Anonymus Casmiriensis Mokṣopāya

prakaraṇa vairāgya

prathamas sargaḥ

divi bhūmau tathākāśe bahir antaś ca me vibhuḥ ।
yo avabhāty avabhāsātmā tasmai viśvātmane namaḥ ।। 

aham baddho vimuktas syām iti yasyāsti niścayaḥ ।
nātyantatajjño nātajjñas so asmiñ śāstre adhikāravān ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

kathopāyān vicāryādau mokṣopāyān imān atha ।
yo vicārayati prājño na sa bhūyo abhijāyate ।। 

asmin rāmāyaṇe nāma kathopāyān mahāphalān ।
etāṃs tu prathamaṃ kṛtvā purāham arimardana ।। 

śiṣyāyāsmai vinītāya bharadvājāya dhīmate ।
ekāgro dattavān ramyān maṇīn abdhir ivārthine ।। 

tata ete kathopāyā bharadvājena dhīmatā ।
kasmiṃścin merugahane brahmaṇo agra udāhṛtāḥ ।। 

athāsya tuṣṭo bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ ।
varaṃ putra gṛhāṇeti samuvāca mahāśayaḥ ।। 

bharadvājaḥ

bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa varo ayaṃ me adya rocate ।
yeneyaṃ janatā duḥkhān mucyate tad udāhara ।। 

brahmā

guruṃ vālmīkim atrāśu prārthayasva prayatnataḥ ।
tenedaṃ yat samārabdhaṃ rāmāyaṇam aninditam ।। 

tasmiñ jñāte naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati ।
setunevāmbudheḥ pāram apāraguṇaśālinā ।। 

ity uktvā sa bharadvājaṃ parameṣṭhī mamāśramam ।
abhyāgamat samaṃ tena bharadvājena bhūtakṛt ।। 

tūrṇaṃ sampūjito devas so arghyapādyādinā mayā ।
avocan māṃ mahāsattvas sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।। 

rāmasvabhāvakathanād asmād varamune tvayā ।
nodyogas samparityājya ā samāpter aninditāt ।। 

jñātenānena loko ayam asmāt saṃsārasaṅkaṭāt ।
samuttariṣyati kṣipraṃ potenevāśu sāgarāt ।। 

vaktuṃ tavaitam evārtham aham āgatavān ayam ।
kuru lokahitārthaṃ tvaṃ śāstram ity uktavān ajaḥ ।। 

mama puṇyāśramāt tasmāt kṣaṇād antardhim āgataḥ ।
muhūrtād udyataḥ proccais taraṅga iva vāriṇaḥ ।। 

tasmin prayāte bhagavaty ahaṃ vismayam āgataḥ ।
punas tatra bharadvājam apṛcchaṃ svacchayā dhiyā ।। 

kim etad brahmaṇā proktam bharadvāja vadāśu me ।
ity uktena punaḥ proktam bharadvājena me anagha ।। 

bharadvājaḥ

etad uktam bhagavatā yathā rāmāyaṇaṃ kuru ।
sarvalokahitāyāśu saṃsārārṇavapotakam ।। 

mahyaṃ ca bhagavan brūhi kathaṃ saṃsārasaṅkaṭe ।
rāmo vyavahṛto apy asmin bharataś ca mahāmanāḥ ।। 

śatrughno lakṣmaṇaś cāpi sītā cāpi yaśasvinī ।
rāmānuyāyinas te vā mantriputrā mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

nirduḥkhatāṃ kathaṃ te tu prāptās tad brūhi me sphuṭam ।
tathaivāhaṃ tariṣyāmi tato janatayā saha ।। 

bharadvājena rājendra yadety ukto asmi sādaram ।
tadā kartuṃ vibhor ājñām ahaṃ vaktuṃ pravṛttavān ।। 

śṛṇu vatsa bharadvāja yathāpṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te ।
śrutena yena sammoham alaṃ dūrīkariṣyasi ।। 

tathā vyavahara prājña yathā vyavahṛtas sukhī ।
sarvāsaṃsaktayā buddhyā rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ ।। 

lakṣmaṇo bharataś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahāmanāḥ ।
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca sītā daśarathas tathā ।। 

kṛtāsthaś cāvirodhaś ca bodhapāram upāgataḥ ।
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca mantriṇo aṣṭau tathetare ।। 

ghṛṣṭir vikunto bhāmaś ca satyavardhana eva ca ।
vibhīṣaṇas suṣeṇaś ca hanumān indrajit tathā ।। 

ete aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ proktās samanīrāgacetasaḥ ।
jīvanmuktā mahātmāno yathāprāptānuvartinaḥ ।। 

ebhir yathā hṛtaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītam uṣitaṃ smṛtam ।
tathā ced vartase putra mukta evāsi saṅkaṭāt ।। 

apārasaṃsārasamudrapātī labdhvā parāṃ yuktim udārasattvaḥ ।
na śokam āyāti na dainyam eti gatajvaras tiṣṭhati nityatṛptaḥ ।। 

sūtramātraṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

bharadvājaḥ

jīvanmuktasthitiṃ brahman kṛtvā rāghavam āditaḥ ।
kramāt kathaya me nityaṃ bhaviṣyāmi sukhī yathā ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
apunassmaraṇaṃ manye sādho vismaraṇaṃ varam ।। 

dṛśyātyantābhāvabodhaṃ vinā tan nānubhūyate ।
kadācit kenacin nāma sa bodho anviṣyatām ataḥ ।। 

sa ceha sambhavaty eva tadartham idam ātatam ।
śāstram ākarṇayasi cet tattvaṃ prāpnoṣi nānyathā ।। 

jagadbhramo ayaṃ dṛśyo api nāsty evety anubhūyate ।
varṇo vyomna ivākhedād vicāreṇāmunānagha ।। 

dṛśyaṃ nāstīti bodhena manaso dṛśyamārjanam ।
sampannaṃ cet tad utpannā parā nirvāṇanirvṛtiḥ ।। 

anyathā śāstragarteṣu luṭhatāṃ bhavatām iha ।
bhavaty akṛtrimajñānā kalpair api na nirvṛtiḥ ।। 

parityāgo vāsanāyā uttamo mokṣa ucyate ।
brahman sa eṣa vimalakramo jñānaprakāśakaḥ ।। 

kṣīṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ tu mano galati satvaram ।
kṣīṇāyāṃ śītasantatyāṃ brahman himakaṇo yathā ।। 

ayaṃ vāsanayā deho dhriyate bhūtapañjaraḥ ।
tanunāntarniviṣṭena muktaughas tantunā yathā ।। 

vāsanā dvividhā proktā śuddhā ca malinā tathā ।
malinā janmano hetuś śuddhā janmavināśinī ।। 

ajñānasughanākārā ghanāhaṅkāraśālinī ।
punarjanmakarī proktā malinā vāsanā budhaiḥ ।। 

punarjanmāṅkuratyaktā sthitā sambhṛṣṭabījavat ।
dehāntaṃ dhriyate jñātajñeyā śuddheti socyate ।। 

apunarjanmakaraṇī jīvanmukteṣu dehiṣu ।
vāsanā vidyate śuddhā dehe cakra iva bhramaḥ ।। 

ye śuddhavāsanā bhūyo na janmānarthabhājanam ।
jñātajñeyās ta ucyante jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktapadaṃ prāpto yathā rāmo mahāmatiḥ ।
tat te ahaṃ sampravakṣyāmi jarāmaraṇaśāntaye ।। 

bharadvāja mahābuddhe rāmakramam imaṃ śubham ।
śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tenaiva sarvaṃ jñāsyasi sarvathā ।। 

vidyāgṛhād viniṣkramya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ ।
divasāny anayad gehe līlābhir akutobhayaḥ ।। 

atha gacchati kāle atra pālayaty avaniṃ nṛpe ।
prajāsu vītaśokāsu sthitāsu vigatajvaram ।। 

tīrthamunyāśramaśreṇīṃ draṣṭum utkaṇṭhitaṃ manaḥ ।
rāmasyābhūd bhṛśaṃ tatra kadācid guṇaśālinaḥ ।। 

rāghavaś cintayitvaivam upetya caraṇau pituḥ ।
haṃsaḥ padmāv iva navau jagrāha nakhakesarau ।। 

rāmaḥ

tīrthāni devasadmāni vanāny āyatanāni ca ।
draṣṭum utkaṇṭhitaṃ tāta mamedaṃ hi bhṛśaṃ manaḥ ।। 

tad etām arthanāṃ pūrvāṃ saphalīkartum arhasi ।
na so asti bhuvane tāta tvayā yo arthī vimānitaḥ ।। 

iti samprārthito rājā vasiṣṭhena samaṃ tadā ।
vicāryāmuñcad evainaṃ rāmaṃ prathamam arthinam ।। 

śubhe nakṣatradivase bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ ।
maṅgalālaṅkṛtavapuḥ kṛtasvastyayano dvijaiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaprahitair vipraiś śāstratajjñais samanvitaḥ ।
snigdhaiḥ katipayair eva rājaputravarais saha ।। 

ambābhir vihitāśīrbhir āliṅgyāliṅgya bhūṣitaḥ ।
niragāt sa gṛhāt tasmāt tīrthayātrārtham udyataḥ ।। 

nirgatas svapurāt paurais tūryaghoṣeṇa vardhitaḥ ।
pīyamānaḥ purandhrīṇāṃ netrair bhṛṅgaughabhaṅguraiḥ ।। 

grāmīṇalalanālokahastapadmāpavarjitaiḥ ।
lājavarṣair vikīrṇātmā himair iva himācalaḥ ।। 

āvarjayan vipragaṇān pariśṛṇvan prajāśiṣaḥ ।
ālokayan digantāṃś ca paricakrāma jaṅgale ।। 

athārabhya svakāt tasmāt kramāt kosalamaṇḍalāt ।
snānadānatapodhyānapūrvakaṃ sa dadarśa ha ।। 

nadīs tīrthāni puṇyāni vanāny āyatanāni ca ।
jaṅgalāni vanānteṣu taṭāny abdhimahībhṛtām ।। 

mandākinīm indunibhāṃ kālindīṃ cotpalāmalām ।
sarasvatīṃ śatadruṃ ca candrabhāgām irāvatīm ।। 

veṇāṃ ca kṛṣṇaveṇāṃ ca nirvindhyāṃ sarayūṃ tathā ।
carmaṇvatīṃ vitastāṃ ca vipāśāṃ bāhudām api ।। 

prayāgaṃ naimiṣaṃ caiva dharmāraṇyaṃ gayāṃ tathā ।
vārāṇasīṃ śrīgiriṃ ca kedāraṃ puṣkaraṃ tathā ।। 

mānasaṃ ca kramasaras tathaivottaramānasam ।
vaḍavāṃ maḍavāṃ caiva tīrthavṛndaṃ sasodaram ।। 

agnitīrthaṃ mahātīrtham indradyumnasaras tathā ।
sarāṃsi sarasīś caiva tathā vāpīhradāvalīm ।। 

svāminaṃ kārttikeyaṃ ca sāligrāmahariṃ tathā ।
sthānāni ca catuṣṣaṣṭiṃ harasya girijāpateḥ ।। 

nānāścaryavicitrāṇi caturabdhitaṭāni ca ।
vindhyakandarakuñjāṃś ca kulaśailasthalāni ca ।। 

rājarṣīṇāṃ ca mahatāṃ brahmarṣīṇāṃ tathaiva ca ।
devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pāvanān āśramāñ śubhān ।। 

bhūyo bhūyas sa babhrāma bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha mānadaḥ ।
caturṣv api diganteṣu sarvān eva mahītaṭān ।। 

amarakinnaramānavamānitas samavalokya mahīm akhilām imām ।
upayayau svagṛhaṃ raghunandano vihṛtadik śivalokam iveśvaraḥ ।। 

tīrthayātrākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

lājapuṣpāñjalivrātair vikīrṇaḥ pauravāsibhiḥ ।
sa viveśa gṛhaṃ śrīmāñ jayanto viṣṭapaṃ yathā ।। 

praṇanāmātha pitaraṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ mātṛbāndhavān ।
brāhmaṇān guruvṛddhāṃś ca rāghavaḥ prathamāgataḥ ।। 

suhṛdbhir mātṛbhiś caiva pitrā dvijagaṇena ca ।
muhurāliṅganācārai rāghavo na mamau tadā ।। 

tasmin dṛḍhair dāśarathau priyaprakathanair mithaḥ ।
jughūrṇur madhurair āśā mṛduvaṃśasvanair iva ।। 

bahūny āsa dināny atra rāmāgamanam utsavaḥ ।
mahānande janān muñcan kelikolāhalākulaḥ ।। 

uvāsa sa sukhaṃ gehe tataḥ prabhṛti rāghavaḥ ।
varṇayan vividhācārān deśācārān itas tataḥ ।। 

prātar utthāya rāmo asau kṛtvā sandhyāṃ yathāvidhi ।
sabhāsaṃsthaṃ dadarśendrasamaṃ svapitaraṃ tadā ।। 

kathābhis suvicitrābhis sa vasiṣṭhādibhis saha ।
sthitvā dinacaturbhāgaṃ jñānagarbhābhir ādṛtaḥ ।। 

jagāma pitranujñāto mahatyā senayāvṛtaḥ ।
varāhamahiṣākīrṇaṃ vanam ākheṭakecchayā ।। 

tata āgatya sadane kṛtvā snānādikaṃ kramāt ।
samitrabāndhavo bhuktvā nināya sasuhṛn niśām ।। 

evamprāyadinācāro bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ ।
āgatya tīrthayātrāyās samuvāsa pitur gṛhe ।। 

nṛpatisaṃvyavahāramanojñayā sujanacetasi candrikayā tathā ।
parinināya dināni sa ceṣṭayā śrutasudhārasapeśalayānaghaḥ ।। 

divasavyavahāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

athonaṣoḍaśe varṣe vartamāne raghūdvahe ।
rāmānuyāyini tathā śatrughne lakṣmaṇe api ca ।। 

bharate saṃsthite nityaṃ mātāmahagṛhe sukham ।
pālayaty avaniṃ rājñi yathāvad akhilām imām ।। 

janyatrārthaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ pratyahaṃ saha mantribhiḥ ।
kṛtamantre mahāprajñe tajjñe daśarathe nṛpe ।। 

kṛtāyāṃ tīrthayātrāyāṃ rāmo nijagṛhasthitaḥ ।
jagāmānudinaṃ kārśyaṃ śaradīvāmalaṃ saraḥ ।। 

kramād asya viśālākṣaṃ pāṇḍutāṃ mukham ādadhe ।
pākaphulladalaṃ śuklaṃ sālimālam ivāmbujam ।। 

kapolatalasaṃlīnapāṇiḥ padmāsanasthitaḥ ।
cintāparavaśas tūṣṇīm avyāpāro babhūva saḥ ।। 

kṛśāṅgaś cintayā yuktaḥ khedī paramadurmanāḥ ।
novāca kasyacit kiñcil lipikarmārpitopamaḥ ।। 

khedāt parijanenāsau prārthyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
cakārāhnikam ācāraṃ parimlānamukhāmbujaḥ ।। 

evaṃ muniviśiṣṭaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ guṇagaṇākaram ।
ālokya bhrātarāv asya tām evāyayatur daśām ।। 

tathā teṣu tanūjeṣu khedavatsu kṛśeṣu ca ।
sapatnīko mahīpālaś cintāvivaśatāṃ yayau ।। 

kā te putra ghanā cintety evaṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
apṛcchat snigdhayā vācā na cākathayad asya saḥ ।। 

na kiñcit tāta me duḥkham ity uktvā pitur aṅkagaḥ ।
rāmo rājīvapatrākṣas tūṣṇīm eva sma tiṣṭhati ।। 

tato daśaratho rājā rāmaḥ kiṃ khedavān iti ।
apṛcchat sarvakāryajñaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ vadatāṃ varam ।। 

asty atra kāraṇaṃ śrīman mā rājan duḥkham astu te ।
ity uktaś cintayā yukto vasiṣṭhamuninā nṛpaḥ ।। 

kopaṃ viṣādakalanāṃ vitataṃ ca harṣaṃ nālpena kāraṇavaśena vahanti santaḥ ।
sargeṇa saṃhatijavena vinā jagatyāṃ bhūtāni bhūpa na mahānti vikārayanti ।। 

kārśyaparidevanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

ity ukte munināthena sandehavati pārthive ।
khedavaty āsthite maunaṃ kañcit kālaṃ pratīkṣiṇi ।। 

parikhinnāsu sarvāsu rājñīṣu nṛpasadmasu ।
sthitāsu sāvadhānāsu rāmaceṣṭāsu sarvataḥ ।। 

etasminn eva kāle tu viśvāmitra iti śrutaḥ ।
maharṣir āgamad draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāṃ narādhipam ।। 

tasya yajño atha rakṣobhis tadā vilulupe kila ।
māyāvīryabalonmattair dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ ।। 

rakṣārthaṃ tasya yajñasya draṣṭum aicchat sa pārthivam ।
na hi śakto hy avighnena tam āptuṃ sa muniḥ kratum ।। 

tatas teṣāṃ vināśārtham udyatas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ ।
viśvāmitro mahātejā ayodhyām abhyayāt purīm ।। 

sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha ।
śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinas sutam ।। 

tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dvāssthā rājagṛhaṃ yayuḥ ।
sambhrāntamanasas sarve tena vākyena coditāḥ ।। 

te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tataḥ ।
prāptam āvedayām āsuḥ pratīhārapatiṃ tadā ।। 

athāsthānagataṃ bhūpaṃ rājamaṇḍalamālitam ।
samupetya tvarāyukto yāṣṭīko asau vyajijñapat ।। 

deva dvāri mahātejā bālabhāskarabhāsvaraḥ ।
jvālāruṇajaṭājūṭaḥ pumāñ śrīmān avasthitaḥ ।। 

sacāmarapatākāḍhyaṃ sāśvebhapuruṣāyudham ।
kṛtavāṃs taṃ pradeśaṃ yas tejobhiḥ kīrṇakāñcanam ।। 

vakty asmān āśu yāṣṭīkā nivedayata rājani ।
viśvāmitro muniḥ prāpta ity anuddhatayā girā ।। 

iti yāṣṭīkavacanam ākarṇya nṛpasattamaḥ ।
sa samantrī sasāmantaḥ prottasthe hemaviṣṭarāt ।। 

padātir eva mahatāṃ rājñāṃ vṛndena pālitaḥ ।
vasiṣṭhavāmadevābhyāṃ saha sāmantasaṃstutaḥ ।। 

jagāma tatra yatrāsau viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ ।
dadarśa muniśārdūlaṃ dvārabhūmāv adhiṣṭhitam ।। 

kenāpi kāraṇenorvītalam arkam ivāgatam ।
brāhmeṇa tejasākrāntaṃ kṣātreṇa ca mahaujasā ।। 

jarājaraḍhayā nityaṃ tapaḥprasararūkṣayā ।
jaṭāvallyā vṛtaskandhaṃ sasandhyābhram ivācalam ।। 

upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighaṃ tathā ।
nibhṛtaṃ corjitākāraṃ dadhānaṃ bhāsvaraṃ vapuḥ ।। 

peśalenātibhīmena prasannenākulena ca ।
gambhīreṇātipūrṇena tejasā rañjitaprajam ।। 

anantajīvitadaśāsakhīm ekām aninditām ।
dhārayantaṃ kare ślakṣṇāṃ vīṇām amlānamānasam ।। 

karuṇākrāntacetastvāt prasannamadhurekṣitaiḥ ।
īkṣaṇair amṛteneva saṃsiñcantam imāḥ prajāḥ ।। 

sitāsitatatāpāṅgaṃ dhavalapronnatabhruvam ।
ānandaṃ ca bhayaṃ cāntaḥ prayacchantam avekṣituḥ ।। 

munim ālokya bhūpālo dūrād evānatākṛtiḥ ।
praṇanāma galanmaulimaṇimālitabhūtalam ।। 

munir apy avaner īśaṃ bhāsvān iva śatakratum ।
tatrābhivādayāṃ cakre madhurodārayā girā ।। 

tato vasiṣṭhapramukhās sarva eva dvijātayaḥ ।
svāgatādikrameṇainaṃ pūjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

daśarathaḥ

aśaṅkitopanītena bhāsvatā darśanena te ।
sādho svanugṛhītās smo raviṇevāmbujākarāḥ ।। 

yad anādi yad akṣubdhaṃ yad apāyavivarjitam ।
tad ānandasukhaṃ prāptā adya tvaddarśanān mune ।। 

adya vartāmahe nūnaṃ dharmyāṇāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ ।
bhavadāgamanasyeme yad vayaṃ lakṣyatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

evaṃ prakathayanto atra rājāno atha maharṣayaḥ ।
āsaneṣu sabhāsthānam āsthāya samupāviśan ।। 

sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ lakṣmyā bhītas tam ṛṣim āgatam ।
prahṛṣṭavadano rājā svayam arghyaṃ nyavedayat ।। 

sa rājñaḥ pratigṛhyārghyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā ।
pradakṣiṇaṃ prakurvantaṃ rājānaṃ paryapūjayat ।। 

sa rājñā pūjitas tena prahṛṣṭavadanas tadā ।
kuśalaṃ cāpyayaṃ caiva paryapṛcchan narādhipam ।। 

vasiṣṭhena samāgamya prahasya munipuṅgavaḥ ।
yathārhaṃ cārcayitvainaṃ papracchānāmayaṃ tataḥ ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ yathārham anyo'nyaṃ pūjayitvā sametya ca ।
te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso mahārājaniveśane ।। 

yathocitāsanagatā mithas saṃvṛddhatejasaḥ ।
paraspareṇa papracchus sarve anāmayam ādarāt ।। 

upaviṣṭāya tasmai sa viśvāmitrāya dhīmate ।
pādyam arghyaṃ ca gāś caiva bhūyo bhūyo nyavedayat ।। 

arcayitvā ca vidhivad viśvāmitram abhāṣata ।
prāñjaliḥ prayato vākyam idaṃ prītamanā nṛpaḥ ।। 

yathāmṛtasya samprāptir yathā varṣam avarṣake ।
yathāndhasyekṣaṇaprāptir bhavadāgamanaṃ tathā ।। 

yatheṣṭadhanasamparkaḥ putrajanmāprajāvataḥ ।
svapnadṛṣṭārthalābhaś ca bhavadāgamanaṃ tathā ।। 

yathepsitena saṃyoga iṣṭasyāgamanaṃ yathā ।
praṇaṣṭasya yathā lābho bhavadāgamanaṃ tathā ।। 

yathā harṣo nabhogatyā mṛtasya punar āgamāt ।
tathā tvadāgamād brahman svāgataṃ te mahāmune ।। 

brahmalokanivāso hi kasya na prītim āvahet ।
mune tavāgamas tadvat satyam eva bravīmi te ।। 

kaś ca te paramaḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca te karavāṇy aham ।
pātrabhūto asi me vipra prāptaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।। 

pūjyo rājarṣiśabdena tapasā dyotitaprajaḥ ।
brahmarṣitvam anu prāptaḥ pūjyo asi bhagavan mama ।। 

gaṅgājalābhiṣekeṇa yathā prītir bhaven mama ।
tathā tvaddarśanāt prītir antaś śītayatīva mām ।। 

vigatecchābhayakrodho vītarāgo nirāmayaḥ ।
idam atyadbhutaṃ brahman yad bhavān mām upāgataḥ ।। 

śubhakṣetragataṃ cāham ātmānam apakalmaṣam ।
candrabimba ivonmagnaṃ vedmi vedyavidāṃ vara ।। 

sākṣād iva brahmaṇo me tavābhyāgamanaṃ matam ।
pūto asmy anugṛhīto asmi tavābhyāgamanān mune ।। 

tvadāgamanapuṇyena sādho yad anurañjitam ।
adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ tat sujīvitam ।। 

tvām ihābhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā pratipūjya praṇamya ca ।
ātmany eva namāmy antar dṛṣṭendur jaladhir yathā ।। 

yat kāryaṃ yena cārthena prāpto asi munipuṅgava ।
kṛtam ity eva tad viddhi mānyo asi hi bhṛśaṃ mama ।। 

svakāryeṇa vimarśaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi kauśika ।
bhagavan nāsty adeyaṃ hi tvayi yat pratipadyate ।। 

kāryasya ca vicāraṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi dharmataḥ ।
kartā cāham aśeṣaṃ te daivataṃ paramaṃ bhavān ।। 

idam atimadhuraṃ niśamya vākyaṃ śrutisukham arthavidā vinītam uktam ।
prathitaguṇavaśād guṇair viśiṣṭaṃ munivṛṣabhaḥ paramaṃ jagāma harṣam ।। 

viśvāmitrābhyāgamanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tac chrutvā rājasiṃhasya vākyam adbhutavistaram ।
hṛṣṭaromā mahātejā viśvāmitro abhyabhāṣata ।। 

sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla tavaivaitan mahītale ।
mahāvaṃśaprasūtasya vasiṣṭhavaśavartinaḥ ।। 

yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryavinirṇayam ।
kuru tvaṃ rājaśārdūla dharmaṃ samanupālaya ।। 

ahaṃ niyamam ātiṣṭhe siddhyarthaṃ puruṣarṣabha ।
tasya vighnakarā ghorā rākṣasā mama saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

yadā yadā tu yajñena yaje ahaṃ vibudhavrajam ।
tadā tadā me yajñaṃ taṃ vinighnanti niśācarāḥ ।। 

bahuśo vihite tasmin mama rākṣasanāyakāḥ ।
akiraṃs te mahīṃ yāge māṃsena rudhireṇa ca ।। 

avadhūte tathābhūte tasmin yāgakadambake ।
kṛtaśramo nirutsāhas tasmād deśād apāgamam ।। 

na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva ।
tathābhūtaṃ hi tat karma na śāpas tasya vidyate ।। 

īdṛśī ca kṣamā rājan mama tasmin mahākratau ।
tvatprasādād avighnena prāpayeyaṃ mahāphalam ।। 

trātum arhasi mām ārtaṃ śaraṇārthinam āgatam ।
arthināṃ yan nirāśatvaṃ satām abhibhavo hi saḥ ।। 

tavāsti tanayaś śrīmān dṛptaśārdūlavikramaḥ ।
mahendrasadṛśo vīro rāmo rakṣovidāraṇaḥ ।। 

taṃ putraṃ rājaśārdūla rāmaṃ satyaparākramam ।
kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi ।। 

śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā ।
rākṣasā ye apakartāras teṣāṃ mūrdhavinigrahe ।। 

śreyaś cāsmai kariṣyāmi bahurūpam anantakam ।
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena pūjyo bhaviṣyati ।। 

na ca tena samāsādya sthātuṃ śaktā niśācarāḥ ।
kruddhaṃ kesariṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe vana ivaiṇakāḥ ।। 

teṣāṃ nānyaś ca kākutsthād yoddhum utsahate pumān ।
ṛte kesariṇaḥ kruddhān mattānāṃ kariṇām iva ।। 

vīryotsiktā hi te pāpāḥ kālakūṭopamā raṇe ।
kharadūṣaṇayor bhṛtyāḥ kṛtāntāḥ kupitā iva ।। 

rāmasya rājaśārdūla sahiṣyante na sāyakān ।
anāratāgatā dhārā jaladasyeva pāṃsavaḥ ।। 

na ca putragataṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva ।
na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na deyaṃ mahātmanaḥ ।। 

hanta nūnaṃ vijānāmi hatāṃs tān viddhi rākṣasān ।
na hy asmadādayaḥ prājñās sandigdhe sampravṛttayaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ vedmi mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam ।
vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejā ye cānye dīrghadarśinaḥ ।। 

yadi dharmo mahattvaṃ ca yaśas te manasi sthitam ।
tan mahyaṃ svam abhipretam ātmajaṃ dātum arhasi ।। 

daśarātraś ca me yajño yasmin rāmeṇa rākṣasāḥ ।
hantavyā vighnakartāro mama yajñasya vairiṇaḥ ।। 

atrābhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadatāṃ tava mantriṇaḥ ।
vasiṣṭhapramukhās sarve tena rāmaṃ visarjaya ।। 

nātyeti kālaḥ kālajña yathāyaṃ mama rāghava ।
tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ ।। 

kāryam aṇv api kāle tu kṛtam ety upakāratām ।
mahad apy upakāreṇa riktatām ety akālataḥ ।। 

ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ ।
virarāma mahātejā viśvāmitro munīśvaraḥ ।। 

śrutvā vaco munivarasya mahāprabhāvas tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad upapannam idaṃ sa vaktum ।
no yuktiyuktakathanena vinaiti toṣaṃ dhīmān apūritamano'bhimataś ca lokaḥ ।। 

viśvāmitravākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tac chrutvā rājaśārdūlo viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam ।
muhūrtam āsīn niśceṣṭas sadainyaṃ cedam abravīt ।। 

ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣo ayaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ ।
na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ ।। 

iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāḥ patir ahaṃ prabho ।
tayā parivṛto yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi piśitāśinām ।। 

ime hi śūrā vikrāntā bhṛtyā astraviśāradāḥ ।
ahaṃ caiṣāṃ dhanuṣpāṇir goptā samaramūrdhani ।। 

ebhis saha tavārīṇāṃ mahendramahatām api ।
dadāmi yuddhaṃ mattānāṃ kariṇām iva kesarī ।। 

bālo rāmas tv anīkeṣu na jānāti balābalam ।
antaḥpurād ṛte dṛṣṭā nānenānyā raṇāvaniḥ ।। 

na cāstraiḥ paramair yukto na ca yuddhaviśāradaḥ ।
na bhaṭabhrūkuṭīnāṃ ca tajjñas samaramūrdhasu ।। 

kevalaṃ puṣpaṣaṇḍeṣu nagaropavaneṣu ca ।
udyānavanakuñjeṣu sadaiva pariśīlitaḥ ।। 

vihartum eṣa jānāti saha rājakumārakaiḥ ।
kīrṇapuṣpopakārāsu svakāsv ajirabhūmiṣu ।। 

adya tv atitarāṃ brahman mama bhāgyaviparyayāt ।
himenevāhataḥ padmas sampanno haritaḥ kṛśaḥ ।। 

nāttum annāni śaknoti na vihartuṃ gṛhāvanau ।
antaḥkhedaparītātmā tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhati kevalam ।। 

sadāras sahabhṛtyo ahaṃ tatkṛte munināyaka ।
śaradīva payovāho nūnaṃ nissahatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

īdṛśo asau suto bāla ādhinā vivaśīkṛtaḥ ।
kathaṃ dadāmi taṃ tubhyaṃ yoddhuṃ saha niśācaraiḥ ।। 

api bālāṅganāsaṅgād api sādho sudhārasāt ।
rājyād api sukhāyaiṣa putrasneho mahāmate ।। 

ye durantā mahārambhās triṣu lokeṣu khedadāḥ ।
putrasnehena santo api kurvate te na saṃśrayam ।। 

asavo atha dhanaṃ dārās tyajyante mānavais sukham ।
na putrā muniśārdūla svabhāvo hy eṣa jantuṣu ।। 

rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaḥ kūṭayuddhaviśāradāḥ ।
rāmas tān yodhayatv ittham uktir evātidussahā ।। 

viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe ।
jīvituṃ jīvitākāṅkṣī na rāmaṃ netum arhasi ।। 

navavarṣasahasrāṇi mama yātāni kauśika ।
duḥkhenotpāditās tv ete catvāraḥ putrakā mayā ।। 

pradhānabhūtas teṣv eṣu rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ ।
taṃ vinā te trayo apy anye dhārayanti na jīvitam ।। 

sa eva rāmo bhavatā nīyate rākṣasān prati ।
yadi tat putrahīnaṃ tvaṃ mṛtam evāśu viddhi mām ।। 

caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītir atra hi me parā ।
jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamayaṃ tasmān na rāmaṃ netum arhasi ।। 

niśācarabalaṃ hantuṃ mune yadi tavepsitam ।
caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha balaṃ naya ।। 

kiṃvīryā rākṣasās te tu kasya putrāḥ kathaṃ ca te ।
kiyatpramāṇāḥ ke caite iti varṇaya me sphuṭam ।। 

kathaṃ tena prahartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām ।
māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām ।। 

sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan yathā teṣāṃ mayā raṇe ।
sthātavyaṃ duṣṭasattvānāṃ vīryotsiktā hi rākṣasāḥ ।। 

śrūyate hi mahāvīro rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ ।
sākṣād vaiśravaṇabhrātā putro viśravaso muneḥ ।। 

sa cet tava makhe vighnaṃ karoti kila durmatiḥ ।
tat saṅgrāme na śaktās smo vayaṃ tasya durātmanaḥ ।। 

kāle kāle pṛthag brahman bhūrivīryavibhūtayaḥ ।
bhūteṣv abhyudayaṃ yānti pralīyante ca kālataḥ ।। 

adyāsmiṃs te vayaṃ kāle rāvaṇādiṣu śatruṣu ।
na samarthāḥ puras sthātuṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

tasmāt prasādaṃ dharmajña kuru tvaṃ mama putrake ।
mama caivālpabhāgyasya bhavān hy asamadaivatam ।। 

devadānavagandharvā yakṣaplavagapannagāḥ ।
na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ yoddhuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣā yudhi ।। 

mahāvīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte sa sudhābhujām ।
tena sārdhaṃ na śaktās smas saṃyuge tasya vā varaiḥ ।। 

ayam anyatamaḥ kālaḥ pelavīkṛtasajjanaḥ ।
rāghavo api gato dainyaṃ yatra vārddhakajarjaraḥ ।। 

atha vā lavaṇaṃ brahman yajñaghnaṃ taṃ madhos sutam ।
kathaya tvaṃ suraprakhya kveva mokṣyāmi putrakam ।। 

atha necchasi ced brahmaṃs tad vidheyo aham eva te ।
anyathā tu na paśyāmi śāśvataṃ jayam ātmanaḥ ।। 

ity uktvā mṛduvacanaṃ bhayākulo asāv ālole munimatasaṃśaye nimagnaḥ ।
nājñāsīt kaṇam api niścayaṃ mahātmā prodvīcāv iva jaladhau samuhyamānaḥ ।। 

daśarathavākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya snehaparyākulākṣaram ।
samanyuḥ kauśiko vākyaṃ pratyuvāca mahīpatim ।। 

viśvāmitraḥ

kariṣyāmīti saṃśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi ।
sattvavān kesarī bhūtvā mṛgatām abhivāñchasi ।। 

rāghavānām ayukto ayaṃ kulasyāsya viparyayaḥ ।
na kadācana jāyante śītāṃśau kṛṣṇaraśmayaḥ ।। 

yadi tvaṃ na kṣamo rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgataḥ ।
hīnapratijñaḥ kākutstha sukhī bhava sabāndhavaḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

tasmin kopaparīte atha viśvāmitre mahātmani ।
cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā surāś ca bhayam āviśan ।। 

krodhābhibhūtaṃ vijñāya jaganmitraṃ mahāmunim ।
dhṛtimān suvrato dhīmān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātas sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ ।
bhavān daśarathaś śrīmāṃs trailokye guṇabhūṣitaḥ ।। 

nītimān suvrato bhūtvā na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi ।
munes tribhuvaneśasya vacanaṃ kartum arhasi ।। 

triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmeṇa yaśasā yutaḥ ।
svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi ।। 

kariṣyāmīti saṃśrutya tat te rājann akurvataḥ ।
iṣṭāpūrtaḥ pated dharmas tasmād rāmaṃ visarjaya ।। 

guptaṃ puruṣasiṃhena jvalanenāmṛtaṃ yathā ।
kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ drakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ ।। 

ikṣvākuvaṃśajāto api svayaṃ daśaratho api san ।
na pālayasi ced vākyaṃ ko aparaḥ pālayiṣyati ।। 

yuṣmadādipraṇītena vyavahāreṇa jantavaḥ ।
maryādāṃ na vimuñcanti tāṃ na hātum ihārhasi ।। 

eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ ।
eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasāṃ ca parāyaṇaḥ ।। 

eṣo astraṃ vividhaṃ vetti trailokye sacarācare ।
naitad anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyati kaścana ।। 

na ca devarṣayaḥ kecin nāmarā na ca rākṣasāḥ ।
na nāgayakṣagandharvā anena sadṛśā nṛpa ।। 

astram asmai bhṛśāśvena paraiḥ paramadurjayam ।
kauśikāya purā dattaṃ yadā rājyaṃ samanvaśāt ।। 

te hi putrāḥ bhṛśāśvasya prajāpatisutopamāḥ ।
enam anvacaran vīrā dīptimanto mahaujasaḥ ।। 

jayā ca suprabhā caiva dākṣāyaṇyau sumadhyame ।
tayos tu yāny apatyāni śataṃ paramadurjayam ।। 

pañcāśatas sutāñ jajñe jayā labdhavarā purā ।
vadhāyāsurasainyānāṃ te akṣayāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

suprabhā janayām āsa putrān pañcāśataḥ parān ।
saṅgharṣān nāma durdharṣān durākrośān balīyasaḥ ।। 

evaṃvīryo mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ ।
na rāmagamane buddhiṃ viklavāṃ kartum arhasi ।। 

asmin mahāsattvamaye munīndre sthite samīpe puruṣas tu sādhuḥ ।
prāpte api mṛtyāv amaratvam eti mā dīnatāṃ gaccha yathā vimūḍhaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathas sutam ।
samutsraṣṭumanā rāmam ājuhāva salakṣmaṇam ।। 

daśarathaḥ

pratīhāra mahābāhuṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam ।
salakṣmaṇam avighnena munyarthaṃ śīghram ānaya ।। 

iti rājñā visṛṣṭo asau gatvāntaḥpuramandiram ।
muhūrtamātreṇāgatya samuvāca mahīpatim ।। 

deva dordalitāśeṣaripo rāmas svamandire ।
vimanās saṃsthito rātrau ṣaṭpadaḥ kamale yathā ।। 

āgacchāmi kṣaṇeneti vakti dhyāyati caikakaḥ ।
na kasyacit sa nikaṭe sthātum icchati khinnadhīḥ ।। 

ity ukte tena bhūpālas taṃ rāmānucaraṃ janam ।
sarvam āśvāsayām āsa papraccha ca yathākramam ।। 

kathaṃ kīdṛk sthito rāma iti pṛṣṭo mahībhṛtā ।
rāmabhṛtyajanaḥ khinno vākyam āha mahīpatim ।। 

dehayaṣṭim imāṃ deva dhārayanta ime vayam ।
khinnāḥ khedaparimlāne vibho rāme sute tava ।। 

rāmo rājīvapattrākṣo yataḥ prabhṛti cāgataḥ ।
savipras tīrthayātrāyās tataḥ prabhṛti durmanāḥ ।। 

yatnaprārthanayāsmākaṃ nijavyāpāram āhnikam ।
sāyam amlānavadanaḥ karoti na karoti vā ।। 

snānadevārcanācāraparyante parikhedavān ।
prārthito api hi nā tṛpter aśnāty aśanam īśvaraḥ ।। 

lolāntaḥpuranārībhiḥ kṛtadolābhir aṅgane ।
na ca krīḍati līlābhir dharādbhir iva cātakaḥ ।। 

māṇikyamuktāsamprotā keyūrakaṭakāvalī ।
nānandayati taṃ rājan dyauḥ pātavivaśaṃ yathā ।। 

krīḍadvadhūviloleṣu vahatkusumavāyuṣu ।
latāvalayageheṣu bhavaty ativiṣādavān ।। 

yad ramyam ucitaṃ svādu peśalaṃ cittahāri vā ।
bāṣpapūrekṣaṇa iva tenaiva parikhidyate ।। 

kim imā duḥkhadāyinyaḥ prasphuranti purogatāḥ ।
iti nṛttavilāseṣu kāminīḥ parinindati ।। 

bhojanaṃ śayanaṃ snānaṃ vilāsaṃ pānam āsanam ।
unmattaceṣṭitam iva nābhinandati ninditam ।। 

kiṃ sampadā kiṃ vipadā kiṃ gehena kim īhitaiḥ ।
sarvam evāsad ity uktvā tūṣṇīm eko avatiṣṭhate ।। 

nodeti parihāseṣu na bhogeṣu nimajjati ।
na ca tiṣṭhati kāryeṣu maunam evāvalambate ।। 

vilolālakavallaryo helāvalitalocanāḥ ।
nānandayanti taṃ nāryo mṛgyo vanataruṃ yathā ।। 

ekānteṣu diganteṣu tīreṣu vipineṣu ca ।
ratim āyāty araṇyeṣu vikrītavad ajantuṣu ।। 

vastrapānāśanādānaparāṅmukhatayā tayā ।
parivrāḍdharmiṇāṃ rājan so anuyāti tapasvinām ।। 

eka eva vasan deśe janaśūnye janeśvara ।
na hasaty ekayā buddhyā na gāyati na roditi ।। 

baddhapadmāsanaś śūnyamanā vāmakarasthale ।
kapolatalam ādāya kevalaṃ paritiṣṭhati ।। 

nābhimānam upādatte nābhivāñchati rājatām ।
nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhaduḥkhānuvṛttiṣu ।। 

na vidmaḥ kim asau jātaḥ kiṃ karoti kim īhate ।
kiṃ dhyāyati kim āyāti kathaṃ kim anudhāvati ।। 

pratyahaṃ kṛśatāṃ yāti pratyahaṃ yāti pāṇḍutām ।
virāgaṃ pratyahaṃ yāti śaradanta iva drumaḥ ।। 

anuyātau tam evaitau rājañ śatrughnalakṣmaṇau ।
tādṛśāv eva tasyaiva pratibimbāv ivotthitau ।। 

bhṛtyai rājabhir ambābhis sa pṛṣṭo api punaḥ punaḥ ।
uktvā na kiñcid eveti tūṣṇīm āste nirīhitaḥ ।। 

āpātamātrahṛdyeṣu mā bhogeṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ ।
iti pārśvagataṃ bhavyam anuśāsti suhṛjjanam ।। 

nānāvibhavaramyāsu strīṣu goṣṭhīkathāsu ca ।
purassthitam ivāsneho nāśam evānupaśyati ।। 

rītimādhuryasāyāsapadasaṃsthitivarjitaiḥ ।
ceṣṭitair eva kākalyā bhūyo bhūyaḥ pragāyati ।। 

samrāḍ bhaveti pārśvasthaṃ vadantam anujīvinam ।
pralapantam ivonmattaṃ hasaty anyamanā muniḥ ।। 

na proktam ākarṇayati prekṣate na purogatam ।
karoty avajñāṃ sarvatra sumahaty api vastuni ।। 

apy ākāśasarojinyām apy ākāśamahāvane ।
ittham etat katham iti vismayo asya na jāyate ।। 

kāntāmadhyagatasyāpi mano asya madaneṣavaḥ ।
na bhedayanti durbhedaṃ dhārā iva mahopalam ।। 

āpadām ekam āvāsam abhivāñchasi kiṃ dhanam ।
anuśāsyeti sarvasvam arthine sa prayacchati ।। 

iyam āpad iyaṃ sampad ity ayaṃ kalpanāmayaḥ ।
manasy abhyudito moha iti śokāt pragāyati ।। 

hā hato aham anātho aham ity ākrandaparo api san ।
na jano yāti vairāgyaṃ citram ity eva vakty asau ।। 

raghukānanasālena rāmeṇa ripughātinā ।
bhṛśam itthaṃ sthitenaiva vayaṃ khedam upāgatāḥ ।। 

na vidmaḥ kiṃ mahābāho tasya tādṛśacetasaḥ ।
kurmaḥ kamalapattrākṣa gatir atra hi no bhavān ।। 

rājānam atha vā vipram upadeṣṭāram agragam ।
hasan paśum ivāvyagras so avadhīrayati prabho ।। 

prapañco ayam iha sphāraṃ jagannāma yad utthitam ।
naitad vastu na caivāham iti nirṇīya saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

nārau nātmani no mitre na rājye na ca mātari ।
na sampadāpador nāntas tasyāsthā na vibhor bahiḥ ।। 

nirastāstho nirāśo asau nirīho asau nirāspadaḥ ।
mohena ca vimukto asau tena tapyāmahe vayam ।। 

kiṃ dhanena kim ambābhiḥ kiṃ rājyena kim īhayā ।
iti niścayavān antaḥ prāṇatyāgamanās sthitaḥ ।। 

bhogeṣv āyuṣi rājye ca mitre pitari mātari ।
param udvegam āyātaś cātako avagrahe yathā ।। 

tasya tādṛksvabhāvasya samagravibhavānvitam ।
saṃsārajālam ābhogi prabho prativiṣāyate ।। 

tādṛśas syān mahāsattvaḥ ka ivāsmin mahītale ।
prakṛte vyavahāre taṃ yo niveśayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

iti no yeyam āyātā śākhāprasaraśālinī ।
āpat tām alam uddhartuṃ samudetu dayāparaḥ ।। 

manasi moham apāsya mahāmanās sakalam ārtimataḥ kila sādhutām ।
saphalatāṃ nayatīha tamoharan dinakaro bhuvi bhāskaratām iva ।। 

rāghavaviṣādo nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

viśvāmitraḥ

evaṃ cet tan mahāprājñaṃ bhavanto raghunandanam ।
ihānayantu tvaritaṃ hariṇaṃ hariṇā iva ।। 

eṣa moho raghupater nāpadbhyo na ca rāgataḥ ।
vivekavairāgyakṛto bodha eṣa mahodayaḥ ।। 

ihāyātu kṣaṇād rāmas tad ihaiva vayaṃ kṣaṇāt ।
mohaṃ tasyāpaneṣyāmo maruto adrer ghanaṃ yathā ।। 

etasmin mārjite yuktyā mohe ca raghunandanaḥ ।
viśrāntim eṣyati pade tasmin vayam ivottame ।। 

satyatāṃ muditāṃ prajñāṃ viśrāntiṃ ca sametya saḥ ।
pīnatāṃ varavarṇatvaṃ pītāmṛta ivaiṣyati ।। 

nijāṃ ca prakṛtām eva vyavahāraparamparām ।
paripūrṇamanā mānya ācariṣyaty akhaṇḍitām ।। 

bhaviṣyati mahāsattvo jñātalokaparāvaraḥ ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśāhīnas samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ ।। 

ity ukte munināthena rājā sampūrṇamānasaḥ ।
prāhiṇod rāmam ānetuṃ bhūyo dūtaparamparām ।। 

etāvatā ca kālena rāmo nijagṛhāsanāt ।
pitus sakāśam āgantum utthito arka ivācalāt ।। 

vṛtaḥ katipayair bhṛtyair bhrātṛbhyāṃ cājagāma ha ।
tat puṇyaṃ pitur āsthānaṃ svargaṃ surapater iva ।। 

dūrād eva dadarśāsau rāmo daśarathaṃ tadā ।
vṛtaṃ rājasamūhena devaugheneva vāsavam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrābhyāṃ sevitaṃ pārśvayor dvayoḥ ।
sarvaśāstrārthatajjñena mantrivṛndena pālitam ।। 

cārucāmarahastābhiḥ kāntābhis samupāsitam ।
kakubbhir iva mūrtābhis saṃsthitābhir yathocitam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrādyās tathā daśarathādayaḥ ।
dadṛśū rāghavaṃ dūrād upāyāntaṃ guhopamam ।। 

sattvāvaṣṭambhagarveṇa śaityeneva himālayam ।
śritaṃ sakalasevyena gambhīreṇa svareṇa ca ।। 

saumyaṃ samaśubhākāraṃ vinayodāram ūrjitam ।
kāntopaśāntavapuṣaṃ parasyārthasya bhājanam ।। 

samudyadyauvanārambham udyogaśamaśobhitam ।
anudvignam anāyāsaṃ pūrṇaprāyamanoratham ।। 

vicāritajagadyātraṃ pavitraguṇagocaram ।
mahāsattvaikalobhena guṇair iva samāśritam ।। 

udārasāram āpūrṇam antaḥkaraṇakoṭaram ।
avikṣubhitayā vṛttyā darśayantam anuttamam ।। 

evaṃ guṇagaṇākīrṇo dūrād eva raghūdvahaḥ ।
parimeyasitācchācchasvahārāmbarapallavaḥ ।। 

praṇanāma calaccārucūḍāmaṇimarīcinā ।
śirasā vasudhākampalolamānācalaśriyā ।। 

prathamaṃ pitaraṃ paścān munīn mānyaikam ānataḥ ।
tato viprāṃs tato bandhūṃs tato adhikaguṇān gurūn ।। 

jagrāha cātmanā dṛṣṭvā manāk svādugirā tathā ।
rājalokena vihitāṃ sa praṇāmaparamparām ।। 

vihitāśīr munibhyāṃ tu rāmas sa śamamānasaḥ ।
āsasāda pituḥ puṇyaṃ samīpaṃ surasundaraḥ ।। 

pādābhivandanarataṃ tam athāsau mahīpatiḥ ।
śirasy abhyāliliṅgāśu cucumba ca punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

śatrughnaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva tathaiva paravīrahā ।
āliliṅga ghanasnehaṃ rājahaṃso ambujaṃ yathā ।। 

utsaṅge vatsa tiṣṭheti vadaty atha mahīpatau ।
bhūmau parijanāstīrṇe so aṃśuke atha nyavikṣata ।। 

daśarathaḥ

putra prāptavivekas tvaṃ kalyāṇānāṃ ca bhājanam ।
janavaj jīrṇayā buddhyā khedāyātmā na dīyate ।। 

vṛddhavipraguruproktaṃ tvādṛśenānutiṣṭhatā ।
padam āsādyate puṇyaṃ na moham anudhāvatā ।। 

tāvad evāpado dūre tiṣṭhanti paripelavāḥ ।
yāvad eva na mohasya prasaraḥ putra dīyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājaputra mahābāho śūras tvaṃ vijitās tvayā ।
durucchedā durārambhā apy amī viṣayārayaḥ ।। 

kim atajjña ivājñānāṃ yogye vā mohasāgare ।
vinimajjasi kallolagahane jāḍyaśālini ।। 

viśvāmitraḥ

calannīlotpalavyūhasamalocana lolatām ।
brūhi cetaḥkṛtāṃ tyaktvā hetunā kena muhyasi ।। 

kiṃniṣṭhāḥ kiyatā kena kiyantaḥ kāraṇena te ।
ādhayo nu vilumpanti mano geham ivākhavaḥ ।। 

manye nānucitānāṃ tvam ādhīnāṃ padam uttamaḥ ।
āpatsu cāpto yo dhīro nirjitās tena cādhayaḥ ।। 

yathābhimatam āśu tvaṃ brūhi prāpsyasi cānagham ।
sarvam eva punar yena tava bhetsyanti nādhayaḥ ।। 

ity uttamasya sa mune raghuvaṃśaketur ākarṇya vākyam ucitārthavilāsagarbham ।
tatyāja khedam abhigarjati vārivāhe barhī yathābhyanumitābhimatārthasiddhiḥ ।। 

rāghavasamāśvāsanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

iti pṛṣṭo munīndreṇa samāśvāsya ca rāghavaḥ ।
uvāca vacanaṃ cāru dhīrapūrṇārthamantharam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhavatā pṛṣṭo yathāvad adhunā kila ।
kathayāmy aham ajño api ko laṅghayati sadvacaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ tāvad ayaṃ jāto nije asmin pitṛsadmani ।
krameṇa vṛddhiṃ samprāptaḥ prāptavidyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

tatas sadācāraparo bhūtvāhaṃ munināyaka ।
vihṛtas tīrthayātrārtham urvīm ambudhimekhalām ।। 

etāvatātha kālena saṃsārāsthām imāṃ mama ।
svaviveko jahārāntar oghas taṭalatām iva ।। 

vivekena parītātmā tenāhaṃ tadanu svayam ।
bhoganīrasayā buddhyā pravicāritavān idam ।। 

kiṃ nāmedaṃ vata sukhaṃ yo ayaṃ saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
jāyate mṛtaye loko mriyate jananāya ca ।। 

svasthitās sarva eveme sacarācaraceṣṭitāḥ ।
āpadāṃ patayaḥ pāpā bhāvā vibhavabhūmayaḥ ।। 

ayaśśalākāsadṛśāḥ parasparam asaṅginaḥ ।
śliṣyante kevalaṃ bhāvā manaḥkalpanayā svayā ।। 

manassamāyattam idaṃ jagad ābhogi dṛśyate ।
manaś cāsad ihābhāti kena smaḥ parimohitāḥ ।। 

asataiva vayaṃ kaṣṭaṃ vikrītā mūḍhabuddhayaḥ ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā dūre vane mugdhamṛgā iva ।। 

na kenacic ca vikrītā vikrītā iva saṃsthitāḥ ।
vata mūḍhā vayaṃ sarve jānānā api śambaram ।। 

kim eteṣu prapañceṣu bhogā nāma sudurbhagāḥ ।
mudhaiva hi vayaṃ mohāt saṃsthitā baddhabhāvanāḥ ।। 

ajñāte bahukālena vyartha eva vayaṃ ghane ।
mohe nipatitā mugdhāś śvabhre mugdhamṛgā iva ।। 

kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ bhogaiḥ ko ahaṃ kim idam āgatam ।
yan mithyaivāstu tan mithyā kasya nāma kim āgatam ।। 

evaṃ vimṛśato brahman sarveṣv eva tato mama ।
bhāveṣv aratir āyātā pathikasya maruṣv iva ।। 

tad etad bhagavan brūhi kim idaṃ parinaśyati ।
kim idaṃ jāyate bhūyaḥ kim idaṃ parivardhate ।। 

jarāmaraṇam āpac ca jananaṃ sampadas tathā ।
āvirbhāvatirobhāvair vivartante punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

bhāvais tair eva tair eva tucchair vayam ime kila ।
paśya jarjaratāṃ nītā vātair iva giridrumāḥ ।। 

acetanā iva janāḥ pavanaiḥ prāṇanāmabhiḥ ।
dhvanantas saṃsthitā vyarthaṃ yathā kīcakaveṇavaḥ ।। 

śāmyatīdaṃ kathaṃ duḥkham iti tapto asmi cintayā ।
jaraddruma ivogreṇa koṭarasthena vahninā ।। 

saṃsāraduḥkhapāṣāṇanīrandhrahṛdayo apy aham ।
nijalokabhayād eva galadbāṣpair na rodimi ।। 

śūnyamanmukhavṛttīs tu śuṣkarodananīrasāḥ ।
viveka eva hṛtsaṃstho mamaikānteṣu paśyati ।। 

bhṛśaṃ muhyāmi saṃsmṛtya bhāvābhāvamayīṃ sthitim ।
dāridryeṇeva subhago dūre saṃsāracintayā ।। 

mohayanti manovṛttiṃ khaṇḍayanti guṇān alam ।
duḥkhajālaṃ prayacchanti vipralambhaparāś śriyaḥ ।। 

cintānicayavakrāṇi nānandāya dhanāni me ।
samprasūtakalatrāṇi gṛhāṇy ugrāpadāṃ yathā ।। 

vividhadoṣadaśāparicintanais satatabhaṅgurakāraṇakalpitaiḥ ।
mama na nirvṛtim eti mano mune nigaḍitasya yathā vanahastinaḥ ।। 

khalāḥ kāle kāle niśi niśitamohaikamihikāgatāloke loke viṣayahaṭhacaurās sucaturāḥ ।
pravṛttāḥ prodyuktā diśi diśi vivekaikaharaṇe raṇe śaktās teṣāṃ vadata vibudhāḥ ke adya subhaṭāḥ ।। 

prathamaparidevitaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

iyam asmin vinodāya saṃsāre parikalpitā ।
śrīr mune parimohāya sāpi nūnam anarthadā ।। 

ullāsabahulān antaḥ kallolān akramākulān ।
jaḍān prasravati sphārān prāvṛṣīva taraṅgiṇī ।। 

cintāduhitaro bahvyo bhūridurlaliteritāḥ ।
cañcalāḥ prabhavanty asyās taraṅgās sarito yathā ।। 

eṣā hi padam ekatra na nibadhnāti durbhagā ।
mugdhevāniyatācāram itaś cetaś ca dhāvati ।। 

janayantī paraṃ dāhaṃ parāmṛṣṭāṅgikā satī ।
vināśam eva dhatte antar dīpalekheva kajjalam ।। 

guṇāguṇavicāreṇa vinaiva kila pārśvagam ।
rājaprakṛtivan mūḍhā durārūḍhāvalambate ।। 

karmaṇā tena tenaiṣā vistāram upagacchati ।
doṣāśīviṣavegasya yat kṣīravisarāyate ।। 

tāvac chītamṛdusparśaḥ pare sve ca jane janaḥ ।
vātyayeva himaṃ yāvac chriyā na paruṣīkṛtaḥ ।। 

prājñāś śūrāḥ kṛtajñāś ca peśalā mṛdavaś ca ye ।
pāṃsumuṣṭyeva maṇayaś śriyā te malinīkṛtāḥ ।। 

na śrīs sukhāya bhagavan duḥkhāyaiva hi kalpate ।
guptaṃ vināśanaṃ dhatte mṛtiṃ viṣalatā yathā ।। 

śrīmān ajananindyaś ca śūraś cāpy avikatthanaḥ ।
samadṛṣṭiḥ prabhuś caiva durlabhāḥ puruṣās trayaḥ ।। 

eṣā hi viṣamā duḥkhabhogināṃ gahanā guhā ।
ghanamohagajendrāṇāṃ vindhyaśailamahāṭavī ।। 

satkāryapadmarajanī duḥkhakairavacandrikā ।
saddṛṣṭidīpikāvātyā kallolaughataraṅgiṇī ।। 

sambhramābhrādripadavī viṣādaviṣavardhinī ।
kedārikā vikalpānāṃ khadā kubhayabhoginām ।। 

himaṃ vairāgyavallīnāṃ vikārolūkayāminī ।
rāhudaṃṣṭrā vivekendos saujanyāmbhojacandrikā ।। 

indrāyudhavad ālolanānārāgamanoharā ।
lolā taḍid ivotpannadhvaṃsinī jaḍasaṃśrayā ।। 

capalā varjitā ratyā nakulī nakulīnajā ।
vipralambhanatātparyahetūgramṛgatṛṣṇikā ।। 

laharīvaikarūpeṇa kṣaṇaṃ padam akurvatī ।
calā dīpaśikhevātidurjñeyāgatigocarā ।। 

siṃhīva vigrahavyagrakarīndrakulapātinī ।
khaḍgadhāreva śiśirā tīkṣṇā tīkṣṇāśayāśrayā ।। 

nānayopahatārthinyā durādhiparipīnayā ।
paśyāmy abhavyayā lakṣmyā kiñcid duḥkhād ṛte sukham ।। 

dvāreṇotsāritā lakṣmīḥ punar eti tamo'riṇā ।
aho vata hṛtasthānā nirlajjā durjanāspadā ।। 

manoramā karṣati cittavṛttiṃ kadaryasādhyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā ca ।
vyālāvalīgarbhanivṛttadehā śvabhrotthitā puṣpalateva lakṣmīḥ ।। 

lakṣmīnirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

āyuḥ pallavakoṇāgralambāmbukaṇabhaṅguram ।
unmattam iva santyajya yāty akāṇḍe śarīrakam ।। 

viṣayāśīrviṣāsaṅgaparijarjaracetasām ।
aprauḍhātmavivekānām āyur āyāsakāraṇam ।। 

ye tu vijñātavijñeyā viśrāntā vitate pade ।
bhāvābhāvasamāśvastā āyus teṣāṃ sukhāyate ।। 

vayaṃ parimitākārapariniṣṭhitaniścayāḥ ।
saṃsārābhrataḍitpuñje mune nāyuṣi nirvṛtāḥ ।। 

yujyate veṣṭanaṃ vāyāv ākāśasyāvakhaṇḍanam ।
grathanaṃ ca taraṅgāṇām āsthā nāyuṣi yujyate ।। 

pelavaṃ śaradīvābhram asneham iva dīpakam ।
taraṅgakam ivālolaṃ gatam evopalakṣyate ।। 

taraṅgapratibimbenduṃ taḍitpuñjaṃ nabho'mbude ।
grahītum āsthāṃ badhnāmi na tv āyuṣi gatasthitau ।। 

aviśrāntamanāś śūnyam āyur ātatam īhate ।
duḥkhāyaiva vimūḍho antar garbham aśvatarī yathā ।। 

saṃsārasaṃsṛtāv ambhaḥ pheno asmin sargasāgare ।
kāyavallyāṃ raso rājañ jīvitaṃ me na rocate ।। 

prāpyaṃ samprāpyate yena bhūyo yena na śocyate ।
parāyā nirvṛtes sthānaṃ yat taj jīvitam ucyate ।। 

taravo api hi jīvanti jīvanti mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।
sa jīvati mano yasya mananena na jīvati ।। 

jātās ta eva jagati jantavas sādhujīvitāḥ ।
ye punar neha jāyante śeṣā jānīta gardabhāḥ ।। 

bhāro avivekinaś śāstraṃ bhāro jñānaṃ ca rāgiṇaḥ ।
aśāntaṃ ca mano bhāro bhāro anātmavido vapuḥ ।। 

rūpam āyur mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathehitam ।
bhāro bhāradharasyeva sarvaṃ duḥkhāya durdhiyaḥ ।। 

aviśrāntamanaḥpūrṇam āpadāṃ paramāspadam ।
nīḍo rogavihaṅgānām āyur āyāsanaṃ dṛḍham ।। 

pratyahaṃ khedam utsṛjya śanair alam anāratam ।
āśv eva janmanaś śvabhraṃ kālena vinikhanyate ।। 

śarīrabilaviśrāntair viṣadāhapradāyibhiḥ ।
rogair nipīyate raudrair vyālair iva vanānilaḥ ।। 

prasuvānair avacchedaṃ tucchair antaravāsibhiḥ ।
duḥkhair ākṛṣyate krūrair ghuṇair iva jaraddrumaḥ ।। 

nūnaṃ nigiraṇāyāśu ghanagarvam anāratam ।
ākhur mārjārakeṇeva maraṇenāvalokyate ।। 

garvādiguṇagarbhiṇyā śūnyayāśaktivaśyayā ।
annaṃ mahāśaneneva jarasā parijīryate ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva parijñāya gatādaram ।
durjanas sajjaneneva yauvanenāvamucyate ।। 

vināśasuhṛdā nityaṃ jarāmaraṇabandhunā ।
rūpaṃ śiḍgavareṇeva kṛtāntenābhilaṣyate ।। 

sthiratayā sukhahāritayā tayā satatam ujjhitam uttama phalgu ca ।
jagati nāsti tathā guṇavarjitaṃ maraṇamārjitam āyur idaṃ yathā ।। 

jīvitagarhā nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mudhaivābhyutthito mohān mudhaiva parivardhate ।
mithyāmayena bhīto asmi durahaṅkāraśatruṇā ।। 

ahaṅkāravaśād eva doṣakośaḥ kadarthanām ।
dadāti dīnadīnānāṃ saṃsāro vividhākṛtiḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāravaśād āpad ahaṅkārād durādhayaḥ ।
ahaṅkāravaśād īhāpy ahaṅkāro mahāmayaḥ ।। 

tam ahaṅkāram āśritya paramaṃ ciravairiṇam ।
na bhuñje na pibāmy ambhaḥ kim u bhogān bhaje mune ।। 

saṃsārarajjur ādīrghā mama cetasi mohinī ।
tatāhaṅkāradoṣeṇa kirāteneva vāgurā ।। 

yāni duḥkhāni dīrghāṇi viṣamāṇi mahānti ca ।
ahaṅkārāt prasūtāni tāny agāt khadirā iva ।। 

śamendos saiṃhikeyāsyaṃ guṇapadmamahāśanim ।
jñānameghaśaratkālam ahaṅkāraṃ tyajāmy aham ।। 

nāhaṃ rāmo na me vāñchā bhāveṣu ca na me manaḥ ।
śānta āsitum icchāmi svātmany eva jino yathā ।। 

ahaṅkāravaśād yad yan mayā bhuktaṃ kṛtaṃ hṛtam ।
sarvaṃ tu tad avastv eva vastv ahaṅkārariktatā ।। 

aham ity asti ced brahmann aham āpadi duḥkhitaḥ ।
sampatsu sukhitas tasmād anahaṅkāritādhanaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāraṃ parityajya mune śāntamanās tathā ।
avatiṣṭhe gatodvego bhogaughe abhaṅgurāspadam ।। 

brahman yāvad ahaṅkāravāridaḥ pravijṛmbhate ।
tāvad vikāsam āyāti tṛṣṇākuṭajamañjarī ।। 

ahaṅkāraghane śānte tṛṣṇānavataḍillatā ।
śāntadīpaśikhāvṛttyā kvāpi yāsyati satvaram ।। 

ahaṅkāramahāvindhye manomattamataṅgajaḥ ।
visphūrjati ghanāsphoṭais stanitair iva vāridaḥ ।। 

iha dehamahādaryāṃ ghanāhaṅkārakesarī ।
yo ayam ullasati sphāraṃ tenedaṃ jagad ātatam ।। 

tṛṣṇātantulavaprotā bahujanmaparamparā ।
ahaṅkārograśiḍgena kaṇṭhe muktāvalī kṛtā ।। 

putradārakalatrāṇi tantraṃ mantravivarjitam ।
prasāritam aneneha durahaṅkāravairiṇā ।। 

pramārjite aham ity asmin pade svayam akhidyatā ।
pramārjitā bhavanty eva sarva eva durādhayaḥ ।। 

aham ity ambude śānte śanais suśamaśālini ।
manomananasammohamihikā kvāpi gacchati ।। 

nirahaṅkāravṛtter me maurkhyāc chokena sīdataḥ ।
yat kiñcid ucitaṃ brahmaṃs tad ākhyātum ihārhasi ।। 

sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam antarastham unmuktam uttamaguṇena na saṃśrayāmi ।
yatnād ahaṅkṛtipadaṃ parito atiduḥkhaṃ śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva ।। 

ahaṅkārajugupsā nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

doṣair jarjaratāṃ yātaṃ satkāryād āryasevitāt ।
vātāttapiñchalavavac cetaś calati cañcalam ।। 

itaś cetaś ca suvyagraṃ vyartham evābhidhāvati ।
dūrād dūrataraṃ dīnaṃ grāme kauleyako yathā ।। 

na prāpnoti kvacit kiñcit prāptair api mahādhanaiḥ ।
nāntas sampūrṇatām eti karaṇḍaka ivāmbubhiḥ ।। 

nityam eva manaś śūnyaṃ kadāśāvāgurāvṛtam ।
na manāṅ nirvṛtiṃ yāti mṛgo yūthād iva cyutaḥ ।। 

taraṅgataralāṃ vṛttiṃ dadhad ālūnaśīrṇatām ।
parityajya kṣaṇam api na mano yāti nirvṛtim ।। 

mano mananavikṣubdhaṃ diśo daśa vidhāvati ।
mandarāhananoddhūtaṃ kṣīrārṇavapayo yathā ।। 

kallolakalanāvartaṃ māyāmakaramālinam ।
na niroddhuṃ samartho asmi manomohamahārṇavam ।। 

bhogadūrvāṅkurākāṅkṣī śvabhrapātam acintayan ।
manohariṇako brahman dūraṃ viparidhāvati ।। 

na kadācana me cetas tām ālūnaviśīrṇatām ।
tyajaty ākulayā vṛttyā cañcalatvam ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

cetaś cañcalayā vṛttyā cintānicayacañcuram ।
dhṛtiṃ badhnāti naikatra kesarī pañjare yathā ।। 

mano moharathārūḍhaṃ śarīrāc chamatāsukham ।
haraty upagatodyogaṃ haṃsaḥ kṣīram ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

analpakalpanātalpe nilīnāś cittavṛttayaḥ ।
munīndra na prabudhyante tena tapto aham ākulaḥ ।। 

kroḍīkṛtadṛḍhagranthitṛṣṇāsūtrombhitātmanā ।
vihago jālakeneva brahman baddho asmi cetasā ।। 

satatāmarṣadhūmena cintājvālābilena ca ।
vahnineva tṛṇaṃ śuṣkaṃ mune dagdho asmi cetasā ।। 

krūreṇa jaḍatāṃ yātas tṛṣṇābhāryānugāminā ।
śavaḥ kauleyakeneva brahman bhukto asmi cetasā ।। 

taraṅgataralāsphālavṛttinā jaḍarūpiṇā ।
taṭavṛkṣa ivaughena brahman nīto asmi cetasā ।। 

avāntaranipātāya śūnyenākramaṇāya ca ।
tṛṇaṃ caṇḍānileneva dūre nunno asmi cetasā ।। 

saṃsārajaladher asmān nityam uttaraṇonmukhaḥ ।
setuneva payaḥpūro rodhito asmi kucetasā ।। 

pātālād gacchatā pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhāt pātālagāminā ।
kūpakāṣṭhaṃ kudāmneva veṣṭito hy asmi cetasā ।। 

mithyaiva sphārarūpeṇa vicāraviśarāruṇā ।
bālo vetālakeneva gṛhīto asmi svacetasā ।। 

vahner uṣṇataraś śailād api kaṣṭatarakramaḥ ।
vajrād api dṛḍho brahman durnigrahamanograhaḥ ।। 

cetaḥ patati kāryeṣu vihagaś cāmiṣeṣv iva ।
kṣaṇena viratiṃ yāti bālaḥ krīḍanakād iva ।। 

jaḍaprakṛtir ālolo vitatāvartavṛttimān ।
mano'bdhir īhitavyālo dūrān nayati tāta mām ।। 

apy abdhipānān mahatas sumerūllaṅghanād api ।
api vahnyaśanāt sādho viṣamaś cittanigrahaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ kāraṇam arthānāṃ tasmin sati jagattrayam ।
tasmin kṣīṇe jagat kṣīṇaṃ tac cikitsyaṃ prayatnataḥ ।। 

cittād imāni sukhaduḥkhaśatāni nūnam abhyāgatāny agavarād iva kānanāni ।
tasmin vivekavaśatas tanutāṃ prayāte manye mune nipuṇam eva galanti tāni ।। 

sakalaguṇajayāśā yatra baddhā mahadbhis tam arim iha vijetuṃ cittam abhyutthito aham ।
vigataratitayāntar nābhinandāmi lakṣmīṃ jaḍamalinaviśālāṃ meghamālām ivenduḥ ।। 

cittadaurātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

hārdāndhakāraśarvaryā tṛṣṇayeha durantayā ।
caranti cetanākāśe doṣakauśikapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

antardāhapradāyinyā samūḍharasamārdavaḥ ।
paṅka ādityadīptyeva śoṣaṃ nīto asmi cintayā ।। 

mama cittamahāraṇye vyāmohatimirākule ।
śūnye tāṇḍavinī mattā bhṛśam āśāpiśācikā ।। 

rajoracitanīhārā kāñcanāvacayojjvalā ।
nūnaṃ vikāsam āyāti cintā me aśokamañjarī ।। 

alam antar bhramāyaiṣā tṛṣṇā kavalitāśayā ।
āyātā viṣamollāsam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva ।। 

uddāmakallolaravā dehādrau vahatīva me ।
taraṅgitatarākārā tarattṛṣṇātaraṅgiṇī ।। 

vegaṃ saṃroddhum udito vātyayeva jarattṛṇam ।
nītaḥ kaluṣayā kvāpi dhiyāyaṃ cittacātakaḥ ।। 

yāṃ yām aham adhītāsthām āśrayāmi guṇaśriyam ।
tāṃ tāṃ kṛntati me tṛṣṇā tantrīm iva kumūṣikā ।। 

payasīva jaratparṇaṃ vāyāv iva jarattṛṇam ।
nabhasīva śaranmeghaś cintācakre bhramāmy aham ।। 

gantum āspadam ātmīyam asamarthadhiyo vayam ।
cintājāle vimuhyāmo jāle śakunayo yathā ।। 

tṛṣṇābhidhānayā tāta dagdho asmi jvālayā tathā ।
yathā dāhopaśamanam āśaṅke nāmṛtair api ।। 

dūraṃ dūram ito gatvā sametya ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
bhramaty āśu diganteṣu tṛṣṇonmattaturaṅgamī ।। 

jaḍasaṃsaṅginī tṛṣṇā kṛtordhvādhogamāgamā ।
kṣubdhā granthimatī nityam araghaṭṭograrajjuvat ।। 

antar grathitayā dehe sambhramocchidyamānayā ।
rajjvevāśu balīvardas tṛṣṇayā vāhyate janaḥ ।। 

putradārakalatrāditṛṣṇayā nityakṛṣṇayā ।
khageṣv iva kirātyeha jālaṃ lokeṣu racyate ।। 

bhāyayaty api dhīreham andhayaty api sekṣaṇam ।
khedayaty api sānandaṃ tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇeva śarvarī ।। 

kuṭilā komalasparśā viṣavaiṣamyaśaṃsinī ।
dahaty api manāk spṛṣṭā tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇeva bhoginī ।। 

bhinatti hṛdayaṃ puṃsāṃ māyāmayavidhāyinī ।
daurbhāgyadāyinī dīnā tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇeva rākṣasī ।। 

tandrātantrīgaṇaṃ kośe dadhānā pariveṣṭitam ।
nānande rājate brahmaṃs tṛṣṇājarjaravallakī ।। 

nityam evātimalinā kaṭukonmādaśālinī ।
dīrghā tanvī ghanasnehā tṛṣṇāgahvaravallarī ।। 

anānandakarī śūnyā niṣphalātyartham unnatā ।
amaṅgalakarī krūrā tṛṣṇā kṣīṇeva mañjarī ।। 

anāvarjitacittāpi sarvam evānudhāvati ।
na cāpnoti phalaṃ kiñcit tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva kāminī ।। 

saṃsāranṛtte mahati nānārasasamākule ।
bhuvanābhogaraṅgeṣu tṛṣṇā jaraḍhanartakī ।। 

jarākusumitārūḍhā pātotpātaphalāvaliḥ ।
saṃsārajaṅgale dīrghe tṛṣṇāviṣalatā tatā ।। 

yan na śaknoti tatrāpi dhatte tāṇḍavitāṃ gatim ।
nṛtyaty ānandarahitaṃ tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva nartakī ।। 

bhṛśaṃ sphurati nīhāre śāmyaty āloka āgate ।
duḥkhaugheṣu padaṃ dhatte tṛṣṇācapalabarhiṇī ।। 

jaḍakallolabahalā ciraṃ śūnyatarāntarā ।
kṣaṇam ullāsam āyāti tṛṣṇāprāvṛṭtaraṅgiṇī ।। 

naṣṭam utsṛjya tiṣṭhantaṃ vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāparam ।
puruṣāt puruṣaṃ yāti tṛṣṇā loleva pakṣiṇī ।। 

padaṃ karoty alaṅghye api tṛptāpi phalam īhate ।
ciraṃ tiṣṭhati naikatra tṛṣṇācapalamarkaṭī ।। 

idaṃ kṛtvedam āyāti sarvam evāsamañjasam ।
anārataṃ ca yatate tṛṣṇā ceṣṭeva daivikī ।। 

kṣaṇam āyāti pātālaṃ kṣaṇaṃ yāti nabhastalam ।
kṣaṇaṃ bhramati dikkuñje tṛṣṇāhṛtpadmaṣaṭpadī ।। 

sarvasaṃsāradoṣāṇāṃ tṛṣṇaikā dīrghaduḥkhadā ।
antaḥpurastham api yā yojayaty atisaṅkaṭe ।। 

prayacchati paraṃ jāḍyaṃ paramālokarodhinī ।
mohanīhāragahanā tṛṣṇājaladamālikā ।। 

sarveṣāṃ jantujālānāṃ saṃsāravyavahāriṇām ।
pariprotamanomālās tṛṣṇā bandhanarajjavaḥ ।। 

vicitravarṇā viguṇā dīrghā malinasaṃsthitiḥ ।
śūnyā śūnyāspadā tṛṣṇā śakrakārmukadharmiṇī ।। 

aśanir guṇasasyānāṃ phalitā śarad āpade ।
himaṃ sampatsarojinyās tamasāṃ dīrghayāminī ।। 

saṃsāranāṭakanaṭī kāyālayavihaṅgamī ।
mānasāraṇyahariṇī smarasaṅgītavallakī ।। 

vyavahārābdhilaharī mohamātaṅgaśṛṅkhalā ।
mārganyagrodhasubhagā duḥkhakairavacandrikā ।। 

jarāmaraṇaduḥkhānām ekā ratnasamudgikā ।
ādhivyādhivilāsānāṃ nityamattā vilāsinī ।। 

kṣaṇam ālokavimalā sāndhakāralavā kṣaṇam ।
vyomavīthīsamā tṛṣṇā nīhāragahanā kṣaṇam ।। 

gacchatūpaśamaṃ tṛṣṇā kāryavyāyāmaśāntaye ।
tamī ghanatamaḥkṛṣṇā yathā rakṣonivṛttaye ।। 

tāvan muhyaty ayaṃ loko mūko vilulitāśayaḥ ।
yāvad evānusandhatte tṛṣṇāviṣaviṣūcikām ।। 

loko ayam akhilaṃ duḥkhaṃ cintayojjhita ujjhati ।
cintāviṣūcikāmantraś cintātyāgo hi kathyate ।। 

tṛṇapāṣāṇakāṣṭhādi sarvam āmiṣaśaṅkayā ।
ādadhānā sphuraty antas tṛṣṇā matsyī hrade yathā ।। 

rogārtiraṅgagā tṛṣṇā gambhīram api mānavam ।
uttānatāṃ nayaty āśu sūryāṃśava ivāmbujam ।। 

antaśśūnyā granthimatyo dīrghasvāṅkurakaṇṭakāḥ ।
muktāmaṇiśriyo nityaṃ tṛṣṇā veṇulatā iva ।। 

aho bata mahac citraṃ tṛṣṇām api mahādhiyaḥ ।
duśchedyām api kṛntanti vivekenāmalāsinā ।। 

nāsidhārā na vajrāgnir na taptāyaḥkaṇārciṣaḥ ।
tathā tīkṣṇā yathā brahmaṃs tṛṣṇeyaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitā ।। 

kajjalāsitatīkṣṇāgrās snehadīrghadaśāparāḥ ।
prakāśā dāhadasparśās tṛṣṇā dīpaśikhā iva ।। 

api merūpamaṃ prājñam api śūram api sthiram ।
tṛṇīkaroti tṛṣṇaikā nimeṣeṇa narottamam ।। 

vistīrṇagahanā bhīmā ghanajālarajomayī ।
sāndhakārogranīhārā tṛṣṇā vindhyamahāṭavī ।। 

ekaiva sarvabhuvanāntaralabdhalakṣyā durlakṣatām upagateva purassthitaiva ।
tṛṣṇā sthitā jagati cañcalavīcimāle kṣīrārṇavāmbupaṭale madhureva śaktiḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāgarhā nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ārdrāntratantrīgahano vikārī paritāpavān ।
dehas sphurati saṃsāre so api duḥkhāya kevalam ।। 

ajño api tajjñasadṛśo valitātmacamatkṛtiḥ ।
yuktyā bhavyo apy abhavyo me na jaḍo nāpi cetanaḥ ।। 

jaḍājaḍadṛśor madhye dolāyitadurāśayaḥ ।
na vivekī na mūḍhātmā moham eva prayacchati ।। 

stokenānandam āyāti stokenāyāti kheditām ।
nāsti dehasamaś śocyo nīco guṇabahiṣkṛtaḥ ।। 

āgamāpāyinā nityaṃ dantakesaraśālinā ।
vikāsismitapuṣpeṇa pratikṣaṇam alaṅkṛtaḥ ।। 

bhujaśākhaughanamito dvijānustambhasusthitaḥ ।
locanālivapākrāntaś śiraḥpīṭhabṛhatphalaḥ ।। 

sravadasrurasasrotā hastapādasupallavaḥ ।
gulphavān kāryasaṅghātavihaṅgamatatāspadam ।। 

sacchāyo dehavṛkṣo ayaṃ jīvapānthagaṇāspadam ।
kasyātmīyaḥ kasya para āsthānāsthe kilātra ke ।। 

bhārasantāraṇārthena gṛhītāyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
nāvi dehalatāyāṃ ca kasya syād ātmabhāvanā ।। 

dehanāmni vane śūnye bahugartasamākule ।
tanūruhāsaṅkhyatarau viśvāsaṃ ko adhigacchati ।। 

carmasnāyvasthivalite śarīrapaṭahe dṛḍhe ।
mārjāravad ahaṃ nāntas tiṣṭhāmy aviratadhvanau ।। 

saṃsārāraṇyasaṃrūḍho vilasaccittamarkaṭaḥ ।
cintāmañjarikākāro dīrghaduḥkhaghuṇakṣataḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇābhujaṅgamīgehaḥ kopakākakṛtālayaḥ ।
smitapuṣpo drumaś śrīmāñ śubhāśubhamahāphalaḥ ।। 

suskandho dorlatājālo hastastabakasundaraḥ ।
pavanaspanditāśeṣasvāṅgāvayavapallavaḥ ।। 

sarvendriyakhagādhāras sujānus sutvag unnataḥ ।
sarasacchāyayā yuktaḥ kāmapānthaniṣevitaḥ ।। 

mūrdhni sañjanitādīrghaśiroruhatṛṇāvaliḥ ।
ahaṅkārajaradgṛddhakulāyasuṣirodaraḥ ।। 

udbhinnavāsanājālamūlatvād durbalākṛtiḥ ।
vyāyāmaviramaḥ kāyavṛkṣo ayaṃ na sukhāya me ।। 

kalevaram ahaṅkāragṛhasthasya mahāgṛham ।
luṭhatv abhyetu vā sthairyaṃ kim anena mune hi me ।। 

paṅktibaddhendriyapaśu valgattṛṣṇāgṛhāṅganam ।
rajorañjitasarvāṅgaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

kāṣṭhāsthikāṣṭhasaṅghaṭṭaparisaṅkaṭakoṭaram ।
antradāmabhir ābaddhaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

prasṛtasnāyutantrīkaṃ raktāmbukṛtakardamam ।
jarāmakkoladhavalaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

citrakṛtyabhṛtānantaceṣṭāvaṣṭabdhasaṃsthiti ।
mithyāmohamahāsthūṇaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

duḥkhārbhakakṛtākrandaṃ sukhaśayyāmanoharam ।
durīhādagdhadāsīkaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

malāḍhyaviṣayavyūhabhāṇḍopaskarasaṅkaṭam ।
ajñānakṣāravalitaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

gulphagulguluviśrāntajānūccastambhamastakam ।
dīrghadordārusudṛḍhaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

prakaṭākṣagavākṣāntaḥkrīḍatprajñāgṛhāṅganam ।
cintāduhitṛkaṃ brahman neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

mūrdhajacchādanacchannakarṇaśrīcandraśālikam ।
ādīrghāṅguliniryūhaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

sarvāṅgakuḍyasañjātaghanaromayavāṅkuram ।
saṃśūnyapīṭhapiṭhiraṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

nakhorṇanābhanilayaiś śāram āraṇitāntaram ।
bhāṅkārakāripavanaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

praveśanirgamavyagravātavegam anāratam ।
vitatākṣagavākṣaṃ ca neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

jihvāmarkaṭikākrāntavadanadvārabhīṣaṇam ।
dṛṣṭadantāsthiśakalaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

tvaksudhālepamasṛṇaṃ yantrasañcāracañcalam ।
mano'mandākhunotkhātaṃ neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

smitadīpaprabhābhāsi kṣaṇam ānandasundaram ।
kṣaṇaṃ vyāptaṃ prabhāpūrair neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।। 

samastarogāyatanaṃ valīpalitapattanam ।
sarvādhisāraṅgavanaṃ neṣṭaṃ mama kalevaram ।। 

akṣarkṣakṣobhaviṣamā śūnyā nissārakoṭarā ।
tamogahanahṛtkuñjā neṣṭā dehāṭavī mama ।। 

dehālayaṃ dhārayituṃ na śakto asmi munīśvarāḥ ।
paṅkamagnaṃ samuddhartuṃ gajam alpabalo yathā ।। 

kiṃ śriyā kiṃ ca kāyena kiṃ kāmena kim īhayā ।
dinaiḥ katipayair eva kālas sarvaṃ nikṛntati ।। 

raktamāṃsamayasyāsya sabāhyābhyantaraṃ mune ।
nāśaikadharmiṇo brūhi keva kāyasya ramyatā ।। 

maraṇāvasare kāyā jīvaṃ nānusaranti ye ।
teṣu tāta kṛtaghneṣu kevāsthā vata dhīmataḥ ।। 

mattebhakarṇāgracalaḥ kāyo lambāmbubhaṅguraḥ ।
na santyajati māṃ yāvat tāvad enaṃ tyajāmy aham ।। 

pavanaspandataralaḥ pelavaḥ kāyapallavaḥ ।
jarjaras tanuvṛttaś ca neṣṭo ayaṃ kaṭunīrasaḥ ।। 

bhuktvā pītvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bālapallavapelavam ।
tanutām etya yatnena vināśam anudhāvati ।। 

tāny eva sukhaduḥkhāni bhāvābhāvamayāny asau ।
bhūyo apy anubhavan kāyaḥ prākṛto hi na lajjate ।। 

suciraṃ prabhutāṃ kṛtvā saṃsevya vibhavaśriyam ।
nocchrāyam eti na sthairyaṃ kāyaḥ kim iti pālyate ।। 

jarākāle jarām eti mṛtyukāle tathā mṛtim ।
samam evāviśeṣajñaḥ kāyo bhogidaridrayoḥ ।। 

saṃsārāmbhodhijaṭhare tṛṣṇākuharakāntare ।
suptas tiṣṭhati mukteho mūko ayaṃ kāyakacchapaḥ ।। 

dahanaikārthayogyāni kāyakāṣṭhāni bhūriśaḥ ।
saṃsārābdhāv ihohyante kañcit teṣu naraṃ viduḥ ।। 

dīrghadaurātmyacalayā nipātaphalayānayā ।
na dehalatayā kāryaṃ kiñcid asti vivekinaḥ ।। 

majjan kardamakośeṣu jhagity eva jarāṃ gataḥ ।
na jñāyate yāty acirāt kva kathaṃ dehadarduraḥ ।। 

nissārasakalārambhāḥ kāyāś capalavāyavaḥ ।
rajomārgeṇa gacchanto dṛśyante neha kenacit ।। 

vāyor dīpasya manaso gacchato jñāyate gatiḥ ।
āgacchataś ca bhagavan na śarīraśarasya naḥ ।। 

baddhāśā ye śarīreṣu baddhāśā ye jagatsthitau ।
tān mohamadironmattān dhig dhig astu punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ dehasya no deho mama nāyam ahaṃ tathā ।
iti viśrāntacittā ye te mune puruṣottamāḥ ।। 

mānāvamānabahulā bahulābhamanoramāḥ ।
śarīramātrabaddhāsthaṃ ghnanti doṣadṛśo naram ।। 

śarīrasaṅgaśāyinyā piśācyā peśalāṅgayā ।
ahaṅkāracamatkṛtyā chalena cchalitā vayam ।। 

prajñā varākī sarvaiva kāyabaddhāsthayānayā ।
mithyājñānakurākṣasyā chalitā kaṣṭam ekikā ।। 

na kiñcid api yasyāsti satyaṃ tena hatātmanā ।
citraṃ dagdhaśarīreṇa janatā vipralabhyate ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva nirjharāmbukaṇo yathā ।
pataty ayam ayatnena jarjaraḥ kāyapallavaḥ ।। 

kāyo ayam acirāpāyo budbudo ambunidhāv iva ।
vyarthaṃ kāryaparāvarte parisphurati niṣphalaḥ ।। 

mithyājñānavikāre asmin svapnasambhramapattane ।
kāye sphuṭatarāpāye kṣaṇam āsthā na me dvija ।। 

taḍitsu śaradabhreṣu gandharvanagareṣu ca ।
sthairyaṃ yena vinirṇītaṃ sa viśvasiti vigrahe ।। 

satatabhaṅgurakāryaparamparāvijayi jātajayaṃ śaṭhavṛttiṣu ।
sakaladoṣam idaṃ kukalevaraṃ tṛṇam ivāham upojjhya sukhaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

śarīrajugupsā nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

labdhvāpi taralākāre kāryabhārataraṅgiṇi ।
saṃsārasāgare janma bālyaṃ duḥkhāya kevalam ।। 

aśaktir āpadas tṛṣṇā mūkatā mūḍhabuddhitā ।
gṛdhnutā lolatā dainyaṃ sarvaṃ bālye pravartate ।। 

roṣarodanaraudrīṣu dainyajarjaritāsu ca ।
daśāsu bandhanaṃ bālyam ālānaṃ kariṇīṣv iva ।। 

na mṛtau na jarāroge na cāpadi na yauvane ।
tāś cintā vinikṛntanti hṛdayaṃ śaiśaveṣu yāḥ ।। 

tiryagjātisamārambhas sarvair evāvadhīritaḥ ।
lolo bālajanācāro maraṇād api duḥkhadaḥ ।। 

pratibimbaṃ ghanājñānāṃ nānāsaṅkalpapelavam ।
bālyam ālūnasaṃśīrṇamanaḥ kasya sukhāvaham ।। 

jaḍaśyāmalayājasraṃ jātabhītyā pade pade ।
yad bhayaṃ śaiśave buddhyā kasyām āpadi tad bhavet ।। 

līlāsu durvilāseṣu durīhāsu durāśaye ।
paramaṃ moham ādatte bālo balavadāpadam ।। 

vikalpakalilārambhaṃ durvilāsaṃ durāspadam ।
śaiśavaṃ śāsanāyaiva puruṣasya na śāntaye ।। 

ye doṣā ye durācārā duṣkramā ye durādhayaḥ ।
te sarve saṃsthitā bālye durgarta iva kauśikāḥ ।। 

bālyaṃ ramyam iti vyarthabuddhayaḥ kathayanti ye ।
tān mūrkhapuruṣān brahman dhig astu hatacetasaḥ ।। 

yatra lolākṛti manaḥ parisphurati vṛttiṣu ।
trailokyarājyam api tat kathaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye ।। 

sarveṣām eva sattvānāṃ sarvāvasthāsu caiva hi ।
manaś cañcalatām eti bālye daśaguṇaṃ mune ।। 

manaḥ prakṛtyaiva calaṃ bālyaṃ ca calatāvaram ।
tayos saṃśliṣṭayos tāta kenaivāntaḥ kucāpale ।। 

strīlocanais taḍitpuñjair jvālāmālais taraṅgakaiḥ ।
cāpalaṃ śikṣitaṃ brahmañ śaiśavān manaso atha vā ।। 

śaiśavaṃ ca manaś caiva sarvāsv eva hi vṛttiṣu ।
bhrātarāv iva lakṣyete satataṃ bhaṅgurasthitī ।। 

sarvāṇi duṣṭabhūtāni sarve doṣā durāśayāḥ ।
bālyam evopajīvanti śrīmantam iva mānavāḥ ।। 

navaṃ navaṃ prītikaraṃ na śiśuḥ pratyahaṃ yadi ।
prāpnoti tad asau yāti viṣavegasya mūrchanām ।। 

stokena vaśam āyāti stokenaiti vikāritām ।
amedhya eva ramate bālaḥ kauleyako yathā ।। 

ajasraṃ bāṣpavadanaḥ kardamāntar jaḍāśayaḥ ।
varṣokṣitasya taptasya sthalasya sadṛśaś śiśuḥ ।। 

bhayāhāraparaṃ dīnaṃ yathādṛṣṭābhilāṣi ca ।
lolabuddhir vapur dhatte bālo duḥkhāya kevalam ।। 

svasaṅkalpābhilaṣitān bhāvān aprāpya taptadhīḥ ।
duḥkham ety abalo bālo vinikṛtta ivāśaye ।। 

durīhālabdhalakṣyāṇi bahupakṣolvaṇāni ca ।
bālasya yāni duḥkhāni mune tāni na kasyacit ।। 

bālo balavatāśv eva manorathavilāsinā ।
manasā tapyate nityaṃ grīṣmeṇeva vanasthalam ।। 

vidyāgṛhagato bālaḥ parām eti kadarthanām ।
ālāna iva nāgendro viṣavaiṣamyabhīṣaṇām ।। 

nānāmanorathamayī mithyākalpitakalpanā ।
duḥkhāyātyantadīrghāya bālatā pelavāśayā ।। 

sambhṛṣṭaṃ tuhinaṃ bhoktum indum ādātum ambarāt ।
vāñchyate yena maurkhyeṇa tat sukhāya kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

antaściter aśaktasya śītātapanivāraṇe ।
ko viśeṣo mahābuddhe bālasyorvīruhasya ca ।। 

uḍḍīnam abhivāñchanti pakṣābhyāṃ kṣutparāyaṇāḥ ।
bhayāhāraparā nityaṃ bālā vihagadharmiṇaḥ ।। 

śaiśave guruto bhītir mātṛtaḥ pitṛtas tathā ।
janato jyeṣṭhabālāc ca śaiśavaṃ bhayamandiram ।। 

sakaladoṣadaśāvihatāśayaṃ śaraṇam apy avivekavilāsinaḥ ।
iha na kasyacid eva mahāmune bhavati bālyam alaṃ parituṣṭidam ।। 

bālyajugupsā nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bālyānartham atha tyaktvā pumān abhihatāśayaḥ ।
ārohati nipātāya yauvanaśvabhrasambhramam ।। 

tatrānantavilāsasya lolasya svasya cetasaḥ ।
vṛttīr anusaran yāti duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ jaḍaḥ ।। 

svacittabilasaṃsthena nānāsambhramakāriṇā ।
balāt kāmapiśācena vivaśaḥ paribhūyate ।। 

cintānāṃ lolavṛttīnāṃ lalanānām ivābhitaḥ ।
arpayaty avaśaś ceto jvālānām ātmajaṃ yathā ।। 

te te doṣā durārambhās tatra taṃ tādṛśāśayam ।
taruṇaṃ pravilumpanti dṛśyās te naiva ye mune ।। 

mahānarakabījena santatabhramadāyinā ।
yauvanena na ye naṣṭā naṣṭā nānyena te janāḥ ।। 

nānārasamayī citrā vṛttāntanicayombhitā ।
bhīmā yauvanabhūr yena tīrṇā dhīras sa ucyate ।। 

nimeṣabhāsurākāram ālolaghanagarjitam ।
vidyutprakāśam aniśaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

vividhāvartabahulaṃ paṅkalagnaṃ jaḍāśayam ।
taraṅgabhaṅguraṃ bhīmaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

sarvasyāgresaraṃ puṃsaḥ kṣaṇamātramanoharam ।
gandharvanagaraprakhyaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

iṣuprapātamātraṃ hi sukhadaṃ duḥkhabhāsuram ।
dāhadoṣapradaṃ nityaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

madhuraṃ svādu tiktaṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ doṣabhūṣaṇam ।
surākallolasadṛśaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

asatyaṃ satyasaṅkāśam acirād vipralambhadam ।
svapnāṅganāsaṅgasamaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

kṣaṇaprakāśataralaṃ mithyāracitacakrikam ।
alātacakrapratimaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

mṛdusphāratarodāram antaśśūnyaṃ kṣaṇakṣatam ।
śaradambudasaṅkāśaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

āpātamātraramaṇaṃ sadbhāvarahitāntaram ।
veśyāstrīsaṅgamaprakhyaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate ।। 

ye kecana durārambhās te sarve sarvaduḥkhadāḥ ।
tāruṇye sannidhiṃ yānti mahotpātā iva kṣaye ।। 

hārdāndhakārakāriṇyā bhairavākāravān api ।
yauvanājñānayāminyā bibheti bhagavān api ।। 

suvismṛtaśubhācāraṃ buddhivaidhuryadāyinam ।
dadāty atitarām eṣa bhramaṃ yauvanavibhramaḥ ।। 

kāntāviyogajātena hṛdi durdharṣavahninā ।
yauvane dahyate jantus tarur dāvāgninā yathā ।। 

vistīrṇāpi prasannāpi pāvany api hi yauvane ।
matiḥ kaluṣatām eti prāvṛṣīva taraṅgiṇī ।। 

śakyate ghanakallolabhīmā rodhayituṃ nadī ।
na tu tāruṇyataralā tṛṣṇātaralitāntarā ।। 

sā kāntā tau stanau pīnau te vilāsās tad ānanam ।
tāruṇya iti cintābhir yāti jarjaratāṃ janaḥ ।। 

tarattaralatṛṣṇārtaṃ yuvānam iha sādhavaḥ ।
pūjayanti na tucchehaṃ jarattṛṇalavaṃ yathā ।। 

nāśāyaiva madāndhasya doṣamauktikadhāriṇaḥ ।
abhimānamahebhasya nityālānaṃ hi yauvanam ।। 

manovipulamūlānāṃ doṣāśīviṣadhāriṇām ।
roṣarodanavṛkṣāṇāṃ yauvanaṃ navakānanam ।। 

rasakesarasambādhaṃ kuvikalpadalākulam ।
duścintācañcarīkāṇāṃ puṣkaraṃ viddhi yauvanam ।। 

kṛtākṛtakupakṣāṇāṃ hṛtsarastīracāriṇām ।
ādhivyādhivihaṅgānām ālayo navayauvanam ।। 

jaḍānāṃ gatasaṅkhyānāṃ kallolānāṃ vilāsinām ।
anapekṣitamaryādo vāridhiḥ pūrṇayauvanam ।। 

sarveṣāṃ guṇaparṇānām apanetuṃ rajas tataḥ ।
apanetuṃ sthito dakṣo viṣamo yauvanānilaḥ ।। 

nayanti pāṇḍutāṃ vaktram ākulāvakarotkaṭāḥ ।
ārohanti parāṃ koṭiṃ rūkṣā yauvanapāṃsavaḥ ।। 

udbodhayati doṣālīṃ nikṛntati guṇāvalīm ।
narāṇāṃ yauvanollāso vilāso duṣkṛtaśriyaḥ ।। 

śarīrapaṅkajarajaś cañcalāṃ matiṣaṭpadīm ।
nibadhya mohayaty eṣa naraṃ yauvanacandramāḥ ।। 

śarīraṣaṇḍakodbhūtā ramyā yauvanavallarī ।
lagnam eva manobhṛṅgaṃ madayaty unnatiṃ gatā ।। 

śarīramarutāpotthāṃ yuvatāmṛgatṛṣṇikām ।
manomṛgāḥ pradhāvantaḥ patanti viṣamāvaṭe ।। 

śarīraśarvarījyotsnā cittakesariṇas saṭā ।
laharī jīvitāmbhodher yuvatā me na rocate ।। 

dināni katicid yeyaṃ phalitā dehajaṅgale ।
yuvatāśarad asyāṃ hi na samāśvāsam arhatha ।। 

jhagity eva prayāty eṣa śarīrād yuvatākhagaḥ ।
kṣaṇenaivālpabhāgyasya hastāc cintāmaṇir yathā ।। 

yadā yadā parāṃ koṭim abhyārohati yauvanam ।
valganti sarasāḥ kāmās tadā nāśāya kevalam ।। 

tāvad eva vivalganti rāgadveṣapiśācikāḥ ।
nāstam eti samastaiṣā yāvad yauvanayāminī ।। 

nānādhikārabahule varāke kṣaṇanāśini ।
kāruṇyaṃ kuru tāruṇye mriyamāṇe sute yathā ।। 

harṣam āyāti yo mohāt puruṣaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginā ।
yauvanena mahāmugdhas sa vai naramṛgas smṛtaḥ ।। 

mānamohamadonmattaṃ yauvanaṃ yo abhilaṣyati ।
acireṇa sa durbuddhiḥ paścāttāpena yujyate ।। 

te dharmyās te mahātmānas ta eva puruṣā bhuvi ।
ye sukhena samuttīrṇās sādho yauvanasaṅkaṭāt ।। 

sukhena tīryate ambhodhir utkṛṣṭamakarākaraḥ ।
na kallolavanollāsi sadoṣaṃ hatayauvanam ।। 

vinayabhūṣitam āryajanāspadaṃ karuṇayojjvalam āvalitaṃ guṇaiḥ ।
iha hi durlabham aṅga suyauvanaṃ jagati kānanam ambaragaṃ yathā ।। 

yauvanagarhā nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

māṃsaputtalikāyāś ca yantralolāṅgapañjare ।
snāyvasthigranthiśālinyās striyāḥ kim iva śobhanam ।। 

tvaṅmāṃsaraktabāṣpāsru pṛthak kṛtvā vilocanam ।
samālokaya ramyaṃ cet kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi ।। 

itaḥ keśā ito raktam itīyaṃ pramadātanuḥ ।
kim etayā ninditayā karotu vipulāśayaḥ ।। 

vāsovilepanair yāni lālitāni punaḥ punaḥ ।
tāny aṅgāny avalumpanti kravyādās sarvadehinām ।। 

meroś śṛṅgataṭollāsigaṅgājalarayopamāḥ ।
dṛṣṭā yasmin stane muktā hārasyollāsaśālinaḥ ।। 

śmaśāneṣu diganteṣu sa eva lalanāstanaḥ ।
śvabhir āsvādyate kāle laghupiṇḍa ivāndhasaḥ ।। 

raktamāṃsādidigdhāni karabhasya yathā vane ।
tathaivāṅgāni kāminyās tat praty api hi ko grahaḥ ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyatvaṃ kalpyate kevalaṃ striyāḥ ।
manye tad api nāsty atra mune mohaikakāraṇe ।। 

vipulollāsadāyinyā madonmathanapūrvakam ।
ko viśeṣo vikāriṇyā madirāyā iha striyāḥ ।। 

lalanālānasaṃlīnā mune mānavadantinaḥ ।
prabodhaṃ nādhigacchanti dīrghair api śamāṅkuśaiḥ ।। 

keśakajjaladhāriṇyas tīkṣṇāḥ prakṛtitas sadā ।
duṣkṛtāgniśikhā nāryo dahanti tṛṇavan naram ।। 

te vandyās te mahātmānas ta eva puruṣā bhuvi ।
ye sukhena samuttīrṇās sādho yauvatasaṅkaṭāt ।। 

jvalatām api dūre api sarasā api nīrasam ।
striyo hi narakāgnīnāṃ dāru cāru ca dāruṇam ।। 

kīrṇāndhakārakavarī tarattārakalocanā ।
pūrṇendubimbavadanā kumudotkarahāsinī ।। 

līlāvilolaparuṣā kāryasaṃhārakāriṇī ।
paraṃ vimohanaṃ buddheḥ kāminī dīrghayāminī ।। 

puṣpābhirāmamadhurā karapallavalāsinī ।
bhramarabhrūvilāsāḍhyā stabakastanadhāriṇī ।। 

puṣpakesaragaurāṅgī naramāraṇatatparā ।
dadāty uttamavaivaśyaṃ kāntā viṣamahālatā ।। 

sītkārocchvāsamātreṇa bhujaṅgadalanotkayā ।
kāntayoddhriyate jantuḥ karabhyevorago bilāt ।। 

kāmanāmnā kirātena vitīrṇā mugdhacetasām ।
nāryo naravihaṅgānām aṅgabandhanavāgurāḥ ।। 

lalanāvipulālāne manomattamataṅgajaḥ ।
ratiśṛṅkhalayā brahman baddhas tiṣṭhati mūkavat ।। 

janmapalvalamatsyānāṃ karmakoṭaracāriṇām ।
puṃsāṃ durvāsanārajjur nārī baḍiśapiṇḍikā ।। 

mandureva turaṅgānām ālānam iva dantinām ।
puṃsām abjam ivālīnāṃ bandhanaṃ vāmalocanāḥ ।। 

nānārasamayī citrā bhogabhūmir iyaṃ mune ।
striyam āśritya saṃyātā parām iha hi saṃsthitim ।। 

sarveṣāṃ doṣaratnānāṃ susamudgikayānayā ।
duḥkhaśṛṅkhalayā nityam alam astu mama striyā ।। 

kiṃ stanena kim akṣṇā vā kiṃ nitambena kiṃ bhruvā ।
māṃsamātraikasāreṇa karomy aham avastunā ।। 

ito māṃsam ito raktam ito asthīni ca vāsaraiḥ ।
brahman katipayair eva yāti strī viśarārutām ।। 

yās tā niṣparuṣais tūlair lālitāḥ patibhis striyaḥ ।
tā mune pravibhaktāṅgyas svapanti pitṛbhūmiṣu ।। 

yasmin ghananavasnehaṃ mukhe pattrāṅkuraśriyaḥ ।
kāntena racitā brahmañ śīryate tat tu jaṅgale ।। 

keśāś śmaśānavṛkṣeṣu yānti cāmaraleśatām ।
asthīny uḍuvad ābhānti dinair avanimaṇḍale ।। 

pibanti pāṃsavo raktaṃ kravyādāś cāpy anekaśaḥ ।
carmānalaśikhā bhuṅkte khaṃ yānti prāṇavāyavaḥ ।। 

ity eṣā lalanāṅgānām acireṇaiva bhāvinī ।
sthitir mayā vaḥ kathitā kiṃ bhrāntim anudhāvatha ।। 

bhūtapañcakasaṅghaṭṭasaṃsthānaṃ lalanābhidham ।
rasād abhivahatv etat kathaṃ nāma dhiyānvitaḥ ।। 

śākhāvitānagahanā kaṭvamlaphalaśālinī ।
pratānottālatām eti cintā kāntānusāriṇī ।। 

kvacid bhūtatayā ceto dhanagardhāndham ākulam ।
paraṃ moham upādatte yūthabhraṣṭo mṛgo yathā ।। 

śocyatāṃ paramām eti taruṇas taruṇīrataḥ ।
nibaddhaḥ kariṇīlobhād vindhyakhāte yathā dvipaḥ ।। 

yasya strī tasya bhogecchā nisstrīkasya na bhogabhūḥ ।
striyaṃ tyaktvā jagat tyaktaṃ jagat tyaktvā sukhī bhavet ।। 

āpātamātraramaṇeṣu durantareṣu bhogeṣu nāham alipakṣatipelaveṣu ।
brahman rame maraṇarogajarādibhītyā śāmyāmy ahaṃ param upaimi vanaṃ prayatnāt ।। 

strījugupsā nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

aparyāptaṃ hi bālatvaṃ bālyaṃ pibati yauvanam ।
yauvanaṃ ca jarā paścāt paśya karkaśatāṃ mithaḥ ।। 

himāśanir ivāmbhojaṃ vātyeva śaradambudam ।
dehaṃ jarā jarayati sarit tīrataruṃ yathā ।। 

śithilādīrghasarvāṅgaṃ jarājīrṇakalevaram ।
samaṃ paśyanti kāminyaḥ puruṣaṃ karabhaṃ tathā ।। 

śvāsāyāsakadarthinyā gṛhīte jarasā jane ।
palāyya gacchati prajñā sapatnyeva hatāṅganā ।। 

dāsāḥ putrās striyaś caiva bāndhavās suhṛdas tathā ।
hasanty unmattakam iva naraṃ vārddhakakampitam ।। 

duṣprajñaṃ jaraḍhaṃ dīnaṃ hīnaṃ guṇaparākramaiḥ ।
gṛdhro vṛkṣam ivādīrghaṃ gardho hy abhyeti vṛddhatām ।। 

dainyadoṣamayī dīrghā hṛdi dāhapradāyinī ।
sarvāpadām ekasakhī vardhate vārddhake spṛhā ।। 

kartavyaṃ kiṃ mayā kaṣṭaṃ paratrety atidāruṇam ।
apratīkārayogyaṃ hi vardhate vārddhake bhayam ।। 

ko ahaṃ varākaḥ kim iva karomi katham eva vā ।
tiṣṭhāmi maunam eveti dīnatodeti vārddhake ।। 

gardho abhyudeti sollāsam upabhoktuṃ na śakyate ।
hṛdayaṃ dahyate nūnaṃ śaktidaussthyena vārddhake ।। 

jarājīrṇabakī yāvat kāsakreṅkārakāriṇī ।
rauti rogoragākīrṇā kāyadrumaśirassthitā ।। 

tāvad āgata evāśu kuto api paridṛśyate ।
ghanāndhatimirākāṅkṣī mune maraṇakauśikaḥ ।। 

sāyaṃsandhyā prajātaiva tamas samanudhāvati ।
jarā vapuṣi dṛṣṭaiva mṛtiṃ samanudhāvati ।। 

jarākusumitaṃ dehadrumaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dūrataḥ ।
mṛtibhṛṅgī drutaṃ brahman narasyāyāti sūtsukā ।। 

śūnyaṃ nagaram ābhāti bhāti cchinnalato drumaḥ ।
bhāty anāvṛṣṭimān deśo na jarājarjaraṃ vapuḥ ।। 

kṣaṇān nigiraṇāyaiva kāsakvaṇitakāriṇī ।
gṛdhrīvāmiṣam ādatte tarasaiva naraṃ jarā ।। 

dṛṣṭvaiva sotsukevāśu pragṛhya śirasi kṣaṇāt ।
pralunāti jarā dehaṃ kumārī kairavaṃ yathā ।। 

sītkārakāriṇī pāṃsuparuṣā parijarjaram ।
śarīraṃ śātayaty eṣā vātyeva tarupallavam ।। 

jarasopahato deho dhatte jarjaratāṃ gataḥ ।
tuṣāranikarākīrṇaparimlānāmbujaśriyam ।। 

jarājyotsnoditaiveyaṃ śiraśśikharipṛṣṭhataḥ ।
vikāsayati saṃrabdhavātāṃ kāsakumudvatīm ।। 

paripakvaṃ samālokya jarākṣāravidhūsaram ।
śiraḥkuṣmāṇḍakaṃ bhuṅkte puṃsaḥ kālaḥ kileśvaraḥ ।। 

jarājahnusutodyuktā mūlāny asya nikṛntati ।
śarīratīravṛkṣasya calasyāyūṃṣi satvaram ।। 

jarāmārjārikā bhuktayauvanākhutayaidhitā ।
param ullāsam āyāti śarīrāmiṣagardhinī ।। 

kācid asti jagaty asmin nāmaṅgalakarī tathā ।
yathā jarākrośakarī dehajaṅgalajambukī ।। 

kāsaśvāsasasītkārā duḥkhadhūmatamomayī ।
jarājvālā jvalaty eṣā yayāsau dagdha eva hi ।। 

jarasā vakratām eti śuklāvayavapallavā ।
tāta tanvī tanur nṝṇāṃ latā puṣpānatā yathā ।। 

jarākarpūradhavalaṃ dehakarpūrapādapam ।
mune maraṇamātaṅgo nūnam uddharati kṣaṇāt ।। 

maraṇasya mune rājño jarādhavalacāmarā ।
āgacchato agre niryāti svādhivyādhipatākinī ।। 

na jitāś śatrubhis saṅkhye ye niṣpiṣṭādrikoṭayaḥ ।
te jarājīrṇarākṣasyā paśyāśu vijitā mune ।। 

jarātuṣāradhavale śarīrasadanāntare ।
śaknuvanty akṣaśiśavas spandituṃ na manāg api ।। 

saṃsārasaṃsṛter asyā gandhakuṭyāś śirogatā ।
dehayaṣṭyā jarānāmnī cāmaraśrīr virājate ।। 

jarācandrodayasite śarīranagare sthite ।
kṣaṇād vikāsam āyāti mune maraṇakairavam ।। 

jarāsudhālepasite śarīrāntaḥpurāntare ।
aśaktir ārtir āpac ca tiṣṭhanti sukham aṅganāḥ ।। 

abhāvāgresarā yatra jarā jayati jantuṣu ।
kas tatreha samāśvāso mama mandamater mune ।। 

kiṃ tena durjīvitadurgraheṇa jarāṃ gatenāpi hi jīvyate yat ।
jarā jagatyām ajitā narāṇāṃ sarvaiṣaṇās tāta tiraskaroti ।। 

jarājugupsā nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

vikalpakalpanānalpakalpitair alpabuddhibhiḥ ।
bhedair uddhuratāṃ nītas saṃsārakuhakabhramaḥ ।। 

satāṃ katham ivāstheha jāyate jālapañjare ।
bālā evāttum icchanti phalaṃ makurabimbitam ।। 

ihāpi vidyate yaiṣā pelavā sukhabhāvanā ।
ākhus tantum ivāśeṣaṃ kālas tām api kṛntati ।। 

na tad astīha yad ayaṃ kālas sakalaghasmaraḥ ।
grasate na jagajjātaṃ mahābdhim iva vāḍavaḥ ।। 

samastasāmānyatayā bhīmaḥ kālo maheśvaraḥ ।
dṛśyasattām imāṃ sarvāṃ kavalīkartum udyataḥ ।। 

mahatām api no devaḥ pratipālayati kṣaṇāt ।
kālaḥ kavalitānantaviśvo viśvātmatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

yugavatsarakalpākhyaiḥ kiñcit prakaṭatāṃ gataḥ ।
rūpair alakṣyarūpātmā sarvam ākramya tiṣṭhati ।। 

ye ramyā ye śubhārambhās sumeruguravo api ye ।
kālena vinigīrṇās te karabheṇeva pannagāḥ ।। 

nirdayaḥ kaṭhinaḥ krūraḥ karkaśaḥ kṛpaṇo adhamaḥ ।
na tad asti yad adyāpi na kālo nigiraty ayam ।। 

kālaḥ kavalanaikāntamatir atti girīn api ।
anantair api bhogaughair nāyaṃ tṛpto mahāśanaḥ ।। 

haraty ayaṃ nāśayati karoty atti nihanti ca ।
kālas saṃsāranṛtye hi nānārūpair yathā naṭaḥ ।। 

bhinatti pravibhāgastho bhūtabījāny anāratam ।
jagaty asattayā cañcvā dāḍimāni yathā śukaḥ ।। 

śubhāśubhaviṣāṇāgravilūnajanapallavaḥ ।
sphūrjati sphītajanatājīvarājīvinīgajaḥ ।। 

viriñcamajjabrahmāṇḍabṛhadbilvaphaladrumam ।
brahmakānanam ābhogi param āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।। 

yāminībhramarīpūrṇā racayan dinamañjarīḥ ।
varṣakalpakalāvallīr na kadācana khidyate ।। 

bhidyate nāvabhagno api dagdho api hi na dahyate ।
dṛśyate nātidṛśyo api dhūrtacūḍāmaṇir mune ।। 

ekenaiva nimeṣeṇa kiñcid utthāpayaty alam ।
kiñcid vināśayaty uccair manorājyavad ātataḥ ।। 

durvilāsavilāsinyā ceṣṭayā kaṣṭapuṣṭayā ।
darvyeva sūpakṛt sūpaṃ janam āvartayan sthitaḥ ।। 

tṛṇaṃ pāṃsuṃ mahendraṃ ca sumeruṃ parṇam arṇavam ।
ātmasphāratayā sarvam ātmasātkartum udyataḥ ।। 

krauryam atraiva paryāptaṃ lubdhatātraiva saṃsthitā ।
sarvaṃ daurbhāgyam atraiva sarvam atraiva cāpalam ।। 

prerayaṃl līlayārkendū krīḍatīha nabhastale ।
nikṣiptavīṭāyugalo nije bāla ivāṅgane ।। 

sarvabhūtāsthimālābhir āpādavalitākṛtiḥ ।
vilasaty eṣa kalpānte kālaḥ kalpitakalpanaḥ ।। 

asyoḍḍāmaranṛttasya kalpānte aṅgavinirgataiḥ ।
prasphuraty ambare merur bhūrjatvag iva vāyubhiḥ ।। 

rudro bhūtvā bhavaty eṣa mahendro atha pitāmahaḥ ।
śukro vaiśravaṇaś cāpi punar eva na kiñcana ।। 

dhatte ajasrotthitadhvastān sargān amitabhāsurān ।
anyān anyān apy ananyān vīcīn abdhir ivātmani ।। 

mahākalpābhidhānebhyo vṛkṣebhyaḥ pariśātayan ।
devāsuragaṇān pakvān phalabhārān avasthitaḥ ।। 

ālolabhūtamaṣakaghuṅghumānāṃ prapātinām ।
brahmāṇḍoḍumbaraughānāṃ bṛhatpādapatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

sattāmātrakumudvatyā cijjyotsnāpariphullayā ।
vapur vinodayaty ekaḥ kriyāpriyatamānvitaḥ ।। 

anantāpāyaparyantaṃ baddhapīṭhaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ ।
mahāśailavad uttuṅgam avalambya vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

kvacic chyāmātamaśśyāmaṃ kvacit kāntiyutaṃ tatam ।
dvayenāpi kramād riktaṃ svabhāvaṃ bhāvayan sthitaḥ ।। 

saṃlīnāsaṅkhyasaṃsārasārayā svātmasattayā ।
gurvīva bhāraghanayā nibaddhapadatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

na khidyate na mriyate nāyāti na ca gacchati ।
nāstam eti na codeti mahākalpaśatair api ।। 

kevalaṃ jagadārambhalīlayā ghanahelayā ।
yāpayaty ātmanātmānam anahaṅkāram āgatam ।। 

yāminīpaṅkakalilāṃ dinakokanadāvalīm ।
kriyābhramarikāṃ svātmasarassv āropayan sthitaḥ ।। 

gṛhītvā bhīṣaṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ rajanīṃ jīrṇamārjanīm ।
ālokakanakakṣodam āharaty abhito avanim ।। 

sañcārayan kriyāṅgulyā koṇakeṣv arkadīpikām ।
jagatsadmani kāruṇyāt kva kim astīti vīkṣate ।। 

prekṣyāhāni nimeṣeṇa sūryākṣṇā pākavanty alam ।
lokapālaphalāny atti jagajjīrṇavanād ayam ।। 

jagajjīrṇakuṭīkīrṇān arpayaty ugrakoṭare ।
krameṇa guṇavallokamaṇīn mṛtyusamudgake ।। 

guṇair āpūryate yaiva lokaratnāvalī bhṛśam ।
bhūṣārtham iva tām aṅge kṛtvā bhūyo nikṛntati ।। 

dinahaṃsānusṛtayā niśendīvaramālayā ।
tārākesarayājasraṃ capalo valayaty alam ।। 

śailorṇadyudharāśṛṅgajagadūrṇāyusaunikaḥ ।
pratyahaṃ pibati prokṣya tārāraktakaṇān api ।। 

tāruṇyanalinīsoma āyurmātaṅgakesarī ।
na tad asti na yasyāyaṃ tucchātucchasya taskaraḥ ।। 

kalpakelivilāsena piṣṭapātitajantunā ।
nyagbhāvodbhavahāsena ramate svātmanātmani ।। 

kartā bhoktātha saṃhartā smartā sarvapadaṃ gataḥ ।
sarvam eva karotīdaṃ na karoti ca kiñcana ।। 

sakalam apy akalākalitāntaraṃ subhagadurbhagarūpadharaṃ vapuḥ ।
prakaṭayan sahasaiva ca gopayan vilasatīha hi kālabalaṃ nṛṣu ।। 

kālāpavādo nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

asyoḍḍāmaralīlasya dūrāstasakalāpadaḥ ।
saṃsāre rājaputrasya kālasyākalitaujasaḥ ।। 

asminn ācarato dīnair mugdhair bhūtamṛgavrajaiḥ ।
ākheṭakaṃ jarjarite jagajjaṅgalajālake ।। 

ekadeśollasaccāruvaḍavānalapaṅkajā ।
krīḍāpuṣkariṇī ramyā kalpakālamahārṇavaḥ ।। 

kaṭutiktāmblabhūtāḍhyais sadadhikṣīrasāgaraiḥ ।
tair eva taiḥ paryuṣitair jagadbhiḥ kālavartanam ।। 

caṇḍī caturasañcārā sarvamātṛgaṇānvitā ।
saṃsāravanavinyastanaraiṇākarṣaṇī vṛkī ।। 

pṛthvī karatale pṛthvī pānapātrī rasānvitā ।
kamalotpalakalhāralolajālakamālitā ।। 

virāvī vikaṭāsphālo nṛsiṃho bhujapañjare ।
saṭāvikaṭapīnāṃsaḥ kāntaḥ krīḍāśakuntakaḥ ।। 

alābuvīṇāmadhuraś śaradvyomāmalacchaviḥ ।
devaḥ kila mahākālo līlākokilabālakaḥ ।। 

ajasrasphūrjitākāro vāntaduḥkhaśarāśaniḥ ।
abhāvanāmakodaṇḍaḥ parisphurati sarvataḥ ।। 

anuttamasphuritavilāsavardhito bhraman haran parivilasan vidārayan ।
jarajjagajjaraḍhavilolamarkaṭaḥ parisphuradvapur iha kāla īhate ।। 

kālavilāso nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

atraiva durvilāsānāṃ cūḍāmaṇir ivāparaḥ ।
karoty astīti lokena daivaṃ kālaś ca kathyate ।। 

kriyāmātrād ṛte yasya svaparispandarūpiṇaḥ ।
nānyad ālakṣyate rūpaṃ karmaṇo na samīhitam ।। 

teneyam akhilā bhūtasantatir nityapelavā ।
tāpena himamāleva nītā vidhuratāṃ bhṛśam ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagadābhogimaṇḍalam ।
tat tasya nartanāgāram ihāsāv abhinṛtyati ।। 

tṛtīyaṃ ca kṛtānteti nāma bibhrat sudāruṇam ।
kāpālikavapur mattaṃ daivaṃ jagati nṛtyati ।। 

nṛtyato hi kṛtāntasya nitāntam avirāmiṇaḥ ।
nityaṃ niyatikāntāyā mune paramakāminaḥ ।। 

śeṣaś śaśikalāśubhro gaṅgāvāhaś ca tau tridhā ।
upavīte avītābhe ubhe saṃsāravakṣasi ।। 

candrārkamaṇḍale hemakaṭake karamūlayoḥ ।
līlāsarasijaṃ haste brāhmaṃ brahmāṇḍakarṇikam ।। 

tārābinducitaṃ lolapuṣkarāvartapallavam ।
ekārṇavapayodhautam ekam ambaram ambaram ।। 

evaṃrūpasya tasyāgre niyatir nityakāminī ।
anastamitasaṃrambham ārambhaiḥ parinṛtyati ।। 

tasyā nartanalolāyā jaganmaṇḍapakoṭare ।
aruddhaspandarūpāyā āgamāpāyacañcure ।। 

cārubhūṣaṇam aṅgeṣu devalokāntarāvalī ।
āpātālaṃ nabho lambaṃ kavarīmaṇḍalaṃ bṛhat ।। 

narakālī ca mañjīramālā kalakalākulā ।
protā duṣkṛtasūtreṇa pātālacaraṇe calā ।। 

kastūrikātilakakaṃ kriyāsakhyopakalpitam ।
citritaṃ citraguptena yāme vadanapaṭṭake ।। 

kālīrūpam upasthāya kalpānteṣu kriyākulam ।
nṛtyaty eṣā punar devī sphuṭacchailaghanāravam ।। 

paścātpralambavibhrāntakaumārarathabarhibhiḥ ।
netratrayabṛhadrandhrabhūribhāṅkārabhīṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

lambalolaśaraccandravitīrṇaharamūrdhajaiḥ ।
uccaraccārumandāragaurīkavaricāmaraiḥ ।। 

uttāṇḍavācalākārabhairavodaratumbakaiḥ ।
raṇatsahasrarandhrendradehabhikṣākapālakaiḥ ।। 

śuṣkā śarīrakhaṭvāṅgabhaṅgair āpūritāmbaram ।
bhāyayaty ātmanātmānam api kṛṣṇair ghanāsitam ।। 

viśvarūpaśiraścakracārupuṣkaramālayā ।
tāṇḍaveṣu vivalgantī mahākalpeṣu rājate ।। 

pramattapuṣkarāvartaḍamarūḍḍāmarāravaiḥ ।
tasyāḥ kila palāyante kalpānte tumburādayaḥ ।। 

nṛtyato ante kṛtāntasya candramaṇḍalahāsinaḥ ।
tārakācandrikācāruvyomapiñchāvacūlinaḥ ।। 

ekasmiñ śravaṇe dīrghā himavān asti mudrikā ।
apare api mahāmeruḥ kāntā kāñcanakarṇikā ।। 

atraiva kuṇḍale lole candrārkau gaṇḍamaṇḍale ।
lokālokācalaśreṇī sarvataḥ kaṭimekhalā ।। 

itaś cetaś ca gacchantī vidyudvalayavarṇikā ।
anilāndolitā bhāti nīradāṃśukapaṭṭikā ।। 

musulaiḥ paṭṭisaiś śūlaiḥ prāsais tomaramudgaraiḥ ।
tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣīṇajagadvrātakṛtāntair iva sambhṛtaiḥ ।। 

saṃsārabandhanādīrghe pāśe kālakaracyute ।
śeṣabhogamahāsūtre protair mālāsya śobhate ।। 

jīvollasanmakarikāratnatejobhir ujjvalā ।
saptābdhikaṅkaṇaśreṇī bhujayor asya bhūṣaṇam ।। 

vyavahāramahāvartā sukhaduḥkhaparamparā ।
rajaḥpūrṇā tamaśśyāmā romālī tasya rājate ।। 

evamprāyāṃ sa kalpānte kṛtāntas tāṇḍavodbhaṭām ।
upasaṃhṛtya nṛttehāṃ sṛṣṭyā saha maheśvaraḥ ।। 

punar hāsyamayīṃ nṛttalīlāṃ sarvasvarūpiṇīm ।
tanotīmāṃ jarāduḥkhaśokābhinayabhūṣitām ।। 

bhūyaḥ karoti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi lokāntarāṇi janajālakakalpanāṃ ca ।
ācāracārukalanāṃ ca calācalāṃ ca paṅkād yathārbhakajano racanām akhinnaḥ ।। 

kṛtāntavilasitaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

vṛtte asminn eva caiteṣāṃ kālādīnāṃ mahāmune ।
saṃsāranāmni kaivāsthā mādṛśānāṃ bhavatv iha ।। 

vikrītā iva tiṣṭhāma etair daivādibhir vayam ।
dhūrtaiḥ prapañcacaturair mugdhā vanamṛgā iva ।। 

eṣo anāryasamācāraḥ kālaḥ kavalanonmukhaḥ ।
jagaty avirataṃ lokaṃ pātayaty āpadarṇave ।। 

dahaty ante durāśābhir daivo dāruṇaceṣṭayā ।
lokaṃ puṣpanikāśābhir jvālābhir dahano yathā ।। 

dhṛtiṃ vidhurayaty ekāmayadā rūpavallabhā ।
strītvāt svabhāvacapalā niyatir niyamonmukhī ।। 

grasate avirataṃ bhūtajālaṃ sarpa ivānilam ।
kṛtāntaḥ karkaśācāro jarāṃ nītvā jagadvapuḥ ।। 

yamanirghṛṇarājendro nārtaṃ nāmānukampate ।
sarvabhūtadayācāro jano durlabhatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

sarvā eva mune phalguvibhavā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
duḥkhāyaiva durantāya dāruṇā lobhabhūmayaḥ ।। 

āyur atyantataralaṃ mṛtyur ekas tu niṣṭhuraḥ ।
tāruṇyaṃ cātitaralaṃ bālyaṃ jaḍatayā hṛtam ।। 

kalākalaṅkito loko bandhavo bhavabandhanam ।
bhogā bhavamahārogās tṛṣṇā ca mṛgatṛṣṇikā ।। 

śatravaś cendriyāṇy eva satyaṃ yātam asatyatām ।
praharaty ātmanaivātmā mana eva manoripuḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāraḥ kalaṅkāya buddhayaḥ paripelavāḥ ।
kriyā duṣphaladāyinyo līlās strīniṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

vāñchāviṣayaśālinyas sacamatkṛtayaḥ kṛtāḥ ।
nāryo doṣapatākinyo rasā nīrasatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

vastv avastutayā cāttaṃ dattaṃ cittam ahaṅkṛtau ।
abhāvarodhitā bhāvā bhavānto nādhigamyate ।। 

tapyate kevalaṃ sādho matir ākulitāntarā ।
rāgorago vilasati virāgaṃ nopagacchati ।।
