rajoguṇāhatā dṛṣṭis tamas samparivardhate ।
na cādhigamyate sattvaṃ tattvam atyantadūrataḥ ।। 

sthitir asthiratāṃ yātā mṛtir āgamanonmukhī ।
dhṛtir vaidhuryam āyāti ratir nityam avastuni ।। 

matir māndyena malinā pātaikaparamaṃ vapuḥ ।
jvalatīva jarā dehe pravisphūrjati duṣkṛtam ।। 

yatnena yāti yuvatā dūre sajjanasaṅgatiḥ ।
gatir na vidyate kācit kvacin nodeti satyatā ।। 

mano vimuhyatīvāntar muditā dūrato gatā ।
nojjvalā karuṇodeti dūrād āyāti nīcatā ।। 

dhīratādhīratām eti pātotpātaparo janaḥ ।
sulabho durjanāśleṣo durlabhas sādhusaṅgamaḥ ।। 

āgamāpāyino bhāvā bhāvanā bhavabandhanī ।
nīyate kevalaṃ kvāpi nityaṃ bhūtaparamparā ।। 

diśo api hi na dṛśyante deśo apy avyapadeśabhāk ।
śailā api hi śīryante kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

dravanty api samudrāś ca śīryante tārakā api ।
siddhā api na sidhyanti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

adyate asattayāpi dyaur bhuvanaṃ cāpi bhajyate ।
dharāpi yāti vaidhuryaṃ kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

dānavā api dīryante dhruvo apy adhruvajīvitaḥ ।
amarā api māryante kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

śakro apy ākramyate śakrair yamo api hi niyamyate ।
vāyor apy asty avāyutvaṃ kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

somo api vyomatām eti mārtāṇḍo apy eti khaṇḍanām ।
rugṇatām agnir apy eti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

parameṣṭhy apy aniṣṭhāvān harate harim apy ajaḥ ।
bhavo apy abhavatāṃ yāti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

kālaś śakalatām eti niyatiś cāpi nīyate ।
kham apy ālīyate anante kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane ।। 

aśravyāvācyadurdarśatantreṇājñātamūrtinā ।
bhuvanāni viḍambyante kenacid bhramadāyinā ।। 

ahaṅkārakalām etya sarvatrāntaravāsinā ।
na so asti triṣu lokeṣu yas teneha na bādhyate ।। 

śilāśailakaṭapreṣu sāśvasūto divākaraḥ ।
vanapāṣāṇavan nityam avaśaḥ paridolyate ।। 

dharāgolakam antassthasurāsuragaṇāspadam ।
veṣṭyate dhiṣṇyacakreṇa pakvākṣoṭam iva tvacā ।। 

divi devā bhuvi narāḥ pātāle asurabhoginaḥ ।
kalpitāḥ kalpamātreṇa nīyante jarjarāṃ daśām ।। 

kāmaś ca jagatīśānaraṇalabdhaparākramaḥ ।
akrameṇaiva vikrānto lokam ākramya valgati ।। 

vasanto mattamātaṅgo madaiḥ kusumavarṣaṇaiḥ ।
āmoditakakupcakraś ceto nayati vakratām ।। 

anuraktāṅganālokalocanālokitākṛti ।
spaṣṭīkartuṃ manaś śakto na viveko mahān api ।। 

paropakārakāriṇyā parārtyā paritaptayā ।
buddha eva sukhī manye svārthaśītalayā dhiyā ।। 

utpannadhvaṃsinaḥ kālavaḍavānalapātinaḥ ।
saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante kallolā jīvitāmbudheḥ ।। 

sarva eva narā mohād durāśāpāśapātinaḥ ।
doṣagulmakasāraṅgā nigīrṇā janmajaṅgale ।। 

saṅkṣīyate jagati janmaparamparāsu lokasya tair iha kukarmabhir āyur etat ।
ākāśapādapalatākṛtapāśakalpaṃ yeṣāṃ phalaṃ na hi vicāravido api vidmaḥ ।। 

adyotsavo ayam ṛtur eṣa tatheha yātrā te bandhavas sukham idaṃ sa viśeṣabhogaḥ ।
itthaṃ mudhaiva kalayan svavikalpajālam ālolapelavamatir galatīha lokaḥ ।। 

durvilāsavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

anyac ca tātātitarām aramye manorame veha jagatsvarūpe ।
na kiñcid apy eti tad arthajātaṃ yenātiviśrāntim upaiti cetaḥ ।। 

bālye gate kalpitakelilole vayomṛge dāradarīṣu kīrṇe ।
śarīrake jarjaratāṃ prayāte vidūyate kevalam eva lokaḥ ।। 

jarātuṣārābhihatāṃ śarīrasarojinīṃ dūratare vihāya ।
kṣaṇād gate jīvitacañcarīke janasya saṃsārasaro viśuṣkam ।। 

yadā yadā pākam upaiti nūnaṃ tadā tadeyaṃ natim ātanoti ।
jarābharānalpanavaprasūnavijarjarā kāyalatā narāṇām ।। 

tṛṣṇānadī sāratarapravāhagrastākhilānantapadārthajātā ।
taṭasthasantoṣasuvṛkṣamūlanikāṣadakṣā vahatīha loke ।। 

śarīranauś carmanibaddhabandhā bhavāmbudhāv ālulitā bhramantī ।
pravroḍyate pañcabhir indriyākhyair adho vahantī makarair adhīnā ।। 

tṛṣṇālatākānanacāriṇo amī śākhāśataṃ kāmamahīruheṣu ।
paribhramantaḥ kṣapayanti kāmam manomṛgā no phalam āpnuvanti ।। 

kṛcchreṣu dūrāstaviṣādamohās svāmyeṣv anutsiktamano'bhirāmāḥ ।
sudurlabhās samprati sundarībhir anāhatāntaḥkaraṇā mahāntaḥ ।। 

taranti mātaṅgaghaṭātaraṅgaṃ raṇāmbudhiṃ ye mayi te na śūrāḥ ।
śūrās ta eveha manastaraṅgaṃ ye hīndriyāmbhodhim imaṃ taranti ।। 

akliṣṭaparyantaphalābhirāmā na dṛśyate kasyacid eva kācit ।
kriyā durāśāhatacittavṛtter yām etya viśrāntim upaiti lokaḥ ।। 

kīrtyā jagad dikkuharaṃ pratāpaiś śriyā gṛhaṃ sattvabalena lakṣmīm ।
ye pūrayanty akṣatadharmabandhā na te jagatyāṃ sulabhā manuṣyāḥ ।। 

apy antarasthaṃ giriśailabhitter vajrālayābhyantarasaṃsthitaṃ vā ।
sarvaṃ samāyānti samiddhavegās sarvāś śriyas santatam āpadaś ca ।। 

putrāś ca dārāś ca dhanaṃ ca buddhyā prakalpyate tāta rasāyanaṃ va ।
sarvaṃ tu tan nopakaroty athānte yatrātiramyā viṣamūrchanaiva ।। 

viṣādayukto viṣamām avasthām upāgataḥ kāyavayo'vasāne ।
bhāvān smaran svān abhidharmariktāñ jano jarāvān abhidahyate antaḥ ।। 

kāmārthadharmāptikṛśāntarābhiḥ kriyābhir ādau divasāni nītvā ।
cetaś calad barhiṇapiñchalolaṃ viśrāntim āgacchatu kena puṃsaḥ ।। 

purogatair apy anavāptarūpais taraṅgiṇītuṅgataraṅgakalpaiḥ ।
kriyāphalair daivavaśād upetair viḍambyate bhinnarucir hi lokaḥ ।। 

imāny amūnīti vibhāvitāni kāryāṇy aparyantamanoramāṇi ।
janasya jāyājanarañjanena jaṭājarāntaṃ jarayanti cetaḥ ।। 

parṇāni śīrṇāni yathā tarūṇāṃ sametya janmāśu layaṃ prayānti ।
tathaiva lokās svavivekahīnās sametya gacchanti kuto apy ahobhiḥ ।। 

itas tato dūrataraṃ vihṛtya praviśya gehaṃ divasāvasāne ।
vivekilokāśrayisādhukarmarikte ahni yāte ka upaiti nidrām ।। 

vidrāvite śatrujane samaste samāgatāyām abhitaś ca lakṣmyām ।
sevyanta etāni sukhāni yāvat tāvat samāyāti kuto api mṛtyuḥ ।। 

kuto api saṃvardhitatuccharūpair bhāvair amībhiḥ kṣaṇadṛṣṭanaṣṭaiḥ ।
vilobhyamānā janatā jagatyāṃ na vetty upāyātam aho na yātam ।। 

yiyāsubhiḥ kālamukhaṃ kriyante janaiḍakais te hatakarmabandhāḥ ।
ye pīnatām eva balād upetya śarīrabandhe nanu te bhavanti ।। 

ajasram āgacchati satvareyam anārataṃ gacchati satvaraiva ।
kuto api lolā janatā jagatyāṃ taraṅgamālā kṣaṇabhaṅgureva ।। 

prāṇāpahāraikaparā narāṇām mano manohāritayā haranti ।
raktacchadāṣ ṣaṭpadacañcalākṣyo viṣadrumā lolalatās striyaś ca ।। 

ito anyataś copagatā mudhaiva samānasaṅketanibaddhabhāvā ।
yātrāsamāsaṅgasamā narāṇāṃ kalatramitravyavahāramāyā ।। 

pradīpakāntiṣv iva bhuktabhūridaśāsv atisnehanibandhanīṣu ।
saṃsāramāyāsu calācalāsu na jñāyate tattvam atāttvikīṣu ।। 

saṃsārasaṃrambhakucakrikeyam prāvṛṭpayobudbudabhaṅgurāpi ।
asāvadhānasya janasya buddhau cirasthirapratyayam ātanoti ।। 

śobhojjvalā dainyavaśād vinaṣṭā guṇās sthitās samprati jarjaratve ।
āśvāsanā dūrataraṃ prayātā janasya hemanta ivābjinīṣu ।। 

punaḥ punar daivavaśād upetya svadehabhāreṇa kṛtāpakāraḥ ।
vilūyate yatra taruḥ kuṭhārair āśvāsane tatra hi kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ।। 

manoramasyāpy atidoṣavṛtter antar vighātāya samutthitasya ।
viṣadrumasyeva janasya saṅgād āsādyate samprati mūrchanaiva ।। 

kās tā dṛśo yāsu na santi doṣāḥ kās tā diśo yāsu na duḥkhadāhaḥ ।
kās tāḥ prajā yāsu na bhaṅguratvaṃ kās tāḥ kriyā yāsu na nāma māyā ।। 

kalpābhidhānakṣaṇajīvino api kalpaughasaṅkhyākalane viriñcāḥ ।
ataḥ kalāśālini kālajāle laghutvadīrghatvadhiyo apy asatyāḥ ।। 

sarvatra pāṣāṇamayā mahīdhrā mṛdā mahī dārubhir eva vṛkṣāḥ ।
māṃsair janāḥ pauruṣabaddhabhāvā nāpūrvam astīha vikārahīnam ।। 

ālokyate cetanayānuviddhaḥ payonibaddho aṇucayo nabhassthaḥ ।
pṛthagvibhāgena padārthalakṣmyā etaj jagan netarad asti kiñcit ।। 

camatkṛtiś ceha manasviloke cetaścamatkārakarī narāṇām ।
svapne api sādho viṣayaṃ kadācit keṣāñcid apy eti na citrarūpā ।। 

adyāpayāte tv api kalpanāyā ākāśavallīphalavanmahattve ।
udeti no alobhalavāhatānām udāravṛttāntamayī kathaiva ।। 

ādātum icchan padam uttamānāṃ svacetasaivopahato adya lokaḥ ।
pataty aśaṅkaṃ paśur adrikūṭād ānīlavallīdalavāñchayeva ।। 

avāntaranyastanirarthakāṃsacchāyālatāpattraphalaprasūnāḥ ।
śarīra eva kṣatasampadaś ca śvabhradrumā adyatanā narāś ca ।। 

kvacij janā mārdavasundareṣu kvacit karāleṣu ca sañcaranti ।
daśāntarāleṣu nirantareṣu vanāntaṣaṇḍeṣv iva kṛṣṇaśārāḥ ।। 

dhātur navāni divasaṃ prati bhīṣaṇāni ramyāṇi cāvalulitākhilamānavāni ।
kāryāṇi kaṣṭaphalapākahatodayāni vismāpayanti na śaṭhasya manāṃsi keṣām ।। 

janaḥ kāmāsakto vividhakukalāvedanaparas samas svapne apy asmiñ jagati sulabho nādya sujanaḥ ।
kriyā duḥkhāsaṅgād vidhuravidhurā nūnam akhilā na jāne netavyā katham iva daśā jīvitamayī ।। 

anityatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yac cedaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
tat sarvam asthiraṃ brahman svapnasaṅgamasannibham ।। 

śuṣkasāgarasaṅkāśo nikhāto yo adya dṛśyate ।
sa prātar abhrasaṃvīto nagas sampadyate mune ।। 

yo vanavyūhavistīrṇo vilīḍhagagano acalaḥ ।
dinair eva sa yāty urvīsamatāṃ kūpatāṃ ca vā ।। 

yad aṅgam adya saṃvītaṃ kauśeyasragvilepanaiḥ ।
digambaraṃ tad eva śvo dūre viśaritāvaṭe ।। 

yatrādya nagaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vicitrācāracañcalam ।
tatraivodeti divasais saṃśūnyāraṇyadhanvatā ।। 

yaḥ pumān adya tejasvī maṇḍalāny adhitiṣṭhati ।
sa bhasmakūṭatāṃ rājan divasair eva gacchati ।। 

araṇyānī mahābhīmā yā nabhomaṇḍalopamā ।
patākācchāditākāśā saiva sampadyate purī ।। 

yā latāvalitā bhīmā bhāty adya vipināvalī ।
divasair eva sā yāti mune marumahīpadam ।। 

salilaṃ sthalatāṃ yāti sthalī bhavati vāribhūḥ ।
viparyasyati sarvaṃ hi sakāṣṭhāmbutṛṇaṃ jagat ।। 

anityaṃ yauvanaṃ bālyaṃ śarīraṃ dravyasañcayāḥ ।
bhāvād bhāvāntaraṃ yānti taraṅgavad anāratam ।। 

vātāttadīpakaśikhālolaṃ jagati jīvitam ।
taḍitsphuraṇasaṅkāśā padārthaśrīr jagattraye ।। 

viparyāsam iyaṃ yāti bhūribhūtaparamparā ।
bījarāśir ivājasraṃ prathamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

manaḥpavanaparyastabhūribhūtarajaḥpaṭā ।
pātotpātaparāvartavarābhinayabhūṣitā ।। 

ālakṣyate sthitir iyaṃ jāgatī janitabhramā ।
nṛttāveśavivṛtteva saṃsārārabhaṭīnaṭī ।। 

gandharvanagarākāraviparyāsavidhāyinī ।
apāṅgabhaṅgurodāravyavahāramanoramā ।। 

taḍittaralam ālokam ātanvānā punaḥ punaḥ ।
saṃsārarañjanā brahman nṛttamatteva rājate ।। 

divasās te mahāntas te sampadas tāḥ kriyāś ca tāḥ ।
sarvaṃ smṛtipadaṃ yātaṃ yāmo vayam api kṣaṇāt ।। 

pratyahaṃ kṣayam āyāti pratyahaṃ jāyate punaḥ ।
adyāpi hatarūpāyā nānto asyā dagdhasaṃsṛteḥ ।। 

tiryaktvaṃ puruṣā yānti tiryañco naratām api ।
devāś cādevatāṃ caite kim eveha vibho sthiram ।। 

racayan raśmijālena rātryahāni punaḥ punaḥ ।
ativāhya raviḥ kālaṃ vināśāvadhim īkṣate ।। 

brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca sarvā vā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
nāśam evānudhāvanti salilānīva vāḍavam ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
vināśavāḍavasyaitat sarvaṃ saṃśuṣkam indhanam ।। 

dhanāni bandhavo bhṛtyā mitrāṇi vibhavāś ca ye ।
vināśabhayabhītasya sarvaṃ nīrasatāṃ gatam ।। 

svadante tāvad evaite bhāvā jagati dhīmataḥ ।
yāvat smṛtipathaṃ yāti na vināśakurākṣasaḥ ।। 

kṣaṇam aiśvaryam āyāti kṣaṇam eti daridratā ।
kṣaṇaṃ vigatarogatvaṃ kṣaṇam āgatarogatā ।। 

pratikṣaṇaṃ viparyāsadāyinā mahatāmunā ।
jagadbhrameṇa ke nāma dhīmanto api na mohitāḥ ।। 

tamaḥpaṅkasamālabdhaṃ kṣaṇam ākāśamaṇḍalam ।
kṣaṇaṃ kanakaniṣṣyandakomalālokasundaram ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ jaladanīlābjamālāvalitakoṭaram ।
kṣaṇam uḍḍāmararavaṃ kṣaṇaṃ mūkam avasthitam ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ tārāvilasitaṃ kṣaṇam arkeṇa bhūṣitam ।
kṣaṇam indukṛtāhlādaṃ kṣaṇaṃ sarvabahiṣkṛtam ।। 

āgamāpāyaparayā sthityā saṃsthitanāśayā ।
na bibhetīha saṃsāre dhīro api ka ivānayā ।। 

āpadaḥ kṣaṇam āyānti kṣaṇam āyānti sampadaḥ ।
kṣaṇaṃ janmātha maraṇaṃ mune kim iva na kṣaṇam ।। 

prāg āsīd anya eveha jātas tv anyetaro dinaiḥ ।
apy ekarūpaṃ bhagavan kiñcid asti na susthitam ।। 

ghaṭasya paṭatā dṛṣṭā paṭasyāpi ghaṭasthitiḥ ।
na tad asti na yad dṛṣṭaṃ viparyasyati saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

aśūreṇa hataś śūra ekenāpi śataṃ hatam ।
prākṛtāḥ prabhutāṃ yātās sarvam āvartate jagat ।। 

janateyaṃ viparyāsam ajasram anugacchati ।
jaḍaspandaparāmarśāt taraṅgānām ivāvalī ।। 

bālyam adya dinair eva yauvanaśrīs tato jarā ।
dehe api naikarūpatvaṃ kāsthā bāhyeṣu vastuṣu ।। 

kṣaṇam ānanditām eti kṣaṇam eti viṣāditām ।
kṣaṇaṃ saumyatvam āyāti sarvasmin naṭavan manaḥ ।। 

itaś cānyad itaś cānyad itaś cānyad ayaṃ vidhiḥ ।
racayan vastu nāyāti khedaṃ līlāsv ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

cinoty unmādayaty atti nihanty āhanti cātmasāt ।
jagajjātam idaṃ dhātā pātotpātaśatair iha ।। 

kṣaṇenānyad dinenānyat prātar anyad itas tataḥ ।
racayan vañcanādakṣo vidhir dṛṣṭo na kenacit ।। 

yad adya tat tu na prātar yat prātas tat tu nādya ca ।
yad anyadā tu tan nādya sarvam āvartatetarām ।। 

santatānīha duḥkhāni sukhāni viralāni ca ।
satataṃ rātryahānīva vivartante naraṃ prati ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvabhāgino bhavabhāvinaḥ ।
janasya sthiratāṃ yānti nāpado na ca sampadaḥ ।। 

padāt padam ayaṃ pāpas sarvam āpadi pātayan ।
helāvivalitāśeṣaḥ khalakālalavas sthitaḥ ।। 

samaviṣamadaśāvipākabhinnās tribhuvanabhūtaparamparāphalaughāḥ ।
samayapavanapātitāḥ patanti pratidinam ātatasaṃsṛtidrumebhyaḥ ।। 

virataviparyāsapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

iti medhopadāvāgnidagdhe mahati cetasi ।
prasphuranti na bhogāśā mṛgatṛṣṇās sarassv iva ।। 

pratyahaṃ cātikaṭutām eti saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
kālapākavaśollāsirasā nimbalatā yathā ।। 

vṛddhim āyāti daurjanyaṃ saujanyaṃ yāti tānavam ।
karañjakarkaśe rājan pratyahaṃ janacetasi ।। 

bhajyate bhuvi maryādā jhagity eva diśaṃ prati ।
śuṣkeva māṣaśimikā ṭāṅkārakaṭhināravam ।। 

rājyebhyo bhogapūgebhyaś cintāvanto mahīśvarāḥ ।
nirastacintākalikā varam ekāntaśīlatā ।। 

nānandāya mamodyānaṃ na sukhāya mama śriyaḥ ।
na harṣāya mamārthāśā śāmyāmi manasā saha ।। 

anityaś cāsukho lokas tṛṣṇā tāta durudvahā ।
cāpalopahataṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtim ।। 

nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ nābhinandāmi jīvitam ।
yathā tiṣṭhāmi tiṣṭhāmi tathaiva vigatajvaram ।। 

kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ bhogaiḥ kim arthena kim īhitaiḥ ।
ahaṅkāravaśād etat sa eva galito mama ।। 

janmāvalivaratrāyām indriyagranthayo dṛḍhāḥ ।
ye lagnās tadvimokṣārthaṃ ye yatante ta uttamāḥ ।। 

dalitaṃ māninīlokair mano makaraketunā ।
komalaṃ khuraniṣpeṣaiḥ kamalaṃ kariṇā yathā ।। 

adya cet svasthayā buddhyā munīndra na cikitsyate ।
bhūyaś cittacikitsāyāṃ kaḥ kilāvasaraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

viṣaṃ viṣayavaiṣamyaṃ na viṣaṃ viṣam ucyate ।
janmāntaraghnā viṣayā ekadehaharaṃ viṣam ।। 

na sukhāni na duḥkhāni na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ ।
na jīvitaṃ na maraṇaṃ bandhāya jñasya cetasaḥ ।। 

tad bhavāmi yathā brahman pūrvāparavidāṃ vara ।
vītaśokabhayāyāso jñas tathopadiśāśu me ।। 

vāsanājālavalitā duḥkhakaṇṭakasaṅkaṭā ।
nipātotpātabahalā bhīmarūpājñatāṭavī ।। 

krakacograviniṣpeṣaṃ soḍhuṃ śakto asmy ahaṃ mune ।
saṃsāravyavahārotthaṃ nāśāviṣamavaiśasam ।। 

idaṃ nāstīdam astīti vyavahārijanabhramaḥ ।
dhunotīdaṃ calaṃ ceto rajorāśim ivānilaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇātantulavaprotajīvasañcayamauktikam ।
cidacchāṅgatayā nityaṃ prakaṭaṃ cittanāyakam ।। 

saṃsārahāram aratiḥ kālavyālavibhūṣaṇam ।
troṭayāmy aham akrūrāṃ vāgurām iva kesarī ।। 

nīhāraṃ hṛdayāṭavyāṃ manastimiram āśu me ।
kenacij jñānadīpena bhinddhi tattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

vidyanta eveha na te mahātman durādhayo na kṣayam āpnuvanti ।
ye saṅgamenottamamānasānāṃ niśātamāṃsīva niśākareṇa ।। 

āyur vāyuvighaṭṭitābjapaṭalīlambāmbuvad bhaṅguraṃ bhogā meghavitānamadhyavilasatsaudāminīcañcalāḥ ।
lolo yauvanalālanājalarayaś cety ākalayya drutaṃ mudraivādridṛḍhārpitā nanu mayā citte ciraṃ śāntaye ।। 

sakalapadārthānāsthāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

evam abhyutthitānarthasārthasaṅkaṭakoṭaram ।
jagad ālokya nirmagnaṃ mano mananakardame ।। 

mano me bhramatīvedaṃ sambhramaś copajāyate ।
gātrāṇi parikampante pattrāṇīva jarattaroḥ ।। 

anāptottamasantoṣacaryotsaṅgākulā matiḥ ।
śūnyāspadā bibhetīha bālevālpabaleśvarā ।। 

vikalpebhyo luṭhanty etāś cāntaḥkaraṇavṛttayaḥ ।
śvabhrebhya iva sāraṅgyas tucchālambaviḍambitāḥ ।। 

avivekāspadabhraṣṭāḥ kaṣṭe rūḍhā na satpade ।
andhakūpam ivāpannā varākāś cakṣurādayaḥ ।। 

nāvasthitim upāyāti na ca yāti yathepsitam ।
cintā jīveśvarāyattā kāntevāpriyasadmani ।। 

jarjarīkṛtya vastūni tyajantī bibhratī tathā ।
mārgaśīrṣāntavallīva dhṛtir vidhuratāṃ gatā ।। 

apahastitasarvārtham anavasthitir āsthitā ।
gṛhītvotsṛjya cātmānam avasthitir avasthitā ।। 

calitācalitenāntar avaṣṭambhena me matiḥ ।
daridrācchinnavṛkṣasya mūleneva viḍambyate ।। 

cetaś cañcalam ābhogi bhuvanāntarvihāri ca ।
sambhramaṃ na jahātīdaṃ svavimānam ivāmaraḥ ।। 

ato atuccham anāyāsam anupādhi gatabhramam ।
kiṃ tat sthitipadaṃ sādhu yatra śaṅkā na vidyate ।। 

sarvārambhasamārambhās sujanā janakādayaḥ ।
vyavahāraparā eva katham uttamatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

lagnenāpi kilāṅgeṣu bahunā bahumānada ।
kathaṃ saṃsārapaṅkena pumān iha na lipyate ।। 

kāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ samupāśritya bhavanto vītakalmaṣāḥ ।
mahānto vicarantīha jīvanmuktā mahāśayāḥ ।। 

lobhayanto bhayāyaiva viṣayā bhogabhoginaḥ ।
bhaṅgurākāravibhavāḥ katham āyānti bhavyatām ।। 

mohamātaṅgamṛditā kalaṅkakalitāntarā ।
paraṃ prasādam āyāti śemuṣīsarasī katham ।। 

saṃsāra eva nivasañ jano vyavaharann api ।
na bandhaṃ katham āyāti padmapattre payo yathā ।। 

ātmavat tṛṇavad vedaṃ sakalaṃ janayañ jagat ।
katham uttamatām eti manomanmatham aspṛśan ।। 

kaṃ mahāpuruṣaṃ pāram upayātaṃ bhavodadheḥ ।
ācāreṇānusṛtyāyaṃ jano yāti na duṣkṛtam ।। 

kiṃ tad yad ucitaṃ śreyaḥ kiṃ tat syād ucitaṃ phalam ।
vartitavyaṃ ca saṃsāre kathaṃ nāmāsamañjase ।। 

tat tvaṃ kathaya me kiñcid yenāsya jagataḥ prabho ।
vedmi pūrvāparāṃ dhātuś ceṣṭitasyāsamasthitim ।। 

hṛdayākāśaśaśinaś cetaso malamārjanam ।
yathā me jāyatāṃ brahmaṃs tathā nirvighnam ācara ।। 

kim iha syād upādeyaṃ kiṃ vā heyam athetarat ।
kathaṃ viśrāntim āyātu cetaś capalam adrivat ।। 

kena pāvanamantreṇa dussaṃsṛtiviṣūcikā ।
śāmyatīyam anāyāsam āyāsaśatakāriṇī ।। 

kathaṃ śītalatām antar ānandatarumañjarīm ।
pūrṇacandra ivākṣīṇāṃ rākām āsādayāmy aham ।। 

prāpyāntaḥpūrṇatām antar na śocāmi yathā punaḥ ।
santo bhavantas tattvajñās tathaivopadiśantu mām ।। 

anuttamānandapadapradhānaviśrāntiriktaṃ hi mano mahātman ।
kadarthayantīha bhṛśaṃ vikalpāś śvāno vane deham ivālpajīvam ।। 

prayojanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

triṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

proccavṛkṣacalatpattralambāmbukaṇabhaṅgure ।
āyuṣīśānaśītāṃśukalāmṛduni dehake ।। 

kedāraviraṭadbhekakaṇṭhatvakkoṇabhaṅgure ।
vāgurāvalaye jantos suhṛtsvajanasaṅgame ।। 

vāsanāvātavalitakadāśātaḍiti sphuṭe ।
mohaughamihikāmeghe ghanaṃ sphūrjati garjati ।। 

nṛtyaty uttāṇḍavaṃ caṇḍe lole lobhakalāpini ।
suvikāsini sasphoṭam anarthakuṭajadrume ।। 

krūre kṛtāntamārjāre sarvabhūtākhuhāriṇi ।
aśrutaspandasañcāre kuto apy uparipātini ।। 

ka upāyo gatiḥ kā vā kā cintā kas samāśrayaḥ ।
keneyam aśubhodarkā na bhavej jīvitāṭavī ।। 

na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā kvacit ।
sudhiyas tuccham apy etad yan na yāti naramyatām ।। 

ayaṃ hi dagdhasaṃsāro nīrandhrakalanākulaḥ ।
kathaṃ susvādutām eti nīraso mūrkhatāṃ vinā ।। 

āśāprativiṣā kena kṣīrasnānena ramyatām ।
upaiti puṣpaśubhreṇa madhuneva suvallarī ।। 

apamṛṣṭamalodeti kṣālanenāmṛtadyutiḥ ।
manaścandramasaḥ kena tena kāmakalaṅkinaḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭasaṃsāragatinā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavināśinā ।
kena vā vyavahartavyaṃ saṃsāravanavīthiṣu ।। 

rāgadveṣamahārogā bhogapūrvātipūtayaḥ ।
kathaṃ jantor na bādhante saṃsārāraṇyacāriṇaḥ ।। 

kathaṃ ca vīravairāgnau patatāpi na dahyate ।
pāvake pārateneva rasena rasaśālinā ।। 

yasmāt kila jagaty asmin vyavahārakriyāṃ vinā ।
na sthitis sambhavaty abdhau patitasyājalā yathā ।। 

rāgadveṣavinirmuktā sukhaduḥkhavivarjitā ।
kṛśānor dāhahīneva śikhā nāstīha satkriyā ।। 

manomananamāninyās satāpābhuvanatraye ।
kṣayo yuktiṃ vinā nāsti brūta tām alam uttamāḥ ।। 

vyavahāravato yuktyā duḥkhaṃ nāyāti me yayā ।
atha vāvyavahārasya brūta tāṃ gatim uttamām ।। 

tat kathaṃ kena vā kiṃ vā kṛtam uttamacetasā ।
pūrvaṃ yenaiti viśrāmaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ manaḥ ।। 

yathā jānāsi bhagavaṃs tathā mohanivṛttaye ।
brūhi me sādhavo yena yūyaṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

atha vā tādṛśī brahman yuktir yadi na vidyate ।
na vakti mama vā kaścid vidyamānām api sphuṭam ।। 

svayaṃ caiva na cāpnomi tāṃ viśrāntim anuttamām ।
tad ahaṃ tyaktasarveho nirahaṅkāratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

na bhokṣye na pibāmy ambu nāhaṃ paridadhe ambaram ।
karomi nāhaṃ vyāpāraṃ snānadānāśanādikam ।। 

na ca tiṣṭhāmi kāryeṣu sampatsv āpaddaśāsu ca ।
na kiñcid abhivāñchāmi dehatyāgād ṛte mune ।। 

kevalaṃ vigatāśaṅko nirmamo gatamatsaraḥ ।
maunam eveha tiṣṭhāmi lipikarmasv ivārpitaḥ ।। 

atha krameṇa santyajya saśvāsocchvāsasaṃvidam ।
sanniveśaṃ tyajāmīmam anarthaṃ dehanāmakam ।। 

nāham asya na me dehaś śāmyāmy asnehadīpavat ।
sarvam eva parityajya tyajāmīdaṃ kalevaram ।। 

ity uktavān amalaśītakarābhirāmo rāmo mahattaravivekavikāsicetāḥ ।
tūṣṇīṃ babhūva purato mahatāṃ ghanānāṃ kekāravaśramavaśād iva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ ।। 

rāghavapraśno nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

vadaty evaṃ manomohavinivṛttikaraṃ vacaḥ ।
rāme rājīvapattrākṣe tasmin rājakumārake ।। 

sarve babhūvus tatrasthā vismayotphullalocanāḥ ।
dhṛtāmbarā deharuhair giraś śrotum ivodgataiḥ ।। 

virāmavāsanāpāstasamastabhavavāsanāḥ ।
muhūrtam amṛtāmbhodhivīcīvilulitā iva ।। 

tā giro rāmabhadrasya tasya citrārpitair iva ।
saṃśrutāś śṛṇukair antar ānandaparipīvaraiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrādyair munibhis saṃsadi sthitaiḥ ।
jayantaghṛṣṭipramukhair mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ ।। 

nṛpair daśarathaprakhyaiḥ pauraiḥ pāraśavādibhiḥ ।
sāmantai rājaputraiś ca brāhmaṇair brahmavādibhiḥ ।। 

tathā bhṛtyair amātyaiś ca pañjarasthaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ ।
krīḍāmṛgair gataspandais turaṅgair gatacarvaṇaiḥ ।। 

kausalyāpramukhaiś caiva nijavātāyanasthitaiḥ ।
saṃśāntabhūṣaṇārāvair aspandair vanitāgaṇaiḥ ।। 

udyānavallīnilayair viṭaṅkanilayair api ।
akṣubdhapakṣatatibhir vihagair viratāravaiḥ ।। 

siddhair nabhaścaraiś caiva tathā gandharvakinnaraiḥ ।
nāradavyāsapulahapramukhair munipuṅgavaiḥ ।। 

anyaiś ca devadeveśavidyādharamahoragaiḥ ।
rāmasya tā vicitrārthā mahodārā giraś śrutāḥ ।। 

atha tūṣṇīṃ sthitavati rāme rājīvalocane ।
tasmin raghukulākāśaśaśāṅkasamasundare ।। 

sādhuvādagirā sārdhaṃ siddhasārthasamīritā ।
vitānakasamā vyomnaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha ।। 

mandārakośaviśrāntabhramaradvandvanādinī ।
madirāmodasaundaryamuditonmadamānavā ।। 

vyomavātavinunneva tārakāṇāṃ paramparā ।
patiteva dharāpīṭhaṃ svargastrīhasitacchaṭā ।। 

vṛṣṭiṣv ekaśaranmeghalavāvalir iva cyutā ।
haiyyaṅgavīnapiṇḍānām īriteva paramparā ।। 

himavṛṣṭir ivodārā muktāhāracayopamā ।
aindavī raśmimāleva kṣīrormīṇām ivātatiḥ ।। 

kiñjalkāmodavalitā bhramadbhṛṅgakadambakā ।
sītkāragāyadāmodamadhurāniladolitā ।। 

prabhramatketakavyūhā prasaratkairavotkarā ।
prapatatkundavalayā valatkuvalayālayā ।। 

āpūritāṅganārāmagṛhacchādanacatvarā ।
udgrīvapuravāstavyavaranārīvilokitā ।। 

nirabhrotpalasaṅkāśavyomavṛṣṭir anākulā ।
adṛṣṭapūrvā sarvasya janasya janitasmayā ।। 

adṛṣṭapūrvā siddhaughakarotkarasamīritā ।
sā muhūrtacaturbhāge puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha ।। 

āpūritasabhāloke śānte kusumavarṣaṇe ।
imān siddhagaṇālāpāñ śuśruvus te sabhāsadaḥ ।। 

ākalpaṃ siddhasenāsu bhramadbhir abhito divam ।
apūrvam adya tv asmābhiś śrutaṃ śrutirasāyanam ।। 

yad anena kilodāram uktaṃ raghukulendunā ।
vītarāgatayā tad dhi vākpater apy agocaram ।। 

aho vata mahat puṇyam adyāsmābhir idaṃ śrutam ।
vaco rāmamukhodbhūtam amṛtāhlādakaṃ dhiyaḥ ।। 

upaśamāmṛtasundaram ādarād adhigatottamatāpadam eṣa yat ।
kathitavān ucitaṃ raghunandanas sapadi tena vayaṃ pratibodhitāḥ ।। 

nabhaścarasādhuvādo nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśas sargaḥ

siddhāḥ

pāvanasyāsya vacasaḥ proktasya raghuketunā ।
nirṇayaṃ śrotum ucitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ maharṣibhiḥ ।। 

nāradavyāsapulahapramukhā munipuṅgavāḥ ।
āgacchatāśv avighnena sarva eva maharṣayaḥ ।। 

patāmaḥ paritaḥ puṇyām etāṃ dāśarathīṃ sabhām ।
nīrandhrakanakāmbhojāṃ nalinīm iva ṣaṭpadāḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktvā sā samastaiva vyomāvāsanivāsinī ।
āpapāta sabhāṃ tatra divyā muniparamparā ।। 

agrasthitamarutpṛṣṭharaṇadvīṇamunīśvarā ।
payaḥpīnaghanaśyāmavyāsamecakitāntarā ।। 

bhṛgvaṅgiraḥpulastyādimunināyakamaṇḍitā ।
cyavanoddālakośīraśaralomādipālitā ।। 

parasparaparāmarśād dussaṃsthānamṛgājinā ।
lolākṣamālāvalayā sukamaṇḍaludhāriṇī ।। 

tārāvalir ivānyo'nyaṃ kṛtaśobhātiśāyinī ।
kausumī vṛṣṭir anyeva dvitīyevārkamaṇḍalī ।। 

tārājāla ivāmbhodo vyāso hy atra vyarājata ।
tāraugha iva śītāṃśur nārado atra vyarājata ।। 

deveṣv iva surādhīśaḥ pulastyo atra vyarājata ।
āditya iva devānām aṅgirāś ca vyarājata ।। 

athāsyāṃ siddhasenāyāṃ patantyāṃ nabhaso rasāt ।
uttasthau munisampūrṇā tadā dāśarathī sabhā ।। 

miśrībhūtā virejus te nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ ।
parasparavṛtāṅgābhā bhāsayanto diśo daśa ।। 

veṇughaṇṭāvṛtakarā līlākamaladhāriṇaḥ ।
dūrvāṅkurākrāntaśikhās sacūḍāmaṇimūrdhajāḥ ।। 

jaṭākaṭaprakapilā maulimālitamastakāḥ ।
prakoṣṭhagākṣavalayā māṇikyavalayānvitāḥ ।। 

cīravalkalasaṃvītās srakkauśeyāvaguṇṭhitāḥ ।
vilolamekhalāpāśāś calanmuktākalāpinaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrau tān pūjayām āsatuḥ kṣaṇāt ।
arghyaiḥ pādyair vacobhiś ca nabhaścaramahāgaṇān ।। 

sarvācāreṇa siddhaughaṃ pūjayām āsa bhūpatiḥ ।
siddhaugho bhūpatiṃ caiva kuśalapraśnavārttayā ।। 

tais taiḥ praṇayasaṃrambhair anyo'nyaṃ prāptasatkriyāḥ ।
upāviśan viṣṭareṣu nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ ।। 

vacobhiḥ puṣpavarṣeṇa sādhuvādena cābhitaḥ ।
rāmaṃ taṃ pūjayām āsuḥ puraḥ praṇatam āsthitam ।। 

āsāṃ cakre ca tatrāsau rājalakṣmyā virājitaḥ ।
viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaḥ ।। 

nārado devaputraś ca vyāsaś ca munipuṅgavaḥ ।
marīcir atha durvāsā munir āṅgirasas tathā ।। 

kratuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaś śaralomā munīśvaraḥ ।
vātsyāyano bharadvājo vālmīkir munipuṅgavaḥ ।। 

uddālaka ṛcīkaś ca śaryātiś cyavanas tathā ।
ūṣmapāś ca ghṛtārciś ca śāluḍir vāluḍis tathā ।। 

ete cānye ca bahavo vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ ।
jñātajñeyā mahātmānas saṃsthitās tatra nāyakāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrābhyāṃ saha te nāradādayaḥ ।
idam ūcur anūcānā rāmam ānamitānanam ।। 

aho vata kumāreṇa kalyāṇaguṇaśālinī ।
vāg uktā paramodāravirāgarasagarbhiṇī ।। 

pariniṣṭhitavākyārthasubodham ucitaṃ sphuṭam ।
udāraṃ priyacaryārham avihvalam aviplutam ।। 

abhivyaktapadaspaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ ca tuṣṭimat ।
karoti rāghavaproktaṃ vacaḥ kasya na vismayam ।। 

śatād ekatamasyaiva sarvodāracamatkṛteḥ ।
īpsitārthārpaṇaikāntadakṣā bhavati bhāratī ।। 

kumāra tvāṃ vinā kasya vivekaphalaśālinī ।
evaṃ vikāsam āyāti prajñāvanalatā navā ।। 

prajñādīpaśikhā yasya rāmasyeva hṛdi sthitā ।
prajvalaty alam ālokakāriṇī sa pumān smṛtaḥ ।। 

raktamāṃsāsthiyantrāṇi bahūny atitatāni ca ।
padārthān apakarṣanti nāsti teṣu sacetanam ।। 

janmamṛtyujarāduḥkham anuyānti punaḥ punaḥ ।
vimṛśanti na saṃsāraṃ paśavaḥ parimohitāḥ ।। 

kathañcit kvacid evaiko dṛśyate vimalāśayaḥ ।
pūrvāparavicārārho yathāyam arisūdanaḥ ।। 

anuttamacamatkāraphalās subhagamūrtayaḥ ।
bhavyā hi viralā loke sahakāradrumā iva ।। 

samyagdṛṣṭir jagajjātau svavivekacamatkṛtiḥ ।
asmin bhavyamatāv antar iyam anyeva dṛśyate ।। 

sulabhās subhagā lokāḥ phalapallavaśālinaḥ ।
jāyante taravo deśe na tu candanapādapāḥ ।। 

vṛkṣāḥ prativane santi satyaṃ suphalapallavāḥ ।
na tv apūrvacamatkāro lavaṅgas sulabhas sadā ।। 

jyotsneva śītamahasas sutaror iva mañjarī ।
puṣpād āmodalekheva dṛṣṭā rāmāc camatkṛtiḥ ।। 

asmād uddāmadaurātmyadaivanirmāṇanirmiteḥ ।
dvijendrā dagdhasaṃsārāt sāro hy atyantadurlabhaḥ ।। 

yatante sārasamprāptau ye yaśonidhayo dhiyā ।
dhanyā dhuri satāṃ gaṇyās ta eva puruṣottamāḥ ।। 

na rāmeṇa samo astīha triṣu lokeṣu kaścana ।
vivekavān udārātmā mahātmā ceti no matiḥ ।। 

sakalalokacamatkṛtikāriṇo apy abhimataṃ yadi rāghavacetasaḥ ।
phalati no tad ime vayam eva hi sphuṭataraṃ munayo hatabuddhayaḥ ।। 

siddhamunīśvarādisabhāpatanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

vairāgyaprakaraṇaṃ samāptam nāma sargaḥ

prakaraṇa mumukṣuvyavahāra

prathamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

nāradeneti mahatā vacasy ukte sabhāgataḥ ।
rāmam agragataṃ prītyā viśvāmitro apy uvāca ha ।। 

viśvāmitraḥ

tava rāghava nāsty anyaj jñeyaṃ jñānavatāṃ vara ।
svayaiva sūkṣmayā buddhyā sarvaṃ vijñātavān asi ।। 

kevalaṃ mārjanāmātraṃ manāg evopayujyate ।
svabhāvavimale nityaṃ subuddhimakure tava ।। 

bhagavadvyāsaputrasya śukasyeva matis tava ।
viśrāntimātram evāntar jñātajñeyāpy apekṣate ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavadvyāsaputrasya śukasya bhagavan katham ।
dhiyāpy ādau na viśrāntaṃ viśrāntaṃ ca dhiyā punaḥ ।। 

viśvāmitraḥ

ātmodantasamaṃ rāma varṇyamānam imaṃ mayā ।
śṛṇu vyāsātmajodantaṃ janmanām antakāraṇam ।। 

yo ayam añjanavarṇābho niviṣṭo hemaviṣṭare ।
pārśve tava pitur vyāso bhagavān bhāskaradyutiḥ ।। 

asyābhūd induvadanas tanayo nayakovidaḥ ।
śuko nāma mahāprājño yajño mūrtyeva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

pravicārayato lokayātrām alam imāṃ hṛdi ।
taveva kila tasyāpi viveka udabhūd bhṛśam ।। 

tenāsau svavivekena svayam eva mahāmate ।
vicārya suciraṃ cāru yat satyaṃ tad avāptavān ।। 

svayaṃ prāpte pare vastuny aviśrāntamanās tataḥ ।
nedaṃ vastv iti viśvāsaṃ nāsāv ātmany upāyayau ।। 

kevalaṃ virarāmāsya ceto vigatacāpalam ।
bhogebhyo bhūribhaṅgebhyo dharādbhya iva cātakaḥ ।। 

ekadā so amalaprajño merāv ekāntasaṃsthitam ।
papraccha pitaraṃ bhaktyā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim ।। 

saṃsārāḍambaram idaṃ katham abhyutthitaṃ mune ।
kathaṃ ca praśamaṃ yāti kiyat kasya kadeti ca ।। 

iti pṛṣṭena muninā vyāsenākhilam ātmaje ।
yathāvad amalaṃ proktaṃ vaktavyaṃ viditātmanā ।। 

ajñāsiṣaṃ pūrvam etad aham ity atha tatpituḥ ।
sa śukaś śuddhayā buddhyā na vākyaṃ bahv amanyata ।। 

vyāso api bhagavān buddhvā putrābhiprāyam īdṛśam ।
pratyuvāca punaḥ putraṃ nāhaṃ jānāmi tattvataḥ ।। 

janako nāma bhūpālo vidyate vasudhātale ।
yathāvad vetty asau vedyaṃ tasmāt sarvam avāpsyasi ।। 

pitrety uktaś śukaḥ prāyāt sumeror vasudhātalam ।
videhanagarīṃ prāpa janakenābhipālitām ।। 

āvedito asau yāṣṭīkair janakāya mahātmane ।
dvāri vyāsasuto rājañ śuko atra sthitavān iti ।। 

jijñāsārthaṃ śukasyāsāv āstām evety avajñayā ।
uktvā babhūva janakas tūṣṇīṃ saptadināny api ।। 

tataḥ praveśayām āsa janakaś śukam aṅganam ।
tatrāhāni sa saptaiva tathaivāvasad unmanāḥ ।। 

atha praveśayām āsa janako antaḥpuraṃ śukam ।
rājā na dṛśyate tāvad iti saptadināni tam ।। 

tatronmadābhiḥ kāntābhir bhojanair bhogasañcayaiḥ ।
janako lālayām āsa śukaṃ śaśisamānanam ।। 

te bhogās tāni duḥkhāni vyāsaputrasya tan manaḥ ।
na jahrur mandapavano baddhapīṭham yathācalam ।। 

kevalaṃ saśamas svaccho maunī muditamānasaḥ ।
atiṣṭhad atra sa śukas sampūrṇa iva candramāḥ ।। 

parijñātasvabhāvaṃ taṃ śukaṃ sa janako nṛpaḥ ।
ānīya muditātmānam avalokya nanāma ha ।। 

niśśeṣitajagatkārya prāptākhilamanoratha ।
kim īpsitaṃ tavety āśu kṛtasvāgatam āha tam ।। 

śukaḥ

saṃsārāḍambaram idaṃ katham abhyutthitaṃ guro ।
kathaṃ praśamam āyāti yathāvat kathayāśu me ।। 

viśvāmitraḥ

janakeneti pṛṣṭena śukasya kathitaṃ tathā ।
tad eva yat purā proktaṃ tasya pitrā mahātmanā ।। 

śukaḥ

svayam eva mayā pūrvam etaj jñātaṃ vivekataḥ ।
etāvad eva pṛṣṭena pitrā me samudāhṛtam ।। 

bhavatāpy eṣa evārthaḥ kathito vāgvidāṃ vara ।
eṣa eva ca vākyārthaś śāstreṣu paridṛśyate ।। 

yathāyaṃ svavikalpotthas svavikalpaparikṣayāt ।
kṣīyate dagdhasaṃsāro nissāra iti niścayaḥ ।। 

tat kim etan mahābāho satyaṃ brūhi mamāmalam ।
tvatto viśrāmam āpnoti ceto mā bhramatāj jagat ।। 

janakaḥ

nātaḥ parataraḥ kaścin niścayo asty aparo mune ।
svayam etat tvayā jñātaṃ gurutaś ca punaś śrutam ।। 

avyucchinnaś cidātmaikaḥ pumān astīha netarat ।
sa saṅkalpavaśād baddho nissaṅkalpaś ca mucyate ।। 

yena tv etat sphuṭaṃ jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ ।
bhogebhyo viratir jātā dṛśyād vā sakalād iha ।। 

tava cālaṃ mahāvīra matir viratim āgatā ।
bhogebhyo dīrgharogebhyaḥ kim anyat paripṛcchasi ।। 

na tathā pūrṇatā jātā sarvajñānamahānidheḥ ।
tiṣṭhatas tapasi sphāre pitus tava yathā tava ।। 

vyāsād adhika evāhaṃ vyāsaśiṣyo api tatsutaḥ ।
bhogecchātānaveneha matto apy abhyadhiko bhavān ।। 

prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ bhavatā pūrṇacetasā ।
na dṛśye patasi brahman muktas tvaṃ bhrāntim utsṛja ।। 

anuśiṣṭas sa ity evaṃ janakena mahātmanā ।
viśaśrāma śukas tūṣṇīṃ svacche paramavastuni ।। 

vītaśokabhayāyāso nirīhaś chinnasaṃśayaḥ ।
jagāma śikharaṃ meros samādhyartham aninditam ।। 

tatra varṣasahasrāṇi nirvikalpasamādhinā ।
daśa sthitvā śaśāmāsāv ātmany asnehadīpavat ।। 

vyapagatakalanākalaṅkaśuddhas svayam amalātmani pāvane pade asau ।
salilakaṇa ivāmbudhau mahātmā vigalitabhedam athaikatāṃ jagāma ।। 

śukanirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

viśvāmitraḥ

tasya vyāsatanūjasya matimātrāpamārjanam ।
yathopayuktaṃ te rāma tāvad evopayujyate ।। 

jñeyam etena vijñātam aśeṣeṇāvanīśvara ।
svadante asmai na yad bhogā rogā iva sumedhase ।। 

jñātajñeyasya manaso nūnam etad dhi lakṣaṇam ।
na svadante samagrāṇi bhogavṛndāni yat punaḥ ।। 

bhogabhāvanayā yāti bandho dārḍhyam avastujaḥ ।
tayaiva śāntayā yāti bandho jagati tānavam ।। 

vāsanātānavaṃ rāma mokṣa ity ucyate budhaiḥ ।
padārthavāsanādārḍhyaṃ bandha ity abhidhīyate ।। 

ātmatattvābhigamanaṃ bhavati prāyaśo nṛṇām ।
punar viṣayavairasyaṃ kadarthād upajāyate ।। 

samyak paśyati yas tajjño jñātajñeyas tu paṇḍitaḥ ।
na svadante balād eva tasmai bhogā mahātmane ।। 

yaśaḥprabhṛtinā yasmai hetunaiva vinā punaḥ ।
bhuvi bhogā na rocante sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

jñeyaṃ yāvan na vijñātaṃ tāvat tāta na jāyate ।
viṣayeṣv aratir jantor marubhūmau latā yathā ।। 

ata eva hi vijñātajñeyaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha ।
yad enaṃ rañjayanty etā na ramyā bhogabhūmayaḥ ।। 

rāmo yad etaj jānāti tad vastv ity eva sanmukhāt ।
ākarṇya cittaviśrāmo rāghavasyopajāyate ।। 

kevalaṃ kevalībhāvaviśrāntiṃ samapekṣate ।
rāmabuddhiś śarallakṣmīr jalaviśramaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

atrāsya cittaviśrāntyai rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ ।
yuktiṃ kathayatu śrīmān vasiṣṭho bhagavān ayam ।। 

raghūṇām eṣa sarveṣāṃ prabhuḥ kulagurus sadā ।
sarvajñas sarvadarśī ca trikālāmaladarśanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭha bhagavan pūrvaṃ kaccit smarasi yat svayaṃ ।
āvayor vairaśāntyarthaṃ śreyase ca mahātmanām ।। 

niṣadhādrer munīnāṃ ca sānau saralasaṅkule ।
upadiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā jñānaṃ padmabhuvā bahu ।। 

yena yuktimatā brahmañ jñāneneyaṃ hi vāsanā ।
saṃsārī nūnam āyāti śamaṃ śyāmeva bhāsvatā ।। 

tad eva yuktimaj jñeyaṃ rāmāyāntenivāsine ।
brahmann upadiśāśu tvaṃ yena viśrāntim eṣyati ।। 

kadarthanā ca naivaiṣā rāmo hi gatakilbiṣaḥ ।
nirmale makure vaktram ayatnenaiva bimbati ।। 

taj jñānaṃ sa ca śāstrārthas tad vaidagdhyam akhaṇḍitam ।
sacchiṣyāya viraktāya sādho yad upadiśyate ।। 

aśiṣyāyāviraktāya yat kiñcid upadiśyate ।
tat prayāty apavitratvaṃ gokṣīraṃ śvadṛtāv iva ।। 

vītarāgabhayakrodhā nirmamā galitainasaḥ ।
vadanti tvādṛśā yat tu tatra viśrāmyatīha dhīḥ ।। 

ity ukte gādhiputreṇa vyāsanāradapūrvakāḥ ।
munayas te tam evārthaṃ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan ।। 

athovāca mahātejā rājñaḥ pārśve vyavasthitaḥ ।
brahmeva brahmaṇaḥ putro vasiṣṭho bhagavān muniḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mune yad ādiśasi me tad avighnaṃ karomy aham ।
kas samarthas samartho api satāṃ laṅghayituṃ vacaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ hi rājaputrāṇāṃ rāmādīnāṃ manastamaḥ ।
jñānenāpanayāmy adya dīpeneva niśātamaḥ ।। 

smarāmy akhaṇḍitaṃ sarvaṃ saṃsārabhramaśāntaye ।
niṣadhādrau purā proktaṃ yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

iti nigaditavān asau mahātmā parikarabandhagṛhītavandyatejāḥ ।
akathayad idam ajñatopaśāntyai paramapadaikavibodhanaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ ।। 

viśvāmitravākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pūrvam uktaṃ bhagavatā yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā ।
sargādau lokaśāntyarthaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham ।। 

rāmaḥ

kathayiṣyasi vistīrṇāṃ bhagavan mokṣasaṃhitāṃ ।
imaṃ tāvat kṣaṇaṃ jātaṃ saṃśayaṃ me nivāraya ।। 

pitā śukasya sarvajño gurur vyāso mahāmuniḥ ।
videhamukto na kathaṃ kathaṃ muktas suto asya saḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paramārkaprakāśāntas trijagattrasareṇavaḥ ।
utpatyotpatya līnā ye na saṅkhyām upayānti te ।। 

vartamāne ca yās santi trailokyagaṇakoṭayaḥ ।
śakyante naiva saṅkhyātuṃ tāś ca kāścana kenacit ।। 

bhaviṣyanti parāmbhodhau jagatsargataraṅgakāḥ ।
ye tāṃś ca parisaṅkhyātuṃ saṅkathaiva na vidyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

yā bhūtā yā bhaviṣyantyo jagatsargaparamparāḥ ।
tāsāṃ vicāraṇaṃ yuktaṃ vartamānāsu kā kathā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tiryakpuruṣadevāder yo yo rāma vinaśyati ।
tasminn eva pradeśe asau tadaivedaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

ātivāhikanāmnāntas svahṛdy eva jagattrayam ।
vyomni cittaśarīreṇa vyomātmānubhavaty ajaḥ ।। 

evaṃ mṛtā mriyante ca mariṣyanti ca koṭayaḥ ।
bhūtānāṃ yā jaganty āsām uditāni pṛthak pṛthak ।। 

durvātabhūkampa iva piśācatrastabālavat ।
muktālīvāmale vyomni nauspandataruyānavat ।। 

svapnasaṃvittipuravat smṛtijātakhavṛkṣavat ।
jagatsaṃsaraṇaṃ svāntar mṛto anubhavati svayam ।। 

tatrātipariṇāmena tad eva ghanatāṃ gatam ।
iha loko ayam ity eva jīvākāśe vijṛmbhate ।। 

punas tatraiva janmehāmaraṇādyanubhūtimān ।
paralokaṃ kalpayati mṛtas tatra tathā punaḥ ।। 

tadantar anye puruṣās teṣām antas tathā pare ।
saṃsārā iti bhāntīme kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।। 

na pṛthvyādimahābhūtagaṇā na ca jagatkramāḥ ।
mṛtānāṃ santi tatrāpi tathāpy eṣāṃ jagadbhramāḥ ।। 

avidyaivam ananteyaṃ nānāprasavaśālinī ।
jaḍānāṃ sarid ādīrghā jagatsargataraṅgiṇī ।। 

paramārthāmbudhau sphāre rāma sargataraṅgakāḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyo vivartante ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ ।। 

sarvatas sadṛśāḥ kecit kulakramamanoguṇaiḥ ।
kecid ardhena sadṛśāḥ kecic cātivilakṣaṇāḥ ।। 

imaṃ vyāsamuniṃ tatra dvātriṃśaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham ।
yathāsambhavayā jñānadṛśā darśasamānayā ।। 

dvādaśānyadhiyas tatra kulākārehitais samāḥ ।
daśa sarvasamākārāś śiṣṭāḥ kulavilakṣaṇāḥ ।। 

adyāpy anye bhaviṣyanti vyāsavālmīkayas tathā ।
bhṛgvaṅgiraḥpulastyāś ca tathaivāthānya eva ca ।। 

nānāsurarṣidevānāṃ gaṇās sambhūya bhūriśaḥ ।
utpadyante vilīyante kadācic ca pṛthak pṛthak ।। 

brahmadvāsaptates tretā āsīd asti bhaviṣyati ।
sa evānyaś ca lokaś ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti vedmy aham ।। 

krameṇāsya muner itthaṃ vyāsasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ ।
saṃlakṣyate avatāro ayaṃ daśamo dīrghadarśinaḥ ।। 

abhūma vyāsavālmīkiyuktā vayam anekaśaḥ ।
abhūma vayam eveme nānākārās samāśayāḥ ।। 

bhāvyam adyāpy aneneha nanu vārāṣṭakaṃ punaḥ ।
bhūyo api bhārataṃ nāma svetihāsaṃ kariṣyati ।। 

kṛtvā vedavibhāgaṃ ca nītvānena kulaṃ prathām ।
brahmatvaṃ ca tato gatvā bhāvyaṃ vaidehamokṣiṇā ।। 

vītaśokabhayaś śānto nirvāṇo gatakalpanaḥ ।
jīvanmukto jitamanā vyāso ayam iti varṇitaḥ ।। 

vittabandhuvayaḥkarmavidyāvijñānaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
samāni santi bhūtāni sarge sarge punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

kvacit sargaśatais tāni bhavanti na bhavanti vā ।
kadācid api māyeyam ittham antavivarjitā ।। 

gacchatīyaṃ viparyāsaṃ bhūribhūtaparamparā ।
bījarāśir ivājasram upyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

tenaiva sanniveśena tathānyena punaḥ punaḥ ।
sargākārāḥ pravartante taraṅgāḥ kālavāridheḥ ।। 

āśvastāntaḥkaraṇaḥ kṣīṇavikalpas svarūpasāramayaḥ ।
paramaśamāmṛtatṛptas tiṣṭhati vidvān nirāvaraṇaḥ ।। 

bhūyo bhūyas sargānubhavanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saumyāmbutve taraṅgatve salilasyāmbutā yathā ।
samaivābdhau tathādehasadehatvavimuktatā ।। 

rāmaḥ

sadehā vāstv adehā vā muktatā viṣayena vaḥ ।
anāsvāditabhojyasya kuto bhojyānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktaṃ muniśreṣṭha kevalaṃ hi padārthavat ।
paśyāmaḥ purato nāsya punar vidmo antarāśayam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sadehādehamuktānāṃ bhedaḥ ko abhedarūpiṇām ।
yad evāmbu taraṅgatve saumyatve api tad eva tat ।। 

na manāg api bhedo asti sadehādehamuktayoḥ ।
saspando astv atha vāspando vāyur eva kilānilaḥ ।। 

sadehā vā videhā vā muktatā na pramāspadam ।
asmākam asyās tu yadā svaikatāsty avibhāginī ।। 

tasmāt prakṛtam evedaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।
mayopadiśyamānaṃ tvaṃ jñānam ajñāndhyanāśanam ।। 

sarvam eveha hi sadā saṃsāre raghunandana ।
samyakprayuktāt sarveṇa pauruṣāt samavāpyate ।। 

iha hīndor ivodeti śītalāhlādanaṃ hṛdi ।
parispandaphalaprāptau pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ ।। 

pauruṣaspandaphalavad dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣato na yat ।
kalpitaṃ mohibhir mandair daivaṃ kiñcin na vidyate ।। 

sādhūpadeśaśāstreṇa yan mano'ṅgaviceṣṭitam ।
tat pauruṣaṃ tat saphalam anyad unmattaceṣṭitam ।। 

yo yam arthaṃ kāmayate tad arthaṃ cehate kramāt ।
avaśyaṃ tam avāpnoti na ced ardhān nivartate ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena trailokyaiśvaryasundarīm ।
kaścit prāṇiviśeṣo hi śakratāṃ samupāgataḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena sahasāmbhoruhāspadām ।
kaścid eva cidullāso brahmatām adhigacchati ।। 

sāreṇa puruṣārthena svenaiva garuḍadhvajām ।
kaścid eva pumān eṣa puruṣottamatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena lalanāvalanākṛtim ।
śarīrī kaścid eveha gataś candrārdhacūḍatām ।। 

prāktanaṃ caihikaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ viddhi pauruṣam ।
prāktano adyatanenāśu puruṣārthena jīyate ।। 

yatnavadbhir dṛḍhābhyāsaiḥ prajñotsāhasamanvitaiḥ ।
meravo api nigīryante kaiva prākpauruṣe kathā ।। 

śāstraniyantritapauruṣaparamā puruṣasya puruṣatā yā syāt ।
abhimataphalabharasiddhyai bhavati hi sānyā tv anarthāya ।। 

kasyāñcit svayam ātmadussthitivaśāt puṃso daśāyāṃ śanair aṅgulyagranipīḍitaikaculukād ācāmabindur bahuḥ ।
kasyāñcij jalarāśiparvatapuradvīpāntarālaṅkṛtā kartavyocitasaṃvibhāgakaraṇe pṛthvī na pṛthvī bhavet ।। 

pauruṣopakramaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pravṛttir evaṃ prathamaṃ yathāśāstraṃ vihāriṇām ।
prabheva varṇabhedānāṃ sādhanī sarvakarmaṇām ।। 

manasā vāñchyate yat tu yathāśāstraṃ na karmaṇā ।
sādhyate mattalīlāsau mohanī nārthasādhanī ।। 

yathā sañcetyate yena tathā tenānubhūyate ।
svakarmaiveti vāstv anyā vyatiriktā na daivadṛk ।। 

ucchāstraṃ śāstritaṃ ceti pauruṣaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtam ।
tatrocchāstram anarthāya paramārthāya śāstritam ।। 

dvau huḍāv iva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau ।
ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jayaty atibalas tayoḥ ।। 

anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt ।
anarthakartur balavat tatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam ।। 

paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan ।
śubhenāśubham udyuktaḥ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet ।। 

prāktanaḥ puruṣārtho asau māṃ niyojayatīti dhīḥ ।
balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā ।। 

tāvat tāvat prayatnena yatitavyaṃ svapauruṣam ।
prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam ।। 

doṣaś śāmyaty asandehaṃ prāktano adyatanair guṇaiḥ ।
dṛṣṭānto atra hyastanasya doṣasyādyaguṇaiḥ kṣayaḥ ।। 

asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā ।
saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhūtyai yatetādhātum ātmani ।। 

na gantavyam anudyogais sāmyaṃ puruṣagardabhaiḥ ।
udyogas tu yathāśāstraṃ lokadvitayasiddhaye ।। 

saṃsārakuharād asmān nirgantavyaṃ svayaṃ balāt ।
pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya hariṇevāripañjarāt ।। 

pratyahaṃ pratyavekṣeta naraś caritam ātmanaḥ ।
santyajet paśubhis tulyaṃ śrayet satpuruṣocitam ।। 

kiñcit kāntānnapānādikalilaṃ komalaṃ gṛhe ।
vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt ।। 

śubhena pauruṣeṇāśu śubham āsādyate phalam ।
aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiñcana ।। 

pratyakṣadṛṣṭam utsṛjya yo anumānamanās tv asau ।
svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām ।। 

daivaṃ samprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham ।
adṛṣṭaśreṣṭhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīr nivartate ।। 

tasmāt puruṣayatnena vivekaṃ pūrṇam āśrayet ।
ātmajñānamayārthāni śāstrāṇi pravicārayet ।। 

citte cintayatām arthaṃ yathāśāstraṃ nijehitaiḥ ।
asaṃsādhayatām eva mūḍhānāṃ dhig durīpsitam ।। 

pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yan nāmābhivāñchyate ।
na yatnenāpi mahatā tailam āsādyate aśmanaḥ ।। 

yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ ।
niyataḥ parimāṇasthaḥ puruṣārthas tathaiva vaḥ ।। 

sa ca śāstrārthasatsaṅgasamācārair nijaṃ phalam ।
dadātīti svabhāvo ayam anyathānarthasiddhaye ।। 

svarūpaṃ pauruṣasyaitad evaṃ vyavaharan naraḥ ।
yāti niṣphalayatnatvaṃ na kadācana kaścana ।। 

dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā apy anye puruṣottamāḥ ।
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām ।। 

ā bālyāc caivam abhyastaiś śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ ।
guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo arthas samprāpyate hi taiḥ ।। 

iti pratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ kṛtam ।
daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ ।। 

ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā ।
ālasyād iyam avanis sasāgarāntā sampūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca ।। 

bālye gate aviratakalpitakelilole paugaṇḍamaṇḍanavayaḥprabhṛti prayatnāt ।
satsaṅgamaiḥ padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ kuryān naras svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

pauruṣasthāpanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat tat projjhya dūrataḥ ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrair jīvam uttārayed balāt ।। 

yathā yathā prayatnas syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā ।
iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ ।। 

duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate ।
hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api ।। 

prāksvakarmetarākāraṃ daivaṃ nāma na vidyate ।
bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iha śakyate ।। 

hyastano duṣṭa ācāra ācāreṇādya cāruṇā ।
yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā ।। 

tajjayāya yatante ye na lābhalavalampaṭāḥ ।
te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnās sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati ।
tatra nāśayitur jñeyaṃ pauruṣaṃ balavattaram ।। 

yad ekavṛntaphalayor apy ekaṃ śūnyakoṭaram ।
tatra prayatnas sphuritas tathā tadrasasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

yat prayānti jagadbhāvās saṃsiddhā api saṅkṣayam ।
kṣayakārakayatnasya tatra jñeyaṃ mahad balam ।। 

bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt ।
tad amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya mahat phalam ।। 

pauruṣeṇānnam ākramya yathā dantair vicūrṇyate ।
alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate ।। 

anubhūtaṃ hi mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ yatnaśālinām ।
yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat ।। 

śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet ।
tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā ।। 

bhūtānāṃ balavadbhūtayatno daivam iti sthitam ।
tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ ।। 

śāstrāmātyebhapaurāṇām avikalpyā svabhāvadhīḥ ।
sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ ।। 

aihikaḥ prāktanaṃ hanti prāktano adyatanaṃ balāt ।
sarvadā puruṣaspandas tatrānudvegavāñ jayī ।। 

dvayor adyatanasyaiva pratyakṣād balitā bhavet ।
daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate ।। 

meghena nīyate yad vā vatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ ।
meghasya puruṣārtho asau jayaty adhikayatnavān ।। 

krameṇopārjite apy arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā ।
na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā ।। 

yan na śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomy aham ।
tad amānitamṛtyor me yuktaṃ pratyaharodanam ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyavaśato visphuranty amī ।
sarva eva jagadbhāvā jayaty adhikayatnavān ।। 

tasmāt pauruṣam āśritya sacchāstrais satsamāgamaiḥ ।
prajñām amalatāṃ nītvā saṃsārāmbunidhiṃ tara ।। 

prāktanaś caihikaś cemau puruṣārthau phaladrumau ।
aihikaḥ puruṣārthaś ca jayaty abhyadhikas tayoḥ ।। 

karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ ।
ajño jantur anīśo asau vāṅmanassukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

yas tūdāracamatkāras sadācāravihāravān ।
sa niryāti jaganmohān mṛgendraḥ pañjarād iva ।। 

kaścin māṃ prerayaty evam ity anarthakukalpane ।
yas sthito dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyo asau dūrato adhamaḥ ।। 

vyavahārasahasrāṇi yāny upāyānti yānti ca ।
yathāśāstraṃ vihartavyaṃ teṣu tyaktvā sukhāsukhe ।। 

yathāśāstram anucchinnāṃ maryādāṃ svām anujjhataḥ ।
upatiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ratnāny ambunidher iva ।। 

svārthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ ।
proktā pauruṣaśabdena sā siddhyai śāstrayantritā ।। 

kriyāyās spandadharmiṇyās svārthasādhakatā svayam ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayābhyūhyate dhiyā ।। 

anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate atyantaṃ te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ ।। 

prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tac ced daivaśabdena kathyate ।
tad yuktam etad etasmin nāmni nāpavadāmahe ।। 

mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivam anyad yais te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।
nityaṃ svapauruṣād eva lokadvayahitaṃ bhavet ।। 

hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā ।
adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava ।। 

karāmalakavad dṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣād eva yat phalam ।
mūḍhaḥ pratyakṣam utsṛjya daivamohe nimajjati ।। 

sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpabalād upakalpitam ।
tad anapekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ ।। 

śāstrais sadācaritajṛṃbhitadeśadharmair yat kalpitaṃ phalam atīva ciraprarūḍham ।
tasmin hṛdi sphurati no aparam eti cittam aṅgāvalī tadanu pauruṣam etad āhuḥ ।। 

buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvam etad ātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā ।
neyā tatas saphalatāṃ paramām athāsau sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena ।। 

daivapauruṣavicāracārubhiś cetasā caritam ātmapauruṣam ।
nityam eva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevanodyamaḥ ।। 

janmaprabandhamayam āmayam eṣa jīvo buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣam eva siddhyai ।
śāntiṃ nayatv avitathena varauṣadhena pṛṣṭena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena ।। 

daivanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāpya vyādhivinirmuktaṃ deham alpādhivedhitam ।
tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād yathā bhūyo na jāyate ।। 

daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yo ativartitum icchati ।
iha cāmutra ca jayet sa sampūrṇābhivāñchitam ।। 

ye samudyogam utsṛjya sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ ।
te dharmam arthakāmau ca nāśayanty ātmavidviṣaḥ ।। 

saṃvitspando manasspanda indriyaspanda eva ca ।
etāni puruṣārthasya rūpāṇy ebhyaḥ phalodayaḥ ।। 

yathā saṃvedanaṃ cetas tathāntasspandam ṛcchati ।
tathaiva kāyaś calati tathaiva phalabhoktṛtā ।। 

ābālyam etat saṃsiddhaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā ।
daivaṃ tu na kvacid dṛṣṭam ato jayati pauruṣam ।। 

puruṣārthena deveśagurur eṣa bṛhaspatiḥ ।
śukro daityendragurutāṃ puruṣārthena cāsthitaḥ ।। 

dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā api sādho narottamāḥ ।
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām ।। 

mahānto vibhavāḍhyā ye nānāścaryasamāśrayāḥ ।
pauruṣeṇaiva doṣeṇa narakātithitāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

bhāvābhāvasahasreṣu daśāsu vividhāsu ca ।
svapauruṣavaśād eva vivṛttā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

śāstrato gurutaś caiva svataś ceti trisiddhatā ।
sarvatra puruṣārthasya na daivasya kadācana ।। 

aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣv evāvatārayet ।
yatnena cittam ity āśu sarvaśāstrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ।। 

yac chreyo yad atucchaṃ ca yad apāyavivarjitam ।
tat tad ācara yatnena putreti guravas sthitāḥ ।। 

yathā yathā prayatno me phalam āśu tathā tathā ।
ity ahaṃ pauruṣād eva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ ।। 

pauruṣād dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣo dhīmatāṃ kramaḥ ।
daivam āśvāsanāmātraṃ duḥkhe pelavabuddhiṣu ।। 

pratyakṣapramukhān nityaṃ pramāṇāt pauruṣaḥ kramaḥ ।
phalato dṛśyate loke deśāntaragamādikaḥ ।। 

bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ ।
vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām ।। 

pauruṣeṇa durantebhyas saṅkaṭebhyas subuddhayaḥ ।
samuttaranty ayatnena na tu mūkatayānayā ।। 

yo yo yathā prayatate sa sa tadvat phalaikabhāk ।
na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacit prāpyate phalam ।। 

śubhena puruṣārthena śubham āsādyate phalam ।
aśubhenāśubhaṃ rāma yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

puruṣārthaphalaprāptir deśakālavaśād iha ।
prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivam iti smṛtā ।। 

na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam ।
uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svaṃ loke karmaṇaḥ phalam ।। 

puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punaḥ ।
na tatra dṛśyate daivaṃ jarāyauvanabālyavān ।। 

deśād deśāntaraprāptir hastasthadravyadhāraṇam ।
vyāpāraś ca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ ।। 

arthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ ।
proktā pauruṣaśabdena sarvam āsādyate anayā ।। 

anarthaprāptikāryaikaprayatnaparatā tu yā ।
soktā pronmattaceṣṭeti na kiñcit prāpyate anayā ।। 

kriyāyās spandadharmiṇyās svārthasādhakatā svayam ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayonnīyate dhiyā ।। 

anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ svakaṃ viduḥ ।
tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ ।। 

sacchāstrādiguṇo matyā sacchāstrādiguṇān matiḥ ।
vardhete te mitho abhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ ।। 

ā bālyād alam abhyastaiś śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ ।
guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo arthas samprāpyate hitaḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa jitā daityās sthāpitā bhuvanakriyāḥ ।
racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ ।। 

jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe asmin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam ।
vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅka eva ।। 

pauruṣapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ ।
tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate ।। 

svakarmaphalasamprāptāv idam ittham itīva yāḥ ।
giras tā daivanāmnaitāḥ prasiddhiṃ samupāgatāḥ ।। 

tathaiva mūḍhamatibhir daivam astīti niścayaḥ ।
ātto duravabodhena rajjāv iva bhujaṅgamaḥ ।। 

hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā ।
adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava ।। 

mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasyāsti durmateḥ ।
daivād dāho astu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake ।। 

daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā ।
snānadānāśanācāraṃ daivam eva kariṣyati ।। 

kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kila ।
sañcāryate tu daivena kiṃ kasyehopadiśyate ।। 

na ca nisspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā ।
spandāś ca phalasamprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam ।। 

na cāmūrtena daivena mūrtasya sahakartṛtā ।
hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam ।। 

manobuddhivad apy etad daivaṃ nehānubhūyate ।
āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā ।। 

buddheś cet pṛthag anyo arthas saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ ।
kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate ।। 

nāmūrtes tena saṅgo asti nabhaseva vapuṣmataḥ ।
mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate ।। 

viniyoktātha bhūtānām asty anyas taj jagattraye ।
śeratāṃ bhūtavṛndāni daivaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati ।। 

daivenetthaṃ niyukto asmi kiṃ karomīdṛśaṃ sthitam ।
samāśvāsanavāg eṣā na daivaṃ paramārthataḥ ।। 

mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।
prājñās tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ ।। 

ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ ।
tais taiḥ kair iva loke asmin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate ।। 

kālavidbhir vinirṇītā yasyāsti cirajīvitā ।
sa cej jīvati sañchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam ।। 

kālavidbhir vinirṇītaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ yasya rāghava ।
anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam ।। 

viśvāmitreṇa muninā daivam utsṛjya dūrataḥ ।
pauruṣeṇaiva samprāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ rāma nānyathā ।। 

amībhir aparai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ ।
pauruṣeṇaiva samprāptā ciraṃ gaganagāmitā ।। 

utsādya devasaṅghātāṃś cakrus tribhuvanodare ।
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena sāmrājyaṃ dānaveśvarāḥ ।। 

ālūnaśīrṇam ābhogi jagad ājahrur ojasā ।
pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena dānavebhyas sureśvarāḥ ।। 

rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā ।
ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam ।। 

haraṇādānasaṃrambhavibhramabhramabhūmiṣu ।
śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadher iva ।। 

sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpavaśād upakalpitam ।
tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam ।। 

daivanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña pratiṣṭhām alam āgatam ।
yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ rāghava netarat ।
phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam ।। 

daivaṃ na kiñcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate ।
na dṛśyate nādriyate kevalaṃ kalpanedṛśī ।। 

siddhasya pauruṣeṇeha phalasya phalaśālinām ।
śubhāśubhā vā sampattir daivaśabdena kathyate ।। 

pauruṣopanatā nityam iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ ।
prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate ।। 

bhāvī tv avaśyam evārthaḥ puruṣārthaikasādhanaḥ ।
yas so asmiṃl lokasaṅghāte daivaśabdena kathyate ।। 

na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiñcid eva hi ।
daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā ।। 

puruṣārthasya siddhasya śubhāśubhaphalodaye ।
idam itthaṃ sthitir iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate ।। 

itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt ।
iti karmaphalāvāptir yoktis tad daivam ucyate ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭaphalāvāptāv evam ityarthavācakam ।
āśvāsanāmātravaco daivam ity eva kathyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña prāg yat karmopasañcitam ।
tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te akhilam ।
daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati ।। 

yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ ।
saiveyaṃ karmabhāvena nṝṇāṃ pariṇatiṃ gatā ।। 

jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
anyakarmānyabhāvaś cety etan naivopapadyate ।। 

grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam ।
yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā ।। 

yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā ।
tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate ।। 

evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā ।
vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ ।। 

yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat ।
mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ ।। 

ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat ।
nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ ।। 

manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ ।
rāma puṃniścayasyaitās sañjñās sadbhir udāhṛtāḥ ।। 

evaṃnāmā hi puruṣo dṛḍhabhāvanayā yathā ।
nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā ।। 

evaṃ puruṣakāreṇa sarvam eva raghūdvaha ।
prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado astu te ।। 

rāmaḥ

prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ niyojayati māṃ yathā ।
mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam ।
svaprayatnopanītena pauruṣeṇaiva nānyathā ।। 

dvividho vāsanāvyūhaś śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te ।
prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro atha vā ।। 

vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase ।
tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam ।। 

atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe ।
prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt ।। 

prājña cetanamātraṃ tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ ।
tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase ।। 

anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko aparaḥ ।
kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī ।। 

śubhāśubhābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ vahantī vāsanāsarit ।
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yojanīyā śubhe pathi ।। 

aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣv evāvatārayet ।
svamanaḥ puruṣārthena balena balināṃ vara ।। 

aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat ।
jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayet sadā ।। 

samatāsāntvanenāśu na drāgiti śanaiś śanaiḥ ।
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena pālayec cittabālakam ।। 

vāsanaughas tvayā pūrvam abhyāsena ghanīkṛtaḥ ।
śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru ।। 

prāgabhyāsavaśād yātā yadā te vāsanodayam ।
tadābhyāsasya sāphalyaṃ viddhi tvam arimardana ।। 

idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha ।
abhyāsavaśatas tasmāc chubhābhyāsam upāhara ।। 

pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā ।
vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava ।। 

sandigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara ।
asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana ।। 

yad yad abhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate ।
ity ākumāraṃ prājñeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ sandehavarjitam ।। 

śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye ।
paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya vijityendriyapañcakam ।। 

avyutpannamanā yāvad bhavān ajñātatatpadaḥ ।
guruśāstrapramāṇais tu nirṇītaṃ tāvad ācara ।। 

tataḥ kaṣāyapākena nūnaṃ vijñātavastunā ।
śubho apy asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā ।। 

yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā ।
adhigamaya padaṃ sadā viśokaṃ tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha ।। 

karmavicāro nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya śreyase nityabāndhavam ।
ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama ।। 

avāntarābhipātīni svārūḍhāni manoratham ।
pauruṣeṇendriyāṇy āśu saṃyamya samatāṃ naya ।। 

ihāmutra ca siddhyarthaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradām ।
mokṣopāyamayīṃ vakṣye saṃhitāṃ sārasammitām ।। 

apunargrahaṇāyāntas tyaktvā saṃsāravāsanām ।
sampūrṇau śamasantoṣāv ādāyodārayā dhiyā ।। 

sapūrvāparavākyārthavicāraviṣayādṛtam ।
manas samarasaṃ kṛtvā sānusandhānam ātmani ।। 

sukhaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ mahānandaikasādhanam ।
mokṣopāyam ito rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ imaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ ।
padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate ।। 

idam uktaṃ purākalpe brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā ।
sarvaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ paramāśvāsanaṃ dhiyaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kenoktaṃ kāraṇenedaṃ brahman pūrvaṃ svayambhuvā ।
kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asty anantavilāsātmā sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ ।
cidākāśo avināśātmā pradīpas sarvavastuṣu ।। 

spandāspandasamākārāt tato viṣṇur ajāyata ।
spandamānarasāpūrāt taraṅgas sāgarād iva ।। 

sumerukarṇikāt tasya digdalād dhṛdayāmbujāt ।
tārakākesaravataḥ parameṣṭhī vyajāyata ।। 

vedavedārthadeveśamunimaṇḍalamālitam ।
so asṛjat sakalaṃ sargaṃ vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ ।। 

jambudvīpasya koṇe asmin varṣe bhāratanāmani ।
sa sasarja janaṃ putrair ādhivyādhipariplutam ।। 

bhāvābhāvaviṣaṇṇārtham utpātadhvaṃsatatparam ।
sarge asmin bhūtajātīnām āpyāyanakaraṃ param ।। 

janasya tasya duḥkhaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt ।
jagāma karuṇām īśaḥ putraduḥkhād yathā pitā ।। 

ka eteṣāṃ hatāśānāṃ duḥkhasyānto hatāyuṣām ।
syād iti kṣaṇam ekāgraś cintayām āsa bhūtapaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya bhagavān sasarja punar īśvaraḥ ।
tapo dharmaṃ ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva ha ।। 

etat sṛṣṭvā punar devaś cintayām āsa bhūtakṛt ।
puṃsāṃ nānena sarvasya duḥkhasyānta iti svayam ।। 

nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punar janaḥ ।
na jāyate na mriyate taj jñānād eva labhyate ।। 

saṃsārottaraṇe jantor upāyo jñānam eva hi ।
tapo dānaṃ tathā tīrtham aṇūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।। 

tat tāvad duḥkhamokṣārthaṃ janasyāsya mahātmanaḥ ।
pratyagraṃ taraṇopāyam āśu prakaṭayāmy aham ।। 

iti sañcintya bhagavān brahmā kamalasaṃsthitaḥ ।
manasā parisaṅkalpya mām utpāditavān imam ।। 

kuto apy utpanna evāśu tato ahaṃ samupasthitaḥ ।
pitus tasya puraś śīghram ūrmer ūrmir ivānagha ।। 

kamaṇḍaludharo nāthas sakamaṇḍalunā mayā ।
sākṣamālas sākṣamālaṃ sa praṇamyābhivāditaḥ ।। 

ehi putreti mām uktvā sa svābjasyottare dale ।
śukle abhra iva śītāṃśuṃ yojayām āsa pāṇinā ।। 

mṛgakṛttiparīdhāno mṛgakṛttinijāmbaram ।
mām uvāca pitā brahmā sa haṃsas sārasaṃ yathā ।। 

muhūrtamātraṃ te putra ceto vānaracañcalam ।
ajñānam abhyāviśatu śaśaś śaśadharaṃ yathā ।। 

iti tenāśu śaptas san vicārasamanantaram ।
ahaṃ vismṛtavān sarvaṃ svarūpam amalaṃ dvijaḥ ।। 

athāhaṃ dīnatāṃ yātas sthitas sambuddhayā dhiyā ।
duḥkhaśokābhisantapto jāto jana ivādhamaḥ ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ saṃsāranāmāyaṃ doṣaḥ katham ivāgataḥ ।
iti cintitavān antas tūṣṇīm eva vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

athābhyadhāt sa māṃ tātaḥ putra kiṃ duḥkhavān asi ।
duḥkhopaghātaṃ māṃ pṛccha sukhī nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi ।। 

tataḥ pṛṣṭas sa bhagavān mayā sakalalokakṛt ।
haimapadmadalasthena saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam ।। 

kathaṃ nāma mahad duḥkham ayaṃ saṃsāra āgataḥ ।
kathaṃ ca kṣīyate jantor iti pṛṣṭena tena me ।। 

taj jñānaṃ subahu proktaṃ yaj jñātvā pāvanaṃ param ।
ahaṃ pitur api prāyaḥ kilādhika iva sthitaḥ ।। 

tato viditavedyaṃ māṃ nijaprakṛtim āsthitam ।
sa uvāca jagatkartā vaktā sakalakāraṇam ।। 

śāpenājñapadaṃ nītvā pṛcchakas tvaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ ।
putrāsya jñānasārasya samastajanasiddhaye ।। 

idānīṃ śāntaśāpas tvaṃ paraṃ bodham upāgataḥ ।
saṃsthito aham ivaikātmā kanakaṃ kanakād iva ।। 

gacchedānīṃ mahīpīṭhe jambudvīpāntarasthitam ।
sādho bhāratavarṣaṃ tvaṃ lokānugrahahetunā ।। 

tatra kriyākāṇḍaparās tvayā putra mahādhiyaḥ ।
upadeśyāḥ kriyākāṇḍakrameṇa kramaśālinaḥ ।। 

viraktacittāś ca tathā mahāprajñā virāgiṇaḥ ।
upadeśyās tvayā sādho jñānenānandadāyinā ।। 

iti tena niyukto ahaṃ pitrā kamalayoninā ।
iha rāghava tiṣṭhāmi yāvad bhūtaparamparā ।। 

kartavyam asti mama neha hi kiñcid eva sthātavyam ity abhimanā bhuvi saṃsthito asmi ।
saṃśāntayā satatasuptadhiyeva vṛttyā kāryaṃ karomi na ca kiñcid ahaṃ karomi ।। 

jñānāvataraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ jñānāvataraṇaṃ bhuvi ।
mayā svam īhitaṃ caiva kamalodbhavakalpitam ।। 

tad idaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śrotum adya tavānagha ।
bhṛśam utkaṇṭhitaṃ ceto mahatas sukṛtodayāt ।। 

rāmaḥ

kathaṃ brahman bhagavato loke jñānāvatāraṇe ।
sargād anantaraṃ buddhiḥ pravṛttā parameṣṭhinaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parame brahmaṇi brahmā svabhāvavaśatas svayam ।
jātas spandamayo nityam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva ।। 

sṛṣṭvaivam ātataṃ sargaṃ sargasya sakalā gatīḥ ।
bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthā dadarśa parameśvaraḥ ।। 

satkriyākramakālasya kṛtādeḥ kṣaya āgate ।
moham ālokya lokānāṃ kāruṇyam agamat prabhuḥ ।। 

tato mām īśvaras sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt ।
visasarja mahīpīṭhe lokasyājñānaśāntaye ।। 

yathāhaṃ prahitas tena tathānye api maharṣayaḥ ।
sanatkumārapramukhā nāradādyāś ca bhūriśaḥ ।। 

kriyākrameṇa puṇyena tathā jñānakrameṇa ca ।
manomahāmayottabdham uddhartuṃ lokam īritāḥ ।। 

maharṣibhis tatas tais tu kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā ।
kramāt kriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyāṃ tanutāṃ gate ।। 

kriyākramavidhānārthaṃ maryādāniyamāya ca ।
pṛthagdeśavibhāgena bhūpālāḥ parikalpitāḥ ।। 

bahūni smṛtiśāstrāṇi yajñaśāstrāṇi cāvanau ।
dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitāny uditāny atha ।। 

kālacakre vahaty asmiṃs tato vigalite krame ।
pratyahaṃ bhojanapare jane śālyarjanonmukhe ।। 

dvandvāni sampravṛttāni viṣayārthaṃ mahībhujām ।
daṇḍyatāṃ samprayātāni bhūtāni bhuvi bhūriśaḥ ।। 

tato yuddhaṃ vinā bhūpā mahīṃ pālayituṃ kramāt ।
asamarthās tad āyātāḥ prajābhis saha dīnatām ।। 

teṣāṃ dainyāpanodārthaṃ samyaksṛṣṭikramāya ca ।
tato asmadādibhiḥ proktā mahatyo jñānadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

adhyātmavidyā teneyaṃ pūrvaṃ rājasu varṇitā ।
tadanu prasṛtā loke rājavidyety udāhṛtā ।। 

rājavidyā rājaguhyam adhyātmagrantham uttamam ।
jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

atha rājasv atīteṣu bahuṣv amalakīrtiṣu ।
asmād daśarathād rāma jāto adya tvam ihāvanau ।। 

tava cātiprasanne asmiñ jātaṃ manasi pāvanam ।
nirnimittam idaṃ cāru vairāgyam arimardana ।। 

sarvasyaiva hi bhavyasya sādhor api vivekinaḥ ।
nimittapūrvaṃ vairāgyaṃ jāyate rāma rājasam ।। 

idaṃ tv apūrvam utpannaṃ camatkārakaraṃ satām ।
tavānimittaṃ vairāgyaṃ sāttvikaṃ svavivekajam ।। 

bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko nāma na virajyate ।
satāṃ tūttamavairāgyaṃ vivekād eva jāyate ।। 

te mahānto mahāprajñā nimittena vinaiva hi ।
vairāgyaṃ jāyate yeṣāṃ ta evāmalamānasāḥ ।। 

svavivekacamatkāraparāmarśaviraktayā ।
rājate hi dhiyā jantur yuveva vanamālayā ।। 

parāmṛśya vivekena saṃsāraracanām imām ।
virāgaṃ ye adhigacchanti ta eva puruṣottamāḥ ।। 

svavivekavaśād eva vicāryedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
indrajālaṃ parityājyaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ balāt ।। 

śmaśānam āpadaṃ dainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na virajyate ।
tad vairāgyaṃ paraṃ śreyas svato yad abhijāyate ।। 

akṛtrimavirāgas tvaṃ mahattām alam āgataḥ ।
yogyo asi jñānasārasya bījasyeva mṛdusthalam ।। 

prasādāt parameśasya nāthasya paramātmanaḥ ।
tvādṛśasya śubhā buddhir vivekam anudhāvati ।। 

kriyākrameṇa mahatā tapasā niyamena ca ।
dānena tīrthayātrābhiś cirakālavivekataḥ ।। 

duṣkṛte kṣayam āpanne paramārthavicāraṇe ।
kākatālīyayogena buddhir jantoḥ pravartate ।। 

kriyāparās tāvad alaṃ cakrāvṛttibhir ādṛtāḥ ।
bhramantīha janā yāvan na paśyanti paraṃ padam ।। 

yathābhūtam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam ।
parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva ।। 

viṣameyam anantehā rāma saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
dehamuktā mahātantur vinā jñānaṃ na naśyati ।। 

jñānayuktiplavenaiva saṃsārābdhiṃ sudustaram ।
mahādhiyas samuttīrṇā netareṇa raghūdvaha ।। 

tām imāṃ jñānayuktiṃ tvaṃ saṃsārāmbhodhitāriṇīm ।
śṛṇuṣvāvahito buddhyā nityāvahitayānayā ।। 

yasmād anantasaṃrambhā jagato duḥkharītayaḥ ।
cirāyāntar dahanty etā vinā yuktim anindita ।। 

śītavātātapādīni dvandvaduḥkhāni rāghava ।
jñānayuktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu ।। 

āpatanti pratipadaṃ yathākālaṃ dahanti ca ।
duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇam agniśikhā iva ।। 

prājñaṃ vijñātavijñānaṃ samyagdarśinam ādhayaḥ ।
na dahanti vanaṃ varṣadabdam agniśikhā iva ।। 

ādhivyādhiparāvarte saṃsāramarumārute ।
kṣubhite api na tattvajño bhajyate kalpavṛkṣavat ।। 

tattvaṃ jñātum ato yatnād dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā ।
prāmāṇikaḥ prabuddhātmā praṣṭavyaḥ praṇayānvitaṃ ।। 

prāmāṇikasya pṛṣṭasya vaktur uttamacetasā ।
yatnena vacanaṃ grāhyam aṃśukeneva kuṅkumam ।। 

atattvajñam anādeyavacanaṃ vāgvidāṃ vara ।
yaḥ pṛcchati naraṃ tasmān nāsti mūḍhataro aparaḥ ।। 

prāmāṇikasya tajjñasya vaktuḥ pṛṣṭasya yatnataḥ ।
nānutiṣṭhati yo vākyaṃ nānyas tasmān narādhamaḥ ।। 

tajjñatātajjñate pūrvaṃ vaktur nirṇīya kāryataḥ ।
yaḥ karoti naraḥ praśnaṃ pṛcchakas sa mahāmatiḥ ।। 

anirṇīya pravaktāraṃ bālaḥ praśnaṃ karoti yaḥ ।
adhamaḥ pṛcchakas sa syān na mahārthasya bhājanam ।। 

pūrvāparasamādhānakṣamabuddhāv anindite ।
pṛṣṭaṃ prājñena vaktavyaṃ nādhame paśudharmiṇi ।। 

prāmāṇikārthayogyatvaṃ pṛcchakasyāvicārya vā ।
yo vakti tam iha prājñāḥ prāhur mūḍhatamaṃ naram ।। 

tvam atīva guṇādhāraḥ pṛcchako raghunandana ।
ahaṃ ca vaktuṃ jānāmi sa ca yogo ayam āvayoḥ ।। 

yad ahaṃ vacmi tad yatnāt tvayā śabdārthakovida ।
etad vastv iti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryam akhaṇḍitaṃ ।। 

mahān asi virakto asi tajjño asi janatāsthitau ।
tvayi vastu lagaty antaḥ kuṅkumāmbu yathāṃśuke ।। 

uktāvadhānaparamā paramārthavivecanī ।
viśaty arthaṃ tava prajñā jalamadhyam ivārkabhā ।। 

yad yad vacmi tavādeyaṃ hṛdi kāryaṃ prayatnataḥ ।
na cet praṣṭavya evāhaṃ na tvayeha nirarthakam ।। 

mano hi capalaṃ rāma saṃsāravanamarkaṭam ।
saṃrodhya hṛdi yatnena śrotavyā paramārthadhīḥ ।। 

avivekinam ajñānam asajjanaratiṃ janam ।
ciraṃ dūrataraṃ kṛtvā pūjanīyā hi sādhavaḥ ।। 

nityaṃ sajjanasamparkād viveka upajāyate ।
vivekapādapasyaite bhogamokṣau phale smṛte ।। 

mokṣadvāre dvārapālāś catvāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।
śamo vicāras santoṣaś caturthas sādhusaṅgamaḥ ।। 

ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvāro dvau trayo atha vā ।
dvāram udghāṭayanty ete mokṣarājagṛhe balāt ।। 

ekaṃ vā sarvayatnena prāṇāṃs tyaktvā samāśrayet ।
etasmin vaśage yānti catvāro api vaśaṃ yataḥ ।। 

saviveko hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapaso dyuteḥ ।
bhājanaṃ bhūṣaṇākāro bhāskaras tejasām iva ।। 

ghanatām upayātaṃ hi prajñāmāndyam acetasām ।
yāti sthāvaratām ambu jāḍyāt pāṣāṇatām iva ।। 

tvaṃ tu rāghava saujanyaguṇaśāstrārthadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
vikāsitāntaḥkaraṇas sthitaḥ padma ivodaye ।। 

imāṃ jñānadṛśaṃ śrotum avaboddhuṃ ca sanmate ।
arhasy uddhṛtakarṇas tu jantur vīṇādhvaniṃ yathā ।। 

vairāgyābhyāsayogena samasaujanyasampadā ।
tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate ।। 

śāstrais sujanasamparkapūrvakais sutapodamaiḥ ।
ādau saṃsāramuktyarthaṃ prajñām evābhivardhayet ।। 

saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣograsekam āspadam āpadām ।
añjanaṃ mohayāminyā maurkhyaṃ yatnena nāśayet ।। 

etad eva ca maurkhyasya paramaṃ viddhi nāśanam ।
yad idaṃ prekṣyate śāstraṃ kiñcitsaṃskṛtayā dhiyā ।। 

durāśāsarpagartena maurkhyeṇa hṛdi valgatā ।
cetas sañkocam āyāti carmāgnāv iva yojitam ।। 

prājñe yathārthabhūteyaṃ vastudṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati ।
dṛg ivendau nirambhodasakalāmalamaṇḍale ।। 

pūrvāparavicārārthacārucāturyaśālinī ।
savikāsā matir yasya sa pumān iti kathyate ।। 

vikasitena sitena manomuṣā varavicāraṇaśītalarociṣā ।
guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvam amalena nabhaś śaśinā yathā ।। 

vaktṛpṛcchakalakṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paripūrṇamanā mānyaḥ praṣṭuṃ jānāsi rāghava ।
vetsi coktaṃ ca tenāhaṃ pravṛtto vaktum ādarāt ।। 

rajastamobhyāṃ rahitāṃ śuddhasattvānupātinīm ।
matim ātmani saṃsthāpya jñānaṃ śrotuṃ sthiro bhava ।। 

vidyate tvayi sarvaiva pṛcchakasya guṇāvalī ।
vaktur guṇālī ca mayi ratnaśrīr jaladhau yathā ।। 

āttavān asi vairāgyaṃ vivekāsaṅgajaṃ mune ।
candrakānta ivārdratvaṃ lagnacandrakarotkaraḥ ।। 

ciram ā śaiśavād eva tavābhyāso asti sadguṇaiḥ ।
śuddhaiś śuddhasya dīrghaiś ca padmasyevātisantataiḥ ।। 

ataś śṛṇu kathāṃ vakṣye tvam evāsyā hi bhājanam ।
na hi candraṃ vinā śuddhā savikāsā kumudvatī ।। 

ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ ।
te ca tāś ca pade dṛṣṭe niśśeṣaṃ yānti vai śamam ।। 

yadi vijñānaviśrāntir na bhaved bhavyacetasaḥ ।
tad asyāṃ saṃsṛtau sādhuś cintāṃ soḍhuṃ saheta kaḥ ।। 

paraprāptyā vilīyante sarvā mananavṛttayaḥ ।
kalpāntārkagaṇāsaṅgāt kulaśailaśilā iva ।। 

dussahā rāma saṃsāraviṣāveśaviṣūcikā ।
yogagāruḍamantreṇa pāvanena praśāmyati ।। 

sa ca yogas sujanena saha śāstrārthavicārāt । paramārthajñānamayo labhyate eva । 

avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhaparikṣayo bhavatīti mantavyam । 

nāto vicāradṛṣṭayo avahelayā draṣṭavyāḥ । vicāravaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacam iva paripakvāṃ parityajya vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinoda iva jagad akhilam ālokyate samyagdarśanavatā । 

asamyagdarśanavato hi paraṃ duḥkham idam । viṣamo hy ayam atitarāṃ saṃsārarogo bhogīva daśati । asir iva cchinatti । śara iva vedhayati । rajjur iva veṣṭayati । rātrir ivāndhayati । aśaṅkitaparipātitaparuṣapāṣāṇa iva vivaśīkaroti । harati prajñām । pātayati mohāndhakūpe । tṛṣṇayā jarjarīkaroti । na tad asti kiñcid duḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yan nāpnoti । 

duranteyaṃ kila viṣayaviṣamaviṣaviṣūcikā । yadi na cikitsyate tad atitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī tat tat karoti । yatra śitāsiśatapāta utpalatāḍanam । agnidāho himāvaseko । aṅgavikartanaṃ candanacakrakaracanā । ghūrṇadvātāntaḥ paripeṣo aṅgaparimālanam । anavaratānalajvālāvicalitacāmaranārācanikaranipāto nidāghavinodanadhārāgṛhaśīkaravarṣaṇam । śiraśchedas sukhanidrā । mūkīkaraṇaṃ pāṭavamudrā mahān upacayaḥ । 

tad evaṃvidhe kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracapalayantre asmin rāghava nāvahelā kartavyā । avaśyam idaṃ hi vicāraṇīyam । 

evaṃ cāvaboddhavyam yathā kilāsti vicārāc chreyo'vāptir iti । 

anyac ca raghukulendo । yadi naite mahānto munayo maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrās tat katham aduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhamayīṃ tamovṛttipūrvakaṃ saṃsārakadarthanām anubhavantas satatam eva muditamanasas tiṣṭhanti । 

iha hi ।

vikautukā vigatavikalpaviplavā yathā sthitā hariharapadmajādayaḥ ।
narottamās samadhigatātmadīpakās tathā sthitā jagati vibuddhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

tathā ca ।

parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane ajñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmany abhimate ।
vicāryāryais sārdhaṃ galitavapuṣor vā sadasator dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam ।। 

anyac ca rāghava ।

prasanne cittattve hṛdi savibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsv akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu puraḥ ।
śamaṃ yāntīṣv antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsv āhitarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam ।। 

anyac ca ।

rathas sphāro dehas turagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vātād aham akalitānantaviṣamaḥ ।
paro vārvāg dehī jagati viharāmīty anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam ।। 

tattvamāhātmyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya puṣṭātmānas subuddhayaḥ ।
vicaranty asamunnaddhā mahānto abhyuditā iva ।। 

na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubhāśubham ।
sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiñcana ।। 

svastham evāvatiṣṭhanti svasthaṃ kurvanti yānti ca ।
heyopādeyatāpakṣarahitās svātmani sthitāḥ ।। 

āyānti ca na cāyānti vanaṃ yānti na yānti ca ।
na kurvanty api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca ।। 

ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ ।
heyādeyadṛśo yās tāḥ kṣīyante adhigate pade ।। 

parityaktasamastehaṃ mano madhuravṛttimat ।
sarvatas sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam ।। 

api nirmananārambham apy astākhilakautukam ।
ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam ।। 

na karotīndrajālāni nānudhāvati vāsanām ।
bālacāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate ।। 

evaṃvidhā hi vṛttaya ātmatattvāvalokanāl labhyante । tasmād vicāreṇātmānveṣṭavyaḥ upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣeṇa netarad iti । 

svānubhūtes suśāstrasya guroś caivaikavākyatā ।
yatrābhyāsena tenātmā santatenāvalokyate ।। 

avahelitaśāstrārthair avajñātamahājanaiḥ ।
kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhais samatām iyāt ।। 

na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale ।
khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām ।। 

kiñcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnāṃ śravyaṃ śāstram idaṃ yathā ।
maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiñcana ।। 

idaṃ śravyaṃ sukhakaraṃ kathādṛṣṭāntasundaram ।
aviruddham aśeṣeṇa śāstravākyārthabandhunā ।। 

āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ ।
tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭakā iva ।। 

varaṃ śarāvahastasya caṇḍālāgāravīthiṣu ।
bhikṣārtham aṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam ।। 

imam ālokam āsādya mokṣopāyamayaṃ janaḥ ।
andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api ।। 

tāvan nayati saṅkocaṃ tṛṣṇāśyāmā narāmbujam ।
yāvad vivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā ।। 

saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣārthaṃ mādṛśais saha bandhubhiḥ ।
svarūpam ātmano jñātvā guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktāś carantīha yathā hariharādayaḥ ।
yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava ।। 

anantānīha duḥkhāni sukhaṃ kṣaṇalavopamam ।
nātas sukheṣu badhnīyād dṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu ।। 

yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye ।
sādhanīyaṃ prayatnena puruṣeṇa vijānatā ।। 

ta eva puruṣārthasya bhājanaṃ puruṣottamāḥ ।
anuttamapadālambi mano yeṣāṃ gatajvaram ।। 

sambhogāśanamātreṣu rājyādiṣu sukheṣu ye ।
santuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tān andhaḍuṇḍubhān ।। 

ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛtārambhaśāliṣu ।
dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu ।। 

te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam ।
narakān narakaṃ mūḍhā mohamantharabuddhayaḥ ।। 

parasparavināśotke śreyasyau na kadācana ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśe rāma taḍitprasarabhaṅgure ।। 

ye viraktā mahātmānas suviviktā bhavādṛśaḥ ।
puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhogamokṣaikabhāginaḥ ।। 

vivekaṃ param āśritya vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ ।
saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorām imām āpadam uttaret ।। 

na svaptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha vijānatā ।
viṣamūrchanasammohadāyinīṣu vivekinā ।। 

saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā ।
jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiś śete tārṇasya so antare ।। 

yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate ।
tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet ।
asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt ।। 

pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyeha mokṣopāyavicāraṇe ।
yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate ।। 

anapāyi nirāśaṅkaṃ svāsthyaṃ vigatavibhramam ।
na vinā kevalībhāvaṃ vidyate bhuvanatraye ।। 

tatprāptāv uttamaprāptau na kleśa upayujyate ।
na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bandhavaḥ ।। 

na hastapādacalanaṃ na deśāntarasaṅgamaḥ ।
kleśātiśayasādhyo vā na tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ ।। 

puruṣārthaikasādhyena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā ।
kevalaṃ tan manomātrajayenāsādyate padam ।। 

vivekamātrasādhyaṃ tadvicāraikāntaniścayam ।
tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇa tad avāpyate ।। 

sukhasevyāsanasthena tad vicārayatā svayam ।
na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo abhijāyate ।। 

tat samastasukhāsārasīmāntaṃ sādhavo viduḥ ।
tad anuttamaniṣṣyandaṃ param āhū rasāyanam ।। 

kṣayitvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ svargamānuṣyayor dvayoḥ ।
sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ ।। 

ato manojayaś cintyaś śamas santoṣasādhanaḥ ।
anantaśamasambhogas tasmād ānanda āpyate ।। 

jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā ।
rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā ।। 

manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tat prāpya paramaṃ sukham ।
vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam ।। 

vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam acinvatā ।
bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate ।। 

manaḥ praśāntam atyacchaṃ viśrāntaṃ gatavibhramam ।
anīhaṃ vigatābhīṣṭaṃ nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।। 

mokṣadvāre dvārapālān imāñ śṛṇu yathākramam ।
yeṣām ekatamāsaktyā mokṣadvāre praviśyate ।। 

duḥkhadoṣadaśā dīrghā saṃsāramarumaṇḍalī ।
jantoś śītalatām eti śītalena śamāmbunā ।। 

śamenāsādyate śreyaś śamo hi paramaṃ padam ।
śamaś śivaṃ śamaś śāntiś śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam ।। 

puṃsaḥ praśamatṛptasya śītalācchatarātmanaḥ ।
śamatoṣitacittasya śatrur apy eti mitratām ।। 

śamacandramasā yeṣām āśayas samalaṅkṛtaḥ ।
kṣīrābdhīnām ivodeti teṣāṃ paramaśuddhatā ।। 

hṛtkuśeśayakośeṣu yeṣāṃ śamakuśeśayam ।
satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmās samā hareḥ ।। 

śamaśrīś śobhate yeṣāṃ mukhendāv akalaṅkite ।
te amī kulendavo vandyās saundaryavijitendavaḥ ।। 

trailokyodaravartinyo nānandāya tathā śriyaḥ ।
sāmrājyasampatpratimā yathā śamavibhūtayaḥ ।। 

yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā dussahā ye durādhayaḥ ।
tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo arkeṣv iva naśyati ।। 

mano hi sarvabhūtānāṃ prasādam anugacchati ।
na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam ।। 

śamaśālini sauhārdavati sarveṣu jantuṣu ।
sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati ।। 

mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca ।
viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini ।। 

na rasāyanapānena na lakṣmyāliṅganena ca ।
tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ ।। 

sarvādhivyādhivalitaṃ krāntaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā ।
manaś śamāmṛtāsekais samāśvāsaya rāghava ।। 

yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā ।
tat te atisvadate svādu netarat tāta mānase ।। 

śamāmṛtarasasnātaṃ mano yām eti nirvṛtim ।
chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava ।। 

na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ ।
na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgādyā dviṣanti śamaśālinam ।। 

susannaddhasamastāṅgaṃ praśamāmṛtavarmaṇā ।
vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilām iva ।। 

na tathā rājate rājāmātyāntaḥpurasaṃsthitaḥ ।
samayā svasthayā vṛttyā yathopaśamaśobhitaḥ ।। 

prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ ।
yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam ।। 

samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yas sādhu vartate ।
abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ ।। 

anuddhatamanāś śāntas sādhu karma karoti yat ।
tat sarvam abhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham ।
na hṛṣyati glāyati yas sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

yas samas sarvabhāveṣu nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।
jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

tuṣārakarabimbācchaṃ mano yasya nirākulam ।
maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

sthito api na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati ।
yas suṣuptamanās svasthas sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

amṛtasyandasubhagā yasya sarvajanaṃ prati ।
dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

spaṣṭāvadātayā buddhyā yathaivāntas tathā bahiḥ ।
dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api ।
tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

antaśśītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati ।
vyavahārī na sammūḍhas sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

ākāśasadṛśī yasya nityaṃ svavyavahāriṇaḥ ।
kalaṅkam eti na matis sa śānta iti kathyate ।। 

tapasviṣu bahujñeṣu yājakeṣu nṛpeṣu ca ।
balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavān eva rājate ।। 

śamasaṃsaktamanasāṃ mahatāṃ guṇaśālinām ।
udeti nirvṛtiś cittāj jyotsneva himarociṣaḥ ।। 

sīmānto guṇapūgānāṃ pauruṣaikāntabhūṣaṇam ।
saṅkaṭeṣv abhayasthānaṃ śamaś śrīmān virājate ।। 

śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ ।
