raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva ।। 

śamanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śāstrāvabodhāmalayā dhiyā paramapūtayā ।
kartavyaḥ kāraṇajñena vicāro niyatātmanā ।। 

vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam ।
dīrghasaṃsārarogasya vicāro hi mahauṣadham ।। 

āpadvanam anantehāparipallavitākṛti ।
vicārakrakacacchinnaṃ naiva bhūyaḥ prarohati ।। 

moheṣu bandhunāśeṣu saṅkaṭeṣu bhrameṣu ca ।
sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ ।। 

na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo asti vipacchame ।
vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīs satām ।। 

balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam ।
phalanty etāni sarvāṇi vicāreṇaiva dhīmataḥ ।। 

yuktāyuktamahādīpam abhivāñchitasādhakam ।
sphāraṃ vicāram āśritya saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret ।। 

ālūnahṛdayāmbhojaṃ mahāmohamataṅgajam ।
vidārayati śuddhātmā vicārodārakesarī ।। 

mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yad gatāḥ paramaṃ padam ।
tad vicārapradīpasya vijṛmbhitam anuttamam ।। 

rājyāni sampadas sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ ।
vicārakalpavṛkṣasya phalāny etāni rāghava ।। 

yā vivekavilāsinyo matayo mahatām iha ।
na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi ।। 

vicārodayahāriṇyā dhiyā vyavaharanti ye ।
phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te ।। 

mūrkhahṛtkānanasthānām āśāprasararodhinām ।
avicārakarañjānāṃ mañjaryo duḥkharītayaḥ ।। 

kajjalakṣodamalinā madirāmodadharmiṇī ।
avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam ।। 

mahāpady api dīrgheṣu sadvicāraparo naraḥ ।
na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva ।। 

mānase sarasi svacche vicārakamalotkaraḥ ।
nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ ।। 

vicāravikalā yasya matir māndyam upeyuṣaḥ ।
tasyodety aśaniś candrān mudhā yakṣaś śiśor iva ।। 

duḥkhaṣaṇḍakavalmīkaṃ vipannavalatāmadhuḥ ।
rāma dūre parityājyo nirviveko narādhamaḥ ।। 

ye kecana durārambhā durācārā durādhayaḥ ।
avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā ।। 

avicāriṇam ekāntajaraddrumasadharmiṇam ।
akṣamaṃ sādhukāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha ।। 

viviktaṃ hi mano jantor āśāvaivaśyavarjitam ।
parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani ।। 

vivekitoditā dehaṃ sarvaṃ śītalayaty alam ।
alaṅkaroti cātyantaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanam navā ।। 

paramārthapatākāyā dhiyo dhavalacāmaram ।
vicāro rājate janto rajanyām iva candramāḥ ।। 

vicāracāravo bhāvā bhāsayanto diśo daśa ।
bhānti bhāskaravad bhagnabhūyobhavabhayāmayāḥ ।। 

bālasya svamanomohakalpitaḥ prāṇahārakaḥ ।
rātrau tamasi vetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate ।। 

sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāraṇacāravaḥ ।
avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ ।। 

puṃso nijamanomohakalpito analpaduḥkhadaḥ ।
saṃsāraciravetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate ।। 

samasvacchaṃ nirābādham anantam anapāśrayam ।
viddhīmaṃ kevalībhāvaṃ vicārogrataroḥ phalam ।। 

acalasthitinodāraprakaṭābhogatejasā ।
tena niṣkāmatodeti śītatevoditendunā ।। 

cintājvaramahauṣadhyā sādhucittaniṣaṇṇayā ।
tayottamatvapradayā nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।। 

tat sadālambanaṃ cetas sphāram ābhāsam āgatam ।
nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram ।। 

na jahāti na cādatte na tāmyati na śāmyati ।
kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye avatiṣṭhati ।
na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmaṇi majjati ।। 

upekṣate gataṃ vastu samprāptam anuvartate ।
na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpeṇa manasā mahātmāno mahāśayāḥ ।
jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ ।। 

uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam ।
tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām ।। 

ko ahaṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā ।
cintanīyaṃ prayatnena sapratīkāram ātmanā ।। 

kāryasaṅkaṭasandehaṃ rājā jānāti rāghava ।
niṣphalaṃ saphalaṃ vāpi vicāreṇaiva nānyathā ।। 

vedavedāntasiddhāntasthitayas sthitikāraṇam ।
nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpeneva bhuvo niśi ।। 

anaṣṭam andhakāreṣu bahutejassv ajihmitam ।
paśyaty api vyavahitaṃ vicārac cārulocanam ।। 

vivekāndho hi jātyandhaś śocyaś sarvasya durmatiḥ ।
divyacakṣur vivekātmā jayaty akhilavastuṣu ।। 

paramātmamayī pālyā mahānandaikasādhanī ।
kṣaṇam ekaṃ parityājyā na vicāracamatkṛtiḥ ।। 

vicāracāruḥ puruṣo mahatām api rocate ।
paripakvaṃ camatkāri sahakāraphalaṃ yathā ।। 

vicārakāntamatayo nānekeṣu punaḥ punaḥ ।
patanti duḥkhagarteṣu jñātordhvagatayo narāḥ ।। 

na virauti tathā rogī nānarthaśatajarjaraḥ ।
avicāravinaṣṭātmā yathājñaḥ pariroditi ।। 

varaṃ kardamakīṭatvaṃ śvabhrakaṇṭakatā varam ।
varam andhaguhāhitvaṃ na narasyāvicāritā ।। 

sarvānarthanijāvāsaṃ sarvasādhutiraskṛtam ।
sarvadaussthityasīmāntam avicāraṃ parityajet ।। 

nityaṃ vicārayuktena bhavitavyaṃ mahātmanā ।
bhavāndhakūpe patatāṃ vicāro hy avalambanam ।। 

svayam evātmanātmānam avaṣṭabhya vicārataḥ ।
saṃsāramohajaladhes tārayet svamanomṛgam ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham ayaṃ doṣas saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ ।
nyāyeneti parāmarśo vicāra iti kathyate ।। 

andhāndhamohamukharaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāya kevalam ।
kṛtaṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ durmateś cāvicāriṇaḥ ।। 

bhāvābhāvagrahotsargadṛśām iha hi rāghava ।
na vicārād ṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiñcana ।। 

vicārāj jñāyate tattvaṃ tattvād viśrāntir ātmani ।
tato manasi śānte tu sarvaduḥkhaparikṣayaḥ ।। 

saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchata uttamāt ।
sphuṭavicāradṛśaiva vicāritā śamavate bhavate api virocatām ।। 

vicāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

santoṣo hi paraṃ śreyas santoṣas sukham ucyate ।
santuṣṭaḥ param abhyeti viśrāmam arisūdana ।। 

santoṣaiśvaryasukhināṃ ciraviśrāntacetasām ।
sāmrājyam api sādhūnāṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate ।। 

santoṣaśālinī buddhī rāma saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।
viṣamāsv apy anudvignā na kadācana dūyate ।। 

santoṣāmṛtapānena ye parāṃ tṛptim āgatāḥ ।
bhogaśrīr atulā teṣām eṣā prativiṣāyate ।। 

na tathā tarpayanty etāḥ pīyūṣarasavīcayaḥ ।
yathā hi madhurāsvādas santoṣo doṣanāśanaḥ ।। 

aprāptavāñchām utsṛjya samprāpte samatāṃ gataḥ ।
adṛṣṭakhedākhedo antas sa santuṣṭa ihocyate ।। 

ātmanātmani santoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam ।
udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt ।। 

santoṣaśītalaṃ cetaś śuddhavijñānadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
bhṛśaṃ vikāsam āyāti sūryāṃśubhir ivāmbujam ।। 

āśāvaivaśyavivaśe citte santoṣavarjite ।
mlāne vaktram ivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati ।। 

ajñānaghanayāminyā saṅkocaṃ na narāmbujam ।
yāty asāv udito yasya nityaṃ santoṣabhāskaraḥ ।। 

akiñcano apy asau jantus sāmrājyasukham aśnute ।
ādhivyādhivinirmuktaṃ santuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam ।। 

nābhivāñchaty asamprāptaṃ prāptaṃ bhuṅkte yathākramam ।
yas sa somyas sadācāras santuṣṭa iti kathyate ।। 

santoṣaparitṛptasya mahataḥ pūrṇacetasaḥ ।
kṣīrābdher iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīr virājate ।। 

pūrṇatām alam āśritya svātmany evātmanā svayam ।
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tṛṣṇāṃ sarvatra varjayet ।। 

santoṣāmṛtapūrṇasya svāntaś śītalatā svayam ।
sthairyam āyāty ariktasya śītāṃśor iva śāśvatam ।। 

santoṣapuṣṭamanasaṃ bhṛtyā iva maharddhayaḥ ।
rājānam upatiṣṭhante kiṅkaratvam upāgatāḥ ।। 

ātmanaivātmani svacche santuṣṭe puruṣe sthite ।
praśāmyanty ādhayas sarve prāvṛṣīvāśu pāṃsavaḥ ।। 

nityaṃ śītalayā nāma kalaṅkaparihīnayā ।
puruṣaś śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇatayenduvat ।। 

samatāsundaraṃ vaktraṃ puruṣasyāvalokayan ।
toṣam eti yathā loko na tathā dhanasaṅgamaiḥ ।। 

samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ puruṣarāḍ iha yas samalaṅkṛtaḥ ।
tam amalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā api mahāmunayo raghunandana ।। 

santoṣanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

viśeṣeṇa mahābuddhe saṃsārottaraṇe nṛṇām ।
sarvatropakarotīha sādhus sādhusamāgamaḥ ।। 

sādhusaṅgataror jātaṃ vivekakusumaṃ śubham ।
rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ ।। 

śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti mṛtir apy utsavāyate ।
āpat sampad ivābhāti vidvajjanasamāgame ।। 

himam āpatsarojinyā mohanīhāramārutaḥ ।
jayaty eko jagaty asmin sādhus sādhusamāgamaḥ ।। 

paraṃ vivardhanaṃ buddher ajñānataruśātanam ।
samutsaraṇam ādhīnāṃ viddhi sādhusamāgamam ।। 

vivekaḥ paramo dīpo jāyate sādhusaṅgamāt ।
manoharojjvalo nūnam aśokād iva gucchakam ।। 

nirapāyāṃ nirābādhāṃ nirvṛtiṃ nityapīvarīm ।
anuttamāṃ prayacchanti sādhusaṅgavibhūtayaḥ ।। 

api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptair daśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ ।
manāg api na santyājyā mānavais sādhusaṅgatiḥ ।। 

sādhusaṅgatayo loke sanmārgaśubhadīpikāḥ ।
hārdāndhakārahāriṇyo bhāso jñānavivasvataḥ ।। 

yas snātaś śītasitayā sādhusaṅgatigaṅgayā ।
kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ ।। 

nīrāgāś chinnasandehā galitagranthayo anagha ।
sādhavo yadi vidyante kiṃ tapastīrthasaṅgrahaiḥ ।। 

viśrāntamanaso vandyāḥ prayatnena pareṇa hi ।
daridreṇeva maṇayaḥ prekṣaṇīyā hi sādhavaḥ ।। 

satsamāgamasaundaryaśālinī dhīmatāṃ matiḥ ।
kamalevāpsarovṛnde sarvadaiva virājate ।। 

tenāmalavilāsasya padasyāgrāvacūlatā ।
prathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhusaṅgatiḥ ।। 

vicchinnagranthayas tajjñās sādhavas sarvasammatāḥ ।
sarvopāyena saṃsevyās te hy upāyā bhavāmbudhau ।। 

ta ete narakāgnīnāṃ saṃśuṣkendhanatāṃ gatāḥ ।
yair dṛṣṭā helayā santo narakānalavāridāḥ ।। 

dāridryaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham ityādiviṣamo bhramaḥ ।
sampraśāmyaty aśeṣeṇa sādhusaṅgamabheṣajaiḥ ।। 

santoṣas sādhusaṅgaś ca vicāro atha śamas tathā ।
eta eva bhavāmbhodhāv upāyās taraṇe nṛṇām ।। 

santoṣaḥ paramo lābhas satsaṅgaḥ paramā gatiḥ ।
vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukhaṃ ।। 

catvāra ete vimalā upāyā bhavabhedane ।
yair abhyastās ta uttīrṇā mohavārer bhavārṇavāt ।। 

ekasminn eva caiteṣām abhyaste vimalodaye ।
catvāro api kilābhyastā bhavanti sudhiyāṃ vara ।। 

eko apy eko api sarveṣāṃ eṣāṃ prasavabhūr iva ।
sarvasaṃsiddhaye tasmād yatnenaikaṃ samāśrayet ।। 

satsamāgamasantoṣavicārās tv avicāritam ।
pravartante śame svacche vahanānīva sāgare ।। 

vicārasantoṣaśamās satsamāgamaśālini ।
pravartante śriyo jantau kalpavṛkṣāśrite yathā ।। 

vicāraśamasatsaṅgās santoṣavati mānave ।
pravartante prapūrṇendau saundaryādyā guṇā iva ।। 

satsaṅgasantoṣaśamā vicāravati sanmatau ।
pravartante mantrivare rājanīva jayaśriyaḥ ।। 

tasmād ekatamaṃ nityam eteṣāṃ raghunandana ।
pauruṣeṇa mano jitvā yatnenābhyāhared guṇam ।। 

paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya jitvā cittamataṅgajam ।
yāvad eko guṇo nāptas tāvan nāsty uttamā gatiḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena dantair dantān vicūrṇayat ।
yāvan nābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane ।। 

devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapo atha vā ।
tāvat tava mahābāho nopāyo astīha kaścana ।। 

ekasminn eva phalite guṇe balam upāgate ।
kṣīyante sarva evāśu doṣā viṣadacetasaḥ ।। 

guṇe vivṛddhe vardhante guṇā doṣakṣayāvahāḥ ।
doṣe vivṛddhe vardhante doṣā guṇavināśinaḥ ।। 

manomahāvane hy asmin veginī vāsanāsarit ।
śubhāśubhabṛhatkūlā nityaṃ vahati jantuṣu ।। 

sā hi svena prayatnena yasminn eva nipātyate ।
kūle tenaiva vahati yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

puruṣayatnajavena manovane śubhataṭānugatāṃ kramaśaḥ kuru ।
varamate nijabhāvamahānadīm iha hi tena manāg api nohyase ।। 

sadācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam āttaviveko yas sa bhavān iva rāghava ।
yogyo jñānagiraś śrotuṃ rājeva nayabhāratīḥ ।। 

avadāto avadātasya vijñānasya mahāśayaḥ ।
jaḍasaṅgojjhito yogyaś śaradīndor yathā nabhaḥ ।। 

tvam etayākhaṇḍitayā guṇalakṣmyā samāśritaḥ ।
manomohaharaṃ vākyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

puṇyakalpadrumo yasya phalabhārānatas sthitaḥ ।
muktaye jāyate jantos tasyedaṃ śrotum udyamaḥ ।। 

pāvanānām udārāṇāṃ parabodhaikadāyinām ।
vacasāṃ bhājanaṃ bhūtyai bhavyo bhavati nādhamaḥ ।। 

mokṣopāyābhidhāneyaṃ saṃhitā sārasammitā ।
triṃśad dve ca sahasrāṇi jñātā nirvāṇadāyinī ।। 

dīpe yathā vinidrasya jvalite sampravartate ।
āloko anicchato apy evaṃ nirvāṇam anayā bhavet ।। 

svayaṃ jñātā śrutā vāpi bhrāntiśāntyaiva saukhyadā ।
āptoktivarṇitā sadyo yathāmṛtataraṅgiṇī ।। 

yathā rajjvām ahibhrāntir vinaśyaty avalokanāt ।
tathaitatprekṣaṇāc chāntim eti saṃsāraduḥkhitā ।। 

yuktiyuktārthavākyāni kalpitāni pṛthak pṛthak ।
dṛṣṭāntasārasūktāni cāsyāṃ prakaraṇāni ṣaṭ ।। 

vairāgyākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prathamaṃ parikīrtitam ।
vairāgyaṃ vardhate yena sekeneva marau taruḥ ।। 

sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ granthasya yasmin hṛdi vicārite ।
prakāśā śuddhatodeti maṇāv iva vimārjite ।। 

mumukṣuvyavahārākhyaṃ tataḥ prakaraṇaṃ kṛtam ।
sahasramātraṃ granthasya sūktigranthena sundaram ।। 

svabhāvo hi mumukṣūṇāṃ narāṇāṃ yatra varṇyate ।
evaṃsvabhāvo mokṣasya yogya ity avagamyate ।। 

athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntākhyāyikāmayam ।
pañcagranthasahasrāṇi vijñānapratipādanam ।। 

jāgatī draṣṭṛdṛśyaśrīr ahaṃ tvam itirūpiṇī ।
anutthitaivotthiteva yatreti parivarṇyate ।। 

yasmiñ śrute jagad idaṃ śrotrāntar budhyate akhilam ।
sāsmadyuṣmat savistāraṃ salokākāśaparvatam ।। 

piṇḍagrahavinirmuktaṃ nirbhittikam aparvatam ।
pṛthvyādibhūtarahitaṃ saṅkalpa iva pattanam ।। 

svapnopalabdhabhāvābhaṃ manorājyavad ātatam ।
gandharvanagaraprakhyam arthaśūnyopalambhanam ।। 

dvicandravibhramābhāsaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat tatam ।
nauyānalolaśailābhaṃ satyalābhavivarjitam ।। 

cittabhramapiśācābhaṃ nirbījam api bhāsvaram ।
kathārthapratibhānābhaṃ vyomamuktāvalīnibham ।। 

kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni taraṅgatvaṃ yathāmbhasi ।
yathā nabhasi nīlatvam asad evotthitaṃ tathā ।। 

abhitti raṅgarahitam upalabdhimanoharam ।
svapne vā vyomni vā citram akarma cirabhāsuram ।। 

avahnir eva vahnitvaṃ dhatte citrānalo yathā ।
tathā dadhaj jagacchabdarūpārtham asadātmakam ।। 

taraṅgotpalamālāḍhyadṛṣatpattram ivotthitam ।
cakraśūtkāracūrṇasya malarāśim ivoditam ।। 

śīrṇapattraṃ bhraṣṭanaṣṭaṃ grīṣme vanam ivārasam ।
maraṇavyagranṛttābhaṃ śilāstrīhāsyahāsadam ।। 

andhakāragṛhaikaikanṛttam unmattaceṣṭitam ।
praśāntājñānanīhāraṃ vijñānaśaradambaram ।। 

samutkīrṇam iva stambhe citrabhittāv ivehitam ।
paṅkād ivābhiracitaṃ sacetanam acetanam ।। 

tatas sthitiprakaraṇaṃ caturthaṃ parikalpitam ।
trīṇi granthasahasrāṇi svākhyānākhyāyikāmayam ।। 

itthaṃ jagad ahambhāvarūpaṃ sthitim upāgatam ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaprauḍham ity atra parivarṇitam ।। 

daśadiṅmaṇḍalābhogabhāsuro ayaṃ jagadbhramaḥ ।
ittham abhyāgato vṛddhim iti tatrocyate ciram ।। 

upaśāntiprakaraṇaṃ tataḥ pañcasahasrikam ।
pañcamaṃ pāvanaṃ proktaṃ munisantatisundaram ।। 

idaṃ jagad ahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntir utthitā ।
ity asau śāmyatīty asmin kathyate ślokasaṅgrahe ।। 

upaśāntiprakaraṇe śrute śāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ ।
praspaṣṭā vibhrameṇaiva kiñcillabhyopalambhanā ।। 

śatāṃśaśiṣṭā bhavati saṃśāntabhrāntirūpiṇī ।
anyasaṅkalpacittasthā nagaraśrīr ivāsatī ।। 

alabhyaiva svapārśvasthasvapnayuddhavirāvavat ।
śāntasaṅkalpamattābhrabhīṣaṇāśaniśabdavat ।। 

vismṛtasvapnasaṅkalpanirmāṇanagaropamā ।
bhaviṣyannagarodyānasotsavaśyāmalāṅgikā ।। 

naśyajjihvocyamānograkathārthānubhavopamā ।
anullikhitacittasthacitravyāpteva bhittibhūḥ ।। 

parivismaryamāṇācchakalpanānagarīnibhā ।
sarvartumadanutpannavaramardāsphuṭākṛtiḥ ।। 

bhāvipuṣpavarākāravasantarasarañjanā ।
antarlīnataraṅgaughasaumyavārisaritsamā ।। 

nirvāṇākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tataṣ ṣaṣṭham udāhṛtam ।
śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñeyaṃ mahārthadam ।। 

buddhe tasmin bhavec chrotā nirvāṇaś śāntakalpanaḥ ।
acetyacitprakāśātmā vijñānātmā nirāmayaḥ ।। 

paramākāśakośācchaś śāntasarvabhavabhramaḥ ।
nirvāhitajagadyātraḥ kṛtakartavyasusthitaḥ ।। 

samastavitatārambhavajrastambho nabhonibhaḥ ।
vinigīrṇayathāsaṃsthajagajjālātitṛptimān ।। 

ākāśībhūtaniśśeṣarūpālokamanaskṛtiḥ ।
kāryakāraṇakartṛtvaheyādeyadaśojjhitaḥ ।। 

sadeha eva nirdehas sasaṃsāro apy asaṃsṛtiḥ ।
cinmayo ghanapāṣāṇajaṭharājaṭharopamaḥ ।। 

cidādityas tapaṃl loke apy andhakārodaropamaḥ ।
paraprakāśarūpo api param āndhyam ivāgataḥ ।। 

ruddhasaṃsṛtidurlīlaḥ prakṣīṇāśāviṣūcikaḥ ।
naṣṭāhaṅkāravetālo dehavān akalevaraḥ ।। 

kasmiṃścid romakoṭyagre tasyeyam avatiṣṭhate ।
jagallakṣmīr mahāmeroḥ puṣpe kvacid ivālinī ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇau cidākāśasya koṭare ।
jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi dhatte kṛtvā ca paśyati ।। 

pravitatā hṛdayasya mahāmate hariharābjajalakṣaśatair api ।
tulanam eti na muktimato bata pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ ।। 

prakaraṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asyāṃ vā citimātrāyāṃ paro bodhaḥ pravartate ।
bījād iva yato vyuptād avaśyambhāvi satphalam ।। 

api pauruṣam ādeyaṃ śāstraṃ ced yuktibodhakam ।
anyatrārṣam api tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyaikasevinā ।। 

yuktiyuktam upādeyaṃ vacanaṃ bālakād api ।
anyat tṛṇam iva tyājyam apy uktaṃ padmajanmanā ।। 

yo ambhas tātasya kūpo ayam iti kaupaṃ pibet kaṭu ।
tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ purassthaṃ taṃ ko anuśāsati rāgiṇam ।। 

yathoṣasi pravṛttāyām āloko avaśyam eṣyati ।
asyāṃ vā citimātrāyāṃ svavivekas tathaiṣyati ।। 

śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanād buddhāyāṃ svayam eva vā ।
śanaiś śanair vicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate ।। 

pūrvaṃ tāvad udety antar bhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā ।
śuddhā muktālatevoccair yā sabhāsthānabhūṣaṇam ।। 

parā virāgatodeti mahattvaguṇaśālinī ।
sā yayā sneham āyānti rājāno ajagarā api ।। 

pūrvāparajñas sarvatra naro bhavati buddhimān ।
padārthānāṃ yathā dīpahasto niśi sulocanaḥ ।। 

lobhamohādayo doṣās tānavaṃ yānty alaṃ śanaiḥ ।
dhiyo diśas samāsannaśarado mihikā yathā ।। 

kevalaṃ samapekṣante vivekābhyasanaṃ dhiyaḥ ।
na kācana phalaṃ dhatte svabhyāsena vinā kriyā ।। 

manaḥ prasādam āyāti śaradīva mahat saraḥ ।
paraṃ sāmyam upādatte nirmandara ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

nirantaḥkālimā vajraśikhevāstatamaḥpaṭā ।
parijvalaty alaṃ prajñā padārthapravibhāginī ।। 

dainyadāridryaduḥkhādyā dṛṣṭayo darśitāntarāḥ ।
na nikṛntanti marmāṇi sasannāham iveṣavaḥ ।। 

hṛdayaṃ nāvalumpanti bhīmās saṃsṛtibhītayaḥ ।
purassthitam api prājñaṃ mahopalam ivākhavaḥ ।। 

kathaṃ syād āditā janmakarmaṇor daivapuṃstvayoḥ ।
ityādisaṃśayagaṇaś śāmyaty ahni yathā tamaḥ ।। 

sarvathā sarvabhāveṣu saṅgatir hy upaśāmyati ।
yāminyām iva yātāyāṃ prajñāloka upāgate ।। 

samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyaṃ meror iva sthiram ।
antaśśītalatā cendor ivodeti vicāriṇaḥ ।। 

sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā ।
śāntāśeṣavikalpasya bhavaty āviśya yoginaḥ ।। 

sarvārthaśītalā śuddhā paramālokadā sudhīḥ ।
paraṃ prakāśam āyāti jyotsneva sakalaindavī ।। 

hṛdyākāśe vivekārke śamālokini nirmale ।
anarthasārthakartāro nodyanti kaliketavaḥ ।। 

śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate ।
acañcale jaḍās tṛṣṇāś śaradīvābhramālikāḥ ।। 

yatkiñcanakarī krūrā grāmyatā vinivartate ।
dīnānanā piśācānāṃ līleva divasāgame ।। 

dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām ।
ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva ।। 

na pataty avaṭe jantur viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi ।
kaḥ kila jñātasaraṇiś śvabhre samanudhāvati ।। 

sacchāstrasādhuvṛttānām avirodhini karmaṇi ।
ramate dhīr yathāprāpte sādhvīvāntaḥpurājire ।। 

jagatāṃ koṭilakṣyeṣu yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ।
teṣām ekaikaśo antassthān sargān paśyaty asargadhīḥ ।। 

mokṣopāyāvabodhena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaṃ janam ।
na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇau sargavargā nirargalam ।
ye patanty utpatanty ambuvīcivat tān sa paśyati ।। 

na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati ।
kāryāṇy eṣa prabuddho api niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ ।। 

dṛśyate lokasāmānyo yathāprāptānuvṛttimān ।
iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaprāptau hṛdayenāparājitaḥ ।। 

buddhvedam akhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivecya vā ।
anubhūyata evaitan na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat ।। 

śāstraṃ subodham evedaṃ nānālaṅkārabhūṣitam ।
kāvyaṃ rasaghanaṃ cāru dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipādakam ।। 

budhyate svayam evedaṃ kiñcitpadapadārthavit ।
svayaṃ yas tu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt ।। 

asmiñ śrute mate jñāte tapodhyānajapādikam ।
mokṣaprāptau tu tasyeha na kiñcid upayujyate ।। 

etacchāstraghanābhyāsāt paunaḥpunyena vīkṣitāt ।
jantoḥ pāṇḍityapūrvaṃ hi cittasaṃskārapūrvakam ।। 

ahaṃ jagad iti prauḍho draṣṭṛdṛśyapiśācakaḥ ।
piśāco arkodayeneva svayaṃ śāmyaty avighnataḥ ।। 

bhramo jagad ahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati ।
svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no ramayaty alam ।। 

yathā saṅkalpanagare puṃso harṣaviṣāditā ।
na bādhate tathaivāntaḥ parijñāte jagadbhrame ।। 

citrasarpaḥ parijñāto na sarpabhayado yathā ।
dṛśyasarpaḥ parijñātas tathā na sukhaduḥkhadaḥ ।। 

parijñānena sarpatvaṃ citrasarpasya naśyati ।
yathā tathaiva saṃsāras sthita evopaśāmyati ।। 

sumanaḥpallavāmarṣe kiñcid vyatikaro bhavet ।
paramārthapadaprāptau na tu vyatikaro asti naḥ ।। 

gacchaty avayavaspandas sumanaḥpatramardane ।
iha dhīmātrabodhas tu nāṅgāvayavabodhanam ।। 

sukhāsanopaviṣṭena yathāsambhavam aśnatā ।
bhogajālaṃ sadācāraviruddheṣu na tiṣṭhatā ।। 

yathākṣaṇaṃ yathādeśaṃ pravicārayatā sukham ।
yathāsambhavasatsaṅgam idaṃ śāstram athetarat ।। 

āsādyate mahājñānabodhas saṃsāraśāntidaḥ ।
sa bhūyo yena nāyāti yoniyantraprapīḍanam ।। 

etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ ।
svamātṛviṣṭhākrimayaḥ kīrtanīyā na te adhamāḥ ।। 

śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam imaṃ mayā ।
rāghava jñānavistāraṃ buddhisāratarāntaram ।। 

yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataś śṛṇu ।
vicāryate yathārtho ayaṃ yayā ca paribhāṣayā ।। 

yenehānanubhūte arthe dṛṣṭenārthāvabodhanam ।
bodhopakāraphaladaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭāntena vinā rāma nāpūrvo artho avabudhyate ।
yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ gṛhe ।। 

yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabodhyase ।
sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam ।। 

upamānopameyānāṃ kāryakāraṇatoditā ।
varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate ।। 

brahmopadeśadṛṣṭānto yasya veha hi kathyate ।
ekadeśasadharmatvaṃ tatrātaḥ parigṛhyate ।। 

yo yo nāmeha dṛṣṭānto brahmatattvāvabodhane ।
dīyate sa sa boddhavyas svapnadṛṣṭajagadgataḥ ।। 

evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham ।
dṛṣṭānta iti nodyanti mūrkhavaikalpikoktayaḥ ।। 

anyā siddhaviruddhādidṛg dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇe ।
svapnopamatvāj jagatas samudeti na kācana ।। 

avastu pūrvāparayor vartamānavicāritam ।
yathā jāgrat tathā svapnas siddha ābālam akṣatam ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpanadhyānavaraśāpauṣadhādibhiḥ ।
ye arthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

mokṣopāyakṛtā granthakāreṇānye api ye kṛtāḥ ।
granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane ।। 

svapnābhatvaṃ ca jagataś śrute śāstre avabhotsyate ।
śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpasudhyānanagarādyupamaṃ jagat ।
yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare ।। 

akāraṇaṃ kāraṇinā yad bodhāyopamīyate ।
na tatra sarvasādharmyaṃ sambhavaty upamābhramaiḥ ।। 

upameyasyopamānād ekāṃśena sadharmatā ।
aṅgīkāryāvabodhāya dhīmatā nirvivādinā ।। 

arthāvalokane dīpād ābhāmātrād ṛte kila ।
na sthālatailavartyādi kiñcid evopayujyate ।। 

ekadeśasadharmatvād upameyāvabodhanam ।
upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo arthaṃ prabhayā yathā ।। 

dṛṣṭāntasyāṃśamātreṇa bodhyabodhodaye sati ।
upādeyatayā grāhyo mahāvākyārthaniścayaḥ ।। 

na kutārkikatām etya nāśanīyā prabuddhatā ।
anubhūtyapalāpāttair apavitrair vikalpitaiḥ ।। 

vicāraṇād anubhavakāri vāṅmayaprasaṅgatām upagatam asmadādiṣu ।
striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ ।। 

asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato ataḥ ।
prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam ।। 

pramāṇadṛṣṭāntanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

viśiṣṭāṃśasadharmatvam upamāneṣu gṛhyate ।
ko bhedas sarvasādṛśye tūpamānopameyayoḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭāntabuddhād ekātmajñānaśāstrārthavedanāt ।
mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā śāntir nirvāṇam ucyate ।। 

tasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntavikalpollasitair alam ।
yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet ।। 

śāntiś śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet ।
bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ ।। 

akāraṇaṃ kāraṇibhir bodhārtham upamīyate ।
upamānais tūpameyasadṛśair ekadeśataḥ ।। 

sthātavyaṃ neha bhogeṣu vivekavikalātmanā ।
upalodarasañjātaparipīnāndhabhekavat ।। 

dṛṣṭāntair yuktibhir yatnād vāñchitaṃ tyajatetarat ।
vicāraṇavatā bhāvyaṃ śāntiśāstrārthaśālinā ।। 

śāstropaśamasaujanyaprajñātajjñasamāgamaiḥ ।
antarāntarasampannadharmyārthopārjanakriyaḥ ।। 

tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani ।
samprayāty apunarnāśāṃ śāntiṃ turyapadābhidhām ।। 

turyaviśrāntiyuktasya pratīrṇasya bhavārṇavāt ।
jīvato ajīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ ।। 

na kṛtenākṛtenārtho na śrutismṛtivibhramaiḥ ।
nirmandara ivāmbhodhis sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam ।। 

ekāṃśenopamānānām upameyasadharmatā ।
boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā ।। 

yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te ।
muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ ।। 

hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrānte anubhavātmani ।
vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcus sa ucyate ।। 

abhimānavikalpāṃśair ajño jñaptiṃ vikalpayan ।
bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam ।। 

sarvapramāṇasattānāṃ padam abdhir apām iva ।
pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu ।। 

sarvārthasāram adhyakṣaṃ vedanaṃ vidur uttamāḥ ।
nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad udāhṛtam ।। 

anubhūter vedanasya pratipatter yathāsthitam ।
pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvas sa eva ca ।। 

sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahantāpratyayātmakaḥ ।
sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā ।। 

sa saṅkalpavikalpādyaiḥ kṛtanānākramo bhramaiḥ ।
jagattayā sphuraty ambu taraṅgāditayā yathā ।। 

prāg akāraṇam evāśu sargādau sargalīlayā ।
sphuritvā kāraṇībhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayam ātmani ।। 

kāraṇatvaṃ vicāro asya jīvasyāsad api sthitam ।
sad ivāsyāṃ jagadrūpasampattau vyaktim āgatam ।। 

svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ ।
nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam ।। 

vicārayan vicāro api nātmānam adhigacchati ।
yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

manasy anīhite śānte tair buddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ ।
neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt ।। 

manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te ।
karmendriyāṇi karmādāv asañcāritayantravat ।। 

manoyantrasya calane kāraṇaṃ vedanaṃ viduḥ ।
prāṇālī dārumeṣasya rajjur antargatā yathā ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārapadārthādyākulaṃ jagat ।
vidyate vedanasyāntar vāte antas spandanaṃ yathā ।। 

sarvātmavedanaṃ śuddhaṃ yathodeti tadātmakam ।
bhāti prasṛtadikkālabāhyāntārūpadehakam ।। 

draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ ।
svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pravibhāti tathaiva tat ।। 

sarvam ātmā yathā tatra saṅkalpatvam ivāgataḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate ।। 

sarvātmakatayā draṣṭur dṛśyatvam iva yujyate ।
draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭrasadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ ।। 

akāraṇakam evāto brahmakalpam idaṃ sthitam ।
pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ ।। 

svayatnamātretararūpako yas taddaivaśabdārtham apāsya dūre ।
śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate antaḥ ।। 

vicārayācāryaparamparāṇāṃ matena satyena sitena tāvat ।
yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi ।। 

pramāṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

āryasaṅgamayuktyādau prajñāṃ vṛddhiṃ nayed balāt ।
tato mahāpuruṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate ।
śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye ।। 

mahāpuruṣatā tv eṣā śamādiguṇaśālinī ।
samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit ।। 

jñānāc chamādayo yānti vṛddhiṃ satpuruṣakramāt ।
ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntar vṛṣṭer iva navāṅkurāḥ ।। 

śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam ।
annātmakebhyo yajñebhyaś śālivṛṣṭir ivottamā ।। 

guṇāś śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā ।
parasparaṃ vivardhete ete abdasarasī yathā ।। 

jñānaṃ satpuruṣācārāj jñānāt satpuruṣakramaḥ ।
parasparaṃ gatau vṛddhiṃ jñānasatpuruṣakramau ।
eko api naitayos tāvat puruṣasyeha sidhyati ।। 

yathā kalamarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatārayā ।
khagotsādena sahito gītānandaḥ prasādhyate ।। 

jñānasatpuruṣehābhyām akartrā kartṛrūpiṇā ।
tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam ।। 

sadācārakramaḥ prokto mayaiṣa raghunandana ।
tathopaveśyate samyag ayaṃ jñānakramo adhunā ।। 

idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam ।
tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā ।। 

śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam ।
yathā katakasaṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśaṃ payaḥ ।। 

viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam ।
yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tadavabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi ।। 

jñānasatpuruṣakramo nāma sargaḥ

mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇaṃ samāptam

prakaraṇa utpatti

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani ।
yad idaṃ tat svaśabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat ।। 

nyāyenānena sarvasmin sarge brahmāmbare sati ।
kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ tāvad yathājñānaṃ yathāvastu yathākramam ।
yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ ।। 

svapnavat paśyati jagac cinnabho dehavinmayam ।
svapnasaṃsāradṛṣṭāntā ihaivāntas samanvitāḥ ।। 

mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayāt prakaraṇād anu ।
athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ parikathyate ।। 

bandho ayaṃ dṛśyasadbhāvo dṛśyābhāve na bandhanam ।
na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt ।। 

utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate ।
sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā ।। 

atas te svavabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham ।
utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā ।। 

idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava ।
tataḥ prakathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati ।। 

tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam ।
anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yat kiñcid avaśiṣyate ।। 

ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ ।
kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ ।। 

sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan ।
jīvatām upayātīva bhāvināmakadarthanām ।। 

tatas sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ ।
mano bhavati maunātmā mananān mantharībhavat ।। 

manas sampadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
susthirād asthirākāras taraṅga iva vāridheḥ ।। 

tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ ।
teneyam indrajālaśrīr vitateva vitanyate ।। 

yathā kaṭakaśabdārthaḥ pṛthaktvārho asti kānake ।
na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare ।। 

brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat ।
na jagacchabdakārtho asti hemnīva kaṭakāditā ।। 

asataivāsatī tāpanadyeva laharī calā ।
manasaivendrajālaśrīr jāgatī pravitanyate ।। 

avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ ।
kalpitānīti nāmāni yasyās sakalavedibhiḥ ।। 

bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu ।
tatas svarūpaṃ mokṣasya jñāsyasīndusamānana ।। 

draṣṭur dṛśyatvasattāṅga bandha ity abhidhīyate ।
draṣṭā dṛśyavaśād baddho dṛśyābhāvād vimucyate ।। 

jagat tvam aham ityādisargātmā dṛśyam ucyate ।
yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate ।। 

nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati ।
saṅkalpajanakair dṛśyavyādhiḥ pratyuta vardhate ।। 

na ca tarkabharakṣodair na tīrthaniyamādibhiḥ ।
sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ ।। 

jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit ।
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।। 

acetyacitsvarūpātmā yatra yatraiṣa tiṣṭhati ।
tatra tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīs samudety apy aṇūdare ।। 

tasmād asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā ।
tyaktaṃ tapodhyānajapair iti kāñcikatṛptivat ।। 

yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati ।
paramāṇūdare apy asmiṃś cidādarśe na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati ।
adridyūrvīnadīśādi cidādarśe tathaiva hi ।। 

tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī ।
bhāvābhāvagrahotsargās sthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ ।। 

idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ ।
etad evākṣayaṃ bījaṃ samādhau saṃsṛtismṛteḥ ।। 

sati tv asmiñ jagaddṛśye nirvikalpasamādhinā ।
na cākṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpy upapadyate ।। 

vyutthāne hi samādhīnāṃ suṣuptānta ivākhilam ।
jagadduḥkham idaṃ bhāti yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ ।
bhūyo anarthanipāte hi kṣaṇasāmye api kiṃ sukham ।। 

yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet ।
tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam ।। 

prāpyate sati dṛśye asmin na ca tan nāma kenacit ।
yatra tatra kilāyāti cittabhrāntyā jagadbhramaḥ ।। 

draṣṭātha yadi pāṣāṇarūpatāṃ bhāvayan balāt ।
kilāste tat tadante api bhūyo asyodeti dṛśyatā ।। 

na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā nirvikalpasamādhayaḥ ।
keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate ।। 

na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātās samādhayaḥ ।
bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam ।। 

tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana ।
śāmyet tapojapadhyānair dṛḍham ity ajñakalpanā ।। 

ālīnavallarīrūpaṃ yathā padmākṣakoṭare ।
āste kamalinībījaṃ tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

yathā rasaḥ padārtheṣu yathā tailaṃ tilādiṣu ।
kusumeṣu yathāmodas tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

yatra yatra sthitasyāpi karpūrādes sugandhatā ।
yathodeti tathā dṛśyaṃ ciddhātor udare jagat ।। 

yathā cātra tava svapnasaṅkalpaś cittarājyadhīḥ ।
svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ ।। 

tasmāc cittavikalpasthaḥ piśāco bālakaṃ yathā ।
vinihanty evam eṣāntar draṣṭāraṃ dṛśyarūpikā ।। 

yathāṅkuro antar bījasya saṃsthito deśakālataḥ ।
karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

dravyasya hṛdy eva camatkṛtir yathā sadoditāsty astamayojjhitodare ।
dravyasya cinmātraśarīriṇas tathā svabhāvabhūtāsty udare jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

bandhahetuvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idam ākāśajākhyānaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।
utpattyākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ yena rāghava budhyase ।। 

astīhākāśajo nāma dvijaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
dhyānaikaniṣṭhas satataṃ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ ।। 

sa ciraṃ jīvati yadā tadā mṛtyur acintayat ।
sarvāṇy eva krameṇāhaṃ bhūtāny admi kilākṣayaḥ ।। 

evam ākāśajaṃ vipraṃ na kasmād bhakṣayāmy aham ।
atra me kuṇṭhitā śaktiḥ khaḍgadhārā yathopale ।। 

iti sañcintya taṃ hantum agacchat tatpuraṃ tadā ।
tyajanty udyamam udyuktā na kadācana kecana ।। 

tatas tatsadanaṃ yāvan mṛtyuḥ praviśati svayam ।
tāvad enaṃ dahaty agniḥ kalpāntajvalanopamaḥ ।। 

agnijvālāmahājālaṃ vidāryāntargato apy asau ।
dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā samādātuṃ hastenaicchat prayatnataḥ ।। 

na cāśakat puro dṛṣṭam api hastaśatair dvijam ।
balavān apy avaṣṭabdhuṃ saṅkalpapuruṣaṃ yathā ।। 

athāgatya yamaṃ mṛtyur apṛcchat saṃśayacchidam ।
kim ity ahaṃ na śaknomi bhoktum ākāśajaṃ prabho ।। 

yamaḥ

mṛtyo na kiñcic chaktas tvam eko mārayituṃ balāt ।
māraṇīyasya karmāṇi tatkartṝṇīha netarat ।। 

tasmād etasya viprasya māraṇīyasya yatnataḥ ।
karmāṇy anviccha teṣāṃ tvaṃ sāhāyyenainam atsyasi ।। 

tatas sa mṛtyur babhrāma tatkarmānveṣaṇādṛtaḥ ।
maṇḍalāni digantāṃś ca sarāṃsi sarito diśaḥ ।। 

vanajaṅgalajālāni śailāmbhodhitaṭāny api ।
dvīpāntarāṇy araṇyāni nagarāṇi purāṇi ca ।। 

grāmān akhilarāṣṭrāṇi deśāntagahanāni ca ।
evaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhrāntvā sa kutaścin na kānicit ।। 

tāny ākāśajakarmāṇi labdhavān mṛtyur udyataḥ ।
vandhyāputram iva prājñas saṅkalpādrim ivāparaḥ ।। 

samapṛcchad athāgatya yamaṃ sarvārthakovidam ।
parāyaṇaṃ hi prabhavas sandeheṣv anujīvinām ।। 

mṛtyuḥ

ākāśajasya karmāṇi kva sthitāni vada prabho ।
dharmarājo atha sañcintya suciraṃ proktavān idam ।। 

dharmarājaḥ

ākāśajasya karmāṇi mṛtyo santi na kānicit ।
eṣa hy ākāśajo vipro jātaḥ khād eva kevalāt ।। 

ākāśād eva yo jātas sa vyomaivāmalaṃ bhavet ।
sahakārīṇi no santi kāraṇāṇy asya kānicit ।। 

sambandhaḥ prāktanenāsya na manāg api karmaṇā ।
asti vandhyāsutasyeva tathājātākṛter iva ।। 

tasmād ajāta evaiṣa svayambhūr aja eva ca ।
naitasya pūrvakarmāsti nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ ।। 

naitad asyāvaśaṃ cittam abhāvāt pūrvakarmaṇaḥ ।
adya tāvad anenānyan na kiñcit karma sañcitam ।। 

eṣa ākāśakośātmā viśadākāśarūpiṇi ।
samādhau saṃsthito nityaṃ karmāṇy asya na kānicit ।। 

prāktanāni na santy asya karmāṇy adya karoti no ।
kiñcid apy evam eṣo atra vijñānākāśamātrakam ।। 

prāṇaspando asya yat karma lakṣyate cāsmadādibhiḥ ।
dṛśyate asmābhir evaitan na tv asyāsty atra karmadhīḥ ।। 

deho asya dṛśyate asmābhir naiṣa vetti parāt padāt ।
bhinnam ākāśam ātmīyaṃ citstambhe sālabhañjikām ।। 

anutkīrṇā yathā stambhe saṃsthitā sālabhañjikā ।
tathaiṣa paramātmāntas svātmabhūtas sthito dvijaḥ ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasi śūnyatvaṃ ca yathāmbare ।
mārute ca yathā spandas tathaiṣa parame pade ।। 

karmāṇy adyatanāny asya sañcitāni na santi hi ।
na pūrvāṇy eva teneha na saṃsāravaśaṃ gataḥ ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve yaḥ prajāyate ।
nāsau svakāraṇād bhinno bhavatīty anubhūyate ।। 

nirmalākāśakośātmā dvija eṣa svayambhavaḥ ।
kartā na pūrvaṃ nāpy adya katham ākramyate vada ।। 

yadaiṣa kalanāṃ buddhyā mṛtyunāmnīṃ kariṣyati ।
tadaiva rahito buddhyā svayam eva mariṣyati ।। 

pṛthvyādimān aham ayam iti yasya svaniścayaḥ ।
sa pārthivo bhavaty āśu grahītuṃ sa ca śakyate ।। 

eṣa tv apārthivākāraś śuddhavijñānarūpavān ।
dṛḍharajjveva gaganaṃ grahītuṃ naiva yujyate ।। 

mṛtyuḥ

bhagavañ jāyate śūnyaḥ kathaṃ nāma vadeti me ।
pṛthvyādayaḥ kathaṃ santi na santi vada vā katham ।। 

yamaḥ

na kadācana jāto asau na ca nāsti kadācana ।
dvijaḥ kevalavijñānabhāmātraṃ tat tathā sthitam ।। 

mahāpralayasampattau na kiñcid avaśiṣyate ।
brahmāste śāntam ajaram anantātmaiva kevalam ।। 

cetyanirmuktacinmātram aṇūnām aṇu viddhi tat ।
tathā tad aṇu yenāsya nikaṭe adrinibhaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

sa cinmātrasvabhāvatvād deho aham iti cetasi ।
kākatālīyavad bhātam ākāraṃ tena paśyati ।। 

sa eṣa brāhmaṇas tasmin sargādāv ambarodare ।
svayaṃ bhātas svayambhūtvaṃ gato bhāty ajarāmaraḥ ।। 

nāsya deho na karmāṇi na kartṛtvaṃ na vāsanā ।
eṣa śuddhacidākāśo vijñānaghanam ātatam ।। 

prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ kiñcid asya na vidyate ।
kevalaṃ vyomarūpasya bhārūpasyeva tejasaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ vedanāmātrād evam eṣo avalokyate ।
vedanāmātrasaṃśāntāv īdṛśo api na dṛśyate ।। 

tasmād yathā cidākāśas tathā tatpratipattayaḥ ।
kutaḥ kilātra pṛthvyādeḥ kīdṛśas sambhavaḥ katham ।। 

etadākramaṇe mṛtyo tasmān mā yatnavān bhava ।
grahītuṃ yujyate vyoma na kadācana kenacit ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahmaiva kathito brahmaṃs tvayā me prapitāmahaḥ ।
svayambhūr aja ekātmā vijñānātmeti me matiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam etan mayā rāma brahmaiṣa kathitas tava ।
vivādam akaron mṛtyur yamenaitatkṛte purā ।। 

manvantare sarvabhakṣo yadā mṛtyur haran prajāḥ ।
balam ety abjajākrāntāv ārambham akarot svayam ।। 

tad evaṃ dharmarājena yamenāśv anuśāsitaḥ ।
yad eva kriyate nityaṃ ratis tatraiva jāyate ।। 

brahmā kila parākāśavapur ākramyate katham ।
manomātram asaṅkalpaḥ pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ ।। 

yaś cidvyomacamatkāraḥ kilākāśānubhūtimān ।
sa cidvyomaiva no tasya kāraṇatvaṃ na kāryatā ।। 

ākāśasphuradākāras saṅkalpapuruṣo yathā ।
pṛthvyādirahito bhāti svayambhūr bhāsate tathā ।। 

na dṛśyam asti no draṣṭā paramātmani kevale ।
svayaṃ cittvāt tathāpy eṣa svayambhūr iti bhāsate ।। 

saṅkalpamātram evaitan mano brahmeti kathyate ।
saṅkalpākāśapuruṣo nāsya pṛthvyādi vidyate ।। 

yathā citrakṛdantassthā nirdehā bhāti putrikā ।
tathaiva bhāsate brahmā cidākāśāccharañjanam ।। 

cidvyoma kevalam anantam anādimadhyaṃ brahmeti bhāti nijacittavaśāt svayambhūḥ ।
ākāravān iva rasād iha vastutas tu vandhyātanūja iva nāsti tu tasya dehaḥ ।। 

ādyasṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

evam etan manaś śuddhaṃ pṛthvyādirahitaṃ nabhaḥ ।
mune brahmeti kathitaṃ satyaṃ pṛthvyādivarjitam ।। 

tad atra prāktanī nāma smṛtiḥ kasmān na kāraṇam ।
yathā mama tathānyasya bhūtānāṃ ceti me vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pūrvadeho asti yasyādyaḥ pūrvakarmasamanvitaḥ ।
tasya smṛtis sambhavati kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛtisthiteḥ ।। 

brahmaṇaḥ prāktanaṃ karma yadā kiñcin na vidyate ।
prāktanī saṃsmṛtis tasya tadodeti kutaḥ katham ।। 

tasmād akāraṇaṃ bhāti vā svacittvaikakāraṇam ।
svakāraṇād ananyātmā svayambhūs svayamātmavān ।। 

ātivāhika evāsau deho asty asya svayambhuvaḥ ।
na tv ādhibhautiko rāma deho ajasyopapadyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

ātivāhika eko asti deho anyas tv ādhibhautikaḥ ।
sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnāṃ brahmaṇo asty eka eva kim ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarveṣām eva dehau dvau bhūtānāṃ kāraṇātmanām ।
ajasya kāraṇāsattvād eka evātivāhikaḥ ।। 

sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnām eko ajaḥ kāraṇaṃ param ।
ajasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti tenāsāv ekadehavān ।। 

nāsty eva bhautiko dehaḥ prathamasya prajāpateḥ ।
ākāśātmāvabhāty eṣa ātivāhikadehavān ।। 

cittamātraśarīro asau na pṛthvyādimayātmakaḥ ।
ādyaḥ prajāpatir vyomatanuḥ pratanute prajāḥ ।। 

tāś ca nirvāṇarūpiṇyo vinānyaiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ ।
yad yatas tat tad eveti sarvair evānubhūyate ।। 

nirvāṇamātraṃ prathamaṃ paraṃ bodhas tad eva ca ।
cittamātraṃ tad evāste na yāti vasudhāditām ।। 

sarveṣāṃ bhūtamanasāṃ saṃsāravyavahāriṇāṃ ।
prathamo asau praticchandaś cittadehas svatodayaḥ ।। 

yasmāt pūrvāt praticchandād ananyaitatsvarūpiṇī ।
iyaṃ pravisṛtā sṛṣṭis spandadṛṣṭir ivānilāt ।। 

pratibhānākṛter asmāt pratibhāmātrarūpadhṛt ।
vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargas satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭānto atra svapnapuraṃ svapnastrīsurataṃ tathā ।
asad apy arthasampattyā satyānubhavabhāsuram ।। 

apṛthvyādimayo bhāti vyomākṛtir adehakaḥ ।
sadeha iva bhūteśas svātmabhūḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ ।। 

sa citsaṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati ।
svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati ।। 

brahmā saṅkalparahitaḥ pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ ।
kevalaś cittamātrātmā kāraṇaṃ trijagatsthiteḥ ।। 

saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ ।
vyomātmaiṣa tathā bhāti bhavatsaṅkalpaśailavat ।। 

ātivāhikataikāntavismṛtyā dṛḍharūḍhayā ।
ādhibhautikabodhena mudhā bhāti piśācavat ।। 

idamprathamatodyogasamprabuddhamahāciteḥ ।
nodeti śuddhasaṃvittvād ātivāhikavismṛtiḥ ।। 

ādhibhautikatā tena nāsyodeti piśācikā ।
asatyā mṛgatṛṣṇeva mithyā jāḍyabhramapradā ।। 

manomātraṃ yadā brahmā na pṛthvyādimayātmakaḥ ।
manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi ।। 

ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat ।
tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit ।। 

kāraṇāt kāryavaicitryaṃ tenātrāsti na kiñcana ।
yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam ।। 

kāryakāraṇatā tv atra na kiñcid upapadyate ।
yādṛg eva paraṃ brahma tādṛg eva jagattrayam ।। 

manastām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat ।
ananyad ātmanaś śuddhād dravatvam iva vāriṇā ।। 

manasā tanyate sarvam asad evedam ātatam ।
yathā saṅkalpanagaraṃ yathā gandharvapattanam ।। 

ādhibhautikatā nāsti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatā ।
brahmādayaḥ prabuddhās tu kathaṃ tiṣṭhantu tatra te ।। 

ātivāhika evāsti na prabuddhamateḥ kila ।
ādhibhautikadehasya carcaivātra kutaḥ katham ।। 

manonāmno manuṣyasya vividhākāradhāriṇaḥ ।
manorājyaṃ jagad iti satyarūpam iva sthitam ।। 

mana eva viriñcatvaṃ viddhi saṅkalpanātmakam ।
svavapus sphāratāṃ nītvā manasedaṃ pratanyate ।। 

viriñco manaso rūpaṃ viriñcasya mano vapuḥ ।
pṛthvyādi vidyate nātra tena pṛthvyādi kalpitam ।। 

padmākṣe padminīvāntar manohṛdy asti dṛśyatā ।
manodṛśyadṛśau bhinne na kadācana kiñcana ।। 

tathā cātra bhavatsvapnasaṅkalpaś cittarājyadhīḥ ।
svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ ।। 

tasmāc cittavikalpasthaḥ piśāco bālakaṃ yathā ।
vinihanty evam eṣāntar draṣṭāraṃ dṛśyarūpikā ।। 

yathāṅkuro antar bījasya saṃsthito deśakālataḥ ।
karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

sac cen na śāmyati kadācana dṛśyaduḥkhaṃ dṛśye tv aśāmyati na boddhari kevalatvam ।
dṛśye tv asambhavati boddhari boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite api hi tad asya vimokṣam āhuḥ ।। 

bandhahetur nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

kathayaty evam uddāmavacanaṃ munināyake ।
śrotum ekarase jāte jane maunavati sthite ।। 

śānteṣu kiṅkiṇījālasvaneṣu spandanaṃ vinā ।
pañjarāntarahārītaśukeṣv apy astakeliṣu ।। 

suvismṛtavilāsāsu sthitāsu lalanāsv api ।
citrabhittāv iva nyaste samaste rājasadmani ।। 

muhūrtaśeṣam abhavad divasaṃ madhurātapam ।
vyavahāro ravikarais saha tānavam āyayau ।। 

vavur utphullakamalaprakaronmadamāṃsalāḥ ।
vāyavo madhuraspandaṃ śravaṇārtham ivāgatāḥ ।। 

śrutaṃ cintayituṃ bhānur ivāhoracanābhramam ।
tatyājaikāntam agamac chūnyam astagires taṭam ।। 

uttasthur mihikārambhaśyāmatā vanabhūmiṣu ।
vijñānaśravaṇād antaśśītalāś śāntatā iva ।। 

babhūvur alpasañcārā janā daśasu dikṣv api ।
sāvadhānatayā śrotum iva santyaktaceṣṭitāḥ ।। 

chāyā dīrghatvam ājagmur vāsiṣṭhaṃ varṇanakramam ।
iva śrotum aśeṣāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ dīrghakandharāḥ ।। 

pratīhāraḥ puraḥ prahvo bhūtvāha vasudhādhipam ।
deva snānadvijārcāsu kālo hy atigato bhṛśam ।। 

tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān saṃhṛtya madhurāṃ giram ।
adya tāvan mahārāja śrutam etāvad astu vaḥ ।। 

prātar anyad vadiṣyāma ity uktvā maunavān abhūt ।
ity ākarṇyaivam astūktvā bhūpatir bhūtivṛddhaye ।। 

puṣpārghyapādyasammānadakṣiṇādānapūjayā ।
sadevarṣimunīn viprān pūjayām āsa sādaram ।। 

athottasthau sabhā sarvā sarājamunimaṇḍalā ।
kuṇḍalākīrṇaraśmyoghapariveśāvṛtānanā ।। 

parasparāṃsasaṅghaṭṭaraṇatkeyūrakaṅkaṇā ।
hārabhārāhatasvarṇapaṭṭābhorastaṭāntarā ।। 

śekharotsaṅgaviśrāntaprabuddhamadhupasvanaiḥ ।
saghuṅghumaśirobhāgā patadbhir iva mūrdhajaiḥ ।। 

kāñcanābharaṇoddyotakanakīkṛtadiṅmukhāḥ ।
buddhisthamunivāgarthasaṃśāntendriyavṛttayaḥ ।। 

jagmur nabhaścarā vyoma bhūcarā bhūmimaṇḍalam ।
cakrur dinasamācāraṃ svaṃ sarve sveṣu veśmasu ।। 

etasminn antare śyāmā yāminī samadṛśyata ।
janasaṅghātanirmukte gṛhe bālāṅganā yathā ।। 

deśāntaraṃ bhāsayituṃ yayau divasanāyakaḥ ।
sarvatrālokakartṛtvam eva sātpuruṣaṃ vratam ।। 

udabhūd abhitas sandhyā tārānikaradhāriṇī ।
utphullakiṃśukavanā vasantaśrīr ivoditā ।। 

cūtanīpakadambāgragrāmacaityagṛhodare ।
nililyire khagāś citte tadā tā vṛttayo yathā ।। 

bhānor bhāsā bhūṣitair meghaleśaiḥ kiñcit kiñcit kuṅkumacchāyayeva ।
pāścātyo adriḥ pītavāsās tamo'bdhes tārāhāraśrīyutaḥ khaṃ sametaḥ ।। 

pūjām ādāya sandhyāyāṃ prayātāyāṃ yathāgatam ।
andhakārās samuttasthur vetālavalayā iva ।। 

avaśyāyakaṇasyandī helāvidhutapallavaḥ ।
komalaḥ kumudāśaṃsī vavāv āśītalo anilaḥ ।। 

paramāndhyam upājagmur diśo api sphuṭatārakāḥ ।
lambadīrghatamaḥkeśyo vidhavā iva yoṣitaḥ ।। 

āyayau bhuvanaṃ tejaḥkṣīrapūreṇa pūrayan ।
rasāyanamayākāraś śaśikṣīrārṇavo nabhaḥ ।। 

jagmus timirasaṅghātāḥ palāyya kvāpy adṛśyatām ।
śrutajñānagiraś cittān mahīpānām ivājñatāḥ ।। 

ṛṣayo bhūmipālāś ca munayo brāhmaṇās tathā ।
cetasīva vicitrārthās svāspadeṣu viśaśramuḥ ।। 

yamakāyopamā śyāmā yayau timiramāṃsalā ।
āyayau mihikākārā tatra teṣām uṣā śanaiḥ ।। 

alakṣyatām upājagmus tārā nabhasi bhāsurāḥ ।
prabhātapavaneneva hṛtāḥ kuṅkumavṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

dṛśyatām ājagāmārkaprabhonmīlitalocanā ।
vivekavṛttir mahatāṃ manasīva navodgatā ।। 

sabhāṃ punar upājagmur nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ ।
hyastanena krameṇaiva kṛtaprātastanakramāḥ ।। 

sā pūrvasanniveśena viveśa vipulā sabhā ।
babhūvāspanditākārā vātamukteva padminī ।। 

atha prasaṅgam āsādya rāmo madhurayā girā ।
uvāca muniśārdūlaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ vadatāṃ varam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan manaso rūpaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vada me sphuṭam ।
yasmāt teneyam akhilā tanyate doṣamañjarī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāmāsya manaso rūpaṃ na kiñcid api dṛśyate ।
nāmamātrād ṛte vyomno yathā śūnyajaḍākṛteḥ ।। 

na bāhye nāpi hṛdaye sadrūpaṃ vidyate manaḥ ।
sarvatraiva sthitaṃ caitad viddhi rāma yathā nabhaḥ ।। 

idam asyāsad utpannaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbusannibham ।
rūpaṃ tu śṛṇu saṅkṣepād dvitīyendubhramopamam ।। 

sādho yad etad arthasya pratibhānaṃ prathāṃ gatam ।
sato vāpy asato vāpi tan mano viddhi netarat ।। 

yad arthapratibhānaṃ tan mana ity abhidhīyate ।
anyan na kiñcid apy asti mano nāma kadācana ।। 

saṅkalpanaṃ mano viddhi saṅkalpāt tan na bhidyate ।
yathā dravatvāt salilaṃ tathā spando yathānilāt ।। 

yatra saṅkalpanaṃ tatra tan mano aṅga tathā sthitam ।
saṅkalpamanasī bhinne na kadācana kecana ।। 

satyam astv atha vāsatyaṃ yad arthapratibhāsanam ।
tāvanmātraṃ mano viddhi tad brahmaiṣa pitāmahaḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehātmā mana ity abhidhīyate ।
ādhibhautikabuddhis tu sadādhīs tu cirasthitiḥ ।। 

avidyā saṃsṛtiś cittaṃ mano bandho malaṃ tamaḥ ।
iti paryāyanāmāni dṛśyasya vidur uttamāḥ ।। 

na hi dṛśyād ṛte kiñcin manaso rūpam asti hi ।
dṛśyaṃ cotpannam evaitan neti vakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ।। 

yathā kamalabīje antas sthitā kamalamañjarī ।
mahācitparamāṇvantas tathā dṛśyaṃ jagat sthitam ।। 

prakāśasya yathāloko yathā vātasya copanam ।
yathā dravatvaṃ payaso dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭur īdṛśam ।। 

aṅgadatvaṃ yathā hemni mṛganadyāṃ yathā jalam ।
bhittir yathā svapnapure tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam ananyad iva yat sthitam ।
tad apy unmārjayāmy āśu tvaccittādarśato malam ।। 

yad draṣṭur asyādraṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyābhāve bhaved balāt ।
tad viddhi kevalībhāvam ata evāsatas sataḥ ।। 

tattām upagate bhāve rāgadveṣādivāsanā ।
śāmyaty aspandite vāte spandasaṅkṣubdhatā yathā ।। 

asambhavati sarvasmin digbhūmyākāśarūpiṇi ।
prakāśye yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ prakāśasyāmalaṃ bhavet ।। 

trijagat tvam ahaṃ ceti dṛśye asattām upāgate ।
draṣṭus syāt kevalībhāvas tādṛśo vimalātmanaḥ ।। 

anantākhilaśailādipratibimbe hi yādṛśī ।
syād darpaṇe darpaṇatā kevalātmasvarūpiṇī ।। 

ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau praśānte dṛśyasambhrame ।
syāt tādṛśī kevalatā sthite draṣṭary avīkṣake ।। 

rāmaḥ

sac cen na śāmyatīdaṃ vā nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
asattāṃ ca na vidmo asmin dṛśye doṣapradāyini ।। 

tasmāt katham iyaṃ śāmyed brahman dṛśyaviṣūcikā ।
nānodbhavabhramakarī duḥkhasantatidāyinī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asya dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai mantram imaṃ śṛṇu ।
rāmātyantam ayaṃ yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati ।। 

yad asti tasya nāśo asti na kadācana rāghava ।
tasmāt tan naṣṭam apy antar bījabhūtaṃ bhaved dhṛdi ।। 

smṛtibījā cidākāśe punar udbhūya dṛśyadhīḥ ।
lokaśailāmbarākāraṃ doṣaṃ vitanute atanum ।। 

itthaṃ nirmokṣadoṣas syān na ca tasyāṃśasambhavaḥ ।
yasmād devarṣimunayo dṛśyante muktibhājanam ।। 

yadi syāj jagadādīdaṃ tat syān mokṣo na kasyacit ।
bāhyastham astu hṛtsthaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ nāśāya kevalam ।। 

tasmād imāṃ pratijñāṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rāmātibhīṣaṇām ।
yām uttareṇa granthena nūnaṃ tvam avabudhyase ।। 

ayam ākāśabhūtādirūpo ahaṃ ceti lakṣitaḥ ।
jagacchabdasya nāmārtho nanu nāsty eva kaścana ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśyajālaṃ purogatam ।
ekaṃ brahmaiva tat sarvam ajarāmaram avyayam ।। 

pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ prasarati śānte śāntaṃ paraṃ sthitam ।
vyomany evoditaṃ vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati ।। 

na dṛśyam asti no dṛk ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam ।
na śūnyaṃ no jaḍaṃ no cic chāntam evedam ātatam ।। 

rāmaḥ

vandhyāputreṇa piṣṭo adriś śaśaśṛṅgaṃ pramāyate ।
prasārya bhujasaṅghātaṃ śilā nṛtyati tāṇḍavam ।। 

sravanti sikatās tailaṃ paṭhanty upalaputrikāḥ ।
garjanti citrajaladā itīvedaṃ vacaḥ prabho ।। 

jarāmaraṇaduḥkhādiśailākāśamayaṃ jagat ।
nāstīti kim idaṃ nāma bhavatāpi mamocyate ।। 

yathedaṃ na sthitaṃ viśvaṃ notpannaṃ na ca vidyate ।
tathā kathaya me brahman yenaitan niścitaṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nāsamanvitavāg asmi śṛṇu rāghava kathyate ।
yathedam asad ābhāti vandhyāputra ivāravī ।। 

idam ādāv anutpannaṃ sargādau tena nāsty alam ।
idaṃ hi manasā bhāti svapnādau pattanaṃ yathā ।। 

mana eva ca sargādāv anutpannam asadvapuḥ ।
tathaitac chṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathaitad anubhūyate ।। 

mano dṛśyamayaṃ doṣaṃ tanotīmaṃ kṣayātmakam ।
asad evāsadākāraṃ svapnas svapnāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati dehakam ।
teneyam indrajālaśrīr vitatena vitanyate ।। 

sphurati gacchati valgati yācate bhavati majjati saṃharati svayam ।
amaratām upayāty api kevalaṃ calati cañcalaśaktitayā manaḥ ।। 

prakaraṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan muniśārdūla kim iveha mano bhrame ।
vidyate katham utpannaṃ mano māyāmayaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

utpattim ādāv iti me samāsena vada prabho ।
pravakṣyasi tataś śiṣṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahāpralayasampattāv asattāṃ samupāgate ।
aśeṣadṛśye sargādau śāntam evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

āste anastamito bhāsvān ajo devo nirāmayaḥ ।
sarvadā sarvakṛt sarvaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ ।। 

yato vāco nivartante yo muktair avagamyate ।
yasya cātmādikās sañjñāḥ kalpitā na svabhāvajāḥ ।। 

yaḥ pumān sāṅkhyadṛṣṭīnāṃ brahma vedāntavādinām ।
vijñānamātraṃ vijñānavidām ekāntanirmalam ।। 

yaś śūnyavādināṃ śūnyaṃ bhāsako yo arkatejasām ।
vaktā smartā ṛtaṃ bhoktā draṣṭā kartā sadaiva yaḥ ।। 

sad apy asad yo jagati yo dehastho api dūragaḥ ।
citprakāśo hy ayaṃ yasmād āloka iva bhāsvataḥ ।। 

yasmād viṣṇvādayo devās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ ।
yasmāj jaganty anantāni budbudā jaladher iva ।। 

yaṃ yānti dṛśyavṛndāni payāṃsīva mahāmbudhim ।
ya ātmānaṃ padārthaṃ ca prakāśayati dīpavat ।। 

ākāśe yaś śarīre ca dṛṣatsv apsu latāsu ca ।
pāṃsuṣv adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdhaṃ puryaṣṭakam itas tataḥ ।
yena mūkīkṛtā mūḍhāś śilā dhyānam ivāsthitāḥ ।। 

vyoma yena kṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ śailā yena ghanīkṛtāḥ ।
āpo drutāḥ kṛtā yena dīpto yasya vaśād raviḥ ।। 

prasaranti yataś citrās saṃsārāsāradṛṣṭayaḥ ।
akṣayāmṛtasampūrṇād ambhodād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvamayyas tribhuvanormayaḥ ।
sphuranty avirataṃ yasmin ghṛṇāv iva marīcayaḥ ।। 

nāśarūpo avināśātmā yo antassthas sarvavastuṣu ।
gupto yo vyatirikto api sarvabhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

prakṛtivratatir vyomni jātā brahmāṇḍasatphalā ।
cittamūlendriyadalā yena nṛtyati vāyunā ।। 

yaś cinmaṇiḥ prakacati pratidehasamudgakam ।
yasminn indau sphuranty etā jagajjālamarīcayaḥ ।। 

praśāntacidghane yasmin sphuranty amṛtavarṣiṇi ।
dhārājalāni bhūtāni dṛṣṭayas taḍitas sphuṭāḥ ।। 

camatkurvanti vastūni yadālokanayā mithaḥ ।
asaj jātam asad yena yena sat sattvam āgatam ।। 

calatīdam anicchasya kāyāyo yasya sannidhau ।
jaḍaṃ paramaratnasya śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhataḥ ।। 

niyatir deśakālau ca calanaṃ spandanaṃ kriyāḥ ।
iti yena gataṃ sattāṃ sarvasattvābhigāminā ।। 

śuddhasaṃvinmayatvād yaḥ khaṃ bhaved vyomavittayā ।
padārthavittayārthatvam avatiṣṭhaty aniṣṭhitaḥ ।। 

kurvann apīva jagatāṃ mahatām anantaspandaṃ na kiñcana karoti kadācanāpi ।
svātmany anastamayasaṃvidi nirvikāre tyaktodayasthitimatis sthita eka eva ।। 

mūlakāraṇadevasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asya devātidevasya parasya paramātmanaḥ ।
jñānād eva parā siddhir na tv anuṣṭhānakhedadā ।। 

atra jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ na tv anyad upayujyate ।
mṛgatṛṣṇājalabhrāntiśāntivedanarūpi tat ।। 

na caiṣa dūre nākāśe nālabhyo viṣamo na ca ।
svānandabhāsarūpo asau svadehād eva labhyate ।। 

kiñcin nopakaroty atra tapodānavratādikam ।
svabhāvamātraviśrāntim ṛte nātrāsti sādhanam ।। 

śāstrasatsaṅgasadyogiparataivātra kevalam ।
sādhanaṃ bodhanaṃ mohajālasya yad akṛtrimam ।। 

ayaṃ sa deva ity eva samparijñānamātrataḥ ।
jantor na jāyate duḥkhaṃ jīvanmuktatvam eti ca ।। 

rāmaḥ

samparijñātamātreṇa kilānenātmanātmani ।
punar doṣā na bādhante maraṇādyāḥ kadācana ।। 

devadevo mahān eṣa kuto dūrād avāpyate ।
tapasā kena tīvreṇa kleśena kiyatāthavā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapauruṣaprayatnena vivekena vikāsinā ।
sa devo jñāyate rāma na tapassnānakarmabhiḥ ।। 

rāgadveṣatamaḥkrodhamadamātsaryavarjanam ।
vinā rāma tapodānaṃ kleśa eva na vāstavam ।। 

rāgādyupahate citte vañcayitvā paraṃ dhanam ।
yad arjyate tato dānād yasyārthas tasya tatphalam ।। 

rāgādyupahate citte vratādi kriyate ca yat ।
sa dambhaḥ procyate tasya phalam asti manāṅ na vā ।। 

tasmāt puruṣayatnena mukhyam auṣadham āharet ।
sacchāstrasajjanāsaṅgaṃ saṃsṛtivyādhināśanam ।। 

atraikaṃ pauruṣaṃ yatnaṃ varjayitvetarā gatiḥ ।
sarvaduḥkhakṣayaprāptau na kācid upapadyate ।। 

śṛṇu tat pauruṣaṃ kīdṛg ātmajñānasya labdhaye ।
yena śāmyanty aśeṣeṇa rāgadveṣaviṣūcikāḥ ।। 

yathāsambhavayā vṛttyā lokaśāstrāviruddhayā ।
santoṣasantuṣṭamanā bhogagardhaṃ parityajan ।। 

yathāsambhavam udyogād anudvignatayā svayā ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparatāṃ prathamaṃ śrayet ।। 

yathāprāptārthasantuṣṭo yo garhitam upekṣate ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrarataś śīghraṃ sa mucyate ।। 

vicāraṇāparijñātasvabhāvasya mahāmateḥ ।
anukampyā bhavanty ete brahmaviṣṇvindraśaṅkarāḥ ।। 

bhṛśaṃ yaṃ sujanaprāyaṃ lokās sādhuṃ pracakṣate ।
sa viśiṣṭas sa sādhus syāt taṃ prayatnena saṃśrayet ।। 

adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ pradhānaṃ tatkathāśrayam ।
śāstraṃ sacchāstram ity āhur mucyate tadvicāravān ।। 

sacchāstrasatsaṅgamajair vivekais tathā vinaśyanti balān malāni ।
yathā jalānāṃ katakānuṣaṅgād yathā jaḍānām abhayopayogāt ।। 

mumukṣuyatnopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ya eṣa devaḥ kathito yasmiñ jñāte vimucyate ।
vada kvāsau sthito devaḥ katham enam ahaṃ labhe ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ya eṣa devaḥ kathito naiṣa dūre avatiṣṭhate ।
śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ ।। 

eṣa sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ na viśvaṃ tv eṣa sarvagaḥ ।
vidyate hy eṣa evaiko na tu viśvābhidhāsti dṛk ।। 

cinmātram eṣa śaśibhṛc cinmātraṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ ।
cinmātram eva tapanaś cinmātraṃ kamalodbhavaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

bālā api vadanty etad yadi cetanamātrakam ।
jagad ity eva kaivātra nāma syād upadeśatā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cinmātraṃ cetanaṃ viśvam iti yaj jñātavān asi ।
na kiñcid etad vijñātaṃ bhavatā bhavatāraṇam ।। 

cetanaṃ nāma saṃsāro jīva eṣa paśus smṛtaḥ ।
etasmād eva niryānti jarāmaraṇavīcayaḥ ।। 

paśur ajño hy amūrto api duḥkhasyaivaiṣa bhājanam ।
cetanatvāc cetatīdam atyanarthas svayaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

cetyanirmuktatā yā syād acetyonmukhatāthavā ।
asya sā bharitāvasthā tāṃ jñātvā nānuśocati ।। 

bhidyate hṛdayagranthiś chidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ ।
ksīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare ।। 

tasya cetyonmukhatvaṃ tu cetyāsambhavanaṃ vinā ।
roddhuṃ na śakyaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu cetyaṃ śāmyatu vai katham ।। 

rāmaḥ

sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrais saṃsārārṇavatārakaḥ ।
dṛśyate paramātmā yas sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad etac cetanaṃ jīvo viśīrṇo janmajaṅgale ।
etam ātmānam icchanti ye te ajñāḥ paṇḍitā api ।। 

jīva eveha saṃsāraś cetanād duḥkhasantateḥ ।
asmiñ jñāte nāvijñātaṃ kiñcid bhavati kutracit ।। 

jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tad duḥkhasantatiḥ ।
kṣayam eti viṣāveśaśāntāv iva viṣūcikā ।। 

rāmaḥ

rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ ।
yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyās saṃvido vapuḥ ।
nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

atyantābhāva evāsti saṃsārasya jagatsthiteḥ ।
yasmin bodhamahāmbhodhau tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito apy astam alaṃ gataḥ ।
yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnyaṃ jagat sthitam ।
sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

yan mahācinmayam api bṛhatpāṣāṇavat sthitam ।
jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvaṃ yena samprāpya saṅgamam ।
svarūpasattām āpnoti tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

prakāśasya yathāloko yathā śūnyatvam ambare ।
tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

sarvataḥ paramātmaiṣa kathaṃ nāmāvabudhyate ।
iyato asya jagannāmno dṛśyasyāsambhavaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
atyantābhāvasambodhe yadi rūḍhir alaṃ bhavet ।। 

taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā ।
dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ ।। 

atyantābhāvasampattau dṛśyasyāsya yathāsthiteḥ ।
śiṣyate paramārtho asau budhyate jñāyate tataḥ ।। 

na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit ।
kva vinā pratibimbena kilādarśo avatiṣṭhate ।। 

jagannāmno asya dṛśyasya sattāsambhavanaṃ vinā ।
budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit ।। 

rāmaḥ

iyato dṛśyajālasya brahmāṇḍasya jagatsthiteḥ ।
mune katham asattāsti kva merus sarṣapodare ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasy akhinnadhīḥ ।
sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparamas tad ahaṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

pramārjayāmi te dṛśyaṃ bodhe mṛgajalaṃ yathā ।
dṛśyābhāve draṣṭṛtā ca śāmyed bodho avaśiṣyate ।। 

draṣṭṛtvaṃ sati dṛśye asmin dṛśyatvaṃ saty avekṣake ।
ekatvaṃ sati hi dvitve dvitvaṃ caikatvavedane ।। 

ekābhāve dvayor eva siddhir bhavati nātra hi ।
dvitvaikyadraṣṭṛdṛśyatvakṣaye sad avaśiṣyate ।। 

ahantādi jagaddṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ te mārjayāmy aham ।
atyantāsattvasaṃvittyā manomakurato malam ।। 

nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
yat tu nāsti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśas tatpramārjane ।। 

jagad ādāv anutpannaṃ yac cedaṃ dṛśyate tatam ।
tat svātmany eva vimale brahma cittvāt svabṛṃhitam ।। 

jagan nāma na cotpannaṃ na cāsti na ca dṛśyate ।
hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ kim etanmārjane śramaḥ ।। 

tathaitad vistareṇeha vakṣyāmo bahuyuktibhiḥ ।
abādhitaṃ yathā nūnaṃ svayam evānubhūyate ।। 

ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ ।
kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ ।। 

yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam ।
yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam ।
etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ ।। 

yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ ।
yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā kaṣṭāvaho bhavati taṃ vidur ajñam eva ।। 

jagadādidṛśyāsattāpratijñā nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati ।
nyāye anubhūta etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bahukālam iyaṃ rūḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā ।
jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati ।। 

vadāmy ākhyāyikā rāma yā imā bodhasiddhaye ।
tāś cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān ।। 

no ced udvegaśīlatvād ardhād utthāya gacchasi ।
tat tiryagdharmiṇas te adya kiñcin nāpi tu setsyati ।। 

yo ayam arthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ yatate tathā ।
so avaśyaṃ tad avāpnoti na cec chrānto nivartate ।। 

sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparo bhavasi rāma cet ।
tad dinair eva no māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramaṃ padam ।। 

rāmaḥ

ātmajñānaprabodhāya śāstraṃ śāstravidāṃ vara ।
kiṃnāma tat pradhānaṃ syād yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ātmajñānapradhānānām idam eva mahāmate ।
śāstrāṇāṃ paramaṃ śāstraṃ mahārāmāyaṇābhidham ।। 

itihāsottamād asmāt paro bodhaḥ pravartate ।
sarveṣām itihāsānām ayaṃ sāra udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

śrute asmin vāṅmaye yasmāj jīvanmuktatvam akṣatam ।
udeti svayam evāta idam evātipāvanam ।। 

sthitam evāstam āyāti jagad dṛśyaṃ vicāraṇāt ।
yathā svapne parijñāte svapnārthād eva bhāvanā ।। 

yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit ।
imaṃ samastavijñānaśāstrakośaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ tasyodāracamatkṛteḥ ।
bālasyāpi paraṃ bodhaṃ buddhir eti na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

yasmai nedaṃ tv abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtodayāt ।
vicārayatu yat kiñcit sa śāstraṃ jñānavāṅmayam ।। 

jīvanmuktatvam asmiṃs tu śrute samanubhūyate ।
svayam eva yathā pīte nīrogatvaṃ varauṣadhe ।। 

śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre asmiñ śrotā vetty etad ātmanā ।
yathāvad idam asmābhir na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat ।। 

śāmyati saṃsṛtiduḥkham idaṃ te svātmavicāramahākathayaiva ।
no dhanadānatapaśśrutavedais tatkathanojjhitayatnaśatena ।। 

sacchāstranirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

taccittās tadgataprāṇā bodhayantaḥ parasparam ।
kathayantaś ca tan nityaṃ tuṣyanti ramayanti ye ।। 

teṣāṃ jñānaikaniṣṭhānām ātmajñānavicāraṇāt ।
sā jīvanmuktatodeti videhonmuktataiva yā ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahman videhamuktasya jīvanmuktasya lakṣaṇam ।
brūhi yena tathaivāhaṃ yate śāstradṛśā dhiyā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathāsthitam idaṃ yasya vyavahāravato api ca ।
astaṅgataṃ sthitaṃ vyoma sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

bodhaikaniṣṭhatāṃ yāto jāgarty eva suṣuptavat ।
ya āste vyavahartaiva sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukhaprabhā ।
yathāprāptasthiter yasya sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

yo jāgarti suṣuptastho yasya jāgran na vidyate ।
yasya nirvāsano bodhas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

rāgadveṣabhayādīnām anurūpaṃ carann api ।
yo antar vyomavad atyacchas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate ।
kurvato akurvato vāpi sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

yaś conmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ vidheḥ pralayasambhavau ।
paśyet trilokyāḥ khasamas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

bhoktaiva yo na bhoktaiva śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ ।
buddhas supta ivāste antas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

nityaṃ draṣṭaiva cādraṣṭā jīvann eva mṛtopamaḥ ।
vyavahartaiva śailābhas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ ।
harṣāmarṣabhayonmuktas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

śāntasaṃsārakalanaḥ kalāvān api niṣkalaḥ ।
yas sacitto api niścittas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

yas samastārthajāteṣu vyavahāry api śītalaḥ ।
parārtheṣv iva pūrṇātmā sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

jīvanmuktapadaṃ tyaktvā dehe kālavaśāt kṣate ।
cid yāty adehamuktatvaṃ pavano aspandatām iva ।। 

videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati ।
na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat ।। 

sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam ।
rudras sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmabhūḥ ।। 

khaṃ bhūtvā pavanaskandhān dhatte sarkṣasurāsurān ।
kulācalagaṇo bhūtvā lokapālapurāspadam ।। 

bhūmir bhūtvā bibhartīmāṃ lokasthitim akhaṇḍitām ।
tṛṇagulmalatā bhūtvā dadāti phalasantatim ।। 

bibhraj jalānalākārañ jvalati dravati drutaḥ ।
candro amṛtaṃ prasavati mṛtiṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam ।। 

tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavan ।
śūnyaṃ san vyomatām eti giris san rodhayaty alam ।। 

karoti jaṅgamaṃ cittve sthāvaraṃ sthāvarākrṭiḥ ।
bhūtvārṇavo valayati bhūstriyaṃ valayo yathā ।। 

paramārkavapur bhūtvā prakāśe antar visārayan ।
trijagattrasareṇvoghaṃ śāntam evāvatiṣṭhati ।। 

yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati ।
kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā ।। 

rāmaḥ

katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me ।
dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

muktir eṣocyate rāma brahmaitat samudāhṛtam ।
nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate dṛśyam ahantvattādisaṃyutam ।
sato apy asyāpy anutpattyā buddhayaitad avāpyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

videhamuktās trailokyaṃ sampadyante yadā tadā ।
manye te sargatām eva gatā vedyavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vidyate cet tribhuvanaṃ tat tattāṃ samprayāntu te ।
yatra trailokyaśabdārtho na sambhavati kaścana ।। 

tatra trilokatāṃ yātaṃ brahmety uktyarthadhīḥ kutaḥ ।
tasmān no sambhavaty anyā jagacchabdārthakalpanā ।। 

ananyac chāntam ābhāsamātram ākāśanirmalam ।
brahmaiva jagad ity eva satyaṃ satyāvabodhinaḥ ।। 

yathā hi hemakaṭake vicāryāpi na dṛśyate ।
kaṭakatvaṃ kvacin nāma ṛte nirmalahāṭakam ।। 

jalād ṛte payovīcau nāhaṃ paśyāmi kiñcana ।
vīcitvaṃ tvādṛśair dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu nāsty eva tatra hi ।। 

spandatvaṃ pavanād anyan na kadācana kutracit ।
spanda eva sadā vāyur jagat tasmān na vidyate ।। 

yathā śūnyatvam ākāśas tāpa eva marau jalam ।
teja eva yathāloko brahmaiva trijagat tathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

atyantābhāvasampattyā jagaddṛśyasya muktatā ।
yayodeti mune yuktyā tāṃ mamopadiśottamām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mithas sampannayor draṣṭṛdṛśyayor ekasaṅkṣaye ।
dvayābhāve sthitiṃ yāte nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

dṛśyasya jagatas tasmād atyantānudbhavo yathā ।
brahma cetthaṃ svabhāvasthaṃ budhyate vada me tathā ।। 

kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati ।
etasmiṃs tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bahukālam iyaṃ rūḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā ।
nūnaṃ vicāramantreṇa nirmūlam upaśāmyati ।। 

na śakyate jhagity eva samucchedayituṃ kṣaṇāt ।
samaprayatane hy adrau samārohāvarohaṇe ।। 

tasmād abhyāsayogena yuktyā nyāyopapattibhiḥ ।
jagadbhrāntir yathā śāmyet tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu ।। 

vadāmy ākhyāyikāṃ rāma yām imāṃ bodhasiddhaye ।
tāṃ cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān ।। 

athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ tava kathyate ।
yaḥ kilotpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate ।। 

iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā ।
ity utpattiprakaraṇe kathyate asmin mayādhunā ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ sasurāsurakinnaram ।। 

tan mahāpralaye prāpte rudrādipariṇāmini ।
bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati ।। 

tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam ।
anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ sat kiñcid avaśiṣyate ।। 

na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam ।
na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam ।। 

kim apy avyapadeśātma pūrṇāt pūrṇatarākrṭi ।
na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca ।। 

cinmātraṃ cetyarahitam anantam ajaraṃ śivam ।
anādimadhyaparyantaṃ yad anādhi nirāmayam ।। 

yasmiñ jagat prasphurati dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsavat ।
yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devas sadasadātmakaḥ ।। 

akarṇajihvo anāsātvaṅnetras sarvatra sarvadā ।
yaś śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati ।। 

sa eva sadasadrūpaṃ yenālokena lakṣyate ।
sargacitram anādyantaṃ kharūpaṃ cāpy arañjanam ।। 

ardhonmīlitadṛg bhrūbhūmadhyatārakavaj jagat ।
vyomātmaiva sadābhāsaṃ svarūpaṃ yo abhipaśyati ।। 

yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat ।
yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

jvalatas sarvato ajasraṃ cittasthālīṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ।
yasya cinmātradīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam ।। 

yaṃ vinārkādayo apy ete prakāśās timiropamāḥ ।
sati yasmin pravartante trijaganmṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ ।। 

saspande samudetīva nisspande antargateva ca ।
iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā ।। 

jagannirmāṇavilayavilāso vyāpako mahān ।
spandāspandātmako yasya svabhāvo nirmalo akṣayaḥ ।। 

spandāspandamayī yasya pavanasyeva sarvagā ।
sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ ।। 

sarvadaiva prabuddho yas supto yas sarvadaiva ca ।
na supto na prabuddhaś ca yas sarvatraiva sarvadā ।। 

yadaspandaś śivaṃ śāntaṃ yatspandas trijagatsthitiḥ ।
spandāspandavilāsātmā ya eko bharitākṛtiḥ ।। 

āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu ।
pratyakṣastho apy athāgrāhyaś śauklyaṃ śuklapaṭeṣv iva ।। 

mūkopamo api yo vaktā mantā yo apy upalopamaḥ ।
yo bhoktā nityatṛpto api kartā yaś cāpy akiñcana ।। 

yo anaṅgo api samastāṅgas sahasrakaralocanaḥ ।
nakiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat ।। 

nirindriyabalasyāpi yasyāśeṣendriyakriyāḥ ।
yasya nirmanaso apy etā manonirmāṇarītayaḥ ।। 

yadanālocanād bhānti saṃsāroragabhītayaḥ ।
yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadetayaḥ ।। 

sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ ।
sati yasmin pravartante citrehās spandapūrvikāḥ ।। 

yasmād ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ ।
taraṅgakaṇakallolavīcayo vāridher iva ।। 

sa evānyatayodeti yaḥ padārthaśatabhramaiḥ ।
kaṭakāṅgadakeyūranūpurair iva kāñcanam ।। 

yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo aham ete janāś ca ye ।
yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca ye ।। 

anyevāvyatiriktaiva saivāseva ca bhaṅgurā ।
payasīva taraṅgālī yasmin sphurati dṛśyabhūḥ ।। 

yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā ।
mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam ।। 

kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam ।
yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau ।। 

draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ madhye yad darśanaṃ sthitam ।
sādho tadavadhānena svātmānam avabudhyase ।। 

ajam ajaram ajāḍyaṃ śāśvataṃ brahma nityaṃ śivam amalam anādyaṃ vandhyavedyair anindyam ।
sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām anubhavanam avedyaṃ vedanaṃ vittvam antaḥ ।। 

paramakāraṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mahāpralayasampattau yad etad avaśiṣyate ।
bhavatv etad anākāraṃ nāma nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।। 

na śūnyaṃ katham etat syān na prakāśaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।
kathaṃ vā na tamorūpaṃ kathaṃ vā naiva khātmakam ।। 

kathaṃ vā naiva cidrūpaṃ jīvo vā na kathaṃ bhavet ।
kathaṃ na buddhitattvaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā na mano bhavet ।। 

kathaṃ vā na nakiñcit syāt kathaṃ vā sarvam ity api ।
anayā ca vacobhaṅgyā mama moha ivoditaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

viṣamo ayam ati praśno bhavatā samudāhṛtaḥ ।
bhinadmy enaṃ tv ayatnena naiśaṃ tama ivāṃśumān ।। 

mahākalpāntasampattau yat tat sad avaśiṣyate ।
tan nāma na yathā śūnyaṃ tad idaṃ kathyate śṛṇu ।। 

anutkīrṇā yathā stambhe saṃsthitā sālabhañjikā ।
tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatra tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam ।। 

ayam itthaṃ mahābhogo jagadākhyo avabhāsate ।
satyo bhavatv asatyo vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā ।। 

yathā na putrikāśūnyas stambho anutkīrṇasālikaḥ ।
tathā tāta jagad brahma tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam ।। 

saumyāmbhasi yathā vīcir na cāsti na ca nāsti ca ।
tathā jagad brahmaṇīdaṃ śūnyāśūnyapadaṃ gatam ।। 

deśakālādiśāntatvāt putrikāracanaṃ drume ।
sambhavaty ajadhātau tu kena nāntar vimuhyate ।। 

tat stambhaputrikādy etat paramārthajagatsthiteḥ ।
ekadeśena sadṛśam upamānaṃ na sarvataḥ ।। 

na kadācid udetīdaṃ parasmān na ca śāmyati ।
itthaṃrūpaṃ kevalaṃ sad brahma svātmani saṃsthitam ।। 

aśūnyāpekṣayā śūnyaśabdārthaparikalpanā ।
aśūnyatvāsambhavataś śūnyatāśūnyate kutaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇy ayaṃ prakāśo hi na sambhavati bhūtajaḥ ।
sūryānalendutārādi kutas tatra kilāvyaye ।। 

mahābhūtaprakāśānām abhāvas tama ucyate ।
mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ tu tenātra na tamaḥ kvacit ।। 

svānubhūtiprakāśo asya kevalaṃ vyomarūpiṇaḥ ।
yo antar asti sa tenaiva na tv anyenānubhūyate ।। 

muktaṃ tamaḥprakāśābhyām ity etad ajaraṃ padam ।
ākāśakośam evainaṃ viddhi kośaṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

bilvasya bilvasañjñasya yathā bhedo na kaścana ।
tatheha brahmajagator na manāg api bhinnatā ।। 

salile antar yathā vīcir mṛdo antar ghaṭako yathā ।
tathā yatra jagatsattā tat kathaṃ khātmakaṃ bhavet ।। 

mṛjjalādyupamānaśrīs sākārātrā samā na sā ।
brahma tv ākāśaviśadaṃ tasyāntassthaṃ tathaiva tat ।। 

tasmād yādṛk cidākāśam ākāśād api nirmalam ।
tadantassthaṃ tādṛg eva jagacchabdārthabhāg api ।। 

marice antar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktur na lakṣyate ।
cinmātratvaṃ parākāśe tathā cetyakalāṃ vinā ।। 

tasmāc cid apy acidrūpā cetyariktatayātmani ।
jagattā tādṛśy eveyaṃ tādṛṅmātrātmatāvaśā ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārās tanmayā eva netarat ।
yathāsthitam ato viśvaṃ suṣuptaṃ turyam eva vā ।। 

tena yogī suṣuptātmā vyavahāry api śāntadhīḥ ।
āste brahma nirābhāsaṃ sarvabhāsāṃ samudgakam ।। 

ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitas toye dravakramaḥ ।
anākṛtau tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ pare ।। 

pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati nirākārān nirākṛti ।
brahmaṇo viśvam ābhātaṃ tad viśvārthavivarjitam ।। 

pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati saṃsthitaṃ pūrṇam eva tat ।
ato viśvam anutpannaṃ yac cotpannaṃ tad eva tat ।। 

cetyāsambhavatas tasmin pade keva cidarthatā ।
āsvādakāsambhavato marice keva tīkṣṇatā ।। 

satyeveyam asatyaiva citeś cittoditā pare ।
abhāvāt pratibimbasya pratibimbārhatā kutaḥ ।। 

paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo apy aṇīyasaḥ ।
śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvād ativistṛtam ।
tad anādyantam ābhāsaṃ bhāsanīyavivarjitam ।। 

cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā ।
kathaṃ syāc cittatākārā vāsanānilarūpiṇī ।। 

cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā ।
na buddhitā na cittatvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ ।। 

evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam ।
asmaddṛṣṭyā sthitaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyam ākāśato adhikam ।। 

rāmaḥ

paramārthasya kiṃ rūpaṃ tasyānantacidākṛteḥ ।
punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇaṃ bodhavṛddhaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahāpralayasampattau sarvakāraṇakāraṇam ।
śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu ।। 

nāśayitvā svam ātmānaṃ manaso vṛttisaṅkṣaye ।
yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ ।। 

nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat ।
bhātīti bhāsanaṃ yat syāt tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ ।। 

citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ ।
cinmātraṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ yat tat kāraṇakāraṇam ।। 

aṅguṣṭhasyātha vāṅgulyā vātādyasparśane sati ।
jīvataś cetaso rūpaṃ yat tad paramam ātmanaḥ ।। 

asvapnāyā anantāyā ajaḍāyā ghanasthiteḥ ।
yad rūpaṃ ciracintāyās tat tadānagha śiṣyate ।। 

yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca ।
tasyācetyasya cidvyomnas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

acetyasyāmanaskasya jīvato yā kriyāvataḥ ।
syāt sthitis sā parā śāntā sattā tasyādyavastunaḥ ।। 

citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya vā ।
darśanasya ca yan madhyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

vedanasya prakāśasya dṛśyasya tamasas tathā ।
vedanaṃ yad anādyantaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

yato jagad udetīva nityānuditarūpy api ।
vibhinnavad ivābhinnaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmanaḥ ।। 

vyavahāraparasyāpi yat pāṣāṇavad āsanam ।
avyomna eva vyomatvaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam ।। 

vedyavedanavettṛtvarūpatrayam idaṃ punaḥ ।
yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam ।। 

vedyavedanavettṛtvaṃ yatredaṃ pratibimbati ।
abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam ।। 

manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyonmuktaṃ yad rūpaṃ syān mahāciteḥ ।
jaṅgame sthāvare vāpi tat sargānte avaśiṣyate ।। 

sthāvarāṇāṃ hi yad rūpaṃ tac ced bodhamayaṃ bhavet ।
manobuddhyādinirmuktaṃ tat pareṇa samaṃ bhavet ।। 

brahmārkaviṣṇuharaśakrasadāśivādiśāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste ।
śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam āśritena ।। 

mahākalpāntāvaśiṣṭaparamārthavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

itthaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram ।
mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati ।
kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam ।। 

rāmaḥ

vandhyāputro vyomavanaṃ naivāsti na bhaviṣyati ।
kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vandhyāputravyomavane yathā na staḥ kadācana ।
jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana ।। 

na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate ।
utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

vandhyāputranabhovṛkṣakalpanā tāvad asti hi ।
sā yathā nāśajanmādyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

phullasyātulabhus samyag ālakaiḥ kuru kolanam ।
niranvayā yathaivoktir jagatsattā tathaiva hi ।। 

yathā sauvarṇakaṭake dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam ।
kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare ।। 

ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat ।
jagattvaṃ brahmaṇi tathā nāsty evāpy upalabdhimat ।। 

kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt ।
pṛthag eva bhaved buddhaṃ jagan nāsti pare pade ।। 

yathā ca śaityaṃ śaśino na himād vyatiricyate ।
brahmaṇo na tathā sargo vidyate vyatirekavān ।। 

marunadyāṃ yathā toyaṃ dvitīyendau yathendutā ।
nāsty evaivaṃ jagan nāsti dṛṣṭam apy amalātmani ।। 

saṃvidvilocanāloko bhāty ayaṃ saṃvidambare ।
jagadākhye amale vyomni dṛṣṭimuktāvalī yathā ।। 

cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam ।
tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate ।। 

ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam ।
vartamāne api tan nāsti nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

kvāsambhavadbhūtajāḍyaṃ pṛṭhvyāder jaḍavastunaḥ ।
kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā ।। 

kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ nedaṃ tat kiñcanoditam ।
yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam ।। 

ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat ।
yaj jagad dṛśyate svapne saṃvitkacanam eva tat ।। 

saṃvitkacanam evāntar yathā svapnajagadbhramaḥ ।
sargādau brahmaṇi tathā jagatkacanam ātatam ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam ।
nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcit kadācana ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā ।
yathā prakāśa ābhāso brahmaiva trijagat tathā ।। 

yathā puram ivāste antar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi ।
tathā jagad ivābhāti svātmaiva paramātmani ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada ।
idaṃ dṛśyaviṣaṃ jātam asatsvapnānubhūtivat ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā ।
ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ ।। 

atyantāsambhavo yāvad buddho dṛśyasya nākṣayaḥ ।
tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam ।। 

dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam ।
tad dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpo bandho na śāmyati ।। 

yatra kvacana saṃsthasya svādarśasyeva cidgateḥ ।
pratibimbo lagaty eva sargasmṛtimayo hy ayam ।। 

ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyabhramābhāvāt tat sambhavati muktatā ।। 

rāmaḥ

tasmād asambhavanmukter mama protsārya yuktitaḥ ।
atyantāsambhavaṃ dṛśye kathayātmavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asad eva yathā bhāti jagatsargātmakaṃ tathā ।
śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te ।। 

vyavasāyakathāvākyair yāvat tan nānuvarṇitam ।
na viśrāmyati te tāvad dhṛdi pāṃsur yathā hrade ।। 

atyantābhāvam asyās tvaṃ jagatsargabhramasthiteḥ ।
buddhvaikadhyānaniṣṭhātmā vyavahāraṃ kariṣyasi ।। 

bhāvābhāvagrahotsargasthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ ।
dṛśas tvā vedhayiṣyanti na mahādrim iveṣavaḥ ।। 

sa eṣo asty eka evātmā na dvitīyāsti kalpanā ।
jagad atra yathotpannaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi rāghava ।। 

tasmād imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni yo hīdam aṅga sakale sakalaṃ mahātmā ।
rūpāvalokanamanomananaprakāśakośāspadaṃ svayam udeti ca līyate ca ।। 

paramārthavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasmāt paramāc chāntāt padāt paramapāvanāt ।
yathedam utthitaṃ viśvaṃ tac chṛṇūttamayā dhiyā ।। 

suṣuptaṃ svapnavad bhāti bhāti brahmaiva sargavat ।
sarvam ekaṃ ca tac chāntaṃ tatra tāvat kramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

tasyānantaprakāśātmarūpasyātatacinmaṇeḥ ।
sattāmātrātma kacanaṃ yad ajasraṃ svabhāvataḥ ।। 

tad ātmani svayaṃ kiñcic cetyatām iva gacchati ।
agṛhītārthakaṃ saṃvidīhāmarśanasūcakam ।। 

bhāvināmārthakalanaiḥ kiñcidūhitarūpakam ।
ākāśād aṇu śuddhaṃ ca sarvasmin bhāvibodhanam ।। 

tatas sā paramā sattā satītaś cetanonmukhī ।
cinnāmayogyā bhavati kiñcillabhyatayā tayā ।। 

ghanasaṃvedanāt paścād bhāvijīvādināmikā ।
sā bhavaty ātmakalanā yadā yāntī parāt padāt ।। 

svataikabhāvanāmātrasārā saṃsaraṇonmukhī ।
tadā vastusvabhāvena tanvas tiṣṭhanti tām imāḥ ।। 

samanantaram etasyāḥ khasattodeti śūnyatā ।
śabdādiguṇabījaṃ sā bhaviṣyadabhidhārthadā ।। 

ahantodeti tadanu saha vai kālasattayā ।
bhaviṣyadabhidhārthe te bījaṃ mukhyaṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

tasyāś śakteḥ parāyās tu svasaṃvedanamātrakam ।
etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ sad ivodeti visphurat ।। 

evamprāyātmikā sā cid bījaṃ saṅkalpaśākhinaḥ ।
tatrāpy ahaṅkārakaras sa tatspandatayā marut ।। 

cid ahantāvatī vyomaśabdatanmātrabhāvanāt ।
svato ghanībhūya śanaiḥ khatanmātraṃ bhavaty alam ।। 

bhāvināmārtharūpaṃ tad bījaṃ śabdaughaśākhinaḥ ।
padavākyapramāṇāḍhyavedavṛndavikāri tat ।। 

tasmād udeṣyaty akhilā jagacchrīś śabdarūpiṇaḥ ।
śabdaughanirmitārthaughapariṇāmavisāriṇī ।। 

cid evamparivārā sā jīvaśabdena kathyate ।
bhāviśabdārthajālena bījaṃ bhūtaughaśākhinaḥ ।। 

caturdaśavidhaṃ bhūtajātam āvalitāmbaram ।
jagajjaṭharayantraughaṃ prasariṣyati vai tataḥ ।। 

asamprāptābhidhāsārā cij jīvatvāt sphuradvapuḥ ।
yā saiva sparśatanmātraṃ bhāvanād bhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

pavanaskandhavistāraṃ bījaṃ sparśaikaśākhinaḥ ।
sarvabhūtakriyāspandas tasmāt samprasariṣyati ।। 

tatra yaś cidvilāsena prakāśo anubhavād bhavet ।
tejastanmātrakaṃ tattadbhaviṣyadabhidhārthadam ।। 

tat sūryādivijṛmbhābhir bījam ālokaśākhinaḥ ।
tasmād rūpavibhedena saṃsāraḥ prasariṣyati ।। 

bhavac caturṇām avatas tatas sata ivāsataḥ ।
svadanaṃ tasya saṅghasya rasatanmātram ucyate ।। 

bhāvivārivilāsātma tad bījaṃ rasaśākhinaḥ ।
anyo'nyāsvadanenāsmāt saṃsāraḥ prasariṣyati ।। 

bhaviṣyadgandhasaṅkalpanāmāsau kalanātmakā ।
saṅkalpātmā sasaugandhatanmātratvaṃ prayacchati ।। 

bhāvibhūgolakatvena bījam ākṛtiśākhinaḥ ।
sarvādhārātmanas tasmāt saṃsāraḥ prasariṣyati ।।
