citā vibhāvyamānāni tanmātrāṇi parasparam ।
svayaṃ pariṇatāny antar ambunīva nirantaram ।। 

tathaitāni vimiśrāṇi viviktāni punar yathā ।
na śuddhāny upalabhyante sarvanāśāntam eva hi ।। 

saṃvittimātrarūpāṇi sthitāni gaganodare ।
bhavanti vaṭajālāni yathā bījakaṇāntare ।। 

prasavaṃ paripaśyanti śataśākhaṃ sphuranti ca ।
paramāṇvantare mānti kṣaṇāt kalpībhavanti ca ।। 

vivartam eva dhāvanti nirvivartāni santi ca ।
cidveditāni sarvāṇi kṣaṇāt piṇḍībhavanti hi ।। 

tanmātragaṇam etat sā svasaṅkalpātmakaṃ citiḥ ।
vedanāvasare aṇvaugham anākāraiva paśyati ।। 

bījaṃ jagatsu nanu pañcakamātram asya bījaṃ parā vyavahitā citiśaktir ādyā ।
tajjaṃ tad eva bhavatīti sadānubhūtaṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam ato jagacchrīḥ ।। 

saṃsṛtibījopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parame brahmaṇi sphāre same samasamasthitau ।
anutpannanabhastejastamassattādikātmani ।। 

pūrvaṃ cetyatvakalanaṃ svacetyāṃśasya cetanāt ।
udeti cittvakalanaṃ citiśaktitvacetanāt ।। 

tato jīvatvakalanaṃ cetyasampoṣacetanāt ।
tato ahambhāvakalanaṃ cetyaikaparatāvaśāt ।। 

tato buddhitvakalanam ahantāpariṇāmataḥ ।
etad eva manastādiśabdatanmātrakādimat ।। 

aucchūnyād anyatanmātrabhāvanād bhūtarūpiṇaḥ ।
ayam itthaṃ mahāgulmo jagadādir vilokyate ।। 

jhagity eva krameṇeti svapne puram ivākṛtam ।
mahākāśamahāṭavyām udbhūyodbhūya naśyatām ।। 

jagatkarañjakuñjānāṃ bījam etad avāpajam ।
nāpekṣate kiñcid api kṣitivāryanilādikam ।। 

etac cidātmakaṃ paścāt kilorvyādi kariṣyati ।
svapnasaṃvitpuram iva cinmātrātmakam eva tat ।। 

jagadādyaṅkuraṃ yatratatrastham api muñcati ।
jagataḥ pañcakaṃ bījaṃ pañcakasya cid avyayā ।। 

yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ viddhi tasmād brahmamayaṃ jagat ।
evam eṣa mahākāśe sargādau pañcako gaṇaḥ ।। 

cicchaktyākāśabhūtātmā kalpito asti na vāstavaḥ ।
anenocchūnatām etya yad apīdaṃ vitanyate ।। 

tad apy ākāśarūpātma kalanātma na sanmayam ।
na kvacin nāma tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate ।। 

kharūpaṃ yad vikalpātma kathaṃ tat satyatām iyāt ।
atha cet pañcakaṃ brahma brahmātmakatayā tayā ।। 

tat pañcakavidhiprauḍho brahmaiva trijagadbhramaḥ ।
yathā sphurati sargādāv eṣa pañcakasambhavaḥ ।। 

tathaivādyeha bhūtatve yāti kāraṇatāṃ svayam ।
evaṃ na jāyate kiñcij jagaj jātaṃ ca lakṣyate ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpapuravad asat sad anubhūyate ।
brahmākāśaḥ parākāśo jīvākāśatvam ātmani ।। 

iti vetty avadātātmā pṛthvyādīnām asambhavāt ।
ity eṣa jīvaḥ kathito vyomni khātmā yathoditaḥ ।। 

jīvākāśas tv imaṃ dehaṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu ।
jīvākāśaḥ kham evāsau tasmiṃs tu paramāmbare ।। 

atra tejaḥkaṇo asmīti svayaṃ cetati cintayā ।
tam evocchūnam iva sad bhāvayaty ātmanāmbare ।। 

asad eva sadākāraṃ saṅkalpendur yathā śaśam ।
tam eva bhāvayan draṣṭṛdṛśyarūpatayā sthitaḥ ।
eka eva dvitām eti svapne svamṛtiboddhṛvat ।। 

kiñcit sthaulyam ivādatte tatas tārakatāṃ vidan ।
yathābhāvitvam atrārthabhāvitāc citsvarūpataḥ ।। 

kha eva khātmā satato apy ayaṃ so aham iti svayam ।
cittvāt pratyayam ādatte svapne tvam iva pānthatām ।। 

tārakākāram ākāraṃ bhāvidehābhidhaṃ tataḥ ।
bhāvayan yāti tadbhāvaṃ cittaṃ cetyārthatām iva ।। 

parityajyeva tad bāhyaṃ tatas tārakakoṭare ।
antar bhāti bahisstho api parvato makure yathā ।। 

kūpasaṃsthaṃ yathā dehaṃ samudgakagataṃ ca vā ।
svapnasaṅkalpayos saṃvid vetty evaṃ jīvako aṇuke ।। 

kharūpatārakāntasstho jīvo yac cetati svayam ।
tad etad buddhicittādi jñānasantānarūpakam ।। 

jīvākāśas tatas tatra tārakākāśakośagaḥ ।
prekṣe aham iti bhāvena draṣṭuṃ prasaratīva khe ।। 

tato randhradvayeneva bhāvibāhyābhidhaṃ punaḥ ।
yena paśyati tan netrayugmaṃ nāmnā bhaviṣyati ।। 

yena spṛśati sāsya tvag yac chṛṇoti śrutis tu sā ।
yena jighrati tad ghrāṇaṃ sa svam ātmani paśyati ।। 

tat tasya svadanaṃ paścād rasanāmnollasiṣyati ।
yat spandati sa tad vāyuceṣṭāḥ karmendriyavrajam ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārajātam ity eva bhāvayan ।
ātivāhikadehātmā tiṣṭhaty ambaram ambare ।। 

evam ucchūnatāṃ tasmin bhāvayaṃs tejasaḥ kaṇe ।
asatyaṃ satyasaṅkāśaṃ brahmāste jīvaśabdadhṛt ।। 

itthaṃ sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ ।
ātivāhikadehātmā cittadehāmbarākṛtiḥ ।। 

svakalpanāta ākāram aṇḍasaṃsthaṃ prapaśyati ।
kaścij jalagataṃ vetti kaścit samrāṭsvarūpiṇam ।। 

bhāvibrahmāṇḍakalanaṃ paśyaty anubhavaty api ।
ātmagarbhagṛhaṃ cittād yathā saṅkalpitātmakaḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyakalanāvedanaṃ sa tat ।
bhāvayañ śabdanirmātā śabdair badhnāti kalpitaiḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadeho asāv ity asatye jagadbhrame ।
asatya eva kacati svapneṣūḍḍayanaṃ yathā ।। 

ity anudbhūta evāsau svayambhūs svayam utthitaḥ ।
ātivāhikadehātmā prabhur ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।। 

etasminn api sampanne brahmāṇḍākāriṇi bhrame ।
na kiñcid api sampannaṃ na ca jātaṃ na dṛśyate ।। 

tad brahmākāśam ākāśam eva sthitam aśaṅkitam ।
saṅkalpanagarākāram etat sad api naiva sat ।। 

anirmitam anaṅgaṃ ca etad khe citram utthitam ।
akṛtaṃ cānubhūtaṃ ca na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam ।। 

mahākalpe vimuktatvād brahmādīnām asaṃśayam ।
smṛtir na prāktanī kācit kāraṇaṃ sā svayambhuvaḥ ।। 

tena yādṛk svayambhūs syāt tādṛk tajjam idaṃ smṛtam ।
anādyanubhavas tv itthaṃ ya evāvanitādibhiḥ ।। 

svapnānubhūtaṃ pṛthvyādi prabodhe yādṛśaṃ bhavet ।
smṛtaṃ sad vyomamātrātma sarvadaivedṛśaṃ jagat ।। 

yatra yatra yathā toye dravatvaṃ nāma vidyate ।
tatra tatra tathā nānyas sargo asti paramātmani ।। 

sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ prauḍhā sarga evam ayaṃ sthitaḥ ।
brahmāṇḍaṃ nāma bhāty eva vyomātmaivāpanirmitiḥ ।। 

dṛśyam evam idaṃ śāntaṃ khātma nirbhitti nirbhramam ।
nirādhāraṃ nirādheyam advaitaṃ caikyavarjitam ।। 

jagatsaṃvidi jātāyām api jātaṃ na kiñcana ।
paramākāśam āśūnyam accham eva vyavasthitam ।। 

sarvasaṃhārakhe tv āsīd yad eva tad avasthitam ।
nādheyaṃ tatra nādhāro na ca dṛśyaṃ na draṣṭṛtā ।। 

brahmāṇḍaṃ nāsti na brahmā na ca brahmāṇḍikā kvacit ।
na jagan nāsti jagatī śāntam evākhilaṃ sthitam ।। 

brahmaiva kacati svaccham ittham ātmātmanātmani ।
cittvād dravatvāt salilam ivāvartatayātmani ।। 

asad evedam ābhāti sad ivehānubhūyate ।
vinaśyaty asad evānte svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

atha vājasvarūpatvāt sad evedam anāmayam ।
akhaṇḍitam anādyantaṃ jñānamātrāmbarodaram ।। 

ākāśa eva parame prathamaḥ prajeśo nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati śūnyatayā samānaḥ ।
sa hy ātivāhikavapur na tu bhūtarūpī pṛthvyādi tena na sad asti yadā na jātam ।। 

svayambhūtpattivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

itthaṃ jagadahantādi dṛśyajātaṃ na kiñcana ।
ajātatvāc ca nāsty eva yac cāsti param eva tat ।। 

paramākāśa evāsau jīvatāṃ cetati svayam ।
nisspandāmbhodhijaṭhare salilaṃ spandatām iva ।। 

ākāśarūpam ajahad eva vettīva dṛśyatām ।
svapnasaṅkalpaśailādāv iva cidvṛttir āntarī ।। 

pṛthvyādirahito deho yo virāḍātmano mahān ।
ātivāhika evāsau cinmātrācchanabhomayaḥ ।। 

akṣayasvapnaśailābhas sthirasvapnapuropamaḥ ।
citrakṛtsthitacittasthacitrasainyasamākṛtiḥ ।। 

anikhātamahāstambhaputrikaughasamopamaḥ ।
brahmākāśe anikhātātmā svastambhe sālabhañjikā ।। 

ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ ।
prāktanānāṃ svakāryāṇām abhāvād apakāraṇaḥ ।। 

mahāpralayaparyanteṣv ādyāḥ kila pitāmahāḥ ।
mucyante sarva evātaḥ prāktanaṃ karma teṣu kim ।। 

moktavya eva kuḍyātmā dṛśyo adṛśyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ ।
na ca dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca ।। 

praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ sarveṣām eṣa eva saḥ ।
asmād udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakād iva ।। 

saṅkalpa eva saṅkalpāt kilaiti kṣmādivarjitaḥ ।
kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyas svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

asmād eva praticchandāj jīvās samprasaranty amī ।
sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve kāryakāraṇam ।
ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ ।। 

brahmaivādyo virāḍātmā virāḍātmaiva sargatā ।
jīvākāśas sa evetthaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthvyādy asad yataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kiṃ syāt parimito jīvarāśir āho anantakaḥ ।
āhosvid asty anantātmā jīvapiṇḍo acalopamaḥ ।। 

dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ ।
kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ ।। 

iti me bhagavan brūhi jīvajālavinirṇayam ।
jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eka eva na jīvo asti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ ।
śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayātītīva te vacaḥ ।। 

na jīvo asti na jīvānāṃ rāśayas santi rāghava ।
na caikaḥ parvataprakhyo jīvapiṇḍo asti kaścana ।। 

jīvaśabdārthakalanās samastakalanānvitāḥ ।
na ca kāścana santīti niścayo astu tavācalaḥ ।। 

śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvataḥ ।
tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām ।। 

cinmātrānukrameṇaiva sampraphultāṃ latām iva ।
nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati ।। 

jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api ।
svasattāṃ prakacantīṃ tāṃ niyojayati vedane ।। 

sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ ।
abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate ।। 

yathāndhakāro dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ praṇaśyati ।
na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi ।। 

evaṃ brahmaiva jīvātmā nirvibhāgo nirantaraḥ ।
sarvaśaktir anādyantaṃ mahācitsārarūpadhṛt ।। 

sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā ।
vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

evam etat kathaṃ brahmann ekajīvecchayākhilāḥ ।
jagajjīvā na yujyante mahājīvaikatāvaśāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahājīvātma tad brahma sarvaśaktimayātmakam ।
sthitaṃ yatheccham eveha nirvibhāgaṃ nirantaram ।। 

yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā ced ato dvitvam udeti tat ।। 

paścād dvitvavibhaktānāṃ svaśaktīnāṃ prakalpitaḥ ।
anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ ।। 

śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ ।
taṃ vinā nodayo anyāsāṃ pradhānecchaiva rohati ।। 

yasyā jīvābhidhānāyāś śaktyā yecchā phalaty asau ।
pradhānaśaktiniyamānuṣṭhānena vinā tu na ।। 

pradhānaśaktiniyamas supratiṣṭho bhaven na cet ।
tat phalaṃ śaktyaśaktitvān nehitānāṃ kvacid bhavet ।। 

evaṃ brahma mahājīvo vidyate antādivarjitaḥ ।
jīvat koṭimahākoṭībhavaty atha na kiñcana ।। 

cetyasaṃvedanāj jīvo bhavaty āyāti saṃsṛtim ।
tadasaṃvedanād rūpaṃ śamam āyāti saṃsṛteḥ ।। 

evaṃ kaniṣṭhajīvānāṃ jyeṣṭhajīvakriyākramaiḥ ।
samudety ādyajīvatvaṃ tāmrāṇām iva hematā ।। 

atrānante parākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇo apy asan ।
khātmaiva sann ivodeti ciccamatkaraṇātmakaḥ ।। 

svayam eva camatkāro yas samāgamyate citā ।
bhaviṣyannāmadehādi tad ahambhāvanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

cito yas syāc cidālokas tanmayatvād anantakaḥ ।
sa eṣa bhuvanābhoga iti tasyāḥ prabimbati ।। 

pariṇāmavikārādiśabdais saiva cid avyayā ।
tādṛgrūpyād abhedyāpi svaśaktyaiva vibudhyate ।। 

avicchinnavilāsātma svato yat svadanaṃ citaḥ ।
acetyasya prakāśasya jagad ity eva tat sthitam ।। 

ākāśād api sūkṣmaiṣā yā śaktir vitatā citaḥ ।
sā svabhāvata evainām ahantāṃ paripaśyati ।। 

ātmany ātmātmanaivāsyā yat prasphurati vārivat ।
jagadantam ahantāṇuṃ tad evāsau prapaśyati ।। 

camatkārakarī cāru yac camatkurute citiḥ ।
iyaṃ svātmani tasyaiva jagannāma tataṃ kṛtam ।। 

citaś cittvam ahaṅkāras saiva rāghava kalpanā ।
tanmātrādi cid evāto dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite ।। 

jīvahetāv asantyāge tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti santyaja ।
śeṣaṃ sadasator madhye bhavety arthātmako bhavet ।। 

citā yathādau kalitā svasattā sā tathoditā ।
abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnas sattāsatte atha vedmy aham ।। 

citkhaṃ khaṃ jagadīhāḥ khaṃ kham abdhivibudhācalāḥ ।
khākāraciccamatkārarūpatvān nānyad asti hi ।। 

yo yadvilāsas tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate ।
api sāvayavāt tattvāt kaivānavayave kathā ।। 

citer nityam acetyāyāś cin nāsty avitatākṛteḥ ।
yad rūpaṃ jagato rūpaṃ tat tatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

mano buddhir ahaṅkāro bhūtāni girayo diśaḥ ।
iti paryāyaracanā citas tattvāj jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

citaś cittvaṃ jagad viddhi nājagac cittvam asti hi ।
ajagattvād acic cit syād bhāvābhedāj jagat kutaḥ ।। 

citer maricabījasya nijā yāntaś camatkṛtiḥ ।
saivaiṣā jīvatanmātramātraṃ jagad iti sthitā ।। 

cittvāt svaśaktikacanaṃ yad ahambhāvanaṃ citeḥ ।
jīvas spandātmakarmātmā bhaviṣyadabhidho hy asau ।। 

yac cic cittvena kalanaṃ svasampādyābhidhārthadik ।
vyavacchedavikārais tad bhidyate ato na vidyate ।। 

citspandarūpiṇor asti na bhedaḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ।
spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ ।। 

jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca ।
manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṃ hi citprakāśacchaṭā jagat ।
kāryakāraṇatāditvaṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate ।। 

acchedyo aham adāhyo aham akledyo aśoṣya eva ca ।
nityas satatagas sthāṇur acalo aham iti sthitam ।। 

vivadante yathā hy atra vivadantu tathā bhramaiḥ ।
bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ ।। 

dṛśye mūrte ajñasaṃrūḍhe vikārādi pṛthag bhavet ।
nāmūrte tajjñakacite citkhe sadasadātmani ।। 

cittaruś cetyarasataś śaktīḥ kālādināmikāḥ ।
tanoty ākāśaviśadāś cinmadhuśrīs svamañjarīḥ ।। 

svayaṃ vicitraṃ sphurati citkarmukam anāhatam ।
svayaṃ vicitraṃ kacati cidratnam apakāraṇam ।। 

svayaṃ vilakṣaṇaspandaś cidvāyur ajaḍātmakaḥ ।
svayaṃ vicitravalanaṃ cidvāri na nikhātagam ।। 

svayaṃ vicitradhātūccaiś cicchṛṅgam apanirmitam ।
svayaṃ citrarasollāsā cijjyotsnā satatoditā ।। 

svayaṃ sadaiva prakaṭaś cidāloko amalātmakaḥ ।
svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ ।। 

svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā ।
svayaṃ spandi tathāspandi cittvāc citimahānabhaḥ ।। 

citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca ।
cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca ।। 

cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca ।
cinmārutaghanaspando jagad asti na cāsti ca ।। 

cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca ।
cidarkālokadivaso jagad asti na cāsti ca ।। 

citkajjalarajaśśailaparamāṇur jagadbhramaḥ ।
cidagnyauṣṇyaṃ jagallekhā jagac cicchaṅkhaśuklatā ।। 

jagac cicchailajaṭharaṃ cijjaladravatā jagat ।
jagac cidikṣumādhuryaṃ citkṣīrasnigdhatā jagat ।। 

jagac ciddhimaśītatvaṃ cijjvālājvalanaṃ jagat ।
jagac citsarpiṣi sneho vīciś citsarito jagat ।। 

jagac citkṣaudramādhuryaṃ jagac citkanakāṅgadam ।
jagac citpuṣpasaugandhyaṃ cillatāgraphalaṃ jagat ।। 

citsattaiva jagatsattā jagatsattaiva cidvapuḥ ।
atra bhedavikārādi na khe malam iva sthitam ।। 

itīdaṃ sanmayatvena sad asad bhuvanatrayam ।
avikalpyatadātmatvāt sattāsatte tad eva vā ।। 

avayavāvayavitāśabdārthau śaśaśṛṅgavat ।
anubhūtyapalāpāya kalpitau yair dhig astu tān ।। 

na vidyate jagad yatra sādridyūrvīnadīśvaram ।
cidekatvāt prasaṅgas syāt kas tatretaravibhrame ।। 

śilāhṛdayapīnāpi svākāśaviśadaiva cit ।
dhatte antar akhilaṃ śāntaṃ sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā ।। 

padārthanikarākāśe tvam ākāśalavopamaḥ ।
tvattāmattātmatātattāsattollekhā na santi te ।। 

pallavāntaralekhaughasanniveśavad ātatam ।
anyānanyātmakam idaṃ dhatte antaś cit svabhāvataḥ ।। 

samastakāraṇaughānāṃ kāraṇādipitāmaham ।
svabhāvato akāraṇātma cittvaṃ viddhy anubhūtitaḥ ।। 

na cāsattvam acetyāyāś cito vācāpi sidhyati ।
yad asti tad udetīti dṛṣṭaṃ bījād ivāṅkuram ।। 

gaganam iva suśūnyabhedam asti tribhuvanam aṅga mahācito antar asyāḥ ।
paramapadamayaṃ samastadṛśyaṃ tv idam iti niścayavān bhavānubhūteḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

brahmatvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jagad ākāśam evedaṃ yathā hi vyomni mauktikam ।
vimale bhāti khātmaiva jagac cidgagane tathā ।। 

anutkīrṇaiva bhātīva trijagatsālabhañjikā ।
citstambhe na ca sotkīrṇā na cotkartātra vidyate ।। 

samudre antar jalāspandās svabhāvād acyutā api ।
vidi vedyā bhavantīva pare dṛśyavidas tathā ।। 

jalāntargatasūryābhājālakāracanāny api ।
jagadbhānaṃ prati sthūlāny aṇuṃ prati yathācalāḥ ।। 

jagadbhānam abhānābhaṃ brahmaṇo avyatirekataḥ ।
jalasūryāṃśujālaṃ tu vyatirekānubhūtidam ।। 

anubhūtāny apīmāni jagati vyomarūpiṇi ।
pṛthvyādīni na santy eva svapnasaṅkalpayor iva ।। 

piṇḍagrahe sad ity asmin vijñānākāśarūpiṇi ।
marunadyāṃ jalam iva na sambhavati kutracit ।। 

jagaty apiṇḍagrāhe asmin gandharvanagaropame ।
marau sarid ivābhāti dṛśyatā bhrāntirūpiṇī ।। 

svapnādriṇeva jagatā tulādeśau na kaucana ।
pūritau kalanonmuktā dṛśyaśrīr vyoma kevalam ।। 

varjayitvājñavijñātajagacchabdārthabhāvanam ।
jagadbrahmakhaśabdānām arthe nāsty eva bhinnatā ।। 

idaṃ tv acetyacinmātrabhānor bhānaṃ nabhaḥ prati ।
tathā sūkṣmaṃ yathā meghaṃ prati saṅkalpavāridaḥ ।। 

yathā svapnapuraṃ svacchaṃ jāgratpuravaraṃ prati ।
tathā jagad idaṃ svacchaṃ saṅkalpitajagat prati ।। 

tasmād acetyacidrūpaṃ jagad vyomaiva kevalam ।
śūnyau vyomajagacchabdau paryāyau viddhi cinmayau ।। 

tasmān na kiñcid utpannaṃ jagadādīha dṛśyakam ।
anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yathāsthitam avasthitam ।। 

jagad eva mahākāśaṃ cidākāśam abhittimat ।
tad deśasyāṇumātrasya tulāyāś cāprapūrakam ।। 

ākāśarūpam evācchaṃ piṇḍagrahavivarjitam ।
vyomni vyomamayaṃ citraṃ saṅkalpapuravat sthitam ।। 

atredaṃ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।
nissandeho yathaiṣo arthaś citte viśrāntim eti te ।। 

rāmaḥ

sadbodhavṛddhaye brahman samāsena vadāśu me ।
maṇḍapākhyānam akhilaṃ yena bodho vivardhate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

abhūd asmin mahīpīṭhe kulapadmo vikāsavān ।
padmo nāma nṛpaś śrīmān bahuputro atikośavān ।। 

maryādāpālane ambhodhir dviṣattimirabhāskaraḥ ।
kāntākumudinīcandro doṣatṛṇahutāśanaḥ ।। 

merur vibudhavṛndānāṃ yaśaścandrodbhavārṇavaḥ ।
saras sadguṇahaṃsānāṃ kalākamalabhāskaraḥ ।। 

śātravāmbhodapavano mānamātaṅgakesarī ।
samastavidyādayitas sarvāścaryaguṇākaraḥ ।। 

śūrārisāgarakṣobhavilasanmandarācalaḥ ।
vilāsapuṣpaughamadhus saubhāgyakusumāyudhaḥ ।। 

līlālatālāsyamarut sāhasotsavakeśavaḥ ।
saujanyakairavaśaśī durlīlālatikānalaḥ ।। 

tasyāsīt subhagā bhāryā līlā nāma vilāsinī ।
sarvasaubhāgyavalitā kamalevoditāvanau ।। 

sarvasampattilalitā līlāmadhurabhāṣiṇī ।
sānandamandavalitā dvitīyendūdayasmitā ।। 

alakālimanohārivadanāmbhojaśālinī ।
śītāṅgī karṇikāgaurī jaṅgameva sarojinī ।। 

latāvilāsakundaughahāsinī rasaśālinī ।
pravālahastā puṣpāḍhyā madhuśrīr iva dehinī ।। 

avadātatanuḥ puṇyā janatāhlādadāyinī ।
gaṅgeva gāṃ gatā devanadī haṃsavilāsinī ।। 

tasya bhūtalapuṣpeṣos sakalāhlādadāyinaḥ ।
paricaryāṃ ciraṃ kartum anyā ratir ivoditā ।। 

udvigne prodvignā muditā mudite samākulākulite ।
pratibimbasamā kāntā saṅkruddhe kevalaṃ bhītā ।। 

jagaty ākāśapratipādanāya maṇḍapopākhyāne rājavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūtalāpsarasā sārdham ananyavanitāpatiḥ ।
akṛtrimapremarasaṃ sa reme kāntayā tayā ।। 

udyānavanagulmeṣu tamālagahaneṣu ca ।
puṣpamaṇḍapatalpeṣu latāvalayasadmasu ।। 

puṣpāntaḥpuraśayyāsu puṣpasambhāravīthiṣu ।
vasantodyānadolāsu krīḍāpuṣkariṇīṣu ca ।। 

candanadrumaṣaṇḍeṣu santānakataleṣu ca ।
kadambanimbageheṣu pāribhadrodareṣu ca ।। 

śailakandarakaccheṣu vātāyanapureṣu ca ।
sarittaṭakaṭapreṣu vāraṇoparisadmasu ।। 

grīṣme tuṣāraharmyeṣu latāmaṇḍapakeṣu ca ।
hemamandiravṛkṣeṣu muktāmāṇikyabhittiṣu ।। 

vikasatkundamandāramakarandasugandhiṣu ।
vasantavanajāleṣu kūjatkokilamāliṣu ।। 

nānāratnatṛṇānāṃ ca sthaleṣu mṛdudīptiṣu ।
nirjhareṣu tarattāraśīkarāsāravarṣiṣu ।। 

śailānāṃ hemamāṇikyaśilāphalahakeṣu ca ।
devarṣimunigeheṣu dūrapuṇyāśrameṣu ca ।। 

kumudvatīṣu phullāsu smerāsu nalinīṣu ca ।
vanasthalīṣu phullāsu phullāsūtpalinīṣu ca ।। 

prahelikābhir ākhyānais tathaivākṣaramuṣṭibhiḥ ।
aṣṭāpadair bahūddyotais tathā gūḍhacaturthakaiḥ ।। 

nāṭakākhyāyikābhiś ca ślokair bindumatībhramaiḥ ।
deśabhāṣāvibhāgaiś ca nagaragrāmaceṣṭitaiḥ ।। 

sragdāmamālyavalanair nānābharaṇayojanaiḥ ।
līlāvilolacalanair vicitrarasabhājanaiḥ ।। 

ārdrakramukakarpūratāmbūlīdalacarvaṇaiḥ ।
samālambhanalīlābhir dolārohaṇavibhramaiḥ ।। 

gṛhe kusumadolābhir anyo'nyāndolanakramaiḥ ।
phullapuṣpalatākuñjadehagopanakharvaṇaiḥ ।। 

nauyānayugyahastyaśvadāntoṣṭrādigamāgamaiḥ ।
jalakelivilāsena parasparasamukṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

nṛttagītakalālāsyatāṇḍavodbhaṭavṛttibhiḥ ।
saṅgītakais saṅkathanair vīṇāmurajavādanaiḥ ।। 

udyāneṣu sarittīravṛkṣeṣu vanavīthiṣu ।
antaḥpureṣu harmyeṣu teṣu teṣu tathā tathā ।। 

sā bālā sukhasaṃvṛddhā tasya praṇayinī priyā ।
ekadā cintayām āsa śubhasaṅkalpaśālinī ।। 

prāṇebhyo api priyo bhartā mamaiṣa jagatīpatiḥ ।
yauvanollāsalakṣmīvān kathaṃ syād ajarāmaraḥ ।। 

bhartrānena sahottuṅgastanī kusumasadmasu ।
kathaṃ svairaṃ ciraṃ kāntā rameyābdaśatāny aham ।। 

tathā yateya kramatas tapojapayamehitaiḥ ।
rajanīśarucī rājā yathā syād ajarāmaraḥ ।। 

jñānavṛddhāṃs tapovṛddhān vidyāvṛddhān ahaṃ dvijān ।
pṛcchāmi tāvan maraṇaṃ kathaṃ na syān nṛṇām iti ।। 

athānāyyāśu sampūjya dvijān papraccha sānatā ।
amaratvaṃ kathaṃ viprā bhaved iti punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

viprāḥ

tapojapayamair devi samastās siddhasiddhayaḥ ।
samprāpyante amaratvaṃ tu na kadācana labhyate ।। 

ity ākarṇya dvijamukhāc cintayām āsa sā punaḥ ।
idaṃ svaprajñayaivāśu bhītā priyaviyogataḥ ।। 

maraṇaṃ bhartur agre me yadi daivād bhaviṣyati ।
tat sarvaduḥkhanirmuktā saṃsthāsye sukham ātmani ।। 

atha varṣasahasreṇa bhartādau cen mariṣyati ।
tat kariṣye tathā yena jīvo gehān na yāsyati ।। 

udbhramadbhartṛjīve asmin nije śuddhāntamaṇḍape ।
bhartrāvalokitā nityaṃ nivatsyāmi yathāsukham ।। 

adyaivārabhyaitadarthaṃ devīṃ jñaptiṃ sarasvatīm ।
japopavāsaniyamair ātoṣaṃ pūjayāmy aham ।। 

iti niścitya sā nātham anuktvaiva varāṅganā ।
yathāśāstraṃ cacārograṃ tapo niyamam āsthitā ।। 

trirātrasya trirātrasya paryante kṛtapāraṇā ।
devadvijaguruprājñavidvatpūjāparāyaṇā ।। 

snānadānatapodhyānanityodyuktaśarīrikā ।
sarvāstikyasadācārakāriṇī kleśabhāriṇī ।। 

yathākālaṃ yathodyogaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathākramam ।
toṣayām āsa bhartāram aparijñātatatsthitim ।। 

trirātraśatam evaṃ sā bālā niyamaśālinī ।
anāratataponiṣṭham atiṣṭhat kaṣṭaceṣṭayā ।। 

trirātrāṇāṃ śatenātha pūjitā pratimām itā ।
tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśīdam uvāca tām ।। 

sarasvatī

nirantareṇa tapasā bhartṛbhaktyatiśāyinā ।
parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam ।। 

rājñī

jaya janmajarājvālādāhadoṣaśaśiprabhe ।
jaya hārdāndhakāraughanivāraṇaraviprabhe ।। 

amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām ।
idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham ।। 

ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike ।
asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt ।। 

dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye ahaṃ yadā yadā ।
darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam ।। 

ity ākarṇya jaganmātā tathāstv evam iti kṣaṇāt ।
uktvāntardhānam agamad utthāyormir ivārṇave ।। 

atha sā rājamahiṣī parituṣṭeṣṭadevatā ।
śrutagīteva hariṇī babhūvānandadhāriṇī ।। 

parāvṛttyugrakaṭake dināre varṣadaṇḍake ।
kṣaṇanābhau spandamaye kālacakre vahaty api ।। 

antardhim ājagāmāsyāḥ patyus tac cetanaṃ tanau ।
sandṛśyamāna evāśu śuṣkaparṇe raso yathā ।। 

raṇakhaṇḍitadehe asmin mṛte antaḥpuramaṇḍape ।
nirjalā nalinīvāsau parāṃ mlānim upāyayau ।। 

viṣoṣṇaśvasanastabdhasakalādharapallavā ।
prāpa sā maraṇāvasthāṃ malayādhityakām iva ।। 

prāpa sā tamasāndhatvaṃ tasmin maraṇam āgate ।
dīpajvālālave kṣīṇe sadmaśrīr iva bhūṣitā ।। 

kārśyam āpa kṣaṇenāsau bālā virasatāṃ gatā ।
yathā srotasvinī srotaḥkṣaye kṣāmavidhūsarā ।। 

kṣipram ākrandinī kṣipraṃ maunāsaktā viyoginī ।
babhūva cakravākīva māninī maraṇonmukhī ।। 

atha tām atimātravihvalāṃ sakṛd ākāśabhavā sarasvatī ।
śapharīṃ hradaśoṣavihvalāṃ prathamā vṛṣṭir ivānvakampata ।। 

maṇḍapopākhyāne rājñīparidevanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

sarasvatī

śavībhūtam imaṃ vatse bhartāraṃ puṣpakambalaiḥ ।
ācchādya sthāpayeha tvaṃ punar enam avāpsyasi ।। 

puṣpāṇi mlānim eṣyanti no na caiṣa vinaṅkṣyati ।
bhūyaś ca tava bhartāyam acireṇa bhaviṣyati ।। 

etadīyaś ca jīvo asāv ākāśaviśadas tava ।
na nirgamiṣyati kṣipram apy antaḥpuramaṇḍapāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ṣaṭpadaśreṇinayanā samākarṇyeti bandhubhiḥ ।
sā samāśvāsitāgatya payobhir iva padminī ।। 

patiṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva puṣpapūrapragopitam ।
kiñcid āśvāsitātiṣṭhat kṛpaṇeva nidhāninī ।। 

tasminn eva dine saikā tasmiñ śuddhāntamaṇḍape ।
ardharātraṃ parijane sarvasmin nidrayā hṛte ।। 

jñaptiṃ bhagavatīṃ devīṃ śuddhajñānamahādhiyā ।
duḥkhād āhvāyayām āsa sovaca samupetya tām ।। 

sarasvatī

kiṃ smṛtāsmi tvayā vatse dhatse kim iti śokitām ।
saṃsāre bhrāntayo bhānti mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvan mudhā ।। 

līlā

kva mamāmba sthito bhartā kiṃ karoty atha kīdṛśaḥ ।
samīpaṃ naya māṃ tasya naikā śaknomi jīvitum ।। 

devī

cittākāśaṃ cidākāśam ākāśaṃ ca tṛtīyakam ।
tebhyaś śūnyatamaṃ viddhi cidākāśaṃ varānane ।। 

śūnyam evedam akhilaṃ jagat tatra vyavasthitam ।
ahaṃ tvam iti dṛśyātma nānānānaiva nirvapuḥ ।। 

abhittimayam evedaṃ kalpanārūpitaṃ jagat ।
jñaptibhāmātrakaṃ deśatulāpūraṇavarjitam ।। 

tac cidākāśakośātmā cidākāśaikyabhāvanāt ।
avidyamānam apy āśu dṛśyate athānubhūyate ।। 

deśād deśāntaraprāptau saṃvido madhyam eva yat ।
nimeṣeṇa cidākāśaṃ tad viddhi varavarṇini ।। 

tasmin nirastaniśśeṣasaṅkalpasthitim eṣi cet ।
sarvātmakapadaṃ tat tad dṛṣṭvā prāpnoṣy asaṃśayam ।। 

atyantābhāvasaṃvittyā jagatas tv etad āpyate ।
nānyathā madvareṇāśu tvaṃ tu prāpsyasi sundari ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā sā yayau devī divyam ātmīyam āspadam ।
līlā tu līlayaivāsīn nirvikalpasamādhibhāk ।। 

tat tatyāja nimeṣeṇa sāntaḥkaraṇapañjaram ।
svadehaṃ kham ivoḍḍīnā nijanīḍaṃ vihaṅgamī ।। 

dadarśa ca svabhartāraṃ tasminn evālayāmbare ।
saṃsthitaṃ pṛthivīpālam āsthāne bahurājake ।। 

siṃhāsanasamārūḍhaṃ jaya jīveti saṃstutam ।
prastutaṃ maṇḍalānekakāryam āhartum ādṛtam ।। 

patākāmañjarīkīrṇarājadhānīgṛhasthitam ।
pūrvadvārasthitāsaṅkhyamuniviprarṣimaṇḍalam ।। 

dakṣiṇadvāragāsaṅkhyalalanālokamaṇḍalam ।
paścimadvāragāsaṅkhyarājarājeśamaṇḍalam ।। 

uttaradvāragāsaṅkhyarathahastyaśvasaṅkulam ।
ekabhṛtyavinirṇītadakṣiṇāpathavigraham ।। 

karṇāṭanātharacitapūrvadeśakriyākramam ।
surāṣṭrādhipanirṇītasarvamlecchottarāpatham ।। 

mālaveśasamākrāntasarvapāścātyataṅgaṇam ।
dakṣiṇābdhitaṭāyātalaṅkādūtavinoditam ।। 

pūrvābdhitaṭamāhendrasiddhoktagaganāpagam ।
uttarābdhitaṭāyātadūtavarṇitaguhyakam ।। 

paścimābdhitaṭīlokavarṇitāstamayakramam ।
asaṅkhyabaddhabhūpālakarākīrṇākhilājiram ।। 

yajñavāṭapaṭhadviprajitatūryogranissvanam ।
vandikolāhalollāsapratiśrudghanakandaram ।। 

geyavādyodyatadhvānapradhvanadgaganāntaram ।
hayahastirathāvārirajomeghaghanāmbaram ।। 

puṣpakarpūradhūmotthagandhāmoditaparvatam ।
sarvamaṇḍalasambhāraracitānekaśāsanam ।। 

yaśaḥkarpūrajaladhisuśuklāmbaraparṣadam ।
rodasīstambhabhūtaikasvaprabhāvajitārkakam ।। 

ārambhamantharodārakāryasaṃvyagrabhūmipam ।
nānānagaranirmāṇasodyogasthapatīśvaram ।। 

papātātha mahārambhāṃ sā tāṃ narapates sabhām ।
vyomātmikā vyomamayīṃ mihikevāmbarāṭavīm ।। 

bhramantīṃ tatra tām agre dadṛśus te na kecana ।
anyasaṅkalparacitāṃ puruṣāḥ kāminīm iva ।। 

tathā te tāṃ na dadṛśus sañcarantīṃ purogatām ।
anyasaṅkalparacitāṃ madhye svanagarīṃ yathā ।। 

prāktanān eva tān sarvān sā dadarśa purogatān ।
bhūbhṛtaiva samaṃ prāptān nagarān nagarāntaram ।। 

tadveśāṃs tanmayācārāṃs tathā tān eva bālakān ।
tā eva bālavanitās tāṃs tān eva ca mantriṇaḥ ।। 

tān eva bhuvi bhūpālāṃs tāṃs tān eva ca paṇḍitān ।
tān eva narmasacivān bhṛtyāṃs tān eva tādṛśān ।। 

athānyān anyapūrvāṃś ca paṇḍitān suhṛdas tathā ।
vyavahārāṃs tathā cānyān paurān anyāṃs tathaiva ca ।। 

madhyāhnakālaṃ divasaṃ ghanagharmākulā diśaḥ ।
antarikṣaṃ sacandrārkaṃ sāmbhodapavanadhvani ।। 

mahīṃ hradanadīśailapurapattanamaṇḍitām ।
nānānagaravinyāsajaṅgalagrāmasaṅkulām ।। 

dvir aṣṭavarṣaṃ bhūpālaṃ prāktanyā jarasojjhitam ।
prāktanīṃ janatāṃ sarvāṃ samastān grāmavāsinaḥ ।। 

sā tān ālokya lalanā cintāparavaśābhavat ।
te asmin nagaravāstavyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ sarve mṛtā iti ।। 

punaḥprajñaptibodhena prāktanāntaḥpurāntaram ।
ājagāma dadarśātra sārdharātraṃ tathaiva tat ।। 

śavarūpaṃ svabhartāraṃ puṣpasambhāragopitam ।
nidrākulaṃ parijanasanniveśaṃ tathaiva tam ।। 

atha sotthāpayām āsa nidrākrāntaṃ sakhījanam ।
āha cātīva me duḥkham āsthānaṃ dīyatām iti ।। 

bhartus siṃhāsanasyāsya pārśve tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ yadi ।
paśyantī sabhyasaṅghātaṃ tat prajīvāmi nānyathā ।। 

sa rājaparivāro atha tayety ukto yathākramam ।
āsīd anidras suvyagras sarvas sarvasvakarmasu ।। 

paurān sabhyān samānetuṃ yayur yāṣṭīkapaṅktayaḥ ।
vyavahāraṃ kalayitum urvīm arkakarā iva ।। 

āsthānabhūmiṃ bhṛtyāś ca mārjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।
prāvṛṭpayodamalinaṃ khaṃ śaradvāsarā iva ।। 

aṅganaṃ prati dīpaughās tasthuḥ pītatamo'mbhasaḥ ।
āścāryadarśanāyeva prāptā nakṣatrapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

janatāḥ pūrayām āsuḥ pūrair ajirabhūmikāḥ ।
abdhīn pralayasaṃśuṣkān purāsarge ivāmbhasā ।। 

ājagmur mantrisāmantās svaṃ svaṃ sthānam aninditāḥ ।
trailokye punar utpanne lokapālā yathā diśaḥ ।। 

vavur ākīrṇakarpūrasāndrā malayaśītalāḥ ।
utphullakusumodvāntamāṃsalāmodino anilāḥ ।। 

paryanteṣu pratīhārās tasthur dhavalavāsasaḥ ।
vṛṣṭamūkārkatāpāntameghamālā ivādriṣu ।। 

prabhāpītatamaḥpuñjāḥ petuḥ puṣpotkarā bhuvi ।
meghamārutavidhvastās tārakānikarā iva ।। 

āsthānaṃ pūrayām āsur mahīpālānuyāyinaḥ ।
utphullakamalākīrṇaṃ haṃsā iva sarovaram ।। 

siṃhāsanasamīpasthe haimavetrāsane śubhe ।
upāviśad asau līlā līleva smaracetasi ।। 

dadarśa tān nṛpān bhṛtyān sarvān eva yathāsthitān ।
gurūn āryān sakhīn bhṛtyān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān ।। 

sakalam eva hi pūrvavad eva sā samavalokya mudaṃ paramāṃ yayau ।
nṛpatirāṣṭrajanaḥ khalu jīvatīty uditayā ca babhau śaśivac chriyā ।। 

līlopākhyāne sadehādeharāṣṭravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭha

itthaṃ vinodayāmīdaṃ duḥkhitaṃ cittam ity alam ।
bodhayitveṅgitair bhūpān āsthānād utthitātha sā ।। 

praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ bhartuḥ pārśve antaḥpuramaṇḍape ।
viveśa puṣpaguptasya cintayām āsa ceti sā ।। 

aho vicitrā māyeyam ete asmatpuramānavāḥ ।
bahir antaś cidādarśe tatra ceha ca saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

tālītamālahintālamālitā girayo apy amī ।
yathā tatra tathehāpi bata māyeyam ātatā ।। 

ādarśe bahir antaś ca yathā śailo anubhūyate ।
bahir antaś cidādarśe tathā sargo anubhūyate ।। 

atra bhrāntimayas sargaḥ kas syāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ ।
iti pṛcchāmi vāgīśīm abhyarcyottamasaṃśayam ।। 

iti niścitya tāṃ devīṃ pūjayām āsa sā tadā ।
dadarśa ca puraḥ prāptāṃ kumārīrūpadhāriṇīm ।। 

bhadrāsanagatāṃ devīm upaviśya purogatā ।
paramārthamahāśaktiṃ līlāpṛcchad bhuvi sthitā ।। 

līlā

anukampyasya no devi bhajanty udvegam uttamāḥ ।
tvayaiva kila sargādau sthāpiteti purāsthitiḥ ।। 

tad iyaṃ yat purā prahvā pṛcchāmi parameśvari ।
tvaṃ brūhi tvatkṛto nūnaṃ saphalo me asty anugrahaḥ ।। 

devī

asty ādarśo jagannāmnaḥ khād apy adhikanirmalaḥ ।
yasya yojanakoṭīnāṃ koṭayo avayavo manāk ।। 

nissandhibandho abhighano mṛdur masṛṇaśītalaḥ ।
acetyacid iti khyāto nāmnā nirbhittir agrahaḥ ।। 

dikkālakalanākāśaprakāśaniyatikramāḥ ।
yatreme pratibimbanti parāṃ parimitiṃ gatāḥ ।। 

trijagatpratibimbaśrīr bahir antaś ca saṃsthitā ।
tatrāmba kṛtrimā kā syāt kāsau vā syād akṛtrimā ।। 

devī

akṛtrimatvaṃ sargasya kīdṛśaṃ vada sundari ।
kīdṛśaṃ kṛtrimatvaṃ syād yathāvat kathayeti me ।। 

līlā

yathāham iha tiṣṭhāmi tvaṃ ca devi sthitāmbike ।
asāv akṛtrimas sarga iti deveśi vedmy aham ।। 

yatrādhunā sa bhartā me sthitas sargas sa kṛtrimaḥ ।
ahaṃ manye yataś śūnyo deśakālādyapūrakaḥ ।। 

devī

kṛtrimo akṛtrimāt sargo na kadācana jāyate ।
na hi kāraṇataḥ kāryam udety asadṛśaṃ kvacit ।। 

līlā

dṛśyate kāraṇāt kāryaṃ suvilakṣaṇam ambike ।
ambv ādātum aśaktā mṛd ghaṭas tajjas tadāspadam ।। 

devī

sampadyate hi yat kāryaṃ kāraṇais sahakāribhiḥ ।
mukhyakāraṇavaicitryaṃ kiñcit tasyāvalokyate ।। 

na ca tvadbhartṛsargasya kiñcit pṛthvyādi kāraṇam ।
na bhūmaṇḍalato bhūmir jātā tatra varānane ।। 

gatā cid ita uḍḍīya kutas syād ihabhūtalam ।
sahakārīṇi kāny eva kāraṇāny atra kāraṇam ।। 

kāraṇānām abhāve api yad eti sahakāriṇām ।
tat pūrvakāraṇān nānyat sarveṇety anubhūyate ।। 

līlā

smṛtis sā devi madbhartus tathā sphāratvam āgatā ।
smṛteś ca kāraṇaṃ vedmi sargo ayam iti niścayaḥ ।। 

devī

smṛtir ākāśarūpaiva yathā tajjas tathaiva te ।
bhartṛsargo anubhūto hi sa kham eva tathābale ।। 

līlā

smṛtyākāśamayas sargo yathā bhartur mamoditaḥ ।
tathaivemam ahaṃ manye sa sargo atra nidarśanam ।। 

devī

evam etad asatsargo bhartus te bhāti bhāsuraḥ ।
tathaivāyam ihābhāti paśyāmy etad ahaṃ sute ।। 

līlā

yathā patyur amūrto asmāt sargāt sargo bhramātmakaḥ ।
jātas tathāyaṃ vada me jagatkuḍyanivṛttaye ।। 

devī

prāksmṛtir bhrāntimātrātmā sargo ayam udito yathā ।
svapnabhramātmako bhāti tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu ।। 

asti kaścic cidākāśe kvacit saṃsāramaṇḍapaḥ ।
ākāśakācadalavac chādanācchādanākṛtiḥ ।। 

merustambhasthalokeśapuraśrīsālabhañjikaḥ ।
caturdaśāpavarakas trigarto bhānudīpakaḥ ।। 

koṇasthabhūtavalmīkavyāptaparvataloṣṭakaḥ ।
anekaputrajaraḍhaprajeśabrāhmaṇāspadam ।। 

ṛkṣaughakośakārāḍhyavyomordhvatalakālimā ।
nabhonivāsisiddhaughamaṣakāhitaghuṅghumaḥ ।। 

payodagṛhadhūmograjālāvalitakoṇakaḥ ।
vātamārgamahāvaṃśasthitavaimānikakrimiḥ ।। 

surāsurādidurbālalīlākalakalākulaḥ ।
lokāntarapuragrāmabhāṇḍopaskaranirbharaḥ ।। 

saritsroto'bdhisarasījalokṣitamahītalaḥ ।
pātālabhūtalasvargābhogabhāsurakoṭaraḥ ।। 

tatra kasmiṃścid ekasmin koṇāpavarakodare ।
śailaloṣṭatale asty eko girigrāmakagartakaḥ ।। 

asmin nadīśailavanopagūḍhe sāgnis sadāras sutavān arogaḥ ।
gokṣīravān rājabhayād vimuktaḥ sarvātithir dharmaparo dvijo abhūt ।। 

līlopākhyāne sakalasargabhrāntitvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

devī

vittaveśavayaḥkarmavidyāvibhavaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
vasiṣṭhasyeva sadṛśo na tu vāsiṣṭhacetanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭha iti nāmnābhūt tasyābhūd indusundarī ।
nāmnā tv arundhatī bhāryā bhūmivyomany arundhatī ।। 

vittaveśavayaḥkarmavidyāvibhavaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
sameva sāpy arundhatyā na tu cetanasattayā ।। 

akṛtrimapremarasā vilāsālasagāminī ।
sāsya saṃsārasarvasvam āsīt kumudahāsinī ।। 

sa vipras tasya śailasya sānau sarasaśādvale ।
kadācid upaviṣṭas san dadarśādho mahīpatim ।। 

samagraparivāreṇa yāntam ākheṭakecchayā ।
mahatā sainyaghoṣeṇa meror iva bibhitsayā ।। 

cāmaraiḥ kīrṇacandrāṃśu patākābhir latāvanam ।
kurvāṇaṃ khaṃ sitacchatramaṇḍalai raupyakuṭṭimam ।। 

aśvīyāgnipṛṣatpūrapūrṇareṇvabhravarṇavat ।
hāstikottambhitakaravāṭāṭṭālakagopitam ।। 

mahākalakalāvartadravaddigbhūtamaṇḍalam ।
kacatkāñcanamāṇikyahārakeyūrakuṇḍalam ।। 

tam ālokya mahīpālam idaṃ cintitavān asau ।
aho nu ramyā nṛpatā sarvasaubhāgyabhāsitā ।। 

padātirathahastyaśvapatākācchatracāmaraiḥ ।
kadā syāṃ daśadikkuñjapūrako ahaṃ mahīpatiḥ ।। 

kadā me vāyavaḥ kundamakarandasugandhayaḥ ।
pāsyanty antaḥpurastrīṇāṃ surataśramaśīkarān ।। 

karpūreṇa purandhrīṇāṃ kīrṇena yaśasā diśām ।
indūdayāvadātāni kadā kuryāṃ mukhāny aham ।। 

itthaṃ tataḥprabhṛty eva vipras saṅkalpavān abhūt ।
svadharmanirato nityaṃ yāvajjīvam atandritaḥ ।। 

himāśanir ivāmbhojaṃ jarjarīkartum ādṛtā ।
jarā hārdānvitevainaṃ javād dvijam upāyayau ।। 

āsannamaraṇasyātra bhāryā mlānim upāyayau ।
tasya śāmyati puṣpartau lateva grīṣmabhītitaḥ ।। 

mām athārādhitavatī sā tatas tvam ivāṅganā ।
amaratvaṃ suduṣprāpaṃ buddhvemaṃ sāvṛṇod varam ।। 

devi svamaṇḍapād eva jīvo bhartur mṛtasya me ।
mā yāsīd ity atas tasyās sa evāṅgīkṛto mayā ।। 

atha kālavaśād vipras sa pañcatvam upāyayau ।
tasminn eva gṛhākāśe jīvākāśatayā sthitaḥ ।। 

sampannaḥ prāktanānalpasaṅkalpavaśatas svayam ।
ākāśavapur evorvīpatiḥ paramaśaktimān ।। 

prabhāvāj jitabhūpīṭhaḥ pratāpākrāntaviṣṭapaḥ ।
kṛpāpālitapātālas trilokavijayī nṛpaḥ ।। 

kālāgnir aripakṣāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ makaraketanaḥ ।
merur viṣayavāyūnāṃ sādhvabjānāṃ divākaraḥ ।। 

ādarśas sarvaśāstrāṇām arthināṃ kalpapādapaḥ ।
pādapīṭhaṃ dvijāgryāṇāṃ rākā dharmāmṛtatviṣaḥ ।। 

svagṛhābhyantarākāśe cittākāśamayātmani ।
tasmin dvije śavībhūte bhūtākāśaśarīriṇi ।। 

sā tasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā śokeṇātyantakarṣitā ।
śuṣkeva māṣaśimikā hṛdayena dvidhāgamat ।। 

bhartrā saha śavībhūtā deham utsṛjya dūrataḥ ।
ātivāhikadehena bhartāraṃ samupāyayau ।। 

nadī nikhātam iva taṃ bhartāram anusṛtya sā ।
ājagāma viśokatvaṃ savasanteva mañjarī ।। 

tatrāsya viprasya sutā gṛhāṇi bhūsthāvarādīni ghanāni santi ।
adyāṣṭamaṃ vāsaram āptamṛtyor jīvo girigrāmakamandirasthaḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāne brāhmaṇamaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

devī

sa te bhartādya sampanno dvijo bhūpatvam āgataḥ ।
yāsāv arundhatī nāma brāhmaṇī sā tvam aṅgane ।। 

ihemau kuruto rājyaṃ tau bhavantau sudampatī ।
cakravākāv iva navau bhuvi jātau śivāv iva ।। 

eṣa te kathitas sarvaḥ prāktanas saṃsṛtibhramaḥ ।
bhrāntimātrakam ākāśam eva jīvasvarūpadhṛt ।। 

bhramād asmāc cidādarśe bhramo ayaṃ pratibimbitaḥ ।
asatya eva cāsatyād bhavator bhavabhaṅgadaḥ ।। 

tasmād bhrāntimayaḥ kas syāt ko vā bhrāntyujjhito bhavet ।
sargo nirargalānalpabodhān nānyad vijṛmbhate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity ākarṇya ciraṃ cāruvismayotphullalocanā ।
bhūtvovāca vaco līlā līlālasapadākṣaram ।। 

devi tvadvacanaṃ mithyā kathaṃ sampannam īdṛśam ।
kva viprajīvas svagṛhe kveme vayam iha sthitāḥ ।। 

tādṛg lokāntaraṃ sā bhūs te śailās tā diśo daśa ।
kathaṃ mānti gṛhasyāntar madbhartā yeṣv avasthitaḥ ।। 

matta airāvaṇo baddhas siddhārthakaṇakodare ।
maṣakena kṛtaṃ yuddhaṃ siṃhaughair aṇukoṭare ।। 

padmākṣe sthāpito merur nigīrṇo madhupāyinā ।
svapnābhragarjitaṃ śrutvā citre nṛtyanti varhiṇaḥ ।। 

asamañjasam evaitad yathā sarveśvareśvari ।
tathā gṛhāntaḥ pṛthivī śailāś cety asamañjasam ।। 

yathāvad etad deveśi kathayāmalayā dhiyā ।
prasādasugṛhīte hi nodvijante mahaujasaḥ ।। 

devī

nāhaṃ mithyā vadāmīdaṃ yathāvac chṛṇu sundari ।
bhedanaṃ niyatīnāṃ hi kriyate nāsmadādibhiḥ ।। 

vibhidyamānām anyena sthāpayāmy aham eva yām ।
maryādāṃ tāṃ mayā bhinnāṃ ko aparaḥ pālayiṣyati ।। 

sagrāmaṃ dvijajīvātmā tasminn eva svasadmani ।
vyomny evedaṃ mahīrāṣṭraṃ vyomātmaiva prapaśyati ।। 

prāktanī sā smṛtir luptā yuvayor uditānyathā ।
svapne jāgratsmṛtir yadvad etanmaraṇam aṅgane ।। 

yathā svapne tribhuvanaṃ saṅkalpāt trijagad yathā ।
yathā kathārthasaṅgrāmo marubhūmau yathā jalaṃ ।। 

tasya brāhmaṇagehasya saśailavanapattanā ।
iyam antassthitā bhūmis saṅkalpādarśayor iva ।। 

asatyaiveyam ābhāti satyeva ghanasargatā ।
tasyāsatyāvabhāsasya cidvyomnaḥ kośakoṭare ।। 

asatyād yat samutpannaṃ smṛtyā nāma tad apy asat ।
mṛgatṛṣṇātaraṅgiṇyās taraṅgo api na satyataḥ ।। 

idaṃ tvadīyaṃ sadanaṃ tadgehākāśakośagam ।
viddhi māṃ tvāṃ ca sarvaṃ vā tac ca vyomaiva kevalam ।। 

svapnasaṅgamasaṅkalpasvānubhūtiparamparāḥ ।
pramāṇāny atra mukhyāni sambodhāya pradīpavat ।। 

sthito brāhmaṇagehe antar dvijajīvas tadantare ।
sasamudravanā pṛthvī sthitābja iva ṣaṭpadī ।। 

tasyāḥ kasmiṃścid ekasmin pelave koṭarodare ।
idaṃ pattanam ābhāti keśoṇḍuka ivāmbare ।। 

tasminn asmin pure tanvi tavedaṃ sadanaṃ sthitam ।
tasmāt kim aṇumātre antar gajavṛndam iva sthitam ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇau santi vatse cidātmani ।
antar antar jagantīti kenaitan nāma saṅkhyate ।। 

līlā

aṣṭamaṃ divasaṃ vipras sa mṛtaḥ parameśvari ।
gato varṣagaṇo asmākam ataḥ katham idaṃ bhavet ।। 

devī

deśadairghyaṃ yathā nāsti kāladairghyaṃ tathaiva ca ।
nāsty eveti yathānyāyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu ।। 

yathaitat pratibhāmātraṃ jagatsargāvabhāsanam ।
tathaitat pratibhāmātraṃ kṣaṇakalpāvabhāsanaṃ ।। 

kṣaṇakalpajagatsargatvattāmattātmajanmanām ।
yathāvat pratibhāsasya vatse kramam imaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

anubhūya kṣaṇaṃ jīvo mithyāmaraṇamūrchanām ।
tadaivonmeṣamātreṇa vyomny eva vyomarūpy api ।। 

ādheyo aham ihādhāre sthito aham iti cetati ।
hastapādādimān deho mamāyam iti paśyati ।। 

yadaiva cetati vapus tadaivedaṃ sa cetati ।
etasyāhaṃ pituḥ putro varṣāṇīmāni santi me ।। 

ime me bāndhavā ramyā mamedaṃ ramyam āspadam ।
jāto aham abhavaṃ bālo vṛddhiṃ yāto aham īdṛśaḥ ।। 

bāndhavāś cāsya te sarve tathaiva viharanty api ।
cidākāśaghanaikyatvāt svātmany api bhavanti te ।। 

evaṃ nāmodite apy asyāś cites saṃsāraṣaṇḍake ।
na kiñcid apy abhyuditaṃ sthitaṃ vyomaiva nirmalam ।। 

svapne draṣṭari yadvac cit tadvad dṛśye cid eva sā ।
sarvadaikatayā tasmāt sā svapne draṣṭṛdarśanam ।। 

yathā svapne tathodeti paralokadṛśā citiḥ ।
paraloke yathodeti tathaivehāpy udeti sā ।। 

tat svapnaparalokehalokānām asatāṃ satāṃ ।
na manāg api bhedo asti vīcīnām iva vāriṇi ।। 

ato ajātam idaṃ viśvam ajātatvād anāśi ca ।
kharūpatvāc ca nāsty eva yac ca bhāti cid eva sā ।। 

yathaiṣā cetyanirhīnā paramavyomarūpiṇī ।
sacetyāpi tathaivaiṣā paramavyomarūpiṇī ।। 

yasmāc cetyam ato nānyad vīcitvād iva vāritā ।
vīcitvaṃ ca na caivāsti śaśaśṛṅgavad eva hi ।। 

saiva cetyam ivāpannā svabhāvād acyutāpy alam ।
tasmān nāsty eva dṛśyo arthaḥ kuto ato draṣṭṛdṛśyadhīḥ ।। 

nimeṣeṇaiva jīvasya mṛtimohād anantaram ।
trijagatsargadṛśyaśrīḥ pratibhām upagacchati ।। 

yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ yathārambhaṃ yathākramam ।
yathotpādaṃ yathāmātṛ yathāpitṛ yathaurasam ।। 

yathāvayo yathāsaṃvid yathāsthānaṃ yathehitam ।
yathābandhu yathābhṛtyaṃ yathehāstamayodayam ।। 

ajātam eva jāto aham iti paśyati cidvapuḥ ।
deśakālakriyādravyamanobuddhīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

jhagity eva mṛter ante vapuḥ paśyati yauvanam ।
eṣā mātā pitā tv eṣa bālo abhūvam ahaṃ tv iti ।। 

nānubhūto anubhūto vā yas syāt smṛtimayaḥ kramaḥ ।
paścād udety asau tasya puṣpasyeva phalodayaḥ ।। 

nimeṣeṇaiva sakalo gata ity anubhūyate ।
rātrir dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandre tathāpy abhūt ।। 

kāntāvirahiṇām ekaṃ vāsaraṃ vatsarāyate ।
mṛto jāto aham anyo me piteti svapnadhāmni ca ।। 

abhuktasyaiva bhogyasya bhuktadhīr upajāyate ।
bhukte cābhuktadhīr dṛṣṭam ity alaṃ kitavādiṣu ।। 

śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti tulyaṃ vyasanam utsavaiḥ ।
vipralambho api lābhaś ca madasvapnādisaṃvidi ।। 

taikṣṇyaṃ yathā maricabījakaṇe sthitaṃ svaṃ stambhe athavā racitaputrakajālam antaḥ ।
dṛśyaṃ tv ananyad idam evam aje asti śāntaṃ kasyāsti bandhanavimokṣadṛśaḥ kutaḥ kāḥ ।। 

maṇḍapopākhyāne līlopākhyānāparanāmni jagataḥ paramārthatvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśas sargaḥ

devī

pratibhānti jaganty āśu mṛtimohād anantaram ।
jīvasyonmīlanād akṣṇo rūpāṇīvākhilāny alam ।। 

dikkālakalanākāśadharmakarmamayāni ca ।
parisphārāṇy anantāni kalpāntasthairyavanti ca ।। 

nānubhūtaṃ na yad dṛṣṭaṃ tan mayā kṛtam ity api ।
tat kṣaṇāt smṛtitām eti svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

bhrāntir evam ananteyaṃ cidvyomavyomni bhāsurā ।
apakuḍyā jagannāmnī nagarīkalpanātmikā ।। 

ahaṃ jagad iyaṃ sargasmṛtir eveti jṛmbhati ।
dūrakalpakṣaṇābhyāsaviparyāsaikakāriṇī ।। 

nānubhūtānubhūtā ca jñaptir itthaṃ dvirūpiṇī ।
pūrvaṃ kāraṇarikteva cidrūpaiva pravartate ।। 

nānubhūte anubhūtatvaṃ saṃvido antar udety api ।
svapnabhramād ananyasmin pitarīva pitṛsmṛtiḥ ।। 

kadācit smṛtitām tyaktvā pratibhāmātram eva sat ।
bhāti prathamasargeśarūpeṇa tadanu kramāt ।। 

dṛśyaṃ tribhuvanādīdam anubhūtasmṛtau sthitam ।
keṣāñcit tanvi keṣāñcin nānubhūtasmṛtau sthitam ।। 

pratibhāsata evedaṃ keṣāñcit smaraṇaṃ vinā ।
cidaṇūnāṃ prajeśatvaṃ kākatālīyavad yataḥ ।। 

atyantavismṛtaṃ dṛśyaṃ mokṣa ity abhidhīyate ।
īpsitānīpsite tatra na staḥ kecana kasyacit ।। 

atyantābhāvasampattiṃ vināhantvajagatsthiteḥ ।
anutpādamayīm eva nodety eva vimuktatā ।। 

rajjvāṃ sarpabhramas sarpaśabdārthāsambhavaṃ vinā ।
anutpādamayo nityaṃ śānto api na hi śāmyati ।। 

ardhaśānto na śānto asau samety anyatayā punaḥ ।
udety ekapiśācānte piśāco anyo apy adhīmataḥ ।। 

saṃsāraś cāyam ābhogī param eveti niścayaḥ ।
kāraṇābhāvato bhāti yad ihābhāvam eti tat ।। 

līlā

brāhmaṇabrāhmaṇīrūpe sarge yā kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ ।
katham abhyuditā sā syāt smaraṇīyam idaṃ vinā ।। 

devī

pitāmahasmṛtis tatra kāraṇaṃ tasya ca smṛtiḥ ।
pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva muktatvāt pūrvajanmanaḥ ।। 

pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva smaraṇīyā citis svayam ।
padmajāditvam āyāti cetanasya yathāsthiteḥ ।। 

abhūvam aham ity anyaḥ prajānāthaḥ prajāyate ।
kākatālīyavat kaścid bhavati pratibhāmayaḥ ।। 

evam abhyudite loke na kiñcin na kadācana ।
kvacid abhyuditaṃ nāma kevalaṃ cinnabhas sthitam ।। 

dvividhāyās smṛter asyāḥ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ padam ।
kāryakāraṇabhāvo asāv ekam eva cidambaram ।। 

kāryakāraṇayos sattā kāraṇais sahakāribhiḥ ।
kāryakāraṇayor aikyaṃ tadabhāvān na śāmyati ।। 

mahācidrūpam evedaṃ smaraṇād viddhi vedanam ।
kāryakāraṇabhāvo atra tena śabdo na vāstavaḥ ।। 

evaṃ na kiñcid utpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ trijagadādy api ।
cidākāśaṃ cidākāśe kevalaṃ svātmani sthitam ।। 

līlā

aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā devi me tvayā ।
rūpaśrīr jāgatī prātaḥprabhayevekṣaṇadyuteḥ ।। 

idānīm aham etasyāṃ yāvat pariṇatā dṛśi ।
nābhyāsena vinā tāvad bhinddhīmaṃ devi kautukam ।। 

yatrāsau brāhmaṇo gehe brāhmaṇyā sahito abhavat ।
taṃ sargaṃ taṃ girigrāmaṃ naya māṃ samavekṣitum ।। 

devī

acetyacidrūpamayīṃ paramāṃ pāvanīṃ dṛśam ।
avalambyemam ākāram avamucya bhavāmalā ।। 

tataḥ prāpsyasy asandehaṃ vyomātmānaṃ nabhassthitam ।
bhūmiṣṭhanarasaṅkalpo gaganāntaḥ puraṃ yathā ।। 

evaṃsthitaṃ taṃ paśyāvas saha sargam anantaram ।
evaṃ taddarśanadvāre deho hi paramārgalā ।। 

līlā

amunā devi dehena jagad anyad avāpyate ।
na vā kasmād atra yuktiṃ kathayānugrahagrahāt ।। 

devī

jagantīmāny amūrtāni mūrtimanti mudhāgrahāt ।
bhavadbhir avabuddhāni hemanīvormikādhiyā ।। 

hemny ūrmikārūpavane apy ūrmikātvaṃ na vidyate ।
yathā tathā jagadrūpe jagattvaṃ nāsti citpade ।। 

jagad ākāśam evedaṃ brahmaiva na tu dṛśyatā ।
dṛśyate kācid apy atra dhūlir ambunidhāv iva ।। 

brahmaiva paśyati brahma nābrahma brahma paśyati ।
sargādināmnā prathitas svabhāvo asyaivam īdṛśaḥ ।। 

na brahmajagator asti kāryakāraṇatodayaḥ ।
kāraṇānām abhāvena sarveṣāṃ sahakāriṇām ।। 

yāvad abhyāsayogena na śāntā bhedadhīs tava ।
nūnaṃ tāvad atadrūpā na brahma paripaśyasi ।। 

tatra rūḍhim upāyātā ime ye tv asmadādayaḥ ।
abhyāsād brahmasaṃvitteḥ paśyāmas te hi tat padam ।। 

saṅkalpanagarasyeva mamākaśamayaṃ vapuḥ ।
brahmaiva vātaḥ paśyāmi dehenānena tat padam ।। 

viśuddhajñānadehāhaṃ yathaite padmajādayaḥ ।
brahmātmajagadādīdam aṅgam asmākam aṅgane ।। 

tavābhyāsaṃ vinā bālo nākāro brahmatāṃ gataḥ ।
sthitaḥ kalanarūpātmā tena tan nānupaśyasi ।। 

yatra svasaṅkalpapuraṃ svadehe nānulabhyate ।
tatrānyasaṅkalpapuraṃ svadehe nānulabhyate ।। 

tasmād enaṃ parityajya dehaṃ cidvyomarūpiṇī ।
tat paśyasy etad evāśu kuru kāryavidāṃ vare ।। 

saṅkalpanagaraṃ satyaṃ yathā saṅkalpinaṃ prati ।
sadehaṃ vā videhaṃ vā netaraṃ prati kiñcana ।। 

ādisarge jagadbhrāntir yatheyaṃ sthitim āgatā ।
tathā tadāprabhṛty eva niyatiḥ prauḍhim āgatā ।। 

līlā

tvayoktaṃ devi gacchāvo brāhmaṇabrāhmaṇīgṛham ।
sahetīdam ahaṃ vacmi kathaṃ gantavyam amba he ।। 

iha dehaṃ imaṃ nyasya śuddhasattvānupātinā ।
cetasā tat paraṃ yāmi lokaṃ tvaṃ kathayeti tu ।। 

devī

saṅkalpavyomavṛkṣas te yathā sann api khātmakaḥ ।
na kuḍyātmā na kuḍyena rodhyate nāpi kuḍyahā ।। 

śuddhaikasattvanirmāṇacittarūpasya tat kila ।
pratibhānam atas tasmād paramād bhidyate manāk ।। 

so ayam etādṛśo deho nainaṃ santyajya yāmy aham ।
anenaiva tam āpnomi deśaṃ gandham ivānilaḥ ।। 

yathā jalaṃ jalair vāgnir agninā vāyunānilaḥ ।
milaty evaṃ manodeho dehair anyair manomayaiḥ ।। 

na hi pārthivatāṃ saṃvid ety apārthivasaṃvidā ।
ekatvaṃ kalpanāśailaśailayoḥ kvāhatir mithaḥ ।। 

ātivāhika evāyaṃ tvādṛśaś cittadehakaḥ ।
ādhibhautikabuddhyā tu gṛhītaś cirabhāvanāt ।। 

yathā svapne yathā dīrghakāladhyāne yathā bhramaiḥ ।
yathā vyasanisaṅkalpe yathā gandharvapattane ।। 

vāsanātānavaṃ nūnaṃ yadā te sthitim eṣyati ।
tadādhibhautikībhāvaṃ punar eti na dehakaḥ ।। 

līlā

ātivāhikadehatvapratyaye ghanatāṃ gate ।
tam avāpnoty ayaṃ deho daśāmohe vinaśyati ।। 

devī

yad asti nāma tatraiṣa nāśānāśakramo bhavet ।
vastuto nāsti yat tv eva nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame naṣṭe satyabodhavaśāt sute ।
sarpo na naṣṭas tan naṣṭo vety evaṃ keva saṅkathā ।। 

yathā satyaparijñānād dṛśyate nādhibhautikaḥ ।
tathātivāhikajñānād dṛśyate nādhibhautikaḥ ।। 

kalpanā vinivarteta kalpitā yadi kenacit ।
sā śilā samapāstaiva yā nehāsti kadācana ।। 

parasparaṃ parāpūrṇam idaṃ dehādikaṃ sthitam ।
iti satyaṃ vayaṃ bhadre paśyāmo nāsi paśyasi ।। 

ādisarge bhavec cittvaṃ kalpanākalitaṃ yadā ।
tadā tataḥprabhṛty ekaṃ svatvaṃ dṛśyam ivekṣyate ।। 

līlā

ekasminn eva saṃśānte dikkālādyavibhāgini ।
vidyamāne pare tattve kalpanāvasaraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

devī

kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni taraṅgatvaṃ yathāmbhasi ।
satyatvaṃ ca yathā svapnasaṅkalpanagarādiṣu ।। 

nāsty eva satyānubhave tathā nāsty eva citpade ।
kalpanaṃ vyatiriktātma tatsvabhāvād anāmayāt ।। 

yathā nāsty ambare pāṃsuḥ pare nāsti tathā kalā ।
akalākalanaṃ śāntam idam ekam ajaṃ tataḥ ।। 

yad vedaṃ bhāsate kiñcit tat tasyaiva nirāmayam ।
kacanaṃ kāñcanākhyānakāntasyātimaṇer iva ।। 

līlā

etāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālam evaṃ devi vayaṃ vada ।
bhrāmitāḥ ke ca nāmeme dvaitādvaitavikalpanaiḥ ।। 

devī

avicāreṇa tarale bhrāntāsi ciram ākulā ।
avicāras svabhāvotthas sa vicārād vinaśyati ।। 

avicāro vicāreṇa nimeṣād eva naśyati ।
eṣo asann eva tenāntar avidyaiṣā na vidyate ।। 

tasmān naivāvicāro asti nāvidyā naiva bandhanam ।
na mokṣo asti nirābādhaṃ śuddhabodhas tv idaṃ jagat ।। 

etāvantaṃ yadā kālaṃ tvayaitan na vicāritam ।
tadā na samprabuddhā tvaṃ bhrāntaivārṇava ākulā ।। 

adyaprabhṛti buddhāsi vimuktāsi vivekinī ।
vāsanātānave bījaṃ patitaṃ tava cetasi ।। 

ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ saṃsāranāṭakam ।
yadā tadā kathaṃ kena vāsyate vāsanāpi kā ।। 

atyantābhāvasampattau draṣṭṛdṛśyadṛśām ataḥ ।
ekadhyāne paraṃ rūḍhe nirvikalpasamādhini ।। 

vāsanākṣayabīje asmin kiñcid aṅkurite hṛdi ।
kramān nodayam eṣyanti rāgadveṣādikā dṛśaḥ ।। 

saṃsārasambhavaś cāyaṃ nirmūlatvam upaiṣyati ।
nirvikalpasamādhānaṃ pratiṣṭhām alam eṣyati ।। 

vigatakalanakālimākalaṅkā gaganakalāntaranirmalā balena ।
sakalakaraṇakāryakāraṇāntaḥ katipayakāryavaśād bhaviṣyasīti ।। 

līlopākhyāne viśrāntyupadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśas sargaḥ

devī

yathā svapnaparijñānāt svapnadeho na vāstavaḥ ।
anubhūto apy ayaṃ tadvaj jāgraddeho na vāstavaḥ ।। 

yathā svapnaparijñānāt svapnadeho api śāmyati ।
vāsanātānavāt tadvaj jāgraddeho api śāmyati ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpadehānte deho ayaṃ cetyate yathā ।
tathā jāgradbhāvanāntar udety evātivāhikaḥ ।। 

svapne nirvāsanābīje yathodeti suṣuptatā ।
jāgraty avāsanābīje tathodeti vimuktatā ।। 

yeyaṃ tu jīvanmuktānāṃ vāsanā sā na vāsanā ।
śuddhasattvābhidhānaṃ tat sattāsāmānyam ucyate ।। 

yā suptavāsanā nidrā sā suṣuptam iti smṛtā ।
yat suptavāsanaṃ jāgrat sa ghano moha ucyate ।। 

prakṣīṇavāsanā nidrā turyaśabdena kathyate ।
jāgraty api bhavaty etad vidite parame pade ।। 

prakṣīṇavāsanā yeha jīvatāṃ jīvitasthitiḥ ।
amuktair aparijñātā sā jīvanmuktir ucyate ।। 

śuddhasattvānupatitaṃ cetaḥ prabhinnavāsanam ।
ātivāhikatām eti himaṃ tāpād ivāplutam ।। 

ātivāhikatāṃ yātaṃ buddhaṃ cittāntarair manaḥ ।
sargajanmāntaragatais siddhair milati netarat ।। 

yadā te ayam ahambhāvas svābhyāsāc chāntim eṣyati ।
tadodeṣyati te sphārā dṛśyānte bodhatā svayam ।। 

ātivāhikatā jñātā sthitiṃ te yāti śāśvatīm ।
yadā tadānyasaṅkalpālokāt prakṛtipāvanī ।। 

vāsanātānave tasmāt kuru yatnam anindite ।
tasmin prauḍhim upāyāte jīvanmuktā bhaviṣyasi ।। 

yāvan na pūritas tv eṣa nirmalo bodhacandramāḥ ।
tāvad deham iha sthāpya lokāntaram avekṣyatām ।। 

māṃsadeho māṃsadehenaiva saṃśleṣam ṛcchati ।
na tu cittaśarīreṇa vyavahāreṣu karmasu ।। 

yathānubhavam evaitad yathāsthitam udāhṛtam ।
ābālasiddhaṃ saṃsiddhaṃ na nāma varaśāpavat ।। 

avabodhaghanābhyāsād dehasyāsyaiva jāyate ।
saṃsāravāsanākārśyaṃ nūnaṃ cittaśarīratā ।। 

udeṣyantī ca saiṣātra kenacin nopalakṣyate ।
kevalaṃ tu janair deho mriyamāṇo avalokyate ।। 

dehas tv ayaṃ na mriyate na ca jīvati kiñcana ।
ke kila svapnasaṅkalpabhrānter maraṇajīvite ।। 

jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caitat saṅkalpapuruṣe yathā ।
asatyam eva bhāty etad asmin putri śarīrake ।। 

līlā

tad etad upadiṣṭaṃ me jñānaṃ devi tvayāmalam ।
yasmiñ śrutiṃ gate śāntim eti viśvaviṣūcikā ।। 

atropakurute ko hi ko abhyāsaḥ kīdṛśo athavā ।
sa kathaṃ poṣam āyāti puṣṭe tasmiṃś ca kiṃ bhavet ।। 

devī

yad eva kriyate kiñcid yena yena yadā yadā ।
vinābhyāsena tan neha siddhim eti kadācana ।। 

taccintanaṃ tatkathanam anyo'nyaṃ tatprabodhanam ।
tadgataprāṇamananaṃ brahmābhyāsaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

yeṣāṃ tv antaṃ gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām ।
te dvandvamohanirmuktā vijñeyā brahmasevakāḥ ।। 

adhyātmaśāstracintābhir yeṣāṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ ।
vāsanātānavotkābhis te brahmābhyāsinas sthitāḥ ।। 

ye viraktā mahātmāno bhogabhāvanatānavam ।
bhāvayanty abhavāyāntar bhavyā bhuvi jayanti te ।। 

uditaudāryasaundaryā vairāgyarasarañjitā ।
ānandasyandinī yeṣāṃ matis te abhyāsinaḥ pare ।। 

atyantābhāvasampattiṃ jñātuṃ jñeyasya vastunaḥ ।
yuktyā śāstre yatante ye te brahmābhyāsinas sthitāḥ ।। 

sargādāv eva notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva tat sadā ।
idaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti bodhābhyāsaṃ viduḥ pare ।। 

dṛśyāsambhavabodhena rāgadveṣāditānave ।
ratir baloditā yāsau brahmābhyāsa udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

dṛśyāsambhavabodhena rāgadveṣāditānavam ।
tapa ity ucyate loke dṛśyadoṣas tu duḥkhakṛt ।। 

dṛśyāsambhavabodhe hi jñānaṃ jñeyasya kathyate ।
tadabhyāsena nirvāṇam ity abhyāso mahodayaḥ ।। 

bhavabahulaniśānitāntanidrā satatavivekavibodhavārisekaiḥ ।
pragalati himaśītalair ivoccaiḥ śaradi mahāmihikeva cetasīti ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

līlopākhyāne vijñānābhyāsavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti saṅkathanaṃ kṛtvā tasyāṃ niśi varāṅgane ।
supte parijane nūnam athāntaḥpuramaṇḍape ।। 

dṛḍhākhilārgaladvāragavākṣe dakṣacetasī ।
puṣpapūraṇasusphītamāṃsalāmodamanthare ।। 

amlānamālāvasanaśavapārśvāsanasthite ।
sakalāmalapūrṇenduvadanoddyotitāspade ।। 

samādhisthānakaṃ gatvā tasthatur niścalāṅgake ।
ratnastambhād ivotkīrṇe citrabhittāv ivārpite ।। 

sarvās tatyajatuś cintās saṅkocaṃ samupāgate ।
divasānta ivābjinyau prasṛtāmodalekhike ।। 

babhūvatur bhṛśaṃ śānte śuddhe spandavivarjite ।
girau śaradi nirvāta iva vṛṣṭyābhramālike ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhānāj jahatur vyomni saṃvidam ।
yathā kalpalate kānte pūrṇam ṛtvantare rasam ।। 

ahaṃ jagad iti bhrānter dṛśyasyādāv anudbhavaḥ ।
yadā tābhyām avagatas svātyantābhāvanātmakaḥ ।। 

tadā dṛśyapiśāco ayam alam astaṅgatas tayoḥ ।
asattvād eva cāsmākaṃ śaśaśṛṅgam ivānagha ।। 

ādāv eva hi yan nāsti vartamāne api tat tathā ।
bhātaṃ cābhātam evāto mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvaj jagat ।। 

svabhāvaḥ kevalaś śāntas strīdvayaṃ tad babhūva ha ।
candrārkādipadārthaughadūramuktam ivāmbaram ।। 

tenaiva jñānadehena tatāra jñaptidevatā ।
mānuṣī tv itareṇāśu jñānājñānānurūpiṇā ।। 

gehāntar eva prādeśamātram āruhya vai divaḥ ।
babhūvatuś cidākāśarūpiṇyau vyomagākṛtī ।। 

atha te lalane līlālāne lalitalocane ।
svabhāvāc cetyasaṃvitter nabho dūram ivāgate ।। 

tatrasthe ekacidvṛttyā pupluvāte nabhastalam ।
koṭiyojanavistīrṇaṃ dūrād dūratarāntaram ।। 

dṛśyānusandhānanijasvabhāvād ākāśadehe api te mitho atra ।
parasparākāravilokanena babhūvatus snehapare vayasye ।। 

līlopākhyāne līlāprajñaptyor vijñānadehākāśagamanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dūrād dūraṃ samāplutya śanair uccapadaṃ gate ।
haste hastaṃ samāsajya yāntyau dadṛśatur nabhaḥ ।। 

ekārṇavam ivocchūnaṃ gambhīraṃ nirmalāntaram ।
komalaṃ komalamarudasaṅgasukhabhogadam ।। 

āhlādakam alaṃ saumyaṃ śūnyatāmbhonimajjanāt ।
atyantaśuddhagambhīraṃ prasannam iva sajjanam ।। 

śṛṅgasthanirmalāmbhodapīnodarasudhālaye ।
viśaśramatur āśāsu pūrṇacandrodarāmale ।। 

siddhagandharvamandāramālāmodamanohare ।
candramaṇḍalaniṣkrānte remāte madhurānile ।। 

sasnatur bhūri gharmānte taḍidraktābjasaṅkule ।
sarasīva jalāpūramanthare meghajālake ।। 

bhūtalodyanmahāśailamṛnālāṅkurakoṭiṣu ।
dikṣu babhramatur bhūri bhramaryau sarasīṣv iva ।। 

dhārāgṛhadhiyā dhīragaṅgānirjharadhāriṇi ।
vavatur vātavikṣubdhameghamaṇḍalamaṇḍape ।। 

tato madhurakāminyau viśrāmyantyau svaśaktitaḥ ।
śūnye dadṛśatur vyoma mahāsaṃrambhamantharam ।। 

adṛṣṭapūrvam anyo'nyam anyasaṅkaṭakoṭaram ।
āpūryamāṇam āśūnyaṃ jagatkoṭiśatair api ।। 

upary upary upary uccair anyair anyair vṛtaṃ pṛthak ।
vicitrāvaraṇākārair bhūtābhrāṃśuvimānakaiḥ ।। 

paritaḥ pūritavyomnāṃ mervādikulabhūbhṛtām ।
padmarāgataṭoddyotaiḥ kalpajvālodaropamam ।। 

muktāśikharabhāpūrair himavatsānusundaram ।
kāñcanādristhalārcirbhiḥ kāñcanasthalabhāsuram ।। 

mahāmarakatābhābhiś śādvalasthalanīlima ।
draṣṭur dṛṣṭikṣayāsatyajātadhvāntotthakālima ।। 

pārijātalatālolavimānagaṇaketanam ।
bodhamañjaritākāram iva vaiḍūryabhūtalam ।। 

manovegamahāsiddhajitavātagamāgamam ।
vimānagṛhadevastrīgītavādyaravākulam ।। 

trailokyacarabhūtaughasañcāraviralāntaram ।
anyo'nyādṛṣṭasañcārasurāsurakulākulam ।। 

paryantasthitakumbhāṇḍarakṣoguhyakamaṇḍalam ।
vātaskandhamahāvegavahadvaimānikavrajam ।। 

vahadvimānajhāṅkāramuṣṭigrāhyaghanadhvani ।
graharkṣagaṇasañcārasañcaladvātayantrakam ।। 

nikaṭātapadagdhālpasiddhisiddhojjhitāspadam ।
arkāśvamukhavātāstadagdhamugdhavimānakam ।। 

lokapālāpsarovṛndasañcārācāracañcalam ।
devāntaḥpurikādagdhadhūpadhūmāmbudāvṛtam ।। 

vihagāhṛtadevastrīsvāṅgavibhraṣṭabhūṣaṇam ।
sāmānyasiddhāsahyogratejaḥpuñjatamobalam ।। 

balavatsiddhasaṅghaṭṭagamāgamavighaṭṭitaiḥ ।
ghanais sāṃśukapārśvasthahimavanmerumandaram ।। 

kākolūkais sagṛdhraughaiḥ puñjībhūtaiś calair vṛtam ।
nṛtyadbhir ḍākinīvāhais taraṅgair iva vāridhim ।। 

pranṛtyadyoginīsaṅghaiś śvakākoṣṭrakharānanaiḥ ।
nirarthaṃ yojanaśataṃ gatvāgacchadbhir āvṛtam ।। 

lokapālapurodvāntadhūpadhūmābhramandiram ।
siddhagandharvamithunaprārabdhasuratotsavam ।। 

svargagītaśravonmattakhadirākrāntamārgagam ।
anāratavahaddhiṣṇyalakṣalakṣitapakṣikam ।। 

vātaskandhanikhātāntavahattripathagājalam ।
āścaryālokanavyagrasañcarattridaśārbhakam ।। 

sandehasañcaradvajracakraśūlāsiśaktimat ।
kvacin nirbhittisadanagāyattumburunāradam ।। 

meghamārgamahāmeghamahārambhākulaṃ kvacit ।
citranyastasamākāramūkakalpāntavāridam ।। 

utpakṣakajjalādrīndrasundarāmbhodharaṃ kvacit ।
kvacit kanakaniṣṣyandakāntatāpādavāridam ।। 

kvacic candrābhatāpāḍhyavṛṣṭamūkāmbudāṃśukam ।
kvacin niṣpavanāmbhodhisaṃśāntaṃ śūnyatājalam ।। 

kvacid vātanadīprauḍhavimānatṛṇapallavam ।
kvacic caladalivrātapṛṣṭhatvakkāntinirmalam ।। 

kvacin merudarīkalpavātadhūlividhūsaram ।
kvacid vimānagīrvāṇaprabhābhiś citritāṅganam ।। 

kvacin nirambaronmattamātṛmaṇḍalamālitam ।
kvacin nityaravakṣīvakṣubdhayogīśvarīgaṇam ।। 

kvacic chāntasamādhisthaviśrāntamunimaṇḍalam ।
samaṃ dūrāstasaṃrambhaṃ sādhucittamanoharam ।। 

gāyatkinnaragandharvasurastrīmaṇḍalaṃ kvacit ।
kvacit stabdhapurākīrṇaṃ vahatsuravaraṃ kvacit ।। 

kvacid ruddhapurāpūraṃ kvacid baddhamahāpuram ।
kvacin māyākṛtapuraṃ kvacid āgāmipattanam ।। 

kvacid bhramaccandrasaraḥ kvacit stabdhapayassaraḥ ।
kvacit saratsiddhagaṇaṃ kvacid indukṛtodayam ।। 

kvacit sūryodayamayaṃ kvacid rātritamomayam ।
kvacit sandhyāṃśukapiśaṃ kvacin nīhāradhūsaram ।। 

kvacid vimānadhavalaṃ kvacid varṣatpayodharam ।
kvacit sthalam ivākāśam eva viśrāntalokapam ।। 

ūrdhvādhogamanavyagrasurāsuragaṇaṃ kvacit ।
pūrvāparottarāyāmyadiksañcārākulaṃ kvacit ।। 

api yojanalakṣāṇi kvacid duṣprāpadhūpakam ।
avināśatamaḥpūrṇadṛṣṭavad vyomavat kvacit ।। 

avināśibṛhattejaḥ kvacid arkānalopamam ।
himānījaṭharāśītaṃ kvacic candrādisadmasu ।। 

kvacid bṛhatpuronnṛtyatkalpavṛkṣalatāvanam ।
kvacid daityahatottuṅgaprapataddevapattanam ।। 

vaimānikanipātena vahnilekhāṅkitaṃ kvacit ।
kvacit ketuśatotpātamithassaṅghaṭṭaghaṭṭitam ।। 

kvacic chubhagrahagaṇapragṛhītādyamaṅgalam ।
kvacid rātritamovyāptaṃ kvacid divasabhāsuram ।। 

kvacid durgarjadambhodaṃ kvacin mūkacalāmbudam ।
vātāvakīrṇaśuklābhrakhaṇḍapuṣpotkaraṃ kvacit ।। 

kvacid atyantaniśśūnyam avadātam anantaram ।
ānandimṛduśāntācchaṃ jñasyeva hṛdayaṃ tatam ।। 

śukavāhanabhekaughaiḥ kvacid galakṛtāravam ।
śūnyatārābhivalitaṃ kṣetram ākāśavāsinām ।। 

mayūrahemacūḍādipakṣibhiḥ kvacid āvṛtam ।
vidyādharīṇāṃ devīnāṃ vāhanair vihitāspadaiḥ ।। 

kvacid abhrāntaronnṛtyadguhamāyūramaṇḍalam ।
kvacid agniśukaiś śyāmaṃ śādvalānām iva sthalam ।। 

kvacit preteśamahiṣamahimnā vāhanāmbudam ।
kvacid aśvais tṛṇagrāsaśaṅkāgrastāsitāmbudam ।। 

kvacid devapuravyāptaṃ kvacid daityapurānvitam ।
anyo'nyāprāpyanagaraṃ nagarandhrakarālinam ।। 

kvacit kulācalākāranṛtyadbhairavabhāsuram ।
kvacid gandharvanagarasurastrīvṛndabandhanam ।। 

kvacid kampadgiridhvastavṛkṣalakṣokṣitāmbudhim ।
kvacin māyākṛtākāśanalinījalaśītalam ।। 

kvacit sapakṣaśailendrasamanṛtyadvināyakam ।
kvacid ghargharavātāḍhyapakṣaproḍḍīnaparvatam ।। 

kvacid indukarāvṛṣṭiśītalāhlādimārutam ।
kvacit taptānalādagdhadrumaparvatavāridam ।। 

kvacid atyantasaṃśāntavātādyekāntanirdhvani ।
kvacit parvatatulyāgniśikhāsadṛśatodayam ।। 

kvacit prāvṛḍbharonmattaghanābhraravaghargharam ।
kvacit surāsuragaṇapravṛttaraṇadurgamam ।। 

kvacid vyomābjinīhaṃsīsvarāhūtājavāhanam ।
kvacin mandākinītīranalinīluṇṭhakānilam ।। 

śarīriṇīnāṃ gaṅgādisaritāṃ sannidhānataḥ ।
proḍḍīnamatsyamakarakulīrāntarakoṭaram ।। 

pātālagārkajanitabhūcchāyākākatodaram ।
kvacit kvacin maṇḍaleṣu grastacandrārkamaṇḍalam ।। 

kvacit svargānilādhūtamāyākusumakānanam ।
patatpuṣpahimāsāratrastavaimānikāṅganam ।। 

uḍumbarodaramaṣakakramabhramajjagattrayāntaragatabhūtasañcayam ।
vilaṅghya tad varalalane vimucya khaṃ mahītalaṃ punar api gantum udyate ।। 

līlopākhyāne gaganavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nabhastalād girigrāmaṃ gacchantyau kiñcid eva hi ।
jñapticittasthite bhūmitalaṃ dadṛśatus striyau ।। 

brahmāṇḍanarahṛtpadmaṃ digaṣṭakadalaṃ bṛhat ।
girikesarasambādhaṃ svāmodabharasundaram ।। 

saritkesarikānālam avaśyāyāmbubindukam ।
śarvarībhramarībhrāntaṃ bhūtaughamaṣakākulam ।। 

antarghuṇagaṇākīrṇaṃ surandhrais suṣirair vṛtam ।
uhyamānaṃ payaḥpūrair divasālokakāntimat ।। 

rasārdraṃ khe bhramaddhaṃsaṃ rātrisaṅkocabhājanam ।
pātālapaṅkanirmagnanāganāthamṛṇālakam ।। 

kadācid āspadāmbhodhikampakampitadigdalam ।
adho nāgagatānantadaityadānavakaṇṭakam ।। 

asuravraṇavallaryā sambhogasukumārayā ।
vyāptabhūbhṛnmahābījahṛdayaṃ bījabhūtayā ।। 

jambudvīpa iti khyātāṃ vipulāṃ tatra karṇikām ।
saritkesarikānālāṃ nagaragrāmakesarām ।। 

kulaśailoddhurottuṅgabījasaptakasundarīm ।
madhyasthoccamahāmerubījākrāntanabhastalām ।। 

saraḥprāleyakaṇikāvanajaṅgalayūthikām ।
svalekhāmaṇḍalāntassthajanajālābhramaṇḍalām ।। 

tāṃ yojanaśatākāraiḥ pratirākāṃ prabodhibhiḥ ।
sāgarair bhramarair vyāptāṃ dikcatuṣṭayaśāyibhiḥ ।। 

digdalāṣṭakaviśrāntasasvanāmbhojaṣaṭpadām ।
bhrātṛbhir navabhir bhūpair navadhā parikalpitām ।। 

lakṣayojanavistīrṇām ākīrṇāṃ ca rajolavaiḥ ।
nānājanapadavyūhasthirāvaśyāyaśīkarām ।। 

dvīpāt tu dviguṇaṃ sālaṃ lavaṇārṇavalekhayā ।
dadhatyā valitāṃ bāhye prakoṣṭham iva kambunā ।। 

tato api dviguṇaṃ dehaṃ dadhatyā valayākṛtim ।
jagadbhujalatāvyāptāṃ śākākhyadvīpalekhayā ।। 

tato api dviguṇākāradhāriṇyā pariveṣṭitām ।
pratyagrakṣīrapūrṇābdhilekhayā svāduśītayā ।। 

tato api dviguṇākāradhāriṇyā pariveṣṭitām ।
nānājanālaṅkṛtayā kuśākhyadvīpalekhayā ।। 

tato api dviguṇākāraṃ dhārayantyā viveṣṭitām ।
dadhyabdhilekhayā nityaṃ santarpitasuraughayā ।। 

tataḥ krauñcābhidhadvīpalekhayaivampramāṇayā ।
veṣṭitāṃ khātakhadayā navāṃ nṛpapurīm iva ।। 

tato api ca ghṛtāmbhodhilekhayaivampramāṇayā ।
tato api śalmalidvīpalekhayāmarapūrṇayā ।। 

tatas surāmahāmbhodhilekhayā puṣpaśubhrayā ।
śeṣasya dehalatayā harimūrtim ivāśritām ।। 

tato gomedakadvīpalekhayaivampramāṇayā ।
ikṣūdalekhayāpy evaṃ himavatsānuśuddhayā ।। 

tato api puṣkaradvīpalekhayā dviguṇasthayā ।
ante svādūdakāmbhodhilekhayaivampramāṇayā ।। 

saptasv arṇavalekhāsu nairṛte kakubantare ।
jalendhanajvalajjvālavaḍavāgnikaṇāṅkitām ।। 

tato api koṭidaśakaṃ taptakāñcanakāntayā ।
valitāṃ kāntiśālinyā bhuvā gīrvāṇabhogyayā ।। 

atha saptārṇavadvīpahemorvīṇāṃ pramāṇataḥ ।
tato daśaguṇenādhaḥ pātālatalagāminā ।। 

nikhātavalayenoccaiś śvabhrasambhārarūpiṇā ।
pātālagamamārgeṇa valitāṃ bhayadātmanā ।। 

etasmāt khalu sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇoccayā ।
āvyoma sacaturdikkaṃ śvabhrasambhārabhīmayā ।। 

ardhe mlānatamorūpalagnanīlotpalasrajā ।
nānāmāṇikyaśikharakalhārakumudābjayā ।। 

lokālokācalottālavipulāṭṭālamālayā ।
valitāṃ trijagallakṣmīdhammillavalanām iva ।। 

etasmād atha sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇātmanā ।
ajñātabhūtasañcāranāmnāraṇyena pālitām ।। 

etasmād atha sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇātmanā ।
nabhaseva caturdikkaṃ vyāptāṃ nirmalavāriṇā ।। 

etasmād atha sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇātmanā ।
mervādidrāvaṇotkena jvālājālena mālitām ।। 

etasmād atha sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇātmanā ।
mervādy apy acalanīkaṃ nayatā tṛṇapāṃsuvat ।। 

vahatādrīndravisphoṭakāridārvāgnihāriṇā ।
niśśūnyatvād aśabdena marutā parito vṛtām ।। 

etasmād atha sarvasmāt tato daśaguṇātmanā ।
parito valitāṃ vyomnā niśśūnyenaikarūpiṇā ।। 

atha yojanalakṣāṇāṃ śatena ghanarūpiṇā ।
vyāptāṃ brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍena haimena raviparvaṇā ।। 

iti jaladhimahādrilokapāla tridaśapurāmbarabhūtalapraṇītam ।
jagadudaram avekṣya mānuṣī prāg bhuvi nijamandirakoṭaraṃ dadarśa ।। 

līlopākhyāne bhūlokavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ

tato dadṛśatus sadma svam eva siddhayoṣitau ।
adṛśye eva lokasya maṇḍapaṃ brāhmaṇāspadam ।। 

cintāvidhuradāsīkaṃ bāṣpaklinnāṅganāmukham ।
vidhvastaprāyaracanaṃ śīrṇapattrāmbujopamam ।। 

naṣṭotsavapuraprāyam agastyāntam ivārṇavam ।
grīṣmadagdham ivodyānaṃ vidyuddagdham iva drumam ।। 

vātacchinnam ivāmbhodaṃ himadagdham ivāmbujam ।
svalpasnehadaśaṃ dīpam ivālokanakhedadam ।। 

āsannamṛtyutaruṇāntaravaktrakāntisaṃśīrṇajīrṇataruparṇavanopamānam ।
vṛṣṭivyapāyaparidhūsaradeśarūkṣaṃ jātaṃ gṛheśvaraviyogahataṃ gṛhaṃ tat ।। 

atha sā nirmalajñānacirābhyāsena sundarī ।
sampannā satyasaṅkalpā satyakāmā ca devavat ।। 

cintayām āsa mām ete devīṃ cemāṃ svabāndhavāḥ ।
paśyantu tāvat sāmānyalalanārūpadhāriṇīm ।। 

tato gṛhajanas tatra sa dadarśāṅganādvayam ।
lakṣmīgauryor yugam iva samudbhāsitamandiram ।। 

āpādaṃ vividhāmlānamālāvalanasundaram ।
vasantalakṣmyor yugalam ivāmoditakānanam ।। 

sarvauṣadhivanagrāmaṃ pūrayat taṃ rasāyanaiḥ ।
śītalāhlādasukhadaṃ candradvayam ivoditam ।। 

lambālakalatālolalocanālivilokitaiḥ ।
kirat kuvalayonmiśramālatīkusumotkarān ।। 

drutahemarasāpūrṇasaritsaraṇahāriṇā ।
dehaprabhāprabhāvena kanakīkṛtakānanam ।। 

sahajāyā vapur lakṣmyā līlādolāvilāsinā ।
tarateva taraṅgāḍhyanijalāvaṇyavāridheḥ ।। 

vilolabāhulatikāyugenāruṇapāṇinā ।
prakirad vā navaṃ haimakalpavṛkṣalatāvanam ।। 

pādair amṛditāmlānapuṣpapallavakomalaiḥ ।
phullābjadalamālābhair aspṛśadbhūtalaṃ punaḥ ।। 

tālītamālaṣaṇḍānāṃ śuṣkānāṃ śaśirociṣām ।
ālokanāmṛtāsekair janayad bālapallavān ।। 

namo astu vanadevībhyām ity uktvā kusumāñjalim ।
tatyāja jyeṣṭhaśarmātha sārdhaṃ gṛhajanena saḥ ।। 

papāta pādayor devyos tayos sakusumāñjaliḥ ।
prāleyaśīkarāsāraḥ padminyā iva padmayoḥ ।। 

jyeṣṭhaśarmādayaḥ

jayataṃ vanadevyau no duḥkhanāśārtham āgate ।
prāyaḥ paraparitrāṇam eva karma nijaṃ satām ।। 

devyāv abhavatāṃ snigdhāv iha brāhmaṇadampatī ।
sarvātithī kulakarau stambhabhūtau dvijasthiteḥ ।। 

tāv adya gṛham utsṛjya saputrapaśubāndhavam ।
svargaṃ gatau naḥ pitarau tena śūnyaṃ jagattrayam ।। 

pakṣiṇo vṛkṣam āruhya vikṣipantaḥ pratikṣaṇam ।
gṛhe śūnye mṛtāv utkāś śocanti madhurasvanaiḥ ।। 

guhā ghuraghurārāvapralāpakalanākulā ।
saritsthūlāśrudhārābhiḥ pariroditi parvataḥ ।। 

nirjharākrandahāriṇyo muktāmbarapayodharāḥ ।
taptaniśśvāsavidhvastāḥ paraṃ kārśyam itā diśaḥ ।। 

kṣatavikṣatasarvāṅgaḥ karuṇākrandakarkaśaḥ ।
upavāsaparo grāmo dīno mṛtiparas sthitaḥ ।। 

divasaṃ prati vṛkṣāṇām avaśyāyāsrubindavaḥ ।
gucchalocanakośebhyas tāpoṣṇā nipatanty adhaḥ ।। 

praśāntajanasañcārā rathyāḥ kṣāravidhūsarāḥ ।
vidhavā vigatānandās saṃśūnyahṛdayaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

kokilālipralāpinyo vṛṣṭibāṣpahatā latāḥ ।
uṣṇoṣṇaśvasanā dehaṃ ghnanti pallavapāṇibhiḥ ।। 

ātmānaṃ śatadhā kartuṃ bṛhacchvabhrāc chilātale ।
nirjharā nipatanty ete tāpataptaśarīrakāḥ ।। 

nissaṅkathā gataśrīkā mūkā vilulitāśayāḥ ।
andhena tamasā pūrṇā gṛhā gahanatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

udyānapuṣpaṣaṇḍebhyo rudadbhyo bhramarāravaiḥ ।
pūtigandho viniryāti svāmodāparanāmakaḥ ।। 

cūtadrumavilāsinyo virasāḥ prativāsaram ।
latāḥ kṛśā vilīyante saṅkucadgucchalocanāḥ ।। 

prakṣeptum ambudhau dehaṃ pravṛttā gantum ākulāḥ ।
kulyāḥ kalakalālolā lolayantyas tanuṃ bhuvi ।। 

aśaṅkamaṣakāpātaspandam apy aticāpalam ।
kalayantyas sthitā vāpyo nisspandānandam ātmani ।। 

gāyatkinnaragandharvavidyādharasurāṅganam ।
nūnam adya nabho jātam asmattātābhyalaṅkṛtam ।। 

tad devyau kriyatāṃ tāvad asmākaṃ śokanāśanam ।
mahatāṃ darśanaṃ nāma na kadācana niṣphalam ।। 

ity uktavantaṃ sā putraṃ mūrdhni pasparśa pāṇinā ।
pallavenānatā namraṃ mūlagranthim ivābjinī ।। 

tasyās sparśena tenāsau duḥkhadaurbhāgyasaṅkaṭam ।
jahau prāvṛḍghanāsaṅgād grīṣmatāpam ivācalaḥ ।। 

sarvo gṛhajanas so atha tayor devyor vilokanāt ।
lakṣmīvān duḥkhanirmukto babhūvāmṛtapo yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

tayāsya līlayā mātrā putrasya jyeṣṭhaśarmaṇaḥ ।
kasmān na darśanaṃ dattaṃ no dattaḥ kathito athavā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

buddhaḥ pṛthvyādibodhena yena pṛthvyādisaṅghakaḥ ।
tasya piṇḍātmatāṃ dhatte vyomaivānyasya kevalam ।। 

asad evāṅga sad iva bhāti pṛthvyādivedanāt ।
yathā bālasya vetālo na bhāti tadavedanāt ।। 

yathā pṛthvyāditā bhātā na pṛthvyādi bhavet kṣaṇāt ।
svapne svapnaparijñānāt tathā jāgraty api sphuṭam ।। 

pṛthvyādi khatayā buddhaṃ kham ity evānubhūyate ।
tathā hi kṣubdhadhātūnāṃ kuḍye api kha ivodyamaḥ ।। 

svapne nagaram urvī vā śūnyaṃ khātaṃ ca budhyate ।
svapnāṅganā ca kurute śūnyāpy arthakriyā nṛṇām ।। 

khaṃ pṛthvyāditayā buddhaṃ pṛthvyādi bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
mūrchayā paraloko api pratyakṣam anubhūyate ।। 

bālo vyomaiva vetālaṃ mriyamāno ambaraṃ vanam ।
keśoṇḍukaṃ kham anyas tu kham anyo vetti mauktikam ।। 

trastakṣīvārdhanidrāś ca nauyānāś ca sadaiva khe ।
vetālavac ca vṛkṣādi paśyanty anubhavaty api ।। 

prathābhāvitam eteṣāṃ padārthānām ado vapuḥ ।
abhyāsajanitaṃ bhāvi nāsty ekaṃ paramārthataḥ ।। 

līlayā tu yathāvastu buddhaṃ pṛthvyādi nāsti tat ।
ākāśam eva saṃvittyā bhāvitvāditayoditam ।। 

brahmātmaikacidākāśamātrabodhavato muneḥ ।
putramitrakalatrāṇi kathaṃ kāni kadā kutaḥ ।। 

hastaś śirasi yad datto līlayā jyeṣṭhaśarmaṇaḥ ।
tat pravāhasthitārambhasambodhāyāś citeḥ phalam ।। 

bodho hi cetati yathaiva tathā vibhāti sūkṣmas tu khād atitarāṃ ca tathā viśuddhaḥ ।
sarvatra rāghava sa eva padārthajālaṃ svapneṣu kalpitapureṣv anubhūtam eva ।। 

līlopākhyāne siddhadarśanahetukathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmin giritaṭe grāme tasmin maṇḍapakodare ।
antardhim āśv āyayatus tatrasthe eva te striyau ।। 

asmākaṃ vanadevībhyāṃ prasādaḥ kṛta ity atha ।
śāntaduḥkhe gṛhajane puṇyapārapare sthite ।। 

maṇḍapākāśasaṃlīnā līlām āha sarasvatī ।
vyomarūpā vyomarūpāṃ smayāt tūṣṇīm avasthitām ।। 

saṅkalpasvapnayor moghakriyāyāḥ kathanaṃ mithaḥ ।
yathehārthakriyāṃ dhatte tayos sā saṅkathā tathā ।। 

pṛthvyādināḍīprāṇāder ṛte apy abhyuditā tayoḥ ।
sā saṅkathanasaṃvittis svapnasaṅkalpayor iva ।। 

sarasvatī

jñeyaṃ jñātam aśeṣeṇa dṛṣṭā draṣṭavyasaṃvidaḥ ।
īdṛśīyaṃ brahmasattā kim anyad vada pṛcchasi ।। 

līlā

mṛtasya bhartur jīvo asau yatra rājyaṃ karoti me ।
tatrāhaṃ kiṃ na tair dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāsmīha sutena kim ।। 

sarasvatī

abhyāsena vinā vatse tadā te dvaitaniścayaḥ ।
nūnam astaṅgato nābhūd ṛtusandhāv ṛtur yathā ।। 

advaitaṃ yo na yāto asau katham advaitakarmabhiḥ ।
yujyate tāpasaṃsthasya cchāyāṅgānubhavaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

līlāsmīti vinābhyāsaṃ tatra nāstaṅgato abhavat ।
yadā bhāvas tadā satyasaṅkalpatvam abhūn na te ।। 

adyāpi satyānubhavās saṅkalpās tena māṃ yayuḥ ।
sampaśyatv ity abhimataṃ phalitaṃ tava sundari ।। 

idānīṃ tasya bhartus tvaṃ samīpaṃ yadi gacchasi ।
tat tena vyavahāras te pūrvavat sampravartate ।। 

līlā

ihaiva mandirākāśe patir vipro mamābhavat ।
ihaiva sa mṛto bhūtvā sampanno vasudhādhipaḥ ।। 

ihaiva tasya saṃsāre tasmin bhūmaṇḍalāntare ।
rājadhānīpure tasmin purandhry asmi vyavasthitā ।। 

ihaivāntaḥpure tasmin sa mṛto mama bhūmipaḥ ।
ihaivāntaḥpurākāśe tasminn eva punar nṛpaḥ ।। 

sampanno vasudhāpīṭhe nānājanapadeśvaraḥ ।
sarvo javañjavībhāva ihaivāyam avasthitaḥ ।। 

asminn eva gṛhākāśe sarvā brahmāṇḍabhūtayaḥ ।
sthitās samudgakośasya yathāntas sarṣapotkarāḥ ।। 

tad adūram ahaṃ manye tad bhartur mama maṇḍalam ।
kvacit pārśvasthitam iha yathā paśyāmi tat kuru ।। 

śrīdevī

bhūtalārundhatisute bhartāras tava samprati ।
trayo nāmāthavābhūvan bahavaś śatasammitāḥ ।। 

nedīyasāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu dvijas te bhasmasādgataḥ ।
rājā mālyāmbaravṛtas saṃsthito antaḥpure śavaḥ ।। 

saṃsāramaṇḍape apy asmiṃs tṛtīyo vasudhādhipaḥ ।
mahāsaṃsārajaladhau patito bhramam āgataḥ ।। 

bhogakallolavalanāvikalākulacetanaḥ ।
jāḍyajarjaracidvṛttis saṃsārāmbhodhikacchapaḥ ।। 

citrāṇi rājakāryāṇi kurvann atyākulāny api ।
suptaḥ tejassthitatayā na jāgarti bhavabhrame ।। 

īśvaro aham ahaṃ bhogī siddho ahaṃ balavān sukhī ।
ity anantamahārajjvā valito vaśatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

tat kasya vada bhartus tvāṃ samīpe varavarṇini ।
vātyā vanāntaraṃ gandhalekhām iva vanān naye ।। 

anya eva sa saṃsāras sevyo brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapaḥ ।
anyā eva ca tā vatse vyavahāraparamparāḥ ।। 

saṃsāramaṇḍalānīha tāni pārśve sthitāny api ।
nūnaṃ yojanakoṭīnāṃ koṭayas teṣv ihāntaram ।। 

ākāśamātram eteṣām idaṃ paśya vapuḥ puraḥ ।
merumandarakoṭīnāṃ koṭayas teṣv iha sthitāḥ ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇau sargavargā nirargalam ।
mahācitas sphuranty antā rucīva trasareṇavaḥ ।। 

mahārambhagurūṇy evam api brahmāṇḍakāni ca ।
tulāyāṃ dhānakāmātram api tāni bhavanti no ।। 

nānāratnācaloddyoto vanavad bhāti khe yathā ।
pṛthvyādibhūtarahitā jagadvad bhāti cit tathā ।। 

kacati jñaptir eveyaṃ jagad ityādināmabhiḥ ।
na tu pṛthvyādi sampannaṃ sargādāv eva kiñcana ।। 

yathā taraṅgas sariti bhūtvā bhūtvā punar bhavet ।
vicitrākārakalanādeśā jātāsy alaṃ tathā ।। 

līlā

evam etaj jaganmātar mayā mṛtam ihādhunā ।
mamedaṃ rājasaṃ janma tāmasaṃ no na sāttvikam ।। 

brahmaṇas tv avatīrṇāyā aṣṭau janmaśatāni me ।
nānāyonīny atītāni paśyāmīvādhunā puraḥ ।। 

saṃsāramaṇḍale devi kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ purā ।
lokāntarābjabhramarī vidyādharavarāṅganā ।। 

durvāsanākaluṣitā tato ahaṃ mānuṣī sthitā ।
saṃsāramaṇḍale anyasmiṃs taṅgaṇeśvarakāminī ।। 

karañjakuñjajambīrakadambavanavāsinī ।
pattrāmbaradharā śyāmā śabary aham athābhavam ।। 

vanavāsanayā mugdhā sampannāham atho latā ।
gulucchanayanā pattrahastā vananivāsinī ।। 

puṇyāśramalatā sāhaṃ munisaṅgapavitritā ।
vanāgnidagdhā tasyaiva kanyābhūvaṃ mahāmuneḥ ।। 

astrītvaphaladātṝṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ pariṇāmataḥ ।
rājāhaṃ cābhavaṃ śrīmān surāṣṭreṣu samāś śatam ।। 

tālīnāṃ talakaccheṣu rājaduṣkṛtadoṣataḥ ।
nakulī navavarṣāṇi kuṣṭhanaṣṭāṅgikābhavam ।। 

varṣāṇy aṣṭau surāṣṭreṣu devi gotvaṃ mayā kṛtam ।
soḍhuṃ durjanaduṣṭājñabālagopālalīlayā ।। 

vihaṅgyā vairivinyastā vāgurā vipināvanau ।
kleśena mahatā cchinnā adyemā vāsanā iva ।। 

karṇikākroḍaśayyāsu viśrāntam alinā saha ।
padmakuḍmalakośeṣu bhuktakiñjalkayā rahaḥ ।। 

bhrāntam uttuṅgaśṛṅgāsu hariṇyā hārinetrayā ।
vanasthalīṣu ramyāsu kirātahatamarmayā ।। 

dṛṣṭam aṣṭāsu dikṣv abdhikallolair uhyamānayā ।
matsyāśvakacchapāsphoṭaraṭanāṭanatāḍanam ।। 

pītaṃ carmaṇvatītīre gāyantyā madhurasvanam ।
sāratas surate svairaṃ samantāt sādhurañjitaḥ ।। 

tālītamālakuñjeṣu taralānananetrayā ।
kṣīvayekṣaṇavikṣobhaiḥ kṛtaṃ kāntāvalokanam ।। 

kanakasyandasandohasundarair aṅkapaṅkajaiḥ ।
svargāpsaro'mbujinyāśutoṣitā suraṣaṭpadā ।। 

maṇikāñcanamāṇikyamuktānikarabhūtale ।
kalpadrumavane meror yūnā saha rataṃ kṛtam ।। 

kallolākulakacchāsu lasadgulugulāsu ca ।
velāvanaguhāsv abdheś ciraṃ kūrmatayā sthitam ।। 

nalinīnāladolāsu dolanaṃ sarasānilam ।
calatpattrasajālāsu rājahaṃsatayā kṛtam ।। 

śādvalīdaladolānām āndolanavinidratām ।
maṣakasya mayālokya dīnaṃ maṣikayā sthitam ।। 

tarattārataraṅgāsu cañcadvīcyagracumbanaiḥ ।
bhrāntaṃ śailasravantīṣu jalavañjulabālayā ।। 

gandhamādanamandāramandire madanāturaḥ ।
patitaḥ pādayoḥ pūrvaṃ vidyādharakumārakaḥ ।। 

kīrṇakarpūrapūteṣu talpeṣu vyasanāturā ।
ciraṃ vilulitāsmīndor bimbeṣv iva śaśiprabhā ।। 

yoniṣv anekavidhaduḥkhaśatānvitāsu bhrāntaṃ mayonnamanasannamanākulāṅgyā ।
saṃsāradīrghasaritaś calayā laharyā durvāravātahariṇīsaraṇakrameṇa ।। 

līlopākhyāne janmāntaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

vajrāṅgasārād brahmāṇḍakuḍyān nibiḍamaṇḍalāt ।
koṭiyojanasaṃviṣṭāt kathaṃ te nirgate ubhe ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kva brahmāṇḍaṃ kva tadbhittiḥ kvātrāsau vajrasāratā ।
kilāvaśyaṃ sthite devyāv antaḥpuravarāmbare ।। 

tasminn eva girigrāme tasminn evālayāmbare ।
brāhmaṇas sa vasiṣṭhākhya āsvādayati rājatām ।। 

tam eva maṇḍapākāśakoṇakaṃ śūnyamātrakam ।
catussamudraparyantaṃ bhūtalaṃ so anubhūtavān ।। 

ākāśātmani bhūpīṭhe tasmiṃs tad rājapattanam ।
rājasadmānubhavati sa ca sā cāpy arundhatī ।। 

līlābhidhānā sañjātā tayā ca jñaptir arcitā ।
jñaptyā saha samullaṅghya kham āścaryamanoramam ।। 

prādeśamātre nabhasi sā tatraiva gṛhodare ।
brahmāṇḍāntaram āsādya giriṃ vāsavamandiram ।। 

brahmāṇḍāt parinirgatya svagṛhe sthitim āyayau ।
svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ prāpya yathā talpagataḥ pumān ।। 

pratibhāmātram evaitat sarvam ākāśamātrakam ।
na brahmāṇḍaṃ na saṃsāro na kuḍyādi na dūratā ।। 

svacittam eva kacati tayos tādṛṅ manoharam ।
vāsanāmātrasollekhaṃ kva brahmāṇḍaṃ kva saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

nirāvaraṇam evedaṃ jñaptyākāśam anantakam ।
kiñcit svacittenonnītaṃ spandayuktyeva mārutaḥ ।। 

cidākāśam ajaṃ śāntaṃ sarvatraiva hi sarvadā ।
cittvāj jagad ivābhāti svayam evātmanātmani ।। 

yena buddhaṃ tu tasyaitad ākāśād api śūnyakam ।
na buddhaṃ yena tasyaitad vajrasārācalopamam ।। 

gṛha eva yathā svapne nagaraṃ bhāti bhāsvaram ।
tathaitad asad evāntaś ciddhātau bhāti bhāsvaram ।। 

yathā marujale ambutvaṃ kaṭakatvaṃ ca hemani ।
asat sad iva bhātīdaṃ tathā dṛśyatvam ātmani ।। 

evam ākalayantyau te lalane lalanākṛtī ।
gṛhān niryayatur bāhyaṃ cārucaṅkramaṇakramaiḥ ।। 

adṛśye grāmalokena prekṣamāṇe puro girim ।
cumbitākāśakuharaṃ saṃsprṣṭādityamaṇḍalam ।। 

nānāvarṇākhilotphullavicitravanakambalam ।
nānānirjharanirdhūtakūjadvanavihaṅgamam ।। 

vicitramañjarīpuñjapiñjarāmbudamaṇḍalam ।
abhrakacchagulucchāgraviśrāntakhagasāravam ।। 

sāravañjulavistāraguptākhilasarittaṭam ।
asamāptaśilāśvabhralatānartanamārutam ।। 

puṣpābhrapihitākāśakośakuṭṭakavāridam ।
pataddīrghasaritsrotassitamuktākalāpakam ।। 

caladvṛkṣavanavyūhavātaghaṭṭitadiktaṭam ।
nānāvanākulopāntacchāyāsatataśītalam ।। 

atha te lalane tatra tadā dadṛśatus svayam ।
taṃ girigrāmakaṃ vyomnas svargakhaṇḍam iva cyutam ।। 

vahatpraṇālīpaṭalaṃ pūrṇapuṣkariṇījalam ।
dvijaiḥ kurukucaiḥ kūjat suṣiraśvabhrakacchalam ।। 

garjadgovṛndahuṅkārakarālākhilakuñjakam ।
guñjāgulmakaṣaṇḍāḍhyaṃ sacchāyaghanamārutam ।। 

duṣpraveśārkakiraṇaṃ pṛthaṅ nīhāradhūsaram ।
udañcanmañjarīpuñjajaṭālaviśikhāntaram ।। 

śilāphalahakasphāraprocchalacchuklanirjharaiḥ ।
smāritācalanirdhūtakṣīrodadhijalaśriyam ।। 

phalamālāmahābhārabhāsurair ajiradrumaiḥ ।
ānīya puṣpasambhāraṃ tiṣṭhadbhir iva saṅkulam ।। 

tarattaralajhāṅkārakārimārutakampitaiḥ ।
kīrṇapuṣpamahāvṛṣṭiṃ drumair iva rasākulaiḥ ।। 

aśaṅkitaśilākūṭasravadabbindujhāṅkṛtaiḥ ।
kiñcitkṛtaravaṃ guptair aśaṅkaiś śaṅkitaiḥ khagaiḥ ।। 

utphālalaharīprāntaśīkarāsvādanākulaiḥ ।
nadyām uḍḍayanāvartavṛttibhir vihagair vṛtam ।। 

uttālatālaviśrāntakākālokanaśaṅkitaiḥ ।
bālaiḥ pragopitāmikṣākhaṇḍaṃ jīrṇasvabhūptakaiḥ ।। 

puṣpaśekharasambhāravasanagrāmabālakam ।
kadambanimbajambīragahanopāntaśītalam ।। 

kṣaumānutastāsvarayā mañjarīpūrṇakarṇayā ।
kṣutkṣāntayā bhrāntarathyaṃ grāmakheṭakakāntayā ।। 

sarittaraṅgasaṅghaṭṭasaṃrāvāśrutasaṅkatham ।
karṇajāḍyaghanatrāsavāñchitaikāntasaṃsthitim ।। 

dadhiliptāsyahastāṃsair baddhapuṣpalatādharaiḥ ।
nagnair gomayapaṅkāṅkair bālair ākulacatvaram ।। 

tīraśādvalavallīnāṃ dolāndolanahāribhiḥ ।
taraṅgair vāhyamānāmbulekhikāṅkitasaikatam ।। 

dadhikṣīraghanāmodamattamantharamakṣikam ।
kālyabhaktārthanodbāṣpajarjarāmbarabālakam ।। 

gomayāsiktavalayakaravārīkṛtakrudham ।
dhammillavalanāvyagrabhūtastrīvihasajjanam ।। 

dāntapucchacchaṭacchannapatatkakudavāyasam ।
gṛharathyāṅganadvārakīrṇakundakaraṇḍakam ।। 

gṛhapārśvasthitaśvabhrajātaiḥ kusumitadrumaiḥ ।
pratyahaṃ prātar āgulpham ākīrṇakusumājiram ।। 

saraccāmarasāraṅgacalajaṅgalaṣaṇḍakam ।
guñjānikuñjasañjātaśaṣpasuptamṛgārbhakam ।। 

ekāntarāstavatsaikakarṇaspandāstamakṣikam ।
gopocchiṣṭīkṛtadadhisamparkāspandamakṣikam ।। 

samastasadmasu kṣīṇamākṣikākṣiptamakṣikam ।
phullāśokadrumoddyotakṛtalākṣikamandiram ।। 

śīkarāsāramarutā nityārdravikacaddrumam ।
kadambamukulaprotasaptacchadacchadotkaram ।। 

vṛtivrātalatāphullaketakotkaramālinam ।
bṛhatpraṇālīpaṭalīraṇadruṭaruṭāravam ।। 

vātāyanaguhāniryatsaudhaviśrāntavāridam ।
pūrṇapuṣkariṇīpaṅktipūtarājapathāntaram ।। 

nīrandhraviṭapacchāyāśītalāmalaśādvalam ।
sarvapuṣpāsravadbindupratibimbitatārakam ।। 

anāratapatatpuṣpahimavarṣasitālayam ।
vicitramañjarīpuṣpapattrapalvalapādapam ।। 

gṛhakakṣyāntarālīnameghaguptaciraṇṭikam ।
saudhasthameghavidyudbhir anādeyapradīpakam ।। 

kandarānilajhāṅkāraghanaghuṅghumamaṇḍapam ।
caraccakorahārītahariṇīhārimandiram ।। 

unnidrakandalodvāntamāṃsalāmodamantharaiḥ ।
marudbhir mandam ādātum ārabdhair lolapallavam ।। 

lāvakālāpalīlāyām ālīnalalanākulam ।
kokakokilakākolakolāhalasamākulam ।। 

sālatālītamālāḍhyanīlapalvalamālitam ।
valīvalayavinyāsavilāsavalitadhruvam ।। 

ālolapallavalatāvalitālayānām utphullakandalasilindhrasugandhitānām ।
sārāvavārivalanākulagokulānām ānīlaṣaṣpakusumasthalaśobhitānām ।। 

tīradrumaprakaraguptasaridrayāṇām nīrandhrapuṣpitalatogravitānakānām ।
udyānakundamakarandasugandhitānām gandhāndhaṣaṭpadakulāntaritāmbudānām ।। 

saundaryatarjitapurandaramandirāṇām rājīvarājirajasāruṇitāmbarāṇām ।
raṃhovahadgirinadīravaghargharāṇām kundāvadātajaladadyutibhāsurāṇām ।। 

saudhasthalollasitapuṣpalatālayānāṃ līlāvilolakalakaṇṭhavihaṅgamānām ।
ullāsikausumadalāstaraṇasthayūnām āpādam āvalitamālyavilāsinīnām ।। 

sarvaṃ tu sundaranavāṅkuradanturāṇām helollasadvanalatākulamārgagāṇām ।
sañjātakomalalatopalasaṅkulānām varṣatpayodapaṭasaṃvalitālayāṇām ।। 

nīhārahāriharitasthalavistṛtānām saudhasthameghataḍidākulitāṅganānām ।
nīlotpalollasitasaurabhasundarāṇām huṅkārahāriharitonmukhagokulānām ।। 

vidhvastamugdhamṛgaśāvagṛhāṅganānām unmattabarhigaṇaśīkaranirjharāṇām ।
saugandhyamattapavanāhṛtasaurabhānām vaprauṣadhijvalanavismṛtadīpakānām ।।
