kolāhalākulakulāyakulākulānām kulyākulākalakalāśrutasaṅkathānām ।
muktāphalaprakarasundarabindupātaśītākhiladrumalatātṛṇapallavānām ।। 

lakṣmīm anastamitapuṣpavikāsabhājām ।
śaknoti kaḥ kalayituṃ girimandirāṇām ।। 

līlopākhyāne girigrāmavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tatra te petatur devyau grāme antaśśītalātmani ।
bhogamokṣaśriyau śānte puṃsīva viditātmani ।। 

kālenaitāvatā līlā tenābhyāsena sābhavat ।
śuddhajñānaikadehatvāt trikālāmaladarśinī ।। 

atha sasmāra sarvās tāḥ prāktanīs saṃsṛter gatīḥ ।
svās svayaṃ svarasenaiva prāgjanmamaraṇādikāḥ ।। 

līlā

devi deśam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvatprasādāt smarāmy aham ।
iha tat prāktanaṃ sarvaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ veṣṭitāntaram ।। 

ihābhūvam ahaṃ jīrṇā sirālāṅgī kṛśāsitā ।
brāhmaṇī śuṣkadarbhāgrabhedarūkṣakarodarā ।। 

bhartuḥ kulakarī bhāryā dohamanthānaśobhinī ।
mātā sakalaputrāṇām atithīnāṃ priyaṅkarī ।। 

devadvijasatāṃ bhaktā siktāṅgī ghṛtagorasaiḥ ।
gargarīcarukumbhādibhāṇḍopaskaraśodhinī ।। 

nityam annalavāktaikakācakambuprakoṣṭhakā ।
jāmātṛduhitṛbhrātṛpitṛmātṛprapūjinī ।। 

ādehaṃ sadmavṛttyaiva prakṣīṇadinayāminī ।
vācaṃ ciraṃ ciram iti vadanty aniśam ākulā ।। 

kāhaṃ ka iva saṃsāra iti svapne apy asaṅkathā ।
jāyā śrotriyamūḍhasya tādṛśasyaiva durdhiyaḥ ।। 

ekaniṣṭhā samicchākagomayendhanasañcaye ।
mlānakambalasaṃvītasirālakṣā sagātrikā ।। 

tarṇakīkarṇajāhasthakriminiṣkāsatatparā ।
gṛhaśākavanāsekasatvarā gṛhakarmaṇāṃ ।। 

nīlatīrataraṅgāktatṛṇatarpitatarṇakā ।
pratikṣaṇaṃ gṛhadvārakṛtacandanavarṇakā ।। 

nītyarthaṃ gṛhabhṛtyānāṃ sādināṃ kṛtavācyatā ।
maryādāniyamād abdhivelevāniśam acyutā ।। 

jīrṇaparṇasavarṇaikakarṇadolādhirūḍhayā ।
kaṣṭatāpajarābhītajīvabhṛtyeva cihnitā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā sañcarantī sā śikharigrāmakoṭare ।
sañcarantyās sarasvatyā darśayām āsa sā svayam ।। 

iyaṃ me pāṭalāṣaṇḍamaṇḍitā puṣpavāṭikā ।
iyaṃ me puṣpitodyānamaṇḍapākāravāṭikā ।। 

iyaṃ puṣkariṇītīradrumagrathitatarṇakā ।
iyaṃ sā karṇikānāmnī tarṇikā bhuktaparṇikā ।। 

iyaṃ sā medasā kṣīṇā varākī jalahārikā ।
adyāṣṭamaṃ dinaṃ bāṣpapūrṇākṣī pariroditi ।। 

iha devi mayā proktam ihoṣitam iha sthitam ।
iha suptam ihātītam idaṃ dattam ihāhṛtam ।। 

eṣa me jyeṣṭhaśarmākhyaḥ putro roditi mandire ।
eṣā me jaṅgale dhenur doghdrī carati śādvalam ।। 

gṛhe avasannaṃ dāhāya rūkṣaṃ kṣāravidhūsaram ।
svaṃ deham iha pañcākhyaṃ paśyemaṃ praghanaṃ mama ।। 

tumbīlatābhir ugrābhis tṛṣṇābhir iva veṣṭitam ।
mahānasasthānam idaṃ mama deham ivāparam ।। 

ete rodanatāmrākṣā bandhavo bhuvi bandhanam ।
aṅgadārpitarudrākṣā āharanty analendhanam ।। 

anārataṃ śilākacchagucchācchoṭanakāribhiḥ ।
taraṅgais tuṅgitākāraspṛṣṭatīralatādalaiḥ ।। 

śīkarākīrṇaparyantaśādvalasthalavellitaiḥ ।
śilāphalahakāsphālaphenilotphālaśīkaraiḥ ।। 

tuṣārīkṛtamadhyāhnadivākarakarotkaraiḥ ।
phullapuṣpotkarāsārapradānotkataṭadrumaiḥ ।। 

vidrumair iva saṅkrāntaphullakiṃśukakāntibhiḥ ।
vyāptayā puṣparāśīnāṃ samullāsanakāribhiḥ ।। 

uhyamānaphalāpūrasuvyagragrāmabālayā ।
mahākalakalāvartasaktayā grāmyakulyayā ।। 

veṣṭitas taralāsphālajaladhautatalopamaḥ ।
ghanapattratarucchattracchāyāsatataśītalaḥ ।। 

ayam ālakṣyate puṣpalatāvalanasundaraḥ ।
laladgulucchakacchannagavākṣo gṛhamaṇḍapaḥ ।। 

atra me saṃsthito bhartā jīvākāśalavākṛtiḥ ।
catussamudraparyantamekhalāyā bhuvaḥ patiḥ ।। 

āsmṛtaṃ pūrvam etena kilāsīd abhivāñchitam ।
śīghraṃ syām iva rājeti tīvrasaṃvegadharmiṇā ।। 

dinair aṣṭabhir evāsau tena rājyaṃ samṛddhimat ।
cirakālapratyayadaṃ prāptavān parameśvari ।। 

atrāsau bhartṛjīvo me gṛhe vyomni sthito nṛpaḥ ।
adṛśyaḥ khe yathā vāyur āmodo vā yathānile ।। 

ihaivāṅguṣṭhamātrānte tad vyomnīva padaṃ sthitam ।
madbhartṛrājyaṃ mama tu gataṃ yojanakoṭitām ।। 

āvāṃ kham eva tat khaṃ ca bhartṛrājyaṃ mameśvari ।
pūrṇaṃ sahasraiś śailānām aho māyeyam ātatā ।। 

tad devi bhartur nikaṭaṃ punar gantuṃ mamepsitam ।
tad ehi tatra gacchāvaḥ kiṃ dūraṃ vyavasāyinām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā praṇatā devīṃ sā praviśyāśu maṇḍapam ।
vihaṅgīva tayā sārdhaṃ pupluve asinibhaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

bhinnāñjanacayaprakhyaṃ saumyaikārṇavasundaram ।
nārāyaṇāṅgasadṛśaṃ bhṛṅgapṛṣṭhāmalachavim ।। 

meghamārgam atikramya vātaskandhāvaniṃ tathā ।
sauraṃ mārgam athākramya cāndraṃ mārgam atītya ca ।। 

dhruvamārgottaraṃ gatvā sādhyānāṃ mārgam eva ca ।
siddhānāṃ samatītyorvīm ullaṅghya svargamaṇḍalam ।। 

brahmalokāntare gatvā tuṣitānāṃ ca maṇḍalam ।
golokaṃ śivalokaṃ ca pitṛlokam atītya ca ।। 

videhānāṃ ca devānāṃ dūram uttīrya dūragam ।
dūrād dūrataraṃ gatvā kiñcid ruddhā babhūva sā ।। 

paścād ālokayām āsa samatītaṃ nabhastalam ।
yāvan na kiñcic candrārkatārādy ālakṣyate hy adhaḥ ।। 

tamas stimitagambhīram āśākuharapūrakam ।
ekārṇavodaraprakhyaṃ śilodaraghanaṃ sthitam ।। 

līlā

tad devi bhāskarādīnāṃ kvādhas tejo gataṃ vada ।
śilājaṭharanisspandaṃ muṣṭigrāhyaṃ tamaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

devī

etāvatīm imāṃ vyomnaḥ padavīm āgatāsi bhoḥ ।
arkādīny api tejāṃsi yato dṛśyanta eva no ।। 

yathā mahāndhakūpādhaḥ khadyoto nāvalokyate ।
pṛṣṭhagena tathehāto nādhas sūryo avalokyate ।। 

līlā

aho nu padavīm etāṃ dūrām āvām upāgate ।
sūryo apy adho aṇukaṇavan na manāg api lakṣyate ।। 

ita uttaram anyā syāt padavī kā nu kīdṛśī ।
kathaṃ ca pātanī bhavyā kathyatām iti devi me ।। 

sarasvatī

ita uttaram agre te brahmāṇḍapuṭakarparam ।
yasya vajrādayo nāma dhūlileśās samutthitāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti prakathayantyau te prāpte brahmāṇḍakarparam ।
bhramaryāv iva śailasya kuḍyaṃ nibiḍamaṇḍalam ।। 

akleṣenaiva te tasmān nirgate gaganād iva ।
niścayatvaṃ hi yad vastu tad vajragati netarat ।। 

nirāvaraṇavijñānā sā dadarśa tatas tataḥ ।
jalādyāvaraṇān pāre brahmāṇḍasyātibhāsurān ।। 

brāhmād aṇḍād daśaguṇaṃ toyatattvaṃ vyavasthitam ।
āsthitaṃ veṣṭayitvā tat tvag ivākṣoṭapṛṣṭhagā ।। 

tasmād daśaguṇo vahnis tasmād daśaguṇo anilaḥ ।
tato daśaguṇaṃ vyoma tataḥ paramam ambaram ।। 

tasmin paramake vyomni madhyādyantavikalpanāḥ ।
na kāścana samudyanti vandhyāputrakathā iva ।। 

kevalaṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ tad anādi gatabhramam ।
ādyantamadhyarahitaṃ mahaty ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

ākalpam uttamabalena śivāpatiś cet tasmin balād garuḍaketurathotpateś cet ।
taddhyānato avalabhate vimale ambare antam ākalpam ekajavagāmy atha māruto api ।। 

līlopākhyāne paramākāśavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

triṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pṛthivyaptejasām atra nabhasvannabhasor api ।
yathottaraṃ daśaguṇān atītyāvarakān kṣaṇāt ।। 

dadarśa paramākāśaṃ tat pramāṇavivarjitam ।
tathā tataṃ jagad idaṃ yathā tatrāṇumātrakam ।। 

tādṛkṣāvaraṇān sargān brahmāṇḍeṣu dadarśa sā ।
koṭiśas sphuritā vyomni trasareṇur ivātape ।। 

mahākāśamahāmbhodhau mahāśūnyatvavāriṇi ।
mahāciddravabhāvotthān budbudān arbudakramān ।। 

kāṃścid āpatato adhastāt kāṃścic copari gacchataḥ ।
kāṃścit tiryaggatīn anyān sthitān stabdhān svasaṃvidā ।। 

yatra yatroditā saṃvid yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ yathā yathā ।
tatra tatroditaṃ rūpaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ tathā tathā ।। 

na caiva tatra nāmordhvaṃ nādho na ca gamāgamāḥ ।
anyad eva padaṃ kiñcid asmaddehāgamaṃ hi tat ।। 

utpadyotpadyate tatra svayaṃ saṃvit svabhāvataḥ ।
svasaṅkalpaiś śamaṃ yāti bālasaṅkalpajālavat ।। 

rāmaḥ

kim adhas syāt kim ūrdhvaṃ syāt kiṃ tiryak tatra bhāsure ।
iti brūhi mama brahmann ihaiva yadi na sthitiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sasarvāvaraṇāny atra mahaty antavivarjite ।
brahmaṇo aṇḍāni bhāsante vyomni keśoṇḍuko yathā ।। 

asvatantrāḥ pradhāvanti padārthās sarva eva yat ।
brahmāṇḍaṃ pārthivaṃ bhāgaṃ tad adhaś śūnyam anyathā ।। 

pipīlikānām bhramatāṃ vyomni vartulaloṣṭake ।
daśadikkam adhaḥpādāḥ pṛṣṭham ūrdhvam udāhṛtam ।। 

vṛkṣavalmīkajālena keṣāñcid dhṛdi bhūtalam ।
sendvarkāmaradaityena veṣṭitaṃ vyoma nirmalam ।। 

sambhūtaṃ marubhūtena sagrāmapuraparvatam ।
idaṅkalpam alūnena pakvākṣoṭam iva tvacā ।। 

yathā vindhyavanābhoge prasphuranti kareṇavaḥ ।
tathā tasmin parābhoge brahmāṇḍatrasareṇavaḥ ।। 

tasmin sarvaṃ tatas sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca tat ।
tac ca sarvamayaṃ nityaṃ tathā tad aṇukaṃ prati ।। 

śuddhabodhamaye tasmin paramālokavāridhau ।
ajasram etya gacchanti brahmāṇḍākhyās taraṅgakāḥ ।। 

antaśśūnyās sthitāḥ kecit sakalpakṣayarātrayaḥ ।
taraṅgā iva toyābdhau prohyante śūnyatārṇave ।। 

keṣāñcid antaḥ kalpāntaḥ pravṛtto ghargharāravaḥ ।
na śruto anyair na ca jñātas svabhāvarasanākulaiḥ ।। 

anyeṣāṃ prathamārambheṣūdbubhūṣā vijṛmbhate ।
sargasaṃsiktabījānāṃ kośe aṅkuralatā yathā ।। 

mahāpralayasampattau sūryārcirvidrutāśrayāḥ ।
pravṛttā galituṃ kecit tāpe himakaṇā yathā ।। 

ākalpaṃ nipatanty eva kecid aprāptabhūmayaḥ ।
yāvad viśīrya jāyante tathāsaṃvinmayāḥ kila ।। 

stabdhā eva sthitāḥ kecit keṣoṇḍukam ivāmbare ।
vāyos spandā ivābhānti tathāproditasampadaḥ ।। 

ācārād vedaśāstrāṇām anya evānyathoditaḥ ।
ārambho vitato anyeṣām anitthaṃ saṃsthitakramaḥ ।। 

kecid brahmādipuruṣāḥ kecid viṣṇvādisargapāḥ ।
kecic cānye prajānāthāḥ kecin nirnāthajantavaḥ ।। 

kecid vicitrasargeśāḥ kecit tiryaṅmayāntarāḥ ।
kecid ekārṇavāpūrṇā jaletaravivarjitāḥ ।। 

kecic chilāṅganiṣpiṇḍāḥ kecit krimipathāntarāḥ ।
kecid devamayā eva kecin naramayāntarāḥ ।। 

kecin nityāndhakārāḍhyās tathāśīlitajantavaḥ ।
kecin maṣakasampūrṇā uḍumbaraphalaśriyaḥ ।। 

nityaṃ śūnyāntarāḥ kecic chūnyaspandātmajantavaḥ ।
sargeṇa tādṛśenānye pūrṇā ye asmaddhiyām iha ।
kalpanām api nāyānti vyomamūkācalā iva ।। 

tādṛgantaram eteṣāṃ mahākāśaṃ tatas sthitam ।
ājīvitaṃ prayacchadbhir viṣṇvādyair yan na dīyate ।। 

pratyekam aṇḍagolasya sthitaḥ kaḍḍhakaratnavat ।
bhūtākṛṣṭikaro bhāgaḥ pārthivas sa svabhāvataḥ ।। 

yas sargavibhavo asmākaṃ dhiyām aviṣayas tataḥ ।
tajjagatkathane śaktir na mamāsti mahāmate ।। 

bhīmāndhakāragahane sumahaty araṇye nṛtyanty adarśitaparasparam eva mattāḥ ।
yakṣā yathā pravitate paramāmbare antar evaṃ sphuranti subahūni mahājaganti ।। 

līlopākhyāne brahmāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam ākalayantyau te nirgatya jagato nijam ।
antaḥpuraṃ dadṛśatur jhagitīva vinidrite ।। 

sthitapuṣpabharāpūrṇamahārājamahāśavam ।
śavapārśvopaviṣṭāntaścittalīlāśarīrakam ।। 

ghanarātritayālpālpamahānidrajanākulam ।
dhūpacandanakarpūrakuṅkumāmodamantharam ।। 

tam ālokya punar bhartus saṃsāraṃ gantum ādṛtā ।
papāta līlā saṅkalpadehenātraiva tannabhaḥ ।। 

viveśa bhartṛsaṅkalpasaṃsāraṃ kañcid ātatam ।
saṃsārāvaraṇaṃ bhittvā bhittvā brahmāṇḍakarparam ।। 

prāpa sārdhaṃ tayā devyā punar āvaraṇānvitam ।
brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapaṃ sphāraṃ taṃ praviśya tathā javāt ।। 

dadarśa bhartṛsaṅkalpajagaj jambālapalvalam ।
sā haṃsī śailakamalaṃ tamojaladapaṅkilam ।। 

devyau viviśatus tat te vyoma vyomātmake jagat ।
brahmāṇḍe antar yathā pakvamṛdubilvaṃ pipīlike ।। 

tatra lokāntarāṇy adrīn antarikṣam atītya te ।
prāpatur bhūtalaṃ śailamaṇḍalāmbhodhisaṅkulam ।। 

meruṇālaṅkṛtaṃ jambudvīpaṃ navadalodaram ।
tatrātha bhārate varṣe līlānāthasya maṇḍalam ।। 

etasminn antare tasmin maṇḍale maṇḍitāvanau ।
cakre avaskandanaṃ kaścit sīmāntodriktabhūmipaḥ ।। 

tena saṅgrāmasaṃrambhaprekṣārthaṃ samupāgataiḥ ।
trailokyabhūtais tad vyoma babhūvātyantasaṅkaṭam ।। 

aśaṅkitāgate te tu devyau dadṛśatur nabhaḥ ।
nabhaścaragaṇākrāntam ambudair iva mālitam ।। 

siddhacāraṇagandharvagaṇavidyādharānvitam ।
śūragrahaṇasaṃrabdhasvargalokāpsarovṛtam ।। 

raktamāṃsamukhonnṛtyadbhūtarakṣaḥpiśācakam ।
vṛṣṭipuṣpabharāpūrṇahastavidyādharāṅganam ।। 

vetālayakṣakumbhāṇḍair dvandvālokanasādaraiḥ ।
āyudhāpātarakṣārthagṛhītādritaṭair vṛtam ।। 

astramārganabhobhāgavidravadbhūtamaṇḍalam ।
svargārhaśūrānayanavyagrendrabhaṭabhāsuram ।। 

śūrārthālaṅkṛtottuṅgalokapālāgryavāraṇam ।
āgacchacchūrasaṅghātagandharvonmukhacāraṇam ।। 

śūrotsukāmarastraiṇakaṭākṣekṣitasadbhaṭam ।
āhopuruṣikākṣubdhaprekṣakāmoṭanodbhaṭam ।। 

āsannabhīmasaṅgrāmakiṃvadantīparamparam ।
līlāhāsavilāsotkasundarīdhūtacāmaram ।। 

dharmyapakṣaprayuktāgryamunisvastyayanastavam ।
sampannānekalokeśavanitānavasaṃstavam ।। 

vīradormaṇḍalāśleṣalampaṭastrīgaṇākaram ।
śuklena śūrayaśasā candrīkṛtadivākaram ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavañ śūraśabdena kīdṛśaḥ procyate bhaṭaḥ ।
svarge alaṅkaraṇaṃ kas syāt ko vā ḍimbāhato bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śāstroktācārayuktasya prabhor arthena yo raṇe ।
mṛto athavā jayī vā syāt sa śūraś śūralokabhāk ।। 

anyathā tu nikṛttāṅgo raṇe yo mṛtim āpnuyāt ।
ḍimbāhavahataḥ proktas sa naro narakāspadam ।। 

ayathāśāstrasañcāravṛttenārthena yudhyate ।
yo naras tasya saṅgrāme mṛtasya nirayo akṣayaḥ ।। 

yathāsambhavaśāstrārthalokācārānuvṛttimān ।
yudhyate tādṛśasyaiva bhaktyā śūras sa ucyate ।। 

gor arthe brāhmaṇasyārthe mitrasyārthe ca sanmatiḥ ।
śaraṇāgatayatnena mṛtas svarge vibhūṣaṇam ।। 

paripālya svadeśaikapālanīyasthitiṃ sadā ।
rājā mṛtas tadarthaṃ yas sa vīro vīralokabhāk ।। 

prajopadravaniṣṭhasya yasya rājño athavā prabhoḥ ।
arthena ye mṛtā yuddhe te vai nirayagāminaḥ ।। 

dharmyaṃ yathā tathā yuddhaṃ yadi syāt tad imāṃ sthitim ।
nāśayeyur alaṃ mattā yena lokabhayojjhitāḥ ।। 

yatra yatra hataś śūras svargya ity adhamoktayaḥ ।
dharmyo yoddhā bhavec chūra ity evaṃ śāstraniścayaḥ ।। 

sadācāravatām arthe khaḍgadhārāṃ sahanti ye ।
te śūrā iti kathyante śeṣā ḍimbāhavāhatāḥ ।। 

teṣām arthe raṇavyomni tiṣṭhanty utkaṇṭhitāśayāḥ ।
surībhūtamahāsattvadayitotkās surāṅganāḥ ।। 

vidyādharīmadhuramantharagītagarbhaṃ mandāramālyavalanākulamāninīkam ।
viśrāntakāntasurasiddhavimānapaṅkti vyomotsave racitaśobham ivollalāsa ।। 

līlopākhyāne gaganacarayuddhaprekṣakānvitāmbaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha vīravarotkaṇṭhanṛtyadapsarasi sthitā ।
līlā vilokayām āsa vyomni vidyānvitāvanau ।। 

surāṣṭramaṇḍale bhartṛpālite vanamālite ।
kasmiṃścid vitatāraṇye dvitīyākāśabhīṣaṇe ।। 

senādvitayam akṣubdhaṃ saumyābdhidvitayopamam ।
mahārambhaghanaṃ mattaṃ sthiraṃ rājadvayānvitam ।। 

yuddhasajjaṃ susannaddhasiddham agnim ivāhutam ।
pūrvaprahārasampātaprekṣākṣubdhākṣilakṣakam ।। 

udyatāmalanistriṃśadhārāsārabruḍajjanam ।
kacatparaśvadhaprāsabhiṇḍipālarddhisaṅkulam ।। 

garutmatpakṣavikṣubdhavanasampātakampitam ।
udyaddinakarālokakacatkanakakaṅkaṭam ।। 

parasparamukhālokakopaproddhāsitāyudham ।
anyo'nyabaddhadṛṣṭitvāc citrabhittāv ivārpitam ।। 

lekhāmaryādayā dīrghabaddhayā sthāpitasthiti ।
anivāryamahāhāryajhāṅkārāśrutasaṅkatham ।। 

pūrvaprahārasmayataś cirasaṃśāntadundubhi ।
nibaddhayodhasaṃsthānaniścalānīkamantharam ।। 

dhanurdvitayamātrātmaśūnyamadhyaikasetunā ।
vibhaktaṃ kalpavātena mattam ekārṇavaṃ yathā ।। 

kāryasaṅkaṭasaṃrambhacintāparavaśeśvaram ।
ravavadbhekakaṇṭhatvagbhaṅgurāturahṛdguham ।। 

prāṇasarvasvasannyāsasodyogāsaṅkhyasainikam ।
karṇasthasaśarajyaughatyāgonmukhadhanurdharam ।। 

prahārapātasamprekṣānisspandāsaṅkhyasainikam ।
anyo'nyotkaṭakāṭhinyabhaṭabhrūkuṭisaṅkaṭam ।। 

parasparāṃsasaṅghaṭṭakaṭuṭāṅkārakaṅkaṭam ।
vīrayodhadurādharṣabhīruprojjhitakoṭaram ।। 

mithassaṃsthānakālokamātrasandigdhajīvitam ।
samastāṅgaruhāsaktapāṃsuvṛddhābhamānavam ।। 

pūrvaprahārasamprekṣāvyagraprāṇitayā tayā ।
saṃśāntakallolaravaṃ nidrāmudrapuropamam ।। 

saṃśāntaśaṅkhasaṅghātatūryanirhrādadundubhi ।
bhūtalāvaśasaṃlīnasarvapāṃsupayodharam ।। 

palāyanaparaiḥ paścāt tyaktam aṅgulam aṅgulam ।
visārimakaravyūhamatsyasaṃsthābdhibhāsuram ।। 

patākāmañjarīpuñjavījitadrumanāyakam ।
hāstikottambhitakarakānanīkṛtakhāntaram ।। 

tarattaralabhāpūrasapakṣasakalāyudham ।
dhamad dham iti śabdaiś ca śvāsotthair vyāptakhāntaram ।। 

cakravyūhakarākrāntadurvṛttasubhaṭāsuram ।
garuḍavyūhasaṃrambhavivalannāgasañcayam ।। 

śyenavyūhāvibhinnograsanniveśonnamaddhvani ।
anyo'nyasphoṭaniṣpeṣaprapatacchūravṛndakam ।। 

vividhavyūhavinyāsam āntarārāvabhairavam ।
karapratolanollāsamattamudgaramandiram ।। 

kṛṣṇāyudhāṃśujālena śyāmīkṛtadivākaram ।
anilādhūtaśalmīlaśūtkarābhaśaradhvani ।। 

anekakalpakalpāntasadharmam iva saṃsthitam ।
pralayānilasaṅkṣubdham ekārṇavam ivotthitam ।। 

pātālakuharākṣubdham andhakāram ivotthitam ।
lokālokam ivonmattanṛttalolalasattaṭam ।
mahānarakasaṅghātaṃ bhittvāvanim ivotthitam ।। 

ālolakuntamusulāsiparaśvadhāṃśuśyāmāyamānam iva sātapavāripūraiḥ ।
ekārṇavaṃ bhuvanakośam ivācireṇa kartuṃ samudyatam agādham anantapūraiḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāna āhavārambhavikāravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan yuddham etan me samāsena manāg vada ।
śrutir āhlādyate śrotur yasmād etābhir uktibhiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha khe tatra te devyau saṅgrāmaṃ tad avekṣitum ।
vimāne kalpite kānte ruddhe ruruhatus sthire ।। 

etasminn antare tatra līleśapratipakṣataḥ ।
tāmyan soḍhum aśaktas san duḥkhavyatikaraṃ raṇe ।। 

pralayārṇavakallola ivotpatyodbhaṭo bhaṭaḥ ।
jahau sānāv iva śilāṃ bhaṭasyorasi mudgaram ।। 

atha pravṛttaḥ prasabhaṃ pralayārṇavaraṃhasā ।
senayoś śastrasampātaḥ kirann analavidyutaḥ ।। 

tarattaraladhārāgrarekhāṅkitanabhastalaḥ ।
dhvanajjhaṇajhaṇāśabdamadhyalakṣitajhāṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

vīrahuṅkāramiśrajyāghargharārāvaghasmaraḥ ।
pravṛttaśaradhārābhrabhāskarārcirvitānakaḥ ।। 

raṇatkaṅkaṭaṭāṅkāraproḍḍīnakaṇapāvakaḥ ।
parasparāhaticchinnahetikhaṇḍakhagāmbaraḥ ।। 

vīradordrumasañcāravahadvananabhastalaḥ ।
kodaṇḍacakrakreṅkāradravadvaimānikāṅganaḥ ।। 

mahāhalahalārāvabhṛṅgīkṛtaghanadhvaniḥ ।
nirvikalpasamādhistha ivaikaghanatāvaśāt ।। 

nārācāsāradhārāgralūnaśūraśiraḥkaṇaḥ ।
parasparāṃsasaṅghaṭṭaraṇatkaṅkaṭasaṅkaṭaḥ ।। 

huṅkārahatahetyagrasaṅghaṭṭakaṭuṭāṅkṛtaḥ ।
taraddhārātaraṅgogradanturāśeṣadiṅmukhaḥ ।। 

hetisaṅghaṭṭavikṣobhamuṣṭigrāhyajhaṇajjhaṇaḥ ।
vikacatsphoṭakasphoṭaraṭaccaṭacaṭāravaḥ ।। 

pravahatkhaḍgaṭāṅkārajvalacchaṇaśaṇadhvaniḥ ।
saraccharabharodvāntalasacchavaśavasvanaḥ ।। 

dhag dhag dhag iti vicchinnakaṇṭhotthavraṇalohitaḥ ।
chinnabāhuśiraḥkhaḍgakhaṇḍanirvivarāmbaraḥ ।। 

kaṅkaṭotthasphuradvahnicchaṭāpluṣṭaśiroruhaḥ ।
raṇatpatadasivrātadattapīnajhaṇajjhaṇaḥ ।। 

kuntakuṇṭhitamātaṅgataraṅgodgatalohitaḥ ।
dantidantaviniṣpeṣatārakreṅkārakarkaśaḥ ।। 

mahāmusulasampātapiṣṭavṛndoddhurasvaraḥ ।
taracchūraśiraḥpadmaprakarācchāditāmbaraḥ ।। 

vyomavyastabhujāhīndrapūrṇadhūlimayāmbudaḥ ।
chinnahetinarārabdhakeśākeśipratikriyaḥ ।। 

nakhānakhinikṛṣṭākṣikarṇanāsomahābhayaḥ ।
patatsamadamātaṅgakampitorvīluṭhadrathaḥ ।। 

raṇaprāsarayotpannavraṇaraktaparicchadaḥ ।
rajoracitanīhārakacatpravahadāyudhaḥ ।। 

ekīkṛtaghanakṣobhasainyasāgaragarvitaḥ ।
mattahāsavilāsena mṛtyunā paricarvitaḥ ।। 

garvitādrīndranāgendrakharvitāmbhodagarjitaḥ ।
vṛkṣapārśvataṭīsannacakraśaktyṛṣṭimudgaraḥ ।। 

śarorṇātantunīrandhravṛkṣayodhādimeṣakaḥ ।
meghavibhrāntivicchinnapatākāpaṭṭacāmaraḥ ।। 

yantrapāṣāṇacakraughadrutavidrutakhecaraḥ ।
maraṇavyagrakṛttāṅgayodhākrandātighargharaḥ ।। 

kudhārāghātasaṅghātavidalanmastakavraṇaḥ ।
dūroḍḍīnakacatkhaḍgakhaṇḍatārakitāmbaraḥ ।। 

śaṅkunirmuktaśaktyoghaviṣaktebhāvṛtāvaniḥ ।
sainyavyākulavetālavalganonmuktamudgaraḥ ।। 

gaganottambhitottuṅgaśūratomaratoraṇaḥ ।
bhusuṇḍībhagnakhaḍgaughakhaṇḍālīvyomakuṇḍalaḥ ।। 

kuntaveṇuvanavyastatāpāmbarakacacchikhī ।
khaḍgarṣṭivṛṣṭisantuṣṭarājapūjitasainikaḥ ।। 

śūrottambhitasacchūragrahaṇodyamitāpsarāḥ ।
gadānusāravigalatsphuritāṅgadadiṅmukhaḥ ।। 

prāsaprasabhaniṣpiṣṭakaṣṭaceṣṭabhaṭotkaṭaḥ ।
cakricakrakhasañcāracchinnācaturavāraṇaḥ ।। 

paraśuvrātasampātapatatsamadavāraṇaḥ ।
laguḍāloḍanoḍḍīnaproḍḍāmararaṇadbhaṭaḥ ।। 

yantrapāṣāṇasampātapiṣṭaketurathadrumaḥ ।
karavālavilūnogracchattrapaṅkajapāṇḍuraḥ ।। 

kṣepaṇakṣobhasaṅkṣīṇasainyakṣoṇyopalakṣitaḥ ।
kabandhabandhamattebhapātasampiṣṭapārśvagaḥ ।। 

śaṅkuśaṅkitaśaṅkhasthavīravāritavāraṇaḥ ।
pāśāveśaviśeṣajñavīrātiparidevanaḥ ।। 

kṣurikākukṣinirbhedagalatpadmapatajjanaḥ ।
triśūlavadanodāttaśūlaśaṅkaranartanaḥ ।। 

dhāvaddhānuṣkasampūrṇatūṇakūjanakākaliḥ ।
bhiṇḍipālabhaṭāṭopapatrātārabhaṭīnaṭaḥ ।। 

vajramuṣṭiviniṣpiṣṭapṛṣṭhasadbhaṭasaṅkaṭaḥ ।
śyenavad vyomapadavīṃ protpatatsūtapaṭṭiśaḥ ।। 

aṅkuśākrāntaśūrendramahebhahayaketanaḥ ।
hālāhalahalālūnahelākulabalācalaḥ ।। 

sutālottālakuddālanikhātabalabhūtalaḥ ।
dhanurdviguṇadattāstralūnalokaśilāvaliḥ ।। 

krakacobhayapārśvehācchinnamattamataṅgajaḥ ।
saṅgrāmolūkhalāpūrṇalokataṇḍulamausulī ।
abhrābhaśṛṅkhalājālabaddhasenāvihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

nārācavarṣavaravāridavīrapūra mattābhrasambhramasanṛttakabandhabarhī ।
kalpāntakāla iva vegavivartamānamātaṅgaśailavalito raṇasambhramo abhūt ।। 

līlopākhyāne senayoḥ prathamāpātavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha rājñāṃ yuyutsūnāṃ bhaṭānāṃ mantriṇām api ।
rabhasaprekṣakāṇāṃ ca tatremāḥ prodagur giraḥ ।। 

calatpadmaṃ sara iva vahadvihagam eva vā ।
nabhaś śūraśiraḥkīrṇaṃ bhāti tārakitākṛti ।। 

paśya raktapṛṣatpūrasindūrāruṇamārutaiḥ ।
sandhyā iva vibhānty ete madhyāhne ambudabhānavaḥ ।। 

kim idaṃ bhagini vyoma palālabharitaṃ sthitam ।
nedaṃ palālaṃ vīrāṇām ete śarabharāmbudāḥ ।। 

yāvanto bhuvi śāmyanti rudhirair aṇureṇavaḥ ।
tāvanty abdasahasrāṇi bhaṭānām āspadaṃ divi ।। 

mā bhaiṣṭa naite nistriṃśā nīlotpaladalatviṣaḥ ।
amī vīrāvalokinyā lakṣmyā nayanavibhramāḥ ।। 

vīrāliṅganalolānāṃ nitambe surayoṣitām ।
mekhalāś śithilīkartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ ।। 

laladbhujalatālolaraktapallavapāṇayaḥ ।
mañjarīmattanayanā madhvāmodasugandhayaḥ ।। 

yācantyo madhurālāpair nandanodyānadevatāḥ ।
tavāgamanam āśaṅkya pravṛttāḥ parinartitum ।। 

pratyanīkaṃ bhinatty antaḥ kuṭhāraiḥ kaṭhinair iyam ।
senā grāmyeva vanitā dayitaṃ duṣṭaceṣṭitaiḥ ।। 

hā pitur mama bhallena śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam ।
sūryasya nikaṭaṃ nītaṃ kālenevāṣṭamo grahaḥ ।। 

āpādaṃ śṛṅkhalāprotabhramatsthūlopaladvayam ।
bhramayaṃś citradaṇḍākhyaṃ cakram ūrdhvabhujo javāt ।। 

yodho yama ivāyāmī yāmyād āyāti diktaṭāt ।
sarvatas saṃharan senām ehi yāmo yathāgatam ।। 

sadyaśchinnaśiraśśvabhramajjatkaṅkakulākulāḥ ।
kabandhāḥ paśya nṛtyanti tālottālā raṇāṅgane ।। 

gīrvāṇagaṇagoṣṭhīṣu pravṛttā saṅkathā mithaḥ ।
vada lokāntaraṃ vīrāḥ kathaṃ yāsyanti ke kutaḥ ।। 

nigiranty āgatās senās sravantīr iva sāgarāḥ ।
samatsyamakaravyūhā aho nu viṣamā bhaṭāḥ ।। 

kaṭeṣu kariṇāṃ kīrṇā dhārānārācarāśayaḥ ।
patitā iva sampūrṇāś śṛṅgasaṅgheṣu vṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

hā kuntena śiro nītaṃ mamety evaṃ vivakṣataḥ ।
śira ānītam ity eva khe khageneva vāśitam ।। 

yantrapāṣāṇavarṣeṇa yenāsmān pariṣiñcati ।
senāsyāṃ śṛṅkhalājālavalanā kriyatāṃ balāt ।। 

sarvān samagrato mūḍhān nayatārdhamṛtān narān ।
nijān pādaprahāreṇa maitān mārayatādhamāḥ ।। 

dhammillavalanāvyagre ghanotkaṇṭhāpsarogaṇe ।
bhaṭo divyaśarīreṇa pārśvaṃ prāpto vilokyatām ।। 

phullahemāravindāsu cchāyāśītajalānilaiḥ ।
svarganadyās taṭīṣv evaṃ dūrāyātaṃ vilokaya ।। 

vividhāyudhasaṅghaṭṭakhaṇḍitogrādrikoṭayaḥ ।
khe carantyo jhaṇatkāraiḥ pramṛtās tārakā iva ।। 

vyomni śūnyanadīvāhe vahatsāyakavāriṇi ।
cakrāvartini gacchanti girayo apy aṇupaṅkatām ।। 

bhramadbhir grahamārgeṣu śirobhir vīrabhūbhṛtām ।
āyudhāṃśulatānālalagnāsidalakaṇṭakaiḥ ।। 

ketupaṭṭamṛṇālāṅkatalair lagnaśilīmukhaiḥ ।
vahadvātalalatpadmaṃ nabhaḥ padmasaraḥ kṛtam ।। 

mṛtamātaṅgasaṅghāte girāv iva pipīlikāḥ ।
bhīravaḥ parilīyante striyaḥ puṃvakṣasīva vā ।। 

apūrvottamasaundaryakāntasaṅgamaśaṃsinaḥ ।
vānti vidyādharastrīṇām alakollāsino anilāḥ ।। 

chattreṣūḍḍīya yāteṣu chinneṣu vyomacandrikām ।
indunaitya yaśomūrtyā kṛtā śubhrātapatratā ।। 

bhaṭo maraṇamūrchānte nimeṣeṇāmaraṃ vapuḥ ।
svakalpaśilpiracitaṃ prāptas svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

śūlaśaktyṛṣṭicakrāṇāṃ vṛṣṭayo muktamuṣṭayaḥ ।
vyomābdhau matsyamakarakulīrāś śūravat sthitāḥ ।। 

śarotkṛttapatacchattrakalahaṃsair nabhastalam ।
bhāti sañcitapūrṇendubimbalakṣair ivāvṛtam ।। 

kriyate gaganoḍḍīnaiś cāmaraiś cārughargharaiḥ ।
vātāvadhūtasārāvataraṅganikaradyutiḥ ।। 

dṛśyante te atidalitāś chattracāmaraketavaḥ ।
ākāśakṣetranikṣiptā yaśaś śālilavā iva ।। 

vahadbhir vyomny asaṅkhyeyaiḥ paśya nītā śaraiḥ kṣayaṃ ।
śaktivṛṣṭir upāyāntī sasyaśrīś śalabhair iva ।। 

eṣā prasṛtadordaṇḍabhaṭakhaḍgacchanatkṛtiḥ ।
kaṭhināt kaṅkaṭāj jātā mṛtyor evograhuṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

hetikalpānilakṣuṇṇā dantanirjharavārayaḥ ।
janatākṣayakāle asmin bhagnanāgā nagā iva ।। 

sacakranāthasūtāśvaṃ vyūharaktamahāhrade ।
hā hā dhig bruḍitaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ rathapattanam ।। 

kaṭukaṅkaṭakuṭṭākakhaḍgasaṅghaṭṭaṭāṅkṛtaiḥ ।
kālarātryā pranṛtyantyā raṇe vīṇeva vādyate ।। 

narebhāśvaśavādribhyo ye cyutā raktanirjharāḥ ।
paśya tadbindusiktena vāyunāruṇitā diśaḥ ।। 

śastrāṃśujaladher vyomni kālīcikuramecakī ।
śarakorakabhārasrag ghemavidyud ivombhitā ।। 

anantaraktasaṃraktasenāvanibhir āyudhaiḥ ।
bhuvanaṃ bhāty atijvālam agnilokam ivākulam ।। 

bhusuṇḍīśaktiśūlāsimusulaprāsavṛṣṭayaḥ ।
anyo'nyacchedabhedābhyāṃ kaṇaprakaratām itāḥ ।। 

akṣobhaikapraharaṇād abuddhānyo'nyaceṣṭitam ।
saṃrambhāṇveṣaṇaprajñaṃ raṇaṃ suptam iva sthitam ।। 

ananyaśabdāviratahatahetijhaṇajhaṇaiḥ ।
gāyatīva kṣayakṣobhamudito raṇabhairavaḥ ।। 

anyo'nyahatahetyagracūrṇapūrṇo raṇārṇavaḥ ।
vālukāmaya evābhūc chinnacchattrataraṅgakaḥ ।। 

atirabhasarasadvidāritūrya pratiravapūritalokapālalokaḥ ।
raṇagirir ayam ugrapakṣadakṣaḥ pravisṛtanṛtta ivāmbare yugānte ।। 

hā hā dhik pravikaṭakaṅkaṭāṭanodyatproḍḍīnaprakaṭataḍicchaṭāḥ pradīptāḥ ।
kreṅkārasphuritaguṇeritā raṇanto nārācāś śikhariśilābhido vahanti ।। 

chinnecchā ccham iti na yāvad aṅgabhaṅgaṃ kurvanti jvaladanalojjvalāḥ pṛṣatkāḥ ।
tāvad drāg drutam ita ehi mitra yāmo yāmo ayaṃ pravahati vāsaraś caturthaḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāne raṇaprekṣakajanoktivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha proḍḍayanodyuktaturaṅgamataraṅgakaḥ ।
uttāṇḍava ivāmatto babhūva sa raṇārṇavaḥ ।। 

chattradiṇḍīraviśrāntaśiteṣuśapharotkaraḥ ।
aśvebhasainyollalanakallolākulakoṭaraḥ ।। 

nānāyudhanadīnītasainyāvartavivṛttimān ।
mattahastighaṭāpīṭhacalācalakulākulaḥ ।। 

kacaccakraśatāvartavṛttibhrāntaśirastṛṇaḥ ।
dhūlījaladharāpītabhramatkhaḍgaprabhājalaḥ ।। 

makaravyūhavistārabhagnābhagnabhaṭogranauḥ ।
mahāguḍuguḍāvartapratiśrudghanakandaraḥ ।। 

mīnavyūhaviniṣkrāntaśarabījaughasarṣapaḥ ।
hetivīcighaṭālūnapatākāvīcimaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

śastravārikṣatāmbhodasadṛśāvartakuṇḍalaḥ ।
saṃrambhaghanasañcāraghaṭātimitimiṅgilaḥ ।। 

kṛṣṇāyasaparīdhānacalatsenāmbubhīṣaṇaḥ ।
kabandhāvartalekhāntarbaddhasainyādribhīṣaṇaḥ ।। 

śaraśīkaranīhārasāndhakārakakubgaṇaḥ ।
nirghoṣāśeṣitāśeṣaśabdaikaghanaghuṅghumaḥ ।। 

patanotpatanavyagraśiraśśakalaśīkaraḥ ।
āvartacakravyūhāntaḥprabhramadbhaṭakāṣṭakaḥ ।। 

kaṣṭaṭāṅkārakodaṇḍakuṇḍalormighaṭodbhaṭaḥ ।
aśaṅkam eva pātālād ivodyatsainikormimān ।। 

gamāgamaparānantapatākācchatraphenilaḥ ।
vahadraktanadīraṃhaḥprohyamānarathadrumaḥ ।। 

gajapratimasampannamahārudhirabudbudaḥ ।
sainyapravāhavivaladdhayahastijalecaraḥ ।। 

sa saṅgrāmo ambaragrāma ivāścaryakaro nṛṇām ।
abhūt pralayabhūkampakampitācalacañcalaḥ ।। 

taratturaṅgavihagaḥ patatkarighaṭātaṭaḥ ।
bhramadbhīrumṛgānīkas sphūrjadghuraghurāravaḥ ।। 

saraccharālīśarabhaś śarabhaṅgurasainyabhūḥ ।
taratturaṅgaśarabhaś śarabhāravahāvaniḥ ।। 

valadvīrebhanirhrādo rasatūryaguhāgṛhaḥ ।
visaratsainyajalado luṭhadbhaṭamṛgādhipaḥ ।। 

prasaraddhūlijalado vigalatsainyasānumān ।
patadrathavarāḍhyaṅgaḥ prapatatkhaḍgamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

protpatatpaṭṭapuṣpāḍhyaḥ patākāchatravāridaḥ ।
vahadraktanadīpūraḥ patatsārāvavāraṇaḥ ।। 

so abhūt samarakalpānto jagatkavalanākulaḥ ।
paryastasadhvajacchatrapatākārathapattanaḥ ।। 

patadvimalahetyoghabhūribhāskarabhāsvaraḥ ।
kaṭhinaprāṇisantāpatāpitākhilamānavaḥ ।। 

kodaṇḍapuṣkarāvartaśaradhārānirantaraḥ ।
vahatkhaḍgaśilālekhāvidyudvalayitāmbaraḥ ।। 

ucchūnaraktajaladhipatitebhakulācalaḥ ।
nabhovikīrṇanipatadyantrāśmagaṇatārakaḥ ।। 

cakrakalpāmbudāvartapūrṇavyomaśarāmbudaḥ ।
astrakalpāgninirdagdhasainyalokāntarāntarāḥ ।। 

hetivarṣāśanicchinnabhūtabhūtalabhūdharaḥ ।
gajarājagirivrātapātapiṣṭajanavrajaḥ ।। 

śaradhārādharānīkameghacchannamahīnabhaḥ ।
mahānīkārṇavakṣobhasaṅghaṭṭakaṭhināravaḥ ।। 

vyāpta ugrāniloddhūtair jalavyālānalācalaiḥ ।
anyo'nyadalanavyagrair astrotpātaphalotthitaiḥ ।। 

śūlāsicakraśaraśaktigadābhusuṇḍīprāsādayo vidalanena mitho dhvanantaḥ ।
dīptā dadhur daśadiśaṃ śataśo bhramantaḥ kalpāntavātaparivṛttapadārthalīlām ।। 

līlopākhyāne raṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha śṛṅgopamāneṣu sthiteṣu śavarādiṣu ।
gaṅgātulyāsu jātāsu vahadraktanadīṣu ca ।। 

nṛtyatsu loladordaṇḍaṃ kabandheṣu sabandhuṣu ।
bruḍatsu narahastyaśvaratheṣu rudhirāmbhasi ।। 

sarvasainyeṣu yāteṣu viralatvaṃ visāriṣu ।
sarvabhīruṣu bhagneṣu vidruteṣu diśo daśa ।। 

mātaṅgaśavaśaileṣu viśrāntāmbudapaṅktiṣu ।
yakṣarakṣaḥpiśāceṣu krīḍatsu rudhirārṇave ।। 

mahatāṃ dharmaniṣṭhānāṃ śīlaujassattvaśālinām ।
śuddhānāṃ kulapadmānāṃ vīrāṇām anivartinām ।। 

dvandvayuddhāni jātāni meghānām iva garjatām ।
mitho nigaraṇotkāni milatsāgarapūravat ।। 

sapañjaraḥ pañjariṇā gajaughena gajoccayaḥ ।
savanas savanenādrir adriṇevāmilad balāt ।। 

aśvaugho amilad aśvānāṃ vṛndenārāviraṃhasā ।
taraṅgoghena ghoreṇa taraṅgogha ivārṇave ।। 

narānīko narānīkaṃ samāyudham ayodhayat ।
veṇvaugham iva veṇvaugho marullolo maruccalam ।। 

rathaughaś ca rathaughena niṣpipeṣākhilaṃ vapuḥ ।
nagaraṃ nagareṇeva daivenoḍḍīnam ambaram ।। 

saraccharabharāsāraracitāpūrvavāridam ।
yuyudhe sthagitākāśā dhanurdharapatākinī ।। 

viṣamāyudhayuddheṣu yoddhāraḥ pelavāśayāḥ ।
yadā yuktyā palāyante raṇakalpānale tadā ।। 

militāś cakriṇaś cakrair dhanurdhārair dhanurdharāḥ ।
khaḍgibhiḥ khaḍgayoddhāro bhusuṇḍībhir bhusuṇḍinaḥ ।। 

musulair musuloddhārāḥ kuntinaḥ kuntadhāribhiḥ ।
ṛṣṭyāyudhā ṛṣṭidharaiḥ prāsibhiḥ prāsapāṇayaḥ ।। 

samudgarā mudgaribhis sagadair vilasadgadāḥ ।
prāsamārgavidaḥ prāsaiḥ paraśūtkāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ ।। 

laguḍaughair laguḍina upalair upalāyudhāḥ ।
pāśibhiḥ pāśaparamāś śaṅkubhiś śaṅkudhāriṇaḥ ।। 

kṣurikābhis sakṣurikā bhiṇḍipālaiś ca tadbhṛtaḥ ।
vajramuṣṭidharās tatsthair aṅkuśair aṅkuśoddhṛtāḥ ।। 

halair halanikāṣajñās triśūlaiś ca triśūlinaḥ ।
śṛṅkhalājālino jālaiś śārṅkhalair alikomalaiḥ ।। 

śāktīkaiś śaktiyoddhāraś śūlaiś śūlaviśāradāḥ ।
kṣubhitāḥ kalpavikṣubdhasāgarormighaṭā iva ।। 

kṣubdhaś cakrajalāvartaiś śaraśīkaramārutaiḥ ।
prabhramaddhetimakaro vyomaikārṇava ābabhau ।। 

utphālāyudhakallolas senākulajalecaraḥ ।
rodhorandhrasamudro asau babhūvāmaradustaraḥ ।। 

digaṣṭakajanānīkaṃ pakṣadvayatayā tayā ।
ardhenārdhena kuṣitaṃ bhūpālābhyāṃ tathā sthitam ।। 

paśya deśādisaṅkhyena prāgdigbhāgagatān imān ।
līlānāthasya padmasya pakṣe janapadāñ śṛṇu ।। 

pūrvasyāṃ kāśimagadhāḥ kosalā mithilotkalāḥ ।
mekalāḥ kavaṭāḥ puṇḍrās tathauṇḍrās samagauḍakāḥ ।। 

drimayo madrasuhmāś ca tāmraliptās tathaiva ca ।
prāgjyotiṣā vājimukhā ambaṣṭhāḥ puruṣādakāḥ ।। 

karṇākṣaṣṭhā aviśrotrā āmamīnāśanās tathā ।
vyāghravaktrāḥ kirātāś ca śavarā ekapādakāḥ ।। 

mālyavān nāma śailo atra śibivāñ jñāna eva ca ।
vṛṣabhadhvajapadmādyās tathodayakaro giriḥ ।। 

atha prāgdakṣiṇāyāṃ tu ime vindhyādrivāsinaḥ ।
cedayo vatsadāśārṇā aṅgavaṅgopavaṅgakāḥ ।। 

kaliṅgapuṇḍrajaṭharā vidarbhā mekhalās tathā ।
śavarā nagnaparṇāś ca kaṇṭhatripurapūrakāḥ ।। 

kaṇṭakasthalanāmānaḥ pṛthudvīpakakomalāḥ ।
kaṇṭhadrāś śoṇikāś caiva tathā carmaṇvatā api ।। 

kokakā hemakuḍyāś ca tathā śmaśrudharā iti ।
baligrīvamahāgrīvāḥ kiṣkindhā nārikelinaḥ ।। 

atha līlāpater asya dakṣiṇasyām ime adrayaḥ ।
vindhyo atha kusumāpīḍo mahendro dunduras tathā ।। 

malayas sūryavāṃś caiva gaṇarājyanṛrājyakāḥ ।
avantir iti vikhyātā tathā sāmbavatīti ca ।। 

daśapuryā ekakacchā ṛṣikās turuṣkāś śakāḥ ।
vanavāsopagirayas te bhadragirayas tathā ।। 

nāgarā daṇḍakāś caiva gaṇarājyā nṛrājyakāḥ ।
sahārā ṛṣyamūkāś ca kārkoṭā vanatimbilāḥ ।। 

padmā nivāsinaś caiva caurakāḥ karkavīrakāḥ ।
vairikāḥ pāśikāś caiva dharmapattanapāṃsikāḥ ।। 

śākikāḥ kṛṣṇacelūrā nārmadās tāmraparṇakāḥ ।
gonandāḥ kanakāś caiva cīnapattananāmakāḥ ।। 

tālīkaṭās saritkīrṇā rahakā veṇṇakārhaṇāḥ ।
vaivuṇḍakās tumbavanā lājinadvīpakarṇakāḥ ।। 

karṇikārāś ca śivayaḥ kuṅkuṇāś citrakūṭakāḥ ।
karṇāṭamañcakaṭakā mahākaṭavikās tathā ।। 

āndhrāś ca kollaśinayaś śivātakacavairikāḥ ।
baladevāḥ pattanakāḥ krauñcāṣ ṭīvās tathaiva ca ।। 

śilākṣā radato nandanandanāmalayābhidhāḥ ।
te citrakūṭaśikharā laṅkārakṣogaṇāspadāḥ ।। 

atha pratyagdakṣiṇāyāṃ mahārāṣṭrasurāṣṭrakāḥ ।
sindhusauvīraśūdrākhyā ābhīrā dramiḍās tathā ।। 

koṭakāṣ ṣaṇḍasindhvākhyās tathā kaliruhā api ।
atra hemagiriś śailas tathā raivatako giriḥ ।। 

nabhukākhyaṃ mayavanaṃ yavanās tatra jantavaḥ ।
pahlavā mārgaṇāvartā dhūmrāmbaṣṭhakanāmakāḥ ।। 

tathā lājakaṇāś caiva tathāmragirivāsinaḥ ।
tato abdhir aurvāgniyutā ete līlāpater janāḥ ।। 

atha tatpratipakṣasthān imāñ janapadāñ śṛṇu ।
paścimāyāṃ diśi prauḍhā ime tāvan mahādrayaḥ ।। 

matimān nāma śailendraḥ kṣurārpaṇagiris tathā ।
vanaukahā meghavāṃś ca cakravān astaparvataḥ ।। 

janāḥ pañcanadā nāma kāśā brahmāvasātakāḥ ।
tathaiva tārakṣatayaḥ pāravāś śāntikās tathā ।। 

pārśve vatakapokrāṇāṃ girivānavamās tathā ।
santyaktadharmamaryādās te adhamā mlecchajātayaḥ ।। 

tato janapadā bhūmir yojanānāṃ śatadvayam ।
tato mahendraśikharī muktā maṇimayāvaniḥ ।। 

vṛto mahīdharaśatair athāsto nāma parvataḥ ।
tato mahārṇavo bhīmāḥ pāriyātragires taṭe ।। 

paścimottaradigbhāge deśo girimatis sthitaḥ ।
tathā veṇumatiś caiva tatas turamatir mahī ।। 

tathā phalgunakāś caiva māṇḍavyā ekanetrakāḥ ।
purukundās tukhārāś ca tālamallalahāvahāḥ ।। 

vandilā navilā vālā dīrghakeśāṅgabāhavaḥ ।
raṅgāḥ khamūnikāḥ kampā guruhāś cāruhās tathā ।। 

tatas strīrājyam atulaṃ govṛṣāpatyabhājanam ।
athottarasyāṃ himavān kāñjo atha madhumān giriḥ ।। 

kailāso vasumān merus tatpatheṣu janā ime ।
madrapauravayaudheyā mālavāś śūrasenakāḥ ।। 

rājanyāś ca tathāśvinyā arjunāvanayas tathā ।
trigartakekayaḥ kṣudramācelāścūstavāsinaḥ ।। 

ambalāḥ prasthalāś śākāḥ kṣemadhūrtaya eva ca ।
antaradvīpagāndhāras tathā vandivaṭastavaḥ ।। 

atha takṣaśilā nāma tato api lavaṇāvatī ।
puṣkalāvatideśaś ca yaśovatimahī tataḥ ।। 

tato maṇimatī bhūmiś śyāmākā khacarās tathā ।
dāśadānā gavyasanā daṇḍahavyasanās tathā ।। 

dānadāś śūrakāś caiva vāṭādhārās tathaiva ca ।
kohakaṃ nagaraṃ caiva surabhūtipuraṃ tathā ।। 

tato vai taṭakādarśā danturādarśa eva ca ।
tataḥ piṇḍalamālavyayāyaneyābhidhānakāḥ ।। 

mālahālā hūnahematālāśvās svamukhās tathā ।
himavān vasumān kauñjaḥ kailāsaś cetyagās tathā ।। 

tato janapadā bhūmir aśītiśatayojanā ।
atha prāguttarasyāṃ tvam imāñ janapadāñ śṛṇu ।। 

kaulūtā brahmaputrāś ca kuvindāś ca dinādanāḥ ।
maḍavā naṣṭarājyāś ca vanarāṣṭrās tathaiva ca ।। 

kaiḍabhallās siṃhapurās tathā cāmavataṅganāḥ ।
sārpātakāḥ pārvatakāḥ kaśmīrā daradās tathā ।। 

abhisārajadārvākāḥ pallolukaciroḍunāḥ ।
kirātāḥ paśupālāś ca cīnās svarṇamahī tataḥ ।। 

devasthalopavanabhūs tadanūditaśrīr viśvāvasos tadanu mandiram uttamarddhi ।
kailāsabhūs tadanu muñjavanaś ca śailo vidyādharāmaravihāravimānabhūmiḥ ।। 

līlopakhyāne janapadavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

raṇe rabhasanirlūnanaravāraṇadāruṇe ।
ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti vṛndānupātini ।। 

ete cānye ca bahavas tatra bhasmatvam āgatāḥ ।
praviśantaḥ prayatnena śalabhā iva pāvake ।। 

atrānye madhyadeśīyā janā nodāhṛtā mayā ।
tān imāñ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi pakṣyāṃl līlāmahībhṛtaḥ ।। 

uddehikāś śūrasenā guḍā aśvatthanīpakāḥ ।
uttamajyotikadrāṇi padamadhyamikādayaḥ ।। 

sālvakāḥ ketakā matsyā dauleyakakapiṣṭalāḥ ।
māṇḍavyapāṇḍunagarasauragrīvā gurugrahāḥ ।। 

pāriyātrāḥ kurāḍhyaś ca yāmunoḍumbarā api ।
gajāhvā ujjihānāś ca kālakoṭikamāthurāḥ ।। 

kapoladharmāraṇyāś ca tathaivottaradakṣiṇāḥ ।
pāñcālakāḥ kurukṣetrās tathā sārasvatā janāḥ ।। 

avantīsyandanaśreṇīkuntaiḥ pañcanaderitāḥ ।
syandamānā vidravantī nipapāta mahābhṛgau ।। 

kāśā brahmāvasātāś ca chinnās sāmbavatījanaiḥ ।
bhūmau nipatitās santo mathitā mattavāraṇaiḥ ।। 

śūrā daśapurāś śastrair nikṛttodārakandharāḥ ।
tārakṣatibhir ākramya yojitā yojane hrade ।। 

ṛṣyakārurukacchāś ca śaivyaśaṅkuśatāṅkitāḥ ।
paṅkile paṅkatāṃ yātā bhūtale sainyamardanaiḥ ।। 

vanavāsopagirayo anilaye nilayārthinaḥ ।
paritaḥ paridhāvantaḥ patitā yamunāhrade ।। 

dīrṇodaraviniryātasvāntratantrīniyantritāḥ ।
rātrikāś śāntasañcārāḥ piśācaiś carvitā niśi ।। 

udravair bhadragiribhis saṅgrāmādhvani dīkṣitaiḥ ।
kṣoṇīgarteṣu nikṣiptā rasalāḥ kamalā iva ।। 

vidrutyeva dravadraktā vidrāvitamahārathāḥ ।
daṇḍakāntrāniloddhūtā hehayā hariṇā iva ।। 

dantidantavinirbhinnā dāradā dalitārayaḥ ।
nītā raktamahānadyā drumāṇāṃ pallavā iva ।। 

nārācaiś carvitāś cīnā jīrṇajarjarajīvitāḥ ।
jahur jalanidhau dehān bhārabhūtān avasthitān ।। 

karṇāṭasubhaṭoḍḍīnakuntakartitakandarāḥ ।
terur ābhīraśūrāḥ khe tārakānikarā iva ।। 

karīndramakaravyūharaṃhasāhatahetayaḥ ।
keśākeśikṛtārambhā vinemur daśakāś śakāḥ ।। 

daśārṇād āśanir muktaśṛṅkhalā jālabhīravaḥ ।
nilīnā raktajambāle vaitastās timayo yathā ।। 

gūrjarānīkanāśena gūrjarīkeśaluñchanam ।
vihitaṃ taṅganottuṅgaśitaśaṅkuśateraṇaiḥ ।। 

siṣicuś śastrakāṣodyadvidyud dyaunirgatā dravāt ।
śaradhārāvanānīva mīnahetipradāmbudāt ।। 

bhusuṇḍīmaṇḍaloddyotaśyāmārkotpātabhīruṣu ।
ābhīreṣv arayaḥ petur gogaṇā hariteṣv iva ।। 

kāntakāñcanakāntāṅgī nagnā taṅganavāhinī ।
bhuktā gauḍabhaṭenāṅganakhakeśanikarṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

raṇadgaganagāsajjacakricakravikartanaiḥ ।
taṅganāḥ kaṇaśaḥ kīrṇāḥ kaṅkagṛddhreṣu rudrakaiḥ ।। 

laguḍāloḍanoḍḍīnaṃ gauḍaṃ guḍaguḍāravam ।
śrutvā gāndhāragāvogre dudruvuḥ pramitā iva ।। 

ākāśagārṇavaprakhyo vahacchastrakadambakaḥ ।
akarod pārasīkānāṃ ghananaiśatamobhramam ।। 

mandarāhananoḍḍīnakhasthakṣīrodasundare ।
vanālīvāyudhāny āsañ chattraprāleyasānuni ।। 

yad ambudair ivoḍḍīnaṃ śastravṛndair nabho'ṅgane ।
tad dṛṣṭaṃ vīcivalayair lolaiḥ plutam ivārṇave ।। 

śatacandraṃ sitacchatraiś śaraiś śalabhanirbharam ।
śaktibhiḥ kākanīrandhraṃ dṛṣṭam ākāśakānanam ।। 

līnāś cīracayākrandakāriṇaḥ kekayāḥ kṛtāḥ ।
kaṅkaiḥ kaṅkakulākrāntair vyomocchalitamastakāḥ ।। 

himavacchailakanyānāṃ kāmaṃ kalakalāravaiḥ ।
aṅgair anaṅgatāṃ nītvā bhairavair iva garjitam ।। 

kāśair uddehakākrāntā adṛśyair dayayā khagaiḥ ।
nirdhūtapakṣaiḥ kṣubhitaiḥ pavanair iva pāṃsavaḥ ।। 

unmattāstravinirdhūtās tyaktahetiraṇāmbarāḥ ।
nandanānandanirmātṛ nanṛtur jahasur jaguḥ ।। 

prakvaṇatkiṅkiṇījālaṃ śaktivarṣam upāgatam ।
sālvabāṇāniloddhūtam agamat pṛṣadākṛtim ।। 

śaivyāstraiḥ khaṇḍitāḥ kauntā bhramatkuntair vighaṭṭitāḥ ।
śavībhūtā divaṃ nītā dṛṣṭā vidyādharā iva ।। 

dharādharaṇadharmiṇyā dhīrayā vīrasenayā ।
loṭhitāḥ pāṇḍunagarāś calanollāsamātrataḥ ।। 

uddehakāḥ pañcanadair dalitā mattakāśibhiḥ ।
kuntadantakṣatoddāmaiḥ padmā iva mataṅgajaiḥ ।। 

brahmavāsantakānīkaiḥ kṛttāś cakrair gatā mahīm ।
māhāryāḥ krakacotkṛttā vṛkṣāḥ kusumitā iva ।। 

bhokkāṇakānanaṃ lūnaṃ kuṭhārair jaṭhareritaiḥ ।
patad dadāha pārśvastho bhadreśaś śaravahninā ।। 

kāśayo vandilālānalagnā jīrṇamataṅgajāḥ ।
layam ājagmur ābuddham iddhe agnāv indhanaṃ yathā ।। 

trigartāvartagarteṣu bhramitvauṇḍrās tṛṇopamāḥ ।
viviśur vyastamūrdhānaḥ pātālāntaṃ palāyitāḥ ।। 

mandānilācalāmbhodhibhāsure māgadhe bale ।
nimagnā vandilā mandāḥ paṅke jīrṇagajā iva ।। 

cedayac cetanāṃ jahnus taṅganānāṃ raṇāṅgane ।
puṣpāṇāṃ pathi śīrṇānāṃ saukumāryam ivātapāḥ ।। 

kosalāḥ pauravārāvam asahanto arbhakā iva ।
terur muktagadāprāsaśaraśaktyṛṣṭivṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

babhur bhallanikṛttāṅgā drimayo vidrumadrumāḥ ।
ivādrau vidravatsvāntrasāndrāsṛksravamūrtayaḥ ।। 

nārācaughā mahāhetimārutādhūtamūrtayaḥ ।
babhramur bhramarānīkabhāsurā jaladhāv iva ।। 

śaradhārādharāmeghāś śarorṇāpūrṇamecakāḥ ।
śarapatrāvṛtā vṛkṣā bhremur udgarjanā javāḥ ।। 

vanarājyo javāj jīrṇāḥ kaṭakasthalajantavaḥ ।
atruṭan paramākṛṣṭāḥ pelavā iva tantavaḥ ।। 

ratheṣūrdhvasthacakreṣu nikhātonmagnamūrdhasu ।
nipetur janasaṅghātā meghā iva vanādriṣu ।। 

sālatālavanaṃ prāpya janatālavanaṃ ghanam ।
bhujāvakartanaṃ cāsīd uttālasthāṇukānanam ।। 

nanandur nandanodyānasundaryo mattayauvanāḥ ।
vanopavanadeśeṣu meror vīravarāśritāḥ ।। 

tāvat tārāravaṃ reje sainyakānanam unnatam ।
yāvan na parapakṣeṇa krāntaṃ kalpānalaujasā ।। 

chinnān piśācasaṃyuktā hūnāpahṛtahetayaḥ ।
pātayitvā yayuḥ karṇān daśārṇās tarṇakā iva ।। 

jahur bhagnasvarāḥ kāntiṃ tājikājijanaujasā ।
kāśayaḥ kamalānīva śuṣkasrotassvinojasā ।। 

bhukhārā mekhalaiḥ kīrṇāś śaraśaktyṛṣṭimudgaraiḥ ।
vidrutā narake kṣiptāḥ kārkoṭasthalanāmani ।। 

kaurukṣetrāsthas tavasaiś chadmayodhibhir āvṛtāḥ ।
guṇā iva khalākrāntā gatā vyaktam aśaktatām ।। 

drimayo vaṭadhānānāṃ kṣaṇenādāya mastakam ।
bhallaiḥ palāyyāśu gatā vilūnakamalā iva ।। 

mithas sārasvatādityā ādināntaṃ kṛtājayaḥ ।
paṇḍitā iva vādeṣu nodvignā na parājitāḥ ।। 

kavāṭāḥ kharvitakṣudrāvāṭadhānaiḥ parāvṛtāḥ ।
tejaḥ paramam ājagmuś śāntāgnaya ivendhanaiḥ ।। 

kiyadākhyāyata etaj jihvānicayaiḥ kilālam ākulitam ।
vāsukir api varṇayituṃ na samartho raṇavaraṃ nāma ।। 

līlopākhyāne janapadadvandvayuddhavarṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam atyākule yuddhe sāsphoṭabhaṭasaṅkaṭe ।
ādināntam asaṃruddhe raṭatkaṭhinakaṅkaṭe ।। 

vahantīṣūtpatantīṣu patantīṣv aśmavṛṣṭiṣu ।
nadīṣu kṣepaṇotthāsu caṭatketvabjapaṅktiṣu ।। 

mithaḥ phalāgraṭaṅkotthavahniśīkariṇīsu khe ।
āyāntīṣu patantīṣu dūraṃ śaranadīṣu ca ।। 

vahallūnaśiraḥpadmacakrāvartais taraṅgitaiḥ ।
khārṇave pūrite hetivṛndamandākinīgaṇaiḥ ।। 

samīraṇaraṇadvāriśastracūrṇaghanair ghanaiḥ ।
sadāhāṅgeṣu siddheṣu kapikacchavyathāpradaiḥ ।। 

aṣṭabhāgadaśāśeṣaṃ pratāpamadhurākṛtiḥ ।
śastraghātaujasā vīra ivāhas tanutāṃ yayau ।। 

śrāntāśvena prabhagnāgrahetisaṅghātadīptayaḥ ।
dineśena samaṃ senā yayur mandapratāpatām ।। 

atha senādhināthābhyāṃ vicārya saha mantribhiḥ ।
dūtāḥ parasparaṃ dattā yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti ।। 

tataś śramavaśān mandapattraśastraparākramaiḥ ।
raṇasaṃharaṇaṃ kāle sarvair evorarīkṛtam ।। 

tato mahārathottuṅgaketuprānte kṛtāspadam ।
balayor ārurohaika eko yodho dhruvo yathā ।। 

aṃśukaṃ bhrāmayām āsa sarvadiṅmaṇḍalekṣitam ।
dyām eva dīrgham indvaṃśuṃ yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti ।। 

tato dundubhayaś śemuḥ pratidhvanitadiṅmukhāḥ ।
mahāpralayasaṃśāntau puṣkarāvartakā iva ।। 

śarādihetisarito vistīrṇe gaganasthale ।
pravṛttāś śoṣam āgantuṃ śāradyas sarito yathā ।। 

yodhadordrumasañcāras tanutām āyayau śanaiḥ ।
bhūkampānte vanaspanda ivāvāta ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

vinirgantuṃ pravavṛte raṇāraṇyād baladvayam ।
vāripūraś caturdikkaṃ pralayaikārṇavād iva ।। 

utkṣiptamandarakṣīrasamudravalanākulam ।
sainyaṃ praśamadāvartaṃ śanais sāmyam upāyayau ।। 

krameṇāsīn muhūrtena vikaṭodarabhīṣaṇam ।
agastyapītārṇavavac chūnyam eva raṇāṅganam ।। 

śavasantatisampūrṇaṃ vahadraktamahāhradam ।
parikūjanajhāṅkārapūrṇakhillīvanopamam ।। 

bṛhadraktasaritsrotastaraṅgaravaghargharam ।
sākrandāvasṛtāhūtasvatrāṇavyagramānavam ।। 

mṛtārdhamṛtadehaugharaktaughasrutanirjharam ।
sajīvanarapṛṣṭhasthaśavaspandanabhītidam ।। 

karīndraśavarāśyagraviśrāntāmbudakhaṇḍakam ।
viśīrṇarathasaṅghātajitacchattramahāvanam ।। 

vahadraktanadīraṃhaḥprohyamānarathadvipam ।
śaraśaktyṛṣṭimusulagadāprāsāsisaṅkulam ।। 

paryāṇāñcalasannāhakavacāvṛtabhūtalam ।
ketucāmarapaṭṭaughaguptaśāvaśarīrakam ।। 

sphārasphoṭakatūṇīrakuñjakūjatsamīraṇam ।
śararāśipalāśaughatalpasuptaśaveśvaram ।। 

maulihārāṅgadoddyotacakracāpavanāvṛtam ।
śvasṛgālakhagākṛṣṭasāndrāntradīrgharajjukam ।। 

raktakṣetrakvaṇatkiñciccheṣajīvātidanturam ।
raktakardamanirmagnasajīvanaradurduram ।। 

varāṭakacayaprekṣyanirgatākṣiśatoccayam ।
vahadbhujaughakāṣṭaughaghoraraktasaricchatam ।। 

sākrandabandhuvalitamṛtārdhamṛtamānavam ।
sarvāyudharathāśvebhaparyāṇāsañcarāntaram ।। 

nṛtyatkabandhadordaṇḍaṣaṇḍakānanitāmbaram ।
madamedovasāgandhapiṇḍāktaghrāṇakoṭaram ।। 

utphālārdhamṛtebhāśvamāryamāṇālpajīvitam ।
vahadraktanadīvīcīprahārahatadundubhi ।। 

uhyamānamṛtāśvebhamakarāsṛksaricchaṭam ।
mriyamāṇanarānīkaphūtkṛtāsṛgghanānilam ।। 

svalpajīvaśarāpūrṇamukhahikkāṅkitasvaram ।
piṇḍahāryavasāgandhavātāttotpīḍalohitam ।। 

unnāsārdhamṛtebhendrakarākrāntakabandhakam ।
niradhiṣṭhitahastyaśvapātitodyatkabandhakam ।। 

rudadbandhusakhibhraṣṭaśavakṣubdhāsṛguddhvani ।
mṛtabhartṛgale śastratyaktaprāṇakulāṅganam ।। 

śavasthānakṛtodgrīvabandhukāyaparīkṣaṇam ।
śavahārakharākṛṣṭasampṛktanaravyākulam ।। 

keśaśevalavaktrābjacakrāvartananartanam ।
tarattuṅgataraṅgāḍhyavahadraktamahānadam ।। 

prāṇāntasmṛtaputreṣṭamātṛdevadhanābhidham ।
hāhāhīhītikathitamarmacchedanavedanam ।। 

aṅgalagnāyudhoddhāravyagrārdhamṛtamānavam ।
videśamṛtasākrandahūnataṅganatājikam ।। 

mriyamāṇamithodviṣṭaprārabdharathasaṅgaram ।
dantayuddhāsamarthāsyasmṛtageheṣṭadaivatam ।। 

mriyamāṇapathalajjaśūrāśritapalāyanam ।
aśaṅkitāsṛgāvartanītāspadagamotsukam ।। 

marmacchediśaravrātavyathāvihitahuṅkṛti ।
kabandhabandhaprārabdhavetālavalanākramam ।। 

uhyamānadhvajacchattracārucāmarapaṅkajam ।
kiratsandhyāruṇaṃ dikṣu tejasviraktapaṅkajam ।। 

rathacakravanāvartaṃ raktārṇavam ivāṣṭamam ।
patākāphenapuñjāḍhyaṃ cārucāmarabudbudam ।। 

viparyastarathaṃ bhūmikampabhagnapuropamam ।
utpātavātanirdhūtadrumaṃ vanam ivātatam ।। 

kalpadagdhajagatprakhyaṃ munipītārṇavopamam ।
ativṛṣṭihato deśa iva procchinnamānavam ।। 

kālāyaḥkuntavalitaṃ bhusuṇḍīmaṇḍalākulam ।
mattanāgaśavākāraṃ sannatomaramudgaram ।। 

śilāśikharasañjātatālajālam ivātatam ।
patadraktanadītīrajātakuntonnatadrumam ।। 

nāgāgasyūtahetyoghavṛkṣāṃśukusumākulam ।
kaṅkakṛṣṭāntraraśanāvṛndajālakitāmbaram ।। 

asṛksarovaradhvastapatākānalinīgaṇam ।
raktakardamanirmagnanarāhūtasuhṛjjanam ।। 

karīndrakuṇapāgāraniryadbhītajanekṣitam ।
hetilūnalatair vṛkṣais sandigdhograkabandhakam ।। 

asṛṅnadīvahaddhastikaṭakarparanaugaṇam ।
raktasrotassphuracchuklavastradiṇḍīrapiṇḍakam ।। 

sañcarannipatatkṣipramṛtyuvicchinnamānavam ।
itaś cetaś ca nipatatkabandhanavadānavam ।। 

ūrdhvasthālakṣyacakraughachinnasainyadravajjanam ।
raktanissrāvabhāṅkārahikkārārdhamṛtāravam ।। 

sirāmukhollasadraktadhārādhautavrajatkhagam ।
sutālottālavetālatālatāṇḍavasaṅkaṭam ।। 

paryastarathadārvantarvanāntaritasadbhaṭam ।
antassthasajjīvabhaṭasyandisyandanabhītidam ।। 

raktakardamapūrṇāsyakiñcijjīvakvaṇacchavam ।
kiñcijjīvanarodgrīvakaṣṭadṛṣṭaśvavāyasam ।। 

ekāmiṣograkravyādayuddhakolāhalākulam ।
ekāmiṣārthayuddhehāmṛtakravyādasaṅkulam ।। 

vivṛttāsaṅkhyāśvadviradapuruṣādhīśvararathapravṛttāstagrīvaprakṛtirudhirodgārasusarit ।
raṇodyānaṃ mṛtyos tad abhavad aśuṣkāyudhalataṃ saśailaṃ kalpānte jagad iva viparyastam akhilam ।। 

līlopākhyāna āhavavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha vīra ivāraktaḥ kālenāstamito raviḥ ।
śaśvattejaḥparimlānapratāpo abdhau samujjhitaḥ ।। 

raṇaraktarucivyomadarpaṇapratibimbitā ।
ahnas sūryaśiraśchede sandhyālekhodabhūt kṣaṇāt ।। 

bhūpātālanabhodigbhyaḥ pralayābdhijalaughavat ।
samājagmus tamastālā vetālavalayā iva ।। 

dṛṣṭaṃ dhvāntāsidalite dinanāgendramastake ।
sandhyārāgāruṇākīrṇaṃ tārānikaramauktikam ।। 

nissattveṣu tamo'ndheṣu sarassv arasaśāliṣu ।
saṅkocam āyayuḥ padmā mṛtānāṃ hṛdayeṣv iva ।। 

mīlatpakṣāḥ kṣaṇāt suptāḥ kacchavruḍitakandharāḥ ।
kulāyeṣu khagā āsan sarvāṅgeṣv iva hetayaḥ ।। 

āsannacandrasubhagālokāḥ kumudapaṅktayaḥ ।
ullasaddhṛdayā jātā vīrapakṣeṣv iva śriyaḥ ।। 

raktavārimayī sāyasaṅgaguptaśilīmukhā ।
saṅkucadvaktrapadmābhūd raṇabhūmir ivābjinī ।। 

upary abhūd vyomasaras tārākumudamaṇḍitam ।
adhas tv abhūd vāriviyat sphuratkumudatārakam ।। 

tamāṃsy apītakāryāṇi bhūtāni cākhilāny alam ।
payāṃsīva viserūni prasṛtāni diśaṃ prati ।। 

āsīd raṇāṅganaṃ gāyadvetālakulasaṅkulam ।
kvaṇatkaṅkālakaṇṭhasthakaṅkakākolakelimat ।। 

rathakāṣṭacitijvālāsatārāmbarabhāsuram ।
pacatpacapacāśabdamedomāṃsamayānalam ।। 

śavāṅgāsthisphuṭāsphoṭaluṭhacciticayolmukam ।
vetālalalanārabdhajalalīlātirohitam ।। 

śvakākayakṣavetālatālakolāhalolbaṇam ।
samāgamena bhūtānāṃ samuḍḍīnavanopamam ।। 

raktamāṃsavasāmedoharaṇavyagraḍākinam ।
carvitāsṛgvasāmāṃsasravatsṛkvipiśācakam ।। 

sabhyamadhyacitālokaprakaṭāsṛkśavavrajam ।
kharūpikānīyamānāśvasannyastamahāśavam ।। 

uttāṇḍavograkumbhāṇḍamaṇḍaloḍḍāmarodaram ।
chamacchamivilāpāntaṃ medo'sṛgbāṣpasāmbudam ।। 

vahadraktanadīraṃhorūḍhabhūcararūpikam ।
vetālākulakaṅkālakarṣaṇākulakākakam ।। 

mṛtebhodaramañjūṣāsuptavetālabālakam ।
viviktaikatarūddeśapānakrīḍāstharākṣasam ।। 

mattavetālakalahe citālātaraṇojjvalam ।
vahadraktavasāmiśragandhabandhuramārutam ।। 

rūpikāpeṭake vegaraṇadruṭaruṭāravam ।
ardhapakvaśavāsvādalubdhayakṣollasatkili ।। 

tuṅgavaṅgakaliṅgāṅgataṅganāṅgalagatkhagam ।
tārāpātopamabhavatsaṃmukhajvālarūpikam ।। 

patadvetālasollāsamadhyasthāsṛksurūpikam ।
piśācākarṇitābhyarṇayoginīgaṇagāyanam ।। 

prasṛtāntramahātantrīprāyasampannavādanam ।
piśācavāsanotkrāntapiśācībhūtamānavam ।। 

rūpikālokanāpūrvatrāsārdhamṛtasadbhaṭam ।
kvacidvetālarakṣobhir ahanīvonnamadraṇam ।। 

kharūpikāskandhapatacchavatrastaniśācaram ।
nabhassaṅghaṭitāpūrvabhūtapeṭakasaṅkaṭam ।। 

atiprayatnāpahṛtamriyamāṇanarādhipam ।
subhakṣāpekṣiyakṣekṣāvikṣiptaśavarāśimat ।। 

śivāmukhānalaśikhākhaṇḍaiś chamitanaktagaiḥ ।
samuḍḍīnanavāśokapuṣpaguccham ivābhitaḥ ।। 

kabandhakandharābaddhavyagravetālabālakam ।
yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācājikacadākāśagolmukam ।। 

ākāśabhūdharanikuñjaguhāntarāla piṇḍopamasthitatamo'mbudapīṭhapūram ।
vyālolabhūtarabhasākulakalpavāta vyādhūtalokakarakāṇḍakavāṭakalpam ।। 

līlopākhyāne niśācarākularātriraṇāṅganasthānavarṇavaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśat sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ niśācarācāraciraghore raṇāṅgane ।
ullasantīṣu vetālakṣveḍāsūḍḍāmarāravaiḥ ।। 

nabhaḥprekṣakasenāsu pragatāsu yathāgatam ।
viśrānteṣv iva bhūpeṣu rathādiṣu nijāspade ।। 

mahāsarojala iva jane dṛśye raṇāṅgane ।
ahanīva janācāre sthite śyāmācarehite ।। 

hastahāryatamaḥpiṇḍasphuṭakuḍye niśāgṛhe ।
lābhotsavocchalaccitte bhūtasaṅghe pranṛtyati ।। 

niśśabdaśāntasañcāre nidrāmudre kakubgaṇe ।
līlāpatir udārātmā kiñcit khinnamanā iva ।। 

prātaḥkāryaṃ vicāryāśu mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ ।
dīrghacandrasamākāre śayane himaśītale ।। 

candrodayanibhe vāsagṛhe śiśirakoṭare ।
nidrāṃ muhūrtam agaman mudritekṣaṇapuṣkaraḥ ।। 

atha te lalane vyoma tat parityajya tad gṛham ।
randhrair viviśatur vātalekho abjamukulaṃ yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

iyanmātram idaṃ sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ vāgvidāṃ vara ।
randhreṇa tantutanunā kathaṃ praviśati prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ādhibhautikadeho ayam iti yasya matibhramaḥ ।
tasyāsāv aṇurandhreṇa gantuṃ śaknoti nānagha ।। 

rodhito aham aneneti na māmy atreti yasya dhīḥ ।
anubhūtānubhavinī bhavatīty anubhūyate ।। 

yenānubhūtaṃ pūrvārdhaṃ gacchāmīti sa tatkriyaḥ ।
kathaṃ bhavati paścārdhagamanonmukhacetanaḥ ।। 

vāri naivordhvam āyāti nādho gacchati pāvakaḥ ।
yā yathaiva pravṛttā cit sā tathaivāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

chāyāyām upaviṣṭasya kutas tāpānubhūtayaḥ ।
anyasaṃvedano anyo'rthaḥ kenacin nānubhūyate ।। 

yā yathā sampravṛttā cit sā tathaiva sthitiṃ gatā ।
parameṇa prayatnena nīyate anyāṃ daśāṃ punaḥ ।। 

sarpaikapratyayo rajjvām asatyapratyayād balāt ।
nivartate anyathā tv eṣa tiṣṭhaty eva yathāsthitam ।। 

yathā saṃvit tathā cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ tathehitam ।
bālaṃ praty api saṃsiddham etat ko nānubhūyate ।। 

yaḥ punas svapnasaṅkalpapuruṣapratimākṛtiḥ ।
ākāśamātrakākāras sa kathaṃ kena rodhyate ।। 

cittamātraśarīraṃ tu sarvasyaiva hi sarvataḥ ।
vidyate vedanātve tat kvacid etīva hṛdgatāt ।। 

yathābhimatam evāsya bhavaty astamayodayam ।
ādisarge svabhāvotthaṃ paścād dvaitaikyabhāvanam ।। 

cittākāśaṃ cidākāśam ākāśaṃ ca tṛtīyakam ।
viddhy etat trayam evaikam avinābhāvatāvaśāt ।। 

etac cittaśarīraṃ tvaṃ viddhi sarvagatodayam ।
yathā saṃvedanecchatvād yathā saṃvedanodayam ।। 

vasati trasareṇvantar nīyate gaganodare ।
līyate aṅkurakośeṣu rasībhavati pallave ।। 

ullasaty ambuvīcitve pranṛtyati śilodare ।
pravarṣaty ambudo bhūtvā śilībhūyāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

yatheccham ambare yāti jaṭhare api ca bhūbhṛtām ।
anantam ākāśavapur dhatte atha paramāṇutām ।। 

bhavaty adrivarādhāro baddhapīṭho nabhaśśiraḥ ।
dehasyāntar bahir api dadhadvaratanūruham ।। 

bhavaty ākāśam ādhatte koṭīḥ padmajasadmanām ।
ananyās svātmanāmbhodhir āvartaracana iva ।। 

anudbhinnaprabodho asau sargādau cittadehakaḥ ।
ākāśātmā mahān bhūtvā vetti prakṛtitāṃ gataḥ ।। 

asatyam eva vāritvaṃ buddhvodetīva tattayā ।
vandhyāputro ayam asmīti yathā svapnabhrame naraḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kiṃ cittam etad bhavati kiṃ vā bhavati no katham ।
katham evaṃmayād rūpān nānyad bhavati vā kṣaṇāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pratyekam eva yac cittaṃ tad evaṃrūpaśaktimat ।
pṛthak pratyekam uditāḥ praticittaṃ jagadbhramāḥ ।। 

kṣaṇakalpajagatsaṅgāt samudyanti galanti ca ।
nimeṣāt kasyacit kalpāt kasyacit tat kramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

maraṇāder mahāmohād anantaram iyaṃ sthitiḥ ।
kṣaṇāc cirād vodety āśu tatremaṃ tvaṃ kramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

maraṇādimayī mūrchā pratyekenānubhūyate ।
yaivaitāṃ viddhi sumate mahāpralayayāminīm ।। 

tadante tanute sargaṃ sarva eva pṛthak pṛthak ।
sahajasvapnasaṅkalpasambhramācalavṛttivat ।। 

mahāpralayarātryante virāḍātmā manovapuḥ ।
yathedaṃ tanute tadvat pratyekaṃ mṛtyanantaram ।। 

rāmaḥ

mṛter anantaraṃ sargo yathā smṛtyānubhūyate ।
virāṭ tathānubhavati nāto viśvam akāraṇam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahati pralaye rāma sarve hariharādayaḥ ।
videhamuktatāṃ yānti smṛteḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ ।। 

asmadādiprabuddhātmā kilāvaśyaṃ vimucyate ।
kathaṃ bhavantu vāmuktā videhāḥ padmajādayaḥ ।। 

adyatve te hi ye jīvās teṣāṃ maraṇajanmasu ।
smṛtiḥ kāraṇatām eti mokṣābhāvavaśād iha ।। 

jīvo hi mṛtimūrchānte yad antaḥ pronmiṣann iva ।
anunmiṣita evāste tat pradhānam udāhṛtam ।। 

tad vyoma prakṛtis soktā tad avyaktaṃ jaḍājaḍam ।
saṃsṛter asmṛteś caiva krama eṣa bhavodaye ।। 

bodhonmukhatve hi mahat tat prabuddhaṃ yadā bhavet ।
tadā tanmātradikkālakriyābhūtādy udeti khāt ।। 

tad evocchūnam ābuddhaṃ bhavatīndriyapañcakam।
tad eva budhyate dehaṃ sa eṣo asty ātivāhikaḥ ।। 

cirakālapratyayataḥ kalpanāparipīvaraḥ ।
ādhibhautikatābodham ādhatte athaiṣa eva vaḥ ।। 

tato dikkālakalanās tadādhāratayā sthitāḥ ।
udyanty anuditā eva vāyau spandakriyā iva ।। 

vṛddhim ittham ayaṃ yāto mudhaiva bhuvanabhramaḥ ।
svapnāṅganāsaṅgasamas svanubhūto apy asanmayaḥ ।। [sic!]

yadaiva mriyate jantuḥ paśyaty āśu tadaiva saḥ ।
tatraiva bhuvanābhogam idam ittham avasthitam ।। 

vyomnaivānubhavaty accham ahaṃ jagad iti bhramam ।
vyomarūpaṃ vyomarūpī jīvo jāta ivātmavān ।। 

purapattanaśailārkatārānikaradanturam ।
jarāmaraṇavaiklavyavyādhisaṅkaṭakoṭaram ।। 

sabhāvābhāvasaṃrambhasthūlasūkṣmacalācalam ।
sādridyūrvīnadīśāhorātrikalpakṣayodayam ।। 

ahaṃ jāto amunā pitrā kilātrety āttaniścayam ।
iyaṃ mātā dhanam idaṃ mamety uditavāsanam ।। 

sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ceti mameti kṛtakalpanam ।
bālo abhūvam ahaṃ tv adya yuveti vilasan hṛdi ।। 

pratyekam evam uditas saṃsāravanaṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
tārākusumito nīlameghacañcalapallavaḥ ।। 

carannaramṛgānīkas surāsuravihaṅgamaḥ ।
sālokakausumarajomāyāgahanakuñjakaḥ ।। 

abdhipuṣkariṇīpūrṇo mervādyacalaloṣṭakaḥ ।
cittapuṣkarabīje antar nilīnānubhavāṅkuraḥ ।। 

yatraiṣa mriyate jīvas tatraivaṃ paśyati kṣaṇāt ।
pratyekam uditeṣv evaṃ jagatṣaṇḍeṣu bhūriśaḥ ।। 

koṭayo brahmarudrendramarudviṣṇuvivasvatām ।
mervabdhimaṇḍaladvīpalokāntaradṛśaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

yātā yāsyanti yānty etā dṛṣtayo anaṣṭarūpiṇi ।
yā brahmaṇy upabṛṃhāḍhye tāḥ ke gaṇayituṃ kṣamāḥ ।। 

evaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ viśvaṃ nāsty eva mananād ṛte ।
mananaṃ ca kham evātas tad idānīṃ vicāraya ।। 

yad eva tac cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ smṛtaṃ ।
mananaṃ ca cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ padam ।। 

yad evāmbu sa āvarto na tv asty āvarta vastusat ।
dṛṣṭvaivāste dṛśyam iva dṛśyaṃ na tv asti vastusat ।। 

cidvyomno bhūtanabhasi kacanaṃ yan maṇer iva ।
taj jagad bhāti nānātmaratnaṃ śvabhram ivāmbare ।। 

madbuddhārtho jagacchabdo vidyate paramaṃ padam ।
tvadbuddhārthas tu nāsty eva tvamahaṃśabdakāv api ।। 

tasmāl līlāsarasvatyāv ākāśavapuṣau sthite ।
sarvage paramātmācche sarvatrāpratighe anaghe ।। 

yatra tatra tadā vyomni yathākāśaṃ yathepsitam ।
udayaṃ kurutas tena tadgṛhe te sthitiṃ gate ।। 

sarvatra sambhavati cidgaganaṃ tadantas tadvedanaṃ kalanam āmananaṃ visāri ।
tac cātivāhikam ihāhur akuḍyam eva dehaṃ kathaṃ ka iva taṃ vada kiṃ ruṇaddhi ।। 

līlopākhyāne maraṇasamanantaraṃ saṃsṛtyanubhavanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

tayoḥ praviṣṭayor devyoḥ padmasadma babhūva tat ।
candradvayodayoddyotadhavalodarasundaram ।। 

komalāmalasaugandhyamṛdumandāramārutam ।
tatprabhāveṇa nidrālunṛpetararaṇāṅganam ।। 

saubhāgyanandanodyānaṃ vidrutavyādhivedanam ।
savasantaṃ vanam iva phullaṃ prātar ivāmbujam ।। 

tayor dehaprabhāpūraiś śaśiniṣṣyandaśītalaiḥ ।
āhlādito asau bubudhe rājokṣita ivāmṛtaiḥ ।। 

āsanadvayaviśrāntaṃ sa dadarśāpsarodvayam ।
meruśṛṅgadvaye līnaṃ candradvayam ivoditam ।। 

nimeṣam iva sañcintya sa vismitamanā nṛpaḥ ।
uttasthau śayanāc cheṣād iva cakragadādharaḥ ।। 

parisamyamitālambamālyahāravarāmbaraḥ ।
puṣpotkara ivotphullaṃ jagrāha kusumāñjalim ।। 

upadhānapradeśasthāt svayaṃ paṭalakodarāt ।
baddhapadmāsano bhūmau bhūtvovācedam ānataḥ ।। 

jayatāṃ janmadaussthityadāhadoṣaśaśiprabhe ।
devyau bāhyāntaratamovidrāvaṇaraviprabhe ।। 

tayor uktveti tatyāja pādayoḥ kusumāñjalim ।
tīradrumo vikasitaṃ padminyoḥ padmayor iva ।। 

līlāyai bhūpajanmātha vaktuṃ mantriṇam īśvarī ।
bodhayām āsa pārśvasthaṃ saṅkalpena sarasvatī ।। 

prabuddho apsarasau dṛṣṭvā praṇamya kusumāñjalim ।
tayoḥ pādeṣu santyajya viveśa purato nataḥ ।। 

uvāca devī he rājan kas tvam kasya sutaḥ kadā ।
iha jāta iti śrutvā sa mantrī vākyam abravīt ।। 

devyau yuṣmatprasādo ayaṃ bhavatyor api yat puraḥ ।
vaktuṃ śaknomi tad idaṃ śrūyatāṃ janma matprabhoḥ ।। 

āsīd ikṣvākuvaṃśottho rājā rājīvalocanaḥ ।
śrīmatkundaratho nāma dośchāyācchāditāvaniḥ ।। 

tasyābhūd induvadanaḥ putro bhadrarathābhidhaḥ ।
tasya viśvarathaḥ putras tasya putro bṛhadrathaḥ ।। 

tasya sindhurathaḥ putras tasya śailarathas sutaḥ ।
tasya kāmarathaḥ putras tasya putro mahārathaḥ ।। 

tasya viṣṇurathaḥ putras tasya putraḥ kalārathaḥ ।
tasya sūryarathaḥ putras tasya putro nabhorathaḥ ।। 

ayam asmatprabhus tasya putraḥ pūrṇāmaladyuteḥ ।
amṛtāpūritarathaḥ kṣīrodasyeva candramāḥ ।। 

mahadbhiḥ puṇyasambhārair vidūratha iti śrutaḥ ।
jāto mātus sumitrāyā gauryā guha ivāparaḥ ।। 

pitāsya daśavarṣasya dattvā rājyaṃ vanaṃ gataḥ ।
pālayaty eṣa bhūpīṭhaṃ tataḥprabhṛti dharmataḥ ।। 

bhavantyāv adya samprāpte phalite sukṛtadrume ।
devyau dīrghatapaḥkleśaśataduṣprāpadarśane ।। 

ity ayaṃ vasudhādhīśo vidūratha iti śrutaḥ ।
adya yuṣmatprasādena parāṃ pāvanatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

ity uktvā saṃsthite tūṣṇīṃ mantriṇy avanipe tathā ।
kṛtāñjalau natamukhe baddhapadmāsane avanau ।। 

rājan smara vivekena pūrvajātim imāṃ svayam ।
vadantī mūrdhni pasparśa taṃ kareṇa sarasvatī ।। 

atha hārdatamomāyā padmasya kṣayam āyayau ।
savikāsaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ jñaptisparśād athābhavat ।। 

sasmāra pūrvavṛttāntam antassphurad iva sthitam ।
anyadehaikarājatvaṃ līlāvilasitānvitam ।। 

jñātvā prajñaptivṛttāntaṃ līlāyatnavijṛmbhitam ।
ātmodantaṃ babhūvāsāv uhyamāna ivārṇave ।। 

uvācātmani saṃsāre bata māyeyam ātatā ।
parijñātā prasādena devyor iha mayādhunā ।। 

he devyau kim idaṃ nāma dinam ekaṃ mṛtasya me ।
gatam adyeha yātāni vayo varṣāṇi saptatiḥ ।। 

smarāmy anekakāryāṇi smarāmi prapitāmaham ।
smarāmi bālyaṃ tāruṇyaṃ mitrabandhuparicchadam ।। 

jñaptiḥ

rājan mṛtimahāmohamūrchāyās samanantaram ।
tasmiṃl lokāntare atīte tasminn eva muhūrtake ।। 

tasminn eva gṛhe athāsmin naiva vetsy atha vacmi te ।
ayaṃ tasya gṛhasyāntar vyomany eva kila sthitaḥ ।। 

girigrāmakaviprasya gṛhe antar bhūpamaṇḍapaḥ ।
tasyāntar idam ābhāti pratyekaṃ ca jagadgṛham ।। 

kila brāhmaṇagehāntar jīvas te madvarāt sthitaḥ ।
tatraiva tasya bhūpīṭhaṃ tasmiṃś ca nijamaṇḍapaḥ ।। 

tasyaiva ca gṛhasyāntar idaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।
tatraivedaṃ tava gṛhaṃ sthitam ārambhamantharam ।। 

tatraiva cetasi tava nirmalākāśanirmale ।
pratibhāsāgatam idaṃ vyavahārabhramaṃ tatam ।। 

vidūrathaḥ

yathedaṃ nāma me janma tathekṣvākukulaṃ mama ।
etannāmāna ete me purābhūvan pitāmahāḥ ।। 

jāto aham abhavaṃ bālo daśavarśasya me pitā ।
parivrāḍ vipinaṃ yāta iha rājye abhiṣicya mām ।। 

tato digvijayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā rājyam akaṇṭakam ।
amībhir mantribhiḥ pauraiḥ pālayāmi vasundharām ।। 

yajñakriyākramavato dharme pālayataḥ prajāḥ ।
vayasas samatītāni mama varṣāṇi saptatiḥ ।। 

idaṃ parabalaṃ prāptaṃ mama dāruṇavigraham ।
yuddhaṃ kṛtvedam āyāto gṛham asmi yathāsthitam ।। 

ime devyau gṛhaṃ prāpte mamaite pūjayāmy aham ।
pūjitā hi prayacchanti devatās svaṃ samīhitam ।। 

mameyam etayor ekā jñānaṃ jātismṛtipradam ।
iha dattavatī devī bhābjasyeva vikāsanam ।। 

idānīṃ kṛtakṛtyo asmi jāto asmi gatasaṃśayaḥ ।
śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam ।। 

sarasvatī

itīyam ātatā bhrāntir bhavato bhūrisambhramā ।
nānāhāravihārāḍhyā salokāntarasañcarā ।। 

yasminn eva muhūrte tvaṃ mṛtim abhyāgataḥ purā ।
tadaiva pratibhaiṣā te svayam abhyuditā hṛdi ।। 

ekām āvartavalanāṃ tyaktvādhatte yathāparām ।
kṣipram eva nadīvāhaś citpravāhas tathaiva vaḥ ।। 

āvartāntarasaṃmiśro yathāvartaḥ pravartate ।
kadācid evaṃ sargaśrīr miśrāmiśrā ca vardhate ।। 

tasmin mṛtimuhūrte te pratibhānam upāgatam ।
etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ cidbhāge sad iva sthitam ।। 

yathā svapnamuhūrte antas saṃvatsaraśatakramaḥ ।
yathā saṅkalpanirmāṇe jīvitān maraṇaṃ punaḥ ।। 

yathā gandharvanagare kuḍyamaṇḍapakuṭṭanam ।
yathā nauyānasaṃrambhe vṛkṣaparvatacopanam ।। 

yathā svadhātusaṅkṣobhe puraparvatanartanam ।
yathā samañjasaṃ svapne svaśiraḥparikartanam ।। 

mithyaiveyam iha prauḍhā bhrāntir ātatarūpiṇī ।
vastutas tu na jāto asi na mṛto asi kadācana ।। 

śuddhavijñānarūpas tvaṃ śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhasi ।
paśyasīvaitad akhilaṃ na ca paśyasi kiñcana ।। 

sarvātmakatayā nityaṃ prakacasy ātmanātmani ।
mahāmaṇir ivodāra āloka iva bhāsuraḥ ।। 

vastutas tu na bhūpīṭham idam na ca bhavān ayam ।
na ceme girayo grāmā na ceha na ca vai vayam ।। 

girigrāmakaviprasya maṇḍapākāśake kila ।
tal līlāpatirājyāḍhyaṃ jagad ābhāti bhāsuram ।। 

tatra līlārājadhānīmaṇḍapo maṇḍitākṛtiḥ ।
bhāti tasyodare vyomni tavedaṃ vitataṃ jagat ।। 

yasmiñ jagati gehe antar yasmin vayam iha sthitāḥ ।
evaṃ teṣāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vyoma vyomaiva nirmalam ।। 

teṣu maṇḍapakheṣv asti na mahī na ca pattanam ।
na vanāni va śailaughā na meghasaridarṇavāḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ tatra niśśūnye viharanti gṛhe janāḥ ।
na paśyanti jagan nāpi pārthivān na ca bhūdharān ।। 

vidūrathaḥ

evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ devi mamehānucarā ime ।
sampannā ātmanā santi te kim ātmani nāthavā ।। 

jagat svapnārthavad bhāti tatra svapne navādrayaḥ ।
katham ātmani satyās syur nāsatyā veti me vada ।। 

devī

rājan viditavedyeṣu śuddhabodhaikarūpiṣu ।
na kiñcid etat sadrūpaṃ cidvyomātmasu jāgatam ।। 

śuddhabodhātmano bhāti kuto nāma jagadbhramaḥ ।
rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte punas sarpabhramaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

asadbhāte parijñāte kutas sattā jagadbhrame ।
parijñāte marujale punar jalamatiḥ kutaḥ ।। 

svapnakāle parijñāte sve svapnamaraṇe kutaḥ ।
svasvapne svapnamṛtibhīr amṛtasyaiva jāyate ।। 

buddhasya śuddhasya śarannabhaśśrīsvacchāvadātasya ghanāśayasya ।
ahaṃ jagac ceti kuśabdakārthavarjaṃ yad asty aṅganavācikaṃ tat ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

līlopākhyāne bhrāntivicāro nāma sargaḥ

dvicatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

yas tv abuddhamatir mūḍho rūḍho na vitate pade ।
vajrasāram idaṃ tasya jagad asty asad eva sat ।। 

yathā bālasya vetālo mṛtiparyantaduḥkhadaḥ ।
asad eva sadākāraṃ tathā mūḍhamater jagat ।। 

tāpa eva yathā vāri mṛgāṇāṃ bhramakāraṇam ।
asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tathā mūḍhadhiyāṃ jagat ।। 

yathā svapne mṛtir jantor asatyā satyarūpiṇī ।
nārthakriyākarī bhāti tathedaṃ durvidāṃ jagat ।। 

avyutpannasya kanake kānake kaṭake yathā ।
kaṭakajñaptir evāsti na manāg api hemadhīḥ ।। 

yathājñasya purāgāranaganāgendrakalpanā ।
iyaṃ dṛśyadṛg evāsti na tv anyā paramārthadṛk ।। 

yathā nabhasi muktālīpiñchakeśoṇḍukādayaḥ ।
asatyās satyatāṃ yātā tathedaṃ durdṛśāṃ jagat ।। 

dīrghasvapnam idam viśvaṃ viddhy ahantādisaṃyutam ।
atrānye svapnapuruṣā yathā satyās tathā śṛṇu ।। 

asti sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ paramārthaghanaṃ śuci ।
acetyacinmātravapuḥ paramākāśam ātatam ।। 

tat sarvagaṃ sarvaśakti sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ svayam ।
yatra yatra yathodeti tathāste tatra tatra vai ।। 

tena svapnapure draṣṭā yān vetti puravāsinaḥ ।
narān iti narā eva kṣaṇāt tasya bhavanti te ।। 

yad draṣṭuś citsvarūpaṃ tat svapnākāśāntarasthitam ।
svapnākāśacitāhaṃ hi naro aneneti bhāvitam ।। 

citpakṣataikyavaśato narataivāvabudhyate ।
ātmany ato digdvayena dvayor apy eti satyatā ।। 

rāmaḥ

svapne te svapnapuruṣā na satyās syur mune yadā ।
vada tat ko bhaved doṣo māyāmātraśarīriṇi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapne anyapuravāstavyā vastutas satyarūpiṇaḥ ।
pramāṇam atra śṛṇu me pratyakṣaṃ nāma netarat ।। 

sargādāv ātmabhūr bhāti svapnābho anubhavātmakaḥ ।
tatsaṅkalpakalā viśvam evaṃ svapnābham eva tat ।। 

evaṃ viśvam idaṃ svapnas tatra satyaṃ bhavān mama ।
yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivānye svapne svapnaṃ tathā nṛṇām ।। 

svapne nagaravāstavyās satyā na syur ime yadi ।
tad ihāpi tadākāre na satyaṃ me bhavān api ।। 

yathāhaṃ tava satyātmā satyam evaṃ bhavān mama ।
svapnopalambhe saṃsāre mithas siddhyai prathedṛśī ।। 

saṃsāravipule svapne yathā satyam ahaṃ tava ।
tathā tvam api me satyaṃ sarvasvapneṣv iti kramaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

svapnadraṣṭari nirnidre tad dṛṣṭaṃ svapnapattanam ।
sadrūpatvāt tathaivāste mamaivaṃ bhagavan matiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam etat tathaivāste satyatvāt svapnapattanam ।
svapnadraṣṭari nirnidre apy ākāśaviṣadākṛtiḥ ।। 

etad āstām idaṃ tāvad yaj jāgrad iti manyase ।
viddhi tat svapnam evāntar deśakālādyapūrakam ।। 

evaṃ sarvam idaṃ bhāti na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam ।
rañjayaty api mithyaiva svapnastrīsuratopamam ।। 

sarvatra vartate sarvaṃ dehasyāntar bahis tathā ।
yat tu vetti yathā saṃvit tat tathāśv eva paśyati ।। 

yat kośe vidyate dravyaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā labhyate yathā ।
tathāsti sarvaṃ cidvyomni labhyate yat pracetyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anantaram uvācedaṃ devī jñaptir vidūratham ।
kṛtvā bodhāmṛtāsekair vivekāṅkurasundaram ।। 

sarasvatī

tad evam eṣa rājaṃs tvaṃ līlārtham upavarṇitaḥ ।
svasti te astu gamiṣyāvo dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti proktaṃ sarasvatyā girā madhuravarṇayā ।
uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān bhūmipālo vidūrathaḥ ।। 

mamāpi darśanaṃ devi moghaṃ bhavati nārthini ।
mahāphalapradāyās tu kathaṃ tava bhaviṣyati ।। 

ahaṃ dehaṃ samutsṛjya lokāntaram itaḥ param ।
nijam āyāmi he devi svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

atrādiśāśu māṃ mātaḥ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgatam ।
bhakte avahelā varade mahatāṃ na virājate ।। 

yaṃ pradeśam aham yāmi tam evāyātv ayaṃ mama ।
mantrī kumārī caiveyaṃ bāleti kuru me dayām ।। 

sarasvatī

āgaccha rājyam ucitāṅgavicāracāru prāgjanmamaṇḍalavare kuru nirviśaṅkam ।
asmābhir arthijanakāmanirākṛtir hi dṛṣṭā na kācana kadācid apīti viddhi ।। 

līlopākhyāne svapnapuruṣasatyatvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tricatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

sarasvatī

asmin raṇavare rājan mṛtavyaṃ bhavatādhunā ।
prāptavyaṃ prāktanaṃ rājyam etat pratyakṣam eva me ।। 

kumāryā mantriṇā caiva tvayā ca prāktanaṃ puram ।
āgantavyaṃ śavībhūtaṃ prāptavyaṃ taccharīrakam ।। 

āvāṃ yāvo yathāyātaṃ vātarūpeṇa ca tvayā ।
āgantavyaś ca taddeśaḥ kumāryā mantriṇāpi ca ।। 

anyaiva gatir aśvasya gatir anyā kharoṣṭrayoḥ ।
madaklinnakapolasya gatir anyaiva dantinaḥ ।। 

prastuteti kathā yāvan mitho madhurabhāṣiṇoḥ ।
tāvad praviśya sambhrānta uvācordhvaṃ sthito naraḥ ।। 

deva sāyakacakrāsigadāparighavṛṣṭimat ।
mahat parabalaṃ prāptam ekārṇava ivoddhataḥ ।। 

kalpakālāniloddhūtakulācalaśilopamaḥ ।
gadāśaktibhusuṇḍīnāṃ vṛṣṭīn muñcati vṛṣṭivat ।। 

nagare nagasaṅkāśe lagno agnir vyāptadiktaṭaḥ ।
dahaṃś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiḥ pātayaty uttamāḥ purīḥ ।। 

kalpāmbudaghaṭātulyā vyomni dhūmamahādrayaḥ ।
balāt proḍḍayanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā garuḍā iva ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sasambhramaṃ vadanty evaṃ puruṣe paruṣārave ।
udabhūt pūrayann āśā bahiḥ kolāhalo mahān ।। 

balād ākṛṣṭakarṇānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ śaravarṣiṇām ।
bṛhatāṃ mattamattānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ tarasvinām ।। 

pure caṭacaṭāsphoṭair vellatāṃ jātavedasām ।
paurāṇāṃ dagdhadārāṇāṃ mahāhalahalāravaiḥ ।। 

taratām agnikhaṇḍānāṃ ṣvakkārakaṭhināravam ।
jvalantīnāṃ parispandād dhvagadhvagiti cārciṣām ।। 

atha vātāyanād devyau mantrī rājā vidūrathaḥ ।
dadṛśuḥ pronnamannādaṃ mahāniśi mahāpuram ।। 

pralayānilasaṅkṣubdhapūrṇaikārṇavaraṃhasā ।
pūrṇaṃ parabalenograhetimeghataraṅgiṇā ।। 

kalpāntavahnivigalandehabhūdharabhāsuraiḥ ।
dahyamānaṃ mahājvālājālair ambarapūrakaiḥ ।। 

muṣṭigrāhyamahāmeghagarjasantarjanorjitaiḥ ।
ghoraṃ kalakalārāvair māṃsalair mantrijalpitaiḥ ।। 

puṣkarāvartasaṅkāśadhūmābhrapihitāmbaram ।
proḍḍīnahemābhranibhajvālāpuñjair nirantaram ।। 

taradulmukakhaṇḍoghatārātaralitāmbaram ।
anyo'nyadehasadmaughaprajvalajjvālanākulam ।। 

hatasainyapurāpātadhūtāṅgārābhrakoṭaram ।
karkaśākrandanirdagdhalokapūrogragarjitam ।। 

kṛśānukaṇanārācanirantaratarāmbaram ।
bṛhadagniśikhājālaluṭhaddagdhapurotkaram ।। 

raṇaddviradasaṅghaṭṭakuṭṭitodbhaṭasadbhaṭam ।
vidravattaskaracchedamārgakīrṇamahādhanam ।। 

aṅgārarāśinipatannaranāryugrarodanam ।
sphuṭaccaṭacaṭāśabdapraluṭhatpluṣṭakāṣṭakam ।। 

vipulālātacakraughaśatasūryanabhastalam ।
aṅgāraśikharākīrṇasamastavasudhātalam ।। 

dagdhāgnikāṣṭhakreṅkāraraṇajjvalanavaiṇikam ।
dagdhajantuparākrandarudatsakalasairibham ।। 

paṭaviśrāntarājastrīvṛddhotsannahṛtāśanam ।
sakalagrasanārambhasodyogāgnimahāśikham ।। 

kaṭacchākkāradukkārakaṭhināgniraṇadgṛham ।
anantajantubhojyānnavahnimuktendhanaspṛham ।। 

atha śuśrāva tatrāsau giro rājā vidūrathaḥ ।
yodhānāṃ dahyamānānāṃ paśyatām abhidhāvatām ।। 

hā mattamarud ūrdhvasthān aṅgāragṛhapādapān ।
raṇatkhagavaralīnajvalanān pātayan sthitaḥ ।। 

hā khaḍgadhārā prāleyaśītā deheṣu dantinām ।
lagnā manassu mahatām iva vijñānasūktayaḥ ।। 

hā tāta hetayo lagnās taruṇīkavarītṛṇe ।
jvalanti śuṣkaparṇaughā iva vīrānaleritāḥ ।। 

āvartavartinī dīrghā vahaty ūrdhvaṃ taraṅginī ।
paśyeyaṃ dhūmayamunā vyomagaṅgāṃ pradhāvati ।। 

vahadulmukakāṣṭaurdhvagāminī dhūmanimnagā ।
vaimānikān andhayati paśyāgnikaṇabudbudā ।। 

asya mātā pitā bhrātā jāmātā tanayas sutā ।
asmin sadmani nirdagdhā dagdhaiṣām antam icchati ।। 

hā hā hā gaccha bhoś śīghram etad aṅgāramandiram ।
itaḥ pravṛttaṃ patituṃ sumeroś śikharaṃ yathā ।। 

aho śaraśilāśaktikuntaprāsāsihetayaḥ ।
jvālāsandhyabhrapaṭalaṃ viśanti śalabhā iva ।। 

hetipravāhā jvalanaṃ nabhas sarve viśanty aho ।
vaḍavānalam ujjvālam arṇaḥpūrā ivārṇavāt ।। 

dhūmāyante mahābhrāṇi jvālāśikharakoṭiṣu ।
sarasāny api śuṣyanti hṛdayānīva rāginām ।। 

ālānatvaruṣaivaitā dantibhir vṛkṣapaṅktayaḥ ।
sphuṭatkaṭakaṭārāvaṃ pātyante kṛtapītkṛtaiḥ ।। 

pluṣṭapuṣpaphalaskandhagandhaśrīkā gṛhadrumāḥ ।
gatā nirdagdhasarvasvā gṛhasthā iva dīnatām ।। 

mātāpitṛvinirmuktā bālakās timirāvalīḥ ।
mathnanto aṅgeṣu rathyāsu kuḍyapātena hā hatāḥ ।। 

vata vidrāvitāndhasya kariṇo raṇamūrdhani ।
patadaṅgārakāgārabhāriṇaḥ kaṭukūjitam ।। 

hā kaṣṭham asinirbhinnaskandhe sannadṛḍholmuke ।
patito yantrapāṣāṇaḥ puruṣasyāśanir yathā ।। 

gavāśvamahiṣājoṣṭraśvaśṛgālavṛkair aho ।
ghoro raṇa ihārabdho mārgarodhaka ākulaiḥ ।। 

paṭaiḥ paṭapaṭāśabdair jvalajjvālālimārutaiḥ ।
ākrandinyas striyo yānti sthalapadmācitā iva ।। 

strīṇāṃ jvālālavāḥ paśya lihanty alakavallarīḥ ।
kurvanto aśokapuṣpābhāṃ karabhā iva pannagīḥ ।। 

hā hā hariṇaśāvākṣyāḥ pakṣmalekṣaṇapakṣmasu ।
kuśāgreṣv iva viśrāntim eti kārṣāṇavī śikhā ।। 

dahyamāno api niryāti na kalatraṃ vinā naraḥ ।
aho bata durucchedāḥ prāṇināṃ snehavāgurāḥ ।। 

karī rabhasanirbhinnajvaladaṅgārapādapaiḥ ।
pluṣṭapuṣkarakaḥ kopān mathnāty utpuṣkaraṃ saraḥ ।। 

dhūmo'mbudapadaṃ prāpya lolālātataḍillatam ।
jvaladaṅgāranārācanikaraṃ parivarṣati ।। 

iha dhūmas sphuradvahnikaṇa āvartavṛttimān ।
sthita āpīḍavān vyomni ratnapūra ivāmbare ।। 

gauram ambaram ābhāti jvālāśikharatejasā ।
mṛtyor ivotsave dattaḥ kuṅkumāṅkaḥ kadarthakaḥ ।। 

aho nu viṣamaṃ vairaṃ vartate vṛttivarjitam ।
hriyante rājanāryo api varavīrair udāyudhaiḥ ।। 

lolasragdāmakusumair mārgaprakarakārikāḥ ।
ardhanirdagdhakavarīkīrṇavakṣassthalāmbarāḥ ।। 

ālolāmbarasaṃlakṣyanitambajaghanasthalāḥ ।
patanmāṇikyavalayā valitāvanimaṇḍalāḥ ।। 

chinnahāralatājālavikīrṇāmalamauktikāḥ ।
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭastanaśroṇipārśvodyatkanakaprabhāḥ ।। 

kurarīkarkaśākrandamandīkṛtaraṇāravāḥ ।
dhārāpātyasrunārācabhinnapārśvasthacetanāḥ ।। 

raktakardamabāṣpāmbuklinnagrathitavāsasaḥ ।
bhujamūlārpitabhujair nīyamānā balān nṛbhiḥ ।। 

ka ivāsmatparitrātā syād ity ādīnavīkṣitaiḥ ।
utpalair iva varṣadbhiḥ pariroditasainikāḥ ।। 

mṛṇālakomalācchorumūlajālais sunirmalaiḥ ।
svacchāmbaratalālakṣyair ākāśanalinīnibhāḥ ।। 

ālolamālyavasanābharaṇāṅgarāgā īrṣyākulānanacalālakavallarīkāḥ ।
ānandasundaraniraṅkuśamathyamānāt kāmārṇavāt samuditā iva rājalakṣmyaḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāne agnidāhavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare rājamahiṣī mattayauvanā ।
tad viveśa gṛhaṃ lakṣmīr iva paṅkajakoṭaram ।। 

ālolamālyavasanā cchinnahāralatākulā ।
anuyātā vayasyābhir dāsībhir bhayavihvalā ।। 

candrānanāvadātāṅgī śvāsotkampipayodharā ।
tārakākāradaśanā sthitā dyaur iva rūpiṇī ।। 

atha tasyā vayasyaikā rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat ।
vṛtrasaṅgrāmasaṃrabhdam amarendram ivāpsarāḥ ।। 

deva devī sahāsmābhiḥ palāyyāntaḥpurāntarāt ।
śaraṇaṃ devam āyātā vātārteva latā drumam ।। 

rājadārā hṛtās stenair balavadbhir udāyudhaiḥ ।
ūrmijālair mahābdhīnāṃ tīre drumalatā iva ।। 

antaḥpurādhipās sarve piṣṭāś śatrubhir uddhataiḥ ।
aśaṅkitābhipatitair vātair iva vanadrumāḥ ।। 

pūreṇāśaṅkam āyātaiḥ parair naḥ puram āhṛtam ।
rātrau varṣāsv ivodgārair udakaplavavāribhiḥ ।। 

dhūmravarmabhir unnādair lelihānāgrahetibhiḥ ।
vahnibhir naḥ puraṃ vyāptaṃ parayodhaiś ca bhūribhiḥ ।। 

parivāravilāsinyo devya āhṛtya mūrdhajaiḥ ।
ākrandantyo balān nītāḥ kurarya iva dhīvaraiḥ ।। 

iti no yeyam āyātā śākhā prasaraśālinī ।
āpat tām alam uddhartuṃ devasyaivāsti śaktitā ।। 

ity ākarṇyāvalokyāsau devyau yuddhāya yāmy aham ।
kṣamyatāṃ mama bhāryeyaṃ yuṣmatpādābjaṣaṭpadī ।। 

ity uktvā niryayau rājā kopākulitacetanaḥ ।
mattebhanirbhinnavanaḥ kandarād iva keśarī ।। 

līlā līlāṃ dadarśātha svākārasadṛśākṛtim ।
pratibimbam ivāyātām ādarśe cārudarśanām ।। 

prabuddhalīlā

kim idaṃ devi me brūhi kasmād iyam ahaṃ sthitā ।
yā sābhavam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ seyam iha sthitā ।। 

mantriprabhṛtayaḥ paurā yodhās sabalavāhanāḥ ।
sarva eva ta eveme sthitās tatra tathaiva ye ।। 

tatrāpīdam ayaṃ devi sarve katham iha sthitāḥ ।
bahir antaś ca makura ivaite kiṃ pracetanāḥ ।। 

devī

yathā jñaptir udety antas tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt ।
citiś cetyārthatām eti cittaṃ cittārthatām iva ।। 

yādṛgbhāvana evāntaścetanas tanute smṛtim ।
tādṛgarthajagadrūpas tatraivodeti tatkṣaṇāt ।। 

na deśakāladīrghatvaṃ na vaicitryaṃ padārthajam ।
bāhyam asty antaraṃ bhāti svapnārtho atra nidarśanam ।। 

yad antas svapnasaṅkalpapuravat kacanaṃ citeḥ ।
tad etad bāhyanāmnaiva svābhyāsāt susphuṭaṃ sthitam ।। 

yādṛgbhāvo mṛto bhartā tava tasmiṃs tadā pure ।
tādṛgbhāvas tam evārthaṃ tatraiva samupāgataḥ ।। 

anya eva hy amī bhṛtyās tebhyas tatsadṛśā api ।
sadrūpā eva caitasya svapnasaṅkalpasainyavat ।। 

avisaṃvādi sarvārtharūpaṃ yad anubhūyate ।
tasya tāvad vada kathaṃ kīdṛśī vāpy asatyatā ।। 

athavottarakāle tu bhaṅguratvān na vastusat ।
tad īdṛk sarvam evedaṃ tatra kā nāstikādhikā ।। 

svapno jāgraty asadrūpas svapne jāgrad asadvapuḥ ।
mṛtir janmany asadrūpā mṛtau janmāpy asanmayam ।। 

vicāraviśarārutvād anubhūteś ca sundari ।
evaṃ na san nāsad idaṃ bhrāntimātraṃ vibhāsate ।। 

mahākalpāntasampattāv apy adyānyayuge athavā ।
na kadācana yan nāśi tad brahmaivāsti taj jagat ।। 

tasmin madhye kacantīmā bhrāntayas sṛṣṭināmikāḥ ।
vyomni keśoṇḍukānīva na kacanti tu vastutaḥ ।। 

yathā taraṅgā jaladhau tathemās sṛṣṭayaḥ pare ।
utpatyotpatya līyante rajāṃsīva mahānile ।। 

tasmād bhrāntimayābhāse mithyātvam ahamātmake ।
mṛgatṛṣṇājalaraye kevāsthā sargabhasmani ।। 

bhrāntayaś ca na tatrānyās tās tā eva paraṃ padam ।
ghane tamasi yakṣābhā tama eva na yakṣakāḥ ।। 

tasmāj janma mṛtir moho vyomāhaṃ tvam idaṃ tatam ।
sarvaṃ tac ca mahākalpaśāntau yad avaśiṣyate ।। 

nātas satyam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na cāsatyaṃ kadācana ।
dvayam evaitad atha vā brahma tatraiva sambhavat ।। 

ākāśaparamāṇvantar dravyāder aṇuke api vā ।
jīvāṇur yatra tatredaṃ jagad vetti nijaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

agnir auṣṇyaṃ yathā vetti nijabhāvakramoditam ।
paśyatīdaṃ tathaivātmā svātmabhūtaṃ viśuddhacit ।। 

yathā sūryātape gehe bhramanti trasareṇavaḥ ।
tatheme paramākāśe brahmāṇḍatrasareṇavaḥ ।। 

yathā vāyau sthitas spanda āmodaś śaityam ambare ।
piṇḍagrahavinirmuktaṃ tathā viśvaṃ sthitam pare ।। 

bhāvābhāvagrahotsargasthūlasūkṣmacarācarāḥ ।
vivarjitasyāvayavair bhāvā brahmaṇa īdṛśaiḥ ।। 

sākārasyeva bodhāya vijñeyā bhavatādhunā ।
ananyās svātmanas te syus taror avayavā iva ।। 

yathāsthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ nijabhāvakramoditam ।
riktaṃ tad viśvaśabdārthair ananyad brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

na tat satyaṃ na cāsatyaṃ rajjvāṃ sarpabhramopamam ।
mithyānubhūtitas satyam asatyaṃ tat parīkṣaṇāt ।। 

paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ vittvāj jīvatvam iva vetty alam ।
atas tad evānubhavañ jīvatvaṃ vindate sphuṭam ।। 

satyaṃ bhavaty asatyaṃ vā khe api bhātam idaṃ jagat ।
rañjayaty eva jīvāṇuṃ svotthābhir anubhūtibhiḥ ।। 

anubhūtaya etās tu kāścit pūrvānubhūtitaḥ ।
apūrvānubhavāḥ kāścit samāś caivāsamāś ca tāḥ ।। 

kvacit kadācit tā eva kvacid eva samā api ।
kacanty asatyās satyābhā jīvākāśe anubhūtayaḥ ।। 

tatkulās tatsamācārās tajjanmānas tadīhitāḥ ।
ta eva mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ pratibhāne bhavanti vaḥ ।। 

te caivātmany alaṃ satyā deśakālehitais samāḥ ।
sarvagātmasvarūpāyāḥ pratibhāyā iti sthitiḥ ।। 

yathā rājātmani vyomni pratibhodeti sanmayī ।
tathānv agagragodeti satyaiva pratibhāsvare ।। 

tvacchīlā tvatsamācārā tvatkulā tvadvapuṣmayī ।
iti līleyam ābhāti pratibhā pratibimbajā ।। 

sarvage saṃvidādarśe pratibhā pratibimbati ।
yādṛśī yatra sā tatra tathodeti nirantarā ।। 

jīvākāśasya yāntassthā pratibhā kacati svayam ।
sā bahiḥ khe cidādarśapratibimbād iyaṃ sthitā ।। 

eṣā tvam ambaram ahaṃ bhuvanaṃ dharādi rājeti sarvam ajam eva vibhātamātram ।
cidvyoma bilvajaṭharaṃ vidur aṅga viddhi tvaṃ ceti śāntam alam āssva yathāsthiteha ।। 

līlopākhyāne agnidāharātriyuddhajagadbrahmatvavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcacatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

sarasvatī

vidūrathas te bhartaiṣa tanuṃ tyaktvā raṇāṅgane ।
tad evāntaḥpuraṃ prāpya tādṛgātmā bhaviṣyati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity ākarṇya vaco devyā līlā sā tatpurāspadā ।
punaḥ prahvā sthitovāca vacanaṃ vihitāñjaliḥ ।। 

dvitīyalīlā

devī bhagavatī jñaptir nityam eva mayārcitā ।
svapneṣu darśanaṃ devi sā dadāti niśāsu me ।। 

sā yādṛg eva deveśi tādṛg eva tvam ambike ।
tvaṃ me kṛpaṇakāruṇyād varaṃ dehi varānane ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktā sā tadā jñaptis smṛtvā tad bhaktibhāvanām ।
idaṃ prasannā provāca tāṃ līlāṃ tatpurāspadām ।। 

devī

ananyayā bhāvanayā yāvajjīvam ajīrṇayā ।
parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇābhīpsitaṃ varam ।। 

taddeśalīlā

raṇe dehaṃ parityajya yatra tiṣṭhati me patiḥ ।
anenaiva śarīreṇa tatra syām etadaṅganā ।। 

devī

evam astu tvayāvighnaṃ pūjitāsmi sute ciram ।
ananyabhāvayā devi puṣpadhūpasaparyayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha taddeśalīlāyāṃ phullāyāṃ tadvarodayāt ।
pūrvalīlābravīd devīṃ sandehalulitāśayā ।। 

pūrvalīlā

ye satyakāmās satyaikasaṅkalpā brahmarūpiṇaḥ ।
tvādṛśās sarvam evāśu teṣāṃ siddhyaty abhīpsitam ।। 

tat tenaiva śarīreṇa kim arthaṃ nāham īśvari ।
lokāntaram imaṃ nītā taṃ girigrāmakaṃ ca vā ।। 

devī

na kiñcit kasyacid ahaṃ karomi varavarṇini ।
sarvaṃ sampādayaty āśu svayaṃ jīvas samīhitam ।। 

ahaṃ hi sarale jñaptis saṃvinmātrādhidevatā ।
pratyekam asmi cicchaktir jīvaśaktisvarūpiṇī ।। 

jīvasyodety ahaṃśaktir yasya yasya yathā yathā ।
bhāti tatphaladā nityaṃ tasya tasya tathā tathā ।। 

māṃ samārādhayanty āśu jīvaśaktis tathoditā ।
yathā bhavaty adehāsyāṃ muktāsmīti ciraṃ tadā ।। 

tena tena prakāreṇa tvaṃ mayā samprabodhitā ।
tayā yuktyāmalaṃ bhāvaṃ nītāsi varavarṇini ।। 

anayaivaṃ bhāvanayā bodhitāsmi ciraṃ yadā ।
tam evārthaṃ prāpnuvatī tadā svacitiśaktitaḥ ।। 

yasya yasya yathodeti svacitprayatanaṃ ciram ।
phalaṃ dadāti kālena tasya tasya tathā tathā ।। 

tapo vā devatā vāpi bhūtvā saiva cid avyayā ।
phalaṃ dadāty atha svairaṃ nabhaḥphalanipātavat ।। 

svasaṃviddyotanād anyan na kiñcana kadācana ।
phalaṃ bhavati tenāśu yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

cidbhāva eva nanu sarvagato antarātmā yaś cetati prayatate ca tad eti tacchrīḥ ।
ramyaṃ na ramyam athaveti vicārya tasmād yat pāvanaṃ tad avabudhya tad antar āssva ।। 

līlopākhyāne satyakāmasatyasaṅkalpasthitir nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

evaṃ saṅkathayantīṣu tāsu tasmin gṛhodare ।
vidūrathaḥ kim akaron nirgatya kupito gṛhāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vidūrathas svasadanān nirgatya parivāritaḥ ।
parivāreṇa mahatā ṛkṣaughenaiva candramāḥ ।। 

sannaddhasarvāvayavo lagnahāravibhūṣaṇaḥ ।
mahājayajayārāvais surendra iva nirgataḥ ।। 

samādiśan yodhagaṇaṃ śṛṇvan maṇḍalasaṃsthitim ।
ālokayan vīraraṇān āruroha nṛpo ratham ।। 

bhūtāgārasamākāraṃ muktāmāṇikyamaṇḍitam ।
patākāpuñjakavyāptaṃ dyuvimānam ivāgatam ।। 

candrabhittiparisrotaḥprapatatkāñcanāṅkuram ।
muktājhaṇajhaṇatkāracāruvidrumakūvaram ।। 

sugrīvair lakṣaṇopetaiḥ praśastair dhavalaiḥ kṛśaiḥ ।
javonnayanavegena prasravadbhiḥ khurān iva ।। 

vāyūn apīva sahajān asahadbhir gatikramaiḥ ।
projjhadbhir iva paścārdham āpibadbhir ivāmbaram ।। 

yojitair iva saṃpūrṇaiś candraiś cāmaradīptibhiḥ ।
aśvair aṣṭabhir ābaddham āśāpūrakaheṣitaiḥ ।। 

athodabhūt tadoddāmanāgābhraravanirbharaḥ ।
śailabhittipratidhvānadāruṇo dundubhidhvaniḥ ।। 

mattasainikanirmuktair vyāptaiḥ kalakalāravaiḥ ।
kiṅkiṇījālanidhvānair hetisaṅghaṭṭaṭāṅkṛtaiḥ ।। 

dhanuścaṭacaṭāśabdaiś śaraśītkāragāyanaiḥ ।
parasparāṃsaniṣpiṣṭakavacaughajhaṇajjhaṇaiḥ ।। 

jvaladagniṭaṇatkārair ārtimatkrandanāravaiḥ ।
parasparaṃ bhaṭāhvānair bandīvikṣubdharodanaiḥ ।। 

śilāghanīkṛtāśeṣabrahmāṇḍakuharo dhvaniḥ ।
hastagrāhyo bhavadbhīmo daśāśākuñjapūrakaḥ ।। 

athodapatad ādityapathapīvararodhakam ।
rajonibhena bhūpīṭham ambaroḍḍayanonmukham ।। 

garbhavāsam ivāpannaṃ tenāsīt tanmahāpuram ।
mūrkhatvaṃ yauvaneneva ghanatām āyayau tamaḥ ।। 

prayayuḥ kvāpi dīpaughā divaseneva tārakāḥ ।
āyayur balam ālolā naiśabhūtaparamparāḥ ।।
