dadṛśus tanmahāyuddhaṃ dve līle sā kumārikā ।
prasphuraddhṛdayenaitā devīdattamahādṛśā ।। 

praśemur atha geheṣu prodyatkaṭakaṭāravāḥ ।
ekārṇavapayaḥpūrair vāḍavā iva vahnayaḥ ।। 

śarais senāṃ samākarṣan rājā parabalāntaram ।
viveśa pakṣaproḍḍīno merur ekam ivārṇavam ।। 

athodabhūd guṇadhvānaś caṭaccaṭad iti sphuṭam ।
racitātmamayāmbhodās teruś śaraparamparāḥ ।। 

yayur ambaram āśritya nānāhetivihaṅgamāḥ ।
prasasrur alam āśāsu mihikāś śastradīptayaḥ ।। 

babhramuś śastrasaṅghaṭṭajvalanā ulmukāgnivat ।
jagarjuś śaradhāraughān varṣanto vīravāridāḥ ।। 

vileguḥ kaṅkavatkrūrā vīrāṅgeṣu ca hetayaḥ ।
petuḥ paṭapaṭārāvaṃ hetiniṣpiṣṭayo ambare ।। 

jagmuś śamaṃ tamāṃsy āśu śastrajvalanadīpakaiḥ ।
babhūvur akhilās senā navanārācaromaśāḥ ।। 

uttasthur nṛttayātrāyāṃ kabandhanaṭapaṅktayaḥ ।
jagur uccai raṇadrohaṃ piśācyo raṇadārikāḥ ।। 

udagur mattasaṅghaṭṭatkreṅkārā dantināṃ bale ।
ūhuḥ kṣepaṇapāṣāṇamattanadyo nabhastale ।। 

petuś ca rathasaṅghātās saṃśuṣkavanaparṇavat ।
niryayur lohitā nadyo raṇādrer mṛtivarṣiṇaḥ ।। 

praśemuḥ pāṃsavo raktais tamāṃsy āyudhavahnibhiḥ ।
yuddhaikadhyānataś śabdā bhayāni mṛtiniścayaiḥ ।। 

abhavat kevalaṃ yuddhaṃ saśabdam asamaṃ bhramam ।
anākulāmbuvāhābhakhaḍgavīcisajhāṅkṛtam ।। 

ṣavaṣavaravasaṃvahaccharaughaṃ kaṭakaṭaravasaṃpatadbhusuṇḍi ।
jhaṇajhaṇaravasaṃmilanmahāstraṃ niśi navaraṇam āsa suptavat tat ।। 

līlopākhyāne vidūrathaniryāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptacatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasmin vartamāne tu ghore samarasambhrame ।
līlādvayam uvācedaṃ jñaptiṃ bhagavatīṃ puraḥ ।। 

līlādvayam

devi kasmād akasmān no bhartā jayati no raṇe ।
vada tvayy api tuṣṭāyām asmin vidrutavāraṇe ।। 

sarasvatī

ciram ārādhitānena vidūrathanṛpāriṇā ।
ahaṃ pratijayārthena na vidūrathabhūbhujā ।। 

tenāsāv eva jayati jīyate na vidūrathaḥ ।
jñaptir antargatā saṃvid eṣāsau yad yathā yadā ।। 

codayaty āśu tat tasya tadā sampādayāmy aham ।
yo yathā codayati māṃ tasya tiṣṭhāmi tatphalā ।। 

na svabhāvodyataṃ dhatte vahner auṣṇyam ivaiṣa me ।
jayas syān mama saṃgrāma ity anenāsmi pūjitā ।। 

pratimārūpiṇī tena phalam āpnoty asau tathā ।
vidūrathenaitam arthaṃ asañcintyāsmi bodhitā ।। 

anena caiva muktas syām aham ity asmi bhāvitā ।
tasmād vidūratho dehaṃ taṃ prāpya saha bhāryayā ।। 

tvayānayā ca kālena bāle mukto bhaviṣyati ।
etadīyas tv ayaṃ śatrus sindhunāma mahīpatiḥ ।
hatvainaṃ vasudhāpīṭhe jayī rājyaṃ kariṣyati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ devyāṃ vadantyāṃ tu balayor yudhyamānayoḥ ।
ravir draṣṭum ivāścaryam ājagāmodayācalam ।। [sic!]

celus timirasaṃghātā balānīvālirūpiṇaḥ ।
asṛjīva śavāny āsan sandhyāyāṃ tārakā divi ।। 

śanair vikaṭatāṃ jagmū raṇākāśādribhūmayaḥ ।
bhuvanaṃ kajjalāmbhodher ivotkṣiptam arājata ।। 

petuḥ kanakaniṣṣyandasundarā raviraśmayaḥ ।
śaileṣu varavīreṣu raṇaraktacchaṭā iva ।। 

adṛśyata tato vyoma tathā raṇamahītalam ।
bāhubhir bhrāntabhujagaṃ prabhābhiḥ kīrṇakāñcanam ।। 

kuṇḍalaiḥ kīrṇaratnaughaṃ śirobhir vṛddhapaṅkajam ।
āyudhaiḥ khaganīrandhraṃ śaraiś śarabhanirbharam ।। 

raktābhāsthirasandhyāḍhyaṃ sasiddhapuruṣaṃ śavaiḥ ।
hārais sasarpanirmokaṃ paṭair evāṃśusaṅkulam ।। 

lasallatāpatākābhir ūrubhiḥ kṛtatoraṇam ।
hastapādaiḥ pallavitaṃ śaraiś śaravanopamam ।। 

śastrāṃśuśādvalaśyāmaṃ śastratārṇais sasaikatam ।
kīrṇam āyudhamālābhir unmattam iva bhairavam ।। 

phullāśokavanākāraṃ śastrasaṃghaṭṭavahnibhiḥ ।
udghuṅghumaṃ mahāśabdair vidravatsiddhanāyakam ।। 

sauvarṇaracitākāraṃ bālārkakacitāyudhaiḥ ।
prāsāsicakraśaktyṛṣṭimudgarāraṇitāntaram ।। 

etasminn antare senās sarvās saṅkṣayam āyayuḥ ।
āsīd raṇāṅganaṃ śūnyam ivālpobhayasainikam ।। 

chinnabhinnamṛtadhvastayātavidrutamānavam ।
patacchavamahārāśipaṅkasravadasṛksarit ।। 

vahadraktanadīraṃhaḥprohyamānaśavotkaram ।
bhusuṇḍīśaktikuntāsisthūlapāṣāṇasaṅkulam ।। 

śūraśastrāhaticchinnakabandhapatanānvitam ।
tālatāṇḍavivetālakulārabdhakalāravam ।। 

śūnye raṇāṅgane dīptau padmasindhurathau calau ।
adṛśyetāṃ nabhaścihnau candrasūryau divīva tau ।। 

cakraśūlabhusuṇḍarṣṭiprāsāyudhasamākulau ।
sahasreṇa sahasreṇa vīrāṇāṃ parivāritau ।। 

vicarantau yathākāmaṃ maṇḍale vitatāvanau ।
sacītkāramahācakrapiṣṭānekamṛtāmṛtau ।। 

tarantau raktasarito mattavāraṇalīlayā ।
keśaśevalasañchannacakraraktajalārdrakau ।। 

vahaccakrāhatikṣobhapātitākulavāraṇau ।
maṇimuktājhaṇatkāraraṇatkūvarakoṭarau ।। 

vātāhatapatākāgrapaṭatpaṭapaṭāravau ।
anuyātau mahāvīrair bhūribhir bhītasainikaiḥ ।। 

bhārān dadhadbhiḥ kuntānāṃ śarāṇāṃ dhanuṣām api ।
śaktīnāṃ prāsaśaṅkūnāṃ cakrāṇāṃ kacatāṃ rucā ।। 

tatra tau kṣaṇam āvṛtya maṇḍalair bhūrimaṇḍalaiḥ ।
ubhau vyatibabhūvāte saṃmukhāv āyudhāmbudau ।। 

nārācadhārānikaravikṣepakarakāghanau ।
anyo'nyam abhigarjantau mattābdhijaladāv iva ।। 

tayoḥ praharator bāṇān vasudhā narasiṃhayoḥ ।
pāṣāṇamusulākārā vyomavistāriṇo abhavan ।। 

karavālaphalāḥ kecin mudgarānanakāḥ pare ।
śitacakramukhāḥ kecit kecit paraśuvaktrakāḥ ।। 

kecic chaktimukhā bāṇāḥ kecit kṣuramukhā api ।
kecit kuntographalakā ardhacandramukhās tathā ।। 

siṃhopalamukhāḥ kecit kecic chūlaśikhāmukhāḥ ।
triśūlavadanāḥ kecit sthūlā iva mahāśilāḥ ।। 

pralayapavanapātitāḥ śilaughā iva vicaranti śilīmukhās tadā sma ।
pramilitam abhavat tayos tadānīṃ pralayavijṛmbhitasindhusaṃbhrameṇa ।। 

līlopākhyāne vidūrathasindhusamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭacatvāriṃśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāpya rājā puraḥ prāptaṃ sindhum uddhurakandharam ।
madhyāhnatapanābhena kopena vitato abhavat ।। 

dhanur āsphālayām āsa parirāvitadiṅmukham ।
kalpāntapavanāsphoṭa ivāmaragires taṭam ।। 

visasarjorjito rājā prātar arkaḥ karān iva ।
tūṇīrarajanībaddhāś śilīmukhaparamparāḥ ।। 

eka eva viniryāti guṇāt tasya śaro mahān ।
sahasraṃ patati vyomni gacchan patati lakṣaśaḥ ।। 

sindhor api tathaivāsīc chaktir lāghavam eva ca ।
raver ānanasāmyaṃ vai viṣṇor dhānuṣkatā tayoḥ ।। 

musulā nāma te bāṇā musulākṛtayo ambaram ।
chādayām āsur unnādāḥ kalpāntagirayo yathā ।। 

rejuḥ kanakanārācarājayo vyomni tasya tāḥ ।
śaravyāḥ kalpavātārtāḥ patantya iva tārakāḥ ।। 

vidūrathāc charāsārā ajasram abhiniryayuḥ ।
abdher iva payaḥpūrās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ ।। 

pracaṇḍapavanoddhūtapuṣpāṇīva mahātaroḥ ।
ayaḥpiṇḍād ivottaptatāḍitāḥ kaṇapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva nirjharāt ।
tatpurāgnimahādāhāt sphuliṅgā iva bhāsvarāḥ ।। 

tayoś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaṃ śṛṇvan kodaṇḍayor dvayoḥ ।
baladvayam abhūt prekṣāmūkaṃ śānta ivāmbudhiḥ ।। 

vahanti sma śarāpūrā gaṅgāpūra ivāmbare ।
sindhor abhimukhaṃ yakṣaghargharāravaraṃhasaḥ ।। 

kacatkanakanārācaśaravarṣāṇy anāratam ।
vahacchavaśavāśabdaṃ niryayur dhanur ambudāt ।। 

bāṇamandākinīpūraṃ vrajantaṃ sindhupūraṇe ।
vātāyanāt tam ālokya līlā tatpuravāsinī ।। 

tena bāṇasamūhena jayam āśaṅkya bhartari ।
uvāca vākyam ānandavikasanmukhapaṅkajā ।। 

jaya devi jayaty eṣa nātho asmākaṃ vilokaya ।
kilānena śaraughena merur apy eti cūrṇatām ।। 

tasyām evaṃ vadantyāṃ tu ghanasneharavākulam ।
prekṣaṇavyagrayor devyor hasantyor mānuṣaṃ hṛdā ।। 

tac charārṇavam āmattam apibat sindhuvāḍavaḥ ।
śaroṣmaṇāpy agamyena jahnur mandākinīm iva ।। 

bāṇavarṣeṇa sakalaṃ sāyakaughaṃ ghanaṃ ghanam ।
bhittvā tato apy adhaḥkṛtvā cikṣepa gaganārṇave ।। 

yathā dīpasya śāntasya na parijñāyate gatiḥ ।
tasya sāyakasaṅghasya na vijñātā tathā gatiḥ ।। 

taṃ chittvā sāyakāsāraṃ svaśarāmbudharaṃ ghanam ।
vyomni prasārayām āsa saracchavaśavānvitam ।। 

vidūrathas tam apy āśu vyadhamat sāyakottamaiḥ ।
sāmānyajaladaṃ mattakalpāntapavano yathā ।। 

kṛtapratikṛtair evaṃ bāṇavarṣair mahīpatī ।
vyarthīkṛtair anayatāṃ prahāram avirāmiṇau ।। 

athādade mohanāstraṃ sindhur gandharvasauhṛdāt ।
prāptaṃ tena yayur lokā vinā mohaṃ vidūratham ।। 

nyastaśastrāmbarā mūkā viṣaṇṇavadanekṣaṇāḥ ।
mṛtā ivābhavan yodhāś citranyastā ivāthavā ।। 

yāvad vidūratharatho mohenāyāti mandatām ।
tāvad vidūratho rājā prabodhāstram upādadhe ।। 

tataḥ prabodham āpannā prajā prātar ivābjinī ।
vidūrathe abhavat sindhuḥ kruddhotka iva rākṣase ।। 

nāgāstram ādadhe bhīmaṃ pāśabandhanakhedadam ।
tenābhavan nabho vyāptaṃ bhogibhiḥ parvatopamaiḥ ।। 

sarpair vivalitā bhūmir mṛṇālais sarasī yathā ।
sampannā girayas sarve kṛṣṇapannagakambalāḥ ।। 

padārthās sarva eveme pihitā ahivigrahaiḥ ।
saparvatavanābhogā yayau vivaśatāṃ mahī ।। 

dhūtāṅgārakaṇākīrṇā viṣavegasya śaṃsinī ।
vavur uṣṇoṣṇanīhārā vātajvalanareṇavaḥ ।। 

vidūratho atha sauparṇam ādadhe astraṃ mahāstravit ।
udagur garuḍās tena sauvarṇā iva parvatāḥ ।। 

kāñcanīkṛtasarvāśās sarvāśaparipūrakāḥ ।
pakṣaparvatasaṃrambhajanitapralayānilāḥ ।। 

ghoṇāvivalanākṛṣṭaśvasadbhujagamaṇḍalāḥ ।
mahāgharagharārāvapūritāmbhodaṣaṇḍakāḥ ।। 

bhūpūrakaṃ tu sarpaughaṃ sa suparṇaghano apibat ।
kṛṣṭaṃ śalaśalāyantam agastya iva vāridhim ।। 

sarpakambalanirmuktaṃ bhūmaṇḍalam arājata ।
viśālam iva nīrandhram iva nirvāri rāśi vā ।। 

tatas tadgaruḍānīkaṃ kvāpy agacchad adṛśyatām ।
dīpaugha iva vātena śaradīvābhramaṇḍalam ।। 

vajrabhītyeva pakṣāḍhyaṃ parvataprakaraṃ punaḥ ।
svapnadṛṣṭaṃ jagad iva saṅkalpapurapūravat ।। 

tatas tamo'stram asṛjat sindhur andhāndhakāradam ।
tenāndhakāro vavṛdhe kṛṣṇābhrajaṭharopamaḥ ।। 

rodorandhre pravisṛta ekārṇava ivābhavat ।
matsyā ivābhavañ śailās tārāś ca maṇayo abhavan ।। 

andhakāraḥ pravavṛdhe maṣīpaṅkārṇavopamaḥ ।
kajjalācalasambhāro dhutaḥ kalpāntarair api ।। 

andhakūpe nipatitā ivāsan sakalāḥ prajāḥ ।
kalpānta iva saṃśemur vyavahārā diśāṃ prati ।। 

vidūratho atha mārtāṇḍam astraṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍape ।
dadāv astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puṣṭamantraviceṣṭitaḥ ।। 

athoditas tamo'mbhodhim arkāgastyo gabhastibhiḥ ।
apibat kṛṣṇam ambhodaṃ śaratkāla ivāmalaḥ ।। 

andhakārāmbaronmuktā virejur amalā diśaḥ ।
bhūpateḥ purataḥ kāntā iva ramyapayodharāḥ ।। 

yayuḥ prakaṭatām antar akhilā vanarājayaḥ ।
lobhakajjalajālena muktā iva satāṃ dhiyaḥ ।। 

atha kopākulas sindhū rākṣasāstraṃ mahābhayam ।
kṣaṇād udīrayām āsa mantroditaśarātmakam ।। 

udagur bhīṣaṇā digbhyas saruṣo vanarākṣasāḥ ।
pātālagajahūṅkārakṣubdhā iva mahārṇavāḥ ।। 

kapilordhvajaṭādhūmrās sphuṭaccaṭacaṭāravāḥ ।
agnayo lelihānograjihvā ardrendhanā iva ।। 

sāvartavṛttayo vyomni bhīmaḍakkāraṭāṅkṛtāḥ ।
agnidāhamahādhūmavipulā iva solmukāḥ ।। 

daṃṣṭrābisāṅkurākrāntamukhapaṅkajadehakāḥ ।
utthitā lomaniryātaduṣprajvālajaṭā iva ।। 

nigirantaḥ pradhāvanto garjantas tarjitāśayāḥ ।
jaṭojjvālitaḍitpuñjajaladās sajalā iva ।। 

etasminn antare tasmiṃl līlānātho vidūrathaḥ ।
nārāyaṇāstraṃ pradadau duṣṭabhūtanivāraṇam ।। 

udīryamāṇa evāsminn astrarāje tu rājayaḥ ।
rākṣasānāṃ praśemus tā andhakārā ivodaye ।। 

pramṛṣṭarākṣasānīkam abhavad bhuvanatrayam ।
śaradīva gatāmbhodaṃ vyoma nirmalam ābabhau ।। 

atha sindhur mumocāstram āgneyaṃ jvalitāmbaram ।
jajvaluḥ kakubhas tena kalpāgnivalitā iva ।। 

dhūmāmbudabharacchannā babhūvus sakalā diśaḥ ।
gaganaprotthapātālatimirākulitā iva ।। 

babhuḥ prajvālitākārā girayaḥ kāñcanā iva ।
praphullanavanīrandhracaṇpakaughavanā iva ।। 

yayur vyomādridikkuñjā jvālājālajaṭālatām ।
kuṅkumenotsave mṛtyos samālabdhā ivāsṛjā ।। 

jvalitā janatāntaikaśaṅkināsannabhasspṛśā ।
sahasrākṛtinor veṇavalitā iva sāgarāḥ ।। 

jitvā ripuṃ punar asau yathā praharate tathā ।
vāruṇaṃ visasarjāstraṃ pūjayitvā vidūrathaḥ ।। 

āyayus salilāpūrās tamaḥpūrā ivābhitaḥ ।
adhastād ūrdhvato digbhyo dravarūpā ivādrayaḥ ।। 

bhāgā iva śaradvyomno drutapātā ivāmbudāḥ ।
mahārṇavā ivordhvasthāḥ kulaśailaśilā iva ।। 

tamālaughā ivoḍḍīnās sañcitā iva rātrayaḥ ।
kajjalaughā ivoddhūtā lokāloka ivottaṭaḥ ।। 

rasātalaguhābhogā iva vyomadidṛkṣavaḥ ।
mahāghuraghurārāvaraṃhobṛṃhitamūrtayaḥ ।। 

tāpāgnisantatilatāṃ sā cacāmāmbusaṃhatiḥ ।
bhuvanavyāpinī sandhyām āśu kṛṣṇeva yāminī ।। 

tām agnisantatiṃ pītvā pūrayām āsa bhūtalam ।
jalaśrīs santataṃ dehaṃ nirdravavyaktim īyuṣī ।। 

evaṃvidhān astramohān viruddhān eva netare ।
mitho māyāmayān agre paśyanty anubhavanti ca ।। 

hetibhāravahās sindhoś cakrarakṣās tato ambhasā ।
tṛṇānīva gatāḥ prohya rathaś cāsyābhavat plutaḥ ।। 

etasminn antare sindhur astraṃ sasmāra śoṣaṇam ।
āpattrāṇakaraṃ devaṃ dadau ca śararūpiṇam ।। 

śaśāmāmbumayī māyā tena yāmeva bhāsvatā ।
ye mṛtās te mṛtā eva babhūvuś śoṣitā bhuvaḥ ।। 

atha mūrkharuṣā tulyatāpas santāpayan prajāḥ ।
jajṛmbhe jarjarājīrṇavanavistārakarkaśaḥ ।। 

kacatkanakaniṣṣyandasundarāṅgacchavir diśām ।
āsīd rājavarastrīṇām ivāṅgopāṅgasaṅginī ।। 

tena gharmamayīṃ mūrchām ājagmus tadvirodhinaḥ ।
grīṣmadāvānalottaptā mṛdavaḥ pallavā iva ।। 

vidūratho raṇaddīrghatārakreṅkāramānasam ।
kodaṇḍaṃ kuṇḍalīkṛtya parjanyāstram athādadhe ।। 

udaguḥ paṅktayo abdānāṃ yāminya iva sañcitāḥ ।
tamālavipinoḍḍīnasaṃrambhārambhamantharāḥ ।। 

vāsanāvāripūreṇa garjanoddāmasañcarāḥ ।
mihikāmantharāśeṣakakubmaṇḍalakuṇḍalāḥ ।। 

vavur āvalitāsārā meghāḍambarabhedinaḥ ।
kīrṇaśīkaranīhārahārodārās samīraṇāḥ ।। 

prasphurus trastasauvarṇasarpāpasaraṇopamāḥ ।
vidyuto divi daityastrīkaṭākṣavalanā iva ।। 

jughūrṇur garjanocchūnapratiśrudghanakandarāḥ ।
diśaś calitamātaṅgasiṃharkṣavanaghargharāḥ ।। 

mahāmusuladhārābhiḥ petur āsāravṛṣṭayaḥ ।
kaṣṭaṭāṅkārakaṭhināḥ kṛtāntasyeva dṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

udabhūt prathamaṃ bāṣpa uṣṇoṣṇo adrinibho bhuvaḥ ।
pātālād abhravṛndānāṃ yuddhāyevābhravibhramāḥ ।। 

tato nimeṣamātreṇa praśemur mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ ।
parabodharasāpūrair yathā saṃsāravāsanāḥ ।। 

āsīt paṅkāṅkam akhilaṃ bhūmaṇḍalam asañcaram ।
pūritaḥ pūrṇadhārābhis sindhus sindhum ivāmbunā ।। 

vāyavyam astram asṛjad ghūrṇitākāśakoṭaram ।
kalpāntanṛttasaṃpannaraṇadbhairavabhīṣaṇam ।। 

vavur aśaninipātapiṇḍitāṅgā dalitaśilāśakalāḥ kakummukheṣu ।
pralayasamayasūcakā bhaṭānāṃ kṛtakaṭuṭāṅkṛtaṭaṅkinas samīrāḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāne astrayuddhavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vavur valitanīhārā vikīrṇaghanapallavāḥ ।
vāyavo dhūtavṛkṣaughāḥ patanotpāṭanodbhaṭāḥ ।। 

vikuṭṭitāṭavīṣaṇḍāś śvabhrabhittivibhedinaḥ ।
tenātibhīmavātena vidūratharatho apy atha ।। 

uhyamāno abhavan nadyā yathā jarjarapallavaḥ ।
vidūratho atha tatyāja parvatāstraṃ mahāstravit ।। 

vyomāpi ghanatāṃ yena samādhātum ivodyatam ।
tena śailāstraghātena virarāma samīraṇaḥ ।। 

śamaṃ ca tena śāntena prayayau vāyunā yataḥ ।
antarikṣagatā vṛkṣapaṅktayaḥ patitā bhuvi ।। 

nānājanāśanavyūhe kākānām iva koṭayaḥ ।
śemuś śītkāraḍakkārabhākkārokkārakā diśām ।। 

pralāpā iva vidhvastaprathāḥ pavanavīrudhām ।
girīn apaśyan nabhasaḥ patataḥ parṇapattravat ।। 

sindhus sindhur ivotpannān mainākādīn itas tataḥ ।
vajrāstram asṛjad dīptaṃ terur vajraghanās tataḥ ।। 

pibanto adrīn pratigiraṃ vahnidāhād ivāgnayaḥ ।
te girīṇāṃ purīṇāṃ ca koṭituṇḍāvakhaṇḍanaiḥ ।। 

śirāṃsi śātayām āsuḥ phalānīvolbanānilāḥ ।
vidūratho atha vajrāstraśāntyai brahmāstram abhyadāt ।। 

tato brahmāstravajrāstre samaṃ praśamam āgate ।
śyāmāśyāmaṃ piśācāstram atha sindhur acodayat ।। 

tenodaguḥ piśācānāṃ paṅktayo anantabhītidāḥ ।
sandhyāyām iva bhītyeva divasaś śyāmatāṃ yayau ।। 

piśācā bhuvanaṃ jahrur andhakārabharā iva ।
bhāsmanastambhasadṛśās tālottālavilāsinaḥ ।। 

dṛśyamānamahākārā muṣṭigrāhyā nakiñcana ।
ūrdhvakeśāḥ kṛśāṅgāś ca kecic ca śmaśrulā api ।। 

kṛśāṅgā malināṅgāś ca grāmyā iva nabhaścarāḥ ।
sabhāyāṃ mūḍhadṛṣṭāś ca yatkiñcanakarāḥ khalāḥ ।। 

dīnā bahvāśinaḥ krūrā dīnā grāmyajanā iva ।
tarukardamarathyāntaśśūnyagehagṛhāś calāḥ ।। 

lelihānāḥ pretarūpāḥ kṛṣṇāṅgāś śvapacā iva ।
jagṛhus te tadā mattā hataśiṣṭam arer balam ।। 

āsannasainikās tatra vitrastakṣubdhacetanāḥ ।
tyaktāyudhatanutrāṇās trastaprāṇās skhaladgamāḥ ।। 

netrair aṅgair mukhaiḥ pādair vikārabhayakāriṇaḥ ।
tyaktakaupīnavasanā nirnagnā hasanottarāḥ ।। 

viṣṭhāṃ mūtraṃ ca kurvantas sthiram ārabdhanartanāḥ ।
piśācarājo rājānam atha yāvadvidūratham ।। 

samākrāmati tāvat sa māyāṃ tāṃ bubudhe budhaḥ ।
piśācasaṅgrāmakarīṃ māyāṃ vetti sa bhūmipaḥ ।। 

tayā piśācasainyaṃ tat parasainye nyayojayat ।
tatas svasainikās svasthāḥ parayodhāḥ piśācinaḥ ।। 

tasyātha rūpikāstraṃ tad dadau cānyad asau ruṣā ।
udagur bhūtalād vyomno rūpikās stabdhamūrdhajāḥ ।। 

nirnagnā vikarālākṣyo lambaśroṇipayodharāḥ ।
udbhinnayauvanā vṛddhāḥ pīvarāṅgyo atha jarjarāḥ ।। 

svarūpārūpajaghanā durnāṭyavikasadbhagāḥ ।
narapadmaśirohastā rudhirāruṇagātrakāḥ ।। 

ardhacarvitamāṃsāsṛksravatsṛkvāktalālanāḥ ।
nānānānāṅgavalanānanonnamanasannamāḥ ।। 

sirālabhujavaktrorukucapārśvakarāṅgikāḥ ।
tāḍīkṛtārbhakaśavād anukṛṣṭāntrarajjavaḥ ।। 

śvakākolūkavadanā nimnavaktrahanūdarāḥ ।
jagṛhus tāḥ piśācāṃs tān durbalān duśśiśūn iva ।। 

piśācarūpikāsainyaṃ tadāsīd ekatāṃ gatam ।
nirnagnaṃ nartanottānavadanāṅgavilocanam ।। 

parasparākrāntikaraṃ bhīṣayaṃś ca parasparam ।
niṣkāsitamahājihvaṃ nānāmukhavikāradam ।। 

śavabhārāḍhyam anyo'nyaṃ hriyamāṇaśavāṅgakam ।
rudhirāmbhasi majjat tadunmajjac ca lasattanu ।। 

lambodaraṃ lambabhujaṃ lambakarṇoṣṭhanāsikam ।
raktamāṃsavasāpaṅkeṣv anyo'nyaṃ vellanātma tat ।। 

mandaroddhūtadugdhābdhilasatkalakalākulam ।
yathaiva māyāsañcāras tena tasya kṛtaḥ punaḥ ।। 

tenāpi tasyāśu tathā kṛto buddhvāśu lāghavam ।
vetālāstraṃ tato dattaṃ tenottasthuś śavavrajāḥ ।। 

amūrdhānas samūrdhāno vetālāveśavalgitāḥ ।
tataḥ piśācavetālarūpikaughakabandhavat ।। 

udbabhūva balaṃ bhīmam ūrvīnigaraṇakṣamam ।
athetaro api bhūpālo māyāṃ sañcārya cāparām ।। 

rākṣasāstraṃ sasarjāśu trailokyākramaṇonmukham ।
udaguḥ parvatākārās sarvatas sthūlarākṣasāḥ ।। 

deham āśritya niṣkrāntāḥ pātālān narakā iva ।
athābhūt tad balaṃ bhīmaṃ sasurāsurabhītidam ।। 

garjadrakṣomahāmbhodavādyanṛtyatkabandhakam ।
rūpikādārikārūpaṃ piśācasthānasusthiti ।। 

āttakvaṇitavaṃśāḍhyaṃ śiraḥ padmotkarākulam ।
lolāntramālāvalitaṃ rudhirāmbusamukṣitam ।। 

vetālatālasollāsaṃ lasaddhāma piśācakam ।
medomāṃsavasādyāḍhyaṃ rudhirāsavasundaram ।
kṣībavetālakumbhāṇḍayakṣatāṇḍavasaṅkaṭam ।। 

kumbhāṇḍakottāṇḍavadaṇḍapādakṣubdhāsṛgutkṣiptataraṅgasiktaiḥ ।
sandhyābhradhārotkarakoṭikāntair bhūtair asṛksrotasi dattasetu ।। 

līlopākhyāne dvitīyāstrayuddhaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne ghore samrambhavibhrame ।
sarvārisainyanāśārtham ekas svabalaśāntaye ।। 

sasmāra smṛtimān antar anantodāradhairyabhṛt ।
astram astreśvaraṃ śrīmad vaiṣṇavaṃ śaṅkaropamam ।। 

atha yo asau śaras tena vaiṣṇavāstrābhimantritaḥ ।
muktas tasya phalaprāntād ulmukānīva niryayuḥ ।। 

paṅktayas sphāracakrāṇāṃ śatārkīkṛtadiktaṭāḥ ।
gadānām abhiyāntīnāṃ śatavaṃśīkṛtāmbarāḥ ।। 

vajrāṇām urudhārāṇāṃ śaracchṛṅgīkṛtāmbarāḥ ।
paṭṭisānāṃ ca paṭṭānāṃ tīravṛkṣīkṛtāmbarāḥ ।। 

atha rājā dvitīyo api vaiṣṇavāstrapraśāntaye ।
dadau vaiṣṇavam evāstraṃ śastraniṣṭhīvapūrakam ।। 

tato api niryayur nadyo hetīnāṃ hatahetayaḥ ।
śaraśaktigadāprāsapaṭṭisādipayorayāḥ ।। 

śastrāstrasaritāṃ tāsāṃ vyomni yuddham avartata ।
rodorandhrakṣayakaraṃ kulaśailendradāraṇam ।। 

śaraśātitaśūlāśrikhaḍgākuṭṭitapaṭṭisam ।
suprāsaprahataprāsaṃ śūlaśātitaśaktikam ।। 

śarāmburāśimathanamattamudgaramandaram ।
gadāvadalanodyuktadurvārādrinibhāśani ।। 

ṛṣṭivṛṣṭipraśamanabhramatkuntendumaṇḍalam ।
prāsagrasanasaṃrabdhaprodyacchaṅkukṛtāntakam ।। 

cakrārdhacaṭitoccādrivajravijvaraparvatam ।
śaṅkuśaṅkitaśūtkārakāśiśūlaśilātalam ।। 

bhusuṇḍībhaṇḍitoddaṇḍabhiṇḍipāloḍumaṇḍalam ।
paraśūlakarānekaparaśūlūkalaṅghitam ।। 

vahatkacakrakacavacchinnacañcuracāmaram ।
sphuṭaccaṭacaṭāsphoṭatruṭyattripathagārayam ।। 

hetyaśricūrṇasaṃbhāramahābhramavitānakam ।
anyo'nyaśastrasaṃghaṭṭabhramajjvālollasattaḍit ।। 

śabdasphuradviriñcāṇḍaṃ ghātabhagnakulācalam ।
dhārānikṛttaśastraugham astrayor yudhyamānayoḥ ।। 

sadastravāraṇenaiva yātaḥ kālo balātmanaḥ ।
svayaṃ kiyadbala iti sindhau tiṣṭhati helayā ।। 

vidūratho astram āgneyaṃ tatyājāśaniśabdavat ।
jvālayām āsa sa rathaṃ sindhoḥ kakṣam ivārasam ।। 

etasminn antare vyomni hetinirvivarodare ।
sa sannāha iva prāvṛṭpayodapaṭinīva vā ।। 

astrarājekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ paramadāruṇaṃ ।
anyo'nyaṃ śamam āyātau savīryau subhaṭāv iva ।। 

etasminn antare astrāgnī rathaṃ kṛtvāśu bhasmasāt ।
prāpa dagdhvā vanaṃ sindhuṃ mṛgendram iva kandarāt ।। 

sindhur abhyāśato agnyastraṃ vāruṇāstreṇa śātayan ।
rathaṃ tyaktvāvaniṃ prāpya khaḍgakheṭakavān abhūt ।। 

akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa rathāśvānāṃ ripoḥ khurān ।
lulāva karavālena mṛṇālānīva lāghavāt ।। 

vidūratho api viratho babhūva kheṭakāsimān ।
samāyudhau samotsāhau ceratur maṇḍalānvitau ।। 

khaḍgau krakacatāṃ yātau mithaḥ praharatos tayoḥ ।
dantamāleyam asyeva calecarcayataḥ prajāḥ ।। 

śaktim ādāya cikṣepa khaḍgaṃ tyaktvā vidūrathaḥ ।
sindhāv udghargharārāvaṃ mahotpāta ivāśanim ।। 

avicchinnaṃ samāyāntī patitā sāsya vakṣasi ।
apriyasya yathā bhartur anicchantī svakāminī ।। 

tena śaktiprahāreṇa nāsau maraṇam āptavān ।
kevalaṃ rudhirasroto nāgo jalam ivātyajat ।। 

taddeśalīlā taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tama ivendunā ।
savikāsā ghanānandā pūrvalīlām uvāca ha ।। 

devi paśya nṛsiṃhena hato bhartāyam āvayoḥ ।
śaktikoṭinakhair daityas sindhur uddhurakandharaḥ ।। 

sarastalasthanāgendravarahūṅkṛtavārivat ।
diṣṭyorasy asya niryāti raktaṃ śuluśulāravaiḥ ।। 

hā kaṣṭaṃ ratham ānītaṃ sindhur āroḍhum udyataḥ ।
sauvarṇaṃ mairavaṃ śṛṅgaṃ puṣkarāvartako yathā ।। 

paśya devi ratho asyāsau mudgareṇāvacūrṇitaḥ ।
bhramatparvatapātena sauvarṇaṃ nagaraṃ yathā ।। 

pravṛtto ratham ānītam āroḍhuṃ patir eṣa me ।
kaṣṭaṃ vajram ivendreṇa musulaṃ sindhuneritam ।। 

vañcayitvā vilāsena ratham āruhya lāghavāt ।
paśya bhartā madīyo asau cakāsti nitarāṃ raṇe ।। 

hā dhik kaṣṭam asau sindhur āryaputrarathaṃ balāt ।
hariś śvabhram ivarūḍhaḥ plavenontar iva drumam ।। 

khaḍgenārohato asyāṃsacchinno bhartā vilokaya ।
padmarāgagirir dyotam iva muñcati śoṇitam ।। 

hā hā dhik kaṣṭam etena sindhunā khaḍgadhārayā ।
jaṅghayor me patiś chinnaḥ krakaceneva pādapaḥ ।। 

hā hā hatāsmi dagdhāsmi mṛtāsmy apahatāsmi ca ।
mṛṇāle iva lūne me patyur dve api jānunī ।। 

ity uktvā sā tadālokya bhartṛbhāvabhayāturā ।
latā paraśukṛtteva mūrchitā patitā bhuvi ।। 

vidūratho api nirjānuḥ praharann eva vidviṣi ।
papāta syandane apy āśu chinnamūla iva drumaḥ ।। 

patann evaiṣa sūtena rathenaivāpavāhitaḥ ।
yadā tadāhatiṃ tasya kaṇṭhe adāt sindhur uddhataḥ ।। 

ardhavicchinnakaṇṭho asāv anuyāto atha sindhunā ।
syandanenāviśat sadma padmam evendirā yathā ।। 

sarasvatīprabhāvāḍhyaṃ tat praveṣṭum asau gṛham ।
nāśakan maṣako matto mahājvālāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

khaḍgāvakṛttagalagartagalatsavātaraktacchaṭācchuritavastratanutragātram ।
tatyāja taṃ bhagavatīm abhito gṛhāntas sūtaḥ praviśya mṛtitalpatale gatārim ।। 

līlopākhyāne vidūrathamaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

hato rājā hato rājā pratirājena saṃyuge ।
iti śabde samudbhūte rāṣṭram āsīd bhayākulam ।। 

bhāṇḍopaskarabhārāḍhyavidravatsakalaprajam ।
sākrandārtakalatrāḍhyadravannāgaraṃ durgamam ।। 

palāyamānasākrandamārgāhṛtavadhūgaṇam ।
anyo'nyaluṇṭhanavyagralokalagnamahāhavam ।। 

pararāṣṭrajanānīkatāṇḍavollāsanāravam ।
niradhiṣṭhitamātaṅgahayacārapatajjanam ।। 

kavāṭapāṭanoḍḍīnakośotthāravaghargharam ।
luṇṭhitāsaṅkhyakauśeyaprāvṛtāribhaṭodbhaṭam ।। 

kṣurikotpāṭitārdrāntramṛtarājagṛhāṅganam ।
rājāntaḥpuraviśrāntacaṇḍālaśvapacotkaram ।। 

gṛhāpahṛtabhojyānnabhojanonmukhapāmaram ।
sahemabhāracauraughapādāhatarudacchiśu ।। 

apūrvataruṇākrāntakeśāntaḥpurikāṅganam ।
caurahastacyutānargharatnadanturamārgadik ।। 

hayebharathasaṅghaṭṭavyagrasāmantamaṇḍalam ।
abhiṣekodyamādeśaparamantripurassaram ।। 

rājadhānīvinirmāṇasānusthasthapatīśvaram ।
kūpavātāyanaśvabhranipatadrājavallabham ।। 

jayaśabdaśatodghoṣasindhurājanyanirbharam ।
asaṅkhyanijarājaughavṛtasindhukṛtasthitim ।। 

grāmāntarasamākrāntavidravadrājavallabham ।
maṇḍalāntarasañjātanagaragrāmaluṇṭhanam ।। 

anantacauryamaukharyaruddhamārgagamāgamam ।
mahānubhāvavaidhuryasanīhāradinātapam ।। 

mṛtabandhujanākrandair śrutatūryaravair api ।
hayebharathaśabdaiś ca piṇḍagrāhyaghanadhvani ।। 

sindhudevo jayaty ekacchattrabhūmaṇḍalādhipaḥ ।
ity anantaram āremur bheryaḥ pratipuraṃ tadā ।। 

rājadhānīṃ viveśātha sindhur uddhatakandharaḥ ।
prajās sraṣṭuṃ yugasyānte manur jagad ivāparaḥ ।। 

pravṛttā daśadigbhyo atha praveṣṭuṃ saindhavaṃ puram ।
narāḥ karihayāgārai ratnapūrā ivāmbhudhim ।। 

nibandhanāni cihnāni śāsanāni diśāṃ prati ।
kṣaṇaṃ niveśayām āsur maṇḍalaṃ prati mantriṇaḥ ।। 

udabhūd acireṇaiva deśe deśe pure pure ।
jīvite maraṇe māne niyamo yamato yathā ।। 

atha śemur nimeṣeṇa deśopaplavavibhramāḥ ।
praśāntotpātapavanāḥ padārthāvṛttayo yathā ।। 

saumyatām ājagāmāśu deśo daśadiganvitaḥ ।
kṣīrodaḥ kṣubhitāvarto drāg ivodvṛttamandaraḥ ।। 

vavur alakacayān vilolayanto mukhakamalālimukhāni saindhavīnām ।
jalalavavalanākulās samīrā aśivaguṇā iva sarvataḥ kṣaṇena ।। 

līlopākhyāne sindhurājyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvipañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare līlā samuvāca sarasvatīm ।
śvāsāvaśeṣam ālokya pūrvaṃ bhartāram agragam ।। 

pravṛtto deham utsraṣṭuṃ madbhartāyam ihāmbike ।
sthitā ca mṛtakalpeyaṃ līlā nisspandagātrikā ।। 

dehenānena gantavyam anayā vīrabhāryayā ।
yatrāvābhyāṃ ca tat sthānaṃ kathaṃ gantavyam ambike ।। 

jñaptiḥ

evaṃrūpamahārambhe saṅgrāme rāṣṭrasambhrame ।
saṃpanne api sthite apy uccair vicitrārambhamanthare ।। 

na kiñcid api saṃpannaṃ rāṣṭraṃ na ca mahītalam ।
na sthitaṃ kvacanāpy evaṃ svapnātmakam idaṃ yataḥ ।। 

tasya tvanmaṇḍapasyāntaś śavasya nikaṭāmbare ।
itthaṃ bhūrāṣṭram ābhāti bhartṛjīvasya te anaghe ।। 

antaḥpuragṛhaṃ te tad idaṃ rāṣṭrānvitodaram ।
vasiṣṭhavipragehe antaś śavagehe jagat sthitam ।। 

evam eṣa mahārambho jagattrayamayo bhramaḥ ।
tvayā mayānayānena saṃyuktas sārṇavāvaniḥ ।। 

girigrāmakagehe antar madhye gaganakośake ।
khātmāvakacati vyakto na kacaty eva vā kvacit ।। 

evam ārambhaghanayor api maṇḍapayos tayoḥ ।
udare śūnyam ākāśam evāsti na jagadbhramaḥ ।। 

bhramadraṣṭur abhāve hi kīdṛśī bhramatā bhrame ।
nāsty eva bhramasattā tu yad asti tad ajaṃ padam ।। 

bhrame dṛśyam asat tasya draṣṭur draṣṭṛdaśā kutaḥ ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyakramābhāvād atra yat sahajaṃ hi tat ।। 

tat padaṃ paramaṃ viddhi nāśotpādavivarjitam ।
svakaṃ kacati cābhātaṃ śāntam ādyam anāmayam ।। 

kila maṇḍapagehāntas svasvabhāvoditātmani ।
viharanti janās tatra svagṛhe saṃvyavasthayā ।। 

na jagat tatra no sargaḥ kaścit tair anubhūyate ।
tenāhaṃ jagad ākāśam ajam ity eva vacmi te ।। 

sarvaṃ śūnyātmavijñānaṃ mervādigirijālakam ।
nedaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ kiñcid yathā svapne mahāpuram ।। 

deśe prādeśamātre api girijālamayāny api ।
vajrasārāṇi khāny eva sambhavanty aṇuke aṇuke ।। 

kadalīpallavāpīḍasanniveśena bhūriśaḥ ।
trijagac cidaṇāv antar asti svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

tasyāpy antar vibhāgena kramād ekaikaśo jagat ।
teṣāṃ yasmiñ jagaty eva padmo rājā śavas sthitaḥ ।। 

līlā tava sapatnī taṃ prāptā pūrvataraṃ śubhe ।
yadaiva mūrchām āyātā līleyaṃ puratas tava ।
tadaiva bhartuḥ padmasya śavasya nikaṭe sthitā ।। 

līlā

katham eṣā gatā devi sampannā tatra dehinī ।
kathaṃ kathaṃ vā tatpatnībhāvam āptavatī sthitā ।। 

te vāsyā vada kiṃ rūpaṃ paśyanty atha vadanti kim ।
tadgehavaravāstavyās samāseneti me vada ।। 

devī

śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāsena yathādṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te ।
līle līlāsvavṛttāntam antadaṃ dṛśyadurdṛśām ।। 

padma eva sa bhartaiṣa bhrāntiṃ tāvat tatām imām ।
itthaṃ jaganmayīṃ svasminn eva sadmani paśyati ।। 

bhrāntiyuddham idaṃ yuddham ime bhrāntijanā janāḥ ।
bhrāntyaivāstīha maraṇam eṣa caiva bhramātmakaḥ ।। 

bhramakrameṇānenaiva līlāsya dayitā sthitā ।
tvaṃ caiṣā ca varārohe svapnamātrā varāṅgane ।। 

tathā bhavatyor bhartaiṣa tathaivāham api svayam ।
jagacchobhaiva saṃsāre dṛśyase tad ihocyate ।। 

etad eva parijñātaṃ dṛśyaśabdārtham ujjhati ।
evam eṣā tvam evaṃ ca sampannaivam asau nṛpaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ cātmani satyatvagatās sarvatayātmanaḥ ।
ime vayam ihānyo'nyaṃ sampannās svoditā iva ।। 

itthaṃ sarvātmakatayā mahācidghanasaṃsthiteḥ ।
evam eṣā sthitā rājñī hārihāsavilāsinī ।। 

līlāvilolanayanā navayauvanaśālinī ।
peśalācāramadhurā madhurodārabhāṣiṇī ।। 

kokilasvarasaṅkāśā madamanmathamantharā ।
asitotpalapattrākṣī vṛttapīnāpayodharā ।। 

kāntakāñcanagaurāṅgī pakvabimbaphalādharā ।
tvatsaṅkalpātmakasyaiṣā yathā bhartur manaḥkalā ।। 

tadā tvatsadṛśākārā sthitaiṣā ciccamatkṛtau ।
tvadbhartṛmaraṇe kṣipraṃ samanantaram eva hi ।। 

tvadbhartaiṣā puro dṛṣṭā tvatsaṅkalpātmanāṇunā ।
yadādhibhautikaṃ bhāvaṃ ceto anubhavati svayam ।। 

vetty asanmayam evāta ātivāhikakalpanam ।
yadādhibhautikaṃ bhāvaṃ vetty etaṃ tu na sanmayam ।। 

ātivāhikasaṅkalpas tadā so anyasya jāyate ।
ato maraṇasaṃvittyā punarjanmamaye bhrame ।। 

tvaṃ hi saṃviditānena tvayāvagata eṣa saḥ ।
itthaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭavān eṣa dṛṣṭaś caiṣa tvayeti ca ।। 

tvam asyātmani saṃpannā sarvagatvāc cidātmanaḥ ।
brahma sarvagataṃ yasmād yathā yatra yadoditam ।। 

bhavaty āśu tathā tatra tat svaśaktyaiva paśyati ।
sarvatra sarvaśaktitvād yatra yāṃ śaktim unnayan ।। 

āste tatra tathā bhāti tīvrasaṃvegahetutaḥ ।
mṛtimohakṣaṇenaiva tad etau dampatī sthitau ।। 

tadaivābhyām idaṃ buddhaṃ pratibhāsavaśād dhṛdi ।
āvayoḥ pitarāv etāv ime caivāpi mātarau ।। 

deha eṣa dhanaṃ cedaṃ karmedaṃ pūrvam īdṛśam ।
āvāṃ vivāhitāv evam evaṃ nāmaikatāṃ gatau ।। 

etayoś cāpi janatā yātā tatraiva satyatām ।
tathaivātrāsti dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣas svapnavedanam ।। 

ity evaṃbhāvayā līle līlayāham athārcitā ।
māhaṃ syāṃ vidhavety evaṃ varo datto mayāpy asau ।। 

ity arthīva mṛtā pūrvam eṣeha khalu bālikā ।
bhavatāṃ cetanāṃśānām ahaṃ cetanadharmiṇī ।। 

kuladevī sadā pūjyāpy ata etat karomy aham ।
athāsyā jīvako dehāt prāṇamārutarūpadhṛt ।। 

manasā valitaḥ prāpto mukhāgraṃ tyaktadehakaḥ ।
tato maraṇamūrchānte gṛhe asminn eva caitayā ।
buddho bhāvita ākāro dṛṣṭo jīvātmanā tataḥ ।। 

sampannaiṣā hariṇanayanā pūrṇacandrānanaśrīr mānonnaddhā dayitavalitā kāntam ābhoktukāmā ।
pūrvasmṛtyā sarabhasamukhī saṃyatāntassvabhāvā svapnastheva prakṛtavibhavā padminīvoditeva ।। 

līlopākhyāne maraṇasamanantaraṃ dehapratibhāvanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tripañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasisṭhaḥ

atha labdhavarā dehenānenaiva mahīpatim ।
patiṃ prāptuṃ prayāmy eṣā nabhomārgeṇa viṣṭapam ।। 

iti sañcintya sānandam uddāmamakaradhvajā ।
pupluve peśalākārā pakṣiṇīva nabhastale ।। 

kumārī tatra sā prāpa jñaptyaiva prahitāṃ hitām ।
svasaṅkalpamahādarśāt purato nirgatām iva ।। 

kumārī

duhitāsmi sakhi jñapte svāgataṃ te astu sundari ।
pratīkṣamāṇā tvām eva sthitāsmīha nabhaḥpathe ।। 

līlā

devi bhartṛsamīpaṃ māṃ naya nīrajalocane ।
mahatāṃ darśanaṃ yasmān na kadācana niṣphalam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ehi tatraiva gacchāva ity uktvā sā kumārikā ।
puras tasyās sthitā vyomni mārgadarśanatatparā ।। 

tatas tadanuyātā sā prāpa koṭaram ambaram ।
nirmalaṃ karavālāṅgaṃ yathā lakṣaṇalekhikā ।। 

meghamārgam athollaṅghya vātaskandhāntarotthitā ।
sūryamārgād atigatā tārāmārgamahīm itā ।। 

vāyvindrasurasiddhānāṃ lokān ullaṅghya lāghavāt ।
brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ prāpa brahmāṇḍakarparam ।। 

himaśaityaṃ yathāntassthaṃ kumbhabhitter bahir bhavet ।
tathā saṅkalpasiddhā sā brahmāṇḍān nirgatā bahiḥ ।। 

svacittamātradehaiṣā svasaṅkalpaprabhāvajam ।
antare vānubhavati kilaivaṃ nāma vibhramam ।। 

tato brahmāṇḍapārasthāñ jalādyāvaraṇān nava ।
samullaṅghya puraḥ prāpa mahācidgaganāntaram ।। 

adṛṣṭapāraparyantam ativegena dhāvatā ।
sarvato garuḍenāpi kalpakoṭiśatair api ।। 

tatra brahmāṇḍalakṣāṇi santy asaṅkhyāni bhūriśaḥ ।
anyo'nyaṃ tāny adṛṣṭāni phalānīva mahāvane ।। 

tatraikasmin purassaṃsthe vitatāvaraṇānvite ।
vedhayitvā viveśāntar vadanaṃ krimiko yathā ।। 

punar brahmendraviṣṇvādi lokān ullaṅghya bhāsurān ।
sā mahīmaṇḍalaṃ śrīmat prāpa tārāpathād adhaḥ ।। 

tatra tan maṇḍalaṃ prāpya tatpuraṃ taṃ ca maṇḍapam ।
praviśya puṣpaguptasya śavasya nikaṭe sthitā ।। 

etasminn antare sātra na dadarśa kumārikām ।
māyām iva parijñātāṃ kvāpi yātāṃ varānanā ।। 

mukham ālokya sā tasya svabhartuś śavarūpinaḥ ।
idaṃ buddhavatī satyaṃ pratibhāvaśatas svataḥ ।। 

ayaṃ sa bhartā saṃgrāme nihato mama sindhunā ।
vīralokān imān prāpya kṣaṇaṃ śete yathāsukham ।। 

ahaṃ devyāḥ prasādena saśarīrainam īdṛśam ।
iha prāptavatī dhanyā madanyā nāsti kācana ।। 

iti sañcintya sā haste gṛhītvā cārucāmaram ।
vījayām āsa cāndreṇa taṃ dyaur vāvanimaṇḍalam ।। 

līlā

te bhṛtyās tāś ca vā dāsyas sa rājā vā prabuddhavān ।
vakṣyanti vadatāṃ devi kiṃ kayeva kathaṃ dhiyā ।। 

devī

sa rājā sā ca te bhṛtyās sarva eva parasparam ।
cidākāśaikatāyogād āvayoś ca prabhāvataḥ ।। 

mahācitpratibhāsāś ca mahāniyatiniścayāt ।
anyo'nyam evaṃ vetsyanti mithas sampratibimbitam ।। 

iyaṃ me sahajā bhāryā mameyaṃ sahajā sakhī ।
mameyaṃ sahajā rājñī bhṛtyo ayaṃ sahajo mama ।। 

kevalaṃ tvam ahaṃ sā ca yathāvṛttam akhaṇḍitam ।
jñāsyāma mahadāścaryaṃ na tu kaścid apītaraḥ ।। 

līlā

amunaiva śarīreṇa kimarthaṃ nāgatā patim ।
eṣā vare api saṃprāpte līlā lalitavādini ।। 

devī

aprabuddhadhiyas siddhalokān puṇyavaśoditān ।
na samarthās svadehena prāptuṃ chāyā ivātapān ।। 

ādisarge hi niyatis sthāpiteti prabodhibhiḥ ।
yathā satyam alīkena na milaty eva kiñcana ।। 

yāvad vetālasaṅkalpo bālasya kila vidyate ।
nirvetāladhiyas tāvad udayas tasya kaḥ katham ।। 

avivekajvaroṣṇatvaṃ vidyate yāvad ātmani ।
tāvad vivekaśītāṃśuśaityaṃ kuta udety alam ।। 

ahaṃ pṛthvyādidehaḥ khegatir nāsti mamottamā ।
iti niścayavān yo antaḥ kathaṃ syāt so anyaniścayaḥ ।। 

ato jñānavivekena puṇyenātha vareṇa vā ।
puṇyadehe na gacchanti paraṃ lokam anena no ।। 

śuṣkaparṇaṃ kilāṅgāre patad evāśu dahyate ।
ayaṃ devamayīṃ dehaḥ prāpta eva viśīryate ।। 

etāvad eva bhavati varalābhavijṛmbhitaiḥ ।
yathā saṃvit sa evāhaṃ tathā smṛta iti sthitiḥ ।। 

yas sarpapratyayo rajjvāṃ sa kathaṃ sarpakāryakṛt ।
ātmany eva hi yo nāsti tasya kā kāryakāritā ।। 

yat tv etan mṛta ity eva mithyā samanubhūyate ।
prāgabhyāsasya puṣṭasya nāmaitat pravijṛmbhitam ।। 

svānubhūte jagajjāle sugame saṃsṛtibhramaḥ ।
nānyasaṅkalpite nāma sargādyabhyāsa īdṛśaḥ ।। 

antar anubhūyamānās saṃsṛtayo bāhyabhūtajālānām ।
aviditavedyadṛśām atidūre puṃsām ivaindavaṃ bimbam ।। 

līlopākhyāne saṃsṛtivicāropadeśo nāma sargaḥ

catuṣpañcāśattamas sargaḥ

devī

tasmād ye vedyavettāro ye vā dharmaṃ paraṃ śritāḥ ।
ātivāhikadehatvaṃ prāpnuvanty eva netare ।। 

ādhibhautikadehatvaṃ mithyā bhramamayātmakam ।
katham anye sthitiṃ yātu cchāyās te katham ātape ।। 

līlā viditavedyā no paramaṃ dharmam āśritā ।
kevalaṃ tena sā bhartṛkalpitaṃ nagaraṃ gatā ।। 

līlā

evam eṣā prayātā tu bhartā paśya mamāmbike ।
pravṛttaḥ prāṇasantyāge kartavyam kim ihādhunā ।। 

bhāvābhāveṣu bhāvānāṃ kathaṃ niyatir āgatā ।
kathaṃ bhūyo apy aniyatir mṛtijanmādiṣūcitā ।। 

kathaṃ svabhāvasaṃsiddhiḥ kathaṃ sattā padārthagā ।
katham agnyādiṣūṣṇatvaṃ pṛthvyādau sthiratā katham ।। 

himādiṣu kathaṃ śaityaṃ kā sattā kālakhādiṣu ।
bhāvābhāvagrahotsargas sthūlasūkṣmadṛśaḥ katham ।। 

katham atyantam ucchrāyaṃ tṛṇagulmāṅkurādikam ।
vastunāyāty anaṣṭe api sthite svocchrāyakāraṇe ।। 

devī

mahāpralayasaṃpattau sargāsthāstamaye sati ।
anantākāśam āśāntaṃ sad brahmaivāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

taccidrūpatayā tejaḥkaṇo aham iti cetati ।
svapne saṃvid yathā hi tvam ākāśagamanādi vā ।। 

tejaḥkaṇo sausthūlatvam ātmanātmani vindati ।
asatyam eva satyābhaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ tad idaṃ smṛtam ।। 

tatrāntar brahma tad vetti brahmāham ayam ity atha ।
manorājyaṃ sa kurute khātmaiva tad idaṃ jagat ।। 

tasmin prathamatas sarge yā yathā yatra saṃvidaḥ ।
kathitās tās tathā tatra sthitā adyāpi niścalāḥ ।। 

yad yathā sphuritaṃ cittvaṃ tat tathānyatma cid bhavet ।
svayam evāniyamitas tatas syān neha kiñcana ।। 

na ca nāma nakiñcittvaṃ yujyate citsvarūpiṇaḥ ।
tyaktvā samastasaṃsthānaṃ hi saṃtiṣṭhatu vai katham ।। 

sargādau svayam evāntaś cid yathā kacitātmani ।
himāgnyāditayādyāpi sā tathāste svasattayā ।। 

tasmāt svasattāsantyāgas sataḥ kartuṃ na yujyate ।
yadā cidādes teneyaṃ niyatir na vinaśyati ।। 

yad yathā kacitaṃ yatra vyomarūpy api pārthivam ।
sargādau tasya calitum adya yāvan na yujyate ।। 

yā yathā cit prakacitā pratipakṣavidaṃ vinā ।
na sā tataḥ pracalati vedanābhyāsatas svayam ।। 

jagadādāv anutpannaṃ yac cedam anubhūyate ।
tat saṃvidvyomakacanaṃ svapnastrīsurataṃ yathā ।। 

asatyam eva satyābhaṃ pratibhānam iti sthitam ।
iti svabhāvasaṃvittir itthaṃ bhūtānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

sargādau yā yathā rūḍhā saṃvitkacanasantatiḥ ।
sādyāpi cālitānyena sthitā niyatir dṛśyate ।। 

gṛhītavyomatāsaṃvic cidvyoma vyomatāṃ gatam ।
gṛhītakālatāsaṃvic cinnabhaḥ kālatāṃ gatam ।। 

gṛhītajalasaṃvid cidvyoma vāri vyavasthitam ।
svapne tathā hi puruṣaḥ paśyaty ātmani vāritām ।। 

svamarutsaṃvidā bhāti bhavaty eṣā yathāsthitā ।
ciccamatkāracāturyam asad etat samūhate ।। 

khatvaṃ maruttvam urvītvam aptvam agnitvam apy asat ।
vetty antas svapnasaṅkalpadhyāneṣv iva citis svayam ।। 

maraṇānantaraṃ karmaphalānubhavanakramam ।
sarvakarmehaśāntyarthaṃ śrutaṃ śreyaskaraṃ śṛṇu ।। 

rūḍhādisarge niyatir yaikadvitricaturmitā ।
puṣṭyādiṣv āyuṣaḥ puṃsāṃ tasyātha niyatiṃ śṛṇu ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyaśuddhyaśuddhī svakarmaṇām ।
ūnatve cādhikatve ca nṛṇāṃ kāraṇam āyuṣaḥ ।। 

svakarmadharme hrasati hrasaty āyur nṛṇām iha ।
vṛddhe vṛddhim upāyāti samam eva bhavet same ।। 

bālamṛtyupradair bālo yuvā yauvanamṛtyudaiḥ ।
vṛddhamṛtyupradair vṛddhaḥ karmabhir mṛtim ṛcchati ।। 

yo yathā śāstram ārabdhaṃ svadharmam anutiṣṭhati ।
bhājanaṃ bhavati śrīmān sa yathāśāstram āyuṣaḥ ।। 

evaṃ karmānusāreṇa jantur antyāṃ daśām itaḥ ।
bhavaty astaṅgatavaco dṛṅmarmacchedivedanaḥ ।। 

līlā

maraṇaṃ me samāsena kathayendusamānane ।
kiṃ sukhaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ vā duḥkhaṃ mṛtvā ca kiṃ bhavet ।। 

devī

trividhāḥ puruṣās santi dehasyānte mumūrṣavaḥ ।
mūrkho atha dhāraṇābhyāsī yuktimān puruṣas tathā ।। 

abhyasya dhāraṇāś ceṣṭā dehaṃ tyaktvā yathāsukham ।
prayāti dhāraṇābhyāsī yuktiyuktas tathaiva ca ।। 

dhāraṇā yasya nābhyāsaṃ prāptā naiva sa muktibhāk ।
mūrkhas svamṛtikāle asau duḥkham ety avaśāśayaḥ ।। 

vāsanāveśavaivaśyaṃ bhāvayan viṣayāśayaḥ ।
dīnatāṃ paramām eti parilūnam ivāmbujam ।। 

aśāstrasaṃskṛtamatir asajjanaparāyaṇaḥ ।
mṛtāv anubhavaty antar dāham agnāv iva cyutaḥ ।। 

yadā ghargharakaṇṭhatvaṃ vairūpyaṃ dṛṣṭivarṇajam ।
gacchaty eṣa vināśātmā tadā bhavati dīnadhīḥ ।। 

paramaśyāmalāloko divābhyuditarātrikaḥ ।
bhramaddiṅmaṇḍalābhogo ghanamecakitāmbaraḥ ।। 

marmavyathāvidhuritaḥ prabhramadvṛkṣamaṇḍalaḥ ।
ākāśībhūtavasudho vasudhībhūtakhāntaraḥ ।। 

parivṛttakakupcakra uhyamāna ivārṇave ।
nīyamāna ivākāśe ghananidronmukhāśayaḥ ।। 

andhakūpam ivāpannaś śilāntar iva yojitaḥ ।
svayaṃ jaḍībhavajjihvo vikartita ivāśaye ।। 

patatīva nabhomārgād ghuṇāvarta ivārpitaḥ ।
rathadruta ivārūḍho himavadgalanonmukhaḥ ।। 

jyotkurvann iva saṃsāraṃ vahnimadhyaṃ spṛśann iva ।
bhramitaḥ kṣepaṇeṇeva vātayantra iva sthitaḥ ।। 

bhramito vā bhrama iva kṛṣṭo raśanayeva vā ।
bhramann iva jalāvarte śastrayantra ivārpitaḥ ।। 

prohyamānas tṛṇam iva mahaty arṇavamārute ।
dūroḍho vāripūreṇa nipatann iva vāḍave ।। 

anantagagane śvabhre cakrāvarte patann iva ।
adridyūrvīviparyāsadaśām anubhavan sthitaḥ ।। 

patann ivānavarataṃ protpatann iva vābhitaḥ ।
ghūtkārākarṇanodbhrāntaḥ pūrṇasarvendriyavrajaḥ ।। 

kramāc chyāmalatāṃ yānti tasya sarvārthasaṃvidaḥ ।
yathāstaṅgacchanti ravau mandālokatayā diśaḥ ।। 

pūrvāparaṃ na jānāti smṛtis tānavam āgatā ।
yathā pāścātyasandhyānte naṣṭā dṛṣṭir digaṣṭake ।। 

manaḥkalpanasāmarthyaṃ jahāty asya vimohitaḥ ।
avivekena tenāsau mahāmohe nimajjati ।। 

yadeṣanmoham ādatte nādatte pavanas tadā ।
na tv ādatte yathā prāṇān moham āyāty alaṃ tadā ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ puṣṭatāṃ yātair mohāt saṃvedanabhramaiḥ ।
jantuḥ pāṣāṇatām eti sthitam ity ādisargataḥ ।। 

līlā

vyathāṃ vimohaṃ mūrchāṃ ca bhramaṃ vyādhim acetanam ।
kim artham ayam āyāti deho khaṇḍāṅgavān api ।। 

devī

evaṃ saṃviditaṃ karma sargādau spandanaṃ vidaḥ ।
yady asmin samaye duḥkhaṃ kālenaitāvatedṛśam ।। 

syāt kacaty eva viṭapagucchavat tat svabhāvajam ।
vetti cittvavijṛmbhotthaṃ nānyad atrāsti kāraṇam ।। 

yadā vyathāvaśān nāḍyas svasaṅkocavikāsane ।
tyajanti maruto dehāt pariyānti nijāṃ sthitim ।। 

praviṣṭā na viniryānti niryātāḥ praviśanti no ।
yadā vātā vināḍitvāt tadāspandān mṛtir bhavet ।। 

na viśaty eva vā naiva niryāti pavano yadā ।
śarīrān nāḍivaidhurye mṛta ity ucyate tadā ।। 

āgantavyaṃ mayā nāśaṃ kālenaitāvateti yā ।
pūrvaṃ saṃviditā saṃvid yāti taccoditā mṛtim ।। 

īdṛśena mayehetthaṃ bhāvyam ity ādisargajā ।
saṃvid bījakalānāśaṃ na kadācana gacchati ।। 

saṃvido vedanaṃ nāma svabhāvo avyatirekavān ।
tasmāt svabhāvasaṃvitter nānyan maraṇajanmanī ।। 

kvacid āvartavad daussthyaṃ kvacin nadyāṃ jalaṃ yathā ।
kvacit saumyaṃ kvacij jīvadharmīdaṃ cetanaṃ tathā ।। 

yathā latāyāḥ parvāṇi dīrghāyā madhyamadhyataḥ ।
tathā cetanasattāyā janmāni maraṇāni ca ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate cetanaṃ puruṣaḥ kvacit ।
svapnasambhramavad bhrāntam etat paśyati kevalam ।। 

puruṣaś cetanāmātraṃ sa kadā kveva naśyati ।
cetanavyatiriktaṃ ca vadānyat kiṃ pumān bhavet ।। 

kvādya yāvan mṛtaṃ brūhi cetanaṃ kasya kiṃ katham ।
mriyante dehalakṣāṇi cetanaṃ sthitam akṣayam ।। 

amariṣyat tu cec cittvam ekasminn eva tanmṛte ।
abhaviṣyan sarva eva mṛtā ekamṛtāv iha ।। 

vāsanāmātravaicitryaṃ yaj jīvo anubhavet svayam ।
tasyaiva janmamaraṇe nāmanī parikalpite ।। 

evaṃ na kiñcin mriyate jāyate na ca kaścana ।
vāsanāvartagarteṣu jīvo luṭhati kevalam ।। 

atyantāsambhavād eva dṛśyasyāsau ca vāsanā ।
nāsty eveti vicāreṇa dṛḍhajñāne vinaśyati ।। 

anuditam uditaṃ jagatprabandhaṃ bhavabhayato vyasanair vilokya samyak ।
alam anuditavāsano hi jīvo bhavati vimukta itīha satyam astu ।। 

līlopākhyāne maraṇavicāro nāma sargaḥ

pañcapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

līlā

yathaiṣa jantur mriyate jāyate ca yathā punaḥ ।
tan me kathaya deveśi punar bodhavivṛddhaye ।। 

devī

nāḍīpravāhe vidhure yadā vātavisaṃsthatām ।
jantuḥ prāpnoti hi tadā śāmyatīvāsya cetanam ।। 

śuddhaṃ hi cetanaṃ nityaṃ nodeti na ca śāmyati ।
sthāvare jaṅgame vyomni śaile agnau pavane sthitam ।। 

kevalaṃ vātasaṃrodhād yadā spandaḥ praśāmyati ।
mṛta ity ucyate dehas tadā sa jaḍanāmakaḥ ।। 

tasmin dehe śavībhūte vāte khānilatāṃ gate ।
cetanaṃ vāsanāyuktaṃ khātma tatraiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

jīva ity ucyate tasya nāmāṇor vāsanāvataḥ ।
tatraivāste sa ca śavāgāre gaganake tathā ।। 

tato asau pretaśabdena procyate vyavahāribhiḥ ।
cetano vāsanāmiśras sāmodānilavat sthitaḥ ।। 

idaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya yadāste darśanāntare ।
sa svapna iva saṅkalpa iva nānākṛtis tadā ।। 

tasminn eva pradeśe antaḥ pūrvavat smṛtibhāg bhavet ।
tadaiva mṛtimūrchānte paśyaty anyac charīrakam ।। 

ātmany asthighaṭāpuṣṭam anyasya vyoma kevalam ।
ādhāre bhūtale sārkam ākāśajanavāsanam ।। 

bhavanti yadvidhāḥ pretās teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu ।
sāmānyapāpino madhyapāpinas sthūlapāpinaḥ ।। 

sāmānyadharmā madhyasthadharmā cottamadharmavān ।
eteṣāṃ kasyacid bhedo dvau trayo apy atha kasyacit ।। 

kaścin mahāpātakavān vatsarān mṛtimūrchanām ।
vimūḍho anubhavaty antaḥ pāṣāṇahṛdayopamām ।। 

tataḥ kālena sambuddho vāsanājaṭharoditam ।
anubhūya ciraṃ kālaṃ vāsanāduḥkham akṣatam ।। 

bhuktvā yoniśatāny uccair duḥkhād duḥkhāntaraṃ gataḥ ।
kadācid imam āyāti saṃsārasvapnavibhramam ।। 

atha vā mṛtimohānte jaḍāṃ duḥkhaśatākulāṃ ।
kṣaṇād vṛkṣāditām eva hṛtsthām anubhavanti te ।। 

svavāsanānurūpāṇi duḥkhāni narake punaḥ ।
anubhūyātha yonīṣu jāyante bhūtale cirāt ।। 

atha madhyamapāpo yo mṛtimohād anantaram ।
sa śilājaṭharaṃ jāḍyaṃ kañcit kālaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

tataḥ prabudhya kālena kenacid vā tathaiva vā ।
tiryagādikramair bhuktvā yonīs saṃsāram eṣyati ।। 

mṛta evānubhavati kaścit sāmānyapātakī ।
svavāsanānusāreṇa dehaṃ sampannam akṣatam ।। 

saṅkalpa iva saṅkalpa iva vetti sa tādṛśam ।
tasminn eva kṣaṇe tasya smṛtir ittham udety api ।। 

ye tūttamamahāpuṇyamṛtimohād anantaram ।
svargaṃ vidyādharapuraṃ smṛtyāsv anubhavanti te ।। 

tato anyakarmasadṛśaṃ bhuktvānyatra nijaṃ phalam ।
jāyante mānuṣe loke saśrīke sajjanāspade ।। 

ye atha madhyamadharmāṇo mṛtimohād anantaram ।
ta ihottāraṃ kurvantas sthitaṃ paśyanti dehakam ।। 

ye atha sāmānyadharmāṇo mṛtimohād anantaram ।
te vyomavāyuvalitāḥ prayānty oṣadhipallavān ।। 

tatra cāruphalaṃ bhūtvā praviśya hṛdayaṃ nṛṇām ।
tatas tām adhitiṣṭhanti garbhe jātikramodite ।। 

svavāsanānusāreṇa pretā etāṃ vyavasthitiṃ ।
mūrchānte anubhavanty antaḥ krameṇaivākrameṇa ca ।। 

ādau mṛtā vayam iti budhyante tadanukramāt ।
bandhupiṇḍādidānena protpannā iti vedinaḥ ।। 

tato yamabhaṭā ete kālapāśānvitās tathā ।
nīyamāno vrajāmy ebhiḥ kṣaṇād yamapuraṃ tv iti ।। 

udyānāni vimānāni śobhanāni punaḥ punaḥ ।
svakarmabhir upāttāni puṇyānīty eva puṇyavān ।। 

imāni kaṇṭakaśvabhraśastrapattravanāni ca ।
svakarmaduṣkṛtotthāni saṃprāptānīti pāpavān ।। 

iyaṃ me saumyasaṃpātā dharaṇiś śītaśādvalā ।
snigdhacchāyāsavāpīkā purassaṃstheti madhyamaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ prāpto yamapuram ayam eṣa sa bhūtapaḥ ।
ayaṃ karmavicāro me kṛta ity anubhūtimān ।। 

iti pratyekam abhyeti pṛthus saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
yathāsaṃsthitaniśśeṣapadārthācārabhāsuraḥ ।। 

ākāśa eva niśśūnye śūnyātmaivaṃ vibhodhavān ।
deśakālakriyādairghyabhāsuro api na kiñcana ।। 

ito ayam aham ādiṣṭas svakarmaphalabhojane ।
gacchāmy āśu śubhaṃ svargam ito narakam eva vā ।। 

ayaṃ svargo mayā bhukto bhukto ayaṃ narako athavā ।
imās tā yonayo tyaktā jāye ahaṃ saṃsṛtau punaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ śālir ahaṃ jātaḥ kramāt phalam iha sthitam ।
ity udarkaprabodhena buddhyamāno bhaviṣyati ।। 

saṃsuptavāsanas tv evaṃ bījatāṃ yāty asau nare ।
tadbījaṃ yonigalitaṃ garbho bhavati mātari ।। 

sa garbho jāyate loke pūrvakarmānusārataḥ ।
bhavyo bhavaty abhavyo vā bālako lalitākṛtiḥ ।। 

tato anubhavatīdaṃ hi yauvanaṃ madanonmukham ।
tato jarāṃ padmamukhe himāśanim iva cyutām ।। 

tato api vyādhimaraṇaṃ punar maraṇamūrchanam ।
punas svapnavad āyātaṃ piṇḍair dehaparigraham ।। 

yāmyaṃ yāti punar lokaṃ punar enaṃ bhramakramam ।
bhūyo bhūyo anubhavati vyomny eva vyomarūpavān ।। 

līlā

ādisarge yathā devi bhrama eva pravartate ।
tathā kathaya me bhūyaḥ prasādād bodhavṛddhaye ।। 

devī

paramārthaghanaṃ śailāḥ paramārthaghanaṃ drumāḥ ।
paramārthaghanaṃ pṛthvī paramārthaghanaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

sarvātmakatvāt sa yato yathodeti cidīśvaraḥ ।
paramākāśaśuddhātmā tathā tatra bhavaty alam ।। 

sargādau svapnapuruṣanyāyenādiprajāpatiḥ ।
yathā sphuratprakacitas tathādyāpi sthitā sthitiḥ ।। 

prathamo asau praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ hi bimbakam ।
pratibimbitam etasmād yat tad adyāpi saṃsthitam ।। 

yan nāma suśiraṃ sthānaṃ dehānāṃ tadgato anilaḥ ।
karoty aṅgaparispandaṃ jīvatīty ucyate tataḥ ।। 

sargādāv eva me vaiṣā jaṅgame adhiṣṭhitā sthitiḥ ।
cetanā api nisspandās tena te pādapādayaḥ ।। 

cidākāśo ayam evāṃśaṃ kurute cetanoditam ।
sa eva saṃvid bhavati śeṣaṃ tad api naiva tat ।। 

naro yadi khuraprāntaṃ cetaty akṣipaṭaṃ na tu ।
tat tasya nākṣiṇirjīvaṃ nājīvaty eva sarvataḥ ।। 

tathā khaṃ khatayā bhūmir bhūmitvenāptayā jalam ।
yad yathā cetati svairaṃ tad vetty eva tathāvapuḥ ।। 

iti sarvaśarīreṇa jaṅgamatvena jaṅgamam ।
sthāvaraṃ sthāvaratvena sarvātmā bhāvayan sthitaḥ ।। 

tasmād yaj jaṅgamaṃ nāma tat sacopanarūpadhṛt ।
tena buddhaṃ tatas tadvat tad evādyāpi saṃsthitam ।। 

yaj jaḍābhidham ābuddhaṃ sthāvaraṃ tena vai punaḥ ।
jaḍam adyāpi saṃviddhi śilātarutṛṇādi tat ।। 

na tu jāḍyaṃ pṛthak kiñcid asti nāpi ca cetanam ।
nāsti bhedo atra sargādau sattāsāmānyakena tu ।। 

vṛkṣāṇām upalānāṃ yā nāmāntassthās svasaṃvidaḥ ।
buddhyādīnīhitāny eva tāni teṣām iha sthitiḥ ।। 

vido antas sthāvarāder yās tasyā buddhyādayo hi te ।
anyābhidhānās tv anyārthās saṅketair aparais sthitāḥ ।। 

krimikīṭapataṅgānāṃ yeṣām antas svasaṃvidaḥ ।
tāny eva teṣāṃ buddhyādīny anyābhikhyārthakāni tu ।। 

yathottarābdhijanatā dakṣiṇābdhijanasthitim ।
na kiñcid api jānāti nijasaṃvedanād ṛte ।। 

svasaṃjñānubhave līnās tathā sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ ।
parasparajaḍās sarve svasaṅketaparāyaṇāḥ ।। 

yathā śilāntassaṃsthānāṃ bahissthānāṃ ca vedanam ।
asaj jaḍaṃ ca bhekānāṃ mitho'ntas tasthuṣāṃ tathā ।। 

tatra sarvagataṃ cittvāc cidvyomnā yat pracetitam ।
sargādau copanaṃ vāyus sa ihādyāpi saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

viditaṃ yat tu sauśiryaṃ tan nabhas tatra mārutaḥ ।
spandātmetyādi sa mahān padārtheṣv iti copanam ।। 

cittvaṃ tu paramārthena sthāvare jaṅgame sthitam ।
copanāny anilair eva bhavanti na bhavanti ca ।। 

evaṃ bhrāntimayaṃ viśvaṃ padārthās saṃvidaṃśavaḥ ।
sargādiṣu yathaivāsaṃs tathaivādyāpi saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

yathā viśvapadārthānāṃ svabhāvasya vijṛmbhaṇam ।
asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ tava ।। 

ayam astaṅgataprāyaḥ paśya rājā vidūrathaḥ ।
mālāśavasya padmasya patyus te yāti hṛdguhām ।। 

līlā

kena mārgeṇa deveśi yāntyau vai śavamaṇḍapam ।
enam evāśu paśantyāv āvāṃ gacchāva uttame ।। 

devī

manuṣyavāsanāntassthaṃ mārgam āśritya gacchati ।
eṣo aham aparaṃ lokaṃ dūraṃ yāmīti cinmayam ।। 

mārgeṇāvāsanenaiva yā vas tenaiva sammatam ।
parasparecchā saṃvittir na hi sauhārdabandhinī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti vihitakathāśamakramāyāṃ paramadṛśi prasṛte prabodhabhānau ।
nṛpativarasutāmanasy udāre vigalitavij jaraḍho vidūratho abhūt ।। 

līlopākhyāne saṃsāramaraṇayor calanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭpañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare rājā parivṛttākṣitārakaḥ ।
babhūvaikatanuprāṇas sadyaś śuṣkasitādharaḥ ।। 

jīrṇaparṇasavarṇābhaḥ kṣīṇapāṇḍumukhacchaviḥ ।
bhṛṅgakūjitasacchāyāśvāsakūṭāvikūṇitaḥ ।। 

mahāmaraṇamūrchāndhakūpe nipatitāśayaḥ ।
antarnilīnaniśśeṣanetrādīndriyavṛttimān ।। 

citranyasta ivākāramātradṛśyo vicetanaḥ ।
nisspandasarvāvayavas samutkīrṇa ivopale ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena tāludeśena taṃ jahau ।
prāṇaḥ pipatiṣuṃ vṛkṣaṃ supakṣīvāntarikṣagaḥ ।। 

taṃ te dadṛśatur bāle divyadṛṣṭī nabhogatam ।
jīvaṃ prāṇamayaṃ saṃvidgandhaleśam ivānile ।। 

sā jīvasaṃvid gaganavātenāvalitā satī ।
khe dūraṃ gantum ārebhe vāsanānuvidhāyinī ।। 

tām evānusasārātha strīdvayaṃ jīvasaṃvidam ।
bhramarīyugalaṃ vātalagnāṃ gandhakalām iva ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa śānte maraṇamūrchane ।
sāmbare bubudhe saṃvid gandhalekheva vayunā ।। 

apaśyat puruṣān yāmyān nīyamānaṃ ca tair vapuḥ ।
bandhupiṇḍapradānena śarīraṃ jātam ātmanaḥ ।। 

mārge karmaphalollāsavati dūratare sthitam ।
vaivasvatapuraṃ gantuṃ pravṛttam anivāritam ।। 

prāptaṃ vaivasvatapuram ādiṣṭaṃ ca tato yathā ।
asya karmāṇy aśubhrāṇi naiva santi kadācana ।। 

nityam evāvadātānāṃ kartāyaṃ śubhakarmaṇām ।
bhagavatyās sarasvatyā vareṇāyaṃ vivardhitaḥ ।। 

prāktano asya śavībhūto deho asti kusumāmbaraḥ ।
praviśatv eṣa taṃ gatvā tyajyatām ity avekṣya saḥ ।। 

tatas tyakto nabhomārgaṃ yantropala iva plutaḥ ।
atha jīvakalā līlā jñaptiś ceti trayaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

pupluve jīvalekhā tv arūpiṇy ete na paśyati ।
tam evānusarantyau te samullaṅghya nabhastalam ।। 

lokāntarāṇy atītyātha vinirgatya jagadgṛhāt ।
dvitīyaṃ jagad āsādya bhūmaṇḍalam upetya ca ।। 

kānte saṅkalparūpiṇyau saṅgate jīvalekhayā ।
padmarājapuraṃ prāpya līlāntaḥpuramaṇḍapam ।। 

kṣaṇād viviśatus svairaṃ vāyulekhe yathāmbudam ।
sūryātapo yathāmbhojaṃ sugandhaḥ pavanaṃ yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahman prāptaḥ katham asau śavasya nikaṭaṃ gṛham ।
kathaṃ tena parijñāto mārgo mṛtaśarīriṇā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasya svavāsanāntasstham avaśyaṃ kila rāghava ।
tat sarvaṃ hṛdgataṃ tasmān māsau prāpnotu tat katham ।। 

bhrāntimātram asaṅkhyeyaṃ jagajjīvakaṇodare ।
bīje vaṭatarum iva sthitaṃ ko vai na paśyati ।। 

svabhāvabhūtaṃ cidaṇus trailokyanicayaṃ tathā ।
naro yathaikadeśastho dūradeśāntarasthitam ।। 

saṃpaśyati nidhānaṃ svaṃ manasānārataṃ sadā ।
yathā jīvadvapur jīvamakuraṃ hṛdi paśyati ।। 

tathā svavāsanāntasstham abhīṣṭhaṃ paripaśyati ।
jīvo jātiśatāḍhyo api bhrame parigato api vā ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan piṇḍadānādivāsanārahitākṛtiḥ ।
kīdṛk saṃpadyate dehaḥ piṇḍo yasmai na dīyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

piṇḍo atha dīyatāṃ mātre piṇḍo datto mameti cet ।
vāsanā hṛdi saṃrūḍhā tat piṇḍaphalabhāṅ naraḥ ।। 

yaccittas tanmayo jantur bhavatīty anubhūtayaḥ ।
sadeheṣu videheṣu na bhavanty anyathā kvacit ।। 

sapiṇḍo asmīti saṃvittyā niṣpiṇḍo api hi piṇḍavān ।
niṣpiṇḍo asmīti saṃvittyā sapiṇḍo api na piṇḍavān ।। 

yathābhāvanam eteṣāṃ padārthānāṃ hi satyatā ।
bhāvanā ca padārthebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya udeti hi ।। 

yathā vāsanayā jantor viṣam apy amṛtāyate ।
asatyas satyatām eti padārtho bhāvanāt tathā ।। 

kāraṇena vinodeti na kadācana kasyacit ।
kāryatā kācid api bho iti niścayavān bhava ।। 

kāraṇena vinā kāryam ā mahāpralayaṃ kvacit ।
na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ kiñcit svayaṃ svaikatayā ṛte ।। 

vid eva vāsanā saiva dhatte svapna ivārthatām ।
kāryakāraṇatām eti saivam anyeva tiṣṭhati ।। 

rāmaḥ

dharmo nāsti mamety eva yaḥ preto vāsanānvitaḥ ।
tasya cet suhṛdā bhūridharmā kṛtvā samarpitaḥ ।। 

tatra cātra sa kiṃ dharmo naṣṭas syād uta bhāvanam ।
satyārthād vāpy asatyārthād bhāvanāt kiṃ balādhikam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

deśakālakriyādravyasampadbhyaś ceti bhāvanā ।
yatraivābhyuditā sāmyāt sa dvayor adhiko jayī ।। 

dharmadātuḥ pravṛddhā ced vāsanā tat tayā kṣaṇāt ।
āpūryate pretamatir no cet pretadhiyāśu sā ।। 

evaṃ parasparajayo jayaty atrātivīryavān ।
tasmāc chubhena yatnena śubhābhyāsam upāharet ।। 

rāmaḥ

deśakālādhikā brahman vāsanā samudeti cet ।
tan mahākalpasargādau deśakālodayaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

kāraṇais samudetīdaṃ kais tadā sahakāribhiḥ ।
sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve vāsanā kutaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam etan mahābhāga satyātmani kadācana ।
mahāpralayasargādau deśakālādi kiñcana ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve sati dṛśyadhīḥ ।
neyam asti na cotpannā na ca sphurati kācana ।। 

dṛśyasyāsambhavād dhetoḥ kiñcid yad dṛśyate tv idam ।
tad brahmaiva kacadrūpaṃ sthitam ittham anāmayam ।। 

etac cāgre yuktiśataiḥ kathayiṣyāma eva te ।
etadarthaṃ prayatno ayaṃ vartamānakathāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

tat te dadṛśatuḥ prāpte mandiraṃ sundarodaram ।
kīrṇaṃ puṣpopakāreṇa vasantam iva śītalam ।। 

prabhātācārasārambharājadhānyāṃ samaṃ sthitam ।
mandārakundasragdāmavṛndāmbaravalacchavam ।। 

śavaśayyāśirassthāgryapūrṇakumbhādimaṅgalam ।
anivṛttagṛhadvāragavākṣakaṭhinārgalam ।। 

praśāmyaddīpikālokaśyāmalāmalabhittikam ।
gṛhaikadeśasaṃsuptamukhaśvāsasasītkṛtam ।। 

sampūrṇacandraśakalodarakāntikāntasaundaryanirjitapurandaramandirarddhi ।
vairiñcapadmamukulāntaracāruśobhā niśśabdam abdam iva nirmalam indukāntam ।। 

līlopākhyāne maraṇasamanantarapretavyavasthāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tato dadṛśatus tatra śavaśayyaikapārśvagām ।
līlāṃ vidūrathasyāgre mṛtāṃ tāṃ prathamāgatām ।। 

prāgveṣāṃ prāksamācārāṃ prāgdehāṃ prāksvavāsanām ।
prāktanākārasadṛśasarvarūpāṅgasundarīm ।। 

prāksmṛtyavayavaspandāṃ prāgambaraparāvṛtām ।
prāgbhūṣaṇabharacchannāṃ kevalaṃ tatra saṃsthitām ।। 

gṛhītacāmarāṃ cāru vījayantīṃ mahīpatim ।
maunasthāṃ vāmahastasthavadanendutayānatām ।। 

bhūṣaṇāṃśulatāpuṣpaiḥ phullām iva vanasthalīm ।
kurvāṇāṃ vīkṣaṇair dikṣu mālatyutpalavarṣaṇam ।। 

sṛjantīm ātmalāvaṇyād bindūn indūn ivoditān ।
narādhipātmano viṣṇor lakṣmīm iva samāgatām ।। 

uditāṃ puṣpasambhārād iva puṣpākaraśriyam ।
bhartur vadanavinyastadṛṣṭim iva viceṣṭitām ।। 

kiñcitpramlānavadanāṃ mlānacandrāṃ niśām iva ।
tābhyāṃ sā lalanā dṛṣṭā tayā te tu na lakṣite ।
yasmāt te satyasaṅkalpe sā na tāvat tathoditā ।। 

rāmaḥ

tasmin pradeśe sā pūrvalīlā saṃsthāpya dehakam ।
dhyānena jñaptisahitā gatābhūd iti varṇitam ।। 

kim idānīṃ ca līlā yā dehas tatra na varṇitaḥ ।
kiṃ sampannaḥ kva vāyāta iti me kathaya prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kvāsīl līlāśarīraṃ tat kutas tasya hi satyatā ।
sā kila bhrāntir evābhūj jalabuddhir marāv iva ।। 

yathaiva bodhe līlāsau pariṇāmam itā kramāt ।
pare tathaiva tasyās tad dhimavadgalitaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehasya kālenābhyudito bhramaḥ ।
ādhibhautikadeho aham iti rajjubhujaṅgavat ।। 

ātivāhikadehena dṛśyaṃ yad avakalpitam ।
bhūmyādi nāma tasyaiva kṛtaṃ tat tv ādhibhautikam ।। 

vāstavena tu rūpeṇa bhūmyādyātmādhibhautikaḥ ।
na śabdena na cārthena śabdārthau śaśaśṛṅgavat ।। 

puṃso hariṇako asmīti svapne yasyoditā matiḥ ।
sa kim anviṣyati mṛgaṃ svamṛgatvaparikṣaye ।। 

udety asatyam evāśu tathāsatyam pralīyate ।
bhrāntir hi bhramato rajjvām iva sarpatvasaṅgrahe ।। 

samastasyāprabuddhasya manojātasya kasyacit ।
viḍambena dṛg eveyaṃ mithyārūḍhim upāgatā ।। 

svapnopalambhaṃ sargākhyaṃ svaṃ sarvo anubhavan sthitaḥ ।
ciram āvṛttadehātmā bhūcakrasphuraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahmaṃl lokaiḥ purassthasya gacchato yogino nijām ।
ātivāhikatāṃ dehaḥ kīdṛśo ayaṃ vilokyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dehād dehāntaraprāptiḥ pūrvadehavināśadā ।
ātivāhikadehe hi svapneṣv iva vikasvarā ।। 

yathātāpe himakaṇaś śaradvyomni sito ambudaḥ ।
dṛśyamāno apy adṛśyatvam ety evaṃ yogidehakaḥ ।। 

jhagity evāthavā kaścid yogideho na lakṣyate ।
sayogibhiḥ puro vegāt proḍḍīna iva khe khagaḥ ।। 

svavāsanākrameṇaiva kvacit kecit kadācana ।
mṛto ayam iti paśyanti kaṃcid yoginam agragāḥ ।। 

bhrāntimātraṃ tu dehātma teṣāṃ tad upaśāmyati ।
satyabodhena rajjūnāṃ sarpabuddhir ivātmani ।। 

ko dehaḥ kasya vā sattā kasya nāśaḥ kathaṃ kutaḥ ।
sthiraṃ tad evaṃ yad abhūd abodhaḥ kevalaṃ gataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ātivāhikatāṃ yāti ādhibhautika eva kim ।
utānya iti me brūhi yenohya iva na prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bahuśo apy uktam etan me na gṛhṇāsi kim uttaram ।
ātivāhika evāsti nāsty evehādhibhautikaḥ ।। 

tasyaivābhyāsato abhyeti sādhibhautikatāmatiḥ ।
yadā śāmyati saivāsya tadā pūrvā pravartate ।। 

tadā gurutvaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ bhittimattvaṃ mudhāgrahaḥ ।
śāmyet svapne narasyeva boddhur bodhān nirāmayāt ।। 

laghutūlasamāpattis tatas samupajāyate ।
svapne svapnaparijñānād yathā deho laghūbhavet ।। 

tathā bodhād ayaṃ dehas sthūlavat plutimān bhavet ।
anekadinasaṅkalpadehe pariṇatātmanām ।। 

asmin dehe śave dagdhe tatraiva sthitim īyuṣām ।
laghudehānubhavanam avaśyaṃbhāvi vai tathā ।। 

prabodhātiśayād eti jīvatām api yoginām ।
uditāyāṃ smṛtau tatra saṅkalpātmāham ity alam ।। 

yādṛśas sa bhaved dehas tādṛśo ayaṃ prabodhinaḥ ।
bhrāntir evam iyaṃ bhāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatā ।
kiṃ naṣṭam asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jātāyāṃ kiṃ prajāyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

anantaraṃ te vāstavyā līle paśyanti te yadi ।
tat satyasaṅkalpatayā budhyante kiṃ tataḥ prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ jñāsyanti te rājñī duḥkhiteyam iha sthitā ।
vayasyā kācid anyeyaṃ kuto apy asyā upāgatā ।। 

sandehaḥ ka ivātraiṣāṃ paśavo hy avivekinaḥ ।
yathādṛṣṭaṃ viceṣṭante kuta eṣāṃ vicāraṇā ।। 

yathā loṣṭo luṭhan vṛkṣaṃ vañcayitvāśu gacchati ।
ajñātvaivājñajanatā tathādryagnisurādikam ।। 

yathā svapnavapur bodhena jāne kveva gacchati ।
asatyam eva tad yasmāt tathaivehādhibhautikam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan svapnaśikharī prabodhe kveva gacchati ।
iti me saṃśayaṃ chindhi śaradabhram ivānilaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapne bhrame atha saṅkalpe padārthāḥ parvatādayaḥ ।
saṃvido antar milanty ete spandanāny anilaṃ yathā ।। 

aspandasya yathā vāyos svaspando antar viśaty alam ।
asphurantī tu tenaiva yāty ekatvaṃ tadātmikā ।। 

saṃvitsvapnārthayor dvitvaṃ na kadācana labhyate ।
yathā dravatvapayasor yathā vā spandavātayoḥ ।। 

yas tv atra syād dvitābodhas tad ajñānam anuttamam ।
saiṣā saṃsṛtir ity uktā mithyājñānātmikoditā ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve kila kīdṛśī ।
saṃvit svapnapadārthānāṃ dvitvaṃ svapne nirarthakam ।। 

yathā svapnas tathā jāgrad idaṃ nātrāsti saṃśayaḥ ।
svapne puram asad bhāti sargādau bhāti asaj jagat ।। 

na cārtho bhavituṃ śaktas satyatve svapnacoditaḥ ।
saṃvido nityasatyatvaṃ svapnārthānām asatyatā ।। 

jhagity eva yathākāśaṃ bhavati svapnaparvataḥ ।
krameṇa vā tathā bodhe khaṃ bhavaty ādhibhautikaḥ ।। 

uḍḍīno ayaṃ mṛto veti paśyanti nikaṭe sthitāḥ ।
jñānātivāhikībhūtasvasvabhāvahatā yataḥ ।। 

mithyādṛṣṭaya evemās sṛṣṭayo mohadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
māyāmātradṛśo bhānti śūnyās svapnānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

svapnānubhūtaya imā maraṇāntarbodhabhātetarabhramadṛśas sphuṭasargabhāsaḥ ।
bhānty ātivāhikaśarīragatās samastā mithyoditā mṛganadīmaraṇakrameṇa ।। 

aṣṭapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare jñaptir jīvaṃ vaidūrathaṃ puraḥ ।
saṅkalpena rurodhāśu manasas spandanaṃ yathā ।। 

līlā

vada devi kiyat kālo gato ayam iha mandire ।
samādhau mayi līnāyāṃ mahīpālaśave sthite ।। 

jñaptiḥ

iha māsas tv atikrānta iha dāsyāv ime ubhe ।
rakṣārthaṃ vāsakagṛhe svapato vahite sthite ।। 

śṛṇu dehasya kiṃ vṛttaṃ taveha varavarṇini ।
śarīraṃ kila pakṣeṇa cotklinnasnāyutāṃ gatam ।। 

nirjīvaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau saṃśuṣkam iva pallavam ।
kāṣṭhakuḍyopasaṃjātaṃ śavaṃ tuhinaśītalam ।। 

tato mantribhir āgatya mṛtaiveyam iti svayam ।
kledalokād vinirṇīya bhītyā niṣkālitaṃ gṛhāt ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena nītvā candanadārubhiḥ ।
citau prakṣipya saghṛtaṃ sahasā bhasmasātkṛtam ।। 

tato rājñī mṛte atyuccaiḥ kṛtvā rodanam ākulaḥ ।
parivāras tavāśeṣaḥ kṛtavān aurdhvadehikam ।। 

idānīṃ tvām ihālokya saśarīrām ihāgatām ।
paralokād āgateti mahac citraṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 

tvaṃ tu tenaiva dehena satyasaṅkalpatas sute ।
dṛśyase svavadātena tena cittaṃ tavopari ।। 

yadvāsanā tvam abhavo dehaṃ prati tad eva te ।
rūpam abhyuditaṃ bāle tena prāksadṛśaṃ tava ।। 

svavāsanānusāreṇa sarvas sarvaṃ hi paśyati ।
dṛṣṭānto atrāvisaṃvādī bālavetāladarśanam ।। 

ātivāhakadehāsi sampannā siddhasundarī ।
vismṛtas tava deho asau prāktano nayatas svayam ।। 

dṛḍhātivāhikadṛśaḥ praśāmyaty ādhibhautikaḥ ।
buddhasya dṛśyamāno api śaranmegha ivāmbare ।। 

rūḍhātivāhikībhāvaś śavo bhavati dehakaḥ ।
nirjalāmbhodasadṛśo nirgandhakusumopamaḥ ।। 

adyārabhya prarūḍhāyām ātivāhikasaṃvidi ।
deho vismṛtim āyāti garbhasaṃstheva yauvane ।। 

ekatriṃśe adya divase prāptā vayam ihāmbaram ।
prabhāte mohite dāsyau mayaite nidrayādhunā ।। 

tad ehi yāval līlāyai līle saṅkalpalīlayā ।
ātmānaṃ darśayāvo asyai vyavahāraḥ pravartatām ।। 

āvāṃ tāvad ime līlā paśyatv ity eva cintite ।
jñaptyā devyau tatas tatra dṛśye dīpte babhūvatuḥ ।। 

sā vidūrathalīlātha samākulavilocanā ।
gṛham ālokayām āsa tat tejaḥpuñjabhāsuram ।। 

candrabimbād ivotkīrṇaṃ dhautaṃ hemadravair iva ।
jvālāyā iva śītāyās sumadhyam iva bhittimat ।। 

gṛham ālokya purato līlājñaptī vilokyate ।
utthāya sambhramavatī tayoḥ pādeṣu sāpatat ।। 

majjayāyāgate devyau jayataṃ jīvitaprade ।
iha pūrvam ahaṃ prāptā bhavatyor mārgaśodhinī ।। 

ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ tā māninyo mattayauvanāḥ ।
upāviśan viṣṭareṣu latā meruśirassv iva ।। 

jñaptiḥ

sute vada kathaṃ prāptā tvam imaṃ deśam āditaḥ ।
kiṃ vṛttaṃ te tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ kim ivādhvani kutra vā ।। 

vidūrathalīlā

devi tasmin pradeśe sā jātamūrchā tadābhavam ।
dvitīyendukalevāhaṃ kalpāntajvālayāvṛtā ।। 

na cetitaṃ mayā kiñcit samaṃ viṣamam eva vā ।
tatas taralapakṣmānte vinimīlya vilocane ।। 

tato maraṇamūrchānte paśyāmi parameśvari ।
yāvad abhyutthitāsmy āśu plutā ca gaganodaram ।। 

bhūtākāśe anilarathaṃ samārūḍhāsmy ahaṃ tathā ।
ānītā gandhalekheva tenāham imam ālayam ।। 

iha paśyāmi sadanaṃ nāyakenābhyalaṅkṛtam ।
dīptadīpaṃ viviktaṃ ca mahārhaśayanānvitam ।। 

patim ālokayāmīmaṃ yāvad eṣa vidūrathaḥ ।
śete kusumaguptāṅgo madhuḥ puṣpavane yathā ।। 

atha saṅgrāmasaṃrambhaśramārto ayaṃ svapity alam ।
iti nidrā mayāsyaivaṃ deveśvari na vāritā ।। 

anantaram imaṃ deśaṃ prāpte devyāv ime tv iti ।
yathānubhūtaṃ kathitaṃ madanugrahakāriṇi ।। 

jñaptiḥ

he haṃsahārigāminyau līle lalitalocane ।
utthāpayāmo nṛpatiṃ śavatalpatalād imam ।। 

sety uktvā mumuce jīvam āmodam iva padminī ।
sa samīralavākāras tannāsānikaṭaṃ yayau ।। 

ghrāṇakośaṃ viveśāśu vaṃśarandhram ivānilaḥ ।
svavāsanāśatāny antar dadhad abdhir maṇīn iva ।। 

antassthajīvaṃ vadanaṃ tasya tatkāntim āyayau ।
padmasyāvagrahe padmaṃ praviṣṭam iva vāriṇi ।। 

kramād aṅgāni sarvāṇi sarasāni cakāśire ।
tasya puṣpākara iva latājālāni būbhṛtaḥ ।। 

athābabhau kalāpūrṇas sa rākāyām ivoḍurāṭ ।
bhāsayan bhavanaṃ bhūri vadanendumarīcibhiḥ ।। 

sphārayām āsa so aṅgāni rasavanti mṛdūni ca ।
kanakojjvalakāntīni pallavānīva mādhavaḥ ।। 

unmīlayam āsa dṛśau vimalālokakāraṇe ।
hāriṇyau subhagābhoge candrārkau bhuvanaṃ yathā ।। 

uttasthau prollasatkāyo vindhyādrir iva vṛddhimān ।
uvāca kas sthita iha prabhākapiśitālayaḥ ।। 

līlādvayam athāsyāgre provācādiśyatām iti ।
sa dadarśa puro namraṃ līlādvayam avasthitam ।। 

samādhāraṃ samākāraṃ samarūpaṃ samasthiti ।
samavākyaṃ samodyogaṃ samānandaṃ samodayam ।। 

kā tvaṃ keyaṃ kutaś ceyam ity āha sa vilokayan ।
tasmai līlāha he deva śrūyatāṃ yad vadāmy aham ।। 

mahilā tava līlāhaṃ prāktanī saha vardhitā ।
vāg arthasyeva saṃsaktā sthitā saṃśleṣaśālinī ।। 

iyaṃ līlā dvitīyā te mahilā helayā mayā ।
upārjitā tvadarthena kathayiṣye aham īdṛśam ।। 

śirobhāgopaviṣṭeyaṃ yeha hemamahāsanā ।
eṣā sarasvatī devī trailokyajananī śivā ।। 

asmākaṃ puṇyasaṃbhārair iha sākṣād upāgatā ।
anayāsi parāl lokād ihānīto mahīpatiḥ ।। 

ity ākarṇya samutthāya rājā rājīvalocanaḥ ।
lambamālyāmbaradharaḥ papāta jñaptipādayoḥ ।। 

sarasvati namas tubhyaṃ sarvalokahitaprade ।
prayaccha varade medhāṃ dīrgham āyur dhanāni ca ।। 

ity uktavantaṃ hastena pasparśa jñaptidevatā ।
tvaṃ putrābhimatārthāḍhyo bhaveti vacanānvitaḥ ।। 

sarasvatī

sarvāpadas sakaladuṣkṛtadṛṣṭayaś ca gacchantu vaś śamam anantasukhāni samyak ।
āyāntu nityamuditā janatā bhavantu rāṣṭre sthirāś ca vilasantu sadaiva lakṣmyaḥ ।। 

līlopākhyāne padmajīvanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navapañcāśattamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarasvatī tadetyuktvā tatraivāntardhim āyayau ।
prabhāte paṅkajais sārdhaṃ bubudhe sakalo janaḥ ।। 

āliliṅga ghanaṃ līlāṃ līlā ca dayitaṃ kramāt ।
punaḥ punar mahānando mṛtaprojjīvito nṛpaḥ ।। 

tadāsīd rājasadanaṃ madamanmathamantharaṃ ।
ānandamattajanataṃ vādyageyaravākulam ।। 

jayamaṅgalapuṇyāhaghoṣaghuṅghumaghargharam ।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇarājalokavṛtāṅganam ।। 

siddhavidyādharonmuktapuṣpavarṣasaśītkṛtam ।
dhvananmṛdaṅgamurajakāhalāśaṅkhadundubhi ।। 

ūrdhvīkṛtabṛhaddhastahāstikastanitotkaṭam ।
uttālatāṇḍavastraiṇapūrṇāṅganalasaddhvani ।। 

mithassaṅghaṭṭanipatannānopāyanadanturam ।
puṣpaśekharasambhāramayasragdāmasundaram ।। 

vikīrṇapāṭitakṣaumaṃ mantrisāmantanāgaraiḥ ।
sthalapadmamayaṃ vyoma raktais tāṇḍavinīkaraiḥ ।। 

mattastrīkandharāvṛttalīlāndolitakuṇḍalam ।
pranṛttapādasampātapronnamatpuṣpakardamam ।। 

paṭavāsaśaranmeghavitānakavitānitam ।
varāṅganāmukhair nṛtyaccandralakṣyagṛhājiram ।। 

paralokād upānīto rājñātmā patir eva ca ।
ity evaṃ vṛttagāthābhir jagur deśāntare janāḥ ।। 

padmo bhūmipatiś śrutvā vṛttāntakathanaṃ manāk ।
cakre snānaṃ samānītaiś catussāgaravāribhiḥ ।। 

tato abhiṣiṣicur viprā mantriṇo bhūbhujaś śatam ।
labdhodayam ananteham amarendram ivāmarāḥ ।। 

līlā līlā ca rājātha jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ ।
remire pūrvavṛttāntakathanais suratair iva ।। 

sarasvatyāḥ prasādena svapauruṣakṛtena tat ।
prāptaṃ lokadvayaṃ śreyaḥ padmeneti mahībhujā ।। 

prajñaptijñānasaṃbuddho rājā līlādvayānvitaḥ ।
cakre varṣāyutāny aṣṭau tatra rājyam aninditam ।। 

jīvanmukto jitamanā jitapañcendriyabhramaḥ ।
asaṃsaktamanā maunī yathāprāptānuvṛttimān ।। 

tasya lāvaṇyajaladher bindur indur ivoddhṛtaḥ ।
tasya pratāpakalpāgner bhānuḥ kaṇa ivotthitaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktās ta ity evaṃ rājyaṃ varṣāyutāṣṭakam ।
kṛtvā videhamuktatvam āsedus siddhasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

yad udayi viśadaṃ vidagdhamugdhaṃ samuditam ātmahitaṃ ca peśalaṃ ca ।
tad akhilajanatoṣadaṃ svarājyaṃ ciram anupālya sudampatī vimuktau ।। 

līlopākhyāne nirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te kathitaṃ rāma dṛśyadoṣanivṛttaye ।
līlopākhyānam anagha ghanatāṃ jagatas tyaja ।। 

śāntaiva dṛśyasattāsyāś śamanaṃ nopayujyate ।
sato hi mārjanaṃ kleśo nāsatas tu kadācana ।। 

jñānenākāśarūpeṇa dṛśyaṃ jñeyaṃ kharūpakam ।
ity ekībhūtam ālokya jñas tiṣṭhaty ambaropamaḥ ।। 

pṛthvyādirahitenedaṃ cidbhāsaiva svayambhuvā ।
sādhitaṃ yad asiddhena tan na dvyātma na sādhitam ।। 

saṃvid yathā yā yatate sā tathā bāhyalekhikā ।
visṛtā sṛṣṭicinnadyāṃ yāvad yatnān na bodhitā ।। 

cidākāśāvabhāso ayaṃ jagad ity eva budhyate ।
cidvyomnaivātmani svacche paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati ।। 

evam asyā mudhābhrānteḥ kā sattā keva vāsanā ।
kāsthā kā niyatiḥ kehā kāvaśyambhāvitocyatām ।। 

sarvaṃ caitad yathādṛṣṭaṃ sthitam ittham akhaṇḍitam ।
māyaivaivam ananteyaṃ na ca māyāsti kācana ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā bhagavaṃs tvayā ।
dāvārcirdṛśyakakṣyāṇāṃ dāhaśāntau kalaindavī ।। 

aho nu sucireṇaitaj jñātaṃ jñātavyam akṣatam ।
mayā yathedaṃ yac cedaṃ yādṛk cedaṃ yato yadā ।। 

śāmyāmīva dvijaśreṣṭha nirvāmīvāvikalpanaḥ ।
etad āścaryam ākhyānaṃ vyākhyānaṃ śāstradṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

idaṃ me bhagavan brūhi saṃśayaṃ sarvakovida ।
tava pātuṃ na tṛpto asmi śrotrapātrair vaco'mṛtam ।। 

sa sargatritaye kālo līlābhartur hi yogataḥ ।
sa kvacit kim ahorātraḥ kvacit kiṃ māsamātrakaḥ ।। 

kvacit kiṃ bahuvarṣāṇi kasyacit kiṃ supelavaḥ ।
kasyacit kiṃ mahādīrghaḥ kasyacit kiṃ kṣaṇasthitaḥ ।। 

iti me bhagavan brūhi tvaṃ yathāvad anugrahāt ।
sakṛc chrutaṃ na viśrāntim eti loṣṭe yathā jalam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yena yena yadā yad yad yathā saṃvedyate anagha ।
tena tena tadā tat tat tathā samanubhūyate ।। 

amṛtatvaṃ viṣaṃ yāti sadaivāmṛtavedanāt ।
śatrur mitratvam āyāti mitrasaṃvittivedanāt ।। 

yathābhāvitam eteṣāṃ padārthānāṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ ।
tad eva hi cirābhyāsān niyater vaśam āgatam ।। 

kacanaikātmikaiṣā cid yathā kacati yādṛśam ।
tathā tatrāśu bhavati tat svabhāvaikakāraṇāt ।। 

nimeṣe yadi kalpaughaṃ pravidan parivindate ।
nimeṣa eva tat kalpībhavaty atra na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

kalpe yadi nimeṣatvaṃ vetti kalpo apy asau tataḥ ।
nimeṣībhavati kṣipraṃ tādṛgrūpātmikā hi cit ।। 

duḥkhitasya niśā kalpas sukhinas saiva ca kṣaṇaḥ ।
kṣaṇas svapne bhavet kalpaḥ kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ ।। 

tathā ca mṛtvā jāto ahaṃ taruṇo aham avasthitaḥ ।
yāto asmi yojanaśataṃ svapna ity anubhūyate ।। 

rātriṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandro anubhūtavān ।
lavaṇo bhuktavān āyur ekarātryāṃ samāś śatam ।। 

yo nimeṣaḥ prajeśasya sa manor jīvitaṃ muneḥ ।
jīvitaṃ yad viriñcasya tad dinaṃ kila cakriṇaḥ ।। 

dhyāne prakṣīṇacittasya na dināni na rātrayaḥ ।
na padārthā na ca jagat satyaṃ nātmāpi yoginaḥ ।। 

madhuraṃ kaṭutām eti kaṭubhāvena cintitam ।
kaṭv apy āyāti mādhuryaṃ madhuratvena cetitam ।। 

mitrabuddhyā dviṣan mitraṃ ripubuddhyā ripus suhṛt ।
bhavatīti mahābāho yathāsaṃvedanaṃ jagat ।। 

anabhyastāḥ padārthā ye śāstrapāṭhajapādayaḥ ।
eṣāṃ saṃvedanābhyāsān nūnam abhyeti sātmatā ।। 

naur yāyināṃ bhramārtānāṃ vedanāt tu vivartate ।
avedanād bhramārtānām api naiṣā vivartate ।। 

śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti vedanāt svapnadṛkṣv iva ।
vedanāt pītam ānīlaṃ śuklaṃ vāpy anubhūyate ।। 

āpadvad utsavaḥ khedaṃ karoti parimohinaḥ ।
kuḍye api kha ivācāro dṛṣṭo dhātuvikāriṇaḥ ।। 

asadyakṣo vimūḍhānāṃ prāṇān apy apakarṣati ।
vedanāt svapnavanitā jāgratīva ratipradā ।। 

yad yathābhyāsam āyātaṃ tat tathā sthiratāṃ gatam ।
asad eva nabhasy eva nabha eva cidātmani ।। 

śatahastakhuracchāyānaṭavṛttam ivātatam ।
gagane mānasaṃ spandaṃ jagad viddhi na vastu tat ।। 

mithyājñānapiśācasya sandarśanam anākṛti ।
kāyāmātrakam evedam arodhakam abhittimat ।। 

idaṃ bhāsvaram ābhāsaṃ svapnasandarśanaṃ citaḥ ।
apūrvam eva suptāyā narasyevoditaṃ viduḥ ।। 

akhātāś cetati stambho yādṛśaṃ sālabhañjikāḥ ।
paramārthamahāstambhas sṛṣṭīś cetati tādṛśam ।। 

yādṛśo mānavaḥ pārśve svapne kṣubdho mahābhaṭaiḥ ।
tādṛśo brahmaṇas sargo buddha eva suṣuptavat ।। 

tṛṇagulmalatāyuktaś śiśirānte yathā rasaḥ ।
vāsantas saṃsthito bhūmau tathā sargaḥ pare pade ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ kanake sthitam antar anunmiṣat ।
tathā sthitaḥ pare sargaḥ khātmā valgann aṇāv aṇau ।। 

sanniveśo yathāṅgānām aṅgino ananyad ātmanaḥ ।
jagad evam anaṅgasya khātmanaḥ khātma brahmaṇaḥ ।। 

yādṛg ekanarasvapnayuddham anyanaraṃ prati ।
tādṛśaṃ sadasadrūpaṃ khātmedaṃ vyomagaṃ jagat ।। 

mahākalpāntasargādau citsvabhāva idaṃ vapuḥ ।
kāraṇatvaṃ mithaḥ paścād asad vetti na vāstavam ।। 

mukte asmin brahmaṇi yadi brahmānyas smṛtijo bhavet ।
tatsmṛtir jñaptije sarge sthiteva jñaptimātrataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

paurāṇāṃ mantrimukhyānāṃ vidūrathakulakramaḥ ।
samam eva kathaṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ pratibhāsitaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

citas samanuvartante mukhyāyās sarvasaṃvidaḥ ।
yathā vipulavātyāyās sāmānyā vātalekhikāḥ ।। 

parasparānubhāvena tathārūpeṇa saṃvidaḥ ।
kacitās tāḥ prajāpālaprajāvāstavyamantriṇām ।। 

evaṃrūpāt kulāj jāto rājāsmākam ayaṃ tv asau ।
kacitā iti vāstavyavido vaidūrathe pure ।। 

kacane citsvabhāvasya na ca kāraṇamārgaṇam ।
yuktaṃ mahāmaṇer bhāsām ivānyat svasvabhāvataḥ ।। 

aham eva kulācāro rājāsyā bhuva ity api ।
vidūrathavido ratnād uditā pratibhāprabhā ।। 

yāvanto jantavo yasmin ye ye sarge yadā yadā ।
te sarvagatvāc ciddhātor anyo'nyādarśatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

tīvravegavatī yā syāt tatra saṃvid akalpitā ।
saivāyāti paraṃ sthairyaṃ sāmokṣatvaikarūpiṇī ।। 

balavadvidvilāsānām anuvṛttyā parasparam ।
svabhāvāḥ pratibimbanti cidādarśasvabhāvataḥ ।। 

tatrātiyatnā jayati sānyās saṃvida ātmasāt ।
kurvatī sarid ambhodhigāminīs sarito yathā ।। 

ye samās tv atra te tāvad yatante citsvabhāvataḥ ।
yāvad eko jayet tatra dvitīyas sannimajjati ।। 

jāyamāneṣu naśyatsu vartamāneṣu bhūriśaḥ ।
evaṃ sargasahasreṣu paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati ।। 

na kiñcit kenacid vyāptaṃ na ca kiñcit kvacit sthitam ।
cidākāśam ajaṃ śāntam etat sarvam abhittimat ।। 

ayam ābhāsate svapno nirnidro draṣṭṛvarjitaḥ ।
avaśyambhāvabodhaś ca so anubhūto apy asanmayaḥ ।। 

puṣpapattraphalāṃśātmā yathaikas svāsthito drumaḥ ।
anantasarvaśaktyātmā caika eva tathā vibhuḥ ।। 

mātṛmeyapramāṇādimayātmakam ajaṃ padam ।
buddhaṃ vismṛtim āyāti na kadācana kasyacit ।। 

śūnyodayāstamayavastu tamaḥprakāśadikkālarūpy api sad ekam anādiśuddham ।
ādyantamadhyarahitaṃ sthitam accham ambusomyatvavīcivalanāḍhyam ivaikam eva ।। 

ahaṃ tvam ityādi jagatsvarūpā viśuddhabodhaikavibhā vibhāti ।
ākāśakośe nijaśūnyataiva dvaitaikyasaṅkalpavikalpanāḥ kva ।। 

līlopākhyāne prayojanavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ahaṃ jagad iti bhrāntiḥ parasmāt kāraṇaṃ vinā ।
yathodeti tathā brahman bhūyaḥ kāthaya sādhu me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

samastās samam evāntas saṃvido vindate yataḥ ।
sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvātmaikam ajas tataḥ ।। 

sarvādiśabdārthakalā brahmaivaitāḥ pṛthaṅ na tu ।
sarvārthaśabdādikalārūpam āsāṃ na vidyate ।। 

kaṭakatvaṃ pṛthag ghemnas taraṅgatvaṃ pṛthag jalāt ।
yathā na sambhavaty evaṃ na jagat pṛthag īśvarāt ।। 

īśa eva jagadrūpaṃ jagadrūpaṃ tu neśvaraḥ ।
hemaiva kaṭakāditvaṃ kaṭakatvaṃ tu hema no ।। 

yathāvayavino rūpam anekāvayavātmakam ।
tathānavayavāyās tu cittvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ citaḥ ।। 

yat tulyakālam akhilaṃ tanmātrāvedanaṃ pare ।
antassthaṃ tad idaṃ bhāti jagad ity aham ity api ।। 

lekhaughānāṃ yathā bhedī sanniveśaś śilodare ।
tathānanyaj jagad ahaṃ cety antaś cidghane ghanam ।। 

sthitās taraṅgās salile yathāntarataraṅgite ।
sṛṣṭiśabdārtharahitās tathāntas sṛṣṭayaḥ pare ।। 

nāsargaṃ tiṣṭhati paraṃ sargas tiṣṭhati nāparaḥ ।
avayavāvayavivat sattānavayavaitayoḥ ।। 

cidrūpeṇa khasaṃvittyā khatanmātraṃ vibhāvyate ।
svam eva rūpaṃ hṛdayaṃ vātena spandanaṃ yathā ।। 

tatkālam eṣa śabdāṇuś ciccamatkārarūpadhṛt ।
cetyate śaminaivāntas saṅkalpa iva cetasā ।। 

tadaivānilatāṃ vetti nijasattātmikāṃ svayam ।
antargataspandarasāṃ pavanas spandatām iva ।। 

tadaivābhāsatām eti nijasattātmikāṃ svayam ।
kośasthitālokalavāṃ tejaḥ prakaṭatām iva ।। 

tadaivāptāṃ cetayate nijasattātmikām ajaḥ ।
hṛtsaṃstharasatanmātrāṃ salilaṃ dravatām iva ।। 

tadaivāvanitāṃ vetti svacittaikātmikām ajaḥ ।
antassthagandhatanmātrām urvī sthairyakalām iva ।। 

tulyakālanimeṣāṃśalakṣabhāgaṃ pratītayaḥ ।
nityaṃ citaḥ prakacanaṃ tat sargaughaparamparāḥ ।। 

evaṃ sakṛt svabhāvāntar dṛśyamadhyam anāmayam ।
udayāstamayonmuktaṃ brahma tiṣṭhaty aniṣṭhitam ।। 

buddhaṃ sad apasargaṃ tat sasargam api tat samam ।
abuddhaṃ sargarūpātma visargam api tat sadā ।। 

cidbrahma yad yathā yena vindate svatvam ātmani ।
tat tat tathānubhavati sarvaṃ tat sarvaśaktimat ।। 

tat satyaṃ vidvilāsatvān nityānubhavarūpataḥ ।
tad asatyaṃ manaṣṣaṣṭhaṃ sarvākhyātigataṃ yataḥ ।। 

yathā tat saraṇaṃ vāyau tathā sargas sthitaḥ pare ।
asatkalpe tv asatkalpas satye asatya ivāpi ca ।। 

anyarūpā yathānanyā tejasy ālokatodare ।
tathā brahmaṇi viśvaśrīs satyāsatyātmikātmani ।। 

anutkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vātha dāruṇi ।
varṇā yathā maṣīkalke tathā sargās sthitāḥ pare ।। 

ananyānyeva kacati brahmatattvamarusthale ।
asatyānityasatteyaṃ trijaganmṛgatṛṣṇikā ।। 

brahmaṇā cinmayenātmāsargātmaiva vibhāvyate ।
na bhāvyate cānanyatvād bījenāntar iva drumaḥ ।। 

yathā kṣīrasya mādhuryaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ maricasya ca ।
dravatvaṃ payasaś caiva spando antaḥ pavanasya ca ।। 

sthito ananyo apy athānyas san na sthitaś ca tathātmani ।
sargo anargalacidrūpaḥ paramātmātmarūpadhṛt ।। 

kacanaṃ brahmaratnasya jagad ity eva yat sthitam ।
tad akāraṇakaṃ tasmāt tena na vyatiricyate ।। 

vāsanācittajīvādivedanaṃ vedanoditam ।
nodety avedanād eva yan nānātmaiva pauruṣam ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti kvacit kiñcit kadācana ।
sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ brahma cidghanaṃ suśilāghaṇam ।। 

parāṇuṃ prati sargaughāś cittvād bhānti sahasraśaḥ ।
teṣv anye aṇāv aṇāv antaḥ kaivātra gaṇanā katham ।। 

yathā jalāntar ūrmyādyā guptāguptās svaśaktayaḥ ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptādyās tathā jīve antar āsthitāḥ ।। 

jātā ced aratir bhogān prati manāg api ।
tadāsau tāvataivoccaiḥ padaṃ prāpta iti śrutiḥ ।। 

yato yato viyujyate tatas tato vimucyate ।
ato aham ity asaṃvidaḥ ka eti janmasaṃvidam ।। 

citaṃ parāparām ajām arūpikām anāmikām ।
carācarādharāmayīṃ vidanti ye jayanti te ।। 

pare cid asty aprakaṭādvitīyā svāvartalekheva jaladrave antaḥ ।
sā hanta yena trijaganti dhatte na santi nāsanti parātmakāni ।। 

ahammayī padmajabhāvanā cit saṅkalpabhedāt pratanoti viśvam ।
antar mudhaivānubhavaty anantaṃ nimeṣakoṭyaṃśavidhau yugāntam ।। 

jagattākacanavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dviṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paramāṇunimeṣāṇāṃ lakṣāṃśakalanāsv api ।
jagatkalpasahasrāṇi satyānīva vibhānty alam ।। 

teṣv apy antas tathaivāntaḥ paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati ।
bhrāntir evam anantāho iyam ity avabhāsate ।। 

vahantīmāḥ parā sattā śāntās sargaparamparāḥ ।
saliladravatevāntar asphuṭāvartavartikāḥ ।। 

mithyātmikaiva sargaśrīr vahatīha mahāmarau ।
tīradrumalatonmuktapuṣpāṇīva taraṅgiṇī ।। 

svapnendrajālapuravat saṅkathehāpurādrivat ।
saṅkalpavad asatyaiva bhāti sargānubhūtibhūḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

aikātmyaikatayaivaṃ hi jāte samyagvicāraṇāt ।
nirvikalpātmani jñāne parijñānavatāṃ vara ।। 

kimartham iha tiṣṭhanti dehās tattvavidām api ।
daiveneva samākrāntā daivam atra ca kiṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

astīha niyatir brāhmī cicchaktisparśarūpiṇī ।
avaśyambhavitavyaikasattā sakalakalpagā ।। 

ādisarge hi niyatir bhāvavaicitryam akṣayam ।
anenetthaṃ sadā bhāvyam iti sampadyate param ।। 

mahāsatteti kathitā mahācitir iti smṛtā ।
mahāśaktir iti khyātā mahādṛṣṭir iti sthitā ।। 

mahākriyeti gaditā mahodbhava iti śrutā ।
mahāspanda iti prauḍhā mahātmaikatayoditā ।। 

tṛṇānīti jagantīti daityā iti surā iti ।
iti nāgā iti nagā ity ākalpam iti sthitiḥ ।। 

kadācid brahmasattāyā vyabhicāro anumīyate ।
citram ākāśakośe vā nānyathā niyates sthitiḥ ।। 

viriñcādyātmabhir buddhair bodhāyāviditātmanām ।
bṛṃhaṇāt saiva niyatis sargo ayam iti kathyate ।। 

acalaṃ calavad dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇy āryavyavasthitam ।
anādimadhyaparyantaṃ śāstro vṛkṣa ivāmbaram ।। 

pāṣāṇodaralekhaughanyāyenātmani tiṣṭhatā ।
brahmaṇā niyatis sargo buddho bodhayateva kham ।। 

dehe yathāṅgināṅgādi spṛśyate citsvabhāvataḥ ।
brahmaṇā padmajatvena niyatyādyaṅgakaṃ tathā ।। 

eṣā daivam iti proktā sarvaṃ sakalakālagam ।
padārtham alam ākramya śuddhā cid iti saṃsthitā ।। 

spanditavyaṃ padārthena bhāvyaṃ vā bhoktṛtāpadam ।
anenettham anenettham avaśyam iti daivadhīḥ ।। 

eṣaiva puruṣaspandatṛṇagulmādi cākhilam ।
eṣaiva sarvabhūtādi jagatkālakriyādi ca ।। 

anayā pauruṣī sattā sattāsyāḥ pauruṣeṇa ca ।
lakṣyete bhavanaṃ yāte dve ekātmatayeti hi ।। 

nareṇa pauruṣeṇaiva kārye sattātmike ubhe ।
īdṛśy eva hi niyatir evaṃ niyatipauruṣam ।। 

praṣṭavyo ahaṃ tvayā rāma daivapauruṣanirṇayam ।
maduktaṃ pauruṣaṃ pālyaṃ tvayeti niyatis sthitā ।। 

bhojayiṣyati māṃ daivam iti daivaparāyaṇaḥ ।
yat tiṣṭhaty akriyo maunaṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa samāhṛtya bhogān bhuṅkte naraś ca yat ।
rājyādīn mokṣaparyantān niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

muktir bhavati saṃsārān na kalpanicayair api ।
bhramatāṃ yac charīraughair niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

nāsyā buddhir na karmāṇi na vikārādi nākṛtiḥ ।
kevalaṃ tv ittham ākalpaṃ sthityā bhāvyam iti sthitam ।। 

avaśyaṃ bhavitā hy evam idam ittham iti sthitiḥ ।
na śakyate laṅghayitum api rudrādibuddhibhiḥ ।। 

pauruṣam na parityājyam enām āśritya dhīmatā ।
pauruṣeṇaiva rūpeṇa niyatir hi niyāmikā ।। 

apauruṣaṃ hi niyatiḥ pauruṣaṃ saiva sargagā ।
niṣphalāpauruṣākārā saphalā pauruṣātmikā ।। 

niyatyā mūkatāhetuniṣpauruṣatayākriyaḥ ।
yas tiṣṭhati prāṇamarutspandas tasya kva gacchati ।। 

atha prāṇakriyārodham api kṛtvā virāmadam ।
yadi tiṣṭhati tat sādhur mukta eva kim ucyate ।। 

pauruṣaikātmatā śreyo mokṣo atyantam akarmatā ।
ābhyāṃ tu śabalaḥ pakṣo duḥkhāyaiva mahātmanām ।। 

niyatir brahmatattvābhā tasyāṃ cet pariṇamyate ।
nūnaṃ paramaśuddhāyāṃ tat prāptaiva parā gatiḥ ।। 

etair niyatyādimahāvilāsair brahmaiva visphūrjati sarvagātma ।
tṛṇādivallītarugulmajālais satteva toyasya dharāntarasthā ।। 

daivaśabdārthavicāro nāma sargaḥ

triṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etad brahmatattvaṃ sarvathā sarvadaiva sarvata eva sarvaśakti sarvākāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ sarvagaṃ sarvam eveti । eṣa tv ātmā sarvaśaktitvād anantaśaktitvāc ca kvacic cicchaktiṃ prakaṭayati kvacij jaḍaśaktiṃ kvacid ullāsaṃ kvacic chāntiṃ kvacit kiñcit kvacin nakiñcit prakaṭayati । yatra yadā yad evāsau yathā bhāvayati tatra tadā tad evāsau tathā paśyati । 

sarvaśakter hi yā yaiva yathodeti tathaiva sā ।
tadā svaśaktir nānābhārūpiṇī sā svabhāvataḥ ।। 

imāś śaktayo ayam ātmety evaṃ vikalpajālaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ dhīmadbhiḥ parikalpitaṃ loke na tv ātmani vidyate bhedaḥ । yathormitaraṅgaiḥ payasāṃ kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrair vā hemnaḥ avayavāvayavinos saṃvit kālpanikī dvidhā na vāstavī । yathā yac cetyate tathaiva tan na bāhyato nāntarataś cetanaṃ samudeti hi । sarvātmatvāt svam ābhāsaṃ kvacit kiñcit prapaśyati sarvākāramayaṃ brahmaivedaṃ tatra mithyājñānavadbhiś śaktiśaktimatte avayavāvayavirūpe kalpite na pāramārthike sad vā bhavatv asad vā cid yat saṅkalpayaty abhiniviṣṭā tat tatpaśyati sakalaṃ tat tat sadvastuvad bhāti । 

cittāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

catuṣṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ
