yo ayaṃ sarvagato devaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ ।
svacchas svānubhavānandarūpo antādivivarjitaḥ ।। 

etasmāt paramānandāc chuddhacinmātrarūpiṇaḥ ।
jīvas sañjāyate pūrvaṃ sa cittaṃ tat tato jagat ।। 

rāmaḥ

svānubhūtipramāṇe asmin brahman brahmaṇi bṛṃhite ।
kathaṃ sattām avāpnoti jīvako dvaitavarjite ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asadābhāsam adhyātma brahmāstīha prabṛṃhitam ।
bṛṃhaccidbhairavavapur ānandābhidham avyayam ।। 

tasya yat samam āpūrṇaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam acihnitam ।
tadvidām apy anirdeśyaṃ tac chāntaṃ paramaṃ padam ।। 

tasyaivodyan mahāśānti yat sattvaṃ saṃvidātmakam ।
svabhāvāt spandanaṃ tat taj jīvaśabdena kathyate ।। 

tatremāḥ paramādarśe cidvyomny anubhavātmikāḥ ।
asatyāḥ pratibimbanti jagajjālaparamparāḥ ।। 

brahmaṇas sphuraṇaṃ kiñcid yad avātāmbudher iva ।
dīpasya vāpy avātasya taj jīvaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

śāntatvāpagame acchasya manāksaṃvedanātmakam ।
svābhāvikaṃ yat sphuraṇaṃ cidvyomnas so aṅga jīvakaḥ ।। 

yathā vātasya calanaṃ kṛśāṇor uṣṇatā yathā ।
śītatā vā tuṣārasya tathā jīvatvam ātmanaḥ ।। 

cidrūpasyātmatattvasya svabhāvavaśatas svayam ।
manāksaṃvedanaṃ pūrvaṃ yat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

tad eva ghanasaṃvitti yāty ahantām anukramāt ।
vahnyaṇus svendhanādhikyāt svāṃ prakāśakatām iva ।। 

yathāsya tārakāsarge vyomnas sphurati nīlimā ।
śūnyasyāpy asya jīvasya tathāhambhāvabhāvanā ।। 

jīvo ahaṅkṛtim ādatte saṅkalpakalayeddhayā ।
svayaiva vā ghanatayā nīlimānam ivāmbaram ।। 

ahambhāvo hi dikkālavyavacchedāṅkitākṛtiḥ ।
khasthas saṅkalpavaśato vātaspanda iva sphuran ।। 

saṅkalponmukhatāṃ yātas tv ahaṅkārābhidhas sthitaḥ ।
cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prakṛtiś ceti nāmabhiḥ ।। 

tatsaṅkalpātmakaṃ ceto bhūtamātrātmakalpanam ।
kurvaṃs tattāṃ vrajaty eva saṅkalpād yāti pañcatām ।। 

tanmātrapañcakākāraṃ cittaṃ tejaḥkaṇo bhavet ।
ajātajagati vyomni tārakā pelavā yathā ।। 

tejaḥkaṇatvam ādatte cittaṃ tanmātrakalpanāt ।
śanais svasmāt parispandād bījam aṅkuratām iva ।। 

asau tejaḥkaṇo aṇḍākhyāt kalpanāt kaścid aṇḍatām ।
prayāty antassphuradbrahmā jalam āpīḍatām iva ।। 

kaścid drāgiti dehādikalpanād yāti dehatām ।
bhrāntyutthāṃ tadatadrūpāṃ gandharveccheva pūśśriyam ।। 

kaścit sthāvaratām eti kaścij jaṅgamatām api ।
kaścid yāti khavāryādirūpaṃ saṅkalpatas svajāt ।। 

sargādāv ādijo deho jīvasaṅkalpasambhavaḥ ।
krameṇa padam āsādya vairiñcaṃ kurute jagat ।। 

ātmabhūḥ kalanātmābho yat saṅkalpayati kṣaṇāt ।
tat svabhāvavaśād eva jātam eva prapaśyati ।। 

citsvabhāvāt svam āyātaṃ brahmatvaṃ sarvakāraṇam ।
saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ paścāt karma nirmāya saṃsthitam ।। 

cittvaṃ svabhāvāt sphurati citaḥ phena ivāmbhasaḥ ।
karmabhir badhyate paścād diṇḍīram iva rajjubhiḥ ।। 

saṅkalpaḥ karmaṇo bījaṃ tadātmaiva hi jīvakaḥ ।
karma paścāt tanoty uccair utthāyākarmakakramam ।। 

kroḍīkṛtāṅkurāṃ pūrvaṃ bījaṃ dhatte svabījatām ।
paścān nānātvam āyāti pattrāṅkuraphalabhramaiḥ ।। 

anye kha eva ye jīvā evam evākṛtiṃ gatāḥ ।
pūrvotpanne jagati te yānti bhūtāśritās sthitim ।। 

svakarmabhis tato janmamṛtikāraṇatāṃ gataiḥ ।
prayānty ūrdhvam adhastād vā karma citspanda ucyate ।। 

citspandanaṃ bhavati karma tad eva daivaṃ cittaṃ tad eva ca tad eva śubhāśubhādi ।
tasmād bhavanti bhuvanāni jaganti pūrvaṃ bhūtāni cāśu kusumāni taror ivādyāt ।। 

bījāṅkuranirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

pañcaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasmāt kāraṇād evaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam ।
mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam ।। 

bhāvābhāvarddhimaddolas tenāyam avalokyate ।
sargas sadasadābhāsaḥ pūr gandharvecchayā yathā ।। 

na kaścid vidyate bhedo dvaitaikyakalanātmakaḥ ।
brahmajīvamanomāyākartṛkarmajagaddṛśām ।। 

apāravānavistārasaṃvitsalilavalganaiḥ ।
cidekārṇava evāyaṃ svayam ātmā vijṛmbhate ।। 

asatyam asthairyavaśāt satyaṃ svapratibhāsataḥ ।
yathā svapnas tathā citte jagat sadasadātmakam ।। 

na san nāsann ayaṃ jātaś cetaso jāgato bhramaḥ ।
oṣadhīsamavāyānām indrajālam ivotthitam ।। 

dīrghas svapnas sthitiṃ yātas saṃsārākhyo manovaśāt ।
asamyagdarśanāt sthāṇāv iva pumpratyayo mudhā ।। 

anātmālokanāc cittaṃ cittatvenānuśocati ।
vetālakalpanād bāla iva saṅkalpite bhaye ।। 

anākhyasya svarūpasya sarvāṃśātigatātmanaḥ ।
cetyonmukhatayā cittvaṃ cittvāj jīvatvakalpanam ।। 

jīvatvād apy ahambhāvas tv ahambhāvāc ca cittatā ।
cittatvād indriyāditvaṃ tato dehādivibhramaḥ ।। 

dehādimohatas svarganarakau mokṣabandhane ।
bījāṅkuravad ārambhas saṃrūḍho dehakarmaṇoḥ ।। 

dvaitaṃ yathā nāsti cidātmatattvayos tathaiva bhedo asti na jīvacittayoḥ ।
yathaiva bhedo asti na jīvacittayos tathaiva bhedo asti na dehakarmaṇoḥ ।। 

karmaiva deho nanu deha eva cittaṃ tad evāham itīva jīvaḥ ।
sa jīva eveśvaracit sa ātmā sarvaṃ śivāt tv ekapadottham etat ।। 

jīvavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam ekaṃ paraṃ vastu rāmānānātvam apy alam ।
nānātvam iva saṃyātaṃ dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā ।। 

yathābhūtam asadrūpam ātmānaṃ yadi paśyati ।
vicārya cetas tad ahambhāvahīnaṃ na śocati ।। 

cittamātraṃ naras tasmin śānte śāntam idaṃ jagat ।
upānadrūḍhapādasya nanu carmāvṛtaiva bhūḥ ।। 

pattramātrād ṛte nānyat kadalyā vidyate yathā ।
bhramamātrād ṛte nānyaj jagatāṃ vidyate tathā ।। 

jāyate bālatām eti yauvanaṃ vārdhakaṃ tathā ।
mṛtiṃ svargaṃ ca narakaṃ bhramāc ceto hi nṛtyati ।। 

vicitrabudbudollāse svātmano avyatirekiṇi ।
yathā surāyās sāmarthyaṃ tathā cittasya saṃsṛtau ।। 

yathā dvitvaṃ śaśāṅkādau paśyaty akṣi malābilam ।
cic cetanakalākrāntā tathaiva paramātmani ।। 

yathā madavaśād bhrāntān kṣīvaḥ paśyati pādapān ।
tathā cetanavikṣubdhā saṃsārāṃś cit prapaśyati ।। 

yathā līlābhramād bālaḥ kumbhakṛccakravaj jagat ।
bhrāntaṃ paśyati cittvāt tu cid vai dṛśyaṃ tathaiva hi ।। 

yadā cic cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyavibhramaḥ ।
yadā na cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyayoḥ kṣayaḥ ।। 

yac cetyate tad itarad vyatiriktaṃ cito asti no ।
kiñcin nāstīti saṃśāntyā citaś śāmyati cetanam ।। 

cidghanenaikatām etya yadā tiṣṭhasi niścalaḥ ।
śāmyan vyavaharan vāpi tadā saṃśānta ucyase ।। 

tanvī cetayate cetyaṃ ghanā cin nāṅga cetati ।
alpakṣīvaḥ kṣobham eti ghanakṣīvo hi śāmyati ।। 

cidghanaikyaṃ prayātasya rūḍhasya parame pade ।
nairātmyaśūnyavādādyaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathanaṃ bhavet ।। 

cic cetanena cetyatvam ity evaṃ paśyati bhramam ।
jāye jīvāmi naśyāmi saṃsarāmīty asanmayam ।। 

svabhāvād vyatiriktaṃ tu na citaś cāsti cetanam ।
spandād ṛte yathā vāyāv ataḥ kiṃ kena cetyate ।। 

cetye tv asambhavaty eva kiñcid yac cetyate citā ।
rajjos sarpabhramābhāsaṃ tad avidyābhramaṃ viduḥ ।। 

saṃvinmātracikitsye asmin vyādhau saṃsāranāmani ।
cittamātraparispande saṃrambho anagha kiṃ tava ।। 

yadi sarvaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhasy utkrāntavāsanam ।
amunaiva nimeṣeṇa tan mukto asi na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgāśā vināṅgacalanaṃ kṣaṇāt ।
saṃvinmātravivartena naśyaty evaṃ hi saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

yatrābhilāṣas tan nūnaṃ santyajya sthīyate yadi ।
prāpta evāṅga tan mokṣaḥ kim etāvati duṣkaram ।। 

api prāṇāṃs tṛṇam iva tyajantīha mahāśayāḥ ।
yatrābhilāṣas tanmātratyāge kṛpaṇatā katham ।। 

yatrābhilāṣas tat tyaktvā cetasā niravagraham ।
prāptaṃ karmendriyair gṛhṇaṃs tyajann iṣṭaṃ ca tiṣṭha bhoḥ ।। 

yathā karatale bilvaṃ yathā vā parvataḥ puraḥ ।
pratyakṣam evam asyālam ajatvaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

ātmaiva bhāti jagad ity uditas taraṅgaiḥ kalpānta eka iva vāridhir aprameyaḥ ।
jñātas sa eva hi dadāti vimokṣasiddhim ajñāta eva manasā cirabandhanāya ।। 

saṃsṛtyupaśamayogo nāma sargaḥ

saptaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

manastvayogyo jīvo ayaṃ ko bhavet paramātmanaḥ ।
kathaṃ vāsmin samutpannaḥ ko vāyaṃ vada me punaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

samastaśaktikacitaṃ brahma sarveśvaraṃ sadā ।
yayaiva śaktyā sphurati prāptāṃ tām eva paśyati ।। 

svayaṃ yāṃ vetti sarvātmā citiṃ cetanarūpiṇīm ।
sā proktā jīvaśabdena saiva saṅkalpakāriṇī ।। 

svabhāvakāraṇaṃ dvitve pūrvaṃ saṅkalpya cit svayam ।
nānākāraṇatāṃ paścād yāti janmamṛtisthitau ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ sthite muniśreṣṭha daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate ।
kim ucyate tathā karma kāraṇaṃ ca kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

spandāspandasvabhāvaṃ hi cinmātram iha vidyate ।
khe vāta iva tatspandāt sollāsaṃ śāntam anyathā ।। 

citaś cittvaṃ bhāvitaṃ sat spanda ity ucyate budhaiḥ ।
dṛśyatvābhāvitaṃ caitad aspandanam iti smṛtam ।। 

spandāt sphurantī cit sargo nisspandā brahma śāśvatam ।
jīvakāraṇakarmādyāś citspandasyābhidhās smṛtāḥ ।। 

ya evānubhavātmāyaṃ citspando asti sa eva hi ।
jīvakāraṇakarmākhyo bījam etad dhi saṃsṛteḥ ।। 

kṛtadvitvacidābhāsavaśād deha upasthite ।
saṅkalpavividhārthatvaṃ citspando anubhavaṃś cirāt ।। 

nānākāraṇatāṃ yātaś citspando mucyate cirāt ।
kaścij janmasahasreṇa kaścid ekena janmanā ।। 

svabhāvakāraṇād dvitvaṃ cit sametyātha gacchati ।
svargāpavarganarakabandhakāraṇatāṃ śanaiḥ ।। 

hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthitau ।
dehe tiṣṭhati nānātvaṃ jaḍe bhāvavikārajam ।। 

ajātam apy asadrūpaṃ paśyatīmaṃ bhramaṃ manaḥ ।
jātas sthito mṛto asmīti bhramāntaḥpatanaṃ yathā ।। 

ahaṃ mamety asadrūpam eva cetaḥ prapaśyati ।
adṛṣṭaparamārthatvād āśāvivaśasaṃsthiti ।। 

mathurādhipate rājño yathā śvapacasambhramaḥ ।
āsīd evaṃ hi cittasya sphuratīyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

sarvam eva manomātrabhrāntyullāsavijṛmbhaṇam ।
idaṃ jīvatayā nāma prasphuraty ambubhaṅgavat ।। 

śivāt prāk kāraṇāt pūrvaṃ cic cetyakalanonmukhī ।
udeti saumyāj jaladheḥ payasspando manāg iva ।। 

sphuraṇāj jīvacakratvam etya cittormitāṃ gatam ।
cidvāri brahmajaladhau kurute sargabudbudam ।। 

svacchasaumyasamasyeṣad yat siṃhasyeva jṛmbhaṇam ।
brahmaṇas sa cidābhāsas tat sacetyam iva svayam ।। 

cit sacetyocyate jīvas sa saṅkalpān mano bhavet ।
buddhiś cetyam ahaṅkāro māyetyādyabhidhaṃ tataḥ ।। 

tanmātrakalpanā pūrvaṃ tanotīdaṃ jagan manaḥ ।
asatyaṃ satyasaṅkāśaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

yathā śūnyadṛśas tārāmuktāvalyādidarśanam ।
yathā svapne bhramaś caiva tathā cittasya saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

śuddha ātmā nityatṛpta iva śāntas samasthitiḥ ।
apaśyan paśyatīvemaṃ cittākhyaṃ svapnavibhramam ।। 

saṃsṛtir jāgrad ity uktaṃ svapnaṃ vidur ahaṅkṛtim ।
cittaṃ suṣuptabhāvas syāc cinmātraṃ turyam ucyate ।। 

atyantaśuddhacinmātre pariṇāmaś cirāya yaḥ ।
turyātītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tatstho bhūyo na śocati ।। 

tasmin sarvam udetīdaṃ tasminn eva pralīyate ।
tatraiva tanute cedaṃ dṛṣṭau muktāvalī yathā ।। 

arodhakatvāt khaṃ hetur yathā vṛkṣasamunnateḥ ।
akartry api tathā kartrī cetanāc cij jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

sannidhānād yathā lohaḥ pratibimbasya hetutām ।
yāty ādarśas tathaivāyaṃ cinmayo apy arthavedane ।। 

bījam aṅkurapattrādiyuktyā yadvat phalaṃ bhavet ।
cinmātraṃ cetyajīvādiyuktyā tadvan mano bhavet ।। 

svato bījaṃ phalādy ujjhad yathā bījaṃ punar bhavet ।
tathā cic cetyacittādi tyaktvā svāsthyena tiṣṭhati ।। 

yady apy abodhe bodhe ca bījāntas tarubījayoḥ ।
iva bhedo asti na jagadbrahmaṇor api cittayoḥ ।। 

tathāpi vyajyate bodhe saty ātmatvam akhaṇḍitam ।
rūpaśrīr iva dīpena cinmātrālokam eti yat ।। 

yad yan nikhanyate bhūmer yathā tat tan nabho bhavet ।
yā yā vicāryate avidyā tathā sā sā paraṃ bhavet ।। 

sphaṭikāntas sanniveśas svāṇūnāṃ vedanād yathā ।
śuddho api bhāti nāneva tathā brahmodaraṃ jagat ।। 

brahma sarvaṃ jagad vastu piṇḍa ekam akhaṇḍitam ।
phalapattralatāgulmapīṭhaṃ bījam iva sthitam ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho citraṃ jagad idam asat sad iva bhāsate ।
aho bṛhad aho svaccham aho sphuṭam aho tanu ।। 

brahmaṇi pratibhāsātmā tanmātragaṇagolakaḥ ।
avaśyāyakaṇābho asau yathā sphurati tac chrutam ।। 

yathāsau yāti vaimukhyaṃ yathā bhavati cātmabhūḥ ।
yathā svabhāvasiddhir vā tathā kathaya me prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atyantāsambhavad rūpam ananyat svasvabhāvataḥ ।
atyantānanubhūtaṃ sat svanubhūtam ivāgrataḥ ।। 

hullas sabhullo ghullāṅgha iti bālahṛdi sphuṭam ।
yathodeti tathodeti pare brahmaṇi jīvatā ।। 

mānameyātmikāśuddhāsatyaiva satyavat sthitā ।
bhinneva ca na bhinnāsmād brahmaṇo bṛṃhaṇātmikā ।। 

yathā brahma bhavaty āśu jīvaḥ kalanajīvitaḥ ।
tathā jīvo bhavaty āśu mano mananavedanam ।। 

cittaṃ tanmātramananaṃ paśyaty āśu svarūpavat ।
eṣa saṅgho anilalavaprakhyas sphurati khāntare ।। 

aucchūnyam eṣo anubhavaty avaśyāyakaṇopamam ।
saṃvedanātmakaṃ kālakalitaikāntam ātmani ।। 

ahaṃ kim iti śabdārthavedanām so aṅgasaṃvidam ।
saṃvidan vastuśabdārthaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati sārthakam ।। 

tādṛksaṃvedanas so atha rasaśabdārthavedanam ।
bhāvijihvārthanāmnaikadeśe anubhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

tādṛksaṃvedanāj jīvaś śabdārthonmukhatāṃ gataḥ ।
bhaviṣyannetranāmnaikadeśe bhavati bhāsanam ।। 

tādṛksaṃvedanas so atha ghrāṇaṃ tadvṛttivedanāt ।
sthito yasmin bhaviṣyantī tāvad dṛṣṭyāditatsthitiḥ ।। 

evamprāyas sa jīvātmā kākatālīyavac chanaiḥ ।
viśiṣṭasanniveśatvaṃ bhāvitaṃ paśyati svataḥ ।। 

sa tasya sanniveśasya tv asato api satas sataḥ ।
śabdabhāvaikadeśatvaṃ śravaṇārthena vindati ।। 

sparśabhāvaikadeśatvaṃ tvakchabdārthena vindati ।
rasabhāvaikadeśatvaṃ jihvārthākṛti paśyati ।। 

rūpabhāvaikadeśatvaṃ netrārthākṛti paśyati ।
gandhabhāvaikadeśatvaṃ nāsikātvena paśyati ।। 

evambhāvamayaitattā prakaṭīkaraṇakṣamam ।
bhaviṣyad indriyākhyaṃ sā randhraṃ paśyati dehake ।। 

ity evam ādijīvasya rāghavādyatanasya ca ।
udeti pratibhāsātmā deha evātivāhikaḥ ।। 

anākhyaiva parā sattā svātivāhikatām iva ।
sā gacchaty apy agacchantī tādṛkśaktyātmabhāvanāt ।। 

mātṛmeyapramāṇādi yadā brahmaiva vedanāt ।
tadātivāhikoktīnāṃ kaḥ prasaṅgas tad eva tat ।। 

rāmaḥ

anyatvavedanād anyaḥ parasmād ātivāhikaḥ ।
brahmatvavedanād brahma nāsaṃvittir hi sānyathā ।। 

asambhavād asaṃvitter brahmātmakatayāthavā ।
ko mokṣaḥ ko vicāras syād alaṃ bhedavikalpanaiḥ ।। 

siddhāntakāla evaiṣa praśnas te rāma rājate ।
akālapuṣpamālā hi śobhanāpi na śobhate ।। 

sārthaivānarthikākālamālā vivalitā yathā ।
tathaivākālagīr jantos sarvaṃ kāle hi śobhate ।। 

pratibandhābhyanujñānāṃ kālo dāteti dṛśyate ।
nanu sarvapadārthānāṃ kālena phalayogitā ।। 

evam eṣa sa jīvātmā suptātmā samupasthitaḥ ।
pitāmahatvam ucchūnaḥ paśyann ātmani kālataḥ ।। 

omuccāraṇasaṃvittipūrvaṃ vedān prapaśyati ।
yaḥ karoti manorājyaṃ bhavaty āśu sa tanmatiḥ ।। 

idam evam asat sadvad vidan vyomni sutātmani ।
parvataughākṛti vyomajagad vyomni vijṛmbhate ।। 

neha prajāyate kiñcin neha kiñcana naśyati ।
jagad gandharvanagararūpeṇa brahmabṛṃhitam ।। 

yathaiva brahmajādīnāṃ jīvānāṃ sadasanmayī ।
sattā tathaiva sarveṣām āsarīsṛpam āsuram ।। 

saṃvidvibhrama evāyam evam abhyutthito apy asat ।
ābrahma kīṭasaṃvittes samyaksaṃvedanakṣayaḥ ।। 

yathā sampadyate brahmā kīṭas sampadyate tathā ।
kīṭas tu rūḍhabhūtaughavalanāt tucchakarmataḥ ।। 

yad eva jīvanaṃ jīve cetyonmukhamayātmakam ।
tad eva pauruṣaṃ tasmin sāraṃ karma tad eva ca ।। 

brahmaṇas sargatāhante kīṭasyāpy asadutthite ।
cittamātrātmake bhrānte prekṣāmātrabhavatkṣaye ।। 

mātṛmānaprameyārtho na cinmātretaro yadā ।
tadā dvaitaikyavādārthaś śaśaśṛṅgābjinīsamaḥ ।। 

bhāvadārḍhyātmakaṃ mithyā brahmaṇo aṇḍaṃ vibhāvyate ।
ātmaiva kośakāreṇa lālārūpātmakaṃ yathā ।। 

sattayā brahmaṇā yad yad yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vibhāti tat ।
tat tathā dṛśyate tajjñais svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

yathā yad uditaṃ vastu tan na tattāṃ vinā bhavet ।
nimeṣam api kalpo vā svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

alīkam idam utpannam alīkaṃ ca vivardhate ।
alīkam eva svadate tathālīkaṃ vilīyate ।। 

śuddhaṃ sarvagataṃ brahmānantam advitīyaṃ duravabodhavaśād aśuddham ivāsad ivānekam ivāsarvagam ivāvabudhyate । jalam anyat taraṅgo anyad iti bālakalpanayā bhedaḥ parikalpyata eva na vāstavaḥ । tasmād yo ayam ābhāti bhedas sa kevalam atattvavidbhiḥ parikalpito rajjvām ahitvam iva । 

evaṃ bhedābhedaśaktyor abhinnayor eva brahmaṇy eva sambhavāt tenātmanādvitīyenaiva dvitvam ivānītaṃ yathā salilena taraṅgakalpanayā suvarṇena kaṭakaparikalpanayaivam iti atas tena svayam evātmanātmānya iva cetyate । saiva sphāratāṃ prāpya manas sampannā । tenāhambhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ nirvikalpapratyakṣarūpaṃ yat prathamaṃ tan manaḥ । tad ahaṃ bhavati kṣipram ahaṃśabdārthabhāvanāt । tato mano'haṅkārābhyāṃ smṛtir anusaṃhitā । tais tribhis tadanubhūtatanmātrāṇi kalpitāni । satsu tanmātreṣu jīvena cittātmanā svayam kākatālīyavad dhastapādādimān sanniveśaḥ kalpito dṛśyata eva yad eva manaḥ kalpayati tad eva paśyati sad vā bhavatv asad vā । cittaṃ yat kalpayaty abhiniviṣṭaṃ tat tat paśyati sad iva pratibhāsam upāgataṃ yathā svapne । 

cinmātrasyāntare sargaś cinmātraṃ sakalāntare ।
tattvāt samastasattānāṃ cinmātraṃ sarvam eva vā ।। 

cinmātram eva bahir antar upary adhastān mānaprameyam iti mātṛpadaṃ ca dhatte ।
nityopaśāntam iti tena samastasattā nityaṃ sthitaṃ susamam ekam apetaturyam ।। 

satyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
rākṣasyoktaṃ mahāpraśnajālam āvalitākhilam ।। 

asti kajjalapaṅkādrer ivogrā sālabhañjikā ।
himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī ।। 

viṣūcikābhidhānā yā kanyā sā nyāyabādhikā ।
vindhyāṭavīva dehena yuktyā kārśyam upāgatā ।। 

mahābalāgninayanā rodorandhrāvapūriṇī ।
nīlāmbarāmbarā kṛṣṇā dehabaddheva yāminī ।। 

nīhāravasanācchannā medurābhraśiraḥpaṭā ।
lambābhrabimborasijā nityordhvatimirordhvajā ।। 

sthiravidyullatānetrā tamālatarutārakā ।
vaiḍūryaśūrpāgranakhī bhasmanīhārahāsinī ।। 

nirmāṃsanaradehaughapuṣpasragdāmabhūṣitā ।
sarvāṅgogrāntrasamprotaśavamālāvirājitā ।। 

vetālāveśavivalatkālakaṅkālakuṇḍalā ।
arkādānotkadīptābhrabhīmograbhujamaṇḍalā ।। 

tasyā vipulakāyatvād durlabhatvān nijāndhasaḥ ।
atṛpto arṇavalekhāyā ivābhūj jāṭharo analaḥ ।। 

na kadācana sā tṛptim upāyāti mahodarī ।
vaḍavānalajihveva cintayām āsa caikadā ।। 

jambudvīpagatān sarvān nigirāmi janān yadi ।
anāratam anucchvāsaṃ jalarāśīn ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

meghena mṛgatṛṣṇeva tan me kṣud upaśāmyati ।
aviruddhaiva sā yuktir yayāpadi hi jīvyate ।। 

mantrauṣadhatapodānadevapūjādirakṣitam ।
samam eva janaṃ sarvaṃ nirbādhaṃ kaḥ prabādhate ।। 

tapaḥ karomi paramam akhinnenaiva cetasā ।
tapasaiva mahogreṇa yad durāpaṃ tad āpyate ।। 

iti sañcintya sā sarvajantujātajighatsayā ।
tapo'rtham atha sasmāra pradeśaṃ bhūtadurgamam ।। 

āruroha ca tac chṛṅgaṃ sthiravidyudvilocanā ।
hastapādādimaddehā śyāmalevābhramaṇḍalī ।। 

tatrāmbarāmbarā snātuṃ tapaḥ kartuṃ kṛtasthitiḥ ।
atiṣṭhad ekapādena candrārkāspandalocanā ।। 

krameṇa divasāḥ pakṣās tasyā māsartavo yayuḥ ।
śītātapeṣv alolāyāḥ kṛttāyā iva śailataḥ ।। 

sā babhūvābhramālāyās samā saṃstambhitākṛtiḥ ।
kṛṣṇotthitordhvakeśī kham āhartum iva codbhujā ।। 

ālokya tāṃ pavanajarjaritāṅgakatvakklīvāṃ sajhāṅkṛtiraṇatpavanāvadhūtaiḥ ।
ūrdhvasthamūrdhajatamaḥpaṭalair dadhānāṃ tāraughamauktikam ajas samupājagāma ।। 

rākṣasīvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha varṣasahasreṇa tāṃ pitāmaha āyayau ।
dāruṇaṃ hi tapas siddhyai viṣṭhāgnir api śītahā ।। 

manasaiva praṇamyainaṃ sā tatheti sthitā satī ।
ko varaḥ kṣutkṣayāyālam iti cintānvitābhavat ।। 

anāyasī cāyasī ca syām ahaṃ jīvasūcikā ।
asyoktyā dvividhā sūcībhūtvālakṣyā viśāmy aham ।। 

prāṇena saha sarveṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ surabhir yathā ।
yathābhimatam etena graseyaṃ sakalaṃ janam ।। 

krameṇa kṣudvināśāya kṣudvināśaḥ paraṃ sukham ।
iti sañcintayantīṃ tām uvāca kamalodbhavaḥ ।। 

anyādṛṣṭas tayā dṛṣṭas tv amṛtābhraravopamam ।
putri karkaṭike rakṣaḥkulaśailābhramālike ।। 

uttiṣṭha tvayi tuṣṭo asmi gṛhāṇābhimataṃ varam ।
bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa syām ahaṃ jīvasūcikā ।। 

anāyasī cāyasī ca vikalpaya ca me varam ।
evam astv iti tām uktvā punar eva pitāmahaḥ ।। 

sūcikām āha sarge tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣūcikā ।
sūkṣmayā māyayā sarvalokahiṃsāṃ kariṣyasi ।। 

durbhojanā durārambhā mūrkhā dussthitayaś ca ye ।
durdeśavāsino dhṛṣṭās teṣāṃ hiṃsāṃ kariṣyasi ।। 

praviśya hṛdayaṃ prāṇaiḥ padmaplīhādivedhanāt ।
vātalekhātmikā vyādhir bhaviṣyasi viṣūcikā ।। 

saguṇaṃ viguṇaṃ vāpi janam āsādayiṣyasi ।
guṇini tvaccikitsārthaṃ mantro ayaṃ tu mayocyate ।। 

brahmā

himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī ।
viṣūcikābhidhānā yā kanyā sā nyāyabādhikā ।। 

tasyā mantraḥ oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rām । viṣṇuśaktaye namaḥ । bhagavati viṣṇuśakte enāṃ daha daha paca paca matha matha hana hana utsādaya utsādaya dūrīkuru । viṣūcike rkhraḥ rkhraḥ rkhraḥ himavantaṃ gaccha himavantaṃ gaccha jīva । saḥ saḥ saḥ candramaṇḍala gatāsi । svāhā । 

iti mantraṃ mahāmantraṃ nyasya vāmakarodare ।
mārjayed āturākāraṃ tena hastena saṃyataḥ ।। 

himaśailābhimukhyena vidrutāṃ tāṃ vicintayet ।
karkaṭīṃ karkaśākrandāṃ mantramudgaracūrṇitām ।। 

āturaṃ cintayec candre rasāyanahrade sthitam ।
ajarāmaraṇaṃ muktaṃ sarvādhivyādhivibhramaiḥ ।। 

sādhako hi śucir bhūtvā svācāntas susamāhitaḥ ।
krameṇānena sakalāḥ procchinatti viṣūcikāḥ ।। 

iti gaganagatas trilokanātho gaganagasiddhagṛhītasiddhamantraḥ ।
gata ibhagataśakravandyamāno nijapuram akṣayam agryam ujjvalaśri ।। 

sūcyupākhyāne viṣūcikāmantrakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha vaiḍūryaśṛṅgābhā sā mahākṛṣṇā rākṣasī ।
kajjalāmbudalekheva tānavaṃ gantum udyatā ।। 

babhūvābhropamākāratyāge viṭapirūpiṇī ।
pumpramāṇā tato apy āsīt tato abhūd dhastamātrakam ।। 

tataḥ prādeśamātrābhā tato apy aṅgularūpiṇī ।
tato māṣaśimītulyā tatas sūcī babhūva ha ।। 

tataḥ kauśeyasūcītvaṃ padmakesarasundaram ।
prāptā sā śikharākārā saṅkalpādrir ivātatā ।। 

rarāja sūcikā kṛṣṇā ślakṣṇāyasakalāmayī ।
puryaṣṭakena valitā vyomagā vātavāhinī ।। 

sūcir dṛśyata evāsau na tv ayo nāma vidyate ।
saṃvidbhramakalaivaiṣā svapnasūcīva lakṣyate ।। 

ratnasūcīva masṛṇā manomananasaṃyutā ।
vaiḍūryaraśmilekheva daṇḍasantānasundarī ।। 

kajjalāmbhojakiñjalkalateva pavanāhṛtā ।
sūkṣmarandhrekṣaṇasvacchadṛṣṭavyomakanīnikā ।। 

svamukhagrāhyasūtreṇa ślakṣṇapucchaśikhāṇunā ।
dṛśyā vaipulyaśāntyarthaṃ paraṃ maunavrataṃ gatā ।। 

sudūrād dīpavad dṛṣṭaṃ sutanmātratvam āgatam ।
dūrād eva manojñena prodgirantī mukhena kham ।। 

kuñcitekṣaṇasandṛśyadīrghadīpāṃśukomalā ।
sadyassnānasamucchūnabhālabālavilāsinī ।। 

tantur bisād ivoḍḍīnā bāhyasañcārakautukāt ।
brahmanāḍir ivodyuktā bahir indvaṃśasundarī ।। 

niyatendriyaśaktis svā jīveneva bahiṣkṛtā ।
bauddhatīrthikavijñānasantānavad alakṣitā ।। 

śūnyasiddhāntaśisikā randhrānilalavābhayā ।
kṣīṇadīpāṃśusūcyeva tīkṣṇayānupalabhyayā ।। 

grāsārthaṃ sūcitāṃ yātā sa cāsyā nopayujyate ।
vicāritaṃ tayā naitad aho maurkhyavijṛmbhitam ।। 

sāgrā sañcintayām āsa na sūcī tuccharūpatām ।
caittam īhitam evaikaṃ paśyanty āste yathāsukham ।। 

avicāryaiva sūcitvaṃ tayā mūḍhadhiyārthitam ।
nānārthabuddhes sphurati pūrvāparavicāraṇā ।। 

sārthakriyo agryasāmarthyo yāti bhāvanayānyatām ।
padārtho abhimatārthāḍhyāṃ niśśvāseneva darpaṇaḥ ।। 

sūcībhāvaṃ prapannāyās tyajantyāḥ pīvaraṃ vapuḥ ।
mahāmaraṇam apy asyā rākṣasyās susukhaṃ sthitam ।। 

ekavastvanurāgāṇām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ ।
deho api tṛṇavat tyakto rākṣasyā nijayecchayā ।। 

ekavastvatigarveṇa naśyanty anyā hi saṃvidaḥ ।
rāksasyā grāsagarveṇa dehanāśo api nekṣitaḥ ।। 

nāśo api sukhayaty ajñam ekavastvatirāgiṇam ।
sūcībhūtā videhāpi parituṣṭaiva rākṣasī ।। 

anyā babhūva tallagnā sā tathā jīvasūcikā ।
vyomātmikā nirākārā vyomavṛttiśarīrakā ।। 

tejastantupravāhābhā prāṇatantumayātmikā ।
śūlasaṃvedanākārā tadrandhrārkāṃśusundarī ।। 

pṛthaksthevāsidhārā sā paramāṇvāvalīva ca ।
kausumī gandhalekheva kalākalanarūpiṇī ।। 

pāpātmikā manovṛttis sā hi tasyās tathā sthitā ।
paraprāṇadaśāvedhaparamārthaparāyaṇā ।। 

evam asyās tanur jātā sūcidvayamayī hi sā ।
nīvāraśūkavat tanvī karpāsāṃśusupelavā ।। 

tanudvayena tenāsau praviśya hṛdayaṃ nṛṇām ।
vedhayantī tataḥ krūrā prababhrāma diśo daśa ।। 

sarvas svasaṅkalpavaśāl laghur bhavati vā guruḥ ।
karkaṭyograṃ vapus tyaktvā sūcītvam urarīkṛtam ।। 

tuccho apy artho alpasattvānāṃ yāty atiprārthanīyatām ।
sūcīvṛttapiśācītvaṃ rākṣasyā tapasārjitam ।। 

api puṇyaśarīrāṇāṃ jātibandho na śāmyati ।
anusūci piśācītvaṃ rākṣasyā samupārjitam ।। 

tasyāṃ digantabhramaṇe pravṛttāyāṃ sahānilaiḥ ।
tatraiva sā tanus sthūlā galitā śāradābhravat ।। 

kasyacid vivaśāṅgasya kṣīvasya vipulasya vā ।
praviśyāntar vātasūcī bhavaty ati viṣūcikā ।। 

kasyacit tanudehasya svacchasya sudhiyo api ca ।
praviśya jīvasūcitve bhavaty antar viṣūcikā ।। 

evaṃ kvacit tṛpyati sā durbuddhihṛdayasthitā ।
kvacid ucchidyate puṇyair mantrauṣadhikṛtakramaiḥ ।। 

āsīd bahūni varṣāṇi bhramaṇaikaparāyaṇā ।
dehadvayena gacchantī vyomni bhūmitale tathā ।। 

rajastirohitā bhūmau haste aṅgulitirohitā ।
prabhātirohitā vyomni vastre sūtratirohitā ।। 

antassthā snāyusariti durbhage pāṃsupāṇḍuni ।
śuṣkarekhāsaritkhāte sūkṣmarekhājarattṛṇe ।। 

arthahīne gatacchāye śūnye ucchvāsakāriṇi ।
makṣikāvātaharaṇe śrīvṛkṣaparivarjite ।। 

sthūlāsthigranthivalite nityakampasphurattale ।
anātmīyācchanīhāraśuddhāṃśukakṛtabhrame ।। 

kiṇasthāṇvagraviśrāntamakṣikāviṅkavāyase ।
raukṣyarūḍharasadvāte vilolāṅguliśākhini ।। 

malābhralekhāsaṃsāre svāṅgulivraṇagartake ।
svedāvaśyāyaduṣṣṭhyūte parvavālmīkaparvate ।। 

kacatpāṃsujalabhrāntau nakhājagarakarkaśe ।
kvacit kvacit saridbhītabhītayūkākupānthake ।। 

viralā śuṣkasandṛṣṭapiṭakāpūtapalvale ।
madhyasthalekhāmārgaughe śītaśvasanagocare ।। 

grastayūkānaraughāsṛkpūrṇasṛkvinakhāsyatām ।
dadhatāṅguṣṭhayakṣeṇa krānte sarvatra pātinā ।। 

nānāviracanā citrapaṭapattanagāminī ।
gamāgamapariśrāntā tatrātyantacirāśvagā ।। 

nagarān nagare nyastasūtrabhāṇḍikabhāriṇī ।
prāpte karatalāraṇye balīvardavivartinī ।। 

gupte viśramaṇāyaiva manāk karaparicyutā ।
tantuprotamukhākṛṣṭikhinnā kvāpi viśīryate ।। 

vedhanaṃ karṇasaṃśliṣṭā kaṭhināpi na sākarot ।
na hi tīkṣṇo bahiḥ kārye nīcatvaṃ vijahāti cet ।। 

sāyassūcī manassūcyā valitā vijahāra ha ।
dikṣv apsv iva śilāgurvī nāvaṅgavalitā satī ।। 

visasāra diganteṣu sāntaḥkaraṇasattayā ।
tṛṇalekheva pavanaśaktyā saṃsṛtirūpayā ।। 

mukhena sūkṣmasūtrāntaṃ tyajantī suśirombhane ।
parāpūrodyamenāśu jāteva hṛdayānvitā ।। 

parāpūraraseneva sūcyā hṛt suvikāsitam ।
anāratavamat sūkṣmasūtrāntam iva sūmbhane ।। 

tīkṣṇair api cirakṣīṇaḥ pūryate nirvicāraṇam ।
dṛṣṭānto atra kṣaṇāt sūcyā pūrito jarjaraḥ paṭaḥ ।। 

sūtrāṃśunirgatair yogyaṃ sūcyā hṛdayam arjitam ।
parapūraṇayaivāśu tejaś ca kacitārkaruk ।। 

akasmāt tena rūḍheṇa kṣīṇapūraṇarūpiṇā ।
hṛdaye rākṣasī sūcī karmaṇātapyateva sā ।। 

vedhaṃ khuraraveṇaiva karotīṣatpracāritā ।
prakṛtena nijenāpi khedāya vyavahāritā ।। 

sañcārayati vastreṣu sūtraṃ caturavedhanā ।
ādīrghaṃ vāsanātantuṃ śarīreṣv iva vedanā ।। 

sañcāryamāṇā vegena dhāvatīvākṣipāṭane ।
adarśitamukhā eva durjanā marmavedhinaḥ ।। 

skandhavastrajavaprotā vedhākṣṇā sukham īkṣate ।
katham enaṃ bhinadmīti tīkṣṇānām etad īpsitam ।। 

samam eva ca kauśeye kṣaume ca vasane śitā ।
jaḍaḥ ka iva vā nāma guṇāguṇam upekṣate ।। 

sā dadhānojjvalaṃ sūtram aṅguṣṭhāṅgulipīḍitā ।
antratantum ivānantam udgirantī nirīkṣate ।। 

tīkṣṇāsyahṛdayatvena saraseṣu na keṣucit ।
sūtritāpi padārtheṣu viśaty alasagāminī ।। 

agardabhīmukhaprotā sutīkṣṇāpi na cāpi dhīḥ ।
avedhitāpy ahṛdayā rājaputry api durbhagā ।। 

vinā parāpakāreṇa tīkṣṇe saraṇam īhate ।
vedhanād rodhitā sūciḥ karṇapāśe pralambate ।। 

śete kiṃ cāru maitryeva buse karaparicyutā ।
svarūpasadṛśaṃ mitraṃ kasmai nāma na rocate ।। 

miśritā mūḍhacittānāṃ vṛttibhiḥ prākṛte jane ।
tiṣṭhaty ātmasamāṃ ko hi saṅgatiṃ tyaktum icchati ।। 

bhavaty ayaskāracitau santyaktāntardhigāminī ।
bhastrāvātair vivalitā gaganoḍḍayanonmukhī ।। 

prāṇāpānapravāhasthā hṛtpadmāntaragāminī ।
duḥkhaśaktir mahāghorā jīvaśaktir ivodyatā ।। 

samānavaiparītyena samānasamagāminī ।
udānaviparītatvād udānasamagāminī ।। 

vyānasthā vyādhijananī sarvāṅgarasacāriṇī ।
hṛtkaṇṭaśūlotplavanavaivarṇyonmādakāriṇī ।। 

prāyas saucikahastasthā suptorṇāgaṇḍakoṭare ।
bālahaste aṅgulītalpavedhanaikavilāsinī ।। 

pādapraviṣṭā rudhirapānapājiravistṛtā ।
tuṣyaty atitarāṃ tucchabhojanā tucchabhojanaiḥ ।। 

śete kardamakośasthā cirakālam adhomukhī ।
icchānurūpam āsādya ka ivāspadam ujjhati ।। 

krauryeṇāpahṛtātmānaṃ darśayaty upavedhanaiḥ ।
utsavād api nīcānāṃ kalaho hi sukhāyate ।। 

kapardikā valabhyāntarātmānaṃ bahu manyate ।
durucchedā hi bhūtānām ahaṅkāracamatkṛtiḥ ।। 

śvetikāyugmalabhyena sāhṛtenātmanā nṛṇām ।
mṛtim ādhāsyate citrā svārthe nodeti mūḍhatā ।। 

vastratantuvibhedena paramāraṇam āśu me ।
idaṃ sampadyata iti bhavaty atyantanirmalā ।। 

sthāpitā malam ādatte sūcī yad gharṣaṇaṃ vinā ।
parāpavedhavirahād vyādhis so asyāḥ pravartate ।। 

sūkṣmadṛśyā vedhadātrī kṣaṇād vismṛtim eti vā ।
tīkṣṇā bhedakarī krūrā sūciceṣṭeva daivikī ।। 

tantuvedhanamātreṇa hato anya iti toṣitā ।
durjano yena tenaiva nāśito vetti duṣṭatām ।। 

paṅke majjati yāti khe viharati vyomānilair diktaṭāñ śete pāṃsuṣu bhūtale pathi gṛhe haṭṭe vane antaḥpure ।
haste śrotrasaroruhe atha mṛduni svasthorṇikāgaṇḍake randhre kāṣṭhamṛdāṃ ca nāḍihṛdaye dravyātmasattaiva sā ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

sūcyupākhyāne sūcivyavahāravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha sā bahukālena karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī ।
sarveṣāṃ naramāṃsānāṃ nūnaṃ tṛptim upāyayau ।। 

pūrveṇaiva kilāhnā sā tṛptā rudhirabindunā ।
sūcyāṃ kim iva māty antas tṛṣṇāsūcis tu durbharā ।। 

cintayām āsa hā kaṣṭaṃ kim idaṃ sūcitāṃ gatā ।
sūkṣmāsmi hataśaktiś ca mayi grāso na māti ca ।। 

kva me tāni viśālāni gatāny aṅgāni durdhiyaḥ ।
kālameghavilāsāni vane śīrṇāni parṇavat ।। 

mayy asyāṃ mandabhāgyāyāṃ manāg api na māti ca ।
svādumāṃsarasagrāso vasāvāsita āsavaḥ ।। 

paṅke antar vinimajjāmi patāmi dharaṇītale ।
hatāsmi janapadaughais taskarair dalitāsmi ca ।। 

hā hatāham anāthāham anāśvāsā nirāspadā ।
duḥkhād duḥkhe nimajjāmi saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭe api ca ।। 

na me sakhī na me dāsī na me mātā na me pitā ।
na me bandhur na me bhṛtyo na me bhrātā na me sutaḥ ।। 

na me deho na me sthānaṃ na me kaścit samāśrayaḥ ।
naikasthānasamāśvāso bhramāmi vanaparṇavat ।। 

āpadāṃ dhuri tiṣṭhāmi niviṣṭāsmi sudāruṇe ।
abhāvam abhivāñchāmi so api sampadyate na me ।। 

svako dehaḥ parityakto mūḍhacetanayā mayā ।
kācabuddhyā vimūḍhena hastāc cintāmaṇir yathā ।। 

āpatantī manomohaṃ pūrvam āpat prayacchati ।
paścād anarthavistārarūpeṇa pravijṛmbhate ।। 

buseṣu parisuptāsmi mārgeṣu lulitāsmi ca ।
vraṇeṣu preṣitāsmy antar hā me duḥkhaparamparā ।। 

parapreṣyakarī nityaṃ parasañcāracāriṇī ।
paraṃ kārpaṇyam āyātā jātā paravaśāsmy aham ।। 

bhṛtiṃ karomi tucchaiva sāpi vedhanarūpiṇī ।
aho mamālpabhāgyāyā daurbhāgyam api durlabham ।। 

utthitas sphāravetālaḥ kurvantyāś śāntim eva me ।
sarvanāśo dhanādāne pravṛttāyā mamoditaḥ ।। 

kim andhayā mayā tādṛk santyaktaṃ tan mahāvapuḥ ।
yathā nāśena vā bhāvyaṃ tathodety aśubhā matiḥ ।। 

mām avāntaranirdagdhāṃ nyūnāṃ kīṭakaṇād api ।
uddhariṣyati ko nāma pāṃsurāśiṣu hāritām ।। 

viviktamanasāṃ buddhau kva sphuranti hatāśayāḥ ।
grāmamārgatṛṇānīva girer upari vāsinām ।। 

sthitānām ajñasambodhe katham abhyudayo bhavet ।
aṇv apy udeti prākāśyaṃ na khadyotānusevinaḥ ।। 

ataḥ kiyantaṃ no jāne kālam āvalitāpadam ।
mayāpacchvabhragarteṣu luṭhitavyaṃ hatehayā ।। 

kadā syām añjanamahāśailaputrakarūpiṇī ।
dyāvāpṛthivyor vaiḍūryastambhatām anutiṣṭhatī ।। 

meghamālāsamabhujā sthiravidyucchaṭekṣaṇā ।
nīhārajālavasanā proccakeśāsitāmbarā ।। 

lambodarābhrasandarśapranartitaśikhaṇḍinī ।
lambalolastanī śyāmadehapātadravatsurā ।। 

hāsabhasmacchaṭācchannasūryamaṇḍalarodhinī ।
kṛtāntagrasanodyuktakṛtyaikākṛtidhāriṇī ।। 

kuṇālolūkhalabṛsīśūrpasragdāmabhāriṇī ।
parvatāt parvate śṛṅge nyasya pādaṃ vihāriṇī ।। 

kadā me syād uruśvabhrabhāsuraṃ tan mahodaram ।
kadā me syāc charanmeghamedurā nakharāvalī ।। 

kadā me syān mahārakṣovidrāvaṇakaraṃ smitam ।
svasphigvādyair araṇyānyāṃ kadā nṛtyeyam unmadā ।। 

vasāsavamahākumbhair mṛtamāṃsāsthisañcayaiḥ ।
kadā kariṣye virataṃ madhurodarapūraṇam ।। 

kadā pītamahālokarudhirā kṣīvatāṃ gatā ।
bhaveyam uditonnṛttā mudritā nidrayā tataḥ ।। 

mayaiva kutapovahnau tad dagdhvā bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ ।
bhasmatvaṃ kanakeneva sūcitvam urarīkṛtam ।। 

kva kilāñjanaśailābhaṃ vapur bharitadiktaṭam ।
kva mūṣikākhurasamaṃ sūcitvaṃ tṛṇapelavam ।। 

tyajaty āśu mṛd ity ajñaḥ prāpyāpi kanakāṅgadam ।
mayā sūcitvalobhena santyaktaṃ bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ ।। 

hā mahodara vindhyādrisanīhāraguhopamam ।
adya nāntaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kathaṃ siṃhaiṇahastinām ।। 

hā bhujau bharanirbhugnaśikharau śaśabhṛnnakhau ।
puroḷāśadhiyā candraṃ katham adya na dhāvathaḥ ।। 

hā vakṣaḥ kācavaiḍūryagirīndrataṭasundara ।
nādya siṃhādiyaukaṃ tad dhṛtaṃ romavanaṃ tvayā ।। 

hā netre kṛṣṇarajanījvalacchuṣkavanojjvale ।
kasmān na me bhūṣayatho dṛgjvālāmālayā diśaḥ ।। 

hā skandhabandho naṣṭo asi vibhraṣṭo asi mahītale ।
kālena viniviṣṭo asi nighṛṣṭo asi śilodare ।। 

hā mukhendo tapasi kiṃ nādya tvaddantaraśmibhiḥ ।
kalpāgnidagdhasaṃśāntacandrabimbamanohara ।। 

hā hā hastau mahākārau tāv adya kva gatau mama ।
sampannā kim ahaṃ sūcī makṣikākhuradolitā ।। 

hā bhagograkarañjāḍhyasukhadaśvabhraśobhana ।
vindhyādryaraṇyavipulanitambāmalabimbaka ।। 

kvākāro ambarapūrakaḥ kva ca navaṃ tucchātmasūcīvapū rodorandhrasamaḥ kva cāsyakuharaḥ kvedaṃ ca sūcīmukham ।
kva grāso bahumāṃsabhārabahalaḥ kvābbindunā rodhanaṃ sūkṣmāsy etad aho mayaiva racitaṃ svātmakṣaye nāṭakam ।। 

viṣūcikāparidevanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvisaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sūcī sāsambhavadvāṇī cintayitvety akalpayat ।
punas taddehalābhāya bhavāmy āśu tapasvinī ।। 

iti sañcintya sattvasthaṃ saṃhṛtya janamāraṇam ।
tad eva himavacchṛṅgaṃ jagāma tapase sthiram ।। 

apaśyad evaṃ sūcītvaṃ sā tan mānasam ātmani ।
prāṇavātātmakā prāṇaiḥ praviśya hatamānavā ।। 

athātmany eva sūcītvaṃ paśyanty eva manomayī ।
prāṇavātaśarīrāsau jagāma himavacchiraḥ ।। 

dṛḍhadāvānale tatra sarvabhūtavivarjite ।
mahāśilātalakṣobharūkṣe pāṃsuvidhūsare ।। 

tasthāv abhyutthitaikāsau nistṛṇe vipulasthale ।
marāv akasmāt sañjātā śuṣkā tṛṇaśikhā yathā ।। 

sūkṣmasyaikasya pādasya sārdhenaivāśritorvarā ।
svasaṃvidekapādātmatapaḥ kartuṃ pracakrame ।। 

sūkṣmapādatalenaiṣā vasudhāreṇusaṅkaṭam ।
nivāryāttapadā kṛcchrād yatnenordhvamukhī sthitā ।। 

kṛṣṇatvahiṃsratātaikṣṇyā vṛttāsyā pavanāśanaiḥ ।
yatnāt padaṃ nibadhnantī reṇvaṇūpalasaṅkaṭe ।। 

araṇye kṣubhitāṃ sarpīṃ dūrālokārtham utthitām ।
pucchakoṭisthitāṃ pātalolām anucakāra sā ।। 

mukharandhraviniṣkrāntā tasyā bhāskaradīdhitiḥ ।
sakhī babhūva sūcyābhā paścādbhāgaikarakṣiṇī ।। 

kṣudre api svajanībhūte yāti vatsalatāṃ janaḥ ।
dīdhityāpi sakhīvṛttaṃ sūcyās sūcitayāśritam ।। 

babhūva tasyās svacchā yā dvitīyā tāpasī sakhī ।
enassūcīva malinā tayā paścāt kṛtaiva sā ।। 

sūcyāsyanirgatārkāṃśupātākṣasmayakūṇitam ।
paścāt smayatatā dṛṣṭā sā dhūlyaivātra kevalam ।। 

dhūlyāpi prekṣyate yā tām api drumalatādayaḥ ।
mahātapasvinīṃ sūcīṃ draṣṭuṃ notkaṇṭhayanti ke ।। 

sthirabaddhapadām enāṃ sumanovṛttim utthitām ।
anilāḥ kṣobhayāṃ cakrur mukhanirgatabhāṅkṛtaiḥ ।। 

prasūtāni bhaviṣyāmo nigīrṇāny anayāciram ।
kausumāni rajāṃsy asyā ity āsyaṃ paryapūpuran ।। 

tapoharendraprahitavātanunnāmiṣaṃ rajaḥ ।
tayā tv ahṛttvavyājena na nigīrṇaṃ mukhe api sat ।। 

na nigīrṇavatī tāni rajāṃsi dṛḍhaniścayā ।
antassāratayā kāryaṃ laghavo apy āpnuvanti hi ।। 

na pibanty āsyasaṃsthānitayā puṣparajāṃsy api ।
vismayaṃ pavanaḥ prāpa sumerūnmūlanādhikam ।
āśiraḥpihitā paṅkaiḥ pūritāpi mahājalaiḥ ।। 

vidhutāpi bṛhadvātais trāsitāpi taḍidbhramaiḥ ।
uddhūlitāpi jaladaiḥ kṣobhitāpy abhragarjitaiḥ ।। 

api varṣasahasrais sā cittasthadṛḍhaniścayā ।
paṭṭagaṇḍakasupteva nākampata tapasvinī ।। 

nivṛttāyā bahisspandād atha kāle asahāgate ।
vicārayantyās tasyās svam ātmatattvaṃ svacetanam ।। 

jñānālokas samudabhūt sā parāvaradarśinī ।
babhūva nirmalā sūcī citsūcī pāvanī param ।। 

jātā viditavedyā sā svayam eva tayā dhiyā ।
tapasā duṣkṛte kṣīṇe sūcī svamukhasūcanī ।। 

iti varṣasahasrāṇi sākarod dāruṇaṃ tapaḥ ।
sapta saptamahālokasantāpakaram unmukhī ।। 

tasyāḥ kalpāgnibhīmena tapasā himavān giriḥ ।
babhūva tena jvalito jajvāleva tato jagat ।। 

kasyedaṃ tapasākrāntaṃ jagad ity atha vāsavaḥ ।
nāradaṃ paripapraccha sa tasyākathayac ca tat ।। 

sapta varṣasahasrāṇi sūcī dīrghatapasvinī ।
mayā vijñātadehāsau tenedaṃ jvalitaṃ jagat ।। 

nāgāś śvasanti vidalanti nagāḥ patanti vaimānikā jaladavāridhayaḥ prayānti ।
śoṣaṃ diśo arkasahitā malinībhavanti sūcyendra paśya tapasā kṣayamāyayaiva ।। 

sūcītapaḥprabhāvo nāma sargaḥ

trisaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

karkaṭīkaṭuvṛttāntaṃ sarvam ākarṇya vāsavaḥ ।
nāradaṃ paripapraccha punarjātakutūhalaḥ ।। 

śakraḥ

sūcīvṛttapiśācītvaṃ tapasopārjya tat tayā ।
karkaṭyā himavatkukṣyāṃ ke bhuktā vibhavā mune ।। 

nāradaḥ

jīvasūcī piśācītvaṃ gatā yā śūkapelavam ।
asīt kārṣṇāyasī sūcis tasyās svam avalambanam ।। 

tat svam ālambanaṃ tyaktvā vyomavātarathasthayā ।
prāṇamārutamārgeṇa tayā dehapraviṣṭayā ।। 

sarvāsām antratantrīṇāṃ snāyumedovasāsṛjām ।
randhreṣu pakṣiṇyevāntar nilīnaṃ malināṅgayā ।। 

yasyāṃ nāḍyāṃ na yo vāyur māti tat tām upetayā ।
tatra śūlaṃ kṛtaṃ mūlaṃ nyagrodhāgra ivotkaṭam ।। 

tac charīrendriyais tāni tathānyāni bahūni ca ।
bhuktāni naramāṃsāni bhojanāny ucitāni ca ।। 

suptaṃ vivalitānalpamālayā mugdhabālayā ।
kāntavakṣassthalasyūtamliṣṭapattrakapolayā ।। 

vihṛtaṃ vītaśokāsu vihaṅgyā vanavīthiṣu ।
kalpadrumotthapuṣpābhradviguṇāmbhodapaṅktiṣu ।। 

pīta āmodimandāramakarandakaṇāsavaḥ ।
vaneṣv amaraśailānām alinyālinilīnayā ।। 

carvitāni śavāṅgāni gṛdhragarvātivṛddhayā ।
khaḍgayaṣṭyeva saṅgrāme vīrāṅgāni javeddhayā ।। 

sarvāṅgakośanāḍīṣu dikṣv ivānilalekhayā ।
uḍḍīnam avaḍīnaṃ ca kākyeva vyomavīthiṣu ।। 

virāḍātmahṛdi prāṇā vātaskandhās sphuranti khe ।
yathā tathā prasphuritaṃ prati dehagṛhaṃ tayā ।। 

sarvaprāṇiśarīreṣu bhrāntaṃ cicchaktiduṣṭayā ।
dīpaprabhābhāsitayā gṛhiṇyeva svasadmasu ।। 

vihṛtaṃ rudhireṣv antar dravaśaktyeva vāriṣu ।
abdhiṣv āvartavṛttyeva jaṭhareṣu vivalgitam ।। 

suptaṃ medassu śubhreṣu śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā ।
svāditas svāmagandho antar vātaśaktyāmṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

tarugulmauṣadhādīnāṃ hṛtsthāraṇyānilaśriyā ।
paribhuktāny aśaktāni hiṃsayā vīkṣitāni ca ।। 

ahaṃ jīvamayī sūcī syām itīcchāvareṇa sā ।
sampannā mānasī sūciś cetanī pāvanī śitā ।। 

adṛśyayā tayā tena mārutograturaṅgayā ।
ayassūcīnilayayā vihṛtaṃ dikṣu ruddhayā ।। 

pītaṃ bhuktaṃ vilasitaṃ hasitaṃ dattam āhṛtam ।
nartitaṃ gītam uṣitam anantaiḥ prāṇidehakaiḥ ।। 

adṛśyayā śarīriṇyā manaḥ pavanadehayā ।
kṛtam ākāśarūpiṇyā na tad asti na yat tayā ।। 

mattayāśaktayā svādurasāṃś carvitum etayā ।
bālayālānam āśritya kariṇyeva vivalgitam ।। 

kallolabahalādyūnadehaduṣṭanadīṣv alam ।
vegair vaidhuryakāriṇyā mattayā makarāyitam ।। 

aśaktayā nigirituṃ medomāṃsaṃ tayā hṛdi ।
dūnaṃ suciram arthāḍhyavṛddhāturadhiyā yathā ।। 

gajoṣṭramṛgahastyaśvasiṃhādihṛdi nartitam ।
nartakyeva ciraṃ raṅge vellayantyāṅgam aṅgake ।। 

bahir antaś ca vāyūnām ekatvam anuyātayā ।
gandhalekhikayevāntassthitaṃ durlakṣyayānayā ।। 

mantrauṣadhatapodānadevapūjādibhir hitā ।
valgadgirinadītuṅgataraṅgavad apadrutā ।। 

dīpaprabhevāvijñātagatir gatvāśu līyate ।
ayassūcyāṃ mātarīva tatra nivṛtim eti sā ।। 

svavāsanānusāreṇa sarva āspadam īhate ।
sūcitvam eva rākṣasyā sūcitvenāspadīkṛtam ।। 

sarvo vihṛtyāpi diśas svam evāspadam āpadi ।
jīvasūcī lohasūcīm ivāyāti jaḍo janaḥ ।। 

evaṃ prayatamānā sā viharantī diśo daśa ।
mānasīṃ tṛptim āyāti na śārīrīṃ kadācana ।। 

sati dharmiṇi dharmā hi sambhavantīha nāsati ।
śarīraṃ dṛśyate yasya tasya tat kila tṛpyati ।। 

atha tṛptasya dehasya smaraṇāt prāktanasya sā ।
babhūva duḥkhitā svādupūrṇodarasukhārthinī ।। 

tataḥ prāktanadehārthaṃ karomi vipulaṃ tapaḥ ।
iti sañcintya tapase deśaṃ nirṇīya cātmanā ।। 

viveśākāśagṛdhrasya hṛdayaṃ taruṇasya sā ।
prāṇamārutamārgeṇa khaṃ mṛgeva khakhelagā ।। 

sa gṛdhras tām ayassūcīṃ kāñcid evaṃsamāśritām ।
citā tayeritaś cañcvā vṛttiṃ mana ivādadhe ।। 

sūcīm ādāya gṛdhro asau yayau taccintitaṃ girim ।
antas sūcīpiśācyāśu nunno abda iva vāyunā ।। 

tatrājane mahāraṇye sthāpayām āsa tām asau ।
sarvasaṅkalparahite pade yogīva cetanām ।। 

ekenaivāṇunā tena pādaprāntena mūrchitā ।
sā pratiṣṭhāpitevādrer mūrdhni gṛdhreṇa devatā ।। 

rajaḥkaṇabṛhacchṛṅgaśirasy ekena sāṇunā ।
pādenātiṣṭhad udgrīvaṃ śikheva girimūrdhani ।। 

utthitāṃ sthāpitāṃ sūcīṃ gṛdhrāntar jīvasūcikā ।
dṛṣṭvā bahir vinirgantuṃ khagadehāt pracakrame ।। 

gṛdhraprāṇān nirjagāma sūcī pronmukhacetanā ।
pavanād gandhalekheva ghrāṇavātalavonmukhī ।। 

jagāma gṛdhras svaṃ deśaṃ bhāraṃ tyaktveva bhārikaḥ ।
nivṛttavyādhir iva sa babhūvāntaranākulaḥ ।। 

ayassūcitayādhāras tapase parikalpitaḥ ।
dṛḍhasya sadṛśo arthānāṃ viniyogo hi rājate ।। 

na hy amūrtasya sidhyanti vinādhāraṃ kila kriyāḥ ।
ity ādhāraikaniṣṭhatvam āśrityāsau tapassthitā ।। 

jīvasūcī lohasūcīṃ piśācī śiṃśapām iva ।
sarvato valayām āsa vātyevāmodalekhikām ।। 

tatas tataḥprabhṛty eṣā sūcī dīrghatapasvinī ।
araṇyānyāṃ sthitā śakra tatra varṣagaṇān bahūn ।। 

tasyā varārthaṃ yatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru kartavyakovida ।
cireṇa sambhṛtaṃ lokam alaṃ dagdhuṃ hi tattapaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nāradataś śrutvā śakras sūcinirīkṣaṇe ।
mārutaṃ preṣayām āsa daśadiṅmaṇḍalāny atha ।। 

jagāmātha marutsaṃvid ātmanā tāṃ nirīkṣitum ।
avamucya nabhomārgaṃ vicacāra tvarānvitaḥ ।। 

sā vātasaṃvit kṣiprā vai naiva sarvagatā satī ।
paramā cid ivāvighnaṃ sahasaiva dadarśa ha ।। 

bhūmes saptasamudrānte nibaddhāṃ vipulasthale ।
lokālokādriraśanāṃ nānāmaṇimayopalām ।। 

svādūdakābdhivalayaṃ sakoṭarakakubgaṇam ।
puṣkaradvīpavalayaṃ tadantargirimaṇḍalam ।। 

madirāmbhodhivalayaṃ tajjalecarasaṃsthitam ।
gomedhadvīpakaṭakaṃ tanmadhyaviṣayavrajam ।। 

ikṣūdakābdhiparikhāṃ sāntargirigaṇāntarām ।
krauñcadvīporvarāpīṭhaṃ sāntargatagirikramam ।। 

kṣīrābdhimuktāvalayaṃ samadhyagatanāyakam ।
śvetākhyadvīpavalayaṃ sabhūtapratibhāgakam ।। 

bhūmer ghṛtodavalanaṃ sāntasthāmaramandiram ।
kuśadvīpavṛtivyāsaṃ sumahāśailakoṭaram ।। 

dadhyambhorāśiraśanāṃ sāntaś carapurodarām ।
śākadvīporvarākāraṃ sāntassthaviṣayāntaram ।। 

kṣārāmbhorāśiparikhāṃ sāntassthapuraparvatām ।
jambudvīpamahāmeruṃ kulaparvatasaṅkulam ।। 

vātaskandhebhya evādau pataty anilavellanā ।
krameṇānena paryante tenaiva prasṛteha sā ।। 

vāyur ālokayann itthaṃ jambudvīpaṃ nirīkṣya ca ।
tat prāpa himavacchṛṅgaṃ yatra sūcis tapasvinī ।। 

śṛṅgamūrdhni mahaty ugre so araṇyānīm avāpa tām ।
dvitīyākāśavitatāṃ varjitāṃ prāṇikarmabhiḥ ।। 

asañjātatṛṇavyūhāṃ nikaṭatvād vivasvataḥ ।
rajomayīm eva tatāṃ saṃsāraracanām iva ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇānadīsārthapūraṇīyābdhitāṃ gatām ।
śakrakodaṇḍasaṅkāśamṛgatṛṣṇāsaricchatām ।। 

amitopāntaparyantāṃ lokapālekṣitair api ।
kevalaṃ pavanaspandapracaladdhūlikuṇḍalām ।। 

sūryāṃśukuṅkumair liptāṃ lagnacandrāṃśucandanām ।
vilāsinīm iva vyomno vātaśītkāragāyanām ।। 

saptadvīpasamudramudraṇasamucchūnaikadeśāśrayaṃ bhūpīṭhaṃ parito vihṛtya pavano dīrghādhvanā jarjaraḥ ।
tāṃ prāpyāgragiristhalīm alivapurvyomāṅgalagnām iva vyāttānantadigantapūrakabṛhaddeho viśaśrāma saḥ ।। 

sūcītapaḥparipākavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catussaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tatra tasyordhvaśṛṅgasya tasyāṃ mūrdhamahāvanau ।
dadarśa madhye tāṃ sūcīṃ protthitāṃ saśikhām iva ।। 

ekapādaṃ tapasyantīṃ śuṣyantīṃ ciram ūṣmapām ।
satatānaśanāc chuṣkāṃ piṇḍībhūtodaratvacam ।। 

sakṛdvikāsināsyena gṛhītvaiva tam ānilam ।
paścāt tyajantīṃ hṛdaye apy eva māntīm anāratam ।। 

śuṣkāṃ caṇḍāṃśukiraṇair jarjarāṃ vanavāyubhiḥ ।
acalantīṃ nijāt sthānāt snapitām induraśmibhiḥ ।। 

pūrvaṃ rajo'ṇunaikena samadhiṣṭhitamastakām ।
kṛtārthatvaṃ kalayatā dadatānyasya nāspadam ।। 

araṇyeneva dattārghāṃ cirāj jātaśikhām iva ।
mūrdhnīva sthāpitaprāṇāṃ jaṭākūṭavatīm iva ।। 

tāṃ vīkṣya pavanas sūcīṃ vismayākulacetanaḥ ।
praṇamyālokya caritaṃ bhītabhīta ivāgrataḥ ।। 

mahātapasvinī sūci kimarthaṃ tapyase tapaḥ ।
neti vaktuṃ śaśākāsau tattejorāśinirjitaḥ ।। 

bhagavatyā mahāsūcyā aho citraṃ mahat tapaḥ ।
ity eva kevalaṃ dhyāyan māruto gaganaṃ yayau ।। 

samullaṅghyābhramārgaṃ tu vātaskandhān atītya ca ।
siddhavṛndāny adhaḥ kṛtvā sūryamārgam upetya ca ।। 

ūrdhvam etya vicārebhyaḥ prāpa śakrapurāntaram ।
sūcidarśanapuṇyaṃ tam āliliṅga purandaraḥ ।। 

pṛṣṭaś ca kathayām āsa dṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ mayety asau ।
sahadevanikāyāya śakrāyāsthānavāsine ।। 

vāyuḥ

jambudvīpe asti śailendro himavān nāma sūnnataḥ ।
jāmātā yasya bhagavān sākṣāc chaśikalādharaḥ ।। 

tasyottare mahāśṛṅgapṛṣṭhe paramarūpiṇī ।
sthitā tapasvinī sūcī tapaś carati dāruṇam ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena vātādyaśanaśāntaye ।
tayā svodarasauṣiryaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya nivāritam ।। 

śāntasaṅkocam ūṣmārthaṃ vikāsyāsyaṃ rajo'ṇunā ।
tayādya sthagitaṃ śītavātāśananivṛttaye ।। 

tasyās tīvreṇa tapasā tuhinākāram utsṛjan ।
agnyākāram ago gṛhṇan devadussevyatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

tad uttiṣṭhāśu gacchāmas sarva eva pitāmaham ।
tadvarārtham anarthāya viddhi taddussahaṃ tapaḥ ।। 

iti vāteritaś śakras saha devagaṇena saḥ ।
jagāma brahmaṇo lokaṃ prārthayām āsa taṃ prabhum ।। 

sūcyā ahaṃ varaṃ dātuṃ gacchāmi himavacchiraḥ ।
brahmaṇeti pratijñāte śakras svargam upāyayau ।। 

etāvatātha kālena sā babhūva ca pāvanī ।
sūcī nijatapastāpatāpitāmaramandirā ।। 

mukharandhrasthitārkāṃśudṛśā svacchāyayaiva sā ।
vismayinyā vivartinyā ādināntam upekṣitā ।। 

kauśeyasūcyā tṛṇavan merus sthairyeṇa nirjitaḥ ।
majjanitryeti vṛddhyeva yuktayādyantayor dine ।। 

madhyāhne tāpabhītyeva viśantyā mātur antaram ।
anyadā gauravād dṛṣṭyā dūrataḥ prekṣyamāṇayā ।। 

sā tām avekṣite akṣṇārāt tāpād aṅge nimajjati ।
saṅkaṭe vismaraty eva jano gauravasatkriyām ।। 

chāyāsūcis tāpasūcis tayety ātmatṛtīyayā ।
trikoṇaṃ tapasā pūtaṃ vārāṇasyās samaṃ kṛtam ।। 

gatās tena trikoṇena trivarṇaparikhāvatā ।
vāyavaḥ pāṃsavo ye api te parāṃ muktim āgatāḥ ।। 

viditaparamakāraṇātha jātā svayam anu cetanasaṃvidaṃ vicārya ।
svamananakalanānusāra ekas tv iha hi guruḥ paramo na rāghavānyaḥ ।। 

sūcitapaḥparipākavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha varṣasahasreṇa tāṃ pitāmaha āyayau ।
varaṃ putri gṛhāṇeti vyājahāra nabhastalāt ।। 

sūcī karmendriyābhāvāj jīvamātrakalāvatī ।
na kiñcid vyājahārāsmai cintayām āsa kevalam ।। 

pūrṇāsmi gatasandehā kiṃ vareṇa karomy aham ।
śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam ।। 

jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ śāntās sandehajālikāḥ ।
svaviveko vikasitaḥ kim anyena prayojanam ।। 

yathā sthiteyam asmīha santiṣṭheyaṃ tathaiva hi ।
satyāsatyakalām eva tyaktvā kim itareṇa me ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālam avivekena bādhitā ।
svasaṅkalpasamutthena vetāleneva bālikā ।। 

idānīm upaśānto asau svavicāraṇayā svayam ।
īpsitānīpsitair arthaḥ ko bhavet kalpitair mama ।। 

iti niścayayuktāṃ tāṃ sūcīṃ karmendriyojjhitām ।
tūṣṇīṃ sthitāṃ sa niyates sampaśyan bhagavān sthitim ।। 

brahmā punar uvācemāṃ vītarāgāṃ prasannadhīḥ ।
varaṃ putri gṛhāṇa tvaṃ kañcit kālaṃ ca bhūtale ।। 

bhogān bhuktvā tataḥ paścād gamiṣyasi paraṃ padam ।
avyāvṛttisvarūpāyā niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

tapasānena saṅkalpas saphalo astu tavottame ।
pīnā bhava punas saiva himakānanarākṣasī ।। 

yayā pūrvaṃ viyuktāsi tanvā jaladarūpayā ।
bījāntarvṛkṣatā putri bṛhadvṛkṣatayā yathā ।। 

yogam eṣyasi bhūyas tvaṃ tanvā tadbījarūpiṇī ।
tayaiva ramase putri latayevāṅkurasthitiḥ ।। 

bādhāṃ viditavedyatvān na ca loke kariṣyasi ।
antaśśuddhā śāntavātā śaradīvābhramaṇḍalī ।। 

antaradhyānaviratā kadācil līlayā yadi ।
bhaviṣyasi bahīrūḍhā sarvātmadhyānarūpiṇī ।। 

vyavahārātmakadhyānadhāraṇādhārarūpiṇī ।
vātasvabhāvavaddehaparispandavilāsinī ।। 

tadā virodhinī putri svakarmaspandarodhinī ।
nyāyena kṣunnivṛttyarthaṃ bhūtabādhāṃ kariṣyasi ।। 

bhaviṣyasi nyāyavṛttir loke tvaṃ nyāyabādhikā ।
jīvanmuktatayā dehe svavivekaikapālikā ।। 

ity uktvā gaganatalāj jagāma devas sūcī sā bhavatu mameti kiṃ virāgaḥ ।
rāgo vābjajavacanārthadhāraṇe asminn ity antar mananamayī manāg babhūva ।। 

prādeśaḥ prathamam abhūt tato api hasto vyāsaṃ cāpy atha viṭapas tato abhramālā ।
sodyatsāvayavalatā babhau nimeṣāt saṅkalpadrumakaṇikāṅkurakrameṇa ।। 

tanmātrāṇy avikalaśaktimanti dehād udbhūtāny atha karaṇendriyāṇi samyak ।
saṅkalpadrumanavapuṣpavat samantād bīje yāny alam abhavaṃs tirohitāni ।। 

sūcīśarīralābho nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭsaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athābhavad asau sūcī karkaṭī rākṣasī punaḥ ।
sūkṣmaiva sthaulyam āyātā meghalekheva vārṣikī ।। 

nijam ākāram āsādya kiñcit pramuditā satī ।
bṛhadrākṣasagarvaṃ tadbodhāt kañcukavaj jahau ।। 

tatraiva dhyāyinī tasthau baddhapadmāsanasthitiḥ ।
ālambya saṃvidaṃ śuddhāṃ saṃsthitā girikūṭavat ।। 

atha sā māsaṣaṭkena dhyānād bodham upāgatā ।
mahājaladanādena prāvṛṣīva śikhaṇḍinī ।। 

prabuddhā sā bahirvṛttir babhūva kṣutparāyaṇā ।
yāvajjīvaṃ svabhāvo asya dehasya na nivartate ।। 

atha sā kiṃ grasa iti cintayām āsa cintayā ।
bhoktavyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca nyāyena na vinā mayā ।। 

yad āryagarhitaṃ yad vā nyāyena na samarjitam ।
tasmād grāsād varaṃ manye maraṇaṃ dehinām iha ।। 

yadi dehaṃ tyajāmīmaṃ tan nyāyopārjitaṃ vinā ।
na kiñcid admi nirnyāyaṃ bhukto artho hi garāyate ।। 

yan na lokakramaprāptaṃ tena bhuktena kiṃ bhavet ।
na jīvitena no mṛtyā kiñcit kāraṇam asti me ।। 

manomātram ahaṃ hy āsaṃ dehādibhramamātrakam ।
tac chāntaṃ svāvabodhena dehādehadṛśau kutaḥ ।। 

evaṃ sthitā maunavatī śuśrāva gaganād giram ।
rakṣassvabhāvasantyāgatuṣṭenoktāṃ nabhasvatā ।। 

gaccha karkaṭi mūḍhāṃs tvaṃ jñānenāśv avabodhaya ।
mūḍhottāraṇam eveha svabhāvo mahatām iti ।। 

bodhyamāno bhavatyāpi yo na bodham upaiṣyati ।
svanāśāyaiva jāto asau nyāyyo grāso bhavet tava ।। 

śrutvety anugṛhītāsmi tvayety uktavatī śanaiḥ ।
uttasthau śailaśikharāt kramād avaruroha ca ।। 

adhityakām atītyāśu gatvā copatyakātaṭāt ।
viveśa śailapādasthaṃ kirātajanamaṇḍalam ।। 

bahvannapaśulokaughadravyasasyauṣadhāmiṣam ।
anantamūlapānānnamṛgakīṭakhagādikam ।। 

pracalitagalitāñjanācalābhā himagiripādaniṣevitaṃ sudeśam ।
tadanu gatavatī niśācarī sā niśi sughanāndhatamisramārgabhūmau ।। 

nyāyabādhikānyāyo nāma sargaḥ

saptasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare tatra kirātajanamaṇḍale ।
hastahāryatamaḥpiṇḍā babhūvāsitayāminī ।। 

nīlameghapaṭacchannanirindugaganāntarā ।
tamālavanasampiṇḍamaṇḍaloḍḍīnakajjalā ।। 

latāghanatayā grāmakoṭaraikāndhyamantharā ।
gṛhacatvarasambādhanagare navayauvanā ।। 

catvareṣu tamaḥpiṇḍaprajihmīkṛtadīpikā ।
kuñcikācchidraniṣkrāntadīpikāromarājikā ।। 

svavayasyeva karkaṭyāḥ parinṛtyatpiśācikā ।
mattakaṅkālavetālā kāṣṭhamaunam iva sthitā ।। 

suṣuptamṛtabhūtaughā ghananīhārahāriṇī ।
mandamandamarutspandaśaratprāleyaśīkarā ।। 

sarassu viraṭadvārikokabhekataraṅgikā ।
antaḥpureṣu ramaṇaraṇannārīnarānanā ।। 

jaṅgaleṣu jvalajjvālajaṭālajvalanojjvalā ।
kedāreṣv ambusaṃsekapuṣṭapākamilatsilā ।। 

nabhasy alakṣitaspandaparivṛttarkṣacakrakā ।
vaneṣu visaradvātapatatpuṣpaphaladrumā ।। 

śvabhreṣu kauśikāsyāttavāyasyādyāhṛtāravā ।
taskarākrāntaparyantagrāmyākrandanakarkaśā ।। 

grāmeṣv acetanagrāmyā nagare suptanāgarā ।
vaneṣu visaradvātā nīḍeṣv aspandapakṣiṇī ।। 

guhāsu suptasiṃhaughā kuñjeṣūcchvasitaiṇakā ।
khe sāvaśyāyanikarā vipine maunadhāriṇī ।। 

kajjalāmbhodamadhyābhā kācaśailodaropamā ।
paṅkapiṇḍāntaraghanā khaḍgacchedyāndhyamāṃsalā ।। 

pralayānilavikṣubdhā kajjalācalacañcalā ।
ekārṇavamahāpaṅkaparvatodaramedurā ।। 

aṅgārakoṭinakharā sauṣuptapadasundarī ।
ajñānanidrāniviḍā bhṛṅgapṛṣṭhacchavicchaviḥ ।। 

tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhīmāyāṃ kirātajanamaṇḍale ।
mantriṇā saha bhūpālas tasminn avasare tadā ।। 

nirjagāma sudhīrātmā nagarāt suptanāgarāt ।
aṭavīṃ vikramo nāma viṣamāṃ vīracaryayā ।। 

aṭavyāṃ karkaṭī sā tau carantau rājamantriṇau ।
apaśyad dhṛtadhairyāṃśau vetālālokanonmukhau ।। 

atha sā cintayām āsa labdho bhakṣo adya ho mayā ।
mūḍhāv etāv anātmajñau bhāro dehaḥ kilānayoḥ ।। 

ihāmutra ca nāśāya mūḍho duḥkhāya jīvati ।
yatnād vināśanīyo asau nānarthaḥ paripālyate ।। 

apaśyatas svam ātmānaṃ mṛtir mūḍhasya jīvitam ।
maraṇenodayo asyāsti pāpasampattihetutaḥ ।। 

ādisarge ca niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ paṅkajajanmanā ।
hiṃsrābhibhojanāyāstu mūḍhātmā nātmavān iti ।। 

tasmād imau mayaivādya bhoktavyau bhojyatāṃ gatau ।
abhavya eva nirdoṣaṃ prāptam artham upekṣate ।। 

mā kadācid imau syātāṃ guṇayuktau mahāśayau ।
tādṛṅnaravināśo hi svabhāvān me na rocate ।। 

tad etau samparīkṣe ahaṃ yadi tāvad guṇānvitau ।
tad bhakṣyaṃ na karomy etau na hiṃsyā guṇinaḥ kvacit ।। 

akṛtrimaṃ sukhaṃ kīrtim āyuś caivābhivāñchatā ।
sarvābhimatadānena pūjanīyā guṇānvitāḥ ।। 

yadi naśyāmi dehena tan na bhokṣye guṇānvitam ।
sukhayanti hi cetāṃsi jīvitād api sādhavaḥ ।। 

api jīvitadānena guṇinaṃ paripālayet ।
guṇavatsaṅgamauṣadhyā mṛtyur apy eti mitratām ।। 

yatrāham api rakṣāmi rākṣasī guṇaśālinam ।
tatrānyaś cānukuryāt taṃ hṛdvicāram ivāmalam ।। 

udāraguṇayuktā ye viharantīha dehinaḥ ।
dharātalendavas saṅgād bhṛśaṃ śītalayanti te ।। 

mṛtir guṇatiraskāro jīvitaṃ guṇisaṃśrayaḥ ।
phalaṃ svargāpavargādi jīvitād guṇisaṃśrayāt ।। 

tasmād imau parīkṣe ahaṃ kadācit praśnalīlayā ।
kiṃ mānajñānakāv etāv iti tāmarasekṣaṇau ।। 

ādau vicārya suguṇāguṇaleśayuktim āgas tato adhikataraṃ ca guṇād yādi syāt ।
kuryāt tatas samupapattivaśena daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyasya laghv atha dṛḍhaṃ dhanasambhave vā ।। 

rākṣasīvicāro nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha sā rākṣasī rakṣaḥkulakānanamañjarī ।
tamasy evābhralekheva gambhīraṃ ninanāda sā ।। 

nādānte samuvācedaṃ prīṅkāraparuṣaṃ vacaḥ ।
garjitānantaraṃ jātakarakāśaniśabdavat ।। 

bho bho ghorāṭavīvyomapadavīśaśibhāskarau ।
mahāmāyātamaḥpīṭhaśilākoṭarakīṭakau ।। 

kau bhavantau mahābuddhī durbuddhī vā samāgatau ।
madgrāsapatham āpannau kṣaṇān maraṇakovidau ।। 

rājā

bho bho bhūtaka kiṃ syās tvaṃ kva tiṣṭhasi ca dehakam ।
darśayāsyās tava giraḥ ko bibhety alinīdhvaneḥ ।। 

siṃhavat sarvavegena patanty arthaṃ kilārthinaḥ ।
samam ākāraśabdābhyāṃ bhāvayāsmān bibheṣi kim ।
na kiñcid dīrghasūtrāṇāṃ sidhyaty ātmakṣayād ṛte ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājñety ukte ramyam uktam iti sañcintya sā tayoḥ ।
prakāśāyāpy adhairyāya nanāda ca jahāsa ca ।। 

tato dadṛśatus tau tāṃ śabdapūritadiggaṇām ।
svāṭṭahāsaprabhāpiṇḍapūraprakaṭitākṛtim ।। 

kalpābhrāṃśanikāśena ghṛṣṭām adritaṭīm iva ।
svanetravidyudvalayāvalanājvalitāmbarām ।। 

timiraikārṇavaurvāgnijvālāvivalanām iva ।
garjadghanaghaṭāṭopapīvarāsitakandharām ।। 

raṇadvadanasaṃrambhahāhāhataniśācarām ।
rodasīkajjalastambhalīlayollāsitāṃ puraḥ ।। 

ūrdhvakeśīṃ sirālāṅgīṃ kapilākṣīṃ tamomayīm ।
yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācānām apy analpabhayapradām ।। 

darīrandhralasatsvāsyāṃ vātajhāṅkārabhīṣaṇām ।
musulolūkhalālātāṃ halaśūrpakaśekharām ।। 

sphurantīm iva kalpānte vaiḍūryaśikharisthalīm ।
hāsaghaṭṭitaviśveśāṃ kālarātrīm ivoditām ।। 

ghanavyomāṭavīṃ sābhrāṃ kṛtadehām ivāgatām ।
śarīriṇīṃ mahābhrāḍhyāṃ yāminīm iva māṃsalām ।। 

śarīrasanniveśena paṅkapīṭhīm ivotthitām ।
tanuṃ candrārkayuddhāya tamaseva samāśritām ।। 

indranīlataṭaśvabhralambābhrayugalopamau ।
ulūkhalādihālāḍhyau dadhānām asitau stanau ।। 

nagnām aṅgārakāśena samālabdhamahātanum ।
drumābhāspadasamiralaladbhujalatātanum ।। 

tām avekṣya mahāvīrau tathaivākṣubhitau sthitau ।
na tad asti vimohāya yad viviktasya cetasaḥ ।। 

mantrī

mahārākṣasi saṃrambho hāsātmā kim ayaṃ tava ।
laghavo hy atha vā nāryo lāghave apy atisambhramāḥ ।। 

tyaja saṃrambham ārambho nāyaṃ tava virājate ।
viṣaye hi pravartante dhīmantas svārthasādhakāḥ ।। 

tvādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi maṣikānām ivābale ।
asmākaṃ vāsanāvātyāvyūḍhāni tṛṇaparṇavat ।। 

saṃrambhajvaram utsṛjya samayā svasthayā dhiyā ।
yuktyā ca vyavahāriṇyā so arthaḥ prājñena sādhyate ।। 

svenaiva vyavahāreṇa kāryaṃ sidhyatu māthavā ।
mahāniyatinītyaiva bhramasyāvasaro hi kaḥ ।। 

kathayābhimataṃ kiṃ te kim arthayasi vārthinī ।
arthī svapne api nāsmākam aprāptārthaḥ purogataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktā sā tadā tena cintayām āsa rākṣasī ।
aho nu vimalācāraṃ sattvaṃ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ ।। 

na sāmānyāv imau manye citraiveyaṃ camatkṛtiḥ ।
vacovaktrekṣaṇāny eva vadanty antarviniścayam ।। 

vacovaktrekṣitadvārair dhīmatām āśayā mithaḥ ।
ekībhavanti saritāṃ payāṃsi valanair iva ।। 

ābhyāṃ prāyaḥ parijñāto mama bhāvo anayor mayā ।
na vināśyau mayemau vā svayam evāvināśinau ।। 

manye bhavata ātmajñau nātmajñānād ṛte matiḥ ।
pramṛṣṭasadasadbhāvā bhavaty astabhayā mṛteḥ ।। 

tad etau paripṛcchāmi kañcit sandeham utthitam ।
prāpyaṃ prāpya na pṛcchanti ye kiñcit te narādhamāḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya pṛcchāyai tan nānāvasaraṃ tatam ।
akālakalpābhraravaṃ hāsaṃ saṃyamya sābravīt ।। 

kau bhavantau narau vīrau kathyatām iti me anaghau ।
jāyate darśanād eva maitrī viṣadacetasām ।। 

mantrī

ayaṃ rājā kirātānām asyāhaṃ mantritāṃ gataḥ ।
udyatau rātricāreṇa tvādṛgjanavinigrahe ।। 

rājño rātrindinaṃ dharmo duṣṭabhūtavinigrahaḥ ।
svadharmatyāgino ye tu te vināśānalendhanam ।। 

rākṣasī

rājñas tvam asi durmantrī durmantritvād arāḍ ayam ।
sadbhūpasya bhaven mantrī rājā sanmantriṇā bhavet ।। 

rājaivādau vivekena yojanīyas sumantriṇā ।
tenāryatām upāyāti yathā rājā tathā prajāḥ ।। 

samagraguṇajālānām adhyātmajñānam uttamam ।
tadvad rājā bhaved rājā tadvan mantrī ca mantravit ।। 

prabhutvaṃ samadṛṣṭitvaṃ tac ca syād rājavidyayā ।
tām eva yo na jānāti nāsau mantrī na so adhipaḥ ।। 

bhavantau tadvidau sādhū yadi tac chreya āpsyathaḥ ।
no ced anarthadau svasyāḥ prakṛter nādmy ahaṃ yuvām ।। 

ekopāyena matpārśvād bālakāv uttariṣyathaḥ ।
matpraśnapañjaraṃ sāraṃ ced vicārayatho dhiyā ।। 

praśnāni māṃ kathaya pārthiva nātha mantrinn atrārthinī bhṛśam ahaṃ paripūrayārtham ।
aṅgīkṛtārtham adadat ka ivāsti loke doṣeṇa saṅkṣayakareṇa na yujyate yaḥ ।। 

rākṣasīvicāro nāma sargaḥ

ekonāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā rākṣasī praśnān sā vaktum upacakrame ।
ucyatām iti rājñokte tān imāñ śṛṇu rāghava ।। 

rākṣasī

ekasyānekasaṅkhyasya kasyāṇor ambudher iva ।
antar brahmāṇḍalakṣāṇi līyante budbudā iva ।। 

kim ākāśam anākāśaṃ nakiñcit kiñcid eva kim ।
ko aham evāpi sampannaḥ ko bhavān apy ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

gacchan na gacchati ca kaḥ ko atiṣṭhann eva tiṣṭhati ।
kaś cetano api pāṣāṇaḥ kaś cidvyomani citrakṛt ।। 

vahnitām ajahac caiva kaś ca vahnir na dāhakaḥ ।
avahner jāyate vahniḥ kasmād rājan nirantaram ।। 

acandrārkāgnitāro api ko avināśaḥ prakāśakaḥ ।
anetralabhyāt kasmāc ca prakāśaś ca pravartate ।। 

latāgulmāṅkurādīnāṃ jātyandhānāṃ tathaiva ca ।
anyeṣām apy anakṣāṇām ālokaḥ ka ivottamaḥ ।। 

janakaḥ ko ambarādīnāṃ sattāyāḥ kas svabhāvadaḥ ।
ko jagadratnakośas syāt kasya kośe maṇer jagat ।। 

ko aṇus tamaḥ prakāśaś ca ko aṇur asti ca nāsti ca ।
ko aṇur dūre apy adūre ca ko aṇur eva mahāgiriḥ ।। 

nimeṣa eva kaḥ kalpaḥ kaḥ kalpo api nimeṣakaḥ ।
kiṃ pratyakṣam asadrūpaṃ kiṃ cetanam acetanam ।। 

kaś cāvāyuś ca vāyuś ca kaś śabdo aśabda eva ca ।
kas sarvaṃ ca nakiñcid ca ko ahaṃ nāhaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet ।। 

kiṃ prayatnaśataprāptaṃ labdhvāpi bahujanmabhiḥ ।
labdhaṃ nakiñcid bhavati nanu sarvaṃ ca labhyate ।। 

svasthena jīvataivoccaiḥ kena svātmāpahāritaḥ ।
kenāṇunāntar vriyate merus tribhuvanaṃ tṛṇam ।। 

kenāṇukaṇamātreṇa pūritā śatayojanī ।
ko aṇur eva bhavan māti na yojanaśateṣv api ।। 

kenālokanamātreṇa jagadbālaḥ pranāṭyate ।
kasyāṇor antare santi kulāvanibhṛtāṃ ghaṭāḥ ।। 

aṇutvam ajahat ko aṇur meros sthūlatarākṛtiḥ ।
vālāgraśatabhāgātmā ko aṇur uccaiś śiloccayaḥ ।। 

ko aṇuḥ prakāśatamasor dīpaḥ prakaṭanapradaḥ ।
kasyāṇor antare santi samagrānubhavāṇavaḥ ।। 

ko aṇur atyantanissvādur api saṃsvadate bhṛśam ।
kena santyajatā sarvam aṇunā sarvam āśritam ।। 

kenātmācchādanāśakter aṇunācchāditaṃ jagat ।
jagan nayena kasyāṇos sadbhūtam abhijīvati ।। 

ajātāvayavaḥ ko aṇus sahasrakaralocanaḥ ।
ko nimeṣo mahākalpo mahākalpaśatāni vā ।। 

aṇau jaganti tiṣṭhanti kasmin bīja iva drumāḥ ।
bījādyāni phalāntāni sphuṭāny anuditāny api ।। 

kalpaḥ kasya nimeṣasya jīvasyevāntare sthitaḥ ।
kaḥ prayojakakartṛtvam apy anāśritya kārakaḥ ।। 

dṛśyasampattaye draṣṭāpy ātmānaṃ dṛśyatāṃ nayet ।
dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ ko na paśyati netravat ।। 

antargalitadṛśyaṃ ca ka ātmānam akhaṇḍitam ।
dṛśyāsampattaye paśyan puro dṛśyaṃ na paśyati ।। 

ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ ko bhāsayati dṛśyavat ।
kaṭakādīni hemneva nigīrṇaṃ kena ca trayam ।। 

kasmān na kiñcic ca pṛthag ūrmyādīva mahāmbhasaḥ ।
kasyecchayā pṛthak cāsti vīciteva mahāmbhasaḥ ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnād ekasmād asatas sataḥ ।
dvaitam apy apṛthak kasmād dravateva mahāmbhasaḥ ।। 

ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ sad asac ca gatakramam ।
ko antarbījam ivāṅgasthaṃ sthitaḥ kṛtvā trikālagam ।। 

bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyasthaṃ jagadvṛndaṃ bṛhadbhramam ।
nityaṃ samasya kasyāntar bījasyāntar iva drumaḥ ।। 

bījaṃ drumatayaivāśu drumo bījatayaiva ca ।
svayam ekam asadrūpam udety anudito api kaḥ ।। 

bisatantur mahāmerur bho rājan yadapekṣayā ।
tasya kasyodare santi merumandarakoṭayaḥ ।। 

kenedam ātatam anekacid eva viśvaṃ kiṃsāra evam abhivalgasi haṃsi pāsi ।
kiṃdarśanena na bhavasy atha vā sad eva nūnaṃ bhavasy asamadṛg vada tatpraśāntyai ।। 

eṣo asau pragalatu saṃśayo mamoccaiś cittaśrīmukhamihikāmalānulepaḥ ।
yasyāgre na galati saṃśayas samūlo naivāsau kvacid api paṇḍitoktim eti ।। 

enaṃ me yadi na nayiṣyathaḥ kramoktyā saṃśāntiṃ laghutarasaṃśayaṃ subuddhī ।
tad rakṣojaṭharahutāśanendhanatvaṃ nirvighnaṃ jhagiti gamiṣyathaḥ kṣaṇena ।। 

paścāt tāṃ janapadamaṇḍalīṃ samantād bhāvatkīm urujaṭharā kṣaṇād grase aham ।
evaṃ te bhavati surājateva manye mūrkhānām atirasa eva saṅkṣayāya ।। 

ity uktvā vipulagabhīrameghanāda prollāsaprakaṭagirā niśācarī sā ।
tūṣṇīm apy ativikaṭākṛtis tadāsīc chuddhāntaśśaradamalābhramaṇḍalīva ।। 

rākṣasīpraśno nāma sargaḥ

āśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahāniśi mahāraṇye mahārākṣasakanyayā ।
iti prokte mahāpraśne mahāmantrī giraṃ dadau ।। 

mantrī

śṛṇu toyadasaṅkāśe praśnam enaṃ bhinadmi te ।
anukramātmakaṃ mattaṃ gajendram iva kesarī ।। 

bhavatyā paramātmaiṣa kathitaḥ kamalekṣaṇe ।
anayaiva vacobhaṅgyā brahmavidbodhayogyayā ।। 

anākhyatvād agamyatvān manasām apy agocaraḥ ।
cinmātram evam ātmāṇur ākāśād api sūkṣmakaḥ ।। 

cidaṇoḥ paramasyāntas sad evāsad iva sthitam ।
sattāpy evam asatteva sphuratīdaṃ jagat sthitam ।। 

sa kiñcidanubhūtitvāt sargātmakatayā sthitaḥ।
tadātmakatayā pūrvaṃ bhāvasattāṃ kilāgataḥ ।। 

atīndriyatvān no kiñcit sa evāṇur anantakaḥ ।
sarvātmakatvād bhuṅkte ca tena kiñcin na kiñcana ।। 

cidaṇoḥ pratibhāsāt svād ekasyānekatoditā ।
asatyaivāpi satyeva hemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā ।। 

eṣo aṇuḥ paramākāśas sūkṣmaḥ khād apy alakṣitaḥ ।
manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātītas sthitas sarvātmako api san ।। 

sarvātmakas syān naivāsau śūnyo bhavati karhicit ।
yad asti na tad astīti vaktonmatta iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

kayācid api yuktyeha sato asattvaṃ na yujyate ।
sarvātmā khātaguptena karpūreṇeva darśyate ।। 

cinmātrāṇus sa eveha sarvaṃ kiñcid ghanaṃ sthitaḥ ।
na kiñcid indriyātītarūpatvād amalas sthitaḥ ।। 

sa eva caiko anekaś ca sarvasattātmavedanāt ।
sa evedaṃ jagad dhatte jagatkoṭīs tathaiva ca ।। 

imāś cittvamahāmbhodhes trijagajjalavīcayaḥ ।
prajās tasmin kacanty apsu dravatvāc cakratā iva ।। 

cittendriyādyalabhyatvāt so aṇuś śūnyaṃ kharūpadhṛt ।
svasaṃvedanalabhyatvād aśūnyaṃ vyomarūpy api ।। 

so ahaṃ bhavann eva bhavāt sampanno dvaitavedanāt ।
bhavān bhavann ahaṃ jāto bodhabṛṃhābṛhadvapuḥ ।। 

tvattāhantātmakaṃ sarvaṃ vinigīryāvabodhataḥ ।
na tvaṃ nāhaṃ na sarvaṃ vāsarvaṃ vā bhavati svayam ।। 

gacchan na gacchaty eṣo aṇur yojanaughagato api san ।
saṃvittyā yojanaughatvaṃ tasyāṇor antare sthitam ।। 

na gacchaty eṣa yāto api samprāpto api na cāgataḥ ।
svasattākāśakośe antar vāsitvād deśakālayoḥ ।। 

gamyaṃ yasya śarīrasthaṃ kva kilāsau prayāti hi ।
kucakoṭaragaḥ putraḥ kiṃ mātrānyatra vīkṣyate ।। 

gamyo yasya mahādeśo yāvatsambhavam akṣayaḥ ।
antassthas sarvakartuś ca sa kathaṃ kveva gacchati ।। 

yathā deśāntaraprāpte kumbhe vaktrasumudrite ।
tadākāśasya gamanāgamau na stas tathātmanaḥ ।। 

cititāsthāṇute asyāntar yadā sto anubhavātmike ।
cetanaś ca jaḍaś caiva tadāsau dvayam eva hi ।। 

yadā cetanapāṣāṇasattaikātmaiva cidvapuḥ ।
tadā cetana evāsau pāṣāṇa iva rākṣasi ।। 

parame vyomny anādyante cinmātraparamāṇunā ।
vicitraṃ trijagac citraṃ tenedam akṛtaṃ kṛtam ।। 

tatsaṃvittyā vahnisattā tenātyaktānalākṛtiḥ ।
sarvago apy adahann eva sa jagaddravyapācakaḥ ।। 

ajvalan bhāsurākārān nirmalād gaganād api ।
prajvalaṃś cetanaikātmā tasmād agniḥ prajāyate ।। 

saṃvedanād anarkādiḥ pradhāne sa prakāśakaḥ ।
na naśyaty ādyabhārūpo mahākalpāmbudair api ।। 

anetralabhyo anubhavarūpo hṛdgṛhadīpakaḥ ।
sarvasattāprado anantaḥ prakāśas sa paras smṛtaḥ ।। 

pravartate asmād āloko manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātigāt ।
yenāntar api vastūnāṃ dṛśyādṛśyacamatkṛtiḥ ।। 

latāgulmāṅkurādīnām anakṣāṇāṃ ca so aṇukaḥ ।
utsedhavedanākāraḥ prakāśo anubhavātmakaḥ ।। 

kālākāśakriyāsattāsvabhāvānāṃ svavedanāt ।
svāmī kartā pitā bhoktā khātmatvāc ca na kiñcana ।। 

aṇutvam ajahat so aṇur jagadratnasamudgakaḥ ।
mātṛmānaprameyātmā jagat tatrāsti vedane ।। 

sa eva sarvajagati sarvatra kacati sphuṭam ।
yadā jagat samudge asmiṃs tadāsau paramo maṇiḥ ।। 

durbodhatvāt tamas so aṇuś cinmātratvāt prakāśadṛk ।
so asti saṃvittirūpatvāt tadakṣātītayā tv asat ।। 

dūre asau nākṣalabhyatvāc cidrūpatvād adūragaḥ ।
sarvasaṃvedanāc chailā asāv evāṇur eva san ।। 

tat saṃvedanamātraṃ yat tad idaṃ bhāsate jagat ।
na satyam asti śailādi tenāṇāv eva merutā ।। 

nimeṣapratibhāso hi nimeṣa iti kathyate ।
kalpaikapratibhāso hi kalpaśabdena kathyate ।। 

kalpakriyāvilāso hi nimeṣe pratibhāsate ।
bahuyojanavistīrṇaṃ manasīva mahāpuram ।। 

nimeṣajaṭhare kalpasaṃrambhas samudeti hi ।
mahānagaranirmāṇaṃ makure antar ivāmale ।। 

nimeṣakalpaśailābdhipurayojanakoṭayaḥ ।
yatrāṇāv eva vidyante tatra dvaitaikate kutaḥ ।। 

kṛtavān prāg idam aham iti buddhāv udeti hi ।
kṣaṇāt satyam asatyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntassvapnavibhramāḥ ।। 

duḥkhe kālas sudīrgho hi sukhe laghutaras sadā ।
rātrir dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandrasya coditā ।। 

niścayo ya udety antas satyo vāsatya eva vā ।
hemnīva kaṭakāditvam ūrmis sindhau virājate ।। 

na nimeṣo asti no kalpo nādūraṃ na ca dūratā ।
cidaṇupratibhaivevaṃ sthitānanyānyavastuvat ।। 

prakāśatamasor dūrādūrayoḥ kṣaṇakalpayoḥ ।
ekacitkośayor evaṃ na bhedo asti manāg api ।। 

pratyakṣam akṣasāratvād apratyakṣaṃ tato atigam ।
dṛśyatvenaiva codeti vitvād draṣṭaiva sadvapuḥ ।। 

yāvat kaṭakasaṃvittis tāvan nāsty eva hematā ।
yāvac ca dṛśyatāpattis tāvan nāsty eva sā kalā ।। 

kaṭakatve kṣate dṛśye suvarṇatvam ivātatam ।
kevalaṃ nirmalaṃ buddhaṃ brahmaiva pariśiṣyate ।। 

sarvatvād eṣa sadrūpo durlakṣyatvād asadvapuḥ ।
cetanaś cetanātmatvāc cetyāsambhavatas tv acit ।। 

ciccamatkāramātrātmany asmiṃs tatpratibhātmani ।
jagaty anilavṛkṣābhe ciccetyakalane kutaḥ ।। 

yathā tapasy apīnasya bhāsanaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā ।
ekaṃ pīvaram advaitaṃ tathā cidbhāsanaṃ jagat ।। 

arkāṃśusūkṣmatarabhānirmāṇaṃ yad anāmayam ।
astitānāstite tatra kuḍyāder iva kaiva dhīḥ ।। 

māyāpāṃsukaṇāṅke khe yathā kacati kāñcanam ।
tathā jagad idaṃ bhāti ciccetyakalane kutaḥ ।। 

svapnagandharvasaṅkalpanagare kuḍyavedanam ।
na san nāsad yathā tadvad viddhi dīrghabhramaṃ jagat ।। 

tathā caivaṃvidhanyāyabhāvanābhyāsanirmalāḥ ।
kuḍyākāśena niryānti yathābhūtārthadarśinaḥ ।। 

na kuḍyākāśayor bhedo dṛḍhasaṃvedanād ṛte ।
ā brahmajīvakalanād yad rūḍhaṃ rūḍham eva tat ।। 

pratibhāsāmalākāśe khatvakuḍyatvaśūnyatāḥ ।
prakacanti ghanībhāvāt prabhāpiṇḍa iva prabhāḥ ।। 

pṛthaktā pratibhāsasya svacamatkārayogataḥ ।
sarvātmikā hi pratibhā parā vṛkṣātmabījavat ।। 

bījam antassthavṛkṣatvaṃ nānānānā yathaikadṛk ।
tathāsaṅkhyaṃ jagad brahma śāntam ākāśakośavat ।। 

bījasyāntassthavṛkṣasya vyomādvaitā sthitir yathā ।
brahmaṇo antassthajagato vyomākṣubdhā sthitis tathā ।। 

śāntaṃ samastam ajam ekam anādimadhyaṃ nehāsti kācana kalā kalanāḥ kathañcit ।
nirdvandvaśāntam atirekam anekam accham ābhāsarūpam alam ekavikāsam āssva ।। 

praśnabhedo nāma sargaḥ

ekāśītitamas sargaḥ

rākṣasī

aho nu paramārthoktiḥ pāvanī tava mantriṇaḥ ।
rājā rājīvapattrākṣa idānīm eṣa bhāṣatām ।। 

rājā

eṣo aṇuvedanād vāyur vāyuś ca bhrāntidṛṣṭitaḥ ।
tato na kiñcid vāyvādi kevalaṃ śuddhacetanam ।। 

śabdasaṃvedanāc chabdaś śabdaś ca bhrāntidarśanam ।
tato atra śabdaśabdārthadṛṣṭir dūrataraṃ gatā ।। 

so aṇus sarvaṃ nakiñcic ca so ahaṃ nāhaṃ sa eva ca ।
sarvaśaktyātmano asyaiva pratibhaivātra kāraṇam ।। 

ātmā yatnaśataiḥ prāpyo labdhe asmin na ca kiñcana ।
labdhaṃ bhavati tac caitat paramaṃ nāma kiñcana ।। 

tāvaj janmavasanteṣu saṃsṛtivratatiś ciram ।
vikasaty udito yāvan na bodho mūlakāṣakṛt ।। 

aṇunānena rūpaṃ svaṃ dṛśyatām iva gacchatā ।
tāpenāmbu dhiyaiveva svasthenaivāpahāritam ।। 

anena saṃvidaṃ nānā merus tribhuvanaṃ tṛṇam ।
vamitvā bahir antassthaṃ māyātmakam avekṣyate ।। 

cidaṇor antare yad yad asti tad dṛśyate bahiḥ ।
saṅkalpeṣṭāliṅganādi dṛṣṭānto atra hi rāgiṇaḥ ।। 

ādisarge sarvaśaktiś cid yathā coditātmanā ।
tathāśu paśyaty akhilaṃ saṅkalpamativat svataḥ ।। 

abhijātāśayasyāntar yad yathā pratibhāsate ।
tat tathā paśyatīvāsau dṛṣṭānto atra śiśor manaḥ ।। 

paramāṇuta evāpi cinmātreṇāmunāṇunā ।
parisūkṣmatamenaiva viśvag viśvaṃ prapūritam ।। 

aṇur eva na māty eṣa yojanānāṃ śateṣv api ।
sarvagatvād anādyantarūpatvād vedanākṛtiḥ ।। 

yathā dhūrtena śiḍgena puṃsā bālaḥ pranāṭyate ।
sabhrūvikāranayananirīkṣaṇaviceṣṭitaiḥ ।। 

cidālokena śuddhena saparvatatṛṇaṃ jagat ।
nāṭyate avirataṃ tadvad vivṛtyābhinayaṃ sadā ।। 

tenaivānantarūpatvād aṇunā vāsasā yathā ।
saṃvidantar bhaved bāhye kṛtvā mervādi veṣṭitam ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvān meruto bṛhat ।
vālāgraśatabhāgātmāpy eṣa sūkṣmaḥ paro aṇukaḥ ।। 

śuddhasaṃvedanākāśarūpasya paramāṇunā ।
śobhate na hi sāmyoktir merusarṣapayor iva ।। 

māyākalāparāṇutvaṃ nirmāyā paramātmatā ।
hemnīva kaṭakatvena nāto atra samatā bhavet ।। 

prakaṭo anena dīpena prakāśo anubhavātmanā ।
svasattānāśapūrvo hi vinānena bhavet tu saḥ ।। 

yadi sūryādikaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ekajaḍaṃ bhavet ।
tataḥ kim ātmā kiṃ rūpaṃ prakāśas syāt kva vātha kim ।। 

śuddhacinmātrasattvaṃ yat svatas svātmani saṃsthitam ।
tad etad aṇunā tejo dṛṣṭaṃ bahir iva sthitam ।। 

tejāṃsy arkenduvahnīnām abhinnāni tamoghanāt ।
etāvān atra bhedo asti yad varṇe śauklyakṛṣṇate ।। 

yādṛk kajjalanīhārameghanīhārayor bhavet ।
tādṛk prakāśatamasor bhedaś ceti tayos sthitaḥ ।। 

jaḍayor upalambhāya cidādityaḥ kilaitayoḥ ।
yadā tapati tenaite labdhasattaikatāṃ gate ।। 

tapaty ekaś cidādityo rātrindivam atandritaḥ ।
antar bahiś śilādyantar apy anastamayodayaḥ ।। 

trilokī bhāti teneyaṃ jīvasya prathitātmanaḥ ।
nānopalambhabhāṇḍāḍhyā kuṭī kaṭhinakoṭarā ।। 

tamastvaṃ tamaso deham avināśayatāmunā ।
tapyate bhāsayā bhāsā sarvam ābhāsyate tamaḥ ।। 

padmotpalau yathārkeṇa tapatā prakaṭīkṛtau ।
prakāśatamasos satte citaivaṃ prakaṭīkṛte ।। 

arkaḥ kurvann ahorātraṃ darśayaty ākṛtiṃ yathā ।
citis sadasatī kṛtvā darśayaty ākṛtiṃ tathā ।। 

cidaṇor antare santi vicitrānubhavāṇavaḥ ।
yathā madhurasasyāntaḥ pattrapuṣpaphalaśriyaḥ ।। 

udyanti cidaṇor ete samagrānubhavāṇavaḥ ।
madhumāsarasāc citrā iva ṣaṇḍaparamparāḥ ।। 

paramātmāṇur atyantaṃ nissvādas sūkṣmatāvaśāt ।
samagrasvādasattaikajanakas svadate svayam ।। 

yo yo nāma rasaḥ kaścit svasattāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ ।
pratibimbam ivādarśe tāṃ vinā nāsty asau svataḥ ।। 

tyajatā saṃśritaṃ sarvaṃ cinmātraparamāṇunā ।
tyaktaṃ jagad asaṃvittyā saṃvittyā sarvam āśritam ।। 

aśaktayāpy ātmaguptau sarvam ācchāditaṃ jagat ।
citāṇutām eva parāṃ samprasārya vitānavat ।। 

ātmaguptiṃ na śaknoti paramātmāmbarākṛtiḥ ।
manāg api kṣaṇam api gajo dūrvāvane yathā ।। 

tathāpy ākrāntavān viśvaṃ jñatāṃ gopayati kṣaṇāt ।
jagaddhānāṃ kaṇaṃ bāla ivāho ghanamāyitā ।। 

cinmātrāṇunayenedaṃ jagat samabhijīvati ।
vasantarasavedhena vicitreva vanāvalī ।। 

citsattaiveyam akhilaṃ svato jagad ivoditā ।
madhumāsarasollāsī citro hi vanaṣaṇḍakaḥ ।। 

satyaṃ cinmayam evedaṃ jagad ity eva viddhy alam ।
vasantarasam evedaṃ viddhi pallavagulmakam ।। 

sarvāvayavisāratvāt sahasrakaralocanaḥ ।
paraṃāṇur asāv eva nityānavayavodayaḥ ।। 

nimeṣāṃśāvabodhe api cidaṇoḥ pratibhāsate ।
yataḥ kalpasahasraughas svapnavārddhakabālyavat ।। 

tatas so apy nimeṣāṇuḥ kalpakoṭiśatāny alam ।
sarvasattāvilāsena pratibhaikā hi jṛmbhate ।। 

abhuktavaty eva yathā bhuktavān aham ity alam ।
jāyate pratyayas tadvan nimeṣe kalpaniścayaḥ ।। 

abhuktvā bhuktavān asmīty evaṃ pratyayaśālinaḥ ।
dṛśyante vāsanāviṣṭās svapne svamaraṇam yathā ।। 

jaganti paritiṣṭhanti paramāṇau cidātmani ।
pratibhāsāḥ pravartante tata eva hi jāgatāḥ ।। 

yad asti yatra tat tasmāt samudeti tad eva tat ।
ākāriṇi vikārādi dṛṣṭaṃ na gagane amale ।। 

citi bhūtāni bhūtāni vartamānāni samprati ।
bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyanti śaktibīje drumā iva ।। 

nimeṣakalpāv etena tuṣeṇānnakaṇāv iva ।
valitau naiṣa caitābhyām aṇus svāṅgātmakaś citaḥ ।। 

udāsīnavad āsīno na saṃspṛṣṭo manāg api ।
eṣa bhoktṛtvakartṛtvaiḥ khātmā kurvañ jaganty api ।। 

jagatsattoditeyaṃ hi śuddhacitparamāṇutaḥ ।
parāmaṇoś ca bhoktṛtvakartṛtve kveva saṃsthite ।। 

jagan na kiñcit kriyate sarvadaiva na kenacit ।
vilīyate ca no kiñcin mātrasyādy asya khaṇḍanam ।। 

sarvaṃ samarasābhāsam idam ākāśakośagam ।
jagatparyāyaśabdākhyaṃ viddhy anākhyaṃ ca rākṣasi ।। 

cidaṇur dṛśyasiddhyartham āntarīṃ ciccamatkṛtim ।
bahīrūpatayā dhatte svātmanātmani saṃsthitām ।। 

etad bahisstham antasstham asti śabde na vastuni ।
upadeśāya sattvānāṃ cidrūpatvāj jagattraye ।। 

draṣṭā dṛśyapadaṃ gacchann ātmānaṃ samprapaśyati ।
netraṃ dṛśyābhipātīva sad evāsad iva sthitam ।। 

na ca gacchati dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭā hy asad avāstavam ।
ātmany eva na yat kiñcit tattām eti kathaṃ puraḥ ।। 

dṛg eva locane sā ca vāsanā tan nijaṃ vapuḥ ।
bahurūpatayā dṛśyaṃ kṛtvā draṣṭṛtayoditā ।। 

na vinā draṣṭṛtām asti dṛśyasattā kathañcana ।
pitṛteva vinā putraṃ dvitevaikyapadaṃ vinā ।। 

draṣṭaiva dṛśyatām eti na draṣṭṛtvaṃ vināsti tat ।
vinā pitreva tanayo vinā bhoktreva bhogyatā ।। 

draṣṭur hi dṛśyanirmāṇe cittvād asty eva śaktatā ।
kanakasyāvadātasya kaṭakatvakṛtāv iva ।। 

dṛśyasya draṣṭṛnirmāṇe jaḍatvān nāsti śaktatā ।
kaṭakatvasya mohasya yathā kanakanirmitau ।। 

cetanād dṛśyanirmāṇaṃ cit kacaty asad eva yat ।
akāraṇaṃ mohahetur hemaiva kaṭakabhramaḥ ।। 

kaṭakatvāvabhāse hi yathā hemno na hematā ।
satyaiva prakacaty evaṃ draṣṭur dṛśyasthitau vapuḥ ।। 

draṣṭā dṛśyatayā tiṣṭhan draṣṭṛtām ujjhatīva hi ।
satyāṃ kaṭakasaṃvittau hema kāñcanatām iva ।। 

ekasmin pratibhāse asti na sattā draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ ।
pumpratyayaprakacane kva paśupratyayodayaḥ ।। 

dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā svaṃ prapaśyati ।
draṣṭur hi dṛśyatāpattau sattāsatteva tiṣṭhati ।। 

bodhād galitadṛśyasya draṣṭus sattaiva bhāsate ।
abuddhakaṭakatvasya hemnaḥ kanakatā yathā ।। 

dṛśye asaty asti na draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ draṣṭari nāsati ।
dvayena ca vinā naikyaṃ naikyam apy asti cānayoḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ yathāvad vijñāya śuddhasaṃvinmayātmanaḥ ।
vācām aviṣayas svāsthyaṃ kiñcid evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

ātmātha darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ dīpenevāvabhāsitam ।
kṛtaṃ ca sarvam etena cinmātraparamāṇunā ।। 

mātṛmeyapramāṇākhyaṃ buddhau nigirati trayam ।
hemeva kaṭakāditvam asanmayam upasthitam ।। 

yathā na jalam ūrmyādeḥ pṛthak kiñcin manāg api ।
tathaitasmāt svabhāvāṇor na kiñcit pṛthag eva hi ।। 

sarvagānubhavātmatvāt sarvānubhavarūpataḥ ।
ekatvānubhave nyāyye rūḍhe sarvaikatāsya hi ।। 

asyecchayā pṛthaktāsti vīciteva mahāmbhasaḥ ।
icchānurūpasampatter bhāvitārthaikalābhinaḥ ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnaḥ paramātmāsti kevalaḥ ।
sarvātmatvāt sa sarvātmā sarvānubhavatas svataḥ ।। 

sann eṣa cetanātmatvād asann anavabodhataḥ ।
dvaitaikye nātra vidyete satyarūpe mahātmani ।। 

yadi kaścid dvitīyas syāt tad ekasyaikatā bhavet ।
dvitvaikyayor mithas siddhir ātapacchāyayor iva ।। 

yatra nāsti dvitīyo hi tatraikasyaikatā katham ।
ekatāyām asiddhāyāṃ dvayam eva na vidyate ।। 

evaṃ sthite tu yac chiṣṭaṃ tat syād riktam ihāsthiteḥ ।
tasmān na vyatiriktaṃ tadrūpaṃ drava ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

nānārambhaviśālaṃ ca sāmyenākṣubdharūpi ca ।
bījasyāntas tarur iva brahmaṇo antas sthitaṃ jagat ।। 

dvaitam apy apṛthak tasmād dhemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā ।
sāmyabuddhāvabodhe hi dvaitaṃ sac ca nasanmayam ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasas spandanaṃ mātariśvanaḥ ।
vyomnaś śūnyatvam evaṃ hi na pṛthag dvaitam īśvarāt ।। 

dvaitādvaitopalambho hi duḥkhāyaiṣa kṣayātmane ।
nipuṇo anupalambho yas tv etayos tat paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

mātṛmānaprameyādi draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyatāḥ ।
etāvaj jagad etac ca paramāṇau citas sthitam ।। 

ayaṃ jagadaṇur nityam anenāṇusumeruṇā ।
spandanaṃ pavaneneva svāṅga eva dhṛtaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

aho nu bhīmā māyeyam atha vā māyitā parā ।
paramāṇvantar evāsti yat trailokyaparamparā ।। 

athāsambhavamāyitvam evaitat sarvadā sthitam ।
cinmātraparamāṇvantamātram eva jagat sthitam ।। 

antargatajagajjālo apy eṣo aṇus sāmyam atyajan ।
sthito antassthabṛhadvṛkṣaṃ bījaṃ bhāṇḍodare yathā ।। 

bīje antar vṛkṣavistāras sthitas saphalapallavaḥ ।
parayā dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā jagac ca cidaṇūdare ।। 

sa śākhāphalavṛkṣatvam ajahad bījakoṭare ।
yathā tarus sthitas tadvad vikāsi cidaṇau jagat ।। 

saṃsthitadvaitam advaitabījakośam iva sthitam ।
jagac citparamāṇvantar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

na dvaitaṃ na ca vādvaitaṃ na bījaṃ na ca vāṅkuraḥ ।
na sthūlaṃ na ca vā sūkṣmaṃ nājātaṃ jātam eva no ।। 

na cāsti na ca nāstīdaṃ na somyaṃ kṣubhitaṃ na ca ।
trijagaccidaṇor antas sattvaṃ vātha na kiñcana ।। 

na jagan nājagad vāsti vidyate citparāṇutā ।
sarvātmikā yadā yatra yā yathodeti tat tathā ।। 

udety anudito apy eṣa svasaṃvedanajṛmbhitaḥ ।
paramātmāṇur ekātmā samagrātmatayeva khe ।। 

drumībhūyeva bījatvam ivodety anudayy api ।
paraṃ tattvaṃ jagadbhaṅgyā jagannāśodayena ca ।। 

drumo bījatayevāśu na santyaktasamasthitiḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty apagataspandatyāgātyāgaḥ paro aṇukaḥ ।। 

bisatantur mahāmeruḥ parātmāṇor apekṣayā ।
dṛśyaḥ kila bise tantur adṛśyākṣṇā parātmatā ।। 

bisatantur mahāmeruḥ paramāṇoḥ kilātmanaḥ ।
tasyaiva tadghanāc cāntassthitā mervādikoṭayaḥ ।। 

etena tena mahatā paramāṇunā ca vyāptaṃ tataṃ viracitaṃ janitaṃ kṛtaṃ ca ।
viśvaprapañcaracanaṃ nabhaseva viṣvak śūnyatvam accham abhitaḥ parilabdham eva ।। 

dvaitena sundarataraṃ svam anujjhateva rūpaṃ suṣuptasadṛśena parāvabodhāt ।
aikyaṃ gataṃ sthitagamāgamamuktam evam itthaṃ sthitaṃ nanu jagat paramārthapiṇḍaḥ ।। 

jagatparamārthapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvyaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti rājamukhāc chrutvā karkaṭī vanamarkaṭī ।
avabuddhapadāntassthaṃ jahau mātsaryacāpalam ।। 

antaśśītalatāṃ toṣaṃ viśrāntim apatāpatām ।
prāptā prāvṛṇmayūrīva sajyotsneva kumudvatī ।। 

tayā rājagirā tasyā ānanda udabhūd bhṛśam ।
garbho antaḥ khe balākāyā raveṇeva payomucaḥ ।। 

rākṣasī

aho bata pavitreyaṃ bhavator bhāti śemuṣī ।
anastamitasāreṇa prabodhārkeṇa bhāsitā ।। 

sitā samarasā śuddhā jyotsneva śaśimaṇḍalāt ।
vivekakaṇikā dṛṣṭā bhavator hṛdayād iyam ।। 

vivekino jagatpūjyās sevyā manye bhavādṛśāḥ ।
tvatsaṅgāt savikāsāsmi candreṇeva kumudvatī ।। 

saurabhaṃ kusumāsaṅgād iva satsaṅgamāc chubham ।
pravartate arkasamparkād vikāso amburuhām iva ।। 

mahatām eva saṃsargāt punar duḥkhaṃ na bādhate ।
ko hi dīpaśikhāhastas tamasā paribhūyate ।। 

mayemau jaṅgale prāptau bhavantau bhūmibhāskarau ।
pūjanīyāv ataś śīghram īhitaṃ kathyatāṃ śubham ।। 

rājā

asmajjanapade rakṣaḥkulakānanamañjari ।
janasya bādhate atyarthaṃ sadā hṛdayaśūlanam ।। 

yadā sarvaiva janatā sadā dṛḍhaviṣūcikā ।
manmaṇḍale adya tenāhaṃ nirgato rātricaryayā ।। 

śūlāni hṛdaye nṝṇāṃ na śāmyanti yadauṣadhaiḥ ।
tadāhaṃ tvadvidhaproktamantrādyarthena nirgataḥ ।। 

tvādṛśasya ca lokasya mugdhalokābhighātinaḥ ।
nigrahārthaṃ pravṛttir me sā ca sampattim etv alam ।। 

etāvad eva ca śubhe nanv aṅgīkriyatāṃ tvayā ।
bhūyo bhavatyā yat prāṇā hiṃsanīyā na kasyacit ।। 

rākṣasī

bāḍham evaṃ karomy adyaprabhṛty avitathaṃ prabho ।
satyam evaṃ na kiñcid dhi hiṃsanīyaṃ mayādhunā ।। 

rājā

yady evaṃ phullapadmākṣi paradehaikabhojane ।
kiṃ syāc charīravṛttyā te sthitāyā matsamīhite ।। 

rākṣasī

ṣaḍbhir varṣaśatai rājan prabuddhāyās samādhitaḥ ।
jātabhojanasaṅkalpā bhojaneccheyam adya me ।। 

idānīṃ śikharaṃ gatvā tad eva dhyānaniścalā ।
yāvadicchaṃ sukhenāse sajīvā sālabhañjikā ।। 

āmṛtīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā dhārayāmi śarīrakam ।
yatheccham atha kālena tyakṣyāmīti matir mama ।। 

āśarīraparityāgam idānīṃ na mayā nṛpa ।
hiṃsanīyāḥ paraprāṇās tenedaṃ madvacaś śṛṇu ।। 

himavān nāma śailo asti rucā candrāṃśunirmalaḥ ।
ya uttarāśāhṛdaye spṛṣṭapūrvāparārṇavaḥ ।। 

tatrāhaṃ nivasāmy ugre hemaśṛṅgadarīgṛhe ।
āyasī stambhalekheva karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī ।। 

tapasā prārthito brahmā janatāmāraṇecchayā ।
viṣūcikā prāṇaharā syāṃ sūkṣmāsmīti vai mayā ।। 

tasmāt samprāptavarayā bahūn varṣagaṇān mayā ।
bhuktā viṣūcikātvena janatā jīvavedhanaiḥ ।। 

tvayā na guṇino hiṃsyā iti me brahmaṇā kṛtaḥ ।
niyamārthaṃ mahāmantras tadāyattāsmi saṃsthitā ।। 

so ayaṃ pragṛhyatāṃ tena sarvaṃ hṛdayaśūlanam ।
śamam eṣyati loke asmin kā kathā matkṛte bhrame ।। 

virataivāsmi hiṃsāto yat purā hiṃsitaṃ mayā ।
janasya hṛdayaṃ tena nāḍyo vaidhuryam āgatāḥ ।। 

hiṃsitvā raktamāṃsāni santyaktā ye mayā janāḥ ।
tebhyo vidhuranāḍibhyo ye jātās te api tādṛśāḥ ।। 

rājan viṣūcikāmantras so ayaṃ sampanna eva te ।
na hi sattvavatām asti dussādhyam iha kiñcana ।। 

ato durnāḍikośeṣu śūlānāṃ pariśāntaye ।
mantro yo brāhmaṇā prokto rājañ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇa tam ।। 

āgaccha nikaṭaṃ nadyā gacchāmas tatra bhūpate ।
svācāntābhyāṃ saṃyatābhyāṃ bhavadbhyāṃ suvratā dade ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti tasyāṃ tadā rātryāṃ rākṣasīmantribhūbhṛtaḥ ।
jagmus te saritas tīraṃ mithassañjātasauhṛdāḥ ।। 

anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ rākṣasyās sauhṛdaṃ tathā ।
jñātvā sthitau tau svācāntāv ubhāv ante nivāsinau ।। 

tayā brahmopadiṣṭo asau tatas tābhyāṃ yathākramam ।
snehād viṣūcikāmantraḥ pradatto japasiddhidaḥ ।। 

tatas sañjātasauhārdau tau visṛjya niśācarī ।
yadā gantuṃ pravṛttāsau tadā rājābravīd vacaḥ ।। 

rājā

gurus tvaṃ nau mahādevi vayasyā ca sunirvṛtā ।
nimantrayāvahe yatnāt tvām ambhoruhasundari ।। 

na prārthanāṃ tathāsmākaṃ vitathīkartum arhasi ।
sauhārdaṃ sujanānāṃ hi darśanād eva vardhate ।। 

laghusaubhāgyasaṃyuktaṃ kṛtvākāraṃ manoharam ।
āgacchāsmadgṛhaṃ bhavyā tatra tiṣṭha yathāsukham ।। 

rākṣasī

mugdhastrīrūpadhāriṇyai dātuṃ śaknoṣi bhojanam ।
