santarpayasi māṃ kena rākṣasīrūpadhāriṇīm ।। 

rakṣo'nnam eva me tuṣṭyai na sāmānyajanāśanam ।
pūrvasiddhas svabhāvo ayam ā sargāntād vivardhate ।। 

rājā

hemasragdāmavalitā dināni katicid gṛhe ।
mama strīrūpiṇī tiṣṭha yāvadiccham anindite ।। 

tato duṣkṛtinaś caurān vadhyāñ śatasahasraśaḥ ।
maṇḍalebhyas samānīya dade tubhyaṃ subhojane ।। 

kāntārūpaṃ parityajya gṛhītvā rākṣasaṃ vapuḥ ।
ādāya vadhyāñ śataśaḥ puruṣāṃs tān svasañcitān ।। 

nayasva himavacchṛṅgaṃ tatra bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham ।
mahāśanānām ekānte bhojanaṃ hi sukhāyate ।। 

suptā nidrāṃ parityajya bhava bhūyas samādhibhāk ।
samādhiviratā bhūyo apy āgatya punar anyadā ।। 

neṣyasy anyān vadhyanarān hiṃsā naiṣā ca dharmataḥ ।
svadharmeṇa ca hiṃsaiva mahākaruṇayā samā ।। 

tvaṃ sameṣyasi cāvaśyaṃ māṃ samādhivirāmiṇī ।
asatām api saṃrūḍhaṃ sauhārdaṃ na nivartate ।। 

rākṣasī

yuktam uktaṃ tvayā rājan karomy evam ahaṃ sakhe ।
sauhārdena pravṛttasya ko vākyaṃ nābhinandati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā rākṣasī tatra sampannā sā vilāsinī ।
hārakeyūrakaṭakapaṭṭasragdāmadhāriṇī ।। 

rājann āgaccha gacchāma ity uktvā nṛpamantriṇau ।
agre gantuṃ pravṛttau tau rātrāv anusasāra sā ।। 

atha te pārthivagṛhaṃ prāpya tāṃ rajanīṃ mithaḥ ।
kathayaikagṛhe ramye kṣapayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

prabhāte antaḥpure tasthau purandhrijanalīlayā ।
rākṣasī mantrirājānau svavyāpārau babhūvatuḥ ।। 

tato divasaṣaṭkena sañcitāni mahībhṛtā ।
nṛpāntarapurebhyo api svamaṇḍalagaṇāt tathā ।। 

trīṇi vadhyasahasrāṇi tāni tasyai tadādadau ।
sā babhūva niśākāle saivogrā kṛṣṇā rākṣasī ।। 

tāni vadhyasahasrāṇi jagrāha bhujamaṇḍale ।
dhārānikarajālāni meghamāleva koṭare ।। 

yayau rājānam āpṛcchya tad eva himavacchiraḥ ।
daridrā labdhahemeva gṛham ugraśarīriṇī ।। 

tatrā tṛpter bhṛśaṃ bhuktvā sukhaṃ suptvā dinadvayam ।
āsīt prabuddhā susvacchā sā samādhivatī punaḥ ।। 

pañcabhir vā tribhir vāpi varṣais sā samprabudhyati ।
tat tato maṇḍalaṃ yāti tena rājñā ca pūjyate ।। 

tatra viśrambhagarbhābhiḥ kathābhiḥ kañcid eva sā ।
sthitvā kālaṃ gṛhītvā tān vadhyān svāspadam ety atha ।। 

jīvanmuktatayaivam eva vipine sādyāpi rakṣo'ṅganā ।
tasminn eva girau sthitā vigalitadhyānaikatānāśayā ।। 

tasmin rājani śāntim āgatavati tyaktaiṣaṇenātmanā ।
tadrāṣṭrādhipasauhṛdais svakavalān āsvādayantī ciram ।। 

rākṣasīsauhārdaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tryaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kirātamaṇḍale tasmin ye ye santi mahībhṛtaḥ ।
tais tais saha parā maitrī tasyās samabhijāyate ।। 

sarvāṃs tatra mahotpātān piśācādibhayāny api ।
rogāṃś ca yogasiddhā sā nivārayati rākṣasī ।। 

bahuvarṣagaṇair naiṣā dhyānād viratim āgatā ।
tatrāgatya samaśnāti vadhyāñ jantūn susañcitān ।। 

adyāpi tatra ye vadhyās te tadarthaṃ mahībhujā ।
dīyante mitrasammāne ke hi nādhyavasāyinaḥ ।। 

tasyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ kirātajanamaṇḍale ।
anāyāntyāṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ janadoṣapraśāntaye ।। 

sā devī kandarānāmnī maṅgaletaranāmikā ।
samprasthāpitā proccaiḥ pure gahanakoṭare ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti tatrānyo yo yo bhavati bhūmipaḥ ।
sa kandarāṃ bhagavatīṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati svayam ।। 

yaḥ kandarāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vā na karoti nṛpo adhamaḥ ।
tasyopatāpanicayāḥ prajā nighnanti yatnataḥ ।। 

tatpūjanād avāpnoti janas tatrepsitaṃ phalam ।
svabhāvanāvaśocchūnam anarthāyāprapūjanam ।। 

vadhyalokopacāreṇa sā devī paripūjyate ।
pratimāyāṃ sthitādyāpi cittasthaphaladāyinī ।। 

sakalalokasamaṅgalakāriṇī kavalitākhilavadhyamahājanā ।
jayati sātra kirātajanāspadā paramabodhavatī ciradevatā ।। 

sūcyupākhyānaṃ samāptaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te kathitaṃ sarvam upākhyānam aninditam ।
karkaṭyā vanarākṣasyā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

himavadgahvaraproktā sā kathaṃ kṛṣṇarākṣasī ।
kathaṃ ca karkaṭī nāmnā yathāvad vada me prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kulāni santy anekāni rākṣasānāṃ svabhāvataḥ ।
tāni kṛṣṇāni śuklāni haritāny ujjvalāni ca ।। 

karkaṭaprāṇisadṛśaḥ karkaṭo nāma rākṣasaḥ ।
babhūva tajjā sā kṛṣṇā karkaṭī karkaṭākṛtiḥ ।। 

karkaṭīpraśnasaṃsmṛtyā mayaiṣā kathitā tava ।
adhyātmoktiprasaṅgena citsvarūpanirūpaṇe ।। 

sampannam evam ekasmād asampannam api sphuṭam ।
idaṃ jagad anādyantāt padāt paramakāraṇāt ।। 

bhāvinyo vīcayo vāriṇy anyānanyās sthitā yathā ।
vartamānā api pare sṛṣṭayas saṃsthitās tathā ।। 

ajvalann eva kāṣṭheṣu vahnir arthakriyāṃ yathā ।
karoti markaṭādīnāṃ śītāpaharaṇādikām ।। 

samaṃ saumyatvam ajahad eva nityoditasthiti ।
tathā brahma karotīdaṃ nānākarteva saj jagat ।। 

apy anāgata evāyam evaṃ sarga upāgataḥ ।
bhos sālabhañjikāsaṃvid dāruṇīva subodhitā ।। 

bījād yathānanyad api phalādy anyad ivotthitam ।
cites tathānanyad api cetyam anyad ivotthitam ।। 

acchedād ekasattāyā na bhedaḥ phalabījayoḥ ।
ciccetyayoś ca vāryūrmyor iva vastuni kaścana ।। 

avicārād ṛte bhedo naitayor upapadyate ।
yataḥ kutaścid uditas sa vicāreṇa naśyati ।। 

bhrāntir eṣā yathāyātā tathā yātu raghūdvaha ।
jñāsyasy etat prabuddhas tvam enāṃ kevalam utsṛja ।। 

bhrāntigranthau vitruṭite maduktiśravaṇāt tava ।
jñānaśabdārthabhedānāṃ vastu jñāsyasy alaṃ svayam ।। 

cittād iyam anarthaśrīs tac ca sā cetaraś ca te ।
maduktiśravaṇād eva śāntim eṣyanty asaṃśayam ।। 

brahmaṇas sarvam utpannaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaiva ceti ca ।
madgīrbhis samprabuddhas sañ jñāsyasy alam anindita ।। 

rāmaḥ

tasmād idam iti brahman vyatirekārthapañcamī ।
nanu kiṃ vakṣi deveśād abhinnaṃ sarvam ity api ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

upadeśāya śāstreṣu jātaś śabdo athavārthajaḥ ।
pratiyogivyavacchedas saṅkhyālakṣaṇapakṣavān ।। 

bhedo dṛśyata evāyaṃ vyavahārān na vāstavaḥ ।
vetālo bālakasyeva kāryārthaṃ parikalpitaḥ ।। 

dvaitaikyam api no yasyāṃ yathābhūtārthasaṃsthitau ।
asti tasyām īdṛśas syāt kutas saṅkalpaviplavaḥ ।। 

kāryakāraṇabhāvo hi yathā svasvāmilakṣaṇaḥ ।
hetuś ca hetumāṃś caiva tathaivāvayavakramaḥ ।। 

vyatirekāvyatirekapariṇāmādivibhramaḥ ।
tathā bhāvavikārāś ca vidyāvidye sukhāsukhe ।। 

evamādimayī mithyāsaṅkalpakalanombhitā ।
ajñānām avabodhārthaṃ na tu bhedo asti vastuni ।। 

asambodhād ayaṃ bhedo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate ।
jñāte saṃśāntakalanaṃ maunam evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

param ekam anādyantam avibhāgam akhaṇḍitam ।
iti jñāsyasi siddhāntakāle bodham upāgataḥ ।। 

vikalpante hy asambuddhās svavikalpavijṛmbhitaiḥ ।
upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate ।। 

vācyavācakasambandho vinā dvaitaṃ na sidhyati ।
na ca dvaitaṃ sambhavati maunaṃ vā vāca ity alam ।। 

mahāvākyārthaniṣṭhāṃ tvaṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā raghūdvaha ।
vacobhedam anādṛtya yad idaṃ vacmi tac chṛṇu ।। 

jātaṃ kutaścid utthāya gandharvapuravan manaḥ ।
bhrāntimātraṃ tanotīdaṃ jagadākhyaṃ svajṛmbhaṇam ।। 

yathā cetas tanotīmāṃ jaganmāyāṃ tathānagha ।
śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmīdaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ sṛṣṭivedane ।। 

yaṃ śrutvā sarvam evedaṃ bhrāntimātram iti svayam ।
rāma niścayavān bhūtvā dūre tyakṣyasi vāsanām ।। 

manomanananirmāṇamātram eva jagattrayam ।
sarvam utsṛjya śāntātmā svātmany eva nivatsyasi ।। 

madvākyārthāvadhānastho manovyādhicikitsane ।
vivekauṣadhilepena prayatnaṃ ca kariṣyasi ।। 

evaṃ sthite jagadrūpaṃ cittam eveha jṛmbhate ।
na vidyate śarīrādi sikatāntaratailavat ।। 

cittam eva hi saṃsāro rāgādikleśadūṣitam ।
tad eva tair vinirmuktaṃ bhavānta iti kathyate ।। 

cittaṃ sādhyaṃ pālanīyaṃ vicāryaṃ kāryam āryavat ।
āhāryaṃ vyavahāryaṃ ca sañcāryaṃ dhāryam ādarāt ।। 

evam abhyantare citraṃ bibharti trijagan manaḥ ।
aṇḍaṃ māyūram iva tad yathākālaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

yo ayaṃ cittasya cidbhāgas saiṣā sarvārthabījatā ।
yaś cāsya jaḍabhāgas svas taj jagat so aṅga vibhramaḥ ।। 

avidyamānam evedam ādisarge dharādikam ।
nirākṛtir ajas svapnaṃ paśyatīva na paśyati ।। 

sargādi dīrghasaṃvittyā śailādi jaḍasaṃvidā ।
sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmavidā vetti dehaṃ śūnyaṃ na vāstavam ।। 

sarvagenātmanā vyāptaṃ svacetyātmavapur manaḥ ।
ātalaṃ somyavimalaṃ vārīva ravitejasā ।। 

cittabālo jagadyakṣaṃ mithyā paśyaty abodhataḥ ।
bodhato asau paraṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ paśyati nirāmayam ।। 

yathātmā dṛśyatām eti dvaitaikyabhramadāyinīm ।
śṛṇu tat te pravakṣyāmi vakṣyamāṇakathākramaiḥ ।। 

yat kathyate hi hṛdayaṅgamayopamānayuktyā girā madhuramugdhapadārthayā ca ।
śrotus tad aṅga hṛdayaṃ parito visāri vyāpnoti tailam iva vāriṇi vāry aśaṅkam ।। 

tyaktopamānam amanojñapadaṃ durarthaṃ kṣubdhaṃ tvarāvidhuritaṃ vinigīrṇavarṇam ।
śrotur na yāti hṛdayaṃ pravināśam eva saṃyāti cājyam iva bhasmani hūyamānam ।। 

ākhyānakāni bhuvi yāni kathāś ca yā yā yad yat prameyam uditaṃ paripeśalaṃ vā ।
dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭikathanena tad eti sādho prākāśyam āśu bhuvanaṃ sitaraśmineva ।। 

mano'ṅkurotpattikathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

purā me brahmaṇā proktaṃ sargasaṅkathayānagha ।
yad idaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tvayi pṛcchati rāghava ।। 

purā mayā hi bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kamalasambhavaḥ ।
ime katham upāyānti brahman sargagaṇā iti ।। 

brahmā

evaṃ hi mana evedam itthaṃ sphurati bhūtavat ।
calair jalāśayas sphārair vicitraiś cakrakair iva ।। 

dinādau samprabuddhasya saṃsāraṃ sraṣṭum icchataḥ ।
purākalpe hi kasmiṃścic chṛṇu kiṃ vṛttam aṅga me ।। 

kadācid akhilaṃ sargaṃ saṃhṛtya divasakṣaye ।
eka evāham ekāgras svasthas svām anayaṃ niśām ।। 

niśānte samprabuddhas san sāndhyāṃ kṛtvā tathā vidhim ।
prajā draṣṭuṃ dṛśas sphāre vyomni yojitavān aham ।। 

yāvat paśyāmi gaganaṃ na tamobhir na tejasā ।
vyāptam atyantavitataṃ śūnyam antavivarjitam ।। 

sargaṃ saṅkalpayāmīmam iti niścitya tan mayā ।
kham evekṣitum ārabdhaṃ śuddhasūkṣmeṇa cetasā ।। 

athāhaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra manasā vitate ambare ।
pṛthaksthitān mahārambhān sargān sthitinirargalān ।। 

paraspareṇa cādṛṣṭān brahmaviṣṇvindrasaṃyutān ।
sasurāsuragandharvakinnaroragamānavān ।। 

merumandarakailāsamahendramalayācalān ।
sādridyūrvīnadīśāṃś ca saṅkhyayā daśabhāsurān ।। 

teṣu tatpratibimbābhāḥ padmakośādhivāsinaḥ ।
rājahaṃsarathārūḍhās saṃsthitā daśapadmajāḥ ।। 

pṛthaksthiteṣu daśasu teṣūdyadbhūtapaṅktiṣu ।
jvalajjvāleṣu dīrgheṣu jagatsūjjvaladīptiṣu ।। 

pravahanti mahānadyaḥ pradhvananti tathābdhayaḥ ।
pratapanty uṣṇarucayaḥ prasphuranty ambare anilāḥ ।। 

divi krīḍanti vibudhā bhuvi krīḍanti mānavāḥ ।
dānavā bhoginaś caiva pātāleṣu sukhaṃ sthitāḥ ।। 

kālacakrapariprotāṣ ṣaṭ chubhās sakalartavaḥ ।
yathākālaṃ phalapūrṇāṃ bhūṣayanty abhito mahīm ।। 

prauḍhiṃ śubhāśubhācārasthitayaḥ kakubhāṃ prati ।
narakasvargaphaladās sarvatra samupāgatāḥ ।। 

bhogamokṣaphalārthinyas samastā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
samīhitaṃ yathākālaṃ prayatante yathākramam ।। 

saptalokās tathā dvīpās samudrā girayas tathā ।
avekṣamāṇāḥ kalpāntaṃ sphuranty urutarāravam ।। 

kvacid rātritvam āyātaṃ kvacit sthiratayā sthitam ।
sthitaṃ parvatakuñjeṣu tamas tejolavadrutam ।। 

nabhonīlotpalasyāntar bhramadabhramadhuvratam ।
prasphurattārakājālaṃ kesarāpūratāṃ gatam ।। 

kalpāntaghananīhāro merukuñjeṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।
śalmaler amalaṃ tūlam aṣṭhīlākoṭareṣv iva ।। 

lokālokādriraśanāṃ raṇadarṇavaghurghurām ।
tamaḥkhaṇḍendranīlāḍhyāṃ nijaratnavirājitām ।। 

dadhānā vasudhā bhūtaravakākalighuṅghumām ।
saṃsthitā bhuvanābhoge svāntaḥpura ivāṅganā ।। 

gaurāhaḥpaṅktimadhyastharajanīrājirājitāḥ ।
padmotpalasraja iva lakṣyante vatsaraśriyaḥ ।। 

bahugarbhavibhāgasthabhūtalokāḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।
tejo'ruṇā vilokyante dāḍimānīva ṣaṇḍake ।। 

tripravāhā tripathagā kṛtvordhvādhogamāgamā ।
jagadyajñopavītābhā sphurantīndukalāmalā ।। 

itaś cetaś ca gacchanti śīryante prodbhavanti ca ।
diglatāsu taḍitpuṣpā vātānte meghapallavāḥ ।। 

gandharvanagarodyānavimānāvalimālitā ।
samudrabhūminabhasāṃ padavī pravirājate ।। 

lokāntareṣu saṅghena devāsuranaroragāḥ ।
udumbareṣu maṣakā iva ghuṅghumitās sthitāḥ ।। 

yugakalpakṣaṇalavakalākāṣṭākalaṅkitaḥ ।
kālo vahaty akalitas sarvanāśapratīkṣakaḥ ।। 

evam ālokya śuddhena pareṇa svena tejasā ।
bhṛśaṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kim etat katham ity aham ।। 

kathaṃ māṃsamayenākṣṇā yan na paśyāmi kiñcana ।
tan māyājālam atulaṃ paśyāmi manasāmbare ।। 

athālokya ciraṃ kālaṃ manasaivāham ambarāt ।
arkaṃ tasmāj jagajjālād ekam ānīya pṛṣṭavān ।। 

āgaccha devadeveśa bho bhāskara mahādyute ।
svāgataṃ te astv iti proktaṃ mayāsau kathito apy atha ।। 

kas tvaṃ katham idaṃ jātaṃ jagad ekaṃ jaganti vā ।
yadi jānāsi bhagavaṃs tad etat kathayānagha ।। 

ity ukto mām asāv arkas samparijñātavān atha ।
namaskṛtyābhyuvācedam anindyapadayā girā ।। 

bhānuḥ

asya dṛśyapiśācasya nityaṃ kāraṇatām api ।
gataḥ kasmān na jānīṣe kiṃ mām īśvara pṛcchasi ।। 

atha madvākyasandarbhe līlā cet tava sarvaga ।
acintitāt samutpannaṃ tac chṛṇu tvaṃ vadāmy aham ।। 

sad asad iti kalābhir ātataṃ sad bhramabharabhedavimohadāyinībhiḥ ।
pravitataracanābhir īśvarātma pravilasatīha mano mahan mahātman ।। 

brahmādityasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍaśītitamas sargaḥ

bhānuḥ

kalpanāmni mahādeva hyastane divase tava ।
tale kailāsaśailasya jambudvīpaikakoṇake ।। 

suvarṇajaṭanāmnā yat tvatputrair janitaprajaiḥ ।
maṇḍalaṃ kalpitaṃ śrīmad analpasukhasundaram ।। 

tatrābhūd atidharmātmā brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ ।
indur nāmātiśāntātmā kaśyapasya kulodbhavaḥ ।। 

tasmiṃs tadā nivasato nityaṃ svajanamaṇḍale ।
na babhūvātmajas tasya marubhūmes tṛṇaṃ yathā ।। 

na vyarājata sā bhāryā tasya niṣphalapuṣpitā ।
ṛjvī gaurī suśuddhāpi śūnyā śaralatā yathā ।। 

tau tato dampatī khinnau putrārthaṃ tapase gireḥ ।
kailāsasyāṃsam ārūḍhau rūḍhāv iva vanadrumau ।। 

bhūtair anāvṛte śūnye tasmin kailāsakuñjake ।
tepāte tau tapo ghoraṃ jalāhārau tarusthitau ।। 

ekaṃ pānīyaculakaṃ pītvā divasaparyaye ।
nispandam utthitau vārkṣīṃ vṛttim āśritya saṃsthitau ।। 

tasthatus tau tadā tatra tāvad vanataruvratau ।
yāvat tretā dvāparaś ca yuge dve eva te gate ।। 

tatas tuṣṭo abhavad devas tayoś śaśikalādharaḥ ।
dinatāpottāpitayor induḥ kumudayor iva ।। 

ājagāma tam uddeśaṃ yatra tau vipradampatī ।
salatāpādapaṃ deśaṃ puṣpākara iveśvaraḥ ।। 

dampatī tau vṛṣārūḍhaṃ somaṃ somārdhaśekharam ।
phullānanaṃ dadṛśatuḥ kumude śaśinaṃ yathā ।। 

tau taṃ praṇematur devaṃ tuṣārāmalam īśvaram ।
dyāvāpṛthivyāv uditaṃ paripūrṇam ivoḍupam ।। 

tarjayan pavanādhūtanavaveṇuvanasvanam ।
mṛdūddāmaṃ smitasyandi provācātha vacaś śivaḥ ।। 

īśvaraḥ

varaṃ vipra gṛhāṇāśu tuṣṭo asmi tava vāñchitam ।
madhumāsarasākrāntavṛkṣavan mudito bhava ।। 

vipraḥ

bhagavan devadeveśa daśa putrā mahādhiyaḥ ।
bhavyā bhavantu me bhūyaś śoko yena na bādhate ।। 

bhānuḥ

athaivam astv iti procya jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ ।
vyomni vārinidhau hrādaṃ kṛtvevormir mahāvapuḥ ।। 

tatas tau dampatī tuṣṭau śivāt prāpya varaṃ gṛham ।
gatau gīrvāṇasadṛśau kham ivomāmaheśvarau ।। 

tatra sā brāhmaṇī gehe babhūvodāragarbhiṇī ।
babhau pūrṇodarī śyāmā meghalekheva vāriṇā ।। 

kālena suṣuve putrān pratipaccandrakomalān ।
daśa bālān madhau mugdhā vasudheva navāṅkurān ।। 

te kṛtabrahmasaṃskārā vṛddhim īyur mahaujasaḥ ।
svalpenaiva hi kālena prāvṛṣīva navāmbudāḥ ।। 

te saptavarṣavayaso babhūvur jñātavāṅmayāḥ ।
virejus tejasā tatra nabhasīvāmalā grahāḥ ।। 

atha kalena mahatā teṣāṃ tau pitarau tadā ।
sañjagmatus tanuṃ tyaktvā svāṃ gatiṃ gatikovidau ।। 

mātāpitṛbhyāṃ rahitā daśa te brāhmaṇās tataḥ ।
yayuḥ kailāsaśikharaṃ gṛhaṃ santyajya dūrataḥ ।। 

tatra sañcintayām āsur udvignās te vibāndhavāḥ ।
kiṃ syāt param iha śreya ūcuś cedaṃ parasparam ।। 

kim iha syāt samucitaṃ bhrātaraḥ kim aduḥkhadam ।
kiṃ mahattvaṃ mahaiśvaryaṃ kiṃ mahāvibhavaṃ śubham ।। 

kiyad etad anaiśvaryaṃ sāmantā hi cireśvarāḥ ।
sāmantasampat kiṃ nāma rājāno hi maheśvarāḥ ।। 

kiṃ nāma sampad bhūpānāṃ samrāḍ iha maheśvaraḥ ।
kiṃ nāma sampat sāmrājyam indro hīha maheśvaraḥ ।। 

kiṃ nāma vastv athendratvaṃ yan muhūrtaṃ prajāpateḥ ।
vinaśyati na yat kalpe kiṃ syāt tad iha śobhanam ।। 

vadamāneṣv athaiteṣu jyeṣṭho bhrātā mahāmatiḥ ।
gambhīravāg uvācedaṃ mṛgayūthān mṛgo yathā ।। 

aiśvaryāṇāṃ hi sarveṣām akalpāntavināśi yat ।
rocate bhrātaras tan me brahmatvam iha netarat ।। 

etat taduktam akhilā dvijaputrās tadottamāḥ ।
vacobhir aindavās tatra sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan ।। 

ūcuś cedaṃ kathaṃ tāta sarvaduḥkhāpamarjanam ।
padmāsanaṃ jagatpūjyaṃ viriñcatvam avāpnumaḥ ।। 

bhrātrā tena punaḥ proktā bhrātaro bhūritejasaḥ ।
maduktaṃ sarva evaite bhavantaḥ pālayantv alam ।। 

padmāsanagato bhāsvān brahmāham iti cetasā ।
sṛjāmi saṃharāmīti dhyānam astu cirāya vaḥ ।। 

agrajeneti kathite bāḍhaṃ kṛtvā ta uttamāḥ ।
dhyānādhīnadhiyas tasthus sahaiva jyāyasā rasāt ।। 

lipikarmakṛtākārā dhyānāsaktā daśaiva te ।
antassthenaiva manasā cintayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

ayam utphullakamalakośacakronnatāsanaḥ ।
brahmāhaṃ jagatas sraṣṭā kartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ ।। 

yajñakriyākramayutās sāṅgopāṅgamaharddhayaḥ ।
sarasvatyā sagāyatryā yuktā vedavarā ime ।। 

lokapālapurākrāntasañcaratsiddhamaṇḍalaḥ ।
ayam uddāmasaubhāgyas svargas suravibhūṣitaḥ ।। 

parvatadvīpajaladhikānanais samalaṅkṛtam ।
idaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ nīlaṃ trilokīkarṇakuṇḍalam ।। 

etat pātālakuharaṃ daityadānavabhoginām ।
amṛtastrīgaṇākīrṇaṃ gṛhaṃ gahanakoṭaram ।। 

ayam indro mahābāhur vajrālaṅkṛtadordrumaḥ ।
trailokyanagarīm ekaḥ pāti pāvanayajñabhuk ।। 

dīptijālavaratrābhir avaṣṭabhyeva diggaṇam ।
krameṇa pratapanty ete bhānavo bhūribhānavaḥ ।। 

lokapālā ime lokaṃ rakṣanty akṣubdhavṛttayaḥ ।
maryādābhir atucchābhir gopālā gogaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

unmajjanti nimajjanti prasphuranti patanti ca ।
taraṅgā iva toyānām imāḥ pratidiśaṃ prajāḥ ।। 

sṛjāmīmam ahaṃ sargaṃ saṃharāmi tathādṛtaḥ ।
ayam ātmani tiṣṭhāmi śāmyāmi bhuvaneśvaraḥ ।। 

ayaṃ saṃvatsaro yāta idaṃ pariṇataṃ yugam ।
sṛṣṭir iyam asau kālas tv ayaṃ saṃharaṇasya ca ।। 

ayam adya gataḥ kalpo brāhmī rātrir iyaṃ tataḥ ।
ayam ātmani tiṣṭhāmi pūrṇātmā parameśvaraḥ ।। 

iti bhāvitayā buddhyā te dvijā aindavā daśa ।
abahirvṛttayas tasthus samutkīrṇā ivopalāt ।। 

adhigatakamalāsanakramās te parigalitetaratucchavṛttijālāḥ ।
satatagajavajarjarāsanasthāś ciram iti padmajakalpane virejuḥ ।। 

aindavasamādhānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptāśītitamas sargaḥ

bhānuḥ

pitāmahakrame tasmiṃs tatas te baddhabhāvanāḥ ।
karmabhis tais samākrāntamanaskās tasthur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

yāvat te dehakās teṣāṃ tāpena pavanais tathā ।
yayuś śoṣaṃ yathā grīṣme chinnāḥ kamalapallavāḥ ।। 

jakṣus tān dehakāṃs tatra kravyādā vanavāsinaḥ ।
itaś cetaś ca luṭhitās satphalānīva markaṭāḥ ।। 

atha te śāntabāhyārthā brahmatve kṛtabhāvanāḥ ।
tasthuś caturyugasyānte yāvat kalpaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ ।। 

kṣīyamāṇe tataḥ kalpe tapaty ādityasañcaye ।
puṣkarāvartakeṣūccair varṣatsu kaṭhināravam ।। 

vahatsu kalpavāteṣu sthita eva mahārṇave ।
kṣīṇeṣu bhūtavṛndeṣu te tathaiva vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

adya prabuddhe bhavati draṣṭum icchati saṃsṛtim ।
svakenaiva krameṇoccais te tathaiva vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

ta ete bhagavan brahman brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā daśa ।
ta ete daśa saṃsārā manovyomani saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

teṣām ekatamasyāyam aham ākāśamandiraḥ ।
bhānur bhuvi vibho kālakalākarmaṇi yojitaḥ ।। 

eṣa te kathitas sargo daśānām abjasambhava ।
brahmaṇāṃ sambhavo vyomni yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

vividhakalpanam āvalitāmbaraṃ yad idam uttamajāgatam utthitam ।
kiraṇajālakamohitamohanaṃ tad akhilaṃ nijacetasi vibhramaḥ ।। 

jagaddaśakanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāśītitamas sargaḥ

brahmā

brāhmaṇa brahmaṇo bhānur ity uktvā brahmaṇo mama ।
brahman brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭha tūṣṇīm eva babhūva saḥ ।। 

tata uktaṃ mayā tasya ciram sañcintya cetasā ।
bhānor bhāno vadāśu tvaṃ kim anyat saṃsṛjāmy aham ।। 

etāni daśa vidyante kila yatra jaganti hi ।
tatrānyo mama sargeṇa ko arthaḥ kathaya bhāskara ।। 

bhānuḥ

nirīhasya niricchasya ko arthas sargeṇa te prabho ।
vinodamātram eveyaṃ sṛṣṭis tava jagatpate ।। 

niṣkāmād eva bhavatas sargas sampadyate prabho ।
arkād iva jalādityaḥ pratibimbam ivādhiyaḥ ।। 

śarīrasanniveśasya tyāge rāge mate yadā ।
niṣkāmo bhagavan bhāvo nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।। 

sṛjasīdaṃ tadā deva vinodāyaiva bhūtapa ।
punas saṃhṛtya saṃhṛtya dinaṃ dinapatir yathā ।। 

tava nityam asaṃsaktavinodāyaiva kevalam ।
idaṃ kartavyam eveti jagan na tu ghanecchayā ।। 

sṛṣṭiṃ na ca karoṣi tvam aharvyāpāram ātmanaḥ ।
nityakarmaparityāgāt kim apūrvam avāpsyasi ।। 

yathāprāptaṃ hi kartavyam asaktena satā sadā ।
makureṇākalaṅkena pratibimbakriyā yathā ।। 

yathaiva karmakaraṇe kāmanā nāsti dhīmataḥ ।
tathaivākarmakaraṇe kāmanā nāsti dhīmataḥ ।। 

atas suṣuptopamayā vṛttyā niṣkāmayānayā ।
suptaprabuddhasamayā kuru kāryaṃ yathāgatam ।। 

sargair athenduputrāṇāṃ toṣam eti jagat prabho ।
tadaite toṣayiṣyanti na tvāṃ sargās sureśvara ।। 

cittanetrair bhavān etān sargān paśyati no dṛśā ।
apaśyaṃś cakṣuṣā sargaṃ sṛṣṭam ity eva vetti kaḥ ।। 

yenaiva manasā sargo nirmitaḥ parameśvara ।
sa eva māṃsanetreṇa taṃ paśyati hi netaraḥ ।। 

na caitān daśa saṃsārān daśanīrajasambhavān ।
kaścin nāśayituṃ śaktaś cito dārḍhyāc ciraṃ sthitān ।। 

karmendriyair yat kriyate tad roddhuṃ kila yujyate ।
na manoniścayakṛtaṃ kaścid rodhayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

yo baddhapadatāṃ yāto jantor manasi niścayaḥ ।
sa tenaiva vinā brahman nānyena vinivāryate ।। 

bahukālaṃ yad abhyastaṃ manasā dṛḍhaniścayam ।
śāpenāpi na tasyāsti kṣayo naṣṭe api dehake ।। 

yad baddhapīṭham abhito manasi prarūḍhaṃ tadrūpa eva puruṣo bhavatīha nānyaḥ ।
tadbodhanād itaram atra kilābhyupāyaṃ śailaugham ekam iva niṣphalam eva manye ।। 

aindavaniścayakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonanavatitamas sargaḥ

bhānuḥ

śrūyate hi purā deva magadheṣu mahīpatiḥ ।
indradyumna iti khyāta indradyumna ivāparaḥ ।। 

tasyendubimbapratimā bhāryā kamalalocanā ।
ahalyā nāma tatrāsīc chaśāṅkasyeva rohiṇī ।। 

tasminn eva pure śiḍgaḥ kilāsīd balavān iti ।
indranāmāparaḥ kaścic chrīmān viprakumārakaḥ ।। 

ahalyā pūrvam indrasya babhūveṣṭety ahalyayā ।
śrutaṃ rājamahiṣyātha kathāprastāvataḥ kvacit ।। 

ākarṇya tad ahalyā sā babhūvendrānurāgiṇī ।
ahalyāṃ māṃ na kasmāt sa śakro abhyetīti sotsukā ।। 

mṛṇālahārakadalīpallavāstaraṇeṣu sā ।
atapyata bhṛśaṃ bālā latālūnā vaneṣv iva ।। 

khedam āpa samagrāsu tāsu bhūpavibhūtiṣu ।
matsī nidāghataptāsu parilolā sthaleṣv iva ।। 

ayam indro ayam indraś cety evaṃ jātapralāpayā ।
lajjāpi hi tayā tyaktā vaivaśyam upayātayā ।। 

ity ārtāyā ghanasneham atha tasyā vayasyayā ।
uktam āli tavāvighnam indram apy ānayāmy aham ।। 

indraṃ tavānayāmīti śrutvā vikasitekṣaṇā ।
papāta pādayos sakhyā nalinyā nalinī yathā ।। 

tataḥ prayāte divase samāyāte niśāgame ।
sā vayasyā tam indrākhyaṃ yayau viprakumārakam ।। 

bodhayitvā yathāyuktaṃ sā tam indrakumārakam ।
ahalyānikaṭaṃ rātrāv ānayām āsa satvaram ।। 

sā tatas tena śiḍgena mahendreṇa ratiṃ yayau ।
kasmiṃścit sadane gupte bahumālyavilepanā ।। 

hārāṅgadamanojñena tena sā taruṇī tadā ।
ratenāvarjitā vallī rasena madhunā yathā ।। 

tatas tadanuraktā sā paśyantī tanmayaṃ jagat ।
na sānantaguṇākīrṇaṃ bhartāraṃ bahv amanyata ।। 

kenacit tv atha kālena tasyā indrānurāgitā ।
sā jñātā rājasiṃhena tanmukhavyomacandrikā ।। 

indraṃ dhyāyati sā yāvat tāvat tasyā virājate ।
mukhaṃ pūrṇena candreṇa prabuddham iva kairavam ।। 

evam anyo'nyam āsaktabhāvam ālokya bhūpatiḥ ।
cakāra bahubhir daṇḍais sa dvayor atha śāsanam ।। 

tāv ubhāv api santyaktau hi santau salilāśaye ।
tuṣṭau jahasatus tatra na khedaṃ samupāgatau ।। 

apṛcchat tau tato rājā khinnau sthaḥ kiṃ na durmatī ।
tāv ūcatur mahīpālaṃ jalāśayasamuddhṛtau ।। 

saṃsṛtyāvām ihānyo'nyaṃ mukhakāntim aninditām ।
muhyāvo na mahīpāla svāṅgair api vikartitaiḥ ।। 

vahnāv api parikṣiptāv akhinnāv evam eva tau ।
ūcatur muditātmānāv anyo'nyaṃ smṛtiharṣitau ।। 

grathitau gajapādeṣu nakhinnāv eva saṃsthitau ।
evam evocatur bhūpam anyo'nyaṃ smṛtiharṣitau ।। 

kaṣāhatāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ ।
paṅkamagnāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ ।। 

anyasmāc chāsanājālāt kalpitāc ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
uddhṛtāv ūcatuḥ pṛṣṭau tam evārthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

uvācendro mahīpāla jagan me dayitāmayam ।
na śāsanāni duḥkhāni bādhante kiñcid eva me ।। 

asyāś caiva jagad rājan sarvaṃ manmayam eva hi ।
tena nau śāsanāduḥkhaṃ kiñcid eva na bādhate ।। 

mano nāma vayaṃ rājan mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ ।
prapañcamātram evāyaṃ deho dṛśyata eva hi ।। 

samakālaprayuktena sahasā daṇḍarāśinā ।
dhīraṃ mano bhedhayituṃ na manāg api śakyate ।। 

kā nāma tā mahārāja kīdṛśyaḥ kasya śaktayaḥ ।
yābhir manāṃsi bhidyante dṛḍhaniścayavanty api ।। 

patatūdetu vā deho yātu vā viśarārutām ।
bhāvitārthābhipatitaṃ manas tiṣṭhati pūrvavat ।। 

iṣṭe arthe ciram āviṣṭaṃ bhaṅktuṃ dhīraṃ sthitaṃ manaḥ ।
bhāvā bhāvāś śarīrasthā mama śaktā na kecana ।। 

bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena manasā yan mahīpate ।
tad eva paśyaty acalaṃ na śarīraviceṣṭitam ।। 

na kāścana kriyā rājan varaśāpādikā api ।
tīvrasaṃvegasampannaṃ śaktāś cālayituṃ manaḥ ।। 

tīvravegena saṃsaktaṃ puruṣā hy abhivāñchite ।
manaś cālayituṃ śaktā na mahādriṃ mṛgā iva ।। 

rāmeyam asitāpāṅgā manaḥkośe pratiṣṭhitā ।
devāgāre mahotsedhe devī bhagavatī yathā ।। 

na duḥkham anugacchāmi priyayā jīvarakṣayā ।
girir grīṣmadaśādāhaṃ lagnayevābhramālayā ।। 

yatra yatra yathā rājaṃs tiṣṭhāmy abhipatāmi vā ।
tatreṣṭāsaṅgamād anyat kiṅcin nānubhavāmy aham ।। 

ahalyādayitānāmnā manasendrābhidhaṃ manaḥ ।
saṃsaktam idam āyāti na svabhāvād ṛte param ।। 

ekakāryaniviṣṭaṃ hi mano dhīrasya bhūpate ।
na cālyate merur iva varaśāpabalair api ।। 

deho hi varaśāpābhyām anyatvam upagacchati ।
na tu dhīraṃ mano rājan vijigīṣutayotthitam ।। 

etāni cātra manasāṃ na ca kāraṇāni rājañ śarīraśakalāny asamutthitāni ।
ceto hi kāraṇam amīṣu śarīrakeṣu vārīva sarvavanaṣaṇḍalatāraseṣu ।। 

ādyaṃ śarīram iha viddhi mano mahātman saṅkalpitā jagati tena śarīrasaṅghāḥ ।
ādyaṃ śarīram abhitiṣṭhati yatra tatra tat tad bhṛśaṃ phalati netarad asya puṃsaḥ ।। 

mukhyāṅkuraṃ subhaga viddhi mano hi puṃso dehās tataḥ pravisṛtās tarupallavābhāḥ ।
naṣṭe aṅkure punar udeti na pallavaśrīr na tv aṅkuraḥ kṣayam upaiti dalakṣayeṣu ।। 

dehakṣaye vividhadehagaṇaṃ karoti svapnāvanāv iva vanaṃ navam āśu cetaḥ ।
citte kṣate na tu karoti hi kiñcid eva dehas tatas samanupālaya cittaratnam ।। 

diśi diśi hariṇākṣīm eva paśyāmi rājan priyayuvatimanastvān nityam ānandito asmi ।
tava sukhavikṛtīnāṃ yat phalaṃ duḥkhadāyi kṣaṇam atha suciraṃ vā tan na paśyāmi kiñcit ।। 

kṛtrimendravākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navatitamas sargaḥ

bhānuḥ

athendreṇaivam ukto asau rājā rājīvalocanaḥ ।
muniṃ bharatanāmānaṃ pārśvasaṃstham uvāca ha ।। 

rājā

bhagavan sarvadharmajña paśyasy asya durātmanaḥ ।
bhṛśam adya mukhe sphāraṃ dhārṣṭyaṃ maddārahāriṇaḥ ।। 

pāpānurūpam apy asya śāpaṃ dehi mahāmune ।
yad avadhyavadhāt pāpaṃ vadhatyāgāt tad eva hi ।। 

ity ukto rājasiṃhena bharato munisattamaḥ ।
yathāvat pravicāryāśu pāpaṃ tasya durātmanaḥ ।। 

sahānayā duṣkṛtinyā bhartṛdrohābhibhūtayā ।
vināśaṃ vraja durbuddhe iti śāpaṃ visṛṣṭavān ।। 

bhānuḥ

tatas tau snehasambaddhamanaskāv eva śāpataḥ ।
patitau bhūtale vṛkṣavicyutāv iva pallavau ।। 

atha vyasanasaṃsaktau mṛgayonim upāgatau ।
tato dvāv api saṃsaktau bhūyo jātau vihaṅgamau ।। 

adyāsmākaṃ vibho sarge mithassambaddhabhāvanau ।
tapaḥparau mahāpuṇyau jātau brāhmaṇadampatī ।। 

bhārato hi tayoś śāpas sa samartho babhūva ha ।
śarīramātrākramaṇe na manonigrahe prabho ।। 

tāv adyāvadhitenaiva dehasaṃskārahetunā ।
yatra yatropajāyete bhavatas tatra dampatī ।। 

akṛtrimapremarasānuviddhaṃ snehaṃ tayos taṃ prasamīkṣya kāntam ।
vṛkṣā api sneharasānuviddhāś śṛṅgāraceṣṭākulitā bhavati ।। 

ekanavatitamas sargaḥ

bhānuḥ

tenaitad vacmi bhagavan yathājātaṃ mano mune ।
anigrāhyam abhedyaṃ ca śāpair api durāsadaiḥ ।। 

aindavānām atas sṛṣṭikramāṇāṃ pravināśanam ।
yujyate na na ca brahman yuktam etan mahātmanaḥ ।। 

kiṃ tad asti jagaty asmin vividheṣu jagatsu vā ।
tavāpi nātha nāthasya yad dainyāya mahātmanaḥ ।। 

mano hi jagatāṃ kartṛ mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ ।
manaḥkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ loke na śarīrakṛtaṃ kṛtam ।। 

yan manoniścayakṛtaṃ tad dravyauṣadhidaṇḍanaiḥ ।
hantuṃ na śakyate jantoḥ pratibimbaṃ maṇer iva ।। 

tasmād ete atra tiṣṭhantu bhāsurais sargasambhramaiḥ ।
tvaṃ sṛṣṭveha prajās tiṣṭha buddhyākāśe apy anantakaḥ ।। 

cittākāśaś cidākāśa ākāśaś ca tṛtīyakaḥ ।
anantās traya evaite cidākāśaprakāśitāḥ ।। 

ekaṃ dvau vā bahūn vāpi kuru sargān prajāpate ।
svecchayātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tavaindavaiḥ ।। 

brahmā

athaindave jagajjāle bhānunettham udāhṛte ।
mayā sañcintya suciram idam uktaṃ mahāmune ।। 

yuktam uktaṃ tvayā bhāno vitataṃ hi kilāmbaram ।
manaś ca vitataṃ cāpi cidākāśaś ca vistṛtaḥ ।। 

tad yathābhimataṃ sargaṃ nityaṃ karma karomy aham ।
kalpayāmi bahūny āśu bhūtajālāni bhāskara ।। 

tat tvam evāśu bhagavan prathamo atra manur bhava ।
kuru sargaṃ yathākāmaṃ mayā samabhicoditaḥ ।। 

athaitat sa mahātejā mama vākyaṃ prabhākaraḥ ।
aṅgīkṛtya dvidhātmānaṃ cakāra tapatāṃ varaḥ ।। 

ekena prāktane tasmin vapuṣā sūryatāṃ gataḥ ।
vyomādhvagatayā sarge tatāna divasāvalīm ।। 

manmanutvaṃ dvitīyena kṛtvā svavapuṣā kṣaṇāt ।
sasarja sakalāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ tatām abhimatāṃ mama ।। 

pratibhāsam upāyāti yad yad asya hi cetasaḥ ।
tat tat prakaṭatām eti sthairyaṃ saphalatām api ।। 

sāmānyabrāhmaṇā bhūtvā pratibhāsavaśāt kila ।
aindavā brahmatāṃ yātā manasaḥ paśya śaktatām ।। 

yathaivaindavajīvās te cittatvād brahmatāṃ gatāḥ ।
vayaṃ tathaiva cidbhāvāc cittatvād brahmatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

cittaṃ hi pratibhāsātma yac ca tatpratibhāsanam ।
tad idaṃ bhāti dehādikhābhaṃ nāto asti dehadṛk ।। 

cittvam ātmacamatkāras tac camatkurute svataḥ ।
yad yāvatsambhavaṃ svātmany evāntar maricātmavat ।। 

tad etac cittavad bhātam ātivāhikanāmakam ।
tad evodāharanty etad dehanāmnā ghanaṃ bhrami ।। 

kathyate jīvanāmnaitac cetaḥ pratanuvāsanam ।
śāntaṃ dehacamatkāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi kramāt param ।। 

nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha cittvaṃ cittam idaṃ sthitam ।
vasiṣṭhaindavasaṃvidvad asat sattām ivāgatam ।। 

yathaindavamano brahmā tathaivāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
matkṛtaṃ cāham evedaṃ saṅkalpātmaiva bhāsate ।। 

kaścic cittavilāso ayaṃ brahmāham iti saṃsthitaḥ ।
svabhāva eva dehādi viddhi śūnyatarātmakhāt ।। 

śuddhā cit paramātmaikarūpiṇīty eva bhāvanāt ।
jīvībhūya mano bhūtvā vettītthaṃ dehatāṃ mudhā ।। 

sarvam aindavasaṃsāravad idaṃ bhāti cidvapuḥ ।
sampannam aprabodhātma dīrghasvapnas svaśaktijaḥ ।। 

dvicandravibhramākāraṃ tanmātrākāravibhramam ।
aindavābjajavad rūḍhaṃ citaś cittvaṃ mano bhavet ।। 

na san nāsad ahaṃrūpaṃ sattvāsattve tathaiva ca ।
upalambhena sadrūpam asatyaṃ tadvirodhataḥ ।। 

jaḍājaḍaṃ mano viddhi saṅkalpātma bṛhadvapuḥ ।
ajaḍaṃ brahmarūpatvāj jaḍaṃ dṛśyātmatāgamāt ।। 

dṛśyānubhavasatyātma tadabhāve vilāyi tat ।
kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathā brahmaṇi saṃsthitam ।। 

sarvatvād brahmaṇas sarvaṃ jaḍaṃ cinmayam eva vā ।
asmadādiśilāntātma na jaḍaṃ na ca cetanam ।। 

dārvādīnām acittvena nopalambhasya sambhavaḥ ।
upalambho hi sadṛśasambandhād eva jāyate ।। 

upalabdher jaḍaṃ viddhi cetanaṃ sarvam eva hi ।
upalambho hi sambandhāt sambandho hi samātmanoḥ ।। 

jaḍacetanaśāntādiśabdārthaśrīr na vidyate ।
anirdeśye pade pattralatādīva mahāmarau ।। 

citau yac cetyakalanaṃ tan manastvam udāhṛtam ।
cidbhāgo atrājaḍo bhāgo jāḍyam atra tu cetyatā ।। 

cidbhāgo atrāvabodhāṃśo jaḍaṃ cetyaṃ hi dṛśyatā ।
iti jīvo jagadbhrāntiṃ paśyan gacchati lolatām ।। 

citā sva eva bhāvo asau śuddhayaivaṃ dvayīkṛtaḥ ।
atas sarvaṃ jagat saiva dvaitaṃ labdhāṃśam eva tat ।। 

svam evānyatayā dṛṣṭvā citir dṛśyatayā vapuḥ ।
nirbhāgāpy ekabhāgābhaṃ bhramatīva bhramāturā ।। 

na bhrāntir asti bhramabhāṅ naivetīha hi niścayaḥ ।
paripūrṇārṇavaprakhyā citītthaṃ saṃsthitā citiḥ ।। 

sarvatvāj jāḍyam astv asyāṃ citi cittvaṃ ca vetsi tat ।
cidbhāgo atrāvabodhāṃśas tv ahantājaḍatodayaḥ ।। 

ahantvādi pare tattve manāg api na vidyate ।
ūrmyādīva pṛthak toye saṃvitsāraṃ hi tad yataḥ ।। 

ahampratyayasandṛśyaṃ cetyaṃ viddhi samutthitam ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivātas tan nūnaṃ vidyata eva no ।। 

ahantāpadamātrātmapadaṃ viddhi nirāmayam ।
vidaṃ vidur ahantādi śaityam eva yathā himam ।। 

citaiva cetyate jāḍyaṃ svapne svamaraṇopamam ।
sarvātmatvāt sarvaśaktīḥ kurvatī naiti sāmyatām ।। 

manaḥ padārthāditayā sarvarūpaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
nānātmā cittadeho ayam ākāśaviṣadākṛtiḥ ।। 

dehādi dehapratibhārūpātma tyajatā sadā ।
vicāryaṃ pratibhāsātma cittvaṃ cittvena vai sphuṭam ।। 

cittatāmre śodhite hi paramārthasuvarṇatām ।
gate akṛtrima ānandaḥ kiṃ dehopalakhaṇḍakaiḥ ।। 

yad vidyate śodhyate tad dhautaḥ kena khapādapaḥ ।
dehādyavidyā satyā ced yukta etāṃ prati grahaḥ ।। 

asatyābhiniviṣṭānāṃ dehādāv adhiyām iha ।
ye nāmopadiśanty ajñāḥ kecit te puruṣaiḍakāḥ ।। 

yathaitad bhāvayet svāntaṃ tathaitad bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
dṛṣṭānto atraindavāhalyākṛtrimendrādiniścayaḥ ।। 

yad yad yathā sphurati svapratibhātma cittaṃ tat tat tathā bhavati dehatayoditātma ।
deho ayam asti na na cāham iti svarūpaṃ vijñānam ekam avagamya niriccham āssva ।। 

deho ayam eṣa ca kilāham iti svabhāvād dehārtham eva yatate tata eti nāśam ।
yakṣādikalpanavaśād bhayam eti bālo niryakṣadeśagata eva kayāpi yuktyā ।। 

jīvāvatāraṇakramopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvinavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavān sa bhagavān mayā kamalasambhavaḥ ।
raghūdvaha punaḥ pṛṣṭo vākyam ākṣipya bhūtapaḥ ।। 

tvayaiva bhagavan proktāś śāpamantrādiśaktayaḥ ।
amoghā iti tā eva kathaṃ moghīkṛtāḥ punaḥ ।। 

śāpena mantravīryeṇa manobuddhīndriyāṇy api ।
sarvāṇy eva vimūḍhāni dṛṣṭāni kila jantuṣu ।। 

yathaitau pavanaspandau yathā snehaghṛte tathā ।
abhinnau tadvad evaitau manodehau sadaiva hi ।। 

atha nāsty eva vā dehaḥ kevalaṃ cetasohitaḥ ।
mudhānubhūyate svapnamṛgatṛṣṇādvicandravat ।। 

ekanāśe dvayor eva nāśo atrābhyupapadyate ।
avaśyabhāvī tu manonāśe dehaparikṣayaḥ ।। 

manaś śāpādibhir doṣaiḥ kathaṃ nākramyate prabho ।
katham ākramyate vāpi brūhi me parameśvara ।। 

brahmā

na tad asti jagatkośe śubhakarmānupātinā ।
yat pauruṣeṇa śuddhena na samāsādyate janaiḥ ।। 

ābrahmasthāvarāntaṃ ca sarvadā sarvajātayaḥ ।
sarvā eva jagaty asmin dviśarīrāś śarīriṇām ।। 

ekaṃ manaśśarīraṃ tu kṣiprakāri sthitaṃ calam ।
akiñcitkaram anyat tu śarīraṃ māṃsanirmitam ।। 

yatra māṃsamayaḥ kāyas sarvasyaiva vaśaṅgataḥ ।
sarvair āyāsyate śāpais tathādhivyādhisañcayaiḥ ।। 

mūkaprāyo hy aśakto asau dīnaḥ kṣaṇavinaśvaraḥ ।
padmapattrāmbucapalo devādivivaśasthitiḥ ।। 

mano nāma dvitīyo yaḥ kāyaḥ kāyavatām iha ।
sa āyatto api nāyatto bhūtānāṃ bhuvanatraye ।। 

pauruṣaṃ svam avaṣṭabhya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam ।
yadi tiṣṭhaty agamyo asau duḥkhānāṃ tad aninditaḥ ।। 

yathā yathāsau yatate manodeho hi dehinām ।
tathā tathāsau bhavati svaniścayaphalaikabhāk ।। 

saphalo māṃsadehasya na kaścit pauruṣakramaḥ ।
manodehasya saphalaṃ sarvam eva svaceṣṭitam ।। 

pavitram anusandhānaṃ cetasā yas smaran sthitaḥ ।
niṣphalās tatra śāpādyāś śilāyām iva sāyakāḥ ।। 

patatv ambhasi vahnau vā kardame vā kalevaram ।
mano yad anusandhatte tad evāpnoti niścitam ।। 

pauruṣātiśayas sarvas sarvabhāvopamardajaḥ ।
dadāty avighnena phalaṃ mano hi manaso mune ।। 

pauruṣeṇa balenāntaś cittaṃ kṛtvā priyāmayam ।
kṛtrimendreṇa duḥkhārtir na dṛṣṭā śāsanāsv api ।। 

pauruṣeṇa manaḥ kṛtvā nīrāgaṃ vigatajvaram ।
māṇḍavyena jitāḥ kleśāś śūlaprānte api tiṣṭhatā ।। 

andhakūpe sthitenāpi mānasair yajñasañcayaiḥ ।
ṛṣiṇā dīrghatapasā samprāptaṃ vaibudhaṃ puram ।। 

indoḥ putrair narair eva puruṣādhyavasāyataḥ ।
dhyānena brahmatā prāptā yā mayāpi na khaṇḍyate ।। 

anye apy sāvadhānā ye dhīrās suramaharṣayaḥ ।
cittāt svam anusandhānaṃ na tyajanti manāg api ।। 

ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva śāpāḥ pāpadṛśas tathā ।
na khaṇḍayanti tān padmapattrāghātāś śilām iva ।। 

ye vāpi khaṇḍitāḥ kecic chāpādyair ādhisāyakaiḥ ।
svavivekākṣamaṃ teṣāṃ mano manye apy apauruṣam ।। 

na kadācana saṃsāre sāvadhānamanā manāk ।
svapne api kaścid asty eva doṣajālaiḥ khalīkṛtaḥ ।। 

manasaiva manas tasmāt pauruṣeṇa pumān iha ।
svakam eva svakenaiva yojayet pāvane pathi ।। 

pratibhātaṃ yad evāsya tathārūpaṃ bhavaty alam ।
kṣaṇād eva manaḥ pīnaṃ bālavetālavan mune ।। 

pratibhāsasyānupadaṃ prāktanīṃ sthitim ujjhati ।
kulālakarmānupadaṃ ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍatām iva ।। 

pratibhātārthatām eti kṣaṇād eva mano mune ।
spandamātrātmakaṃ vāri yathā tuṅgataraṅgatām ।। 

anusandhānamātreṇa sūryabimbe api yāminīm ।
manaḥ paśyaty aśuddhākṣaś candrabimbe dvitām iva ।। 

yat paśyati tad evāśu phalībhūtam idaṃ manaḥ ।
saha harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ bhuṅkte tasmāt tad eva sat ।। 

pratibhānupadaṃ caitac candre apy agniśikhāśatam ।
dṛṣṭvā dāham avāpnoti dagdhaṃ ca paritapyate ।। 

pratibhānupadaṃ cetaḥ kṣāre api hi rasāyanam ।
dṛṣṭvā pītvā parāṃ tṛptiṃ yāti valgati dṛpyati ।। 

pratibhānupadaṃ ceto vyomany api mahāvanam ।
dṛṣṭvā lunāti lūtvā ca punar āropayaty alam ।। 

itthaṃ yad eva parikalpayatīndrajālaṃ kṣipraṃ tad eva paripaśyati tāta cetaḥ ।
nāsaj jagan na ca sad ity avagamya nūnam enāṃ dṛśaṃ vividhabhedavatīṃ jahīhi ।। 

manomāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trinavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti me bhagavatā pūrvam uktam । tad etad adya tubhyaṃ kathitam । tasmād asmād anākhyād brahmaṇas sarvagatāt pūrvaṃ manāṅ mananam utpadyate । svayam eva tad ghanatāṃ prāpya manas sampadyate । tan manas tanmātrakalpanapūrvakaṃ sanniveśaṃ bhāvayati । tatas taijasaḥ puruṣas sampadyate । so ayaṃ brahmety ātmani nāma kṛtavān । tena nāma yo ayaṃ parameṣṭhī tan manastattvaṃ viddhi । sa manastattvākāro bhagavān brahmā saṅkalpamayatvād yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati । tatas teneyam avidyā parikalpitānātmany ātmābhimānamayīti । tena brahmaṇā giritṛṇajaladhimayam idaṃ krameṇa jagat parikalpitam । itthaṃ krameṇa brahmatattvād iyam āgatā sṛṣṭir anyata ivāgateyam iti lakṣyate । 

tasmāt sarvapadārthānāṃ trailokyodaravartinām ।
utpattir brahmaṇo rāma taraṅgānām ivārṇavāt ।। 

evam utpanne jagati yā brahmaṇaś cin mananarūpiṇī sāhaṅkāraṃ parikalpya brahmatām eti । yās tv anyāś cicchaktayas sarvaśaktibhir abhinnā eva bhinnāḥ kalpyanta iva jagati sphāratāṃ nīte pitāmaharūpeṇa manasā samullasanti । ta ete sahasraśo viparivartamānā jīvā ucyante । te abhyutthitā eva cinnabhaso nabhasi tanmātrair āvalitā gaganapavanāntarvartinaś caturdaśavidhāyā bhūtajāter madhyād yasyā abhyāśe tiṣṭhati tasyā eva prāṇaśaktidvāreṇa praviśya śarīraṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā bījatāṃ gacchanti । tadanu yonito jagati jāyante tadanu kākatālīyotpannavāsanāpravāhānurūpakarmaphalabhāgino bhavanti । tataḥ karmaphalarajjubhir vāsanāvalitābhir baddha śarīrā bhramantaḥ patanti protpatanti ca । itthaṃ caitā bhūtajātayaḥ । 

kāścij janmasahasrāḍhyāḥ patanti vanaparṇavat ।
karmavātyā paribhrāntā luṭhanti girikukṣiṣu ।। 

aprameyabhavāḥ kāścit santatājñānamohitāḥ ।
cirajātā bhramantīha bahukalpaśatāny api ।। 

kāścit katipayātītamanoramabhavāntarāḥ ।
viharanti jagaty asmiñ śubhakarmaparāyaṇāḥ ।। 

kāścid vijñātavijñānāḥ param eva padaṃ gatāḥ ।
vātoddhūtāḥ payomadhyaṃ sāmudrā iva bindavaḥ ।। 

utpattis sarvabījānām iti hi brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
āvirbhāvatirobhāvabhaṅgurā bhavarāgiṇī ।। 

vāsanā viṣavaiṣamyavaidhuryajvaradhāriṇī ।
anantasaṅkaṭānarthakāryasaṅkarakāriṇī ।। 

nānādigdeśakālāntaśailakandaracāriṇī ।
racitottamavaicitryā vihitāvartasambhramā ।। 

eṣā jagajjaṅgalajīrṇavallī samyaksamālokakuṭhārakṛttā ।
vilīnavikṣubdhamanaśśarīrā bhūyo na saṃrohati rāmabhadra ।। 

utpattidarśanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturnavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ padārthānām itas tataḥ ।
utpattīnāṃ vibhāgo ayaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi rāghava ।। 

itthamprathamatotpanno yo asminn eva hi janmani ।
brahmaṇas sāttvikī tasya prathamotpattir iṣyate ।। 

idamprathamatānāmnī śubhābhyāsasamudbhavā ।
śubhalokāśrayā sā ca śubhakāryānubandhinī ।। 

sā ced vicitrasaṃsāravāsanāvyavahāriṇī ।
bhāvaiḥ katipayair mokṣam īyuṣī guṇapīvarī ।। 

tādṛkphalapradānaikakāryākāryānumānadā ।
tena rājasasattveti procyate sā kṛtātmabhiḥ ।। 

atha cec citrasaṃsāravāsanāvyavahāriṇī ।
atyantakaluṣā janmasahasrair jñānabhāginī ।। 

tādṛkphalapradānaikadharmādharmānumānadā ।
asāv adhamasattveti procyate sā kṛtātmabhiḥ ।। 

saiva saṅkhyātigānantajanmavṛndād anantaram ।
sandigdhamokṣā yadi tat procyate atyantatāmasī ।। 

anadyatanajanmāttamatis tādṛśakāraṇā ।
yotpattir madhyamā puṃso rāma dvitribhavāntarā ।। 

tadvatkāryānugā loke rājasī rājasattama ।
aviprakṛṣṭajanmādhvā socyate kṛtabuddhibhiḥ ।। 

sā hi tajjanmamātreṇa mokṣayogyā mumukṣubhiḥ ।
tādṛkkāryānumānena proktā rājasasāttvikī ।। 

saiva ced itarair alpair janmabhir mokṣabhāginī ।
tat tādṛśī hi sā tajjñaiḥ proktā rājasarājasī ।। 

saiva janmaśatair mokṣabhāginī cec ciraiṣiṇī ।
tad uktā tādṛgārambhā sadbhī rājasatāmasī ।। 

saiva sandigdhamokṣā cet sahasrair api janmanām ।
tad uktā tādṛgārambhā rājasātyantatāmasī ।। 

bhuktajanmasahasrā tu yotpattir brahmaṇo nṛṇām ।
ciramokṣā hi kathitā tāmasī sā maharṣibhiḥ ।। 

tajjanmanaiva mokṣasya bhāginī cet tad ucyate ।
tajjñais tāmasasattveti tādṛgārambhaśaṃsinī ।। 

bhāvaiḥ katipayair mokṣabhāginī cet tad ucyate ।
tamorājasarūpeti tādṛśair guṇavṛttibhiḥ ।। 

pūrvaṃ janmasahasrāḍhyā puro janmaśatair api ।
mokṣayogyā tataḥ proktā tajjñais tāmasatāmasī ।। 

pūrvaṃ tu janmalakṣyāḍhyā janmalakṣyaiḥ puro api cet ।
sandigdhamokṣā tad asau procyate atyantatāmasī ।। 

sarvā etās samāyānti brahmaṇo bhūtajātayaḥ ।
kiñcitpracalitā bhogāt payorāśer ivormayaḥ ।। 

sarvā etā viniṣkrāntā brahmaṇo jīvarāśayaḥ ।
svatejasspanditā bhogād dīpād iva marīcayaḥ ।। 

sarvā eva samutpannā brahmaṇo bhūtapaṅktayaḥ ।
svamarīcibaloddhūtād alātāṅgāt kaṇā iva ।। 

sarvā evotthitās tasmād brahmaṇo jīvajātayaḥ ।
mandāramañjarīrūpāś candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

sarvā eva samutpannā brahmaṇo dṛśyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
yathā viṭapinaś citrās tadrūpā viṭapaśriyaḥ ।। 

sarvā eva samutpannā brahmaṇo jīvaśaktayaḥ ।
kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrayuktayaḥ kanakād iva ।। 

sarvā evotthitā rāma brahmaṇo jīvarāśayaḥ ।
nirjharād amaloddyotāt payasām iva bindavaḥ ।। 

ajasyaivākhilā rāma bhūtasantatikalpanā ।
ākāśasya ghaṭasthālīrandhrākāśādayo yathā ।। 

sarvā evotthitā lokakalanā brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
śīkarāvartalaharībindavaḥ payaso yathā ।। 

sarvā evotthitā rāma brahmaṇo dṛśyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
mṛgatṛṣṇātaraṅgiṇyo yathā bhāskaratejasaḥ ।। 

sarvā dṛśyadṛśo draṣṭur vyatiriktā na rūpataḥ ।
śītaraśmer iva jyotsnā svālokā iva tejasaḥ ।। 

evam etā hi lokānāṃ jātayo vividhāśrayāḥ ।
tasmād eva samāyānti tasminn eva viśanti ca ।। 

kāścij janmasahasrāntājātayaś cirakālikāḥ ।
kāścit katipayātītajanmarūpā vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

itthaṃ jagatsu vividheṣu vicitrarūpās tasyecchayā bhagavato vyavahāravatyaḥ ।
āyanti yānti nipatanti tathotpatanti bhūtaśriyaḥ kaṇaghaṭā iva pāvakotthāḥ ।। 

brahmaṇas sarvaṃ samutpadyata iti pratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

abhinnau karmakartārau samam eva parāt padāt ।
svayaṃ prakaṭatāṃ yātau puṣpāmodau taror iva ।। 

sarvasaṅkalpanāmukte jīvā brahmaṇi nirmale ।
sphuranti vitate vyomni nīlimna iva candrakāḥ ।। 

aprabuddhajanācāro yatra rāghava dṛśyate ।
tatra brahmaṇa utpannā jīvā ity uktayas sthitāḥ ।। 

samprabuddhajanācāre vaktum evaṃ na śobhanam ।
yad brahmaṇa idaṃ jātaṃ na jātaṃ veti rāghava ।। 

kācid vā kalanā yāvan na nītā rāghava prathām ।
upadeśyopadeśaśrīs tāval loke na śobhate ।। 

ato bhedadaśāṃ dīnām aṅgīkṛtyopadiśyate ।
brahmedam ete jīvāś ca veti vācām ayaṃ bhramaḥ ।। 

iti dṛṣṭyā nirāsaṅgād brahmaṇo jāyate jagat ।
tajjaṃ tad eva tattvaṃ tu gataṃ duravabodhataḥ ।। 

merumandarasaṅkāśā bahavo jīvarāśayaḥ ।
utpatyotpatya saṃlīnās tasminn eva pare pade ।। 

anādyantās sphuranty anye jāyamānās sahasraśaḥ ।
nānākakubnikuñjeṣu pādapeṣv iva pallavāḥ ।। 

jīvaughāś codbhaviṣyanti madhāv iva navāṅkurāḥ ।
tatraiva layam eṣyanti grīṣme madhulatā iva ।। 

tiṣṭhanty ajasraṃ kāleṣu ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ ।
jāyante atha pralīyante parasmiñ jīvarājayaḥ ।। 

puṣpāmodāv ivābhinnau pumān karma ca rāghava ।
parameśāt samāyātau tatraiva viśataś śanaiḥ ।। 

ittham ete jagaty asmin daityoraganarāmarāḥ ।
udbhavanyagbhavābhāvaiḥ prasphuranti punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

hetur viharaṇe teṣām ātmavismaraṇād ṛte ।
na kaścil lakṣyate sādho janmādhvaphalado aparaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

avisaṃvāditārthaṃ sad yat pramāṇikadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
vītarāgair vinirṇītaṃ tac chāstram iti kathyate ।। 

mahāsattvaguṇopetā ye dhīrās samadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
yannideśāḥ phalopetās sādhavas ta udāhṛtāḥ ।। 

iyaṃ tu dṛṣṭis sakalā siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām ।
sādhuvṛttatayā śāstraṃ sarvadaivānuvartate ।। 

sādhusaṃvyavahārasthaṃ śāstraṃ yo nānuvartate ।
bahiṣkurvanti taṃ sarve sa ca duḥkhe nimajjati ।। 

iha loke ca vede ca śrutir itthaṃ sadā prabho ।
yathā karma ca kartā ca paryāyeṇeha saṅgate ।। 

karmaṇā kriyate kartā kartrā karma pramīyate ।
bījāṅkuravad āmnāyo loke vedokta eṣa saḥ ।। 

karmaṇo jāyate jantur bījād iva navāṅkuraḥ ।
jantoḥ prajāyate karma punar bījam ivāṅkurāt ।। 

yayā vāsanayā karma dīyate bhavapañjare ।
tadvāsanānurūpeṇa phalaṃ samanubhūyate ।। 

evaṃ sthite kathaṃ nāma janmabījena karmaṇā ।
vinotpattis tvayā proktā bhūtānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।। 

pakṣeṇānena bhagavan bhavatā janmakarmaṇoḥ ।
tiraskṛtā jagajjātāpy avinābhāvitaitayoḥ ।। 

karmaṇy akāraṇe brahmañ janmādiṣu phaleṣu tu ।
karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti tvayā loke pramārjitam ।। 

sañjāte saṅkare loke karmasv aphaladāyiṣu ।
mātsye nyāye vilasati nāśa evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

kiṃ tat kṛtaṃ bhavaty evaṃ bhagavan brūhi tattvataḥ ।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sphāraṃ chinddhi vedavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sādhu rāghava pṛṣṭo asmi tvayā praśnam imaṃ śubham ।
śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te yena bhṛśaṃ jñānodayo bhavet ।। 

manaso yas samunmeṣaḥ kalākalanarūpataḥ ।
etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījaṃ phalam asyaiva vidyate ।। 

yad eva hi manastattvam utthitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
tad eva karma jantūnāṃ jīvo dehatayā sthitaḥ ।। 

kusumāmodayor bhedo na yathā bhinnayor iha ।
tathaiva karmamanasor bhedo nāsty api bhinnayoḥ ।। 

kriyāspando jagaty asmin karmeti kathito budhaiḥ ।
pūrvaṃ tasya manodehaḥ karmātaś cittam eva hi ।। 

na sa śailo na tad vyoma na sā diṅ na triviṣṭapam ।
asti yatra phalaṃ nāsti kṛtānām ātmakarmaṇām ।। 

aihikaṃ prāktanaṃ vāpi karma yad racitaṃ sphuṭam ।
pauruṣo asau paro yatno na kadācana niṣphalaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇaḥ protthitaṃ cittaṃ karma viddhīha netarat ।
tad eva janatābījaṃ viddhi rāghava netarat ।। 

deśād deśāntaraprāpter anusandhānahetutaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ cetaḥ karma cittam ato viduḥ ।। 

akṣubdhasāgaraprakhyād brahmaṇas spandadharmiṇī ।
yā cid āhur ataś cittaṃ janatājīvatāṃ gatam ।। 

manaḥ karma mano jīvaḥ kāyas tenaiva tanyate ।
ataḥ karma ca kartā ca na bhinnau tilatailavat ।। 

kartṛkarmātmakāv arthāv abhinnau nityam eva hi ।
abodhād bhedam āyātau kalpyamānau mudhaiva hi ।। 

dve karmamanasī rāma mūrkhāṇāṃ na tu dhīmatām ।
samudrāmbu taraṅgāmbu bālānām iva bhedadhīḥ ।। 

paryāyaśabdāv etau hi viddhi tvaṃ cittakarmaṇī ।
paryāyaśabdatāṃ tyaktvā sthite duravabodhataḥ ।। 

manaḥ karmātmakaṃ pūrvaṃ parasmāt sampravartate ।
āmodātmeva kusumaṃ vividhākṛti pādapāt ।। 

kartṛkarmābhidhānīha cetāṃsy avirataṃ padāt ।
parasmāt sampravartante taraṅgā iva sāgarāt ।। 

uddhṛtāny eva tasmiṃs tu jīvasañjñāni tāni tu ।
sphuritvā pravilīyante taraṅgā iva sāgare ।। 

manasā kriyate karma yad yat tat saphalaṃ bhavet ।
manasy eva na kāyotthaṃ kartā karma manas tataḥ ।। 

ālokalāñchitābhoge makure rājate sukham ।
brahmatattvaparāmṛṣṭe kartṛtvaṃ manasi sphuṭam ।। 

guṇo guṇini śauklyādiḥ paṭādau saṃsthito yathā ।
tathā manasi kartṛtvaṃ jīvanāmni vyavasthitam ।। 

yathā śaityādirahitas tuṣāro nopalabhyate ।
tathā karma vinā cittaṃ na kiñcid upalabhyate ।। 

kṛṣṇatāsaṅkṣaye yadvat kṣīyate kajjalaṃ svayam ।
spandātmakarmavigame tadvat prakṣīyate manaḥ ।। 

karmanāśo manonāśo manonāśo hy akarmatā ।
muktasyaiva bhavaty eṣa nāmuktasya kadācana ।। 

vahnyauṣṇyayor iva sadā śliṣṭayoś cittakarmaṇoḥ ।
dvayor ekatarābhāve dvayam eva vilīyate ।। 

cittaṃ sadā spandavilāsam etat spandaikarūpaṃ nanu karma viddhi ।
karmātha cittaṃ kila dharmadharmi padaṃ gate rāma paraspareṇa ।। 

karmapuruṣayor aikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṇṇavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mano hi bhāvanāmātraṃ bhāvanā spandarūpiṇī ।
kriyā tadbhāvitaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ sarvo anudhāvati ।। 

rāmaḥ

vistareṇa mama brahmañ jaḍasyāpy ajaḍākṛteḥ ।
rūpam ārūḍhasaṅkalpaṃ manaso vaktum arhasi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anantasyātmatattvasya sarvaśakter mahātmanaḥ ।
saṅkalpaśaktisahitaṃ yad rūpaṃ tan mano viduḥ ।। 

jaḍājaḍadṛśor madhye dolāyitavapus sthitam ।
yat tattvaṃ dviparāmṛṣṭaṃ tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ cidavabhāsātmā kṛpaṇo asmīti niścayaḥ ।
yas sadākrāntakalanas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ ।। 

bhāvas sadasator madhye nṝṇāṃ sphurati niścalaḥ ।
kalanonmukhatāṃ yātas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ ।। 

kalanātmikayā karmaśaktyā virahitaṃ manaḥ ।
na sambhavati loke asmin guṇahīno guṇī yathā ।। 

yathānalauṣṇyayos sattā na sambhavati bhinnayoḥ ।
tathaiva karmamanasos tathātmamanasor api ।। 

svenaiva cittarūpeṇa karmaṇā phaladharmaṇā ।
saṅkalpaikaśarīreṇa nānāvistaraśālinā ।। 

yā yena vāsanā yatra latevāropitā yathā ।
sā tena phalabhūs tatra tad eva prāpyate tathā ।। 

karmabījaṃ manas spandaḥ kathyate athānubhūyate ।
kriyās tu vividhās tasya śākhāś citraphalās taroḥ ।। 

mano yad anusandhatte tat karmendriyavṛttayaḥ ।
sarvās sampādayanty etās tasmāt karma manas smṛtam ।। 

mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cetaḥ karmātha kalpanā ।
saṃsṛtir vāsanāvidyā prayatnas smṛtir eva ca ।। 

indriyaṃ prakṛtir māyā kriyā cetītarā api ।
citrāś śabdaśriyo bahvyas saṃsārabhramahetavaḥ ।। 

kākatālīyayogena tyaktasphāracamatkṛteḥ ।
citeś cetyānupātinyaḥ kṛtāḥ paryāyavṛttayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

parāyās saṃvido brahmann etāḥ paryāyavṛttayaḥ ।
kalpyamānavicitrārthāḥ kathaṃ rūḍhim upāgatāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

gateva sakalaṅkatvaṃ yadā cit kalanātmakam ।
unmeṣarūpiṇī jātā tadaiva hi manassthitiḥ ।। 

bhāvānām anusandhānaṃ yadā niścitya saṃsthitā ।
tadaiṣā procyate buddhir niyatā grahaṇakṣamā ।। 

yadā mithyābhimānena sattāṃ kalayati svayam ।
ahaṅkārābhidhā tena procyate bhavabandhanī ।। 

idaṃ tyaktvedam āyāti bālavat pelavā yadā ।
vicāraṃ samparityajya tadā sā cittam ucyate ।। 

yadā spandaikadharmatvāt karmapaiśunyaśaṃsinī ।
ādhāvati spandaphalaṃ tadā karmety udāhṛtā ।। 

kākatālīyayogena tyaktvaikadravyaniścayam ।
yadehitaṃ kalpayati bhāvaṃ teneha kalpanā ।। 

pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā prāg sṛṣṭam iti niścayam ।
yadaiṣehāṃ vidhatte antas tadā smṛtir udāhṛtā ।। 

yadā padārthaśaktīnāṃ sambhuktānām ivāntare ।
vasaty astamitānyehaṃ vāsaneti tadocyate ।। 

asty ātmatattvaṃ vimalaṃ dvitīyā dṛṣṭir aṅkitā ।
ajātā hy avidyamānaiva tadāvidyeti kathyate ।। 

sphuraty ātmavināśāya vismārayati tat padam ।
mithyāvikalpajālena tan malaṃ parikalpyate ।। 

śrutvā sṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā vimṛśya ca ।
indram āmodayaty eṣā tenendriyam iti smṛtā ।। 

sarvasya dṛśyajālasya paramātmany alakṣite ।
prakṛtatvena bhāvānāṃ loke prakṛtir ucyate ।। 

sadasattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ vāsattvam añjasā ।
sad vāsad vā vikalpaughaṃ tena māyeti kathyate ।। 

darśanaśravaṇasparśarasanaghrāṇakarmabhiḥ ।
kriyeti kathyate loke kāryakāraṇatāṃ gatā ।। 

citaś cetyānupātinyā gatāyās sakalaṅkatām ।
prasphuradrūpadharmiṇyā etāḥ paryāyavṛttayaḥ ।। 

cittatām upayātāyā gatāyāḥ prākṛtaṃ padam ।
svair eva saṅkalpaśatair bhṛśaṃ rūḍhim upāgatāḥ ।। 

cetanīyakalaṅkāṅkā jāḍyajālānupātinī ।
saṅkhyāvibhāgakalitā svavikalpākulaiva cit ।। 

jīva ity ucyate loke mana ity api kathyate ।
cittam ity ucyate caiva buddhir ity ucyate tathā ।। 

nānāsaṅkalpakalilaṃ paryāyanicayaṃ budhāḥ ।
vadanty asyāḥ kalaṅkinyāś cyutāyāḥ paramārthataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

manaḥ kiṃ syāj jaḍaṃ brahmann atha vāpi ca cetanam ।
ity eko mama tattvajña niścayo antar na jāyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mano hi na jaḍaṃ rāma nāpi cetanatāṃ gatam ।
mlānā jaḍājaḍā dṛṣṭir mana ity eva kathyate ।। 

madhye sadasato rūpaṃ pratibhātaṃ yad ābilam ।
jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ rāma tad etac cittam ucyate ।। 

śāśvatenaikarūpeṇa niścayena vinā sthitiḥ ।
yeha sā cittam ity uktā tasmāj jātam idaṃ jagat ।। 

jaḍājaḍadṛśor madhye dolārūḍhaṃ svakalpanam ।
yac cito mlānarūpiṇyas tad etan mana ucyate ।। 

cinniṣyando hi malinaḥ kalaṅkavikalāntaraḥ ।
mana ity ucyate rāma na jaḍaṃ na ca cinmayam ।। 

tasyemāni vicitrāṇi nāmāni kalitāny alam ।
ahaṅkāramanobuddhijīvādyānītarāṇy api ।। 

yathā gacchati śailūṣo rūpāṇyatvaṃ tathaiva hi ।
mano nāmānyatām eti rāma karmāntaraṃ vrajan ।। 

citrādhikāravaśato vicitrādhikṛtābhidhām ।
yathā yāti naraḥ karmavaśād yāti tathā manaḥ ।। 

yā etāḥ kathitās sañjñā mayā rāghava cetasaḥ ।
etā evānyathā proktā vādibhiḥ kalpanāśataiḥ ।। 

svabhāvābhimatāṃ yuktim āropya manasā kṛtāḥ ।
manobuddhīndriyādīnāṃ vicitrā nāmagītayaḥ ।। 

mano hi jaḍam anyasya bhinnam anyasya jīvataḥ ।
tathāhaṅkṛtir anyasya buddhir anyasya vādinaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāramanobuddhidṛṣṭayas sṛṣṭakalpanāḥ ।
ekarūpatayā proktā yā mayā raghunandana ।। 

naiyāyikair itarathā tādṛśāḥ parikalpitāḥ ।
anyathā kalpitās sāṅkhyaiś cārvākair api cānyathā ।। 

jaiminīyair ārhataiś ca bauddhair vaiśeṣikais tathā ।
anyair api vicitrehaiḥ pāñcarātrādibhis tathā ।। 

sarvair eva hi gantavyaṃ tat padaṃ pāramātmikam ।
vicitradeśakālotthaiḥ puram ekam ivādhvagaiḥ ।। 

ajñānāt paramārthasya viparītāvabodhataḥ ।
kevalaṃ vivadante te vikalpair ārurukṣavaḥ ।। 

svaṃ mārgam abhiśaṃsanti vādinaś citrayā dṛśā ।
vicitradeśakālotthā mārgaṃ svaṃ pathikā iva ।। 

tair mithyā rāghava proktāḥ karmamānasacetasām ।
svavikalpārpitair arthais svās svā vaicitryayuktayaḥ ।। 

yathaikaḥ puruṣas snānadānādānāśanakriyāḥ ।
kurvāṇaḥ kartṛvaicitryam eti tadvad idaṃ manaḥ ।। 

vicitrakāryavaśato nāmabhedena kartṛtā ।
manasaḥ procyate jīvavāsanākarmanāmabhiḥ ।। 

cittam evedam akhilaṃ sarveṇaivānubhūyate ।
acitto hi naro loke paśyann api na paśyati ।। 

śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca ghrātvā bhuktvā śubhāśubham ।
antar harṣaṃ viṣādaṃ ca samanasko hi vindate ।। 

āloka iva rūpāṇām arthānāṃ kāraṇaṃ manaḥ ।
badhyate baddhacitto hi muktacitto hi mucyate ।। 

taṃ jaḍānāṃ varaṃ viddhi jaḍaṃ yenocyate manaḥ ।
taṃ cāvagacchata jaḍaṃ mano yasya hi cetanam ।। 

na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ yad idaṃ protthitaṃ manaḥ ।
vicitrasukhaduḥkhehaṃ jagad abhyutthitaṃ tataḥ ।। 

ekarūpe hi manasi saṃsāraḥ pravilīyate ।
ābilaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhrānter bhrāntyā jagad upasthitam ।। 

ajaḍaṃ hi mano nāma saṃsārasya na kāraṇam ।
jaḍaṃ copaladharmāpi saṃsārasya na kāraṇam ।। 

manaḥ kāraṇam arthānāṃ rūpāṇām iva bhāsanam ।
cittād ṛte anyad yad asti tad acittasya kiṃ jagat ।। 

na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ tasmāj jagati rāghava ।
sarvasya bhūtajātasya samagraṃ pravilīyate ।। 

nānākarmadaśāveśān mano nānābhidheyatām ।
ekaṃ vicitratām etya yāti kālo yathārtubhiḥ ।। 

yadi nāmāmanaskānām ahaṅkārendriyakriyāḥ ।
kṣobhayanti śarīraṃ tat santu jīvādayaḥ pare ।। 

darśaneṣu tu ye proktā bhedā manasi tarkataḥ ।
kvacit kvacid vādakarair apavādakaraiḥ kila ।। 

te rāma na virudhyante viśiṣyante na ca kvacit ।
sarvā hi śaktayo deve vidyante sarvage yataḥ ।। 

yadaivaṃ khalu śuddhāyā manāg api hi saṃvidaḥ ।
jaḍeva śaktir uditā tadā vaicitryam āgatam ।। 

ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur jāyate cetanāj jaḍaḥ ।
nityaṃ prabuddhāt paramād brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtis tathā ।। 

avidyāvaśataś citrā bhāvanās sthitim āgatāḥ ।
cittaparyāyaśabdārthā bhinnās teneha vādinām ।। 

jīvo manaś ca nanu buddhir ahaṅkṛtiś cety evaṃ prathām upagateyam anirmalā cit ।
saivocyate jagati cetanacittajīvasañjñāgaṇena kila nāsti vivāda eṣaḥ ।। 

manassañjñāvicāro nāma sargaḥ

saptanavatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

brahman manasa evedam ata āḍambaraṃ smṛtam ।
yatas tad eva karmeti vākyārthād upalabhyate ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvoparaktena manasaivorarīkṛtam ।
marucaṇḍātapeneva bhāsurāvaraṇaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

brahman manye jagaty asmin mana evākṛtiṃ gatam ।
kvacin naratayā rūḍhaṃ kvacit suratayoditam ।। 

kvacid daityatayollāsi kvacid yakṣatayotthitam ।
kvacid gandharvatāṃ prāptaṃ kvacit kinnararūpi ca ।। 

nānāvananagābhogapurapattanarūpayā ।
manye vitatayākṛtyā mana eva vijṛmbhate ।। 

evaṃ sthite śarīraughas tṛṇakāṣṭhalavopamaḥ ।
tadvicāraṇayā ko artho vicāryaṃ mana eva naḥ ।। 

tenedaṃ sarvam ābhogi jagad atyākulaṃ tatam ।
manye tadvyatirekeṇa paramātmaiva śiṣyate ।। 

ātmā sarvapadātītas sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ ।
tatprasādena saṃsāre mano dhāvati valgati ।। 

ato manye manaḥ karma tac charīreṣu kāraṇam ।
jāyate mriyate tad dhi nātmanīdṛgvidho guṇaḥ ।। 

mana evaṃ vicāreṇa manye vilayam eṣyati ।
manovilayamātreṇa tataś śreyo bhaviṣyati ।। 

manonāmni parikṣīṇe karmaṇy ahitasambhrame ।
mukta ity ucyate jantuḥ punar nāma na jāyate ।। 

bhagavān bhavatā proktā jātayas trividhā nṛṇām ।
prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāsāṃ manas sadasadātmakam ।। 

tat kathaṃ śuddhacinnāmnas tattvāc chuddhivivarjitam ।
utthitaṃ sphāratāṃ yātaṃ jagaccitrakaraṃ manaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ākāśā hi trayo nāma vidyante vitatāntarāḥ ।
cittākāśaś cidākāśo bhūtākāśas tṛtīyakaḥ ।। 

ete hi sarvasāmānyās sarvatraiva vyavasthitāḥ ।
śuddhacittattvaśaktyā tu labdhasattaikatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantarastho yo vettā sattāvabodhakaḥ ।
vyāpī samastabhūtānāṃ cidākāśas sa ucyate ।। 

sarvabhūtahitas sraṣṭā yaḥ kalākalanātmakaḥ ।
yenedam ātataṃ sarvaṃ cittākāśas sa ucyate ।। 

daśadiṅmaṇḍalābhogair avyucchinnavapur hi yaḥ ।
bhūtātmā so ayam ākāśaḥ pavanābdādisaṃśrayaḥ ।। 

ākāśacittākāśau dvau cidākāśavaśodbhavau ।
cit kāraṇaṃ hi sarvasya kāryaughasya dinaṃ yathā ।। 

jaḍo asmi na jaḍo asmīti niścayo malinaś citaḥ ।
yas tad eva mano viddhi tenākāśādi bhāvyate ।। 

aprabuddhātmaviṣayam ākāśatrayakalpanā ।
kalpyate hy upadeśārthaṃ prabuddhaviṣayaṃ na tu ।। 

ekam eva paraṃ brahma sarvaṃ sarvāvapūrakam ।
prabuddhaṃ vimalaṃ nityaṃ kalākalanavarjitam ।। 

dvaitādvaitasamudbhedair vākyasandarbhagarbhitaiḥ ।
upadiśyata evājño na prabuddhaḥ kathañcana ।। 

yāvad rāmāprabuddhatvam ākāśatrayakalpanā ।
tāvad evāvabodhārthaṃ mayā ta upadiśyate ।। 

ākāśacittākāśādyāś cidākāśāt kalaṅkitāt ।
prasūtā dāvadahanād yathā marumarīcayaḥ ।। 

cito hi malinaṃ rūpaṃ cittatāṃ samupāgatam ।
trijagantīndrajālāni racayaty ākulātmakam ।। 

cittatvam asya malinasya cidātmakasya tattvasya dṛśyata idaṃ nanu bodhahīnaiḥ ।
śuktau yathā rajatatā na tu bodhavadbhir maurkhyeṇa bandha iha bodhabalena mokṣaḥ ।। 

cidākāśamāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yataḥ kutaścid utpannaṃ cittaṃ yat kiñcid eva hi ।
nityam ātmavimokṣāya yatate yatnato anagha ।। 

asti nāmātivitatā śūnyā śāntāpi bhīṣaṇā ।
araṇyānī nabho yasyāṃ lakṣyate koṇamātrakam ।। 

tasyām eko hi puruṣas sahasrakaralocanaḥ ।
paryākulamatir bhīmas saṃsthito vitatākṛtiḥ ।। 

sahasreṇa sa bāhūnām ādāya parighān bahūn ।
praharaty ātmanaḥ pṛṣṭhe svātmanaiva palāyate ।। 

dṛḍhaprahāraiḥ praharan svayam evātmanātmani ।
pravidravati bhītātmā sa yojanaśatāny api ।। 

krandan palāyamāno asau gatvā dūram itas tataḥ ।
śramavān vivaśākāro viśīrṇacaraṇāṅgakaḥ ।। 

patito avaśa evāśu mahaty andho andhakūpake ।
kṛṣṇarātritamobhīmanabhogambhīrakoṭare ।। 

tataḥ kālena mahatā so andhakūpāt samutthitaḥ ।
punaḥ prahāraiḥ praharan vidravaty ātmanātmanaḥ ।। 

punar dūrataraṃ gatvā karañjavanagulmakam ।
praviṣṭaḥ kaṇṭakavyāptaṃ śalabhaḥ pāvakaṃ yathā ।। 

tasmāt karañjagahanād viniṣkramya kṣaṇād iva ।
svayaṃ prahāraiḥ praharan vidravaty ātmanātmanaḥ ।। 

punar dūrataraṃ gatvā tam evāndho andhakūpakam ।
sa sampraviṣṭas tvarayā viśīrṇāvayavākṛtiḥ ।। 

andhakūpāt samutthāya praviṣṭaḥ kadalīvanam ।
punaḥ prahāraiḥ praharan vidravaty ātmanātmanaḥ ।। 

punar dūrataraṃ gatvā śaśāṅkakaraśītalam ।
kadalīkānanaṃ kāntaṃ sampraviṣṭo hasann iva ।। 

kadalīṣaṇḍakāt tasmād viniṣkramya punaḥ kṣaṇāt ।
kadalīkānanāc chubhraṃ karañjavanagulmakam ।। 

karañjakavanāt kūpaṃ kūpād rambhāvanāntaram ।
praviśya praharaṃś caiva svayam ātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpanijācāras so avalokyādarān mayā ।
avaṣṭabhya balād eva muhūrtaṃ paribodhitaḥ ।। 

pṛṣṭaś ca kas tvaṃ kim idaṃ kenārthena karoṣi vā ।
kiṃ nāmābhimataṃ te syāt kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi ।। 

iti pṛṣṭena kathitaṃ tena me raghunandana ।
nāhaṃ kaścin na caivedaṃ mune kiñcit karomy aham ।। 

tvayāyam avabhagno asmi tvaṃ me śatrur arindama ।
tvayā dṛṣṭo asmi naṣṭo asmi duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca ।। 

iti uktvā mām asāv aṅgāny ālokya svāni tiṣṭhavān ।
rurodārtaravaṃ dīno megho varṣann ivāravī ।। 

kṣaṇamātreṇa tatrāsāv upasaṃhṛtya rodanam ।
svāny aṅgāni samālokya jahāsendvaṃśuvat sitam ।। 

athāṭṭahāsaparyante sa pumān purato mama ।
krameṇa tāni tatyāja svāny aṅgāni samantataḥ ।। 

prathamaṃ patitaṃ tasya śiraḥ paramadāruṇam ।
tatas te bāhavaḥ paścād vakṣas tadanu codaram ।। 

atha kṣaṇena sa pumāṃs tāny aṅgāni ca sambhramaḥ ।
sarvam antardhim āyātaṃ svapno bodhavato yathā ।। 

vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ ।
dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram ।। 

so api prahārān paritaḥ prayacchan svayam ātmani ।
bāhubhiḥ pīvarākārais svayam eva palāyate ।। 

kūpe patati kūpāt tu samutthāyābhidhāvati ।
punaḥ patati kuñje antaḥ punar ārtaḥ palāyate ।। 

punaḥ praviśati svacchaṃ kṣaṇaṃ śiśirakānanam ।
ruṣṭaḥ punaḥ punas tuṣṭaḥ punaḥ praharati svayam ।। 

evamprāyanijācāraś ciram ālokya sasmayam ।
sa mayā samavaṣṭabhya paripṛṣṭas tathaiva hi ।। 

tenaivātha krameṇāsau ruditvā samprahasya ca ।
aṅgair viśīrṇatām etya yayāv alam alakṣyatām ।। 

vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ ।
dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram ।। 

praharaṃs tadvad evāsau svayam eva palāyate ।
palāyamānaḥ patito mahaty andho andhakūpake ।। 

tatrāhaṃ suciraṃ kālam avasaṃ tatpratīkṣakaḥ ।
yāvat sa sucireṇāpi kūpād abhyutthitaś śaṭhaḥ ।। 

athāham udyato gantuṃ dṛṣṭavān puruṣaṃ punaḥ ।
tādṛśaṃ tādṛśācāraṃ prayatantaṃ tathaiva ca ।। 

avaṣṭabhya tathaivāśu tasya proktaṃ punar mayā ।
tathaivotpalapatrākṣa nāsau tad avabuddhavān ।। 

kevalaṃ mām asau mūḍho naiva jānāmi kiñcana ।
āḥ pāpa durdvijety uktvā svavyāpārapāro yayau ।। 

atha tasmin mahāraṇye tathā viharatā mayā ।
bahavas tādṛśā dṛṣṭāḥ puruṣā doṣakāriṇaḥ ।। 

matpṛṣṭāḥ kecid āyānti svapnasambhramavac chamam ।
maduktaṃ nābhinandanti kecic chvavirutaṃ yathā ।। 

vinipatyāndhakūpebhyaḥ kecin na protthitāḥ punaḥ ।
kadalīṣaṇḍakāt kecic cireṇāpi na nirgatāḥ ।। 

kecid antarhitās sphāre karañjavanakuñjake ।
na kvacit sthitim āyānti kecid bhramaparāyaṇāḥ ।। 

evaṃvidhā sā vitatā raghūdvaha mahāṭavī ।
adyāpi vidyate yasyām itthaṃ te puruṣās sthitāḥ ।। 

sā ca dṛṣṭāṭavī rāma tvayeha vyavahāriṇā ।
bālyāt tu buddhitattvasya na tvaṃ smarasi rāghava ।। 

sā bhīṣaṇā vividhasaṅkaṭasaṅkaṭāṅgī ghorāṭavī ghanatamogahanā ca lokaiḥ ।
āgatya nirvṛtim abuddhihatair na tajjñair āsevyate kusumagulmakavāṭikeva ।। 

cittopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonaśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kāsau mahāṭavī brahman kadā dṛṣṭā kathaṃ mayā ।
ke ca te puruṣās tatra kiṃ tat kartuṃ kṛtodyamāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

raghunātha mahābāho śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te akhilam ।
na sā mahāṭavī nāma dūre naiva ca te narāḥ ।। 

yeyaṃ saṃsārapadavī gambhīrāsārakoṭarā ।
tāṃ tvaṃ śūnyāṃ vikārāḍhyāṃ viddhi rāma mahāṭavīm ।। 

vicārālokalabhyena yadaikenaiva vastunā ।
pūrṇā nānyena saṃyuktā kevalaiva tadaiva sā ।। 

tatra ye te mahākārāḥ puruṣāḥ prasaranti hi ।
manāṃsi tāni viddhi tvaṃ duḥkhe nipatitāny alam ।। 

draṣṭā yo ayam ahaṃ teṣāṃ saviveko mahāmate ।
vivekena mayā tāni dṛṣṭāny anyāni rāghava ।। 

mayā tāny eva budhyante vivekena manāṃsi hi ।
satataṃ svaprakāśena kamalānīva bhānunā ।। 

matprabodhaṃ samāsādya matprasādān mahāmate ।
manāṃsi kānicit tāni gatāny upaśamāt param ।। 

kānicin nābhinandanti māṃ vivekaṃ vimohataḥ ।
mattiraskāravaśataḥ kūpeṣv eva patanty uta ।। 

ye te andhakūpā gahanā narakās te raghūdvaha ।
manāṃsi tāni teṣv antar nipatanty utpatanti ca ।। 

yat tat karañjagahanaṃ tat kalatrarasaṃ viduḥ ।
duḥkhakaṇṭakasambādhaṃ mānuṣyaṃ trividhaiṣaṇam ।। 

karañjagahanaṃ yāni praviṣṭāni manāṃsi tu ।
mānuṣye tāni jātāni tatraikarasikāni ca ।। 

kadalīkānanaṃ yat tac chaśāṅkakaraśītalam ।
tan manohlādanakaraṃ svargaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha ।। 

kadalīkānanaṃ yāni sampraviṣṭāni tāni tu ।
svargaikarasikāni tvaṃ manāṃsi jñātum arhasi ।। 

praviṣṭāny andhakūpāntar nirgatāni na yāni tu ।
mahāpātakayuktāni tāni cittāni rāghava ।। 

karañjavanayātāni nirgatāni na yāni tu ।
tāni mānuṣyajātāni cittāni raghunandana ।। 

kānicit samprabuddhāni tatra muktāni bandhanāt ।
kānicid bahurūpāṇi yoner yoniṃ viśanti hi ।। 

kānicit puṇyapūtena tapasā dāruṇātmanā ।
dhārayanti śarīrāṇi saṃsthitāny ucitāny ca ।। 

yair ahaṃ pumbhir abudhair durdvijeti tiraskṛtaḥ ।
tair manobhir anātmajñais svavivekatiraskṛtaḥ ।। 

tvayā dṛṣṭo vinaṣṭo asmi śatrur me tvam iti drutam ।
yad uktaṃ tad dhi cittena galatā paridevitam ।। 

ruditaṃ yan mahākrandaṃ puṃsā bahvasru rāghava ।
tad bhogajālaṃ tyajatā manasā rodanaṃ kṛtam ।। 

ardhaprāptavivekasya na prāptasyāmalaṃ padam ।
cetasas tyajato bhogān paritāpo bhṛśaṃ bhavet ।। 

rudatāṅgāni dṛṣṭāni kāruṇyenāvabodhinā ।
kaṣṭam etāni santyajya kiṃ prayāmīti cetasā ।। 

ardhaprāptavivekasya na prāptasyāmalaṃ padam ।
cetasas tyajato aṅgāni paritāpo hi vardhate ।। 

hasitaṃ yat tad ānandi puṃsā madavabodhataḥ ।
pariprāptavivekena tat tuṣṭaṃ rāma cetasā ।। 

pariprāptavivekasya tyaktasaṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ ।
cetasas tyajato rūpam ānando hi vivardhate ।। 

hasatāṅgāni dṛṣṭāni puṃsā yāny upahāsataḥ ।
tāni dṛṣṭāni manasā vipralambhapradāni hi ।। 

mithyāvikalparacitair vipralabdham ahaṃ ciram ।
ity aṅgāny upahāsena dṛṣṭāni svāni cetasā ।। 

manaḥ prāptavivekaṃ hi viśrāntaṃ vitate pade ।
prāktanīṃ dīnatāṃ dhīraṃ hasat paśyati dūrataḥ ।। 

yadāsau samavaṣṭabhya mayā pṛṣṭaḥ prayatnataḥ ।
tad viveko balāc cittam ādatta iti darśitam ।। 

yad aṅgāni viśīrṇāni gatāny antardhim agrataḥ ।
tac cittena vinārthecchāś śāmyantīti pradarśitam ।। 

sahasranetrahastatvaṃ yat puṃsaḥ parivarṇitam ।
tad anantākṛtitvaṃ hi cetasaḥ paridarśitam ।। 

yad ātmani prahāraughaiḥ pumān praharati svayam ।
tat tatkukalpanāghātaiḥ praharaty ātmano manaḥ ।। 

palāyate yat puruṣas svātmanaḥ praharan svayam ।
svavāsanāprahārebhyas tan manaḥ prapalāyate ।। 

svayaṃ praharati svāntaṃ svayam eva svayecchayā ।
palāyate svayaṃ caiva paśyājñānavijṛmbhitam ।। 

svavāsanopataptāni sarvāṇy eva manāṃsi hi ।
svayam eva palāyante gantum utkāni tat padam ।। 

yad idaṃ vitataṃ duḥkhaṃ tat tanoti svayaṃ manaḥ ।
svayam evātikhinnātma punas tasmāt palāyate ।। 

saṅkalpavāsanājāle svayam āyāti bandhanam ।
mano lālāmayair vālaiḥ kośakārakrimir yathā ।। 

yathānartham avāpnoti tathā krīḍati cañcalam ।
bhāvi duḥkham apaśyan svaṃ durlīlābhir ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

apaśyan kāṣṭharandhrasthavṛṣaṇākramaṇaṃ yathā ।
kīlotpāṭī kapir duḥkham etīdaṃ hi manas tathā ।। 

cirapālanayā cetaś cirabhāvanayā tathā ।
abhyāsāt svasthatām etya na bhūyaḥ pariśocati ।। 

manaḥpramādād vardhante duḥkhāni girikūṭavat ।
tadvaśād eva naśyanti sūryasyāgre himaṃ yathā ।। 

yāvajjīvam anindyayā varamate śāstrārthasañjātayā pālyaṃ vāsanayā mano hi munivan maunena rāgādiṣu ।
paścāt pāvanapāvanaṃ padam ajaṃ tat prāpyate śītalam yatsaṃsthena na śocyate punar alaṃ puṃsā mahāpatsv api ।। 

cittopākhyānaṃ samāptaṃ nāma sargaḥ

śatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cittam etad upāyātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāt padāt ।
atanmayaṃ tanmayaṃ ca taraṅgas sāgarād iva ।। 

prabuddhānāṃ mano rāma brahmaiveha na cetarat ।
jalasāmānyabuddhīnām abdher nānyas taraṅgakaḥ ।। 

mano rāmāprabuddhānāṃ saṃsārabhramakāraṇam ।
apaśyato ambusāmānyam anyatāmbutaraṅgayoḥ ।। 

aprabuddhadhiyāṃ pakṣe tatprabodhāya kevalam ।
vācyavācakasambandhakṛto bhedaḥ prakalpyate ।। 

sarvaśakti paraṃ brahma nityam āpūrṇam avyayam ।
na tad asti na tasmin yad vidyate vitatātmani ।। 

sarvaśaktir hi bhagavān yaiva tasmai hi rocate ।
śaktis tām eva vitatāṃ prakāśayati sarvagaḥ ।। 

cicchaktir brahmaṇo rāma śarīreṣv abhidṛśyate ।
spandaśaktiś ca vāteṣu jaḍaśaktis tathopale ।। 

dravaśaktir athāmbhassu tejaśśaktis tathānale ।
śūnyaśaktir athākāśe bhāvaśaktir bhavasthitau ।। 

brahmaṇas sarvaśakter hi dṛśyate daśadiggatā ।
nāśaśaktir vināśyeṣu śokaśaktiś ca śokiṣu ।। 

ānandaśaktir mudite vīryaśaktir mahābhaṭe ।
sargeṣu sargaśaktiś ca kalpānte sarvahāritā ।। 

phalapuṣpalatāpattraśākhāviṭapaparvavān ।
vṛkṣabīje yathā vṛkṣas tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

pratibhāsavaśād eva madhyasthaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ ।
jīvetarābhidhaṃ cittam antar brahmaṇi dṛśyate ।। 

nānātarulatāgulmajālapallavaśālayaḥ ।
yathartau śaktayas tadvaj jīvehā brahmaṇi sthitāḥ ।। 

vyuptasarvartukusumā kṣmā deśavidhibhedataḥ ।
yathā dadāti puṣpāṇi tathā cittāni lokakṛt ।। 

kvacit kāścit kadācic ca tasmād āyānti śaktayaḥ ।
deśakālāt tu vaicitryāt kṣmātalād iva śālayaḥ ।। 

nirvikalpakacinmātranāmāvijñātakalpanam ।
brahmaivedam ahaṃ tvaṃ ca jagadāśāś ca rāghava ।। 

sa ātmā sarvago rāma nityoditamahāvapuḥ ।
yan manāṅmananāṃ śaktiṃ dhatte tan mana ucyate ।। 

piñchabhrāntir yathā vyomni payasy āvartadhīr yathā ।
pratibhāsakalāmātraṃ mano jīvas tathātmani ।। 

yad etan manaso rūpam uditaṃ mananātmakam ।
brāhmī śaktir asau tasmād brahmaiva tad arindama ।। 

idaṃ tad aham ity eva vibhāgaḥ pratibhāsajaḥ ।
manaso brahmaṇo anyatve mohaḥ paramakāraṇam ।। 

yad yac caitanmananatā kiñcit sadasadātmakam ।
śabditaṃ sarvaśaktes sā śaktir brahmaiva tāṃ viduḥ ।। 

manassattātmakaṃ nāma yad etan manasi sthitam ।
taj jātaṃ pratibhāsena tenaivānyena naśyati ।। 

pratiyogivyavacchedasaṅkhyārūpādayaś ca ye ।
manaśśabdaiḥ prakalpyante brahmajān brahma viddhi tān ।। 

yathā yathāsya manasaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pravartate ।
tathā tathaiva bhavati dṛṣṭānto atra kilaindavāḥ ।। 

svayam akṣubdhavimale yathā spando mahāmbhasi ।
saṃsārakāraṇaṃ jīvas tathāyaṃ paramātmani ।। 

jñasya sarvacitā rāma brahmaivāvartate sadā ।
kallolormitaraṅgoghair abdher jalam ivātmani ।। 

dvitīyā nāsti sattaiva nāmarūpakriyātmikā ।
pare nānātaraṅge abdhau kalpaneva jaletarā ।। 

jāyate naśyati tathā yad idaṃ yāti tiṣṭhati ।
tad idaṃ brahmaṇi brahma brahmaṇaiva vivartate ।। 

svātmany evātapas tīvro mṛgatṛṣṇikayā yathā ।
vaicitryeṇāvicitro api sphuraty ātmātmanā tathā ।। 

kāraṇaṃ karma kartā ca jananaṃ maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ ।
sarvaṃ brahmaiva nānyo asti tad vinā kalanārthataḥ ।। 

na lobho asti na moho asti na tṛṣṇāsti nirañjanāḥ ।
ka ātmany ātmano lobhas tṛṣṇā moho athavā kutaḥ ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ātmaiva kalanākramaḥ ।
hemāṅgadatayevāyam ātmodeti manastayā ।। 

abuddhaṃ brahma yad rāma tac cittaṃ jīva ucyate ।
aparijñāta evāśu bandhur āyāty abandhutām ।। 

cinmayenātmanājñena svasaṅkalpanayā svayam ।
śūnyatā gaganeneva jīvatā prakaṭīkṛtā ।। 

ātmaivānātmavad iha jīvo jagati rājate ।
dvīndutvam iva durdṛṣṭes sac cāsac ca samutthitam ।। 

mohādiśabdārthadṛśor etayor atyasambhavāt ।
sarvatvād ātmanaś caiva kvātmā baddhaḥ kva mucyate ।। 

nityāsambhavabandhasya bandho astīti kukalpanā ।
yasya kālpanikas tasya mokṣo mithyā na satyataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

mano yanniścayaṃ yāti tat tad bhavati nānyathā ।
tena kālpaniko nāsti bandhaḥ katham iva prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mithyākālpanikaiveyaṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ bandhakalpanā ।
mithyaivābhyuditā teṣām itarā mokṣakalpanā ।। 

evam ajñānakalane bandhamokṣadṛśau smṛte ।
vastutas tu na bandho asti na mokṣo asti mahāmate ।। 

kalpanāyā avastutvaṃ samprabuddhamatiṃ prati ।
rajjvaher iva he prājña na tv abuddhamatiṃ prati ।। 

bandhamokṣādisammoho na prājñasyāsti kaścana ।
sammoho bandhamokṣādir ajñasyaivāsti rāghava ।। 

ādau manas tadanu bandhavimokṣadṛṣṭī paścāt prapañcaracanā bhuvanābhidhānā ।
ityādikā sthitir iyaṃ hi gatā pratiṣṭhām ākhyāyikā bhavati bālajanociteva ।। 

cittacikitsāpūrvakaṃ cittotpattivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādhikaśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kim ucyate muniśreṣṭha bālakākhyāyikākramaḥ ।
krameṇa kathayaitan me manovarṇanakāraṇam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mugdhamugdhamatir bālo dhātrīṃ pṛcchati rāghava ।
kāñcit karṇapathāyātāṃ varṇayākhyāyikām iti ।। 

sā bālasya vinodāya dhātrī tasya mahāmate ।
ākhyāyikāṃ kathayati prasannamadhurākṣarām ।। 

kvacit santi mahātmāno rājaputrās trayaś śubhāḥ ।
vistīrṇe śūnyanagare vyomnīvojjvalatārakāḥ ।। 

dvau na jātau tathaikaś ca garbha eva hi na sthitaḥ ।
śubhācārāś śubhākārā iti bhāntīndavo yathā ।। 

athātyuttamalābhārtham ekadā samavāyataḥ ।
nirbandhavaḥ khinnamukhāś śokopahatacetasaḥ ।। 

te tasmāc chūnyanagarān nirgatā vikṛtānanāḥ ।
gaganād iva saṃśliṣṭā budhaśukraśanaiścarāḥ ।। 

śirīṣasukumārāṅgāḥ pṛṣṭhato arkeṇa tāpitāḥ ।
mārge glāniṃ gatā grīṣmatāpārtyā pallavā iva ।। 

santaptamārgasikatādagdhapādasaroruhāḥ ।
hā tātāmbeti śocanto mṛgā yūthacyutā iva ।। 

darbhāgrabhinnacaraṇās tāpasvinnāṅgasandhayaḥ ।
ullaṅghya dūram adhvānaṃ dhūlidhūsaramūrtayaḥ ।। 

mañjarījālajaṭilaṃ phalapallavitāmbaram ।
mṛgapakṣigaṇādhāraṃ prāpur mārge tarutrayam ।। 

tasmin vṛkṣatraye vṛkṣau dvau na jātau manāg api ।
bījam eva tṛtīyasya svārohasya na vidyate ।। 

viśrāntās te pariśrāntās tatraikasya taror adhaḥ ।
pārijātatale svarge śakrānilayamā iva ।। 

phalāny amṛtasṛṣṭāni bhuktvā pītvā ca tadrasam ।
kṛtvā gulucchakair mālāś ciraṃ viśramya te yayuḥ ।। 

punar dūrataraṃ gatvā madhyāhne samupasthite ।
sarittritayam āsedus taraṅgataralāravam ।। 

tatraikā pariśuṣkaiva manāg apy ambu na dvayoḥ ।
vidyate saritor dṛṣṭir andhalocanayor iva ।। 

pariśuṣkā bhṛśaṃ yāsau tasyāṃ te sasnur ādṛtāḥ ।
gharmārtā divi gaṅgāyāṃ viṣṇubrahmaharā iva ।। 

ciraṃ kṛtvā jalakrīḍāṃ pītvāmṛtasamaṃ payaḥ ।
jagmus te rājatanayāḥ prahṛṣṭamanasas sukham ।। 

athāsedur dinasyānte lambamāne divākare ।
bhaviṣyan navanirmāṇaṃ nagaraṃ nagasannibham ।। 

patākāpadminīvyāptanīlāmbarajalāśayam ।
dūraśrutisamullāsagāyannagaramaṇḍalam ।। 

dadṛśus tatra ramyāṇi trīṇi sadvibhavāni te ।
maṇikāñcanagehāni śṛṅgāṇīva mahāgireḥ ।। 

anirmite dve sadane ekaṃ nirbhitti tatra vai ।
abhittimandiraṃ cāru praviṣṭās te narās trayaḥ ।। 

sampraviśyopaviśyāśu viharanto varānanāḥ ।
prāpus sthālītrayaṃ tatra taptakāñcananirmitam ।। 

yatra karparatāṃ yāte dve ekā cūrṇatāṃ gatā ।
jagṛhuś cūrṇarūpāṃ tāṃ sthālīṃ te dīrghabuddhayaḥ ।। 

droṇair navanavatyā tais tasyāṃ droṇena cāndhasaḥ ।
tatra droṇaśataṃ hīnaṃ randhitaṃ bahubhojibhiḥ ।। 

tato bhuktaṃ janaśatair brāhmaṇānāṃ śatais tathā ।
tribhis tai rājaputraiś ca parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataiḥ ।। 

bhaviṣyannagare tasmin rājaputrās trayo api te ।
sukham adya sthitāḥ putra mṛgayāvyavahāriṇaḥ ।। 

ākhyāyikaiṣā kathitā mayā ramyā tavānagha ।
etāṃ hṛdi kuru prājña vidagdhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi ।। 

dhātryeti kathitā rāma bālāyākhyāyikā śubhā ।
tuṣṭiṃ jagāma bālaś ca śubhākhyāyikayānayā ।। 

eṣā hi kathitā rāma cittākhyānakathāṃ prati ।
bālakākhyāyikā tubhyaṃ mayā kamalalocana ।। 

iyaṃ saṃsāraracanā sthitim evam upāgatā ।
bālakākhyāyikevograis saṅkalpair vyarthakalpitaiḥ ।। 

vikalpajālikaiveyaṃ pratibhāsātmikānagha ।
bandhamokṣādikalanārūpeṇa pravijṛmbhate ।। 

saṅkalpamātrād itarad vidyate neha kiñcana ।
saṅkalpavaśataḥ kiñcin nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaḥ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
saṅkalpakalitaṃ sarvam etat svapnavad ātmanaḥ ।। 

rājaputrās trayo nadyo bhaviṣyannagaraṃ tathā ।
yathā saṅkalparacanā tatheyaṃ trijagatsthitiḥ ।। 

saṅkalpamātram abhitaḥ parisphurati cañcalam ।
payomātrātmako ambhodhir ambhasīvātmanātmani ।। 

saṅkalpamātram utpannaṃ prathamaṃ paramātmani ।
tad idaṃ sphāratāṃ yātaṃ vyāpārair divasaṃ yathā ।। 

saṅkalpajālakalanaiva jagat samagraṃ saṅkalpam eva nanu viddhi vilāsi cetyam ।
saṅkalpamātram alam utsṛja nirvikalpam āśritya niścayam avāpnuhi rāma śāntim ।। 

bālakākhyāyikā nāma sargaḥ

dvyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svasaṅkalpavaśān mūḍho moham eti na paṇḍitaḥ ।
ayakṣe yakṣasaṅkalpān muhyate śiśunaiva hi ।। 

rāmaḥ

ko asau saṅkalpitaḥ kena yakṣo brahmavidāṃ vara ।
asataiva mahāmohaṃ yenādatte sadaiva hi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

amunā bhūtasaṅgena yakṣo ahaṅkārarūpadhṛt ।
vetālaś śiśuneveha mithyaiva parikalpitaḥ ।। 

ekasminn eva sarvasmin sthite paramavastuni ।
kutaḥ ko ayam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ nāma kiloditaḥ ।। 

vastuto nāsty ahaṅkāraḥ paramātmany abhedataḥ ।
asamyagdarśanān mārgī sarit tīvrātape yathā ।। 

manomaṇir mahārambhas saṃsāra iti lakṣyate ।
ātmanātmānam āśritya sphuraty ambu yathāmbunā ।। 

asamyagdarśanaṃ tena tyaja rāma nirāśrayam ।
sāśrayaṃ satyam ānandi samyagdarśanam āśraya ।। 

dhiyā vicāradharmiṇyā mohasaṃrambhahīnayā ।
vicārayādhunā satyam asatyaṃ samparityaja ।। 

abaddho baddha ity uktvā kiṃ śocasi mudhaiva hi ।
anantasyātmatattvasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena badhyate ।। 

nānānānātvakalanāsv avibhinne mahātmani ।
sarvasmin brahmatattve asmin kiṃ baddhaṃ kiṃ vimucyate ।। 

anārto apy ārtisadbhāvāc chinne aṅge kiṃ ca tāmyasi ।
bhedābhedavikārārtiḥ kācin nātmani vidyate ।। 

dehe naṣṭe kṣate kṣīṇe kātmanaḥ kṣatir āgatā ।
bhastrāyāṃ paridagdhāyāṃ tatsthaṃ hema na naśyati ।। 

dehaḥ patatu vodetu kā naḥ kṣatir upāgatā ।
ko naṣṭaḥ prakṣate puṣpe āmodo vyomasaṃśrayaḥ ।। 

āpatantu vapuḥpadmaṃ sukhaduḥkhahimaśriyaḥ ।
ākāśoḍḍayane alīnāṃ kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā ।। 

dehaḥ patatu vodetu yātu vā gaganāntaram ।
tadvilakṣaṇarūpasya kāsau bhavati te kṣatiḥ ।। 

yathā payodamarutor yathā ṣaṭpadapadmayoḥ ।
tathā rāghava sambandhas tvaccharīratvadātmanoḥ ।। 

mano nāma śarīraṃ hi jagatas sakalasya ca ।
ātmaśaktiś cid asyātmā na naśyati kadācana ।। 

yo asāv ātmā mahāprājña naśyatīty avagacchasi ।
na naśyati kadācid sa kiṃ mudhā paritapyase ।। 

viśīrṇe abhre yathā vātaś śuṣke abje ṣaṭpado yathā ।
yāty anantapadaṃ vyoma tathātmā dehasaṅkṣaye ।। 

saṃsāre asmin viharato mano api hi na naśyati ।
jñānāgninā vinā jantor ātmanāśe tu kā kathā ।। 

yaḥ kuṇḍabadaranyāyo yo ghaṭākāśayoḥ kramaḥ ।
sthitir dehātmanos saiva savināśāvināśayoḥ ।। 

badaraṃ hastam āyāti yathā sphuṭati kuṇḍake ।
ātmā gaganam āyāti tathā calati dehake ।। 

kumbhe gacchaty akumbhatvaṃ kumbhākāśo yathāmbare ।
tiṣṭhaty evam ayaṃ dehī dehe kṣīṇe nirāmayaḥ ।। 

mano deho hi jantūnāṃ deśakālatirohitaḥ ।
muhur mṛtipaṭācchannaś śete kiṃ paridevanā ।। 

deśakālatirodhāne mūḍho api maraṇe naraḥ ।
kiṃ bibheti mahābāho neha naśyati kaścana ।। 

atas tvaṃ vāsanāṃ rāma mithyaivāham iti sthitām ।
tyaja pakṣīśvaro vyomagamanotka ivāṇḍakam ।। 

yaiṣā hi mānasī śaktir iṣṭāniṣṭānubandhinī ।
anayedaṃ mudhā bhrāntyā svapnavat parikalpitam ।। 

avidyaiṣā durantaiṣā duḥkhāyaiṣā hi vardhate ।
aparijñāyamānaiṣā tanotīdam asanmayam ।। 

eṣā kuḍyavad ākāśaṃ tuṣāram analaṃ yathā ।
paripaśyati vibhrāntā svarūpasya svabhāvataḥ ।। 

asad evedam ārambhamantharaṃ sad ivotthitam ।
kalpitaṃ jagad ābhogi dīrghasvapna ivaitayā ।। 

bhāvanāmātram evāsyās svarūpaṃ kartṛtāṃ gatam ।
jagatām ākulaṃ cakṣur vyomni piñchakatām iva ।। 

layam asyās svarūpaṃ tvaṃ naya rāma vicāraṇāt ।
yathā himaśilāyās tu tapanād divasādhipaḥ ।। 

himābhāvārthino arkasya svodayena hitaṃ yathā ।
sidhyaty evaṃ vicāreṇa manonāśārthino arthitam ।। 

avidyā sampravṛttā hi vitatānarthadurgamā ।
nānendrajālakalaṇaṃ śāmbarī hema varṣati ।। 

svavināśakriyāṃ caitāṃ mana eva karoty alam ।
mano hy ātmavadhaṃ nāma nāṭakaṃ parinṛtyati ।। 

ātmānam īkṣate cetas svavināśāya kevalam ।
na hi jānāti durbuddhir vināśaṃ pratyupasthitam ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svavikalpadaśām idam ।
manas saṃsādhayaty āśu kleśo nātropayujyate ।। 

svaṃ vikalpya vikalpyāśu vivekopahitaṃ manaḥ ।
santyajya rūpam ārambhi karoty ātmāvabodhanam ।। 

mahodayo manonāśo mahotpāto asya tūdayaḥ ।
manonāśe prayatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru mā manaso jave ।। 

aviralasukhaduḥkhavṛkṣaṣaṇḍe viṣamakṛtāntamahorage vane asmin ।
prabhur idam akhile vivekahīnaṃ subhaga mano mahad āpadekahetuḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

tryuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parasmād utthitaṃ cetaḥ kaṇo lola ivārṇavāt ।
sphāratām etya bhuvanaṃ tanotīdam itas tataḥ ।। 

hrasvaṃ dīrghīkaroty āśu dīrghaṃ nayati kharvatām ।
svatāṃ nayaty anyad alaṃ svaṃ tathaivānyatām api ।। 

prādeśamātram api yad vastu bhāvanayaiva tat ।
svayaṃ sampannayaivāśu karoty adrīndrabhāsuram ।। 

labdhapratiṣṭhaṃ paramāt padād ullasitaṃ manaḥ ।
nimeṣeṇaiva saṃsārān karoti na karoti ca ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca ।
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ cittād etad upāgatam ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyaśaktiparyākulīkṛtam ।
bhāvād bhāvāntaraṃ yāti lolatvān naṭavan manaḥ ।। 

sad asattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ cāsan nayaty alam ।
tādṛśāny eva cādatte sukhaduḥkhāni bhāvitam ।। 

yathāniścayam ādatte yathaiva capalaṃ manaḥ ।
hastapādādisaṅghātas tathā prayatate sadā ।। 

tatas saiva kriyā cittasamīhitam alaṃ phalam ।
kṣaṇāt prayacchati latā kāle sikteva tādṛśam ।। 

citrāṃ krīḍanakaśreṇīṃ yathā paṅkād gṛhe śiśuḥ ।
karoty evaṃ mano rāma vikalpāt kurute jagat ।। 

manaśśiśujanakrīḍāmṛdūdgāralaveṣv ataḥ ।
kim ekaṃ tatpadārtheṣu rūpaṃ jagati kalpyate ।। 

karoty ṛtukaraḥ kālo yathā rūpānyatāṃ taroḥ ।
cittam evaṃ padārthānāṃ teṣām evānyatām iha ।। 

manorathe tathā svapne saṅkalpakalanāsu ca ।
goṣpadaṃ yojanavyūhas svāsu līlāsu cetasaḥ ।। 

kalpaṃ kṣaṇīkaroty etat kṣaṇaṃ nayati kalpatām ।
manas tadāyattam ato deśakālakramaṃ viduḥ ।। 

tīvramandatvasaṃvegād bahutvālpatvabhedataḥ ।
vilambate na ca ciraṃ na ca cittam aśaktitaḥ ।। 

vyāmohasambhramānarthadeśakālagamāgamāḥ ।
cetasaḥ prabhavanty ete pādapād iva pallavāḥ ।। 

jalam eva yathāmbhodhir auṣṇyam eva yathānalaḥ ।
tathā vividhasaṃrambhas saṃsāraś cittam eva hi ।। 

sakartṛkarmakaraṇaṃ yad idaṃ cetyam ātatam ।
draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyāḍhyaṃ tat sarvaṃ cittam eva vaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ jaganti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi saṃlakṣyate svayam upāgatam ātmabhedaiḥ ।
keyūramaulikaṭakais tadatatsvarūpaṃ tyaktaikakāñcanadhiyeva janena hema ।। 

cittamāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam ।
jāgatīhendrajālaśrīś cittāyattā sthitā yathā ।। 

asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe nānānagavanākulaḥ ।
uttarāḥ pāṇḍavā nāma sphīto janapado mahān ।। 

nīrandhranavajambīravanaviśrāntatāpasaḥ ।
vidyādharīkṛtalatādolopavanapattanaḥ ।। 

vātoddhūtābjakiñjalkapuñjapiñjaraparvataḥ ।
lasatkusumasambhāravanamālāvataṃsakaḥ ।। 

karañjamañjarīkuñjaguptaparyantajaṅgalaḥ ।
kharjūrāntaritagrāmaghuṅghumadhvanitāmbaraḥ ।। 

pākapiṅgamilacchreṇiśālikedārapiṅgalaḥ ।
nīlakaṇṭharavoddāmavanamaṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ ।। 

sārasāravasaṃrambharaṇatkamalakānanaḥ ।
tamālapaṭalānīlagirigrāmakakuṇḍalaḥ ।। 

vicitravihagavyūhavirāvāhitakākaliḥ ।
nadīparisaronnidrapāribhadradrumāruṇaḥ ।। 

gāyatkalamakedāradārikāhūtamanmathaḥ ।
puṣpasthalavaladvātavyādhūtakusumāmbudaḥ ।। 

darīgṛhaviniṣkrāntasiddhacāraṇavanditaḥ ।
svargād iva samāhūya lāvaṇyam abhinirmitaḥ ।। 

gāyatkinnaraparyantakadalīṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaḥ ।
