mandānilabaloddhūtapuṣpopavanapāṇḍuraḥ ।। 

tatrāsti lavaṇo nāma rājā paramadhārmikaḥ ।
hariścandrakulodbhūto bhūmāv iva divākaraḥ ।। 

yadyaśaḥkusumottaṃsapāṇḍuraskandhamaṇḍalāḥ ।
tatra śailā virājante harāḥ proddhūlitā iva ।। 

kṛpāṇaśakalotkṛttaniśśeṣārātimaṇḍalāt ।
arātilokaḥ prāpnoti yadanusmaraṇāj jvaram ।। 

yasyodārasamārambham āryalokānupālanam ।
caritaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti harer iva ciraṃ janāḥ ।। 

yasyāpsarobhir adrīndramūrdhasv amarasadmasu ।
vikāsipulakollāsaṃ gīyante guṇagītayaḥ ।। 

yasya svassundarīgītā lokapālaciraśrutāḥ ।
viriñcahaṃsair dhvanyante svābhyāsād guṇagītayaḥ ।। 

svapneṣv api na sāmānyā yasyodāracamatkṛteḥ ।
rāma dṛṣṭāś śrutā vāpi dainyadoṣamarīcayaḥ ।। 

jihmatāṃ yo na jānāti na dṛṣṭā yena gṛdhnutā ।
udāratā yena dhṛtā brahmaṇevākṣamālikā ।। 

dināṣṭabhāga ākāśa āgate divasādhipe ।
kadācit sa sabhāsthāne siṃhāsanagato abhavat ।। 

sukhopaviṣṭe tatrāsmin rājanīndāv ivāmbare ।
praviśantīṣu sāmantasenāsu ca sasambhramam ।। 

gāyantīṣv atha kāntāsu sūpaviṣṭeṣu rājasu ।
manoharati sāhlāde vīṇāvaṃśakalārave ।। 

cārucāmarahastāsu savilāsāsu rājani ।
devāsuraguruprakhye viśrānte mantrimaṇḍale ।। 

prastuteṣu prakṛṣṭeṣu rājakāryeṣu mantribhiḥ ।
proktāsu deśavārtāsu nipuṇaiś cāratantribhiḥ ।। 

itihāsamaye puṇye vācyamāne ca pustake ।
paṭhatsu ca stutīḥ puṇyāḥ puraḥprahveṣu vandiṣu ।। 

sabhāṃ viveśa sāṭopaḥ kaścit tām aindrajālikaḥ ।
varṣaṇāhitasaṃrambho vasudhām iva vāridaḥ ।। 

sa nanāma mahīpālaṃ śikharodārakandharam ।
pādopāntagataḥ kāntaṃ śailaṃ phalatarur yathā ।। 

sacchāyasyonnatāṃsasya phalinaḥ puṣpadhāriṇaḥ ।
saṃviveśa puro rājñas taror agre kapir yathā ।। 

capalo lampaṭo arthānāṃ sāmodasukhamārutam ।
uvācotkandharaṃ bhūpaṃ sa padmam iva ṣaṭpadaḥ ।। 

vilokaya vibho tāvad ekām iha kharolikām ।
pīṭhastha eva sāścaryāṃ vyomnaś candra ivāvanim ।। 

ity uktvā bhramitā tena piñchikā bhramadāyinī ।
nānāviracanābījaṃ māyeva paramātmanā ।। 

tāṃ dadarśa mahīpālas tejorekhāvirājitām ।
śakras suravimānasthas svakārmukalatām iva ।। 

sabhāṃ saindhavasāmanto viveśāsmin kṣaṇe tadā ।
tārāpatikarākīrṇāṃ vyomavīthīm ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

taṃ caivānujagāmāśvaś śasyaḥ paramavegavān ।
devalokonmukhas tv abdheś śakram uccaiśśravā iva ।। 

sa tam aśvam upādāya pārthivaṃ samuvāca ha ।
soccaiśśravā iva kṣīrasāgaro marutāṃ patim ।। 

idam uccaiśśravaḥprakhyaṃ hayaratnaṃ mahīpate ।
jave jayanaśīle tu mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ ।। 

aśvo ayam asmatprabhuṇā prabho samprahitas tvayi ।
rājate hi padārthaśrīr mahatām arpaṇāc chubhā ।। 

ity uktavati tasmiṃs tu pratyuvācaindrajālikaḥ ।
jaladastanite śānte cātako bhūdharaṃ yathā ।। 

sadaśvam enam āruhya bhuvanaṃ vihara prabho ।
svapratāpāhitānalpaśobhām urvīṃ ravir yathā ।। 

aśvam ālokayām āsa tenokta iti pārthivaḥ ।
nirhrādasūcitaṃ meghaṃ sa mayūra ivotsukaḥ ।। 

athānimeṣayā dṛṣṭyā rājā citropamākṛtiḥ ।
babhūvālokayann aśvaṃ lipikarmārpitopamam ।। 

kṣaṇam ālokya piñchāśvau tasthau sa sthagitekṣaṇaḥ ।
dṛṣṭakṣubdhasamudrādrir bhīrur ekataro yathā ।। 

tasthau muhūrtayugmaṃ tu dhyānāsakta ivātmani ।
vītarāgo munir buddhaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ ।। 

bodhitaḥ kenacin nāsau svapratāpajitorjitaḥ ।
bhayāt kām apy ayaṃ bhūpaś cintāṃ cintayatīti ha ।। 

babhūvuḥ kevalaṃ tatra nisspandasitacāmarāḥ ।
cāmariṇyo hi śarvaryas stambhitendukarā iva ।। 

virejur vismayāpūrṇā nisspandās te sabhāsadaḥ ।
nisspandakiñjalkadalāḥ padmāḥ paṅkakṛtā iva ।। 

praśaśāma sabhāsthāne janakolāhalaś śanaiḥ ।
praśāntaprāvṛṣo vyomnas sāmbhodam iva garjitam ।। 

sandehasāgaronmagnā jagmuś cintāṃ sumantriṇaḥ ।
viṣīdati gadāpāṇāv asurājāv ivāmarāḥ ।। 

vitatavismayajihmatayā tayā janatayā bhavamohaniṣaṇṇayā ।
stimitacakṣuṣi bhūmipatau sthite mukulitābjavanasya dhṛtā dyutiḥ ।। 

indrajālopākhyāne nṛpavyāmoho nāma sargaḥ

pañcottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

muhūrtadvitayenātha bodham āpa mahīpatiḥ ।
prāvṛṣeṇyāmbunirmuktam ambhoruham ivottamam ।। 

āsanāt sāṅgadottaṃsaḥ prabuddho asāv akampata ।
savanābhogaśṛṅgāgro bhūkampa iva parvataḥ ।। 

babhāv ardhaprabuddho asāv āsane parikampitaḥ ।
vikṣubdha iva pātālāvaraṇe mandarācalaḥ ।। 

patantaṃ dhārayām āsus taṃ purogā nṛpaṃ bhujaiḥ ।
meruṃ pralayavikṣubdhaṃ kulaśailās taṭair iva ।। 

purogair dhāryamāṇo asau paryākulamatir nṛpaḥ ।
vīcivikṣobhitasyendor babhāra vadane śriyam ।। 

ko ayaṃ pradeśaḥ kasyeyaṃ sabheti sa nṛpaś śanaiḥ ।
dadhvāna majjadambhojakośastha iva ṣaṭpadaḥ ।। 

athovāca sabhā deva kim etad iti sādaram ।
raṇanmadhukarī bhānuṃ dṛṣṭarāhum ivābjinī ।। 

athainaṃ paripapracchuḥ purogā mantriṇas tathā ।
pralayollāsasantrastaṃ mārkāṇḍeyam ivāmarāḥ ।। 

tvayītthaṃ saṃsthite deva vayam atyantam ākulāḥ ।
abhedyam api bhindanti nirnimittabhramā manaḥ ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyeṣu paryantaviraseṣu ca ।
bhogeṣv iva vikalpeṣu keṣu te luṭhitaṃ manaḥ ।। 

satatodāravṛttāsu kathāsu pariśīlitam ।
manas te nirmalaṃ kasmāt sambhrameṣu nimajjati ।। 

tucchālambanam ālūnaviśīrṇaṃ lokavṛttiṣu ।
mano moham upādatte na mahattvavijṛmbhitam ।। 

sātatyena hi yaivāsya manaso vṛttir utthitā ।
śarīramadamattāsu tām evānuvidhāvati ।। 

atucchālambanaṃ śuddhaṃ prabuddhaṃ guṇahāri ca ।
tavāpi hi manaś citram ālūnam iva lakṣyate ।। 

anabhyastavivekaṃ hi deśakālavaśānugam ।
mantrauṣadhavaśaṃ yāti mano nodāravṛttimat ।। 

nityam āttavivekasya katham ālūnaśīrṇatā ।
dunoti vitataṃ ceto vātyeva vibudhācalam ।। 

iti jātāsu gīrṣv asya bhūpateḥ kāntir ānanam ।
bhūṣayām āsa śītāṃśuṃ māsānta iva pūrṇatā ।। 

rarāja rājā sāścaryam unmīlitavilocanaḥ ।
gate himartau prollāsipuṣpaugha iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

athātisambhramāścaryakhinnasmitamukho babhau ।
āsannamṛtyum ālokya rāhum indur ivāmbare ।। 

aindrajālikam ālokya provācātha hasann iva ।
babhruṃ hiṃsātmakaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarparūpīva takṣakaḥ ।। 

jālma jālaṃ jaṭālena kim etad bhavatā kṛtam ।
mīnaspandāprasanno abdhiḥ kṣaṇād eti prasannatām ।। 

citraṃ citrā hi devasya padārthaśataśaktayaḥ ।
suśaktam api me cittam ābhir mohe niveśitam ।। 

kva vayaṃ lokaparyāyavṛttāntaparidevinaḥ ।
kva manomohadāyinyo vitatāḥ prākṛtāpadaḥ ।। 

apy abhyastamahājñānaṃ manas tiṣṭhati dehake ।
kadācin moham ādatte kṣaṇaṃ matimatām api ।। 

idam āścaryam ākhyānaṃ śṛṇutātha sabhāsadaḥ ।
mama śāmbarikeṇeha yan muhūrtaṃ pradarśitam ।। 

dṛṣṭavān aham etasmin bahvīḥ kāryadaśāś calāḥ ।
muhūrte protthitadhvastaśakrās sṛṣṭīr ivābjajaḥ ।। 

ity uktvonmukhanetreṣu sabhyeṣu sa hasann iva ।
rājā varṇayituṃ citraṃ vṛttāntam upacakrame ।। 

rājā

iha vividhapadārthasaṅkulāyāṃ hradanadaparvatapattanākulāyām ।
kulaśikharisamudrasaṅkaṭāyāṃ bhuvi vibhavāvalito asty ayaṃ pradeśaḥ ।। 

rājaprabodho nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rājā

asti tāvad ayaṃ deśo nānāvananadīyutaḥ ।
vasudhāmaṇḍalasyāsya sahodara ivānujaḥ ।। 

asmiṃś cāyam aham rājā paurābhimatavṛttimān ।
indras svarga ivāsyāṃ tu sabhāyām adya saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

yāvad abhyāgato dūrāt kaścic chāmbarikas tv ayam ।
rasātalād abhyutthito māyī maya iva svayam ।। 

anena bhrāmitaiṣeha piñchikā rājirājitā ।
kalpāntapavanābhreṇa śakracāpalatā yathā ।। 

ālokyaitām ahaṃ lolām asyāśvasya purassthiteḥ ।
pṛṣṭham ārūḍhavān eka ātmanā bhrāntamānasaḥ ।। 

tato adriṃ pralayakṣubdhaṃ puṣkarāvartako yathā ।
tathā calantaṃ calitas svaśvam ārūḍhavān aham ।। 

gantuṃ pravṛtto mṛgayām eko aham atha raṃhasā ।
urvarām iva nirbhettuṃ kallolaḥ pralayāmbudheḥ ।। 

tenānilavilolena dūraṃ nīto asmi vājinā ।
bhogābhyāsajaḍenājño mugdhas svamanasā yathā ।। 

akiñcanamanaśśūnyaṃ strīcittam iva durbhagam ।
tataḥ pralayanirdagdhajagadāspadabhīṣaṇam ।। 

niṣpakṣi kṣāranīhāraṃ nirvṛkṣam ajalaṃ mahat ।
samprāpto aham aparyantam araṇyaṃ tāntavāhanaḥ ।। 

tad dvitīyam ivākāśaṃ tathāṣṭamam ivāmbudhim ।
pañcamaṃ sāgaram iva saṃśuṣkaṃ śūnyakoṭaram ।। 

jñasyeva vitataṃ ceto mūrkhasyeva ruṣo ajavam ।
adṛṣṭajanasaṃsargam ajātatṛṇapallavam ।। 

araṇyaṃ mahad āsādya matir me khedam āgatā ।
lalanevaitya dāridryaṃ nirannaphalabāndhavam ।। 

kacanmarumarīcyambupūraplutakakubmukhe ।
āsūryāntaṃ dinaṃ tatra prakrāntaṃ sīdatā mayā ।। 

tad araṇyaṃ mayātītam atikṛcchreṇa khedinā ।
vivekineva saṃsāro madhyaśūnyātatākṛtiḥ ।। 

taddinenātivāhyāhaṃ prāptavāñ jaṅgalaṃ mahat ।
astādrisānuṃ khinnaḥ khaṃ śūnyaṃ bhrāntveva bhāskaraḥ ।। 

jambūkadambaprāyeṣu kalālāpāḥ patatriṇaḥ ।
yatra sphuranti ṣaṇḍeṣu pānthānām iva bandhavaḥ ।। 

yatra śaṣpaśikhāśreṇyo dṛśyante aviralās sthale ।
kadarthalakṣmyā jihmasya hṛdīvānandavṛttayaḥ ।। 

pūrvād araṇyād arasāt tad dhi kiñcit sukhāvaham ।
atyantaduḥkhān maraṇād varaṃ vyādhir hi jantuṣu ।। 

tatra jambīraṣaṇḍasya talaṃ samprāptavān aham ।
mārkāṇḍeya ivāgendram ekārṇavavihārataḥ ।। 

ālambitā mayā tatra skandhasaṃsaṅginī latā ।
nīlā jaladamāleva tāpataptena bhūbhṛtā ।। 

mayi pralambamāne asyāṃ prayātas sa turaṅgamaḥ ।
gaṅgāvalambini jane yathā duṣkṛtasañcayaḥ ।। 

ciradīrghādhvagaḥ khinnas tatra viśrāntavān aham ।
bhānur astācalotsaṅge tale kalpataror iva ।। 

yāvat samastasaṃsāravyavahārabharais samam ।
ravir viśramaṇāyeva niviṣṭo astācalāṅgane ।। 

śanaiś śyāmikayā graste samaste bhuvanodare ।
rātrisaṃvyavahāreṣu sampravṛtteṣu jaṅgale ।। 

ahaṃ tanutṛṇe tasmin pelave ṣaṇḍakodare ।
nilīno aviralālasyas svanīḍe vihago yathā ।। 

vipadbhraṣṭavivekasya cchinnāśasya galatsmṛteḥ ।
vikrītasyeva dīnasya magnasyevāndhakūpake ।। 

tatra kalpasamā rātrir mohamagnasya me gatā ।
ekārṇavohyamānasya mārkāṇḍeyamuner iva ।। 

na snātavān na sthitavān na tadā bhuktavān aham ।
kevalaṃ me gatā rātris sāpadāṃ dhuri tiṣṭhataḥ ।। 

vinidrasya vidhairyasya sphuratas saha pallavaiḥ ।
mama duḥkhātidairghyeṇa sā vyatīyāya śarvarī ।। 

tatas timiralekhāsu saha tārendukairavaiḥ ।
mayīvāpadyamānāsu mlānatām alasānanaiḥ ।। 

śāmyantīṣu ca vetālakṣveḍāsv ajanajaṅgale ।
saha śītārtimaddantapaṅktiṭāṅkārasītkṛtaiḥ ।। 

mām abantaranirmagnaṃ hasantīm iva dṛṣṭavān ।
ahaṃ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prātar madhupānāruṇām iva ।। 

kṣaṇād ajña iva jñānaṃ daridra iva kāñcanam ।
dṛṣṭavān aham arkaṃ khavāraṇārohaṇonmukham ।। 

utthāya vāravāṇaṃ ca tata āsphoṭitaṃ mayā ।
hasticarma hareṇeva sandhyānṛttānurāgiṇā ।। 

pravṛttas tām ahaṃ sphārāṃ vihartuṃ jaṅgalasthalīm ।
kālo jagatkuṭīṃ kalpadagdhabhūtagaṇām iva ।। 

na kiñcid dṛśyate tatra bhūtaṃ jaraḍhajaṅgale ।
abhijāto guṇalavo yathā mūrkhaśarīrake ।। 

kevalaṃ vigatāśaṅkaṃ ṣaṇḍabhramaṇacañcalāḥ ।
cīcīkūcīcīvacanā viharanti vihaṅgamāḥ ।। 

athāṣṭabhāgam āpanne vyomno divasanāyake ।
śuṣkāvaśyāyaleśāsu snātāsv iva latāsu ca ।। 

bhramatātra mayā dṛṣṭā dārikaudanadhāriṇī ।
gṛhītāmṛtasatkumbhā dānaveneva mādhavī ।। 

tarattārakanetrāṃ tāṃ śyāmām adhavalāmbarām ।
aham abhyāgatas tatra śarvarīm iva candramāḥ ।। 

mahyam odanam āśv etad bāle balavadāpade ।
dehi dīnārtiharaṇāt sphāratāṃ yānti sampadaḥ ।। 

kṣud antar dahatīyaṃ māṃ bāle vṛddhim upeyuṣī ।
kṛṣṇasarpī prasūteva koṭarasthā jaraddrumam ।। 

yācñayāpi tayā mahyam itthaṃ dattaṃ na kiñcana ।
yatnaprārthitayā lakṣmyā yathā duṣkṛtine dhanam ।। 

kevalaṃ cirakālena mayy atyantānugāmini ।
ṣaṇḍāt ṣaṇḍaṃ nipatati cchāyābhūte purassthite ।। 

tayokto hārakeyūriṃś caṇḍālīṃ viddhi mām iti ।
rākṣasīm iva sukrūrāṃ puruṣāśvagajānanām ।। 

rājan yācanamātreṇa matto nāpnoṣi bhojanam ।
grāmyād anabhijātehāt saujanyam iva sundara ।। 

ity uktavatyā gacchantyā skhalantyeva pade pade ।
kuñjakeṣu nimajjantyā līlāvanatayoditam ।। 

dadāni bhojanam idaṃ bhartā bhavasi cen mama ।
loko nopakaroty arthaṃ sāmānyas snigdhatāṃ vinā ।। 

vāhayaty atra me dāntān uḍḍāre pukkasaḥ pitā ।
śmaśāna iva vetālaḥ kṣudhito dhūlidhūsaraḥ ।। 

tasyedam annaṃ bhavati bhartṛtve dīyate sthite ।
prāṇair api hi sampūjyā vallabhāḥ puruṣā yataḥ ।। 

athoktā sā mayā bhartā bhavāmi tava suvrate ।
kenāpadi vicāryante varṇadharmakulakramāḥ ।। 

tatas tayaudanād ardhaṃ mahyam ekaṃ samarpitam ।
mādhavīvāmṛtād ardham indrāyāgnimate purā ।। 

jambūphalarasaḥ pītas sa bhuktaḥ pukkasaudanaḥ ।
viśrāntaṃ ca mayā tatra mohāpahṛtacetasā ।। 

māṃ taḍākam ivāpūrya sā prāvṛṭśyāmalā gatā ।
hastena samupādāya prāṇaṃ bahir iva sthitam ।। 

durākṛtiṃ durārambham āsasāda bhayapradam ।
pitaraṃ pīvarākāram avīcim iva śāsanā ।। 

tayā madanuṣaṅgiṇyā svārthas tasmai niveditaḥ ।
mātaṅgāya bhramaryeva nissvanenālilagnayā ।। 

sa tasyā bāḍham ity uktvā dinānte samupasthite ।
mumoca dāntāv ābaddhau kṛtāntaḥ kiṅkarāv iva ।। 

nīhārābhrakaḍārāsu dikṣu proddhūlitāsv iva ।
vetālavad vanāt tasmād dinānte calitā vayam ।। 

kṣaṇena pakkaṇaṃ prāptās sandhyāyāṃ dīrghajaṅgalāt ।
śmaśānād iva vetālāś śmaśānam itaran mahat ।। 

vikartitavarāhāśvakapikukkuṭavāyasam ।
raktasiktorvarābhāgaprabhramanmakṣikāgaṇam ।। 

śoṣārthaprasṛtārdrāntratandrījālapatatkhagam ।
niṣkuṭāsthitajambīraṣaṇḍalagnaśvajāghani ।। 

śuṣyadguruvasāpiṇḍapūrṇālindalasatkhagam ।
dṛtiprasaktaraktāktacarmasravadasṛglavam ।। 

bālahastasthitakravyapiṇḍāraṇitamakṣikam ।
jarjarajyeṣṭhacaṇḍālatarjitāraṭitārbhakam ।। 

tat praviṣṭā vayaṃ kīrṇaśiro'ntraṃ bhīmapakkaṇam ।
mṛtabhūtaṃ jagat kalpe kṛtāntānucarā iva ।। 

sambhramopahitānalpakadalīdalapīṭhake ।
aham āsthitavāṃs tatra nave śvaśuramandire ।। 

śvaśrvā me kekarākṣyās tu tenāsrulavacakṣuṣā ।
jāmātāyam iti proktaṃ tayā tad abhinanditam ।। 

atha viśramya caṇḍālabhojanāny ajināsane ।
sañcitāny upabhuktāni duṣkṛtānīva bhūriśaḥ ।। 

anantaduḥkhabījāni namanojñatarāṇy api ।
tāni praṇayavākyāni śrutāny asubhagāny alam ।। 

nirabhrāmbaranakṣatre kasmiṃścin divase tataḥ ।
tais tair ārambhasaṃrambhais tair vastravibhavārpaṇaiḥ ।। 

dattātha tena sā mahyaṃ kumārī bhayadāyinī ।
sukṛṣṇā kṛṣṇavarṇena duṣkṛteneva śāsanā ।। 

sarabhasam abhito vinedur atra prasṛtamahāmadirāsavāś śvapākāḥ ।
hatapaṭupaṭahā vilāsavantas svayam iva duṣkṛtarāśayo mahāntaḥ ।। 

caṇḍālīvivāho nāma sargaḥ

saptottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rājā

bahunātra kim uktena svotsavāvarjitāśayaḥ ।
tataḥprabhṛti tatrāhaṃ sampannaḥ puṣṭapukkasaḥ ।। 

saptarātrotsavasyānte kramān māsāṣṭakaṃ gatam ।
puṣpitā sātha sampannā sthitā garbhavatī tataḥ ।। 

prāsūta duḥkhadāṃ kanyāṃ vipad duḥkhakriyām iva ।
sā kanyā vavṛdhe śīghraṃ mūrkhacinteva pīvarī ।। 

punaḥ prāsūta sā varṣais tribhiḥ putram aśobhanam ।
anartham iva durbuddhir āśāpāśavidhāyakam ।। 

punaḥ prāsūta kanyāṃ ca punar apy arbhakaṃ tataḥ ।
kalatravān ahaṃ jāto vane jaraḍhapukkasaḥ ।। 

tayā saha samās tatra mayā bahvyo ativāhitāḥ ।
narake cintayā sārdhaṃ brahmaghneneva naśyatā ।। 

śītavātātapakleśavivaśena vanāntare ।
ciraṃ vilulitaṃ vṛddhakacchapeneva palvale ।। 

kalatracintāhatayā dhiyā sandahyamānayā ।
dṛṣṭāḥ kaṣṭasamārambhā diśaḥ prajvalitā iva ।। 

kṣaumānekasamākṣīṇapaṭakhaṇḍakadhāriṇā ।
kāṣṭhabhāro vane vyūḍho yo mūrtam iva duṣkṛtam ।। 

yaukakīrṇajaraklinnagandhikaupīnavāsasā ।
āḍhyāspadavalīkānāṃ tale nītā ghanāgamāḥ ।। 

kalatrāpūraṇotkena jarjareṇa himānilaiḥ ।
hemante durdureṇeva nilīnaṃ vanakukṣiṣu ।। 

nānākalahakallolatāpaprasaravidrutāḥ ।
bāṣpavyājena nirmuktā netrābhyāṃ raktabindavaḥ ।। 

yāminyo vipine klinnavarāhāmiṣabhojinā ।
śilātalakuṭīkoṇe nītā jaladaviplutāḥ ।। 

kāle kṣayaṃ gate snehe kalatre aghanatāṃ gate ।
asauhārdena bandhūnāṃ kalahaiś cātisantataiḥ ।। 

sarvatra jātaśaṅkena kulīlāmukharārbhake ।
mayā kṛpaṇacittena nītāḥ paragṛhe samāḥ ।। 

caṇḍālīkalahodvignacaṇḍacaṇḍālatarjanaiḥ ।
mukhaṃ jarjaratāṃ yātam indū rāhuradair iva ।। 

carvitāḥ kharvitoṣṭhena dvīpīpiśitapeśayaḥ ।
narakāhṛtavikrītā nārakyo rasanā iva ।। 

himavatkandarodgīrṇāś caṇḍā hemantavāyavaḥ ।
aṅge nirambare soḍhā mṛtyumuktā iveṣavaḥ ।। 

jarajjaraḍhamūḍhena mūlāni kṣīṇabhūruhām ।
sukṛtānām ivaikena samutkhātāni bhūriśaḥ ।। 

śarāvakeṣv aṭavyāṃ ca palalaṃ pakvam ādarāt ।
amṛṣṭena janair bhuktaṃ kukalatravatā mayā ।। 

grahītṛtejaḥkṣataye bahuvaktravikāriṇā ।
bhāgadheyam ivātmīyaṃ vikrītaṃ paṇyam anyataḥ ।। 

prāṇyaṅgavapuṣas svasya protkṛtyotkṛtya peśayaḥ ।
āyuṣaḥ pari vikrītā vindhyapakkaṇabhūmiṣu ।। 

janmāntarasahasrotthaṃ svaṃ pāpam iva vṛddhaye ।
avakīrṇaṃ ca saṅkīrṇaṃ maṇḍalārāmabhūmiṣu ।। 

dṛṣṭaṃ kuddālakaṃ dṛṣṭyā ṛjvyā snehasamutkayā ।
rauravāpatiteneva tatkākas snigdhatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

vindhyakandaragulmānāṃ bandhutvam iva gacchatā ।
pulindavapuṣā pattrapaṅktayo aṅge samarpitāḥ ।। 

tarpitā laguḍāsphālajitakauleyaraṃhasā ।
putradārāḥ kadannena grāmyakād yācitena ca ।। 

dhārāsāraraṇatpattraśuṣkatālatale niśāḥ ।
nītā raṇitadantena sārdhaṃ vipinavānaraiḥ ।। 

romabhiḥ koṭiṣu proccaiś śītenoddhṛṣitasya me ।
varṣāsu muktākaṇavad dhṛtās salilabindavaḥ ।। 

ajājimūlakhaṇḍārthaṃ kṣutkṣobhakṣīṇakukṣiṇā ।
kalatreṇa mahāṭavyāṃ kṛtaḥ kalaha ākulaḥ ।। 

vane raṇitadantena śītakekaracakṣuṣā ।
maṣīmalinagātreṇa vetālasvajanāyitam ।। 

sarittīreṣu matsyārthaṃ bhrāntaṃ baḍiśadhāriṇā ।
kalpe jagatsu bhūtārthaṃ kṛtānteneva pāśinā ।। 

pītaṃ bahūpavāsena samyakkṛttān mṛgorasaḥ ।
tatkālakoṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ mātus stanapayo yathā ।। 

śmaśānasaṃsthitān matto raktaraktāt palāśinaḥ ।
vidrutā vanavetālāś caṇḍikābhidrutā iva ।। 

vāgurā vipine vyuptā bandhārthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām ।
āśā iva vivṛddhyarthaṃ putradārakalatrajāḥ ।। 

mayā māyāmayair lokās sūtrajālamayaiḥ khagāḥ ।
jālair jarjaratāṃ nītā diśaś ca sukṛtāyuṣām ।। 

tatrātidattaprasare manaso duṣkṛtodaye ।
āśā prasāritā dūraṃ prāvṛṣīva taraṅgiṇī ।। 

karabhyā iva sarpeṇa vidrutaṃ dūrato hriyā ।
dūre tyaktā dayā dehād bhujaṅgeneva kañcukam ।। 

krauryaṃ mukharasaṃrambhi śaravarṣi ninādi ca ।
aṅgīkṛtaṃ nidāghānte nabhasevāsitāmbudaḥ ।। 

vikāsinyo akṣatākārā dūraṃ parihṛtā janaiḥ ।
śvabhreṇeva kumañjaryaś ciram ūḍhā mayāpadaḥ ।। 

śvakākākulakoṇāsu narakoḍḍārabhūmiṣu ।
uptā duṣkṛtabījānāṃ muṣṭayo mohavṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

vāgurāsimatā vindhyakandarasthena nirdayam ।
bhūteṣv iva kṛtāntena mṛgeṣu parivalgitam ।। 

pāmarīkaṇṭhakuḍyeṣu viśrāntaśirasā mayā ।
suptam astavivekena śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā ।। 

vilolaparṇāmbarayā śarāvollāsidhūmayā ।
mama tanvā sanīhāravindhyakacchaguhāyitam ।। 

kṛṣṇadehena yaukāḍhyā kanthā skandhe mayā ciram ।
grīṣmeṣūḍhā balodbhūtā varāheṇa yathorvarā ।। 

bahuśo ahaṃ vanotthāgninirdagdhaprāṇimaṇḍalaḥ ।
kalpāgnibhuktajagataḥ kālasyānukṛtiṃ gataḥ ।। 

lohaliṅgā yathā rogān anarthān iva durgrahāḥ ।
prasūtās tatra me dārā duḥkhāny api sutān api ।। 

tribālaputrikeṇaikatanayena tadā mayā ।
nītā nīrandhradoṣeṇa ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpasamās samāḥ ।। 

ākruṣṭam uddhataravaṃ ruditaṃ vipatsu bhuktaṃ kadannam uṣitaṃ hatapakkaṇeṣu ।
kālāntaraṃ bahu mayopahatena tatra durvāsanānigaḍabandhagatena sabhyāḥ ।। 

indrajālopākhyāna āpadvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rājā

atha gacchati kāle atra jarājarjaritāyuṣi ।
tuṣārapūrṇaśaṣpaughasamaśmaśrudhṛte mayi ।। 

karmavātāvanunneṣu saraseṣv araseṣv api ।
patatsu vāsaraugheṣu śīrṇaparṇagaṇeṣv iva ।। 

ājāv iva śaraugheṣu sukhaduḥkheṣv anāratam ।
kalaheṣv atha kāryeṣu āgacchatsu vrajatsu ca ।। 

vikalpakalanāvartavartinīva jagadbhrame ।
samudra iva kallolabhare bhramati cetasi ।। 

calaṃ cintācitaṃ cakram ārūḍhe bhrānta ātmani ।
prohyamāne tṛṇa iva sāvarte kālasāgare ।। 

vindhyorvīvraṇakīṭasya grāmaikaśaraṇasya ca ।
dvibāhor gardabhasyātra kṣīṇa itthaṃ samāgaṇe ।। 

vismṛte mama bhūpatve śavasyeva mahājvare ।
caṇḍālatve sthirībhūte chinnapakṣa ivācale ।। 

saṃsāram iva kalpānto dāvāgnir iva kānanam ।
sāgarormis taṭam iva śuṣkavṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ ।। 

akāṇḍamaraṇoḍḍīnacaṇḍacaṇḍālamaṇḍalam ।
nirannatṛṇapattrāmbu vindhyakacchaṃ tadā yayau ।। 

na varṣati ghanavrāte dṛṣṭanaṣṭe kvacit sthite ।
pūtāṅgārakaṇonmiśragatau vahati mārute ।। 

śīrṇamarmaraparṇāsu dāvāgnivalitāsu ca ।
vanasthalīṣu śūnyāsu cirapravrajitāsv iva ।। 

akāṇḍam abhavad bhīmam uddāmadavapāvakam ।
śoṣitāśeṣagahanaṃ bhasmaśeṣatṛṇolapam ।। 

pāṃsudhūsarasarvāṅgaṃ kṣudhitāśeṣamānavam ।
nirannatṛṇapānīyadeśodyaddāvamaṇḍalam ।। 

kacanmarumarīcyambumajjanmahiṣamaṇḍalam ।
vātotthasaikatavyūhavārivāhāvṛtāmbaram ।। 

pānīyaśabdamātraikaśravaṇotkanaravrajam ।
ātapād atisaṃśoṣasīdatsakalamānavam ।। 

putragrasanasaṃrabdhakṣudhitojjhitajīvitam ।
svāṅgacarvaṇasaṃrambhaluṭhaddaśanamaṇḍalam ।। 

māṃsaśaṅkānigīrṇograkhadirāgnikaṇotkaram ।
maṇḍūkāśāvaśagrastavanapāṣāṇakhaṇḍakam ।। 

anyo'nyadrutasaṃsaktamātṛputrapitṛvrajam ।
gṛdhrodararaṭatsāgranigīrṇavanaśārikam ।। 

parasparāṅgavicchedaraktasiktadharātalam ।
harigrasanasaṃrabdhamattakṣubhitavāraṇam ।। 

darīnigiraṇaikotkasiṃhabhramaṇabhīṣaṇam ।
anyo'nyagrasanodyuktalokamallakṛtāhavam ।। 

niṣpattrapādapoḍḍīnapūtāṅgāramayānilam ।
raktapānotkamārjāralīḍhadhātutalāvani ।। 

jvālāghanaghanāṭopasāvataṃsavanānilam ।
sarvaskhalajjvaladvahnipuñjapiñjarajaṅgalam ।। 

dagdhājagarakuñjotthadhūmamāṃsalagulmakam ।
mārutāvalitajvālāsandhyābhravalitāmbaram ।। 

uḍḍāmaramarudbhrāntabhāsmanastambhamaṇḍalam ।
sākrandanaradantāgraśīrṇārbhakakṛtāravam ।। 

sambhrāntapuruṣavyūhadantakṛttamahāśavam ।
māṃsabhogajavagrastaraktaraktanijāṅguli ।। 

nīlapattralatāśabdapītadhūmaghanacchavi ।
bhramadgṛdhranigīrṇogranabhobhrāntolmukāmiṣam ।। 

itaretarabhinnāṅgalokavidravaṇākulam ।
jvalitāgniṭanatkāravidīrṇahṛdayodaram ।। 

gatamārutabhāṅkārabhīmadāvāgnivalganam ।
bhītājagaraphūtkārapatadaṅgārapādapam ।। 

tad akāṇḍaṃ sphuṭaṃ prāpya sa deśaś śuṣkakoṭaraḥ ।
dvādaśārkāgnidagdhasya jagato anukṛtiṃ yayau ।। 

jvaladanalajaṭālavṛkṣaṣaṇḍaḥ prasṛtamarutprasarāpanunnalokaḥ ।
jvalanatapanabhāskarātmajānāṃ ramaṇagṛhānukṛtiṃ jagāma deśaḥ ।। 

indrajālopakhyāne akāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rājā

tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne kaṣṭe vidhiviparyaye ।
akālolbaṇakalpānte nitāntātapadāyini ।। 

janāḥ kecana niṣkramya sakalatrasuhṛjjanāḥ ।
gatā deśāntaraṃ vyomnaś śaradīva payodharāḥ ।। 

dehāvayavasaṃlīnaputradārāgryabāndhavāḥ ।
śīrṇāḥ kecana tatraiva cchinnā iva vane drumāḥ ।। 

bhuktāḥ kecana digvyāghrair nirgacchantas svamandirāt ।
ajātapakṣakāś śyenaiḥ khagā nīḍodgatā iva ।। 

praviṣṭāḥ kecid analaṃ jvalitaṃ śalabhā iva ।
kecic chvabhreṣu patitāś śilāś śailacyutā iva ।। 

ahaṃ tu tān parityajya śvaśurādīn svakāñ janān ।
kalatramātram ādāya kṛcchrād deśād vinirgataḥ ।। 

analān anilāṃś caiva rakṣakān bhakṣakān api ।
vañcayitvā bhayān mṛtyos sadāro ahaṃ vinirgataḥ ।। 

prāpya taddeśaparyantaṃ tatra tālataros tale ।
avaropya sutān skandhāt tān anarthān ivolbaṇān ।। 

viśrānto asmi ciraśrānto rauravād iva nirgataḥ ।
grīṣmadāvanidāghārto grīṣme padma ivājalaḥ ।। 

atha caṇḍālakanyāyāṃ viśrāntāyāṃ taros tale ।
suptāyāṃ śītalacchāye dvau samāliṅgya dārakau ।। 

thutthako nāma tanayo mamaikaḥ puratas sthitaḥ ।
atyantavallabho asmākaṃ kanīyān kāntimān iti ।। 

sa mām uvāca dīnātmā bāṣpapūrṇavilocanaḥ ।
āpta dehy āśu me māṃsaṃ pānaṃ ca rudhiraṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

punaḥ punar vadann evaṃ sa bālas tanayo mama ।
prāṇāntikīṃ daśāṃ prāptas sākrando hi punaḥ kṣudhā ।। 

tasyoktaṃ hi mayā putra māṃsaṃ nāstīti bhūriśaḥ ।
tathāpi māṃsaṃ dehīti vadaty eva sudurmatiḥ ।। 

atha vātsalyamūḍhena mayā duḥkhātibhāriṇā ।
tasyoktaṃ putra manmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ sambhujyatām iti ।। 

tad apy aṅgīkṛtaṃ tena dehīti vadatā punaḥ ।
manmāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇavṛttinā ślathakṛttinā ।। 

sarvaduḥkhāpanodāya snehakāruṇyamohitaḥ ।
maraṇāyāttamitrāya tato ahaṃ sahasotthitaḥ ।। 

grīṣmatāpopataptāni kāṣṭhāny āhṛtya jaṅgalāt ।
maraṇāyātmanas tatra citā viracitā mayā ।। 

lelihānānalajvālā citā prajvālitātha sā ।
kṣaṇāc caṭacaṭāsphoṭais sthitā madabhikāṅkṣiṇī ।। 

mayoktaṃ tanayāsyāṃ tu citāyāṃ patitāt punaḥ ।
utkṛtyotkṛtya bhoktavyaṃ matto māṃsaṃ kṣaṇāt tvayā ।। 

ity uktvā yāvad ātmānaṃ svaṃ citāyāṃ kṣipāmy aham ।
luṭhito asmi javāt tāvad asmāt siṃhāsanān nṛpaḥ ।। 

tatas tūryaninādena jayaśabdena cābhitaḥ ।
bhṛśam eva prabuddho ahaṃ smṛtyā ca valitas sthitaḥ ।। 

iti śāmbarikeṇeha moha utpādito mama ।
ajñāneneva jīvasya daśāśatasamanvitaḥ ।। 

ātmodantaṃ bhavatsv ittham enaṃ kathitavān aham ।
mārkāṇḍeya ivānantaṃ kalpaduḥkhaṃ surājasu ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavati rājendre lavaṇe bhūritejasi ।
antardhānaṃ jagāmāsau tatra śāmbarikaḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

athedam ūcus te sabhyā vismayākulacetasaḥ ।
anyo'nyālokanavyagrapadmapattranibhekṣaṇāḥ ।। 

aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā nanu vilakṣaṇā ।
ko nu śāmbariko nāma kva cāsāv agrato gataḥ ।। 

sarvaśakter vicitrā hi śaktayaś śataśo vidheḥ ।
yad vivekimano apy eṣa vimohayati māyayā ।। 

vijñātalokavṛttāntaḥ kva nāmāyaṃ mahīpatiḥ ।
kva sāmānyamanovṛttiyogyā vipulasambhramāḥ ।। 

na ca śāmbarikottheyaṃ māyā manasi mohanī ।
arthasya gṛdhnavo hy ete nityaṃ śāmbarikāḥ kila ।। 

yatnena prārthayante arthaṃ nāntardhānaṃ vrajanti te ।
iti sandehadolāyāṃ saṃsthitau luṭhitā vayam ।। 

sabhāyām avasaṃ tasyām ahaṃ rāma tadā kila ।
tena pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ mayaitan nāptataś śrūtam ।। 

atibahukalanāvivardhitāṅgaṃ naya nijacittam idaṃ śamaṃ mahātman ।
śamam upagamite paraṃ svabhāve paramam upaiṣyasi pāvanaṃ padaṃ tat ।। 

śāmbarikopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

daśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parasmāt kāraṇād ādau cic cetyapadapātinī ।
kalanāpadam āsādya kalaṅkakalanāntaram ।। 

asatsv eva vimoheṣu rāmaivamprāyavṛttiṣu ।
ghaneṣu tucchatām etya cirāya parimajjati ।। 

asad eva manovṛttir mlānā vistārayaty alam ।
duḥkhaṃ doṣasahasreṇa vetālam iva bālakaḥ ।। 

sad eva hi mahāduḥkham asattāṃ nayati kṣaṇam ।
niṣkalaṅkā manovṛttir andhakāram ivārkaruk ।। 

nayad abhyāśatāṃ dūram abhyāśaṃ dūratāṃ nayat ।
mano valgati bhūteṣu bālo bālakhageṣv iva ।। 

abhayaṃ bhayam ajñasya cetaso vāsanāvataḥ ।
dūrato mugdhapānthasya sthāṇur yāti piśācatām ।। 

śatrutvaṃ śaṅkate mitre kalaṅkamalinaṃ manaḥ ।
madāviṣṭamatir jantur bhramat paśyati bhūtalam ।। 

paryākule hi manasi śaśino jāyate aśaniḥ ।
amṛtaṃ viṣabhāvena bhuktaṃ yāti viṣakriyām ।। 

purapattananirmāṇam asat sad iva paśyati ।
vāsanāvalitaṃ cetas svapnavaj jāgrad eva hi ।। 

mohaikakāraṇaṃ jantor manaso vāsanolbaṇā ।
utkhātavyā prayatnena mūlacchedena caiva sā ।। 

vāsanāvāgurākṛṣṭo manohariṇako nṛṇām ।
parāṃ vivaśatām eti saṃsāravanagulmake ।। 

yenocchinnā vicāreṇa jīvasya jñena vāsanā ।
nirabhrasyeva sūryasya tasyāloko virājate ।। 

atas tvaṃ mana evedaṃ naraṃ viddhi na dehakam ।
jaḍo deho manas tv atra na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ viduḥ ।। 

yat kṛtaṃ manasā rāma tat kṛtaṃ viddhi rāghava ।
yat tyaktaṃ manasā rāma tat tyaktaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

manomātraṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ manaḥ parvatamaṇḍalam ।
mano vyoma mano bhūmir mano vāyur mano mahān ।। 

mano yadi padārthaṃ tu tadbhāvena na yojayet ।
tatas sūryādayo apy ete na prakāśāḥ kadācana ।। 

mano moham upādatte yasyāsau mūḍha ucyate ।
śarīre moham āpanne na śave mūḍha ucyate ।। 

manaḥ paśyad bhavaty akṣi śṛṇvac śravaṇatāṃ gatam ।
tvagbhāvaṃ sparśanād eti ghrāṇatām eti śiṅghanāt ।। 

rasanād rasatām eti vicitrāsv atra vṛttiṣu ।
nāṭake naṭavad dehe mana evābhivartate ।। 

laghu dīrghaṃ karoty etat sattāsattāṃ ca gacchati ।
kaṭutāṃ nayati svādu ripuṃ nayati mitratām ।। 

ya eva pratibhāso asya cetaso vṛttivartinaḥ ।
tat sad eva hi pratyakṣaṃ tanmātrānubhavād iha ।। 

pratibhāsavaśād eva svapnārthalitacetasaḥ ।
hariścandrasya sampannā rātrir dvādaśavārṣikī ।। 

cittānubhāvavaśato muhūrtatvaṃ gataṃ yugam ।
indradyumnasya vairiñcapurābhyantaravartinaḥ ।। 

manojñayā manovṛttyā sukhatāṃ yāti rauravam ।
prātaḥprāpyasvarājyasya subaddhasyeva bandhanam ।। 

jite manasi sarvaiva vijitaivendriyāvalī ।
śīryate ca yathā tantau dagdhe sauktikamālikā ।। 

sarvatas sthitayā svaccharūpayā nirvikārayā ।
samayā sūkṣmayā nityaṃ cicchaktyā sākṣibhūtayā ।। 

sarvabhāvānugatayā na cetyārthavibhinnayā ।
rāmātmasattayāmūkam api dehasamaṃ jaḍam ।। 

mano antar valgati vyastamananaiṣaṇam ūrjayā ।
bahirgirisaridvyomasamudrapuralīlayā ।। 

jāgrac cābhimataṃ vastu nayaty amṛtamṛṣṭatām ।
anīhitaṃ ca viṣatāṃ nayaty amṛtam apy alam ।। 

prasṛjya sarvabhāvānām alam ātmacamatkṛtim ।
manas tv abhimatākāraṃ rūpaṃ sṛjati vastuṣu ।। 

spandeṣu vāyutām eti prakāśeṣu prakāśatām ।
draveṣu dravatām eti cicchakticchuritaṃ manaḥ ।। 

pṛthvyāṃ kaṭhinatām eti śūnyavṛttiṣu śūnyatām ।
sarvatrecchāsthitau yāti cicchakticchuritaṃ manaḥ ।। 

śuklaṃ kṛṣṇīkaroty etat kṛṣṇaṃ nayati śuklatām ।
vinaiva deśakālābhyāṃ śaktiṃ paśyāsya cetasaḥ ।। 

manasy anyatra saṃsakte carvitasyāpi jihvayā ।
bhojanasyātimṛṣṭasya na svādo hy anubhūyate ।। 

yac cittadṛṣṭaṃ tad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tadalokitam ।
andhakāre yathā rūpam indriyaṃ nirmanas tathā ।। 

indriyeṇa vinodeti mano nendriyam unmanaḥ ।
indriyāṇi prasūtāni manaso nendriyān manaḥ ।। 

atyantabhinnayor aikyaṃ yeṣām cittaśarīrayoḥ ।
jñātajñeyā mahātmāno namasyās te supaṇḍitāḥ ।। 

kusumollāsidhammilā helāvalitalocanā ।
kāṣṭhakuḍyopamāṅgeṣu lagnāpy amanaso aṅganā ।। 

manasy anyatra saṃsakte vītarāgeṇa kānane ।
kravyādacarvito aṅgasthas svakaro api na lakṣitaḥ ।। 

sukhīkartuṃ suduḥkhāni duḥkhīkartuṃ sukhāni ca ।
sukhenaivāśu yujyante manaso atiśayān muneḥ ।। 

manasy anyatra saṃsakte kathyamānāpi yatnataḥ ।
latā paraśukṛtteva kathā vicchidyate bata ।। 

manasy adritaṭārūḍhe gṛhasthenāpi jantunā ।
śvabhrābhrakandarabhrāntiduḥkhaṃ samanubhūyate ।। 

manasy ullasite svapne hṛdy eva puraparvatāḥ ।
ākāśa iva vistīrṇe dṛśyante nirmitāḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

mano vilulitaṃ svapne hṛdy evādripurāvalīm ।
tanoti calito ambhodhir vīcīcayam ivātmani ।। 

antar abdher jalād yadvat taraṅgāpīḍavīcayaḥ ।
dehāntar manasas tadvat svapnādripurarājayaḥ ।। 

aṅkurasya yathā pattralatāpuṣpaphalaśriyaḥ ।
manaso asya tathā jāgratsvapnavibhramabhūtayaḥ ।। 

vyatiriktā yathā hemno na haimavanitā tathā ।
jāgratsvapnakriyālakṣmīr vyatiriktā na cetasaḥ ।। 

dhārākaṇormiphenaśrīr yathā saṃlakṣyate ambhasaḥ ।
tathā vicitravibhavā nānāteyaṃ hi cetasaḥ ।। 

svacittavṛttir eveyaṃ jāgratsvapnadṛśoditā ।
rasāveśād upādatte śailūṣa iva bhūmikām ।। 

caṇḍālatvaṃ hi lavaṇaḥ pratibhāsavaśād yathā ।
tathedaṃ jagad ābhogi manomananamātrakam ।। 

yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tena tenāśu bhūyate ।
manomanananirmāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

nānāpurasaricchailarūpatām etya dehinām ।
tanoty antasstham evedaṃ jāgratsvapnabhramaṃ manaḥ ।। 

suratvād daityatām eti nāgatvān nagatām api ।
pratibhāsavaśāc cittam āpadaṃ lavaṇo yathā ।। 

naratvād eti nārītvaṃ pitṛtvāt putratāṃ punaḥ ।
yathā kṣipraṃ prati naṭas svasaṅkalpāt tathā manaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpataḥ pramriyate saṅkalpāj jāyate punaḥ ।
manaś ciratarābhyastāj jīvatām ety anākṛti ।। 

mano mananasammūḍham ūḍhavāsanamārutāt ।
saṅkalpād yonim āyāti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayābhaye ।। 

sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca manasi tile tailam iva sthitam ।
tad deśakālavaśato ghanaṃ vā tanu vā bhavet ।। 

tailaṃ tilasya ca krāntyā sphuṭatām eti śāśvatīm ।
cetaso mananāsaṅgād ghanībhūte sukhāsukhe ।। 

deśakālābhidhānena rāma saṅkalpa eva hi ।
kathyate tadvaśād yasmād deśakālau sthitiṃ gatau ।। 

praśāmyaty ullasaty eti yāti nandati valgati ।
manaś śarīrasaṅkalpe phalite na śarīrakam ।। 

nānāsphālasamullāsais svasaṅkalpopakalpitaiḥ ।
mano valgati dehe asmin svaśvavāra ivājire ।। 

cāpale prasaras tasmād antar yena na dīyate ।
mano vinayam ādhatte tasyālāna iva dvipaḥ ।। 

na spandate mano yasya śastrastambha ivottamaḥ ।
sadvastuno asau puruṣaś śiṣṭāḥ kardamakīṭakāḥ ।। 

yasyācāpalatāṃ yātaṃ mana ekatra saṃsthitam ।
anuttamapadenāsau dhyānenānugato anaghaḥ ।। 

saṃyamān manasaś śāntim eti saṃsārasambhramaḥ ।
mandare aspandatāṃ yāte yathā kṣīramahārṇavaḥ ।। 

manaso vṛddhayo yā yā bhogasaṅkalpavibhramaiḥ ।
saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya tā evāṅkurayonayaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ calatkuvalayaṃ valayanta ete mūḍhā mahājaḍajave madamohamandāḥ ।
āvartavartini vilūnaviśīrṇacittāś cakrabhrame puruṣadurbhramarāḥ patanti ।। 

cittavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asya cittamahāvyādheś cikitsāyāṃ varauṣadham ।
svāyattaṃ śṛṇu yuktyātmasusādhaṃ svātmani sthitam ।। 

svenaiva pauruṣeṇāśu svasaṃvedanarūpiṇā ।
yatnena cittavetālas tyaktveṣṭaṃ vastu jīyate ।। 

tyajann abhimataṃ vastu yas tiṣṭhati nirāmayaḥ ।
jitam eva manas tena kudānta iva dantinā ।। 

svasaṃvedanayatnena pālyate cittabālakaḥ ।
avastuno vastuni ca yojyate bodhyate api ca ।। 

śāstrasaṅgamadhīreṇa cintātaptam atāpinā ।
chinddhi tvam ayasevāyo manasaiva mano mune ।। 

ayatnena yathā bāla itaś cetaś ca yujyate ।
bhavyais tathaiva ceto antaḥ kim ivātrātiduṣkaram ।। 

satkarmaṇi samākrāntam udarkodayadāyini ।
svapauruṣeṇaiva manaś cetanena niyojayet ।। 

svāyattam ekāntahitaṃ svepsitatyāgavedanam ।
yasya duṣkaratāṃ yātaṃ dhik taṃ puruṣakīṭakam ।। 

aramyaṃ ramyarūpeṇa bhāvayitvā svasaṃvidā ।
malleneva śiśuś cittam ayatnenaiva jīyate ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena cittam āśv eva jīyate ।
acittenāsapatnena padaṃ brahmaṇi dhīyate ।। 

svāyattaṃ ca susādhaṃ ca svacittākrāntimātrakam ।
śaknuvanti na ye kartuṃ dhik tān puruṣajambukān ।। 

svapauruṣaikasādhyena svepsitatyāgarūpiṇā ।
manaḥpraśamamantreṇa vināsti na śubhā gatiḥ ।। 

manomāraṇamātreṇa sādhyena svātmasaṃvidā ।
nissapatnam anādyantam aniṅganam ihoṣyatām ।। 

īpsitāvedanāṅgyāṃ tu manaḥpraśamanaśriyi ।
gurūpadeśaśāstrārthamantrādyā yuktayas tṛṇam ।। 

sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ brahma sampadyate tadā ।
asaṅkalpanaśastreṇa cchinnaṃ cittagadaṃ yadā ।। 

svasaṃvedanasādhye asmin saṅkalpānarthanāśane ।
śāntasyācchābhravapuṣi puṃsaḥ keva kadarthanā ।। 

nūnaṃ daivam anādṛtya mūḍhasaṅkalpakalpitam ।
puruṣārthena saṃvittyā naya cittam acittatām ।। 

tāṃ mahāpadavīm ekāṃ kām apy anusaraṃś ciram ।
cittaṃ cidbhakṣitaṃ kṛtvā cittvād api paraṃ bhava ।। 

bhavabhāvanayā mukto yuktaḥ paramayā dhiyā ।
dhārayātmānam avyagro agrastacittaṃ citaḥ param ।। 

paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya nītvā cittam acittatām ।
tāṃ mahāpadavīm ehi yatra nāsi na cetarat ।। 

saṃvedanaviparyāsarūpiṇārir ivābalaḥ ।
jetum āśu mano rāma pauruṣenaiva śakyate ।। 

anudvegaś śriyo mūlam anudvegāt pravartate ।
jantor manojayo yena trilokīvijayas tṛṇam ।। 

na śastradahanotpātapātā yasyāṃ manāg api ।
svabhāvamātravyāvṛttau tasyāṃ keva kadarthanā ।। 

api svavedanākrāntāv aśaktā ye narādhamāḥ ।
kathaṃ vyavahariṣyanti vyavahāradaśāsu te ।। 

pumān dṛto asmi jāto asmi jīvāmīti kudṛṣṭayaḥ ।
cetaso vṛttayo yānti capalasyāsadutthitāḥ ।। 

na kaścaneha mriyate jāyate neha kaścana ।
svayaṃ vetti mṛtiṃ dehe lokam anyaṃ gataṃ manaḥ ।। 

ito yātaṃ pare loke sphuraty anyatayā manaḥ ।
na naśyaty etad āmokṣam ato mṛtibhayaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

deharūpeṇa vicarad ihaloke paratra ca ।
cittam āmokṣam āste asya rūpam anyan na vidyate ।। 

sute bhrātari bhṛtyādau kleśa ākramaṇaṃ nṛṇām ।
na svacitte svacaitanyavyāvṛttyātmeti me matiḥ ।। 

tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca bhūyo bhūyo vicāritam ।
yāvan nāsti kilopāyaś cittopaśamanād ṛte ।। 

ṛte pathye tate śuddhe bodhe hṛdy udite citi ।
manovilayamātreṇa viśrāntir upajāyate ।। 

dhyāyate hṛdayākāśe citiś ciccakradhārayā ।
mano māraya niśśaṅkaṃ tvāṃ pramathnanti nādhayaḥ ।। 

yadi ramyam aramyatve tvayā saṃviditaṃ vidā ।
chinnāny eva tad aṅgāni cittasyeti matir mama ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me etāvanmātrakaṃ manaḥ ।
tadabhāvanamātreṇa dātreṇeva vilūyate ।। 

chinnābhram amale vyomni yathā śaradi dhūyate ।
nirvikalpe pare tattve tathā nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ ।। 

vahanti yatra śastrāgnipavanās tatra bhīr bhavet ।
svāyatte mṛduni svacche kim asaṅkalpane bhayam ।। 

idaṃ śreya idaṃ neti siddham ābālam akṣatam ।
bālaṃ putram ivodāre manaś śreyasi yojayet ।। 

akṣapañcānanaṃ cetassiṃhaṃ saṃsṛtibṛṃhaṇam ।
ghnanti ye te jayantīha nirvāṇapadapātinaḥ ।। 

bhīmās sambhramadāyinyas saṅkalpakalanād imāḥ ।
vipadas samprasūyante mṛgatṛṣṇā maror iva ।। 

kalpāntapavanā vāntu yantu caikatvam arṇavāḥ ।
tapantu dvādaśādityā nāsti nirmanasaḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

manobījāt samudyanti śubhāśubhaphalapradāḥ ।
saṃsāraṣaṇḍakā ete lokasaptakapallavāḥ ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātraikasādhye sakalasiddhaye ।
asaṅkalpābhisāmrājye tiṣṭhāvaṣṭambhatatparaḥ ।। 

prayacchaty uttamānandaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ manaḥ kramāt ।
kaṣakṣīṇāṅgako aṅgāro yathāṅgārakṣayārthinaḥ ।। 

api brahmakuṭīlakṣyaṃ manasaś cet samīhitam ।
tad aṇor antare vyaktaṃ vibhaktaṃ paridṛśyate ।। 

saṅkalpamātravibhavena kṛtātyanarthaṃ saṅkalpaśāntivibhavena susādhitārtham ।
santoṣamātravibhavena mano vijitya nityoditena jayam ehi nirīhitena ।। 

paramapāvanayā vimanastayā samatayā matayātmavidām ati ।
śamitayā mitayāntar ahantayā yad avaśiṣṭam ajaṃ padam astu tat ।। 

manaśśaktisvarūpapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yasmin yasmin padārthe hi yena yena yathā tathā ।
tīvrasaṃvegasampannaṃ manaḥ paśyati vāñchitam ।। 

jāyate mriyate caiṣā manasas tīvravegitā ।
saumyāmbubudbudālīva nirnimittā svabhāvataḥ ।। 

śītatā tuhinasyeva kajjalasyeva kṛṣṇatā ।
lolatā manaso rūpaṃ tīvrātīvraikarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

katham asyātilolasya vegāvegaikakāraṇam ।
calatā manaso brahman balato vinivāryate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

neha cañcalatāhīnaṃ manaḥ kvacana dṛśyate ।
cañcalatvaṃ manodharmo vahnidharmo yathoṣṇatā ।। 

yaiṣā hi cañcalā spandaśaktiś cittatvasaṃsthitā ।
tāṃ viddhi mānasīṃ śaktiṃ jagadāḍambarātmikām ।। 

spandasparśād ṛte vāyor yathā sattaiva nohyate ।
tathāsti cittasattā no cañcalaspandanād ṛte ।। 

yat tu cañcalatāhīnaṃ tan mano mṛtam ucyate ।
sa eva ca tapaśśāstraprasiddho mokṣa ucyate ।। 

manovilayamātreṇa duḥkhaśāntir avāpyate ।
manojananamātreṇa duḥkhaṃ param avāpyate ।। 

duḥkham utpādayaty uccair utthitaś cittarākṣasaḥ ।
sukhāyānantabhogyāya taṃ prayatnena pātaya ।। 

tasya cañcalatā yaiṣā hy avidyā nāma socyate ।
vāsanāparanāmnī tāṃ vicāreṇa vināśaya ।। 

avidyayā vāsanayā tayāntaś cittaśāntayā ।
vilīnayā tyāgavaśāt paraṃ śreyo adhigamyate ।। 

yat tat sadasator madhyaṃ yan madhyaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ ।
tan manaḥ procyate rāma dvayadolāyitākṛti ।। 

jāḍyānusandhānahṛtaṃ jāḍyātmakatayeddhayā ।
ceto jaḍatvam āyāti dṛḍhābhyāsavaśena hi ।। 

vivekaikānusandhānāc cidaṃśātmatayā manaḥ ।
citaikatām upāyāti dṛḍhābhyāsavaśāt sthiram ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yasminn eva pade manaḥ ।
pātyate tat padaṃ prāpya bhavaty abhyāsalohitam ।। 

ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya cittam ākramya cetasā ।
viśokaṃ padam āśritya nirāśaṅkas sthiro bhava ।। 

bhavabhāvanayā bhagnaṃ manasaiva na cen manaḥ ।
balād uttāryate rāma tad upāyo asti netaraḥ ।। 

mana eva samarthaṃ vai manaso dṛḍhanigrahe ।
arājā kas samarthas syād rājño rāghava nigrahe ।। 

tṛṣṇāgrāhagṛhītānāṃ saṃsārārṇavaraṃhasi ।
āvartair uhyamānānāṃ dūraṃ svamana eva nauḥ ।। 

manasaiva manaś chittvā pāśaṃ paramabandhanam ।
unmocito na yenātmā nāsāv anyena mokṣyate ।। 

yā yodeti manonāmnī vāsanā vāsitāntarā ।
tāṃ tāṃ pariharet prājñas tato avidyākṣayo bhavet ।। 

bhogaughavāsanāṃ tyaktvā tyaja tvaṃ khedavāsanām ।
bhāvābhāvau tatas tyaktvā nirvikalpas sukhī bhava ।। 

abhāvanaṃ bhāvanāyās tv etāvān bhāvanākṣayaḥ ।
eṣa eva manonāśas tv avidyānāśa ucyate ।। 

yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tatrāsaṃvedanaṃ varam ।
asaṃvittis tu nirvāṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvedanād bhavet ।। 

svenaiva tat prayatnena puṃsas sampadyate kṣaṇāt ।
bhāvasyābhāvanaṃ bhūtyai tat tasmān nityam āharet ।। 

rāgādayo ye manasepsitās te buddhvaiva tāṃs tāṃs tvam avastubhūtān ।
tyaktvā tadāsthāṅkuram astabījaṃ mā harṣaśokau samupaiṣi tṛptaḥ ।। 

khuraraveṇopadeśāṃśakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eṣā hi vāsanā nityam asaty eva yad utthitā ।
dvicandrabhrāntivat tena tyaktuṃ rāghava yujyate ।। 

avidyāvidyamānaiva naṣṭaprajñasya vidyate ।
nāmnaivāṅgīkṛtābhāvā samyakprajñasya sā kutaḥ ।। 

mā bhavājño bhava prājñas samyag rāma vicāraya ।
nāsty evendur dvitīyaḥ khe bhrāntyā saṃlakṣyate mudhā ।। 

nātmatattvād ṛte kiñcid vidyate vastv avastu vā ।
ūrmimālini vistīrṇe vāripūrād ṛte yathā ।। 

svavikalpakṛtān etān bhāvābhāvān asanmayān ।
nitye tate site śuddhe mā samāropayātmani ।। 

nāsi kartā kim etāsu kriyāsu mamatā tava ।
ekasmin vidyamāne hi kiṃ kena kriyate katham ।। 

mā cākartā bhava prājña kim akartṛtayeha te ।
sādhyaṃ sādhyam upādeyaṃ tasmāt svastho bhavānagha ।। 

kartā saṃs tvam asaktatvād bhavākartā raghūdvaha ।
asaktatvād akartāpi kartṛvat spandanaṃ kuru ।। 

satyaṃ cet syād upādeyaṃ mithyā syād dheyam eva tat ।
upādeyaikasaktatvād yuktā saktir hi karmaṇi ।। 

yatrendrajālam akhilaṃ māyāmayam avastukam ।
tatra kās tāḥ kathaṃ rāma heyopādeyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

saṃsārabījakaṇikā yaiṣāvidyā raghūdvaha ।
eṣā hy avidyamānaiva satīva sphāratāṃ gatā ।। 

yeyam ābhoginissārasaṃsārārambhacakrikā ।
vijñeyā vāsanaiṣā sā caitasī mohadāyinī ।। 

cāruvaṃśalatevāntaśśūnyanissārakoṭarā ।
sarittaraṅgamāleva na vyucchinnā vinaśvarī ।। 

gṛhyamāṇāpi hastena grahītuṃ naiva yujyate ।
mṛdvy apy atyantatīkṣṇāgrā nirjharormir ivotthitā ।। 

dṛśyate prakaṭābhāsā sadarthe nopayujyate ।
taraṅgiṇī taraṅgābhāsv ākārapariniṣṭhitā ।। 

kvacid vakrā kvacid ṛjvī dīrghā kharvā sthirā calā ।
yatprasādodbhavā tasmād vyatirekam upāgatā ।। 

antaśśūnyāpi sarvatra dṛśyate asārasundarī ।
na kvacit saṃsthitāpīha sarvatraivopalakṣyate ।। 

jaḍaiva cinmayīvāsāv anyaspandopajīvinī ।
nimeṣam apy atiṣṭhantī sthairyāśaṅkāṃ prayacchati ।। 

jvāleva śuddhavarṇāpi maṣīmalinakoṭarā ।
valgaty anyaprasādena kṣīyate tadavīkṣitā ।। 

āloke vimale mlānā tamasy ativirājate ।
mṛgatṛṣṇeva susphārā nānāvarṇavilāsinī ।। 

vakrā viṣamayī tanvī mṛdvī kaṇṭakakarkaśā ।
lalanā cañcalā kṣuddhā tṛṣṇā jihveva bhoginaḥ ।। 

svayaṃ dīpaśikhevāśu kṣīyate snehasaṅkṣaye ।
sindūradhūlilekheva vinā rāgaṃ na rañjate ।। 

kṣaṇaprakāśā taralā kṛtasaṃsthā jaḍāśaye ।
mugdhānāṃ trāsajananī vakrā vidyud ivoditā ।। 

yatnād gṛhītvā dahati bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate ।
labhyate api ca nānviṣṭā vidyudvad atibhaṅgurā ।। 

aprārthitaivopanatā ramaṇīyāpy anarthadā ।
akālapuṣpamāleva śreyase nābhinanditā ।। 

atyantavismṛtaivātisukhāya bhramadāyinī ।
dussvapnakalaneveyam anarthāyaiva sūtthitā ।। 

pratibhāsavaśād eva trijaganti mahānti ca ।
muhūrtamātreṇotpādya dhatte grāsīkaroti ca ।। 

muhūrto vatsaraśreṇī lavaṇasyānayā kṛtā ।
rātrir dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandrasya nirmitā ।। 

viyoginām athānyeṣāṃ kāntāvirahaśālinām ।
rātrir vatsaravad dīrghā bhavaty asyāḥ prasādataḥ ।। 

sukhitasyālpatām eti duḥkhitasyaiti dīrghatām ।
kālo hy asyāḥ prasādena viparyāsaikaśālinā ।। 

asyās svasattāmātreṇa kartṛtaitāsu vṛttiṣu ।
dīpasyālokakāryāṇāṃ yathā tadvan na vastutaḥ ।। 

sanitambastanā citre na strī strīdharmiṇī yathā ।
tathaivākāradhīreyaṃ kartuṃ yogyā na kiñcana ।। 

manorājyam ivākārabhāsvarā satyavarjitā ।
sahasraśataśākhāpi na kiñcit paramārthataḥ ।। 

araṇye mṛgatṛṣṇeva mithyaivāḍambarānvitā ।
viḍambayati tān mugdhamṛgān eva na mānuṣān ।। 

phenamāleva sañjātadhvastā vicchedavarjitā ।
jaḍaiva cañcalākārā gṛhyamānā na kiñcana ।। 

ananyā cetanasyāpi nūnam anyeva ca sthitā ।
krimitantur ivādīrghā jaḍaivāpy ajaḍāśritā ।। 

kaluṣoḍḍāmarakārā rajaḥprasaradhūsarā ।
calā kalpāntavātyeva svākrāntabhuvanāntarā ।। 

dhūmālīvāṅgasaṃlagnā dāhasvedapradāyinī ।
garbhīkṛtarasākramya jaganti parivartate ।। 

dhārā jaladharasyeva sudīrghā jaḍanirmitā ।
asārasaṅghātadṛḍharajjus tṛṇagaṇair iva ।। 

taraṅgotpalamāleva kalpanāmātravarṇitā ।
mṛṇālīva bahucchidrā paṅkaprauḍhā jaḍātmikā ।। 

jvāleva dṛśyate vṛddhitatparā na ca vardhate ।
viṣāsvāda ivāpātamadhurānte sudāruṇā ।। 

naṣṭā dīpaśikhevaiṣā na jāne kveha gacchati ।
mihikevāgradṛṣṭāpi gṛhyamāṇā na kiñcana ।। 

pāṃsumuṣṭir ivāstīrya prekṣitā pāramāṇavī ।
ākāśanīlimevaiṣā nirnimittaiva dṛśyate ।। 

dvicandramohavaj jātā svapnavad vihitabhramā ।
yathā nauyāyinas sthāṇuspandas tadvad ihotthitā ।। 

anayopahate citte dīrghakālam ivākulaiḥ ।
janair ālakṣyate dīrghas saṃsārasvapnavibhramaḥ ।। 

manojñam api satyaṃ ca dṛśyate sad asattayā ।
amanojñam asatyaṃ ca dṛśyate asac ca sattayā ।। 

anayopahate tv asmiṃś citrāś cetasi vibhramāḥ ।
utpadyante vinaśyante taraṅgās toyadher iva ।। 

padārtharatham ārūḍhā bhāvanaiṣā balānvitā ।
ākrāmati manaḥ kṣipraṃ vihagaṃ vāgurā yathā ।। 

kāruṇyāt spandamānākṣīṃ sravatkṣīralavastanīm ।
nayaty ullāsitānandaṃ jananīṃ gṛhiṇīpadam ।। 

viṣīkaroti niṣṣyandasantarpitajagattrayam ।
sudhā sārdram api kṣipraṃ pravṛddhā bimbam aindavam ।। 

unmattavaravetālavartanārambhasambhramam ।
sthāṇavas samprayacchanti mūkam apy eti yad dhiyā ।। 

sandhyādiṣu ca kāleṣu loṣṭapāṣāṇabhittayaḥ ।
asyāḥ prasādād dṛśyante sarpā jagati dṛṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

eko api dvitayodeti yathā dviśaśidarśane ।
dūram abhyāśatāṃ yāti svapne abdhitaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

ādīrghaḥ kṣaṇatām eti kālas seṣṭā yathā niśā ।
kṣaṇo varṣam ivābhāti kāntāvirahiṇām iva ।। 

na tad asti na yan nāma na karotīyam uddhatā ।
asyās tv akiñcanāyās tu śaktatāṃ paśya rāghava ।। 

saṃrodhayet prayatnena saṃvidaivāśu saṃvidam ।
saṃvitsrotonirodhena śuṣyaty eṣā manonadī ।। 

avidyamānayaivedaṃ pelavāṅgyā sutucchayā ।
mithyābhāvanayā nāma citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

arūpayā nirākṛtyā cārucetanahīnayā ।
asatyevāśu naśyantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

ālokena vinaśyantyā sphurantyā tamaso antare ।
kauśikekṣaṇadharmiṇyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

kukarmaikāntakāriṇyā na sahantyāvalokanam ।
deham apy avijānantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

sudhīrācāradharmiṇyā nityaṃ prākṛtakāntayā ।
anāratāstaṅgatayā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

anantaduḥkhākulayā sadaiva dhṛtayānayā ।
sambodhahīnayā nāma citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

kāmakrodhaghanastanyā tamaḥprasaravaktrayā ।
acetanaśarīriṇyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

ātmāndhakūpāspadayā jaḍayā jāḍyajīrṇayā ।
duḥkhadīrghapralāpinyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

puruṣāsaṅgabhaṅginyā rogiṇyākṣatamāyayā ।
vivartinyā vivakṣāsu citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

puruṣasya na yā śaktā soḍhum īkṣitam apy alam ।
tayā striyāśaraṇayā citram andhīkṛtaḥ pumān ।। 

na yasyāś cetanaivāsti yāpy anaṣṭaiva naśyati ।
tayā striyāpuruṣayā citram andhīkṛtaḥ pumān ।। 

anantaduṣprasaravilāsakāriṇī kṣayodayonmukhasukhaduḥkhakāriṇī ।
iyaṃ prabho vigalati kena vāsanā manoguhānilayanibaddhabhāvanā ।। 

avidyāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

avidyāvibhavaprotthaṃ jagataḥ puruṣasya vā ।
mahad āndhyam idaṃ brahman kathaṃ nāma vinaśyati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā tuṣāranalinī bhāskarālokanāt kṣaṇāt ।
naśyaty evam avidyeyaṃ naśyaty ātmāvalokanāt ।। 

tāvat saṃsārabhṛguṣu svātmanā saha dehinam ।
āndolayati sā yaiṣā duḥkhakaṇṭakajāliṣu ।। 

avidyā yāvad asyās tu notpannā kṣayakāriṇī ।
svayam ātmāvalokecchā mohasaṅkṣayadāyinī ।। 

asyāḥ paraṃ prapaśyantyās svātmanāśaḥ pravartate ।
ātapānubhavārthinyāś chāyāyā iva rāghava ।। 

dṛṣṭe sarvagate deve svayam eva vilīyate ।
sarvāśābhyudite chāyā dvādaśārkagaṇe yathā ।। 

icchāmātram avidyeha tannāśo mokṣa ucyate ।
sa cāsaṅkalpamātreṇa siddho bhavati rāghava ।। 

manāg api manovyomni vāsanātamasi kṣate ।
kālimā tanutām eti cidādityamahodayāt ।। 

yathodite dinakare kvāpi yāti tamasvatī ।
tathā viveke abhyudite kvāpy avidyā pralīyate ।। 

dṛḍhavāsanayā bandho ghanatām eti cetasaḥ ।
calavetālasaṅkalpas sandhyākāle yathā śiśoḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ sāvidyā kṣīyate ca sā ।
ātmabhāvanayā brahmann ātmāsau kīdṛśas smṛtaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cetyānupātarahitaṃ sāmānyena ca sarvagam ।
yac cittattvam anākhyeyaṃ sa ātmā parameśvaraḥ ।। 

ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ tṛṇādi yad idaṃ jagat ।
tat sarvaṃ sarvadātmaiva nāvidyā vidyate anagha ।। 

sarvaṃ ca khalv idaṃ brahma nityaṃ cidghanam akṣayam ।
kalpanānyā manonāmnī vidyate na hi kācana ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye ।
na ca bhāvavikārāṇāṃ sattā kvacana vidyate ।। 

kevalaṃ kevalābhāsaṃ sarvasāmānyam akṣatam ।
cetyānupātarahitaṃ cinmātram iha vidyate ।। 

asmin nitye tate śuddhe cinmātre nirupadrave ।
śānte samasamābhoge nirvikāroditātmani ।। 

yaiṣā svabhāvābhigataṃ svayaṃ saṅkalpya dhāvati ।
cic cetyaṃ svayam amlānā sā mlānā tan manas smṛtam ।। 

ekasmāt sarvagād devāt sarvaśakter mahātmanaḥ ।
vibhāgakalanāśaktir laharīvotthitāmbhasaḥ ।। 

ekasmin vitate śānte yā na kiñcana vidyate ।
saṅkalpamātreṇa gatā sā siddhiṃ paramātmani ।। 

atas saṅkalpasiddheyaṃ saṅkalpenaiva naśyati ।
yenaiva jātā tenaiva vahnijvāleva vāyunā ।। 

pauruṣodyogasiddhena bhogāśārūpatāṃ gatā ।
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa sāvidyā parilīyate ।। 

nāhaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhād badhyate manaḥ ।
sarvaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhān mucyate punaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpaḥ paramo bandhas tv asaṅkalpo vimuktatā ।
saṅkalpam avajityāntar yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

dṛṣṭā mayāmbare atrāsti nalinī hemapaṅkajā ।
lolavaiḍūryamadhupā sugandhitadigambarā ।। 

uddaṇḍaiḥ prakaṭābhogair mṛṇālabhujamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
vihasantī prakāśasya śaśino raśmimaṇḍalāt ।। 

vikalpajālikaivettham asatyaivāpi satsamā ।
manassvāsthyavināśārthaṃ yathā bālena kalpyate ।। 

tathaiveyam avidyeha bhāvanābhavabandhanī ।
capalenāsukhāyaiva manobālena kalpitā ।। 

kṛśo atiduḥkhī baddho ahaṃ hastapādādimān aham ।
iti bhāvānurūpeṇa vyavahāreṇa badhyate ।। 

nāhaṃ duḥkhī na me dehaḥ ko bandho asyātmanaś citaḥ ।
iti bhāvānurūpeṇa vyavahāreṇa mucyate ।। 

nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na cāsthīni dehād anyaḥ paro hy aham ।
iti niścayavān antaḥkṣīṇāvidya ihocyate ।। 

prottuṅgasuraśailāgravaiḍūryaśikharaprabhā ।
atha vārkāṃśudurbhedā timiraśrīs sthitopari ।। 

kalpyate hi yathā vyomnaḥ kālimeti svabhāvajaḥ ।
puṃsā dharaṇisaṃsthena svavikalpanayeddhayā ।। 

kalpitaivam avidyeyam anātmany ātmabhāvanā ।
puruṣeṇāprabuddhena na prabuddhena rāghava ।। 

rāmaḥ

merunīlamaṇicchāyā neyaṃ nāpi tamaḥprabhā ।
tad idaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ brahman nīlatvaṃ nabhaso vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

na rāma nīlatā vyomnaś śūnyasya guṇavat sthitā ।
anyaratnaprabhābhāvān na cāpy eṣātra mairavī ।। 

tejomayatvād aṇḍasya sphāratvāt siddhatejasaḥ ।
prākāśyād aṇḍapārasya tamaso nātra sambhavaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ śūnyataivaiṣā bahvī subhaga dṛśyate ।
vayasyevānurūpāyā avidyāyā na sanmayī ।। 

svadṛṣṭikṣayasampattāv asad evotthitaṃ tamaḥ ।
vastu svabhāvāt tad vyomnaḥ kārṣṇyam ity avalokyate ।। 

etadbuddhyā yathā vyomni dṛśyamāno api kālimā ।
na kālimeti bodhas syād avidyātimire tathā ।। 

asaṅkalpo hy avidyāyā nigrahaḥ kathito budhaiḥ ।
yathā gaganapadminyās sa cātisukaras svayam ।। 

bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
apunassmaraṇaṃ manye sādho vismaraṇaṃ varam ।। 

naṣṭo aham iti saṅkalpād yathā duḥkhena naśyati ।
prabuddho asmīti saṅkalpāj jano abhyeti tathā sukham ।। 

tathā sammūḍhasaṅkalpān mūḍhatām eti vai punaḥ ।
prabodhodārasaṅkalpāt prabodhāyānudhāvati ।। 

kṣaṇāt saṃsmaraṇād eṣām avidyodeti śāśvatī ।
yatnād vismaraṇād arthaḥ parinaśyati tattvataḥ ।। 

bhāvanī sarvabhāvānāṃ sarvabhūtavimohanī ।
tāraṇī svātmano nāśe svātmavṛddhau vināśikī ।। 

mano yad anusandhatte tat sarvendriyavṛttayaḥ ।
kṣaṇāt sampādayanty etā rājājñām iva mantriṇaḥ ।। 

tasmān mano'nusandhānaṃ bhāveṣu na karoti yaḥ ।
antaś cetanayatnena sa śāntim adhigacchati ।। 

yad ādāv eva nāstīdaṃ tad adyāpi na vidyate ।
yad idaṃ bhāti tad brahma śāntam ekam aniṅganam ।। 

mananīyamanomānāny ataḥ kasya kathaṃ kutaḥ ।
nirvikāram anādyantam āsyatām apayantraṇam ।। 

paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya yatnād paramayā dhiyā ।
bhogāśābhāvanāṃ cittāt samūlam alam uddharet ।। 

yad udeti paro moho jarāmaraṇakāraṇam ।
āśāpāśaśatollāsī vāsanā tad vijṛmbhate ।। 

mama putrā mama dhanam ahaṃ so ayam idaṃ mama ।
itīyam indrajālena vāsanaikā vivalgati ।। 

śūnya eva śarīre asmin vilolo arjunavātavat ।
avidyayā vāsanayā tv ahambhāvāhir arpitaḥ ।। 

paramārthena tattvajña mamāham idam ity alam ।
ātmatattvād ṛte manye na kadācana kiñcana ।। 

sādridyūrvīgiriśreṇyā sṛṣṭidṛṣṭyā punaḥ punaḥ ।
saivānyeva vicitreyam avidyā parivartate ।। 

udety ajñānamātreṇa naśyati jñānamātrataḥ ।
saṃvinmātraparicchedyā rajjvām iva bhujaṅgamaḥ ।। 

sādridyūrvīnadī seyaṃ yāvidyā jñasya rāma sā ।
nāvidyā tasya tad brahma sve mahimni vyavasthitam ।। 

rajjusarpavikalpau dvāv ajñānaikopakalpitau ।
jñena tv ekaiva nirṇītā brahmadṛṣṭir akṛtrimā ।। 

mā bhavājño bhava jñas tvaṃ jahi saṃsāravāsanāḥ ।
anātmany ātmabhāvena kim anya iva rodiṣi ।। 

kas tavāyaṃ jaḍo mūko deho bhavati rāghava ।
yadarthaṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyām avaśaḥ parihīyate ।। 

yathā hi kāṣṭhajatunor yathā badarakuṇḍayoḥ ।
śliṣṭayor api naikatvaṃ dehadehavatos tathā ।। 

bhastrādāhe yathā dāho na bhastrāntaravartinaḥ ।
pavanasya tathā dehanāśe nātma vinaśyati ।। 

duḥkhito ahaṃ sukhāḍhyo aham iti bhrāntī raghūdvaha ।
anayopahate citte duṣpāreha kadarthanā ।। 

mithyaivānarthakāriṇyā manomananapīnayā ।
anayā duḥkhadāyinyā mahāmohamalāndhayā ।। 

candrabimbe sudhārdre api kṛtvā rauravakalpanām ।
nārakaṃ dāhasaṃśoṣaduḥkhaṃ samanubhūyate ।। 

jalaloloccakalhārapuṣpaśītalavīciṣu ।
sarassu mṛgatṛṣṇāḍhyaṃ mahattvaṃ paridṛśyate ।। 

nabhonagaranirmāṇapātotpatanasambhramāḥ ।
svapnādiṣv anubhūyante vicitrasukhaduḥkhadāḥ ।। 

saṃsāravāsanā ceto yadi nāma na pūrayet ।
taj jāgratsvapnasaṃrambhāḥ kaṃ nayeyur ihāpadam ।। 

dṛśyante rauravāvīcinarakānarthaśāsanāḥ ।
mithyājñāne gate vṛddhiṃ svargopavanabhūmiṣu ।। 

anayā vedhitaṃ ceto bisatantāv api kṣaṇāt ।
paśyaty akhilasaṃsārasāgarāvartavibhramam ।। 

anayopahate citte rājya eva hi saṃsthitaḥ ।
tās tā daśā jano yāti yā na yogyāś śvapākinaḥ ।। 

tasmād rāma parityajya vāsanāṃ bhavabandhanīm ।
sarvabhāvamayīṃ tiṣṭha nīrāgas sphaṭiko yathā ।। 

tiṣṭhatas tava kāryeṣu māstu rāgānurañjanā ।
sphaṭikasyeva citrāṇi pratibimbāni gṛhṇataḥ ।। 

vigatakautukasaṅgasamiddhayā yadi karoṣi sadaiva hi līlayā ।
varadhiyā jagati prakṛtikriyās tad asi kena mahān upamīyase ।। 

yathākathitadoṣaparihāropadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

evam ukto bhagavatā vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā ।
rāmaḥ kamalapattrākṣa unmīlita ivābabhau ।। 

vikāsitāntaḥkaraṇaś śobhām alam upāyayau ।
āśvastas tamasi kṣīṇe padmo arkālokavān iva ।। 

bodhavismayasañjātasaumyasmitasitānanaḥ ।
dantaraśmisudhādhautām imāṃ vācam uvāca ca ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhās tantubhir adrayaḥ ।
avidyamānā yāvidyā tayā sarve vaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 

idaṃ tad vajratāṃ yātaṃ rūpam asmiñ jagattraye ।
avidyayāpi yan nāma sad evāsad iva sthitam ।। 

asyās saṃsāramāyāyā naṭyās tribhuvanāṅgane ।
rūpaṃ sadavabodhārthaṃ kathayānugrahāt punaḥ ।। 

anyac ca saṃśayo ayaṃ me mahātman hṛdi vartate ।
lavaṇo asau mahābhāgaḥ kiṃ tām āpadam āptavān ।। 

saṃśliṣṭayor ahatayor dvayor vā dehadehinoḥ ।
brahman ka iva saṃsārī śubhāśubhaphalaikabhuk ।। 

lavaṇasya tathā dattvā tām āpadam anuttamām ।
kiṃ gataś cañcalārambhaḥ kaś cāsāv aindrajālikaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kāṣṭhakuḍyopamo deho na kiñcana ivānagha ।
svapnāloka ivānena cetasā parikalpyate ।। 

cetas tu jīvatāṃ yātaṃ cicchaktiparirūṣitam ।
viddhi saṃsāri sumate kapipotakacañcalam ।। 

ceto hi karmabhāg dehe nānākāraṃ śarīradhṛt ।
ahaṅkāramanojīvanāmabhiḥ parikathyate ।। 

tasyemāny aprabuddhasya suprabuddhasya rāghava ।
sukhadukhāny anantāni na śarīrasya kānicit ।। 

aprabuddhaṃ mano nānāsañjñākalpitakalpanam ।
vṛttīr anupatac citrā vicitrākṛtitāṃ gatam ।। 

aprabuddham bhaved yāvan nidrāntaṃ tāvad eva hi ।
sambhramaṃ paśyati svapne na prabuddhaḥ kadācana ।। 

ajñānanidrākulito jīvo yāvan na bodhitaḥ ।
tāvat paśyati durbodhaṃ saṃsārārambhavibhramam ।। 

samprabuddhasya manasas tamas sarvaṃ vilīyate ।
kamalasya yathā hy āndhyaṃ dinālokavikāsinaḥ ।। 

cittāvidyāmanojīvavāsaneti kṛtātmabhiḥ ।
karmātmeti ca yaḥ proktas sa dehī duḥkhakovidaḥ ।। 

jaḍo deho na duḥkhārho duḥkhī jīvo avicārataḥ ।
avicāro ghanājñānād ajñānaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam ।। 

śubhāśubhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ jīvo viṣayatāṃ gataḥ ।
avivekaikadoṣeṇa kośe nedaṃ mahāpadam ।। 

avivekāmayottabdhaṃ mano vividhavṛttimat ।
nānākāravihāreṇa paribhramati cakravat ।। 

udeti rauti hanty atti yāti valgati nandati ।
mana eva śarīre asmin na śarīraṃ kadācana ।। 

yathā gṛhapatir gehe rathe vā sārathir yathā ।
yathā bhujaṅgo bhastrāyāṃ śarīre asmiṃs tathā manaḥ ।। 

acale cañcalākāraḥ pādape pavano yathā ।
sphuraty evaṃ mano dehe sthito deho na cetasi ।। 

sarveṣu sukhaduḥkheṣu sarvāsu kalanāsu ca ।
manaḥ kartṛ mano bhoktṛ mānasaṃ viddhi mānavam ।। 

atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam ।
lavaṇo asau yathā yātaś caṇḍālatvaṃ manobhramāt ।। 

manaḥ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte śubhaṃ vāśubham eva vā ।
yathaitad budhyase nūnaṃ tathākarṇaya rāghava ।। 

hariścandrakulotthena lavaṇena purānagha ।
ekāntaikopaviṣṭena cintitaṃ manasā ciram ।। 

pitāmaho me sumahān rājasūyasya yājakaḥ ।
ahaṃ tasya kule jātas taṃ yaje manasā makham ।। 

iti sañcintya manasā kṛtvā sambhāram āditaḥ ।
rājasūyasya dīkṣāyāṃ viveśa sa mahīpatiḥ ।। 

ṛtvijaś cārcayām āsa pūjayām āsa sanmunīn ।
devatā vandayām āsa jvālayām āsa pāvakam ।। 

tasyetthaṃ yajamānasya manasy upavanāntare ।
yayau saṃvatsaras sāgro devarṣidvijapūjayā ।। 

bhūtebhyo dvijapūrvebhyo dattvā sarvasvadakṣiṇām ।
vyabudhyata dinasyānte svasminn upavane nṛpaḥ ।। 

evaṃ sa lavaṇo rājā rājasūyam avāptavān ।
manasaiva hi puṣṭena yuktas tasya phalena ca ।। 

ataś cittaṃ naraṃ viddhi bhoktāraṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।
tad anādāv anāyāse satye yojaya rāghava ।। 

pūrṇe cetasi sampūrṇaḥ pumān naṣṭe vinaśyati ।
deho aham iti yeṣāṃ tu niścayas tair alaṃ budhaiḥ ।। 

pūrṇe vivekavati cetasi samprabuddhe duḥkhāny alaṃ vigalitāni viviktabuddheḥ ।
bhāsvatkaraprakaṭite nanu padmaṣaṇḍe saṅkocajāḍyatimirāṇi ciraṃ kṛtāni ।। 

sukhaduḥkhabhoktur upadeśanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

rājasūyaphalaṃ prāptaṃ lavaṇena khila prabho ।
pramāṇaṃ kim ivātra syāt kalpanājālaśambare ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yadā śāmbarikaḥ kāle samprāpto lāvaṇīṃ sabhām ।
tadāham avasaṃ tatra tat pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavān ।। 

ahaṃ sabhyais tatas tatra gate śambarakāriṇi ।
kim etad iti yatnena pṛṣṭaś ca lavaṇena ca ।। 

cintayitvā mayā dṛṣṭvā tatra yat kathitaṃ tataḥ ।
śṛṇu tat te pravakṣyāmi rāma śāmbarikehitam ।। 

rājasūyasya kartāro ye hi te dvādaśābdikam ।
āpadduḥkhaṃ prāpnuvanti nānākāradaśāmayam ।। 

ataś śakreṇa gaganād duḥkhāya lavaṇasya saḥ ।
prahito devadūto hi rāma śāmbarikākṛtiḥ ।। 

rājasūyakriyākartus tasya dattvā mahāpadam ।
agacchat svanabhomārgaṃ surasiddhaniṣevitam ।। 

tasmāt pratyakṣam evaitad rāma nātra sandeho asti । mano hi vilakṣaṇānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ kartṛ bhoktṛ ca । tad eva nighṛṣya saṃśodhya cittaratnam iha himakaṇam ivātapena vilīnatāṃ vivekena nītvā paraṃ śreyaḥ prāpsyasi । cittam eva sakalabhuvanajagadāḍambarakāriṇīm avidyāṃ viddhi । sā vicitravikalpajālavaśād idam utpādayati । avidyācittajīvabuddhiśabdānāṃ bhedo nāsti vṛkṣataruśabdayor iveti jñātvā cittam eva vilīnaṃ kuru । 

abhyudite tu cittavimalārkabimbe sakalavikalpoddāmatimirahāriṇi na tad asti rāghava yan na dṛśyate yan nāsādyate yan nātmīkriyate yan na parityajyate yan na śrīyate nātmīyaṃ yan na parakīyaṃ । sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvo bhavatīti paramārthaḥ । 

bhāvarāśis tathā bodhe sarvo yāty ekapiṇḍatām ।
vicitramṛdbhāṇḍagaṇo yathāpakvo jale sthitaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ manovṛttiparikṣaye sakalasukhaduḥkhānām antaḥ prāpyata iti bhagavatā proktam । tat kathaṃ mahātmann aticapalavṛttes svarūpasyāsya manasas sattā bhavati । 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

raghukulendo śṛṇu manaḥpraśamane yuktim । jñātvā svaśvavāra iva duraśvaṃ manas saṃyamayiṣyasi । iha hi tāvad brahmaṇas sarvabhūtānāṃ trividhotpattir iti pūrvam uktam । tatredamprathama tayā manaḥkalanodeti । sā brahmā bhavati । brahmarūpiṇī saṅkalpamayī bhūtvā yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati । tenedaṃ bhuvanāḍambaraṃ kalpayati । tatra jananamaraṇasukhaduḥkhamohādikaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ kalpayantī kalpān bahūn ārambhamantharaṃ sthitvā svayaṃ vilīyate himakaṇikevātapagatā । 

kāloditasaṅkalpavaśāt punar anyatayā jāyate । sāpi punar vilīyate । punar anyodeti saiva veti bhūyo bhūyo anusarantī saṃsāravṛttīs । svayam upaśamayya śāmyati । ittham anantā brahmakoṭayo asmin brahmāṇḍe anyeṣu ca samatītā bhaviṣyanti । santi cetarā anantā yāsāṃ saṅkhyā na vidyata eva । 

tatrāsyāṃ dṛṣṭau vartamānāyām īśvarād āgatya jīvo yathā jāyate yayā ca mucyate tac chṛṇu । brahmaṇo manaśśaktir utthitā purassthitām ākāśaśaktim avalambya tatrasthapavanānupātinī ghanasaṅkalpatvaṃ gacchati । tataḥ punaḥprāptabhūtatanmātrapañcakatām etyāntaḥkaraṇanāmnī satī sūkṣmā prakṛtir bhūtvā gaganapavanasamparkāt prāleyarūpatām upetya śālyoṣadhiṣu viśati । prāṇino garbhatāṃ vā gacchati । jāyate tasmāt । tataḥ puruṣas sampadyate । tena tu puruṣeṇa jātamātreṇaiva bālyāt prabhṛti vidyāgrahaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ । guravo anugantavyāḥ । tataḥ kramāt puṃsas taveva camatkṛtir jāyate । tvatsadṛśacittavṛtteḥ puruṣasya heyopādeyavicāra utpadyate । 

tādṛgvivekavati saṅkalitābhimāne puṃsi sthite vimalasattvamayāgryajātau saptātmikāvatarati kramaśaś śivāya cetaḥprakāśanakarī nanu yogabhūmiḥ । 

sāttvikajanmāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kīdṛśyo bhagavan yogabhūmikās sapta siddhidāḥ ।
samāseneti me brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ajñānabhūs saptapadā jñabhūs saptapadaiva ca ।
padāntarāṇy asaṅkhyāni bhavanty anyāny athaitayoḥ ।। 

svayatnamādhavarasān mahāsattātarau late ।
ete pratipadaṃ baddhamūle svaṃ phalataḥ phalam ।। 

tatra saptaprakāratvaṃ tvam ajñānabhuvaś śṛṇu ।
tatas saptaprakāratvaṃ śroṣyasi jñānabhūmijam ।। 

svarūpāvasthitir muktis tadbhraṃśo ahantvavedanam ।
etat saṅkṣepataḥ proktaṃ tajjñatvājñatvalakṣaṇam ।। 

śuddhacinmātrasaṃvittes svarūpān na calanti ye ।
rāgadveṣodayābhāvāt teṣāṃ nājñatvasambhavaḥ ।। 

yat svarūpaparibhraṃśaś cetyārthaparimajjanam ।
etasmād aparo moho na bhūto na bhaviṣyati ।। 

arthād arthāntaraṃ citte yāte madhye hi yā sthitiḥ ।
nirastamananāṅkāsau svarūpasthitir ucyate ।। 

saṃśāntasarvasaṅkalpaṃ yā śilāntaravat sthitiḥ ।
jāḍyanidrādinirmuktā sā svarūpasthitis smṛtā ।। 

ahantādāv alaṃ śānte bhede nisspandacittatā ।
ajaḍā yat pratapati tat svarūpam iti smṛtam ।। 

bījajāgrat tathā jāgran mahājāgrat tathaiva ca ।
jāgratsvapnas tathā svapnas svapnajāgrat suṣuptakam ।। 

iti saptavidho mohaḥ punar eṣa parasparam ।
śliṣṭo bhavaty anekākhyaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam asya ca ।। 

prathamaṃ cetanaṃ yat syād anākhyaṃ nirmalaṃ citaḥ ।
bhaviṣyaccitijīvādināmaśabdārthabhājanam ।। 

bījarūpaṃ sthitaṃ jāgrad bījajāgrat tad ucyate ।
eṣā jñapter navāvasthā tvaṃ jāgratsaṃsthitiṃ śṛṇu ।। 

evaṃ prasūtasya parād ayaṃ cāham idaṃ mama ।
iti yaḥ pratyayas svacchas taj jāgrat prāgabhāvanā ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti janmāntaroditaḥ ।
pīvaraḥ pratyayaḥ proktaṃ mahājāgrad iti sphurat ।। 

arūḍham atha vārūḍham anidram abahirmayam ।
yaj jāgrato manorājyaṃ jāgratsvapnas sa ucyate ।। 

dvicandraśuktikārūpyamṛgatṛṣṇādibhedataḥ ।
abhyāsaṃ prāpya jāgrattvaṃ tad anekavidhaṃ bhavet ।। 

alpakālaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam etan no satyam ity api ।
nidrākālānubhūte arthe nidrānte pratyayo hi yaḥ ।। 

sa svapnaḥ kathitas tasya mahājāgrat sthitaṃ hṛdi ।
cirasandarśanābhāvād apraphultabṛhadvapuḥ ।। 

svapno jāgrattayārūḍho mahājāgratpadaṃ gataḥ ।
yat kṣate vākṣate dehe svapnajāgran mataṃ hi tat ।। 

ṣaḍavasthāparityāge jaḍajīvasya yā sthitiḥ ।
bhaviṣyadduḥkhabodhāḍhyā sauṣuptī socyate gatiḥ ।। 

ete tasyām avasthāyāṃ tṛṇaloṣṭaśilādayaḥ ।
padārthās saṃsthitās sarve purāpāścātyanūtanāḥ ।। 

saptāvasthā iti proktā mayājñānasya rāghava ।
ekaikā śataśākhātra nānāvibhavarūpiṇī ।। 

jāgratsvapnaś ciraṃ rūḍho jāgrattām eva gacchati ।
nānāpadārthabhedena sa vikāsaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

asyāś cāpy udare santi mahājāgraddaśādṛśaḥ ।
tāsām apy antar anyāś ca santy evaṃ saṃsṛtir ghanā ।। 

suṣuptasvapnakalane āsv antaradaśāsv api ।
sthite tenāyam akhilas sthito mohaś śilāghanaḥ ।। 

svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ loko mohān mohāntaraṃ vrajet ।
adhaḥpātijalāvarta iva yāti jalāntaram ।। 

kāścit saṃsṛtayo dīrghasvapnajāgrattayā sthitāḥ ।
kāścit punaḥpunas svapnā jāgratsvapnās tathetarāḥ ।। 

ajñānabhūmir iti saptapadā mayoktā nānāvikāradapadāntarabhedabhinnā ।
asyās samuttarasi cāruvicāraṇābhir dṛṣṭe prabodhavimale svayam ātmanīti ।। 

ajñānabhumikāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

imāṃ saptapadāṃ jñānabhūmim ākarṇayānagha ।
na yayā jñātayā mohapaṅke bhūyo nimajjasi ।। 

vadanti bahubhedena vādino yogabhūmikāḥ ।
mama tv abhimatā nūnam imā eva śubhapradāḥ ।। 

avabodhaṃ vidur jñānaṃ tad idaṃ sāptabhūmikam ।
muktis taj jñeyam ity uktā bhūmikā saptakāt param ।। 

satyāvabodho mokṣaś caiveti paryāyanāmanī ।
satyabodhena jīvo ayaṃ neha bhūyaḥ prarohati ।। 

jñānabhūmiś śubhecchākhyā prathamā samudāhṛtā ।
vicāraṇā dvitīyātra tṛtīyā tanumānasā ।। 

sattvāpattiś caturthī syāt tato asaṃsaktināmikā ।
padārthābhāvanī ṣaṣṭhī saptamī turyagā smṛtā ।। 

āsām ante sthitā muktis tasyāṃ bhūyo na śocate ।
etāsāṃ bhūmikānāṃ tvam idaṃ nirvacanaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

sthitaḥ kiṃ mūḍha evāsmi prekṣe ahaṃ śāstrasajjanam ।
vairāgyapūrvam iccheti śubhecchety ucyate budhaiḥ ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkavairāgyābhyāsapūrvakam ।
sadācārapravṛttir yā procyate sā vicāraṇā ।। 

vicāraṇāśubhecchābhyām indriyārtheṣv araktatā ।
yatrāśātanutābhāvāt procyate tanumānasā ।। 

bhūmikātritayābhyāsāc citte arthavirater vaśāt ।
sattvātmani sthite śuddhe sattvāpattir udāhṛtā ।। 

daśācatuṣṭayābhyāsād asaṃsaṅgaphalena vai ।
rūḍhasattvacamatkārā proktāsaṃsaktināmikā ।। 

bhūmikāpāñcakābhyāsāt svātmārāmatayā dṛḍham ।
ābhyantarāṇāṃ bāhyānāṃ padārthānām abhāvanāt ।। 

paraprayuktena ciraṃ prayatnenārthabodhanāt ।
padārthābhāvanānāmnī ṣaṣṭhī sañjāyate gatiḥ ।। 

bhūmiṣaṭkacirābhyāsād bhedasyānupalambhataḥ ।
yat svabhāvaikaniṣṭhatvaṃ sā jñeyā turyagā gatiḥ ।। 

eṣā hi jīvanmukteṣu turyāvastheha vidyate ।
videhamuktaviṣayaṃ turyātītam ataḥ param ।। 

ye hi nāma mahābhāgās saptamīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।
ātmārāmā mahātmānas te mahat padam āgatāḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktā na majjanti sukhaduḥkharasasthitau ।
prākṛtenāryakāryeṇa kiṃcit kurvanti vā na vā ।। 

pārśvasthā bodhitās santas sarvācāre kramāgatam ।
ācāram ācaranty eva suptabuddhavad akṣatāḥ ।। 

ātmārāmatayā tāṃs tās sukhayanti na kāścana ।
jagatkriyās susaṃsuptān rūpālokaśriyo yathā ।। 

bhūmikāsaptakaṃ tv etad dhīmatām eva gocaram ।
na paśusthāvarādīnāṃ na ca mlecchādicetasām ।। 

prāptā jñānadaśām etāṃ paśumlecchādayo api ye ।
sadehā vāpy adehā vā te muktā nātra saṃśayaḥ ।। 

jñaptir hi granthivicchedas tasmin sati vimuktatā ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhyādiśāntimātrātmakas tv asau ।। 

ye tu mohād ghanāt tīrṇā na prāptāḥ pāvanaṃ padam ।
te sthitā bhūmikāsv āsu svātmalābhaparāyaṇāḥ ।। 

sarvabhūmigatāḥ kecit kecid āntaikabhūmikāḥ ।
bhūmitrayagatāḥ kecit kecit pañcamabhūgatāḥ ।। 

bhūmiṣaṭkagatāḥ kecit kecit sārdhaikabhūmikāḥ ।
bhūcatuṣṭayagāḥ kecit kecid bhūmidvaye sthitāḥ ।। 

bhūmyaṃśabhājanāḥ kecit kecit sārdhatribhūmikāḥ ।
kecit sārdhacaturbhūkās sārdhaṣaḍbhūmikāḥ pare ।। 

vivekino narā loke caranta iti bhūmiṣu ।
gṛhāyatanatāpasya daśāveśeṣu saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

te hi dhīrās surājāno daśāsv āsu jayanti te ।
tṛṇāyate tu digdantighaṭābhaṭaparājayaḥ ।। 

etāsu bhūmiṣu jayanti hi ye mahānto vandyās ta eva hi jitendriyaśātravās te ।
samrāḍ virāḍ api ca yatra tṛṇāyate tat sphāraṃ padaṃ jhagiti te samavāpnuvanti ।। 

jñānabhūmikopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ūrmikāsaṃvidā hema yathā vismṛtya hematām ।
virauti nāhaṃ hemeti vṛthātmāhantayā tathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

ūrmikāsaṃvidudayaḥ kathaṃ hemno mahāmune ।
ahambhāvātmaka iti yathāvad brūhi me prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sata evāgamāpāyau praṣṭavyau nāsatas sadā ।
ahantvam ūrmikātvaṃ ca satī tu na kadācana ।। 

hema dehy ūrmikātvaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇety udite yadi ।
tad dīyate sormikeṇa tat tad asti na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ cet tat prabho atra syād ūrmikātvaṃ tu kīdṛśam ।
anayaivārthavicchittyā jñāsyāmi brahmaṇo vapuḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rūpaṃ rāghava nīrūpam asataś cen nirūpyate ।
tad vandhyātanayākāraguṇān me tvam udāhara ।। 

ūrmikātvaṃ mudhā bhrāntir māyevāsatsvarūpiṇī ।
rūpaṃ tad etad evāsyāḥ prekṣitā yan na dṛśyate ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasi dvīndāv ahantārucakādiṣu ।
etāvad eva rūpaṃ yat prekṣyamāṇaṃ na lakṣyate ।। 

yaś śuktau rajatākāraṃ prekṣate rajatasya saḥ ।
na samprāpnoty aṇum api kaṇaṃ kṣīṇam api kvacit ।। 

aparyālocanenaiva sad ivāsad virājate ।
yathā śuktau rajatatā jalaṃ marumarīciṣu ।। 

yan nāsti tasya nāstitvaṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ prakāśate ।
aprekṣyamāṇaṃ sphurati mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivāmbudhīḥ ।। 

asad eva ca tat kāryakaraṃ bhavati ca sthiram ।
bālānāṃ maraṇāyaiva vetālabhrāntisaṅgamaḥ ।। 

hematāṃ varjayitvaikāṃ vartate hemni netarat ।
ūrmikākaṭakāditvaṃ tailādi sikatāsv iva ।। 

nehāsti satyaṃ no mithyā yad yathā pratibhāsate ।
tat tathārthakriyākāri bālayakṣavikāravat ।। 

sad vā bhavatv asad vāpi sudṛḍhaṃ hṛdaye tu yat ।
tat tad arthakriyākāri viṣasyevāmṛtakriyā ।। 

paramaiva hi sāvidyā māyaiṣā saṃsṛtir hy asau ।
asato niṣpratiṣṭhasya yadāhantvasya bhāvanam ।। 

hemny asti normikāditvam ahantādy asti nātmani ।
ahantvābhāvatas tv evaṃ svacche śānte same pare ।। 

na sanātanatā kācin na ca kācid viriñcatā ।
na ca brahmāṇḍatā kācin na ca kācit surāditā ।। 

na lokāntaratā kācin na ca sargāditā kvacit ।
na merutā nāmbaratā na manastā na dehatā ।। 

na mahābhūtatā kācin na ca kāraṇatā kvacit ।
na cartukālakalanā na bhāvābhāvavastutā ।। 

tvattāhantātmatā tattā sattāsattā na kāścana ।
na kvacid bhedakalanā na bhāvābhāvarañjanā ।। 

sarvaṃ śāntaṃ nirālambhaṃ jñam acchaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam ।
anāmayam anābhāsam anāmakam akāraṇam ।। 

na san nāsan na madhyāntaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvam eva ca ।
manovacobhir agrāhyaṃ śūnyāśūnyaṃ suśāśvatam ।। 

rāmaḥ

avabuddhaṃ mahābrahman sarvam etan mayādhunā ।
tathāpi bhūyaḥ kathaya sargaḥ kim avalokyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pare śāntaṃ paraṃ nāma sthitam ittham idantayā ।
neha sargo na sargākhyā kācanāsti kadācana ।। 

mahārṇavāmbhasīvāmbu saṃsthitaṃ parame pade ।
jalaṃ dravatvāt spandīva nisspandaṃ paramaṃ padam ।। 

bhāsvātmanīva kacati na kacac caiva tat padam ।
bhāsate kacanaṃ bhāsāṃ paraṃ tv akacanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

adha ūrdhvaṃ varjayitvā yathābdher udare payaḥ ।
sphuraty evaṃ pare cittvād idaṃ nāneva tatparam ।। 

īṣadvidan svayaṃ cittvād anyatām iva paśyati ।
budhyate sarga ity eva śamāc chāmyati śāśvatam ।। 

sargas tu paramārthasya sañjñety eva viniścayaḥ ।
na nāsti nāyam asty antar ambarasya yathāmbaram ।। 

cittvāt sargasamāpattir acittvāt sargasaṅkṣayaḥ ।
pare paramaṃ saṃśānte hemnīva kaṭakabhramaḥ ।। 

sann eva sargo asargatvam eti vittvaśamodaye ।
asat sattām avāpnoti svatas saṃvedanodaye ।। 

saṃvedanam ahambhāvasargasambhavasambhramaḥ ।
asaṃvedanam āśāntaṃ paraṃ viddhi na taj jaḍam ।। 

nānena sargo nānāyaṃ jñāsyaikātmā śivātmakaḥ ।
pustakarmakṛtā senā mṛṇmayī śilpināṃ yathā ।। 

idaṃ pūrṇam anārambham anantam anavodayam ।
pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ parāpūraiḥ pūrvam evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

yad ayaṃ lakṣyate sargas tad brahma brahmaṇi sthitam ।
nabho nabhasi viśrāntaṃ śāntaṃ śānte śivaṃ śive ।। 

makurapratibimbasthe nagare nagaraṃ jane ।
yathā dūram adūraṃ ca tatheśe tadatatkramaḥ ।। 

asad abhyutthitaṃ viśvaṃ sad apy abhyuditaṃ sadā ।
pratibhāsāt sadābhāsam avastutvād asanmayam ।। 

ādarśanagarākāre mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubhāsvare ।
dvicandravibhramābhāse sarge asmin keva satyatā ।। 

māyācūrṇaparikṣepād yathā vyomni purabhramaḥ ।
tathā saṃvidi saṃsāras sāro asāraś ca bhāsate ।। 

yāvad vicāradahanena samūladāhaṃ dagdhā na jarjaralateva balād avidyā ।
śākhāpratānagahanā gahanāni tāvan nānāvidhāni sukhaduḥkhavanāni sūte ।। 

muktyupadeśo nāma sargaḥ

viṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

hemormikādivan mithyā kacitāyāḥ kṣayonmukham ।
tvam ahantvam avidyāyāś śṛṇu rāghava kīdṛśam ।। 

lavaṇo asau mahīpālas tadā dṛṣṭvā tathā bhramam ।
dvitīye divase gantuṃ pravṛttas tāṃ mahāṭavīm ।। 

yat tad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā duḥkham araṇyānīṃ smarāmi tām ।
cittādarśagatā cittvāt kadācil labhyate ca sā ।। 

iti niścitya sacivais sa yayau dakṣiṇāpatham ।
punar digvijayāyaiva prāpa vindhyamahīdharam ।। 

pūrvadakṣiṇapāścātyamahārṇavataṭasthalīm ।
babhrāma kautukāt sarvāṃ vyomavīthīm ivoṣṇaruk ।। 

athaikasmin pradeśe tāṃ bhittāv iva purogatām ।
dadarśogrām araṇyānīṃ paralokamahīm iva ।। 

sarvatra viharaṃs tāṃs tān vṛttāntān sakalān api ।
dṛṣṭavān dṛṣṭavāṃś caiva jñātavāṃś ca visismaye ।। 

tān parijñātavāṃś cāsīd vyādhān pukkasajān puraḥ ।
vismayākulayā buddhyā bhūyo babhrāma sambhramī ।। 

atha prāpa mahāṭavyāḥ paryante dhūmadhūsaram ।
tam eva grāmakaṃ yasmin so abhavat puṣṭapukkasaḥ ।। 

tatrāpaśyaj janāṃs tāṃs tāṃs striyas tās tāḥ kuṭīrikāḥ ।
tān ārāmāñ jalādhārāṃs tāṃs tāṃś ca vasudhātaṭān ।। 

taṃ cākāṇḍaparibhraṃśaṃ tān vṛkṣāṃs tān vṛtivrajān ।
tāṃs tathaiva samuddeśāṃs tadvṛttāntaikalāñchitān ।। 

anyāsu vṛddhāsu sabāṣpanetrāsv ārtyābhiyuktāsu ca varṇayantī ।
akālakāntāraviśīrṇabandhuduḥkhāny asaṅkhyāni sakhī sakhīṣu ।। 

vṛddhā pravṛddhojjvalabāṣpānetra kanthāvṛtā śuṣkakucā kṛśāṅgī ।
avagrahogrāśanidagdhadeśe tatrāntarāntā pariroditīyam ।। 

hā putra putrāvṛtasarvagātra dinatrayābhojanajarjarāṅga ।
kṛtteśunā carmaṇi jīrṇadehāt kathaṃ kva muktā bhavatāsavas te ।। 

tālīlatālambanam ambudārdradantāntarasthāruṇasatphalasya ।
smarāmi guñjāphaladāmahetoḥ puras svavadhvā rasahāsinas te ।। 

kadambajambīralavaṅgaguñjakuñjāntar atrastatarattarakṣoḥ ।
paśyāmi putrasya kadā nu bhūyo bhayaṅkarāṇy āplutivalgitāni ।। 

na tāni tāmbūlavilāsinīnāṃ mukheṣu śobhalalitāni santi ।
tamālanīle cibukaikadeśe sutasya yāny āsyagatāmiṣasya ।। 

sutāpi nītā saha tena bhartrā yamena yāsyā yamunā samānā ।
tamālavallī sahapuṣpagucchā samīraṇeneva vanecareṇa ।। 

hā putri guñjāphaladāmahāre samunnatābhogapayodharāṅgi ।
vātollasatkajjalanīlavarṇe parṇāmbare abādharaje ambudante ।। 

hā rājaputrendusamāna kānta santyajya śuddhāntavilāsinīs tāḥ ।
ratiṃ prayāto asi mamātmajāyāṃ na sāpi te susthiratām upetā ।। 

saṃsāranadyās svataraṅgabhaṅgaiḥ kriyāvilāsair vihitopahāsaiḥ ।
kiṃ nāma tucchaṃ na kṛtaṃ nṛpo asau yad yojitaḥ pukkasakanyakāyām ।। 

sā trastasāraṅgasamānanetrā sa tṛptaśārdūlasamānavīryaḥ ।
ubhau gatāv ekapadena nāśam āśā sahārthena yathā ca hema ।। 

mṛteśvarāsmy astamitātmajāsmi durdeśayātāsmi ca durgatāsmi ।
durjātajātāsmi mahāpadāsmi sākṣāt svayaṃ vonnamitāpadāsmi ।। 

nīcāvamānaprabhavasya manyoḥ kṣudhāvasannasya kalatrakasya ।
śokasya vegād anivāryavṛtter nāryas sadaikāyatanaṃ vināthāḥ ।। 

daivopataptasya vibāndhavasya mūḍhasya rūḍhasya mahādhibhūmau ।
yat prāṇanaṃ tan maraṇaṃ mahāpad yā syān mṛtir jīvitam uttamaṃ tat ।। 

janair vihīnasya videśavṛtter duḥkhāny anantāni samullasanti ।
sahasraśākhārasasaṅkulāni tṛṇāni varṣāsv iva parvatasya ।। 

evaṃ lapantīṃ svakalatravṛddhāṃ dāsibhir āśvāsya nṛpas striyaṃ tām ।
papraccha kiṃ vṛttam ihāsi kā ca kā te sutā kaś ca patis taveti ।। 

uvāca sodbāṣpavilocanātha grāmas tv ayaṃ pukkasaghoṣanāmā ।
ihābhavat pukkasakaḥ patir me babhūva tasyendusamā sutaikā ।। 

sā daivayogāt patim indutulyam ihāgataṃ daivavaśena bhūpam ।
śūnye viśīrṇaṃ madhukumbham āpa vane varākī karabhī yathaikā ।। 

sā tena sārdhaṃ suciraṃ sukhāni bhuktvā prasūtā tanayāṃ sutāṃś ca ।
vṛddhiṃ gatā kānanakoṭare asmiṃs tumbīlatā pādapasaṃvṛteva ।। 

caṇḍālīśocanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

caṇḍālī

kenacit tv atha kālena grāmake asmiñ janeśvara ।
avṛṣṭiduḥkham abhavad bhīṣaṇaṃ bhagnamānavam ।। 

mahatānena duḥkhena sarve te grāmakāj janāḥ ।
vinirgatya gatā dūraṃ tatra pañcatvam āgatāḥ ।। 

tenemā duḥkhabhāginyaś śūnyā vayam iha prabho ।
śocyāś śocāma udbāṣpam ācāntekṣaṇavārayaḥ ।। 

ity ākarṇyāṅganāvaktrād rājā vismayam āgataḥ ।
mantriṇāṃ mukham ālokya citrārpita ivābhavat ।। 

bhūyo vicārayām āsa tad āścaryam anuttamam ।
bhūyo bhūyaś ca papraccha babhūvāścaryavān ati ।। 

teṣāṃ samucitair mānasammānair duḥkhasaṅkṣayam ।
kṛtvā karuṇayāviddho dṛṣṭalokaparāvaraḥ ।। 

sthitvā tatra ciraṃ kālaṃ vimṛśya niyater gatīḥ ।
ājagāma puraṃ paurair vanditaḥ praviveśa ca ।। 

prātas tatra sabhāsthāne mām apṛcchad asau nṛpaḥ ।
katham eṣa mune svapnaḥ pratyakṣa iti vismitaḥ ।। 

yathāvastu mayā tasya tattadyuktyā sa tādṛśaḥ ।
saṃśayo hṛdayān nunno vātenevāmbudodayaḥ ।। 

itīyaṃ rāghavāvidyā mahatī bhramadāyinī ।
asat sattāṃ nayaty āśu sac cāsattāṃ nayaty alam ।। 

rāmaḥ

katham evaṃ vada brahman svapnas satyatvam āgataḥ ।
bhramabhāra ivaiṣo artho na me lagati cetasi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvam etad avidyāyāṃ sambhavaty eva rāghava ।
ghaṭeṣu paṭatā dṛṣṭā svapnasambhramaṇādivat ।। 

dūraṃ nikaṭavad bhāti makure antar ivācalaḥ ।
ciraṃ śīghratvam āyāti yūnas seṣṭeva yāminī ।। 

asambhavaṃ sambhavati svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।
asac ca sad ivodeti svapneṣv iva nabhogatiḥ ।। 

susthiraṃ suṣṭhu calati bhrame bhūmivivartavat ।
abalo balam āyāti madavikṣubdhacittavat ।। 

vāsanāvalitaṃ ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam ।
tat tathānubhavaty āśu na sad asti na cāpy asat ।। 

yadaivābhyuditāvidyā tv ahantādimayī mudhā ।
tadaivānādimadhyāntā bhramasyānantatoditā ।। 

pratibhāsavaśād eva sarvaṃ viparivartate ।
kṣaṇaḥ kalpatvam āyāti kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ ।। 

viparyastamatir jantuḥ kām avasthāṃ na vāpatet ।
bibharti siṃhatām eṇo vāsanāvaśatas svayam ।। 

viṣabhramamadāvidyāmohāhantādayas samāḥ ।
sarve cittaviparyāsāt phalasampattihetavaḥ ।। 

kākatalīyavac cetovāsanāvaśatas svataḥ ।
saṃviśanti mahārambhā vyavahārāḥ parasparam ।। 

vṛttaṃ prāk pakkaṇe rājñaḥ kasyacil lavaṇasya yat ।
pratibhātaṃ tad etasya sad vāsad vā manogatam ।। 

vismaraty api vistīrṇāṃ kriyāṃ cetaḥkṛtāṃ yathā ।
tathā kṛtām apy akṛtām iti smarati niścitam ।। 

tathāpy abhuktavān asmi bhuktavān iti vetti hi ।
svapne deśāntaragamaś cākṛto apy avabudhyate ।। 

vindhyapukkasaktagrāmavyavahāro ayam īdṛśaḥ ।
pratibhāsāgatas tasya svapne pūrvakathā yathā ।। 

atha vā lavaṇenāśu dṛṣṭo yas svapnavibhramaḥ ।
sa eva saṃvidaṃ prāpto vindhyapukkasacetasaḥ ।। 

vindhyapukkasasaṃvid vārūḍhā pārthivacetasi ।
yathā bahūnāṃ sadṛśaṃ vacanaṃ nāma cānanam ।। 

tathā svapno api bhavati kālo deśaḥ kriyāpi ca ।
vyavahāragates tv asyās sattāsti pratibhāsataḥ ।। 

sattā sarvapadārthānāṃ nānyā saṃvedanād ṛte ।
saṃvedane antar ābhāti vicitrā sargasantatiḥ ।। 

bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthā tarubīje tarur yathā ।
tasyās sattvam asattvaṃ ca na san nāsad iti sthitam ।। 

sat sad eva hi saṃvitter asaṃvitter na sanmayam ।
nāvidyā vidyate kiñcit tailādi sikatāsv iva ।। 

hemnaḥ kiṃ kaṭukatvaṃ tad anyat syād dhematāṃ vinā ।
avidyayātmano acchasya sambandho nopapadyate ।। 

sambandhas sadṛśānāṃ yas sa sphuṭas so anubhūtidaḥ ।
jatukāṣṭhādisambandho yas sa no samayor ataḥ ।। 

nānyo'nyānubhavātmāsau tad ekāspadamātrakam ।
paramārthamayaṃ sarvaṃ yadā tenopalādayaḥ ।। 

citā samabhicetyante sambandhavaśatas samāt ।
yadā cinmātrasanmātramayās sarve jagadgatāḥ ।। 

bhāvās tadā vibhānty ete mithas svānubhavasthitau ।
na sambhavati sambandho viṣamāṇāṃ nirantaraḥ ।। 

na parasparasambandhād vinānubhavanaṃ mithaḥ ।
sadṛśe sadṛśaṃ vastu kṣaṇād gatvaikatām alam ।। 

rūpam āsphārayaty ekam ekatvād eva nānyathā ।
cic citā militā dṛśyarūpayodeti cetanam ।। 

jaḍaṃ jaḍena militaṃ jaḍaṃ sampadyate ghanam ।
na ca cijjaḍayor aikyaṃ vailakṣaṇyāt kvacid bhavet ।। 

cijjaḍau cet sta ekatra na tau sammilataḥ kvacit ।
cinmayatvāc cidālehe cidālehena vedanam ।। 

dārupāṣāṇabhedānāṃ na tu hy ete cidātmakāḥ ।
padārtho hi padārthena pariṇamyānubhūyate ।। 

jihvayeva rasas sā ca sajātīyodayā calā ।
aikyaṃ ca viddhi sambandhaṃ nāsty asārasasārayoḥ ।। 

jaḍacetanayos tena nopalādi jaḍaṃ matam ।
cid evopalakuḍyādirūpiṇī militā citā ।। 

ekībhāvaṃ gatā draṣṭṛdṛśyādi kurute bhramam ।
kāṣṭhopalādy aśeṣaṃ hi paramārthamayaṃ yadā ।। 

tadātmanāntassambaddhaṃ dṛśyatvenopalabhyate ।
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyam anantam iva yat tatam ।। 

viśvaṃ sanmātram evaitad viddhi tattvavidāṃ vara ।
asatāpy aṅga viśvena viśvalakṣaśatabhramaiḥ ।। 

pūritaś ciccamatkāro na ca kiñcana pūritam ।
saṅkalpanagarā nṝṇāṃ mithaḥ paśyati no yathā ।। 

na deśakālabodhāya tathā sargāś citi sthitāḥ ।
bhedabodho hi sargatvam ahantādibhramodayaḥ ।। 

hemasaṃvitparityāge kaṭakādibhramo yathā ।
kaṭakādibhramo hemni deśādes sambhavād bhavet ।। 

tvaddarśanaparītāt tu nāvidyāsti pṛthak parā ।
kaṭakādimahābhedam ekaṃ brahma tathāmalam ।। 

bodhaikatvād ayaṃ sargas sattaivāsad bhavaty alam ।
senā mṛtsaṃvidā citrā mṛṇmātram iva mṛṇmayī ।। 

jalam ekaṃ taraṅgādi dārv ekaṃ sālabhañjikāḥ ।
mṛṇmātram ekaṃ kumbhādi brahmaikaṃ trijagadbhramaḥ ।। 

sambandhe draṣṭṛdṛśyānāṃ madhye draṣṭur hi yad vapuḥ ।
draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyādivarjitaṃ tad idaṃ param ।। 

deśād deśaṃ gate citte madhye yaś cetaso vapuḥ ।
ajāḍyasaṃvinmananaṃ tanmayo bhava sarvadā ।। 

ajāgratsvapnanidrasya yat te rūpaṃ sanātanam ।
acetanaṃ cājaḍaṃ ca tanmayo bhava sarvadā ।। 

jaḍatāṃ varjayitvaikāṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ hi yat ।
akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas tanmayo bhava rāghava ।। 

kasyacit kiñcanāpīha nodeti na vilīyate ।
akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas svasthas tiṣṭha yathāsukham ।। 

nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi dehe kiñcit kvacit pumān ।
svasthas tiṣṭha nirāśaṅkaṃ dehavṛttim upāgataḥ ।। 

bhaviṣyadgrāmakagrāmyakārye tiṣṭhasi no yathā ।
cittavṛttiṣu mā tiṣṭha tathā tathyātmatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

yathā deśāntaranaro yathā kāṣṭhaṃ yathopalaḥ ।
tathaiva paśya cittaṃ tvam acittaiva yathātmatā ।। 

yathā dṛṣadi nāsty ambu yathāmbhasy analas tathā ।
svātmany evāsti no cittaṃ paramātmani tat kutaḥ ।। 

prekṣyamāṇaṃ na yat kiñcit tena yat kriyate kvacit ।
kṛtaṃ bhavati tan neti matvā cittātigo bhava ।। 

atyantānātmabhūtasya cec cittasyānuvartase ।
paryantavāsinaḥ kasmān na mlecchasyānuvartase ।। 

nirantaram anādṛtya tvam ārāc cittapukkasam ।
svastham āssva nirāśaṅkaṃ paṅkeneva kṛto jaḍaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ nāsty eva me bhūtaṃ mṛtam evādya veti ca ।
bhava niścayavān bhūtvā śilāpuruṣaniścalaḥ ।। 

prekṣāyām asti no cittaṃ tadvihīno asi tattvataḥ ।
tat kimartham anarthena tadarthena kadarthyase ।। 

asatā cittayakṣeṇa ye athavātivaśīkṛtāḥ ।
teṣāṃ pelavabuddhīnāṃ candrād aśanir utthitā ।। 

cittaṃ dūre parityajya yo asi so asi sthiro bhava ।
bhava bhāvanayā mukto yuktyā paramayānvitaḥ ।। 

asato ye anuvartante cetaso asattvarūpiṇaḥ ।
vyomakānanakarmaikanītakālān dhig astu tān ।। 

vyapagalitamanā mahānubhāvo bhava bhavapāram upāgatāmalātmā ।
suciram api vicāritaṃ na labdhamalam alam ātmani mānasātma kiñcit ।। 

cittābhāvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prathamaṃ jātamātreṇaiva puṃsā kiñcidvikacitabuddhinaiva satsaṅgamapareṇa bhavitavyam । anavaratapravāhāpatito ayam avidyānadīnivahaś śamaśāstrasajjanasamparkād ṛte tarituṃ na śakyate । tena vivekavataḥ puruṣasya heyopādeyavicāra utpadyate । tenāsau śubhecchābhidhānāṃ vivekabhuvam āpatito bhavati । tato vivekavaśato vicāraṇayā samyagjñānenāsamyagvāsanāṃ tyajatas saṃsāravāsanāto manas tanutām eti । tena tanumānasīṃ nāma vivekabhūmim avatīrṇo bhavati । yadaiva yoginas samyagjñānodayas tadaiva sattvāpattiḥ । tadvaśād vāsanā tanutāṃ gatā yadā tadaivāsāv asakta ity ucyate । karmaphalena na badhyata iti ।
