atha tāvad asāv asattve bhāvanātānavam abhyasyati । yāvat kurvann api vyavaharann api asatyeṣu saṃsāravastuṣu sthito api । svātmany eva kṣīṇamanastvād abhyāsavaśād bāhyaṃ vastu kurvann api na karoti paśyann api na paśyati nālambate tam eva । tanuvāsanatvāc ca kevalam ardhasuptaprabuddha iva kartavyaṃ karoti na tu bhāvitamanaskaḥ । tena yogabhūmim abhāvanīm adhirūḍha ity antarlīnacittaḥ katicit saṃvatsarān abhyasya sarvathaiva kurvann api bāhyapadārthabhāvanāṃ tyajati । turyātmā bhavati । tato jīvanmukta ity ucyate । 

nābhinandati samprāptaṃ nāprāptam abhiśocati ।
kevalaṃ vigatāśaṅkas samprāptam anuvartate ।। 

tvayāpi rāghava jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilāntaram ।
manye te sarvakāryebhyo vāsanās tanutāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

śarīrātītavṛttis tvaṃ śarīrastho athavā bhava ।
mā gāś śokaṃ ca harṣaṃ ca tvam ātmā vigatāmayaḥ ।। 

tvayy ātmani sthite svacche sarvage satatodite ।
kuto duḥkhasukhe rāma kuto maraṇajanmanī ।। 

abandhur api kasmāt tvaṃ bandhuduḥkhāni śocasi ।
advitīye sthite hy asmin bāndhavāḥ ka ivātmani ।। 

dṛśyate kevalaṃ dehaparamāṇucayaḥ param ।
deśakālānyatāpatter nātmodeti na līyate ।। 

avināśo api kasmāt tvaṃ vinaśyāmīti śocasi ।
amṛtyuvaśini svacche vināśaḥ ka ivātmani ।। 

ghaṭe kapālatāṃ yāte ghaṭākāśo na naśyati ।
yathā tathā śarīre asmin naṣṭe tvaṃ na vinaśyasi ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇātaraṅgiṇyāṃ kṣīṇāyāṃ nātapo yathā ।
vinaśyati tathā dehe naṣṭe nātmā vinaśyati ।। 

vāñchaivodeti te kasmād bhrāntir antar nirarthikā ।
advitīyo dvitīyaṃ tat kiṃ vastv ātmābhivāñchatu ।। 

śravyaṃ spṛśyaṃ tathā dṛśyaṃ ramyaṃ ghreyaṃ ca rāghava ।
na kiñcid asti jagati vyatiriktaṃ yad ātmanaḥ ।। 

sarvaśaktāv imās tasminn ātmany evākhilās sthitāḥ ।
śaktayo vitate vyakte ākāśa iva śūnyatāḥ ।। 

cittād rāghava rūḍheyaṃ trilokīlalanodare ।
trividhena krameṇeha janatā janitabhramā ।। 

manaḥpraśamane siddhe vāsanākṣayanāmani ।
karmakṣayābhidhāne ca māyeyaṃ pravinaśyati ।। 

saṃsārogrāraghaṭṭe asmin yā dṛḍhā yantravāhinī ।
rajjus tāṃ vāsanām etāṃ chinddhi rāghava yatnataḥ ।। 

aparijñāyamānaiṣā mahāmohapradāyinī ।
parijñātā tv anantākhyasukhadā brahmagāminī ।। 

āgatā brahmaṇo bhuktvā saṃsāram iha līlayā ।
punar brahmaiva saṃsmṛtya brahmaṇy eva vilīyate ।। 

śivād rāghava nīrūpād aprameyān nirāmayāt ।
sarvabhūtāni jātāni prākāśyānīva tejasaḥ ।। 

rekhāvṛndaṃ yathā parṇe vīcijālaṃ yathā jale ।
kaṭakādi yathā hemni tathauṣṇyādi yathānale ।। 

tadatadbhāvabhūtaṃ hi tathedaṃ bhuvanatrayam ।
tasminn eva sthitaṃ tajjaṃ tasmād eva tad eva ca ।। 

sa eṣa sarvabhūtānām ātmā brahmeti kathyate ।
tasmiñ jñāte jagaj jñātam ajñāte ajñātam eva tat ।। 

śāstrasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ tasyāsya vitatākṛteḥ ।
cid brahmātmeti nāmāni kalpitāni kṛtātmabhiḥ ।। 

viṣayendriyasaṃyoge harṣāmarṣavivarjitā ।
yaiṣā śuddhānubhūtir hi so ayam ātmā cidavyayaḥ ।। 

ākāśātitarācchāccham idaṃ tasmiṃś cidātmani ।
svābhoga eva hi jagat pṛthagvat pratibimbati ।। 

buddhās tadvyatirekeṇa lobhamohādayo aritām ।
yānty athāvyatirekeṇa buddhās tasmiṃs tadaiva te ।। 

adehasyaiva te nāma nirvikalpacidākṛteḥ ।
lajjābhayaviṣādākhyaḥ kuto mohas samutthitaḥ ।। 

adeho dehajair doṣair lajjādibhir asanmayaiḥ ।
kiṃ mūrkha iva durbuddhe vikalpair abhibhūyase ।। 

akhaṇḍacitirūpasya dehe khaṇḍanam āgate ।
asamyagdarśino apy asti na nāśaḥ kim u sanmateḥ ।। 

yad etad arkamārge api na viruddhagamāgamam ।
cittvaṃ rāma sa vijñeyaḥ puruṣo na śarīrakam ।। 

śarīre saty asati vā pumān eṣa jagattraye ।
jño apy ajño api sthito rāma naṣṭe dehe na naśyati ।। 

yānīmāni vicitrāṇi duḥkhāni paripaśyasi ।
tāni sarvāṇi dehasya nāgrāhyasya cidātmanaḥ ।। 

manomargād atītatvād yāsau śūnyam iva sthitā ।
cit kathaṃ nāma sā duḥkhais sukhair vā parigṛhyate ।। 

saṃvidātmā tad asmāt tu viśiṣṭād dehapañjarāt ।
abhyastāṃ vāsanāṃ yāti ṣaṭpadaḥ kham ivāmbujāt ।। 

asac ced ātmatattvaṃ tad asmiṃs te dehapañjare ।
naṣṭe kiṃ nāma naṣṭaṃ syād rāma yenānuśocasi ।। 

satyaṃ bhāvaya tena tvaṃ mā moham anubhāvaya ।
niricchasyātmano necchāḥ kāścid apy anaghākṛteḥ ।। 

sākṣibhūte same svacche nirvikalpe cidātmani ।
svayaṃ jaganti dṛśyante sanmaṇāv iva raśmayaḥ ।। 

niriccham abhisambandho yathā darpaṇabimbayoḥ ।
svabhāvavaśasampannas tathā cijjagator ayam ।। 

dvitvaikatve sthite yad varmakurapratibimbayoḥ ।
tathaivehātmajagator bhedābhedau vyavasthitau ।। 

sūryasannidhimātre tu yathodeti bhuvi kriyā ।
citsattāmātrakenedaṃ jagan niṣpadyate tathā ।। 

piṇḍagrahe nivṛtte asyā evaṃ rāma jagatsthiteḥ ।
ākāśam eṣā sampannā bhavatām api cetasi ।। 

sattāmātreṇa dīpasya yathā dīptis svabhāvataḥ ।
cittattvasya svabhāvāt tu tatheyaṃ jāgatī kriyā ।। 

pūrvaṃ manas samuditaṃ paramātmatattvāt tenātataṃ jagad idaṃ svavikalpajālam ।
śūnyena śūnyam amalena yathāmbareṇa nīlatvam ullasati cārulatābhirāmam ।। 

saṅkalpasaṅkṣayavaśād galite tu citte saṃsāramohamihikā galitā bhavanti ।
svacchaṃ vibhāti śaradīva kham āśritāyāṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam anantam antaḥ ।। 

karmātmakaṃ prathamam eva mano abhyudeti saṅkalpataḥ kamalajaprakṛtiṃ tad etya ।
nānāvidhaṃ jagad anantam idaṃ tanoti vetāladehakalanām iva mugdhabālaḥ ।। 

asanmayaṃ sad iva puropalakṣyate punar bhavaty atha parilīyate punaḥ ।
svayaṃ manaś citi vitataṃ sphuradvapur mahārṇave jalavalayāvalī yathā ।। 

paramārthanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ tāvad idaṃ viddhi dṛśyaṃ jagad iti sthitam ।
ahaṃ cetyādy anākāraṃ bhrāntimātram asanmayam ।। [ MT]

akartṛkam anaṅgaṃ ca gagane citram utthitam ।
adraṣṭṛkaṃ sānubhavam anidraṃ svapnadarśanam ।। 

bhaviṣyatpuranirmāṇaṃ citrasaṃstham ivoditam ।
markaṭānalatāpābham ambvāvartavad āsthitam ।। 

sadrūpam api niśśūnyaṃ tejas sauram ivāmbare ।
ratnābhājālam iva khe dṛśyamānam abhittimat ।। 

saṅkalpapuravat prauḍham anubhūtam asanmayam ।
kathārthapratibhānātma na kvacit sthitam asti ca ।। 

nissāram apy atīvāntassāraṃ svapnācalopamam ।
bhūtākāśam ivākārabhāsuraṃ śūnyamātrakam ।। 

śaradabhram ivāgrastham alakṣyakṣayam ākṣayi ।
varṇo vyomatalasyeva dṛśyamānam avastukam ।। 

svapnāṅganāratākāram arthaniṣṭham anarthakam ।
citrodyānam ivotphullam arasaṃ sarasākṛti ।। 

prakāśam iva nistejaś citrārkānalavat sthitam ।
anubhūtaṃ manorājyam ivāsatyam avāstavam ।। 

citrapadmākara iva sārasaugandhyavarjitam ।
śūnye prakacitaṃ nānāvarṇam ākāritātmakam ।। 

paramārthena śuṣyadbhir bhūtapelavapallavaiḥ ।
tataṃ jaḍam asārātma kadalīstambhabhāsuram ।। 

sphāritekṣaṇadṛśyāndhakāracakrakavat tatam ।
atyantam abhavadrūpam api pratyakṣavat sthitam ।। 

vār budbuda ivābhogi śūnyam antas sphuradvapuḥ ।
rasātmakaṃ satyarasam avicchinnakṣayodayam ।। 

nīhāra iva vistāri gṛhītaṃ san na kiñcana ।
jaḍaṃ śūnyāspadaṃ śūnyaṃ keṣāñcit paramāṇuvat ।। 

kiñcid bhūtamayo astīti sthitaṃ śūnyam abhūtakam ।
gṛhyamāṇam asadrūpaṃ niśātama ivotthitam ।। 

rāmaḥ

mahākalpakṣaye dṛśyam āste bīja ivāṅkuram ।
pare bhūya udety etat tata eveti kiṃ vada ।। 

evambodhāḥ kim ajñās syur uta tajjñā iti sphuṭam ।
yathāvad bhagavan brūhi sarvasaṃśayaśāntaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idaṃ bīje aṅkura iva dṛśyam āste mahākṣaye ।
brūte yaḥ param ajñatvam etat tasyātiśaiśavāt ।। 

sparśe kiṃ tad asambaddhaṃ katham etad avāstavam ।
viparīto bodha eṣa vaktuś śrotuś ca maurkhyakṛt ।। 

bījakāle aṅkura iva jagad āsta itīha yā ।
buddhis sāsatpralāpārthā mūḍhā śṛṇu kathaṃ kila ।। 

bījaṃ bhavet svayaṃ dṛśyaṃ cittādīndriyagocaraḥ ।
vaṭadhānādi dhānyādi yuktam atrāṅkurodbhavaḥ ।। 

manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ yaḥ khād atitarām api ।
bījaṃ tad bhavituṃ śaktaṃ svayambhūr jagataḥ katham ।। 

ākāśād api sūkṣmasya parasya paramātmanaḥ ।
sarvākṣānupalabhyasya kīdṛśī bījatā katham ।। 

sat sūkṣmam asadābhāsam asad eva hy ataddṛśām ।
kīdṛśī bījatā tatra bījābhāve kuto aṅkuraḥ ।। 

gaganāṅgād api svacche śūnye tatra pare pade ।
kathaṃ santi jaganmerusamudragaganādayaḥ ।। 

nakiñcid yat kathaṃ kiñcit tatrāste vastv avastuni ।
asti cet tat kathaṃ tatra vidyamānaṃ na dṛśyate ।। 

nakiñcidātmanaḥ kiñcit katham eti kuto atha vā ।
śūnyarūpād ghaṭākāśāj jāto adriḥ kva kutaḥ kadā ।। 

pratipakṣe kathaṃ kiñcid āste chāyātape yathā ।
katham āste tamo bhānau katham āste hime analaḥ ।। 

merur āste katham aṇau kutaḥ kiñcid anākṛtau ।
tadatadrūpayor aikyaṃ kva cchāyātapayor iva ।। 

sākāre vaṭadhānādāv aṅkuro astīti yuktimat ।
anākāre mahākāraṃ jagad astīty ayuktimat ।। 

deśāntare yac ca narāntare ca buddhyādisarvendriyaśaktyadṛśyam ।
nāsty eva tattadvidhabuddhibodhe nakiñcid ity eva tad ucyate ca ।। 

kāryasya tat kāraṇatāṃ prayātaṃ vaktīti yas tasya vimūḍhabodhaḥ ।
kair nāma tatkāryam udeti tasmāt svaiḥ kāraṇaughais sahakārirūpaiḥ ।। 

durbuddhibhiḥ kāraṇakāryabhāvaṃ saṅkalpitaṃ dūratare vyudasya ।
yad eva tat satyam anādimadhyaṃ jagat tad eva sthitam ity avehi ।। 

janyajanakanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athaitadabhyupagame vacmi vedyavidāṃ vara ।
samastakalanātīte mahācidvyomni nirmale ।। [ MT]

jagadādyaṅkuras tatra yady asti tad asau tadā ।
kair ivodeti kathaya kāraṇais sahakāribhiḥ ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve vāṅkurodgatiḥ ।
vandhyākanyā ca dṛṣṭeha na kadācana kenacit ।। 

sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve yac ca voditam ।
mūlakāraṇam evātmā tat svabhāve sthitaṃ tathā ।। 

sargādau sargarūpeṇa brahmaivātmani tiṣṭhati ।
yathāsthitam anākāraṃ kva janyajanakakramaḥ ।। 

atha pṛthvyādayo anye vā kuto apy āgatya kurvate ।
sahakārikāraṇatvaṃ tat pūrvaivātra dūṣaṇā ।। 

tasmāt pare jagac chāntam āste tat sahakāraṇaiḥ ।
vinā prasaratīty uktir bālasya na vipaścitaḥ ।। 

tasmād rāma jagan nāsīn na cāsti na bhaviṣyati ।
cetanākāśam evācchaṃ kacatīttham ivātmani ।। 

atyantābhāva evāsya jagato vidyate yadā ।
tadā brahmedam akhilam iti sad rāma nānyathā ।। 

pūrvapradhvaṃsanānyo'nyābhāvair yad upaśāmyati ।
aśāntam eva tac citte na śāmyaty eva tad yataḥ ।। 

atyantābhāvam evāto jagaddṛśyasya sarvathā ।
varjayitvetarā yuktir nāsty evānarthasaṅkṣaye ।। 

cidākāśasya bodho ayaṃ jagadādīti yat sthitam ।
ayaṃ so aham idaṃ rūpālokacittakalādy api ।। 

idam arkādi pṛthvyādi tathedaṃ vatsarādi ca ।
ayaṃ kalpaḥ kṣaṇaś cāyam ime maraṇajanmanī ।। 

ayaṃ kalpāntasaṃrambho mahākalpānta eṣa saḥ ।
ayaṃ sa sargaprārambho bhāvābhāvakramas tv asau ।। 

lakṣāṇīmāni kalpānām imā brahmāṇḍakoṭayaḥ ।
ime brahmendranicayā imā viṣṇvādiśaktayaḥ ।। 

ete ceme pariṇatā ime bhūya upāgatāḥ ।
imāni dhiṣṇyajālāni deśakālakalā imāḥ ।। 

mahācitparamākāśam anāvṛttam anantakam ।
yathā pūrvaṃ sthitaṃ śāntam ity evaṃ kacati svayam ।। 

paramāṇusahasrāṃśabhāsa etā mahāciteḥ ।
svabhāvabhūtā evāntassthitā nāyānti yānti no ।। 

svayam antaś camatkāro yas samudgīryate citā ।
tat sargabhānaṃ bhātīdaṃ bhārūpaṃ na ca bhittimat ।। 

nodyanti na ca naśyanti nāyānti na ca yānti ca ।
mahāśilāntarlekhānāṃ sanniveśa ivācalāḥ ।। 

ime sargāḥ prasphuranti svatas svātmani nirmale ।
nabhasīva nabhobhāgā nirākārā nirākṛtau ।। 

dravatvānīva toyasya spandā iva sadāgateḥ ।
āvartā iva vāmbhodher guṇino vāthavā guṇāḥ ।। 

vijñānaghana evaikam idam ittham avasthitam ।
sodayāstamayārambham anantaṃ śāntam ātatam ।। 

sahakāryādihetūnām abhāve śūnyatā jagat ।
svayambhūr jāyate ceti kilonmattakaphūtkṛtam ।। 

praśāntasarvārthakalākalaṅko nirastaniśśeṣavikalpatalpaḥ ।
cirāya vidrāvitadīrghanidro bhavābhayo bhūṣitabhūḥ prabuddhaḥ ।। 

smṛtibījopanyāso nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mahāpralayasargādau prathamo asau prajāpatiḥ ।
smṛtyātmā jāyate sarge smṛtyātmaiva tato jagat ।। [ MT]

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahāpralayasargādāv evam etad raghūdvaha ।
smṛtyātmaiva bhavaty ādau prathamo asau prajāpatiḥ ।। 

tatsaṅkalpātma ca jagat smṛtyātmaivam idaṃ tataḥ ।
bhāti saṅkalpanagaraṃ sthitaṃ pūrvaprajāpateḥ ।। 

iti sthite api sā rāma tasya pūrvaprajāpateḥ ।
sthitir na sambhavaty eva nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

na sambhavati kiṃ brahman sargādau prāktanī smṛtiḥ ।
mahāpralayasammohair naśyati prāksmṛtiḥ katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāṅmahāpralaye prājña pūrve brahmādayaḥ purā ।
kila nirvāṇam āyātās te avaśyaṃ brahmatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

prāktanyāḥ kas smṛtes smartā tasmāt kathaya suvrata ।
smṛtir nirmūlatāṃ yātā smartur muktatayā yataḥ ।। 

atas smartur abhāve sā smṛtiḥ kodetu kiṃ katham ।
avaśyaṃ hi mahākalpe sarve mokṣaikabhāginaḥ ।। 

nānubhūte anubhūte ca svataś cidvyomni yā smṛtiḥ ।
sā jagacchrīr iti prauḍhā dṛśyābhāve hi citprabhā ।। 

bhāti saṃvitprabhaivāccham anādyantāvabhāsinī ।
yat tad etaj jagad iti svayambhūr iti ca sthitam ।। 

anādikālasaṃsiddhaṃ yad bhānaṃ brahmaṇo nijam ।
sa ātivāhiko deho virājo jagadākṛtiḥ ।। 

paramāṇāv idaṃ bhāti jagat sabhuvanatrayam ।
deśakālakriyādravyadinarātrikramānvitam ।। 

paramāṇuṃ prati tatas tasyāntas tādṛg eva ca ।
bhāti bhāsvaritākāraṃ tādṛggirikulāvṛtam ।। 

tatrāpi tādṛgākāram evaṃ praty aṇum ātatam ।
dṛśyam ābhāti bhārūpam etad aṅga na vāstavam ।। 

ity asty anto na saddṛṣṭer asaddṛṣṭeś ca vā kvacit ।
asyās tv abhyuditaṃ buddham abuddhaṃ prati vānagha ।। 

buddhaṃ pratīdaṃ brahmaiva kevalaṃ śāntam avyayam ।
abuddhaṃ prati tu dvaitabhāsuraṃ bhuvanānvitam ।। 

yathedaṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāti jagad aṇḍakajṛmbhitam ।
tathā koṭisahasrāṇi bhānty anyāny apy aṇāv aṇau ।। 

yathā stambhe putrikāntas tasyāś cāṅgeṣu putrikā ।
tasyāś ca putrikāsty aṅge tathā trailokyaputrikā ।। 

na bhinnā na ca saṅkhyeyā yathādrau paramāṇavaḥ ।
tathā brahmabṛhanmerau trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ ।। 

sūryaughāṃśuṣu saṅkhyātuṃ śakyante laghavo aṇavaḥ ।
nānādyantāś cidāditye trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ ।। 

yathāṇavo vahanty arkadīptiṣv apsu rajassu ca ।
tathā vahante cidvyomni trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ ।। 

śūnyānubhavamātrātma bhūtākāśam idaṃ yathā ।
sargānubhavamātrātma cidākāśam idaṃ tathā ।। 

sargas tu sargaśabdārthatayā buddho nayaty adhaḥ ।
sa brahmaśabdārthatayā buddhaś śreyo bhavaty alam ।। 

vijñānātmā śāsitā viśvabījaṃ brahmaivādyaṃ svaṃ cidākāśamātram ।
tasmāj jātaṃ yat tad eveti vedyaṃ budhyasvāntar bodhasambodhamātram ।। 

jagadanantyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

indriyagrāmasaṅgrāmasetunā bhavasāgaraḥ ।
tīryate netareṇeha kenacin nāma karmaṇā ।। [ MT]

śāstrasatsaṅgamābhyāsais saviveko jitendriyaḥ ।
atyantābhāvam evāsya dṛśyaughasyāvagacchati ।। 

etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpaṃ rūpiṇāṃ vara ।
saṃsārasāgaraśreṇyo yathāyānti prayānti ca ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena manaḥ karmadrumāṅkuraḥ ।
tasmiṃś chinne jagacchākhaś chinnaḥ karmatarur bhavet ।। 

manas sarvam idaṃ rāma tasminn antaś cikitsite ।
cikitsito ayaṃ sakalo janmajālamayo bhavaḥ ।। 

tad etaj jāyate loke mano malalavākulam ।
manaso vyatirekeṇa dehaḥ kva kila dṛśyate ।। 

dṛśyātyantāsambhavanam ṛte nānyena hetunā ।
manaḥpiśācaḥ praśamaṃ yāti kalpaśatair api ।। 

etac ca sambhavaty eva manovyādhicikitsane ।
dṛśyātyantāsambhavātma paramauṣadham uttamam ।। 

mano moham upādatte mriyate jāyate manaḥ ।
kasyacit tu prasādena badhyate mucyate punaḥ ।। 

sphuratītthaṃ jagat sarvaṃ citte mananamanthare ।
śūnya evāmbare sphāre gandharvāṇāṃ puraṃ yathā ।। 

manasīdaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ sphāraṃ sphurati cāsti ca ।
puṣpaguccha ivāmodas tatsthas tasmād ivetaraḥ ।। 

yathā tilakaṇe tailaṃ guṇo guṇini vā yathā ।
yathā dharmiṇi vā dharmas tathedaṃ manasi sthitam ।। 

yathāmbhasi taraṅgaugha indau dvīndubhramo yathā ।
mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpe saṃsāraś cittake tathā ।। 

raśmijālaṃ yathā sūrye yathālokaś ca tejasi ।
yathauṣṇyaṃ citrabhānau vā manasīdaṃ tathā jagat ।। 

śaityaṃ yathaiva tuhine yathā nabhasi śūnyatā ।
yathā cañcalatā vāyau manasīdaṃ tathā jagat ।। 

mano jagaj jagad akhilaṃ tathā manaḥ parasparaṃ tv avirahitaṃ sadaiva hi ।
tayor dvayor manasi nirantaraṃ kṣate kṣataṃ jagan na tu jagati kṣate manaḥ ।। 

sthityaṅkurakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña pūrvāparavidāṃ vara ।
ayaṃ manasi saṃsāras sphāraḥ katham iva sthitaḥ ।। [ MT]

yathāyaṃ manasi sphāra ārambhas sphurati sphuṭam ।
dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭyā sphuṭayā tathā kathaya me anagha ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathaindavānāṃ viprāṇāṃ jaganty avapuṣām api ।
sthitāni jātadārḍhyāni manasīdaṃ tathā sthitam ।। 

lavaṇasya yathā rājñaś cendrajālākulākṛteḥ ।
caṇḍālatvam anuprāptaṃ tathedaṃ manasi sthitam ।। 

bhārgavasya ciraṃ kālaṃ svargabhogabubhukṣayā ।
bhogeśvaratvaṃ ca yathā tathedaṃ manasi sthitam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhṛguputrasya svargabhogabubhukṣayā ।
kathaṃ bhogādhināthatvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ babhūva ca ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāma purā vṛttaṃ saṃvādaṃ bhṛgukālayoḥ ।
sānau mandaraśailasya tamālaviṭapākule ।। 

purā mandaraśailasya sānau kusumasaṅkule ।
atapyata tapo ghoraṃ kasmiṃścid bhagavān bhṛguḥ ।। 

tam upāste sma tejasvī bālaḥ putro mahāmatiḥ ।
śukras sakalacandrābhaḥ prakāśa iva bhāskaram ।। 

bhṛgur varavane tasmin samādhāv eva saṃsthitaḥ ।
sarvakālaṃ samutkīrṇo vanopalatalād iva ।। 

śukraḥ kusumaśayyāsu kaladhautābjinīṣu ca ।
mandāratarudolāsu bālo aramata līlayā ।। 

vidyāvidyādṛśor madhye śukro aprāptamahāpadaḥ ।
triśaṅkur iva rodo'ntar avartata tadā kila ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhisthe sa kadācit pitary atha ।
avyagro abhavad ekānte jitārir iva bhūmipaḥ ।। 

dadarśāpsarasaṃ tatra gacchantīṃ nabhasaḥ pathā ।
kṣīrodamadhyalulitāṃ lakṣmīm iva janārdanaḥ ।। 

mandāramālyavalitāṃ mandānilacalālakām ।
hārijhāṅkārigamanāṃ sugandhitanabho'nilām ।। 

lāvaṇyapādapalatāṃ madaghūrṇitalocanām ।
amṛtīkṛtataddeśāṃ dehendūdayakāntibhiḥ ।। 

kāntām ālokya tasyābhūd ullāsataralaṃ manaḥ ।
dṛṣṭe nirmalapūrṇendau vapur ambunidher iva ।। 

manasijeṣuśatāhatam āśaye sa parirudhya manas tadanūśanāḥ ।
vigalitetaravṛttitayātmanā suravadhūmaya eva babhūva saḥ ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne bhārgavaskhalanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha tāṃ manasā dhyāyaṃs tatraivāmīlitekṣaṇaḥ ।
ārabdhavān manorājyam idam ekaḥ kilośanāḥ ।। [ MT]

eṣā hi lalanā vyomni sahasranayanālaye ।
samprāpto ayam ahaṃ svargam ālolasurasundaram ।। 

ime te mṛdumandārakusumottaṃsasundarāḥ ।
dravatkanakaniṣṣyandavilāsivapuṣas surāḥ ।। 

imās tā locanollāsasṛṣṭanīlābjavṛṣṭayaḥ ।
mugdhā hāsavilāsinyaḥ kāntā hariṇadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

ime te kaustubhoddyotā anyo'nyapratibimbitāḥ ।
viśvarūpopamākārā maruto mattakāśinaḥ ।। 

airāvaṇakaṭāmodaviraktamadhupaśrutāḥ ।
imās tāḥ kākalīgītā gīrvāṇagaṇagītayaḥ ।। 

iyaṃ sā kanakāmbhojacaradvairiñcasārasā ।
mandākinītaṭodyānaviśrāntasuranāyikā ।। 

ete te yamacandrendrasūryānilajalānalāḥ ।
lokapālās tanūddyotakīrṇadīptojjvalārciṣaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ sa suravikrāntahetikaṇḍūyitānanaḥ ।
airāvaṇo raṇaddantaprotadaityendramaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

ime te bhūtalasthānā vyomatārakatāṃ gatāḥ ।
vaimānikāś calaccāruhāracāmarakuṇḍalāḥ ।। 

imās tā vividhodyānamaṇimandiramaṇḍitāḥ ।
vimānapaṅktayaś cārucāmīkaramayātapāḥ ।। 

merūpalatalāsphālaśīkarākīrṇadevatāḥ ।
etās tāḥ kīrṇamandārā gaṅgāsalilavīcayaḥ ।। 

etāḥ prasṛtamandāramañjarīpuñjapiñjarāḥ ।
dolālolāpsaraśśreṇyaś śakropavanavīthayaḥ ।। 

ime te kundamandāramakarandasugandhayaḥ ।
candrāṃśunikarākārāḥ pārijātasamīraṇāḥ ।। 

puṣpakesaranīhārapaṭavāseraṇotsukaiḥ ।
latāṅganāgaṇair vyāptam idaṃ tan nandanaṃ vanam ।। 

kāntagītaravānandapranartitasurāṅganau ।
imau tau vallakīsnigdhasvarau nāradatumburū ।। 

ime te puṇyakartāro bhūribhūṣaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।
vyomany uḍḍayamāneṣu vimāneṣu sukhaṃ sthitāḥ ।। 

madamanmathamattāṅgya imās tās surayoṣitaḥ ।
deveśvaraṃ niṣevante vanaṃ vanalatā iva ।। 

candrāṃśujālakusumāś cintāmaṇigulucchakāḥ ।
kalpavṛkṣa ime pakvaratnastabakadanturāḥ ।। 

iha tāvad imaṃ śakram aham āsanasaṃsthitam ।
dvitīyam iva deveśaṃ pūjayaivābhivādaye ।। 

iti sañcintya śukreṇa manasaiva śacīpatiḥ ।
tenābhivāditas tatra dvitīya iva vai bhṛguḥ ।। 

atha sādaram utthāya śukraś śakreṇa pūjitaḥ ।
gṛhītahastam ānīya samīpa upaveśitaḥ ।। 

dhanyas tvadāgamenādya svargo ayaṃ śukra śobhate ।
uṣyatāṃ ciram eveha śakra ittham uvāca tam ।। 

atha tatropaviśyāsau bhārgavaś śobhitānanaḥ ।
śriyaṃ jahāra śaśinas sakalasyāmalasya ca ।। 

sakalasuragaṇābhivandito asau bhṛgutanayaś śatamanyupārśvasaṃsthaḥ ।
cirataram atulām avāpa tuṣṭiṃ naramatim ujjhitavān alaṃ babhūva ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne bhārgavamanorājyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti śukraḥ puraṃ prāpya vaibudhaṃ svena cetasā ।
visasmāra nijaṃ bhāvaṃ prāktanaṃ vyasanaṃ vinā ।। [ MT]

muhūrtam atha viśramya tasya pārśve śacīpateḥ ।
svargaṃ vihartum uttasthau svarvāsiparicoditaḥ ।। 

svargaśriyaṃ samālokya lolalocanalāñchitam ।
straiṇaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagāmāsau nalinīm iva sārasaḥ ।। 

tatra tāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ kāntām adhyāgatām asau ।
dadarśa vipināntassthāṃ bhṛṅgaś cūtalatām iva ।। 

tām ālokya lasallolavilāsavalitākṛtim ।
āsīd vilīyamānāṅgo jyotsnayendumaṇir yathā ।। 

vilīyamānasarvāṅgas tām avaikṣata kāminīm ।
candrakānta iva jyotsnāṃ śītalāṃ khe vilāsinīm ।। 

tenāvalokitā sāpi tatparāyaṇatāṃ gatā ।
niśānte cakravākena kānteva parikūjitā ।। 

rasād vikasator nūnam anyo'nyam anuraktayoḥ ।
prātar arkanalinyor yā śobhā saiva tayor abhūt ।। 

saṅkalpitārthadāyitvād deśasya madanena sā ।
sarvāṅgaṃ vivaśīkṛtya śukrāyaiva samarpitā ।। 

petus smaraśarās tasyā mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu bhūriśaḥ ।
palāśeṣv iva padminyā dhārā navapayomucaḥ ।। 

sā babhūva smarādhūtā lolālivalayālakā ।
mandavātavinunnāyā mañjaryās sahadharmiṇī ।। 

nīlanīrajanetrāṃ tāṃ haṃsavāraṇagāminīm ।
madanaḥ kṣobhayām āsa pūraḥ kamalinīm iva ।। 

atha tāṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā śukras saṅkalpitārthabhāk ।
tamas saṅkalpayām āsa saṃhāram iva bhūtakṛt ।। 

triviṣṭapasya deśo asau babhūva timirākulaḥ ।
bhūlokasyāndhatamaso lokālokataṭo yathā ।। 

lajjāndhakāratīkṣṇāṃśau tasmiṃs timiramaṇḍale ।
pratiṣṭhām āgate tasya mithunasyeva manmathe ।। 

teṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu gateṣv abhimatāṃ diśam ।
tasmāt pradeśād bhūlokaṃ dinānte vihageṣv iva ।। 

sā dīrghadhavalāpāṅgā pravṛddhamadanā tathā ।
ājagāma bhṛgoḥ putraṃ mayūrī vāridaṃ yathā ।। 

dhavalāgāramadhyasthe paryaṅke parikalpite ।
viveśa bhārgavas tatra kṣīroda iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

sā pādāv avalambyāsya vivaśeva varānanā ।
rarāja ca surebhasya pādalagneva padminī ।। 

uvāca cedaṃ lalitaṃ lasatsnehotkayā girā ।
vaco madhuram ānandi vilāsavalitākṣaram ।। 

paśyāmalenduvadana maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukaḥ ।
abalām anubadhnāti mām eṣa kimanaṅgakaḥ ।। 

pāhi mām abalāṃ nātha dīnāṃ tvaccharaṇām iha ।
kṛpaṇāśvāsanaṃ sādho viddhi saccaritavratam ।। 

snehadṛṣṭim ajānadbhir mūḍhair eva mahāmate ।
praṇayā avagaṇyante na rasajñaiḥ kadācana ।। 

aśaṅkitopasampannaḥ praṇayo anyo'nyaraktayoḥ ।
adhaḥkaroti niṣyandaṃ cāndram āsvāditaṃ priya ।। 

na tathā sukhayaty eṣā cetas tribhuvaneśatā ।
yathā parasparānandī snehaḥ prathamaraktayoḥ ।। 

tvatpādasparśaneneyaṃ samāśvastāsmi mānada ।
candrapādaparāmṛṣṭā yathā niśi kumudvatī ।। 

saṃsparśāmṛtapānena tava jīvāmi sundara ।
candrāṃśurasapānena cakorī capalā yathā ।। 

mām imāṃ caraṇālīnāṃ bhramarīṃ karapallavaiḥ ।
āliṅgyāmṛtasampūrṇe satpadmahṛdaye kuru ।। 

ity uktvā puṣpamṛdvaṅgī sā tasya patitorasi ।
vyāghūrṇitālinayanā sutarāv iva mañjarī ।। 

tau dampatī tatra vilāsakāntau vilesatus tāsu vanasthalīṣu ।
kiñjalkagaurānilaghūrṇitāsu mattau dvirephāv iva padminīṣu ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne navasaṅgamo nāma sargaḥ

triṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti cittavilāsena ciram utprekṣitaiḥ priyaiḥ ।
praṇayair bhārgavasyāsīt tuṣṭaye sasamāgamaḥ ।। [ MT]

mandāradāmākulayā vaibudhāsavamattayā ।
tadā tena tayā sārdhaṃ dvitīyenāmalendunā ।। 

vihṛtaṃ mattahaṃsāsu hemapaṅkajinīṣu ca ।
taṭeṣv amaravāhinyās saha kinnaracāraṇaiḥ ।। 

pītam indudalasyandi devais saha rasāyanam ।
pārijātalatājālanilayeṣu vilāsinā ।। 

cārucaitrarathodyānalatādolāsu līlayā ।
ciraṃ vilasitaṃ vyagrais saha vidyādharīgaṇaiḥ ।। 

nandanopavanābhogo mandareṇeva vāridhiḥ ।
bhṛśam ullolatāṃ nītaḥ pramathais saha śāmbhavaiḥ ।। 

bālahemalatājālajaṭilāsu darīṣu ca ।
bhrāntam unmattarāgeṇa mairavīṣv abjinīṣv iva ।। 

kailāsavanakuñjeṣu tayā saha vilāsinā ।
hārendudhavalā rātriḥ kṣapitā gaṇagītibhiḥ ।। 

gandhamādanaśailasya viśramyopari sānuṣu ।
sā tena kanakāmbhojair āpādam abhimaṇḍitā ।। 

lokālokataṭānteṣu vicitrāścaryahāriṣu ।
krīḍitaṃ kṛtahāsena rāma tena tayā saha ।। 

mandarāntarakaccheṣu sārdhaṃ hariṇaśāvakaiḥ ।
avasat sa samāṣ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpitāmaramandiraḥ ।। 

kṣīrārṇavataṭeṣv asya vanitāsahacāriṇaḥ ।
kṣīṇaṃ kṛtayugād ardhaṃ śvetadvīpajanais saha ।। 

gandharvanagarodyānalīlāviracanair asau ।
sṛṣṭānantajagatsṛṣṭeḥ kālasyānukṛtiṃ gataḥ ।। 

athāvasad asau śukraḥ purandarapure punaḥ ।
sukhaṃ caturyugāny aṣṭau hariṇekṣaṇayā saha ।। 

puṇyakṣayānusandhānāt tataś cāvanimaṇḍale ।
tayaiva saha māninyā papātāpahṛtākṛtiḥ ।। 

parālūnasamastāṅgo hṛtasyandananandanaḥ ।
cintāparavaśo dhvastas samitīvāhato bhaṭaḥ ।। 

patitasyāvanau tasya cintayā saha dīrghayā ।
śarīraṃ śatadhā yātaṃ śilāpātīva nirjharaḥ ।। 

saṃśīrṇayor dehakayoś citte te vāsanāvṛte ।
viceratus tayor vyomni nirnīḍau vihagau yathā ।। 

tatrāviviśatuś cāndraṃ te citte raśmijālakam ।
prāleyatām upetyāśu śālitām atha jagmatuḥ ।। 

śālīṃs tān bhuktavān pakvān daśārṇeṣu dvijottamaḥ ।
śaukrāñ śukrāṅganāgarbhān mālaveṣu ca bhūpatiḥ ।। 

ajāyatośanāḥ pūrvaṃ daśārṇeṣu dvijottamāt ।
nṛpād uttamasaubhāgyān mālaveṣu tadaṅganā ।। 

sa tatra vavṛdhe bālas sā tatra vavṛdhe aṅganā ।
tau pūrvadampatī jātau svarbhraṣṭāv iva bhūtale ।। 

atha ṣoḍaśavarṣo abhūc chukras sāraṅganāmabhṛt ।
pitur gṛhe yauvanavāñ śrīmān viprakumārakaḥ ।। 

mālānāmasurastrī sā kumārī rājasadmani ।
bhṛṅgekṣaṇā gatā vṛddhiṃ latā varavane yathā ।। 

rājaputrī tato mālā pūjayām āsa śaṅkaram ।
labheyaṃ prāktanaṃ siddhaṃ patim ity aniśaṃ śubhā ।। 

atha mālavabhūpasya yajñe dvijasabhāgatam ।
mālā dadarśa sāraṅgaṃ pitrā saha samāgatam ।। 

taṃ dṛṣṭvā sānavadyāṅgī prāktanasnehabhāvitā ।
dṛṣṭacandrendumaṇivat snehasvinnāṅgikā babhau ।। 

tato yajñasabhāmadhye dāśārṇadvijadārakam ।
bhartṛtve varayām āsa sā mālā mālavātmajā ।। 

kramāt kṛtavivāhāya tasmai vārdhakajarjaraḥ ।
mālaveśo akhilaṃ rājyaṃ pratipādya vanaṃ yayau ।। 

sa sāraṅgas tayā sārdhaṃ tasmin mālavamaṇḍale ।
cakārātisukhī rājyaṃ śakravac charadāṃ śatam ।। 

atha kālena mahatā cañcalatvāc ca cetasaḥ ।
apriyatvaṃ mitho yātau dampatī tau vidher vaśāt ।। 

sāraṅgas tu jarājīrṇaḥ pātasajjakalevaraḥ ।
dadhre śvasanaśaithilyāj jīrṇaparṇasavarṇatām ।। 

jāyājanavirāgeṇa vārdhakātiśayena ca ।
maraṇaṃ mandamandeho nirīho abhinananda saḥ ।। 

atha nīrasarājyasya duḥkhātiśayaśaṃsinaḥ ।
araṇya iva vetālo moho atighanatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

mohāndhakūpapatitaṃ bhogāsaṅgād anāratam ।
avivekinam ajñānam asajjanaparāyaṇam ।। 

jahārainaṃ tato mṛtyus tṛṣṇākavalitāśayam ।
pataṅgam iva maṇḍūkaḥ kṛtākrandam akiñcanam ।। 

tataḥ karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā svaṃ paratra śubhāśubham ।
aṅgeṣu dhīvaro jātas sa durbhāvavaśāt tadā ।। 

tatra dhīvarakarmāṇi kurvan sa śaradāṃ śatam ।
duḥkhajarjaracetastvād vairāgyaṃ samupāyayau ।। 

duḥkhaṃ saṃsāra ity evaṃ cintayan bhāskaraṃ tataḥ ।
sampataṃs tena sañjātas sūryavaṃśe mahānṛpaḥ ।। 

śubhabhāvavaśāt so atha kiñcij jñānam avāptavān ।
jajñe nṛpatanuṃ tyaktvā gurus sarvopadeśakaḥ ।। 

mantrasādhitasiddhir hi so atha vidyādharo abhavat ।
kalpam ekaṃ tu bubhuje tato vaidyādharīṃ purīm ।। 

kalpāvasānasamayaṃ nītvā pavanarūpayā ।
tanvā sṛṣṭau pravṛttāyāṃ bhūyo jāto munes sutaḥ ।। 

tato munīnāṃ samparkāt tapasy ugre vyavasthitaḥ ।
avasan merugahane manvantaram aninditaḥ ।। 

tatra tasya samutpanno mṛgyāḥ putro narākṛtiḥ ।
tatsnehena paraṃ mohaṃ punar abhyāyayau kṣaṇāt ।। 

putrasyāsya dhanaṃ me astu guṇāś cāyuś ca śāśvatam ।
ity anāratacintābhir jahau satyām avasthitim ।। 

dharmacintāparibhraṃśāt putrārthaṃ bhogacintanāt ।
kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ tam aharan mṛtyus sarpa ivānilam ।। 

bhogaikacintayā sārdhaṃ sa samutkrāntacetanaḥ ।
prāpya madreśaputratvam āsīn madramahīpatiḥ ।। 

madradeśe ciraṃ kṛtvā rājyam ucchinnaśātravaḥ ।
jarām abhyājagāmātra himāśanir ivāmbujam ।। 

madrarājatanuṃ tāṃ tu tapovāsanayā saha ।
tatyāja tena jāto asau tapasvī tāpasātmajaḥ ।। 

samaṅgāyā mahānadyās taṭam āsādya tāpasaḥ ।
tapas tepe mahābuddhis sa rāma vigatajvaraḥ ।। 

vividhajanmadaśāvivaśāśayas samanusṛtya śarīraparamparām ।
sukham atiṣṭhad asau bhṛgunandano varanadīsutaṭe dṛḍhavṛkṣavat ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne vividhajanmānubhavanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti cintayatas tasya śukrasya pitur agrataḥ ।
jagāmātitarāṃ kālo bahusaṃvatsarātmakaḥ ।। [ MT]

atha kālena mahatā pavanātapajarjaraḥ ।
kāyas tasya papātorvyāṃ chinnamūla iva drumaḥ ।। 

manas tu cañcalābhogaṃ tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca ।
babhrāmātivicitrāsu vanarājiṣv ivaiṇakaḥ ।। 

bhrāntam udbhrāntam abhitaś cakrārpitam ivākulam ।
manas tasya viśaśrāma samaṅgāsaritas taṭe ।। 

anantavṛttāntaghanāṃ pelavāṃ sudṛḍhām api ।
tāṃ saṃsṛtidaśāṃ śukro videho anubhavan sthitaḥ ।। 

mandarācalasānusthā sā tanus tasya dhīmataḥ ।
tāpaprasarasaṃśuṣkā carmaśeṣā babhūva ha ।। 

śārīrarandhrapravahadvātaśītkārarūpayā ।
ceṣṭāduḥkhakṣayānandāt kākalyeva sma gāyati ।। 

prāṇānusmaraṇocchvāsam iva bāṣpaṃ sma muñcati ।
caṇḍānilavilāsena lulitvā vanabhūmiṣu ।। 

manovarākam avaṭe luṭhitaṃ bhavabhūmiṣu ।
hasantīvātiśubhrābhrasitayā dantamālayā ।। 

darśayantī svakaṃ śūnyaṃ vapur akṣṇor akṛtrimam ।
mukhāraṇyajaratkūparūpayā gartaśobhayā ।। 

tāpopataptā saṃsiktā varṣājalabhareṇa sā ।
pāṃsunā pavanotthena duṣkṛteneva rūṣitā ।। 

śuṣkakāṣṭhavad ālolā pāteṣu kṛtajhāṅkṛtā ।
dhārānikarapātena vinunnā jaladāgame ।। 

prāvṛṇnirjharapūreṇa plutā girinadītaṭe ।
tāramārutaśītkārā vanopala iva sthitā ।। 

vakrā śuṣkāntratantrī ca pūtā jhāṅkārakāriṇī ।
araṇyalakṣmīvīṇeva śūnyacarmamayodarī ।। 

rāgadveṣavihīnatvāt tasya puṇyāśramasya tu ।
mahātapastvāc ca bhṛgor na bhuktā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ ।। 

yamaniyamakṛśīkṛtāṅgayaṣṭeś carati tapas sma bhṛgūdvahasya cetaḥ ।
tanur atha pavanāpanītaraktā ciram aluṭhan mahatīṣu sā śilāsu ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne bhārgavakalevaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha varṣasahasreṇa divyena parameśvaraḥ ।
bhṛguḥ paramasambodhād virarāma samādhitaḥ ।। [ MT]

nāpaśyad agre tanayaṃ taṃ nayāvanatānanam ।
sīmāntaṃ guṇasīmāyāḥ puṇyaṃ mūrtam iva sthitam ।। 

apaśyat kevalaṃ kālaṃ kaṅkālaṃ purato mahat ।
dehayuktam ivābhāgyaṃ dāridryam iva mūrtimat ।। 

tāpaśuṣkavapuḥ kṛttirandhrasphuritatittiri ।
saṃśuṣkāntrodaraguhāchāyāviśrāntadarduram ।। 

netragartakasaṃsuptaprasūnavanakīṭakam ।
makṣikāpañjaraprotakośakārakrimivrajam ।। 

prāktanīm upabhogehām iṣṭāniṣṭaphalapradām ।
dhārādhautāntayā tanvā hasac chuṣkāsthimālayā ।। 

śiroghaṭena śubhreṇa sampannenenduvarcasā ।
viḍambayac ca karpūraplutaliṅgaśiraśśriyam ।। 

ṛjvā saṃśuṣkasitayā svāsthimātrāvaśeṣayā ।
grīvayātmānusṛtayā dīrghīkurvad ivākṛtim ।। 

mṛṇālikāpāṇḍurayā dhārāvadhutamāṃsayā ।
nāsāsthilatayā vaktraṃ kṛtasīmākramaṃ dadhat ।। 

dīrghakandharayā nūnam uttānīkṛtavaktrayā ।
prekṣamāṇam iva prāṇān utkrāntān ambarodare ।। 

jaṅghorujānudordaṇḍair dviguṇaṃ dīrghatāṃ gataiḥ ।
pramimāṇam ivāśāntaṃ dīrghādhvaśramabhītitaḥ ।। 

udareṇātinimnena carmaśeṣeṇa śoṣiṇā ।
pradarśayad ivājñasya hṛdayasyātiśūnyatām ।। 

prekṣya tac chuṣkakaṅkālam ālānam iva dantinaḥ ।
pūrvāparaparāmarśam akurvan bhṛgur utthitaḥ ।। 

ālokasamakālaṃ hi pratibhātaṃ tato bhṛgoḥ ।
ciram utkrāntajīvaḥ kiṃ matputro ayam iti kṣaṇāt ।। 

acintayata evāsya bhaviṣyattābalaṃ tataḥ ।
kālaṃ prati babhūvāśu kopaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ ।। 

akāla eva matputro nītaḥ kim iti kopitaḥ ।
kālāya śāpam utsraṣṭuṃ bhagavān upacakrame ।। 

athākalitarūpo asau kālaḥ kavalitaprajaḥ ।
ādhibhautikam āsthāya vapur munim upāyayau ।। 

khaḍgapāśadharaś śrīmān kuṇḍalī kavacānvitaḥ ।
ṣaḍbhujaṣ ṣaṇmukho bahvyā vṛtaḥ kiṅkarasenayā ।। 

yaccharīrasamutthena jvālājālena valgatā ।
phullakiṃśukavṛkṣasya babhārādreś śriyaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

yatkarasthatriśūlāgraniṣṭhyūtair agnimaṇḍalaiḥ ।
virejur uditair āśāḥ kānakair iva kuṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

yatpāśaśvasanāyastaśikharā medinībhṛtaḥ ।
dolām iva samārūḍhāś celuḥ petuś ca ghūrṇitāḥ ।। 

yatkhaḍgamaṇḍaloddyotaśyāmaṃ bimbaṃ vivasvataḥ ।
kalpadagdhajagaddhūmaparyākulam ivābabhau ।। 

sa upetya mahābāhuḥ kupitaṃ taṃ mahāmunim ।
kalpakṣubdhābdhigambhīraṃ sāntvapūrvam uvāca ha ।। 

vijñātalokasthitayo mune dṛṣṭaparāvarāḥ ।
hetunāpi na muhyanti kim u hetum vinottamāḥ ।। 

tvam anantatapā vipro vayaṃ niyatipālakāḥ ।
tena sampūjyase pūjya sādho netarayecchayā ।। 

mā tapaḥ kṣapaya kṣubdhaiḥ kalpakālamahānalaiḥ ।
yo na dagdho asmi me tasya kiṃ tvaṃ śāpena dhakṣyasi ।। 

saṃsārāvalayo grastā nigīrṇā rudrakoṭayaḥ ।
bhuktāni viṣṇuvṛndāni kena śaptā vayaṃ mune ।। 

bhoktāro hi vayaṃ brahman bhojanaṃ yuṣmadādayaḥ ।
svayaṃ niyatir eṣā hi nāvayor etad īhitam ।। 

svayam ūrdhvaṃ prayāty agnis svayaṃ yānti payāṃsy adhaḥ ।
bhoktāraṃ bhojanaṃ yāti sṛṣṭiś cāpy antakaṃ svayam ।। 

idam itthaṃ mune rūpam asyeha paramātmanaḥ ।
svātmani svayam evātmā svata eva vijṛmbhate ।। 

neha kartā na bhoktāsti dṛṣṭyā naṣṭakalaṅkayā ।
bahavaś ceha kartāro dṛṣṭyānaṣṭakalaṅkayā ।। 

kartṛtākartṛte brahman kevalaṃ parikalpite ।
asamyagdarśanenaiva na samyagdarśanena vaḥ ।। 

puṣpāṇi taruṣaṇḍeṣu bhūtāni bhuvaneṣu ca ।
svayam āyānti yāntīha kalpyate hetutā vidheḥ ।। 

abbimbitasya candrasya calane kartrakartṛte ।
na satye nānṛte yadvat tadvat kālasya sṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

mano mithyābhramāl loke kartṛtākartṛtāmayīm ।
karoti kalanāṃ rajjvāṃ bhrāntekṣaṇa ivāhitām ।। 

tena mā gā mune kopam āpadām īdṛśaḥ kramaḥ ।
yad yathā tat tathaivāstu satyam ālokayākulaḥ ।। 

na vayaṃ prabhutārthena nābhimānavaśīkṛtāḥ ।
svato hevākavaśataḥ kevalaṃ niyatau sthitāḥ ।। 

prakṛtavyavahārehāṃ niyatāṃ niyater vaśāt ।
prājñas samanuvarteta nābhimānamahātamāḥ ।। 

kartavyam eva kriyate kevalaṃ kāryakovidaiḥ ।
sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kayācid api nāśayā ।। 

kva sā jñānamayī dṛṣṭiḥ kva mahattvaṃ kva dhīratā ।
mārge sarvaprasiddhe hi kim andha iva muhyasi ।। 

trikālāmaladarśitvaṃ dhārayann api cetasi ।
avicārya jagadyātrāṃ kiṃ mūrkha iva muhyasi ।। 

svakarmaphalapākotthām avicārya daśāṃ sute ।
kiṃ mūrkha iva sarvajña mudhā māṃ śaptum arhasi ।। 

dehinām iha sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃ dvividhaṃ mune ।
kiṃ na jānāsi vā deham ekam anyan mano'bhidham ।। 

tatra deho jaḍo atyarthaṃ vināśaikaparāyaṇaḥ ।
manas tūtthānaniyataṃ kadarthāt kṣīyate na vā ।। 

catureṇa yathā sādho rathas sārathinohyate ।
kurvatā kiñcana svehāṃ deho ayaṃ manasā tathā ।। 

asat saṅkalpya kriyate sac charīraṃ vināśyate ।
kṣaṇena manasā paṅkapuruṣaś śiśunā yathā ।। 

cittam eveha puruṣas tatkṛtaṃ kṛtam ucyate ।
tad baddhaṃ kalanāhetoḥ kalanāstaṃ vimucyate ।। 

ayaṃ deha idaṃ netram idam aṅgam idaṃ śiraḥ ।
idaṃ sphāravikāraṃ tan mana evābhidhīyate ।। 

mano hi jīvaj jīvākhyaṃ niścāyakatayā tu dhīḥ ।
ahaṅkāro abhimānitvān nānātvaṃ tv idam eti hi ।। 

dehavāsanayā cetas tv anyāni svāni ceddhayā ।
pārthivāni śarīrāṇi santīva paripaśyati ।। 

ālokayati cet satyaṃ tad asatyamayīṃ manaḥ ।
śarīrabhāvanāṃ tyaktvā paramāṃ yāti nirvṛtim ।। 

tan manas tava putrasya samādhau tvayi saṃsthite ।
svamanorathamārgeṇa dūrād dūrataraṃ gatam ।। 

idam auśanasaṃ tyaktvā dehaṃ mandarakandare ।
prayātaṃ vaibudhaṃ sadma nīḍoḍḍīnaḥ khago yathā ।। 

tatra mandārakuñjeṣu pārijātagṛheṣu ca ।
nandanodyānaṣaṇḍeṣu lokapālapureṣu ca ।। 

mune caturyugāny aṣṭau viśvācīṃ devasundarīm ।
asevata mahātejāṣ ṣaṭpadaḥ padminīm iva ।। 

tīvrasaṃvegasampannas svasaṅkalpopakalpite ।
atha puṇyakṣaye jāte nīhāra iva śārvare ।। 

pramlānakusumottaṃsas svinnāṅgāvalayālasaḥ ।
sa papāta tayā sākaṃ kālapakvaṃ phalaṃ yathā ।। 

vaibudhaṃ tat parityajya nabhasy eva śarīrakam ।
bhūtākāśam athāsādya vasudhāyām ajāyata ।। 

āsīd dvijo daśārṇeṣu kosaleṣu mahīpatiḥ ।
dhīvaro aṅgamahāṭavyāṃ haṃsas tripathagātaṭe ।। 

sūryavaṃśī nṛpaḥ pauṇḍre sauras sālveṣu daiśikaḥ ।
kalpaṃ vidyādharaś śrīmān dhīmān atha munes sutaḥ ।। 

madreṣv atha mahīpālas tatas tāpasabālakaḥ ।
vāsudeva iti khyātas samaṅgāyās taṭe sthitaḥ ।। 

anyāsv api vicitrāsu vāsanāvaśatas svayam ।
viṣamāsv eṣa putras te cacārānantayoniṣu ।। 

abhūd vindhyavane gopaḥ kirataḥ kekayeṣu ca ।
sauvīreṣu ca sāmantas traigartaś caiva daiśikaḥ ।। 

vaṃśagulmaḥ kirāteṣu hariṇaś cīrajaṅgale ।
sarīsṛpas tālatale tamāle vanakukkuṭaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ sa putro bhavato bhūtvā mantravidāṃ varaḥ ।
prajajāpa purā vidyāṃ vidyādharapadapradām ।। 

tenāsau bhagavan brahman vyomni vidyādharo mahān ।
hārakuṇḍalakeyūrī līlānicayalāsakaḥ ।। 

nāyikānalinībhānuḥ puṣpacāpa ivāparaḥ ।
vidyādharīṇāṃ dayito gandharvapurabhūṣaṇam ।। 

sa kalpāvadhim āsādya dvādaśādityadhāmani ।
jagāma bhasmaśeṣatvaṃ śalabhaḥ pāvake yathā ।। 

jagannirmāṇarahite sphāre nabhasi sā tataḥ ।
vāsanā tasya babhrāma nirnīḍā vihagī yathā ।। 

atha kālena sañjāte vicitrārambhakāriṇi ।
saṃsārāḍambarārambhe brāhmī rātriviparyaye ।। 

sā manovāsanā tasya vātavyāvalitā satī ।
kṛte brāhmaṇatām etya jātādya vasudhātale ।। 

vāsudevābhidhāno asau mune viprakumārakaḥ ।
jāto matimatāṃ madhye samadhītākhilaśrutiḥ ।। 

kalpaṃ vidyādharo bhūtvā nadyā adya mahāmune ।
tapaś carati te putras samaṅgāyās taṭe sthitaḥ ।। 

vividhaviṣamavāsanānuvṛttyā khadirakarañjakarālakoṭarāsu ।
jagati jaraḍhayoniṣu prayāto gahanatarāsu ca kānanasthalīṣu ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne kālavākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

kālaḥ

adyoddāmataraṅgaughajhāṅkāraraṇitānile ।
tīre varataraṅgiṇyās tapas tapati te sutaḥ ।। [ MT]

jaṭāvān akṣavalayī jitasarvendriyabhramaḥ ।
tatra varṣaśatāny aṣṭau saṃsthitas tapasi sthire ।। 

yadīcchasi mune draṣṭuṃ taṃ svaputramanobhramam ।
tat samunmīlya vijñānanetram āśu vilokaya ।। 

ity ukte jagadīśena kālena samadṛṣṭinā ।
munis sañcintayām āsa jñānākṣṇā tanayehitam ।। 

dadarśa ca muhūrtena pratibhāsavaśād asau ।
putrodantam aśeṣeṇa buddhidarpaṇabimbitam ।। 

punar mandarasānusthāṃ kāle kālāgrasaṃsthitām ।
samaṅgāyās taṭād etya viveśa svatanuṃ bhṛguḥ ।। 

vismayasmerayā dṛṣṭyā kālam ālokya kāntayā ।
vītarāgam uvācedaṃ vītarāgo munir vacaḥ ।। 

bhṛguḥ

bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa bālā vayam anābilā ।
tvādṛśām eva dhīr deva trikālāmaladarśinī ।। 

nānākāraṃ vikārāḍhyā satyevāsatyarūpiṇī ।
vibhramaṃ janayaty eṣā dhīrasyāpi jagadgatiḥ ।। 

tvam eva deva jānāsi tvadabhyantaravarti yat ।
rūpam asyā manovṛtter indrajālavidhāyakam ।। 

matputrasyāsya bhagavan mṛtyuḥ kila na vidyate ।
tenemaṃ mṛtam ālokya jātas sambhramavān aham ।। 

akṣīṇajīvitaṃ putraṃ kālo me nītavān iti ।
niyater vaśato deva tvacchāpecchā mamoditā ।। 

na tu vijñātasaṃsāragatayo vayam āpadam ।
sampadaṃ vāpi gacchāmo harṣāmarṣavaśaṃ kila ।। 

ayuktakāriṇi krodhaḥ prasādo yuktakāriṇi ।
kartavya iti rūḍheyaṃ sāṃsārī bhagavan sthitiḥ ।। 

idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti yāvajjīvaṃ jagatkramaḥ ।
yāvad agnis sthitā tāvad auṣṇyadāhādidṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti heyā yasya jagatsthitiḥ ।
tasyaitatsamparityāgo heya eva jagadguro ।। 

kevalaṃ tānayīṃ cintām anālokya yadā vayam ।
bhagavan bhavate kṣubdhā yātās smas tena vācyatām ।। 

tvayedānīm ahaṃ deva smāritas tanayehitam ।
samaṅgāyās taṭe tena dṛṣṭo ayaṃ tanayo mayā ।। 

manye jagati bhūtānāṃ dve śarīre na sarvaga ।
mana eva śarīraṃ hi yenedaṃ bhāvyate jagat ।। 

kālaḥ

samyag uktaṃ tvayā brahmañ śarīraṃ mana eva naḥ ।
karoti dehaṃ saṅkalpya kumbhakāro ghaṭaṃ yathā ।। 

karoty akṛtam ākāraṃ kṛtaṃ nāśayati kṣaṇāt ।
saṅkalpena mano mohād bālo vetālakaṃ yathā ।। 

tathā ca sambhrame svapnamithyājñānādibhāsvarāḥ ।
gandharvanagarākārā dṛṣṭā manasi śaktayaḥ ।। 

sthūladṛṣṭidṛśaṃ tv etām avalambya mahāmune ।
puṃso manaś śarīraṃ ca kāyau dvāv iti kathyate ।। 

manomanananirmāṇamātram etaj jagattrayam ।
na san nāsad iva sphāram uditaṃ netaran mune ।। 

cittadehāṅgalatayā bhedavāsanayeddhayā ।
dvicandratvam ivājñānān nānāteyaṃ samutthitā ।। 

bhedavāsanayā bahvyā padārthanicayaṃ manaḥ ।
bhinnaṃ paśyati sarvatra ghaṭāvaṭapaṭādikam ।। 

kṛśo atiduḥkhī mūḍho aham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ ।
bhāvayat svavikalpotthā yāti saṃsāratāṃ manaḥ ।। 

mananaṃ kṛtrimaṃ rūpaṃ mamaitan na patāmy aham ।
iti tattyāgataś śāntaṃ ceto brahma sanātanam ।। 

yathā pravitate ambodhau tate anekataraṅgiṇi ।
somyaspandamayānekakallolāvaliśālini ।। 

vāryātmani same svacche śuddhe svāduni śītale ।
avināśini vistīrṇe mahāmahimani sphuṭe ।। 

tryaśras taraṅgas svaṃ rūpaṃ bhāvayan sa svabhāvataḥ ।
tryaśro asmīti vikalpena karoti svena kalpanām ।। 

bhraśyaṃś caiva paribhraṣṭarūpo asmīti talātalam ।
bhāvayan bhūtalaṃ yāti tādṛgbhāvanayā tayā ।। 

utthitaṃ ca balād ūrdhvam utthito asmīti bhāvitaḥ ।
tais tair vikalpais tadbhāvaṃ vikalpayati sābhidham ।। 

sasūryapratibimbas tu prakāśo asmīti bhāvitaḥ ।
sarajaḥpuñjapātas tu malino asmīti bhāvitaḥ ।। 

saratnaraśmijālas tu śobhate dīptayā śriyā ।
tuṣārabharaviddhas tu śītalo asmīti vindati ।। 

sataṭācaladāvāgnipratibimbojjvaladvapuḥ ।
bibheti vata dagdho asmīty āttamīnaś ca kampate ।। 

pratibimbitavelādritaṭapakṣivanadrumaḥ ।
mahān ārambhasaṃrambhasaṃyuto asmīti rājate ।। 

vimalollasanotpannadhvastalolaśarīrakaḥ ।
khaṇḍaśaḥ pariyāto asmīty āttākranda ivāravī ।। 

na cormayas te jaladher vyatiriktāḥ payorasāt ।
na caikaṃ rūpam eteṣāṃ kiñcit sann apy asanmayam ।। 

na ca te nyūnadairghyādyā guṇās teṣu ca teṣu te ।
normayas saṃsthitā abdhau na ca tatra na saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ svasvabhāvasthasaṅkalpavikalīkṛtāḥ ।
naṣṭānaṣṭāḥ punar jātā jātājātāḥ punaḥ kṣatāḥ ।। 

parasparaparāmarśān nānātām upayānty alam ।
ekarūpāmbusāmānyamayā eva nirāmayāḥ ।। 

tathaivāsmin pravitate site śuddhe nirāmaye ।
brahmamātraikavapuṣi brahmaṇi sphārarūpiṇi ।। 

sarvaśaktāv anādyante pṛthagvad apṛthakkṛtāḥ ।
saṃsthitāś śaktayaś citrā vicitrācāracañcalāḥ ।। 

nānāśakti hi nānātvam eti svavapuṣi sthitam ।
bṛṃhitaṃ brahmaṇi brahma payasīvormimaṇḍalam ।। 

nānārūpakarūpatvād vairūpyaśatakāriṇī ।
niyatir niyatākārā padārtham adhitiṣṭhati ।। 

jaḍā jāḍyam upādatte cittvam āyāti cinmayī ।
vāsanārūpiṇī śaktis svasvarūpasthitātmanaḥ ।। 

brahmaivānagha tenedaṃ sphārākāraṃ vijṛmbhate ।
nānārūpaiḥ parispandaiḥ paripūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

nānātāṃ svayam ādatte nānākāravihārataḥ ।
ātmaivātmany ātmanaiva samudrāmbha ivāmbhasi ।। 

vyatiriktā na payaso vicitrā vīcayo yathā ।
vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samagrāḥ kalanās tathā ।। 

stambhapuṣpalatāpattraphalakorakayuktayaḥ ।
yathaikasmiṃ sthitā bīje tathā brahmaṇi śaktayaḥ ।। 

nānākartṛtayā nānāśaktitā puruṣe yathā ।
tathaivātmani sarvajñe sarvadā sarvaśaktitā ।। 

vicitravarṇatā yadvad dṛśyate kaṭhinātape ।
vicitraśaktitā tadvad deveśe sadasanmayī ।। 

vicitrarūpodetīyam avicitrāt sthitiś śivāt ।
ekavarṇāt payovāhāc chakracāpalatā yathā ।। 

ajaḍāj jaḍatodeti jāḍyabhāvanahetukā ।
ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur yathā puṃsas suṣuptatā ।। 

acittaś caitasīṃ śaktiṃ svabandhāyecchayā śivaḥ ।
tanoti tāntavaṃ kośaṃ kośakārakrimir yathā ।। 

svecchayātmātmano brahman bhāvayitvā svakaṃ vapuḥ ।
saṃsārān mokṣam āyāti svālānād iva vāraṇaḥ ।। 

yad eva bhāvayaty ātmā satataṃ bhāvitas svayam ।
tayaivāpūryate śaktyā śīghram eva mahān api ।। 

bhāvitā śaktir ātmānam ātmatāṃ nayati kṣaṇāt ।
anantam api khaṃ prāvṛṇmihikā mahatī yathā ।। 

yā śaktir uditā śīghraṃ yāti tanmayatām ajaḥ ।
yām eva tu sthitiṃ yātas tanmayo bhavati drumaḥ ।। 

na mokṣo mokṣa īśasya na bandho bandha ātmanaḥ ।
bandhamokṣadṛśau loke na jāne protthite kutaḥ ।। 

nāsya bandho na mokso asti tanmayaś caiva lakṣyate ।
grastaṃ nityam asatyena māyāmayam aho jagat ।। 

yadaiva cittaṃ kalitam akalena kilātmanā ।
kośakīṭavad ātmāyam anenāvalitas tadā ।। 

ananyarūpās tv anyatvavikalpitaśarīrakāḥ ।
manaśśaktaya etasmād imā niryānti koṭiśaḥ ।। 

tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthagrūpās samudrād iva vīcayaḥ ।
tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthaksthāś ca candrād iva marīcayaḥ ।। 

asmin spandamaye sphāre paramātmamahāmbudhau ।
cijjale vitatābhoge cinmātrarasaśālini ।। 

kāścit sthitā haribrahmarudracidvalanādhikāḥ ।
laharyaḥ prasphuranty etās svabhāvodbhāvitātmikāḥ ।। 

kāścid yamamahendrārkavahnivaiśravaṇādikāḥ ।
ghnanti kurvanti tiṣṭhanti laharyaś capalaiṣaṇāḥ ।। 

kāścit kinnaragandharvavidyādharasurādikāḥ ।
utpatanti patanty ugrā laharyaḥ parivalgitāḥ ।। 

kāścit kiñcitsthitākārā yathā kamalajādikāḥ ।
kāścid utpannavidhvastā yathā suranarādikāḥ ।। 

krimikīṭapataṅgādigonāsājagarādikāḥ ।
kāścit tasmin mahāmbhodhau sphuranty eteṣu binduvat ।। 

kāścic calānanamṛgagṛdhravañjulakādayaḥ ।
sphuranti girikuñjeṣu velāvanataṭeṣv iva ।। 

sudīrghajīvitāḥ kāścit kāścid atyalpajīvitāḥ ।
svatucchabhāvanāt tucchāt kāścit tucchaśarīrikāḥ ।। 

saṃsārasvapnasaṃrambhe kāścit sthairyeṇa bhāvitāḥ ।
svavikalpahatāḥ kāścic chaṅkante susthiraṃ jagat ।। 

alpālpabhāvanāḥ kāścid dainyadoṣavaśīkṛtāḥ ।
kṛśo atiduḥkhī mūḍho aham iti duḥkhair dṛḍhīkṛtāḥ ।। 

kāścit sthāvaratāṃ yātāḥ kāścid devatvam āgatāḥ ।
kāścit puruṣatāṃ prāptāḥ kāścid dānavatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

kāścit sthitā jagati kalpaśatāny analpāḥ kāścid vrajanti paramaṃ puruṣaṃ suśuddhāḥ ।
brahmārṇavāt samuditā laharīvilolāś citsaṃvido hi mananāparanāmavatyaḥ ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne saṃsārapravṛttipradarśanayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

kālaḥ

surāsuranarākārā imā yās saṃvido mune ।
brahmārṇavād abhinnās te satyam etan mṛṣetarat ।। [ MT]

mithyābhāvanayā brahman svavikalpakalaṅkitāḥ ।
na brahma vayam ity antarniścayena hy adhogatāḥ ।। 

brahmaṇo vyatiriktatvaṃ brahmārṇavagatā api ।
bhāvayantyo vimuhyanti bhīmāsu bhavabhūmiṣu ।। 

yā etās saṃvido brāhmyo mune naikakalaṅkitāḥ ।
etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījam atha karmaiva viddhi vā ।। 

saṅkalparūpayaivāntar mune kalanayaitayā ।
karmajālakarañjānāṃ bījamuṣṭyā karālayā ।। 

imā jagati vistīrṇe śarīropalapaṅktayaḥ ।
tiṣṭhanti parivalganti rudanti ca hasanti ca ।। 

ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ spandanaiḥ pavano yathā ।
ullasanti niyacchanti mlāyanti vihasanti ca ।। 

tā etāḥ kāścid atyacchā yathā hariharādayaḥ ।
kāścid alpavimohasthā yathoraganarāmarāḥ ।। 

kāścid atyantamohasthā yathā tarutṛṇādayaḥ ।
kāścid ajñānasammūḍhāḥ krimikīṭatvam āgatāḥ ।। 

kāścit tṛṇavad uhyante dūre brahmamahodadheḥ ।
aprāptabhūmikā etā yathoraganarādayaḥ ।। 

taṭamātraṃ samālokya kāścit khedam upāgatāḥ ।
jātājātā nikhanyante kṛtāntajaradākhunā ।। 

kāścid antaram āsādya brahmatattvamahāmbudheḥ ।
gatās tattām aśokāya haribrahmaharādikāḥ ।। 

alpamohānvitāḥ kāścit tam eva brahmavāridhim ।
adṛṣṭarāgarogaugham avalambya vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

kāścid bhoktavyajanmaughā bhuktajanmaughakoṭayaḥ ।
vandhyāḥ prakāśatāmasyas saṃsthitā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

kāścid ūrdhvād adho yānti tathādhastān mahat padam ।
ūrdhvād ūrdhvataraṃ kāścid adhastāt kāścid apy adhaḥ ।। 

bahusukhaduḥkhakaṭaṅkaṭā kriyeyaṃ paramapadāsmaraṇāt samāgateha ।
paramapadāvagamāt prayāti nāśaṃ vihagapatismaraṇād viṣavyatheva ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne vistārotpattivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

kālaḥ

etāsāṃ bhūtajātīnām ūrmīṇām iva sāgare ।
vividhānāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ latānām iva mādhave ।। [ MT]

madhyāj jitamanomohā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarāḥ ।
jīvanmuktā bhramantīha yakṣagandharvakinnarāḥ ।। 

anye tu kāṣṭhakuḍyābhā mūḍhās sthāvaratāṃ gatāḥ ।
aparikṣīṇamohās te kiṃ teṣāṃ pravicāryate ।। 

loke prabudhyamānānāṃ bhūtānām ātmasiddhaye ।
viharantīha śāstrāṇi kalpitāny ucitātmabhiḥ ।। 

samprabuddhāśayā ye tu duṣkṛtānāṃ parikṣaye ।
teṣāṃ śāstravicāreṣu nirmalā dhīḥ pravartate ।। 

vilīyate manomohas sacchāstrapravicāraṇāt ।
nabhoviharaṇād bhānoś śārvaraṃ timiraṃ yathā ।। 

akṣīyamāṇaṃ hi mano mohāyaiva na siddhaye ।
nīhāra iva sañchādya vetāla iva valgati ।। 

sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ sukhaduḥkhārthabhājanam ।
śarīraṃ mana eveha na tu māṃsamayaṃ mune ।। 

yo ayaṃ māṃsāsthisaṅghāto dṛśyate cādhibhautikaḥ ।
manovikalpitaṃ viddhi na dehaḥ pāramārthikaḥ ।। 

manaśśarīreṇa tava putro yat kṛtavān mune ।
tad eva prāptavān āśu vayaṃ nātrāparādhinaḥ ।। 

svayā vāsanayā loko yad yat karma karoti yaḥ ।
sa tathaiva tad āpnoti netarasyātra kartṛtā ।। 

nānusaṃhitam antar yan manovāsanayā svayā ।
ko nāma bhuvane so asti tat kartuṃ yasya śaktatā ।। 

ye svarganarakābhogā yās svarganarakaiṣaṇāḥ ।
svamanomananendos sa niṣṣyando māndyaduḥkhadaḥ ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena śabdasandarbhakāriṇā ।
uttiṣṭha bhagavan yāmo yatra te tanayas sthitaḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ cittaśarīreṇa bhuktvā śukraḥ kṣaṇād iha ।
adyenduraśmisaṅghaṭṭāt samaṅgātāpasas sthitaḥ ।। 

tatprāṇapavanaś cittvayukta indvaṃśugaḥ phalam ।
avaśyāyatayā bhūtvā vīryatvena naras sthitaḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktvā bhagavān kālo hasann iva jagadgatīḥ ।
hastād dhastena jagrāha bhṛgum indum ivāṃśumān ।। 

aho nu citrā niyater vyavastheti vadañ śanaiḥ ।
bhagavān bhṛgur uttasthāv udayādrer yathā raviḥ ।। 

tejonidhī susamasaṅgasamutthitau tau bhātas tadā varavane satamālajāle ।
tulyodayāv iva nabhasy amale vihartum abhyudyatāv ajaladau sakalendusūryau ।। 

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne samāśvāsanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha kālabhṛgū devau mandarācalakandarāt ।
gantuṃ pravṛttāv avanau samaṅgāsaritas taṭam ।। [ MT]

tau śailād avarohantau dṛṣṭavantau mahādyutī ।
navahemalatājālakuñjasuptān nabhaścarān ।। 

vallīvalayadolābhiḥ krīḍantīr gaganāṅganāḥ ।
hariṇīmugdhamugdhākṣiprekṣitasmāritotpalāḥ ।। 

siṃhān adhyāsitottuṅgaśilāśakalaviṣṭarān ।
dhṛtākārān ivotsāhān helādṛṣṭajagattrayān ।। 

tālottālalatānyastahastān hastighaṭāpatīn ।
madāvalepanidrālūn madān mūrtim ivāsthitān ।। 

puṣpakesararaktāṅgapavanāruṇavāladhīn ।
cañcalāṃś camarāṃś cāru bhūbhṛnmaṅgalacālitān ।। 

kṛtājasrapatatpuṣpadhārāsāranimajjanān ।
bhramarān sarjakharjūraśākhāśaraṇatāṃ gatān ।। 

parasparaphalāghātakṣveḍāvijitakīcakān ।
dhātupāṭalasadvaktrān markaṭān aṭanotkaṭān ।। 

latāvitānasañchannasānūpavanamandirān ।
siddhān amaranārībhir mandārakusumāhatān ।। 

dhātupāṭalanirvāripayodapaṭasaṃvṛtān ।
taṭān ajanasaṃsargān bauddhān pravrājitān iva ।। 

saritaḥ kundamandārapinaddhalaharīghaṭāḥ ।
sāgarotkatayevāttamadhumāsaprasādhanāḥ ।। 

puṣpabhārapinaddhāṅgān vṛkṣān pavanakampitān ।
kṣīvān iva madhuprāptau ghūrṇanmadhukarekṣaṇān ।। 

śailarājaśriyaṃ sphītāṃ paśyantau tāv itas tataḥ ।
prāptavantau vasumatīṃ purapattanamaṇḍitām ।। 

kṣaṇād avāpatus tatra puṣpalolataraṅgiṇīm ।
samaṅgāṃ saritaṃ sādhū sarvapuṣpamayīm iva ।। 

dadarśātha taṭe tasyāḥ kasmiṃścit tanayaṃ bhṛguḥ ।
dehāntaraparāvṛttaṃ bhāvam anyam upāgatam ।। 

śāntendriyaṃ samādhistham acañcalamanomṛgam ।
sucirād iva viśrāntaṃ suciraṃ śramaśāntaye ।। 

cintayantam ivānantāś cirabhuktāś cirojjhitāḥ ।
saṃsārasāgaragatīr harṣaśokanirantarāḥ ।। 

nūnaṃ niścalatāṃ yātam atibhramitacakravat ।
anantajagadāvartavivartātiśayād iva ।। 

ekāntasaṃsthitaṃ kāntaṃ kāntyaikākinam āśritam ।
upaśāntehitaṃ tyaktacittasambhramasaṅgamam ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhisthaṃ virataṃ dvandvavṛttitaḥ ।
hasantam akhilā lokagatīś śītalayā dhiyā ।। 

viditākhilavṛttāntaṃ vigatāśeṣakautukam ।
nirastakalpanājālam ālambitamahāpadam ।। 

anantaviśrāntitate pade viśrāntam ātmani ।
pratibimbam agṛhṇantaṃ sitaṃ maṇim iva sthitam ।। 

heyopādeyasaṅkalpavikalpābhyāṃ samujjhitam ।
suprabuddhamatiṃ dhīraṃ dadarśa tanayaṃ bhṛguḥ ।। 

tam ālokya bhṛgoḥ putraṃ kālo bhṛgum uvāca ha ।
vākyam abdhidhvaninibhaṃ tava putras tv asāv iti ।। 

vibudhyatām iti girā samādher virarāma saḥ ।
bhārgavo ambhodaghoṣeṇa śanair iva śikhaṇḍabhṛt ।। 

unmīlya netre so apaśyad agre kālabhṛgū prabhū ।
samodayāv ivāyātau devau śaśidivākarau ।। 

kadambalatikāpīṭhād athotthāya nanāma tau ।
samaṃ samāgatau kāntau viprau hariharāv iva ।। 

mithaḥ kṛtasamācārāś śilāyāṃ samupāviśan ।
merupṛṣṭhe jagatpūjyā brahmaviṣṇuharā iva ।। 

atha śāntatapā nāma sa samaṅgātaṭe dvijaḥ ।
tāv uvāca vacaś śāntam amṛtasyandasundaram ।। 

bhavator darśanenāham adya nirvṛtim āgataḥ ।
samam āgatayor lokaṃ śītaloṣṇarucor iva ।। 

yo na śāstrair na tapasā na jñānena na vidyayā ।
vinaṣṭo me manomohaḥ kṣīṇo asau darśanena vām ।। 

na tathā sukhayanty antar nirmalāmṛtavṛṣṭayaḥ ।
yathā praharṣayanty etā mahatām eva dṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

caraṇābhyām imaṃ deśaṃ bhavantau bhūritejasau ।
kau pavitritavantau naś śaśāṅkārkāv ivāmbaram ।। 

ity uktavantaṃ provāca bhṛgur janmāntarātmajam ।
smarātmānaṃ prabuddho asi nājño asīti raghūdvaha ।। 

prabodhito asau bhṛguṇā janmāntaradaśā nijāḥ ।
muhūrtamātraṃ sasmāra dhyānonmīlitalocanaḥ ।। 

athāsau vismayasmeramukho muditamānasaḥ ।
vitarkamantharāṃ vācam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ ।। 

jayaty aviratārambhā niyatiḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
yadvaśād idam ābhogi jagaccakraṃ vivartate ।। 

mamānantāny atītāni janmāny aviditāni ha ।
tāni tāntadaśāḍhyāni saṃsmṛtāny ucitāni ca ।। 

bhuktāni bahukāryāṇi vicitravibhavāny ati ।
daśāphalāny anantāni kalpāntakalitāni ca ।। 

dṛṣṭāḥ kaṭhinasaṃrambhā vibhavopārjanabhramāḥ ।
vihṛtaṃ vītaśokāsu ciraṃ merusthalīṣu ca ।। 

pītam āmodi mandārakusumāruṇitaṃ payaḥ ।
mandākinyās sakalhāraṃ taṭeṣv amarabhūbhṛtaḥ ।। 

bhrāntaṃ santānakuñjeṣu phullahemalatāliṣu ।
merau kalpatarucchāyāpuṣpasundarasānuṣu ।। 

na tad asti na yad bhuktaṃ na tad asti na yat kṛtam ।
na tad asti na yad dṛṣṭam iṣṭāniṣṭāsu dṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

jñātaṃ jñātavyam adhunā dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akṣatam ।
viśrānto asmi ciraśrānto gato me sakalo bhramaḥ ।। 

uttiṣṭha tāta gacchāmaḥ paśyāmo mandarasthitām ।
tāṃ tanuṃ tāvad āśuṣkāṃ śuṣkāṃ vanalatām iva ।। 

nāsamīhitam astīha na samīhitam asti me ।
niyate racanāṃ draṣṭuṃ kevalaṃ viharāmy aham ।। 

kim iti subhagam āryasevitaṃ tat sthiram anuyāmi madekabhāvabuddhyā ।
tad alam abhimatāmatair mamāstu prakṛtam imaṃ vyavahāram ācarāmi ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne bhārgavajanmāntaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vicārayantas tattvajñā iti te jāgatīr gatīḥ ।
samaṅgāyās taṭāt tasmāt praceluś cañcalāṃśavaḥ ।। [ MT]

kramād ākāśam ākramya nirgatyāmbudakoṭaraiḥ ।
samprāpus siddhamārgeṇa mandaraṃ hemakandaram ।। 

adhityakāyāṃ tasyādrer ārdraparṇāvaguṇṭhitām ।
dadarśa bhārgavaś śuṣkāṃ pūrvajanmodbhavāṃ tanum ।। 

uvāca cedaṃ he tāta tanvī tanur iyaṃ hi sā ।
yā tvayā sukhasambhogaiḥ purā samabhilālitā ।। 

iyaṃ sā mattanur yasyā mandārakusumotkaraiḥ ।
racitāś śītalāś śayyā merūpavanabhūmiṣu ।। 

iyaṃ sā mattanur mattadevastrīgaṇalālitā ।
sarīsṛpamukhakṣuṇṇā paśya śete dharātale ।। 

nandanodyānaṣaṇḍeṣu mama tanvā yayānayā ।
ciraṃ vilasitaṃ seyaṃ śuṣkakaṅkālatāṃ gatā ।। 

surāṅganāṅgasaṃsaṅgād uttuṅgānaṅgaraṅgayā ।
cetovṛttyā rahitayā tanveha mama śuṣyate ।। 

teṣu teṣu vilāseṣu tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca ।
tathā tā bhāvanā baddhvā kathaṃ svastho asi dehaka ।। 

hā tano kvāvabhagnāsi tāpasaṃśoṣam āgatā ।
karaṅkatāṃ prayātāsi māṃ bhāvayasi durbhage ।। 

dehenāhaṃ vilāseṣu yenaiva mudito abhavam ।
kaṅkalatām upagatāt tasmād eva bibhemy aham ।। 

tārājālasamākāro yatra hāro abhavat purā ।
mamorasi nilīyante paśya tatra pipīlakāḥ ।। 

dravatkāñcanakāntena lobhaṃ nītā varāṅganāḥ ।
yena madvapuṣā tena paśya kaṅkalatohyate ।। 

paśyeme vitatāsyena tāpasaṃśuṣkakṛttinā ।
matkaṅkālakuvaktreṇa vitrāsyante vane mṛgāḥ ।। 

paśyātisaṃśuṣkatayā śavodaradarī mama ।
prakāśārkāṃśujālena vivekeneva śobhate ।। 

mattanuḥ pariśuṣkeyaṃ sthitottānā vanāvanau ।
vairāgyaṃ nayatīvātmatucchatvenāmbarasthitān ।। 

śabdarūparasasparśagandhalobhavimuktayā ।
nirvikalpasamādhyeva mama tanvoṣyate girau ।। 

saṃśānte cittavetāle yām ānandakalāṃ tanuḥ ।
yāti tām api rājyena jāgatena na gacchati ।। 

paśya viśrāntasarvehaṃ vigatāśeṣakautukam ।
nirastakalpanājālaṃ sukhaṃ śete kalevaram ।। 

cittamarkaṭasaṃrambhasaṅkṣubdhaḥ kāyapādapaḥ ।
tathā vegena calati yathā mūlāni kṛntati ।। 

cittānarthavimukto adrau gajābhraharivibhramam ।
nāyaṃ paśyati me dehaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ ।। 

sarvāśājvarasammohamihikāśaradāgamam ।
acittatvaṃ vinā nānyac chreyaḥ paśyāmi jantuṣu ।। 

ta eva sukhasambhogasīmāntaṃ samupāgatāḥ ।
mahādhiyaś śāntadhiyo ye yātā vimanaskatām ।। 

sarvaduḥkhadaśāmuktāṃ saṃśāntāṃ vigatajvarām ।
diṣṭyā paśyāmy amananāṃ vane tanum imām aham ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña bhārgaveṇa tadā kila ।
subahūny upabhuktāni śarīrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

bhṛguṇotpādite kāye tat tasmiṃs tasya kiṃ mune ।
mahān atiśayo jātaḥ paridevanam eva vā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śukrasya kalanā rāma yāsau jīvadaśāṃ gatā ।
karmātmikā samutpannā bhṛgor bhārgavarūpiṇī ।। 

sā hīdamprathamatvena sametya paramāt padāt ।
bhūtākāśapadaṃ prāpya vātavyāvalitā satī ।। 

prāṇāpānapravāheṇa praviśya hṛdayaṃ bhṛgoḥ ।
krameṇa vīryatām etya sampannauśanasī tanuḥ ।। 

vihitabrāhmasaṃskārā tatas sā pitur agragā ।
kālena mahatā prāptā śuṣkakaṅkālarūpatām ।। 

idamprathamam āyātā yadā sā brahmaṇas tanuḥ ।
tatas tāṃ prati śukreṇa tadā tat paridevitam ।। 

vītarāgo apy aniccho api samaṅgāviprarūpavān ।
svāṃ śuśoca tanuṃ śukras svabhāvo hy eṣa dehajaḥ ।। 

kiṃ tu pradarśitaṃ tena śokavyājena dhīmatām ।
vairāgyapratipattyai tat pṛthaktvaṃ dehadehinoḥ ।। 

jñasyājñasya ca dehasya yāvajjīvam ayaṃ kramaḥ ।
lokavad vyavahāro yat saktyāsaktyātha vā sadā ।। 

ye parijñātagatayo ye cājñāḥ paśudharmiṇaḥ ।
lokasaṃvyavahāreṣu te sthitā vanajālavat ।। 

vyavahārī yathaivājñas tathaiva kila paṇḍitaḥ ।
vāsanāmātrabhedo atra kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ ।। 

yāvac charīraṃ tāvad dhi duḥkhe duḥkhaṃ sukhe sukham ।
asaṃsaktadhiyo dhīrā darśayanty aprabuddhavat ।। 

sukheṣu sukhitā nityaṃ duḥkhitā duḥkhavṛttiṣu ।
mahātmāno hi dṛśyante nūnam antas tu śītalāḥ ।। 

stambhasya pratibimbāni kṣubhyanti na vapus sthiram ।
jñasya karmendriyāṇy eva kṣubhyanti na manas sthiram ।। 

calācalatayā tajjño lokavṛttiṣu tiṣṭhati ।
adhassthitir iva svacchaṃ pratibimbeṣu bhāskaraḥ ।। 

santyaktalokakarmāpi baddha evāprabuddhadhīḥ ।
atyaktamohalīlo api mukta eva prabuddhadhīḥ ।। 

muktabuddhīndriyo mukto baddhakarmendriyo api hi ।
baddhabuddhīndriyo baddho muktakarmendriyo api hi ।। 

sukhaduḥkhadṛśor loke bandhamokṣadṛśos tathā ।
hetur buddhīndriyāṇy eva tejāṃsīva prakāśane ।। 

bahir lokocitācāras tv antar ācāravarjitaḥ ।
samo asann iva tiṣṭha tvaṃ saṃśāntasakalaiṣaṇaḥ ।। 

sarvaiṣaṇāvimuktena svātmanātmani tiṣṭhatā ।
kuru karmāṇi kāryāṇi nūnaṃ sāmanasi sthitiḥ ।। 

ādhivyādhimahāvarte garte saṃsāravartmani ।
mamatogrāndhakūpe asmin mā patātapadāyini ।। 

na tvaṃ bhāveṣu no bhāvās tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇa ।
śuddhabuddhasvabhāvas tvam ātmasaṃsthas sthiro bhava ।। 

vyapagatamamatāmahāndhakāraṃ padam amalaṃ vigataiṣaṇaṃ sametya ।
prabhavasi yadi cetaso mahātmaṃs tad atidhiye mahate sate namas te ।। 

aṣṭātriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athākṣipya vacas tasya tanayasya tadā bhṛgoḥ ।
uvāca bhagavān kālo vaco gambhīranissvanam ।। [ MT]

kālaḥ

samaṅgātāpasīm etāṃ tanuṃ santyajya bhārgava ।
praviśemāṃ tanuṃ sādho nagarīm iva pārthivaḥ ।। 

kāle pūrvajayā tanvā tapaḥ kṛtvānayā punaḥ ।
gurutvam asurendrāṇāṃ kartavyaṃ bhavatānagha ।। 

mahākalpānta āyāte bhavatā bhārgavī tanuḥ ।
apunargrahaṇāyaiṣā tyājyā pramlānapuṣpavat ।। 

jīvanmuktapadaṃ prāptas tanvā prāktanarūpayā ।
mahāsurendragurutāṃ kurvaṃs tiṣṭha mahāmate ।। 

kalyāṇam astu vāṃ yāmo vayaṃ tv abhimatāṃ diśam ।
na kiñcid api tac cittaṃ yasya nābhimataṃ bhavet ।। 

ity uktvā muñcatoḥ puṣpaṃ tayos so antaradhīyata ।
taptāṃśur iva rodasyos samam aṃśubhir aṃśumān ।। 

gate tasmin bhagavati tām uktvā bhavitavyatām ।
vicārya bhārgavo abhedyāṃ niyatāṃ niyater gatim ।। 

kālakāraṇasaṃśuṣkāṃ bhāvipuṣpaphalodayām ।
viveśa tāṃ tanuṃ bālāṃ sulatām iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

sā brāhmaṇatanur bhūmau vivarṇavadanāṅgikā ।
papāta kampitā tūrṇaṃ chinnamūlā latā yathā ।। 

tasyāṃ praviṣṭajīvāyāṃ putratanvāṃ mahāmuniḥ ।
cakārāpyāyanaṃ mantrais sakamaṇḍaluvāribhiḥ ।। 

sarvanāḍyas tatas tanvyās tasyāḥ pūrṇā virejire ।
saritaḥ prāvṛṣīvāmbupūrapūritakoṭarāḥ ।। 

nalinī prāvṛṣīvāsau madhāv iva navā latā ।
yadā pūrṇā tadā tasyāḥ prāṇāḥ pallavitā babhuḥ ।। 

atha śukras samuttasthau vahatprāṇasamīraṇaḥ ।
rasamārutasaṃyogād āpūrṇa iva vāridaḥ ।। 

puro abhivādayām āsa pitaraṃ pāvanākṛtiḥ ।
prathamollāsito meghas staniteneva parvatam ।। 

pitātha prāktanīṃ tasyāpy āliliṅga tanuṃ tataḥ ।
snehārdravṛttir jaladaś cirād giritaṭīm iva ।। 

bhṛgur dadarśa sasnehaṃ prāktanīṃ tānayīṃ tanum ।
matto jāto ayam ity āsthā haraty api mahāmatim ।। 

matputro ayam iti sneho bhṛgum apy aharat tadā ।
paratātmīyatā ceyaṃ yāvadākṛti bhāvinī ।। 

babhūvatuḥ pitāputrau tāv athānyo'nyaśobhitau ।
niśāvasānamuditāv arkapadmākarāv iva ।। 

cirasaṅgamasambaddhāv iva cakrāhvadampatī ।
ghanāgamaghanasnehau mayūrajaladāv iva ।। 

cirakāladṛḍhotkaṇṭhayogyayā kathayā tayā ।
sthitvā tatra muhūrtaṃ tāv athotthāya mahāmatī ।। 

samaṅgādvijadehaṃ taṃ bhasmasāt tatra cakratuḥ ।
ko hi nāma jagajjāta ācāraṃ nānutiṣṭhati ।। 

evaṃ tau kānane tasmin pāvane bhṛgubhārgavau ।
saṃsthitau tapasā dīptau divīva śaśibhāskarau ।। 

ceratur jñātavijñeyau jīvanmuktau jagadgurū ।
deśakāladaśaugheṣu sugamaṃ susthiraṃ tapaḥ ।। 

athāsuragurutvaṃ sa śukraḥ kālena labdhavān ।
bhṛgur apy ātmano yogye pade atiṣṭhad anāmaye ।। 

śukro asau prathamam iti krameṇa jāta etasmāt paramapadād udārakīrtiḥ ।
svenāśu smṛtipadavibhrameṇa paścād evaṃ ca pravilulito daśāntareṣu ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne śukrapunarjīvanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonacatvariṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhṛguputrasya pratibhā sānubhūtitaḥ ।
yathāsya saphalā jātā tathānyasya na kiṃ bhavet ।। [ MT]

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idamprathamam utpannā sā tadā brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
śuddhā matir bhārgavasya nānyajanmakalaṅkitā ।। 

sarvaiṣaṇānāṃ saṃśāntau śuddhā cittasya yā sthitiḥ ।
tat sattvam ucyate saiṣā vimalā cid udāhṛtā ।। 

mano nirmalasattvātma yad bhāvayati yādṛśam ।
tat tathāśu bhavaty eva yathāvarto arṇave ambhasaḥ ।। 

yathā bhṛgusutasyaiṣa vibhramaḥ proditas svayam ।
pratyekam apy evam eva dṛṣṭānto atra bhṛgos sutaḥ ।। 

bījasyāṅkurapattrādi svaṃ camatkurute yathā ।
sarveṣāṃ bhūtasaṅghānāṃ bhramaṣaṇḍas tathaiva hi ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate viśvam evam evākhilaṃ hi tat ।
pratyekam uditaṃ mithyā mithyaivāstam upaiti ca ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcana kasyacit ।
bhrāntimātram idaṃ māyā mudhaiva parijṛmbhate ।। 

yathāsmatpratibhāsasthas so ayaṃ saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
tathā teṣāṃ sahasrāṇi mitho adṛṣṭāni santi hi ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpanagaravyavahārāḥ parasparam ।
pṛthag yathā na dṛśyante tathaite saṃsṛtibhramāḥ ।। 

evaṃ nagaravṛndāni nabhassaṅkalparūpiṇām ।
santi tāni na dṛśyante mitho jñānadṛśaṃ vinā ।। 

piśācayakṣarakṣāṃsi santy evaṃrūpakāṇi hi ।
saṅkalpamātradehāni sukhaduḥkhamayāni ca ।। 

evam eva vayaṃ ceme sampannā raghunandana ।
svasaṅkalpātmakākārā mithyāsatyatvabhāvitāḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpaiva hi pare vartate sargasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
na vāstavī vastutas tu saṃsthiteyam avastuni ।। 

pratyekam uditaṃ viśvam evam eva mudhaiva hi ।
navagulmakarūpeṇa vāsantikaraso yathā ।। 

prathamo ayaṃ svasaṅkalpas suprathām āgatas tathā ।
yathātipāramārthyena dṛḍhenetthaṃ vibhāvyate ।। 

pratyekam uditaṃ cittaṃ svasvabhāvodarasthitam ।
idam itthaṃsamārambhaṃ jagat paśyad vinaśyati ।। 

pratibhāsavaśād asti nāsti vastvavalokanāt ।
dīrghas svapno jagajjālam ālānaṃ cittadantinaḥ ।। 

cittasattaiva hi jagaj jagatsattaiva cittakam ।
ekābhāve dvayor nāśas tac ca satyavicāraṇāt ।। 

śuddhasya pratibhāso hi satyo bhavati cetasaḥ ।
niṣkalaṅke hi lagati paṭe kuṅkumarañjanā ।। 

anyenānāhṛtasyānyo guṇo avaśyaṃ vivardhate ।
anākrāntasya saṅkalpaiḥ pratibhodeti cetasaḥ ।। 

suvarṇo na sthitiṃ yāti malavaty aṃśuke yathā ।
ekā dṛṣṭis sthitiṃ yāti na mlāne cittake tathā ।। 

pramārjanād iva maṇes tāmrasyeva ca yuktitaḥ ।
ciram ekadṛḍhābhyāsāc chuddhir bhavati cetasaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

pratibhāsātmani jagaty ete kālakriyākramāḥ ।
sodayāstamayā jātāḥ kathaṃ śukrasya cetasaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yādṛg jagad idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śukreṇa pitṛmātṛtaḥ ।
tādṛk tasya sthitaṃ citte mayūrāṇḍe mayūravat ।। 

svabhāvakośāt svaditaṃ tad anena kramoditam ।
bījenāṅkurapattrādilatāpuṣpaphalaṃ yathā ।। 

jīvo yadvāsanāsāras tad evāntaḥ prapaśyati ।
svapna evātra dṛṣṭānto dīrghasvapnas tv idaṃ jagat ।। 

pratyekam udito rāma nanu saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
rātrau sainyanarasvapnajālavat svātmani sphuṭaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

eṣa saṃsṛtiṣaṇḍaugho mithas sammilati svayam ।
no vāpi yadi tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

malinaṃ hi mano avīryaṃ na mithaś śleṣam arhati ।
ayo ayasīvāsantapte śuddhe tapte tu līyate ।। 

cittatattvāni śuddhāni sammilanti parasparam ।
ekarūpāṇi toyāni yānty aikyaṃ nābilāni hi ।। 

śuddhir hi cittasya vivāsanatvam abhūtasaṃvedanarūpam ekam ।
tasyās suṣuptātmapadāt prabudhya tanmātrayuktyā parasaṅgam eti ।। 

manorājyasammīlanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catvariṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvasaṃsṛtiṣaṇḍeṣu bījarūpakalātmanaḥ ।
tanmātrapratibhāsasya pratibhāse na bhinnatā ।। [ MT]

pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā tanmātrāpattipūrvakam ।
sarvasya jīvajātasya suṣuptatvād anantaram ।। 

pravṛttibhājo ye jīvās te tanmātrapadaṃ gatāḥ ।
tanmātraikatayā sargān mithaḥ paśyanti kalpitān ।। 

tanmātraikyapraṇālena citrās sargajalāśayāḥ ।
parasparaṃ sammilanti ghanatāṃ yānti cābhitaḥ ।। 

kecit pṛthak sthitim itāḥ pṛthag eva layaṃ gatāḥ ।
kecin mithas sammilitā jagatṣaṇḍās sthitāḥ kṛtāḥ ।। 

jagatṣaṇḍasahasrāṇi yatrāsaṅkhyāny aṇāv aṇau ।
aparasparalagnāni kānanaṃ brahma nāma tat ।। 

mithas sa melanaṃ naiti ghanatāṃ samupāgataḥ ।
yad yad yatra yathā rūḍhaṃ tat tat paśyati netarat ।। 

vartamānamanorājyavaśāj jīvaparamparāḥ ।
parasparaṃ sammilitās sargāṇāṃ rūḍhibhāvanāḥ ।। 

dehasattā bhṛśaṃ rūḍhā dehābhāvas tu vismṛtaḥ ।
dehatvaparirūḍhatvāc cidvyomnā vismṛtātmanā ।। 

yathā śuddhaprāṇamarut paraprāṇābhivedhanāt ।
vetti vedhyamanorājyaṃ tathā sargān narāśrayī ।। 

sarveṣāṃ jīvarāśīnām ātmāvasthātrayaṃ śritaḥ ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptākhyam atra deho na kāraṇam ।। 

evam ātmani jīvatvam anyāvasthātrayātmani ।
tāpāmbhasīva vīcitvam asmin kacati dehatā ।। 

citkalāpadam āsādya suṣuptāntapade sthitam ।
buddho nivartate jīvo mūḍhas sarge pravartate ।। 

svabhāvaśuddhir hi yadā tadā maitrī pravartate ।
dvayor ekatvarūpaiva svasauhārdanidarśanā ।। 

ajñas suṣuptāt sambuddho jīvaḥ kaścit svasargabhāk ।
sarvagatvāc citaḥ kaścit parasargeṇa nīyate ।। 

sarge sarge pṛthagrūpaṃ santi sargāntarāṇy api ।
teṣv apy antassthasargaughāḥ kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।। 

sarge sargāntarāpūrapattrapīvaravṛttimān ।
svabhāvaśītalo brahmakadalīdalamaṇḍapaḥ ।। 

kadalyām anyatā nāsti yathā pattraśateṣv api ।
brahmatattve anyatā nāsti tathā sargaśateṣv api ।। 

bījāt phalaṃ rasād bhūtvā yathā bījaṃ punar bhavet ।
tathā brahma mano bhūtvā bodhād brahma punar bhavet ।। 

rasakāraṇakaṃ bījaṃ phalabhāvena jṛmbhate ।
brahmakāraṇako jīvo jagadrūpeṇa jṛmbhate ।। 

rasasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ syād iti vaktuṃ na yujyate ।
svabhāvo nirviśeṣatvāt paraṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate ।। 

na cāsattā sarvamaye vaktuṃ kvacana śakyate ।
nākāraṇe kāraṇādi pare vāsty ādikāraṇe ।। 

bījaṃ jahan nijavapuḥ phalībhūtaṃ vilokyate ।
brahmājahan nijavapuḥ phalaṃ bījaṃ ca saṃsthitam ।। 

bījasyākṛtimat sarvaṃ tenānākṛti tatpadam ।
na yujyate samīkartuṃ tasmān nāsty upamā śive ।। 

kham eva jāyate khābhān na ca taj jāyate anyadṛk ।
ato na jātaṃ vā jātaṃ viddhi brahmanabho jagat ।। 

dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā samprapaśyati ।
prapañcākrāntasaṃvitteḥ kasyodeti nijā sthitiḥ ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇājalabhrāntau satyāṃ keva vidagdhatā ।
vidagdhatāyāṃ satyāṃ tu kevāsau mṛgatṛṣṇikā ।। 

ākāśaviśado draṣṭā sarvago api na paśyati ।
netraṃ nijam ivātmānaṃ dṛśībhūtam aho bhramaḥ ।। 

ākāśaviśadaṃ brahma yatnenāpi na labhyate ।
dṛśye dṛśyatayādṛṣṭe tv asya lābhas sudūrataḥ ।। 

tvādṛksthūlo avadhānena vinā yatra na dṛśyate ।
tatrātidūrodastaiva draṣṭus sūkṣmasya dṛśyatā ।। 

draṣṭā draṣṭaiva bhavati na tu spṛśati dṛśyatām ।
dṛśyaṃ ca dṛśyate tena draṣṭā rāma na dṛśyate ।। 

draṣṭaiva sambhavaty eko na tu dṛśyam ihāsti hi ।
draṣṭā sarvātmako dṛśyaṃ sthitaś cet keva dṛśyatā ।। 

sarvaśaktimatā rājñā yad yat sampādyate yathā ।
tat tat tathā bhavaty āśu sa evodeti tattayā ।। 

yathā madhurasollāsaṣ ṣaṇḍo bhavati bhāsuraḥ ।
rasatām ajahac caiva phalapuṣpadalonnataḥ ।। 

cidullāsas tathā jīvo bhūtvā bhavati dehakaḥ ।
cinmātratāṃ tām ajahad eva darśanadṛṅmayaḥ ।। 

nānāṣaṇḍasahasraughair advitīyair nijātmanaḥ ।
yathodeti raso bhaumaś cit tathodety ahambhramaiḥ ।। 

cidrasollāsavṛkṣāṇāṃ kacatām ātmanātmani ।
dṛśyaśākhāśatāḍhyānām iha nānto avagamyate ।। 

ṣaṇḍaḥ pratyekam evāntar yathā rasacamatkṛtim ।
svādayaty evam eṣā cit pṛthak paśyati saṃsṛtīḥ ।। 

yā yodeti yathā yasyā jīvaśaktes svasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
tām tāṃ tathaiti sā svāntaś cid bhūtabhuvanasthitim ।। 

jīvasaṃsṛtayaḥ kāścit pramilanti parasparam ।
svayaṃ vihṛtya saṃsāre śāmyanti cirakālataḥ ।। 

sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svaṃ paśyasy anayā tathā ।
jagajjālasahasrāṇi paramāṇvantareṣv api ।। 

bhittau nabhasi pāṣāṇe jvālāyām anile jale ।
santi saṃsāralakṣyāṇi tile tailam ivākhile ।। 

śuddhim eti yadā cetas tadā jīvo bhavec citiḥ ।
śuddhā ca sā sarvagatā tena sammelanaṃ mithaḥ ।। 

sarveṣāṃ padmajādīnāṃ svasattābhramapūrakaḥ ।
jagaddīrghamahāsvapnas svayam antas samutthitaḥ ।। 

svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yānti kāścid bhūtaparamparāḥ ।
tenopalambhaḥ kuḍyādāv āsāṃ dṛḍhataras sthitaḥ ।। 

yad yatra cid bhāvayati tat tatrāśu bhavaty alam ।
tayā svapne api yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatkāle satyam eva tat ।। 

cidaṇor antare santi samastānubhavāṇavaḥ ।
yathā bījāntare pattralatāpuṣpaphalāṇavaḥ ।। 

paramāṇuṃ jagad antar dhatte citparamāṇukaḥ ।
līnam ākāśam ākāśe dvaitaikyabhramam utsṛja ।। 

deśakālakriyādyākhyais svair evāṇubhir eva cit ।
aṇūn anubhavaty antar itarāṇor asambhavāt ।। 

svayaṃ sarvasya kacitas svacchaś cidaṇuṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
brahmādeḥ kīṭaniṣṭhasya dehadṛṣṭyānubhāvitaḥ ।। 

kacitaṃ kiñcid eveha vastutas tu na kiñcana ।
svayaṃ svatvaṃ svādayante dvaitaṃ citparamāṇavaḥ ।। 

svayaṃ prakacati sphāradehaś cidaṇuṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
netrādikusumadvārais saṃvidāmodam udgiran ।। 

sampaśyatītarān kaścid bahīrūpeṇa cidghanān ।
sarvagatvād anāśatvād dṛśyabījasya vai citeḥ ।। 

antar evākhilaṃ kaścit paśyaty avikalaṃ jagat ।
tatrātikālaṃ kalanād unmajjati nimajjati ।। 

svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ tatra tathā paśyan punaḥ punaḥ ।
mithyāvaṭeṣu luṭhitaś śileva śikharacyutā ।। 

kecit sammīlitāḥ kecid ātmany eva bhrame sthitāḥ ।
magnās svasaṃvidrasatas sphuranto dehiṣaṇḍakāḥ ।। 

svayam antaḥ prapaśyanti ye jagajjīvasambhramam ।
taiḥ kaiścit tat tathā dṛśyam asatsvapnavad āśritam ।। 

sarvātmatvāt svabhāvasya tad dṛśyaṃ satyam ātmani ।
sarvago vidyate yatra tatra sarvam udeti hi ।। 

jīvāntaḥ pratibhāsasya sargasya punar antare ।
jīvaṣaṇḍa udety uccais tasyāntar itaro api ca ।। 

jīvāntar jāyate jīvas tasyāntar api jīvakaḥ ।
sarvatra rambhādalavaj jīvabījaṃ prajīvati ।। 

dṛśyabuddhiparāvṛddhi samam etad anantakam ।
hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ parijñaptyaiva naśyati ।। 

vicāro yasya nodeti ko ahaṃ kim idam ity alam ।
tasyādyantāvimukto asau dīrgho jīvajvarabhramaḥ ।। 

vicāraḥ phalitas tasya vijñeyo yasya sanmateḥ ।
dinānudinam āyāti tānavaṃ bhogagṛdhnutā ।। 

yathā dehopayuktaṃ hi karoty ārogyam auṣadham ।
tathendriyajaye nyasto vivekaḥ phalito bhavet ।। 

viveko asti vacasy eva citre agnir iva bhāsuraḥ ।
yasya tena parityaktā duḥkhāyaiva vivekitā ।। 

yathā sparśena pavanas sattām āyāti no girā ।
tathecchātānavenaiva viveko asyeti budhyate ।। 

citrāmṛtaṃ nāmṛtam eva viddhi citrānalaṃ nānalam eva viddhi ।
citre aṅganā nūnam anaṅganaiva vācā vivekas tv aviveka eva ।। 

pūrvaṃ vivekena tanutvam eti rāgo atha vairaṃ ca samūlam eva ।
paścāt parikṣīyata eva yatra sa pāvanas tatra vivekitāsti ।। 

bhārgavopākhyāne jīvaṣaṇḍakāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

samāptam utpattiprakaraṇam

prakaraṇa sthiti

prathamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athotpattiprakaraṇād anantaram idaṃ śṛṇu ।
sthitiprakaraṇaṃ rāma jñātaṃ nirvāṇakāri yat ।। 

jīvabījaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvatra kham iva sthiram ।
tena jīvodarajagaty api jīvo asty anekadhā ।। [ MT]

cidghanaikaghanātmatvāj jīvāntar jīvajātayaḥ ।
kadalīdalavat santi kīṭā iva narodare ।। 

yo yo rāma yathā grīṣme kalkasvedād bhavet krimiḥ ।
tattannāma tathā cittvāt khaṃ jīvībhavati svataḥ ।। 

yathā yathā yatante te jīvakās svātmasiddhaye ।
tathā tathā bhavanty āśu vicitropāsanakramaiḥ ।। 

devān devayajo yakṣayajo yakṣān vrajanti hi ।
brahma brahmayajo yānti yad atucchaṃ tad āśrayet ।। 

sa śukro bhṛguputro hi nirmalatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ ।
baddhaḥ prathamadṛṣṭena dṛśyenāśu svabhāvataḥ ।। 

abhijātāparimlānā bālā yat prathamaṃ puraḥ ।
saṃvit prāpnoti tadrūpā bhavaty anyā na kācana ।। 

rāmaḥ

jāgratsvapnadaśābhedaṃ bhagavan vaktum arhasi ।
kathaṃ ca jāgraj jāgrat syāt svapno ajāgrat kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sthirapratyayayuktaṃ yat taj jāgrad iti kathyate ।
asthirapratyayaṃ yat syāt sa svapnas samudāhṛtaḥ ।। 

jāgrac cet kṣaṇadṛṣṭaṃ syāt svapnaḥ kālāntarasthitaḥ ।
taj jāgrat svapnatām eti svapno jāgrattvam ṛcchati ।। 

jāgratsvapnadaśābhedo na sthirāsthiratāṃ vinā ।
samas sadaiva sarvatra samastānubhavo anayoḥ ।। 

yad eva sthiratām eti taj jāgrad iti kathyate ।
kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakas svapno yathā bhavati tac chṛṇu ।। 

jīvadhātuś śarīre antar vidyate yena jīvyate ।
tejo vīryaṃ jīvadhātur ityādyabhidham aṅga tat ।। 

vyavahārī yadā kāyo manasā karmaṇā girā ।
bhavet tadā sa sampanno jīvadhātuḥ prasarpati ।। 

tasmin prasarpaty aṅgeṣu sparśāt saṃvid udeti hi ।
puṣṭatvāt saiti cittākhyām antarlīnajagadbhramā ।। 

sekṣaṇādiṣu randhreṣu prasarpantī bahirmayam ।
nānākāravikārāḍhyaṃ rūpam ātmani paśyati ।। 

tatsthiratvāt tathaivātha jāgrad ity avagamyate ।
jāgratkrama iti proktas suṣuptādikramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

manasā karmaṇā vācā yadā kṣubhyati no vapuḥ ।
śānta ātiṣṭhati svaccho jīvadhātus tadā tv asau ।। 

samatām āgatair vātaiḥ kṣobhyate na hṛdantare ।
nirvātasadane dīpo yathālokaikakārakaḥ ।। 

tatas sarati nāṅgeṣu saṃvit kṣubhyati tena no ।
na cekṣaṇādīny āyāti randhrāṇy āyāti no bahiḥ ।। 

jīvo antar eva sphurati tailasaṃvid yathā tile ।
śītasaṃvid dhima iva snehasaṃvid yathā ghṛte ।। 

jīvaḥ kālakalāṃ kāñcit tiṣṭhañ śāntatayātmani ।
daśām āyāti sauṣuptīṃ saumyavātāṃ vicetanām ।। 

jñātvā cetasy uparate śāmyan vyavaharann api ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu prabuddhas turyavān smṛtaḥ ।। 

sauṣuptāt somyatāṃ yātaiḥ prāṇais sañcālyate yadā ।
sa jīvadhātus sā saṃvit tataś cittatayoditā ।। 

svāntassaṃsthaṃ jagajjālaṃ bhāgabhāgaiḥ kramabhramaiḥ ।
paśyati svāntar evāśu sphāraṃ bījam iva drumam ।। 

jīvadhātur yadā vātaiḥ kiñcit saṅkṣobhyate bhṛśam ।
tadohyate ambara iva paśyaty ātmani khe gatim ।। 

yadāmbhasā plāvyate asau tadā vāryādisambhramam ।
antar evānubhavati svāmodaṃ kusumaṃ yathā ।। 

yadā pittādinākrāntas tadāgnyauṣṇyādisambhramam ।
antar evānubhavati sphāraṃ bahir ivākhilam ।। 

raktāpūrṇo raktavarṇān deśakālān bahir yadā ।
paśyaty anubhavātmatvāt tatraiva ca nimajjati ।। 

sevate vāsanāṃ yāṃ tāṃ so antaḥ paśyati nidritaḥ ।
pavanaiḥ kṣobhito randhrair bahir akṣādibhir yathā ।। 

anākrantendriyacchidro yad akṣubdho antar eva saḥ ।
saṃvidānubhavaty āśu sa svapna iti kathyate ।। 

samākrantendriyacchidro yat kṣubdho bāhyasaṃvidā ।
paripaśyati taj jāgrad ity āhur matimattamāḥ ।। 

iti viditavatā tvayādhunāntaḥ prathitamahāmatineha satyatāsthā ।
asati jagati naiva bhāvanīyā mṛtihṛtisaṃsṛtidoṣabhāvanī yā ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyasvarūpavicāro nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ manorūpanirūpaṇe ।
mayā rāghava nānyena kenacin nāma hetunā ।। [ MT]

dṛḍhaniścayavac ceto yad bhāvayati bhūriśaḥ ।
tattāṃ yāty analāśleṣād ayaḥpiṇḍo agnitām iva ।। 

bhāvābhāvagrahotsargadṛśaś cittena kalpitāḥ ।
nāsatyā nāpi satyās tā manaścāpalakāraṇāḥ ।। 

mano hi hetuḥ kartṛ syāt kāraṇaṃ ca jagatsthiteḥ ।
viśvarūpatayaivedaṃ tanoti malinaṃ manaḥ ।। 

mano hi puruṣo rāma tan niyojyaṃ śubhe pathi ।
tajjayaikāntasādhyā hi sarvā jagati bhūtayaḥ ।। 

śarīraṃ cec charīraṃ syāt kathaṃ śukro mahāmatiḥ ।
agamad vividhaṃ bhedaṃ bahudehasamudbhavam ।। 

tasmāc cittaṃ hi puruṣaś śarīraṃ cittam eva hi ।
yanmayaṃ ca bhavaty etat tad avāpnoty asaṃśayam ।। 

yad atuccham anāyāsam anupādhi gatabhramam ।
yatnāt tadanusandhānaṃ kuru tattāṃ ca yāsyasi ।। 

abhipatati manassthitiṃ śarīraṃ na tu vapurācaritaṃ manaḥ prayāti ।
abhipatatu tavātra tena satyaṃ subhaga manaḥ prajahātv asatyam anyat ।। 

manorūpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam ।
hṛdi vyāvartate lolaḥ kallola iva sāgare ।। [ MT]

dikkālādyanavacchinne tate nitye nirāmaye ।
mlānā saṃvin manonāmnī kutaḥ keyam upasthitā ।। 

yasmād anyan na nāmāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।
kutaḥ kīdṛk kathaṃ tasya kalaṅkaḥ kutra vidyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sādhu rāma tvayā proktaṃ jātā te mokṣabhāginī ।
matir uttamaniṣṣyandā nandanasyeva mañjarī ।। 

pūrvāparavicārārthatatpareyaṃ matis tava ।
samprāpsyati padaṃ proccair yat prāptaṃ śaṅkarādibhiḥ ।। 

praśnasyāsya tu te rāma na kālas tava samprati ।
siddhāntaḥ kathyate yatra tatrāyaṃ praśna ucyate ।। 

siddhāntakāle bhavatā praṣṭavyo aham idaṃ padam ।
karāmalakavat tena siddhāntas te bhaviṣyati ।। 

siddhāntakāle praśnoktir eṣā tava virājate ।
prāvṛṣy eva hi kekoktir yuktā śaradi haṃsagīḥ ।। 

sahajo nīlimā vyomni śobhate prāvṛṣaḥ kṣaye ।
prāvṛṣi tv atanūdagrapayodapaṭalotthitaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ prakṛta ārabdho manonirṇaya uttamaḥ ।
yadvaśāj janatājanma tad ākarṇaya suvrata ।। 

evaṃ prakṛtir eveyaṃ manomananadharmiṇī ।
karmeti rāma nirṇītaṃ sarvair eva mumukṣubhiḥ ।। 

śṛṇu lakṣaṇabhedena tan nānānāmatāṃ katham ।
vāgmināṃ vadatāṃ yātaṃ citrābhiś śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ bhāvam upādatte mano mananacañcalam ।
taṃ tam eti ghanāmodamadhyasthaḥ pavano yathā ।। 

tatas tam eva nirṇīya tam eva ca vikalpayan ।
antas tayā rañjanayā rañjayan svām ahaṅkṛtim ।। 

tanniścayam upādāya tatraiva rasam ṛcchati ।
tanmayatvaṃ śarīre tu tato buddhīndriyeṣv api ।। 

yanmayaṃ hi mano rāma dehas tadanu tadvaśāt ।
tattām āyāti gandhāntaḥ pavano gandhatām iva ।। 

buddhīndriyeṣu valgatsu karmendriyagaṇas tataḥ ।
sphurati svata evorvīrajo lola ivānile ।। 

karmendriyagaṇe kṣubdhe svaśaktiṃ prathayaty alam ।
karma niṣpadyate sphāraṃ pāṃsujālam ivānilāt ।। 

evaṃ hi manasaḥ karma karmabījaṃ manas smṛtam ।
abhinnaivaitayos sattā yathā kusumagandhayoḥ ।। 

yādṛśaṃ bhāvam ādatte dṛḍhābhyāsavaśān manaḥ ।
tathā spando asya karmākhyas tathā śākhā vimuñcati ।। 

tathā kriyāṃ tatphaladāṃ niṣpādayati cādarāt ।
tatas tad eva cāsvādam anubhūyāśu badhyate ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ bhāvam upādatte tat tad vastv iti vindati ।
tac chreyo anyat tu nāstīti niścayo asya prajāyate ।। 

dharmārthakāmamokṣārthaṃ prayatante sadaiva hi ।
manāṃsi dṛḍhabhāvāni pratipattyā svayaiva hi ।। 

manobhiḥ kāpilānāṃ tu pratipattiṃ nijām alam ।
urarīkṛtya nirṇīya kalpitāś śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

mokṣe tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ ।
svāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pravivṛṇvantas sthitās svaniyamabhramaiḥ ।। 

vedāntavādino buddhyā brahmedam iti rūḍhayā ।
yuktiṃ śamadamopetāṃ nirṇīya parikalpya ca ।। 

muktau tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ ।
svāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pravivṛṇvantas sthitās svaniyamabhramaiḥ ।। 

vijñānavādino buddhyā sphuratsvabhramarūpayā ।
svāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pravivṛṇvanti svair eva niyamabhramaiḥ ।। 

ārhatādibhir anyaiś ca svayābhimatayecchayā ।
citrāś citrasamācārāḥ kalpitāś śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

nirnimittotthasaumyāmbubudbudaughair ivotthitaiḥ ।
svaniścayair itiprauḍhair nānākārā hi rītayaḥ ।। 

sarvāsām eva caitāsāṃ rītīnām eka ākaraḥ ।
mano nāma mahābāho maṇīnām iva sāgaraḥ ।। 

na nimbekṣū kaṭusvādū śītoṣṇau nendupāvakau ।
yad yathā manasābhyastam upalabdhaṃ tathaiva tat ।। 

yas tv akṛtrima ānandas tadarthaṃ prayateta vai ।
manas tanmayatāṃ neyaṃ tenāsau samavāpyate ।। 

dṛśyaṃ saṃsāraḍimbasthaṃ tucchaṃ parijahan manaḥ ।
tajjābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ nāvaśaḥ parikṛṣyate ।। 

apavitram asadrūpaṃ mohanaṃ bhayakāraṇam ।
dṛśyam ābhāsam ābhogi bandhaṃ mā bhāvayānagha ।। 

māyaiṣā sā hy avidyaiṣā bhāvanaiṣā bhayāvahā ।
saṃvidas tanmayatvaṃ yat tat karmeti vidur budhāḥ ।। 

draṣṭur dṛśyaikatānatvaṃ viddhi tvaṃ mohanaṃ manaḥ ।
bhramāyaiva ca tan mithyā mahīmakkolakarmavat ।। 

dṛśyatanmayatā yaiṣā svabhāvasyānubhūyate ।
saṃsāramadirā seyam avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ ।। 

anayopahato lokaḥ kalyāṇaṃ nādhigacchati ।
bhāsvaraṃ tapanālokaṃ paṭalāndhekṣaṇo yathā ।। 

svayam utpadyate sā ca saṅkalpād vyomavṛkṣavat ।
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svayam eva vinaśyati ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātreṇa bhāvanāyāṃ mahāmate ।
kṣīṇāyāṃ svaprasādena vimarśena vilāsinā ।। 

asaṃsaṅge padārtheṣu sarveṣu sthiratāṃ gate ।
satyadṛṣṭau prasannāyām asatye kṣayam āgate ।। 

nirvikalpacidacchātmā sa ātmā samavāpyate ।
nāsattā yasya no sattā na sukhaṃ nāpi duḥkhitā ।। 

kevalaṃ kevalībhāvo yasyāntar upalabhyate ।
abhavyayā bhāvanayā na cittendriyadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

ātmano ananyabhūtābhir api yaḥ parivarjitaḥ ।
vāsanābhir anantābhir vyomeva ghanarājibhiḥ ।। 

sandigdhāyāṃ yathā rajjvāṃ sarpatvaṃ tadvad eva hi ।
cidākāśātmanā bandhas tv abaddhenaiva kalpitaḥ ।। 

kalpitaṃ kalpitaṃ vastu pratikalpanayānyayā ।
tad evānyatvam ādatte kham ahorātrayor iva ।। 

yad atuccham anāyāsam anupādhi gatabhramam ।
tattatkalpanayā tādṛk tat sukhāyaiva kalpate ।। 

śūnya eva kusūle antas siṃho astīti bhayaṃ yathā ।
śūnya eva śarīre antar baddho asmīti bhayaṃ tathā ।। 

yathā śūnye kusūle antaḥ prekṣya siṃho na labhyate ।
tathā saṃsārabandhārhaḥ prekṣitas san na labhyate ।। 

idaṃ jagad ayaṃ cāham itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā ।
bālānāṃ śyāmale kāle chāyā vaitālikī yathā ।। 

kalpanāvaśato jantor bhāvābhāvāś śubhāśubhāḥ ।
kṣaṇād asattām āyānti sattām api punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

mātaiva gṛhiṇībhāvagṛhītā kaṇṭhalambinī ।
karoti gṛhiṇīkāryaṃ suratānandadāyinī ।। 

kāntaiva mātṛbhāvena gṛhītākaṇṭhalambinī ।
dūraṃ vismārayaty eva manmathonmādabhāvanām ।। 

bhāvānusāriphaladaṃ padārthaugham avekṣya ca ।
na jñeneha padārtheṣu rūpam ekam udīryate ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvanayā ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam ।
tat tatphalaṃ tadākāraṃ tāvatkālaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā ।
yad yathā yena nirṇītaṃ tat tathā tena lakṣyate ।। 

bhāvitākāśamātaṅgaṃ vyomahastitayā manaḥ ।
vyomakānanamātaṅgīṃ vyomasthām anudhāvati ।। 

tasmāt saṅkalpam eva tvaṃ sarvabhāvamayātmakam ।
tyaja rāghava susvasthas svātmanaiva bhavātmani ।। 

maṇir hi pratibimbānāṃ pratiṣedhakriyāṃ prati ।
na śakto jaḍabhāvena na tu rāma bhavādṛśaḥ ।। 

yad yan manomaṇau rāma taveha pratibimbati ।
tad avastv iti nirṇīya mā tenāgaccha rañjanām ।।
