tad eva satyam iti vāpy abhinnaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।
manvānas tvam anādyantaṃ bhāvayātmānam ātmanā ।। 

cetasi pratibimbanti ye bhāvās tava rāghava ।
rañjayantv anyasaktātman mā te tvāṃ sphaṭikaṃ yathā ।। 

sphaṭikam apamalaṃ yathā viśanti prakaṭatayā navarañjanā vicitrāḥ ।
iha hi vimananaṃ tathā viśantu prakaṭatayā bhuvanaiṣaṇā bhavantam ।। 

vijñānavādo nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jantoḥ kṛtavicārasya vigaladvṛtticetasaḥ ।
mananaṃ tyajato jñatvāt kiñcit parigatātmanaḥ ।। [ MT]

dṛśyaṃ santyajato heyam upādeyam upeyuṣaḥ ।
draṣṭāraṃ paśyato dṛśyam adraṣṭāram apaśyataḥ ।। 

asuptasya pare tattve jāgarūkasya jīvataḥ ।
suptasya ghanasammohamaye saṃsāravartmani ।। 

paryantātyantavairasyād arasasya raseṣv api ।
bhogeṣv ābhogaramyeṣu nīrasasya nirāśiṣaḥ ।। 

vrajaty ātmāmbhasaikatvaṃ jīrṇajāḍye manasy alam ।
galaty apagatāsaṅge himāpūra ivātape ।। 

taraṅgitāsu kallolajālalolāntarāsu ca ।
śāmyantīṣv atha tṛṣṇāsu nadīṣv iva ghanātyaye ।। 

saṃsāravāsanājāle khagajāla ivākhunā ।
troṭite cādṛḍhagranthiślathe vairasyaraṃhasā ।। 

katakaṃ phalam āsādya yathā vāri prasīdati ।
tathā vijñānavaśatas svabhāvas samprasīdati ।। 

nīrāgaṃ nirupāsaṅgaṃ nirdvandvaṃ nirupāśrayam ।
viniryāti mano mohād vihagaḥ pañjarād iva ।। 

śāntasandehadaurātmyaṃ gatakautukavibhramam ।
paripūrṇāntaraṃ cetaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājate ।। 

janitottamasaundaryā dūrodastanatonnatā ।
samatodeti sarvatra śāntavāta ivārṇave ।। 

andhakāramayī mūḍhā jāḍyajarjaritāntarā ।
tanutām eti saṃsāravāsaneva prage kṣapā ।। 

dṛṣṭacidbhāskarā prajñāpadminī puṇyapallavā ।
vikasaty amaloddyotā prātar dyaur iva rūpiṇī ।। 

prajñā hṛdayahāriṇyo bhuvanāhlādanakṣamāḥ ।
sattvalakṣmyaḥ pravartante sakalendor ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena jñātajñeyo mahāmatiḥ ।
nodeti naiva yāty astam abhūtākāśakośavat ।। 

vicāraṇāparijñātasvabhāvasyoditātmanaḥ ।
anukampyā bhavanty ete brahmaviṣṇvindraśaṅkarāḥ ।। 

prakaṭākāram apy antar nirahaṅkāracetasam ।
nāpnuvanti vikalpās taṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivaiṇakāḥ ।। 

taraṅgavad amī lokāḥ prayānty āyānti cābhitaḥ ।
kroḍīkuruta ātmotthe na jñaṃ maraṇajanmanī ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvau saṃsāro netaraḥ kramaḥ ।
iti tābhyāṃ samāloke ramate na sa khidyate ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate kumbhe kumbhanabho yathā ।
bhūṣite dūṣite vāpi dehe tadvad ihātmavān ।। 

viveka udite śīte mithyābhramabharoditā ।
kṣīyate vāsanā sābhre mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ veti yāvan na pravicāritam ।
saṃsārāḍambaraṃ tāvad andhakāropamaṃ sthitam ।। 

mithyābhramabharodbhūtaṃ śarīraṃ padam āpadām ।
ātmabhāvanayā nedaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

deśakālavaśotthāni na mameti gatabhramam ।
śarīrasukhaduḥkhāni yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

ātmānam itarac caiva dṛśā nityāvibhinnayā ।
sarvaṃ cijjyotir eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

apāraparyantanabho dikkālādikriyānvitam ।
aham eveti sarvatra yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

vālāgralakṣabhāgāt tu koṭiśaḥ parikalpitaḥ ।
ahaṃ sūkṣma iti vyāpī yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

sarvaśaktir anantātmā sarvabhāvāntarasthitaḥ ।
advitīyaś cid ity antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

ādhivyādhibhayodvigno jarāmaraṇajanmavān ।
deho aham iti na prājño yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimā mama ।
na dvitīyo mamāstīti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva ।
cittantur aham eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha brahmaivāsti na cāsti tat ।
itthaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

yan nāma kiñcit trailokye sa eko avayavo mama ।
taraṅgo abdhāv ivety antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

ātmatāparate tvattāmatte yasya mahātmanaḥ ।
bhāvād uparate syātāṃ sa paśyati sulocanaḥ ।। 

śocyā pālyā mayaiveyaṃ svaseyaṃ me kanīyasī ।
trilokī pelavety uccair yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

cetyānupātarahitaṃ cidbhairavamayaṃ vapuḥ ।
āpūritajagajjālaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo abhāvo avivekakalanāś ca yāḥ ।
ahaṃ na veti vā nūnaṃ paśyan na parihīyate ।। 

svātmasattāparāpūrṇe jagaty anyena varjite ।
kiṃ me heyaṃ kim ādeyam iti paśyan sadṛṅ naraḥ ।। 

apratarkyam anābhāsaṃ sanmātram idam ity alam ।
heyopādeyakalanā yasya kṣīṇā namāmi tam ।। 

ya ākāśavad ekātmā sarvabhāvagato api san ।
na bhāvarañjanām eti sa mahātmā maheśvaraḥ ।। 

tamaḥprakāśakalanāmuktaḥ kālātmatāṃ gataḥ ।
yas somyas susamas svasthas taṃ naumi padam āgatam ।। 

yasyodayāstamayasaṅkalanākalāsu citrāsu cāruvibhavāsu jagadgatāsu ।
vṛttis samaiva sakalaikagater anantā tasmai namaḥ paramabodhavate śivāya ।। 

anuttamapadaviśrāntasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sa uttamapadālambī cakrabhramavad āsthitaḥ ।
śarīranagarīrājyaṃ kurvann api na lipyate ।। [ MT]

tasyeyaṃ bhogamokṣārthaṃ tajjñasyopavanopamā ।
sukhāyaiva na duḥkhāya svaśarīramahāpurī ।। 

rāmaḥ

nagarītvaṃ śarīrasya kathaṃ nāma mahāmune ।
enāṃ cādhivasan yogī kathaṃ rājyasukhaikabhāk ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ramyeyaṃ dehanagarī rāma sarvaguṇānvitā ।
jñasyānantavilāsāḍhyā svālokārkaprakāśitā ।। 

netravātāyanoddyotaprakāśabhuvanāntarā ।
karapratolīvistāraprāptapādopajaṅgalā ।। 

romarājilatāgulmā tvagaṭṭālakamālitā ।
gulphagulguluviśrāntajaṅghorustambhamaṇḍalā ।। 

rekhāvibhaktapādograśilāprathamanirmitā ।
carmamarmasirāsārasandhisīmāmanoramā ।। 

ūrudvayakavāṭāgranirmitopasthanirgamā ।
kacatkacāvalīkācadalapracchādanāvṛtā ।। 

bhrūlalāṭāsyasacchāyavadanodyānaśobhitā ।
dṛṣṭipātotpalākīrṇakapolavipulasthalā ।। 

vakṣassthalasarassyūtakucapaṅkajakorakā ।
ghanaromāvalicchannaskandhakrīḍāśiloccayā ।। 

udaraśvabhranikṣiptasvanneṣṭabhakṣakarparā ।
dīrghakaṇṭhabilodgīrṇavātasaṃrambhaśabditā ।। 

hṛdayāpaṇanirṇītayathāprāptārthabhūṣitā ।
anārataṃ navadvārapravahatprāṇanāgarā ।। 

āsyasphārakhadādṛṣṭadantāsthiśakalākulā ।
mukhaskhadābhramajjihvācillācarvitabhojanā ।। 

romaśaṣpabharacchannakarṇakoṭarakūpakā ।
sphikkṛṅkhalāñcitopāntapṛṣṭhavistīrṇajaṅgalā ।। 

gudocchinnāraghaṭṭāntaruddhṛtānantakardamā ।
cittodyānamahīvalgadātmacintāvarāṅganā ।। 

dhīvaratrādṛḍhābaddhacapalendriyamarkaṭā ।
vadanodyānahasanapuṣpodgamamanoramā ।। 

svaśarīrapurī jñasya sarvasaubhāgyasundarī ।
sukhāyaiva na duḥkhāya paramāya hitāya ca ।। 

ajñasyeyam anantānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kośapālikā ।
jñasya tv iyam anantānāṃ sukhānāṃ kośapālikā ।। 

na kiñcid asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jñasya naṣṭam arindama ।
sthitāyāṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ teneyaṃ jñasukhāvahā ।। 

yad enāṃ jñas samāruhya saṃsāre viharaty alam ।
aśeṣabhogamokṣārthaṃ teneyaṃ jñarathas smṛtaḥ ।। 

śabdarūparasasparśagandhabandhuśriyo yataḥ ।
anayaiva hi labhyante teneyaṃ jñasya lābhadā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhakriyājālaṃ yadaiṣodvahati svayam ।
tadaiṣā rāma sarvatra sarvavastubharakṣamā ।। 

tasyāṃ śarīrapuryāṃ hi rājyaṃ kurvan gatabhramaḥ ।
jñas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ svapuryām iva vāsavaḥ ।। 

na kṣipaty avaṭāṭope manomattaturaṅgamam ।
na lobhadvandvarūpāya prajñāputrīṃ prayacchati ।। 

ajñānapararāṣṭraṃ ca na randhraṃ tv asya paśyati ।
saṃsārāribhayasyāntar mūlāny eṣa nikṛntati ।। 

tṛṣṇāsāraparāvarte kāmasaṅkṣobhadurgrahe ।
na nimajjati paryastasukhaduḥkhākṣadevane ।। 

karoty avirataṃ snānaṃ bahir antar api kṣaṇāt ।
saritsaṅgamatīrtheṣu manorathagatiḥ kramāt ।। 

sakalākṣijanādṛśyaḥ puraprekṣāparāṅmukhaḥ ।
dhyānanāmni sukhaṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhaty antaḥpurāntare ।। 

sukhāvahaiṣā nagarī nityaṃ pramuditātmanaḥ ।
bhogamokṣapradā divyā śakrasyevāmarāvatī ।। 

sthitayā saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ kiñcin naṣṭaṃ na naṣṭayā ।
yayā puryā mahīpasya sā kathaṃ na sukhāvahā ।। 

vinaṣṭe dehanagare jñasya naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana ।
ākrāntakumbhakośasya khasya kumbhakṣaye yathā ।। 

vidyamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ vāyuḥ kila spṛśati nāsthitam ।
yathā tathaiva dehī svāṃ śarīranagarīm imām ।। 

atrastha eṣa bhagavān ātmā sarvagato api san ।
svavikalpakṛtāṃ bhuktvā puṃstām adhigatātmadṛk ।। 

kurvann api na kurvāṇas samyaksarvakriyonmukhaḥ ।
kadācit prakṛtān sarvān kāryārthān adhitiṣṭhati ।। 

kadācil līlayā lolaṃ vimānam adhirohati ।
anāhatagatiṃ kāntaṃ vihartum amalaṃ manaḥ ।। 

tatrastho lokasundaryā satataṃ śītalāṅgayā ।
ramate rāmayā maitryā nityaṃ hṛdayasaṃsthayā ।। 

dve kānte tiṣṭhatas tasya pārśvayos satyataikate ।
indor iva viśākhe dve samāhlāditacetase ।। 

jña imān akhilāṃl lokān duḥkhakrakacadāritān ।
vālmīkān iva pīṭhasthaḥ pṛṣṭhād arka ivekṣate ।। 

ciraṃ pūritasarvāśas sarvasampattisundaraḥ ।
apunaḥkhaṇḍanāyenduḥ pūrṇāṅga iva rājate ।। 

sevyamāno api bhogaugho na khedāyāsya jāyate ।
kālakūṭaḥ kileśasya kaṇṭhe pratyuta rājate ।। 

parijñāyopabhukto hi bhogo bhavati tuṣṭaye ।
vijñāyāśvāsito maitrīm eti cauro na śatrutām ।। 

naranārīnaṭaughānāṃ kalahe dūragāminā ।
jñena yātreva subhagā bhogaśrīr avalokyate ।। 

aśaṅkitopasamprāptā grāmayātrā yathādhvagaiḥ ।
prekṣyate tadvad eva jñair vyavahāramayī kriyā ।। 

ayatnopanateṣv akṣi digdravyeṣu yathā puraḥ ।
nīrāgam eva patati tadvat kāryeṣu dhīradhīḥ ।। 

indriyāṇāṃ na harati prāptam arthaṃ kadācana ।
na dadāti tathā prāptaṃ sampūrṇo jño avatiṣṭhate ।। 

aprāptacintās samprāptasamupekṣāś ca sanmatim ।
nākampayanti taralāḥ piñchaghātā ivācalam ।। 

saṃśāntasarvasandeho galitākhilakautukaḥ ।
saṅkṣīṇavāsanājālo jñas samrāḍ iva śobhate ।। 

ātmany eva na māty antas svātmanātmani jṛmbhate ।
sampūrṇāpāraparyantaḥ kṣīrārṇava ivātmavān ।। 

bhogecchākṛpaṇāñ jantūn dīnān dīnendriyāṇi ca ।
anunmattamanāś śānto hasaty unmattakān iva ।। 

icchato anyanijāṃ jāyāṃ yathaivānyena hasyate ।
indriyasyecchato bhogaṃ tathaiva jñena hasyate ।। 

tyajantaṃ susukhaṃ sāmyaṃ mano viṣayavidrutam ।
aṅkuśeneva nāgendraṃ vicāreṇa śamaṃ nayet ।। 

bhogeṣu prasaro yasyā manovṛtteḥ pradīyate ।
sāpy ādāv eva hantavyā viṣasyevāṅkurodgatiḥ ।। 

tāḍitasya hi yaḥ paścāt sammānas so apy anantakaḥ ।
śāler grīṣmopataptasya kuseko apy amṛtāyate ।। 

anārtena hi sammāno bahumāno na budhyate ।
pūrṇānāṃ saritāṃ prāvṛṭpūras svalpaṃ virājate ।। 

pūrṇas tūpakṛto apy anyat punar apy abhivāñchati ।
jagatpūraṇayāpy ambu gṛhṇāty ekārṇavo akhilam ।। 

manaso nigṛhītasya yā paścād bhāgamaṇḍanā ।
tām evālabdhavistāralabdhatvād bahu manyate ।। 

baddhamukto mahīpālo grāmamātreṇa tuṣyati ।
parair abaddho nākrānto na rājyaṃ bahu manyate ।। 

hastaṃ hastena sampīḍya dantair dantān vicūrṇya ca ।
aṅgāny aṅgair ivākramya jaya svendriyaśātravān ।। 

jetum anyaṃ kṛtotsāhaiḥ puruṣair udbubhūṣubhiḥ ।
pūrvaṃ hṛdayaśatrutvāj jetavyānīndriyāṇy alam ।। 

etāvati dharaṇitale subhagās te sādhucetanāḥ puruṣāḥ ।
puruṣakathāsu ca gaṇyā na jitā ye cetasā svena ।। 

hṛdayabile kṛtakuṇḍala ulbaṇakalanāviṣo manobhujagaḥ ।
yasyopaśāntim āgata uditaṃ tam arindamaṃ vande ।। 

śarīranagarādivibhūtiyogo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahānarakasaṃrājo mattaduṣkṛtavāraṇāḥ ।
āśāśaraśalākāḍhyā durjayā hīndriyārayaḥ ।। [ MT]

svāśrayaṃ prathamaṃ dehaṃ kṛtaghnā nāśayanti ye ।
te kukāryamahākośā durjayās svendriyārayaḥ ।। 

kalevarāśrayaṃ prāpya viṣayāmiṣagardhataḥ ।
akṣagṛdhrā vivalganti kāryākāryograpakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

vivekatantujālena gṛhītā yena te śaṭhāḥ ।
tasyāṅgāni na lumpanti pāṣāṇakavalaṃ yathā ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyeṣu ramanti viṣayeṣu ye ।
atyantavirasānteṣu patanti narakeṣu te ।। 

vivekadhanavān asmin kukalevarapattane ।
indriyāribhir antassthair avaśo nābhibhūyate ।। 

tathā na sukhitā bhūpā mṛṇmayograpurījuṣaḥ ।
yathā svādhīnamanasas svaśarīrapurīśvarāḥ ।। 

svākrāntendriyabhṛtyasya sugṛhītamanoripoḥ ।
vasanta iva mañjaryo vardhante buddhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

prakṣīṇacittadarpasya nigṛhītendriyadviṣaḥ ।
padminya iva hemante kṣīyante bhogavāsanāḥ ।। 

tāvan niśīva vetālyo valgante hṛdi vāsanāḥ ।
ekatattvadṛḍhābhyāsād yāvan na vijitaṃ manaḥ ।। 

bhṛtyo abhimatakartṛtvān mantrī satkāryakāraṇāt ।
sāmantas svendriyākrānter mano manye vivekinaḥ ।। 

lālanāt snigdhalalanā pālanāt pāvanaḥ pitā ।
suhṛd uttamaviśvāsān mano manye manīṣiṇām ।। 

svālokitaṃ śāstradṛśā sudhyātaṃ svanunāthitam ।
prayacchati parāṃ siddhiṃ tyaktvātmānaṃ manaḥpitā ।। 

sughṛṣṭas suparāmṛṣṭas sudhṛtas svanubodhitaḥ ।
suguṇāyojito bhāti hṛdi hṛdyo manomaṇiḥ ।। 

janmavṛkṣakuṭhārāṇi tathodarkodayāni ca ।
diśaty eṣa manomantrī karmāṇi śubhakarmaṇaḥ ।। 

evaṃ manomaṇiṃ rāma bahupaṅkakalaṅkitam ।
vivekavāriṇā siddhyai prakṣālyālokavān bhava ।। 

bhavabhūmiṣu bhīmāsu vivekavitato api san ।
mā patotpātapūrṇāsu vivaśaḥ prākṛto yathā ।। 

saṃsāramāyām uditām anarthaśatasaṅkulām ।
mā mahāmohamihikām imāṃ tvam avadhīraya ।। 

vivekaṃ param āśritya buddhyā satyam avekṣya ca ।
indriyārīn alaṃ jitvā tīrṇo bhava bhavārṇavāt ।। 

asaty eva śarīre asmin sukhaduḥkheṣv asatsu ca ।
dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā te bhavatu rāghava ।। 

ayam aham iti niścayo vṛthā yas tam alam apāsya mahāmate subuddhyā ।
yad itarad avalambya tat padaṃ tvaṃ vraja piba bhuṅkṣva na badhyase amanaskaḥ ।। 

manasy āptatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

asmin viharato loke lokārāmasya dhīmataḥ ।
śreyase tiṣṭhato yatnam uttamārthābhipātinaḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā te bhavatu rāghava ।
bhīmabhāsadruṭasthityā tavāstv ativiśokatā ।। 

rāmaḥ

dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā bhavatv ity udāhṛtam ।
brahman kim etad bhavatā bhavatāpāpahāriṇā ।। 

udārayaitayā śuddhaṃ samprabodhaya māṃ girā ।
ghanatāpāpahāriṇyā prāvṛṣeva kalāpinam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dāmavyālakaṭanyāyaṃ bhīmabhāsadruṭasthitim ।
śrutvā rāghava tat paścād yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara ।। 

āsīt pātālakuhare sarvāścaryamanohare ।
śambaro nāma daityendro māyāmaṇimahārṇavaḥ ।। 

ākāśanagarodyānaracitāsuramandiraḥ ।
kṛtrimottamacandrārkabhūṣitātmīyamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

śilāśakalasambhūtapadmāḍhyaramaṇācalaḥ ।
anantavibhavārambhaparipūritadānavaḥ ।। 

gṛharatnāṅganāgeyajitāmaravadhūdhvaniḥ ।
candrabimbaphalāpūrṇakrīḍopavanapādapaḥ ।। 

phullanīlotpalavyūhajaṭālaramaṇālayaḥ ।
ratnahaṃsasamāhūtahemāmburuhasārasaḥ ।। 

hemapādapaśākhāgrakṛtāmbhoruhakuṭmalaḥ ।
karañjajālajanitamandārakusumotkaraḥ ।। 

ratnayantramayānantadaityanirjitavāsavaḥ ।
himaśītānalajvālānirmitodyānamaṇḍapaḥ ।। [ MT]

sarvartukusumodyānajitanandananandanaḥ ।
māyāsarpahṛtavyālamalayācalacandanaḥ ।। 

hemastrīlokalāvaṇyajihmitāntaḥpurāṅganaḥ ।
krīḍārthaspardhayeśānahatacakragadādharaḥ ।। 

ajasroḍḍīnaratnaughatārāḍhyasvapurāmbaraḥ ।
nānākusumasambhārajānudaghnakṛtāṅganaḥ ।। 

niśāsv akhilapātālaśatacandranabhastalaḥ ।
svasālabhañjikālokagītigītaguṇotkaraḥ ।। 

māyairāvaṇanāgendravidrutāmaravāraṇaḥ ।
trailokyavibhavotkarṣapūritāntaḥpurāntaraḥ ।। 

sarvasampattisubhagas sarvaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ ।
samastadaityasāmantavanditāgryānuśāsanaḥ ।। 

mahābhujavanacchāyāviśrāntāsuramaṇḍalaḥ ।
sarvāmbudhiguhāsāraratnakuṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ ।। 

tasyotsāditadevasya kaṭhinoḍḍāmarākṛteḥ ।
babhūva vipulaṃ sainyam āsuraṃ suranāśanam ।। 

tasmin māyābale supte deśāntaragate tathā ।
tatsainyāntaram ājagmuś chidraṃ prāpya kilāmarāḥ ।। 

atha śambaradaityena dudrikahvadrumādayaḥ ।
rakṣārthaṃ mattasāmantās svasenāsu niyojitāḥ ।। 

tān apy antaram āsādya jaghnur gīrvāṇanāyakāḥ ।
vyomāntaracarāś śyenāḥ kalaviṅkān ivākulān ।। 

senāpatīn punaś cānyāṃś cakārāsurasattamaḥ ।
capalān udbhaṭārāvāṃs taraṅgān iva sāgaraḥ ।। 

devās tān api tasyāśu jaghnus tena sa kopavān ।
jagāmāmaranāśāya paripūrṇas triviṣṭapam ।। 

tatrāsya māyābhītās te surā antardhim āyayuḥ ।
merukānanakuñjeṣu mṛgā gaurīguror iva ।। 

krandatkṣudrāmaragaṇaṃ bāṣpaklinnasurīmukham ।
śūnyaṃ dadarśa sa svargaṃ kalpakṣīṇajagatsamam ।। 

vihṛtya kupitas tatra labdham āhṛtya śambaraḥ ।
lokapālapurīr dagdhvā jagāmātmīyam ālayam ।। 

evaṃ dṛḍhatarībhūte dveṣe dānavadevayoḥ ।
devās svargaṃ parityajya dikṣu jagmur adarśanam ।। 

atha śambaradaityena ye ye senādhināyakāḥ ।
kriyante yatnatas tāṃs tāñ jaghnur yatnaparās surāḥ ।। 

yāvad udvegam āpannaś śambaraḥ kopavān bhṛśam ।
tārṇo abhi vātam anala iva jajvāla cocchvasan ।। 

trailokyam api cānviṣya na devāṃl labdhavān atha ।
pareṇāpi prayatnena sukṛtānīva duṣkṛtī ।। 

sasarja māyayā ghorān asurāṃs trīn mahābalān ।
balarakṣārtham uditān kālān mūrtim ivāsthitān ।। 

nirmitā māyayā bhīmāḥ kalpapādapabāhavaḥ ।
udagus te mahākāyāḥ pakṣakṣubdhā ivādrayaḥ ।। 

dāmā vyālaḥ kaṭaś ceti nāmabhiḥ parilāñchitāḥ ।
yathāprāptaikakartāraś cetanāmātradharmiṇaḥ ।। 

abhāvāt karmaṇāṃ te ca prāktanānām avāsanāḥ ।
nirvikalpakacinmātraparispandaikakarmiṇaḥ ।। 

karmabījaṃ kalāṃ tanvīṃ dadhānā mananātmikām ।
apuṣṭāṃ kṛtrimām antar ādāyodayam āgatāḥ ।। 

pāramparyeṇa te hy atra kākatālīyavad bhaṭāḥ ।
prakṛtām anuvartante kriyām ujjhitavāsanāḥ ।। 

ardhasuptā yathā bālās svāṅgair iṅganti kevalam ।
vāsanātmābhimānābhyāṃ hīnās te tadvad eva hi ।। 

nābhipātaṃ na cāpātaṃ vidus te na palāyanam ।
na jīvitaṃ na maraṇaṃ na raṇaṃ ca jayājayau ।। 

kevalaṃ sainikān agre dṛṣṭvābhihananodyatān ।
abhijaghnuḥ parān ājau prahāradalitādrayaḥ ।। 

śambaraś cintayām āsa parituṣṭamanāḥ pure ।
vijeṣyate hi matsenā māyāsurasurakṣitā ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭābhir ete hi vāsanābhis samujjhitāḥ ।
tato raṇe bibhyati no vidravanti ca na sthirāḥ ।। 

yadaite na palāyante devair abhihatā api ।
tadaiṣātibalā senā mamedānīṃ vyavasthitā ।। 

atibalāsuradordrumapālitā mama camūs sthiratām alam eṣyati ।
amaravāraṇadantavighaṭṭaneṣv amaraparvatahemamahī yathā ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭotpattir nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nirṇīya daityendro dāmavyālakaṭānvitām ।
senāṃ sampreṣayām āsa bhūtalaṃ devanāśinīm ।। [ MT]

daityās sāgarakuñjebhyaḥ kandarebhyas surācalāt ।
udagur bhīmanirhrādās sapakṣagirilīlayā ।। 

rodasīkuharaṃ hastaprahārahatabhāskaram ।
dānavāḥ pūrayām āsur dāmavyālakaṭeritāḥ ।। 

athottasthur nikuñjebhyaḥ kandarebhyas surācalāt ।
pralayānta ivākṣubdhā bhītās svarvāsināṃ gaṇāḥ ।। 

devāsurapatākinyos tad yuddham abhavat tayoḥ ।
akālolbaṇakalpāntabhīṣaṇaṃ bhuvanāntare ।। 

petuḥ pralayaparyastasacandrārkādrivad divaḥ ।
śirāṃsi kuṇḍalodvāntatejaḥpītatamāṃsy adhaḥ ।। 

jughūrṇur bhaṭanirmuktasiṃhanādavirāvitāḥ ।
pralayānilasampūrais sāṭṭahāsā ivādrayaḥ ।। 

rejur ātmaśilātulyahetipātārtavṛttayaḥ ।
kulācalataṭā bhītavibhrāntaharimaṇḍalāḥ ।। 

teruḥ parasparāghātahatahetisamutthitāḥ ।
lolānalakaṇāḥ kalpaviśīrṇā iva tārakāḥ ।। 

vilesū raktamāṃsaughapūrṇaikārṇavatīragāḥ ।
kalpatālatanūttālā vetālās tāratālinaḥ ।। 

prasphuradrudhirāsāraśāntapāṃsupayodhare ।
vyomni hetihatakṣuṇṇamaulikuṇḍalakoṭayaḥ ।। 

babhūvur bhāskarākāraiḥ kalpapādapabāhubhiḥ ।
prahāradalitādrīndrair daityair nirvivarā diśaḥ ।। 

jagmur jvaladasivrātapātapāṭitabhittayaḥ ।
kaṇaprakaratāṃ śailāḥ kalpāgnivalitā iva ।। 

devās tejas samājagmur aśvamedhaidhitā iva ।
asurān anusasrus tāñ jaladān iva vāyavaḥ ।। 

jagṛhus tān athākramya jaradākhūn ivotavaḥ ।
rejus surāsurāḥ phullavanalolādrivad divi ।। 

te anyo'nyaṃ pūrayām āsuś śastrapūrair diśo daśa ।
vanāni kusumavrātais sumeror iva mārutāḥ ।। 

ghoraṃ samabhavad yuddhaṃ devadānavasainyayoḥ ।
rodorandhroḍumbarāntar mahāmaṣakasaṅghayoḥ ।। 

athodapatad unnāsair lokapālebhamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
kalpābhraiḥ pūritākāro dāruṇas samarāravaḥ ।। 

piṇḍagraheṇa nabhasi bhūbhāga iva kuṭṭimam ।
muṣṭigrāhyo mahāmeghamantharodarapīvaraḥ ।। 

prathamāpātasampiṣṭaśastraśailaraṭattaṭaḥ ।
sphuṭaddhṛdayanissattvakarkaśākrandaghargharaḥ ।। 

pralayapratyayollāsikalpābhrāravabṛṃhaṇaḥ ।
dvādaśādityasaṅghaṭṭadravatkāñcanasannibhaḥ ।। 

brahmāṇḍakuḍyasaṅghaṭṭāt parāvṛtyāvaniṃ gataḥ ।
mahāsrotaḥpayaḥpūras setvāhata ivākaram ।। 

calatsapakṣaśailendrapakṣavātabaladhvaniḥ ।
kaṭhināpūraṇoḍḍīnasphuṭacchailendrakandaraḥ ।। 

mandaroddhūtadugdhābdhisaṅkṣobhasadṛśāṃśakaḥ ।
pratiśrudghuṅghumāsphoṭaghaṭṭitadvīpajantubhūḥ ।। 

senayoḥ kruddhayor āsīd yuddham uddhatadānavam ।
niṣpiṣṭanagaragrāmagirikānanamānavam ।। 

mahāhetiśatacchinnadānavācalapūrṇadik ।
anyo'nyahatahetyadricūrṇapūrṇāmbarodaram ।। 

bhusuṇḍīmaṇḍalāsphoṭasphuṭanmeruśiraśśatam ।
śaramārutanirlūnadaityadevāsurāmbujam ।। 

cakrāvartaśatabhrāntadevadaityajarattṛṇam ।
senāpravāhakallolavalanāvalitāmbaram ।। 

hetyadripātaniṣpiṣṭapatadvaimānikavrajam ।
hastānītābdhivāryoghaplāvitavyomapattanam ।। 

vahanmahāstrāvartāsiśūlaśaktinadīśatam ।
śailapakṣodbhaṭāsphoṭajaḍabrahmāṇḍamaṇḍapam ।। 

daityapārṣṇiprahāraughapatallokeśapattanam ।
nārīhalahalārāvaravatkanakamandiram ।। 

luṭhaddaityācaloddhūtamattārṇavajalādribhiḥ ।
dhautaraktanabhoyodhamuktanādadravadvrajam ।। 

lokapānekapāmbhodacchannacchannāryamānvitam ।
punas surāsuroddyotair dṛṣṭasainyakulākulam ।। 

sapakṣaparvatākāradānavādrigamāgamaiḥ ।
vahatpacapacāśabdabhūribhāṅkarabhīṣaṇam ।। 

āyudhādrivibhinnāgradaityaparvatanirjharaiḥ ।
raktair aruṇitāśeṣavasudhārṇavaparvatam ।। 

utsannarāṣṭranagaravipinagrāmagahvaraiḥ ।
vṛtāsaṅkhyāsurebhāśvamanuṣyarathaparvatam ।। 

sutālottālanārācarājirecitacāraṇam ।
kalpābhrapaṭalāsāradhārādalitaparvatam ।। 

muṣṭiprahārapiṣṭāṃsamattairāvaṇavāraṇam ।
mahāśaniviniṣpeṣapiṣṭoḍḍīnakulācalam ।। 

kupitāgnijvalajjvālājālair jvalitadānavam ।
ekāñjalipuṭānītasamudrotsāditānalam ।। 

cāndraśaityādisambhāraśilīkṛtamahājalam ।
vanavyūhendhanāgnyarcirdrāvitāmbuśiloccayam ।। 

astranirmitadurvāratamaḥkalpāntarātrikam ।
māyāsūryagaṇoddyotapītātanutamaḥpaṭam ।। 

māyāgnivarṣanipatatkalpāntagaṇavarṣaṇam ।
sadhrīṅkārāgnipavanaśastrasaṅghaṭṭakarṣaṇam ।। 

vajravarṣavinirdhūtaśailavarṣāstrasambhavam ।
nidrābodhāstrayuddhāḍhyaṃ savarṣāvagrahāstrakam ।। 

vahatkrakacavṛkṣāstraṃ jalāgnyastraraṇānvitam ।
brahmāstrayuddhaviṣamaṃ tamastejo'straśāritam ।। 

astrodgīrṇāyudhānīkanīrandhrasakalāmbaram ।
śilāvarṣāstravalitaṃ vahnivarṣāstrabhāsuram ।। 

patākāmṛṣṭaśaśikaiś cakracītkāragarjitaiḥ ।
muhūrtena rathair laṅghitodayāstamayācalam ।। 

vajraprahārāviratamriyamāṇamahāsuram ।
śukrāmaramahāvidyājāyamānāparāsuram ।। 

śubhagrahamahāketupālitānām itas tataḥ ।
utpātamaṅgalaughānāṃ yuddhair uddhatakandharam ।। 

sādrikhorvīsamudradyu jagad rudhiravāribhiḥ ।
phullaikakiṃśukavanaṃ kurvad durvāravairataḥ ।। 

parvatapratimāsaṅkhyaśavapūrṇamahārṇavam ।
samagrataruśākhāṃsalambalolamahāśavam ।। 

nīyamānais svavātāktaiḥ pakṣapuṣpalasatphalaiḥ ।
tālottālaiś śaravrātavanair vyāptanabhastalam ।। 

parvatapratimāsaṅkhyakabandhavanabāhubhiḥ ।
nṛtyadbhiḥ patitāmbhodavimānasuratārakam ।। 

śaraśaktigadāprāsapaṭṭisaprotaparvatam ।
lokasaptakavibhraṣṭakuḍyakhaṇḍācitāmbaram ।। 

anāratarasanmattakalpābhradṛḍhadundubhi ।
pṛṣṭhaśabdaśravonnādapātālatalavāraṇam ।। 

vināyakakarākṛṣṭadīrghadānavaparvatam ।
ekadiktaṭanisspandasiddhasādhyamarudgaṇam ।। 

palāyamānagandharvakinnarāmaracāraṇam ।
śavībhūtakṣatakṣīṇapatadgandharvanāyakam ।। 

kiñcillabdhajayaprāyadaityadānavamaṇḍalam ।
dūyamānasurānīkam ekāntodvignavāsavam ।। 

uttarāśāmiladvahniraktahetibṛhatprabham ।
pratikṣaṇaṃ lasaddāhaprakāśatimirolbaṇam ।। 

vavur aśaninipātapiṇḍitāṅgā dalitaśilāśakalā diśāṃ mukheṣu ।
pralayasamayasūcakās surāṇām urutaraghargharaghasmarās samīrāḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭasaṅgrāmavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne ghore samarasambhrame ।
devāsuraśarīreṣu patatsv adridaleṣv iva ।। [ MT]

vahatsv asṛkpravāheṣu gaṅgāpūreṣv ivāmbarāt ।
dāmni veṣṭitadevaughe muktakṣveḍāghanārave ।। 

vyāle nijakarākṛṣṭipiṣṭasarvasurālaye ।
kaṭe kaṭhinasaṃrambhasaṅgarācchāditāmare ।। 

airāvaṇe kṣīṇamade palāyanaparāyaṇe ।
pravṛddhe dānavānīke madhyāhna iva bhāskare ।। 

patitārdhāyudhāṅgāni prasravadrudhirāṇi ca ।
payāṃsīva visetūni devasainyāni dudruvuḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭās tāni ciram antarhitāny api ।
anujagmur lasannādam indhanānīva pāvakāḥ ।। 

anviṣṭān api yatnena nālabhantāsurās surān ।
ghanajālavanoḍḍīnān siṃhā hariṇakān iva ।। 

alabdheṣv amaraugheṣu dāmavyālakaṭās tadā ।
jagmuḥ pātālakośasthaṃ prabhuṃ pramuditāśayāḥ ।। 

atha devā viṣaṇṇās te kṣaṇam āśvasya vai yayuḥ ।
jayopāyāya vijitā brahmāṇam amitaujasam ।। 

teṣām āvirabhūd brahmā raktaraktānanaśriyām ।
sāyaṃ raktīkṛtāmbūnām abdhīnām iva candramāḥ ।। 

praṇamya te surās tasmai tam arthaṃ śambareritam ।
samyak prakathayām āsur dāmavyālakaṭakramam ।। 

tam ākarṇyākhilaṃ brahmā vicārya ca vicāravit ।
uvācedaṃ surānīkam āśvāsanakaraṃ vacaḥ ।। 

brahmā

hanta varṣasahasrānte śambareṇa hareḥ kramāt ।
martavyam amareśasya tatkālaṃ sampratīkṣyatām ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭān etān adya tv amarasattamāḥ ।
yodhayantaḥ palāyadhvaṃ māyāyuddhena dānavān ।। 

yuddhābhyāsavaśād eṣāṃ makurāṇām ivāśaye ।
ahaṅkāracamatkāraḥ pratibimbam upaiṣyati ।। 

gṛhītavāsanās tv ete dāmavyālakaṭās surāḥ ।
sujayā vo bhaviṣyanti jālalagnāḥ khagā iva ।। 

adya tv avāsanā ete sukhaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ ।
dhairyeṇārīn vinighnanto devadurjayatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

vāsanātantubaddhā ye āśāpāśavaśīkṛtāḥ ।
vaśyatāṃ yānti te loke rajjubaddhāḥ khagā iva ।। 

ye hi nirvāsanā dhīrās sarvatrāsaktabuddhayaḥ ।
na hṛṣyanti na kupyanti durjayās te mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

yasyāntarvāsanārajjvā granthibandhaś śarīriṇaḥ ।
mahān api bahujño api sa bālenāpi jīyate ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ me tad ity ākalitakalpanaḥ ।
āpadāṃ pātratām eti payasām iva sāgaraḥ ।। 

iyanmātraparicchinno yenātmābhavyabhāvitaḥ ।
sa sarvajño api sarvatra parāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

anantasyāprameyasya yeneyattā prakalpitā ।
ātmatattvasya tenātmā svātmanaivāvaśīkṛtaḥ ।। 

ātmano vyatiriktaṃ yat kiñcid asti jagattraye ।
tatropādeyabhāvena baddhā bhavati bhāvanā ।। 

āsthāmātram anantānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ viduḥ ।
anāsthāmātram abhitas sukhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ viduḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭā yāvad anāsthā bhāvasaṃsthitau ।
tāvan na nāma jeyā vo maṣakāṇām ivānilāḥ ।। 

antarvāsanayā jantur dīnatām anuyātayā ।
jito bhavaty anyathā tu maṣako apy amarācalaḥ ।। 

vidyate vāsanā yatra tatra cāyāti dīnatā ।
guṇāguṇānuviddhatvaṃ sato dṛṣṭaṃ hi nāsataḥ ।। 

ayaṃ so ahaṃ mamedaṃ cety evam antas svavāsanām ।
yathā dāmādayaś śakra bhāvayanti tathā kuru ।। 

yā yā janasya vipado bhāvābhāvadaśāś ca yāḥ ।
tṛṣṇākarañjavallyās tā mañjaryaḥ kaṭukomalāḥ ।। 

vāsanātantubaddho ayaṃ loko viparivartate ।
sā suvṛddhātiduḥkhāya sukhāyocchedam āgatā ।। 

dhīro apy atibahujño api kulajo api mahān api ।
tṛṣṇayā badhyate jantus siṃhaś śṛṅkhalayā yathā ।। 

dehapādapasaṃsthasya hṛdayālayaśāyinaḥ ।
tṛṣṇā cittakhagasyāsya vāgurā parikalpitā ।। 

dīno vāsanayā lokaḥ kṛtāntenāpakṛṣyate ।
rajjveva bālena khago vivaśo aniśam ucchvasan ।। 

alam āyudhabhāreṇa saṅgarabhramaṇena ca ।
vāsanāṃ saviparyāsāṃ yuktyaiva tvaṃ ripoḥ kuru ।। 

antarakṣubhite dhairye ripor amaranāyakāḥ ।
na śastrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na cāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭās tv ete yuddhābhyāsavaśena ca ।
ahaṅkāramayīm antas te grahīṣyanti vāsanām ।। 

yadi te yantrapuruṣāś śambareṇa vinirmitāḥ ।
vāsanāṃ nāśrayiṣyanti yāsyanti tad ajayyatām ।। 

tat tāvad yuktiyuddhena tān prabodhayatāmarāḥ ।
yāvad abhyāsavaśato bhaviṣyanti savāsanāḥ ।। 

tato vadhyā bhaviṣyanti bhavatāṃ baddhabhāvanāḥ ।
tṛṣṇāprotāśayā loke na kecana napelavāḥ ।। 

samaviṣamam idaṃ jagat samagraṃ samupagataṃ sthiratāṃ svavāsanātaḥ ।
calati ca laharībharo yathābdhāv ata iha saiva cikitsyatāṃ prayātā ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭopākhyāne pitāmahavākyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā bhagavān devas tatraivāntardhim āyayau ।
velāvanataṭe śabdaṃ kṛtvevāmbutaraṅgakaḥ ।। [ MT]

surās tv ākarṇya tadvākyaṃ jagmus svām abhito diśam ।
kamalāmodam ādāya vanamālām ivānilāḥ ।। 

dināni katicit sveṣu kānteṣu sthirakāntiṣu ।
dvirephā iva padmeṣu mandireṣu viśaśramuḥ ।। 

kañcit kālaṃ samāsādya svātmodayakaraṃ śubham ।
cakrur dundubhinirghoṣaṃ pralayābhraravopamam ।। 

atha daityais saha vyomni taiḥ pātālatalotthitaiḥ ।
kālakṣepakaraṃ ghoraṃ punar yuddham avartata ।। 

vavur asiśaraśaktimudgaraughā musulagadāparaśūgracakrasaṅghāḥ ।
aśanigiriśilāhutāśavṛkṣā ahigaruḍādimukhāni cāyudhāni ।। 

māyākṛtāyudhamahāmbughanapravāhā kṣipraṃ prati pratidiśaṃ parinirjagāma ।
pāṣāṇaparvatamahītaṭavṛkṣalakṣakṣubdhāmbupūraghanaghoṣavatī nadī drāk ।। 

madhyapravāhavahadulmukaśūlaśailaprāsāsikuntaśaratomaramudgareṇa ।
gaṅgopamāmbuvalitāmaramandireṇa sarvāsu dikṣv aśanivarṣaṇakarṣaṇena ।। 

pṛthvyādidāruṇaśarīramayī prahāradānagrahe gaganaraśmiśarīrakaiva ।
yā yopaśāmyati surāsurasiddhasenā māyākṛtā punar udeti rasena saiva ।। 

śailopamāyudhavighaṭṭitabhūdharāṇi raktāmbupūraparipūrṇamahārṇavāni ।
devāsurendrasuraśailavirūḍhakuntatālīvanāni kakubhāṃ vadanāny athāsan ।। 

udgīrṇakuntaśaraśaktigadāsicakrā helānigīrṇasuradānavamuktaśailā ।
kāṣakvaṇatkrakacadantanakhogramālā jīvānvitāpatad athāyasasiṃhavṛṣṭiḥ ।। 

ujjvālalocanaviṣajvalanātapodyaddigdāhadarśitayugāntadineśasenā ।
uḍḍīyamānaparidīrghamahīmahīdhrā mattābdhivad viṣadharāvalir ullalāsa ।। 

unnādavajramakarotkarakarkarāntarikṣābdhivīcivalayair valitācalendraiḥ ।
āsīj jagat sakalam eva susaṅkaṭāṅgam āvartibhir vividhahetinadīpravāhaiḥ ।। 

śailāstraśastragaruḍācalamālitoccanāgāṅganāsuragaṇāṅganam antarikṣam ।
āsīt kṣaṇaṃ jaladhibhiḥ kṣaṇam agnipūraiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dinakaraiḥ kṣaṇam andhakāraiḥ ।। 

garuḍaguḍaguḍākulāntarikṣapravisṛtahetihutāśaparvataughaiḥ ।
jagad abhavad asahyakalpakālajvalitasurālayabhūtalāntarālam ।। 

udapatan vasudhātalato asurā gaganam adritaṭād iva pakṣiṇaḥ ।
atibalād apatan vibudhā bhuvi pralayacālitaśailaśilā iva ।। 

śarīrarūḍhonnatahetivṛkṣavanāvalīlagnamahāgnidāhāḥ ।
surāsurāḥ prāpur athāmbarāntaḥ kalpānilāndolitaśailaśobhām ।। 

surāsurādrīndraśarīramuktai raktapravāhair abhito bhramadbhiḥ ।
babhāra pūrṇaṃ parito ambarābdhis sandhyāruṇodyacchatagaṅgam aṅgam ।। 

girivarṣaṇam ambuvarṣaṇaṃ vividhogrāyudhavarṣaṇaṃ tathā ।
viṣamāśanivarṣaṇaṃ ca te śamam anyo'nyam athāgnivarṣaṇam ।। 

anayan nayamārgakovidā dalitāśeṣagirīndrabhittayaḥ ।
sasṛjuś ca samaṃ samantataḥ kakubaṅgeṣv iva puṣpavarṣaṇam ।। 

devāsurās sarasasaṅgarasambhramārtā anyo'nyam aṅgadalanākulahetihastāḥ ।
dāmendraḍimbadahanāḥ pṛthupīṭhapīṭhaiḥ kīrṇāsṛjo nabhasi babhramur ākṣipantaḥ ।। 

chinnaiś śiraḥkarabhujorubharair bhramadbhir ākāśakośaśalabhair aśivais tadānīm ।
āsīj jagajjaṭharam abhravarair ivograir ābhāskaraṃ sthagitadiktaṭaśailajālam ।। 

mattānalaṃ kṣubdhajalānilārkaṃ daladvanaṃ śīrṇasurāsuraugham ।
brahmāṇḍam ākhaṇḍitakuḍyakoṇam akālakalpāntakarālam āsīt ।। 

bhrāntaṃ bhṛśaṃ bhramitadiktaṭam adrikūṭair ātmapramāṇaghanahetihatai raṇadbhiḥ ।
kūjadbhir ārtibhir ivograguhaughavātaiḥ krandadbhir āpatitasiṃharavair adabhraiḥ ।। 

māyānadījaladhiyodhaghanāgnidāhair vṛkṣais surāsuraśavair acalaiś śilaughaiḥ ।
bhrāntaṃ śirastraśaraśaktigadāstraśastrair vātāvakīrṇavanaparṇavad ambarāntaḥ ।। 

adrīndrapakṣaparimāṇagamāgamaikadurvārahastataladāruṇatāḍanair drāk ।
āsīt patadbhaṭaśarīragirīndraghātavibhraṣṭadevapurapūrṇajalārṇavaughaḥ ।। 

ghanaghuṅghumapūritāntarikṣā kṣatajākṣālitabhūdharāntarālā ।
rudhirahradavṛttivartinī vā bhuvanābhogaguhā tadākulābhūt ।। 

anantadikprasaravikārakāriṇī kṣayodayonmukhasukhaduḥkhadāyinī ।
raṇakriyāsurasurasaṅghasaṅkaṭā tadābhavat khalu sadṛśīha saṃsṛteḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭopākhyāne punaryuddhavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evamprāyākulārambhair asurair asuhāribhiḥ ।
mahāsāhasasaṃrabdhair ārabdhamaraṇai raṇaiḥ ।। [ MT]

māyayātha vivādena sandhinā vigraheṇa ca ।
palāyanena dhairyeṇa cchadmanopāyanena ca ।। 

kārpaṇyenāstrayuddhena svāntardhānaiś ca bhūriśaḥ ।
kṛtas sa samaro devais triṃśad varṣāṇi pañca ca ।। 

varṣāṇi divasān māsān daśāṣṭau pañca sapta ca ।
varṣāṇi petur vṛkṣāgnihetyambvaśanibhūbhṛtām ।। 

etāvatā tu kālena dṛḍhābhyāsād ahaṅkṛteḥ ।
dāmādayo aham ity āsthāṃ jagṛhur grastacetasaḥ ।। 

naikaṭyātiśayād yadvad darpaṇaṃ bimbavad bhavet ।
abhyāsātiśayāt tadvat te apy ahaṅkāritāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

yadvad dūrataraṃ vastu nādarśe pratibimbate ।
padārthavāsanā tadvad anabhyāsān na jāyate ।। 

yadā dāmādayo jātā jātāhaṅkāravāsanāḥ ।
tadā me jīvitaṃ me artha iti dainyam upāgaman ।। 

bhayavāsanayā grastā mohavāsanayā hatāḥ ।
āśāpāśanibaddhās te tataḥ kṛpaṇatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

mudhaiva hy anahaṅkārair mamatvam upakalpitam ।
rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvam iva dāmavyālakaṭais tataḥ ।। 

āpādamastakaṃ dehalateyaṃ bhavatu sthirā ।
mameti tṛṣṇākṛpaṇā dīnatāṃ te samāyayuḥ ।। 

sthiro bhavatu me dehas sukhāyāstu dhanaṃ mama ।
iti baddhadhiyāṃ teṣāṃ dhairyam antardhim āyayau ।। 

avāsanatvād vapuṣām anāsthatvāt suradviṣām ।
yābhūt prahāraparatā mārjitaivāśu sābhavat ।। 

kathaṃ sthirā jagaty asmin bhavema iti cintayā ।
vedhitā dīnatāṃ jagmuḥ padmā iva nirambhasaḥ ।। 

teṣāṃ tv arthānnapāneṣu svāhaṅkṛtimatāṃ ratiḥ ।
babhūva bhavabhāvasthā bhīṣaṇā bhavabhāginī ।। 

atha tasmin raṇe bhītyā sāpekṣatvam upāyayuḥ ।
mattebhagaṇasaṃrabdhā vane hariṇakā iva ।। 

mariṣyāmo mariṣyāma iti cintāhatāśayāḥ ।
mandaṃ mandaṃ kila bhremuḥ kupitairāvaṇe raṇe ।। 

śarīraikārthināṃ teṣāṃ bhītānāṃ maraṇād ati ।
alpasattvatayā mūrdhni kṛtam āpatpradaṃ padam ।। 

atha pramlānasattvās te hantum agragataṃ bhaṭam ।
na śekur indhanakṣīṇā havir dagdhum ivāgnayaḥ ।। 

vibudhānāṃ praharatāṃ sudasyutvam upāgatāḥ ।
kṣatavikṣatasarvāṅgās tasthus sāmānyavadbhaṭāḥ ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena maraṇād bhītacetasaḥ ।
daityā deveṣu valgatsu dudruvus samarājirāt ।। 

teṣu dravatsu sarveṣu sarvato dānavādriṣu ।
dāmavyālakaṭākhyeṣu vikhyāteṣv asurālaye ।। 

taddaityasainyam apatat khād vidrutam itas tataḥ ।
kalpāntapavanādhūtaṃ tārājālam ivābhitaḥ ।। 

amarācalakuñjeṣu śikharāṇāṃ śilāsu ca ।
taṭeṣu vārirāśīnāṃ payodapaṭaleṣu ca ।। 

sāgarāvartagarteṣu śvabhreṣv atha saritsu ca ।
jaṅgaleṣu diganteṣu jvalatsu vipineṣu ca ।। 

tadraṇotsannakośeṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca ।
aṭavīṣūgrayakṣāsu maruṣūdyaddavāgniṣu ।। 

lokālokācalānteṣu parvateṣu hradeṣu ca ।
andhradramiḍakāśmīrapārasīkapureṣu ca ।। 

nānāmbhodhitaraṅgāsu gaṅgājalaghaṭāsu ca ।
dvīpāntareṣu dūreṣu jambūṣaṇḍalatāsu ca ।। 

sarvataḥ parvatākārāḥ patitās te surārayaḥ ।
visphoṭitāṅgacaraṇā vibhinnakarabāhavaḥ ।। 

śākhālagnāntratantrīkā muktaraktavahacchaṭāḥ ।
vyastāṅgakhuramūrdhāno niṣkrāntakupitekṣaṇāḥ ।। 

svāyudhāvalanāvegacchinnakaṅkaṭahetayaḥ ।
dūrāpātaviparyastapatannānāvidhāṃśukāḥ ।। 

kaṇṭhalagnaśirastrāṇakhaṭatkārograbhītayaḥ ।
śilāśitaśikhāprotadehabhāgāvalambinaḥ ।। 

śalmalyagradṛḍhāpātaprotakaṅkaṭaśaṅkavaḥ ।
suśilāphalakāsphālaśatadhāśīrṇamastakāḥ ।। 

sarva eva sakalāsu saśastrāḥ pātamātrasamanantaram eva ।
dikṣu nāśam agamann asurendrāḥ pāṃsavo ambudhigatāḥ payasīva ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭopākhyāne asuraparibhraṃśo nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti tuṣṭeṣu deveṣu dānaveṣu hateṣu ca ।
dāmavyālakaṭā dīnā babhūvur bhayavihvalāḥ ।। [ MT]

jajvāla jvalitaḥ kopī kalpāntāgnir iva jvalan ।
śambaraś śamitānīko dāmavyālakaṭān prati ।। 

śambarasya bhayād gatvā pātālam atha saptamam ।
dāmavyālakaṭās tasthus tyaktvā dānavamaṇḍalam ।। 

yamasya kiṅkarās tatra vetālatrāsanakṣamāḥ ।
kukuhā nāma tiṣṭhanti narakārṇavapālakāḥ ।। 

cintā iva ghanākārā duhitṝs tu kramād daduḥ ।। 

tais sārdhaṃ nītavantas te tatra dāmādayo avadhim ।
daśavarṣasahasrāntām āttānantakuvāsanāḥ ।। 

iyaṃ me vanitā ramyā mameyaṃ prabhuteti ca ।
kukuhasnehabaddhānāṃ kālas teṣāṃ vyavartata ।। 

dharmarājo atha taṃ deśaṃ kadācit samupāyayau ।
mahānarakakāryāṇāṃ vicārārthaṃ yadṛcchayā ।। 

aparijñātam enaṃ te dharmarājaṃ trayo asurāḥ ।
na praṇemur vināśāya sāmānyam iva kiṅkaram ।। 

atha vaivasvatenaite jvalitaśvabhrabhūmiṣu ।
vihitabhrūparispandam ādeśena niveśitāḥ ।। 

tatra te karuṇākrandās sasuhṛddārabāndhavāḥ ।
dagdhās saparṇaviṭapā vṛkṣā iva davānalaiḥ ।। 

svayā vāsanayā jātās tathaiva krūrayā punaḥ ।
vadhakarmakarākārāḥ kairātā rājakiṅkarāḥ ।। 

taj janmātha parityajya jātās suhmeṣu vāyasāḥ ।
tadante gṛdhratāṃ yātās tato api bakatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

śavaratvaṃ trigarteṣu meṣatvaṃ barbareṣu ca ।
magadheṣv atha kīṭatvaṃ cakrus te vakrabuddhayaḥ ।। 

anubhūyetarām atra citrāṃ yoniparamparām ।
adya matsyās sthitā rāma kaśmīrāraṇyapalvale ।। 

dāvāgnikvathitālpālpapaṅkakalkānupāyinaḥ ।
na mriyante na jīvanti jarajjambālajarjarāḥ ।। 

vicitrayonisaṃrambham anubhūya punaḥ punaḥ ।
bhūtvā bhūtvā punar naṣṭās taraṅgā jaladhāv iva ।। 

bhavajaladhigatās te vāsanāvātanunnās tṛṇam iva ciram ūḍhā deharūpais taraṅgaiḥ ।
upaśamam anuyātā rāma nādyāpy anantaṃ parikalaya mahattvaṃ dāruṇaṃ vāsanāyāḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭajanmāntaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ataḥ prabodhāya tava vacmi rāma mahāmate ।
dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā te astv iti na līlayā ।। [ MT]

avivekānusandhānāc cittam āpadam īdṛśīm ।
anantataraduḥkhāya parigṛhṇāti līlayā ।। 

kva kilāmaravidhvaṃsiśambarānīkanāthatā ।
kva tāpataptajambālajalajarjaramīnatā ।। 

kva dhairyam amarānīkavidrāvaṇakaraṃ mahat ।
kva kirātamahīpālakṣudrakiṅkararūpatā ।। 

kva nāma nirahaṅkāracitsattvodāradhīratā ।
kva mithyāvāsanāveśād ahaṅkārakukalpanā ।। 

śākhāpratānagahanā saṃsāraviṣamañjarī ।
ahaṅkārāṅkurād eva samudetīyam ātatā ।। 

ahaṅkāram ato rāma mārjayāntaḥ prayatnataḥ ।
ahaṃ na kaścid eveti mārjayitvā sukhī bhava ।। 

ahaṅkārāmbudacchannaṃ paramārthendumaṇḍalam ।
rasāyanamayaṃ śītam adṛśyatvam upāgatam ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśācāttā dāmavyālakaṭās trayaḥ ।
gatās sattām asanto api māyāmāhātmyadānavāḥ ।। 

kaśmīreṣu mahāpadmasarasītīrapalvale ।
adya matsyās sthitā rāma śevālalavalālasāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
te hy asantaḥ kathaṃ santas sampannā iti me vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam etan mahābāho nāsad bhavati hi kvacit ।
kadācit kiñcid apy etad bṛhad bhavati vā tanu ।। 

kim asat sat sthitaṃ brūhi kiṃ tat sad vāpy asat sthitam ।
nidarśanenānenaiva kariṣye tvadvibodhanam ।। 

rāmaḥ

santa eva sthitās santo brahman vayam ime kila ।
dāmādayas tv asanto api vakṣi santas sthitā iti ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā dāmādayo rāma sthitā māyāmayā iha ।
asatyā eva satyābhā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbupūravat ।। 

tathaiveme vayam api sasurāsuradānavāḥ ।
asatyā eva valgāmo yāma āyāma eva ca ।। 

alīkam eva tvadbhāvo madbhāvo alīka eva ca ।
anubhūto apy asadrūpas svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

mṛto bandhur yathā svapne apy anubhūto apy asanmayaḥ ।
mṛto ayam iti ca jñaptir bhaved evam idaṃ jagat ।। 

eṣā hi mūḍhaviṣayā uktir eva na rājate ।
abhyāsena vinodeti nānubhūter apahnavaḥ ।। 

niścayo antaḥ prarūḍho yas sa yatnābhyasanaṃ vinā ।
nāśam āyāti loke asmin na kadācana kasyacit ।। 

idaṃ jagad asad brahma satyam ity eva vakti yaḥ ।
tam unmattam ivonmattā vimūḍhā vihasanty alam ।। 

akṣīvakṣīvayor aikyaṃ kva kilehājñatajjñayoḥ ।
andhaprakāśayor bodhe syāc chāyātapayor iva ।। 

yatnenāpy anubhūte arthe satye kartum apahnavam ।
tajjño ajñaś ca na śaknoti śava ākramaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

brahma sarvaṃ jagad iti vaktuṃ tajjñasya yujyate ।
yato avidyānanubhave sa tad evānubhūtavān ।। 

prabuddhaviṣaye hy eṣā rāma vāk pravirājate ।
buddhasyāsmīti rūpeṇa kila nāsty eva kiñcana ।। 

brahmaivedaṃ paraṃ śāntam ity evānubhavan sudhīḥ ।
apahnavas svānubhūteḥ kartuṃ tasya kva yujyate ।। 

parasmād vyatirekeṇa nāham ātmani kiñcana ।
hemanīvormikāditvaṃ na mayy asti vasiṣṭhatā ।। 

bhūtatvavyatirekeṇa mūḍho nātmani kiñcana ।
ūrmyādibuddhau hemeva nājñe asti paramārthatā ।। 

mithyāhantāmayo mūḍhas satyaikātmamayas sudhīḥ ।
yujyate na kvacin nāma svabhāvāpahnavo anayoḥ ।। 

yo yanmayas tasya tasmin yujyate apahnavaḥ katham ।
puruṣasya ghaṭo asmīti vākyam unmattataiva hi ।। 

tasmān neme vayaṃ satyā na ca dāmādayaḥ kvacit ।
asatyās te vayaṃ ceme nāsti naḥ khalu sambhavaḥ ।। 

satyasaṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bodhākāśaṃ nirañjanam ।
satyaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntam asty anastamitodayam ।। 

sarvaṃ sat tac ca niśśūnyaṃ nakiñcid iva saṃsthitam ।
tatra vyomni vibhāntīmā nijā bhāso aṅga dṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

yathā taimirikākṣasya sahajā eva dṛṣṭayaḥ ।
keśoṇḍukādivad bhānti tathemās tatra sṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

sa ātmānaṃ yathā vetti tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt ।
cidākāśas tato asatyam api satyaṃ tadīkṣaṇāt ।। 

na satyam api nāsatyam iha tasmāj jagattraye ।
yad yathā vetti cid rūpaṃ tat tathodety asaṃśayam ।। 

yathā dāmādayas tadvad eveme abhyuditā vayam ।
satyāsatyāḥ kim atrāṅga tān praty api vikalpanā ।। 

asyānantasya cidvyomnas sarvagasya nirākṛteḥ ।
cid udeti yathā yāntas tathā sā tatra bhāty alam ।। 

yatra dāmādirūpeṇa saṃvit prakacate svayam ।
tathāsau tatra sampannā tathākārānubhūtitaḥ ।। 

svasvapnapratibhāsasya jagad ity abhidhā kṛtā ।
cidvyomno vyomavapuṣas tāpasyeva mṛgāmbutā ।। 

yatra prabuddhaṃ cidvyoma tatra dṛśyābhidhā kṛtā ।
yatra suptaṃ tu tenaiva tatra mokṣābhidhā kṛtā ।। 

na ca tat kvacid āsuptaṃ na prabuddhaṃ kadācana ।
cidvyoma kevalaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagad ity avagamyatām ।। 

nirvāṇam eva sargaśrīs sargaśrīr eva nirvṛtiḥ ।
nānayoś śabdayor arthabhedaḥ paryāyayor iva ।। 

paramārthe jagad iti rūpaṃ vetti svayaṃ svakam ।
yathā taimirikaṃ cakṣuḥ keśoṇḍukam ivekṣitam ।। 

na tat keśoṇḍukaṃ kiñcit sā hi dṛṣṭis tathā sthitā ।
nedaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ kiñcid itthaṃ cidvyoma saṃsthitam ।। 

sarvatra sarvam idam asti yathānubhūtaṃ no kiñcana kvacid ihāsti ca nānubhūtam ।
śāntaṃ sad ekam idam ātatam ittham āste santyaktaśaṅkam apabhedam atas tvam āssva ।। 

śilodarākāraghanaṃ praśāntam mahācito rūpam idaṃ kham accham ।
naivāsti nāstīti dṛśau kvacit sto yac cāsti tat sādhu tad eva bhāti ।। 

nirvāṇaprakaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

satām apy asatām eva bālayakṣapiśācavat ।
dāmavyālakaṭādīnāṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।। [ MT]

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dāmavyālakaṭārthaṃ tais tadaiva yamakiṅkaraiḥ ।
prārthitena yamenoktam idaṃ śṛṇu raghūdvaha ।। 

yadā viyogam eṣyanti śroṣyanti ca nijāṃ kathām ।
dāmādayas tadā muktā bhaviṣyantīty asaṃśayam ।। 

rāmaḥ

svavṛttāntam imaṃ kutra kadā kathaya te katham ।
śroṣyanti bhagavan kena varṇyamānaṃ kathākramam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kaśmīreṣu mahāpadmasarasītīrapalvale ।
bhūyo bhūyo anubhūyaite matsyayoniparamparām ।। 

ālānitāśayā lolāḥ kālena layam āgatāḥ ।
tatraiva padmasarasi te bhaviṣyanti sārasāḥ ।। 

tatra kalhāramālāsu sarojapaṭalīṣu ca ।
śevālavaravallīṣu taraṅgavalanāsu ca ।। 

lalatkumudadolāsu nīlotpalalatāsu ca ।
śīkaraughābhralekhāsu śītalāvartavṛttiṣu ।। 

sarassārasasambhogān bhuktvā bhuvanabhūṣaṇāḥ ।
vihṛtya suciraṃ kālam alam āgataśuddhayaḥ ।। 

te viyuktā bhaviṣyanti muktaye labdhayuktayaḥ ।
rajassattvatamāṃsīva bhedaprāptyā yadṛcchayā ।। 

kaśmīramaṇḍalasyāntar nagaraṃ nagaśobhitam ।
nāmnādhiṣṭhānam ity etac chrīmat tatra bhaviṣyati ।। 

pradyumnaśikharaṃ nāma tasya madhye bhaviṣyati ।
śṛṅgaṃ laghu sarojasya kośacakram ivodare ।। 

tasmin mūrdhni girer gehaṃ ko api rājā kariṣyati ।
abhraṅkaṣamahāsālaṃ śṛṅge śṛṅgam ivāparam ।। 

gṛhasyeśānakoṇādriśirobhittivraṇodare ।
tasyāniśam aviśrāntavātoddhūtatṛṇāṅkite ।। 

ālaye dānavo vyālaḥ kalaviṅko bhaviṣyati ।
prathamālpaśrutacchāttra ivārtharahitāraṭiḥ ।। 

tasminn eva tadā kāle tatra rājā bhaviṣyati ।
śrīyaśaskaradevākhyaś svarge śakra ivāparaḥ ।। 

dānavo dāmanāmāntar maṣakas tasya sadmani ।
bhaviṣyati bṛhatstambhapṛṣṭhacchidre mṛdudhvaniḥ ।। 

adhiṣṭhānābhidhe tasminn evogranagare tadā ।
ratnāvalīvihārākhyo vihāro api bhaviṣyati ।। 

tasmiṃs tadbhūmipāmātyo narasiṃha iti śrutaḥ ।
karāmalakavad dṛṣṭabandhamokṣo bhaviṣyati ।। 

bhaviṣyati gṛhe tasya krīḍanakrakaraḥ khagaḥ ।
kaṭo māyāsuro nāma kṛtahiñjīrapañjaraḥ ।। 

sa nṛsiṃho nṛpāmātyaś ślokair viracitām imām ।
dāmavyālakaṭādīnāṃ kathayiṣyati saṅkathām ।। 

sa kaṭaḥ krakaraś śrutvā tāṃ kathāṃ saṃsmṛtātmabhūḥ ।
śāntamithyāhamaṃśo antaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇam eṣyati ।। 

pradyumnaśikharaprāntavāstavyaḥ kalaviṅkakaḥ ।
tathaitya svakathāṃ śrutvā paraṃ nirvāṇam eṣyati ।। 

rājamandiradārvantar vraṇavāstavyatāṃ gataḥ ।
maṣako api prasaṅgena śrutvā śāntim upaiṣyati ।। 

pradyumnaśṛṅgāc caṭako maṣako rājamandirāt ।
vihārāt krakaraś ceti mokṣam eṣyanti rāghava ।। 

eṣa te kathitas sarvo dāmavyālakaṭakramaḥ ।
māyeyam eva saṃsārī śūnyaivātyantabhāsurā ।। 

bhramayaty aparijñātā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbudhīr iva ।
saṃśāmyati parijñātā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbudhīr iva ।। 

mahato api padād evaṃ rāmājñānavaśād adhaḥ ।
patanti mohitā mūḍhā dāmavyālakaṭā iva ।। 

kva bhrūkṣepaviniṣpiṣṭamerumandarasahyatā ।
kva rājagṛhadārvantar vraṇe maṣakarūpatā ।। 

kva capeṭacchaṭāmātrapātitārkendubimbatā ।
kva pradyumnagirau gehabhittivraṇavihaṅgatā ।। 

kva puṣpalīlayālolakaratolitamerutā ।
kvārṣyaśṛṅge nṛsiṃhasya gṛhe krakarapotatā ।। 

cidākāśo hi mithyaiva rajasā rañjitaprabhaḥ ।
svarūpam atyajann eva virūpam iva budhyate ।। 

svayaiva vāsanābhrāntyā satyayevāpy asatyayā ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhyeva yāti jantur avāntaram ।। 

taranti te bhavāmbhodhiṃ svapravāhadhiyaiva ye ।
śāstreṇāsad idaṃ dṛśyam iti nirvāsanaṃ sthitāḥ ।। 

tārāravavikārīṇi śuṣkatarkamatāni ye ।
yānti śvabhrajalāny āśu nāśubhaṃ nāśayanti te ।। 

svānubhūtiprasiddhena mārgeṇāgamagāminā ।
na vināśo bhavaty aṅga gacchatāṃ patatām iva ।। 

idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād iti buddhimatāṃ matiḥ ।
svena daurbhāgyadainyena na bhasmāpy upatiṣṭhate ।। 

vetti nityam udārātmā trailokyam api yas tṛṇam ।
taṃ tyajanty āpadas sarvā rasateva jarattṛṇam ।। 

parisphurati yasyāntar nityaṃ sattvacamatkṛtiḥ ।
brāhmam aṇḍam ivākhaṇḍaṃ lokeśāḥ pālayanti tam ।। 

apy āpadi durantāyāṃ naiva rantavyam akrame ।
rāhur apy akrameṇaiva pibann apy amṛtaṃ mṛtaḥ ।। 

sacchāstrasādhusamparkam arkam ugraprakāśadam ।
ye śrayanti na te yānti mohāndhyasya punar vaśam ।। 

avaśyā vaśyam āyānti yānti sarvāpadaḥ kṣayam ।
avaśyaṃ bhavati śreyaḥ kreyaṃ yasya guṇair yaśaḥ ।। 

yeṣāṃ guṇeṣv asantoṣo arāgo yeṣāṃ śrutaṃ prati ।
saty avyasanino ye ca te narāḥ paśavo apare ।। 

yaśaścandrikayā yeṣāṃ bhāsitaṃ janahṛnnabhaḥ ।
teṣāṃ kṣīrasamudrāṇāṃ nūnaṃ mūrtau sthito hariḥ ।। 

bhuktaṃ bhoktavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭā draṣṭavyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
kim anyad bhavabhaṅgāya bhūyobhogeṣv alubdhatā ।। 

yathākramaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathācāraṃ yathāsthiti ।
sthīyatāṃ mucyatām antar bhogagārdhyam avāstavam ।। 

saṃstavaḥ kriyatāṃ kīrtyā guṇair gaganagāmibhiḥ ।
trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ na kadācana bhogakāḥ ।। 

gāyanti siddhasundaryo yeṣām indusitaṃ yaśaḥ ।
gītibhir gaganābhoge te jīvanti mṛtāḥ pare ।। 

paramaṃ pauruṣaṃ yatnam āsthāyādāya sūdyamam ।
yathāśāstram anudvegam ācārāt ko na siddhibhāk ।। 

yathāśāstraṃ viharatā tvarā kāryā na siddhiṣu ।
cirakālaparā pakvā siddhiḥ puṣṭatarā bhavet ।। 

vītaśokabhayāyāsam agardham apayantraṇam ।
vyavahāro yathāśāstraṃ kriyatāṃ mā vinaśyatām ।। 

jīvo jīrṇāndhakūpeṣu bhaveṣv antardhim āgataḥ ।
bhavatāṃ bhūribhaṅgānām adhunoddhriyatām ataḥ ।। 

itaḥ prabhṛti mā bhūyo gamyatām adharād adhaḥ ।
idaṃ nirdhāryatāṃ śāstram astram āpannivāraṇe ।। 

raṇe rabhasanirlūnavāraṇe prāṇam ujjhatām ।
kim arthamātrayā kāryam āryāś śāstram avekṣyatām ।। 

idaṃ bimbam idaṃ nimbam iti matyā vicāryatām ।
svayā parapreraṇayā yāta mā paśavo yathā ।। 

daurbhāgyadāyinī dīnā śubhahīnāvicāraṇā ।
ghanadīrghamahānidrā tyajyatāṃ samprabudhyatām ।। 

suptaṃ mā sthīyatāṃ vṛddhamandakacchapavac chanaiḥ ।
utthānam aṅgīkriyatāṃ jarāmaraṇaśāntaye ।। 

anarthāyārthasampattir bhogaugho bhavarogadaḥ ।
āpade sampadas sarvās sarvatrānādaro jayaḥ ।। 

lokatantrānusāreṇa vicārād vyavahāriṇām ।
śāstrācārāviruddhena karmaṇā śarma sidhyati ।। 

svācāracārucaritasya viviktavṛttes saṃsāraduḥkhalavasaukhyadaśāsv agṛdhnoḥ ।
āyur yaśāṃsi ca guṇāś ca sahaiva lakṣmyā phullanti mādhavalatā iva satphalāya ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭopākhyāne sadācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvātiśayasāphalyāt sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ।
sambhavaty eva tasmāt svaṃ śubhodyogaṃ na santyajet ।। 

mitrasvajanabandhūnāṃ nandinānandadāyinā ।
sarasīśānam ārādhya mṛtyur apy upanirjitaḥ ।। [ MT]

sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante devā api vimarditāḥ ।
dānavair dānavāryāḍhyair gajaiḥ padmākarā iva ।। 

maruttanṛpater yajñe saṃvartena maharṣiṇā ।
brahmaṇevāparas sargo racitas sasurāsuraḥ ।। 

mahātiśayayuktena viśvāmitreṇa vipratā ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prayuktena duṣprāpā tapasārjitā ।। 

piṣṭātakāmbu duṣprāpaṃ rasāyanam ivāśnatā ।
durbhagenedṛśenāptaḥ kṣīroda upamanyunā ।। 

trailokyamallāṃs tṛṇavan nighnan viṣṇvabjajādikān ।
yuktyātiśayadārḍhyena kālaś śvetena kālitaḥ ।। 

praṇayena yamaṃ jitvā kṛtvā vacanasaṅgaram ।
paralokād upānītas sāvitryā satyavān patiḥ ।। 

na so asty atiśayo loke yasyāsti na phalaṃ sphuṭam ।
bhavitavyaṃ vicāryātas sarvātiśayaśālinā ।। 

ātmajñānam aśeṣāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhadaśādṛśām ।
mūlaṅkaṣakaraṃ tasmād bhāvyaṃ tatrātiśāyinā ।। 

nānayopahatārthinyā dṛśyadṛṣṭyātiduṣṭayā ।
duḥkhād ṛte nirābādhaṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid avāpyate ।। 

aśamaḥ paramaṃ brahma śamaś ca paramaṃ padam ।
yady apy evaṃ tathāpy enaṃ praśamaṃ viddhi śaṅkaram ।। 

abhimānaṃ parityajya śamam āśritya śāśvatam ।
vicārya prajñayāryatvaṃ kuryāt sajjanasevanam ।। 

na tapāṃsi na tīrthāni na śāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ ।
saṃsārasāgarottāre sajjanāsevanaṃ yathā ।। 

lobhamoharuṣāṃ yasya tanutānudinaṃ bhavet ।
yathāśāstraṃ viharatas svakarmasu sa sajjanaḥ ।। 

adhyātmaviduṣas saṅgāt tasya sā dhīḥ pravartate ।
atyantābhāva evāsya yayā dṛśyasya dṛśyate ।। 

dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu param evāvaśiṣyate ।
anyābhāvavaśād āśu jīvas tatraiva līyate ।। 

na cotpannaṃ na caivāsīd dṛśyaṃ na ca bhaviṣyati ।
vartamāne api naivāsti param evāsty aveditam ।। 

etad yuktisahasreṇa darśitaṃ darśyate api ca ।
sarvair evānubhūtaṃ hi darśayiṣyāmi cādhunā ।। 

yathedam akhilaṃ śāntaṃ trijagat saṃvidambaram ।
idaṃ tattvaṃ tv asattvādi kuto atra syāt kathañcana ।। 

cic camatkurute cāru cañcalācañcalātmani ।
yat tayaiva tad evedaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate ।। 

trailokyarūpo anubhavaś cidādityāṃśumaṇḍalam ।
kva vendvaṃśumator bhedo nirvikatthana kathyatām ।। 

svabhāvato asyāś ciddṛṣṭer ye unmeṣanimeṣaṇe ।
jagadrūpānubhūtes tāv etāv astamayodayau ।। 

ahamartho aparijñātaḥ paramārthāmbare malaḥ ।
parijñāto ahamarthas tu paramārthāmbaraṃ bhavet ।। 

ahambhāvaḥ parijñāto nāhambhāvībhavaty alam ।
ekatām ambunevāmbu yāti cinnabhasātmanā ।। 

ahamādi jagad dṛśyaṃ kila nāsty eva vastutaḥ ।
avaśyam eva tat kasmāc chiṣyate ahaṃvicāriṇaḥ ।। 

bādhate dhyāmaladhiyām apiśāce piśācadhīḥ ।
śiśūnāṃ nāvadātāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ vicāraṇāt ।। 

cijjyotsnā yāvad evāntar ahaṅkāraghanāvṛtā ।
vikāsam eti no tāvat paramārthakumudvatī ।। 

pramārjite aham ity asmin pade sārthe svayaṃ citā ।
narakasvargamokṣāditṛṣṇāyāḥ kalpanaiva kā ।। 

hṛdi yāvad ahaṅkāravāridaḥ pravijṛmbhate ।
tāvad vikāsam āyāti tṛṣṇākuṭajamañjarī ।। 

ākramya cetanādityam ahaṅkārāmbude sthite ।
jāḍyam eva sthitiṃ yāti na prākāśyaṃ kathañcana ।। 

āsanno ayam ahaṅkāras svayaṃ mithyā prakalpitaḥ ।
duḥkhāyaiva na harṣāya bālasambhramayakṣavat ।। 

mudhaiva kalpito moham ahambhāvaḥ prayacchati ।
anantasaṃsārakaraṃ dāmādiṣv iva durmatau ।। 

ayaṃ so aham iti sphāramohād anyat paraṃ tamaḥ ।
anarthabhūtaṃ saṃsāre na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।। 

yat kiñcid idam āyāti sukhaduḥkham alātavat ।
tad ahaṅkāracakrasya pravikāsi vijṛmbhitam ।। 

ahaṅkārāṅkuraḥ kaṣṭo hṛdi yenādhiropitaḥ ।
sahasraśākhaṃ duśchedaṃ tasya saṃsṛtikānanam ।। 

ahambhāvo aṅkuro janmavṛkṣāṇām akṣayātmanām ।
mamedam iti vistīrṇās teṣām śākhās sahasraśaḥ ।। 

kacaṭā vātavisphoṭā bhānty arthā vāsanodayāḥ ।
vidāryadāruravavat taraṅgāravapaṅktivat ।। 

ahambhāvamahānābhiṃ tvam ahambhāvavarjitaḥ ।
saṃsāracakraṃ vahanād ātmanaḥ parirodhaya ।। 

ahambhāvatamo yāvat pumaraṇye vijṛmbhate ।
tāvad etā vivalganti cintāmattapiśācikāḥ ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśācena gṛhīto yo narādhamaḥ ।
na tantrāṇi na mantrāś ca tasyānāthasya śāntaye ।। 

rāmaḥ

cinmātre darpaṇākāre nirmale svātmani sthite ।
bimbaty ahaṅkṛtis tasmāt puṃsaḥ kevātra vācyatā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahaṅkāracamatkāro vastudharmo na rāghava ।
vāsanākṛta eṣo arthaḥ pumprayatnena śāmyati ।। 

nāhaṃ na ca mamārthaśrīs sukhaduḥkhe kutas sthite ।
iti bhāvānusandhānād ahaṅkāro na jāyate ।। 

mithyeyam indrajālaśrīḥ kiṃ me snehavirāgayoḥ ।
ity antar anusandhānād ahaṅkāro na jāyate ।। 

nāham ātmani nāpy asya dṛśyaśriya iti svayam ।
śāntena vyavahāreṇa nāhaṅkāraḥ pravardhate ।। 

ahaṃ hi jagad ity antar heyādeyadṛśoḥ kṣaye ।
samatāyāṃ prasannāyāṃ nāhaṅkāraḥ pravartate ।। 

rāmaḥ

kimākṛtir ahaṅkāraḥ kathaṃ santyajyate prabho ।
saśarīro aśarīraś ca tyakte tasmin kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

trividho rāghavāstīha tv ahaṅkāro jagattraye ।
dvau śreṣṭhāv itaras tyājyaś śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmi te ।। 

ahaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmāham acyutaḥ ।
nānyad astīti saṃvid yā paramā sā hy ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

mokṣāyaiṣā na bandhāya jīvanmuktasya vidyate ।
ahaṅkārābhidhā tv asyāḥ kalpitā na tu vāstavī ।। 

sarvasmād vyatirikto ahaṃ vālāgraśatakalpitaḥ ।
yadi vā saṃvid eṣāsau dvitīyāhaṅkṛtiḥ parā ।। 

mokṣāyaiṣā na bandhāya jīvanmuktasya vidyate ।
ahaṅkārābhidhā tv asyāḥ kalpitā na tu vāstavī ।। 

pāṇipādādimātro ayam aham ity eva niścayaḥ ।
ahaṅkāras tṛtīyo asau laukikas tuccha eva saḥ ।। 

varjya eṣa durātmāsau śatrur eṣa paras smṛtaḥ ।
anenābhihato jantur na bhūyaḥ parirohati ।। 

ripuṇānena balinā vividhādhipradāyinā ।
kharvīkṛtamatir lokas saṅkaṭeṣv eva majjati ।। 

anayā durahaṅkṛtyā bhāvāt santyaktayā ciram ।
śiṣṭāhaṅkāravāñ jantur bhagavān yāti muktatām ।। 

lokāhaṅkāradoṣasya vapur asmīti rūpiṇaḥ ।
na deho asmīti nirṇīyavarjanaṃ mahatāṃ matam ।। 

prathamau dvāv ahaṅkārāv aṅgīkṛtyāpy alaukikau ।
tṛtīyāhaṅkṛtis tyājyā laukikī duḥkhadāyinī ।। 

anayā durahaṅkṛtyā dāmavyālakaṭāḥ kila ।
tāṃ daśāṃ samanuprāptā yā kathāsv api duḥkhadā ।। 

rāmaḥ

tṛtīyāṃ laukikīm etāṃ tyaktvā cittād ahaṅkṛtim ।
kimbhāvaḥ puruṣo brahman prāpnuyād ātmane hitam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eṣā tāvat parityājyā tyaktvaitāṃ duḥkhadāyinīm ।
yathā yathā pumāṃs tiṣṭhet param eti tathā tathā ।। 

ete ahaṅkṛtidaśe pūrvokte bhāvayan yadi ।
tiṣṭhaty abhyeti paramaṃ tat padaṃ puruṣo anaghaḥ ।। 

atha te eva santyajya sarvāhaṅkṛtivivarjitaḥ ।
santiṣṭhate tathāpy uccaiḥpadam evādhirohati ।। 

sarvadā sarvayatnena laukikī durahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
paramānandabodhāya varjanīyā mahādhiyā ।। 

śarīrasthāmayāpuṇyadurahaṅkāravarjanāt ।
anyan na paramaṃ śreya etad eva paraṃ padam ।। 

bhāvād ahaṅkṛtiṃ tyaktvā sthūlām etāṃ hi laukikīm ।
tiṣṭhan vyavaharan vāpi na naraḥ prapataty adhaḥ ।। 

saṃśāntāhaṅkṛter jantor bhogarogā mahāmateḥ ।
na svadante sutṛptasya yathā prativiṣārasāḥ ।। 

bhogeṣv asvadamāneṣu puṃsaś śreyaḥ purogatam ।
kṣīṇe andhakāre kiṃ nāma manaso anyat pravartate ।। 

ahaṅkārānusandhānavarjanād eva rāghava ।
pauruṣaikaprayatnotthāt tīryate bhavasāgaraḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ na nāma mama kiñcid apīti matvā sarvaṃ ca me sakalam apy aham eva veti ।
labdhāspadāṃ manasi saṃvidam evam īḍyāṃ nītvā sthitiṃ param upaiti padaṃ mahātmā ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭopākhyāne ahaṅkāravicāro nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi dāmādiṣu gateṣv atha ।
yad vṛttaṃ śambarasyaiva nagare nagasannibhe ।। 

tathā gaganavibhraṣṭe samaste dhvastasaṃsthitau ।
vinaṣṭe śambarānīke śaradīvābhramaṇḍale ।। 

devanirjitasainyo asau nītvā katipayās samāḥ ।
punar devavadhodyuktaś cintayām āsa dānavaḥ ।। 

dāmādayas te racitā ye mayā māyayāsurāḥ ।
maurkhyāt tair bhāvitā yuddhe mithyaivāntar ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

idānīṃ saṃsṛjāmy anyān dānavān māyayoditān ।
tān athāpy ātmaśāstrajñān savivekān karomy aham ।। 

tatas tattvaparijñānān mithyā bhāvanayotthitam ।
nāhaṅkāraṃ prayāsyanti vijeṣyanti ca tān surān ।। 

iti sañcintya daityendras tādṛśān dānavādhipān ।
māyayotpādayām āsa budbudān iva vāridhiḥ ।। 

sarvajñā vedyavettāro vītarāgā gatainasaḥ ।
yathāprāptaikakartāro bhāvitātmāna uttamāḥ ।। 

bhīmo bhāso druṭa iti nāmabhiḥ parilāñchitāḥ ।
jagat tṛṇam ivāśeṣaṃ paśyantaḥ pāvanāśayāḥ ।। 

te sma daityā bhuvaṃ prāpya cchādayām āsur ambaram ।
garjanto hetitaḍitaḥ prāvṛṣīva payodharāḥ ।। 

ayudhyanta samaṃ devair api varṣagaṇān bahūn ।
vivekavaśato jagmur nāhaṅkāraṃ kadācana ।। 

teṣāṃ yāvad udety antar mamedam iti vāsanā ।
tāvat ko ayam ahaṃ ceti vicārād yāty asatyatām ।। 

asac charīraṃ cic chuddhā ko asāv aham iti sthitaḥ ।
vicārād ittham eteṣāṃ prodagur na bhayādayaḥ ।। 

asac charīraṃ nāstīdaṃ cic chuddhaivātmani sthitā ।
ahaṃ nāma na cānyo asti niścityety asurā babhuḥ ।। 

tatas tair nirahaṅkārair jarāmaraṇanirbhayaiḥ ।
prāptānukāribhir vīrair vartamānānuvartibhiḥ ।। 

asaktabuddhibhir nityaṃ hatānyair apy ahantṛbhiḥ ।
vāsanājālanirmuktaiḥ kṛtakāryair akartṛbhiḥ ।। 

prabhoḥ kāryam idaṃ kāryam iti saṅgaratatparaiḥ ।
vītarāgair gatadveṣais satataṃ samadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

sā daivī dānavais senā bhīmabhāsadruṭādibhiḥ ।
hatā bhuktā kṣatā pluṣṭā svāntraśrīr iva bhoktṛbhiḥ ।। 

bhīmabhāsadruṭakṣuṇṇā tato gīrvāṇavāhinī ।
paridudrāva vegena gaṅgeva himavaccyutā ।। 

sā surānīkinī devaṃ kṣīrodārṇavaśāyinam ।
jagāma śaraṇaṃ śailaṃ vātāntevābdamālikā ।। 

viṣṇur āśvāsayām āsa tāṃ bhītāṃ devavāhinīm ।
bhujagābhidrutām ekāṃ ramaṇīm iva nāyakaḥ ।। 

atha kṣīrodakuhare tāvat sā suravāhinī ।
uvāsa yāvad bhagavān arināśārtham udyayau ।। 

babhūva dāruṇaṃ yuddhaṃ śauriśambarayos tataḥ ।
akāla iva kalpāntas samuḍḍīnakulācalaḥ ।। 

śaśāma samare tasmin daityas sabalavāhanaḥ ।
nārāyaṇahato yātaś śambaro vaiṣṇavīṃ purīm ।। 

bhīmabhāsadruṭās te tu tasmin viṣamasaṅgare ।
viṣṇunaiva śamaṃ nītāḥ pavaneneva dīpakāḥ ।। 

te hi nirvāsanā eva yadā śāntim upāgatāḥ ।
tadaiteṣāṃ gatir jātā dīpānām iva śāmyatām ।। 

tasmād vāsanayā baddhaṃ muktaṃ nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ ।
rāma nirvāsanībhāvam āharāśu vivekataḥ ।। 

samyagālokanāt satyād vāsanā pravilīyate ।
vāsanāvilaye cetaś śamam āyāti dīpavat ।। 

na satyaṃ kiñcid eveha yadbhāvo bhāvayaty alam ।
nāsty eva bhāvanā tasmād ity etat samyagīkṣaṇam ।। 

vāsanācittanāmānau śabdāv arthasamanvitau ।
satyāvalokanād yatra vilīnau tat paraṃ padam ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ kaḥ kiṃ bhāvayatu kva vā ।
bhāvanā nāma nāsty eva etat tat samyagīkṣaṇam ।। 

vāsanāvalitaṃ cittam iha sthitim upāgatam ।
tad eva tadvinirmuktaṃ vimuktam iti kathyate ।। 

nānāghaṭapaṭākāraiś cetas sthitim upāgatam ।
tad evāśu śamaṃ neyaṃ mithyā yakṣa ivotthitaḥ ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭākāraiś cetaḥ pariṇataṃ yathā ।
bhīmabhāsadruṭākāraiś cetaḥ pariṇataṃ tathā ।। 

bhīmabhāsadruṭanyāyo rāghavāstv acalas tava ।
dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā te bhavatu rāghava ।। 

etad rāma purā proktaṃ pitrā kamalajena me ।
bhavate adya mayā proktaṃ śiṣyāyātyantadhīmate ।। 

dāmavyālakaṭanyāyas tasmān mā te astu rāghava ।
bhīmabhāsadruṭanyāyo nityam astu tavānagha ।। 

aviralasukhaduḥkhasaṅkaṭeyaṃ bhavapadavī bhavabhāvanopayātā ।
vyavaharaṇavato api bhūtajātau satatam asaktatayā vinaśyatīti ।। 

dāmādyupākhyānaṃ samāptaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jayanti te sadā śūrās sādhavo yair vinirjitam ।
avidyāmadirollāsi svamano viṣayonmukham ।। 

saṃsārasyāsya duḥkhasya sarvopadravadāyinaḥ ।
upāya eka evāsti manasas svasya nigrahaḥ ।। 

śrūyatāṃ dharmasarvasvaṃ śrutvā caivāvadhāryatām ।
bhogecchāmātrako bandhas tattyāgo mokṣa ucyate ।। 

kim anyaiś śāstrasandarbhaiḥ śrūyatām idam eva tat ।
yad yat svādv aṅga tat sarvaṃ dṛśyatāṃ viṣavahnivat ।। 

viṣayā viṣamābhogāḥ pravicāryāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
te hy aniṣṭāḥ parityājyās sevyamānās sukhāvahāḥ ।। 

doṣān prasūte sasphārān vāsanāvāsitā matiḥ ।
kīrṇakaṇṭakabījā bhūḥ kaṇṭakaprasaraṃ yathā ।। 

alagnavāsanāgarbhā matiḥ prasaravarjitā ।
adṛṣṭarāgadveṣā sā śamam eti śanaiḥ param ।। 

śubhavāsanāgarbhā dhīḥ prasūte suguṇān sadā ।
phaladān aṅkurān kāle śreṣṭhabījavatīva bhūḥ ।। 

śubhabhāvānusandhānāt prasanne manasi sthite ।
śanaiś śanaiḥ praśānte ca mithyājñānaghanāmbude ।। 

vṛddhiṃ gate ca saujanye śuklapakṣa ivoḍupe ।
viveke prasṛte puṇye jagatīvārkatejasi ।। 

dhṛtāv antar vivṛddhāyāṃ muktāyām iva kīcake ।
sthitāv antaḥ kṛtāsthāyāṃ rucāv iva niśākare ।। 

phalite śītalacchāye satsaṅgasaphaladrume ।
sravaty ānandasurasaṃ samādhisaraladrume ।। 

mano bhavati nirdvandvaṃ niṣkāmam anupadravam ।
praśāntacāpalānarthalobhamohabhayāmayam ।। 

kṣīṇaśāstrārthasandehaṃ vigatāśeṣakautukam ।
nirastakalpanājālaṃ jīvanmuktam alepakam ।। 

nirīhaṃ nirupākrośaṃ nirapekṣaṃ nirādhi ca ।
saṃśāntaśokanīhāram asaktaṃ granthivarjitam ।। 

svendriyograsutaṃ sūtaṃ satṛṣṇādārapañjaram ।
nāśayitvā svam ātmānaṃ sādhayaty artham aiśvaram ।। 

ātmapīvaratāhetūn vikalpān svayam ujjhati ।
sadbhṛtyaḥ prabhukṛtyeṣu jahāti tṛṇavat tanum ।। 

manaso abhyudayo nāśo manonāśo mahodayaḥ ।
jñamano nāśam abhyeti mano ajñasya vivardhate ।। 

manomātraṃ jagaccakraṃ manaḥ parvatamaṇḍalam ।
mano vyoma mano deho mano mitraṃ mano ripuḥ ।। 

vikalpakaluṣā yā syāc cittattvasyātmavismṛtiḥ ।
mana ity ucyate seyaṃ vāsanā bhavabhāginī ।। 

cetyānupātakalitaṃ cinmātretikṣatābhidham ।
manāg vikalpakaluṣaṃ cittattvaṃ jīva ucyate ।। 

cetyaprapatitaṃ rūḍhasañjñam ajñatvam āgataṃ ।
tad evādhikavistāraṃ kalpyate tanmanastayā ।। 

nātmā saṃsārapuruṣo na śarīraṃ na śoṇitam ।
jaḍaṃ sarvaṃ śarīrādi dehī khavad alepakaḥ ।। 

śarīre kaṇaśaḥ kṛtte nāsty anyad rudhirādikāt ।
nirbhinne kadalīstambhe nāsty anyat pallavād ṛte ।। 

mano jīvaṃ naraṃ viddhi tad evākāram āgatam ।
ātmanātmānam ādatte svavikalpāṃśakalpitam ।। 

svavikalpān naras tantūn prasārya racayaty alam ।
jālam ātmanibandhāya kośakāraḥ krimir yathā ।। 

imaṃ dehabhramaṃ tyaktvā deśakālāntare punaḥ ।
śarīram anyad ādatte pallavatvam ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

yādṛgvāsanam etat syān manas tādṛk prajāyate ।
janas svapiti yaccittas tat svapne niśi paśyati ।। 

amblam amblarasāsiktaṃ madhuraṃ madhurañjitam ।
bījaṃ prativiṣākalkasiktaṃ ca kaṭu jāyate ।। 

śubhavāsanayā ceto mahatyā jāyate mahat ।
bhavatīndramanorājyād indratāsvapnabhāṅ naraḥ ।। 

kṣudravāsanayā cetaḥ kṣudratām eti pelavām ।
piśācavibhramāt svasthaḥ piśācān niśi paśyati ।। 

manasi sphāranairmalye kāluṣyaṃ yāti na sthitim ।
tathaiva sphārakāluṣye prasādo yāti na sthitim ।। 

manasi sphārakāluṣye tadrūpaṃ jāyate phalam ।
tathaiva sphāranairmalye tadrūpaṃ jāyate phalam ।। 

tyajaty udārāṃ na gatiṃ kṣīṇo apy atyantam uttamaḥ ।
udyogavān avirataṃ pūraṇāśām ivoḍupaḥ ।। 

neha bandho na mokṣo asti na badhyo na ca bandhanam ।
mithyotthitaiva māyeyam indrajālalatā yathā ।। 

gandharvanagarākāro mṛgatṛṣṇākramotthitaḥ ।
dvicandravibhramābhāsas saṃsāro ayam asanmayaḥ ।। 

nānanto ahaṃ varāko aham iti durniścayoditaḥ ।
ananto asmi paro asmīti niścayena vilīyate ।। 

sarvage svātmani svacche yaiṣā pramitibhāvanā ।
etat tad bandhanaṃ loke svavikalpopakalpitam ।। 

bandhamokṣadaśāhīnā dvitvaikatvavivarjitā ।
sarvaiva brahmasatteyam ity eṣā paramārthatā ।। 

mano nirmalatāṃ yātam asaktaṃ sarvadṛṣṭiṣu ।
amanastām ivāpannaṃ brahma paśyati nānyathā ।। 

mano nirmalatāṃ yātaṃ śubhasantānavāribhiḥ ।
brāhmīṃ dṛṣṭim upādatte raṅgaṃ śuklaḥ paṭo yathā ।। 

sarvam eva mamātmeti satyabhāvanayānagha ।
heyādeyadale kṣīṇe bandhamokṣau kim ucyatām ।। 

śuddhasya manasaḥ kāyaś śāstravairāgyabuddhibhiḥ ।
abhijātopalasyeva galaty abhyeti ca dyutiḥ ।। 

padārthenaikatām etya manaso yaikatānatā ।
asamyagjñānadṛṣṭiṃ tāṃ viddhi kṣaṇavināśinīm ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tyaktvā sarvā dṛśyadṛśo yadā ।
manas tiṣṭhati saṃlīnaṃ samprāptaṃ tat padaṃ tadā ।। 

dṛśyadṛṣṭis sphuṭā yeyaṃ sā hy avaśyam asanmayī ।
tanmayatvaṃ ca manasas svarūpaṃ viddhi netarat ।। 

ādyantayor vināśitvān madhye api tad asanmayam ।
kujñānamanasas tena duḥkhitā hastasaṃsthitā ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti vinā bhāvena duḥkhadā ।
dṛśyaśrīr anyathā tv eṣā bhogamokṣaikadāyinī ।। 

jalam anyat taraṅgo anya iti nānātayājñatā ।
jalam eva taraṅgo ayam ity ekatvāt kila jñatā ।। 

ajñatvād duḥkham āyāti heyopādeyarūpi yat ।
tadabhāvena tu jñatvād ānantyam avaśiṣyate ।। 

saṅkalpakalpitatvāc ca manorūpam asanmayam ।
asanmayavināśe tu kaḥ kleśo vada rāghava ।। 

avatsalo yathā bandhur arāgadveṣayā dhiyā ।
dṛśyate paśya tadvat tvaṃ dṛśyapañjaram ātmanaḥ ।। 

avatsalād yathā bandhos sukhaduḥkhair na lipyate ।
paratvasamparijñātāt tathā tattvacayātmanaḥ ।। 

tad anādi śivaṃ jñānaṃ yan madhyaṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ ।
tasmin satye manaś śāntaṃ pāṃsur vāyukṣaye yathā ।। 

upaśānte manovāyau dehapāṃsuḥ praśāmyati ।
punas saṃsāranagare na nīhāraḥ pravartate ।। 

vāsanāprāvṛṣi kṣīṇasaṃsthitau śamam āgate ।
jāḍye janitahṛtkampe paṅke śoṣam upāgate ।। 

śuṣkatṛṣṇālateṣv antar mahāhṛdayakānane ।
akṣakṣīṇakadambeṣu mithyājñānaghane kṣate ।। 

kṣīyate mohamihikā prabhāta iva śarvarī ।
kvāpi gacchati taj jāḍyaṃ viṣaṃ mantrahataṃ yathā ।। 

dehādrau na navacchidrasaritaḥ prasravanty alam ।
nollasanti lasatpakṣās saṅkalpograkalāpinaḥ ।। 

parāṃ nirmalatām eti svacidākāśakoṭaram ।
rājate atitarām accho jīvādityo mahodayaḥ ।। 

ghanamohabharonmuktā viviktatvaṃ paraṃ gatāḥ ।
śamam etyātiśobhante dhautā āśāmahādiśaḥ ।। 

bhṛśam ābhāti vimalā muditākāśamañjarī ।
śītalīkṛtadikcakrā śaradvyomnīva candrikā ।। 

sarvasampatprakāśena paramānandaśālinī ।
bhṛśaṃ saphalatām eti suviviktā vivekabhūḥ ।। 

saparvatavanābhogaṃ paramālokasundaram ।
acchācchaṃ śītalacchāyaṃ jāyate bhuvanāntaram ।। 

vistāritāṃ suśamatāṃ sphāritāṃ sphuṭikācchatām ।
upaiti hṛtsaras svacchanīrugambhojakoṭaram ।। 

hṛtpadmakośān malinas svāhaṅkāramadhuvrataḥ ।
apunardarśanāyaiva cañcalaḥ kvāpi gacchati ।। 

bhavaty apagatāpekṣas sarvagas sarvanāyakaḥ ।
nirvāsanaś śāntamanās svadehanagareśvaraḥ ।। 

vicāraṇāsamadhigatātmadīpake manasy alaṃ vyapagalite ca dhīradhīḥ ।
vilokayan kṣayabhayanīrasā gatīr gatajvaro vilasati dehapattane ।। 

upaśamasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvātīte cidātmani ।
tan me kathaya he brahman punar bodhābhivṛddhaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathormayo anabhivyaktā bhāvinaḥ payasi sthitāḥ ।
na sthitāś cāpy alakṣyatvāc cittattve sṛṣṭayas tathā ।। 

yathā sarvagatas saukṣmyād ākāśo nopalabhyate ।
tathā niraṃśaś cidbhāgas sarvago api na lakṣyate ।। 

asthitaiva sthitaivāntaḥ pratimāstrī maṇau yathā ।
na satyabhūtā nāsatyā tatheyaṃ sṛṣṭir ātmani ।। 

khādhārair ambudaiḥ khasthair na spṛṣṭaṃ gaganaṃ yathā ।
citsthais sargaiś cidādhārair na spṛṣtā cit parā tathā ।। 

jaladhiṣv eva no mahyāṃ yathāgniḥ pratibimbati ।
tathā puryaṣṭakeṣv eva cin na deheṣu lakṣyate ।। 

sarvasaṅkalparahitā sarvasañjñāvivarjitā ।
saiṣā cid avināśātmatattvoktyādikṛtābhidhā ।। 

ākāśaśatabhāgācchā jñeṣu niṣkalarūpiṇī ।
sakalāmalasaṃsārasvarūpaikātmadarśinī ।। 

taraṅgādimayī sphārā nānātā salilārṇave ।
cinmātravyatirekeṇa tathā naiva prakāśate ।। 

cic cinoti citaṃ cetyaṃ tenedaṃ sthitam ātmani ।
jñe ajñe tv anyatvam āyātam anyad astīti kalpanāt ।। 

ajñeṣv asatsvabhāvograsaṃsāragaṇarūpiṇī ।
jñeṣu prakāśarūpaiva sakalaikātmikā satī ।। 

anubhūtivaśān nityam arkādīnāṃ prakāśinī ।
svādanī sarvabhāvānāṃ bhāvanī bhavabhāvinām ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti nottiṣṭhati na tiṣṭhati ।
na ca yāti na cāyāti na ceha na ca neha cit ।। 

saiṣā cid amalākārā svayam ātmani saṃsthitā ।
rāghavetthaṃ prapañcena jagannāmnā vijṛmbhate ।। 

tejaḥpuñjair yathā tejaḥ payaḥpūrair yathā payaḥ ।
parisphurati saspandais tathā cit sargasambhramaiḥ ।। 

tatsvabhāvena cinnāmnā sarvagenoditātmanā ।
prakāśenāprakāśena niraṃśenāṃśadhāriṇā ।। 

svayaṃ svavalanāyogād anantaṃ padam ujjhatā ।
ayaṃ so asmīti bhāvena gacchatājñapadaṃ śanaiḥ ।। 

nānātāyāṃ prarūḍhāyām asyāṃ saṃsṛtipūrvakam ।
bhāvābhāvagrahotsargapade sthitim upāgate ।। 

puryaṣṭakaṃ spandaśataiḥ karoti na karoti ca ।
utsedham eti bhūkośakoṭarastho aṅkurotkaraḥ ।। 

vyoma sauṣiryam ādatte sarvamūrtyavirodhi yat ।
spandaikadharmavān vāto rasarūpi yathā jalam ।। 

dṛḍhorvī prakaṭaṃ tejas sthitimanti jaganti ca ।
pratibandhābhyanujñāsu kālaḥ kalanayā sthitaḥ ।। 

puṣpaṃ latāntam āyāti śanais sañcitakesaram ।
mṛtkoṭararasollāsas tṛṇatām eti bhūtale ।। 

mūlasthāḥ phalam āyānti pelavā rasaleśakāḥ ।
sanniveśaṃ vrajanty etā rekhāḥ pallavapāliṣu ।। 

racanām anugṛhṇanti śakrabāṇāsane aṇavaḥ ।
yogo bhavaty avirataṃ saṃsthānena navo navaḥ ।। 

vasantam upatiṣṭhante puṣpapallavarāśayaḥ ।
nidāghavidhim āyānti dāvadāhavibhūtayaḥ ।। 

prāvṛṭsamayam īhante nīlā jaladarājayaḥ ।
śaradaṃ cānudhāvanti samagrāḥ phalarāśayaḥ ।। 

himantau himahāsinyo bhavanti kakubho daśa ।
nayanty upalatām ambu śiśire śītalānilāḥ ।। 

na jahāti svamaryādāṃ kālo yugamayīm imām ।
taraṅgiṇītaraṅgaughalīlayā yānti sṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

niyatis sthitim āyāti sthairyacāturyakāriṇī ।
tiṣṭhaty āpralayaṃ dhīrā dharā dharaṇadharmiṇī ।। 

caturdaśavidhānīha bhūtāni bhuvanāntare ।
nānācāravihārāṇi nānāviracanāni ca ।। 

punaḥ punar vilīyante jāyante ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
dhārāparamparāpātavati vārīva budbudāḥ ।। 

āyāti yāti paritiṣṭhati rāraṭīti svārthān upārjayati dhāvati janmarāśau ।
unmattavad vihitabhāvanam āhitehā mugdhā kṛtāntavivaśā janatā varākī ।। 

cidādityasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

itthaṃ sthiracalākārās saṃsārāvalayo abhitaḥ ।
svabhāvād brahmaṇas sarvāḥ punar āyānti yānti ca ।। 

svatas sarvam idaṃ jātam anyo'nyaṃ hetutāṃ gatam ।
anyo'nyam api naśyac ca svata eva vilīyate ।। 

svatas stambhanibhas spando yathāgādhajalodare ।
tathaivedam asat sac ca cid eva paridṛśyate ।। 

vyomany eva nirābhāse nidāghāt sarito yathā ।
lakṣyante tadvad evemāś cittattve sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

yathā madavaśād ātmā svo anyavat pratibhāsate ।
tathaiva cittvāc ciddhātus sa evāsa iva sthitaḥ ।। 

na cedaṃ sad asan nedaṃ tatsthātatsthatayā citiḥ ।
nātiriktātiriktā ca kaṭakādiṣu hematā ।। 

yena śabdaṃ rasaṃ rūpaṃ gandhaṃ jānāsi rāghava ।
so ayam ātmā paraṃ brahma sarvam āpūrya saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

nānaikatām atītāt tu sarvagād amalātmanaḥ ।
dvitīyā kalpanaivāsti kācin netarathā kvacit ।। 

rāśer abhāvād anyasya bhāvābhāvāś śubhāśubhāḥ ।
sṛṣṭayaḥ parikalpyante nātmanaivātha vātmani ।। 

yasmād ātmano vyatirikte vastuni siddhe sati tatrecchā pravartate । yatra svātmano vyatiriktaṃ na kiñcid api sambhavati tatrātmā kiṃ nāmābhivāñchatu । kim anusandadhātu । ata idam īhitam idam anīhitam ity ātmānaṃ na spṛśanti vikalpāḥ । ato niricchatayāyam ātmā na kiñcid api karoti kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇām ekatvāt । na kvacit tiṣṭhaty ādhārādheyayor ekatvāt । na ca niricchasyātmano naiṣkarmyam abhimataṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kalpanāyā asambhavāt । tena rāma । 

nāsi rāmo na cārāmas tvam iyaṃ brahmasaṃsthitiḥ ।
sarvadvandvavinirmuktaḥ kartā bhava gatajvaraḥ ।। 

anyac ca rāghava ।

puraḥ kṛtvā kṛtvā bahuvidham idaṃ karma tarasā tvayā prāpyaṃ kiṃ tad vada yad ucitaṃ bhūtagaṇakāt ।
akartṛtve cāsthā bhavatu tava māvāñchanamater bhava svasthasvacchas sthitataramatir dhairyajaladhiḥ ।। 

gatvā sudūram api yatnavatā janena nāsādyate tad iha yena supūrṇateti ।
matveti santyaja padārthagaṇaṃ dhiyā tvaṃ tattvaṃ svam eva paramārthatayā cidātmā ।। 

upadeśakaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ sthite tajjñānāṃ yad etat kartṛtvaṃ dṛśyate yāgādiṣu vadhādiṣu vā tad asat । 

yataḥ kartṛtvaṃ nāma kim ucyate । yo hy antarāsthayā manovṛtter niścaya upādeyatāpratyayo vāsanābhidhānas tat kartṛtvaśabdenocyate । 

ceṣṭāvaśāt tādṛkphalabhoktṛtvaṃ kartṛtvāt । vāsanānurūpaṃ spandate puruṣas spandānurūpaṃ phalam anubhavati । phalabhoktṛtvaṃ nāma kartṛteti siddhāntaḥ । 

tathā ca ।

kurvato akurvato vāpi svarge vā narake api vā ।
yādṛgvāsanam etat syān manas tad anubhūyate ।। 

tasmād ajñātatattvānāṃ puṃsāṃ kurvatām akurvatāṃ ca kartṛtā । na tu jñātatattvānām avāsanatvāt । 

jñātatattvo hi śithilībhūtavāsanaḥ kurvann api phalaṃ nānusandadhāti । avayavaspandamātraṃ kevalaṃ karoty asaktabuddhiḥ । samprāptam api phalam ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti nānubhavati । kena vyatiriktaṃ kim anubhūyate iti । tena tattvajñaḥ kurvann api na kiñcid api karoti । 

ajñas tv avayavaspandanam akurvann api sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sarvam eva karmaphalam anubhavati । akurvann api karoti magnamanāḥ । 

mano yat karoti tat kṛtaṃ bhavati । yan na karoti tan na kṛtaṃ bhavati । ato mana eva kartṛ na dehaḥ । cittād evāyaṃ saṃsāra āgataḥ । cittamaya eva cittamātra eva sthita iti । 

jñaviṣayaṃ tu sarvam upaśāntam । jña evehāstīti । ātmavatāṃ hi tan manaḥ paramam upaśamam āgataṃ mṛgatṛṣṇājalam iva varṣati jalade । himakaṇa iva caṇḍātape vilīnaṃ । turyadaśām upagataṃ sthitam । 

nānando na nirānando na calaṃ nācalaṃ sthiram ।
na san nāsan na caiteṣāṃ madhyaṃ jñamananaṃ viduḥ ।। 

na vāsanāmaye spandarase gaja iva palvale majjati tajjñaḥ । mūrkhasya mano bhogabhūmim eva paśyati na sattattvam । 

tathā cāyam atrāparo dṛṣṭāntaḥ । akurvann api śvabhrapatanaṃ puruṣaś śayyāsanagato api śvabhrapatanavāsanāvāsite cetasi śvabhrapatanaduḥkham anubhavati । aparas tu kurvann api śvabhrapatanaṃ paramam upaśamam upagatavati manasi śayyāsanasukham anubhavati । evam ekaśayyāsanagatayor ekaś śvabhrapatanasyākartā kartā sampannaḥ । dvitīyaś śvabhrapatanasya kartāpy akartā sampannaś cittavaśāt । tasmād yaccittas tanmayo bhavati puruṣa iti siddhāntaḥ । 

tena tava kartur akartur vā nityam asaṃsaktaṃ bhavatu cetaḥ । na tad astv ātmatattvavyatiriktaṃ yatra saṃsaktir bhāvyate । yat kiñcid idaṃ jagad gataṃ tat sarvaṃ śuddhacittattvāvabhāsam evāvaihi । 

evambhāvasya jñātajñeyasya puṃso nāyam ātmā sukhaduḥkhānāṃ gamya iti niścaye jāte । nātmano vyatiriktā ādhārādheyadṛṣṭayo vidyante iti niścaye jāte । nātmano vyatiriktā draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyadṛśo dṛśyante iti niścaye jāte । nātmano vyatiriktam īhitam anīhitaṃ vāstīti niścaye jāte । nāhaṃ deha iti niścaye jāte । sarvapadārthayvatirikto vālāgrasahasrabhāgabhāgo aham iti niścaye jāte । yat kiñcid idaṃ tat sarvam aham eveti niścaye jāte । sarvatattvāvabhāsakas sarvagaś cijjyotir evāham iti niścaye jāte । nāhaṃ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ gamya iti niścaye jāte । vigatajvaratayā cittavṛtter līlayaiva tiṣṭhato vyavahāreṣu jñasya saṅkaṭeṣv asaṅkaṭeṣu muditaiva kevalaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanabhāgam alaṅkaroti na cintā । 

tena jñaḥ kurvann apy akartā sampannaḥ । manaso alepakatvāt । nāsau pāṇipādādivikṣepasya yatnakṛtasyāpi karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati । 

etan manas sarvakarmaṇāṃ sarvehitānāṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvagatīnāṃ bījaṃ । tasmin parihṛte sarvakarmāṇi parihṛtāni bhavanti । sarvaduḥkhāni kṣīyante । sarvānandās samupayānti । 

mānasenāpi karmaṇā yatnakṛtenāpi jño nākramyate na vivaśīkriyate na rañjanām upaity avyatiriktatvāt । 

yathā bālo manasā nagarasya nirmāṇaṃ nirmathanaṃ ca kurvan nagare nirmāṇaṃ manaskṛtam akṛtam eva līlayānubhavati nopādeyatayā । sukham akṛtrimam idam iti paśyati । nagaranirmathanaṃ ca manaskṛtam akṛtam iva paśyan duḥkham api līlayānubhavann api na duḥkham iti paśyati । evam asau paramārthajñaḥ kurvann api na lipyate eveti । 

sarvabhāveṣūpādeyatāyāṃ kṣīyamāṇāyāṃ jagati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ duḥkhasya । na copādeyaṃ kiñcid api sambhavati yad avināśi vyatiriktaṃ vātmanaḥ । tasmād ayam ātmā kartāpy akartā bhoktāpy abhoktā tattvataḥ । 

yad etat kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ cāsyādhyāropyate । avaśyakaṃ tad asamyagdarśanamohāt na vastuta iti । yathābhūtavastuvicāraṇāt kartṛtvabhoktṛtve na staḥ । indriyendriyārthadveṣābhilāṣādikā dṛṣṭayas taddṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛśyante nātaddṛṣṭīnām । 

na mokṣo asti na saṃsāras tv asaktamanasām iha ।
saṃsaktamanasāṃ tv antas sarvam asti yathāsthitam ।। 

jñasya kevalam ātmatattvam evollasati । na dvitvaikatvādisiddhe dvitvaikatve karoti । sattvāsattve ca na dve karoti । śaktijālād abhinnāṃ sarvaśaktitāṃ ca darśayati । tasmāt । 

na bandho asti na mokṣo asti na badhyo asti na bandhanaḥ ।
aprabodhād idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prabodhāt pravilīyate ।। 

saṅkalpitā jagati bandhamatir mudhaiva saṅkalpitā jagati mokṣamatir mudhaiva ।
santyajya sarvam anahaṅkṛtir ātmaniṣṭho dhīro dhiyā vyavaharan bhuvi rāma tiṣṭha ।। 

upadeśakaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavann evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭe pare brahmaṇy eva vidyamāne kuta evāvidyācitrarūpāyās sṛṣṭer āgama iti kathaya mahātman । 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājaputra brahmatattvam evedam āvartate । yasmāt sarvaśakti tat tasmāt sarvaśaktayo brahmaṇi dṛśyante । sattvam asattvaṃ dvitvam ekatvam ādyatvam antatvam iti । 

yathā jalarāśau jalarāśaya ullāsapratyullāsair nānākāratāṃ darśayantaḥ prakaṭatāṃ gacchanti । tathā cidghana eva cidghanaś citaṃ cinvānas sarvāś śaktīḥ karmamayīr vāṅmayīr manomayīś cinoti bibharti janayati kṣapayati ceti । 

sarveṣām eva jīvānāṃ sarvāsām abhito dṛśām ।
samagrāṇāṃ padārthānām utpattir brahmaṇo aniśam ।। 

lokāḥ parād upāyānti tasmin sthitvā viśanty alam ।
tanmayā eva satataṃ taraṅgā iva sāgare ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavaṃs tavātigahaneyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ । na khalu vākyārtham avagacchāmi । kva kilātītamanaṣṣaṣṭhendriyavṛtti brahmatattvaṃ । kva bhaṅgureyaṃ tajjā padārthaśrīr iti vacanaracanā । 

yadi cāyam ārambho brahmaṇa āpatitas tad anena tatsadṛśenaiva bhavitavyam । yo yasmāj jāyate sa tatsadṛśo bhavati । yathā puruṣaḥ puruṣāt । sasyāt sasyam । ato nirvikārād yad āgataṃ nirvikāreṇaiva tena bhavitavyam । athedaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ced ātmanas tan niṣkalaṅkasya kuta iyaṃ kalaṅkāpattiḥ । 

ity ākarṇya bhagavān brahmarṣir uvāca । 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

brahmaivedaṃ sthitaṃ nānā malam astīha nānagha ।
taraṅgormigaṇair ambhas sindhau sphurati no rajaḥ ।। 

dvitīyā kalpanaiveha na raghūdvaha vidyate ।
brahmamātrād ṛte vahnāv auṣṇyamātrād ṛte yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

nirduḥkhaṃ brahma nirdharma tajjaṃ duḥkham idaṃ jagat ।
aspaṣṭārtham idaṃ brahman na vedmi vacanaṃ tava ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity ukte tatra rāmeṇa cintayām āsa cetasā ।
vasiṣṭho muniśārdūlo rāghavasyopadeśane ।। 

paraṃ vikāsam āyātā nāsya tāvad iyaṃ matiḥ ।
kiñcin nirmalatāṃ prāptā prohyate veha vastuni ।। 

vyutpannamanasas tv asya jñātajñeyasya dhīmataḥ ।
mokṣopāyagirāṃ pāraṃ prayātasya vivekataḥ ।। 

na kaścit kasyacid doṣo nāsty avidyātmanīty alam ।
yāvan noktaṃ na viśrāntiṃ tāvad yāty eva rāghavaḥ ।। 

ardhavyutpannabuddhes tu naitat vaktuṃ hi śobhanam ।
dṛṣṭyānayā bhogadaśāṃ bhāvayann eṣa naśyati ।। 

parāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ prayātasya bhogecchā nābhijāyate ।
sarvaṃ brahmeti siddhāntakāle rāmasya yujyate ।। 

ādau śamadamaprāyair guṇaiś śiṣyaṃ viśodhayet ।
paścāt sarvam idaṃ brahma śuddhas tvam iti bodhayet ।। 

ajñasyārdhaprabuddhasya sarvaṃ brahmeti yo vadet ।
mahānarakajāleṣu sa tena viniyojitaḥ ।। 

prabuddhabuddheḥ prakṣīṇabhogecchasya nirāśiṣaḥ ।
nāsty avidyāmalam iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ mahātmanaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya bhagavān ajñānatimirāpahaḥ ।
samuvāca muniśreṣṭho vasiṣṭho bhūmibhāskaraḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kalaṅkakalanā brahmaṇy asti nāstīti rāghava ।
siddhāntakāle vaktavyaṃ svayaṃ jñāsyasi vānagha ।। 

brahma tu sarvaśakti sarvavyāpi sarvagataṃ sarvehaṃ sarvaṃ ceti । 

yathendrajālinaḥ paśyasi vicitrarūpāḥ kriyā janayatas sad asattāṃ nayanti । asac ca sattāṃ nayanti te । tathaivātmā । na māyāmayo api māyāmaya iva । paramaindrajāliko ghaṭaṃ paṭaṃ karoti । śakaṭam avaṭaṃ karoti । upale latām utpādayati । meroḥ kanakataṭe nandanam iva । 

latāyām upalam utpādayati । kalpapādapeṣu ratnastabakam iva । vyomni kānanam adhyāropayati । gāndharvam udyānam iva । kānanaṃ gaganatāṃ nayati । naṣṭacchāyaṃ janam iva । vyoma dharātalaṃ nayati । gandharvanagararājagṛhavipulājiram iva । bhūtale vyoma niveśayati । ratnakuṭṭimeṣv ākāśapratibimbam iva । 

kiṃ tad asti jagati babhūva bhaviṣyati vā yad īśvaro avyaktarūpo api cittatām upetya na darśayati । sarvam eva sarvathā sarvatra sarvadā sambhavaty eva । 

ekam eveha vastu vidyate iti । tasmād dharṣāmarṣavismayānāṃ ka ivāvasaro rāma । samatayaiva satataṃ matimatā sthātavyam । 

smayavismayasammohaharṣāmarṣavikāritām ।
samatācalitas tajjño na kadācana gacchati ।। 

aparyavasānadeśakālavati citrā hi jagati yuktayo dṛśyante । etāś ca yuktīr nāsāv ātmā yatnena racayati । na hi samudraḥ prayatnena taraṅgaracanāṃ karoti । na cotpannās tiraskaroti sāgara iva vīcīḥ । 

kiṃ tarhi kṣīra iva ghṛtaṃ । paṭa iva tantavaḥ । vaṭā iva vaṭadhānāyām ātmany eva sthitā etāś śaktayaḥ prakaṭatām āgatā hriyante aviratam eva taraṅgavat । 

nātra kaścit kartā na bhoktā na vināśayiteti । kevalam ātmatattve sākṣiṇi nirāmaye samatayātmani nityam akṣubdhaṃ tiṣṭhati saty evaṃ sampadyate । 

sati dīpa ivālokas saty arka iva vāsaraḥ ।
sati puṣpa ivāmodas svatas sampadyate jagat ।। 

ābhāsamātram evedaṃ paridṛśyata eva vā ।
spandas samīraṇasyeva na san nāsad iva sthitam ।। 

na kāsāñcid eva jāgatīnāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ paramārthato bhagavān bhūtavinaṣṭānāṃ punaḥkartā kṛtānāṃ vā vināśayitā । kevalaṃ kadācit prakaṭāḥ kadācid alpaprakaṭāḥ kadācid atiprakaṭā vana iva kusumarāśayaḥ । 

naśyatīha hi tad vastu nātmabhūtaṃ yad ātmanaḥ ।
kathaṃ naśyati tad vastu svātmabhūtaṃ yad ātmanaḥ ।। 

tasmād asamyagjñānavaśād brahmaṇas sarvapadārthānām āgamaḥ । avatīrṇānāṃ ca teṣām avataraṇasamakālam evāvidyodeti । tayājñānaṃ dṛdhatām eti । tad ataś śatasahasraskandho vicitraśubhāśubhavalito bhuvanabhūriśākhas sphāratām eti saṃsāradrumaḥ । 

āśāmañjaritākṛtiṃ vivalitaṃ duḥkhāhibhir dāruṇair bhogaiḥ pallavitaṃ jarākusumitaṃ tṛṣṇālatābhāsuram ।
saṃsāraṃ viṣavṛkṣam ātmanigaḍaṃ chittvā vivekāsinā muktas tvaṃ vihareha vāraṇapatis stambhād ivonmocitaḥ ।। 

sarvaikatvapratipādanopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

utpattiḥ katham eteṣāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
kiyatī kīdṛśī veti vistareṇa vada prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

utpadyante yathā citrā brahmaṇo bhūtajātayaḥ ।
yathā nāśaṃ prayānty etā yathā muktā bhavanti ca ।। 

yathā ca parivardhante tiṣṭhanty antarhitā yathā ।
tat krameṇa mahābāho śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te anagha ।। 

brāhmī cicchaktir amalā kalayantī yadṛcchayā ।
sarvaśaktis svayaṃ cetyaṃ bhavaty ākalanātmakam ।। 

kalanā ghanatām etya yat kiñcid api sā svayam ।
saṅkalpayati paścāt tat tattām eti manaḥpadam ।। 

manas saṅkalpamātreṇa gandharvapuravat kṣaṇāt ।
tanotīdam asad dṛśyaṃ brāhmīṃ dṛṣṭim iva tyajat ।। 

citsvarūpaṃ parikacac chūnyam evāvatiṣṭhate ।
yat tad dṛśyaṃ sthitaṃ tasmād dṛśyam ākāśam eva naḥ ।। 

kṛtvā padmajasaṅkalpaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati pādmajam ।
tato jagat kalpayati svaprajāpatipūrvakam ।। 

caturdaśavidhānantabhūtajātasaghuṅghumam ।
jñaptir evam iyaṃ rāma cittān nirmitim āgatā ।। 

cittamātramayī śūnyā vyomamātraśarīrikā ।
saṅkalpamātranagarī bhrāntimātrātmikāsatī ।। 

iha kāścin mahāmohā bhūtānāṃ jātayas sthitāḥ ।
kāścid abhyuditajñānāḥ kāścin madhye skhalanti hi ।। 

bhuvi sambudhyamānānāṃ yāntīnām upadeśyatām ।
sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnāṃ yā etā narajātayaḥ ।। 

bahvādhayo duḥkhamayyas tā hi dveṣabhayāturāḥ ।
tāsāṃ madhyāt pravakṣyāmi tāvad rājasasāttvikīm ।। 

yat tad asty amṛtaṃ brahma sarvavyāpi nirāmayam ।
cidābhāsam anantākhyam anādi vigatabhramam ।। 

nisspandavapuṣas tasya spandasattaikadeśataḥ ।
ghanatām eti somye abdhau calatvāc cakratām iva ।। 

rāmaḥ

anantasyātmatattvasya ekadeśaḥ ka ucyate ।
kathaṃ vikāritā vā syāt kathaṃ cāvayavikramaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tena jātaṃ tato jātam itīyaṃ racanā girām ।
śāstrasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ na rāma paramārthataḥ ।। 

vikāritāvayavitādiṅmattādeśitādayaḥ ।
kramā na sambhavantīśe dṛśyamānodayā api ।। 

taṃ vinā kalpanaivānyā nāsti nāpi bhaviṣyati ।
kutastyau kramaśabdārthāv uktayo vyavahārajāḥ ।। 

yehā yā kalpanā yo artho yaś śabdo yo aṅgināṃ gaṇaḥ ।
tajjatvāt tanmayatvāc ca tat tat tanmayam iṣyate ।।
