tajjas sa eva bhavati vahner vahnir ivotthitaḥ ।
janyo ayaṃ janakaś cāyam ity uktau bhedakalpanā ।। 

ayam asmāt samutpanna itīyaṃ yā jagatsthitiḥ ।
ādhikyaṃ tat kriyāśaktau janyaṃ janakam eva tat ।। 

idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti śabdārthavibhramaḥ ।
uktāv eva na devo asti pramite bhinnatā yataḥ ।। 

tajjayaiva manaśśaktyā svatas sañjñā pravartate ।
dṛḍhabhāvanayā tasyā iṣṭo arthaḥ pratipadyate ।। 

agneś śikhāyā ekasyā dvitīyā janiketi yā ।
uktivaicitryam evaitan noktyarthe atrāsti satyatā ।। 

na janyajanakādyās tās sambhavanty uktayaḥ pare ।
ekam eva tv anantaṃ yat kiṃ kathaṃ taj janiṣyate ।। 

ukter eṣa svabhāvo yad uktaivoktir anantaram ।
pratiyogivyavacchedasaṅkhyādyarthena yujyate ।। 

ūrmijālam ivāmbhodhau pare yaḥ paridṛśyate ।
śabdārthakalanākāras tad brahmaiva vidur budhāḥ ।। 

brahma cid brahma ca mano brahma jñānam avastu ca ।
brahmārtho brahma śabdaś ca brahma dig brahma dhātavaḥ ।। 

ayam anyo ayam anyo ayaṃ bhāga ity antar ātmanoḥ ।
mithyājñānavikalpoktau vāci satyārthatātra kā ।। 

vahneś śikhāyā jāteyaṃ śikheti manaso hi yā ।
cāpalotthā vikalpaśrīr vastutas sā na sidhyati ।। 

asatyaiva vikalpoktis satyabhāvena kalpyate ।
mohopahatadṛṣṭitvād dvicandrajñānadoṣavat ।। 

sarvasmāt sarvagāt tasmād anantād brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
nānyat kiñcit sambhavati tad uktaṃ yat tad eva tat ।। 

brahmatattvaṃ vinā neha kiñcid evopapadyate ।
sarvaṃ ca khalv idaṃ brahmety eṣaiva paramārthatā ।। 

evamprāyaś ca he prājña siddhāntas te bhaviṣyati ।
atraivodāhariṣyāmas siddhāntārthoktipañjaram ।। 

ihāvidyādikāḥ kecid vidyante netare kramāḥ ।
jñāsyasy alam aśeṣārtham etad ajñānasaṅkṣaye ।। 

avastusaṅkṣaye vastu yathāvastu prasīdati ।
yathāvad dṛśyate dṛśyaṃ jagan naiśatamaḥkṣaye ।। 

yad idam akhilam ātataṃ kudṛṣṭyā tad upaśame tava rāma nirmalābhe ।
avitathavaradarśane bhaviṣyaty avitatham eva na saṃśayo atra kaścit ।। 

brahmaivedaṃ sarvaṃ jagad iti pratipādanopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kṣīrodakukṣitulyābhiś śītalāmaladīptibhiḥ ।
tavoktibhir vicitrābhir gambhīrābhir ihābhitaḥ ।। 

kṣaṇam āndhyam ivāpnomi kṣaṇaṃ yāmi prakāśatām ।
śāntātapabalaḥ prāvṛḍlolābhra iva vāsaraḥ ।। 

anantasyāprameyasya sarvasyaikasya bhāsvataḥ ।
anastamitasārasya kalanā katham āgatā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathābhūtārthavākyārthās sarvā eva mamoktayaḥ ।
nāsamarthavirūpārthāḥ pūrvāparavirodhadāḥ ।। 

jñānadṛṣṭau prasannāyāṃ prabodhe pratatodaye ।
yathāvaj jñāsyasi svastho madvāgdṛṣṭim imām alam ।। 

upadeśyopadeśārthaṃ śāstrārthapratipattaye ।
śabdārthavākyaracanā bhramāyeyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tava ।। 

yadādhunā jñāsyasi tat satyam atyantanirmalam ।
vācyavācakaśabdārthabhedaṃ jñāsyasi vai tadā ।। 

bhedakṛd vākprapañco ayam upadeśyeṣu kalpitaḥ ।
sa cājñeṣv eva na jñeṣu vidyate pāramārthikaḥ ।। 

kalanāmalam īhādi kiñcin nātmani vidyate ।
nīrāgaṃ brahma nirdvandvaṃ tad evedaṃ jagat sthitam ।। 

etad vicitrarūpābhir uktibhir bahuśaḥ punaḥ ।
vistāreṇaiva vaktavyaṃ siddhāntāvasare anagha ।। 

vākprapañcaṃ vinā tv etad ajñānam atulaṃ tamaḥ ।
bhettum anyo'nyam uditaṃ yatnaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate ।। 

avidyayaivottamayā svātmanāśodyamotkayā ।
vidyā samprāpyate rāma sarvadoṣātihāriṇī ।। 

śāmyati hy astram astreṇa malena kṣālyate malam ।
śamaṃ viṣaṃ viṣeṇaiti ripuṇā hanyate ripuḥ ।। 

īdṛśī bhūtamāyeyaṃ yā svanāśena harṣadā ।
na lakṣyate svabhāvo asyāḥ prekṣyamāṇaiva naśyati ।। 

vivekam ācchādayati jaganti janayaty alam ।
na ca vijñāyate kaiṣā paśyāścaryam idaṃ mahat ।। 

aprekṣyamāṇā sphurati prekṣitā tu vinaśyati ।
māyeyam aparijñāyamānarūpaiva valgati ।। 

aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā saṃsārabandhanī ।
asatyaivātisatyeva prājñān api hinasti yā ।। 

atyabhinne pade tasmiṃs tanvānā bhedam ātatam ।
saṃsāramāyā vijñātā yenāsau puruṣottamaḥ ।। 

nāsty eṣā paramārthenety evambhāvanayeddhayā ।
jño bhūtvā jñeyasamprāptyā jñāsyasy asyās tvam āśayam ।। 

yāvat tu na prabuddhas tvaṃ tāvan madvacasaiva te ।
niścayo bhavatūddāmo nāsty avidyeti niścalaḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ mānasaṃ mananaṃ mahat ।
asat tad iti yasyāntar niścayo mokṣabhāg asau ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyatāṃ prāptaṃ manomātravijṛmbhitam ।
sat tad brahmeti yasyāntar niścayas so api mokṣabhāk ।। 

calācalā tṛtīyā yā dṛṣṭir ābaddhabhāvanā ।
sā samagrajagadbhūtakhagabandhanavāgurā ।। 

yas svapnabhramavad bhrāntam asat sad vaikaniścayaḥ ।
jagat paśyaty asaktātmā na sa duḥkhe nimajjati ।। 

yasyemās svasvarūpāsu bhāvanāsv ātmabhāvanāḥ ।
asvarūpasvarūpasya tasyāvidyaiva vidyate ।। 

vikāritādayo doṣā na kecana mahātmani ।
paramātmani vidyante payasīveha pāṃsavaḥ ।। 

bhāvanā śabdaśabdārtharañjaneyaṃ jagadgatā ।
vyavahārārtham utpannā vyatiriktā na cātmanaḥ ।। 

anena vyavahāreṇa vinaitāś śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ ।
saṃsthitiṃ nādhigacchanti paṭā iva vitantavaḥ ।। 

uhyamāno hy avidyādhvany ātmā nehopalabhyate ।
ātmajñānād ṛte tac ca śāstrārthāt samavāpyate ।। 

avidyāsaritaḥ pāram ātmalābhād ṛte kila ।
rāma nāsādyate tad dhi padam akṣayam acyutam ।। 

yataḥ kutaścij jāteyam avidyā bhramadāyinī ।
nūnaṃ sthitim upāyātā samācchādya padaṃ sthitā ।। 

kuto jāteyam iti te rāma māstu vicāraṇā ।
imāṃ katham ahaṃ hanmīty eṣā te astu vicāraṇā ।। 

astaṅgatāyāṃ kṣīṇāyām asyāṃ jñāsyasi rāghava ।
yata eṣā yathā caiṣā yathā naṣṭety akhaṇḍitam ।। 

vastutaḥ khalu nāsty eṣā vibhāty evānavekṣitā ।
asato bhrāntibhātasya rūpaṃ jānāti kaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

jāteyaṃ prauḍhim āpannā doṣāyaivātatākṛtiḥ ।
balāt praṇāśayitvaināṃ parijñāsyasi vai tataḥ ।। 

api śūrā api prājñās te na santi jagattraye ।
avidyayā ye puruṣā na nāma vivaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 

tad asyāṃ rogaśālāyāṃ yatnaṃ kuru cikitsane ।
yathaiṣā janmaduḥkhena na bhūyas tvāṃ niyokṣyati ।। 

sarvāpadām ekasakhīm ajñānatarumañjarīm ।
anarthasārthajananīm avidyām alam uddhara ।। 

bhayaviṣādadurādhivipatpradāṃ hṛdayamohamahāpaṭalākulām ।
bhṛśam apāsya kudṛṣṭim imāṃ balād bhava bhavārṇavapāram upāgataḥ ।। 

avidyākathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kupitasyāsato apy asya prekṣāmātravināśinaḥ ।
avidyāvitatavyādher auṣadhaṃ śṛṇu rāghava ।। 

yāṃ tāṃ kathayituṃ jātiṃ rāma rājasasāttvikīm ।
manovīryavicārārthaṃ prastuto asmīti tāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yat tad asty amṛtaṃ brahma sarvavyāpi nirāmayam ।
cidābhāsam anantākhyam anādi vigatabhramam ।। 

citspandavapuṣas tasya spandaḥ kasmāccid eva hi ।
pradeśād ghanatām eti somyābdheś calanād iva ।। 

antar abdher jalaṃ yadvat spandāt stambhavad īhate ।
sarvaśakti tathaikatra gacchati spandaśaktitām ।। 

ātmany evātmanā vyomni yathā sarati mārutaḥ ।
tathehātmātmaśaktyaiva svātmany evaiti lolatām ।। 

svaśikhāspandaśaktyaiva dīpas somyo yathoccatām ।
eti tadvad asāv ātmā tat sve vapuṣi valgati ।। 

jalāntare ambudher yadval lasad vāri kvacic calam ।
sarvaśaktivapuṣy eva tathā spando vilāsavān ।। 

yathollasati bhācakrair dravatkāñcanasāgaraḥ ।
tathātmani parispandais sphuraty acchaiś cidarṇavaḥ ।। 

lakṣyate mauktikaspando yathā vyomni dṛśā dṛśaḥ ।
tathodeti lasadrūpā svaśaktir brahmaṇaś citaḥ ।। 

kiñcitkṣubhitarūpā sā cicchaktiś cinmahārṇave ।
tanmayy eva sphuraty acchā tatraivormir ivārṇave ।। 

ātmano avyatiriktaiva vyatirikteva tiṣṭhati ।
ālokaśrīr ivālokakoṭare ghanatāṃ gatā ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ sphurantī sā devī sarvaśaktitayā tayā ।
cinoti svāṃ svayaṃ śaktiṃ kalendoś śītatām iva ।। 

uditaiṣā prakāśākhyā cicchaktiḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
deśakālakriyāśaktīr vayasyās samprakarṣati ।। 

aviditvā svabhāvaṃ svaṃ vyāpyānantapadaṃ sthitā ।
rūpaṃ parimitevāsau bhāvayaty avibhāvitā ।। 

yadaiva bhāvitaṃ rūpaṃ tayā paramakāntayā ।
tadaivainām anugatā nāmasaṅkhyādikā dṛśaḥ ।। 

cid athaitadavasthaiva vyatiriktā sthitātmanaḥ ।
anantā tadgataivāśu laharīva mahārṇavāt ।। 

yathā kaṭakakeyūrair bhedo hemno vilakṣaṇaḥ ।
tathātmanaś citā rūpaṃ bhāvayantyā svam āṃśikam ।। 

yathā dīpena dīpānāṃ jātānām ātmanā tathā ।
deśakālakalāmātrabhedas svo bhāvitaś citā ।। 

deśakālaparispandaśaktisandīpitātha cit ।
saṅkalpam anudhāvantī prayāti kalanāpadam ।। 

vikalpakalpitākāraṃ deśakālakriyāspadam ।
cito rūpaṃ mahābāho kṣetrajña iti kathyate ।। 

kṣetraṃ śarīram ity āhus tad asau vetty akhaṇḍitam ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tena kṣetrajña iti kathyate ।। 

vāsanāḥ kalpayan so api yāty ahaṅkāratāṃ punaḥ ।
ahaṅkāro vinirṇītā kālikī buddhir ucyate ।। 

buddhis saṅkalpakalitā prayātā mananāspadam ।
mano ghanavikalpaṃ tu gacchatīndriyatāṃ śanaiḥ ।। 

pāṇipādamayaṃ deham indriyāṇi vidur budhāḥ ।
deho asau jāyate loke mriyate api ca jīvati ।। 

evaṃ jīvo hi saṅkalpo vāsanārajjuveṣṭitaḥ ।
duḥkhajālaparītātmā kramād āyāti cittatām ।। 

krameṇa pākavaśataḥ phalam eti yathānyatām ।
avasthayaiva nākṛtyā jīvo malavaśāt tathā ।। 

jīvo ahaṅkāratāṃ prāptas tv ahaṅkāraś ca buddhitām ।
saṅkalpajālavalitā manastāṃ buddhir āgatā ।। 

mano hi saṅkalpamayaṃ saṃsthāgrahaṇatatparam ।
pratiyogivyavacchinnaṃ prāptam anyair apīhitaiḥ ।। 

icchādyāś śaktayo mattāṃ gāvo vṛṣam ivonmadam ।
anudhāvanti doṣāya saritas sāgaraṃ yathā ।। 

itiśaktimayaṃ ceto ghanāhaṅkāratāṃ gatam ।
kośakārakrimikavad icchayā yāti bandhanam ।। 

svasaṅkalpānusandhānāt pāśair āvalayad vapuḥ ।
kaṣṭam asmi svayaṃ baddham ity ārtyā paritapyate ।। 

baddham asmīti kalayad vidyātattvaṃ jahac chanaiḥ ।
avidyāṃ janayaty antar jagajjaṅgalarākṣasīm ।। 

svasaṅkalpitatanmātrajālābhyantaravarti ca ।
parāṃ vivaśatām eti śṛṅkhalābaddhasiṃhavat ।। 

vicitrakāryakartṛtvam āharad vāsanāvaśāt ।
svecchāmātrānuracitā daśāś cānupatan navāḥ ।। 

kvacin manaḥ kvacid buddhiḥ kvacij jñānaṃ kvacit kriyā ।
kvacid etad ahaṅkāraḥ kvacit puryaṣṭakaṃ smṛtam ।। 

kvacit prakṛtir ity uktaṃ kvacin māyeti kalpitam ।
kvacin mana iti proktaṃ kvacit karmeti saṃsthitam ।। 

kvacid bandha iti khyātaṃ kvacic cittam iti sphuṭam ।
proktaṃ kvacid avidyeti kvacid iccheti saṅgatam ।। 

tad etad ābaddham iha cittaṃ rāghava duḥkhitam ।
tṛṣṇāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanam āturam ।। 

jarāmaraṇamohārtaṃ bhavabhāvanayā hatam ।
īhitānīhitair grastam avidyārāgarañjitam ।। 

icchāsaṅkucitākāraṃ karmavṛkṣanavāṅkuram ।
suvismṛtotpattipadaṃ kalpitānarthakalpanam ।। 

kośakāravad ābaddhaṃ kośakārapadaṃ gatam ।
tanmātravṛndāvayavam anantanarakātapam ।। 

adṛśyam api śailendrasamabhārabharāvaham ।
jarāmaraṇaśākhāḍhyaṃ saṃsāraviṣadurdrumam ।। 

imaṃ saṃsāram akhilam āśāpāśavidhāyakam ।
dadhad antaḥ phalair hīnaṃ vaṭadhānā vaṭaṃ yathā ।। 

cintānalaśikhādagdhaṃ kopājagaracarvitam ।
kāmābdhikallolahataṃ vismṛtātmapitāmaham ।। 

mṛgaṃ yūthād iva bhraṣṭaṃ śokopahatacetanam ।
pataṅgakam ivojjvāle dagdhaṃ viṣayapāvake ।। 

chinnamūlam ivāmbhojaṃ paramāṃ mlānim āgatam ।
chinnāśam ātmanas sthānād videśāsaṅgadussthitam ।। 

viṣayāhiṣu madhyasthaṃ mitrarūpeṣu śatruṣu ।
daśākhadāsv anantāsu luṭhitaṃ saṅkaṭāsv ati ।। 

duḥkhe nipatitaṃ ghore vihagaṃ vāgure yathā ।
ābaddhāsthaṃ jagajjāle śūnye gandharvapattane ।। 

uhyamānam anarthābdhau mano viṣayavidrutam ।
uddharāmarasaṅkāśa mātaṅgam iva kardamāt ।। 

balīvardavad āmagnaṃ mano mananapalvale ।
ālūnaśīrṇāvayavaṃ balād rāma samuddhara ।। 

śubhāśubhaprasaraparāhatākṛtau jvalajjarāmaraṇaviṣādamūrchite ।
dayeha na svamanasi yasya jāyate narākṛtis sa jagati rāma rākṣasaḥ ।। 

jīvāvataraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ jīvāś cito bhāvād bhavabhāvanayā hatāḥ ।
brahmaṇo akalitākārāl lakṣaśo api ca koṭiśaḥ ।। 

saṅkhyātītāḥ purā jātā jāyante adyāpi cābhitaḥ ।
utpatiṣyanti caivānye kaṇaughā iva nirjharāt ।। 

svavāsanāvaśāveśād āśāvivaśatāṃ gatāḥ ।
daśāsv ativicitrāsu svayaṃ nigaḍitāśayāḥ ।। 

anārataṃ pratidiśaṃ pratideśaṃ jale sthale ।
jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi ।। 

kecit prathamajanmānaḥ kecij janmavaśātigāḥ ।
kecic cāsaṅkhyajanmānaḥ kecij janmaśatāntarāḥ ।। 

bhaviṣyajjātayaḥ kecit kecid bhūtamahābhavāḥ ।
vartamānabhavāḥ kecit kecic cābhavatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

kecit kalpasahasrāṇi jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
ekām evāśritā yoniṃ kecid yonyantaraṃ śritāḥ ।। 

kecin mahāduḥkhahatāḥ kecid alpavayassthitāḥ ।
kecid atyantam uditāḥ kecid arkā ivoditāḥ ।। 

kecit kinnaragandharvavidyādharamahoragāḥ ।
kecid arkendravaruṇatryakṣādho'kṣajapadmajāḥ ।। 

kecit kumbhāṇḍavetālayakṣarakṣaḥpiśācakāḥ ।
kecid brāhmaṇabhūpālavaiśyaśūdragaṇās smṛtāḥ ।। 

kecic chvapacacaṇḍālakirātakhaśapukkasāḥ ।
kecit tṛṇauṣadhīpattraphalamūlapadaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

kecid vanalatāgulmatṛṇopaladaśoṣitāḥ ।
kecit kadambajambīrasālatālatamālakāḥ ।। 

kecid vibhavasambhāramattasāmantabhūmipāḥ ।
kecic cīrāmbaracchannā munimaunam upāśritāḥ ।। 

kecid bhujagagonāsakrimikīṭapipīlakāḥ ।
kecin mṛgendramahiṣamṛgarkṣacamaraiṇakāḥ ।। 

kecit sārasacakrāhvabalākābakakokilāḥ ।
kecit kamalakalhārakumudotpalatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

kecit karabhamātaṅgapataṅgavṛṣagardabhāḥ ।
kecid dvirephamaṣakaputtikādaṃśavaṃśajāḥ ।। 

kecid āpadbalākrāntāḥ kecit sampadam āgatāḥ ।
kecit sthitās svargapure kecin narakam āsthitāḥ ।। 

ṛkṣacakragatāḥ kecid vṛkṣarandhragatāḥ pare ।
vātarūpe sthitāḥ kecit kecid vyomapade sthitāḥ ।। 

sūryāṃśuṣu sthitāḥ kecit kecid indvaṃśuṣu sthitāḥ ।
kecit tṛṇalatāgulmarasasvāduṣv avasthitāḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktā bhramantīha kecit kalyāṇabhājanam ।
ciramuktās sthitāḥ kecin nūnaṃ pariṇatāḥ pare ।। 

kecic cireṇa kālena bhaviṣyanmuktayaś śaṭhāḥ ।
kecid dviṣanti durbhāvāḥ kevalībhāvam ātmanaḥ ।। 

kecij jātā jagaty asmin kecid anyatra saṃsthitāḥ ।
kecin neha na cānyatra pare eva pade sthitāḥ ।। 

kecin mahendramalayasahyamandarameravaḥ ।
kecit kṣāradadhikṣīraghṛtekṣujalarāśayaḥ ।। 

kecid viśālāḥ kakubhaḥ kecin nadyo mahārayāḥ ।
kecit striyaḥ kāntadṛśaḥ kecic chaṇḍhanapuṃsakāḥ ।। 

kecit prabuddhamatayaḥ kecij jaḍatarāśayāḥ ।
kecij jñānopadeṣṭāraḥ kecid āttasamādhayaḥ ।। 

jīvās svavāsanāveśavivaśāśayatāṃ gatāḥ ।
etāsv etāsv avasthāsu saṃsthitā baddhabhāvanāḥ ।। 

viharanti jagatkośe nipatanty utpatanti ca ।
kandukā iva hastena mṛtyunāvirataṃ hatāḥ ।। 

āśāpāśaśatābaddhā vāsanābhāradhāriṇaḥ ।
kāyāt kāyam upāyānti vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāṇḍajāḥ ।। 

anantānantasaṅkalpakalpanotpātamāyayā ।
indrajālaṃ vitanvānā jaganmayam idaṃ mahat ।। 

tāvad bhramanti saṃsāre vārīvāvartarāśayaḥ ।
yāvan mūḍhā na paśyanti svam ātmānam aninditam ।। 

dṛṣṭvātmānam asat tyaktvā satyām āsādya saṃvidam ।
kālena padam āgatya jāyante neha te punaḥ ।। 

bhuktvā janmasahasrāṇi jñānena tapasātha vā ।
parameṣṭhipadaṃ prāpya kecid yānti paraṃ padam ।। 

kecic chakratvam apy uccaiḥ prāpya tucchatayā dhiyaḥ ।
punas tiryaktvam āyānti tiryaktvān naratām api ।। 

kecin mahādhiyas santa utpadya brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
tadaiva janmanaikena tatraiva praviśanty alam ।। 

brahmāṇḍeṣv itareṣv anye tenaite jīvarāśayaḥ ।
prayānti padmodbhavatām anye ca haratām api ।। 

anye prayānti tiryaktvam anye ca suratām api ।
anye api nāgatāṃ rāma yathaiveha tathaiva hi ।। 

yathedaṃ hi jagat sphāraṃ tathānyāni jaganti hi ।
vidyante samatītāni bhaviṣyanti ca bhūriśaḥ ।। 

anyenānyena citreṇa krameṇānyena hetunā ।
vicitrās sṛṣṭayas teṣām āpatanti patanti ca ।। 

kāścid gandharvatāṃ yānti kāścid gacchanti yakṣatām ।
kāścit prayānti suratāṃ kāścid āyānti daityatām ।। 

yenaiva vyavahāreṇa brahmāṇḍe asmiñ janās sthitāḥ ।
tenaivānyeṣu tiṣṭhanti sanniveśāvilakṣaṇāḥ ।। 

svasvabhāvavaśāveśād anyo'nyaparighaṭṭanaiḥ ।
sṛṣṭayaḥ parivartante taraṅgiṇyā ivormayaḥ ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvair unmajjananimajjanaiḥ ।
sṛṣṭayaḥ parivartante taraṅgiṇyā ivormayaḥ ।। 

niryānty avirataṃ tasmāt parasmāj jīvarāśayaḥ ।
anirdeśyāt svasaṃvedyāt tatraivāśu sphuranti ca ।। 

dīpād ivālokadṛśas sūryād iva marīcayaḥ ।
kaṇās taptāyasa iva sphuliṅgā iva pāvakāt ।। 

kālād ivartavaś citrā āmodāḥ kusumād iva ।
śīkarā iva pātāmbupūrād abdher ivormayaḥ ।। 

utpatyotpatya kālena tyaktvā dehaparamparāḥ ।
svaka eva pade yānti vilayaṃ jīvarāśayaḥ ।। 

aviralam iyam ātatā sthitoccair bhavati vinaśyati vardhate mudhaiva ।
tribhuvanaracanāvimohamāyā paramapade laharīva vārirāśau ।। 

jīvanicayasaṃsthānopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

krameṇānena yenāptā jīvena sthitir ātmanaḥ ।
sa kathaṃ bhagavan dehaṃ samādatte asthipañjaram ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pūrvam eva mayā proktaṃ rāma kiṃ nāvabudhyase ।
pūrvāparavicārārhā śemuṣī kva gatā tava ।। 

yad idaṃ hi śarīrādi jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
ābhāsamātram evaitad asat svapna ivotthitam ।। 

dīrghasvapno hy ayaṃ rāma mithyaivānagha dṛśyate ।
dvicandravibhramākāro bhramārtabhrāntaśailavat ।। 

praśāntājñānanidras san nūnaṃ galitabhāvanaḥ ।
prabuddhacetās saṃsārasvapnaṃ paśyan na paśyati ।। 

svabhāvakalpito rāma jīvānāṃ sarvadaiva hi ।
āmokṣapadasamprāpti saṃsāro asty ātmano antare ।। 

svabhāvakalpito nityaṃ sarvasyāsty ātmano antare ।
jīvasya taralaḥ kāya āvartaḥ payaso yathā ।। 

bīje yathāṅkuras sphāraḥ pallavaś cāṅkure yathā ।
pallave ca yathā puṣpaṃ puṣpakośe phalaṃ yathā ।। 

yataś ca kalpanārūpo deho asti manaso antare ।
bahīrūpatayā rāma tato asty eveha sa sphuṭaḥ ।। 

ya eva pratibhāso asya manasaḥ kila jāyate ।
sa evāśu bhavaty etan mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭako yathā ।। 

pratibhāsata evedaṃ manassaṅkalpamātrakam ।
jagad rāghava no satyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇājalaṃ yathā ।। 

pratibhāsena caitena deho ayaṃ dṛśyate puraḥ ।
bhītibhrāntena bālena vetālo agragato yathā ।। 

ādisarge purā kāyapratibhāso asya cetasaḥ ।
yas sa eva vibhur brahmā padmakośagṛhe sthitaḥ ।। 

tatsaṅkalpakrameṇaiva tatas sthitim upāgatā ।
iyaṃ sṛṣṭir aparyantā māyeva ghanamāyayā ।। 

rāmaḥ

jīvo manaḥpadaṃ prāpya vairiñcapadam āgataḥ ।
yathā brahmaṃs tathā sarvaṃ vistareṇa vadāśu me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

brāhmaṃ śṛṇu mahābāho śarīragrahaṇe kramam ।
nidarśanena tenaiva jāgatīṃ jñāsyasi sthitim ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnam ātmatattvaṃ svaśaktitaḥ ।
līlayaiva yad ādatte dikkālakalitaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

tad etaj jīvaparyāyaṃ vāsanāveśatatparaṃ ।
manas sampadyate lolaṃ kalanākalanonmukham ।। 

kalayantī manaśśaktir ādau bhāvayati kṣaṇāt ।
ākāśabhāvanām acchāṃ śabdabījarasonmukhīm ।। 

tatas tadghanatāṃ yātaṃ ghanaspandaṃ kramān manaḥ ।
bhāvayaty anilaspandaṃ sparśabījarasonmukham ।। 

tābhyām ākāśavātābhyām āmṛṣṭābhyāṃ manodṛśā ।
śabdasparśasvarūpābhyāṃ saṅgharṣāj janyate analaḥ ।। 

manas tadghanatāṃ prāpya tato bhāvayati kṣaṇāt ।
prākāśyam amalālokam ālokas tena vardhate ।। 

manas tādṛgguṇagaṇaṃ rasatanmātravedanam ।
kṣaṇāc cinoty apāṃ śaityaṃ jalasaṃvit tato bhavet ।। 

tatas tādṛgguṇagaṇaṃ mano bhāvayati kṣaṇāt ।
svarūpaṃ gandhavat sthūlaṃ yenodeṣyati medinī ।। 

athedaṃ bhūtatanmātraveṣṭitaṃ tanutāṃ jahat ।
vapur vahnikaṇākāraṃ sphuritaṃ vyomni paśyati ।। 

ahaṅkārakalāyuktaṃ buddhijīvasamanvitam ।
tat puryaṣṭakam ity uktaṃ bhūtahṛtpadmaṣaṭpadaḥ ।। 

tasmiṃs tat tīvrasaṃvegād bhāvayad bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ ।
sthūlatāṃ eti pākena mano bhavyaphalaṃ yathā ।। 

mūṣāsthadrutahemābhaṃ sphuritaṃ vimalāmbare ।
sanniveśam athādatte tat tejas svaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।। 

tasmin svasanniveśe atha tejaḥpuñjamaye manaḥ ।
bhajate bhāvanāṃ sphāre niścitām ātatāṃ svataḥ ।। 

ūrdhvaṃ śiraḥpīṭhamayīm adhaḥ pādamayīṃ tathā ।
pārśvayor hastasaṃsthānāṃ madhye codaradharmiṇīṃ ।। 

prakaṭāvayavo bālo jvālājālāmalākṛtiḥ ।
manorathavaśopāttavapus tiṣṭhaty asāv atha ।। 

evaṃ svavāsanāveśāt kalpitāṅgaṃ mano muneḥ ।
nayaty upacayaṃ dehaṃ svaṃ svabhāvam ṛtur yathā ।। 

kālena sphuṭatām etya bhavaty amalavigrahaḥ ।
buddhisattvabalotsāhavijñānaiśvaryasaṃsthitaḥ ।। 

sa eṣa bhagavān brahmā sarvalokādhināyakaḥ ।
dravatkanakasaṅkāśaḥ paramākāśasambhavaḥ ।। 

athāsau paramākāśe tiṣṭhan paramarūpavān ।
kalpayaty ātmano geham ātmasthaś cittalīlayā ।। 

kadācit kevalaṃ vyoma paramaṃ pāravarjitam ।
anādimadhyaparyantaṃ kadācid amalaṃ payaḥ ।। 

kadācit kalpakālāgnijvālābhāsuramaṇḍitam ।
kadācit kānanaṃ kāntaṃ nābhīkamalakuṭmalam ।। 

anyāny anyāny anekāni pratijanmāvadhi prabhuḥ ।
kalpayaty āsanāny eṣa nānārūpāṇi helayā ।। 

tatredamprathamatvena yadaiṣa brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
avatīrṇas tadā jñānāt tasyaiva susamas smṛtaḥ ।। 

garbhanidrāvyapagame vapuḥ paśyati bhāsuram ।
prāṇāpānapravāhāḍhyaṃ dravyair eva vinirmitam ।। 

romakoṭibhir ākīrṇaṃ dvātriṃśaddaśanānvitam ।
tristhūṇaṃ pañcadaivatyam adhaścaraṇalāñchitam ।। 

pañcabhāgaṃ navadvāraṃ tvaglepamasṛṇāṅgakam ।
yuktam aṅguliviṃśatyā nakhaviṃśatilāñchitam ।। 

dvibāhuṃ dvistanaṃ dvyakṣaṃ bahvakṣabhujam eva vā ।
nīḍaṃ cittavihaṅgasya bilaṃ manmathabhoginaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāpiśācyā nilayaṃ jīvakesarikandaram ।
abhimānagajālānam ānanāmbhojaśobhitam ।। 

avalokya vapur brahmā kāntam ātmīyam uttamam ।
cintayām āsa bhagavāṃs trikālāmaladarśanaḥ ।। 

asminn ākāśakuhare tate madupalāñchite ।
adṛṣṭāpāraparyante prathamaṃ kim abhūd iti ।। 

iti cintitavān brahmā sadyojāto amalātmadṛk ।
apaśyat sargavṛndāni samatītāny anekaśaḥ ।। 

atha sasmāra sakalān sa sadharmaguṇakramān ।
vasantaḥ kusumānīva vedān vāṅmayasaṃyutān ।। 

līlayā kalpayām āsa citrās saṅkalpajāḥ prajāḥ ।
nānācārasamārambhā gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā ।। 

tāsāṃ svargāpavargārthaṃ dharmakāmārthasiddhaye ।
anantāni vicitrāṇi śāstrāṇi samakalpayat ।। 

sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ rāma sarge asmin sthitim āgatā ।
viriñcarūpān manasaḥ puṣpalakṣmīr madhor iva ।। 

vividhaviracanaiḥ kriyāvilāsaiḥ kamalajarūpadhareṇa cetasaiva ।
raghusuta parikalpanena nītā sthitim atulāṃ jagatīha sargalakṣmīḥ ।। 

saṃsārāvataraṇapratipādanopadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃsampannam evaitan nakiñcid api saṃsthitam ।
śūnyam eva nabhomātraṃ manovilasitaṃ param ।। 

na deśakālāv etena brahmāṇḍenāvṛtau kvacit ।
manāg api mahārūpavatāpy ākāśarūpiṇā ।। 

etat saṅkalpamātrātma svapnadṛṣṭapuropamam ।
yatraitat tatra niśśūnyaṃ kevalaṃ vyoma saṃsthitam ।। 

abhittirāgaracanam api dṛṣṭam asanmayam ।
akṛtaṃ kṛtam evaitad vyomni citraṃ vicitrakam ।। 

manasā kalpitaṃ sarvaṃ dehādibhuvanatrayam ।
saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ caitac cakṣur ālokane yathā ।। 

ābhāsamātraṃ hi jagad ghaṭāvaṭapaṭakramaiḥ ।
āvartate na sadrūpāḥ pṛthak kuḍyādayas sthitāḥ ।। 

manasedaṃ śarīraṃ hi nivāsārthaṃ prakalpitam ।
krimiṇā kośakāreṇa svātmakośa iva svayam ।। 

na tad asti na yan nāma cetas saṅkalpamantharam ।
na karoti na cāpnoti durgam apy atiduṣkaram ।। 

sarvaśaktau pare deve kā nāma nanu śaktayaḥ ।
na sambhavanty āvriyate yābhir antar manoguhā ।। 

sattāsatte padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadaiva hi ।
mahābāho sambhavatas sarvaśaktau vibhau sati ।। 

paśya bhāvanayā prāptaṃ manasā pādmajaṃ vapuḥ ।
tasmāt tatkalanaṃ rāma sarvaśaktiyutaṃ viduḥ ।। 

svasaṅkalpaiḥ kṛtās sarge devāsuranarācarāḥ ।
svasaṅkalpopaśamane śāmyanty asnehadīpavat ।। 

ākāśasadṛśaṃ sarvaṃ kalpanāmātrajṛmbhitam ।
jagat paśya mahābuddhe sudīrghaṃ svapnam utthitam ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate iha kaścit kadācana ।
pāramārthyena sumate mithyā sarvaṃ pravartate ।। 

na vṛddhim eti no nāśaṃ yatra kiñcit kadācana ।
rekhātaruvane tatra kasya nāma ca khaṇḍanā ।। 

bhramabhūtaṃ svakāyaṃ tvam apaśyan nipuṇaṃ dṛśā ।
rāghavāghahatasvāntaḥ kim ajña iva bhāṣase ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpān manaso atiśayāt tathā ।
asanta eva dṛśyante sarve brahmādayo apy amī ।। 

dvicandravibhramaprakhyā manorathavad utthitāḥ ।
mithyājñānamayās sarve jagaty ākārarāśayaḥ ।। 

yathā nauyāyino mithyā sthāṇuspandamatis tathā ।
asatyaivotthitā nityam ākārāṇāṃ paramparā ।। 

indrajālam idaṃ viddhi māyāracitapañjaram ।
manomanananirmāṇaṃ na san nāsad iva sthitam ।। 

brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam anyatāyās tv ataḥ kutaḥ ।
prasaṅgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ko asau kva cāsau paritiṣṭhati ।। 

ayaṃ girir ayaṃ sthāṇur ity āḍambaravibhramaḥ ।
manaso bhāvanādārḍhyād asat sad iva lakṣyate ।। 

prapañcacaturārambham antas tuccham idaṃ jagat ।
sakāmatṛṣṇāmananaṃ tyaktvānyad rāma bhāvaya ।। 

yathā svapne mahārambho bhrāntir eva na vastusat ।
dīrghasvapnaṃ tathaivedaṃ viddhi cittopakalpitam ।। 

dṛśyamānamahābhogaṃ gṛhyamāṇam avastukam ।
kośam āśābhujaṅgīnāṃ saṃsārāḍambaraṃ tyaja ।। 

asad etad iti jñātvā mātra bhāvaṃ niveśaya ।
anudhāvati kaḥ prājño vijñāya mṛgatṛṣṇikām ।। 

svasaṅkalpottharūpāḍhyāṃ manorathamayīṃ striyam ।
yo anugacchati mūḍhātmā duḥkhasyaiva sa bhājanam ।। 

vastuny asati loko ayaṃ yātu kāmam avastuni ।
yas tu vastu parityajya yāty avastu sa naśyati ।। 

manovyāmoha evedaṃ rajjvām ahibhayaṃ yathā ।
bhāvanāmātravaicitryāc ciram āvartate jagat ।। 

asadabhyuditair bhāvair jalāntaścandracañcalaiḥ ।
vañcyate bāla eveha na tattvajño bhavādṛśaḥ ।। 

ya imaṃ guṇasaṅghātaṃ bhāvayan sukham īhate ।
pramārṣṭi sa jaḍo jāḍyaṃ vahnāv appratibimbite ।। 

asad evedam ābhogi dṛśyate dṛśyapañjaram ।
manomanananirmāṇaṃ hṛdaye nagaraṃ yathā ।। 

idaṃ cittecchayodeti līyate ca tadicchayā ।
mithyaiva dṛśyate sphāraṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

rāma naṣṭe jagaty asmin na kiñcid api naśyati ।
yukte api ca jagaty asmin na kiñcid api yujyate ।। 

manaḥprakalpite bhagne hṛdi vistīrṇapattane ।
vṛddhiṃ vopagate brūhi kiṃ vṛddhaṃ kasya kiṃ kṣataṃ ।। 

krīḍārthena yathodeti bālānāṃ hṛdi pattanam ।
manasā tadvad evedam udety avirataṃ jagat ।। 

na kiñcit kasyacin naṣṭam indrajālajale yathā ।
bhraṣṭe naṣṭe tathaivāsmin saṃsāre vibhavotthite ।। 

yad asat tad asat syāc cet tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam ।
ato harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ saṃsāro nāma nāspadam ।। 

asad eva yad atyantaṃ tasmin kiṃ nāma naśyati ।
nāśābhāve hi duḥkhasya kaḥ prasaṅgo mahāmate ।। 

sad eva vā yad atyantaṃ tasya kiṃ nāma naśyati ।
brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sukhaduḥkhe kim utthite ।। 

sarvatrāsatyabhūte asmin prapañcaikāntakāriṇi ।
saṃsāre kim upādeyaṃ prājño yad abhivāñchatu ।। 

sarvatra satyabhūte asmin brahmatattvamaye api ca ।
kiṃ syāt tribhuvane heyaṃ prājñāḥ pariharantu yat ।। 

asat sad vā jagaj jñasya tenāsau sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।
agamya eva mūrkhas tu tṛtīyāṃśena duḥkhitaḥ ।। 

ādāv ante api yan nāsti vartamāne api san na tat ।
yo abhivāñchaty asad rāma tasyāsattaiva śiṣyate ।। 

ādāv ante ca yat satyaṃ vartamāne sad eva tat ।
yasya sarvaṃ sad eva syāt tasya sattaiva śiṣyate ।। 

asatyabhūtaṃ toyāntaś candravyomalatādikam ।
bālā evābhivāñchanti manomohāya nottamāḥ ।। 

bālo hi vitatākārair vasturiktaiḥ prayojanaiḥ ।
santoṣam ety anantāya duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu ।। 

tasmān mā bhava bālas tvaṃ rāma rājīvalocana ।
anityatām ihālokya nityam āśraya susthiram ।। 

asad idam akhilaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti vigaṇayya viṣāditāstu mā te ।
sad iha hi sakalaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti ca vilokya viṣāditāstu mā te ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

yathābhūtārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

naṣṭe dhane atha dārādau śokasyāvasaro atra kaḥ ।
indrajāle kṣaṇād dṛṣṭe naṣṭe kā paridevanā ।। 

gandharvanagarasyārdhe bhūṣite dūṣite atha vā ।
avidyāṃśe sutādau vā kaḥ kramas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

prāpte dhane atha dārādau harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ ।
vṛddhāyāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ kim ānando jalārthinaḥ ।। 

dhanadāreṣu vṛddheṣu duḥkhaṃ yuktaṃ na tuṣṭatā ।
vṛddhāyāṃ mohamāyāyāṃ kas samāśvāsavān iha ।। 

yair eva jāyate rāgo mūrkhasyādhikatāṃ gataiḥ ।
tair eva bhogaiḥ prājñasya virāga upajāyate ।। 

apāradarśino mūḍhā bhogair āyānti tuṣṭatām ।
pārāvalokinas tv etair virāgaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ ।। 

ato rāghava tattvajño vyavahāreṣu saṃsṛteḥ ।
naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣasva prāptaṃ prāptam upāhara ।। 

anāgatānāṃ bhogānām avāñchanam akṛtrimam ।
āgatānāṃ ca sambhoga iti paṇḍitalakṣaṇam ।। 

saṃsārasambhrame hy asmiṃś channātmany ātatāyini ।
tathā vihara sambuddho yathā nāyāsi mūḍhatām ।। 

saṃsārāḍambarasyāsya prapañcaracite krame ।
samyak samaṃ na paśyanti ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ ।। 

yayā kayācid yuktyeha yasya dṛśyagatāratiḥ ।
parimajjati tasyācchā na kvacin nirmalā matiḥ ।। 

yasyāsad idam ity āsthā nivṛttā sarvavastuṣu ।
kroḍīkaroti sarvajñaṃ nāvidyā tam avāstavī ।। 

ahaṃ jagac caikam idaṃ sarvam eveti yasya dhīḥ ।
āsthānāsthe parityajya saṃsthitā sa na majjati ।। 

śuddhaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ padaṃ buddhyāvalambya ca ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ viśvaṃ mā gṛhāṇa vimuñca mā ।। 

atyantavitatas svacchas sarvavān sarvavarjitaḥ ।
vyomavat tiṣṭha nīrāgaṃ rāma kāryakaro api san ।। 

yasya necchā na cānicchā jñasya karmaṇi tiṣṭhataḥ ।
na tasya lipyate prajñā padmapattram ivāmbubhiḥ ।। 

darśanasparśanādīni mā karotu karotu vā ।
tavendriyagaṇo gauṇas tvam aniccho bhavātmavān ।। 

mamedam ity asadbhūte indriyārthe bhavanmanaḥ ।
mā nimajjatv amagnaṃ san mā karotu karotu vā ।। 

yadi te nendriyārthaśrīs svadate hṛdi rāghava ।
tad asi jñātavijñānas samuttīrṇo bhavārṇavāt ।। 

asvāditendriyārthasya satanor atanor api ।
anicchato api sampannā muktir arthavaśāt tava ।। 

uccaiḥpadāya parayā prajñayā vāsanāgaṇāt ।
puṣpād gandham ivodāraṃ ceto rāma pṛthak kuru ।। 

saṃsārāmbunidhāv asmin vāsanāmbupariplute ।
ye prajñānāvam ārūḍhās te tīrṇā bruḍitāḥ pare ।। 

kṣuradhārāgraśitayā dhiyā paramadhīrayā ।
pravicāryātmanas tattvaṃ tat tvaṃ svaṃ padam āviśa ।। 

yathā tattvavidaḥ prājñā jñānabṛṃhitacetasaḥ ।
viharanti tathā rāma vihartavyaṃ na mūḍhavat ।। 

jīvanmuktā mahātmāno nityatṛptā mahāśayāḥ ।
ācārair anugantavyā na bhogakṛpaṇāś śaṭhāḥ ।। 

na tyajanti na vāñchanti vyavahāraṃ jagadgatam ।
sarvam evānuvartante parāvaravido janāḥ ।। 

prabhāvasyābhimānasya guṇānāṃ yaśasaś śriyaḥ ।
na kvacit kṛpaṇā loke mahāntas tattvadarśinaḥ ।। 

suśūnye api na khidyante devodyāne nasaṅginaḥ ।
niyatiṃ ca na muñcanti mahānto bhāskarā iva ।। 

vigatecchā yathāprāptavyavahārānuvartinaḥ ।
vicaranty asamunnaddhās svasthā deharathasthitāḥ ।। 

tvam api prāptavān rāma vivekam imam āgatam ।
prajñābalena cānena jāne svastho asi sundara ।। 

spaṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya nirmāno gatamatsaraḥ ।
viharāsmin bhuvaḥ pīṭhe parāṃ siddhim avāpsyasi ।। 

svasthas sarvehitatyāgī dūrālokitavāñchanaḥ ।
parāṃ śītalatām antar ādāya viharānagha ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

itthaṃ girā vimalayā vimalāśayasya rāmo munes sa parimṛṣṭa ivābabhāse ।
jñānāmṛtena madhureṇa virājatāntaḥ pūrṇaś śaśāṅka iva śītalatāṃ jagāma ।। 

yathābhūtārthāvabodhavyavahārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña vedavedāntapāraga ।
āśvasta iva tiṣṭhāmi śuddhābhir bhavaduktibhiḥ ।। 

udārāṇi viraktāni peśalāny ucitāni ca ।
śrotuṃ tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi vacāṃsi vadatas tava ।। 

jātyā rājasasāttvikyāḥ kathanāvasarāntare ।
utpattir bhavatā proktā bhagavan padmajanmanaḥ ।। 

atrāyaṃ mama sandeho mahātman hṛdi vartate ।
sarvasaṃśayavicchedakārinn āśu tad ucyatām ।। 

kvacid abjāt kvacid vyomnaḥ kvacid aṇḍāt kvacij jalāt ।
citrotpattiḥ kathaṃ proktā śāstre kamalajanmanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bahūni brahmalakṣyāṇi śaṅkarendraśatāni ca ।
nārāyaṇasahasrāṇi samatītāni rāghava ।। 

adyānyeṣu vicitreṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu ca bhūriṣu ।
nānācāravihārāṇi viharanti sahasraśaḥ ।। 

tulyakālam ananteṣu kālāntarabhaveṣu ca ।
jagatsu prodbhaviṣyanti bahūny anyāni bhūriśaḥ ।। 

teṣām abjodbhavādīnāṃ teṣv aṇḍeṣu divaukasām ।
utpattayo mahābāho vicitrāḥ kathitā divi ।। 

kadācit sṛṣṭayaś śārvyaḥ kadācit padmajodbhavāḥ ।
kadācid api vaiṣṇavyaḥ kadācin muninirmitāḥ ।। 

kadācid abjajo brahmā kadācit salilodbhavaḥ ।
aṇḍodbhavaḥ kadācic ca kadācij jāyate ambarāt ।। 

kasmiṃścid aṇḍe tryakṣo arkaḥ kasmiṃścid api vāsavaḥ ।
kasmiṃścit puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kasmiṃścit tryakṣa eva hi ।। 

kasyāñcid bhūr abhūt sṛṣṭau nīrandhratarusaṅkaṭā ।
kasyāñcin naranīrandhrā kasyāñcid bhūdharāvṛtā ।। 

bhūr abhūn mṛṇmayī kācit kācid āsīd dṛṣanmayī ।
āsīd dhemamayī kācit kācin māṃsamayī tathā ।। 

ihaiva kānicit tāni jaganty anyāny athānyathā ।
anyo'nyaikaikalokāni nirvedhāṃsy api kānicit ।। 

anantāni jaganty asmin brahmatattvamahāmbare ।
ambhodhivīcivrajavan nimajjanty udbhavanti ca ।। 

yathā taraṅgā jaladhau mṛgatṛṣṇā marau yathā ।
kusumāni yathā cūte tathā viśvaśriyaḥ pare ।। 

bhānor gaṇayituṃ śakyā raśmiṣu trasareṇavaḥ ।
ālolavapuṣo brahmatattve na jagatāṃ gaṇāḥ ।। 

yathā maṣakajālāni varṣāsv ikṣuvanāliṣu ।
utpatyotpatya naśyanti tathemā lokasṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

na ca vijñāyate kasmāt kālāt prabhṛti cāgatāḥ ।
nityāgamāpāyaparā etās sargaparamparāḥ ।। 

anādimatyo avirataṃ prasphuranti taraṅgavat ।
pūrvāt pūrvaṃ kilābhūvaṃs tataḥ pūrvataraṃ tathā ।। 

bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyante surāsuranarādikāḥ ।
sarittaraṅgabhaṅgyaitās samastā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

yathedam aṇḍaṃ vairiñcaṃ tathā brahmāṇḍapaṅktayaḥ ।
sahasraśaḥ parikṣīṇā nālikā vatsareṣv iva ।। 

anyās samprati vidyante vartamānaśarīrakāḥ ।
pāre brahmapurasyāsya vitate brahmaṇaḥ pade ।। 

brahmaṇy anyā bhaviṣyanti bahvyo brahmapuraśriyaḥ ।
purastāc ca vinaṅkṣyanti bhūtvā bhūtvā yathā giraḥ ।। 

brahmaṇy anyā bhaviṣyantyas sthitās sargaparamparāḥ ।
ghaṭā iva mṛdo rāśāv aṅkure pallavā iva ।। 

yāvatsamudraṃ jaladhau yathā jalarayormayaḥ ।
yāvadbrahma cidākāśe tathā tribhuvanaśriyaḥ ।। 

sphārākāravikārāḍhyāḥ prekṣyamāṇā na kiñcana ।
unmajjantyo nimajjantyo na satyā nāpy asacchriyaḥ ।। 

jaḍā rasānvitās tanvyas tāś śevālalatā iva ।
taraṅgasamadharmiṇyo dṛṣṭanaṣṭaśarīrikāḥ ।। 

sarvāsāṃ sṛṣṭikoṭīnāṃ citrācāraviceṣṭitāḥ ।
citrākāravikārāś ca citrarūpāś ca sṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samagrās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tattvajñaviṣayā rāma salilād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

āyānti sṛṣṭayo devāj jaladād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tasmād evākhilā jātā ālokād iva dṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samastās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।
vyatiriktā ivābhānti svāṣṭhīlāś śalmaler iva ।। 

iha sṛṣṭiṣu puṣṭāsu nikṛṣṭāsu ca rāghava ।
paramān nabhaso jātatanmātramalamālitam ।। 

kadācit prathamaṃ vyoma pratiṣṭhām upagacchati ।
tataḥ prajāyate brahmā vyomajo asau prajāpatiḥ ।। 

kadācit prathamaṃ vāyuḥ pratiṣṭhām upagacchati ।
tataḥ prajāyate brahmā vāyujo asau prajāpatiḥ ।। 

kadācit prathamaṃ vāri sphāratām adhigacchati ।
tataḥ prajāyate brahmā jalajo asau prajāpatiḥ ।। 

kadācit prathamaṃ pṛthvī sphāratām adhigacchati ।
tataḥ prajāyate brahmā pārthivo asau prajāpatiḥ ।। 

iti catvāri sampīḍya pañcamaṃ vardhate yadā ।
tadā tajjatayaiveśaḥ kurute jāgatīṃ kriyām ।। 

kadācid apsu vāyau vā susphāre vāpi tejasi ।
svayaṃ sampadyate kaścit pumān prakṛtibhāvataḥ ।। 

tasyātha puṃso vadanāt kadācij jāyate padāt ।
kadācid aṃsāt pṛṣṭhād vā kadācil locanāt karāt ।। 

kadācit puruṣasyāsya nābheḥ padmaḥ prajāyate ।
tasmin sañcarate brahmā padmajo asau prakīrtitaḥ ।। 

māyeyaṃ svapnavad bhrāntir mithyāracitacakrikā ।
manorājyarucir lolā salilāvṛttisundarī ।। 

kim ivāsyāṃ vada jñaptau kathaṃ sambhavatīha no ।
na ced bālamanorājyam idaṃ paryanuyujyate ।। 

kadācid ambare śuddhe manastattvānurañjanāt ।
sauvarṇaṃ brahmagarbhaṃ ca svayam aṇḍaṃ pravartate ।। 

kadācid eṣa puruṣo vīryaṃ sṛjati vāriṇi ।
tasmāt prajāyate padmaṃ brahmāṇḍam atha vā mahat ।। 

tasmāt prajāyate brahmā kadācid bhāskaro hy asau ।
kadācid varuṇo brahmā kadācid vāyur abjajaḥ ।। 

evam antarvihīnāsu vicitrāsv iha sṛṣṭiṣu ।
vicitrotpattayo rāma brahmaṇo vividhā gatāḥ ।। 

nidarśanārthaṃ sṛṣṭes tu mayaikasya prajāpateḥ ।
bhavate kathitotpattir asyevānyasya vānagha ।। 

manovijṛmbhaṇam ayaṃ saṃsāra iti sanmate ।
sambodhanāya bhavatas sṛṣṭikrama udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

tās sāttvikīprabhṛtayo jātayas tv ittham āgatāḥ ।
iti te kathanāyaiṣa sṛṣṭikrama udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

punas sṛṣṭiḥ punar nāśaḥ punar duḥkhaṃ punas sukham ।
punar ajñāḥ punas tajjñā bandhamokṣadṛśau punaḥ ।। 

punaḥ punas sṛṣṭikarāḥ pītasnehadaśābhṛtaḥ ।
dīpā iva kṛtālokāḥ praśāmyanty udbhavanti ca ।। 

dehotpattau vināśe ca dīpānāṃ brahmaṇām api ।
kālenādhikatāṃ tyaktvā nāśe bhedo na kaścana ।। 

punaḥ kṛtaṃ punas tretā punaś ca dvāparaḥ kaliḥ ।
punar āvartate sarvaṃ cakrāvartehayā jagat ।। 

punar manvantarārambhāḥ punaḥ kalpaparamparāḥ ।
punaḥ punaḥ kāryadaśāḥ prātaḥ prātar ahar yathā ।। 

lokālokakalākālakalanākalitāntaram ।
punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcana punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

anāhate pratapte ayaḥpiṇḍe analakaṇā iva ।
ime bhāvās sthitā nityaṃ cidākāśe svabhāvataḥ ।। 

kadācid anabhivyaktaṃ kadācid vyaktim āgatam ।
idam asti pare tattve sarvaṃ vṛkṣa ivārtavam ।। 

citspanda eva sarvātmā sarvadaivedṛśākṛtiḥ ।
yad asmāj jāyate sargo dvīndutvam iva locanāt ।। 

citas sarvās samāyānti santatās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tatsthā evāpy atatsthābhāś candrād iva marīcayaḥ ।। 

na kadācana saṃsāraḥ kilāyaṃ nāma sarvadā ।
sarvaśaktāv asaṃsāraśaktitā vidyate yataḥ ।। 

na caivedaṃ kadācit tu sādho jagad anīdṛśam ।
sarvaśaktau hi saṃsāraśaktitā vidyate yataḥ ।। 

mahākalpāvadhiṃ kālam asaṃsāritayeddhayā ।
na bhaviṣyati saṃsāra idānīm iti yujyate ।। 

jñadṛṣṭyā sarvam evedaṃ brahmaiveti mahāmate ।
nāsti saṃsāra ity etad upapadyata eva naḥ ।। 

ajñadṛṣṭyā tv avicchinnasaṃsāritvād anāratam ।
nityā saṃsāramāyeyam ity asyaivopapadyate ।। 

punaḥ punaś ca bhāvitvān na kadācid anīdṛśam ।
jagad ity etad apy uktaṃ na mṛṣā raghunandana ।। 

anārataṃ patadbhūtā diśo dṛṣṭvā vinaśvarīḥ ।
vināśīdaṃ jagat sarvam iti kiṃ nopapadyate ।। 

sarvadoditacandrārkā diśo dṛṣṭvā sthirācalāḥ ।
avināśi jagat sarvam ity apy avitathopamam ।। 

na tad asti na yat tasminn ekasmin vitatātmani ।
saṅkalpakalanājālam anākhye nopapadyate ।। 

punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ punar maraṇajanmanī ।
punas sukhaṃ punar duḥkhaṃ punaḥ karaṇakarmaṇī ।। 

punar āśāḥ punar vyoma punas sāmbudhayo adrayaḥ ।
abhyudeti punas sṛṣṭiś śaśvad arkaprabhā yathā ।। 

punar daityāḥ punar devāḥ punar lokāntarakramaḥ ।
punas svargāpavargehā punar indraḥ punaś śaśī ।। 

punar nārāyaṇo devaḥ punar manusutādayaḥ ।
punar āśāś calaccārucandrārkavaruṇānilāḥ ।। 

sumerukarṇikā kāntaṛkṣakesaraśālinī ।
phullasphītodarodeti rodasīnalinī punaḥ ।। 

vyomakānanam ākramya valgaty aṃśunakhotkaraiḥ ।
tamaḥkarighaṭā bhettuṃ punar bhāskarakesarī ।। 

punar induś calaccūtamañjarīsundaraiḥ karaiḥ ।
karoty amṛtam āhlādaṃ digvadhūmukhamaṇḍanam ।। 

punas svargataroḥ puṇyakṣayavātasamīritāḥ ।
patantīha vinunnāṅgāḥ puṇyakṛtphalapālayaḥ ।। 

punaḥ kāryakriyāpakṣais saṃsārārambhanāmakam ।
kiñcit paṭapaṭaṃ kṛtvā yāti kālakapiñjalaḥ ।। 

punar indrālike yāte rājyam āsvādya kesaram ।
āyāty aparadevendraṣaṭpadas svargapaṅkajam ।। 

punaḥ kālaṃ kṛtāpūtaṃ kaluṣīkurute kaliḥ ।
sacakriṇam ivāmbhodhiṃ pravṛddho avakarānilaḥ ।। 

punaḥ kālakulālena kṛtabhūtaśarāvakam ।
cakram āvartate vegād ajasraṃ kālanāmakam ।। 

punar nīrasatām eti jagad dhvastaśubhasthiti ।
abhyāśībhūtakalpāntaṃ saṃśuṣkam iva kānanam ।। 

punar arkagaṇāṃśvagnidagdhānantakalevaram ।
sarvabhūtāsthisampūrṇaṃ jagad eti śmaśānatām ।। 

punaḥ kulācalākārapuṣkarāvartavarṣaṇaiḥ ।
nṛtyadbhasmabṛhatphenāṃ yāty ekārṇavatāṃ jagat ।। 

punas saṃśāntavāyvambu riktaṃ sakalavastubhiḥ ।
tadapūrvam ivākāśaṃ jagad āyāti śūnyatām ।। 

punaḥ katipayā bhuktvā samās samarasāśayaḥ ।
jīvitaṃ jīrṇayā tanvā brahmādhyātmani līyate ।। 

punar anyena kālena tathaiva jagatāṃ gaṇam ।
manas tanoti vai śūnye gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā ।। 

punas sargasamārambhaḥ punaḥ pralayasambhavaḥ ।
sarvaṃ punar idaṃ rāma cakravat parivartate ।। 

kim etasmin mahāmāyāḍambare dīrghaśambare ।
rāma satyam asatyaṃ vā nirṇīya yad ihocyate ।। 

dāśūrākhyāyikeveyaṃ rāma saṃsāracakrikā ।
kalpanāracitākārā vastuśūnyā tu vastutaḥ ।। 

aviralam idam ātataṃ vikalpair asaduditākṛtibhir dvicandrakalpaiḥ ।
viracitam asatā tu yan na sat taj jagad iha tena vimūḍhatā kimutthā ।। 

jagatsattāsattānirṇayayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

triṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kriyāviśeṣabahulā bhogaiśvaryahatāśayāḥ ।
nāvekṣante yadā satyaṃ na paśyanti śaṭhās tadā ।। 

ye tu pāraṃ gatā buddher indriyair na vaśīkṛtāḥ ।
ta etāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ paśyanti karabilvavat ।। 

nanu tāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ jīvo dṛṣṭvā vicāravān ।
ahaṅkāramayīṃ āsthāṃ tyajaty ahir iva tvacam ।। 

asaktatāṃ tato abhyetya punar nāma na jāyate ।
kṣetre api suciraṃ tiṣṭhad bījaṃ dagdham ivāgninā ।। 

ādhivyādhiparītāya prātar vādya vināśine ।
prayatante śarīrāya hitam ajñās tu nātmane ।। 

tvam apy ajñavad ajñasya śarīrasya samīhitam ।
mā sampādaya duḥkhāya bhavātmaikaparāyaṇaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

dāśūrākhyāyikeveyaṃ nāma saṃsāracakrikā ।
kalpanāracitākārā vastuśūnyeti kiṃ prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jaganmāyāsvarūpasya varṇanāvyapadeśataḥ ।
dāśūrākhyāyikāṃ rāma varṇyamānāṃ mayā śṛṇu ।। 

asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe vicitrakusumadrumaḥ ।
magadhā nāma vikhyātaś śrīmāñ janapado mahān ।। 

kadambavanavistārī tālāvalitajaṅgalaḥ ।
vicitravihagavyūhas sarvāścaryamanoharaḥ ।। 

sasyasaṅkaṭasīmāntaḥ puropavanamaṇḍitaḥ ।
kamalotpalakalhārapūrṇasarvasarittaṭaḥ ।। 

udyānadolāvilasallalanāgeyaghuṅghumī ।
niśopabhuktakusumanīrandhraviśikhāvaniḥ ।। 

tatraikasmin giritaṭe karṇikārasamākule ।
kadalīṣaṇḍanīrandhre nīpagulmavirājite ।। 

kūjaccakoracamare dhvanannirjharavāriṇi ।
phullacūtalatājāle pragītakalakokile ।। 

pulindalīlālulite tālāvṛtanabhastale ।
utphullapadminīśāre jīvajīvakajīvite ।। 

puṣpaughasphūrjadanile kesarāruṇadhūlini ।
kāraṇḍavakṛtārāve saratsarasasārase ।। 

tasmin nagavare puṇye vicitravihagadrume ।
kaścit paramadharmātmā munir āsīn mahātapāḥ ।। 

dāśūranāmā mahatā tapoyogena saṃyutaḥ ।
kadambapṛṣṭhavāstavyo vītarāgo mahāmatiḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ṛṣis tapasvī bhagavan vipine kena hetunā ।
kathaṃ vāpy avasat pṛṣṭhe kadambasya mahātaroḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śaralometi vikhyātaḥ pitā tasya babhūva ha ।
nāmnāpara iva brahmā tasminn evāvasad girau ।। 

tasyāsāv ekaputro abhūt kaco devaguror iva ।
tena sārdhaṃ sa putreṇa nītavāñ jīvitaṃ vane ।। 

athāsau śaralomātra bhuktvā yugagaṇaṃ yayau ।
tyaktadehas surāgāraṃ tyaktanīḍaḥ khago yathā ।। 

eka eva vane tasmin dāśūraḥ praruroda ha ।
daśāpanītapitṛkaḥ karuṇaṃ kuraro yathā ।। 

mātāpitṛviyogena śokasantāpitāśayaḥ ।
mlānim abhyāyayau nūnaṃ hemanta iva paṅkajam ।। 

bālo asāv atha dīnātmā vanadevatayā vane ।
ittham āśvāsito rāma tadādṛśyaśarīrayā ।। 

ṛṣiputra mahāprājña kim ajña iva rodiṣi ।
saṃsārasya na kasmāt tvaṃ svarūpaṃ vetsi cañcalam ।। 

sarvadaivedṛśī sādho saṃsārī saṃsṛtiś calā ।
jāyate jīvate paścād avaśyaṃ ca vinaśyati ।। 

yad yat kiñcid dṛśor dṛśyaṃ brahmādikam idaṃ mune ।
gantavyas tena sarveṇa vināśo nātra saṃśayaḥ ।। 

tadarthaṃ mā kṛthā vyarthaṃ viṣādaṃ maraṇe pituḥ ।
avaśyabhāvy astamayo jātasyāharpater iva ।। 

aśarīrām iti śrutvā giram āraktalocanaḥ ।
dhairyam āsādayām āsa śikhaṇḍī stanitād iva ।। 

utthāyāvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā pāścātyaṃ pitur ādṛtaḥ ।
cakāra tapase buddhiṃ dṛḍhām uttamasiddhaye ।। 

brāhmeṇa karmaṇā tasya vipine caratas tapaḥ ।
anantasaṅkalpamayaṃ śrotriyatvaṃ babhūva ha ।। 

ajñātajñeyabuddhes tu suśrotriyatayā tayā ।
na viśaśrāma ceto asya pavitre api dharātale ।। 

kevalaṃ sarvam evedam api śuddhaṃ dharātalam ।
aśuddham iva paśyan sa na reme kvacid eva hi ।। 

atha saṅkalpayām āsa svasaṅkalpanayaiva saḥ ।
vṛkṣāgram eva saṃśuddhaṃ sthitir atrocitā mama ।। 

tad idānīṃ tapas tapsye tapasā yena śākhiṣu ।
khagavat sthitim āpnomi śākhāsu ca daleṣu ca ।। 

iti sañcintya sañjvālya hutāśam atibhāsvaram ।
juhāva tasmin protkṛtya māṃsaṃ svaṃ skandhabhittitaḥ ।। 

atha gīrvāṇavṛndasya samagrā galabhittayaḥ ।
manmukhasthena mā yāntu vipramāṃsena bhasmasāt ।। 

iti sañcintya bhagavān saptārcis tasya dehavān ।
puro babhūva dīptāṃśur dīptāṃśur vākpater iva ।। 

uvāca vacanaṃ vīrakumārābhimataṃ varam ।
gṛhāṇa sthāpitaṃ sādho kośakośān maṇiṃ yathā ।। 

ity uktavantam analam arghapuṣpopaśobhinā ।
sampūjya stutivādena prāha viprakumārakaḥ ।। 

bhagavan bhūtapūrṇāyā bhuvaḥ pāvanam aṅganam ।
nāpnomi tena vṛkṣāṇām upari sthitir astu me ।। 

ity ukte muniputreṇa sarvadevamukhaṃ śikhī ।
evam astu tam ity uktvā jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ ।। 

tasminn antarhite deve kṣaṇāt sāndhya ivāmbude ।
pūrṇakāmaḥ kumāro asāv āpūrṇendur ivābabhau ।। 

adhigatābhimatānanamaṇḍaladyutijavena jahāsa sa tuṣṭimān ।
śaśinam āptakalākulam ambujaṃ vikasitaṃ ca sitaṃ smitaśobhinā ।। 

dāśūropākhyāne dāśūravarapradānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha kānanamadhyasthaṃ cumbitāmbudamaṇḍalam ।
madhyāhnakhinnasūryāśvasevitaskandhamaṇḍapam ।। 

mimānam iva dikkukṣīr dīrghair viṭapabāhubhiḥ ।
ālokayantaṃ kakubho vikāsikusumekṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

vātāvalulitānalpabhramadbhramarakuntalam ।
pramārjayantam āśānāṃ mukhaṃ pallavapāṇibhiḥ ।। 

kacchair urugulucchācchamañjarīpuñjapiñjaraiḥ ।
āsyair iva satāmbūlair hasantam alimālitaiḥ ।। 

latāvilāsanollāsipuṣpakesaradhūlibhiḥ ।
ābaddhamaṇḍalābhogaṃ pūrṇendum iva dīptibhiḥ ।। 

saṅkaṭaṃ viṭapāvalyā kuñjakūjaccakorayā ।
gāyatkinnarayā siddhavīthyeva jagad uccayā ।। 

latāpīṭhopaviṣṭānām adholambaiḥ kalāpinām ।
kalāpaiś śobhitaṃ vyoma sendracāpair ivāmbudaiḥ ।। 

magnonmagnaiḥ pratiskandhaṃ cāmarair bhāsitaṃ sitaiḥ ।
cakorānugataiḥ pūrṇais saṃvatsaram ivendubhiḥ ।। 

kapiñjalakalālāpaiḥ kalakokilakūjitaiḥ ।
jīvajīvavirāvaiś ca pragāyantam ivorjitaiḥ ।। 

kādambakakadambaiś ca kulāyakṛtakelibhiḥ ।
svargakoṭaraviśrāntais siddhair jagad ivāvṛtam ।। 

pravālāruṇahastābhir alinetrābhir āśritam ।
apsarobhir iva svargaṃ mañjarībhir itas tataḥ ।। 

sendracāpaṃ vilolena kusumotkarareṇunā ।
mañjarīpiñjaraṃ śyāmaṃ vidyutvantam ivāmbudam ।। 

sahasrabhujaśākhāḍhyaṃ pūritākāśakoṭaram ।
viśvarūpam ivonnṛttaṃ candrārkakṛtakuṇḍalam ।। 

tale niṣaṇṇanāgendraṃ vyomni tārāgaṇākulam ।
latāpuṣpamayaṃ madhye bhūmaṇḍalam ivāparam ।। 

pitāmaham ivāśeṣaśailakānanaśākhinām ।
phalapallavapuṣpāṇāṃ kośam ekam ivāvanau ।। 

dadhānaṃ kalikājālaṃ sthagitaṃ puṣpadhūlibhiḥ ।
kaccheṣv arkakaracchannatārājālam ivāmbaram ।। 

vilolavihagais skandhaiḥ kulāyakulasaṅkulaiḥ ।
valitaṃ bhūtalaṃ lolalokair janapadair iva ।। 

mañjarīsupatākāḍhyaṃ latāmaṇḍapamaṇḍitam ।
puṣpamakkoladhavalaṃ puṣpaprakarapūritam ।। 

kūjaccakoracamaraśukakokilaśārikam ।
ghanastabakasañchannakuharāgragavākṣakam ।। 

sañcaratpakṣijanataṃ madamantharakoṭaram ।
sarvāsāṃ vanadevīnām antaḥpuram ivottamam ।। 

bruḍadbhṛṅgataraṅgaughaiḥ puṣpakesararāśibhiḥ ।
rājamānaṃ patantībhis saridbhir iva parvatam ।। 

bhramadbhiḥ puṣpapattraughair mandavātavilāsibhiḥ ।
vardhamānair vṛtaskandhaṃ śubhrābhrair iva bhūdharam ।। 

mātaṅgaghaṭaghṛṣṭena jānustambhena pīṭhinā ।
ābhoginā baddhapadaṃ taṭeneva mahācalam ।। 

vicitravarṇapakṣāṇāṃ skandhakoṭaracāriṇām ।
vṛtaṃ khagānāṃ vṛndena bhūtānām iva śṛṅgiṇam ।। 

stabakāṅgulijālena lolenābhinayakriyām ।
diśantam iva vallīnāṃ pranṛttānāṃ vanānilaiḥ ।। 

kaścid eva nirāśo me nārthī cāpaiti tuṣṭitaḥ ।
nṛtyantam iva puṣpāḍhyair latāvalayavalganaiḥ ।। 

latākāntaikakāntatvāc chṛṅgārarasanirbharam ।
kākalyeva pragāyantaṃ mattālijananissvanaiḥ ।। 

ārād unmuktakusumaṃ siddhānāṃ vyomacāriṇām ।
svāgatānīva kurvāṇaṃ kokilālikulāravaiḥ ।। 

phalapuṣpalatollāsam aunnatyaṃ ca mahīruhām ।
vihasantam ivācchābhiḥ puṣpakuṭmaladīptibhiḥ ।। 

pārijātam ivājetum ūrdhvagais skandhamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
vyomāntar abhidhāvantam alam uddhurakandharam ।। 

madhyabhāgasphuradbhṛṅgais stabakair ghanapakṣmabhiḥ ।
sahasrākṣatvam atulair jetum aindram ivodyatam ।। 

kacatkusumagucchācchaphaṇāmaṇigaṇāvṛtam ।
pātālād utthitaṃ śeṣam iva vyomadidṛkṣayā ।। 

rajasoddhūlitākāraṃ dvitīyam iva śaṅkaram ।
chāyayā phalaśālinyā samastamuniśaṅkaram ।। 

nibiḍadalanibaddhabhittibhāgaiḥ kusumalatānavamaṇḍapair upetam ।
puram iva gagane kadambavṛkṣaṃ khagakulanāgarasaṅkaṭaṃ dadarśa ।। 

dāśūropākhyāne kadambavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tam athāsau mahābuddhiḥ phalapallavaśālinam ।
ānandamantharamanāḥ puṣparūpācalopamam ।। 

kadambaṃ rodasīstambham āruroha vanasthitam ।
ekārṇavagataṃ śauriḥ kalpavṛkṣam ivonnatam ।। 

tatrāsau vyomalagnāyāś śākhāyāḥ prāntapallave ।
viveśādhigatākāśam aiḍūkaprāntabuddhavat ।। 

athopaviśya mṛduni navapallavaviṣṭare ।
kṣaṇam ālokitās tena diśaḥ kautukamantharam ।। 

saridekāvalīramyāś śailendrastanakuṭmalāḥ ।
nirmalākāśakavarā lolanīlāmbudālakāḥ ।। 

nīlaśādvalavasanāḥ puṣpagauravanāṅgikāḥ ।
gṛhītasāgarāpūrṇakalaśāḥ purabhūṣaṇāḥ ।। 

dhṛtapraphullapadminyas sugandhimukhamārutāḥ ।
grāmaghuṅghumakākalyo nirjharāravanūpurāḥ ।। 

dyumūrdhāno mahīpādā vanālīromarājayaḥ ।
jaṅgalorunitambinyaś candrārkakṛtakuṇḍalāḥ ।। 

śālisañcārakedāracandanasthāsakāṅkitāḥ ।
śikharorasijālagnahimaśubhrāmbudāṃśukāḥ ।। 

mahārṇavapayaḥpūranavamaṇḍanadarpaṇāḥ ।
vṛkṣaughagharmapulakā bhuvanāntaḥpurāntarāḥ ।। 

ārtavasnānadhāriṇyo lagnasūryāṃśukuṅkumāḥ ।
vicitrakusumopetāś candrāṃśusitacandanāḥ ।। 

gaganatalalatādalopaviṣṭaḥ prasṛtavanāvalivārivāhaveṣāḥ ।
tribhuvanavanitā dadarśa hṛṣṭaḥ kusumanirantaramaṇḍitā daśāśāḥ ।। 

dāśūropākhyāne dāśūradigavalokanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataḥ prabhṛti tatrāsau prasiddhas tāpasāśrame ।
kadambadāśūra iti śūras tapasi dāruṇe ।। 

tasmiṃl latādale sthitvā vilokya kakubhaḥ kṣaṇam ।
dṛḍhaṃ padmāsanaṃ baddhvā digbhyaḥ pratyāhṛtātmanā ।। 

ajñātaparamārthena kriyāmātre ca tiṣṭhatā ।
phalakārpaṇyayuktena manasā so akaron makham ।। 

nabhogatalatāpattrasaṃsthitena vanāntare ।
sarvās svamanasā tena kṛtā yajñakriyāḥ kramāt ।। 

tatrāsau daśa varṣāṇi manasaivāyajat surān ।
gavāśvanaramedhādyair yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ ।। 

kālenāmalatāṃ yāte vitate tasya cetasi ।
balād avatatārāntar jñānam ātmaprasādajam ।। 

tato viśīrṇāvaraṇo vigaladvāsanāmalaḥ ।
avasat pallave tasmin munir vigatakalmaṣaḥ ।। 

sa dadarśaikadā tasyāṃ latāyām agratas sthitām ।
vanadevīṃ viśālākṣīm ālolakusumāmbarām ।। 

kāminīkāntavadanāṃ madaghūrṇitalocanām ।
nīlotpalāmodavatīm atīva sumanoharām ।। 

tām uvācānavadyāṅgīṃ sa munir vinatānanām ।
kokilaḥ kusumāpūranatāṃ vanalatām iva ।। 

kā tvam utpalapattrākṣi parivikṣobhitasmarā ।
vayasyām iva puṣpāḍhyāṃ latāṃ kim adhitiṣṭhasi ।। 

ity uktā mṛgaśāvākṣī gaurī pīnapayodharā ।
munim āha manohāri mugdhākṣaram idaṃ vacaḥ ।। 

yāni yāni durāpāni vāñchitāni mahītale ।
prāpyante tāni tāny āśu mahatām eva yācñayā ।। 

aham asmiṃl latākīrṇe tvatkadambābhyalaṅkṛte ।
latālīlālayā brahman vipine vanadevatā ।। 

hyaś caitrasitapakṣasya trayodaśyāṃ smarotsave ।
babhūva vanadevīnāṃ samājo nandane vane ।। 

sāmodapuṣpabhramare kokilāliparicchadā ।
tatrāham agamaṃ nātha trailokyalalanāsadaḥ ।। 

tato dṛṣṭā mayā sarvā vayasyā madanotsave ।
aputrayā putrayutās tenāhaṃ duḥkhitā bhṛśam ।। 

tvayi sarvārthisārthasya bṛhatkalpatarau sthite ।
anātheva kathaṃ nātha kila śocyāsmy aputrikā ।। 

dehi me bhagavan putraṃ no ced deham ihāgnaye ।
prakaromy āhutiṃ putraduḥkhadāhopaśāntaye ।। 

tām ity uktavatīṃ tanvīṃ vihasya munipuṅgavaḥ ।
prāha hastagataṃ puṣpaṃ tasyai dattvā dayānvitaḥ ।। 

gaccha tanvaṅgi māsena pūjārham alilocanam ।
prasoṣyase sutaṃ kāntaṃ prasūnam iva sallatā ।। 

kiṃ tv asau maraṇāveśapāpinyetas tvayā yataḥ ।
yācitaḥ kṛcchrasamprāpyajñānas tena bhaviṣyati ।। 

ity uktvā sa munis tanvīṃ prasannamukhamaṇḍalām ।
paricaryāṃ karomīti prārthanotkāṃ vyasarjayat ।। 

sā jagāmātmasadanaṃ so atiṣṭhat svātmanā saha ।
avahat kramaśaḥ kāla ṛtusaṃvatsarāṅkitaḥ ।। 

atha dīrgheṇa kālena saivotpalavilocanā ।
dvādaśābdam upādāya sutaṃ munim upāyayau ।। 

sampraṇamyopaviśyāgre munim indusamānanā ।
uvāca kalayā vācā cūtadrumam ivālinī ।। 

ayaṃ sa bhagavan bhavyaḥ kumāraḥ putra āvayoḥ ।
kṛto mayā samagrāṇāṃ kalānāṃ kila kovidaḥ ।। 

prabho kevalam etena jñānaṃ nādhigataṃ śubham ।
yena saṃsārayantre asmin na punaḥ paripīḍyate ।। 

jñānaṃ tvam evāsya vibho kṛpayopadiśādhunā ।
ko hi nāma kule jātaṃ putraṃ maurkhye niyojayet ।। 

evaṃvadantīṃ sa munir macchiṣyam abale sutam ।
ihaiva sthāpayainaṃ tvam ity uktvā tāṃ vyasarjayat ।। 

tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ sa pitur antevāsitayā tadā ।
atiṣṭhat saṃyato dhīmān arkasyevāruṇaḥ puraḥ ।। 

kadarthaprāpyavijñānaṃ tataś citrābhir uktibhiḥ ।
ciraṃ kālam asau tatra muniḥ putraṃ vyabodhayat ।। 

ākhyāyikākhyānaśatair dṛṣṭāntair dṛṣṭakalpitaiḥ ।
tathetihāsavṛttāntair vedavedāntaniścayaiḥ ।। 

anudvegitayā nityaṃ vistareṇa kathākramaiḥ ।
anubhūtim upārūḍhai rūḍhair atidhiyāṃ dhiyi ।। 

anubhavavaśato rasātiriktair alam ucitārthavacogaṇair mahātmā ।
jalada iva śikhaṇḍinaṃ purassthaṃ tanayam abodhayad ambare maharṣiḥ ।। 

dāśūrasutāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kadācid atha mārgeṇa tena kailāsavāhinīm ।
ahaṃ snātum adṛśyātmā vyomavīthigato agamam ।। 

nirgatya nabhasas saptamunimaṇḍalakoṭarāt ।
rātrau prāpto asmi sumate dāśūratarupṛṣṭhakham ।। 

yāvac chṛṇomi viṭapakuharāt kānane vacaḥ ।
kuṭmalāmbhojabaddhasya ṣaṭpadasyeva nissvanam ।। 

śṛṇu putra mahābuddhe vastuno asya samām imām ।
varṇayāmi mahāścaryām ekām ākhyāyikāṃ tava ।। 

asti rājā mahāvīryo vikhyāto bhuvanatraye ।
nāmnā svottha iti śrīmāñ jagadākramaṇe kṣamaḥ ।। 

yasyānuśāsanaṃ sarve bhuvaneṣv api nāyakāḥ ।
śirobhir dhārayanty uccaiś cūḍāmaṇim ivottamam ।। 

yas sāhasaikarasiko nānāścaryavihāravān ।
kenacit triṣu lokeṣu na mahātmā vaśīkṛtaḥ ।। 

yasyārambhasahasrāṇi sukhaduḥkhapradāny alam ।
saṅkhyātuṃ naiva śakyante kallolā jaladher iva ।। 

yasya vīryaṃ suvīryasya na śastrāstrair na pāvakaiḥ ।
kenacid bhuvane krāntam ākāśam iva muṣṭinā ।। 

yadīyāṃ vitatārambhāṃ līlāṃ nirmāṇabhāsurām ।
na manāg anukurvanti śakropendraharā api ।। 

trayas tasya mahābāho dehā digbharaṇakṣamāḥ ।
jagad ākṛṣya tiṣṭhanti uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ ।। 

vyomany evātivitate jāto asau triśarīrakaḥ ।
tatraiva ca sthitiṃ yātaś śabdavātakhapakṣivat ।। 

tatraivāpāragagane nagaraṃ tena nirmitam ।
caturdaśamahārathyaṃ vibhāgatrayabhūṣitam ।। 

vanopavanamālāḍhyaṃ krīḍāśikharisundaram ।
muktālatāvivalitaṃ vāpīsaptakabhūṣitam ।। 

śītaloṣṇātmakākṣīṇadīpadvayavirājitam ।
ūrdhvādhogatirūpeṇa vaṇiṅmārgeṇa saṅkulam ।। 

tasminn evātivipule pattane tena bhūbhṛtā ।
sañcāriṇo viracitā mugdhāvavarakā gaṇāḥ ।। 

ūrdhve kecid adhaḥ kecin madhye kecin niyojitāḥ ।
kecic cireṇa naśyantaḥ kecic chīghravināśinaḥ ।। 

asitacchādanācchannā navadvāravibhūṣitāḥ ।
anāratavahadvātā bahuvātāyanānvitāḥ ।। 

dīpapañcakasālokās tristhūṇāś śukladāravaḥ ।
masṛṇālepamṛdavaḥ pratolīkulasaṅkulāḥ ।। 

māyayā racitās tena rājñā teṣu mahāmate ।
rakṣitāro mahāyakṣā nityam ālokabhīravaḥ ।। 

athāvavarakaugheṣu calatsu sa mahīpatiḥ ।
karoti vividhāḥ krīḍā nīḍeṣv iva vihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

triśarīras sa teṣv antas tair yakṣais saha putraka ।
līlālasam uṣitvāśu punar niṣkramya gacchati ।। 

tasyecchā jāyate vatsa kadācic calacetasaḥ ।
puraṃ bhaviṣyannirmāṇaṃ kiñcid yāmīti niścalā ।। 

bhūtāviṣṭa ivāvegāt tata utthāya dhāvati ।
puraṃ tad apy avāpnoti gandharvair iva nirmitam ।। 

tasyecchā jāyate nāma kadācij jaḍacetasaḥ ।
vināśaṃ samprayāmīti tenāśu sa vinaśyati ।। 

punar utpadyate tūrṇaṃ khān mahormir ivāmbhasaḥ ।
vyavahāraṃ tanoty uccaiḥ punar ārambhamantharam ।। 

svayaiva vyavahṛtyātha kadācit paridūyate ।
kiṃ karomīdam ajño asmi duḥkhito asmīti śocati ।। 

mudam etya kadācic ca svayam āyāti pīnatām ।
prāvṛḍvarṣajalollāsapūrād iva nadīrayaḥ ।। 

pibati valgati gacchati jṛmbhate sphurati bhāti na bhāti ca bhāsuraḥ ।
suta mahāmahimā sa mahīpatiḥ patir apām iva vātarayākulaḥ ।। 

svotthavibhavavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athāpṛcchat sutas tatra jambudvīpe mahāniśi ।
kadambāgrāvacūlasthaṃ pitaraṃ pāvanāśayaḥ ।। 

putraḥ

ko asau svottha iti khyāto bhūpas tātottamākṛtiḥ ।
kathitaṃ ca kim etan me tvayaitad brūhi tattvataḥ ।। 

kva bhaviṣyati nirmāṇaṃ vartamāne kva gamyatām ।
ubhayārthaviruddhatvān mohārthāya vacas tava ।। 

dāśūraḥ

śṛṇu putra yathābhūtam etat te kathayāmy aham ।
yena saṃsāracakrasya tattvam asyāvabudhyase ।। 

asadabhyutthitārambham avastumayam ātatam ।
saṃsārasaṃsthānam idam evam ākathitaṃ mayā ।। 

paramān nabhaso jātas saṅkalpas svottha ucyate ।
jāyate svayam evāsau svayam eva vilīyate ।। 

tatsvarūpam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ābhogi vidyate ।
jāyate tena jātena tasmin naṣṭe vinaśyati ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādīṃs tasyaivāvayavān viduḥ ।
viṭapān iva vṛkṣasya śṛṅgāṇīva mahībhṛtaḥ ।। 

śūnye vyomani tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ trijagatpuram ।
pratibhāsānusandhānamātreṇaitya viriñcatām ।। 

yatreme vitatālokā lokakośāś caturdaśa ।
vanopavanapālyaś ca yatrodyānaparamparāḥ ।। 

krīḍāśikhariṇo yatra sahyamandarameravaḥ ।
śītoṣṇadīptī candrārkau dīpau yatrānilākṣatau ।। 

sūryāṃśukacadālolataraṅgottuṅgamauktikāḥ ।
vahantyas sarito yatra sanmuktāvalayaś calāḥ ।। 

ikṣukṣīrādisalilā maṇiratnabisāṅkurāḥ ।
aurvānalāmbujā yatra vāpyas sapta mahārṇavāḥ ।। 

adha urvyāṃ tathordhve khe puṇyāpuṇyadhanaśriyaḥ ।
narāmarakirāṭānāṃ yatrātikrayavikrayau ।। 

tasminn eva jagaty asmin pure saṅkalpabhūbhujā ।
krīḍārtham ātmanaś citrā dehāvavarakāḥ kṛtāḥ ।। 

kecid gīrvāṇanāmāna ūrdhva eva niyojitāḥ ।
naroragādayaḥ kecid adha eva niveśitāḥ ।। 

vātayantrapravāheṇa calanto māṃsamṛṇmayāḥ ।
sitāsthidāravaś citrās tvaglepamasṛṇāmalāḥ ।। 

kecic cireṇa naśyanti kecic chīghravināśinaḥ ।
kacakṛṣṇolapollāsaracitācchādanaśriyaḥ ।। 

karṇākṣināsāpramukhair dvārair navabhir anvitāḥ ।
anāratavahatprāṇapavanenoṣṇaśītalāḥ ।। 

karṇanāsāsyatālvādivātāyanagaṇānvitāḥ ।
bhujādyaṅgapratolīkāḥ pañcendriyakudīpakāḥ ।। 

māyayā racitās teṣu saṅkalpena mahāmate ।
ahaṅkāramahāyakṣāḥ paramālokabhīravaḥ ।। 

dehāvavarakeṣv antar mahāhaṅkārayakṣakaiḥ ।
sa hi saṅkrīḍate atyartham asad evāsadutthitaiḥ ।। 

yathā kusūle mārjāro bhastrāyāṃ bhujago yathā ।
muktāphalaṃ yathā veṇāv ahaṅkāras tanau tathā ।। 

kṣaṇam abhyudayaṃ yāti kṣaṇaṃ śāmyati dīpavat ।
dehageheṣu saṅkalpas taraṅgas sāgareṣv iva ।। 

bhaviṣyannavanirmāṇam apy āpnoti tadā puram ।
yadā saṅkalpitaṃ vastu pura eva prapaśyati ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svenaivāśu vinaśyati ।
śreyase paramāyāsya nāśas svo na tu sambhavaḥ ।। 

svayaṃ saṅkalpanāmātrāj jāyate bālayakṣavat ।
anantāyātmaduḥkhāya nānandāya kadācana ।। 

idaṃ sphāraṃ jagadduḥkhaṃ pratanoty ātmasattayā ।
asattayā nāśayati kṣaṇam āndhyaṃ yathā tamaḥ ।। 

svayaiva duḥkhadāyinyā ceṣṭayā pariroditi ।
kāṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhavṛṣaṇaḥ kīlotpāṭī kapir yathā ।। 

saṅkalpitānandalavas tiṣṭhaty uddhurakandharam ।
akasmāt khacyutamadhubindubhuk karabho yathā ।। 

svayaṃ viratim āyāti kṣaṇam eti ratiṃ kṣaṇam ।
kṣaṇaṃ vikāram āyāti saṅkalpo abhavyabālavat ।। 

enaṃ sakalabhāvebhyaḥ kṛtvā nirmalam ādarāt ।
matimantaḥ padaṃ yātā yathā putra tathā kuru ।। 

trayas tv asyā mater dehā uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ ।
tamassattvarajassañjñāḥ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ ।। 

tamorūpo hi saṅkalpo nityaṃ prākṛtaceṣṭayā ।
parāṃ kṛpaṇatām etya prayāti krimikīṭatām ।। 

sattvarūpo hi saṅkalpo dharmajñānaparāyaṇaḥ ।
adūrakevalībhāvas sāmrājyam adhitiṣṭhati ।। 

rajorūpo hi saṅkalpo lokasaṃvyavahāravān ।
paritiṣṭhati saṃsāre putradārānurañjitaḥ ।। 

trividhaṃ tu parityajya rūpam etan mahāmate ।
saṅkalpaḥ param āyāti padam ātmaparikṣaye ।। 

sarvā dṛṣṭīḥ parityajya niyamya manasā manaḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantarārthasya saṅkalpasya kṣayaṃ kuru ।। 

yadi varṣasahasrāntaṃ tapaś carasi dāruṇam ।
yadi vā līlayātmānaṃ śilayā cūrṇayasy alam ।। 

yady ambudhiṃ praviśasi vaḍavāgnim athāpi vā ।
yadi vā patasi śvabhre khaḍgadhārājale atha vā ।। 

haro yady upadeṣṭā te hariḥ kamalajo api vā ।
atyantakaruṇākrānto lokanātho atha vākpatiḥ ।। 

pātālasthasya bhūsthasya svargasthasyāpi tat tava ।
nānyaḥ kaścid upāyo asti saṅkalpopaśamād ṛte ।। 

anādāv avikāre ca sukhe paramapāvane ।
saṅkalpopaśame yatnaṃ pauruṣeṇa paraṃ kuru ।। 

saṅkalpatantāv akhilā bhāvāḥ protāḥ kilānagha ।
bhinne tantau na jāne te kva yānti viśarāravaḥ ।। 

asat sat sadasat sarvaṃ saṅkalpād eva nānyataḥ ।
saṅkalpāt sad asac caivam iha satyaṃ kim ucyatām ।। 

saṅkalpyate yathā yad yat tat tathā bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
mā kiñcid api tattvajña saṅkalpaya kadācana ।। 

nissaṅkalpo yathāprāptavyavahāraparo bhava ।
cid acetyonmukhatvaṃ hi yāti saṅkalpasaṅkṣaye ।। 

utthāyāsatyarūpeṇa yenāsatyamayātmakam ।
tataṃ jagadduḥkham idaṃ vyarthaṃ sadṛśam ātmanaḥ ।। 

tena duḥkhāya mahate kiṃ śritena kilānagha ।
yad aduḥkhāya tat prājñās saṃśrayantīha netarat ।। 

adhigataparamārthatām upetya prasabham apāsya vikalpajālam uccaiḥ ।
adhigamaya padaṃ tad advitīyaṃ vitatasukhāya suṣuptacittavṛttiḥ ।। 

saṃsāravikalpayor vicārayogo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśas sargaḥ

putraḥ

kīdṛśas tāta saṅkalpaḥ katham utpadyate prabho ।
kathaṃ vā vṛddhim āyāti kathaṃ caiva vinaśyati ।। 

dāśūraḥ

anantasyātmatattvasya sattāsāmānyarūpiṇaḥ ।
citaś cetyonmukhatvaṃ yat tat saṅkalpāṅkuraṃ viduḥ ।। 

leśataḥ prāptasattākas sa eva ghanatāṃ gataḥ ।
yāti cittaṃ kham āpūrya dṛḍhajāḍyāya meghavat ।। 

bhāvayantī citiś cetyaṃ vyatiriktam ivātmanaḥ ।
saṅkalpatām ihāyāti bījam aṅkuratām iva ।। 

saṅkalpanaṃ hi saṅkalpas svayam eṣa prajāyate ।
vardhate svata evāśu duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu ।। 

saṅkalpamātraṃ hi bhavāñ jalamātraṃ yathārṇavaḥ ।
ṛte saṅkalpato anyā te nāsti saṃsāritā ṛtā ।। 

kākatālīyayogena sañjāto asi mudhaiva hi ।
mṛgatṛṣṇādvicandratvavad asatyaṃ ca vardhase ।। 

nigīrṇamātulāṃśasya kanakapratyayo yathā ।
svayam abhyety asatyo antas saṅkalpas te tathā bhavet ।। 

asatyam eva jātas tvam asatyam abhivardhase ।
asmiñ jāte ca vijñāne asatyas san vilīyase ।। 

ayaṃ so aham ime bhāvās sukhaduḥkhamayā mama ।
vyartham eveti sāsthas tvaṃ tenāntaḥ paritapyase ।। 

asann evāsy ajāto asi kuto janma kilāsataḥ ।
vyartham evāvamūḍho asi saṅkalpavaśatas svataḥ ।। 

mā saṅkalpaya saṅkalpaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvaya mā sthitau ।
etāvataiva bhāvena bhavyo bhavasi bhūtaye ।। 

saṅkalpanāśane yatno na bhūyāṃs tava gacchati ।
bhāvanābhāvamātreṇa saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate hṛdi ।। 

sumanaḥkusumāmarde kiñcid vyatikaro bhavet ।
susādhe abhāvamātreṇa na tu saṅkalpanāśane ।। 

puṣpākrāntau karaspandayatnaḥ putropayujyate ।
tad apy upakaroty asmin na saṅkalpaparikṣaye ।। 

saṅkalpo yena hantavyas tena bhāvaviparyayāt ।
apy ardhena nimeṣeṇa līlayaiva vihanyate ।। 

bhāvamātropaśamane svātmani svastham āsthite ।
sādhyate yad asādhyaṃ tat kasya syāt kim ivāmateḥ ।। 

saṅkalpenaiva saṅkalpaṃ manasā svamano mune ।
bhittvā svātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram ।। 

upaśānte hi saṅkalpe upaśāntam idaṃ bhavet ।
saṃsāraduḥkham atulaṃ mūlād api mahāmate ।। 

saṅkalpo hi mano jīvaś cittaṃ dhīr atha vāsanā ।
nāmnaivānyatvam apy eṣāṃ nārthenārthavidāṃ vara ।। 

saṅkalpāṃśād ṛte neha kiñcid apy asti kutracit ।
tam eva hṛdayāc chinddhi kim anyat pariśocasi ।। 

yathaivedaṃ nabhaś śūnyaṃ jagac chūnyaṃ tathaiva hi ।
asanmayavikalpotthe ubhe ete tate yataḥ ।। 

asiddhaṃ sarvam evaitad yad asiddhena sādhitam ।
saṅkalpena jagat tasmād bhāvanā kvāvatiṣṭhatām ।। 

satyāsthāyām asatyāṃ tu kiṃniṣṭhā vāsanā bhavet ।
vāsanākṣayatas siddhis tataḥ prāpyaṃ na śiṣyate ।। 

tasmād asad idaṃ sarvaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ helayeddhayā ।
na tu bhāvanayā tena sukhaduḥkhair na lipyate ।। 

avastv itīdaṃ nirṇīya nehāsthā sampravartate ।
āsthākṣaye na jāyete harṣāmarṣau bhavābhavau ।। 

mano mithyā karotīdaṃ sukhaduḥkhābhravibhramam ।
mano jīvas sphuraty uccair mānasaṃ nagaraṃ jagat ।। 

bhaviṣyad vartamānaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca parivartayat ।
vāsanāvaśato loke sphuracchakti manas sthitam ।। 

karoti svāśayenemāṃ vyavasthāṃ malinaś calaḥ ।
ātmanas sadṛśīṃ lolāṃ jīvo hṛdvanamarkaṭaḥ ।। 

dīrgham ākāram ādāya nimeṣād yānti hrasvatām ।
grahītuṃ ca na yujyante saṅkalpā jaḍavīcayaḥ ।। 

manāgdṛṣṭā vivardhante dahanti saparicchadam ।
tṛṇamātreṇa dīpyante saṅkalpā vahniśeṣavat ।। 

jagatprakaṭanākārāḥ pradīptāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ ।
bhramadā jaḍasaṃsthānās saṅkalpās taḍidagnayaḥ ।। 

yadaivāsann ayaṃ putra tadaivāśu cikitsitum ।
śakyate nātra sandeho nāsat sad bhavati kvacit ।। 

san sthito yadi saṅkalpo duścikitsas tato bhavet ।
kiṃ tv asadbhūta evaiṣa sucikitsas tadā bhṛśam ।। 

akṛtrimaṃ cet saṃsāramalam aṅgārakārṣṇyavat ।
tad etatkṣālane sādho kaḥ pravarteta durmatiḥ ।। 

kiṃ tv etat taṇḍule śūkatuṣakambukavat sthitam ।
yadā tadā prayatnena pauruṣeṇa vinaśyati ।। 

akṛtrimam api prāptaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtrimatāṃ suta ।
sukhocchedyatayā jñasya saṃsāramalam ātatam ।। 

taṇḍulasya yathā carma yathā tāmrasya kālimā ।
naśyati kriyayā putra puruṣasya tathā malam ।। 

jīvasya taṇḍulasyeva malaṃ sahajam apy alam ।
naśyaty eva na sandehas tasmād udyamavān bhava ।। 

asatkalpair vikalpair yas saṃsāro janito mudhā ।
stokenāsau layaṃ yāti kvāsad vastu kila sthiram ।। 

asattām eti saṃsāras svāṃ vyavasthāṃ vicinvataḥ ।
dīpālokād ivāndhatvaṃ dvīndutvaṃ svīkṣitād iva ।। 

nedaṃ tava na cāsya tvaṃ bhrāntiṃ putra parityaja ।
asatye satyavad dṛṣṭe bhāvanāṃ mā nyavīviśaḥ ।। 

mama guruvibhavojjvalā vilāsā iti tava māstu vṛthaiva vibhramo antaḥ ।
tvayi sati vitatāś ca te vilāsā vilasati sarvam idaṃ tadātmatattvam ।। 

dāśūropākhyāne saṅkalpacikitsā nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity ākarṇya tadā tatra rātrāv ālapanaṃ tayoḥ ।
ahaṃ raghukulākāśaśaśāṅka raghunandana ।। 

patitaḥ khāt kadambāgre pattrapuṣpalatākule ।
tūṣṇīṃ nirvṛṣṭimūkātmā śṛṅgāgra iva toyadaḥ ।। 

apaśyaṃ tatra dāśūraṃ śūraṃ indriyanigrahe ।
pareṇa tapasā yuktaṃ tejaseva hutāśanam ।। 

tejobhir dehaniṣkrāntaiḥ kāñcanīkṛtabhūruhaiḥ ।
tāpayantaṃ pradeśaṃ taṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaraṃ yathā ।। 

mām athālokya samprāptaṃ dāśūro arghyasaparyayā ।
vitīrṇaviṣṭaraṃ pattre parayā paryapūjayat ।। 

tataḥ kurvan kathās tena saha dāśūrabhāsvatā ।
tās tattanayasambaddhās saṃsārottāraṇakṣamāḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭavāṃs tam ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ korakotkaṭakoṭaram ।
smiteneva sphuṭaradaṃ śvasanasphuritacchadam ।। 

dāśūrasyecchayā sarvair apatadbhir mṛgadvijaiḥ ।
sevyamānaṃ vanam iva latāmaṇḍapamaṇḍitam ।। 

latākoṭitaṭabhrāntaiś camarair indusundaraiḥ ।
śubhrābhrakhaṇḍanikaraiś śarannabha ivāvṛtam ।। 

prāleyakaṇapaddhatyā muktāvalyābhyalaṅkṛtam ।
sarvāvayavam evācchapuṣpapūraiḥ prapūritam ।। 

svareṇucandanālepais samālabdham akhaṇḍitam ।
svacchadābhogavipularaktāmbarapariṣkṛtam ।। 

vivāhāyeva veṣeṇa puṣpabhārādihāriṇā ।
latāṅganānuṣaktena nāgareṇa kṛtodyamam ।। 

sunibaddhajaṭākāralatāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।
mañjarībhiḥ patākābhir yuktaṃ puram ivotsave ।। 

mṛgakaṇḍūyanadhvastapuṣpadhūlividhūsaram ।
protsāritopāntavanaṃ vṛkṣamallam ivotthitam ।। 

barhibhiḥ kusumodvāntaparāgaparipāṭalaiḥ ।
nikṣepakṣiptasandhyābhrabālasālam ivācalaiḥ ।। 

pravālāruṇahastena śītalacchāyaśāyinā ।
madhunā ghūrṇamānena prāleyotpulakatviṣā ।। 

nīrandhrapuṣpapūreṇa ghūrṇitena vanānilaiḥ ।
nidrālukuṭmaladṛśā stabakastanadhāriṇā ।। 

puṣpajālarajaḥpuñjakuṅkumāruṇavāsasā ।
latāvitānanilayavātāyananiṣaṅgiṇā ।। 

navapuṣpalatādolālīlayālasalāsinā ।
āpādamastakaprāntaṃ sasamastalatālayam ।। 

vṛndena vanadevīnāṃ kokilālāpaśālinā ।
sandigdhamañjarījālam alinetreṇa hāsinā ।। 

avaśyāyopaśamitaratikhedair madālasaiḥ ।
puṣpadhūlisamārabdhair ālabdhair nibiḍaṃ mithaḥ ।। 

puṣpāntarāntaḥpuragaiḥ kim api praṇayocitam ।
dhvanadbhir abhitas svacchaṃ mattāliyugalair vṛtam ।। 

kānanopāntanagarīghuṅghumākarṇanecchayā ।
kṣaṇam utkarṇam āśāntacārucarvaṇaṭāṅkṛtaiḥ ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ dalāśriviśrāntamugdhamugdhaśirastayā ।
paśyadbhir indvaṃśukacajjalām arṇavamekhalām ।। 

vanasthalīnāṃ tanayair nayair mūrtim ivāsthitaiḥ ।
suptaiḥ pattrapuṭeṣv antar mṛgaiś śāralatāntaram ।। 

nīḍaśvasatsuviśvastasuptasārbhakapakṣiṇam ।
pākacyutaphalopāntavṛttalambikamaṇḍalam ।। 

sandigdhamūkabhramaraṃ guccheṣv abjākṣasūtrakaiḥ ।
śyāmalīkṛtaparyantaṃ nīlaiḥ pallavamaṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

sugandhitāśeṣavanaṃ puṣpameghīkṛtāmbudam ।
dhūlīkadambaśabalaṃ phalārthivalitaṃ tale ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena na kiñcid api vidyate ।
pattraṃ tatra taror yatra noṣyate vā na bhujyate ।। 

pattre pattre mṛgās suptā viśrāntās sughane ghane ।
kacche kacche khagā līnās tasya bhūruhabhūpateḥ ।। 

evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ taṃ mamālokayatas tarum ।
mahotsavena sadṛśī sā babhūva tamasvatī ।। 

tataḥ kathābhir anyābhis sa tasya tanayo mayā ।
vijñānālokaramyābhir nīto bodhaṃ paraṃ punaḥ ।। 

āvayos tatra citrābhiḥ kathābhir itaretaram ।
śarvarī sā vyatīyāya muhūrta iva kāntayoḥ ।। 

prātaḥ pratanutāṃ yāte dyugharmajalajālake ।
khakānanāṅkurodgāre tārakānikare śanaiḥ ।। 

ākadambanabhobhāgam anuyātaṃ sutānvitam ।
ahaṃ visarjya dāśūraṃ harācalanadīṃ gataḥ ।। 

tatrābhimatam āsādya snānam etya nabhastalam ।
praviśya khaṃ munīnāṃ ca madhyaṃ svastham avasthitaḥ ।। 

dāśūrākhyāyikaiṣā te kathitā raghunandana ।
jagataḥ pratibimbābhā satyākārāpy asanmayī ।। 

dāśūrākhyāyikaiveyam ity etat kathitaṃ mayā ।
tubhyaṃ rāghava ghorāghajagadrūpanirūpaṇe ।। 

tasmād avāstavīṃ tyaktvā vāstavīm api rañjanām ।
dāśūrasiddhāntadhiyā sadodāro bhavātmavān ।। 

anena gacchāmarasundaratvaṃ kadambadāśūrakathārathena ।
āsādayiṣyasy acirāt puraṃ tad bhaviṣyasīśo bhuvaneṣu yena ।। 

vasiṣṭhadāśūrasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭātriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nāstīdam iti nirṇīya sarvatas tyaja rañjanām ।
yan nāsti tat prati kila kaivāstheha vicāriṇām ।। 

dṛśyamānam athedaṃ ced asti tat tava kiṃ gatam ।
tiṣṭhatv ātmani badhnāsi tvaṃ kilātra kim ātmatām ।। 

atha ced asti nāstīdam iti niścayavān asi ।
tathāpi bhāvanāsaṅgaḥ kathaṃ yuktaś calācale ।। 

nedam asti jagad rāma na ca nāsti mahāmate ।
kevalaṃ svottham evetthamābhānam idam īdṛśam ।। 

nedaṃ kartṛkṛtaṃ kiñcin na cākartṛkṛtakramam ।
svayam ābhāsate cedaṃ kartrakartṛpadaṃ gatam ।। 

akartṛkaṃ jagajjālaṃ bhavatv atha sakartṛkam ।
mā tvam etena sambandhaṃ bhāvayānagha cetasi ।। 

sarvendriyavihīnātmā karteha sa jaḍopamaḥ ।
akartr eva tadā manye kākatālīyavaj jagat ।। 

kākatālīyayogena jātaṃ yat kiñcid eva yat ।
tasmin bhāvānusandhānaṃ bālo badhnāti netaraḥ ।। 

na kadācid idaṃ śāntaṃ jagad rāma na ca kṣayi ।
ajasraṃ dṛśyamānatvād bhāvitvāc ca punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

na kadācid idaṃ cāsti jagad rāma na cākṣayi ।
ajasraṃ kṣīyamāṇatvān nāśitvāc cānumānataḥ ।। 

sarvendriyapadātīto yadā karteha vijvaraḥ ।
kurvāṇas sa tadā khedaṃ na kadācana gacchati ।। 

teneyaṃ niyatiḥ prauḍhā bhāvābhāvadaśāmayī ।
īdṛśy eva sthirā dīrghā cittotthāpi na naśyati ।। 

aparyantasya kālasya kaścid aṃśaś śaracchatam ।
tāvanmātramahāyur yaḥ kim āsthāṃ so anudhāvati ।। 

sthirāś cej jāgatā bhāvās tat tadāsthā na śobhate ।
katham anyo'nyasaṃśleṣo jaḍacetanayoḥ kila ।। 

asthirāś cej jagadbhāvās tad apy āsthā na śobhate ।
payaḥphenāsthirāsyānte duḥkham eṣā dadāti te ।। 

āsthābandho mahābāho jagadbhāvatvadātmanoḥ ।
na sthirāsthirayoḥ phenaśailayor iva rājate ।। 

sarvakartāpy akarteva karoty ātmā na kiñcana ।
tiṣṭhaty alam udāsīna ālokaṃ prati dīpavat ।। 

kurvan na kiñcit kurute dinakāryam ivāṃśumān ।
gacchan na gacchati svasthas svāspadastho ravir yathā ।। 

yataḥ kutaścid evedaṃ sampannam iva lakṣyate ।
arjunānilavad vāripūrāvartavad ātatam ।। 

iti ced bhavatā rāma naipuṇyenāvadhāritam ।
pramāṇapariśuddhena cetasā ca vicāritam ।। 

tadāti bhāvanā sādho padārthaṃ prati nārhati ।
alātacakre svapne ca bhrame vā keva bhāvanā ।। 

akasmād āgato jantus sauhārdasya na bhājanam ।
bhramabhūtaṃ jagajjālam āsthāyāś ca na bhājanam ।। 

uṣṇendau śītale bhānau mṛgatṛṣṇājale tathā ।
yathā na bhāvayasy āsthām evaṃ mā bhāvaya sthitau ।। 

saṅkalpapuruṣaṃ svapnajanaṃ dvīndutvavibhramam ।
yathā paśyasi paśya tvaṃ bhāvajātam idaṃ tathā ।। 

antar āsthāṃ parityajya bhāvaśrībhāvanāmayīm ।
yo asi so asi jagaty asmiṃl līlayā viharānagha ।। 

akartṛtvapadasthasya kartṛtvam api kurvataḥ ।
sarvabhāvāntarasthasya sarvātītasya cātmanaḥ ।। 

iyaṃ sannidhimātreṇa niyatiḥ pravijṛmbhate ।
dīpasannidhimātreṇa niriccheva prakāśatā ।। 

abhrasannidhimātreṇa kuṭajāni yathā svayam ।
ātmasannidhimātreṇa trijaganti tathā svayam ।। 

sarvecchārahite bhānau yathā vyomani tiṣṭhati ।
jāyate vyavahāraśrīs sati deve tathā kriyā ।। 

niricche saṃsthite ratne yathālokaḥ pravartate ।
sattāmātreṇa devena tathaivāyaṃ jagadgaṇaḥ ।। 

ata ātmani kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca saṃsthitam ।
niricchatvād akartāsau kartā sannidhimātrataḥ ।। 

sarvendriyābhyatītatvāt kartā bhoktā na bhūtapaḥ ।
indriyāntargatatvāt tu kartā bhoktā sa eva hi ।। 

dve evātmani vidyete kartṛtākartṛte anagha ।
yayaiva paśyasi śreyas tām āśritya sthiro bhava ।। 

sarvatrāham akarteti dṛḍhabhāvanayānayā ।
pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann api na lipyase ।। 

sarvatrāham akarteti saṃvidā bhogakāmanā ।
yāti nīrasatāṃ jantor apravṛttes svacetasaḥ ।। 

yatrāhaṃ kiñcid eveha na karomīti niścayaḥ ।
bhogaughakāmanāṃ tatra kaḥ karotu jahātu vā ।। 

tasmān nityam akartāham iti bhāvanayeddhayā ।
paramāmṛtanāmnī sā samataivāvaśiṣyate ।। 

atha sarvaṃ karomīti mahākartṛtayānayā ।
yadīcchasi sthitiṃ rāma tat tām apy uttamāṃ viduḥ ।। 

ahaṃ yatra karomīmaṃ samagraṃ jāgataṃ bhramam ।
rāgadveṣakramas tatra kuto anyasyātyasambhavāt ।। 

yad anyena śarīraṃ me dagdham anyena lālitam ।
sa madārambha evātaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ ।। 

matsukhāsukhavistāre jagajjālakṣayodaye ।
ahaṃ karteti matvāntaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ ।। 

khedollāsavilāse tu svātmakartṛtayaikayā ।
svayam eva layaṃ yāte samataivāvaśiṣyate ।। 

samatā sarvabhāveṣu yāsau satyā parā sthitiḥ ।
tasyām avasthitaṃ cittaṃ na bhūyo duḥkham āpnuyāt ।। 

atha vā sarvakartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca rāghava ।
sarvaṃ tyaktvā manaḥ pītvā yo asi so asi sthiro bhava ।। 

ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ nāhaṃ karomīdam idaṃ na tu ।
iti bhāvānusandhānamayī dṛṣṭir na tuṣṭaye ।। 

sā kālasūtrapadavī sā mahāvīcivāgurā ।
sāsipattravanaśreṇī yā deho aham iti sthitiḥ ।। 

sā tyājyā sarvayatnena sarvanāśe apy upasthite ।
spraṣṭavyā sā na bhavyena saśvamāṃseva pukkasī ।। 

tayā sudūrojjhitayā dṛṣṭau pāṭalalekhayā ।
udeti paramā dṛṣṭir jyotsneva vigatāmbudā ।। 

kartā nāsmi na cāyam asmi sa iti jñātvaivam antas sphuṭaṃ kartaivāsmi samagram asmi tad iti jñātvātha vā niścayam ।
ko apy evāsmi na kaścid evam iti vā nirṇīya sarvottamaṃ tiṣṭha tvaṃ svapade sthitāḥ padavido yatrottamās sādhavaḥ ।। 

kartṛtvavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

navatriṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

satyam etat tvayā brahman yad uktaṃ sūktisundaram ।
akartaiva hi kartātmā bhoktābhoktaiva bhūtabhṛt ।। 

sarveśvaras sarvamayaś cinmātram amalaṃ padam ।
svānubhūtivapur devas sarvabhūtāntarasthitaḥ ।। 

hṛdayaṅgamatāṃ yātam idānīṃ brahma me prabho ।
tvaduktibhir yathā śītaṃ dhārābhir bhūbhṛtaḥ payaḥ ।। 

audāsīnyād anicchatvān na bhuṅkte na karoti ca ।
samagrālokakāritvād bhuṅkte devaḥ karoti ca ।। 

kiṃ tv ayaṃ bhagavan sphāras saṃśayo me hṛdi sthitaḥ ।
chinddhi taṃ tvaṃ girā brahman dīdhityendur yathā tamaḥ ।। 

idaṃ sat tad idaṃ cāsad ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ bhavān ।
ayam eko dvitīyo ayam ityādikalanāmalam ।। 

ekasmin vitate śānte nīhāra iva bhāskare ।
idamprathamam evācche katham ātmani saṃsthitam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

siddhāntakāla evāsya satpraśnasyottarasthitim ।
kathayiṣyāmi te rāma jñāsyasy enāṃ tadaiva ca ।। 

mokṣopāyasya siddhāntasamayaṃ prāpya rāghava ।
śrotuṃ praśnottarāṇy etāny alaṃ yogyo bhaviṣyasi ।। 

kāntāgeyagirāṃ rāma bhājanaṃ taruṇo yathā ।
praśnānām uttamoktīnāṃ prāptadṛg bhājanaṃ tathā ।। 

vyarthā bhavati bāleṣu yathā rāgamayī kathā ।
nirarthakālpabodheṣu tathodārodayā kathā ।। 

kasmiṃścid eva samaye kiñcit puṃso virājate ।
phalam ābhāti vṛkṣasya śarady eva na mādhave ।। 

upadeśagiro vṛddhe rañjanā nirmale paṭe ।
laganty udāravijñānakathāś cādhigatātmani ।। 

praśnasyāsyottaraṃ pūrvaṃ leśataḥ kathitaṃ mayā ।
na vistareṇa tenaitan na jñātaṃ bhavatā sphuṭam ।। 

yadi tvam ātmanātmānam adhigacchasi tat svayam ।
etat praśnottaraṃ sādho jānāsy atra na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

mayā siddhāntakāle tu prāptabodhe tvayi sthite ।
vaktavyo vistareṇaiṣa sādho praśnottarakramaḥ ।। 

jānāty ātmānam ātmaiva kṛta ātmātmanaiva hi ।
ātmaiva samprasannas sann ātmānaṃ pratipadyate ।। 

mayaitat kathitaṃ rāma kartrakartṛvicāraṇam ।
vāsanāmayanāśāya tajjño nirvāsano bhavet ।। 

bandho hi vāsanābandho mokṣas syād vāsanākṣayaḥ ।
vāsanās tvaṃ parityajya mokṣārthitvam api tyaja ।। 

tāmasīr vāsanāḥ pūrvaṃ tyaktvā viṣayavāsitāḥ ।
maitryādibhāvanānāmnīr gṛhāṇāmalavāsanāḥ ।। 

tā apy antaḥ parityajya tābhir vyavaharan bahiḥ ।
antaś śāntasamasteho bhava cinmātravāsanaḥ ।। 

tām apy atha parityajya manobuddhisamanvitām ।
śeṣe sthirasamādhāno yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja ।। 

cinmanaḥkalanākālaprakāśatimirādikam ।
vāsanāṃ vāsitāraṃ ca prāṇaspandanapūrvakam ।। 

samūlam akhilaṃ tyaktvā vyomasomyaḥ praśāntadhīḥ ।
yas tvaṃ bhavasi sadbuddhe sa bhavāśv avilambitaḥ ।। 

hṛdayāt samparityajya sarvam eva mahāmatiḥ ।
yas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ sa muktaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

samādhim atha karmāṇi mā karotu karotu vā ।
hṛdayenāstasarvārtho mukta evottamāśayaḥ ।। 

naiṣkarmyeṇa na tasyārtho na tasyārtho asti karmabhiḥ ।
na samādhānajapyābhyāṃ yasya nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ ।। 

vicāritam alaṃ śāstraṃ ciram udgrāhitaṃ mithaḥ ।
santyaktavāsanān maunād ṛte nāsty uttamaṃ padam ।। 

dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akhilaṃ bhrāntvābhrāntā diśo daśa ।
janāḥ katipayā eva yathāvastv avalokinaḥ ।। 

yad yad ālokyate kiñcid yatra yatra ca gamyate ।
īpsitānīpsitād anyan na tatra yatate janaḥ ।। 

ye kecana samārambhā ye janasya kriyākramāḥ ।
te sarve dehamātrārtham ātmārthaṃ tu na kiñcana ।। 

pātāle brahmaloke ca svarge atha vasudhātale ।
santaḥ katipayā eva dṛśyante dṛṣṭadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

idaṃ heyam upādeyam idam ity asadutthitau ।
niścayau galitau yasya jñasyāsāv atidurlabhaḥ ।। 

karotu bhuvane rājyaṃ viśatv analam ambu vā ।
nātmalābhād ṛte jantur viśrāntim adhigacchati ।। 

ye mahāmatayas santi śūrās svendriyaśatruṣu ।
janmajvaravināśāya ta upāsyā mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

sarvatra pañcabhūtāni ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiñcin na vidyate ।
pātāle bhūtale vyomni ratim eti kva dhīradhīḥ ।। 

yuktyā santarato jñasya saṃsāro goṣpadākṛtiḥ ।
dūrasantyaktayuktes tu mahāmattārṇavopamaḥ ।। 

kadambagolakasvacchaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ sphāracetasaḥ ।
kiṃ prayacchati kiṃ bhuṅkte prāpte asmin sakale api saḥ ।। 

etadartham abuddhīnāṃ yan mahāsamarakriyāḥ ।
tan manye rāma bhikṣārthaṃ dvandvalakṣakṣayāvaham ।। 

kalpamātreṇa kālena sahasā pelavodare ।
asminn api ca yo nāśas sa vīrudhi mahāśaniḥ ।। 

ātmano aṃśasya sarvāder yat tṛṇād api nottamam ।
tasmiñ jagattraye prāptaṃ kiṃ tad ātmavato bhavet ।। 

itaś śailaśatair vyāptas tatheto jalarāśibhiḥ ।
kiyān asyā bhuvo deho yenodāraṃ prapūrayet ।। 

na tad asti jagaty asmin sapātālaharālaye ।
yan nāmātmavato jñasya kiñcit kāryakaraṃ bhavet ।। 

ekatām anuyātasya vyomavad vitatasya ca ।
svasthasyātmavato jñasya sthitasyātmany acetasi ।। 

śarīrajālanīhāradhūsarā śūnyakoṭarā ।
śāntasañcārasubhagā trilokī vipulāṭavī ।। 

sphārabrahmāmalāmbhodhiphenās sarve kulācalāḥ ।
cidādityamahātejomṛgatṛṣṇā jagacchriyaḥ ।। 

ātmatattvamahāmbhodhivīcayas sargarājayaḥ ।
anuttamapadāmbhodavṛṣṭayaś śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

candrārkatapanālokā ghaṭakāṣṭhādisannibhāḥ ।
prakāśanīyāś ciddīpatviṣo bhūtagaṇās tathā ।। 

ciram antarhitātmānas saṃsāravanacāriṇaḥ ।
kāmabhogolapagrāsā mṛgā narasurāsurāḥ ।। 

asthikhaṇḍārgalā mūrdhapidhānās snāyuśṛṅkhalāḥ ।
jagaddehā jagajjīvaratnamāṃsasamudgakāḥ ।। 

vanabālamṛgīmugdhāḥ parasañcāritās sthitau ।
bālabuddhivinodāya yoṣitaś carmaputrikāḥ ।। 

evaṃvidhodāramanā manāg api mahāmatiḥ ।
na jñaś calati bhogaughair mukhavātair ivācalaḥ ।। 

tasmin kila pade rāma jñas tiṣṭhati mahonnatau ।
yasmāc candrārkadeśo api naḥ pātālam iva sthitaḥ ।। 

imāṃl lokān anālokāñ jātālokās suvedinaḥ ।
sarīsṛpān vayam iva paśyanty ūḍhān bhavārṇave ।। 

na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī ।
nāgaraṃ nāgarīkāntaṃ kugrāmalaṭabhā iva ।। 

na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī ।
apy abhyāśagatās sphārahṛdayaṃ kham ivāmbudāḥ ।। 

na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī ।
markaṭya iva nṛtyantyo gaurīlāsyārthinaṃ haram ।। 

na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī ।
prāktanapratibimbaśrī ratnaṃ kumbhagataṃ yathā ।। 

cakrārpitopamam asanmayam ambubhaṅgatvaṅgattaraṅgakṛtabimbam ivāvalokya ।
lokaṃ tadīhitasukheṣu ratiṃ na yāti tajjñaḥ kuśevalalaveṣv iva rājahaṃsaḥ ।। 

pūrṇāśayarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atraiva vastuny ucite śṛṇu rāghava pūrvajāḥ ।
kacena gāthā yā gītā bārhaspatyena pāvanīḥ ।। 

kasmiṃścin merugahane tiṣṭhan suraguros sutaḥ ।
kadācid abhyāsavaśād viśrāntiṃ prāpad ātmani ।। 

samyagjñānāmṛtāpūrṇā matir nāramatāsya sā ।
pañcabhūtamaye mlāne dṛśye asmin pelavātmani ।। 

tena nirviṇṇa iva sa ātmatattvād ṛte param ।
apaśyan samuvācedam eko gadgadayā girā ।। 

kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim ।
ātmanā pūritaṃ viśvaṃ mahākalpāmbunā yathā ।। 

duḥkham ātmā sukhaṃ caiva kham āśās tvam ahaṃ tathā ।
sarvam ātmamayaṃ jātaṃ kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭo aham ātmanā ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ deheṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ ca dikṣu ca ।
ita ātmā tathehātmā nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit ।। 

sarvatraiva sthito hy ātmā sarvam ātmani saṃsthitam ।
sarvam evedam ātmaivam ātmany eva namāmy aham ।। 

na tad asti na yatrāhaṃ na tad asti na yan mayi ।
kim anyad abhivāñchāmi kevalaṃ praśamāmy aham ।। 

ātmanātmani yenāhaṃ namāmy āpūritātmanā ।
upaśāmyāmi tenāntaḥ kvānyatrābhipatāmy aham ।। 

aham agnir ahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūr aham ambaram ।
yan nāhaṃ nāsti tat kiñcit sarvam evāham ātatam ।। 

āpūritāpāranabhomahābhairavarūpavān ।
sarvasaṃvinmayaḥ pūrṇas tiṣṭhāmy ekārṇavopamaḥ ।। 

ity evaṃ bhāvayan bhāvaṃ kanakācalakuñjake ।
uccārayann athoṅkāraṃ ghaṇṭāsvanam iva kramāt ।। 

oṅkārasya kalām ardhāṃ pāścātyāṃ vālakomalām ।
nāntarasthena bāhye na bhāvayan parame hṛdi ।। 

vyapagatakalanākalaṅkaśuddho hṛdayanirantaralīnavātavṛttiḥ ।
gataghanaśaradambaropamānaḥ kaca upalācalamūrtimān atiṣṭhat ।। 

kacagāthā nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

annapānāṅganāsaṅgād ṛte nāstīha kiñcana ।
śubhaṃ vastv avisaṃvādi mahān kim abhivāñchatu ।। 

tiryañcaḥ paśavo mūḍhā yena tuṣyanty asādhavaḥ ।
bhogādinā kathaṃ tena ratim āyānti sādhavaḥ ।। 

bhogaiḥ kṛpaṇasarvasvair ādimadhyāntapelavaiḥ ।
viśvāsaṃ yānti ye loke tair alaṃ naragardabhaiḥ ।। 

itaḥ keśā ito raktam itīyaṃ pramadātanuḥ ।
etayā toṣam āyānti sārameyā na mānavāḥ ।। 

mṛn mahī dāru taravo deho māṃsaṃ dṛṣad giriḥ ।
adho bhūr ambaraṃ pṛṣṭhe kim apūrvaṃ sukhāya yat ।। 

mātrāsparśānusāriṇyo vivekapadabhaṅgurāḥ ।
mohāyaiva parāmṛṣṭās sakalā lokasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

sarvasyā eva paryante śubhāyā api saṃsthiteḥ ।
malinaṃ duḥkham asty eva jvālāyā iva kajjalam ।। 

āgamāpāyato anityā manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyakriyāḥ ।
latā nāgendram iva tā dhārayanti na satpadam ।। 

putrikā raktamāṃsasya kānteyam iti sādaram ।
svadehanāmny asthicaye śliṣyate seti kaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ satyam idam rāma sthiram ajñasya tuṣṭaye ।
jñasyāsthiram asatyaṃ ca jagad rāma na tuṣṭaye ।। 

abhukte api viṣe yaiṣā viṣamūrchāṃ prayacchati ।
tāṃ parityajya bhāvāsthām ātmaikatvāj jñatāṃ vraja ।। 

anātmany ātmabhāvena cittaṃ sthitim upāgatam ।
yadā tadedam āyātaṃ jagajjālam asanmayam ।। 

vāsanāvaśato brahmamanasā kalpitaṃ vapuḥ ।
tejasāśritakuḍyena hemābhatvam ivātmanaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

vairiñcapadam āsādya mano brahman mahāmate ।
idaṃ jagat sughanatāṃ katham ānayati kramāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

garbhatalpāt samutthāya padmajaḥ prathamaṃ śiśuḥ ।
brahmeti śabdam akarod brahmā tena sa ucyate ।। 

saṅkalpajālarūpasya manasaḥ kalpitākṛteḥ ।
akarot tasya saṅkalpalakṣmīḥ padam athāntare ।।
