tatas saṅkalpayām āsa pūrvaṃ tejo mahāprabham ।
lasadagnilatācakravakrīkṛtadigantaram ।। 

ṛkṣapratimaniṣṭhyūtakarkaśāgnikaṇotkaram ।
muñjapiñjaraparyantahemakānanitāmbaram ।। 

jvālāhemalatājālajaṭālanijamaṇḍalam ।
kacatprasaraduddāmakarakuṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।। 

taccharīri manas tasmiṃs tatas tejasi bhāsvare ।
ātmākārasamākāraṃ bhāskaraṃ samakalpayat ।। 

sa tatas tejasas tasmād abhyudeti divākaraḥ ।
jvālāmaṇḍalamadhyastho jvalatkanakakuṇḍalaḥ ।। 

jvālājaṭābhāradharo vāntavisphārapāvakaḥ ।
jvālāvilāsāvayavaḥ pūritākāśamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

atha brahmā mahābuddhir anyāṃs tāṃs tejasaḥ kaṇān ।
akasmāt pratibhātena vimānatvena cāruṇā ।। 

kṣaṇāt saṅkalpayām āsa dadarśa ca tathaiva tān ।
saṅkalpān antaraṃ jātān vidvāñ śabdagaṇān iva ।। 

sthitir eṣā mahābāho pratisargaṃ svayambhuvaḥ ।
pratyahaṃ ca pratijagat saṅkalpitasurāsurā ।। 

kālaṃ kālavibhaktīś ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā ।
saritas sāgarān dvīpān diśaś śailāṃs tathāvanim ।। 

devān daityān narān nāgān gandharvān yakṣarākṣasān ।
akalpayad ayaṃ brahmā taraṅgān iva sāgaraḥ ।। 

teṣāṃ deśān girīṃś caiva vimānāny uttamāni ca ।
karmāṇi pravibhaktāni padmajas samakalpayat ।। 

te api saṅkalpasamprāptasiddhayas sarvaśaktayaḥ ।
yathāsaṅkalpitaṃ vastu kṣaṇād dadṛśur agrataḥ ।। 

saṅkalpayanty athānyāṃs te nānābhūtagaṇān bahūn ।
te apy anyāṃs tatra te apy anyāṃs te apy anyān vividhān api ।। 

saṃsmṛtya vedāṃs tadanu yajñakramaguṇānvitān ।
jagadgṛhavadhūṃ brahmā maryādāṃ samakalpayat ।। 

brāhmaṃ rūpam upādāya mano māyi mahadvapuḥ ।
tanotīttham imāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ bhūtasantatisaṅkulām ।। 

samudrācalavṛkṣāḍhyāṃ kṛtalokāntarakramām ।
merubhūpīṭhadikkuñjajaṭālodaramaṇḍalām ।। 

sukhaduḥkhajarājanmamaraṇavyādhivedhitām ।
rāgadveṣabhayāviddhāṃ guṇatrayamayātmikām ।। 

manobhis tair viriñcotthair yad yathā kalpitaṃ purā ।
tat tathaivākhilaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate adyāpi māyayā ।। 

itthaṃ sarveṣu sargeṣu keṣucit tv atha vāpy ajaḥ ।
saṅkalpayati saṃsāraṃ paripaśyati ca sthiram ।। 

moha evam ayaṃ mithyā jāgatas sthiratāṃ gataḥ ।
saṅkalpanena manasā kalpito avirataṃ svayam ।। 

saṅkalpavaśatas sarvāḥ prasaranti jagatkriyāḥ ।
saṅkalpavaśato devī niyatir niyatā sthitā ।। 

ropitāyāṃ prajānāthais sṛṣṭau sa kamalodbhavaḥ ।
brahmā sañcintayaty eṣa padmāsanagataḥ prabhuḥ ।। 

manasspandanamātreṇa citraṃ citreyam utthitā ।
sṛṣṭir ābhoginī sphāravyavahāravikāriṇī ।। 

indropendranarendrāḍhyā śailasāgarasaṅkulā ।
pātālarododigvargamārgasaṅkaṭakoṭarā ।। 

saṅkalpajālam akhilaṃ mayedam ahitaṃ tatam ।
adhunā viramāmy asmāt saṅkalpollāsanakramāt ।। 

iti niścitya viratas kalpanānarthasaṅkaṭāt ।
anādimat paraṃ brahma smaraty ātmānam ātmanā ।। 

tam āsādya tadābhāse pade galitamānasaḥ ।
sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati śāntātmā talpe adhvaśramavān iva ।। 

nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ parāṃ śāntim upāgataḥ ।
avikṣubdha ivāmbhodhir ātmanātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

dhyānāt kadācid bhagavān svayaṃ viramati prabhuḥ ।
cidvaśāt salilaspandāt somyatvād iva vāridhiḥ ।। 

vicārayati saṃsāraṃ sukhaduḥkhasamanvitam ।
āśāpāśaśatair baddhaṃ rāgadveṣabhayāturam ।। 

tatas sa karuṇākrāntamanā bhūtavibhūtaye ।
karotīha mahārthāni śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca ।। 

adhyātmajñānagarbhāṇi vedavedāntavanti ca ।
purāṇādīni cānyāni muktaye sarvadehinām ।। 

punas tat param ālambya padam āpadvivarjitam ।
svasthas tiṣṭhati śāntātmā nirmandara ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

avalokya jagacceṣṭāṃ maryādāyāṃ niyojya ca ।
brahmā kamalapīṭhasthaḥ punas svātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

kevalaṃ janmasaṃskāravaśatas tasya tad vapuḥ ।
apunarjananāyaiva cakrabhramavad āsthitam ।। 

na rocate asya santyāgo vapuṣo na ca saṅgrahaḥ ।
nātmā na cetaran nehā na sthitir nāsthitis tathā ।। 

sarvabhāvasamārambhas samas sarvāsu vṛttiṣu ।
paripūrṇārṇavākāro mukta evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

kadācit kevalaṃ sarvasaṅkalpaparihīnayā ।
yadṛcchayānugrahārthaṃ lokānāṃ pravibudhyate ।। 

eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ puṇyā yā mayoktā mahāmate ।
jātiṃ viddhi surānīke tām etāṃ sāttvikīm iti ।। 

visarge paramākāśe brahmaṇo yā manaḥkalā ।
udeti prathamaṃ saiṣā brahmatvaṃ samupāśnute ।। 

sarge sthitiṃ gate tv anyā yodeti kalanā parā ।
sā vyomānilam āśritya praviṣyauṣadhipallavān ।। 

kācit suratvam āyāti puruṣatvam athāparā ।
kācit tiryaktvam āyāti kācid āyāti yakṣatām ।। 

candraraśmipraṇālena gṛhītauṣadhipallavā ।
yā yat sattvaṃ samabhyeti sā tad evāśu jāyate ।। 

jātā saṃsargavaśatas tasminn eva hi janmani ।
badhyate mucyate vāsau svacamatkārabhedataḥ ।। 

itthaṃ gatā sthitim iyaṃ kila rāmabhadra sṛṣṭis sphuṭaṃ prakaṭasaṅkaṭakarmabandhā ।
āvirbhavadvividhaveṣavihārabhārasaṃrambhagarbhavidhurā kalanāpadena ।। 

kamalajavyavahāro nāma sargaḥ

dvācatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asmin bhagavati brahmaṇy amalaṃ padam āsthite ।
pitāmahe mahābāho kṛtasargavyavasthitau ।। 

jagajjīrṇāraghaṭṭe asmin vahati svavyavasthayā ।
viprotabhūtaghaṭayā rajjvā jīvitatṛṣṇayā ।। 

brahmottheṣu ca jīveṣu viśatsu bhavapañjaram ।
vāsanālūnaśīrṇeṣu payorāśiṃ payassv iva ।। 

āgateṣv īśvarād vyomavātamadhyavivartiṣu ।
manassv anyeṣu vātāntāl lolālātāt kaṇeṣv iva ।। 

anārataṃ viniryānti viśanty anye tathābhitaḥ ।
rāma brahmaṇi jīvaughās taraṅgā iva vāridhau ।। 

anādyantapadotpannāḥ kalanāpadam āgatāḥ ।
bhūtākāśaṃ viśanty anye dhūmaśriya ivāmbudam ।। 

ekatāṃ tatra gacchanti bhūtatanmātramaṇḍalaiḥ ।
mandārakusumāmodā yathā madhuramārutaiḥ ।। 

te tu tanmātravātena tatprāṇatvam upeyuṣā ।
ākramyante pracaṇḍena daityaughenāmarā iva ।। 

bhūtaprāṇānilotthena tena gandhavahena te ।
niveśyante śarīreṣu gandhā ghrāṇavraṇeṣv iva ।। 

teṣu bhūtaśarīreṣu jīvā gacchanti vīryatām ।
tato jagati jāyante bhavanti prāṇinas sphuṭāḥ ।। 

anye dhūmādimārgeṇa garbhatām etya dehinām ।
prāṇitām upagacchanti ciraṃ sthāvaratāṃ ca vā ।। 

kecit pavanamārgeṇa śālikoṭaraśāyinaḥ ।
vīryatām etya jāyante vividhāḥ prāṇadharmiṇaḥ ।। 

kācid utpannamātraiva rāma jīvaparamparā ।
tanmātravalitā tāvat tiṣṭhaty ambarakoṭare ।। 

udeti yāvad bhagavān indur uddāmamaṇḍalaḥ ।
kṣīrāmbubhir ivālolaiḥ plāvayan raśmibhir jagat ।। 

tatas teṣv atiramyeṣu candraraśmiṣu sā padam ।
karoti vihagī lolā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntareṣv iva ।। 

tebhyo api candraraśmibhyo viśaty oṣadhipallavān ।
navaṃ kumudinīṣaṇḍaṃ padminībhya ivālinī ।। 

tayauṣadhiphalāny antas svādavanti bhavanty alam ।
ikṣunālyo raseneva yānti pīvaratām api ।। 

phaleṣu teṣu badhnāti padam indukaracyutā ।
jīvālī kṣīrapūrṇeṣu mātṛstanabhareṣv iva ।। 

tāḥ phalāvalayaḥ pakvā bhakṣyante yaiś śarīribhiḥ ।
teṣv eva vīryam āgatya tiṣṭhanty apravibodhitāḥ ।। 

prasuptavāsanājālā jīvaśrīr garbhapañjaram ।
adhitiṣṭhati bījaśrīs suptapattrā yathā ghaṭam ।। 

yathā kāṣṭhe sthito vahnir yathā mṛdi ghaṭas sthitaḥ ।
yathā kṣīre sthitaṃ sarpir vīrye jīvas tathā sthitaḥ ।। 

anena kramayogena parāgatya maheśvarāt ।
adṛṣṭānyaśarīraśrīr jāyate yo naro bhuvi ।। 

sa hi sāttvikajātis syād udāravyavahāravān ।
tenaiva mokṣabhāgī cej janmanā tat sa sāttvikaḥ ।। 

athetthaṃ yonim āsādya bhuktvā janmaparamparām ।
mokṣārthaṃ prāptajanmā cet tat sa rājasasāttvikaḥ ।। 

pāścātyajanmanaḥ puṃsaḥ kramaṃ vakṣyāmi te adhunā ।
rāma rājasasattvasya mokṣam āyāty asau yathā ।। 

prāthamyena ya āyātas saṃsāram atisāttvikaḥ ।
sa kadācit kvacit kaścit sambhavaty anaghākṛte ।। 

sambhavantīha puruṣā rāma rājasasāttvikāḥ ।
pravicāryās ta evāto gantavyaṃ ceha taddṛśā ।। 

prāthamyena samāyātā ye padāt paramātmanaḥ ।
durlabhāḥ puruṣā rāma te mahāguṇaśālinaḥ ।। 

ye cānye vividhā mūkā mūḍhās tāmasajātayaḥ ।
teṣāṃ sthāvaratulyānāṃ kiṃ tad rāma vicāryate ।। 

katipayādhigatātmabhavāntaraḥ prakṛtajanmani labhyamahāpadaḥ ।
ayam iha pravicāraṇayogyatām anugato nanu rājasasāttvikaḥ ।। 

vicāryapuruṣanirṇayaprasaṅgopadiṣṭajīvāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

trayaścatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ye hi rājasasattvasthā etā bhuvi mahāguṇāḥ ।
te nityam eva muditā uditāḥ kha ivendavaḥ ।। 

na khedam adhigacchanti vyomabhāgā malaṃ yathā ।
nāpadi mlānim āyānti niśi hemāmbujā yathā ।। 

nehante prākṛtād anyad dinānyad bhāskaro yathā ।
ramante sve sadācāre svārtave pādapā yathā ।। 

nityam āpūrṇatām antar akṣubdhām indusundarīm ।
āpady api na muñcanti śaśinaś śītatām iva ।। 

ākṛtyaiva virājante maitryādiguṇakāntayā ।
navastabakahāsinyā latayeva mahādrumāḥ ।। 

samās samarasās somyās satataṃ sādhusādhavaḥ ।
abdhivad dhṛtamaryādā bhavanti vitatāśayāḥ ।। 

atas teṣāṃ mahābāho padam āpadapāsanam ।
sarvadaivānugantavyaṃ maṅktavyaṃ nāpadarṇave ।। 

tathā tatheha jagati vihartavyam akhedinā ।
ātmodayāya vartante yathā rājasasāttvikāḥ ।। 

adhigamyārya sacchāstraṃ vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
anityatāṃ svamanasā viviktenāśu bhāvayet ।। 

ādāv ante ca yan nityaṃ rūpaṃ trailokyavartinām ।
padārthānāṃ tad evāśu bhāvayen netaran mudhā ।। 

asamyagdarśanaṃ tyaktvā vyarthasantānam antavat ।
smartavyaṃ samyag evedaṃ jñānasārtham anantakam ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ veti saṃsāram idam ātatam ।
pravicāryaṃ prayatnena prājñena saha sādhunā ।। 

nākarmasu nimaṅktavyaṃ nānāryeṇa sahāvaset ।
draṣṭavyas sarvavicchettā na mṛtyur avahelayā ।। 

uccaiḥpadasthas tajjñena sumahāñ śītalāśayaḥ ।
sādhur evānugantavyo mayūreṇāmbudo yathā ।। 

ahaṅkārasya dehasya saṃsārasyodbhavasya ca ।
vicāram amalaṃ kṛtvā satyam evāśrayen naraḥ ।। 

śarīram asthimāṃsaṃ ca tyaktvā raktādy aśobhanam ।
bhūtamuktāvalītantuṃ cinmātram avalokayet ।। 

satye nitye tate śuddhe sarvage sarvabhāvane ।
śive sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā ।। 

yaiva cid bhuvanābhogabhūṣaṇe vyomni bhāskare ।
dharāvivarakośasthe saiva cit kīṭakodare ।। 

kumbhavyomnāṃ na bhedo asti yatheha paramārthataḥ ।
citāṃ śarīrasaṃsthānāṃ na bhedo asti tathānagha ।। 

sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tiktaṃ kaṭu ca nānyathā ।
ekatvād anubhūter hi kutaś cinmātrabhinnatā ।। 

ekasminn eva satataṃ sthite cinmātravastuni ।
jāto ayam ayam unnaṣṭa iti kaiṣājñateha vaḥ ।। 

neha tan nāma vastv asti yad abhūtvā prajāyate ।
na ca tan nāma vastv asti yad bhūtvā pravilīyate ।। 

ābhāsamātram evedaṃ na san nāsac ca rāghava ।
utplutenāpraśāntena cetasā sad iva sthitam ।। 

meha moho astu vo maurkhyān nedaṃ sad yat praṇaśyati ।
na cāsad ity eva dṛḍhaṃ nirṇīyāśokitāstu vaḥ ।। 

asati jagati kiṃ kileha mohas sati ca kim aṅga vimohakāraṇaṃ tat ।
jananamaraṇasaṃsthitiṣv atas tvaṃ bhava kham ivātisamas sadopaśāntaḥ ।। 

mohavicāro nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dhīro vicāravāñ jantur ādāv eva mahādhiyā ।
śāstrārthaviduṣā jñena sujanena samaṃ vaset ।। 

yā yā duḥkhavināśinyo varavijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tās tā madhāv iva latā jāyante sujane sati ।। 

sujanena viraktena hṛdyena mahatā saha ।
pravicārya mahābāho padam āsādyate param ।। 

śāstrārthasujanāsaṅgavairāgyābhyāsasatkṛtaḥ ।
puruṣas tvam ivābhāti rāma vijñānabhājanam ।। 

tvaṃ tūdāranijācāro dhīro guṇagaṇārṇavaḥ ।
adhitiṣṭhasi nirduḥkhāṃ jātiṃ rājasasāttvikīm ।। 

bhūyo asmin dagdhasaṃsāre nāsi duḥkhasya bhājanam ।
pāścātyajanmāsi mune svabhāvam anudhāvasi ।। 

svayaivāmalayā dṛṣṭyā tava prakaṭatāṃ gatam ।
yathābhūtaṃ jagadvastu rucā dinapater iva ।। 

idānīṃ madvacorāśivahnidagdhamalo amalaḥ ।
nūnam utsāritābhreṇa śaradvyomnā samo bhava ।। 

bhavabhāvanayā muktaṃ yuktam uttamasaṃvidā ।
cittamuktākalāpaṃ tvam acchācchaṃ hṛdaye kuru ।। 

mamedam idam anyasyety evaṃkalanayojjhitam ।
mano muktavibhāgaṃ te muktam eva na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

tavottamānubhāvasya ya idānīṃ narā bhuvi ।
ceṣṭām anusariṣyanti te api yāsyanty aśokatām ।। 

rāghavavyavahāreṇa vihariṣyanti ye narāḥ ।
bhavārṇavāt tariṣyanti svamanaḥpotakena te ।। 

bhavattulyamatir yas syāt sujanas samadarśanaḥ ।
yogyo asau jñānadṛṣṭīnāṃ pūrṇendus surucām iva ।। 

tvam aśokāṃ daśāṃ prāpto yathāprāptānuvṛttimān ।
yāvaddehaṃ dhiyā tiṣṭha rāgadveṣavihīnayā ।। 

bahir lokocitācāras tv antas tyaktākhilaiṣaṇaḥ ।
parāṃ śītalatām etya tiṣṭha pūrṇendubimbavat ।। 

itarāsu tu ye jātā jātiṣv aguṇaśālinaḥ ।
avicāryās ta ete hi gomāyuśiśudharmakāḥ ।। 

ye svabhāvā mahābāho nṛṇāṃ sāttvikajanmanām ।
tān bhajan puruṣo yāti pāścātyodārajanmatām ।। 

yān eva sevate jantur iha jātiguṇān sadā ।
apy anyajātijāto api yāti tajjātitāṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

prāktanā akhilā bhāvā jātikarmavaśānugāḥ ।
pauruṣeṇāvajīyante dhīrair dhīrā ivārayaḥ ।। 

prāktanāśubhajātisthakarmadoṣākulām api ।
dhairyeṇābhyuddhared buddhiṃ paṅkān mugdhamṛgīm iva ।। 

tāmasīṃ rājasīṃ caiva jātim anyām api śritāḥ ।
svavivekavaśād yānti santas sāttvikajātitām ।। 

antaś cittamaṇau svacche yad rāghava niyojyate ।
tanmayo hi bhavaty eṣa tasmāj jayati pauruṣam ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena mahārhaguṇaśālinā ।
mumukṣavo bhavantīha pāścātyaśubhajātayaḥ ।। 

na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā kvacit ।
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yan nāpnoti guṇānvitaḥ ।। 

tvam ajaryeṇa dhairyeṇa varavairāgyaraṃhasā ।
yuktaḥ prajñāprarūḍhena kiṃ nāpnoṣi tadīhitam ।। 

hitaṃ mahāsattvatayātmanas tvaṃ vidhāya buddhyā bhava vītaśokaḥ ।
bhavatkrameṇaiva tato jano ayam urvyāṃ bhaviṣyaty ativītaśokaḥ ।। 

pāścātyajanmani vivekamahāmahimnā yukte tvayi prasṛtasattvaguṇābhirāme ।
sattvasthakarmaṇi padaṃ nanu rāma rāme maiṣā karotu bhavabandhavimohacintā ।। 

sthitiprakaraṇaṃ samāptam

prakaraṇa upaśānti

prathamas sargaḥ

atha sthitiprakaraṇād anantaram idaṃ śṛṇu ।
upaśāntiprakaraṇaṃ jñātaṃ nirvāṇakāri yat ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

śarattārakitākāśastimitāyāṃ susaṃsadi ।
kathayaty evam āhlādi vasiṣṭhe pāvanaṃ vacaḥ ।। 

śravaṇārthaṃ ca maunasthapārthive saṃsadantare ।
nivāta iva nisspandakamale kamalākare ।। 

vilāsinīṣu saṃśāntamadamohabalāsu ca ।
śamam antaḥ prayāntīṣu cirapravrājitāsv iva ।। 

karāmbhoruhahaṃseṣu līneṣu śravaṇād iva ।
mūkaghurghuraghaṇṭeṣu cāmareṣu lipāv iva ।। 

nāsāgrapariviśrāntatarjanyaṅgulikoṭiṣu ।
vicārayatsu vijñānakalāṃ tajjñeṣu rājasu ।। 

rāme vikāsam āyāte prabhāta iva paṅkaje ।
parityaktatamaḥpīṭhe sūryodaya ivāmbare ।। 

ākarṇayati vāsiṣṭhīr giro daśarathe rasāt ।
kalāpinīva jīmūtanirhrādam uruvarṣaṇam ।। 

āhṛtya sarvabhogebhyo mano markaṭacañcalam ।
śravaṇaṃ prati yatnena bharate mantriṇi sthite ।। 

vasiṣṭhoktyā parijñāte svātmanīndukalāmale ।
lakṣmaṇe vilasallakṣye śikṣābalavilakṣaṇe ।। 

śatrughne śatrudalane cetasā pūrṇatāṃ gate ।
alam ānandam āyāte rākācandropame sthite ।। 

sumantre mitratāṃ yāte manasīndvaṃśuśītale ।
vikāsihṛdaye jāte tatkāla iva paṅkaje ।। 

tatrastheṣu tathānyeṣu tadā muniṣu rājasu ।
ādhautacittaratneṣu procchvasatsv iva cetasā ।। 

udabhūt pūrayann āśāḥ kalpābhraravamāṃsalaḥ ।
atha madhyāhnaśaṅkhānām abdhighoṣasamas svanaḥ ।। 

mahatā tena śabdena tirodhānaṃ muner giraḥ ।
yayur jaladanādena kokiladhvanayo yathā ।। 

munir antarayāṃ cakre svāṃ vācam atha saṃsadi ।
jitasāro guṇaḥ kena mahatā samudīryate ।। 

muhūrtamātram atha taṃ śrutvā madhyāhnanissvanam ।
ghane kolāhale śānte rāmaṃ munir uvāca ha ।। 

rāmādyatanam etāvad āhnikaṃ kathitaṃ mayā ।
prātar anyat pravakṣyāmi vaktavyam arimardana ।। 

idaṃ niyatitaḥ prāptaṃ kartavyaṃ yad dvijanmanām ।
madhyāhnasavanaṃ tan naḥ kāryam āryāvasīdati ।। 

tvam apy uttiṣṭha subhaga samastāṃ savanakriyām ।
ācarācāracatura snānadānārcanādikām ।। 

ity uktvā munir uttasthau samaṃ daśarathena saḥ ।
saṃsadas sendur āditya udayādritaṭād iva ।। 

tayor utthitayos sarvā sabhotthātum akampata ।
mandavātaparāmṛṣṭā nalinīvālilocanā ।। 

uttasthau sāvataṃsotthabhṛṅgamaṇḍalamaṇḍitā ।
kariseneva vindhyādrāv ālolakarapuṣkarā ।। 

parasparāṃsasaṅghaṭṭacūrṇitāṅgadamaṇḍalā ।
ratnacūrṇāruṇāmbhodasandhyāsamayasūcinī ।। 

pataduttaṃsavibhrāntabhṛṅgopāhitaghuṅghumā ।
mukuṭoddāmavidyotaśakracāpīkṛtāmbarā ।। 

kāntālatāhastadalacalaccāmaramañjarī ।
vanalekheva vikṣubdhavaravāraṇamaṇḍalā ।। 

kacatkaṭakaratnāśrikṛṣṭānyo'nyātatāmbarā ।
vātavyādhūtapuṣpeva mandāravanamālikā ।। 

kastūrīkaṇanīhāraracitāmalavāridā ।
śaraddiktaṭamāleva prasṛtāśeṣabhūmipā ।। 

lolamaulimaṇivrātapāṭalāmbarakoṭarā ।
sandhyevākulalolābjakāryasaṃhārakāriṇī ।। 

ratnāṃśusalilāpūrā mukhapadmanirantarā ।
padminīvālivalitā nūpurārāvasārasā ।। 

santatā sā sabhottasthau bhūbhṛcchatasamākulā ।
bhūtasantatisampūrṇā sṛṣṭir navam ivoditā ।। 

praṇamyātha nṛpaṃ bhūpā niryayur nṛpamandirāt ।
śakracāpīkṛtā ratnair ambhodher iva vīcayaḥ ।। 

sāmantā mantriṇaś caiva vasiṣṭham atha bhūmipam ।
praṇamya jagmus snānāya nayavijñānakovidāḥ ।। 

vāmadevādayaś cānye viśvāmitrādayas tathā ।
vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā tasthur āmajjanonmukhāḥ ।। 

rājā daśarathas tatra pūjayitvā munivrajam ।
tadvisṛṣṭo jagāmātha svakāryārtham arindamaḥ ।। 

vanaṃ vanāspadā jagmur vyoma vyomanivāsinaḥ ।
nagaraṃ nāgarāś caiva prātar āgamanāya te ।। 

mahīpativasiṣṭhābhyāṃ praṇayāt prārthitaḥ prabhuḥ ।
vasiṣṭhasadmani niśāṃ viśvāmitro atyavāhayat ।। 

vasiṣṭhas saha viprendraiḥ pārthivair munibhis tathā ।
upāsyamāno rāmādyais sarvair daśarathātmajaiḥ ।। 

jagāma svāśramaṃ śrīmān sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ ।
anuyātas suraughena brahmalokam ivābjajaḥ ।। 

tasmāt pradeśād rāmādīn munir daśarathātmajān ।
sarvān visarjayām āsa pādopānte natān asau ।। 

nabhaścarān avanicarāñ jalecarān visarjya sa stutaguṇagocarāṃś carān ।
yathākramaṃ svagṛha udārasanmunau cakāra tā dvijajanavāsarakriyāḥ ।। 

prathamāhṇikavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

te sametya gṛhaṃ vīrā rājaputrāś śaśitviṣaḥ ।
cakrus sarvam aśeṣeṇa svasadmasu dinakramam ।। 

vasiṣṭho rāghavaś caiva rājāno munayo dvijāḥ ।
iti cakrus svakāryāṇi tadā svagṛhavīthiṣu ।। 

sasnuḥ kamalakalhārakumudotpalahāriṣu ।
jalāśayeṣu cakrāhvahaṃsasārasarāviṣu ।। 

gobhūtilahiraṇyāni śayanāny āsanāni ca ।
dadur dānāni viprebhyo bhojanāny aṃśukāni ca ।। 

hemaratnavicitreṣu sveṣu cāmarasadmasu ।
ānarcur acyuteśānahutāśārkādikān surān ।। 

putrapautrasuhṛdbhṛtyabandhumitragaṇais saha ।
tata āsvādayām āsur bhojanāny ucitāni te ।। 

etasmin samaye cāsmin nagare divaso abhavat ।
tanur aṣṭāṃśaśeṣatvān mṛdvātapamanoharaḥ ।। 

sāyantanavidhiṃ te te tatkālocitayecchayā ।
anayan bandhubhis sārdhaṃ yāvad astaṃ yayau raviḥ ।। 

sandhyāṃ vavandire suṣṭhu jepuś caivāghamarṣaṇam ।
peṭhus stotrāṇi puṇyāni jagur gāthā manoramāḥ ।। 

tataś cābhyudite śyāmākāminīśokahāriṇi ।
kṣīrodād iva māhendryāṃ candre avaśyāyadāyini ।। 

śanair āstīrṇapuṣpeṣu kīrṇakarpūramuṣṭiṣu ।
dīrghendubimbaramyeṣu tasthus talpeṣu rāghavāḥ ।। 

atha rāmād ṛte anyeṣāṃ tatra tadvyavahāriṇī ।
vyatīyāya śanaiś śyāmā muhūrta iva sundarī ।। 

tasthau rāmas tu tām eva vāsiṣṭhīṃ vacanāvalīm ।
cintayan madhurodārāṃ prākpītāṃ karabho yathā ।। 

kim idaṃ nāma saṃsārabhramaṇaṃ kim ime janāḥ ।
bhūtānīha vicitrāṇi kim āyānti prayānti kim ।। 

manasaḥ kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ caitat prasṛjyate ।
māyeyaṃ sā kimutthā syāt kathaṃ ceyaṃ nivartate ।। 

nivṛttayā ca vā kas syād guṇo doṣo atha vā bhavet ।
katham ātmani caivāyaṃ tate saṅkoca āgataḥ ।। 

kim uktaṃ syād bhagavatā muninā manasaḥ kṣaye ।
kim indriyajaye proktaṃ kim uktam atha cātmani ।। 

jīvaś cittaṃ mano māyetyevamādibhir ātataiḥ ।
rūpair ātmaiva saṃsāraṃ tanotīmam asanmayaiḥ ।। 

ebhir eva manomātratantubaddhaiḥ kṣayaṃ gataiḥ ।
duḥkhopaśāntir etāni sucikitsyāni naḥ katham ।। 

bhogābhramālāvalanād dhībalākām imāṃ katham ।
pṛthak karomi payaso dhārāṃ haṃsa ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

bhogās tyaktuṃ na śakyante tattyāgena vinā dhiyaḥ ।
prabhavāmo na vipadām aho saṅkaṭam āgatam ।। 

manomātrajayaprāpyaṃ tanv evedaṃ prayojanam ।
sampannaṃ me giriguru maurkhyād yakṣaś śiśor iva ।। 

kadā svaśāntim āgatya gatasaṃsārasambhramā ।
bāleva labdhadayitā sukham āpsyati no matiḥ ।। 

kadopaśāntasaṃrambhaṃ vigatāśeṣakautukam ।
apārapadaviśrāntaṃ mama syāt pāvanaṃ manaḥ ।। 

kalākalāpasampūrṇāc chaśāṅkād api śītale ।
pade surūdḥaṃ viśramya hasiṣyāmi kadā jagat ।। 

kalanāpelavaṃ rūpam utsṛjyālīnam ātmani ।
kadaiṣyati manaś śāntiṃ payasīva taraṅgakaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇātaraṅgākulitaṃ māyāmakaramālitam ।
kadā saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā syām aham ajvaraḥ ।। 

kadopaśāntaśuddhāsu padavīṣu vicakṣaṇāḥ ।
mumukṣūṇāṃ nivatsyāmo niśśokaṃ samadarśanāḥ ।। 

santāpitasamastāṅgas sarvadhātubhayaṅkaraḥ ।
saṃsṛtijvara ādīrghaḥ kadā naś citta śāmyati ।। 

nivātadīpalekheva kadoṣitvā gatabhramam ।
śamam eṣyasi he buddhe svaprakāśād anantaram ।। 

kadendriyāṇi duḥkhebhyas santariṣyatha helayā ।
durīhādagdhadehāni garutmanta ivābdhitaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti vyaktotthito bhramaḥ ।
śaradīvāsito meghaḥ kadā na upaśāmyati ।। 

mandāravanalekhāsu yā ratis sā tṛṇāyate ।
yatra tat padam ātmīyaṃ samprāpsyāmaḥ kadā vayam ।। 

vītarāgajanaproktā nirmalā jñānadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
kaccit padaṃ tvayi manaḥ kariṣyantīti me vada ।। 

hā tāta mātaḥ putreti girāṃ mā syām ahaṃ punaḥ ।
bhājanaṃ citta madbandho bhojanaṃ duḥkhabhoginām ।। 

he buddhe bhagini bhrātur arthitāṃ pūrayāśu me ।
āvayor duḥkhamokṣāya vicāraya muner giraḥ ।। 

āpad āpatati prītyā bhave sati suteva te ।
tena bhavye bhavacchedabhūtaye susthirā bhava ।। 

vasiṣṭhamuninā proktā viraktāḥ prathamaṃ giraḥ ।
tato mumukṣor ācāra utpattīnāṃ kramas tataḥ ।। 

tatas sthitiprakaraṇaṃ nānādṛṣṭāntasundaram ।
vijñānagarbhaṃ sakalaṃ yathāvat smara he mate ।। 

kṛtam api śataśo vicāritaṃ yad yadi tad upaiti na mānavasya buddhiḥ ।
bhavati tad aphalaṃ śaradghanābhaṃ satatam ato matir eva kāryasāraḥ ।। 

upadeśānuśravaṇam nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tasyaivamprāyayā tatra tatayodāracintayā ।
sā vyatīyāya rajanī padmasyevārkakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।। 

kiñcit tamaḥkaḍārāsu kiñcid apy aruṇāsu ca ।
tato viralatārāsu dikṣu rāmasitāsv iva ।। 

prabhātatūryaghoṣeṇa samam indusamānanaḥ ।
uttasthau rāghavaś śrīmān padmaḥ padmākarād iva ।। 

prātastanaṃ vidhiṃ sarvaṃ sampādya bhrātṛsaṃyutaḥ ।
pramitātmaparīvāro vasiṣṭhasadanaṃ yayau ।। 

samādhisaṃstham ekānte munim ātmaparāyaṇam ।
dūrād eva nanāmāsau rāmo vinatakandharaḥ ।। 

taṃ praṇamyāṅgane tasthus tasmiṃs te vinayānvitāḥ ।
yāvat tamas samālūnaṃ dhvastaṃ diṅmukhamaṇḍalāt ।। 

rājāno rājaputrāś ca ṛṣayo brāhmaṇās tathā ।
āyayus sadanaṃ maunaṃ brahmalokam ivāmarāḥ ।। 

tad vasiṣṭhasya sadanaṃ babhūva janasaṅkulam ।
hastyaśvarathasambādhaṃ pārthivāgāraśobhanam ।। 

kṣaṇād vasiṣṭho bhagavān virarāma samādhitaḥ ।
ācāreṇopapannena jagrāha praṇataṃ janam ।। 

athānuyāto munibhir viśvāmitrānvito muniḥ ।
āruroha rathaṃ śrīmān sahasābjam ivābjajaḥ ।। 

yayau gṛhaṃ dāśarathaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ ।
brahmeva śakranagaraṃ samastasuramālitaḥ ।। 

viveśa vitatāṃ tatra ramyāṃ dāśarathīṃ sabhām ।
haṃsayūthānuvalito rājahaṃsa ivābjinīm ।। 

trīṇi tasya padāny āśu tadā daśaratho nṛpaḥ ।
nirjagāma mahāvīryas siṃhāsanasamutthitaḥ ।। 

viviśus tatra te sarve nṛpā daśarathādayaḥ ।
vasiṣṭhādyāś ca munaya ṛṣayo brāhmaṇās tathā ।। 

mantriṇaś ca sumantrādyā dhaumyādyāś ca vipaścitaḥ ।
rājaputrāś ca rāmādyā mantriputrās suhādayaḥ ।। 

sāmantādyāḥ prakṛtayas suhotrādyāś ca nāgarāḥ ।
mālavādyās tathā bhṛtyāḥ paurādyāś caiva lālakāḥ ।। 

svociteṣu pradeśeṣu svociteṣv āsaneṣu ca ।
sarveṣv evopaviṣṭeṣu vasiṣṭhonmukhadṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

sabhākalakale śānte maunasaṃstheṣu vandiṣu ।
pṛṣṭāsu sthitivārttāsu somye tasmin sabhāntare ।। 

sindūradhūlipuñjābhe bāle dinakarātape ।
vitānatalaviśrānte kacaty ādarśamaṇḍale ।। 

sphuraty añcalamālāsu viśaty ambhojakoṭaraṃ ।
padmarāgeṣv apihite muktādāmasu cañcale ।। 

bṛhatkusumadolābhyaḥ prasṛtābhyas samantataḥ ।
vāti māṃsalam āmodam ādāya madhurānile ।। 

vātāyaneṣu mṛduṣu kusumākīrṇabhūmiṣu ।
paryaṅkeṣūpaviṣṭāsu paśyantīṣu purandhriṣu ।। 

jālāgatārkakaralolavilocanāsu ratnaprabhāprakarapiṅgalacāmarāsu ।
santyaktacāpalalavaṃ capalābalāsu maunasthitāsu sitacāmaradhāriṇīṣu ।। 

muktāphalapratiphalatpratimārkaraśmiśārodarāsv ajirabhūmiṣu caṇpakaugham ।
nāsvādayaty abhinavātapabindubuddhyā bhrāntyā bhramiṇy alibale nabhasīva meghe ।। 

puṇyo vasiṣṭhavacanaprasaraś śruto yas taṃ śaṃsati prasṛtavismayam āryaloke ।
saṃsadgate mṛdupadākṣaramugdhavākyam anyo'nyam utsmitam analpaguṇābhirāmam ।। 

digbhyaḥ purāc ca gaganāc ca nṛparṣisiddhavidyādharāryamunivipragaṇe viśiṣṭe ।
maunapraṇāmam abhitaḥ praviśaty aśabdaṃ sopāṃśu gauravavatā saha jātavākye ।। 

unnidrakokanadakomalakośakṛṣṭamattālijālamakarandasuvarṇarāgaiḥ ।
āpiṅgale maruti vāti vilolaghaṇṭāṭāṅkāragītavati pītaniśāmbuśīte ।। 

agurutagaradhūme candanāmodamiśre sarasakusumadāmoddāmagandhāṅkitābhre ।
sarati sitavitānāmbhoruhāvartaleśaiś calakusumarajo'ṅkaiś śabdavijñātabhṛṅgam ।। 

sabhāsaṃsthānavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

meghagambhīrayā vācā visrabdhapadasundaram ।
idaṃ daśaratho vākyam uvāca munināyakam ।। 

bhagavan hyastanena tvaṃ vākyasandarbhajanmanā ।
kaccin mukto asi khedena tapaḥkārśyātiśāyinā ।। 

hyas tvayokto ya ānandī vivikto vacasāṃ gaṇaḥ ।
amṛtāvarṣaṇeneva tenehāśvāsitā vayam ।। 

candrāṃśava ivotsārya tamāṃsy amṛtanirmitāḥ ।
antaś śītalayanty etā mahatām amalā giraḥ ।। 

apūrvāhlādadāyinya uccaistarapadāśrayāḥ ।
atimohāpahāriṇyas sūktayo amṛtavṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

ātmaratnāvalokaikadīpikā pāramārthikī ।
yasmād uktilatodeti sa vandyas sajjanadrumaḥ ।। 

durīhitaṃ durvihitaṃ sarvaṃ sajjanasūktayaḥ ।
pramārjayanti śītāṃśos tamaskāṇḍam ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇālobhādayo asmākaṃ saṃsāranigaḍā mune ।
tavoktyā tanutāṃ yātāś śaradīvāsitāmbudāḥ ।। 

sampravṛttā vayaṃ draṣṭum ātmānam apakalmaṣam ।
rasāñjanānītadṛśo jātyandhā iva kāñcanam ।। 

saṃsāravāsanānāmnī mihikā hṛdayāmbare ।
pravṛttā tanutāṃ gantuṃ tvaduktiśaradeha naḥ ।। 

mune mandāramañjaryas taraṅgā vāmṛtāmbhasaḥ ।
na tathāhlādayanty antar yathodāradhiyāṃ giraḥ ।। 

yad yad rāghava saṃyāti mahājanasaparyayā ।
dinaṃ tad iha sālokaṃ śeṣās tv andhā dinālayaḥ ।। 

rāma rājīvapattrākṣa prakṛtārthadidṛkṣayā ।
munim ābodhaya punaḥ prasāde samavasthitam ।। 

ity ukte bhūbhṛtā tatra rāmābhimukham āsthitaḥ ।
uvācedam udārātmā vasiṣṭho bhagavān muniḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāghava svakulaikendo taṃ mayoktaṃ mahāmate ।
kaccit smarasi vākyārthaṃ pūrvāparavicāritam ।। 

utpattīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ sattvādiguṇabhedataḥ ।
kaccit smarasi sarvāsāṃ vibhāgam arimardana ।। 

kaccit sarvam asarvaṃ ca sad asac ca sadoditam ।
rūpaṃ smarasi devasya vimalaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

yathedam uditaṃ viśvaṃ viśveśād īśvareśvarāt ।
kaccit smarasi tat sādho sādhuvādaikabhājana ।। 

rūpaṃ kaccid avidyāyāḥ phalgubhaṅguram ātatam ।
anantam antavac caiva samyak smarasi sanmate ।। 

cittam eva naro nānyad iti yat pratipāditam ।
lavaṇādivicāreṇa kaccit smarasi sādhu tat ।। 

vākyārthaś cākhilaḥ kaccit tvayā rāma vicāritaḥ ।
hyastanasya vicārasya rātrau hṛdi niveśitaḥ ।। 

bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛṣṭaṃ hṛdaye suniyojitam ।
prayojanaṃ phalaty uccair na helāhatasaṃsthiti ।। 

bhājanaṃ tvaṃ viviktānāṃ vacasāṃ śuddhiśālinām ।
viviktahṛdayo veṇur muktānām iva mānada ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

kamalāsanaputreṇa muninā sumahaujasā ।
evaṃvitīrṇāvasaro rāmo vākyam uvāca ha ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña tavaivaitad vijṛmbhitam ।
yad ahaṃ paramodāraṃ buddhavān vacanaṃ tava ।। 

yad ādiśasi tat sarvaṃ tathaiva na tad anyathā ।
apāstanidreṇa mayā vākyārtho niśi cintitaḥ ।। 

bhavāndhakārakṣataye bhavatorvīvivasvatā ।
hyaḥ prasāritam āhlādi vāgraśmipaṭalaṃ prabho ।। 

tad adīnam adīnātman sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ mayā ।
ramyaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ ca ratnavṛndam ivābdhinā ।। 

hitānubandhi hṛdyaṃ ca puṇyam ānandasādhanam ।
śirasā dhriyate kair no siddhyai tvadanuśāsanam ।। 

prakṣīyamāṇasaṃsāranīhārāvaraṇā vayam ।
prasannās tvatprasādena varṣānta iva vāsarāḥ ।। 

āpātamadhurārambhaṃ madhye saubhāgyavardhanam ।
anuttamaphalodarkaṃ puṇyaṃ tvadanuśāsanam ।। 

vikāsi sitam amlānam āhlādi muditāśayam ।
tvadvacaḥkusumaṃ nityaṃ śrīmatphaladam astu naḥ ।। 

sakalaśāśvataśāstraviśārada prasṛtapuṇyajalaikamahāhrada ।
bhaja bhṛśaṃ vitatavrata samprati prasṛtatāṃ hatakilbiṣa māṃ prati ।। 

rāghavapraśno nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idam uttamasiddhāntasundaraṃ sundarākṛte ।
upaśāntiprakaraṇaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito hitam ।। 

dīrghasaṃsāramāyeyaṃ rāma rājasatāmasaiḥ ।
dhāryate puruṣair nityaṃ sustambhair iva maṇḍapaḥ ।। 

sattvasthajātibhir vīrais tvādṛśair guṇabṛṃhitaiḥ ।
helayā tyajyate pakvā māyeyaṃ tvag ivoragaiḥ ।। 

ye sattvajātayaḥ prājñās tathā rājasasāttvikāḥ ।
vicārayanti te sādho jagat pūrvāparaṃ param ।। 

śāstrasajjanasatkārasaṅgenāpagatainasām ।
sārāvalokinī buddhir jāyate dīpikopamā ।। 

svayam eva vicāreṇa vicāryātmānam ātmanā ।
yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ na tāvad adhigamyate ।। 

prajñāvatāṃ nayavatāṃ dhīrāṇāṃ kulaśālinām ।
jātyā rājasasattvānāṃ mukhyas tvaṃ kulanandana ।। 

svayam ālokaya prājña saṃsārārambhadṛṣṭiṣu ।
kiṃ satyaṃ kim asatyaṃ vā bhava satyaparāyaṇaḥ ।। 

ādāv ante ca yan nāsti kīdṛśī tasya satyatā ।
ādāv ante ca yan nityaṃ tat satyaṃ rāma netarat ।। 

ādyantāsanmaye yasya vastuny ārajyate manaḥ ।
tasya mugdhapaśor jantor vivekaḥ kena janyate ।। 

jāyate mana eveha mana eveha vardhate ।
samyagdarśanadṛṣṭyā tu mana eva vilīyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

jñātam etan mayā brahman yathāsmin bhuvanatraye ।
mana eva hi saṃsāri jarāmaraṇabhājanam ।। 

yas tasyottaraṇopāyas taṃ me brūhi viniścitam ।
hārdaṃ tamas tvayārkeṇa rāghavāṇāṃ vināśyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pūrvaṃ rāghava śāstreṇa vairāgyeṇa vareṇa ca ।
tathā sajjanasaṅgena nīyate puṇyatāṃ manaḥ ।। 

saujanyabṛṃhitaṃ ceto yadā vairāgyam āgatam ।
tadānugamyā guravo vijñānaguravo hi ye ।। 

tatas tadupadiṣṭena kṛtvā dhyānārcanādikam ।
krameṇa padam āpnoti tad yat paramapāvanam ।। 

vicāreṇāvadātena paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā ।
indunā śītalenāntar bimbaṃ svam iva tejasā ।। 

tāvad bhavamahāmbhodhau janas tṛṇavad uhyate ।
vicārataṭaviśrāntim eti yāvan na cetasā ।। 

vicāreṇa parijñātavastuno asya janasya dhīḥ ।
sarvān adhaḥ karoty ādhīn somyāmbha iva vālukāḥ ।। 

idaṃ rukmam idaṃ bhasma parijñāte iti sphuṭam ।
na yathā hemakārasya moho jñātātmanas tathā ।। 

akṣayo ayam anāśātmā svātmety avagate ciram ।
bhavatīti hi kasyeha mohasyāvasaraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

aparijñātasāre hi maṇau mūlye vimuhyate ।
jñātasāre tv asandigdhamūlye kva kila mūḍhatā ।। 

he janā aparijñāta ātmā vo duḥkhasiddhaye ।
parijñātas tv anantāya sukhāyopaśamāya ca ।। 

miśrībhūtam ivānena dehenopahatātmanā ।
vyastīkṛtya svam ātmānaṃ svasthā bhavata māciram ।। 

dehenāsya na sambandho manāg evāmalātmanaḥ ।
hemnaḥ paṅkalaveneva tadgatasyāpi mānavāḥ ।। 

pṛthag ātmā pṛthag deho jalapadmadalopamau ।
ūrdhvabāhur viraumy eṣa na ca kaścic chṛṇoti me ।। 

jaḍadharmi mano yāvad gartakacchapavat sthitam ।
bhogamandavapur mūḍhaṃ vismṛtātmavicāraṇam ।। 

tāvat saṃsāratimiraṃ sendunāpi savahninā ।
arkadvādaśakenāpi manāg api na bhidyate ।। 

samprabuddhe hi manasi svāṃ vivecayati sthitim ।
naiśam arkodaya iva tamo hārdaṃ palāyate ।। 

nityam uttamabodhāya bhogaśayyāgataṃ manaḥ ।
bodhayed bhavabhedāya bhavo hy atyantaduḥkhadaḥ ।। 

yathā rajobhir gaganaṃ yathā kamalam ambubhiḥ ।
na lipyate api saṃśliṣṭair dehair ātmā tathaiva vaḥ ।। 

kardamādi yathā hemnaś śliṣṭam eva pṛthak sthitam ।
nāntaḥ pariṇatiṃ yāti jaḍo dehas tathātmanaḥ ।। 

sukhaduḥkhānubhāvitvam ātmanīty avabudhyate ।
asatyam eva gagane dvīndutāmlānate yathā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhe hi dehasya sarvātītasya nātmanaḥ ।
ete hy ajñānakasyaiva tasmin naṣṭe na kasyacit ।। 

na kasyacit sukhaṃ kiñcid duḥkhaṃ ca na ca kasyacit ।
sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam anantaṃ paśya rāghava ।। 

imā yāḥ paridṛśyante vitatās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।
payasīva taraṅgās tāḥ piñchā vyomnīva vātmani ।। 

yathā maṇir dadāty ātmacchāyās svayam akāraṇam ।
tejomayīs tathaivāyam ātmā sṛṣṭīḥ prayacchati ।। 

ātmā jagac ca sumate naikaṃ na dve na cāpy asat ।
ābhāsamātram evedam itthaṃ samprati jṛmbhate ।। 

samastaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma sarvam ātmedam ātatam ।
aham anyad idaṃ cānyad iti bhrāntiṃ tyajānagha ।। 

tate brahmaghane nitye sambhavanti na kalpanāḥ ।
vicchittayaḥ payorāśau yathā rāma jaletarāḥ ।। 

ekasminn eva sarvasmin paramātmani vistṛte ।
dvitīyā kalpanā nāsti vahnau himakaṇo yathā ।। 

bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ cidrūpeṇaiva cinmayam ।
jagajjālam ayaṃ hy ātmā svayam ātmani jṛmbhate ।। 

na śoko asti na moho asti na janmāsti na janmavān ।
yad astīha tad evāsti vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

samas svasthas sthiramatiś śāntaś śāntamanā muniḥ ।
maunī varamaṇisvaccho vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān ।
advitīyo viśokātmā vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

viviktaś śāntasaṅkalpo dhīradhīr ūrjitāśayaḥ ।
yathāprāptānuvartī ca vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

vītarāgo nirāyāso vimanā vītakalmaṣaḥ ।
nādātā na parityāgī vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

viśvātītaṃ padaṃ prāptaḥ prāptaprāptavyapūritaḥ ।
pūrṇārṇavavad akṣubdho vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

vikalpajālanirmukto māyāñjanavivarjitaḥ ।
ātmanātmani tṛptātmā vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

anantāpāraparyantavapur ātmavidāṃ varaḥ ।
dharādharaśirodhīro vijvaro bhava rāghava ।। 

ātmany evātmanaudāryaṃ bhaja pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ ।
ātmany evātmanāhlādaṃ bhaja pūrṇendubimbavat ।। 

viśvaprapañcaracaneyam asatyarūpā nāsatyarūpam anudhāvati nāma tajjñaḥ ।
tajjño asi śāntakalano asi nirāmayo asi nityodito asi bhava sundara śāntaśokaḥ ।। 

ekātapatram avanau guruṇopadiṣṭaḥ samyak prapālaya ciraṃ samayeha dṛṣṭyā ।
rājyaṃ samastaguṇarañjitarājalokas tyāgo na yukta iha karmasu nāpi rāgaḥ ।। 

prathamopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

imam evaṃ parispandaṃ karomīty astavāsanam ।
pravartate yaḥ kāryeṣu sa mukta iti me matiḥ ।। 

pauruṣīṃ tanum āśritya kecid ete kriyāratāḥ ।
svargān narakam āyānti svargaṃ ca narakāt punaḥ ।। 

kecit kukarmaniratā viratās svavivekataḥ ।
narakān narakaṃ yānti duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam ।। 

kecit svavāsanātantubaddhāḥ karmāvaloḍitāḥ ।
tiryaktvāt sthāvaratanuṃ yānti tiryaktanuṃ tataḥ ।। 

kecid ātmavido dhanyā vicāritamanodṛśaḥ ।
vicchinnatṛṣṇānigaḍā yānti niṣkevalaṃ padam ।। 

purā katipayāny eva bhuktvā janmāni rāghava ।
asmiñ janmani yo muktas sa syād rājasasāttvikaḥ ।। 

jāto asau vṛddhim abhyeti pārvaṇaś candramā iva ।
kuṭajaṃ prāvṛṣīvainaṃ saubhāgyam anugacchati ।। 

yasyedaṃ janma pāścātyaṃ tam āśv eva mahāmate ।
viśanti vidyā vimalā muktā veṇum ivottamam ।। 

āryatā hṛdyatā maitrī somyatā muktatā jñatā ।
samāśrayanti taṃ nityam antaḥpuram ivāṅganāḥ ।। 

yaḥ kurvan sarvakāryāṇi puṣṭe naṣṭe atha tatphale ।
samas sa sarvakāleṣu na tuṣyati na śocati ।। 

tamāṃsīva divā yānti tatra dvandvāni saṅkṣayam ।
śaradīva ghanās tatra guṇā gacchanti śuddhatām ।। 

peśalācāramadhuraṃ sarve vāñchanti taṃ janāḥ ।
veṇuṃ madhuranissvānaṃ vane mṛgagaṇā iva ।। 

naraṃ pāścātyajanmānam evamprāyā guṇaśriyaḥ ।
jātam evānudhāvanti balākā iva vāridam ।। 

tato asau guṇasampūrṇo gurum evānugacchati ।
sa tam ekaṃ vivekena niyojayati pāvanam ।। 

vicāravairāgyavatā cetasā guṇaśālinā ।
devaṃ paśyaty athātmānam ekarūpam anāmayam ।। 

ato rāma vicāreṇa cāruṇā śāntacetasā ।
prabodhanīyaṃ prathamaṃ mano mananamantharam ।। 

ye hi pāścātyajanmānas te hi suptaṃ manomṛgam ।
prabodhayanti prathamaṃ guṇagītair mahāguṇāḥ ।। 

prathitaguṇān sugurūn niṣevya yatnād amaladhiyā pravicārya cittaratnam ।
gatim amalām upayāti mānavo asmiñ jagati vilokya ciraṃ prakāśam antaḥ ।। 

kramopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eṣa tāvat kramaḥ proktas sāmānyas sarvajantuṣu ।
imam anyaṃ viśeṣaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rājīvalocana ।। 

asmin saṃsārasaṃrambhe jātānāṃ dehadhāriṇām ।
apavargagatau rāma dvāv imāv uttamau kramau ।। 

ekas tāvad guruproktād anuṣṭhānāc chanaiś śanaiḥ ।
janmanā janmabhir vāpi siddhidas samudāhṛtaḥ ।। 

dvitīyas tv ātmanaivāśu kiñcidvyutpannacetasaḥ ।
bhavati jñānasamprāptir ākāśaphalapātavat ।। 

nabhaḥphalanipātābhajñānasampratipattaye ।
atremaṃ śṛṇu vṛttāntaṃ prāktanaṃ kathayāmi te ।। 

śṛṇu subhaga kathaṃ mahānubhāvā vyapagatapūrvaśubhāśubhārgaḍaughāḥ ।
khapatitaphalavat paraṃ vivekaṃ caramabhavā vimalaṃ samāpnuvanti ।। 

kramasūcanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asty astamitasarvāpad udyatsampad udāradhīḥ ।
videhānāṃ mahīpālo janako nāma vīryavān ।। 

kalpavṛkṣo arthisārthānāṃ mitrābjānāṃ divākaraḥ ।
mādhavo bandhupuṣpāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ makaraketanaḥ ।। 

dvijakairavaśītāṃśur dviṣattimirabhāskaraḥ ।
saujanyaratnajaladhir bhuvaṃ viṣṇur ivāsthitaḥ ।। 

praphultabālalatike mañjarīpuñjapiñjare ।
sa kadācin madhau mattakokilollāsalāsini ।। 

yayau kusumitābhogaṃ savilāsalatāṅganam ।
līlayopavanaṃ kāntaṃ nandanaṃ vāsavo yathā ।। 

tasmin varavane hṛdye kesarāmodimārute ।
dūrasthānucaraś cārukuñjeṣu vicacāra ha ।। 

atha śuśrāva kasmiṃścit tamālavanagulmake ।
siddhānām apradṛśyānāṃ svaprasaṅgād udāhṛtāḥ ।। 

viraktamanasāṃ nityaṃ śailakandaracāriṇām ।
imāḥ kamalapattrākṣa gītā gītātmabhāvanāḥ ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśyasamāyogāt pratyayānandaniścayaḥ ।
yas taṃ svam ātmatattvotthaṃ niṣṣyandaṃ samupāsmahe ।। 

draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyāni tyaktvā vāsanayā saha ।
darśanaprathamābhāsam ātmānaṃ samupāsmahe ।। 

nirbhāsanaṃ nirmananam ābhāsamananopamam ।
abhāvabhāvanābhogaṃ sadātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

dvayor madhyagataṃ nityam asti nāstīti pakṣayoḥ ।
prakāśanaṃ prakāśānām ātmānaṃ samupāsmahe ।। 

aśiraskahakārābham aśeṣākārasaṃsthitam ।
ajasram uccarantaṃ taṃ svam ātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

santyajya hṛdguheśānaṃ devam anyaṃ prayānti ye ।
te ratnam abhivāñchanti tyaktahastasthakaustubhāḥ ।। 

sarvāśāḥ kila santyajya phalam etad avāpyate ।
yenāśāviṣavallīnāṃ mūlamālā vilūyate ।। 

buddhvāpy atyantavairasyaṃ yaḥ padārtheṣu durmatiḥ ।
badhnāti bhāvanāṃ bhūyo naro nāsau sa gardabhaḥ ।। 

utthitānutthitān etān indriyāhīn punaḥ punaḥ ।
hanyād vivekavajreṇa vajreṇeva harir girīn ।। 

upaśamasukham āvahet pavitraṃ śamavaśataś śamam eti sādhucetaḥ ।
praśamitamanasas svake svarūpe bhavati sukhe sthitir uttamā cirāya ।। 

siddhagītā nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti siddhagaṇodgītā gītāś śrutvā mahīpatiḥ ।
viṣādam ājagāmāśu bhīrū raṇaravād iva ।। 

jagāma parivāraṃ svam ākarṣan svagṛhaṃ prati ।
svatīravṛkṣānusṛtaḥ prāvṛḍogha ivārṇavam ।। 

parivāram aśeṣeṇa visarjyātra svam ālayam ।
eka evārurohāgryaṃ gṛham arka ivācalam ।। 

tataḥ proḍḍayanālolakhagapakṣaticañcalāḥ ।
ālokayaṃl lokagatīr vilalāpedam āturaḥ ।। 

hā kaṣṭam atikaṣṭāsu lokaloladaśāsv ayam ।
pāṣāṇeṣv iva pāṣāṇa āluṭhāmi balād alam ।। 

aparyantasya kālasya ko apy aṃśo jīvyate mayā ।
tasmin bhāvaṃ nibadhnāmi dhiṅ mām adhamacetasam ।। 

kiyanmātram idaṃ nāma rājyam ājīvitaṃ mama ।
kim etena vinā duḥkhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi hatadhīr yathā ।। 

ādāv ante apy ananto ahaṃ madhye pelavajīvitaḥ ।
bālaś citrendunevāhaṃ kiṃ mudhā dhṛtimān sthitaḥ ।। 

prapañcaracitenāyam indrajālena jālinā ।
hā kaṣṭam abhimuhyāmi kenāsmi parimohitaḥ ।। 

yad vastu yac ca vā ramyaṃ yad udāram akṛtrimam ।
kiñcit tad iha nāsty eva kiṃniṣṭheyaṃ dhṛtir mama ।। 

dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ yan me manasi vartate ।
iti nirṇīya bāhye arthe bhāvanāṃ santyajāmy aham ।। 

lokājavañjavībhāvas salilāvartabhaṅguraḥ ।
dṛṣṭo adyāpi hi duḥkhāya keyam āsthā sukhaṃ prati ।। 

pratyabdaṃ pratimāsaṃ ca pratyahaṃ ca pratikṣaṇam ।
sukhāni duḥkhaviddhāni duḥkhāni tu punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ nibhālitam ।
atucchaṃ na tad astīha satāṃ yatrāstu saṃsthitiḥ ।। 

adya ye mahatāṃ mūrdhni te dinair nipatanty adhaḥ ।
hatacitta mahattāyāṃ kaiṣā viśvastatā tava ।। 

arajjur eva baddho aham apaṅko asmi kalaṅkitaḥ ।
patito asmy uparistho api hā mamātman hatā sthitiḥ ।। 

kasmād akasmān moho ayam āgato dhīmato api me ।
asitaḥ pihitāloko bhāskarāgram ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

ka ime me mahābhogāḥ ka ime mama bandhavaḥ ।
bālo bhūtabhayeneva śaṅke kenāham ākulaḥ ।। 

svayam eva nibadhnāmi jarāmaraṇakāriṇīm ।
kim imām aham artheṣu dhṛtim udvegabhāriṇīm ।। 

yātu tiṣṭhatu vā sampan mamaināṃ prati ko grahaḥ ।
budbudaśrīr ivaiṣā hi mithyaivettham upasthitā ।। 

te mahāvibhavā bhogās te santas snigdhabāndhavāḥ ।
sarvaṃ smṛtipathaṃ prāptaṃ vartamāne api kā dhṛtiḥ ।। 

kva dhanāni mahīpānāṃ brahmaṇāṃ kva jaganti vā ।
prāktanāni prayātāni keyaṃ viśvastatā mama ।। 

galitānīndralakṣāṇi budbudānīva vāriṇi ।
māṃ jīvitanibaddhāśaṃ vihasiṣyanti sādhavaḥ ।। 

koṭayo brahmaṇāṃ yātā gatās sargaparamparāḥ ।
prayātāḥ pāṃsuvad bhūpāḥ kā dhṛtir mama jīvite ।। 

saṃsārarātridussvapne śūnye dehamaye bhrame ।
āsthāṃ ced anubadhnāmi tan mām astu dhig asthitim ।। 

ayaṃ so aham iti vyartham utthitāsatsvarūpiṇā ।
ahaṅkārapiśācena kim ajñavad ahaṃ hataḥ ।। 

hṛtaṃ hṛtam idaṃ kasmād āyur āyatayānayā ।
paśyann api na paśyāmi sūkṣmayā kālalekhayā ।। 

pādapīṭhīkṛteśānāś śārṅgikrīḍanakandukāḥ ।
kālakāpālinā grastāḥ kim āsthe mayi valgasi ।। 

ajasram upayānty ete yānti cādyāpi vāsarāḥ ।
avinaṣṭaikasadvastur dṛṣṭo nādyāpi vāsaraḥ ।। 

sārasās sarasīvaite sarvasmiñ janacetasi ।
bhogā eva sphuranty antar nātucchapadadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ prāpto duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ gataḥ ।
adyāpi na virakto asmi hā dhiṅ mām adhamāśayam ।। 

yeṣu yeṣu dṛḍhābaddhā bhāvanā dṛḍhavastuṣu ।
tāni tāni vinaṣṭāni dṛṣṭāni kim ihottamam ।। 

yan madhye yac ca paryante yad āpāte manoramam ।
sarvam evāpavitraṃ tad vināśāmedhyadūṣitam ।। 

yeṣu yeṣu padārtheṣu dhṛtiṃ badhnāti mānavaḥ ।
teṣu teṣv eva tasyāśu dṛṣṭo duḥkhodayo bhṛśam ।। 

śvaś śvaḥ pāpīyasīm eva śvaś śvaḥ krūratarām api ।
śvaś śvaḥ khedakarīm eti daśām iha jaḍo janaḥ ।। 

ajñānopahato bālye yauvane madanāhataḥ ।
śeṣe kalatracintārtaḥ kiṃ karotu kadā jaḍaḥ ।। 

āgamāpāyavirasaṃ daśāvaiṣamyadūṣitam ।
asārasāraṃ saṃsāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati manmatiḥ ।। 

rājasūyāśvamedhādyair iṣṭvā yajñaśatair api ।
mahākalpāt kam apy aṃśaṃ svargaṃ āpnoti nādhikam ।। 

ko asau svarge asti bhūmau vā pātāle vā pradeśakaḥ ।
na yatrābhidravanty etā durbhramarya ivāpadaḥ ।। 

nijacetobilavyālāś śarīrasthalapallavāḥ ।
ādhayo vyādhayaś caite nivāryante kathaṃ kila ।। 

satye asattā sthitā mūrdhni mūrdhni ramyeṣv aramyatā ।
sukheṣu mūrdhni duḥkhāni kim ekaṃ saṃśrayāmy aham ।। 

jāyante ca mriyante ca prākṛtāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ ।
dharā tair eva nīrandhrā durlabhās sādhusādhavaḥ ।। 

nīlotpalālinayanāḥ paramapremabhūṣaṇāḥ ।
hāsāyaiva vilāsinyaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā sthitāḥ ।। 

yeṣāṃ nimeṣaṇonmeṣair jagatāṃ pralayodayau ।
tādṛśāḥ puruṣā yātā mādṛśāṃ gaṇanaiva kā ।। 

santi ramyatarād ramyās susthirād api ca sthirāḥ ।
cintāparyavasāneyaṃ padārthaśrīḥ kim īdṛśī ।। 

sampadaś ca vicitrā yās tāś cec cittena sammatāḥ ।
tat tā api mahārambhā manye nūnaṃ mahāpadaḥ ।। 

āpado api vicitrā yās tāś cen manasi sammatāḥ ।
tat tā api mahārambhā manye sakalasampadaḥ ।। 

manomātravivarte asmiñ jagaty abbindubhaṅgure ।
mamedam ity apūrvaiva kutas tv akṣaramālikā ।। 

kākatālīyayogena sampannāyāṃ jagatsthitau ।
dhūrtena kalpitā vyarthaṃ heyopādeyabhāvanāḥ ।। 

iyattācchinnarūpāsu sukhanāmnīṣu dṛṣṭiṣu ।
kāsv etāsv anuṣakto asmi pataṅgo agniśikhāsv iva ।। 

varam ekāntadāheṣu luṭhitaṃ rauravāgniṣu ।
na tv ālūnaviśīrṇāsu sthitis saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।। 

saṃsāra eva duḥkhānāṃ sīmāntaḥ kila kathyate ।
tanmadhyapatiteneha sukham āsādyate katham ।। 

akṛtrimamahāduḥkhe saṃsāre ye vyavasthitāḥ ।
ta ete anyāni duḥkhāni jānate madhurāṇy alam ।। 

aham apy ādhimān kaṣṭaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthitaiḥ ।
ajñair evāgatas sāmyam aparāmṛṣṭavastubhiḥ ।। 

sahasrāṅkuraśākhātmaphalapallavaśālinaḥ ।
asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya manomūlamayo aṅkuraḥ ।। 

saṅkalpam eva taṃ manye saṅkalpopaśamena tat ।
śoṣayāmi yathā śoṣam eti saṃsārapādapaḥ ।। 

ākāramātraramyāsu manomarkaṭavṛttiṣu ।
parijñātāsv ihādyaiva na rame nīrasāsv aham ।। 

āśāpāśaśataprotāḥ pātotpātopatāpadāḥ ।
saṃsāravṛttayo bhuktā idānīṃ viramāmy aham ।। 

hā hato asmi vinaṣṭo asmi mṛto asmīti punaḥ punaḥ ।
śocite gata evāham idānīṃ nānurodimi ।। 

prabuddho asmi prahṛṣṭo asmi dṛṣṭaś cauro mayātmanaḥ ।
manonāmā nihanmy enaṃ manasāsmi ciraṃ hataḥ ।। 

etāvantam imaṃ kālaṃ manomuktāphalaṃ mama ।
aviddham āsīd adhunā viddhaṃ tu guṇam arhati ।। 

manastuṣārakaṇako vivekārkātapena me ।
ciranirvṛtaye nūnam acirāl layam eṣyati ।। 

vibudhais sādhubhis siddhair ahaṃ sādhu prabodhitaḥ ।
ātmānam anugacchāmi paramānandasādhanam ।। 

ātmānaṃ maṇim ekānte labdhvaivālokayan sukham ।
tiṣṭhāmy astamitānyehaś śaradīvāmalo ambudaḥ ।। 

ayam aham idam eva tan mameti sphuritam apāsya balād asatyam antaḥ ।
ripum atimalinaṃ mano nihanmi praśamam upaimi namo astu te viveka ।। 

janakavitarko nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti cintayatas tasya puras sampraviveśa ha ।
pratīhāraḥ prage bhānos syandanāgram ivāruṇaḥ ।। 

pratīhāraḥ

deva dosstambhaviśrāntasamastavasudhābhara ।
sampādayottiṣṭha dinavyāpāraṃ nṛpatocitam ।। 

etāḥ kusumakarpūrakuṅkumāmbughaṭās striyaḥ ।
snānabhūmau sthitās sajjā nadyo mūrtiyutā iva ।। 

eṣā kamalakalhārakānanabhrāntaṣaṭpadā ।
kṛtā kamalinī stryarthaṃ racitāṃśukamaṇḍapā ।। 

etāḥ kamalinītīrabhuvaś chattraiḥ prapūritāḥ ।
sacāmararathebhāśvais snānāvasarasevinām ।। 

samagrasumanaḥpūrṇai ratnauṣadhipariplutaiḥ ।
sajjīkṛtāḥ paṭalakair devārcanabhuvas tava ।। 

snātaḥ pavitrahastaś ca parijaptāghamarṣaṇam ।
tvām eva prekṣate deva dakṣiṇārho dvijavrajaḥ ।। 

calaccāmarahastābhiḥ pālyante parameśvara ।
sajjīkṛtās tu kāntābhiś śītā bhojanabhūmayaḥ ।। 

śīghram uttiṣṭha bhadraṃ te niyataṃ kāryam ācara ।
na kālam ativartante mahāntas sveṣu karmasu ।। 

pratīhārapatāv ittham uktavaty atha pārthivaḥ ।
tathaiva cintayām āsa citrāṃ saṃsārasaṃsthitim ।। 

kiyanmātram idaṃ nāma rājyaṃ sukham iti sthitam ।
na prayojanam etena mameha kṣaṇabhaṅginā ।। 

sarvam eva parityajya mithyāḍambarasambhramam ।
ekānta eva tiṣṭhāmi saṃśānta iva vāridhiḥ ।। 

alam ebhir asatprāyair mama bhogavijṛmbhitaiḥ ।
tyaktvā sarvāṇi karmāṇi sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ ।। 

citta cāturyam etasmād bhogābhyāsakusambhramāt ।
tyaja janmajarājāḍyajālajambālaśāntaye ।। 

daśāsu yāsu yāsv eva sambhramaṃ citta paśyasi ।
tābhya evātivirataṃ paramaṃ sukham eṣyasi ।। 

pravṛttaṃ san nivṛttaṃ sad bhūyo bhūyaś ciraṃ ciram ।
bhogabhūmiṣu sarvāsu citta tṛptiṃ na gacchasi ।। 

tasmāt tavālam anayā tucchayā bhogacintayā ।
bhavaty akṛtrimā tṛptir yenābhipata tat tatam ।। 

iti sañcintya janakas tūṣṇīm eva babhūva ha ।
śāntacāpalacetastvāl lipikarmārpitopamaḥ ।। 

pratīhāro api novāca gauraveṇa bhayena ca ।
punarvākyaṃ mahīpānāṃ cittavṛttiṣv aśīlitam ।। 

tūṣṇīm atha kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā janako janajīvitam ।
punas sañcintayām āsa manasā śamaśālinā ।। 

kim upādeyam astīha yatnāt saṃsādhayāmi yat ।
kasmin vastuni badhnāmi dhṛtiṃ nāśavivarjite ।। 

kiṃ me kriyāparatayā kiṃ niṣkriyatayāpi vā ।
na tad asti vināśena varjitaṃ yat kiloditam ।। 

kriyāvān akriyo vāstu kāyo ayam asadutthitaḥ ।
satas sthirasya śuddhasya citaḥ kā nāma me kṣatiḥ ।। 

nābhivāñchāmy asamprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ na tyajāmy aham ।
svastha ātmani tiṣṭhāmi yan mamāsti tad astu me ।। 

na mameha kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।
kriyayākriyayā vāpi yat prāpyaṃ sad asat sataḥ ।। 

akurvataḥ kurvato vā yuktāyuktāḥ kriyā mama ।
nābhivāñchitam astīha yad upādeyatāṃ gatam ।। 

tad utthāya kramaprāptāṃ kāyo ayaṃ prakṛtāṃ kriyām ।
karotv aspanditāṅgas tu kim ayaṃ sādhayiṣyati ।। 

sthite manasi niṣkāme same vigatarañjane ।
kāyāvayavajau kāryaspandāspandau phale samau ।। 

karmajāsu phalaśrīṣu manasaḥ kartṛbhoktṛte ।
tasmin praśamam āyāte kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ nṛṇām ।। 

yo niścayo antaḥ puruṣasya rūḍhaḥ kriyāsv asau tanmayatām upaiti ।
anāmayaṃ me padam āgatā dhīr adhīratām antar alaṃ tyajāmi ।। 

janakaniścayo nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti sañcintya janako yathāprāptāṃ kriyām asau ।
asaktaḥ kartum uttasthau dinaṃ dinapatir yathā ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭāḥ parityajya cetasā vāsanās svayam ।
yathāprāptaṃ cakārāsau jāgrad eva suṣuptavat ।। 

sampādya tad ahaḥkāryam āryāvarjanapūrvakam ।
anayac charvarīm ekas tathaiva dhyānalīlayā ।। 

manas samarasaṃ kṛtvā saṃśāntaviṣayabhramam ।
śarvaryāṃ kṣīyamāṇāyām itthaṃ cittam abodhayat ।। 

citta cañcalavistāra ātmano na sukhāya te ।
śamam ehi śamāt tāta sukhaṃ sāram avāpya te ।। 

yathā yathā vikalpaughaṃ saṅkalpayasi helayā ।
tathā tathaiti sphāratvaṃ saṃsāras tava cittaka ।। 

śataśākhatvam āyāti sekena viṭapī yathā ।
anantādhitvam āyāsi śaṭha bhogecchayā tathā ।। 

cintājālavilāsotthā imās saṃsārasṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tasmāt tyaktvā vicitrāṃ tvaṃ cintām upaśamaṃ vraja ।। 

saṃsārasṛṣṭiṃ taralām imāṃ tulaya sundara ।
asyāś cet sāram āpnoṣi tad enām eva saṃśraya ।। 

āsthām asmāt parityajya dṛśyād darśanalālasa ।
maitad gṛhāṇa mā muñca śuddhayā viharecchayā ।। 

idaṃ dṛśyam asat sad vāpy udetv astam upaitu vā ।
sādho vivaśatāṃ gaccha maitadīyair guṇāguṇaiḥ ।। 

manāg api na sambandhas tava dṛśyena vastunā ।
avidyamānarūpeṇa sambandhaḥ kila kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

asat tvam etac ca na sad dvayor evāsatos satoḥ ।
sambandha iti citreyam apūrvaivākṣarāvalī ।। 

asad etad bhavat sac cet tathāpi kila sundara ।
saṅgas sadasatoḥ kīdṛg vada tvaṃ mṛtajīvatoḥ ।। 

citta tvam atha dṛśyaṃ ca dve eva yadi sanmaye ।
sadā sthite tat prasaraḥ kuto harṣaviṣādayoḥ ।। 

tasmān mā bhava mūḍhaṃ tvaṃ mā samullāsam āhara ।
akṣubdhāṃ buddhim ātiṣṭha bhavya tyaja bhavasthitim ।। 

tindukālātavad vyartham ātmany eva parijvalat ।
mā mohamalam āsādya mandatāṃ gaccha durmate ।। 

na tad ihāsti samunnatam uttamaṃ vrajasi yena parāṃ paripūrṇatām ।
tad avalambya balād atidhīratāṃ jahihi cañcalatāṃ śaṭha re manaḥ ।। 

cittānuśāsanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ vicārayaṃs tatra svarājye janako nṛpaḥ ।
cakārākhilakāryāṇi na mumoha ca dhīradhīḥ ।। 

na manaḥ prollalāsāsya kvacid ānandavṛttiṣu ।
kevalaṃ susamaṃ svacchaṃ sa sadaiva vyatiṣṭhata ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛty asau dṛśyaṃ nājahāra na cātyajat ।
kevalaṃ vigatāśaṅkaṃ vartamāne vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

anāratavivekena tena tanmanasā tataḥ ।
punaḥ kalaṅkaṃ naivāttam ambareṇeva rājasam ।। 

svavivekānusandhānād iti tasya mahīpateḥ ।
samyagjñānam anantābhaṃ mano nirmalatāṃ yayau ।। 

anāmṛṣṭavikalpāṃśaś cidātmā vigatāmayaḥ ।
udiyāya hṛdākāśe tasya vyomnīva bhāskaraḥ ।। 

sa dadarśākhilān bhāvāṃś cittantau maṇivat tatān ।
ātmabhūtān anantātmā sarvabhūtātmakovidaḥ ।। 

prahṛṣṭo na babhūvāsau kadācin na ca duḥkhitaḥ ।
prakṛtavyavahāritvāt sadaiva samamānasaḥ ।। 

jīvanmukto babhūvāsau tataḥ prabhṛti mānada ।
janako jaraḍhajñāno jñātalokaparāvaraḥ ।। 

rājyaṃ kurvan videhānāṃ janako janajīvitam ।
naiva harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ so avaśaḥ paryatapyata ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti guṇadoṣavivarjitaḥ ।
arthānarthais svarājyotthair na glāyati na hṛṣyati ।। 

kurvann api karoty eṣa na kiñcid api kutracit ।
santiṣṭhaty eva satataṃ jīvanmuktavapur yataḥ ।। 

suṣuptāvasthitasyeva janakasya mahīpateḥ ।
bhāvanās sarvabhāvebhyas sarvathaivāstam āgatāḥ ।। 

bhaviṣyan nānusandhatte nātītaṃ cintayaty asau ।
vartamānaṃ nimeṣaṃ tu hasann evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

svavicāravaśenaiva tena tāmarasekṣaṇa ।
prāptaṃ prāpyam aśeṣeṇa rāma netarayecchayā ।। 

tāvat tāvat svakenaiva cetasā pravicāryate ।
yāvad yāvad vicārāṇāṃ sīmāntas samavāpyate ।। 

na tad guror na śāstrārthān na puṇyāt prāpyate padam ।
yat satprasaṅgād uditavicāraviśadād dhṛdaḥ ।। 

snigdhayā nijayā ṛjvyā prajñayaiva vayasyayā ।
padam āsādyate rāma na nāma kriyayānyayā ।। 

yasya jvalati tīkṣṇāgrā pūrvāparavicāriṇī ।
prajñādīpaśikhā jātu tam āndhyaṃ nānudhāvati ।। 

duruttarā yā vipado duḥkhakallolasaṅkulāḥ ।
tīryate prajñayā tābhyo nāvevādbhyo mahāmate ।। 

prajñāvirahitaṃ mūḍham āpad alpaiva bādhate ।
pelavaivānilakalā sārahīnam ivolapam ।। 

prajñāvān asahāyo api viśāstro api visajjanaḥ ।
uttaraty eva saṃsārasāgarād rāma potavat ।। 

prajñāvān asahāyo api kāryāntam adhigacchati ।
duṣprajñaḥ kāryam āsādya pradhānam api naśyati ।। 

śāstrasajjanasaṃsargaiḥ prajñāṃ pūrvaṃ vivardhayet ।
sekasaṃrakṣaṇārambhaiḥ phalaprāptyai latām iva ।। 

prajñābalabṛhanmūlaḥ kāle satkāryapādapaḥ ।
phalaṃ phalaty atisvādu māso bimbam ivaindavam ।। 

ya eva yatnaḥ kriyate bāhyārthopārjane naraiḥ ।
sa eva yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ pūrvaṃ prajñāvivardhane ।। 

sīmāntaṃ sarvaduḥkhānām āpadāṃ kośam uttamam ।
bījaṃ saṃsāravṛkṣāṇāṃ prajñāmāndyaṃ vivarjayet ।। 

yat svargād yac ca pātālād yad rājyāt samavāpyate ।
tat samāsādyate sarvaṃ prajñākośān mahāmate ।। 

prajñayottīryate ghorād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt ।
nācārair na ca vā tīrthais tapasā ca na rāghava ।। 

yat prāptās sampadaṃ daivīm api bhūmicarā narāḥ ।
prajñāpuṣpalatāyās tat phalaṃ svādu samutthitam ।। 

prajñayā nakharālūnavanavāraṇaraktapāḥ ।
jambukair vijitās siṃhās siṃhair hariṇakā iva ।। 

pāmarair api bhūpatvaṃ prāptaṃ prajñāvaśān naraiḥ ।
svargāpavargayogyatvaṃ prājñasyaiveha dṛśyate ।। 

prajñayā vādinas sarve svavikalpavilāsinaḥ ।
jayanti sugataprakhyā ravān abdhiravā iva ।। 

cintāmaṇir iyaṃ prajñā hṛtkośasthā vivekinaḥ ।
phalaṃ kalpalatevaiṣā cintitaṃ samprayacchati ।। 

bhavyas tarati saṃsāraṃ prajñayā prohyate adhamaḥ ।
śikṣitaḥ pāram āpnoti nāvā naśyaty aśikṣitaḥ ।। 

dhīs samyagyojitā pāram asamyagyojitāpadam ।
naraṃ nayati saṃsāre vahantī naur ivārṇave ।। 

vivekinam asammūḍhaṃ prājñam āśāgaṇotthitāḥ ।
doṣā na paribādhante sannaddham iva sāyakāḥ ।। 

prajñayedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ samyag evāṅga dṛśyate ।
samyagdarśinam āyānti nāpado na ca sampadaḥ ।। 

pidhānaṃ paramārkasya jaḍātmā vitato asitaḥ ।
ahaṅkārāmbudo mattaḥ prajñāvātena pāṭyate ।। 

padam atulam upaitum icchatā svaṃ prathamam iyaṃ matir eva lālanīyā ।
phalam abhipatatā kṛṣīvalena prathamataraṃ nanu kṛṣyate dharaiva ।। 

prajñāmāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ janakavad rāma vicāryātmānam ātmanā ।
padaṃ viditavedyānām acireṇādhigacchasi ।। 

ye hi pāścātyajanmānaḥ prājñā rājasajātayaḥ ।
prāpnuvanti svayaṃ prāpyaṃ te janā janako yathā ।। 

tāvat tāvad vijityārīn indriyākhyān yateta ha ।
yāvad ātmātmanaivāyam ātmany eva prasīdati ।। 

prasanne sarvage deve deveśe paramātmani ।
svayam ālokite sarvāḥ kṣīyante duḥkhadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

muṣṭayo mohabījānāṃ vṛṣṭayo vividhāpadām ।
kudṛṣṭayaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare ।। 

sadā janakavad rāma sarvārambhavatātmanā ।
prajñayātmānam ālakṣya lakṣmīvān uttamo bhava ।। 

nityam āttavicārasya paśyataś cañcalaṃ janam ।
janakasyeva kālena svayam ātmā prasīdati ।। 

na daivaṃ na ca karmāṇi na dhanāni na bandhavaḥ ।
śaraṇaṃ bhavabhītānāṃ svaprayatnād ṛte nṛṇām ।। 

ye daivaniṣṭhāḥ karmādikuvikalpaparāyaṇāḥ ।
teṣāṃ mandā matis tāta nānugamyā vināśinī ।। 

vivekaṃ param āśritya vilokyātmānam ātmanā ।
dhiyā virāgoddhurayā saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret ।। 

eṣā sā kathitā rāma nabhaḥphalanipātavat ।
sukhadā jñānasamprāptir ajñānataruśātanī ।। 

janakasyeva sadbuddhes svayam eva vivekinaḥ ।
vikāsam ety ayaṃ dehī devaḥ prātar ivāmbujam ।। 

saṃśāntamananaṃ cittaṃ vicāreṇa vilīyate ।
galadvarṇākṛtisparśam ātapena himaṃ yathā ।। 

ayam evāham ity asyāṃ niśāyām udite kṣaye ।
svayaṃ sarvagatas sphāras svālokas sampravartate ।। 

ayam evāham ity asmin saṅkoce vilayaṃ gate ।
anantabhuvanavyāpī vistāras samprajāyate ।। 

janakena parityaktā yathāhaṅkāravāsanā ।
tathā tvam api sadbuddhe vicāryāntaḥ parityaja ।। 

ahaṅkārāmbude kṣīṇe cidvyomni vimale amalaḥ ।
nūnaṃ prakaṭatām eti svāloko bhāskaraḥ paraḥ ।। 

etāvad evātitamo yad ahambhāvabhāvanam ।
tasmiñ śamam upāyāte prakāśa upajāyate ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo asti na ca nāstīti bhāvitam ।
manaḥ praśāntim āyātaṃ nopādeyeṣu majjati ।। 

upādeyānupatanaṃ heyaikāntavivarjanam ।
yad etan manaso rāma taṃ bandhaṃ viddhi netarat ।। 

mā khedaṃ bhaja heyeṣu mopādeyaparo bhava ।
heyādeyadṛśau tyaktvā śeṣasthas svasthatāṃ vraja ।। 

yeṣām idam upādeyam idaṃ heyam iti sthitiḥ ।
vilīnā te na vāñchanti na tyajantīha netare ।। 

heyopādeyakalane kṣīṇe yāvan na cetasi ।
na tāvat samatā bhāti sābhre vyomnīva candrikā ।। 

avastv idam idaṃ vastu yasyeti lulitaṃ manaḥ ।
tasmin nodeti samatā śāhoṭa iva mañjarī ।। 

yuktāyuktaiṣaṇā yatra lābhālābhavilāsinī ।
samatāsvacchatā tatra kuto nairāśyahāsinī ।। 

ekasmin brahmatattve asmin vidyamāne nirāmaye ।
nānānānātayā nityaṃ kim ayuktiḥ kva yuktatā ।। 

īpsitānīpsitāśaṅke markaṭyau cittapādape ।
cañcale sphurato yasmin kutas tasyeha somyatā ।। 

nirāśatā nirbhayatā nityatā samatā jñatā ।
nirīhatā niṣkriyatā somyatā nirvikalpatā ।। 

dhṛtir maitrī smṛtis tuṣṭir muditā mṛdubhāṣitā ।
heyopādeyanirmuktaṃ jñaṃ yānti vanitā ratāḥ ।। 

dhāvamānam adho bhogāṃś cittaṃ pratyāhared balāt ।
pratyāhāreṇa patitam adho vārīva setunā ।। 

bāhyān arthān imāṃs tyaktvā tiṣṭhan gacchan svapañ śvasan ।
sarvathā sarvadā sarvān āntarāṃś ca nivārayet ।। 

gṛhītatṛṣṇāśaphari vāsanājālam ābilam ।
saṃsāravāri prasṛtaṃ cintātantubhir ātatam ।। 

anayā tīkṣṇayā tāta cchinddhi buddhiśalākayā ।
vātyayevāmbudaṃ kālo vahantyā vitate pade ।। 

asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya mūlaṃ doṣāṅkurāspadam ।
dhuryadhīreṇa dhairyeṇa proddharoddhurayā dhiyā ।। 

manasaiva manaś chittvā vismṛtya caramaṃ manaḥ ।
vartamānam api cchittvā cchinnasaṃsāratāṃ vraja ।। 

moho vismṛtya saṃsāraṃ na bhūyaḥ parirohati ।। 

tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan rāma nivasann utpatan patan ।
asad evedam ity antar niścityāsthāṃ parityaja ।। 

samatām alam āśritya samprāptaṃ kāryam āharan ।
acintayaṃs tathāprāptaṃ vihareha hi rāghava ।। 

yathā sarvartuliṅgāni na bibharti bibharti ca ।
kham evam iha kāryāṇi kuru mā kuru vānagha ।। 

tvam eva vettā tvam ajas tvam ātmā tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ ।
ātmano avyatiriktaṃ sat tvayedam ātataṃ tatam ।। 

yenāsmād dṛśyasambhārād abhito bhāvanojjhitā ।
sa na saṅgṛhyate doṣair harṣāmarṣaviṣādajaiḥ ।। 

rāgadveṣavinirmuktas samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ ।
mukta ity ucyate yogī tyaktasaṃsāravāsanaḥ ।। 

sa yat karoti yad bhuṅkte yad dadāti nihanti yat ।
tatra muktadhiyas tasya samatā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

prāptaṃ kartavyam eveti tyaktveṣṭāniṣṭabhāvanam ।
pravartate yaḥ kāryeṣu na sa majjati kutracit ।। 

citsattāmātram evedam iti niścayavan manaḥ ।
tyaktabhogābhimananaṃ śamam eti mahāmate ।। 

manaḥ prakṛtyaiva jaḍaṃ cittattvam anudhāvati ।
māṃsagardhena mārjāro vane mṛgapatiṃ yathā ।। 

siṃhavīryavaśāl labdhaṃ māṃsaṃ bhuṅkte hi jambukaḥ ।
cidvīryavaśataḥ prāptaṃ dṛśyam āśrayate manaḥ ।। 

mana evam asatkalpaṃ citprasādena jīvati ।
bhāvayaṃś citam evaikāṃ cittām etya cid apy ataḥ ।। 

jaḍaṃ yat kila nirhīnaṃ citā dīpikayojjhitam ।
tan manaś śavasaṅkāśam acid uttiṣṭhate katham ।। 

citsvabhāvaparāmṛṣṭā spandaśaktir marunmayī ।
kalanā cittam ity uktyā kathyate śāstradarśibhiḥ ।। 

yaś citaḥ kṣubdha ākāras saiveyaṃ kalanocyate ।
cid evāham iti jñātvā sā cittām eva gacchati ।। 

cetyena rahitā yaiṣā cit tad brahma sanātanam ।
cetyena sahitā yaiṣā cit seyaṃ kalanocyate ।। 

kiñcidaspaṣṭarūpaṃ yad brahma tat saṃsthitaṃ manaḥ ।
kalanām asad evaitya sad ivopasthitaṃ hṛdi ।। 

cittam ity eva rūḍheha yadaiva kalanā citaḥ ।
tadaiva cittvaṃ vismṛtya sā jaḍeva vyavasthitā ।। 

sampannā kalanānāmnī saṅkalpānuvidhāyinī ।
vyavacchedavatī jātā heyopādeyadharmiṇī ।। 

saiṣā cid eva jaḍatām āgateva svaśaktitaḥ ।
na samprabodhitā yāvad rūpaṃ tāvan na budhyate ।। 

ataś śāstravicāreṇa vairāgyeṇa pareṇa ca ।
nigraheṇendriyāṇāṃ ca bodhayet kalanāṃ svayam ।। 

kalanā sarvajantūnāṃ vijñānena śamena ca ।
prabuddhā brahmatām eti bhramatītarathā jagat ।। 

vyāmohamadirāmattāṃ luṭhitāṃ viṣayāvaṭe ।
ātmāvabodhe saṃsuptāṃ kalanām avabodhayet ।। 

aprabuddhā jaḍā hy eṣā na kiñcid avabudhyate ।
saṅkalpalalanevāntar dṛśyamānāpy asanmayī ।। 

tayā paramayā dṛṣṭyā kalanaiṣāntarasthayā ।
mañjarī gandhaśaktyeva padārtheṣu virājate ।। 

na tu saṅkalpitā yaiṣā kalaneti jagattraye ।
sā hi kiñcid vijānāti nityajāḍyaikadharmiṇī ।। 

cetati kva jaḍā nāma kalanopalarūpiṇī ।
padminīvātapenāsau pareṇaivāvabodhyate ।। 

yathā śilāmayī kanyā coditāpi na nṛtyati ।
tatheyaṃ kalanā dehe na kiñcid avabudhyate ।। 

lipikarmanṛpair yuddhaṃ kva kṛtaṃ ghargharāravam ।
kva citracandrakiraṇair oṣadhyaḥ pravibodhitāḥ ।। 

abhūtāviṣṭagātrair vā śavaiḥ kva parivalgitam ।
kva gītaṃ madhuradhvānaṃ vanapāṣāṇamaṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

kva pustavihitair arkaiḥ kṣapitaṃ yāminītamaḥ ।
kva saṅkalpamayaiś chāyāḥ kriyante vyomakānanaiḥ ।। 

kva jaḍair upalākārair mithyābhramabharotthitaiḥ ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmayair ebhir manobhiḥ kriyate kriyā ।। 

yathātape sthite sphāre mṛgatṛṣṇātaraṅgiṇī ।
kalanā tadvad eveyaṃ sphuraty ātmani saty alam ।। 

yad etat spandanaṃ rāma manaso adhigataṃ śanaiḥ ।
marutāṃ viddhi tāṃ śaktim antaḥprāṇaśarīriṇām ।। 

yaiṣā saṃvid anākrāntā saṅkalpalavaniścayaiḥ ।
anākṣiptarasākārā prabhaiṣā pāramātmikī ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti yā kalanā sthitā ।
prāṇātmatattvayos tasyās sañjñā jīveti kathyate ।। 

dhīś cittaṃ jīva ity etās saṅkalpasyāsatas sataḥ ।
sañjñās saṅkalpitās tajjñair na rāma paramārthataḥ ।। 

na mano no matir nāpi jīvo na ca śarīrakam ।
astīha paramārthena svātmaivehāsti sarvadā ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ātmā kālakramas tathā ।
sadākāśād acchataro nāstīvāsty eva vāmalaḥ ।। 

acchatvād asadābhāsas saṃvidrūpatayā tu sat ।
ātmā sarvapadātītas svānubhūtyānubhūyate ।। 

manas tatra parikṣīṇaṃ yatra saṃvit parātmanaḥ ।
andhakārakṣayo yatra tatrālokaḥ pravartate ।। 

yatrātmasaṃvido acchāyās saṅkalponmukhatā manāk ।
tatrātmano vismaraṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ cittajanmanaḥ ।। 

parasya puṃsas saṅkalpamayatvaṃ cittam ucyate ।
acittatvam asaṅkalpān mokṣanāmābhijāyate ।। 

etāvac cetaso janma bījaṃ saṃsārabhūruhaḥ ।
saṅkalponmukhatāsyāntas saṃvido yat kilātmanaḥ ।। 

nirvikalpacitas sattā saṅkalpāṅkakalaṅkitā ।
kalanety ucyate neha ghaṭavad vidyate manaḥ ।। 

prāṇaśaktau niruddhāyāṃ mano nāma vilīyate ।
dravyasthāyāṃ tu tad dravyaṃ prāṇarūpaṃ hi mānasam ।। 

deśāntarānubhavanaṃ prāṇo vetti hṛdi sthitam ।
spandavedanato yat tan mana ity abhidhīyate ।। 

vairāgyāt karaṇābhyāsād yuktito vāsanākṣayāt ।
paramārthāvabodhāc ca rodhyante prāṇaśaktayaḥ ।। 

dṛṣado vidyate śaktiḥ kadācit svādane andhasām ।
na punar manasām asti śaktis spandāvabodhane ।। 

spandaḥ prāṇamarucchaktiś calarūpaiva sā jaḍā ।
cic citas svātmanas svasthā sarvadā sarvagaiva sā ।। 

cicchaktes spandaśakteś ca sambandhaḥ kalpyate manaḥ ।
mithyaiva tat samutpannaṃ mithyājñānaṃ tad ucyate ।। 

eṣā hy avidyā kathitā māyaiṣā sā nigadyate ।
param etat tad ajñānaṃ saṃsārādhiviṣapradam ।। 

cicchaktes spandaśakteś ca saṅge saṅkalpakalpanam ।
na kṛtaṃ cet parikṣīṇās tad imā bhavabhītayaḥ ।। 

vāyutas spandaśaktir yā sā citā cetyate yadā ।
sacetyacit tadaivāntas saṅkalpād yāti cittatām ।। 

cittataiṣā cito mithyā kalpitā bālayakṣavat ।
akhaṇḍamaṇḍalākārā spandasattā cid eva yat ।। 

sarvagatvāc cid anyena kena sambadhyate kila ।
akhaṇḍaśakter indrasya kena syāt saha saṅgaraḥ ।। 

atas sambandhino abhāvāt sambandho atra na vidyate ।
sambandhena vinā kasya siddhaṃ tat kīdṛśaṃ manaḥ ।। 

citspandayor ekatāyāṃ kiṃ nāma mana ucyate ।
kā senā hayamātaṅgasaṅghasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ vinā ।। 

tasmān nāsty eva duṣṭātma cittaṃ nāma jagattraye ।
eṣā samyakparijñānāc cetaso jāyate kṣatiḥ ।। 

mā mudhaivam anarthāya manas saṅkalpayānagha ।
mano mithyā samuditaṃ nāsty eva paramārthataḥ ।। 

mā tvam antaḥ kvacit kiñcit saṅkalpaya mahāmate ।
manas saṅkalpakaṃ nāma yasmān nāstīha kutracit ।। 

asamyagjñānasambhūtā kalanāmṛgatṛṣṇikā ।
hṛnmarau tava saṃśāntā samyagālokanān mune ।। 

jaḍatvān nissvarūpatvāt sarvadaiva mṛtaṃ manaḥ ।
mṛtena māryate lokaś citreyaṃ maurkhyacakrikā ।। 

yasya nātmā na deho asti nādhāro nāpi cākaraḥ ।
tenedaṃ bhakṣyate sarvaṃ citreyaṃ maurkhyavāgurā ।। 

sarvasāmagryahīnena hanyate manasāpi yaḥ ।
tasyotpaladalāghātair manye dalati mastakam ।। 

jaḍena mūkenāndhena nihato manasāpi yaḥ ।
manye sa dahyate mūḍhaḥ pūrṇacandramarīcibhiḥ ।। 

vidyamāno hi yaś śūro lokas tenābhibhūyate ।
avidyamānam evedaṃ hanty ato mugdhatoditā ।। 

mithyāsaṅkalpakalitaṃ mithyaiva sthitim āgatam ।
anviṣṭam api no dṛṣṭaṃ kā tasya kila śaktatā ।। 

aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyāmayavidhāyinī ।
cetasāpy atilolena loko yad abhibhūyate ।। 

maurkhyaṃ sarvāpadāṃ niṣṭhā kā hi nāpad ajānataḥ ।
paśya maurkhyād iyaṃ sṛṣṭir ajātenaiva janyate ।। 

hā kaṣṭam atimugdheyaṃ sṛṣṭir maurkhyavaśaṃ gatā ।
asataiva yad etena jīvenāpy upatāpyate ।। 

manye mūrkhamayī sṛṣṭir iyam atyantapelavā ।
taraṅgāsiprahāreṇa kaṇaśaḥ pariśīryate ।। 

nīlābjanālapātena yantreṇeva vidīryate ।
indor ābhogapūrṇasya karasparśena muhyate ।। 

ripubhir nayanonmuktair dṛṣṭisūtrair nibadhyate ।
saṅkalpakṛtayā śūrasenayā paribhūyate ।। 

yasmāt kileyaṃ manasā na sthitenaiva kutracit ।
kalpitena mudhānyena kṛpaṇena vihanyate ।। 

mūrkhalokamayī sṛṣṭir mana evāsadutthitam ।
yā śaktā na vaśīkartuṃ na sā rāmopadiśyate ।। 

abhijātasvarūpaiṣā prajñākṣodeṣu na kṣamā ।
nopadeśagirāṃ yogyā paripūrṇeva saṃsthitā ।। 

bibhety eṣā hi vīṇāyās tantrīguṇatanudhvaneḥ ।
bandhor api sanidrasya bibheti vadanadyuteḥ ।। 

hasato api janād uccairbhītabhītā palāyate ।
svenaiva manasāpy ajñā kilaiṣā vivaśīkṛtā ।। 

sukhalavavivaśā dviṣeva taptā hṛdayagatena nijena cetasaiva ।
vidhuritadhiṣaṇā na vetti satyaṃ tad avitathaṃ parimohitā mudhaiva ।। 

manonivāraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃsārasāgarāsārakalloleṣūhyamānayā ।
mana eva na mūkaṃ svaṃ yayā janatayā jitam ।। 

ātmalābhamayodāraphalābhir iha sā mayā ।
vicāroktibhir etābhiś śāstre asmin nopadiśyate ।। 

na paśyaty eva yo hy andhas tasya kaḥ khalu durmatiḥ ।
vicitramañjarīcitraṃ sandarśayati kānanam ।। 

kaḥ kuṣṭhaghargharaghrāṇaṃ nānāmodavicāraṇe ।
mūrkham ātmopadeśe ca pramāṇaṃ kurute amatiḥ ।। 

viparyastendriyaṃ mattaṃ madirāghūrṇitekṣaṇam ।
dharmanirṇayasākṣitve kaḥ pramāṇīkaroty adhīḥ ।। 

kaś śavaṃ vā śmaśānasthaṃ samupāyakathāṃ śaṭhaḥ ।
paripṛcchati sandehe kaś ca mūrkhaṃ praśāsti vai ।। 

yenāśayabilastho hi mūko andho api na nirjitaḥ ।
manovyālas sa durbuddhiḥ kathaṃ nāmopadiśyate ।। 

jitam eva mano viddhi vastuto yan na vidyate ।
nikaṭāt sā cirāstaiva yā śilā naiva vidyate ।। 

mano na vijitaṃ rāma yenāsad api durdhiyā ।
tenāgrastaviṣeṇaiva mriyate viṣamūrchayā ।। 

jñaḥ paśyati sadaivātmā spandante jñānaśaktayaḥ ।
indriyāṇi svadharmeṣu mano nāma kim ucyate ।। 

prāṇānāṃ spandinī śaktir jñā śaktiḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
indriyāṇāṃ nijā śaktir evaṃ ko atra nibadhyate ।। 

sarvāś ca śaktayas tasya sarvaśakteḥ kilātmanaḥ ।
pṛthaktā cānyatā ceyaṃ kuto nāmetarotthitā ।। 

kiṃ nāma jīva ity uktaṃ yenehāndhīkṛtaṃ jagat ।
cittaṃ caivāsad eva tvaṃ viddhi kāsty asya śaktatā ।। 

manonirdagdhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaparamparāḥ ।
matir me karuṇākrāntā rāma mugdheva tapyate ।। 

kaḥ kilātra kutaḥ khedo yan mūrkhaḥ paritapyate ।
duḥkhāyaiva hi jāyante karabhāḥ prākṛtās tathā ।। 

vināśāyaiva jāyante jaḍadeheṣv abuddhayaḥ ।
anāratodayāpāyā budbudā jaladhiṣv iva ।। 

kiyantaḥ paśya paśavaḥ pratyahaṃ pratimaṇḍalam ।
sūnāvadbhir nihanyante kevātra paridevanā ।। 

arbudāny anilo hanti kṣupājāleṣu cānvaham ।
daṃśānāṃ maṣakānāṃ ca kevātra paridevanā ।। 

diśaṃ prati girīndreṣu pulindaughā vane vane ।
nighnanti prāṇilakṣāṇi kevātra paridevanā ।। 

jale jalacaravyūhāt tanuṃ sthūlo nikṛntati ।
grāsāya pratyahaṃ matsyaḥ kevātra paridevanā ।। 

gṛdhraśyenādayo vyomni pakṣipūgaṃ vihaṅgamāḥ ।
anārataṃ vilumpanti kevātra paridevanā ।। 

likṣām aṇukaṇakṣāmāṃ kṣudhā khādati makṣikā ।
tāṃ kośakāraḥ kṣudhito daṃśas tam api cañcalaḥ ।। 

taṃ daṃśaṃ darduro bhuṅkte vyālas tam api darduram ।
sarpam ugrakharo hanti babhruś cainaṃ nikṛntati ।। 

babhruṃ hinasti mārjāro mārjāraṃ śvā nikṛntati ।
ṛkṣaḥ kauleyakaṃ hanti ṛkṣaṃ vyāghro nikṛntati ।। 

siṃho abhibhavati vyāghraṃ śarabhas siṃham atti ca ।
śarabho nāśam āyāti mattameghavilaṅghane ।। 

meghā vātair vidhūyante vāyavo giribhir jitāḥ ।
girayo vajraniṣpiṣṭāś śakrasya vaśagaḥ paviḥ ।। 

viṣṇunā dhriyate śakro viṣṇur gacchati jantutām ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśāveśajarāmaraṇamālitām ।। 

jantavo api mahākāyā api vidyāyudhānvitāḥ ।
likṣābhir aṅgalagnābhir upajīvyanta eva hi ।। 

ajasram evam ālūnaviśīrṇaṃ bhūtajaṅgalam ।
parasparam alaṃ mohād bhakṣyate rakṣyate api ca ।। 

anārataṃ vinaśyanti vividhā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
anārataṃ ca jāyante vicitrāḥ kakubhaṃ prati ।। 

jalakośeṣu jāyante matsyebhamakarādayaḥ ।
bhūmāv antaḥ prajāyante kīṭaughā vṛścikādayaḥ ।। 

antarikṣe api jāyante ākāśe vihagādayaḥ ।
vanavīthīṣu jāyante siṃhavyāghramṛgādayaḥ ।। 

prāṇyaṅgeṣv api jāyante likṣāyūkāpipīlakāḥ ।
sthāvareṣu ca jāyante ghuṇājagarajātayaḥ ।। 

śilāntareṣu jāyante kīṭabhekaghuṇādayaḥ ।
viṣṭhāyām api jāyante nānākīṭagaṇās tathā ।। 

evam anyeṣv asaṅkhyeṣu janmasv apacayeṣu ca ।
ajasraṃ karuṇāvanto nandantūparudantu vā ।। 

anāratamṛtāv asminn anāratasamudbhave ।
saṃsārasambhrame yuktā na tuṣṭir na ca duḥkhitā ।। 

paṅktayas tv evam evemā vṛkṣaparṇagaṇais saha ।
utpatyotpatya līyante bhūtānāṃ bhūrisambhavāḥ ।। 

yaḥ pravṛttaḥ kubuddhīnāṃ dayāvān duḥkhamārjane ।
sa hastacchattranirmṛṣṭasūryāṃśuḥ khedam ety alam ।। 

na tiryaksamadharmāṇa upadeśyā narā bhuvi ।
kathāprakathanenārthaḥ kas sthāṇuvikaṭe vane ।। 

kiṃ kilotphālamanasāṃ paśūnāṃ ca viśeṣaṇam ।
kṛṣyante paśavo rajjvā manasā mūḍhacetasaḥ ।। 

svacittapaṅkamagnānāṃ svāśāṃśaracitātmanām ।
mūrkhāṇām āpadam dṛṣṭvā prarudanty upalā api ।। 

anirjitātmacittānām anantā duḥkharāśayaḥ ।
tanmārjane kṛtaprajño nātas sampratipadyate ।। 

vinirjitātmacittānāṃ duḥkhāni raghunandana ।
sunivāryāṇi tenātra jñātajñeyaḥ pravartatām ।। 

mano nāsti mahābāho mā mudhaitat prakalpaya ।
anena kalpitena tvaṃ vetāleneva hanyase ।। 

yāvad vismṛtavān ātmatattvaṃ mūḍho abhavad bhavān ।
tāvat tava manovyālo babhūvābhyuditas tataḥ ।। 

idānīṃ bhavatā jñātaṃ yathābhūtam arindama ।
saṅkalpād vardhate cittaṃ tad evāśu parityaja ।। 

dṛśyam āśrayasīdaṃ cet tat sacitto asi bandhavān ।
dṛśyaṃ santyajasīdaṃ cet tad acitto asi mokṣavān ।। 

ayaṃ guṇasamāhāro bandhāyaiva samāśritaḥ ।
santyakta eva mokṣāya yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

nāhaṃ nedam iti dhyāyaṃs tiṣṭha tvam acalācalaḥ ।
anantākāśasaṅkāśahṛdayo hṛdayeśvaraḥ ।। 

ātmano jagataś cāntar vibhāgakalanāmalam ।
rāma dvitvamayaṃ tyaktvā śeṣasthas susthiro bhava ।। 

ātmano jagataś cāntar draṣṭṛdṛśyadaśāntare ।
darśanākhye svam ātmānaṃ sarvadā bhāvayan bhava ।। 

svādyasvādakasantyaktaṃ svādyasvādakamadhyagam ।
svadanāntassthitaṃ dhyāyan nityam ātmamayo bhava ।। 

rāmānubhavanīyasya tathānubhavitus svayam ।
avalambya nirālambaṃ madhyam adya sthiro bhava ।। 

bhavabhāvanayā hīnaṃ bhāvābhāvadaśojjhitam ।
bhāvayitvaivam ātmānam ātmasaṃsthas svayaṃ bhava ।। 

ātmasattāṃ tyajann enāṃ cetyaṃ bhāvayasi svayam ।
yadā rāma tadā yāsi cittatām atiduḥkhadām ।। 

cittatāśṛṅkhalām enāṃ svarūpajñānayuktibhiḥ ।
balāc chittvā mahābāho svātmasiṃhaṃ vimocaya ।। 

paramātmadaśāṃ tyaktvā cetyaṃ paripatan malam ।
yadā gacchasi saṅkalpaṃ cetyaṃ sampadyase tadā ।। 

ātmano vyatiriktaṃ sac cetyam ity aṅgasaṃvidā ।
manas sampadyate duḥkhi kṣīyate tyaktayā tayā ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ity antas saṃvidodaye ।
kva cettā kva ca vā cittaṃ kiṃ cetyaṃ cintanaṃ ca kim ।। 

aham ātmeti jīvo asmīty etāvac cittakaṃ viduḥ ।
anenedam anādyantaṃ duḥkhaṃ rāghava tanyate ।। 

aham ātmā na jīvākhyās sattās santītarāḥ kvacit ।
ity eva cittopaśamaḥ paramaṃ sukham ucyate ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti jāte rāghava niścaye ।
asattā cetaso jātā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

evaṃ satyāvabodhena svātmaivedam iti sthite ।
manas sugalitaṃ viddhi sūryabhāsā tamo yathā ।। 

manassarpaś śarīrastho yāvat tāvan mahad bhayam ।
tasminn utsārite yogād bhayasyāvasaraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

bhrāntimātrotthitaś cittavetālo bhavatānagha ।
samyagjñānena mantreṇa prasabhaṃ vinipātyatām ।। 

dehagehād gate cittayakṣe balavatāṃ vara ।
nirādhir vigatodvegaṃ tiṣṭha nāsti bhayaṃ tava ।। 

nīrāga eva nirupāñjana eva cāsmīty etāvataiva galitā tava cittasattā ।
nirduḥkham uttamapadaṃ paramaṃ gato asi tiṣṭhopaśāntasakalaiṣaṇa evam antaḥ ।। 

cittasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

enām anusaran rāma cittasattām apāvanīm ।
saṃsārabījakaṇikāṃ jīvabandhanavāgurām ।। 

ātmā tyaktātmarūpābho malinām āpatan daśām ।
cintāṃ samanusandhatte dhatte ca kalanāmalam ।। 

mūrchamānā mahāmohadāyinī bhayakāriṇī ।
tṛṣṇā viṣalatārūpā mūrchām eva prayacchati ।। 

yadā yadodeti tadā mahāmohapradāyinī ।
tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇaniśeveyam anantāndhyavikāriṇī ।। 

kalpānalaśikhādāhaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktā harādayaḥ ।
tṛṣṇānalaśikhādāhaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktā na kecana ।। 

tīkṣṇā kṛṣṇā sudīrghā ca vahaty aṅge sadā nije ।
śītalevāsukhodarkā ghorā tṛṣṇākṛpāṇikā ।। 

yāny etāni durantāni durdharāṇy uddhatāni ca ।
tṛṣṇāvallyāḥ phalānīha tāni duḥkhāni rāghava ।। 

adṛśyaivātti māṃsāsthirudhirādi śarīrakāt ।
manobilavilīnaiṣā tṛṣṇāvanaśunī nṛṇām ।। 

kṣaṇam ullāsam āyāti kṣaṇam āyāti śūnyatām ।
jaḍā vidalayaty āśu tṛṣṇāprāvṛṭtaraṅgiṇī ।। 

dṛṣṭadainyo hatasvānto hataujā yāti nīcatām ।
muhyate rauti patati tṛṣṇayābhihato janaḥ ।। 

na sthitā koṭare yasya tṛṣṇākṛṣṇabhujaṅgamī ।
tasya prāṇānilās svasthāḥ puṃso hṛdayarandhragāḥ ।। 

nūnam astaṅgato yatra tṛṣṇākṛṣṇaniśākramaḥ ।
puṇyāni tatra vardhante śuklapakṣa ivendavaḥ ।। 

yo na tṛṣṇāghuṇāvalyā kṣataḥ puruṣapādapaḥ ।
puṇyaprasūnena sadā so avabhāti vikāsinā ।। 

anantākulakallolā vivartāvartasaṅkulā ।
pravahaty āśayāraṇye tṛṣṇāmohanadī nṛṇām ।। 

tṛṣṇayeme janās sarve sūtrayantrapatatrivat ।
uhyante praviśīryante saṃhriyante ca bhūriśaḥ ।। 

mūlāny api susūkṣmāpi kaṭhināyasakarkaśā ।
tṛṣṇā paraśudhāreva lagantī vinikṛntati ।। 

nipataty avaṭe mūḍhas tṛṣṇām anusarañ janaḥ ।
nīlām anupatañ śvabhratṛṇaśākhāṃ yathaiṇakaḥ ।। 

nāpan nāpi jarā na kṣut tathā jarayati kṣaṇāt ।
yathā jarayati kṣāmaṃ tṛṣṇā hṛdayarūpikā ।। 

tṛṣṇayāśayakauśikyā hṛdy amaṅgalabhūtayā ।
rūḍhayā bhagavān eṣa viṣṇur vāmanatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

kayācid eva daivikyā hṛdi grathitayānayā ।
tṛṣṇayā bhrāmyate vyomni rajjvevārko anvahaṃ kila ।। 

sarvaduḥkhamayākārāṃ kārāṃ jagati jīvataḥ ।
tṛṣṇāṃ parihara krūrām uragīm iva dūrataḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇayā pavanā vānti śailās tiṣṭhanti tṛṣṇayā ।
tṛṣṇayaiva dharā dhātrī trailokyaṃ tṛṣṇayā vṛtam ।। 

sarvaiva lokayātreyaṃ protā tṛṣṇāvaratrayā ।
rajjubaddhā vimucyante tṛṣṇābaddhā na kecana ।। 

tasmād rāghava tṛṣṇāṃ tvaṃ tyaja saṅkalpavarjanāt ।
manas saṅkalpakaṃ nāsti nirṇītam iti yuktitaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ nāmāham ity eva prathamaṃ tāvad āśaye ।
mā durāśāṃ mahābāho saṅkalpaya tamomayīm ।। 

etāṃ duḥkhaprasavinīm anātmany ātmabhāvanām ।
na bhāvayasi ced rāma tad bahujñeṣu gaṇyase ।। 

enām ahambhāvamayīm apuṇyāṃ chittvā svayambhāvaśalākayaiva ।
svabhāvanāṃ bhavya bhavāntabhūmau bhavābhibhūtākhilabhītibhūtiḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

atigambhīram etat tu bhagavan vacanaṃ tava ।
yad ahaṅkāratṛṣṇe tvaṃ mā gṛhāṇeti vakṣi mām ।। 

yady ahaṅkārasantyāgaṃ karomi tad imaṃ prabho ।
tyajāmi dehanāmānaṃ sanniveśam aśeṣataḥ ।। 

jānustambhena mahatā dhāryate sutarur yathā ।
ahaṅkāreṇa deho ayaṃ tathaiva kila dhāryate ।। 

ahaṅkārakṣaye dehaḥ kilāvaśyaṃ vinaśyati ।
mūle krakacasaṃlūne sumahān iva pādapaḥ ।। 

tat kathaṃ santyajāmy enaṃ jīvāmi ca kathaṃ mune ।
ekam arthaṃ viniścitya vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvatra vāsanātyāgo rāma rājīvalocana ।
dvividhaḥ kathyate tajjñair dhyeyo neyaś ca nāmataḥ ।। 

aham eṣāṃ padārthānām ete ca mama jīvitam ।
nāham ebhir vinā kaścin na mayaite vinā kila ।। 

ity antar niścayaṃ tyaktvā vicārya manasā saha ।
nāhaṃ padārthasya na me padārtha iti bhāvite ।। 

antaśśītalayā buddhyā kurvantyā līlayā kriyāḥ ।
yo nūnaṃ vāsanātyāgo dhyeyo nāma sa kīrtitaḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā yaṃ kṛtvā vāsanākṣayam ।
jahāti nirmanā dehaṃ sa neyo vāsanākṣayaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāramayīṃ tyaktvā vāsanāṃ līlayaiva yaḥ ।
tiṣṭhati dhyeyasantyāgī sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

nirmūlakalanāṃ kṛtvā vāsanāṃ yaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ ।
neyatyāgamayaṃ viddhi muktaṃ taṃ raghunandana ।। 

dhyeyaṃ taṃ vāsanātyāgaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti līlayā ।
jīvanmuktā mahātmānas sujanā janakā iva ।। 

neyaṃ tu vāsanātyāgaṃ kṛtvopaśamam āgatāḥ ।
videhamuktās tiṣṭhanti brahmaṇy eva parāpare ।। 

dvāv etau rāghava tyāgau samau muktapadasthitau ।
dvāv eva brahmatāṃ yātau dvāv eva vigatajvarau ।। 

muktāv uttamaviśvāse kevalaṃ vimale anagha ।
ekas sthitas sphuraddehaś śāntadehas sthito aparaḥ ।। 

ekas sadeho nirmuktas tiṣṭhaty apagatajvaraḥ ।
tyaktadeho vimukto anyo vartate aneyavāsanaḥ ।। 

āpatatsu yathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkheṣv anāratam ।
na hṛṣyati glāyati vā yas sa mukta ihocyate ।। 

īpsitānīpsite na sto yasyāntar vastudṛṣṭiṣu ।
suṣuptavad yaś calati sa mukta iti kathyate ।। 

heyopādeyakalane mamety aham iheti ca ।
yasyāntas samparikṣīṇe sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

harṣāmarṣabhayakrodhakāmakārpaṇyadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
na parāmṛśyate yo antas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

suṣuptavat praśamitabhāvavṛttinā sthitaṃ sadā jāgrati yena cetasā ।
kalānvito vidhur iva yas sadā mudā niṣevyate mukta itīha sa smṛtaḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

tṛṣṇācikitsopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

videhamuktā ye rāma te girām iha gocare ।
naiva tiṣṭhanti tasmāt tvaṃ jīvanmuktān imāñ śṛṇu ।। 

prakṛtāny eva kāryāṇi yayārañjitayācchayā ।
kriyante tṛṣṇayemāni tāṃ jīvanmuktatāṃ viduḥ ।। 

yā sthitis tṛṣṇayā jantor bāhyārthe baddhabhāvayā ।
taṃ bandham āhur ācāryās saṃsāranigaḍaṃ dṛḍham ।। 

nūnam ujjhitasaṅkalpā hṛdi bāhye vihāriṇī ।
vāsanā yoditā seha jīvanmuktaśarīriṇī ।। 

bāhyārthavyasanocchūnā tṛṣṇā baddheti rāghava ।
sarvārthavyasanonmuktā tṛṣṇā mukteti kathyate ।। 

pūrvaṃ yasyās tu tṛṣṇāyā vartamāne ca śāśvatī ।
nirduḥkhatā niṣkalatā sā muktaiva budhais smṛtā ।। 

idam astu mamety antar yaiṣā rāghava bhāvanā ।
tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ śṛṅkhalāṃ viddhi kalanāṃ ca mahāmate ।। 

tām etāṃ sarvabhāveṣu satsv asatsu ca sarvadā ।
santyajya paramodāraṃ padam eti mahāmanāḥ ।। 

bandhāśām atha mokṣāśāṃ sukhaduḥkhadaśām api ।
tyaktvā sadasadāśāṃ ca tiṣṭhākṣubdhamahābdhivat ।। 

ajarāmaram ātmānaṃ buddhvā buddhimatāṃ vara ।
jarāmaraṇaśaṅkābhir mā manaḥ kaluṣaṃ kṛthāḥ ।। 

padārthajātaṃ nedaṃ te nāyam apy asi rāghava ।
kiñcit tadanyad evedam anya evāsi śāśvataḥ ।। 

asadabhyutthite viśve satye vā satataṃ sthite ।
tvayi tattām upagate tṛṣṇāyās saṅgamaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

anyaś ca rāma manasi puruṣasya vicāriṇaḥ ।
jāyate niścayas sādho sphārākāraś caturvidhaḥ ।। 

āpādamastakam ahaṃ mātāpitṛvinirmitaḥ ।
ity eko niścayo rāma bandhāyāsadvilokanāt ।। 

atītas sarvabhāvebhyo vālāgrād apy ahaṃ tanuḥ ।
iti dvitīyo mokṣāya niścayo jāyate satām ।। 

jagajjālapadārthātmā sarvadaivāham akṣataḥ ।
tṛtīyo niścayaś cetthaṃ mokṣāyaiva raghūdvaha ।। 

ahaṃ jagac cāsad idaṃ śūnyaṃ vyomasamaṃ sadā ।
evam eṣa caturtho api niścayo mokṣasiddhaye ।। 

niścayeṣu caturṣv evaṃ bandhāya prathamas smṛtaḥ ।
trayo mokṣāya kathitāś śuddhabhāvanayombhitāḥ ।। 

eteṣāṃ prathamaḥ protas tṛṣṇayā bandhayogyayā ।
śuddhatṛṣṇās trayas svacchā jīvanmuktā vilāsinaḥ ।। 

sarvam ātmāham eveti niścayo yo mahāmate ।
tam ādāya viṣādāya na bhūyo yāti te matiḥ ।। 

tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimātmanaḥ ।
sarvam ātmeti tenāntar niścayena na badhyase ।। 

śūnyaṃ prakṛtimāye ca brahma vijñānam ity api ।
śivaḥ puruṣa īśeti nityam ātmaiva kathyate ।। 

sadā sarvaṃ sad evedaṃ neha dvitvānyate kvacit ।
vidyate vidyayā vyāptaṃ jagan netarayāndhayā ।। 

āpātālam anantātmā pūrito ambubhir ambudhiḥ ।
ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ jagad āpūrṇam ātmanā ।। 

ṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ nityaṃ nānṛtaṃ vidyate kvacit ।
vāry eva sakalo ambhodhir na taraṅgādayaḥ pṛthak ।। 

pṛthak kaṭakakeyūranūpurādi na kāñcanāt ।
bhinnās tarutṛṇākārakoṭayaś caiva nātmanaḥ ।। 

dvaitādvaitasamudbhedair jagannirmāṇalīlayā ।
paramātmamayī śaktir advaitaiva vijṛmbhate ।। 

ātmīye parakīye ca sarvasminn eva sarvadā ।
naṣṭe vopacite kārye sukhaduḥkhe gṛhāṇa mā ।। 

bhāvādvaitam upāśritya sattādvaitamayātmakaḥ ।
karmādvaitam anādṛtya dvaitādvaitamayo bhava ।। 

bhavabhūmiṣu bhīmāsu bhavabhāvanayānayā ।
mā patotpātapūrṇāsu nadīṣv andhaḥ karī yathā ।। 

dvitvaṃ na sambhavati sarvagate mahātmany ātmany athaikyam api ca dvitayoditātma ।
advaitam aikyarahitaṃ satatoditaṃ ca sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāhur atas svarūpam ।। 

naivāham asmi na ca nāma jaganti santi sarvaṃ ca vidyata idaṃ nanu nirvikāram ।
vijñānamātram avabhāsata eva śāntaṃ nāsan na saj jagad ahaṃ ca sadeti viddhi ।। 

paramam amṛtam ādyaṃ bhāsanaṃ sarvabhāsām ajam ajaram acintyaṃ niṣkramaṃ nirvikāram ।
vigatakaraṇajālam jīvanaṃ jīvaśaktes sakalakalanahīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām ।। 

satatam uditam īśaṃ vyātate citprakāśe sthitam anubhavabījaṃ svātmabhāvopadeśyam ।
svadanam anu cito antar brahma sarvaṃ sadaitat tvam aham api jagac cety astu te niścayo antaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāvicchedo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

muktāśayānāṃ mahatām ahatānāṃ kudṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
svabhāvo ayaṃ mahābāho līlayā caratām iha ।। 

viharann api saṃsāre jīvanmuktamanā muniḥ ।
ādimadhyāntavirasā vihasañ jāgatīr gatīḥ ।। 

sarvaprakṛtakāryastho madhyasthas sarvavṛttiṣu ।
dhyeyaṃ taṃ vāsanātyāgam avalambya vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

sarvatra vigatodvegas sarvārthaparipoṣakaḥ ।
vivekodyānatuṣṭātmā prabodhopavane sthitaḥ ।। 

sarvātītapadālambī pūrṇenduśiśirāśayaḥ ।
nodvegī na ca tuṣṭātmā saṃsāre nāvasīdati ।। 

sarvaśatruṣu madhyastho dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutaḥ ।
prāptakramakaro agryāṇāṃ saṃsāre nāvasīdati ।। 

nābhinandati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati ।
maunasthaḥ prakṛtārambhī saṃsāre nāvasīdati ।। 

pṛṣṭas san prakṛtaṃ vaktā na pṛṣṭas sthāṇuvat sthitaḥ ।
īhitānīhitair muktas saṃsāre nāvasīdati ।। 

sarvasyābhimataṃ vaktā coditaḥ peśaloktimān ।
āśayajñaś ca bhūtānāṃ saṃsāre nāvasīdati ।। 

yuktāyuktadaśāgrastam āśopahataceṣṭitam ।
jānāti lokavṛttāntaṃ karakoṭarabilvavat ।। 

paraṃ padam upārūḍho bhaṅgurāṃ jāgatīṃ sthitim ।
antaśśītalayā buddhyā hasann iva nirīkṣate ।। 

jitacittā mahātmāno ye hi dṛṣṭaparāvarāḥ ।
svabhāva īdṛśas teṣāṃ kathitas tava rāghava ।। 

vaktuṃ vayaṃ tu mūrkhāṇām ajitātmīyacetasām ।
bhogakardamamagnānāṃ na vidmo abhimataṃ matam ।। 

teṣām abhimatā nāryo hāvabhāvavibhūṣaṇāḥ ।
jvālā narakavahnīnāṃ yās tāḥ kanakarociṣaḥ ।। 

anarthagahanāś cārthā vyarthārthanakadarthanāḥ ।
diśanto duḥkhasaṃrambhasahitā āhitāpadaḥ ।। 

phalabandhīni karmāṇi nānācāramayāni ca ।
sukhaduḥkhāvapūrṇāni tāni vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ ।। 

pūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya dhyeyatyāgavilāsinīm ।
jīvanmuktatayā svastho loke vihara rāghava ।। 

antas santyaktasarvāśo vītarāgo vivāsanaḥ ।
bahis sarvasamācāro loke vihara rāghava ।। 

udāraḥ peśalācāras sarvācārānuvṛttimān ।
antas sarvaparityāgī loke vihara rāghava ।। 

pravicārya daśās sarvā yad atucchataraṃ padam ।
tad eva bhāvenālambya loke vihara rāghava ।। 

antar nairāśyam ādāya bahir āśonmukhehitaḥ ।
bahis tapto antar āśīto loke vihara rāghava ।। 

bahiḥ kṛtrimasaṃrambho hṛdi saṃrambhavarjitaḥ ।
kartā bahir akartāntar loke vihara rāghava ।। 

jñātavān asi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ satyam āntaram ।
yathecchasi tayā dṛṣṭyā loke vihara rāghava ।।
