kṛtrimollāsaharṣasthaḥ kṛtrimodvegadūṣaṇaḥ ।
kṛtrimārambhasaṃrambho loke vihara rāghava ।। 

tyaktāhaṅkṛtir āśvastamatir ākāśaśobhanaḥ ।
agṛhītakalaṅkāṅko loke vihara rāghava ।। 

āśāpāśaśatonmuktas samas sarvāsu vṛttiṣu ।
bahiḥ prakṛtakāryastho loke vihara rāghava ।। 

na bandho asti na mokṣo asti dehinaḥ paramārthataḥ ।
mithyeyam indrajālaśrīs saṃsāraparivartanā ।। 

bhrāntimātram idaṃ mohāj jagad rāghava dṛśyate ।
janitapratyayaṃ sphāre jalaṃ tīvrātape yathā ।। 

abaddhasyaikarūpasya sarvagasyātmanaḥ katham ।
bandhas syāt tadabhāve tu mokṣaḥ kasya vidhīyate ।। 

atattvajñānajāteyaṃ sāṃsārī bhrāntir ātatā ।
tattvajñānāt kṣayaṃ yāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgadhīḥ ।। 

jñātavān asi tattvaṃ svam anayā sūkṣmayā dhiyā ।
jāto asi nirahaṅkāro vyomavat tiṣṭha nirmalaḥ ।। 

nāsi cet tvaṃ tad akhilās suhṛdbāndhavabhāvanāḥ ।
santyajāsatsvabhāvasya kā nāma kila bhāvanā ।। 

asi cet tvaṃ tad atyantasattvavān anumīyase ।
idamprathamatāṃ prāptaḥ paramād asi kāraṇāt ।। 

bhogabandhujagadbhāvaiḥ karmabhiś ca śubhāśūbhaiḥ ।
ātmano nāsti sambandhaḥ kim enam anuśocasi ।। 

ātmatattvaikasāro aham iti jātadhiyo bhavaiḥ ।
na te rāmāsti sambandhaḥ kiṃ bibheṣi jagadbhramāt ।। 

ajātasya sato bandhor bandhuduḥkhasukhakramaiḥ ।
kas te rāghava sambandho yad etān anuśocasi ।। 

tvaṃ ced babhūvitha purā tathedānīṃ bhaviṣyasi ।
yady atheha sthito asīti jñātavān asi niścayam ।। 

tad anantatarān anyān prāgyonigaṇasaṃstutān ।
bandhūn atītān subahūn kasmāt tvaṃ nānuśocasi ।। 

pūrvam adya tathedānīṃ babhūvitha bhaviṣyasi ।
yadi rāma tathāpi tvaṃ sadrūpaḥ kiṃ vimuhyasi ।। 

purā bhūtvādya bhūtvā ca bhūyaś cen na bhaviṣyasi ।
tathāpi kṣīṇasaṃsāraḥ kimartham anuśocasi ।। 

tasmān na duḥkhitā yuktā prakṛte jāgate krame ।
na caiva muditā yuktā yuktaṃ kāryānuvartanam ।। 

mā gaccha duḥkhitāṃ rāma sukhitām api mā vraja ।
samatām ehi sarvatra paramātmāsi sarvagaḥ ।। 

anantas svaccharūpas tvaṃ kham ivātitatāntaraḥ ।
nityaśuddhaḥ prakāśas tvaṃ jvālāyā iva koṭaram ।। 

jāgatānāṃ padārthānām adṛśyāṇutanus tanuḥ ।
hṛtstho asi hāramuktānām ekas tantur ivātataḥ ।। 

saṃsārasthitir eveyaṃ yad bhūtvā bhūyate punaḥ ।
ajñenaiva na tu jñena jño asi rāma sthiro bhava ।। 

svarūpam idam asyās tu saṃsṛtes santataṃ hi yat ।
ajñānāt sphāratām eti jñānavān asi sanmate ।। 

rūpaṃ kim anyad bhavatu bhramamātrād ṛte bhrame ।
svapnamātrād ṛte svapne bhavaty anyo hi kaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

sarvaśakter iyaṃ śaktir bhramamātramayī matā ।
rūḍhā saṃsāramāyeti nāsatyā nāpi sanmayī ।। 

kevalaṃ jñānavairūpyād aparyālocanāt tathā ।
rāma dṛśyata evedam ābhānam atibhāsvaram ।। 

na bandhuḥ kasyacit kaścid iha no kaścid apy ariḥ ।
sadā sarvaṃ ca sarvasya sarvas sarveśvarecchayā ।। 

ālūnaśīrṇam akhilam idam anyo'nyamiśritam ।
anārataṃ yāti jagat taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

adha ūrdhvatvam āyāti yāty ūrdhvatvam adhas tathā ।
saṃsārasya calasyāsya cakranemir ivābhitaḥ ।। 

svargasthā narakaṃ yānti nārakā yānti viṣṭapam ।
yoner yonyantaraṃ yānti dvīpād dvīpāntaraṃ janāḥ ।। 

dhīrāḥ kārpaṇyam āyānti kṛpaṇā yānti dhīratām ।
parisphuranti bhūtāni pātotpātaśatabhramaiḥ ।। 

ekarūpaṃ sthiraṃ svasthaṃ svacchaṃ santāpavarjitam ।
neha samprāpyate kiñcid agnau himakaṇo yathā ।। 

ye ye rāma mahābhāgā bahavo abahavo atha vā ।
naṣṭā eveha dṛśyante te te katipayair dinaiḥ ।। 

paratātmīyatānyatvatvattvamattvādibhāvanāḥ ।
neha satyā mahābāho dvicandrādidṛśo yathā ।। 

ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ bhavān ।
etā mithyādṛśo rāma vigalantu tavādhunā ।। 

krīḍārthaṃ vyavahārastha etābhir hatadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
āmūlam antaś chinnābhir bahir vihara helayā ।। 

saṃsārasaraṇāv asyāṃ tathā vihara suvrata ।
na yathaiṣi śramaṃ śrānto vāsanābhāravān yathā ।। 

yathā yathaiṣā kalyāṇī vāsanākṣayakāriṇī ।
vicāraṇā tavodeti saṃśāmyasi tathā tathā ।। 

ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti gaṇanā laghucetasām ।
udāracaritānāṃ tu vigatāvaraṇaiva dhīḥ ।। 

na tad asti na yatrāhaṃ na tad asti na yan mama ।
iti nirṇītasārāṇāṃ vigatāvaraṇaiva dhīḥ ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti yaś cidākāśavan mahān ।
sa sarvaṃ paśyati svasthaḥ khastho bhūmitalaṃ yathā ।। 

sarvā eva hi te bhūtajātayo rāma bandhavaḥ ।
atyantāsaṃstutā etās tava nāma na kāścana ।। 

vividhajanmaśatāhitasambhrame jagati bandhur abandhur iti kṣaṇam ।
bhramadaśaiva vivalgati vastutas tribhuvanaṃ cirabandhur abandhv api ।। 

jīvanmuktasvarūpavarṇanayogo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
bhrātros tripathagātīre saṃvādo muniputrayoḥ ।। 

ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti kathāprastāvatas smṛtam ।
itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ sāścaryaṃ śṛṇu rāghava ।। 

asty asya jambudvīpasya kasmiṃścid diṅnikuñjake ।
vanavyūhamahottaṃso mahendro nāma parvataḥ ।। 

kalpadrumavanacchāyāviśrāntasurakinnaraḥ ।
śṛṅgair ātatam ākāśaṃ jitavān yas samunnataiḥ ।। 

brahmalokāntaraprāptaiś śṛṅgakandaracāribhiḥ ।
sāmavedaṃ pratidhvānaghuṅghumair gāyatīva yaḥ ।। 

yaḥ payomedurair meghair lulitaiś śṛṅgakoṭiṣu ।
latākusumasamprotaiḥ kuntalair iva rājate ।। 

yas taṭoḍḍayanotkānāṃ śarabhāṇāṃ vijṛmbhitaiḥ ।
visphūrjati guhāvaktraiḥ kalpābhrāṇi hasann iva ।। 

yena nirjharanirhrādaiḥ kandarāntaracāribhiḥ ।
samudrajalakallolavilāso vijito abhitaḥ ।। 

tasyaikadeśe vitate ratnasānau manorame ।
munibhis snānapānārthaṃ vyomagaṅgāvatāritā ।। 

tasyās tripathagāyās tu tīre vikasitadrume ।
ratnādritaṭavidyotakacatkanakapaṅkaje ।। 

āsīd abhyuditajñānas taporāśir udāradhīḥ ।
munir dīrghatapā nāma tapomūrtim ivāsthitaḥ ।। 

muner babhūvatus tasya dvau putrāv indusundarau ।
puṇyapāvananāmānau dvau kacāv iva vākpateḥ ।। 

sa tābhyāṃ saha putrābhyāṃ bhāryayā saha caikayā ।
uvāsa saritas tīre tasmin saphalapādape ।। 

atha kāle tayos tasya putrayor jñānavān abhūt ।
puṇyanāmā vayojyeṣṭho guṇajyeṣṭhaś ca rāghava ।। 

pāvano ardhaprabuddho abhūt pūrvasandhyāmbujaṃ yathā ।
maurkhyād atigato nāntaḥ padaṃ lolam ivāsthitaḥ ।। 

tato vahaty akalite kāle kalitakāraṇe ।
saṃvatsaragaṇe kṣīṇe dīne dehe gatāyuṣi ।। 

asmād bhaṅgurabhūtāḍhyād vṛttāntabharabhīṣaṇāt ।
ratim utsṛjya saṃsārāj jarājarjarajīvitaḥ ।। 

kalanāpakṣiṇīnīḍaṃ dehaṃ dīrghatapā muniḥ ।
jahau giriguhāgehe bhāraṃ vaivadhiko yathā ।। 

praśāntakalanārambhaṃ cetyariktacidāspadam ।
padaṃ jagāma nīrāgaṃ puṣpagandha ivāmbaram ।। 

atha bhāryā muner dehaṃ prāṇāpānavivarjitam ।
dṛṣṭvāviluṭhitaṃ bhūmau vinālam iva paṅkajam ।। 

ciram abhyastayā yogayuktyā pativitīrṇayā ।
tatyāja tanum amlānāṃ ṣaṭpadī padminīm iva ।। 

bhartāram evānuyayau janasyādṛśyatāṃ gatam ।
prabhāgaganakośastham astaṃ yātam ivoḍupam ।। 

mātāpitros tu gatayor aurdhvadaihikakarmaṇi ।
puṇya eva sthite avyagre pāvano duḥkham āyayau ।। 

śokopahatacitto asau bhraman kānanavīthiṣu ।
jyāyāṃsam anavekṣyaiva pāvano vilalāpa ha ।। 

athaurdhvadaihikaṃ kṛtvā mātāpitror udāradhīḥ ।
āyayau vipine puṇyaḥ pāvanaṃ śokalālasam ।। 

puṇyaḥ

kiṃ putra ghanatāṃ śokaṃ nayasy āndhyaikakāraṇam ।
bāṣpadhārākaraṃ ghoraṃ prāvṛṭkāla ivāmbudam ।। 

pitā tava mahāprājña gatas sārdhaṃ tvadambayā ।
svām eva paramāṃ ātmapadavīṃ mokṣanāmikām ।। 

tat sthānaṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad rūpaṃ viditātmanām ।
svaṃ bhāvam abhisampanne kiṃ pitary abhiśocasi ।। 

kim īdṛśī tvayā baddhā bhāvaneha vimohajā ।
saṃsāre yad aśocyo api tvayā tāto anuśocyate ।। 

na saiva bhavato mātā nāsāv eva pitā tava ।
na bhavān eva tanayas tayor nissaṅkhyaputrayoḥ ।। 

mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi samatītāni te suta ।
bahūny ambupravāhasya nimnānīva vane vane ।। 

asaṅkhyaputrayor naiva bhavān eva sutas tayoḥ ।
sarittaraṅgavat putra gatāḥ putragaṇā nṛṇām ।। 

asmatpitror atītāni putralakṣāṇy anekaśaḥ ।
pattrakorakavṛndāni latāpādapayor iva ।। 

mitrabāndhavavṛndāni jantor janmani janmani ।
ṛtāv ṛtāv atītāni phalānīva mahātaroḥ ।। 

śocanīyā yadi snehān mātāpitṛsutās suta ।
tad atītā na śocyante kim ajasraṃ sahasraśaḥ ।। 

prapañco ayaṃ mahābhāga dṛśyate jāgato bhramaḥ ।
paramārthena tu prājña nāsti mitraṃ na bāndhavaḥ ।। 

manāg apīha hi bhrātaḥ paramārthe na vidyate ।
mahaty api cirāt tapte marāv iva payolavaḥ ।। 

etā yāḥ prekṣase lakṣmīś chattracāmaracañcalāḥ ।
svapna eva mahābuddhe dināni trīṇi pañca vā ।। 

dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā putra satyaṃ vicāraya ।
neha tvaṃ naiva cedaṃ te bhrāntim antaḥ parityaja ।। 

ayaṃ mṛto gataś cāham itīmā dṛṣṭayaḥ punaḥ ।
svasaṅkalpopatāpotthā dṛśyante na tu satyataḥ ।। 

ajñānavistīrṇamarau vilolaiś śubhāśubhaspandamayais taraṅgaiḥ ।
svavāsanātāpamarīcivāri parisphuraty etad anantarūpam ।। 

pāvanabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

puṇyaḥ

kaḥ pitā kiṃ ca vā mitraṃ kā mātā ke ca bandhavaḥ ।
svabuddhyaivāvadhūyante vātyayā janapāṃsavaḥ ।। 

bandhumitrasutasnehadveṣamohadaśāmayaḥ ।
svasañjñāmātrakeṇaiva prapañco ayaṃ vitanyate ।। 

bandhutve bhāvito bandhuḥ paratve bhāvitaḥ paraḥ ।
viṣāmṛtadaśevaiṣā sthitir bhāvanibandhanī ।। 

ekatve vartamānasya sarvagasya kilātmanaḥ ।
ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ity asatkalanā kutaḥ ।। 

raktamāṃsāsthisaṅghātād dehād evāsthipañjarāt ।
ko ahaṃ syām iti cittena svayaṃ putra vicāraya ।। 

dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā na kaścit tvaṃ na cāpy aham ।
mithyājñānam idaṃ puṇyaḥ pāvanaś ceti valgati ।। 

kas te pitā kaś ca suhṛt kā mātā kaś ca vā paraḥ ।
khasyānantavilāsasya kim asvaṃ kiṃ svam ucyatām ।। 

asi cet tvaṃ tad anyeṣu yāteṣu bahujanmasu ।
ye bandhavo ye vibhavāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi ।। 

babhūvus te supuṣpāsu sthalīṣu mṛgayoniṣu ।
bahavo bandhavo dhanyās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi ।। 

babhūvus te sapadmāsu taṭīṣv ambudhiyoṣitām ।
haṃsasya bandhavo haṃsās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi ।। 

babhūvus te lasatpattrāś citrāsu vanarājiṣu ।
bahavo bandhavo vṛkṣās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi ।। 

babhūvus te mahābhreṣu śikhareṣu mahībhṛtām ।
bahavo bandhavas siṃhās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi ।। 

babhūvus te sravantīṣu sarassv ambhojinīṣu ca ।
bahavo bandhavo matsyāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi ।। 

babhūvitha daśārṇeṣu kapilo vanavānaraḥ ।
rājaputras tukhāreṣu puṇḍreṣu vanavāyasaḥ ।। 

hehayeṣu ca mātaṅgas trigarteṣu ca gardabhaḥ ।
sālveṣu saramāputraḥ patatrī śavaradrume ।। 

vindhyādrau pippalo bhūtvā ghuṇo bhūtvā mahāvaṭe ।
mandare markaṭo bhūtvā viprāj jāto asi kandare ।। 

kosaleṣu dvijo bhūtvā bhūtvā vaṅgeṣu tittiriḥ ।
aśvo bhūtvā tukhāreṣu jātas tvaṃ brāhmaṇād vane ।। 

yaḥ kīṭas tālakandāntar daṃśako ya udumbare ।
yaḥ prājiko vindhyavane sa tvaṃ putra mamānujaḥ ।। 

himavatkandarābhūrjatarutvagrandhrakoṭare ।
pipīlako yaṣ ṣaṇ māsān so ayaṃ tvam anujo mama ।। 

suhmasīmāntakugrāmagomaye yaś ca vṛścikaḥ ।
sārdhaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sādho so ayaṃ tvam anujo mama ।। 

pulindīstanapīṭheṣu nilīnaṃ yena kānane ।
ṣaṭpadeneva padmeṣu so ayaṃ tvam anujo mama ।। 

etāsv anyāsu cānyāsu bahvīṣu janayoniṣu ।
jāto asi jambudvīpe asmin purā śatasahasraśaḥ ।। 

itthaṃ tavātmanaś caiva prāktanaṃ vāsanākramam ।
paśyāmi sūkṣmayā buddhyā samyagdarśanaśuddhayā ।। 

mamāpi bahvyo bahudhā yonayo mohamantharāḥ ।
samatītās smarāmy adya tā jñānoditayā dṛśā ।। 

trigarteṣu śuko bhūtvā haṃso bhūtvā sarittaṭe ।
pakkaṇe vāyaso bhūtvā jāto aham iha kānane ।। 

bhuktvā pulindatāṃ vindhye kṛtvā vaṅgeṣu vṛkṣatām ।
uṣṭratvam ativāhyādrau jāto aham iha kānane ।। 

yaś cātako himagirau yo rājā puṇḍramaṇḍale ।
vyāghro yas sahyakuñjeṣu sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ ।। 

yo gṛdhro daśavarṣāṇi yo mṛgo māsapañcakam ।
yas samānāṃ śataṃ siṃhas sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ ।। 

andhragrāmacakoreṇa tukhāranṛpavājinā ।
śrīśailācāryaputreṇa mayedaṃ tava kathyate ।। 

sarve vividhasaṃrambhā vividhācāraceṣṭitāḥ ।
vilāsā janmanāṃ bhrātas smaryante prāktanā mayā ।। 

evaṃ sthite jagajjātāv āvayoś śataśo gatāḥ ।
pitaro mātaraś caiva bhrātaras suhṛdas tathā ।। 

kāṃs tān samanuśocāvo na śocāvaś ca kān api ।
bandhūn kiṃ vāpi śocāva īdṛśy eva jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

anantāḥ pitaro yānti yānty anantāś ca mātaraḥ ।
iha saṃsāriṇāṃ puṃsāṃ vanapādapaparṇavat ।। 

kiṃ pramāṇam ataḥ putra duḥkhasyātra sukhasya vā ।
tasmāt sarvaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāvas svasthatāṃ gatau ।। 

prapañcabhāvanāṃ tyaktvā manasy aham iti sthitām ।
tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te yāṃ yānti gatikovidāḥ ।। 

ihājavañjavībhāvaṃ patanotpatanātmakam ।
nānuśocanti sudhiyaś cikitsante ca kevalam ।। 

bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ jarāmaraṇavarjitam ।
saṃsmarātmānam avyagro mā vimūḍhamanā bhava ।। 

na te duḥkhaṃ na te janma na te mātā na te pitā ।
ātmaivāsi na sadbuddhe tvam anyaḥ kaścid eva hi ।। 

asyāṃ saṃsārayātrāyāṃ nānābhinayadāyinaḥ ।
ajñā eva naṭās sādho rasabhāvasamanvitāḥ ।। 

madhyasthadṛṣṭayas svasthā yathāprāptārthadarśinaḥ ।
tajjñās tu prekṣakā eva sākṣidharme vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

kartāro api na kartāro yathā dīpā niśāgame ।
ālokakarmaṇām evaṃ tajjñā lokasthitāv iha ।। 

pratibimbair na dūṣyante svātmabimbagatair api ।
yathā darpaṇaratnādyās tathā kāryair mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

sarvaiṣaṇāmayakalaṅkavivarjitena svacchātmabhāvakalitena hṛdabjamadhye ।
putrātmanātmani mahāmaṇināmunaiva santyajya sambhramam alaṃ paritoṣam ehi ।। 

pāvanavijñānaprāptir nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ prabodhitas tena tadā puṇyena pāvanaḥ ।
prabodham āpa prākāśyaṃ prabhāta iva bhūtalam ।। 

ubhāv api tatas siddhau jñānavijñānapāragau ।
viceratur vane tasmin yāvadiccham aninditau ।। 

tataḥ kadācit kālena nirvāṇapadam āgatau ।
tau videhau gatasnehau dīpāv iva śamaṃ gatau ।। 

evaṃ prāgbhuktadehānām anantā dhanabandhujāḥ ।
āśāḥ kiṃ gṛhyate tābhyaḥ kiṃ vā santyajyate anagha ।। 

tasmād āsām anantānāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ raghunandana ।
upāyas tyāga evaiko na nāma paripālanam ।। 

cintanenaidhate cintā svindhaneneva pāvakaḥ ।
naśyaty acintanenaiva vinendhanam ivānalaḥ ।। 

dhyeyatyāgarathārūḍhaḥ karuṇodārayā dṛśā ।
lokam ālokayan dīnaṃ mā tiṣṭhottiṣṭha rāghava ।। 

eṣā brāhmī sthitis svacchā niṣkāmā vigatāmayā ।
enāṃ prāpya mahābāho vimūḍho api na muhyati ।। 

ekaṃ vivekaṃ suhṛdam ekāṃ prauḍhasakhīṃ dhiyam ।
ādāya viharann evaṃ saṅkaṭe api na muhyasi ।। 

vinivāritasarvārthād apahastitabāndhavāt ।
na svadhairyād ṛte kaścid abhyuddharati saṅkaṭāt ।। 

vairāgyeṇātha śāstreṇa mahattvādiguṇair api ।
yatnenāpadvighātārthaṃ svam evonnamayen manaḥ ।। 

na tat tribhuvanaiśvaryān na kośād ratnadhāriṇaḥ ।
phalam āsādyate cittād yan mahattvopabṛṃhitāt ।। 

tāvad asmiñ jagatkukṣau pātotpātāvadolanaiḥ ।
patanti puruṣā yāvan manas teṣāṃ na vijvaram ।। 

pūrṇe manasi sampūrṇaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sudhādravaiḥ ।
upānadgūḍhapādasya kila carmāvṛtaiva bhūḥ ।। 

nairāśyāt pūrṇatām eti mano anāśāvaśānugam ।
āśayā riktatām eti śaradīva saro manaḥ ।। 

hṛdayaṃ śūnyatām eti prakaṭīkṛtakoṭaram ।
agastyapītārṇavavad āśāvivaśacetasām ।। 

yasya cittatarau sphāre tṛṣṇācapalamarkaṭī ।
na valgati mahat tasya rājate hṛdvanāntaram ।। 

padmākṣakośas trijagad goṣpadaṃ yojanavrajaḥ ।
nimeṣārdhaṃ mahākalpas tṛṣṇārahitacetasām ।। 

śītatā sā na śītāṃśau na himācalakandare ।
na rambhācandanāvalyāṃ nisspṛheṣu manassu yā ।। 

na tathā bhāti pūrṇendur na pūrṇaḥ kṣīrasāgaraḥ ।
na lakṣmīvadanaṃ kāntaṃ spṛhāhīnaṃ yathā manaḥ ।। 

yathābhralekhā śaśinaṃ sudhālepaṃ maṣī yathā ।
dūṣayaty evam eṣāntar naram āśāpiśācikā ।। 

āśākhyāś cittavṛkṣasya śākhās sthagitadiktaṭāḥ ।
tāsu cchinnāsv arūpatvaṃ yāti cittamahādrumaḥ ।। 

chinnatṛṣṇāmahāśākhe cittasthāṇau sthitiṃ gate ।
ekarūpatayā dhairyaṃ prayāti śataśākhatām ।। 

anuttamena dhairyeṇa tena citte kṣayaṃ gate ।
tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate ।। 

etāsāṃ cittavṛttīnām āśānām uttamāśaye ।
na dadāsi prarohaṃ cet tad bhavān asti rāghava ।। 

cittaṃ vṛttivihīnaṃ te yadā yātam acittatām ।
tadā mokṣamayīm antas sattām āpnoṣi tāṃ tatām ।। 

cittakauśikapakṣatyā tṛṣṇayā kṣubdhayāntare ।
amaṅgalāni vistāram alam āyānti rāghava ।। 

vartanaṃ vṛttir ity uktaṃ vartate cittam āśayā ।
cittavṛttim ato hy āśāṃ tyaktvā niścittatāṃ vraja ।। 

yo yayā vartate vṛttyā sa tayaiva vinā kṣayī ।
ataś cittopaśāntyarthaṃ tadvṛttiṃ prakṣayaṃ nayet ।। 

praśamitasakalaiṣaṇo mahātman bhava bhavabandham apāsya muktacittaḥ ।
manasi nigaḍarajjavaḥ kadāśāḥ parigalitāsu ca tāsu ko na muktaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇācikitsāyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha vā raghuvaṃśākhyanabhaḥpūrṇaniśākara ।
baḍivad buddhibhedena jñānam āsādayāmalam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña tvatprasādān mayā hṛdi ।
prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ viśrānto asmy amale pade ।। 

śaradīvāmbarād abhram adabhraṃ mama cetasaḥ ।
vibho vyapagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mohamahātamaḥ ।। 

amṛtāpūritas svacchaś śītalātmā mahādyutiḥ ।
tiṣṭhāmy ānandavān antas sāyaṃ pūrṇa ivoḍurāṭ ।। 

aśeṣasaṃśayāmbhodaśaratsamaya kiṃ tv aham ।
tṛptim eṣāṃ na gacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava ।। 

baḍivijñānasamprāptiṃ punar madbodhavṛddhaye ।
vibho kathaya khidyante santo nāvanataṃ prati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāghava te vakṣye baḍivṛttāntam uttamam ।
śrutena yena tena tvaṃ bodham āpsyasi śāśvatam ।। 

asty asmiñ jagataḥ kośe kasmiṃścid diktaṭāntare ।
pātālam iti vikhyāto loko bhūmer adhas sthitaḥ ।। 

kṣīrodārṇavajātābhir digdhābhir amṛtāmbubhiḥ ।
kvacid dānavakanyābhir bhāti nirvivarāntaraḥ ।। 

jihvācaroddāmaravair viṣabhārabharāyudhaiḥ ।
kvacid bhogibhir āpūrṇas sahasraśatamastakaiḥ ।। 

helāvivalitāśeṣaviśvoddharaṇaghasmaraiḥ ।
kvacid danusutair vyāptaś caladbhir iva merubhiḥ ।। 

kaṭakuḍyāgraviśrāntavasudhāmaṇḍaloddhuraiḥ ।
kvacid digdantibhir dantadrumādribhir upāśritaḥ ।। 

mahākaṭakaṭāśabdadagdhabhūtaparamparaiḥ ।
kvacid durgandhidigbhāgo dhvanan narakamaṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

ābhūtalam abhiprotasaptapātālamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
kvacid ratnākarair vyāptaḥ pātālair itarair iva ।। 

surāsuraśirassuptapādāmbhoruhapāṃsunā ।
kvacid bhagavatā tena kapilena pavitritaḥ ।। 

asurīsambhṛtānantapūjanakrīḍanaiṣiṇā ।
kvacid bhagavatā tena hāṭakeśena pālitaḥ ।। 

tasminn asuradosstambhadhāryamāṇamahābhare ।
babhūva dānavo rājā virocanasuto baḍiḥ ।। 

svākrāntena samaṃ sarvais suravidyādharoragaiḥ ।
pādasaṃvāhanaṃ yasya surarājena vāñchitam ।। 

kośas trailokyaratnānāṃ pātā sarvaśarīriṇām ।
dhartā bhuvanadharmāṇāṃ yasya praṇatavān hariḥ ।। 

airāvaṇasya saṃśoṣaṃ yannāmnā kaṭabhittayaḥ ।
kekayevāhihṛnnāḍyo jagmur ājagmur ārtatām ।। 

pratāpogroṣmabhir yasya kalpakāla ivābdhayaḥ ।
yayuś śoṣonmukhās sapta taptatāṃ kupitākṛteḥ ।। 

yadadhvarājyadhūmābhrarājayo valitādrayaḥ ।
brahmāṇḍakoṭarasyāsya sadā kavacatāṃ yayuḥ ।। 

yasya dṛṣṭidṛḍhāpātād anupātakulācalāḥ ।
vinamanti diśas sarvā latāḥ phalanatā iva ।। 

līlāvijitaniśśeṣabhuvanābhogabhūṣaṇaḥ ।
daśakoṭīs sa varṣāṇāṃ daityo rājyaṃ cakāra ha ।। 

atha gacchatsv analpeṣu yugeṣv āvartavṛttiṣu ।
surāsuramahaugheṣu protpatatsu patatsu ca ।। 

ajasram upabhukteṣu trailokyodaravartiṣu ।
bhogeṣv abhajad udvegaṃ baḍir dānavanāyakaḥ ।। 

meruśṛṅgaśikhādantadigdhavātāyane sthitaḥ ।
ekadā cintayām āsa svayaṃ saṃsārasaṃsthitim ।। 

kimantam idam akṣuṇṇaśaktinaiva mayādhunā ।
sāmrājyam iha kartavyaṃ vihartavyaṃ jagattraye ।। 

mahatā mama rājyena trailokyādbhutakāriṇā ।
kiṃ vā bhavati bhuktena bhūribhogātibhāriṇā ।। 

āpātamātramadhuram āvaśyakaparikṣayam ।
bhogopabhogamātraṃ me kiṃ nāmedaṃ sukhāvaham ।। 

punar dinaikakalanā śārvarīsaṃsthitiḥ punaḥ ।
punas tāny eva karmāṇi lajjāyai na tu tuṣṭaye ।। 

punar āliṅgyate kāntā punar eva ca bhujyate ।
seyaṃ śiśujanakrīḍā lajjāyai mahatām iha ।। 

tam eva śuktavirasaṃ vyāpāraughaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
divase divase kurvan prājñaḥ kasmān na lajjate ।। 

punar dinaṃ punā rātriḥ punaḥ kāryaparamparā ।
punaḥ punar ahaṃ manye prājñasyeyaṃ viḍambanā ।। 

ūrmitāṃ punar āsādya punar eti nirūrmitām ।
yathā jalaṃ tathaivāyaṃ tāṃ tām eti kriyāṃ janaḥ ।। 

unmattaceṣṭitākārā punaḥ punar iyaṃ kriyā ।
janaṃ hāsayati prājñaṃ bālalīlopamā muhuḥ ।। 

kṛtayāpy anayā nityaṃ kriyayā kṛtakāryayā ।
ko arthas syāt tādṛśo yena punaḥ karma na gacchati ।। 

kiyantam atha vā kālam idam āḍambaraṃ mahat ।
ihāsmābhir anuṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ yāvat samavāpyate ।। 

ananteyaṃ śiśukrīḍā vastuśūnyaiva vastutaḥ ।
āvṛttyā kriyate vyartham anarthaprasavārthibhiḥ ।। 

phalam ekaṃ mahodāraṃ neha paśyāmi kiñcana ।
kāryam astītarat prāpte yasmin nāma na kiñcana ।। 

bhogād ṛte kim atyantaṃ syād ramyam avināśi ca ।
etat sañcintayāmy āśu dadhyau matvety asau baḍiḥ ।। 

athābhyuvācāsurarāḍ ā saṃsmṛtam iti kṣaṇāt ।
ātmany eva manasy arthaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ vimarśayan ।। 

purā kileha bhagavān pṛṣṭo abhūt sa virocanaḥ ।
pitā mayātmatattvajño dṛṣṭalokaparāvaraḥ ।। 

yathā sakaladuḥkhānāṃ sukhānāṃ ca mahāmate ।
yatra sarve bhramāś śāntāḥ ko asau sīmānta ucyatām ।। 

kvopaśānto manomohaḥ kvātītās sakalaiṣaṇāḥ ।
virāmarahitaṃ kutra tāta viśramaṇaṃ ciram ।। 

kiṃ prāpyeha samastebhyaḥ prāptebhyas tṛptimān pumān ।
kiṃ dṛṣṭvā darśanaṃ bhūyo na tātopakaroty alam ।। 

atyantabahavo apy ete bhogā hi na sukhāvahāḥ ।
kṣobhayanti mano mohe pātayanti satām api ।। 

tat tāta vitatānandasundaraṃ kiñcid eva me ।
tādṛk kathaya yatrasthaś ciraṃ viśrāntim emy aham ।। 

ity ākarṇya purā niśākarakaraspardhāparārdhyollasatpuṣpāpūrakṛtāvaguṇṭhanapaṭasyoktaṃ tale tena me ।
pitrā svargahṛtasya sāgarataros saṃropitasyājire sphārākārarasāyanāsavasamaṃ mohopaśāntyai vacaḥ ।। 

virocanavacanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśas sargaḥ

virocanaḥ

asti putrātivitato deśo vipulakoṭaraḥ ।
trailokyānāṃ sahasrāṇi yatra mānti bahūny api ।। 

yatra nāmbhodharā nāpi sāgarā vā na cādrayaḥ ।
na vanāni na tīrthāni na nadyo na sarāṃsi ca ।। 

na mahī nāpi cākāśo na dyaur no pavanādayaḥ ।
na candrārkau na lokeśā na devā na ca dānavāḥ ।। 

na bhūtayakṣarakṣāṃsi na gulmā na vanaśriyaḥ ।
na kāṣṭhatṛṇabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi vā ।। 

nāpo na jvalanaṃ nāśā nordhvaṃ nādho na viṣṭapam ।
nāloko na tamo nāhaṃ na harīndraharādayaḥ ।। 

eka evāsti sumahāṃs tatra rājā mahādyutiḥ ।
sarvakṛt sarvagas sarvas sa ca tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

tena saṅkalpito mantrī sarvasammantraṇonmukhaḥ ।
aghaṭaṃ ghaṭayaty āśu ghaṭaṃ vighaṭayaty alam ।। 

bhoktuṃ kiñcin na śaknoti na ca jānāti kiñcana ।
rājārthaṃ kevalaṃ sarvaṃ karoty ajño api san sadā ।। 

sa eva sarvakāryaikakartā tasya mahīpateḥ ।
rājā kevalam ekānte svastha evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

ādhivyādhivinirmuktaḥ kas sa deśo mahādyutiḥ ।
katham āsādyate vāpi kena vādhigataḥ prabho ।। 

kas sa tādṛgvidho mantrī rājā vāpi mahābalaḥ ।
helālūnajagajjālair yo asmābhir api no jitaḥ ।। 

apūrvam etad ākhyānaṃ mamāmarabhayaprada ।
kathayāpanayāsmān me hṛdvyomnas saṃśayāmbudam ।। 

sa tatra mantrī bhagavān devāsuragaṇais suta ।
sametair lakṣaguṇitair api nākramyate manāk ।। 

nāsau sahasranayano na yamo na dhaneśvaraḥ ।
nāmaro nāsuro vāpi yadi putraka jīyate ।। 

tatrāsimusulaprāsavajracakragadādayaḥ ।
hetayaḥ kuṇṭhatāṃ yānti dṛṣadīvotpalāhatiḥ ।। 

gamyo asau nāstraśastrāṇāṃ na bhaṭotkaṭakarmaṇām ।
tena devāsurās sarve sarvadaiva vaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 

aviṣṇunāpi tenaiva hiraṇyākṣādayo asurāḥ ।
pātitāḥ kalpavātena merukalpadrumā iva ।। 

nārāyaṇādayo devā api sarvāvabodhinaḥ ।
tenākramya yathākāmam avaṭeṣu niveśitāḥ ।। 

tatprasādena sāṭopaṃ pañcamātraśaras smaraḥ ।
trailokyam idam ākramya samrāḍ iva vivalgati ।। 

surāsuraughagarhyo api guṇahīno api durmatiḥ ।
durākṛtir api krodhas tatprasādena jṛmbhate ।। 

devāsurasamūhānāṃ saṅgaro yat punaḥ punaḥ ।
tad etat krīḍanaṃ tasya mantriṇo mantraśālinaḥ ।। 

sa mantrī kevalaṃ putra tenaiva prabhuṇā yadi ।
jīyate tat sujeyo asāv anyathā tv acalācalaḥ ।। 

tasyaiva tatprabhoḥ kāle jetuṃ taṃ mantriṇaṃ nijam ।
icchā sañjāyate tena jīyate asāv ayatnataḥ ।। 

trailokyavalanāmallam ullāsitajagattrayam ।
jetuṃ ced asti te śaktis tat parākramavān asi ।। 

tasminn abhyudite sūrye trailokyakamalākarāḥ ।
ime vikāsam āyānti vilīyante layaṃ gate ।। 

tam ekam ekayā buddhyā vyāmohaparihīnayā ।
yadi jetuṃ samartho asi dhīras tad asi suvrata ।। 

tasmiñ jite jitā lokā bhavanty avijitā api ।
ajite tv ajitā ete cirakālajitā api ।। 

tasmād anantasiddhyarthaṃ śāśvatāya sukhāya ca ।
tajjaye yatnam ātiṣṭha kaṣṭayāpi hi ceṣṭayā ।। 

sasuram asuranāgayakṣayuktaṃ sanaramahoragakinnaraṃ sametam ।
trijagad api vaśīkṛtaṃ samantād atibalinā nanu helayaiva tena ।। 

baḍivṛttānte virocanagāthā nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśas sargaḥ

baḍiḥ

kenopāyena balavān sa tāta parijīyate ।
ko asau veti mahāvīrya sarvaṃ prakathayāśu me ।। 

virocanaḥ

mantriṇas tasya tanaya nityājeyasthiter api ।
śṛṇu vacmi susādhatvaṃ yenāsau parijīyate ।। 

putra yuktyā gṛhīto asau kṣaṇād āyāti vaśyatām ।
yuktiṃ vinā dahaty eṣa āśīviṣa ivoddhataḥ ।। 

bālaval lālayitvainaṃ yuktyā niyamayanti ye ।
rājānaṃ taṃ samālokya padam āsādayanti te ।। 

dṛṣṭe tasmin mahīpāle sa mantrī vaśam eti vaḥ ।
tasmiṃś ca mantriṇy ākrānte sa rājā dṛśyate punaḥ ।। 

yāvan na dṛṣṭo rājāsau tāvan mantrī na jīyate ।
mantrī ca yāvan na jitas tāvad rājā na dṛśyate ।। 

rājany adṛṣṭe durmantrī sa duḥkhāyotphalaty ati ।
mantriṇy anirjite rājā so atyantaṃ yāty adṛśyatām ।। 

abhyāsenobhayaṃ tasmāt samam eva samāharet ।
rājñas sandarśanaṃ tasya mantriṇaś ca parājayam ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena svābhyāsena śanaiś śanaiḥ ।
dvayaṃ sampādayann etad deśam āpnoti śobhanam ।। 

tvam abhyāse phalībhūte taṃ deśam adhigacchasi ।
yadi daityendra tad bhūyo manāg api na śocasi ।। 

saṃśāntasakalāyāsā nityapramuditāśayāḥ ।
sādhavas tatra tiṣṭhanti praśāntāśeṣasaṃśayāḥ ।। 

śṛṇu kaḥ putra deśo asau sarvaṃ prakaṭayāmi te ।
deśanāmnā mayoktas te mokṣas sakaladuḥkhahā ।। 

rājā tu tatra bhagavān ātmā sarvapadātigaḥ ।
tena mantrī kṛtaḥ prājño manonāmā mahāmate ।। 

mano viśvatayā viṣvag idaṃ pariṇatiṃ gatam ।
ghaṭatveneva mṛtpiṇḍaṃ dhūmo ambudatayeva vā ।। 

tasmiñ jite jitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ cāsāditaṃ bhavet ।
durjayaṃ tad vijānīyād yuktyaiva parijīyate ।। 

baḍiḥ

yā yuktir bhagavaṃs tasya cittasyākramaṇe sphuṭā ।
tāṃ me kathaya tat tāta yayā jeṣyāmi dāruṇam ।। 

virocanaḥ

viṣayān prati bhoḥ putra sarvān eva hi sarvathā ।
anāsthā paramā yaiṣā sā yuktir manaso jaye ।। 

eṣaiva paramā yuktir anayaiva mahāmadaḥ ।
svamanomattamātaṅgo drāgity evāvadamyate ।। 

eṣā hy atyantaduṣprāpā suprāpā ca mahāmate ।
anabhyastā hi duṣprāpā svabhyastā prāpyate sukham ।। 

kramād abhyasyamānaiṣā viṣayāratir ātmaja ।
sarvatas sphuṭatām eti sekasiktā latā yathā ।। 

nāsādyate hy anabhyastā kāṅkṣatāpi śaṭhātmanā ।
putra śālir ivāvyuptas tasmād enāṃ samāharet ।। 

tāvad bhramanti duḥkheṣu saṃsārāvaṭavāsinaḥ ।
viratiṃ viṣayeṣv ete yāvan nāyānti dehinaḥ ।। 

abhyāsena vinā kaścin nāpnoti viṣayāratim ।
apy atyantamatāṃ dehī deśāntaram ivāgatiḥ ।। 

dhyeyatyāgam ato ajasraṃ dhyāyatā dehadhāriṇā ।
bhogeṣv aratir abhyāsād vṛddhiṃ neyā latā yathā ।। 

puruṣārthād ṛte putra neha samprāpyate śubham ।
pauruṣeṇaiva sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ phalam āpyate ।। 

kriyāphale pariprāpte harṣāmarṣādito yathā ।
daivam ity ucyate loke na daivaṃ dehavat kvacit ।। 

avaśyabhavitavyākhyā yehayā niyatiś ca vā ।
ucyate daivaśabdena sā narair eva netaraiḥ ।। 

yad yatheha sadā yatra sampannaṃ phalatāṃ gatam ।
harṣāmarṣavināśāya tad daivam iti kathyate ।। 

daivaṃ niyatirūpaṃ ca pauruṣeṇāvajīyate ।
samyagjñānavilāsena mṛgatṛṣṇābhramo yathā ।। 

yathā saṅkalpyate yad yat pauruṣeṇa tathaiva tat ।
talavattāgṛhītaṃ khaṃ talavattāsukhapradam ।। 

kartr ato mana eveha yat kalpayati tat tathā ।
niyatiṃ yādṛśīm etat saṅkalpayati sā tathā ।। 

niyatān niyatān kāṃścid bhāvān aniyatān api ।
karoti cittaṃ tenaitac cittaṃ niyatiyojakam ।। 

niyatāṃ niyatiṃ kurvan kadācit sārthanāmikām ।
sphuraty asmiñ jagatkośe jīvo vyomnīva mārutaḥ ।। 

niyatyā rahitāṃ kurvan kadācin niyatiṃ manaḥ ।
sañjñārtharūḍhāniyatiśabdāṃ sphurati vātavat ।। 

tasmād yāvan manas tāvan na daivaṃ niyatir na ca ।
manasy astaṅgate sādho yad bhavaty astu tat tathā ।। 

jīvo hi puruṣo jātaḥ pauruṣeṇa sa yad yathā ।
saṅkalpayati loke asmiṃs tat tathā tasya nānyathā ।। 

puruṣārthād ṛte putra na kiñcid iha vidyate ।
paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya bhogeṣv aratim āharet ।। 

na bhogeṣv aratir yāvaj jāteha jayadāyinī ।
na parā nirvṛtis tāvat prāpyate bhavanāśinī ।। 

viṣayeṣu ratir yāvat sthitā sammohakāriṇī ।
tāvad bhavadaśādolāvilolāndolanaṃ sthitam ।। 

abhyāsena vinā putra na kadācana duḥkhadā ।
bhogabhogibharaprotthā kadāśā vinivartate ।। 

baḍiḥ

bhogeṣv aratir eṣāntaḥ kathaṃ sarvāsureśvara ।
sthitim āyāti jīvasya dīrghajīvitadāyinī ।। 

virocanaḥ

ātmānam ālokayataḥ phalitaṃ phalati sphuṭam ।
jīvasya bhogeṣv aratiś śaradīva mahālatā ।। 

ātmāvalokanenaiṣā viṣayāratir uttame ।
hṛdaye sthitim āyāti śrīr ivāmbhojakoṭare ।। 

tasmāt prajñānikāṣeṇa vicāreṇāticāruṇā ।
devam ālokayed bhogād ratiṃ cāpaharet samam ।। 

cittasya bhogair dvau bhāgau śāstreṇaikaṃ prapūrayet ।
guruśuśrūṣayā caikam avyutpannasya satkrame ।। 

kiñcitvyutpattiyuktasya bhāgaṃ bhogaiḥ prapūrayet ।
guruśuśrūṣayā bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ śāstrārthacintayā ।। 

vyutpattim anuyātasya pūrayec cetaso anvaham ।
dvau bhāgau śāstravairāgyair dvau dhyānagurupūjanaiḥ ।। 

sādhutām āgato jīvo yogyo jñānakathākrame ।
nirmalākṛtir ādatte paṭa uttamarañjanām ।। 

śanaiś śanair lālanayā yuktibhiḥ pāvanoktibhiḥ ।
śāstrārthapariṇāmena pālayec cittabālakam ।। 

pare pariṇataṃ jñāne śithilībhūtadurgraham ।
jyotsnābhinnasphaṭikavac cetaś śītaṃ virājate ।। 

prajñayā parayā ṛjvyā bhogānām īśvarasya ca ।
samam evātha dehasya rūpam āśv avalokayet ।। 

prajñāvicāravaśatas samam eva sadā suta ।
ātmāvalokanaṃ tṛṣṇāsantyāgaṃ ca samāharet ।। 

pare dṛṣṭe vitṛṣṇatvaṃ tṛṣṇānāśe ca dṛk parā ।
ete mitho dhṛte dṛṣṭī naunāvikadaśe yathā ।। 

bhogapūge gatasvāde dṛṣṭe deve parāpare ।
pare brahmaṇi viśrāntir anantodeti śāśvatī ।। 

cirāya phalitānandam anantodeti nirvṛtiḥ ।
na kadācana jīvānām ātmaviśramaṇād ṛte ।। 

na tapobhir na dānena na tīrthair api jāyate ।
bhogeṣu viratir jantos svabhāvālokanād ṛte ।। 

kayācid api no yuktyā buddhir ātmāvalokane ।
svaprayatnād ṛte puṃsaś śreyase sampravartate ।। 

bhogasantyāgasamprāptaparamārthād ṛte suta ।
na brahmapadaviśrāntisukham āsādyate param ।। 

ābrahmastambaparyante jagaty asmin na kutracit ।
tadvad āśvasyate sādho parame kāraṇe yathā ।। 

pauruṣam yatnam āśritya daivaṃ kṛtvā sudūrataḥ ।
bhogān vigarhayet prājñaś śreyomārgadṛḍhārgalān ।। 

prauḍhāyāṃ bhogagarhāyāṃ vicāra upajāyate ।
vṛddhāyāṃ prāvṛṣi śrīmāñ śaratkāla ivāmalaḥ ।। 

vicāro bhogagarhāto vicārād bhogagarhaṇam ।
anyo'nyam ete pūryete samudrajaladāv iva ।। 

bhogagarhā vicāraś ca svātmālokaś ca śāśvataḥ ।
anyo'nyaṃ sādhayanty arthaṃ susnigdhās suhṛdo yathā ।। 

pūrvaṃ daivam anādṛtya pauruṣaṃ prāpya yatnataḥ ।
dantair dantān prasampīḍya bhogeṣv aratim āharet ।। 

deśācārāviruddhena bāndhavaikahitena ca ।
pauruṣeṇa krameṇādau dhanāni samupārjayet ।। 

dhanair abhyāhared bhavyān sujanān guṇaśālinaḥ ।
pravartate samāsaṅgāt teṣāṃ bhogavigarhaṇā ।। 

tato vicāras tadanu jñānaśāstrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ।
tataḥ krameṇa paramapadaprāptiḥ prajāyate ।। 

yadāsurapate kāle viṣayebhyo viraṃsyasi ।
tadā vicāravaśataḥ paramaṃ padam eṣyasi ।। 

samyak prāpsyasi viśrāntim ātmany atyantapāvane ।
na punaḥ kalanāpaṅke duḥkhāyāvapatiṣyasi ।। 

deśakrameṇa dhanam alpavigarhaṇena tenāṅga sādhujanam arjaya mānapūrvam ।
tatsaṅgamotthaviṣayābhyavahelanena samyagvicāravibhavena tavātmalābhaḥ ।। 

cittacikitsāyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ

baḍiḥ

etan me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ pitrā cāruvicāriṇā ।
idānīṃ saṃsmṛtaṃ diṣṭyā samprabodham ahaṃ gataḥ ।। 

adyeyaṃ mama sañjātā bhogān praty aratis sphuṭam ।
diṣṭyā śamasukhaṃ svacchaṃ viśāmy amṛtaśītalam ।। 

punar āpūrayann āśāḥ punar abhyāharan dhanam ।
punar āvarjayan kāntāḥ khinno asmi vibhavasthitau ।। 

aho nu khalu ramyeyaṃ śamabhūś śītalāntarā ।
sarvā eva śamaṃ yānti sukhaduḥkhadṛśaś śame ।। 

śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse śame sthitaḥ ।
ayam antaḥ prahṛṣyāmi candrabimba ivārpitaḥ ।। 

uttāṇḍavamanoraṃhaḥpoṣitoruśarīrakam ।
anārataparikṣobhaṃ hā duḥkhaṃ vibhavārjanam ।। 

aṅgam aṅgena sampīḍya māṃsaṃ māṃsena ca striyāḥ ।
purāham abhavaṃ prīto yat tan mohavijṛmbhitam ।। 

dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭā bhuktaṃ bhoktavyam akṣatam ।
ākrāntam akhilaṃ bhūtajātaṃ kim iva śobhanam ।। 

punas tāny eva tāny eva tatrehānyatra cātra ca ।
itaś cetaś ca vastūni nāpūrvaṃ nāma kiñcana ।। 

sarvam eva parityajya parihṛtya dhiyā svayam ।
svaccha evāvatiṣṭhe ahaṃ pūrṇo arṇava ivātmani ।। 

pātāle bhūtale svarge striyo ratnopalādayaḥ ।
sāraṃ tad api tucchena kālenāśu nigīryate ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ bhṛśaṃ bālo abhavaṃ purā ।
yaḥ kurvan dveṣam amarais tucchayā jagadicchayā ।। 

manonirmāṇamātreṇa jagannāmnā mahādhinā ।
tyaktenāttena vārthas syāt ka udāro mahātmanaḥ ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ cirataraṃ kālam anartho arthadhiyā mayā ।
ajñānamadamattena bālena śveva sevitaḥ ।। 

tarattaralatṛṣṇena kim ivāsmiñ jagattraye ।
mayā na kṛtam ajñena paścāttāpābhivṛddhaye ।। 

etayā tad alaṃ me astu tucchayā pūrvacintayā ।
pauruṣaṃ yāti sāphalyaṃ vartamānacikitsayā ।। 

adyāparimitākārakāraṇaikatayātmanaḥ ।
sarvatas sukham abhyemi rasāyana ivārṇave ।। 

ko ayaṃ tāvad ahaṃ kiṃ syād ātmety ātmāvalokanam ।
pṛcchāmy uśanasaṃ nāthaṃ nūnam ajñānaśāntaye ।। 

sañcintayāmi parameśvaram āśu śukram udyatprasādam atha tena giropadiṣṭaḥ ।
tiṣṭhāmy anantavibhave svayam ātmanātmany akṣīṇam artham upadeśagiraḥ phalanti ।। 

baḍivṛttānte baḍicittāsiddhāntayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti sañcintya bhagavān baḍir āmīlitekṣaṇaḥ ।
dadhyau kamalapattrākṣaṃ śukram ākāśamandiram ।। 

sarvasthacinmayānantanityadhyāno atha bhārgavaḥ ।
cetantaṃ jñātavāñ śiṣyaṃ baḍiṃ gurvarthinaṃ pure ।। 

atha sarvagatānantacidātmā bhārgavaḥ prabhuḥ ।
ānināya sa dehaṃ svaṃ ratnavātāyanaṃ baḍeḥ ।। 

gurudehaprabhājālaparimṛṣṭatanur baḍiḥ ।
bubudhe prātar arkāṃśusambodhitam ivāmbujam ।। 

tatra ratnārghadānena mandārakusumotkaraiḥ ।
pādābhivandanenainaṃ pūjayām āsa bhārgavam ।। 

ratnārghaparikīrṇāṅgaṃ kṛtamandāraśekharam ।
mahārhāsanaviśrāntam athovāca guruṃ baḍiḥ ।। 

baḍiḥ

bhagavaṃs tvatprasādotthā pratibheyaṃ puras tava ।
niyojayati māṃ vaktuṃ kāryaṃ kartum ivārkabhāḥ ।। 

bhogān prati virakto asmi mahāsammohadāyinaḥ ।
tattvaṃ vijñātum icchāmi mahāsammohahāri yat ।। 

kim ihāsti kiyanmātram idaṃ kimmayam eva vā ।
ko ahaṃ kas tvaṃ kim ete vā lokā iti vadāśu me ।। 

śukraḥ

bahunātra kim uktena khaṃ gantuṃ yatnavān aham ।
sarvaṃ dānavarājendra sāraṃ saṅkṣepataś śṛṇu ।। 

cid ihāsti hi cinmātram idaṃ cinmayam eva ca ।
cit tvaṃ cid aham ete ca lokāś cid iti saṅgrahaḥ ।। 

citaṃ niścayam ādāya vilokaya dhiyeddhayā ।
svayam evātmanātmānam anantaṃ padam āpsyasi ।। 

bhavyo asi cet tad etasmāt sarvam āpnoṣi niścayāt ।
no cet tad bahv api proktaṃ tvayi bhasmani hūyate ।। 

ciccetyakalanā bandhas tanmuktir muktir ucyate ।
cid acetyā kilātmeti sarvasiddhāntasaṅgrahaḥ ।। 

etaṃ niścayam ādāya vilokaya dhiyeddhayā ।
svayam evātmanātmānam anantaṃ padam āpsyasi ।। 

khaṃ vrajāmy aham atraite munayas sapta saṅgatāḥ ।
kenāpi surakāryeṇa vartavyaṃ tatra khe mayā ।। 

rājan yāvad ayaṃ dehas tāvan muktadhiyām api ।
yathāprāptārthasantyāgo rocate na svabhāvataḥ ।। 

iti kathitavatātha bhārgaveṇa sphuṭajalarāśipathe mahājavena ।
plutam aliśabale nabho'ntarāle taralataraṅgavad ākule grahaughaiḥ ।। 

baḍyupadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

surāsurasabhāpūjye tasmin bhṛgusute gate ।
manasā cintayām āsa baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ ।। 

yuktam uktaṃ bhagavatā cid evedaṃ jagattrayam ।
cid ahaṃ cid ime lokāś cid āśā cid iyaṃ kriyā ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvaṃ cid eva paramārthataḥ ।
asti cidvyatirekeṇa neha kiñcana kutracit ।। 

ayam āditya ity arko na citā cetyate yadi ।
tad arkatamasor bhedaḥ ka ivehopalabhyate ।। 

iyaṃ bhūr iti bhūr eṣā citā yadi na cetyate ।
bhūmeḥ kiṃ nāma bhūmitvaṃ tad bhaved bhavyatāṃ gatam ।। 

imā diśo diśa iti cetyante na citā yadi ।
tat kiṃ nāma diśāṃ diktvaṃ śailānāṃ vāpi kādritā ।। 

idaṃ jagad iti jagac citā yadi na cetyate ।
tat kiṃ jagattvaṃ jagato nabhastvaṃ nabhaso atha kim ।। 

kāyo ayaṃ parvatākāraś citā yadi na cetyate ।
tat kiṃ nāma śarīratvaṃ śarīrasya śarīriṇām ।। 

cid indriyāṇi cit kāyaś cin manaś cit tadeṣaṇā ।
cid antaś cid bahiś cit khaṃ cid bhāvaś cid bhavasthitiḥ ।। 

cid evaikam ahaṃ sarvaṃ sparśanaiṣaṇapūrvakam ।
karomi mātrāsaṃsparśaṃ śarīreṇa na kiñcana ।। 

kim anena śarīreṇa kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamena me ।
aśeṣajagadekātmā cid ahaṃ cetanātmakaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ cid ambare bhānāv ahaṃ cid bhūtapañjare ।
surāsureṣu cid ahaṃ sthāvareṣu careṣu ca ।। 

cid astīha dvitīyā hi kalpanaiva na vidyate ।
dvitvasyāsambhavāl loke kaś śatruḥ kaś ca vā suhṛt ।। 

baḍināmnaś śarīrasya cchinne śirasi bhāsure ।
citas tat kiṃ bhavec chinnaṃ sarvalokāvapūraṇāt ।। 

citā sañcetito dveṣo dveṣo bhavati nānyathā ।
tasmād dveṣādayas sarve bhāvābhāvāś cidātmakāḥ ।। 

na cito vyatirekeṇa pravicāryāpi kiñcana ।
anyad āsādyate sphārād asmāt tribhuvanodarāt ।। 

na dveṣo asti na rāgo asti na mano nāsya vṛttayaḥ ।
cinmātrasyātiśuddhasya vikalpakalanā kutaḥ ।। 

cid ahaṃ sarvago vyāpī nityānandamayātmakaḥ ।
vikalpakalanātīto vikalpāṃśavivarjitaḥ ।। 

citaś cid iti yan nāma nirnāmāyā na nāma tat ।
śabdātmikaiṣā cicchaktiḥ parisphurati sarvagā ।। 

dṛśyadarśananirmuktaḥ kevalāmalamūrtimān ।
nityodito nirābhāso draṣṭāsmi parameśvaraḥ ।। 

na kartāsmi na bhoktāsmi draṣṭaivāsmi nirāmayaḥ ।
kalpanāvikalākārakālakāntakalāmayaḥ ।। 

ābhāsamātram udito nitya ābhāsyavarjitaḥ ।
bhārūpaikasvarūpo asmi svarūpeṇa jayāmy aham ।। 

cetyarañjanariktāya vimuktāya mahātmane ।
pratyakcetanarūpāya svarūpāya namo astu me ।। 

citaye cetyamuktāya yuktyā yuktāya yogyayā ।
sarvāvabhāsarūpāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

cetyanirmuktacidrūpaṃ viṣvagviśvāvapūrakam ।
saṃśāntasarvasaṃvedyaṃ saṃvinmātram ahaṃ tatam ।। 

ākāśavad ananto aham apy aṇor aṇur ātataḥ ।
nāsādayanti mām etās sukhaduḥkhadaśādṛśaḥ ।। 

saṃvedanam asaṃvedyam acetyaṃ cetanaṃ tatam ।
na śaktā māṃ paricchettum bhāvābhāvā jagadgatāḥ ।। 

atha vaite jagadbhāvāḥ paricchindantu mām imam ।
yathābhimatam ete hi matto na vyatirekiṇaḥ ।। 

yadi svabhāvabhūtena vastunā vastu mīyate ।
hriyate dīyate vāpi tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam ।। 

sarvadā sarvam evāhaṃ sarvakṛt sarvasaṅgataḥ ।
cetyam asty aham evaitan na kiñcid api coditam ।। 

kiṃ saṅkalpavikalpābhyāṃ cid acic cāham ekabhāḥ ।
saṅkṣobhayāmy ahaṃ tāvac chāmyāmy ātmani pāvane ।। 

iti sañcintayann eva baḍiḥ paramakovidaḥ ।
akārārdhārdhamātrārthaṃ bhāvayan dhyānam āsthitaḥ ।। 

saṃśāntasarvasaṅkalpaḥ praśāntakalanāgaṇaḥ ।
niśśaṅkam atidūrāstacetyacintakacintanaḥ ।। 

dhyātṛdhyeyadhyānahīno nirmanāś śāntavāsanaḥ ।
babhūvāvātadīpābho baḍiḥ prāptamahāpadaḥ ।। 

upaśāntamanās tatra ratnavātāyane baḍiḥ ।
avasad bahukālaṃ sa samutkīrṇa ivopalāt ।। 

praśamitaiṣaṇayā paripūrṇayā mananadoṣadaśojjhitayoccayā ।
baḍir arājata nirmalasattayā vighanam acchatayeva śarannabhaḥ ।। 

baḍiviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha te dānavās tatra baḍer anucarās tadā ।
tadgṛhaṃ sphāṭikaṃ saudham uccair āruruhuḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

ḍimbādyā mantriṇo vīrās sāmantāḥ kukuhādayaḥ ।
surādyāś caiva rājāno vṛtrādyā balahāriṇaḥ ।। 

hayagrīvādayas sabhyāś śukundādyāś ca bandhavaḥ ।
luḍaṅgādyāś ca suhṛdaḥ palmūlādyāś ca lālakāḥ ।। 

kuberayamaśakrādyā upāyanakarās surāḥ ।
yakṣā vidyādharā nāgās sevāvasarakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।। 

rambhātilottamādyāś ca cāmariṇyo varāṅganāḥ ।
saritas sāgarāś śailā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā ।। 

sevārtham āyayus tasya taṃ pradeśaṃ tadā baḍeḥ ।
anye ca bahavas siddhās trailokyodaravāsinaḥ ।। 

dhyānamaunasamādhisthaṃ citrārpitam ivācalam ।
namatkirīṭāvalayo dadṛśur baḍim ādṛtāḥ ।। 

taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakartavyāḥ praṇemus te mahāsurāḥ ।
viṣādavismayānandabhayamantharatāṃ yayuḥ ।। 

mantriṇo atha vicāryātra kiṃ prāptam iti dānavāḥ ।
bhārgavaṃ cintayām āsur guruṃ sarvavidāṃ varam ।। 

cintanānantaraṃ daityā bhārgavaṃ bhāsuraṃ puraḥ ।
dadṛśuḥ kalpitaprāptaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

pūjyamāno asuragaṇair niviṣṭo guruviṣṭare ।
dadarśa dhyānamaunasthaṃ bhārgavo dānaveśvaram ।। 

viśramya sa kṣaṇam iva premavān avalokya ca ।
baḍiṃ vicārayan dṛṣṭyā parikṣīṇabhavabhramam ।। 

deharaśmiśatair dantadīptibhiḥ kṣīrasāgare ।
kṣipann iva sabhām āha hasan vākyam idaṃ guruḥ ।। 

śukraḥ

aho citram idaṃ daityās svavicāraṇayaiva yat ।
samprāptavimalālokas siddho ayaṃ bhagavān baḍiḥ ।। 

ayaṃ tad evam eveha tiṣṭhan dānavasattamāḥ ।
svātmani sthitim āpnotu padaṃ paśyatv anāmayam ।। 

śrānto viśrāntim āyātaḥ kṣīṇacintābharabhramaḥ ।
śāntasaṃsāranīhāro bodhanīyo na dānavāḥ ।। 

sva evāloka etena samprāpto ajñānasaṅkṣaye ।
śānte abhrasambhrame sauro dineneva karotkaraḥ ।। 

svayam eva hi kālena prabodham ayam eṣyati ।
bījakośāt svasaṃvittyā suptamūrtir ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

kurudhvaṃ svāni kāryāṇi sarve dānavanāyakāḥ ।
baḍir varṣasahasreṇa samādher bodham eṣyati ।। 

ity ukte guruṇā tatra bhayaharṣaviṣādajām ।
daityāś cintāṃ jahuś śuṣkāṃ mañjarīm iva pādapāḥ ।। 

vairocanisabhāsaṃsthāṃ vidhāya prāgvyavasthayā ।
svavyāpāraparās tasthus sarva evāsurās tataḥ ।। 

narā mahīm ahipatayo rasātalaṃ grahā nabhas tridaśagaṇās triviṣṭapam ।
diśo adrayo jalapatayaś ca kandarān vanecarā gaganacarāś ca khaṃ yayuḥ ।। 

baḍisamādhivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha varṣasahasreṇa divyenāsurasattamaḥ ।
devadundubhinirghoṣair bubudhe bhagavān baḍiḥ ।। 

baḍau prabuddhe tad bāḍhaṃ vireje nagaraṃ tadā ।
vairiñca iva sūryaugha udite kamalākaraḥ ।। 

baḍiḥ prabuddha evāsau yāvan nāyānti dānavāḥ ।
tāvat sañcintayām āsa samādhisadane kṣaṇam ।। 

aho nu ramyā padavī śītalā pāramārthikī ।
aham asyāṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ ।। 

tad enām eva padavīm avalambya vasāmy aham ।
bhavatīhopabhuktābhiḥ kiṃ me bāhyavibhūtibhiḥ ।। 

aindaveṣv api bimbeṣu na tathānandavīcayaḥ ।
toṣayanti yathāntar māṃ saṃvidvibhavabhūmayaḥ ।। 

iti bhūyo api viśrāntyai kurvāṇaṃ galitaṃ manaḥ ।
baḍim āvārayām āsur daityāś candram ivāmbudāḥ ।। 

tān ālokya punar dadhyau tatpraṇāmākulekṣaṇaḥ ।
taiḥ kulācalasaṅkāśaiḥ parivītavapus tv idam ।। 

citaḥ kṣīṇavikalpasya kim upādeyam asti me ।
mano yadabhipātitvād yātu tadrasatām alam ।। 

mokṣam icchāmy ahaṃ kasmād baddhaḥ kenāsmi vai purā ।
abaddho mokṣam icchāmi keyaṃ bālaviḍambanā ।। 

na bandho asti na mokṣo asti maurkhyaṃ me kṣayam āgatam ।
kiṃ me dhyānavilāsena kiṃ vādhyānena me bhavet ।। 

na dhyānaṃ nāpi cādhyānaṃ na bhogān nāpy abhogitām ।
abhivāñchāmi tiṣṭhāmi samam eva gatajvaraḥ ।। 

na me vāñchā pare tattve na me vāñchā jagatsthitau ।
na me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ vibhavena me ।। 

nāhaṃ mṛto na jīvāmi na san nāsann ahaṃ samaḥ ।
nedaṃ me naiva nānyan me namo mahyam ahaṃ hy aham ।। 

idam astu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy atra svasaṃsthitaḥ ।
naiva vāstu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy ātmani śītalam ।। 

kiṃ me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyavibhavaśriyā ।
yad āyāti tad āyātu nāhaṃ kiñcin na me kvacit ।। 

na kiñcid api kartavyaṃ yadi nāma mayādhunā ।
tat kasmān na karomīha kiñcit prakṛtakarma vai ।। 

iti nirṇīya pūrṇātmā baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ ।
daityān ālokayām āsa padmānīva divākaraḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭipātavibhāgena sarveṣāṃ danujanmanām ।
śiraḥpraṇāmāñ jagrāha puṣpāmodān ivānilaḥ ।। 

atha vairocanis tatra dhyeyatyāgamayātmanā ।
manasā sakalāny eva rājakāryāṇi sa vyadhāt ।। 

devān dvijān gurūṃś caiva pūjayām āsa pūjayā ।
sammānayām āsa suhṛdbandhusāmantasajjanān ।। 

arthenāpūrayām āsa bhṛtyān arthigaṇāṃs tathā ।
lalanā lālayām āsa vicitravibhavārpaṇaiḥ ।। 

ity asāv avasat tasmin rājye sakalaśāsane ।
yajñaṃ prati babhūvātha matir asya kadācana ।। 

tarpitāśeṣabhuvanaṃ devarṣigaṇapūjitam ।
saha śukrādibhir mukhyais sa cakāra mahāmakham ।। 

baḍir bhogabharasyārthī neti nirṇīya mādhavaḥ ।
baḍer īpsitasiddhyarthaṃ siddhidas tanmakhaṃ yayau ।। 

bhogaikakṛpaṇāyedaṃ jagajjaṅgalakhaṇḍakam ।
dātuṃ yogyāya śakrāya vayojyeṣṭhāya kāryavit ।। 

kramamātracchalenātra vañcayitvā baḍiṃ hariḥ ।
babandha pātālatale bhūgeha iva vānaram ।। 

adyāsau saṃsthito rāma punarindratvahetunā ।
jīvanmuktavapus svastho nityaṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇadhīḥ ।। 

pātālakuhare tiṣṭhañ jīvanmuktamatir baḍiḥ ।
āpadaṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭyā samayaiva sa paśyati ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti tatprajñā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।
samā sthiratarākārā citrasūryāvalī yathā ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvasahasrāṇīha jīvatām ।
tanmanaś ciram ālokya bhogeṣu viratiṃ gatam ।। 

daśakoṭīś ca varṣāṇām anuśāsya jagattrayam ।
ante viraktatāṃ prāptam upaśāntaṃ baḍer manaḥ ।। 

ūhāpohasahasrāṇi bhāvābhāvaśatāni ca ।
baḍinā paridṛṣṭāni kva samāśvāsam etv asau ।। 

bhogābhilāṣaṃ santyajya baḍis sampūrṇamānasaḥ ।
ātmārāmas sthito nityam adya pātālakoṭare ।। 

punar etena baḍinā jagad indratayākhilam ।
anuśāsyam idaṃ rāma bahūn varṣagaṇān iha ।। 

na tasyendrapadaprāptyā tuṣṭis samupajāyate ।
na tasya svapadabhraṃśād udvega upajāyate ।। 

sa samas sarvabhāveṣu sarvadaivoditāśayaḥ ।
samprāptam āharan svastha ākāśa iva tiṣṭhati ।। 

baḍivijñānasamprāptir eṣā te kathitā mayā ।
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tvam apy abhyudito bhava ।। 

baḍivat svavivekena nityo aham iti niścayāt ।
padam āsādayādvandvaṃ pauruṣeṇaiva rāghava ।। 

dve cāṣṭau caiva varṣāṇāṃ koṭīr bhuktvā jagattrayam ।
ante vairasyam āpanno baḍir apy asurottamaḥ ।। 

tasmād avaśyavairasyaṃ bhogapūgam arindama ।
santyajya satatānandam avairasyapadaṃ vraja ।। 

imā dṛśyadṛśo rāma nānākāravikāradāḥ ।
na kāścana tavātmīyā dūrāc chailaśilā iva ।। 

dhāvamānam ihāmutra luṭhitaṃ lokavṛttiṣu ।
saṃsthāpaya nibadhyaitan mano hṛdayakoṭare ।। 

cidādityo bhavān eva sarvatra jagati sthitaḥ ।
kaḥ paras te ka ātmīyaḥ pariskhalasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

tvam ananto mahābāhus tvam ādyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।
tvaṃ padārthaśatākāraiḥ parisphūrjasi cidvapuḥ ।। 

tvayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
bodhe nityodite śuddhe sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā ।। 

na jāyase na mriyase tvam ajaḥ puruṣo virāṭ ।
cic chuddho janmamaraṇabhrāntayo mā bhavantu te ।। 

samastajanmarogāṇāṃ pravicārya balābalam ।
tṛṣṇām utsṛjya bhogānāṃ bhoktaiva bhava kevalam ।। 

tvayi sthite jagannāthe cidāditye sadodite ।
idam ābhāsate sarvaṃ saṃsārasvapnamaṇḍalam ।। 

mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vyarthaṃ sukhaduḥkhaiṣaṇā na te ।
śuddhaś cid asi sarvātmā sarvavastvavabhāsakaḥ ।। 

pūrvam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ tvam aniṣṭaṃ ceṣṭam ity api ।
parikalpya tadabhyāsāt tato api dve parityaja ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭadṛśos tyāge samatodeti śāśvatī ।
tayā hṛdayavartinyā punar jantur na jāyate ।। 

yeṣu yeṣu pradeśeṣu mano majjati bālavat ।
tebhyas tebhyas samuddhṛtya tad dhi tattve niveśayet ।। 

evam abhyāgatābhyāsaṃ manomattamataṅgajam ।
nibadhya sarvabhāvena paraṃ śreyo adhigamyate ।। 

mā śaṭhair ayathārthajñair mithyādṛṣṭihatāśayaiḥ ।
dhūrtasaṅkalpavikrītair vimūḍhais samatāṃ gamaḥ ।। 

akiñcanāt svanirṇītau lambamānāt paroktiṣu ।
na maurkhyād adhiko loke kaścid astīha duḥkhadaḥ ।। 

tvam etad avivekābhram uditaṃ hṛdayāmbare ।
vivekapavanenāśu dūraṃ naya mahāmate ।। 

ātmanaiva prayatnena yāvad ātmāvalokane ।
na kṛto anugrahas tāvan na vicārodayo bhavet ।। 

vedavedāntaśāstrārthatarkadṛṣṭibhir apy ayam ।
nātmā prakaṭatām eti yāvan na svam avekṣaṇam ।। 

tvam ātmany ātmanā rāma prasāde samavasthitaḥ ।
prāpto asi vitataṃ bodhaṃ madvacāṃsy avabudhyase ।। 

vikalpāṃśavihīnasya tvayaiṣā cidvivasvataḥ ।
gṛhītā vitatā vyāptir maduktā paramātmanaḥ ।। 

vilīnasarvasaṅkalpaś śāntasandehavibhramaḥ ।
kṣīṇakautukanīhāro jāto asi vigatajvaraḥ ।। 

yad upagacchasi pāsi nihaṃsi vā pibasi valgasi cinmaya vardhase ।
tad asi tena tavāstu mahāmune vigatabodhakalaṅkaviśaṅkitā ।। 

baḍivijñānaprāptir nāma sargaḥ

triṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athemam aparaṃ rāma vijñānādhigame kramam ।
śṛṇu daityeśvaras siddhaḥ prahlādas svātmanā yathā ।। 

āsīt pātālajaṭhare vidrāvitasuro asuraḥ ।
hiraṇyakaśipur nāma nārāyaṇaparākramaḥ ।। 

ākrāntabhuvanābhogas sa jahāra harer jagat ।
ṣaṭpadasya bṛhatpattraṃ rājahaṃsa ivāmbujam ।। 

cakāra jagatāṃ rājyaṃ samākrāntasurāsuraḥ ।
dantī nirastahaṃsaugho nalinyām alinām iva ।। 

athāsāv asurādhīśaḥ kurvaṃs tribhuvaneśatām ।
kālena suṣuve putrān aṅkurān iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

te avardhantācireṇaiva tejastarjitatārakāḥ ।
daśārkāṃśuśatānīva vyomākrāntivilāsinaḥ ।। 

prahlādo nāma bhagavān pradhānātmā babhūva ha ।
teṣāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ maṇīnām iva kaustubhaḥ ।। 

tenārājata putreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur bhṛśam ।
sarvasaundaryayuktena vasanteneva vatsaraḥ ।। 

atha putrasahāyo asau balakośasamanvitaḥ ।
ājagāma madaṃ daityas trigaṇḍagalitebhavat ।। 

tatāpākrāntitāpena trijaganti vikāsinā ।
kalpāntasūryagaṇavan navayaiva karaśriyā ।। 

akhidyantāsya tenātha sūryendupramukhās surāḥ ।
durvilāsavilolasya bālasyeva svabandhavaḥ ।। 

te arthayāṃ cakrire śauriṃ daityendrebhapater vadhe ।
na kṣamante mahānto api paunaḥpuṇyena duṣkriyām ।। 

tataḥ pralayaparyastajagadghargharajṛmbhitam ।
digdantidaśanaprakhyanakhavajrāśrisūmbhitam ।। 

sthiravidyullatājālabhāsurordhvajamaṇḍalam ।
daśadikkoṭarodvāntajvalajjvalanakuṇḍalam ।। 

samastakulaśailendrapiṇḍapīṭhodbhaṭodaram ।
dordrumādhūnanoddhūtasphuṭadbrahmāṇḍakarparam ।। 

vadanodaraniṣkrāntavātotsāritaparvataṃ ।
trijagaddahanodyuktakopakalpāgnigarvitam ।। 

saṭāvikaṭapīnāṃsaspandapreritabhāskaram ।
romakūpalasadvahnipuñjapiñjaraparvatam ।। 

kulācalamahākuḍyakuṭṭanodbhaṭadṛkpuṭam ।
sarvāvayavaniṣṭhyūtapaṭṭisaprāsatomaram ।। 

nārasiṃhaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā mādhavo ahan mahāsuram ।
lasatkaṭakaṭārāvaṃ turaṅgamam iva dvipaḥ ।। 

puram āsuram udvāntair dadāhekṣaṇavahnibhiḥ ।
sasarvabhūtaṃ kalpānte jagajjālam ivānalaḥ ।। 

nṛsiṃhamārute tasmin bhṛśaṃ kṣobham upāgate ।
visphūrjati ghanāsphoṭair ekārṇava ivākule ।। 

dudruvur dānavaughās te dikṣv alaṃ maṣakā iva ।
upāyayur adṛśyatvaṃ dīpā iva gatatviṣaḥ ।। 

atha vidrutadaityendraṃ dagdhāntaḥpuramaṇḍalam ।
babhūva pātālatalaṃ kalpakṣuṇṇajagatsamam ।। 

akālakalpāntavidhau śanaiḥ praśamite vibhau ।
kvāpi yāte samāśvastasurasaṃrambhapūjite ।। 

mṛtaśiṣṭā danusutāḥ prahlādaparipālitāḥ ।
dagdhaṃ svaṃ deśam ājagmus saraś śuṣkam ivāṇḍajāḥ ।। 

tatra kālocitāṃ kṛtvā svanāśaparidevanām ।
aurdhvadaihikasatkāraṃ cakruḥ prabhuṣu bandhuṣu ।। 

hṛtabandījanaṃ pluṣṭabandhubāndhavamaṇḍalam ।
śanair āśvāsayām āsur mṛtaśiṣṭaṃ svakaṃ janam ।। 

citrārpitopamadurākṛtayo nirīhā dīnāśayā himahatāmburuhopamānāḥ ।
śokopataptamanaso asuranāyakās te dagdhadrumā iva nirastavikāsam āsan ।। 

prahlādaviśrāntau hiraṇyakaśipuvadho nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha duḥkhaparītātmā hariṇā hatadānave ।
prahlādaś cintayām āsa maunī pātālakoṭare ।। 

ko anv asmākam upāyas syād ya evehāsurāṅkuraḥ ।
tīkṣṇāgro jāyate taṃ taṃ bhuṅkte śākhāmṛgo hariḥ ।। 

na kadācana pātāle daityā dordaṇḍaśālinaḥ ।
sthirā babhūvur udbhinnāḥ padmā iva himācale ।। 

utpatyotpatya naśyanti bhāsurākāraghargharāḥ ।
kṣaṇaprasphuritārambhās taraṅgā iva vāridheḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ kaṣṭaṃ samagrālokahāriṇaḥ ।
ripavaḥ prauḍhim āyātā apūrvatimirabhramāḥ ।। 

tamaḥprapūrṇahṛdayās saṅkucatpattrasampadaḥ ।
suhṛdaḥ khedam āyātā niśīva kamalākarāḥ ।। 

tātasya malinavyūhapādapīṭhāpamārjakaiḥ ।
surair viṣaya ākrānto mṛgair iva mahāvanam ।। 

nirudyamā gataśrīkā dīnāḥ prakaṭitāśayāḥ ।
bāndhavā na virājante padmāḥ pluṣṭadalā iva ।। 

sphuranty asuravīrāṇāṃ gṛheṣv aviratānilaiḥ ।
dhūsarā bhasmanīhārā dhūpadhūmabharā iva ।। 

hṛtadvārakavāṭāsu daityāntaḥpurabhittiṣu ।
prabhā marakatasyeva jātā navayavāṅkurāḥ ।। 

trilokīnābhinalinīmattebhā dānavā api ।
devavad dainyam āyātāḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ ।। 

manāk calati parṇe api dṛṣṭāribhayabhīravaḥ ।
vadhvas trasyanti vidhvastā mṛgyo grāmagatā iva ।। 

asurīkarṇapūrārthaṃ phullaratnagulucchakāḥ ।
narasiṃhakarālūnās sthāṇutām āgatā drumāḥ ।। 

divyāmbaralatāpattrā ratnastabakadanturāḥ ।
punar āropitās tatra nandane kalpapādapāḥ ।। 

purehāmarabandīnāṃ daityair ālokitaṃ mukham ।
adya tv asurabandīnāṃ surair ālokyate mukham ।। 

manye dānamahānadyas surebhakaṭabhittiṣu ।
pravṛttās tā bhaviṣyanti śailasānuṣv ivāpagāḥ ।। 

asmākam ibhagaṇḍeṣu dāvadāhavibhūtayaḥ ।
lasanti maruṣaṇḍeṣu saṃśuṣkeṣv iva dhūlayaḥ ।। 

vikāsisitamandāramakarandāruṇānilāḥ ।
tā meruśikharasthalyo daityadurlabhatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

suragandharvasundaryo dānavāntaḥpuroṣitāḥ ।
punar merau sthitiṃ yātā mañjarya iva pādape ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ tātapurandhrīṇāṃ śuṣkāmburuhanīrasāḥ ।
vilāsās suranārībhir hasyante hāsyalīlayā ।। 

pūrvaṃ yair eva mattātaś cāmarair upavījitaḥ ।
sahasranayanas svarge kaṣṭaṃ tair eva vījyate ।। 

iyam asmākam anyāpad āgatā dainyadāyinī ।
tasyaikasya prasādena duṣpauruṣavato hareḥ ।। 

taddorvanaghanacchāyālabdhaviśrāntayas surāḥ ।
na kadācana tapyante himādrer iva sānavaḥ ।। 

śauriśauryograśikharasaṃśrayeṇāśritaśriyaḥ ।
asmān samupatapyanti munīñ śākhāmṛgā iva ।। 

tenāsurapurandhrīṇāṃ nityamaṇḍanamaṅgale ।
mukhapadme arpitaṃ bāṣpam abjinīnāṃ himaṃ yathā ।। 

śīrṇabhinnaluṭhadbhittir jagajjarjaramaṇḍapaḥ ।
ayaṃ nīlamaṇistambhais tadbhujair eva dhāryate ।। 

sa dhartā surasainyasya majjato vipadarṇave ।
kṣīrododaramagnasya mandarasyeva kacchapaḥ ।। 

ete tātādayas sarve tenaivāsurasattamāḥ ।
pātitāḥ kṣubdhakalpāntavāteneva kulācalāḥ ।। 

sa eṣa evaṃ saṃhārakarmakṣamabhujāvaliḥ ।
surasārthasuhṛc chrīmān viṣamo madhusūdanaḥ ।। 

daityadordaṇḍaparaśos tasya vīryeṇa vīryavān ।
dānavān bādhate śakro bālakān iva markaṭaḥ ।। 

durjayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pravimuktāyudho api san ।
nāsau śastrāstravicchedair vajrasāro vidīryate ।। 

abhyastā bahavas tena mithaḥpreritaparvatāḥ ।
bhīmās samarasaṃrambhās samam asmatpitāmahaiḥ ।। 

tāsu tāsv atighorāsu vitatāsv asurājiṣu ।
yo na bhīta idānīṃ sa bhayam eṣyati kā kathā ।। 

upāyam ekam evemaṃ harer ākramaṇe sphuṭam ।
manye tadvyatirekeṇa vidyate na pratikriyā ।। 

sarvātmanā sarvadhiyā sarvasaṃrambharaṃhasā ।
sa eva śaraṇaṃ devo gatir astīha nānyathā ।। 

na tasmād adhikaḥ kaścid asti lokatrayāntare ।
pralayasthitisargāṇāṃ hariḥ kāraṇatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

tasmān nimeṣād ārabhya nārāyaṇam ajaṃ sadā ।
samprapanno asmi sarvatra nārāyaṇamayo hy aham ।। 

namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantras sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।
nāpaiti mama hṛtkośād ākāśād iva mārutaḥ ।। 

harir āśā harir vyoma harir urvī harir jagat ।
ayaṃ harir ameyātmā jāto harimayo hy aham ।। 

aviṣṇuḥ pūjayan viṣṇuṃ na pūjāphalabhāg bhavet ।
viṣṇur bhūtvā yajed viṣṇum ayaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

anantam idam ākāśam āpūrya vinatāsutaḥ ।
kanakāṅgo mamāṅgānām ayam āsanatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

karaśākhaikaviśrāntasarvahetivihaṅgamāḥ ।
nakhāṃśumañjarīkīrṇā mahāmarakatadrumāḥ ।। 

ime te mṛdumandāradāmadṛbdhāṃsamaṇḍalāḥ ।
mandarāghṛṣṭakeyūrāś catvāro mama bāhavaḥ ।। 

calacchaśikarāpūracārucāmaradhāriṇī ।
iyaṃ me pārśvagā lakṣmīḥ kṣīrodajaṭharotthitā ।। 

helāvilabdhabhuvanā trailokyatarumañjarī ।
iyaṃ me pārśvagā kīrtir dhavalāmalahāsinī ।। 

anārataṃ jagajjālanavanirmāṇakāriṇī ।
iyaṃ me pārśvagā māyā svendrajālavilāsinī ।। 

iyaṃ sā helayākrāntatrailokyataruṣaṇḍikā ।
jayā sphurati me pārśve latā kalpataror iva ।। 

imau me nityaśītoṣṇau devau śītāṃśubhāskarau ।
prakaṭīkṛtasaṃsārau mukhamadhye vilocane ।। 

mameyam utpalaśyāmā pīnāmbhodharasundarī ।
śyāmīkṛtakakupcakrā dehadīptir visāriṇī ।। 

ayaṃ mama kare śaṅkhaḥ pāñcajanyas sphuraddhvaniḥ ।
mūrtaṃ kham iva śabdātma kṣīroda iva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ me karṇikākośanilīnabrahmaṣaṭpadaḥ ।
padmaḥ karatale śrīmān svanābhikuharodbhavaḥ ।। 

iyaṃ me ratnacitrāṅgī sumeruśikharopamā ।
hemāṅgadā gadā gurvī daityadānavamardinī ।। 

ayaṃ me bhāsurākāras sukhadṛśyas sudarśanaḥ ।
jvālājaṭilaparyantaparipāṭaladiktaṭaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ me ketumadvahnisundaro jvalito asitaḥ ।
kuṭhāro daityavṛkṣāṇāṃ nandayan nandakas sthitaḥ ।। 

idaṃ maccharadhārāṇāṃ puṣkarāvartako ghanaḥ ।
śārṅgaṃ dhanur ahīndrābham indrakārmukasundaram ।। 

imāny aham anantāni jaganti jaṭhare ciram ।
bibharmi jātanaṣṭāni vartamānāny anekaśaḥ ।। 

imau mahī me caraṇāv idaṃ me gaganaṃ śiraḥ ।
idaṃ vapur me trijagad imā me kukṣayo diśaḥ ।। 

sākṣād ayam ahaṃ viṣṇur nīlameghodaradyutiḥ ।
suparṇaparvatārūḍhaś śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।। 

ete mattaḥ palāyante samagrā duṣṭacetasaḥ ।
tārṇās taralasañcārāḥ pavanād iva rāśayaḥ ।। 

ayam indīvaraśyāmaḥ pītavāsā gadādharaḥ ।
lakṣmīvān garuḍārūḍhas svayam evāham acyutaḥ ।। 

ko mām eti viruddhātmā trailokyadahanakṣamam ।
svanāśāya marutkṣubdhaṃ kalpāgniṃ śalabho yathā ।। 

ime te taijasīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mamāgrasthās surāsurāḥ ।
na śaknuvanti saṃsodḥuṃ cakṣurmandāḥ prabhām iva ।। 

ime mām īśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmendrāgniharādayaḥ ।
stuvanty anantayā vācā bahuvaktrasamutthayā ।। 

ayaṃ vijṛmbhitaiśvaryo jāto aham ajitākṛtiḥ ।
sarvadvandvapadātīto mahimnā parameṇa hi ।। 

tribhuvanabhavanodaraikamūrti prasabhavibhinnasamastaduṣṭasattvam ।
ghanagiritṛṇakānanāntarasthaṃ sakalabhayāpaharaṃ vapuḥ praṇaumi ।। 

prahlādanirvāṇe nārāyaṇīkaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prahlāda iti sañcintya kṛtvā nārāyaṇīṃ tanum ।
punas sañcintayām āsa pūjārtham asuradviṣaḥ ।। 

vapuṣo vaiṣṇavād asmān marunmūrtiḥ parāparaḥ ।
ayaṃ prāṇapravāheṇa bahir viṣṇus sthito aparaḥ ।। 

vainateyasamārūḍhas sphuṭaśakticatuṣṭayaḥ ।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiś śyāmalāṅgaś caturbhujaḥ ।। 

candrārkanayanaś śrīmān kāntanandakanandanaḥ ।
padmapāṇir viśālākṣaś śārṅgadhanvā mahādyutiḥ ।। 

tad enaṃ pūjayāmy āśu parivārasamanvitam ।
saparyayā manomayyā sarvasambhāraramyayā ।। 

tata enaṃ mahādevaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ।
pūjayā bāhyasambhogamahatyā bahuratnayā ।। 

prahlāda iti sañcintya sambhārabharabhāriṇā ।
manasā pūjayām āsa mādhavaṃ kamalādhavam ।। 

ratnārghapātrapaṭalaiś candanādivilepanaiḥ ।
dhūpair dīpair vicitraiś ca nānāvibhavabhūṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

mandāramālāvalanair hemābjapaṭalotkaraiḥ ।
kalpavṛkṣalatāgucchai ratnastabakamaṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

pallavair devavṛkṣāṇāṃ nānākusumadāmabhiḥ ।
kiṅkirātair bukaiḥ kundaiś caṇpakair asitotpalaiḥ ।। 

kalhāraiḥ kumudaiḥ kāśaiḥ kharjūraiś cūtakiṃśukaiḥ ।
aśokair madanair bilvaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ kirātakaiḥ ।। 

kadambaiḥ kukurair nīpais sindhuvārais sayūthikaiḥ ।
pāribhadrair guggulubhir vidulaiḥ kuyyakotkaraiḥ ।। 

priyaṅgupaṭalaiḥ pāṭaiḥ pāṭalair dhātupāṭalaiḥ ।
āmrair āmrātakair bhavyair harītakavibhītakaiḥ ।। 

sālatālatamālānāṃ latākusumapallavaiḥ ।
komalaiḥ kalikājālais sahakārais sakuṅkumaiḥ ।। 

ketakais saptaparṇaiś ca tatherāmañjarīgaṇaiḥ ।
vicitrapālīvatajair nānāṭaṅkatarūdbhavaiḥ ।। 

manoharārukodbhūtair mālatīmādhavīgaṇaiḥ ।
navaśephālikājālais suvarṇasumanoharaiḥ ।। 

bhakṣyair bhojyais tathā pānair lehyaiḥ peyaiś ca picchilaiḥ ।
rasaiḥ phalaiḥ pallavaiś ca vividhāsvādajātibhiḥ ।। 

aṃśukaiś śayanair yānair mahārhair hemaviṣṭaraiḥ ।
geyair nṛttair vādanaiś ca mahārhalalanāgaṇaiḥ ।। 

udyānopavanābhogasamagravibhavārpaṇaiḥ ।
sarvasaundaryasammānais svayam ātmārpaṇair api ।। 

hariṃ paramayā bhaktyā jagadvibhavabhavyayā ।
manasā pūjayām āsa prahlādo antaḥpure patim ।। 

atha devagṛhe tasmin bāhyārthaiḥ paripūrṇayā ।
pūjayā pūjayām āsa dānaveśo janārdanam ।। 

bahirdṛśyena tenaiva krameṇa parameśvaram ।
punaḥ punaḥ pūjayitvā tuṣṭimān dānavo abhavat ।। 

tatas tataḥ prabhṛty eva prahlādaḥ parameśvaram ।
tathaiva pratyahaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrṇayā ।। 

atha tasmin pure daityās tataḥ prabhṛti vaiṣṇavāḥ ।
sarva evābhavan bhavyā rājā hy ācārakāraṇam ।। 

jagāma vārttā gaganaṃ devalokam atho harim ।
viṣṇor dveṣaṃ parityajya bhaktā daityās sthitā iti ।। 

devā vismayam ājagmuś śakrādyās samarudgaṇāḥ ।
gṛhītā vaiṣṇavī bhaktir daityaiḥ kim iti rāghava ।। 

kṣīrode bhogibhogasthaṃ vibudhā vismayākulāḥ ।
jagmur ambaram utsṛjya harim āhavaśālinaṃ ।। 

tatraitaṃ daityavṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur asya te ।
papracchuś cainam āsīnam apūrvāścaryavismayāt ।। 

devāḥ

kim etad bhagavan daityā viruddhā ye sadaiva te ।
te hi tvanmayatāṃ yātā māyeyam iti bhāvyate ।। 

kva kilātyantadurvṛttā dānavā dalitādrayaḥ ।
kva pāścātyamahājanmalabhyā bhaktir janārdane ।। 

prākṛto guṇavāñ jāta ity eṣā bhagavan kathā ।
akālapuṣpamāleva sukhāyodvejanāya ca ।। 

nopapannaṃ hi yad yatra tatra tan na virājate ।
madhye kācakalāpasya mahāmūlyo maṇir yathā ।। 

yo yo yādṛgguṇo jantus sa tām evaiti saṃsthitim ।
sadṛśeṣv apy ajeṣu śvā na manye ramate kvacit ।। 

na tathā duḥkhayanty aṅge majjantyo vajrasūcayaḥ ।
vaisādṛśyena sambaddhā yathaitā vastudṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

yad yatra kramasamprāptam upapannam aninditam ।
tad eva rājate tatra jale ambhojaṃ na tu sthale ।। 

kvādhamaḥ prākṛtārambho hīnakarmaratis sadā ।
varāko dānavas tucchajātir bhaktiḥ kva vaiṣṇavī ।। 

kamalinī paruṣoṣarabhūgatā sukhayatīha yathā na durāśrayā ।
danusuto api hi mādhavabhaktimān iti kathā na tatheśa sukhāya naḥ ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne vibudhavitarko nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

garjantam atisaṃrabdhaṃ suralokam athārihā ।
uvāca mādhavo vākyaṃ śikhivṛndam ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

bhagavān

vibudhā mā viṣaṇṇās stha prahlādo bhaktimān iti ।
pāścātyaṃ janma tasyedaṃ mokṣārho asāv arindamaḥ ।। 

ita uttaram etena garbhatā danusūnunā ।
na kartavyā pradagdhena bījenevāṅkurakriyā ।। 

guṇavān nirguṇo jāta ity anarthakramaṃ viduḥ ।
nirguṇo guṇavāñ jāta ity āhus siddhidaṃ kramam ।। 

ātmīyāni vicitrāṇi bhuvanāny amarottamāḥ ।
prayāta nāsukhāyaiṣā prāhlādī guṇiteha vaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā vibudhāṃs tatra kṣīrodārṇavavīciṣu ।
antardhānaṃ yayau devas taṭatāpiñchagucchavat ।। 

so api sampūjitaharis suraugho avrajad ambaram ।
punar mandaranirdhūtāt kaṇajālam ivārṇavāt ।। 

prahlādaṃ prati gīrvāṇās tatas snigdhatvam āyayuḥ ।
mahānto yatra nodvignās tatra viśvāsavan manaḥ ।। 

pratyahaṃ pūjayām āsa devadevaṃ janārdanam ।
manasā karmaṇā vācā prahlādo bhaktimān iti ।। 

atha pūjāparasyāsya samavardhanta kālataḥ ।
vivekānandavairāgyavibhavapramukhā guṇāḥ ।। 

nābhyanandad asau bhogapūgaṃ śuṣkam iva drumam ।
na cāramata kāntāsu mṛgo marumahīṣv iva ।। 

na reme lokacarcāsu śāstrārthakathanād ṛte ।
nājāyata ratis tasya dṛśye sthala ivābjinī ।। 

na viśaśrāma ceto asya bhogarogānurañjane ।
muktāphalam asaṃśliṣṭaṃ muktāphala ivātale ।। 

tyaktabhogābhikalanaṃ viśrāntim atha nāgatam ।
cetaḥ kevalam asyāsīd dolāyām iva yojitam ।। 

prāhlādīṃ tāṃ sthitiṃ kṛṣṇadehaḥ kṣīrodakoṭarāt ।
viveda sarvagatayā tayā paramakāntayā ।। 

atha pātālamārgeṇa viṣṇur āhlāditāgragaḥ ।
pūjādevagṛhaṃ tasya prahlādasya samāyayau ।। 

vijñāyābhyāgataṃ devaṃ pūjayā dviguṇeddhayā ।
daityendraḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam ādarāt paryapūjayat ।। 

pūjāgṛhagataṃ devaṃ pratyakṣāvasthitaṃ harim ।
prahlādaḥ paramaprīto girā tuṣṭāva puṣṭayā ।। 

prahlādaḥ

tribhuvanabhavanābhirāmakośaṃ sakalakalaṅkaharaṃ paraṃ prakāśam ।
aśaraṇaśaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam īśaṃ harim ajam īśvaram acyutaṃ prapadye ।। 

kuvalayadalaśailasannikāśaṃ śaradamalāmbarakoṭaropamānam ।
bhramaratimirakajjalāñjanābhaṃ sarasijacakragadādharaṃ prapadye ।। 

vicaladalikalāpakomalāṅgaṃ sitadalapaṅkajakuṭmalābhaśaṅkham ।
śrutiraṇitaviriñcacañcarīkaṃ svahṛdayapadmajalāśayaṃ prapadye ।। 

sitamaṇigaṇatārakāvakīrṇaṃ smitadhavalānanapīvarendubimbam ।
hṛdayamaṇimarīcijālagaṅgaṃ hariśaradambaram ātataṃ prapadye ।। 

tribhuvananalinīsitāravindaṃ timirasamānavimohadīpam agryam ।
jaḍataram ajaḍaṃ cidātmatattvaṃ jagadakhilārtiharaṃ hariṃ prapadye ।। 

navavikasitapadmareṇugauraṃ sphuṭakamalāvapuṣoparūṣitāṅgam ।
dinagamasamayāruṇāmbarābhaṃ kanakanibhāmbarasundaraṃ prapadye ।। 

aviratahatasṛṣṭasargalīlaṃ satatam ajātam avardhanaṃ viśālam ।
yugaśatajaraḍhābhijātadehaṃ tarutalaśāyinam arbhakaṃ prapadye ।। 

ditisutanalinītuṣārapātaṃ suranalinīsatatoditārkabimbam ।
kamalajanalinījalāvapūraṃ hṛdi nalinīnilayaṃ vibhuṃ prapadye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti guṇabahulābhir vāgbhir abhyarcito asau harir asuravināśaś śrīniṣaṇṇāṃsadeśaḥ ।
jalada iva mayūraṃ prītimān prīyamāṇaṃ kuvalayadaladehaḥ pratyuvācāsurendram ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne nārāyaṇāgamanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśas sargaḥ

bhagavān

varaṃ guṇanidhe daityakulacūḍāmahāmaṇe ।
gṛhāṇābhimataṃ bhūyojanmaduḥkhopaśāntaye ।। 

prahlādaḥ

sarvasaṅkalpaphalada sarvalokāntarasthita ।
yad udāratamaṃ vetsi tad evādiśa deva me ।। 

bhagavān

sarvasambhramasaṃśāntyai paramāya phalāya ca ।
brahmaviśrāntiparyanto viveko astu tavānagha ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā ditiputrendraṃ viṣṇur antaradhīyata ।
kṛtaghargharanirhrādas taraṅgas toyadher iva ।। 

viṣṇāv antarhite deve pūjāyāḥ kusumāñjalim ।
pāścātyaṃ dānavas tyaktvā maṇiratnapariṣkṛtam ।। 

padmāsanastho atha mṛdāv upaviśya varāsane ।
stotrapāṭhavidhāv atra cintayām āsa cintayā ।। 

vicāravān eva bhavān bhavatv iti bhavāriṇā ।
devenokto asmi tenāntaḥ karomy āśu vicāraṇām ।। 

kim ahaṃ nāma tāvat syāṃ yo asmin bhuvanaḍambare ।
vacmi gacchāmi tiṣṭhāmi prayate cāharāmi ca ।। 

jagat tāvad idaṃ nāhaṃ savṛkṣavanaparvatam ।
yad bāhyaṃ jaḍam atyantaṃ tat syāṃ katham ahaṃ kila ।। 

asann abhyutthito mūkaḥ pavanais sphurati kṣaṇam ।
kālenālpena vilayī deho nāham acetanaḥ ।। 

jaḍayā karṇaśaṣkulyā kalpyamānaḥ kṣaṇasthayā ।
śūnyākṛtiś śūnyabhavaś śabdo nāham acetanaḥ ।। 

tvacā kṣaṇavināśinyā prāpyam aprāpyam anyathā ।
citprasādopalabdhātma sparśanaṃ nāsmy acetanam ।। 

labdhātmā jihvayā tuccho lolayā lolasattayā ।
svalpaspando dravyaniṣṭho raso nāham acetanaḥ ।। 

dṛśyadarśanayor līnaṃ kṣayi kṣaṇavināśinoḥ ।
kevale draṣṭari kṣīṇaṃ rūpaṃ nāham acetanam ।। 

nāsayātyantajaḍayā kṣayiṇyā parikalpitaḥ ।
pelavo aniyatādhāro gandho nāham acetanaḥ ।। 

nirmamo amananaś śānto gatapañcendriyabhramaḥ ।
śuddhaś cetana evāhaṃ kalākalanavarjitaḥ ।। 

cetyavarjitacinmātram aham eṣo avabhāsakaḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantaravyāpī niṣkalāmalasanmayaḥ ।। 

ā idānīṃ smṛtaṃ satyam etat tad akhilaṃ mayā ।
nirvikalpacidābhāsa eṣa ātmāsmi sarvagaḥ ।। 

anena cetaneneme sarve ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ ।
sūryāntā avabhāsante dīpenottamatejasā ।। 

anenaitās sphurantīha vicitrendriyavṛttayaḥ ।
tejasāntaḥ prakāśena yathāgnikaṇapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

anenaitās sphuranty antar manomananaśaktayaḥ ।
sarvagena nidāghena yathā marumarīcayaḥ ।। 

anenaitat padārthānāṃ vastutvaṃ pratipādyate ।
śuklādiguṇavattvaṃ svaṃ pradīpeneva vāsasām ।। 

asāv eva hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva jāgratām ।
sarvānubhavitā bhūmāv ātmā makuravat sthitaḥ ।। 

asya tasyāvikalpasya ciddīpasya prasādataḥ ।
uṣṇo arkaś śiśiraś candro ghano adrir vidrutaṃ payaḥ ।। 

sātatyenānubhūtānāṃ padārthānām anena tat ।
padārthatvam udety uccaiḥ pratāpeneva taptatā ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ jagatsthitau ।
etat kāraṇam ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ nāsya vidyate ।। 

akāraṇād akaraṇāt sarvakāraṇakāraṇāt ।
etasmāj jagad utpannam idaṃ śaityaṃ himād iva ।। 

ciccetyadraṣṭṛdṛśyādināmabhir varjitātmane ।
sate sakṛdvibhātāya mahyam asmai namo namaḥ ।। 

etasmin sarvabhūtāni nirvikalpacidātmani ।
guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca ।। 

yat kilānena kalitaṃ cetanenāntar ātmanā ।
tat tad bhavati sarvatra netarat sad api sthitam ।। 

yac citā kalitaṃ kiñcit tad āpnoti nijaṃ padam ।
yac citā kalitaṃ neha tat sad apy astam āgatam ।। 

imā ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ ।
jāgatyo vipulādarśe hy asmin vyomani bimbitāḥ ।। 

adṛśyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāpyaṃ galitacetasām ।
etat tad dṛśyate sadbhiḥ paraṃ vyometi tanmayaiḥ ।। 

etad vṛddhaṃ vṛddhimati kṣayi kṣayiṇi jāgate ।
padārthe sad asac cāpi pratibimbārkavat sthitam ।। 

iyam abhyudayaṃ yāti nānātā dṛśyamañjarī ।
ācāracañcarīkāḍhyā etasmād kāraṇadrumād ।। 

asmād iyam udety uccais saṃsāraracanā calā ।
vicitratarugulmāḍhyā śailād iva vanāvalī ।। 

sarveṣām avibhinno asau trailokyodaravartinām ।
brahmādīnāṃ tṛṇāntānāṃ cidātmā samprakāśakaḥ ।। 

eṣo asāv aham ādyantarahitas sarvagākṛtiḥ ।
carācarāṇām bhūtānām antas svānubhavas sthitaḥ ।। 

asya tasya mamemāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca ।
parisaṅkhyāvihīnāni śarīrāṇi bahūni ca ।। 

eṣo asāv aham ekātmā svānubhūtivaśāt svayam ।
sarvadṛgdraṣṭṛdṛśyatvāt sahasrakaralocanaḥ ।। 

eṣo asāv aham ākāśe sūryadehena cāruṇā ।
viharāmītareṇāpi vāyudehena vāhinā ।। 

mamaitad vapur ānīlaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।
sarvasaubhāgyasīmānto hy asmiñ jagati valgati ।। 

aham asmin samudbhūtaḥ padmāsanagatas sadā ।
nirvikalpasamādhisthaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataḥ ।। 

ahaṃ trinetrayākṛtyā gaurīvaktrābjaṣaṭpadaḥ ।
sargānte saṃharāmīdaṃ kūrmo aṅgapaṭalaṃ yathā ।। 

aham aindreṇa rūpeṇa trilokīmaṭhikām imām ।
pālayāmi kramaprāptāṃ maṭhikām iva tāpasaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ tṛṇalatāgulmajālaṃ rasatayā sthitaḥ ।
utthāpayāmi cidbhūmeḥ kūpād urulatām iva ।। 

svalīlārtham idaṃ cāru jagadāḍambaraṃ tatam ।
mayābhijātabālena paṅkakrīḍanakaṃ yathā ।। 

mayīdam arpyate sarvaṃ sattāṃ māṃ prāpya gacchati ।
matparityaktam etac ca sad apy eva na kiñcana ।। 

mayi sphāre cidādarśe pratibimbaṃ yad āgatam ।
tad asti netarat tasmān matto anyan neha vidyate ।। 

kusumeṣv aham āmodaḥ padmapattreṣv ahaṃ chaviḥ ।
chaviṣv ahaṃ rūpakalā rūpeṣv anubhavo apy aham ।। 

yad yat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sarvasaṅkalparahitaṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ param ।। 

āpyā rasamayī śaktir aṇvoghavivṛtodayā ।
sā yathā dārukuḍyeṣu tathāhaṃ sarvavastuṣu ।। 

paramāṃ tām ahaṃ sarvapadārthāntaravartitām ।
upetya saṃvidvaicitryaṃ pratanomi svayecchayā ।। 

ghṛtaṃ yathāntaḥ payasi rasaśaktir yathā jale ।
cicchaktis sarvabhāveṣu tathāntar aham āsthitaḥ ।। 

idaṃ jagat trikālasthaṃ citi mayy eva saṃsthitam ।
cetyopacārarahitaṃ vastujātam ivāvanau ।। 

bharitāśeṣadikkukṣis tyaktasaṅkocavibhramaḥ ।
sarvasthas sarvadhartā ca virāṭ samrāḍ ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

apūrvam anibaddhendram aśastradalitāmaram ।
aprārthitaṃ me samprāptaṃ jagadrājyam idaṃ tatam ।। 

aho nu vitatātmāsmi na māmy ātmātmanātmani ।
kalpāntapavanocchūna ekārṇava ivārṇave ।। 

nātmany antam avāpnomi svacche antas svodite svayam ।
kṣīravārinidhau paṅgus sarīsṛpa iva sphuran ।। 

svalpeyaṃ maṭhikā brāhmī jagannāmnī susaṅkaṭā ।
gajo bilva ivāsyāṃ me na māti vipulaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

viriñcasadanāt pāre tattvānte apy āharat padam ।
prasaraty eva me rūpam adyāpi na nivartate ।। 

ayaṃ nāmāham ity antaḥ kuto niravalambanā ।
aparyantākṛter eṣā kilāsīt svalpatā mama ।। 

bhavān ayam ahaṃ cāyam iti mithyaiva vibhramaḥ ।
ko dehaḥ ko apy adeho vāpy apāravapuṣaś citaḥ ।। 

varākāḥ pelavadhiyo babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ ।
ye sāmrājyam idaṃ tyaktvā remire arthavibhūtiṣu ।। 

kveyaṃ kila mahādṛṣṭir bharitā brahmabṛṃhitā ।
kva sarīsṛpabhīmābhī ratī rājyavibhūtibhiḥ ।। 

anantānantasambhogā paropaśamaśālinī ।
śuddheyaṃ cinmayī dṛṣṭir jayaty akhiladṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

sarvabhāvāntarasthāya cetyamuktacidātmane ।
pratyakcetanarūpāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

jayāmy aham ahaṃ jāto jīrṇasaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
prāptaḥ prāpto mayātmāyaṃ jīvāmi ca jayāmi ca ।। 

idam uttamasāmrājyaṃ bodhaṃ santyajya śāśvatam ।
na rame aham aramyāsu rājyaduḥkhavibhūtiṣu ।। 

dāruvāridṛṣanmātre lulubhe yo dharātale ।
dhig varākam anātmajñaṃ taṃ pitāmahakīṭakam ।। 

avidyaikātmabhir dravyair avidyāmayam ājyapam ।
ajñena santarpayatā kiṃ nāma guruṇā kṛtam ।। 

varṣāṇi katicit prāpya jagadgrāmaṭikām imām ।
kiṃ nāma prāpad ucitaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kila ।। 

anāsvādya śamānandaṃ jagadrājyaśatāny api ।
samāsvādayatā neha kiñcid āsvāditaṃ bhavet ।। 

na kiñcid yena samprāptaṃ tenedaṃ paramāmṛtam ।
samprāpyāntaḥ prapūrṇena sarvaṃ prāptam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

tyaktāmitapado mūrkho mitam eti na paṇḍitaḥ ।
uṣṭro hi tyaktasulataḥ kaṇṭakaṃ yāti netaraḥ ।। 

parāṃ dṛṣṭim imāṃ tyaktvā dagdharājye rameta kaḥ ।
kas tyaktekṣurasaḥ prājñaḥ kaṭunimbapayaḥ pibet ।। 

mūrkhā eva hi te sarve babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ ।
imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ parityajya ye ratā rājyasaṅkaṭe ।। 

kva phullā nandanasthalyaḥ kva dagdhā marubhūmayaḥ ।
kvemā bodhadṛśaś śāntāḥ kva bhogeṣv ātmabuddhayaḥ ।। 

na kiñcid asti trailokye yad rājyam abhivāñchyate ।
sarvaṃ cāsty eva cittattve tat kasmān nānubhūyate ।। 

citā sarvasthayā svacchasamayā nirvikārayā ।
sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvatas sādhu labhyate ।। 

bhānavī taijasī śaktir amṛtasrutir aindavī ।
brāhmī mahattā mahatī śākrī trailokyarājatā ।। 

paramā pūrṇatā śārvī jayalakṣmīś ca vaiṣṇavī ।
mānasī śīghragamitā balavattā tu vāyavī ।। 

āgneyī dāhakalanā pāyasī rasanirvṛtiḥ ।
maunī mahātapassiddhir vidyā bārhaspatī tathā ।। 

vaimānikī vyomagatā sthiratāpi ca pārvatī ।
gambhīratātha sāmudrī mairavī ca mahonnatiḥ ।। 

samaśrīs saugatī somyā mādanī madalolatā ।
mādhavī puṣpamayatā śāradī ghanasasyatā ।। 

yākṣī ca māyāmayatā nābhasī niṣkalaṅkatā ।
śītatāpi ca tauṣārī naidāghī tāpataptatā ।। 

etāś cānyās tathā bahvyo deśakālakriyātmikāḥ ।
nānākāravikārotthās trikālodarasaṃsthitāḥ ।। 

vicitrāś śaktayas svacchasamayā nirvikārayā ।
citā kriyante parayā kalākalanamuktayā ।। 

vikalpahīnā cit sarvapadārthaśatadṛṣṭiṣu ।
samam evābhipatati prabhā prābhākarī yathā ।। 

sarvāśākośaviśrāntāṃ padārthapaṭalīṃ mahī ।
kālatrayehākalitāṃ yathānubhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

tathā samastasaṃsārabṛhaddṛśyadaśāśriyam ।
kālatrayasthām amalā cic cinoti tatātmikā ।। 

tulyakālaparāmṛṣṭatrikālakalanāśatā ।
anantānubhavābhogā paripūrṇaiva śuddhacit ।। 

parāmṛṣṭatrikālāyā dṛṣṭānantadṛśaś citaḥ ।
samatāparaparyāyā pūrṇataivāvaśiṣyate ।। 

tulyakālāvabuddhena mṛdunā kaṭunā ca cit ।
samena samatām eti madhuniṣṭhānubhūtivat ।। 

tyaktasaṅkalpakalayā sūkṣmayā cidavasthayā ।
sarvabhāvānugatayā sattādvaitaikarūpayā ।। 

vicitrāpi padārthaśrīr anyo'nyavalitāntarā ।
tulyakālānubhavanāt sāmyenaivānubhūyate ।। 

bhāvena bhāvam āśritya bhāvas tyajati duḥkhitām ।
prekṣya bhāvam abhāvena bhāvas tyajati tuṣṭatām ।। 

kālatrayam upekṣitryā hīnāyāś cetyabandhanaiḥ ।
citaś cetyam upekṣitryās samataivāvaśiṣyate ।। 

yāti vācām agamyatvād asattām iva śāśvatīm ।
nairātmyasiddhāntadaśām upayāteva tiṣṭhati ।। 

bhavaty ātmā tathā brahma nakiñcic cākhilaṃ ca vā ।
paramopaśame līnā mokṣanāmnā parocyate ।। 

saṅkalpakalitā tv eṣā mandābhāsatayā jagat ।
na samyak paśyatīdaṃ cid dṛṣṭiḥ paṭalinī yathā ।। 

īhānīhāmayair antar yā cid āvalitā malaiḥ ।
sā hi notpatituṃ śaktā pāśabaddheva pakṣiṇī ।। 

saṅkalpakalanenaiva ye kecana janā ime ।
patitā mohajāleṣu vinetrā iva pakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpajālavalitair viṣayāvaṭapātibhiḥ ।
padavī gatabādheyaṃ na dṛṣṭā matpitāmahaiḥ ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva sphuritvā dharaṇītale ।
varākās tena te naṣṭā maṣakāḥ kuhareṣv iva ।। 

ajñāsyan yadi te tattvaṃ bhogaduḥkhārthinas tataḥ ।
bhāvābhāvāndhakūpeṣu nāpatiṣyan hatāśayāḥ ।। 

icchādveṣasamutthena dvandvamohena jantavaḥ ।
dharāvivaramagnānāṃ kīṭānāṃ samatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

īhitānīhitākārā kalanāmṛgatṛṣṇikā ।
satyāvabodhameghena yasya śāntā sa jīvati ।। 

kutaḥ kilāsyāś śuddhāyā avicchinnāmalākṛteḥ ।
candrikāyā rucaḥ koṣṇāḥ kalaṅkakalanāś citaḥ ।। 

ātmane astu namo mahyam avicchinnacidātmane ।
lokālokamaṇe deva cireṇādhigato asy aho ।। 

parāmṛṣṭo asi labdho asi prodito asi cirāya ca ।
uddhṛto asi vikalpebhyo yo asi so asi namo astu te ।। 

mahyaṃ tubhyam anantāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ śivātmane ।
namo devātidevāya parāya paramātmane ।। 

gataghanam iva pūrṇam indubimbaṃ gatakalanāvaraṇaṃ svam eva rūpam ।
svavapuṣi muditaṃ svayaṃ svasaṃsthaṃ svayam uditaṃ svarasaṃ svayaṃ namāmi ।। 

prahlādopadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśas sargaḥ

prahlādaḥ

om ity ākāritākāro vikāraparivarjitaḥ ।
ātmaivāyaṃ idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñcij jagatīgatam ।। 

medo'sthimāṃsamajjāsṛgatīto apy eṣa cetanaḥ ।
antarastho api sūryādīn prakāśayati dīpakaḥ ।। 

uṣṇīkaroti dahanaṃ rasayaty amṛto rasaṃ ।
indriyānubhavān bhuṅkte bhogān iva mahīpatiḥ ।। 

tiṣṭhann api hi nāsīno gacchann api na gacchati ।
śānto api vyavahārasthaḥ kurvann api na lipyate ।। 

pūrvam adya tathedānīm ihāmutrobhayatra ca ।
pihito apihito apy eṣa samas sarvāsu vṛttiṣu ।। 

udbhavanyagbhavābhāvabhāvanābhir itas tataḥ ।
brahmāditṛṇaparyantaṃ jagad āvartayan sthitaḥ ।। 

nityaspandamayo nityam api devāt sadāgateḥ ।
sthāṇor apy akriyo nityam ākāśād apy alepakaḥ ।। 

manāṃsi kṣobhayaty eṣa pallavān iva mārutaḥ ।
vāhayaty akṣapaṅktiṃ vā svāśvālīm iva sārathiḥ ।। 

atiduḥkhitavad dehagehe karmakaras sadā ।
samrāḍ ivātmani svāsthyasaṃsthito bhogabhug vibhuḥ ।। 

eṣa eva sadānveṣyas stutyo dhyātavya eva ca ।
jarāmaraṇasammohād anenottīrya gamyate ।। 

sulabhaś cāyam atyantaṃ sujñeyaś cāptabandhuvat ।
śarīrapadmakuhare sarveṣām eva ṣaṭpadaḥ ।। 

anākṛṣṭo apy anāhūtas svadehād eva labhyate ।
manāg evopahūto api kṣaṇād bhavati sammukhaḥ ।। 

nāsya saṃsevyamānasya sarvasampattiśālinaḥ ।
dhanānām īśvarasyeva smayo garvo atha vā bhavet ।। 

āmoda iva puṣpeṣu tailaṃ tilakaṇeṣv iva ।
rasajātiṣv ivāsvādo devo deheṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

avicāravaśād eṣa hṛdayastho api cetanaḥ ।
na jñāyate cirād dṛṣṭa iṣṭabandhur ivāgragaḥ ।। 

vicāraṇāt parijñāte etasmin parameśvare ।
abhyudeti parānando labdhe priyajane yathā ।। 

asmin dṛṣṭe pare bandhāv uddāmānandadāyini ।
āyānti dṛṣṭayas tās tā yābhir bandho vilīyate ।। 

truṭyanti sarvataḥ pāśāḥ kṣīyante sarvaśatravaḥ ।
na kṛntanti manāṃsy āśā gṛhāṇīva durākhavaḥ ।। 

asmin dṛṣṭe jagad dṛṣṭaṃ śrute asmin sakalaṃ śrutam ।
spṛṣṭe cāsmiñ jagat spṛṣṭaṃ sthite asmin saṃsthitaṃ jagat ।। 

eṣa jāgarti suptānāṃ praharaty avivekinām ।
haraty āpadam ārtānāṃ vitaraty amahātmanām ।। 

vicaraty eṣa lokeṣu dīpa eva jagatsthitau ।
vilasaty eṣa bhogeṣu prasphuraty eṣa vastuṣu ।। 

ātmanātmānam evāntaś śāntenānubhavan bhavī ।
sthitas sarveṣu deheṣu tiktatvaṃ mariceṣv iva ।। 

cetanākalanārūpī sabāhyābhyantarāśritaḥ ।
jagatpadārthasambhārasattāsāmānyam āsthitaḥ ।। 

eṣa śūnyatvam ākāśe spanda eṣa sadāgatau ।
prakāśaś caiṣa tejassu payasy eṣa rasaḥ paraḥ ।। 

kāṭhinyam avanāv eṣa auṣṇyam eṣa hutāśane ।
śaityam eṣa niśānāthe sattā caiṣa jagadgaṇe ।। 

maṣīpiṇḍe yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śauklyaṃ himakaṇe yathā ।
yathā puṣpeṣu saugandhyaṃ dehe dehapatis tathā ।। 

yathā sarvagatā sattā kālas sarvagato yathā ।
yathā sarvagataṃ vyoma vibhus sarvagatas tathā ।। 

prabhuśaktir mahīpasya sarvadeśagatā yathā ।
rūpālokamanaskāramuktaṃ sattvaṃ tathātmanaḥ ।। 

nityas so ayam ahaṃ devo devānām avabodhakaḥ ।
svayam ātmāsmi me nāsti kalanāvit kiletarā ।। 

reṇunevāṇunā vyomni padmapattra ivāmbhasā ।
sambhrameṇeva pāṣāṇe sambandho mayi nainasā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhaśriyo dehe mā patantu patantu vā ।
tumbakopari dhārāś ca kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā ।। 

dīpāṅgābhigato rajjvā nāloko badhyate yathā ।
tathaivāyam abaddho ahaṃ sarvabhāvagaṇātigaḥ ।। 

sambandhaḥ ko nu naḥ kāmair bhāvābhāvair athendriyaiḥ ।
kena sambadhyate vyoma kena vā gṛhyate manaḥ ।। 

śarīre śatadhā yāte khaṇḍanā kā śarīriṇaḥ ।
kumbhe rugṇe kṣate kṣīṇe kumbhākāśasya kā kṣatiḥ ।। 

piśācaka ivādṛśyo mano nāmoditaṃ mudhā ।
jaḍe tasmin kṣate bodhāt kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhamayī yasya vāsanā tan mano mama ।
abhavat pūrvam adyaikā sampannā nanu nirvṛtiḥ ।। 

anyo bhuṅkte anya ādatte apy anyasyānarthasaṅkaṭaḥ ।
anyaḥ paśyaty aho maurkhyaṃ kasyeyaṃ khalu cakrikā ।। 

bhuṅkte prakṛtir ādatte mano dehasya saṅkaṭaḥ ।
draṣṭātmā maurkhyam astīha na kiñcit keva me kṣatiḥ ।। 

na me bhogasthitau vāñchā na ca bhogavivarjane ।
yad āyāti tad āyātu yat prayāti prayātu tat ।। 

sukheṣu mama nāpekṣā nopekṣā duḥkhavṛttiṣu ।
sukhaduḥkhāny upāyāntu yāntu vāpy aham eṣu kaḥ ।। 

vāsanā vividhā dehe tv astaṃ vodayam eva vā ।
prayāntu nāham etāsu na caitā mama kāścana ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālam ajñānaripuṇoruṇā ।
hṛtvā vivekasarvasvam ekāntam avapothitaḥ ।। 

vaiṣṇavena prasādena svasamutthena cāruṇā ।
idānīṃ svaṃ parijñāya mayaiṣa paripothitaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśāco ayaṃ śarīratarukoṭarāt ।
parāvabodhamantreṇa mayedānīm apākṛtaḥ ।। 

nirahaṅkārayakṣo ayaṃ maccharīramahādrumaḥ ।
puṇyatām alam āyātaḥ praphulta iva rājate ।। 

praśāntamohadāridryo durāśādoṣasaṅkṣaye ।
vivekadhanasambhārāt sthito asmi parameśvaraḥ ।। 

jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭā draṣṭavyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
tat prāptam adhunā yena na prāpyam iha śiṣyate ।। 

diṣṭyā dūrojjhitānarthām apetaviṣayoragām ।
saṃśāntamohanīhārāṃ śāntāśāmṛgatṛṣṇikām ।। 

rajorahitasarvāśāṃ śītalopaśamadrumām ।
prāpto asmi vitatāṃ bhūmim unnatāṃ pāramārthikīm ।। 

stutyā praṇatyā vijñaptyā śamena niyamena ca ।
labdho ayaṃ bhagavān ātmā dṛṣṭaś cādhigatas sphuṭam ।। 

ahaṅkārapadātītaś cirāt saṃsmṛtim āgataḥ ।
svabhāvo bhagavān ātmā viṣṇur brahma sanātanam ।। 

indriyoragagarteṣu maraṇaśvabhrabhūmiṣu ।
tṛṣṇākarañjakuñjeṣu kāmakolāhaleṣu ca ।। 

vāsanāvanajāleṣu janmakūpāntareṣu ca ।
duḥkhadāvāgnidāheṣu duṣkṛtāṅgārabhāriṣu ।। 

pātotpātadaśālakṣair majjanonmajjanabhramaiḥ ।
āvirbhāvatirobhāvair āśāpāśaviveṣṭanaiḥ ।। 

ahaṃ ciram ahaṅkāradviṣā samavapothitaḥ ।
niśāyām alpadhairyātmā piśāceneva jaṅgale ।। 

svayam eva tvayedānīṃ kriyāśaktyā svayaiva hi ।
śaurivāgvyapadeśena vivekaśrīr vibodhitā ।। 

prabuddhe bhavatīśāne tam ahaṅkārarākṣasam ।
na paśyāmi vibho dīpe jvalite timiraṃ yathā ।। 

tasyāhaṅkārayakṣasya manovivaravāsinaḥ ।
dīpasyeva praśāntasya na vedmi gatim īśvara ।। 

dṛṣṭa eva tvayīśāne palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ ।
sampanno madahambhāvaś cauras sūryodaye yathā ।। 

asadabhyutthite tasminn ahaṅkārapiśācake ।
śānte tiṣṭhāmy atisvastho nirgonāsa iva drumaḥ ।। 

śāmyāmi parinirvāmi jāgarmy asmi prabodhavān ।
taskareṇāvamukto asmi nirvṛto asmi cirād ayam ।। 

śaityam abhyāgato asmy antaś śāntāśāmṛgatṛṣṇikaḥ ।
prāvṛḍambubharasnātaś śāntadāva ivācalaḥ ।। 

pramārjite aham ity asmin pade sārthe vicārataḥ ।
ko mohaḥ kāni duḥkhāni kāḥ kadāśāḥ ka ātapaḥ ।। 

narakasvargamokṣādibhramās satyām ahaṅkṛtau ।
bhittāv eva pravartante citrehā na nabhastale ।। 

ahaṅkārakalāpīne citte sāracamatkṛtiḥ ।
na rājate aṃśuke mlāne yathā kuṅkumarañjanā ।। 

nirahaṅkārajalade tṛṣṇāsāravivarjite ।
bhāti cittaśaradvyomni svacchatā kāntiśālinī ।। 

nirahaṅkārapaṅkāya samprasannāntarāya ca ।
mahyam ānandasarase tubhyam ātman namo namaḥ ।। 

gatāhaṅkārameghāya śāntāśādāvavahnaye ।
mahyam ānandaśailāya viśrāntāya namo namaḥ ।। 

śāntendriyogragrāhāya kṣīṇacittaurvavahnaye ।
ānandāmbudhaye tubhyaṃ mahyam ātman namo namaḥ ।। 

praphultānandapadmāya śāntacintāmahormaye ।
mahyam unmānasāyātmaṃs tubhyam antar namo namaḥ ।। 

saṃvidābhāsapakṣāya padmakoṭaravāsine ।
sarvamānasahaṃsāya svātmane antar namo namaḥ ।। 

kalākalitarūpāya niṣkalāyāmitātmane ।
sadoditātipūrṇātmaśaśine te namo namaḥ ।। 

sadoditāya śītāya mahāhṛddhvāntahāriṇe ।
sarvagāyāpy adṛśyāya citsūryāya namo namaḥ ।। 

asnehasnehadīprāya vartyatikrāntavartine ।
svabhāvādhāradhīrāya ciddīpāya namo namaḥ ।। 

mananānalasantaptaṃ śītena manasā manaḥ ।
chinnam antar mayā taptam ayaseva balād ayaḥ ।। 

indriyair indriyaṃ chittvā chittvā ca manasā manaḥ ।
ahaṅkṛtim ahaṅkṛtyā chittvā śeṣo jayāmy aham ।। 

bhāvena bhāvam āmṛdya cchittvā tṛṣṇām atṛṣṇayā ।
niṣpiṣya prajñayāprajñāṃ jñe ajñas saṃyojito mayā ।। 

manasā manasi cchinne nirahaṅkāratāṃ gate ।
bhāvena galite bhāve svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ ।। 

nirbhāvaṃ nirahaṅkāram amanaskam anīhitam ।
kevalaspandaśuddhātma yantraṃ tiṣṭhati me vapuḥ ।। 

helānukalpitānantaviśvaikavyavasāyinī ।
