paramopaśamopetā jāteyaṃ mama nirvṛtiḥ ।। 

praśāntamohavetālo gatāhaṅkārarākṣasaḥ ।
kadāśārūpikāmukto jāto asmi vigatajvaraḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇārajjugaṇaṃ chittvā maccharīrakapañjarāt ।
na jāne kva gatoḍḍīya durahaṅkṛtipakṣiṇī ।। 

uddhūlite ghanājñānakulāye kāyapādapāt ।
na jāne gata uḍḍīya kvāhambhāvavihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

durāśādīrghadaurātmyā dhūsarā bhogabhasmanā ।
bhayabhogihatā diṣṭyā vayasyā vāsanā mṛtā ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ ko abhūvaṃ cittam īdṛśam ।
yenāham eva mithyaiva dṛḍhāhaṅkāratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

adyāham asmi jāto ayam aham adya mahāmatiḥ ।
ahaṅkāramahābhreṇa yaḥ kṛṣṇenālam ujjhitaḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭo ayam ātmā bhagavān antaś cādhigato mayā ।
ālabdhaś cānubhūto aṅge sānubhūtir niyojitaḥ ।। 

gatāspadaṃ gatamananaṃ gataiṣaṇaṃ tiraskṛtaṃ nipuṇam ahaṅkṛtibhrame ।
nirīhitaṃ vyapagatarāgarañjanaṃ vikautukaṃ praśamam idaṃ gataṃ manaḥ ।। 

duruttarās samaviṣamā mahāpadas sudussahāḥ prabhavanadīrghadoṣadāḥ ।
gatāḥ kṣayaṃ samadhigato maheśvaraś cidavyayo vyapagatacittam antare ।। 

prahlādātmalābhacintā nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśas sargaḥ

prahlādaḥ

ātman sarvapadātīta cirāt saṃsmṛtim āgataḥ ।
diṣṭyā labdho asi bhagavan namas te astu cidātmane ।। 

abhivandyāvalokyāyam alam āliṅgyase mayā ।
ko anyas syād bhagavan bandhus tvadṛte bhuvanatraye ।। 

haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvaṃ stauṣi yāsi vivalgasi ।
ayaṃ prāpto asi dṛṣṭo asi kiṃ karoṣi kva gacchasi ।। 

svasattāpūritāśeṣaviśva viśvajanīna he ।
sarvatra lakṣyase nityam adhunā kva palāyase ।। 

āvayor antaraṃ bhūrijanmavyavahitāntaram ।
adūram adya sampannaṃ diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo asi bāndhava ।। 

namas te kṛtakṛtyāya kartre hartre namo astu te ।
namas saṃsāranṛtyāya nityāya vimalātmane ।। 

namaś cakrābjahastāya namaś candrārdhadhāriṇe ।
namo vibudhanāthāya namas te padmajanmane ।। 

vācyavācakadṛṣṭyaiva bhedo yo ayam ihāvayoḥ ।
asatyā kalpanaivaiṣā vīcivīcyambhasor iva ।। 

tvam evānantayānantavastuvaicitryarūpayā ।
bhāvābhāvavilāsinyā nityayeha vijṛmbhase ।। 

namo draṣṭre namas tvaṣṭre namo anantavikāsine ।
namas sarvasvabhāvāya namas te sarvagāmine ।। 

pratijanma ciraṃ bahvyo dīrghaduḥkhavatā mayā ।
tvayā māyopadagdhena digdhena mahatainasā ।। 

ālokitā lokadaśā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
na prāptas tvaṃ tvayā yena kiñcid āsāditaṃ bhavet ।। 

sarvaṃ mṛtkāṣṭhapāṣāṇavārimātram idaṃ jagat ।
nehāsti tvadṛte deva yatprāptau nābhivāñchyate ।। 

devāyam adya labdho asi dṛṣṭo asy adhigato asi ca ।
samprāpto asi gṛhīto asi namas te astu na mucyase ।। 

yo akṣṇoḥ kanīnikāraśmijālaprotavapus sthitaḥ ।
devo darśanarūpeṇa kathaṃ so antar na dṛśyate ।। 

yas tvakpuṣpe spṛśan sparśagandhaṃ tailaṃ tile yathā ।
sparśam antaḥ karoty eṣa sa kathaṃ nānubhūyate ।। 

yaś śabdaśravaṇād antaś śabdaśaktiṃ parāmṛśan ।
romāñcaṃ janayaty aṅge sa dūrasthaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

jihvāpallavalagnāni svatītasyāṅgato api ca ।
svadante yasya vastūni svadate sa na kasya vā ।। 

puṣpagandhān upādāya ghrāṇahastena dehakam ।
ya ālepayati prītyā kasyāsau na mukhe sthitaḥ ।। 

vedavedāntasiddhāntatarkapaurāṇagītibhiḥ ।
yo gītas sa kathaṃ hy ātmā vijñāto yāti vismṛtim ।। 

saiveha deva bhogālī subhagāpīyam adya me ।
antar na svadate svacche tvayi dṛṣṭe parāpare ।। 

tvayā vimaladīpena bhānuḥ prakaṭatāṃ gataḥ ।
tvayā śītatuṣāreṇa candraś śiśiratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

tvayaite guravaś śailās tvayaite dyucarā dhṛtāḥ ।
tvayaiveyaṃ dharā dhīrā tvayaivāmbaram ambaram ।। 

diṣṭyā mattām asi prāpto diṣṭyā tvattām ahaṃ gataḥ ।
ahaṃ tvaṃ tvam ahaṃ deva diṣṭyā bhedo asti nāvayoḥ ।। 

ahaṃ tvam iti śabdābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ mahātmanaḥ ।
tava vā mama vā sādho sampṛktābhyāṃ namo namaḥ ।। 

namo mahyam anantāya nirahaṅkārarūpiṇe ।
namo mahyam arūpāya namaś śamanasadmane ।। 

mayy ātmani same svacche sākṣibhūte nirākṛtau ।
dikkālādyanavacchinne svātmany eveha tiṣṭhati ।। 

manaḥ prakṣobham āyāti sphurantīndriyasaṃvidaḥ ।
śaktir ullasati sphārā prāṇāpānapravāhinī ।। 

vahanti dehayantrāṇi kṛṣṭāny āśāvaratrayā ।
carmamāṃsāsthidigdhāni manassārathimanti ca ।। 

ayaṃ saṃvidvapur ahaṃ na kvacin na kṛtāspadaḥ ।
dehaḥ patatu vodetu svayābhimatayecchayā ।। 

cirād aham ahaṃ jātas svātmalābhaś cirād ayam ।
cirād upaśamaṃ yāmi kalpasyānte jagad yathā ।। 

cirāt saṃsāragāmitvād dīrghasaṃsāravartmani ।
viśrānto asmi ciraśrāntaḥ kalpasyānta ivānilaḥ ।। 

sarvātītāya sarvāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ namo namaḥ ।
tebhyo api ca namo astv eva ye tvāṃ māṃ pravadanti vā ।। 

akhilānantasambhogā na spṛṣṭā doṣadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
jayaty akṛtasambhārā sākṣitā paramātmanaḥ ।। 

ātman puṣpa ivāmodaś śastrapiṇḍa ivānalaḥ ।
tile tailam ivāsmiṃs tvaṃ sarvatra vapuṣi sthitaḥ ।। 

haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvam avasphūrjasi valgasi ।
anahaṅkṛtirūpo api citreyaṃ tava māyitā ।। 

jayasīśa jvaladdīptis sarvam unmīlayañ jagat ।
jayasy apagatārambhaṃ jagad bhūyo nimīlayan ।। 

paramāṇos tavaivāntar idaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।
vaṭaś ca vaṭadhānāyāṃ babhūvāsti bhaviṣyati ।। 

hayadviparathākārair yadvat khe dṛśyate ambudaḥ ।
tadvad ālakṣyase deva padārthaśatavibhramaiḥ ।। 

bhavānāṃ bhūribhaṅgānām abhāvāya bhavādhipaḥ ।
bhava bhāvavimuktātmā bhāvābhāvabahiṣkṛtaḥ ।। 

jahi mānaṃ madaṃ kopaṃ kāluṣyaṃ krūratāṃ tathā ।
na mahānto nimajjanti prākṛte guṇasaṅkaṭe ।। 

prāktanīr dīrghadaurātmyadaśās smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ ।
ko ahaṃ kiṃ tad babhūveti hasa muktācchaṭāsitam ।। 

te prayātās samārambhā gatās te dagdhavāsarāḥ ।
yeṣu cintānalajvālājālajīrṇo bhavān abhūt ।। 

adya tvaṃ dehanagare rājā sphāramanorathaḥ ।
na duḥkhair gṛhyase nāpi sukhair vyoma karair iva ।। 

adyendriyaduraśvāṃs tvaṃ jitvā jitamanogajaḥ ।
bhogārīn abhito bhaṅktvā sāmrājyam adhitiṣṭhasi ।। 

apārāmbarapānthas tvam ajasrāstamayodayaḥ ।
avabhāsakaro nityaṃ bahir antaś ca bhāskaraḥ ।। 

sarvadaivāsi saṃsuptaś śaktyā saṃvedyase vibho ।
bhogālokanalīlārthaṃ kāminyā kāmuko yathā ।। 

dṛkkṣudrābhir upānītaṃ dūrād rūpamadhu tvayā ।
pīyate svīkṛtaṃ śaktyā netravātāyanasthayā ।। 

brahmāṇḍakoṭarodvāntāḥ prāṇāpānacarās tvayā ।
gatāgatair brahmapure samprekṣyante pratikṣaṇam ।। 

dehapuṣpe tvam āmodo dehendau tv amṛtāmṛtam ।
rasas tvaṃ dehaviṭape śaityaṃ dehahime bhavān ।। 

tvayy asti cinmayas snehaś śarīrakṣīrasarpiṣi ।
tvam antar asya dehasya dāruṇy agnir iva sthitaḥ ।। 

tvam apām uttamāsvādaḥ prākāśyaṃ tejasām api ।
avagantā tvam arthānāṃ tvaṃ bhāsām avabhāsakaḥ ।। 

spandas tvaṃ sarvavāyūnāṃ tvaṃ manohastino madaḥ ।
prajñānalaśikhāyās tvaṃ prākāśyaṃ taikṣṇyam eva ca ।। 

tvadvaśād dīpavan māyā kvāpi sampravilīyate ।
dīpavat punar anyatra samudeti kuto api sā ।। 

tvayi saṃsāravartinyaḥ padārthāvalayas tathā ।
kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrayuktayaḥ kanake yathā ।। 

bhavān ayam ayaṃ cāhaṃ tvaṃ śabdair evamādibhiḥ ।
svayam evātmanātmānaṃ līlayā stauṣi vakṣi ca ।। 

mandānilavinunno abdo gajāśvanaradṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
yathā saṃlakṣyate vyomni tathā tvaṃ bhūtadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

yathā hayagajākārair jvālā lasati vahniṣu ।
tathaivāvyatiriktas tvaṃ dṛśyair vasasi sṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

tvaṃ brahmāṇḍakamuktānām acchinnas tantur ātataḥ ।
kṣetraṃ tvaṃ bhūtasasyānāṃ cidrasāyanasekinām ।। 

asat tad anabhivyaktaṃ padārthānāṃ prakāśyate ।
tvayā tattvaṃ yathā paktrā māṃsānāṃ svādavedanam ।। 

vidyamānāpi vastuśrīr na sthitā tvayi na sthite ।
vanitārūpalāvaṇyasatteva gatacakṣuṣaḥ ।। 

sad apīha na sattāyai vastu nākalitaṃ tvayā ।
tuṣṭaye na svalāvaṇyaṃ makurāpratibimbitam ।। 

luṭhati tvāṃ vinā dehaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau ।
sann apy asattayaivātto yāmāsv iva raviṃ vinā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhakramaḥ prāpya bhavantaṃ parinaśyati ।
prākāśyam āsādya yathā tamas tejo atha vā himam ।। 

tvadālokanayaivaite sthitiṃ yānti sukhādayaḥ ।
sūryālokanayā prātar varṇāś śuklādayo yathā ।। 

labdhātmāno vinaśyanti sambandhakṣaṇa eva te ।
te tamāṃsīva dīpasya dṛṣṭāv eva vrajanty alam ।। 

tamastā tamaso dīpāsattāyāṃ sphuṭatāṃ gatā ।
dīpasambandhasamaye sā cotpatya vinaśyati ।। 

tathaiva sukhaduḥkhaśrīr dṛṣṭvaiva tvām anāmayam ।
jāyate jātamātraiva sarvanāśena naśyati ।। 

bhaṅguratvād iha sthātuṃ kālaṃ nāṇum api kṣamā ।
nimeṣalakṣabhāgākhyā tanvī kālakalā yathā ।। 

gatvarī naśvarī tanvī sukhaduḥkhādibhāvanā ।
sphurati tvatprasādena tvayi dṛṣṭe vilīyate ।। 

tvadālokakṣaṇodbhūtā tvadālokakṣaṇakṣayā ।
mṛtaiva jātā jātaiva mṛtā kenopalakṣyate ।। 

kṣaṇam apy asthiraṃ vastu kathaṃ kāryakaraṃ bhavet ।
taraṅgair utpalākārair mālā katham ivombhyate ।। 

yadi jātavinirnaṣṭaṃ kriyāṃ vastv akariṣyata ।
tadāraṃsyata loko ayaṃ mālāṃ kṛtvā taḍidguṇaiḥ ।। 

imāṃ sukhādikāṃ lakṣmīṃ vivekijanacetasi ।
sthitas san naiva gṛhṇāsi na jahāsi samasthite ।। 

avivekini yo asi tvaṃ sa bhavātman yadṛcchayā ।
tadrūpakathanenālaṃ mamāmalapadāspada ।। 

nirīheṇa niraṃśena nirahaṅkṛtinā tvayā ।
sataivāpy asatevāpi kartṛtvam urarīkṛtam ।। 

jaya proḍḍāmarākāra jaya śāntiparāyaṇa ।
jaya sarvāgamātīta jaya sarvāgamāspada ।। 

jaya jāta jayājāta jaya kṣata jayākṣata ।
jaya bhāva jayābhāva jaya jeya jayājaya ।। 

ullasāmy upaśāmyāmi tiṣṭhāmy atigato asmi ca ।
jayī jayāmi jīvāmi namo mahyaṃ namo astu te ।। 

tvayi sthite mayi vigatāmayātmani svasaṃsthitau vyapagatarāgarañjane ।
kva bandhavaḥ kva ca vipadaḥ kva sampado bhavābhavau kva śamam upaimi śāśvatam ।। 

prahlādopākhyāna ātmasaṃstavanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti sañcintayann eva prahlādaḥ paravīrahā ।
nirvikalpaṃ parānandasamādhiṃ samupāyayau ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhisthaś citrārpita ivācalaḥ ।
śailād iva samutkīrṇo babhau svapadam āsthitaḥ ।। 

tathātha tiṣṭhatas tasya kālo bahutaro yayau ।
sve gṛhe bhuvanasthasya meror iva suradviṣaḥ ।। 

bodhito apy asurādhīśair nābudhyata mahāmatiḥ ।
akāle bahuseko api bījakośād ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi pīnāṃso atiṣṭhad ekadṛk ।
śānta evāsurapure mattārṇava ivopalaḥ ।। 

parānandadaśaikāntapariṇāmitayā tayā ।
nirānandam anābhāsam ivābhāsapadaṃ gataḥ ।। 

etāvatātha kālena tadrasātalamaṇḍalam ।
babhūvārājakaṃ tīkṣṇamātsyanyāyakadarthitam ।। 

hiraṇyakaśipau kṣīṇe samādhau tatsute sthite ।
na babhūvāparaḥ kaścid rājā danusutālaye ।। 

asureśārthināṃ teṣāṃ dānavānāṃ samādhitaḥ ।
pareṇāpi prayatnena prahlādo na vyabudhyata ।। 

na prāpur vikasadrūpaṃ patiṃ tatrāmarārayaḥ ।
lasatpattraprabhājālaṃ niśi padmam ivālayaḥ ।। 

saṃvidvāto na tasyāntar abudhyata vicetasaḥ ।
bhuvaś ceṣṭākrama iva pauruṣo gatabhāsvataḥ ।। 

athodvigneṣu daityeṣu gateṣv abhimatā diśaḥ ।
vicaratsu yathākāmam arājani pure pure ।। 

pātālamaṇḍalam abhūd abhūpālatayā tayā ।
mātsyanyāyaviparyastam astaṅgataguṇakramam ।। 

balibhuktābalapuraṃ maryādākramavarjitam ।
sarvagāśeṣavanitaṃ parasparahatāsuram ।। 

pralāpākrandaparuṣaṃ visaṃsthānapurāntaram ।
luṭhadudyānanagaraṃ vyarthānarthakadarthitam ।। 

cintāparāsuragaṇaṃ nirannaphalabāndhavam ।
akāṇḍotpātavivaśaṃ dhvastāśāmukhamaṇḍalam ।। 

surārbhakaparābhūtaṃ bhūtair ākrāntam anyajaiḥ ।
bhūtariktam alakṣmīkam utsannaprāyakoṭaram ।। 

aniyatavanitārthamattayuddhaṃ hṛtadhanadāravirāvitaṃ samantāt ।
kaliyugasamayodbhaṭodarābhaṃ tad asuramaṇḍalam ākulaṃ babhūva ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne asurapuravibhraṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athākhilajagajjālakramapālanadevanaḥ ।
kṣīrodanagare śeṣaśayyāsanagato hariḥ ।। 

prāvṛṇnidrāvyuparame devārtham arisūdanaḥ ।
dhiyā vilokayām āsa kadācij jāgatīṃ sthitim ।। 

traiviṣṭapaṃ svamanasā pārthivaṃ cāvalokya saḥ ।
ācāram ājagāmāśu pātālam aripālitam ।। 

tatra sthirasamādhānasthite prahlādadānave ।
dṛṣṭvāpadam arīndrasya pure prauḍhim upāgatām ।। 

vyālatalpatalasthasya kṣīrodārṇavaśāyinaḥ ।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇer dehasyāntaracāriṇā ।। 

padmāsanasthasya manaśśarīreṇātibhāsvatā ।
idaṃ sañcintayām āsa trailokyābjamahālinā ।। 

prahlāde padaviśrānte pātāle gatanāyake ।
kaṣṭaṃ sṛṣṭir iyaṃ prāyo nirdaityatvam upāgatā ।। 

daityābhāve suraśreṇī nirjigīṣupadaṃ gatā ।
śamam eṣyaty adṛṣṭābdapaṭaleva sarid varā ।। 

mokṣākhyaṃ vigatadvandvaṃ tato yāsyati tat padam ।
kṣīṇābhimānā virasā lateva pariśuṣkatām ।। 

devaughe śāntim āyāte bhuvi yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ ।
adevatvaphalās sarvāś śamam eṣyanty asaṃśayam ।। 

kriyāsv athopaśāntāsu bhūloko astam upaiṣyati ।
asaṃsāraprasaṅgo atha śeṣo apy artho bhaviṣyati ।। 

ākalpāntaṃ tribhuvanaṃ yad idaṃ nirmitaṃ mayā ।
layam eṣyaty akāle tat tāpe himakaṇo yathā ।। 

kim evam asminn ābhāse vilīya kṣayam āgate ।
kṛtaṃ mayeha bhavati svalīlākṣayakāriṇā ।। 

tato aham api śūnye asmin naṣṭacandrārkatārake ।
vapuḥpraśāntim ādāya sthitim eṣyāmi tatpade ।। 

akāṇḍa evam evaṃ hi jagaty upaśamaṃ gate ।
neha śreyo anupaśyāmi manye jīvantu dānavāḥ ।। 

daityodvegena vibudhās tato yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ ।
tena saṃsārasaṃsthānam asaṃsārakramo anyathā ।। 

tasmād rasātalaṃ gatvā yathāvat sthāpayāmy aham ।
sve krame dānavādhīśam ṛtuḥ punar iva drumam ।। 

vinā prahlādam atha ced itaraṃ dānaveśvaram ।
karomi tad asau manye devān utsādayiṣyati ।। 

prahlādasya tv ayaṃ dehaḥ paścimaḥ pāvano mahān ।
ākalpam iha vastavyaṃ dehenānena tena ca ।। 

evaṃ hi niyatir daivī niścitā pārameśvarī ।
prahlādena yathākalpaṃ sthātavyam iha dehinā ।। 

tasmāt tam eva gatvāśu daityendraṃ bodhayāmy aham ।
garjan giridarīsuptaṃ mayūram iva vāridaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktasamādhisthaḥ karotv asuranāthatām ।
maṇir muktamanaskāraḥ pratibimbakriyām iva ।। 

na vinaśyati sargo ayam evaṃ saha surāsuraiḥ ।
bhaviṣyati ca nādvandvaṃ tan me krīḍā bhaviṣyati ।। 

sargakṣayodayāv etau susamau mama yady api ।
tathāpīdaṃ yathāsaṃsthaṃ bhavatv anyena kiṃ mama ।। 

bhāvābhāveṣu yat tulyaṃ tannāśe tatsthitau ca vā ।
yaḥ prayatnaḥ kubuddhitvāt tad vyomahananaṃ bhavet ।। 

tasmāt prayāmi pātālaṃ bodhayāmy asureśvaram ।
sthairyaṃ nayāmi saṃsāraṃ līlāṃ sampādayāmy aham ।। 

asurapuram avāpya proddhatācāraghoraṃ kamalam iva vivasvān daityam udbodhayāmi ।
jagad idam akhilāsthaṃ sthairyam abhyānayāmi ghanavidhir iva śaile cañcalaṃ meghajālam ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne parameśvaravitarko nāma sargaḥ

ekonacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti sañcintya sarvātmā kṣīrodād rāma tatpuram ।
cacāla parivāreṇa saha sābhra ivācalaḥ ।। 

kṣīrodatalarandhreṇa tenaiva stambhitāmbhasā ।
prahlādanagaraṃ prāpa śakralokam ivāparam ।। 

hemamandirakośasthaṃ dadarśātrāsuraṃ hariḥ ।
atha śailaguhālīnaṃ samādhistham ivābjajam ।। 

tatra te tejasā daityā vaiṣṇavenāvadhūnitāḥ ।
dūraṃ yayur dineśāṃśuvitrastā iva kauśikāḥ ।। 

dvitrais sahāsurair mukhyaiḥ parivārayuto hariḥ ।
praviveśāsuragṛhaṃ tārāvān iva khaṃ śaśī ।। 

vainateyāsanastho asau lakṣmīvidhutacāmaraḥ ।
svāyudhādiparīvāro devarṣiparivanditaḥ ।। 

mahātman samprabudhyasvety evaṃ viṣṇur udāharan ।
pāñcajanyaṃ pradadhvāna dhvanayan kakubhāṃ gaṇam ।। 

mahatā tena śabdena vaiṣṇavaprāṇajanmanā ।
tulyakālaṃ parikṣubdhakalpābhrārṇavaraṃhasā ।। 

āsurī janatā bhūmau papātāgatasambhramā ।
mattanīlābhranādena rājahaṃsāvalī yathā ।। 

jahṛṣe janitānandā vaiṣṇavī vītasambhramā ।
janatā jaladadhvānaphulleva kuṭajāvalī ।। 

babhūva samprabuddhātmā dānaveśaś śanaiś śanaiḥ ।
meghāravalasatpuṣpaḥ kadamba iva kānane ।। 

brahmarandhrakṛtotthānā prāṇaśaktir athāsuram ।
śanair ākramayām āsa gaṅgā sarvam ivārṇavam ।। 

kṣaṇād ākramayām āsa prāṇaśrīs sarvato asuram ।
udayānantaraṃ saurī prabheva bhuvanāntaram ।। 

prāṇeṣu randhranavake pravṛtteṣv atha tasya cit ।
cetyonmukhī babhūvāntaḥ prāṇadarpaṇabimbitā ।। 

cetanīyonmukhe cittve cin manastām upāyayau ।
dvitvaṃ makurasaṅkrāntā mukhaśrīr iva rāghava ।। 

kiñcid aṅkurite citte netre vikasanonmukhe ।
śanair babhūvatus tasya prātar nīle yathotpale ।। 

prāṇāpānaparāmṛṣṭanāḍīvivarasaṃvidaḥ ।
vātārtasyeva padmasya spando asya samajāyata ।। 

nimeṣāntaramātreṇa manaḥ pīvaratāṃ yayau ।
tasmin prāṇavaśāt pūrṇe taraṅga iva vāriṇi ।। 

athāsau vikasannetramanaḥprāṇavapur babhau ।
ardhodita ivāditye saras sphuritapaṅkajam ।। 

tasminn avasare yāvad budhyasvety avadat prabhuḥ ।
prabuddhas tāvad eṣo abhūd barhī ghanaravād iva ।। 

praphultanayanaṃ jātamananaṃ pīvarasmṛtim ।
uvācainaṃ trilokeśaḥ purā nābhyabjajaṃ yathā ।। 

sādho smara mahālakṣmīm ātmīyāṃ smara cākṛtim ।
akāṇḍa eva kiṃ dehavirāmaḥ kriyate tvayā ।। 

heyopādeyasaṅkalpavihīnasya śarīragaiḥ ।
bhāvābhāvais tavārthaḥ kas tiṣṭhottiṣṭhasva samprati ।। 

sthātavyam iha dehena kalpaṃ yāvad anena te ।
vayaṃ hi niyatiṃ vidmo yathābhūtām anindita ।। 

jīvanmuktena bhavatā rājya eveha tiṣṭhatā ।
kṣapaṇīyā gatodvegam ākalpāntam iyaṃ tanuḥ ।। 

tanau kalpāntaśīrṇāyāṃ sve mahimni tvayānagha ।
vastavyaṃ sphuṭite kumbhe kumbhākāśena khe yathā ।। 

kalpāntasthāyinī śuddhā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarā ।
iyaṃ tava tanur jātā jīvanmuktivilāsinī ।। 

noditā dvādaśādityā na vilīnās śiloccayāḥ ।
na jagaj jvalitaṃ sādho tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

vāyur vahati nonmattas trilokībhasmadhūsaraḥ ।
lolāmarakapālāṅkas tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

aśoka iva mañjaryaḥ puṣkarāvartavidyutaḥ ।
na sphuranti jagatkośe tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

dhārāsāraraṇacchailāḥ prajvalajjvalanojjvalāḥ ।
kakubho na viśīryante tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

na brahmaviṣṇurudrākhyatrayaśeṣam idaṃ jagat ।
sthitaṃ jaraḍhajīmūtaṃ tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

sphuṭadadrīndraṭāṅkārakarālārāvavanti khe ।
kalpābhrāṇi na garjanti tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

ahaṃ bhūtāvakīrṇāsu sālokāsu khagadhvajaḥ ।
viharāmi daśāśāsu mā deham avadhīraya ।। 

ime vayam ime śailā bhūtānīmāny ayaṃ bhavān ।
idaṃ jagad idaṃ vyoma mā deham avadhīraya ।। 

pīvarājñānayogena yasya paryākulaṃ manaḥ ।
duḥkhāni vinikṛntanti maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

kṛśo atiduḥkhī mūḍho aham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ ।
matiṃ yasyāvalumpanti maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

āśāpāśanibaddho antar itaś cetaś ca nīyate ।
yo vilolamanovṛttyā maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

yasya tṛṣṇāḥ prabhañjanti hṛdayaṃ hṛtabhāvanāḥ ।
kugeham iva gargaṭyo maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

cittavṛttilatā yasya tālottālamanovane ।
phalitā sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

romarājilatājālaṃ yasyemaṃ dehadurdrumam ।
anarthaugho haraty uccair maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

yasya svadehavipinam ādhivyādhidavāgnayaḥ ।
dahanti lolāṅgalataṃ maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

kāmakopātmako yasya sphuraty ajagaras tanau ।
antaś śuṣkadrumasyeva maraṇaṃ tasya rājate ।। 

yo ayaṃ dehaparityāgas tal loke maraṇaṃ smṛtam ।
na satā nāsatā tena kāraṇaṃ vedyavedinām ।। 

yasya notkrāmati matis svātmatattvāvalokanāt ।
yathārthadarśino jñasya jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate ।
yas samas sarvabhāveṣu jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

yo antaśśītalayā buddhyā rāgadveṣavimuktayā ।
sākṣivat paśyatīdaṃ hi jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

yena samyak parijñāya heyopādeyam ujjhatā ।
cittasyānte arpitaṃ cittaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

avastusadṛśe vastuny astasaṅkalpanāmale ।
yenālīnaṃ kṛtaṃ ceto jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya līlayeyaṃ jagatkriyā ।
kriyate avāsanaṃ yena jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

nāntas tuṣyati nodvegam eti yo viharann api ।
heyopādeyasamprāptau jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

śuddhapakṣaś ca śuddhaś ca haṃsaughas saraso yathā ।
yasmād guṇaugho niryāti jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

yasmiñ śrutipathaṃ yāte dṛṣṭe smṛtim upāgate ।
ānandaṃ yānti bhūtāni jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate ।। 

yasyodayena hṛdayeṣu janāmbujāni jīvālimanti sakalāni vikāsavanti ।
tasyāvabhāti cirajīvitam akṣayendor āpūrṇateva danujeśvara netarasya ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne nārāyaṇavacanopanyāsayogo nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśas sargaḥ

bhagavān

sthairyaṃ dehasya dṛṣṭasya jīvitaṃ procyate budhaiḥ ।
dehāntarārthaṃ dehasya santyāgo maraṇaṃ smṛtam ।। 

dvābhyām evāsi pakṣābhyām ābhyāṃ mukto mahāmate ।
kiṃ te maraṇam astīha kiṃ vā jīvitam asti te ।। 

nidarśanārtham etat tu mayoktam arimardana ।
na tvaṃ jīvasi sarvajña mriyase na kadācana ।। 

dehasaṃstho apy adehatvād adeho asi videhadṛk ।
vyomasaṃstho apy asaktatvād avyomaiva hi mārutaḥ ।। 

sparśasambodhakāritvād deha evāsi suvrata ।
utsedhārodhakatvena kham utsedhasya kāraṇam ।। 

prabuddho jñātavastutvād eva tvam asi nāsi ca ।
iyattaikaparicchinnaṃ rūpam ajñeṣu duḥkhitam ।। 

sarvadā sarvam evāsi citprakāśaparaikadhīḥ ।
ko dehaḥ ko apy adehas te yaṃ gṛhṇāsi jahāsi vā ।। 

samudetu vasanto vā vātu vā pralayānilaḥ ।
bhāvābhāvavihīnasya kim abhyāgatam ātmanaḥ ।। 

praluṭhatsv api śaileṣu kalpāgniṣu dahatsv api ।
vahatsūtpātavāteṣv apy ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati ।। 

sarvabhūtāni tiṣṭhantu samam eva prayāntu vā ।
naśyantu vātha vardhantām ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati ।। 

kṣīyate na kṣayaṃ prāpte vardhamāne na vardhate ।
na spandate spandamāne dehe asmin puruṣaḥ paraḥ ।। 

dehasyāham ahaṃ deha iti kṣīṇe api te bhrame ।
tyajāmi na tyajāmīti kiṃ mṛṣā kalanoditā ।। 

idaṃ kṛtvā karomīdam idaṃ tyaktvedam āhare ।
iti tattvavidāṃ tāta saṅkalpās saṅkṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

prabuddhās sarvakartāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti vai navam ।
navasyākaraṇān nityam akartṛtvapadaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

akartṛtvād abhoktṛtvam arthād eva samāgatam ।
saṅgṛhītaṃ kilānuptaṃ keneha bhuvanatraye ।। 

śānte kartṛtvabhoktṛtve śāntir eva hi śiṣyate ।
prauḍhim abhyāgatā saiva muktir ity ucyate budhaiḥ ।। 

prabuddhāś cinmayāś śuddhās sarvam ākramya saṃsthitāḥ ।
kiṃ tyaktaṃ parigṛhṇantu kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tyajantu vā ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhaḥ pramitāvayavikramaḥ ।
hīnaḥ prameyāvayavaiḥ kiṃ gṛhṇātu jahātu kim ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhe kṣīṇe śāntir udety alam ।
sthitim abhyāgatā sāntar mokṣanāmnābhidhīyate ।। 

tatra sthitās sadā santas tvādṛśāḥ puruṣottamāḥ ।
suṣuptāvayavaspandasādharmyeṇa caranti hi ।। 

parāvabodhaviśrāntavāsanā jāgatīṃ sthitim ।
ardhasuptā ivehemāṃ paśyanty ātmasthayā dhiyā ।। 

na ramanti hi ramyeṣu svātmany ekagatāśayāḥ ।
nodvijante ca duḥkheṣu svātmany ekarasā yataḥ ।। 

nityaprabuddhā gṛhṇanti kāryāṇīmāny asaṅginaḥ ।
makurā iva bimbāni yathāprāptāny avāñchayā ।। 

jāgrati svātmani svasthās suptās saṃsārasaṃsthitau ।
bālavat praviceṣṭante suṣuptasadṛśāśayāḥ ।। 

tvam ajitapadavīm upāgato antaḥ kamalajavāsaram ekam eva bhuktvā ।
guṇagaṇakalitām ihaiva lakṣmīṃ vraja paramāspadam acyutaṃ mahātman ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne prahlādabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jagadratnasamudgena trailokyādbhutadarśinā ।
ity ukte padmanābhena jyotsnāśītalayā girā ।। 

prahlādanāmā deho asau vikāsinayanāmbujaḥ ।
mṛdūvāca vaco dhīro gṛhītamananakramaḥ ।। 

prahlādaḥ

ciram antar mayā deva dṛṣṭo asy amalayā dhiyā ।
punar bahir ayaṃ dṛṣṭyā diṣṭyā deveśa dṛśyase ।। 

aham āsam anantāyām asyāṃ dṛśi maheśvara ।
sarvasaṅkalpamuktāyāṃ vyoma vyomnīva nirmale ।। 

na śokena na mohena na ca vairāgyacintayā ।
na dehatyāgakāryeṇa na saṃsārabhayena ca ।। 

ekasmin vidyamāne hi kutaś śokaḥ kutaḥ kṣatiḥ ।
kuto dehaḥ kva saṃsāraḥ kva sthitiḥ kva bhayābhaye ।। 

yathecchayaivāmalayā kevalaṃ svasamutthayā ।
evaṃ devāham avasaṃ vitate pāvane pade ।। 

hā virakto asmi saṃsāraṃ tyajāmīty āśayeśvara ।
aprabuddhadhiyāṃ cintā harṣaśokavikāradā ।। 

dehābhāve na duḥkhāni dehe duḥkhāni me sati ।
iti cintāviṣavyālī mūrkham evāvalumpate ।। 

idaṃ sukham idaṃ duḥkham idaṃ nāstīdam asti me ।
iti dolāyitaṃ ceto mūḍham eva na paṇḍitam ।। 

ayam anyo anya evāham ity ajñānāndhavāsanāḥ ।
dūrodastās subuddhīnāṃ rajanyo aṃśumatām iva ।। 

idaṃ tyājyam idaṃ grāhyam iti mithyā manobhramaḥ ।
nonmattatāṃ nayaty antar jñam ajñam iva durdhiyam ।। 

sarvasminn ātmani tate tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇa ।
heyopādeyapakṣasthā dvitīyā kalanā kutaḥ ।। 

vijñānābhāsam akhilaṃ jagat sadasatos sthitam ।
kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iti yat tyajyate na vā ।। 

kevalaṃ svasvabhāvena draṣṭṛdṛśye vicārayan ।
kṣaṇaṃ viśrāntavān antar aham ātmātmanātmani ।। 

bhāvābhāvavinirmukto heyopādeyavarjitaḥ ।
evam āsam ahaṃ pūrvam adhunettham avasthitaḥ ।। 

śamam ātmīyam āpannas sarvagātman satāṃ gate ।
karomy ahaṃ mahādeva tubhyaṃ yat parirocate ।। 

tvam ayaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa pūjyas tāvaj jagattraye ।
tan mattaḥ prakṛtaprāptāṃ pūjām ādātum arhasi ।। 

ity uktvā dānavādhīśaḥ puraḥ kṣīrodaśāyinaḥ ।
śailendra iva pūrṇendum arghapātram upādade ।। 

sāyudhaṃ sāpsarovṛndaṃ sasuraṃ sakhagādhipam ।
pujayām āsa govindaṃ satrailokyam athāgragam ।। 

sabāhyābhyantarakrāntabhuvanaṃ bhuvaneśvaram ।
pūjayitvopaviṣṭaṃ tam uvāca kamalāpatiḥ ।। 

bhagavān

uttiṣṭha dānavādhīśa siṃhāsanam upāśraya ।
yāvad āśv abhiṣekaṃ te svayam eva dadāmy aham ।। 

pāñcajanyaravaṃ śrutvā ya ime samupāgatāḥ ।
siddhās sādhyās suraughās te kurvantu tava maṅgalam ।। 

ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣo dānavaṃ siṃhaviṣṭare ।
yojayām āsa yogānte meruśṛṅga ivāmbudam ।। 

athainaṃ harir āhūtaiḥ kṣirodādyair mahābdhibhiḥ ।
gaṅgādibhis saritpūrais sarvatīrthajalais tathā ।। 

sarvaviprarṣisaṅghaiś ca sarvasiddhagaṇais tathā ।
munividyādharayuto lokapālasamanvitaḥ ।। 

abhyaṣiñcad ameyātmā daityarājye mahāsuram ।
marudgaṇais stūyamāṇaṃ pūrvasarge hariṃ yathā ।। 

surāsurais stūyamānaṃ stūyamānas surāsuraiḥ ।
abhiṣiktam uvācedaṃ prahlādaṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।। 

bhagavān

yāvan merur dharā yāvad yāvac candrārkamaṇḍale ।
akhaṇḍitaguṇaślāghī tāvad rājā bhavānagha ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ tyaktvā samadarśanayā dhiyā ।
vītarāgabhayakrodho rājyaṃ samanupālaya ।। 

rājye asmin bhogasampūrṇe dṛṣṭānuttamabhūminā ।
na gantavyas tvayodvegas svarge vā narake atha vā ।। 

deśakālakriyākārair yathāprāptāsu dṛṣṭiṣu ।
prakṛtaṃ kāryam ātiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavāsanam āssva bhoḥ ।। 

atiheyatayādattaṃ mamatāparivarjitam ।
bhāvābhāve samaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann iha na badhyase ।। 

dṛṣṭasaṃsāraparyāyas tulitātulatatpadaḥ ।
sarvaṃ sarvatra jānāsi kim anyad upadiśyate ।। 

vītarāgabhayakrodhe tvayi rājani rājati ।
bhūmiḥ pāsyati nedānīṃ durgṛdhrīvāsṛg āsuram ।। 

dalayiṣyati bāṣpaśrīr nāsurīkarṇamañjarīm ।
vanarājīm ivaughotthā sarit tārataraṅgiṇī ।। 

adyaprabhṛti saṃśāntadānavāmarasaṅgaram ।
nirmandarāmbhonidhivaj jagat svastham avasthitam ।। 

devāsurakuṭumbinyo bhartṛṣv antaḥpureṣu ca ।
sveṣv eva yāntu viśvāsam aparasparam āhṛtāḥ ।। 

bhava bahulaniśānitāntanidrātimiram apāsya sadoditāśayaśrīḥ ।
danusuta vanitāvilāsaramyāṃ ciram ajitām upabhuṅkṣva rājyalakṣmīm ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne prahlādābhiṣeko nāma sargaḥ

dvicatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣas sanarāmarakinnaraḥ ।
dvitīya iva saṃsāraś cacālāsuramandirāt ।। 

prahlādādivinirmuktaiḥ paścāt puṣpāñjalivrajaiḥ ।
pūryamāṇavihaṅgeśapāścātyāṅgaruhotkaraḥ ।। 

kramāt kṣīrodam āsādya visṛjya suravāhinīm ।
bhogibhogāsane tasthau śvetābja iva ṣaṭpadaḥ ।। 

bhogibhogāsane viṣṇuś śakras svarge sahāmaraiḥ ।
pātāle dānavādhīśa iti tasthur gatajvarāḥ ।। 

eṣā te kathitā rāma niśśeṣamalanāśinī ।
prāhlādī bodhasamprāptir aindavadravaśītalā ।। 

ya etāṃ mānavā loke bahuduṣkṛtino api hi ।
dhiyā vicārayiṣyanti te prāpsyanty acirāt padam ।। 

sāmānyena vicāreṇa kṣayam āyāti duṣkṛtam ।
yogavākyavicāreṇa ko na yāti paraṃ padam ।। 

ajñānam ucyate pāpaṃ tad vicāreṇa naśyati ।
pāpamūlacchidaṃ tasmād vicāraṃ na parityajet ।। 

imāṃ prahlādasaṃsiddhiṃ pravicārayatāṃ nṛṇām ।
saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kṣayam āpnoty asaṃśayam ।। 

rāmaḥ

pare pade pariṇataṃ pāñcajanyasvanair manaḥ ।
kathaṃ prabuddhaṃ bhagavan prahlādasya mahātmanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dvividhā muktatā loke sambhavaty anaghākṛte ।
sadehaikā videhānyā vibhāgo ayaṃ tayoś śṛṇu ।। 

asaṃsaktamater yasya tyāgādāneṣu karmaṇām ।
naiṣaṇā tatsthitiṃ viddhi tvaṃ jīvanmuktatām iha ।। 

saiva dehakṣaye rāma punarjananavarjitā ।
videhamuktatā proktā tatsthā nāyānti dṛśyatām ।। 

bhṛṣṭabījopamā bhūyojanmāṅkuravivarjitā ।
hṛdi jīvadvimuktānāṃ śuddhā bhavati vāsanā ।। 

pāvanī paramodārā sattvamātrānupātinī ।
ātmadhyānamayī nityaṃ suṣuptastheva tiṣṭhati ।। 

api varṣasahasrānte te tayaivāntarasthayā ।
sati dehe prabudhyante jīvanmuktā raghūdvaha ।। 

prahlādo antassthayā śuddhasattvavāsanayā svayā ।
bodham āpa mahābāho śaṅkhaśabdāvabuddhayā ।। 

harir ātmā hi bhūtānāṃ tasya yat pratibhāsate ।
tat tathaiva bhavaty āśu sarvatrātmaiva kāraṇam ।। 

prabodham etu prahlādo yadaiveti vicintitam ।
nimeṣād vāsudevena tadaiva tad upasthitam ।। 

ātmany akāraṇenaiva bhūtānāṃ kāraṇena ca ।
sṛṣṭyarthaṃ vapur āttaṃ tad vāsudevīyam ātmanā ।। 

ātmāvalokanenāśu mādhavaḥ paridṛśyate ।
mādhavārādhanenāśu svayam ātmāvalokyate ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavātmāvalokane ।
viharāśu virāḍātmā padaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam ।। 

sukhāsāravatī rāma saṃsāraprāvṛḍ ātatā ।
jāḍyaṃ dadāti paramaṃ vicārārkam apaśyataḥ ।। 

prasādād ātmano viṣṇor māyeyam atibhāsurā ।
prabādhate na dhīrāṃs tu yakṣī mantravato yathā ।। 

ātmecchayaiva ghanatāṃ samupāgatāntar ātmecchayaiva tanutām upayāti kāle ।
saṃsārajālaracaneyam anantamāyā jvāleva vātakalayānagha pāvakasya ।। 

prahlādavyavasthāpanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tricatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña śuddhais tvadvacanāṃśubhiḥ ।
nirvṛtās smaś śaśāṅkasya karair oṣadhayo yathā ।। 

karṇābhivāñchyamānāni pavitrāṇi mṛdūni ca ।
bhūṣayanti gṛhītāni puṣpāṇīva vacāṃsi te ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena sarvam āsādyate yadi ।
prahlādas tat kathaṃ buddho na mādhavavaraṃ vinā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad yad rāghava samprāptaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā ।
tat tad āsāditaṃ tena pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ ।। 

ātmā nārāyaṇaś caiva na bhinnau tilatailavat ।
tathaiva śauklyapaṭavat kusumāmodavat tathā ।। 

yo hi viṣṇus sa evātmā yo hy ātmā sa janārdanaḥ ।
viṣṇvātmaśabdau paryāyau yathā viṭapipādapau ।। 

prahlādanāmnā prathamam ātmaiva svayam ātmanā ।
svayaiva śaktyā parayā viṣṇubhaktau niyojitaḥ ।। 

prahlādo hy ātmanaivaitaṃ varam arjitavān svayam ।
svayaṃ vicāraṃ kṛtavān svayaṃ vijitavān manaḥ ।। 

kadācid ātmanaivātmā svayaṃ śaktyā vibodhyate ।
kadācid viṣṇudehena bhaktilabhyena bodhyate ।। 

ciram ārādhito apy eṣa paramaprītimān api ।
nāvicāravato jñānaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti mādhavaḥ ।। 

mukhyaḥ puruṣayatnottho vicāras svātmadarśane ।
gauṇo varādiko hetur mukhyahetuparo bhava ।। 

pūrvam eva balāt tasmād ākramyendriyapañcakam ।
abhyāsāt sarvayatnena cittaṃ kuru vicāravat ।। 

yad yad āsādyate kiñcit kenacit kvacid eva hi ।
svaśaktisampravṛttyā tal labhyate nānyataḥ kvacit ।। 

pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya prollaṅghyendriyaparvatam ।
saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā pāraṃ gaccha paraṃ padam ।। 

vinā puruṣayatnena dṛśyate cej janārdanaḥ ।
mṛgapakṣigaṇaṃ kasmāt tad asau noddharaty ajaḥ ।। 

guruś ced uddharaty ajñam ātmīyāt pauruṣād ṛte ।
uṣṭradāntabalīvardāṃs tat kasmān noddharaty asau ।। 

na harer na guror nārthāt kiñcid āsādyate mahat ।
ākrāntamanasas svasmād yan nāsāditam ātmanaḥ ।। 

abhyāsavairāgyayutād ākrāntendriyapannagāt ।
ātmanaḥ prāpyate yat tat prāpyate na jagattrayāt ।। 

ārādhayātmanātmānam ātmanātmānam arcaya ।
ātmanātmānam ālokya santiṣṭha svātmanātmani ।। 

śāstrayatnavicārebhyo mūrkhāṇāṃ prapalāyatām ।
kalpitā vaiṣṇavī bhaktiḥ pravṛttyarthaṃ śubhasthitau ।। 

abhyāsayatnau prathamaṃ mukhyo vidhir udāhṛtaḥ ।
tadabhāve tu gauṇas syāt pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

asti ced indriyākrāntiḥ kiṃ pūjāpūjyapūjanaiḥ ।
nāsti ced indriyākrāntiḥ kiṃ pūjāpūjyapūjanaiḥ ।। 

vicāropaśamābhyāṃ hi vinā nāsādyate hariḥ ।
vicāropaśamābhyāṃ ca yuktasyābjakareṇa kim ।। 

vicāropaśamopetaṃ cittam ārādhayātmanaḥ ।
tasmin siddhe bhavān siddho no cet tvaṃ vanagardabhaḥ ।। 

kriyate mādhavādīnāṃ praṇayaḥ prārthanāya yat ।
sa caiva kasmāt kriyate na svakasyaiva cetasaḥ ।। 

sarvasyaiva janasyāsya viṣṇur abhyantare sthitaḥ ।
taṃ parityajya ye yānti bahir viṣṇuṃ na te budhāḥ ।। 

hṛdguhāvāsi cittattvaṃ mukhyaṃ sānātanaṃ vapuḥ ।
śaṅkhacakragadāhasto gauṇa ākāra ātmanaḥ ।। 

yo hi mukhyaṃ parityajya gauṇaṃ samanudhāvati ।
tyaktvā rasāyanaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃsādhayaty asau ।। 

yas tu vā sthitim evāsyām ātmajñānacamatkṛtau ।
nāsādayati sammattamanās sa raghunandana ।। 

aprāptātmaviveko antar ajñaś cittavaśīkṛtaḥ ।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇim arcayaty amareśvaram ।। 

tatpūjanena kaṣṭena tapasā tasya rāghava ।
kāle nirmalatām eti cittaṃ vairāgyavāriṇā ।। 

nityābhyāsavivekābhyāṃ cittam āśu prasīdati ।
āmram eva daśām eti sāhakārīṃ śanaiś śanaiḥ ।। 

etad apy ātmanaivātmā phalam āpnoti bhāvitam ।
haripūjākramākhyena nimittenārisūdana ।। 

varam āpnoti yo vāpi viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ ।
tena svasyaiva tat prāptaṃ phalam abhyāsaśākhinaḥ ।। 

sarveṣām uttamārthānāṃ sarvāsāṃ cirasampadām ।
svamanonigraho bhūmir bhūmis sasyaśriyām iva ।। 

apy urvīkhananotkasya kaṣato api śiloccayam ।
svamanonigrahād anyo nopāyo astīha duḥkhahā ।। 

tāvaj janmasahasrāṇi bhramanti bhuvi mānavāḥ ।
yāvan nopaśamaṃ yāti manomattamahārṇavaḥ ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādyāś ciraṃ sampūjitā api ।
upaplutamanovyādhiṃ na trāyante api vatsalāḥ ।। 

ākārabhāsuraṃ tyaktvā bāhyam āntaram apy ajam ।
kuru janmakṣayāyāśu saṃvinmātraikacintanam ।। 

saṃvedyanirmuktanirāmayaikasaṃvinmayāsvādam anantarūpam ।
sanmātram āsvādaya sarvasāraṃ pāraṃ paraṃ prāpsyasi janmanadyāḥ ।। 

prahlādopākhyāne prahlādaviśrāntis samāptā nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāmāparyavasāneyaṃ māyā saṃsṛtināmikā ।
ātmacittajayenaiva kṣayam āyāti nānyathā ।। 

jaganmāyāprapañcasya vaicitryapratipattaye ।
itihāsam imaṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣvāvahito anagha ।। 

asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe kosalā nāma maṇḍalam ।
kalpavṛkṣavanaṃ meror iva ratnagaṇākaram ।। 

tatrāsīd brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid guṇī gādhir iti śrutaḥ ।
paramaśrotriyo dhīmān vedo mūrtim ivāśritaḥ ।। 

ā bālyāt praviraktena cetasā sa vyarājata ।
niṣkalaṅkāvadātena bhuvanaṃ nabhasā yathā ।। 

kim apy abhimataṃ kāryaṃ vinidhāya sa cetasi ।
bandhuvargād viniṣkramya tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ yayau ।। 

utphullakamalaṃ tatra saraḥ prāpa sa viprarāṭ ।
candraḥ prasannavimalaṃ tārāśāram ivāmbaram ।। 

āśauridarśanaṃ tasmiṃs tapo'rthaṃ sarasi dvijaḥ ।
ākaṇṭham ambunirmagnaḥ prāvṛṭpadma ivāvasat ।। 

yayau māsāṣṭakaṃ tasya magnasya saraso ambhasi ।
māṃsapaṅkajaśaṅkotkabhṛṅgabhagnamukhacchaveḥ ।। 

athainaṃ tapasā taptam ajagamaikadā hariḥ ।
nidāghārtaṃ ghanaś śyāmaḥ prāvṛṣīva dharātalam ।। 

bhagavān

viprottiṣṭha payomadhyād gṛhāṇābhimatam varam ।
abhīpsitaphalopeto jātas te niyamadrumaḥ ।। 

brāhmaṇaḥ

asaṅkhyeyajagadbhūtahṛtpadmakuharāline ।
jagattrayaikanalinīsarase viṣṇave namaḥ ।। 

māyām imāṃ tvaduditāṃ bhagavan pāramātmikīm ।
draṣṭum icchāmi saṃsāranāmnīm āścaryakāriṇīm ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

imāṃ drakṣyasi māyāṃ tvaṃ tatas tyakṣyasi cety ajaḥ ।
uktvā yayāv adṛśyatvaṃ gāndharvam iva pattanam ।। 

gate viṣṇau samuttasthau jalāt sa brāhmaṇeśvaraḥ ।
śītalāmalamūrtitvād induḥ kṣīrodakād iva ।। 

babhūva parituṣṭātmā darśanena jagatpateḥ ।
darśanasparśanair indor utphullam iva kairavam ।। 

athāsya katicit tasmin divasāni yayur vane ।
harisandarśanānandavato brāhmaṇakarmaṇā ।। 

ekadārabdhavān snānaṃ sarasy uditapaṅkaje ।
cintayan vaiṣṇavaṃ vākyaṃ maharṣir iva mānase ।। 

atha snānavidhāv antarjalam eṣa cakāra ha ।
sakalāghavighātārthaṃ parivartanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

antarjalavidhau tasmin vismṛtadhyānamantradhīḥ ।
paryastasaṃvitprasaras so apaśyaj jalamadhyagaḥ ।। 

mṛtam ātmānam ātmīye sadane asomyatāṃ gatam ।
patitaṃ vātavegena kandarāntar iva drumam ।। 

prāṇāpānapravāheṇa muktam antam upāgatam ।
saṃśāntāvayavaspandaṃ nirvāta iva ṣaṇḍakam ।। 

pāṇḍurānanam āmlānaṃ vṛkṣaparṇam ivārasam ।
śavībhūtam anāhlādaṃ chinnanālam ivāmbujam ।। 

viparyastekṣaṇaṃ prātar majjattāram ivāmbaram ।
sāvagraham iva grāmaṃ sarvataḥ pāṃsudhūsaram ।। 

bāṣpaklinnamukhair dīnaiḥ karuṇākrandakāribhiḥ ।
āvṛtaṃ bandhubhiḥ khinnaiḥ kurarair iva pādapam ।। 

setubhaṅgagaladvārimlāyamānamukhābjayā ।
nalinyā samadharmiṇyā bhāryayā pādayoś śritam ।। 

tārākrandaraṇadrūḍhapralāpālāpamugdhayā ।
mātrā gṛhītaṃ cibuke navavyañjanalāñchite ।। 

anyaiḥ pārśvagatair dīnais sravadasrumukhair janaiḥ ।
śritaṃ galadavaśyāyaiś śuṣkaparṇair iva drumam ।। 

viyogabhītyā saṃyogaparihāraparair iva ।
dūraṃ pravisṛtair aṅgair anātmīyair ivāvṛtam ।। 

parasparam alagnābhyām oṣṭhābhyāṃ daśanaiś śanaiḥ ।
savirāgam ivāmlānair hasantaṃ svātmajīvitam ।। 

maunaṃ dhyānam ivāpannaṃ paṅkād iva vinirmitam ।
aprabodhāya saṃsuptaṃ viśrāmyantam ivoccakaiḥ ।। 

bāndhavākrandasaṃrambhakolāhalagatā giraḥ ।
snehabhāvavicārārthaṃ śṛṇvantam iva yatnataḥ ।। 

atha tatkālakallolapralāpākulaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
sorastāḍanam ucchūnanetravāribhir āplutaiḥ ।। 

krameṇa svajanaiḥ kṣubdhais tārākranditaghargharaiḥ ।
niṣkālitam amaṅgalyam apunardarśanāya taiḥ ।। 

nītaṃ śmaśānam āśyānavasāpaṅkakalaṅkitam ।
śuṣkāśuṣkajaratklinnakaṅkālaśatasaṅkulam ।। 

gṛdhrābhracchannasūryāṃśu citājvalananistamaḥ ।
śivāśatamukhajvālājālapallavitāvani ।। 

vahadraktasaritsnātamadgukaṅkogravāyasam ।
raktārdratantrīprasarajālabaddhajaratkhagam ।। 

tatra te jvalane dīpte cakrus taṃ bhasmasāc chavam ।
bāndhavās salilāpūraṃ samudrā iva vāḍave ।। 

citiś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiś śavam āśu dadāha tam ।
śuṣkendhanavad ucchūnajvālājālajaṭāvatī ।। 

atyullasaccaṭacaṭāravamuktagandhavyāptāmbuvāhapaṭalo asthicayaṃ hutāśaḥ ।
dantī virandhram iva veṇuvanaṃ samantād udvāntamedurarasaṃ dalayāṃ cakāra ।। 

gādhivṛttānte gādhivināśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athāpaśyad asau gādhis svādhipīvarayā dhiyā ।
antarjalastha evāntar ātmanātmany anirmale ।। 

hūnamaṇḍalaparyantagrāmopāntanivāsinām ।
śvapacānāṃ striyo garbhe sthitam ātmānam ākulam ।। 

garbhavāsabhayākrāntaṃ pīḍitaṃ pelavāṅgakam ।
śvapacīhṛdaye suptaṃ śvaviṣṭhāyām ivāṅkuram ।। 

śanaiḥ pakvatayā kāle prasūtaṃ mecakacchavim ।
śvapacyā prāvṛṣevābdaṃ śyāvam āvalitaṃ malaiḥ ।। 

sampannaṃ śvapacāgāre śiśuṃ śvapacavallabham ।
itaś cetaś ca gacchantam utpīḍam iva yāmunam ।। 

dvādaśābdadaśāṃ yātaṃ saṃsthitaṃ ṣoḍaśābdikam ।
pīvarāṃsam udārāṅgaṃ payodam iva meduram ।। 

sārameyaparīvāraṃ viharantaṃ vanād vanam ।
nighnantaṃ mṛgalakṣāṇi paulindīṃ sthitim āsthitam ।। 

tamālaṃ latayevātha śritaṃ śvapacakāntayā ।
stanastabakaśālinyā navapallavahastayā ।। 

śyāmayā kalikājāladaśanāmalamālayā ।
navavallabhayā bhūrivilāsavalitāṅgayā ।। 

vilasantaṃ vanānteṣu tayā saha naveṣṭayā ।
śyāmalaṃ śyāmayā bhṛṅgaṃ bhṛṅgyeva kusumarddhiṣu ।। 

navaparṇalatāpattravasanaṃ vyasanāntaram ।
vindhyakāntāram ākāram abhyāgatam ivodbhaṭam ।। 

viśrāntaṃ vanakuñjeṣu suptaṃ giridarīṣu ca ।
nilīnaṃ pattrakuñjeṣu gulmakeṣu kṛtālayam ।। 

kiṅkirātāvataṃsāḍhyaṃ yūthikāsragvibhūṣitam ।
ketakottaṃsasubhagaṃ sahakārasragākulam ।। 

lulitaṃ puṣpaśayyāsu bhrāntam abdhitaṭeṣu ca ।
tajjñaṃ kānanakośeṣu bahujñaṃ mṛgamāraṇe ।। 

prāsūta so atha śaileṣu putrān nijakulāṅkurān ।
atyantaviṣamodarkān khadiraḥ kaṇṭakān iva ।। 

kalatravantaṃ sampannaṃ sthitaṃ prakṣīṇayauvanam ।
śanair jarjaratāṃ yātaṃ vṛṣṭihīnam iva sthalam ।। 

tato hūnahatagrāmaṃ janmadeśam upetya tam ।
saṃsthitaṃ maṭhikāṃ parṇaiḥ kṛtvā dūre munīndravat ।। 

jarājaraḍhatāṃ yātaṃ svadehasamaputrakam ।
jīrṇaprāyarasaśvabhratamālatarusannibham ।। 

prauḍhaṃ śvapacagārhasthyaṃ kurvāṇaṃ bahubāndhavam ।
karañjakuñjavanavat parāṃ vṛddhim upāgataṃ ।। 

athāpaśyad asau gādhir yāvat tasya kalatriṇaḥ ।
jaraḍhaśvapaceśasya svātmano bhramakāriṇaḥ ।। 

tat kalatram aśeṣeṇa nītam ādṛtamanyunā ।
āsārapavanenāśu vanaparṇagaṇo yathā ।। 

pralapaty eka evāsāv aṭavyāṃ duḥkhakarṣitaḥ ।
viyūtha iva sāraṅgo vigatāstho asrulocanaḥ ।। 

dināni katicit tatra nītvā śokaparītadhīḥ ।
jahau svadeśaṃ saṃśuṣkapadmaṃ sara ivāṇḍajaḥ ।। 

vijahāra bahūn deśān anāsthaś cintayānvitaḥ ।
preryamāṇa ivānyena vātanunna ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

ekadā prāpa kīrāṇāṃ maṇḍale śrīmatīṃ purīm ।
khe anūrur viharañ śūnye sadvimānam ivāmaraḥ ।। 

nṛtyadratnāṃśukacchannamārgavṛkṣalatāṅganām ।
āgulphaṃ kīrṇakusumāṃ nandanāntarasundarīm ।। 

sāmantair lalanābhiś ca nāgaraiś ca nirantaram ।
svargamārgopamaṃ rājamārgam asyām avāpa saḥ ।। 

maṇiratnakṛtāgāraṃ tatra maṅgalahastinam ।
dadarśāmalaśailendram iva sañcāracañcalam ।। 

mṛte rājani rājārthaṃ viharantam itas tataḥ ।
ratnajñam iva ratnorvyāṃ cintāmaṇididṛkṣayā ।। 

tam asau śvapaco nāgaṃ kautukodārayā dṛśā ।
ciram ālokayām āsa spandayuktācalopamam ।। 

ālokayantam ādāya taṃ kareṇa sa vāraṇaḥ ।
svakaṭe ayojayan merus taṭe arkam iva sādaram ।। 

tasmin kaṭagate nedur jayadundubhayo abhitaḥ ।
kalpāmbuda ivākāśam adhirūḍhe mahārṇavāḥ ।। 

pūritāśo babhau rājā jayatīti janasvanaḥ ।
udyāne samprabuddhānāṃ vihagānām ivāravaḥ ।। 

udabhūd vandivṛndānāṃ ghanakolāhalas tataḥ ।
velāvilulitāmbūnām ambudhīnām iva dhvaniḥ ।। 

taṃ tatrāvārayām āsur maṇḍanārthaṃ varāṅganāḥ ।
kṣīrodagatam udratnā laharya iva mandaram ।। 

māninyas taṃ guṇaprotair nānāratnair apūrayan ।
nānāprabhāprabhāvāḍhyair velā iva taṭācalam ।। 

tuṣāraśiśirasparśais tās taṃ hārair abhūṣayan ।
śyāmā navanadīpūrair varṣāś śṛṅgam ivonnatam ।। 

vicitravarṇasaugandhyaiḥ puṣpair āvalayan striyaḥ ।
vanaṃ madhuśriya iva taṃ lolakarapallavāḥ ।। 

nānāvarṇarasāmodais tās tam āśu vilepanaiḥ ।
alepayan prabhājālais taṭyo abhram iva dhātujaiḥ ।। 

ratnakāñcanakānto asāv ādade chattram ātatam ।
sandhyābhratārendunadīvyāptaṃ merur ivāmbaram ।। 

bhūṣitas savilāsābhir bālavallībhir āvṛtaḥ ।
ratnapuṣpāṃśukākīrṇaḥ kalpavṛkṣa ivābabhau ।। 

tādṛśaṃ tam upājagmuḥ parivārasamanvitāḥ ।
sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ phullaṃ mārgadrumam ivādhvagāḥ ।। 

tā enam āsane saiṃhe prāpyābhiṣiṣicuḥ kramāt ।
tasminn eva gaje śakram airāvaṇa ivāmarāḥ ।। 

evaṃ sa śvapaco rājyaṃ prāpa kīrapurāntare ।
araṇye hariṇaṃ puṣṭam aprāṇam iva vāyasaḥ ।। 

kīrīkaratalāmbhojapramṛṣṭacaraṇāmbujaḥ ।
sarvāṅgakuṅkumālepais sandhyāmbudharaśobhanaḥ ।। 

jajvāla kīranagare nāgarījanavān asau ।
siṃhīgaṇayutas siṃho yathā kusumite vane ।। 

harihatamadanāgottāramuktākalāpapravicaritaśarīraś śāntacintāviṣādaḥ ।
aramata sa mahadbhis tatra bhogais sarasyāṃ ravikaramadatapto vāripūrair ivebhaḥ ।। 

parivisṛtanṛpaujās sarvadiksaṃsthitājñaḥ katipayadivasehāsiddhadeśavyavasthaḥ ।
prakṛtibhir alam ūḍhāśeṣarājatvabhāras sa gavala iti nāmnā tatra rājā babhūva ।। 

gādhivṛttānte rājyalābho nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vilāsinībhir valito mantrimaṇḍalapūjitaḥ ।
vanditas sarvasāmantaiś chattracāmaramālitaḥ ।। 

siddhānuśāsanaḥ kānto jñātarājyaguṇakramaḥ ।
vītaśokabhayāyāsas tatra prāptamahāpadaḥ ।। 

vismṛtātmaprabhāvo abhūd aniśaṃ stavamaṅgalaiḥ ।
ānandāpūrṇayā vṛttyā bhṛśaṃ kṣīva ivāsavaiḥ ।। 

kīreṣu śvapaco rājyaṃ varṣāṇy aṣṭau cakāra ha ।
āryavṛttam aśeṣeṇa tāvatkālaṃ babhāra ha ।। 

yadṛcchayaikadāthāsāv atiṣṭhat tyaktabhūṣaṇaḥ ।
atamastārakendvarkatejo'mbudam ivāmbaram ।। 

bahv amanyata no hārakeyūravasanādy asau ।
prabhutābṛṃhitaṃ ceto nāhāryam abhinandati ।। 

eka evājiraṃ bāhyaṃ tādṛgveṣas sa niryayau ।
mukhyāṅganān nabhobhāgād antaṃ gacchann ivāṃśumān ।। 

tatrāpaśyad ghanaśyāmaṃ pīnaṃ śvapacapeṭakam ।
gāyan mṛdu vasantotthaṃ kokilānām iva vrajam ।। 

dhunānaṃ jhallarītantrīṃ karapallavalīlayā ।
madhurehaṃ raṇadrephām aliśreṇīm iva drumaḥ ।। 

atha tasmāt samuttasthau jarāvān raktalocanaḥ ।
kācaśṛṅgaṃ himāpūrṇam iva śvapacanāyakaḥ ।। 

jyo kaṭañjeti sahasā vadan kīramahīpateḥ ।
vallyāṃ kākam ivānandāj jānvagre ayojayat karam ।। 

uvācedaṃ ca kīreśaṃ he bandho bhoḥ kaṭañjaka ।
kva nu sthito asi diṣṭyādya dṛṣṭo asi cirabāndhava ।। 

kvāsi viśrāntavān kālam etāvantaṃ vanāntare ।
bandhuvṛndaparityaktaḥ parapuṣṭa ivaikakaḥ ।। 

iha rājā bhavantaṃ vā kaccid geyakalāvidam ।
raktakaṇṭhaṃ mānayati rāgavān iva kokilam ।। 

āpūrayati vā kaccid gṛhavastrāśanārpaṇaiḥ ।
madhus tamālaviṭapaṃ phalapattrarasair iva ।। 

darśanena tavādyāhaṃ parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataḥ ।
padmas sūryodayeneva candrodaya ivodadhiḥ ।। 

ānandānām aśeṣāṇāṃ lābhānāṃ mahatām api ।
viśrāmāṇām anantānāṃ sīmānto bandhudarśanam ।। 

śvapace pravadaty evaṃ rājā tāvat tayā tayā ।
cakāra tatkālajayā ceṣṭayaivāvadhīraṇam ।। 

tāvad vātāyanagatāḥ kāntāḥ prakṛtayas tathā ।
śvapaco ayam iti jñātvā mlānatām alam āyayuḥ ।। 

padmās tuṣāravṛṣṭyeva grāmās sāvagrahā iva ।
dāvavanta ivādrīndrā nāgarā na virejire ।। 

nṛpo avadhīrayām āsa sa tāṃ svajanasaṅkathām ।
vṛkṣāgragatamārjāraphekkāraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva ।। 

satvaraṃ praviveśāntaḥpuram āmlānamānavam ।
rājahaṃsa ivāvarṣasīdatsarasijaṃ saraḥ ।। 

sarvāvayavaviśrāntāṃ mlānatām alam āyayau ।
jānustambhāntaramahārandhrasthāgnir iva drumaḥ ।। 

tatrāpaśyad asau sarvaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanaṃ janam ।
jālaṃ kuṅkumapuṣpāṇāṃ bhuktamūlam ivākhunā ।। 

mantriṇo nāgarā nāryas tatas te taṃ mahīpatim ।
nāsprākṣur api tiṣṭhantaṃ gṛha eva śavaṃ yathā ।। 

bhṛtyāś cākṛtasatkāraṃ dūra eva tam atyajan ।
duḥkhayuktā ghanasnehā api bālaśavaṃ yathā ।। 

anānandamukhaṃ śyāmaśarīraṃ śrīvivarjitam ।
dagdhaṃ sthalam ivainaṃ te bahv amanyanta nākulāḥ ।। 

dhūmāyamānadehasya paritāpadaśāvatī ।
nāḍhaukatāsya janatā pārśvam agnigirer iva ।। 

mandotsāhasamudbhūtās tanvyas saṅghātavarjitāḥ ।
etadājñāḥ paraṃ prāpur bhasmanīvāmbuvipruṣaḥ ।। 

krūrakarmakarākārāt saṅgato aśubhadāyinaḥ ।
tasmād viśeṣeṇa janā rākṣasād iva dudruvuḥ ।। 

eka eva babhūvāsau janamadhyagato api san ।
arthādiguṇanirmuktaḥ paradeśa ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

bhṛśam āraṭate apy asmai nālāpaṃ nāgarā daduḥ ।
muktājālayutāyāpi kīcakāyādhvagā iva ।। 

atha sarve vayaṃ dīrghaṃ kālaṃ śvapacadūṣitāḥ ।
prāyaścittair na śuddhās smaḥ praviśāmo hutāśanam ।। 

iti nirṇīya nagare nāgarā mantriṇas tathā ।
abhito jvalayām āsuś citāś śatasahasraśaḥ ।। 

jvalitāsv abhitas tāsu tārakāsv iva khe tadā ।
babhūva nagaraṃ sarvam ākrandaparamānavam ।। 

karuṇārāvamukharaiḥ kalatrair bāṣpavarṣibhiḥ ।
avaṣṭabdhajvalatkuṇḍapātasajjajanavrajam ।। 

agnikuṇḍapraviṣṭānāṃ mantriṇāṃ bhṛtyarodanaiḥ ।
krandadrathyaṃ dhvanadgartam araṇyam iva mārutaiḥ ।। 

citidīpitaviprendramāṃsamāṃsalagandhayā ।
jātanīhāram utpātavātyayāvakarair dhutaiḥ ।। 

vātadīrghavasāgandhadhūtānītakhagombhitaiḥ ।
antrair vyomagataiś channaṃ bhāskaraṃ jaladair iva ।। 

vātoddhūtacitāvahniprajvalatpuramaṇḍalam ।
uḍḍīnāgnikaṇavrātatārākrāntadigantaram ।। 

pramattataskaraṃ krandadbālakāntakumārakam ।
santrastanāgarāpāstajīvitāstham asaṃsthiti ।। 

arakṣitagṛhaṃ cauraluṇṭhitākhilasañcayam ।
tyaktaputrakalatraṃ ca maraṇavyagranāgaram ।। 

tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne kaṣṭe vidhiviparyaye ।
aśeṣajanatānāśe kalpāntasadṛśasthitau ।। 

rājyasajjanasamparkapavitrīkṛtadhīradhīḥ ।
gavalaś cintayām āsa śokavyākulacetanaḥ ।। 

madartham atyanartho ayaṃ deśe asmin sthitim āgataḥ ।
akālakalpāntasamas sarvanāyakanāśanaḥ ।। 

kiṃ me duḥkhitajīvena maraṇaṃ me mahotsavaḥ ।
lokanindyasya durjantor jīvitān maraṇaṃ varam ।। 

iti niścitya gavalo jvalite jvalane puraḥ ।
pataṅgavad anudvegam akarod āhutiṃ vapuḥ ।। 

tasmin balād gavalanāmni hutāśarāśau dehe pataty avayavākulatāṃ prayāte ।
svāṅgāvadāhadahanasphuraṇānurodhād antarjale jhagiti bodham avāpa gādhiḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

gādhivṛttānte rājyabhraṃśo nāma sargaḥ

saptacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

muhūrtadvitayenātha gādher ādhibharabhramāt ।
praśaśāmākulībhāvo velāvattvam ivāmbudheḥ ।। 

payonirmāṇasammohāt tasmāt sa virarāma ha ।
kalpāntasamaye brahmā jagadviracanād iva ।। 

bodham āpa śanaiś śāntas svam evonnidradhīradhīḥ ।
kṣīvatāyāṃ praśāntāyāṃ yathā pariṇatāsavaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti dadarśa ha ।
niśāvyapagame loko yathā kṣīṇatamaḥpaṭe ।। 

smṛtasvarūpo vadanam uddadhre sa jalāntarāt ।
śiśirānte prabuddhātmā sarojam iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

vanavārikakubvyomavatīṃ vasumatīm imām ।
anyām eva puraḥ paśyan paraṃ vismayam āyayau ।। 

ko ahaṃ kim iva paśyāmi kim akārṣam ahaṃ kila ।
evaṃ vicārayaṃś citraṃ sabhrūbhaṅgam abhūt kṣaṇam ।। 

etanmuhūrtamātreṇa sambhramaṃ dṛṣṭavān aham ।
iti vijñāya salilād udasthād udayārkavat ।। 

cintayām āsa ca taṭe kva me mātā kva me priyā ।
yad ahaṃ mṛtim āyāto madhye mātṛmahelayoḥ ।। 

bālasya mātāpitarau naṣṭau kila mamāmateḥ ।
vātanītasya pattrasya vallīvṛkṣāv ivāgninā ।। 

avivāho asmi jānāmi na svarūpam api striyaḥ ।
duṣṭāyāḥ kṣobhakāriṇyā madirāyā iva dvijaḥ ।। 

tasmād etad asadbhūtam ahaṃ kiṃ nāma dṛṣṭavān ।
vividhārambhasaṃrambhaṃ gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā ।। 

tad āstām etad eṣā hi bandhumadhyamṛtasthitiḥ ।
māyā mohe manāg asmin na satyam upalabhyate ।। 

nityam evam anantāsu bhramadṛṣṭiṣu dehinām ।
ceto bhramati śārdūlo vanarājiṣv ivonmadaḥ ।। 

avadhīryeti taṃ cittamohaṃ gādhir nināya saḥ ।
dināni katicit tasmin svaka evāśrame tadā ।। 

ekadā gādhim āgacchat kaścid annapriyo atithiḥ ।
brahmāṇam iva durvāsās sa viśaśrāma saśramaḥ ।। 

paramāṃ tṛptim ānītaḥ phalapuṣparasāśanaiḥ ।
so atithir gādhinā tena vasanteneva pādapaḥ ।। 

atha vanditasandhyau tau kṛtajapyāv ubhāv api ।
kramāc chayanam āsādya tasthatur mṛdupallavam ।। 

tataḥ pravavṛte śāntā tayos tāpasayoḥ kathā ।
svavyāpārocitā puṣpaśrīr ivartus svamāsayoḥ ।। 

papracchāthātithiṃ gādhiḥ prasaṅgāpatitaṃ vacaḥ ।
kim brahman sukṛśāṅgas tvaṃ kim iti śramavān asi ।। 

atithiḥ

mamātikārśyaśramayor bhagavañ śṛṇu kāraṇam ।
kathayāmi yathābhūtaṃ vayaṃ nāsatyavādinaḥ ।। 

asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe uttarāśānikuñjake ।
kīro nāmātivikhyātaś śrīmāñ janapado mahān ।। 

tatrāham avasaṃ māsaṃ pūjyamānaḥ pure janaiḥ ।
anantāsvādalolātmacittavetālamohitaḥ ।। 

ekadaikena tatroktaṃ kathāprastāvataḥ kvacit ।
ihābhūc chvapaco rājā varṣāṇy aṣṭau dvijeti me ।। 

tato grāmeṣu matpṛṣṭaiḥ proktaṃ sakalajantubhiḥ ।
rājā babhūva śvapaco varṣāṇy aṣṭāv iheti taiḥ ।। 

sa evānte parijñātaḥ praviṣṭo jvalanaṃ javāt ।
tato dvijaśatānīha praviṣṭāni hutāśanam ।। 

iti teṣāṃ mukhāc chrutvā tasmān nirgatya maṇḍalāt ।
prayāge akaravaṃ śuddhyai prāyaścittam ahaṃ dvija ।। 

kṛtvā cāndrāyaṇasyānte tṛtīyasyādya pāraṇam ।
ihāham āgatas tena śrānto asmy atikṛśo asmi ca ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti śrutavatā tena gādhinā sa tadā dvijaḥ ।
bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo apy etad eva kathayām āsa nānyathā ।। 

atha vismayavān gādhis tāṃ nītvā tatra śarvarīm ।
jagadgehamahādīpe ravāv udayam āgate ।। 

kṛte prātastanavidhāv āpṛcchyāśv atithau gate ।
idaṃ sañcintayām āsa vismayoddhurayā dhiyā ।। 

yan mayā sambhrame dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ bhūtaṃ dvijena tat ।
uktaṃ mameti kiṃ nāma syān māyāśambare kramaḥ ।। 

yad bandhumadhye maraṇaṃ mayā tad dṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ ।
sā māyaiva na sandehaś śeṣe paśyāmi satyatām ।। 

tad ātmaśvapacodantaṃ draṣṭuṃ tāvad akhinnadhīḥ ।
hūnamaṇḍalaparyantagrāmaṃ gacchāmi satvaram ।। 

iti sañcintayan gantuṃ maṇḍalāntaram ādarāt ।
uttasthau bhāskaraḥ pārśvaṃ meror draṣṭum ivodyataḥ ।। 

vinirgatyāvahan mārge prāvṛḍoghajavena saḥ ।
deśān ullaṅghayām āsa bahūn vātataraṅgavat ।। 

tucchadeśajanācāraṃ hūnamaṇḍalam āsadat ।
karabhaḥ kaṇṭakaughārthī kārañjam iva kānanam ।। 

tatra saṃvitsthitenaiva sanniveśena vai puraḥ ।
apaśyad grāmakaṃ kañcid gandharva iva pattanam ।। 

dadarśa tasya paryante tam eva śvapacālayam ।
adhas tribhuvanasyeva pātāle narakavrajam ।। 

citracintitavistārisanniveśamayaṃ puram ।
gandharvavad asāv ātmaśvapaceśasya dṛṣṭavān ।। 

tenaiva sanniveśena prāg dṛṣṭaṃ śvapacāspadam ।
tasya kām api vairāgyapadavīm anayan manaḥ ।। 

prāvṛḍāsāraluṭhitaṃ bhittijātayavāṅkuram ।
paryastacchādanārdhāṅkaṃ kiñcidādṛṣṭakandaram ।। 

dāridryaṃ taṃ dṛḍham iva daurbhāgyam iva kuṭṭitam ।
bhraṣṭāṅgam iva daurātmyaṃ daussthityam iva khaṇḍitam ।। 

gādhidantāvadalitair gavāśvamahiṣāsthibhiḥ ।
dhavalair vyāptaparyantaṃ sākṣyaṃ kartum iva sthitaiḥ ।। 

bhuktaṃ pītaṃ purā tena yeṣu karparakeṣu ca ।
tair asanmātramalinaiḥ paripūrṇair ivāvṛtam ।। 

tābhir evāntratantrībhis saṃśuṣkābhir ṛtāv ṛtau ।
tṛṣṇābhir iva dīrghābhiḥ paritaḥ pariveṣṭitam ।। 

ciram ālokayām āsa sa tad ātmagṛhaṃ smayāt ।
prāktanaṃ śuṣkaśavatāṃ yātaṃ deham ivātmavān ।। 

atha vismayavān eṣa grāmakaṃ samupāyayau ।
ullaṅghya mlecchanagaram āryadeśam ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

tatrāpṛcchaj janaṃ sādho kaccit smarati bho bhavān ।
prāg vṛttam asya grāmasya paryante śvapacakramam ।। 

sarva eva hi dhīmantaś ciravṛttam api sphuṭam ।
karastham iva paśyanti mayeti sujanāc chrutam ।। 

atra śvapacam ekāntavāsinaṃ vṛddham unnatam ।
smarasy ekaṃ kila tamoduḥkhānām iva dehakam ।। 

yadi jānāsi bhos sādho tan me kathaya taṃ janam ।
pānthasaṃśayavicchede mahat puṇyaphalaṃ smṛtam ।। 

bhūyo bhūya iti grāmyāḥ pṛṣṭā gādhidvijanmanā ।
analpasmayasaṃrambhā ārteneva cikitsakāḥ ।। 

grāmyāḥ

yathā kathayasi brahmaṃs tat tathā na tad anyathā ।
kaṭañjanāmā śvapaca ihābhūd dāruṇākṛtiḥ ।। 

putrapautrasuhṛdbhṛtyabandhusvajanapeṭakam ।
yasyātivistīrṇam abhūt pattravṛndaṃ taror iva ।। 

tasya vṛddhasya tat sarvaṃ kalatraṃ mṛtyur ācchinat ।
adreḥ puṣpaphalopetaṃ mahāvanam ivānilaḥ ।। 

yas tato deśam utsṛjya yayau kīrapurāntaram ।
varṣāṇy aṣṭāv anudvegaṃ tatra rājā babhūva yaḥ ।। 

yas tatrātha parijñāya janair dūre tiraskṛtaḥ ।
yathā rāśir amedhyasya yathā grāme viṣadrumaḥ ।। 

tato jane agniṃ praviśaty ātmanā yo hutāśanam ।
āryatām āryasaṃsargād āryataḥ praviveśa ha ।। 

kiṃ tvam ekaṃ prayatnena śvapacaṃ pṛcchasi prabho ।
kiṃ te bandhur asau kaścid abhavat saṃstuto atha vā ।। 

evaṃ kathayato grāmyān gādhiḥ pṛcchan punaḥ punaḥ ।
sarveṣu tatra grāmeṣu māsam ekam uvāsa saḥ ।। 

yathā tenānubhūtaṃ tac chvapacatvaṃ tathaiva taiḥ ।
grāmīṇais tasya kathitaṃ sarvair evāvikhaṇḍitam ।। 

avyāhataṃ sakalahūnamukhād athaitad ākarṇya samyag avalokya yathānubhūtam ।
gādhiś śaśāṅkamalavad dhṛdaye virūḍhaṃ gūḍhākṛtiḥ paramavismayam ājagāma ।। 

gādhivṛttānte pratyakṣāvalokanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

luṭhitaṃ śvapacāgāraṃ punar vismayavān yayau ।
gādhir mano hi nāyāti tṛptim āścaryadarśane ।। 

tatrāvalokayām āsa sthānāni sadanāni ca ।
kalpakṣobhavivṛttāni jagantīvāmbujodbhavaḥ ।। 

uvāca svātmanaivedam araṇye luṭhitālaye ।
śuṣkāsthimālāvalite piśācaka iva bhraman ।। 

imās tā mṛtamātaṅgadantamālā vṛtau kṛtāḥ ।
adyāpi saṃsthitāḥ kalpaṃ prati meruśikhā iva ।। 

iha tad vānarīmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ vaṃśāṅkurais saha ।
bhuktaṃ surāsavonmattais saha śvapacabandhubhiḥ ।। 

āliṅgya śvapacīṃ śyāmām iha kesaricarmaṇi ।
suptam āpīya maireyaṃ tiktaṃ gajamadair navaiḥ ।। 

kauleyakakuṭumbinyaḥ piṇyākaparivardhitāḥ ।
iha baddhā varatrābhir mṛtebharadakāṣṭhake ।। 

iha vāraṇamuktānāṃ tad āsīt piṭhiratrayam ।
pinaddhaṃ māhiṣeṇogracarmaṇāmbudaśobhinā ।। 

sthalīṣv etāsu tāsv atra saha śvapacabālakaiḥ ।
ciraṃ vilulitaṃ cūtapattrapuñje pikair iva ।। 

rūḍhatadbālaniśśvāsaraṇadvaṃśānuvṛttimat ।
gītaṃ pītaṃ śunīraktasādhitāsavatoṣitaiḥ ।। 

atra sārdhaṃ kuṭumbena janyatreṣu kuṭumbinā ।
nṛttaṃ tat kṛtam unnādaṃ kallolair jaladhāv iva ।। 

atroḍḍayanalolānāṃ kākabhāsapatatriṇām ।
dhṛtānām anyaghātārthaṃ grathitaṃ vaṃśapañjaram ।। 

evamprāyās smaran gādhiḥ prāktanīś śvapacakriyāḥ ।
vismayotkampitaśirā dhātuś ceṣṭāḥ parāmṛśan ।। 

cacāla tasmād dīrgheṇa deśāt kālena kāryavit ।
hūnamaṇḍalam utsṛjya prāpa deśāntaraṃ kramāt ।। 

samullaṅghya nadīśailamaṇḍalāraṇyasantatim ।
āsasāda tuṣārādrilagnaṃ kīrajanāspadam ।। 

tatra prāpa mahīpālanagaraṃ nagasannibham ।
jagadbhramaṇakhinnātmā svarlokam iva nāradaḥ ।। 

athātmanānubhūtāni dṛṣṭāny āsevitāni ca ।
sthānāni nagare paśyan papraccha janam ādṛtaḥ ।। 

sādho smarasi kaccit tvam iha śvapacam īśvaram ।
yadi jānāsi tat tan me kathayāśu yathāvidhi ।। 

nāgaraḥ

abhūd ihāṣṭau varṣāṇi śvapaco bhūmipo dvija ।
rājatvam arpitaṃ yasya navamaṅgalahastinā ।। 

ante sa samparijñātas sampraviṣṭo hutāśanam ।
atra dvādaśavarṣāṇi samatītāni tāpasa ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ pṛcchaty asau gādhir janaṃ jātakutūhalaḥ ।
tasya tasya mukhād evaṃ śṛṇoty anubhavaty api ।। 

athāpaśyat pure tasmin nṛpaṃ sabalavāhanam ।
devaṃ cakradharaṃ draṣṭuṃ mandirān nirgataṃ bahiḥ ।। 

taṃ dṛṣṭvā sthagitākāśaṃ balareṇupayodharaiḥ ।
prāktanīṃ rājatām smṛtvā svām uvācātivismitaḥ ।। 

imās tāḥ kīrakāminyaḥ padmagarbhopamatvacaḥ ।
kanakadravavarṇinyo lolanīlotpalekṣaṇāḥ ।। 

cāmaraughā ime candrakarasampiṇḍapāṇḍurāḥ ।
sthiranirjharasaṅkāśāḥ kāśapuṣpacayā iva ।। 

kāntābhir avadhūyante vālavyajanarāśayaḥ ।
imās tā navavallībhiḥ kusumānām ivarddhayaḥ ।। 

imās tā mattamātaṅgaghaṭā ghaṭitamandirāḥ ।
sakalpapādapā meror iva śrṅgaparamparāḥ ।। 

ete te yamaśarvendrakuberapratimaujasaḥ ।
sāmantā vāsavasyeva lokapālā mahībhṛtaḥ ।। 

imās tās sarvaratnāḍhyās sarvābhimatadās tatāḥ ।
kalpavṛkṣalatākuñjasundaryo gṛhapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

idaṃ tat kīrajanatārājyaṃ prāg bhuktam adya me ।
ātmajanmāntarācāra iva pratyakṣatāṃ gatam ।। 

satyasvapna ivedaṃ me jāgrato api puras sthitam ।
na jāne kiṃ kṛtotthānā māyeyaṃ pravijṛmbhate ।। 

aho nu khalu dīrgheṇa manomohena jṛmbhatā ।
vaivaśyam upanīto ahaṃ jāleneva śakuntakaḥ ।। 

hā dhik kaṣṭam abuddhaṃ me mano vāsanayā hatam ।
paśyato bhramajālāni vitanoti śiśor iva ।। 

eṣā hi māyā mahatī tena me cakrapāṇinā ।
darśitety adhunā sādhu mayā smṛtam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

tad idānīṃ tathā yatnaṃ kariṣye girikandare ।
yathātisambhramasyāsya jāne marma yathāsthitam ।। 

iti sañcintya nagarād gādhis taptuṃ jagāma ha ।
kandaraṃ prāpya śailasya tasthau suśrāntasiṃhavat ।। 

tatra saṃvatsaraṃ sārdhaṃ payaśculakabhojanaḥ ।
tapaś cakre mahātejās tuṣṭaye śārṅgadhanvanaḥ ।। 

athāsya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ payomūrtir upāyayau ।
prasādam utpalaśyāmaś śaradīva mahāhradaḥ ।। 

tam ājagāma śailendrakandaraṃ dvijamandiram ।
payodharavad ātmācchacchavir vyomany athāvasat ।। 

bhagavān

gādhe kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā māyā mama garīyasī ।
dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā jagajjālaceṣṭitaṃ veṣṭitātmakam ।। 

cittābhimata etasmin prāpte samyag anindita ।
tapo giritaṭe kurvan kim anyad abhivāñchasi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ vadantam ālokya hariṃ gādhir dvijottamaḥ ।
arcākusumapūreṇa pādayoḥ paryapūjayat ।। 

dattārghaṃ kīrṇakusumaṃ praṇamyāśu pradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
viṣṇum āha dvijo vākyam ambhodam iva cātakaḥ ।। 

gādhiḥ

deva yaiṣā tvayā māyā darśitātitamomayī ।
mahīṃ prātar ivādityas tāṃ me prakaṭatāṃ naya ।। 

bhramaṃ yat paśyati mano vāsanāmalamālitam ।
svapnavat sa kathaṃ deva jāgraty api hi dṛśyate ।। 

muhūrtam upalabdhātmā jalāntas svapnavibhramaḥ ।
kathaṃ pratyakṣatāṃ prāpto mamāmalapadāspada ।। 

dairghyādairghye ca kālasya śarīrasya bhavābhavau ।
katham atra sthitāni syur madīyaśvapacabhrame ।। 

bhagavān

gādhe svādhividhūtasya rūpam asyaitad ātmajam ।
cetaso adṛṣṭatattvasya yat paśyaty uruvibhramam ।। 

bahir na kiñcid apy asti khādridyūrvīdigādikam ।
etat svacitta evāsti pattrapuñja ivāṅkure ।। 

phalādi sphāratām eti yathaiva bahir aṅkurāt ।
bahiḥ prakaṭatāṃ yāti tathā pṛthvyādi cetasaḥ ।। 

satyaṃ pṛthvyādi cittasthaṃ na bahissthaṃ kadācana ।
aṅkurasthaṃ phalaṃ vastu tasmād yasmāt phalaśriyaḥ ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārān sattākālakriyākramān ।
kumbhakāro ghaṭam iva ceto hanti karoti ca ।। 

ābālam etat puruṣais sarvair evānubhūyate ।
svapnabhramavad āvegarāgarogādidṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

citte vṛttāntalakṣāṇi saṃsthitāny āttavāsane ।
pādape phalapuṣpāṇi mūlākrāntāvanāv iva ।। 

tyaktāvaner viṭapino bhūyaḥ pattrāṇi no yathā ।
nirvāsanasya jīvasya punar janmādi no tathā ।। 

yatrānantaṃ jagajjālaṃ saṃsthitaṃ tena cetasā ।
śvapacatvaṃ prakaṭitaṃ yadi tad vismayo atra kim ।। 

avabuddhā śvapacatā pratibhāsavaśāt tvayā ।
yathaivānalpasaṃrambhā vicitrāpi vikāradā ।। 

tathaivātithir āyāto bhuktavān suptavān dvijaḥ ।
kathāṃ kathitavāṃś ceti dṛṣṭavān asi vibhramam ।। 

tathaivotthāya gacchāmi prāpto ahaṃ hūnamaṇḍalam ।
ime hūnā ime grāmā dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam ।। 

tathaivedaṃ kaṭañjasya prāktanaṃ luṭhitaṃ gṛham ।
janair uktaḥ kaṭañjaś ca dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam ।। 

tathaiva kīranagaraṃ prāpto asmi kathitaṃ ca me ।
kīraiś śvapacarājatvaṃ dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam ।। 

evaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ mohajālaṃ dvijottama ।
yat satyam iti jānāsi yac cāsatyam avaiṣi ca ।। 

vāsanāvalitaṃ cetaḥ kiṃ nāma na na paśyati ।
sādhitaṃ dṛśyate svapne varṣasādhyaṃ prayojanam ।। 

nātithir na ca hūnās te na kīrās te na tat puram ।
sarvam eva mahābuddhe vyāmohād dṛṣṭavān asi ।। 

gacchatā bhavatā hūnadeśaṃ pānthena kandare ।
kasmiṃścid vipra viśrāntaṃ kuraṅgeṇeva kānane ।। 

tathaiva śramamūḍhatvād idaṃ tad dhūnamaṇḍalam ।
idaṃ tac chvapacāgāram iti dṛṣṭaṃ na satyataḥ ।। 

tathaiva kīranagaraṃ dṛṣṭavān asi tat tathā ।
tathaiva nānyathā vāpi māyārthī hi bhavān dvija ।। 

sarvadaiva samagrāsu viharann asi dṛṣṭavān ।
dikṣu pronmattaka iva vibhramaṃ manasā mune ।। 

tad uttiṣṭha nijam karma kurvaṃs tiṣṭhopaśāntadhīḥ ।
na svakarma vinā śreyaḥ prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nigaditavān sa padmanābho vanagatatāpasavṛndapūjyamānaḥ ।
vibudhamunigaṇaiḥ pavitrahastair vṛta udadhiṃ nijam āspadaṃ jagāma ।। 

gādhivṛttānte māyāmahattvakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha gādhir gate viṣṇau punar hūnādikāñ janān ।
svasammohavicārārthaṃ babhrāmābhram ivāmbare ।। 

upalabhya tathaivātmavṛttāntaṃ janatas tataḥ ।
harim ārādhayām āsa punar adriguhāgataḥ ।। 

ājagāmainam alpena kālenātha janārdanaḥ ।
sakṛdārādhanenaiva mādhavo yāti bandhutām ।। 

uvāca gādhiṃ bhagavān mayūram iva vāridaḥ ।
kiṃ tvaṃ prārthayase bhūyas tapaseti prasādavān ।। 

gādhiḥ

bhrānto asmi deva ṣaṇmāsān hūnakīrajanāspadam ।
tatra vyabhicaraty asmadvṛttānto na kathāsv api ।। 

māyayā hūnabhūr dṛṣṭā tvayety ukto asmi kiṃ prabho ।
mohanāśāya mahatāṃ vaco no mohavṛddhaye ।। 

bhagavān

kākatālīyayogena cetasi śvapacasthitiḥ ।
sarveṣāṃ hūnakīrāṇāṃ tathaiva pratibimbitā ।। 

tenāṅga tava vṛttāntaṃ satyaṃ yat kathayanti te ।
pratibhāso hi nāyāti punar apratibhāsatām ।। 

kenacic chvapacenānte grāmasya racitaṃ gṛhaṃ ।
tat tathā yat tvayā dṛṣṭam iṣṭakākhaṇḍatāṃ gatam ।। 

kadācit pratibhaikaiva bahūnām api jāyate ।
kākatālīyagativad vicitrā hi manogatiḥ ।। 

tathā hi bahavas svapnam ekaṃ paśyanti mānavāḥ ।
svāpabhramadamaireyamadamantharacittavat ।। 

ekasyām eva līlāyāṃ vanasthalyām ivaiṇakāḥ ।। 

bahavas tulyakālaṃ ca pratibhātena karmaṇā ।
janā yatante svaphalapākeneva drumā ṛtau ।। 

pratibandhābhyanujñānāṃ kālo dāteti yā śrutiḥ ।
vipra saṅkalpamātro asau kālo hy ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

amūrto bhagavān kālo brahmaiva tam ajaṃ viduḥ ।
na jahāti na cādatte kiñcit kasyacid eva saḥ ।। 

laukiko yas tv ayaṃ kālo varṣakalpayugātmakaḥ ।
saṅkalpyate padārthaughaiḥ padārthaughāś ca tena te ।। 

samānapratibhāsotthasambhramabhrāntacetasaḥ ।
tathā tad dṛṣṭavantas te hūnakīrajanoccayāḥ ।। 

svavyāpāraparo bhūtvā dhiyātmānaṃ vicārayan ।
sādho gatamanomoham ihaivāssva vrajāmy aham ।। 

ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇur jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ ।
atiṣṭhat kandare gādhir ādhipīvarayā dhiyā ।। 

tataḥ katipayeṣv adrau māseṣv api gateṣu saḥ ।
punar ārādhayām āsa puṇḍarīkakaraṃ dvijaḥ ।। 

dadarśa caikadā nātham āgataṃ praṇanāma tam ।
pūjayām āsa manasā sotkenovāca ceśvaram ।। 

gādhiḥ

bhagavan saṃsmaraṃś citrāṃ tām ātmaśvapacasthitim ।
imāṃ saṃsāramāyāṃ ca parimuhyāmi cetasā ।। 

tad uktvāśu yathāvastu mahāmohanivṛttaye ।
etasminn eva vimale māṃ niyojaya karmaṇi ।। 

bhagavān

brahmañ jagad idaṃ māyāmahāśambaraḍambaram ।
sarvā āścaryakalanās sambhavantīha vistṛte ।। 

hūnakīrapure mohād dṛṣṭavāṃs tat tathā bhavān ।
ity etat sambhavaty eva dṛśyate hi janair bhramaḥ ।। 

hūnās tvam iva kīrāś ca dṛṣṭavantas tathā bhramam ।
mudhaivety api satyābhaṃ samakālādisambhavāt ।। 

idaṃ tu śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathābhūtam anindita ।
yenaiti tanutāṃ cintā mārgaśīrṣalateva te ।। 

yo asau kaṭañjako nāma śvapaco hūnamaṇḍale ।
tenaiva sanniveśena sa tathaivābhavat purā ।। 

tathaiva vikalatratvaṃ prāpya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ ।
babhūva kīranṛpatiḥ praviveśānalaṃ tataḥ ।। 

bhavataḥ kevalaṃ citte jalāntarvartinas tadā ।
pratibhātā tathābhūtā kaṭañjācārasaṃsthitiḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭānubhūtam atyarthaṃ kadācid vismaraty alam ।
kadācid apy adṛṣṭaṃ tu cetaḥ paśyati dṛṣṭavat ।। 

yathā svapnamanorājyadhātusaṃsthitiṣu bhramaḥ ।
jāgraty api tathaivāṅga dṛśyate manasā svayam ।। 

bhaviṣyadbhūtakālasthaṃ yathā traikālyadarśinaḥ ।
pratibhām eti te gādhe kaṭañjacaritaṃ tathā ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti majjati nātmavān ।
ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti paśyaty anātmavān ।। 

sarvam evāham eveti tattvajño nāvasīdati ।
na gṛhṇāti padārtheṣu vibhāgānarthabhāvanām ।। 

tenāsau bhramamoheṣu sukhaduḥkhavilāsiṣu ।
na nimajjati magno api tumbīpātram ivāmbhasi ।। 

tvaṃ tāvad vāsanājālagrastacitto vicetanaḥ ।
kiñciccheṣamahāvyādhir iva na svāsthyam āgataḥ ।। 

jñānasyāparipūrṇatvān na śaknoṣi manobhramam ।
vinivārayituṃ megham asamyaṅmantravān iva ।। 

yad eva te manomātre sahasā pratibimbate ।
tarur oghajaveneva tenaivākramyase kṣaṇāt ।। 

cittanābheḥ kalāsyeha māyācakrasya sarvataḥ ।
sthīyate cet tad ākramya tan na kiñcit prabādhate ।। 

tvam uttiṣṭha gireḥ kuñje daśavarṣāṇy akhinnadhīḥ ।
tapaḥ kuru tato jñānam anantābhāvam āpsyasi ।। 

ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।
vātābhravad dīpakavad yamunotpīḍavat kṣaṇāt ।। 

gādhir vivekavaśajaṃ vairāgyaṃ param āgataḥ ।
śaratsamayaparyante vairasyam iva pādapaḥ ।। 

vicitraṃ ceṣṭitaṃ dhātur asamañjasam ātatam ।
bṛhadbhramabharonmuktamatir mandam agarhayat ।। 

jagāma karuṇārdrātmā niyamāyottamaśriye ।
viśrāntyai vṛṣṭamūkātmā payodhara ivācalam ।। 

nirastāśeṣasaṅkalpas tapas tatra cakāra ha ।
daśavarṣāṇi tenāsāv ātmajñānam avāpa ha ।। 

aramata tadanu svāṃ prāpya sattāṃ mahātmā vyapagatabhayamoho bhogabhūmāv anicchaḥ ।
satatamuditajīvanmuktarūpaḥ praśāntas sakala iva śaśāṅko ghūrṇitāpūrṇacetāḥ ।। 

gādhivṛttāntas samāptaḥ nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam eṣātivitatā durjñānā raghunandana ।
mahāmohakarī māyā viṣamā pāramātmikī ।। 

kva muhūrtadvayasvapnasambhramālokadṛṣṭatā ।
kvānekavarṣasambhuktaśvapacāvanipabhramaḥ ।। 

kva sambhramopalabdhatvaṃ kva pratyakṣanidarśanam ।
kvāsatyatvam asandigdhaṃ kva satyapariṇāmitā ।। 

ato vacmi mahābāho māyeyaṃ vitatety alam ।
asāvadhānamanasaṃ yojayaty atisaṅkaṭe ।। 

rāmaḥ

evam asya kathaṃ brahman māyācakrasya rodhanam ।
kurmaḥ prabalino vegāt sarvāṅgacchedakāriṇaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asya saṃsārarūpasya māyācakrasya rāghava ।
cittaṃ viddhi mahānābhiṃ bhramato bhramadāyinaḥ ।। 

tasmin nūnam avaṣṭabdhe dhiyā puruṣayatnataḥ ।
gṛhītanābhi vahanān māyācakraṃ nirudhyate ।। 

avaṣṭabdhamanonābhi mohacakraṃ na copati ।
yathā rajjvāṃ niruddhāyāṃ kīlakaṃ rajjuveṣṭitam ।। 

cakrayuddhaikatajjño api kasmāj jānāsi nānagha ।
cakraṃ nābhāv avaṣṭabdhaṃ vaśam āyāti nānyathā ।। 

cittanābhāv avaṣṭabhya tasmād yatnena rāghava ।
saṃsāracakraṃ vahanād ātmanaḥ parirodhaya ।। 

etāṃ yuktiṃ vinā duḥkham anantam idam ātmanaḥ ।
asyāṃ yuktau kṣaṇāt tv antaṃ gatam evāvalokaya ।। 

cittākramaṇamātrākhyāt paramād auṣadhād ṛte ।
prayatnenāpi saṃsāramahārogo na śāmyati ।। 

tasmād rāghava santyajya tīrthadānatapaḥkriyāḥ ।
śreyase paramāyāntaś cittam eva vaśīkuru ।। 

cittāntar eva saṃsāraḥ kumbhāntaḥ kumbhakhaṃ yathā ।
cittanāśe na saṃsāraḥ kumbhanāśe na kumbhakham ।। 

cittasaṃsāraṇākāśakoṭare cittakumbhakham ।
vināśyātulitākāśarūpaṃ svaṃ rūpam āviśa ।। 

vartamānaṃ kramāyātaṃ bhajad bāhyadhiyā kṣaṇam ।
bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad abhajad yāti cittam acittatām ।। 

saṅkalpaṃ sānusandhānavarjanaṃ cet pratikṣaṇam ।
karoṣi tad acittatvaṃ prāpta evāsi pāvanam ।। 

yāvat saṅkalpakalanaṃ tāvac cittavibhūtayaḥ ।
yāvaj jaladavistāras tāvat khe jalabindavaḥ ।। 

sacittaṃ cetanaṃ yāvat tāvat saṅkalpakalpanam ।
sacandrāṃśu jagad yāvat tāvat prāleyaleśakāḥ ।। 

cetanaś cittariktaś ced bhāvitas tat kusaṃsṛteḥ ।
āmūlam eva dagdhāni viddhi mūlāni siddhiman ।। 

cetanaṃ cittariktaṃ hi pratyakcetanam ucyate ।
nirmanaskasvabhāvaṃ tan na tatra kalanāmalaḥ ।। 

sā satyatā sā śivatā sā sattā pāramātmikī ।
sarvajñatā sā sā tṛptir nanu yatra manaḥ kṣatam ।। 

mano yatra tu tatrāsthās tatra duḥkhasukhāni ca ।
sadā sannidhim āyānti śmaśāna iva vāyasāḥ ।। 

avastutvāvabodhena sarvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ ।
saṃsṛtivratater bījaṃ saṅkalpe nopajāyate ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkasantatābhyāsayogataḥ ।
jāgatānām avastutvaṃ bhāvānām adhigamyate ।। 

avivekād upāhṛtya cetas svair yatnaniścayaiḥ ।
balātkāreṇa saṃyojyaṃ śāstrasatpuruṣakrame ।। 

mukhyaṃ kāraṇam ātmaiva paramātmāvalokane ।
agādhe patitaṃ ratnaṃ ratnenaivāvakṛṣyate ।। 

svānubhūtāni duḥkhāni svātmaiva tyaktum arhati ।
tenātmaivātmavijñāne hetur ekaḥ paras smṛtaḥ ।। 

pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api ।
nirastamananānantasaṃvinmātraparo bhava ।। 

mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so aham iti santyajya vāsanāḥ ।
ekaniṣṭhatayāntassthasaṃvinmātraparo bhava ।। 

vartamānabhaviṣyantyos sthityor ādeham ekadhīḥ ।
svasaṃvittyanusandhānāt samādhānaparo bhava ।। 

palāyaneṣu yuddheṣu duḥkheṣu ca sukheṣu ca ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu svasaṃvittiparo bhava ।। 

malaṃ saṃvedyam utsṛjya mano nirmathya mantharam ।
āśāpāśān alaṃ chittvā svasaṃvittiparo bhava ।। 

aśubhāśubhasaṅketas saṃśāntāśāviṣūcikaḥ ।
naṣṭeṣṭāniṣṭadṛṣṭis tvaṃ saṃvitsāraparo bhava ।। 

sakartṛkarmakaraṇān svān sparśān antar aspṛśan ।
nirvikalpanirālambas svacinmātraparo bhava ।। 

jāgraty eva hi sauṣuptīṃ bhāvayan susthirāṃ sthitim ।
sarvam astīti sañcintya sattaikātmavapur bhava ।। 

nānānānādaśāmukto yukto muktatayāśaye ।
samagrakalanādīpas svacinmātraparo bhava ।। 

ātmatāparate tyaktvā nirvibhāgo jagatsthitau ।
vajrastambhavad ātmānam avalambya sthiro bhava ।। 

chittvāntar mānasān pāśān āśārūpān udārayā ।
dhiyā dhairyaikadhāriṇyā nirdharmādharmatāṃ vraja ।। 

samāsādayatas tattvaṃ svasaṃvedanam ity alam ।
viṣaṃ hālāhalam api yāsyaty amṛtatāṃ tava ।। 

tadodeti mahāmohas saṃsṛtibhramakāraṇam ।
nirmalāyā niraṃśāyās svasaṃvitteś cyutir yadā ।। 

tadā saṅkṣīyate mohas saṃsṛtibhramakāraṇam ।
nirmalāyāṃ niraṃśāyāṃ svasaṃvittau sthitir yadā ।। 

svarūpam anuyātasya tīrṇasyāśāmahārṇavam ।
prasariṣyati te saṃvit sūryāṃśur iva sarvataḥ ।। 

svabhāvam ālokayata ānandamayasaṃsthiteḥ ।
rasāyanam api svādu rāma prativiṣāyate ।। 

tair na lajjāmahe pumbhir ye svabhāvam upāgatāḥ ।
śeṣāḥ puruṣanāmāno gardabhā dīrghabāhavaḥ ।। 

parvatāḥ kharvatāṃ yānti puro adrer iva dantinaḥ ।
parāṃ koṭiṃ prayātasya svasaṃvittyunnatasthiteḥ ।। 

ādṛśyadraṣṭṛsīmno antas sūryādīny akhilāny api ।
na tejāṃsy upakurvanti svasaṃviddivyacakṣuṣaḥ ।। 

avastutāṃ vrajanty ete madhyāhna iva dīpakāḥ ।
arkādayo mahālokavidhāv adhigatātmanaḥ ।। 

tejo'ṃśuṣu prabhāveṣu baleṣv atimahatsv api ।
sarveṣūnnatiyukteṣu tattvajñaḥ paramonnataḥ ।। 

bhānti bhāsā yathā sūryavahnīndumaṇitārakāḥ ।
tathā jagati rājante jñātajñeyā narottamāḥ ।। 

dharāvivarakīṭebhyo gardabhebhyo api mānavāḥ ।
tiryagbhyaś cāpy atattvajñā rāma tucchatarās smṛtāḥ ।। 

tāvat sammohavetālo deho yāvad anātmavān ।
ātmajña eva saṃyuktaś cetaneneti tadvidaḥ ।। 

anātmajño hi durdehaḥ prasphurann api bhūtale ।
śava eva bhramaty uccair ātmajñas tu sacetanaḥ ।। 

dūram ātmajñatā yāti citte pīvaratāṃ gate ।
ālokalakṣmīr amalā mahāmegha ivotthite ।। 

bhogābhogatiraskāraiḥ kārśyaṃ neyaṃ manaś śanaiḥ ।
rasāpahārais tajjñena kālenājīrṇaparṇavat ।। 

anātmany ātmabhāvena dehamātrāsthayānayā ।
putradārakuṭumbaiś ca ceto gacchati pīnatām ।। 

ahaṅkāravikāreṇa mamatāmalahelayā ।
idaṃ mameti bhāvena ceto gacchati pīnatām ।। 

jarāmaraṇaduḥkhena vyartham unnatim īyuṣā ।
doṣāśīviṣakośena ceto gacchati pīnatām ।। 

durāśākṣīrapānena bhogānilabalena ca ।
āsthādānena cānena cittāhir yāti pīnatām ।। 

ādhivyādhivilāsena samāśvāsena saṃsṛtau ।
heyādeyaprayatnena ceto gacchati pīnatām ।। 

āgamāpāyavapuṣā viṣavaiṣamyaśaṃsinā ।
bhogābhogena pīnena cittāhir yāti pīnatām ।। 

śarīraduśśvabhraciraprarūḍhaṃ cintācayoccākṛtimañjarīkam ।
jarāmṛtivyādhiphalāvanamraṃ kāmopabhogaughavikāsipuṣpam ।। 

vicārasārakrakacena cittaviṣadrumaṃ tvaṃ drutam indukalpa ।
āśāmahāśākham aśaṅkam eva cchinddhi prasahyārdravikalpapattram ।। 

mattaṃ kṣaṇaṃ caikataṭopaveśaviśrāntisaukhyeṣv asamartham ugram ।
āloḍanotkaṃ sujanakramābjaṣaṇḍasya caṇḍaṃ sukhaduḥkhagaṇḍam ।। 

cetogajaṃ kāyakukānanasthaṃ sutīkṣṇayā dhīkarajāgrapaṅktyā ।
vidārayādīrghavikāradantaṃ kriyākaraṃ rāghava rājasiṃha ।। 

ratiṃ gataṃ nityam asatpradeśe śarīramālāgrasanena puṣṭam ।
dhṛṣṭaṃ kriyākarkaśacañcucaṇḍam ekekṣaṇaṃ puṣṭatamo'ṃśakṛṣṇam ।। 

dūre samutsāraya sārabhūtaṃ duśceṣṭitaṃ karkaśam āraṭantam ।
garvoddhataṃ kāyakulāyakośād doṣopaśāntyai nijacittakākam ।। 

tṛṣṇāpiśācyā paricaryamāṇaṃ viśrāntam ajñānamahāvaṭeṣu ।
bhrāntaṃ ciraṃ dehaśateṣv aṭavyāṃ svasaṃsṛtau cetanavarjiteṣu ।। 

vivekavairāgyaguruprayatnamantrais svatantrais svacidātmagehāt ।
notsāritaś cittapiśācako ayaṃ yāvat kutas tāvad ihātmasiddhiḥ ।। 

śubhāsubhāśīrhatamānavaughaṃ cintāviṣaṃ kāyakukañcukaṃ ca ।
ajasram acchaśvasanāśanaṃ ca sarvasya rāmābhayanāśanaṃ ca ।। 

hṛdabjaduśśalmalikoṭarasthaṃ bhogaughagarhākhagamantraśaktyā ।
nītvā śamaṃ rāma manomahāhiṃ bhayaṃ bhṛśaṃ projjhya bhavābhayātmā ।। 

amaṅgalākāradharaś śarīraśavāvalīsantatasevanena ।
digāvalīsambhramaṇaśramārtaś śmaśānasevī vapuṣā kṣatena ।। 

bhogāmiṣe dikṣv abhidhāvamāna utkandharo dhīravivṛddhagarvaḥ ।
uḍḍīya ced gacchati cittagṛdhro dehadrumāt tan nipuṇaṃ jayas te ।। 

bhrāntaṃ vanānteṣu digantareṣu phalārthinaṃ cañcalam ākulāṅgam ।
janmāvaner janmamahīṃ prayāntaṃ saṃsārapānthaṃ janam āhasantam ।। 

drume akṣināsākusume bhujādiśākhe vilolāṅgulijālapattre ।
samullasantaṃ parimārayainaṃ manomahāmarkaṭam aṅga siddhyai ।। 

abhyutthitaṃ satphalasaṅkṣayāya lasatsukhāsaṅgataḍitprakāśam ।
varṣantam āsāram anarthasārtham āndolitaṃ vāsanavātyayāntaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpyasaṅkalpanavarjanogramantraprabhāvād dhṛdayāmbarāt tvam ।
sotsāham utsādaya cittameghaṃ mahat phalaṃ prāpya bhavālam āḍhyaḥ ।। 

granthīkṛtaṃ karmabhir ātmasṛṣṭaiś śastrair abhedyaṃ jvalanair adagdham ।
pīḍāṃ parām ātmani kalpayantaṃ samastajātyantaradīrghadāma ।। 

samprotanissaṅkhyaśarīramālaṃ balād asaṅkalpanamātraśastraiḥ ।
chittvā svayaṃ rāghava cittapāśaṃ yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ viharāstaśaṅkaḥ ।। 

phūtkāradagdhākhilamārgalokam atyantaduṣprāpaparaprabodham ।
āśāviṣāśoṣitalokaṣaṇḍaṃ vātāmiṣocchūnaśarīradaṇḍam ।। 

āmantharaṃ dehaguhāprasuptaṃ saṅkalpaghorājagaraṃ javena ।
akāmanānāmamahānalena balena dagdhvā vibhayo bhava tvam ।। 

cittena cetaś śamam āśu nītvā śuddhena ghorāstram ivāstrayuktyā ।
cirāya sādho tyaja cañcalatvaṃ vimarkaṭo vṛkṣa ivākṣataśrīḥ ।। 

alam alam iti kṛtvā cetasā vītaśaṅkaṃ vyupaśamitamalo antas sarvam ādeham eva ।
tṛṇalavalaghu paśyaṃl līlayāheyadṛṣṭyā piba vihara ramasva prāptasaṃsārapāraḥ ।। 

rāghavāśayaviniyogo nāma sargaḥ

ekapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paridīrghāsu tanvīṣu kacantīṣv asitāsu ca ।
kṣuradhāropamānāsu cittavṛttiṣu tiṣṭha mā ।। 

kālena ca mahākṣetre jāteyaṃ buddhivallarī ।
vṛddhiṃ vivekasekena nayaināṃ nayakovida ।। 

yāvan mlāyati no kāyakalikā kalibhasmanā ।
bhūtale patitāṃ tāvad enām uddhṛtya dhāraya ।। 

madvākyārthaikatattvajña madvākyārthaikabhāvanāt ।
sukham āpnoṣi sarpārir yathābhraravabhāvanāt ।। 

uddālakavad ālūnaviśīrṇaṃ bhūtapañcakam ।
kṛtvā kṛtvā dhiyā dhīra dhīrayāntar vicāraya ।। 

rāmaḥ

kena krameṇa bhagavan muninoddālakena tat ।
bhūtapañcakam ālūnaṃ kṛtvāntaḥ pravicāritam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāma yathā pūrvaṃ bhūtavṛndavicāraṇāt ।
uddālakena samprāptā paramā dṛṣṭir akṣatā ।। 

jagajjīrṇagṛhasyāsya koṇe kasmiṃścid ātate ।
bhūmer aniladiṅnāmni bhūbhṛdbhāṇḍabharākule ।। 

gandhamādanaśailendranāmnī kācit kila sthalī ।
vidyate kīrṇakusumā karpūradrumadhūsarā ।। 

vicitravarṇavihagā nānāvanavilāsinī ।
vanecaravyāptataṭī puṣpakesarahāsinī ।। 

kvacit sthitamahāratnā kvacin nīlāmbudotpalā ।
kvacin nīhārakavarī sarasīdarpaṇā kvacit ।। 

tatra kasmiṃścid udite sānau saphalapādape ।
āgulphakīrṇakusume snigdhacchāyāmahādrume ।। 

uddālako nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ ।
aprāptayauvanaḥ pūrvam uvāsoddāmatāpasaḥ ।। 

prathamaṃ tu babhūvāsāv alpaprajñāvicāravān ।
aprāptapadaviśrāntir aprabuddhaśubhāśayaḥ ।। 

tataḥ krameṇa tapasā śāstrārthaniyamair yamaiḥ ।
viveka ājagāmainaṃ navartur iva bhūtalam ।। 

athedaṃ cintayām āsa saṃsārabhayabhītadhīḥ ।
ekānta eva nivasan kadācit klāntamānasaḥ ।। 

kiṃ tat prāpyaṃ pradhānaṃ syād yad viśrāntau na śocyate ।
yat prāpya janmanā bhūyas sambandho nopajāyate ।। 

kadāhaṃ tyaktamananaḥ pade paramapāvane ।
viśrāntiṃ ciram eṣyāmi meruśṛṅga ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

kadā śamam upeṣyanti mamāntar bhogavāsanāḥ ।
ālolakallolaravā ūrmayo ambunidhāv iva ।। 

idaṃ kṛtvedam apy anyat kartavyam iti kalpanām ।
kadāntar vihasiṣyāmi padaviśrāntayā dhiyā ।। 

kadā vikalpajālaṃ me na lagiṣyati cetasi ।
sthitam apy ujjhitāsaṅgaṃ payaḥ padmadale yathā ।। 

kadā bahalakallolāṃ nāvā paramayā dhiyā ।
paritīrṇo bhaviṣyāmi tṛṣṇāmattataraṅgiṇīm ।। 

kademāṃ jāgatair bhūtaiḥ kriyamāṇām asanmayīm ।
kriyām upahasiṣyāmi bālalīlām ivāphalām ।। 

kadā vikalpaparyastamanodolāvadolanam ।
praśamiṣyati me śāntapānaujasa iva bhramaḥ ।। 

kadoditavapurbhāsvān vihasañ jāgatīr gatīḥ ।
antas santoṣam eṣyāmi virāḍātmeva pūrṇadhīḥ ।। 

śāntaś samasamācāras somyas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ ।
kadopaśamam eṣyāmi manthonmuktamahābdhivat ।। 

kademām akhilāṃ dṛśyaśriyam āśāśatātmikām ।
sarvāṃ suṣuptavat paśyan bhaviṣyāmy antarātataḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvaṃ śāntakalpanayā dhiyā ।
paśyaṃś cinmātram akhilaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kadā ।। 

kadopaśāntacittātmā cittām upagataḥ parām ।
paramālokam eṣyāmi jātyāndhyavigamād iva ।। 

kadābhyāsopalabdhena citprakāśena cāruṇā ।
dūrād ālokayiṣyāmi tanvīṃ kālakalām imām ।। 

īhitānīhitonmukto heyopādeyavarjitaḥ ।
kadāntas toṣam eṣyāmi svaprakāśapadasthitaḥ ।। 

kadāśākauśikīkīrṇā jāḍyajīrṇahṛdambujā ।
kṣayam eṣyati kṛṣṇeyaṃ kadā me mohayāminī ।। 

kadopaśāntamanano dharaṇīdharakandare ।
sameṣyāmi śilāsāmyaṃ nirvikalpasamādhinā ।। 

kadā me cittamātaṅgas svābhimānamahāmadaḥ ।
tattvāvabodhahariṇā hato nāśam upaiṣyati ।। 

niraṃśadhyānaviśrāntimūkasya mama mūrdhani ।
kadā karṇe kariṣyanti kulāyaṃ vanaputtikāḥ ।। 

kadā niśśaṅkam urasi dhyānādhīnadhiyaḥ khagāḥ ।
mama viśrāntim eṣyanti śailasthāṇutalasthiteḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇākarañjajaṭilāṃ janmajarjaragulmakām ।
saṃsārāraṇyasaraṇiṃ tyaktvā yāsyāmy ahaṃ kadā ।। 

iti cintāparavaśo vana uddālako dvijaḥ ।
punaḥ punas tūpaviśya dhyānābhyāsaṃ cakāra saḥ ।। 

viṣayair nīyamāne tu citte markaṭacañcale ।
na sa lebhe samādhānapratiṣṭhāṃ prītidāyinīm ।। 

kadācid bāhyasaṃsparśaparityāgād anantaram ।
tasyāgacchac cittakapiḥ prodvegaṃ tattvasaṃsthitau ।। 

kadācid āntarān sparśān parityajya manaḥkapiḥ ।
lolatvāt tasya saṃyāto viṣayaṃ viṣalubdhavat ।। 

kadācid āntarārkābhaṃ tejo dṛṣṭvāntare manaḥ ।
viṣayonmukhatāṃ yātaṃ tasya tāmarasekṣaṇa ।। 

antar āndhyatamastyāgaṃ kṛtvā viṣayalampaṭam ।
tasyoḍḍīya mano yāti kadācit trastapakṣivat ।। 

bāhyān ābhyantarān sparśāṃs tyaktvā nidrāṃ ca tanmanaḥ ।
tamas tejaś ca no lebhe kadācic chāśvatīṃ sthitim ।। 

iti paryākulāsv antas so aluṭhad dhyānavṛttiṣu ।
darīṣv anvaham ugrāsu vātabhagna iva drumaḥ ।। 

atiṣṭhal lūnasaṃrūḍhamanā mananasaṅkaṭe ।
yathā dolāyitavapus tṛṇaṃ tīrataraṅgake ।। 

atha paryākulamatir vijahārāratir girau ।
pratyahaṃ divasādhīśo mahāmerāv ivaikakaḥ ।। 

samagrabhūtaduṣprāpām ekadā prāpa kandarām ।
saṃśāntasarvasañcārāṃ munir mokṣadaśām iva ।। 

aparyākulitāṃ vātair aprāptamṛgapakṣiṇīṃ ।
adṛṣṭāṃ devagandharvaiḥ paramākāśaśobhanām ।। 

puṣpaprakarasañchannāṃ mṛduśādvalakomalām ।
jyotīrasāśmasamprotaiḥ kṛtāṃ marakatair iva ।। 

siddhagītalasacchāyāṃ prakaṭāṃ ratnadīpakaiḥ ।
suguptāṃ vanadevīnām antaḥpurakuṭīm iva ।। 

na locanāhitālokāṃ nātyuṣṇāṃ nātiśītalām ।
śāradasyoditārkasya hemagaurīṃ prabhām iva ।। 

nālpālokaparimlānāṃ komalāśabdamārutām ।
mañjarījaṭilopāntāṃ bālāṃ mālāvatīm iva ।। 

upaśamapadavīm ivāttarūpāṃ kamalajaviśramaṇāya yogyarūpām ।
kusumanikarakomalābhirāmāṃ sarasijakoṭarasundarīṃ samantāt ।। 

uddālakamanoratho nāma sargaḥ

dvipañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sa tāṃ viveśa dharmātmā gandhamādanakandarām ।
cirabhramaṇasamprāptām aliḥ padmakuṭīm iva ।। 

samādhānonmukhatayā praviśan sa vyarājata ।
sargavyāpāraviratāv ātmapuryām ivābjajaḥ ।। 

cakārāsanam ānīlaiḥ pattrair antassthagucchakam ।
mṛdu meghavidhir vṛndam āmbhodam iva tatra saḥ ।। 

tasya prasārayām āsa pṛṣṭhe cāru mṛgājinam ।
nīlaratnataṭe meros tārāśāram ivāmbaram ।। 

tatropāviśad āveśaṃ caitasaṃ tanutāṃ nayan ।
antaśśuddhavapuś śṛṅge vṛṣṭamūka ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

buddhavat sudṛḍhābaddhapadmāsana udaṅmukhaḥ ।
pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau dhṛtvā cakāra brāhmam añjalim ।। 

vāsanābhyas samāhṛtya manomṛgapariplutam ।
nirvikalpasamādhyarthaṃ cakāremāṃ vicāraṇām ।। 

ayi mūrkha manaḥ ko arthas tava saṃsāravṛttibhiḥ ।
dhīmanto na niṣevante paryante duḥkhadāṃ kriyām ।। 

anudhāvati yo bhogāṃs tyaktvā śamarasāyanam ।
sa tyaktamandāravanaḥ prayāti viṣajaṅgalam ।। 

yadi yāsi mahīrandhraṃ brahmalokam athāpi vā ।
tan na nirvṛtim āyāsi tvaṃ vinopaśamāmṛtam ।। 

āśāśatāvapūrṇatvaṃ tvam idaṃ sarvaduḥkhadam ।
tyaja yāhi paraṃ śreyaḥ padam ekāntasundaram ।। 

imā vicitrāḥ kalanā bhāvābhāvamayātmikāḥ ।
duḥkhāyaiva tavogrāya na sukhāya kadācana ।। 

śabdādikābhir etābhiḥ kiṃ mūḍha hatavṛttibhiḥ ।
bhramasy avirataṃ vyartham eva maṇḍūkikā yathā ।। 

manomaṇḍūkike vyartham iyantaṃ kālam andhayā ।
bhramantyā bhuvanaṃ viṣvak kiṃ samāsāditaṃ tvayā ।। 

yasmāt kiñcit tad āpnoṣi yasmin bhajasi nirvṛtim ।
tasmiṃś citta śame mūrkha nānubadhnāsi kiṃ padam ।। 

āgatya śrotratāṃ mūrkha vyarthotthānopabṛṃhitām ।
dhiyā śabdānusāriṇyā mṛgavan mā kṣayaṃ vraja ।। 

tvaktām āgatya duḥkhāya sparśonmukhatayānayā ।
mūrkha mā baddhatām ehi gajīlubdhagajendravat ।। 

rasanābhāvam āgatya gardhenāndha durandhasām ।
mā nāśam ehi baḍiśapiṇḍīlampaṭamatsyavat ।। 

cākṣuṣīṃ vṛttim āśritya stryādirūpāmayonmukhīm ।
mā gaccha dagdhatāṃ mugdha kāntilubdhapataṅgavat ।। 

ghrāṇamārgam upāśritya śarīrāmbhojakoṭare ।
gandhonmukhatayā bandhaṃ mā samāśraya bhṛṅgavat ।। 

kuraṅgālipataṅgebhamīnās tv ekaikaśo hatāḥ ।
sarvair etair anarthais tu vyāptasyājña kutas sukham ।। 

he citta vāsanājālaṃ bandhāya bhavatombhitam ।
svātmanas sahajaḥ phenas tāntavaḥ krimiṇā yathā ।। 

śaradabhravad āgatya śuddhiṃ tyaktamalāmayām ।
yadi śāmyasi nirmūlaṃ tad anantā jayās tava ।। 

kṣayodayadaśādātrīḥ paryantaparitāpinīḥ ।
jānann api jagaddṛṣṭīr na tyakṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi ।। 

karomy atha kimarthaṃ vā tavaitad anuśāsanam ।
vicāraṇavataḥ puṃsaś cittam asti hi nānagha ।। 

yāvad ajñānaghanatā tāvat praghanacittatā ।
yāvat prāvṛṭprabalatā tāvan nīhārabhūritā ।। 

yāvad ajñānatanutā tāvac cittasya tānavam ।
prāvṛṭparikṣayo yāvat tāvan nīhārasaṅkṣayaḥ ।। 

yāvat tānavam āyātaṃ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ vicāravat ।
tāvat tat kṣīṇam evāhaṃ manye śāradameghavat ।। 

anuśāsanam etad yad asato naśyato atha vā ।
kriyate tan nabhovāripavanāhananais samam ।। 

tasmāt saṅkṣīyamāṇaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmy aham asanmayam ।
maurkhyaṃ paramam evāhuḥ parityājyānuśāsanam ।। 

nirvikalpo asmi ciddīpo nirahaṅkāravāsanaḥ ।
tvayāhaṅkārabījena na sambaddho asmy asanmaya ।। 

ayaṃ so aham iti vyarthaṃ durdṛṣṭir avalambitā ।
tvayā mūḍha vināśāya śaṅkāviṣaviṣūcikā ।। 

anantasyātmatattvasya tanvī matimatī sthitiḥ ।
