na sambhavati bilvāntar vāsitā dantino yathā ।। 

mahāskhadeva gambhīrā duḥkhadā vāsanāśritā ।
tvayaiṣā tad asatpātir nainām anusarāmy aham ।। 

kaḥ kilāyaṃ mudhā moho bālasyevāvicāriṇaḥ ।
ayaṃ so aham iti bhrāntisandarbhaparikalpitaḥ ।। 

pādāṅguṣṭhāc chiro yāvat kaṇaśaḥ pravicāritam ।
na labdho asāv ahaṃ nāma kas syād ahaṃ iti sthitaḥ ।। 

bharitāśeṣadikkuñjaṃ paśyāmy ekaṃ jagattraye ।
saṃvedanam asaṃvedyaṃ sarvatra vitatātmakam ।। 

dṛśyate tasya neyattā na nāma parikalpanā ।
naikatā nānyatā caiva na mahattā na cāṇutā ।। 

vedanaṃ tvam asaṃvedyaṃ mayi ced duḥkhakāraṇam ।
vivekajena bhedena tad idaṃ hanyase mayā ।। 

idaṃ māṃsaṃ idaṃ raktam imāny asthīni dehake ।
ime te śvāsamarutaḥ ko asāv aham iti sthitaḥ ।। 

māṃsam anyad asṛk cānyad asthīny anyāni citta he ।
bodho anyas spandanaṃ cānyat ko asāv aham iti sthitaḥ ।। 

idaṃ ghrāṇam iyaṃ jihvā tvag iyaṃ śravaṇe ime ।
idaṃ cakṣur ayaṃ spandaḥ ko asāv aham iti sthitaḥ ।। 

yathābhūtatayā nāham asmi na tvaṃ na vāsanā ।
ātmā śuddhaś cidābhāsaḥ kevalo ayaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

aham eveha sarvatra nāhaṃ kiñcid apīha vā ।
ity eva sanmayī dṛṣṭir netaro vidyate kramaḥ ।। 

ciram ajñānadhūrtena pothito asmy aty ahantayā ।
vṛkeṇa dṛptenāṭavyāṃ labdhveva paśupotakaḥ ।। 

diṣṭyedānīṃ parijñāto mayaiṣo ajñānataskaraḥ ।
punar na saṃśrayāmy enaṃ svarūpārthāpahāriṇam ।। 

nirduḥkho duḥkhayogyasya nāham asya na caiṣa me ।
kaścid bhavati śailasya tatstha eva yathāmbudaḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ bhūtvā tv ahaṃ hīdaṃ vacmi tiṣṭhāmi yāmi vā ।
ātmāvalokanenāham anahaṅkāratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

nūnam evānya evaite matto ajñāś cakṣurādayaḥ ।
yāntu tiṣṭhantu vā dehe mamaite tu na kecana ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ ko ayam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ kenopakalpitaḥ ।
jagadbālakavetālas tālottālātulākṛtiḥ ।। 

etāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vyartham āluṭhito avaṭe ।
aham ambutṛṇonmukte duradrau hariṇo yathā ।। 

svārthaikālokane cakṣur yadi tūnmukhatāṃ gatam ।
tad ahaṃ nāma ko asau syād yo asmi duḥkhena mohitaḥ ।। 

sparśanāmni nije tattve yadi jātā tvag unmukhī ।
tat ko ayaṃ syād ahaṃ nāma kupiśāca ivoditaḥ ।। 

raseṣv abhiniṣaṇṇe asmin sve krame rasanendriye ।
ahaṃ mṛṣṭabhug ity eṣa kutastyaḥ kutsito bhramaḥ ।। 

śabdaśaktiṃ śrite śrotre varāke svārthapaṇḍite ।
tad ahaṅkāraduḥkhasya nirbījasya ka āgamaḥ ।। 

ātmambharitvabharite ghrāṇe svaṃ gandham āgate ।
ahaṃ ghrāteti yo mantā taṃ cauraṃ naiva vedmy aham ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇākrameṇaiṣā bhāvanāpy arthabhāvanī ।
bhāvas tasyām asatyāyāṃ yasyāsāv api sambhramaḥ ।। 

vāsanāhīnam apy etac cakṣurādīndriyaṃ svataḥ ।
pravartate bahis svārthe vāsanā nātra kāraṇam ।। 

vāsanārahitaṃ karma kriyate nanu citta he ।
kevalaṃ nānubhūyante sukhaduḥkhadṛśo atra tāḥ ।। 

tasmān mūrkhāṇīndriyāṇi tyaktvāntarvāsanāṃ nijām ।
kurudhvaṃ karma he sarvaṃ na duḥkhaṃ samavāpsyatha ।। 

bhavadbhir eva duḥkhāya vāsanā vāsitā mudhā ।
bālaiḥ paṅkakrīḍanakavināśeneva khinnatā ।। 

vāsanādyā dṛśas sarvā vyatiriktās tu nātmanaḥ ।
jalād iva taraṅgālyo jñasyaivājñasya nānagha ।। 

tṛṣṇayaiva vinaṣṭās stha vyartham indriyacārakāḥ ।
kośakārāḥ kukrimayas tantuneva svayambhuvā ।। 

tṛṣṇayaiveha luṭhatha jarāmaraṇasaṅkaṭe ।
bhramadṛṣṭyeva śikharipathikāś śvabhrabhūmiṣu ।। 

vāsanaiveha bhavatāṃ hetur ekatra bandhane ।
rajjuś śūnyāśayaprotā muktānām ātatā yathā ।। 

kalpanāmātrakalitā na satyaiṣā hi vastutaḥ ।
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa dātreṇeva vilūyate ।। 

eṣā hi bhavatām eva vimohāya kṣayāya ca ।
vātalekheva dīpānāṃ sphuratām api tejasā ।। 

he citta sarvendriyakośa tasmāt sarvendriyair aikyam upetya nūnam ।
ālokya cātmānam asatsvarūpaṃ nirvāṇam ekāmalabodham āssva ।। 

viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām anantāṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya ।
abhimataparihārakāryayuktyā bhava vibhayo bhagavān bhiyām abhūmiḥ ।। 

uddālakavicāro nāma sargaḥ

tripañcāśas sargaḥ

uddālakaḥ

apāraparyantavapuḥ paramāṇvaṇur eva vā ।
cid acetyā tadākrāntau na śaktā vāsanādayaḥ ।। 

manaśśemuṣyahaṅkārapratibimbaiś śaṭhendriyaiḥ ।
vāsanotthāpitā śūnyavetālī trāsanodyatā ।। 

tatkṛtebhyo vikārebhyo bhītiṃ tāny eva bhūriśaḥ ।
bhūyo apy anubhavantv antar ahaṃ hi cid alepikā ।। 

cito na janmamaraṇe sarvagāyāś citaḥ kila ।
kiṃ nāma mriyate brūta māryate kena vāpi kim ।। 

cito na jīvitenārthas sarvātmā saiva jīvitam ।
kiṃ prāpsyati kadātmaiṣa prāṅmṛto yadi jīvati ।। 

jīvyate mriyate ceti kuvikalpakalāpinām ।
kalanā manasām eva nātmano vitatātmanaḥ ।। 

yo hy ahambhāvatāṃ prāpto bhāvābhāvais sa gṛhyate ।
ātmano nāsty ahambhāvo bhāvābhāvāḥ kuto asya te ।। 

ahambhāvo mudhā moho manaś ca mṛgatṛṣṇikā ।
jaḍaḥ padārthasambhāraḥ kasyāhambhāvabhāvanā ।। 

raktamāṃsamayo deho mano naṣṭaṃ vicāraṇāt ।
jaḍāś cittādayas sarve kuto ahambhāvabhāvanā ।। 

ātmambharitayā nityam indriyāṇi sthitāny alam ।
padārthāś ca padārthatve kuto ahambhāvabhāvanā ।। 

guṇā guṇeṣu vartante prakṛtiḥ prakṛtau sthitā ।
sad eva sati viśrāntaṃ kuto ahambhāvabhāvanā ।। 

sarvagaṃ sarvadehasthaṃ sarvakālamayaṃ mahat ।
kevalaṃ paramābhānaṃ cidātmaiva hi saṃsthitam ।। 

evaṃ kimākṛtiḥ ko vā kimādeyaś ca kiṅkṛtaḥ ।
kiṃrūpaḥ kimmayaḥ ko ahaṃ kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim ।। 

tenāhaṃ nāma nehāsti bhāvābhāvopapattimān ।
anahaṅkārarūpasya sambandhaḥ kena me katham ।। 

asaty alam ahaṅkāre sambandhaḥ kena kasya kaḥ ।
sambandhābhāvasaṃsiddhau vilīnā dvitvakalpanā ।। 

evaṃ brahmātmakam idaṃ yat kiñcij jagati sthitam ।
brahmaivāsti tad evāsmi pariśocāmi kiṃ mudhā ।। 

ekasminn eva vimale pade sarvagate sthite ।
ahaṅkārakalaṅkasya kathaṃ nāmodayaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

nāsty eva hi padārthaśrīr ātmaivāstīha sarvagaḥ ।
padārthalakṣmyāṃ satyāṃ ca sambandho asti na kasyacit ।। 

indriyair indriyeṣv aṅgair mano manasi valgati ।
cid aluptavapuḥ kena sambaddhaṃ kasya kiṃ katham ।। 

upalāyaśśalākānāṃ sambandho na yathā mithaḥ ।
tathaikatrāpi dṛṣṭānāṃ dehendriyamanaścitām ।। 

asadabhyutthite vyartham ahaṅkāramahābhrame ।
mamedam idam asyeti viparyastam idaṃ jagat ।। 

atattvālokajāteyam ahaṅkāracamatkṛtiḥ ।
tāpena himalekheva tattvālokena līyate ।। 

ātmano vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid api vidyate ।
śabdabrahmeti tat tattvam etat tad bhāvayāmy alam ।। 

ahaṅkārabhramasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
apunassmaraṇaṃ manye nūnaṃ vismaraṇaṃ varam ।। 

samūlaṃ parivismṛtya cirāyāhaṅkṛtibhramam ।
tiṣṭhāmy ātmani satyātmā śaratkhe śaradīva kham ।। 

dadāty anarthanicayaṃ vikāsayati duṣkṛtam ।
vistārayati santāpam ahambhāvo anusaṃhitaḥ ।। 

sphuraty ahaṅkāraghane hṛdvyomni salilātmani ।
vikasaty abhitaḥ kāyakadambe doṣamañjarī ।। 

maraṇam jīvitopāntaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇāntagam ।
bhāvo abhāvāvadhicchinnaḥ kaṣṭeyaṃ duḥkhavedanā ।। 

idaṃ labdham idaṃ prāpsyāmīty antardāhakāriṇī ।
na śāmyaty arkaratnānāṃ grīṣme arcir iva durdhiyām ।। 

nāstīdam idam astīti cintā dhāvaty ahaṅkṛtim ।
jaḍāśayā jaḍām abhramālā śailāvalīm iva ।। 

ahaṅkāre parikṣīṇe śuṣkas saṃsārapādapaḥ ।
bhūyaḥ prayacchaty araso na pāṣāṇavad aṅkuram ।। 

sutṛṣṇākṛṣṇabhoginyo dehadrumakṛtālayāḥ ।
kvāpi yānti vicārātmany āgate vinatāsute ।। 

asadabhyutthite viśve tajjā vayam asanmayāḥ ।
asanmayaparispande tvam ahaṃ ceti kaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

idaṃ jagad udety ādāv akāraṇam akāraṇāt ।
yad akāraṇam ucchūnaṃ tat sad ity ucyate katham ।। 

aparyantaṃ purā kālaṃ mṛdi kumbha ivākṛtaḥ ।
deho abhavad idānīṃ tu tathaivānte bhaviṣyati ।। 

madhye naravayomātraṃ kañcit kālaṃ tu cañcalam ।
ādyantasomyate tyaktvā vāri vīcitayā yathā ।। 

asmin kṣaṇaparispande dehe viśaraṇonmukhe ।
taraṅge ca nibaddhāsthā ye hatās te kudṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

prāk purastāc ca sarvāṇi santi vastūni cābhitaḥ ।
madhyasphuṭatva eteṣāṃ kevāsthā hatarūpiṇi ।। 

citta pūrvaṃ purastāc ca videhaṃ śāntam ity asi ।
sad asad vā khasaṃlīnaṃ madhye asmin kiṃ tavogratā ।। 

yathā svapnavikāreṣu yathā sambhramadṛṣṭiṣu ।
yathā vā madalīlāsu yathā nauyānasambhrame ।। 

yathā dhātuvikāreṣu yathā vendriyaviplave ।
yathātisambhramānandadoṣāveśavaśeṣu ca ।। 

dṛśyate kṣīyate caiva rūpaṃ sadasatoś calam ।
tathaivedam iyaṃ tv eṣā kāle nyūnātiriktatā ।। 

sā ca tvayā kṛtā nityaṃ citta duḥkhasukhodayaiḥ ।
yathā viyogasaṃyogayāminyor anurāgiṇām ।। 

tvam apy evāsadābhāsaṃ mithyā sad iva lakṣyase ।
mṛgatṛṣṇeva tenaitat tvatkṛtaṃ sat kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi tat sarvaṃ dṛśyamaṇḍalam ।
avastv iti vinirṇīya mano yāhy amanaḥpadam ।। 

avastv idam iti sphāre rūḍhe manasi niścaye ।
hemanta iva padminyaḥ kṣīyante bhogavāsanāḥ ।। 

citā dṛṣṭātmanā nūnaṃ santyaktamananaujasā ।
manasā vītarāgeṇa svayaṃ svasthena bhūyate ।। 

paramātmānale kṣiptasaṃvittyavayavaṃ svayam ।
dagdhātmakam alaṃ cittaṃ śuddhatām eti śāśvatīm ।। 

deham anyatayā dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā viṣayavāsanām ।
vināśam urarīkṛtya mano jayati vīravat ।। 

manaś śatruś śarīrasya śarīraṃ manaso ripuḥ ।
ekabhāvena naśyete ādhārādheyakāryavat ।। 

rāgadveṣavator nityam anyo'nyātiviruddhayoḥ ।
etayor mūlakāṣeṇa vināśaḥ paramaṃ sukham ।। 

etayor ekasaṃsthāne ratir ity eva yā kathā ।
sā vyomny ayasstriyā bhuktā dhareti kathayā samā ।। 

akṛtrimavirodhasthau yatra saṅghaṭitāv ubhau ।
dhārā iva patanty eva tatrānarthaparamparāḥ ।। 

mithoviruddhasaṃsarge ratim ety adhamo hi yaḥ ।
tyaktavyas sa patadvārāv agnirāśāv apelave ।। 

saṅkalpena manas spṛṣṭvā śarīraṃ bālayakṣavat ।
pātrāyeva dhanāny asmai svaduḥkhāni prayacchati ।। 

tair duḥkhais tāpito deho mano hantum athecchati ।
putro api hanti pitaram ātatāyipadaṃ gatam ।। 

nāsti śatruḥ prakṛtyaiva na ca mitraṃ kadācana ।
sukhadaṃ mitram ity uktaṃ duḥkhadāś śatravas smṛtāḥ ।। 

deho duḥkhāny anubhavan svamano hantum icchati ।
dehaṃ manas svaduḥkhānāṃ satkośaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt ।। 

evaṃ mitho duḥkhadayoś śliṣṭayoḥ kas sukhāgamaḥ ।
etayor dehamanasor jātyaivānyo'nyaviddhayoḥ ।। 

manasy eva parikṣīṇe na deho duḥkhabhājanam ।
tatkṣayotkatayā nityaṃ deho api paridhāvati ।। 

naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam anarthāya śarīraṃ padam āpadām ।
alabdhātmavivekena manasāśu vinindyate ।। 

ete manaśśarīre hi mithaḥ pīvaratāṃ gate ।
jaḍarūpe hi varṣāsu payodasarasī yathā ।। 

mitho duḥkhāya sampanne ekarūpe dvidhā sthite ।
vyavahārapare sārdhaṃ loke vāyvanalāv iva ।। 

citte kṣayiṇi saṅkṣīṇo deha ā mūlato bhavet ।
vardhamāne tarur iva śataśākhaḥ pravardhate ।। 

kṣīyate manasi kṣīṇe dehaḥ prakṣīṇavāsanaḥ ।
mano na kṣīyate kṣīṇe dehe tat kṣapayen manaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpapādapaṃ tṛṣṇālataṃ chittvā manovanam ।
vitatām bhuvam āsādya viharāmi yathāsukham ।। 

prakṣīyamāṇam evedaṃ mama manye manas sthitam ।
praśāmyadvāsanājālaṃ prāvṛḍanta ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

dhātūnāṃ sanniveśo ayaṃ dehanāmā vapur mama ।
prakṣīyamāṇe manasi galann evāvatiṣṭhatu ।। 

yadarthaṃ kila bhogaśrīr vāñchyate tat kalevaram ।
na me nāpi ca tasyāhaṃ ko arthas sukhalavena me ।। 

nāhaṃ deha iti tv asmin yuktim ākarṇaya krame ।
sarvāṅgeṣv api satsv eva śavaḥ kasmān na valgati ।। 

tasmād dehād atīto ahaṃ nityo anastamitadyutiḥ ।
yas saṅgaṃ bhāsvatā prāpya vedmi vyomani bhāskaram ।। 

jño ahaṃ me na sukhenārtho nānarthena ca duḥkhitā ।
śarīram astu vā māstu sthito asmi vigatajvaraḥ ।। 

yatrātmā tatra na mano nendriyāṇi na vāsanāḥ ।
pāmarāḥ paritiṣṭhanti nikaṭe na mahībhṛtaḥ ।। 

padaṃ tad anuyāto asmi kevalo asmi jayāmy aham ।
nisspṛho asmi niraṃśo asmi nirīho asmi nirīpsitaḥ ।। 

nedānīṃ mama sambandho manodehendriyādibhiḥ ।
pṛthakkṛtasya tailasya tilair vidalitair yathā ।। 

svasmāt padavarād asmāl līlayā calitasya me ।
adha ākramataḥ kiñcit parivāro hy ayaṃ śubhaḥ ।। 

svasthatorjitatā sattā hṛdyatā satyatā jñatā ।
ānanditopaśamitā matā ca muditoditā ।। 

pūrṇatodāratā satyā kāntimattaikatānatā ।
sarvaikatā nirbhayatā kṣīṇadvitvavikalpatā ।। 

etā nityoditās svasthās sundaryas subhagodayāḥ ।
mamaikātmarateḥ kāntā nityaṃ hṛdayavallabhāḥ ।। 

sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvasmin sambhavaty ataḥ ।
sarvaṃ prati mama kṣīṇe vāñchāvāñche sukhāsukham ।। 

vigatamohatayā vimanastayā gatavikalpanacittatayā sphuṭam ।
uparamāmy aham ātmani śītale ghanalavaś śaradīva nabhastale ।। 

uddālakavicāravilāso nāma sargaḥ

catuṣpañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nirṇīya tatayā dhiyā dhavalayā muniḥ ।
baddhapadmāsanas tasthāv ardhonmīlitalocanaḥ ।। 

oṅkāram akarot tārasvaram ūrdhvagatadhvanim ।
samyagāhatalāṅgūlaṃ ghaṇṭākumbham ivāravam ।। 

omuccārayatas tasya saṃvittattve tadunmukhe ।
yāvadoṅkāram ūrdhvasthe vitate vimalātmani ।। 

sārdhatryaṃśātmamātrasya prathame aṃśe sphuṭārave ।
praṇavasya manākkṣubdhaprāṇāraṇitadehake ।। 

recakākhyo akhilaṃ kāyaṃ prāṇaniṣkramaṇakramaḥ ।
riktīcakāra pītāmbur agastya iva sāgaram ।। 

atiṣṭhat prāṇapavanaś cidrasāpūrite ambare ।
tyaktadehaḥ parityaktanīḍaḥ khaga ivāmbare ।। 

hṛdayāgnir jvalañ jvālī dadāha malinaṃ vapuḥ ।
utpātapavanocchūno dāvaś śuṣkam iva drumam ।। 

yāvadiccham avasthaiṣā praṇavaprathame krame ।
babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ ।। 

athetarāṃśāvasare praṇavasya samasthitau ।
nisspandakumbhako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ ।। 

na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nāśāsu tatra te ।
saṅkṣobham agaman prāṇā ardhasaṃstambhitā iva ।। 

dagdhadehapuro vahniś śaśāmāśanivat kṣaṇāt ।
adṛśyata sitaṃ bhasma śārīraṃ himapāṇḍuram ।। 

yatra karpūraśayyāyāṃ suptānīva sukhocitam ।
śarīrāsthīni lakṣyante nisspandāni sitāni ca ।। 

tad bhasma pavanādhūtaṃ sāsthi vāyur ayojayat ।
svadehe bhṛśam ucchūne trinetravratavān iva ।। 

tac caṇḍapavanoddhūtam āvṛtya gaganaṃ kṣaṇāt ।
śaradīvābhramihikā kvāpi bhasmāsthimad yayau ।। 

yāvadiccham avasthaiṣā praṇavasyāpare krame ।
babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ ।। 

tatas tṛtīyāvasare praṇavasyopaśāntide ।
pūraṇāt pūrako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ ।। 

asminn avasare prāṇāś cetanāmṛtamadhyagāḥ ।
vyomni śītalatām īyur himasaṃsparśasundarīm ।। 

kramād gaganamadhyasthāś candramaṇḍalatāṃ yayuḥ ।
dhūmā gaganakośasthāś śītalāmbudatām iva ।। 

kalākalāpasampūrṇe te tasmiṃś candramaṇḍale ।
puṇyarāśāv ivāpūrṇe rasāyanamahārṇave ।। 

rasāyanamahādhārās sampannāḥ prāṇavāyavaḥ ।
maṇiyaṣṭisamākārā jaleṣv indor ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

sā papātāmbarād dhārā śeṣe śārīrabhasmani ।
rāsāyanī haraśiraḥpatiteva surāpagā ।। 

udabhūd indubimbābhaṃ caturbāhuvapus tayā ।
prasphuranmandarād abdheḥ pārijāta iva drumaḥ ।। 

uddālakaśarīraṃ tan nārāyaṇatayoditam ।
praphultacūtavat kāntam ābabhau dīptisundaram ।। 

rasāyanamayāḥ prāṇās taccharīram apūrayan ।
saridoghā iva saro vṛkṣaṃ madhurasā iva ।। 

antaḥ kuṇḍalinīṃ prāṇāḥ pūrayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।
vakrānuvakraprasṛtās sarāṃsīva saritskhadām ।। 

prakṛtisthaṃ babhūvāsya tac charīraṃ dvijanmanaḥ ।
prāvṛṭsaṃrambhavigame dhautaṃ talam ivāvaneḥ ।। 

atha padmāsanagataḥ kṛtvā dehe sthitiṃ dṛḍhām ।
ālāna iva mātaṅgaṃ nibadhyendriyapañcakam ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhyarthaṃ vyavasāyam upādade ।
svabhāvaṃ svacchatāṃ netuṃ śaratkāla ivāmalaḥ ।। 

svasvāntavātahariṇam āśādiggaṇagāminam ।
cintayā hṛdayaṃ ninye dūrād rajjveva kīlakam ।। 

dhāvamānam adho mattaṃ cittam ābilam ākulam ।
balāt saṃrodhayām āsa setur jalam iva drutam ।। 

nyamīmilad dṛśāv ardhaṃ paripakṣmalapakṣmake ।
nisspandatārāmadhupe sandhyākāla ivāmbuje ।। 

somyatām anayan maunī prāṇāpānajavaṃ mukhe ।
śvasanaṃ śreyase deśe praśastas samayo yathā ।। 

tilebhya iva tailāni pṛthak cakre prayatnataḥ ।
indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ kūrmo aṅgānīva gopayan ।। 

bāhyān sparśān aśeṣeṇa jahau dūre śanair arīn ।
sahasā kuṇḍakacchanno maṇir dūraṃ tviṣo yathā ।। 

vilīnān āntarāṃś cakre sparśān ujjhitadarśanān ।
rasān viṭapakośasthān mārgaśīrṣa iva drumaḥ ।। 

rurodha gudasaṅkocān navadvārānilān atha ।
mukhasaṃsthaganāt kumbharandhrakośān ivetarān ।। 

ātmaratnaprakāśāḍhyāṃ spaṣṭāṃ kusumalāñchitām ।
dadhāra kandharāṃ dhīrāṃ meruś śṛṅgaśikhām iva ।। 

dadhāra hṛdayākāśe manas saṃyamam āgatam ।
vindhyakhāta ivonmattaṃ gajaṃ yuktivaśīkṛtam ।। 

śarannabhovad āsādya nirmalām atisomyatām ।
jahāra paripūrṇābdher meroś cātaralāṃ śriyam ।। 

dudhāvātha vikalpaughān pratibhāsam upeyuṣaḥ ।
puraḥparisphuradrūpān maṣakān iva mārutaḥ ।। 

āgacchato yathākāmaṃ pratibhāsān punaḥ punaḥ ।
acchinan manasā śūraḥ khaḍgeneva raṇe śarān ।। 

vikalpaughe parālūne so apaśyad dhṛdayāmbare ।
tamaś channavivekārkaṃ lolakajjalamecakam ।। 

tad apy utsārayām āsa samyak svāntavivasvatā ।
samyagjñānoditenāśu pavaneneva kajjalam ।। 

tamasy uparate kāntaṃ tejaḥpuñjaṃ dadarśa saḥ ।
śārvare timire śānte prātas sāndhyam ivāmbudam ।। 

taṃ lulāva sthalābjānāṃ vanaṃ bāla iva dvipaḥ ।
apibac cāpy asṛkpūraṃ vetāla iva vegataḥ ।। 

tejasy uparate tasya ghūrṇamānaṃ mano muneḥ ।
niśābjavad agān nidrāṃ lolaṃ kṣīvavad eva vā ।। 

meghamālāṃ iva marud bālo nīlābjinīm iva ।
yāminīm iva tīkṣṇāṃśus tām apy āśu lulāva saḥ ।। 

nidrāvyupaśame tasya bhāvayām āsa tan manaḥ ।
vyoma śyāmaladṛg jantur nabhasīva śikhaṇḍakam ।। 

payoda iva tāpiñchaṃ nīhāram iva mārutaḥ ।
tamo dīpa ivācchātmā tad apy āśu mamārja saḥ ।। 

vyomasaṃvidi bhagnāyāṃ mūḍhaṃ tasyābhavan manaḥ ।
nidrāyāṃ pravilīnāyāṃ maireyamadavān iva ।। 

moham apy eṣa manasas taṃ mamārja mahāśayaḥ ।
yāminījanitaṃ jāḍyaṃ bhuvanād iva bhāskaraḥ ।। 

tatas tejastamonidrāmohādiparivarjitam ।
kām apy avasthām āsādya viśaśrāma manaḥ kṣaṇam ।। 

viśramyāśu papātāṅgasaṃvidaṃ citsvarūpiṇīm ।
seturuddhaṃ sarovāri pratīpaṃ svam ivāspadam ।। 

cirānusandhānavaśāt svadanāc ca svasaṃvidaḥ ।
tataś cinmayatām āgād dhema nūpuratām iva ।। 

cittatvam atha santyajya cittaṃ cittvaṃ tataṃ gataṃ ।
anyad eva babhūvāśu paṅkaḥ kumbhasthitāv iva ।। 

cetyaṃ santyajya cic chuddhā citsāmānyam athāyayau ।
tyaktavīcyādibhede abdhau vārsāmānyam ivaikadhīḥ ।। 

tyaktabhūtaughamananaṃ tato viśvambharaṃ bṛhat ।
cidākāśaṃ tataṃ śuddhaṃ so abhavad bodhim āgataḥ ।। 

tatra prāpa mahānandaṃ dṛśyadarśanavarjitam ।
anantam uttamāsvādaṃ rasāyanam ivārṇavam ।। 

śarīrāt samatīto asau kām apy avanim āgataḥ ।
sattāsāmānyarūpātmā babhūvānandasāgaraḥ ।। 

dvijacetanahaṃso asāv ānandasarasi sthire ।
atiṣṭhac charadacche khe kalāpūrṇa ivoḍupaḥ ।। 

babhūvāvātadīpābho lipikarmārpitopamaḥ ।
vītavelāmbudhiprakhyo vṛṣṭamūkāmbudasthitiḥ ।। 

athaitasmin mahāloke tiṣṭhann uddālakaś ciram ।
apaśyad vyomagān siddhān amarān iva bhūriśaḥ ।। 

āgatāni vicitrāṇi siddhajālāni cābhitaḥ ।
śakrārkapadadātṝṇi nīrandhrāṇy apsarogaṇaiḥ ।। 

tāni nādarayāṃ cakre siddhavṛndāni sa dvijaḥ ।
gambhīramatir akṣubdho vilāsān iva śaiśavān ।। 

siddhasārtham anādṛtya tasmin svānandamandire ।
atiṣṭhad atha ṣaṇmāsān diktaṭe arka ivottare ।। 

jīvanmuktapadaṃ tat tad yat sa samprāptavān dvijaḥ ।
tatra siddhās surās sādhyās sthitā brahmaharādayaḥ ।। 

ānandapariṇāmitvād anānandapadaṃ gatāḥ ।
nānande na nirānande tatas tatsaṃvid ābabhau ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vā tatra labdhvā sthitiṃ manaḥ ।
ratim eti na bhogaughe dṛṣṭasvarga ivāvanau ।। 

tat padaṃ sā gatiś śāntā tac chreyaś śāśvataṃ śivam ।
tatra viśrāntim āptasya na bhūyo jāyate śramaḥ ।। 

tat padaṃ sādhavaḥ prāpya dṛśyadṛṣṭim imāṃ punaḥ ।
na yānti khadirodyānaṃ labdhacaitrarathā iva ।। 

tāṃ mahānandapadavīṃ cittāny āsādya dehinām ।
dṛśyaṃ na bahu manyante rājāno dīnatām iva ।। 

cetas tatpadaviśrāntaṃ buddhaṃ dṛśyadaśāṃ prati ।
kadarthād bodham āyāti na yāty evātha vānagha ।। 

uddālako atha ṣaṇmāsān dūrotsāritasiddhabhūḥ ।
uṣitvonmiṣato ambhodakośād arko madhāv iva ।। 

dadarśa samprabuddhātmā punaḥ paramatejasaḥ ।
praṇāmalālasān siddhāṃś candrabimbavapurdharān ।। 

ramaṇīr gauramandārareṇvabhrāmalacāmarāḥ ।
sphuratpatākāpaṭalā dyuvimānaparamparāḥ ।। 

asmadādīn munīn darbhapavitrāṅkakarāmbujān ।
vidyādharībhir valitān vidyādharapatīn api ।। 

te tam ūcur mahātmānam uddālakamuniṃ tadā ।
prasādena praṇāmān no bhagavann avalokaya ।। 

āruhyemaṃ vimānaṃ tvam ehi traiviṣṭapaṃ puraṃ ।
svarga eva hi sīmānto jagatsambhogasampadām ।। 

ākalpam ucitān bhuṅkṣva bhogān abhimatān vibho ।
svargādiphalabhogārtham evāśeṣatapaḥkriyāḥ ।। 

hāracāmaradhāriṇyo vidyādharavarāṅganāḥ ।
paśyemās tvām upāsīnāḥ kariṇyaḥ kariṇaṃ yathā ।। 

kāmo dharmārthayos sāraḥ kāmasārāś śucismitāḥ ।
vasanta iva mañjaryas svarga eva bhavanti tāḥ ।। 

evaṃ kathayatas siddhān atithīn ity asau muniḥ ।
paripūjya yathānyāyam atiṣṭhad gatasambhramam ।। 

nābhyanandan na tatyāja tāṃ vibhūtiṃ sa dhīradhīḥ ।
bhos siddhā vrajatety uktvā svavyāpāraparo abhavat ।। 

atha svakarmanirataṃ bhogeṣv aratim āgatam ।
tam upāsya yayus siddhā dinaiḥ katipayais svayam ।। 

jīvanmuktas sa ca munir vijahāra yathāsukham ।
yāvadicchaṃ vanānteṣu munīnām āśrameṣu ca ।। 

merumandarakailāsahimavadvindhyasānuṣu ।
dvīpopavanadikkuñjajaṅgalāraṇyabhūmiṣu ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti samprāptapada uddālako dvijaḥ ।
guhāsu girikukṣīṇāṃ nyavasad dhyānalīlayā ।। 

kadācid ahnā māsena kadācid vatsareṇa ca ।
kadācid vatsaraughena dhyānāsakto vyabudhyata ।। 

uddālakas tad ārabhya vyavahāraparo api san ।
susamāhita evāsīc cittattvaikatvam āgataḥ ।। 

cittattvaikaghanābhyāsān mahācittvam upetya saḥ ।
dṛśye asmiṃś citraravivan nāstam āyān na codayam ।। 

samaparapadalābhaprāptisaṃśāntacetā dalitajananapāśaḥ kṣīṇasandehadolaḥ ।
śaradi kham iva kāntaṃ vyātataṃ corjitaṃ ca sphuṭam amalam alekhaṃ tat vapus svaṃ babhāra ।। 

uddālakaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

pañcapañcāśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ātmajñānadinaikārka matsaṃśayatṛṇānala ।
ajñānadāhaśītāṃśo sattāsāmānyam īśa kim ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yadā saṅkṣīyate cittam abhāvātyantabhāvanāt ।
citsāmānyasvarūpasya sattāsāmānyatā tadā ।। 

nūnaṃ cetyāṃśarahitā cid yadātmani līyate ।
asadrūpavad atyacchaṃ sattāsāmānyatā tadā ।। 

yadā sarvāṇi dṛśyāni saṃśāntānyo'nyavedanam ।
svarūpeṇa svarūpābhaṃ bhāvyante samatā tadā ।। 

kūrmāṅgānīva dṛśyāni līyante svātmanātmani ।
abhāvitāny eva yadā sattāsāmānyatā tadā ।। 

dṛṣṭir eṣā hi paramā sadehādehayos sadā ।
muktayos sambhavaty eva turyātītapadopamā ।। 

vyutthitasya bhavaty eṣā samādhisthasya cānagha ।
jñasya kevalam ajñasya na bhavaty eva bodhajā ।। 

asyāṃ dṛśi sthitās sarve jīvanmuktā mahāśayāḥ ।
siddhā rasā iva bhuvi vyomavīthyām ivānilāḥ ।। 

asmatprabhṛtayas sarve nāradādyāś ca rāghava ।
brahmaviṣṇvīśvarādyāś ca dṛṣṭāv asyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

etām ālambya padavīṃ samastabhayanāśinīm ।
uddālako asāv avasad yāvadicchaṃ jagadgṛhe ।। 

atha kālena mahatā buddhis tasya babhūva ha ।
videhamuktas tiṣṭhāmi dehaṃ tyaktveti niścalā ।। 

evaṃ niścayavān adrer guhāyāṃ pallavāsane ।
baddhapadmāsanas tasthāv āmīlitavilocanaḥ ।। 

saṃyamya gudasaṃrodhād dvārāṇi nava cetasaḥ ।
mātrāsparśān acinvāno bhāvitasvāṅgacidghanaḥ ।। 

saṃruddhaprāṇapavanas samasaṃsthānakandharaḥ ।
tālumūlatalālagnajihvāmūlollasanmukhaḥ ।। 

na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nārthe na śūnyake ।
saṃyojitamanodṛṣṭir dantair dantān asaṃspṛśan ।। 

prāṇapravāhasaṃrodhasamas svacchānanacchaviḥ ।
aṅgacitsaṃviduttānaromakaṇṭakitāṅgabhūḥ ।। 

aṅgacitsaṃvidabhyāsāc citsāmānyam upādade ।
tadabhyāsād avāpāntar ānandasyandam uttamam ।। 

tadāsvādanato līnacitsāmānyadaśākramaḥ ।
viśvambharam anantātma sattāsāmānyam āyayau ।। 

tatsthas samasamābhogaḥ parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ ।
anānandasamānandamugdhamugdhamukhadyutiḥ ।। 

saṃśāntānandapulakaḥ padaṃ prāpyāpy alaṃ gataḥ ।
cirakālaparikṣīṇamananādibhavabhramaḥ ।। 

babhūva sa mahāsattvo lipikarmārpitopamaḥ ।
samaḥ kalāvapūrṇena śaradacchāmbarendunā ।। 

upaśaśāma śanair divasair asau katipayais svapade vimalātmani ।
tarurasaś śaradanta ivāmale ravikaraujasi janmadaśātigaḥ ।। 

gatasakalavikalpo nirvikāro abhirāmas sakalamalavilāsopādhinirmuktamūrtiḥ ।
vigalitasukham ādyaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāpa yasmiṃs tṛṇam iva jalarāśāv uhyate śakralakṣmīḥ ।। 

aparimitanabho'ntarvyāpidigvyāpi pūrṇaṃ bhuvanabharaṇaśīlaṃ bhūribhāgyopasevyam ।
kathanaguṇam atītaṃ satyam ānandam ādyaṃ sukham asukham anantaṃ brāhmaṇo asau babhūva ।। 

gatavati padam ādyaṃ cetasi svasvabhāvaṃ dvijatanur atha māsais sopaviṣṭā ca ṣaḍbhiḥ ।
ravikaraparitaptā vātajhāṅkāraramyā tanutarabahutantrī śailavīṇā babhūva ।। 

atha bahutarakālenainam adrer bhuvaṃ tām upayayur agakanyāsaṃyutā mātaraḥ khāt ।
abhimataphalasiddhyai saṃyutā eva sarvā analam iva śikhānāṃ paṅktayaḥ piṅgakeśyaḥ ।। 

dinakarakaraśuṣkaṃ viprakaṅkālakaṃ taj jhagiti ca karakoṭau baddhakhaṭvāṅgasaṅgā ।
sakalavibudhavandyā khiṅkhinī devadevī niśi navaratanṛttā kācakāntiṃ cakāra ।। 

ity uddālakadehako adya vilasanmāyūrabarhavrajavyālolābdalave nave vivalite mandāramālāgaṇaiḥ ।
śete khiṅkhinikāmahābhagavatīlīlālalāme latājāle bhṛṅga ivāntapuṣpapaṭale paścād upāgacchati ।। 

eṣoddālakacittavṛttikalanāvallī vivekasphuratsvānandapravikāsabhāsikusumā hṛtkānane vistṛte ।
rūḍhā yasya kadācid eva vilasadramyeva sacchāyayā nāsāv eti viyogam eti ca phalenoccaistarāṃ saṅgamam ।। 

uddālakanirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭpañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

krameṇānena ripuhan vicāryātmānam ātmanā ।
viśrāntim eti vitate pade padmadalekṣaṇa ।। 

śāstrārthagurucetobhis tāvat tāvad vicāryate ।
sarvadṛśyakṣayābhyāsād yāvad āsādyate param ।। 

vairāgyābhyāsaśāstrārthaprajñāguruyamakramaiḥ ।
padam āsādyate puṇyaṃ prajñayaivaikayātha vā ।। 

samprabodhavatī tīkṣṇā kalaṅkarahitā matiḥ ।
sarvasāmagryahīnāpi prāpyaṃ prāpnoti śāśvatam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa kaścij jñātasamādhikaḥ ।
prabuddha iti viśrānto vyavahāraparo api san ।। 

kaścid ekāntam āśritya samādhiniyatas sthitaḥ ।
tayos tu kataraś śreyān iti me bhagavan vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

imaṃ guṇasamāhāram anātmatvena paśyataḥ ।
antaśśītalatā yāsau samādhir iti kathyate ।। 

dṛśyair mama na sambandha iti niścitya śītalaḥ ।
kaścit saṃvyavahārasthaḥ kaścid dhyānavyavasthitaḥ ।। 

dvāv etau rāma susamāv antaś cet pariśītalau ।
antaśśītalatā yā syāt tad dhanaṃ tat tapaḥphalam ।। 

samādhisthānakasthasya cetaś ced vṛtticañcalam ।
tat tasya tat samādhānaṃ samam unmattatāṇḍavaiḥ ।। 

unmattatāṇḍavasthasya cetaś cet kṣīṇavāsanam ।
tad asyonmattanṛttaṃ tat samaṃ buddhasamādhinā ।। 

vyavahārī prabuddho yaḥ prabuddho yo vane sthitaḥ ।
dvāv etau puruṣau nūnam asandehapadaṃ gatau ।। 

akartṛ kurvad apy etac cetaḥ pratanuvāsanam ।
dūre gatamanā jantuḥ kathāsaṃśravaṇe yathā ।। 

akurvad api kartr eva cetaḥ praghanavāsanam ।
nisspandāṅgam api svapne śvabhrapātasthitāv iva ।। 

cetaso yad akartṛtvaṃ tat samādhānam uttamam ।
taṃ viddhi kevalībhāvaṃ sā śubhā nirvṛtiḥ parā ।। 

cetaścalācalatvaṃ hi paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ smṛteḥ ।
dhyānādhyānadṛśos tena tad evānaṅkuraṃ kuru ।। 

avāsanaṃ sthiraṃ proktaṃ mano dhyānaṃ tad eva ca ।
sa eva kevalībhāvaś śāntaṃ tatraiva tat sadā ।। 

tanuvāsanam apy uccaiḥpadāyodyatam ucyate ।
avāsanaṃ mano akartṛpadaṃ tasmād avāpyate ।। 

ghanavāsanam etat tu cetaḥ kartṛtvabhāvanam ।
sarvaduḥkhapradaṃ tasmād vāsanās tanutām nayet ।। 

praśāntajagadāstho antar vītaśokabhayaiṣaṇaḥ ।
svastho bhavati yenātmā sa samādhir iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

cetasā samparityajya sarvabhāvān sabhāvanān ।
yathā tiṣṭhasi tiṣṭha tvaṃ tathā śaile gṛhe atha vā ।। 

gṛham eva gṛhasthānāṃ susamāhitacetasām ।
śāntāhaṅkṛtidoṣāṇāṃ vijanā vanabhūmayaḥ ।। 

araṇyasadane tulye samāhitamanodṛśām ।
mahatām iha bhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatām iva ।। 

śāmyaccittamahābhrasya janajālojjvalāny api ।
nagarāṇy eva śūnyāni vanāny avanipātmaja ।। 

vṛttimaccittamattasya nirjanāni vanāny api ।
nagarāṇi mahālokapūrṇāni paravīrahan ।। 

vyutthitaṃ cittam abhyeti bhrame śānte suṣuptatām ।
nirvāṇam eti nirvāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

sarvabhāvapadātītaṃ sarvabhāvātmakaṃ ca vā ।
yaḥ paśyati sadātmānaṃ sa samāhita ucyate ।। 

sahātmanā sadaivedaṃ jagat paśyati no manaḥ ।
yathā svapne tathaivāsmiñ jāgraty api janeśvara ।। 

yathā vipinagā lokā viharanto apy asatsamāḥ ।
asambandhāt tathā jñasya grāmo api vipinopamaḥ ।। 

antarmukhamanā nityaṃ supto buddho vrajan paṭhan ।
puraṃ janapadaṃ grāmam araṇyam iva paśyati ।। 

sarvam ākāśatām eti nityam antarmukhasthiteḥ ।
sarvathānupayogitvād bhūtākulam idaṃ jagat ।। 

antaśśītalatāyāṃ tu labdhāyāṃ śītalaṃ jagat ।
vijvarāṇām iva nṛṇāṃ bhavaty ā jīvitasthiteḥ ।। 

antastṛṣṇopataptānāṃ dāvadāhamayaṃ jagat ।
bhavaty akhilajantūnāṃ yad antas tad bahis sthitam ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
antaḥkaraṇatattvasya bhāgā bahir avasthitāḥ ।। 

vaṭadhānāvaṭa iva antar asya yad ātmanaḥ ।
tad bahir bhāsate bhāsvad vikasatpuṣpagandhavat ।। 

na bahiṣṭvaṃ na cāntastvaṃ kvacit kiñcana vidyate ।
yad yathā kacitaṃ cittvāt tat tathā tathyam utthitam ।। 

ātmatattvodaraṃ bhāti bahiṣṭvena jagattayā ।
karpūram iva gandhena saṅkoci pravikāsi ca ।। 

ātmedaṃ sphurati sphāraṃ jagattvenāpy ahantayā ।
bāhyatvenāntaratvena sa ca nāsan na sadvibhuḥ ।। 

bahiṣṭvenāśritaṃ bāhyam antastvenāntaraṃ sthitam ।
yathāviditam ātmāyaṃ svacittvam anupaśyati ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śāntam ātmano abhedanaṃ jagat ।
ahantādau sthite dehe bhūribhaṅgaṃ bhayaṃ tu sat ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
kalpāgnineva jvalitaṃ sarvam ādhihatātmanaḥ ।। 

yas tv ātmaratir evāntaḥ kurvan karmendriyaiḥ kriyāḥ ।
na vaśo harṣaśokābhyāṃ sa samāhita ucyate ।। 

yas sarvagatam ātmānaṃ paśyan samupaśāntadhīḥ ।
na śocati dhyāyati vā sa samāhita ucyate ।। 

sapūrvāparaparyantā yaḥ paśyañ jāgatīr gatīḥ ।
dṛṣṭiṣv etāsu hasati sa samāhita ucyate ।। 

same pare asti nāhantā na jagajjanmanī mayi ।
vīcivṛndeṣv ivānaptvaṃ na nāśe phenadhātavaḥ ।। 

yasyāntar asti nāhantvaṃ na vibhāgādi no mama ।
na cetanācetanate so asti nāstītaro janaḥ ।। 

vyomasvaccho bhavan svehāṃ samyag ācaratīha yaḥ ।
harṣāmarṣavikāreṣu kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamas sa san ।। 

ātmavat sarvabhūtāni paradravyāṇi loṣṭavat ।
svabhāvād eva na bhayād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

artho atanus tanur vāpi nāsadrūpeṇa cetyate ।
na sadrūpeṇānubhūto jñenājñeneva tattayā ।। 

īdṛśāśayasampanno mahāsattvapadaṃ gataḥ ।
tiṣṭhatūdetu vā yātu mṛtim etu nihantu vā ।। 

vasatūttamabhogāḍhye svagṛhe vā janākule ।
sarvabhogojjhitābhoge sumahaty atha vā vane ।। 

uddāmamardalaṃ pānatatparo vāpi nṛtyatu ।
sarvasaṅgaparityāgī śamam āyātu vā girau ।। 

candanāgurukarpūrair vapur vā parilimpatu ।
jvālājaṭilavistāre nipatatv atha vānale ।। 

pāpaṃ karotu sumahad bahalaṃ puṇyam eva vā ।
adyaiva mṛtim āyātu kalpāntanicayena vā ।। 

nāsau kiñcin na tat kiñcit kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā ।
nāsau kalaṅkam āpnoti hema paṅkagataṃ yathā ।। 

saṃvitpuruṣaśabdārthais sakalaṅkaiḥ kalaṅkyate ।
ahantvavāsanārūpaiś śuktikārajatopamaiḥ ।। 

samastavastupraśamas samyagjñānād yathāsthiteḥ ।
sa evāsyopaśānto antaḥ kalaṅko asattayā yataḥ ।। 

ahantvavāsanānarthaḥ prasūte saṃvidātmanaḥ ।
puruṣasya vicitrāṇi sukhaduḥkhāni janmabhūḥ ।। 

rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte gehino nirvṛtir yathā ।
ahantvabhāvasaṃśāntau tathāntassamatā matā ।। 

yat karoti yad aśnāti yad dadāti juhoti vā ।
na taj jñasya na tatra jño mā karotu karotu vā ।। 

karmaṇāsti na tasyārtho nārthas tasyāsty akarmaṇā ।
yathāsvabhāvaṃ bhagavān sa ātmany eva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

icchās tatas samudyanti na mañjarya ivopalāt ।
yāś codyanti ca tās sarvās sa evāmbv iva vīcayaḥ ।। 

sakalam idam asāv asau ca sarvaṃ jagad akhilaṃ na vibhāgitātra kācit ।
paramapuruṣapāvanaikarūpī sa sad iti tat sad akiñcid eva vāsau ।। 

dhyānavicāro nāma sargaḥ

saptapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad ātmamaricasyāntaś cittvāt tīkṣṇatvavedanam ।
tad ahantvādi bhedādi deśakālādi vetty adaḥ ।। 

yad ātmalavaṇasyāntaś cittvāl lāvaṇyavedanam ।
tad ahantvādibhedādideśakālādimat sthitam ।। 

svato yad antar ātmekṣoś cittvān mādhuryavedanam ।
tad ahantvādi bhedādi jagattādīti jṛmbhitam ।। 

svato yad ātmadṛṣadaś cittvāt kāṭhinyavedanam ।
tad ahantvādibhedādideśakālāditāṃ gatam ।। 

svato yad ātmaśailādijñatayā jāḍyavedanam ।
tad ahantvādi bhedādi bhuvanādīti saṃsthitam ।। 

svato yad ātmatoyasya ciddravatvād vivartanam ।
tad āvartādy ahantādi bhedādy ākāritādi ca ।। 

svato ya ātmavṛkṣasya śākhādis tasya vedanam ।
tad ahantādi bhedādi bhuvanādīva saṃsphuṭam ।। 

yad ātmagaganasyāntaś cittvāc chūnyatvavedanam ।
tad ahantādi bhedādi bhāvanādīti bhāvitam ।। 

yad ātmagaganasyāntaś cittvāt sauṣiryavedanam ।
tad ahantādi cittādi śarīrādīva dīpitam ।। 

svato yad ātmakuḍyasya nairantaryaṃ nirantaram ।
tad ahantādibhedena cittvād bahir iva sthitam ।। 

svato yad ātmasattāyā vittvāt sattvaikavedanam ।
tad ahantvādi bhedādi cetanādīti vā sthitam ।। 

antar ātmaprakāśasya svato yad avabhāsanam ।
tad ahantvādi vittvādi jīva ity eva vetty asau ।। 

antar asti yad ātmendoś cidrūpaṃ cidrasāyanam ।
svata āsvādyate tena tad ahantādinoditam ।। 

paramātmaguḍasyāntar yac citsvādūdayātmakam ।
tad evāsvādyate tena svato ahantādināntare ।। 

paramātmamaṇeś cittvād yad antaḥ kacanaṃ svayam ।
cetanātma tad evāntar aham ityādi vetty asau ।। 

na ca kiñcana vetty antar vedyasyāsambhavād iha ।
na cāsvādayati svādu svādyasyāsambhavād alam ।। 

na ca kiñcic cinoty antaś cetyasyāsambhave sati ।
vedyate na ca vā kiñcid vedyasyāsambhavād asau ।। 

asadābhāsa evātmā ananto bharitākṛtiḥ ।
sthitas sadaivaikaghano mahāśaila ivātmani ।। 

anayā tu vacobhaṅgyā mayā vo raghunandana ।
nāhantādijagattādibhedo astīti nidarśitam ।। 

na cittam asti no cettā na jagattādivibhramaḥ ।
dṛṣadīvāmbaram ataś śāntaṃ śāmyati kevalam ।। 

yathāvartāditām eti dravatvād vāri vāriṇi ।
tathāhantāditām eti jñatvāj jñaptau jña ātmani ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spandas sadāgatau ।
ahantādeśakālādi tathā jñe jñaptimātrake ।। 

jño jñatāyāṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ jānāti jñānabṛṃhayā ।
jñāyate tad ahantādi jīvādy apy abhijīvanaiḥ ।। 

yathodeti yadā jñasya jñaptir jñānena yādṛśī ।
ananyaivānyatāṃ buddhvā sā tadā jṛmbhate tathā ।। 

jīvasya jīvitaṃ jñānaṃ jñatāyāṃ jīvajīvane ।
aṇur apy asti no bhedo virūpatve jñajīvayoḥ ।। 

yathā jñajīvayor nāsti bhedo rāma tathaitayoḥ ।
bhedo asti na jñajagator viddhi śāntam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

sarvaṃ praśāntam ajam ekam anādimadhyam ābhāsanaṃ svadanamātram acetyacihnam ।
sarvaṃ praśāntam ati śabdamayī tu dṛṣṭir bodhārtham eva hi mudhaiva tad om itīdam ।। 

bhedanirāso nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
kirāteśasya suraghor vṛttāntaṃ vismayapradam ।। 

uttarasyā diśo medaḥ karpūrapaṭalaṃ bhuvaḥ ।
sambhṛtaṃ hasanaṃ śārvaṃ śuklo vā cāndra ātapaḥ ।। 

himādreś śṛṅgam astīha kailāso nāma parvataḥ ।
śailajālasya sanmuktākalāpasyeva nāyakaḥ ।। 

viṣṇoḥ kṣīrodaka iva svargas surapater iva ।
abjajasyeva nābhyabjaṃ gṛhaṃ yaś śaśimaulinaḥ ।। 

rudrākṣavṛndadolābhis sāpsarobhir vibhāti yaḥ ।
lolaratnaśalākābhir laharībhir ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

gaṇāṅganānām aniśaṃ mattānāṃ caraṇair hatāḥ ।
aśokā iva rājante yatrāśokā vikāsinaḥ ।। 

sañcaracchaṅkare dikṣu bhṛguṣv indumaṇidravaiḥ ।
nivartante pravartante yatrājasraṃ ca nirjharāḥ ।। 

yo latāgulmavṛkṣaughavāpīhradanadīnadaiḥ ।
mṛgapakṣigaṇair bhītair brahmāṇḍavad ihāvṛtaḥ ।। 

tasya hemajaṭā nāma kirātās saṃsthitās tale ।
pipīlakā varataror mūlakośagatā iva ।। 

kailāsapādāraṇyānyāṃ jaṭālāyāṃ sugulmakaiḥ ।
vasanti yaukavat kṣudrās te tannikaṭajīvinaḥ ।। 

āsīt teṣām udārātmā rājā parapurañjayaḥ ।
jayalakṣmyā bhuja iva yaḥ prajāyāś ca dakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

suraghur nāma balavān suraghorāridarpahā ।
mūrtaḥ parākrama iva mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ ।। 

jino vairāgyavibhavair dhanair guhyakanāyakaḥ ।
śatakratugurur bodhaiḥ kāvyair asuradaiśikaḥ ।। 

sa cakre rājakāryāṇi nigrahānugrahakramaiḥ ।
yathāprāptāny akhinnātmā dinānīva divākaraḥ ।। 

tajjābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyām atha tasyābhyabhūyata ।
sumatir vāgurābandhaiś śliṣṭair grīveva pakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

kim ārtaṃ pīḍayāmy enaṃ tilayantram ivaujasā ।
sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ mamevārtiḥ prajāyate ।। 

dhanam asmai prayacchāmi dhanenānandavāñ janaḥ ।
bhavaty aham ivāśeṣas tad alaṃ me vinigrahaiḥ ।। 

atha vā nigrahaṃ prāptaṃ karomy etena vai vinā ।
vartate na prajaiveyaṃ vinā vāri sarid yathā ।। 

hā kaṣṭam eṣa nigrāhyo diṣṭyānugrāhya eṣa me ।
diṣṭyādya sukhavān asmi kaṣṭam adyāsmi duḥkhavān ।। 

iti dolāyitaṃ ceto na viśaśrāma bhūpateḥ ।
ekatrāmbumahāvarte ciraṃ tṛṇam iva bhramat ।। 

athaikadā gṛhaṃ tasya māṇḍavyo munir āyayau ।
bhrāntāśeṣakakupkuñjo vāsavasyeva nāradaḥ ।। 

tam asau pūjayām āsa papraccha ca mahāmunim ।
sandehadurdrūmastambhaparaśuṃ sarvakovidam ।। 

suraghuḥ

bhavadāgamanenāsmi mune nirvṛtim āgataḥ ।
paramāṃ vasudhāpīṭhaṃ samprāpta iva mādhave ।। 

adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ nātha dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ ।
vikāsi raviṇevābjaṃ yat tvayāsmi vilokitaḥ ।। 

bhagavan sarvadharmajña ciraṃ viśrāntavān asi ।
tad imaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi mamārkas timiraṃ yathā ।। 

mahatāṃ saṅgamenārtiḥ kasya nāma na naśyati ।
sandehaṃ tu parām ārtim āhur ārtivido janāḥ ।। 

mannigrahānugrahajā madbhṛtyavapuṣi sthitāḥ ।
kaṣanti mām alaṃ cintā gajaṃ harinakhā iva ।। 

tad yathā samatodeti sūryāṃśur iva sarvagā ।
matau mama mune mānya tathā karuṇayā kuru ।। 

māṇḍavyaḥ

svāyattena svasaṃsthena svenopāyena bhūpate ।
eṣā manaḥpelavatā himavat pravilīyate ।। 

svavicāraṇayaivāśu śāmyaty antar manojvaraḥ ।
śaradāgamamātreṇa mihikā mahatī yathā ।। 

svenaiva manasā svāni svaśarīragatāni ca ।
vicārayendriyāṇy antaḥ kīdṛśāny atha kāni vā ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ kiṃ vā kathaṃ maraṇajanmanī ।
vicārayāntar etat tvaṃ mahattām alam eṣyasi ।। 

vicāreṇa parijñātasvabhāvasya satas tava ।
harṣāmarṣadṛśaś cetas tolayiṣyanti nācalam ।। 

manas svaṃ rūpam utsṛjya śamam eṣyati vijvaram ।
bhūtapūrvavapur bhūtvā taraṅgaḥ payasīva te ।। 

tiṣṭhad eva mano rūpaṃ parityakṣyati te anagha ।
kalaṅkavikalaṃ kāla ṛtvantaragatāv iva ।। 

anukampyā bhaviṣyanti śrīmantas sarva eva te ।
dṛṣṭatattvasya tuṣṭasya janāḥ pitur ivāvanau ।। 

vivekadīpadṛṣṭātmā mervabdhinabhasām api ।
adhaḥ kariṣyasi nṛpa mahattām uttamārthadām ।। 

mahattām āgataṃ cetas tava saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।
na nimaṅkṣyati he sādho goṣpadeṣv iva vāraṇaḥ ।। 

kṛpaṇaṃ tu mano rājan pelave api nimajjati ।
kārye goṣpadatoye api jīrṇāṅgo maṣako yathā ।। 

ceto vāsanayā paṅke kīṭavat parimajjati ।
dṛśyamātrāvalambinyā svayā dīnatayā tayā ।। 

tāvat tāvan mahābāho svayaṃ santyajyate akhilam ।
yāvad yāvat parālokaḥ paramātmaiva śiṣyate ।। 

tāvat prakṣālyate dhātur yāvad dhemaiva śiṣyate ।
tāvad ālokyate sarvaṃ yāvad ātmaiva lakṣyate ।। 

sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā svayaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ।
sarvathā samparityajya svātmanātmopalabhyate ।। 

yāvat sarvaṃ na santyaktaṃ tāvad ātmā na labhyate ।
sarvavastuparityāge śeṣa ātmeti kathyate ।। 

yāvad anyan na santyaktaṃ tāvat sāmānyam eva hi ।
vastu nāsādyate sādho svātmalābhe tu kā kathā ।। 

yatra sarvātmanā svātmalābhāya patati svayam ।
tyaktānyakāryaḥ prāpnoti tan nāma nṛpa netarat ।। 

ātmāvalokanārthaṃ tu tasmāt sarvaṃ parityajet ।
sarvaṃ kiñcit parityajya yac chiṣṭaṃ tat paraṃ padam ।। 

sakalakāraṇakāryaparamparāmayajagadgatavastuvijṛmbhitam ।
alam apāsya manas svavapus tataḥ parivilūya ca yac chubham asti tat ।। 

suraghuvṛttānte māṇḍavyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā bhagavān enaṃ suraghuṃ raghunandana ।
yayau svām eva kakubhaṃ māṇḍavyo maunamaṇḍanaḥ ।। 

gate varamunau rājā gatvaikāntam aninditam ।
dhiyā sañcintayām āsa ko nāmāham iti svayam ।। 

nāhaṃ merur na me merur jagan nāhaṃ na me jagat ।
nāhaṃ śailā na me śailā na dharāhaṃ na me dharā ।। 

kirātamaṇḍalaṃ nedaṃ mama nāhaṃ ca maṇḍalam ।
nijasaṅketamātreṇa kevalaṃ deśa eṣa me ।। 

tyakto mayaiṣa saṅketo nāhaṃ deśo na caiṣa me ।
idānīṃ nagaraṃ śiṣṭam eṣa evātra niścayaḥ ।। 

patākāpurapaṭṭāḍhyā bhṛtyopavanasaṅkulā ।
gajāśvasāmantayutā purī nāhaṃ na me purī ।। 

vyarthasaṅketasambaddhaṃ saṅketavigame kṣatam ।
bhogavṛndaṃ kalatraṃ ca nāhaṃ naitan mamākhilam ।। 

evaṃ sabhṛtyaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanapurāntaram ।
nāhaṃ rājyaṃ na me rājyaṃ saṅketo hy ayam ākulaḥ ।। 

dehamātram ahaṃ manye hastapādādisaṃyutam ।
tad etat tāvad āśv antar aham ālokayāmy alam ।। 

tad atra tāvan māṃsāsthi nāham etad acetanaṃ ।
na caitan mama saṃśleṣam ety abjasya yathā jalam ।। 

māṃsaṃ jaḍaṃ na tad ahaṃ naivāhaṃ raktam apy alam ।
jaḍāny asthīni naivāhaṃ na caitāni mama kvacit ।। 

karmendriyāṇi naivāhaṃ na ca karmendriyāṇi me ।
jaḍaṃ yat kila dehe asmiṃs tad ahaṃ naiva cetanaḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ bhogā na me bhogā na me buddhīndriyāṇi ca ।
jaḍāny asatsvarūpāṇi na ca buddhīndriyāṇy aham ।। 

mūlaṃ saṃsṛtidoṣasya mano nāhaṃ jaḍaṃ hi tat ।
atha buddhir ahaṅkāra iti dṛṣṭir manomayī ।। 

manobuddhīndriyādyanto bhūtakośaś ca tad vapuḥ ।
nāham evaṃ śarīrādi śiṣṭam ālokayāmy aham ।। 

śeṣas tu cetanājīvas sa ca cetyena cetati ।
anyena bodhyamāno asau nātmatattvavapur bhavet ।। 

evaṃ tyajāmi saṃvedyaṃ cetyaṃ nāhaṃ hi tat kila ।
śeṣo vikalparahito viśuddhā cid ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

citram eṣo asmi labdhātmā jātaḥ kālena kāryavit ।
eṣa so aham anantātmā kvānto asya paramātmanaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇīndre yame vāyau sarvabhūtagaṇe tathā ।
sa eṣa bhagavān ātmā tantur muktāsv iva sthitaḥ ।। 

cicchaktir amalā saiṣā cetyāmayavivarjitā ।
bharitāśeṣadikkuñjā bhairavākāradhāriṇī ।। 

sarvabhāvagatā sūkṣmā bhāvābhāvavivarjitā ।
ābrahmabhuvanāntasthā sarvaśaktisamudgikā ।। 

sarvasaundaryasubhagā sarvaprākāśyadīpikā ।
sarvasaṃsāramuktānāṃ tantur ātatarūpiṇī ।। 

sarvākāravikārāḍhyā sarvākāravivarjitā ।
sarvabhūtaughatāṃ yātā sarvadā sarvatāṃ gatā ।। 

caturdaśavidhāny eṣā bhūtāni bhuvanodare ।
etanmayīyaṃ kalanā jāgatī vedanātmikā ।। 

mithyāvabhāsamātraṃ tu sarvaduḥkhadaśāgatiḥ ।
nānākāramayābhāsaṃ sarvam ātmaiva cit parā ।। 

seyam ātmā mama vyāpī seyaṃ madavabodhanam ।
seyam ākalitāṅgehā karoti nṛpatibhramam ।। 

asyā eva prasādena mano deharathasthitam ।
saṃsārajālalīlāsu yāti valgati nṛtyati ।। 

idaṃ manaś śarīrādi na kiñcit api vastutaḥ ।
naṣṭe na kiñcit apy asmin parinaśyati pelave ।। 

jagajjālamayaṃ nṛttam idaṃ cittanaṭais tatam ।
etayaivaikayā paṅktyā dṛśyate dīpalekhayā ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ mudhaiva me cintā nigrahānugrahasthitau ।
babhūva dehaniṣṭhaiva na kiñcid api dehakaḥ ।। 

nanv aho samprabuddho asmi gataṃ durdarśanaṃ mama ।
dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ akhilaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyam idaṃ mayā ।। 

sarvaṃ kiñcit idaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛśyate yaj jagadgatam ।
cinniṣṣyandāṃśamātraṃ tan nānyat kiñcana śāśvatam ।। 

kva tau kīdṛgvidhau vāpi kiṃniṣṭhau vā kimātmakau ।
nigrahānugrahau loke harṣāmarṣakramau tathā ।। 

kiṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ ca vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ brahmedam ātatam ।
aham āsaṃ mudhā mūḍho diṣṭyāmūḍho asmy ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

kim asminn evam āloke śocyate kiṃ vimuhyate ।
kiṃ prekṣyate kim kriyate sthīyate kva kva gamyate ।। 

kiñcit ittham idaṃ nāma cidābhāsaṃ virājate ।
namo namas te nistattva dṛṣṭadṛśyo asi sundara ।। 

aho nu samprabuddho asmi samyag jñātam alaṃ mayā ।
namo mahyam anantāya samyagjñānodayāya ca ।। 

vigatarañjananirviṣayasthitir gatabhavabhrama īhitavarjitaḥ ।
sthirasuṣuptakalātigatas tatas samasamaṃ nivasāmy aham ātmani ।। 

suraghuviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti hemajaṭādhīśo lebhe padam anuttamam ।
vivekādhyavasāyena brāhmaṇyam iva gādhijaḥ ।। 

anantākārakāryāsu nāsīc ceṣṭāsu khedavān ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prayuktāsu dinamālāsv iveśvaraḥ ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti so atiṣṭhat sarvehāvigatajvaram ।
samāsame svake kārye jalaugho agra ivānate ।। 

harṣāmarṣavinirmuktaḥ prakṛtaṃ kāryam ācaran ।
udāragambhīravapur jahārāmbunidheś śriyam ।। 

suṣuptasamadharmiṇyā cittavṛttyā vyarājata ।
niṣkampayā prakāśinyā dīpas svaśikhayeva saḥ ।। 

na nirghṛṇo dayāvān no na dvandvī nāpy amatsaraḥ ।
na sukhī nāsukhī nārthī nānarthī sa babhūva ha ।। 

samadarśanayā nityaṃ vṛttyā cāmaladhīrayā ।
antaśśītalayā reje paripūrṇendubimbavat ।। 

sarvaṃ cittattvakacanaṃ jagad ity avalokya sā ।
praśāntasukhaduḥkhaśrīs tasya pūrṇā matir babhau ।। 

ullasan vilasan ghūrṇaṃs tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan svapan ।
abhūt sa svasamādhisthaḥ prabuddhaś cillayaṃ gataḥ ।। 

sa kurvan vigatāsaṅgaṃ rājyaṃ rājīvalocanaḥ ।
atiṣṭhad akṣatākāro bhūrivarṣaśatāny atha ।। 

sanniveśam imaṃ dehanāmakaṃ tadanu svayam ।
sa jahau tejasākrānto rūpaṃ himakaṇo yathā ।। 

viveśa param ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇeśvaram ।
prajñayā saritā vāripūraḥ pūrṇam ivāmbudhim ।। 

adhigatavimalaikarūpatejā gaganadaśāṃ samupetya śāntaśokaḥ ।
alam abhavad asau paraṃ svarūpaṃ ghaṭakham ivāmbarasaṃyutaṃ mahātmā ।। 

suraghuvṛttāntas samāptaḥ nāma sargaḥ

ekaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya na manaḥ paritapyate ।
ghore tamasi nirmagnaṃ labdhadīpaś śiśur yathā ।। 

vivekāvasthayā cetas tanvyaivāyāti nirvṛtim ।
patañ śvabhre dṛḍhatṛṇapracayālambanād iva ।। 

buddhvaitāṃ pāvanīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayitvāpy udāharan ।
nityam ekasamādhāno bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

katham ekasamādhānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vā munīśvara ।
vātāhatamayūrāṅgaruhalolaṃ mano bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu tasyaiva suraghoḥ prabuddhasya satas tadā ।
parṇādasya ca rājarṣes saṃvādam imam adbhutam ।। 

rāghavaikasamādhānabodhitāyoditātmanoḥ ।
parasparasamālāpam imaṃ prakaṭayāmi te ।। 

babhūva pārasīkānāṃ pārthivaḥ paravīrahā ।
parigho nāma vikhyātaḥ parighas syandane yathā ।। 

sa babhūva paraṃ mitraṃ suragho raghunandana ।
nandanodyānasaṃsthasya madanasyeva mādhavaḥ ।। 

kadācit parighasyābhūd akāṇḍaṃ maṇḍale mahat ।
kalpānta iva saṃsāre prajāduṣkṛtadoṣajam ।। 

vineśur janatās tatra bahvyaḥ kṣutkṣatajīvitāḥ ।
jvalite vipine vahnau yathā bhūtaparamparāḥ ।। 

tadduḥkhaṃ parigho dṛṣṭvā viṣādam atulaṃ yayau ।
tatyāja cākhilaṃ rājyaṃ dagdhaṃ grāmam ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

prajānāśapratīkāreṣv asamartho virāgavān ।
jagāma vipinaṃ kartuṃ tapo jinamunīndravat ।। 

paurāṇām aparijñātaḥ kasmiṃścid dūrakānane ।
sa uvāsa viraktātmā lokāntara ivāpare ।। 

tapaś carañ śāntamatir dāntaḥ kandaramandiraḥ ।
svayaṃ śīrṇāni śuṣkāṇi tatra parṇāny abhakṣayat ।। 

ciraṃ hutāśavac chuṣkaparṇāny evātha bhakṣayan ।
parṇāda iti nāmāsau prāpa madhye tapasvinām ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti parṇādanāmā rājarṣisattamaḥ ।
jambudvīpe babhūvāsau vikhyāto munisadmasu ।। 

tato varṣasahasreṇa tapasā dāruṇātmanā ।
prāpad abhyāsavaśato jñānam ātmaprasādajam ।। 

babhūva vigatadvandvo nīrāgas samadarśanaḥ ।
nirīho niranukrośo jīvanmuktaḥ prabuddhadhīḥ ।। 

vijahāra yathākāmaṃ trilokīmaṭhikām imām ।
siddhasādhyais samaṃ sādho sahaṃso alir ivābjinīm ।। 

ekadā tasya sadanaṃ hemacūḍamahīpateḥ ।
prāpa ratnavinirmāṇaṃ meroś śṛṅgam ivāparam ।। 

te tatra prāktane mitre pūjām akurutāṃ mithaḥ ।
pūrṇāṃ vijñātavijñeyau maurkhyagartād vinirgate ।। 

aho nu mama kalyāṇaiḥ phalitaṃ bata pāvanaiḥ ।
samprāptavān ahaṃ yat tvām ity anyo'nyam athocatuḥ ।। 

āliṅgitaśarīrau tāv anyo'nyāninditākṛtī ।
ekāsane viviśatuś candrārkāv iva bhūdhare ।। 

parighaḥ

paramānandam āyātaṃ cetas tvaddarśanena me ।
candrabimba ivonmagnam antaśśītalatāṃ gatam ।। 

akṛtrimaṃ suhṛtprema viyoge śataśākhatām ।
prayāti palvalataṭe chinnarūḍha iva drumaḥ ।। 

visrabdhāṃs tān kathālāpāṃs tā līlās tac ca ceṣṭitam ।
saṃsmṛtya prāktanaṃ sādho hṛṣyāmy eva punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

jñānam etan mayā prāptaṃ tvayā jñānaṃ yathānagha ।
māṇḍavyasya prasādena paramātmaprasādajam ।। 

adya kaccid aduḥkhas tvaṃ kaccid viśrāntavān asi ।
parame kāraṇe merāv iva bhūmaṇḍalādhipa ।। 

kaccit paramakalyāṇa svātmārāmatayā tava ।
prasādo jāyate citte śaradīva saro'mbhasi ।। 

kaccit karoṣi samayā suprasannagabhīrayā ।
dṛṣṭyā subhaga kāryāṇi kāryāṇy eva narādhipa ।। 

nirādhivyādhayo dhīrāḥ kaccit sampannaśālayaḥ ।
janatās tava deśeṣu tiṣṭhanti vigatajvaram ।। 

kaccid uddāmaphalinī phalinīva latānatā ।
dharā tava phalāpūrair bhṛśaṃ dhārayati prajāḥ ।। 

kaccit tava diganteṣu candrasyevāṃśupañjaram ।
tuṣāranikarākāraṃ prasṛtaṃ pāvanaṃ yaśaḥ ।। 

kaccid guṇaśatair etā diśo nirvivarīkṛtāḥ ।
tvayā saro'mbhasā bandho bisānām iva bhittayaḥ ।। 

kaccit kalamakedārakoṇasthāṇuṣu harṣulāḥ ।
pratigrāmaṃ kumāryas te gāyanty ānandadaṃ yaśaḥ ।। 

kuśalaṃ tava dhānyeṣu dhaneṣu vibhaveṣu ca ।
bhṛtyeṣv atha kalatreṣu putreṣu nagareṣu ca ।। 

ādhivyādhivihīneyaṃ kaccit kāyalatā tava ।
phalaṃ phalati puṇyākhyaṃ yad ihāmutra coditam ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyeṣu paryantātyantavairiṣu ।
kaccid viṣayasarpeṣu savirāgaṃ manas tava ।। 

aho bata ciraṃ kālam āvāṃ viśleṣam āgatau ।
kālena śleṣitau bhūyo vasantādritaṭāv iva ।। 

na tā jagati vidyante sukhaduḥkhadaśās sakhe ।
jīvadbhir yā na dṛśyante saṃyogajaviyogajāḥ ।। 

tathaitāsv atidīrghāsu daśāsv anyatvam āgatāḥ ।
bhūyo vayam api śliṣṭāś citrā hi niyatir vidheḥ ।। 

suraghuḥ

bhagavan niyater asyā gatiṃ dīpagater iva ।
daivikyāḥ ko hi jānāti gambhīrāṃ vismayapradām ।। 

tvam ahaṃ ca viyojyātidūre dūradaśāsu ca ।
adya saṅghaṭitau bhūyaḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ ।। 

vayaṃ tv adya mahāsattva bhṛśaṃ kuśalinas sthitāḥ ।
tvadāgamanapuṇyena parāṃ pāvanatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

īṣat tvadāgamakṣīṇapāpānāṃ puṇyapādapaiḥ ।
tathā phalitam asmākaṃ na yathā vayam ākulāḥ ।। 

sarvās sampattayo asmākaṃ rājarṣe saṃsthitāḥ pure ।
bhavadāgamanenādya prayātāś śataśākhatām ।। 

vikirati parito rasāyanānām iva nikaraṃ madhuraṃ mahānubhāva ।
tava vacanam avekṣaṇaṃ ca puṇyaṃ paramapadapratimo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ ।। 

suraghuparighasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

dviṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athaivamprāyayā tatra viśrambhakathayā ciram ।
prāktanasnehagarbhiṇyā sthitvovācāyudhābhidhaḥ ।। 

parighaḥ

yad yat saṃsārajāle asmin kriyate karma bhūmipa ।
tat samāhitacittasya sukhāyānyasya nānagha ।। 

kaccit saṅkalparahitaṃ paraṃ viśramaṇāspadam ।
paramopaśamaśreyas samādhim anutiṣṭhasi ।। 

suraghuḥ

etan me brūhi bhagavan sarvasaṅkalpavarjitam ।
paramopaśamaśreyas samādhir hi kim ucyate ।। 

parighaḥ

yo jño mahātman satataṃ tūṣṇīṃ vyavaharaṃś ca vā ।
asamāhitacitto asau kadā bhavati kaḥ kila ।। 

nityaprabuddhacittās tu kurvanto api jagatkriyāḥ ।
ātmaikatattvatanniṣṭhās sadaiva susamādhayaḥ ।। 

baddhapadmāsanasyāpi kṛtabrahmāñjaler api ।
aviśrāntasvabhāvasya kas samādhiḥ kathaṃ ca vā ।। 

suraghuḥ

tattvāvabodho bhagavan sarvāśātṛṇapāvakaḥ ।
proktas samādhibhedena na tu tūṣṇīm avasthitiḥ ।। 

samāhitā nityatṛptā yathābhūtārthadarśinī ।
sādho samādhiśabdena parā prajñocyate budhaiḥ ।। 

akṣubdhā nirahaṅkārā dvandveṣv anabhipātinī ।
proktā samādhiśabdena meros sthiratarā sthitiḥ ।। 

niścintā vigatābhīṣṭā heyopādeyavarjitā ।
proktā samādhiśabdena paripūrṇā manogatiḥ ।। 

yataḥ prabhṛti bodhena yuktam ātyantikaṃ manaḥ ।
tad ārabhya samādhānam avyucchinnaṃ mahātmanaḥ ।। 

na hi prabuddhamanaso bhūtvā vicchidyate punaḥ ।
samādhir dūram ākṛṣṭo bisatantuś śiśor iva ।। 

samagraṃ dinam ālokād viramaty akṣi no yathā ।
ājīvitāntaṃ me prajñā tathā tattvāvalokanāt ।। 

ajasram ambu vahanād yathā nadyā na rudhyate ।
tathā vijñānadṛg bodhāt kṣaṇamātraṃ na rudhyate ।। 

na vismaraty avirataṃ yathā kālakalā gatim ।
na vismaraty avirataṃ svātmānaṃ prājñadhīs tathā ।। 

na vismarati sarvatra yathā satatago gatim ।
na vismarati niścetyaṃ cinmātraṃ prājñadhīs tathā ।। 

gatiṃ kālakalā yadvac cinvānā samavasthitā ।
cic ciraṃ cetyarahitaṃ cinvānāṅgaṃ tathā sthitā ।। 

yathā sattāvihīnātmā padārtho nopalabhyate ।
tathātmajñānahīnātmā kālo jñasya na labhyate ।। 

na sambhavati saṃsāre guṇahīno guṇī yathā ।
na sambhavaty ātmasaṃvidvarjito hy ātmavāṃs tathā ।। 

sarvadaivāsmi sambuddhas sarvadaivāsmi nirmalaḥ ।
sarvadaivāsmi śāntātmā sarvadāsmi samāhitaḥ ।। 

bhedaḥ kena samādher me janyate katham eva vā ।
ātmano vyatiriktena nityam evāsadātmanā ।। 

tasmāt kadācid api me na samādhimayaṃ manaḥ ।
na cāsamāhitaṃ nityam ātmatattvaikasambhavāt ।। 

sarvagas sarvadaivātmā sarvam eva ca sarvathā ।
asamādhir hi ko asau syāt samādhir api kas smṛtaḥ ।। 

nityaṃ samāhitadhiyas suśamā mahāntas tiṣṭhanti kāryapariṇāmavibhāgamuktāḥ ।
tenāsamāhitasamāhitabhedabhaṅgyā mithyoditaṃ na tu maduttamavākprapañcaḥ ।। 

samādhiniścayo nāma sargaḥ

triṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

parighaḥ

rājan nūnaṃ prabuddho asi prāptavān asi tat padam ।
saṃśītalāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājase ।। 

ānandamadhusampūrṇo lakṣmyā ca parayā śritaḥ ।
śītalasnigdhamadhuro rājīvam iva rājase ।। 

nirmalo vitataḥ pūrṇo gambhīraḥ prakaṭāśayaḥ ।
velānilabalollāsamukto abdhir iva rājase ।। 

svacchas svānandasampūrṇo gatāhaṅkāravāridaḥ ।
sphuṭaṃ vistīrṇagambhīraś śaratkham iva rājase ।। 

sarvatra lakṣyase svasthas sarvatra parituṣyasi ।
sarvatra vītarāgo asi rājan sarvatra rājase ।। 

sārāsāraparicchedapāragas tvaṃ mahādhiyā ।
jānāsi sarvam evedaṃ yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

bhāvābhāvaparicchedatattvajña muditāśaya ।
samāsamadaśālaulyamuktaṃ tava vapus sthitam ।। 

vastunāvastunaivāntar amṛteneva sāgaraḥ ।
apunaḥprakṣayāyaiva paritṛpto asi sundara ।। 

suraghuḥ

na tad asti mune vastu yatropādeyatāsti naḥ ।
yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ tāvad eva na kiñcana ।। 

upādeyasya cābhāvād dheyam apy asti kiṃ kila ।
pratiyogivyavacchedaṃ vinā heyaṃ kim ucyate ।। 

tucchatvāt sarvabhāvānām atucchatvāc ca kālataḥ ।
ciraṃ mama parikṣīṇe tucchātucchamanassthitī ।। 

deśakālavaśād dṛṣṭvā tucchasyātucchatām iha ।
atucchasya tu tucchatvaṃ varjye nindāstutī budhaiḥ ।। 

rāgān nindāstutī loke rāgaś ca parivāñchanāt ।
vāñchyate ca mahodāraṃ vastu śobhanabuddhinā ।। 

trilokyāṃ ca striyaś śailās samudrā vanarājayaḥ ।
bhūtāni ca suśūnyāni sāro nāsty uttamas tataḥ ।। 

māṃsārbudābhamṛdvartimaye jagati jarjare ।
vāñchanīyavihīne asmiñ śūnye kim iva vāñchyate ।। 

vāñchāyāṃ vinivṛttāyāṃ saṅkṣayo dveṣarāgayoḥ ।
dinalakṣmyāṃ vyatītāyām ālokātapayor iva ।। 

alam ativitatair vacaḥprapañcair iyam uciteha sukhāya dṛṣṭir ekā ।
samupaśamitavāsanaṃ mano antar yadi muditaṃ hi tad uttamā pratiṣṭhā ।। 

suraghuparighaniścayo nāma sargaḥ

catuṣṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

suraghuḥ parighaś caiva vicāryeti jagadbhramam ।
mithaḥ prapūjitau tuṣṭau svavyāpāraparau gatau ।। 

tad eva rāghava śrutvā paramaṃ bodhakāraṇam ।
anenaiva vibodhena bhava labdhāspadas sphuṭam ।। 

parayā prajñayā dhīra vicārātatataikṣṇyayā ।
galaty alam ahaṅkārakālameghe hṛdambare ।। 

samastalokānumate saphale hlādakāriṇi ।
nirmale vitate cetaśśaratkāla upasthite ।। 

dhyeye śaraṇye susame sakalānandasampadi ।
supraśaste cidākāśe sthīyate paramātmani ।। 

yo nityam adhyātmamayo nityam antarmukhas sukhī ।
nityaṃ cidanusandhānas sa na śokena bādhyate ।। 

vyavahāraparo apy uccai rāgadveṣamayo api san ।
nāntaḥ kalaṅkam ādatte padmo jalalavaṃ yathā ।। 

samyagvijñānavān buddhvā yo antaś śāntamanā muniḥ ।
na bādhyate sa manasā kariṇeva mṛgādhipaḥ ।। 

bhogaikaśaraṇaṃ dīnaṃ na cittaṃ jñasya vidyate ।
nandane durdruma iva jñacittaṃ himavadvapuḥ ।। 

viraktajāyāmaraṇe yathā duḥkhī na mānavaḥ ।
parijñātākhilāvidyaṃ tathā cittaṃ na duḥkhadam ।। 

parijñātamanomoho jagadbhānodbhavātmanā ।
spṛśyate nainasā sādhū rajaseva nabhastalam ।। 

avidyāsamparijñānamātram eva mahauṣadham ।
avidyāvitatavyādhes timirasyeva dīpakaḥ ।। 

avidyā samparijñātā yadaiva hi tadaiva hi ।
sā parikṣīyate bhūyas svadate ca na bhogabhūḥ ।। 

vyavahāraparo apy antar asaktamatir ekadhīḥ ।
spṛśyate nainasā sādhur matsyekṣaṇam ivāmbhasā ।। 

prāpte cidbhāskarāloke prakṣīṇājñānayāminī ।
cittabhūḥ paramānandam āgatā jñasya rājate ।। 

ajñānanidropaśame jano jñānārkabodhitaḥ ।
taṃ prabodham avāpnoti punar yena na muhyati ।। 

dināni jīvyate tāni sānandās te kriyākramāḥ ।
ātmacintoditā yeṣu cijjyotsnā hṛdayāmbare ।। 

naro mohasamuttīrṇas satatasvātmacintayā ।
antaśśītalatām eti svāmṛteneva candramāḥ ।। 

tāni mitrāṇi śāstrāṇi tāni tāni dināni ca ।
virāgollāsavān yais syād ātmacintodayas sphuṭam ।। 

ciraṃ śocanti te dīnā janmajaṅgalavīrudhaḥ ।
ātmāvalokane helā yeṣām adhigatainasām ।। 

āśāpāśaśatair baddhaṃ bhogolapasulālasam ।
jarājarjaritākāraṃ śokocchvāsakadarthitam ।। 

vyūḍhaduḥkhamahābhāraṃ janmajaṅgalajīvinam ।
kukarmakardamāliptaṃ mohapalvalaśāyinam ।। 

rogadaṃśāvalīdaṣṭaṃ kṛṣṭaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā ।
manovājinakottabdhaṃ bandhubandhananiścalam ।। 

putradāradarījīrṇaṃ magnonmagnaṃ kukardame ।
śrāntaṃ vigataviśrāmaṃ bhagnam ādīrghavartmani ।। 

gamāgamaparikṣīṇaṃ saṃsārāraṇyacāriṇam ।
alabdhaśītalacchāyaṃ tīvratāpopatāpitam ।। 

ākārabhāsuraṃ dīnaṃ vāhair ākrāntam indriyaiḥ ।
karmakarṇīrathākrāntaṃ tāntaṃ duṣkṛtatāḍanaiḥ ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvacakrāvartadurudvaham ।
ajñānavikaṭāṭavyāṃ luṭhantaṃ bhagnagātrakam ।। 

nijānarthaskhadāmagnaṃ sīdamānam akiñcanam ।
sannāṅgaṃ karmabhāreṇa karuṇākrandakāriṇam ।। 

rāma jīvabalīvardam imaṃ saṃsārapalvalāt ।
paramaṃ yatnam āsthāya ciram uttārayed balāt ।। 

tattvāvalokanāt kṣīṇe citte no jāyate punaḥ ।
jīvaḥ kadācana tadā bhavet tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

mahānubhāvasamparkāt saṃsārārṇavalaṅghane ।
yuktis samprāpyate rāma dṛḍhā naur iva nāvikāt ।। 

yasmin deśamarau rāma nāsti sajjanapādapaḥ ।
saphalaś śītalacchāyo na tatra nivased budhaḥ ।। 

snigdhaśītavacaḥpattre sacchāye smitapuṣpite ।
kṣaṇād viśramyate rāma bhṛśaṃ sujanaṣaṇḍake ।। 

tadabhāve mahāmohadāhasantatidāyini ।
kiñcijjātavivekena svaptavyaṃ neha dhīmatā ।। 

ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmanātmānam uddharet ।
nātmānam avalepena janmapaṅkārṇave kṣipet ।। 

kim idaṃ katham āyātaṃ kimmūlaṃ kimapakṣayam ।
dehaduḥkham iti prājñaiḥ prekṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ ।। 

na dhanāni na mitrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ ।
narāṇām upakurvanti magnasvātmasamuddhṛtau ।। 

manomātreṇa suhṛdā sadaiva sahavāsinā ।
saha kiñcit parāmṛśya bhavaty ātmā samuddhṛtaḥ ।। 

vairāgyābhyāsayatnābhyāṃ svaparāmarśajanmanā ।
tattvālokena potena tīryate bhavasāgaraḥ ।। 

śocyamānaṃ janair nityaṃ dahyamānaṃ durāśayā ।
nātmānam avamanyeta proddhared enam ādarāt ।। 

ahaṅkāramahālānaṃ tṛṣṇārajjuṃ manomadam ।
janmajambālanirmagnaṃ jīvadantinam uddharet ।। 

ayam etāvataivātmā trāto bhavati rāghava ।
yad apāsya vimūḍhatvam ahaṅkāraḥ pramārjyate ।। 

etāvataiva sanmārgo yāti prakaṭatām alam ।
yad apāsya manomoham ahambhāvo vilīyate ।। 

etāvataiva deveśaḥ paramātmāvagamyate ।
kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamatvena deho yad avalokyate ।। 

ahaṅkārāmbude kṣīṇe dṛśyate ciddivākaraḥ ।
tatas tatpariṇāmena tat padaṃ samavāpyate ।। 

yathā dhvāntasamucchede svayam ālokavedanam ।
tathāhaṅkāravicchede svayam ātmāvalokanam ।। 

ahaṅkārasamucchede yāvasthā susamodayā ।
sā parā bharitākārā sā sarvavyāpinī citiḥ ।। 

paripūrṇārṇavaprakhyā na vāggocaram eti naḥ ।
nopamānam upādatte nānudhāvati rañjanam ।। 

kevalaṃ citprakāśāṃśakalitā sthiratāṃ gatā ।
turyā cet prāpyate dṛṣṭis tat tayā sopamīyate ।। 

adūragatasādṛśyā suṣuptasyopalakṣyate ।
sāvasthā bharitākārā gaganaśrīr ivāmbudheḥ ।। 

mano'haṅkāravilaye sarvabhāvāntarasthitā ।
samudeti parānandā yā tanuḥ pārameśvarī ।। 

sā svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhyā suṣuptādūrabhāvinī ।
na gamyā vacasāṃ rāma hṛdy evehānubhūyate ।। 

akhilam idam anantam ātmatattvaṃ dṛḍhapariṇāmini cetasi sthite antaḥ ।
bahir upaśamite carācarātmā svayam anubhūyata eva devadevaḥ ।। 

tadanu viṣayavāsanāvināśas tadanu śubhaḥ paramasphuṭaḥ prakāśaḥ ।
tadanu ca samatāvaśāt svarūpe pariṇamanaṃ mahatām acintyarūpe ।। 

kāruṇyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

manasaiva manaś chittvā yady ātmā nāvalokyate ।
mamety aham iti tyaktvā tat tāmarasalocana ।। 

nāstam eti jagadduḥkhaṃ yathā citragato raviḥ ।
āpad āyāty anantatvaṃ mahārṇavavad ātatā ।। 

punaḥ punar upāyāti jaḍakallolakāriṇī ।
meghanīlataruśyāmā saṃsṛtiprāvṛḍ ākulā ।। 

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
saṃvādaṃ suhṛdos sahyasānau bhāsavilāsayoḥ ।। 

asty utsedhajitākāśaḥ pīṭhena jitabhūtalaḥ ।
talena jitapātālas trilokavijayī giriḥ ।। 

asahyakusumāpūro asahyanirmalanirjharaḥ ।
guhyakārakṣitanidhis sahyanāmāviṣahyabhāḥ ।। 

muktāpaṭalasampūrṇair dhātupāṭalabhittibhiḥ ।
bhāsuraḥ kāñcanataṭaiḥ kaṭair iva suradvipaḥ ।। 

kvacit puṣpabharāśāro dhātuśārataraḥ kvacit ।
kvacit phullasaraśśāro ratnaśāraśirāḥ kvacit ।। 

ito raṭannirjharavān itaḥ kvaṇitakīcakaḥ ।
ito raṭadguhāvāta itaṣ ṣaṭpadaghuṅghumī ।। 

sānau gītāpsarovṛndo vane mṛdukhagāravaḥ ।
adhityakāyāṃ mattābhro gahaneṣu mṛgāravī ।। 

vidyādharodgītaguho bhṛṅgagītāmbujākaraḥ ।
kirātāgītaparyantaḥ khagāgītavanadrumaḥ ।। 

skandheṣu devair valitaḥ pādeṣu valito naraiḥ ।
pātāle valito nāgair jagadgeham ivāparam ।। 

kandareṣu śritas siddhair nidhānair antar āśritaḥ ।
candaneṣu śrito nāgais siṃhaiś śṛṅgaśikhāsu ca ।। 

puṣpābhrasaṃvītavapuḥ puṣpareṇvabhrapāṃsulaḥ ।
puṣpapattrābhrabhṛdvātaḥ puṣpapādapapāṇḍuraḥ ।। 

dhātudhūlyabhrakapilo ratnopalatalasthitiḥ ।
sa dārujair iva surastrīgaṇair alam āśritaḥ ।। 

abhranīlāṃśukacchannā mūkaratnavibhūṣaṇāḥ ।
śilākanakasundaryo yatra śṛṅgābhisārikāḥ ।। 

tatrottarataṭe sānāv ānamatphalapādape ।
ratnapuṣkariṇījālavahannirjharavāriṇi ।। 

cūtadrumalatonmuktapuṣpastabakadanture ।
vidulāṅkollapunnāganīpanīrandhradiktaṭe ।। 

latāvitānacchannārke ratnāṃśubharabhāsure ।
sravajjambūrasaknūte svarlokāhlādakāriṇi ।। 

brahmalokasamas svargaramyaś śivapuropamaḥ ।
atrer asty āśramaś śrīmān siddhaśramaharo mahān ।। 

mahaty atryāśrame tasmiṃs tāpasau dvau babhūvatuḥ ।
kaucid eva nabhomārga iva śukrabṛhaspatī ।। 

tayor athaikāspadayos tatrābhūtāṃ sutāv ubhau ।
kulāṅkurau śuddhatanū sarasvaty ambujāv iva ।। 

vilāsabhāsanāmānau vṛddhim āyayatuḥ kramāt ।
tau pitroḥ pallavau śīghraṃ latāpādapayor iva ।। 

āstām anyo'nyasuhṛdau susnigdhau vallabhau mithaḥ ।
tilatailavad āśliṣṭau tau puṣpāmodavat sthitau ।। 

nābhūtāṃ viprayuktau tau suraktāv iva dampatī ।
ekaṃ dvitvam ivāpannaṃ samam āsīt tayor manaḥ ।। 

tau tathānyo'nyamuditau manoharatarākṛtī ।
tasthatus svāśrame maune saroja iva ṣaṭpadau ।। 

prāpatur yauvanaṃ bālyam utsṛjya janavallabhau ।
kālenālpatareṇaiva candrasūryāv ivoditau ।। 

jagmatur deham utsṛjya tatas tau pitarau tayoḥ ।
svargaṃ jarārtāv uḍḍīya nīḍād iva vihaṅgamau ।। 

pañcatvaṃ gatayoḥ pitror dīnavaktrau babhūvatuḥ ।
sannāṅgau vigatotsāhau padmāv iva jaloddhṛtau ।। 

tatraurdhvadaihikaṃ kṛtvā cakrāte paridevanam ।
lokasthitir alaṅghyā hi mahatām api mānada ।। 

kṛtvaurdhvadaihikam atho vyathayābhibhūtau śokotthayā karuṇam ārtagirā vilapya ।
citrārpitāv iva nirastasamastaceṣṭau tau saṃsthitau susamaśūnyahṛdādināntam ।। 

bhāsavilāsavṛttānte sahyagirivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha śokaparābhūtau tasthatur dṛḍhatāpasau ।
tāpasaṃśuṣkasarvāṅgau tāv araṇyadrumāv iva ।। 

viraktau vipine kālaṃ kṣapayām āsatur dvijau ।
viyūthāv iva sāraṅgāv anāsthām āgatau parām ।। 

jagmur dināni māsāś ca varṣāṇy atha tayos tadā ।
kramāt tāv api saṃyātau jarāṃ śvabhradrumāv iva ।। 

aprāptavimalajñānau cirāj jaraḍhatāpasau ।
tāv ekadā saṅghaṭitāv idam anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ ।। 

vilāsaḥ

jīvitogradrumaphala madāśvāsāmṛtāmbudhe ।
jagaty asmin mahābandho bhāsa svāgatam astu te ।। 

etāvatyo dināvalyo madviyogavatā tvayā ।
vada kva kṣapitās sādho kaccit te vimalaṃ tapaḥ ।। 

kaccit te vijvarā buddhiḥ kaccij jātas tvam ātmavān ।
kaccit phalitavidyas tvaṃ kaccit kuśalavān asi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavantaṃ saṃsārasamudvignam alaṃ tadā ।
prāhāprāptamahājñānaṃ suhṛt suhṛdam ādarāt ।। 

bhāsaḥ

sādho svāgatam adyāṅga diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo asi mānada ।
kuśalaṃ tu kuto asmākaṃ saṃsāre tiṣṭhatām iha ।। 

yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ yāvat kṣīṇā na cittabhūḥ ।
yāvat tīrṇaṃ na saṃsārāt tāvan me kuśalaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

yāvan nādhigataṃ jñānaṃ yāvan na samatoditā ।
yāvan nābhyudito bodhas tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

āśā yāvad aśeṣeṇa na lūnāś cittasambhavāḥ ।
vīrudho dātrakeṇeva tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

ātmalābhaṃ vinā sādho vinā jñānamahauṣadham ।
udeti punar eveyaṃ dussaṃsṛtiviṣūcikā ।। 

śaiśavāṅkuritārambho navayauvanapallavaḥ ।
jarākusumito abhyeti punas saṃsāradurdrumaḥ ।। 

kāyajīrṇataror asmād bāndhavākrandaṣaṭpadāt ।
jarāpuṣpasitodeti punar maraṇamañjarī ।। 

bhuktaśuktartuvirasā purāṇadivasombhitā ।
nīyate nīrasaprāyā punas saṃvatsarāvalī ।। 

mahādarīṣu dehādres tṛṣṇākaṇṭakitāsv ati ।
helāvyālāsu ca punaḥ kriyāsu parilupyate ।। 

duḥkhais sukhalavākārair dīrghadīrghaiś śubhāśubhaiḥ ।
aparyastāgamaprāyāḥ prayānty āyānti rātrayaḥ ।। 

ayathārthakriyārambhaiḥ kadāśāveśapallavaiḥ ।
kṣīyate karmabhis tucchair āyur āhatakartṛbhiḥ ।। 

unmūlitāśayālāno manomattamataṅgajaḥ ।
tṛṣṇākareṇukottabdho dūraṃ viparidhāvati ।। 

jihvādalalatālagnaḥ kāyadrumaguhālaye ।
yatracintāmaṇau vṛddho gardhagṛdhro vivardhate ।। 

nīrasā nissukhā laghvī patatpelavagātrikā ।
jīrṇaparṇasavarṇeyaṃ kṣīyate divasāvalī ।। 

apamānarajodhvastam astaṅgatavapuśśri ca ।
mukhaṃ dhūsaratām eti himaiḥ padmam ivāhatam ।। 

śuṣyataḥ kāyasarasaḥ pragaladyauvanāmbhasaḥ ।
rājahaṃsaḥ kṣaṇād āyur anāvarti palāyate ।। 

kālānilabaloddhūtāj jarjarāj jīvitadrumāt ।
bhogapuṣpāṇi divasaparṇāni nipatanty adhaḥ ।। 

bhogabhogiśriteṣv antar duḥkhadarduravāriṣu ।
mano mohāndhakūpeṣu dūreṣu vinimajjati ।। 

nānānurañjanā spaṣṭā tṛṣṇā taralapelavā ।
caityamagnapatākeva dūraṃ samadhirohati ।। 

asya saṃsāratantrasya bṛhatkālabilāspadaḥ ।
jīvitāśāmayāṃs tantūn antakākhur nikṛntati ।। 

yauvanotphālakallolā bahalollāsaphenilā ।
parāvartamahāvartā yāti jīvitadurnadī ।। 

kalākulakalatkāryakallolakulasaṅkulā ।
kriyāsarid aparyantā vahaty ākulakoṭarā ।। 

anantā bandhujanatānadyo gambhīrakoṭare ।
ajasraṃ nipatanty etā vitate kālasāgare ।। 

deharatnaśalākeyaṃ nāśapaṅkārṇavodare ।
na jñāyate kva magneti tāta janmani janmani ।। 

cintācakre ciraṃ cañcaccakrikācāracañcure ।
ceto bhramati sāmudre gartāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā ।। 

uhyamānam ananteṣu cetaḥ kāryamahormiṣu ।
kṣaṇam eti na viśrāmaṃ cintātāṇḍavitāśayam ।। 

idaṃ kṛtaṃ karomīdaṃ kariṣyāmīdam ity alam ।
kalanājālavalitā mūrchitā matipakṣiṇī ।। 

ayaṃ suhṛd ayaṃ śatrur iti dvandvamahāmayaḥ ।
vinikṛntati marmāṇi navānīvotpalāni me ।। 

cintātuṇḍyā madāvartavīcyaikanicayaṃ caran ।
kṣaṇād ucchūnatām eti mānamīnaḥ kṣaṇāt kṣatim ।। 

anātmīyāni duḥkhāni bahūny evaṃvidhāny alam ।
ātmabuddhyā vicinvāno jano gacchati dīnatām ।। 

bahuvidhasukhaduḥkhamadhyapātī vitatajarāmaraṇaprapātabhagnaḥ ।
jagadudaragirau luṭhañ jano ayaṃ gatarasaparṇavad eti jarjaratvam ।। 

anityatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ tau kuśalapraśnaṃ kṛtavantau parasparam ।
kālenāsādya vimalaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣaṃ tato gatau ।। 

ato vacmi mahābāho yathā jñānetarā gatiḥ ।
nāsti saṃsārataraṇe pāśabaddhasya cetasaḥ ।। 

idaṃ bhavyamater duḥkham anantam api pelavam ।
kukhagasyātaro ambhodhis sarpārer goṣpadāyate ।। 

dehātītā mahātmānaś cinmātre svātmani sthitāḥ ।
dūrad dehaṃ hasanti svaṃ prekṣyārko janatām iva ।। 

dehe duḥkhini saṅkṣubdhe kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā ।
rathe vidhurite bhagne sāratheḥ keva khaṇḍanā ।। 

manasi kṣubdhatāṃ yāte cittvasyāṅga kim āgatam ।
taraṅge rajasā mlāne vaiparītyaṃ kim ambudheḥ ।। 

ke bhavanty ayasāṃ haṃsāḥ payasām upalāś ca ke ।
kāś śilāḥ kila dārūṇāṃ ke bhogāḥ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

sambandhaḥ ka ivāgrāśāśailāparasamudrayoḥ ।
antare dūrasambādhe kaś ca cittattvabandhayoḥ ।। 

apy utsaṅgohyamānāni kāṣṭhāni saridambhasām ।
kāni nāma bhavantīha śarīrāṇi tathātmanaḥ ।। 

saṅghaṭṭāt kāṣṭhapayasāṃ yathottuṅgāḥ kaṇādayaḥ ।
dehātmanos samāyogāt tathaitāś cittavṛttayaḥ ।। 

sambandhād dārupayasāṃ pratibimbāni dārutaḥ ।
yathā payasi lakṣyante śarīrāṇi tathātmani ।। 

yathā darpaṇavāryādau pratibimbāni vastutaḥ ।
nāsatyāni na satyāni śarīrāṇi tathātmani ।। 

dāruvāryupalāsphoṭe duḥkhitā na yathā kvacit ।
saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu na tathā pañcasu kṣatiḥ ।। 

dārusaṃvellitāt toyāt kampaśabdādayo yathā ।
prajāyante tathaivāsmād dehāc citparibodhitāt ।। 

na buddhajaḍayor etās saṃvidaś ciccharīrayoḥ ।
etā hy ajñānamātrasya tasmin naṣṭe tad eva tāḥ ।। 

yathā na kasyacid dāruvāriśleṣe anubhūtayaḥ ।
tathā na kasyacid dehadehisaṅge anubhūtayaḥ ।। 

ajñasyāyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭas saṃsāras satyatāṃ gataḥ ।
tajjñasyāyaṃ tathā naṣṭas saṃsāro asatyatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

antassaṅgavihīnās te yathā snehā dṛṣattale ।
tathāsaktamanovṛttau bāhyābhogānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

antassaṅgena rahito yadvat salilakāṣṭhayoḥ ।
sambandhas tadvad evāntar asaṅgo dehadehinoḥ ।। 

antassaṅgena rahitas sambandho jalakāṣṭhayoḥ ।
jñadehadehinoś caiva pratibimbāmbhasos tathā ।। 

sthitā sarvatra saṃvittiś śuddhā saṃvedyavarjitā ।
dvitvopalāñchitā tv anyā dussaṃvittir na vidyate ।। 

aduḥkham eti duḥkhatvam antassaṃvedanāt sphuṭam ।
sthāṇur bhavati vetālo vetālatvena bhāvitaḥ ।। 

asambandho hi sambandho bhavaty antarviniścayāt ।
svapnāṅganāsuratavat sthāṇuvetālabhaṅgavat ।। 

asatprāyo hi sambandho yathā salilakāṣṭhayoḥ ।
tathaiva mithyā sambandhaś śarīraparamātmanoḥ ।। 

antassaṅgaṃ vinā nāmbu kāṣṭhāghātaiḥ pramuhyate ।
ātmāntassaṅgarahito dehaduḥkhair na dahyate ।। 

dehabhāvanayaivātmā dehaduḥkhavaśe sthitaḥ ।
tattyāgena tato mukto bhavatīti vidur budhāḥ ।। 

antassaṅgavihīnatvād duḥkhavanty aṅga no yathā ।
pattrāmbūpaladārūṇi śliṣṭāny api parasparam ।। 

antassaṅgena rahitā yānti nirduḥkhatāṃ parām ।
śliṣṭā api tathaivātmā dehendriyamanāṃsy alam ।। 

antassaṅgo hi saṃsāre sarveṣāṃ nāma dehinām ।
jarāmaraṇamohānāṃ tarūṇāṃ bījakāraṇam ।। 

antassaṃsaṅgavāñ jantur magnas saṃsārasāgare ।
antassaṃsaṅgamuktas tu tīrṇas saṃsārasāgarāt ।। 

antassaṃsaṅgavac cittaṃ śataśākham ihocyate ।
antassaṃsaṅgarahitaṃ vilīnaṃ cittam ucyate ।। 

bhagnasphaṭikavad viddhi manas saktam apāvanam ।
abhagnasphaṭikābhāsam asaktaṃ viddhi vai manaḥ ।। 

asaktaṃ nirmalaṃ cittaṃ muktaṃ saṃsāry api sphuṭam ।
saktaṃ tu dīrghatapasā yuktam apy atibandhavat ।। 

antassaktaṃ mano baddhaṃ muktaṃ saktivivarjitam ।
antassaṃsaktir evaikaṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ ।। 

antassaṃsaktimuktasya kurvato api na kartṛtā ।
sukhaduḥkhavati svapne sambhramonmukhatā yathā ।। 

citte kartari kartṛtvam adehasyāpi vidyate ।
svapnādāv iva vikṣubdhasukhaduḥkhadaśāmayam ।। 

akartari manasy antar akartṛtvaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet ।
śūnyacitto hi puruṣaḥ kurvann api na cetati ।। 

cetasā kṛtam āpnoṣi cetasā na kṛtaṃ na tu ।
na kvacit kāraṇaṃ deho na cittam api kartṛ vai ।। 

asaṃsaktam akartr eva kurvad eva mano viduḥ ।
na karmaphalabhoktṛtvam asaktaṃ pratipadyate ।। 

brahmahatyāśvamedhābhyām asaṃsakto na lipyate ।
dūrasthakāntāsaṃsaktamanāḥ kāryair ivāgragaiḥ ।। 

antassaṃsaktinirmukto jīvo madhuravṛttimān ।
bahiḥ kurvann akurvan vā kartā bhoktā na hi kvacit ।। 

antassaṃsaktimuktaṃ yan manas syāt tad akartṛkam ।
tad viyuktaṃ praśāntaṃ tat tad yuktaṃ tad alepakam ।। 

tat syāt sarvapadārthānāṃ śliṣṭānāṃ niścitaṃ bahiḥ ।
sarvaduḥkhakarīṃ krūrām antassaktiṃ vivarjayet ।। 

virahitam alam antassaṅgadoṣeṇa cetaś śamam upagatam ādyaṃ vyomavan nirmalābham ।
sakalakalanamuktenātmanaikatvam eti sthiram alinibham ambho vāriṇīvālinīle ।। 

antassaṅgavicāro nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kīdṛśo bhagavan saṅgaḥ kaś ca bandhāya vai nṛṇām ।
kaś ca mokṣāya kathitaḥ kathaṃ caiṣa cikitsyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dehadehivibhāgaikaparityāge na bhāvanā ।
dehamātre tu viśvāsas saṅgo bandhārha ucyate ।। 

anantasyātmatattvasya saparyantaviniścaye ।
yat sukhārthitvam antas sa saṅgo bandhārha ucyate ।। 

sarvam ātmedam akhilaṃ kiṃ vāñchāmi tyajāmi kim ।
ity asaṅgasthitiṃ viddhi jīvanmuktatanusthitām ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo asti mā bhavantu bhavantu vā ।
sukhāny asakta ity antaḥ kathyate muktibhāṅ naraḥ ।। 

nābhinandati naiṣkarmyaṃ na karmaprakṛtehitaḥ ।
susamo yaḥ phalatyāgī so asaṃsakta iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

ātmatattvaikaniṣṭhasya harṣāmarṣavaśaṃ manaḥ ।
yasya nāyāty asakto asau jīvanmuktaś ca kathyate ।। 

sarvakarmaphalādīnāṃ manasaiva na karmaṇā ।
nipuṇaṃ yaḥ parityāgas so asaṃsaṅga iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

asaṃsaṅgena sakalāś ceṣṭā nānāvijṛmbhitāḥ ।
cikitsitā bhavanty aṅga śreyas sampādayanti ca ।। 

saṃsaktivaśatas sarve vitatā duḥkharāśayaḥ ।
prayānti śataśākhatvaṃ śvabhrakaṇṭakavṛkṣavat ।। 

rajjukṛṣṭaghanaghrāṇo yad gantryāḥ pathi gardabhaḥ ।
bhāraṃ vahati bhītātmā tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam ।। 

śītavātātapakleśam ekadeśaniṣaṇṇayā ।
tarur vahati yat tanvā tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam ।। 

dharāvivaranirmagno yat kīṭaḥ pīḍitāṅgakaḥ ।
kṣiṇoti vikalaḥ kālaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam ।। 

dūrvāṅkuratṛṇāhāraḥ kirātaśarapīḍayā ।
jahāti yan mṛgo dehaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam ।। 

vīruttṛṇadaśāṃ yātā lūyante yat punaḥ punaḥ ।
nānāvigatasañcārās tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam ।। 

rasātalarasāyogāt tṛṇagulmalatādayaḥ ।
janayanti yad ākāraṃ tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam ।। 

utpatyotpatya līyante taraṅgiṇi taraṅgavat ।
bhūtāni yad anantāni tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam ।। 

śāntaivānantasaṅkāśā padārthaśatasaṅkulā ।
yat saṃsāranadī mattā tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam ।। 

saktir hi dvividhā proktā vandhyā vandyā ca rāghava ।
vandhyā sarvatra mūḍhānāṃ vandyā tattvavidāṃ nijā ।। 

ātmatattvāvabodhena hīnā dehādivastujā ।
bhūyassaṃsāradā saktir dṛḍhā vandhyeti kathyate ।। 

ātmatattvāvabodhena satyabhūtā vivekajā ।
vandyā hi kathyate saktir bhūyassaṃsāravarjitā ।। 

śaṅkhacakragadāhasto deho vividhayehayā ।
vandyasaṃsaktivaśataḥ paripāti jagattrayam ।। 

anārataṃ nirālambe vyomavartmani pānthatām ।
vandyasaṃsaktivaśataḥ karoti ravir anvaham ।। 

mahākalpasamādhānadhīrakalpitakalpanam ।
vandyasaṃsaktivaśato brāhmaṃ sphurati vai vapuḥ ।। 

līlayā lalanālānanilīnaṃ bhūtibhūṣitam ।
vandyasaṃsaktivaśataś śarīraṃ śāṅkaraṃ sthitam ।। 

vijñātagatayas siddhā lokapālās tathetare ।
vandyasaṃsaktivaśatas tiṣṭhanti jagatāṃ gaṇe ।। 

dhatte śarīrayantraugham anyeyaṃ bhūtasantatiḥ ।
vandhyasaṃsaktivaśato jarāmṛtivivartitam ।। 

manaḥ patati bhogeṣu gṛdhro māṃsalaveṣv iva ।
vandhyasaktivaśād eva vyarthayā rasyaśaṅkayā ।। 

saṃsaktivaśato vāti vāyur bhuvanakoṭare ।
pañcabhūtāni tiṣṭhanti vahatīyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

divi devā bhuvi narāḥ pātāle bhogino asurāḥ ।
brahmāṇḍodumbaraphale sphuranmaṣakavat sthitāḥ ।। 

jāyante ca mriyante ca nipatanty utpatanti ca ।
bhūtāny avirataṃ bhūyo nirjharāmbukaṇā iva ।। 

parasparanigīrṇāṅgī janatā jāḍyajarjarā ।
sambhrāntā prabhramaty aṅga śīrṇaṃ parṇam ivāmbare ।। 

nakṣatracakraṃ gagane kṣamāmaṣakasantatam ।
sphuraty āvartavṛttyaiva pātālagajalaughavat ।। 

pātotpātadaśājīrṇaṃ kālabālakakandukam ।
adyāpi na jahātīndur jaḍimnā malinaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

nānāyugaparāvartaduḥkhālokanakarkaśam ।
na lunāti manaṣṣaṇḍaṃ divi gīrvāṇamaṇḍalam ।। 

vāsanāmātravaśataḥ pare vyomani kenacit ।
idam āracitaṃ citraṃ vicitraṃ paśya rāghava ।। 

manassaṅgaikaraṅgeṇa śūnye vyomni jaganmayam ।
yad idaṃ racitaṃ citraṃ na tat satyaṃ kadācana ।। 

saṃsaktamanasām asmin saṃsāre vyavahāriṇām ।
atti tṛṣṇā śarīrāṇi tṛṇāny agniśikhā yathā ।। 

parisaktamater dehān sikatāḥ patyur ambhasām ।
kaś śaktaḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ paramāṇugaṇaṃ tathā ।। 

muktālatāyā gaṅgāyā meror āpādamastakam ।
taraṅgamuktā gaṇyante na dehās saktacetasaḥ ।। 

saṃsaktacittam āyānti sarvā duḥkhaparamparāḥ ।
jaḍakallolavalitā mahānadya ivāmbudhim ।। 

saṃsaktamanasām etā ramyāntaḥpurapaṅktayaḥ ।
racitā rauravāvīcikālasūtrādināmikāḥ ।। 

saktacittaṃ janaṃ duḥkhaśuṣkam indhanasañcayam ।
jvalatāṃ narakāgnīnāṃ viddhi tena jvalanti te ।। 

duḥkhajālam idaṃ rāma yat kiñcij jagatīgatam ।
saṃsaktamanasām arthe tat sarvaṃ parikalpitam ।। 

manassaṃsaṅgadharmiṇyā bhārabhūtaśarīrayā ।
kṣayodayadaśārthinyā sarvaṃ tatam avidyayā ।। 

asaṃsaṅgena bhogānāṃ sarvā rāma vibhūtayaḥ ।
paraṃ vistāram āyānti prāvṛṣīva mahāpagāḥ ।। 

antassaṃsaṅgam aṅgānām aṅgāraṃ viddhi rāghava ।
anantassaṅgam aṅgānāṃ viddhi rāma rasāyanam ।। 

saṃsaṅgenāntarasthena dahyate prakṛtis svayam ।
svaphalotthenaiḍakākṣī pāvakena yathauṣadhiḥ ।। 

sarvatrāsaktam āśaktam anantam iva saṃsthitam ।
asaṅkalpaṃ sadābhāsaṃ sukhāyaiva mano bhavet ।। 

vidyādṛśi prodayam āgatena kṣayaṃ tv avidyāviṣayaṃ gatena ।
sarvatra saṃsaktivivarjitena svacetasā tiṣṭhati yas sa muktaḥ ।। 

saṃsaṅgavicārayogo nāma sargaḥ

ekonasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvadā sarvasaṃsthena sarveṇa saha tiṣṭhatā ।
sarvakarmaratenāpi manaḥ kāryaṃ vijānatā ।। 

na saktam iha cintāsu na ceṣṭāsu na vastuṣu ।
nākāśe nāpy adhobhāge na dikṣu na latāsu ca ।। 

na bahir vipulābhoge na caivendriyavṛttiṣu ।
nābhyantare na ca prāṇe na mūrdhani na tāluni ।। 

na bhrūmadhye na nāsānte na mukhe na khatārake ।
nāndhakāre na cābhāse na cāsmin hṛdayāmbare ।। 

na jāgrati na ca svapne na suṣupte na nirmale ।
nāsite na ca vā pīte raktādau śabale api ca ।। 

na sthire na cale nādau na madhye netaratra ca ।
na dūre nāntike nāṅge na padārthe na cātmani ।। 

na śabdasparśarūpeṣu na mohānandavṛttiṣu ।
na gamāgamaceṣṭāsu na kālakalanāsu ca ।। 

kevalaṃ citi viśramya kiñcic cetyāvalambataḥ ।
sarvatra nīrasam iva tiṣṭhatv ātmarasaṃ manaḥ ।। 

tatrastho vigatāsaṅgo jīvo ajīvatvam āgataḥ ।
vyavahāram imaṃ sarvaṃ mā karotu karotu vā ।। 

akurvan vāpi kurvan vā jīvas svātmaratikriyām ।
kriyāphalair na sambandham āyāti kham ivāmbudaiḥ ।। 

atha vā tam api tyaktvā cetyāṃśaṃ śāntacidghanaḥ ।
jīvas tiṣṭhatu saṃśāntaṃ jvalan maṇir ivātmani ।। 

nirvāṇam ātmani gatas satatoditātmā jīvo bhuvi vyavaharann api rāmabhadra ।
nāsaṅgam eti gatasaṅgatayā phalena karmodbhavena hasatīva ca deham ārāt ।। 

sātatikasamācārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asaṃsaṅgasukhadhyānasaṃsthitair viditātmabhiḥ ।
vyavahāribhir apy antar vītaśokair avasthitam ।। 

prakṣubdhākṣubdhadehasya visaṃvedanasaṃvidaḥ ।
antaḥpūrṇasya vadane śrīr indor iva lakṣyate ।। 

cetyahīnacidālambi mano yasya gatajvaram ।
tenāmbu katakeneva janatā samprasīdati ।। 

nityam ātmadṛgālīno jñas svasthaś cañcalo api san ।
kṣubdho dṛśyata evāsau pratibimbārkavan mudhā ।। 

ātmārāmā mahātmānaḥ prabuddhāḥ paramodayāḥ ।
bahiḥ piñchāgrataralā antar merur ivācalāḥ ।। 

cittam ātmatvam āyātaṃ sukhaduḥkhānurañjanām ।
nopaiti raṅgasaṃyogaṃ masṛṇas sphaṭiko yathā ।। 

saṃsāradṛṣṭir uditā jñātalokaparāvaram ।
na rañjayati saccittaṃ jalalekhā yathāmbujam ।। 

ātmadhyānamayo adhyānī prabodhaṃ param āgataḥ ।
kalanāmalanirmuktas tv asakta iti kathyate ।। 

ātmārāmatayā jīvo yāty asaṃsaktatām iha ।
ātmajñānena saṃsaṅgas tanutām eti nānyathā ।। 

jāgraty eva suṣuptastho jīvo bhavati rāghava ।
asyāṃ dṛśi gatadvandvo nityānastamayodayaḥ ।। 

atra prauḍhim upāyātas turyatām eti pāvanīm ।
pariṇāmavaśād indur amāvasyārkatām iva ।। 

cittve cetyadaśāhīne yā sthitiḥ kṣīṇacetasaḥ ।
socyate śāntakalanā jāgraty eva suṣuptatā ।। 

tāṃ ca suptadaśām etya jīvan vyavaharan naraḥ ।
sukhaduḥkhavaratrābhir na kadācana kṛṣyate ।। 

jāgraty eva suṣuptastho yaḥ karoti jagatkriyām ।
taṃ yantraputrakam iva nāyāti sukhaduḥkhadṛk ।। 

cittasya bādhikā saktir bhāvābhāvopatāpadā ।
ātmatām āgate citte kasya kiṃ bādhate katham ।। 

suṣuptabuddhiḥ karmāṇi pūrvahevākahelayā ।
kurvan na badhyate jīvo jīvanmuktatayā sthitaḥ ।। 

sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kuru mā kuru vānagha ।
karma prakṛtihevākavaśād upagataṃ svakam ।। 

nādānaṃ na parityāgaḥ karmaṇo jñāya rocate ।
tiṣṭhanty adhigatātmāno yathāprāptānuvartinaḥ ।। 

kurvann api na kartāsi suṣuptaikasthayā dhiyā ।
akartāpi ca kartāsi yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

yathā na kiñcit kalayan mañcake spandate śiśuḥ ।
tathā phalādy akalayan kuru karmāṇi rāghava ।। 

acetyacitpadasthatvāj jāgraty api suṣuptadhīḥ ।
yad yat karoti labdhātmā tasmiṃs tasya na kartṛtā ।। 

daśām āsādya sauṣuptīṃ svavidaiva vivāsanaḥ ।
antaśśītalatām eti jño rasena yathā śaśī ।। 

suṣuptastho mahātejā ghūrṇan pūrṇendubimbavat ।
samas sarvāsv avasthāsu bhavaty adrir yathartuṣu ।। 

suṣuptasaṃstho dhīrātmā bahir āyāti lolatām ।
kriyāsu nāntar bhūkampapraspandita ivācalaḥ ।। 

suṣuptāvasthito bhūtvā dehaṃ vigatakalmaṣaḥ ।
ghātayāśv atha vā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dhāraya śailavat ।। 

eṣaiva rāma sauṣuptī sthitir abhyāsayogataḥ ।
prauḍhā satī turyam iti kathitā tattvakovidaiḥ ।। 

ānandamaya evātra prakṣīṇasakalāmayaḥ ।
atyantāstaṅgatamanā bhavati jño mahodayaḥ ।। 

atrastho jñaḥ pramuditaḥ paramānandaghūrṇitaḥ ।
līlām ivemāṃ racanāṃ sāṃsārīm anupaśyati ।। 

vītaśokabhayāyāso gatasaṃsārasambhramaḥ ।
turyāvasthām upārūḍho bhūyaḥ patati nātmavān ।। 

prāptuṃ svāṃ padavīṃ puṇyāṃ yatnavantam imaṃ janam ।
śailasaṃstha ivādhassthaṃ hasan paśyati dhīradhīḥ ।। 

asyāṃ tu turyāvasthāyāṃ sthitiṃ prāpyāvināśinīm ।
ānandaikāntalīnatvād anānandapadaṃ gataḥ ।। 

anānandamahānandaḥ kalātītas tato api hi ।
mukta ity ucyate yogī turyātītapadaṃ gataḥ ।। 

parigalitasamastajanmapāśas sakalavihīnamanomayābhimānaḥ ।
paramarasamayīṃ prayāti sattāṃ jalagatasaindhavakhaṇḍavan mahātmā ।। 

saṃsaṅgacikitsopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yāvat turyaparāmarśas tāvat kevalatāpadam ।
jīvanmuktasya viṣayo vacasāṃ ca raghūdvaha ।। 

ata ūrdhvaṃ sadehānāṃ muktānāṃ vacasāṃ tathā ।
viṣayo na mahābāho puruṣāṇāṃ ivāmbaram ।। 

sā hi viśrāntipadavī dūrebhyo api davīyasī ।
gamyā videhamuktānāṃ khalekheva nabhasvatām ।। 

suṣuptāvasthayā kañcit kālaṃ bhuktvā jagatsthitim ।
turyatām etya tadanu paramānandaghūrṇitāḥ ।। 

turyātītāṃ daśāṃ tajjñā yathā yānty ātmakovidāḥ ।
tathādhigaccha nirdvandvaṃ padaṃ raghukulodvaha ।। 

suṣuptāvasthayā rāma bhava saṃvyavahāravān ।
citrendor iva te na staḥ kṣayodvegāv arindama ।। 

śarīrasanniveśasya kṣaye sthairye ca saṃvidam ।
mā gṛhāṇa bhramo hy eṣa śarīram iti jṛmbhate ।। 

dehanāśena ko arthas te ko arthas te dehasaṃsthayā ।
bhava tvaṃ prakṛtārambhas tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam ।। 

jñātavān asi tat satyaṃ buddhavān asi tat padam ।
prāptavān asi rūpaṃ svaṃ viśoko bhava bhūtaye ।। 

īpsitānīpsitatyaktaś śītalālokaśobhayā ।
andhakārātapāmbhodamuktaṃ kham iva śobhase ।। 

manas tavātmā sampannaṃ nādhas samanudhāvati ।
yogamantratapassiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ khād ivāvanim ।। 

iha śuddhā cid evāsti pārāvāravivarjitā ।
ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti te māstu vibhramaḥ ।। 

ātmeti vyavahārārtham abhidhā kalpitā vibhoḥ ।
nāmarūpādibhedās tu dūram asmād alaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

jalam eva yathāmbhodhir na taraṅgādikaṃ pṛthak ।
ātmaivedaṃ tathā sarvaṃ na bhūtaughādikaṃ pṛthak ।। 

yathā samastāj jaladher jalād anyan na labhyate ।
tathaiva jagatas sphārād ātmano anyan na labhyate ।। 

ayaṃ so aham iti prājña kva karoṣi vyavasthitim ।
kiṃ tat tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā te syāt kiṃ na tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā na te ।। 

na dvitvam asti no dehas sambandho na ca taiś citaḥ ।
sambhavaty akalaṅkāyā bhānor iva tamaḥpaṭaiḥ ।। 

dvitvam abhyupagamyāpi kathayāmi tavārihan ।
dehādibhis sadbhir api na sambandho vibhor bhavet ।। 

chāyātapaprasarayoḥ prakāśatamasor yathā ।
na sambhavati sambandhas tathā vai dehadehinoḥ ।। 

yathā śītoṣṇayor nityaṃ parasparaviruddhayoḥ ।
na sambhavati sambandho rāma dehātmanos tathā ।। 

avinābhāvitārthas tu sambandhaḥ katham etayoḥ ।
jaḍacetanayor dehadehinor anubhūyate ।। 

cinmātreṇātmanā dehas sambaddha iti yā kathā ।
saiṣā duravabodhotthā dāvāgnau jaladhīr yathā ।। 

satyāvalokanenaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir vinaśyati ।
avalokanayā samyag ātape jaladhīr yathā ।। 

cidātmā nirmalo nityas svāvabhāso nirāmayaḥ ।
dehas tv anityo malavāṃs tena sambadhyate katham ।। 

spandam āyāti vātena bhūtair āpīvarīkṛtaḥ ।
dehas tena na sambandho manāg eva mahātmanaḥ ।। 

siddhe dvitve api dehasya na sambandhasya sambhavaḥ ।
dvitvāsiddhau tu sumate kalanaivedṛśī kutaḥ ।।
