ity etad eva tat satyam atraivāṅga sthitiṃ kuru ।
na bandho asti na mokṣo asti kadācit kasyacit kvacit ।। 

sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam ity eva pratyayaṃ sphuṭam ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ rāma sarvatra dṛḍhatāṃ naya ।। 

sukhī duḥkhī ca mūḍho asmīty etā durdṛṣṭayas smṛtāḥ ।
āsu ced vastubuddhis te tac ciraṃ duḥkham eṣyasi ।। 

yaḥ kramaś śailatṛṇayoḥ kauśeyopalayos tathā ।
sāmyaṃ prati sa evoktaḥ paramātmaśarīrayoḥ ।। 

yathā śītoṣṇayor aikyaṃ kathāsv api na dṛśyate ।
jaḍaprakāśayoś śleṣo na tathātmaśarīrayoḥ ।। 

yathā tejastimirayor na sambandho na tulyatā ।
atyantabhinnayo rāma tathā hy ātmaśarīrayoḥ ।। 

dehaś calati vātena tenaivāyāti gacchati ।
śabdaṃ karoti tenaiva dehanāḍīvilāsinā ।। 

śabdaḥ kacaṭataprāyas sphuraty antas samīraṇe ।
yathā prajāyate vaṃśād deharandhrāt tathaiva hi ।। 

kanīnikāparispandaś cakṣusspandaś ca mārutāt ।
indriyasphuraṇaṃ caiva saṃvit kevalam ātmanaḥ ।। 

ākāśopalakuḍyādau sarvatrātmadaśā sthitā ।
pratibimbam ivādarśe citta eva ca dṛśyate ।। 

śarīrālayam utsṛjya yatra cittavihaṅgamaḥ ।
svavāsanāvaśād yāti tatraivātmānubhūyate ।। 

yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandhasaṃvidas saṃsthitā yathā ।
yatra cittaṃ hi tatrātmasaṃvidas saṃsthitās tathā ।। 

sarvatra sthitam ākāśam ādarśe pratibimbate ।
yathā tathātmā sarvatra sthitaś cetasi dṛśyate ।। 

apām avanataṃ sthānam āspadaṃ bhūtale yathā ।
antaḥkaraṇam evātmasaṃvidām āspadaṃ tathā ।। 

satyāsatyaṃ jagadrūpam antaḥkaraṇabimbitā ।
ātmasaṃvit tanotīdam ālokam iva sūryabhāḥ ।। 

antaḥkaraṇam evātaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhūtasaṃsṛtau ।
ātmā sarvātigatvāt tu kāraṇaṃ sad akāraṇam ।। 

avicāraṇam ajñānaṃ maurkhyam āhur mahādhiyaḥ ।
saṃsārasaṃsṛtau sāram antaḥkaraṇakāraṇam ।। 

asamyakprekṣaṇān mohāc cetas sattāṃ gṛhītavat ।
sammohabījakaṇikāṃ tamo arkadravaṇād iva ।। 

yathābhūtātmatattvaikaparijñānena rāghava ।
asattām ety alaṃ ceto dīpeneva tamaḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

saṃsārakāraṇam atas svayaṃ ceto avicāraṇāt ।
jīvo antaḥkaraṇaṃ cittaṃ manaś cetyādināmakam ।। 

rāmaḥ

etās sañjñāḥ prabho bahvyaś cetaso rūḍhim āgatāḥ ।
katham ity eva kathaya mayi mānada siddhaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarve bhāvā ime nityam ātmatattvaikarūpiṇaḥ ।
citrās taraṅgakakaṇā jalaikakalitā yathā ।। 

ātmā spandaikarūpātmā sthitas teṣu kvacit kvacit ।
taraṅgeṣu viloleṣu payo vyomāmalaṃ yathā ।। 

kvacid aspandarūpātmā sthitas teṣu maheśvaraḥ ।
taraṅgatvam ayāteṣu jalabhāvo jaleṣv iva ।। 

tatropalādayo bhāvā alolā ātmani sthitāḥ ।
surāphenavad utspandā lolās tu puruṣādayaḥ ।। 

tatra teṣu śarīreṣu sarvaśaktitayātmanā ।
kalitājñānakalanā tenājñānam asau śritaḥ ।। 

tad ajñānam anantātmarūṣitaṃ jīva ucyate ।
sa saṃsārī mahāmohamāyāpañjarakuñjaraḥ ।। 

jīvanāj jīva ity ukto ahambhāvaś cāpy ahantayā ।
buddhir niścāyakatvena saṅkalpakalanān manaḥ ।। 

prakṛtiḥ prakṛtatvena deho digdhatayā sthitaḥ ।
jaḍaḥ prakṛtibhāvena cetanas svātmasattayā ।। 

jaḍājaḍadṛśor madhye yat tattvaṃ pāramātmikam ।
tad etad eva nānātvaṃ nānāsañjñābhir āgatam ।। 

evaṃ svarūpaṃ jīvasya bṛhadāraṇyakādiṣu ।
bahudhā bahuṣu proktaṃ vedānteṣu kilānagha ।। 

anyais tv etāsu sañjñāsu kuvikalpakutārkikaiḥ ।
mohāya kevalaṃ mūḍhair vyartham arthāḥ prakalpitāḥ ।। 

evam eṣa mahābāho jīvas saṃsārakāraṇam ।
mūkenātivarākeṇa dehakeneha kiṃ kṛtam ।। 

ādhārādheyayor ekanāśenānyasya naṣṭatā ।
yathā tathā śarīrādināśe nātmani naṣṭatā ।। 

ekaparṇarase kṣīṇe raso naiti yathā kṣayam ।
yāti parṇarasaś cārkaraśmijālāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

śarīrasaṅkṣaye dehī na kṣayaṃ yāti kasyacit ।
nirvāsanaś cet tad vyomni tiṣṭhaty ātmapade tathā ।। 

dehanāśe vinaṣṭo asmīty evaṃ yasyāmater bhramaḥ ।
mātus stanataṭāt tasya manye vetāla utthitaḥ ।। 

yasya hy ātyantiko nāśas syād asāv uditas smṛtaḥ ।
cittanāśo hi nāśas syāt sa mokṣa iti kathyate ।। 

mṛto naṣṭa iti proktam anyais tac ca mṛṣā na sat ।
sa deśakālāntarito bhūtvā bhūyo anubhūyate ।। 

ihohyate janair oghataraṅgāntas tṛṇair iva ।
maraṇavyapadeśāt tu deśakālatirohitaiḥ ।। 

vāsanāvalito jīvo yāty utsṛjya śarīrakam ।
kapir vanataruṃ tyaktvā tarvantaram ivāsthitaḥ ।। 

punas tad api santyajya prayāty anyad api kṣaṇāt ।
anyasmin vitate deśe kāle anyasmiṃś ca rāghava ।। 

itaś cetaś ca nīyante jīvā vāsanayā svayā ।
ciraṃ tadupajīvinyā dhūrtadhātryeva bālakāḥ ।। 

vāsanārajjuvalitā jīrṇāḥ parvatakukṣiṣu ।
jarayanty atiduḥkhena jīvitaṃ jīvajīvakāḥ ।। 

jaraḍhajagadupoḍhaduḥkhabhārāḥ pariṇatajarjarajīvitāś śvasantyaḥ ।
hṛdayajanitavāsanānuvṛttyā narakabhare janatāś ciraṃ patanti ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

saṃsāryupadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvisaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dehe jāte na jāto asi dehe naṣṭe na naśyasi ।
tvam ātmā niṣkalaṅkātmā dehas tava na kaścana ।। 

yaḥ kuṇḍabadaranyāyo yā ghaṭākāśasaṃsthitiḥ ।
tatraikasmin kṣate kṣīṇe dve iti vyarthakalpanā ।। 

vināśini vinaṣṭe asmin dehe svāṃ sthitim āgate ।
vinaśyāmīti yaḥ khedī taṃ dhig astv andhacetanam ।। 

yādṛśo raśmirathayos snehodvegavivarjitaḥ ।
sambandhas tādṛśo dehacittendriyasukhaiś citaḥ ।। 

gatetaretarāpekṣas saraḥpaṅkopalāmbhasām ।
yathā rāghava sambandhas tathā dehendriyātmanām ।। 

yādṛśo abdhidharādyānāṃ niricchāparidevanaḥ ।
saṃyogo viprayogaś ca tādṛśo dehadehinām ।। 

yathā kalpitavetālavikārabhayabhītayaḥ ।
mithyaiva kalpitā ete tathā snehasukhādayaḥ ।। 

bhūtapañcakasampiṇḍād racitā janatāḥ pṛthak ।
ekasmād eva viṭapād vicitrā iva putrikāḥ ।। 

kāṣṭhetarat kāṣṭhanare kiñcid anyan na vidyate ।
bhūtapiṇḍetarad dehe kiñcid anyan na vidyate ।। 

bhūtapañcakavikṣobhanāśotpādeṣu he janāḥ ।
harṣāmarṣaviṣādānāṃ kiṃ bhavanto vaśaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

ko nāmātiśayaḥ puṃsāṃ strīnāmny aparanāmni vā ।
kevale bhūtasaṅghāte prodbhūte arjunavātavat ।। 

sanniveśāṃśavaicitryam ajñānām eva tuṣṭaye ।
tajjñānāṃ tu yathābhūtabhūtapañcakadarśanam ।। 

mithaś śilāputrikayor yathaikopalasaṃsthayoḥ ।
śliṣṭayor api no rāgas tathā cittaśarīrayoḥ ।। 

mṛtpuṃsāṃ yādṛśo anyo'nyam āśayas saṅgame bhavet ।
buddhīndriyātmamanasām saṅgame tādṛśo astu te ।। 

nānyo'nyasnehasambandhabhājanaṃ śailaputrikāḥ ।
dehendriyātmaprāṇāś ca kasyātra paridevanā ।। 

itaś cetaś ca yātāni yathā saṃśleṣayaty alam ।
taraṅgas tṛṇajālāni tathā bhūtāni bhūtakṛt ।। 

saṃyujyante viyujyante tṛṇāny abdhijale yathā ।
muktāntaḥkalanaṃ dehabhūtāny ātmani vai tathā ।। 

ātmā cittatayā dehabhūtāny āśleṣayan sthitaḥ ।
tṛṇāny āvartavṛttyāntaḥkalanonmuktam ambv iva ।। 

prabodhāc cittatāṃ tyaktvā vrajaty ātmātmatāṃ svayam ।
svaspandavaśato vāri tyaktvāvartam ivācchatām ।। 

tato viviktaṃ bhūtaughaṃ dehasañjñaṃ prapaśyati ।
vātaskandhagato jantur vasudhāmaṇḍalaṃ yathā ।। 

pṛthagbhūtagaṇaṃ tyaktvā dehātīto bhavaty ajaḥ ।
paraṃ prakāśam āyāti sūryakānta ivāhani ।। 

jānāty athātmanātmānaṃ mānameyāmayojjhitam ।
muktaḥ kṣīvatayevāntas svāṃ saṃvidam anusmaran ।। 

ātmaikas spandate citkhe vastujālair ivoditaḥ ।
taraṅgakaṇakallolair anantāmbv ambudhāv iva ।। 

evamprāyamahābodhā vītarāgā gatainasaḥ ।
jīvanmuktāś carantīha mahāsattvapadaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

yathā kacanti vividhair maṇiratnair mahormayaḥ ।
nirastavāsanaṃ citrair vyavahārair narottamāḥ ।। 

na kūlakāṣair jaladhir na rajobhir nabhastalam ।
na mlāyati nijair lokavyavahārair ihātmavān ।। 

gatair abhyāgatais svacchair malinaiś capalair jaḍaiḥ ।
na rāgo nāmbudher dveṣo bhogaiś cādhigatātmanaḥ ।। 

yan manomananaṃ kiñcit samagre jagati sthitam ।
tac cetyonmukhacittattvavilāsollasanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

yad ahaṃ yac ca bhūtādi kālatritayabhāvi yat ।
dṛśyadarśanasambandhavistāras tad vijṛmbhate ।। 

yad dṛśyaṃ tad asat sad vā dṛṣṭim ekām upāśritam ।
anyat tv alepakaṃ tasmād dharṣaśokadaśe kutaḥ ।। 

asatyam evāsatyaṃ hi satyaṃ satyaṃ sadaiva hi ।
satyāsatyam asad viddhi tadarthaṃ kiṃ vimuhyasi ।। 

asamyagdarśanaṃ tyaktvā samyak paśya sulocana ।
na kvacin muhyati prauḍhas samyagdarśanavān iha ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yat sukhaṃ pāramārthikam ।
anubhūtimayaṃ tasmāt paraṃ brahmeti kathyate ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukhasaṃvid anuttamā ।
dadāty ajñāya saṃsāraṃ jñāya mokṣaṃ sukhodayā ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukham ātmavapur viduḥ ।
tad dṛśyāvalitaṃ baddhaṃ tanmuktaṃ muktam ucyate ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukhasaṃvid anāmayā ।
kṣayātiśayamuktā cet tan muktis socyate budhaiḥ ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yānubhūtis svagocarā ।
dṛśyadarśananirmuktā tām ālambya bhavābhavaḥ ।। 

sauṣuptī dṛṣṭir eṣā hi yāty evaṃ samprakāśatām ।
evaṃ ca yāti turyatvam evaṃ muktir iti smṛtā ।। 

dṛśyadarśanamuktāyāṃ yuktāyāṃ parayā dhiyā ।
dṛśyadarśanasambandhasaṃvidy asyāṃ tu rāghava ।। 

nātmā sthūlo na caivāṇur na pratyakṣo na cetanaḥ ।
nācetano na ca jaḍo na caivāsan na sanmayaḥ ।। 

nāhaṃ nānyo na caivaiko nāneko nāpy anekavān ।
nābhyāśastho na dūrastho naivāsti na ca nāsti ca ।। 

nāprāpyo nāpi ca prāpyo na cāsarvo na sarvagaḥ ।
na padārtho nāpadārtho nāpañcātmā na pañca ca ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyatāṃ prāptaṃ manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyāspadam ।
tadatītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tan na kiñcid ivehitam ।। 

yathābhūtam idaṃ samyag jñasya sampaśyato jagat ।
sarvam ātmamayaṃ vidvan nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit ।। 

kāṭhinyadravaṇaspandasvāvakāśāvalokane ।
ātmaiva sarvaṃ sarveṣu bhūvāryanilakhāgniṣu ।। 

sattaivāsti na vastūnāṃ yayā nāma vinā citā ।
vyatiriktaṃ tato astīti viddhi pronmattajalpitam ।। 

eko jaganti sakalāni samastakālakalpakramāntaragatāni gatāgatāni ।
ātmaiva netarakalākalanāsti kācid itthammatir bhava bhavātigato mahātman ।। 

mukhyasvarūpopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

trisaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃvicārayā dṛṣṭyā dvaitatyāgena rāghava ।
svo bhāvaḥ prāpyate tajjñais tajjñaiś cintāmaṇir yathā ।। 

athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇu rāmānayā yathā ।
drakṣyasy ātmānam acalaṃ bhaviṣyasi ca divyadṛk ।। 

ahaṃ kham aham ādityo diśo aham aham apy adhaḥ ।
ahaṃ daityā ahaṃ devāś śailāś cāham ahaṃ mahaḥ ।। 

tamo aham aham abhrāṇi bhūsamudrādikaṃ tv aham ।
rajo vāyur athāgniś ca jagat sarvam idaṃ tv aham ।। 

jagattraye ahaṃ sarvatra sa ātmaiva kila sthitaḥ ।
ko ahaṃ kim anyad iha hi dvitvam ekasya kīdṛśam ।। 

iti niścayavān antar nūnam ātmatayā jagat ।
paśyan harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ nāvaśaḥ paribhūyate ।। 

manmaye asmin kila jagaty akhile saṃsthite anagha ।
kim ātmīyaṃ paraṃ kiṃ syāt kamalekṣaṇa kathyatām ।। 

kiṃ tajjñavyatirekeṇa vidyate yad upāgame ।
harṣam etu viṣādaṃ vā vināśe jño jaganmayaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāradṛśāv ete sāttvike dve vinirmale ।
tattvajñānāt pravartete mokṣade pāramārthike ।। 

paro aṇus sakalātītarūpo ahaṃ tv ity ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
prathamā sarvam evāham ity anyoktā raghūdvaha ।। 

ahaṅkāradṛg anyā tu tṛtīyā vidyate anagha ।
deho aham iti tāṃ viddhi duḥkhāyaiva na śāntaye ।। 

atha vaitat trayam api tyaktvā sakalasiddhaye ।
yathecchaṃ tad upālambya tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhatatpadaḥ ।। 

sarvātītasvarūpo api sarvasattātigo api ca ।
svasattāpūritajagad asty evātmā prakāśakaḥ ।। 

svānubhūtyaiva paśyāśu sa evāsi sadoditaḥ ।
saṃśayaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ tyaja tattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

nātmāsty anumayā rāma na cāptavacanādinā ।
sarvadā sarvathā sarvaṃ sa pratyakṣānubhūtitaḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ darśanaṃ spandaḥ kiñcid yat saṃvidādy api ।
tat sarvam ātmā bhagavān dṛśyadarśanavarjitaḥ ।। 

na san nāsad asau devo nāṇur nāpi mahān asau ।
nāpy etayor dṛśor madhyaṃ sa evedaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ।। 

sa evedaṃ ca vadati sa ca vaktuṃ na yujyate ।
na tadanyad idaṃ naitat paśya māyām anāmayām ।। 

nātmāyam ayam apy ātmā sañjñābheda iti svayam ।
tenaiva sarvagatayā śaktyā svātmani kalpitaḥ ।। 

saṃsthitas sa hi sarvatra triṣu kāleṣu bhāsuraḥ ।
sūkṣmatvāt sumahattvāc ca kevalaṃ na vibhāvyate ।। 

satsv anantapadārtheṣu jīvatvenābhibimbati ।
ātmā puryaṣṭakādarśe svabhāvavaśatas svataḥ ।। 

puryaṣṭakodayād eva svayam ātmānubhūyate ।
sarvadā sarvasaṃsthaḥ khe ghanaspandād ivānilaḥ ।। 

cidātmā sarvago vyāpī na kvacin nāma na sthitaḥ ।
yadvat sarvapadārthānāṃ sattā tadvan maheśvaraḥ ।। 

sati puryaṣṭake tasmiñ jīvas sphurati nopalaḥ ।
sati vāyāv iva rajas sati dīpa ivekṣaṇam ।। 

iyaṃ puryaṣṭakasyecchā svātmany evātmani sthite ।
sati sphuraty abhyudite bhānāv iva janaiṣaṇā ।। 

yadi sūrye sthite vyomni tadvaśoditasaṃsthitiḥ ।
naśyati vyavahāro ayaṃ bhāsvataḥ kim upāgatam ।। 

yady ātmani sthite deve tatsattālabdhasaṃsthitiḥ ।
deho nāśam upāyāti tat kim unnaṣṭam ātmanaḥ ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।
na mukto na ca baddho ayam ātmā sarvasya sarvadā ।। 

ātmāvabodhābhyuditā nirātmany ātmatāṃ gatā ।
sarparajjubhramākārā bhrāntir duḥkhāya kevalam ।। 

anāditvān na jāto ayam ajātatvān na naśyati ।
ātmātmavyatiriktaṃ tu nābhivāñchaty asambhavāt ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchedān na baddho ayaṃ kadācana ।
bandhābhāve apy amuktis syād amokṣas tena sa smṛtaḥ ।। 

evaṅguṇaviśiṣṭo ayam ātmā sarvasya rāghava ।
avicāravaśān mūḍho loko ayaṃ pariroditi ।। 

samyagālokitāśeṣapūrvāparajagatkramaḥ ।
mā śokaṃ gaccha sumate maurkhyopahatalokavat ।। 

dve eva kalane tyaktvā mokṣabandhātmike sadā ।
viduṣā vyavahartavyaṃ yantreṇevātmamauninā ।। 

na mokṣo nabhasaḥ pṛṣṭhe na pātāle na bhūtale ।
mokṣo hi ceto vimalaṃ samyagjñānāvabodhitam ।। 

sakalāśāsv asaṃsaktyā yas svayaṃ cetasaḥ kṣayaḥ ।
sa mokṣanāmnā kathitas tattvajñair ātmadarśibhiḥ ।। 

yāvat prabodho vimalo noditas tāvad eva saḥ ।
maurkhyadīnatayā rāma bhaktyā mokṣo abhivāñchyate ।। 

ciraṃ prabodham āsādya citte avitatatāṃ gate ।
daśa mokṣā na vāñchyante kim utaiko hi mokṣakaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ mokṣas tv ayaṃ bandhaḥ pelavāṃ kalanām imām ।
parityajya mahātyāgī tvaṃ tvam eva bhavābhavaḥ ।। 

parigalitavikalpatāṃ prayātas sagarasutaughanikhātamekhalāṅkam ।
avanivalayam antarastasaṅgaś ciram anupālaya sarvadoditaśrīḥ ।। 

ātmavicāro nāma sargaḥ

catussaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

līlayāpaśyati vapuḥ kalanātmani jāyate ।
ramyasyāpaśyato vaktraṃ hṛdi daurūpyadhīr iva ।। 

tadvaśād iyam āyātā mahatī medurodarā ।
māyā madamahāśaktis surāsvādalavād iva ।। 

tayānayā vikāriṇyā tadatadbhāvabhūtayā ।
idaṃ sampannam akhilaṃ tāpād iva marau payaḥ ।। 

mano buddhir ahaṅkāro vāsanāś cendriyāṇy api ।
evaṅkalpitanāmāṅkas sphuraty ātmābdhir ambubhiḥ ।। 

cittāhaṅkārayor dvitvaṃ vacasy asti na vastutaḥ ।
yac cittaṃ sa hy ahaṅkāro yo ahaṅkāro mano hi tat ।। 

vyatiriktaṃ himāc chauklyam iti saṅkalpyate yathā ।
mudhaiva kalpyate bhedaś cittāhaṅkārayos tathā ।। 

mano'haṅkārayor antar dvayor ekatarakṣaye ।
kṣīṇe dve eva hi yathā paṭaśauklye paṭakṣaye ।। 

tucchāṃ mokṣadhiyaṃ tyaktvā bandhabuddhiṃ tathaiṣaṇāḥ ।
suvairāgyavivekābhyāṃ kevalaṃ kṣapayen manaḥ ।। 

mokṣo me astv iti cintā cej jātā tad vyutthitaṃ manaḥ ।
mananotke manasy uccair vapur doṣāya kevalam ।। 

ātmany atīte sarvasmāt sarvarūpe atha vā tate ।
ko bandhaḥ kaś ca vā mokṣo nirmūlaṃ mananaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

vāyus spandanadharmatvād yadā lagati dehake ।
tadā sphurati hastāṅgarasanāpallavāvalī ।। 

pādape pallavaśreṇīṃ cālayaty anilo yathā ।
tathaivāṅgāvalīṃ vāyur dehe sañcālayaty alam ।। 

cit sarvavyāpinī sūkṣmā na calā na ca cālyate ।
na svatas spandam āyāti devācala ivānilaiḥ ।। 

pratibimbitasarvārthā kevalaṃ svātmani sthitā ।
prakāśayati bodhena jagantīmāni dīpavat ।। 

tatra ko ayaṃ mudhā moho bhavatām atiduḥkhadaḥ ।
ayaṃ so ahaṃ mamāṅgāni mamedaṃ ceti durdhiyām ।। 

anicchalolatvān nunnadṛṣadārāvarāśivat ।
jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvakriyā samupalabhyate ।। 

tatrāyam ātmā sammantā bhoktā karteti jāyate ।
mudhaivājñānatāpotthā mṛgatṛṣṇeva vāsanā ।। 

ajñātaiṣā manomattamṛgaṃ viṣayatarṣulam ।
asatyaiva hi satyeva mṛgatṛṣṇeva karṣati ।। 

vijñātā satyarūpeyaṃ nāśaṃ yāti palāyate ।
vipramadhyāt parijñātā yathā caṇḍālakanyakā ।। 

avidyā samparijñātā na manaḥ parikarṣati ।
mṛgatṛṣṇā parijñātā tarṣulaṃ nāpakarṣati ।। 

paramārthāvabodhena samūlaṃ rāma vāsanā ।
dīpenevāndhakāraśrīr galaty āloka eti ca ।। 

nāsty avidyeti sañjāte niścaye śāstrayuktitaḥ ।
galaty avidyā tāpena tuṣārakaṇikā yathā ।। 

dehasyāsya jaḍasyārthe kiṃ bhogair iti niścayī ।
bhinatty āśāmayaṃ jñānī pañjaraṃ kesarī yathā ।। 

āśāparikare rāma nūnaṃ parihṛte hṛdaḥ ।
pumān āgatasaundaryo hlādam āyāti candravat ।। 

parāṃ śītalatām eti vṛṣṭidhauta ivācalaḥ ।
nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ dhatte prāptarājya ivādhanaḥ ।। 

śobhate amalayā lakṣmyā śaradīva nabhastalam ।
ātmany eva na māty uccaiḥ kalpasyānta ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

bhavaty apetasaṃrambho vṛṣṭamūka ivāmbudaḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty ātmani saṃvettā praśānta iva vāridhiḥ ।। 

paraṃ dhairyam upādatte sthairyaṃ merur ivācalaḥ ।
rājate svasthayā lakṣmyā śāntendhana ivānalaḥ ।। 

bhavaty ātmani nirvāṇaḥ praśānta iva dīpakaḥ ।
dṛṣṭim āyāti paramāṃ naraḥ pītāmṛto yathā ।। 

antardīpo ghaṭa iva madhyajvāla ivānalaḥ ।
sphuraddīptir maṇir iva prayāty antaḥ prakāśatām ।। 

sarvātmakaṃ sarvagataṃ sarveśaṃ sarvanāyakam ।
sarvākāraṃ nirākāraṃ svam ātmānaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

hasaty alam atītās tāḥ pelavā divasāvalīḥ ।
yāsu smaraśaraśreṇīcapalaṃ cittam acchinat ।। 

saṅgaraṅgaviniṣkrāntaś śāntamānamanojvaraḥ ।
adhyātmaratir āsīnaḥ pūrṇapāvanamānasaḥ ।। 

nirmṛṣṭakāmapaṅkāṅkaś chinnajanmanibandhanaḥ ।
dvandvadoṣabhayonmuktas tīrṇasaṃsārasāgaraḥ ।। 

prāptānuttamaviśrāntir labdhālabhyapadāspadaḥ ।
anivartipadaṃ prāptaḥ karmaṇām antam āgataḥ ।। 

sarvābhivāñchitārambho na kiñcid api vāñchati ।
sarvānumoditānando na kiñcid anumodate ।। 

na dadāti na cādatte na stauti na ca nindati ।
nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na śocati ।। 

sarvārambhaphalatyāgī sarvopādhivivarjitaḥ ।
sarvāśāsamparityāgī jīvanmukta iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

sarvaiṣaṇāḥ parityajya cetasā bhava maunavān ।
dhārā niravaśeṣeṇa yathā tyaktvā payodharaḥ ।। 

tathā na sukhayaty aṅgasaṃlagnā varavarṇinī ।
yathā sukhayati svāntam induśītā nirāśatā ।। 

na tathendus sukhayati kaṇṭhalagno api rāghava ।
nairāśyaṃ sukhayaty antar yathā sakalaśītalam ।। 

puṣpaghūrṇannavalato na tathā rājate madhuḥ ।
yathodāramatir maunī nairāśyasamamānasaḥ ।। 

na himādrer na muktābhyo na rambhābhyo na candanāt ।
na tac candramasaś śaityaṃ nairāśyād yad avāpyate ।। 

api rājyād api svargād apīndor api mādhavāt ।
api kāntāsamāsaṅgān nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham ।। 

tṛṇavan nopakurvanti yayā tribhuvanaśriyaḥ ।
sā parā nirvṛtis sādho nairāśyād upalabhyate ।। 

āśākarañjaparaśuṃ parāyā nirvṛteḥ padam ।
puṣpagucchaṃ śamataror ālambasva nirāśatām ।। 

goṣpadaṃ pṛthivī merus sthāṇur āśās samudgikāḥ ।
tṛṇaṃ tribhuvanaṃ rāma nairāśyālaṅkṛtākṛteḥ ।। 

dānādānasamāhāravihāravibhavādikāḥ ।
kriyā jagati hasyante nirāśaiḥ puruṣottamaiḥ ।। 

padaṃ yasya na badhnāti kadācit kalanā hṛdi ।
tṛṇīkṛtatribhuvanaḥ kenāsāv upamīyate ।। 

idam evāstv idaṃ māstu mameti hṛdi rañjanā ।
na yasyāsti tam ātmeśaṃ tolayanti kathaṃ janāḥ ।। 

sarvasaṅkaṭaparyantam asaṅkaṭamalaṃ sukham ।
saubhāgyaṃ paramaṃ buddher nairāśyam avalambyatām ।। 

na śāsteha tvam āśānāṃ viddhi mithyābhramaṃ jagat ।
vahadrathasthadikcakranemyāvartavad utthitam ।। 

kiṃ muhyasi mahābāho mūrkhavat paṇḍito api san ।
mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so aham ity udbhrāntena cetasā ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nānāteha na vidyate ।
ekarūpaṃ jagaj jñātvā dhīrai rāma na khidyate ।। 

yathābhūtapadārthaughadarśanād eva rāghava ।
paramāśvāsanaṃ buddher nairāśyam adhigamyate ।। 

bhāvābhāvavisaṃvādamuktam ādyantayos sthitam ।
yad rūpaṃ tat samālambya padārthānāṃ sthitiṃ kuru ।। 

nairāśyadhīramanaso māyeyam atimohinī ।
palāyya yāti saṃsārī mṛgī kesariṇo yathā ।। 

kāntām uddāmamadanāṃ lolāṃ vanalatām api ।
jarjaropalapālīṃ ca samaṃ paśyati dhīradhīḥ ।। 

bhogā nānandayanty antaḥ khedayanti na cāpadaḥ ।
dṛśyaśriyo haranty aṅga na jñam adrim ivānilāḥ ।। 

raktabālāṅganasyāpi jñasyodāradhiyo muneḥ ।
kaṇaśaḥ khaṇḍatāṃ yānti manasi smarasāyakāḥ ।। 

rāgadveṣais svarūpajño nāvaśaḥ parikṛṣyate ।
sparśa evāsya naitābhyāṃ kim utākramaṇaṃ bhavet ।। 

samadṛṣṭalatālolavanitādriśilādiṣu ।
ramate naiṣa bhogeṣu pāntho marumahīṣv iva ।। 

ayatnopanataṃ sarvaṃ līlayā muktamānasaḥ ।
bhuṅkte bhogabharaṃ prājñas tv ālokam iva locanam ।। 

kākatālīyavat prāptā bhogālī lalanādikā ।
sevitāpy aṅga dhīrasya na duḥkhāya na tuṣṭaye ।। 

samyagdṛṣṭapadārthaṃ jñaṃ sukhaduḥkhagatī manāk ।
dve vīcyāv iva śailendraṃ kṣobhaṃ netuṃ na śaknutaḥ ।। 

helayālokayan bhogān mṛdur dānto gatajvaraḥ ।
svam eva padam ālambya sarvabhūtāntarasthitam ।। 

jñas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ vyagrayāpi samanvitaḥ ।
jaganti janayann eva brahmevātmaparāyaṇaḥ ।। 

āpatatsu yathākāmaṃ yathākālaṃ yathākramam ।
sukhaduḥkheṣu na kṣobham eti bhūbhṛd ṛtuṣv iva ।। 

majjato api bahujñasya rāma karmendriyakramaiḥ ।
asaktamanaso nityaṃ na kiñcid api majjati ।। 

kalaṅky antaḥkalaṅkena procyate hema nānyathā ।
bhāvāsaktyā samāsakta ukto jantur hi nānyathā ।। 

śarīrāt praviviktaṃ svaṃ paśyataḥ pravivekinaḥ ।
vikartitāṅgakasyāpi na kiñcit pravikartitam ।। 

sakṛtprabhātaṃ vimalaṃ yaj jñātaṃ jñātam eva tat ।
na hi bandhuḥ parijñātaḥ punar ajñātatāṃ vrajet ।। 

sarpabhrāntau nivṛttāyāṃ na rajjvāṃ sarpabhāvanā ।
punar eti yathā prāvṛṇnadī giritaṭacyutā ।। 

na hema tāpaśuddhāṅgaṃ svābhāsam alam āgatam ।
kardame magnam api sat samādatte malaṃ punaḥ ।। 

kṣīṇe svahṛdayagranthau na bandho asti punar guṇaiḥ ।
yatnenāpi punar baddhaṃ kena vṛnte cyutaṃ phalam ।। 

ayaśchedavicārābhyām abhitaḥ khaṇḍaśo gatam ।
pāṣāṇaṃ ca manaś caiva sandhātuṃ kasya śaktatā ।। 

vijñātāyām avidyāyāṃ kaḥ punaḥ parimajjati ।
parijñāya śvapākānāṃ yātrāṃ kaḥ prekṣate dvijaḥ ।। 

sudhāmbhasi yathā kṣīradhīr vicārān nivartate ।
saṃsāravāsanā tadvad dhīvicārān nivartate ।। 

madhvambuśaṅkayā tāvad viṣavāri prapīyate ।
yāvat tan na parijñātaṃ parijñātaṃ vihīyate ।। 

rūpalāvaṇyayuktāpi citrakānteva kāminī ।
dravyamātrasamārambhāt tattvavidbhir vilokyate ।। 

yathā maṣīkusumbhādi striyāś citre tathaiva hi ।
jīvantyā api keśoṣṭhaṃ kas tāṃ prati kila grahaḥ ।। 

anubhūto guḍas svādur api dāhavikartanaiḥ ।
na śakyate anyathā kartuṃ tattvālokas tathātmanaḥ ।। 

paravyasaninī nārī vyagrāpi gṛhakarmaṇi ।
tad evāsvādayaty antar navasaṅgarasāyanam ।। 

evaṃ tattve pare śuddhe dhīro viśrāntim āgataḥ ।
na śakyate cālayituṃ devair api sahāsuraiḥ ।। 

paravyasaninī nārī kena bhartrā balīyasā ।
vismāritā svasaṅkalpakāntasaṅgamahotsavam ।। 

jagat samarasānantacidālokāvalambanam ।
kena vismāryate buddhis tattvajñasya mahātmanaḥ ।। 

samagrasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ vyavahāram akhaṇḍitam ।
kurvan gurujanāyatto bhartṛśvaśurakheditaḥ ।। 

yathā saṅkalpakāntena bhavaty ānandamantharaḥ ।
vadhūloko vyasanavān duḥkhajālair na khedyate ।। 

tathā vigalitāvidyo vyavahāraparo api san ।
samyagdṛṣṭisamācāro mudam ety antar ātmanā ।। 

chidyate na nikṛttāṅgo galadasrur na roditi ।
dahyate na pradagdho api naṣṭo api na vinaśyati ।। 

vyapagatasukhaduḥkhasannipāto vidhividhureṣv api saṅkaṭeṣv akhinnaḥ ।
nivasatu sadane purottame vā vitatagirau vipine tapovane vā ।। 

nairāśyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

janakas saṃsthito rājye vyavahāraparo api san ।
vigatajvara evāntar anākulamatis sadā ।। 

pitāmaho dilīpas te sarvārambhaparo apy alam ।
vītarāgatayaivāntar bubhuje medinīṃ ciram ।। 

jīvanmuktākṛtir nityam ajo rājyam apālayat ।। 

vicitrabalayuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu bhūriṣu ।
māndhātā suciraṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavān na paraṃ padam ।। 

baḍiḥ pātālapīṭhasthaḥ kurvan svāṃ divasasthitim ।
sadātyāgī sadāsakto jīvanmuktapade sthitaḥ ।। 

namucir dānavādhīśo devadvandvaparas sadā ।
nānācāravihāreṣu kvacin nāntar atapyata ।। 

vāsavājau tanutyāgī vṛtro vitatamānasaḥ ।
antaśśītamanā mānī cakāra surasaṅgaram ।। 

kurvan dānavakāryāṇi pātālatalapālakaḥ ।
anapāyaṃ nirākrośaṃ prahlādo hlādam āgataḥ ।। 

śambaraikaparo apy antaś śambaraikatayoditaḥ ।
saṃsāraśambaraṃ rāma śambaras tyaktavān idam ।। 

asaktabuddhir hariṇā kurvan dānavasaṅgaram ।
parāṃ saṃvidam āsādya musalas tyaktavāṃs tanum ।। 

sarvāmaramukhaṃ vahniḥ kriyājālaparo apy ati ।
yajñalakṣmīṃ ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mukta eveha tiṣṭhati ।। 

pīyamānas surais sarvais somas samarasāśayaḥ ।
kvacid eti na saṃsaṅgam ākrānto apy ambaraṃ yathā ।। 

bṛhaspatir devagurur dārārthaṃ candrayodhy api ।
ācaran divi citrehāmukta eva vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

śukro ambarataloddyotī labdhasarvārthapālakaḥ ।
nirvikāramatiḥ kālaṃ nayaty asuradaiśikaḥ ।। 

jagadbhūtagaṇāṅgāni ciraṃ sañcārayann api ।
sarvadā sarvasañcārī mukta eva samīraṇaḥ ।। 

lokājavañjavībhāve prodvegārho apy akhinnadhīḥ ।
brahmā samamanā rāma kṣapayaty āyur āyatam ।। 

jarāmaraṇayuddhādidvandvapañjaralīlayā ।
caratīha ciraṃ kālaṃ mukto api bhagavān hariḥ ।। 

muktenāpi trinetreṇa saundaryatarumañjarī ।
dehārdhe dhāryate gaurī kāmukeneva kāmukī ।। 

muktayāpi gale baddho gauryā gauras trilocanaḥ ।
suśuddha iva muktānāṃ gaṇaś śaśikalāmalaḥ ।। 

guho gahanadhīr vīras tārakādiraṇakramam ।
mukto api kṛtavān sarvajñānaratnaikasāgaraḥ ।। 

bhṛṅgīśo raktamāṃsaṃ svaṃ svamātre pravitīrṇavān ।
muktayaiva dhiyā rāma dhīrayā dhyānadhautayā ।। 

munir muktasvabhāvo api jagajjaṅgalakhaṇḍakam ।
nārado vijahāremaṃ līlayā kāryaśīlayā ।। 

jīvanmuktamanā mānī viśvāmitras svayaṃ prabhuḥ ।
vedoktāṃ makhanirmāṇakriyāṃ samadhitiṣṭhati ।। 

dhārayaty avaniṃ śeṣaḥ karoty arko dināvalīm ।
yamo yamatvaṃ kurute jīvanmuktatayaiva hi ।। 

anye apy asmiṃs tribhuvane yakṣāmaranarāsurāḥ ।
śataśo muktatāṃ yātās santas tiṣṭhanti saṃsṛtau ।। 

saṃsthitā vyavahāreṣu vividhācāradhāriṣu ।
antarāśītalāḥ kecit kecin mūḍhāś śilāsamāḥ ।। 

paramaṃ bodham āsādya kecit kānanam āgatāḥ ।
yathā bhṛgubharadvājaviśvāmitrasahādayaḥ ।। 

kecit rājyeṣu tiṣṭhanti cchattracāmaramālitāḥ ।
yathā janakaśaryātimāndhātṛmagadhādayaḥ ।। 

kecid vyomani tiṣṭhanti dhiṣṇyacakrāntarasthitāḥ ।
yathā bṛhaspatyuśanaścandrasūryamunīśvarāḥ ।। 

kecit surapadaṃ yātā vimānāvalim āsthitāḥ ।
yathāgnivāyuvaruṇayamatumburunāradāḥ ।। 

kecit pātālakuhare jīvanmuktā vyavasthitāḥ ।
yathā baḍisuhotrāndhaprahlādahlādapūrvakāḥ ।। 

tiryagyoniṣv api sadā vartante kṛtabuddhayaḥ ।
devayoniṣv api prājña vartante mūrkhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra sarvathā sarvadaiva hi ।
sambhavaty eva sarvātmany ātmanātmasvarūpiṇi ।। 

vidher vicitrā niyatir anantārambhamantharā ।
sanniveśāṃśavaicitryāt sarvaṃ sarvatra dṛśyate ।। 

vidhir daivaṃ vibhur dhātā sarveśaś śiva īśvaraḥ ।
iti nāmabhir ātmāntaḥ pratyakcetana ucyate ।। 

asty avastuni vastv antaḥ kāñcanaṃ sikatāsv iva ।
asti vastuny avastv antar malaṃ hemakaṇeṣv iva ।। 

ayukte yuktatā yuktyā prekṣyamāṇā pradṛśyate ।
pāpasya hi bhayāl loko dharme rāma pravartate ।। 

asatye satyatā sādho śāśvatī parilakṣyate ।
śūnyena dhyānayogena śāśvataṃ padam āpyate ।। 

yan nāsti tad udety āśu deśakālavilāsataḥ ।
śaśakāś śṛṅgavanto hi dṛśyante śambarasthitau ।। 

ye vajrasārās sudṛḍhā dṛśyante te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।
kalpasyānte yathendvarkadharābdhivibudhādrayaḥ ।। 

iti paśyan mahābāho bhāvābhāvabhavakramam ।
harṣāmarṣaviṣādehās santyajya samatāṃ vraja ।। 

asat sad avabhātīha sad asac cāpi dṛśyate ।
āsthānāsthe parityajya tenāśu samatāṃ vraja ।। 

muktau rāghava loke asmin na prāptis sambhavaty alam ।
apravṛttyā vivekasya magnā hi janakoṭayaḥ ।। 

muktau rāghava loke asmin prāptir asti sadaiva hi ।
pravṛttyā hi vivekasya muktāś ca janakoṭayaḥ ।। 

pravivekāvivekābhyāṃ sulabhālabhyatāṃ gatā ।
muktir manaḥkṣayaprāptyā vivekaṃ tena dīpaya ।। 

ātmāvalokane yatnaḥ kartavyo bhūtim icchatā ।
sarvaduḥkhaśiraścheda ātmālokena jāyate ।। 

nīrāgā nirupāsaṅgā jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ ।
sambhavantīha bahavas suhotrajanakā iva ।। 

tasmāt tvam api vai rāma vivekoditadhīradhīḥ ।
jīvanmukto vihara bhos samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ ।। 

dvividhā muktatā loke vidyate dehadhāriṇām ।
sadehaikā videhānyā vibhāgo ayaṃ tayoś śṛṇu ।। 

asaṃsaṅgāt padārthānāṃ manaśśāntir hi muktatā ।
saty asaty api dehe sā sambhavaty anaghākṛte ।। 

snehasaṅkṣayam evāṅga viduḥ kaivalyam uttamāḥ ।
tat sambhavati dehasya bhāve cābhāva eva ca ।। 

yo jīvati gatasnehaṃ sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।
sasnehajīvito baddho mukta eva tṛtīyakaḥ ।। 

yatno yatnena kartavyo mokṣārthaṃ yuktipūrvakam ।
yatnayuktivihīnasya goṣpadaṃ dustaraṃ bhavet ।। 

na tv anadhyavasāyasya duḥkhāya vipulātmane ।
ātmā paravaśaḥ kāryo moham āśritya kevalam ।। 

sumahad dhairyam ālambya manasā vyavasāyinā ।
vicārayātmanātmānam ātmanaś cirasiddhaye ।। 

vitatādhyavasāyasya jagad bhavati goṣpadam ।
vihatādhyavasāyasya goṣpadaṃ vai jagad bhavet ।। 

yad upagatas sugataḥ paraṃ pradhānaṃ yad upagato dhruvatāṃ nṛpaś ca kaścit ।
yad upagatāḥ padam uttamaṃ mahāntaḥ prayatanakarmataror mahāphalaṃ tat ।। 

muktāmuktavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭsaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

brahmaṇas samupāyānti jagantīmāni rāghava ।
sthairyaṃ yānty avivekena śāmyanty aṅga vivekataḥ ।। 

jagajjālajalāvartavṛttayo brahmavāridhau ।
saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante bhāsāṃ ca trasareṇavaḥ ।। 

asamyakprekṣaṇaṃ viddhi kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthitau ।
saṃsāraśāntāv ekāntakāraṇaṃ samyagīkṣaṇam ।। 

ayaṃ hi rāma duṣpāro ghoras saṃsārasāgaraḥ ।
vinā yuktiprayatnābhyām asmān nāma na tīryate ।। 

ayaṃ hi sāgaraḥ pūrṇo mohāmbubharapūritaḥ ।
agādhamaraṇāvartaḥ kallolākulakoṭaraḥ ।। 

prabhramatpuṇyadiṇḍīro jvalannarakavāḍavaḥ ।
tṛṣṇāvilolalaharir manojalamataṅgajaḥ ।। 

ālīnajīvitasarid bhogaratnasamudgakaḥ ।
kruddharogoragākīrṇa indriyagrāhaghargharaḥ ।। 

paśyāsmin prasṛtā rāma vīcayaś cārucañcalāḥ ।
imā mugdhāṅganānāmnyaś śikharākarṣaṇakṣamāḥ ।। 

chadaśrīpadmarāgāḍhyā netranīlotpalākulāḥ ।
dantamuktāphalākīrṇās smitaphenopaśobhitāḥ ।। 

keśendranīlavalayā bhrūvilāsataraṅgitāḥ ।
nitambapulinasphītāḥ kaṇṭhakambuvibhūṣitāḥ ।। 

lalāṭamaṇipaṭṭāḍhyā vilāsagrāhasaṅkulāḥ ।
kaṭākṣalolaśapharā varṇakāñcanavālukāḥ ।। 

evaṃvilolalaharībhīmāt saṃsārasāgarāt ।
uttīryate cen magnena tat paraṃ pauruṣaṃ bhavet ।। 

satyāṃ prajñāmahānāvi viveke sati nāvike ।
saṃsārasāgarād asmād yo na tīrṇo dhig astu tam ।। 

apārāvāram ākramya prameyīkṛtya sarvataḥ ।
saṃsārābdhiṃ gāhate yas sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ ।। 

vicāryāryais sahālokya dhiyā saṃsārasāgaram ।
etasmiṃs tadanu krīḍā śobhate rāma nānyathā ।। 

iha bhavyo bhavān sādho vicāraparayā dhiyā ।
tvayā yūnaiva yenāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ pravicāryate ।। 

bhavān iva vicāryādau saṃsāram atikāntayā ।
matyā yo gāhate loke nehāsau parimajjati ।। 

pūrvaṃ dhiyā vicāryaite bhogā bhogibhayapradāḥ ।
bhoktavyāś caramaṃ rāma garuḍeneva pannagāḥ ।। 

vicārya tattvam ālokya sevyante yā vibhūtayaḥ ।
tā udarkodayā jantoś śeṣā duḥkhāya kevalam ।। 

balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca dṛṣṭatattvasya vardhate ।
savasantasya vṛkṣasya saundaryādyā guṇā iva ।। 

ghanarasāyanapūraṇaśītayā vimalayā samayā satataṃ dhiyā ।
śiśiraraśmir ivātivirājate viditavedyasukhaṃ raghunandana ।। 

saṃsārasāgarayos sāmyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptasaptatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

samāsena mune bhūyo dṛṣṭatattvacamatkṛtim ।
kathayodāravṛttānte kas te vacasi tṛpyati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jīvanmuktasya bahudhā kathitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ mayā ।
bhūyo api ca mahābāho kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

suṣuptavad idaṃ nityaṃ paśyaty apagataiṣaṇaḥ ।
asadrūpaṃ ivāsaktas sarvatrākhilam ātmavān ।। 

kaivalyam iva samprāptaḥ parisuptamanā iva ।
ghūrṇamāna ivānandī tiṣṭhaty adhigatātmadṛk ।। 

na dattam apy upādatte gṛhītam api pāṇinā ।
antarmukhatayodāttarūpayā samayā dhiyā ।। 

yantraputrakasañcāra itīmaṃ janatākramam ।
antassaṃlīnayā dṛṣṭyā paśyan hasati śāntadhīḥ ।। 

nāpekṣate bhaviṣyac ca vartamāne na tiṣṭhati ।
na saṃsmaraty atītaṃ ca sarvam eva karoti ca ।। 

suptaḥ prabuddho bhavati prabuddho api ca suptavat ।
sarvakarmakaro apy antar na karotīva kiñcana ।। 

antas sarvaparityāgī nityam antar aneṣaṇaḥ ।
kurvann api bahiḥ kāryaṃ sarvam evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

bahiḥ prakṛtasarveho yathāprāptakriyonmukhaḥ ।
svakarmakramasamprāptadvandvakāryānuvṛttimān ।। 

samagrasukhabhogātmā sarvāśāsv iva saṃsthitaḥ ।
karoty akhilakarmāṇi tyaktakartṛtvavibhramaḥ ।। 

udāsīnavad āsīnaḥ prakṛtikramakarmasu ।
nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi na śocati na hṛṣyati ।। 

anubandhaparo jantāv asaṃsaktena cetasā ।
bhakte bhaktasamācāraś śaṭhe śaṭha iva sthitaḥ ।। 

bālo bāleṣu vṛddheṣu vṛddho vīreṣu vīryavān ।
yuvā yauvanavṛtteṣu duḥkhiteṣu tu duḥkhitaḥ ।। 

pravṛttavākpuṇyakatho dainyād apagatāśayaḥ ।
dhīradhīr uditānandaḥ peśalaḥ puṇyakīrtanaḥ ।। 

prājñaḥ prasannamadhuraḥ pūrṇas supratibhodayaḥ ।
nirastakhedadaurgatyas sarvasmin snigdhabāndhavaḥ ।। 

udāracaritākāras samas saukhyamahodadhiḥ ।
susnigdhaś śītalasparśaḥ pūrṇaś candra ivoditaḥ ।। 

na tasya sukṛtenārtho na bhogair na ca karmabhiḥ ।
na duṣkṛtair na bhogānāṃ santyāgena na bandhubhiḥ ।। 

na kāryakaraṇārambhair na niṣkriyatayā tathā ।
na bandhena na mokṣeṇa na pātālena no divā ।। 

yathāvastu yadā dṛṣṭaṃ jagad ekamayātmakam ।
tadā bandhavimokṣārthaṃ na kvacit kṛpaṇaṃ manaḥ ।। 

samyagjñānāgninā yasya dagdhā sandehajālikā ।
niśśaṅkam alam uḍḍīnas tasya cittavihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

yasya bhrāntivinirmuktaṃ manas samarasaṃ sthitam ।
sa nāstam eti nodeti vyomavat sarvavṛttiṣu ।। 

mañjūṣāyāṃ niṣaṇṇasya yathā bālasya ceṣṭate ।
aṅgāvaly anusandhānavarjitā jñasya vai tathā ।। 

ghūrṇan kṣīva ivānandī mandīkṛtapunarbhavaḥ ।
anupādeyabuddhyā tu na smaraty akṛtaṃ kṛtam ।। 

sarvaṃ sarvaprakāreṇa gṛhṇāti ca jahāti ca ।
anupādeyasarvārtho bālavac ca viceṣṭate ।। 

sa tiṣṭhann api kāryeṣu deśakālakriyākramaiḥ ।
na kāryasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ manāg api hi gṛhyate ।। 

bahiḥ prakṛtasarvārtho apy antaḥ punar anīhayā ।
na sattāṃ yojayaty arthe na phalāny anudhāvati ।। 

nopekṣate duḥkhadaśāṃ na sukhāśām apekṣate ।
kāryodaye naiti mudaṃ kāryanāśe na khidyate ।। 

api śītarucāv arke sukṛṣṇe apīndumaṇḍale ।
apy adhaḥ prasaraty agnau vismayo asya na jāyate ।। 

cidātmana imā itthaṃ prasphurantīha śaktayaḥ ।
ity asyāścaryajāleṣu nābhyudeti kutūhalam ।। 

na dayādainyam ādatte na krauryam anudhāvati ।
na lajjām anusandhatte nālajjatvaṃ ca gacchati ।। 

na kadācana dīnātmā noddhatātmā kadācana ।
na pramatto na khinnātmā nodvigno na ca harṣavān ।। 

nāsya cetasi susphāre śaradambaranirmale ।
kopādayaḥ pravartante nabhasīva navāṅkurāḥ ।। 

anāratapatajjātabhūtāyāṃ jagatas sthitau ।
kva kathaṃ kila kāsya syāt sukhitā duḥkhitātha vā ।। 

phenājavañjavībhāve jale bhūtakrame tathā ।
kva kileha kutaḥ ko antaḥ prasaṅgas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

bhāvābhāvair aparyantair ajasraṃ jantusambhavaiḥ ।
na viṣīdanti nodyanti dṛṣṭasṛṣṭikramā narāḥ ।। 

nimeṣaṃ prati yāminyā yathānyās svapnadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
yathotpannavināśinyas tathaitā lokadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

anāratasamutpattāv anāratavināśini ।
kaḥ kramo dagdhasaṃsāre kāruṇyānandayor iha ।। 

śubhābhāvāt sukhābhāve sthitiṃ yāte vilakṣaṇāḥ ।
kīdṛśyaḥ katham āyātāḥ kā vā tā duḥkhasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

sukham ante tadantotthā svabījaṃ vitanoti yā ।
śāntaṃ duḥkhadaśā seyaṃ katham antarite sukhe ।। 

kṣīṇābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ heyopādeyayoḥ kṣaye ।
īpsitānīpsite kva sto galite atha śubhāśubhe ।। 

ramyāramyadṛśor nāśāc chānte bhogābhivāñchane ।
nairāśyasantatiprauḍhe himavad vigalen manaḥ ।। 

ā mūlān manasi kṣīṇe saṅkalpasya kathaiva kā ।
tileṣv evātidagdheṣu tailasya kalanā kutaḥ ।। 

bhāveṣv abhāvaghanabhāvanayā mahātmā nirmuktasaṅkalanam ambaravat sthiteṣu ।
cittaṃ prati svamudito viditaikarūpī jñas tiṣṭhati svapiti jīvati nityatṛptaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathālātaparispandād agnicakraṃ pravartate ।
asad eva sadābhāsaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat ।। 

yathā jalaparispandād vyatirikta ivāmbhasaḥ ।
dṛśyate vartulāvartaś cittaspandāt tathā jagat ।। 

yathā vyomnīkṣitaspandāt piñchamauktikamaṇḍalam ।
dṛśyate sad ivāsatyaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat ।। 

rāmaḥ

yena praspandate cittaṃ yena na spandate atha vā ।
tad brahman brūhi me yena cikitsyeta tad eva hi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā śauklyahime rāma tilatailalavau yathā ।
yathā kusumasaugandhye tathauṣṇyadahanau yathā ।। 

raghunandana saṃśliṣṭau cittaspandau tathaiva hi ।
abhinnau kevalaṃ mithyā bhedaḥ kalpita etayoḥ ।। 

cittacittaparispandapakṣayor ekasaṅkṣaye ।
svayaṃ guṇaguṇisthityā naśyato dvau na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

dvau kramau cittanāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava ।
yogas tadvṛttirodho hi jñānaṃ samyagavekṣaṇam ।। 

rāmaḥ

kayā kīdṛkṣayā vṛttyā prāṇāpānanibaddhayā ।
yoganāmnyā manaś śāntim ety anantasukhapradām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dehe asmin dehanāḍīṣu vātas sphurati yo abhitaḥ ।
skhadāsv iva bhuvo vāri sa prāṇa iti kīrtitaḥ ।। 

tasya spandavaśād antaḥ kriyāvaicitryam īyuṣaḥ ।
apānādīni nāmāni kalpitāni kṛtātmabhiḥ ।। 

āmodasya yathā puṣpaṃ śauklyasya tuhinaṃ yathā ।
tathaiṣa ratha ādhāraś cittasyābhinnatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

antaḥprāṇaparispandāt saṅkalpakalanonmukhī ।
saṃvit sañjāyate yaiṣā tac cittaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

prāṇaspandaṃ vidus spandaṃ tatspandād eva saṃvidaḥ ।
cakrāvartavidhāyinyo jalaspandād ivormayaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ prāṇaparispandam āhur āgamabhūṣaṇāḥ ।
tasmin saṃrodhite nūnam upaśāntaṃ bhaven manaḥ ।। 

manasspandopaśāntyāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ pravilīyate ।
sūryālokaparispandaśāntau vyavahṛtir yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

aniśaṃ caratāṃ dehagehe gahanagāminām ।
prāṇādīnāṃ parispando vāyūnāṃ rodhyate katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śāstrasajjanasamparkād vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ ।
anāsthāyāṃ kṛtāsthāyāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।। 

yathābhivāñchitadhyānāc ciram ekatayoditāt ।
etattattvaghanābhyāsāt prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

pūrakādinijāyāmadṛḍhābhyāsād akhedajāt ।
ekāntadhyānasaṃyogāt prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

oṅkāroccāraṇaprāntaśabdatattvānudhāvanāt ।
suṣupte saṃvido jāte prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

recake nūnam abhyaste prāṇe sphāraṃ kham āgate ।
na spṛśaty aṅgarandhrāṇi prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

kumbhake pūrvavat kālam anantaṃ paritiṣṭhati ।
abhyāsāt stambhite prāṇe prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

tālumūlagatāṃ yatnāj jihvayākramya ghaṇṭikām ।
ūrdhvarandhragate prāṇe prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

samastakalanonmukte nakiñcinnāmni sūkṣmakhe ।
dhyānāt saṃvidi līnāyāṃ prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

dvādaśāṅgulaparyante nāsāgre vimalāmbare ।
samyag dṛśoḥ praśāmyantyoḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

abhyāsād ūrdhvarandhreṇa tālūrdhvadvādaśāntage ।
prāṇe galitasaṃvittau prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

bhrūmadhye tārakālokaśāntāv astam upāgate ।
cetane ketane buddheḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

ciraṃ kālaṃ hṛdekāntavyomasaṃvedanān muneḥ ।
avāsanamanodhyānāt prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahmañ jagati bhūtānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tat kim ucyate ।
idaṃ sarvaṃ mahādarśe yasmiṃs tat pratibimbati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sādho jagati bhūtānāṃ dvividhaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthitam ।
upādeyaṃ ca heyaṃ ca vibhāgo ayaṃ tayoś śṛṇu ।। 

iyattayā paricchinne dehe yad vakṣaso antare ।
heyaṃ tad dhṛdayaṃ viddhi tanāv ekataṭe sthitam ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ tu hṛdayam upādeyaṃ nṛṇāṃ smṛtam ।
tad antare ca bāhye ca na ca bāhye na cāntare ।। 

tat tatpradhānaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatredaṃ samavasthitam ।
tad ādarśaḥ padārthānāṃ tat kośas sarvasampadām ।। 

sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ saṃvid dhṛdayam ucyate ।
na dehāvayavaikāṃśo jaḍo jīrṇopalopamaḥ ।। 

tasmāt saṃvinmaye śuddhe hṛdaye atra vivāsanam ।
balān niyojite citte prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

ebhiḥ kramair athānyaiś ca nānāsaṅkalpakalpitaiḥ ।
nānādaiśikavaktrasthaiḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

abhyāsena nirābādham etās tā yogayuktayaḥ ।
upāyatām upāyānti bhavyasya bhavabhedane ।। 

abhyāsād dṛḍhatāṃ yātād vairāgyaparilāñchitāt ।
yathāvāsanam āyāmaḥ prāṇānāṃ saphalas smṛtaḥ ।। 

bhrūnāsātālusaṃsthāsu dvādaśāṅgulakoṭiṣu ।
abhyāsāc chāmyati prāṇo dūre girinadī yathā ।। 

bhūyo bhūyaś cirābhyāsāj jihvāprāntena tāluni ।
ghaṇṭikā spṛśyate prāṇā yenordhvena vahanty alam ।। 

vikalpabahulās tv ete svabhyāsena samādhayaḥ ।
paramopaśamāyāśu samprayānty avikalpatām ।। 

ātmārāmo vītaśoko bhavaty antassukhaḥ pumān ।
abhyāsād eva nānyasmāt tasmād abhyāsavān bhava ।। 

abhyāsena parispande prāṇānāṃ kṣayam āgate ।
manaḥ praśamam āyāti nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate ।। 

vāsanāvalitaṃ janma mokṣo nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ ।
prāṇaś ca rāma gṛhṇāti yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

prāṇaspando manorūpaṃ tasmāt saṃsṛtisambhramaḥ ।
tasminn eva śamaṃ yāte kṣīyate saṃsṛtijvaraḥ ।। 

vikalpasaṅkṣayāj jantoḥ padaṃ tad avaśiṣyate ।
yato vāco nivartante samastakalanānvitāḥ ।। 

yatra sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat ।
yatra nedaṃ yato nedaṃ yan nedaṃ nedṛśaṃ ca yat ।। 

vināśitvād vikalpitvād guṇitvān nirguṇātmanaḥ ।
yasya no sadṛśo dṛśye dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid eva hi ।। 

svādanī sarvaśālīnāṃ dīpikā sarvatejasām ।
kalanā sarvakāmānāṃ yataś ciccandrikoditā ।। 

yatsaṅkalpataror bahvyas saṃsāraphalapaṅktayaḥ ।
anārataṃ bahurasā jāyante ca patanti ca ।। 

tat padaṃ sarvasīmāntam avalambya mahāmatiḥ ।
yas sthitas sthiradhīs tajjñas sa jīvanmukta ucyate ।। 

vigatasarvasamīhitakautukas samupaśāntahitāhitakalpanaḥ ।
sakalasaṃvyavahārasamāśayo bhavati muktamanāḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktajātibandhavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonāśītitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yogayuktyāsya cittasya śama evaṃ nirūpitaḥ ।
samyagjñānam idānīṃ me kathayānugrahāt prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anādyantāvabhāsātmā paramātmeha vidyate ।
ity ekaniścayas sphāras samyagjñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

imā ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśataśaktayaḥ ।
ātmaiva nānyad astīti niścayas samyagīkṣaṇam ।। 

asamyagvedanāj janma mokṣas samyagavekṣaṇāt ।
asamyagvīkṣaṇād rajjus sarpo no samyagīkṣaṇāt ।। 

saṅkalpāṃśavinirmuktā saṃvit saṃvedyavarjitā ।
saṃvid ādyābhir ākhyābhir muktāstīha hi netarat ।। 

sā śuddharūpā vijñātā paramātmeti kathyate ।
buddhā tv aśuddharūpāntar avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ ।। 

saṃvittir eva saṃvedyaṃ nānayor dvitvakalpanā ।
cinoty ātmānam ātmaiva rāmaivaṃ nānyad asti hi ।। 

yathābhūtārthadarśitvam etāvadbhuvanatraye ।
yad ātmaiva jagat sarvam iti niścitya pūrṇatā ।। 

sarvam ātmaiva kiṃniṣṭhau bhāvābhāvau kva vāsthitau ।
kva bandhamokṣakalane kim anyad rāma śocyate ।। 

na cittam anyan no cetyaṃ brahmaivedaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
sarvaṃ ekaṃ paraṃ vyoma kva mokṣaḥ kasya baddhatā ।। 

brahmedaṃ bṛṃhitākāraṃ bṛhad bṛṃhad avasthitam ।
dūram astamitadvitvaṃ bhavātmaiva tvam ātmanā ।। 

samyagālokite rūpe kāṣṭhapāṣāṇavāsasām ।
manāg api na bhedo asti kvāpi saṅkalpanonmukhaḥ ।। 

ādāv ante ca saṃśāntaṃ svarūpam avināśi yat ।
vastūnām ātmanaś caiva tanmayo bhava rāghava ।। 

dvaitādvaitasamudbhūtair jarāmaraṇavibhramaiḥ ।
sphuraty ātmabhir ātmaiva citrair ambv iva vīcibhiḥ ।। 

śuddham ātmānam ālambya nityam antassthayā dhiyā ।
yas sthitas taṃ ka ātmeśaṃ bhogo vañcayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

kṛtasphāravicārasya mano bhogādayo arayaḥ ।
manāg api na bhindanti śailaṃ mandānilā iva ।। 

avicāriṇam ajñānaṃ mūḍham āśāparāyaṇam ।
nigirantīha duḥkhāni bakā matsyam ivājalam ।। 

jagad ātmaiva sakalam avidyā nāsti kutracit ।
iti dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya samyagrūpāṃ sthiro bhava ।। 

nānātvam asti kalanāsu na vastuto antar nānāvidhāsu sarasīṣu jalād ivānyat ।
ity ekaniścayamayaḥ puruṣo vimukta ity ucyate samavalokitasamyagarthaḥ ।। 

samyagjñānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idam antaḥ kalayato bhogān prati vivekinaḥ ।
purassthitān api sadā spṛhaivāṅga na jāyate ।। 

cakṣur ālokanāyaiva jīvas tu sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।
bhārāyaiva balīvardo bhoktā dravyasya nāyakaḥ ।। 

nayane rūpanirmagne kṣobhaḥ ka iva dehinaḥ ।
gardabhe palvalonmagne kaiva senāpateḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

rūpakardamam etan mānaya nāsvādayādhama ।
naśyaty etan nimeṣeṇa bhavantam api hiṃsati ।। 

yenaiva sakhyaṃ kriyate ya evābhyanugamyate ।
tadīyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kṣipraṃ prājñaś śūro api badhyate ।। 

utpannadhvaṃsi sampātamātrahṛdyam asanmayam ।
rūpam āśraya mā netra vināśāyāvināśine ।। 

sākṣivat tvaṃ sthitaṃ netra rūpaṃ ātmani tiṣṭhati ।
ālokaḥ kālavaśatas tvam ekaḥ kiṃ pratapyase ।। 

salilaspandavad dṛṣṭiḥ piñchikevāmbarotthitā ।
svajātibandhāt sphurati tava citta kim āgatam ।। 

svalpāmbhasīva śaphare citte sphuraṇadharmiṇi ।
svayaṃ sphuraty ahaṅkāra tvam ayaṃ protthitaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

ālokarūpayor nityaṃ jaḍayos sphurator mithaḥ ।
ādhārādheyayoś citta vyartham ākulatā tava ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārāḥ parasparam asaṅginaḥ ।
saṃsaktā iva lakṣyante vadanādarśabimbavat ।। 

ajñānajantunā hy ete śliṣṭā jātā nirantarāḥ ।
ajñāne jñānagalite pṛthak tiṣṭhanty asanmayāḥ ।। 

manaḥkalanayā hy ete susambaddhāḥ parasparam ।
rūpālokamanaskārā dārūṇi jatunā yathā ।। 

svamanomanane tantau mano'bhyāsena yatnataḥ ।
vicārāc chedam āyāte chinnaivājñānabhāvanā ।। 

ajñānasaṅkṣayāt kṣīṇe manasy ete punar mithaḥ ।
rūpālokamanaskārās saṅghaṭante na kecana ।। 

sarveṣāṃ cittam evāntar indriyāṇāṃ prabodhakam ।
tad eva tasmād ucchedyaṃ piśāca iva mandirāt ।। 

citta valgasi mithyaiva dṛṣṭo anto bhavato mayā ।
ādyanteṣu sutucchas tvaṃ vartamāne api na hy asi ।। 

mudhā pañcabhir ākāraiḥ kim antaḥ parivalgasi ।
yas tvāṃ tv ām iti jānāti tasyaitat parivalgyate ।। 

tvadvalganaṃ me kumano na manāg api tuṣṭaye ।
māyānaraspanda iva vyarthaṃ vṛttiṣu dahyase ।। 

tiṣṭha vā gaccha vā citta nāsi me śaṭha jīvasi ।
prakṛtyāsi mṛtaṃ nityaṃ vicārāt sumṛtaṃ sthitam ।। 

nistattvaṃ tvaṃ jaḍaṃ bhrātaś śaṭha nityamṛtākṛte ।
mūḍha eva tvayājñena vañcyate na vicāravān ।। 

vayam ājñātavantas tvāṃ maurkhyeṇānusṛtaṃ bhavet ।
mṛtam asmākam adyāsi dīpānāṃ timiraṃ yathā ।। 

śaṭhena bhavatā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama ।
uparuddham abhūt pūrvaṃ sādhusaṃsargavarjitam ।। 

jaḍe pretasamākāre gate tvayi manaśśaṭhe ।
sarvasajjanasaṃsevyaṃ idaṃ dehagṛhaṃ sthitam ।। 

pūrvam evāsi nāsy eva sampraty api jaḍaṃ śaṭham ।
na bhaviṣyasi cedānīṃ kiṃ vetāla na lajjase ।। 

saha tṛṣṇāpiśācībhis saha kopādiguhyakaiḥ ।
nirgaccha cittavetāla śarīrasadanān mama ।। 

diṣṭyā vivekamantreṇa nirgato dehamandirāt ।
pramattacittavetālaḥ kuvṛkaḥ kandarād iva ।। 

aho nu citraṃ sumahaj jaḍena kṣaṇabhaṅginā ।
manaśśaṭhena sarvo ayaṃ nīto vivaśatāṃ janaḥ ।। 

kas te parākramaḥ kiṃ te balaṃ kas te samāśrayaḥ ।
yadi valgasi mām eva janatāṃ bādhase tathā ।। 

śaṭhātmaivāsi na mayā dīnacittaka māryase ।
mṛtam ity avabuddhaṃ tvam adya kevalam ajña he ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ tvāṃ jñātvā jīvadāsthitam ।
kliṣṭaḥ prabhūtabhaṅgāsu ciraṃ saṃsṛtirātriṣu ।। 

cittaṃ mṛtaṃ hi nāstīha tv ity adyāvagataṃ mayā ।
tena tvadāśāṃ santyajya tiṣṭhāmy ātmani kevalaḥ ।। 

diṣṭyā cittaṃ mṛtam iti jñātam adya mayā svayam ।
na śaṭhena samaṃ nītaṃ samagraṃ jīvitaṃ nijam ।। 

utsārya dehasadanān manaśśaṭham ahaṃ kṣaṇāt ।
ayaṃ svasthas sthito asmy antarvetālaparivarjitaḥ ।। 

cittavetālalabdhena ciraṃ kālaṃ mayoddhatāḥ ।
kṛtā vikārā vividhās svayaṃ kṛtvā hasāmi yān ।। 

cirān nipatito diṣṭyā vicārāsivarāṅkitaḥ ।
hṛdgehāc cittavetālas tālottālasamunnatiḥ ।। 

praśāntacittavetāle pavitrāṃ padavīṃ gate ।
diṣṭyā śarīranagare sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ ।। 

mṛtaṃ mano mṛtāś cintā mṛto ahaṅkārarākṣasaḥ ।
vicāramantreṇa samas svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ ।। 

kiṃ mano me mamāśāḥ kāḥ ko me ahaṅkārako bhavet ।
diṣṭyā vyarthaṃ kalatraṃ me naṣṭam etad aśeṣataḥ ।। 

ekasmai kṛtakṛtyāya nityāya vimalātmane ।
nirvikalpacidākhyāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

na mamāśā na karmāṇi na saṃsāro na kartṛtā ।
na bhoktṛtā na deho me mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

nāham ātmā na cākāśo na caivāyam ahaṃ svayam ।
mama nāsti vyavacchedo mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

nīrūpāya nirākhyāya prakāśāyāmalātmane ।
svayam ātmaikasaṃsthāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

nirvikārāya nityāya niraṃśāya nirātmane ।
sarvasmai sarvakāryāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

samāṃ sarvagatāṃ sūkṣmāṃ jagadekaprakāśinīm ।
sattām upāgato asmy antar mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

sādridyūrvīnadīśāṅgaṃ nāham evāham eva vā ।
jagat sarvapadārthāḍhyaṃ mahyam eva namo namaḥ ।। 

vyapagatamananaṃ śamābhirāmaṃ prakaṭitaviśvam aviśvam apy anantam ।
svayam ajam ajaraṃ guṇād atītaṃ vapur aham acyutam aiśvaraṃ namāmi ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ekāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ vicārya buddhyāntaḥ punar itthaṃ vicāryate ।
tattvavidbhir mahābāho jñeya ātmā mahātmabhiḥ ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti satyaṃ cittena mārjitam ।
utthitaṃ syāt kutaś cittam aho citram avastu yat ।। 

avidyātvād acittvāc ca samāyātvāt sadaiva hi ।
mṛtaṃ nāsty eva vā cittaṃ bhramād anyat khapuṣpavat ।। 

siddhas sthāṇuparispando naugatasya yathā śiśoḥ ।
abuddhasya na buddhasya tathā cittam asanmayam ।। 

maurkhyamohabhrame śānte cittaṃ nopalabhāmahe ।
cakrārohabhramasyānte parvataspandanaṃ yathā ।। 

evaṃ hi cittaṃ nāsty eva brahmaivāsti tatātmakam ।
padārthabhāvanāś citrās tenāsatyā mayojjhitāḥ ।। 

jāto asmi śāntasandehas sthito asmi vigatajvaraḥ ।
yathā tiṣṭhāmi tiṣṭhāmi tathaiva vigataiṣaṇam ।। 

cittābhāve parikṣīṇā balāt tṛṣṇādayo guṇāḥ ।
ālokoparame citrā varṇākhyā iva saṃvidaḥ ।। 

mṛtaṃ cittaṃ gatās tṛṣṇāḥ prakṣīṇaṃ mohapañjaram ।
nirahaṅkāratā jātā jagaty asmi prabuddhavān ।। 

ekam eva jagac chāntaṃ nānātvaṃ na sad ity api ।
kim anyad vimṛśāmy antaḥ kathayaivālam etayā ।। 

nirābhāsam anādyantaṃ padaṃ pāvanam āgataḥ ।
somyas sarvagatas sūkṣmas sthita ātmāsmi śāśvataḥ ।। 

yad asti yac ca nāstīha cittādy ātmādy avastu vā ।
tat khād acchataraṃ śāntam anantāgrāhyam ātatam ।। 

cittaṃ bhavatu vā māntar niyatāṃ smṛtim etu vā ।
ko vicāraṇayārtho me niraṃśasyoditātmanaḥ ।। 

vicārakārako maurkhyād aham āsam iti sthitiḥ ।
vicāreṇāmitākāraḥ kvādhunāhaṃ vicārakaḥ ।। 

mṛte api manasīyaṃ me vikalpaśrīr nirarthakā ।
manovetālavṛttyarthaṃ kimartham upajāyate ।। 

tad imāṃ prajahāmy antar vikalpakalanām alam ।
nirṇīyom iti śāntātmā tiṣṭhāmy ātmani maunavān ।। 

aśnan gacchan svapaṃs tiṣṭhann iti rāghava cetasā ।
sarvatra prajñayā tajjñaḥ pratyahaṃ pravicārayet ।। 

pravicārya svasaṃsthena svasthena svena cetasā ।
tiṣṭhanti vigatodvegaṃ santaḥ prakṛtakarmasu ।। 

vigatamānamadā muditāśayāś śaradupoḍhaśaśāṅkasamatviṣaḥ ।
prakṛtasaṃvyavahāravihāriṇas tv iha sukhaṃ viharanti mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

cittāsattāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvyaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vicāra evaṃ viduṣā saṃvartena kṛtaḥ purā ।
kathito mama vindhyādrau tenaiva viditātmanā ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya vicāraparayā dhiyā ।
saṃsārasāgarād asmāt tāratamyena santara ।। 

athemām aparāṃ rāma śṛṇu dṛṣṭiṃ padapradām ।
muninā vītahavyena yathā sthitam aśaṅkitam ।। 

vītahavyo mahātejā babhrāmābhrāmbaraḥ purā ।
vindhyaśailadarīr dīrghā ravir merudarīr iva ।। 

asmāt kriyākramād ghorāt saṃsārabhramadāyinaḥ ।
ādhivyādhimayākārāt kālenodvegam āyayau ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhyaṃśalabhyodārapadecchayā ।
sañjahāra jarājīrṇas svāṃ vyāpāraparamparām ।। 

viveśa rambhāracitaṃ nijaṃ parṇoṭajāntaram ।
cūtagauraṃ sasaugandhyam alir nīlam ivotpalam ।। 

tatrāsane same śuddhe svāstīrṇahariṇājine ।
viśaśrāmācale śānte vāntavarṣa ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

baddhapadmāsanaḥ kṛtvā pārṣṇyor adhi karāñjalim ।
śṛṅgivac chāntacalanam atiṣṭhad dṛḍhakandharam ।। 

sañjahārālam ālokaṃ digvikīrṇaṃ śanaiś śanaiḥ ।
viśan merudarīṃ sāyaṃ bhānur bhāsām ivotkaram ।। 

bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caiva sparśān pariharan kramāt ।
idam ākalayām āsa manasā vigatainasā ।। 

aho nu cañcalam idaṃ pratyāhṛtam api kṣaṇāt ।
na manas sthairyam āyāti taraṅgaprauḍhaparṇavat ।। 

cakṣurādibhir uddāmai rūpair āhitasambhramaiḥ ।
ajasram utphalaty eva vīṭeva talatāḍitā ।। 

tyajad evāśu gṛhṇāti vṛttīr indriyavardhitāḥ ।
yasmān nivāryate tasmin pronmatta iva dhāvati ।। 

ghaṭāt paṭam upāyāti paṭāc chakaṭam utkaṭam ।
cittam artheṣu carati pādapeṣv iva markataḥ ।। 

pañcadvārāṇi manasaś cakṣurādīny amūny alam ।
dagdhendriyābhidhānāni tāvad ālokayāmy aham ।। 

haṃho hatendriyagaṇāḥ kim eṣoddāmateha vaḥ ।
velā vilulitāmbūnām abdhīnām iva cañcalā ।। 

mā kurudhvam anarthāya cāpalaṃ cañcalāśayāḥ ।
smaratātītavṛttīni duḥkhajālāni bhūriśaḥ ।। 

rūpāṇi manaso yūyaṃ jaḍā eva kilādhamāḥ ।
jaḍimnotsukatātyarthaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇeva valgati ।। 

asārātmasvarūpāṇām anālokavatāṃ sadā ।
andhānām uddhatir yeyaṃ sā hāsāyaiva jāyate ।। 

cidātmā bhagavān sarvaṃ sākṣitvena karoty ajaḥ ।
hatendriyagaṇā yūyaṃ kiṃ nirarthakam āgatāḥ ।। 

mithyaivaite vivalganti nīrūpā nayanādayaḥ ।
alātacakrapratimās sarparajjubhramopamāḥ ।। 

tenātmanā bahujñena nirjñānāś cakṣurādayaḥ ।
manāg api na sambaddhā dyupātālatalādrivat ।। 

bhītaḥ pāntha ivāhibhyaḥ pukkasebhya iva dvijaḥ ।
dūre tiṣṭhati cinmātram indriyebhyas tv anāmayam ।। 

citsattāmātrakeṇāyaṃ saṅkṣobho bhavatāṃ mithaḥ ।
tiṣṭhati svairam āditye dinakāryavatām iva ।। 

citta cāraṇacārvāka caturdikkukṣibhikṣuka ।
śveva vyartham anarthāya medaṃ vihara he jagat ।। 

ahaṃ cidvad iti vyartham asatyā tava vāsanā ।
atyantabhinnayor aikyaṃ nāsti cinmanasoś śaṭha ।। 

jīvāmy evāham ity eṣā tavāhaṅkāradundubhiḥ ।
mithyaiva jātā duḥkhāya na satyā satyavarjitā ।। 

ahaṅkārād ahaṃ so asmīty etāṃ saṃrabdhatāṃ tyaja ।
na kiñcid api mūrkha tvaṃ kiṃ vyarthaṃ taralāyase ।। 

saṃvic cittam anādyantaṃ saṃvido anyan na vidyate ।
dehe asmiṃs tan mahāmūrkha kiṃ tat syāc cittanāmakam ।। 

viṣaparyavasāneyaṃ rasāyanavad utthitā ।
bhoktṛtākartṛtāśaṅkā tava citta mudhaiva hi ।। 

mopahāsapadaṃ gaccha mūrkhendriyagaṇa svayam ।
na kartā tvaṃ na bhoktā tvaṃ jaḍo asy anyena bodhyase ।। 

kas tvaṃ bhavasi bhogānāṃ ke vā bhogā bhavanti te ।
jaḍasyātmaiva te nāsti bandhumitrādi tat kutaḥ ।। 

yaj jaḍaṃ tad dhi nāsty eva sad evāsattayānvitam ।
jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvamantṛtvānām asambhavāt ।। 

pratyakcetanarūpaṃ cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva te vapuḥ ।
bhāvābhāvamayī citta sattā te keva duḥkhadā ।। 

ye vā kartṛtvabhoktṛtve mithyaivādhigate tvayā ।
mayā te hi pramārjyete śṛṇu yuktyā kathaṃ śaṭha ।। 

svayaṃ tāvad bhavān eṣa jaḍo nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।
jaḍasya kīdṛk kartṛtvaṃ nṛtyanti hi kathaṃ śilāḥ ।। 

upajīvya ciraṃ tasmāc chuddhaṃ tadbhāgam aiśvaram ।
jīvasīcchasi haṃsi tvaṃ plavase yāsi valgasi ।। 

kriyate yat tu yacchaktyā tat tenaiva kṛtaṃ bhavet ।
lunāti dātraṃ puṃśaktyā hantaiva procyate pumān ।। 

pīyate yat tu yacchaktyā pītaṃ tenaiva tad bhavet ।
pātreṇa pīyate pānaṃ pānapas tūcyate naraḥ ।। 

prakṛtyaivāsi sujaḍam asakṛj jñena bodhyase ।
tenātmaivātmanātmānaṃ cinotīdaṃ hi no bhavet ।। 

anārataṃ bodhayati tvām ātmā parameśvaraḥ ।
bodhanīyā budhair mūḍhāḥ kilāvṛttiśatair api ।। 

ātmasattaiva bodhaikarūpiṇī sphuratīha hi ।
tayaiva citta śabdārthān aṅgīkṛtya laghu sthitam ।। 

evaṃ citta tvam ajñānād ātmaśakter upāgatam ।
jñāne tv adyāvagalitaṃ tīvre himam ivātape ।। 

tasmān mṛtaṃ tvaṃ mūḍhaṃ tvaṃ nāsi tvaṃ paramārthataḥ ।
tad evāham iti vyarthaṃ māno māstv asukhāya te ।। 

asatyāś cittakalanā indrajālalatā iva ।
vijñānamātram eveha brāhmam aṅga vijṛmbhate ।। 

narāmarajagadrūpair brāhmī śaktir udety alam ।
sāmudrī kaṇakallolajālair veleva valgati ।। 

cinmayaṃ cidbhavan mūḍha tat tasmāt paramāt padāt ।
nityam avyatiriktaṃ tvaṃ kim anyat pariśocasi ।। 

sarvagaṃ sarvabhāvasthaṃ sarvarūpaṃ hi tat padaṃ ।
tatprāptau sarvam evāśu prāptaṃ bhavati sarvadā ।। 

na tvam asti na deho asti brahmāstīha mahat sphurat ।
ahaṃ tvam iti niṣṣyandais sphuraty ārtir hi kasya kā ।। 

ātmā cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva sarvago astīha netaraḥ ।
ātmano anyaj jaḍaṃ tvaṃ cet tat tvaṃ nāsty asy avidvapuḥ ।। 

ātmaiva sarvaṃ trijagat tadanyat tu nakiñcana ।
tan nakiñcit tvam ātmānyad yadi tat tvaṃ nakiñcana ।। 

ahaṃ tv idam idaṃ tan me iti vyarthaṃ kim īhase ।
asadvapuḥ kiṃ sphurati śaśaśṛṅgeṇa ko hataḥ ।। 

tṛtīyā kalpanā nāsti cijjaḍāṃśetarā śaṭha ।
chāyāhasanayor madhye tṛtīyevānurañjanā ।। 

satyāvalokanāj jāte cittvajāḍyadṛśoḥ kṣaye ।
sampadyate yat tat tv ajña svasaṃvedanamātrakam ।। 

tena mūḍha na kartṛ tvaṃ na bhoktṛ tvaṃ na cāpy asi ।
tad evāsi paraṃ brahma tyaja maurkhyaṃ bhavātmakam ।। 

kevalaṃ tv ajñaviṣayam upadeśārthasiddhaye ।
tvayā karaṇabhūtena karoty ātmeti kathyate ।। 

asatsvarūpaṃ karaṇaṃ jaḍaṃ niravalambanam ।
na spandate na plavate kartṛsambodhanaṃ vinā ।। 

akartuḥ karaṇasyājña śaktiḥ kācin na vidyate ।
dātrasya lāvakābhāve kartuṃ kim iva śaktatā ।। 

khaḍgaprahāravicchedakriyāyāṃ puṃsi śaktatā ।
na khaḍge sujaḍe kṛttasarvāṅge apy asti śaktatā ।। 

tasmān nāsi sakhe kartṛ mā vyarthaṃ duḥkhabhāg bhava ।
parārthaṃ kleśitā mūrkha prākṛteṣu na śobhate ।। 

īśvaro nedṛśaś śocyo yas tvayopakṛto bhavet ।
naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।। 

sarvaṃ tūpakaromy enam iti kevalam alpadhīḥ ।
kliśyate ca satāṃ tv artho na kaścid upayujyate ।। 

kartur bhogeśvarasyaivam atha ced anuvartase ।
tad asya kācin neccheha tṛptatvāt sarvadaiva hi ।। 

akṛtrimāvabhāsena sarvagena cidātmanā ।
ekenaivedam āpūrṇaṃ kalpanaivāsti netarā ।। 

ekānekāvabhāsena samastena tatātmanā ।
ātmany evātmanaivāntaḥ kriyate kiṃ kim iṣyate ।। 

tvādṛśasya tu dṛṣṭyaiva kṣubdhatā jāyate mudhā ।
ālokya rājamahiṣīṃ mano madamayīṃ yathā ।। 

ātmanā tava sambandhaś cet tat kartr asi sundara ।
kiṃ tu nāsyāsi sambandhaḥ kusumasyopalo yathā ।। 

dvitīyena samaṃ yaiṣā tattā tadbhāvataikatā ।
sā sambandhagatiḥ proktā prāgdvitvād adhunaikatā ।। 

nānāprakāraracanā nānārūpakriyāmukhī ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśāhetus sā cānekavidhā smṛtā ।। 

sambandhas samayor dṛṣṭas tathārdhasamayor api ।
suvilakṣaṇayoś cānyas tasmin sati jagattraye ।। 

dravyāntaraguṇaṃ dravyāṇy āśrayanti bahūny alam ।
śaśiśaityaṃ yathauṣadhyo yathoṣmāṇaṃ mahāśilāḥ ।। 

itthaṃ yadi tu sambandho bhavataḥ paramātmanā ।
astu tat saṃsṛter bījam anyo'nyaguṇasaṅkaraḥ ।। 

manomanananirmāṇakalātītātmanātmanā ।
īdṛśo asti na sambandhas tavendriyagaṇāṇunā ।। 

anyaś ca dṛśyate loke sambandhas samayos sphuṭaḥ ।
yathā jvalanayor aikye tejasoḥ payasor api ।। 

manomanananirmāṇakalātītātmanāṇunā ।
īdṛśo api na sambandhas tavendriyagaṇātmanā ।। 

anyaś ca caura sambandho dṛṣṭo ardhasamayor api ।
ekāvayavavaicitryād yathā strīpuṃsayor iha ।। 

kiñcidanyatayā caiva salilakṣīrayor iva ।
atha vā vārimadhunor madhunor iva citrayoḥ ।
pāṇḍurāruṇayor vāpi tejasor aruṇārkayoḥ ।। 

manomanananirmāṇakalātītātmanātmanā ।
īdṛśo api na sambandhas tavendriyagaṇāṇunā ।। 

anyo asti caura sambandho yo atyantāsamayor api ।
yatheha kāṣṭhajatunos tathā puruṣadantinoḥ ।। 

tādṛśo api na sambandhas tavendriyagaṇāṇunā ।
manomanananirmāṇakalātītātmanātmanā ।। 

anyo bījāṅkuranyāye pitṛputrakrame tathā ।
kāryakāraṇarūpo api na sambandhas tavātmanā ।। 

anyo api kalanāmātrasaṅketaracito bhavet ।
tavāhaṃ tvaṃ mamety antarniścayena kila dvayoḥ ।। 

anye ca bahavo lokeṣv ādhārādheyatādayaḥ ।
sambhavantīha sambandhās suṣṭhu sambandhakāriṇām ।। 

manomanananirmāṇakalātītātmanāṇunā ।
tathāpi naiva sambandhas tavendriyagaṇātmanā ।। 

ātmanā bhavataḥ ko ayaṃ ghoras saṃsāraduḥkhadaḥ ।
sambandhas syād vadāsmābhir yo na dṛṣṭo na dṛśyate ।। 

nāsau susamanirmāṇo na cārdhasamanirmitiḥ ।
na vilakṣaṇanirmāṇas sambandhaḥ ka ivedṛśaḥ ।। 

śaśamastakaśṛṅgeṇa rasāyanamayaś śaśī ।
kathaṃ saṃśliṣyate sādho nityaṃ sann asatā kila ।। 

nityaṃ sadasator aikyaṃ katham akṣagaṇātmanoḥ ।
prakāśajaḍayor mūrkha sakalaṅkākalaṅkayoḥ ।। 

dvayor vāpy asator evaṃ saṅgas sambhavatīha kaḥ ।
śaśamastakaśṛṅgādriśilāśakalayor iva ।। 

śṛṇv imaṃ niścayaṃ citta satyam eva mayocyate ।
ātmanā tava sambandhas svapneṣv api na vidyate ।। 

yad anātmamayaṃ tac ca na sambhavati kutracit ।
ātmanas sarvarūpatvāt tena tvaṃ nāsi cittaka ।। 

citta cetyavimukteyaṃ jagajjālavijṛmbhitaiḥ ।
ahaṃ tvam ityādimayī brahmasattaiva valgati ।। 

sakalakalpanayā svasamutthayā parivṛto apy abhitaś ca vivarjitaḥ ।
tava na saṅgam upaiti śaṭhākṛte hatamanas sakalāmaladṛg vibhuḥ ।। 

vītahavyopākhyāne cittānuśāsanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tryaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vītahavyo mahābuddhir vindhyādrau kandarodare ।
kṣurāgraśitayā buddhyā bhūyaś cedaṃ vyacārayat ।। 

mūrkhendriyagaṇāśeṣe samagraracanānvite ।
sarvasaṅkalpavalite sarvāṅkuraparāvṛte ।। 

samagraparivāre asmin sarvanāśe tavotthite ।
nūnam evābhyudety ātmā tamasīva kṣate raviḥ ।। 

nityodito api bhavato nodeti parameśvaraḥ ।
ravir andhekṣaṇasyeva vāsanāvalitātmanaḥ ।। 

vāsanāmalasaṃśāntau tvaṃ samūlaṃ vinaśyasi ।
tataḥ prakaṭatām eti brahma bṛṃhitacidghanam ।। 

bandho hi vāsanāmātraṃ tatkṣayo mokṣa ucyate ।
vāsanārajjuvicchedavilāsenodito bhava ।। 

indriyālī vibhau dṛṣṭe kṣīyate sahavāsanā ।
āndhyasaṅkalpanā kāle nāndhyakṣaya ivodite ।। 

ātmalābhe kṣayaṃ yāti manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyāvalī ।
indriyāvalināśe ca svātmanātmopalabhyate ।। 

satataṃ śreyase tasmād dvayam eva samācaret ।
ātmalābhendriyavaśāv abhyāsenaiva sidhyataḥ ।। 

svayaṃ guṇasamāhāraḥ kṣīyate dṛṣṭa ātmani ।
śārvaro bhūtasaṃrambho divākara ivodite ।। 

yasmin dṛṣṭe kṣayaṃ yāti yas sa tena satā kṣayī ।
kathaṃ sambandham āyāti cetanena jaḍātmakaḥ ।। 

prakāśasyāprakāśena śītalenoṣṇarūpiṇaḥ ।
jīvatā pramṛtasyeva na sambhavati saṅgamaḥ ।। 

kva samagrakalātītaḥ kva samagrakalānvitaḥ ।
kva nityas samprakāśātmā kvānityas timirākṛtiḥ ।। 

nityam astamitākāraḥ kva nityoditacidvapuḥ ।
kva cāsajjaḍamūkāndhaḥ kva sarvālokacidghanaḥ ।। 

ātmendriyagaṇair yukta ity anarthāya niścayaḥ ।
yāvad ajñānam evāntar bālānām eva valgati ।। 

tajjñānām ātmanā saṅgo nendriyāṇām iti sthite ।
akṣagrāme kṣayaṃ yāte paramātmamayaṃ jagat ।। 

yayāyuktyā mudhaiṣā te śaṅkā sphurati pīvarī ।
ātmā kalaṅkita iti sā vinaṣṭājñatādhunā ।। 

anigīrṇaviṣo mūrkhas sa yāto viṣamūrchanām ।
ātmendriyaśaṭhair yukta iti yenāśrito antaram ।। 

duḥkhiṣv indriyamūrkheṣu sukheṣūpahateṣu vā ।
sākṣiṇo akṣīṇasadvṛtter ātmanaḥ kim ivāgatam ।। 

cittendriyātmanāṃ saṅga iti no sambhavaty alam ।
sambandhābhāvasaṃsiddhau bhoktṛtākartṛte katham ।। 

nātaḥ kartā na bhoktāsmi na mokṣo asti na bandhanam ।
nāham asmi na cānyo asti saṃvidātmāsty alepakaḥ ।। 

sa evāhaṃ sa eva tvaṃ sa jagat so ambaraṃ sa bhūḥ ।
sarvaṃ nūnaṃ sa eveti nirṇīte kiṃ vimuhyasi ।। 

saṃvidaś cyavanaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvido mā cyuto bhava ।
etāvataikadhyānena nityadhyāno bhavātmadṛk ।। 

abhāve duḥkhadasyāntar dṛśyādṛśyasya vastunaḥ ।
saṅkalponmukhatāṃ viddhi duḥkhadāṃ saṃvidaś cyutim ।। 

jaḍeṣūpalabhedeṣu manodehendriyādiṣu ।
kīdṛśī kartṛtā citta kathaṃ vyomni vanaṃ bhavet ।। 

nirastakalanāpaṅke mananadhvaṃsarūpiṇi ।
na caivātmani kartṛtvaṃ sambhavaty ambarāṅgavat ।। 

ayaṃ kevalam ātmaiva nānānānātayātmani ।
sphuraty abdhir ivāmbhobhir mudhā lokaḥ kadarthitaḥ ।। 

ābhāsamātre sarvasmin sphuraty asmiṃś cidātmani ।
dvitīyā nāsti kalanā taptāṅgāra ivāmbudhau ।। 

kalanārahite deve dehe manasi vā jaḍe ।
saṃvit saṃvedyanirmuktā sārā sundara netarat ।। 

idam anyad idaṃ cānyac chubhaṃ vāśubham eva vā ।
iti saṅkalpanā nāsti yathā nabhasi kānanam ।। 

saṃvedyarahitaṃ saṃvinmātram evedam ātatam ।
tatrāyam aham anyo ayam iti saṅkalpanā katham ।। 

anādimati nīrūpe sarvage vitatātmani ।
āropayet kaḥ kalanām ṛgvedaṃ vyomni ko likhet ।। 

nityodite sakalavastupadārthasāre deve sthite bharitanirbharabhūridikkam ।
ātmany asat tvam iti sādhu gate amalatvāt kṣīṇau sukhāsukhalavau mama vai samoham ।। 

vītahavyopākhyāna indriyānuśāsanayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

caturaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūyo munivaro dhīro dhiyā dhavalayeddhayā ।
svam indriyagaṇaṃ guptaṃ bodhayām āsa sādhv idam ।। 

tavendriyagaṇa svārthaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmy atisphuṭam ।
śrutvā tadbhāvatām etya parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ vraja ।। 

bhavatām ātmasattaikā duḥkhāyaivānapāyinī ।
asatyām ātmanas sattāṃ tad bhavantas tyajantv iti ।। 

madīyenopadeśena sattaiṣā bhavatāṃ kṣayam ।
gataiveti sphuṭaṃ matto yūyaṃ hy ajñānasambhavāḥ ।। 

svasattāsphuṭataivātiduḥkhāya tava cittaka ।
taptakvāthe jatūllāso dāhāyaiva svapārśvayoḥ ।। 

paśya tvayi sati bhrātar jaḍakallolasaṅkulāḥ ।
viśanti kālajaladhiṃ saṃsārasaritāṃ gaṇāḥ ।। 

patanty ahamahamikāvihitānyo'nyavellanāḥ ।
kuto api duḥkhāvalayo dhārā āsāragā iva ।। 

parisphuraty aparyantā hṛdayonmūlanodyatā ।
ākrandakāriṇī krūrā bhāvābhāvaviṣūcikā ।। 

kāsaśvāsaraṇadbhṛṅge kalevarajaraddrume ।
vikasaty amaloddyotā jarāmaraṇamañjarī ।। 

kallolavyālavalite śarīraśvabhrakoṭare ।
khanatīhānakhī khātaṃ cintācapalagargaṭī ।। 

lobhalaṭvā laṭatpakṣā tīkṣṇayā dvandvatuṇḍayā ।
kāyajīrṇadrumād asmād guṇapadmāni kṛntati ।। 

hṛdayāvakaraṃ kīrṇam itaś cetaś ca karkaśaḥ ।
apavitroddhurākāraḥ kurute kāmakukkuṭaḥ ।। 

mahatyāṃ mohayāminyām ulbaṇo ajñānakauśikaḥ ।
śmaśāna iva vetālaḥ parivalgati hṛddrume ।। 

etāś cānyāś ca bahvyo api tvayīndriyagaṇe sati ।
piśācā iva śarvaryāṃ pravalganty aśubhaśriyaḥ ।। 

tvayi tv asati he sādho sarvā eva śubhaśriyaḥ ।
prabhāta iva padminyas sālokaṃ vikasanty alam ।। 

praśāntamohamihikaṃ rājate hṛdayāmbaram ।
nirmalālokavalitaṃ nīrajaskaṃ tatāntaram ।। 

aśaṅkitaṃ nabhaḥkośapatitopalapūravat ।
nāpatanti vikalpaughāś ciraṃ vaikalyakāriṇaḥ ।। 

sarvasyāhlādanī śītā maitrī paramapāvanī ।
abhyudeti hṛdo hṛdyā sutaror iva mañjarī ।। 

antaśchidravatī jāḍyayuktā guptaguṇā svayam ।
cintā śoṣam upāyāti himadagdheva padminī ।। 

ālokas sphuṭatām antar āyāty ajñānasaṅkṣaye ।
praśāmyaty ambude vyomni śaradīvārkamaṇḍalam ।। 

prasannasphāragambhīram akṣubdham aparāhatam ।
hṛdayaṃ samatām eti śāntavāta ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

amṛtāpūrapūrṇena nityānandamayena ca ।
sthīyate puruṣeṇāntaśśītena śaśinā yathā ।। 

saṃvidaṃśaikaviśrāntaṃ samagraṃ sacarācaram ।
bhāvyate bharitākāraṃ vapur ānandamantharam ।। 

na bhavaty astasaṅgānām āśāpāśavidhāyinām ।
dagdhānām iva parṇānāṃ janmanāṃ punarāgatiḥ ।। 

puṃsā kṣapitasaṃsārajarājanmamahādhvanā ।
apunarbhramaṇāyātmadrume viśramyate ciram ।। 

evamprāyās tathānyāś ca bhavanti guṇasampadaḥ ।
asati tvayi sarvāśin sarvāśākṣaṇadākṣaye ।। 

pakṣayor etayoś citta sattāsattāsvarūpayoḥ ।
yenaiva paśyasi śreyas tam evāṅgīkuru kṣaṇāt ।। 

svātmābhāvas tava sukhaṃ manye mānavatāṃ vara ।
tam eva bhāvayābhāvaṃ sukhatyāgo hi mūḍhatā ।। 

yadi tv asti bhavat satyam antarbhāvitacetanam ।
jīvatas tat tavātyantam abhāvaṃ ka ivecchati ।। 

kiṃ tu nāsty asi satyena vadāmi tava sundara ।
tena mithyaiva jīvāmīty āsthayā mā bhavāsukhi ।। 

prakrame vāsi nāsty eva yā vā bhrāntyā tvadastitā ।
sāpīdānīṃ vicāreṇa bhṛśaṃ saṅkṣayam āgatā ।। 

etāvad eva te rūpaṃ sādho yad avicāraṇam ।
vicāre vihite samyak tvam arūpam asat sthitam ।। 

avicārāt prajātaṃ tvam anālokāt tamo yathā ।
vicāreṇopaśāntaṃ tvam ālokena tamo yathā ।। 

etāvantaṃ sakhe kālaṃ babhūvālpavivekitā ।
tāvataivātipīnatvam abhūd duḥkhaikakāraṇam ।। 

mohasaṅkalpamātreṇa bālavetālavad bhavat ।
babhūvātyantasaṅkalpe kṣīṇe tvayi bhavat sthitam ।। 

idānīm uditaṃ nityaṃ tvaṃ prāgrūpe kṣayaṃ gate ।
vivekasya prasādena vivekāya namo namaḥ ।। 

babhūvithāprabuddhaṃ tvaṃ cittakātyantabodhataḥ ।
cittatāyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāṃ sthitas tvaṃ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

prāksvarūpavilāsas te śreyasi sthitim āgataḥ ।
samastavāsanonmuktas sampraty asi maheśvaraḥ ।। 

yasyāvivekād utpattis sa vivekād vinaśyati ।
prakāśena prayāty antam anālokodbhavaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

anicchato api te sādho vicāre sthitim āgate ।
arthato ayam upāyāto vināśas sukhasiddhaye ।। 

tasmān nāsty asi nirṇītam iti siddhāntayuktibhiḥ ।
mitrendriyeśvara svasti bhavatas tv astam āgatam ।। 

nityaṃ pūrvam abhūtāya nāstirūpāya samprati ।
bhaviṣyate ca nodarkas svamanas svasti te astv iti ।। 

parinirvāmi śānto asmi diṣṭyāsmi vigatajvaraḥ ।
svātmany evāvatiṣṭhe ahaṃ turyarūpe pade sthitaḥ ।। 

ato nāsty eva nāsty eva saṃsārī cittasaṃsthitiḥ ।
ātmā tv asty eva cāsty eva yasmād anyan na vidyate ।। 

ayam ātmeti kalanā manye no nirmalāntarā ।
pratiyogivyavacchedakalanaikasya vā kutaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ tenāyam ātmeti kalanām anudāharan ।
maunī svātmani nirvāmi taraṅga iva vāriṇi ।। 

saṃśāntavāsanam anāśritacetanāṃśam aprāṇasañcaraṇam astavināśadoṣam ।
saṃvedyavarjitam upetya susaṃvidaṃśaṃ śāmyāmi maunam ayam eva nirīham antaḥ ।। 

vītahavyavṛttānte cittāsattāvicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nirṇīya sa munir vītahavyo vivāsanaḥ ।
āsīt samādhāv acalo vindhyaparvatakoṭare ।। 

aparispanditāśeṣaspandanānandasundaraḥ ।
babhūvāstaṅgatamanās stimitāmbhodhiśobhanaḥ ।। 

antar eva śaśāmāsya krameṇa prāṇasantatiḥ ।
jvālājālaparispando dagdhendhana ivānale ।। 

anantarniṣṭhatāṃ yāte bāhyārthe cāpy asaṃsthite ।
śeṣe tu labdhasaṃsthāne tasya sphuritapakṣmaṇī ।। 

ghrāṇaprāntagatālpālpasamāloka ivekṣaṇe ।
ardhakuṭmalitaiḥ padmaiś śriyam āyayatus samām ।। 

samakāyaśirogrīvasthānakas sa mahāmatiḥ ।
āsīc chailād ivotkīrṇaś citrārpita ivātha vā ।। 

tathā pratiṣṭhatas tasya saṃvatsaraśatatrayam ।
koṭare vindhyakacchasya yayāv ardhamuhūrtavat ।। 

etāvantam asau kālaṃ nābudhyata kilātmavān ।
jīvanmuktatayā dhyānī na ca tatyāja tāṃ tanum ।। 

tāvatkālaṃ sa subhago na prābudhyata yogavit ।
uddāmair ambudārāvair āsārabharaghargharaiḥ ।। 

paryantamaṇḍalādhīśamṛgayāravabṛṃhitaiḥ ।
ṛkṣavānaranirhrādair mātaṅgāsphoṭanissvanaiḥ ।। 

siṃhasaṃrambharaṭitair nirjharārāvajhāṅkṛtaiḥ ।
viṣamāśanisampātair gajakolāhalair ghanaiḥ ।। 

pramattaśarabhāsphoṭair bhūkampataṭaghaṭṭanaiḥ ।
vanadāhadhamaddhvānair jalaughāhatavellanaiḥ ।। 

mahopalatalāghātair dharaṇītalamajjanaiḥ ।
jalaughāndolanāpātais tāpair analakarkaśaiḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ vahati svairaṃ kāle kalitakāraṇe ।
pariyāntīṣu varṣāsu laharīṣv iva vāriṇi ।। 

svalpenaiva sa kālena tasmin parvatakandare ।
prāvṛḍoghavinunnena paṅkenorvītale kṛtaḥ ।। 

tatrāsāv avasad bhūmeḥ koṭare saṅkaṭodare ।
paṅkasampiṇḍitaskandaḥ parvate antaś śilā yathā ।। 

śatatraye tu varṣāṇām atha yāte svayaṃ prabhuḥ ।
prābudhyatātmarūpātmā dharākoṭarapīḍitaḥ ।। 

saṃvid evāsya taṃ dehaṃ jagrāhorvīnipīḍitam ।
na tu prāṇamayas spandaḥ prāṇasaṃsaraṇaṃ vinā ।। 

utpatya prauḍhim āsādya kalanā hṛdayāmbare ।
svamanorūpiṇī tasya hṛdy evānubabhūva sā ।। 

kailāsakānane kānte kadambasya taros tale ।
munitvaṃ śatam abdānāṃ jīvanmuktātma nirmalam ।। 

vidyādharatvaṃ varṣāṇāṃ śatam ādhivivarjitam ।
yugapañcakam indratvaṃ praṇataṃ suracāraṇaiḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

munitvādiṣu teṣv asya pratibhāseṣu bho mune ।
niyamo aniyamaś caiva dikkālaniyateḥ katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvātmikaiṣā cicchaktir yatrodeti yathā yathā ।
tathā tathāśu bhavati tadātmaikasvabhāvataḥ ।। 

yadā yatra yathā buddho niyamas sa tathā sthitaḥ ।
deśakālādiniyamakramāṇāṃ tanmayātmanām ।। 

tena nānāvidhāny eṣa jaganti paridṛṣṭavān ।
hṛdi saṃvedanākāśe vītahavyo vivāsanaḥ ।। 

samyagbodhavatām eṣā vāsanaiva na vāsanā ।
jñānāgnidagdhā dagdhasya keva bījasya bījatā ।। 

kalpam ekaṃ gaṇatvaṃ sa candramauleś cakāra ha ।
samastavidyāniyataṃ trikālāmaladarśanam ।। 

yo yādṛgdṛḍhasaṃskāras sa sampaśyati tādṛśam ।
jīvanmuktatayaivaitad vītahavyo anubhūtavān ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ sthite muniśreṣṭha jīvanmuktamater api ।
bandhamokṣadṛśas santi vītahavyātmano yathā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathāsthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ śāntam ākāśanirmalam ।
brahmaiva jīvanmuktānāṃ bandhamokṣadṛśaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

evaṃ saṃvinnabho bhāti yatra yatra yathā yathā ।
tatra tatra tathā tāvat tāvat tad vindate tatam ।। 

tenānubhūtāni bahūny anubhūyanta eva ca ।
jaganti sarvātmatayā brahmarūpeṇa rāghava ।। 

dharākoṭaranirmagnavītahavyacidātmasu ।
jagatsu teṣv asaṅkhyeṣu nīrūpeṣu mahātmasu ।। 

yaś śakro anavabuddhātmā so adya cīneṣu pārthivaḥ ।
kartuṃ pravṛtto mṛgayāṃ kṣaṇe asmin nīpakānane ।। 

yo haṃso anavabuddhātmā padme paitāmahe abhavat ।
sthitas sa eṣa dāśeśaḥ kailāsavanakuñjake ।। 

yo rājānavabuddhātmā bhūmau saurāṣṭramaṇḍale ।
sa eṣa hi sthito andhrāṇāṃ grāme vipulapādapaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

mānasaḥ kila sargo asau vītahavyasya tatra ye ।
dehino bhrāntimātraṃ te vadehākāriṇaḥ katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yadi bhrāntyekamātrātma vītahavyasya taj jagat ।
tad idaṃ bhāsate nāma kimmayaṃ pratibhāsate ।। 

idam aṅga sacinmātramanomātraṃ bhramātmakam ।। 

vastutas tu na tan nāma jagan nedaṃ ca netarat ।
na cāpi na jagatsattā brahmedaṃ bhāti kevalam ।। 

bhāvi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca tac cedaṃ ca tathetarat ।
jagat sarvam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ saṃvinmātramanomayam ।। 

evaṃrūpam idaṃ yāvan na parijñātam īdṛśam ।
vajrasāraṃ dṛḍhaṃ tāvaj jātaṃ sat paramāmbaram ।। 

ajñānāṃ mana evedam itthaṃ sampravijṛmbhate ।
pratyullāsavilāsātma jalam ambunidhāv iva ।। 

yathāsthitenaiva cidambareṇa svacittvam eveti mano'bhidhānam ।
sphārīkṛtaṃ tena jagac ca dṛśyam evaṃ tataṃ naiva tataṃ ca kiñcit ।। 

vītahavyamanojagadvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍaśītitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

atha kiṃ vītahavyasya sthitaṃ tasmin vanodare ।
katham uddhṛtavān dehaṃ sa sampannaś ca kiṃ katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anantaram anantātma vītahavyābhidhaṃ manaḥ ।
svam evātmacamatkāram itthaṃ tam avabuddhavān ।। 

sarvasyāsya gaṇasyābhūt prāgjātismaraṇe svayam ।
icchā kadācit sakalaprāgjanmālokanaṃ prati ।। 

aśeṣān sa dadarśātha naṣṭān naṣṭān svadehakān ।
anaṣṭānāṃ tato madhyāt taṃ dharākoṭarasthitam ।। 

yadṛcchayaiva proddhartuṃ dehaṃ tasyābhavan matiḥ ।
śarīraṃ vītahavyākhyaṃ dharākoṭarapīḍitam ।। 

prāvṛḍoghopanītaṃ svapṛṣṭhasthaṃ paṅkamaṇḍalam ।
tṛṇajālāvakīrṇatvaṃ dehapṛṣṭhamṛdas tathā ।। 

etad dṛṣṭvā mahātejā dharāvivarayantritaḥ ।
bhūyo api cintayām āsa dhiyā paramabodhayā ।। 

sarvasampiṇḍitāṅgatvāt kāyo me prāṇavāyubhiḥ ।
mūkaś calitum ākrāntaś śaknoti na manāg api ।। 

tad gatvā praviśāmy āśu deham etaṃ vivasvataḥ ।
tadīyaḥ piṅgalo deham uddhariṣyati me tataḥ ।। 

atha vā kiṃ mamaitena śāmyāmy aham avighnataḥ ।
nirvāmi svaṃ padaṃ yāmi ko artho me dehalīlayā ।। 

iti sañcintya manasā vītahavyo mahāmate ।
tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ bhūyaś cintayām āsa bhūtale ।। 

upādeyo hi dehasya na me tyāgo na saṃśrayaḥ ।
yādṛśo dehasantyāgas tādṛśo dehasaṃśrayaḥ ।। 

tad yāvad asti deho ayaṃ na yāvad aṇutāṃ gataḥ ।
tāvad enam upāruhya kiñcit pravicarāmy aham ।। 

piṅgalena śarīraṃ svam uddhartuṃ tāpanaṃ vapuḥ ।
praviśāmi nabhassaṃsthaṃ makuraṃ pratibimbavat ।। 

ity asau munir ādityaṃ viveśānilarūpadhṛt ।
puryaṣṭakavapur bhūtvā śastrapiṇḍam ivānalaḥ ।। 

bhagavān ravir apy enaṃ hṛdgataṃ munināyakam ।
dṛṣṭvā so acintayat kāryapaurvāparyam udāradhīḥ ।। 

vindhyakandarabhūdeśam agraṃ munikalevaram ।
tṛṇopalaparicchannaṃ dadarśa gatasaṃvidam ।। 

ṛṣeś cikīrṣitaṃ jñātvā bhānur gaganamadhyagaḥ ।
dharāto munim uddhartum ādideśāgragaṃ gaṇam ।। 

vītahavyamunes saṃvit sā puryaṣṭakarūpiṇī ।
raviṃ vātamayī pūjyaṃ praṇanāmāśu cetasā ।। 

bhānunāthābhyanujñāto mānapūrvakam agragam ।
viveśa piṅgalākāraṃ vindhyakandaragāminam ।। 

piṅgalo asau nabhas tyaktvā kuñjakuñjarasundaram ।
prāpa vindhyavanaṃ prāvṛṇmattābhrāmbarabhāsuram ।। 

uddadhāra dharākośān nakhaniṣkṛṣṭabhūdharaḥ ।
kalevaraṃ muneḥ paṅkān mṛṇālam iva sārasaḥ ।। 

maunaṃ puryaṣṭakam atha svaṃ viveśa kalevaram ।
nabhastalapariśrānto vihaṅgama ivālayam ।। 

praṇamyāśu mitho mūrtī vītahavyanabhaścarau ।
babhūvatus svakāryaikatatparau tejasāṃ nidhī ।। 

jagāma piṅgalo vyoma muniś ca vimalaṃ saraḥ ।
tārakākārakumudaṃ sūryāṃśukacadākṛti ।। 

vītahavyo mamajjāśu sarasy utphullapaṅkaje ।
paṅkapalvalalīlānte vane kalabhako yathā ।। 

tatra snātvā japaṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā divākaram ।
tapobhūṣitayā tanvā pūrvavat punar ābabhau ।। 

maitryā tayā samatayā parayā ca śāntyā satprajñayā muditayā kṛpayā śriyā ca ।
yukto munis sakalasaṅgavimuktacetā vindhye sarittaṭagato dinam eva reme ।। 

vītahavyasamādhiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dinānte sa samādhātuṃ punar eva mano muniḥ ।
viveśa kāñcid vitatāṃ vijanāṃ vindhyakandarām ।। 

tad evāthānusandhānam atyajat samam indriyaiḥ ।
cetasā kathayām āsa dṛṣṭalokaparāvaraḥ ।। 

pūrvam evendriyagaṇo mayā parihṛtas sphuṭam ।
idānīṃ cintayā nārthaḥ punar vitatayā mama ।। 

asti nāstīti kalanāṃ bhaṅktvā mṛdvīṃ latām iva ।
śeṣe tu baddhasaṃsthānaṃ tiṣṭhāmy acalaśṛṅgavat ।। 

udito astaṅgata iva svastaṅgata ivoditaḥ ।
samas samarasābhāsas tiṣṭhāmi svasthatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

prabuddho api suṣuptasthas suṣuptasthaḥ prabuddhavān ।
turyam ālambya kāryāntaṃ tiṣṭhāmi stambhitasthitiḥ ।। 

sthiras sthāṇur ivaikānte svāntānte sarvatas sthite ।
sattvasāmānyasāmye hi tiṣṭhāmy apagatāmayaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya sa dhyāne punas tasthau dināni ṣaṭ ।
tataḥ prabodham āpannaḥ kṣaṇasupta ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

evaṃsiddhas sa bhagavān vītahavyo mahātapāḥ ।
vijahāra ciraṃ kālaṃ jīvanmuktatayā tayā ।। 

vastu nābhinanandāsau na nininda kadācana ।
na jagāma tathodvegaṃ na ca harṣam avāpa ha ।। 

gacchatas tiṣṭhataś caiva tasyeyam abhavad dhṛdi ।
vinodāya svacittasya kathā svamanasā saha ।। 

avyayendriyavargeśa manaś śamavatā tvayā ।
paśyānandasukhaṃ kīdṛg idam āsāditaṃ tatam ।। 

eṣaivānārataṃ tasmān nīrāgaiva daśā tvayā ।
avalambyā parityājyaṃ cāpalaṃ calatāṃ vara ।। 

bho bho indriyacaurā he hatāśā hatanāmakāḥ ।
yuṣmākaṃ nāyam ātmāsti na bhavantas tathātmani ।। 

vrajatāśu vināśāntam āśā vo viphalīkṛtāḥ ।
na samarthās samākrāntau bhavanto bhaṅgurāśrayāḥ ।। 

vayam ātmeti yaiṣā vo babhūva kila vāsanā ।
tattvavismṛtijā sā hi dṛṣṭarajjubhujaṅgavat ।। 

anātmany ātmatā saiṣā saiṣā vastuny avastutā ।
avicārād babhūveha vicāreṇa kṣayaṃ gatā ।। 

bhavanto anye vayaṃ cānye brahmānyat kartṛtā parā ।
anyo bhoktānya ādatte ko doṣaḥ kasya kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

vanebhyo dāru sañjātaṃ rajjavo veṇucarmaṇī ।
vāsī cāyaḥphalāny evaṃ takṣā grāsārtham udyataḥ ।। 

itthaṃ yatheha sāmagryā svaśaktisthapadārthayā ।
sampannaḥ kākatālīyād ratho gṛhavarākṛtiḥ ।। 

sampannaḥ kākatālīyāt svaśaktiniratendriyaḥ ।
tathaiva kila kāyo ayaṃ keva kasyātra khaṇḍanā ।। 

vismṛtir vismṛtā dūraṃ smṛtis sphuṭam anusmṛtā ।
sat saj jātam asac cāsat kṣayi kṣīṇaṃ sthiraṃ sthitam ।। 

evaṃvidhena bhagavān vicāreṇa mahātapāḥ ।
so atiṣṭhan muniśārdūlo bahūn varṣagaṇān iha ।। 

apunarbhavanāyaiva yatra cintāntam āgatā ।
mūḍhatā ca sudūrasthā tatrāsāv avasat sadā ।। 

yathābhūtapadārthaughadarśanottham anantakam ।
dhyānāśvāsanam ālambya so avasat puruṣas sadā ।। 

heyādeyasamāsaṅgatyāgādānadṛśoḥ kṣaye ।
pade paramapūrṇātmā so avasat svāntaśāntide ।। 

so agastyaputro bhagavān vītahavyo vivāsanaḥ ।
videhamuktatāṃ prāpto yathā kālena tac chṛṇu ।। 

triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi saptavarṣaśatāni ca ।
puṇyāśrama uṣitveha tathā merau surālaye ।। 

vītahavyamuner āsīd icchānicchācchacetasaḥ ।
videhe kevalībhāve sīmānte janmakarmaṇām ।। 

saṃsārāsaṅgasantyāgarasāsavavarecchayā ।
viveśa sa tayaikānte vindhyādrer hemakandaram ।। 

apunassaṅgamāyāśu jagajjālam avekṣya saḥ ।
baddhapadmāsanaṃ sthitvā tatrovācātmanātmani ।। 

rāga nīrāgatāṃ gaccha dveṣa nirdveṣatāṃ vraja ।
bhavadbhyāṃ suciraṃ kālam iha prakrīḍitaṃ mayā ।। 

bhogā namo astu yuṣmabhyaṃ janmakoṭiśatāny aham ।
bhavadbhir lālito loke lālakair iva bālakaḥ ।। 

imām api parāṃ puṇyāṃ nirvāṇapadavīm aham ।
yena vismāritas tasmai sukhāyāstu namo namaḥ ।। 

tvaduttaptena he duḥkha mayātmānviṣṭa ādarāt ।
tasmāt tvadupadiṣṭo ayaṃ mārgo mama namo astu te ।। 

tvatprasādena labdheyaṃ śītalā padavī mayā ।
duḥkha nāmnaiva duḥkhaṃ tvaṃ sukhadātman namo astu te ।। 

kalyāṇam astu te mitra saṃsārāsārajīvitā ।
deha sthitir iyaṃ yāmo vayam ātmīyam āspadam ।। 

prāyo jaḍānāṃ jantūnām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ ।
dehenāpi viyujye ahaṃ bhūtvā janmaśatāny api ।। 

mitra kāya mayā na tvaṃ tyajyase cirabāndhava ।
tvayaivātmany upānītā svātmajñānavaśāt kṣatiḥ ।। 

adhigamyātmavijñānam ātmanāśaḥ kṛtas tvayā ।
dehe nānyena bhagno asi tvayaivaitad upāsitam ।। 

ekākinyaiva śuṣyantyā praśānte mayi dīnayā ।
tvayā duḥkhaṃ na kartavyaṃ mātas tṛṣṇe vrajāmy aham ।। 

kṣantavyāḥ kāma bhagavan viparītāparādhajāḥ ।
doṣā upaśamaikāntaṃ vrajāmy ādiśa mām alam ।। 

cirāc cirāya cedānīm amba tṛṣṇe kilāvayoḥ ।
viyogo yogadoṣeṇa praṇāmo ayam apaścimaḥ ।। 

namas sukṛta sevyāya bhavate astu tvayā purā ।
narakebhyas samuttārya svarge aham abhiyojitaḥ ।। 

kukāryakṣetrarūḍhāya narakaskandhavāhine ।
śāsanāpuṣpabhārāya namo duṣkṛtaśākhine ।। 

yena sārdhaṃ ciraṃ bahvyo bhuktā duṣkṛtayonayaḥ ।
adya prabhṛty adṛśyāya tasmai mohāya te namaḥ ।। 

pradhvanadvaṃśamadhuravacase pattravāsase ।
namo guhātapasvinyai vayasyāyai samādhiṣu ।। 

saṃsārādhvani khinnasya tvaṃ samāśvāsakāraṇam ।
āsīr vayasyā susnigdhā sarvaśokāpahāriṇī ।। 

sarvasaṅkaṭakhinnena doṣebhyo dravatā mayā ।
tvam ekā śokanāśārtham āśritā paramā sakhī ।। 

vārddhakaikāntasuhṛde daṇḍakāṣṭhāya te namaḥ ।। 

asthipañjaram ātmīyaṃ tathā raktāntratantukam ।
etāvanmātrasāraika gṛhītvā gaccha dehaka ।। 

payaḥkṣobhaprakārebhyas snānebhyo api namo namaḥ ।
namo astu vyavahārebhyas saṃsṛtibhyo namo astu vaḥ ।। 

ete bhavantas sahajāḥ prāktanās suhṛdo mayā ।
krameṇa jyotkṛtāḥ prāṇās svasti vo astu vrajāmy aham ।। 

bhavadbhis saha citrāsu mayā bahvīṣu yoniṣu ।
viśrāntaṃ girikuñjeṣu bhrāntaṃ lokāntareṣu ca ।। 

krīḍitaṃ purapīṭhāntar uṣitaṃ parvateṣu ca ।
sthitaṃ kāryavilāseṣu prasthitaṃ vividhādhvasu ।। 

na tad asti jagatkośe bhavadbhis saha yan mayā ।
na kṛtaṃ na hṛtaṃ nāttaṃ na dattaṃ nāvalambitam ।। 

idānīṃ svāṃ diśaṃ yāntu bhavanto yāmy ahaṃ priyāḥ ।
saṃyogā viprayogāntās sarve saṃsāravartmani ।। 

ayaṃ cākṣuṣa āloko viśatv ādityamaṇḍalam ।
viśantu vanapuṣpāṇi saugandhyānandasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

prāṇānilās tathā sparśā viśantv adya prabhañjanam ।
viśantv ākāśakuharaṃ śabdaśravaṇapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

galatv agnau ghṛtam iva candre kṣīṇavapur manaḥ ।। 

sukhaduḥkhādayas sarve prayāntu svām avasthitim ।
tṛṣṇā śuṣyatu sārambhā hemanta iva padminī ।। 

dagdhendhana ivārciṣmān nissneha iva dīpakaḥ ।
nirmandara ivāmbhodhir gatārka iva vāsaraḥ ।। 

śaradīva ghanas svairaṃ prāptasargāntakalpavat ।
oṅkārānte astamananaṃ praśāmyāmy ātmanātmani ।। 

vyapagatākhilakāryaparamparas sakaladṛśyadaśātigatasthitiḥ ।
praṇavaśāntyanusaṃsṛtiśāntadhīr vigatamohamalo ayam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

indriyavarganirākaraṇayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ kalitavān antaḥ praśāntamananaiṣaṇaḥ ।
śanair uccārayaṃś cāru praṇavaprāptibhūmikaḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantarān sarvān sūkṣmān sthūlatarān api ।
trailokyakalpitāṃs tyaktvā saṅkalpān kalpakalpitān ।। 

tiṣṭhann akṣubhitākāraś cintāmaṇir ivātmani ।
sampūrṇa iva śītāṃśur viśrānta iva mandaraḥ ।। 

kumbhakāragṛhe cakraṃ saṃrodhitam iva bhramāt ।
ambhodhir iva sampūrṇas stimitasphāranirmalaḥ ।। 

śāntatejastamaḥpuñjaṃ vigatārkendutārakam ।
adhūmābhrarajas svaccham anantaṃ śaradīva kham ।। 

saha praṇavaparyantadīrghanissvanatantunā ।
jahāv indriyatanmātrajālaṃ gandham ivānilaḥ ।। 

tato jahau tamomātraṃ pratibhātam ivāntare ।
uttiṣṭhat prasphuradrūpaṃ prājñaḥ kopalavaṃ yathā ।। 

pratibhātaṃ tatas tejo nimeṣārdhaṃ vicārya saḥ ।
jahau babhūva ca tadā na tamo na prakāśakam ।। 

tām avasthām athāsādya manasā tan manastṛṇam ।
sphuritaṃ na manāg eva nimeṣārdhād aśātayat ।। 

tato aṅgasaṃvidaṃ svasthāṃ pratibhāsam upāgatām ।
sadyojātaśiśujñānasamām akalanāmalām ।। 

nimeśārdhārdhabhāgena kālenākalanaḥ prabhuḥ ।
jahau citaś cetyadaśāṃ spandaśaktim ivānilaḥ ।। 

paśyantīpadam āsādya sattāmātrātmakaṃ tataḥ ।
suṣuptapadam āsādya tasthau merur ivācalaḥ ।। 

tatas suṣuptasaṃsthānasthityā sthitvā vibhur manāk ।
suṣupte sthairyam āsādya turyarūpam upāyayau ।। 

nirānando api sānandas sac cāsac cāpi tatra saḥ ।
āsīn nakiñcit kiñcic ca prakāśas timiraṃ tathā ।।
