acinmayaṃ cinmayaṃ ca neti neti yad ucyate ।
tat tatas sambabhūvāsau madgirām apy agocaraḥ ।। 

tad asau suṣamaṃ sthānaṃ padaṃ paramapāvanam ।
sarvabhāvāntaragatam abhūt sarvavivarjitam ।। 

yac chūnyavādināṃ śūnyaṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ varam ।
vijñānamātraṃ vijñānavidāṃ yad amalātmakam ।। 

puruṣas sāṅkhyadṛṣṭīnām īśvaro yogavādinām ।
śivaś śaśikalaṅkānāṃ kālaḥ kālakavādinām ।। 

ātmātmanas tadviduṣāṃ nairāśyaṃ tādṛśātmanām ।
madhyaṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca sarvaṃ suśamacetasām ।। 

yat sarvaśāstrasiddhānto yat sarvahṛdayānugam ।
yat sarvaṃ sarvadā sārvaṃ yat sat tat sad asau sthitaḥ ।। 

yad anuttamaniṣṣyando dīpaṃ yat tejasām api ।
svānubhūtyekamānaṃ yat tat tat tat tad asau sthitaḥ ।। 

yad ekaṃ cāpy anekaṃ ca sāñjanaṃ ca nirañjanam ।
yat sarvaṃ cāpy asarvaṃ ca tat tat tat tad asau sthitaḥ ।। 

ajam ajaram anādyam ādyam ekaṃ padam akalaṃ sakalaṃ ca niṣkalaṃ ca ।
sthita iti sa tadā nabhassvarūpād api vimalasthitir īśvaraḥ kṣaṇena ।। 

vītahavyanirvāṇayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāpya saṃsṛtisīmāntaṃ duḥkhābdheḥ pāram āgataḥ ।
vītahavyaś śaśāmaivam apunarmanase muniḥ ।। 

tasmiṃs tathopaśānte hi parāṃ nirvṛtim āgate ।
payaḥkaṇa ivāmbhodhau sve pade pariṇāmini ।। 

tathaiva tiṣṭhan nisspandas sa kāyo mlānim āyayau ।
antar virasatāṃ prāpya mārgaśīrṣāntaparṇavat ।। 

tasya dehadrumāntassthaṃ tyaktvā hṛnnīḍam āyayuḥ ।
proḍḍīya prāṇavihagā yantronmuktāśmavan nabhaḥ ।। 

bhūteṣv eva praviṣṭāni bhūtāni sakalāny alam ।
māṃsāsthiyantraṃ dehas tu vanāvanitale avasat ।। 

cidarṇavaṃ praviṣṭā cid dhātavo dhātuṣu sthitāḥ ।
sve svarūpe sthitaṃ sarvaṃ munāv upaśamaṃ gate ।। 

eṣā te kathitā rāma vicāraśataśālinī ।
viśrāntir vītahavyasya prajñayaitāṃ vivecaya ।। 

evamprakārayā yuktyā svavicāraṇayeddhayā ।
tattvam ālokya tatsāram ātiṣṭhotthāya rāghava ।। 

yad etad akhilaṃ rāma bhavate varṇitaṃ mayā ।
yad idaṃ varṇayāmy anyad varṇayiṣyāmi yac ca vā ।। 

trikāladarśinā nityaṃ ciraṃ ca kila jīvatā ।
vicāritaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca mayā tad akhilaṃ svayam ।। 

tad etām amalāṃ dṛṣṭim avalambya mahāmate ।
jñānam āsādaya paraṃ jñānān muktir hi labhyate ।। 

jñānān nirduḥkhatodeti jñānād ajñānasaṅkṣayaḥ ।
jñānād eva parā siddhir nānyasmād rāma vastutaḥ ।। 

jñānena sakalān pāśān vinikṛtya samantataḥ ।
śātitāśeṣacittādrir vītahavyo munīśvaraḥ ।। 

vītahavyātmikā saṃvit saṅkalpajagatīti sā ।
anubhūtavatī viśvam idam eva ca taj jagat ।। 

vītahavyo manomātraṃ mano ahaṃ tvam ime adrayaḥ ।
mano jagad idaṃ kṛtsnam anyatānanyate atra ke ।। 

adhigataparamārthaḥ kṣīṇarāgādidoṣas sakalamalavikāropādhibhaṅgād atītaḥ ।
ciram anusṛtam anyais svaṃ svabhāvaṃ vivekī padam amalam anantaṃ prāptavāñ śāntaśokaḥ ।। 

vītahavyaviśrāntis samāptā

navatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vītahavyavad ātmānaṃ nītvā viditavedyatām ।
vītarāgabhayadveṣas tiṣṭha rāghava karmasu ।। 

triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi vijahāra yathā muniḥ ।
vītahavyo vītaśokas tathā vihara rāghava ।। 

anye rājanyamunayo jñātajñeyā mahādhiyaḥ ।
yathāvasan svarājyeṣu tathāvasa mahāmate ।। 

sukhaduḥkhakramair ātmā na kadācana gṛhyate ।
sarvago api mahābāho kiṃ mudhā pariśocasi ।। 

bahavo viditātmāno viharantīha bhūtale ।
na kecana vaśaṃ yātā duḥkhasyāṅga bhavān iva ।। 

svastho bhava bhavodāras samo bhava sukhī bhava ।
sarvagas tvaṃ tvam ātmaiva tava nāsti punarbhavaḥ ।। 

harṣāmarṣavikārāṇāṃ jīvanmuktā bhavādṛśaḥ ।
na kecana vaśaṃ yānti mṛgendrāś śākhinām iva ।। 

rāmaḥ

anenaiva prasaṅgena saṃśayo ayaṃ mamoditaḥ ।
śaratkāla ivāmbhodaṃ taṃ me tvaṃ tanutāṃ naya ।। 

jīvanmuktaśarīrāṇāṃ katham ātmavidāṃ vara ।
śaktayo neha dṛśyante ākāśagamanādikāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ākāśagamanādīni yāny etāni raghūdvaha ।
karmāṇi tāḥ padārthānāṃ sahajāḥ khalu śaktayaḥ ।। 

yad vicitraṃ kriyājālaṃ darśyate gopyate punaḥ ।
rāma vastusvabhāvo asau na tad ātmavidāṃ matam ।। 

anātmavid amukto api nabhoviharaṇādikam ।
dravyakarmakriyākālaśaktyāpnoty eva rāghava ।। 

nātmajñasyaiṣa viṣaya ātmajño hy ātmavān svayam ।
ātmanātmani santṛpto nāvidyām anudhāvati ।। 

ye kecana jagadbhāvās tān avidyākṛtān viduḥ ।
kathaṃ teṣu kilātmajñas tyaktāvidyo nimajjati ।। 

avidyām api ye yuktyā sādhayanti sukhātmikām ।
te hy avidyākṛtā eva na tv ātmajñās tathākramāḥ ।। 

tattvajño vāpy atattvajño yaḥ kāladravyakarmabhiḥ ।
yathākramaṃ prayatate tasyendratvādi sidhyati ।। 

ātmajñas tv iha sarvasmād atīto vigataiṣaṇaḥ ।
ātmany eva hi santuṣṭo na karoti na cehate ।। 

na tasyārtho nabhogatyā na siddhyā na ca bhogakaiḥ ।
na prabhāveṇa no mānair nāśāmaraṇajīvitaiḥ ।। 

nityatṛptaḥ praśāntātmā vītarāgo vivāsanaḥ ।
ākāśasadṛśākāras tajjña ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

aśaṅkitopayātena duḥkhena ca sukhena ca ।
tṛpyaty apagatāsaṅgo jīvena maraṇena ca ।। 

samudrasaridāpātakramasamprāptavastunā ।
samena viṣameṇāpi tiṣṭhaty ātmānam arcayan ।। 

naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।
na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaścid arthavyapāśrayaḥ ।। 

yas tu vā bhāvitātmāpi siddhijālāni vāñchati ।
sa siddhisādhakair dravyais tāni sādhayati kramāt ।। 

sidhyatīttham idaṃ yuktyaivety ayaṃ niyateḥ kramaḥ ।
tryakṣādibhis suravarair vyarthīkartum na śakyate ।। 

svabhāva eṣa vastūnāṃ svatas siddho hi nānyataḥ ।
niyatiṃ na jahāty eva śaśāṅka iva śītatām ।। 

sarvajño api samartho api mādhavo api haro api vā ।
anyathā niyatiṃ kartuṃ na śaktaḥ kaścid eva hi ।। 

dravyakālakriyāmantraprayogānāṃ svabhāvajāḥ ।
etās tāś śaktayo rāma yad vyomagamanādikam ।। 

yathā viṣāṇi nighnanti madayanti madhūni ca ।
vamayanti ca bhuktāni madanāni phalāni ca ।। 

tathā svabhāvavaśato dravyakālakriyākramāḥ ।
niyataṃ sādhayanty āśu prayogaṃ yuktiyogajāḥ ।। 

etasmāt samatītasya yuktyā yuktasya rāghava ।
ātmajñānasya nāsty eva kartṛtā nāpy akartṛtā ।। 

dravyamantrakriyākālayuktayas sādhusiddhidāḥ ।
paramātmapadaprāptau nopakurvanti kāścana ।। 

yasyecchā vidyate kācit sa siddhiṃ sādhayaty alam ।
ātmajñānasya pūrṇatvān necchā sambhavati kvacit ।। 

sarvecchājālasaṃśāntāv ātmalābhodayo hi yaḥ ।
tadviruddhā kathaṃ tasmād icchā sañjāyate anagha ।। 

yā yodeti ca yasyecchā sa tayā yatate tathā ।
yathā kālaṃ tad āpnoti jño vāpy ajñataro api vā ।। 

vītahavyena yatitaṃ nājātecchena kiñcana ।
jātecchenāśu yatitaṃ protthito asau yathāvaneḥ ।। 

evaṃ kālakriyādravyakarmayuktisvabhāvajāḥ ।
yatheṣṭam eva sidhyanti siddhayas svāḥ kramārjitāḥ ।। 

yāḥ phalāvalayo yena samprāptās siddhināmikāḥ ।
tās tenādhigatā rāma nijāt prayatanadrumāt ।। 

mahatāṃ nityatṛptānāṃ tajjñānāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।
īpsitāntaṃ prayātānāṃ nopakurvanti siddhayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ayaṃ me saṃśayo brahman vītahavyasya sā tanuḥ ।
kravyādair na kathaṃ bhuktā kathaṃ klinnā na bhūtale ।। 

tadaiva vītahavyo asau kathaṃ ca na gataḥ prabho ।
videhamuktatāṃ śīghraṃ yathāvad iti me vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yā saṃvid valitā sādho vāsanāmalatantunā ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśādāhabhāginī bhavatīha sā ।। 

nirmuktavāsanā śuddhasaṃvinmātramayī tu yā ।
tanus tiṣṭhati tacchede śaktā neha hi kecana ।। 

śṛṇu yuktyā yayā yogitanuś chedādibhir bhramaiḥ ।
nākramyate mahābāho bahuvarṣaśatair api ।। 

cetaḥ padārthe patati yasmin yasmin yadā yadā ।
tanmayaṃ tad bhavaty āśu tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadā tadā ।। 

tathā dṛṣṭāri hi mano vikāram upagacchati ।
dṛṣṭamitraṃ ca hṛdyatvaṃ svayam evābhipadyate ।। 

rāgadveṣavihīne tu pathike pādape girau ।
bhavaty arāgavidveṣaṃ svayam ity anubhūyate ।। 

mṛṣṭe laulyam upādatte durbhojye yāti naspṛhām ।
vairasyaṃ yāti kaṭuni svayam ity anubhūyate ।। 

samasaṃvidvilāsāḍhye yad yadā yogidehake ।
hiṃsraṃ cetaḥ pataty āśu samatām eti tat tadā ।। 

samaṃ sadbhāvamuktatvāc chedādau na pravartate ।
pāntho vyarthaṃ pathi grāme yathā grāmīṇakarmaṇi ।। 

yogidehasamīpāt tu gatvā prāpnoti hiṃsratām ।
yad yad bhavati tatrāśu tathārūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

iti hiṃsrair mṛgavyāghrasiṃhakīṭasarīsṛpaiḥ ।
na cchinnā vītahavyasya tanur bhūtalaśāyinī ।। 

sarvatra vidyate saṃvit kāṣṭhaloṣṭopalādike ।
sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa saṃsthitā bālamūkavat ।। 

poplūyamānā taralā kevalaṃ paridṛśyate ।
tanvī puryaṣṭakeṣv eva pratibimbaṃ jaleṣv iva ।। 

tena bhūjalavāyvagnisaṃvittyā samarūpayā ।
na vikāraṃ tanur nītā vītahavyasya rāghava ।। 

anyac ca śṛṇu he rāma spando nāśasya kāraṇam ।
vikārasya ca cittottho vātajo vā jagatsthitau ।। 

prāṇānāṃ prāṇatā spandāt tacchāntau te dṛṣatsamāḥ ।
yatas sthitā dhāraṇayā tenānaṣṭāsya sā tanuḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ spandaś cetaso vātajo atha vā ।
na yasya vidyate tasya dūrasthau vikṛtikṣayau ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śānte spande tattvavidāṃ vara ।
dhātavas saṃsthitiṃ dehe na tyajanti kadācana ।। 

saṃśānte dehagehasthe praspande cittavātayoḥ ।
dhātavo mairavaṃ sthairyaṃ yānti saṃstambhitātmakāḥ ।। 

tathā ca dṛśyate loke spandaśāntau dṛḍhā sthitiḥ ।
dārūṇām iva dhīrāṇāṃ sarvāṅgānām acopatām ।। 

iti varṣasahasrāṇi dehā jagati yoginām ।
na klidyanti na bhidyante abhagnavajralavā iva ।। 

tadaiva vītahavyo asau śṛṇu kiṃ nopaśāntavān ।
deham utsṛjya tattvajño jñātajñeyatayā paraḥ ।। 

ye hi vijñātavijñeyā vītarāgā mahādhiyaḥ ।
vicchinnagranthayas sarve te svatantrās tanau sthitāḥ ।। 

evaṃ vāpi ca karmāṇi prāktanāny aihikāni vā ।
vāsanā vā na teṣāṃ tac ceto niyamayanty alam ।। 

tena tattvavidāṃ tāta kākatālīyavan manaḥ ।
yad yad bhāvayati kṣipraṃ tat tad āśu karoty alam ।। 

kākatālīyayogena vītahavyasya saṃvidā ।
sāmprataṃ jīvitaṃ buddhaṃ tad evāśu sthirīkṛtam ।। 

yadā tu tasya pratibhā videhonmukhatāṃ gatā ।
tadā videhamukto abhūd asau svātantryasaṃsthitiḥ ।। 

vigatavāsanam āśu vipāśatām upagataṃ mana ātmatayoditam ।
yad abhivāñchati tad bhavati kṣaṇāt sakalaśaktimayo hi maheśvaraḥ ।। 

siddhilābhavicāropadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yadā hy astaṅgataprāyaṃ jātaṃ cittaṃ vicārataḥ ।
tadāsya vītahavyasya jātā maitryādayo guṇāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

vivekābhyudayāc cittasvarūpe antarhite mune ।
maitryādayo guṇā jātā ity uktaṃ kiṃ tvayā prabho ।। 

brahmann astaṅgate citte kasya maitryādayo guṇāḥ ।
kva vā parisphurantīti vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dvividhaś cittanāśo asti sarūpo arūpa eva ca ।
jīvanmuktas sarūpas syād arūpo adehamuktajaḥ ।। 

cittasatteha duḥkhāya cittanāśas sukhāya ca ।
cittasattāṃ kṣayaṃ nītvā cittanāśam upārjayet ।। 

tāmasair vāsanājālair vyāptaṃ yaj janmakāraṇam ।
vidyamānaṃ mano viddhi tad duḥkhāyaiva kevalam ।। 

prākṛtaṃ guṇasambhāraṃ mameti bahu manyate ।
yat tu cittam atattvajñaṃ duḥkhi taj jīva ucyate ।। 

vidyamānaṃ mano yāvat tāvad duḥkham anantakam ।
manasy astaṅgate jantos saṃsāro antam upāgataḥ ।। 

duḥkhi mūḍham avaṣṭabdham asmīty eva viniścayam ।
vidyamānaṃ mano viddhi duḥkhavṛkṣanavāṅkuram ।। 

rāmaḥ

naṣṭaṃ kasya mano brahman naṣṭaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet ।
kīdṛśaś cāsya nāśas syāt syāt sattā cāsya kīdṛśī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cetasaḥ kathitā sattā mayā raghukulodvaha ।
asya nāśam idānīṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu praśnavidāṃ vara ।। 

sukhaduḥkhadaśā dhīraṃ sāmyān na proddharanti yam ।
niśśvāsā iva śailendraṃ cittaṃ tasya mṛtaṃ viduḥ ।। 

ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ nāham iti cintā narottamam ।
kharvīkaroti yaṃ nāntaś cittaṃ tasya mṛtaṃ viduḥ ।। 

eṣa sādho manonāśo naṣṭaṃ cedṛṅ mano bhavet ।
cittanāśadaśā caiṣā jīvanmuktasya vidyate ।। 

manastāṃ mūḍhatāṃ viddhi yadā naśyati sānagha ।
cittanāśābhidhānaṃ hi tadā sattvam udety alam ।। 

tasya sattvavilāsasya cittanāśasya rāghava ।
jīvanmuktasvabhāvasya kaiścic cittvābhidhā kṛtā ।। 

maitryādibhir guṇair yuktaṃ bhavaty uttamavāsanam ।
bhūyojanmavinirmuktaṃ jīvanmuktaṃ mano anagha ।। 

vyāptaṃ vāsanayā yat syād bhūyojananamuktayā ।
jīvanmuktamano asaktaṃ rāma tat sattvam ucyate ।। 

sampraty evānubhūtatvāt sattvāptyā tattvasaṃyutaḥ ।
sarūpo asau manonāśo jīvanmuktasya vidyate ।। 

maitrī dayātha muditā śaśāṅka iva dīptayaḥ ।
jīvanmuktamanonāśe sarvathā sarvadā sthitāḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktamanonāśe sattvanāmni himācale ।
vasanta iva mañjaryas sphuranti guṇasampadaḥ ।। 

arūpas tu manonāśo yo mayokto raghūdvaha ।
videhamuktāv evāsau vidyate niṣkalātmakaḥ ।। 

samagrāgryaguṇādhāram api sattvaṃ pralīyate ।
videhamuktau vimale pade paramapāvane ।। 

videhamuktaviṣaye tasmin sattvakṣayātmake ।
cittanāśe virūpākhye na kiñcid api vidyate ।। 

na guṇā nāguṇās tatra na śrīr nāśrīr na lolatā ।
na codayo nāstamayo na harṣāmarṣasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

na tejo na tamaḥ kiñcin na sandhyādinarātrayaḥ ।
na diśo daśa nākāśaṃ nārtho nānartharūpatā ।। 

na vāsanā na racanā nehānīhe na rañjanā ।
na sattā nāpi vāsattā na madhyaṃ vāpi tat padam ।। 

atamastejasā vyomnā vitārendvarkavārmucā ।
tat samaṃ śaradacchena visandhyenārajastviṣā ।। 

ye hi pāraṃ gatā buddhes saṃsārāḍambarasya ca ।
teṣāṃ tad āspadaṃ sphāraṃ pavanānām ivāmbaram ।। 

saṃśāntaduḥkham ajaḍātmakam ekasuptam ānandamantharam apetarajastamo'rkam ।
ākāśakośatanavo atanavo mahāntas tasmin pade galitacittalavā vasanti ।। 

cittavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvinavatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

paramākāśakośādrirūḍhaṃ lokāntaradrumam ।
tārakāpuṣpaśabalaṃ devāsuravihaṅgamam ।। 

vidyunmañjaritopāntanīlanīradapallavam ।
sarvarturamyaṃ candrārkagaṇaramyaṃ kacattaṭam ।। 

saptābdhivāpīvalitaṃ saricchatanirantaram ।
caturdaśavidhānantabhūtajātopajīvitam ।। 

jagatkānanam ākramya sthitāyāḥ kṛtajālakam ।
brahman saṃsṛtimṛdvīkālatāyā vitatākṛteḥ ।। 

jarāmaraṇaparyāyaduḥkhaduḥkhaphalāvaleḥ ।
prarūḍhamūlamālāyā mohasekajalāñjaleḥ ।। 

kiṃ bījam atha bījasya tasya kiṃ bījam ucyate ।
atha tasyāpi kiṃ bījaṃ bījaṃ tasyāpi kiṃ bhavet ।। 

sarvam etat samāsena punar bodhābhivṛddhaye ।
siddhaye jñānasārasya vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

antarlīnaghanārambhaśubhāśubhamahāṅkuram ।
saṃsṛtivratater bījaṃ śarīraṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

śākhāpratānagahanā phalapallavalāsinī ।
teneyaṃ bhavati sphītā śaradīva vasundharā ।। 

bhāvābhāvadaśākośaṃ duḥkharatnasamudgakam ।
bījam asya śarīrasya cittam āśāvaśānugam ।। 

cittād idam udety uccais sac cāsac cāṅgajālakam ।
tathā caitat svayaṃ svapnasambhrameṣv anubhūyate ।। 

yathā gandharvasaṅkalpāt puram evaṃ hi cetasaḥ ।
savātāyanam ākārabhāsuraṃ jāyate vapuḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi jāgataṃ dṛśyatāṃ gatam ।
rūpaṃ tac cetasas sphāraṃ ghaṭāditvaṃ mṛdo yathā ।। 

dve bīje cittavṛkṣasya vṛttivratatidhāriṇaḥ ।
ekaṃ prāṇaparispando dvitīyaṃ dṛḍhabhāvanā ।। 

yadā praspandate prāṇo nāḍīsaṃsparśanodyataḥ ।
tadā saṃvedanamayaṃ cittam āśu prajāyate ।। 

yadā na spandate prāṇas sirāsaraṇikoṭare ।
asaṃvittivaśāt tena cittam antar na jāyate ।। 

prāṇaspandanam evedaṃ cittadvāreṇa dṛśyate ।
jagattām āgataṃ vyomni nīlatvādīva dṛgdṛśā ।। 

prāṇapraspandanaṃ puṃstā tacchāntiś śāntir ucyate ।
prāṇapraspandanāt saṃvid vāti vīṭeva coditā ।। 

saṃvit sphurati deheṣu prāṇaspandaprabodhitā ।
cakrāvartair aṅganeṣu vīṭeva karatāḍitā ।। 

satī sarvagatā saṃvit prāṇaspandena bodhyate ।
sūkṣmāt sūkṣmatarākārā gandhalekheva vāyunā ।। 

saṃvitsaṃrodhanaṃ śreyaḥ paramaṃ viddhi rāghava ।
kāraṇaṃ samatāyās tat kṣobhas tatra na vidyate ।। 

saṃvit samuditaivāśu yāti saṃvedyam ādarāt ।
saṃvedanād anantāni tato duḥkhāni cetasaḥ ।। 

suptā punar abodhāya saṃvit santiṣṭhate yadā ।
labdhaṃ bhavati labdhavyaṃ tadā tad amalaṃ padam ।। 

tasmāt prāṇaparispandair vāsanācodanais tathā ।
no cet saṃvidam ucchūnāṃ karoṣi tad ajo bhavān ।। 

saṃviducchūnatā cittaṃ viddhi tenedam ātatam ।
anarthajālam ālūnaviśīrṇajanajīvakam ।। 

yoginaś cittaśāntyarthaṃ kurvanti prāṇarodhanam ।
prāṇāyāmais tathā dhyānaiḥ prayogair yuktikalpitaiḥ ।। 

cittopaśāntiphaladaṃ paramaṃ sāmyakāraṇam ।
subhagaṃ saṃvidas svāsthyaṃ prāṇasaṃrodhanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

jñānavadbhiḥ prakaṭitām anubhūtāṃ ca rāghava ।
cittasyotpattim aparāṃ vāsanāta imāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvanayā tyaktapūrvāparavicāraṇam ।
yad ādānaṃ padārthasya vāsanā sā prakīrtitā ।। 

bhāvitaṃ tīvrasaṃvegād ātmanā yat tad eva saḥ ।
bhavaty āśu mahābāho vigatetarasaṃsmṛtiḥ ।। 

tādṛgrūpo hi puruṣo vāsanāvivaśīkṛtaḥ ।
yat paśyati tad etat tat sadvastv iti vimuhyati ।। 

vāsanāveśavaivaśyāt svarūpaṃ prajahāti tam ।
bhramaṃ paśyati durdṛṣṭis sarvaṃ madavaśād iva ।। 

asamyagjñānavān eva bhavaty ādhipariplutaḥ ।
antassthayā vāsanayā viṣūcyeva vaśīkṛtaḥ ।। 

asamyagdarśanaṃ yat syād yad anātmātmabhāvanam ।
yad avastuni vastutvaṃ tac cittaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

dṛḍhābhyāsapadārthaikabhāvanād aticañcalam ।
cittaṃ sañjāyate janmajarāmaraṇakāraṇam ।। 

yadā na vāsyate kiñcid dheyopādeyarūpi yat ।
sthīyate sakalaṃ tyaktvā tadā cittaṃ na jāyate ।। 

avāsanatvāt satataṃ yadā na manute manaḥ ।
amanastā tadodeti paramopaśamapradā ।। 

yadā kiñcin na saṃvittau sphuraty abhram ivāmbare ।
tadā padma ivākāśe cittam antar na jāyate ।। 

yadā na bhāvyate bhāvaḥ kvacij jagati vastuni ।
tadā hṛdambare śūnye cittarakṣo na jāyate ।। 

etāvanmātrakaṃ manye rūpaṃ cittasya rāghava ।
yad bhāvanaṃ vastuno antā rāgeṇa ca rasena ca ।। 

na kāñcit kalanāyogyāṃ dṛśaṃ bhāvayatas svataḥ ।
ākāśakośasvacchasya kutaś cittodayo bhavet ।। 

yad abhāvanam āsthāyā yad abhāvasya bhāvanam ।
yad yathāvastudarśitvaṃ tad acittatvam ucyate ।। 

sarvam antaḥ parityajya śītalāśayavarti yat ।
vṛttistham api tac cittam asadrūpam udāhṛtam ।। 

vāsanāyāṃ rasādānād rāgo yasya na vidyate ।
tasya cittam acittatvaṃ gataṃ sattvaṃ tad ucyate ।। 

na vāsanā ghanā yasya punarjananakāriṇī ।
jīvanmuktas sa sattvasthaś cakrabhramavad āsthitaḥ ।। 

bhṛṣṭabījopamā yeṣāṃ punarjananavarjitā ।
vāsanā rasanirhīnā jīvanmuktā hi te smṛtāḥ ।। 

sattvarūpapariprāptacittās te jñānapāragāḥ ।
acittā iti kathyante dehānte vyomarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

dve bīje rāma cittasya prāṇaspandanavāsane ।
ekasmiṃś ca tayoḥ kṣīṇe kṣipraṃ dve api naśyataḥ ।। 

mithaḥ kāraṇam ete hi bīje janmani cetasaḥ ।
jalāṅgīkaraṇe rāma jalāśayaghanāv iva ।। 

bījāṅkuravad ete hi sthite ca tilatailavat ।
avinābhāvinī nityaṃ kālāpekṣakrame tathā ।। 

sārdham utpādayete tu cittakaṃ saṃvidātmakam ।
yathā ghrāṇendriyānandam āmodapavanāv ubhau ।। 

cittasyotpādake sārdhaṃ tathaite vā same tadā ।
āmodapuṣpavat tailatilavac ca vyavasthite ।। 

vāsanāvaśataḥ prāṇaspandas tena ca vāsanā ।
jāyate cittabījasya tena bījāṅkurakramaḥ ।। 

vāsanotplūyamānatvāt saṃvit prakṣobhakarmaṇā ।
prāṇaspandaṃ bodhayati tena cittaṃ prajāyate ।। 

prāṇas spandanadharmitvāt spandate spṛṣṭahṛdguhaḥ ।
saṃvidaṃ bodhayaṃs tena cittabālaḥ prajāyate ।। 

evaṃ hi vāsanāprāṇaspandau cittasya kāraṇam ।
tayor ekakṣaye nāśo dvayoś cittasya cānagha ।। 

sukhaduḥkhamahāskandhaṃ śarīrakamahāphalam ।
kāryapallavitākāraṃ vṛttivratativeṣṭitam ।। 

tṛṣṇākṛṣṇāhivalitaṃ rāgarogabakālayam ।
ajñānamūlaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ līnendriyavihaṅgamam ।। 

vāsanākṣayanāmaitaṃ cittavṛkṣaṃ kṣaṇena hi ।
prapātayati vātaughaḥ kālapakvaṃ phalaṃ yathā ।। 

pāṇḍurīkṛtasarvāśaṃ sthagitākhiladarśanam ।
vilolajaladākāram ajñānāvakarotthitam ।। 

tṛṣṇātṛṇalavaprāptaṃ stambhākṛtiśarīrakam ।
sphurattanutanukṣubdhaṃ lubdham utplavanaṃ prati ।। 

antassthitamahālokam apaśyat pravilīyate ।
pavanaspandarodhāc ca rāma cittarajaḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

vāsanāprāṇapavanaspandayor anayos tayoḥ ।
saṃvedyaṃ bījam ity uktaṃ sphuratas tau yatas tataḥ ।। 

hṛdi saṃvedyagardhena prāṇaspando atha vāsanā ।
udeti tasmāt saṃvedyaṃ kathitaṃ bījam etayoḥ ।। 

saṃvedyasamparityāgāt prāṇaspandanavāsane ।
samūlaṃ naśyataḥ kṣipraṃ mūlacchedād iva drumau ।। 

saṃvidaṃ viddhi saṃvedyabījaṃ vīra tayā vinā ।
na sambhavati saṃvedyaṃ tailahīnas tilo yathā ।। 

na bahir nāntare kiñcit saṃvedyaṃ vidyate pṛthak ।
saṃvit sphurantī saṅkalpya saṃvedyaṃ sphurati svataḥ ।। 

svapne yathātmamaraṇaṃ tathā deśāntarasthitiḥ ।
svacamatkārayogena saṃvedyaṃ saṃvidas tathā ।। 

saṃvedanaṃ svasaṅkalpāt saṃvido yat pravartate ।
jagajjālakatāṃ yāti tad idaṃ raghunandana ।। 

yathā bālasya vetālas svasaṅkalpodbhavo bhavet ।
puruṣatvaṃ yathā sthāṇos saṃvedyaṃ saṃvidas tathā ।। 

etan mithyā vidur jñānaṃ samyagjñānād vilīyate ।
rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatvaṃ dvīndutvaṃ svīkṣitād iva ।। 

śuddhaiva saṃvit trijagat saṃvedyaṃ nānyad asty alam ।
ity antar niścayo rūḍhas samyagjñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā yad asyāḥ pratibhāsate ।
saṃvidas tat prayatnena mārjanīyaṃ vijānatā ।। 

tadamārjanamātraṃ hi mahāsaṃsāratāṃ gatam ।
tatpramārjanamātraṃ tu mokṣa ity abhidhīyate ।। 

saṃvedanam anantāya duḥkhāya jananātmane ।
asaṃvittir ajāḍyasthā sukhāyājananātmane ।। 

ajaḍo galitānandas tyaktasaṃvedano bhava ।
asaṃvedyaḥ prabuddhātmā yas tvaṃ sa tvaṃ raghūdvaha ।। 

rāmaḥ

ajaḍaś cāpy asaṃvittiḥ kīdṛśo bhavati prabho ।
asaṃvittau ca jāḍyaṃ tat kathaṃ vā vinivāryate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yas sarvatrānavasthāstho viśrāntāstho na kutracit ।
jīvo na vindate kiñcid asaṃvid ajaḍo hi saḥ ।। 

saṃvidvastudaśālambas sa yasyeha na vidyate ।
so asaṃvid ajaḍaḥ proktaḥ kurvan kāryaśatāny api ।। 

saṃvedyena hṛdākāśo manāg api na lipyate ।
yasyāsāv ajaḍo asaṃvij jīvanmuktaś ca kathyate ।। 

yadā na bhāvyate kiñcin nirvāsanatayātmani ।
bālamūkādivijñānam iva ca sthīyate sthiram ।। 

tadā jāḍyavinirmuktam asaṃvedanam ātatam ।
āśritaṃ bhavati prājña yasmād bhūyo na lipyate ।। 

samastavāsanātyāgān nirvikalpasamādhitaḥ ।
nīlatvam iva khāt sphāra ānandas sampravartate ।। 

yoginas tatra līnasya nissaṃvedanasaṃvidaḥ ।
tanmayatvād anādyantaṃ tad apy antar vilīyate ।। 

gacchaṃs tiṣṭhan spṛśañ jighrann api tena sa ucyate ।
ajaḍo galitānandas tyaktasaṃvedanas sukhī ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya kaṣṭayā naṣṭaceṣṭayā ।
tara duḥkhāmbudheḥ pāram apāraguṇasāgaraḥ ।। 

yathā bījād bṛhadvṛkṣo vyoma vyāpnoti kālataḥ ।
tathaivedaṃ svasaṅkalpāt saṃvedyaṃ saṃvidutthitam ।। 

yadā saṅkalpya saṅkalpaṃ saṃvit saṃvindate vapuḥ ।
tadāsya janmajālasya saiva gacchati bījatām ।। 

janayitvātmanātmānaṃ mohayitvā punaḥ punaḥ ।
svayaṃ mokṣaṃ nayaty ante saṃvit sarvatra rāghava ।। 

yad eva bhāvayaty eṣā tad eva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
naṭavad bhūmikāṃ tyaktvā svam āyāti cirād vapuḥ ।। 

devo nāgo asuro yakṣo rakṣaḥ puṅkinnaro gajaḥ ।
ātmaivāsyā vilāsinyā jagannaṭyāḥ pranṛtyati ।। 

baddhvātmānaṃ ruditvā ca kośakāraḥ krimir yathā ।
cirāt kevalatām eti svayaṃ saṃvit svabhāvataḥ ।। 

jagajjaladhijālānāṃ saṃvij jalam alaṃ tathā ।
yathaivāpūrya dikcakraṃ sphuraty adryāditāṃ gatā ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
ity asyā vīcayaḥ proktās saṃvitsalilasantateḥ ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dvitīyā nāsti kalpanā ।
ity eva samyagjñānena saṃvid gacchati nānyatām ।। 

yadā na vindate kiñcit spandate na na copati ।
svātmany eva sthitiṃ yāti saṃvin nālipyate tadā ।। 

athāsyās saṃvido rāma sanmātraṃ bījam ucyate ।
sattvamātrād udety eṣā prākāśyam iva tejasaḥ ।। 

dve rūpe tatra sattāyā ekaṃ nānākṛti sthitam ।
dvitīyam ekarūpaṃ tu vibhāgo ayaṃ tayoś śṛṇu ।। 

ghaṭatā paṭatā tattā tvattā matteti kathyate ।
sattārūpaṃ vibhāgena yat tu nānākṛti sthitam ।। 

vibhāgaṃ tu parityajya sattaikātmatayā tatam ।
sāmānyenaiva sattāyā rūpam ekam udāhṛtam ।। 

viśeṣaṃ samparityajya sanmātraṃ yad alepakam ।
ekarūpaṃ mahārūpaṃ sattāyās tat paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

rūpaṃ nānākṛtitvena sattāyā na kadācana ।
asaṃvedyaṃ sambhavati tasmād etad avastukam ।। 

ekarūpaṃ tu yad rūpaṃ sattāyā vimalātmakam ।
na kadācana tad yāti nāśaṃ nāpi ca vismṛtim ।। 

kālasattā kalāsattā vastusatteyam ity api ।
vibhāgakalanāṃ tyaktvā sanmātraikaparo bhava ।। 

kālasattā khasattā ca pronmuktakalanā satī ।
yady apy uttamasadrūpā tathāpy eṣā na vāstavī ।। 

vibhāgakalanā yatra vibhinnamatadāyinī ।
nānātākāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭā tat kathaṃ pāvanaṃ bhavet ।। 

sattāsāmānyam evaikaṃ bhāvayan kevalaṃ vapuḥ ।
paripūrṇaḥ parānandī tiṣṭhābharitadigbharaḥ ।। 

sattāsāmānyamātrasya yā koṭiḥ kovideśvara ।
saivāsya bījatāṃ yātā tata eṣa pravartate ।। 

sattāsāmānyaparyantaṃ yat tat kalanayojjhitam ।
padam ādyam anādyantaṃ tasya bījaṃ na vidyate ।। 

saṃvil layaṃ yāti tatra nirvikāraṃ ca tiṣṭhati ।
bhūyo nāvartate duḥkhe tatra labdhavatī padam ।। 

tad dhetus sarvahetūnāṃ tasya hetur na vidyate ।
sa sāras sarvasārāṇāṃ tasmāt sāro na vidyate ।। 

tasmiṃś ciddarpaṇe sphāre samagrā vastudṛṣṭayaḥ ।
imās tāḥ pratibimbanti sarasīva taṭadrumāḥ ।। 

sarve bhāvā ime tatra svadante svādadhāriṇi ।
ṣaḍrasā iva jihvāyāṃ prakaṭatvaṃ prayānti ca ।। 

tat khād acchatarasyāpi cidākāśasya vai padam ।
sarveṣāṃ svādajātānām alam āsvādanaṃ ca tat ।। 

jāyate vartate caiva vardhate dṛśyate tathā ।
santiṣṭhate vigalati tatrāṅga jagatāṃ gaṇaḥ ।। 

tat tad guru gariṣṭhānāṃ tat tal laghu laghīyasām ।
tat tat sthūlaṃ sthaviṣṭhānām aṇīyas tad aṇīyasām ।। 

daviṣṭhānāṃ daviṣṭhaṃ tad antikānāṃ tad antikam ।
kaniṣṭhānāṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ taj jyeṣṭhaṃ taj jyāyasām api ।। 

tejasām api tat tejas tamasām api tat tamaḥ ।
vastūnām api tad vastu dṛśām apy aṅga dṛk parā ।। 

tat tat kiñcin nakiñcic ca tat tad asti ca nāsti ca ।
tat tad dṛśyaṃ adṛśyaṃ ca tat tad asmi na cāsmi ca ।। 

rāma sarvaprayatnena tasmin paramapāvane ।
pade sthitim upāyāsi yathā kuru tathānagha ।। 

tad amalam ajaraṃ tad ātmatattvaṃ tadavagatāv upaśāntim eti cetaḥ ।
avagatavitataikatatsvarūpo bhava bhavamukta sadoditaś cirāya ।। 

saṃsṛtibījavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

trinavatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

etāni tāni proktāni tvayā bījāni mānada ।
katamasya prayogeṇa śīghraṃ tat prāpyate padam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eteṣāṃ duḥkhabījānāṃ proktaṃ yad yan mayottaram ।
tasya tasya prayogeṇa śīghram āsādyate padam ।। 

sattāsāmānyakoṭisthe jhagity eva pade yadi ।
pauruṣeṇa prayatnena balāt santyajya vāsanāḥ ।। 

sthitiṃ badhnāsi tattvajña kṣaṇam apy akṣayātmikām ।
kṣaṇe asminn eva tat sādhu padam āsādayasy alam ।। 

sattāsāmānyarūpe vā karoṣi sthitim aṅga cet ।
tat kiñcidadhikeneha yatnenāpnoṣi tat padam ।। 

saṃvittattve kṛtajñāno yadi tiṣṭhasi vānagha ।
tad yatnenādhikenoccair āsādayasi tat padam ।। 

saṃvedye kevale dhyānaṃ na sambhavati rāghava ।
sarvatra sambhavād asyās saṃvitter eva sarvadā ।। 

yac cintayasi yad yāsi yat tiṣṭhasi karoṣi vā ।
tatra tatra sthitā saṃvit saṃvid eva tad eva vā ।। 

vāsanāsamparityāge yadi yatnaṃ karoṣi vā ।
tat te śithilatāṃ yānti sarvādhivyādhayaḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

pūrvebhyas tu prayatnebhyo viṣamo ayaṃ hi saṃsmṛtaḥ ।
dussādho vāsanātyāgas sumerūnmūlanād api ।। 

yāvad vilīnaṃ na mano na tāvad vāsanākṣayaḥ ।। 

tattvajñānaṃ manonāśo vāsanākṣaya eva ca ।
mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatvā dussādhāni sthitāny ataḥ ।। 

tasmād rāghava yatnena pauruṣeṇa vivekinā ।
bhogecchāṃ dūratas tyaktvā trayam etat samāśrayet ।। 

sarva ete samaṃ yāvan na svabhyastā muhur muhuḥ ।
tāvan na padasamprāptir bhavaty api samāśataiḥ ।। 

vāsanākṣayavijñānamanonāśā mahāmateḥ ।
samakālaṃ cirābhyastā bhavanti phaladā muneḥ ।। 

ekaikaśo niṣevyante yady ete ciram apy alam ।
tan na siddhiṃ prayacchanti mantrāś śakalitā iva ।। 

cirakālopacaritā apy ete sudhiyo api ca ।
ekaśaḥ param abhyetuṃ na śaktās sainikā iva ।। 

samam udyogam ānītās santa ete hi dhīmatā ।
samsārāriṃ nikṛntanti mūlād api bhaṭā iva ।। 

vāsanākṣayavijñānamanonāśāḥ prayatnataḥ ।
samaṃ sevyās tava ciraṃ tena tāta na tapyase ।। 

tribhir ebhiś cirābhyastair hṛdayagranthayo dṛḍhāḥ ।
niśśeṣam eva truṭyanti bisacchedād guṇā iva ।। 

janmāntaraśatābhyastā rāma saṃsārasaṃsthitiḥ ।
sā cirābhyāsayogena vinā na kṣīyate kvacit ।। 

gacchañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighraṃs tiṣṭhañ jāgrat svapan sadā ।
śreyase paramāyāsya trayasyābhyāsavān bhava ।। 

vāsanāsamparityāgasamaṃ prāṇanirodhanaṃ ।
vidus tattvavidas tasmāt tad apy evaṃ samāharet ।। 

vāsanāsamparityāgāc cittaṃ gacchaty acittatām ।
prāṇaspandanirodhāc ca yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

prāṇāyāmadṛḍhābhyāsair yuktyā ca gurudattayā ।
āsanāsanayogena prāṇaspando nirudhyate ।। 

samyagjñānavilāsena jagadvastuṣv anāsthayā ।
yathābhūtārthadarśitvād vāsanā na pravartate ।। 

adāv ante ca vastūnām avisaṃvādi yat sthiram ।
rūpaṃ taddarśanaṃ jñānaṃ kṣīyate tena vāsanā ।। 

nissaṅgaṃ vyavahāritvād bhavabhāvanavarjanāt ।
śarīre nāśadarśitvād vāsanā na pravartate ।। 

saṃśānte pavanaspande yathā pāṃsur nabhastale ।
vāsanāvibhave naṣṭe na cittaṃ sampravartate ।। 

yaḥ prāṇapavanaspandaś cittaspandas sa eva hi ।
tasmāj jaganti jāyante pāṃsavo avakarād iva ।। 

prāṇaspandajayo yatnaḥ kartavyo dhīmatoccakaiḥ ।
upaviśyopaviśyaikacittakena muhur muhuḥ ।। 

atha vainaṃ kramaṃ tyaktvā cittākramaṇam eva cet ।
rocate te tad āpnoṣi kālena bahunā padam ।। 

na śakyate mano jetuṃ vinā yuktim anindita ।
aṅkuśena vinā mattaṃ yathā duṣṭamataṅgajam ।। 

adhyātmavidyādhigamas sādhusaṅgama eva ca ।
vāsanāsamparityāgaḥ prāṇaspandanirodhanam ।। 

etās tā yuktayaḥ puṣṭās santi cittajaye kila ।
yābhis taj jīyate kṣipraṃ dhārābhir iva bhūrajaḥ ।। 

satīṣu yuktiṣv etāsu haṭhān niyamayanti ye ।
cetas te dīpam utsṛjya vinighnanti tamo añjanaiḥ ।। 

vimūḍhāḥ kartum udyuktā ye haṭhāc cetaso jayam ।
te nibadhnanti nāgendram unmattaṃ bisatantubhiḥ ।। 

ciraṃ cittasya mādūraṃ saṃsthitaṃ svaśarīrakam ।
śodhayanti samutsṛjya yuktiṃ ye tān hatān viduḥ ।। 

bhayād bhayam upāyānti kleśāt kleśaṃ vrajanti te ।
nirvṛtiṃ nādhigacchanti durbhagā iva jantavaḥ ।। 

kālaṃ tīrthatapodānayajñadevārcanabhramaiḥ ।
ciram ādhiśatopetāḥ kṣapayanti mṛgā iva ।। 

bhramanti girikūṭeṣu phalapallavabhojinaḥ ।
mugdhamugdhadhiyo bhītā varākā hariṇā iva ।। 

matir ālūnaśīrṇāṅgī tadīyā pelavāṅgikā ।
na kvacid yāti viśvāsaṃ mṛgī grāmagatā yathā ।। 

kallolavalitaṃ cetas teṣāṃ jaḍajavāhṛtam ।
prohyate prapatad dūraṃ tṛṇaṃ girinadīṣv iva ।। 

ātmatattvaṃ vidhivaśāt kadācit kiñcid eva te ।
duḥkhadoṣadaśādigdhā vidanti na vidanti vā ।। 

āgamāpāyino nityā narakasvargamānuṣaiḥ ।
pātotpātakarākārā nīyante kandukā iva ।। 

tato gacchanti narakaṃ tatas svargam ihaiva vā ।
āvṛttibhir vivartante saritīva taraṅgakāḥ ।। 

tasmād etāḥ parityajya durdṛṣṭī raghunandana ।
śuddhāṃ saṃvidam āśritya vītarāgas sthiro bhava ।। 

jñānavān eva sukhabhāg jñānavān eva jīvati ।
jñānavān eva balavāṃs tasmāj jñānamayo bhava ।। 

saṃvedyavarjitam anuttamam ādyam ekaṃ saṃvitpadaṃ vikalanaṃ kalayan mahātman ।
hṛdy eva tiṣṭha kalanārahitaḥ kriyāṃ tu kurvann akartṛpadam eṣy asamoditaśrīḥ ।। 

saṃsṛtibījanirākaraṇakramopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

caturnavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

manāg api vicāreṇa cetasas svasya nigrahaḥ ।
manāg api kṛto yena tenāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam ।। 

vicārakaṇikā yeṣāṃ hṛdi sphurati pelavā ।
eṣaivābhyāsayogena prayāti śataśākhatām ।। 

kiñcitprauḍhavicāraṃ tu naraṃ vairāgyapūrvakam ।
saṃśrayanti guṇā gaurās saraḥ pūrṇam ivāṇḍajāḥ ।। 

samyagvicāriṇaṃ prājñaṃ yathābhūtāvalokinam ।
āsādayanty api sphārā nāvidyāvibhavā bhṛśam ।। 

kiṃ kurvantīha viṣayā mānasyo vṛttayas tathā ।
ādhayo vyādhayo vāpi samyagdarśanasanmateḥ ।। 

kvonnamatpavanāpūrās taḍitpiṅgalapāṭalāḥ ।
puṣkarāvartajaladā gṛhītā jālamuṣṭibhiḥ ।। 

kva nabhomadhyasaṃsthendur mugdhe maṇisamudgake ।
mugdhayāṅganayā baddho mugdhendīvaraśaṅkayā ।। 

kva kaṭaprocchaladbhṛṅgapaṭalotpalaśekharāḥ ।
mugdhastrīśvāsamadhurair maṣakair mathitā gajāḥ ।। 

kvebhamuktāphalollāsaniraṇannakhapañjarāḥ ।
siṃhās samarasaṃrabdhā hariṇaiḥ pravidāritāḥ ।। 

kva viṣollāsaniśśvāsadagdhonnatavanadrumāḥ ।
kṣudvanto ajagarāḥ kṣubdhā nigīrṇā bāladarduraiḥ ।। 

kva prāptabhūmiko dhīro jñātajñeyo vivekavān ।
ākrāntaḥ kila vikrānto viṣayendriyadasyubhiḥ ।। 

vicāradhiyam aprauḍhāṃ haranti viṣayārayaḥ ।
pracaṇḍapavanā mṛdvīṃ kṣatavṛntāṃ latām iva ।। 

na vivekabalaprauḍhāṃ bhaṅktuṃ śaktā durādhayaḥ ।
kalpakṣobhasahaṃ dhīraṃ śailaṃ mandānilā iva ।। 

agṛhītamahīpīṭhaṃ vicārakusumadrumam ।
cintāvātyā vidhunvanti na sthirasthitisusthitam ।। 

gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato api vā ।
na vicāraparaṃ ceto yasyāsau mṛta ucyate ।। 

kim idaṃ syāj jagat kiṃ syād aham ity aniśaṃ śanaiḥ ।
vicārayādhyātmadṛśā svayaṃ vā sajjanais saha ।। 

andhakārapareṇāśu vicāreṇa paraṃ padam ।
dṛśyate vimalaṃ ratnaṃ pradīpeneva bhāsvatā ।। 

jñānena sarvaduḥkhānāṃ vināśa upajāyate ।
kṛtālokavilāsena tamasām iva bhāsvatā ।। 

jñāne prakaṭatāṃ yāte jñeyaṃ svayam udety alam ।
ravāv abhyudite bhūmāv āloka iva nirmalaḥ ।। 

yena śāstravicāreṇa brahmatattvaṃ vibudhyate ।
taj jñānam ucyate jñeyād abhinnam iva saṃsthitam ।। 

vicāro adhyātmavidyānāṃ jñānam aṅga vidur budhāḥ ।
jñeyam asyāntar evāsti mādhuryaṃ payaso yathā ।। 

samyagjñānasamālokaḥ pumāñ jñeyamayas svayam ।
bhavaty āpītamaireyo madānandamayo yathā ।। 

sadasadrūpam amalaṃ jñeyaṃ brahma paraṃ viduḥ ।
jñānādhigamamātreṇa tat svayaṃ samprasīdati ।। 

jñānavān uditānando na kvacit parimajjati ।
jīvanmukto gatāsaṅgaṃ samrāḍātmaiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

jñānavān hṛdyaśabdeṣu vīṇāvaṃśaravādiṣu ।
kāminyāḥ kāmagīteṣu sambhogamaṇiteṣu ca ।। 

vasantamadamattānāṃ ṣaṭpadānāṃ svaneṣu ca ।
prāvṛṭprasarapuṣṭeṣu jaladastaniteṣu ca ।। 

uttāṇḍavaśikhaṇḍeṣu kekākalaraveṣu ca ।
raṇitāmbhojaṣaṇḍeṣu sārasakvaṇiteṣu ca ।। 

kartaryādikarānteṣu gambhīramurajeṣu ca ।
tatāvanaddhasuṣiracitravādyasvaneṣu ca ।। 

keṣucin na nibadhnāti rūkṣeṣu madhureṣu ca ।
raṇiteṣu ratiṃ rāma padmeṣv iva niśākaraḥ ।। 

jñānavān bālakadalīstambhapallavapāṇiṣu ।
candanāgurumandāralatāstabakasadmasu ।। 

kauśeyahārakundendukamalotpalabhūmiṣu ।
dravatkāñcanakānteṣu nitambastanabāhuṣu ।। 

ūruṣv anaṅgasadanahematoraṇaśobhiṣu ।
suragandharvakanyāṅgalatānandanakeliṣu ।। 

keṣucin na nibadhnāti svāyatteṣv apy asaktadhīḥ ।
rāma sparśaratiṃ dhīro haṃso marumahīṣv iva ।। 

jñānavān piṇḍakharjūrakadambapanasādiṣu ।
mṛdvīkekṣvārukākṣoṭabisajambīrajātiṣu ।। 

madirāmadhumaireyamārdvīkāsavabhūtiṣu ।
dadhikṣīraghṛtāmikṣānavanītaudaneṣu ca ।। 

ṣaḍraseṣu vicitreṣu lehyapeyavilāsiṣu ।
phaleṣv anneṣu mūleṣu śākeṣv apy āmiṣeṣu ca ।। 

keṣucin na nibadhnāti tṛptamūrtir asaktadhīḥ ।
āsvādanaratiṃ vipraś śvaśarīrapaleṣv iva ।। 

jñānavān yamacandrendrarudraviṣṇvabjajādiṣu ।
merumandarakailāsasahyadardurasānuṣu ।। 

kauśeyadalajāleṣu candrabimbaphalādiṣu ।
kalpapādapakuñjeṣu devīdolāvilāsiṣu ।। 

ratnakāñcanakuḍyeṣu maṇimuktāmayeṣu ca ।
tilottamorvaśīrambhāmenakāṅgalatāsu ca ।। 

keṣucid darśanaṃ śrīmān nābhivāñchaty asaktadhīḥ ।
paripūrṇamanā maunī mānī śatruṣv ivābalaḥ ।। 

jñānavān kundamandārakalhārakumudādiṣu ।
kamalotpalapunnāgaketakāgurujātiṣu ।। 

kadambacūtajambīrakiṃśukāśokaśākhiṣu ।
japātimuktasauvīranimbapāṭaladāmasu ।। 

candanāgurukarpūrarajomṛgamadeṣu ca ।
kaśmīrajalavaṅgailākakkolatagarādiṣu ।। 

keṣucin na nibadhnāti saugandhyaratim ekadhīḥ ।
samabuddhir avikṣobhī madhvāmodeṣv iva dvijaḥ ।। 

abdhau gulugulārāve pratiśrutkasvane girau ।
ninade ca mṛgendrāṇāṃ na kṣubhyati manāg api ।। 

mattamātaṅgabṛṃhāsu vetālavalanāsu ca ।
piśācayakṣakṣveḍāsu na manāg api kampate ।। 

aśanisvanaghoṣeṇa nagāsphoṭaraveṇa ca ।
airāvaṇaninādena sāmyadhyānān na kampate ।। 

vahatkrakacakāṣeṇa śitāsidalanena ca ।
śilāśaninipātena kampate na svarūpataḥ ।। 

nānandam ety upavane na khedam adhigacchati ।
na khedam eti maruṣu nānandam adhigacchati ।। 

pūtāṅgārasamānalpasaikateṣv aribandhuṣu ।
puṣpaprakarasañchannamṛduśādvalabhūmiṣu ।। 

kṣuradhārāsu tīkṣṇāsu śayyāsu ca navotpalaiḥ ।
unnatācaladeśeṣu kūpakośataleṣu ca ।। 

śilāsv arkāṃśutaptāsu mṛdvīṣu lalanāsu ca ।
sampatsv āpatsu cogrāsu maraṇeṣūtsaveṣu ca ।। 

viharann api nodvegaṃ nānandam adhigacchati ।
antarmuktaṃ mano nityaṃ samaṃ kṛtvaiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

ayaśśaṅkucitāṅgāsu narakāraṇyabhūmiṣu ।
paraspareritānantakuntatomaravṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

na bibheti na cādatte vaivaśyaṃ na ca dīnatām ।
samas svasthamanā maunī dhīras tiṣṭhati śailavat ।। 

apavitraṃ ca pathyaṃ ca viṣapaṅkagarādy api ।
bhuktvā jarayati kṣipraṃ klinnaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca mṛṣṭavat ।। 

nimbaprativiṣākalkakṣīrekṣusalilāndhasām ।
asaktabuddhis tattvajño bhavaty āsvādane samaḥ ।। 

maireyamadirākṣīraraktamedovasāsavaiḥ ।
tuṣāsthitṛṇakeśānnair na hṛṣyati na kupyati ।। 

jīvitasyāpi hantāraṃ dātāraṃ caikarūpayā ।
dṛśā prasādamādhuryaśālinyā paripaśyati ।। 

sthirāsthiraśarīreṣu ramyāramyeṣu vastuṣu ।
na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sadā samatayeddhayā ।। 

tyaktāsthatvād anādeyarūpatvāj jagatas sthiteḥ ।
nūnaṃ viditavedyatvān nīrāgatvāt svacetasaḥ ।। 

na kasyacin na kasyāñcid akṣasya viṣayasthitau ।
dadāti prasaraṃ sādhur ādhiprojjhitayā dhiyā ।। 

atattvajñam aviśrāntam alabdhātmānam asthiram ।
nigirantīndriyāṇy āśu hariṇā iva pallavam ।। 

uhyamānaṃ bhavāmbhodhau vāsanāvīcivellitam ।
nigirantīndriyagrāhā hāhākrandaparāyaṇam ।। 

vicārato labdhapadaṃ viśrāntadhiyam ātmani ।
na haranti vikalpaughā jalaughā iva parvatam ।। 

sarvasaṅkalpasīmānte viśrāntānāṃ pare pade ।
teṣāṃ labdhasvarūpāṇāṃ merur eva tṛṇāyate ।। 

jagaj jarattṛṇalavo viṣaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca ।
kṣaṇaḥ kalpasahasraṃ ca samatā tatacetasām ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ jagad iti matvā muditabuddhayaḥ ।
saṃvinmayatvād antassthajagatkā viharanty amī ।। 

saṃvinmātraparispande jāgate vastupañjare ।
kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iha tattvavido muneḥ ।। 

saṃvid evedam akhilaṃ bhrāntim anyāṃ tyajānagha ।
saṃvinmayavapus sphāraḥ kiṃ jahāsi kim īhase ।। 

yad etaj jāyate bhūmer bhaviṣyat pelavāṅkuraḥ ।
tat saṃvid eva prathate tathā na tv aṅkuro asti saḥ ।। 

ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne api tasya yā ।
kañcit kālalavaṃ dṛṣṭā sattāsau saṃvido bhramaḥ ।। 

iti matvā dhiyaṃ tyaktvā bhāvābhāvānupātinīm ।
nissaṅgasaṃvidbhārūpo bhava bhāvāntam āgataḥ ।। 

kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api ।
karma kurvann akurvan vā nissaṅgas san na lipyase ।। 

gatasaṅgena manasā kurvann api na lipyase ।
sukhaduḥkhair mahābāho manorathadaśāsv iva ।। 

gatasaṅgamatiḥ karma kurvann apy aṅgayaṣṭibhiḥ ।
na lipyate sukhair duḥkhair manorathakalāsv iva ।। 

gatasaṅgamanā dṛṣṭyā paśyann api na paśyati ।
etad anyasthacittatvād bālenāpy anubhūyate ।। 

gatasaṅgaṃ mano jantoḥ paśyaṃś cāpi na paśyati ।
na śṛṇoty api śṛṇvaṃś ca na spṛśaty api saṃspṛśan ।। 

na jighraty api jighraṃś ca nonmiṣaṃś conmiṣaty api ।
padārthe na pataty eva balāt pātitam apy alam ।। 

deśāntarasthacetobhir etad ātmagṛhasthitaiḥ ।
aprauḍhamatibhis sādhu murkhair apy anubhūyate ।। 

saṅgaḥ kāraṇam arthānāṃ saṅgas saṃsārakāraṇam ।
saṅgaḥ kāraṇam āśānāṃ saṅgaḥ kāraṇam āpadām ।। 

saṅgatyāgaṃ vidur mokṣaṃ saṅgatyāgād ajanmatā ।
saṅgaṃ santyajya bhāvānāṃ jīvanmukto bhavānagha ।। 

rāmaḥ

sarvasaṃśayanīhāraśaranmāruta he mune ।
saṅgaḥ kim ucyate brūhi samāsena mama prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhāvābhāve padārthānāṃ harṣāmarṣavikāradā ।
malinā vāsanā yaiṣā sa saṅga iti kathyate ।। 

jīvanmuktaśarīrāṇām apunarjanmakāriṇī ।
muktā harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ śuddhā bhavati vāsanā ।। 

tām asaṅgābhidhāṃ viddhi yāvaddehaṃ ca bhāvinīm ।
tayā yat kriyate karma tad bandhāyaiva kevalam ।। 

evaṃrūpaṃ parityajya saṅgaṃ svāṅgavikāradam ।
yadi tiṣṭhasi nirvyagraṃ kurvann api tad asy asi ।। 

harṣāmarṣavikārābhyāṃ yadi gacchasi nānyatām ।
vītarāgabhayakrodhas tad asaṅgo asi rāghava ।। 

asaṅgatām anāyāsāṃ jīvanmuktasthitiṃ sthirām ।
avalambya samas svastho vītarāgo bhavānagha ।। 

jīvanmuktamatir maunī nigṛhītendriyagrahaḥ ।
amānamadamātsarya āryas tiṣṭhati vijvaraḥ ।। 

sadā samagre api hi vastujāte samāśayo apy antar adīnasattvaḥ ।
vyāpāramātrāt sahajāt kramasthān na kiñcid apy anyad asau karoti ।। 

yad eva kiñcit prakṛtakramasthaṃ kartavyam ātmīyam asau tad eva ।
saṃsaṅgasambandhavihīnayaiva kurvann akhedo ramate dhiyāntaḥ ।। 

apy āpadaṃ prāpya susampadaṃ vā mahāmatis svaṃ prakṛtaṃ svabhāvam ।
jahāti no mandaravellito api śauklyaṃ yathā kṣīramahāmburāśiḥ ।। 

samprāpya sāmrājyam athāpadaṃ vā sarīsṛpatvaṃ suranāthatāṃ vā ।
tiṣṭhaty akhedodayam astaharṣaṃ kṣayodayeṣv indur ivaikarūpaḥ ।। 

nirastasaṃrambham apāstabhedaṃ praśāntanānāphalaphalguceṣṭaḥ ।
vicārayātmānam adīnasattvo yathā bhavasy uttamakāryaniṣṭhaḥ ।। 

tathoditaprasaravilāsaśuddhayā gatajvaraṃ padam avalokayāmalam ।
dhiyeddhayā punar iha janmabandhanair na badhyase samadhigatātmadṛg yathā ।। 

punarupadeśakaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

samāptam upaśāntiprakaraṇam

prakaraṇa nirvāṇa

upaśāntiprakaraṇād anantaram idaṃ śṛṇu ।
tvaṃ nirvāṇaprakaraṇaṃ jñātaṃ nirvāṇakāri yat ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

kathayaty evam uddāmavacanaṃ munināyake ।
śravaṇaikarase maunaṃ sthite rājakumārake ।। 

munivāgarthanikṣiptamanasy astetarakriye ।
rājaloke gataspandaṃ citrārpita iva sthite ।। 

vasiṣṭhavacasām arthaṃ vicārayati sādaram ।
lasadaṅgulibhaṅge ca munisārthe sphuradbhruvi ।। 

vismayālokanollāsaprotphullanayanālini ।
purandhrivarge pragrīvatarumañjaritāṃ gate ।। 

khe vāsaracaturbhāgadeśe dinakare sthite ।
śrutajñānatayā saumye kiñcic chamam upeyuṣi ।। 

śravaṇāyeva saṃśāntavitānaspandam āsthite ।
maunaṃ maruti mandāramadhurāmodadāyini ।। 

puṣpadāmasu suptāsu madād bhramarapaṅktiṣu ।
jñātajñeyatayā nūnaṃ samyagdhyānavatīṣv iva ।। 

jālamuktākalāpāntas tathā makurabhūmiṣu ।
kacaty apagataspandaṃ tāpe śrotum ivāsthite ।। 

gṛhāntaraṃ praviṣṭeṣu gavākṣair dūram aṃśuṣu ।
viśramārtham ivādīrghanabhaḥpāntheṣu śītalam ।। 

muktājālaprabhājālabhasmanoddhūlitātmani ।
śaṃsatīva śamaṃ śāmyaddinadehe dinātape ।। 

karalīlāsarojeṣu śekhareṣu ca bhūbhṛtām ।
śuṣyatsu rasasaṃśoṣād avṛttiṣu manassv iva ।। 

bālakeṣv ajñalokeṣu līlāpakṣiṣu sāravam ।
bhojanārthaṃ vadhūlokam uparundhatsv anāratam ।। 

bhramadbhramarapakṣotthavātādhūte rajasy alam ।
kausume pariviśrānte cāmareṣv akṣipakṣmasu ।। 

raśmiṣv agragrahonmuktacchāyājālabhayād iva ।
gavākṣādiṣv ivoḍḍīya praviṣṭeṣu gṛhāntaram ।। 

āsīd dinacaturbhāgasattāvedanatatparaḥ ।
bherīpaṇavaśaṅkhānāṃ diṅmukhāpūrako dhvaniḥ ।। 

tena tat tāram apy āśu vaco antardhānam āyayau ।
maunaṃ jaladanādena māyūra iva nissvanaḥ ।। 

cukṣubhe kṣubdhapakṣālī pañjarasthā khagāvalī ।
bhūkampena lasattālīpallaveva vanāvalī ।। 

āyayur bhayavitrastā bālā dhātrīkucāntaram ।
sāravaṃ prāvṛśīvābdāḥ pronnataṃ śṛṅgakoṭaram ।। 

uttasthur avataṃsebhyo bhūbhṛtāṃ bhramaravrajāḥ ।
dṛṣatkarālavāhābhyas saridbhyo ambukaṇā iva ।। 

evaṃ prakṣubhite tasmin gṛhe dāśarathe tadā ।
proktavāsaravṛddhatve śānte śaṅkhasvane śanaiḥ ।। 

saṃharan prastutaṃ vastu vaco madhuravṛttimat ।
uvāca muniśārdūlas sabhāmadhye raghūdvaham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāghavānagha vāgjālaṃ mayaitad yat prasāritam ।
tena cittakhagaṃ baddhvā kroḍīkṛtyātmatāṃ naya ।। 

kaccid gṛhīto bhavatā madgirām artha īdṛśaḥ ।
tyaktvā durbodham akṣīṇo haṃsenevāmbhasaḥ payaḥ ।। 

vicāryaitad aśeṣeṇa svadhiyaiva punaḥ punaḥ ।
anenaiva pathā sādho gantavyaṃ bhavatādhunā ।। 

anayaiva dhiyā rāma viharan naiva badhyase ।
anyathādhaḥ patasy āśu vindhyakhāte yathā gajaḥ ।। 

sugṛhītaṃ dhiyā rāma madvaco na karoṣi cet ।
tat patasy avaṭe tyaktadīpaḥ pāntho yathā niśi ।। 

asaṅgena yathāprāpto vyavahāras svasiddhaye ।
ity evaṃ śāstrasiddhāntam ādāyodayavān bhava ।। 

he sabhyā he mahārāja rāma lakṣmaṇa bhūmipāḥ ।
sarva eva bhavanto adya tāvad vyāpāram āhnikam ।। 

kurvantv ayaṃ hi divasaḥ prāyaḥ pariṇatākṛtiḥ ।
śeṣaṃ vicārayiṣyāmo vicāryaṃ prātar āgatāḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity ukte muninā tena sā sarvaiva sabhā tadā ।
prottasthau padmavadanā savikāseva padminī ।। 

rājānas stutarājānaḥ kṛtarāghavavandanāḥ ।
pariṣṭutavasiṣṭhās te jagmur ātmaniveśanam ।। 

viśvāmitreṇa sahito vasiṣṭho gantum āśramam ।
uttasthāv āsanāc chrīmān namaskṛtanabhaścaraḥ ।। 

daśarathaprabhṛtayo rājāno munayas tathā ।
yathānurūpaṃ vaktāram anugamya ciraṃ munim ।। 

āpṛcchya kecid gaganaṃ yayuḥ kecid vanāntaram ।
kecid rājagṛhaṃ santo bhṛṅgāḥ padmotthitā iva ।। 

vasiṣṭhapādayos tyaktvā puṣpāñjalim anābilam ।
paurair anugato rājā praviveśa gṛhāntaram ।। 

rāmalakṣmaṇaśatrughnāḥ prāptasya svāśramaṃ guroḥ ।
abhyarcya caraṇau bhaktā ājagmur nṛpamandiram ।। 

sadanāni samāsādya śrotāras sarva eva te ।
sasnur ānarcur apy āśu devān viprān pitṝṃs tathā ।। 

yathākramaṃ ca viprādyair bhṛtyāntaiś ca paricchadaiḥ ।
samaṃ bubhujire bhojyaṃ varṇadharmakramocitam ।। 

astaṅgate dinakare samaṃ divasakarmabhiḥ ।
abhyāgate rātrikare samaṃ rajanikarmabhiḥ ।। 

sthitās talpeṣu kauśeyaśayaneṣv āsaneṣu ca ।
bhūcarā munirājāno rājaputrā maharṣayaḥ ।। 

saṃsārottaraṇopāyaṃ vasiṣṭhavacaneritam ।
yathāvad ekāgradhiyaś cintayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

tataḥ praharamātreṇa nidrām āmudritānanāḥ ।
tatsvapnasundarīm īyuḥ padmā iva dinārthinaḥ ।। 

rāmalakṣmaṇaśatrughnāḥ praharatrayam eva tat ।
vāsiṣṭham upadeśaṃ te cintayām āsur akṣatam ।। 

praharasyārdhamātraṃ tu tata āmudritekṣaṇāḥ ।
tatsvapnām āyayur nidrāṃ kṣaṇād vidrāvitaśramām ।। 

iti śubhamanasāṃ vivekabhājām adhigatasāratayoditāśayānām ।
abhajata viratiṃ tadā triyāmā malinaniśākaravaktratāṃ jagāma ।। 

divasavyāpāravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvitīyas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

tataḥ khinnenduvadanā paryākulatamaḥpaṭā ।
kṣīyamāṇā babhau śyāmā vivekānteva vāsanā ।। 

pūrve dhvastatayālokād dṛśyamāno apare acale ।
śephālikāvataṃsābhāṃ tārakānikaro dadhau ।। 

avaśyāyakaṇākarṣī parāmṛṣṭendumaṇḍalaḥ ।
jyotsnākavalanālolo vavau prābhātiko anilaḥ ।। 

rāmalakṣmaṇaśatrughnā utthāyānucarais saha ।
yayur vanditasandhyās te puṇyaṃ vāsiṣṭham āśramam ।। 

tatra vanditasandhyasya nirgatasyāgnisadmanaḥ ।
muner vavandire pādāv ādau dattvārghyasantatim ।। 

kṣaṇāt tat sadanaṃ maunaṃ munibrāhmaṇarājabhiḥ ।
hastyaśvarathayānaiś ca kṣaṇān nīrandhratāṃ yayau ।। 

athāsau muniśārdūlas tayaiva saha senayā ।
gṛhaṃ dāśarathaṃ kalye rāmādyanugato yayau ।। 

tatrainaṃ pūrvasambuddhaḥ kṛtasandhyo mahīpatiḥ ।
dūram agre vinirgatya pūjayām āsa sādaram ।। 

puṣpamuktāmaṇivrātair bhūyo apy adhikabhūṣitām ।
sabhāṃ praviśya te sarve viviśur viṣṭarādiṣu ।। 

athaitasminn avasare hyastanās sarva eva te ।
śrotāras samupājagmur nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ ।। 

viveśa sā sabhā somyaṃ kṛtānyo'nyābhivādanā ।
babhau samasamābhogā śāntavāteva padminī ।। 

yathāpradeśam evāśu niviṣṭeṣu yathāsukham ।
teṣu taddeśayogyeṣu viprarṣimunirājasu ।। 

mṛduni svāgatarave śanaiś śamam upāgate ।
sabhākoṇopaviṣṭeṣu śāntaśabdeṣu vandiṣu ।। 

tvarayevoditeṣv āśu śrotum abhyāgateṣv iva ।
gavākṣād iva jāteṣu praviṣṭeṣv arkaraśmiṣu ।। 

satvaraṃ praviśacchrotṛhastasparśavaśodbhave ।
muktājālajhaṇatkāra oṅkāra iva śāmyati ।। 

kumāraś śaṅkarasyeva kaco devaguror iva ।
prahlāda iva śukrasya suparṇa iva śārṅgiṇaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhasyānane rāmaś śanair dṛṣṭim apātayat ।
bhramantīm ambare vātaḥ phullapadma ivālinīm ।। 

munis tv anujjhitenātha tenaiva raghunandanam ।
krameṇovāca vākyajño vākyaṃ vākyārthakovidam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kaccit smarasi yat proktaṃ hyo mayā raghunandana ।
vākyam atyantagurvarthaṃ paramārthāvabodhakam ।। 

idānīm avabodhārtham anyac ca ripumardana ।
ucyamānaṃ mayedaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu śāśvatasiddhaye ।। 

vairāgyābhyāsavaśatas tathā tattvāvalokanāt ।
saṃsārāt tīryate tena teṣv evābhyāsam āhara ।। 

samyak tattvāvabodhena durbodhe kṣayam āgate ।
galite vāsanāveśe viśokaṃ prāpyate padam ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnam adṛṣṭobhayakoṭikam ।
ekaṃ brahmaiva hi jagat sthitaṃ dvitvam ivāgatam ।। 

sarvabhāvānavacchinnaṃ yatra brahmaiva vidyate ।
śāntaṃ samasamābhāsaṃ tatrānyat tat kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

iti matvāham ity antar muktvā muktavapur mahān ।
ekarūpaḥ praśāntātmā maunī svātmamayo bhava ।। 

nāsti cittaṃ na cāvidyā na mano na ca jīvakaḥ ।
etāś ca kalanā rāma kṛtā brahmaṇa eva tāḥ ।। 

yās sampado yāś ca dṛśo yāś cito yāś cideṣaṇāḥ ।
brahmaiva tad anādyantam abrahmeha na vidyate ।। 

pātāle bhūtale svarge trinetrāntaṃ tṛṇādi yat ।
dṛśyate tat paraṃ brahma cidrūpaṃ nānyad asti hi ।। 

upekṣyaṃ heyam ādeyaṃ bandhavo vibhavā vapuḥ ।
brahmaiva vigatādyantam abdhivat pravijṛmbhate ।। 

yāvad ajñānakalanā yāvad abrahmavāsanā ।
yāvad āsthā jagajjāle tāvac cittādikalpanā ।। 

dehe yāvad ahambhāvo dṛśye asmin yāvad ātmatā ।
yāvan mamedam ity āsthā tāvac cittādivibhramaḥ ।। 

yāvan noditam uccaistvaṃ sajjanāsaṅgaśṛṅgataḥ ।
yāvan maurkhyaṃ na saṅkṣīṇaṃ tāvac cittādinimnatā ।। 

yāvac chithilatāṃ yātaṃ nedaṃ bhuvanabhāvanam ।
samyagdarśanaśaktyāntas tāvac cittodayas sphuṭaḥ ।। 

yāvad ajñatvam andhatvaṃ vaivaśyaṃ viṣayāśayā ।
mūrchāmohasamucchrāyas tāvac cittādikalpanā ।। 

yāvad āśāviṣāmodaḥ parisphurati hṛdvane ।
pravicāracakoro atra na tāvat praviśaty alam ।। 

bhogeṣv anāsthamanasaś śītalāmalanirvṛteḥ ।
chinnāśāpāśajālasya kṣīyate cittavibhramaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāmohaparityāgān nityaśītalasaṃvidaḥ ।
puṃsas saṃśāntacittasya prabuddhasya kva cittabhūḥ ।। 

asaṃstutam ivānāstham avastu paripaśyataḥ ।
dūrastham iva dehaṃ svam asantaṃ cittabhūḥ kutaḥ ।। 

bhāvitānantacittattvarūparūpāntarātmanaḥ ।
svāṅgāṃśalīnajagataś śānto jīvādivibhramaḥ ।। 

asamyagdarśane śānte mithyābhramabharātmani ।
udite paramāditye paramārthaikadarśane ।। 

apunardarśanāyaiva dagdhaṃ saṃśuṣkaparṇavat ।
cittaṃ vigalitaṃ viddhi vahnau ghṛtalavaṃ yathā ।। 

jīvanmuktā mahātmāno ye parāvaradarśinaḥ ।
teṣāṃ yā cittapadavī sā sattvam iti kathyate ।। 

jīvanmuktaśarīreṣu vāsanā vyavahāriṇī ।
na cittanāmnī bhavati sā hi sattvapadaṃ gatā ।। 

niścetaso hi tattvajñā nityaṃ sattvapade sthitāḥ ।
līlayā prabhramantīha sattvasaṃsthitihelayā ।। 

śāntā vyavaharanto api sattvasthās saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
nityaṃ paśyanti cijjyotir na dvaitaikye na vāsanāḥ ।। 

antarmukhatayā sarvaṃ cidvahnau trijagattṛṇam ।
juhvato antar viceṣṭante mūḍhavac chītalāśayāḥ ।। 

vivekaviśadaṃ cetas sattvam ity abhidhīyate ।
bhūyaḥ phalati no mohaṃ dagdhaṃ bījam ivāṅkuram ।। 

yā vāsanā vimūḍhāntar punarjananadharmiṇī ।
cittaśabdābhidhā soktā viparyasyati bodhataḥ ।। 

prāptaprāpyo bhavān rāma sattvabhāvam upāgatam ।
cittaṃ jñānāgninā dagdhaṃ na te bhūyaḥ prarohati ।। 

saṃrohatīṣuṇā viddhaṃ tathā paraśunāgninā ।
na hi jñānāgninirdagdhaṃ prabodhaviśadaṃ manaḥ ।। 

brahmabṛṃhaiva hi jagaj jagac ca brahmabṛṃhaṇāt ।
vidyate nānayor bhedaś cidghanabrahmaṇor iha ।। 

cidantar asti trijagan marice tiktatā yathā ।
nātaś cijjagatī bhinne tasmāt sadasatī mudhā ।। 

acinmayatvān nāsi tvaṃ khātmā kim iva rodiṣi ।
acinmayatvāj jagatām abhāve kalanāḥ kutaḥ ।। 

cinmayaś ced bhavān sarvaṃ tac cittvaṃ pravicāraya ।
śuddhasattvam anādyantaṃ tatrāṅga kalanāḥ kutaḥ ।। 

cidātmāsi niraṃśo asi pārāvāravivarjitaḥ ।
rūpaṃ smara nijaṃ sphāraṃ māsmṛtyā sammito bhava ।। 

tāṃ svasattāṃ gatas sarvam asarvaṃ vā bhavodayī ।
tādṛgrūpo asi śānto asi cid asi brahmarūpy asi ।। 

cicchilodaram evāsi nāsi nānasy athom asi ।
yo asi so asi na so asīva sad asy asad asi svabhāḥ ।। 

yaḥ padārthaviśeṣo antar na tvaṃ nānyo na so asti te ।
tad asy atad asi svacchacidghanātman namo astu te ।। 

ādyantavarjitaviśālaśilāntarālasampīnacidghanavapur gaganāmalas tvam ।
svastho bhavājaraḍhapallavakośalekhālīlāsthitākhilajagajjaladhe jayas te ।। 

viśrāntidṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tṛtīyas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhāvi bhūritaraṅgāṇāṃ payo vṛndam ivāntare ।
yā cid vahaty anantāni jaganty anagha sā bhavān ।। 

bhava bhāvanayā mukto bhāvābhāvavivarjitaḥ ।
cidātman saṃsthitāḥ kveva vada te vāsanādayaḥ ।। 

jīvo ayaṃ vāsanādīdam iti cit kacati svataḥ ।
itaroktyarthayor atra kaḥ prasaṅgo atha varṇyatām ।। 

mahātaralagambhīrabhāsurātmaṃś cidarṇava ।
rāmābhidho asi stimitas samas somyo asi somavat ।। 

yathā na bhinnam analād auṣṇyaṃ saugandhyam ambujāt ।
kārṣṇyaṃ kajjalataś śauklyaṃ himān mādhuryam ikṣutaḥ ।। 

ālokaś ca prakāśāṅgād anubhūtis tathā citeḥ ।
jalād vīciś cidātman bhoś citsvabhāvāt tathā jagat ।। 

cito na bhinno anubhavo bhinno nānubhavād aham ।
na matto bhidyate jīvo na jīvād bhidyate manaḥ ।। 

manaso nendriyaṃ bhinnaṃ pṛthag dehaś ca nendriyāt ।
na śarīrāj jagad bhinnaṃ jagato nānyad asti hi ।। 

evaṃ pravartitam iva mahācakram idaṃ ciram ।
na ca pravartitaṃ kiñcin na ca śīghraṃ ca no ciram ।। 

nānevedam anānaiva sarvam ekam akhaṇḍitam ।
vidyate vyomani vyoma nakasmiṃścin nakiñcana ।। 

śūnye śūnyaṃ samucchūnaṃ brahma brahmaṇi bṛṃhitam ।
satyaṃ vijṛmbhate satye pūrṇe pūrṇam avasthitam ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārān kurvann api na kiñcana ।
jñaḥ karoty anupādeyān upādeye hi kartṛtā ।। 

yad upādeyabuddhyāttaṃ tad duḥkhāya sukhāya vā ।
bhāvābhāvair anādeyam akartṛ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

yathā nānāpy anānaiva khaṃ khe vārīva vārgaṇaḥ ।
sārthako apy atiśūnyātmā tathātmajagatoḥ kramaḥ ।। 

antar vyomāmalo bāhye samyagācāracañcuraḥ ।
harṣāmarṣavikāreṣu kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthitiḥ ।। 

ya evātitarāṃ śatrur matsarī māraṇodyataḥ ।
tam evākṛtrimaṃ mitraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati nadīvega iva drumam ।
yas sauhṛdaṃ matsaraṃ ca sa harṣāmarṣadoṣahā ।। 

rāgadveṣavikārāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ cen na bhāvyate ।
te tu santo apy asadrūpās sevitā apy asevitāḥ ।। 

yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate ।
hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate ।। 

yan nāsti tasya sadbhāvapratipattir udāhṛtā ।
māyaiva sā parijñānād eva naśyaty asaṃśayam ।। 

nissnehadīpavac chānto yasyāntar vāsanārasaḥ ।
tena citraṃ kṛtaṃ naiva jitaṃ jñenāpi kāriṇā ।। 

yasyānupādeyam idaṃ samastaṃ padārthajātaṃ sadasaddaśāsu ।
na duḥkhadāhāya sukhāya naiva sa mukta eveha sajīva eva ।। 

brahmaikatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturthas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mano buddhir ahaṅkāra indriyādi tathānagha ।
acetyacinmayaṃ sarvaṃ kva te jīvādayas sthitāḥ ।। 

ekenaivātmanā dattā nānātā yā mahātmanā ।
viddhi tāṃ tvam anānātāṃ hemnaḥ kaṭakatām iva ।। 

yāvad ajñānasammohas tāvat saṃsāracittakam ।
ajñānasaṅkṣaye jāte kva cetyaṃ cittakaṃ ca vā ।। 

adhyātmavidyābhyasanāj jāḍyam eti kṣayaṃ tathā ।
hutāśasevanād antarjāḍyaṃ jalakṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

bhogatṛṣṇāviṣāveśo yadaivopaśamaṃ gataḥ ।
tadaiva naṣṭam ajñānam āndhyaṃ dhvāntakṣayād iva ।। 

adhyātmaśāstramantreṇa tṛṣṇāviṣaviṣūcikā ।
kṣīyate bhāvitenāntaś śaradā mihikā yathā ।। 

maurkhye kṣīṇe kṣataṃ viddhi cittaṃ rāma sabāndhavam ।
vilīne ambudhare vyomni jāḍyaṃ śāmyaty avighnataḥ ।। 

acittatvaṃ gate citte kṣīyate vāsanābhramaḥ ।
hāramuktāsamāveśaś chinne tantāv ivānagha ।। 

na ghanāghavighātāya śāstrārthaṃ bhāvayanti ye ।
krimikīṭatvabhogāya cetasas sammilanti te ।। 

tava tāmarasākārakāntalocana lolatā ।
śāntā maurkhyakṛtā vātacalatā saraso yathā ।। 

sthiratām upayāto asi bhāvābhāvavivarjite ।
pade paramavistāre nabhasīva prabhañjanaḥ ।। 

manye madvacanair bodham āyāto asi raghūdvaha ।
vitatājñānanidrāto nidrātaḥ paṭahair iva ।। 

sāmānye api laganty eva manye kulaguror giraḥ ।
atyudāramatau rāma na laganti kathaṃ tvayi ।। 

yatropādeyavākyatvaṃ bhāvitaṃ svena cetasā ।
tadvaco antar viśaty uccais tapte kṣetre yathā payaḥ ।। 

vayam iha hi mahānubhāva nityaṃ kulaguravo guravo raghūdvahānām ।
taduditam idam āśu kāryam ārya sphuṭavacanaṃ hṛdi hāravat tvayeti ।। 

cittābhāvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

aho bata mahac citraṃ bhavadvākyārthabhāvanāt ।
śāntaṃ jagajjālam idam agrastham api nātha me ।। 

parām antaḥ prayāto asmi svayam ātmani nirvṛtim ।
dīrghāvagrahasantaptaṃ vṛṣṭyeva vasudhātalam ।। 

śāmyāmi śītalākāras sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi kevalam ।
prasādam upayāto asmi saro nirvāraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

samyak prasannam akhilaṃ diṅmaṇḍalam idaṃ mune ।
yathābhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi nirnīhāram ivādhunā ।। 

jāto asmi gatasandehaś śāntāśāmṛgatṛṣṇikaḥ ।
rajonīhāranirmukto vṛṣṭajaṅgalaśītalaḥ ।। 

ātmanaivāntar ānandaṃ taṃ prāpto asmy antavarjitam ।
rasāyanarasāsvādo yatra nātha tṛṇāyate ।। 

adyāyaṃ prakṛtistho asmi svastho asmi mudito asmi ca ।
lokārāmo asmi rāmo asmi namo mahyaṃ namo astu te ।। 

te saṃśayās tāḥ kalanās sarvam astaṅgataṃ mama ।
rātrivetālasañcāraḥ prabhāta iva bhāsvare ।। 

nirmale hṛdi vistīrṇe sapadme himaśītale ।
matir nirvṛtim āyātā sārasī sarasīva me ।। 

kalaṅka ātmanaḥ kasmāt kathaṃ vetyādisaṃśayaḥ ।
nūnaṃ nirmūlatāṃ yāto mamārkāgre yathā tamaḥ ।। 

sarvam ātmaiva sarvatra sarvadā bhāvitākṛtiḥ ।
idam anyad idaṃ cānyad ity asatkalanāḥ kutaḥ ।। 

ko abhūvaṃ prāg ahaṃ tādṛk tṛṣṇānigaḍayantritaḥ ।
antarātmānam eveti vihasāmi vikāsavān ।। 

ām idānīṃ smṛtaṃ samyaṅ mayaiṣa sa kilāsmy ajaḥ ।
yas tvadvāgamṛtāpūrasnānenāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

aho nu vitatāṃ bhūmim adhirūḍho asmi pāvanīm ।
ihastha eva yatrārko naḥ pātālam ivāsthitaḥ ।। 

mahyaṃ sattām upetāya vyapetāya bhavārṇavāt ।
namo nityanamasyāya jayāmy ātmātmanātmani ।। 

anubhavavaśato hṛdabjakośe sphuṭam alitāṃ samupāgatena nātha ।
tava varavacaseha vītaśokāṃ ciram uditāṃ svadaśām upāgato asmi ।। 

rāghavaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭhas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ ।
yat te ahaṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā ।। 

bodham abhyupagamyāpi śṛṇu bodhavivṛddhaye ।
bhaved alpaprabuddhānām api nirduḥkhatā yathā ।। 

yasyājñātātmano ajñasya deha evātmabhāvanā ।
uditārtiṃ ruṣevākṣaripavo abhibhavanti tam ।। 

yasya jñātātmano jñasya satye svātmani saṃsthitiḥ ।
tuṣṭyeva cākṣasuhṛdo na ghnanti tam aninditam ।। 

parārthaṃ sphurato yasya na stutir nindanād ṛte ।
sa dehī dehaduḥkhaugham ādatte kena hetunā ।। 

nātmā śarīrasambaddhaś śarīram api nātmani ।
mitho vilakṣaṇe ete prakāśatamasī yathā ।। 

sarvair bhāvavikārais tu nityamukto asty alepakaḥ ।
nātmāstam eti bhagavān na codeti sadoditaḥ ।। 

jaḍasyājñasya tucchasya kṛtaghnasya vināśinaḥ ।
śarīrakopalasyāsya yad bhavaty astu tat tathā ।। 

na cāsya kiñcid bhavati pṛthag ātmany avekṣite ।
jaḍasyāsatsvarūpasya kim ivāṅgopapadyate ।। 

nipuṇāyāvabodhāya yat proktaṃ tat punaḥ punaḥ ।
bhaṅgibhiḥ pravicitrābhī rāghavedaṃ prabodhyate ।। 

yadi dehaguṇān ātmā gṛhṇāti paramārthataḥ ।
nādatte tat kathaṃ tasmāj jaḍatāṃ śavarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

yadi vātmaguṇān deho gṛhṇāti paramārthataḥ ।
nādatte tat kathaṃ caittaṃ cinmayatvaṃ sadoditam ।। 

yayor ekaparijñāne jaḍataivāpare sthitā ।
tayoḥ kīdṛgvidhā brūta samānasukhaduḥkhatā ।। 

yau samau samakarmāṇau na kadācana tau katham ।
dvāv apy asantāv anyo'nyaṃ kathaṃ sambandham eṣyataḥ ।। 

kathaṃ sthūlo aṇurūpas syād aṇus sthūlaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।
ekodaye dvitīyasya na sattā dinarātrivat ।। 

jñānaṃ nājñānatām eti cchāyā nāyāti tāpatām ।
sad brahma nāsad bhavati vicitrāsv api dṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

manāg api na saṃśleṣas sarvagasyāpi dehinaḥ ।
dehena dehagasyāpi kamalasyeva vāriṇā ।। 

manāg api na saṃśleṣo brahmaṇo dehasattayā ।
tadgatasyāpy atadvṛtter ambarasyeva vāyunā ।। 

bhavaty ātmani no kiñcin nāsato dehakasya ca ।
tad rāghava mudhaivaiṣa sukhaduḥkhabhramaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

jarāmaraṇam āpac ca sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau ।
manāg api na santīha nirvāṇo nirvṛto bhava ।। 

sthito dehatayātyuccaiḥ pātotpātamayo bhramaḥ ।
dṛśyate kevalaṃ brahmaṇy apsu vīcitayā yathā ।। 

ātmasattopajīvitvād ātmā sambhavatīha hi ।
dehayantraṃ payassattāmātrād ūrmir ivotthitam ।। 

ādhāraspandanenāṅga yathā kṣobhabhavābhavāḥ ।
sūryādeḥ pratibimbasya tathā dehena dehinaḥ ।। 

samyagdṛṣṭe yathābhūte vastuny ātmani jāyate ।
sthitir dehamayo ajñānavibhramo layam eti ca ।। 

dehadehavator jñānād yathābhūtaitayos sthitiḥ ।
sattāsattātmikodeti dīpād iva padārthayoḥ ।। 

asamyagjñānino ye hi svāvartaparivartanaiḥ ।
antaśśūnyās sphurantīha te mohārjunavāyavaḥ ।। 

aparyālocitātmārtham aparāmṛṣṭasaṃvidaḥ ।
spandante veṣṭitonmuktatṛṇavan mūḍhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

anāsvāditacittattvaṃ jaḍās sūtrais svavāyubhiḥ ।
yantravac coditākrāntā naṭanti prasphuranti ca ।। 

tṛṇakāṣṭhādikaṃ sarvam āharanti tyajanti ca ।
saśabdasparśarūpādyās taraṅgataralāṅgakāḥ ।। 

jaḍās santas sphuradrūpā bhṛśaṃ sphārarasāravāḥ ।
savihārāgamāpāyā mahaughā iva durdhiyaḥ ।। 

sarveṣām eva caiteṣāṃ sthitaivaiṣā cid avyayā ।
kiṃ tv abodhavaśād asyāḥ parāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

śvāsasantatayo hy ajñāl lohakāradṛter iva ।
spandamātrārtham evāśu dṛśyante nārthakāriṇaḥ ।। 

tarjanodgarjanaṃ mūḍhād dhanurdaṇḍaguṇād iva ।
śrūyate māraṇāyaiva cidbodhaparivarjitam ।। 

phalalābho api yo mūḍhāt tad araṇyataror iva ।
tasmin viśramaṇaṃ yat tac chilāphalahake yathā ।। 

tena yas saṅgamas sa syāt sthāṇunāpi hi jaṅgale ।
tadarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ kiñcit tad vyoma laguḍair hatam ।। 

tasmin yad adhame dattaṃ tat tyaktaṃ klinnakardame ।
tena sārdhaṃ kathā yās tat kauleyāhvānam adhvare ।। 

ajñatvam āpadāṃ niṣṭhā kā hi nāpad ajānataḥ ।
iyaṃ saṃsārasaraṇir vahaty ajñaprasādataḥ ।। 

ajñasyogrāṇi duḥkhāni sukhāny api dṛḍhāni ca ।
punaḥ punaḥ pravartante yugaṃ praty acalā iva ।। 

śarīradhanadārādāv āsthāṃ samanubadhnataḥ ।
idaṃ durduḥkham ajñasya na kadācana śāmyati ।। 

anātmani śave dehe ātmabhāvam upeyuṣaḥ ।
asadbodhamayī māyā kathaṃ nāma vinaśyati ।। 

durbhāvakharvitadhiyo vastuny andhasya durmateḥ ।
avastuni sanetrasya luṭhataś ca pade pade ।। 

viṣam utpadyate candrād āmodaḥ kusumād iva ।
kaṇṭakaś caiva payaso dūrvāṅkura iva sthalāt ।। 

dehaśalmalibhoginyo manomātaṅgaśṛṅkhalāḥ ।
ajñasyāśāḥ prasūyante suvṛṣṭeṣv iva śālayaḥ ।। 

narakaśrīr anātmajñaṃ duṣkṛtavyālapālitā ।
paripālayati prītā mayūrī vāridaṃ yathā ।। 

netralolālinīlolā sphuritādharapallavā ।
mūrkhārtham eva vikasaty aṅganāviṣavallarī ।। 

ajñavāridhihṛdbhūmāv eva vepathupallavaḥ ।
vardhate apagatacchāyo rāgavidrumadurdrumaḥ ।। 

tanucchadalasaddhūmaś śastrajvālo bhaṭolmukaḥ ।
jvalati dveṣadāvo ajñahṛnmarau kopatāpadaḥ ।। 

ajñamātsaryasarasi parāpavadanacchadā ।
īrṣyākamalinī cintāṣaṭpadī vikasaty alam ।। 

pratijanma prakṛṣṭograduḥkhakallolasambhramaḥ ।
jaḍam eva samabhyeti punarmaraṇavāḍavaḥ ।। 

janmabālyaṃ dhruvaṃ yāti yauvanaṃ yuvatā jarām ।
jarā maraṇam abhyeti mūḍhasyaiva punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

jagajjīrṇāraghaṭṭe asmin rajjvā saṃsṛtirūpayā ।
majjanonmajjanair ajñā yantre śakalatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

yad eva goṣpadādūraṃ jñadhiyaḥ pelavaṃ jagat ।
tad evāpāraparyantam agādham amahātmanaḥ ।। 

dhiyo adṛśa ivājñasya cidvyomodarakoṭarāt ।
na prayānty aparaṃ pāraṃ vihaṅgyaḥ pañjarād iva ।। 

bhāvamātraparāvṛttyā vāsanāmātranābhayaḥ ।
spaṣṭīkartuṃ na śakyante janmacakrasya nemayaḥ ।। 

ajñenendriyaśayyārthaṃ rāgāsṛgaruṇā tanuḥ ।
saṃsārāraṇya āstīrṇā punar āmiṣapiṇḍavat ।। 

bhūtaśailamayī sṛṣṭir mṛnmāṃsalavamātrikā ।
mohāt saṃlakṣyate cittapadārthānartharañjanā ।। 

jayaty analpasaṅkalpakalpanākalpapādapaḥ ।
ajñānāṃ prasṛtā yasmāj jagatparṇaparamparāḥ ।। 

yasmiṃs tiṣṭhanti rājante lasanti vilasanti ca ।
vicitraracanopetā bhūribhogavihaṅgamāḥ ।। 

yatra janmāni parvāṇi karmajālaṃ ca korakāḥ ।
phalāni puṇyapāpāni mañjaryo vibhavaśriyaḥ ।। 

ajñānendūdayād etā yoṣidoṣadhayas sphuṭam ।
saṃsāravanaṣaṇḍe asmin parāṃ śobhām upāgatāḥ ।। 

ghanajāḍyaḥ kalāpūrṇas tamaḥkālakṛtodayaḥ ।
śūnyoditātmā doṣeśo jayaty ajñānacandramāḥ ।। 

ajñānendoḥ prasādena vāsanāmṛtaśālinā ।
tarpitāśācakoreṇa cittaratnarasaiṣiṇā ।। 

rājahaṃsavilāsinyaḥ prāleyaśiśirāṅgikāḥ ।
bhānti kāntākumudvatyo lolalocanaṣaṭpadāḥ ।। 

dhammillatimirollāsā yat prapāṇḍupayodharāḥ ।
rāmārajanyo rājante tan maurkhyenduvijṛmbhitam ।। 

āpātamātramadhuratvam anarthavattvam ādyantavattvam akhilasthitibhaṅguratvam ।
ajñānaśākhina iti prasṛtāni rāma nānākṛtīni vipulāni phalāny amūni ।। 

mohamāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yan muktāvalitā ratnabhūṣitā bhānti yoṣitaḥ ।
madendāv udite kṣubdhakāmakṣīrārṇavormayaḥ ।। 

sauvarṇāmbhojakośasthalolālipaṭalaśriyam ।
dhārayanti dṛśas strīṇāṃ kapoladaladolitāḥ ।। 

udyānavanaṣaṇḍeṣu bhūmau kṛtapadā madhau ।
hṛdyās sumanaso bhānti hāsā iva manobhuvaḥ ।। 

kravyādagṛdhragomāyukauleyakavalāṅgikāḥ ।
striyas samupamīyante candracandanapaṅkajaiḥ ।। 

sauvarṇakalaśāmbhojakorakottuṅgaliṅgavat ।
dṛśyate strīstanaśreṇī raktapratisamudgikā ।। 

rasāyanenduniṣṣyandamadhubimbāsavadravaiḥ ।
oṣṭhābhidho māṃsalavo lālākta upamīyate ।। 

śalmalyaṣṭhīlikākārā bhujāḥ krūrāsthiśaṅkavaḥ ।
bāhūbāhu latāśabdair varṇyante kavibhiś śubhaiḥ ।। 

kadalīstambhasambhārasundarī sundarīratā ।
ūruśobhoditānaṅgatoraṇaśrīr virājate ।। 

āpātamātramadhurā madhye dvandvānupātinī ।
śīghrāvasānavirasā lakṣmīr apy abhivāñchyate ।। 

samupaiti matir duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca śataśākhatām ।
duḥkhaśākhāsu jāyante nānākarmaphalaśriyaḥ ।। 

baddhajālaghanākārāḥ kārārtham iva rajjavaḥ ।
vīrudhaḥ prāvṛṣīvāśāḥ pratānagahanasthitāḥ ।। 

sāratāṃ mohamihikā kāryākāryavikāriṇī ।
yamunā prāvṛṣīvaiti timiraśyāmalāciram ।। 

kaṭūkṛtāntaḥkaraṇo nānākāravikāradaḥ ।
svadate vigatasnehaṃ janmaprativiṣārasaḥ ।। 

vyādhūtajarjarājīrṇajanatāparṇarājayaḥ ।
svakarmapavanā vānti nānākanakareṇavaḥ ।। 

kālaḥ kavalitānantajagatpakvaphalo apy ayam ।
ghasmarāpārajaṭharaḥ kalpair api na tṛpyati ।। 

mohamārutapā mattās tvarāviṣavikāriṇaḥ ।
sphurantīhāhayaś cittabile balavadāpadaḥ ।। 

cintāpiśācyopahatā vivekendūdayaṃ vinā ।
tamasaiva nirālokā yāti yauvanayāminī ।। 

jihvā jarjaratām eti prākṛtānunayajvaraiḥ ।
padmakoṭarakoṇastham api pattraṃ himair iva ।। 

duḥkhajīvamahāṣṭhīlaḥ kaṣṭakaṇṭakasaṅkaṭaḥ ।
sahasraśākhatāṃ yāti dāridryadṛḍhaśalmaliḥ ।। 

antaśśūnyonnatadhvastacittacaityakṛtālayaḥ ।
yācñābahulayāminyāṃ lobholūko vivalgati ।। 

pūrvaṃ gṛhītvā karṇābhyāṃ sphurantam abhitaś ciram ।
jarājarjaramārjārī yauvanākhuṃ nikṛntati ।। 

nissārā kramaśaḥ krāntadharādharasamunnatiḥ ।
diṇḍīrapiṇḍikeveyaṃ sṛṣṭir āyāti puṣṭatām ।। 

ābhāsapuṣpadhavalā jagatpallavaśālinī ।
sattālatā vikasitā dharmārthaphaladhāriṇī ।। 

surācalamahāsthūṇaṃ candrasūryagavākṣakam ।
gaganācchādanaṃ cāru dhriyate trijagadgṛham ।। 

saṃsārasarasi sphāre caranti prāṇaṣaṭpadāḥ ।
śarīrapuṣkareṣv antaś cidrūparasapāyinaḥ ।। 

nabhomārgamahānīlakuṭṭime kāntiśālinī ।
bhuvanāvavarasyāntas sphuraty ādityadīpikā ।। 

āśātantunibaddhāṅgī janatājīrṇapakṣiṇī ।
svavāsanāśalākānte nibaddhendriyapañjare ।। 

anāratapatajjātabhūtaparṇaparamparā ।
spandate ajagarāmṛṣṭā saṃsṛtivratatiś ciram ।। 

pṛṣṭhe katipayaṃ kālam adṛṣṭāḥ kālajālinā ।
adhaḥkṛtogranarakapaṅkāś śaṅkojjhitāḥ kṣaṇam ।। 

bhuktendukhaṇḍakabisā nīlanīradaśevale ।
svargamārgasarasy antas sphuranti surasārasāḥ ।। 

nānāphalāvalimatī vāsanājalamālitā ।
spandāmodamayī sphītā kriyāvikasitābjinī ।। 

varākī sṛṣṭiśapharī sphurantī bhavapalvale ।
kṛtāntavṛddhagṛdhreṇa śaṭhena vinigīryate ।। 

taraṅgaphenamāleva saivānyeva ca bhaṅgurā ।
śvaś śvo aparendulekheva samudeti vicitratā ।। 

bhūribhūtaśarāvāṇi kṣaṇabhaṅgīni kurvatā ।
idaṃ kālakulālena cakraṃ viparivartyate ।। 

asaṅkhyātāny analpāni sañjātāny acale pade ।
jagajjaṅgalajālāni dagdhāni yugavahninā ।। 

bhāvābhāvair aparyantais sukhaduḥkhadaśāśataiḥ ।
vaiparītyaṃ prayātīyam ajasraṃ jāgatī sthitiḥ ।। 

kṣubdhair yugaparāvartair vāsanāśṛṅkhalombhitā ।
mohāśaninipātaiś ca na rugṇā dhruvadhīratā ।। 

śataśo vidrutārīndrair danuputrair abhidrutām ।
bhagabhagnatrapām aindrīṃ tanuṃ vahati vāsanā ।। 

viśaty avirataṃ dhūtasargapāṃsuparamparā ।
nityaṃ niyativātyeyaṃ kālavyālagalāntaram ।। 

padārthāmbhāṃsi sarvāṇi phalaphenāni sarvataḥ ।
patanty aviratāpātam abhāvavaḍavāmukham ।। 

sphuranty ākasmikodbhūtā vicitrā dravyaśaktayaḥ ।
svabhāvamātrasampannās spandaśriya ivāmbhasām ।। 

bhūtamauktikasampūrṇān bṛhatas subahūn api ।
jagatkalabhakān atti kṛtāntodriktakesarī ।। 

kulaśailaphalā meghapakṣapuñjā jalāsṛjaḥ ।
jāyante ca mriyante ca ḍīyante ca jagatkhagāḥ ।। 

cidbhittau spandaśubhrāyāṃ raṅgaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ ।
unmīlayati saṃsāracitrāṇi vidhicitrakṛt ।। 

ajasragatvarīṃ sarvaparispandavidhāyinīṃ ।
nimeṣaśatabhāgāṅgīm acchām utsāhitāṅkurām ।। 

sūkṣmāṃ kālasya kalanāṃ svasamutthānakāriṇīm ।
dhyānenevānvavekṣante sthirās sthāvarajātayaḥ ।। 

rāgadveṣasamutthena bhāvābhāvamayena ca ।
jarāmaraṇamohena jīrṇā jaṅgamajātayaḥ ।। 

svaduṣkṛtottamadhyānadhāriṇyo dharaṇītale ।
niyatyā niyataṃ kālaṃ pīḍyante kīṭapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

kṣaṇenādṛśya evedaṃ nigiraty akhilaṃ sukhī ।
sudurlakṣyabilaḥ kālavyālo vipulabhogavān ।। 

kṣaṇādikalpaparyantas tejastimirarañjanāt ।
kālena kiñcid ālakṣyas svakāya urarīkṛtaḥ ।। 

śītavātātapaprauḍhāḥ prollasatpuṣpadīptayaḥ ।
phalapradāś carantīha kālakhe ṣaḍṛtugrahāḥ ।। 

brahmāṇḍabhaikṣabhāṇḍe asau kālī bhagavatī kriyā ।
svayaṃ dattvaiva dattvaiva bhūtabhikṣāṃ jighṛkṣati ।। 

payaḥpaṭalaviśrāntatrailokyāmbhojakoṭare ।
karoti ghuṅghumaṃ bhūri bhūtabhramarapeṭakaḥ ।। 

timirānīlakavarī arkenducapalekṣaṇā ।
brahmopendraharendrādidharāgirivarāṅgikā ।। 

brahmatattvaikapitṛkā lambamānapayodharā ।
cicchaktimātṛkā sthūlā taralā ghanacāpalā ।। 

tārakājāladaśanā sandhyāruṇatarādharā ।
samastapadminīhastā śatakratupurānanā ।। 

saptābdhimuktālatikā nīlāmbaraparāvṛtā ।
jambudvīpamahānābhir vanaśrīromarājikā ।। 

bhūtvā bhūtvā vinaśyantī trilokīvṛddhakāminī ।
asakṛj jāyate naṣṭā bhūrivibhramakāriṇī ।। 

magnam anyair athonmagnaṃ bhīme kālamahārṇave ।
pratikalpakṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇair brahmāṇḍasphuṭabudbudaiḥ ।। 

kālāgādhasarasyāṃ tu sthitvā sthitvā punaḥ punaḥ ।
kalpamātranimeṣeṇa ḍīnaṃ saṃsārasārasaiḥ ।। 

utpatyotpatya nāśinyas santatās sṛṣṭividyutaḥ ।
kālameghe sphuranty etāś citprakāśamanoramāḥ ।। 

pradhvanadbhūtavihagāḥ patanty aviratadrutāḥ ।
kālatālāt kilottālād brahmāṇḍaphalapālayaḥ ।। 

unmeṣakṛtavairiñcasṛṣṭayo devanāyakāḥ ।
nimeṣakṛtasaṃhārās santi kecana kutracit ।। 

nimeṣonmeṣasaṅkṣīṇakalpajālās sahasraśaḥ ।
rudrāḥ kecana vidyante kasmiṃścit parame pure ।। 

te api yasya nimeṣeṇa bhavanti na bhavanti vā ।
tādṛśo apy asti deveśo hy ananteyaṃ kriyāsthitiḥ ।। 

anantasaṅkalpamaye śūnye ca brahmaṇaḥ pade ।
na sambhavanti kā nāma śaktayaś citrayuktayaḥ ।। 

evam akṣīṇasaṅkalpakalpārthabharabhāsvarā ।
jāgatī kalanā yeyaṃ tad ajñānavijṛmbhitam ।। 

yat sampado yad uta santatam āpadaś ca yad bālyayauvanajarāmaraṇopatāpāḥ ।
yan majjanaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaparamparābhir ajñānatīvratimirasya vibhūtayas tāḥ ।। 

ajñānamāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃsāravanaṣaṇḍe asmiṃś citparvatataṭasthite ।
kīdṛśī khalv avidyākhyā latā vikasitā tatā ।। 

bṛhatparvataparvāḍhyā brahmāṇḍatvakparāvṛtā ।
dehayaṣṭir iyaṃ yasyās trilokī lokalāsinī ।। 

sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo bhāvo jñānam ajñānam eva ca ।
atraitāny uruvṛttāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca ।। 

sukhād avidyodety uccais tad evānte prayacchati ।
duḥkhād avidyodety uccais tad evānte phalaty alam ।। 

bhavād avidyodety eṣā tam eva phalati sphuṭam ।
bhāvāt sattām avāpnoti tam eva phalati kṣaṇāt ।। 

ajñānād vṛddhim āyāti tad evāsyāḥ phalaṃ smṛtam ।
jñānena yāti saṃvittiṃ tad evānte prayacchati ।। 

nānāvidhollāsavatī vāsanāmodadāyinī ।
ghanapravālapaṭalā tanur asyā vijṛmbhate ।। 

divasavyūhakusumā yāminīlolaṣaṭpadā ।
ajasraṃ spandamānaiṣā prapatadbhūtapallavā ।। 

āgatyāgatya tarasā vivekakariṇā kvacit ।
vidhūyate dhūtarajaḥprasarā punar eti ca ।। 

jāyamānapravālāḍhyā sañjātāṅkuradanturā ।
sarvartukusumopetā samagrarasaśālinī ।। 

janmaparvālinīrandhrā vināśacchidradadrulā ।
bhogābhogarasāpūrṇā vicāraikaghuṇakṣatā ।। 

vikasantyaḥ pratidinaṃ candrārkāvalayo hi yāḥ ।
vyomni vātavilolāni puṣpāṇy asyāḥ kilāṅga tāḥ ।। 

asyāḥ prasphuritākārāḥ korakatvam upāgatāḥ ।
pūritākāśakośā yās tārakā raghunandana ।। 

candrārkadahanālokā asyās tat kausumaṃ rajaḥ ।
aneneyaṃ hi gaurāṅgī strīvac cetāṃsi karṣati ।। 

manomātaṅgavalitā saṅkalpakalakokilā ।
indriyavyālaśabalā tṛṣṇātvaguparañjitā ।। 

nīlākāśatamālāṅgasaṃśrayeṇonnatiṃ gatā ।
rodasījānusustambhā bhuvanodyānabhūsthitā ।। 

adhobrahmāṇḍakhaṇḍena svālavālena jālinā ।
vihitāśeṣajaladhijalakṣīrādisecanā ।। 

trayīvilolabhramarā ramaṇīpuṣparañjitā ।
citspandavātavalitā kriyāvipulapattrikā ।। 

kukarmājagaravyāptā svargaśrīpuṣpamaṇḍapā ।
jīvajīvakanīrandhrā nānāmodamadapradā ।। 

nānārasamayī citrā nānākusumahāsinī ।
nānāphalāvalivyāptā nānāvarṇavikāsinī ।। 

nānālavālavalayā nānāvihagadhāriṇī ।
nānāparāgaparuṣā nānābhralavalāñchitā ।। 

nānālatākuṭmalitā nānāvanagaṇotthitā ।
nānāgiritaṭārūḍhā nānācalanirantarā ।। 

jātā ca jāyamānā ca mriyamāṇā tathā mṛtā ।
anucchinnā tathā cchinnā nityam acchedinī tathā ।। 

atītā vartamānā ca satyevāsatpadāspadā ।
nityam atyantataruṇā nityaṃ śamam upeyuṣī ।। 

mahāviṣalataiṣā hi saṃsāraviṣamūrchanām ।
dadāti rabhasā śliṣṭā parāmṛṣṭā vinaśyati ।। 

sphīteto galitetaś ca rūḍhetas saṃsthitānv itaḥ ।
ito jalam itaś śailā ito nāgās surā itaḥ ।। 

itaḥ pṛthvītvam āyātā tatheto dyutayā sthitā ।
itaś candrārkatāṃ prāptā tathetas tārakākṛtim ।। 

itas tama itas teja itaḥ kham ita urvarā ।
itaś śāstram ito vedā ito dvayavivarjitā ।। 

itaḥ puṇyam itaḥ pāpam itas sthāvaramūḍhatā ।
ito jñānāt parikṣīṇā pīneto ajñānabhāvanāt ।। 

itaḥ puṇyatapodānaiḥ kṣīyamāṇatayā sthitā ।
ito yogavilāsena nūnaṃ kṣayam upāgatā ।। 

kvacit khagatayoḍḍīnā kvacid devatayā sthitā ।
kvacit sthāṇutayā rūḍhā kvacit pavanatāṃ gatā ।। 

kvacin narakasaṃlīnā kvacit svarganivāsinī ।
kvacit surapadaṃ prāptā kvacit krimitayā sthitā ।। 

kvacid viṣṇuḥ kvacid brahmā kvacid rudraḥ kvacid raviḥ ।
kvacid agniḥ kvacid vāyuḥ kvacic candraḥ kvacid yamaḥ ।। 

yat kiñcanāṅga bhuvaneṣu mahāmahimnā vyāptaṃ jarattṛṇalavatvam upāgataṃ vā ।
dṛśyaṃ sphurattanu harādy api tām avidyāṃ viddhi kṣayāya tadatītatayātmalābhaḥ ।। 

avidyālatāvilāso nāma sargaḥ

navamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ākārajātam uditaṃ śuddhaṃ hariharādy api ।
avidyaivety ahaṃ śrutvā brahman bhramam ivāgataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃvedyenāparāmṛṣṭaṃ śāntaṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca yat ।
tat sac cid api cābhāsam astīha kalanojjhitam ।। 

samudeti tatas tasmāt kalā kalanarūpiṇī ।
jalād āvartarūpeva sphuradrūpatayoditā ।। 

sūkṣmā madhyā tathā sthūlā ceti sā kalpyate tridhā ।
paścān manastvaṃ yātena svenaiva vapuṣā punaḥ ।। 

tisṛṣv avasthāsv etāsu bhedataḥ kalpitābhidhā ।
sattvaṃ rajas tama iti saiṣaiva prakṛtis sphuṭā ।। 

avidyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi guṇatritayadharmiṇīm ।
eṣaiva saṃsṛtir jantor asyāḥ pāraṃ paraṃ padam ।। 

atraite ye trayaḥ proktā guṇās te api tridhā smṛtāḥ ।
sattvaṃ rajas tama iti pratyekaṃ bhidyate guṇaḥ ।। 

navadhaiva vibhakteyam avidyā guṇabhedataḥ ।
yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyam anayaiva tad āśritam ।। 

ṛṣayo munayas siddhā nāgā vidyādharās surāḥ ।
iti bhāgam avidyāyās sāttvikaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

sāttvikasyāsya bhāgasya nāgā vidyādharās tamaḥ ।
rajas tu munayas sādhyās sattvaṃ devā harādayaḥ ।। 

sattvajāte devayonāv avidyāprakṛter guṇe ।
nirmalaṃ padam āyātaṃ sattvaṃ hariharādayaḥ ।। 

sāttvikaḥ prakṛter bhāgo rāma tajjño hi yo bhavet ।
na pramuhyaty asau bhūyas tenāsau mukta ucyate ।। 

tena rudrādayo hy ete sattvabhāgā mahāmate ।
tiṣṭhanti muktapuruṣā yāvaddehaṃ jagatsthitau ।। 

yāvaddehaṃ mahātmāno jīvanmuktā vyavasthitāḥ ।
videhamuktā dehānte sthāsyanti parameśvarāḥ ।। 

bhāga eṣa tv avidyāyā eva vidyātvam āgataḥ ।
bījaṃ phalatvam āyāti phalam āyāti bījatām ।। 

udety avidyā vidyāyās salilād iva budbudaḥ ।
vidyāyāṃ līyate avidyā payasīva hi budbudaḥ ।। 

payastaraṅgayor dvitvabhāvanād eva bhinnatā ।
vidyāvidyādṛśor bhedabhāvanād eva bhinnatā ।। 

payastaraṅgayor aikyaṃ yathaiva paramārthataḥ ।
vidyāvidyādṛśor aikyaṃ tathaiva paramārthataḥ ।। 

nāvidyātvaṃ na vidyātvam iha kiñcana vidyate ।
vidyāvidyādṛśau tyaktvā yad astīha tad asti hi ।। 

pratiyogivyavacchedavaśād ete raghūdvaha ।
vidyāvidyādṛśau na staś śeṣe baddhapado bhava ।। 

nāvidyāsti na vidyāsti kṛtaṃ kalpanayānayā ।
kiñcid asti nakiñcid yac citsaṃvid iti tat sthitam ।। 

tad evāviditābhāsaṃ sad avidyety udāhṛtaṃ ।
viditaṃ sat tad evedam avidyākṣayasañjñitam ।। 

vidyābhāvād avidyākhyā mithyaivodeti kalpanā ।
mithas sattaitayor ante chāyātāpadṛśor iva ।। 

avidyāyāṃ tu līnāyāṃ kṣaṇād dve eva kalpane ।
ete rāghava līyete avācyaṃ pariśiṣyate ।। 

avidyāsaṅkṣayāt kṣīṇe vidyāpakṣe api rāghava ।
yac chiṣṭaṃ tan nakiñcid vā kiñcid vāpīdam ātatam ।। 

tatredaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ na ca kiñcana dṛśyate ।
vaṭas svavaṭadhānāyām iva puṣpaphalādimān ।। 

tat sarvaśakti kacitaṃ sarvaśaktisamudgakam ।
nabhaso apy adhikaṃ śūnyam avedyaṃ ca cidātmakam ।। 

sūryakānte yathā vahnir yathā kṣīre ghṛtaṃ tathā ।
tatredaṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ deśakālakramodayam ।। 

yathā sphuliṅgā analād yathā bhāso divākarāt ।
tasmāt tathemā niryānti sphurantyas saṃvidas sthitāḥ ।। 

yathāmbhodhis taraṅgāṇāṃ yathāmalamaṇis tviṣām ।
kośo nityam anantānāṃ tathā tat saṃvidāṃ tviṣām ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvavastūnāṃ tad avasthitam ।
sarvadaivāvināśātma kumbhānāṃ gaganaṃ yathā ।। 

yathā maṇer ayasspandeṣv ayaskāntasya kartṛtā ।
akartur eva hi tathā kartṛtā tasya kalpyate ।। 

maṇisannidhimātreṇa yathāyas spandate jaḍam ।
tatsattayā tathaivāyaṃ dehaś copaty acidvapuḥ ।। 

tatra sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ jagadekabīje cinnāmni saṃvid iti kalpitakalpane ca ।
lolormijālam iva vāriṇi citsvarūpaṃ khād apy arūpavati yatra nakiñcid asti ।। 

avidyānirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

daśamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmān nakiñcid evedaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
na kiñcid bhūtatāṃ yātaṃ yat kiñcid api viddhi he ।। 

tatra kācin na kalanā bhāvābhāvamayātmikā ।
tad idaṃ rāma jīvādi sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ kim īhase ।। 

subuddho ayam asāv antar iti yo vyapadiśyate ।
na taṃ labhāmahe sarpaṃ rajjusarpabhramād iva ।। 

aparijñāta ātmaiva bhramatāṃ samupāgataḥ ।
jñāta ātmatvam āyāti sīmāntaṃ sarvasaṃvidām ।। 

avidyety ucyate loke cic cetyamalamālitā ।
cetyātītācchatām eti sarvopādhivivarjitā ।। 

cittamātraṃ hi puruṣas tasmin naṣṭe na naśyati ।
sthite tiṣṭhati nātmāyaṃ ghaṭe sati yathāmbaram ।। 

gacchan paśyati gacchantaṃ sthitaṃ tiṣṭhañ śiśur yathā ।
bhānum evam idaṃ cetaḥ paśyaty ātmānam ākulam ।। 

kośakāravad ātmānaṃ vāsanānanatantubhiḥ ।
veṣṭayaṃś caiva ceto antar bālatvān nāvabudhyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

maurkhyam atyantaghanatām āgataṃ sadavasthitam ।
sthāvarāditanuṃ prāptaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavati prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

amanastvam asamprāptaṃ manastvād api vicyutam ।
taṭasthaṃ rūpam āśritya sthitaiṣā sthāvareṣu cit ।। 

suptapuryaṣṭakā yatra saṃsthitā duḥkhadāyinī ।
mūkāndhajaḍavat tatra sattāmātreṇa tiṣṭhati ।। 

rāmaḥ

sattādvaitatayā yatra saṃsthitā sthāvareṣu cit ।
tatrādūrasthitāṃ muktiṃ manye vedyavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

buddhipūrvaṃ vicāryedaṃ yathāvastvavalokanāt ।
sattāsāmānyabodho yas sa mokṣaś ced anantakaḥ ।। 

parijñāya parityāgo vāsanānāṃ ya uttamaḥ ।
sattāsāmānyarūpatvaṃ tat kaivalyapadaṃ viduḥ ।। 

vicāryāryais sahālokya śāstrāṇy adhyātmabhāvanāt ।
sattāsāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

antas suptā sthitā mandā yatra bīja ivāṅkuraḥ ।
vāsanā tat suṣuptatvaṃ viddhi janmapradaṃ punaḥ ।। 

antas saṃlīnamananaṃ paritas suptavāsanam ।
suṣuptaṃ jaḍadharmāpi janmaduḥkhaśatapradam ।। 

sthāvarādaya ete hi samastā jaḍadharmiṇaḥ ।
suṣuptapadam ārūḍhā janmayogyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

yathā bījeṣu puṣpāṇi mṛdo rāśau yathā ghaṭāḥ ।
tathāntas saṃsthitās sādho sthāvareṣu svavāsanāḥ ।। 

yatrāsti vāsanābījaṃ tat suṣuptaṃ na siddhaye ।
nirbījā vāsanā yatra tat turyaṃ siddhidaṃ smṛtam ।। 

vāsanāyās tathā vahner ṛṇavyādhidviṣām api ।
snehavairaviṣāṇāṃ ca śeṣas svalpo api bādhate ।। 

nirdagdhavāsanābījas sattāsāmānyarūpavān ।
sadeho vā videho vā na bhūyo duḥkhabhāg bhavet ।। 

cicchaktir vāsanābījarūpiṇī svāpadharmiṇī ।
sthitā rasatayā nityaṃ sthāvarādiṣu vastuṣu ।। 

bījeṣūllāsarūpeṇa jāḍyena jaḍarūpiṣu ।
draveṣu dravabhāvena kāṭhinyenetareṣu ca ।। 

bhasmany athādityarucau pāṃsuṣv apy aṇurūpiṇī ।
asiteṣu talasthityā śitadhāratayāsiṣu ।। 

ātmaśaktiḥ padārtheṣu ghaṭāvaṭapaṭādiṣu ।
sarvatra sattāsāmānyaṃ rūpam āśritya tiṣṭhati ।। 

itīyam akhilāṃ dṛśyadaśām ādāya saṃsthitā ।
yathā ghanapaṭā prāvṛḍ ambarālambinī tathā ।। 

svarūpam asyāś caivaitat kathitaṃ pravicāritam ।
asarvaṃ sarvato vyāpi sad ivāsanmayātmakam ।। 

ātmadṛṣṭir adṛṣṭaiṣā saṃsṛtibhramadāyinī ।
dṛṣṭā satī samagrāṇāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kṣayakāriṇī ।। 

asyās tv adarśanaṃ yat tad avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ ।
avidyā hi jagaddhetus tatas sarvaṃ pravartate ।। 

avidyā rūparahitā yāvad evāvalokyate ।
tāvad eva galaty āśu tuhināṇur yathātape ।। 

yathā naro galannidro yāvat kalanayā manāk ।
vimṛśaty āśayaṃ tāvan nidrā tasya vilīyate ।। 

tathā kīdṛg avastv etad iti yāvad vikalpyate ।
avidyā kṣīyate tāvad ālokenāndhatā yathā ।। 

dīpahasto yadābhyeti tamorūpadidṛkṣayā ।
tadā galati tat sarvaṃ tamas tāpe ghṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

na tu saṃlakṣyate dīpais tamaso rūpaniścayaḥ ।
udeti kevalaṃ dhvāntadhvaṃso vimalamūrtimān ।। 

evam ālokyamānaiṣā kvāpi yāti palāyate ।
asadrūpā hy avastutvaṃ dṛśyate asyā vicāraṇāt ।। 

āloka āgate yādṛg yad yat tad dṛśyate tathā ।
avastutve tv avidyāyās tv avastutvaṃ pratīyate ।। 

yāvan nālokyate tāvan na kiñcid api dṛśyate ।
ālokyate yathā yad yat tat tathā pratipadyate ।। 

raktamāṃsāsthiyantre asmin kas syām aham iti svayam ।
yāvad vicāryate tāvat sarvam āśu pralīyate ।। 

ādyantayor asadrūpe nūnaṃ parihṛte hṛdaḥ ।
sarvasminn eva yaś śeṣas tam avidyākṣayaṃ viduḥ ।। 

tan nakiñcic ca kiñcic ca yat sat tad brahma śāśvatam ।
tad vastu tad upādeyaṃ tad avidyānivartanam ।। 

svarūpaṃ nāmna evāsyā jñāyate nissvabhāvakam ।
na hi jihvāgatasyekṣos svādo anyasmāt pratīyate ।। 

nāvidyā kvacid apy asti brahmaivedam akhaṇḍitam ।
sadasatkalanāsphāram aśeṣaṃ yena maṇḍitam ।। 

etāvad evāvidyā yan nedaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ ।
etad eva kṣayo yas syād idaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ ।। 

ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ na vibhur itīty uditeha sā tv avidyā ।
ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ vibhur iti ced galitaiva sā tv avidyā ।। 

avidyācikitsā nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

punaḥ punar idaṃ rāma prabodhārthaṃ mayocyate ।
abhyāsena vinā sādho nābhyudety ātmabhāvanam ।। 

ajñānam etad balavad avidyetaranāmakam ।
janmāntaraśataprauḍhaṃ nūnaṃ sthitim upāgatam ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvair indriyair anubhūyate ।
bhāvābhāveṣu dehasya tenātighanatāṃ gatam ।। 

ātmajñānaṃ tu sarveṣām indriyāṇām agocaram ।
sattāṃ kevalam āyāti manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyakṣaye ।। 

prollaṅghyendriyajāś śaktīr yat sthitaṃ tat kathaṃ kila ।
yāti pratyakṣatāṃ jantoḥ pratyakṣātītavṛttimat ।। 

nityam ajñānam evātas svabhyastaṃ sarvadehinām ।
na kadācana vijñānam iha vāmutra vānagha ।। 

tasmād avidyābhāgena pradhānenetaraṃ dahet ।
tāvad yāvan mithogharṣāt svayaṃ śāmyec chivaṃ bhavet ।। 

na hy abhyāsaṃ vinā kiñcit phaladaṃ bhavati kvacit ।
yad yad āsādyate yatra tad abhyāsataroḥ phalam ।। 

avidyāṃ sucirābhyastāṃ prarūḍhām api yatnataḥ ।
ātmajñānadṛḍhābhyāsād anudvegāc chamaṃ nayet ।। 

tvam avidyālatām etāṃ prarūḍhāṃ hṛdayadrume ।
jñānābhyāsavilāsāsipātena cchinddhi siddhaye ।। 

yathā viharati jñātajñeyo janakabhūpatiḥ ।
ātmajñānaghanābhyāsas tathā vihara rāghava ।। 

niścayo yo maruttasya kāryākāryavicāraṇe ।
jāgratas tiṣṭhato vāpi taj jñānaṃ tena satyatā ।। 

niścayena harir yena vividhācārakāraṇāt ।
yoniṣv avataraty urvyāṃ tat tajjñatvam udāhṛtam ।। 

niścayo yas trinetrasya kāntayā saha tiṣṭhataḥ ।
brahmaṇo vāpy arāgasya sa te bhavatu rāghava ।। 

yo niścayas suraguror vākpater bhārgavasya ca ।
divākarasya śaśinaḥ pavanasyānalasya ca ।। 

nāradasya pulastyasya mama vāṅgirasas tathā ।
pracetaso bhṛgoś caiva krator atreś śukasya ca ।। 

anyeṣāṃ devaviprendrarājarṣīṇāṃ ca rāghava ।
yo niścayo antarmuktānāṃ jīvatāṃ te bhavatv asau ।। 

rāmaḥ

yenaite bhagavan vīrā niścayena mahādhiyaḥ ।
viśokās saṃsthitās taṃ me brahman prabrūhi tattvataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājaputra mahābāho viditākhilavedya he ।
sphuṭaṃ śṛṇu yathāpṛṣṭam ayam eteṣu niścayaḥ ।।
