yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi jagajjālaṃ pradṛśyate ।
tat sarvam amalaṃ brahma bṛṃhayetthaṃ vyavasthitam ।। 

brahma dig brahma bhuvanaṃ brahma bhūtaparamparā ।
brahmāhaṃ brahma macchatrur brahma manmitrabāndhavāḥ ।। 

brahma khānilatejāṃsi brahma bhūmir jalādi vā ।
brahma kālatrayaṃ tac ca brahmaṇy eva vyavasthitam ।। 

taraṅgamālayāmbhodhir yathātmani vivardhate ।
tathā padārthalakṣmyettham idaṃ brahma vivardhate ।। 

gṛhyate brahmaṇā brahma bhujyate brahma brahmaṇā ।
brahma brahmaṇi bṛṃhābhir brahmaśaktyaiva bṛṃhati ।। 

brahma macchatrurūpaṃ ced brahma me priyakṛd yadi ।
tad brahma brahmaṇi śliṣṭaṃ kim anyat kasya kiṃ kṛtaṃ ।। 

rāgādīnām avastūnāṃ kalpitānāṃ khavṛkṣavat ।
asaṅkalpananaṣṭānāṃ kaḥ prasaṅgo atra vardhane ।। 

brahmaṇy eva hi sarvasmiṃś calanaspandanādikam ।
sphurati brahma sakalaṃ sukhitāduḥkhite kutaḥ ।। 

brahma brahmaṇi saṃvettṛ brahma brahmaṇi saṃsthitam ।
sphurati brahmaṇi brahma nāyam astītarātmakaḥ ।। 

ghaṭo brahma paṭo brahma brahmāham idam ātatam ।
ato rāgavirāgāṇāṃ mudhaiva kalanaiva kā ।। 

maraṇabrahmaṇi svairaṃ dehabrahmaṇi saṅgate ।
duḥkhitā nāma keva syād rajjusarpabhramopamā ।। 

sambhogādau sukhe brahmaṇy āsthite dehabrahmaṇi ।
sampannam etan ma iti mudhā syāt kalanā kutaḥ ।। 

vīcyambhasos spandavator na stas tvanmanmatī yathā ।
tvattāmatte tathā na sto brahmaṇi spandarūpiṇi ।। 

yathāvarte mṛte toye na kiñcin mriyate kvacit ।
mṛte brahmatvam āyāte dehabrahmaṇi vai tathā ।। 

yathā calācale toye tvattāmatte na tiṣṭhataḥ ।
tathā jaḍājaḍe rūpe na sthite paramātmani ।। 

kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemno yathāvarto jalasya ca ।
tadatadbhāvarūpeyaṃ tathā prakṛtir ātmanaḥ ।। 

idaṃ hi bhūtaṃ jīvātma jaḍarūpam idaṃ bhavet ।
ity ajñātātmano moho na tu jñātātmanaḥ kvacit ।। 

ajñasya duḥkhaughamayaṃ jñasyānandamayaṃ jagat ।
andhaṃ bhuvanam andhasya prakāśaṃ tu sacakṣuṣaḥ ।। 

jagad ekātmakaṃ jñasya jaḍasya dvaitaduḥkhadam ।
śiśor eva sphuradyakṣā niśā puṃsas tu kevalā ।। 

asmin brahmaghane nityam ekasmin sarvatas sthite ।
na kiñcin mriyate rāma na ca kiñcana jīvati ।। 

yathollāsavilāseṣu na naśyati na jāyate ।
taraṅgādi mahāmbhodhau bhūtavṛndaṃ tathātmani ।। 

idaṃ nāstīdam astīti bhrāntināmnātmanātmani ।
śaktir nirhetukaivāntas sphurati sphaṭikāṃśuvat ।। 

jagacchaktyātmanātmaiva brahma svātmani saṃsthitam ।
taraṅgakaṇajālena payasīva payoghanam ।। 

śarīranāśena kathaṃ brahmaṇo mṛtadhīr bhavet ।
brahmaṇo vyatiriktaṃ hi na śarīrādi vidyate ।
payaso vyatirekeṇa taraṅgādi yathārṇave ।। 

yaḥ kaṇo yā ca kaṇikā yā vīcī yas taraṅgakaḥ ।
yaḥ pheno yā ca laharī tad yathā vāri vāriṇi ।। 

yo deho yā ca kalanā yad dṛśyaṃ yau kṣayāvyayau ।
yehā yā racanā yo arthas tat tathā brahma brahmaṇi ।। 

saṃsthānaracanā citrā brahmaṇaḥ kanakād iva ।
nānyarūpā vimūḍhānāṃ mudhaiva dvitvabhāvanam ।। 

mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca ।
brahmaiva sarvaṃ nānyātma sukhaduḥkhādi vidyate ।। 

ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ ca tvam ityādyarthotthayā girā ।
śabdaḥ pratiśraveṇādrāv ivātmātmani jṛmbhate ।। 

brahmaivājñātam ajñatvam abhyāgatam iva sthitam ।
tathā hi dṛśyate svapnacetasātmātmanā mṛtaḥ ।। 

abhāvitaṃ brahmatayā brahmājñānamayaṃ bhavet ।
abhāvitaṃ hematayā yathā hemaiva mṛd bhavet ।। 

jñātaṃ brahmatayā brahma brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
jñātaṃ hematayā hema hemaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

brahmātmā sarvaśaktir hi yad yathā bhāvayaty alam ।
nirhetukaṃ svayaṃ śaktyā tat tathāśu prapaśyati ।। 

akarmakartṛkaraṇam akāraṇam anāmayam ।
svayaṃprabhu mahātmaitad brahma brahmavido viduḥ ।। 

aparijñātam ajñānam ajñānam iti kathyate ।
parijñātaṃ bhavej jñānam ajñānaparināśanam ।। 

bandhur evāparijñāto hy abandhur iti kathyate ।
parijñāto bhaved bandhur abandhubhramanāśanāt ।। 

idaṃ tv ayuktam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā ।
tasmād ayuktād vairasyād yayā kila virajyate ।। 

dvaitaṃ tv asatyam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā ।
tasmād dvaitāt suvairasyād yayā kila virajyate ।। 

ayaṃ nāham iti jñāte sphuṭaṃ sodeti bhāvanā ।
mithyāhaṅkāratādātmyād yayā nūnaṃ virajyate ।। 

brahmaivāham iti jñāte satyaṃ sodeti bhāvanā ।
tasmin satye nije rūpe yayāntaḥ parilīyate ।। 

sarvam eveha brahmeti jñāte brahmaiva śiṣyate ।
pīte amṛte amṛtamayaḥ ko nāma na bhavet kila ।। 

ceto yad evāharati tad evāśu bhavaty alam ।
brahmaikābhyavahāreṇa brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

yan mithyā tan mudhaiveti jñāte sodeti bhāvanā ।
mithyāpratītir akhilā yayā nūnaṃ pramārjyate ।। 

sarvaṃ sad eveti tate jñāte sodeti bhāvanā ।
tasmin satye tate sphāre yayāntaḥ prāpyate sthitiḥ ।। 

yathābhūte yathātattve yathārūpe yathāsthite ।
bhāvanā sthitim āyāti nānyatrāṅga kadācana ।। 

samāśatopayāte api vismṛte api nije jane ।
abandhuvat sthite apy antas snihyaty eva balān manaḥ ।। 

janmāntaraśatābhyaste sthite api hi bhavabhrame ।
ātmātmany eva vimale nirvṛtiṃ vindate parāṃ ।। 

nityam antikasaṃsthe api pare bandhāv ivāśrite ।
bandhubhāvaṃ gate apy antar mano yāti na nirvṛtim ।। 

atyantagupte api viṣe bhojanasthe nanu smṛtiḥ ।
nivṛttāpi pravṛttāpi sphuraty eva cakoravat ।। 

janmāntaraśatābhyaste apy āgate sauhṛdaṃ param ।
anātmabhūte dṛśye asmin nāyam ātmā prasīdati ।। 

atyantagupte apy amṛte bhojanasthe nanu smṛtiḥ ।
rājate rajanī meghacchanne apīva niśākare ।। 

nitye satye tathābhūta ātmātmany eva hṛṣyati ।
nānātāciragupte api lupte api kalanāmalaiḥ ।। 

tāvad ātmātmanā yatnāt prakṣālyedaṃ malaṃ malaiḥ ।
durbhāvanamalaś śāstraiś śodhyo yāvad bhavet sitaḥ ।। 

śāntadurvāsane jñānaṃ puṇyaṃ lagati cetasi ।
niṣkalaṅke site vastre yathā kuṅkumarañjanam ।। 

sarvaṃ sakalanirmāṇaṃ kāleṣu triṣv api sthitam ।
nityam ekaṃ samaṃ śuddhaṃ brahmaiveti suniścayaḥ ।। 

sarvathā sarvadā sārvaṃ sarvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādimat ।
jagajjanitavistāraṃ brahmedam iti vedmy aham ।। 

na me duḥkhaṃ na karmāṇi na mamehā na vāñchitam ।
samas svastho viśoko asmi brahmāham iti satyatā ।। 

ahaṃ raktam ahaṃ māṃsam aham asthīny ahaṃ vapuḥ ।
cid ahaṃ cetanaṃ cāhaṃ brahmāham iti satyatā ।। 

ahaṃ tṛṇam ahaṃ vallī gulmo ahaṃ kānanāny aham ।
śailasāgarasārtho ahaṃ brahmaivetthaṃ kila sthitam ।। 

ādānadānasaṅkocapūrvikā bhūtaśaktayaḥ ।
sarvam eva cidātmāsmi brahma vyātatarūpadhṛt ।। 

latāgulmāṅkurādīnām aham udbhāvanaiṣaṇāḥ ।
cidātmāntargataṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ brahma rasātmakam ।। 

yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ ।
so ayaṃ cid aham ekātmā paraṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ ।। 

cid ātmā brahma sat satyam ṛtaṃ jña iti nāmabhiḥ ।
procyate sarvagaṃ tattvaṃ cinmātraṃ cetyavarjitam ।। 

ābhāsamātram amalaṃ sarvabhūtāvabodhakam ।
sarvatrāvasthitaṃ śāntaṃ cidbrahmety anubhūyate ।। 

manobuddhīndriyavrātasamastakalanācitam ।
bhedaṃ tyaktvā svam ābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayam ।। 

śabdādīnām aśeṣāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।
tattvāvabhāsakaṃ svacchaṃ cidbrahmāsmi na me kṣayaḥ ।। 

anāratagalatsvacchaciddhārāvahanātmakam ।
ālokas samanomaunaṃ cidbrahmāsmy amṛtaṃ param ।। 

anāratagaladrūpaṃ nityaṃ cānubhavāmṛtam ।
aharniśaṃ kacatkānti cidbrahmāham alepakaḥ ।। 

suṣuptasadṛśaṃ śāntam ālokavimalātmakam ।
sambhogāntasamābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāsmi vivāsanaḥ ।। 

khaṇḍādisvādusaṃvittir īṣad yatrānutiṣṭhati ।
cittādiṣv apy abuddheṣu tac cidbrahmāham acyutaḥ ।। 

kāntāsaṃsaktacittasya candre samudite sati ।
candrapratyayasattātma cidbrahmāham anāmayam ।। 

bhūmiṣṭhanaradṛṣṭīnāṃ lagnānāṃ khe niśākare ।
yā khasthā tantuvac chaktis tac cidbrahmāsmi nirmalam ।। 

sukhaduḥkhādikalanāvikalaṃ nirmanas tathā ।
satyānubhavarūpātma cidbrahmātmāsmi śāśvatam ।। 

asaṃstutādhvagāloke manasy anyatra saṃsthite ।
yā pratītir anāgaskā tac cidbrahmāsmi sarvagaḥ ।। 

bhūvāryanilabījānāṃ sambandhe aṅkurakarmasu ।
śaktir udgamanī yāntas tac cidbrahmāham ātatam ।। 

kharjūranimbabimbānāṃ svayam ātmani tiṣṭhatām ।
yāsvādasattā līnāntas tad brahma cid ahaṃ samam ।। 

khedānandavimuktāntas saṃvin nirmananodayā ।
lābhālābhavidhau tulyā cidbrahmāsmi nirāmayam ।। 

yāvad bhūmer dhruvas tāvad dṛṣṭisūtraṃ yad ātatam ।
tanmadhyasadṛśaṃ śāntaṃ nirmalaṃ cid ahaṃ tatam ।। 

jāgraty api suṣupte api svapne api satatoditam ।
turyarūpam anādyantaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayaḥ ।। 

puṃsāṃ kṣetraśatotthānām ikṣūṇāṃ svāduvat sthitaḥ ।
sarveṣām ekarūpo antaś cidbrahmāsmi samas sthitaḥ ।। 

sarvagā prakṛtau sūkṣmarūpā bhānor iva prabhā ।
ālokakāriṇī kāntā cidbrahmedam ahaṃ tatam ।। 

sambhogānandalavavad amṛtāsvādaśaktivat ।
svānubhūtyekamāno antaś cidbrahmāsmi sad avyayaḥ ।। 

protāṅgam api guptasthaṃ dehe tantur bise yathā ।
chedabhede sphuradrūpaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayaḥ ।। 

ākrāntabhuvanāpy abhramāleva spandaśālinī ।
durlakṣyāṇumayākārā cicchaktir aham ātatā ।। 

anubhūtimayāntassthasnehamātropalakṣitā ।
kṣīrāntarghṛtasatteva cid ahaṃ kṣayavarjitā ।। 

kaṭakāṅgadakeyūraracanā tadatanmayī ।
hemnīva saṃsthitā dehe cid brahmātmāsmi sarvagam ।। 

padārthaughasya śailāder bahir antaś ca saṃsthitā ।
sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa yā cit sāham alepakaḥ ।। 

sarvāsām anubhūtīnām ādarśo yo hy akṛtrimaḥ ।
agamyo malalekhānāṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ mahat ।। 

sarvasaṅkalpaphaladaṃ sarvatejaḥprakāśakam ।
sarvopādeyasīmāntaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

sarvāvayavaviśrāntaṃ samastāvayavātigam ।
anārataṃ kacadrūpaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

ghaṭe paṭe taṭe kuḍye svadamānaṃ sadā tanau ।
jāgraty api suṣuptasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

uṣṇam agnau hime śītaṃ mṛṣṭam anne śitaṃ kṣure ।
kṛṣṇaṃ dhvānte sitaṃ candre cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

madhurādiṣu mādhuryaṃ tīkṣṇādiṣu ca tīkṣṇatām ।
gataṃ padārthaśaktyarthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu turye turyātige pade ।
samaṃ sadaiva sarvatra cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

praśāntasarvasaṅkalpaṃ vigatākhilakautukam ।
viratāśeṣasaṃrambhaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

niṣkautukaṃ nirālambaṃ nirīhaṃ sarvam eva ca ।
niraṃśaṃ nirahaṅkāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

sarvasyānte sthitaṃ sarvam apy apāraikarūpiṇam ।
aparyantaṃ cidārambhaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

trailokyadehamuktānāṃ tantum uttamam ātatam ।
prasārasaṅkocakaraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

līnam antar bahiś cograṃ kroḍīkṛtya jagatkhagam ।
citraṃ bṛhajjālam iva cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

sarvaṃ yatredam asty eva nāsty eva ca manāg api ।
sadasadbhūtam ekaṃ tac cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

paramaṃ pratyayaṃ pūrṇam āspadaṃ sarvasaṃvidām ।
sarvākāravihārasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

carmamarmasirābaddhadehaduryantravāhakam ।
akalaṃ sakalādhāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

niṣkalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaṃ kalanākāravarjitam ।
sarvākāraṃ nakiñcic ca cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

hṛtkaṇṭhatālumadhyasthaṃ bhrūnāsāpuṭakoṭigam ।
gamāgamotkaprāṇasthaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

hṛtpadmakoṭarāntassthaṃ sarvāvayavakośagam ।
bhuvanāḍambarādarśaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

aśiraskahakārāntam ābhāsvaram akhaṇḍitam ।
bhūṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtīnāṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

snehādhāradaśāśāntimukhavātāhatibhramaiḥ ।
yuktaṃ muktaṃ ca ciddīpaṃ bahir antar upāsmahe ।। 

hṛtsaraḥpadminīkandatantuṃ sarvāṅgarañjakam ।
janatājīvitopāyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

akṣīrārṇavasambhūtam aśaśāṅkāśayasthitam ।
ahāryam amṛtaṃ satyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

śabdarūparasasparśagandhair ābhāsam āgatam ।
tenaiva rahitaṃ śāntaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

mahāmahimnā sahitam ahataṃ sarvakartṛbhiḥ ।
kartṛtvenāpy akartāraṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

akhilam idam ahaṃ mamaiva sarvaṃ tv aham api nāham athetarac ca nāham ।
iti viditavato jagat kṣataṃ me sthiram atha vāstu gatajvaro bhavāmi ।। 

jīvanmuktaniścayayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti niścayavantas te mahānto vigatainasaḥ ।
satyāsatyapade śānte same sukham avasthitāḥ ।। 

iti pūrṇadhiyo dhīrās samanīrāgacetasaḥ ।
na nindanti na nandanti jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā ।। 

ity alaṅghyacamatkārā nārāyaṇabhujā iva ।
rejur askhalitākārā aparā iva meravaḥ ।। 

remire vanaṣaṇḍeṣu dvīpeṣu nagareṣu ca ।
devopavanamālāsu svargeṣu ca surā iva ।। 

bhremuḥ kusumapūrṇāsu dolālīlābilāsu ca ।
vicitravanalekhāsu meruśṛṅgaśilāsu ca ।। 

cakrur vijitaśatrūṇi cāmaracchatravanti ca ।
vicitrārthāni rājyāni citrācāramayāni ca ।। 

anujagmur imāṃ sarvāṃ nānārasaviceṣṭitām ।
śrutismṛtyuditārambhām itikartavyatām iha ।। 

vilesū ramaṇīyeṣu lalanālāsyahāriṣu ।
vihārāhāraramyeṣu bhogābhogeṣu bhūṣitāḥ ।। 

viceruś cārucūtāsu mandāravalitāsu ca ।
apsarogītapūrṇāsu nandanodyānabhūmiṣu ।। 

ūṣur ācārapūteṣu viśrāntākhilajantuṣu ।
yajñakriyākarāleṣu gārhasthyeṣu yathākramam ।। 

terur hatagajendrāsu bhrāntabhūriśarāsu ca ।
bherībhāṅkārabhīmāsu saṅgrāmārṇavavīciṣu ।। 

tasthuḥ puruṣacintāsu hṛtacittoddhatāsu ca ।
saṃrambhakṣobharaudrāsu sarvāsu dvandvanītiṣu ।। 

manas teṣāṃ tu nīrāgam anupādhi gatabhramam ।
asaktam uttamaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ sattvapadaṃ gatam ।। 

na mamajja kvacid api saṅkaṭeṣu mahatsu ca ।
muhur apy upayāteṣu kulaśailas sarassv iva ।। 

nollalāsa vilāsinyā śriyā paramakāntayā ।
paripūrṇendulakṣmyeva jalarāśī raghūdvaha ।। 

na mamlau duḥkhaśoṣeṇa grīṣmeṇeva vanasthalam ।
jaharṣa ca na bhogaughair avaśyāyair ivauṣadhiḥ ।। 

te hi kevalam avyagrāḥ kurvantaḥ kāryapañjaram ।
iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ rāma nābhileṣur na tatyajuḥ ।। 

nodaguḥ kāryasampattāv ākrāntā nāstam āyayuḥ ।
jahṛṣur na sukhaprāptau mamlur naiva ca saṅkaṭe ।। 

mumuhur na vimoheṣu mamajjur na vipatkrame ।
śuśucur na śucā śoke rurudur na bhavān iva ।। 

prakṛtācārasamprāptaṃ kurvantaḥ karma kevalam ।
sthitā vigatasaṃrambham aparā iva meravaḥ ।। 

tāṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm ।
anahaṅkṛtyalaṅkāro vihareha yathāsukham ।। 

yathābhūtām imām evaṃ paśyan sargaparamparām ।
merusthiro abdhigambhīras samāssva vigatabhramaḥ ।। 

cinmātraṃ sarvam evedam ittham ābhāsatāṃ gatam ।
neha satyam asatyaṃ vā kvacid apy asti kiñcana ।। 

mahattām alam ālambya tyaktvedam avahelayā ।
asaktabuddhis sarvatra bhava bhavya bhavakṣayī ।। 

kiṃ rodiṣi ghanodvegaṃ mūḍhavac cānuśocasi ।
bhramasy udbhrāntacittaṃ ca somyāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho nu bhagavan nūnaṃ samyagrūpaṃ vilakṣaye ।
tvatprasādāt prabuddho asmi sūryāsaṅgād ivāmbujam ।। 

bhrāntir astaṅgatā nūnaṃ mihikā śaradīva me ।
saṃśāntākhilasandehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava ।। 

vyapagatamadamoho mānamātsaryamuktaś cirataram uditātmā śāntaśokaś cireṇa ।
punar asukham agacchan svacchayaikāntabuddhyā vadasi yad asi sādho tat kariṣye viśaṅkam ।। 

jīvanmuktaniścayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

samyagjñānavilāsena vāsanāvilayodaye ।
jīvanmuktapade brahman vada viśramyate katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃsārottaraṇe yuktir yogaśabdena kathyate ।
tāṃ viddhi dviprakārāṃ tvaṃ cittopaśamadharmiṇīm ।। 

ātmajñānaṃ prakāro asyā ekaḥ prakathito bhuvi ।
dvitīyaḥ prāṇasaṃrodhaś śṛṇu so ayaṃ mayocyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

sulabhatvād aduḥkhatvāt kataraś śobhano anayoḥ ।
yenāvagatamātreṇa bhūyaḥ kṣobho na bādhate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prakārau dvāv api proktau yogaśabdena yady api ।
tathāpi rūḍhim āyātaḥ prāṇayuktāv asau bhṛśam ।। 

evaṃ yogas tathā jñānaṃ saṃsārottaraṇakrame ।
samāv upāyau dvāv eva proktāv ekaphalapradau ।। 

asādhyaḥ kasyacid yogaḥ kasyacij jñānaniścayaḥ ।
mama tv abhimatas sādho susādho jñānajaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

yaj jñātaṃ na tad ajñātaṃ svapneṣv api punar bhavet ।
jñānaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nityam eva pravartate ।। 

dhāraṇāsanadeśādisādhyatvena susādhatāṃ ।
nāyāti yogo hy atha vā vikalpo naiṣa śobhanaḥ ।। 

dvāv eva kila yatnotthau jñānayogau raghūdvaha ।
tatroktaṃ bhavato jñānam antassthajñeyanirmalam ।। 

prāṇāpānarathārūḍho gūḍhadehaguhāśayaḥ ।
anantasiddhidas sādho yogo ayaṃ procyate śṛṇu ।। 

mukhānilasphuraṇanirodhasambhave sthitiṃ gate nṛpasuta cetasaḥ kṣaye ।
samāhitasthitir iha yogayuktitaḥ pare pade vigalitabhīr nivatsyasi ।। 

jñānayogavicāro nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asti tāvad anantasya khasya kvacid ayaṃ kila ।
jagadrūpaḥ parispando mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva ।। 

tatra kāraṇatāṃ yāto brahmā kamalasambhavaḥ ।
sthitaḥ pitāmahatvena sṛṣṭabhūtabharabhramaḥ ।। 

tasyāhaṃ mānasaḥ putro vasiṣṭhaś śreṣṭhaceṣṭitaḥ ।
ṛkṣacakre dhruvavṛte nivasāmi yugaṃ prati ।। 

so ahaṃ kadācid āsthāne svarge tiṣṭhañ śatakratoḥ ।
śrutavān nāradādibhyaḥ kathāṃ sucirajīvinām ।। 

kathāprasaṅge kasmiṃścid atha tatrābhyuvāca ha ।
śātātapo nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ ।। 

meror īśānakoṇasthapadmarāgamaye divi ।
asti kalpataruś śrīmāñ śṛṅge cūḍa iti śrutaḥ ।। 

tasya kalpataror mūrdhni dakṣiṇaskandhakoṭare ।
kaladhautalatāprānte vidyate vihagālayaḥ ।। 

tasmin nivasati śrīmān bhusuṇḍo nāma vāyasaḥ ।
vītarāgo bṛhatkośe brahmeva nijapaṅkaje ।। 

sa yathā jagataḥ kośe jīvatīha surāś ciram ।
cirajīvī tathā svarge na bhūto na bhaviṣyati ।। 

sa dīrghāyus sa nīrogas sa śrīmān sa mahāmatiḥ ।
sa viśrāntamatiś śāntas sa kāntaḥ kālakovidaḥ ।। 

sa yathā jīvati khagas tatheha yadi jīvyate ।
tad bhavej jīvitaṃ puṃsāṃ dīrghaṃ cādeyam eva ca ।। 

iti tena bhusuṇḍo asau bhūyaḥpṛṣṭena varṇitaḥ ।
yathāvad eva devānāṃ sabhāyāṃ satyamūrtinā ।। 

kathāvasarasaṃśāntāv atha yāte suravraje ।
bhusuṇḍavihagaṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ yātaḥ kutūhalāt ।। 

bhusuṇḍas saṃsthito yatra meroś śṛṅgaṃ tad unnatam ।
samprāptavān kṣaṇenāhaṃ padmarāgamayaṃ bṛhat ।। 

drutagairikakāntena tejasā vahnivarcasā ।
madhvāsavaraseneva rañjayan kakubhāṃ gaṇam ।। 

kalpāntajvalanajvālāpiṇḍādrim iva sañcitam ।
indranīlaśilādhūmam ālokāruṇitāmbaram ।। 

sarveṣām eva rāgāṇāṃ rāśim adrāv iva sthitam ।
sarvasandhyābhrajālānāṃ ghanam ekam ivākaram ।। 

utkrāntiṃ kurvato meror brahmanāḍyeva nirgatam ।
mūrdhānam āgataṃ kāntaṃ vāḍavaṃ jaṭharānalam ।। 

sumeruvanadevyeva navālaktakarañjitam ।
līlayādātum induṃ khe nītaṃ hastaṃ śikhāṅgulim ।। 

jvālābhir iva mālābhir aruṇābhiḥ payomucām ।
khaṃ gantum iva saspandaṃ śailastham iva vāḍavam ।। 

tārās spraṣṭum ivākāśam aṅgulībhir ivāśribhiḥ ।
kacadaṃśunakhāgrābhiḥ paricumbad ivonnatam ।। 

kacadratnaśilāśvabhraṃ bhāsvatkanakakandaram ।
saratkusumareṇvabhraṃ bhramadvidyādharāmaram ।। 

kvaṇadvaṃśalasadvātaṃ nṛtyadratnalatāṅganam ।
garjajjīmūtamurajaṃ bhūbhṛto nāṭyamaṇḍapam ।। 

hasatkusumagucchāḍhyaṃ dhvanatṣaṭpadapeṭakam ।
dantatālaṃ dalāvalyā parihāsād iva sphuṭam ।। 

dolālolāpsarovṛndam uddāmamadamanmatham ।
śilāviśrāntavibudhaṃ mithunāśritakandaram ।। 

varāmbarājinaṃ śubhraṃ gaṅgāyajñopavīti ca ।
tāpasaṃ piṅgalam iva veṇudaṇḍadharaṃ sthitam ।। 

gaṅgānirjharanirhrādi latāgṛhagatāmaram ।
gandharvagītasubhagam āmodimadhurānilam ।। 

phullahemāmbujottaṃsaṃ tārāratnavibhūṣitam ।
vyomnaḥ pāram iva prāptaṃ piṅgalaṃ mairavaṃ śiraḥ ।। 

sitaharitapītapāṭaladhavalair maṇikusumarāśinavaraṅgaiḥ ।
vidhivihitāmalacitraṃ līlācalam amarayuvatilokasya ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyāne meruśikharavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kusumāpūrṇakalpābhrakuntale tasya mūrdhani ।
kalpāgam aham adrākṣaṃ śikhācakram iva sthitam ।। 

puṣpareṇvabhravalitaṃ ratnastabakadanturam ।
utsedhanirjitākāśaṃ śṛṅge śṛṅgam ivārpitam ।। 

tārādviguṇapuṣpaughaṃ meghadviguṇapallavam ।
raśmidviguṇareṇvabhraṃ taḍiddviguṇapiñjaram ।। 

skandheṣu kinnarīgītadviguṇabhramarīsvanam ।
dolālolāpsarolokadviguṇīkṛtasallatam ।। 

siddhagandharvasaṅghātadviguṇāgryavihaṅgamam ।
ratnakāntyacchanīhāradviguṇatvagvṛtāṃśukam ।। 

candrabimbasamāśleṣadviguṇāgryabṛhatphalam ।
mūkasaṃlīnakalpābhradviguṇīkṛtaparvakam ।। 

surasaṃvalitaskandhaṃ pattraviśrāntakinnaram ।
nikuñjakūjajjīmūtaṃ kacchasuptasurārbhakam ।। 

svākāravipulān bhṛṅgān utsārya valayasvanaiḥ ।
apsarobhramarībhiś ca gṛhītakusumāntaram ।। 

surakinnaragandharvavidyādharavarānvitam ।
jagadvārkṣīm iva gataṃ daśām ākāśapūraṇīm ।। 

nīrandhrakalikājālaṃ nīrandhramṛdupallavam ।
nīrandhravikasatpuṣpaṃ nīrandhraphalamālitam ।। 

nīrandhramañjarīpuñjaṃ nīrandhramaṇigucchakam ।
nīrandhrāṃśukaratnāḍhyaṃ latāvikasanākulam ।। 

sarvartukusumāpūrais sarvartuphalapallavaiḥ ।
sarvāmodarajaḥpuñjaiḥ paraṃ vaicitryam āgatam ।। 

tasya kaccheṣu kuñjeṣu latāpattreṣu parvasu ।
puṣpeṣv ālayasaṃlīnān vihagān dṛṣṭavān aham ।। 

niśānāthakalākhaṇḍamṛṇālaśakalaidhitān ।
ajanābhyabjinīkandabhojanān brahmasārasān ।। 

viriñcarathahaṃsānāṃ potakān sāmagāyinaḥ ।
oṃkāravedasuhṛdo brāhmapadmabisāśinaḥ ।। 

udgīrṇamantranicayān svāhākāranijasvanān ।
susthiraikataḍitpuñjanīlameghasamopamān ।। 

devān ivājyapān nityaṃ yajñavedīlatādalān ।
śukān kārśānavāñ śyāmāñ śiśūñ śikhiśikhāśikhān ।। 

gaurīrakṣitabarhaughān kaumārān varabarhiṇaḥ ।
skandopanyastaniśśeṣaśaivavijñānakovidān ।। 

vyomny eva jātanaṣṭānāṃ mahatāṃ vyomapakṣiṇām ।
bandhūn ābaddhanilayāñ śaradabhrasamākṛtīn ।। 

viriñcahaṃsajān anyān anyān agniśukodbhavān ।
kaumārabarhijān anyān anyān ambarapakṣijān ।। 

dvituṇḍāṃś cātha bhāruṇḍān hemacūḍān vihaṅgamān ।
kalaviṅkān bakān gṛdhrān kokilān krauñcakukkuṭān ।। 

bhāsacāṣabalākādīn bahūn anyāṃś ca rāghava ।
bhūtaughāñ jagatīvāhaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra pakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

dakṣiṇaskandhaśākhāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ khe davīyasi ।
athāhaṃ dṛṣṭavān puṣṭapattrāyām ambarasthitaḥ ।। 

kālakākolavalayaṃ mañjarījālamālitam ।
lokālokācalāraṇye kalpābhraugham iva sthitam ।। 

tatra paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvad ekatra skandhakoṭare ।
vicitrakusumāstīrṇe vividhāmodaśālini ।। 

śakrānilayamārkendugṛhabalyupajīvinaḥ ।
puṇyakṛdyoṣitāṃ svarge priyasūcakavāśitāḥ ।। 

aparikṣubhitākārās sabhāyāṃ vāyasās sthitāḥ ।
vibhedyameghā vātena sameneva prasāritāḥ ।। 

teṣāṃ madhye sthitaś śrīmān bhusuṇḍaḥ pronnatākṛtiḥ ।
madhye satkācakhaṇḍānām indranīla ivonnataḥ ।। 

paripūrṇamanā mānī samas sarvāṅgasundaraḥ ।
prāṇaspandāvadhānena nityam antarmukhas sukhī ।। 

cirajīvīti vikhyātaś cirajīvitayā tayā ।
jagadviditadīrghāyus sa bhusuṇḍa iti śrutaḥ ।। 

yugāgamāpāyadaśādarśanaprauḍhamānasaḥ ।
pratikalpaṃ ca gaṇayan khinnaś śakraparamparām ।। 

janmanāṃ lokapālānāṃ śauriśakragarutmatām ।
saṃsmartā samatītānāṃ surāsuramahībhṛtām ।। 

prasannagambhīramanāḥ peśalasnigdhamugdhavāk ।
avakravaktā jñātā ca nirmamo nirahaṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

suhṛd dāntas tathā mitraṃ bhṛtyaḥ putro guruḥ prabhuḥ ।
sarvadā sarvathā nityaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya saṃstave ।। 

somyaḥ prasannamadhuro rasavān mahātmā hṛdyas sarovara ivāntar akhaṇḍaśaityaḥ ।
hṛtpuṇḍarīkakuharavyavahāravettā gāmbhīryam accham ajahat prakaṭāśayaśrīḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍadarśanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha tasyāham apataṃ dīpyamānavapuḥ puraḥ ।
kiñcidvikṣobhitasabhaṃ khān nakṣatram ivācale ।। 

cukṣobha vāyasāsthānanīlotpalasaraḥ kṣaṇaṃ ।
matpātamandavātena bhūkampeneva sāgaraḥ ।। 

aśaṅkitam api prāptād darśanāt samanantaram ।
bhusuṇḍas tu vasiṣṭho ayaṃ prāpta ity avabuddhavān ।। 

pattrapuñjāt samuttasthau meghaśāva ivācalāt ।
he mune svāgatam iti provāca madhurākṣaram ।। 

saṅkalpamātrajātābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ kusumāñjalim ।
mahyam āśu dadau bālamegho haimam ivotkaram ।। 

idam āsanam ity uktvā navaṃ kalpatarucchadam ।
upanītavati tyaktabhṛtye vāyasanāyake ।। 

bhusuṇḍānūtthiteṣv īṣaccalapakṣeṣu pakṣiṣu ।
upaviṣṭaṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā svāsanonmukhadṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

sasabhākhagavṛndena bhusuṇḍena samaṃ tataḥ ।
tasmin kalpalatākuñje upaviṣṭo aham āsane ।। 

atha pādyādi dattvā sa bhusuṇḍas tuṣṭamānasaḥ ।
mām uvāca mahātejās sauhārdamadhurākṣaram ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

aho bhagavatāsmākaṃ prasādo darśitaś cirāt ।
darśanāmṛtasekena yat siktās sadrumā vayam ।। 

matpuṇyacirasambhārapreritena tvayādhunā ।
mune mānyaikamānyena kuta āgamanaṃ kṛtam ।। 

kaccid asmin mahāmohe ciraṃ viharatas tava ।
akhaṇḍitaiva samatā sthitā cetasi pāvane ।। 

kimartham adyāgamanakleśenātmā kadarthitaḥ ।
tvadvacaśśrotukāmānām ājñāṃ no dātum arhasi ।। 

tvatpādadarśanād eva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ mayā mune ।
yathāgamanapuṇyena vayam āyojitās tvayā ।। 

cirajīvitacarcābhir vayaṃ te smṛtim āgatāḥ ।
tenemaṃ pādapaṃ pādais tvaṃ pavitritavān ayam ।। 

jñātatvadāgamo apy evaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmīha yan mune ।
bhavadvākyāmṛtāsvādavāñchā tat pravijṛmbhate ।। 

ity uktavān asau pakṣī bhusuṇḍaś cirajīvitaḥ ।
trikālāmalasaṃvedī tatra proktam idaṃ mayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vihaṅgamamahārāja satyam etat tvayocyate ।
draṣṭum abhyāgato asmy adya tvām eva cirajīvitam ।। 

āśītalāntaḥkaraṇo diṣṭyā kuśalavān asi ।
patito asi na śuddhātman bhīṣaṇāṃ bhavavāgurām ।। 

tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi bhagavan mama tattvataḥ ।
kasmin kule bhavāñ jāto jñātajñeyaḥ kathaṃ bhavān ।। 

kiyad āyuś ca te sādho vṛttaṃ smarasi kiṃ ca vā ।
kena vāyaṃ nivāsas te nirdiṣṭo dīrghadarśinā ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

yat pṛcchasi mune sarvaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham ।
anudvegitayeyaṃ naḥ kathā śravyā mahātmanā ।। 

yuṣmadvidhās tribhuvanaprabhupūjyarūpā ākarṇayanti yad udāradhiyo mahāntaḥ ।
tenāśubhaṃ prakathitena vināśam eti meghasya dehavibhavena yathārkatāpaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha rāma bhusuṇḍo asau na prahṛṣṭo na jihmadhīḥ ।
sarvāṅgasundaraś śyāmaḥ prāvṛṣīva payodharaḥ ।। 

snigdhagambhīravacanas smitapūrvābhibhāṣaṇaḥ ।
karasthapālīvatavatpratolitajagattrayaḥ ।। 

tṛṇavaddṛṣṭasakalaḥ prameyīkṛtasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
lokājavañjavībhāve dṛṣṭe jñātaparāvaraḥ ।। 

dhīras sthirasamākāro viśrānta iva mandaraḥ ।
paripūrṇas samaś śuddhaḥ pūrṇārṇava ivāhataḥ ।। 

padaviśrāntadhīś śāntaḥ paramānandaghūrṇitaḥ ।
āvirbhāvatirobhāvatajjñas saṃsārajanminām ।। 

sarabhasavacanābhirāmarūpaḥ priyamadhurocitacāruhṛdyavākyaḥ ।
svayam iva navam āsthitaś śarīraṃ sakalabhayāpaharaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ ।। 

idam amalagirāha hāsaśuddhaṃ mṛdupadam ujjhitasambhramaṃ krameṇa ।
kathayitum akhilaṃ nijaṃ svarūpaṃ madhura iva stanitena mugdhameghaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

asty asmiñ jagati jyeṣṭhas sarvanākanivāsinām ।
devadevo haro nāma devadevābhipūjitaḥ ।। 

ṣaṭpadaśreṇinayanā yasyoccastabakastanī ।
vilāsinī śarīrārdhe latā cūtataror iva ।। 

himahārasitā yasya laharīstabakombhitā ।
āveṣṭitajaṭājūṭā gaṅgā kusumamālikā ।। 

kṣīrasāgarasambhūtaḥ prasṛtāmṛtanirjharaḥ ।
pratibimbaśaśaś śrīmān yasya cūḍāmaṇiś śaśī ।। 

anārataśiraścandraprasraveṇāmarīkṛtaḥ ।
yasyendranīlavat kālakūṭaḥ kaṇṭhasya bhūṣaṇam ।। 

dhūlilekhāmahāvartaṃ svacchaṃ pāvakasambhavam ।
paramāṇucayaṃ bhasma yasya snānajalaṃ sitam ।। 

nirmalāni jitendūni ghṛṣṭāni ghaṭitāni ca ।
yasyāsthīny eva ratnāni dehe kāntimayāni ca ।। 

daśāśādaśam ambhodanīlaṃ śītalapallavam ।
tārakābinduśabalaṃ yasya cāmbaram ambaram ।। 

bhramacchivāṅganaṃ pakvamahāmāṃsaudanākulam ।
bahubhūter gṛhaṃ yasya śmaśānaṃ himapāṇḍuram ।। 

kapālamālābharaṇāḥ pītaraktarasāsavāḥ ।
antrasragdāmavalitā bandhavo yasya mātaraḥ ।। 

prasphuranmūrdhamaṇayaś copanto masṛṇāṅgakāḥ ।
bhujagā valayā yasya prakacatkanakatviṣaḥ ।। 

dṛkpātapluṣṭaśailendraṃ jagatkavalanālasam ।
bhairavācaritaṃ yasya līlāsantrāsitāmaram ।। 

svasthīkṛtajagajjīvas svavyāpārasthacetasaḥ ।
yadṛcchayā karaspando yasyāsurapurakṣayaḥ ।। 

ekāgramūrtayas sneharāgadveṣavivarjitāḥ ।
svajanā yasya te śailās sarasā api nīrasāḥ ।। 

śiraḥkhurāḥ khurakarāḥ karadantā bhujodarāḥ ।
ṛkṣoṣṭrājāhivaktrāś ca pramathā yasya lālakāḥ ।। 

yasya netratrayodbhāsivadanasyāmaraprabhoḥ ।
yathā gaṇās tathaivānyaḥ parivāro hi mātaraḥ ।। 

nṛtyanti mātaras tasya puro bhūtagaṇānatāḥ ।
caturdaśavidhānantabhūtajātaikabhojanāḥ ।। 

kharoṣṭrakākavadanā raktamedovasāsavāḥ ।
digambarā vihāriṇyaś śarīrāvayavasrajaḥ ।। 

vasanti girikūṭeṣu vyomni lokāntareṣu ca ।
aṭavīṣu śmaśāneṣu śarīreṣu ca dehinām ।। 

jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā ।
vāmasrotogatā etās tumburuṃ rudram āśritāḥ ।। 

siddhā śuṣkā ca raktā ca utpalā ceti devatāḥ ।
sroto dakṣiṇam āśritya bhairavaṃ rudram āśritāḥ ।। 

sarvāsām eva mātṝṇām aṣṭāv etās tu nāyikāḥ ।
āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaś śatasahasraśaḥ ।। 

raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī brāhmī vārāhī vāyavī tathā ।
kaumārī vāsavī saurī cetyādyās tās sahasraśaḥ ।। 

āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaḥ khecarya uttamāḥ ।
devakinnaragandharvapuruṣāsurasambhavāḥ ।। 

tāsām anugatās tv anyā bhūcaryaḥ koṭiśas sthitāḥ ।
rūpikānāmadhāriṇyo bhūmau puruṣabhojanāḥ ।। 

hayā gajāḥ kharāḥ kākā uṣṭrājagaramarkaṭāḥ ।
ityādivāhanāny āsāṃ carantīnāṃ jagattraye ।। 

tāḥ kāścit paśudharmiṇyaḥ kṣudrakarmasv avasthitāḥ ।
kāścid viditavedyatvāj jīvanmuktapade sthitāḥ ।। 

tāsāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ mātṝṇāṃ munināyaka ।
alambuseti vikhyātā mātā mānada vidyate ।। 

vajrāśrituṇḍaś caṇḍākhya indranīlācalopamaḥ ।
tasyās tu vāhanaṃ kāko vaiṣṇavyā garuḍo yathā ।। 

ity aṣṭaiśvaryayuktās tā mātaro raudraceṣṭitāḥ ।
vyomni melāpakaṃ cakrur ekadā samam āgatāḥ ।। 

pūjayitvā jagatpūjyau devau tumburubhairavau ।
vicitrārthāḥ kathāś cakrū rudhirāsavatoṣitāḥ ।। 

atheyam āyayau tāsāṃ kathāvasarataḥ kathā ।
asmān umāpatir devaḥ kiṃ paśyaty avahelayā ।। 

prabhāvaṃ darśayāmo asya punar nāsmān asau yathā ।
dṛṣṭamātramahāśaktiḥ kariṣyaty avadhīraṇam ।। 

iti niścitya tā devyo vivarṇavadanāṅgikām ।
umām eva vaśīkṛtya prokṣayām āsur ādṛtāḥ ।। 

māyayāpahṛtāṃ bhartur aṅgād bhaṅgam upāgatām ।
tām ālolakacāṃ devyaś cakrur odanatāṃ gatām ।। 

pārvatīprokṣaṇadine tasmiṃs tatra mahotsavaḥ ।
babhūva tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ nṛttageyamanoramaḥ ।। 

anyā nanṛtur uddāmaravam evāmbarāmbarāḥ ।
dīrghāvayavavikṣepavikāsijaghanodarāḥ ।। 

anyā jahasur uddāmatālakṣveḍāghanāravam ।
lasadaṅgavikāraṃ ca dhvanaḍḍamarukānanāḥ ।। 

anyā jagur dhvanacchailaguham āpānatoṣitāḥ ।
tārāravaṃ raṇadrandhrajaganmaṇḍapakoṭare ।। 

anyāḥ pānaṃ papuḥ puṣṭacarvitārdraśiraḥkhuram ।
līlāghuraghurārāvaraṇadākāśakoṭarāḥ ।। 

papur udagur athoccais terur ājagmur ūṣur jahasur apur ahauṣuḥ petur uccair vavalguḥ ।
nanṛtur aniśam ādus svādumāṃsaṃ ca devyas tribhuvanam apavṛttaṃ cakrur unmattanṛttāḥ ।। 

mātṛvyavahāravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

ity utsave vartamāne tāsāṃ vāhās ta uttamāḥ ।
tathaiva mattā jahasur nanṛtuḥ papur apy asṛk ।। 

tatra kāntāsavonmattāḥ kvacin nanṛtur ambare ।
rathahaṃsyas sitā brāhmyaḥ kākaś cālambusārathaḥ ।। 

nṛtyantīnāṃ tu haṃsīnāṃ pibantīnāṃ tathāsavam ।
velevābdhitaṭīnāṃ tu ratis samyag ajāyata ।। 

sañjātaratayo mattās sarvā haṃsyaḥ krameṇa tāḥ ।
remire tena kākena caṇḍakākhyena vai tadā ।। 

saptānāṃ bālahaṃsīnāṃ dayito vāyasas tv asau ।
krameṇāramataikatra yāvad anyo'nyam īpsitam ।। 

atha tā garbhadhāriṇyo babhūvur atitoṣitāḥ ।
devyaś ca kṛtanṛttās tāḥ praśāntamadatāṃ yayuḥ ।। 

dadur odanatāṃ yātām īśvarāya priyām umām ।
bhojanāya mahāmāyā devyas tāś śūlapāṇaye ।। 

priyā me bhojane dattety evaṃ ca śaśiśekharaḥ ।
buddhvā babhūva ruṣito yadā mātṛgaṇaṃ prati ।। 

tadā tās tāṃ samutpādya svāṅgadānena vai punaḥ ।
dadur bhūyovivāhena pārvatīm indumaulaye ।। 

tato devyo haraś caiva parivāras tathaitayoḥ ।
sarve santuṣṭamanasas svāṃ svām upayayur diśam ।। 

antarvatnyo babhūvus tā brāhmyo haṃsyo munīśvara ।
vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur brāhmyā devyā yathāsthitam ।। 

he vatsās sāmprataṃ garbhavatyo me rathakarmaṇi ।
na samarthā bhavatyo api svairaṃ carata sāmpratam ।। 

iti garbhālasā haṃsīr muktvā devī dayāparā ।
nirvikalpe samādhāne brāhmī tasthau yathāsukham ।। 

atha nābhisarojāte vairiñce kamalākare ।
garbhālasā vicerus tā rājahaṃsyo munīśvara ।। 

evaṃ vipakvagarbhās tā nābhīkamalapallave ।
suvate sma mṛdūny aṇḍāny atha vallya ivāṅkurān ।। 

tāni kālaṃ samāsādya tatrāṇḍāny ekaviṃśatiḥ ।
garbhākrāntyā dvidhā jagmur brahmāṇḍānīva sāravaṃ ।। 

aṇḍebhyas tebhya evaṃ hi jātā vayam ime mune ।
bhrātaraś caṇḍatanayā vāyasā ekaviṃśatiḥ ।। 

te sma jātā gatā vṛddhiṃ tasmin kamalapallave ।
sañjātapakṣās sampannā gaganoḍḍayanakṣamāḥ ।। 

mātṛbhis saha haṃsībhir brāhmī bhagavatī tataḥ ।
ciram ārādhitā samyak samādhiviratā satī ।। 

prasādaparayā kāle bhagavatyā tatas svayam ।
tathāṅgānugṛhītās smo yathā muktā vayaṃ sthitāḥ ।। 

santṛptamanasaś śāntā ekānte dhyānasaṃsthitau ।
tiṣṭhāma iti niścitya pituḥ pārśvaṃ vayaṃ gatāḥ ।। 

āliṅgitās tataḥ pitrā pūjitālambusā vayam ।
tayā dṛṣṭāḥ prasādena saṃsthitās tatra saṃyatāḥ ।। 

caṇḍakaḥ

putrāḥ kaccid aparyantād vāsanāsūtrasūmbhitāt ।
bhavanto nirgatā nūnam asmāt saṃsārajālakāt ।। 

no ced vayaṃ bhagavatīṃ tad imāṃ bhṛtyavatsalām ।
prārthayāmo yathā yūyaṃ bhavata jñānapāragāḥ ।। 

kākāḥ

tāta jñātam alaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ ।
kiṃ tv ekāntasthites sthānam abhivāñchāma uttamam ।। 

caṇḍakaḥ

śṛṇuta vigatadoṣaṃ pāvanaṃ sthānam agryaṃ sthirataram ayi putrā nīḍakāmāḥ pravakṣye ।
vyapagatabhayamohaṃ śāntasarvapracāraṃ nivasata ciratṛptā yatra niśśaṅkam uccaiḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍotpattir nāma sargaḥ

viṃśas sargaḥ

caṇḍakaḥ

sarvaratnagaṇādhāras samastasurasaṃśrayaḥ ।
asty ameyamahotsedho merur nāma mahīdharaḥ ।। 

calaccandrārkadīpasya bhūtavṛndakalatriṇaḥ ।
brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapasyāsya stambhaḥ kanakanirmitaḥ ।। 

sauvarṇaś candravīṭārthaṃ ratnāḍhyaś śikharāṅguliḥ ।
dhvanaddvīpābdhivalayo bhuvevonnāmito bhujaḥ ।। 

vṛtaḥ kulādrisāmantair jambudvīpāsane sthitaḥ ।
rājā candrārkanayane bhramayañ śailasaṃsadi ।। 

tāraughamālatīmālyo digdaśaikāmbarāmbaraḥ ।
nāgadvitayasaṃsthātmā nākanāyakabhūṣaṇaḥ ।। 

digaṅganābhir abhito ramyābhiḥ purabhūṣaṇaiḥ ।
pṛṣanniṣṣyandibhiś śītair vījito ghanacāmaraiḥ ।। 

ṣoḍaśāsya sahasrāṇi yojanānām adhaḥ kṣiteḥ ।
sthitāḥ pādāḥ prapūjyante nānāsuramahoragaiḥ ।। 

aśītis tu sahasrāṇi deho asyārkendulocanaḥ ।
pūjyate nākasadanais suragandharvakinnaraiḥ ।। 

caturdaśavidhāny enaṃ gṛhastham iva bandhavaḥ ।
upajīvanti bhūtāni mitho'dṛṣṭapurāspadam ।। 

asya tv īśānadigbhāge padmarāgamayaṃ bṛhat ।
vidyate śṛṅgam aparo divākara ivoditaḥ ।। 

tasyāsti pṛṣṭhe bhūtaughavṛtaḥ kalpatarur mahān ।
jagataś śikharādarśe pratibimbam iva sthitaḥ ।। 

tasyāsti dakṣiṇaskandhe śākhā kanakapallavā ।
ratnastabakanīrandhrā candrabimbābhasatphalā ।। 

tatra nīḍaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtam āsīt sphuranmaṇi ।
devyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ yasmin kila rame sutāḥ ।। 

ratnapuṣpadalacchannaṃ rasāyanaphalānvitam ।
cintāmaṇiśalākābhir vihitālindasaṃsthiti ।। 

buddhipūrvasamācārais sampūrṇaṃ kākaputrakaiḥ ।
śītalābhyantaraṃ hṛdyaṃ pūritaṃ kusumotkaraiḥ ।। 

tad gacchata sutā nīḍaṃ durgaṃ nākasadām api ।
bhogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tatrasthā nirvighnaṃ samavāpsyatha ।। 

ity uktvāsmān pitā tatra cucumbābhyāliliṅga ca ।
dadau devyai yad ānītam asmabhyaṃ ca tad āmiṣam ।। 

tad bhuktvā caraṇau devyāḥ pituś caivābhivandya ca ।
vindhyakacchād vayaṃ tasmāt sthānād ālambusāt plutāḥ ।। 

krameṇākāśam ullaṅghya nirgatyāmbudakoṭaraiḥ ।
pavanaskandham āruhya vanditavyomacāriṇaḥ ।। 

parihṛtya dinādhīśaṃ lokāntarapurād gatāḥ ।
svargam ullaṅghya yātās smo brahmalokaṃ munīśvara ।। 

praṇāmapūrvaṃ tatraitad yathāvastu pitur vacaḥ ।
mātre ca bhagavatyai ca brāhmyai cāśu nivedya ha ।। 

tābhyāṃ sasneham āliṅgya gacchathety ājñayaidhitāḥ ।
vayaṃ kṛtanamaskārā brahmalokād vinirgatāḥ ।। 

ullaṅghya lokapālānāṃ purīs tapanabhāsurāḥ ।
ākāśagāmino lolāḥ pavanaskandhacāriṇaḥ ।। 

imaṃ kalpataruṃ prāpya nijaṃ nīḍaṃ praviśya ca ।
nirastabādhaṃ tiṣṭhāmo mune maunam avasthitāḥ ।। 

jātā yathā vayam ime sthitim āgatāś ca samprāptabodham upaśāntadhiyo yathā ca ।
etat tad uktam avikhaṇḍam alaṃ mayā te śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva ।। 

ālayalābho nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

āsīt kiñcitpurākalpe jagad yac ciravismṛtam ।
sanniveśenāmunaiva tad yad adyātidūragam ।। 

tad etad vṛttam abhyāsād vartamānena varṇitam ।
mayā munīndra bodhāya prāgjagatsāmyadarśinā ।। 

adya me phalitaṃ puṇyaiś cirakālopabṛṃhitaiḥ ।
nirvighnam evaṃ paśyāmi yad bhavantaṃ mune tataḥ ।। 

idaṃ nīḍam imāś śākhā ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ drumaḥ ।
adya pāvanatāṃ prāptāny etāni tava darśanāt ।। 

idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ gṛhītvā vibhavārpitam ।
nūnaṃ pāvanatāṃ nītvā śeṣeṇādiśa māṃ mune ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvārghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca bhūyo dattavati svayam ।
bhusuṇḍavihage tasminn idaṃ rāmāham uktavān ।। 

bhrātaras te vihaṅgeśa tādṛksattvā mahādhiyaḥ ।
iha kasmān na dṛśyante tvam evaiko hi dṛśyase ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

tiṣṭhatām iha naḥ kālo mahān atigato mune ।
yugānāṃ paṅktayaḥ kṣīṇā divasānām ivānagha ।। 

etāvatā ca kālena sarva eva mamānujāḥ ।
tanūs tṛṇam iva tyaktvā śive pariṇatāḥ pare ।। 

dīrghāyuṣo mahānto api santo api balino api ca ।
sarva eva nigīryante kālenākalitātmanā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

skandharūḍhārkaśaśiṣu vahatsv avirataṃ javāt ।
vātaskandhātivāteṣu kaccit tāta na khidyase ।। 

dagdhodayāstaśailendravanavyūhai raveḥ karaiḥ ।
ciram atyantam āsannaiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase ।। 

indor atha karaiś śītaiḥ pāṣāṇīkṛtavāribhiḥ ।
āsannataratāṃ yātaiḥ kaccit tāta na khidyase ।। 

ajasram iha viśrāntaiḥ kalpajīmūtamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
paraśucchedyanīhāraiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase ।। 

viṣamair jāgataiḥ kṣobhair uccaistarapadasthitaḥ ।
kathaṃ na kṣobham āyāti kalpavṛkṣo ayam unnataḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

nirālambāspadā brahman sarvalokāvadhīritā ।
tuccheyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhye vihagajīvikā ।। 

yad īdṛśeṣu dūreṣu nirjaneṣu vaneṣu ca ।
kalpitāsyās sthitir dhātrā śūnye vā vyomadhanvani ।। 

katham asyāṃ prabho jātau jātasya kila jīvataḥ ।
āśāpāśanibaddhasya vihagasya viśokatā ।। 

vayaṃ tu bhagavan nityaṃ svātmasantoṣasaṃyutāḥ ।
na kadācana nīrūpair muhyāmo jāgatair bhramaiḥ ।। 

svabhāvamātrasantuṣṭāḥ kaṣṭair muktā viceṣṭitaiḥ ।
kṣipāmaḥ kevalaṃ kālam asmin brahman nijālaye ।। 

na jīvitān na maraṇāt kurmo dehasya rodhanam ।
yathā sthitena tiṣṭhāmas tathaivāstaṅgatehitāḥ ।। 

ālokitā lokadaśā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
nūnaṃ santyaktam asmākaṃ manasā cañcalaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

anāratanijāloke nityaṃ cāparitāpini ।
kalpāgasyopari sadā vedmi kālakalāgatim ।। 

ratnagucchaprakāśāḍhye brahman kalpalatāgṛhe ।
prāṇāpānapravāheṇa vedmi kālam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

avijñātadivārātre apy asminn uccaiś śiloccaye ।
jānāmi nijayā buddhyā lokakālakramasthitim ।। 

sārāsāraparicchedi bodhād viśrāntim āgatam ।
nirastacāpalaṃ śāntaṃ jātam eva mune manaḥ ।। 

saṃsāravyavahārotthair āśāpāśair asanmayaiḥ ।
udgālair iva bhūkāko na vaivaśyaṃ vrajāmy aham ।। 

paropaśamadharmiṇyā vayam ālokaśītayā ।
paśyanto jāgatīṃ māyāṃ dhiyā dhairyam upāgatāḥ ।। 

bhīmāsv api mahābuddhe daśāsv acalabuddhayaḥ ।
bibhimo nopalākārās samprāptāsu yathākramam ।। 

iyam ārambhasubhagā taralā jāgatī sthitiḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛṣṭā neha kiñcana sanmayam ।। 

sarvāṇy eva prayānty eva samāyānti ca vā na vā ।
bhagavan bhūtajālāni bhayam asmākam atra kim ।। 

bhūtajālataraṅgiṇyā viśantyāḥ kālasāgaram ।
vayaṃ saṃsārasaritas taṭasthā apy anākulāḥ ।। 

nojjhāmo na ca gṛhṇīmas tiṣṭhāmo naiva ca sthitāḥ ।
mṛdavo api bhṛśaṃ krūrā vayam asmin drume sthitāḥ ।। 

vītaśokabhayāyāsais tvādṛśaiḥ puruṣottamaiḥ ।
tuṣṭair anugṛhītās smas saṃsthitā vigatajvarāḥ ।। 

netaś cetaś ca paryastaṃ lulitaṃ na ca vṛttiṣu ।
nāparāmṛṣṭatattvārtham asmākaṃ bhagavan manaḥ ।। 

nirvikāre gatakṣobhe svātmany upaśamaṃ gate ।
ataraṅgāḥ prapūrṇās smaḥ parvaṇīva mahābdhayaḥ ।। 

bhavadāgamanād brahmann idānīṃ muditāśayāḥ ।
phalitāśeṣasaṅkalpāḥ paramāṃ pūrṇatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

rasāyanamayī śītā paramānandadāyinī ।
nānandayati kaṃ nāma sādhusaṅgaticandrikā ।। 

satsaṅgamānandarasaḥ kenāyam upamīyate ।
mandaroddhūtasarvāmbuḥ kṣīrodo yena kharvyate ।। 

nātaḥ parataraṃ kiñcin manye kuśalam ātmanaḥ ।
santo yad anugamyante santyaktasakalaiṣaṇam ।। 

āpātamātraramyebhyo bhogebhyaḥ kim avāpyate ।
satsaṅgacintāmaṇitas sarvaṃ sāram avāpyate ।। 

snigdhagambhīramasṛṇamadhurodāradhīravāk ।
trailokyapadmakośe asmiṃs tvam ekaṣ ṣaṭpadāyase ।। 

adhigataparamātmano api manye bhavadavalokanaśāntaduṣkṛtasya ।
mama saphalam ihādya janma sādho sakalabhayāpaharo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

yugakṣobheṣu ghoreṣu vātyāsu viṣamāsu ca ।
susthiraḥ kalpavṛkṣo ayaṃ na kadācana kampate ।। 

agamyo ayaṃ samagrāṇāṃ lokāntaravihāriṇām ।
bhūtānāṃ tena tiṣṭhāmas sukham asmin vanaspatau ।। 

hiraṇyākṣo dharāpīṭhaṃ dvīpasaptakaveṣṭitam ।
yadā jahāra tarasā nākampata tadā drumaḥ ।। 

yadā dolāyitavapur babhūvāmaraparvataḥ ।
sarvato dattajhampādrir nākampata tadā drumaḥ ।। 

bhujāvaṣṭambhavinamanmerur nārāyaṇo yadā ।
mandaraṃ proddadhārādriṃ nākampata tadā drumaḥ ।। 

unmūlitādrīndraśilā yadotpātānilā vavuḥ ।
ādhūtamerutaravas tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

yadā surāsurakṣobhasphuraccandrārkamaṇḍalam ।
āsīj jagad atikṣubdhaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

yadā kṣīrodalolādrikandarānilakampitāḥ ।
kalpābhrapaṅktayaḥ petus tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

yadā samantato meruḥ kālanemibhujāntare ।
kiñcid unmūlito atiṣṭhat tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

pakṣīśapakṣapavanā amṛtākrāntisaṅgare ।
yadā vavuḥ patatsiddhās tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

yadā śeṣākṛtiṃ karṣann asamāptaikaveṣṭanāt ।
yayau garutmān amṛtaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

yadā kalpānalaśikhāś śailābdhivalanolbaṇāḥ ।
śeṣaḥ phaṇābhis tatyāja tadā nākampata drumaḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpe drumavare tiṣṭhatām āpadaḥ kutaḥ ।
asmākaṃ muniśārdūla daussthityena kilāpadaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kalpānteṣu mahābuddhe vahatsv agnyambuvāyuṣu ।
pratapatsu tathārkeṣu kathaṃ tiṣṭhasi vijvaram ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

yadopayāti kalpāntavyavahāro jagatsthitau ।
kṛtaghna iva sanmitraṃ tadā nīḍaṃ tyajāmy aham ।। 

ākāśa eva tiṣṭhāmi vigatākhilakalpanam ।
stabdhaprasṛtasarvāṅgo mano nirvāsanaṃ yathā ।। 

pratapanti yadādityās salilīkṛtabhūdharāḥ ।
vāruṇīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā tadā tiṣṭhāmi dhīradhīḥ ।। 

yadā śakalitādrīndrā vānti pralayavāyavaḥ ।
pārvatīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khe tiṣṭhāmy acalas tadā ।। 

jagad galitamervādi yāty ekārṇavatāṃ yadā ।
vāyavīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khaṃ plave acaladhīs tadā ।। 

brahmāṇḍapāram āsādya tattvānte vimale pade ।
suṣuptāvasthayā tāvat tiṣṭhāmy acalarūpayā ।। 

yāvat punaḥ kamalajas sṛṣṭikarmaṇi tiṣṭhati ।
tataḥ praviśya brahmāṇḍaṃ tiṣṭhāmi patagālaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā tiṣṭhasi pakṣīśa dhāraṇābhir akhaṇḍitaḥ ।
kalpānteṣu tathā kasmān nānye tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

brahman niyatir eṣā hi durlaṅghyā pārameśvarī ।
mayedṛśena vai bhāvyaṃ bhāvyam anyais tu tādṛśaiḥ ।। 

na śakyate tolayitum avaśyabhavitavyatā ।
yad yathā tat tathaitad dhi svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

matsaṅkalpavaśenaiva kalpe kalpe punaḥ punaḥ ।
asminn eva gireś śṛṅge tarur itthaṃ bhavaty ayam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atyantam eva dīrghāyur bhavān vihaganāyaka ।
jñānavijñānavān vīro yogayogyamanogatiḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭānekavidhānalpasargasaṅghasamāgamaḥ ।
kiṃ kiṃ smarasi kalyāṇiṃś citram asmiñ jagattraye ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

bṛhadgiriśilārūkṣām ajātatṛṇavīrudham ।
aśailavanavṛkṣaughāṃ smarāmīmāṃ dharām adhaḥ ।। 

daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca ।
bhasmabhārabharāpūrṇāṃ smarāmīmāṃ dharām adhaḥ ।। 

anutpannadinādhīśām ajātaśaśimaṇḍalām ।
avibhaktadinālokāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām adhaḥ ।। 

meruratnataṭoddyotair ardhaprakaṭakoṭaram ।
lokālokam ivādyādriṃ bhuvanaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham ।। 

pravṛddhāsurasaṅgrāme mriyamāṇān narān iva ।
palāyamānān abhitas saṃsmarāmi surān aham ।। 

caturyugāni pañcāśad asurair mattakāśibhiḥ ।
daityāntaḥpuratāṃ prāptāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām ।। 

atyantāntaritāntāntasamastāsuramaṇḍalām ।
ajadevatrayīśeṣāṃ saṃsmarāmi jagatkuṭīm ।। 

caturyugārdhaṃ caramaṃ nīrandhrāṃ ghanapādapaiḥ ।
adṛṣṭanaranirmāṇāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām ।। 

evaṃ caturyugaṃ sāgraṃ nīrandhrair acalair yutām ।
apravṛttajanācārāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām ।। 

ajātaṣaṇmukhāṃ mattatārakodvāsitāmarām ।
daityapakṣajayodriktāṃ saṃsmarāmi jagatkuṭīm ।। 

caturyugāni trīṇy ambupūraplutakakummukhīm ।
merudaṇḍāṅkitāṃ madhye saṃsmarāmi dharām imām ।। 

bhayād antarhitāśeṣavaimānikanabhaścarām ।
dyāṃ nirṛkṣaniśeśārkāṃ saṃsmarāmi tamomayīm ।। 

anagastyām agastyāśām ekaparvatatāṃ gatāṃ ।
matte vindhyamahāśaile saṃsmarāmi jagatkuṭīm ।। 

etāṃś cānyāṃś ca vṛttāntān saṃsmarāmi bahūn api ।
kiṃ tena bahunoktena sāraṃ saṅkṣepataś śṛṇu ।। 

asaṅkhyātān manūn brahman smarāmi śataśo gatān ।
sargān ārambhabahulāṃś caturyugaśatāni ca ।। 

ekadevamayaṃ śuddhaṃ puruṣāsuravarjitam ।
alokatritayaṃ caikasvargaṃ sargaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

surāpabrāhmaṇaṃ mattaṃ niṣiddhasuraśūdrakam ।
bahunāthasatīkaṃ ca kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

vṛkṣanīrandhrabhūlokam akalpitamahārṇavam ।
svargasañjātapuruṣaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

aparvatam abhūmiṃ ca vyomasthāmaramānavam ।
acandrārkaprakāśāḍhyaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

anindram amahīpālam amadhyasthādhamottamam ।
samasarvakakubbhūtaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

sargaprārambhakalanāvibhāge bhuvanatraye ।
devāsuravinirmāṇaṃ dvīpābdhivalayodayaḥ ।। 

kulaparvatasaṃsthānaṃ jambudvīpe pṛthaksthitim ।
varṇadharmadhiyaṃ sṛṣṭivibhāgaṃ maṇḍalāvaleḥ ।। 

ṛkṣacakrakasaṃsthānaṃ dhruvanirmāṇam eva ca ।
janmendubhāskarādīnām indropendravyavasthitiḥ ।। 

hiraṇyākṣāpaharaṇaṃ varāhoddharaṇaṃ kṣiteḥ ।
kalpanaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vedānayanam eva ca ।। 

mandaroddhūnanaṃ cābdher amṛtārthe ca manthanam ।
ajātapakṣo garuḍas sāgarāṇāṃ ca sambhavaḥ ।। 

ityādikā yās smṛtayas svalpātītamanukramāḥ ।
bālair api hi tās tāta smaryante tāsu kiṃ grahaḥ ।। 

garuḍavāhanam agaruḍavāhanaṃ sitavivāhanam asitavivāhanam ।
suvṛṣavāhanam asuvṛṣavāhanaṃ kalitavān aham akalitajīvitaḥ ।। 

cirajīvivṛttāntakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

tato jagati jāteṣu bhagavan yuṣmadādiṣu ।
bharadvājapulastyātrināradendramarīciṣu ।। 

pulahoddālakādyeṣu kratubhṛgvaṅgirassu ca ।
sanatkumārabhṛṅgīśaskandebhavadanādiṣu ।। 

gaurīsarasvatīlakṣmīgāyatryādyāsu bhūriṣu ।
merumandarakailāsahimavaddardurādiṣu ।। 

hayagrīvahiraṇyākṣakālanemibalādiṣu ।
hiraṇyakaśipukrāthabaḍiprahlādakādiṣu ।। 

niminyaṅkupṛthuprothavainyanābhāgakeliṣu ।
nalamāndhātṛsagaradilīpanahuṣādiṣu ।। 

ātreyavyāsavālmīkivatsavātsyāyanādiṣu ।
upamanyumanīmaṅkibhagīrathaśukādiṣu ।। 

alpakātītakāleṣu kiñcid dūreṣu keṣucit ।
tathādyatanasargeṣu smaraṇe gaṇanaiva kā ।। 

mune te brahmaputrasya janmāṣṭamam idaṃ kila ।
saṃsmarāmy aṣṭame sarge tv asmiṃs tvaṃ mama saṅgataḥ ।। 

kadācij jāyase vyomnaḥ kadācij jāyase jalāt ।
kadācij jāyase śailāt kadācij jāyase analāt ।। 

yādṛśo yādṛśācāro yādṛksaṃsthānadiggaṇaḥ ।
sargo ayaṃ tādṛśān eva trīn sargān saṃsmarāmy aham ।। 

ekarūpākhilācārasanniveśanarāmarān ।
samakālākhilasthairyān daśa sargān smarāmy aham ।। 

antardhānaṃ gatā devā vārapañcakam uddhṛtāḥ ।
mune pañcasu sargeṣu kūrmā iva payonidheḥ ।। 

mandarākarṣaṇāvegaparyākulasurāsuram ।
smarāmi dvādaśaṃ cedam amṛtāmbhodhimanthanam ।। 

sarvauṣadhirasopetāṃ baliṃ grāhas taṭād iva ।
vāratrayaṃ hiraṇyākṣo nītavān vasudhām adhaḥ ।। 

reṇukātmajatāṃ gatvā ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāram imaṃ hariḥ ।
bahusargāntareṇāpi cakāra kṣatriyakṣayam ।। 

śataṃ kaliyugānāṃ ca harer buddhadaśāśatam ।
śākyarājatayaivāptaṃ smarāmi munināyaka ।। 

triṃśattripuravikṣobhān dvau dakṣādhvarasaṅkṣayau ।
daśa śukravighātāṃś ca candramaules smarāmy aham ।। 

bāṇārtham aṣṭau saṅgrāmāj jvarapramathanāyakān ।
vikṣobhitasurānīkān smarāmi hariśarvayoḥ ।। 

yugaṃ prati dhiyāṃ puṃsām ūnādhikatayā mune ।
kriyāṅgapāṭhavaicitryayuktān vedān smarāmy aham ।। 

ekāgrāṇi samagrāṇi bahupāṭhāni me anagha ।
purāṇāni pravartante vivṛtāni yugaṃ prati ।। 

punas tān eva tān evam anyān api yuge yuge ।
devarṣivipraracitān itihāsān smarāmy aham ।। 

itihāsaṃ mahāścaryam anyaṃ rāmāyaṇābhidham ।
granthalakṣapramāṇaṃ saj jñānaśāstraṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

rāmavad vyavahartavyaṃ na rāvaṇavilāsavat ।
iti yatra dhiyā jñānaṃ haste phalam ivārpitam ।। 

kṛtaṃ vālmīkinā caitad adhunā ca kariṣyati ।
adya tv aprakaṭaṃ loke sthitaṃ jñāsyati kālataḥ ।। 

vālmīkināmnā jīvena tenaivānyena cākṣatam ।
etat tad dvādaśaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam ।। 

dvitīyam etasya samaṃ bhārataṃ nāma nāmataḥ ।
smarāmi prāktanavyāsakṛtaṃ jagati vismṛtam ।। 

vyāsābhidhena jīvena tathaivānyena cākṣatam ।
etat tu saptamaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam ।। 

ākhyānakāni śāstrāṇi vivṛtāni yugaṃ prati ।
vicitrasanniveśāni saṃsmarāmi munīśvara ।। 

punas tāny eva tāny eva tathānyāni yuge yuge ।
sādho padārthajālāni prapaśyāmi smarāmi ca ।। 

rākṣasakṣataye viṣṇor mahīm avatariṣyataḥ ।
adhunaikādaśaṃ janma rāmanāmno bhaviṣyati ।। 

vasudevagṛhe viṣṇor bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye ।
adhunā ṣoḍaśaṃ janma bhaviṣyati munīśvara ।। 

nārasiṃhena vapuṣā hiraṇyakaśipuṃ hariḥ ।
jaghāna vāratritayaṃ mṛgendra iva vāraṇam ।। 

jagattrayībhrāntir iyaṃ na kadācin na vidyate ।
vidyate na kadācic ca jalabudbudavat sthitā ।। 

dṛśyabhrāntir aniṣṭheyam antassthā saṃvidātmani ।
jāyate līyate cāśu lolā vīcir ivāmbhasi ।। 

samaikasanniveśāni bahūni viṣamāṇi ca ।
tathārdhasamarūpāṇi trijaganti smarāmy aham ।। 

tāny eva tādṛkkarmāṇi tathānyācaraṇāni ca ।
tatkarmāṇi tathānyāni bhūtānīha smarāmy aham ।। 

pratimanvantaraṃ brahman viparyaste jagatkrame ।
sanniveśe anyathā jāte prayāte saṃstute jane ।। 

mamānyāni ca mitrāṇi te anya eva ca bandhavaḥ ।
anya eva navā bhṛtyā anya eva samāśrayāḥ ।। 

kadācid aham ekānte vindhyamūlalatāśrayaḥ ।
kadācin meruśṛṅgāgrakalpavṛkṣalatāśrayaḥ ।। 

kadācit sahyanilayaḥ kadācid dardurālayaḥ ।
kadācid dhimavadvāsī kadācin malayāśrayaḥ ।। 

kadācit prāktanenaiva sanniveśena bhūdharam ।
vanaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ca śākhāṃ ca prāpya nīḍaṃ karomy aham ।। 

adyānanteṣu yāteṣu yugeṣu munināyaka ।
prāktanenaiva jāto ayaṃ sanniveśena pādapaḥ ।। 

tāte jīvati yaivābhūc chobhāsya sutaros tayā ।
kṛtaprāksanniveśo ayam ahaṃ sthitim upāgataḥ ।। 

nehābhūd uttarā pūrvaṃ kakum nāyaṃ ca bhūdharaḥ ।
dig uttarābhūd anyaiva pūrvaṃ merumahīdharā ।। 

ekaikadehasaṃsthānanītabrahmaniśāgamaḥ ।
dhyānānte khastha evaitat sargam ālokya vedmy aham ।। 

arkāder ṛkṣasañcārān mervādes sthānakād diśām ।
saṃsthānam anyathā tasmin sthite yānti diśo anyathā ।। 

na san nāsaj jagan manye bhramo ayaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyaḥ ।
ātmaspandacamatkāravibhavo ayaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

putraḥ pitṛtvam āyāto mitrāṇi tv aritāṃ tathā ।
strītvaṃ ca śataśo yātān puṃsaś caiva smarāmy aham ।। 

kalau kṛtayugācārān kṛte kaliyugasthitīḥ ।
tretāyāṃ dvāpare caiva saṃsmarāmi munīśvara ।। 

adṛṣṭavedavedārthān svasaṅketavihāriṇaḥ ।
sargān nirargalācārān kvacit kāṃścit smarāmy aham ।। 

dhyātari brahmaṇi brahman sasurāsuramānuṣam ।
caturyugasahasre dve jagac chūnyaṃ smarāmy aham ।। 

vicitrasaṃsthānaviśeṣadeśān vicitrakāryākulabhūtakośān ।
vicitravinyāsavilāsaveṣān smarāmy ahaṃ brahmadineṣv aśeṣān ।। 

cirātītasargavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athāsau vāyasaśreṣṭho jijñāsārtham idaṃ mayā ।
bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo mahābāho kalpavṛkṣalatāgrakhe ।। 

caratāṃ jagataḥ kośe vyavahāravatām api ।
kathaṃ vihagarājendra dehaṃ mṛtyur na bādhate ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

jānann api hi sarvajña brahmañ jijñāsayaiva mām ।
pṛcchasi prabhavo nityaṃ bhṛtyaṃ vācālayanti hi ।। 

tathāpi yat pṛcchasi māṃ tat te prakathayāmy aham ।
anājñābhaṅgam evāhur mukhyam ārādhanaṃ satām ।। 

doṣamuktāphalaprotā vāsanātantusantatiḥ ।
hṛdi na grathitā yasya mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati ।। 

viśvāsavṛkṣakrakacās sarve dehalatāghuṇāḥ ।
ādhayo yaṃ na bhindanti mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati ।। 

ṣaṇḍāt ṣaṇḍaṃ nipatitaṃ śākhāmṛgam ivoddhataṃ ।
na cañcalaṃ mano yasya taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati ।। 

śarīratarusarpaughāś cittaurvaśikhinaś śikhāḥ ।
āśā yaṃ na dahanty antas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati ।। 

rāgadveṣaviṣāpūras svamanobilamandiraḥ ।
lobhavyālo na bhuṅkte yaṃ mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati ।। 

pītāśeṣavivekāmbuś śarīrāmbhodhivāḍavaḥ ।
na nirdahati yaṃ kopas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati ।। 

yantraṃ tilānāṃ kaṭhinaṃ rāśim ugram ivākulam ।
yaṃ pīḍayati nānaṅgas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati ।। 

ekasmin nirmale yena pade paramapāvane ।
saṃśritā dṛḍhaviśrāntis taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati ।। 

ete brahman mahādoṣās saṃsāravyādhihetavaḥ ।
manāg api na lumpanti cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

ādhivyādhisamutthāni valitāni mahābhramaiḥ ।
na vilumpanti duḥkhāni cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

na dādati na cādatte na jahāti na yācate ।
kurvad eva ca kāryāṇi cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti nasaṃsmṛti navismṛti ।
na suptaṃ na ca jāgratsthaṃ cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

andhīkṛtahṛdākāśāḥ kāmakrodhavikārajāḥ ।
cintā na parihiṃsanti cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

ye durarthā durārambhā durguṇā durudāhṛtāḥ ।
duṣkramās te na kṛntanti cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

śubhāni vipulārthāni mahānti guṇavanti ca ।
sarvāṇy evānudhāvanti cittam ekasamāhitam ।। 

yad udarkahitaṃ satyam anapāyi gatabhramam ।
durīhitadaśāmuktaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

yad adṛṣṭam aśuddhena ciravaidhuryakāriṇā ।
mune kāmapiśācena tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

ādau madhye tathānte ca cirāya pari coditam ।
yac cāru madhuraṃ pathyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

yad anarthadaśāhīnaṃ nirṇītaṃ sadbhir āditaḥ ।
guṇānubandhi lokyaṃ ca tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

peśalaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyaṃ svādu śītam apakṣayam ।
sutīkṣṇam atinirṇītaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

yad buddheḥ param ālokyam ādyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ param ।
yad anuttamasaubhāgyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ ।। 

sāmare sahagandharve savidyādharakinnare ।
sasurastrīgaṇe svarge na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham ।। 

sanare sanarādhīśe saparvatapuravraje ।
sāmbudhau bhūtale tāta na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram ।। 

sanāge sāsuravyūhe sāsurastrījane tathā ।
samasta eva pātāle na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram ।। 

sasvarge sadharābhoge sapātāle sadiktaṭe ।
jagaty asmiṃs tu sarvasmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram ।। 

samukhe sakare sāṃse sapāde sorumaṇḍale ।
saraktamāṃse dehe asmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram ।। 

ādhivyādhivilolāsu duḥkhaughavalitāsu ca ।
kriyāsu nityatucchāsu na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram ।। 

taralīkṛtacittāsu hṛdayāmardanīṣu ca ।
cintāsu jīvakārāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham ।। 

hṛtkṣīrodakasaspandamandareṣu caleṣv ati ।
svasaṅkalpavikalpeṣu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham ।। 

anāratāgamāpāyaparāsv aśiśirāsv ati ।
citrācārāsu ceṣṭāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham ।। 

na varam ekamahītalarājatā na ca varaṃ vividhāmararūpatā ।
na ca varaṃ dharaṇītalanāgatā sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ ।। 

na varam ākulaśāstravicāraṇaṃ na ca varaṃ varakāvyavivecanam ।
na varam agryakathākramacarvaṇaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ ।। 

na varam ādhimayaṃ cirajīvitaṃ na ca varaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhatā ।
na ca varaṃ narako na ca viṣṭapaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ ।। 

iti vividhajagatkramās samastāś calamatimūḍhatayā narasya rūḍhāḥ ।
calatarakalanāhite padārthe katham upayānti ciraṃ sthitiṃ mahāntaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyāne samādhānasaṅkalpaikanirākaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

ekaiva kevalaṃ dṛṣṭir anapāyā gatabhramā ।
vidyate sarvavicchreṣṭha sarvaśreṣṭhā samunnatā ।। 

ātmacintā samastānāṃ duḥkhānām antakāriṇī ।
cirasambhṛtasantaptasaṃsāraśramahāriṇī ।
niṣkalaṅkamanomārgavipulāṅganacāriṇī ।। 

tayā samastaduḥkhānāṃ sattānarthavilāsinām ।
jyotsnayevāndhakārāṇām alam antaḥ prajāyate ।। 

sā svātmacintā bhagavan sarvasaṅkalpavarjitā ।
yuṣmadādiṣu suprāpā duṣprāpaivāsmadādiṣu ।। 

samastakalanātītaṃ parāṃ koṭim upāśritam ।
padam āsādayantv etat kathaṃ sāmānyabuddhayaḥ ।। 

ātmacintāvilāsinyas tv asyās sakhyo mahāmate ।
kiñcit sāmyam upāyātā vidyante śaśiśītalāḥ ।। 

ātmacintāsamānānāṃ vividhānāṃ munīśvara ।
ātmacintāvayasyānāṃ madhyād ekatamā mayā ।। 

sarvaduḥkhakṣayakarī sarvasaubhāgyavardhinī ।
kāraṇaṃ jīvitasyeyaṃ prāṇacintā samāśritā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavantaṃ vihagaṃ bhusuṇḍaṃ punar apy aham ।
jānann apīdam avyagraḥ pṛṣṭavān krīḍayā punaḥ ।। 

sarvasaṃśayavicchedinn atyantacirajīvita ।
yathārthaṃ brūhi me sādho prāṇacintā kim ucyate ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

sarvavedāntavettāsi sarvasaṃśayanāśakaḥ ।
mām etat parihāsārthaṃ mune pṛcchasi vāyasam ।। 

atha vā bhavatām eva bhavadbhyaḥ pariśikṣitam ।
punaḥ pratyuccarāmīdaṃ kā me kṣatir upasthitā ।। 

bhusuṇḍajīvitakaraṃ bhusuṇḍasyātmalābhadam ।
śṛṇu prāṇasamādhānaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ mayā ।। 

paśyedaṃ bhagavaṃs tāvad dehagehaṃ manoramam ।
tripradhānamahāsthūṇaṃ navadvārasamāvṛtam ।। 

puryaṣṭakakalatreṇa tanmātrasvajanena ca ।
ahaṅkāragṛhasthena sarvataḥ paripālitam ।। 

antassuṣirasatkarṇaśaṣkulīcandraśālikam ।
śiroruhācchādanavad vipulākṣagavākṣakam ।। 

āsyapradhānasaddvāraṃ bhujapārśvopamandiraṃ ।
dantāliketakasragbhir bhūṣitadvārakoṭaraṃ ।। 

anārataraṭadrūparasanādvārapālakam ।
aṅgulīlokavalitapādālindakṛtasthiti ।। 

raktamāṃsarasādigdhasnāyusantativeṣṭitam ।
sthūlāsthikāṣṭhasadbandhaṃ sukuḍyaṃ supramārjitam ।। 

īdṛśasyāsya dehasya gehasya munināyaka ।
suṣire komale madhye pārśukābhittimālite ।। 

padmayugmamayaṃ yantram asthimāṃsamayaṃ mṛdu ।
ūrdhvādhonālam anyo'nyamilatkośaṃ lasaddalam ।। 

satataspandarūpeṇa sakalākāśacāriṇā ।
tasya yantrasya pattrāṇi mṛdūny āttāni vāyunā ।। 

lasatsu teṣu pattreṣu sa marut parivardhate ।
vātāhatalatāpattrajāle bahir ivābhitaḥ ।। 

vṛddhiṃ gato asau pavanaḥ kṛtvātmānam anekadhā ।
ūrdhvādho dikṣu cānyāsu dehe asmin prasaraty atha ।। 

prāṇāpānasamānādyais tatas sa hṛdayānilaḥ ।
saṅketaiḥ procyate tajjñair vicitrācāraceṣṭitaḥ ।। 

hṛtpadmayantrakuharāt samastāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ ।
ūrdhvādhaḥ prasṛtā dehe candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

yānty āyānti vivalganti haranti viharanti ca ।
utpatanti patanty āśu tā etāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ ।। 

sa eṣa hṛtpadmagataḥ prāṇa ity ucyate budhaiḥ ।
asya kācin mune śaktiḥ praspandayati locane ।। 

kācit sparśam upādatte kācid vahati nāsayā ।
kācid annaṃ jarayati kācid vakti vacāṃsi ca ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena sarvam eva śarīrake ।
karoti bhagavān vāyur yantrehām iva yāntrikaḥ ।। 

tatrordhvādho dvisaṅketau prasṛtāv anilau mune ।
prāṇāpānāv iti khyātau prakaṭau tau varānilau ।। 

tayor anusaran nityaṃ mune gatim ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
śītoṣṇavapuṣor nityaṃ nityam ambarapānthayoḥ ।। 

kalevaramahāyantre vāhayoś śramahīnayoḥ ।
hṛdākāśārkaśaśinor agnīṣomasvarūpayoḥ ।। 

śarīrapurapālasya manaso rathacakrayoḥ ।
ahaṅkāreśvarasyāsya praśasteṣṭaturaṅgayoḥ ।। 

tayor mamānusarataḥ prāṇāpānābhidhānayoḥ ।
gatiṃ śarīramarutor āśarīram aruddhayoḥ ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu sadaiva samarūpayoḥ ।
suṣuptasaṃsthitasyeva brahman gacchanti vāsarāḥ ।। 

sahasradhā nikṛttāṅgād bisatantulavād api ।
durlakṣyā vidyamānā ca gatis sūkṣmatarā tayoḥ ।। 

aviratagatayor gatiṃ viditvā hṛdi marutor anusṛtya coditāṃ tām ।
na punar iha hi jāyate mahātman muditamanāḥ puruṣaḥ praṇaṣṭapāśaḥ ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyāne prāṇavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

jānann api mune sarvaṃ kiṃ māṃ pṛcchasi līlayā ।
yathāpṛṣṭam ahaṃ vacmi tatrāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ ।। 

prāṇo ayam aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantare dehe prāṇo ayam upari sthitaḥ ।। 

apāno apy aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantare dehe tv apāno ayam avāk sthitaḥ ।। 

jāgratas svapataś caiva prāṇāyāmo ayam uttamaḥ ।
pravartate yas tajjñasya taṃ tāvac chreyase śṛṇu ।। 

bāhyonmukhatvaṃ prāṇānāṃ yad dhṛdambhojakoṭarāt ।
svairam evāttayatnānāṃ taṃ dhīrā recakaṃ viduḥ ।। 

dvādaśāṅgulaparyantaṃ bāhyam ākramatāṃ hṛdaḥ ।
prāṇānām aṅgasaṃsparśo yas sa pūraka ucyate ।। 

bāhyāt parāpataty antar apāne yatnavarjitam ।
yo aṅgaprapūraṇe sparśo vidus tam api pūrakam ।। 

apāne astaṅgate prāṇo yāvan nābhyudito hṛdi ।
tāvat sā kumbhakāvasthā yogibhir yānubhūyate ।। 

pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakaś ca dvidhā sthitaḥ ।
apānasyodayasthāne dvādaśāntābhidhe bahiḥ ।। 

svabhāvāt sarvakālasthās somyā yatnavivarjitāḥ ।
ye proktās sphāramatibhis tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu mahāmate ।। 

dvādaśāṅgulaparyantād bāhyād abhyuditaḥ prabho ।
apānas tasya tatraiva svabhāvāt pūrakādayaḥ ।। 

mṛdantarasthāniṣpannaghaṭavad yā sthitir bahiḥ ।
vyomni nityam apānasya taṃ viduḥ kumbhakaṃ budhāḥ ।। 

bāhyonmukhatvaṃ vāyor yā nāsikāgrāvadhir gatiḥ ।
taṃ bāhyapūrakaṃ tv ādyaṃ vidur yogavido janāḥ ।। 

nāsāgrād api nirgatya dvādaśāntāvadhir gatiḥ ।
yā vāyos taṃ vidur dhīrā aparaṃ bāhyapūrakam ।। 

atraivāstaṅgate prāṇe yāvan nāpāna udgataḥ ।
tāvat pūrṇāṃ samāvasthāṃ bahissthaṃ kumbhakaṃ viduḥ ।। 

yat tadantarmukhatvaṃ syād apānasyodayaṃ vinā ।
taṃ bāhyarecakaṃ vidyāc cintyamānaṃ vimuktidam ।। 

dvādaśāntād yad utthāya rūpapīvaratā parā ।
apānasya bahis tat tam aparaṃ recakaṃ viduḥ ।। 

bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caitān kumbhakādīn anāratam ।
prāṇāpānasvabhāvān svān buddhvā bhūyo na jāyate ।। 

aṣṭāv ete mahābuddhe rātrindivam anusmṛtāḥ ।
svabhāvād eva vāyūnāṃ kathitā muktidā mayā ।। 

gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato api vā ।
ete na rodham āyānti prakṛtyā hi calo anilaḥ ।। 

yat karoti yad aśnāti buddhyaitān samanusmaran ।
kumbhakādīn naras so antas tatra kartā na kiñcana ।। 

suvyagram asmin vyāpāre bāhyaṃ parijahan manaḥ ।
dinaiḥ katipayair eva padam āpnoti kevalam ।। 

etad abhyasyataḥ puṃso bāhye viṣayavṛttiṣu ।
na badhnāti ratiṃ cetaś śvadṛtau brāhmaṇo yathā ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya ye sthitāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ ।
prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ tair akhinnās ta eva hi ।। 

tiṣṭhatā gacchatā nityaṃ jāgratā svapatā tathā ।
eṣā cet prekṣyate dṛṣṭis tan na bandhanam āpyate ।। 

prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt prāpte bodhe nirāmaye ।
saṃśāntamadamohena svasthenāntar ihoṣyate ।। 

sarvārambhāṃs tyajan svasthaḥ kurvaṃś cāpi budho janaḥ ।
prāṇāpānagatīḥ prāpya susvasthas sukham edhate ।। 

prāṇasyābhyudayo brahman padmayantrād dhṛdi sthitāt ।
dvādaśāṅgulaparyante prāṇo astaṃ yāty ayaṃ bahiḥ ।। 

apānasyodayo bāhyād dvādaśāntān mahāmune ।
astaṅgatir athāmbhojayantre hṛdayasaṃsthite ।। 

prāṇo yatrāstam āyāti dvādaśānte nabhaḥpade ।
padāt tasmād apāno ayam udeti samanantaram ।। 

bāhyākāśonmukhaḥ prāṇo vahaty agniśikhā yathā ।
hṛdākāśonmukho apāno nimne vahati vārivat ।। 

apānaś candramā deham āpyāyayati bāhyataḥ ।
prāṇas sūryo agnir atha vā pacaty antar idaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

prāṇo hi hṛdayākāśaṃ tāpayitvā pratikṣaṇam ।
mukhāgragaganaṃ paścāt tāpayaty uttamo raviḥ ।। 

apānendur mukhāgre khaṃ pyāyayitvā hṛdambaram ।
paścād āpyāyayaty eṣa nimeṣasamanantaram ।। 

apānaśaśino antassthāḥ kalāḥ prāṇavivasvatā ।
yatra grastās tad āsādya padaṃ bhūyo na śocyate ।। 

prāṇārkasya kalāntassthā yatrāpānahimāṃśunā ।
grastā tat padam āsādya na bhūyo janmabhāṅ manaḥ ।। 

prāṇa evārkatāṃ yāti sabāhyābhyantare ambare ।
āpyāyanakarīṃ paścāc chaśitām adhigacchati ।। 

prāṇa evendutāṃ tyaktvā śarīrāpyāyakāriṇīm ।
kṣaṇād āyāti sūryatvaṃ saṃśoṣaṇakaraṃ param ।। 

arkatāṃ samparityajya na yāvac candratāṃ gataḥ ।
prāṇas tāvad vicāryāntar deśakālau na śocyate ।। 

hṛdi candrārkayor jñātvā nityam astamayodayam ।
ātmano nijam ādhāraṃ na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ ।। 

sodayāstamayaṃ senduṃ saraśmiṃ sasamāgamam ।
hṛdaye bhāskaraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

nākṣīṇaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bahissthaṃ siddhaye tamaḥ ।
hārdaṃ tu kṣapayed dhvāntaṃ yatkṣaye siddhir uttamā ।। 

bāhye tamasi saṅkṣīṇe lokālokaḥ prajāyate ।
hārde tu tamasi kṣīṇe svāloko jāyate paraḥ ।। 

hārdāndhakārakṣayadaṃ parijñātaṃ vimuktidam ।
sodayāstamayaṃ yatnāt prāṇārkam avalokayet ।। 

apānenduḥ prayāty astaṃ yatra hṛtpadmakoṭare ।
padāt tasmād udety antaḥ prāṇārko bahirunmukhaḥ ।। 

apāne astaṅgate prāṇas samudeti hṛdambujāt ।
chāyāyāṃ galitāṅgāyāṃ tatraivāśu yathātapaḥ ।। 

prāṇe tv astaṅgate bāhyād apānaḥ prodayet kṣaṇāt ।
ātape parito naṣṭe chāyevāśu pade navā ।। 

prāṇajanmāvanau naṣṭam apānaṃ viddhi sanmate ।
apānajanmabhūmau ca prāṇaṃ naṣṭam avaihi hi ।। 

astaṅgatavati prāṇe tv apāne abhyudayonmukhe ।
bahiḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate ।। 

apāne astaṅgate prāṇe kiñcid abhyudayonmukhe ।
antaḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate ।। 

prāṇarecakamūlastham apānāpūrakoṭigam ।
svasthaṃ kumbhakam abhyasya na bhūyaḥ paritapyate ।। 

apānarecakādhāraṃ prāṇapūrāntasaṃsthitam ।
svasaṃsthaṃ kumbhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhūyaḥ paritapyate ।। 

prāṇāpānāv ubhāv antar yatraitau vilayaṃ gatau ।
tad ālambya padaṃ śāntam ātmanā nānutapyate ।। 

prāṇabhakṣyonmukhāpānaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ ca niṣkalam ।
vicārya bahir antar vā na bhūyaḥ pariśocyate ।। 

apānabhakṣaṇaparaṃ prāṇaṃ hṛdi tathā bahiḥ ।
deśaṃ kālaṃ ca samprekṣya na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ ।। 

yatra prāṇo hy apānena prāṇenāpāna eva ca ।
nigīrṇo bahir antaś ca deśau kālau ca paśya tau ।। 

kṣaṇam astaṅgataprāṇam apānodayavarjitam ।
ayatnasiddhaṃ bāhyasthaṃ kumbhakaṃ tat padaṃ viduḥ ।। 

kṣaṇam astaṅgatāpānaḥ prāṇodayavivarjitaḥ ।
ayatnasiddho hy antassthaḥ kumbhakaḥ paramaṃ padam ।। 

etat tad ātmano rūpaṃ śuddhaiṣā sā paraiva cit ।
etat sad asadābhāsam etat prāpya na śocyate ।। 

puṣpasyāntar ivāmodaṃ prāṇasyāntar avasthitam ।
na ca prāṇaṃ na cāpānaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

prāṇakṣayapadāntastham apānakṣayakoṭigam ।
apānaprāṇayor madhyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

prāṇasya prāṇanaṃ proccaiḥ paraṃ jīvasya jīvitam ।
dehasya dhāraṇaṃ dhuryaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ ।
yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe ।। 

ālokālokanaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvapāvanapāvanam ।
bhāvābhāvanam anyūnaṃ cidātmanam upāsmahe ।। 

parasparopasaṅghaṭṭe hṛdaye marutos sthitam ।
bahir antas tathākāśe cidātmanam upāsmahe ।। 

apāno astaṅgato yatra prāṇo nābhyuditaḥ kṣaṇam ।
kalākalaṅkarahitaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

nāpāno abhyudito yatra prāṇaś cāstam upāgataḥ ।
nāsāgragaganāvartaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

prāṇāpānodbhavasthāne bāhyābhyantarasaṃsthite ।
ye dve yogipadādhāraṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

prāṇāpānarathārūḍham aprāṇāpānam ātatam ।
yac chaktirūpaṃ śaktīnāṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

hṛtprāṇakumbhakaṃ devaṃ bahiś cāpānakumbhakam ।
pūrakāṃśavimṛṣṭaṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

prāṇāpānaparāmarśasattārūpāvabodhakam ।
yat prāpyaṃ prāṇamananāt tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

yat prāṇapavanaspando yat spandānandakāraṇam ।
kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe ।। 

yad akhilakalanākalaṅkahīnaṃ parivalitaṃ ca sadā kalāgaṇena ।
anubhavavibhavaṃ padaṃ tad agryaṃ sakalasurāvanataṃ paraṃ prapadye ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyāne prāṇasamādhivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

eṣā hi citi viśrāntir mayā prāṇasamādhinā ।
krameṇānena samprāptā svayam ātmani nirmale ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya saṃsthito asmi mahāmune ।
na calāmi nimeṣāṃśam api merur ivācalaḥ ।। 

gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato api vā ।
svapne api na calaty eṣa susamādhir mamātmani ।। 

nityānityāsu lolāsu jagatsthitiṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।
antarmukho asmi tiṣṭhāmi svayam evātmanātmani ।। 

api saṃrudhyate vāyur api vā salilaṃ gateḥ ।
naitasmāt susamādhānān niruddhaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham ।। 

prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt paramātmāvalokanāt ।
aśokam anuyāto asmi padam ādyaṃ mahātapaḥ ।। 

ā mahāpralayād brahmann unmajjananimajjane ।
ayam adyāpi bhūtānāṃ paśyañ jīvāmi dhīradhīḥ ।। 

na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyac ca cintayāmi kadācana ।
dṛṣṭim ālambya tiṣṭhāmi vartamānām ihātmanaḥ ।। 

yathāprāpteṣu kāryeṣu parityaktaphalaiṣaṇaḥ ।
suṣuptasamayā buddhyā paritiṣṭhāmi kevalam ।। 

bhāvābhāvamayīṃ cintām īhitānīhitānvitām ।
vimucyātmani tiṣṭhāmi ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

prāṇāpānasamāyogasamayaṃ samanusmaran ।
svayam ātmani tuṣyāmi tenāsmi cirajīvitaḥ ।। 

idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ lapsyāmi sundaram ।
iti cintā na me tena ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

na staumi na ca nindāmi kvacit kiñcit kadācana ।
ātmano anyasya vā sādho tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

na tuṣyati śubhaprāptau nāśubheṣv api khidyate ।
mano mama samaṃ nityaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

paramaṃ tyāgam ālambya sarvam eva sadaiva hi ।
jīvitādi mayā tyaktaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

praśāntacāpalaṃ vītaśokam astasamīhitam ।
mano mama mune śāntaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

kāṣṭhaṃ vilāsinīṃ śailaṃ tṛṇam agniṃ himaṃ nabhaḥ ।
samaṃ sarvatra paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

kim adya mama samprāptaṃ prātar vā bhavitā punaḥ ।
iti cintājvaro nāsti tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

jarāmaraṇaduḥkheṣu rājyalābhasukheṣu ca ।
na bibhemi na hṛṣyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyaṃ mamāyam ayam anyataḥ ।
iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

āharan viharaṃs tiṣṭhann uttiṣṭhann ucchvasan svapan ।
deho aham iti no vedmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

imaṃ saṃsāram ārambhaṃ suṣuptavad avasthitaḥ ।
asantam iva paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

yathākālam upāyātāv arthānarthau samau mama ।
hastāv iva śarīrasthau tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

apāriplavayā ṛjvyā sudṛśā snigdhamugdhayā ।
ṛju paśyāmi sarvatra tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

āpādamastakānte asmin na dehe mamatā mama ।
tyaktāhaṅkārapaṅkasya tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

yat karomi yad aśnāmi tat tyaktvā tadvato api me ।
mano naiṣkarmyam ādatte tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

yadā yadā mune kiñcid vijānāmi tadā tadā ।
natim āyāmi nauddhatyaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

karomīśo api nākrāntiṃ paritapye na kheditaḥ ।
daridro api na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

naśyadrūpe śarīre asminn anaṣṭātmā cidāspadaḥ ।
bhūtavṛndaṃ hasāmy ārāt tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

āśāpāśavinunnāyāś cittavṛttes samāhitaḥ ।
saṃsparśaṃ na dadāmy antas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

asattāṃ jagatas sattām ātmanaḥ karabilvavat ।
suptaḥ prabuddhaḥ paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

kṣīṇaṃ bhinnaṃ ślathaṃ jīrṇaṃ kṣubdhaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam ।
paśyāmi navavat sarvaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

sukhito asmi sukhāsakte duḥkhito duḥkhite jane ।
sarvasya priyamitraṃ ca tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

āpady acaladhīro asmi jaganmitraṃ ca sampadi ।
bhāvābhāveṣu naivāsmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo me nāham anyasya kasyacit ।
iti me bhāvitaṃ cetas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ jagad ahaṃ vyoma deśakālakramāv aham ।
ahaṃ kriyeti me buddhis tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

ghaṭaś cic cit paṭaś cit khaṃ cid vaṭaś śakaṭaś ca cit ।
cit sarvam iti me bhāvas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ ।। 

ity ahaṃ muniśārdūla trilokīkamalālikaḥ ।
bhusuṇḍanāmā kākolaḥ kathitaś cirajīvitaḥ ।। 

brahmārṇave vilulitaṃ trijagattaraṅgam utpādanāśavibhavena vibhinnarūpam ।
ālīnam unnamitam ākuladṛśyadṛśyam ālokayan prakalayaṃś ca ciraṃ sthito asmi ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyāne cirajīvitahetukathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

etat te kathitaṃ brahman yathāsmi yad ihāsmi vā ।
tvadājñāmātrasiddhyarthaṃ dhārṣṭyena jñānapāraga ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

aho nu citraṃ bhagavan bhavatā bhūṣaṇaṃ śruteḥ ।
ātmodantaḥ prakathitaḥ paraṃ vismayakāraṇam ।। 

dhanyās te ye mahātmānam atyantaṃ cirajīvitam ।
bhavantaṃ paripṛcchanti dvitīyam iva padmajam ।। 

vayam adya bhṛśaṃ dhanyās svātmodantam akhaṇḍitam ।
yathāvat pāvanaṃ buddhes sarvaṃ kathitavān asi ।। 

prabhrāntaṃ dikṣu sarvāsu dṛṣṭā vibudhabhūmayaḥ ।
bhavān iva jagaty asmin na mahān avalokitaḥ ।। 

kathañcit prāpyate kaccid bhrāntveha hi mahājanaḥ ।
na bhavān iva bhavyātmā sulabho jagati kvacit ।। 

vaṃśakhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate mauktikaṃ yathā ।
jagatkhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate tvādṛśas tathā ।। 

mayā tu sumahat kāryam adya sampāditaṃ śubham ।
puṇyadeho vimuktātmā yad bhavān avalokitaḥ ।। 

tad astu tava kalyāṇaṃ praviśātmaguhāṃ śubhām ।
madhyāhnasamayo ayaṃ me vrajāmi suramandiram ।। 

ity ākarṇya bhusuṇḍo asau jagrāhotthāya pādapāt ।
saṅkalpitābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ supātraṃ hemapallavam ।। 

kalpavṛkṣalatāpuṣpakesareṇa himatviṣā ।
tat pātraṃ mauktikārgheṇa pūrayām āsa pūrṇadhīḥ ।। 

tenārghyapādyapātreṇa trinetram iva mām asau ।
āpādamastakaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrvajaḥ ।। 

anuvrajyākadarthena khagendrālam iti bruvan ।
viṣṭarād aham utthāya tataḥ khagavad āplutaḥ ।। 

vyomni yojanamātreṇa madanuvrajyayā gataḥ ।
karaṃ kareṇāvaṣṭabhya balāt saṃrodhitaḥ khagaḥ ।। 

mayi yāte tato dīrghe gaganādhvany adṛśyatām ।
nivṛtto asau vihaṅgeśo dustyajā saṅgatis satām ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ mayi tasmiṃś ca taraṅgaka ivāmbudhau ।
vyomany adṛśyatāṃ yāte gatas smṛtyā munīn aham ।। 

saptarṣimaṇḍalaṃ prāpya jāyayā paripūjitaḥ ।
vismayotphullahṛdayas tato ahaṃ rāghavāvasam ।। 

bhusuṇḍo bhavyatuṇḍo asau tasmin kalpalatālaye ।
samaś śāntamanā mānyas svasamādhānavān abhūt ।। 

jīvaty adyāpi matimāṃs tasminn eva latādale ।
tatraiva saṃsthito meros tathaiva kanakadrume ।। 

yāte kṛtayugasyādau purā varṣaśatadvaye ।
saṅgato ahaṃ bhusuṇḍena merau śṛṅgadrume abhavam ।। 

adya rāma kṛte kṣīṇe tretā samparivartate ।
madhye tretāyugasyāsya jātas tvaṃ ripusūdana ।। 

punar adyāṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ tatraivopari bhūbhṛtaḥ ।
milito abhūd bhusuṇḍo asau tathaivājararūpavān ।। 

itīdaṃ kathitaṃ citraṃ bhusuṇḍodantam uttamam ।
śrutvā vicārya caivāntar yad yuktaṃ tat samācara ।। 

iti sumunibhusuṇḍasaṅkathāṃ yo vimalamatiḥ pravicārayiṣyatīha ।
bhavabhayabahalāṃ kusaṃsṛtiṃ sa prasabham asatsaritaṃ tariṣyatīti ।। 

bhusuṇḍopākhyānaṃ samāptam

ekonatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ bhusuṇḍavṛttāntaḥ kathitas te mayānagha ।
anayā prajñayā tīrṇo bhusuṇḍo mohasaṅkaṭāt ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya svaprāṇābhyāsapūrvikām ।
bhusuṇḍavan mahābāho bhava tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

yathā jñānena yogena santatābhyāsajanmanā ।
bhusuṇḍo avāptavān prāpyaṃ tathā sādhaya tat padam ।। 

asaktabuddhayas santo bhusuṇḍavad avasthitim ।
prāpnuvanti pare tattve prāṇāpānāvalokinaḥ ।। 

etā vicitrā bhavatā śrutā vijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
idānīṃ dhiyam ālambya yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhavatā bhūmibhāsvatā jñānaraśmibhiḥ ।
hārdam uddāmadaurātmyaṃ pramṛṣṭam akhilaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

prabuddhās smaḥ prahṛṣṭās smaḥ praviṣṭās smas svam āspadam ।
sthitās smo jñātavijñeyā bhavanto hy aparā iva ।। 

aho bhusuṇḍacaritaṃ paraṃ vismayakārakam ।
bhagavan bhavatā proktam uttamārthāvabodhadam ।। 

bhusuṇḍacarite brahmann etasmin yat tvayā vibho ।
tac charīragṛhaṃ proktaṃ māṃsacarmāsthinirmitam ।। 

tat kena nāma racitaṃ kuto vā tat samutthitam ।
kathaṃ vā sthitim āyātaṃ ko vā tatrāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paramārthāvabodhāya doṣāpākaraṇāya ca ।
śṛṇu rāghava tattvena vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ mayā ।। 

asthisthūṇaṃ navadvāraṃ raktamāṃsāvalepanam ।
śarīrasadanaṃ rāma na kenacid idaṃ kṛtam ।। 

ābhāsamātram evedam ittham evāvabhāsate ।
dvicandravibhramākāraṃ sad asac ca vyavasthitam ।। 

dvicandravibhramavidhau dvicandratvaṃ sad eva hi ।
vastutaś caika evendus sthitir dehe tathaiva hi ।। 

dehapratyayakāle hi deho ayaṃ san vyavasthitaḥ ।
asann eva vastutas sa proktas sadasadātmakaḥ ।। 

svapnas svapnavidhau satyas tv anyadā sa mudhaiva hi ।
budbudo budbudavidhau satyo mithyaiva cānyadā ।। 

deho dehāvadhau satyo apy asatya itarāvadhau ।
pratibhāsāvadhau tāpe jalaṃ sad asad anyadā ।। 

pratibhāsāvadhau dehas sann asaṃs tv anyadā smṛtaḥ ।
ābhāsamātram evedam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate ।। 

ayaṃ nāmāham ity antar gṛhītamananaṃ sthitam ।। 

māṃsāsthimayanirmāṇaṃ deho nānyad iti bhramam ।
tyaja saṅkalpanirmāṇā dehās santi sahasraśaḥ ।। 

varatalpagato yena svapne dehena diktaṭam ।
paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

jāgarāyāṃ manorājye yena svargapurāntaram ।
paribhramasi meruṃ vā sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

svapneṣv api ca yas svapnas tatra yena mahītaṭān ।
paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

gatair dehair manorājye mahāvibhavabhūmiṣu ।
paribhramasi yeneha sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

manorājye manorājye vicitrā yā jagatkriyāḥ ।
prakaroṣi mahābāho yair dehais te kva saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

vilāsinyānurāgiṇyā yena saṅkalpakāntayā ।
nirvṛtiṃ yāsi dehena sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

ete rāma yathā dehā mānasaspandasanmayāḥ ।
tathaiva tādṛgārambho deho ayaṃ mānasas smṛtaḥ ।। 

idaṃ dhanam ayaṃ deho deśo ayam iti yo bhramaḥ ।
tat sarvaṃ cittavīryasya saṅkalpasya vijṛmbhitam ।। 

dīrghaṃ svapnam imaṃ viddhi dīrghaṃ vā cittavibhramam ।
dīrghaṃ vāpi manorājyaṃ saṃsāraṃ raghunandana ।। 

prabodham eṣyasi yadā param ātmecchayā svayā ।
drakṣyasi tvaṃ tadā samyag idam ūrdhvād adho yathā ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpakalane yathānyeva jagatsthitiḥ ।
tathaiveyaṃ hi saṅkalpakalanā kācid eva ha ।। 

yathā pūrvaṃ mayotpattiḥ proktā kamalajanmanaḥ ।
manasas svayam evāntas saṅkalpakalanodbhavā ।। 

vicitraracanopetam anantaśatavibhramam ।
saṅkalpakalanāmātraṃ tathedam avabhāsate ।। 

yathā kalita ābhāso manaso abjajatāgatau ।
dehavac cintito dehas sthito anyas tadvad eva hi ।। 

prākpravāhacirābhyasto vāsanāvilayena yaḥ ।
tathaiva dṛśyate dehas tadākṛtyudayena saḥ ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena saṅkalpo hy ayam eva cet ।
anyathā bhāvyate rāma bhūyate tad ihānyathā ।। 

ayaṃ so ahaṃ mamāyaṃ ca saṃsāra iti bhāvite ।
satyo ayaṃ bhāsate rāma bhāvanādārḍhyasambhavaḥ ।। 

bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena yad evāśu tad eva ca ।
sarvatra dṛśyate rāma kāntevātyantavallabhā ।। 

aharvyāpṛtir abhyastā yathā svapne api dṛśyate ।
tathā sambhāvanābhyastas saṃsāro apy avalokyate ।। 

yathā svapnāvadhau kṣipram aharvad avabhāsate ।
tathedaṃ sarvakālastham api saṃlakṣyate ciram ।। 

vyomany eva yathā tāpasantapte dṛśyate sarit ।
dharāpy avidyamānaiva saṅkalpād dṛśyate tathā ।। 

dṛśyate dṛṣṭivairūpyād yathā vyomani piñchikā ।
tathaiveyaṃ jagallakṣmīr durjñānād eva bhāsate ।। 

bhīrur apy eti na yathā svasaṅkalpeṣu sambhramam ।
svasaṅkalpe api saṃsāre na tathaiti bhayaṃ sudhīḥ ।। 

sva eva hi svabhāvo ayam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate ।
saṃsārasaraṇisthityā kasmāt ko atra vibhāti kim ।। 

sa eva kiñcit saṃśodhyaś śuddhyā vimalatāṃ gate ।
tasmin na dṛśyate rāma moho ayaṃ jāgataś calaḥ ।। 

samyagālokamātreṇa svabhāvaś śuddhim ṛcchati ।
na gṛhṇāti malaṃ bhūyas tāmratām iva kāñcanam ।। 

ābhāsamātram evaitan na san nāsaj jagattrayam ।
ity anyakalanātyāgaṃ samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ svargo jñānam ajñānam eva ca ।
cidābhāsād ṛte nāstīty ekatā samyagīkṣaṇam ।। 

tvamahantādisaṃsāram idam etā diśo daśa ।
sarvaṃ svābhāsam eveti samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ ।। 

sadasanmayasaṃsāre yathābhūtārthadarśanāt ।
nāstam eti na codeti samyagālokanān manaḥ ।। 

nirṇīya sarvabhāvānām asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā ।
niṣkāmaṃ śāntim abhyeti samyagālokanān manaḥ ।। 

na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na śocati ।
śītalaṃ satyatām eti samyagālokanān manaḥ ।। 

avaśyam eva martavyaṃ sarvair eva hi bandhubhiḥ ।
iti bandhuviyogeṣu kiṃ vṛthā paritapyase ।। 

avaśyam eva ca mayā martavyam iti niścaye ।
ity ātmamaraṇaprāptau kiṃ mudhā paritapyase ।। 

avaśyam eva jātena kiñcit svavibhavādikam ।
prāptavyaṃ puruṣeṇeti harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ ।। 

sarvasyaiva hi saṃsāre narasya vyavahāriṇaḥ ।
anarthāya bhavaty āpac chokasyāvasaro hi kaḥ ।। 

bruḍaty udeti sphurati budbudaugha ivārṇave ।
idaṃ hi janatājālaṃ kim atra paridevanā ।। 

sat sad eva sadaivaitad asad evāsad eva hi ।
kriyāvaicitryamātre tu kim asmin paridevanā ।। 

nāham asmi na cābhūvaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi cādhunā ।
deho ahaṃ cittadoṣo ayaṃ kim anyat paridevyate ।। 

dehāc ced anya evāhaṃ cidābhāsas tad aṅga he ।
kau tau me sadasadbhāvau yanniṣṭhaṃ paritapyate ।। 

iti niścayavat tv antas samyagjñānān mano muneḥ ।
nāstam eti na codeti na cāntaḥ paritapyate ।। 

paratām eva tāṃ so antar anuttarapadasthitām ।
ādatte tittirir mṛdvīṃ tṛṇakoṭim ivāmalām ।। 

etadartham asatye asmin nāsthā kāryā manāg api ।
surajjveva balīvardo badhyate jantur āsthayā ।। 

asatsvapnaṃ dṛḍham idam iti nirṇīya buddhitaḥ ।
āsthārahitayā dṛṣṭyā vihartavyam ihānagha ।। 

kartavyam eva kartavyaṃ yasya na pratibhāsate ।
so antaśśītalatām eti dinānte bhuvanaṃ yathā ।। 

pravibhāgaṃ parityajya padārthapaṭalavraje ।
ābhāsamātrasāmānyam idam ālokayānagha ।। 

ābhāsamātrakaṃ rāma cintāmarśakalaṅkitam ।
tatas tad api santyajya nirābhāso bhavottamaḥ ।। 

cidākāśamayo nityas sarvagas sarvavarjitaḥ ।
ābhāsasya parityāge bhavasy ekāntanirmalaḥ ।। 

nāham asmi na me bhogās satyā ity abhibhāvite ।
nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate ।। 

aham eva hi vā sarvaṃ cid ity evābhibhāvite ।
nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate ।। 

darśanadvayam apy etat satyam atyantasiddhidam ।
yad ekam etayor vetsi ramyaṃ tad rāma saṃśraya ।। 

dvābhyām evātha vai tābhyāṃ darśanābhyām ihānagha ।
viharan kuru kalyāṇaṃ rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt ।। 

yat kiñcid ucitaṃ loke yan nabhasy atha yat pare ।
tat sarvaṃ prāpyate rāma rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt ।। 

rāgāhihitayā buddhyā yādṛg rāma viceṣṭyate ।
tat tad eva prayāty āśu mūḍhānāṃ viparītatām ।। 

dveṣadoṣoparuddhāsu na guṇāś cittavṛttiṣu ।
padaṃ kurvanti dagdhāsu sthalīṣu hariṇā iva ।। 

rāgo dveṣaś ca sarpau dvau na nilīnau manobile ।
yasya kalpataros tasmāt kiṃ nāmāṅga na labhyate ।। 

ye hi prājñās suniyatā vidagdhāś śāstraśālinaḥ ।
rāgadveṣamayās te cej jambukās tad dhig astu tān ।। 

mad dhanaṃ bhuktam anyena dhanaṃ bhuktaṃ mayānyataḥ ।
itthaṃ saṃvyavahārehā ko rāgadveṣayoḥ kramaḥ ।। 

dhanāni bandhavo mitraṃ punar āyānti yānti ca ।
kim eteṣu naraḥ prājño rajyate vā virajyate ।। 

bhāvābhāvabhavābhogā māyeyaṃ pārameśvarī ।
saṃsāraracanāsarpī prasaktaṃ pradahaty alam ।। 

na dhanaṃ na jano nāsmi satyaṃ rāghava vastutaḥ ।
mithyaiva mithyāvalitam itīdaṃ parilakṣyate ।। 

ādyantayos sarvam asan madhye apy asthiram ādhimat ।
kva badhnātu dhṛtiṃ dhīro hy anyakalpitakhadrume ।। 

ekena kalpitā khe strī bhuṅkte tāṃ dūrago aparaḥ ।
itīyam aṅga saṃsāraracanā netaraḥ kramaḥ ।। 

ihājavañjavībhāvam imam ākulam ātatam ।
gandharvapuranirmāṇavināśena samaṃ viduḥ ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpapuravad asad evedam utthitam ।
kāladairghyadhiyā jātapratyayaṃ jātam adya vaḥ ।। 

nāsi nāyaṃ paṭo nārtho vidyate bhittibhāgavān ।
saṅkalpakalanaiveyam abhyāsāt puṣṭatāṃ gatā ।। 

suṣuptasaṃsthito nityaṃ vitate śāśvate pade ।
na kaścid eva parame bhavān ātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ tatrastha evedaṃ suṣuptapadavicyutaḥ ।
paripaśyasi saṃsāradīrghasvapnam urubhramam ।। 

ajñānanidrāsughanasvasvabhāvān manāk cyutaḥ ।
saṃsārasvapnasambhrānto bhavān ayam iha sthitaḥ ।। 

tad etāṃ vitatāṃ nidrāṃ ghanājñānamayātmikām ।
tyajālakṣmīm iva prāptanidhānaḥ puruṣottama ।। 

prabodham ehi paśyāccham ātmānam uditaṃ sadā ।
nirvikalpacidābhāsaṃ prātaḥ padmo raviṃ yathā ।। 

prabudhyasva prabudhyasva punaḥ punar ayaṃ mayā ।
prabodhyase mahābāho paśyātmārkam anāmayam ।। 

mayaitenātiśītena vṛṣṭena jñānavāriṇā ।
suśabdaśālinā rāma ghanenevāsi bodhitaḥ ।। 

bodham āsādaya paraṃ prabuddho asy eva rāghava ।
satyam ālokayālīkaṃ tyaktvemaṃ jāgataṃ bhramam ।। 

na te janma na te duḥkhaṃ na doṣas te na te bhramaḥ ।
sarvasaṅkalpamuktas tvaṃ svātmanātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

parigalitavikalpadoṣajālas samasitasārasuṣuptasomyavṛttiḥ ।
ativitatam idaṃ ca somyarūpaṃ samupaśamātmani tiṣṭha he mahātman ।। 

paramārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

triṃśas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

ity ākarṇayati svacchasamacetasi rāghave ।
viśrānte svātmani svairaṃ paramānandam āgate ।। 

tatrastheṣu ca sarveṣu teṣūpaśamaśāliṣu ।
aparikṣubdhacitteṣu sthiteṣv abhyuditātmasu ।। 

saṃśāntasakalaspandaśabdasaṃvyavahāriṇi ।
sabhābhoge sthite somye rātrāv iva mahītale ।। 

pramūkamugdhaghaṇṭāsu niṣaṇṇāsu nabhastale ।
śṛṇvantīṣv iva śuddhāsu patākāsu vaco muneḥ ।। 

śāntasañcārasaṅkrāntaniścalāsyeṣu pakṣiṣu ।
svapatsv antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca pañjareṣv ālayeṣu ca ।। 

vicārayatsu tattvārthaṃ buddhyā prāptavikāsayā ।
sutattvajñeṣu sabhyeṣu sahajānandaśāliṣu ।। 

paropaśamaśālinyā tayā sadvākyamālayā ।
vinayāvanatistheṣu krīḍāmarkaṭakeṣv api ।। 

rāghavasyātmaviśrāntisthityarthaṃ vacanaughataḥ ।
virarāma munir vāri sasetv ātmarayād iva ।। 

atha yāte muhūrtārdhe rāghave pratibodhite ।
punar āha tam evārthaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāma samyakprabuddho asi svātmānam asi labdhavān ।
