etam evāvalambyāntas tiṣṭha meha madaṃ kṛthāḥ ।। 

idaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ hi nābhau saṅkalpamātrake ।
saṃrodhitāyāṃ vahanād raghunandana rudhyate ।। 

bodhitāyāṃ manonābhyām idaṃ saṃsāracakrakam ।
prayatnād rodhitam api pravahaty eva vegataḥ ।। 

paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya balaṃ prajñāṃ ca yuktitaḥ ।
nābhiṃ saṃsāracakrasya cittam eva nirodhayet ।। 

prajñāsaujanyayuktena śāstrasaṃvalitena ca ।
pauruṣeṇa na yat prāptaṃ na tat kvacana labhyate ।। 

daivaikaparatāṃ tyaktvā bālabodhopakalpitām ।
nijaṃ prayatnam āśritya cittam ādau nirodhayet ।। 

ā viriñcāt pravṛttena bhrameṇājñānarūpiṇā ।
asad eva sadābhāsam idam ālakṣyate anagha ।। 

ajñānabhramavistāramithyaikākṛtayo anagha ।
ime dehā bhramantīha sarva evāsadutthitāḥ ।। 

saṅkalpapuruṣasyeva dehasyārthe kadācana ।
sukhaduḥkhavikāritvaṃ na kāryaṃ rāma dhīmatā ।। 

duḥkhamlānamukhakledī prasannāt kledavarjitāt ।
api citranarād dehanaras tucchataras smṛtaḥ ।। 

ādhivyādhiparimlāne svayaṃ kledini nāśini ।
na tathā sthiratā dehe citrapuṃsi yathā kila ।। 

vināśito hi citrastho deho naśyati nānyathā ।
avaśyanāśo nāśātmā svayaṃ deho vinaśyati ।। 

pālitas susthirāṃ śobhām ādatte citramānavaḥ ।
dehas tu pālito apy uccair naśyaty eva na vardhate ।। 

tena śreṣṭhaś citradeho nāyaṃ saṅkalpadehakaḥ ।
ye guṇāś citradehe hi na te saṅkalpadehake ।। 

citradehād api jaḍād yo ayaṃ tucchataraḥ kila ।
tasmin māṃsamaye dehe kevāsthā bhavato anagha ।। 

dīrghasaṅkalpadeho ayam asmin kvāsthā mahāmate ।
svalpasaṅkalpajād dehād api tucchataro hy ayam ।। 

svalpasaṅkalpajo dīrghais sukhaduḥkhair na gṛhyate ।
dīrghasaṅkalpajaś cāyaṃ dīrghaduḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ ।। 

deho hi saṅkalpamayo nāyam asti na nāsti ca ।
kiṃ vyartham etadarthaṃ hi mūḍho ayaṃ kleśabhāg janaḥ ।। 

yathā citramaye puṃsi kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।
yathā saṅkalpapuruṣe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

yathā manorājyamaye kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।
yathā dvitīye śaśini kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

yathā svapnasamārambhe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।
yathā ghanātapajale kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

saṅkalpamātrakalite prakṛtyaiva vināśini ।
tathā śarīrayantre asmin kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

dīrghasvapnamaye hy asmiṃś cirasaṅkalpakalpite ।
bhūṣite dūṣite dehe na hi kiñcic citaḥ kṣatam ।। 

na cid astam upāyāti nātmā calati rāghava ।
na brahma vikṛtiṃ yāti kiṃ vo dehakṣaye kṣatam ।। 

bhramaccakroparistho hi tyaktacakro api cakravat ।
yathā paśyati dikcakraṃ bhramad atyantamohitaḥ ।। 

akasmād eva rūḍhena mithyājñānena valgatā ।
abhyastena tathaivedaṃ dṛśyate dehacakrakam ।। 

bhramitaṃ ca bhramadrūpaṃ patadrūpaṃ ca pātitam ।
hataṃ ca hanyamānaṃ ca vapur durvāsanāvaśāt ।। 

ajñānajaṃ bhramaṃ tyaktvā satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avekṣya ca ।
dhīratām alam ālambya ghanaṃ bhramam idaṃ tyajet ।। 

saṅkalpena kṛto deho mithyājñānena san na san ।
asatyena kṛtaṃ yat syān na tat satyaṃ kadācana ।। 

asadabhyutthito deho rajjvām iva bhujaṅgamaḥ ।
asatyām eva cemāṃ ca karoti ca jagatkriyām ।। 

jaḍena rāma kriyate yat tan na kṛtam ucyate ।
kurvann api tato deho na kartā kvacid eva hi ।। 

nirīho hi jaḍo deho nātmano asty abhivāñchitam ।
kartā na kaścid evāto draṣṭā kevalam asy ajaḥ ।। 

yathā dīpo nivātasthas svātmany eva hi tiṣṭhati ।
sākṣivat sarvabhāveṣu tathā tiṣṭha jagatsthitau ।। 

yathā divasakāryāṇi bhāskaras svastha eva san ।
karoty evam imāṃ rāma kuru pārthivasaṃsthitim ।। 

asmin hy asanmaye dehagehe śūnye samutthite ।
sattām upagate mithyā bālakalpitayakṣavat ।। 

kuto apy āgatya nissāras sarvasajjanavarjitaḥ ।
ahaṅkārakuvetālaḥ praviṣṭaś cittanāmabhṛt ।। 

bhṛtyatāṃ māsya gaccha tvam ahaṅkārasya durmateḥ ।
asya bhṛtyatayā rāma nirayaḥ prāpyate phalam ।। 

svasaṅkalpavilāsena dehagehe nirākṛtiḥ ।
unmattacittavetālaḥ parivalgati līlayā ।। 

śūnyadehagṛhaṃ prāpya cittayakṣeṇa tat kṛtam ।
bhītā yena mahānto api samādhiniratās sthitāḥ ।। 

cittavetālam udvāsya svaśarīraikamandirāt ।
saṃsāraśūnyanagare na bibheṣi kadācana ।। 

cittabhūtābhibhūte asmin ye śarīragṛhe ratāḥ ।
citram adyāpi te kasmād ghaṭṭitā nāśmavat sthitāḥ ।। 

graste cittapiśācena dehaveśmani yā dhṛtiḥ ।
piśācasyaiva sā buddhir nāpiśācasya rāghava ।। 

ahaṅkārabṛhadyakṣe gṛhe dagdhaśarīrake ।
viharānāsthayā sādho na tavaitat kila sthiram ।। 

ahaṅkārānucaratāṃ tyaktvā vitatayā dhiyā ।
ahaṅkāramṛtiṃ prāpya svātmaivāśv avalambyatām ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśācena grastā ye nirayaiṣiṇaḥ ।
teṣāṃ mohāmayāndhānāṃ na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ ।। 

ahaṅkāropahatayā buddhyā yā kriyate kriyā ।
viṣavallyā iva phalaṃ tasyās syān maraṇātmakam ।। 

vivekadhairyahīnena svāhaṅkāramahāśavam ।
mūrkheṇālambitaṃ yena naṣṭam evāśu viddhi tam ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśācena varākā ye vaśīkṛtāḥ ।
ta ete narakāgnīnāṃ rāghavendhanatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

ahaṅkārorago yasya parisphurati koṭare ।
sa dehapādapo dhīrair acireṇa nipātyate ।। 

ahaṅkārapiśāco asmin dehe tiṣṭhatu yātu vā ।
tvam enam ālokaya mā manasā mahatāṃ vara ।। 

avadhūto hy avajñātaś cetasaiva tiraskṛtaḥ ।
ahaṅkārapiśācas te neha kiñcit kariṣyati ।। 

dehālaye sphuraty asmin rāma cittapiśācake ।
asyānantavilāsasya kim ivāgatam ātmanaḥ ।। 

cittayakṣābhibhūtānāṃ yāḥ puṃsāṃ vitatāpadaḥ ।
śakyante parisaṅkhyātuṃ na tā varṣaśatair api ।। 

hato mṛto asmi dagdho asmīty etā durbhagavṛttayaḥ ।
ahaṅkārapiśācasya śaktayo anyasya nānagha ।। 

sarvago api yathākāśas sambaddho neha kenacit ।
sarvago api tathaivātmā nāhaṅkāreṇa saṅgataḥ ।। 

yat karoti yad ādatte dehayantram idaṃ calam ।
vātarajjuyutaṃ rāma tad ahaṅkāraceṣṭitam ।। 

vṛkṣonnatau yathā hetur akartr api kilāmbaram ।
ātmasaṃsthas tathehātmā cittaceṣṭāsu kāraṇam ।। 

ātmasannidhimātreṇa kuḍyarūpam ivāmalam ।
dīpasannidhimātreṇa sphuraty āttavapur manaḥ ।। 

ativiśliṣṭayo rāma nityam evātmacittayoḥ ।
dyāvāpṛthivyor iva kas sambandhaḥ prakaṭāndhayoḥ ।। 

calanaspandanehābhir ātmaśaktibhir āvṛtam ।
cittam ātmeti maurkhyeṇa dṛśyate raghunandana ।। 

ātmā prakāśarūpo hi nityas sarvagato vibhuḥ ।
cittaṃ śaṭham ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi hārdaṃ bṛhattamaḥ ।। 

ātmāsi raghusarvasva jaḍā nāsi manodṛṣat ।
dūrīkuru manomohaṃ kim etenāsi saṅgataḥ ।। 

piśāco hi manonāmā śūnye dehagṛhe sthitaḥ ।
bhāyayaty eṣa duṣṭātmā mainam uttama saṃspṛśa ।। 

bhayapradam akalyāṇaṃ dhairyasarvasvahāriṇam ।
manaḥpiśācam utsārya yo asi sa tvaṃ sthiro bhava ।। 

cittayakṣadṛḍhākrāntaṃ na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ ।
śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ guravo na ca mānavam ।। 

saṃśāntacittavetālaṃ guruśāstrārthabandhavaḥ ।
śaknuvanti samuddhartuṃ svalpapaṅkān mṛgaṃ yathā ।। 

asmiñ jagacchūnyapure sarvam eva pradūṣitam ।
dehagehaṃ pramattena cittayakṣeṇa valgatā ।। 

cittavetālavalitasamastagṛhaṣaṇḍakā ।
iyaṃ jagadaraṇyānī śūnyā kasya na bhītaye ।। 

jagannagaryām asyāṃ tu śāntacittapiśācakam ।
dehagehaṃ katipayais sevyate sadbhir eva ca ।। 

iha saṃśrīyate yā yā dik saiva raghunandana ।
pramattamohavetālaiḥ pūrṇā dehaśmaśānakaiḥ ।। 

asyāṃ jagadaraṇyānyāṃ muhūrtaṃ mugdhabālavat ।
svayam ālambya dhairyāṃśam ātmanātmānam uddhara ।। 

jagajjaradaraṇye asmiṃś caradbhūtamṛgavraje ।
dhṛtiṃ tṛṇarasai rāma mā gaccha mṛgapotavat ।। 

asmin mahītalāraṇye carannṛmṛgapotake ।
tvam ajñānagajaṃ bhaṅktvā saiṃhīṃ vṛttim upāśraya ।। 

anye naramṛgā mugdhā jambudvīpe svajaṅgale ।
viharanti yathā rāma tathā mā viharānagha ।। 

atyalpakālaṃ śiśire kardamālepadāyini ।
na maṅktavyaṃ vadhūrūpe mahiṣeṇeva palvale ।। 

bhogābhogā bahiṣkāryā āryasyānusaret padam ।
pravicārya mahāryais svam ekam ātmānam āśrayet ।। 

apavitrasya tucchasya durbhagasya durākṛteḥ ।
dehasyārthe na maṅktavyaṃ cintācuṇṭīṣu cāruṇā ।। 

anyena racito deho yakṣeṇānyena saṃśritaḥ ।
duḥkham anyasya bhoktānyaś citreyaṃ maurkhyacakrikā ।। 

yathaikarūpā ghanatā dṛṣado apy ātmanas tathā ।
sattāmātraikasāmānyād itarasyātyasambhavāt ।। 

yathopalasya ghanatā manastā hi tathātmanaḥ ।
sattāmātrād abhinnā svād abhāvād anyasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

yathopalasya ghanatā tathāsya paramātmanaḥ ।
rūpaikarūpā saṃvittis sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ ।। 

pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga na jāḍyaṃ na ca cetanam ।
mithyāsaṅkalparacite ete hi śiśuyakṣavat ।। 

yathekṣurasamātrasya tv ekasyaiva pṛthaṅmayī ।
ayaṃ guḍa idaṃ khaṇḍam iti māyā mudhoditā ।। 

paramātmana ekasya sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ ।
mudhaivābhyuditaiveyaṃ jāḍyājāḍyamatis tathā ।। 

kṣīyate prekṣitaivaiṣā prekṣāmātraikanāśinī ।
śuktirupyamatiprakhyā na satī nāsatī tataḥ ।। 

nāsato vidyate bhāvo yo nāsty eveha san na saḥ ।। 

svarūpamātraniṣṭhatvād dvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ ।
abhāvād anyasaṃvittes samatvam upalātmanoḥ ।। 

ananyo ananta ekātmā svasattānubhavī yathā ।
tathopalas svatāniṣṭho na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ ।। 

anyāsambhavato nityadvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ ।
cetyasyāsambhavād ātmā na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ ।। 

jaḍājaḍadṛśau vandhyāputravad vyomavṛkṣavat ।
samāyāte na cāyāte prekṣite na ca vīkṣite ।। 

jaḍacetanaśabdārthāv asantau rajjusarpavat ।
bhavatas tau kathaṃ satyam aprekṣāmātrakād ṛte ।। 

yac ca cetanam ātmeti jaḍaś copala ity api ।
uktaṃ tad īdṛgvāgyogyabodhyabodhanahetukam ।। 

bodhyaḥ paratare bodhe yayā yuktyā prabodhyate ।
sopadeśyā na gṛhṇāti mūḍhas tat sahasā padam ।। 

cittaṃ pṛthak pṛthag imāni hatendriyāṇi kartā na dṛśyata idaṃ ca gṛhaṃ mudhaiva ।
ko apy anya eva parivalgati nissvabhāva eṣo aham ity alam aho mahad indrajālam ।। 

lolāsu saṃsṛtiṣu bhūtaparamparāṇāṃ krīḍāsu cānyapuruṣasya cidekavṛtteḥ ।
tattvaṃ vicārya ramate hi mahānubhāvo mantrī yatholbaṇaviṣāsu bhujaṅgamīṣu ।। 

na tvaṃ śiro na nayane na ca raktamāṃse nāsthīni naiva ca mano na ca bhūtajālam ।
mā moham ehi na śarīram asi prasannā cit tvaṃ prapannasakalāmalasarvageti ।। 

dehasattāvicāro nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭakaṣṭeṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ ।
tiṣṭhāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam apy ariṣṭam ivotsṛjan ।। 

athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mahāmohavināśinīm ।
duṣprāpām api suprāpām anapāyām anāmayām ।। 

śṛṇu yā kathitā pūrvaṃ mama kailāsakandare ।
saṃsāraduḥkhaśāntyarthaṃ devenārdhendumaulinā ।। 

astīndukarasambhārabhāsuraḥ pārago divaḥ ।
kailāso nāma śailendro gaurīramaṇamandiram ।। 

gaṅgānirjharanirdhauto gaṇodgīrṇaguhāgṛhaḥ ।
mandānilavalaccūtakadambavanabandhuraḥ ।। 

līlālolāmaragaṇaḥ kṛtakokakalāravaḥ ।
kaumārabarhivalitakharjūravanapiñjaraḥ ।। 

tamālāntarhitāmbhodaḥ kadalītulitāmbudaḥ ।
cañcarījālajaṭilaḥ kūjatkalakapiñjalaḥ ।। 

vidyādharodgītaguhaḥ kacatkanakakandaraḥ ।
kāraṇḍavoḍḍāmaravāg asaṅkhyakusumāmbudaḥ ।। 

vimuktajaladodgāras siddhacāraṇasevitaḥ ।
candrāvacūladayitas trilokīlokavanditaḥ ।। 

satkalpapādapabhujas suśikhāśṛṅgakandharaḥ ।
ratnavidyotanayano vanāvalitanūruhaḥ ।। 

kācakandarakeśaśrīs svavanāvalanāṃśukaḥ ।
pavanoddhūtakiñjalkajālāruṇatalāmbaraḥ ।। 

tatrāste bhagavān devo haraś candrakalādharaḥ ।
śūlapāṇis trinayano gaṇaughaparivāritaḥ ।। 

bhavānīhṛtadehārdhas sarvalokaikakāraṇam ।
kandarpadarpadalanaḥ kalākarakalādharaḥ ।। 

ṣaṇmukhānugatacchāyaḥ pramattavṛṣavāhanaḥ ।
mattebhakṛttivasanaś śmaśānaramaṇālayaḥ ।। 

taṃ pūjayan mahādevaṃ tasminn eva girau purā ।
kadācid avasaṃ gaṅgātaṭe ahaṃ racitāśramaḥ ।। 

tapo'rthaṃ tāpasācāre cirāya racitasthitiḥ ।
yathākramasadācāraḥ puṇyasānusamāśrayaḥ ।। 

nivāsārthaṃ kṛtasnānaḥ kṛtanīladaloṭajaḥ ।
bālavṛkṣakabaddhāsthas saṃropitalatāvṛtiḥ ।। 

sañcitāgryavanaprāṇir upārjitakamaṇḍaluḥ ।
puṣpārthaṃ syūtapuṭakas sūmbhitasvākṣamālikaḥ ।। 

śiṣyasaṅghātavalitaḥ kṛtaśāstrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ।
ānītapustakavyūhaḥ paripālitasanmṛgaḥ ।। 

evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭasya kailāsavanakuñjake ।
tapaḥ pracarato rāma mama kālo atyavartata ।। 

athaikadā kadācit tu bahulasyāṣṭame dine ।
gate śrāvaṇapakṣasya rātryardhe kṣayam āgate ।। 

dikṣu saṃśāntarūpāsu kāṣṭhamaunasthitāsv iva ।
khaḍgacchedyāndhakāreṣu kuñjeṣu gahaneṣu ca ।। 

avaśyāyalasanmuktāhāse sarati mārute ।
ālavālopadhāneṣu mṛgeṣv āśramaśāyiṣu ।। 

amṛtāṃśukarasyandam ātmanaḥ parivṛddhaye ।
lihatsu śaśiraśmibhyaḥ pallaveṣv amṛtadravam ।। 

kumudvatīṣv oṣadhīṣu cakorīṣu latāsu ca ।
pibantīṣv amṛtasyandaṃ karair ākīrṇam aindavam ।। 

śailaviśrāntanīlābhrapallavasya visāriṇaḥ ।
kṛttikāgucchake vyomatāpiñchasya tribhāgage ।। 

tāraughapratibimbena girau sphaṭikabhūmiṣu ।
vikāsipuṣpaprakare dviguṇatvam upāgate ।। 

mayi pallavapalyaṅkagate muktehayā dhiyā ।
cintayaty amalābhāsam ātmatattvam aviplutam ।। 

dvitīyamaddehavati vyomni saptarṣimaṇḍale ।
madartham iva tām eva diśam āpatatīva ca ।। 

tārakātritaye vyomno gṛhamūrdhani madhyage ।
mṛgatraye kirātātte sadā bhramam ivāgate ।। 

utphullakumudāmodadviguṇoddāmamanmathe ।
cakravākagaṇe śailasarasīṣv anyatāṃ gate ।। 

śilāśikhopaviṣṭāsu śailotkīrṇāsv ivābhitaḥ ।
pibantīṣu cakorīṣu śītaṃ śaśikarāmṛtam ।। 

vahati madhuramārute vane antaś śaśikaraśīkaravarṣaṇaikaśīte ।
dalacayacalanotthaśabdagīte kumudavadhūprathamābhisāriṇīva ।। 

vasiṣṭhāśramavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasmin samaye tatra yāmārdhe prathame gate ।
samādhiṃ tanutāṃ nītvā sthito ahaṃ bāhyalagnadṛk ।। 

apaśyaṃ kānane tejo jhagity eva samutthitam ।
mandarāhananoddhūtakṣubdhakṣīrodabhāsuram ।। 

śubhrābhraśatasaṅkāśaṃ nṛtyadindugaṇopamam ।
caṇḍānilabaloddhūtaṃ himarāśim ivācalam ।। 

yugāntatāpagalitaṃ susphāṭikam ivācalam ।
nāvanītam ivāmbhodaṃ ketakaugham ivotthitam ।। 

śaṅkhaśauklyam ivoḍḍīnaṃ śubhrābhram iva sambhṛtam ।
kṣīraphenam ivotphālaṃ muktāsāram ivoddhatam ।। 

gaṅgātaraṅgabharavat praviṣṭaṃ kandarāntaram ।
piṇḍahāryaṃ sudadhivac chārvaṃ hāsam ivātatam ।। 

prakaṭīkṛtadik tejas tad ālokya mayā smayāt ।
antaḥprakāśaśālinyā buddhidṛṣṭyāvalokitam ।। 

yāvat paśyāmi taṃ sānuṃ līlayaiva yadṛcchayā ।
viharan svagirau hṛdye tāvac candrakalādharaḥ ।। 

pāścātyagulmāntaritagaṇajālopamālitaḥ ।
gaurīkarārpitakaro nandiprotsāritāgragaḥ ।। 

paścātparikrāntavṛṣas sarvarātricarāvṛtaḥ ।
kalhāradāmavalito mandārakṛtaśekharaḥ ।। 

jaṭāmaulīndukaliko bhogīndrakṛtakuṇḍalaḥ ।
calattuṣāraśailābhas sarvasaṅkalpitārthadaḥ ।। 

manodṛṣṭas sa bhagavān manasaiva tato mayā ।
dattamandārapuṣpeṇa praṇatenābhivanditaḥ ।। 

iti kṛtvā mayā dehaḥ paryaṅkaśayanād ayam ।
kṣaṇād utthāpitas tasmād bhūteneva mahāśavaḥ ।। 

śiṣyān udbodhya tatrasthān gṛhītvārghaṃ susaṃyataḥ ।
agamaṃ lokanāthasya dṛṣṭipūtam ahaṃ puraḥ ।। 

tatra puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā dūrād eva trilocanaḥ ।
dattārgheṇa mayā devas sa praṇamyābhivanditaḥ ।। 

tataś candraprabhāmṛdvyā ṛjvyā śītalayā tayā ।
dṛśā sarvārtihāriṇyā saraṇyā śāśvate pade ।। 

aham ālokya devena candrārdhakṛtamaulinā ।
puṣpasānūpaviṣṭena proktas smitasitākṣaram ।। 

īśvaraḥ

ānayārghyaṃ tathā pādyaṃ brahman svāgatam astu te ।
āśramātithayaḥ prāptā vayam adya tavānagha ।। 

ghanābhirāmaśālinyā satataṃ śamaśāntayā ।
muditodārayā brahmaṃs tapolakṣmyā virājase ।। 

āgacchopaviśāsmiṃs tvam akṛtrimadalāsane ।
mṛdau sānusamudbhūte puṇyasañcayapāvane ।। 

iti proktavate tasmai niśeśārdhārdhadhāriṇe ।
arghaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā pādyaṃ samupetyārpitaṃ mayā ।। 

pādayor hastayoś caiva tanvāṃ cāsya svayambhuvaḥ ।
mandārapuṣpāvalayo vikīrṇā bahavaḥ puraḥ ।। 

tato bhagavatī gaurī tādṛśyaiva saparyayā ।
sampūjitā sakhīyuktā gaṇamaṇḍalikā tathā ।। 

gṛhītavantau tau tāṃ me saparyām ādarāt prabhū ।
bhaktipraṇayino rāma pārvatīparameśvarau ।। 

pūjānte pūrṇaśītāṃśuraśmiśītalayā girā ।
tatropaviṣṭaṃ provāca mām athendukalādharaḥ ।। 

īśvaraḥ

brahman praśamaśālinyaḥ prāptaviśrāntayaḥ pare ।
kaccit kalyāṇakāriṇyas saṃvidas te sthitāḥ pade ।। 

kaccit kamalakalhārakumudānayanakṣamāḥ ।
tavāntevāsino brahman nīrujas tvadanuvratāḥ ।। 

balibhāgabhujāṃ kaccid bhagavan bhavadāśrame ।
kuśalaṃ mugdhamugdhānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ matpriyādṛśām ।। 

kaccin mandārakusumāny ete mandārapādapāḥ ।
tavāsmadādipūjārthaṃ samprayacchanti sūnnatāḥ ।। 

kaccin mandākinī puṇyaṃ tava snānopayogikam ।
ekayā vāhalatayā dadāty utpalapaṅkajam ।। 

asamañjasaceṣṭāsu nityaṃ ceṣṭāsu me anagha ।
api madgaṇalīlāsu muninātha na khidyase ।। 

tiṣṭhantam iha śailendre vipināraṇyavāsinaḥ ।
api nodvejayanti tvāṃ dhaneśānucarā mune ।। 

durvṛttaghanayakṣaughe vipra lolaniśācare ।
vasato asmin gireḥ kukṣāv apy anudvegitāsti te ।। 

evaṃvādini deveśe sarvalokaikakāraṇe ।
girānunayaśālinyā mayoktaṃ raghunandana ।। 

tryakṣānusmṛtikalyāṇavatām iha maheśvara ।
na kiñcid api duṣprāpaṃ na ca kāścana bhītayaḥ ।। 

tvadanusmaraṇānandaparipūrṇitacetasaḥ ।
na te santi jagatkośe praṇatiṃ ye na bibhrati ।। 

te deśās te janapadās tā diśas te ca parvatāḥ ।
tvadanusmaraṇaikāntadhiyo yatra narās sthitāḥ ।। 

phalaṃ bhūtasya puṇyasya vartamānasya secanam ।
taror ivaiṣyato bījaṃ tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca saphalaṃ yena nāma tat ।
kālatritayakalyāṇaṃ tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

paramaṃ manaso mitraṃ sarvāpatprasarāpaham ।
sarvasampallatāsekas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

mahāmahimnāṃ mahatāṃ mahitānāṃ ca karmaṇām ।
kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ vai tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

vivekapayasām abdhiḥ puṇyaratnākaraḥ paraḥ ।
ajñānatimirārkaughas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

jñānāmṛtaughakalaśo dhṛtijyotsnāniśākaraḥ ।
apavargapuradvāraṃ tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

tṛṣṇālatāyāḥ paraśur dhairyāmbhodharaparvataḥ ।
dainyadurvanadāvāgnis tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

jayaty ābhāsitāśeṣacittasaṃsāramaṇḍapaḥ ।
apūrvaḥ paramo dīpas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho ।। 

tvadanusmaraṇodāracintāmaṇimatā mayā ।
sarvāsām āpadāṃ mūrdhni dattaṃ bhūtapate padam ।। 

sakaladuḥkhabhayāpahara prabho kṣaṇam apīha mayāsi na cetasā ।
varada vīra maheśvara vismṛtas sukham ato nivasāmi bhavān iva ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

harasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavantam atrāsau gaurī bhagavatī giram ।
mām uvāca jaganmātā māteva tanayaṃ priyam ।। 

devī

bhagavan bhavatā brūhi bhūrisaubhāgyabhāginī ।
pativratānāṃ prathamā kva kṛtārundhatī priyā ।। 

uttiṣṭhānaya tām asmād āśramān macchramāpahāt ।
tayā saha kathāś citrāḥ karomy ekavayasyayā ।। 

ity ukte tatra pārvatyā mayā sā gṛhiṇī svayam ।
gatvoddeśaṃ tam evāśu samānītā samāśayā ।। 

arundhatyā samaṃ kṛtvā lalanācāram akṣatam ।
svakāryaikaparā gaurī babhūva parinirvṛtā ।। 

aham asmin kṣaṇe buddhyā rāma cintitavān idam ।
avyagro matprasannaś ca labdho ayaṃ bhagavān mayā ।। 

kam enaṃ parameśānaṃ sarvajñānamahārṇavam ।
paripṛcchāmi sandeham indubhūṣitaśekharam ।। 

iti sañcintya sa gurur idaṃ pṛṣṭo mayānagha ।
śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ candramaulinā ।। 

bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa sarvakāraṇakāraṇa ।
bhavatprasādenedaṃ me dhārṣṭyam abhyāgataṃ sphuṭam ।। 

pṛcchāmi tvā mahādeva yad ahaṃ tat tvam āśu me ।
brūhi prasannayā buddhyā tyaktodvegam anāmaya ।। 

sarvapāpakṣayakaraṃ sarvakalyāṇavardhanam ।
devārcanavidhānaṃ me satyaṃ brūhi maheśvara ।। 

īśvaraḥ

śṛṇu brahman varam idaṃ devārcanam anuttamam ।
vadāmi mucyase yena kṛtena sakṛd eva hi ।। 

kaccit vetsi mahādevo devaḥ kas syād iti dvija ।
na devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo na ca devas trilocanaḥ ।। 

na devaḥ kamalodbhūto na devas tridaśeśvaraḥ ।
na devaḥ pavano nārko nānalo na niśākaraḥ ।। 

na brāhmaṇo nāvanipo nāhaṃ na tvaṃ dvijottama ।
na devo deharūpo asti na devaś citrarūpadhṛt ।। 

na devaḥ kalanārūpī nāpi devo bhaven matiḥ ।
akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ vedanaṃ deva ucyate ।। 

ākārādiparicchinnam iti vastuni tat kutaḥ ।
akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ vedanaṃ cicchivaṃ viduḥ ।। 

tad eva devaśabdena kathyate tat prapūjayet ।
tad evāsti yatas sarvaṃ sattāsattātmarūpadhṛt ।। 

ajñātaśivatattvānām ākārādyarcanaṃ kṛtam ।
yojanādhvany aśaktasya krośādhvā parikalpyate ।। 

iyattādiparicchinnaṃ rudrādeḥ prāpyate phalam ।
akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ phalam ānanda ātmanaḥ ।। 

akṛtrimaphalaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ kṛtrimaphalaṃ vrajet ।
sa tyaktamandāravanaḥ kārañjaṃ yāti kānanam ।। 

bodhas sāmyaṃ śama iti puṣpāṇy agryāṇi tatra vai ।
śivaṃ cinmātram akalam ātmānam amalaṃ viduḥ ।। 

śamabodhādibhiḥ puṣpair deva ātmā yad arcyate ।
tat taddevārcanaṃ viddhi nākārārcanam arcanam ।। 

ātmasaṃvittirūpaṃ tu tyaktvā devārcanaṃ janāḥ ।
kṛtrimārcāsu ye saktāś ciraṃ kleśaṃ bhajanti te ।। 

jñātajñeyā hi ye santo bālakrīḍopamaṃ na te ।
ātmadhyānād ṛte brahman kurvate devapūjanam ।। 

ātmaiva devo bhagavāñ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam ।
jñānārcanenāvirataṃ pūjanīyas sa sarvadā ।। 

tvam etac cetanākāśam ātmānaṃ jīvam avyayam ।
svabhāvaṃ viddhi na tv anyat pūjyapūjātmapūjanam ।। 

cetanākāśamātrātma yathā jagad idaṃ prabho ।
yathā ca cetanasyaiva jīvāditvaṃ tad ucyatām ।। 

cidvyomaiva kilāstīha pārāvāravivarjitam ।
sarvatrāsambhavaccetyaṃ yat kalpānteṣu śiṣyate ।। 

tad yat svayaṃ prakacati tasya svakacanasya tu ।
svayaṃ saṃviditaṃ nāma tenedaṃ jagad ity alam ।। 

ity evaṃ svapnapuravaj jagad bhāti cidātmakam ।
evaṃ cidvyomamātrātma jagad acchaṃ na bhittimat ।। 

atyantāsambhavaccetyadṛṣṭi cidvyomamātrakam ।
cittvāt kacati sargādau yat taj jagad iti smṛtam ।। 

tasmāt svapnapurākāraṃ yad idaṃ bhāsate jagat ।
tatra cidvyomamātrātmany anyatā nāma kā kutaḥ ।। 

cinmātram eva girayaś cinmātraṃ jagadambaram ।
cinmātram ātmā jīvaś ca cinmātraṃ bhūtasantatiḥ ।। 

cidvyomamātrād itarat sargādau sargavedane ।
bhinnaṃ svapnapure cāṅga kiṃ sambhavati kathyatām ।। 

ākāśaṃ paramākāśaṃ brahmākāśaṃ jagac citiḥ ।
iti paryāyanāmāni tarupādapavṛkṣavat ।। 

etac ca svapnasaṅkalpamāyādiṣv anubhūyate ।
tadā kila cidākāśam eva bhāti jagattayā ।। 

yathaitat saṃvidākāśaṃ svapne bhāti jagadvapuḥ ।
tathedaṃ jāgradākhye api svapne bhāti tad eva naḥ ।। 

yathā svapnapure citkhaṃ varjayitvetarat kvacit ।
na kiñcit sambhavaty aṅga jagaty evam ihāditaḥ ।। 

yato na sambhavaty anyac cedaṃ kiñcit tato akhilam ।
cittvaṃ sacetyam apy etad acetyaṃ saj jagat sthitam ।। 

yathā cidvyomamātrātma svapne ghaṭapaṭādikam ।
sargādāv eva sargo ayaṃ tathā cidvyomamātrakam ।। 

śuddhasaṃvittimātratvād ṛte anyat svapnapattane ।
yathā na vidyate kiñcit tathāsmin bhuvanatraye ।। 

yāḥ kāścana dṛśo ye ye bhāvābhāvāḥ kilāgamāḥ ।
sadeśakālacittās tat sarvaṃ cidvyomamātrakam ।। 

sa eṣa devaḥ kathito yaḥ paraḥ paramārthataḥ ।
yas tvaṃ yo aham aśeṣaṃ vā jagad eva ca yo akhilam ।। 

sarvasya bhūtajātasya jagato anyasya te mama ।
deho hi cetanākāśaṃ paramātmaiva netarat ।। 

saṅkalpane svapnapure śarīraṃ cidvyomato anyan na yathāsti kiñcit ।
tatheha sarge prathamaikasargān mune prabhṛty asti na rūpam anyat ।। 

jagataḥ paramātmamayatvavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

evaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmaiva kevalam ।
brahmaiva paramākāśa eṣa devaḥ paras smṛtaḥ ।। 

tad etatpūjanaṃ śreyas tasmāt sarvam avāpyate ।
sa devas sarvagas sarvas sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam ।। 

akṛtrimam anādyantam advitīyam akhaṇḍitam ।
abahissādhanāsādhyaṃ sukhaṃ tasmād avāpyate ।। 

prabuddhas tvaṃ muniśreṣṭha tenedaṃ tava varṇyate ।
nāsi devārcane yogyaḥ puṣpadhūpamaye mahān ।। 

avyutpannadhiyo ye hi bālāḥ pelavacetasaḥ ।
kṛtrimārcāmayaṃ teṣāṃ devārcanam udāhṛtam ।। 

gandhākṣataiś ca dīpaiś ca puṣpādyaiḥ pūjayanti hi ।
mithyaiva kalpitair devam ākāre kalpitātmakam ।। 

svasaṅkalpakṛtaiḥ kṛtvā kramair arcanam ādṛtāḥ ।
bālās santāpam āyānti puṣpadhūpalavārcanaiḥ ।। 

svasaṅkalpakṛtair arthaiḥ kṛtvā devārcanaṃ mudhā ।
yataḥ kutaścin mithyātma phalam atrārpayanti te ।। 

puṣpadhūpārcanaṃ brahman kalpitaṃ bālabuddhiṣu ।
yat syād bhavādṛśe ayogyam arcanaṃ tad vadāmy aham ।। 

asmadādis tu no kaścid devo matimatāṃ vara ।
devas tribhuvanādhāraḥ paramātmaiva netaraḥ ।। 

śivas sarvapadātītas sarvasaṅkalpanātigaḥ ।
sarvasaṅkalpavalito na sarvī na ca sārvikaḥ ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnas sarvārambhaprakārakṛt ।
cinmātramūrtir amalo deva ity ucyate mune ।। 

saṃvit sarvakalātītā sarvabhāvāntarasthitā ।
sarvasattāpradā devī sarvasantāpahāriṇī ।। 

brahma brahman sadasator madhyaṃ tad deva ucyate ।
paramātmāparābhikhyaṃ tat sad om ity udāhṛtam ।। 

mahāsattāsvabhāvena sarvatra samatāṃ gatam ।
mahācid iti ca proktaṃ paramārtha iti śrutam ।। 

sthitaṃ sarvatra sarvartu latāsv antar yathā rasaḥ ।
sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa mahācittvātmanāpi ca ।। 

yac cittattvam arundhatyā yac cittattvaṃ tavānagha ।
yac cittattvaṃ ca pārvatyā yac cittattvaṃ gaṇeṣu ca ।। 

cittattvaṃ yan mamedaṃ ca cittattvaṃ yaj jagattraye ।
tad deva iti tattvajñā vidur uttamabuddhayaḥ ।। 

pādapāṇyādimān anyo yo vā devaḥ prakalpyate ।
sa cinmātrād ṛte brahman kiṃsāraḥ kila kathyatām ।। 

na sa dūre sthito brahman na duṣprāpas sa kasyacit ।
sa saṃsthitas sadā dehe sarvatraiva ca khe tathā ।। 

sa karoti sa cāśnāti sa bibharti prayāti ca ।
sa niśśvasati saṃvettā so aṅgāny aṅgāni vetti te ।। 

so asyāṃ vicitraceṣṭāyāṃ prakāśāyāṃ ca tadvaśāt ।
tatsvarūpanibaddhāyāṃ puryām aṅgapurīśvaraḥ ।। 

śarīraparvatasthāyāṃ calāyāṃ tatprasādataḥ ।
so asyāṃ gahanakośāyāṃ hṛdguhāyāṃ guheśvaraḥ ।। 

manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyācārasattātītāmalātmanaḥ ।
tasya saṃvyavahārārthaṃ sañjñā cid iti kalpitā ।। 

sa eṣa cinmayas sūkṣmas sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ ।
imaṃ bhāsuram ābhāsaṃ karoti na karoti ca ।। 

sā cid atyantavimalā jagadarthāṃ jagatkriyām ।
imāṃ rañjayati prājña raseneva madhur latām ।। 

cāravo ye camatkārāś citaś citi yathāsthitam ।
camatkurvanti kila te ete kecin nabho'bhidhāḥ ।। 

kecij jīvābhidhānāś ca kecic cittābhidhānakāḥ ।
kecit kālābhidhānāś ca kecid deśābhidhānakāḥ ।। 

kecit kriyābhidhānāś ca kecid dravyābhidhānakāḥ ।
kecid bhāvavikārādijāḍyacittvābhidhānakāḥ ।। 

prākāśyādyabhidhāḥ kecit kecic caiva tamo'bhidhāḥ ।
arkendvādyabhidhāḥ kecit kecid yakṣābhidhānakāḥ ।। 

niricchasvasvabhāvena vasantena yathāṅkuraḥ ।
janyate tadvad eveyaṃ jagallakṣmīś cidātmanā ।। 

cid imāsu samagrāsu sarvadaivaikikaiva hi ।
trailokyāmbudhisaṃsthāsu śarīrajalajālikā ।। 

śarīrapaṅkajabhrāntamanobhramarasambhṛtam ।
āsvādayati saṅkalpamadhu mattā cidīśvarī ।। 

sasurāsuragandharvaṃ saśailārṇavakaṃ jagat ।
citi sthiraṃ pravahati jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā ।। 

cañcaccittamayācāracāracañcuracakrikam ।
saṃsāracakraṃ ciccakre bhrāmyati bhramabhājanam ।। 

cic caturbhujarūpeṇa jaghānāsuramaṇḍalam ।
kālo jaladakhaṇḍena sāyudhena yathātapam ।। 

cit trinetratayā brahman vṛṣaśītāṃśucihnayā ।
gaurīkamalinīvaktrapadmaṣaṇḍālitāṃ gatā ।। 

viṣṇoḥ padmālitām etya cid dhyānādhīnamānasīm ।
trayīnalinyās sarasīṃ dhatte paitāmahīṃ sthitim ।। 

cito brahman vicitrāṇi śarīrāṇīha bhūriśaḥ ।
pattrāṇīva taror hemni keyūrādikriyeva vā ।। 

cit samastasurānīkaparivanditapādayā ।
trailokyacūḍāmaṇitāṃ dhatte vāsavalīlayā ।। 

cit surāsuratām etya trailokyodaraḍambare ।
pataty udeti saṃyāti svātmanaivābdhivārivat ।। 

ciccandrikā caturdikkam evābhāsaṃ vitanvatī ।
vikāsayati niśśeṣabhūtasattākumudvatīm ।। 

ciddarpaṇamahālakṣmīs trijagat pratibimbitam ।
gṛhṇāty anugraheṇāntas svagarbham iva garbhiṇī ।। 

cic caturdaśabhūtānāṃ maṇḍalāni mahānti ca ।
bhūtīkaroti vāriśrīs samudratvam ivāmbudheḥ ।। 

vicitrālokakusumā ghanasaṅkalpapallavā ।
vyomakedārikārūḍhā sattaughaphalaśālinī ।। 

jīvajālarajaḥpuñjā vāsanārasarañjitā ।
saṃvedanatvagvalitā citrehākalikākulā ।। 

atītāsaṅkhyatrijagatkesarojjvalarūpiṇī ।
anārataspandamahāvilāsollāsahāsinī ।। 

sarvartuparvaparuṣā jaḍaśailādigumphitā ।
vihagagranthivalitā mūlāgraparivarjitā ।। 

cillateyaṃ vikasitā pelavaṃ sadasadvapuḥ ।
vicitraṃ dṛśyakusumaṃ parāmarśāsahaṃ bahu ।। 

anayeha hi sarvatra cchāyācchāpi vijanyate ।
manyate tanyate vastu gīyate kriyate api ca ।। 

mahācitānayā nityaṃ bhāsante bhāskarādayaḥ ।
dehās svadante ca mithas tvanmaccijjaḍavibhramaiḥ ।। 

vitatāvartavartanyā cidvātyeyaṃ pranṛtyati ।
jagajjālarajolekhā tatsattā dṛśyadehinī ।। 

cit sarvaṃ jagadārambham imaṃ prakaṭayaty alam ।
trailokyadīpakaśikhā dīpo varṇaśriyaṃ yathā ।। 

ciccandrabimbe vimale śaśavat prāpya saṅgamam ।
sarvatra lakṣyatām eti padārthaśrīr jagadgatā ।। 

cidrasāyanasekena padārthapaṭalāvalī ।
rūpam eti phalaṃ caiva prāvṛṭsikteva sallatā ।। 

cicchāyayaiva sarvasya jāḍyaṃ śāmyaty udeti vā ।
śavasyāsya śarīrasya gṛhasyeva tamas tviṣā ।। 

ciccamatkṛtayo dehe na bhaveyur imā yadi ।
trailokyadehās tat ke te kān spṛśeyuḥ kimākṛtīn ।। 

cidālokaprakāśe asmin saṅkalpaśiśudhāriṇī ।
kriyākulavadhūr dehagehe sphurati cañcalā ।। 

cidālokaṃ vinā kasya rasanāgre sphurann api ।
kathaṃ kadā prakaṭatām eti kīdṛk ca vā rasaḥ ।। 

suskandhas svaṅgaśākho api kuntalālivṛto apy alam ।
cinmañjarīṃ vinā dehavṛkṣaḥ ka iva rājate ।। 

vardhate abhilaṣaty atti cic carācarakāriṇī ।
cid evāstītaran nāsti cinmātram idam utthitam ।। 

ity uktavān atha tryakṣas sudhāsyandācchayā girā ।
punaḥ pṛṣṭo mayā rāma vinayapraśrayojjvalam ।। 

yadi sarvagatā deva cid asty ekā tatātmikā ।
tad ayaṃ cetati sphāram ayaṃ caiva na cetati ।। 

ayaṃ cidvān purā bhūtvā ciddhīnas samprati sthitaḥ ।
itīyaṃ kalpanā loke pratyakṣānubhavā katham ।। 

īśvaraḥ

śṛṇv etad akhilaṃ brahman yathāpṛṣṭam vadāmi te ।
mahān ayaṃ kṛtaḥ praśnas tvayā brahmavidāṃ vara ।। 

cid asti dviśarīreha sarvabhūtamayātmikā ।
cetyonmukhātmikaikā tu nirvikalpā parā smṛtā ।। 

saṅkalpabaddhātmaivāntas svayam anyeva saṃsthitā ।
saṅkalpitetaravarā dauśśīlyaṃ strī yathā gatā ।। 

sa eva hi pumān kopād yathehānya iva kṣaṇāt ।
bhavaty evaṃ vikalpāṅkā cit svarūpānyatāṃ gatā ।। 

vikalpakalitā brahmaṃś cit svarūpaparicyutā ।
jāḍyaṃ kramād bhāvayantī prayāti kalanāpadam ।। 

cit svayaṃ cetyatām eti sākāśaparamāṇutām ।
śabdabījātmikāṃ paścād vātatanmātrabhāvanīm ।। 

deśakālavibhāgā tu tanmātravalitā kramāt ।
jīvo bhūtvā bhavaty āśu buddhiḥ paścād ahaṃ manaḥ ।। 

manastvaṃ samupāyātā saṃsāram avalambate ।
caṇḍālo asmīti mananāc caṇḍālatvam iva dvijaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpitāprabodhena jāḍyāc cit svaprabodhinī ।
śabalaṃ rūpam āsādya saṅkalpān yāty anāratam ।। 

anantasaṅkalpamayī jāḍyasaṅkalpapīvarī ।
cij jāḍyād deham āyāti payaḥ pāṣāṇatām iva ।। 

tataś cittamanomohamāyeti vihitābhidhā ।
jāḍyaṃ nipuṇam āśritya saṃsāre jāyate mune ।। 

mohasātmyam upāyātā tṛṣṇānigaḍapīḍitā ।
kāmakopabhayopetā bhāvābhāvātipātinī ।। 

tyaktānantanijābhogā vyavacchedavikāriṇī ।
duḥkhadāvānalātaptā śokāśanikṛśāśayā ।। 

iyam asmīti bhāvena śūnyena vikalīkṛtā ।
bhedamātragṛhītāsthā paraṃ dainyam upāgatā ।। 

magnā mohamahāpaṅke paṅke jīrṇeva dantinī ।
bhāvābhāvalatādolāparilolaśarīrakā ।। 

asārāvarasaṃsāravikāravyavahāriṇī ।
tāpopataptahṛdayā rāgarogānusāriṇī ।। 

nijayūthaparibhraṣṭā mṛgīvāvaśatāṃ gatā ।
āvirbhāvoditākārā tirobhāve astam āgatā ।। 

svasaṅkalpopayātāsu bhītā sambhramadṛṣṭiṣu ।
palāyate apy asatyāsu vetālīṣv iva bālikā ।। 

uṣṭrīva madhuno binduṃ vāñchate bhāvitaṃ sukham ।
avāntaraparibhraṣṭā doṣād doṣaṃ pataty adhaḥ ।। 

paraṃ vaivaśyam āyāti saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭaṃ gatā ।
duḥkhād duḥkhe nipatitā vipado vipadi sthitā ।। 

nānānarthagaṇopetā ceṣṭāparavaśāśayā ।
kaṣṭāt kaṣṭam anuprāptā paritāpānutāpinī ।। 

kramān nave nave bandhe avaidagdhyaṃ samupāgatā ।
vicitrabandhanirmāṇaparā krimipadaṃ gatā ।। 

sarvataśśaṅkare bhītā prāṇātyayam upāgatā ।
kṣīṇatoyeva śapharī vivartanaparāyaṇā ।। 

bālye vivaśasarvārthā yauvane cintayāhṛtā ।
vārddhake mṛtiduḥkhāttā mṛtā karmavaśīkṛtā ।। 

jāyate duḥkhaśabalā mriyate jananonmukhī ।
karoty āveśavivaśā nigiraty ārtidhāriṇī ।। 

gacchati śramasantaptā bhavaty ambudabhaṅgurā ।
rodity ākrāntahṛdayā parākrandati tāpitā ।। 

apsarās svarganagare nāgī pātālakoṭare ।
asurī daityavivare narastrī vasudhātale ।। 

rākṣasī rākṣasādhāre vānarī vanakoṭare ।
siṃhī girīndraśikhare kinnarī kulaparvate ।। 

vidyādharī devagirau vyālī cāvanigartake ।
latā tarau khagī nīḍe vīrut sānau vane mṛgī ।। 

śete nārāyaṇo ambhodhau dhyānī brahmapure abjajaḥ ।
kāntāsakho haraś śaile svarge suravaro hariḥ ।। 

dinaṃ karoti tīkṣṇāṃśur varṣaty ambudharo jalam ।
karoti rajanīm indur dhatte nīraṃ mahodadhiḥ ।। 

ṛtucakraṃ pravahati sahakālarkṣamaṇḍalam ।
dinarātritayodeti tejastimiratā kvacit ।। 

kvacid bījarasollāsaḥ kvacit pāṣāṇamauninī ।
kvacin nadī rasavahā kvacit kusumavistṛtiḥ ।। 

kvacit phalāvalīpākaḥ kvacit kvātho analādibhiḥ ।
kvacic chaityaṃ himendvādi kvacit khādi nakiñcana ।। 

kvacid ujjvalitākārā kvacit kṛṣṇā kvacit sitā ।
kvacin nīlātha haritā kvacid agniḥ kvacin mahī ।। 

sarvātmatvāt sarvagatvāt sarvaśaktitayeddhayā ।
sarvatvād ekarūpaiva khād apy acchaiva sā parā ।। 

cic cinoti yathātmānaṃ yena yatra yathā yadā ।
tat tathāśu bhavaty amburayād vīcyāditā yathā ।। 

haṃsī krauñcī bakī kākī sarasīsārasī vṛkī ।
pikī balākā hariṇī vānarī kariṇī śunī ।। 

caṭikā vañjulī śārī makṣikā ṣaṭpadī śukī ।
dhīś śrīr hrīḥ prītir ārtiś ca śavarī śarvarī śaśī ।। 

etāsv anyāsu cānyāsu paribhramati yoniṣu ।
vivartamānā saṃsāre jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā ।। 

bibhety eṣā svasaṅkalpāt svaśabdād iva gardabhī ।
nānayā sadṛg anyāsti mugdhā bālābalā calā ।। 

eṣā sā kathitā tubhyaṃ jīvaśaktir mayā mune ।
prākṛtācāravivaśā varākī paśudharmiṇī ।। 

karmātmety abhidhāṃ prāptā śocyāsya paramātmanaḥ ।
anantaduḥkhabahalaṃ svayaṃ sambhramam āśritā ।। 

asad evānayākrāntaṃ vināśi sahajaṃ malam ।
taṇḍuleneva kambūkam ananyac cānyavat sthitam ।। 

anantavibhavabhraṣṭā daurbhāgyaparitāpinī ।
śocati prāpya jīvatvaṃ bhartṛhīneva nāyikā ।। 

jaḍarater avalokaya śaktatāṃ nijapadasmaraṇena vineha yat ।
vrajati pṛṣṭham adhaḥpatanāya khād duraraghaṭṭaghaṭīpuṭapīṭhavat ।। 

cetyonmukhacittattvavicāro nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

cinoty alīkam evaivaṃ duḥkhitāsmīti bhāvanāt ।
cid vadhūḥ kṣīvasuptaiva patitāsmīty alaṃ yathā ।। 

amṛtaiva mṛtāsmīti viparyastamatir vadhūḥ ।
yathā rodity anaṣṭaiva naṣṭāsmīti tathaiva cit ।। 

akāraṇaviparyastamatir bhrāntam api sthiram ।
yathā jagat paśyatīdaṃ tathāhantābhramaṃ citiḥ ।। 

cittvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ tasyās saṃsārānubhave citeḥ ।
na ca tatkāraṇaṃ kiñcic cittvānyatvātyasambhavāt ।। 

evaṃ hi kāraṇābhāvāc cetyasyāsambhavād api ।
nāsau cin na ca tac cetyaṃ na ca tac cetyate tayā ।। 

na dṛśyadarśanadraṣṭṛrūpaṃ tailam ivopale ।
na kartṛkarmakaraṇadṛg indāv iva kṛṣṇatā ।। 

na manomeyamānāni nabhasīva navāṅkuraḥ ।
na ciccetanacetyādi nandane khadiro yathā ।। 

nāhantvatvattvatattvādi parvatatvam ivāmbare ।
na cehatvānyadeśatve śaṅkhatvakṣv iva kajjalam ।। 

nānānānā na cāpy antar aṇāv iva sumeravaḥ ।
na ca śabdārthaśabdaśrīr mahoṣaralatā yathā ।। 

neti neti na caivārkamaṇḍale rajanī yathā ।
na vastutāvastute ca tuṣāreṣu yathoṣṇatā ।। 

na śūnyatāśūnyate ca śilākośa iva drumaḥ ।
śūnyatāśūnyatā nāpi mahatī kha ivākhatā ।। 

kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas svasthataivāvaśiṣyate ।
na kaścit kasyacid doṣo jñatayaitad avāpyate ।। 

nañarthābhāvanāmātreṇānarthaḥ prasṛtaś citeḥ ।
nañarthabhāvanāmātreṇānartha upaśāmyati ।। 

nañarthabhāvanāmātrād ṛte atrāṅgopayujyate ।
na tṛṇaṃ na ca trailokyam iti svāyattatātra te ।। 

svāyatta eva hy eṣo artho dussādho abhāvanāt sthitaḥ ।
yad yan na sādhyate puṃsā tat kathaṃ kila labhyate ।। 

nirvikalpādvitīyā cid yāsau sakalagā satī ।
paramaikā parā sācchā dīpikā tejasām api ।। 

saiṣāvabhāsanakarī sarvagā nityanirmalā ।
nityoditā nirmanaskā nirvikārā nirañjanā ।। 

ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sure ।
asure sāgare bhūte nare nāge ca saṃsthitā ।। 

sākṣivat tiṣṭhati satī spandate ca na kutracit ।
dīpaḥ prakāśanāyaiva karoti na punaḥ kriyām ।। 

malināpy amalaiṣā sā vikalpāḍhyāvikalpinī ।
jaḍaivājaḍatāsārā nasarvā sarvam eva ca ।। 

nirvikalpā parā sūkṣmā cic cinoti svasaṃvidam ।
vāta evāṅgamarmādi yathā yantrādi ceṣṭate ।। 

rūpālokamanaskāravalitā cid abodhataḥ ।
bodhatas saiva bhavati naiṣā sadasatī yataḥ ।। 

sā paraiva cid atyacchā cintām āyāti cetanāt ।
sādhur eva yathāsādhusaṃvitter durjanaiṣaṇām ।। 

satamas svarṇam āyāti tāmratāṃ malamārjanāt ।
punaḥ kanakatām eti yathā cit paramā tathā ।। 

śvāsopaśāntāv ādarśo yathaiti prathamāṃ sthitim ।
tathā sargam ihāgatya bodhāt svaṃ yāti cit padam ।। 

svabhāvāvedanād asyās saṃsāras sampravartate ।
svabhāvavedanād eṣa tv asann evopaśāmyati ।। 

yadā cittvāc cinoty antar anyatām asatīṃ tadā ।
ahantām iva samprāpya naśyatīvāpy anāśinī ।। 

īṣatspandād adho yāti śṛṅgaprāntātalopalaḥ ।
yathā tathaiva saṃvitter adhaḥpāto mahācitaḥ ।। 

rūpādīnāṃ tu sattaiṣā cetyam evāmalaiva cit ।
dvitvaikatve tv abodhotthe bodhena vilayaṃ gate ।। 

sattāmātreṇa cittvasya bodhaś cittendriyādiṣu ।
ālokasattāmātreṇa vyavahāraḥ kriyāsv iva ।। 

vātāt kanīnikāspandas taddīptir dṛṣṭir ucyate ।
tadbāhyapātitā rūpaṃ rūpabodhas tu cit parā ।। 

tvaṅmārutau jaḍau tucchau tatsaṅgas sparśa ucyate ।
mananaṃ sparśasaṃvittis tatsaṃvittis tu cit parā ।। 

gandhatanmātrapavanasambandho gandhasaṃvidaḥ ।
āsāṃ tu manasā hīnaṃ vedanaṃ paramaiva cit ।। 

śabdatanmātraśravaṇaśaktes saṅgān mano vinā ।
suṣuptasadṛśī saṃvit paramā cid udāhṛtā ।। 

kriyonmukhatvaṃ saṅkalpāt saṅkalpo mananakramaḥ ।
mananaṃ citsvakāluṣyam ātmā cin nirmalā bhavet ।। 

cit prakāśātmikā nityā svātmany eva ca saṃsthitā ।
idam antar jagad dhatte sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā ।। 

advitīyaṃ dadhānedaṃ vikārādivivarjitā ।
nāstam eti na codeti spandate no na vardhate ।। 

saṅkalpāj jīvatām etya nissaṅkalpātmanātmanā ।
cij jaḍaṃ cājaḍaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayantī svayaṃ sthitā ।। 

rathas tv asyās smṛto jīvo jīvasyāhaṅkṛtī rathaḥ ।
ahaṅkṛte ratho buddhis tathā buddher mano rathaḥ ।। 

manasas tu rathaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇasyākṣagaṇo rathaḥ ।
akṣaughasya ratho deho dehasya spandanaṃ rathaḥ ।। 

spandanaṃ karma saṃsāro jarāmaraṇapañjaram ।
evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakram idam ādhivibhūtijam ।। 

pratibhāsata evātmany asatsvapna ivātataḥ ।
manāg api na satyātma mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat sthitam ।। 

rathas tv asyās smṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ kalanāyā munīśvara ।
yatra prāṇamarut tatra mananaṃ paritiṣṭhati ।। 

yatra sthitaiṣā kalanā tad eva paricopati ।
yat prayāti vanaṃ vātyā tad eva parighūrṇate ।। 

manasy ākāśasaṃlīne na prāṇaḥ paricopati ।
tejasy asattām āyāte na rūpam iva rājate ।। 

prāṇe praśānte manute na mano antar manāg api ।
vātyāyām upaśāntāyāṃ na rajo hi vikampate ।। 

yatra prāṇamarud yāti manas tatraiva tiṣṭhati ।
yatra yatrānusarati rathas tatraiva sārathiḥ ।। 

prāṇasampreritaṃ cittaṃ yāti deśāntaraṃ kṣaṇāt ।
kṣepaṇonmuktapāṣāṇa iva tan nānyathā javi ।। 

yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandho yatrāgnis tatra coṣṇatā ।
yatra prāṇo manas tatra yatrendus tatra tadruciḥ ।। 

saṃvittiḥ pavanaspandān nāḍīsaṃsparśatas svataḥ ।
saṃvittes sphāratā cittam atas tat prāṇakoṭare ।। 

sarvatra vidyate saṃvid vyomasvacchā jaḍājaḍe ।
kṣubhyatīva tu sā prāṇaspandād ity anubhūyate ।। 

sattāmātrasvarūpeṇa jaḍeṣu samavasthitā ।
prāṇasambodhitodeti vedanātmatayājaḍe ।। 

nānāsphārasamullāsair yaḥ pūrvaṃ parivalgitaḥ ।
prāṇo atīte tu manane sa evāśu na copati ।। 

puryaṣṭake cit paramā sve mune pratibimbati ।
ādarśa eva pratimā dṛśyate nopalādiṣu ।। 

manaḥ puryaṣṭakaṃ viddhi sarvakāryaikakāraṇam ।
tad eva bhedaiḥ kathitam anyais svāśayakalpitaiḥ ।। 

yasmād udeti phalam ākuladṛśyajālaṃ tat tan na vastvitarad ity anubhūtam uccaiḥ ।
tasmān mano viparivarti hi dehadṛṣṭyā sarvaṃ tu tatparam avastv iti viddhi tat tvam ।। 

manaḥprāṇaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

mune śṛṇu kathaṃ kāryakāriṇī spandaśālinī ।
patantīva citiḥ puṃsām upaiti maraṇābhidhām ।। 

prāktanais tair ihānyaiś ca svair manomananehitaiḥ ।
karmavātair vicitrehaiḥ paripīvaratāṃ gataiḥ ।। 

manastvaṃ yā gatā śaktis sujaḍeva mune citeḥ ।
sā sphuraty anayā brahman svacitā sākṣibhūtayā ।। 

asyāḥ prasādād iha sā cit kalaṅkavatī mune ।
jagadgandharvanagaraṃ karoti na karoti ca ।। 

vinātmasattayā jīvo mūkas tiṣṭhati kuḍyavat ।
tatsattayā prasphurati nabhassampreritāśmavat ।। 

yathā sphuraty atijaḍam ayo ayaskāntasannidhau ।
tathā sphurati jīvo ayaṃ sati sarvagate pare ।। 

sarvasthayātmaśaktyaiva jīva eṣa sphuraty alam ।
makuro bimbam ādatte dravyān nāntassthitād api ।। 

suvismṛtasvabhāvatvāc jīvo ayaṃ jaḍatāṃ gataḥ ।
mohād vismṛtabhāvatvāc chūdratām iva saddvijaḥ ।। 

pravismṛtasvabhāvā hi cic cittatvam upāgatā ।
mohopahatacittatvāt sumahān iva dīnatām ।। 

jaḍayāvaśayā deho vātaśaktisamānayā ।
sañcālyate kalanayā pattraṃ vā vīcimālayā ।। 

karmātmanā varākeṇa jīvena manasāmunā ।
cālyante dehayantrāṇi pāṣāṇā iva vāyunā ।। 

śarīraśakaṭānāṃ hi karṣaṇe paramātmanā ।
manaḥprāṇodayau brahman kṛtau karmakarau dṛḍhau ।। 

cij jaḍaṃ tūrarīkṛtya rūpaṃ jīvatvam eva ca ।
manoratham upāruhya vahatprāṇaturaṅgamam ।। 

kvacij jātapadārthatvaṃ kvacin naṣṭapadārthatām ।
kvacid bahupadārthatvaṃ kvacin nānāpadārthatāṃ ।। 

gateva bhinnevāsteccham atyajantī nijaṃ padam ।
jalateva taraṅgatvaṃ saivāseva sadoditā ।। 

upajīvyātmano rūpaṃ paraṃ sphurati vṛttiṣu ।
ālokam upajīvyemaṃ rūpaśrīr dravyagā yathā ।। 

paramātmani cittattve sthite sati nirāmaye ।
jīvo jīvati sālokaṃ dīpe sati gṛhaṃ yathā ।। 

ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva prayānty asyāḥ prapīnatām ।
apām iva taraṅgatvaṃ vīcitvasyeva phenatā ।। 

ādhivyādhibhir ākīrṇaś śarīrāmbhojaṣaṭpadaḥ ।
jīvo vaivaśyam āyāti taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ ।। 

cicchaktis sarvaśaktitvān nāhaṃ cid iti bhāvanāt ।
svavaśaivaiti vaivaśyaṃ sūryadīptir ivāmbudaiḥ ।। 

vaivaśyāśāvatī mauḍhyān na vindaty ātmasaṃvidam ।
ghanajāḍyaparābhūtas svāṅgāvadalanaṃ yathā ।। 

prāṇavāyvanusandhānam asyā mohād vinaśyati ।
ghanamohavato jantos svakāryasmaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

athāṅgasaṃvido vātas spandaśakteś ca mohataḥ ।
na karoty anusandhānaṃ kuṣṭhī spandaiṣaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

asaṃvitspandane dehe padmapattraṃ hṛdi sthitam ।
na sphuraty aparāmṛṣṭaṃ dārupattraṃ yathā bahiḥ ।। 

nisspande padmapattre antaḥ prāṇāś śāntiṃ prayānty amī ।
tālavṛnte yathāspande bahiḥ pavanaśaktayaḥ ।। 

prāṇe śānte antar asparśāj jīvo nipuṇamūkatām ।
yāti śānte nabhovāyāv adṛśyatvaṃ yathā rajaḥ ।। 

virathaṃ vigatādhāraṃ manomātraṃ hi dṛśyate ।
tiṣṭhaty ātmany alabdhorvījalāditarubījavat ।। 

iti vaikalyam āyāte karaṇaughe samantataḥ ।
nāśaṃ puryaṣṭake yāte dehaḥ patati niścalaḥ ।। 

ciccetyacetanān mohāt spandam āyāti vāsanā ।
udīritā smaraty anyad anyad vismarati svayam ।। 

hṛtpadmayantrasphuraṇāt sphuṭaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ bhavet ।
hṛtpadmayantre vahanād ruddhe puryaṣṭakaṃ kṣayi ।। 

dehe puryaṣṭakaṃ yāvad asti tāvat sa jīvati ।
śānte puryaṣṭake deho mṛta ity ucyate dvija ।। 

viruddhamalasaṃrodhāc chedabhedadaśāvaśāt ।
na prasphurati hṛtpadmayantram abhyantare yadā ।। 

tadā puryaṣṭakaṃ śāntim upaiti gagane śanaiḥ ।
saṃrodhite vātayantre yathā pavanasantatiḥ ।। 

svāsaṃvittivaśāj jīvo vaivaśyam upagacchati ।
padmayantraṃ śarīrasthaṃ na vāhayati nissahaḥ ।। 

vāsanā vimalā yeṣāṃ hṛdayān nāpasarpati ।
sthiraikarūpajīvās te jīvanmuktāś cirāyuṣaḥ ।। 

saṃruddhe padmayantre hi prāṇe śāntim upāgate ।
dehaḥ pataty adhairyo ayaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau ।। 

yathaiva vyomamaruti līnaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ bhavet ।
tathaiva tatraiva tadā layam eti mano mune ।। 

sucirābhyastabhāvasthavāsanānucitaṃ manaḥ ।
yatra tatra bhramaṃ svarganarakādiṃ prapaśyati ।। 

śarīraṃ śavatām eti manomārutavarjitam ।
gate gṛhajane dūraṃ gṛhaṃ saṃśūnyatām iva ।। 

sarvagā cic cetanato jīvībhūya manassthitā ।
puryaṣṭakavapur bhūtvaivātivāhikadehinī ।। 

tanmātrapañcakaṃ cittvaṃ kroḍīkṛtya vyavasthitā ।
svapnabhramavad ākāraṃ bhāvāt sthūlaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvanayā paścāt tatraiva rasaśālinī ।
ātivāhikadehatvaṃ vismaraty akhilaṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

asaty eva śarīre asmin kṛtā kṛtrimabhāvanā ।
nayaty asatyaṃ satyatvaṃ satyaṃ cāsatyatām api ।। 

sarvagā hi cid aṃśena jīvībhūya bhaven manaḥ ।
manaḥ puryaṣṭakaratham ākrāmati tato jagat ।। 

puryaṣṭakaṃ vātamayaṃ deham utthāpayaty alam ।
hṛtsthaṃ hi vetāla iva jīva ity ucyate tadā ।। 

kṣīṇe puryaṣṭake cittaṃ yadā vyomani līyate ।
tadā sphurati no deho mṛta ity ucyate api ca ।। 

svabhāvavaśato jīvo vismṛtyāśaktim ṛcchati ।
vairasyāt kālavaśataḥ parṇaṃ jarjaratām iva ।। 

jīvaśaktyāparāmṛṣṭe niruddhe padmayantrake ।
prāṇe saṃrodham āyāte mriyate mānavo mune ।। 

yathā jātāni jātāni tāny athānyāni kālataḥ ।
vṛkṣāt parṇāni śīryante śarīrāṇi tathā nṛṇām ।। 

jāyante ca mriyante ca śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām ।
pādapānāṃ ca parṇāni kā tatra paridevanā ।। 

cidambudhau sphuranty etā dehabudbudapaṅktayaḥ ।
itaś cānyā itaś cānyā etāsv āsthā na dhīmataḥ ।। 

sarvagāpi cid etasmiṃś cetasi pratibimbate ।
padārtham antar ādatte nānyo hi makurād ṛte ।। 

cidamalanabhasi prasannarūpāḥ parivitate tadatanmaye sphuranti ।
kalakalamukharās sphuṭābhirāmā vividhaśarīravimohatāpanadyaḥ ।। 

dehapātavicāro nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

candrārdhaśekharadhara cittattvasya mahātmanaḥ ।
anantasyaikarūpasya dvitvaṃ katham ivāgatam ।। 

kathaṃ ca tan mahādeva rūḍhaṃ sat kālaparyayāt ।
bhaved duḥkhopaghātāya prajñayā vinivāritam ।। 

īśvaraḥ

sarvaśaktir hi cid brahma sad ekaṃ vidyate yadā ।
tadā nirmūla evāyaṃ dvitvaikatvalayodayaḥ ।। 

sati dvitve kilaikaṃ syāt saty ekatve dvirūpatā ।
kale dve eva cidrūpaṃ cidrūpatvāt tad apy asat ।। 

ekābhāvād abhāvo atra caikatvadvitvayor dvayoḥ ।
ekaṃ vinā dvitīyaṃ na na dvitīyaṃ vinaikatā ।। 

kāryakāraṇayor ekasāratvād ekarūpatā ।
phalāntasyāpi bījāder vikārādi hi kalpanā ।। 

cittvaṃ cetyavikalpena svayaṃ sphurati tanmayam ।
vikārādi tad evātas tatsāratvān na bhidyate ।। 

vikārādivikalpo ayaṃ tata utthāya vastuṣu ।
yāti sārthakatām nānākāryakāraṇakādibhiḥ ।। 

taraṅgas salile atoyam ato ayaṃ yasya te sa naḥ ।
śaśaśṛṅgasamas so api yasya satyaṃ sa khāṅkuraḥ ।। 

vastubodhe atra sampanne tavālaṃ vāgvikalpitaiḥ ।
vyavacchedādi duśchedaṃ vaco vāktvāt kila dvija ।। 

brahmaṇas sarvaśaktitvaṃ tattvato na vibhidyate ।
svam aṅga kaṇakallolajālādy ambudhivāriṇaḥ ।। 

puṣpapallavapattrādi latāyā netarad yathā ।
dvitvaikatve jagattvādi tvattāhantvaṃ tathā citeḥ ।। 

deśakālavikārādibhedaś cidracitas tu yat ।
tac cid eveti te proktaṃ na praśno atra tavocitaḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyāsattāniyatyādyāś ca śaktayaḥ ।
cidātmikā eva cites sattvāt sampatitās svataḥ ।। 

cic ca carcitacetyeha cid brahmādyabhidhā smṛtā ।
yathā vīcyabhidhārhatve sthitam ambu taraṅgitam ।। 

ahambhāvataraṅgasya cidvilāsamahāmbudheḥ ।
taraṅgitatvam iva yan na tāvac cetyatāṃ gatam ।। 

tad etat paramaṃ brahma satyeśvaraśivādibhiḥ ।
śūnyaikaparamātmādināmabhiḥ parigīyate ।। 

evaṃrūpapadātītaṃ yad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।
tan na nāmārham amalaṃ viṣayo na girāṃ ca tat ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate tasyās tal latāyā mahāciteḥ ।
phalapallavapuṣpādi na bhinnaṃ tanmayaṃ yataḥ ।। 

mahāciccetyacayanāc cid bhavaty abhidhāvatī ।
sā jīvatvaṃ sa bāhyatvaṃ tad advi dvīva paśyati ।। 

svayam anyeyam asmīti bhāvayitvā svabhāvataḥ ।
anyatām iva saṃyāti svasaṅkalpātmikāṃ svatām ।। 

akalaṅkena rūpeṇa rūpaṃ yat svakalaṅkavat ।
saṃsārapatitaṃ prāpya cetanenaiva cetitam ।। 

cidvapus svayam evaitad ekato yāti jīvatām ।
cittattvasyāvabhāsena jīvo jīvati tanmayaḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehā cij jīvatāṃ samupāgatā ।
bhāvanāt pañcakībhūtā dravyam asmīti vetty alam ।। 

tad dravyaṃ prāṇinā bhuktam āśu gacchati vīryatām ।
tato ahaṃ prāṇavāñ jāto vettīty anubhavātmakam ।। 

ahantādikrameṇāśu pañcakānubhavakramāt ।
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yad yad vetti tat tad bhavaty alam ।। 

kākatālīyayogena dṛḍhābhyāsakṣayeṇa ca ।
vāsanāntarasaṃśleṣāt pūrvam ākāram ujjhati ।। 

dvitvasvasaṃvidā dvitvam ekasyaiva pravartate ।
puṃso vetālasamparkād vetāla iva bhāsuraḥ ।। 

advitvavedanād dvitvam ātmano vinivartate ।
na karomīti saṅkalpāt puruṣasyeva kartṛtā ।। 

paramārthatayā dvitvaṃ na kilātmani vidyate ।
avikārādimattvena sarvagatvena sarvadā ।। 

yat svasaṅkalparacitam asaṅkalpakṣayaṃ hi tat ।
yathā mune manorājyaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

saṅkalparacanaṃ kleśo na saṅkalpavināśanam ।
saṅkalpayatno gandharvapuryās sṛṣṭau na tu kṣaye ।। 

puṣṭasaṅkalpamātreṇa yad idaṃ duḥkham āgatam ।
tad asaṅkalpamātreṇa kṣayi kātra kadarthanā ।। 

yat kiñcid api saṅkalpya naro duḥkhe nimajjati ।
na kiñcid api saṅkalpya sukham akṣayam aśnute ।। 

saṅkalpavyālanirmuktaṃ sthitaṃ cet tava cetanam ।
tadānandavanodyāne tvam uccaiḥ parirājase ।। 

svavivekānilaiḥ kṛtvā saṅkalpajaladakṣayam ।
parāṃ nirmalatām ehi śaradīva nabho'ntaram ।। 

saṅkalpasaritaṃ mattāṃ matiyantreṇa śoṣayan ।
tatrohyamānam ātmānaṃ samāśvāsya bhavāmanāḥ ।। 

saṅkalpānilanirdhūtaṃ bhrāntaṃ parṇatṛṇāṃśavat ।
bhūtākāśe tvam ātmānam avalambyāvalokaya ।। 

svasaṅkalpakakāluṣyaṃ vinivāryātmanātmanaḥ ।
paraṃ prasādam āsādya paramānandavān bhava ।। 

sarvaśaktitayehātmā yad yathā bhāvayaty alam ।
tat tathā paśyati tadā svasaṅkalpavijṛmbhitam ।। 

saṅkalpamātram evedaṃ jagan mithyā samutthitam ।
asaṅkalpanamātreṇa brahman kvāpi vilīyate ।। 

saṅkalpavātavalitaṃ janmajvālākadambakam ।
asaṅkalpānilasparśād dīpavat pariśāmyati ।। 

tṛṣṇākarañjalatikām imāṃ rūḍhim upāgatām ।
saṅkalpamūloddharaṇāt pariśoṣavatīṃ kuru ।। 

pratibhāsasamutthānaṃ pratibhāsaparikṣayam ।
yathā gandharvanagaraṃ tathā saṃsṛtivibhramaḥ ।। 

prākṛto asmīti vismṛtyā tāvac chocati bhūmipaḥ ।
bhūmipo asmīti sañjātā yāvan nāsya hṛdi smṛtiḥ ।। 

naśyate jātayā brahman prāksmṛtir vartamānayā ।
śaradevopagatayā prāvṛḍ jāḍyavikāriṇī ।। 

ghanapravāhā yaiva syāc cittehā saiva vardhate ।
ya evoccais svaras tantryās sa evākrāmati śrutim ।। 

aham eko aham ātmā tv ity ekāṃ bhāvaya bhāvanām ।
tayā bhāvanayā yuktas sa eva tvaṃ bhavasy alam ।। 

evaṃ hy asambhavad idaṃ tv avibhāgabhāsvad brahmatvam uttamapadaṃ param eva devaḥ ।
pūjāṃśapūjanasupūjakapūjyarūpaṃ kiñcin nakiñcid iva cittapanaikamūrtiḥ ।। 

devaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭatriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

itthaṃ sthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ sadasad devarūpi ca ।
dvaitaikyapadanirmuktaṃ muktadvaitaikyam apy uta ।। 

citeḥ kalaṅkavad rūpam iti saṃsāritāṃ gatam ।
akalaṅkam asaṃsāri tac cābhinnaṃ dvayātmakam ।। 

iyam asmīti samprāptakalaṅkā cin nibadhyate ।
etām eva kalāṃ buddhvā svatvābhinnāṃ vimucyate ।। 

cid arthākāratābhāvād dvitvāt sattvaṃ samujjhatī ।
sukhaduḥkhāditāṃ dhatte nasatyāṃ sad iti kṣaṇāt ।। 

śuddhā niraṃśā satyaikā sattā cetyevamādibhiḥ ।
vimuktā nāmaśabdārthais sarvais sarvātmikāpi kham ।। 

sarvaṃ nirupamaṃ śāntaṃ manaso ante trimārgagam ।
brahmedaṃ bṛṃhitaṃ brāhmyā śaktyākāśanikāśayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

manasā manasi cchinne sarvākṣaprasavātmani ।
dvitīye atha tṛtīye vā pade kim avaśiṣyate ।। 

yāvat kilātmanas sattā mahāsattaiva tāvatī ।
samastāstamaye jāte sattā keva kutaś ca kā ।। 

īśvaraḥ

manasā manasi cchinne svendriyāvayavātmani ।
vicāreṇa samādhānāt prayogeṇa jayena vā ।। 

dvaitaikyakalanābhede galite kalitātmani ।
satyāloke jagajjāle procchūne vilayaṃ gate ।। 

śiṣyate śīrṇasaṃsārakalanākalanātmikā ।
bhṛṣṭabījopamā sattā jīvasya citināmikā ।। 

paśyantīnāmakalitā tyajantī cetyacarvaṇam ।
manomahābhranirmuktaśaradākāśakośavat ।। 

śuddhā cid bhāvamātrasthā cetyaciccāpalād gatā ।
adūraviprakṛṣṭeśā padopanatipāvanī ।। 

cid vyomātmeti kalitā galitākhilakalpanā ।
samastasāmānyavatī nāvatīrṇabhavārṇavā ।। 

apunarbodhasauṣuptapadapāṇḍityapīvarī ।
pāram āsādya viśrāntā ciraśrāntā tate pade ।। 

etat te manasi kṣīṇe kathitaṃ prathamaṃ padam ।
dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu viprendra śakter asyās supāvanam ।। 

eṣaiva mananonmuktā cicchaktiś śāntiśālinī ।
sarvajyotistamomuktavitatākāśasundarī ।। 

ghanasauṣuptalekhāvacchilāntassanniveśavat ।
saindhavāntasstharasavad vātāntasspandaśaktivat ।। 

kālenāyāti tatraiva parāṃ pariṇatiṃ yadā ।
śabdaśaktir ivākāśe paramākāśagā tadā ।। 

cetyāṃśonmukhatāṃ nūnaṃ tyajanty ambv iva cāpalam ।
vātalekheva calanaṃ puṣpalekheva saurabham ।। 

kālatākāśate tyaktvā sakale cāpale amalā ।
na jaḍāṃ nājaḍāṃ sphārāṃ dhatte sattām anāmikām ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnāṃ mahāsattāpadād gatām ।
turyaturyāṃśakalitām akalaṅkām anāmayām ।। 

kāñcid eva viśālākṣasākṣivat samavasthitām ।
sarvatas sarvadā sarvaprakārāsvādatatparām ।। 

eṣā dvitīyā padatā kathitā tava suvrata ।
tṛtīyaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi padaṃ padavidāṃ vara ।। 

eṣā dṛk cetyagalanād anāmārthapadaṃ gatā ।
brahmātmatvādiśabdārthād atītodeti kevalam ।। 

sthairyeṇa kālatas svācchyān niṣkalaṅkapadātmanā ।
turyātītādināmatvād api yāti paraṃ padam ।। 

sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā pradhānaṃ śivabhāvataḥ ।
nityaikā niravacchedyā tṛtīyā pāvanī sthitiḥ ।। 

ciram asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ sarvāśādhvānadūragā ।
sā mamāpy aṅga vacasāṃ na samāyāti gocaram ।। 

trimārgakalanātītam iti te kathitaṃ mune ।
tiṣṭhaitasmin pade nityam iti devas sanātanaḥ ।। 

etanmayam idaṃ viśvaṃ mune tanmayavedanāt ।
satyasaṃvedanān nedaṃ na ca nedaṃ munīśvara ।। 

nedaṃ pravartate kiñcin nedaṃ kiñcit nivartate ।
śāntaṃ samasamābhāsam akham eva khakośavat ।। 

advaitaikyād asaṅkṣobhād ghanāghanatayā tathā ।
avikārādimattvāc ca nityānityatayā ciram ।। 

cidghanātmatayā śailakośānāṃ jagatām api ।
manāg api na bhedo asti satām apy asatām iva ।। 

samastaṃ sac chivaṃ śāntam atītaṃ vāgvilāsataḥ ।
om ity asya ca tanmātrāt turyāṃśāt param om iti ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavān amaladṛk pariṇāmato asmin sphāre pade samupaśāntaravābhirāmaḥ ।
tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad amunā muninā ca sārdhaṃ saṃśāntavṛttir atha tatra muhūrtam īśaḥ ।। 

parameśvaropadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tato muhūrtena haro gaurīkamalinīsaraḥ ।
madvikāsonmukhas svairaṃ vikāsaṃ bahir ādade ।। 

dṛktrayaṃ darśayām āsa mukhāt kālavaśoditam ।
rodassamudgakād arkaratnarāśim ivoditam ।। 

akāladvādaśādityadinatejas sa saṃharan ।
niśām anāśayaṃś ceṣad īśo mām āha mānitam ।। 

mune mananam āhūya svasattaivāśu mīyatām ।
tvam artham āharāhāryaṃ pavanas spandatām iva ।। 

draṣṭavyam iha yat kiñcit tad dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ śamabhramaiḥ ।
na hi heyam upādeyaṃ veha paśyāmi tadvidaḥ ।। 

śāntyaśāntimayān etān vikalpān galitān asi ।
vibuddhavān yathāsthityā tvaṃ tvam eva bhavātmadṛk ।। 

imāṃ dṛśyadaśām āśu bālabodhāya vā punaḥ ।
samāśritya maduktaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu tūṣṇīṃsthitena kim ।। 

ity uktvā bāhyabodhasthaṃ mām avekṣya triśūladhṛt ।
kurvan prāharad ajyotsnāsarasīnduṃ sitotpalam ।। 

īśvaraḥ

audāsīnyena dehānāṃ cit svaspandeṣu kāraṇam ।
tadātmanām atattvānāṃ śūnyaṃ kham iva bhūruhām ।। 

citā sañcetyate deho na tu sañcālyate kvacit ।
prabhur draṣṭaiva bhavati kartā bhavati karmakṛt ।। 

prāṇenedaṃ dehagehaṃ parisphurati yantravat ।
prāṇahīnaṃ parispandaṃ tyaktvā tiṣṭhati mūkavat ।। 

cālanī pāvanī śaktiś śaktis saṃvedanī citeḥ ।
sāmūrtā khād api svacchā svasattaivātra kāraṇam ।। 

vinaśyataḥ prāṇadehau viyogātmaka eva ca ।
cidātmā khād api svaccho na vinaśyati kiṃ bhramaiḥ ।। 

manaḥprāṇamaye dehe cittattvaṃ parirājate ।
makure cāmalābhāse pratibimbaṃ pravartate ।। 

sad apy agragataṃ vastu pratibimbakriyāṃ prati ।
yathā nāsti malopete makure munināyaka ।। 

tathā nāsti gataprāṇe vidyamāne api dehake ।
sarvagāpi cid anyūnā bodhaspandādikaṃ prati ।। 

bodhāt kalaṅkavikalā cid eva paramā śivam ।
vidur devaṃ tadabhyāsaṃ sarvasattārthadaṃ tathā ।। 

sa haris sa śivas so ajas sa brahmā sa sureśvaraḥ ।
anilānalacandrārkavapus sa parameśvaraḥ ।। 

sa eva sarvagātmātmā cit saṃvic cetanas smṛtaḥ ।
deveśo dehabhṛd dhātā devadevo divaspatiḥ ।। 

mahācitas samullāsāt samudyantīva kecana ।
ye nāma te jagaty ete brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ ।
kaṇās taptāyasa iva vāridher iva bindavaḥ ।। 

teṣv īṣadbhramabhūteṣu jāteṣv iva parāt padāt ।
sthiteṣu bhramabījeṣu kalpanājālakartṛṣu ।। 

sahasraśataśākheyam avidyodeti pīvarī ।
vedavedārthadevādijīvajālajaṭāvatī ।। 

tatas tv asyā anantāyāḥ prasṛtāyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
sampannadeśakālāyāḥ kṣamas syād varṇanāsu kaḥ ।। 

brahmaviṣṇuharādīnāṃ mato yaḥ paramaḥ pitā ।
mūlabījaṃ mahādevaḥ pallavānām iva drumaḥ ।। 

sa brahmatattvādyabhidhas sarvasaṃvedanaikakṛt ।
sarvasattāprado bhāsvān vandyo abhyarcyaś ca tadvidām ।। 

pratyakṣavastuviṣayas sarvatraiva sadoditaḥ ।
saṃvedanātmakatayā gatayā sarvagocaram ।। 

na tasyāhvānamantrādi kiñcid evopayujyate ।
nityāhūtas sa sarvastho labhyate sarvatas svacit ।। 

yāṃ yāṃ vastudaśāṃ yāsi tata eva mune śivam ।
svarūpaṃ samavāpnoṣi rūpālokamanodṛśā ।। 

ādyaṃ pūjyaṃ namaskāryaṃ stutyam arghyaṃ sureśvaram ।
enaṃ taṃ viddhi vedyānāṃ sīmāntaṃ mahatām api ।। 

evam ātmānam ālokya jarāśokabhayāpaham ।
sambhṛṣṭabījavaj jantur na bhūyaḥ parirohati ।। 

sakalajantuṣu jantupadapradaṃ viditam ādyam upāsya yatavrata ।
tvam ajam ātmamayaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ bhavasi kiṃ parimajjasi dṛṣṭiṣu ।। 

devatānirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

tataṃ cidrūpam evaikaṃ sarvasattāntarasthitam ।
svānubhūtimayaṃ śuddhaṃ devaṃ rudreśvarā viduḥ ।। 

bījaṃ samastabījānāṃ sāraṃ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ ।
karmaṇāṃ paramaṃ karma ciddhātuṃ viddhi nirmalam ।। 

kāraṇaṃ kāraṇaughānām akāraṇam anābilam ।
bhāvanaṃ bhāvanāṃśānām abhāvyam abhavātmakaṃ ।। 

cetanaṃ cetanaughānāṃ cetanātmani cetitam ।
acetyacetanaṃ cetyaṃ paramaṃ bhūribhāsanam ।। 

ālokālokam amalam anālokyam alokajam ।
abījaṃ jīvabījaughaṃ cidghanaṃ vimalaṃ viduḥ ।। 

asatyaṃ sanmayaṃ śāntaṃ satyāsatyavivarjitam ।
mahāsattādisantānaṃ cinmātraṃ viddhi netarat ।। 

svayaṃ bhavati rāgātmā rañjako rañjanaṃ rajaḥ ।
svayam ākāśam apy āśu kuḍyaṃ bhavati maṇḍitam ।। 

asmiṃś cittejasi sphāre jaganmarumarīcayaḥ ।
sphuritāḥ prasphuriṣyanti prasphuranti ca koṭiśaḥ ।। 

svasattāmātrasampannam idam asmin svatejasi ।
na kiñcid api sampannam anyad auṣṇyād ivānale ।। 

garbhīkṛtamahāmeruṃ paramāṇum amuṃ viduḥ ।। 

garbhīkṛtamahākalpo nimeṣo ayam udāhṛtaḥ ।
ākrāntakalpenānena na santyaktā nimeṣatā ।। 

vālāgrakād apy aṇunā vyāptānenākhilā mahī ।
saptābdhivalayāpy urvī nāsyāntam adhigacchati ।। 

akurvann eva saṃsāraracanāṃ kartṛtāṃ gataḥ ।
kurvann eva mahākarma na karoty eva kiñcana ।। 

dravyam apy eva nirdravyo nirdravyo api hi dravyavat ।
akāyo api mahākāyo mahākāyo apy akāyavān ।। 

adyāpy eṣa sadā prātaḥ prātar apy adyatāṃ gataḥ ।
na cāyam adya na prātas tv adya prātaś ca vā sadā ।। 

huṇḍubhillighale mattaśulupiṇṭhilisālaghe ।
vellighillisalāvolalāsaguggulusussunī ।। 

ityādy anarthakaṃ vākyaṃ tathā satyaṃ sa eva ca ।
na tad asti na yat sa syān na tad asti na yat tv asau ।। 

yasmai sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ ।
yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ ।। 

pattrāntarālagahanena vilāsavatyā helāvilolaghanagarjitayā malena ।
mallena mallapadamālitamālavānāṃ lakṣmīlatāvivalitā valiteva puṣṭiḥ ।। 

maheśvaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

ityādikāpi śabdānām arthaśrīs satyarūpiṇī ।
tasmin sarveśvare sarvasattāmaṇisamudgake ।। 

kā nāma vimalā bhāsas tasmin paramacinmaṇau ।
na kacanti vicinvanti vicitrāṇi jaganti yāḥ ।। 

eṣā bījakaṇāntassthā citsattā svavapurmayam ।
buddhvā mṛtkālavāryādi karoty aṅkuracodanam ।। 

phenāvartavivartāntarvartinī rasarūpiṇī ।
kacitendriyasambandhe karoti spandam ambhasām ।। 

eṣā kusumaguccheṣu gandharūpeṇa saṃsthitā ।
kacantī ghrāṇarandhreṣu karoti pariphullanam ।। 

śilāṅgasthā śilāṅgatvaṃ nayantī satyatāpadam ।
sargādhāradaśāṃ dhatte girīndrasthitilīlayā ।। 

pavanaspandakośātmarūpiṇī ca tvagindriyam ।
saṃsādhayaty ātmasutaṃ pitevātmaparājayāt ।। 

aśeṣasārasampiṇḍam apy ātmānaṃ khasiddhaye ।
bhāvayitvā nakiñcittvam iva khatvaṃ karoty alam ।। 

svasattāpratibimbābham ākāśamakurodare ।
dhatte kalpanimeṣāṅkaṃ kālākhyam amalaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

āmahāpañcameśānapariṇāmam anāmayā ।
idam ittham idaṃ neti niyatir bhavati svayam ।। 

sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ ।
saty etasmin prakāśante jagaccitraparamparāḥ ।। 

paramākāśanagaranāṭyamaṇḍapabhūmiṣu ।
svaśaktinṛttaṃ saṃsāraṃ paśyantī sākṣivat sthitā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śivasyāsya jagannātha śaktayas tāḥ kathaṃ sthitāḥ ।
sākṣitā kātha kiṃ tāsāṃ nṛttaṃ syāt kiyad eva vā ।। 

īśvaraḥ

svabhāvācalaśāntasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ ।
somya cinmātrarūpasya sarvasyānākṛter api ।। 

icchāsattā vyomasattā kālasattā tathaiva ca ।
tathā niyatisattā ca mahāsattā ca suvrata ।। 

jñānaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ kartṛtākartṛtāpi ca ।
ityādikānāṃ śaktīnām anto nāsti śivātmani ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śaktayaḥ kuta etās tā bahutvaṃ katham āsu ca ।
udayaś ca kathaṃ deva bhedābhedaś ca kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

īśvaraḥ

śivasyānantarūpasya yaiṣā cinmātratātmanaḥ ।
eṣā hi śaktir ity uktā nāsmād bhinnā manāg api ।। 

jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvasākṣitvādivibhāvanāt ।
śaktayo vividhaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayanti bahūdayam ।। 

śivaśaktyākhyayaiko api bahuvad bhāsate svataḥ ।
sarvaśaktyātmanaikena śivenaiva śivātmasu ।
artheṣv arthitayā satsu sākṣivat kalpitātmasu ।। 

etā jagati nṛtyanti brahmāṇḍe nṛttamaṇḍape ।
kālena nartakeneva krameṇa pariśikṣitāḥ ।। 

yā sā paramparaitāsām eṣā niyatir ucyate ।
kriyā prakṛtir icchā sā kāletyādikṛtābhidhā ।। 

āmahārudraparyantam idam ittham iti sthiteḥ ।
ātṛṇaṃ padmajaspandaniyamān niyatis smṛtā ।। 

niyatir nityam udvegavarjitā paramorjitā ।
eṣā nṛtyati khe nityaṃ jagajjālakanāṭakam ।। 

nānārasavilāsāḍhyaṃ vivartābhinayānvitam ।
kalpakṣaṇahatānekapuṣkarāvartaghargharam ।। 

sarvartukusumākīrṇadharāgolakamandiram ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ patadvarṣabhūrisvedajalotkaram ।। 

payodapallavālolanīlāmbarakṛtabhramam ।
pūrṇasaṃśuṣkasaptābdhiratnāḍhyavalayākulam ।। 

yāmāpakṣmadinaprekṣākaṭākṣāśāritāmbaram ।
majjanonmajjanavyagrakulādrikulaśekharam ।। 

bhramacchaśimaṇiprotagaṅgāmuktālatātrayam ।
caturdaśavidhānantabhūtaromanatonnatam ।। 

sandṛṣṭādṛṣṭasandhyābhravilolakarapallavam ।
anārataraṇallolalokālaṅkārakomalam ।। 

bhūribhūtalapātālanabhastalapadakramam ।
magnonmagnaghanānīkatārāgharmakaṇotkaram ।। 

candrārkamaṇḍalaspandasmitasphuṭanabhomukham ।
kampitānekabrahmāṇḍakavāṭakavitānakam ।। 

luṭhallokāntaravyūhadhvananmuktāṅkapallavam ।
sukhaduḥkhadaśādoṣabhāvābhāvarasāntaram ।। 

asmin vikāravalite niyater vilāse saṃsāranāmni ciranāṭakanāṭyasāre ।
sākṣī sadoditavapuḥ parameśvaro ayam ekas sthito na ca tayā na ca tena bhinnaḥ ।। 

niyatinṛttaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvicatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

eṣa devas sa paramaḥ pūjya eṣa sadā satām ।
cinmātram anubhūtātmā sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ ।। 

ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sthitaḥ ।
śivo haro harir brahmā śakro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ ।। 

bahir antaś ca sarvātmā sadā svātmā subuddhibhiḥ ।
dvividhena krameṇaiṣa bhagavān paripūjyate ।। 

bahis tāvan mahābuddhe krameṇa paripūjyate ।
yena taṃ śṛṇu tattvajña śroṣyasy antaḥkramaṃ tataḥ ।
pūjākrameṣu sarveṣu neha dārbhaṃ pavitrakam ।। 

pūjanaṃ dhyānam evātra dhyānam evātra pūjanam ।
tasmāt tribhuvanādhāre nityaṃ dhyānena pūjayet ।। 

cidrūpaṃ sūryalakṣābhaṃ samastābhāsabhāsanam ।
antassthacitprakāśaṃ svam ahantāsāram āśrayet ।। 

apāraparamākāśavipulābhogakandharam ।
anantādhaspadākāśakośapādasaroruham ।। 

anantadiktaṭābhogabhujamaṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।
nānāvidhamahālokagṛhītaparamāyudham ।। 

hṛtkośakoṇaviśrāntabrahmāṇḍaughaparamparam ।
prakāśaparamākāśapāragāpāravigraham ।। 

brahmendraharirudreśapramukhām amarādikām ।
imāṃ bhūtaśriyaṃ tasya romālīṃ paricintayet ।। 

vividhārambhakāriṇyas trijagadyantrarajjavaḥ ।
icchādyāś śaktayas sarvāś cintanīyāś śarīragāḥ ।। 

anantaikapadādhāras sattāmātraikavigrahaḥ ।
vivartitajagajjālaḥ kālo asya dvārapālakaḥ ।। 

saśailabhuvanābhogam idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalam ।
dehakoṇe asya kasmiṃścit svāṅgāvayavatāṃ gatam ।। 

vicintayen mahādevaṃ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇam ।
sahasraśirasaṃ śāntaṃ sahasrabhujabhūṣaṇam ।। 

sarvatrekṣaṇaśaktyāḍhyaṃ sarvato ghrāṇaśaktigam ।
sarvatra sparśanamayaṃ sarvato rasanānvitam ।। 

sarvatra śravaṇākīrṇaṃ sarvatra manasānvitam ।
sarvato mananātītaṃ sarvatra paramaṃ śivam ।। 

sarvadā sarvakartāraṃ sarvasaṅkalpitārthadam ।
sarvabhūtāntarālasthaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaikasādhanam ।। 

iti sañcintya deveśam arcayed vidhivat tataḥ ।
vidhānam arcanasyedaṃ śṛṇu brahmavidāṃ vara ।। 

devaṃ svasaṃvidātmānaṃ nopahāreṇa pūjayet ।
na dīpena na dhūpena na puṣpavibhavārpaṇaiḥ ।। 

nānnadānādidānena na candanavilepanaiḥ ।
na ca kuṅkumakarpūrair bhogaiś citrair na cetaraiḥ ।। 

nityam akleśalabhyena śītalenāvināśinā ।
ekenaivāmṛtenaiṣa bodhena svena pūjyate ।। 

etad eva paraṃ dhyānaṃ pūjaiṣaiva parā smṛtā ।
yad anāratam antassthaśuddhacinmātravedanam ।। 

paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan ।
pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇañ śuddhasaṃvinmayo bhavet ।। 

dhyānāmṛtena sampūjyas svayam ātmāyam īśvaraḥ ।
paramāsvādayuktena muktena kusumehitaiḥ ।। 

dhyānopahāra evātmadhyānaṃ hy asya samīhitam ।
dhyānam arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca śuddhasaṃvedanātmakam ।। 

dhyānasaṃvedanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ paraṃ viduḥ ।
vinā tenetareṇāyam ātmā labhyata eva no ।। 

dhyānāt prasādam āyātas sarvalokasukhaśriyam ।
ayam ātmā mune bhuṅkte dehe bhūpo gṛhe yathā ।। 

dhyānenānena sumune nimeṣāṃs tu trayodaśa ।
pūrṇo api pūjayatv īśaṃ gopradānaṃ labheta vai ।। 

pūjayitvā nimeṣāṇāṃ śatam ekam iti prabhum ।
aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalam āpnoti mānavaḥ ।। 

dhyānabalyupahāreṇa svayam ātmānam ātmanā ।
ghaṭikāṃ pūjayed yas tu rājasūyaṃ labheta saḥ ।। 

madhyāhnapūjanād itthaṃ rājasūyaikalakṣabhāk ।
divasaṃ pūjayitvaivaṃ pare dhāmni vasen naraḥ ।। 

eṣo asau paramo yoga eṣā sā paramā kriyā ।
bāhyasampūjanaṃ proktam etad uttamam ātmanaḥ ।। 

etat pavitram akhilāghavināśahetuṃ yas tv ācariṣyati naraḥ kṣaṇam apy akhinnaḥ ।
taṃ vandayiṣyati surāsuralokapūgaḥ prāptāspadaṃ jagati mām iva lokasāram ।। 

bāhyapūjā nāma sargaḥ

tricatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ yad yat sarvatamasāṃ kṣayaḥ ।
tad idānīṃ pravakṣye aham antaḥpūjanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

gacchatas tiṣṭhataś caiva jāgratas svapato api vā ।
sarvācāravataḥ pūjā nityadhyānātmikā tv iyam ।। 

nityam eva śarīrastham idaṃ dhyāyet paraṃ śivam ।
sarvapratyayakartāraṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā ।। 

śayānam utthitaṃ caiva vrajantam atha vā sthitam ।
spṛśantam abhitas sparśāṃs tyajantam atha vābhitaḥ ।। 

bhuñjānaṃ santyajantaṃ ca bhogān ābhogapīvarān ।
bāhyārthagaṇakartāraṃ sarvakāryasvarūpadam ।। 

dehaliṅgeśvarāntassthaṃ tyaktaliṅgāntarādikaḥ ।
yathāprāptārthasaṃvittyā bodhaliṅgaṃ prapūjayet ।। 

pravāhāpatitārthas tu sambodhasnānaśuddhimān ।
nityāvabodhārhaṇayā bodhaliṅgaṃ prapūjayet ।। 

ādityabhāvanābhogabhāvitāmbarabhāskaram ।
śaśāṅkabhāvanābhogabhāvitenduṃ sadoditam ।। 

pratibhātapadārthaughanityāvagatasaṃvidam ।
dvārair vahantaṃ śārīrair mukhe prāṇasvarūpiṇam ।। 

rasīkṛtarasaṃ prāṇasvāntodāttaturaṅgamam ।
prāṇāpānarathārūḍhaṃ gūḍham antarguhāśayam ।। 

jñātāraṃ jñeyadṛṣṭīnāṃ kartāraṃ sarvakarmaṇām ।
bhoktāraṃ sarvabhojyānāṃ smartāraṃ sarvasaṃvidām ।। 

samyaksaṃviditāṅgaughaṃ bhavabhāvanabhāvitam ।
ābhāsabhāsanaṃ bhūri sarvagaṃ cintayec chivam ।। 

niṣkalaṃ sakalaṃ caiva dehasthaṃ vyomacāriṇam ।
arañjitaṃ rañjitaṃ ca nityam aṅgāṅgasaṃvidā ।। 

manomananaśaktisthaṃ prāṇāpānāntaroditam ।
hṛtkaṇṭhatālumadhyasthaṃ bhrūnāsāpuṭapīṭhagam ।। 

ṣaṭtriṃśatpadakoṭistham unmanāntadaśātigam ।
kurvantam antaś śabdādīṃś codayantaṃ manaḥkhagam ।। 

vikalpiny avikalpe ca trividhe vākpathe sthitam ।
tile tailam ivāṅgeṣu sarveṣv evāntar āśritam ।। 

kalākalaṅkarahitaṃ kalitaṃ kalanāgaṇaiḥ ।
ekadeśe svahṛtpadme sarvadehe ca saṃsthitam ।। 

cinmātram amalābhāsaṃ kalākalanakalpanam ।
pratyakṣadṛśyaṃ sarvatra svānubhūtimayātmakam ।। 

pratyakcetanam ātmīyam ātmatvena purassthitam ।
padārthatām upetyāśu kṣaṇād dvitvam ivāgatam ।। 

sahastapādāvayavas sakeśanakhadantakaḥ ।
svadeho ahaṃ cidābhāso devo ayam iti bhāvayet ।। 

vicitrāś śaktayo bahvyo nānācārā manodṛśām ।
upāsate māṃ mānasyaḥ patnyo varam ivottamam ।। 

mano me dvārapālo ayam niveditajagattrayaḥ ।
cinteyaṃ me pratīhārī purassthā śuddharūpiṇī ।। 

śaktir mamāṅgagā buddhiḥ kriyā caivāparāṅgagā ।
jñānāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāny aṅgagāni me ।। 

karmendriyāṇi dvārāṇi buddhīndriyagaṇo aṅganāḥ ।
ayaṃ so aham anantātmā vyavacchedojjhitaś citi ।। 

tiṣṭhāmi bharitaikātmā pūrṇas sarvāvapūrakaḥ ।
iti devīm upāśritya svacchām ātmacamatkṛtim ।। 

devavat paripūrṇo antar adīnātmā ca tiṣṭhati ।
nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na tapyate ।। 

na tṛptiṃ na kṣudhaṃ yāti nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।
samas samasamācāras samābhāsas samākṛtiḥ ।। 

somyatām alam āyātas samantāt sundarāśayaḥ ।
ādeham eka evāsāv avyucchinnamahāmatiḥ ।। 

devārcanaṃ karoty evaṃ dīrghadīrgham aharniśam ।
cittattvāvalito deho devo asya parikīrtitaḥ ।। 

yathāprāptena sarveṇa tam arcayati vastunā ।
samayāmalayā buddhyā cinmātraṃ dehatatparam ।। 

yathāprāptakramotthena sarvārthena samarcayet ।
manāg api na kartavyo yatno atrāpūrvavastuni ।। 

prātar dharmehayā nityaṃ tato arthakriyayānagha ।
kāmasaṃvedanenātha pūjayec cetanaṃ vibhum ।। 

bhakṣyabhojyānnapānena nānāvibhavaśālinā ।
śayanāsanayānena yathāptenārcayec citim ।। 

kāntānnapānasambhogasaṃrambhādivilāsinā ।
sukhena sarvarūpeṇa sambudhyātmānam arcayet ।। 

ādhivyādhiparītena mohasaṃrambhaśālinā ।
sarvopadravaduḥkhena prāptenātmānam arcayet ।। 

sīmāntais sampadāṃ caiva ceṣṭānāṃ jagatas sthiteḥ ।
mṛtajīvitasattvaiś ca prāptair ātmānam arcayet ।। 

dāridryeṇātha rājyena vā pravāhāgatātmanā ।
vicitraceṣṭāpuṣpeṇa buddhvātmānaṃ samarcayet ।। 

nānākalahakallolavalanollāsaśālinā ।
rāgadveṣavilāsena somyam ātmānam arcayet ।। 

satāṃ hṛdayahāriṇyā rūḍhayā śaśiśītayā ।
maitryā mādhuryadharmiṇyā hṛtstham ātmānam arcayet ।। 

bhogānām aviruddhānāṃ niṣiddhānāṃ ca sarvadā ।
tyāgena vātha rāgeṇa svātmānaṃ buddham arcayet ।। 

īhitānīhitaughena yuktāyuktamayātmanā ।
tyaktenārtena vārthyena prāptenātmānam arcayet ।। 

naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣeta prāptaṃ prāptam upāharet ।
nirvikāratayaitad dhi paramārcanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

sarvadaiva samagrāsu ceṣṭāniṣṭāsu dṛṣṭiṣu ।
paramaṃ sāmyam ādāya nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret ।। 

sarvaṃ vindeta suśubhaṃ sarvaṃ vindyāc ca vāśubham ।
sarvam ātmamayaṃ kuryān nityātmārcāparo naraḥ ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyaṃ yad yac cāpātasudussaham ।
tat sarvaṃ susamaṃ buddhvā nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret ।। 

ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ nāhaṃ vibhāgam iti santyajet ।
sarvaṃ brahmeti niścitya nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret ।। 

sarvadā sarvarūpeṇa sarvākāravikāriṇā ।
sarvāsarvaprakāreṇa prāptenātmānam arcayet ।। 

na vāñchatā na tyajatā jñena prāptās svabhāvataḥ ।
saritas sāgareṇeva bhoktavyā bhogabhūmayaḥ ।। 

udvego nānugantavyas tucchātucchāsu dṛṣṭiṣu ।
vyomnā citrapadārtheṣu patitotpatiteṣv iva ।। 

deśakālakriyāyogād yad udeti śubhāśubham ।
avikāraṃ gṛhītena tenaivātmānam arcayet ।। 

ātmārcanavidhāne asmin proktā dravyaśriyas tu yāḥ ।
ekenaiva śamenaitā rasena paribhāvitāḥ ।। 

nāmblā na kaṭvyo no tiktā na kaṣāyāś ca kāścana ।
citrair api rasair digdhā madhurā eva tāś citaḥ ।। 

samatāmadhurā ramyā rasaśaktir munīndra yā ।
tayā yad bhāvitaṃ cetyam amṛtaṃ tat kṣaṇād bhavet ।। 

samatāmṛtapūreṇa yad yan nāma vibhāvyate ।
tat tad āyāti mādhuryaṃ param indor iva cyutam ।। 

samam ākāśavad bhūtvā yad ahṛllekham āsanam ।
avikāram anāyāsaṃ tad devārcanam ucyate ।। 

pūrṇenduneva pūrṇena bhāvyaṃ śamasamatviṣā ।
svacchena cidghanaikena jñenāpy upalarūpiṇā ।। 

antar ākāśaviśado bahiḥ prakṛtakāryakṛt ।
rañjanāmihikāmuktas sampūrṇo jña upāsakaḥ ।। 

svapne apy adṛśyahṛllekham ajñānābhraparikṣaye ।
śāntāhantādimihikaṃ jñaśaradvyoma rājate ।। 

sāmānyam astamitamānasamātṛmeyaṃ sadyaḥprasūtaśiśuvedanavadvitānam ।
samyakpraśāntamaticetanacittajīvaṃ jīvañ jña uttamapadasthita eva tiṣṭha ।। 

deśakālakalanakramoditais sarvavastusukhaduḥkhavibhramaiḥ ।
nityam arcitaśarīranāyakas tiṣṭha śāntasakalehayā dhiyā ।। 

devatārcanavicāro nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

īśvaraḥ

yathākāmaṃ yathārambhaṃ na karoṣi karoṣi yat ।
cinmātrasya śivasyāntas tad devārcanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

tenaivāhlādam āyāti yāti prakaṭatāṃ tathā ।
tathāsthitena rūpeṇa svenaiva svayam īśvaraḥ ।। 

rāgadveṣādiśabdārthā nātmany anyatamāś śive ।
sambhavanti pṛthagrūpā vahnau himakaṇā iva ।। 

yad yad rājatvadīnatvasukhaduḥkhādivedanam ।
ātmīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca tat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

viddhi saṃvittim evārcāṃ vetty ātmātmānam eva ca ।
ghaṭādyātmatayā brahman svayam ātmatayaiva vā ।। 

śivaṃ śāntam anābhāsam ekaṃ bhāsuram ātatam ।
jagatpratyayavat sarvam ātmarūpam idaṃ sthitam ।। 

aho nu citram ātmaiva ghaṭādy anyad avasthitam ।
jīvādis svastha evāntar nūnaṃ vismṛtavān iva ।। 

sarvātmakasyānantasya śivasyāntaḥ kilātmanaḥ ।
pūjyapūjakapūjākhyo vibhramaḥ prodito vṛthā ।। 

niyatākāraśāntatvaṃ na ca sambhavatīśvare ।
yatas saṅkalpyate brahman pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

pūjyapūjāvyavacchinno devo anityo amalātmanaḥ ।
sarvaśakter anantasya neśvaratvasya bhājanam ।। 

trijagatprasṛtācchācchasaṃvidrūpasya cātmanaḥ ।
neśvaratvād ṛte brahman vyapadeśo api yujyate ।। 

deśakālaparicchinno yeṣāṃ syāt parameśvaraḥ ।
asmākam upadeśyās te na vipaścid vipaścitaḥ ।। 

tadīyāṃ dṛṣṭim utsṛjya tathemām avalambya ca ।
samas svasthamanāś śānto vītarāgo nirāmayaḥ ।। 

kāryopahārair abhito yathāprāptair akhinnadhīḥ ।
ātmānam arcayaṃs tiṣṭha sukhaduḥkhaśubhāśubhaiḥ ।। 

adhigatavati sādhāv evam evāśu nūnaṃ tvayi taralitajīvaṃ janmaduḥkhādi kiñcit ।
na lagati pariśuddhe sarvatas sphāṭikāṅge navasadana ivāntar niṣkalaṅke kalaṅkaḥ ।। 

devatātvavicāro nāma sargaḥ

pañcacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śivaḥ kim ucyate deva paraṃ brahma kim ucyate ।
ātmā kim ucyate vāpi paramātmā kim ucyate ।। 

tat sat kiñcin nakiñcic ca śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva ca ।
ityādibhedo bhagavaṃs trilokeśa kim ucyate ।। 

īśvaraḥ

anādyantam anābhāsaṃ sat kiñcid iha vidyate ।
indriyāṇām anābhāsād yan nakiñcid iva sthitam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad indriyāṇāṃ buddhyādiyuktānām apy adṛśyatām ।
gataṃ tat katham īśāna vada kenāvagamyate ।। 

īśvaraḥ

yo mumukṣur avidyāṃśaḥ kevalaṃ nāma sāttvikaḥ ।
sāttvikair eva so avidyābhāgaiś śāstrādināmabhiḥ ।। 

avidyāṃ śreṣṭhayāśreṣṭhāṃ kṣālayann iha tiṣṭhati ।
malaṃ malenāpaharan yuktijño rajako yathā ।। 

kākatālīyavat paścād avidyākṣaya āgate ।
prapaśyaty ātmanaivātmā svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

yathā kathañcid aṅgāraṃ nighṛṣya kṣālayañ śiśuḥ ।
karanairmalyam āpnoti kārṣṇyāṅgārakṣaye yathā ।। 

yathā kathañcic chāstrāḍhyair bhāgair bhāgaṃ vicārayan ।
sāttvikais tāmasaṃ nāśād dvayor ātmodayas tathā ।। 

paśyaty ātmānam ātmaiva vicārayati cātmanā ।
ātmaivāstīha nāvidyāvidyāvidyākṣayaṃ viduḥ ।। 

yāvat kiñcid idaṃ vastu nānevātmāvagamyate ।
kramā gurūpadeśādyā nātmajñānasya kāraṇam ।। 

gurur hīndriyavṛndātmā brahma sarvendriyakṣayāt ।
yad vastu yatkṣayaprāpyaṃ tat tasmin sati nāpyate ।। 

akāraṇā api prāptā bhṛśaṃ kāraṇatāṃ dvija ।
kramā gurūpadeśādyā ātmajñānasya siddhaye ।। 

krame gurūpadeśānāṃ pravṛtte śiṣyabodhataḥ ।
anirdeśyo apy adṛśyo api svayam ātmā prasīdati ।। 

śāstrārthair budhyate nātmā guror vācā na cānagha ।
budhyate svayam evaiṣa svabodhavaśatas svataḥ ।। 

gurūpadeśaśāstrārthair vinā cātmā na budhyate ।
etatsaṃyogasattaiva svātmajñānaprakāśinī ।। 

guruśāstrārthaśiṣyāṇāṃ cirasaṃyogasattayā ।
ahanīva janācāra ātmajñānaṃ pravartate ।। 

karmabuddhīndriyādyantasukhaduḥkhādisaṅkṣayaḥ ।
śiva ātmeti kathitas tat sad ityādināmabhiḥ ।। 

yatredam akhilaṃ nāsti tadrūpeṇaiva cāsti vā ।
tad ākāśād acchataram anantaṃ sad ihāsti hi ।। 

aviśrāntatayā tatra tanvavidyair mumukṣubhiḥ ।
vicitraśuddhamananakalaṅkakalitātmabhiḥ ।। 

adūra eva tiṣṭhadbhir jīvanmuktapadasya taiḥ ।
mokṣopāyakabodhāya śāstrārtharacanāya ca ।। 

brahmendrarudrapramukhair lokapālais sapaṇḍitaiḥ ।
purāṇavedasiddhāntasiddhaye bhāvitātmabhiḥ ।। 

cid brahma śiva ātmeśaparamātmeśvarādikāḥ ।
ekasmin kalpitās sañjñā nissañjñe pṛthag īśvare ।। 

evam etaj jagattattvaṃ svaṃ tattvaṃ śivanāmakam ।
sarvathā sarvadā sarveṇārcayan sukham āssva bhoḥ ।। 

śiva ātmā paraṃ brahmetyādiśabde asti bhinnatā ।
savāsanair viracitā jñasya bhedo na vastuni ।। 

evaṃ devārcanaṃ kurvañ jño nityaṃ munināyaka ।
yatrāsmadādayo bhṛtyās tat prayāti paraṃ padam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

avidyamānam evedaṃ vidyamānam iva sthitam ।
yathā tan me samāsena bhagavan vaktum arhasi ।। 

īśvaraḥ

yo asau brahmādiśabdārthas saṃvidaṃ viddhi kevalam ।
svaccham ākāśam apy asyās sthūlaṃ merur aṇor iva ।। 

sā vedyam avagacchantī yāti cinnāmayogyatām ।
apy avedyavatī nūnam unmanāntapadasthitā ।। 

kṣaṇād bhāvitavedyatvād ahantām anugacchati ।
puruṣatvāt pumān svapne navavāraṇatām iva ।। 

asyā ahantāṃ yātāyā deśatākālatākhatāḥ ।
sampadyante svayaṃ śūnyarūpiṇyas sakhya eva tāḥ ।। 

tābhis saṃvalitā sātha sattā jīvābhidhānakā ।
bhavati spandavijñātā pavanasyeva lekhikā ।। 

jīvaśaktis tathābhūtā niścayaikavilāsinī ।
buddhitām anuyātā sā bhavaty ajñapadāsthitā ।। 

śabdaśaktyā kriyāśaktyā jñānaśaktyānugamyate ।
pratyekaṃ prasphuraty antar apradarśitarūpayā ।। 

militvaiṣa gaṇaḥ kṣipraṃ śrutiṃ samanukalpayan ।
mano bhavati śūnyātmabījaṃ saṅkalpaśākhinaḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehoktibhājanaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ ।
antassthayā brahmaśaktyā jñarūpaṃ svātmanātmadṛk ।। 

sampadyamāna evāsmiṃś cetasīmā hi śaktayaḥ ।
paścād iva sahaivāsya prodyanty anuditā api ।। 

vātasattā spandasattā sparśasattā tathaiva ca ।
tvaksattā taijasī sattā tathā sattā prakāśinī ।। 

dṛksattā jalasattā ca svādasattā tathāpi ca ।
tathaiva rasasattā ca gandhasattā tathaiva ca ।। 

bhūsattā dehasattā ca piṇḍasattā ca pīvarī ।
deśasattā kālasattā sarvās tv ākāravarjitāḥ ।। 

evaṃ sattāgaṇaṃ cetaḥ kroḍīkṛtya kharūpadhṛt ।
sphuraty āśritapattrādi bījavaj jīvatāṃ gatam ।। 

etat puryaṣṭakaṃ viddhi deho ayaṃ cātivāhikaḥ ।
aparābodham etat tat sphuraty aṃśavibhāgavat ।। 

etad yad aṅgasampannaṃ sampannaṃ tan na kiñcana ।
na jātaṃ na ca sadrūpaṃ na cidādi na cetarat ।। 

pare paraṃ prasphurati kevalaṃ kevalātma sat ।
jalapīṭhasya jaṭhare jaladravavilāsavat ।। 

saṃvitsaṃvedanaikātma pṛthag etad acetitam ।
sampadyate parijñātaṃ saṅkalpanagaropamam ।। 

saṃvedanaparijñānāc chivatām eva gacchati ।
ajātam eva vā yat tat kathaṃ gacchati vastutām ।। 

athaitad vindate svāntaṃ saṅkalpād aṇutāṃ svataḥ ।
tanmātrasattās tasyāṇor etāḥ paśyanti dehakam ।। 

aṇusthūlatvam āpannaṃ tad evāśu prapaśyati ।
tasya tanmātrarandhrāṇi yathādeśaṃ ca paśyati ।। 

tataḥ puruṣarūpaikabhāvanāt puruṣākṛtim ।
kākatālīyavad dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ bhavaty alam ।। 

jīva etadavastho atha sthitaṃ paśyati dehakam ।
asantam eva gandharvapuraṃ svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

gandharvanagarākāram api svapnapuropamam ।
jagad duḥkhāya duḥkhasya kātra yuktiḥ parikṣaye ।। 

īśvaraḥ

vāsanāvaśato duḥkhaṃ vidyamāne ca sā bhavet ।
avidyamānaṃ ca jagan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubhaṅgavat ।। 

ataḥ kiṃ vāsyate kena kasya vā vāsanā kutaḥ ।
kathaṃ svapnanareṇāṅga mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu pīyate ।। 

sasraṣṭari tu sāhante samanomananādike ।
avidyamāne jagati yat sat tat pariśiṣyate ।। 

yatra no vāsanā naiva vāsakaṃ na ca vāsyatā ।
kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas saṃśāntasakalabhramaḥ ।। 

yasya satyo apy asatyo vā śūnya eva hi yakṣakaḥ ।
vilīnas tasya kaivalyāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate ।। 

śūnya eva hi vetāla ivetthaṃ cittavāsanā ।
uditeyaṃ jagannāmnī tacchāntau śāntir akṣatā ।। 

ahantāyāṃ jagati ca mṛgatṛṣṇājale ca yaḥ ।
sāsthas taṃ cidghanataraṃ nopadeśyas tv asāv iti ।। 

jīvaṃ vivekinam ihopadiśanti tajjñā no bālam udbhramam asanmayam āryamuktam ।
ajñān praśāsti kila yaḥ kanakāvadātāṃ sa svapnadṛṣṭapuruṣāya sutāṃ dadāti ।। 

jaganmithyātvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tatas sa jīvo bhagavan dṛṣṭavān dehasambhramam ।
ādisarge nabhassaṃsthaḥ kām avasthām upaiti hi ।। 

īśvaraḥ

parasmāt parame vyomni pūrvoktakramavad vapuḥ ।
jīvaḥ paśyati sampannam asatsvapnanaro yathā ।। 

sarvagatvāc cidghanasya kāryaṃ svapnanaro api hi ।
yathā karoty āśu tathā jīvasyāpi śarīradṛk ।। 

sanātano aham avyaktaḥ pumān ity abhidhās tataḥ ।
karoty ātmani tenāsau prathamaḥ kathitaḥ pumān ।। 

evaṃ sa sarge kasmiṃścit prathamo arthas sadāśivaḥ ।
kasmiṃścid viṣṇur ity ukto nābhyutpannapitāmahaḥ ।। 

pitāmahas sa kasmiṃścit kasmiṃścid api cetaraḥ ।
sa ca saṅkalpapuruṣas saṅkalpān mūrtimān sthitaḥ ।। 

puṣṭaḥ prathamasaṅkalpas tāṃ manomūrtim āsthitaḥ ।
yad yathā kalpayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam ।। 

tat tv asadrūpam akhilaṃ śūnye vetālako yathā ।
bhramadṛṣṭyā tu sadrūpam ity ahantājagadgatiḥ ।। 

sraṣṭādipuruṣas tv evaṃ svayaṃ sampadyate hi yaḥ ।
sa nimeṣaṃ prati vyomni samudety atha līyate ।। 

nimeṣa eva kalpaughamahākalpaparamparāḥ ।
pratibhāsaviparyāsamātreṇānubhavaty alam ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇau vyomni vyomni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe ।
sargakalpamahākalpabhāvābhāvā bhavanti hi ।। 

dṛśyante kecid anyo'nyaṃ sādharmyaṃ vāsanāśataiḥ ।
mithaḥ kecin na dṛśyante kecit paśyanti netaram ।। 

kecin nānyena dṛśyante dṛṣṭenāpy asadātmanā ।
sargās sargeṇa sarvatra sambhavanti na te śive ।। 

bhavanti parame vyomni vyomarūpā iti svayam ।
svayaṃ ca sadasadrūpā līyante svapnaśailavat ।। 

sargair na deśa ākrānto na ca kālo na kartṛtā ।
na caite satsvarūpā vā na kalpaṃ naiva ca kṣaṇam ।। 

na cedaṃ jāyate kiñcin na ca kiñcana naśyati ।
svacamatkārarūpeṇa cic camatkurute citi ।। 

svapnapattananirmāṇapātotpatanavaj jagat ।
na deśakālākramaṇaṃ karoti manasām api ।। 

yathā saṅkalpaśailena deśakālādyanantakam ।
ākrāntam api nākrāntaṃ tathaiva jagatāsatā ।। 

sampadyate yathādyo asau puruṣas sargakārakaḥ ।
anenaiva krameṇeha kīṭas sampadyate kṣaṇāt ।। 

tasthuṣām evam eveha jātayo hi caturvidhāḥ ।
rudrādyās taruparyantās sampadyante kṣaṇaṃ prati ।। 

paramāparamās santi tathā kecid aṇūpamāḥ ।
eṣa eva kramas teṣāṃ sati cāsati sargake ।। 

asyās saṃsāramāyāyā evambhūtārthabhāvanāt ।
bhedopaśāntāv abhyāsād bhavaty upaśamaś śivaḥ ।। 

nimeṣaśatabhāgārdhamātram eva parā citiḥ ।
svarūpataś cel luṭhitā tad eṣodety avasthitiḥ ।। 

sā jñarūpā śilākośa iva cet svātmani sthitā ।
tad anādyavabhāsātmabrahmaśabdena gīyate ।। 

asmin prauḍhiṃ gate sarge mahācic cetanaṃ navam ।
saṅgam āgatya digdeśakālāṃśaparamāṇunā ।। 

jīvatām āgatā bhūtatanmātravalanākramāt ।
bhavaty agamṛgīvīrutkīṭadevāsurādikam ।। 

yasmin nitye tate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva tiṣṭhati ।
sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi ।। 

na tad dūre na nikaṭe nordhve nādho na te na me ।
na pūrvaṃ nādya na prātar na san nāsan na madhyagam ।। 

anubhavakalanād ṛte asya mātā bhavati na sarvavikalpaneṣu satsu ।
phaladuruvibhavā pramāṇamālā sthitim upayāti na vāriṇīva vahniḥ ।। 

yathāpṛṣṭaṃ mune proktaṃ tvayi kalyāṇam astu te ।
deśaṃ prayāmo abhimatam āgacchottiṣṭha pārvati ।। 

ity uktvā nīlakaṇṭho asau tyaktapuṣpāñjalau mayi ।
tatāra parivāreṇa samam ambarakoṭaram ।। 

tasmin gate tribhuvanādhipatāv umeśe sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tadanu saṃsmṛtipūrvam eva ।
aṅgīkṛtaṃ navapavitratayā mayātmadarbhāsanaṃ śramavateva mahāśrutaṃ tat ।। 

paramātmābhidhānavicāro nāma sargaḥ īśvaravasiṣṭhasaṃvādas samāptaḥ

saptacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etad uktaṃ pareśena svayam eva ca vedmy aham ।
rāma tvam api jānīṣe yathedaṃ samavasthitam ।। 

yatrālīkam alīkena kilālīkaṃ vilokyate ।
tasyāṃ saṃsāramāyāyāṃ kiṃ satyaṃ kim asanmayam ।। 

yathā yena vikalpena yadvikalpena kalpyate ।
tathā tenātmakalpena na satāpy anubhūyate ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spando nabhasvati ।
