yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathā sargatvam ātmani ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti tenaiva krameṇārcanam ātmanaḥ ।
adya yāvad gatavyagraḥ kurvann aham avasthitaḥ ।। 

anenārcāvidhānena mayemā rāma vāsanāḥ ।
akhinnenātivāhyante vyavahāraparā api ।। 

yathāprāptaiḥ kriyācārakusumair ātmano arcanam ।
vyucchinnam apy ucchinnaṃ me na kadācid aharniśam ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhe sāmānye sarvadehinām ।
yoginas sāvadhānatvaṃ yat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

dṛṣṭyānayā raghupate saṅgamuktena cetasā ।
saṃsāre vipulāraṇye viharāsmin na khidyase ।। 

duḥkhe mahati samprāpte dhanabandhuviyogaje ।
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya vicāraṃ kuru suvrata ।। 

sukhaduḥkhe na kartavye dhanabandhūdayakṣayaiḥ ।
evamprāyā eva sarvā nityaṃ saṃsāradṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

jānāsīva gatīś citrā viṣayāṇāṃ pramāthinīḥ ।
yathā yānti yathāyānti yathā paribhavanti ca ।। 

evam eva pravartante premāṇi ca dhanāni ca ।
evam evāvahīyante nimittair avicāritaiḥ ।। 

na tās tava na tāsāṃ tvaṃ nirmalas tvaṃ jagatkriyāḥ ।
idam itthaṃ jagat kiñcit kiṃ mudhā paritapyase ।। 

tvam evāsi jagadrūpaṃ cinmātraṃ vitatākṛtiḥ ।
nijāvayavakāvṛttau kaḥ kramo harṣaśokayoḥ ।। 

cidekatānatām etya sauṣuptīm āgatas sthitim ।
adyaprabhṛti rāma tvaṃ turyāvasthātmako bhava ।। 

samas samasamābhāso bhāsvadvapur udāradhīḥ ।
tiṣṭhātmācārato nityaṃ paripūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

etat tvaṃ śrutavān sarvaṃ sthitas tvaṃ paripūrṇadhīḥ ।
yadīcchasītarat praṣṭuṃ tat pṛccha raghunandana ।। 

brahmaṇo anantarūpasya kuto malam iti tvayā ।
yat pṛṣṭaṃ prathame kalpe tad adya paricodaya ।। 

rāmaḥ

idānīṃ saṃśayo brahman vinivṛtto viśeṣataḥ ।
jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ jātā tṛptir akṛtrimā ।। 

nātmano asti malaṃ dvitvaṃ na caikyaṃ na ca kalpanā ।
tadā mamābhūd ajñānaṃ praśāntam adhunā tu tat ।। 

kalaṅka ātmano astīti mamājñānavaśena yā ।
āsīd bhrāntir idānīṃ sā nivṛttā tvatprasādataḥ ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate na caivātmā kalaṅkitaḥ ।
sarvaṃ ca brahmamayam ity uditaḥ khalu cāsmy aham ।। 

praśnebhyas saṃśayebhyaś ca vāñchitebhyaś ca sarvataḥ ।
śuddhaṃ me nirgataṃ cetas tvaṣṭā yantrabhramād iva ।। 

sarvasāropadeśeṣu prāyaḥ prokteṣu sādhubhiḥ ।
nirākāṅkṣas sthito asmy antas sumeruḥ kanakeṣv iva ।। 

na tad asty asti yatrāśā na tad asti yad īpsitam ।
na tad asti yad ādeyaṃ heyaṃ madhyaṃ ca vā mama ।। 

idaṃ heyam upādeyam idaṃ sad idam apy asat ।
iti cintābhramaś śānto nipuṇaṃ paramo mune ।। 

na svargam abhivāñchāmi dveṣmi vā na ca rauravam ।
ātmany eva hi tiṣṭhāmi mandarādrir ivābhramaḥ ।। 

kaṇaśaḥkīrṇatrijagatkṣīrasāgarasantatiḥ ।
viśrāntaś cirasambhrānto nirbhramo rāmamandaraḥ ।। 

avastv idam idaṃ vastu yasyeti kalanāmalam ।
hṛdi tasya kusandehajālikā jvalitādhikam ।। 

idam itthaṃ jagad iti jñātaṃ yena munīśvara ।
sa yatra yāti kārpaṇyaṃ jagatas tan na labhyate ।। 

vicitrākulakallolāj jaḍāvṛttivivartitāt ।
tvatprasādena bhagavaṃs tīrṇās smo bhavasāgarāt ।। 

sampadām avadhir jñāto dṛṣṭas sīmānta āpadām ।
sarvasāreṣv adīnās smaḥ pūrṇās smaḥ parameśvarāḥ ।। 

parām abhedyām aparair dalitāśāmataṅgajām ।
saṃsārasamare samyag dhīratām āgataṃ manaḥ ।। 

parigalitavikalpatām upetaṃ pragalitavāñcham adīnasārasattvam ।
trijagati jayati prasiddharūpaṃ pramuditam antar anuttaraṃ mano me ।। 

viśrāntyavagamanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭacatvāriṃśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kevalenendriyais sārdhaṃ vartamānārthavartinā ।
asaṅgamena manasā yat karoṣi na tat kṛtam ।। 

yathā prāptikṣaṇe vastu prathamaṃ tuṣṭaye tathā ।
na prāptyekakṣaṇād ūrdhvam iti ko nānubhūtavān ।। 

vāñchākāle yathā vastu tuṣṭaye nānyadā tathā ।
tasmāt kṣaṇasukhe tuṣṭiṃ bālo badhnāti netaraḥ ।। 

vāñchākṣaṇe tuṣṭaye yat tatra vāñchaiva kāraṇam ।
tuṣṭis tv atuṣṭiparyantā tasmād vāñchāṃ parityaja ।। 

yadi tat padam āpnoṣi kadācit kālaparyayāt ।
tad ahambhāvanārūpe na maṅktavyaṃ tvayā punaḥ ।। 

ātmajñānācalasyāgre rāma viśrāntavān asi ।
ahambhāvamahāśvabhre na punaḥ pātam arhasi ।। 

prasṛtānantasaddṛṣṭer jñatvameruśirassthiteḥ ।
punar garbhāndhakārāntaḥpātālapatanaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

dṛśyate te svabhāvo ayaṃ samatāsatyatāmayaḥ ।
manye kṣīṇavikalpo asi jāto asi gatakālikaḥ ।। 

svabhāvo ayaṃ sthiro rāma ity āvedayatīva me ।
somya pūrṇārṇavaprakhyā samatā nirmalā tava ।। 

āśā yātu nirāśatvam abhāvaṃ yātu bhāvanā ।
amanastvaṃ mano yātu tavāsaṅgena jīvataḥ ।। 

yāṃ yāṃ vastudṛśaṃ yāsi tasyāṃ tasyām avasthitam ।
sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa brahma bṛṃhitacidghanam ।। 

ajñātātmā nibaddho asi vijñātātmā na badhyase ।
rāma tvaṃ svātmanātmānaṃ bodhayasva balād ataḥ ।। 

yatra na svadate vastu svadate ca yathāgatam ।
avāsanatvaṃ tad viddhi sāmyam ākāśakomalam ।। 

vāsanārahitair antar indriyair āharan kriyāḥ ।
na vikriyām avāpnoṣi khavat kṣobhaśatair api ।। 

jñātā jñānaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ trayam ekatayātmani ।
śāntātmānubhavan bhavya na bhūyobhavabhāg asi ।। 

cittonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ saṃsārapralayodayau ।
vāsanāprāṇasaṃrodhād anunmeṣaṃ manaḥ kuru ।। 

prāṇonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ saṃsṛteḥ pralayodayau ।
tam abhyāsaprayogābhyām unmeṣarahitaṃ kuru ।। 

maurkhyonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ karmaṇāṃ pralayodayau ।
tad vilīnaṃ kuru balād guruśāstrārthasaṅgamaiḥ ।। 

yathā vātarajassaṅgaspandāt stambhābhravedanam ।
tathā citā cetyatayā spandād idam upasthitam ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhaspandajeyaṃ jagadgatiḥ ।
sphuraty ālokakuḍyādisaṅgajā varṇadhīr iva ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhaspandābhāve na jāyate ।
vedanā bhavadābhāsā citrapuṃsām ivāśaye ।। 

cittaspandotthitā māyā tadabhāve vilīyate ।
payasspandotthitā vīcis tadabhāvena śāmyati ।। 

tyāgato vāsanāṃśasya bodhād vā prāṇarodhanāt ।
citte nisspandatāṃ yāte kutas spandasya sambhavaḥ ।। 

asaṃvitspandamātreṇa yāti cittam acittatām ।
prāṇānāṃ vā nirodhena tad eva ca paraṃ padam ।। 

dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yat sukhaṃ pāramātmikam ।
tadantaikāntasaṃvittyā brahmadṛṣṭyā manaḥkṣayaḥ ।। 

yatra nābhyuditaṃ cittaṃ tat tat sukham akṛtrimam ।
na svargādau sambhavati marau himagṛhaṃ yathā ।। 

cittopaśamajaṃ sphāram avācyaṃ vacasāṃ sukham ।
kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ nodeti na ca śāmyati ।। 

bodhād bhavati cittānto nirbodhāc cittatoditā ।
bālavetālavat tena mohaśrīr ghanatāṃ gatā ।। 

vidyamānam api hy etac cittaṃ bodhād vilīyate ।
sad apy asad ivābhāti tāmraṃ hemīkṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

jñasya cittaṃ na cittākhyaṃ jñacittaṃ sattvam ucyate ।
nāmārthānyatvabhāk cittaṃ bodhāt tāmrasuvarṇavat ।। 

na sambhavati cittatvaṃ tena tat pravilīyate ।
bhramaś śāmyati bodhena nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।। 

avastv etad vikalpātma cittādi śaśaśṛṅgavat ।
sarvatvād ātmanas tasmāt tad vibodhād vilīyate ।। 

cittaṃ sattvaṃ samāyātaṃ kañcit kālaṃ jagatsthitau ।
vihṛtya turyāvasthāyāṃ turyātītaṃ bhavaty ataḥ ।। 

brahmaiva bhūribhuvanabhramavibhramaughair itthaṃ sthitaṃ samam anekatayaikam eva ।
sarvātma sambhavati netarad aṅga kiñcic caittādi kāñcanahṛdīva hi sanniveśaḥ ।। 

cittāsattāsūcanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atremām avabodhāya vismayotphullakāriṇīm ।
apūrvām eva saṅkṣepād rāma ramyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi vipulaṃ vimalaṃ sphuṭam ।
yugair apy ajaradrūpam asti bilvaphalaṃ mahat ।। 

avināśarasādhāraṃ sudhāmadhurasāravat ।
purāṇam api bālendudalamārdavasundaram ।। 

vyūḍhasahyamahāmerumandarādritṛṇāvaleḥ ।
mahākalpāntavātyāyā api vegair acālitam ।। 

yojanāyutakoṭīnāṃ koṭilakṣaśatair api ।
vaipulyenāparicchedyaṃ phalam ādyaṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।। 

asya bilvaphalasyoccair brahmāṇḍāni samīpataḥ ।
haranti līlāṃ śaile adho rājikākaṇapaddhateḥ ।। 

syandamānarasāpūrāṃ svādvīṃ rasacamatkṛtim ।
yasyātiśete no kaścid api rāghava ṣaḍrasaḥ ।। 

na kadācana pākena pātāntena sameti yat ।
sadaiva pakvam apy aṅga jarasā yan na bādhyate ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādyā jaraḍhāḥ kecid eva no ।
yasyotpattiṃ vijānanti mūlaṃ vā vṛkṣam eva vā ।। 

adṛṣṭāṅkuravṛkṣasya tv adṛṣṭakusumodgateḥ ।
astambhamūlaśākhasya phalam evāvalokyate ।। 

ekapiṇḍaghanākāravyātatasthaulyaśālinaḥ ।
yasyotpattivikārādipariṇāmo na dṛśyate ।। 

samastaphalasārasya phalasyāsya mahākṛteḥ ।
majjāntar asti vitato nirvikāro rasāntaraḥ ।। 

śilāntar iva nīrandhras syandamānendubimbavat ।
rasaṃ svasaṃvidāsvādyaṃ syandamāna ṛtāmṛtam ।। 

sekas sakalasaukhyānāṃ śītalālokakārakaḥ ।
śailābho amṛtapiṇḍābho maṇḍa ātmaphalasthiteḥ ।। 

tasmāt paramamajjā tu yāsau svādvī camatkṛtiḥ ।
antar akṣubhitā nityam ananyā śrīphalāṅgataḥ ।। 

svasanniveśavaicitryam ananyatvaphalāṅgakam ।
atyajantyā tayā tanvyā sthūlayāpy atibālayā ।। 

iyam asmīti kalanād asatsadanyatāmalam ।
bhedādy asambhavad idaṃ svayam utpādya bhāvitam ।। 

ahaṅkalā samudayasamanantaram eva sā ।
valitākāśaśabdāṅgatrailokyaparamāṇubhiḥ ।। 

ity anukramato yātā sā saṃvicchaktirūpatām ।
majjā prāksanniveśaṃ svaṃ tam evāpy asamujjhatī ।। 

saṃvicchaktyā tayā tatra tatas taralarūpayā ।
nija eva pare rūpe dṛg itthaṃ samprasāritā ।। 

idaṃ vyomamahānantam iyaṃ kālamahākalā ।
iyaṃ niyatir udyuktā kriyeyaṃ spandadharmiṇī ।। 

ayaṃ saṅkalpavistāras tv ayam āśābharabhramaḥ ।
rāgadveṣasthitir iyaṃ heyopādeyadhīr iyam ।। 

iyaṃ tvattā tv iyaṃ mattā tatteyaṃ saṃsthitis tv iyam ।
brahmāṇḍaugho ayam ūrdhvasthas tv ayam agre ayam apy adhaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ puraḥ pārśvato ayaṃ paścād ārād davīyasi ।
idaṃ bhūtaṃ vartamānaṃ bhaviṣyat tv idam ity api ।। 

idam antassthitānalpakalpanāmbhoruhālayam ।
brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapāpiṇḍakrīḍāmaṇḍapamaṇḍalam ।। 

anantakalanātattvaparipallavitā hareḥ ।
hṛdabjakarṇikā ceyaṃ lokapadmākṣamālikā ।। 

iyaṃ kīrṇamahārudrakaṇāṅkuritakoṭarā ।
dīrghādhvapadavī dhvāntadhvaṃsanehāprabhāvinī ।। 

ayaṃ meruḥ kakuppattrajagatpaṅkajakarṇikā ।
sphuradindumadhūllāsalampaṭāmaraṣaṭpadā ।। 

iyam uddāmasaugandhyā svargaśrīpuṣpamañjarī ।
jagajjaraḍhavṛkṣasya rajonarakamūlinaḥ ।। 

iyaṃ ca tārākiñjalkā brahmāṇḍakataṭasthitā ।
apārāpāraparyantā vyomanīlasarojinī ।। 

iyaṃ kriyāsarid vātataraṅgataraṇāvalī ।
sargāvartavivartasthā bhūribhūtaparamparā ।। 

iyaṃ tamobhramariṇī kṣaṇakalpādipallavā ।
tejaḥkesariṇī kālanalinī vyomapaṅkajā ।। 

imā bhāvavikārāḍhyā jarāmṛtiviṣūcikāḥ ।
vidyāvidyāvikārāḍhyā imāś śāstrārthadṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

iti sā tasya bilvasya nijā majjācamatkṛtiḥ ।
svakalpasanniveśāntar evaivaṃkṛtasaṃsthitiḥ ।। 

śāntā svasthā nirābādhā somyetaratayojjhitā ।
kartṛtvam apy akartṛtvaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā ।। 

ekaikikaiva vividheva vibhāvyamānā naikātmikā na vividhā nanu saiva saiva ।
satyāsthitā sakalaśāntisamaikarūpā sarvātmikātimahatī citir eva śaktiḥ ।। 

cittasattāvikalpopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña tvayaiṣā bilvarūpiṇī ।
mahācidghanasatteti kathiteti matir mama ।। 

cinmajjarūpam akhilam ahantādīdam ātatam ।
na manāg api bhedo asti dvaitaikyakalanātmakaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā brahmāṇḍakūṣmāṇḍamajjā mervādisaṃsthitiḥ ।
tathā cidbilvamajjeyaṃ brahmāṇḍādyā jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

sṛṣṭiś cidbilvamajjasya jagadākhyā camatkṛtiḥ ।
sthitā suṣuptasomyāntas śilāntas sanniveśavat ।। 

atremām induvadana citrāṃ vismayakāriṇīm ।
varṇyamānāṃ mayā ramyām anyām ākhyāyikāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

snigdhā spaṣṭā mṛdusparśā mahāvistāraśālinī ।
nibiḍā nityanīrandhrā kvacid asti mahāśilā ।। 

tasyām antaḥ praphultāni padmāni subahūny api ।
karṇikājātamūlāni mūlāntaḥkarṇikāni ca ।
ūrdhvamūlāny adhomūlāny amūlānītarāṇi ca ।। 

teṣāṃ ca nikaṭe santi śaṅkhāś śatasahasraśaḥ ।
cakraughāś ca mahākārāḥ padmavat sanniveśinaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

satyam etan mayā dṛṣṭā tādṛśī sā mahāśilā ।
sāligrāme harer dhāmni vidyate parivāriṇī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam etad vijānāsi dṛṣṭavān asi tāś śilāḥ ।
yo yaś ca tatra pāṣāṇas sa sarvas tādṛgantaraḥ ।। 

mayā tv iyam apūrvaiva śileyaṃ varṇyate tava ।
yasyām antar mahākukṣau sarvam asti ca nāsti ca ।। 

cicchilaiṣā mayoktā te yasyām antar jaganti khe ।
ghanatvaikātmakatvādivaśād eṣā śileva cit ।। 

apy atyantaghanāṅgāyā anīrandhrākṛter api ।
vidyate antaḥ paraṃ brahma vyomnīva vipulānilaḥ ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
santi tasyāṃ śilā sā ca suṣirā na manāg api ।। 

asyām ekaghanāṅgātma jagatpadmaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
etasmād vastuno nānyad anyac ca dvyātmakaṃ ca vā ।। 

bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac cicchilāyāṃ sālabhañjikā ।
tathāsti tatra tat sarvaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vastuno yathā ।। 

upalāntas sanniveśo nānātmāpy ekapiṇḍatām ।
yathā dhatte tathaiṣā cit piṇḍākāraikikā ghanā ।। 

yathā padmaś śilākośād abhinno api vapurmayaḥ ।
tathā sargaś cito rūpād abhinno api vapurmayaḥ ।। 

suṣuptāvasthayā cakrapadmalekhāś śilodare ।
yathā sthitāś citer antas tatheyaṃ jagadāvalī ।। 

śilāntaḥ padmalekhālī maricāntaś camatkṛtiḥ ।
nodeti nāstam āyāti yathā sargas tathā citau ।। 

yathāparandhro ananyo antarmajjā bilve nirantaraḥ ।
tathā labhyavikārāḍhyā citau brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalī ।। 

vikārādi tad eveti buddhaivoktir anarthikā ।
tattāṃ samupayāty āśu jalabindur ivāmbhasi ।। 

anantatvāc citer etad vikārādi citer iti ।
uktyā sampadyate tac ca tallayena vilīyate ।। 

brahmaivedaṃ vikārādi vikārādyarthavarjitam ।
varjanāvarjane arthasya brahmaivānantatāvaśāt ।। 

brahmasthiti vikārādi brahmaivotpāditaṃ kramāt ।
atrānyārthavidaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā samām ।। 

bījaṃ puṣpaphalāntassthaṃ bījāntaṃ nānyatātmakam ।
tādṛśī bījasattā sā bhavitrī yā tathottaram ।। 

cidghane cidghanatvaṃ yat sa eva trijagatkramaḥ ।
ekatvam anayor dvitvam ekābhāve dvayoḥ kṣatiḥ ।। 

jagad anyagbhavotpatti na kadācid anīdṛśam ।
cid acin na kadācin na dvayam etan mitho dvayam ।। 

mahāśilāntare abhedye lekhātmāsti yathā bahu ।
tadanyānanyamajjādi cidghane trijagadgatiḥ ।। 

yathā śilāntar lekhādi bhidyate na śilāṅgataḥ ।
tatsāratvāt tathā mantṛkartṛtvādi jagac citeḥ ।। 

yathā śilāntar abjānāṃ spandāspandabhavābhavāḥ ।
viṣayatvaṃ na gacchanti kartāro jagatas tathā ।। 

nedaṃ kadācit kriyate na kadācana naśyati ।
adrivan nyagbhavollāsavilāsāvedanātmakam ।। 

yathā yatra yadākāraṃ tathā tatra tad eva hi ।
brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvaṃ suṣuptastham avasthitam ।। 

bhūribhāvavikārāḍhyo yo ayaṃ jagadurubhramaḥ ।
suṣuptam eva tad viddhi śilāntaḥ paṅkajādivat ।। 

nityaṃ suṣuptapadam eva jagadvilāsas somya praśāntasamacidghanakhātmakatvāt ।
padmāś śilāta iva sargadaśās svasārād dṛṣṭyā na bhedam upayānti kayācid eva ।। 

śilākośopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cittattvasya phalasyeva citras somyo apy anukramāt ।
svasattāsanniveśo antar yas sa sarga iti sthitaḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyādīnām ati tanmayarūpataḥ ।
idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti nātropapadyate ।। 

samastaśabdaśabdārthavāsanākalpanāvidām ।
ekātmatvād anyathedam iti saṅkathyate katham ।। 

phalasyāntas sanniveśo nānānukramato yathā ।
।। 

anānaivāpi nāneva kṣubdhevākṣubhitaiva ca ।
yathā phalāntas svā sattā cidantaś ciccayas tathā ।। 

jagannagaram ādarśe citīva pratibimbitam ।
kacatīvākacad api śilāntas sanniveśavat ।। 

parame cinmaṇau santi jagatkoṭiśatāny api ।
cintāmaṇāv anantāni phalānīvārthitāny alam ।। 

citsamudgaka evedaṃ tadaṅgotkīrṇam ātatam ।
jaganmauktikam ābhāti tadaṃśumayam anyavat ।। 

ahorātrān viracayan vedanāvedanāny ayam ।
cidādityas sthito bhāsvāñ jagaddravyāṇi darśayan ।। 

samudrakoṭarāvartapayasspandavilāsavat ।
na vyaktaṃ nānabhivyaktaṃ trijagad vartate citi ।। 

śilāntarghanaśuddhaikacitsāravapur ātmavān ।
somyo vyavaharann eva tiṣṭhaty upalakośavat ।। 

avibhāgaghanaspandā śilāntas sanniveśavat ।
anānaiva ca nānā cic chilāntas sanniveśavat ।। 

yad asti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā ।
yan nāsti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā ।। 

bhāvābhāveṣu yat satyaṃ cinmajjaujjvalyam eva tat ।
majjasārā padārthaśrīs tanmayaṃ syāt tad eva hi ।। 

padmaṃ nānādiśabdārthāṃs tyaktvā yadvac chilodaram ।
nānā tadvad idaṃ nānā tadatanmayam advayam ।। 

nānāpy ekatayānānā ghanaḍimbaśilodaram ।
yathā tad avibhāgātma tathedaṃ cidghanāntaram ।। 

yathāmalaḥ payaḥkośas talaviśrāntabhānubhāḥ ।
sann evāsann ivaivaṃ cinnaibiḍyaṃ sad asat tv iva ।। 

yathā somyapayorāśikoṭaraṃ kalanonmukham ।
dravatvāt spandy athāspandaṃ tathedaṃ cidghanāntaram ।। 

cicchilāśaṅkhapadmaughas tanmayaś cāpy atanmayaḥ ।
jagad viddhi sapadmādiśabdārthaṃ cicchilāntaram ।। 

mahāśilāghano apy eṣa cidghanas suṣirodaraḥ ।
arandhro antaś cādvayo accho jalāntas sanniveśavat ।। 

patatīdaṃ jagadbrahma somyam ambha iva druteḥ ।। 

brahmaṇīdaṃ suṣuptābham asty ananyac chilābjavat ।
majjabilvam iva brahma jagad brahmaiva vāmalam ।। 

yathā śūnyatvam ākāśe dravatvaṃ cāmbhasi sthitam ।
spandatvaṃ ca yathā vāyau brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā jagat ।। 

brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇi yathā tathaivedaṃ jagat sthitam ।
nānayor vidyate bhedas tarupādapayor iva ।। 

yāny etāni jagantīha tāny antrāṇi cidākṛteḥ ।
bhāvābhāvādi nāsty eṣāṃ tasyā iva kadācana ।। 

brahmaiva jagadābhāsaṃ marutāpo yathā jalam ।
brahmaivālokanāc chuddhaṃ bhavaty ambu yathātapaḥ ।। 

mervādes tṛṇagulmādeś cittāder jagato api ca ।
paramāṇuvibhāgena yad rūpaṃ tat paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

tatsamūhas tad evoccaiś cittamerutṛṇādikam ।
yat saukṣmye api hi sārātma sthaulye sārataraṃ hi tat ।। 

yathā rasātmikā śaktiḥ paramāṇutayā tayā ।
sthitā jagatpadārtheṣu pāyasī brahmatā tathā ।। 

rasaśaktir yathodeti tṛṇagulmatayāmbhasaḥ ।
tathā nānātayodeti saivāseveha brahmatā ।। 

yaiṣā rūpavilāsānām ālokaparamāṇutā ।
guṇaguṇyarthasattvātmarūpiṇī sā parātmatā ।। 

cititattve asti śailādi tadabhivyañjanātmani ।
piñchapakṣaughakāṭhinyaṃ mayūrāṇḍarase yathā ।। 

cititattve asti nānātā tadabhivyañjanātmani ।
vicitrapiñchikāpuñjo mayūrāṇḍarase yathā ।। 

nānānānātmike hy evaṃ yathāṇḍarasabarhite ।
vivekadṛṣṭyā dṛśyete tathā brahmajagatsthitī ।। 

sanānāto apy anānāto yathāṇḍarasabarhiṇaḥ ।
advaitadvaitasattātmā tathā brahmajagadbhramaḥ ।। 

yatas sadasatos sattā sattvatāyā yatas sthitiḥ ।
yatas tadatado rūpaṃ bhāvaṃ svaṃ viddhi tat param ।। 

nānānānātvam avidan nanu nūnam asambhavam ।
cijjagajjvalanaṃ paśya barhyaṇḍarasabarhivat ।। 

yathā jagati cittattvaṃ cittattve ca jagat tathā ।
nānānānātma caikaṃ ca mayūrāṇḍaraso yathā ।। 

nānāpadārthabhramapiñchapūrṇo jaganmayūrāṇḍarasaś cidātmā ।
mayūrarūpaṃ tv amayūram atra sattāpadaṃ viddhi kuto asti bhedaḥ ।। 

satyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvipañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yatrānuditarūpātma sarvam astīdam ātatam ।
mayūra iva bījāntas tad ahantvam agādi ca ।। 

tatra nābhyuditaṃ kiñcit tatra sarvaṃ ca vidyate ।
tad avācyaṃ girāṃ svargasukhasāre na vidyate ।। 

tathā ca munayo devā gaṇās siddhā maharṣayaḥ ।
āsvādayantas svaṃ rūpaṃ sadā tūryapade sthitāḥ ।। 

ete ye stabdhanayanadṛṣṭayo nirnimeṣiṇaḥ ।
te dṛśyadarśanāsaṅgaspandatyāge vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

na sthitā bhāvanā yeṣāṃ sthitānām api karmasu ।
saṃvitsaṃvedyasambandhaspandatyāge ca ye sthitāḥ ।। 

prāṇo na spandate teṣāṃ citrasthavapuṣām iva ।
cittacaittasamāsaṅgatyāge te svapade sthitāḥ ।। 

spandāt saṃsādhayanty arthaṃ senās seneśvaraṃ yathā ।
tathaiva cittacaittāni spandāt kurvanti saṃsṛtim ।। 

yathāhlādayati svacchaḥ pallavaṃ raśmir aindavaḥ ।
tathātmāhlādayaty antar dṛśyadarśanasaṅgame ।। 

bimbād dūraṃ prayātasya bhittāv apatitasya ca ।
yad indos tejaso rūpaṃ tad rūpaṃ śuddhasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

na dṛśyaṃ nopadeśārhaṃ nābhyāśe na ca dūrataḥ ।
kevalānubhavaprāpyaṃ tad rūpaṃ śuddham ātmanaḥ ।। 

na deho nendriyagaṇo na cittaṃ na ca vāsanā ।
na jīvo nāpi ca spando na saṃvittir na caiva kham ।। 

na san nāsan na madhyasthaṃ śūnyāśūnye na caiva ha ।
na deśakālavastvādi sa evāsti na cetarat ।। 

etais sarvair vinirmuktaṃ hṛdi kośagate api ca ।
yatraitat spandate adṛśyaṃ tat tad ātmapadaṃ bhavet ।। 

tac ca nādya na kalpānte na śastrāgnyanilādibhiḥ ।
neha nāmutra sadrūpād anyathā bhavati kvacit ।। 

jāyante ca mriyante ca dehakumbhās sahasraśaḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantarasyāsya nātmākāśasya khaṇḍanā ।। 

tac ca dehādi sakalam ātmaivātmavidāṃ vara ।
kevalaṃ bodhavairūpyād īṣat pṛthag avasthitam ।। 

viṣvag ātmamayaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhvā buddhyā svasiddhayā ।
prajvalann api kāryeṣu nirvāṇo nirmamo bhava ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
tat sarvaṃ brahma nirdharma nirguṇaṃ nirmamātmakam ।। 

nityavyapetāvayavam ekam ekāntanirmalam ।
nirvikāram anādyantaṃ nityaṃ śāntaṃ samātmakam ।। 

kālakriyākaraṇakāraṇakartṛkāryajanmasthitipralayasaṃsaraṇādi sarvam ।
brahmeti dṛṣṭavata eva tavātmadṛṣṭyā bhūyo api kiṃ bhramaṇam aṅga sasaṅgam eva ।। 

brahmaikatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tripañcāśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yadi nāsti vikārādi brahman brahmaṇi bṛṃhite ।
tad idaṃ katham ābhāti bhāvābhāvamayaṃ jagat ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

apunaḥprāgavasthānaṃ yat svarūpaviparyayaḥ ।
tad vikārādi kathitaṃ yat kṣīrādiṣu vidyate ।। 

payastāṃ punar abhyeti dadhitvān na punaḥ payaḥ ।
buddham ādyantamadhyeṣu brahma brahmaiva nirmalam ।। 

kṣīrāder iva tenāsti brahmaṇo na vikāritā ।
anādyantāvikārasya na caivāvayavikramaḥ ।। 

samasyādyantayor yeyaṃ dṛśyate vikṛtiḥ kṣaṇam ।
saṃvidas taṃ bhramaṃ viddhi nāvikāre asti vikriyā ।। 

saṃvedye sati saṃvittis tan na brahmaṇi vidyate ।
tad brahmaśabdakathitaṃ nissaṃvedyaṃ cidātma yat ।। 

yādṛg ādyantayor vastu tādṛg eva tad ucyate ।
madhye tasya yad anyatvaṃ tad abodhavijṛmbhitam ।। 

ātmā tv ādyantamadhyeṣu samas sarvatra sarvadā ।
kham apy anyatvam āyāti nātmatattvaṃ kadācana ।। 

bhārūpatvāt tadekatvān nityatvāc cāyam īśvaraḥ ।
vaśaṃ bhāvavikārāṇāṃ na kadācana gacchati ।। 

rāmaḥ

vidyamāne sadaikasmin brahmaṇy ekāntanirmale ।
saṃvidbhramasvarūpāyā avidyāyāḥ ka āgamaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

brahmatattvam idaṃ sarvam āsīd asti bhaviṣyati ।
nirvikāram anādyantaṃ nāvidyāstīti niścayaḥ ।। 

yas tu brahmeti śabdena vācyavācakayoḥ kramaḥ ।
tatrāpi nānyatābhāva upadeṣṭuṃ kṛto hy asau ।। 

tvam ahaṃ jagad āśāś ca bhūḥ kham agnyanilādi ca ।
brahmamātram anādyantaṃ nāvidyāsti manāg api ।। 

nāmaivedam avidyeti bhramamātram asad viduḥ ।
na vidyate yā tasyā hi kīdṛṅ nāma bhaviṣyati ।। 

rāmaḥ

upadeśaprakaraṇe hyaḥ kim etat tvayoditam ।
avidyeyaṃ tathetthaṃ ca nirdhāryata iti prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etāvantam abuddhas tvam abhūḥ kālaṃ raghūdvaha ।
kalpitābhiḥ kilaitābhir bodhito asi suyuktibhiḥ ।। 

avidyeyam ayaṃ jīva ityādikalanākramaḥ ।
aprabuddhaprabodhāya kalpito vāgvidāṃ varaiḥ ।। 

aprabuddhaṃ mano yāvat tāvad eva bhramaṃ vinā ।
na prabodham upāyāti tāvad varṣaśatair api ।। 

yuktyaiva bodhayitvaiṣa jīva ātmani yojyate ।
yad yuktyā sādhyate kāryaṃ na tad yatnaśatair api ।। 

sarvaṃ brahmeti yo brūyād aprabuddhasya durmatiḥ ।
sa karoti suhṛdbhrāntyā sthāṇau duḥkhanivedanam ।। 

yuktyā prabodhyate mūḍhaḥ prājñas tattvena bodhyate ।
mūḍhaḥ prājñatvam āyāti na yuktyā bodhanaṃ vinā ।। 

etāvantam abuddhas tvaṃ kālaṃ yuktyā prabodhitaḥ ।
idānīṃ samprabuddho asi tattvenaivāvabodhyase ।। 

brahmāhaṃ trijagad brahma brahma tvaṃ brahma dṛśyabhūḥ ।
dvitīyā kalpanā nāsti yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

asaṃvedyamahāsaṃvitkoṭimātraṃ jagattrayaṃ ।
evaṃ pratyayavān antaḥ kurvann api na lipyase ।। 

bhārūpaś cetano vyāpī paramātmāham ity alam ।
rāghavānubhavāntas tvaṃ tiṣṭhan gacchan svapañ śvasan ।। 

nirmamo nirahaṅkāro buddhimān asi rāma cet ।
tad brahmavedanaṃ śāntaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ bhava ।। 

tad anādyantam ābhāsi sattvam eva paraṃ padam ।
sthito asi sarvagaikātmā śuddhasaṃvinmayātmakaḥ ।। 

yad brahmātmā vibhur yaś ca yāvidyā prakṛtiś ca yā ।
tad abhinnaṃ sadaikātma yathā kumbhaśateṣu mṛt ।। 

nātmanaḥ prakṛtir bhinnā ghaṭān mṛṇmayatā yathā ।
spandamātraṃ yathā vāyur ātmaiva prakṛtis tathā ।। 

āvartas salilasyeva yas spandas svayam ātmanaḥ ।
proktaḥ prakṛtiśabdena tenaiveha sa eva hi ।। 

yathaikaṃ spandapavanau nāmnā bhinnau na sattayā ।
tathaikam ātmaprakṛtī nāmnā bhinne na sattayā ।। 

abodhād etayor bhedo bodhenaiva vilīyate ।
abodho asanmayo bhrāntī rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo yathā ।। 

cidbhūmau kalanābījaṃ yad etat patati sphurat ।
cittāṅkura udety asmād bhāvisaṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।। 

etad evātmavijñānadagdhaṃ sadvāsanājalaiḥ ।
saṃsiktam api yatnena na bhavaty aṅkurakṣamam ।। 

no cet patati citkṣetre kalanābījakaṃ tataḥ ।
cittāṅkurā na jāyante sukhaduḥkhaphaladrumāḥ ।। 

dvitvaṃ jagaty asadupāttam abodhajātaṃ bodhakṣayaṃ jahihi bodham upāgato asi ।
ātmaikabhāvavibhavena bhavābhayātmā nāsty eva duḥkham iti naḥ paramārthasāraḥ ।। 

saṃsṛtivicārayogo nāma sargaḥ

catuṣpañcāśas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akṣatam ।
pareṇa paripūrṇās smo brahmañ jñānāmṛtena te ।। 

pūrṇātmakam idaṃ pūrṇaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prapūryate ।
pūrṇena pūritaṃ pūrṇaṃ sthitā pūrṇaiva pūrṇatā ।। 

līlayedaṃ tu pṛcchāmi bhūyo bodhābhivṛddhaye ।
bālasyeva pitā brahman na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi ।। 

śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca ।
vidyamānam api brahman dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam ।। 

kathaṃ mṛtasyaiva jantor viṣayaṃ svaṃ na paśyati ।
jīvataś ca kathaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ svaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

kathaṃ ghaṭādi bāhyastham indriyāṇi jaḍāny api ।
śarīre anubhavanty antaḥ punar nānubhavanty api ।। 

ayaśśalākopamayor ghaṭādīndriyayoḥ kila ।
aśliṣṭayor nīrasayoḥ kathaṃ sattoditā mithaḥ ।। 

jānann api yad etat tvāṃ viśeṣāśaṅkayā punaḥ ।
pṛcchāmi tad aśeṣeṇa kathayāśv anukampayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

indriyāṇy api cittādi ghaṭādy api na kiñcana ।
pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga nirmalāc cetanād ṛte ।। 

gaganād api yācchā cit tayā rūpaṃ svam ātmanā ।
cittvāt puryaṣṭakatvena bhāvavṛttyaiva bhāvitam ।। 

tad evedaṃ prakṛtitāṃ gataṃ jagad avasthitam ।
tasyāvayavajātaṃ tad indriyādi ghaṭādi ca ।। 

puryaṣṭakatvam āyātaṃ yac cittattvaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।
sva evāvayavas tasmin ghaṭādi pratibimbati ।। 

rāmaḥ

jagatsahasranirmāṇamahimnāṃ darpaṇasya me ।
puryaṣṭakasya bhagavan rūpaṃ kathaya kīdṛśam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anādyantajagadbījaṃ yad brahmāsti nirāmayam ।
bhārūpaṃ śuddhacinmātraṃ kalākalanavarjitam ।। 

kalanonmukhatāṃ yātaṃ sat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ ।
sa jīvaḥ khalu dehe asmiṃś cinoti spandate sphuṭam ।। 

ahambhāvād ahaṅkāro mananān mana ucyate ।
bodhaniścayato buddhir indradṛṣṭes tathendriyam ।। 

dehabhāvanayā deho ghaṭabhāvanayā ghaṭaḥ ।
eṣa evaṃsvabhāvātmā jīvaḥ puryaṣṭakaṃ smṛtam ।। 

jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvasākṣitvādyabhimāninī ।
yā saṃvij jīva ity uktā tad dhi puryaṣṭakaṃ viduḥ ।। 

kāle kāle svato jīvas tv anyo anyo bhavati svataḥ ।
bhāvitākāritānantavāsanākaṇikodayāt ।। 

puryaṣṭakasvabhāvena kālenākāram ṛcchati ।
vāsanāvaśatas sekād bījaṃ pallavatām iva ।। 

ākāro ahaṃ śarīrādi sthāvarādi surādi vā ।
nāham ādyaś cidātmeti mithyājñāne nimajjati ।। 

bhramaty evaṃ jagaj jīvo vāsanāvellitaś ciram ।
ūrdhvādhogamanair abdhau kāṣṭhaṃ vīcihataṃ yathā ।। 

kaścit sāttvikajātitvād bhavabandhād anantaram ।
buddhvātmānaṃ svam abhyeti padam ādyantavarjitam ।। 

kaścit kālena bahunā bhuktayonigaṇāntaraḥ ।
ātmajñānavaśād eti paramaṃ padam ātmanaḥ ।। 

evambhūtas sa sumate jīvo yātaś śarīratām ।
netrādinā ghaṭādy antar yathā vetti tathā śṛṇu ।। 

cittvasya kalanāt tasya samprayātasya jīvatām ।
manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyagrāmo deho agra iva tiṣṭhati ।। 

padārthadehe dehena sve pataty akṣirūpiṇā ।
tadā taj jīvasaṃsparśāj jīvātmaikatvam ṛcchati ।। 

bāhyārthavedane nityaṃ sambandho akṣasya kāraṇam ।
samanvitasya cittena na muktasya kadācana ।। 

yad yad acchatare tasminn agrasthaṃ pratibimbati ।
jīvena bhavati śliṣṭaṃ bahir jīvo atha jīvati ।। 

nighṛṣṭanavaratnābhe yadā nayanatārake ।
tadaitayor bāhyagataḥ padārthaḥ pratibimbati ।। 

jīvena bhavati śliṣṭaḥ pratibimbavaśāt tataḥ ।
jīvajñeyatvam āyāti bāhyaṃ vastv iti rāghava ।। 

yat saṃśleṣam upāyāti tad bālo api hi vindate ।
paśur vā sthāvaro vāpi jīvaḥ kasmān na vetsyati ।। 

anyac ca nāyanās sādho raśmayo jīvaveṣṭitāḥ ।
kroḍīkurvanty alaṃ dṛśyaṃ jīvas tat tena vindate ।। 

eṣa eva kramas sparśe sambandhapratyayodbhavaḥ ।
rase gandhe ca kathito jīvasaṃsparśasambhavaḥ ।। 

śabdas tv ākāśaniṣṭhatvāt karṇākāśagataḥ kṣaṇāt ।
jīvākāśaṃ viśaty antar evam indriyasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

dṛśyate nirmalādarśaratnavāryādikeṣu yat ।
pratibimbanam etan me brūhi brahman kimātmakam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kākatālīyavad bhātaṃ tad brahmavyomni yac ciram ।
kiñcid āste kṣaṇaṃ kiñcit tad evedaṃ jaganti vaḥ ।। 

svasattāmātrakaṃ svapne ivārtha iti bhāvayat ।
sthitam ekam anekātma cidvyoma svapnavṛkṣavat ।। 

bāhyārthāstitvabodho yo yā brahmātmajaganmatiḥ ।
sa ca sā ceti sat sarvaṃ yathāsaṃvedanaṃ sthiteḥ ।। 

prathamaṃ paramāṇutve buddhe aṇutve tataś ca khe ।
tā vido vetti vidvyoma karākṣādikam adya yāḥ ।। 

sargāditaḥ prabhṛty eva nirmale arthaḥ prabimbate ।
vidātteti sthitis tv aikyāt sarvabimbyanubimbayoḥ ।। 

cidvyomnā kacatā tad yad ayam artha iti sthitam ।
sargādau cetitā saṃsthā yāsau sthitim upāgatā ।। 

asatām eva bhāvānāṃ cidvyomakacanābalāt ।
guṇārpaṇaṃ mitho rūḍhaṃ nirmale pratibimbanam ।। 

atyantajaḍayor eva jīvayor iva yan mithaḥ ।
sattārpaṇaṃ svabhāvena pratibimbaṃ tad ucyate ।। 

cidātmanor vā jaḍayor mahāsattājaḍātmanoḥ ।
ādyasvabhāvaniyamād bimbasattārpaṇaṃ mithaḥ ।। 

pratibimbaṃ dṛśor bhrāntiṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara ।
tāvanmātraṃ jagat tena viśvāso mā tavāstv iha ।। 

ahamityāditaraṅgas sargādyāvartavān parāmbhodhau ।
nāsty eva deśakālakriyākṛtas tanmayaikatayā ।। 

nityam asaktamatir muditātmā śāntasukhāsukhasaṃvidanantaḥ ।
tiṣṭha niviṣṭamatis samatāyām astasamastabhavāmayamāyaḥ ।। 

akṣasaṃvedanavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcapañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

navād udbhavataḥ pūrvaṃ sampannāś cakṣurādayaḥ ।
yathā kamalajasyaitat sarvam eva tvayā śrutam ।। 

brahmapuryaṣṭakasyādāv akṣasaṃvid yathoditā ।
puryaṣṭakasya sarvasya tathaivodeti sarvadā ।। 

viddhi puryaṣṭakaṃ jīvaṃ sa garbhasthendriyodayaḥ ।
yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā paripaśyati ।। 

indriyāṇīndriyārthākhyaṃ viddhi saṃvedanaṃ svakam ।
sampannaṃ ca yathā tat te proktam ādyamanassthitau ।। 

śuddhā saṃvit saṃvidantī saṃvedanam aninditam ।
ato ahaṃvedanād antar jīvaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tv itā ।। 

na tv ekatvād anantatvād avedyatvād anāmayā ।
ananyatvād anekatvād aśūnyatvāt parā sthitiḥ ।। 

cetyādi budhyate kiñcin na manastāṃ ca gacchati ।
na ca jīvatvam āyāti na ca puryaṣṭakātmikā ।। 

nāvidyādivilāso asti so asti nāstīva yas sadā ।
paramātmeti kathito manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātigaḥ ।। 

tasmāt sampadyate jīvaś cinmūrtir mananātmakaḥ ।
bhramaḥ kevalam ity ādya upadeśāya gīyate ।। 

yataḥ kutaścit sampanne tv avidyāmaya āmaye ।
upadeśyopadeśena pravilīne vicāraṇāt ।। 

praśāntasakalācāraṃ jñānaṃ tad avaśiṣyate ।
yatrākāśam api sthūlam aṇāv iva surācalaḥ ।। 

yatrodyadācāram api sad apy asad avasthitam ।
jagaj jñaviṣayaṃ paṅkād iva tiṣṭhati nirmitam ।। 

asanmayam avidyāyā rūpam etāvad eva hi ।
yad vīkṣitā satī nūnaṃ naśyaty eva na dṛśyate ।। 

ālokitaṃ nāma katham avastu kila labhyate ।
prayatnenāpi samprāptaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu kena vā ।। 

asad eva sadaivāsad ajñānād asya satyatā ।
jñānād yathāsthitaṃ vastu dṛśyate naśyati bhramaḥ ।। 

avidyāyā vicārāya jīvapuryaṣṭakādikā ।
apy atyantam asatyāyāḥ kalpanā kalpitātmani ।। 

tasmāt tadupadeśāya seyaṃ jīvādikalpanā ।
kṛtā śāstraiḥ prabodhāya tāṃ tvam ekamanāś śṛṇu ।। 

jīvatvam iva samprāptā puryaṣṭakapade sthitā ।
kalākalaṅkarahitā citir ācetanonmukhī ।। 

yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam ।
satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vā bāleva niśi yakṣakam ।। 

pañcatanmātrakalanās sā bhāvayati yatra yāḥ ।
tatrātmani tathārandhrās tāḥ paśyati tathoditāḥ ।। 

tābhya eva samutpannaṃ bahissthaṃ bhūtapañcakam ।
paśyaty ananyad anyābhaṃ śākhāśatam ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

idam antar idaṃ bāhyam iti niścayavāṃs tataḥ ।
jīvo yathā yad ādatte tat tathā draḍhayaty alam ।। 

raśmijālam ivendor yad ātmanaḥ pratibhāsanam ।
bāhyasparśatayā tena tad evāśūrarīkṛtam ।। 

maricasyeva yat taikṣṇyaṃ śūnyatvam iva khasya yat ।
ātmano vedanaṃ tena tad evānyad ivāśritam ।। 

atraiva niścayaṃ buddhvā niyamas sudṛḍhīkṛtaḥ ।
anenettham anenetthaṃ bhāvyam ity avikhaṇḍitam ।। 

svabhāvetaranāmāsau svasaṅkalpaniyāmakaḥ ।
kvacit kadācid bhavati svabhāvenaiva nānyathā ।। 

ātmanaivedam akhilaṃ sampannaṃ dvaitam advayam ।
ṣaṇḍo madhuraseneva mṛdeva ca mahāghaṭaḥ ।। 

sanniveśavikārādi deśakālādisambhavāt ।
sambhavaty atra na tv īśe deśakālādyasambhavāt ।। 

itaḥ puṣpam itaḥ pattram aham ity udito yathā ।
ṣaṇḍe svātmani vāsanto raso advitve dvitāṃ haran ।। 

itaḥ paṭam itaḥ kuḍyam aham ity uditas tathā ।
sargātmany ātmani brahma nirdvandve dvitvam āharat ।। 

adyāṅkuro aham adyārkarug ahaṃ tv adya vāridaḥ ।
yatheti tiṣṭhaty abbhāgas tathātmā sadasadvapuḥ ।। 

iti bhāvyam anenettham iti sarveśvareritam ।
kramaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ loke kasya nāmāsti śaktatā ।। 

ādarśe svaccha ākāro naiva svaḥ pratibimbati ।
vyatirekāsambhavataḥ kacaty eva tu kevalam ।। 

brahmaṇi tv ātmanātmaiva sthitaḥ kacati bimbati ।
dvaitībhavaty adeho api cinmayatvāt svabhāvataḥ ।। 

yad yathaivātmakacanaṃ cetitaṃ kacatātmanā ।
asatyam api tan neha vyabhicāri kadācana ।। 

hematvakaṭakatve dve satyāsatyasvarūpiṇī ।
hemni bhāṇḍamatau yadvac cittvācittve tathātmani ।। 

sarvagatvāc citeś cittvaṃ nityaṃ manasi vidyate ।
hematvaṃ kaṭakasyeva jaḍatā ca sthitānyadā ।। 

cittvajāḍyātmakaṃ cittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhāvayati svayam ।
yadā yathaiva yadbhāvaṃ tadā bhavati tat tathā ।। 

kāle kāle citā jīvas tv anyo anyo bhavati svayam ।
bhāvitākāravān antar vāsanākaṇikodayāt ।। 

svapne dṛṣṭo yathā grāmo yāti satyātmatāṃ kṣaṇam ।
dehād dehaṃ tathā yāti jīvo ayaṃ pratibhātmakam ।। 

pratibhāso yathā svapne naraḥ kuḍyaṃ paṭaṃ bhavet ।
bhavaty asatyam evaivaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ sa naḥ ।। 

asatyam eva mriyate tv asatyaṃ jāyate punaḥ ।
jīvas svapratibhāsena svapnavat svānyarūpavat ।। 

kālenaitāvatā rūpam idaṃ tyājyaṃ mayety asau ।
prākṛtaṃ niścayaṃ rūḍhaṃ bhavaty anubhavat svataḥ ।। 

vastu dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ ca svapne samanubhūyate ।
jīvasvapnaṃ jagadrūpaṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara ।। 

ajāgraddraṣṭṛdṛśyo yas so abhidhānādinā vinā ।
na svapno bhidyate svasmād acchāt saṃvittimātrakāt ।। 

anyapūrvābhidhabṛhatsvapnaṃ paśyati nā yathā ।
aprāgdṛṣṭaṃ tathaiṣā svaṃ cetanaṃ cit prapaśyati ।। 

prākkṛtā vāsanādyāśu pauruṣeṇaiva jīyate ।
hyaḥkukarmādya yatnena prayāti hi sukarmatām ।। 

mokṣād ṛte na śāmyanti jīvānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ ।
unmajjanti nimajjanti kevalaṃ deśakālataḥ ।। 

cittvasya kalanāt tasya deho agra iva tiṣṭhati ।
pañcātmā bhāvito asatyo mahāyakṣaś śiśor iva ।। 

mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathā tanmātrapañcakam ।
iti puryaṣṭakaṃ proktaṃ deho asāv ātivāhikaḥ ।। 

amūrta eva cittātmā khatvam asyātipīnatā ।
vātatāsya mahāgulpho dehatāsya sumerutā ।। 

dviravasthaḥ krameṇaiṣa niravasthas tu muktibhāk ।
suṣuptataikāvasthāsya jaḍā kroḍīkṛtodayā ।। 

svapnatāsyetarāvasthā dehapratyayaśālinī ।
āmokṣaṃ bhramatīhāyam iti sthāvarajaṅgamaiḥ ।। 

kadācid dhi suṣuptasthaḥ kadācit svapnasaṃsthitaḥ ।
ātivāhikadeho ayaṃ sarvasyaivāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

yadā suṣuptabhāvastho bhāviduḥkhaprabodhanaḥ ।
tadākāśopalasamas tiṣṭhaty anuditākṛtiḥ ।। 

sthāvarādyāsv avasthāsu kalpavṛkṣadaśāsu ca ।
bhavaty eṣa suṣuptastho ghanamohaś śilāghanaḥ ।। 

suṣuptatāsya jaḍatā svapno asyeyaṃ tu saṃsṛtiḥ ।
yaḥ prabodho asya sā muktis taj jāgrat sā ca turyatā ।। 

jīvaprabodho muktir hi sā ceha dvividhocyate ।
ekā jīvanmuktateti dvitīyādehamuktatā ।। 

jīvanmuktir hi turyatvaṃ turyātītaṃ paraṃ tataḥ ।
muktir jīvaprabodho hi sa ca buddhiprayatnataḥ ।। 

jñānapramāṇo jīvo antar yaj jānāti hi tanmayaḥ ।
jānātu jñaptim evāto bhavaty āśu sa tanmayaḥ ।। 

paśyatīmam ayaṃ jīvas sudīrghaṃ svapnavibhramam ।
mithyoditaṃ svahṛdaye svaccha eva śilīkṛte ।। 

jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcic citkalāṃ vinā ।
tām evānyatayā paśyan mudhaiva pariśocati ।। 

jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcit paramād ṛte ।
yatra tatra jagad dṛṣṭam aho māyāvijṛmbhitam ।। 

sthālyantaḥ kvathadambūnāṃ yathānnānāṃ bhramodayaḥ ।
jīvāṇūnāṃ tathā svāntar mithyā saṃsaraṇodayaḥ ।। 

bandho asya vāsanāvattvaṃ mokṣas syād vāsanākṣayaḥ ।
vāsanāto asya sauṣuptī svāpnī ca sphurati sthitiḥ ।। 

ghanavāsanamoho ayaṃ suṣuptātmā jaḍas smṛtaḥ ।
tadantarbhāvinā svapnenāvaśyambhāvinānvitaḥ ।। 

vāsanāveśanidrālur jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam ।
yadāsya vāsanānidrā kṣīyate budhyate tadā ।। 

vāsanoktā dṛśyaratir dṛśyatvaṃ ca na vidyate ।
hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ sarvātmany ātmanā kvacit ।। 

abodhād etad abhavad vilīnaṃ cet prabodhataḥ ।
tad vāsyavāsanāyās tu kṣayād udaya eva vaḥ ।। 

ghanaṃ svavāsanāmohaṃ kṣapayitvā suṣuptagaḥ ।
tanuvāsanatām etya svapnaṃ paśyati saṃsṛtim ।। 

ghanavāsanamoho ayaṃ jīvas sthāvaratādibhāk ।
madhyasthavāsanas tiryak puruṣas tanuvāsanaḥ ।। 

yadāntar jīvitenāttā bahir jīvā ghaṭādayaḥ ।
jīvaikyād ubhayos sattā grāhyagrāhakayos tataḥ ।। 

ātmanātmā samālīḍho bahir antar yadā citā ।
tadā grāhyagrahaṇadhīr mṛgatṛṣṇeva sodayā ।। 

neha santyajyate kiñcin neha kiñcana gṛhyate ।
bāhyāntarakalākāraś cidātmaikaḥ prakāśate ।। 

trijagac ciccamatkāras tv alaṃ bhedavikalpanaiḥ ।
cetitās smaś citi citā bāhyādy anyan na vidmahe ।। 

abdher yathāmalam apāstasamastabhedaṃ svādv accham eva sakalaṃ dravam ekaśuddham ।
sarvaṃ tathedam apahastitabhedajātam ādyaṃ paraṃ padam anāmayam eva buddham ।। 

indriyārthopalambhavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭpañcāśas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yo jīvasyoditas svapno nānākalanakomalaḥ ।
tam imaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ na satyaṃ nāpy asanmayam ।। 

na puṃsa iva jīvasya svapnas sambhavati kvacit ।
tenaite jāgatā bhāvā jāgratsvapnaikatātra hi ।। 

jīvasvapnam idaṃ dīrghaṃ kṣipraṃ ca pratibhāsate ।
asatyam apy avastutvād viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara ।। 

svapnāt svapnāntaram iva gacchanto jīvajīvakāḥ ।
asatyam eva paśyanti ghanasatyatayā ciram ।। 

ajaḍā jaḍatāṃ yātā jāḍye cājāḍyatoditā ।
asatye satyatā jātā jīvānubhavamohataḥ ।। 

sthāṇor apy antar akhilaṃ paśyantas trijagadbhramam ।
bhramanti svapnasambhrāntā iha jīvāhirāśayaḥ ।। 

sarvagatvād anantasya svasya jīvasya vai citeḥ ।
yad bhāvayanti cetanti tad evāśv eti satyatām ।। 

puṇḍarīkākṣagaditām asaṃsaṅgagatiṃ śubhām ।
yām āliṅgya mahābāho jīvanmukto mahāmuniḥ ।। 

pāṇḍoḥ putro arjuno nāma sukhaṃ jīvitam ātmanaḥ ।
kṣapayiṣyati nirduḥkhaṃ tathā kṣapaya jīvitam ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhaviṣyati kadā brahmann arjunaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ ।
kīdṛśīṃ ca haris tasya kathayiṣyaty asaktatām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asti sanmātram ātmeti parikalpitanāmakam ।
sthitam ātmany anādyante nabhasīva mahānabhaḥ ।। 

dṛśyate vimale tasminn ayaṃ saṃsāravibhramaḥ ।
kaṭakādi yathā hemni taraṅgādi yathāmbhasi ।। 

caturdaśavidhā bhūtajātayaḥ prasphuranty alam ।
tasmin saṃsārajāle asmiñ jāle śakunayo yathā ।। 

tatra te yamacandrārkaśakrādyās saṃsṛtikramāḥ ।
bhūtapañcakasaṃsthānā lokapālatvam āgatāḥ ।। 

idaṃ puṇyam upādeyaṃ heyaṃ pāpam idaṃ tv iti ।
tais svasaṅkalpaghaṭitā vedena sthāpitā sthitiḥ ।। 

evaṃ prauḍhiṃ prayātāyāṃ vahantyāṃ ca ciraṃ ciram ।
acchinnāyāṃ vināśinyāṃ nadyām iva jagatsthitau ।। 

vaivasvato yamo nāma lokapālaḥ pratāpavān ।
maraṇāṅkitasattākaprajāsaṃyamane sthitaḥ ।। 

tasyādya yāvad anagha pravāhāpatite nije ।
karmaṇy acalasaṅkāśaṃ sthiraṃ cittam avasthitam ।। 

bhagavān sa yamaḥ kiñcid vrataṃ praticaturyugam ।
tathāpi kurute bhūtadalanotthāghaśaṅkayā ।। 

kadācid aṣṭau varṣāṇi daśa dvādaśa vāpi ca ।
kadācit pañca saptāpi kadācit ṣoḍaśāpi vā ।। 

udāsīnavad āsīne tasmin niyamam āsthite ।
na hinasti jagajjāle mṛtyur bhūtāni kānicit ।। 

tena nīrandhrabhūtaughaṃ nissañcāraṃ mahītalam ।
bhavati prāvṛṣi svedī kuñjako maṣakair iva ।। 

atha tāni vicitrāṇi bhūtāni bahuyuktibhiḥ ।
kṣapayanti surā rāma bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye ।। 

evaṃ yamasahasrāṇi vyavahāraśatāni ca ।
samatītāny anantāni bhūtāni ca jaganti ca ।। 

vaivasvato adya tu yamo ya eva pitṛnāyakaḥ ।
anena tv adhunā sādho parikṣīṇeṣu keṣucit ।। 

yugeṣv aghavighātāya varṣāṇi dvādaśātmanā ।
vratacaryeha kartavyā dūrāstakrūrakarmaṇā ।। 

teneyam urvī nīrandhrā bhūtair martair amṛtyubhiḥ ।
dīnā praghanagulmeva bhārabhūtair bhaviṣyati ।। 

bhūr bhāraparibhūtāṅgī hariṃ śaraṇam eṣyati ।
kāntā dasyuparābhūtā dīnā patim iva priyam ।। 

harir dehadvayenātha mahīm avatariṣyati ।
devāṃśair akhilais sārdhaṃ naranāyakatāṃ gataiḥ ।। 

vasudevasutas tv eko vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ ।
deho bhaviṣyati harer dvitīyaḥ pāṇḍavo arjunaḥ ।। 

yudhiṣṭhira iti khyāto dharmaputro bhaviṣyati ।
ambhodhimekhalābhūpaḥ pāṇḍoḥ putras sa dharmavit ।। 

duryodhana iti khyātas tasya bhrātā pitṛvyajaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati dṛḍhadvandvo bhīmo babhrur aher iva ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ harator urvīṃ tayos saṅgrāmalālasāḥ ।
aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇyo hi ghaṭiṣyanty atra bhīṣaṇāḥ ।। 

tatkṣayeṇa vibhāratvaṃ bhuvo viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati ।
rāghavārjunadehena bṛhadgāṇḍīvadhanvanā ।। 

viṣṇor arjunanāmāsau prākṛtaṃ bhāvam āsthitaḥ ।
harṣāmarṣānvito deho naradharmā bhaviṣyati ।। 

senādvayagatān dṛṣṭvā svajanān maraṇonmukhān ।
viṣādam eṣyaty udyogaṃ yuddhāya na kariṣyati ।। 

tam arjunābhidhaṃ dehaṃ prāptakāryaikasiddhaye ।
harir buddhena dehena bodhayiṣyati rāghava ।। 

bhagavān

tvaṃ mānuṣeṇopahatāntarātmā viṣādamohābhibhavād visañjñaḥ ।
naṣṭas svam utsṛjya paraṃ prakāśaṃ tadātmatattvaṃ nanu rājasiṃha ।। 

anantam avyaktam anādimadhyam ātmānam ālokaya saṃvidātman ।
saṃvidvapus sphāram alagnadoṣam ajo asi nityo asi nirāmayo asi ।। 

na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ ।
ajo nityaś śāśvato ayaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre ।। 

nārāyaṇāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

saptapañcāśas sargaḥ

bhagavān

ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam ।
ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate ।। 

anantasyaikarūpasya satas sūkṣmasya khād api ।
ātmanaḥ parameśasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena hanyate ।। 

nārjunas tvaṃ na hantā tvam abhimānam alaṃ tyaja ।
jarāmaraṇanirmuktas svayam ātmāsi śāśvataḥ ।। 

yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate ।
hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate ।। 

yaiva sañjāyate saṃvid antas saivānubhūyate ।
ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me ity atas saṃvidaṃ tyaja ।। 

anayaiva ca yukto asmi naṣṭo asmīti ca bhārata ।
abhitas sukhaduḥkhābhyām avaśaḥ parikṛṣyase ।। 

svātmāṃśaiḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi bhāgaśaḥ ।
ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate ।। 

cakṣuḥ paśyatu karṇaś ca śṛṇotu tvak spṛśatv iyam ।
rasanā ca rasaṃ yātu ko atraiko aham iti sthitaḥ ।। 

kalanākarmanirate manasy api mahāmate ।
na kaścid atrāham iti kleśabhāgī ka eva te ।। 

bahubhis samavāyena yat kṛtaṃ tatra bhārata ।
eko abhimānaduḥkhena hāsāyaiva hi gṛhyate ।। 

kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api ।
yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmasiddhaye ।। 

ahantvaviṣacūrṇena yeṣāṃ kāyo na bhāvitaḥ ।
kurvanto api haranto api ta ete nirviṣūcikāḥ ।। 

na kvacid rājate kāyo mamatvāmedhyadūṣitaḥ ।
prājño apy atibahujño api duśśīla iva mānavaḥ ।। 

nirmamo nirahaṅkāras samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī ।
yas sa kāryam akāryaṃ vā kurvann api na lipyate ।। 

idaṃ ca te pāṇḍusuta svakarma kṣātram uttamam ।
atikrūram api śreyas sukhāyaivodayāya ca ।। 

api kutsitam apy antyam apy adharmamayaṃ kṛśam ।
śreyase svaṃ yathā karma na tathehāmṛtāsavaḥ ।। 

mūrkhasyāpi svakarmaiva śreyase kim u sanmateḥ ।
matir galadahaṅkārā patitāpi na lipyate ।। 

yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya ।
nissaṅgas tvaṃ yathāprāptakarmāsi cen na badhyase ।। 

śāntabrahmavapur bhūtvā karma brahmamayaṃ kuru ।
brahmārpitasamācāro brahmaiva bhavasi kṣaṇāt ।। 

īśvarārpitasarvārtha īśvarātmā nirāmayaḥ ।
īśvaras sarvabhūtātmā bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ ।। 

sannyastasarvasaṅkalpas samaś śāntamanā muniḥ ।
sannyāsayogayuktātmā kurvan muktamatir bhava ।। 

arjunaḥ

saṅgatyāgasya bhagavaṃs tathā brahmārpaṇasya ca ।
īśvarārpaṇarūpasya sannyāsasya ca sarvaga ।। 

tathā jñānasya yogasya vibhāgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ prabho ।
krameṇa kathayaitan me mahāmohanivṛttidam ।। 

bhagavān

sarvasaṅkalpasaṃśāntāv ekāntaghanavedanam ।
nakiñcidbhāvanākāraṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

tadudyogaṃ vidur jñānaṃ yogaṃ ca kṛtabuddhayaḥ ।
brahma sarvaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti brahmārpaṇaṃ viduḥ ।। 

antaśśūnyaṃ bahiśśūnyaṃ pāṣāṇahṛdayopamam ।
śāntam ākāśakośācchaṃ na śūnyaṃ na dṛṣat param ।। 

tata īṣad yad utthānam īṣad anyatayodaye ।
sa jagatpratibhāso ayam ākāśa iva śūnyatā ।। 

bhāgo aham iti ko apy eṣa pratyekam uditaś citeḥ ।
koṭikoṭyaṃśakalitaḥ ka ivainaṃ prati grahaḥ ।। 

vikalpabhede sphurite saṃvitsāramayātmani ।
vaicitryeṇāvicitre api kim ekatrāpi vo grahaḥ ।। 

apṛthagbhūta evaiṣa pṛthagbhūta iva sthitaḥ ।
pṛthag abdhir aparyanto nāham ity avagacchati ।। 

yathehāhaṃ tathehāsi ghaṭādīhāsti markaṭaḥ ।
kham ihaivaṃ tathāmbvādi kim ahantāṃ prati grahaḥ ।। 

iti jñānād vibhāgasya yo dvaitasya parikṣayaḥ ।
tyāgas saṅkalpajālānām asaṃsaṅgas sa kathyate ।। 

samastakalpanājālasyeśvaraikatvabhāvanam ।
galitadvaitanirbhāsam etad eveśvarārpaṇam ।। 

abhedavaśato bhedo nāmnaivaiṣāṃ cidātmani ।
bodhātmākhilaśabdārthaṃ jagad ekaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

aham āśā jagad ahaṃ kham ahaṃ karma cāpy aham ।
kālo aham aham advaitaṃ dvaitaṃ cāham ahaṃ jagat ।। 

manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru ।
mām evaiṣyasi matvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ ।। 

arjunaḥ

dve rūpe tava deveśa paraṃ cāparam eva ca ।
kīdṛśaṃ tat kadā rūpaṃ tiṣṭhāmy āśritya siddhaye ।। 

bhagavān

sāmānyaṃ paramaṃ caiva dve rūpe viddhi me anagha ।
pāṇyādiyuktaṃ sāmānyaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।। 

paraṃ rūpam anādyantaṃ yan mamaikam anāmayam ।
brahmātmaparamātmādiśabdair etad udīryate ।। 

yāvad apratibuddhas tvam anātmajñatayā sthitaḥ ।
tāvac caturbhujākāradevapūjāparo bhava ।। 

tatkramāt samprabuddhas tvaṃ tato jñāsyasi tat param ।
mama rūpam anādyantaṃ yena bhūyo na jāyase ।। 

yadi vā vedyavijñāto bhavāṃs tad arimardana ।
taṃ mamātmānam ātmānam ātmanaś cāśu saṃśraya ।। 

idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham iti yat pravadāmy aham ।
tad etad ātmatattvaṃ tan muhur vyapadiśāmy alam ।। 

manye sādho prabuddho asi pade viśrāntavān asi ।
saṅkalpair avamukto asi satyaikātmamayo bhava ।। 

sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani ।
paśya tvaṃ yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ ।। 

sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ yo bhajaty aikyam āsthitaḥ ।
sarvathā vartamāno api na sa bhūyo abhijāyate ।। 

ekatvaṃ sarvaśabdārtha ekaśabdārtha ātmatā ।
ātmāpi ca na san nāsad gato yasyāśu tat sa sat ।। 

trailokyacetasām antar āloko yaḥ prakāśajaḥ ।
anubhūtim upārūḍhas so ayam ātmeti niścayaḥ ।। 

trailokyapayasām antar yo rasānubhavas sthitaḥ ।
gavyānām abdhijānāṃ ca so ayam ātmāsmi bhārata ।। 

antas sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ yas sūkṣmo anubhavas sa ca ।
mukto anubhavanīyena so ayam ātmāsmi sarvagaḥ ।। 

samagrapayasām antar yathā ghṛtam avasthitam ।
tathā sarvapadārthānāṃ dehānāṃ ca sthitaḥ paraḥ ।। 

sarvāmbhonidhiratnānāṃ sabāhyābhyantare yathā ।
tejas tathāsmi dehānām asaṃsthita iva sthitaḥ ।। 

yathā kumbhasahasrāṇāṃ sabāhyābhyantare nabhaḥ ।
jagattrayaśarīrāṇāṃ tathātmāham avasthitaḥ ।। 

muktāphalaśataughānāṃ tantuḥ protavapur yathā ।
tathāhaṃ dehalakṣāṇāṃ sthita ātmāsmy alakṣitaḥ ।। 

brahmādau tṛṇaparyante padārthanikurumbake ।
sattāsāmānyam etad yat tam ātmānam ajaṃ viduḥ ।। 

tad īṣatsphuritākāraṃ brahma brahmaiva tiṣṭhati ।
ahantādi jagattādi krameṇa bhramakāriṇā ।। 

ātmaivedaṃ jagadrūpaṃ hanyate hanti cātra kim ।
śubhāśubhair jagadduḥkhaiḥ kim asyārjuna lipyate ।। 

pratibimbeṣv ivādarśaṃ samaṃ sākṣivad āsthitam ।
naśyatsu na vinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham itīdaṃ kathyate mayā ।
evam ātmāsi sarvātmā mām evaṃ viddhi pāṇḍava ।। 

imās sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ ।
ātmatantoś cito antassthāḥ payasspandā ivāmbudhau ।। 

yathopalatvaṃ śailānāṃ dārutvaṃ ca mahīruhām ।
taraṅgāṇāṃ jalatvaṃ ca padārthānāṃ tathātmatā ।। 

sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani ।
yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati ।। 

nānākāravikāreṣu taraṅgeṣu yathā payaḥ ।
kaṭakādiṣu vā hema bhūteṣv ātmā tathārjuna ।। 

nānātaraṅgavṛndāni yathā lolāni vāriṇi ।
kaṭakādīni vā hemni tathā bhūtāni cātmani ।। 

padārthajātaṃ bhūtādi bṛhad brahma ca bhārata ।
ekam evākhilaṃ viddhi pṛthaksthaṃ na manāg api ।। 

kiṃ tadbhāvavikārāṇāṃ gamyam asti jagattraye ।
kva te vāpi jagat kiṃ vā kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi ।। 

iti śrutvāvagamyāntar bhāvayitvā suniścitam ।
jīvanmuktāś carantīha santas samarasāśayāḥ ।। 

nirmānamohā jītasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmavidyā vinivṛttakāmāḥ ।
dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasañjñair gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat ।। 

arjunopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭapañcāśas sargaḥ

bhagavān

bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ ।
yat te ahaṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā ।। 

mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ ।
āgamāpāyino anityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata ।। 

te tu naikātmanaś cānye kvāto duḥkhaṃ kva vā sukham ।
anādyante anavayave kutaḥ pūraṇakhaṇḍane ।। 

saṃsthitā sparśamātrākhyā kalāsmin paramātmani ।
anante asanniveśādau hemnīva kaṭakāditā ।। 

yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete mātrāsparśā bhramātmakāḥ ।
samaduḥkhasukho dhīras so amṛtatvāya kalpate ।। 

sarvatvād ātmanas tv ete ābhāsās saṃsthitā iva ।
asadrūpās tv asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyate ।। 

manāg api na vidyete sukhaduḥkhe asarvage ।
sarvatvād ātmatattvasya sattā katham ivānayoḥ ।। 

nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
nāsty eva sukhaduḥkhādi paramātmāsti sarvagaḥ ।। 

sattvāsattvamatī tyaktvaivaitayor jagadātmanoḥ ।
tyaktvā nakiñcin madhyaṃ ca śeṣe baddhapado bhava ।। 

na hṛṣyati sukhenātmā duḥkhair glāyati nārjuna ।
dṛṣadvac cetanātmāpi śarīrāntargato api san ।। 

jaḍaṃ cittādi duḥkhasya bhājanaṃ dehatāṃ gatam ।
na caitasmin kṣate kṣīṇe kiñcid evātmanaḥ kṣatam ।। 

jaḍaṃ dehādi duḥkhāder yad idaṃ bhoktr iti sthitam ।
tan māyābhramam evāṅga viddhy abodhavaśotthitam ।। 

na kiñcid eva dehādi na ca duḥkhādi vidyate ।
ātmano yat pṛthagbhūtaṃ kiṃ kenāto anubhūyate ।। 

yad idaṃ kathayāmy atra tenaiṣā te vinaśyati ।
bhrāntir duravabodhotthā samyagbodhena bhārata ।। 

yathā rajjvām ahibhayaṃ bodhān naśyaty abodhajam ।
tathā dehādi duḥkhādi bodhān naśyaty abodhajam ।। 

viṣvag viśvam ajaṃ brahma na naśyati na jāyate ।
iti satyaṃ paraṃ viddhi bodhaḥ parama eṣa saḥ ।। 

brahmārṇavataraṅgas tvaṃ kiñcid bhūtvā vilīyase ।
brahmāvarte sphurasy adya brahmaivāsi nirāmayam ।। 

jagat kālaḥ kriyā deśas tvam ahaṃ sainikā iti ।
brahmaṇy evaṃ parispando nātra stas sadasatkramau ।। 

jahi mānaṃ madaṃ śokaṃ bhayam īrṣyāṃ sukhāsukhe ।
dvaitam etad asadrūpam ekas sadrūpavān bhava ।। 

puruṣākṣauhiṇīnāṃ tvaṃ kṣayeṇānubhavātmanā ।
brahmaṇā bṛṃhitaṃ yuddhaṃ brahma brahmamayaṃ kuru ।। 

asaṃvidan sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ lābhālābhau jayājayau ।
yuddhabrahmaikatāṃ gaccha brahmādistambha bhārata ।। 

lābhālābhasamo bhūtvā bhūtvā nūnaṃ nakiñcana ।
jaḍo vāta iva spandī prasṛtaṃ kāryam ācara ।। 

yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat ।
yat kariṣyasi kaunteya tad ātmeti sthiro bhava ।। 

yanmayo yo bhavaty antas sa tad āpnoty asaṃśayam ।
brahmasatyam avāptuṃ tvaṃ brahmasatyamayo bhava ।। 

anapekṣya phalaṃ brahma bhūtvā brahmeti bhāvitam ।
kriyate kevalaṃ karma brahmajñena yathāgatam ।। 

karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyaty akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ ।
sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa coktas sarvakarmakṛt ।। 

mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo astv akarmaṇi ।
yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya ।। 

karmāsaktim anāśritya tathā nāśritya mūḍhatām ।
naiṣkarmyam apy anāśritya samas tiṣṭha yathāsthitam ।। 

tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ ।
karmaṇy abhipravṛtto api naiva kiñcit karoti saḥ ।। 

āsaktim āhuḥ kartṛtvam akartur api tad bhavet ।
maurkhye sthite hi manasi tasmān maurkhyaṃ parityajet ।। 

paraṃ tajjñatvam āśritya nirāsakter mahātmanaḥ ।
sarvakarmaratasyāpi kartṛtodeti na kvacit ।। 

akartṛtvād abhoktṛtvam abhoktṛtvāt samaikatā ।
samaikatvād anantatvaṃ tato brahmatvam ātatam ।। 

nānātām alam utsṛjya paramātmaikatāṃ gataḥ ।
kurvan kāryam akāryaṃ ca naiva kartā tvam arjuna ।। 

yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṅkalpavarjitāḥ ।
jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ ।। 

samas somyas sthiras svasthaś śāntas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ ।
yas tiṣṭhati sa suvyagro apy alam avyagratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān ।
yathāprāptānuvartī ca bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ ।। 

karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran ।
indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāras sa ucyate ।। 

yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate arjuna ।
karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktas sa viśiṣyate ।। 

āpūryamāṇaṃ tv acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat ।
tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī ।। 

arjunopākhyāna ātmajñānopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

bhagavān

na kuryād bhogasantyāgaṃ na kuryād bhogabhāvanam ।
sthātavyaṃ susamenaiva yathāprāptānuvartinā ।। 

anātmany ātmatāṃ dehe mā bhāvaya bhavātmani ।
ātmany evātmatāṃ satye bhāvayābhāvarūpiṇi ।। 

dehanāśe mahābāho na kiñcid api naśyati ।
ātmanāśe hi nāśas syān na cātmā naśyati kvacit ।। 

avināśam anādyantam ātmānam ajaraṃ viduḥ ।
naśyaty ātmeti durbodho mā tavāstv atiduḥkhadaḥ ।। 

na kadācana naśyanti viditātmāna uttamāḥ ।
naśyanty aviditātmāno hy anātmany ātmamāninaḥ ।। 

arjunaḥ

evaṃ cet taj jagannātha mūḍhānām api mānada ।
dehanāśe samutpanne manye naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana ।। 

bhagavān

evam eva mahābāho na kiñcin naśyati kvacit ।
ātmaivāsty avināśātmā kiṃ tasya kva vinaśyati ।। 

idaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ yuktam iti mohād bhramād ṛte ।
anyat tathā na paśyāmi vandhyāstrītanayaṃ yathā ।। 

nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo antas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ ।। 

avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ।
vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati ।। 

antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāś śarīriṇaḥ ।
anāśino aprameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata ।। 

ātmaivaiko asti na dvitvam asatas sambhavaḥ kutaḥ ।
avināśas tv ananto asau sato nāśo na vidyate ।। 

dvaitaikatvaparityāge yac cheṣam avaśiṣyate ।
śāntaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ tad astīha paraṃ padam ।। 

arjunaḥ

tan mṛto asmīti bhagavan kiṃrūḍheha nṛṇāṃ sthitiḥ ।
kathaṃ sthitau vā lokānāṃ tau svarganarakau prabho ।। 

bhagavān

bhūmir āpo analo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca ।
etattanmātrajātātmā jīvo deheṣu tiṣṭhati ।। 

sa kṛṣyate vāsanayā rajjveva paśupotakaḥ ।
sa tiṣṭhati śarīrāntaḥ pañjare vihago yathā ।। 

sa kālavaśato dehāj jarjaratvam upāgatāt ।
vāsanāvaśato yāti vṛkṣaparṇād raso yathā ।। 

śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca ।
gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt ।। 

vāsanāvattvam evāsya deho netarayuktijaḥ ।
kṣīyate vāsanātyāge kṣīṇe bhavati tat padam ।। 

vāsanāvān purā puṣṭo bhūtvā bhrāmyati yoniṣu ।
jīvo bhramabharākāro māyāpuruṣako yathā ।। 

akṣasvabhāvān akhilāñ śarīrād vāsanāvaśaḥ ।
jīvo gṛhītvā saṃyāti puṣpād gandhān ivānilaḥ ।। 

deho nisspandatām eti jīve kaunteya nirgate ।
nisspandāvayavābhogaś śāntavāta iva drumaḥ ।। 

aceṣṭaś chedabhedādidoṣair āyāty adṛśyatām ।
mṛta ity ucyate loke deho vigatajīvitaḥ ।। 

sa jīvaḥ prāṇamūrtiḥ khe yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhate ।
tatra svavāsanābhyāsāt paśyaty ākāram ātatam ।। 

ayaṃ deho hi jīvena tv asann evāvalokitaḥ ।
asya nāśe anyam apy evaṃ paśyaty evāśu svapnavat ।। 

yathaiva paśyaty ākārāṃs teṣāṃ nāśāṃs tathaiva saḥ ।
ādisarge bhāvanayā kilaivaṃ saṃvibhāvitaḥ ।। 

jhagity udbhavakāle tu yad yathā dṛśyate puraḥ ।
ānirvāṇaṃ tad evāsyā avinābhāvisaṃvidaḥ ।। 

prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ puruṣārthena jīyate ।
yatnenādyatanenāśu yatanaṃ hyastanaṃ yathā ।। 

ya eva puruṣārthena dṛṣṭo balavatā kṣaṇāt ।
pūrvottaranimeṣāṃśas sa eva jayati sphuṭam ।। 

api sphuṭati vidhyaṇḍe vāti vā pralayānile ।
pauruṣaṃ hi yathāśāstram atas tyājyaṃ na dhīmatā ।। 

narakasvargasargādi vāsanāvaśato abhitaḥ ।
prapaśyati cirābhyastaṃ jīvo jaraḍhamohadhīḥ ।। 

arjunaḥ

narakasvargasargādisambhrameṣu jagatpate ।
kim asya kāraṇaṃ brūhi jīvasya janitasthiteḥ ।। 

bhagavān

vāsanātmānam enaṃ tvaṃ jīvaṃ viddhi śarīrakam ।
svavāsanātmikaivāsya sattā saṃsṛtikāraṇam ।। 

dhriyate saṃsṛtis tāvad yāvat sphurati vāsanā ।
svapnopamānā teneha śreyase vāsanākṣayaḥ ।। 

arjunaḥ

cirābhyāsavaśāt prauḍhā saṃsārabhramakāriṇī ।
kimutthā devadeveśa vāsanā kṣīyate katham ।। 

bhagavān

maurkhyamohasamucchrāyād anātmany ātmabhāvanāt ।
ajñānād ātmanas sādho sattām āyāti vāsanā ।। 

bhāvitātmāsi kaunteya satyaṃ vijñātavān asi ।
ayaṃ so ahaṃ janā ete mameti tyaja vāsanāḥ ।। 

vāsanāvilaye jīvo vilīno bhavati svayam ।
yo hi yatsattayocchūnas tannāśāt sa vilīyate ।। 

dehe vilayam āyāte deśakālānyatākṛteḥ ।
ko asau bhājanatām eti janmano maraṇasya ca ।। 

svayaṃ kalpitasaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad ābilam ।
tad eva vāsanākāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi mahāmate ।। 

anāyattam asaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad avyayam ।
prabodhād vāsanāmuktaṃ taṃ mokṣaṃ viddhi bhārata ।। 

jīvann eva mahābāho tattvaṃ prekṣya yathāsthitam ।
vāsanāvāgurāmukto mukta ity abhidhīyate ।। 

yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo api saḥ ।
sarvajño apy abhito baddhaḥ pañjarastho yathā khagaḥ ।। 

durdarśanasya gagane śikhipiñchikeva sūkṣmāpi visphurati yasya na vāsanāntaḥ ।
muktas sa eva bhavatīha hi vāsanaiva bandho anaghasya nanu tatkṣaya eva mokṣaḥ ।। 

arjunopākhyāne jīvatvanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

bhagavān

iti nirvāsanatvena jīvanmuktatayātmani ।
antaśśītalatām etya bandhuduḥkham alaṃ tyaja ।। 

jarāmaraṇaniśśaṅka ākāśaviśadāśayaḥ ।
tyakteṣṭāniṣṭasaṅkalpo vītarāgo bhavānagha ।। 

pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryam idaṃ kiñcid yathāgatam ।
kuru kāryam akārpaṇyaṃ na kiñcid iha naśyati ।। 

pravāhāpatitaṃ karma svam eva kriyate hi yat ।
jīvanmuktasvabhāvo asāv ajīvanmuktatānyathā ।। 

idaṃ karma tyajāmīdam āśrayāmīty anirmalam ।
mūḍhasya manaso rūpaṃ jñamanas tu samasthiti ।। 

pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvantaś śāntacetasaḥ ।
jīvanmuktās suṣuptasthās sphuranty ardhaprabuddhavat ।। 

sthirāṃ saṃhṛtim āyānti kūrmāṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ ।
indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo hṛdi jñasya svabhāvataḥ ।। 

cinmātre vitate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva saṃsthitam ।
sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi ।। 

prasārite prasarati tv antardhiṃ yāti saṃvṛte ।
vicitraracanājālam ananyac cidvitānake ।। 

ananyad apy anyad iva svāṅgarūpam anaṅgavat ।
citraṃ vitānaka iva sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ citi ।। 

yathaivāracitaṃ citraṃ sthitaṃ citrakṛdīhite ।
tathā jātam ajātaṃ ca viśvaṃ saṃsthitam ātmani ।। 

yathā sphurati kartavyaṃ citraṃ citrakṛtaś citi ।
viśvātmani tathā viśvaṃ kālatrayamayodayam ।। 

abhitti trijagaccitraṃ kurute cittacitrakṛt ।
vyomni vyomātmakam api prasphuṭaṃ vṛttivartibhiḥ ।। 

cittacitrakareṇādau citraṃ citraṃ vitānitam ।
paścād bhittiḥ kṛtā vyomarūpā cāsāv aho bhramaḥ ।। 

apūrvaivātimāyeyaṃ kila yatra khakuḍyayoḥ ।
na manāg api bhedo asti sphuṭam apy upalabdhayoḥ ।। 

imā yā upalakṣyante bhittayaś cittacitrajāḥ ।
vyomnaś śūnyatayā viddhi tās tāmarasalocana ।। 

kṣaṇena cetasi yathā bhāto lokakṣayodayau ।
khātmā jagat tathaivedaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

cirantanamanorājyamātre asmin kila satyatā ।
katham ālokite api syāt satyaṃ nāsty eva vibhrame ।। 

bhrameṇālokitas satyam ālokena vilīyate ।
dṛśyamānam api kṣāmaṃ śaradīvābhram ambare ।। 

cittacitrakṛtaś citte saṃsthitāś citraputrikāḥ ।
bhittyabhāvād anādhārā bahis tribhuvanādikāḥ ।। 

naitās santi na cāsi tvaṃ kiṃ kena parirudhyate ।
rodhyarodhakasammohaṃ tyaktvā khavimalo bhava ।। 

pravṛttir eva kā vyomnaḥ pravṛttiś caiva khātmikā ।
ataḥ kālakriyākuḍyakalādi vimalaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

cittasaṃsthaṃ yathā citraṃ sadrūpam api khātmakam ।
vyomnaś śūnyatamaṃ viddhi tathedam akhilaṃ jagat ।। 

cittabhittau kṛtaṃ citraṃ yac ciccitrakareṇa tat ।
sarvaṃ śūnyatayā vyomno manāg api na bhidyate ।। 

yathā prakacataś citte jagannirmāṇasaṅkṣayau ।
kṣaṇenaiva tathaivemau bahissthāv iti viddhi he ।। 

ādyakṣaṇamanorājye nānābhuvananāmani ।
kṣaṇabhāvini mohena kalpatā parikalpitā ।। 

asad eva manorājyaṃ kartuṃ śaktaṃ yathā manaḥ ।
kṣaṇasya kalpīkaraṇe tathaiva balavan manaḥ ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ kalpīkaroty etat tathālpaṃ kurute bahu ।
asat sat kurute kṣipram itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā ।। 

kṣaṇam ādimanorājyaṃ pratibhātaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।
yad vicitrātma tad idaṃ jagajjālam iti sthitam ।। 

sargo nirvāṇaniṣṭhatvān nimeṣam ayam utthitaḥ ।
pratibhāmātrato atraiva kalpitā vajrasāratā ।। 

cittacitrakṛtaś citsthaṃ jagaccitraṃ kacat sthitam ।
akuḍyam apy araṅgāḍhyam idaṃ sphāram ivāgrataḥ ।। 

aho nu citraṃ nirbhitti citram ujjvalam utthitam ।
surañjanaṃ jagad iti sthitaṃ dṛṣṭivilobhanam ।। 

nānātamomaṣīlekhaṃ nānātejo'ṃśarañjanam ।
nānākalaṅkāvayavaṃ nānārāgānurañjitam ।। 

nānādṛṣṭivilāsāḍhyaṃ nānānubhavalocanam ।
nānābhrakograracanaṃ nānākārāgrapaścimam ।। 

vyomanīlasaraḥphullatārācandrārkapaṅkajam ।
vicitraracanodyuktameghālīpattramañjari ।। 

svakoṣṭhakābhilikhitasurāsuranṛputrikam ।
paramālokamakkoladhavalākāśakuḍyakam ।। 

ākāśa eva racitā pratibhaikaraṅgā mugdhā jagattrayamanoharaputrikeyam ।
cinmātravaktraparirañjitasarvalokā līlākulā capalacittakacitrakartrā ।। 

hemācalāṅgalatikā ghanakeśapāśā candrārkalocanavicālanadṛṣṭalokā ।
dharmārthakāmatrikayantritaśāstravastrā pātālatālacaraṇonnatabhūnitambā ।। 

brahmendrarudraharibāhucatuṣṭayogrā satyānṛtonnatakucā kakubaṅgayaṣṭiḥ ।
abdhyantraveṣṭitamahītalapadmapīṭhapattrīkṛtācalamahābhuvanodarī ca ।। 

rātryandhakāracapalabhrurahassmitoccais tārākarālapulakā grahadantapaṅktiḥ ।
cañcaccaturdaśavidhākulabhūtajātaromā dhvanatpralayavāridakambupūgā ।। 

jīvānvitā gagana eva kṛtā vicitrā vyomātmikāciravilakṣaṇacitrakartrā ।
cittena citraparikarmavidā trilokī nānāvilāsavalitā varaputriketi ।। 

jagaccitravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

bhagavān

idaṃ viddhi mahāścaryam arjuneha hi yat kila ।
pūrvaṃ sañjāyate citraṃ paścād bhittir udeti hi ।। 

abhittāv utthite citre dṛśyate bhittir ātatā ।
aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ magnaṃ tumbu śilā plutā ।। 

cittasthacitrasadṛśe vyomātmani jagattraye ।
vyomātmanas te kim iyam ahantā vyomatoditā ।। 

sargavyoma kṛtaṃ vyomnā vyomni vyoma vilīyate ।
bhujyate vyomani vyoma vyoma vyomani cātatam ।। 

veṣṭitaṃ vāsanārajjvā dīrghasaṃsṛtidāma yat ।
vāsanodveṣṭanenaiva tad ihodveṣṭyate arjuna ।। 

pratibimbaṃ yathādarśe tathedaṃ brahmaṇi svayam ।
agamyaṃ chedabhedāder ādhārānanyatāvaśāt ।। 

ananyac chedabhedādi brahmaṇi brahma cāmbaram ।
kiṃ kathaṃ kasya kenaitac chidyate vā kva bhidyate ।। 

brahmatā brahmatāpūre jale jalam iva sphurat ।
sthitā samasamā vyoma nirmalā śāntam ātmani ।। 

vāsyavāsakabhāvo ato manāg api na bhidyate ।
tenehāvāsanībhāvo bodhāt sampanna eva te ।। 

yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo api saḥ ।
sarvajño apy atibaddhātmā tapasvy api sa rāgavān ।। 

yasyāsti vāsanābījam atyalpaṃ citibhūmigam ।
bṛhat sañjāyate tasya punas saṃsṛtikānanam ।। 

abhyāsād dhṛdi rūḍhena satyasambodhavahninā ।
nirdagdhaṃ vāsanābījaṃ na bhūyaḥ parirohati ।। 

dagdhaṃ tu vāsanābījaṃ na nimajjati vastuṣu ।
sukhaduḥkhādiṣu svacchaṃ tumbīpattram ivāmbhasi ।। 

śāntātmā vigatabhavāmayo asi jāto nirvāṇo dalitamahāmanovimohaḥ ।
samyagjñaś śrutam avagamya pāvanaṃ tat tiṣṭhātmavyavahṛtir ekaśāntarūpaḥ ।। 

arjunaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

dviṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

arjunaḥ

naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta ।
sthito asmi gatasandehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava ।। 

bhagavān

vṛttayo yadi bodhena saṃśāntā hṛdaye sphuṭam ।
tac cittaṃ śāntam evāśu viddhi sattvam upāgatam ।। 

atra tac cetyarahitaṃ pratyakcetananāmakam ।
vastu śiṣṭaṃ vinirmuktaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat ।। 

na kecana prabādhante tat padaṃ jagadādhayaḥ ।
bhūtalād gaganoḍḍīnaṃ vihaṅgamam ivotavaḥ ।। 

pratyakcetanam ābhāsaṃ śuddhaṃ saṅkalpavarjitam ।
agamyam enam ātmānaṃ viddhi duṣṭadṛśām iha ।। 

sarvātītapadasthasya citā śuddhasya vāsanā ।
na śaknoti padaṃ draṣṭuṃ janadṛṣṭir aher iva ।। 

yatprāptau sarva eveme kṣīṇā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ ।
varākī vāsanā tatra kiṃ karoti pare pade ।। 

yathānalagiriṃ prāpya himaleśo vilīyate ।
śuddham āsādya cittattvam avidyā līyate tathā ।। 

kva varākī rajastucchā vāsanā bhogabandhanī ।
kvāpūritajagajjālaś cittattvavipulānilaḥ ।। 

tāvat sphuraty avidyeyaṃ nānākāravikāriṇī ।
yāvan na samparijñātaś śuddhas svātmāyam ātmanā ।। 

sarvā dṛśyadṛśaḥ kṣīṇāś śuddhataivoditātatā ।
nabhasīva pade tasmin svātmany akhilapūraṇe ।। 

samagrākārarūpaṃ tat samagrākāravarjitam ।
vāgatītaṃ paraṃ vastu kena nāmopamīyate ।। 

viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām atas tvaṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya ।
abhimataparihārayatnayuktyā bhava virujo bhuvanaikanāthamūrtiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti gaditavati trilokanāthe kṣaṇam iva maunam avasthite purastāt ।
atha madhupa ivāsitābjaṣaṇḍe vacanam upaiṣyati tatra pāṇḍuputraḥ ।। 

arjunaḥ

parigalitasamastaśokabhāvā param udayaṃ bhagavan matir gateyam ।
mama tava vacanena lokabhartur dinapatinā paribodhitābjinīva ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvotthāya gāṇḍīvadhanvā sa harisārathiḥ ।
arjuno gatasandeho raṇalīlāṃ kariṣyati ।। 

kariṣyati kṣatagajavājisārathidrutadravadrudhiramahānadīṃ bhuvam ।
śarotkaraprasaramayābhramaṇḍalītirohitadyumaṇivilocanāṃ divam ।। 

arjunaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ arjunopākhyānaṃ samāptam

triṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm ।
tiṣṭha nissaṅgasannyāsabrahmārpaṇamayātmikām ।। 

yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ ।
yaś ca sarvamayo nitya ātmānaṃ viddhi taṃ param ।। 

dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ sarvagaṃ tvaṃ svam eva ca ।
tatsthas tattām avāpnoṣi tad evāsy astasaṃśayam ।। 

yat saṃvedyavinirmuktaṃ saṃvedanam aninditam ।
cetyamuktacidābhāsaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam ।। 

sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā sā dṛśāṃ dṛg anuttamā ।
sa mahimnāṃ ca mahimā gurūṇāṃ sa gurur guruḥ ।। 

sa ātmā tac ca vijñānaṃ tac chūnyaṃ brahma tat param ।
tac chreyas sa śivaś śāntas sā vidyāparamā sthitiḥ ।। 

yo ayam antaścetanātmā sarvānubhavarūpakaḥ ।
yatra svadante sarvāṇi dravyāṇi svātmasattayā ।। 

sa jagattilatailātmā sa jagadgṛhadīpakaḥ ।
sa jagatpādaparasas sa jagatpaśupālakaḥ ।। 

sa tantur bhūtamuktānāṃ pariprotahṛdambaraḥ ।
sa bhūtamaricaughānāṃ paramā tiktatātatā ।। 

sa padārthe padārthatvaṃ sa tucchatvam avastunaḥ ।
sa sato vastunas sattvam asattvam asataś ca saḥ ।। 

jagadgṛhakriyābhāṇḍopaskarāṇāṃ sa dīpakaḥ ।
candrārkatārakātejas tenedaṃ prakaṭīkṛtam ।। 

sarvaṃ prasṛtam etasmāc cetanāt paramātmanaḥ ।
svasaṃvittivicāreṇa svayam ātmaiṣa labhyate ।। 

sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāraṇacāravaḥ ।
avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ ।। 

aham ādau jagajjāle mithyābhramabharātmani ।
ko bhūtvā kvānubadhnāmi dhṛtiṃ katham avāstavīm ।। 

ādimadhyāntamananasaṅkalpakalanāsv aham ।
brahmākāśam anādyantaṃ keveyattā mamātmanaḥ ।। 

itiniścayavān yo antas samavyavahṛtir bahiḥ ।
udayāstamayonmuktas sthito anantas sa sarvadā ।। 

nāstam eti na codeti sāmyaṃ samam avasthitam ।
yasya khasyeva śūnyatvaṃ sa mahātmeha sadvapuḥ ।। 

bhāvādvaitapadārūḍhas suṣuptaparayā dhiyā ।
vyavahāry api hṛtkṣobhaṃ naity ādarśanaro yathā ।। 

ādarśapuruṣasyeva vyavahāravato api ca ।
na yasya hṛdayollekho manāg api sa muktibhāk ।। 

avibhāgamatāv eva jñamaṇau pratibimbati ।
citeḥ paramavaimalyād vyavahāro yathāgataḥ ।। 

ciccamatkṛtir eveyaṃ jagad ity avabhāsate ।
nehāsty aikyaṃ na ca dvitvam upadeśo api tanmayaḥ ।। 

vācyavācakaśiṣyehāgurvākhyais svacamatkṛtaiḥ ।
ātmanātmani śāntaiva cic camatkurute citi ।। 

citpraspando hi saṃsāras tadaspandaḥ paraṃ padam ।
citspandaśamaneneyaṃ pariśāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

mahāciter nañarthāṃśabhāvo yo abhāvanakṣayaḥ ।
asann iva svabhāvena sa citspanda udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

śūnyatvam ajaḍaṃ yat tat param āhuś citer vapuḥ ।
nañarthābhāvanā yātra saṃsṛtis sānubhūyate ।। 

abhāvanāmātralayā sā ca nissārarūpiṇī ।
kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas svas sadrūpo avaśiṣyate ।। 

citspanda eva saṃsāracakrapravahaṇaṃ viduḥ ।
mātṛmānaprameyādi kaṭakādīva hemani ।। 

pṛthag asti na ca spandaś citer yas saṃsṛtir bhavet ।
cittvam eva cites spandas tadabodho hi saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

abodhamātraṃ citspandaḥ kaṭakatvam ivotthitam ।
bodhamātravilīne asmiñ śuddhaṃ ciddhema śiṣyate ।। 

satyāvabodhamātreṇa kṣīyate bhogabhāvanā ।
bhogābhāvanam eveha paramaṃ jñatvalakṣaṇam ।। 

ime anabhimatās sarve jñasya bhogās svabhāvataḥ ।
bhavanti ko atitṛpto hi durannaṃ kila vāñchati ।। 

etad eva paraṃ viddhi jñatvasya paralakṣaṇam ।
svabhāvenaiva bhogānāṃ yat kilānabhivāñchanam ।। 

cid aspandaiva sarvātmarūpiṇy astīti niścayaḥ ।
yo antaḥ prarūḍhas svābhyāsāj jñatvaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ ।। 

yo na bhuṅkte bhujyamānān api bhogān abuddhimān ।
lokānurodhasiddhyarthaṃ sa hanti laguḍair nabhaḥ ।। 

vinākṛtrimayā yuktyā na siddhir adhigamyate ।
kvacid ātmani loke vā svāṅgāvadalanair api ।। 

cic cetyacaityakoṭisthā tāvat paśyati vibhramam ।
iyaṃ yāvad abodhātmā spandate spandarūpiṇī ।। 

samyagbodhodaye tv asyās spandāspandadaśākramāḥ ।
kvāpi yāntīva saṃśāntadīpavat sābhidhānakāḥ ।। 

citaḥ prakāśarūpāyā dīpikāyās svabhāvataḥ ।
spandāspandamayī neha kathaivāsti manāg api ।। 

yad aspandasya maruto na san nāsan na madhyagam ।
rūpaṃ tad eva saṃvittispandatā praśamocitā ।। 

abhinno asyāś cites spandaś śuddhacitsārarūpadhṛt ।
na bandhāya na mokṣāya sthita ātmani kevalam ।। 

cic cen nañarthasaṃvittiṃ nirvāṇeva na vindate ।
tad bandhamokṣapakṣāder nāmāpi hi na vidyate ।। 

mokṣo astv ity eva bandho antaḥpūrṇatākṣayakāraṇaṃ ।
māstv itīty api bandhas te śreyase avedanaṃ param ।। 

yad anābhāsam ajaḍaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam ।
citas svarūpasaṃsthānam acetyonmukhatātmakam ।। 

yas saṅkalpanaśabdārtharūpas spando mahāciteḥ ।
bandhamokṣādikārho asau prekṣyamāṇaḥ praśāmyati ।। 

prekṣaṇād eva saṃśānte tv ahambhāve nirāspade ।
na vidmaḥ kena kiṃ kasya badhyate vātha mucyate ।। 

saṅkalpa eva ca citer buddhaś ced avibhāgavān ।
tad asaṅkalpam aspandaṃ sarvaṃ jātam avāritam ।। 

spande aspandatayaivātte tanmayatvāt sadā citā ।
saṅkṣīṇa eva saṃsāro nisspande cidghane sthite ।। 

citteja eva citspanda iti buddhe nirantaram ।
vyatiriktaś citas spando na kaścid avaśiṣyate ।। 

asmin dṛśyamaye dīrghasvapne svapnāntaraṃ vrajan ।
na jño moham upādatte sarvagatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

yatrodeti prasabham aniśaṃ sarvasaṃvittisattā yasminn ete sakalakalanākāraṭaṅkā laganti ।
utpadyante svadanasubhagaṃ yatra sarvopalambhā dhyānenainaṃ tam avagamaya pratyagātmānam antaḥ ।। 

pratyagātmāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catuṣṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

enam āhuḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ viddhy enaṃ paramaṃ padam ।
vedmy enam ekam evāham eṣa evāsti netaraḥ ।। 

ya eṣa pratyagātmāntas sarvasattaikadarpaṇaḥ ।
etasmād idam utpannaṃ jagad bījād iva drumaḥ ।। 

buddhyahaṅkāracittādi varjayitvā jaḍātmakam ।
yatrānubhavitāntas te tad viddhi paramaṃ padam ।। 

śuddhānubhavamātraṃ yan manobuddhyādivarjitam ।
mahācidabhidhaṃ puṇyaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padam ।। 

tatsthā ete mahārūpā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ ।
vibhūtibhis sphuranty uccair janās tuṣṭanṛpā iva ।। 

ākāśagamanādyābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ krīḍyate ciram ।
tatsthenaiva janeneha svarge svargaukasā yathā ।। 

tat prāpya nāṅga mriyate tat prāpyāṅga na śocyate ।
tat prāpya kṣīyate nāṅga tat prāpyāṅga na badhyate ।। 

apāraparamākāśarūpiṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
sattāsāmānyarūpaṃ cen manāg api vibhāvyate ।। 

tat tannimeṣamātreṇa jantur muktamanā muniḥ ।
kurvan saṃsārakarmāṇi na bhūyaḥ paritapyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

mano buddhir ahaṅkāra iti yatra kṣayaṃ gatam ।
sattāsāmānyam ābhānaṃ kiṃ tat kīdṛśam ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad brahma sarvadehasthaṃ bhuṅkte pibati valgati ।
ādatte vinihanty atti saṃvitsaṃvedyavarjitam ।। 

tat sarvagatam ādyantarahitaṃ sthitam ūrjitam ।
sattāsāmānyam akhilaṃ vastutattvam ihocyate ।। 

tat sthitaṃ khatayā vyomni śabde śabdatayā sthitam ।
sparśe sthitaṃ sparśatayā tvaci tat tvaktayā sthitam ।। 

rase līnaṃ rasatayā rasanāyāṃ ca tattayā ।
rūpe rūpatayā dṛṣṭaṃ netre līnaṃ ca dṛktayā ।। 

ghrāṇe ghrāṇatayā dṛṣṭaṃ gandhe gandhatayoditam ।
puṣṭaṃ kāyatayā kāye bhūmāv api ca bhūtayā ।। 

payastayā ca payasi vāyau vāyutayā sthitam ।
tejastayā tejasi ca buddhau buddhitayā gatam ।। 

manastayā manasy antar ahaṅkṛtyāpy ahaṅkṛtau ।
rūḍhaṃ saṃvidi saṃvittyā citi cittvena cotthitam ।। 

vṛkṣe vṛkṣatayā lagnaṃ paṭe paṭatayā sthitam ।
ghaṭe ghaṭatayā rūḍhaṃ vaṭe vaṭatayā sthitam ।। 

sthāvare sthāvaratvena jaṅgamatvena jaṅgame ।
pāṣāṇatvena pāṣāṇe cetanatvena cetane ।। 

amareṣv amaratvena naratvena nareṣu ca ।
tiryaktvena ca tiryakṣu krimitvena krimisthitau ।। 

kālakrame kālatayā ṛtāv ṛtutayānayā ।
tuṭikṣaṇanimeṣādau saṃsthitas tattayā vibhuḥ ।। 

śukle śuklatayā jātaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatayā sthitam ।
kriyāsu spandarūpeṇa niyatau niyamena ca ।। 

saṃsthitas saṃsthitau sthityā nāśe nāśatayā sthitaḥ ।
utpattirūpeṇotpattāv āsthitaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

bālye bālyena viśrānto yauvane yauvanena ca ।
jarasā ca jarārūpe maraṇe maraṇena ca ।। 

iti sarvapadārthānām abhinnaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।
kallolaśīkarormīṇām abdhāv iva payobharaḥ ।। 

nānātaiṣā tv asatyaiṣā satyenānena caiva hi ।
kalpitā citsvabhāvena vetālaś śiśunā yathā ।। 

sarvatra saṃsthitimatā vigatāmayena vyāptaṃ mayedam akhilaṃ vividhair vilāsaiḥ ।
cidrūpiṇaiva kalitākalitātmaneti sarvopaśāntamatir āssva sukhaṃ mahātman ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

vibhūtiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yathāsmākaṃ mune svapnapurapattanamaṇḍalam ।
tathaiva padmajādīnāṃ yadi dehaparigrahaḥ ।। 

tathaivedaṃ ca sañjātaṃ yadi sarvam asanmayam ।
tad asmākaṃ dṛḍhataraḥ pratyayaḥ katham utthitaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asmatsargavad ābhāti pūrvasargaprajāpatiḥ ।
svajīvapratibhāsātmā vidyate na tu vāstavaḥ ।। 

sarvagatvāc cites sarvaṃ jīvas sarvatra saṃsṛtiḥ ।
sā cāsatyā darśanotthā samyagdarśananāśinī ।। 

svapnābhaḥ pratibhāso asya ya eṣa svayam utthitaḥ ।
ahantāpratyayaikātmā sa evātidṛḍhas sthitaḥ ।। 

svapne kṣaṇavināśitvaṃ yathā puṃsā na dṛśyate ।
sargasvapne tathaivaitad brahmaṇāpi na lakṣyate ।। 

svapno agrapuruṣasyāsya pratibhāsaś ca yo bhavet ।
rāmāsmadādisargātmā bhavet tādṛśa eva saḥ ।। 

yat svapnapuruṣāj jātaṃ tat svapnapuruṣātmakam ।
bhavatīty anubhūtaṃ hi yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ yathā ।। 

asatyam eva tad viddhi yad asatyena sādhyate ।
asaty arthe samarthe api na yuktaṃ bhāvabandhanam ।। 

asaty arthe samarthe api sattā bhāvanasambhavā ।
yatas tena parityājyam asadbhāvanabhāvanam ।। 

dṛḍhapratyayinas svapnapuruṣād yat samutthitam ।
bhavaty ātmani sargādi dṛḍhapratyayam eva tat ।। 

nimeṣamātram evāyaṃ sargasvapnas sphuran sthitaḥ ।
tasmin nimeṣa evāsmatkalpatā parikalpitā ।। 

sudīrghasvapnaṣaṇḍo ayaṃ yathodeti prajāpateḥ ।
sargādyās sarvabhūtānāṃ pratyekam uditās tathā ।। 

cittattvasyaiva bhāvena sargasvapnaparamparāḥ ।
sphuranty ambho dravatvena yathāvartavivartanaiḥ ।। 

yadā svapnātmikaiveyaṃ sargalakṣmīr na vāstavī ।
idaṃ sambhavatīdaṃ no vety ataḥ pralayaṃ gatam ।। 

yad yathā yādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat tādṛg vidyate tathā ।
na hi paryanuyujyante svapnavibhramanītayaḥ ।। 

na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na sambhavati bhrame ।
vicitrās triṣu lokeṣu dṛśyante vastudṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

jalamadhye jvalaty agnir yathābdhau vaḍavānalaḥ ।
nagarāṇy ambare santi yathā vaimānikāśrayāḥ ।। 

śilāsv abjāni jāyante hemādrāv iva pādapāḥ ।
ekāge sarvapuṣpāṇi santi kalpatarau yathā ।। 

śilāḥ phalanti phalavad yathā ratnagulucchakāḥ ।
śilāntaḥ prāṇinas santi bhekā iva śilāntare ।। 

dṛṣado vāri niryāti candrakāntopalād iva ।
nimeṣeṇa ghaṭo yāti paṭatāṃ śāpavān iva ।। 

svāsattām api budhyante svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।
adhogāmi jalaṃ vyomni ḍīyate abhragataṃ yathā ।। 

vitānam iva khe vāri tiṣṭhati svarnadī yathā ।
uḍḍīyante śilās sthūlāḥ pakṣavanto adrayo yathā ।। 

śilātaḥ prāpyate sarvaṃ nanu cintāmaṇer iva ।
cintitāni phalanty āśu devodyānāntareṣv iva ।। 

tāny eva na phalanty āśu mokṣādīnīva rāghava ।
acetano api kurute karma yantrapumān iva ।। 

evamādis tathānyaś ca vicitrārambhavibhramaḥ ।
dṛṣṭaś śambaragandharvavilāsair apy asambhavaḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyaratnaśambaraśāpajāḥ ।
mayagandharvajanitā anantās satyasambhavāḥ ।। 

asambhavas sambhavānām apīhābhyupapadyate ।
sambhavāsambhavāṃśasya siddhayas svapnavibhramāḥ ।। 

na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā ।
sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra svapne sargābhidhānake ।। 

svapne nimagnadhīr jantuḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ yathā ।
sargasvapne magnabuddhiḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ tathā ।। 

bhramād bhramāntaraṃ gacchan svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan ।
atisthirapratyayabhāg iha jīvo vimuhyati ।। 

śvabhrāntaraṃ śvabhranipātadoṣāt samprāpnuvan mugdhamṛgaḥ prayāti ।
mohaṃ yathā pātamayaikarūpaṃ jīvas tathā saṃsṛtipātamūḍhaḥ ।। 

jagatsvapnakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atra rāghava vakṣye aham itihāsam imaṃ śṛṇu ।
yad vṛttaṃ kasyacid bhikṣoḥ kvacin mananaśālinaḥ ।। 

āsīt kaścin mahābhikṣus samādhyabhyāsatatparaḥ ।
nityaṃ svavyavahāreṇa kṣapayann akhilaṃ dinam ।। 

samādhyabhyāsaśuddhaṃ tat tasya cittaṃ kṣaṇena yat ।
cintayaty āśu tadbhāvaṃ gacchaty ambv iva vīcitām ।। 

kadācit sa samādhānavirato atiṣṭhad ekadhīḥ ।
kañcit sañcintayām āsa svāsanasthaḥ kriyākramam ।। 

tasya cintayato jātā pratibheyam atha svataḥ ।
bhāvayāmy āśu līlārthaṃ sāmānyajanavṛttitām ।। 

iti sañcintya ceto asya sthitaṃ kiñcin narāntaram ।
spandasaṃsthānasantyāgamātreṇāvartake ambv iva ।। 

tena cittanareṇātha kṛtaṃ nāmātmanīcchayā ।
jīvaṭo asmīti sahasā kākatālīyavat sthitam ।। 

jīvaṭo vijahārātha sa svapnapuruṣaś ciram ।
svapnanirmāṇanagare kasmiṃścit puravīthiṣu ।। 

tatra pānaṃ papau matto bhṛṅgaḥ padmarasaṃ yathā ।
śilayeva dṛḍhaṃ piṣṭas suṣvāpa ghananidrayā ।। 

svapne dadarśa vipratvaṃ pāṭhānuṣṭhānatuṣṭimat ।
pratibhāmātrasampannaṃ cittadeśāntarāptivat ।। 

kadācit sa dvijaśreṣṭhas svāharvyāpāraniṣṭhayā ।
ājagāma ghanāṃ nidrāṃ bījatām iva pādapaḥ ।। 

so apy apaśyat svayaṃ svapne sāmantatvam athātmani ।
patākārathahastyaśvasenājaladamālitam ।। 

sa sāmantaḥ kṛtāhāraḥ kadācid ghananidrayā ।
suṣvāpāntarvyavahṛtir bījatāyām iva drumaḥ ।। 

apaśyad rājatāṃ svapne kakubvalayamālinīm ।
lālitāṃ bhogapūgena puṣpaughenartutām iva ।। 

sa kadācin nṛpas svasthas suṣvāpāstamitehitaḥ ।
purobhāvinijācāras svaṃ kāryam iva kāraṇe ।। 

apaśyad ātmani svapne surastrītvam aninditam ।
vṛkṣaḥ kesarasollāso mañjarītvam ivoditam ।। 

sā reme surasenāsu devodyānasthalīṣu ca ।
kṣīrāmbhodhitaraṅgeṣu loleva harivallabhā ।। 

suṣvāpa saikadā bālā mattodyānalatāgṛhe ।
saṃśāntasvamanasspandaṃ gandhalekheva paṅkaje ।। 

dadarśātmany atha svapne saṃsargavaśatoditam ।
mṛgītvam ātmani svairam āvartatvam ivāmbutā ।। 

sā mṛgī lolanayanā kadācin nidrayāhṛtā ।
svapne dadarśa vallītvaṃ svābhyāsād rūḍham ātmani ।। 

tiryañco api prapaśyanti svapnaṃ cittasvabhāvataḥ ।
dṛṣṭānto atra śukāśvebhasañjñāsmaraṇam akṣatam ।। 

sā babhūva latā puṣpaphalapallavaśālinī ।
vanadevīvanodyānalatāgṛhavilāsinī ।। 

bījāntassthāṅkurākārarūpayehādhirūḍhayā ।
sāpaśyad antassaṃvittyā sphuṭaṃ lavanam ātmanaḥ ।। 

kañcit kālaṃ suṣuptasthakalayā jaḍatāṃ ghanam ।
anubhūya dadarśātha svātmānaṃ bhramaraṃ sthitam ।। 

ṣaṭpado vijahārātha vane vanalatāsv asau ।
padminīṣu ca phullāsu taruṇīṣv iva vallabhaḥ ।। 

bimbādharaṃ vidalayan svādayan kausumaṃ madhu ।
svapan kusumaśayyāsu bhuktvā vallīvilāsinīḥ ।। 

sa babhūva sarojinyāṃ vyasanī bisanālavat ।
kvacid eva ratiṃ yāti ceto jaḍamater api ।। 

tām ājagāma nalinīṃ pariloḍayituṃ gajaḥ ।
ramyavastukṣayāyaiva mūḍhānāṃ jṛmbhate manaḥ ।। 

nalinīmathanenaiva samaṃ tena sa ṣaṭpadaḥ ।
guṇavattāntare rūḍhir iva cūrṇatvam āyayau ।। 

bhramaro vāraṇālokād vāraṇālokabhāvanāt ।
dadarśātmānam ālolamattahastitayoditam ।। 

śuṣkasāgaragambhīre gajaḥ khāte papāta ha ।
tamoghanaghane śūnye saṃsāra iva jīvakaḥ ।। 

babhūva vallabho rājño mahān parabalāntakaḥ ।
sadā madabalakṣīvo ghūrṇann iva niśācaraḥ ।। 

kadācid arinistriṃśacchinnas so astam upāyayau ।
vivekāsilatālūnarūpo jīva ivātmani ।। 

paśyan gajaghaṭākumbhamaṇīn procchalitān alīn ।
utkrāman sa gajāj jīvo bhūyo drāgity abhūd aliḥ ।। 

sevamāno vanalatāḥ punar āyāt sa padminīm ।
dustaro hi cirābhyāso vāsanānām abodhataḥ ।। 

tatra hastikhurākrāntyā punar ācūrṇatāṃ yayau ।
pārśvasthahaṃsasaṃvittyā babhūva kalahaṃsakaḥ ।। 

sa haṃsaḥ phullapadmāsu sarasīṣu ciraṃ caran ।
kadācid bahubhir haṃsais saṅgato virarāja ha ।। 

brahmahaṃsātmikā saṃvid aśabdārthavatī manāk ।
tatra pusphora tasyāntaḥ prāgjāṇḍarasabarhivat ।। 

sa tāṃ vibhāvayan dūrād dṛḍhaṃ dāśeṣuṇā hataḥ ।
tatsaṃvittyanusandhānāj jātaḥ padmajasārasaḥ ।। 

tatrātisantatavivekavacovilāsair ābodhito adhigatapāvanavastudṛṣṭiḥ ।
muktas sthito nanu yugāntavidhau videhamuktena tena kila bhāvyam avaśyam eva ।। 

bhikṣusaṃsārodāharaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sa kadācid dadarśātha rudraṃ rudrapure khagaḥ ।
vairiñcanalinīnālalīlālānebhalīlayā ।। 

tatra buddhir abhūt tasya rudro aham iti niścitā ।
pratibimbaṃ varādarśe jhagity eva hi bimbati ।। 

rudrībhūtavapus tatra tanuṃ tatyāja tām asau ।
gandhaḥ pavanatāṃ gacchan kusumastabakaṃ yathā ।। 

rudro atha rudrabhavane vijahāra yadṛcchayā ।
tais taiś śivapurācārair gaṇagoṣṭhīgariṣṭhayā ।। 

rudras tv anuttarajñānavilāsaikatayā tayā ।
svam aśeṣam udantaṃ tam apaśyat prāktanaṃ dhiyā ।। 

nirāvaraṇavijñānavapus sa bhagavān haraḥ ।
uvāca svayam ekānte svasvapnaśatavismitaḥ ।। 

aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ bata viśvavimohinī ।
asaty evāpi sadrūpā surūḍhā maruvārivat ।। 

idamprathamam ākrāntacetyo ahaṃ cittatāṃ gataḥ ।
pūrvasampannasargasthagaganādivibhāvanāt ।। 

yadṛcchāsthitajīvatvo bhūtatanmātrarañjitaḥ ।
kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge bhikṣur akṣubhito abhitaḥ ।। 

tenālayanibaddhena bahis svairavihāritā ।
līlāvilulitākārā yadā ramyeti bhāvitā ।। 

sarvabhāvopamardena tadabhyāsavaśāt tadā ।
tām eva so anvabhūd bhikṣus tyaktvānyaṃ mananodayam ।। 

camatkṛtiś cetasi yā rūḍhā saiva vijṛmbhate ।
vallī tyajati naidāghī pītam apy ambu mādhavam ।। 

sa bhikṣur jīvaṭo bhūtvā jantur jaraḍhavāsanaḥ ।
teṣu deśeṣu babhrāma randhreṣv iva pipīlakaḥ ।। 

ātmani dvijabhaktatvāt so apaśyad dvijatām atha ।
bhāvo bhāvaviparyāse balavān eva vardhate ।। 

sāmantatām avāpāsau vipras satatacintitām ।
sātatyena rasaḥ pītaḥ phalatām eti pādape ।। 

rājyārthadharmakāryāṇāṃ kartṛtvāt so abhavan nṛpaḥ ।
sa kāmukatayā rājā surastrītvam avāpa ha ।। 

lolalocanalobhena sā mṛgī rasaśālinī ।
babhūva vāsanāmohas tv aho duḥkhāya jantuṣu ।। 

mṛgī satatacittasthā babhūva vipine latā ।
avaśyambhāvi lavanaṃ latikānubabhūva ha ।। 

antassañjñācirābhyastaṃ bhramaratvam athātmani ।
sāpaśyad bhāvamardena sadātadbhāvabhāvitā ।। 

sa vāraṇakhurakṣodam anubhūyātha bhāvitam ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prababhrāma mahāsaṃsṛtivibhramān ।। 

saṃsāraśataparyante rudras so ayam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
asmin saṃsārasaṃrambhe svamanomātrasambhṛte ।। 

evaṃ saṃśāntarūpāsu saṃsārāraṇyabhūmiṣu ।
bahvīṣv aham abhibhrāntas tv aśūnyāsv iva bhūriśaḥ ।। 

kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge tv ahaṃ jīvaṭanāmakaḥ ।
kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ kasmiṃścid vasudhādhipaḥ ।।
