haṃsaḥ padmavane bhūtvā vindhyakacche ca vāraṇaḥ ।
hariṇo hehayādrau ca daśām aham imāṃ gataḥ ।। 

atra varṣasahasrāṇi caturyugaśatāni ca ।
samatītāny anantāni dinarturacitāni ca ।। 

mama prathamam eva prāksphuritasya parāt padāt ।
sattvajātitayā rūḍho bhikṣutve yo jñatākramaḥ ।। 

bhūyo bhūyo apy atikramya gatasya brahmahaṃsatām ।
sa eva prāktano abhyāsaḥ phalitas saṅgamodayāt ।। 

dṛḍhābhyāso ya evāsya jīvasyodety avighnataḥ ।
yonyantaraśatenāpi tam evaiṣo anudhāvati ।। 

kākatālīyayogena kadācit sādhusaṅgamāt ।
aśubho vāsanābhyāso jīvasya vinivartate ।। 

saṅgatyādikam evaiṣa kevalaṃ svodayaṃ prati ।
prāktano vāsanābhyāso hetuṃ laghum apekṣate ।। 

yad yad abhyasyate ajasram anyadehāntare api ca ।
jāgratsvapneṣv asad api tat sad ity anubhūyate ।। 

tat tad arthakriyākāri duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca ।
udeti bhāvanā tasmād bhāvanābhāvanaṃ jayaḥ ।। 

bhāvanaiva svam ātmānaṃ deho ayam iti paśyati ।
svasattāmātravistāraṃ taṃ gulmatvam ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

bhāvanā prekṣyamāṇaiṣā na kiñcid api śiṣyate ।
naiva vidyata eveti tadbhrameṇālam astu naḥ ।। 

bhramasyāsanmayasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
asaṃvedanamātraikamārjanīyasya vastutaḥ ।। 

asanmayī kharūpaiṣā varaṃ sattaiva lālanī ।
pravartatāṃ vinodāya kim asan naḥ kariṣyati ।। 

tat tān sarvān svasaṃsārān utthāyālokayāmy aham ।
kāṃścid ālokadānena tebhya ekīkaromy aham ।। 

iti sañcintya rudro asau taṃ sargaṃ prajagāma ha ।
yatra bhikṣur vihārasthas suptaś śava iva sthitaḥ ।। 

bodhayitvātha taṃ bhikṣuṃ cetasā cetanena ca ।
yojayām āsa sasmāra bhikṣur apy ātmano bhramam ।। 

rudram ātmānam ālokya jīvaṭādimayaṃ tathā ।
bodhād avismayārho api sthityarthaṃ vismayaṃ yayau ।। 

atha rudras tathā bhikṣur dvāv evotthāya jagmatuḥ ।
kvāpi jīvaṭasaṃsāraṃ cidākāśaikakoṇagam ।। 

tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam ।
viṣayaṃ taṃ puraṃ tac ca tac ca pānavaṇiggṛham ।। 

suptaṃ dadṛśatur naṣṭasañjñaṃ jīvaṭakaṃ śavam ।
sthāpayitvā vapurbhāraṃ prabhrāntaṃ bhavabhūmiṣu ।। 

taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca ।
ekarūpās trirūpās te rudrajīvaṭabhikṣukāḥ ।। 

bodhavanto apy abuddhābhā vismitā apy avismitāḥ ।
babhus tūṣṇīṃ sthitāś citre kṛtākārā iva kṣaṇam ।। 

atha jagmuś ca te sarve kvacic cidvyomani sthitam ।
viprasaṃsāram ārambhaparabhūtasaghuṅghumam ।। 

tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam ।
viṣayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ grāmaṃ prāpus te brāhmaṇālayam ।। 

vipraṃ te dadṛśus suptaṃ kalatravalitaṃ gṛhe ।
kaṇṭhe gṛhītaṃ brāhmaṇyā bahirjīvam iva sthitam ।। 

taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca ।
tasthus te bahavo apy eke savismayam avismayāḥ ।। 

atha jagmuś cidākāśakacitaṃ cetitaṃ ca taiḥ ।
sāmantanṛpasaṃsāram ārambhabharasundaram ।। 

tatra tadbhavanaṃ prāpus tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam ।
sāmantaṃ dadṛśur mattaṃ suptaṃ paryaṅkapaṅkaje ।। 

hemāvadātaṃ hemāṅgyā nihitaṃ kucakoṭare ।
bhramaryevānvitaṃ padmakośasuptaṃ madhuvratam ।। 

kāntābhir abhyāvalitaṃ mañjarībhir iva drumam ।
dīpajālakamadhyasthaṃ ratnaugha iva kāñcanam ।। 

taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca ।
tasthus te bahavo apy evaṃ savismayam avismayam ।। 

atha te rājasaṃsāraṃ jagmus tatra prabodhya tam ।
tena sārdham athānyāsu bhremus saṃsṛtibhūmiṣu ।। 

prāpya tāṃ brahmahaṃsehāṃ rudratāṃ sarva eva te ।
samājagmur virejuś ca rudrāṇām uttamaṃ śatam ।। 

ekasaṃvid bhinnatanu citraceṣṭam aceṣṭitam ।
ekarūpam anekātma rūpaṃ ca parameśvaram ।। 

rudrāṇāṃ tac chatam atha nirāvaraṇacinmayam ।
sarvasaṃsāragaṃ viddhi sthitaṃ sarvajagatsthiti ।। 

daśa rudraśatānīha santi rāma mahānti ca ।
etad ekādaśaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ prati saṃsthitam ।। 

yo yo hi yasya jīvasya saṃsāras samudeti hi ।
tatrāprabuddhā jīvaughāḥ paśyanti na parasparam ।। 

milanti hi mitho buddhās taraṅgāmbv iva vāridhau ।
aprabuddhās svatāmātraniṣṭhā loṣṭavad āsthitāḥ ।। 

yathā dravatvād vīcyambūny anyo'nyaṃ sammilanty alam ।
tathā prabuddhā jīvaughā mithaś cittvān milanty alam ।। 

pratyekam uditāś caite saṃsāre jīvarāśayaḥ ।
ciddhātos sarvagatvena tv asatyās satyavat sthitāḥ ।। 

yad yad ākhanyate bhūmes tat tan nāma yathāṅga mṛt ।
sarvagāyāś citer yad yad ūhyate tat tatheha cit ।। 

sarvatra pañcabhūtāni yathānubhavasīha hi ।
tatheha sarvabhūtātma cittvaṃ sarvatra vidyate ।। 

yat sālabhañjikāvṛnde śailastambhagate aṅgakam ।
prekṣyate tat tad evāśma tathā citi jagac citaḥ ।। 

avedane pare śuddhe vedanaṃ yaj jaganti tat ।
akāraṇakam evaitac chūnyatvaṃ nabhaso yathā ।। 

cidghane vedanaṃ dṛśyaṃ bandho mokṣas tv avedanaṃ ।
yad eva rucitaṃ te syāt tad evāśu dṛḍhīkuru ।। 

sargāsargau bandhamokṣau vedanāvedanātmakau ।
abhinnau bodhataś caitau yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

asaṃvittyaiva yan nāsti tannāśe kā kadarthanā ।
tūṣṇīmbhāvena yat prāpyaṃ prāptam evāśu viddhi tat ।। 

yad vai vedanamātrātma tad aṅgāvedanakṣayam ।
tad vedanāvedanayor yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara ।। 

vīcir yathāmbhasi spando jagac citraṃ tathā citau ।
etāvanmātra evātra bhedo yad raghunandana ।। 

deśakālakharūpeṣu satsu vīcyāditāmbhasi ।
jagadādau tu deśādyā asanto nirmitāś citā ।। 

ābhāsuraṃ trijagad ity avabhāti bhāsvat saṃvedanaṃ cayanam ekacites svarūpam ।
vāci sthitaṃ bhavati caitad upoḍhabhedaṃ kliṣṭaṃ praśāntavacanas tu śivaḥ parātmā ।। 

saṃvedanaṃ sarga itīha śabdāv arthena bhinnau na kadācid etau ।
vīcyambhasī dve iti nocitoktir jñasyājñatāyāṃ tv idam eva yuktam ।। 

svapnaśatarudropākhyāne saṃsāraśatānveṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādīnāṃ haṃsāntānāṃ munīśvara ।
bhikṣusvapnaśarīrāṇāṃ sampannaṃ kim ataḥ param ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rudreṇa saha sambhūya prabuddhās sarva eva te ।
mithaś ca dṛṣṭasaṃsārā rudrāṃśās sukhinas sthitāḥ ।। 

tena rudreṇa tāṃ māyām avalokya tathoditām ।
svāṃśās tām eva saṃsārasthitiṃ te preṣitāḥ punaḥ ।। 

rudraḥ

gacchatāśu nijaṃ sthānaṃ tatra bhuktvā kalatrakaiḥ ।
kañcit kālaṃ samaṃ bhogān matsakāśam upaiṣyatha ।। 

bhaviṣyatha madaṃśā me gaṇā matpurabhūṣaṇāḥ ।
tato mahāpralayato yāsyāmas tat padaṃ saha ।। 

ity uktvā bhagavān rudras teṣāṃ so antaradhīyata ।
anyasaṃsārasaṃsthānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ madhyam āyayau ।। 

prayayus svāspadaṃ te api jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ ।
svakalatrais samaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayitvātha kālataḥ ।। 

rudralokaṃ samāsādya bhaviṣyanti gaṇottamāḥ ।
kadācid vyomni dṛśyante tārakākāradhāriṇaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhikṣusaṅkalparūpās te jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ ।
kathaṃ satyatvam āyātās saṅkalpārtheṣv asatyatā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṅkalpasatyatāstīśe saṅkalpāsatyatāsty aje ।
yatra yan nāsti tan nāsti yatas sarvātma tat padam ।। 

yat svapne dṛśyate yac ca saṅkalpair avalokyate ।
tat tathā vidyate tatra sarvakālaṃ tadātmakam ।। 

taddeśakālātmikayā tayaivāvasthayāpyate ।
taddeśakālātmikayā gatyā deśāntaraṃ yathā ।। 

deśād deśāntaraṃ yadvad yatnagatyādikaṃ vinā ।
na labhyate tathā svapno vinā tattāṃ na labhyate ।। 

sarvam asti citaḥ kośe yad yathālokayaty asau ।
cit tat tathā tadāpnoti sarvātmatvād avikṣatam ।। 

saṅkalpasvapnavastv aṅga yayā ca daśayāpyate ।
paramābhyāsayogābhyāṃ vinā seha na labhyate ।। 

yeṣāṃ tu yogavijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ phalitās sthitāḥ ।
sarvaṃ sarvatra paśyanti ta ete śaṅkarādayaḥ ।। 

idam agragataṃ vastu tathāsaṅkalpitaṃ ca yaḥ ।
prārthayaty ubhayabhraṃśaṃ sa prāpnoty ubhayāśrayāt ।। 

sarvaṃ hy abhimataṃ kāryam ekaniṣṭhasya sidhyati ।
dakṣiṇāṃ kakubhaṃ gacchan kaḥ prāpnoty uttarāṃ diśam ।। 

saṅkalpārthaparair eva saṅkalpārtho avagamyate ।
agrasthārthaparair agrasaṃsthito artho avagamyate ।। 

agrasthabuddhisaṃsthe asmin kalpitaṃ prāptum icchati ।
yas sa nā naikaniṣṭhatvāt tadā tan nāśayed dvayam ।। 

tasmād ekārthaniṣṭhatvād bhikṣujīvena rudratām ।
prāpya sarvātmano labdhaṃ padāt sarvaṃ tathāsthiteḥ ।। 

bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvānāṃ pratyekaṃ taj jagat pṛthak ।
paśyanti te ca nānyo'nyaṃ rudrajñānād ṛte tataḥ ।। 

aprabuddhāḥ prajāyante jīvā jīvāt prabodhinaḥ ।
tadicchayāśu viduṣa iva mūrkhās sutā iva ।। 

iha vidyādharo ahaṃ syām iha syām aham eḍikā ।
ity ekadhyānasāphalyadṛṣṭānto asyāṃ kriyāsthitau ।। 

ekatvaṃ ca śatatvaṃ ca maurkhyaṃ pāṇḍityam eva ca ।
devatvaṃ mānuṣatvaṃ ca deśakālakriyākramaiḥ ।। 

tulyakālam alaṅkartuṃ dhāraṇādhyānayatnataḥ ।
sarvaśaktyajarūpatvāj jīvasyāsty eva śaktatā ।। 

anantaś cāntayuktaś ca svabhāvo asya svabhāvataḥ ।
savikāsas sasaṅkoco haṃsasyeva cidātmanaḥ ।। 

yad icchati tad asty aṅga nanu sampadyate svayam ।
svayaṃsaṅkalpitair ebhir deśakālakriyākramaiḥ ।। 

yoginyo yoginaś ceha tiṣṭhanty anyatra yānti ca ।
iha cāmutra cehante dṛṣṭam etad anekaśaḥ ।। 

kārtavīryo gṛhe tiṣṭhan vavarṣāmbudharo bhavan ।
viṣṇuḥ kṣīrodadhau tiṣṭhañ jāyate puruṣo bhuvi ।। 

paśvarthaṃ yānti tiṣṭhantyo yoginyo yoginīgaṇe ।
śakras svargāsane tiṣṭhan yāti yajñārtham urvarām ।। 

sahasram ekaṃ bhavati tathāsmiñ jagadātmani ।
nṛṇāṃ śatāni bhaktānāṃ yānti sāyujyatāṃ tanau ।। 

ekas sahasraṃ bhavati tathā caiṣa janārdanaḥ ।
ekaḥ kāntāsahasrāṇi tulyakālaṃ niṣevate ।। 

evaṃ te bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ ।
rudravijñānavaśatas svasaṅkalpapurīr gatāḥ ।। 

tatra bhuktvā ciraṃ bhogān prāpya rudrapuraṃ tataḥ ।
gaṇatām āpnuvantas te sthāsyanti saparicchadāḥ ।। 

nityapraphultanavakalpalatālayeṣu rudreṇa sārdham ururatnagulucchakeṣu ।
nānājagatsu ca tadā purapattaneṣu vidyādharīṣv amalamaulidharā ramante ।। 

bhikṣuviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

ekonasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eṣa dṛṣṭo yathānena bhikṣuṇā cetanābhramaḥ ।
bhūtaṃ pratyekam evaivaṃ pṛthaṅ mṛtvā tu paśyati ।। 

sarvasya nāma jīvasya mṛtijanmamayī sthitiḥ ।
bhavaty eva cidākāśarūpiṇo apy ākṛtiṃ gatā ।। 

pṛthak pratyekam abhyeti khātmā saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
pṛthag āmodasārthasya yathā kusumaṣaṇḍakaḥ ।। 

sarva eva mṛto jantuḥ pṛthak svapratibhātmakam ।
paśyaty evaṃ kharūpo api dehī cāmokṣam ākulaḥ ।। 

jīva eṣa mayā tubhyaṃ kathitaḥ kathayānayā ।
parāt praspanditātmeti na bhikṣū rāma kevalaḥ ।। 

mohān mohāntaraṃ yāti jīvo jaraḍhajīvitaḥ ।
parvatāgraparibhraṣṭo hy adho adha upalo yathā ।। 

paramātmapadabhraṣṭo jīvas svapnam imaṃ dṛḍham ।
paśyaty asmād api svapnād yāti svapnāntaraṃ punaḥ ।। 

svapnāt svapne api nipatan mṛṣaivedaṃ śilādṛḍham ।
paripaśyati deho antar māyayā jarjarīkṛtaḥ ।। 

kvacit kenacid evaiṣa kadācid vā na vā svayam ।
dehena mohanidrāto mucyate samprabudhyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho nu viṣamo moho jīvasyāsyopajāyate ।
padāc cyutasya stokena nānākāravikāradaḥ ।। 

mithyājñānograyāminyā māyayā nipuṇād idam ।
aho nu khalu vaiṣamyaṃ bhīmaṃ nijapadacyuteḥ ।। 

bhagavan sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvathaiva jagatsthitau ।
tvayā sambhavatīty uktaṃ mayā tac cānubhūyate ।। 

evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭātmā sumahātman sa bhikṣukaḥ ।
kvacid asti na vety antar ālokya kathayāśu me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atra rātrau samādhisthas trilokīmaṭhikām imām ।
bhikṣur eṣo asti nāstīti prekṣya prātar vadāmy aham ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

munāv evaṃ kathayati bahir madhyāhnadiṇḍimaḥ ।
udabhūt pralayakṣubdhaghanagarjitamāṃsalaḥ ।। 

tatyajuḥ pādayos tasya puṣpāñjaliparamparāḥ ।
nṛpāḥ paurā viṭapinaḥ puṣpaṃ vātayutā iva ।। 

pūjayitvā muniśreṣṭhān udatiṣṭhat sa viṣṭarāt ।
muninā saha bhūpāla udayādrer ivāṃśumān ।। 

sabhā tadanu sottasthau sapraṇāmaparasparam ।
krameṇa hyastanenaiva jagmuḥ khecarabhūcarāḥ ।। 

svāspadeṣu yathāśāstram aharvyāpāram ādṛtāḥ ।
sarve sampādayām āsur nijadharmakramocitam ।। 

cintayanto muniproktaṃ mahīcaranabhaścarāḥ ।
jñānaṃ kṣapāṃ kṣaṇam iva ninyuḥ kalpam ivāpi ca ।। 

prātaḥ punaḥ prasṛtakāryaparampare asmiñ jāte jane khacarabhūcarasiddhasaṅghaḥ ।
āsthānalokaracanena tathaiva tasthāv anyo'nyasaṃvadanapūjitapūjyalokaḥ ।। 

bodhāntaravismayavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatitamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

vasiṣṭhamunisaṃyuktā viśvāmitrādisaṃyutā ।
sthitakhecarasiddhaughā viśrāntanṛpanāyakā ।। 

sarāmalakṣmaṇā saiva tathaivātha sabhā babhau ।
somyā samasamābhogā śāntavātyeva padminī ।। 

anapekṣyaiva ca praśnam uvācātha munīśvaraḥ ।
bodhayanti balād eva sānukampā hi sādhavaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājan raghukulākāśaśaśāṅka raghunandana ।
hyo mayā dhyānanetreṇa sa bhikṣuḥ prekṣitaś ciram ।। 

dhyānenāhaṃ ciraṃ bhrāntas tādṛgbhikṣudidṛkṣayā ।
dvīpāni sapta vipulāṃs tathaiva kulaparvatān ।। 

yāvat kutaścid apy eva bhikṣur labdho na tādṛśaḥ ।
kathaṃ kila manorājyaṃ bahir apy upalabhyate ।। 

tatas tribhāgaśeṣāyāṃ rātrau punar ahaṃ dhiyā ।
uttarāśāntaraṃ yāto velāvāta ivārṇavam ।। 

cīnanāmātha tatrāsti śrīmāñ janapado mahān ।
valmīkopari tatrāsti vihāro jinasaṃśrayaḥ ।। 

tasmin vihāre svakuṭīkośe kapilamūrdhajaḥ ।
bhikṣur dīrghaśayā nāma sthita evaṃparodayaḥ ।। 

ekaviṃśatirātraṃ ca tasyaivaṃsthitiśālinaḥ ।
dṛḍhārgaḍaṃ gṛhaṃ dhyānabhaṅgabhītā viśanti no ।। 

bhṛtyāḥ prāyaḥ kila tathā sa tiṣṭhati subhikṣukaḥ ।
adyaivaṃ tasya sampannaṃ niyater īdṛśī sthitiḥ ।। 

rātrayo dhyānaniṣṭhasya gatās tasyaikaviṃśatiḥ ।
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tathā citte anubhūtavān ।। 

kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe bhikṣur evaṃ purābhavat ।
adya tv iha dvitīyo asti tṛtīyo nopalabhyate ।। 

mayā tu punar anviṣṭaś cetasā caturātmanā ।
tādṛg bhikṣus tṛtīyo anyo jagatpadmodarālinā ।। 

asmāt sargāt tu no labdhas tṛtīyas tādṛgāśayaḥ ।
athānye līlayā sargā mayā samprekṣitās tataḥ ।। 

yāvat kasmiṃścid ākāśakośaśāyini sargake ।
tṛtīyo vidyate bhikṣur brāhmaṇaś cedṛśakramaḥ ।। 

evaṃ tenaiva tenaiva sanniveśena bhūriśaḥ ।
bhaviṣyanty abhavan santi padārthās sargasantatau ।। 

asyāṃ sabhāyām api ye munayo brāhmaṇā nṛpāḥ ।
bhāvyam evaṃsamācārais tair anyair apy anekaśaḥ ।। 

nāradenāmunā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cānagha ।
evam evātriṇā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cādhunā ।। 

evaṃ kalatrakarmabhyāṃ yuktenānena bhūriśaḥ ।
evaṃjanmādinā bhāvyaṃ vyāsena ca śukena ca ।। 

janakena punar bhāvyaṃ kratunā pulahena ca ।
agastyena pulastyena bhṛguṇāṅgirasāpi ca ।। 

eta eva tathānye ca evaṃrūpakriyāspadam ।
cirāc cirād bhaviṣyanti māyeyaṃ vitatā yataḥ ।। 

sadṛśācārajanmānas ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyo vivartante sargeṣv apsv iva vīcayaḥ ।। 

atyantasadṛśāḥ kecit kecid ardhasamakramāḥ ।
kecid īṣatsamāḥ kecin na kadācit punas tathā ।। 

evam eṣātivitatā māyā manasi mohinī ।
kṣaṇo nehāsti no kalpaḥ pratipattir hi jṛmbhate ।। 

kvaikaviṃśatyahorātrā anantāḥ kva kuyonayaḥ ।
kva tāsām upalambho alam aho bhīmā manogatiḥ ।। 

pratibhāmātram evedam itthaṃ vikasitaṃ sitam ।
nānākalahakallolacalaṃ prātar ivāmbujam ।। 

jātaṃ saṃvedanād eva śuddhād idam aśuddhavat ।
saṃsārajālam akhilaṃ vahnir vahnikaṇād iva ।। 

pratyekam evam uditaḥ pratibhāsaṣaṇḍaṣ ṣaṇḍāntareṣv api ca tatra vicitraṣaṇḍāḥ ।
sarve svayaṃ nanu ca te ca mitho na mithyā sarvātmani sphurati kāraṇakāraṇe asmin ।। 

ekasaptatitamas sargaḥ

daśarathaḥ

munināyaka taṃ bhikṣuṃ gatvā sambodhayantv amī ।
narā matprahitāś śīghraṃ cīnabuddhakuṭīgatam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rājaṃs tasya mahābhikṣos sa dehaḥ prāṇavarjitaḥ ।
kledaṃ vaivarṇyam āyāto nāsau jīvitabhājanam ।। 

tasya bhikṣoś ca jīvo asau bhūtvā padmajasārasaḥ ।
jīvanmuktas sthito bhūyo nāsau saṃsṛtibhājanam ।। 

tadgṛhe māsaparyante balān niṣkāsitārgaḍāḥ ।
antar ālokayiṣyanti bhikṣum akṣuṇṇamānasam ।। 

anyenaiva sa dehena bhikṣur mukto vyavasthitaḥ ।
kathaṃ prabodhyate naṣṭaṃ tadvihāre śarīrakam ।। 

eṣā guṇamayī māyā durbodhena duratyayā ।
nityaṃ satyāvabodhena sukhenaivātivāhyate ।। 

asatyaiva kṛtārambhā hemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā ।
pratibhāsaviparyāsamātrakāraṇakodayā ।। 

paramātmana eveyam itthaṃ māyeti mīyate ।
taraṅgateva payasi prekṣāmātravināśinī ।। 

jño api dṛśyamayād dīrghasvapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan ।
evaṃ nānyatvam āyāti vivekāt sarvagātmadṛk ।। 

yo yo asya pratibhāsas syād ātmaiva sa sa bodhataḥ ।
sa evodeti saṃsārakarañjavanagulmadṛk ।। 

pratyekaṃ bhūtam uditaṃ pṛthak saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।
bhikṣos svapnāntaram iva parād vīcir ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

prasṛtaḥ padmajād eva jagatsvapno ayam āditaḥ ।
tathaivātha svacittotkarūḍhas sarvajanaṃ prati ।। 

āpitāmaham ābhāti sargas svapnavilāsavat ।
pratyekam uditas tena brahmāṇḍānīha koṭiśaḥ ।। 

sphuran parasmin pratyekaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam ।
hṛdaye arthasamarthaṃ ca svapnavad dīrgham āntaram ।। 

citsattāmātrasāmānyapratīticyutimātrataḥ ।
jarāmaraṇaduḥkhānāṃ kaścid bhājanatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

pātālaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā cic camatkṛtiśālinī ।
cittāṃśaspandamātreṇa kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā ।। 

cit spandarūpiṇī jīvanāmnāgatyātmanātmani ।
anyatrānyeva luṭhati bhūtvā sambhramabhāriṇī ।। 

bibheṣi paramātmātmā paramātmana eva kim ।
jīvadehādināmno asmāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇy eva paraṃ brahma jagaddṛṣṭyaiva sat sthitam ।
śuddhākāśam ivākāśe jale jalam ivāmalam ।। 

loko brahmaṇa evāyaṃ jagadrūpeṇa tiṣṭhataḥ ।
bibhety anyatayopāttāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

spande aspandīkṛte bodhāc citas sañjñā vilīyate ।
sāpy alaṃ pariṇāmena līyate agnau ghṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

citspanda eva citspande sarvātmātmani jṛmbhate ।
spandāspandau jṛmbhaṇādi kalpitaṃ nātra vāstavam ।। 

na spando astīha nāspando naikatā nāpi ca dvitā ।
śuddhacinmātram evāsti sarvaṃ cāsti yathāsthitam ।। 

pareṇa pariṇāmena sargāhantārthayoś śame ।
cinmātram api nāsty eva nāstīty api na vidyate ।। 

bhedabhāvanayodeti bhedaḥ prakṛtilāñchanaḥ ।
abhedabodhād akhile galite śiṣyate param ।। 

nānātehāsty abodhena so abodho asty anavekṣaṇāt ।
prekṣakaś caiva nāsty eva tasmān niśśaṅkatā parā ।। 

nātas svapno na jāgracchrīr na suṣuptaṃ na turyatā ।
na bandho asti na mokṣo asti nānyad vā kalanātmakam ।। 

śāntir ekā jagannāmnī śāntāv iyam avasthitā ।
abodho asatya evātaḥ kva dṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam ।। 

spando apy aspanda evāsyā nissaṅkalpatayā citeḥ ।
na spandāspandayor bhinnā saṅkalparahitaiva cit ।। 

dvitvaikyādikalārūpas saṅkalpaś cittabhāvanam ।
sa cābhāvanamātreṇa galati brahma śiṣyate ।। 

ciccandrabimbe saṅkalpakalaṅkas sphuratīva yaḥ ।
nāsau kalaṅkas tad viddhi cidghanasya ghanaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

cidghanaś ca na san nāsat sthīyatāṃ tat tate pade ।
ity aśeṣamahābodhasārasaṅgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ।। 

ciccandrabimbāt saṅkalpakalaṅko amṛtavigrahāt ।
tvayā bhāvena sammṛṣṭo bhāvābhāvakṣayātmanā ।। 

bhāvābhāvādikalanāṃ nītvā cinmayatāṃ citā ।
śamollāsavilāsānte samam āssva yathāsukham ।। 

spandāspandau kalpanākalpanāṃśau cittvān nānyau cit tv anāmā niraṃśā ।
sarvākārānāvṛtiś śāntasattā sattvāpūrṇaikārṇavābhā sthiteti ।। 

brahmaikatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvisaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

suṣuptamaunavān bhūtvā dhūtvā dvitvaikarūpiṇīm ।
kalanāṃ kānta cidrūpas tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabhya tat padam ।। 

rāmaḥ

vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhamaunaṃ ca vedmy aham ।
suṣuptamaunaṃ mauneśaṃ brahman brūhi kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dvividhaḥ procyate rāma munir munivarair iha ।
ekaḥ kāṣṭhatapasvī ca jīvanmuktas tathetaraḥ ।। 

abhāvitātmā śuṣkāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ baddhaniścayaḥ ।
haṭhāj jitendriyagrāmo munis syāt kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ ।। 

yathābhūtam idaṃ buddhvā bhāvitātmātmani sthitaḥ ।
lokopamo api tṛpto antar yas sa muktamunis smṛtaḥ ।। 

etayor yo bhaved bhāvaś śāntayor munināthayoḥ ।
cittaniścayarūpātmā maunaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ ।। 

catuṣprakāram āhus tan maunaṃ maunavido janāḥ ।
vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ sauṣuptam eva ca ।। 

vāṅmaunaṃ vacasāṃ rodho balād indriyanigrahaḥ ।
akṣamaunaṃ parityāgaś ceṣṭānāṃ kāṣṭhasañjñakam ।। 

manomaunaṃ pañcamaṃ yat tan mṛte kāṣṭhatāpase ।
bhavet suṣuptamaunākhyaṃ jīvanmukte hi jīvati ।। 

triṣu maunaviśeṣeṣu viṣayaḥ kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ ।
suṣuptamaunāvasthāyāś caturthyāś caiva muktadhīḥ ।। 

vāṅmaunaṃ maunam ity eva siddhaṃ tac ca manaḥkalā- ।
malinaṃ jīvabandhāya tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ ।। 

haṭhād vā yogayuktyaiva yas svākṣāṇāṃ vinigrahaḥ ।
tad akṣamaunam ity āhus tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ ।। 

asmaran saṃsmaran vāpi dṛśyaṃ vāgdvayam aspṛśan ।
apaśyann eva paśyantīṃ kāṣṭhamaunī hi tiṣṭhati ।। 

prasphuraccittakalanam etan maunatrayaṃ smṛtam ।
sambhavaty ajñamuniṣu na tu tajjñeṣu līlayā ।। 

nātropādeyatā jñānām etan maunatrayaṃ kila ।
līlayā helayā vāpi tajjñāḥ kurvanti vā na vā ।। 

idaṃ suṣuptamaunaṃ tu jīvanmuktamatisthitam ।
apunarjanmane jantoś śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।। 

nātra saṃyamyate vāṇī trividhā nāpi cojjhyate ।
nollāsyante na jīyante samastendriyasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

nānātākalaneyaṃ hi na valgati na śāmyati ।
ceto na ceto nāceto na san nāsan na khaṃ na gauḥ ।। 

avibhāgam anāyāsaṃ yad anādyantam āsitam ।
dhyāyato dhāvataś caiva sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat ।। 

yathābhūtam imaṃ buddhvā jagannānātvavibhramam ।
yad āsitam asaṅgehaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat ।। 

anekasaṃvidrūpātma caikam evedam ātatam ।
ity āsitam anantaṃ yat sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat ।। 

ākāśaṃ naiva cākāśaṃ sarvam asmi na cāsmi ca ।
iti sthitaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ yat tan maunaṃ suṣuptavat ।। 

sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirālambaṃ śāntaṃ vijñaptimātrakam ।
na san nāsad iti svastham āsitaṃ maunam uttamam ।। 

bhāvābhāvadaśonmeṣaviśeṣair vitathotthitaiḥ ।
saṃvido yad anāmarśas tan maunaṃ paramaṃ viduḥ ।। 

asataiva satevāntaś cetasā vṛttirūpiṇā ।
yad anāvartanaṃ saṃvidvṛttes tan maunam akṣayam ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo asti na mano na ca mānasam ।
iti saṃvidasaṃvittir avicchinnātimaunatā ।। 

aham asmi jagac cāsti tv astiśabdārthamātrakam ।
sattāsāmānyam eveti sauṣuptaṃ maunam ucyate ।। 

sattvāt saṃvida evānyās svapnādikalanāḥ kutaḥ ।
anantam eva sauṣuptaṃ sarvaṃ maunam atas tatam ।। 

suṣuptamaunam evedam anantatvāt prabodhavat ।
turyam evāmalaṃ viddhi turyātītam athāpi vā ।। 

suṣuptaikasamādhānas tathā turyasamādhikaḥ ।
turyātītasamādhir vā jāgraty api bhaveta vai ।। 

turyastha eva sakalāmalaśāntavṛttir jāgraty api vyavaharan nipuṇaṃ svapitvā ।
nityaṃ sadeha uta vāpi videha eva brāhmaṃ nabho bhava tad eva kilāsi sādho ।। 

om ity apāstabhavavāsanam ekam āssva na tvaṃ na cāham iti kiñcid ihāsti satyam ।
sarvaṃ ca vidyata itīha śilāntarābhaṃ jñas tiṣṭha cidgaganakośakalaikaniṣṭhaḥ ।। 

mahāmaunayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

trisaptatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kutaś śatatvam āyātaṃ rudrāṇāṃ munināyaka ।
ye gaṇās te ca kiṃ rudrā uta neti vadasva me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapnānāṃ bhikṣuṇā dṛṣṭaṃ śataṃ śataśarīrakam ।
sarvam uddeśato jñātam ata uktaṃ na tan mayā ।। 

yad ākārāś śataṃ svapne tat tad gaṇaśataṃ smṛtam ।
tad eva tad rudraśataṃ rudrā api gaṇābhidhāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ekasmād bhagavaṃś cittāt kathaṃ cittaśataṃ kṛtam ।
tatsvapnaśatarudreṇa dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nirāvaraṇasadbhāvā yad yathā kalpayanti ye ।
tat tathāśu bhavaty eva na sāvaraṇasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

sarvātmanas sarvagatvād yad yathā yatra bhāvyate ।
tathānubhūyate tatra tat tat tajjñena nādhiyā ।। 

rāmaḥ

kapālamālābharaṇo bhasmasnāyī digambaraḥ ।
śmaśānanilayo brahman kāmukaś ca maheśvaraḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

maheśvarāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ jīvanmuktaśarīriṇām ।
na kriyāniyamo astīha sa hy ajñeṣv eva kalpitaḥ ।। 

ajñās tv ajitacittatvāt kriyāniyamanaṃ vinā ।
gardhān mātsyena nyāyena paraṃ duḥkhaṃ prayānti hi ।। 

tajjñās tv iṣṭeṣv aniṣṭeṣu na nimajjanti vastuṣu ।
jitendriyatvād buddhatvān nirvāsanatayānayā ।। 

kākatālīyavad rūḍhāṃ kriyāṃ kurvanti te sadā ।
na kurvanty api vā kecin naiṣāṃ kvacid api grahaḥ ।। 

kākatālīyavad viṣṇur evaṃkarmoditaḥ parāt ।
evaṃkarmā trinayana evaṃkarmāmbujodbhavaḥ ।। 

na nindyam asti nānindyaṃ nopādeyaṃ na heyakam ।
na cātmīyaṃ na ca paraṃ karma jñaviṣayaṃ kvacit ।। 

agnyādīnāṃ yathauṣṇyādi sargādau rūḍhim āgatam ।
harādīnāṃ tathā karma dvijātīnāṃ ca jātayaḥ ।। 

sarge prarūḍhim āyāte saṅketavaśataḥ pṛthak ।
anubhūtaphalais svārthāḥ kalpanāḥ kalpitās tataḥ ।। 

videhamuktaviṣayaṃ turyaṃ maunam ito mayā ।
noktaṃ te pañcamaṃ maunaṃ videhasya raghūdvaha ।। 

khād apy atitarām accham ātmākāśaṃ cidātmakam ।
tatra prāptiḥ paraṃ śreyas sā kathaṃ prāpyate śṛṇu ।। 

samyagjñānāvabodhena nityam ekasamādhinā ।
saṅkhyayaivāvabuddhā ye te sāṅkhyā yoginas smṛtāḥ ।। 

prāṇādyanilasaṃśāntau yuktā ye padam āgatāḥ ।
anāmayam anādyantaṃ te smṛtā yogayoginaḥ ।। 

upādeyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śāntaṃ padam akṛtrimam ।
tat kaiścit saṅkhyayā prāptaṃ kaiścid yogena dehataḥ ।। 

ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।
yat sāṅkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ paraṃ yogais tad eva hi ।। 

yatra prāptā manovṛttir atyantaṃ nopalabhyate ।
vāsanāvāgurākrāntā tad viddhi paramaṃ padam ।। 

vāsanāṃ cittam evāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ tad dhi saṃsṛteḥ ।
tad akāraṇatām eti vilīya bhavakarmasu ।। 

manaḥ paśyati vai dehaṃ bālo vetālakaṃ yathā ।
ātmānaṃ vilayaṃ nītvā na bhūyas taṃ prapaśyati ।। 

mano mudhaivābhyuditam asad evānavekṣaṇāt ।
svapne svamaraṇākāraṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ na vidyate ।। 

mano'bhāvān na saṃsāraḥ kvāmodaḥ kusumaṃ vinā ।
upadeśyopadeśādi bandhamokṣau ca tat kutaḥ ।। 

ekatattvaghanābhyāsaḥ prāṇānāṃ vilayas tataḥ ।
manovinigrahaś ceti mokṣaśabdārthakāraṇam ।। 

rāmaḥ

yadi hi prāṇavilayo mune mokṣasya kāraṇam ।
mṛtā eva hi mucyante tan manye sarvajantavaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

triṣv eteṣu prayogeṣu manaḥpraśamanaṃ varam ।
sādhyaṃ viddhi tad evāśu yathā bhavati tac chivam ।। 

yadā nirvāsanaṃ prāṇās tyajantīdaṃ śarīrakam ।
tadā na bhūyas tanmātrair yānti vyomani saṅgamam ।। 

vāsanāṃśātmakāny eva viddhi tanmātrakāṇi vai ।
tadātmakair manovadbhiḥ prāṇāś śliṣyanti netaraiḥ ।। 

savāsanās tu yady ete prāṇā muñcanti dehakam ।
tad vyomavāyusaṃśleṣaṃ yānti duḥkhāya gandhavat ।। 

manas sāmbur ivāmbhodo na śāmyati savāsanam ।
nāmanaskās sambhavanti prāṇās sūryā ivātviṣaḥ ।। 

na jahāti manaḥ prāṇān vinā jñānena karhicit ।
tṛṇāntareṇaiva vinā tṛṇāgram iva tittiriḥ ।। 

jñānād avāsanībhāvaṃ svanāśaṃ prāpya vai manaḥ ।
prāṇaspandaṃ ca nādatte tataś śāntir hi śiṣyate ।। 

jñānāt sarvapadārthānām asattvaṃ samudety alam ।
tato aṅga vāsanānāśād viyogaḥ prāṇacetasoḥ ।। 

tato na paśyati manaḥ praśāntaṃ dehatāṃ punaḥ ।
svanāśena padaṃ prāptaṃ vāsanaiva mano viduḥ ।। 

ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ tadabhāvaḥ paraṃ padam ।
tac ca sampadyate jñānāj jñānam āhur vicāraṇam ।। 

ity asyās saṃsṛte rāma paryantas sampravartate ।
svayaṃ vivekamātreṇa rajjusarpabhramākṛteḥ ।। 

ekārthābhyasanaprāṇarodhacetaḥparikṣayāḥ ।
ekasminn eva saṃsiddhe saṃsidhyanti parasparam ।। 

tālavṛntaparispande śānte śānto yathānilaḥ ।
prāṇānilaparispande śānte śāntaṃ tathā manaḥ ।। 

prāṇāś śarīravilaye prayānti vyomavāyutām ।
yathāvāsitam evedaṃ manaḥ paśyanti tatra ca ।। 

yathā videhāḥ paśyanti prāṇā vyomani dehakam ।
samanaskās tathācāraṃ sarvaṃ cānubhavanti te ।। 

śānte vātaparispande yathā gandhaḥ praśāmyati ।
tathā śānte manasspande śāmyanti prāṇavāyavaḥ ।। 

avinābhāvinī nityaṃ jantūnāṃ prāṇacetasī ।
kusumāmodavan miśre tilataile iva sthite ।। 

manasas spandanaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇasya spandanaṃ manaḥ ।
ete viharato nityam anyo'nyaṃ rathasārathī ।। 

ādhārādheyavat tv ete ekābhāve vinaśyataḥ ।
kurutaś ca svanāśena kāryaṃ mokṣākhyam uttamam ।। 

ekatattvaghanābhyāsāc chāntaṃ śāmyaty alaṃ manaḥ ।
tallayatvāt svabhāvasya tena prāṇo api śāmyati ।। 

vicārya yad anantātmatattvaṃ tanmayatāṃ nayet ।
manas tatas tallayatas tad eva bhavati sthiram ।। 

yad evātitarāṃ śreyo anupalambhopalambhayoḥ ।
dvayor apy asatos tatra śeṣe vāpi sthiro bhava ।। 

ekasmin sudṛḍhe tattve tāvad bhāvaṃ vibhāvayet ।
bhāvo abhāvatvam āyāti svābhyāsād yāvad ātatam ।। 

pratyāhāravaśāc cetas svayaṃ bhogyakṣayād iva ।
vilīyate saha prāṇaiḥ param evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

yadekatānaṃ bhavati cetas tad bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaughaṃ cirābhyāsasvabhāvataḥ ।। 

avidyeyaṃ tu nāstīti buddhvā yuktiyutaṃ dhiyā ।
jñānād eva parāvāptis tadabhyāsas tato varam ।। 

citte śānte śāmyatīyaṃ saṃsāramṛgatṛṣṇikā ।
jarām upagate meghe mihikā mahatī yathā ।। 

cittamātram avidyeti kuru tenaiva tatkṣayam ।
tadrūpanāma cittātmānubhāvo hi paraṃ padam ।। 

muhūrtam eva nirvāṇaṃ yadi cetaḥ pare pade ।
tat tatpariṇataṃ viddhi tatraivāsvādam āgatam ।। 

yadi sāṅkhyena viśrāntaṃ ceto yogena vā pade ।
kṣaṇaṃ tat sattvatāṃ yātaṃ na bhūyaḥ parijāyate ।। 

ceto vigalitāvidyaṃ sattvaśabdena kathyate ।
dagdhaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ tan na dadyād aṅkuraṃ punaḥ ।। 

jñaś cidvigalitāvidyas sattvasthaś śāntavāsanaḥ ।
samaṃ śūnyopamaṃ śāntaṃ jyotiḥ paśyati śāmyati ।। 

vigalitājñapadaṃ vimalaṃ manas subhaga sattvam itīha hi kathyate ।
na punar eti kalāmalinaṃ padaṃ kanakatām iva tāmram upāgatam ।। 

prāṇamanassaṃyogavicāro nāma sargaḥ

catussaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jīvo ajīvībhavaty āśu yāti cittam acittatām ।
vicārād ity avidyānto mokṣa ity abhidhīyate ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇājalam iva sargo ahantādi dṛśyate ।
asad eva manāg eva tad vicārāt pralīyate ।। 

saṃsṛtisvapnaviśrāntau vetālodāhṛtān imān ।
praśnān ākarṇaya śubhān prasaṅgāt smṛtim āgatān ।। 

asti vindhyamahāṭavyāṃ vetālo vipulākṛtiḥ ।
sa kiñcin maṇḍalaṃ gardhād ājagāma jighatsayā ।। 

sa vetālo avasat pūrvaṃ kasmiṃścit sajjanāspade ।
bahubalyupahāreṇa nityatṛptatayā sukhī ।। 

nirnimittaṃ nirāgaskaṃ na tenāsau purogatam ।
kṣudhito api naraṃ hanti saṅgo hi nyāyadaiśikaḥ ।। 

sa kālenāṭavīgeho jagāma nagarāntaram ।
nyāyayuktyā janaṃ bhoktuṃ kṣudhā samabhicoditaḥ ।। 

tatra prāpa sa bhūpālaṃ rātricaryāvinirgatam ।
tam āha ghanaghoreṇa śabdenograniśācaraḥ ।। 

vetālaḥ

rājaṃl labdho asi bhīmena vetālena mayādhunā ।
kva gacchasi vinaṣṭo asi bhavān bhojanam adya me ।। 

rājā

bho rātricara nirnyāyaṃ māṃ ced atsi balād iha ।
tat te sahasradhā mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

vetālaḥ

na tvām admy aham anyāyaṃ nyāyo ayaṃ tu mayocyate ।
rājāsi sakalāśāś ca pūraṇīyās tvayārthinām ।। 

mamemām arthitāṃ rājan sambhavārthaṃ prapūraya ।
praśnān imān mayoktāṃs tvaṃ samyag vyākhyātum arhasi ।। 

kasya sūryasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍāny aṇavaḥ kṛśāḥ ।
kasmin sphuranti pavane mahāgaganareṇavaḥ ।। 

svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ gacchañ śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
tyajan na tyajati svacchaṃ kas svarūpaṃ prabhāsuram ।। 

rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram eva punaḥ punaḥ ।
antar antas tathāntaś ca tathā ko aṇus sa eva hi ।। 

brahmāṇḍākāśabhūtaughasūryamaṇḍalameravaḥ ।
aparityajato aṇutvaṃ kasyāṇoḥ paramāṇavaḥ ।। 

kasyānavayavasyaiva paramāṇumahāgireḥ ।
śilāntar nibiḍaikāntarūpo majjā jagattrayī ।। 

iti kathayasi cen na me durātmaṃs tad iha nigīrya bhavantam ātmaghātin ।
phalam iva tava maṇḍalaṃ graseyaṃ prasabham upetya jagad yathā kṛtāntaḥ ।। 

vetālapraśno nāma sargaḥ

pañcasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktavati vetāle vaktuṃ praśnān vihasya saḥ ।
uvāca vacanaṃ rājā dantāṃśudhavalānanaḥ ।। 

rājā

asti cittiktatātmedaṃ brahmāṇḍamaricaṃ phalam ।
uttarottarasaṃvṛttabhūtatvakpariveṣṭitam ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi phalānāṃ yatra santi hi ।
asty uccais tādṛśī śākhā vipulā calapallavā ।। 

tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi śākhānāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛśo asti mahāvṛkṣo durlakṣyo vipulākṛtiḥ ।। 

yatra santi sahasrāṇi tādṛśānāṃ mahīruhām ।
tādṛśaṃ vanam asty uccair anantatarugulmakam ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi vanānāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛg asti bṛhac chṛṅgam atyuccair bharitākṛti ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śṛṅgāṇāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛśo asti mahāśailaḥ pūritākhiladiktaṭaḥ ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śailānāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛśo asty ativistīrṇo deśo vipulakoṭaraḥ ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi deśānāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛg asti bṛhad dvīpaṃ mahāhradanadīvṛtam ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi dvīpānāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛg asti mahīpīṭhaṃ vicitraracanānvitam ।। 

tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi pṛthvīnāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛg asti jagat sphāraṃ mahābhuvanapañjaram ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi jagatāṃ yatra santy atha ।
tādṛg asti mahac cāṇḍaṃ caṇḍāḍambarapīṭhavat ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi yatrāṇḍāṇāṃ taraṅgakaḥ ।
tādṛśo avirataspando vipulo asty atha sāgaraḥ ।। 

tādṛksāgaralakṣyāṇi taraṅgo yatra pelavaḥ ।
tādṛśas svavilāsātmā nirmalo asti mahārṇavaḥ ।। 

tādṛṃśy abdhisahasrāṇi yasyodarajalāny atha ।
tādṛśo asti pumān kaścid atyuccair bharitākṛtiḥ ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ nṛṇāṃ lakṣair yasya mālorasi sthitā ।
pradhānaṃ sarvasattānāṃ tādṛśo asty aparaḥ pumān ।। 

tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ mahātmanām ।
sphuranti maṇḍale yasya svatanūruhajālavat ।। 

tādṛśo asti mahādityas sa tapaty āsu dṛṣṭiṣu ।
yā etāḥ kalanās sarvās tā etās tasya dīptayaḥ ।। 

asyādityasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ trasareṇuvat ।
eṣa citsūrya ity uktas sarvam etat tapaty asau ।। 

vijñānātmaiṣa paramo bhāskaro bhāvibhāsanaḥ ।
ime ye bhuvanābhogās tasyaiva trasareṇavaḥ ।। 

vijñānaparamārkasya bhāsā bhānti bhavanti ca ।
imā jagadaharlakṣmyas tv aharlakṣmyo raver iva ।। 

vijñānamātrakacitātmani jantujāte trailokyamaṇḍapagaṇe ca vikāsabhāji ।
nirmajjanodbhavanasambhramabhāvalekhās santīva neha hi manāg api śāntam āssva ।। 

paramamahāmārtāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭsaptatitamas sargaḥ

rājā

kālasattā nabhassattā spandasattā ca cinmayī ।
śuddhacetanasattātha sarvam ityādi pāvanam ।। 

paramātmamahāvāyau rajas sphurati cañcalam ।
kusumāntar ivāmodas tadatadrūpakaṃ svataḥ ।। 

jagadākhye mahāsvapne svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajet ।
rūpaṃ tyajati no śāntaṃ brahma śāntatvabṛṃhitam ।। 

saṅkalpaparibṛṃheyam anantasphuraṇā svataḥ ।
yathā yathābhibṛṃhābhir bṛṃhaty ābṛṃhitā tathā ।। 

saṅkalpaś ca parād asmān manāg api na bhidyate ।
cinmayatvāt tataḥ kiñcin na bṛṃhāsti na bṛṃhaṇam ।। 

rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram evāntarāntarā ।
antar antas tathedaṃ hi viśvaṃ brahma vivarty atha ।। 

sabrahmātmādibhiś śabdair yad etair abhidhīyate ।
śūnyam avyapadeśyaṃ tan na nakiñcin na kiñcana ।। 

yā yā vibhāvyate sattā sā sānubhavanirmitā ।
rambhāstambhavad evātaś cinmātram amalaṃ tatam ।। 

sūkṣmatvād apy alabhyatvāt paramātmā paro aṇukaḥ ।
anantatvād asāv eva prokto mervādidhūlimān ।। 

aṇor apy atyanantasya puro asya jagadādy api ।
paramāṇuvad ābhāti pramitatvād arūpavat ।। 

paro aṇur eṣo alabhyatvāt pūrakatvān mahāgiriḥ ।
sarvāvayavarūpo api nirastāvayavaḥ pumān ।। 

asya vijñaptimātrasya majjāmātraṃ jagattrayī ।
vijñānamātramadhyaṃ hi sādho viddhi jagattrayam ।। 

vijñānamātram akalākalitaṃ jaganti śāntaṃ svabhāvasukumāram anantarūpam ।
vetālabālaka padaṃ tad alaṅghanīyam evaṃsmayas samanubhāvaya śāntam āssva ।। 

vetālapraśnabhedo nāma sargaḥ

saptasaptatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti rājamukhāc chrutvā vetālaś śāntim āyayau ।
bhāvitātmatayā tatra vicāroditayā dhiyā ।। 

upaśāntavapur bhūtvā gatvaikāntam aninditaḥ ।
babhūvāvicaladhyānī vismṛtya viṣamāṃ kṣudham ।। 

etad rāma mayoktaṃ te vetālapraśnajālakam ।
evaṃkrameṇa cidaṇāv evedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ jagat ।। 

cidaṇoḥ kośagaṃ viśvaṃ vicāreṇa vilīyate ।
kopo vetālakasyeva śiṣyate yat paraṃ tu tat ।। 

saṃhṛtya sarvataś cittaṃ stimitenāntarātmanā ।
pravāhāpatitaṃ kurvan niricchas tiṣṭha śāntadhīḥ ।। 

ākāśaviśadaṃ kṛtvā manasaiva mano muniḥ ।
tiṣṭhaikaśamaśāntātmā vyomavadviśadāśayaḥ ।। 

sthirabuddher amūḍhasya yathāprāptānuvartinaḥ ।
rājño bhagīrathasyeva dussādham api sidhyati ।। 

sampūrṇaśāntamanasaḥ paritṛptavṛtter nityaṃ same susamam ātmani tiṣṭhato antaḥ ।
sidhyanti durlabhatarā api vāñchitārthā gaṅgāvatāra iva sāgarakhātṛnaptuḥ ।। 

vetālopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

vetālopākhyānaṃ samāptam nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭasaptatitamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yathā cittacamatkṛtyā rājño gaṅgāvatāraṇam ।
bhagīrathasya sampannaṃ tan me kathaya bhoḥ prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

āsīd bhagīratho nāma rājā paramadhārmikaḥ ।
bhuvas samudradvīpāyā maṇḍanātilakopamaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpānantaraṃ prāpur yathābhimatam arthinaḥ ।
candraprasannavadanād yasmāc cintāmaṇer iva ।। 

sādhūnāṃ yo vyavasthārthaṃ dhanāny avirataṃ dadau ।
tṛṇamātram upādatte karaṃ tṛṇamaṇir yathā ।। 

vajrasāram api protam ajvalann eva yo abhinat ।
ayomaṇir ayoyantram iva durjanaceṣṭitam ।। 

adhūmo hy adahañ śīto vitaikṣṇyo hārdam apy alam ।
tamo aharan nṛṇāṃ naiśaṃ yo maṇir veśmanām iva ।। 

kirann agnikaṇāsāram abhitas svapratāpajam ।
madhyāhnasūryakāntāgnir iva jvalati yo ariṣu ।। 

mṛduśītasukhasparśo yas samāhlādayan mahīm ।
sve jane dravati snigdhas sendur indumaṇir yathā ।। 

jagadyajñopavītasya svargapātālavāhinaḥ ।
gaṅgāvāhasya yenorvyāṃ tṛtīyaḥ pūrito guṇaḥ ।। 

agastyaśoṣito ambhodhir gaṅgāpūreṇa pūritaḥ ।
yena duṣpūrarūpo api mahāsārtho arthinām iva ।। 

gaṅgāsopānapaddhatyā yena pātālavāsinaḥ ।
yojitā brahmaṇo loke bāndhavā lokabandhunā ।। 

brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ tapasārādhayaṃś ca yaḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyo yayau khedaṃ na mūrtavyavasāyavat ।। 

yauvane vartamānasya tasya bhūmipater atha ।
pravicārayato lokayātrāṃ paryākulām imām ।। 

svavirāgacamatkāravicārakaṇikodabhūt ।
cetasy api sutāruṇye daivād vallī marāv iva ।। 

ekānte cintayām āsa mahīpatir asāv atha ।
jagadyātrām imāṃ nityam asamañjasasaṅkulām ।। 

punar dinaṃ punaś śyāmā dānādānāśanaṃ punaḥ ।
tad eva śuktavirasaṃ lajjyate karma kurvatā ।। 

yena prāptena loke asmin nāprāptam avaśiṣyate ।
tat kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ manye śeṣaṃ karmaviṣūcikā ।। 

punaḥ punaḥ paryuṣitaṃ karma kurvan na lajjate ।
mūḍhabuddhir amūḍhas tu kaḥ kuryāt kila bālavat ।। 

athaikadodvignamanāḥ kadācit tryuttulaṃ gurum ।
ekānte saṃsṛter bhītas samapṛcchad bhagīrathaḥ ।। 

bhagīrathaḥ

antaśśūnyāsu suciraṃ bhraman saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।
araṇyānīṣv ivaitāsu bhṛśaṃ khinnā vayaṃ vibho ।। 

jarāmaraṇamohādirūpāṇāṃ bhavakāriṇām ।
bhagavan sarvaduḥkhānāṃ katham antaḥ prajāyate ।। 

tryuttulaḥ

cirasāmyātmanācchena nirvibhāgavilāsinā ।
rājañ jñeyāvabodhena pūrṇena bharitātmanā ।। 

kṣīyante sarvaduḥkhāni truṭyanti granthayo abhitaḥ ।
saṃśayāś śamam āyānti sarvakarmāṇi cānagha ।। 

jñeyaṃ tu vidur ātmānaṃ saṃśuddhajñaptirūpiṇam ।
sa ca sarvagato nityaṃ nāstam eti na codayam ।। 

bhagīrathaḥ

cinmātraṃ sarvagaṃ śāntam asti nirmalam acyutam ।
dehādi netarat kiñcid iti vedmi munīśvara ।। 

kiṃ tv atra pratipattir me sphuṭatām eti notarām ।
etāvanmātrasaṃvittis syām ahaṃ bhagavan katham ।। 

tryuttulaḥ

jñānena jñeyaniṣṭhatvam eti ceto hṛdantare ।
tatas sarvavapur bhūtvā bhūyo jīvo na jāyate ।। 

asaktir anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu ।
nityaṃ ca samacittatvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu ।। 

ātmano ananyayogena sadbhāvanam anāratam ।
viviktadeśasevitvam aratir janasaṃsadi ।। 

adhyātmajñānaniṣṭhatvaṃ tattvajñānārthadarśanam ।
etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato anyathā ।। 

rāgadveṣakṣayākārāt saṃsāravyādhibheṣajāt ।
ahambhāvopaśāntau tu rājañ jñānam avāpyate ।। 

bhagīrathaḥ

śarīre asmiṃś ciraṃ rūḍho girau tarur ivoccakaiḥ ।
ahambhāvo mahābhogo vada me tyajyate katham ।। 

tryuttulaḥ

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tyaktvā bhogaughabhāvanam ।
gatvānviṣya citā tattvam ahaṅkāro vilīyate ।। 

yantrāṇāṃ pañjaraṃ yāvad bhagnaṃ lajjādi nākhilam ।
akiñcanatvaśeṣeṇa sphuṭā tāvad ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

sarvam eva dhiyas tyaktvā yadi tiṣṭhasi niścalaḥ ।
tad ahaṅkāravilayī tvam eva paramaṃ padam ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṇo vigatabhīs santyaktasarvaiṣaṇo gatvā nūnam akiñcanatvam ariṣu tyaktvā samagrāṃ śriyam ।
śāntāhaṅkṛtir astadehakalanas teṣv eva bhikṣām aṭan mām apy ujjhitavān alaṃ yadi bhavasy uccais tad uccair asi ।। 

bhagīrathasyopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha tasya guror vaktrād ity ākarṇya bhagīrathaḥ ।
manasy āhitakartavyas svavyāpāraparo abhavat ।। 

tataḥ katipayeṣv eva vāsareṣu gateṣv asau ।
agniṣṭomamakhaṃ cakre sarvatyāgaikasiddhaye ।। 

gobhūmyaśvahiraṇyādi dadau dhanam aśeṣataḥ ।
dvijadevārtabandhubhyo guṇyaguṇyavicāravān ।। 

divasatrayamātreṇa sarvam evaṃ parityajan ।
svavastramātraśeṣo asāv āsīd rājā bhagīrathaḥ ।। 

atha sarvārthariktaṃ taṃ khinnaprakṛtipaurakam ।
sīmāntine tṛṇam iva rājyaṃ svam araye dadau ।। 

ākrānte dviṣatā rājye pure sadmani maṇḍale ।
adhovāso'vaśeṣo asau nirjagāma svamaṇḍalāt ।। 

yatra na jñāyate nāmnā yatra na jñāyate mukhāt ।
tatra grāmeṣv araṇyeṣu dūreṣūvāsa dhairyavān ।। 

ity alpenaiva kālena praśāntasakalaiṣaṇaḥ ।
parameṇa śamenāsau prāpa viśrāntim ātmani ।। 

bhraman dvīpāni bhūpīṭhe kadācit kālayogataḥ ।
bhūpena śatruṇā prāptaṃ svam eva prāpa tat puram ।। 

tān evārīṃś ca tatrāsau pravāhāpatitakramam ।
paurāṃś ca mantriṇaś caiva śamī bhikṣām ayācata ।। 

vividus te arayaḥ paurā mantriṇaś ca bhagīratham ।
pūjayām āsur atha taṃ saviṣādās saparyayā ।। 

prabho rājyaṃ gṛhāṇeti prārthito apy ariṇā muniḥ ।
nādade anādṛtāśeṣas tṛṇam apy aśanād ṛte ।। 

katicid divasāṃs tatra nītvānyatra jagāma saḥ ।
bhagīratho ayaṃ hā kaṣṭam iti lokena śocitaḥ ।। 

athānyatropaśāntātmā pariviśrāntadhīs sukhī ।
ātmārāmaḥ kadācit tu sa prāpa tryuttulaṃ gurum ।। 

svam eva svāgataṃ kṛtvā tena sārdhaṃ bhagīrathaḥ ।
kañcit kālam uvāsādrau vane grāme pure jane ।। 

samatām upayātau tau guruśiṣyau samau sthitau ।
kalayām āsatus svasthau vinodaṃ dehadhāraṇam ।। 

kim ayaṃ dhāryate dehaḥ kim anenojjhitena naḥ ।
yathākramaṃ yathācāraṃ tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam ।। 

iti niścitya tiṣṭhantau tau vanād vanagāminau ।
nanandatur anānandaṃ na sukhaṃ na ca madhyamam ।। 

dhanāni nārīr vibhavān aiśvaryaṃ cāṣṭadhoditam ।
siddhair apy arpitaṃ tuṣṭair menāte jarjaraṃ tṛṇam ।। 

svakarmaṇaiva deho ayaṃ yāvadantam anicchayā ।
dhāraṇīya iti svena karmaṇaivātha tasthatuḥ ।। 

abhinanandatur āgatam uttamau nijasamācaraṇakramajaṃ munī ।
sukham asaukhyam apīpsitavarjitau samasamau khasamau śaminau svataḥ ।। 

bhagīrathanirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athaikadā puraśreṣṭhe kasmiṃścin maṇḍalāntare ।
anapatyaṃ nṛpaṃ mṛtyur aharat svam ivāmiṣam ।। 

tatra prakṛtayaḥ khinnā naṣṭadeśakramā nṛpam ।
anviṣyanti sma saṃyuktaṃ guṇalakṣmyā viśālayā ।। 

tā bhagīratham āsādya sthitaṃ bhikṣāśanaṃ pure ।
parijñāya samānīya sainyaṃ cakrur mahīpatim ।। 

bhagīrathaḥ kṣaṇenaiva prāvṛṣīvāmbunā saraḥ ।
dhūlitas senayā gurvyā jhagity āropito gaje ।। 

bhagīratho jagannātho jayatīti ghanāravaiḥ ।
nīrandhratām upājagmur girīndrāṇāṃ mahāguhāḥ ।। 

tatra tat pālayantaṃ taṃ rājyaṃ rājānam ādṛtāḥ ।
ājagmuḥ prākprakṛtayaḥ prāhur itthaṃ mṛtādhipāḥ ।। 

prakṛtayaḥ

rājann asmākam adhipo yas tvayā sa purā kṛtaḥ ।
mṛtyunā vinigīrṇo asau matsyenevāmiṣaṃ mṛdu ।। 

tat tat pālayituṃ rājyaṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi ।
aprārthitopapannānāṃ tyāgo arthānāṃ tu nocitaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti samprārthito rājā tad aṅgīkṛtya tadvacaḥ ।
sarvasāgaracihnāyās sa babhūva patir bhuvaḥ ।। 

samaś śāntamanā maunī vītarāgo vimatsaraḥ ।
kāryakāryaikakaraṇaratir āhitavismayaḥ ।। 

pātālatalanaṣṭānāṃ sāgarākārakāriṇām ।
pitāmahānāṃ gaṅgāmbu śuśrāvottāraṇakṣamam ।। 

tadā kila svarganadī vahati sma na bhūtale ।
pitṝṇāṃ durlabhas so abhūt tena gaṅgājalāñjaliḥ ।। 

bhagīrathenātha mahīm avatārayituṃ divaḥ ।
gaṅgāṃ gṛhīto niyamas tadā prabhṛti bhūbhṛtā ।। 

tato rājyaṃ parityajya mantriṇāṃ bhūpatiś śamī ।
tapase kāryakāryeho jagāma gahanaṃ vanam ।। 

tatra varṣasahasrais sa samārādhya punaḥ punaḥ ।
brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ bhuvi gaṅgām ayojayat ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛty amalataraṅgabhaṅginī jagatpateś śaśiviśadāṅgasaṅginī ।
nabhastalān nipatati gāṃ trimārgagā mahātmanām iva bahupuṇyasantatiḥ ।। 

sphurattaraṅgabhaṅginī svaphenapuñjahāsinī prasannapuṇyamañjarī druteva dharmasantatiḥ ।
bhagīrathe mahīpatau yaśaḥpracāravīthikā tadādi sā trimārgagā mahītale babhūva ha ।। 

gaṅgāvatāro nāma sargaḥ

ekāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etām avaṣṭabhya dṛśaṃ bhagīrathadhiyā vṛtām ।
samas svastho yathāprāptaṃ kāryam āhara śāntadhīḥ ।। 

idaṃ pūrvaṃ parityajya kroḍīkṛtya tatas svayam ।
śāntam ātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ śikhidhvaja ivācalaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ko asau śikhidhvajo nāma kathaṃ vā labdhavān padam ।
etat kathaya me brahman bhūyo bodhābhivṛddhaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dvāpare abhavatāṃ pūrvam idānīṃ ca bhaviṣyataḥ ।
tenaiva sanniveśena dampatī snigdhanāgarau ।। 

rāmaḥ

yat pūrvam āsīd bhagavaṃs tad idānīṃ tathaiva hi ।
bhaviṣyati kimarthaṃ vai vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jagannirmāṇaniyater asyā brāhmyās svasaṃvidaḥ ।
īdṛśy eva sthitir nityam anivāryā svabhāvajā ।। 

yad anyad bahuśo bhūtvā punar bhavati bhūriśaḥ ।
abhūtvaiva bhavaty anyat punaś ca na bhavaty alam ।। 

anyat prāksanniveśasya sādṛśyena sphuraty alam ।
anyat prāksanniveśārdhasādṛśyena vivalgati ।। 

sadṛśyo viṣamāś caiva yathā sarasi vīcayaḥ ।
tā evānyāś ca dṛśyante vyavasthās saṃsṛtau tathā ।। 

tasmād rāghava bhūyo api vakṣyamāṇo nareśvaraḥ ।
bhaviṣyati mahātejās tadvṛttāntam imaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

dvāpare pūrvam abhavad atīte saptame manau ।
caturyuge caturthe tu sarge asmin vāraṇākule ।। 

jambudvīpe praśāntasya vindhyasyādūrasaṃsthite ।
mālavānāṃ pure śrīmāñ śikhidhvaja itīśvaraḥ ।। 

dhairyaudāryadayāyuktaḥ kṣamāśamadamānvitaḥ ।
śūraś śubhasamācāro mānī guṇagaṇākaraḥ ।। 

āhartā sarvayajñānāṃ jetā sarvadhanuṣmatām ।
kartā sakalakāryāṇāṃ bhartāpūrvavapur bhuvaḥ ।। 

peśalas snigdhamadhuro vidagdhaḥ prītanāgaraḥ ।
sundaraś śīlasubhagaḥ pratāpī dharmavatsalaḥ ।। 

veditā viditārthānāṃ dātā sakalasampadām ।
bhoktā saṃsaṅgarahitas suśrotā sakalaśruteḥ ।। 

sa bhogaughān anādṛtya straiṇaṃ tṛṇavad utsṛjan ।
pitari svargam āpanne bāla evottamaujasā ।। 

kṛtvā ṣoḍaśavarṣātmā kṛtvā digvijayaṃ vaśī ।
nūnaṃ saurājyasampattyā bhūmaṇḍalam ayojayat ।। 

atiṣṭhad vigatāśaṅkaṃ pālayan dharmataḥ prajāḥ ।
dhīmān sa mantribhis sārdhaṃ yaśasā śuklayan diśaḥ ।। 

atha gacchatsu varṣeṣu vasante prollasaty alam ।
puṣpeṣu jṛmbhamāṇeṣu sphuratsu śaśiraśmiṣu ।। 

mañjarījāladolāsu viṭapāntaḥpurāntare ।
rajaḥkarpūradhavale caladdalakavāṭake ।। 

āmodini lasatpuṣpagulucchakavitānake ।
gāyatsu gahaneṣūccair mithuneṣv alināṃ mithaḥ ।। 

āyāti madhure vāyau śaśiśīkaraśītale ।
kadalīkandalīkacchatalapallavalāsini ।। 

kāntāṃ prati babhūvāsya navaṃ cetas samutsukam ।
kṣīvaṃ kusumasambhārasaugandhimadhurāsavaiḥ ।। 

manorājyam idaṃ cakre sa vasantamadaidhitaḥ ।
udyānavanadolāsu līlākamalinīṣu ca ।। 

kadā praṇayinīṃ mugdhāṃ bālābjamukulastanīm ।
kariṣye kāminīm aṅke paryaṅke kusumāṅkitām ।। 

kadā kamalavallīnāṃ dolāsv alir ivālinīm ।
ālolatāṃ vineṣyāmi bālāṃ bhujalatānugām ।। 

mṛṇālahārakundenduvṛndatalpābhilāṣiṇī ।
matkṛte madanātaptā kadā syād indusundarī ।। 

iti cintāparo bhūtvā kusumāvalanonmukhaḥ ।
vijahāra vanānteṣu kusumopavaneṣu ca ।। 

velopavanadolāsu līlākamalinīṣu ca ।
vallīvalayageheṣu vividhodyānabhūmiṣu ।। 

vanopavanavinyāsavarṇanāvalitāsu ca ।
śṛṅgārarasagarbhāsu kathāsv aramatonmanāḥ ।। 

hārihāsalasacchvāsavilolālakavallarīḥ ।
kumārīḥ pūjayām āsa suvarṇakalaśastanīḥ ।। 

evam asya vidur bhavyā mantriṇo navaniścayam ।
iṅgitākāraveditvam eva mantripadaṃ param ।। 

atha tasya vivāhāya mantrivargo vicāravān ।
surāṣṭrādhipatiṃ kanyāṃ yayāce yauvanānvitām ।। 

rūpayauvanasampannāṃ bhāryātve vidhinottamām ।
upayeme sa tām ātmasadṛśīṃ pratimām iva ।। 

cūḍāleti bhuvi khyātā nāmnā nṛpatisundarī ।
sā taṃ bhartāram āsādya reje phulleva padminī ।। 

nīlanīrajanetrāṃ tāṃ cūḍālāṃ sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
snehād vikāsayām āsa śobhayārka ivābjinīṃ ।। 

avardhata tayoḥ prītir anyo'nyārpitacetasoḥ ।
hāvabhāvavilāsādyais sekair navalateva sā ।। 

sa mantryarpitasarvārthas susukhī susthitaprajaḥ ।
rājahaṃsa ivābjinyā reme dayitayā tayā ।। 

antaḥpureṣu dolāsu candanāguruvīthiṣu ।
mandāradāmadolāsu kadalīkandalīṣu ca ।। 

purānteṣu vanānteṣu diganteṣu sarassu ca ।
jaṅgaleṣu dinānteṣu jambūjambīraśāliṣu ।। 

babhūvāhlādakaṃ sarvaṃ tayor anyo'nyaceṣṭitam ।
sadvarṣaṇādhvarācārair dyubhūmyor iva kāntayoḥ ।। 

nityam evāviyuktatvāt priyatvāc ceṣṭitasya ca ।
mithaḥ kalākalāpasya kovidau tau babhūvatuḥ ।। 

svarūpam ekam evaitau dadhatur miśratāṃ gatau ।
anyo'nyaṃ hṛdayasthatvād iva saṅkrāntam akṣatam ।। 

sarvaśāstrādivaidagdhyaṃ citrādy api mukhāt prabhoḥ ।
bālā bhāṇḍād ivāgṛhṇād āsīt sarvārthapaṇḍitā ।। 

nṛttaṃ vādyādi geyādi cūḍālāvadanād asau ।
aśikṣata babhūvātha kalānām atikovidaḥ ।। 

āmāvāsyāv ivendvarkāv anyo'nyaṃ vilasatkalau ।
mitho hṛdayasaṃsthau tau dvāv apy aikyam ivāsthitau ।। 

tau saṃsthitāv ekarasāv ananyadayitāv ubhau ।
puṣpāmodāv ivābhinnau bhūtalasthau śivāv iva ।। 

vaidagdhyasundaramatī sarvaśāstrārthakovidau ।
krīḍayeva bhuvaṃ prāptau kamalākamalādhavau ।। 

snehāt prasannamadhurau samavijñānavedinau ।
anuvṛttiparāv āstāṃ lokavṛttāntatadvidau ।। 

kalākalāpasampannau lasadrasarasāyanau ।
śītalasnigdhamugdhāṅgau śaśāṅkau dvāv ivoditau ।। 

reje lasannṛpatibhogavilāsakāntam antaḥpureṣu mithunaṃ tad anuttamaśri ।
brahmābjaṣaṇḍakuhareṣv iva rājahaṃsayugmaṃ vikāsimadamanmathamandacāri ।। 

śikhidhvajavilāso nāma sargaḥ

dvyaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi mithunaṃ nirbharaspṛham ।
reme yauvanalīlābhir anantābhir dine dine ।। 

atha yāteṣu varṣeṣu bahuṣv āvṛttiśāliṣu ।
śanair galati tāruṇye bhinnakumbhād ivāmbhasi ।। 

śāradasyeva parṇasya mithunasyāsya kālataḥ ।
īṣadvirāgo hṛdayaṃ samyakprāgrasam aspṛśat ।। 

virāgavāsanākrāntam ekāntastham acintayat ।
mithunaṃ taj jagadyātrām imām ittham aśāśvatīm ।। 

kiṃ nāmeha manohāri saṃsārakuharabhrame ।
taraṅganikarākārabhaṅguravyavahāriṇi ।। 

pātaḥ pakvaphalasyeva maraṇaṃ durnivāraṇam ।
himāśanir ivāmbhoje jarā nipatanonmukhī ।। 

āyur galaty avirataṃ jalaṃ karatalād iva ।
prāvṛṣīva latātumbī tṛṣṇaikā dīrghatāṃ gatā ।। 

śailanadyā raya iva samprayāty eva yauvanam ।
indrajālam ivāsatyaṃ jīvitaṃ kṣaṇasaṃsthiti ।। 

sukhāni prapalāyante śarā iva guṇacyutāḥ ।
patanti ceto duḥkhāni dhṛṣṭā gṛdhrā ivāmiṣam ।। 

budbudaḥ prāvṛṣīvāpsu śarīraṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguram ।
rambhāgarbha ivāsāro vyavahāro virāgadaḥ ।। 

satvaraṃ yuvatā yātā kāntevāpriyakāminaḥ ।
balād aratir āyātā vairasyam iva pādapam ।। 

tad iha syāt kusaṃsāre kiṃ nāma bata śobhanam ।
yad āsādya punaś ceto daśāsu na vidūyate ।। 

iti nirṇīya yugmaṃ tat saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam ।
ciraṃ vicārayām āsa śāstram adhyātma sammatam ।। 

ātmajñānaikamantreṇa saṃsṛtyākhyā viṣūcikā ।
saṃśāmyatīti niścitya tāv āstāṃ tatparāyaṇau ।। 

taccittau tadgataprāṇau tatkathau tadvidāśrayau ।
tadvidekārcanaparau tadīhau tau babhūvatuḥ ।। 

tatraivātighanābhyāsau bodhayantau parasparam ।
tatprītau tatsamārambhau cirakālaṃ babhūvatuḥ ।। 

atha sāvirataṃ bālā ramaṇīyapadakramān ।
śrutvādhyātmavidāṃ vaktrāc chāstrārthāṃs tāraṇakṣamān ।। 

itthaṃ vicārayām āsa svam ātmānam aharniśam ।
avyāpṛtā vyāpṛtā ca dhiyā dhavalayāśaye ।। 

prekṣe tāvat svam ātmānaṃ kim idaṃ syām iti svayam ।
kasyāyaṃ jāgato mohaḥ katham abhyutthitaḥ kva vā ।। 

dehas tāvaj jaḍo mūko nāham ity eva niścayaḥ ।
ābālam etat saṃsiddhaṃ mṛtau caivānubhūyate ।। 

karmendriyagaṇaś cāsya na bhinno avayavātmakaḥ ।
avayavāvayavinor abhedāj jaḍa eva ca ।। 

buddhīndriyagaṇo apy evaṃ jaḍa eveti dṛśyate ।
preryate manasā yasmād yaṣṭyeva bhuvi loṣṭakaḥ ।। 

manaś caiva jaḍaṃ manye saṅkalpātmakaśaktimat ।
kṣepaṇair iva pāṣāṇaḥ preryate buddhiniścayaiḥ ।। 

buddhir niścayarūpaivaṃ jaḍāsatyeti niścayaḥ ।
khāteneva sarit svairam ahaṅkāreṇa vāhyate ।। 

ahaṅkāro api nissāro jaḍa evaṃ śavātmakaḥ ।
jīvena janyate yakṣo bāleneva bhramātmakaḥ ।। 

jīvaś ca kalanākāro vātātmā hṛdaye sthitaḥ ।
śukrasāro antar anyena kenāpi parijīvati ।। 

ām aho jñātam etena cetyollekhakalaṅkinā ।
jīvo jīvati jīvena cidrūpeṇātmarūpiṇā ।। 

cetyabhramavatā jīvaś cidrūpeṇaiva jīvati ।
āmodaḥ pavaneneva khāteneva saridrayaḥ ।। 

asatyajaḍacetyāṃśaśrayaṇāc cidvapur jaḍam ।
mahājaḍagato hy agnir api rūpaṃ svam ujjhati ।। 

sad vāsad vā yad ābhāsi cit samācāmati svataḥ ।
svaṃ rūpam alam utsṛjya tad eva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

evaṃ cidrūpam apy etac cetyonmukhatayā svayam ।
jaḍaṃ śūnyam asaṅkalpaṃ cetaty anyaprabodhitam ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā kenaiṣā cit pracetate ।
iti sañcintayām āsa cirāc cetthaṃ vyabudhyata ।। 

aho nu cirakālena jñātaṃ jñeyam anāmayam ।
yad vai ciccamitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcid dūyate punaḥ ।। 

ete hi cidvilāsāntā manobuddhīndriyādayaḥ ।
asantas santa evāho dvitīyenduvad āsthitāḥ ।। 

mahācid ekaivāstīha mahāsatteti yocyate ।
niṣkalaṅkā samā śuddhā nirahaṅkārarūpiṇī ।। 

śuddhasaṃvedanākārā śivaṃ cinmātram acyutā ।
sakṛdvibhātā vimalā nityodayavatī sthitā ।। 

sadbrahmaparamātmādināmabhir yābhidhīyate ।
cetyacetanacittādi nāsyā bhinnaṃ na sā tataḥ ।। 

tayaiṣā cetyate cicchrīs saiṣādyā cid iti smṛtā ।
acetyaṃ yad idaṃ cittvaṃ tat tasyā rūpam akṣatam ।। 

manobuddhīndriyādyartharūpais saivaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
taraṅgakaṇakallolavalanair ambv ivātmani ।। 

jagadbhūtapadārthānāṃ sattā sphurati sāntare ।
yad idaṃ tat paraṃ rūpaṃ tasyāḥ khalu mahāciteḥ ।। 

śuddhasaṃvinmahāsiṃhī seyaṃ samasamoditā ।
ananyayaivānyayeva jagajjṛmbhikayā sthitā ।। 

sattā tadvyatirekeṇa nānyā sambhavatīha hi ।
vicitrahemabhāṇḍānāṃ nanu hemetarā yathā ।। 

sā yathodeti tadrūpam ātmānaṃ cetati svayam ।
svacittvena dravatvena taraṅgāditvam ambv iva ।। 

mahācito jagac cittvād udetīvānudayy api ।
tadātmaiva yathāvarto rūpavāñ jaladhau dravāt ।। 

evaṃ cinmātram evāham anahambhāvam ātatam ।
na tasya janmamaraṇe na ca stas sadasadgatī ।। 

na nāśas sambhavaty asya cinmātranabhasaḥ kvacit ।
acchedyo ayam adāhyo ayaṃ cidātmā nityanirmalaḥ ।। 

aho nu cirakālena śāntāsmi parinirvṛtā ।
nirvāsitamatir muktam āse nirmandarābdhivat ।। 

asadābhāsam atyaccham anantam ajam acyutam ।
ātmākāśam anāyāsam avalambya rame ciram ।। 

anantam idam ākāśaṃ bhūtaughaś cācalādikaḥ ।
surāsurayutaṃ viśvam etanmayam akṛtrimam ।। 

pustakarmamayī senā sarvā mṛṇmātrakaṃ yathā ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyadṛśāṃ sattā cinmātraikamayī tathā ।। 

idam aikyam idaṃ dvitvam ahaṃ nāham itīti ca ।
ka iha bhramasammohaḥ kathaṃ kasya kutaḥ kva vā ।। 

tad anantam anāyāsam upaśāntāsmi khaṃ sthitā ।
nirvāmi parinirvāṇā satyam āse gatajvaram ।। 

acetanaṃ cetanaṃ vā yo yo nāmābhicetati ।
sattāmātrātma tadrūpaṃ svaṃ mahāciti saṃsthitam ।। 

teneha nāham nānyaś ca na bhāvābhāvasambhavaḥ ।
śāntaṃ sarvaṃ nirālambaṃ kevalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ param ।। 

itthaṃ vicāraṇaparā paramāvabodhād buddhvā yathāsthitam idaṃ paramātmatattvam ।
saṃśāntarāgabhayamohamanovilāsā śāntā babhūva śaradambaralekhikeva ।। 

cūḍālāprabodho nāma sargaḥ

tryaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dinānudinam eṣātha svātmārāmatayā tayā ।
nityam antarmukhatayā babhūva prakṛtisthitiḥ ।। 

nīrāgā nīrujāsaṅgā nirdvandvā nissamīhitā ।
na jahāti na cādatte prakṛtācāracāriṇī ।। 

paritīrṇā bhavāmbhodhiṃ śāntasandehajālikā ।
paramātmamahālābhaparipūrṇatarāntarā ।। 

viśrāntā suciraśrāntā ghanalabdhapadātmani ।
sarvopamātītatayā jagāmāvyapadeśyatām ।। 

iti sā mahiṣī tasya cūḍālā varavarṇinī ।
svalpenaiva hi kālena yayau viditavedyatām ।। 

yathāyam āgataḥ kaścij jāgatas spandavibhramaḥ ।
yathā ca līyate sarvaṃ tat taj jñātavatī babhau ।। 

adṛṣṭasakalabhrāntau pade viśrāntim etya sā ।
rarāja śaradacchābhramāleva gatasambhramā ।। 

anākulasamāloke āśaśvāsātmanātmani ।
jaradgur iva śailāgraṃ satṛṇaṃ prāpya saṃsthitā ।। 

svavivekaghanābhyāsavaśād ātmodayena sā ।
śuśubhe śobhanā puṣpalatevābhinavodgatā ।। 

atha tām anavadyāṅgīṃ kadācit sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
apūrvaśobhām ālokya smayamāna uvāca ha ।। 

bhūyo yauvanayukteva maṇḍiteva punaḥ punaḥ ।
adhikaṃ rājase tanvi jagadrājyavatī yathā ।। 

prapītāmṛtasāreva labdhālabhyapadeva ca ।
ānandāpūrapūrṇeva rājase atitarāṃ priye ।। 

upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dadhānā sundaraṃ vapuḥ ।
abhibhūyendum āyāsi śriyaṃ kām api kāmini ।। 

abhogakṛpaṇaṃ śāntam ūrjitaṃ samatāṃ gatam ।
gambhīraṃ ca prasannaṃ ca cetaḥ paśyāmi te priye ।। 

tṛṇīkṛtatribhuvanaṃ pītākhilajagattrayam ।
anantodbhāsuraṃ saumyaṃ manaḥ paśyāmi te priye ।। 

na kenacin mahābhāge vibhavānandavastunā ।
cetas tava tulām eti merukṣīrābdhisundaram ।। 

tair eva bālakadalīmṛṇālāṅkurakomalaiḥ ।
aṅgais sthitim anujjhadbhir vṛddhiṃ yāteva lakṣyase ।। 

tathā tenaiva tenaiva sanniveśena saṃsthitā ।
anyatām upayātāsi latevartuviparyaye ।। 

kiṃ tvayā pītam amṛtaṃ prāptaṃ sāmrājyam eva vā ।
amṛtyave vā samprāptaḥ prayogo yogayuktibhiḥ ।। 

rājyāc cintāmaṇer vāpi trailokyād vā tvayādhikam ।
aprāpyaṃ kim anuprāptaṃ nīlotpalavilocane ।। 

cūḍālā

nakiñcit kiñcidākāram idaṃ tyaktvāham āgatā ।
nakiñcitkiñcidākāraṃ tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

yat kiñcid yan nakiñcic ca taj jānāmi yathāsthitam ।
yathodayaṃ yathānāśaṃ tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

bhogair abhuktais tuṣyāmi bhuktair iva sudūragaiḥ ।
na hṛṣyāmi na kupyāmi tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

ekaivākāśasaṅkāśe kevale hṛdaye rame ।
na rame rājalīlāsu tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

ātmany eva hi tiṣṭhāmi na vanodyānasadmasu ।
na bhogaugheṣu śayyāsu tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

jagatāṃ prabhur evāsmi nakiñcinmātrarūpiṇī ।
ity ātmany eva tiṣṭhāmi tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

anyaivāham iyaṃ nāham anyā ceyaṃ ca vāpy aham ।
sarvam asmi nakiñcid vā tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

yat paśyāmi na paśyāmi tat paśyāmy anyad eva yat ।
iti samyak prapaśyāmi tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

na sukhaṃ prārthaye nārthaṃ nānarthaṃ cetarāṃ sthitim ।
yathāpraptena tuṣyāmi tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

tanuvidveṣarāgābhis tajjñābhiś śāstradṛṣṭiṣu ।
rame saha vayasyābhis tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā ।। 

paśyāmi yan nayanaraśmibhir indriyair vā cittena ceha hi tad aṅga na kiñcid eva ।
paśyāmi tadvirahitaṃ tu nakiñcidābhaṃ paśyāmi samyag iti nātha cirodayāsmi ।। 

cūḍālātmalābho nāma sargaḥ

caturaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam ātmani viśrāntāṃ vadantīṃ tāṃ varānanām ।
asambaddhapralāpāsi bālāsīti vadañ śanaiḥ ।। 

bhogalampaṭayā buddhyā mugdhām āśaṅkya tāṃ priyām ।
abuddhvā tadgirām arthaṃ vihasyovāca bhūpatiḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

asambaddhapralāpāsi bālāsi varavarṇini ।
ramase vākyalīlābhī ramasvāvanipātmaje ।। 

kiñcit tyaktvā nakiñcid yo gataḥ pratyakṣasaṃsthitam ।
tyaktapratyakṣasadrūpas sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

bhogair abhuktais tuṣṭo aham iti bhogāñ jahāti yaḥ ।
ruṣevāśanapānādyān sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

vāhanāśanaśayyādi sarvaṃ santyajya dhīradhīḥ ।
yas tiṣṭhaty ātmanaivaikas sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

svayaṃ nakiñcid evāhaṃ jagadīśo asmi ceti ca ।
niścayo yasya durbuddhes sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

ātmany evātmanaikānte tyaktasarvasamāgamaḥ ।
yas sthitaś śvabhrataruvat sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

nāhaṃ deho anyad evāhaṃ nakiñcit sarvam eva hi ।
evaṃ pralāpo yasyāsti sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

yat paśyāmi na paśyāmi tat paśyāmy anyad eva yat ।
pralāpa ity asan yasya sa kathaṃ kila śobhate ।। 

tasmān mugdhāsi bālāsi capalāsi vilāsini ।
nānālāpavilāsena krīḍasi krīḍa sundari ।। 

pravihasyāṭṭahāsena śikhidhvaja iti priyām ।
madhyāhne snātum utthāya nirjagāmāṅganāgṛhāt ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ nātmani viśrānto madvacāṃsi na buddhavān ।
rājeti khinnā cūḍālā svavyāpāraparābhavat ।। 

tadā tathāṅga tatrātha tādṛśāśayayos tayoḥ ।
tābhiḥ pārthivalīlābhir divasas sa jagāma ha ।। 

krameṇa māsā ṛtavo rāma saṃvatsarās tathā ।
atītā bahavas tatra dampatyos snigdhayos tayoḥ ।। 

ekadā nityatṛptāyā niricchāyā api svayam ।
cūḍālāyā babhūvecchā līlayā khagamāgame ।। 

khagamāgamasiddhyartham atha sā nṛpakanyakā ।
sarvabhogān anādṛtya samāgamya ca nirjanam ।। 

ekaivaikāntaniratā svāsanāvasthitāṅgakā ।
ūrdhvagaprāṇapavanacirābhyāsaṃ cakāra ha ।। 

rāmaḥ

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sasthāsnujaṅgamam ।
spandasya tat kriyānāmnaḥ phalam ity anubhūyate ।। 

kasya spandavilāsasya ghanābhyāsasya me vada ।
brahman khagamanādy etat phalaṃ yatnaikaśālinaḥ ।। 

ātmajño vāpy anātmajñas siddhyarthaṃ līlayā tathā ।
kathaṃ saṃsādhayaty etad yathāvad vada me vibho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

trividhaṃ sambhavaty aṅga sādhyaṃ vastv iha sarvataḥ ।
upādeyaṃ ca heyaṃ ca tathopekṣyaṃ ca rāghava ।। 

ātmabhūtaṃ prayatnena hy upādeyaṃ tu sādhyate ।
heyaṃ santyajyate jñātvā hy upekṣyaṃ madhyam etayoḥ ।। 

yad yad āhlādanakaram ādeyaṃ tad asanmateḥ ।
tadviruddham anādeyam upekṣyaṃ madhyamaṃ viduḥ ।। 

sanmater viduṣo jñasya sarvam ātmamayaṃ yadā ।
traya eva tadā pakṣās sambhavanti na kecana ।। 

kevalaṃ sarvam evedaṃ kadācil līlayā na vā ।
upekṣyam akṣinikṣiptam ālokayati vā na vā ।। 

jñasyopekṣyātmakaṃ rāma mūḍhasyādeyatāṃ gatam ।
heyaṃ sphāravirāgasya śṛṇu siddhikramaṃ katham ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyasādhanās sarvasiddhayaḥ ।
jīvam āhlādayantīha vasanta iva bhūtalam ।। 

madhye caturṇām eteṣāṃ kriyā prathamakalpikī ।
siddhyādisādhane sādhos tanmayās te yataḥ kramāḥ ।। 

gulikāñjanakhaḍgādikriyākramanirūpaṇam ।
tatrāstāṃ tāvad eṣo atra vistāraḥ prakṛtārthahā ।। 

ratnauṣadhitapomantrakriyākramanirūpaṇam ।
tatrāstāṃ tāvad eṣo atra vistāraḥ prakṛtārthahā ।। 

śrīśaile siddhadeśe ca mervādau vā nivāsataḥ ।
siddhir ity api vistāraḥ kriyotthā prakṛtārthahā ।। 

tasmāc chikhidhvajakathāprasaṅgapatitām imām ।
prāṇādipavanābhyāsakriyāṃ siddhiphalāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

samūlam akhilās tyaktvā sādhyārthetaravāsanāḥ ।
gudādidvārasaṅkocāt sthānakādikriyākramaiḥ ।। 

bhojanāsanaśuddhyā ca sādhuśāstrārthabhāvanāt ।
svācārāt sujanāsaṅgāt sarvatyāgāt sukhāsanāt ।। 

prāṇāyāmaghanābhyāsād rāma kālena kenacit ।
kopalobhādisantyāgād bhogatyāgāc ca suvrata ।। 

tyāgādānanirodheṣu bhṛśaṃ yānti vidheyatām ।
prāṇāḥ prabhutvatajjñasya puṃso bhṛtyā ivākhilāḥ ।। 

rājyādyā mokṣaparyantās samastā eva sampadaḥ ।
dehānilavidheyatvasādhyās sarvasya rāghava ।। 

parimaṇḍalitākārā kandasthānasamāśritā ।
antraveṣṭanikā nāma nāḍī nāḍīśatāśritā ।। 

vīṇāgrāvartasadṛśī salilāvartasannibhā ।
lipyādyoṅkārasaṃsthānā kuntalāvartavat sthitā ।। 

devāsuramanuṣyeṣu mṛganakrakhagādiṣu ।
kīṭādiṣv abjajānteṣu sarveṣu prāṇiṣūditā ।। 

śītārtasuptabhogīndrabhogavad baddhamaṇḍalā ।
sitā kalpāgnivigaladinduvad baddhakuṇḍalā ।। 

manobhrūmadhyarandhrādhoviśadabvṛtticañcalā ।
anārataṃ rasasyandaiḥ plavamānaiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

asyā abhyantare tasmin kadalīkośakomale ।
yā vātaśaktis sphurati veṇāv iva lasadgatiḥ ।। 

soktā kuṇḍalinī nāmnā kuṇḍalākāravāhinī ।
prāṇinaḥ paramā śaktis sarvaśaktijavapradā ।। 

aniśaṃ niśśvasadrūpā kupiteva bhujaṅgamī ।
saṃsthitordhvīkṛtamukhī spandānāṃ hetutāṃ gatā ।। 

yadā prāṇānilo yāti hṛdi kuṇḍalinīpadam ।
tadā saṃvid udety antar bhūtatanmātrabījabhūḥ ।। 

yadā kuṇḍalinī dehe sphuraty abja ivālinī ।
tadā saṃvid udety antar mṛdusparśavaśodayā ।। 

sparśena mṛdunā nāḍyā liṅgakāmātapatrayoḥ ।
yathā saṃvid udety uccais tathā kuṇḍalinī javāt ।। 

tasyāṃ samastās sambaddhā nāḍyo hṛdayakośagāḥ ।
utpadyante vilīyante mahārṇava ivāpagāḥ ।। 

nityaṃ vātātmakatayā spandonmukhatayā tayā ।
sā sarvasaṃvidāṃ bījam ekam ādyam udāhṛtam ।। 

rāmaḥ

dikkālādyanavacchinnā citsaṃvit sarvagāsti hi ।
tasyāḥ kuṇḍalinīkośāt kenārthenodayas sphuṭaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvadā sarvatas satyaṃ citsaṃvid vidyate anagha ।
kiṃ tv asyā bhūtatanmātravaśād abhyudayaḥ kvacit ।। 

sarvatra vidyamānā cid deheṣu taralāyate ।
sarvago apy ātapas sāraratneṣv ativijṛmbhate ।। 

kvacin naṣṭaṃ kvacit suptaṃ kvacid ucchūnatāṃ gatam ।
vastu vastuni yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat svabhāvavijṛmbhitam ।। 

etad bhūyaḥ krameṇāhaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te anagha ।
deheṣv eva yathodeti bhṛśaṃ saṃvinmayaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

cetanācetanaṃ bhūtajātaṃ vyoma tathākhilam ।
sarvaṃ cinmātrasanmātraṃ śūnyamātraṃ yathā nabhaḥ ।। 

tad dhi cinmātrasanmātram avikārādy anāmayam ।
kvacit sthitaṃ saṃvidaiva kṛtatanmātrapañcakam ।। 

tat pañcakaṃ gataṃ dvitvaṃ likṣādyantaṃ svasaṃvidā ।
antarbhūtavikārādi dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā ।। 

svasattāmātrakeṇaiva saṅkalpalavarūpiṇā ।
pañcakāni vrajantīha devatvaṃ tāni kānicit ।। 

kānicit tiryagāditvaṃ hemāditvaṃ ca kānicit ।
kānicid dṛṣadāditvaṃ dravyāditvaṃ ca kānicit ।। 

evaṃ hi pañcakaṃ spandamātraṃ jagad iti sthitam ।
citsaṃvid atra sarvatra vidyate raghunandana ।। 

kevalaṃ pañcakavaśād dehādau cetanābhidhā ।
jaḍaspandābhidhā vāri sthāvarādau jaḍābhidhā ।। 

yathābdhiṣv ambv ito vīcir itas talam iti sthitam ।
pañcakeṣu tathetaś cil lolarūpā jaḍā tv itaḥ ।। 

itas somya ito lolaḥ kim abdhir iti no yathā ।
vikalpārhas tathaivaitat pañcakaṃ hi jaḍājaḍam ।। 

dehādipañcakaṃ jīvatspandi śailādikaṃ jaḍam ।
sthāvarādy anilaspandi svabhāvavaśato anagha ।। 

na ca paryanuyoktavyās svabhāvā raghunandana ।
śītoṣṇaṃ kiṃ himāgnyādi vakteti parihasyate ।। 

gṛhītavāsanāṃśānāṃ puṣṭabhāvavikāriṇām ।
sthitayaḥ pañcakānāṃ hi yogyāḥ paryanuyojane ।। 

vāsanāṃśaviparyastā ito netum itaś ca tāḥ ।
puṃsā prājñena śakyante sukhaṃ paryanuyojinā ।। 

aśubhe vā śubhe vāpi tena paryanuyojyate ।
prabuddhavāsanaṃ nānyat pañcakaṃ suptavāsanam ।। 

yatra paryanuyogasya phalaṃ samanubhūyate ।
tatra taṃ samprayuñjīta nākāśaṃ muṣṭibhiḥ kṣipet ।। 

tṛṇāgraniṣṭhā mervādyāḥ pañcakānāṃ hi rāśayaḥ ।
viriñcaniṣṭhāḥ kīṭādyā ete sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ ।। 

prasuptavāsanāḥ kecid yathā sthāvarajātayaḥ ।
prabuddhavāsanāḥ kecid yathā narasurādayaḥ ।। 

svavāsanābilāḥ kecid yathā vai tiryagādayaḥ ।
prakṣīṇavāsanāḥ kecid yathaite mokṣabhāginaḥ ।। 

yathāsvāsv eva saṃvitsu manobuddhyādibhiḥ kṛtāḥ ।
hastapādādisaṃyuktaiḥ sañjñāḥ pañcakarāśibhiḥ ।। 

tiryagādibhir apy anyair anyās sañjñāḥ prakalpitāḥ ।
sthāvarādibhir apy anyair anyathā saṃvidaḥ kṛtāḥ ।। 

iti sādho sphurantīme citrāḥ pañcakarāśayaḥ ।
rūpair ādyantamadhyeṣu calācalajaḍājaḍaiḥ ।। 

eṣām eko hi saṅkalpaparamāṇur mahāmate ।
bījam ākāśavṛkṣāṇāṃ sargāṇāṃ teṣv imāni tu ।। 

indriyāṇy aṅga puṣpāṇi viṣayāmodavanti hi ।
icchābhramaryo rājantyo mañjaryaś cañcalāḥ kriyāḥ ।। 

lokāntarāṇi gucchāni gulmā malayameravaḥ ।
pallavānīha jaladā latālīlā diśo daśa ।। 

vartamānāni bhūtāni bhaviṣyanti ca yāni tu ।
jaganti tāny asaṅkhyāni phalāni raghunandana ।। 

evaṃbījās ta ete hi rāma pañcakapādapāḥ ।
svayaṃ svabhāvāj jāyante svayaṃ naśyanti kālataḥ ।। 

svayaṃ nānātvam āyānti ciraṃ jāḍyāt sphuranti ca ।
suviviktāś śamaṃ yānti taraṅgā iva toyadheḥ ।। 

yato yānti samutsedhaṃ yato yānti śamaṃ svayam ।
ete jāḍyavivekābhyāṃ taraṅgā iva toyadheḥ ।। 

ye vivekavaśato layaṃ gatā rāma pañcakavilāsarāśayaḥ ।
te na bhūya iha yānti saṃsthitiṃ prabhramanti jagatītare muhuḥ ।। 

pañcakavicārayogo nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat pañcakabījaṃ yat kuṇḍalinyāṃ tad antare ।
prāṇamārutarūpeṇa tasyāṃ sphurati sarvadā ।। 

sāntaḥ kuṇḍalinī spandasparśasaṃvitkalāmalā ।
kaloktā kalanenāśu kathitā cetanena cit ।। 

jīvanāj jīvatāṃ yātā mananāc ca manas sthitā ।
saṅkalpāt saiva saṅkalpo bodhād buddhir iti smṛtā ।। 

ahaṅkārakalāṃ yātā saiṣā puryaṣṭakābhidhā ।
sthitā kuṇḍalinī dehe jīvaśaktir anuttamā ।। 

apānatām upāgatya satataṃ pravahaty adhaḥ ।
samānanāmnī madhyasthā udānākhyoparisthitā ।। 

adhas tv apānarūpaiva madhye somyaiva sarvadā ।
pṛṣṭhād udānarūpaiva puṃsas svasthasya tiṣṭhati ।। 

sarvayatnam adho yātā yadi yatnān na dhāryate ।
tat pumān mṛtim āyāti tayā nirgatayā balāt ।। 

samastaivordhvam āyātā yadi yuktyā na dhāryate ।
tat pumān mṛtyum āyāti tayā nirgatayā balāt ।। 

sarvathātmani cet tiṣṭhet tyaktvordhvādhogamāgamam ।
taj jantor jāyate vyādhir malamārutarodhataḥ ।। 

sāmānyanāḍīvaidhuryāt sāmānyavyādhisambhavaḥ ।
pradhānanāḍīvaidhuryāt pradhānavyādhisambhavaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kiṃvināśāḥ kimutpādāś śarīre asmin munīśvara ।
ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva yathāvat kathayāśu me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam ।
tannivṛttiṃ sukhaṃ vidyāt tatkṣayo mokṣa ucyate ।। 

mithaḥ kadācij jāyete kadācit samam eva tu ।
paryāyeṇa kadācit tāv ādhivyādhī śarīrake ।। 

dehaduḥkhaṃ vidur vyādhim ādhyākhyaṃ vāsanāmayam ।
maurkhyamūle hi te vidyāt tattvajñānaparikṣaye ।। 

atattvajñānavaśatas svendriyākramaṇaṃ vinā ।
hṛdi tānavam ujjhatsu rāgadveṣeṣv anāratam ।। 

idaṃ prāptam idaṃ neti jāḍyāndhyaghanamohadāḥ ।
ādhayas sampravartante varṣāsu mihikā iva ।। 

bhṛśaṃ sphurantīṣv icchāsu maurkhyāc cetasy anirjite ।
durannābhyavahāreṇa durdeśākramaṇena ca ।। 

duṣkālavyavahāreṇa duṣkriyāsphuraṇena ca ।
durjanāsaṅgadoṣeṇa durbhāvodbhavanena ca ।। 

kṣīṇatvād vā prapūrṇatvān nāḍiṣv asukhasaṃsṛtau ।
prāṇe vidhuratāṃ yāte kupatheva navādhvage ।। 

daussthityakāraṇaṃ doṣād vyādhir dehe pravartate ।
nadyāṃ prāvṛṇnidāghābhyām ivākāraviparyayaḥ ।। 

prāktanī vaihikī vāpi śubhā vāpy aśubhā matiḥ ।
yaivādhikā saiva tathā tasmin yojayati krame ।। 

ādhayo vyādhayaś caivaṃ jāyante bhūtapañcake ।
kathaṃ śṛṇu vinaśyanti rāghavāṇāṃ kulodvaha ।। 

dvividho hy ādhir astīha sāmānyas sāra eva ca ।
vyavahāras tu sāmānyas sāro janmamayas smṛtaḥ ।। 

prāptenābhimatenaiva naśyanti vyāvahārikāḥ ।
ādhikṣayeṇādhibhavāḥ kṣīyante vyādhayo apy alam ।। 

ātmajñānaṃ vinā sāro nādhir naśyati rāghava ।
bhūyo rajjvavabodhena rajjusarpo hi naśyati ।। 

ādhivyādhivilāsānāṃ rāma sārādhisaṅkṣayaḥ ।
sarveṣāṃ mūlahā prāvṛṇnadīva taṭavīrudhām ।। 

anādhijā vyādhayas tu dravyamantraśubhakramaiḥ ।
cikitsakādiśāstroktair naśyanty abhrair ivātapāḥ ।। 

snānamantrauṣadhopāyavaktṝṇy adhigatāni ca ।
tvayā cikitsāśāstrāṇi kim anyad upadiśyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

ādheḥ kathaṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ kathaṃ ca sa vinaśyati ।
dravyād itarayā yuktyā mantrapuṇyādipūrvayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

citte vidhurite dehas samyaṅ nānubhavaty ayam ।
yathā hi ruṣito jantur agram eva na paśyati ।। 

anapekṣya yathāprāptam amārgam anudhāvati ।
prakṛtaṃ mārgam utsṛjya śarārto hariṇo yathā ।। 

saṅkṣobhāt sāmyam utsṛjya vahanti prāṇavāyavaḥ ।
dehe gajaghaṭārtāni payāṃsīva sarittaṭe ।। 

asamaṃ vahati prāṇe nāḍyo yānti visaṃsthitim ।
asamyak saṃsthite bhūpe yathā varṇāśramakramāḥ ।। 

kāścin nāḍyaḥ prapūrṇatvaṃ yānti kāścic ca riktatām ।
prāṇe vidhurite deśe sarvartau sarito yathā ।। 

kujīrṇatvam ajīrṇatvam atijīrṇatvam eva vā ।
doṣāyaiva prayāty annaṃ prāṇasañcāraduṣkramaiḥ ।। 

yathā kāṣṭhāni nayati prāptaṃ deśaṃ saridrayaḥ ।
tathānnāni nayaty antaḥ prāṇavātas svam āśrayam ।। 

yāny annāni virodhena tiṣṭhanty antaś śarīrake ।
tāny eva vyādhitāṃ yānti pariṇāmasvabhāvataḥ ।। 

evam ādher bhaved vyādhir ādhyabhāvāc ca naśyati ।
yathā mantraiś ca naśyanti vyādhayas tatkramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yathā virekaṃ kurvanti harītakyas svabhāvataḥ ।
bhāvanāvaśataḥ kāryaṃ tathā yaralavādayaḥ ।। 

śuddhayā puṇyayā sādho kriyayā sādhusevayā ।
manaḥ prayāti vaimalyaṃ nikaṣeṇeva kāñcanam ।। 

ānando vardhate dehe śuddhe cetasi rāghava ।
pūrṇendāv udite vyabhre nairmalyaṃ bhuvane yathā ।। 

sattvaśuddhau vahanty ete krameṇa prāṇavāyavaḥ ।
jarayanti tathānnāni vyādhis tena vinaśyati ।। 

ādhivyādhyor iti proktau nāśotpattikramau tvayi ।
kuṇḍalinyāḥ kathāyogād adhunā prakṛtaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

puryaṣṭakāparākhyasya jīvasya prathamāśrayam ।
viddhi kuṇḍalinīm antar āmodasyeva mañjarīm ।। 

tāṃ yadā pūrakābhyāsād āpūrya sthīyate ciram ।
tadaiti mairavaṃ sthairyaṃ kāyasyāpīnatā tathā ।। 

yadā pūrakapūrṇāntar amuktaprāṇamārutam ।
nīyate saṃvidaivordhvaṃ soḍhagharmaklamaśramaṃ ।। 

sarpī prakupitevoccair yāti daṇḍopamāṃ gatā ।
nāḍīs sarvās samādāya dehe baddhā latopamā ।। 

tadā samastam evemaṃ khaṃ plāvayati dehakam ।
nīrandhrā pavanāpūrṇā bhastrevāmbugataṃ naram ।। 

ityabhyāsavilāsena yogena vyomagāmitām ।
yoginaḥ prāpnuvanty uccair dīnās te sudaśām iva ।। 

brahmanāḍipravāheṇa śaktiḥ kuṇḍalinī yadā ।
bahir ūrdhvapravāheṇa dvādaśāṅgulamūrdhani ।। 

recakena prayogeṇa nāḍyantaranirodhinā ।
muhūrtaṃ sthitim āpnoti tadā vyomagadarśanam ।। 

rāmaḥ

darśanaṃ kīdṛśaṃ brahman nayanāṃśugaṇaṃ vinā ।
anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ ca tattvam evaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

na kecana mahābāho bhūcareṇa nabhaścarāḥ ।
adivyair āśritājñānair dṛśyante puruṣendriyaiḥ ।। 

vijñānādūrasaṃsthena buddhinetreṇa rāghava ।
dṛśyante vyomagās siddhās svapnavat svārthadā api ।। 

svapnāvalokanaṃ yadvat tadvat siddhāvalokanam ।
kevalo ayaṃ viśeṣo yat siddhaprāptau sthirārthatā ।। 

mukhād bahir dvādaśānte recakābhyāsayuktitaḥ ।
prāṇe ciraṃ sthitiṃ nīte praviśanty aparāṃ purīm ।। 

rāmaḥ

vada svabhāvasya kathaṃ brahman na calati sthitiḥ ।
vaktāras sānukampā hi duṣpraśne api na khedinaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śaktir vastusvabhāvākhyā yathā sphurati yātmanaḥ ।
sargādinā tathaivāsau sthitiṃ yātīti niścayaḥ ।। 

avastutvād avidyāyā vastuśaktir api kvacit ।
bhidyate dṛśyate hy aṅga vasante śāradaṃ phalam ।। 

sarvam evaṃvidhaṃ brahma nānānānātayānayā ।
dṛśyate vyavahārārthaṃ kevalaṃ kalpyate sthitiḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

sūkṣmacchidrādigatyarthaṃ pūraṇārthaṃ ca khasya vā ।
aṇutāṃ sthūlatāṃ vāpi kāyo ayaṃ nīyate katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kāṣṭhakrakacayoś śleṣād yathā cchedaḥ pravartate ।
tayos saṅgharṣaṇād agnis svabhāvāj jāyate tathā ।। 

māṃsābjayantraṃ jaṭhare sthitaṃ śliṣṭamukhaṃ mithaḥ ।
ūrdhvādhassammilanmūlaṃ dyubhūmyor iva vai talam ।। 

tasya kuṇḍalinī lakṣmīr nilīnāntar nijāspade ।
padmarāgasamudgasya kośe muktāvalī yathā ।। 

āvartaphenamāleva nityaṃ śalaśalāyate ।
daṇḍāhateva bhujagī susannatavivartanā ।। 

dyāvāpṛthivyor madhyasthā kriyeva spandarūpiṇī ।
saṃvinmadhuvibodhotthā hṛtpadmapuṭaṣaṭpadī ।। 

tat sarvaṃ śaktipadmādi bāhyair ābhyantarais sadā ।
hṛdi vyādhūyate vātair abhravṛndam ivābhitaḥ ।। 

yad yad vyoma sphuraty aṅga svabhāvāt tatra vāyavaḥ ।
pelavaṃ mṛdu yat kiñcit tat tat pracalayanty alam ।। 

vātair āhanyamānaṃ tat padmādi taralāyate ।
hṛdy anyo'nyanikāṣeṇa pallavādi yathā tarau ।। 

dehoṣmakāraṇaṃ sarvarasādipacanodyatam ।
janayaty agnim anyo'nyasaṅgharṣād ghanaveṇuvat ।। 

svabhāvaśītaśītātmā dehas tenauṣṇyam ety alam ।
uditena sa sarvāṅgaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhānunā yathā ।। 

sarvato visaradraśmi tat tejas tārakākṛti ।
hṛtpadmahemabhramaro yogināṃ cintyatāṃ gatam ।। 

tat prakāśamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintitaṃ sat prayacchati ।
yena yojanalakṣasthaṃ vastu niśy api dṛśyate ।। 

tasyāgner vāḍavasyeva jalaṃ saṃśuṣkam indhanam ।
māṃsapaṅkajaṣaṇḍāḍhyahṛtsaraḥ kośavāsinaḥ ।। 

yad abjaśītalatvaṃ tad apānātmendur ucyate ।
itīndor utthitas so agnir agnīṣomau hi dehakaḥ ।। 

sarvam ūṣmātmakaṃ kiñcit tejo'rkāgnyabhidhaṃ viduḥ ।
śītātmakaṃ ca somākhyam ābhyām eva kṛtaṃ jagat ।। 

vidyāvidyāsvarūpeṇa sarvaṃ sadasadātmanā ।
jagad dvayena nirvṛttaṃ tad evaivaṃ vibhajyate ।। 

sac cit prakāśaṃ vidyādi sūryam agniṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
asaj jāḍyaṃ tamo avidyādy āhus somaṃ maṇīṣiṇaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

vahnir vāryātmanas somād udetīti mune śrutam ।
somasyotpattim adhunā vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

agnīṣomau mithaḥ kārye kāraṇe ca svasaṃsthiteḥ ।
paryāyeṇa samau caitau prajāyete parasparam ।। 

janmāṅga bījāṅkuravat tathā divasarātrivat ।
sthitiś chāyātapasamā kevalā caitayor bhavet ।। 

tulyakālopalambhā hi mithaś chāyātapasthitiḥ ।
kevalaikopalambhā syāt sthitir divasarātrivat ।। 

kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca dvividhaḥ kathito anayoḥ ।
sadrūpapariṇāmottho vināśapariṇāmajaḥ ।। 

ekasmād yad dvitīyasya sambhavo aṅkurabījavat ।
kāryakāraṇabhāvo asau sadrūpapariṇāmajaḥ ।। 

ekanāśe dvitīyasya yad bhāvo dinarātrivat ।
kāryakāraṇabhāvo asau vināśapariṇāmajaḥ ।। 

sadrūpapariṇāmasya mṛdghaṭakramasaṃsthiteḥ ।
akṣopalambhād itarat pramāṇaṃ nopayujyate ।। 

vināśapariṇāmasya dinarātrikramasthiteḥ ।
abhāvo apy ekavastūttho gato mukhyapramāṇatām ।। 

svanāśe nāsti kartṛtvam ityādyā yuktivādinaḥ ।
avajñāya bahiḥ kāryās svānubhūtyapalāpinaḥ ।। 

pratyakṣavad abhāvo api pramaiva raghunandana ।
agnyabhāvo hi śītasya pramāṇaṃ sarvajantuṣu ।। 

agner dhūmatayā bhāgo yaḥ prayāti payodatām ।
sadrūpapariṇāmena tad agnis somakāraṇam ।। 

agnir nāśātmakatayā śaityād aptāṃ prayāti yat ।
vināśapariṇāmena tad agnis somakāraṇam ।। 

saptāmbudhipayaḥ pītvā dhūmodgāreṇa vāḍavaḥ ।
payodatāṃ prayātena tad eva janayaty alam ।। 

arkaḥ pītvā niśānātham amāvasyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
udgiraty amale pakṣe mṛṇālam iva sārasaḥ ।। 

pītvāmṛtopamaṃ śītaṃ prāṇas somaṃ mukhāgragaṃ ।
abbhāgam āpūrayati śarīre apānatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

jalād aṇutayā bhāgo yaḥ prayāty arkaraśmitām ।
sadrūpapariṇāmena taj jalaṃ vahnikāraṇam ।। 

nāśātmakatayā toyam auṣṇyād yāti yad agnitām ।
vināśapariṇāmena tat toyaṃ vahnikāraṇam ।। 

agner vināśe sadrūpaḥ pariṇāmo niśākaraḥ ।
indor nāśe nigharṣotthapariṇāmo hutāśanaḥ ।। 

hutāśo nāśam āgatya somo bhavati vai tathā ।
divaso nāśam āgatya rātrir bhavati vai yathā ।। 

tamaḥprakāśayoś chāyātapayor dinarātrayoḥ ।
madhye vilakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ prājñair api na labhyate ।। 

sandhir apy ābilo yas syād etayor eva tad vapuḥ ।
bhāvābhāvau yathaikasya śliṣṭāv etau tathaiva hi ।। 

dvābhyāṃ caitanyajāḍyābhyāṃ bhūtāni prasphuranti hi ।
yathā tamaḥprakāśābhyām ahorātrā mahītale ।। 

cidrūpajaḍarūpābhyām ārabdheyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ ।
jalāmṛtābhyāṃ miśrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tanur ivaindavī ।। 

prakāśam analaṃ sūryaṃ cidrūpaṃ viddhi rāghava ।
jaḍātmakaṃ tamorūpaṃ viddhi somaśarīrakam ।। 

citsūrye nirmale dṛṣṭe tamo naśyed bhavāmayaḥ ।
vyomasūrye bahir dṛṣṭe yathā kṛṣṇaniśātamaḥ ।। 

somadehe jaḍe dṛṣṭe cittejo asatyavad bhavet ।
niśīthe vilasaccandre yathā sauraḥ prabhābharaḥ ।। 

somaṃ prakaṭayaty agniś cid dehaṃ suciraprabhā ।
agniṃ bhāsayatīnduś ca dehaṃ svaṃ rūpam arpayan ।। 

cin niṣkriyā tv anābhāsā kevalā nopalabhyate ।
āloka iva dīpena dehenaivāvagamyate ।। 

citaś cetyonmukhatvena lābhas saiva ca saṃsṛtiḥ ।
niścetyāyās tu no lābho nirvāṇaṃ ca tad eva hi ।। 

anyo'nyalabdhasattākāv evaṃ kuḍyaprakāśavat ।
agnīṣomāv imau viddhi sampṛktau dehadehinau ।। 

atiśāyini nirvāṇe jāḍye caivātiśāyini ।
agnes somasya caivāṅga sthitir bhavati kevalā ।। 

prāṇo agnir uṣṇaprakṛtir apānaś śītalaś śaśī ।
chāyātapavad ity etau saṃsthitau mukhamārgagau ।। 

apāne śītale sattām ety uṣṇaḥ prāṇapāvakaḥ ।
pratibimbam ivādarśe sa ca tasmiṃs tathaiva hi ।। 

cidagniḥ padmayantrasthaṃ somaṃ vāryātmakaṃ tviṣā ।
janayaty anubhūtyeha kuḍyālokaṃ yathā bahiḥ ।। 

saṃsṛtyādau hi yā kācit saṃvic chītoṣṇarūpiṇī ।
agnīṣomābhidhāṃ prāptā saiva sargo nṛṇām iha ।। 

yatra somakalā grastā kṣaṇaṃ sūryeṇa ṣoḍaśī ।
mukhād vitastimātrāgre tatra baddhapado bhava ।। 

nūnaṃ sūryapadaṃ prāptas somo yatra hṛdambare ।
nūnaṃ kevalayā sthityā tatra baddhapado bhava ।। 

auṣṇyam agniś cid ādityaś śaityaṃ soma udāhṛtaḥ ।
yatraitau pratibimbasthau tatra baddhapado bhava ।। 

śārīrasomasūryāgnisaṅkrāntijño bhavānagha ।
atra yojanalakṣasthaṃ vastu paśyasi niśy api ।
atra saṅkrāntikālā hi bāhyās tṛṇasamās smṛtāḥ ।। 

saṅkrāntim uttaram athāyanam aṅga samyakkālaṃ tathā viṣuvatī yadi dehavātaiḥ ।
antar bahisstham iva vetsi yathānubhūtaṃ tac chocasīha na punaḥ param abhyupetaḥ ।। 

agnīṣomavicāropadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍaśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

aṇutāṃ sthūlatāṃ cāyaṃ yathā gacchati yoginām ।
deho rāma tathā samyag vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

hṛdy abjapattrakośotthaḥ prasphuraty ānalaḥ kaṇaḥ ।
hemabhramaravat sāndhye vidyutkaṇa ivāmbude ।। 

sa pravardhanasaṃvittyā vātyayevāśu vardhate ।
saṃvidrūpatayā nūnam arkavad yāti codayam ।। 

sandhyābhraprathamārkābho vṛddhim abhyāgataḥ kṣaṇāt ।
gālayaty akhilaṃ sāṅgaṃ dehaṃ hema yathānalaḥ ।। 

jalasparśāsaho yuktyā gālayaty upalādy api ।
bāhya evānalaspanda āntaras tu viśeṣataḥ ।। 

sa śarīradravaḥ paścād vidhūya kvāpi nīyate ।
citkṣobhitena prāṇena nīhāro vātyayā yathā ।। 

ādhāranāḍinirhīnā vyomasthaivāvaśiṣyate ।
śaktiḥ kuṇḍalinī vahner dhūmalekheva nirgatā ।। 

kroḍīkṛtamanobuddhimayajīvādyahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
antassphuraccamatkārā dhūmalekheva tāgarī ।। 

bisavālavraṇe bhittāv upale divi bhūtale ।
sā yathā yojyate yatra tena niryāty alaṃ tathā ।। 

saṃvittis saiva yady aṅga rasādānād yathākramam ।
rasenāpūrṇatām eti tan nīhāra ivāmbunā ।। 

rasapūrṇā yam ākāraṃ bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā ।
dhatte citrakṛto buddhau rekhā rāma yathākṛtim ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvavaśād antar asthīny āpnoti sā tataḥ ।
mātṛgarbhaniṣaṇṇeva suṣiktevāṅkurasthitiḥ ।। 

yathābhimatam ākāraṃ pramāṇaṃ ceti rāghava ।
jīvaśaktir avāpnoti sumervādi tṛṇādi vā ।। 

śrutaṃ tvayā yogasādhyam aṇimādyarthasādhanam ।
jñānasādhyam idānīṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।। 

ekaṃ cinmātram astīha śuddhaṃ somyam alakṣitam ।
sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ śāntaṃ nājagan na jagatkriyāḥ ।। 

tac cinoty ātmanātmānaṃ saṅkalponmukhatāṃ gatam ।
yadā tadā jīva iti proktam ābilatāṃ gatam ।। 

asatyam eva saṅkalpabhrameṇedaṃ śarīrakam ।
jīvaḥ paśyati mūḍhātmā bālo yakṣam ivoddhatam ।। 

yadā tu jñānadīpena samyagāloka āgate ।
saṅkalpamoho jīvasya kṣīyate śaradabhravat ।। 

śāntim āyāti deho ayaṃ sarvasaṅkalpasaṅkṣaye ।
tadā rāghava niśśeṣaṃ dīpas tailakṣaye yathā ।। 

nidrāvyapagame jantur yathā svapnaṃ na paśyati ।
jīvo hi bhāvite satye tathā dehaṃ na paśyati ।। 

atattve tattvabhāvena jīvo dehāvṛtas sthitaḥ ।
nirdeho bhavati śrīmān sukhī tattvaikabhāvanāt ।। 

anātmani śarīrādāv ātmabhāvanam aṅga yat ।
sūryādyālokadurbhedaṃ hārdaṃ tad dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

ātmany evātmabhāvena sarvavyāpi nirañjanam ।
cinmātram amalo asmīti jñānādityena paśyati ।। 

pratimanvantaraṃ rāma buddhatām anutiṣṭhati ।
kalau harir ameyātmā kiñcid āśritya kāraṇam ।। 

tasya buddhābhidhānasya munināthasya rāghava ।
ye bhaktimanto dhīmanto mokṣamārgābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।। 

śūnyaṃ vijñānamātraṃ vā madhyaṃ vā kiñcid etayoḥ ।
astīti hetūpanyāsair brahma vyapadiśanti te ।। 

teṣāṃ madhye hi vijñānavido dvitve kṣayīkṛte ।
jagad bhrāntiparāmarśamātraṃ paśyanti netarat ।। 

madhyaṃ mādhyamikāḥ prāhuḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgavidaḥ pare ।
na śūnyaṃ na ca vijñānam idaṃ kiñcid iti sthitāḥ ।। 

te śūnyavādinas tv anye śūnyatvadṛḍhabhāvanāḥ ।
vyomnaś śūnyataraṃ sarvaṃ jagad ity āsthayojjhitāḥ ।। 

ekam ākāśam evoccair ākāśaviśadāśayāḥ ।
paśyanti rāma nātmānaṃ jagadādi ca vā pṛthak ।। 

śilākuḍyena niryānti nabhasevānirodhitam ।
śastrānilair na bhidyante nabhobhāgā ivācalāḥ ।। 

sumeruvipulākārā apy ādityāṃśureṇuṣu ।
bisatantuṣu megheṣu tiṣṭhanti paramāṇuvat ।। 

śūnyatvam iva saṃyātāś śūnyatābaddhabhāvanāḥ ।
śūnyā iva nabhobhāgāś śūnye tiṣṭhanti vijvaram ।। 

śūnye ca viditātmāno bhāvayanti yathaiva yat ।
tat tathaivāśu paśyanti dṛḍhabhāvanayā svayā ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvānusandhānād vimūḍhā api rāghava ।
viṣaṃ nayanty amṛtatām amṛtaṃ viṣatām api ।। 

evaṃ yathā yathaiveha bhāvyate dṛḍhabhāvanam ।
bhūyate hi tathaivāśu tad ety ālokitaṃ punaḥ ।। 

satyabhāvena dṛṣṭo ayaṃ deho deho bhavaty alam ।
dṛṣṭas tv asatyabhāvena vyomatāṃ yāti dehakaḥ ।। 

aṇimādipadaprāptau jñānayuktir iti śrutā ।
bhavataiṣādhunā rāma yuktim anyām imāṃ śṛṇu ।। 

recakābhyāsayogena jīvaḥ kuṇḍalinīgṛhāt ।
uddhṛtya yojyate vāyāv āmodaḥ kusumād iva ।। 

tyajyate vigataspando deho ayaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭavat ।
dehe vijīve vimaṇau vaṃśe ca ka ivādaraḥ ।। 

sthāvare jaṅgame vāpi yathābhimatayecchayā ।
bhoktuṃ tatsampadaṃ samyag jīvo antar viniveśyate ।। 

iti siddhiśriyaṃ bhuktvā sthitaṃ cet tad vapuḥ punaḥ ।
praviśyate svam anyad vā yad yathātrābhirocate ।। 

dehād ayātayā viṣvag vyāptavatyā ca khānilam ।
saṃvidā jagad āpūrya sampūrṇaṃ sthīyate atha vā ।। 

jñātvā sadābhyuditam ujjhitadoṣam īśaṃ yad yad yathā samabhivāñchati citprakāśaḥ ।
prāpnoti tat tad acireṇa tathaiva rāma sampatpadaṃ vidur anāvaraṇatvam eva ।। 

aṇimādiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryayuktā sā nṛpamāninī ।
evaṃ babhūva cūḍālā ghanābhyāsavatī satī ।। 

jagāmākāśamārgeṇa viveśāmbudhikoṭaram ।
cacāra vasudhāpīṭhe gaṅgevāmalaśītalā ।। 

kṣaṇam apy agatā bhartur vakṣasaś cetasas tathā ।
sarveṣūvāsa rājyeṣu lakṣmīr iva jagatsu ca ।। 

ākāśagāminī śyāmā vidyudālolabhūṣaṇā ।
babhrāma meghalekheva girimālā mahītale ।। 

kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇopalaṃ bhūmiṃ khaṃ vātam analaṃ jalam ।
nirvighnam aviśat sarvaṃ tantur muktāphalaṃ yathā ।। 

meror upari śṛṅgāṇi lokapālapurāṇi ca ।
digvyomodararandhrāṇi vijahāra yathāsukham ।। 

tiryagbhūtapiśācādyais saha nāgāmarāsuraiḥ ।
