vidyādharāpsarassiddhair vyavahāraṃ cakāra sā ।। 

yatnena taṃ ca bhartāram ātmajñānāmṛtaṃ prati ।
bahuśo bodhayām āsa mātā bālam ivātmajam ।। 

na cāsāv āpa tadbhartā rājā viśrāntim ātmani ।
muktāphalam asaṃśliṣṭaṃ muktāphala ivātale ।। 

etāvatāpi kālena tām evaṃguṇaśālinīm ।
bālo vidyām iva nṛpaś cūḍālāṃ na viveda saḥ ।। 

kalāvidagdhā mugdhā ca bāleyaṃ gṛhiṇī mama ।
ity eva kevalaṃ rājā sa cūḍālāṃ viveda tām ।। 

sāpy alabdhātmaviśrāntes tāṃ siddhiśriyam ātmanaḥ ।
darśayām āsa no rājñaś śūdrasyeva makhakriyām ।। 

rāmaḥ

mahatyās siddhayoginyās tasyā api śikhidhvajaḥ ।
yatnena prāpa no bodhaṃ budhyate anyaḥ kathaṃ prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

upadeśakramo nāma vyavasthāmātrapālanam ।
jñaptes tu kāraṇaṃ śuddhā śiṣyaprajñaiva rāghava ।। 

na śrutena na puṇyena jñāyate jñeyam ātmanaḥ ।
jānāty ātmānam ātmaiva sarpas sarpapadāni va ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ sthite varamune katham etaj janaśrutau ।
śrutaṃ gurūpadeśaś ca svātmajñānasya kāraṇam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atyantaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kaścit kirāṭo dhanadhānyavān ।
āste vindhyāṭavīkacche kuṭumbī vraṇakīṭavat ।। 

tasyaikadā nipatitā gacchato vindhyajaṅgale ।
ekā varāṭikā rāma tṛṇajālabusāvṛte ।। 

kārpaṇyāt sa prayatnena sarvaṃ tṛṇabusādikam ।
kapardikārtham abhito dudhāva divasatrayam ।। 

kapardakād dvau bhavataś catvāro aṣṭau ca kālataḥ ।
tataś śataṃ sahasraṃ ca sahasraṃ ceti cetasā ।। 

kalayañ jaṅgale dīno rātrindinam atandritaḥ ।
janahāsaṃ sahaṃs trīṇi dināni dhutavān busam ।। 

tato dinatrayasyānte tena tasmāt kujaṅgalāt ।
pūrṇendubimbapratimo labdhaś cintāmaṇir mahān ।। 

taṃ prāpya tuṣṭahṛdayas samāgatya gṛhaṃ sukhī ।
prāptākhilajagadbhūtiś śāntasarvabhayas sthitaḥ ।। 

evaṃ yathā kirāṭena kapardānveṣaṇena tat ।
ratnaṃ labdhaṃ jaganmūlyam ahorātram akhidyatā ।। 

tathā śrutopadeśena svātmajñānam avāpyate ।
anyad anviṣyate cānyal labhyate hi gurukramāt ।। 

brahma sarvendriyātītaṃ śrutādīndriyasaṃvidā ।
tenopadeśād anagha nātmatattvam avāpyate ।। 

gurūpadeśaṃ ca vinā nātmatattvāgamo bhavet ।
kena cintāmaṇir labdhaḥ kapardānveṣaṇaṃ vinā ।। 

tattvasyāsya mahārghasya gurūpakathanaṃ gatam ।
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇatāṃ maṇer iva kapardakaḥ ।। 

paśya rāghava māyeyaṃ mohanī mahatām api ।
anyad anviṣyate yatnād anyad āsādyate phalam ।। 

anyat karoti puruṣaḥ phalam anyad eva prāpnoti vastuniyatiś ca vilokyate ca ।
tasmād anantavibhavasya jagatkramasya śreyo ativāhanam asaṅgam avajñayaiva ।। 

kirāṭopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāśītitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataś śikhidhvajo rājā tattvajñānapadaṃ vinā ।
ājagāma paraṃ mohaṃ yāmāndhyam iva bhūtalam ।। 

duḥkhāgnidīpitamanā manāg api vibhūtiṣu ।
tāsv apīṣṭopanītāsu na reme agniśikhāsv iva ।। 

ekānteṣu diganteṣu nirjhareṣu guhāsu ca ।
ājagāma ratiṃ jantumukteṣu vyasanī yathā ।। 

rāghava tvam ivāśeṣās sāntvānunayacodanaiḥ ।
prārthitaḥ kāryate bhṛtyair mahīpo divasakriyāḥ ।। 

nityam uddāmavairāgyaḥ parivrāḍ iva śāntadhīḥ ।
nindann eva mahābhogān abhoktaiva śriyāṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

dadāv atitarāṃ dānaṃ gobhūmikanakādikam ।
devebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca svajanebhyaś ca mānadaḥ ।। 

cacāra ca tapaḥ kartuṃ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādikam ।
paribabhrāma tīrthāni vanāny āyatanāni ca ।। 

sa tathāpi viśokatvaṃ manāg api na labdhavān ।
anidhānāṃ khanan bhūmiṃ nidhānārthī nidhiṃ yathā ।। 

rātrindinam anantena śuṣyañ śokakṛśānunā ।
cintayā cintayām āsa saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam ।। 

cintāparavaśo dīno rājyaṃ paśyan viṣopamam ।
mahāvibhavam apy agre nāpaśyat khinnayā dhiyā ।। 

athaikadaikāntagatāṃ cūḍālām aṅkam āgatām ।
idaṃ madhurayā vācā samuvāca śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktā vibhavabhūmayaḥ ।
adhunāsmi virāgeṇa yukto gacchāmi kānanam ।। 

na sukhāni na duḥkhāni nāpado na ca sampadaḥ ।
kroḍīkurvanti bhūtāni muniṃ vananivāsinam ।। 

na deśabhaṅgasammoho na saṅgrāmajanakṣayaḥ ।
rājyād apy adhikaṃ manye sukhaṃ vananivāsinaḥ ।। 

stabakastanadhāriṇyo raktapallavapāṇayaḥ ।
mañjarījālahāsinyo lolaśubhrāmbudāṃśukāḥ ।। 

svaparāgāṅgahāriṇyaḥ kṛtakausumamaṇḍanāḥ ।
susevyakāñcanaśilānitambataṭaśobhanāḥ ।। 

taraṅgamauktikaprotasarinmuktālatāvṛtāḥ ।
latāvayasyāvalitā mugdhamugdhamṛgātmajāḥ ।। 

svabhāvoddāmasaugandhyā vitīrṇaphalabhojanāḥ ।
ṣaṭpadaśreṇinayanāḥ puṣpāpūranatāṅgikāḥ ।। 

āśvāsāspadatāṃ yātāś śītalāmalagātrikāḥ ।
ramayanti tvam iva māṃ vanavīthyo varānane ।। 

yathā viviktam ekānte mano bhavati nirvṛtam ।
na tathā śaśibimbeṣu na ca brahmendrasadmasu ।। 

asmin matpraṇaye tanvi na vighnaṃ kartum arhasi ।
bhartur vighaṭayantīcchāṃ na svapne api kulastriyaḥ ।। 

cūḍālā

prāptakālaṃ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājate nātha netarat ।
vasante rājate puṣpaṃ phalaṃ śaradi rājate ।। 

jarājaraḍhadehānāṃ yuktaṃ vanasamāśrayaḥ ।
na yūnāṃ tvādṛśām eva tenaitan me na rocate ।। 

yauvanena mahārāja na yāvad vayam ujjhitāḥ ।
puṣpaugheneva taravas tāvac chobhāmahe gṛhe ।। 

puṣpābhayā puṣpasitaṃ jarasā saha kānanam ।
samaṃ gṛhād gamiṣyāmo haṃsā iva taros saraḥ ।। 

aprāptakālaṃ nṛpateḥ prajāpālanam ujjhataḥ ।
rājayakṣmeva candrasya mahad eno na naśyati ।। 

aprāptakāriṇaṃ bhūpaṃ rodhayanti ca vai prajāḥ ।
rodhayanti hy akāryebhyaḥ prabhubhṛtyāḥ parasparam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

alam utpalamālākṣi vighnenābhimatasya me ।
viddhi māṃ gatam eveto dūram ekāntakānanam ।। 

bālā tvam anavadyāṅgī nāgantavyaṃ vanaṃ tvayā ।
puṃsām api hi mṛdvaṅgi durviṣahyo vanāśrayaḥ ।। 

na samarthā vanāvāse yoṣitaḥ kaṭhinā api ।
kā nāma puṣpamañjaryas soḍhum arkātapaṃ kṣamāḥ ।। 

bhavatyā pālayantyeha rājyaṃ sthātavyam uttame ।
kuṭumbabhārodvahanaṃ patyau yāte vrataṃ striyaḥ ।। 

ity uktvā dayitāṃ rājā tām induvadanāṃ vaśī ।
uttasthau snātum akhilaṃ dinakāryaṃ cakāra ha ।। 

athojjhitaprajāceṣṭo ravir astācalaṃ yayau ।
śikhidhvajo vanam iva samastajanadurgamam ।। 

saṃhṛtya vitataṃ rūpaṃ tam evānuyayau prabhā ।
nāthaṃ bhavananiṣkrāntaṃ cūḍālevānurāgiṇī ।। 

āyayau yāminī śyāmā bhuvanaṃ bhasmadhūsaram ।
dhṛtavyomāpagaṃ śarvam īrṣyayeva yamasvasā ।। 

dikṣu sandhyābhrahastāsu sthitāsu kṛtakuṇḍalam ।
tamolavālakāṅkāsu jyotsnāhāsodayāṅkitam ।। 

gacchator aparaṃ pāraṃ dampatyor mairavaṃ vanam ।
devodyānamayaṃ rantuṃ dinaśrīdinanāthayoḥ ।। 

āgacchator imaṃ pāraṃ hṛdyaṃ tīkṣṇakarojjhitam ।
niśāniśānāthayoś ca dampatyor mairavaṃ punaḥ ।। 

tārāgaṇo api dadṛśe viśīrṇo vyomakuṭṭime ।
mukto maṅgalalājānāṃ digvadhūbhir ivāñjaliḥ ।। 

candrānanā tamaśśyāmā śītā kumudahāsinī ।
yāminī yauvanaṃ prāpa sarojamukulastanī ।। 

kṛtasandhyāsamācāras saha cūḍālayeṣṭayā ।
suṣvāpa śayane bhūpo maināka iva sāgare ।। 

athārdharātrasamaye deśe niśśabdatāṃ gate ।
ghananidrāśilākośanilīne sakale jane ।। 

sa tasyāṃ samprasuptāyāṃ śayane komalāṃśuke ।
bhṛśaṃ nidrāvimūḍhāyāṃ bhramaryām iva paṅkaje ।। 

tatyāja dayitāṃ suptām aṅkād rājā śikhidhvajaḥ ।
svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhaṃ rāho ravicandraprabhām iva ।। 

uttasthau śayanāl līnavadhūkād dhavalāṃśukāt ।
salakṣmīkād vilolormer hariḥ kṣīrārṇavād iva ।। 

nirjagāmāṅganaṃ mattasuptabhṛtyajanaṃ gṛhāt ।
vanaṃ suptamṛgavyūhaṃ kesarī kandarād iva ।। 

khaḍgamātrasahāyo asau paṭadvayaparāvṛtaḥ ।
ardhasuptadvārapālaṃ dvāradeśam avāpa ca ।। 

vīrakramārthaṃ yāmīti tatraiva dvārapavrajam ।
yojayitvā jagāmāsau purān nirgatya pūrṇadhīḥ ।। 

rājyalakṣmyai namas tubhyam ity uktvā maṇḍalād gataḥ ।
viveśogrām araṇyānīm eko nada ivārṇavam ।। 

ghanāndhakāragulmāḍhyā kṣudrabhūtaughakarkaśā ।
sāraṇyānīniśā sā ca samaṃ tenātivāhitā ।। 

prātaś śūnyam araṇyānīkhaṃ tīrtvā vitataṃ dinam ।
samam arkeṇa kasyāñcid viśaśrāma vanāvanau ।। 

bhānāv adṛśyatāṃ yāte tatra snānādipūrvakam ।
kiñcit phalādikaṃ bhuktvā tāṃ nināya tamasvatīm ।। 

punaḥ prātaḥ purāṇy uccair maṇḍalāni girīn nadīḥ ।
balād ullaṅghayām āsa rāma dvādaśaśarvarīḥ ।। 

tato mandaraśailasya taṭasthaṃ janadurgamam ।
prāpa kānanam atyantadūrasthajanatāpuram ।। 

raṭatpraṇālasalilavāpīvalitapādapam ।
śīrṇavedyādivijñātabhūtapūrvadvijāśramam ।। 

kṣudraprāṇivinirmuktaṃ siddhasevyalatālayam ।
āpūrṇapādapalataṃ prāṇavṛttikaraiḥ phalaiḥ ।। 

tatraikasmin sthale śuddhe same salilamālite ।
śītale śādvalaśyāme snigdhe saphalapādape ।। 

samañjarībhir vallībhis sa cakāroṭajālayam ।
prāvṛṭkālas savidyudbhir nīlābhrair iva pañjaram ।। 

masṛṇaṃ vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ phalabhojanabhājanam ।
arghapātraṃ puṣpabhāṇḍam akṣamālāṃ kamaṇḍalum ।। 

kanthāṃ śītāpanodāya bṛsīṃ caiva mṛgājinam ।
ānīyāyojayat tasmin maṭhikāmandire nṛpaḥ ।। 

yat kiñcid anyad vā vastu yogyaṃ tāpasakarmaṇi ।
tat tatra sthāpayām āsa jagatīva kramaṃ vidhiḥ ।। 

sandhyāpūrvaṃ japaṃ prātaḥpraharaṃ sa tadākarot ।
puṣpoccayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu snānaṃ devārcanaṃ tataḥ ।। 

paścād vanaphalaṃ kiñcid vanakandaṃ bisādikam ।
bhuktvā japyaparo bhūtvā nināyaiko niśāṃ vaśī ।। 

iti divasam akhedaṃ mandaropāntakacche viracita uṭaje antar mālaveśo nināya ।
na ca nṛpativilāsaṃ taṃ sa sasmāra kaṃ vā sphurati hṛdi viveke rājyalakṣmyo haranti ।। 

śikhidhvajapravrajyāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ śikhidhvajaḥ parṇamaṭhikāyāṃ vane sthitaḥ ।
idānīṃ śṛṇu cūḍālā sā kiṃ kṛtavatī gṛhe ।। 

tatrārdharātrasamaye dūraṃ yāte śikhidhvaje ।
hariṇī grāmasupteva cūḍālā bubudhe bhayāt ।। 

apaśyat patinirhīnaṃ śayanaṃ śūnyatāṃ gatam ।
abhāskaram apūrṇenduṃ śāntaśobham ivāmbaram ।। 

uttasthau kiñcid āmlānavadanā khedaśālinī ।
kusikteva mahāvallī nirutsāhāṅgapallavā ।। 

na prasannā na vimalā babhūvākulatāṃ gatā ।
dinaśrīr iva nīhāradhūsarā sā vyatiṣṭhata ।। 

kṣaṇaṃ śayyopaviṣṭaiva cintayām āsa cintayā ।
kaṣṭaṃ rājyaṃ prabhus tyaktvā vanaṃ yāto gṛhād iti ।। 

tan mayehādya kiṃ kāryaṃ tatsamīpaṃ vrajāmy aham ।
bhartaiva gatir uddiṣṭā vidhinā prakṛtā striyaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya bhartāram anugantuṃ samutthitā ।
cūḍālā vātarandhreṇa nirgatyāmbaram āyayau ।। 

babhrāmāmbaramārgeṇa vātaskandhena yoginī ।
kurvatī siddhasārthasya mukhenānyenduvibhramam ।। 

dadarśātha pathā yāntaṃ rātrau khaḍgakaraṃ patim ।
bhramantam ekam ekānte vetāleśam ivotthitam ।। 

tādṛśaṃ patim ālokya ruddhā gaganakoṭare ।
bhaviṣyac cintayām āsa sarvaṃ bhartur akhaṇḍitam ।। 

yathā tena yadā yatra yāvat kāryaṃ yathodayam ।
yathā ca nirvṛtis sphārā gantavyā tena rāghava ।। 

avaśyabhavitavyaṃ tad bhartur dṛṣṭvā purassthitam ।
tad eva sampādayituṃ gamanāt sā nyavartata ।। 

āstāṃ mamādya gamanaṃ kālenāticireṇa hi ।
mayāsya pārśvaṃ gantavyaṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ punaḥ ।
suṣvāpa śayane śambhoś śirasīvaindavī kalā ।। 

kenacit kāraṇenāsau gatas samprati bhūpatiḥ ।
iti paurajanaṃ sarvam āśvāsyātiṣṭhad aṅganā ।। 

rājyaṃ rarakṣa bhartus tat krameṇa samadarśanā ।
yathā kalamakedāraṃ pakvaṃ kalamagopikā ।। 

tayos tadāvahat kālo dampatyos sthitayos tathā ।
adṛṣṭānyo'nyamukhayo rājyakānanapālayoḥ ।। 

jagāmātha dinaṃ pakṣo māso athartuś ca vatsaraḥ ।
śikhidhvajasya vipine cūḍālāyās svamandire ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena varṣāṇy aṣṭādaśāṅganā ।
cūḍālovāsa sadane vanakacche śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

atha yāteṣu bahuṣu varṣeṣu jarasā vṛte ।
śikhidhvaje mahāśailataṭakoṭaravāsini ।। 

bhartuḥ kaṣāyapākaṃ tad ālakṣya phalitaṃ cirāt ।
tadā tasyātmakāryasya bhavitavyatayā tayā ।। 

bhartus samīpagamane mama kālo ayam ity api ।
sañcintya mandaropāntaṃ gantuṃ buddhiṃ cakāra sā ।। 

cacālāntaḥpurād rātrau tatāra ca nabhaḥpatham ।
jagāma vātaskandhena gacchantī khe dadarśa ca ।। 

kalpavṛkṣāṃśukacchannā ratnastabakabhūṣitāḥ ।
nandanodyānanilayā raktās siddhābhisārikāḥ ।। 

parāmṛṣṭenduśakalān prāleyakaṇakarṣiṇaḥ ।
siddhottaṃsāttasaugandhyān sparśayām āsa mārutān ।। 

candrabimbāmṛtāmbhodhimahāvīciparamparām ।
apaśyan nirmalāṃ jyotsnām ambarāmbaratāṃ gatām ।। 

meghāntareṇa gacchantī meghalagnāś ca vidyutaḥ ।
abhiyuktā svabhartrā sā bhūyo bhūyo vyalokayat ।। 

uvāca cātmanaivāho yāvajjīvaṃ śarīriṇām ।
na svabhāvaś śamaṃ yāti mamāpy utkaṇṭhate manaḥ ।। 

kadā mṛgendraskandhaṃ taṃ praṇayapravaṇaṃ puraḥ ।
paśyāmi kāntam ity antar mamāpy utkaṇṭhitaṃ manaḥ ।। 

mañjarītvaṃ latātvaṃ vā varam etās taruṃ patim ।
na muñcanti kṣaṇam api mamāpy utkaṇṭhitaṃ manaḥ ।। 

yatheyam agragaṃ kāntam eti siddhābhisārikā ।
tathā kadāham eṣyāmi mamāpīti manas sthitam ।। 

ime mandāramaruta ete ca śaśinaḥ karāḥ ।
vanarājaya etāś ca mām apy utkaṇṭhayanty aho ।। 

he cittājñavad evāntaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ tāṇḍavitaṃ sthitam ।
sā vyomanirmalā sādho kva te yātā vivekitā ।। 

atha vā citta bhartāraṃ svaṃ praty utkaṇṭhase sakhe ।
tiṣṭhotkaṇṭhāvivalitaṃ kim anutkaṇṭhitena te ।। 

kiṃ kilotkaṇṭhase vāpi bhartā yāto jarāṃ bhavet ।
tapasvī kṛśagātraś ca bhaven nirvāsanas tathā ।। 

matto rājyāc ca bhogebhyo manye asyāmūlatāṃ gatā ।
vāsanā latikā prāvṛṇnadītaṭagatā yathā ।। 

ekāntamatir ekātmā nīrasaś śāntavāsanaḥ ।
manye bhavati me bhartā śuṣkavṛkṣasamasthitiḥ ।। 

tathāpi citta kotkaṇṭhā bhava votkaṇṭhayānvitam ।
patim udbodhya yogena śleṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ gale ।। 

pramṛṣṭavāsanaṃ bhartus samīkṛtya mano muneḥ ।
rājya eva niyokṣyāmi nivatsyāvas sukhaṃ ciram ।। 

aho nu cirakālena manoratham imaṃ śubham ।
aham āsādayiṣyāmi yad bhartrā samacittatā ।। 

samagrānandavṛndānām etad evopari sthitam ।
yat samānamanovṛttisaṅgam āsvādane sukham ।। 

iti cintāvatī vyomnā cūḍālollaṅghya parvatān ।
deśān abdān digantāṃś ca prāpa mandarakandaram ।। 

adṛśyaiva nabhassthaiva praviveśa vanāntaram ।
vātyeva pādapalatāspandacihnagamāgamā ।। 

vanaikadeśe kasmiṃścit kṛtaparṇoṭaje patim ।
dṛṣṭvā yogena bubudhe dehāntaram ivāsthitam ।। 

hārakeyūrakaṭakakuṇḍalādivibhūṣitaḥ ।
abhavan merukāntir yas tam evātra dadarśa sā ।। 

kṛśāṅgaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca jīrṇaparṇam iva sthitam ।
kajjalāmbubharasnātaṃ bhṛṅgīśam iva nissaham ।। 

cīrāmbaradharaṃ śāntam ekākinam avasthitam ।
sthale niṣaṇṇaṃ puṣpāṇi grathayantaṃ jarāṃ gatam ।। 

tam ālokyānavadyāṅgī cūḍālā pīvarastanī ।
kiñcijjātaviṣādedam uvācātmani cetasā ।। 

aho nu viṣamaṃ maurkhyaṃ yad anātmajñatātmakam ।
evaṃvidhās samāyānti daśā maurkhyaprasādataḥ ।। 

ayaṃ sa rājā lakṣmīvān yo mamāpi priyaḥ patiḥ ।
hṛdi mohaghuṇakṣuṇṇām imām adyāgato daśām ।। 

tad avaśyam ihaivādya nāthaṃ viditavedyatām ।
nayāmy enaṃ na sandeho bhogamokṣaśriyaṃ tathā ।। 

idaṃ rūpaṃ parityajya rūpeṇānyena kenacit ।
sakāśam asya gacchāmi bodhaṃ dātum anuttamam ।। 

bāleyaṃ mama kānteti maduktaṃ na karoty ayam ।
tasmāt tāpasarūpeṇa bodhayāmi patiṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

bhartā kaṣāyapākena paripakvamatis sthitaḥ ।
cetasy asyādya vimale svaṃ tattvaṃ pratibimbati ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā babhūva dvijadārakaḥ ।
īṣaddhyānād gatānyatvaṃ kṣaṇād ambutaraṅgavat ।। 

papāta vipine tasmin dvijaputrakarūpiṇī ।
bhartur abhyājagāmāgraṃ mandasmitalasanmukhī ।। 

dadarśa dvijaputraṃ taṃ puro yātaṃ śikhidhvajaḥ ।
vanāntarād upagataṃ tapomūrtim ivāsthitam ।। 

dravatkanakagaurāṅgaṃ muktāhāravibhūṣitam ।
śuklayajñopavītāṅgaṃ śuklāmbarayugāvṛtam ।। 

kamaṇḍaludharaṃ kāntaṃ śāntaṃ dāntam anāmayam ।
vyāptaprakoṣṭhaṃ dviguṇenākṣasūtreṇa cāruṇā ।। 

bhūmāv alagnacaraṇaṃ kiṣkumātropari sthitam ।
kuntalavyāptamūrdhānaṃ sālimālam ivāmbujam ।। 

bhāsayantaṃ pradeśaṃ taṃ śārīrair dīptimaṇḍalaiḥ ।
kuṇḍalābhūṣitamukhaṃ navam arkam ivoditam ।। 

śikhāsamprotamandāraṃ śṛṅgasthendum ivācalam ।
kāntopaśāntavapuṣam ūrjitaṃ vijitendriyam ।। 

himābhabhasmatilakabhūṣitālikasundaram ।
meruṃ hemataṭālīnapūrṇendum iva cañcalam ।। 

tam ālokya dvijasutaṃ samuttasthau śikhidhvajaḥ ।
devaputrāgamadhiyā samparityaktapādukaḥ ।। 

devaputra namaskāra idam āsanam āsyatām ।
ity asya darśayām āsa pāṇinā pattraviṣṭaram ।। 

dadau ca dvijaputrasya puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ karodare ।
candraḥ kumudaṣaṇḍasya prāleyam iva pallave ।। 

he rājarṣe namas tubhyam iti dvijasuto vadan ।
gṛhītvā kusumāny asmād viveśa dalaviṣṭare ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

devaputra mahābhāga kuta āgamanaṃ kṛtam ।
divasas saphalo ayaṃ me yat tvām adyāsmi dṛṣṭavān ।। 

idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ puṣpānīmāni mānada ।
imāḥ pragrathitā mālā gṛhyantāṃ bhadram astu te ।। 

ity uktvā pādyam arghyaṃ ca mālāḥ puṣpāṇi cānagha ।
śikhidhvajas tadiṣṭāyai dadau devyai yathākhilam ।। 

cūḍālā

subahūni paribhrānto bhūtalāyatanāny aham ।
tvattaḥ pūjā yathā prāptā mayeyaṃ na tathānyataḥ ।। 

peśalenānurūpeṇa praśrayeṇāmunānagha ।
manye ahaṃ nūnam atyantacirajīvī bhaviṣyasi ।। 

śāntena manasodāram ārād unmuktakalpanam ।
nirvāṇārhaṃ tapas sādho kaccit sambhṛtavān asi ।। 

asidhārāsamaṃ somya śāntaṃ vratam idaṃ tava ।
sphītaṃ yad rājyam utsṛjya mahāvananiṣevaṇam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

jānāsi bhagavan sarvaṃ devas tvaṃ ko atra vismayaḥ ।
śriyaiva lokottarayā jñāyase cihnabhūtayā ।। 

etāny aṅgāni te candrād ghaṭitānīti me matiḥ ।
anyathā kiṃ samālokād amṛteneva siñcasi ।। 

asti me dayitā kāntā pāti me rājyam adya tat ।
taveva tasyā dṛṣṭāni tāny aṅgāny adya sundara ।। 

upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca vapur āpādamastakam ।
śṛṅgaṃ śubhrāmbudeneva puṣpeṇācchādayāmunā ।। 

niṣkalaṅkendusaṅkāśam aṅgam ādityatejasā ।
manye te mlānim āyāti sumanaḥpattrapelavam ।। 

devārcanāyāvacitam idaṃ yat kusumaṃ mayā ।
aṅga tvadaṅgasaṅgena tat prayātu kṛtārthatām ।। 

jīvitaṃ yāti sāphalyaṃ mamābhyāgatapūjayā ।
devād apy adhikaṃ pūjyas satām abhyāgato janaḥ ।। 

tat kas tvaṃ kasya putras tvaṃ kim āyāto asy anugrahāt ।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chinddhi vimalendusamānana ।। 

cūḍālā

rājarṣe śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathāpṛṣṭam akhaṇḍitam ।
avarṇanaṃ hi jihmatvaṃ tat satām atininditam ।। 

asty asmiñ jagataḥ kośe śuddhātmā nārado muniḥ ।
puṇyalakṣmyā mukhe kānte karpūratilakopamaḥ ।। 

sa kadācin munir meror guhāyāṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ ।
adhityakāyāṃ bhūtānām adṛśyaś śāntamānasaḥ ।। 

tatra hemataṭe gaṅgā vahaty urutaraṅgiṇī ।
merulakṣmyās sphuradrūpā bhāti hāralateva yā ।। 

ekadā nāradamunir dhyānānte saritas taṭe ।
dhvanadvalayam aśrauṣīl līlākalakalāravam ।। 

kim etad ity asau kiñcijjātaprāyakutūhalaḥ ।
helayālokayan nadyām apaśyal lalanāgaṇam ।। 

rambhātilottamāprāyaṃ niryātaṃ jalalīlayā ।
krīḍantaṃ tyaktavasanaṃ deśe puruṣavarjite ।। 

kāñcanāmbhojamukulasundarais stanamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
parivellitam anyo'nyaṃ phalaiḥ kāntadrumaṃ yathā ।। 

drutahemarasāpūranirjharābhogabhāsuraiḥ ।
kurvantam ūrubhiḥ kāmamandirastambhavibhramam ।। 

nirmalīkṛtacandreṇa vyāptavyomnā vilāsinā ।
lāvaṇyarasapūreṇa tarjayantam ivāpagām ।। 

prākārair amarodyāne rathacakrair manobhuvaḥ ।
utpathārpitagaṅgāmbunitambataṭasetubhiḥ ।। 

sarvatra dṛṣṭasarvāṅgaṃ viśvarūpam ivāsthitam ।
pratibimbitasarvārtham anyo'nyādarśatāṃ gatam ।। 

kālakalpataror varṣaviṭapāt pakṣapallavāt ।
vividhartulatājālād dinaśrīkalikākulāt ।। 

ālokapuṣparajaso jātād gaganakānane ।
sphurajjagatkhagavrātāt saptābdhyekālavālakāt ।। 

māsastabakavṛnteṣu vṛddhiṃ yāntaṃ rasānvitam ।
uddhṛtyoddhṛtya sampūrṇaṃ cālitāmbhodapallavam ।। 

ālolālakakeśākṣitārakādimadhuvratam ।
amṛtāpadvighātāya kośasañcayakāribhiḥ ।। 

duṣprāpe bhūtasaṅghānāṃ vikasatkanakāmbuje ।
padmapallavasañchannaṃ guptaṃ meror guhāntare ।। 

śītale svardhunītīre yatnotsṛṣṭamalaṃ puraḥ ।
candrabimbaphalāpūram ekatraivopasambhṛtam ।। 

straiṇam ālokya tat kāntaṃ sahasaiva mano muneḥ ।
anāśritavivekāṃśaṃ babhūvānanditaṃ sphurat ।। 

ānandavalite citte kṣubdhe prāṇānile sthite ।
babhūva tasya tuṣṭasya madanaskhalitaṃ tadā ।। 

phalaṃ rasāpūrṇam iva grīṣmānta iva toyadaḥ ।
pratyagraḥ pādapaś chinnalatāvṛnta ivottamaḥ ।। 

avaśyāyakaṇasyandī śaśāṅka iva vā muniḥ ।
bisaṃ dvidhā yātam iva galatsāraraso abhavat ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

tādṛśo api bahujño api jīvanmukto apy asau muniḥ ।
niriccho api nirāstho api nakiñcidupamo apy alam ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ nityam ākāśaviśado api ca ।
nārado api kathaṃ brahman madanaskhalito abhavat ।। 

cūḍālā

sarvasyā eva rājendra bhūtajāter jagattraye ।
devāder api deho ayaṃ dvayātmaivaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।। 

ajñam astv atha vā tajjñaṃ yāvan mattaṃ śarīrakam ।
sarvam eva jagaty aṅga sukhaduḥkhamayaṃ smṛtam ।। 

hṛdyādinā padārthena kenacid vardhate sukham ।
āloka iva dīpena mahāmbudhir ivendunā ।। 

tucchādinā padārthena duḥkhaṃ kenacid eti hi ।
tamo meghapaṭeneva svabhāvo hy atra kāraṇam ।। 

svarūpe nirmale satye nimeṣam api vismṛte ।
dṛśyam ullāsam āpnoti prāvṛṣīva payodharaḥ ।। 

anāratānusandhānād anunmeṣam avistṛte ।
svarūpe nollasaty eṣa citi dṛśyapiśācakaḥ ।। 

yathā tamaḥprakāśābhyām ahorātraṃ sthitiṃ gatam ।
tathaiva sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ śarīraṃ sthitim āgatam ।। 

ete hi sukhaduḥkhe dve janmakāraṇadarśanāt ।
ajñasya lagataś śuklapaṭakuṅkumavad dṛḍham ।। 

tajjñasya tv aṅga lagato manāg api citer vaśāt ।
yathā śubhāśubhau rāgāv anākrāntāntarau maṇeḥ ।। 

purassthavastvabhāvena rañjanāṃ sphaṭiko yathā ।
tajjñas tyajati he sādho jīvanmuktamatir muniḥ ।। 

vastu saṃśleṣamātreṇa ghanaṃ rañjitacetasaḥ ।
gate api vastuni dṛḍhaṃ durdhiyaḥ paritāpinaḥ ।। 

gate api kuṅkume bhastrā tadīyam anurañjanam ।
na jahāti yathā mūḍhas tathā viṣayarañjanam ।। 

anenaiva krameṇaitau bandhamokṣau vyavasthitau ।
bhāvanātānavaṃ mokṣo bandho hi dṛḍhabhāvanam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

svotpattikāraṇaprāptau kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca vā ।
abhyudetīti vada me dūrasthāyām api prabho ।। 

atyudāram atīvācchaṃ bahvarthaṃ vacanaṃ tava ।
śrotuṃ tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi mayūro abhraraveṣv iva ।। 

cūḍālā

svotpattikāraṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ vastv ādāyākṣapāṇibhiḥ ।
sukhasaṃvid iyaṃ bālā nūnam ullasati svataḥ ।। 

hṛdgatā kṣobham āyātā jīvaṃ kuṇḍalinīgatam ।
somyam udbodhayaty antas siṃham abhraravo yathā ।। 

prāṇāvapūritā nāḍīr jīva ākramati sphuran ।
samyaksekaprabuddhātmā raso drumalatā iva ।। 

sukhaprabodhasañcāre duḥkhabodhagame tathā ।
jīvasya niyatā nāḍyaḥ pṛthag dehe sthitiṃ gatāḥ ।। 

sukhitaḥ prasphuraty eṣa yāsu tāsu na duḥkhitaḥ ।
ye hi mārgās suveṣasya kuveṣasya na te śubhāḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

jīvas sadaiva sarvatra dehe tiṣṭhati vai kila ।
tasya duḥkhe sukhe vāpi niyataṃ sphuritaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

cūḍālā

yāvatpramāṇaṃ jīvo ayaṃ saṃśāmyaty aparisphuran ।
tāvatpramāṇam evainaṃ muktaṃ muktam avaihi vai ।। 

yāvatpramāṇam adhikaṃ sphurati kṣubdhamārutam ।
tāvatpramāṇam evainaṃ baddhaṃ baddham avaihi me ।। 

sukhaduḥkhakalāspando bandho jīvasya netaraḥ ।
tadabhāvo hi mokṣas syād bodhāt sampadyate ca saḥ ।। 

sukhaduḥkhadaśe yāvad ānīte nendriyaiś śaṭhaiḥ ।
tāvat suptasamas somyo jīvas tiṣṭhati śāntavat ।। 

sukham ālokya vā duḥkham akṣānītaṃ caladvapuḥ ।
samutphalati jīvo antar dṛṣṭendur iva toyadhiḥ ।। 

jīvaḥ kṣubhyati dṛṣṭena saṃvidāṅga sukhādinā ।
āmiṣeṇeva mārjāro maurkhyam evātra kāraṇam ।। 

bodhena bodhyate jīva ātmajñānātmanātmanā ।
sukhaduḥkhādi nāstīti tenāsau yāti somyatām ।। 

na sat sukhādi naitan me mudhā cāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
iti jīvaḥ prabuddho antar nirvāṇaṃ yāti śāmyati ।। 

sukhādivastv asadrūpam ity antarbodhasaṃvidā ।
na tadunmukhatāṃ yāti jīvaś śāmyati kevalam ।। 

sarvam eva cidākāśaṃ brahmeti ghananiścaye ।
sthitiṃ yāte śamaṃ yāti jīvo nissnehadīpavat ।। 

dīpavac chamam āyāti sukhādisnehasaṅkṣaye ।
sarvam ekam iti jñātvā jīvo dvitvāvibhāvanāt ।। 

sarvam ākāśam eveti buddhvā ksobhaṃ na gacchati ।
jīvaś śūnyena śūnyasya kaḥ kila kṣobhavibhramaḥ ।। 

jīvenedṛgvidhenaivaṃ yad ā prathamasargataḥ ।
svayaṃ saṃvidito mārgas tenaivādyāpi gacchati ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

sukhasañcārayogyāsu jīve sarati nāḍiṣu ।
devaputra bhavaty etad vīryavicyavanaṃ katham ।। 

cūḍālā

jīvaḥ kṣubdhayati kṣubdhaḥ prāṇādipavanāvalīm ।
saṃvidājñāṃśamātreṇa senām iva mahīpatiḥ ।। 

vātaspandena medo'ntar majjāsāraś ca svasthitim ।
tyajaty ambvabhrasaugandhyarajaḥpattratṛṇādi va ।। 

calitaṃ vastv adho yāti vāryādi dahanādi kham ।
dehān nāḍīpraṇālena śukraṃ yāti bahissthitim ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

devaputra mahājño asi vetsi pūrvāparaṃ sthiteḥ ।
jñāyase vacanād eva svabhāvo hi kim ucyate ।। 

cūḍālā

ādisarge yathā yad yat sphuritaṃ brahma brahmaṇi ।
ghaṭāvaṭapaṭādyātma tathaivādyāpi ca sthitam ।। 

kākatālīyavad vāribudbudotpattināśavat ।
ghuṇākṣaravad ucchūnaṃ taṃ svabhāvaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

asmin svabhāvavaśato jagati prarūḍhe dehās sphuranti vividhā vividhāvikārāḥ ।
prakṣīṇavāsanatayā na bhavanti kecid bhūyo bhavanti ca punas tv itare ghanāsthāḥ ।। 

sukhavicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

navatitamas sargaḥ

cūḍālā

ātmasvabhāvavaśato jātaṃ jagad idaṃ mahat ।
sthitiṃ vāsanayābhyetya dharmādharmavaśe sthitam ।। 

vāsanāṃśaṃ samānīya dharmādharmair na gṛhyate ।
tato na jāyate mukta iti no darśanaṃ mune ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

atyudāraṃ mahārthaṃ ca vakṣi tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara ।
anubhūtim upārūḍhaṃ gūḍhaṃ ca paramārthavat ।। 

tvadvākyavibhavenādya śrutenānena sundara ।
pītenevendunā rāhur antar yāto asmi śītatām ।। 

tat samāsena tāṃ tāvad ātmotpattiṃ vadāśu me ।
tataś śroṣyāmi yatnena jñānagarbhāṃ giraṃ tava ।। 

tena padmajaputreṇa muninā nāradena tat ।
kva kṛtaṃ vīryam āryeṇa kathayārya yathāsthitam ।। 

cūḍālā

tato nibadhnatā tena manomattamataṅgajam ।
vivekavipulālāne śuddhabuddhivaratrayā ।। 

tad vīryaṃ kalpakālāgnigalitendudravopamam ।
rasānāṃ pāratādīnāṃ divyānām anujaṃ navam ।। 

muninā pārśvage kumbhe sphāṭike visaradrucau ।
adrute vidrutākāraṃ candre candram ivārpitam ।। 

ratnaśailair vṛtaḥ kāntais tale pārśveṣu cābhitaḥ ।
gambhīrakukṣis sudṛḍhaś cācalāhananakṣamaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpitena kṣīreṇa sa kumbhas tena pūritaḥ ।
amṛtāpūrabhinnena vidhinevāmṛtārṇavaḥ ।। 

tatra māsaṃ gato vṛddhiṃ munimantrāhutikramaiḥ ।
amṛtātmā śubho garbha indor indur ivānujaḥ ।। 

induṃ māsa ivāpūrṇaṃ māsena suṣuve ghaṭaḥ ।
garbhaṃ kamalapattrākṣaṃ prasūnam iva mādhavaḥ ।। 

paripūrṇasamastāṅgaḥ kumbhād garbhas sa niryayau ।
indus sūkṣmād ivāmbhodher aparaḥ kṣayavarjitaḥ ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva vṛddhim abhyājagāma saḥ ।
aprameyāṅgasaundaryaś śuklapakṣe śaśī yathā ।। 

sarvasaṃskārasampanne sa tasmin nārado muniḥ ।
bhāṇḍād bhāṇḍa ivāśeṣaṃ vidyādhanam ayojayat ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva vijñātāśeṣavāṅmayam ।
cakārainaṃ munivaraḥ pratibimbam ivātmanaḥ ।। 

tenārājata putreṇa muninā munināyakaḥ ।
ratnādrau pratibimbena sadyodita ivoḍurāṭ ।। 

athainaṃ putram ādāya brahmalokaṃ sa nāradaḥ ।
jagāma tatra pitaraṃ brahmāṇaṃ cābhyavādayat ।। 

kṛtābhivādanaṃ brahmā pautram ādāya taṃ tadā ।
abhivāditavedādiṃ svayam aṅke nyaveśayat ।। 

athāśīrvādamātreṇa sarvajñaṃ jñānapāragam ।
pautraṃ taṃ kumbhanāmānaṃ cakāra kamalodbhavaḥ ।। 

sādho so ayam ahaṃ pautraḥ kumbho ahaṃ padmajanmanaḥ ।
putro ahaṃ nāradamuneḥ kumbhanāmāsmi kumbhajaḥ ।। 

nivasāmy abjajapure pitrā saha yathāsukham ।
catvāras suhṛdo vedā mama līlā vilāsinī ।। 

mātṛṣvasā me gāyatrī mātā mama sarasvatī ।
brahmaloke mama gṛhaṃ pautras tatrāsmi susthitaḥ ।। 

yathākāmam aśeṣāṇi jaganti viharāmy aham ।
līlayā paripūrṇatvān na tu kāryeṇa kenacit ।। 

rājarṣe tena me pādau patato me na bhūtale ।
rajas spṛśati nāṅgāni glāniṃ nāyāti me vapuḥ ।। 

adyākāśapathā gacchan dṛṣṭavāṃs tvām ahaṃ puraḥ ।
iha tenāgato asmy aṅga sarvaṃ kathitavān iti ।। 

eṣo aham ity akhilam eva yathānubhūtaṃ te varṇitaṃ nanu mayā vanavāsatajjña ।
santo hy asaṅkathanam āryasamāgameṣu nindanty alaṃ subhaga saṃvyavahāradakṣāḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

kumbhajanmakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekanavatitamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

sarge sphuradbhir matpuṇyair manye sampreṣito bhavān ।
alakṣyais sambhṛtair adrau prāvṛḍvātair ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ sādho dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ ।
amṛtasyandavacasā yat tvayāsmi samāgataḥ ।। 

na kecana tathā bhāvāś cetaś śītalayanti me ।
rājyalābhādayo apy ete yathā sādhusamāgamaḥ ।। 

nirargalatayā yatra sāmyam eva vijṛmbhate ।
muktarāgādimananaṃ tan na kasya sukhāvaham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃvādina evāsya vākyam ākṣipya bhūpateḥ ।
bhūyaḥ provāca cūḍālā munidārakarūpiṇī ।। 

cūḍālā

āstām eṣā kathā tāvat sarvaṃ te varṇitaṃ mayā ।
tvaṃ me kathaya he sādho kas tvam adrau karoṣi kim ।। 

kiyatparyavasāneyaṃ tava vā vanavāsitā ।
satyaṃ kathaya nāsatyaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti tāpasaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

devaputro asi jānāsi sarvam eva yathāsthitam ।
lokavṛttāntatajjño asi kim anyat kathayāmy aham ।। 

saṃsārabhayabhītatvān nivasāmi vanāntare ।
jānato api hi hāsāya kathayāmy eva te manāk ।। 

śikhidhvajo ahaṃ bhūpālas tyaktvā rājyam iha sthitaḥ ।
bhṛśaṃ bhīto asmi tattvajña saṃsṛtau janmanaḥ punaḥ ।। 

punas sukhaṃ punar duḥkhaṃ punar maraṇajanmanī ।
bhavatas tena tapye ahaṃ sarvajña vanavīthiṣu ।। 

bhramann api digantāṃś ca carann api paraṃ tapaḥ ।
nāsādayāmi viśrāntim ekāṃ nidhim ivādhanaḥ ।। 

apattro apy aphalo apy eko nīraso apy astasaṅgatiḥ ।
śuṣyāmy eva vane sādho ghuṇakṣuṇṇa iva drumaḥ ।। 

imām akhaṇḍitāṃ samyak kriyāṃ sampādayann api ।
duḥkhād gacchāmi duḥkhaugham amṛtaṃ me viṣaṃ sthitam ।। 

cūḍālā

pitāmaham ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kadācit pṛṣṭavān idam ।
yat kriyājñānayor ekaṃ śreyas tad brūhi me vibho ।। 

brahmā

jñānaṃ hi paramaṃ śreyaḥ ka ivaitan na vetty alam ।
kālātivāhanāyaiva vinodāyocitā kriyā ।। 

alabdhajñānadṛṣṭīnāṃ kriyāmutra parāyaṇam ।
yasya nāsty ambaraṃ paṭṭaṃ kambalaṃ kiṃ tyajaty asau ।। 

vāsanāmātrasāratvād ajñasya saphalāḥ kriyāḥ ।
sarvā evāphalā jñasya vāsanāmātrasaṅkṣayāt ।। 

sarvā hi vāsanābhāve prayānty aphalatāṃ kriyāḥ ।
suśubhāḥ phalavatyo api sekābhāve latā iva ।। 

ṛtvantare yathā yāti vilayaṃ pūrvam ārtavam ।
tathaiva vāsanānāśe nāśam eti kriyāphalam ।। 

na svabhāvena phalati yathā śaralatā phalam ।
kriyā nirvāsanāmutra phalaṃ phalati no tathā ।। 

sayakṣavāsano bālo yakṣaṃ paśyati nānyathā ।
saduḥkhavāsano mūḍho duḥkhaṃ paśyati nānyathā ।। 

ākārabhāsurāpy uccair na dadāti phalaṃ kriyā ।
śubhāśubhā ca tajjñasya phullā śaralatā yathā ।। 

vāsanā ceha nāsty eva svāhaṅkārādirupiṇī ।
asatyaivoditā maurkhyān marubhūmāv ivāmbudhīḥ ।। 

yasya maurkhyaṃ kṣayaṃ yātaṃ sarvaṃ brahmeti bhāvanāt ।
nodeti vāsanā tasya prājñasyevāmbudhīr marau ।। 

vāsanāmātrasantyāgāj jarāmaraṇavarjitam ।
padaṃ prāpnoti jīvo antar bhūyojanmavivarjitam ।। 

savāsanaṃ mano jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ ।
jñānena jñeyatām etya punar jīvo na jāyate ।। 

cūḍālā

jñānam eva paraṃ śreya iti brahmādayo api te ।
prāhur mahānto rājarṣe tvaṃ kim ajñānavān sthitaḥ ।। 

itaḥ kamaṇḍalur ito daṇḍakāṣṭham ito bṛsī ।
ity anarthavilāse asmin ramase kiṃ mahīpate ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ jātaṃ kathaṃ śāmyati ceti bhoḥ ।
rājan nāvekṣase kasmāt kim ajña iva tiṣṭhasi ।। 

kathaṃ bandhaḥ kathaṃ mokṣa iti praśnān udāharan ।
parāvaravidāṃ pādān kasmād aṅga na sevase ।। 

dusspandasaṃvidā śailakoṭare kriyayānayā ।
jīvitaṃ kṣapayan kiṃ tvaṃ śilākīṭavad āsthitaḥ ।। 

sādhūnāṃ samadṛṣṭīnāṃ paripraśnena sevayā ।
saṅgamena ca sā yuktir labhyate mucyate yayā ।। 

mā narādhamavad grāsaṃ bhuñjāno vanakoṭare ।
tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhaduśceṣṭo dharāvivarakīṭavat ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kāntayā devarūpiṇyā tayaivaṃ pratibodhitaḥ ।
asrupūrṇamukho vākyaṃ śikhidhvaja uvāca ha ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

aho avabodhito asmy adya cirāt surasuta tvayā ।
maurkhyād āryasamāsaṅgamukto aham avasaṃ vane ।। 

aho nu me kṣayaṃ yātaṃ mohadhvāntam aśeṣataḥ ।
yat tvam evaṃ samāgatya samprabodhayasīha mām ।। 

gurus tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me mitraṃ tvaṃ me varānana ।
śiṣyo namaskaromy agre pādau tava kṛpāṃ kuru ।। 

yad udāratamaṃ vetsi yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate ।
bhavāmi nirvṛto yena tad brahmopadiśāśu me ।। 

ghaṭajñānādayo jñānavibhavās santy anekaśaḥ ।
jñānānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ katarat tārakaṃ bhavet ।। 

cūḍālā

yady upādeyavākyo ahaṃ rājarṣe tad vadāmi te ।
yathājñānam idaṃ kiñcin na vakṣye sthāṇukākavat ।। 

anupādeyavākyasya vaktuḥ pṛṣṭasya līlayā ।
phalanty aphalatāṃ vācas tamasīvākṣisaṃvidaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

yad vakṣi tad anuṣṭheyaṃ mayā vidhir iva śruteḥ ।
avikāritam evāśu satyam etad vrataṃ mama ।। 

cūḍālā

yathā bālaḥ pitur vākyaṃ muktahetūpapādanam ।
ādatte hi tathaivedaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ vaco mama ।। 

śravaṇānantaraṃ buddhyā śubham ity eva bhāvayan ।
śṛṇu gītam iva tyaktvā hetvarthitvaṃ vaco mama ।। 

svacaritasadṛśaṃ tavodayantyāś cirasamayena vibodhanaṃ ca buddheḥ ।
bhavabhayabhiduraṃ mahākavīnāṃ śṛṇu kathayāmi yathākramaṃ manojñam ।। 

śikhidhvajāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvinavatitamas sargaḥ

cūḍālā

asti kaścit pumāñ śrīmān sthānaṃ nityaviruddhayoḥ ।
guṇalakṣmyor aśeṣeṇa yathābdhir vaḍavāmbunoḥ ।। 

kalāvāñ śāstrakuśalo vyavahāre vicakṣaṇaḥ ।
sarvasaṅkalpasīmāntaṃ na tu jānāty ajaṃ padam ।। 

anantayatnasaṃsādhye sa cintāmaṇisādhane ।
pravṛtto vāḍavo vahnir abdhisaṃśoṣaṇe yathā ।। 

tasya yatnena mahatā kālenādhyavasāyinaḥ ।
siddhaś cintāmaṇiḥ kiṃ vā na sidhyaty unnatātmanām ।। 

pravṛttim udyamaṃ prajñāṃ prayuṅkte ced akhedavān ।
akiñcano api śakratvaṃ tad avāpnoty avighnataḥ ।। 

maṇim agre sthitaṃ prāptaṃ hastaprāpyaṃ dadarśa saḥ ।
meror udayaśṛṅgastho munir indum ivoditam ।। 

babhūva maṇirājendre na tu niścayavān asau ।
rājye jhagiti samprāpte sudīna iva pāmaraḥ ।। 

idaṃ sañcintayām āsa manasā smayaśālinā ।
samprāptopekṣayā dīrghaduḥkhasambhramabhāvinā ।। 

ayaṃ maṇir maṇir nāyaṃ maṇiś cet tad bhaven na saḥ ।
spṛśāmi na spṛśāmy enaṃ kadācit sparśato vrajet ।। 

naitāvataiva kālena maṇīndraḥ kila sidhyati ।
yatnenājīvitāntena sidhyatīty āgamakramaḥ ।। 

kriyānikūṇitenākṣṇā lolālātatalopamam ।
ratnālokaṃ prapaśyāmi dvicandratvam iva bhramāt ।। 

kuta etāvatī sphītā bhāgyasampan mamātatā ।
adhunaiva yad āpnomi maṇīndraṃ sarvasiddhidam ।। 

kecid eva mahāntas te mahābhāgyā bhavanti hi ।
yeṣām alpena kālena prayānty abhimukhaṃ śriyaḥ ।। 

aham alpatapās sādhur varāko mānuṣaḥ kila ।
siddhayaḥ katham āyānti mām abhāgyaikabhājanam ।। 

evaṃ vikalpasaṅkalpaiś ciram ajñaḥ parāmṛśan ।
na maṇigrahaṇe yatnam akaron maurkhyamohitaḥ ।। 

na yadā yena labdhavyaṃ na tat prāpnoty asau tadā ।
cintāmaṇir avāpto api durdhiyā helayojjhitaḥ ।। 

iti tasmin sthite yāto maṇir uḍḍīya siddhayaḥ ।
tyajanti hy avamantāraṃ śarā guṇam ivojjhitāḥ ।। 

hṛtvā prāksampadaḥ puṃsas sa yātas siddhayaḥ kila ।
āgatās samprayacchanti sarvaṃ yātā haranty alam ।। 

pumān bhūyaḥ kriyāyatnaṃ cakre ratnendrasādhane ।
nodvijante hi kāryeṣu janā adhyavasāyinaḥ ।। 

dadarśātha kacadrūpaṃ kācakhaṇḍam apaṇḍitaḥ ।
hasadbhir vañcakais siddhaiḥ puras tyaktam alakṣitaiḥ ।। 

ayaṃ cintāmaṇir iti mūḍhas tasmin sa vastutām ।
bubudhe mohito hy ajño mṛdaṃ hemeti paśyati ।। 

aṣṭau ṣaṣṭiṃ dviṣan mitraṃ rajjuṃ sarpaṃ sthalaṃ jalam ।
candrau dvau kurute citte śiśor moho amṛtaṃ viṣam ।। 

taṃ dagdhamaṇim ādāya prāktanīṃ sa śriyaṃ jahau ।
sarvaṃ cintāmaṇer asmāt prāpyate kiṃ dhanair iti ।। 

deśo ayam asukho rūkṣo janaiḥ pāpibhir āvṛtaḥ ।
kiṃ tad gehaṃ hataprāyaṃ ke nāma mama bandhavaḥ ।। 

dūraṃ gatvā yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi sampadā ।
ity ādāya maṇiṃ mūḍhaś śūnyaṃ kānanam āyayau ।। 

tatra kācadalenāsau tena tām āpadaṃ yayau ।
kajjalādrer iva niśā maurkhyasyaivāṅga yā samā ।। 

duḥkhāni maurkhyavibhavena bhavanti yāni naivāpadā na ca jarāmaraṇena tāni ।
sarvāpadāṃ śirasi tiṣṭhati maurkhyam ekaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ janasya vapuṣām iva keśajālam ।। 

cintāmaṇyupākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trinavatitamas sargaḥ

cūḍālā

athemam aparaṃ ramyaṃ vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇu bhūpate ।
paraṃ prabodhanaṃ buddhes sādho sadṛśam ātmanaḥ ।। 

asti vindhyavane hastī mahāyūthapayūthapaḥ ।
agastyaruddhayā vṛddhyā vindhyenevaidhitas svataḥ ।। 

vajrāśriviṣamau dīrghau stas tasya daśanau śitau ।
kalpānalaśikhātulyau sumerūnmūlanakṣamau ।। 

sa baddho lohajālena hastipena cchalāditaḥ ।
munīndreṇeva vindhyādrir upendreṇeva vā baḍiḥ ।। 

nibaddho yantraṇāpāśaśastrakumbhārpito gajaḥ ।
tāṃ jagāma vyathāṃ vīro na vāggocaram eti yā ।। 

ripau hastipake dūrād guptaṃ paśyati vāraṇaḥ ।
ayassamudgake tasmin nināya divasatrayam ।। 

khedān nigaḍanirbhedayatnavān sa jhaṇajjhaṇam ।
cakāra kiṅkiṇīkvāṇam upodghātai ratho yathā ।। 

dantābhyāṃ yatnatas tābhyāṃ muhūrtadvitayena saḥ ।
babhañja śṛṅkhalājālaṃ svargārgaḍam ivāsuraḥ ।। 

taṃ tasya nigaḍacchedam apaśyad dūrato ripuḥ ।
baḍes svargāvadalanaṃ harir merutaṭād iva ।। 

tasyāvacchinnapāśasya mūrdhni tālataro ripuḥ ।
papātākramatas svargaṃ harir meror baḍer iva ।। 

sa patan pādapān mohād aprāpya kariṇaś śiraḥ ।
papātordhvyāṃ phalaṃ pakvaṃ vātāhatam ivākulaḥ ।। 

taṃ puraḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahebhaḥ karuṇāṃ yayau ।
sphuratsphāraguṇās santas santi tiryaggatāv api ।। 

patitaṃ dalayāmīti kiṃ nāma mama pauruṣam ।
vāraṇo apīti kalayan na jaghāna ca taṃ ripum ।। 

kevalaṃ nigaḍavyūhaṃ vidāryāśu jagāma ha ।
vitataṃ setum utsārya vipulaugha ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

tam anādṛtya mātaṅgo bhaṅktvā jālaṃ javād yayau ।
vidārya meghasaṅghātaṃ nabhasīva divākaraḥ ।। 

gate gaje samuttasthau hastipas svasthadehadhīḥ ।
gajenaiva samaṃ tasya vyathā dūrataraṃ gatā ।। 

prottālatālaviṭapāt sa tathā patito api san ।
na bhedam āpa durbhedā manye dehā durātmanām ।। 

vardhate prāvṛṣīvābdaḥ kukāryeṣv asatāṃ balam ।
atīvāsīt samutsāhī sa gajākramaṇe tadā ।। 

vāraṇārir asiṃho asau gatebho duḥkham āyayau ।
āgatyopagate antardhiṃ nidhāna iva nirdhanaḥ ।। 

so anviyeṣa gajaṃ yatnād gulmakāntaritaṃ vane ।
payodapihitaṃ bhoktuṃ rāhur indum ivāmbare ।। 

cireṇālabhatebhendraṃ kasmiṃścit kānane sthitam ।
viśrāmyantaṃ tarutale samarād iva nirgatam ।। 

atha yatra sthito nāgas tatra tadbandhanakṣamam ।
parayā rājasāmagryā gajalampaṭarūpayā ।। 

sa khātavalayaṃ cakre hastipaḥ kānane navam ।
sarvadikkaṃ vidhir bhūmau samudravalayaṃ yathā ।। 

upary asthagayaj jīrṇalataughena sa taṃ śaṭhaḥ ।
śūnyaṃ tanvabhrajālena śaratkāla ivāmbaram ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva vāraṇo viharan vane ।
tasmin nipatitaḥ khāte śuṣkābdhāv iva parvataḥ ।। 

vrajan sarpākṛtau kūpe pātālatalabhīṣaṇe ।
khāte śuṣkābdhikhātābhe gajaratnasamudgake ।। 

iti bhūyo dṛḍhaṃ baddhas tena hastipakena saḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty adyāpi duḥkhena bhūsadmani yathā baḍiḥ ।। 

ahaniṣyat puraivāsau yady agropagataṃ ripum ।
tan nālapsyata tad duḥkhaṃ gajaḥ khātanibandhanam ।। 

maurkhyād āgāminaṃ kālaṃ vartamānakriyākramaiḥ ।
aśodhayan naro duḥkhaṃ yāti vindhyagajo yathā ।। 

mukto asmi śastranigaḍād iti tuṣṭo api vāraṇaḥ ।
dūrastho api punar baddho maurkhyaṃ kveva na bādhate ।। 

maurkhyaṃ nibandhanam avaihi paraṃ mahātman bandho na bandha iha cetasi tadviyukte ।
ātmodaye trijagad ātmamayaṃ samastam aśve sthitasya sahayā nanu sarvabhūmiḥ ।। 

gajopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturnavatitamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

maṇisādhanavanyebhabandhanādy amarātmaja ।
sūcitaṃ satkathājālaṃ punar me prakaṭīkuru ।। 

cūḍālā

vākyārthadṛṣṭer niṣpattyā hṛdgṛhe cittabhittiṣu ।
śṛṇuṣva satkathācitraṃ citram unmīlayāmi te ।। 

yo asau śāstrārthakuśalas tattvajñāne tv apaṇḍitaḥ ।
ratnasaṃsādhane proktas sa tvam eva mahīpate ।। 

tajjño bhavasi śāstreṣu ravir merutaṭeṣv iva ।
tattvajñāne tu viśrānto na tvaṃ dṛṣad ivāmbare ।। 

viddhi cintāmaṇiṃ sādho sarvatyāgam akṛtrimam ।
tam antaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ saṃsādhayasi śuddhadhīḥ ।। 

sarvatyāgena śuddhena sarvam āsādyate anagha ।
sarvatyāgo hi sāmrājyaṃ kiṃ cintāmaṇinā bhavet ।। 

siddhas sa sarvasantyāgas sādho saṃsādhitas tava ।
kharvīkurvañ jagadbhūtiṃ vindhyasyātmodayo yathā ।। 

santyaktaṃ bhavatā rājyaṃ sadāradhanabāndhavam ।
brahmaṇeva jagatsargavyāpāras svaniśāgame ।। 

svadeśasyātidūrastham āgato asīmam āśramam ।
bhuvo antam iva viśrāntyai vainateyas sakacchapaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ sarvasantyāge śeṣitāhammatis tvayā ।
mṛṣṭākhilakalaṅkena svasattevānilena khe ।। 

manomātre hṛdas tyakte yāvat te yāti pūrṇatām ।
tyāgas tāvad vikalpas tvāṃ kham ambuda ivāvṛṇot ।। 

nāyaṃ sa paramānandas sarvatyāgo mahodayaḥ ।
ko apy uccair anya evāsau cirasādhyo mahān iti ।। 

cintayeti gate vṛddhiṃ saṅkalpagrahaṇe śanaiḥ ।
vātyayeva vanaspande tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ ।। 

tyāgitā syāt kutas tasya cintām apy āvṛṇoti yaḥ ।
pavanaspandayuktasya nisspandatvaṃ kutas taroḥ ।। 

cintaiva cittam ity āhus saṅkalpetaranāmakam ।
tasyām eva sphurantyāṃ tu cittaṃ tyaktaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

citte gṛhīte trijagajjālabījakaṇe kṣaṇāt ।
kathaṃ sampadyate sādho sarvatyāgo nirañjanaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpagrahaṇenāntas tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ ।
śabdasaṃśravaṇenāṅga yathā grāmavihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

niścintatvadhanaṃ sarvaṃ tyāga ādāya te gataḥ ।
āmantryāpūjito yāti yas sa duḥkhaṃ karoti hi ।। 

sarvatyāgamaṇāv evaṃ gate kamalalocana ।
tapaḥkācamaṇir dṛṣṭas tvayā saṅkalpacakṣuṣā ।। 

tvayā tasmiṃs tapasy eva duḥkhe dṛṣṭibhramodite ।
grāhyaikabhāvanā baddhā jalendau śiśunā yathā ।। 

avāsanam anārabhya kṛtānandā savāsanā ।
ādyantamadhyaviṣamā duḥkhāyaiva tapaḥkriyā ।। 

amitānandam utsṛjya susādhaṃ yaḥ pravartate ।
mite vastuni dussādhe svātmahā sa śaṭhas smṛtaḥ ।। 

sarvatyāgas samārabhya na viniṣpāditas tvayā ।
tapoduḥkhaikatajjñena baddhena vanasadmani ।। 

rājyabandhād viniṣkramya gajavad duḥkhapūrite ।
vanavāsābhidhe sādho baddho asi dṛḍhabandhane ।। 

dviguṇā eva te cintāś śītavātātapādayaḥ ।
bandhanād adhikaṃ manye vanavāsam ajānataḥ ।। 

cintāmaṇir mayā prāpta ity alaṃ buddhavān asi ।
na labdhavān bhavān sādho sphaṭikasyāpi khaṇḍikām ।। 

ity etad aṅga maṇiyatnakathāsamānaṃ samyaṅ mayā prakaṭitaṃ tava padmanetra ।
udbodhya bodham amalaṃ svayam eva buddhyā yad vacmi tat pariṇatiṃ kuru cittakośe ।। 

cintāmaṇilābhakartṛvṛttāntavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcanavatitamas sargaḥ

cūḍālā

idānīṃ rājaśārdūla vastusampratipattaye ।
śṛṇu vindhyebhavṛttāntavivṛtiṃ smayakāriṇīm ।। 

yo asau vindhyavane hastī so asmin bhūmitale bhavān ।
yau vairāgyavivekau te tau tasya daśanau śitau ।। 

yaś cāsau vāraṇākrāntitatparo hastipas sthitaḥ ।
tad ajñānaṃ tvadākrāntitatparaṃ tava duḥkhadam ।। 

atiśakto apy aśaktena duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam ।
hastī hastipakeneva rājan maurkhyeṇa nīyase ।। 

yal loharajjusāreṇa vāraṇaḥ pariyantritaḥ ।
tad āśāpāśajālena bhavān āpadam āgataḥ ।। 

āśā hi loharajjubhyo viṣamā vipulā dṛḍhā ।
kālena kṣīyate lohaṃ tṛṣṇā tu parivardhate ।। 

yad baddhaṃ prekṣate vairī gajam ārād alakṣitaḥ ।
prekṣate tvāṃ tad ajñānaṃ krīḍārthaṃ baddham ekakam ।। 

yad babhañja gajaś śastraśṛṅkhalājālabandhanam ।
tat tatyāja bhavān bhogabhūmiṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam ।। 

kadācit sukaraṃ śastraśṛṅkhalājālabhedanam ।
na tv asya manasas sādho bhogāśāvinivāraṇam ।। 

yad ibhe pāṭayaty uccair bandhaṃ hastipako apatat ।
tvayi tyajati tad rājyam ajñānaṃ patitaṃ kṣatam ।। 

yadā viraktaḥ puruṣo bhogāśāṃ tyaktum icchati ।
tadā prakampate ajñānaṃ chedyavṛkṣapiśācavat ।। 

yadā vivekī puruṣo bhogān santyajya tiṣṭhati ।
tadā palāyate ajñānaṃ chinnavṛkṣapiśācavat ।। 

bhogaughe nūnam unmukte pataty ajñānam asthiti ।
pādape krakacacchinne kulāyas tadgato yathā ।। 

yadā vanaṃ prayātas tvaṃ tadājñānaṃ kṣataṃ tvayā ।
patitaṃ san na vihataṃ manastyāgamahāsinā ।। 

tena bhūyas samutthāya smṛtvā paribhavaḥ kṛtaḥ ।
tapaḥprapañcakhāte asmin gahane tvaṃ niyojitaḥ ।। 

tadaivāghātayiṣyas tvaṃ yady ajñānaṃ yadā patat ।
rājyatyāgavidhau tat tvāṃ nāhaniṣyat kṣayaṃ gatam ।। 

yat khātavalayas tena vairiṇā hastinaḥ kṛtaḥ ।
tat tapoduḥkham atulam ajñānena tavārpitam ।। 

yāṃ tasya rājasāmagrīṃ gajārer āharan nṛpaḥ ।
sā tvadajñānanṛpateś cittabhūtir visāriṇī ।। 

tvaṃ gajendras tapaḥkhāte dīrghe vanagato api san ।
ajñānavairiṇā tena nikṣiptas tarasāciti ।। 

yat khātavalayo bālalatābhir avaguṇṭhitaḥ ।
āvṛtaṃ tat tapoduḥkham īṣatsajjanavṛttibhiḥ ।। 

ity adyāpi tapaḥkhāte duḥkhe hy asmin sudāruṇe ।
sthito asi pātālatale nṛpa baddho yathā baḍiḥ ।। 

gajas tvam āśā nigaḍāni vairī moho nikhātaḥ punar ugrabandhaḥ ।
mahītalaṃ vindhya udanta itthaṃ tvadīya uktaḥ kuru yat karoṣi ।। 

vāraṇavṛttāntavivaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṇṇavatitamas sargaḥ

yad uktaṃ nayaśālinyā tayā viditavedyayā ।
tadā cūḍālayā jñānaṃ tat kasmān norarīkṛtam ।। 

sā hi tattvavidāṃ mukhyā yad yad vakti karoti ca ।
tat sarvaṃ satyam evāṅga tad anuṣṭheyam ādarāt ।। 

atha ced vacanaṃ tasyās tvayā nānuṣṭhitaṃ nṛpa ।
tat sa sarvaparityāgaḥ kasmān na nipuṇīkṛtaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

rājyaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktaṃ deśas tyaktas tathāvidhaḥ ।
dārās tyaktās tathāpy aṅga sarvatyāgo na kiṃ kṛtaḥ ।। 

cūḍālā

dhanaṃ dārā gṛhaṃ rājyaṃ bhūmiś chattraṃ ca bāndhavāḥ ।
iti sarvaṃ na te rājan sarvatyāgo atra kas tava ।। 

tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ ।
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

rājyaṃ cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vanam eva me ।
sālavṛkṣādigulmāḍhyaṃ tad apy etat tyajāmy aham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ ।
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

pramamārja vanāsthāṃ tāṃ hṛdas sudṛḍhaniścayaḥ ।
prāvṛḍvātas taṭagatāṃ rajorekhām ivātmanaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

savṛkṣādivanaśvabhrād vipinād api vāsanā ।
parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama ।। 

kumbhaḥ

adres taṭavanaṃ śvabhraṃ salilaṃ pādapās sthalam ।
ityādi tava no sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kathaṃ tava ।। 

tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ ।
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ svāśramo mune ।
vāpīsthaloṭajayutas tam evāśu tyajāmy aham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ ।
nimeṣadhyānamātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

pramamārjāśramāsthāṃ tāṃ saṃvidā śuddhayā hṛdi ।
sphurantīṃ sphuraṇenaiva rajorekhām ivānilaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

savṛkṣoṭajavīrutkād vāsanā svāśramād api ।
parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama ।। 

kumbhaḥ

vṛkṣo vāpī sthalaṃ gulma uṭajaṃ vratatīvṛtiḥ ।
iti kiñcin na te sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kutas tava ।। 

tavāsty anyo aparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ ।
taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhājanādi me ।
carmakuṭyakṣasūtrādi tat tāvat santyajāmy aham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā sa samuttasthāv avikṣubdhamanāś śamī ।
viṣṭarād avadātātmā śṛṅgād iva śaradghanaḥ ।। 

kumbhas tv ālokayann eva tatkriyāṃ saṃsthitas samām ।
āsane lokakāryeṣu sve syandana ivāṃśumān ।। 

yat karoti karotv etad asyaitat pāvanaṃ param ।
iti tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ kumbhaś śikhidhvajam avaikṣata ।। 

śikhidhvajas tu tat sarvaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaram āśramāt ।
ekatraivānayām āsa bhuvo vāry abdhibhūr iva ।। 

tat saṃsthāpyendhanaiś śuṣkair jvalayām āsa pāvakam ।
karasañcāravān arkas sūryakāntataṭaṃ yathā ।। 

bhāṇḍopaskarajātaṃ tad agnau tyaktuṃ viveśa saḥ ।
bṛsikāyāṃ jagad dagdhuṃ meruśṛṅge yathā raviḥ ।। 

etāvantaṃ mayā kālaṃ vṛto yat tvaṃ vratipriya ।
ajātabuddhibhedena tenaivānṛṇyam astu te ।। 

bhrāntau tu vinivartinyāṃ nādhunopakaroṣi me ।
devaputraprasādena daṇḍakāṣṭha namo astu te ।। 

ity uktvā vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ cikṣepāgnau śikhidhvajaḥ ।
gāṅgaṃ pravāham ādīrghaṃ vaḍavāgnāv ivārṇavaḥ ।। 

prasaṅkhyātāny asaṅkhyāni janmānīva tvayā mayā ।
sakhi mantrapadāny adya yāhi nopakaroṣi me ।। 

mantrāṭavyāṃ ciraṃ bhrāntaṃ vihṛtaṃ kāryavartmasu ।
dṛṣṭāni dharmasthānāni viśrāmyāmy adhunā sakhi ।। 

ity akṣamālāṃ jvalane cikṣepoktvā śikhidhvajaḥ ।
kalpāntāgnāv iva vyomatārālīṃ pavano amalām ।। 

mayā naramṛgeṇa tvaṃ ciraṃ vanamṛgacyutam ।
abodhena dhṛtaṃ vṛttyā dayayeva mṛgājina ।। 

idānīṃ gaccha sacchāya panthānas santu te śivāḥ ।
vahninā vyomatāṃ gaccha satāraṃ vyoma te samam ।। 

unmocyāṅgāt karābhyāṃ ca dhṛtvā carma jahāv iti ।
nṛpo agnāv ambudaṃ vāto davavahnāv ivācalāt ।। 

mayā dhṛtena bhavatā tvayā vāri dhṛtaṃ mama ।
sādho kamaṇḍalo samyakkṛte pratikṛtaṃ kṛtam ।। 

sauhṛdasya manojñasya saujanyasya sthirasya ca ।
sādhutvasya ca sarvasya tvam ekaḥ paramāspadam ।। 

yenaiva vahninā dehaṃ saṃśodhyābhyāgato asi mām ।
tenaiva gaccha he mitra panthānas santu te śivāḥ ।। 

ity uktvā śrotriyāyaiṣa kamaṇḍalum adāt tadā ।
agnaye mahate vāpi dātavyaṃ sādhu yad bhavet ।। 

mūrkhasyeva matir gupte nityam eva vasasy adhaḥ ।
ucitā te gatiḥ keva bṛsike bhasmatāṃ vraja ।। 

ity uktvādāya bṛsikām agnāv indhanavṛddhidām ।
śuddhyartham āsanārthaṃ cety agnau tatyāja bhāsure ।। 

yat tyājyam acireṇaiva tyaktavyaṃ kila tat satā ।
upāyaḥ kriyate sadbhir upādeye mate sati ।। 

śīghram agnāv idaṃ sarvaṃ bhāṇḍajālaṃ tyajāmy aham ।
ekavāraṃ dahann agnir dāhyaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye ।। 

sādho kriyopakaraṇa niṣkriyas tvāṃ tyajāmy aham ।
na khedas tv atra kartavyo anupayogyaṃ bibharti kaḥ ।। 

ity uktavāñ jhagiti bhojanabhājanādyaṃ sarvaṃ juhāva vanavāsavilāsayogyam ।
tad bhāṇḍajālam anale samam eva rājā kalpāntatejasi jagaj jvalatīva kālaḥ ।। 

sarvatyāgo nāma sargaḥ

saptanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athotthāya dadāhāsau śuṣkaṃ tat parṇamandiram ।
ajñena svena manasā vṛthā saṅkalpyakalpitam ।। 

śiṣṭaṃ yat kiñcid abhavat tatra tat sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
asaṃrabdhamanā maunī krameṇa samayā dhiyā ।। 

dadāha dūre cikṣepa tatyāja ca babhañja ca ।
bhāṇḍajātaṃ svavasanabhojanādy api ruṣṭavat ।। 

sa babhūvāśramas tasya dagdhanaṣṭanijasthitiḥ ।
vīrabhadrabaladhvastadakṣayajñāśramopamaḥ ।। 

āśramāt te mṛgakhagās tyaktaromantham udyayuḥ ।
sāgnidāhāt puravarād bhītabhītā janā iva ।। 

bhāṇḍajātaṃ dahaty agnau saha śuṣkendhanena tat ।
kevalākṛtir asnehas tuṣṭimān āha bhūpatiḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

aho nu cirakālena devaputra prabodhitaḥ ।
sampannaḥ kevalaś śuddhas sukhito bodhavān aham ।। 

kiṃ nāma kila vastv etad bhavet sāṅkalpikakramam ।
yad bhāṇḍopaskarasthānasadanādyavalambanam ।। 

yāvad yāvat prahīyante vibandhā bandhahetavaḥ ।
tāvat tāvat samāyāti paramāṃ nirvṛtiṃ manaḥ ।। 

śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukhito asmi jayāmy aham ।
vibandhāḥ prakṣayaṃ yātās sarvatyāgo mayā kṛtaḥ ।। 

digambaro diksadano diksakho ayam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
devaputra mahātyāgāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate ।। 

kumbhaḥ

sarvam eva na santyaktaṃ tvayā rājañ śikhidhvaja ।
sarvatyāgaparānandaṃ mā mudhābhinayīkuru ।। 

tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ ।
yaṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti śrutavatā tena kiñcit sañcintya bhūbhṛtā ।
idam uktaṃ mahābāho rāma rājīvalocana ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

indriyavyālasaṅghāto raktamāṃsamayākṛtiḥ ।
śiṣyate sarvasantyāge deho me devatātmaja ।। 

tad utthāya purassaṃsthabhṛgupātād avighnajāt ।
vināśātmakatāṃ nītvā sarvatyāgī bhavāmy aham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā deham agrasthe śvabhre tyaktum asau javāt ।
karoti yāvad utthānaṃ tāvat kumbho abhyuvāca ha ।। 

kumbhaḥ

rājan kim iti dehaṃ tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ mahāvaṭe ।
tyajasy ajño hi vṛṣabhaḥ kupito hanti tarṇakam ।। 

jaḍo varāko mūkātmā tapasvī dehako hy ayam ।
na kaścana tavaitasmai mā mudhaiva ruṣaṃ kuru ।। 

ātmany evaiṣa mūḍhātmā dhyānavān iva tiṣṭhati ।
sañcālyate pareṇaiva taraṅgeṇeva kāṣṭhakam ।। 

kṣobhayaty anya evainaṃ nigrahārho muhur balāt ।
tapasvinaṃ yathaikāntasaṃsthitaṃ mattataskaraḥ ।। 

sukhaduḥkhānubhūtyā hi nāparādhi śarīrakam ।
nātmanaḥ phalapātāt sa spandair vṛkṣo aparādhavān ।। 

vātaḥ phalaśikhāpuṣpapātanaṃ kurute sphuran ।
taruṇā sādhunā sādhor aparāddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ ।। 

tyaktenāpi śarīreṇa kila tāmarasekṣaṇa ।
sarvatyāgo na te yāti niṣpattiṃ viṣamo hi saḥ ।। 

bhṛgoḥ kevalam etat tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ śarīrakam ।
mudhā kṣipasi no dehatyāgena tyāgitā bhavet ।। 

yenāyaṃ kṣobhyate deho mattebheneva pādapaḥ ।
tat santyajasi cet pāpaṃ tan mahātyāgavān bhavān ।। 

tasmiṃs tyakte bhavet tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ dehādi bhūpate ।
no cen nirdagdham apy etad bhūyo bhūyaḥ prarohati ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

kenāyaṃ cālyate dehaḥ kiṃ bījaṃ janmakarmaṇām ।
kasmiṃs tyakte parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati sundara ।। 

kumbhaḥ

sādho na dehatyāgena na rājyatyajanena ca ।
na coṭajādiploṣeṇa sarvatyāgo bhaven nṛṇām ।। 

yat sarvaṃ sarvato yac ca tasmin sarvaikakāraṇe ।
sarvasmin samparityakte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ sārvaṃ heyaṃ tyājyaṃ ca sarvathā ।
sarvaṃ kim ucyate brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

kumbhaḥ

sādho sarvakalādhāraṃ jīvaprāṇādināmakam ।
na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ bhrāntaṃ cittaṃ sarvam iti smṛtam ।। 

rājyāder atha dehāder āśramāder mahīpate ।
sarvasyaiva mano bījaṃ tarubījaṃ taror iva ।। 

sarvasya bīje santyakte sarvaṃ tyaktaṃ bhavaty alam ।
sambhavāsambhavād bhūyas sarvatyāgo bhaved iti ।। 

sarvaṃ dharmādy adharmādi rājyādi vipinādi ca ।
sacittasya paraṃ duḥkhaṃ niścittasya paraṃ sukham ।। 

idaṃ vivartate sarvaṃ cittam eva jagattayā ।
dehādyākārajālena bījaṃ vṛkṣatayā yathā ।। 

pādapaḥ pavaneneva bhūkampeneva parvataḥ ।
bhastrā bhastrāhinevāyaṃ dehaś cittena cālyate ।। 

sarvabhūtopabhogyānāṃ jarāmaraṇajanmanām ।
mahāmaṇīnāṃ sudṛḍhaṃ cittaṃ viddhi samudgakam ।। 

cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prāṇaś cetyādibhir mune ।
kriyānurūpair abhidhāvyāpāraiś cittam ucyate ।। 

cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tasmiṃs tyakte mahīpate ।
sarvādhivyādhisīmānte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet ।। 

cittatyāgaṃ vidus sarvatyāgaṃ tyāgavidāṃ vara ।
tasmin siddhe mahābāho satyaṃ kenāpi bhūyate ।। 

citte tyakte layaṃ yāti dvaitam aikyaṃ ca sarvataḥ ।
kenacid bhūyate śāntaṃ svaccham ekam anāmayam ।। 

asyāḥ kṣetraṃ viduś cittaṃ saṃsṛtes sasyasantateḥ ।
kṣetre tv akṣetratāṃ yāte śāleḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ ।। 

cittam eva vicitrehaṃ bhāvābhāvavilāsinā ।
vivartate arthabhāvena jalam ūrmitayā yathā ।। 

cittotsādanarūpeṇa sarvatyāgena bhūpate ।
sarvam āsādyate samyak sāmrājyeneva sarvadā ।। 

sarvatyāgasya viṣayo yathaivānyo asti te tathā ।
tvam apy anyasya bhavasi tyāgin gṛhṇāsi cen nṛpa ।। 

sūtraṃ muktāphaleneva jagajjālaṃ trikālagam ।
sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ tena yena sarvaṃ samujjhitam ।। 

yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ tasmiñ śūnye api saṃsthitaṃ ।
jagat sarvaṃ trikālasthaṃ tantur muktāphale yathā ।। 

sasneheneva dīpena tena sarvaṃ prakāśitam ।
sthitas sarvaṃ parityajya yaś śānto asnehadīpavat ।। 

asneheneva dīpena yena sarvaṃ tirohitam ।
sa rājate prakāśātmā samas sasnehadīpavat ।। 

samastavastuniṣkāse yathā kham avaśiṣyate ।
sarvatyāge kṛte tādṛg vijñānam avaśiṣyate ।। 

samastavastūdāso hi yathā khaṃ netaran nṛpa ।
sarvasantyāga evāṅga tathā nirvāṇam ucyate ।। 

sarvatyāgo hi śūnyātmāpy āśrayas sarvasampadām ।
anantānām udārāṇāṃ kham ivedaṃ divaukasām ।। 

sarvatyāgarasāpānāj jarāmaraṇabhītayaḥ ।
na kāścana prabādhante khasyeva malalekhikāḥ ।। 

sarvatyāgo mahattvasya kāraṇaṃ nirmaladyuteḥ ।
sarvaṃ tyajati khaṃ yasmāt tasmāc chuddhaṃ sthiraṃ bṛhat ।। 

sarvatyāgaḥ parānando duḥkham anyat sudāruṇam ।
ity om ity urarīkṛtya yad icchasi tad ācara ।। 

sarvaṃ tyajati yas tasya sarvam evopatiṣṭhate ।
yathaivāmbu viśaty agnau tathaivāyāti vāridhau ।। 

sarvatyāgāntar evāsti jñānam ātmaprasādakam ।
yac chūnyaṃ kila bhāṇḍasya tatra ratnādi tiṣṭhati ।। 

sarvatyāgavaśād eva hatakāle kalāv api ।
śākyena vigatāśaṅkaṃ muninā meruvat sthitam ।। 

sarvatyāgo mahārāja sarvasampatsamāśrayaḥ ।
na gṛhṇāti hi yaḥ kaścit sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate ।। 

kṛtvā sarvaparityāgaṃ śāntas svaccho viyatsamaḥ ।
somyo bhavasi yadrūpas tadrūpo bhava bhūpate ।। 

sarvaṃ parityajya mahānubhāva tyajasy alaṃ yena ca tad vihāya ।
tyāgaṃ ca sādānam alaṃ vimucya vimuktarūpo bhava bhūmipāla ।। 

śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭanavatitamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ vadati vai kumbhe cittatyāgaṃ muhur muhuḥ ।
antar vicārayan somyo rājā vacanam abravīt ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

hṛdayākāśavihago hṛdayadrumamarkaṭaḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyo nirastaṃ hi samāyāty eva māṃ manaḥ ।। 

jānāmi naitad ādātuṃ matsyaṃ bāla ivākulam ।
tyāgam asya na jānāmi citram andha ivottamam ।। 

cittasyādau svarūpaṃ me yathāvad bhagavan vada ।
tataś cittaparityāgaṃ yathāvad bhagavan vada ।। 

kumbhaḥ

vāsanaiva mahārāja svarūpaṃ viddhi cetasaḥ ।
cittaśabdas tu paryāyo vāsanāyā udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

tyāgas tv asyātisukaras susādhas spandanād api ।
ratād apy adhikānandaḥ kusumād api sundaraḥ ।। 

mūrkhasya tu manastyāgo nūnaṃ dussādhatāṃ gataḥ ।
pukkasasyeva sāmrājyaṃ tṛṇasyeva sumerutā ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

svarūpaṃ vedmi cittasya vāsanāmayam ākulam ।
tyāgo asya manye dussādho vajranirdalanād api ।। 

saṃsṛtyāmodapuṣpasya duḥkhatailatilasya ca ।
jagadvālamṛṇālasya mohamārutakhasya ca ।। 

śarīrayantravāhasya hṛtpadmabhramarasya ca ।
ayatnāc cetasas tyāgo yathā bhavati tad vada ।। 

kumbhaḥ

sarvanāśo asya yas sādho cetasas saṃsṛtikṣayaḥ ।
sa eva cittasantyāga ity uktaṃ dīrghadarśibhiḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cittatyāgād ahaṃ manye cittanāśas svasiddhaye ।
abhāvaś cetaso vyādheḥ katham asyānubhūyate ।। 

kumbhaḥ

ahambījadrumaṃ cittaṃ saśākhāphalapallavam ।
unmūlaya samūlaṃ tvam ākāśaviśado bhavan ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cetasaḥ kiṃ mune mūlaṃ ko aṅkuraḥ kaś ca sambhavaḥ ।
kāś śākhāḥ ke ca vā skandhāḥ katham unmūlyate ca tat ।। 

kumbhaḥ

ahamarthodayo yo ayaṃ cidātmā vedanātmakaḥ ।
etac cittadrumasyāsya viddhi bījaṃ jagadgatam ।। 

ahambhāvātmakaṃ vittvaṃ cittabījam udāhṛtam ।
paramātmapadakṣetraṃ netraṃ māyāmayasya tat ।। 

etasmāt prathamodbhinnād yo aṅkuro anubhavākṛtiḥ ।
niścayātmā nirākāro buddhir ity eva socyate ।। 

asya buddhyabhidhānasya yāṅkurasya prapīnatā ।
saṅkalparūpiṇī tasyāś cittaṃ nāma mano abhidhā ।। 

jīvo mithyopalambhātmā śūnyātmāpy upalopamaḥ ।
stambhaḥ kāyo ayam etasya snāyvasthirasarañjitaḥ ।। 

deśād deśāntare dūre deśakālavido asya yāḥ ।
śākhās tāś cittavṛkṣasya dīrghā dūratarās tatāḥ ।। 

indriyāṇy atha bhogāś ca bhāvābhāvamayormayaḥ ।
viṭapaughā mahānto asya śubhāśubhaphalākulāḥ ।। 

īdṛśasyāsya cittasya durvṛkṣasya pratikṣaṇam ।
śākhāvilavanaṃ kurvan mūlakāṣe bharaṃ kuru ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cittadrumasya śākhādeḥ kurvāṇo ahaṃ vikartanam ।
kathaṃ karomi mūlasya niśśeṣaṃ kaṣaṇaṃ mune ।। 

kumbhaḥ

vāsanā vividhāś śākhāḥ phalaskandhādinānvitāḥ ।
abhāvitā bhavanty antar lūnās saṃvidbalena te ।। 

asaṃsaktamanā maunī śāntavādavicāraṇaḥ ।
samprāptakārī yas so antar lūnacittalato bhavet ।। 

cittadrumalatājālaṃ pauruṣeṇa vikartayan ।
yas tiṣṭhati sa mūlasya yogyo nikaṣaṇe bhavet ।। 

gauṇaṃ śākhāvilavanaṃ mukhyaṃ mūlavikartanam ।
cittavṛkṣasya tena tvaṃ mūlakāṣaparo bhava ।। 

mukhyatvena mahābuddhe mūladāham alaṃ kuru ।
cittakaṇṭakaṣaṇḍasya bhavaty evam acittatā ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

ahambhāvātmanaś cittadrumabījasya he mune ।
ko analo dāhyadahanasamartho arthakaro bhavet ।। 

kumbhaḥ

rājan svātmavicāro ayaṃ ko ahaṃ syām iti rūpadhṛt ।
cittadurdrumabījasya dahane dahanas smṛtaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

mune mayā mahābuddhyā bahuśaḥ pravicāritam ।
yāvan nāhaṃ jagan norvī na ca maṇḍalamaṇḍalam ।। 

nādres taṭaṃ na vipinaṃ na parṇasadanādi vā ।
jaḍatvān na ca dehādi na māṃsāsthyasṛgādi ca ।। 

karmendriyāṇy api na ca na ca buddhīndriyāṇi ca ।
na mano nāpi ca matir nāhambhāvaś ca jāḍyataḥ ।। 

kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathāhantvaṃ cidātmani ।
jaḍaṃ tv asadrūpatayā tena tan nāsmi he mune ।। 

sanniveśaviśeṣātmaśabdārthādi pare pade ।
vidyate nātyanantatvān nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ ।। 

jānann apīti bhagavann ahantvamalamārjanam ।
antar yadā na jānāmi tena tapye mahāmune ।। 

kumbhaḥ

etāvanmātrakaṃ vṛndaṃ yadi na tvaṃ mahīpate ।
jaḍatvāt tan mahābuddhe yo asi taṃ vada me navam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cinmātram aham acchātmavedanaṃ viduṣāṃ vara ।
yatra bhāvās svadanty ete nirmīyante ca yena vā ।। 

evaṃrūpasya me lagnaṃ nūnaṃ malam akāraṇam ।
sakāraṇaṃ cāham iti yat tat tyaktuṃ na vedmy aham ।। 

asad etad anātmīyaṃ pramārṣṭuṃ malam ātmanaḥ ।
mune yadā na śakto asmi tena tapye sudāruṇam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

brūhi kiṃ tan mahābāho lagnaṃ tava malaṃ mahat ।
sthito asi yena saṃsārī satā vāpy asatātha vā ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cittadrumasya yad bījam ahambhāvas sa me malam ।
tac ca tyaktuṃ na jānāmi tyaktaṃ tyaktam upaiti mām ।। 

kumbhaḥ

kāraṇāj jāyate kāryaṃ yat tat sarvatra sad bhavet ।
anyat tv asad dvicandrābhaṃ dṛṣṭam eva na vidyate ।। 

kāraṇāj jāyate kāryam ahambhāvātmakaṃ tataḥ ।
itikāraṇam anviṣya kathayāśu mamātmanā ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

mune aham iti doṣasya vedanaṃ vedmi kāraṇam ।
tad yathopaśamaṃ yāti tan me vada munīśvara ।। 

citaś cetyonmukhatvena duḥkhāyāham iti sthitaḥ ।
cetyopaśamanaṃ brūhi mune tadupaśāntaye ।। 

kumbhaḥ

kāraṇaṃ kāraṇajño asi vedanasya vadāśu me ।
tatas tvāṃ bodhayiṣyāmi kāraṇākāraṇakramam ।। 

vedyavedanarūpasya cetyasañcetanasya ca ।
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇatāṃ yad gataṃ tava tad vada ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

cetyacetanarūpasya vedyasaṃvedanākṛteḥ ।
iyaṃ padārthasatteha dehādyā kāraṇaṃ mune ।। 

śarīrāditayodeti vedanaṃ vastusattayā ।
asatyābhāsayā spando yathā pavanalekhayā ।। 

asattāṃ vastusattāyā nāvagacchāmy ahaṃ yayā ।
ahantvavedanaṃ cittabījaṃ samupaśāmyati ।। 

kumbhaḥ

vidyate yadi dehādivastusattā tad asti te ।
abhāvād dehasattādeḥ kiṃniṣṭhaṃ tava vedanam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

yasyopalabhyate kiñcit svarūpaṃ kalanātmakam ।
asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ tat syāt prakāśas syāt kathaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

hastapādādisaṃyuktaḥ kriyāphalavilāsavān ।
sadānubhūyamāno api deho nāsti kathaṃ mune ।। 

kumbhaḥ

kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasya bhūmipāla na vidyate ।
vidyate neha tat kāryaṃ tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ ।। 

kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ vidyate na kadācana ।
vidyate yasya no bījaṃ tad dravyaṃ kveva jāyate ।। 

akāranaṃ tu yat kāryaṃ sad ivāgre anubhūyate ।
tad draṣṭur vibhramaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇājalopamam ।। 

avidyamānam eva tvaṃ viddhi mithyābhramoditam ।
nātiyatnavatāpy etan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu labhyate ।। 

asato dvīndubimbāder na yuktaṃ kāraṇekṣaṇam ।
vandhyātanayasarvāṅgamaṇḍanaṃ kasya rājate ।। 

kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ śarīrādy asthipañjaram ।
avidyamānam evedaṃ viddhy asambhavato nṛpa ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

hastapādādiyuktasya śarīrasya munīśvara ।
nityam ālakṣyamāṇasya pitā kasmān na kāraṇam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

kāraṇābhāvato rājan pitā nāma na vidyate ।
asato yat tu sañjātam asad eva tad ucyate ।। 

padārthānāṃ ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bījam ucyate ।
sambhavaty aṅga jagati na bījena vināṅkuraḥ ।। 

tasmān na kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasyehopapadyate ।
bījābhāve hi tan nāsti tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ ।। 

avaśyam eva yan nāsti nirbījaṃ tan matibhramaḥ ।
dvīndutvamarubhūmyambuvandhyāputradṛśā samaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

pitāmahānāṃ putrāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca jagattraye ।
ādyaḥ pitāmahaḥ kasmāt pūrvotpanno na kāraṇam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

ādyaḥ pitāmaho yas syāt so api nāsty eva bhūpate ।
kāraṇābhāvato nityaṃ yadā kāryaṃ na kasyacit ।। 

kāraṇasya svabījasya nityābhāvāt pitāmahaḥ ।
ādyas san dṛśyamāno api bhramād anyo na vidyate ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad bhrāntirūpa evāvabhāsate ।
pitāmaho arthakāritvam api tv asya bhramātmakam ।। 

pitāmahāder etasya mithyāpratyayatas tv iti ।
ghanatā tu nivṛttaiva mārjayiṣyāmy athetarat ।। 

tasmāc cidātmakatayātmani cinnabho yan nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati cāru tad eṣa devaḥ ।
tenaiva padmaja iti svayam ātmanātmā proktaḥ kharūpa iti śāntam idaṃ samastam ।। 

śikhidhvajāvabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonaśatatamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ yady ayaṃ bhāsate bhramaḥ ।
arthakriyāsamarthaś ca tat sthitaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

evaṃ jagadbhramasyāsya tānavaṃ tāvad āgatam ।
śilībhūtasya śītena salilasyeva sūṣmaṇā ।। 

ajñānaṃ śithilībhūtam eva naṣṭaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
na nāśena vinodeti pūrvasaṃsthānavicyutiḥ ।। 

tanutvaṃ sargabodhasya yat tad eva hi kāraṇam ।
sargopaśamasampatteḥ pratipatteḥ pare pade ।। 

tānavaṃ dṛśyate yasya tasyānukramatas svayam ।
pūrvasaṃsthānavigamāt praśamo apy upapadyate ।। 

anenaiva krameṇainaṃ tvam ādipuruṣaṃ nṛpa ।
bhramākārodayaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditam ।। 

eṣā pitāmahābhāve apy asatī bhūtasantatiḥ ।
na kadācana tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate ।। 

ayaṃ bhūtopalambho hi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditaḥ ।
vicārād vilayaṃ yāti śuktau rajatadhīr iva ।। 

kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryam abhūtvā bhavatīti yat ।
mithyājñānād ṛte tasya na rūpam upapadyate ।। 

mithyādṛṣṭiḥ prekṣitā ca na kadācana vidyate ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā kena ghaṭakāḥ paripūritāḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

sraṣṭur ādyasya paramaṃ brahma kasmān na kāraṇam ।
anantam ajam avyaktam īśvaraṃ śāntam acyutam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

hetutvābhāvato brahma kāryatvābhāvatas tataḥ ।
advaitaikyāvikārātma na kāryaṃ na ca kāraṇam ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇam akāraṇam abījakam ।
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahma kartṛ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

akāraṇatvāt kāryatvarahitaṃ tad yadā bhavet ।
advaitaikyam anādyantaṃ tadā tadupalambhanam ।। 

apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ yac chivaṃ śāntam avyayam ।
tat kathaṃ kasya keneva kartṛ bhoktṛ kadā bhavet ।। 

ato nedaṃ kṛtaṃ kiñcij jagadādi na vidyate ।
na kartāsti na bhoktāsti sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ śivam ।। 

kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ na kasyacid idaṃ jagat ।
akāryatvāc ca nāsty etat sarga itthaṃ na vidyate ।। 

yadā na kasyacit kāryaṃ kāraṇasya jagat tadā ।
padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhis tatsiddhau kasya vedanam ।। 

evaṃ tu vedanābhāve nāsty ahantvasya kāraṇam ।
ataś śuddho asi mukto asi kevoktir bandhamokṣayoḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

āṃ prabuddho asmi bhagavan yuktam uktaṃ tvayottamam ।
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kartṛ neha brahmeti vedmy aham ।। 

kartrabhāvāj jagan nāsti tena nāsti padārthadṛk ।
nātaś cittādi tadbījaṃ nāto ahantādi kiñcana ।। 

evaṃ sthite viśuddho asmi vibuddho asmi na cāsmi ca ।
namo mahyaṃ paraṃ naumi nakiñcid api bodhataḥ ।। 

padārthavedanaṃ mithyaivāsad evāvabhāsate ।
ahamādy alam etena śāntam āse khakośavat ।। 

jagatpadārthapravibhāgadṛṣṭis sadeśadikkālakalākriyaughā ।
aho nu kālena cireṇa śāntā brahmaiva vā nūnam avasthiteti ।। 

śāmyāmi nirvāmi paraṃ sthito asmi na yāmi nodemi na cāstam emi ।
tiṣṭhāmy aniṣṭhaṃ ca yathāsthitātmā śivaṃ śubhaṃ pāvanamaunam asmi ।। 

śikhidhvajaviśrāntir nāma sargaḥ

śatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti brahmaṇi viśrāntim avāpya sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
muhūrtam āsīt saṃśāntamanā nirvāṇadīpavat ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhānapariṇatyāstam īyivān ।
svalīlayeti kumbhena sa jhagity eva bodhitaḥ ।। 

kumbhaḥ

rājann ajñānanidrātaḥ prabuddho asi śivas sthitaḥ ।
kāryaṃ nāstamayeneto na cānastamayena te ।। 

sakṛd eva vibhātātmā tiṣṭhāniṣṭhapadātmakaḥ ।
kalākalananirmukto jīvanmukto aṅga sāmpratam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kumbhena bodhitas tv evaṃ sa babhūva prabodhavān ।
vinirgato rarājoccair mahāmohasamudgakāt ।। 

viśrāntadhīḥ kṣaṇenaiva paśyan dṛśyasya vastunaḥ ।
asattām eva muktātmā līlayā samuvāca ha ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

jñātaprāyam apīdaṃ tu yat pṛcchāmi tad ucyatām ।
bhūyo nipuṇabodhāya mama mānada mohahan ।। 

śive śānte nirābhāse pare anullaṅghitātmani ।
draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyākhyo viśvātmā pratyayaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

kumbhaḥ

sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja rājase bodhabhāsvatā ।
etad eva hi te śiṣṭaṃ jñatāyās tad idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ kalpānte tat praṇaśyati ।। 

tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam ।
mahākalpavilāsānte sat sāram avaśiṣyate ।। 

cinmātram amalaṃ kāntam ābhātam amalaṃ nabhaḥ ।
samastakalanonmuktaṃ yuktaṃ paramayā śriyā ।। 

yad ekoditam atyacchaṃ śāntam ātatam ujjvalaṃ ।
paramātmātmakaṃ tejas stimitaṃ jñaptimātrakam ।। 

apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ samaṃ śivam aniṅganam ।
brahma nirvāṇam āpūrṇam āghūrṇad iva sampadā ।। 

aṇīyasām aṇīyas tat sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām ।
garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api ।। 

īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ nabhaḥ ।
aṇoḥ pārśve mahāmerur iva sthūlātma lakṣyate ।। 

īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sthūlaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ jagat ।
paramāṇuvad ābhāti kvacid eva na bhāti vā ।। 

īdṛśaṃ tad gariṣṭhaṃ ca jagadrājyaṃ yad akṣatam ।
buddhvaitad amalaṃ śāntaṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate ।। 

īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ śreyas tasmin sati yad īśvare ।
jagatpadārthasārthaśrīs svasattodeti vedanāt ।। 

tat sāram ekam eveha vidyate bhūpate tatam ।
ekam ekāntabuddhyāttaṃ naikam apy advitāvaśāt ।। 

tasmād dvitīyā kalanā kācin nāma na vidyate ।
ātmatattvam alaṃ bhātaṃ tad evāpūrṇam akṣatam ।। 

saṃsthitaṃ sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvākāram ivoditam ।
avācyatvād alabhyatvāt tan na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam ।। 

pratyakṣāder agamyatvāt kim apy ekam tad uttamam ।
sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ sūkṣmam acchānubhavamātrakam ।। 

tasyānākhyasya rūpasya nirgatasya pramādṛśaḥ ।
sato vāpy asato vāpi kathaṃ kāraṇatā bhavet ।। 

yad vai na kasyacid bījam anākhyatvān na kāraṇam ।
na kiñcij jāyate tasmāt pramāṇātigatātmanaḥ ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇam satyaṃ cidghanam akṣatam ।
ātmarūpam anābhāsaṃ svasaṃvedanalakṣaṇam ।। 

tasmān na jāyate kiñcit parasmād brahmaṇo mune ।
kathaṃ kila vadāvyakte syāj janyajanakakramaḥ ।। 

na kiñcij jāyate śānte na ca kiñcit pralīyate ।
svasattayā sthitaṃ brahma na bījaṃ na ca kāraṇam ।। 

śuddhānubhavamātraṃ tat tasmād anyan na vidyate ।
kiñcij jagadahantādi tad evānantam asti hi ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

śive jagadahantādi mune nāstīti vedmy aham ।
sargavedanam ābhāti katham etad vadāśu me ।। 

kumbhaḥ

citsāraṃ tad anādyantaṃ tat svasaṃvidi tiṣṭhati ।
tat tadbhavanam atyacchaṃ tattāmātraṃ jagad viduḥ ।। 

citsvātmakacanaṃ nāma yad asambhavacetyadṛk ।
tad ahaṃvedanaṃ viddhi virāḍātma jagat sthitam ।। 

vātasya vātaspandasya yathā bhedo na vidyate ।
śūnyatvakhatvopamayoś cinmātrāhantvayos tathā ।। 

jale asti deśakālātte yathormyādi sakāraṇam ।
pare asty adeśakālātte tathā jagad akāraṇam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

jalādau yat taraṅgādi tat sakāraṇam astv iha ।
pare jagadahantādi nākāraṇam avaimy aham ।। 

kumbhaḥ

idānīṃ bhavatā jñātam etat satyaṃ mahīpate ।
idaṃ jagadahantādi neha kiñcana vidyate ।। 

jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ jagad asti śivātmakam ।
vyomny eva nirmitaṃ śāntaṃ vyomnas sūkṣmatareṇa vā ।। 

yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam ।
sadasadvasturūpeṇa na vā rūpeṇa kenacit ।। 

evaṃrūpaṃ jagad idaṃ samyagjñānāc chivaṃ bhavet ।
samyagjñānaprabhāveṇa viṣam apy amṛtaṃ bhavet ।। 

asamyagjñānam akhilaṃ jagad duḥkhapradaṃ param ।
viṣabuddhyāmṛtam api bhuktaṃ viṣarasāyate ।। 

īśvaratvād yathā vetti yad yad eṣa cidīśvaraḥ ।
tat tathaivāśu bhavati tādṛgrūpatayā śivam ।। 

yathā jvālābhramālā vā vicitrākāravibhramaiḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty ananyarūpaiva brahmasattā tathaiva hi ।। 

yat paraṃ citsvarūpeṇa sthitam ātmani mantharam ।
tat tenedam ahantādi jagadādy eva lakṣyate ।। 

kevalaṃ param evetthaṃ paramaṃ bhāsate śivam ।
kuto jagadahantādi praśna eveha nocitaḥ ।। 

yad vastu vidyamānaṃ sat praśnas tatra virājate ।
prekṣitaṃ yat tu nāsty eva prekṣāpraśnena tatra kim ।। 

sanniveśaṃ vinā sattā yathā hemno na vidyate ।
tathā jagadahambhāvaṃ vinā neśasya saṃsthitiḥ ।। 

akāraṇatvān nāstīdaṃ brahmaivetthaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
ajṛmbhamāṇam evāhaṃjagattveneha saṃsthitam ।। 

yanmayā eva tenaiva mithas sampreritāśayam ।
camatkurvanty amī bhāvāḥ pañceṣu mithunaughavat ।। 

cinmātra eva cinmātraṃ cinmātreṇaiva cīyate ।
nānātmanevānānaiva svātmanātmāpy anātmavat ।। 

pūrṇāt pūrṇam uddharanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni cakrire ।
bhavanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni pūrṇam evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

cinmātram eva kacati yac cinmātratayātmani ।
akacat tv eva tan nāma kacitaṃ sargavedanam ।। 

ahaṃ citā cid evāsau bhavatīva svayaṃ svataḥ ।
abhavanty eva rūpaṃ svam atyajantī nirāmayam ।। 

cito rūpam anādyantaṃ manorūpam anantakam ।
samrāṭcharīram ābhāsi bhavatīva svayambhuvaḥ ।। 

paśyaty athāsad evedaṃ svarūpatvāt sad eva vā ।
bhāvanād ghanatām eti dṛśyaṃ bhavati ca kramāt ।। 

śāntaṃ jagatprasararūpatayā svabhāvaśabdārthamuktam idam avyapadeśyam ekam ।
vastusthitaṃ nijacamatkaraṇāvalokarūpaṃ jagattvarahitānubhavātmatattvam ।। 

śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādhikaśatatamas sargaḥ

kumbhaḥ

na vijñānamayo artho asti na bāhyo nāpi śūnyatā ।
vedanāmātrasāratvād yathāvit so artha ucyate ।। 

dravatvaṃ salilasyeva vido vittvam akāraṇam ।
khātma nityam anantaṃ tad yathāsthitam avasthitam ।। 

pratiyogivyavacchedābhāvatas svatvabhāvayoḥ ।
asattā tena na pare sattvabhāvavyavasthitiḥ ।। 

yadi kāraṇatāpattiyogyaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ bhavet ।
aniṅganam anābhāsam apratarkyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

ato na kāraṇaṃ naiva bījaṃ brahma kadācana ।
kāryasya kasyacin nāma tena sargo na vidyate ।। 

na cānyathopapattir hi sargasyāsyopapadyate ।
cinmātrakād ṛte tasmāj jaḍas sargo na vidyate ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tac cidghanam avedhitam ।
asambhavajjagacchabdaśabdārtharasarañjanam ।। 

kāryaṃ na kāraṇābhāvāt padārtha upapadyate ।
dvitvaikyādyātmakaṃ vyomapuṣpavat svānubhūtitaḥ ।। 

vastu nāśaikaniṣṭhatvān na cājam upapadyate ।
upalambhe dhruvo nāśo janma naṣṭasya ca dhruvam ।। 

atha vainaṃ sadā santaṃ nityaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca vetsi vā ।
padārthaughaṃ tad eṣo artha ekarūpo atra kiṃ vyathā ।। 

upalambhas tu yaś cāyaṃ sā cittattvacamatkṛtiḥ ।
cittattvamātrasattāsti dvitvam aikyaṃ ca nāsty alam ।। 

ataḥ padārthasattāyā abhāve sati bhūpate ।
asambhave bhāvanasya nāhantābhāvanāsti te ।। 

ahambhāvāsambhavataś cittam anyat kim ucyate ।
iti cittam ahaṃrūpaṃ nāsty ato bhava vinnabhaḥ ।। 

nirvāsanaś śāntamanā maunī paranabhomayaḥ ।
sadeho vā videho vā bhava sthāyī calo atha vā ।। 

sarvatvāc chuddhaviddṛṣṭeḥ padārthābhāvasiddhitaḥ ।
bhāvanābhāvataś citte nāsty evāham ataś śivam ।। 

sarvaṃ brahmeti vedārthabhāvanād anubhūtitaḥ ।
cetitārthaikasatyatvāc cittaṃ nāma na vidyate ।। 

tenāsi nirmalam akāraṇam ādimuktaṃ tad brahma śāśvatam aśeṣam anekam ekam ।
śūnyaṃ vināmayam asat sad anādimadhyaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāssva yathāsthitaṃ sat ।। 

śikhidhvajaprathamabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

cittaṃ nāstīti me bodho yathā yuktyā sphuṭo bhavet ।
tām anyām anyathā brūhi buddhaṃ na nipuṇaṃ mayā ।। 

kumbhaḥ

cittaṃ nāsty eva rājarṣe kadācit kiñcana kvacit ।
yac cedaṃ cittavad bhāti tad brahmābhidham avyayam ।। 

ajñajñātātmakaṃ yatra jagad eva na vidyate ।
tatrāhaṃ tvaṃ tad ityādikalanākalanāḥ kutaḥ ।। 

nāsty eva jagad evedaṃ yat tv idaṃ kiñcanoditam ।
brahmaivātmani tad bhāti śṛṇv etad budhyate katham ।। 

mahāpralayasargādāv evedaṃ noditaṃ jagat ।
nirdeśas tv ayam anyatra tvadbodhāya mayā kṛtaḥ ।। 

upādānātmakādīnāṃ kāraṇānām abhāvataḥ ।
akāraṇaṃ ca bhāvānām aśeṣāṇām asambhavāt ।। 

evam ajñāvabuddhātma jagad yasmān na vidyate ।
tasmād yad idam ābhāti bhāsanaṃ brāhmam eva tat ।। 

anākhyo anākṛtir devaḥ karotīdam iti tv asat ।
bhāṣitaṃ nopapattyātma na satyenānubhūyate ।। 

anākhyo apratighaḥ khātmā nirākāro ya īśvaraḥ ।
sa karoti jagantīti hāsāyaiva vaco adhiyām ।। 

anenaiva prayogeṇa rājaṃś ceto na vidyate ।
jagad eva na sat sādho kutaś cittādi tadgatam ।। 

ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ vāsye tu sati vāsanā ।
vāsyaṃ jagat tad evāsad ataś cittāstitā kutaḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ kacati brahma svayam ātmātmanātmani ।
kṛtaṃ tasyaiva tenaiva cittam ityādināmakam ।। 

jagad dṛśyam idaṃ vāsyaṃ tad evotpannam eva no ।
kāraṇābhāvataḥ pūrvam evātaś cittatā kutaḥ ।। 

ataś cidvyomamātrātma paramākāśanāmakam ।
sphāraṃ vedanam evedaṃ kacaty astīha no jagat ।। 

yat kiñcit paramākāśam īṣat kacakacāyate ।
cidādarśe nijācchatvāt tac cittaṃ taj jagat kṛtam ।। 

ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ity eṣā pratipattir na vāstavī ।
mithyā svapna ivābhātā nūnam apy arthakāriṇī ।। 

vāsyasya jagato abhāvād yato nāsty eva vāsanā ।
atas tadātmakaṃ cittaṃ kīdṛśaṃ kva kutaḥ katham ।। 

aprabuddhair avagataṃ caittaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ jagat ।
asad eva nirākāraṃ pūrvam utpannam eva no ।। 

notpannaṃ kāraṇābhāvāt sargādāv eva sarvadā ।
lokaśāstrānubhavato na ca dṛśyasya vastunaḥ ।। 

anāditvam ajatvaṃ vā sthairyaṃ vāpy upapadyate ।
sākārasyāsya jagatas sthūlasapratighākṛteḥ ।। 

samastakāraṇābhāvāl lokaśāstrānubhūtibhiḥ ।
yujyante ca nirākartuṃ na mahāpralayodayāḥ ।। 

śāstrānubhavavedārthasiddhān etāṃś ca yo api vā ।
pralayādīn na santīti vakty unmattaka eva saḥ ।। 

lokāś śāstrāṇi vedāś ca pramāṇaṃ yasya nāmateḥ ।
asatyoktes sumūḍhasya sa paśus taṃ na saṃśrayet ।। 

na ca sapratighasyāsya dṛśyasyāpratighaṃ kvacit ।
kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ sākārasya nirākṛtiḥ ।। 

ittham ālakṣyamāṇaṃ san na cedaṃ nāvabhāsate ।
na ca nārthakriyākāri na caivettham idaṃ jagat ।। 

tasmād idaṃ niraṃśasya cidvyomno apratighākṛteḥ ।
nirākṛter anantasya pūrvāt pūrvataraṃ sataḥ ।। 

brahmaṇas sarvarūpasya śāntaṃ śāntasya yat samam ।
svata evātmakacanaṃ sargapralayarūpadhṛt ।। 

svakaṃ vapus tat tenaiva jñātaṃ jagad idaṃ kṣaṇam ।
kṣaṇāntare tu buddhaṃ sad brahmaivāste nijātmani ।। 

brahmaivedam atas sarvaṃ kva caittajagadādidhīḥ ।
kva cittādi kva dehādi kva dvaitaikyādikalpanāḥ ।। 

sarvaṃ nirālambam ajaṃ praśāntam anādimadhyātma yathāsthitaṃ sat ।
idaṃ ca nānaiva na cāpi nānā yathāsthitaṃ tiṣṭha sukāṣṭhamaunaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tryuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayā mune ।
sthito asmi gatasandeho viśrāntamatir ātmavān ।। 

jñātajñeyo mahāmaunī tīrṇamāyāmahārṇavaḥ ।
śānto aham anahaṃrūpo jñas sthito asmi nirāmayaḥ ।। 

aho nu suciraṃ kālaṃ prabhrānto aham avāntare ।
sthānam avyayam akṣubdham adhunā prāptavān aham ।। 

evaṃ sthite mune nāsti sāhantādijagattrayam ।
mūrkhabuddham idaṃ bhāti yat tad brahmeti vedmy aham ।। 

kumbhaḥ

jagad eva na yatrāsti tatrāhantvavibhāsanam ।
saṃsārāmbarasambhāraḥ kva kutaḥ kīdṛśaḥ katham ।। 

yathāsthitavyavahṛtir maunī śāntamanā muniḥ ।
somyārṇavodarāvartaparispandavad āssva bhoḥ ।। 

brahmarūpatayā śāntam idam asti yathāsthitam ।
ahaṃ jagad idaṃ ceti śabdārthātma nabho amalam ।। 

idam ādyantarahitaṃ sargasaṃhāranāmakam ।
ciccamatkṛtimātrātma nabhaḥ kacakacāyate ।। 

sanniveśadṛśaś śāntau yad asti kanakaṃ yathā ।
jagadādyarthasaṃśāntau brahmedaṃ vidyate tathā ।। 

yathā svayambhūs saṅkalpas svayaṃnāśas tathaiva hi ।
etau svavedanāyattau bandhamokṣau vyavasthitau ।। 

aham ity eva saṅkalpo bandhāyātivināśine ।
nāham ity eva saṅkalpo mokṣāya vimalātmane ।। 

yad bandhamokṣasaṅkalpaśabdārthānāṃ sadāsatām ।
svarūpavedanaṃ tat sat kevalatvaṃ ca kathyate ।। 

anahaṃvedanaṃ siddhir ahaṃvedanam āpade ।
so aham evānaham iti śuddhabodho bhavātmavān ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayātmanā ।
saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ ।। 

apratarkyasvarūpe hi nāsti kāraṇatā śive ।
kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ padārtho api na vidyate ।। 

padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhau vedanaṃ nopapadyate ।
kāraṇābhāvato nityam ahambhāvasya nodayaḥ ।। 

ahambhāvānudayatas saṃsāraḥ kasya kīdṛśaḥ ।
saṃsārābhāvatas sarvaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

yac cedaṃ bhāsate tat sat param evātmani sthitam ।
paraṃ pare parāpūrṇaṃ samam eva vijṛmbhate ।। 

tena nistimitaṃ sarvaṃ śailotkīrṇam ivācalam ।
viddhi raśmimayākāram iva brahma jagat sthitam ।। 

purasaṅkalpake naṣṭe saṅkalpanagarasya yat ।
rūpaṃ tad viddhi jagataḥ khād acchaṃ sadasanmayam ।। 

chāyāpuruṣavat spandi śāntaṃ nirmananaṃ jagat ।
jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārā nīrasā gatabhāvanāḥ ।
samyagjñānavato yasya nirvāṇaṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

yathāsti vāto nisspando yathāsti kham anīlima ।
yathā hemāsanniveśam asti brahmājagat tathā ।। 

nīrasā asadābhāsā jagatpratyayakāriṇaḥ ।
rūpālokamanaskārās santīme brahmarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

ūrmiśabdārtharahitaṃ yādṛg ambu bahūrmy api ।
sargaśabdārtharahitaṃ tādṛg brahmāpi sargavat ।। 

sarga eva paraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmaiva sargadṛk ।
sargaśabdārtharahito vākyārthas tv eṣa śāśvataḥ ।। 

brahmaśabdārthasampattau sargaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ ।
sargaśabdārthasampattau brahmaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ ।। 

samastaśabdaśabdārthabhāvanābhāvanodaye ।
śuddhaṃ kim api cidvyoma brahmaśabdena kathyate ।। 

samyagdarśanasaṃsiddhāv ubhayor apy avedane ।
yac chiṣṭam ajaraṃ śāntaṃ tato vāg vinivartate ।। 

saṃśāntasarvātmakavedanaugham astīdam ekātmakam accharūpam ।
yathāsthitaṃ sarvajagat kharūpaṃ pāṣāṇarūpaṃ ca paraṃ jñarūpam ।। 

śikhidhvajabodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

evaṃ caitan mahābuddhe yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ param ।
tādṛśaṃ kāryam evedaṃ jagad ity eva vedmy aham ।। 

kumbhaḥ

yatra kāraṇatā tatra kāryaṃ samupapadyate ।
yan na kāraṇam evādau tasmāt kāryaṃ kuto bhavet ।। 

nehāsti kāraṇaṃ kiñcin na ca kāryaṃ kadācana ।
vidyamānam idaṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ śāntam ajaṃ jagat ।। 

jāyate kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yat tat kāraṇavad bhavet ।
yan na jāyata eveha tasmin sadṛśatā kutaḥ ।। 

bījam eva na yasyāsti tat kathaṃ vada jāyate ।
apratarkyam anākhyaṃ ca yan na tasyeha bījatā ।। 

deśakālavaśāt sarvā hetumatyaḥ pramopamāḥ ।
akartṛ brahma viṣayaḥ pramākāraṇayoḥ katham ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇe nāsti kāraṇatā śive ।
tasmād akāraṇaṃ nāsti jagacchabdārthavedanam ।। 

brahmaiva svaṃ svarūpaṃ sad yat sthitaṃ dhārayat tatam ।
asamyagdarśiviṣayaṃ tad eva jagad ācitam ।। 

cinmātram ajaraṃ śāntaṃ yad ekaṃ tat pragīyate ।
tenaivājaṃ jagadbrahma sac chāntaṃ budhyate vapuḥ ।। 

asya sva eva yo bhāvaś cetasaḥ pṛthivīpate ।
sa eva nāśaḥ kathitaś cānubhūtaś ca paṇḍitaiḥ ।। 

cittaṃ nāśasvabhāvaṃ tvaṃ viddhi nāśātmakaṃ nṛpa ।
kṣaṇanāśāya saṅkalpaś cittaśabdena kathyate ।। 

asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayaṃ vinā ।
saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ ।। 

nāmnaivāṅgīkṛtābhāvaṃ yad avidyeti kathyate ।
vidyamānaṃ kathaṃ tat syāc cittaṃ tāmarasekṣaṇa ।। 

hastāv utkṣipya yo brūte śūdro asmīti bhṛśaṃ girā ।
kathaṃ sa vipro bhavati vipratvaṃ tasya kīdṛśam ।। 

vivṛttadhātur atyuccair mṛto asmīti virauti yaḥ ।
mṛtam evāṅga taṃ viddhi jīvitaṃ tasya tu bhramaḥ ।। 

bhramākṛti yad astīha dṛśyate alātacakravat ।
mṛgatṛṣṇādvicandrādibālavetālakādivat ।। 

tat kathaṃ kila nāma syāt satyaṃ bhramabharātmakam ।
ajñānabhrāntir evātaś cittam ity eva kathyate ।। 

ajñānam ucyate cittam asat sad iva saṃsthitam ।
mithyābhramaṃ nirākāraṃ keśoṇḍukam ivāmbare ।। 

evam ajñānam evaitac cittaśabdena kathyate ।
tannāśaś cetaso nāśaś cittatyāgas sa eva ca ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

ajñānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathaṃ caitad vinaśyati ।
samāseneti bhagavan vada me vadatāṃ vara ।। 

kumbhaḥ

yad asaṃvedanaṃ samyag vastuno rājasattama ।
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasya kumbhādes tad ajñānam iti smṛtam ।। 

asaṃvedanam ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ bhavet ।
ajñānasya tv asaṃvitter jñānāt saṃvedanāt kṣayaḥ ।। 

jalajñānaṃ mudhābhrāntis sādho marumarīciṣu ।
naitaj jalam iti jñānāt saṃvittiḥ pravilīyate ।। 

idaṃ cittam iti prauḍhaṃ yad ajñānam alaṃ hṛdi ।
nāsti cittam iti jñānāt tat samūlaṃ vinaśyati ।। 

yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvam ajñānabhramasambhavam ।
na sarpo ayam iti jñānād dhṛdi rūḍhāt praṇaśyati ।। 

cittaṃ mano aham ity antar yāvad ajñānasambhavaḥ ।
tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

cittaṃ nāsty aham ity antar yāvaj jñānodayo bhavet ।
tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā nāsty evātra na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

mithyāyakṣabhramo yāvat tāvad yakṣo hi dṛśyate ।
mithyāyakṣabhrame śānte kuto yakṣasya sambhavaḥ ।। 

na cittam asti no caittam ahaṅkārādisaṃyutam ।
kiñcid eva jagaty asmin saṃvid ekāsti nirmalā ।। 

tayā saṅkalpacittādi kṛtam āsīd vimūḍhayā ।
yad yat saṅkalpya tat sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ prabuddhayā ।। 

saṅkalpena yad āyāti tat saṅkalpena gacchati ।
pavanena mahābāho jvālājālam ivānale ।। 

ātmatattvaikaghanayā tat tayā brahmasattayā ।
jagat sarvam abhivyāptaṃ samudra iva vāriṇā ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo asti na tvaṃ naite na cittakam ।
nendriyāṇi na cākāśam ātmaivaiko asti nirmalaḥ ।। 

ghaṭādyākārarūpeṇa sa evāyaṃ vilokyate ।
idaṃ cittam ayaṃ cāham iti keva kukalpanā ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye ।
kevalaṃ vilasaty ātmā sadasadbhāvanātmanā ।। 

sarvam ātmā paraṃ brahma sakṛt prakaṭam ātatam ।
dvitvaikatve na vidyete nirbhrāntir bhava satyataḥ ।। 

sarvendriyaguṇākāras sann evāsi sakhe nabhaḥ ।
