na dahyase mahābuddhe na ca kvacana lipyase ।। 

na te vinaśyati sakhe na ca kiñcid vivardhate ।
nirmalākāśarūpasya caikasyānantarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

icchānicchātmike śaktī ye tavāpi tvam eva te ।
na hy aṃśuvyatirekeṇa śaśāṅka upalabhyate ।। 

tvam ajaram aparaṃ parasvabhāvaṃ sakṛd amalaṃ satataṃ sad ekarūpam ।
vigalitakalanaṃ kalākhyalīlaṃ samuditam ādyam ajaṃ tad ātmatattvam ।। 

śikhidhvajaparamārthabodho nāma sargaḥ

pañcottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti kumbhavaco rājā bhāvayaṃs tad akṛtrimam ।
sva evātmapade tasmin kṣaṇaṃ pariṇato abhavat ।। 

babhūvāmīlitamanolocanaś śāntavāg abhīḥ ।
śilātalād ivotkīrṇo nisspandāvayavākṛtiḥ ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa prabuddhaṃ sphāritekṣaṇam ।
tam uvāca mahābāho cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī ।। 

kumbhaḥ

kaccid asmin pade sphāre śuddhe mṛduni nirmale ।
sutalpe nirvikalpānāṃ sukhaṃ viśrāntavān asi ।। 

kaccid antaḥ prabuddho asi kaccid bhrāntis tvayojjhitā ।
kaccij jñeyaṃ parijñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam eva vā ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena mahāvibhavabhūṣitā ।
mahatī padavī dṛṣṭā sarvasyordhve sthitā mayā ।। 

satāṃ viditavedyānām aho bata mahātmanām ।
apūrvaikāmṛtamayas saṅgas sāraphalapradaḥ ।। 

janmanāpi mayā labdhaṃ yan nāma na mahāmṛtam ।
tad adya tvatsamāsaṅgāt kṣaṇenāsāditaṃ svayam ।। 

anantam ādyam amṛtam etat kamalalocana ।
kathaṃ nāsāditam abhūd etad ātmapadaṃ mayā ।। 

kumbhaḥ

manasy upaśamaṃ yāte tyaktabhogaiṣaṇe sthite ।
kaṣāyapāke nirvṛtte sarvendriyagaṇasya ca ।। 

yānti cetasi viśrāntiṃ vimalā daiśikoktayaḥ ।
yathā sitāṃśuke śuddhe bindavaḥ kuṅkumāmbhasaḥ ।। 

kaṣāyāṇām anantānāṃ sambhṛtānāṃ śarīrake ।
svavāsanāsvarūpāṇām adya pākas tavoditaḥ ।। 

dehān malāni sarvāṇi kālena kamalekṣaṇa ।
sādho vṛkṣāt phalānīva pākena vigalanty adhaḥ ।। 

vāsanātmasu yāteṣu maleṣu vilayaṃ sakhe ।
yad vakti gurur antas tad viśatīṣur yathā bile ।। 

kaṣāyapāke sampanne tvaṃ mayādya vibodhitaḥ ।
tenādyaiva tavājñānakṣayo jāto mahāmate ।। 

adya pakvakaṣāyas tvam adyaivājñānasaṅkṣayī ।
adyaiva sopadeśyas tvam adyaivāsi prabuddhavān ।। 

śubhāśubhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām adya saṅkṣayaḥ ।
satsaṅgavyapadeśena tava niṣpattim āgataḥ ।। 

yāvad asya dinasyaiṣa pūrvo bhāgo mahīpate ।
tāvac ceto hy aham iti tavājñānaṃ babhūva ha ।। 

idānīṃ madvacobodhāc cetasi kṣayam āgate ।
hṛdayāt samparityakte samprabuddho asi bhūpate ।। 

hṛdi yāvan manassattā tāvad ajñānasaṃsthitiḥ ।
citte cittatayā tyakte jñānasyābhyudayo bhavet ।। 

dvitvaikatvadṛśau cittaṃ tad evājñānam ucyate ।
etayor yo layo dṛṣṭyos taj jñānaṃ sā parā gatiḥ ।। 

prabuddho asi vimukto asi tyaktaṃ cittaṃ tvayā nṛpa ।
sad eva sattayāttaṃ hi tvayā tyaktam asat padam ।। 

vītaśoko nirāyāso nissaṅgo nityam ātmavān ।
mahodayo munir maunī kharūpas tiṣṭha nirmalaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

evaṃ hi bhagavañ jantor mūrkhasyaivāsti cittabhūḥ ।
na prabuddhasya tajjñasya cittam asti kila prabho ।। 

jīvanmuktās ta ete hi viharanti kathaṃ vada ।
avidyamānamanaso yuṣmadādyās tathā narāḥ ।। 

iti me kathayāśeṣam anyaiś ca vacanāṃśubhiḥ ।
hārdaṃ tamo me nipuṇam evamprāyaiḥ pramārjaya ।। 

kumbhaḥ

yathā vadasi dharmajña tat tathaiva hi nānyathā ।
cittaṃ hi jīvanmuktānāṃ nāsty aṅkura ivāśmanām ।। 

punarjananayogyā yā vāsanā ghanavāsanā ।
sā proktā cittaśabdena na sā tajjñasya vidyate ।। 

yayā vāsanayā tajjñā viharantīha karmasu ।
tāṃ tvaṃ sattvābhidhāṃ viddhi punarjananavarjitām ।। 

jīvanmuktā mahātmānas sattvasthās saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
viharanti gatāsaṅgaṃ na cittasthāḥ kadācana ।। 

mūḍhaṃ cittaṃ cittam āhuḥ prabuddhaṃ sattvam ucyate ।
aprabuddhā hi cittasthās sattvasthā hi mahādhiyaḥ ।। 

bhūyaḥ prajāyate cittaṃ sattvaṃ bhūyo na jāyate ।
aprabuddhasya bandho asti na prabuddhasya bhūpate ।। 

sattvavān asi sañjāto mahātyāgī sthito bhavān ।
aśeṣeṇa tvayā tyaktaṃ cittam adyeti vedmy aham ।। 

samastavāsanāmukto rājan rājeva rājase ।
ākāśasāmyam āyātaṃ manye tava mune manaḥ ।। 

śamaṃ prāpto asi paramaṃ śuddhas samasamasthitiḥ ।
mandarāhananonmukto yathā kṣīramahārṇavaḥ ।। 

parityaktā tvayā rājyād vāsanā tapasas tathā ।
kānanāc ca śarīrāc ca śubhāśubhaphalād api ।। 

nirīho vigatāsaṅgas tyaktacitto vivāsanaḥ ।
sampannas tvaṃ mahābāho mahātyāgipadaṃ gataḥ ।। 

ayaṃ sa hi mahātyāgas sarvaṃ yatra samujjhitam ।
svargāpavargacittādi tapodānaphalādy api ।। 

prabuddhayeddhayā sādho dhiyā paramabodhayā ।
tapo nāma kiyanmātraduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ bhavet ।। 

kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ yat sukhaṃ samatāmayam ।
tat sat tad vastu tat kiñcin na tu svargādi bhaṅguram ।। 

bhāvābhāvatulārūḍhas sthitādhivyādhivedhitaḥ ।
svargo nāma kimānandas so api sandeham āsthitaḥ ।। 

aprāptasvārthasaṃsiddheḥ kriyākāṇḍaś śubho bhavet ।
yena nāsāditaṃ hema rītiṃ kiṃ sa parityajet ।। 

cūḍālādisamāsaṅgād bhavej jñatvaṃ sukhena te ।
tat kimartham anarthe asmin nimagnas tvaṃ tapomaye ।। 

āśramādivikalpāṃśasādhyasyāsya kukarmaṇaḥ ।
ādyantau paśya sumate madhya eva ramasva mā ।। 

yata ete samāyātā yasmin pariṇamanti ca ।
taporūpā vikalpāṃśās tatra baddhapado bhava ।। 

cidvyomno nabhaso apy acchāt sarve bhāvās samutthitāḥ ।
tatraiva ca layaṃ yānti tatraivāssva ramasva ca ।। 

idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti saṅkalpā brahmabindavaḥ ।
bindūñ śikhidhvaja tyaktvā pūrṇameghaṃ samāśraya ।। 

iṣṭaṃ me prārthayasveti yathaiva prārthyate sakhī ।
striyā tathaiva na kathaṃ dayitaḥ prārthyate svayam ।। 

saṅkalparacitān etān bhāvān āpātabhāsurān ।
na gṛhṇanti mahātmānaḥ prājñā jalaravīn iva ।। 

svargamokṣādiphaladaṃ yat kiñcit samam eva tat ।
tyaktvā samasamābhāso yo asy asāv eva vai bhava ।। 

santaṃ sattvena nāśena naśyantaṃ vigataspṛhaḥ ।
padārthaugham imaṃ gṛhṇaṃs tiṣṭhāspanditacittabhūḥ ।। 

aparispandacittasya saṃsṛtir neha bādhate ।
pauruṣaprabhavā sādho vipan nītimato yathā ।। 

yāni yānīha duḥkhāni prasphuranti jagattraye ।
cetaścāpalajāny eva tāni tāni mahīpate ।। 

sthiraṃ śāntaṃ gataspandaṃ yasya cittam acāpalam ।
sa vibhus sa mahānandī sāmrājyasya sa bhājanam ।। 

atha cetasi tattvajña spandāspandau tad ekatām ।
nītvā tiṣṭha yathākāmam aikyam āgatya śāśvatam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

katham aikyavidhiṃ yātas spandāspandāv imau vibho ।
sarvasaṃśayavicchedakārinn etad vadāśu me ।। 

kumbhaḥ

ekaṃ vastu jagat sarvaṃ cinmātraṃ vār ivāmbudhiḥ ।
tad eva spandate no vā śuddhaṃ vārīva vīcibhiḥ ।। 

brahma cinmātram amalaṃ satyam ityādināmabhiḥ ।
yad gītaṃ tad idaṃ mūḍhaḥ paśyaty aṅga jagattayā ।। 

nisspanda eva sarvasmin sarge tasmād dhi saṃsṛtiḥ ।
parispando hi vīcyādis tad aspandaṃ samaṃ param ।। 

citas sa eva cet spandas tathāspandaś ca bhāvitaḥ ।
ekarūpatayā nāma tat tad apy acalaṃ śivam ।। 

sargaś citspandamātrātmā samyagdṛṣṭo vilīyate ।
udety asamyagdṛṣṭātmā rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo yathā ।। 

saspandā cic cidabhidhā nisspandā tv iyam ātatā ।
turyātītapadārūḍhā vācā vaktuṃ na pāryate ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkasantatābhyāsayogataḥ ।
kālenāmalatāṃ yāte cetasīndāv ivodite ।। 

etat kevalam ābhātaṃ svānubhūtigirātatam ।
kathyate svānubhūtes tu svayaṃ svaṃ rūpam ātmanā ।। 

prāpto asi bhāvaṃ svam anādimadhyam atraiva tiṣṭheṣṭapade niviṣṭaḥ ।
nīrūpanirbhedamahācidātmā jāto asi sādho khalu vītaśokaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajabodho nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

kumbhaḥ

iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śikhidhvaja mahīpate ।
yathedam utthitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā ca pravilīyate ।। 

etac chrutvā ca buddhvā ca matvā ca munināyaka ।
yathecchasi tathā tiṣṭha dṛṣṭaspaṣṭapadaḥ pade ।। 

svargaṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ tatra kāle asmin nārado muniḥ ।
brahmalokāt samāyāto bhavaty amarasaṃsadam ।। 

na māṃ paśyati cet tatra tat kopam upagacchati ।
nodvejanīyā bhavyena guravo hi kadācana ।। 

tyaktasaṅkalpalekhena na kiñcid abhivāñchatā ।
tvayātmany eva vastavyaṃ dṛṣṭir eṣaiva pāvanī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti yāvat prativacaḥ puṣpahastaś śikhidhvajaḥ ।
praṇāmāya dadāty eṣa tāvad antardhim āyayau ।। 

pratibhāsagataṃ vastu yathaivāgre na dṛśyate ।
na dṛṣṭavāṃs tathā kumbham agre rājā śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

gate kumbhe mahīpālaḥ paraṃ vismayam āyayau ।
tad eva cintayaṃś citraṃ citrārpita ivābhavat ।। 

iti sañcintayām āsa citraṃ vilasitaṃ vidheḥ ।
yat kumbhavyapadeśena bodhito asmi cirād ayam ।। 

kva nāradasutaḥ kumbhaḥ kvāhaṃ nāma śikhidhvajaḥ ।
kevalaṃ kālayuktyaivam ahaṃ sampratibodhitaḥ ।। 

aho nu samyak kathitaṃ devaputreṇa yuktimat ।
aho nu samprabuddho asmi mohanidrākulaś cirāt ।। 

kvāham āsaṃ vinirmagnaḥ kriyājālakukardame ।
idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti mithyāvibhramam ācaran ।। 

aho nu śītalā śuddhā śānteyaṃ padavī nijā ।
rasāyanadravākārā sattvaṃ śītayatīva me ।। 

śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam ।
cinmātram api necchāmi saṃsthito asmi yathāsthitam ।। 

evaṃ sañcintayan rājā evaṃnirvāsanāśayaḥ ।
śailād iva samutkīrṇo maunam evātha tasthivān ।। 

tasminn eva tato maunī nissaṅkalpe nirāmaye ।
pratiṣṭhāṃ niścalāṃ prāpya sa tasthau giriśṛṅgavat ।। 

sa tatra saṃśāntabhayo mahātmā cireṇa viśrāntim itas samātmā ।
cireṇa samprāptanijāmalātmā yogena suṣvāpa tadā cidātmā ।। 

śikhidhvajasamādhānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nirvikalpasamādhānāt kāṣṭhakuḍyopamas sthitaḥ ।
evaṃ śikhidhvajo rāma cūḍālām adhunā śṛṇu ।। 

śikhidhvajaṃ taṃ bhartāraṃ kumbhaveṣena tena sā ।
prabodhyāntardhim āgatya tatāra tarasā nabhaḥ ।। 

devaputrākṛtiṃ vyomni jahau māyāvinirmitām ।
vidagdhamugdham ākāraṃ straiṇaṃ jagrāha sundaram ।। 

nabhasā svapuraṃ prāpya viveśāntaḥpuraṃ kṣaṇāt ।
dṛśyā babhūva lokasya nṛpakarma cakāra sā ।। 

vāsaratritayenāpi punar ambaram etya sā ।
babhūva kumbho yogena śikhidhvajavanaṃ yayau ।। 

tathā tatraiva taṃ bhūpam apaśyad vanabhūmigā ।
nirvikalpasamādhisthaṃ samutkīrṇam iva drumāt ।। 

aho nu khalu bho diṣṭyā viśrānto ayam ihātmani ।
sthitas svasthas samaś śānta ity uvāca puraḥ prabhoḥ ।। 

tad enaṃ tāvad etasmād bodhayāmi parāt padāt ।
idānīm eva kiṃ dehatyāgam eṣa karoti vai ।। 

kañcit kālaṃ sphuritveha rājyena vipinena vā ।
samam eva gamiṣyāvas tyaktadehāv imau śamam ।। 

tad yāvad eṣo vicalaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati ।
anenābhyāsayogena tāvad ābodhayāmy aham ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā siṃhanādaṃ cakāra sā ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ prabhor agre vanecarabhayapradam ।। 

na cacāla śilevādrau yadā nādena tena saḥ ।
bhūyo bhūyaḥ kṛtenāpi tadā sā taṃ vyacālayat ।। 

cālitaḥ pātito apy eṣa yadā na bubudhe nṛpaḥ ।
tadā sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī ।। 

aho pariṇatas sādhus svapade bhagavān ayam ।
tad enaṃ hi kayā yuktyā sāmprataṃ bodhayāmy aham ।। 

atha vainaṃ mahātmānaṃ kimarthaṃ bodhayāmy aham ।
videhaṃ bodham āsādya tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsukham ।। 

aham apy aṅganādeham imaṃ tyaktvā paraṃ padam ।
apunarjananāyaiva gacchāmīha hi kiṃ mama ।। 

iti sañcintya dehaṃ svaṃ tyaktum abhyudyatā satī ।
punas sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā sā mahāsatī ।। 

ālokayāmi vai tāvad enaṃ dehaṃ mahīpateḥ ।
yady asya sattvaśeṣo asti bodhabījaṃ hṛdantare ।। 

tat kālenaiṣa bhagavān samprabodham upaiṣyati ।
mūlakośarasālīnaṃ puṣpajālaṃ madhāv iva ।। 

tadeha viharañ jīvanmukta eko bhavaty ayam ।
maiko bhavatv eṣa iti manye gacchāmi no śamam ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā sparśena nayanena ca ।
patim ālokya sāśaṅkam uvāca varavarṇinī ।। 

asty eva sattvaśeṣo asya hṛdi sambodhakāraṇam ।
kāyo ayam agaladrūpo nemaṃ dehaṃ tyajāmy aham ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhṛśaṃ saṃśāntacittasya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthiteḥ ।
sattvaśeṣaḥ kathaṃ brahmañ jñāyate dhyānaśālinaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prabodhakāraṇaṃ yasya durlakṣyāṇuvapur hṛdi ।
vidyate sattvaśeṣo antar bīje puṣpaphalaṃ yathā ।। 

cittaspandavimuktasya tasyāspanditasaccitaḥ ।
dvitvaikatvavihīnasya samasyācalasaṃsthiteḥ ।। 

kāyas samasamābhogo na glāyati na hṛṣyati ।
nāstam eti na codeti samam evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

dvitvaikatvādiyuktasya yasya praspandate manaḥ ।
tasya deho anyatām eti nāspandasya kadācana ।। 

cittaspando hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ ।
rāma bhāvavikārāṇāṃ kusumānāṃ yathā madhuḥ ।। 

yasmin praspandate dehe cittaṃ sa hi muhur muhuḥ ।
harṣaglapanasammohavaśam eti raghūdvaha ।। 

citte praśamam āyāte kāyo yas sattvavān sthitaḥ ।
bādhate nāmbarasyeva tasya bhāvavikārabhūḥ ।। 

vīcyādi na yathodeti samāyā jalasantateḥ ।
tathā na dṛśyate doṣas samāyās sattvasaṃsthiteḥ ।। 

sattvasyānupalambho asti nānyas svopaśamād ṛte ।
yāvad bhāvi samaṃ sattvaṃ kālāc chāmyati kevalam ।। 

dehe yasmiṃs tu no cittaṃ nāpi sattvaṃ ca vidyate ।
sa tāpahimavad rāma pañcatvena vilīyate ।। 

śikhidhvajasya deho asau niścitaṃ cetasojjhitaḥ ।
sattvāṃśena ca saṃyuktas tena na mlānibhājanam ।। 

taṃ tathābhūtam ālokya bhartur dehaṃ varāṅganā ।
anujjhitavatī dehaṃ cintayām āsa satvaram ।। 

cittattvaṃ sarvagaṃ śuddhaṃ praviśyābodhayāmy aham ।
bhaviṣyadbodhanaṃ kāntam eṣa tatra hi saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

na bodhayāmi yady enaṃ cirāt tad budhyate svayam ।
kim ihaikāvatiṣṭhe aham ity enaṃ bodhayāmy aham ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā dehaṃ kāraṇapañjaram ।
santyajya prāpa cittattve sthitim ādyantavarjite ।। 

tatra sā cetanaspandaṃ kṛtvā sattvavataḥ prabhoḥ ।
svaṃ viveśa punar dehaṃ khān nīḍam iva pakṣiṇī ।। 

kumbhākṛtir athotthāya niviṣṭā kusumasthale ।
sāma gātuṃ pravṛttā sā bhramarīvṛndasasvanā ।। 

taṃ sāmasvanam ākarṇya cit sattvaguṇaśālinaḥ ।
bubudhe bhūpater dehe vasanta iva padminī ।। 

dṛśaṃ vikāsayām āsa tāṃ tadārka ivābjinīm ।
gṛhītasattvasampattiś śikhidhvajamahīpatiḥ ।। 

apaśyat kumbham agrasthaṃ sāmagāyanatatparam ।
pareṇa vapuṣā yuktaṃ sāmavedam ivāparam ।। 

aho bata vayaṃ dhanyāḥ punaḥ prāpto munes sutaḥ ।
ity evodāharan rājā kumbhāya kusumaṃ dadau ।। 

diṣṭyā sthitās smo bhagavaṃs tava cetasi pāvane ।
ke nāma na mahāsattvāḥ prasādeṣv aṅga hi sthirāḥ ।। 

asmatpavitrīkaraṇam ekam āgamakāraṇam ।
tava pāpāpahaṃ brūhi dvitīyaṃ katarad bhavet ।। 

kumbhaḥ

yataḥ prabhṛti yāto asmi tvatsakāśād arindama ।
tataḥ prabhṛti ceto me tvayaiveha samaṃ sthitam ।। 

na rame svargaraṅgeṣu devodyāneṣu cānagha ।
merumandarakūṭeṣu kailāsakuhareṣu ca ।। 

tvatsaṅgam eva vāñchāmi subhagācārapeśalam ।
amṛtasyandasaṅkāśaṃ madhumāsam iva drumaḥ ।। 

tasmād eveha tiṣṭhāmi samīpe tava sāmpratam ।
abhīṣṭaṃ yad yad evāṅga ramyāṇāṃ dhuri tat sthitam ।। 

tvādṛśo bandhur āptaś ca suhṛn mitraṃ sakhā tathā ।
viśvāsyaś caiva śiṣyaś ca manye jagati nāsti me ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

aho nu phalitaṃ puṇyapādapair naḥ kulācale ।
yad bhavān apy asaṅgo api vāñchaty asmatsamāgamam ।। 

idaṃ vanam ime vṛkṣā bhṛtyo ayam aham ādṛtaḥ ।
rocate cen na te svargas tad iha sthīyatāṃ prabho ।। 

bhavadvitīrṇayā yogayuktyā viśrāntavān aham ।
yathā sādho tathā manye svarge viśramaṇaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

tām eva svasthitiṃ svacchām avalambya prakāśinīm ।
vihareha yathākāmaṃ svarge bhūmitale atha vā ।। 

kumbhaḥ

pare pade mahānande kaccid viśrāntavān asi ।
idaṃ bhedamayaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaccit santyaktavān asi ।। 

kaccid āpātaramyebhyas saṅkalpebhyo ratir bhṛśam ।
nirmūlatāṃ gatā rājann oghatīralateva te ।। 

heyādeyadaśātītaṃ śāntaṃ samasamasthiti ।
yathāprāpteṣv anudvegi kaccit tava manas sthitam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

tvatprasādena bhagavan dṛṣṭā dṛśyātigā gatiḥ ।
prāptas saṃsārasīmānto labdho labdhavyaniścayaḥ ।। 

cirāyāticireṇaiva viśrāntās smo nirāmayāḥ ।
labdhaṃ labdhavyam akhilaṃ tṛptās smaś ciram akṣatāḥ ।। 

nopadeṣṭavyam asmākaṃ kiñcid apy upayujyate ।
sarvatraivātitṛptās smas saṃsthitās smo gatajvaram ।। 

jñātam ajñātam aprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ tyaktam āśritam ।
tvattvaṃ paratvaṃ mattvaṃ me khasyevāsti na kiñcana ।। 

nissaṃsṛtir vigatamohabhayābhirāmo nityoditas samasamāśayasarvasomyaḥ ।
sarvātmakas sakalasaṅkalanāvimukta ākāśakośaviśadaś śamam āsthito asmi ।। 

kumbhapunarāgamanayogo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity adhyātmavicitrābhiḥ kathābhis tau parasparam ।
āsatāṃ vedyavettārau muhūrtatritayaṃ vane ।। 

tata utthāya kasmiṃścit snātau sarasasārase ।
sarovare vane caiva vihṛtau nandanopame ।। 

tenācāreṇa tābhiś ca kathābhis tau vanecarau ।
nītavantau dināny aṣṭau tāsu kānanavīthiṣu ।। 

atha kumbha uvācānyad vanaṃ yāvo girāv iti ।
tad om iti nṛpo matvā tāv ubhau praviceratuḥ ।। 

vanāny anekarūpāṇi jaṅgalāni taṭāni ca ।
sarāṃsi gulmajālāni śṛṅgāṇi gahanāni ca ।। 

nadīr deśāṃs tathā grāmān nagarāṇi purāṇi ca ।
marūn ghorān girīn kuñjāṃs tīrthāny āyatanāni ca ।। 

samam eva samasnehau samaveṣau sthitāv ubhau ।
samasattau samotsāhau sasnatus tasthatus tathā ।। 

ānarcatuḥ pitṝn devān bubhujāte ca rāghava ।
samaṃ talpe ca śiśyāte samabuddhī babhūvatuḥ ।। 

tamālavanaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca ।
dampatī snigdhahṛdayau suhṛdau tau virejatuḥ ।। 

idaṃ grāhyam idaṃ neti vikalpakalanā manaḥ ।
na jahāra tayo rāma vātyeva vibudhācalam ।। 

viceratus tau suhṛdau kvacid dhūlividhūsarau ।
kvacic candanadigdhāṅgau kvacid bhasmānurañjitau ।। 

kvacid divyāmbaradharau cīrāmbaradharau kvacit ।
kvacit pallavasañchannau kvacit kusumamaṇḍitau ।। 

dinaiḥ katipayair eva gatacittatayā tayā ।
sattvodāttatayā caiva rājā kumbhavad ābabhau ।। 

atha taṃ suragarbhābhaṃ cūḍālā sā śikhidhvajam ।
dṛṣṭvā śobhām upagataṃ cintayām āsa māninī ।। 

ayaṃ patir anindyātmā tathemā vanabhūmayaḥ ।
iyaṃ sthitir anāyāsā yo na kāmī sa vañcitaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktadhiyāṃ bhoge yathāprāptam atiṣṭhatām ।
ekagrahātmikā tucchā mūḍhataivoditā bhavet ।। 

nijaḥ patir anindyātmā nirādhitvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ ।
gṛhāṇi puṣpajālāni sā hatā yā na kāminī ।। 

vanapuṣpalatāgehe svāyatte bhartari priye ।
ramate yā na nirduḥkhā sā hataiva duraṅganā ।। 

vaśyaṃ vivāhitaṃ kāntaṃ patim āsādya nirjane ।
strī satī yā na ramate tāṃ dhig astu duraṅganām ।। 

samujjhatā yathāprāptam api vedyavidā satā ।
anindyaṃ svam udārārthaṃ kiṃ tajjñena kṛtaṃ bhavet ।। 

tat kañcid racayāmy āśu prapañcaṃ prajñayā navam ।
yenāyaṃ bhūpatir bhartā ramate mayi mānadaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā kumbhaveṣadharā patim ।
prāha kānanagulmasthā kokilaṃ kokilā yathā ।। 

kumbhaḥ

caitramāsasya śukle ayaṃ pratipaddivasas suhṛt ।
adyāsthānaṃ mahārambhaṃ svarge bhavati vai hareḥ ।। 

sannidhānaṃ mayā tatra kartavyaṃ pitur agrataḥ ।
yathāsthitā hi niyatir na santyājyā kadācana ।। 

pratipālayitavyaṃ me tvayehādya vanāvanau ।
krīḍatā dhyānapuṣpābhyāṃ samudvegam agacchatā ।। 

āgacchāmi dinānte adya nirvikalpaṃ nabhastalāt ।
svargād atitarām eva tvatsaṅgo mama tuṣṭaye ।। 

ity uktvā mañjarīṃ kumbho dadau mitrāya kausumīm ।
prītaye svām iva prītiṃ kāntāṃ nandanavṛkṣajām ।। 

āgantavyaṃ tvayā śīghram evaṃ vadati bhūpatau ।
pupluve ca vanād vyoma śaranmugdhapayodavat ।। 

puṣpajālaṃ jahau vyoma vrajan kusumadāmajam ।
visāri vanavātena himaṃ haima ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajo vrajantaṃ taṃ dadarśādarśanaṃ gatam ।
unnidro abdaṃ yathā barhī satprītir hi sudustyajā ।। 

śikhidhvajadṛśām ante vyomni kumbhavapur jahau ।
sānāvarteva vāriśrīr mugdhā svaṃ rūpam āyayau ।। 

prāpa mañjaritākārakalpavṛkṣopamaṃ puram ।
sphuratpatākam ātmīyaṃ svargaramyaṃ divaḥ pathā ।। 

antaḥpuram adṛśyaiva viveśa lalanākulam ।
madhumāsamahālakṣmīr lasallatam iva drumam ।। 

rājakāryāṇy aśeṣāṇi tatra sampādya satvaram ।
śikhidhvajavanaṃ gantuṃ punar āpupluve nabhaḥ ।। 

ullaṅghya gaganādhvānaṃ samaṃ dinakarāṃśubhiḥ ।
śikhidhvajavanaṃ śaile dadarśa gagane sthitā ।। 

taṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbharūpaṃ tat punar jagrāha satvaram ।
śikhidhvajasya purataḥ papāta ca khapuṣpavat ।। 

tatra mlānadyuti mukhaṃ cakārākhinnamānasam ।
induṃ sanīhāram iva yāmā khinnam ivāmbujam ।। 

taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛgākāraṃ samuttasthau śikhidhvajaḥ ।
babhūva khinnacetāś ca samuvācedam ādṛtaḥ ।। 

devaputra namas te astu vimanā iva lakṣyase ।
kumbhas tvaṃ tyaja saṃrambham idam āsanam āsyatām ।। 

santo viditavedyā ye te hi harṣaviṣādajām ।
nāśrayanti sthitiṃ svasthāḥ padmā iva jalārdratām ।। 

tena smopaviśety ukte kumbha āhāsane viśan ।
girā viṣaṇṇayā śīrṇavaṃśasvanasamānayā ।। 

yāvaddeham avasthāsu samacittatayaiva ye ।
karmendriyair na tiṣṭhanti na te tattvadhiyaś śaṭhāḥ ।। 

ye hy atattvavido mūḍhā rājan bālatayaiva te ।
avasthābhyaḥ palāyante gṛhītābhyas svabhāvataḥ ।। 

yāvattilaṃ yathā tailaṃ yāvaddehaṃ daśā tathā ।
yo na dehadaśām eti sa cchinatty asināmbaram ।। 

eṣa dehadaśāduḥkhaparihāro hy anuttamaḥ ।
yat sāmyaṃ cetaso yogān na tu karmendriyasthiteḥ ।। 

yāvaddehaṃ yathācāraṃ daśāsv aṅga vijānatā ।
karmendriyair hi sthātavyaṃ na tu buddhīndriyaiḥ kvacit ।। 

parameṣṭhiprabhṛtayas sarva evoditāśayāḥ ।
dehāvasthāsu tiṣṭhanti niyater eṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

ajñatattvajñabhūtādi dṛśyajātam idaṃ hi yat ।
tat sarvam eva niyatiṃ dhāvaty ambu yathāmbudhim ।। 

tajjñā buddhyādisāmyena pāṇyādicalanena ca ।
niyatiṃ yāpayantīmāṃ yāvaddeham akhaṇḍitāḥ ।। 

ajñās tu sarvakṣobheṇa sukhaduḥkhadaśāhatāḥ ।
niyatiṃ yāpayanty aṅga dehalakṣair vikhaṇḍitāḥ ।। 

itthaṃ sukheṣu nanu duḥkhadaśāsu cetthaṃ sthātavyam ity adhigataṃ yad ihāṅga jīvaiḥ ।
tajjñājñabhūtanicayas sphuritas tad eva durlaṅghya eṣa niyato niyater vilāsaḥ ।। 

jīvanmuktavyavahṛtiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

navottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

śikhidhvajaḥ

evaṃ sthite mahābhāga katham udvegam īdṛśam ।
labdhavān asi devo api svargād api sukhāspadāt ।। 

kumbhaḥ

śṛṇu kāryam idaṃ citraṃ madīyaṃ vasudhādhipa ।
kathayāmi tavāśeṣaṃ svarge yad vṛttam adya me ।। 

suhṛdy āveditaṃ duḥkhaṃ param āyāti tānavam ।
ghanaṃ jaḍaṃ kṛṣṇam api muktavṛṣṭir ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

suhṛdā pṛcchatā sādhu ceto yāti prasannatām ।
snihyatopagatenāśu katakena jalaṃ yathā ।। 

ahaṃ tāvad ito yāto bhavate puṣpamañjarīm ।
dattvā gaganam ullaṅghya samprāptaś ca triviṣṭapam ।। 

tatra pitrā sahendrasya sabhāsthāne yathākramam ।
sthitvotthāya tathotthānakāle pitrā visarjitaḥ ।। 

ihāgantum ahaṃ svargaṃ tyaktvā samprāptavān nabhaḥ ।
divākarahayais sārdhaṃ vahāmy anilavartmani ।। 

athaikatra gato bhānur ekenānyena vartmanā ।
āgacchāmy aham ākāśasāgarāt patitākṛtiḥ ।। 

athāgre vāripūrṇānāṃ meghānāṃ madhyavartmanā ।
apaśyaṃ munim āyāntam ahaṃ durvāsasaṃ javāt ।। 

payodharapaṭacchannaṃ vidyudvalayabhūṣitam ।
abhisārikayā tulyaṃ dhārādhautāṅgasañcayam ।। 

sthitaṃ sumeghacchāyāyāṃ śyāmāyāṃ vasudhātale ।
vegenābhisarantaṃ taṃ tapolakṣmīm iva priyām ।। 

tasya kṛtvā namaskāram uktaṃ ca vahatā mayā ।
mune nīlābdavastras tvam abhisārikayā samaḥ ।। 

ity ākarṇya cukopāsau mayi mānada mānahā ।
visphārya rakte nayane prāha gambhīranissvanam ।। 

pautro asmi padmajasyeti garvitas tvaṃ kim īdṛśaḥ ।
bhavyā hi natim āyānti guṇair vṛkṣāḥ phalair iva ।। 

veśyābhisārikārūpo bhavān ity aśubhaṃ vacaḥ ।
mayi vakṣi durācāra mūḍha devakumāraka ।। 

stanakeśavatī kāntā hāvabhāvavikāriṇī ।
gacchānena duruktena rātrau veśyā bhaviṣyasi ।। 

iti śrutvāśubhaṃ vākyam ujjhitaṃ jarjaradvijāt ।
vimṛṣyāmi manāg yāvat tāvad antarhito muniḥ ।। 

ity udvignamanās sādho samprāpto asmi nabhastalāt ।
etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ sampanno asmi niśāṅganā ।। 

ativāhyaṃ dinānteṣu strītvam etan mayā katham ।
yonistanavatā rātrau vaktavyaṃ kiṃ mayā pituḥ ।। 

saṃsṛtau bhavitavyānām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ ।
aham apy anyavad daivād yūnām āmiṣatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

kaṣṭaṃ madapahāreṇa kalaho jāyate adhunā ।
divi devakumārāṇāṃ kāmākuladhiyām iha ।। 

gurudevadvijātīnāṃ lajjāparavaśātmanā ।
katham agre mayā samyak sthātavyaṃ yāminīstriyā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā kṣaṇam ekaṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā munes sutaḥ ।
dhairyam ālambya kumbho atra punar āha raghūdvaha ।। 

kim ajña iva śocāmi kiṃ mama kṣatam ātmanaḥ ।
yathāgatam ayaṃ deho matto anyo anubhaviṣyati ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

paridevanayā ko artho devaputra tavaitayā ।
yad āyāti tad āyātu dehasyātmā na lipyate ।। 

kānicid yāni duḥkhāni sukhāni vihitāni vā ।
tāni sarvāṇi dehasya dehino na tu kānicit ।। 

yadi tvam api kāryāṇām akhedārho api khidyasi ।
tad anyeṣām upāyas syāt ka ivāgamabhūṣaṇa ।। 

khede akhedocitaṃ vācyam iti kiṃ ca tvam uktavān ।
idānīṃ samatām etya tiṣṭhākhinno yathāsthitaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tāv evamādibhir vākyair anyo'nyāśvāsanaṃ svayam ।
kṛtvā sthitau vane snigdhau suhṛdau khedinau mithaḥ ।। 

athārkas tasya kumbhasya strītvam utpādayann iva ।
jagāmāstaṃ jagaddīpo dīpas snehakṣayād iva ।। 

vyavahārabharais sārdhaṃ padmās saṅkocam āyayuḥ ।
mārgāś ca pathikais sārdhaṃ pānthastrīhṛdayāni ca ।। 

dāśavad vihagān sarvān kurvad ekatra puñjitān ।
tārakāratnajālāḍhyaṃ bhuvanaṃ śyāmatāṃ yayau ।। 

khaṃ hasann iva tārāḍhyaṃ vikāsaṃ kumudākaraḥ ।
yayāv unnādacakrāhvaṃ bhramadbhramarapeṭakaḥ ।। 

suhṛdau tāv athotthāya sandhyām udyanniśākarām ।
vandayitvā tathā kṛtvā japyaṃ gulmāntare sthitau ।। 

tataḥ kumbhaś śanais tatra straiṇam abhyāharan vapuḥ ।
śikhidhvajaṃ purassaṃsthaṃ provāca galadakṣaram ।। 

patāmīva sphurāmīva dravāmīvāṅgayaṣṭibhiḥ ।
lajjayeva ca he rājan manye strītvaṃ vrajāmy aham ।। 

paśyeme parivardhante rājan mama śiroruhāḥ ।
prasphurattārakāmālā dinānte timirā iva ।। 

paśyemau mama jāyete pronmukhāv urasi stanau ।
korakāv iva padminyā vasante gaganonmukhau ।। 

āgulpham eva lambāni sampadyante ambarāṇi me ।
dehād eva sakhe paśya striyā iva śanaiś śanaiḥ ।। 

bhūṣaṇāny ururatnāni mālyāni vividhāni ca ।
paśyemāny aṅga jāyante svāṅgebhyo vṛkṣapuṣpavat ।। 

paśyāyaṃ svayam evodyaccandrāṃśubharasundaraḥ ।
mūrdhni paṭṭāṃśuko jāto nīhāro adrāv ivāṅga me ।। 

sarvāṇi kāntāliṅgāni jātāni mama mānada ।
hā dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṣādo me kiṃ karomy aṅganāsmy aham ।। 

hā dhik kaṣṭam aho sādho sthita evāham aṅganā ।
saṃvidānubhavāmy antar nitambaṃ jaghanānvitam ।। 

vipine kumbha ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃ khinno babhūva ha ।
rājāpi ca tam ālokya tathaivāsīd viṣaṇṇadhīḥ ।। 

muhūrtamātreṇovāca śikhidhvaja idaṃ vacaḥ ।
kaṣṭaṃ so ayaṃ mahāsattvas sampanno varavarṇinī ।। 

sādho viditavedyas tvaṃ jānāsi niyater gatim ।
avaśyabhāviny arthe asmin mā khinnahṛdayo bhava ।। 

āpatanti daśās tāta sudhiyāṃ dehamātrake ।
na cetasy adhiyāṃ tv etāś cittaṃ yānti sadehakam ।। 

kumbhaḥ

evam astv anutiṣṭhāmi yāminīstrītvam ātmanaḥ ।
na khedam anugacchāmi niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate ।। 

iti nirṇīya tau khedaṃ taṃ nītvā tanutāṃ mithaḥ ।
ekatalpe niśāṃ tūṣṇīṃ nītavantau cireṇa tām ।। 

atha prabhāte tat svairaṃ vapur utsṛjya yauvatam ।
babhūva kumbhaḥ kumbhābhakucaprojjhitamūrtimān ।। 

iti sā rājamahiṣī cūḍālā varavarṇinī ।
kumbhatvam āsthitā bhartuḥ paścāt strītvam upāgatā ।। 

vijahāra vanānteṣu kumārī dharmiṇī niśi ।
kumbharūpadharā cāhni bhartrā mitreṇa saṃyutā ।। 

kailāsamandarasumerumahendrasahyasānuṣv aviskhalitayogagamāgamā sā ।
sārdhaṃ priyeṇa suhṛdā vibhunā yathecchaṃ sragdāmahāravalitā vijahāra nārī ।। 

strītvalābho nāma sargaḥ

daśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataḥ katipayeṣv eva divaseṣu gateṣu sā ।
idaṃ provāca bhartāraṃ kumbharūpadharā satī ।। 

rājan rājīvapattrākṣa mamedaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu ।
niśāyāṃ pratyahaṃ tāvat sthita evāham aṅganā ।। 

tad icchāmy aṅganādharmaṃ nipuṇīkartum īdṛśam ।
bhartre kasmaicid ātmānaṃ vivāhena dadāmy aham ।। 

tad bhavān eva me bhartā rocate bhuvanatraye ।
gṛhāṇa māṃ vivāhena bhāryātve niśi sarvadā ।। 

ayatnopanataṃ sādho priyeṇa suhṛdā saha ।
strīsukhaṃ bhoktum icchāmi mā me vighnakaro bhava ।। 

kramapravṛttam ā sṛṣṭes sukhasādhyaṃ manoramam ।
prakṛtaṃ kurvataḥ kāryaṃ doṣaḥ ka iva jāyate ।। 

icchānicchādṛśor aikyāt samatvāt sarvavastuṣu ।
vayaṃ na secchā nānicchāḥ kurvas tenaitad īpsitam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

kṛtenānena kāryeṇa na śubhaṃ nāśubhaṃ sakhe ।
paśyāmi tan mahābuddhe yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

samatāṃ samprayātena cetasedaṃ jagattrayam ।
kharūpam eva paśyāmi yathecchasi tathācara ।। 

kumbhaḥ

yady evaṃ tan mahīpāla lagnam adyaiva śobhanam ।
rākeyaṃ śrāvaṇasyāsya hyas sarvaṃ gaṇitaṃ mayā ।। 

rātrāv adyodite candre paripūrṇakalāmale ।
janyatraṃ nau mahābāho dvayor eva bhaviṣyati ।। 

mahendrādriśiraśśṛṅgasānāv asmin manorame ।
ratnadīpaprakāśāḍhyamaṇimandiramaṇḍite ।। 

puṣpabhārānatottuṅgavṛkṣajanyavirājite ।
vanapuṣpalatālāsyanārīnṛttamanohare ।। 

niśi vyomagatās tārā bhartrā pūrṇendunā saha ।
āvayoḥ paripaśyantu karṇāntāgatalocanāḥ ।। 

uttiṣṭhātmavivāhārthaṃ kurvaḥ kānanakoṭarāt ।
rājaṃś candanapuṣpādisambhāraṃ ratnasaṃyutam ।। 

ity uktvā kumbha utthāya saha tena mahībhṛtā ।
kusumāvacayaṃ cakre tathā ratnādisañcayam ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa ratnasānau same śubhe ।
samālambhanapuṣpāḍhyās tābhyāṃ vai rāśayaḥ kṛtāḥ ।। 

hārāmbaramaṇīndrādirāśayas te virejire ।
saubhāgyasyeva kāmena kośāḥ kālena sambhṛtāḥ ।। 

tathā janyatrasambhāraṃ kṛtvā kāñcanakandare ।
yayatus tau mahāmitre snātuṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm ।। 

tatrainaṃ snapayām āsa mahārājam athādarāt ।
gajakumbhopamaskandhaṃ kumbho maṅgalapūrvakam ।। 

bhaviṣyadvanitārūpāṃ bhaviṣyatpatitāṃ gataḥ ।
cūḍālāṃ snapayām āsa kumbharūpadharāṃ priyām ।। 

pūjayām āsatus snātau tatra devān pitṝn munīn ।
yathā kriyāphale anicchau kriyātyāge tathaiva tau ।। 

nityaṃ jñānarasātṛptau vyavasthārthaṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।
cakrāte bhojanaṃ bhavyau tāv anyo'nyasamīritau ।। 

kalpavṛkṣadugūlāni paridhāya sitāni tau ।
phalāni bhuktvā janyatrasthānam āyayatuḥ kramāt ।। 

etāvatātra kālena tayor janyatrasotkayoḥ ।
priyaṃ kartum ivāstādrau jhagity evāviśad raviḥ ।। 

atha sandhyākrame vṛtte kṛte japyāghamarṣaṇe ।
vivāhadarśanāyeva tārājāle kham āgate ।। 

mithunaikasakhī yāmā kumudotkarahāsinī ।
prāleyajālaprakaraṃ vikirantī samāyayau ।। 

ratnadīpān bahūn samyak kumbhas sānāv ayojayat ।
jyotīṃṣīndvarkayuktāni padmodbhava ivāmbarāt ।। 

bhūṣayām āsa rājānaṃ strītvaṃ gacchan niśāmukhe ।
candanāgurukarpūrapūrair mṛgajakuṅkumaiḥ ।। 

hārakeyūrakaṭakais tathā kalpalatāṃśukaiḥ ।
sragdāmair avataṃsaiś ca mālyaiś ca vividhombhitaiḥ ।। 

tathā kalpalatāgucchair mandāraiḥ pārijātakaiḥ ।
santānair bahuratnaiś ca maulinā cendurūpiṇā ।। 

etāvatātha kālena vadhūtvaṃ kumbha āyayau ।
ghanastanataṭākrānto babhūvāśu vilāsavān ।। 

idaṃ sañcintayām āsa sampanno ayam ahaṃ vadhūḥ ।
kāmāyātmā mayādeyaḥ kāryaṃ kālocitaṃ kila ।। 

iyam asmi vadhūḥ kāntā bhartāyaṃ me puras sthitaḥ ।
gṛhāṇa kāma mām ehi kālo ayaṃ tava hṛcchaya ।। 

iti sañcintya bhartāram agrastham abhimaṇḍitam ।
udayantam ivādityaṃ ratiḥ kāmam ivāha sā ।। 

ahaṃ madanikā nāma bhāryāsmi tava mānada ।
pataye te praṇāmo ayaṃ sasnehaṃ kriyate mayā ।। 

ity uktvā sānavadyāṅgī lajjāvanamitānanā ।
lolālakena śirasā praṇanāma nayāt patim ।। 

uvācedaṃ ca he nātha tvaṃ māṃ bhūṣaya bhūṣaṇaiḥ ।
krameṇāgniṃ ca sañjvālya matpāṇigrahaṇaṃ kuru ।। 

rājase atitarāṃ nātha māṃ karoṣi smarāturām ।
rater vivāhe madanam abhibhūyādhitiṣṭhasi ।। 

indor ivāṃśujālāni rājan mālyāni bhānti te ।
merugaṅgāpravāhābhāṃ dhatte hāras tavorasi ।। 

mandārakusumaprotaiḥ kuntalair nṛpa rājase ।
kanakābjam ivālolair bhṛṅgaiḥ kesaradhūsaraiḥ ।। 

ratnāṃśujālaiḥ kusumaiś śriyā sthairyeṇa tejasā ।
unnatyā ca vibho merum abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhase ।। 

evamādi vadantau tau bhaviṣyannavadampatī ।
pracchannapūrvadāmpatyau mithas tuṣṭau babhūvatuḥ ।। 

mahārājñīṃ madanikāṃ mahārājaś śikhidhvajaḥ ।
kāñcanāmalaparyaṅke niyojyābhūṣayat svayam ।। 

avataṃsais tathā mālyair maṇimuktāvibhūṣaṇaiḥ ।
vastrair vilepanaiḥ puṣpair ucitasthānayojitaiḥ ।। 

sā babhau bhūṣitā tanvī madanī madadāyinī ।
girijeva vivāhotkā kāmakānteva kāminī ।। 

mahārājo mahārājñīṃ bhūṣayitvedam āha tām ।
rājase mṛgaśāvākṣi lakṣmīr iva navotthitā ।। 

śakreṇa saha yac chacyā yal lakṣmyā hariṇā saha ।
yad gauryāś śambhunā sārdhaṃ tat te bhavatu maṅgalam ।। 

padmakandāṅkuraradā lolanīlotpalekṣaṇā ।
āmodasubhagākārā tvaṃ sthitā padminīsamā ।। 

suraktapallavakarā stabakastanadhāriṇī ।
tvam eva phaladā manye kāmakalpataror latā ।। 

himaśītāvadātāṅgī jyotsnāprasarahāsinī ।
pūrṇenduśrīr ivodyuktā dṛṣṭaivāhlādayasy alam ।। 

tad uttiṣṭha varārohe vedīṃ vaivāhikīṃ svayam ।
ratnapuṣpalatājālai racayāvo yathākramam ।। 

ity uktvā dampatī kāntau racayām āsatus tadā ।
vedīm ātmavivāhāya mahendramaṇikandare ।। 

muktājālais sajhāṅkāraiḥ puṣpottaṃsais saṣaṭpadaiḥ ।
ratnamālyais saṭāṅkārair vaijayantīpaṭaiś calaiḥ ।। 

kalpavṛkṣalatāsūtraiḥ kalpastabakamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
kalpapādapapaṭṭaiś ca kalpadrumaphalotkaraiḥ ।। 

devadārulatājālaiḥ kāṇḍapratisarāṅkitaiḥ ।
muktākusumalājānāṃ prakarais tārakopamaiḥ ।। 

caturdikkaṃ caturbhiś ca nārikelamahāphalaiḥ ।
pūrṇakumbhatayā gāṅgavāripūraiḥ prakalpitaiḥ ।। 

jvalayām āsatus tasyāṃ madhye candanadārubhiḥ ।
jvalanaṃ jvalitajvālaṃ dakṣiṇasthapradakṣiṇam ।। 

pūrvābhimukham agnes tāv agre pallavaviṣṭare ।
niyojya dampatī kāntau tayor viviśatus svayam ।। 

sa hutvā tilalājādi pāvakāya śikhidhvajaḥ ।
utthāyotthāpya kāntāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ svayam ādade ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ śobhamānau tāv anyāv iva navau śivau ।
cakratur dampatī tasya pāvakasya pradakṣiṇam ।। 

svadāyaṃ jñānasarvasvaṃ hṛdayaṃ prema cācalam ।
dadatus tau mitho mānyau smitakāntamukhaśriyau ।। 

pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā lājān santyajya vahnaye ।
madbhāryām ambarād dṛṣṭvā karau tatyajatuḥ kramāt ।। 

smayamānamukhau kāntau candrāv iva navoditau ।
pūrvoparacite puṣpatalpe viviśatur nave ।। 

etasminn antare candraś caturbhāgaṃ nabhastalāt ।
śanair ākramayām āsa śobhāṃ draṣṭum ivaitayoḥ ।। 

tasmin sānau latācchidrair draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭīr ivābhitaḥ ।
lolais sañcārayām āsa karān indur varāṅgane ।। 

tais tais tatra kathālāpair indāv abhyudite tathā ।
tāv āsāṃ cakratuḥ kāntau dampatī tu muhūrtakam ।। 

athotthāya jvaladratnadīpāṃ kāñcanakandarām ।
svayaṃ pūrvoparacitāṃ guptāṃ viviśatuḥ priyau ।। 

navaṃ dadṛśatus tatra talpaṃ kusumakalpitam ।
parito vyāptam utphullair hemapaṅkajarāśibhiḥ ।। 

mandārādibhir anyaiś ca puṣpair mlānivivarjitaiḥ ।
uccakaiḥ puṃpramāṇena nirmitaṃ kusumais samaiḥ ।। 

dīrghendubimbapratimaṃ tuṣārasthalaśītalam ।
kṣīrodajaladhārābhaṃ jyotsnāsampiṇḍapāṇḍuram ।। 

pratibimbam anantasya ratnabhittāv iva sthitam ।
sugandham unnataṃ kāntaṃ viśarārutayojjhitam ।। 

mithunaṃ puṣparāśau tat papāta dhavalāmale ।
tasmin samasamābhoge kṣīrode mandaro yathā ।। 

tais tais tataḥ praṇatipeśalavāgvilāsais tatkālakāryasubhagaiḥ praṇayopacāraiḥ ।
satkāntayor navanavena tayos sukhena dīrghā muhūrta iva sā rajanī jagāma ।। 

līlāvivāho nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha sūryāṃśuraṅgeṇa rañjite bhuvanodare ।
śikhidhvajāṅganā bhūyo madanī kumbhatāṃ yayau ।। 

evaṃ mahendradaryāṃ tāv ubhau kumbhaśikhidhvajau ।
svayaṃ vivāhitāv iṣṭau sampannau navadampatī ।। 

vilesatur vicitrāsu pratyahaṃ vanarājiṣu ।
prapakvaphalabhārāsu puṣpapallavinīṣu ca ।। 

divā priyatare mitre yāminyām iṣṭadampatī ।
prabhādīpāv iva śliṣṭau na viyuktau babhūvatuḥ ।। 

remāte vanakuñjeṣu guhāsu ca mahībhṛtām ।
tamālasālaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca ।। 

sahyadardurakailāsamahendramalayeṣu ca ।
gandhamādanavindhyādrilokālokataṭeṣu ca ।। 

dinais tribhis tribhir gatvā nidrāṃ gatavati priye ।
cūḍālā rājakāryāṇi kṛtvā svāny āyayau punaḥ ।। 

tau divā suhṛdau rātrau dampatī kumbhabhūmipau ।
nānākusumasaṃvītau tasthatur muditau mithaḥ ।। 

māsam ekaṃ mahendrādrisānau saralasaṅkule ।
ratnakuḍye guhāgehe pūjitau surakinnaraiḥ ।। 

hastalabhyoditendau ca mandāravanamālite ।
evaṃ śuktimataḥ pṛṣṭhe pakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ latāgṛhe ।। 

māsadvayam ṛkṣavato girer dakṣiṇatas taṭe ।
pārijātavane devapuṣpastabakamaṇḍape ।। 

jambūṣaṇḍatale meroḥ pāde jambūnadītaṭe ।
jāmbūnadamaye māsaṃ jambūphalarasāvanau ।। 

daśottarakurūṇāṃ ca maṇḍale divasāni tau ।
kailāsasyottarastheṣu saptaviṃśativāsarān ।। 

evam anyeṣu deśeṣu vicitreṣu mahībhṛtām ।
sthitavantau mahābhāgau suhṛdau snigdhadampatī ।। 

tato yāteṣu māseṣu śanaiḥ katipayeṣu sā ।
cūḍālā cintayām āsa devaputrakarūpiṇī ।। 

suropabhogabhāreṇa parīkṣe ahaṃ śikhidhvajam ।
mā kadācana ceto asya bhogeṣu ratim eṣyati ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā māyayā svāmino vane ।
āgataṃ darśayām āsa sasurāpsarasaṃ harim ।। 

indram abhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā parivārasamanvitam ।
yathāvat pūjayām āsa vanasaṃsthaś śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

ātmanaḥ kiṃ kṛtā dūrād abhyāgamakadarthanā ।
devarāja prasādān me yathāvad vaktum arhasi ।। 

indraḥ

ime vayam ihānītās tvadguṇātiśayena khāt ।
hṛdi lagnena sūtreṇa khagā dūragatā iva ।। 

uttiṣṭha svargam āgaccha tatra sarve tvadunmukhāḥ ।
tvadguṇaśravaṇāścaryās sthitā devagaṇāṅganāḥ ।। 

ime rathā idaṃ yānam ayam uccaiśśravā hayaḥ ।
ayam airāvaṇo nāgo yathābhimatam āśraya ।। 

pādukāgulikākhaḍgarasādīdam athāpi ca ।
gṛhītvā siddhamārgeṇa svīkuru svargamaṇḍalam ।। 

ākalpaṃ vaibudhā bhogās tvayā vibudhasadmani ।
jīvanmuktena bhoktavyās tena tvām aham āgataḥ ।। 

vimānayanti samprāptāṃ na tiraskaraṇaiś śriyam ।
nābhivāñchanti cāprāptāṃ tvādṛśās sādhusādhavaḥ ।। 

avighnam āgatenādya sukhaṃ viharatā tvayā ।
svargaḥ pavitratāṃ yātu hariṇeva jagattrayam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

svargaṃ svargasamācāraṃ vedmi devādināyaka ।
kiṃ tu sarvatra me svargo niyato na tu kutracit ।। 

sarvatraiva hi tuṣyāmi sarvatraiva rame prabho ।
avāñchanatvān manasas sarvatrānandavān aham ।। 

niyataṃ kiñcid ekatra sthitaṃ svargakam īdṛśam ।
śakra gantuṃ na jānāmi nājñātaṃ ca karomy aham ।। 

indraḥ

sādho viditavedyānāṃ paripūrṇadhiyāṃ satām ।
sajjanācaritaṃ yuktaṃ manye bhogopasevanam ।। 

deveśe proktavaty evaṃ tūṣṇīm eva sthite nṛpe ।
kim evaṃ nopayāmy eva tvām iti proktavān hariḥ ।। 

bāḍham ity eva kālena vadatīṣac chikhidhvaje ।
kalyāṇaṃ te astu kumbheti vadann antardhim āyayau ।। 

tad devavṛndam akhilaṃ tridaśeśayuktaṃ tatra kṣaṇād alam adṛśyam abhūd vilīnam ।
kallolajālam iva vārinidhau praśāntavāte sphuranmakaraphenaphaṇīndraśabdam ।। 

śakrāgamanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tāṃ māyāṃ śamam ānīya cūḍālā samacintayat ।
diṣṭyā bhogecchayā nāyaṃ hriyate vasudhādhipaḥ ।। 

śāntas samasamābhoga eva śakrasamāgame ।
asambhramam ahelaṃ ca kṛtavān vyavahāritām ।। 

bhūya eva prapañcena vimṛśāmy enam ādarāt ।
rāgadveṣapradhānena kenacid buddhihāriṇā ।। 

iti sañcintya sā rātrāv indāv abhyudite vane ।
gṛhītamaṇḍanā nūnaṃ kāntā madanikā satī ।। 

vāte vahati puṣpāḍhye madirāmodamāṃsale ।
sandhyājapyapare nadyās tīrasaṃsthe śikhidhvaje ।। 

santānakalatāgehaṃ nīrandhraṃ puṣpagucchakaiḥ ।
śuddhāntaṃ vanadevīnāṃ praviveśa madānvitā ।। 

tatra saṅkalpite puṣpaśayane mālyamālitā ।
kaṇṭhe saṅkalpitaṃ kāntaṃ śiḍgam ādāya saṃsthitā ।। 

āgatyānviṣya kuñjān sa pradadarśa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
latāgehe madanikākaṇṭhe śiḍgaṃ manoharam ।। 

kuntalāvalitaskandhaṃ samālabdhaṃ ca candanaiḥ ।
śayanāvṛttivikṣepaparyākulitaśekharam ।। 

hemābhe dviguṇākāre bālābāhūpadhānake ।
magnaikaśravaṇāpāṅgakapolatalakuntalam ।। 

mithunaṃ tad dadarśātha mithaḥ prahasitānanam ।
anyo'nyavadanāsaktaṃ channaṃ kalpalatāṃśukaiḥ ।। 

ālolamālyaśayanaṃ madanāturam ākulam ।
aṅgarāgacchalenātmarāgam anyo'nyam arpayat ।। 

ratyunmukhaṃ ghanānandam uddāmamadamanmatham ।
parasparāhataṃ puṣpair vakṣobhyāṃ pīḍitastanam ।। 

tad ālokyāvikāreṇa cetasā sa tutoṣa ca ।
aho sukhaṃ sthitau śiḍgāv ity āha sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।। 

tiṣṭhatho aṅga yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ śiḍgau yathāsthitam ।
vighnaṃ mā kuruthaḥ prītāv ity uktvā nirjagāma saḥ ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa prapañcaṃ svam upekṣya sā ।
niryayau darśayantī svaṃ ratiyuddhākulaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

upaviṣṭaṃ dadarśainaṃ nṛpaṃ hemaśilātale ।
samādhisaṃstham ekānte manāgvikasitekṣaṇam ।। 

taṃ pradeśam upāgatya lajjāvanamitānanā ।
tūṣṇīm āsit kṣaṇaṃ khinnā mlānā madanikāṅganā ।। 

kṣaṇāc chikhidhvajo dhyānād viratas tām uvāca ha ।
prasannamadhuraṃ vākyam idam akṣubdhayā dhiyā ।। 

tanvi kiṃ śīghram eva tvaṃ vighnitānandam āgatā ।
ānandāyaiva bhūtāni yatante yāni kānicit ।। 

bhūyas toṣaya taṃ gaccha kāntaṃ praṇayavṛttibhiḥ ।
parasparepsitasneho durlabho hi jagattraye ।। 

aham etena cārthena nodvegaṃ yāmi mānini ।
yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke tad tad deyaṃ vijānatā ।। 

ahaṃ kumbhaś ca tanvaṅgi vītarāgāv iha sthitau ।
durvāsaśśāpajā bālā tvaṃ yad icchasi tat kuru ।। 

madanikā

evam eṣa mahābhāga strīpumbhāvo hi cañcalaḥ ।
kāmo hy aṣṭaguṇas strīṇāṃ na kopaṃ kartum arhasi ।। 

abalāham anenāsmi krāntā gahanakānane ।
tvayi sandhyājapapare kiṃ karomi varākikā ।। 

abalā vākyamātreṇa tāvan naranirodhanam ।
karoti yāvac chiḍgena nāṅge sve viniveśitā ।। 

striyās sundara yātāyāḥ parapuṃsāṅgasaṅgamam ।
manyur niṣedha ākrandas satītvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati ।। 

abalā strī tathā bālā mūḍhāham aparādhinī ।
kṣantum arhasi māṃ nātha kṣamāvanto hi sādhavaḥ ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

manyur mama na bāle antar vidyate kha iva drumaḥ ।
kevalaṃ sādhunindyatvān necchāmi tvām aham vadhūm ।। 

suhṛttvena vanānteṣu pūrvavat samam aṅgane ।
vītarāgatayā nityaṃ tapasaiva ramāvahe ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ samatayā tatra sthite tasmiñ śikhidhvaje ।
cūḍālā cintayām āsa tatsatyenoditāśayā ।। 

aho bata paraṃ sāmyaṃ bhagavān ayam āgataḥ ।
vītarāgabhayakrodho jīvanmukto avatiṣṭhati ।। 

nainaṃ haranti bhogāśā na mahatyo api siddhayaḥ ।
na sukhāni na duḥkhāni nāpado na ca sampadaḥ ।। 

cintitās sakalā eva prayānty enam aninditāḥ ।
manye maharddhayaḥ kāntā nārāyaṇam ivāparam ।। 

ātmavṛttāntam akhilaṃ tad enaṃ smārayāmy aham ।
kumbharūpam idaṃ tyaktvā cūḍālaiva bhavāmy aham ।। 

iti sañcintya cūḍālā cūḍālāvapur akṣatam ।
darśayām āsa tatrāśu tyaktvā madanikāvapuḥ ।। 

tasmān madanikādehāc cūḍālā nirgateva sā ।
babhāv indvamalā muktā nirgateva samudgakāt ।। 

tāṃ dadarśānavadyāṅgīṃ puraḥ praṇayapeśalām ।
kānto madanikām eva cūḍālāṃ dayitāṃ sthitām ।। 

samuditām iva mādhavapadminīm upagatām iva bhūmitalāc chriyam ।
prakaṭitām iva ratnasamudgakāt paridadarśa nijāṃ dayitāṃ nṛpaḥ ।। 

jāraprapañco nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha tāṃ dayitāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayotphullalocanaḥ ।
śikhidhvaja uvācedam āścaryākulayā girā ।। 

kā tvam utpalapattrākṣi kutaḥ prāptāsi sundari ।
kimīhāsi kiyatkālaṃ kimartham iha tiṣṭhasi ।। 

aṅgena vyavahāreṇa smitenānunayena ca ।
mama jāyā vilāsena cūḍālevopalakṣyase ।। 

cūḍālā

evam eva prabho viddhi cūḍālāsmi na saṃśayaḥ ।
akṛtrimena dehena labdho asy adya mayā svayam ।। 

kumbhādidehanirmāṇas tvāṃ bodhayitum eṣa me ।
prapañcaś śataśākhatvam iha yāto vanāntare ।। 

yadā rājyaṃ parityajya mohena tapase vanam ।
tvam agās tatprabhṛty eva tvadbodhāyāham udyatā ।। 

anena kumbhadehena mayaivaṃ tvaṃ vibodhitaḥ ।
māyayā na tu kumbhādi kiñcit satyaṃ mahīpate ।। 

buddho viditavedyas tvaṃ dhyānenaitad akhaṇḍitam ।
sarvaṃ paśyasi tattvajña dhyānenāśv avalokaya ।। 

atha cūḍālayety ukte baddhvā parikaraṃ nṛpaḥ ।
ātmodantam aśeṣeṇa dhyānenālam avaikṣata ।। 

ā svarājyaparityāgāc cūḍālādarśanāvadhim ।
sarvaṃ muhūrtadhyānena svātmodantaṃ dadarśa saḥ ।। 

ā rājyasamparityāgād vartamānakṣaṇakramam ।
sarvam ālokya bhūpālo virarāma samādhitaḥ ।। 

samādhivirato harṣavikāsinayanāmbujaḥ ।
visārya tarasā bāhū pulakojjvalatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

galadaṅgaṃ lasatsneham udyadbāṣpaṃ sphuratspṛham ।
āliliṅga ciraṃ kāntāṃ nakulo nakulīm iva ।। 

tayor āliṅgane tasmiṃs tatra bhāvo babhūva yaḥ ।
na sa vāsukijihvābhir vaktuṃ varṣair hi śakyate ।। 

citrasthāv iva paṅkena kṛtāv iva galattanū ।
śailād iva samutkīrṇau śliṣṭāv āstāṃ ciraṃ priyau ।। 

muhūrtena galadgharmajālau pulakapīvarau ।
bāhū viślathatām īṣan ninyatus tau śanaiḥ priyau ।। 

amṛtāpūrṇahṛdayaṃ saṃśūnyahṛdayopamam ।
unmuktabhujam āstāṃ tāv alakṣyasthitalocanam ।। 

ghanānandaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā tūṣṇīṃ praṇayapeśalam ।
kāntācibukasaṃlagnakaraḥ provāca bhūpatiḥ ।। 

aho nu madhuras snigdhaḥ kāntaś ca kulayoṣitām ।
puṇyaś caritaniṣṣyandas svādavān amṛtād api ।। 

kiyatpramāṇaṃ tanvaṅgi tvayā bālendumugdhayā ।
anubhūtaś ciraṃ kleśo bhartur arthena dāruṇaḥ ।। 

evaṃ duruttarād asmāt saṃsārakuharād aham ।
uttārito yayā buddhyā sā hi kenopamīyate ।। 

arundhatī śacī gaurī gāyatrī śrīs sarasvatī ।
samastāḥ pelavāyante tanvyās sattvaguṇaśriyā ।। 

dhīśrīkāntikṣamāmaitrīkaruṇādyāsu sundari ।
kāntāsv ākārakāntāsu prathamaivāsi lakṣyase ।। 

pareṇādhyavasāyena tvayāham avabodhitaḥ ।
kena pratyupakāreṇa tulām eṣyanti me guṇāḥ ।। 

mohād anādigahanād anantaviṣamād api ।
patim adhyavasāyinyas tārayanti kulastriyaḥ ।। 

śāstrārthagurumantrādi na tathottāraṇakṣamam ।
yathaitās snehaśālinyo bhartṝṇāṃ kulayoṣitaḥ ।। 

sakhā bhrātā suhṛd bhṛtyo gurur mantro dhanaṃ sukham ।
śāstram āyatanaṃ dāsyas sarvaṃ bhartuḥ kulastriyaḥ ।। 

sarvadā sarvayatnena pūjanīyāḥ kulāṅganāḥ ।
lokadvayasukhaṃ samyak sarvaṃ tāsu pratiṣṭhitam ।। 

niricchāyāḥ prayātāyāḥ pāraṃ saṃsāravāridheḥ ।
katham asyopakārasya kariṣye te pratikriyām ।। 

manye kulāṅganāloko loke sarvas tvayādhunā ।
nārīsaujanyacarcāsu vyapadeśyo bhaviṣyati ।। 

tvāṃ nirmitavato dhātur guṇajālātiśāyinīm ।
manye prakupitā nūnam arundhatyādikās striyaḥ ।। 

satītvarūpasaujanyaguṇaratnasamudgike ।
ehi me tvadguṇotkasya punar āliṅganaṃ kuru ।। 

ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ cūḍālāṃ sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
āliliṅga punar gāḍhaṃ nakulo nakulīm iva ।। 

cūḍālā

deva śuṣkakriyājālapare tvayy ākulātmani ।
tathābhūvaṃ bhṛśam ahaṃ tvadarthaṃ duḥkhitā kila ।। 

tena tvadavabodhātmā svārtha evopapāditaḥ ।
mayā tad atra kiṃ devaḥ karoti mayi śaṃsanam ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

tvayā yathā varārohe svārthas sampāditaś śubhaḥ ।
tathedānīṃ satāṃ sarvās sādhayantu kulastriyaḥ ।। 

cūḍālā

buddhyaṃśaikāntaviśrāntajagajjālaka deva he ।
adya taṃ prāktanaṃ kaccin mohaṃ samanupaśyasi ।। 

idaṃ karomi nedaṃ tu prāpnomīdam itas tv iti ।
antar hasasi tāṃ kaccid āśāpelavatāṃ dhiyaḥ ।। 

tās tucchatṛṣṇākalanās tās saṅkalpakukalpanāḥ ।
tvayi nādyāvalokyante deva vyomnīva parvatāḥ ।। 

kas tvam adyāṅgasampannaḥ kiṃniṣṭho asi kim īhase ।
kathaṃ paśyasi pāścātyaṃ dehāvasthākramaṃ prabho ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

sumanaḥpūrṇanīlābjamālāsāravilokane ।
yasya tvam eva tajjñāsi tad evāham upasthitaḥ ।। 

nirīho asmi niraṃśo asmi nabhassvaccho asmi nisspṛhaḥ ।
śāntāhamartharūpo asmi cirāyāham ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

tāṃ daśām upayāto asmi yataś caṇpakavarṇini ।
pratibhānti mahānto api śocyā harijinādayaḥ ।। 

nakiñcinmātracinmātraniṣṭho asmi svastha āsthitaḥ ।
bhrameṇālaṃ vimukto asmi saṃsāreṇālilocane ।। 

na tuṣṭo asmi na khinno asmi nāyam asmi na cetarat ।
na sthūlo asmi na sūkṣmo asmi sarvam asmi ca sundari ।। 

tejobimbāt prayātena bhittāv apatitena ca ।
kṣayātiśayamuktena prakāśenāsmi vai samaḥ ।। 

śānto asmi sāmyam evāsmi svaccho asmi vigatāmayaḥ ।
parinirvāṇa evāsmi sad asmy atisatīvrate ।। 

yat tad asti tad evāsmi vaktuṃ śaknomi netarat ।
taraṅgataralāpāṅge gurus tvaṃ me namo astu te ।। 

prasādena viśālākṣyās tīrṇo asmi bhavasāgarāt ।
punar malaṃ na gṛhṇāmi śatadhmātasuvarṇavat ।। 

svasthaś śānto mṛdur dānto vītarāgo niraṃśadhīḥ ।
sarvātītas sarvagaś ca kham ivāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।। 

evaṃ sthite mahāsattva prāṇeśa hṛdayapriya ।
kim idānīṃ prabho brūhi rocate te mahāmate ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

pratiṣedhaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmy abhivāñchanam ।
yad ācarasi tanvi tvaṃ kadācid vedmi tan na vā ।। 

manmano nāśakalanāṃ tathā sthitikalāṃ priye ।
na kāñcid anusandhātuṃ jānāty ambarasuvratam ।। 

yad eva kiñcij jānāsi tad eva kuru sundari ।
tad eva dhārayiṣyāmi pratibimbaṃ yathā maṇiḥ ।। 

cetasā vigatecchena yathāprāptam anindite ।
na staumi na ca nindāmi yad icchasi tad ācara ।। 

cūḍālā

yady evaṃ tan mahābhāga samākarṇaya manmatam ।
ākarṇya jīvanmuktātmaṃs tad evāhartum arhasi ।। 

sarvatraikyāvabodhena maurkhyakṣayabhuvādhunā ।
niricchās tāvad ākāśaviśadās saṃsthitā vayam ।। 

yādṛg eṣaṇam asmākam tādṛg etad aneṣaṇam ।
eṣaṇāneṣaṇe bhedaś cinmātrollasane hi kaḥ ।। 

tasmād ādyantamadhyeṣu ye vayaṃ puruṣottama ।
maurkhyam eva parityajya ta eveme sthitā iha ।। 

sāmprataṃ prakṛtenemaṃ kālaṃ nītvā krameṇa vai ।
videhatāṃ prayāsyāmaḥ prabho kālena kenacit ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

vayam ādyantamadhyeṣu kīdṛśās tarale vada ।
moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ katham eva vā ।। 

cūḍālā

vayam ādyantamadhyeṣu rājāno rājasattama ।
moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ punar eva te ।। 

sva eva nagare rājā bhava tvaṃ svāsane sthitaḥ ।
lalāmabhūtā kāntānāṃ mahiṣī te bhavāmy aham ।। 

sanṛpā mattavāstavyā nṛtyannavavarāṅganā ।
sapatākā dhvanattūryā puṣpaprakariṇī purī ।। 

lasadvallyā samañjaryā raṇatṣaṭpadayā samā ।
madhumāsavanāvalyā cirād bhavatu naḥ prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti cūḍālayā prokte vihasya sa śikhidhvajaḥ ।
provāca madhuraṃ vākyam akṣubdhaṃ vigatatvaram ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

evaṃ cet tad viśālākṣi svāyattā nas triviṣṭape ।
siddhabhogabhuvas tāsu nivasāmo na kiṃ priye ।। 

cūḍālā

na rājan mama bhogeṣu vāñchā na ca vibhūtiṣu ।
svabhāvasya vaśād eva yathāprāpte rame nṛpa ।। 

na sukhāya mama svargo na rājyaṃ nāpi nākitā ।
yathāsthitam avikṣubdhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi svasthaceṣṭitā ।। 

idaṃ sukham idaṃ neti manane kṣayam āgate ।
samam eva pade śānte tiṣṭhāmīha yathāsukham ।। 

śikhidhvajaḥ

yuktam uktaṃ viśālākṣi tvayaitat samayā dhiyā ।
ko vārthaḥ kila rājyasya grahe tyāge api vā bhavet ।। 

sukhaduḥkhadaśācintāṃ tyaktvā vigatamatsaram ।
yathāsaṃsthānam evemau tiṣṭhāvas svasthatāṃ gatau ।। 

iti tatra kathālāpakathanena tayor dvayoḥ ।
kāntayoś ciradampatyor vāsaras tanutāṃ yayau ।। 

athotthāya dinācāraṃ yathāprāptam aninditau ।
sotkaṇṭhāv apy anutkaṇṭhau cakratuḥ kāryakovidau ।
svargasiddhim anādṛtya tasthatuḥ pūrṇacetasau ।। 

ekasminn eva śayane tais taiḥ praṇayaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
sā vyatīyāya rajanī tayor jīvadvimuktayoḥ ।। 

tad bhogamokṣasukham uttamayos tayos svam ācetatoḥ praṇayavākyavilāsagarbham ।
utkaṇṭhitaṃ praṇayinor ghanatāṃ nayantī dīrghā muhūrtavad asau rajanī jagāma ।। 

cūḍālāprakaṭīkaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tatas samudite sūrye vitamasy ambare sthite ।
samudgakād iva jaganmaṇāv asmin vinirgate ।। 

vikasaty aruṇopānte cakṣuṣīvāmbujākare ।
ācāreṣv iva lokeṣu prasṛteṣv arkaraśmiṣu ।। 

dampatī tau samutthāya kṛtasandhyākramau sthitau ।
pattrāsane mṛdusnigdhe kāntau kāñcanakandare ।। 

athotthāyātra cūḍālā ratnakumbhaṃ karasthitam ।
।। 

।
bhāryā bhartāram ekānte svarājye abhiṣiṣeca sā ।। 

saṅkalpopanate saiṃhe svabhiṣiktaṃ suviṣṭare ।
sthitaṃ provāca tanvī sā cūḍālā devarūpiṇī ।। 

kevalaṃ maunam utsṛjya tejaś śāntam idaṃ prabho ।
aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ tejāṃsy āhartum arhasi ।। 

cūḍālayeti sa prokto vane rājā śikhidhvajaḥ ।
vadann evaṃ karomīti mahārājatvam āyayau ।। 

atha pratīhārapade tiṣṭhantīm āha māninīm ।
mahādevīpade rājñi tvāṃ karomy abhiṣekinīm ।। 

ity uktvāsana āsthāpya mahādevīpade tadā ।
abhiṣiktāṃ nṛpaḥ kṛtvā meghavāg āha tāṃ priyām ।। 

priye kamalapattrākṣi kṣaṇāt saṅkalpasambhavam ।
mahāvibhavam uddāmaṃ sainyam āhartum arhasi ।। 

iti kāntavacaś śrutvā cūḍālā varavarṇinī ।
sainyaṃ saṅkalpayām āsa prāvṛḍghanam ivodbhaṭam ।। 

sainyaṃ dadṛśatus tat tau vājivāraṇasaṅkulam ।
patākāpūritākāśanīrandhrīkṛtakānanam ।। 

tūryāravadhvanacchailaguhaṃ gahanakoṭaram ।
mattasāmantavalitaṃ vidravadvanavāraṇam ।। 

udyannādamahāsiṃhavidārakaraṇodbhaṭam ।
vanebhamadaniṣṣyandagandhodgarjajjayadvipam ।। 

vimānarathasaṅghaṭṭacakracītkārapīvaram ।
mauliratnaghanoddyotabhagnadhūlitamaḥpaṭam ।। 

tatra gandhadvipavare kṛtapārthivamandire ।
rakṣite dṛptasāmantair ārūḍhau nṛpadampatī ।। 

tataś śikhidhvajo rājā mahiṣyā samam iṣṭayā ।
padātirathasambādhaṃ karṣann atibalo balam ।। 

cacālācalacālinyā senayā rabhasenayā ।
bhinantyā tarasā śailān vātyayevāśu toyadān ।। 

tasmān mahendraśailendrāc calitas sa mahīpatiḥ ।
pathi paśyan girīn deśān nadīr grāmān sajaṅgalān ।। 

darśayaṃś ca priyāyās tam ātmavṛttāntasañcayam ।
prāpālpenaiva kālena svāṃ purīṃ svargaśobhanām ।। 

tatra te tasya sāmantās tadāgamanam ādṛtāḥ ।
vividur jayaśabdena nirjagmuś coditāśayāḥ ।। 

ekatāṃ samprayātena tāratūryaninādinā ।
baladvayena tenāsau viveśa nagaraṃ nṛpaḥ ।। 

lājapuṣpāñjalivrātair āvṛṣṭaḥ paurayoṣitām ।
vaṇiṅmārgagato apaśyat puraṃ paramabhūṣitam ।। 

patākādhvajasambādhaṃ muktājālamanoramam ।
nṛttagītaparastrīkaṃ svargaṃ bhūmāv iva cyutam ।। 

praviśyātha gṛhaṃ tais tais saṃyutaṃ nṛpamaṅgalaiḥ ।
samyak sammānayām āsa praṇataṃ prakṛtivrajam ।। 

purotsavaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtvā dinasaptakam uttamam ।
akarod rājakāryāṇi mānitāntaḥpuro nṛpaḥ ।। 

daśavarṣasahasrāṇi rājyaṃ kṛtvā mahītale ।
saha cūḍālayā rājā virato dehadhāraṇāt ।। 

deham utsṛjya nirvāṇam asneha iva dīpakaḥ ।
apunarjanmane rāma jagāmeti mahāmatiḥ ।। 

daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samadṛṣṭitayā tayā ।
rājyaṃ tathānuśiṣyāsau nirvāṇapadam āptavān ।। 

vigatabhayaviṣādo mānamātsaryamuktaḥ prakṛtasahajakarmā saktanīrāgabuddhiḥ ।
iti sa susamadṛṣṭir mṛtyum āryo atha jitvā daśaśiśirasahasrāṇy ekarājyaṃ cakāra ।। 

bhuktvā bhogān anantān bhuvi sakalamahī pālacūḍāmaṇitve sthitvā vai dīrghakālaṃ param amṛtapadaṃ prāptavāṃs tad yathaiṣaḥ ।
evaṃ rāmāgataṃ tvaṃ prakṛtam anusaran kāryajātaṃ viśokas tiṣṭhottiṣṭha svayatnāt prasabham anubhavan bhogamokṣāgryalakṣmīm ।। 

śikhidhvajopākhyānaṃ samāptam nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śikhidhvajakathānakam ।
anena gaccha mārgeṇa na kadācana khidyase ।। 

etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm ।
nityaṃ nīrāgayā buddhyā tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhatatpadaḥ ।। 

yathā śikhidhvajo rājyaṃ kṛtavān evam īdṛśaḥ ।
rāma vyavaharan rājye bhogamokṣamayo bhava ।। 

śikhidhvajakrameṇaiva yathā bodham avāptavān ।
kaco bṛhaspateḥ putras tathā budhyasva rāghava ।। 

rāmaḥ

bṛhaspater bhagavataḥ putro asau bhagavān kacaḥ ।
yathā prabuddho bhagavan samāsena tathā vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rājan kathaṃ śrīmāñ śikhidhvajavad eva saḥ ।
prabodhaṃ paramaṃ yāto devadaiśikajaḥ kacaḥ ।। 

bālabhāvāt samuttīrṇas saṃsārottaraṇonmukhaḥ ।
kacaḥ padapadārthajño bṛhaspatim abhāṣata ।। 

kacaḥ

bhagavan sarvadharmajña kathaṃ saṃsṛtipañjarāt ।
asmān nirgamyate brūhi jantunā jīvatantunā ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

anarthamakarāgārād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt ।
uttīryate nirudvegaṃ sarvatyāgena putraka ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity ākarṇya kaco vākyaṃ pituḥ paramapāvanam ।
sarvam eva parityajya jagāmaikāntakānanam ।। 

bṛhaspates tadgamanaṃ nodvegāya babhūva ha ।
saṃyoge ca viyoge ca mahānto hi samāśayāḥ ।। 

atha varṣeṣu yāteṣu triṣu pañcasu cānagha ।
punaḥ prāpa mahāraṇye kasmiṃścit pitaraṃ kacaḥ ।। 

paripūjyābhivandyainaṃ samāliṅgitaputrakam ।
apṛcchad vākpatiṃ bhūyas sa kacaḥ klāntayā girā ।। 

kacaḥ

adyedam aṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto mayā ।
tathāpi tāta viśrāntiṃ nādhigacchāmy aninditām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam ārtamanasy asmin kace vadati kānane ।
sarvam eva tyajety uktvā vākpatir divam udyayau ।। 

gate tasmin kaco dehād valkalādy apy aśeṣataḥ ।
tatyājāmbudavarṣādi śaradīva nabhastalam ।। 

uvāsaiko diganteṣu śāntaś śūnyavapuś śvasan ।
gatendvabhrārkatāreṇa śaradvyomnā samopamaḥ ।। 

punar varṣatrayeṇaiṣa kasmiṃścit kānanāntare ।
dūyamānamanāḥ prāpa tam eva pitaraṃ gurum ।। 

kṛtapūjākramo bhaktyā samāliṅgitaputrakam ।
apṛcchat tam asau bhūyaḥ khedagadgadayā girā ।। 

kacaḥ

tāta sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ kanthāveṇulatādy api ।
tathāpi nāsti viśrāntis svapade kiṃ karomy aham ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tat tyaktvā putra rājase ।
cittatyāgaṃ vidus sarvatyāgaṃ tyāgavido janāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā vākpatiḥ putraṃ pupluve tarasā nabhaḥ ।
anviyeṣa kacaś cittaṃ parityaktum akhinnadhīḥ ।। 

cintayann apy asau cittaṃ yadā veda na kānane ।
tadā sañcintayām āsa dhiyedam aviṣaṇṇayā ।। 

kacaḥ

padārthavṛndaṃ dehādi na sarvam iti kathyate ।
tad etat kiṃ kva vā vyarthaṃ nirāgaskaṃ tyajāmy aham ।। 

pitus sakāśaṃ gacchāmi jñātuṃ cittamahāripum ।
jñātvā ca tat tyajāmy āśu tatas tiṣṭhāmi vijvaram ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti sañcintya sa kaca uttatāra triviṣṭapam ।
vākpatiṃ prāpya sasnehaṃ vavande praṇanāma ca ।। 

papraccha cainam ekānte kiṃ cittaṃ bhagavan mama ।
svarūpaṃ brūhi cittasya yenaitat santyajāmy aham ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

cittaṃ nijam ahaṅkāraṃ viduś cittavido janāḥ ।
antar yo ayam ahambhāvo jantos tac cittam ucyate ।। 

kacaḥ

manye asya duṣkaras tyāgo na siddhim upagacchati ।
katham eṣa kila tyaktuṃ yujyate yogināṃ vara ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

api puṣpāvadalanād api locanamīlanāt ।
sukaro ahaṅkṛtityāgo na kleśo atra manāg api ।। 

kacaḥ

trayastriṃśanmahākoṭīpramāṇasya mahāmate ।
guro gīrvāṇavṛndasya katham etad vadāśu me ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

yathaitad eva tanaya tathā śṛṇu vadāmi te ।
ajñānamātrasaṃsiddhaṃ vastu jñānena naśyati ।। 

vastuto nāsty ahaṅkāraḥ putra mithyābhramo hy asau ।
asan sann iva sampanno bālavetālavac chaṭhaḥ ।। 

yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvaṃ marāv ambumatir yathā ।
mithyāvabhāsāt sphurati tathā mithyāpy ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।। 

asad eva yathā dvitvaṃ mohād indor vilokyate ।
tathā sphuraty ahaṅkāro nasatyo nāma satyavat ।। 

ekam ādyantarahitaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ tatam ।
khād apy atitarām acchaṃ vidyate sarvavedanam ।। 

sarvatra sarvadā sarvaprakāraṃ sarvajantuṣu ।
tad evaikaṃ kacaty ambu vilolāsv iva vīciṣu ।। 

atra ko ayam ahambhāvaḥ kuto vā katham utthitaḥ ।
kvābdher jāto rajorāśiḥ kvānalād utthitam jalam ।। 

ayaṃ so aham iti vyarthaṃ pratyayaṃ tyaja putraka ।
tucchaṃ parimitākāraṃ dikkālavivaśīkṛtam ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinnaṃ svacchaṃ nityoditaṃ tatam ।
sarvārthamayam ekārthaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ bhavān ।। 

phalakusumadalānāṃ sarvadiksaṃsthitānāṃ rasa iva jagatāṃ tvaṃ saṃsthitas sarvadaiva ।
vimalataracidātmā nityam evātyanantaḥ ka iva kila tavāhaṃniścayo bhāvamūrte ।। 

bṛhaspatikacaprabodho nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti prāpya paraṃ yogam upadeśam anuttamam ।
jīvanmukto babhūvāsau tato devaguros sutaḥ ।। 

nirbhāvo nirahaṅkāraś chinnagranthiḥ praśāntadhīḥ ।
kaco yathā sthito rāma tathā tiṣṭhāvikāravān ।। 

ahaṅkāram asad viddhi mainam āśraya mā tyaja ।
asataś śaśaśṛṅgasya kila tyāgagrahau kutaḥ ।। 

asambhavaty ahaṅkāre kva te maraṇajanmanī ।
nabhaḥkṣetratayā vyuptaṃ kena saṅgṛhyate phalam ।। 

niraṃśaṃ śāntasaṅkalpaṃ sarvabhāvātmakaṃ tatam ।
paramād apy aṇos sūkṣmaṃ cinmātraṃ tvaṃ nirāmayam ।। 

yathāmbhasas taraṅgādi yathā hemno aṅgadādi vā ।
tad evātad ivābhāsaṃ tathāhambhāvanaṃ citaḥ ।। 

abodhena jagat sarvaṃ māyāmayam iva sthitam ।
bodhena sakalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ sampadyate anagha ।। 

dvitvaikatvamatī tyaktvā śeṣasthas sukhito bhava ।
mā duḥkhito bhava vyarthaṃ tvaṃ mithyāpuruṣo yathā ।। 

māyeyam atiduṣpārā sāṃsārī sāratāṃ gatā ।
śaradā mihikevāśu bodhenāyāti tānavam ।। 

rāmaḥ

paramām āgato asmy antas tṛptiṃ jñānāmṛtena te ।
avagrahabhayākrāntas svāsāreṇeva cātakaḥ ।। 

amṛteneva sikto aham antar gacchāmi śītatām ।
uparīva samastānāṃ tiṣṭhāmy atulasampadām ।। 

na tṛptim adhigacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava ।
aindavīnāṃ marīcīnāṃ cakoras tṛṣito yathā ।। 

tṛpto api bhūyaḥ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ praśnam imam īśvara ।
ko nāma tṛpto apy agrasthaṃ na pibaty amṛtāsavam ।। 

kim ucyate muniśreṣṭha mithyāpuruṣanāmakam ।
vastv avastūkṛtajagadvastujātaṃ vadāśu me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mithyāpuruṣabodhāya śṛṇu rāghava śobhanām ।
imām ākhyāyikāṃ hāsajananīṃ madudīritām ।। 

asti kaścin mahābāho māyāyantramayaḥ pumān ।
bālapelavadhīr mūḍho gūḍho maurkhyeṇa kevalam ।। 

sa ekānte kvacij jātaś śūnye tatraiva tiṣṭhati ।
keśoṇḍukam iva vyomni mṛgatṛṣṇeva vā marau ।। 

tasmād anyan na tatrāsti yad asti ca sa eva tat ।
yac cānyat tat sadābhāsaṃ na sa paśyati durmatiḥ ।। 

saṅkalpas tasya sañjātas tatra vṛddhim upeyuṣaḥ ।
khasyāhaṃ kham ahaṃ khaṃ me khaṃ rakṣāmīti niścalaḥ ।। 

khaṃ sthāpayitvā rakṣāmi vastv iṣṭaṃ rakṣyam ādarāt ।
iti sañcintayan vyomarakṣārtham so akarod gṛham ।। 

tasya kośe babandhāsthāṃ rakṣitaṃ khaṃ mayety asau ।
gṛhākāśena santuṣṭas sthitas sa raghunandana ।। 

atha kālena tat tasya gṛhaṃ nāśam upāyayau ।
ṛtvantareṇartur iva vāteneva taraṅgakaḥ ।। 

hā gṛhākāśa naṣṭaṃ tvaṃ hā kva yātam asi kṣaṇāt ।
hā hā bhagnam asi svaccham ity athaitac chuśoca saḥ ।। 

iti śokaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā punas tatraiva durmatiḥ ।
kūpaṃ cakre kharakṣārthaṃ kūpākāśaparo abhavat ।। 

tato nāśaṃ sa kālena nītaḥ kūpo api tasya vai ।
kūpākāśamahāśokavidhuro asau tato abhavat ।। 

kūpākāśapralāpānte kumbhaṃ tatraiva so akarot ।
kumbhākāśaparo bhūtvā svayaṃ nirvṛtim āyayau ।। 

kumbho api tasya kālena nāśaṃ nīto raghūdvaha ।
yām eva diśam ādatte durbhagas sāpi naśyati ।। 

kumbhākāśapralāpānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra saḥ ।
kuṇḍaṃ tatraiva tenāsau kuṇḍākāśaparo abhavat ।। 

kuṇḍam apy asya kālena kānane nāśam āyayau ।
tejaseva tamas tena kuṇḍākaśāṃ śuśoca saḥ ।। 

kuṇḍakākāśaśokānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra saḥ ।
catuśśālaṃ mahāśālaṃ tadākāśaparo abhavat ।। 

tad apy asya jahārāśu kālaḥ kavalitaprajaḥ ।
jīrṇaṃ parṇaṃ yathā vātas sa tacchokaparo abhavat ।। 

catuśśālakhaśokānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra ha ।
kusūlam ambudākāraṃ tadākāśaparas sthitaḥ ।। 

tad apy asya jahārāśu kālo vāta ivāmbudam ।
kusūlākāśaśokena tenāsau paryatapyata ।। 

evaṃ gṛhacatuśśālakumbhakuṇḍakusūlakaiḥ ।
tasyāparyavasānātmā kālo ayam ativartate ।। 

evaṃ sthitas sa śaṭhadhīr gaganaṃ guhāyāṃ gṛhṇan gṛhe na gaganena kilātmabuddhyā ।
duḥkhāntaraṃ ghanataraṃ ghanaduḥkhajālād āyāti yāti ca gater gatim aṅga mūḍhaḥ ।। 

mithyāpuruṣopākhyāne ākāśarakṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mithyānaraprasaṅgena kiṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ prabho ।
kathito ayaṃ tvayā vyomarakṣaṇaṃ ca kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāma yathābhūtam etat prakaṭayāmi te ।
mithyāpuruṣavṛttāntakathanaṃ kathayādhunā ।। 

māyāyantramayaḥ prokto yaḥ pumān raghunandana ।
enaṃ taṃ tvam ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi śūnyāmbarotthitam ।। 

yasminn ākāśakoṇe asmin sādho jagad idaṃ sthitam ।
tad anantam asac chūnyaṃ sargādau bhavati svayam ।। 

antassthitasudurlakṣyabrahmavyomno atha śabdakhāt ।
tasmād udety ahaṅkāraḥ pūrvaṃ spanda ivānilāt ।। 

vṛddhiṃ yātas sa gagane kalpayaty ātmatāṃ śaṭhaḥ ।
anātmātmābhimānena tenāsau yatate tataḥ ।। 

anātmātmaikarakṣārthaṃ dehān nānāvidhān asau ।
bhūyo bhūyo api nirnaṣṭān dṛṣṭvedaṃ kurute jagat ।। 

sa eva māyāpuruṣo mithyāpuruṣa eva saḥ ।
asann evodito vyartham ahaṅkāro api māyayā ।। 

gṛhakuṇḍacatuśśālakumbhādīn dehakān asau ।
kṛtvā rakṣita ātmeti yāti tadvyomni bhāvanām ।। 

ahaṅkārasya tasyāsya nāmānīmāni rāghava ।
śṛṇu yair jagadārambhavibhramair moham ety asau ।। 

jīvo buddhir manaś cittaṃ māyā prakṛtir ity api ।
saṅkalpaḥ kalanā kālaḥ kalā cety api viśrutaiḥ ।। 

evamādyais tathānyaiś ca nāmabhir bahutāṃ gataiḥ ।
sahasrarūpo ahaṅkāraḥ kalpitārthair vijṛmbhate ।। 

bhūtākāśe tate śūnye jagannirmitibhiś ciram ।
sukhaduḥkhāny anubhavan mithyaiva puruṣas sthitaḥ ।। 

yathaiṣa mithyāpuruṣo rakṣan vyomātmaśaṅkayā ।
ghaṭākāśādiṣu śliṣṭam evaṃ mā kleśavān bhava ।। 

ākāśād api vistīrṇaś śuddhas sūkṣmaś śivaś śubhaḥ ।
ya ātmā sa kathaṃ kena rakṣyate gṛhyate tathā ।। 

hṛdayākāśamātrasya ghaṭākāśasamasthiteḥ ।
vyarthaṃ bhūtāni śocanti naṣṭa ātmeti saṅkṣaye ।। 

ghaṭādiṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu yathākāśam akhaṇḍitam ।
tathā deheṣu naṣṭeṣu dehī nityam alopakaḥ ।। 

śuddhacinmātra ātmāyam ākāśād apy aṇor aṇuḥ ।
svānubhūtyaṃśamātraṃ hi khavad rāma na naśyati ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate kvacit kiñcit kadācana ।
jagadvivartarūpeṇa kevalaṃ brahma jṛmbhate ।। 

sarvam ekam idaṃ śāntam ādimadhyāntavarjitam ।
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktam iti matvā sukhī bhava ।। 

sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam asvatantram āsannapātam avivekam asāram ajñam ।
bodhād ahaṅkṛtipadaṃ sakalaṃ vimucya śeṣe subaddhapada uttamatāṃ prayāsi ।। 

mithyāpuruṣopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parasmād brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam ।
mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam ।। 

puṣpakośa ivāmodo mahormir iva sāgare ।
raśmijālam ivāditye mano brahmaṇi rāghava ।। 

tasyādṛśyātmatattvasya vismṛtyaiva gataṃ sthitim ।
nānyayuktyā gataṃ rāma jātaṃ rajjubhujaṅgavat ।। 

ādityavyatirekeṇa yo bhāvayati rāghava ।
raśmijālam idaṃ hy etat tasyānyad iva bhāsvataḥ ।। 

kanakavyatirekeṇa keyūraṃ yena bhāvitam ।
keyūram eva tat tasya na tasya kanakaṃ hi tat ।। 

salilavyatirekeṇa taraṅgo yena bhāvitaḥ ।
taraṅgabuddhir evaikā sthitā tasya na vāridhīḥ ।। 

salilāvyatirekeṇa taraṅgo yena bhāvyate ।
ambusāmānyasambuddhir nirvikalpas sa ucyate ।। 

kanakāvyatirekeṇa keyūraṃ yena bhāvyate ।
kanakaikamahābuddhir nirvikalpas sa ucyate ।। 

pāvakavyatirekeṇa jvālālī yena bhāvyate ।
tasyāgnibuddhir galati jvālādhīr eva tiṣṭhati ।। 

jvālājālena lolena rañjitā sā tathā sthitiḥ ।
tām evāsthāṃ samādhatte tadgatā vyākulā matiḥ ।। 

pāvakāvyatirekeṇa jvālālī yena bhāvyate ।
tasyāgnibuddhir evāsti nirvikalpas sa ucyate ।। 

yo nirvikalpas sa mahān sa saṅkṣīṇamanā muniḥ ।
prāptavyaṃ tena samprāptaṃ nāsau majjati vastuṣu ।। 

nānātām akhilāṃ tyaktvā śuddhacinmātrakoṭare ।
saṃvedanavinirmuktaṃ saṃvittyaṃśo bhavānagha ।। 

svayam ātmātmanaivāśu śaktiṃ saṅkalpanāmikām ।
yadā karoti sphuritāṃ spandaśaktim ivānilaḥ ।। 

tadā pṛthag ivābhāsaṃ saṅkalpakalanāmayam ।
mano bhavati viśvātma bhāvayaty ākṛtiṃ svayam ।। 

tat saṅkalpātmakaṃ ceto yathedam akhilaṃ jagat ।
saṅkalpayati saṅkalpi tathaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt ।। 

kīṭatvam abjajatvaṃ ca merutvam aṇutāṃ tathā ।
mano yātam ahaṅkārabuddhicittādināmakam ।। 

svasaṅkalpād viriñcitvam etya ceto jagatsthitim ।
tanoti tasyāṃ tadanu nānātāṃ gacchati svayam ।। 

saṅkalpamayam evedaṃ jagad ābhogi dṛśyate ।
na satyaṃ na ca mithyaiva svapnajālam ivotthitam ।। 

jantor yathā manorājyaṃ vividhārambhabhāsuram ।
brāhmaṃ tathedaṃ vitataṃ manorājyaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

yathā na vitathas svapnaḥ pratibhāsān na cāpi san ।
tathā brāhmaṃ manorājyaṃ jagan nāsan na san mune ।। 

mithyāvabhāsamātraṃ hi yad idaṃ ghanatāṃ gatam ।
yathābhūtārthabhāvitvāt tad etat pravilīyate ।। 

paramārthena dṛṣṭaṃ cet tad idaṃ naiva kiñcana ।
dṛṣṭaṃ tv aparamārthena prayāti śataśākhatām ।। 

laharyūrmitaraṅgāmbukalanārhaṃ parisphuran ।
yathāmbudhir vapur dhatte svabhāvena tathā vibhuḥ ।। 

kurvan karmasahasrāṇi kartā citspandanād ṛte ।
nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit kaścid bhedam atas tyaja ।। 

paśyañ chṛṇvan spṛśañ jighran vadan vyavaharan svapan ।
nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit satyam ity eva bhāvaya ।। 

yad yat karoṣi tat tattvaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ tatam ।
brahma prabṛṃhitākāraṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate ।। 

padārthajāte sarvasmin saṃvitsāratayā sthite ।
saṃvid evedam akhilaṃ jagan nānyāsti kalpanā ।। 

saṃvitsphuraṇamātre asmiñ jagajjālakanāmani ।
idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti mithyāgrahaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

sambhavād akhilākāreṇaikasyā eva saṃvidaḥ ।
saṃvedyam api nāsty eva bandhamokṣāv ataḥ kutaḥ ।। 

mokṣo ayam eṣa khalu bandha iti prasahya cintā nirasya sakalā vikalābhimānaḥ ।
maunī vaśī vigatamānamado mahātmā kurvan svakāryam anahaṅkṛtir eva tiṣṭha ।। 

paramārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśottaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahākartā mahābhoktā mahātyāgī bhavānagha ।
sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam ।। 

rāmaḥ

kim ucyate mahākartā mahātyāgī kim ucyate ।
kim ucyate mahābhoktā samyak kathaya me prabho ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etad vratatrayaṃ rāma purā candrārdhamaulinā ।
bhṛṅgīśāyottamaṃ proktaṃ yenāsau vijvaras sthitaḥ ।। 

sumeror uttare śṛṅge pūrvaṃ śaśikalādharaḥ ।
atiṣṭhad agnisaṅkāśe samagraparivāravān ।। 

tam apṛcchan mahātejā jñānajijñāsayā svataḥ ।
bhṛṅgīśaḥ praṇato rāma baddhāñjalir umāpatim ।। 

bhṛṅgīśaḥ

bhagavan devadeveśa sarvajña parameśvara ।
yad ahaṃ paripṛcchāmi kṛpayā tad vadāśu me ।। 

saṃsāraracanāṃ nātha taraṅgataralām imām ।
avalokya vimuhyāmi tattvaviśrāntivarjitaḥ ।। 

kam antarniścayaṃ kāntam urarīkṛtya susthiram ।
asmiñ jagajjīrṇagṛhe tiṣṭhāmi vigatajvaram ।। 

īśvaraḥ

sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam ।
mahātyāgī mahākartā mahābhoktā bhavānagha ।। 

bhṛṅgīśaḥ

kim ucyate mahātyāgī mahābhoktā kim ucyate ।
kim ucyate mahākartā samyak kathaya me prabho ।। 

īśvaraḥ

dharmādharmodayāpāyaśaṅkāvirahitāśayaḥ ।
yaḥ karoti yathāprāptaṃ mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dharmādharmau phalāphale ।
yaḥ karoty anapekṣyaiva mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

maunavān nirahambhāvo nirmāno muktamatsaraḥ ।
yaḥ karoti gatodvegaṃ mahākartā sa ucate ।। 

śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu dharmādharmakuśaṅkayā ।
matir na lipyate yasya mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

sarvatra vigatasneho yas sākṣivad avasthitaḥ ।
niricchaṃ vartate kārye mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

udvegānandarahitas samayā svacchayecchayā ।
na śocate yo nodeti mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

yaḥ kāryakāle matimān asaṃsaktamanā muniḥ ।
kāryānurūpavṛttistho mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

svabhāvenaiva yasyāntas samatāṃ na jahāti dhīḥ ।
śubhāśubhaṃ hy ācarato mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

janmasthitivināśeṣu sodayāstamayeṣv alam ।
samam eva mano yasya mahākartā sa ucyate ।। 

na kiñcana dveṣṭi ca yo na kiṃ ca stauti yas svayam ।
bhuṅkte ca prakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

nādatte apy ādadānas san nācaraty ācarann api ।
bhuñjāno api na yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

sākṣivat sakalaṃ lokavyavahāram akhinnadhīḥ ।
yaḥ paśyaty apayātecchaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

sukhair duḥkhaiḥ kriyāyogair bhāvābhāvair bhramapradaiḥ ।
yasya notkrāmati matir mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

jarāmaraṇam āpac ca rājyaṃ dāridryam eva ca ।
ramyam eveti yo vetti mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

mahānti sukhaduḥkhāni yaḥ payāṃsīva sāgaraḥ ।
samas samupagṛhṇāti mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭiś candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ ।
nāpayānty aniśaṃ yasmān mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

kaṭv amblaṃ lavaṇaṃ tiktam amṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭam uttamam ।
adhamaṃ yo atti sāmyena mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

sarasaṃ nīrasaṃ caiva surataṃ virataṃ tathā ।
yaḥ paśyati samas somyo mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

kṣāre khaṇḍaprakāre ca śubhe vāpy aśubhe tathā ।
samatā susthitā yasya mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

idaṃ bhojyam abhojyaṃ cety evaṃ tyaktvā vikalpitam ।
gatābhilāṣaṃ yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

āpadaṃ sampadaṃ moham ānandam avaraṃ varam ।
yo bhuṅkte samayā buddhyā mahābhoktā sa ucyate ।। 

dharmādharmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cintā maraṇajanmanī ।
dhiyā yeneti santyaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

sarvecchās sakalāś śaṅkās sarvehās sarvaniścayāḥ ।
dhiyā yena parityaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

dehasya manaso buddher indriyāṇāṃ jagatsthiteḥ ।
nūnaṃ yenojjhitā sattā mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

na me deho na janmāpi yuktāyukte na karmaṇā ।
iti niścayavān yo antar mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

yena dharmam adharmaṃ ca manomananam īhitaṃ ।
sarvam antaḥ parityaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

mano dhyānaṃ tapastejas tvattāmatte śubhāśubhe ।
tyaktvā yo avasthitas svastho mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

svamanomananaṃ mānyo nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।
yo avāsanas sarvam idaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

yāvatī dṛśyakalanā sakaleyaṃ vilokyate ।
sā yena suṣṭhu santyaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

yo akāmakāmī nirdvandvas sukhaduḥkheṣv aloladhīḥ ।
dhīras svastho mṛdur dānto mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

kurvann api ca kāryāṇi suṣuptasamavṛttitām ।
na santyajati yaḥ pūrṇo mahātyāgī sa ucyate ।। 

ity uktaṃ devadevena bhṛṅgīśāya purānagha ।
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tiṣṭha rāma yathāsthitaḥ ।। 

śrīmatkapālaśakalāvalimadhyabaddhakhaṇḍendumaṇḍitajaṭāśirasā hareṇa ।
ity uktam ujjvalamaṇīndraśilaikaśṛṅge merau jvalajjvalanarūpiṇi rāmabhadra ।। 

etāṃ dṛśaṃ samavalambya vilāsakāntakāryaṃ kuru kramagataṃ samayaiva buddhyā ।
nityodito asi vimalo asi nirāmayo asi śaṅkāṃ parityaja sukhī bhava yo asi so asi ।। 

bhṛṅgīśopākhyāne mahākartādyupadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

viṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

hyo dine hi mayā praśnaḥ kṛta āsīn munīśvara ।
upaśāntiprakaraṇaprasare sa yathā kila ।। 

anantasyātmatattvasya kalaṅkakalanā kutaḥ ।
abdher agādharūpasya rajorāśiḥ kuto bhavet ।। 

tatroktaṃ bhavatā brahman mayy akālaikacodake ।
siddhāntakāla evāsya praśnasyottaravāg iti ।। 

tad adya bhagavaṃs taṃ me hṛdayāc chinddhi saṃśayam ।
vākyaraśmibhir āśītaiḥ khān niśīva śaśī tamaḥ ।। 

tvadvākyāmṛtapānena saṃśayāṃśāpamṛtyavaḥ ।
aśeṣeṇa vinaṣṭā me varṣaṇeneva pāṃsavaḥ ।। 

kṣamānavavadhūkāntaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi tathāpy aham ।
na rājate svayaṃ jñātaṃ jñānaṃ gurugiraṃ vinā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāma rājīvapattrākṣa sādhu saṃsmṛtavān asi ।
ke nāma vā samārambhāḥ prājñasyāyānti vandhyatām ।। 

kṣamaudāryaśamaprāyair guṇair yāto asi pātratām ।
śāradaiś śālisaundaryaiś śrīmattām iva bhūtalam ।। 

bhājanaṃ tvaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ siddhāntavacasāṃ sthitaḥ ।
suraktakaṇṭhagītīnāṃ rāgaraktamanā iva ।। 

śrutvātmajñānasiddhāntaṃ tvam adyārdhaprabuddhavat ।
na kriyādvaitadoṣeṇa gacchasy ubhayanaṣṭatām ।। 

amahātmā hi vedāntasiddhāntāvagatāv itaḥ ।
sarvaṃ brahmeti saṃyāti karmādvaitavaśād adhaḥ ।। 

kṣamādiguṇapūtātmā mahātmā tvādṛśas tu yaḥ ।
sarvaṃ brahmeti nirṇīya svabhāvādvaitam ety alam ।। 

karmādvaitam anādṛtya nābhivāñchati nojjhati ।
ātmatattvaikabhāvitvāt samatām eti kevalam ।। 

sarveṣām eva śāstrāṇāṃ sarvāsām abhito dṛśām ।
śṛṇu rāghava siddhāntam ātmajñānaikadīpakam ।। 

jantur na jāyate yena bhāvitena manāg api ।
bhavya evāṅga nābhavyo bhṛṣṭaṃ bījam ivoṣare ।। 

idaṃ hi kathayanty uccair bodhaṃ param upāgatāḥ ।
vayaṃ svayaṃ ca jānīmaś śāstram evaṃ ca saṃsthitam ।। 

na tattvātattvayor bhedas taraṅgapayasor iva ।
na satyāsatyayor bhedo jāgratsvapnārkayor iva ।। 

sattāyāṃ na tu bhedo asti bhedo yaḥ kalpitas tv ayam ।
vikalpo na kvacit satyas sattāmātram ato akhilam ।। 

na satyāsatyayor bhedas sattāyām aṅga dṛśyate ।
saṅkalpāntaraśailendrabāhyaśailendrayor iva ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ hi puruṣo deho nāma na vidyate ।
arthakriyā tadarthā ca saṃvidarthena pūryate ।। 

tad eva kalpitākāram agendrādīva dṛśyate ।
asadrūpaśarīrārtham arthaḥ ka itaraiḥ kramaiḥ ।। 

antassvānubhavānandaphalā niśśeṣataḥ kriyāḥ ।
samagrāṇāṃ padārthānām āsavādyanubhūtivat ।। 

astīha kiñcid evaikaṃ na dvitīyāsti kalpanā ।
nirmalo nitya ātmāsti yo nāstīva vyavasthitaḥ ।। 

naiva tasya malaṃ nāṅko na vicchedo na vastutā ।
na sattā nāpi cāsattā tvattā mattā na caiva ca ।। 

ātmaivāstīha nānyo asti tyaja rāmetarāṃ dhiyam ।
nirdvitvo atha nirekatvas samo nityodito bhava ।। 

rāmaḥ

tad ete bhagavan brūhi manobuddhyādayaḥ katham ।
saṃsthitā yair iha proktam idaṃ śāstraṃ tvayā mayi ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śāstrasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ śabdarāśiḥ prakalpitaḥ ।
mithyaiṣa cittabuddhyādyo na rāma paramārthataḥ ।। 

।
citsattāmātram evaitat parākāśātmakaṃ tathā ।। 

apsattāmātram evaitad vīcyāvartādikaṃ yathā ।
sarvo jagatpadārthaughaś cidākāśātmakas tathā ।। 

।
yathā svapne purānīkaṃ spandane vā yathānilaḥ ।। 

nityoditaṃ vimalarūpam anantam ādyaṃ brahmāsti netarakalākalanaṃ hi kiñcit ।
ity eva bhāvaya nirañjanatām upeto nirvāṇam ehi sakalāmalaśāntavṛttiḥ ।। 

anāmayaṃ brahma samastakalpakāryaikabījaṃ paramāṇurūpam ।
bṛhac ca tad bṛṃhitasarvabhāvaṃ kham asti nāstīva yad asti kiñcit ।। 

anyat kvacit kiñcid idaṃ kadācin na sambhavaty eva sad apy asac ca ।
ity eva sādho dṛḍhaniścayo antas sthitvā gatāśaṅkavilāsam āssva ।। 

antarmukhas san satataṃ samastaṃ kurvan bahissthaṃ khalu kāryajātam ।
na khedam āyāsi kadācid eva vyomnas samāṃ saṃsthitim abhyupaiṣi ।। 

kalpanānirāso nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāmāhaṅkārasattāntaḥ prasūte saṃsṛtibhramam ।
bālasya bhāvitā yakṣabhāvanevograyakṣakam ।। 

ahaṅkāropaśāntau tu śāmyatīyaṃ hi saṃsṛtiḥ ।
mohadā mihikevāṅga prāvṛṭkālaparikṣaye ।। 

rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo bandhor vākyenaiti yathā kṣayam ।
na sarpo ayam iyaṃ rajjur ityādyena janasya vai ।। 

tathā guror girā śāntim ety ahambhāvavibhramaḥ ।
māhaṅkāram asadrūpaṃ bhāvayetyādirūpayā ।। 

abhyāsāj jñānaśāstrāṇāṃ satsaṅgamakathākramaiḥ ।
ahambhramaś śamaṃ yāti jantor āndhyam ivāñjanaiḥ ।। 

vidyamānam api sthūlaṃ yat tat kṣayi nigharṣaṇaiḥ ।
udapānaśilāpy aṅga kṣīyate ghaṭagharṣaṇaiḥ ।। 

ahaṅkṛter avidyāyā bhāvitāyā akāraṇam ।
nāśe ka iva sandeho vicārair nāśahetubhiḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan sarvatattvajña citte ahaṅkāranāmani ।
galite vā galadrūpe liṅgaṃ sattvasya kiṃ bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vivekābdodayenāṅga śāmyantyāṃ dehadhanvani ।
svacittamṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ na saṃsṛtyātapo bhavet ।। 

uravo api hi sañjātā na spṛśanty āśayaṃ sitam ।
lobhamohādayo doṣāḥ payāṃsīva saroruham ।। 

muditādyāś śriyo vaktraṃ na muñcanti kadācana ।
saubhāgyasukhadāyinyaḥ puṣpalakṣmyo madhuṃ yathā ।। 

kathaṃ saṃsṛtir ity eva vicāre muditodaye ।
udeti sattvaṃ cittaṃ ca galanāya pravartate ।। 

galaty ahaṅkāramaye citte calati duṣkṛte ।
vāsanāgranthayaḥ khinnā iva truṭyanty alaṃ śanaiḥ ।। 

kopas tānavam āyāti śaradīva payodharaḥ ।
moho māndyam upādatte prabhāte timiraṃ yathā ।। 

kāmaḥ klamaṃ gacchati ca dīrghādhvaga ivātape ।
lobhaḥ palāyate kvāpi vyālo dṛṣṭveva barhiṇam ।। 

nollasantīndriyāṇy uccair ahanīva niśācarāḥ ।
na sphuraty uccakaiḥ khedaḥ prāvṛṣīvākulaṃ rajaḥ ।। 

na duḥkhāny upagarjanti gajā iva viyauvanāḥ ।
na sukhāny upadhāvanti payāṃsīvograsetunā ।। 

sukhaduḥkhādayaś caite dṛśyante yadi vā mukhe ।
dṛśyante eva tat sādho na tu limpanti te manaḥ ।। 

citte galati gīrvāṇagaṇasya spṛhaṇīyatām ।
sādhur gacchaty udety asya samatāśītacandrikā ।। 

idaṃ śāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighāti ca ।
nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ svacchaṃ bhavatīndvamalaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

bhāvābhāvavibhugno api vicitro api mahān api ।
nānandāya na khedāya satāṃ saṃsṛtivibhramaḥ ।। 

buddhyālokanasādhye asmin vastuny astamitāpadi ।
pravartate na yo mohāt taṃ dhig astu narādhamam ।। 

viśrāntim āptum ucitāṃ ciram aṅga duḥkharatnākaraṃ jananasāgaram uttitīrṣoḥ ।
ko ahaṃ kathaṃ jagad idaṃ ca paraś ca kas syāt kiṃ bhogakair iti matiḥ paramo abhyupāyaḥ ।। 

sattvasthalakṣaṇakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhavatām ādipuruṣa ikṣvākur nāma bhūpatiḥ ।
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo yathā muktas tathā śṛṇu ।। 

ikṣvākur iti vikhyāto bhūpo bhāskaravaṃśajaḥ ।
āsīt patir mahīpānāṃ pitṝṇām iva dharmarāṭ ।। 

himaśītasvabhāvo api padārthān antar aspṛśan ।
madhyāhne sūryakāntādrir iva jvalati yo ariṣu ।। 

yamabandhutvam ariṣu yena pāpāśayeṣu ca ।
dīnāristrīdṛśā śyāmavapuṣā prakaṭīkṛtam ।। 

pratāpenārkavaṃśatvaṃ yenāriṣu vyatanyata ।
somyatvaṃ tu suhṛdvipravadhūgurvādyabandhuṣu ।। 

yasyānanābjam āśritya lakṣmīr bhrūbhramarī sakhī ।
amanyata harer vakṣaḥ kṣapākusumapelavam ।। 

yasya śītalaśuklena yaśasā valitaṃ jagat ।
karoti cakravākānāṃ pūrṇendūdayavibhramam ।। 

so akhaṇḍaśaktiprasaraṃ svārājyaṃ paripālayan ।
kadācid ekāntagato manasā samacintayat ।। 

jarāmaraṇasaṅkṣobhasukhaduḥkhabhramasthiteḥ ।
asya dṛśyaprapañcasya ko hetus syād iti svayam ।। 

jagato na vivedāsau kāraṇaṃ cintayann api ।
bālo abhrastanitasyeva tenāsau paryatapyata ।। 

athaikadāpṛcchad asau brahmalokāgataṃ manum ।
pūjitaṃ svasabhāsaṃsthaṃ bhagavantaṃ prajāpatim ।। 

ikṣvākuḥ

saṃyojayati dhārṣṭyena bhagavan bhūritejasam ।
bhavatprasāda evāyaṃ bhavantaṃ praṣṭum ojasā ।। 

sphuratā hṛdaye nityaṃ dhūmaśyāmena tāpinā ।
dahye ahaṃ saṃśayenāntar vāḍaveneva vāridhiḥ ।। 

kutas sargo ayam āyātaḥ kiṃsvarūpaś ca kathyate ।
kathaṃ keṣv avatiṣṭhante jarārtimaraṇāpadaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ kathaṃ vā viṣamād asmāt saṃsṛtivibhramāt ।
vimucyeya ghanāstīrṇāj jālād iva vihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

tvam evāsya prapañcasya jānāsi sakalā gatīḥ ।
gambhīrasyātilolasya varuṇo ambunidher iva ।। 

sandehavṛkṣaparaśur hārdadhvāntadivākaraḥ ।
paramāmṛtaśītāṃśus tvam ekaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

manuḥ

aho nu cirakālena viveke pravikāsini ।
vitatānarthavicchettā sāraḥ praśnas tvayā kṛtaḥ ।। 

saṃsārāmbhodhitaraṇaṃ paraṃ viśramaṇaṃ dhiyaḥ ।
dṛśyatṛṇyāmahāvātaṃ yathāpṛṣṭam idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tan nāsti nṛpa kiñcana ।
rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatvam asad evedam utthitam ।। 

yathā gandharvanagaraṃ yathā vārimatir marau ।
yathā śuktau rajatatā yathā dvitvaṃ sudhānidhau ।। 

sarvaṃ mithyāvabhāsātma sphuratīdam asanmayam ।
pravilolojjvalālātalocanabhramacakravat ।। 

yat tu no dṛśyate kiñcid yan nakiñcid iti smṛtam ।
manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ yat khād api nakiñcana ।। 

avināśaṃ tad astīha tat tad ātmeti kathyate ।
tat tat tat paramaṃ brahma tat tat sad amalaṃ param ।। 

anantabhūtaparṇāyā jātāyā vyomakānane ।
ṛkṣajālakapuṣpāyās sargavallyās tu tad rasaḥ ।। 

tat tac cinmātram ābhānaṃ yat parisphurati svayam ।
akṣubdhāmbhodhijalavat taj jagajjālatāṃ gatam ।। 

evaṃ parāt samāyātā rājan sargaparamparāḥ ।
tasminn eva mahādarśe pratibimbam upāgatāḥ ।। 

tās svabhāvasamutpannā bahvyas sphuraṇaśaktayaḥ ।
paścāt kāraṇatāṃ yānti mitho jīvādināmabhiḥ ।। 

kāścid brahmāṇḍatāṃ yānti kāścid gacchanti bhūtatām ।
anyan nānātvam itarā bhavaty evaṃ jagatsthitiḥ ।। 

gṛhītakalanā brāhmyaś śaktayas svayam eva hi ।
saṅkalpya mitajīvatvam ahaṃjñānātmikās sthitāḥ ।। 

tāḥ kośakārakrimivat svayaṃ gacchanti bandhanam ।
prāptāḥ parimitaṃ rūpaṃ rañjanaṃ sphaṭikā iva ।। 

bandho na sambhavaty eva tās svayaṃ bandhanaṃ gatāḥ ।
mugdhā hi bhītyā paśyanti yakṣaṃ mātṛstaneṣv api ।। 

svabhāvatas samutthāya niṣkāraṇam akāraṇam ।
mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ yānti brāhmyas sphuraṇaśaktayaḥ ।। 

na bandho asti na mokṣo asti brahmaivāsti nirāmayam ।
naikyam asti na ca dvitvaṃ saṃvidbhānaṃ vijṛmbhate ।। 

ekaṃ yathā sphurati vāri taraṅgabhaṅgair evaṃ parisphurati cittam akiñcid etat ।
tvaṃ bandhamokṣakalane pravimucya dūre svastho bhavābhayatayodayasāra eva ।। 

ikṣvākūpadeśe sargāvabhāsanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

saṅkalponmukhatāṃ yātās satyāś cinmātrasaṃvidaḥ ।
āpas taraṅgatvam iva yānti bhūmipa jīvatām ।। 

te jīvās saṃsarantīha saṃsāre pūrvam utthite ।
svakarmakaraṇād deheṣv abjeṣv iva madhuvratāḥ ।। 

sarvātmāpi paraṃ brahma kurvad eva karoti no ।
jananiṣṭhāni divasakarmāṇīva divākaraḥ ।। 

calaty acetanam ayo yathāyaskāntasannidhau ।
tathā sphurati sargo ayaṃ svasthite paramātmani ।। 

svaparispandajo vāri yathāvartaḥ pravartate ।
tathāyaṃ cinmaye jīve dehas sampadyate svayam ।। 

yathālātaparispandād dhemacakraṃ pradṛśyate ।
evaṃ svacetanaspandād deho ayam avalokyate ।। 

yathā nadanadībhedād bahutvaṃ kalpyate ambhasaḥ ।
evam ākārabhedena nānātvaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

sukhaduḥkhadaśāmoho manasy evāsti nātmani ।
keyūrakaṭakāditvaṃ saṅkalpe asti na hemani ।। 

mūḍhe jīve manaś cittam ityādikalanaṃ viduḥ ।
yathābhūtārthatattvajñe sattvam etad udāhṛtam ।। 

dehād anantaraṃ sattvaṃ vyomatām eti kevalam ।
na jarāmaraṇārtīnāṃ bhūyo bhavati kāraṇam ।। 

yathāsphurat sphurad iva pratibimbaṃ girer bhavet ।
tathākartaiva karteva lakṣyate cetanas tanau ।। 

śārīreṣu vilāseṣu somya evāśayeśvaraḥ ।
pratibimbaṃ vikāreṣu mukhasyevānuvartate ।। 

yathārkaś cañcalo vāri dṛśyate na tu cañcalaḥ ।
tathātmā cañcalo dehe dṛśyate na tu cañcalaḥ ।। 

yathā ghaṭeṣu naṣṭeṣu ghaṭākāśaṃ na naśyati ।
tathā naṣṭeṣu deheṣu nātmā naśyati kasyacit ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārarahito arthānurañjanam ।
yathāmalo maṇir dhatte dhatte dehaṃ tatheśvaraḥ ।। 

rūpālokamanaskāraiḥ kiṃ vā madhurasas tarum ।
yathollāsayati proccais tathā cid dṛśyamaṇḍalam ।। 

trailokyavartini yathā madhuradravyasañcaye ।
sthitaṃ mādhuryam akhile tathātmā vastujālake ।। 

yathārko gacchato yāti jantos tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhataḥ ।
mithyaiva na tu satyena tathātmā vapuṣām iha ।। 

pratibimbavināśeṣu yathā na makurādayaḥ ।
naśyanti tadvad dehasya nāśe nātmā vinaśyati ।। 

aṅgārādiṣu dagdheṣu yathā hema na dahyate ।
tathā deheṣu naṣṭeṣu cinmātraṃ na vinaśyati ।।
