adṛśyo dṛśyate rāhur gṛhītena yathendunā ।
tathānubhavamātrātmā cetyenātmāvalokyate ।। 

yadvat prakaṭatām eti pratibimbārhatā maṇau ।
pratibimbena tadvad vai cittvaṃ cetyena cetyate ।। 

saṅkalpajālamuktāyāś cito yat svastham āsthitam ।
kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam ।। 

sattvasthe buddhitattve antas svayam ātmopalabhyate ।
ādarśe malamukte hi pratibimbaṃ pravartate ।। 

na śāstrair nāpi guruṇā dṛśyate parameśvaraḥ ।
dṛśyate svayam evātmā svayā sattvasthayā dhiyā ।। 

ime dehādayas sarve bhāvāḥ prakṛtirūpiṇaḥ ।
nāpy asanto na santo api bhramamātrād ṛte anagha ।। 

pathikāḥ pathi dṛśyante rāgadveṣavimuktayā ।
yathā dhiyā tathaivaite draṣṭavyās svendriyādayaḥ ।। 

eteṣu nādaraḥ kāryas satā naivāvadhīraṇam ।
padārthamātratāniṣṭhās tiṣṭhantv ete yathāsthitam ।। 

yad asti tanmayenaiva bhavitavyaṃ vijānatā ।
ātmaiva jagatām asti na dehādyarthajālakam ।। 

padārthajātaṃ dehādi vidā santyajya dūrataḥ ।
āśītalāntaḥkaraṇo nityam ātmamayo bhava ।। 

ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmany ātmaiva vidyate ।
ātmātmanaivāhriyate sarvātmātmānubhūtitaḥ ।। 

yathā jalād ṛte nāsti samudratvaṃ mahāmbudheḥ ।
ātmatattvād ṛte nāsti jagattvaṃ jagatas tathā ।। 

yathārkaḥ kumbhalakṣeṣu tathātmā dehapaṅktiṣu ।
nāstam eti na codeti naṣṭānaṣṭāsu tāsv asau ।। 

anātmadhīḥ kvacid api śuktau rajatatā yathā ।
yodety anagha mithyā sā sarvagatvād ihātmanaḥ ।। 

deho aham iti yā buddhis sā saṃsāranibandhanī ।
dehaduḥkhānupātitvād asāratvāc ca vastunaḥ ।। 

nakiñcinmātrarūpo asmi yathaite gaganādayaḥ ।
iti yā śāśvatī buddhis sā na saṃsārabandhanī ।। 

yathā vimalatoyāntar bahir antaś ca bhānujam ।
tejas tiṣṭhati sarvatra tathātmā sarvavastuṣu ।। 

bhittau nabhasi pātāle puro dūre ca saṃsthitaḥ ।
ātmā triṣv api kāleṣu nāsau naśyati karhicit ।। 

chedādīnām agamyaṃ khaṃ yathaivātmā tathaiva hi ।
etāvanmātrako bhedo yac cinmātrātmatātmani ।। 

sanniveśāṃśavaicitryaṃ yathā hemno aṅgadāditā ।
ātmanas tadatadrūpaṃ tathaiva jagadāditā ।। 

saritām āsamudrāntaṃ yathaivāmbu vivartate ।
utpannadhvaṃsinājasraṃ taraṅgaughena vāriṇi ।। 

ātmany ātmasamullāsas tathaivāyaṃ vilokyate ।
nānāpadārthajālena vināśābdhiṃ pradhāvatā ।। 

vināśavāḍavākrāntaṃ bhīmaṃ kālamahārṇavam ।
jagajjālataraṅgiṇyo yānti sargataraṅgakāḥ ।। 

tasyāpy adyāpy apūrṇasya yaḥ pātā kālavāridheḥ ।
tam ātmānaṃ mahāgastyaṃ rājan bhāvaya vindhyavat ।। 

śāstrasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ saṃsārocchedanodyataiḥ ।
ātmādikāḥ kṛtās sañjñā vāgatītasya vastunaḥ ।। 

na rajjvām asti sarpatvaṃ tan mithyā kaḥ prapaśyati ।
nātmano asti kvacid bandho mā mohād bhāvayāṅga tam ।। 

mohas tadbhāvanāmātram āhur mohaharā narāḥ ।
tam eva bhāvanātyāgāt tyaktvā vijvaratāṃ vraja ।। 

eṣa evāndhakāro asāv etad eva paraṃ malam ।
prāg abaddhasya bandhena saṅkalpo yaḥ kilātmanaḥ ।। 

anātmany ātmatām asmin dehādau dṛśyajālake ।
tyaktvā sattvam upārūḍho gūḍhas tiṣṭha yathāsukham ।। 

kucakoṭarasaṃsuptaṃ vismṛtya jananī sutam ।
yathā roditi putrārthaṃ tathātmārtham ayaṃ janaḥ ।। 

ajarāmaram ātmānam abuddhvā pariroditi ।
hā hato aham anātho ahaṃ naṣṭo asmīti jano mudhā ।। 

deśakālakriyābhede dehasthe maraṇābhidhe ।
loko anuśocaty ātmānam aho nu khalu mūḍhatā ।। 

deśakālakriyābhedaṃ yadi deho anudhāvati ।
tad anāder anāśasya kim asyāgatam ātmanaḥ ।। 

anyad bhuktaṃ vāntam anyad idaṃ tad yaj janavrajaiḥ ।
dehasya nāśino nāśe ātmanāśo anuśocyate ।। 

dehātmanor mahīpāla savikārāvikārayoḥ ।
suvarṇabhasmopamayos sambandhaḥ ka ivaitayoḥ ।। 

nānākāravikārākhyais svavilāsair ananyagaiḥ ।
līlayaiva svam ātmānam ātmāyaṃ gopayan sthitaḥ ।। 

sarganirmāṇasaṃhārair mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gataiḥ ।
akāraṇasvabhāvena vit sphuraty ātmanātmani ।। 

krīḍaty ātmā śiśur iva saṅkalpair līlayombhitaiḥ ।
tṛṇair maṇim ivātmānaṃ svaccham ācchādya cañcalaiḥ ।। 

spandaprabhāṃ cidādityaḥ prasāryālokakāriṇīm ।
jagaddināni racayan na kadācana khidyate ।। 

spandamātrātmaciddhātor deha eva jagatkramaḥ ।
sanniveśo apy abhinnātmā padārthasyeva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

spandamātrāt svabhāvena cit karoti jagatkriyām ।
saṃharaty aparispandād vār vīciracanām iva ।। 

padārthān avibhāgena paśyan buddhyādivarjitaḥ ।
cinmātrabālo ramate sargakrīḍanakais svayam ।। 

bālaḥ krīḍanake jātaratiś śocati tatkṣaye ।
svarūpe vismṛte yadvat tadvad ātmeha saṃsṛtau ।। 

nisspandāspandasaṃvittes svayaṃ sā smaraṇena cit ।
vittvam asyā vidus spandaṃ yadi vedyonmukhaṃ ca tat ।। 

aspandā spandavidbhrāntyā cid vismṛtyaiva śocati ।
jhagity aspandanāmānaṃ mokṣam etyopaśāmyati ।। 

nijam aspandanaṃ turyaṃ jāgratsvapnasuṣuptakaiḥ ।
ācchādya śocati mudhā tad akṛtvā na śocati ।। 

jagajjālāya citspandā manobuddhīndriyādayaḥ ।
samudyanti jalaspandā ivormyoghakaṇādayaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpanaṃ hi citspando aspando asaṅkalpanaṃ smṛtam ।
brahmāsaṅkalpanaṃ viddhi nakiñcid iva yac ca tat ।। 

yathā vāri parispandān nānākāraṃ vilokyate ।
tadadvitīyam evaivaṃ cidbrahma paribṛṃhitam ।। 

cito aspandas tv asaṅkalpas tat turyaṃ brahma tad bhavet ।
taṃ mokṣam āhus tasmiṃs tvaṃ nṛpa baddhapado bhava ।। 

saṅkalpena vihīnaś cet spanda eva citer nṛpa ।
sā tad aspandanā cit syāt saṅkalpas spanda ucyate ।। 

saṃsthāpya saṅkalpavikalpamuktaṃ cittattvam ātmany upaśāntaśaṅkaḥ ।
spande apy apaspandacidīśvarātmā svasthas sukhī rājyam idaṃ praśādhi ।। 

spandavicāro nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

sargātmabhir vibhus spandakrīḍitair bālavan nijām ।
sattāṃ mohayatīvāntas sāvadhāno bhavātra bhoḥ ।। 

saṅkalpyātmā svayaṃ dvaitaṃ ciraṃ śocati yoniṣu ।
svayam advaitasaṅkalpāt kālenāyāti nirvṛtim ।। 

svayam asya tathā śaktir udety ābadhyate yathā ।
svayam asya tathā śaktir udety āmucyate yathā ।। 

na labhyate pravacanair na dhiyā na tapaśśrutaiḥ ।
yadodayecchām āyāti tad ātmātmānam īkṣate ।। 

aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ bata viṣvag vimohinī ।
sarvāṅgaprotam apy ātmā yad ātmānaṃ na paśyati ।। 

dṛṣṭvā sarvagam ātmānam anantam avanīśvara ।
nivartate śarīrāsthā tato duḥkhair na lipyate ।। 

candrārkavahnitaptāyoratnādīnāṃ yathārciṣaḥ ।
yathā pattrādi vṛkṣāṇāṃ nirjharāṇāṃ yathā kaṇāḥ ।। 

tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sphāre jagad buddhyādi kalpitam ।
duḥkhapradam atajjñānāṃ tad evātad iva sthitam ।। 

yathā vāhavaśād vāri dāmādiracanāṃ vahet ।
prakṛtir yāti nānātvaṃ tathā spandavaśād iyam ।। 

yathā saritpayaḥkośe vāhas spandī na lakṣyate ।
tathājasraṃ viracayan sargam ātmā na lakṣyate ।। 

yathā svacchasya somyasya mahato avahato aniśam ।
vāriṇo apy aṃśubhinnasya kośaspando na lakṣyate ।। 

tathā sarvagatasyāpi dāmni vyomny atha vāśmani ।
anāvṛtasyānantasya satas sattā na lakṣyate ।। 

somyasyāvahato vāreḥ kośaspando yathātmagaḥ ।
na san nāsan na ca pṛthak sattā cidvapuṣas tathā ।। 

svasaṅkalpātmikāṃ yatra sarvaśaktitayā svayam ।
cittatām eti tatraitat tat prasphurad iva sthitam ।। 

svasaṅkalpātmikāṃ yatra sarvaśaktitayā svayam ।
jahāti cittatāṃ tatra sat saṃśāntam iva sthitam ।। 

ikṣvākuḥ

evaṃ cet tan mahābhāga dṛṣadādir mahākṛtiḥ ।
pārthivo ayaṃ bṛhadbhāgaḥ kim uttho atha kimātmakaḥ ।। 

manuḥ

śaktayas sakalā eva cinmātre brahmaṇi sthitāḥ ।
vaṭabīje vaṭalatāpattrapuṣpaphalādivat ।। 

jaḍājaḍābhidhe śaktī sarvaśaktes sta ātmanaḥ ।
śaktīnām uttame hemni kāṭhinyadravate yathā ।। 

rūpālokamanaskāraviṣayatvam upāgatā ।
jāḍyanāmnī tayor ekā yāsau bhūmyādirūpiṇī ।। 

naiṣā prajāyate nāpi kadācit pravilīyate ।
svāṅgabhūtā sato nityam ākāśakośavat sthitā ।। 

brahmaṇo avyatirikteyam iti yas sarparajjuvat ।
asadabhyudito mohas sa bodhena vilīyate ।। 

naiṣā bhāvavikārākhyām eti śuddhacidātmani ।
eṣā kila kaṇormyambu payasīva citi sthitā ।। 

yat sato asattvam asatas sattvaṃ vā vikṛtir hi sā ।
atyantānyasvarūpatvān nāsti tat paramātmani ।। 

asattayā sato rājann asataś caiva sattayā ।
vinaṣṭākṛtir asyeti vikārādy abhidhīyate ।। 

yat tv aṅkure phalāditvaṃ kṣīrādau vā ghṛtāditā ।
sattāvabhāsamātraṃ tat sphuraty ambv iva vīcibhiḥ ।। 

yad yathā dṛśyate yatra tat tathā tatra vidyate ।
deśakālavibhāgātma tathā saṃvedanātmakaṃ ।। 

deśakālāntaragato apy eka eva yathā giriḥ ।
bījaṃ phalāntam apy evam ekam atrānyatāsti no ।। 

vaṭatā vaṭadhānāyāṃ yādṛkkālodayā yathā ।
tathā jaḍājaḍeyaṃ śrīs saṃsthitā cinmayātmani ।। 

ākārarāśirūpeṇa bhūribhāvavikāriṇā ।
ābhāsa eva sphurati svapneneva mano nṛpa ।। 

ikṣvākuḥ

śailādyākāratā sthūlā yathāsya paramātmanaḥ ।
sphuraty asatyā satyā vā tathā vada punar mama ।। 

manuḥ

iti sarvaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ cidvyoma tatam avyayam ।
aparyantam anābhāsam āsīd asti bhaviṣyati ।। 

yan nordhvaṃ nāpy adho nāśā na tamo na prakāśanam ।
netarat kiñcid api ca sarvam eva sadaiva ca ।। 

cinmātraikātmanā tena parameṇeśvareṇa naḥ ।
ādyantamadhyamuktena saṅkalpaś cetitas svayam ।। 

sthitas saṅkalparūpātmā manomūrtir ajas tataḥ ।
tena saṅkalpitaṃ vyoma manasedaṃ bṛhadvapuḥ ।। 

manovyomnor ghanatayā sampannaḥ pavanas sphuran ।
manovyomānilāśleṣāt prakāśaṃ buddhavāṃs tataḥ ।। 

tejo'ṃśabhāvasaṅkalparūpaṃ paścāt payas sthitam ।
sa catuṣṭayapiṇḍo atha manaso aṇḍatayekṣitaḥ ।। 

aṇḍaṃ tat pādmajaṃ bhūtvā sampanne paśya rodasī ।
tatra tv avayavābhāsaṃ mervādīdaṃ mahat sthitam ।। 

jagattayeti brahmaiva paripūrṇaṃ vilokyate ।
spandair bhāvavikārādyais savikāram iva sthitam ।। 

ekaivānekarūpeva deśakālāntare yathā ।
sarit tathaiva vallītve sthitā svasthaiva bījatā ।। 

pālīvatāni tiṣṭhanti yathā kumbhasya koṭare ।
tathāpārasya cidvyomno jaganty antas sthitāni hi ।। 

cidbrahmakoṭaragatā imās sargaparamparāḥ ।
sphuranti pariṇāminyo jalakośe yathormayaḥ ।। 

yathā patantyā tamasi dṛṣṭyā kim api dṛśyate ।
tathā jagad ahaṃ ceti citāsat pratibhāsate ।। 

yathā dṛṣṭyā tamasy andhe cakrakādy api dṛśyate ।
tathādisarge ayam aham ity asatyaṃ citohyate ।। 

cidghanasya mahāśakter yad eva pratibhāsanam ।
tat prakṛtyādināmeha na san nāsann atac ca tat ।। 

bṛṃhitā bharitākārā sattaikā pāramātmikī ।
ābhāsaiḥ prasphuraty evam abdhir ūrmyādibhir yathā ।। 

cidākāśamayaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ity eva bhāvayan ।
yas tiṣṭhaty upaśāntecchaṃ sa brahmakavacas sukhī ।। 

ahamarthavimuktena bhāvenābhāvarūpiṇā ।
sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirālambaṃ cicchāntam iti bhāvayet ।। 

idaṃ ramyam idaṃ neti bījaṃ te duḥkhasantateḥ ।
tasmin sāmyāgninā dagdhe duḥkhasyāvasaraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

rājan bhāvanamātreṇa ramyāramyavibhāgitā ।
pauruṣātiśayenāntas svenaivāśu vilīyate ।। 

abhāvanena bhāvānāṃ kartitvā karmakānanam ।
paraṃ sametya rājendra viśokatara āssva bhoḥ ।। 

bharitabhuvanābhogo bhūtvā vibhāgabahiṣkṛto galitakalanollāsollāsī vikāsavilāsavān ।
navanavam ajo vṛddho atyantaṃ cirāya nirāmayas samasamasitasvacchābhogo bhavābhayacidvapuḥ ।। 

manūpadeśe sargāgamayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

yathāvartā jalabhare pratibimbāni vā maṇau ।
yathendriyeṣu viṣayā yathālokaś ca tejasi ।। 

yathā tṛṇāni vā vāyau durlakṣyaspandarūpiṇi ।
trijaganti sphuranty evaṃ durlakṣye anubhavātmani ।। 

yathā dravādayo ambvādau tāpe vā trasareṇavaḥ ।
sanniveśāḥ padārthāṅge sargaughāś cidghane tathā ।। 

tadātmakā atadrūpās tatsthās tatsattayā sthitāḥ ।
anante nāśinas sargā budbudā jaladhāv iva ।। 

kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇas site śuklo rakte rakto yathā maṇiḥ ।
varṇe nirvāsanācchatvān na tv asāv eti rañjanām ।। 

mūḍhe mūḍho hate bhagno hṛṣṭe hṛṣṭas tatheśvaraḥ ।
citte nirvāsanācchatvān na tv asāv eti rañjanām ।। 

vāsanāto jagajjanma sā ca saṅketamātrakam ।
idaṃ mameti mithyaiva bhāvanaṃ tat parityaja ।। 

rajodhūmāndhyatejo'bhrair yathākāśo na lipyate ।
tathā prakṛtisaṅkalpaiś citsāraṃ kham alepakam ।। 

yathā bhūmigatā bhāso ravir evāṅga netarat ।
tathā cid eva saṅkalpās tanmayatvena netarat ।। 

param avyapadeśyātmā nisspandaḥ pavano yathā ।
svavedanātmanas spandād ātmanaivopalabhyate ।। 

asad vedyaṃ vedyam iva cidrūpatvāc cinoti yat ।
cinnāmayogyatā sāsya seyaṃ saṃsṛtir utthitā ।। 

yathā sphurat prasannāmbu nānyat salilamātrataḥ ।
tathā brahma cidacchātma netarad brahmamātrataḥ ।। 

param avyapadeśyātma yāsya tu vyapadeśyatā ।
saiṣā cin nāma saiveha draṣṭṛdṛśyapadaṃ gatā ।। 

nodayy apy uditaṃ spandād āvartādi yathāmbhasaḥ ।
tathānudayy apy uditam iva vittvāt pare jagat ।। 

brahma navyapadeśyātma nisspandaḥ pavano yathā ।
cicchabdārthātmatā yātra tad ahantādimaj jagat ।। 

svacche ambhasi dravaspandād yathāvartāditā matā ।
anirdeśye pare vittvāt tathā cittā jaganmayī ।। 

sargasyādyantayor ukto yaḥ kramo vedanātmakaḥ ।
sa unmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ nimeṣaṃ prati ciddṛśaḥ ।। 

prasaranti yathā spandāt salile cakrakādayaḥ ।
prasaranti pare vittvāt tathāhantāditādayaḥ ।। 

avedanaṃ paraṃ viddhi vedanaṃ sarga ucyate ।
asat sadvedanād dṛśyaṃ sad apy asadavedanāt ।। 

citer dṛśa ivonmeṣād asatsargo avabhāsate ।
citīkṣaṇanimeṣāt tu sann apy eva na bhāsate ।। 

māyācūrṇaparikṣepād indrajālajagad yathā ।
kha evodeti ciccūrṇacamatkārād idaṃ tathā ।। 

yathā spandān nimeṣe api jalam āvartalakṣavat ।
tathā vittvāt kṣaṇād īśe sargapralayavibhramāḥ ।। 

cidrūpasya cirakṣīṇavāsanasyāpi jīvataḥ ।
avedanamayī sattā yasyāsau mukta ucyate ।। 

avāsanam asaṅkalpaṃ pravāhāpatitakriyāḥ ।
tiṣṭhanti samprabuddhā ye te hy avedanasanmayāḥ ।। 

kriyāvanto apy asaṅkalpavāsanās stimitāśayāḥ ।
nityaṃ kāṣṭhasamādhānās te śilodarasannibhāḥ ।। 

na svapnasvapnapurayor iva bhedo manāg api ।
sargavedanayos tasmād brahmavid brahmavedanam ।। 

śabdārthabhāvanehānāṃ vittvāt satyāvabodhataḥ ।
yad asattāvabodho antas tad avedanam ucyate ।। 

adṛṣad dṛṣadābhāsaṃ jñam apy ajñam iva sthitam ।
aśūnyaṃ śūnyasaṅkāśaṃ hṛdayaṃ vedanaṃ sataḥ ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkaiḥ prajñām ādau vivardhayet ।
prathamā bhūmikaiṣoktā yogasya navayoginaḥ ।। 

vicāraṇā dvitīyā syāt tṛtīyāsaṅgabhāvanā ।
caturthī sattvatāpattau vāsanāvilayātmikā ।। 

śuddhasaṃvinmayānandarūpā bhavati pañcamī ।
ardhasuptaprabuddhābho jīvanmukto atra tiṣṭhati ।। 

asaṃvedanarūpā ca ṣaṣṭhī bhavati bhūmikā ।
ānandaikaghanākārā suṣuptasadṛśasthitiḥ ।। 

turyāvasthopaśāntātha muktir eva hi kevalam ।
samatā svacchatā somyā saptamī bhūmikā bhavet ।। 

turyātītātha yāvasthā parinirvāṇarūpiṇī ।
saptamī sā pariprauḍhā viṣayas sā na jīvatām ।। 

pūrvāvasthātrayaṃ tatra jāgrad ity eva saṃsthitam ।
caturthī svapna ity uktā svapnābhaṃ yatra vai jagat ।। 

ānandaikaghanībhāvāt suṣuptākhyā tu pañcamī ।
asaṃvedanarūpā ca ṣaṣṭhī turyābhidhā smṛtā ।। 

turyātītapadāvasthā saptamī bhūmikottamā ।
param avyapadeśyāsāv agamyā mahatām api ।। 

padārthas sanniveśais svair yathānanyais samanvitaḥ ।
tathā cit sargaśabdārthair na tu sargārtharūpibhiḥ ।। 

yathormikādiḥ kanake tathā sargaḥ pare pade ।
kiṃ tv asau vidyamāno api sañjñāśabdārthavarjitaḥ ।। 

hāṭake kaṭakādiś ca sargaś ca parame pade ।
vidyamāno api nāsty eva prekṣāyāṃ kalpanārthavat ।। 

aspandayāvedanayā spandavedanasattayā ।
yā saṃvid aṅkuraśrīs syāt sātmasatteti kathyate ।। 

sā tvaṃ sā cin manas sā ca na tvaṃ no cin manaś ca no ।
sattāsatte na sā śāntā tataś cānyan na vidyate ।। 

ākāśād iva śūnyatvaṃ taraṅgatvam ivāmbhasaḥ ।
nākārādi tato bhinnaṃ na dṛkcittaśilādi ca ।। 

draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ tasyāṃ dṛśi vayaṃ sthitāḥ ।
ciccittajaḍatādīnāṃ nāmāpi na ca śikṣitāḥ ।। 

na sarvāpahnavaṃ vedmi na sarvaṃ nāpy apahnavam ।
tvattvamattvādyasambhāvāt paraṃ śāntaṃ jagannabhaḥ ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣavastuviṣayā satyātmatāsatyatāyuktāhamprakṛtiḥ kriyeti gaditā nāstīti niścitya tat ।
nāstīty etad apīha vānyad aham ity arthair yutaṃ nāsty alaṃ tasmād astajaḍājaḍāṅkurasamutsedhāsanenāsyatām ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

nirvāṇasvarūpayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

saṃśāntabhavasambandham arāgadveśavāsanam ।
jñasyendriyāṇi spandante yantrehāpaṭacitravat ।। 

veṣṭitonmuktatṛṇavat taraṅgavad avāsanam ।
spandante vyavahāreṣu kharūpā vedyavedinaḥ ।। 

arāgadveṣamananam ūrmiṇormir anūrmyate ।
yathā svaṃ jñena yuddhādi karma nirmīyate tathā ।। 

ūrmiṇormāv anūrmitvaṃ nīte tatsāram akṣatam ।
yathāmbv evāmbusampannaṃ yuktaṃ naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana ।। 

jīvenājīvatāṃ jīve nīte tatsāram akṣatam ।
tathātmātmaiva sampanno yuktaṃ naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana ।। 

cic cid astu padāṃśe api sacetyā tadadhaś cyutā ।
kadarthaprāpyanirvāṇā bhavaty abhavaniṃ gatā ।। 

cinmātrātmātmaniṣṭhatvāt sukhaduḥkhe cinoti no ।
asatī eva satyātmā mukto vyavaharann api ।। 

jīvanmuktatvam etāvad yat sthirābhyāsayogataḥ ।
na sukhāya na duḥkhāya bhavec cit pratibimbitā ।। 

svasthaḥ pratyāhṛtivaśāc cetyaṃ cen na cinoṣi tat ।
mukta evāsy asandehaṃ mahāsamatayānayā ।। 

yad bhogasukhaduḥkhāṃśair anātmīkṛtapūrṇadhīḥ ।
ātmārāmo munis tiṣṭhet tan muktatvam udāhṛtam ।। 

vyavahāry upaśānto vā gṛhastho vātha bhikṣukaḥ ।
saśarīro aśarīro vā bhavatv evammatiḥ pumān ।। 

sukhaduḥkhair anālīḍhā saṃvid bhavati cet samā ।
asaṃvid iva tad deho yat karoti karotu tat ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇopame dehe avidyātmani tate kṣate ।
bhāvābhāvabhrame asatye sukhaduḥkhakramaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

cinmātram apanāmedam acidābham anantakam ।
ataś cāsambhavadvedyam ātmānam amalaṃ śrayet ।। 

jāgrato jīvataś cetyacayanād askhalacciteḥ ।
sthitir yopalakośābhā sā turyaṃ sā vimuktatā ।। 

cinmūrtis svāntar evedaṃ svasattātmopakalpitam ।
jagan mithyānubhavati svapne chinnaśirā iva ।। 

yan mithyā tat kva satyātma kva satyā maruvāritā ।
ato asaṃvedanād eva bhramasyāsya parikṣayaḥ ।। 

aham ity eva cayanāj jagatsaṃsṛtivibhramaḥ ।
asyaivācayanān nāhaṃ na jagan na ca vibhramaḥ ।। 

dravaṃ svam iva śuddhāmbu svāntarlekhā ivopalaḥ ।
svam ikṣur iva mādhuryaṃ cit svaṃ cetayate jagat ।। 

yathauṣṇyam agnis tuhinaṃ ca śaityaṃ spandaṃ nabhasvān dravam abdhir evam ।
ananyad apy anyad ivātmatattvaṃ vid vetty adas tat tu na vetty atajjñaḥ ।। 

mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

ātmanaivātmano lepaḥ ka iva syāt kathaṃ kila ।
ato nirlepa evātmā dvitīyasyātyasambhavāt ।। 

vāsanādivikalpo asti vyatiriktaś ca nātmanaḥ ।
ātmaiva vāsanāśaktir jalam eva yathormayaḥ ।। 

ātmā dehendriyatayā sphuradbhāvavikāritām ।
dhatte abhāvavikāro api taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ ।। 

avikāro api saṅkalpya vikārakalanāṃ mudhā ।
vikārīva bhavaty uccaiḥ paśyaty uccair vijṛmbhitam ।। 

ātmano dṛśyate rājan yad vikāro avikāriṇaḥ ।
satyaṃ satyam asatyaṃ tat svayam etad vicāraya ।। 

kaṭakādi yathā hemno vivartādi tathātmanaḥ ।
na vikāro avikārasya sambhavaty avināśataḥ ।। 

na vikāro yathormitvaṃ vāra evaṃ jagac citaḥ ।
asatyālokanād bhrāntir dṛṣṭer eva na vastunaḥ ।। 

yathāṅgadatvād daṇḍatvaṃ gate hemni na śocyate ।
mṛtam aṅgadahemeti na vikārādy apīti ca ।। 

tathāmbaratvāt kuḍyatve sthite cidvyomni śocanam ।
na yuktaṃ vyomasaṃvid vai mṛtā saty eva dhīmataḥ ।। 

dehasaṃvit khasaṃvittvaṃ khasaṃvid dehasaṃvidam ।
yadi gacchati tad dharṣaviṣādānāṃ ka āgamaḥ ।। 

pratyakcetanam ābhāsas saṃvid astīti niścaye ।
bhāvānāṃ savikārāṇāṃ bhrāntijānām abhāvanāt ।। 

balena svacamatkṛtyā nūnaṃ nīte cirodayam ।
nirvāsanatve hṛdaye kuto jīvasya saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

svasaṃvinmātravaicitryaṃ sādhye saṃsṛtisaṅkṣaye ।
jantūnāṃ citram atyantaṃ yat saṃrambha upasthitaḥ ।। 

saṃvinmātropaśamanaṃ jīvo yaḥ kurute balāt ।
jaḍatvam avrajan svacchas sa tīrṇo bhavasāgaram ।। 

saṃviccāpalajeyaṃ vas saṃsṛtir bhavabandhanī ।
śamaṃ tatpraśamād eti tasmāt tatpraśamaṃ kuru ।। 

yaiva saṃvic chamaṃ yāti saiva buddhir vilīyate ।
yaiva prāleyakaṇikā saiva tāpe vilīyate ।। 

na mriye na ca jīvāmi nāhaṃ san nāpy asan na kham ।
ahaṃ nakiñcic cid iti matvā jīvo na śocati ।। 

alepako aham ajaro nīrāgaś śāntavāsanaḥ ।
nirmalo asmi cidākāśam iti matvā na śocati ।। 

aham antādirahitaś śuddho buddho ajarāmaraḥ ।
śāntas samasamābhāsa iti matvā na śocati ।। 

jagatsarvapadārthānāṃ ciddīpo ahaṃ prakāśanam ।
ke te me janmamaraṇe iti matvā na śocati ।। 

tṛṇe agnāv ambare bhānau naranāgāmareṣu ca ।
yac cid asmi tad eveti matvā ka iva śocati ।। 

tiryag ūrdhvam adhastān me vyāpako mahimā citaḥ ।
asyānantavilāsasya jñātveti ka iva kṣayī ।। 

upaśāntamahātāpāṃ parāṃ niṣṭhām ahaṃ gataḥ ।
atha ko ayam ahaṃ nāma mithyaiva pratyayoditaḥ ।। 

ajenātmā kila jñāto yad ahaṃ buddha īśvaraḥ ।
ātmanātmani viśrāntaṃ jaleneva jalārṇave ।। 

brahma brahmaiva sampannam akṣobhaṃ samatāṃ gatam ।
jalam ūrmivapus tyaktvā svaṃ somyatvam ivāgatam ।। 

nirahaṅkārarūpo asmi galito asmy asmi śāśvataḥ ।
antaśśīto asmi śāmyāmi mṛgatṛṣṇeva prāvṛṣi ।। 

nirvṛto asmi cirāyaiva jāto asmy ajavapur mahān ।
iti jānan bhṛśaṃ jīvo baddho api na nibadhyate ।। 

na me bandho na me mokṣo nāham asmi na cetarat ।
yathābhūtārthadarśitvād iti paśyan na śocati ।। 

kurvato api na bandhāya karma tattvavido bhavet ।
bhuñjāno api viṣaṃ tajjño na vinaśyati karhicit ।। 

prākśarīrakṛtaṃ karma mūlakāṣeṇa dahyate ।
vartamānāvabodhena śuṣkaṃ tṛṇam ivāgninā ।। 

baddhavāsanam artho yas sevyate sukhayaty asau ।
dadāti ca phalānīti svayam evānubhūyate ।। 

yat sukhāya tad evāśu vastu duḥkhāya nāśataḥ ।
avinābhāviniṣṭhatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।। 

tanuvāsanam artho yas sevyate vā vivāsanam ।
nāsau sukhāya naivāto nāśāt kālena duḥkhadaḥ ।। 

nirvāsanatayā spandaṃ kurvato asuptabālavat ।
karmaṇo yoginas tena te na karmaphalānvitāḥ ।। 

kṣīṇavāsanayā buddhyā karma yat kriyate anagha ।
tad bhṛṣṭabījavad bhūyo nāṅkuraṃ pravimuñcati ।। 

dehendriyādinā karma karaṇaughena kalpyate ।
ekaḥ kartātra bhoktā vā ka ivāṅgopapadyate ।। 

anyaḥ paśyati bhuṅkte anyaḥ paro apy anubhavaty aṇuḥ ।
anyasya sukhaduḥkhādi kasyaikasyātra kartṛtā ।। 

ātmā kartāpy akartāyam audāsīnyena saṃsthitaḥ ।
pratibimbeṣv ivādarśo manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātigaḥ ।। 

dehādayo jaḍās sarve tasmād aṅga na kiñcana ।
na kaścid eva kurute sukṛteṣv api karmasu ।। 

karma kurvaty api prājñe tayāsaṃsaktayā dhiyā ।
na kaścit kurute kiñcid dehas sphurati kevalam ।। 

tūṣṇīm api sthito mūḍhaś cintāsaṃsaktayā dhiyā ।
karoti karma śailābhaṃ yad yugair api na kṣayi ।। 

karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran ।
indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā tasyānanteha kartṛtā ।। 

yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate anagha ।
karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam akartaiva sa mokṣabhāk ।। 

nirvāsanaṃ kṛtaṃ karma na kartāraṃ spṛśaty ajam ।
padmapattraṃ jalam iva nabhastalam ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

phalāni nānudhāvanti yadā karmāṇy avāsanam ।
tadā jīvaṃ na spṛśati karma janmaikakāraṇam ।। 

karmaṇo janmabījasya rasas sarvatra vāsanā ।
sā yadbhavā ca tasyaiva garbhe paśyati dehakam ।। 

jāyate tata evāśu kramād bhramati saṃsṛtau ।
tasmād vāsanayaivāntar viyogas te astu bhūtaye ।। 

bhāvanās sarvabhāvebhyas samutsṛjya samucchritaḥ ।
śaśāṅkaśītalaḥ pūrṇo bhāsi bhāseva bhāskaraḥ ।। 

kriyamāṇā kṛtā karmatūlaśrīr dehaśalmaleḥ ।
jñānānilasamuddhūtā vilayaṃ kvāpi gacchati ।। 

ātmajñatāṃ prayātasya tīrṇasya bhavasāgarāt ।
icchato api samāyāti punar nājñatvam ātmanaḥ ।। 

yathā dūragatotpattisthānaṃ rayavatī sarit ।
na yāty evaṃ matir buddhā punar mohaṃ na gacchati ।। 

sarvaiva hi kalā jantor anabhyāsena naśyati ।
phaladāpi manojñāpi latevāsekavarjitā ।। 

eṣā jñānakalā tv antas sakṛjjātā dine dine ।
vṛddhim eti balād eva satām apy uptaśālivat ।। 

yathā dadhyuddhṛtaṃ naiti punar dadhnaikatāṃ ghṛtam ।
tathā jñānoddhṛtā jñaptir nāyāty ajñānatāṃ punaḥ ।। 

yathā parabhaṭavyūhaṃ vibhidyodeti sadbhaṭaḥ ।
tathājñānaṃ vidāryāndhyam udeti jñānabhāskaraḥ ।। 

cidghanaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma śāntaṃ sarvam idaṃ tatam ।
advaitaṃ dvaitavad bhāti nityam ekam anāmayam ।। 

ekas sphuraty akhilavastuṣu citsvarūpa ātmā paras svajaladhiṣv iva toyam accham ।
saṃśāntasaṅkalanabhūrikalāpam ekaṃ sattāṃśamātram akhilaṃ jagad aṅga viddhi ।। 

paramārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

parasmāt kāraṇād eko jīvaḥ prathamam utthitaḥ ।
tasmāj jīvakaṇā jātāḥ kaṇās taptāyaso yathā ।। 

te devanāgagandharvavidyādharaśatābhidhāḥ ।
sphuranty ātmāmṛtāmbhodanirmalāmṛtabindavaḥ ।। 

svairasaṅkalpajālena valitā bandham āgatāḥ ।
svalālayeva tantutvaṃ gatayā kośakārakāḥ ।। 

svasaṅkalpena bhūtāni baddhānīti parasparam ।
svatuṣeṇeva dhānyāni duḥkhāny anubhavanty ataḥ ।। 

sa svasaṅkalpanatuṣo dahyate jñānavahninā ।
yadā tadā bhavanty acchā navā muktākaṇā iva ।। 

bhūyo jagati jāyante na kadācana kecana ।
te tatātmapadārūḍhā mūḍhatvād uddhṛtāśayāḥ ।। 

jagadvṛttāv avayavair mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatam ।
akāraṇaṃ jagad viddhi nāśotpattyos svabhāvataḥ ।। 

yathāmbukumbheṣu nabho nārpitaṃ nāpy anarpitam ।
tathātmā sarvadeheṣu na sthito nāpi cāsthitaḥ ।। 

sati kumbhe sati ca khe kumbhākāśābhidhā yathā ।
saty ātmani ca dehe ca dehasaṃvedanaṃ tathā ।। 

cetanācetanakalā nṛpa santi na kāścana ।
kācid ātmābhidhā sattā dehe sphurati kevalam ।। 

yathā dṛṅ nirmale vyomni ciranyastollasaty alam ।
tathā sphurati dehābhā sattātmany ātmanāmikā ।। 

pūrvaṃ jīvās svasaṅkalpair ye jagatsusthitiṃ gatāḥ ।
tatsaṅgād adya jīvatvaṃ yānty anyā brahmaśaktayaḥ ।। 

yathā taskarasaṃsargād badhyate ataskaro api hi ।
tathā prāgjīvasaṃsargāt prayāty ātmakalā mitim ।। 

yāvat svatā svadehādau tāvat saṃsṛtibījatā ।
yāvad viṣayabhogāśā jīvākhyā tāvad ātmanaḥ ।। 

vivekavaśato jñatvāj jāte dvaitaikyayoḥ kṣaye ।
ātmā jīvatvam utsṛjya brahmatām ety anāmayaḥ ।। 

jarājanmamṛtibhrānticakre bhramati mohitā ।
vāsanātantubaddheyaṃ janatātāpabhāginī ।। 

na kasyacid ahaṃ naiva kaścid evāham īdṛśaḥ ।
naiva kaścin mamety antarniścayāt tyaja saṃsṛtim ।। 

sarvaṃ mamāhaṃ sarvasya caiveti dṛḍhaniścayāt ।
tyaja saṃsṛtisaṃrambhaṃ svastho bhava bhavātigaḥ ।। 

ūrdhvād adhas tv adhastāc ca punar ūrdhvaṃ vrajaṃś ciram ।
mā saṃsārāraghaṭṭasya cintārajjvāṃ ghaṭo bhava ।। 

idaṃ mamāham asyeti vyavahāraghanabhramam ।
ye mohāt sanniṣevante te adhastād yānty adhaś śaṭhāḥ ।। 

asyāham eṣa me so ayam aham evammayātmani ।
mohe buddhyā parityakte ūrdhvād ūrdhvaṃ prayāsy ajaḥ ।। 

mā sāgare śileva tvam adho'dho gaccha mohitaḥ ।
kṣīrārṇavenduvad bodhād ūrdhvād ūrdhvataraṃ vraja ।। 

jalaphenavad utpannadhvaṃsitām anubhāvayan ।
vīruttṛṇalatāgulmagaṇanāṃ mā prapūraya ।। 

cittejo yaś cidādityaḥ prasārayati sarvataḥ ।
tena prakaṭitaṃ sārkacandratāraṃ jagadgṛham ।। 

tatprakāśaṃ svam ātmānam avalambyāvilambitam ।
āssva sampūritākāśaṃ dehādiṃ nṛpa paśya he ।। 

yathā tiṣṭhan svabhāvena sphaṭikaḥ kirati prabhāḥ ।
tathā jaganti kirati ciddīptyā ciddivākaraḥ ।। 

yad ātmanaiva vimalaṃ cittvena sphuraṇaṃ citaḥ ।
tad idaṃ jagadābhogi sampannaṃ sphārasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

yadā brahma paraṃ brahma tatraiva brahma bṛṃhitam ।
na tatra sambhavanty etā bhūtābhūtādikalpanāḥ ।। 

sarvaśaktitayā brahma cetastvād atiyātayā ।
sattvaśaktyā sthitaṃ yatra jīvanmuktaṃ hi tatra tat ।। 

yatra brahmānantaśakticittaśaktyā vijṛmbhate ।
viviktayā tatra narasuranāgāditāṃ gatam ।। 

bhrāntayā mūḍhayā yatra cittaśaktyā laye sthitam ।
tatra tiryakpiśācādibhūtatāṃ samupāgatam ।। 

atyantamūḍhayā yatra suṣuptasamayā sthitam ।
cittaśaktyā gataṃ tatra tarugulmatṛṇāditām ।। 

kṣīṇadehasahasrasya ciramūḍhasya cetasaḥ ।
śilādy avayavaṃ viddhi kasyacit parvatasya vā ।। 

yathāmodena kusumaṃ mādhuryeṇa guḍo yathā ।
vyāptaṃ saparvatākāśaṃ cittattvena jagat tathā ।। 

kiñcit kṣubdhaṃ payaḥ kiñcit somyarūpaṃ yathāmbudheḥ ।
kiñcid aspandi kiñcic ca spandirūpaṃ tathā citaḥ ।। 

yadaivaivaṃ cito rūpaṃ tataṃ buddham akhaṇḍitam ।
tadaiva tīrṇas saṃsāraḥ parameśvaratāṃ gataiḥ ।। 

brahmendraviṣṇuvaruṇā yad yat kartuṃ samudyatāḥ ।
tad ahaṃ cidvapus sarvaṃ karomīty eva bhāvayet ।। 

yeṣu yeṣu yathā yad yad darśaneṣu nigadyate ।
sarvam evāṅga tat satyaṃ sarvam eva hi sarvagam ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ videśaṃ vā kālaṃ vā kalanāṃ ca vā ।
vetsi brahmaiva tat sarvaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

yad yad vibhāvyate rūpaṃ tattām eti cidīśvaraḥ ।
tāṃ tām icchāṃ pūrayituṃ cintāmaṇivad ātataḥ ।। 

yad yad vibhāvyate kiñcit tat tat tena vivasvatā ।
kriyate bhūṣyate samyag yojyate cānubhūyate ।। 

cinmātratvaṃ prayātasya tīrṇamṛtyos svacetasaḥ ।
yo bhavet paramānandaḥ kenāsāv upamīyate ।। 

sīmāntas sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mṛtyur eva jagattraye ।
taṃ jitvā yaḥ parānandas sa vaktuṃ kena pāryate ।। 

sarvāsām eva dṛṣṭīnāṃ sarvāsām eva sampadām ।
parijñāya svam ātmānam upari sthīyate ciram ।। 

apy anantā mahānto api vajrabhedakarā api ।
śuddhaṃ kham iva bādhante tajjñaṃ doṣā na kecana ।। 

jarāmaraṇajanmādyās samastā doṣadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
ātmajñānaikaparyantā yathābdhyantās saridrayāḥ ।। 

tāvat prakṛtir ālolā yatate duḥkhasaṅkṣaye ।
yāvat paśyati nātmānaṃ tam ālokyopaśāmyati ।। 

yathā puṣpaṃ samāsādya naśyanti śaraveṇavaḥ ।
tathātmatvaṃ samāsādya manobuddhīndriyādayaḥ ।। 

sarvam ādau jagac chūnyaṃ śūnyam ante ca bhūpate ।
ataś śūnyātmakaṃ hy etad viddhi madhye api śūnyakam ।। 

nāntaś śūnaṃ ca śūnyaṃ ca nācidrūpaṃ na cinmayam ।
nātmarūpaṃ nānyarūpaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāvayan bhava ।। 

etat svarūpam āsādya prakṛtiḥ pariśāmyati ।
svabhāvāc calitaṃ vastu kṣobhaṃ kṛtvā kva tiṣṭhatu ।। 

ajñānagranthinirbhedo mokṣa ity ucyate anagha ।
na deśo mokṣanāmāsti na kālo netarā sthitiḥ ।। 

ahaṅkṛter vimohasya kṣayeṇeyaṃ vilīyate ।
prakṛtir bhāvanānāmnī mokṣas syād eṣa eva saḥ ।। 

eṣa eva śanair dehaṃ gālayitvopaśāmyati ।
viveko viṣaye vācāṃ bhavaty abhavaniṃ gataḥ ।। 

yathābhūtam idaṃ jñātvā jāgataṃ vastuvibhramam ।
bhāvayitvā yathājñānaṃ jñas tiṣṭhati yathāsukham ।। 

praśāntaśāstrārthavicāracāpalo nivṛttanānārasakāvyakautukaḥ ।
nirastaniśśeṣavikalpaviplavas samas sukhaṃ tiṣṭhasi śāśvatātmakaḥ ।। 

sakalaśaṅkānirāsayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

manuḥ

ātmārāmo vītaśoko nityam antarmukhas sukhī ।
kurvann api ca karmāṇi tiṣṭhaty apagatabhramam ।। 

antaśśītalayā nityam anākulatayā tathā ।
somyarūpatayā pūrṇaś śaśāṅka iva śobhate ।। 

samaś śāntamanā maunī kṣīṇavādavicāraṇaḥ ।
kacaty ātmani cittattve dagdhendhana ivānalaḥ ।। 

yena kenacid ācchanno yena kenacid āśitaḥ ।
yatra kvacana śāyī ca samrāḍ iva virājate ।। 

varṇadharmāśramācāraśāstramantrāmayojjhitaḥ ।
nirgacchati jagajjālāt pañjarād iva kesarī ।। 

vācām atītaviṣayāṃ viṣayāśādaśojjhitām ।
kām apy upagataś śobhāṃ śaradīva nabhastalam ।। 

gambhīraś ca prasannaś ca girāv iva mahāhradaḥ ।
parānandarasakṣīvo ramate svātmanātmani ।। 

yathābhimatavistāro yathābhimatakarmakṛt ।
paramāṃ nirvṛtiṃ yāti muktaśāstrārthayantraṇaḥ ।। 

sarvakarmaphalatyāgī nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ ।
na puṇyena na pāpena netareṇāpi lipyate ।। 

sphaṭikaḥ pratibimbena yathā nāyāti rañjanām ।
tajjñaḥ karmaphalenāntas tathā nāyāti rañjanām ।। 

hasan rudann api bhṛśaṃ dehapūjāvikartanaiḥ ।
dāhāhlādau na jānāti pratibimbagatāv iva ।। 

nisstotro nirvaṣaṭkāraḥ pūjyapūjāvivarjitaḥ ।
saṃyuktaś ca viyuktaś ca sarvācāranayakramaiḥ ।। 

tasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca saḥ ।
harṣāmarṣabhayakrodhair mukto yuktaś ca dṛśyate ।। 

rāgadveṣodayārambhais tyajyate api ca yujyate ।
īhānīhāvilāsena nāpyate atha ca bhujyate ।। 

prameye kasyacid api nārohati mahāśayaḥ ।
prameyīkriyate vāpi bālenāpy adurāśayaḥ ।। 

vidhūyānantanānātvaṃ yaḥ kilaikatayoditaḥ ।
tam anādyantasaṃvittiṃ ko vā tulayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

tanuṃ tyajati tīrthe vā śvapacasya gṛhe api vā ।
mā kadācana vā rājan vartamāne api vā kṣaṇe ।। 

jñānasamprāptisamaye mukto asau vigatāmayaḥ ।
vītaśokajarāyāso yat karoti karotu tat ।। 

ahambhrāntir hi bandhāya mokṣo jāte hi tatkṣaye ।
yathā bhavati deho ayaṃ tathā bhavatu kā kṣatiḥ ।। 

yat karoti yad ādatte yatropaviśati kṣaṇam ।
yat paśyati spṛśati yat tasmai spṛhayati prajā ।। 

sa pūjanīyas sa stutyo namaskāryas sa yatnataḥ ।
sa mahātmābhivādyaś ca vibhūtyai vibhavaiṣiṇā ।। 

na yajñatīrthair na tapaḥpradānair āsādyate tat paramaṃ pavitram ।
āsādyate kṣīṇabhavāmayānāṃ bhaktyā satām ātmavidāṃ yad aṅga ।। 

muktapuruṣasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

triṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evam uktvā sa bhagavān manus tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ ।
ikṣvākunā nṛpendreṇa muditenābhipūjitaḥ ।। 

jagāmākāśam āviśya śrīmān paitāmahaṃ gṛham ।
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāmātmārāmatāṃ vraja ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ sthite he bhagavañ jīvanmuktasya sanmateḥ ।
apūrvo atiśayaḥ ko asau bhavaty ātmavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jñasya kasmiṃścid evāṅga bhavaty atiśaye na dhīḥ ।
nityatṛptaḥ praśāntātmā sa ātmany eva tiṣṭhati ।। 

apūrvo atiśayaḥ ko vā sādhor jagati vidyate ।
sarve hy atiśayā loke śataśaḥ pūrvatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

dhūrtais siddhaiś ca tajjñaiś ca tathānyair mṛgapakṣibhiḥ ।
kṛtam ākāśayānādi kā tasya syād apūrvatā ।। 

kevalaṃ śāntasaṃrambhaṃ prakṛtavyavahāravān ।
tajjñas saṅkṣapayan dehaṃ svastha ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

nottamaṃ na ca sāmānyaṃ nāśrutaṃ na bahuśrutam ।
na suvṛttaṃ na durvṛttaṃ jñaṃ vidanti janā ime ।। 

rāmaḥ

lokācāragatasyāpi lokavat saṃsthitasya ca ।
brahman viditavedyasya brūhi cihnaṃ manāg api ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

na kiñcid apy apūrvatvaṃ janāt tasyāṅga lakṣyate ।
yac ca syād asya vā citraṃ tad anyatrāpi lakṣyate ।। 

tattvajñasyeha he rāma na lokālokanakṣamam ।
vidyate lakṣaṇaṃ sākṣād aṇimādy apadādi vā ।। 

vyavahārī yathaivājñas tajjño loke tathaiva hi ।
vyavahāravaśaprāpte sukhe duḥkhe ca tiṣṭhati ।। 

eka eva viśeṣo atra sa cādṛśyo janasthitau ।
sati vāsati vā dehe yad antaḥkṣīṇaduḥkhatā ।। 

svānubhūtyātmakād asmān nirduḥkhatvād ṛte paraḥ ।
śiraśśṛṅgādi tajjñasya cihnam anyan na vidyate ।। 

mahākartā mahābhoktā mahātyāgī sa yady api ।
tajjño bhavati tad rāma te api sādhāraṇā guṇāḥ ।। 

prāyo ajñasyāpi vai dṛṣṭaṃ kāmalobhāditānavam ।
tapodānaṃ yaśaś caiva naitaj jñatvasya lakṣaṇam ।। 

nityam evottamānandād anyat svānubhavasthitāt ।
kṣayātiśayanirmuktāc cihnaṃ tajjñasya nāsti vai ।। 

mahākartṛtvam atha vā cihnaṃ tajjñasya dṛśyate ।
tat sādho sādhu sāmānyam uktaṃ ca bahudhā mayā ।। 

etāvad eva khalu liṅgam aliṅgamūrtes saṃśāntasaṃsṛticirabhramanirvṛtasya ।
tajjñasya yan madanakopaviṣādamohalobhāpadām anudinaṃ nipuṇaṃ tanutvam ।। 

jīvanmuktacihnavicāro nāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūyaś śṛṇu mahābāho saṅgraheṇa vaco mama ।
yad vacmi tava bodhāya mayūrasyeva vāridaḥ ।। 

tvadbodhanam upādeyam ātmīyāt tapaso mama ।
abuddhapṛcchakā rāma ke raghūṇāṃ hi daiśikāḥ ।। 

janmāntaraśatābhyastaghanabhramaṇavihvalaḥ ।
śṛṇu jīvan kathaṃ māyāpañjarāt pravimucyate ।। 

kṛtāhambhāvanā saṃvij jīvādyabhidhayānvitā ।
ahambhāvo atra mithyaiva satyaṃ saṃvid udāhṛtā ।। 

yan mithyā tad bhramāyālpaṃ kālaṃ sphurati no ciram ।
mohātmaśuktirupyādimṛgatṛṣṇādvicandravat ।। 

yan mithyā tat kṣayaṃ yāti yat satyaṃ tan na naśyati ।
ābālam etaj jagati prasiddham aśanādivat ।। 

nāsato vidyate bhāvas snigdhatvaṃ sikatāsv iva ।
sataś ca dṛṣṭo nābhāvo bhekacūrṇād aṇor api ।। 

yathā bhekarajo alakṣyaṃ yāti prāvṛṣi bhekatām ।
yatra yatra sthito jīvas tathodeti na naśyati ।। 

kevalaṃ bhāvanāmātraṃ buddhyaivāsya pramārjaya ।
ātmatvāyāṅga tāmrasya hematvāyeva kālatām ।। 

jagadbhāvāsthayā muktaḥ prayāti paramātmatām ।
jīvo vimuktaṃ kālimnā tāmraṃ kanakatām iva ।। 

sarveṣām eva jīvānāṃ bhāvanā bhavabandhanī ।
vāgureva vihaṅgānām ekāvaṣṭambhakāriṇī ।। 

ātmatattvād ṛte nāsti madīyam aham ity alam ।
yuktito niścaye rūḍhe nūnaṃ galati bhāvanā ।। 

māṃsāsthyoghaś śavo dehaḥ khaṃ kham adrigaṇo jagat ।
buddhyādayo vikalpāṃśāḥ ko ahaṃ mama kathaṃ ca kim ।। 

saṃvido anantaśuddhāyāḥ kilākalitacetasaḥ ।
iyattopaśamaṃ yāti bhāvanāpralaye sati ।। 

samyagdarśanam evāsyā bhāvanāyā viśāmpate ।
vināśaṃ viddhy anantābhaṃ yāminyā divasaṃ yathā ।। 

praśāntavāsano jīva ekatāṃ yāti cidghane ।
ghṛte ghṛtaṃ jale toyaṃ kṣīre kṣīram ivārpitam ।। 

atadātmā tadātmā ca jīvaḥ prasphuratīśvare ।
jvālāyāṃ tu yathāloko yathā gandhalavaḥ kṣitau ।। 

yenaikatāṃ bhāvayati jīvas tad bhavati kṣaṇāt ।
yaccittas tanmayo jantuḥ kenaitan nānubhūyate ।। 

brahmabhāvanayā jīvo brahmatām eti śāśvatīm ।
amṛtaṃ bhāvyate yena so amṛtībhavati svayam ।। 

abrahmabhāvanāj jīvo dīnatām etya naśyati ।
viṣabhāvanayaivāṅga viṣībhavati mānavaḥ ।। 

ātmanas saṃvido acchasya saṃvedyakalanāmalam ।
sampramārjyoditas saṃvidātmā vyavaharānagha ।। 

rāmaḥ

svedotthadaṃśayaukāntaṃ bhūtajātaṃ surādy api ।
kiṃ sarvam eva karmottham uta kiñcid vadeti me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

caturdaśavidhasyāsya bhūtajātasya rāghava ।
kiñcit sakāraṇaṃ jātaṃ prāktanair ātmakarmabhiḥ ।। 

kiñcin niṣkāraṇaṃ jātaṃ kacanaṃ sumaṇer iva ।
svabhāvato adhunā karma kāraṇāttaṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 

rāmaḥ

hārdāndhakāramārtāṇḍa saṃśayābdānilaprabho ।
jagatāṃ bhūtajātasya jātasyātha bhaviṣyataḥ ।। 

kiṃ kathaṃ kāraṇāyātaṃ kiṃ kathaṃ cāpy akāraṇam ।
jātaṃ vā jāyate vāpi kathaṃ vāpi janiṣyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dikkālādyanavacchinnaṃ vyomny avyomni ca saṃsthitam ।
cidvyomānubhavaprāpyam āmodaḥ pavane yathā ।। 

kha ivārko ambudavyāpto vaṭabīja ivāṅkuraḥ ।
vāyau spanda ivālakṣyaṃ vyomny avyomni ca cetanam ।। 

tat kvacin nityam acalaṃ śāntaṃ samasamasthiti ।
brahmāṇḍapārāmbaravad anantam avikāri ca ।। 

kvacit svabhāvajāt spandāt sphuraty agnir iva tviṣā ।
bhūtatanmātrabhāvena jagattāṃ samupeyuṣā ।। 

kvacit prākspandasampannabhūtatanmātrarañjanāt ।
bhūtatvaṃ samupādatte hemāṅgadadaśām iva ।। 

yathā sattvam upekṣya svaṃ śanair vipro durīhayā ।
aṅgīkaroti śūdratvaṃ tathā jāḍyaṃ cidīśvaraḥ ।। 

bhūtāni dvividhāny evaṃ pratisargaṃ sphuranti hi ।
adyacitspandajātāni ciracitspandajāni ca ।। 

tatra ye citsvabhāvotthaspandajās te hi jīvakāḥ ।
niṣkāraṇaṃ samutpannā rucayas sanmaṇer iva ।। 

sakāraṇatvam adhunā gantavyaṃ tais svakarmabhiḥ ।
daśāsu bandhamokṣāsu nāśe janmani karmaṇi ।। 

īśvarāt samupāgatya bhuktajanmāntarās tu ye ।
jātā janmani teṣāṃ hi prāktanaṃ karmakāraṇam ।। 

adhunaiva hi sampannā ye jīvā brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।
te hy akāraṇajanmāno bhaviṣyajjanmakāraṇam ।। 

kāryakāraṇabhāvo ayam īdṛśo jīvakarmaṇoḥ ।
jīvo akāraṇajaḥ puṇyo dhanyaḥ kāraṇajas smṛtaḥ ।। 

kecit puṇyāḥ prajāyante kecid dhanyāś ca jīvakāḥ ।
puṇyā dhanyatvam āyānti na dhanyā yānti puṇyatām ।। 

dhanyāḥ puṇyatvam agatā eva kecid vimokṣaṇāḥ ।
dhanyatvān mokṣiṇaḥ kecid dhanyatvād api netare ।। 

vīruttṛṇalatāgulmayaukakīṭakhagādayaḥ ।
surāsuranarāhīndrapiśācāśīviṣādayaḥ ।। 

kecid dhanyāḥ kecit puṇyāḥ kecid dhāsyanti puṇyatām ।
puṇyatvān mokṣiṇaḥ kecid dhanyatvād vā tato api no ।। 

yathā ratnasya kacanaṃ spandanaṃ pavanasya ca ।
yathauṣṇyam analādeś ca cinmātrasya tathā jagat ।। 

asamyagdarśanotpannaṃ puṃstvaṃ sthāṇau yathoditam ।
kṣīyate samyagālokād dvitvam eva tathātmani ।। 

cinmātrasyātiśuddhasya nissaṅkalpoditātmanaḥ ।
anantasya prakāśasya sarvagatvād raghūdvaha ।। 

khād eva jāyate kaścit kaścid vyomny eva līyate ।
jīvas saṅkalpamātrātmā madhāv iva jaradghanaḥ ।। 

ātmānaṃ samyag ālokya yaḥ kha eva vilīyate ।
na sa sandṛśyate bhūyo himaṃ tāpadrutaṃ yathā ।। 

yas tv apaśyan svam ātmānaṃ saspandaḥ kalanātmabhiḥ ।
karmabhis sa sphuraty uccair vilīno jāyate punaḥ ।। 

yas saṅkalpaparispandais sthaulyam eti jaḍātmakaḥ ।
prāvṛṣīva payovāhaḥ kṣīṇakṣīṇo apy udety asau ।। 

ātmatvāṃśānvitam api citsaṅkalpaṃ raghūdvaha ।
dūrīkuru mahāsiddhyai viṣasiktam ivāśanam ।। 

nirvikalpam anādyantam udāsīnam avasthitam ।
sarvātmaikaṃ samuditaṃ cidvyoma bhava bhūtaye ।। 

akāraṇam upāyānti sarve jīvāḥ parāt padāt ।
paścāt kāraṇatāṃ yānti bandhamokṣadaśāsv iha ।। 

saṅkalpitvaṃ hi bandhasya kāranaṃ tat parityaja ।
mokṣas tu nissaṅkalpatvaṃ tadabhyāsaṃ dhiyā kuru ।। 

akāraṇaṃ tv akaraṇāt sarvakāraṇakāraṇāt ।
yāvan nimeṣam avyaktāj jīvas sampadyate śivāt ।। 

tāvan nimeṣa evāsau yāti kāraṇatāṃ svayam ।
saṃsṛtau svāsv avasthāsu vīciṣv iva calajjalam ।। 

sāvadhāno bhavātas tvaṃ grāhyagrāhakasaṅgame ।
ajasram eva saṅkalpadaśāḥ pariharañ śanaiḥ ।। 

mā bhava grāhyabhāvātmā grāhakātmā ca mā bhava ।
bhāvanām akhilāṃ tyaktvā yac chiṣṭaṃ tanmayo bhava ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhasāvadhāno hy anāratam ।
akurvan vāpi kurvan vā muktim evānudhāvati ।। 

grāhyagrāhakarūpātmā hy ajño rāma kṣaṇaṃ prati ।
navaṃ navam upāyāti bandhanaṃ bhāvanāvaśāt ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhe rasabhāvanayā svayā ।
nimeṣaṃ prati jīvasya bandho gacchati pīnatām ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhe vinaiva rasabhāvanām ।
nimeṣaṃ prati jīvo ayam ātmatām eti mokṣabhāk ।। 

ajasraṃ yaṃ yam evārthaṃ pataty akṣagaṇo anagha ।
badhyate tatra rāgeṇa tatrārāgeṇa mucyate ।। 

kiñcic ced rocate tubhyaṃ tad baddho asi bhavasthitau ।
na kiñcid rocate te cet tan mukto asi bhavasthiteḥ ।। 

asmāt padārthanicayāt sahasthāvarajaṅgamāt ।
tṛṇāder devaparyantān mā kiñcit tava rocatām ।। 

ratir nityam anarthārtham aratiś śreyase nṛṇām ।
antavattvād ratir duḥkhair anantair yojayen naram ।। 

aratis san yad aśnāsi yat karoṣi jahāsi yat ।
na kartāsi na bhoktāsi tatra muktamatiś śamī ।। 

neha prajāyate kiñcin neha kiñcid vinaśyati ।
sarvaṃ śāntaṃ nirālambaṃ cidvyomāmalam ātatam ।। 

santo atītaṃ na śocanti bhaviṣyac cintayanti no ।
vartamānaṃ ca gṛhṇanti kramaprāptaṃ sadānagha ।। 

sphuranti jīvapuṣpāṇi jātāni brahmapādape ।
tajjānyatanmayānīva phenā iva mahārṇave ।। 

anyo'nyapratibimbena cidarṇavataraṅgakāḥ ।
ekātmakā api dvitvaṃ yānti jīvā jagatsthitau ।। 

dṛḍhabhāvanayā jīvo manastām upagacchati ।
śītātiśayatas svacchaṃ payaḥ pāṣāṇatām iva ।। 

manasi grathitāḥ pāśās tṛṣṇāmohamadādayaḥ ।
vāgurāyām iva khagāḥ methyām iva ca tarṇakāḥ ।। 

manasaiva mano rāma cchedanīyaṃ vijānatā ।
vivekatīkṣṇenātaptam ayaseva balād ayaḥ ।। 

ananyadavikārādijanitaṃ svasvabhāvajam ।
vaicitryaṃ śikhipiñchasya yathā bhāti tathātmanaḥ ।। 

nakiñcit kiñcid apy ātmā satyākāro apy asadvapuḥ ।
ākāśād apy alakṣyo asau jagadrūpo apy arūpavān ।। 

sālambe api nirālambo nirvikāro vikāriṇi ।
sābhāse api nirābhāso naśyaty arthe na naśyati ।। 

grāhyaṃ ca grāhakaṃ caiva grahaṇaṃ ca raghūdvaha ।
yatra sattām upagataṃ tattvaṃ tatra sthiro bhava ।। 

manasaiva manaś chinddhi saṃsārabhramaśāntaye ।
kṣālayanti malenaiva malaṃ kṣālanakovidāḥ ।। 

amanastvaṃ prayātasya na bhūyas te bhavo bhavet ।
mananaṃ hi bhavaṃ viddhi svapnād yat tan na tatkṣayāt ।। 

sarvaṃ cinmātram ātmaiva nāsty anyā kalaneti vā ।
buddhvā na jāyase bhūyas sati cāsati cetasi ।। 

sarvaṃ cinmātram ātmaiva nāsty anyad iti yā matiḥ ।
tattvaṃ tad viddhi paramam unmanastvam ajanmane ।। 

sati citte apy acittatvaṃ yad ātmatvaikabhāvanāt ।
tad acittatvam ākāre sati vāsati mokṣadam ।। 

sarvaṃ cid iti bhāvena rāgadveṣadṛśoḥ kṣaye ।
citte saty apy acittatve jāte bhūyobhavaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

sukhāśayaiti saṅkalpaṃ jīvo duḥkhaṃ tato vrajet ।
jīvo hi yatate bhūtyai samprāpnoty āpadaṃ parām ।। 

mano vicāram āruhya mananānartham ujjhati ।
yat karoti vimūḍhātmā tenaitan naśyati svayam ।। 

vivekaṃ prāpya cetas svān saṅkalpān nāśayaty alam ।
pūrvaṃ hi svajanān hanti durjanaḥ prāpya sampadam ।। 

svajanān eva dahati durjanaḥ prathamotthitaḥ ।
rūkṣaiś caṭacaṭāsphoṭair veṇūn veṇvanalo yathā ।। 

prasāraṇāt pradṛśyante sṛṣṭayo antargatāś citaḥ ।
kadarkakasya vividhā yathā varṇakapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

samastaśaktikacitam ekātma brahma saṃvṛtam ।
vivṛtaṃ bhāti nānātve yātrāsv iva kadarkakam ।। 

cinmātrālokitaṃ cittaṃ karotīmāṃ jagatsthitim ।
nṛpekṣitaḥ pratīhāras sāmantaracanām iva ।। 

cidrūṣitasya manasaḥ karma saṃsṛtināmakam ।
rasāsiktasya bījasya pattrapuṣpaphalaṃ yathā ।। 

atyullasadvividhabhaṅguravastujātaiś ciccakracañcalatayā samudeti viśvam ।
tasyaiva samprati nivāraya cañcalatvaṃ buddhveha satyam atha vā ghanatāṃ nayasva ।। 

saṃvedyacikitsanayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jīvasya trīṇi rūpāṇi sthūlasūkṣmaparāṇi tu ।
tatrāsya yat paraṃ rūpaṃ tad bhaja dve apare tyaja ।। 

asyāsatī tu dve rūpe dvicandratvam ivotthite ।
vicārād eva naśyete paraṃ rūpaṃ na naśyati ।। 

jīvasya yad anāśaṃ tu rūpaṃ rāghava tad bhavān ।
tatraivācalavad baddhapadam āssva ramasva ca ।। 

rāmaḥ

jīvasya yāni bhagavaṃs trīṇi rūpāṇi tāni me ।
yathāvat kathayānāśaṃ rūpaṃ vedmi yathāsya tat ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pāṇipādamayo yo ayaṃ deho bhogāya valgati ।
bhogārtham etaj jīvasya rūpaṃ sthūlam iha sthitam ।। 

svasaṅkalpacidākāraṃ yāvat saṃsārabhāvi yat ।
cittaṃ tad viddhi jīvasya rūpaṃ rāmātivāhikam ।। 

sati cāsati dehe asmin prāṇavātarathasthitam ।
etad asya manorūpaṃ jagad bhrāmyaty avāritam ।। 

āmodaḥ pavanārūḍhaḥ puṣpaṃ tyaktvā yathāmbare ।
bhavaty evaṃ śarīreṣu naṣṭeṣu prāṇagaṃ manaḥ ।। 

yathā rakṣārthasūtrasya granthayo vividhās sthitāḥ ।
yathā veṇulatāyāś ca parvāṇy aṅge sthitāni vā ।। 

cittatantau sudīrghe asmiñ śarīrāṇi tathānagha ।
utpatyotpatya nāśīni saridrayataraṅgavat ।। 

ādyantarahitaṃ satyaṃ cinmātraṃ nirvikalpakam ।
yat tad viddhi paraṃ rūpaṃ jīvasyādyaṃ tṛtīyakam ।। 

jagat prajāyate tasmāt tasminn eva pralīyate ।
manāk sphuritvā tadrūpam ūrmijālam ivārṇave ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptānāṃ bhavanāśodbhavasthiteḥ ।
etat turyapadaṃ śuddham atra baddhapado bhava ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahman yeyaṃ vinā nidrāṃ grāhyagrāhakasaṅgadṛk ।
sā lolā jāgradāstheti jānāmy eva na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

jāgradvat svapnakāle yā nidrāyāṃ sphurati bhrame ।
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittis sā svapnākhyeti vedmy aham ।। 

bhāvijāgratsvapnadaśā yā dṛṣadvad vimūḍhatā ।
sā suṣuptadaśety eva jānāmy eva munīśvara ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu sthitaṃ triṣv apy alakṣitam ।
turyaṃ tūryād atītaṃ ca tad viprendra kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahambhāvānahambhāvau tyaktvā sadasatī tathā ।
yad asaktaṃ samaṃ svacchaṃ sthitaṃ tat turyam ucyate ।। 

yā svasthā samatā śāntā jīvanmuktavyavasthitiḥ ।
sākṣyavasthā vyavahṛtau sā turyakalanocyate ।। 

rāgadveṣaviyuktais tu viṣayān indriyaiś caran ।
ātmavaśyair vidheyātmā turyatām upagacchati ।। 

samatā svacchatā cāntar ekatā nirvikalpatā ।
śunyatā bhāvitā yena turyāvasthām asau gataḥ ।। 

sarva eva mahānto api brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ ।
narāś ca kecij jīvanto muktās turye vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

naitaj jāgran na ca svapnas saṅkalpānām asambhavāt ।
suṣuptabhāvo nāpy etad abhāvāj jaḍatāntayoḥ ।। 

rajjusarpabhramanibhaṃ nātra cittaṃ vivalgati ।
sattāsāmānyam ekātma sattvam atra samaṃ sthitam ।। 

ātmārāmāmalānandā saṃśāntasakalaiṣaṇā ।
jīvanmuktadaśā rāma turyaśabdena kathyate ।। 

yathā svapne jagadbhānam idaṃ citkacanaṃ tv iti ।
bodhād dveṣabhayonmuktaṃ śāntam apratighaṃ bhavet ।। 

atyantāsambhavād dṛśyadṛśāṃ brahmātmatodayāt ।
tathā rāgādinirmuktam āsitaṃ turyam ucyate ।। 

śāntaṃ samyakprabuddhānāṃ yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat ।
vilīnaṃ turyam ity āhur abuddhānāṃ sthiraṃ sthitam ।। 

jīvanmuktapadād ūrdhvaṃ vacasāṃ yan na gocare ।
śāntaṃ videhamuktatvaṃ turyātītaṃ tad ucyate ।। 

jīvanmuktapade turye kañcit kālaṃ yadṛcchayā ।
sthitvā videhamuktatvaṃ yāhi turyottaraṃ padam ।। 

turye baddhapado bhūtvā paramāṃ samatāṃ gataḥ ।
mākartā mā ca kartā tvaṃ bhava prakṛtakarmaṇi ।। 

ahaṅkārakalātyāge śāntataivānubhūyatām ।
viśarārau kṣate citte turyāvasthopatiṣṭhate ।। 

yā karmasv iha saṃsṛtau vyavahṛtis sa svapnajāgradbhramo yan maurkhyaṃ ghanam eva mohavalitaṃ sāsau suṣuptasthitiḥ ।
jīvanmuktapadaṃ vivāsanatayā yat turyam āryeha tat turyātītam adehamokṣa iha no vaktuṃ girā pāryate ।। 

turyapadavicāro nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

akartṛkarmakaraṇam asi cittattvam akṣayam ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptākhyo bhramas saṅkalpitas tv asan ।। 

atremaṃ śṛṇu vṛttāntaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayādhunā ।
prabuddho api yathā bodham upaiṣi vibudhopamaḥ ।। 

kasmiṃścit kānane kāṣṭhamaunasthitam arindama ।
dṛṣṭadrutamṛgaṃ kañcin muniṃ papraccha lubdhakaḥ ।। 

paścād upagato bāṇabhinnaṃ mṛgam abhidrutaḥ ।
kva prayāto mṛga iti pratyuvāca sa taṃ muniḥ ।। 

śamaśīlā vayaṃ sādho munayo vanavāsinaḥ ।
nāsmākam asty ahaṅkāro vyavahāreṣu yaḥ kṣamaḥ ।। 

sarvāṇīndriyakarmāṇi karoti hi sakhe manaḥ ।
ahaṅkāramayaṃ tan me nūnaṃ pragalitaṃ ciram ।। 

maṇicandrārkadahanaprakāśāḥ kārukaṃ yathā ।
audāsīnyena tiṣṭhanto yojayanti kriyākrame ।। 

ahaṅkāro manonāmā sa cendriyagaṇaṃ nṛṇām ।
niyojayati kāryeṣu sveṣu sākṣivad āsthitaḥ ।। 

sa evābhyupaśānto naś śaradīva payodharaḥ ।
kas tiṣṭhatv indriyārtheṣu mṛtaḥ ka iva valgati ।। 

cittaṃ śāntim upāyātam asmākaṃ vananāyaka ।
mṛtacittā vayam iha sthitā dārumayā iva ।। 

asmākaṃ nāsty ahaṅkāro raso vā śuṣkabhūruhām ।
ahaṅkāro hi sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ mūlakāraṇam ।। 

tantau muktāphalānīva prayānti samavāyitām ।
ahaṅkṛtāv indriyāṇi sāmantā iva rājani ।। 

ahaṅkāramahātantau chinne tv indriyabālakāḥ ।
itaś cetaś ca gacchanti sāmantā vinṛpā iva ।। 

nirahaṅkṛticittāni viśarārūṇi lubdhaka ।
mamendriyāṇi kāryeṣu na laganty apsv ivāmbujam ।। 

mithas saṃśleṣam āyānti na mamendriyabālakāḥ ।
vināhaṅkārajatunā śītalāyaḥkaṇā iva ।। 

na me buddhīndriyaṃ kañcid vetti karmendriyakramam ।
citrasthā iva tiṣṭhanti sveṣv artheṣv īkṣaṇādayaḥ ।। 

sādho yad indriyaṃ vakti tena dṛṣṭo na te mṛgaḥ ।
yasya vā darśane śaktir vaktuṃ jānāti tan na naḥ ।। 

na kānicin mamaitāni galitāhaṅkṛteḥ kila ।
tad vyādha kas tvāṃ kathayatv ārtimanmṛgadarśanam ।। 

sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ hi paśūnām iva pālakam ।
cittaṃ tac ca vilīnaṃ nas sarvārtharahite pade ।। 

itaś cetaś ca vikṣiptarūpāṇy etāni tat katham ।
kiṃ vā tvā kathayantv aṅga gatānīhaiva pañcatām ।। 

nirmātṛpitṛko yadvad viśarāruś śiśuvrajaḥ ।
tathākṣavṛndam adhṛti nirahambhāvavāsanam ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptākhyā daśā vedmi na kāścana ।
turya evāvatiṣṭhe ahaṃ tatra dṛśyaṃ na vidyate ।। 

iti nirvacanībhāvaṃ yathārthakathanena saḥ ।
lubdhako muninā nīto jagāmābhimatāṃ diśam ।। 

ato vacmi mahābāho nāsti turyetarā daśā ।
nirvikalpā hi cit turyaṃ tad evāstīha netarat ।। 

satyaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmabhāvaṃ gate jīve nirarthakam ।
dehe bhavantīndriyāṇi citrabhittāv ivānagha ।। 

yatreṣṭāniṣṭasambandhe nodayas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ ।
na tac cittaṃ bhaved rāma tat sattvaṃ turyagaṃ viduḥ ।। 

svapnakāle svapna eva jāgrad vyagrāparigrahāt ।
jāgrac ca svapnatām eti smaraṇīyatayā tayā ।। 

asatyaṃ jāgrati svapnas svapne jāgrad asanmayam ।
jāgratsvapnavikārāntā ghanamohā suṣuptabhūḥ ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptākhyaṃ trayam aṅga bhramodbhavam ।
varatrāyām ivāhitvaṃ vijñāne prasphurat sthitam ।। 

turyam asty anavacchinnaṃ śuddhacinmātrarūpi yat ।
tatraitat sphurati bhrāntyā taraṅgatvam ivāmbhasi ।। 

yathābhūtārthavijñānāt trayam etad vilīyate ।
jīvanmuktapadaṃ śuddhaṃ turyam evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

proktaṃ videhamuktatvaṃ turyānta iti paṇḍitaiḥ ।
cid brahmetyevamādīnāṃ vacasāṃ tad agocaraḥ ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptākhyaṃ trayaṃ rūpaṃ hi cetasaḥ ।
śāntaṃ ghoraṃ ca mūḍhaṃ ca tryātma cittam iha sthitam ।। 

ghoraṃ jāgranmayaṃ cittaṃ śāntaṃ svapnamayaṃ sthitam ।
mūḍhaṃ suṣuptabhāvasthaṃ tribhir hīnaṃ mṛtaṃ bhavet ।। 

yatra cittaṃ mṛtaṃ tatra sattvam ekaṃ sthitaṃ samam ।
tad viddhi jīvanmuktatvaṃ tat turyaṃ tan mahat padam ।। 

tatraite munayas siddhā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ ।
sattvātmake turyapade jīvanmuktā vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

yaṃ taṃ muniṃ vane vyādhaḥ pṛṣṭavān mṛgahetunā ।
sa saṃsthitas turyapade śuddhasattvodayātmani ।। 

cittācāraṃ na jānāti mṛtacittas sa kañcana ।
śāntāśeṣaviśeṣāṃśam advaitaikyapadaṃ gataḥ ।। 

samastasaṅkalpavilāsamukte turye pade tiṣṭha nirāmayātmā ।
yatra sthitās sādhu sadehamuktāḥ praśāntabhedā munayo mahāntaḥ ।। 

mṛgavyādhadṛṣṭānto nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

eṣa evāṅga siddhānto yat kālagaganādy api ।
cinmātrāṃśād ṛte nānyaj jagadādy asti kiñcana ।। 

janayaty accham ābhāsaṃ bhaṅguraṃ sphuraṇāt svataḥ ।
jagadrūpaṃ niśāvidyud iva cit kālakhādi ca ।। 

yatra sphurati cidvidyut taj jagat kālakhādi ca ।
sthitaiva yan na sphurati tac chāntaṃ sarvam akramam ।। 

rāmaḥ

yāvad ālokyate ambhodas tāvat satyaiva khe taḍit ।
kāraṇaṃ nātra pṛcchāmi citspande kāraṇaṃ vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vaitaṇḍikājñadurbuddhivilāsaṃ dūratas tyajan ।
śṛṇv etad īdṛśasyaiva vaktavyaṃ nāpalāpinaḥ ।। 

tiṣṭhaty eva ghane vidyut sā ca sphurati bhaṅgurā ।
ābālam etat saṃsiddhaṃ kena nāmāpalapyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā vibho hetvanapekṣaṇāt ।
citspandasya kathaṃ na syāt spando hīha sahetukaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

avātāmbudhidīpāde ratnānāṃ kacanasya vā ।
vāyor vā śūnyasaṃsthasya spande kasyeha hetutā ।। 

rāmāsarvātmano apy evaṃ tattātattopapadyate ।
svatas sarvātmano nityam ataḥ kiṃ nopapadyate ।। 

cid aspandā spandinīti śabde bhedo na vastuni ।
brahmaikaghanam advaitaṃ viddhi vāri yathā dravam ।। 

yathā muktāvalīhaṃsadarśanaṃ khe svabhāvajam ।
dṛṣṭer evaṃ cidacchāyās saṃvitspandāj jagadbhramaḥ ।। 

yathā nimīlite netre svaprabhāveṇa dṛk calam ।
tārākāraṃ paśyatīyaṃ cic cetyaṃ dṛśyavat tathā ।। 

saṅkalpakalanās tyaktvā sarvā evātmatāṃ gataḥ ।
paśya cidghana evācchaḥ kalpāntaikābdhivat sthitaḥ ।। 

asmadādir janas sādho pāradṛśvā jagatsthiteḥ ।
tenaivāsmadvaco grāhyam om ity evāstasaṃśayam ।। 

codyacañcutayā kiñcid vadāmīti tyajan dhiyam ।
yadi tiṣṭhasi madvāci tadā yāsy eva tat padam ।। 

no cet tad vividhānekavikalpakalanāmalaiḥ ।
śuddhatārkikatām etya prayāsi tṛṇagulmatām ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ cet tad iyaṃ brahmaṃs tvattāmattāmayātmikā ।
tattvatas trijagannāmnī manye na kalanāsty alam ।। 

lavaṇaindavaśukrādivṛttāntavad upasthitam ।
bhrāntimātraṃ jagan manye satyaṃ nāstīha kiñcana ।। 

evaṃ sthite muniśreṣṭha sarvāpahnava eva vai ।
kṛto bhavati tad brūhi yujyate katham īdṛśam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāma samyakprabuddho asi jānāsy eva yathāsthitam ।
śuddhacidghana evāsti taṃ ca tvam avabuddhavān ।। 

siddhānto adhyātmaśāstrāṇāṃ sarvāpahnava eva ca ।
nāvidyāstīha no māyā śāntaṃ brahmedam akramam ।। 

śānta eva cidābhāse svacche samasamātmani ।
samagraśaktikacite brahmeti kalitābhidhe ।। 

nirṇīya kecic chūnyatvaṃ kecid vijñānamātratām ।
kecid īśvararūpatvaṃ vivadante parasparam ।। 

saṅkalpya jagad ucchūnaṃ nītvā ca śataśākhatām ।
cālayanti vicāreṇa kecit sāṅkhyamatādikam ।। 

kecit sarvam idaṃ śāntaṃ brahmeti ghananiścayāḥ ।
śuddhacidvyomatām etya santo asanta iva sthitāḥ ।। 

na brahma na jagan nānyad iti niścitya kecana ।
ākāśaviśadās svacchās saṃsthitās saugatādayaḥ ।। 

kecid apy anyathā kṛtvā nānāsaṅkalpakalpanam ।
sthitāś śāmyanti jāyante saṃsaranti ca vā na vā ।। 

samastakalanāhīnam iti nirṇīya cidghanam ।
samagraśaktikacitaṃ vivadante hi vādinaḥ ।। 

ekatra vastuni samastakalāvimukte saṅkalpya saṅkalanayā vividhābhidhās svāḥ ।
svaṃ vāsanāvilasitaṃ samudāharanto vidyāvivādavibhavair vivadanti vaidyāḥ ।। 

avidyānāstitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

śarīrendriyabuddhyādicetasāṃ spandanasya ca ।
kiṃ kasmāt sāram uditaṃ vyāpakaṃ śreyase bhavet ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat tvamahamādimat ।
cittamātraṃ hi tat sarvaṃ jalamātraṃ yathārṇavaḥ ।। 

dehendriyādibhāvena cittaṃ jagad iti sthitam ।
ṣaḍbhir vā pañcabhir dvāraiś cetyaṃ patati dehinām ।। 

yataḥ kutaścit sampannaṃ cittaṃ dvīnduvilāsavat ।
yathā nāneva sampannaṃ tad uktaṃ bahuśas tava ।। 

jīvādisañjñāvalitaṃ dhṛtasaṃsṛtivibhramam ।
yathā tat kṣīyate cittaṃ śreyase tad idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

ceto bhāvavikārāḍhyaṃ paśyatīdaṃ śarīrakam ।
avidyamānaṃ procchūnaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivaiṇakaḥ ।। 

tathā paśyati vai cetaś śarīraṃ spandacañcalam ।
abhinnam eva svātmatvād dadhirūpaṃ yathā payaḥ ।। 

utpattisthitināśāntaṃ yathānubhavati svayam ।
payo dadhitvam evaṃ hi cetaḥ paśyati dehakam ।। 

tathā hi bhārgavodanto lavaṇaindavavibhramaḥ ।
śrutas tvayā mahābāho cittarūpanirūpaṇe ।। 

pratibhāṃ jaḍam apy eti cittaṃ sarvagaciccyutam ।
anicchāyomaṇiprāptam ayaḥ praspandanaṃ yathā ।। 

nityoditāmalānantacidādityāṃśurañjanāt ।
cittapadmo vikasati puryaṣṭakadalāvaliḥ ।। 

yathā muktāvalī dṛṣṭā śūnye khe sadasanmayī ।
sphuraty evaṃ hi cittattve cetas sphurati cañcalam ।। 

yathā citrodayaś śūnye bhrāntimātram upaplavaḥ ।
tathā cetasi deho ayaṃ gandharvapuravat sthitaḥ ।। 

yathā cetasi deho ayaṃ mithyā dvīnduvilāsavat ।
indriyāṇi tathā dehe maivammātraparo bhava ।। 

yathendriyāṇi dehasya bālakalpitayakṣavat ।
spandas tathaivendriyāṇāṃ jaḍo maitatparo bhava ।। 

yathendriyāṇāṃ vātānām iva spando jaḍātmakaḥ ।
spandaboddhṛ tathaivāsat sphuraty etac calaṃ manaḥ ।। 

yathā spandasya tu mano bhramākṛti calaṃ jaḍam ।
manaso asya tathā buddhir mṛgatṛṣṇā vijṛmbhate ।। 

yathaiva buddhis svāntasya tathā buddher ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
asadrūpā mudhodbhūtā maivammātraparo bhava ।। 

yathā buddher ahaṅkāro vallyāḥ puṣpam iva sthitaḥ ।
tathaivāhaṅkṛter jīvo maivammātraparo bhava ।। 

yathaivāhaṅkṛter jīvaś śūnyehāvāsanātmakaḥ ।
tathā jīvasya kalayā yuktā cit sacamatkṛtiḥ ।। 

tad apy anagha saṅkalpavaśān no vastunāpi sat ।
maitad bhāvaya kiñcit tvaṃ naitat tenāsya vā bhavān ।। 

ete parasparaṃ sarve bhramāt kāraṇatāṃ gatāḥ ।
taraṅgavad vivartante manobuddhīndriyādayaḥ ।। 

yathā śūnye mahāraṇye svasaṅkalpabhramākulāḥ ।
bhramanty unmattakā evaṃ manobuddhīndriyādayaḥ ।। 

śarīraṃ saṃsṛtau sāras sāro akṣaughaś śarīrake ।
sāras tv akṣagaṇe spandas spande sāras smṛtaṃ manaḥ ।। 

sāro manasi vai buddhis sāro buddhāv ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
sāras tv ahaṅkṛtau jīvo jīve sāraś cid ābilā ।। 

citi sāras tv acetyatvaṃ cetyasyāsambhavāc chive ।
tasmāt sāratarāt sāraḥ kiñcid anyan na vidyate ।। 

nirvikalpacidābhāsa eva sarvatra kāraṇam ।
kāraṇaṃ tasya nāsty anyat tat svato nityabhāsuram ।। 

tāvanmātraparo nityaṃ bhava pūrvaṃ parityajan ।
sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ vāpi jagac cinmātram eva hi ।। 

valitaṃ sarvasaṅkalpair yadi vā yadi vojjhitam ।
jagat tad akhilaṃ rāma viddhy etac chuddhacinmayam ।। 

ity asmāt paramāt sārād ajasraṃ saṃvid aṅga te ।
rātrindivaṃ na calati yadi tat tvam ajaś śivaḥ ।। 

atra sthitasya tava kecana durvilāsā rātrāv aher iva na rāma padaṃ labhante ।
maināṃ parityaja mahāmṛtakandarāṃ tvam atraiva tiṣṭha dṛḍhalekhyam ivāśmanīti ।। 

jīvādyabhāvapratipādanayogo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

niricchenācchaśāntena cidādityena cetyate ।
sargādiṣu svataś cetyaṃ dṛṣṭyā muktāvalīva khe ।। 

anantaraṃ tad evedaṃ śataśākhaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
bhrame kāraṇatām etya jagajjālatayeddhayā ।। 

yathā svabhāvād itarat kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate ।
śūnyadṛṅmauktikāloke tathā cic cetyavedane ।। 

ciccetyayor na bhedo asti yac cic cetyaṃ tad eva hi ।
yaiva dṛk saiva muktālī bījam evāṅkuras smṛtaḥ ।। 

bījam eva phalaṃ viddhi tyaktāśeṣaviśeṣaṇam ।
viśeṣakalpanād asya na saṅkalpasya satyatā ।। 

satyatā yadi saṅkalpe tasmāt tajjā tad eva vā ।
sa ca saṅkalpa etasmād ādyād evoditaś śivāt ।। 

tasmād yad eva paramaṃ padaṃ cinmātram avyayam ।
tad eva savikalpā cic cetyam ādyaṃ tad eva ca ।। 

tad eva jīvakalanaṃ tad evāhaṅkṛtis sphurat ।
tad eva buddhis tac cittaṃ tat spandaś cendriyāṇi tat ।। 

tad dehas taj jagat kṛtsnaṃ tad diśas tac ca rodasī ।
tad adryurvīnadīśādi tṛṇāntaṃ vābjajādi ca ।। 

jaḍo deho jaḍo akṣaugho jaḍaṃ cittaṃ jaḍā matiḥ ।
jaḍaivāhaṅkalā ceti tathā praspandanaṃ jaḍam ।। 

eteṣāṃ yo anubhavitā so asi sarvagato asi ca ।
tac ca niṣkalacinmātraṃ māsmāt svasmāt padāc cala ।। 

evam ādyantarahitam ekam evedam ātatam ।
ittham ābhāsate bhāsā svayā nānyāsti kalpanā ।। 

sarvaṃ śāntaṃ svabhāsedaṃ bhāsate jñaptimātrakam ।
tvattāmattājagajjanmamaraṇādi na vidyate ।। 

bhrāntiṃ parityaja samo bhava nirvikāro nityodito niravalambanam astabhāvaḥ ।
śāntaṃ samastam avikāram anādimadhyam ity eva satyam apareṇa tavālam astu ।। 

satyāvabodhayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vālmīkiḥ

evaṃ vāsiṣṭham ākarṇya vaco vikasitāśayaḥ ।
ucchvasann iva cittena rāmo vacanam abravīt ।। 

rāmaḥ

aho nu bhāro bharavāṃś cetasā projjhitaś cirāt ।
ayaṃ so aham idaṃ me adya cetyādis tvag ivāhinā ।। 

svacchatām upayāte ayam antaḥkaraṇasaṃsthitiḥ ।
śobhate śaradīva dyauś śāntavāridaviplavā ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ me adya iti bhāraṃ mahābharam ।
api meror gurutaraṃ dhārayan ko na sīdati ।। 

śāmyāmi parinirvāmi jāgarmy āśvāsavān aham ।
adhvagasyeva me skandhād gṛhītā mahatī śilā ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālam aho nu khalu vañcitaḥ ।
yad imāṃ padavīṃ śāntāṃ śītalācchāṃ na labdhavān ।। 

tad imaṃ saṃśayaṃ śeṣam ekaṃ me chettum arhasi ।
bhagavan sarvadharmajña prodvijante hi nottamāḥ ।। 

paramātmamayaṃ sarvaṃ yadi nāma sadaiva hi ।
idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti tat kimarthaṃ kṛtaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathotpannā na votpannā jīvāḥ paramakāraṇāt ।
dvaitavanto atha vādvaitās tat tāvaj jñātavān bhavān ।। 

tatra tāvat svasaṅkalpād yeṣāṃ dvaitam alaṃ sthitam ।
tais tāvat saṃsṛtau kiñcit saṃsartavyam asaṃśayam ।। 

tatra kecid bālya eva svacamatkārayogataḥ ।
vidanti paramātmānaṃ tiṣṭhanti vigatajvaram ।। 

anīśvarās seśvarāś ca ye jīvā dehatāṃ gatāḥ ।
gṛhītadvaitavistārāḥ kālenāyānti te padam ।। 

bhavaty evātiviśrāntir nāsti kasyāsti kasya ca ।
sucirāt kevalaṃ kaścid acirād vetti kaścana ।। 

kecid viditavedyatvaṃ yānti rāghava yauvane ।
jarāvantaḥ paraṃ vastu vidantīhāpare janāḥ ।। 

evaṃ tajjñās tathājñāś ca tiṣṭhanty eva yathāsthitam ।
asyāṃ vyavahṛtau jīvanmuktā baddhāś ca mānavāḥ ।। 

idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti teṣāṃ yadi jagatsthitiḥ ।
nonnīyate tat kṣayakṛn mātsyo nyāyaḥ pravartate ।। 

yāvat kiñcit prasphurati sargas tāvat kadarthanām ।
mā yātu mātsyanyāyena kileti vihitā sthitiḥ ।। 

niṣpuṇyapāpaṃ niścittaṃ nirmamo amananakriyam ।
kālātivāhanāyaiva jīvanmukto avatiṣṭhate ।। 

māyāgrastamatis tv ātmavāsanāvaśataḥ phalam ।
prāpnotīhāmutra caiva tadarthaṃ yatate ca saḥ ।। 

etāvat tāvad ābālapaṇḍitāmaramānavam ।
avisaṃvādi yad yādṛk cittaṃ tanmayatātmanaḥ ।। 

svasaṅkalpaikabījāya narakasvargaśākhine ।
phalāyājñasya kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca rāghava ।। 

yat tu tajjñasya kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca vā kvacit ।
tat prameyadaśām eti na kadācana kasyacit ।। 

kartā bhavatv akartā vā mukta evāṅga tattvavit ।
bhūyo majjati nājñāne payaḥphena ivāmbhasi ।। 

kartā bhavatv akartā vā baddha evāyathārthavit ।
araṇyakūpāc chvevāsmān mohān nottarati kvacit ।। 

nirdeho nirmanā maunī śāntas svastho nireṣaṇaḥ ।
kurvann eva ca karmāṇi tiṣṭhottiṣṭhasva tatpade ।। 

jīvo brahmārṇave vīcir jīvāmbhodhāv ahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
ahaṅkārāmbudhau buddhir buddhyabdhau cittam ābilam ।। 

cittābdhau vāsanā vīcir vāsanābdhau tu saṃsṛtiḥ ।
saṃsārābdhau śarīraṃ ca śarīrābdhau ca jīvitam ।। 

jīvitābdhau ca yuvatā cañcale yauvanārṇave ।
vīcir indriyasaṅghātas spandas tv indriyavāridhau ।। 

spandāmbhodhāv anubhavas svānubhūtyāmbudhau tataḥ ।
taraṅgaś citsamullāsa itīdaṃ sargavedanam ।। 

śabdasaṃsparśarūpādi yenedam avabudhyate ।
tac cinmātraṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatsāratvād raghūdvaha ।। 

akṣubdho avyapadeśyo asāv asargakaraṇonmukhaḥ ।
unnīyate cidambhodhis sadbhir brahmeti kevalam ।। 

akṣubdham api tat kṣubdham iva cet kṛtavedanam ।
tac cidaṃśam upāruhya brahma sarga iti sthitam ।। 

akṣubdho asāv avācyo hi samaś citimahārṇavaḥ ।
vaktuṃ na kenacin nāmnā kalayā vāpi śakyate ।। 

na ca tasya mahābāho kṣobhas sambhavati kvacit ।
pṛthak tanmātrarūpatvāt sarvasya jagato gateḥ ।। 

svarūpe tasya devasya kevalaṃ yā vilāsitā ।
saiṣoktā kṣobhaśabdena cicchabdena ca vānagha ।। 

paramārthamahāmbhodhau cic cetyalavarūpiṇī ।
ūrmivat sphurati spandāt tenedaṃ jāyate jagat ।। 

akṣubdho asāv anirdeśyas samaś cinmātrasāgaraḥ ।
kṣubdhaś cetyataraṅgas tu cid ity ākalito budhaiḥ ।। 

cidabdhau laharī cetyaṃ sā ca tasmān na bhidyate ।
tāvanmātraikasāratvād vāri vīcir ivāmbhasaḥ ।। 

tasmād bhūtāni jātāni tāvanmātrāṇi tāni ca ।
tad evātad ivābhāti sakalaṃ cākalaṃ ca tat ।। 

ekam eva nakiñcid yat kiñcid vā tad idaṃ jagat ।
nānānānātayā ceto mā mithyākulatāṃ naya ।। 

ekasya vāmbhaso vīcirūpeṇa sphurato yathā ।
nānyatāsti tathā bhūtabhāvena sphuraṇāc citaḥ ।। 

bījam eva yathā stambhaḥ pattraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ rasaḥ ।
pariṇāmādirahitaṃ bhavaty evaṃ jaganty ajaḥ ।। 

phalāntā bījasattaiva sphuraty anyatayeva sā ।
advaitaikyajagadrūpā brahmasattaiva jṛmbhate ।। 

bījaṃ sattaikasāmānyenāphalāntaṃ yathā sthitam ।
brahma sattaikasāmānyenāsargāntaṃ tathā sthitam ।। 

brahmaikasattāsāmānyamātram evedam ātatam ।
satyam ekaṃ jagad iti vyāhṛtaṃ taruvṛkṣavat ।। 

ya evācchaś citas spandas sa evetthaṃ jagadbhramaḥ ।
yaś cāspandas sa evāṅga paramopaśamaś śivaḥ ।। 

aho mahattā svacchāyāś cito yasyā jaganty api ।
spandamātrāt samudyanti līyante aspandamātrataḥ ।। 

yasyonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ bhāvānāṃ pralayodayau ।
nānānānābham iva yat tad idaṃ brahma cidghanaḥ ।। 

cid vātavad abhinnātmā spandād ātmagatād yathā ।
tathaiva jagad etasmāt tasmāt tatsthaṃ tad eva ca ।। 

ataś śuddham anābhāsaṃ sarvaṃ cidghanam akṣaye ।
dṛśyamāne api naiva stas tvattāmatte bhavābhayaḥ ।। 

naikyaṃ na ca dvaitam ihāsti kiñcin na tvattvamattvādi sad apy asad vā ।
sarvaṃ ca sarvatra sadaiva cāsti yad buddhavān evam apīha tat tat ।। 

brahmaikatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭātriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

maduktam etad ākarṇya nirṇīya śubham ity alam ।
hṛdaye cākhilaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhetthaṃ śṛṇu rāghava ।। 

sarvam eva parityajya kāṣṭhamaunī bhavānagha ।
nirvāsano nirmananaḥ kṣīṇacittaḥ praśāntadhīḥ ।। 

apaśyann apy agragatān aśṛṇvan paṭahān api ।
aspṛśann ambaram api na jighrañ śvasanādy api ।। 

prabhuñjāno apy abhuñjāno vyomavad vimalāntaraḥ ।
saṃvidaivedṛśas tiṣṭha niṣṭhām ādhyātmikīṃ gataḥ ।। 

ātmany evāssva śāntātmā mūkāndhabadhiropamaḥ ।
pustāc chailād iva kṛtaś citrabhittāv ivārpitaḥ ।। 

iti buddhīndriyair eva sthitvā merur iva sthiraḥ ।
apunarbhavanāyaiṣi samādhānamahāśayaḥ ।। 

kuru karmendriyaiḥ kāryaṃ yantravat spandacañcalaiḥ ।
ardhasuptaprabuddhābhais svakarmābhyāsacañcalaiḥ ।। 

aphalecchānusandhānair bālair unmattakair iva ।
avāsanair amananaiś calair vṛkṣadalair iva ।। 

nityam antarmukho bhūtvā svātmārāmaḥ prapūrṇadhīḥ ।
jāgraty eva suṣuptasthaḥ kuru karmāṇy anidravat ।। 

yathā maunī yantrapumān karoty evaṃ kuru kriyām ।
vātasvabhāvāt spandīni calantv aṅgāni kiṃ tava ।। 

antas sarvaparityāgī bahiḥ kurvann api sthiram ।
na kartāsi na bhoktāsi na cāyam asi netaraḥ ।। 

yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvaś ceto yasya na lipyate ।
jagan nighnan prakurvan vā na hanti na karoti saḥ ।। 

yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṅkalpavarjitāḥ ।
jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ muktam āhus tam uttamāḥ ।। 

evaṃ samādhānamayo mahātman bhūyo na cintām upayāti kaścit ।
mahāsamādhānam anantam etad āśritya tiṣṭhāmṛtatām upaiṣi ।। 

mahāsamādhānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yatraikadvitvakalanās sambhavanti hi kāścana ।
tatraikāntasamādhāne bhaṅgo bhavati rāghava ।। 

ekam eva tu yatrāsti sattāsāmānyamātrakam ।
tatra kiṃ kasya kenaiva samādhānaṃ vinaśyati ।। 

cinomi na cinomīti tyaktvā śabdārthavibhramam ।
cidrūpa evācidrūpo maunavāṃs tiṣṭha kāṣṭhavat ।। 

sthitir vāyor avahataḥ payaso adreś ca khasya vā ।
avāsanāntas sā te astu kurvato akurvataś citaḥ ।। 

ahambhāvo vilīno yas tāpasthahimaleśavat ।
cetyasyācayanād antas sampannaḥ paramaṃ padam ।। 

aṇīyasām aṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām ।
śāntaṃ cittvam asaṃvedyam ananyad idam ātatam ।। 

ayaṃ pratyekam uditaḥ pṛthak saṃsṛtiṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
sasurāsurapātālalokāntaradharāmbaraḥ ।। 

jñas sarvetarasaṅkalpasargān paśyaty akhaṇḍitān ।
āsvāditekṣus sarvekṣurasān sānubhavān iva ।। 

saṅkalpasargapuruṣās satyās sarve parasparam ।
cidvyomno acchinnarūpatvāt tattānubhavatas svataḥ ।। 

spandavicchittayas sarvā dravabhāvād yathāmbhasaḥ ।
saṃvidvicchittayas sarvāś citirūpāt tathātmanaḥ ।। 

aikyam aikyātmatāpūrvaṃ ratnayugmatviṣo yathā ।
yānti vittvena saṅkalpasargā bhinnās tathaikatām ।। 

yad yad ālokyate toye tat tat sarvaṃ yathā dravaḥ ।
yad yad āmṛśyate śānte tat tat sarvaṃ citis tathā ।। 

cidīhanaṃ vidus cittaṃ nirvāṇaṃ cidanīhanam ।
na cidālihanīyo ataḥ padārtho aviditātmanaḥ ।। 

cittasattā paraṃ duḥkhaṃ cittāsattā paraṃ sukham ।
ataś cittaṃ vidīhātma neyaṃ śamam avedanāt ।। 

dṛṣṭvā ramyam aramyaṃ vā stheyaṃ pāṣāṇavat samam ।
etāvatātmayatnena jitā bhavati saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

svenaiva puruṣārthena padārthāmajjanātmanā ।
tīryate goṣpadam iva na tu daivād bhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

vastuprāptau cidīhāyām udite cittarākṣase ।
saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante śūnyās saṃsṛtivibhramāḥ ।। 

ataś citam adhāvantīṃ dhārayann avidann iva ।
kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamas tiṣṭha kāryaṃ kurvan yathāgatam ।। 

saṃvedanīyaṃ na sukhaṃ nāsukhaṃ naiva madhyamam ।
etāvatā tu yatnena duḥkhānto ananta āpyate ।। 

vastvasanmṛgatṛṣṇāmbu jīvo vastutayā lihan ।
cittayakṣodaye bhīmām imāṃ prāpnoti saṃsṛtim ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ paśyaṃś citā caittaṃ dṛṣaddṛḍhaḥ ।
bhūmikākramayogena mukto bhava bhavārṇavāt ।। 

āpīnamaṇḍalaśaśāṅkavad antar eva śrīmadrasāyanamayas sukham eti tajjñaḥ ।
vijñātasarvabhuvanatrayavastusāraḥ kurvan na nāma kurute param abhyupetaḥ ।। 

nirvāṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

saptānāṃ yogabhūmīnām abhyāsaḥ kriyate katham ।
kīdṛśāni ca cihnāni bhūmikāṃ prati yoginaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yataḥ kutaścit sampannam avidyāvyādhivedanam ।
satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vā cikitsāṃ tv asya me śṛṇu ।। 

parād anantād yady eṣā tat tad eveyam akṣatam ।
na jāteyaṃ na cāvidyā bodhamātrād bhaved ataḥ ।। 

pakṣam etam anādṛtya svasaṅkalpavilāsinaḥ ।
satyām apīhāvidyāyāṃ śṛṇu nirnāśane kramam ।। 

jantuḥ prathamajātas tu suṣuptāvasthacetanaḥ ।
bhāvibhāvanaduḥkhātmā krimisaṃvid bhavaty adhīḥ ।। 

bhavec cen navajātasya na bhāvī bhāvanodayaḥ ।
sukhādisaṃvidā sadyas tat sa eva paraṃ padam ।। 

etāvataiva sauṣuptī sthitir bhinnā parāt padāt ।
yad bhāvivāsanaughāsau jaḍā copaladharmiṇī ।। 

turyāvasthāsamā svasthā sadrūpā śāntavāsanā ।
jīvanmuktes sthitir ato na suṣuptopamā bhavet ।। 

agrasthavastusambodhasantatābhyāsayogataḥ ।
bālas suṣuptāvasthāyāḥ kramān niryāti rāghava ।। 

kiñcijjātadhiyo jantor deśabhāṣārthavedinaḥ ।
gṛhṇāmīdaṃ tyajāmīdam iti sañjāyate sthitiḥ ।। 

etāvanmātrabuddhir yas svavṛddhajanagocaraḥ ।
bhavet svakarmaśāstrāṇāṃ viṣayo asāv alaṃ vidheḥ ।। 

kulavṛddhaprayuktena svaniścayavataiva vā ।
bhāvyaṃ padapadārthānāṃ tena tajjñena vai tataḥ ।। 

jantuḥ padapadārthajño heyaṃ tyajati tajjñadhīḥ ।
upādeyam upādatte nālokayati madhyamam ।। 

vivekād vṛddhabhītyā vā śāstrārthavyavahāriṇaḥ ।
vicārapūrvaṃ yasyehā sa pumān iti kathyate ।। 

pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca bhavati dvividhaḥ pumān ।
svargāpavargonmukhayoś śṛṇu lakṣaṇam etayoḥ ।। 

kim etan nāma nirvāṇaṃ varaṃ saṃsṛtir eva naḥ ।
iti kartavyakartā yas sa pravṛtta iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

calārṇavayugacchidrakūrmagrīvārpaṇopamā ।
anekajanmāntarato bhāvinī tasya mokṣadhīḥ ।। 

asārā bata saṃsāravyavasthālaṃ mamaitayā ।
kiṃ karmabhiḥ paryuṣitair dinaṃ tair eva nīyate ।। 

kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ kiṃ syād viśramaṇaṃ param ।
iti niścayavān yo antas sa nivṛtta iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

sa vartamāna eveha janmani tv avivekini ।
sa yogabhūmiṣv etāsu viṣayo viśadāśayaḥ ।। 

kathaṃ virāgavān bhūtvā saṃsārābdhiṃ tarāmy aham ।
evaṃvicāraṇaparo yadā bhavati sanmatiḥ ।। 

sādhusaṅgamam ādatte sacchāstram api vīkṣate ।
virāgam upayāty antar bhāvanāsv anuvāsaram ।। 

kriyāsūdārarūpāsu ramate mānam īhate ।
grāmyāsu jaḍaceṣṭāsu calāsu vicikitsate ।। 

nodāharati marmāṇi puṇyaśarmāṇi ceṣṭate ।
ananyodvegakārīṇi mṛdukarmāṇi sevate ।। 

snehapraṇayagarbhāṇi peśalāny ucitāni ca ।
deśakālopapannāni vacanāny abhibhāṣate ।। 

tadāsau prathamām ekāṃ prāpto bhavati bhūmikām ।
vakṣyamāṇasvabhāvo atha tatra rūḍhim upeṣyati ।। 

devāyatanadeśeṣu brāhmaṇāvasatheṣu ca ।
vaneṣu ramate nityaṃ prathamāṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkaiḥ prajñāṃ vardhayati svayam ।
śuklapakṣaḥ kalām indor iva saundaryaśālinīm ।। 

sarvāstivādanirataḥ peśalaḥ praṇayānvitaḥ ।
manasā karmaṇā vācā sajjanān upasevate ।। 

kadarthalabdhāṃl labhyāṃś ca tajjñān anusaraṃś ciram ।
yataḥ kutaścid ānīya nityaṃ śāstrāṇy avekṣate ।। 

vyālāpadhvaṃsanaśikhī dharmābdeśoccakandharaḥ ।
snānadānatapodhyānavibhavān abhivāñchati ।। 

prathamām ity upāruhya dvitīyām āśrayed balāt ।
puruṣārthād ṛte nānyā saṅkaṭottaraṇe gatiḥ ।। 

evaṃ vicāravān yas syāt saṃsārottaraṇaṃ prati ।
sa bhūmikāvān ity uktaś śeṣas tv ārya iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

āryatātulyatāṃ yātā prathamaikaiva bhūmikā ।
bhūmikānāṃ tu śeṣāṇām āryatā dāsyam arhati ।। 

vicāranāmnīm itarām āgato yogabhūmikām ।
udāramatir ādatte svabhāvaṃ mahatām iti ।। 

śrutismṛtisamācāradhāraṇādhyānakarmaṇām ।
mukhyayā vyākhyayā khyātaṃ śrayati śreṣṭhapaṇḍitam ।। 

icchākutukabandheṣu jayatīndriyaśatruṣu ।
ādehaṃ praharatsv antar vīreṣv iva sudāruṇaḥ ।। 

kim apūrvāṃ jhagity enāṃ saṃśrayāmy anurāgiṇīm ।
iti hrīmān iva hriyaṃ dayāṃ caiṣa na muñcati ।। 

padārthapravibhāgajñaḥ kāryākāryaviniścayam ।
jānāty adhigataśravyo gṛhaṃ gṛhapatir yathā ।। 

madābhimānamātsaryalobhamohātiśāyitām ।
bahir apy āsthitām īṣat tyajaty ahir iva tvacam ।। 

candanāgurugandhīni vanitāliṅganāny api ।
aprārthitopayātāni sevate svāny anādaram ।। 

mātṛvat paradārāṇi paradravyāṇi loṣṭavat ।
svātmavat sarvabhūtāni kāruṇyenābhipaśyati ।। 

yat karoti yad aśnāti spandate yad yad īhate ।
tad ādau buddhibhedena ciraṃ cāru parīkṣate ।। 

avicārātmakaṃ naiti na gacchati na vakti ca ।
na dadāti na cādatte na cinoti na copati ।। 

vyavahārānuvṛttyartham aviruddhaṃ kṣaṇakṣayi ।
harṣāmarṣāṃśam ādatte gantevālātakaṃ niśi ।। 

durdeśaṃ duradhiṣṭhānaṃ dussaṅgaṃ durupāśrayam ।
ālokyam api dehādi liptaṃ tṛṇam ivojjhati ।। 

yad udarkahitaṃ lokyaṃ yad anādhi gatabhramam ।
tad eva hariṇo vātam iva maunī vidhāvati ।। 

hārihāsavilāsāsu hāvabhāvavatīṣu ca ।
vīkṣate bhāvināśāsu strīṣu śuṣkalatāsv iva ।। 

itthambhūtamatiś śāstraṃ gurusajjanasevanāt ।
sarahasyam aśeṣeṇa yathāvad adhigacchati ।। 

asaṃsaṅgātmikām anyāṃ tṛtīyāṃ yogabhūmikām ।
tataḥ pataty asau kāntaḥ puṣpaśayyām ivāmalām ।। 

durvyākhyām adhikavyākhyām ūnavyākhyāṃ vihāya dhīḥ ।
yathāvac chāstravākyārtham ādatte asyātra pāvanī ।। 

phalaty atrāsya śāstrārthaḥ kurvann antar asaṅgatām ।
śikṣitas sūpakārasya samyak sūpo raseṣv iva ।। 

tāpasāśramaviśrāmaiḥ pāvanādhyātmasaṅkathaiḥ ।
śilāśayyāsanāsīno jarayaty āyur ātatam ।। 

vanāvanivihāreṇa cittopaśamaśobhinā ।
asaṅgasukhasomyena kālaṃ nayati nītimān ।। 

na tathā ramayanty enaṃ jyotsnāprasarahāsinaḥ ।
nivāsāḥ kusumākīrṇā yathā giriguhālayāḥ ।। 

devadvijaguruprājñapaṇḍitārcanabhojanaiḥ ।
aparāhṇaṃ kṣapayati pūrvāhṇaṃ śrutasajjanaiḥ ।। 

antarāntarasampannadharmyārthopārjanakramaḥ ।
santoṣāmṛtatṛptātmā sādhvācāreṇa rājate ।। 

sarasīṣv acchatoyāsu phullāsu nalinīṣu ca ।
saritsu bahupuṇyāsu vāpīṣu ca nimajjati ।। 

āsannacandrakarakīrṇasudhārasāsu puṣpopakārasamasomyajalasthalāsu ।
guñjadguhāsu ratam enam adhityakāsu vanyāḥ phalair upacaranti mahānubhāvam ।। 

bhūmikātritayalakṣaṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

abhyāsāj jñānaśāstrāṇāṃ karaṇāt puṇyakarmaṇām ।
jantor yathāvad eveyaṃ vastudṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati ।। 

tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikāṃ prāpya buddho anubhavati svayam ।
dviprakāram asaṃsaṅgaṃ tasya bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

rāmaḥ

asaṃsaṅgasya bhagavan prathamaṃ brūhi lakṣaṇam ।
kathayiṣyasi me paścād asyaiva dviprakāratām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dviprakāratvakathanaprasaṅgenaiva lakṣaṇam ।
asaṃsakteś śṛṇutarāṃ duritaṃ yena naśyati ।। 

dvividho ayam asaṃsaṅgas sāmānyaś śreṣṭha eva ca ।
śṛṇu sāmānyam evādau sa eva śraiṣṭhyam eṣyati ।। 

nāhaṃ karteśvaraḥ kartā na kaścid vātha ko api vā ।
ity amajjanam artheṣu sāmānyāsaṅganāmakam ।। 

sampadyata idaṃ kiñcit kayāpy eveśvarecchayā ।
bhāvanābhāvanam iti sāmānyāsaṅganāmakam ।। 

ajo aham avyayātmāham ananto aham anāmayaḥ ।
akartāsmīty anicchatvaṃ sāmānyāsaṅganāmakam ।। 

evam eva pravartante premāṇi ca dhanāni ca ।
evam evāvahīyante kasya kevātra kartṛtā ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyāni vimardavirasāni ca ।
kākatālīyayogena sukhāny āyānti yānti ca ।। 

bhogā viṣamasambhogā bhogā iva phaṇāvatām ।
nāham eteṣu naite me jāgarmy ātmani śāntadhīḥ ।। 

bhogā bhavamahārogās sampadaḥ paramāpadaḥ ।
viyogā eva saṃyogā ādhayo vyādhayo dhiyaḥ ।। 

kālaḥ kavalanodyuktas sarvabhāvān asanmayān ।
apy atti vipralambhena svātmānam api mohayan ।। 

apy asatyāni santīva nāntavanty antavanti ca ।
cidratnaraśmijālāni jaganty agaṇitāny aho ।। 

vicāreṇa na labhyante na santy agragatāny alam ।
jāgrati svapnadṛṣṭāni purāṇīva sthitāny api ।। 

savātavanavallīnāṃ chāyā iva punaḥ punaḥ ।
anāratavilolāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca ।। 

anāsthayeti bhāvānāṃ yad abhāvanam āntaram ।
nāhaṃ kartā na bhokteti sāmānyo asāv asaṅgamaḥ ।। 

na kartāsmi na bhoktāsmi na vaktāsmi na yāmi ca ।
prasṛteheśvarecchetthaṃ sāmānyaivam asaṅgatiḥ ।। 

īśvarārpaṇayā yad yat kriyate muktavāsanam ।
sāmānyāsaktitānāma tad āhuḥ paramaṃ padam ।। 

asaṃsaṅgo ayam uktas te sāmānyo raghunandana ।
imaṃ śreṣṭham asaṃsaṅgaṃ śṛṇu śrutirasāyanam ।। 

anena kramayogena saṃyogena mahātmanām ।
niyogena satām antaḥ prayogeṇa svasaṃvidām ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tāvad abhyāsa uhyate ।
karāmalakavad yāvat sarvasāro anubhūyate ।। 

yā yodeti manāg icchā tasyās tasyā nipātanāt ।
padam āsādyate sāraṃ kayācin nānyayā dhiyā ।। 

dṛṣṭe sakalasīmānte trijagatkaṇadīpake ।
saṃsārasaritaḥ pāre sāre paramakāraṇe ।। 

nāhaṃ karteśvaraḥ kartā nāsmi kartā na ceśvaraḥ ।
nāyam asmi na cānyo aham aham asmītaraś ca vā ।। 

kṛtvā dūratare nūnam iti śabdārthabhāvanāḥ ।
yan maunam āsitaṃ śāntaṃ śreṣṭhāsaṃsaṅga ucyate ।। 

yan nāntar nāmbare nādho nordhve nāśāsu nāvanau ।
na padārthe nāpadārthe na jaḍe na ca cetane ।। 

āsitaṃ bhāsanaṃ śāntam avāsanam abhāvanam ।
anādyantam ajaṃ kāntaṃ tac chreṣṭhāsaṅga ucyate ।। 

acittacetanānandaṃ sarvabhāvāntarāsanam ।
yad vasantādirasavat tac chreṣṭhāsaṅga ucyate ।। 

animajjanam artheṣu bhāvanābhāvanaṃ hṛdi ।
avedanaṃ sukhādīnām asaṃsaṅgaṃ paraṃ viduḥ ।। 

karmasv artheṣu cintāsu vāsanāsv ātmatāsu ca ।
avedanam amagnatvaṃ śreṣṭhāsaṃsaṅga ucyate ।। 

ajñānapaṅkapīṭhāyāṃ jñaptibhūmau svabhāvataḥ ।
kākatālīyayogād vākṣayād vā sarvakarmaṇām ।। 

saṃvijjalavilāsāyāṃ viśaddehamṛṇālakaḥ ।
jāto hṛdayasadvāpyāṃ cintāśapharikānvitaḥ ।। 

santoṣāmodamadhuras satkāryāmalapallavaḥ ।
cittanālāgrasaṃlīno avighnakaṇṭakasaṅkaṭaḥ ।। 

vivekapadmo rūḍho antar vicārārkavikāsitaḥ ।
phalaṃ phalaty asaṃsaṅgaṃ tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikāṃ gataḥ ।। 

asaṃsaktamanā maunī munir madabahiṣkṛtaḥ ।
bhavaty avidyamānābhas tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

samavāyād viśuddhānāṃ samatvād dharmakarmaṇām ।
kākatālīyayogena prathamodeti bhūmikā ।। 

bhūmiḥ proditamātrāntar amṛtāṅkurikaiva sā ।
vivekenāmbusekena rakṣyā pālyāti dhīmatā ।। 

yenāṃśenollasaty eṣā vicāreṇodayaṃ nayet ।
tam evānudinaṃ yatnāt kṛṣīvala ivāṅkuram ।। 

eṣā hi parimṛṣṭāntar anyāsāṃ prasavaikabhūḥ ।
pattrāṇām aṅkura iva tadrūḍho anyāsu rohati ।। 

tṛtīyeyam asaṃsaṅgakāriṇī bhavatāriṇī ।
anayoditayodeti bhānubhāseva padminī ।। 

vijityāvagrahakṣobhadurdeśapramukhān arīn ।
susiktamūlā latikā dadāty avikalaṃ phalam ।। 

asaṃsaktamatir maunī madamātsaryavarjitaḥ ।
vṛṣṭaśāradameghābho bhaved bhavyas tribhūmikaḥ ।। 

viditākhilavedyasya śāntasandehasantateḥ ।
naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।। 

tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikāṃ prāptas sāmānyāsaṅgavān iha ।
vicaraty asamunnaddhaḥ param ākalayan padam ।। 

śreṣṭhāsaṃsaṅgavān eṣa tṛtīye bhūmikāpade ।
bhavati proṣitāśeṣasaṅkalpakalanāspade ।। 

lagaty asaṃsaktamater na karmaphalabhāvanā ।
vārīva padmapattrasya ratnasyevoparañjanā ।। 

nityāsaṃsaktayā buddhyā prakṛtaṃ bahir ācaran ।
antar akṣobha evāste hṛdayenāparājitaḥ ।। 

enām asaṃsaṅgadaśām avāpya pataty apīcchann iha saṃsṛtiṃ no ।
icchā ca nodeti na rāma te bho yodeti sā sattvacamatkṛtir hi ।। 

bhūmikāvicāro nāma sargaḥ

dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mūḍhasyāsatkulotthasya pravṛttasya narasya ca ।
aprāptayogasaṅgasya katham uttaraṇaṃ bhavet ।। 

ekām atha dvitīyāṃ vā tṛtīyāṃ cetarāṃ ca vā ।
ārūḍhasya mṛtasya syāt kīdṛśī bhagavan gatiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mūḍhasyārūḍhadoṣasya tāvat saṃsṛtir ātatā ।
yāvaj janmāntaraśataiś kākatālīyayogataḥ ।। 

atha vā sādhusaṅgatyā pravṛttasya narasya no ।
udeti vairāgyamatir marau puṣpalatā yathā ।। 

vairāgyamatir evaṃ sā pravṛddhā bhūmikākrame ।
niyojayati saṃsāre taṭīm iva taraṅgiṇī ।। 

kecij janmamahāyogair apy alabdhavicāraṇāḥ ।
araghaṭṭaghaṭīyantram ivordhvādhaḥparās sthitāḥ ।। 

prathamāṃ vetarāṃ vāpi yogabhūmiṃ tu yo abhyaset ।
āyuḥkṣayam avāpnoti punaḥpāścātyajanmane ।। 

sa tam abhyastam evāntar buddhau parikaraṃ varam ।
vahan yāti mṛteḥ pārśvaṃ yathā srotas saridrayam ।। 

tatra taiś śubhasaṅkalpaiḥ pavitrakalanātmakaḥ ।
tādṛgguṇamayair eva mitrabandhubhir anvitaḥ ।। 

adīnātmā jagadbhāvān akhilān aparāmṛśan ।
saṃsmaran parayā bhaktyā jagattaraṇakāraṇam ।। 

sadvāsanāmanorūpo vijahāti śarīrakam ।
vātāvadhūnanādhūtam āmodaḥ kusumaṃ yathā ।। 

prāṇavātānvito jīvagandho dehasaroruham ।
pravihāya samuḍḍīnaḥ kam apy ākāśam āgataḥ ।। 

muhūrtam ekaṃ sauṣuptīm avasthām anutiṣṭhati ।
dehabhāraṃ parityajya gāḍhāṃ nidrām upāgataḥ ।। 

kṣaṇāt prabodham āyātas satatābhyastayā svayā ।
āpūryate vāsanayā saritkhāta ivāmbhasā ।। 

saṃsmṛtya svadhiyā sādhus sa svabhāvanayā tayā ।
vyomni vyomavapur yasmiṃs tiṣṭhet puryaṣṭakānvitaḥ ।। 

na tu dūre na nikaṭe vyoma nedaṃ na cetarat ।
kām apy avarṇanāyogyāṃ tām ākāśadaśāṃ viduḥ ।। 

tatas sa jīvo vyomny atra prāṇavātamayātmakaḥ ।
śanaiḥ prāgbhāvam ādatte madhau rasam ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

bhāvanā yā sadābhyastā tām eva maraṇāvadhau ।
smarañ jīvo jahātīmaṃ bhīmaṃ bhāraṃ kalevaram ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ smaran dehāt sadābhāvitam utplutaḥ ।
tasyaiva phalam āpnoti svapauruṣabalārjitam ।। 

ādehaṃ yat sadābhyastaṃ jīvena tad asau mṛtau ।
sarvān bhāvān anādṛtya smaratīdaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ।। 

yuddharājyasurārāmapāṭharodanavibhramān ।
svakarmaphalabhīto asau nāgrasthān api paśyati ।। 

ya āsannaphalo bhāvas svavaśenāvaśena vā ।
sarvabhāvopamardena sa evāgre vilokyate ।। 

śubham astu mamedānīṃ ciraṃ māśubham astu me ।
ākīṭāmaram āśaiṣā kṣīyate na kadācana ।। 

kṣīyate bhāvanaiṣāntaḥ kevalaṃ viditātmanaḥ ।
ākāśaviśadaś śānto jñaḥ pranirvāti śāmyati ।। 

jaḍaś cet tat puro bhāvān mṛtau kāṃścin na paśyati ।
ajaḍaś cet tadabhyastair bhāvair ākramyate avaśaḥ ।। 

evam ākāśarūpo asau jīvas saṃvṛtavāsanaḥ ।
taṃ muhūrtaṃ jaḍāvastho yugaṃ yātaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

abhavaṃ prāg ahaṃ jantur mṛtas tatrāsmi bandhuṣu ।
yugam atra parikṣīṇam abhipaśyati sa kṣaṇāt ।। 

muhūrta eva sañjāte sa jīvo yuganiścaye ।
iha jātu pravṛtto asmi deśa ity avabudhyate ।। 

abhavaṃ prāg ahaṃ jantur mṛtas tatrāsmi bandhuṣu ।
tataḥ kṛtā me svajanaiḥ piṇḍadānādikāḥ kriyāḥ ।। 

tābhir labdhaśarīreṇa mayā sukṛtaduṣkṛte ।
bhukte cirataraṃ kālaṃ jāto asmy adyettham utthitaḥ ।। 

itthaṃ muhūrta evāsau gate pratyayavān bhavan ।
svavāsanānusāreṇa deham ātmani paśyati ।। 

muhūrte suciraṃ kālam aśarīraś śarīrakam ।
cinoti paśyaty abhyeti jīvas svapnaṃ bhavān iva ।। 

aśreṣṭhayā vāsanayā duṣṭātmaphalavān aham ।
duḥkhavān adhamo jāta iti paśyati jīvakaḥ ।। 

pradhānayā vāsanayā pradhānaphalavān aham ।
jātaḥ pradhāna eveti cinoty ātmānam ātmanā ।। 

jīva evam adeho api sadehatvam upāgataḥ ।
deśakālakramaprauḍhaṃ paralokaṃ prapaśyati ।।
