ayaṃ sa paraloko me dharmarājanarā ime ।
ayaṃ nīto asmi neyo ayaṃ mamedaṃ tattvam īhitam ।। 

paralokabhuvas tv etās satyaṃ vacmi purākṛtam ।
pṛṣṭo asmy ayaṃ dharmabhṛtā cchāyeyaṃ mama sākṣiṇī ।। 

sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cedaṃ karma me puratas sthitam ।
ayaṃ nīto asmi gacchāmi svargaṃ narakam eva vā ।। 

evampratyayavāñ jīvo dīrghaṃ saṃsṛtivibhramam ।
sampaśyati kṣaṇenaiva saṃvatsaraśatena ca ।। 

eṣa duḥkhamahāṣaṇḍo vāsanābījakoṭarāt ।
aham ity ātmano vyaktaṃ durjātād upajāyate ।। 

niyojito asmy ayaṃ duḥkhe sukhe vā yojito asmy ayam ।
ayaṃ me vatsaro yāta idaṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam ।। 

etat tad duṣkṛtaṃ bhuktam etās tās svargasampadaḥ ।
yonyantareṣu tiṣṭhan hi sthito asmy aham iha drumaḥ ।। 

sthitāsmīyam ahaṃ vallī sampanno asmīha ṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
gardabho ayam ahaṃ jātaś śuko ayam aham āsthitaḥ ।। 

markaṭo asmīha sampannas sampanno asmīha tittiriḥ ।
ṛkṣo asmīha vaṭo asmīha matsyo asmīhātha kacchapaḥ ।। 

iha varṣaśataṃ tiryag iha varṣaśataṃ tṛṇam ।
prāpnomi mānuṣīṃ jātiṃ naro bhūyo bhavāmy aham ।। 

piṇḍadānādibhir bandhukṛtyais satputraceṣṭitaiḥ ।
kṣīṇaduṣkṛtasampanno bhavāmi puruṣo adhunā ।। 

ayam asyās striyā garbhe mātur asmi niyojitaḥ ।
garbhamāsāṣṭake kṣīṇe pitur jāto asmy ayaṃ gṛhe ।। 

sthito asmy ayam ahaṃ bālaḥ prāpto asmi navayauvanam ।
ayaṃ jarām aham itaś cirād ayam ahaṃ mṛtaḥ ।। 

ityādy anubhavañ jīvo nijavibhramajarjaraḥ ।
uhyate vāsanāvātyāparāvartaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

vāsanābilakallolair vividhāvartavṛttibhiḥ ।
jīvatṛṇyās sphurantīmās saṃsāraikamahārṇave ।। 

jīvaḥ kvacit suṣuptasthaḥ kvacit sthāvaratājaḍaḥ ।
kvacid vyādhiparimlānaḥ kvacid ādhibhir āturaḥ ।। 

sukhī duḥkhī bhavo abhāvo naro nāgo amaro asuraḥ ।
bakaḥ kākaś śukaś śaṅkhas tittirir hariṇo vṛṣaḥ ।। 

bhavaty abhavyatām etya duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam ।
patann āpātaramyeṣu ramate bhogabhasmasu ।। 

aśarīro nirākāras saṅkalpātmāmbarāspadaḥ ।
piśāco asmīti saṃvittyā kvacid dhatte piśācatām ।। 

yad yat sarge yathā rūḍhaṃ tat tathā tu niṣevate ।
jīvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ tajjñam atajjñam api vānagha ।। 

yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācādibhāvanābhramabhedataḥ ।
janmanām atra saṅkhyāṃ na kartuṃ mama samārthatā ।। 

padārthabhāvanāmātrād atiduḥkhaparamparāḥ ।
ahantātmana udyanti satyāsatyaghanabhramāḥ ।। 

evaṃ kha eva jāyante kharūpās saṃsṛtibhramāḥ ।
na deśakālāvaraṇaṃ kurvanty ete manāg api ।। 

anārataṃ sargaparamparāṇām arūpiṇīnām atha rūpiṇīnām ।
jaladravānukramasaṃsthitānāṃ krānto asmi khe khātmatayoditānām ।। 

sargasyākāśarūpatāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yogabhūmikayotkrāntajīvitasya śarīriṇaḥ ।
bhūmikāṃśānusāreṇa kṣīyate pūrvaduṣkṛtam ।। 

purābhūvam ahaṃ jantur mṛto ahaṃ tatra bandhuṣu ।
cireṇehāham utpanna iti paśyaty asau tataḥ ।। 

evaṃ bhāvanayocchūnaṃ jātaṃ paśyati dehakam ।
sarvāvayavasampannaṃ paṅkād iva vinirmitam ।। 

śarīram abhisampannaṃ paśyan procchūnavāsanam ।
paralokam atha sphāraṃ cinoty āśu ca paśyati ।। 

tataḥ katipayaṃ kālaṃ śeṣaṃ duṣkṛtakarmaṇām ।
bhuktvā sukṛtabhogāya yāti puṇyavatāṃ padam ।। 

tatropari vimāneṣu lokapālapureṣu ca ।
merūpavanakuñjeṣu ramate ramaṇīsakhaḥ ।। 

mandāradaladolāsu punnāgagahaneṣu ca ।
pārijātavanāgreṣu ramate ramaṇīsakhaḥ ।। 

santānakavitāneṣu pāribhadradrumeṣu ca ।
kalpapādapakuñjeṣu ramate ramaṇīsakhaḥ ।। 

yogabhūmigatā ye ye mriyante puruṣottamāḥ ।
te kṣīṇaduṣkṛtā mattā ramante surasadmasu ।। 

svāstīrṇakalpatarupallavasaṃstareṣu puṣpāvanaddhamṛduhemalatālayeṣu ।
samyakkriyās surapureṣu sahāpsarobhir vidyādharās suratasārasukhaṃ ramante ।। 

ardhābhyastabhūmikāmaraṇavicāro nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pratyekam evam uditaḥ pṛthaksaṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ ।
sasurāsurapātālalokāntaradharāmbaraḥ ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādyā evam eva gatās sthitim ।
saṅkalpātmāna evemaṃ sargasaṅkalpam āśritāḥ ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādiḥ pūrvam eva manomayī ।
māyeyam uditā mithyā sargatā kalpanātmikā ।। 

yad yad ālokyate kiñcin māyāyās tad asan nabhaḥ ।
antarantarasārātmarambhāstambhā ivoditāḥ ।। 

saṅkalpapuruṣā ete brahmarudrendrakādayaḥ ।
asatyāś caiva satyāś ca cittvācittvair iha sthitāḥ ।। 

bhūtaṃ prati pṛthagbhūtas sargo vikasitas svayam ।
saṅkalpasvapnapuravan manorājyavad ātataḥ ।। 

sarvagatvāc ca ciddhātor mithaś cānubhavabhramāt ।
sargeṣv eteṣu sadrūpās samastā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

sammilanti mithaḥ kecin nirāvaraṇasaṃvidaḥ ।
sargāḥ pariṇamanty anye tv aparasparavedinaḥ ।। 

kākatālīyavat kecit sargās sarge patanty api ।
deśam anyam imaṃ prāptā vayam ity eva bhāvitāḥ ।। 

krameṇānena he rāma te svapnapuruṣā api ।
saṅkalpapuruṣāś caiva satyāś cittvād akhaṇḍitāt ।। 

cidghanaṃ cittvasāratvāc cittvam evāvatiṣṭhate ।
nāsya vighno na vedho asti nānyatā na ca nāśitā ।। 

saṅkalpapuruṣās satyās satyāś ca svapnavibhramāḥ ।
vartamānārthakāritvān neha kiñcid asanmayam ।। 

parasparam alabhyatvād yan nārthāya na vastu tat ।
satyam asmākam apy eṣa deśāntaranaro yathā ।। 

yad yathā yena yatrāsti tat tathā tena tatra tat ।
nātra satye sadasatī tenālaṃ maunavān bhava ।। 

jagat svabhāvato nāsti yac cedaṃ paridṛśyate ।
tat sarvaṃ brahmasattaiva prekṣitaṃ vā na kiñcana ।। 

bravīmy abhyupagamyāpi sargādi yadi vidyate ।
tad etaj jaṭharaṃ brāhmaṃ viddhi tatkacanātmakam ।। 

yathāntar ikṣor mādhuryaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca maricādiṣu ।
tathāntar brahmaṇo dṛśyam ahantādi jagattrayam ।। 

ahaṃ jagad dṛśyam iti śabdārthaiḥ parivarjitam ।
akhaṇḍitam idaṃ satyam idaṃśabdārthavarjitam ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
sato anavayavasyāpi bhāgā bahir avasthitāḥ ।। 

puruṣaṃ prati saṅkalpāt sargo hṛdi vijṛmbhate ।
sādridyūrvīnadīśāṃśaḥ kauśe rasa ivāṅkure ।। 

saṃvit svodarasaṃlīnaṃ khātmakā khātmakaṃ jagat ।
yathābhirucitenāntar bhogenāsvādayaty alam ।। 

na svapne gamyate deśo na deśo hṛdam eti vā ।
na jāgrati bahirdeśo na jāgrad deśavarti vā ।। 

nāntastvaṃ vidyate kiñcin na bahiṣṭvaṃ ca vānagha ।
nākalpanā nāpi ca vā kalpanākalanāsti vā ।। 

saṃvin mukulitātmānaṃ trijaganmaṇḍalīm iyam ।
yat svādayati tasyaitan nāma svapnābhidhaṃ sthitam ।। 

yad ātmānaṃ vikasitā trijaganmaṇḍalīm iyam ।
yat svādayati tasyaitac cihnaṃ jāgrad iti sthitam ।। 

yan na saṃvit svam ātmānaṃ kañcit kālaṃ śramād iva ।
āsvādayati śānteva tat suṣuptābhidhaṃ smṛtam ।। 

nirvāṇe vāpunarbhrāntyai yad ātmānaṃ na vindate ।
saṃvit sthirasamābhāsā tat turyaṃ mokṣa ucyate ।। 

antaś cetanapadmasya jagadgandho asty asau bahiḥ ।
sphurati prasṛte tasminn antarasphuritātmani ।। 

na sargasaṃvidor bhedaḥ pavanaspandayor iva ।
vāta eva yathā spandas saṃvid eva tathā jagat ।। 

spandaśabdārthadhītyāge yādṛśī pavanasthitiḥ ।
sargaśabdārthadhītyāge tādṛśī sargasaṃsthitiḥ ।। 

spandaśabdārthadhīr vāyau kalpitākalanākṣayā ।
sargaśabdārthadhīś śānte kalpitākalanākṣayā ।। 

yat saṅkalpasamutthānaṃ tad asaṅkalpanaṃ kṣayi ।
etac cānubhavāt siddhaṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram ।। 

na sargo asti vid asty acchā sā ca satyeva khopamā ।
vicchabdārthākalpanena tad etad budhyate svayam ।। 

na sargasargaśabdārthamatir astīti niścayaḥ ।
sargasaṅkalpasaṃśāntāv ātmanaivāśu budhyate ।। 

asargapratipattir hi sargaśabdārthavismṛtau ।
sphuṭībhavaty aśeṣeṇa śiṣyate yad anāma tat ।। 

vedanaṃ sargasaṃvittir avedanam asargakam ।
na vedanāvedanayor bhedaś śabdād ṛte asti ca ।। 

sarvasyānantarūpatvāt kva bhedaḥ kva ca bhedanam ।
kva vismṛtir ataś śāntaṃ tūṣṇīm evāsanaṃ śivam ।। 

nirastasaṅkalpavikalpajālam ālānakalpaṃ suciroṣitaṃ yat ।
praśāntaśāstrārthavicārasattam aśaṅkam ādyaṃ śivam avyayaṃ tat ।। 

sarganirvāṇaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

khātmānas sakalās sargās sargātma sakalaṃ ca kham ।
na nabhassargayor bhedaḥ pavanaspandayor iva ।। 

pūritānantagaganāḥ prabhā vyomni gamāgamam ।
na yathā rodhayanty etās tathā sargāḥ parasparam ।। 

milanti na milanty antar yathaite paramāṇavaḥ ।
khe sūkṣmatvād alakṣyatvāt tathā sargāḥ parasparam ।। 

manāg api na bhedo asti militānāṃ yathāmbhasām ।
tathā cidghanarūpāṇām sargāṇāṃ śliṣyatām api ।। 

nīhārāṇāṃ vimiśrāṇāṃ lakṣyante nāṇavo yathā ।
pṛthag jīvair na sargāṇāṃ lakṣyante jantavas tathā ।। 

yathā yāti sarity ambu majjanonmajjanābilam ।
tathā sphurati sargaughaḥ pṛthaṅ miśraś ca ciddhṛdi ।। 

avāyavo yathāmodā miśrībhūtāḥ parasparam ।
na rodhakā na paśyanti tathā sargāḥ kharūpiṇaḥ ।। 

āvartāḥ parivartante yathā rajasi rājasāḥ ।
aspaṣṭogrānile sphāre tathā sargāḥ parasparam ।। 

saṅkalpātmatayānyo'nyaṃ na draṣṭāro na rodhakāḥ ।
nabhasīva nabhobhāgās svaprabhāsv iva ca prabhāḥ ।। 

kecin mithaḥ sammilitā ekatām upayānty alam ।
nīhāreṣv iva nīhārās svaprabhāsv iva ca prabhāḥ ।। 

kecin mithas sammilitā api bhānti vilakṣaṇāḥ ।
ghṛtodā iva dugdhābdhau ratnadīptāv ivārkabhāḥ ।। 

savikāsā yathā svapne merumandarakoṭayaḥ ।
saṃvittattve tathā sargā dṛṣadādyantareṣv api ।। 

saṃvit sarvagatā śāntā sattāsāmānyarūpiṇī ।
sargaśabdārtharahitās sargās tasyāḥ kilodaram ।। 

sthalaṃ jalaṃ nabhaś śailaṃ pūrvam adyādhunākhilam ।
sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ sarvagatvān mahāciteḥ ।। 

saṃvinmayatvād vāryantar api santy eva sṛṣṭayaḥ ।
cittākāśātmikā noḍhāḥ pratibimbānvitā iva ।। 

bhūtapañcakasattāsu sabāhyābhyāntaraṃ sadā ।
santi sargasahasrāṇi na ca santi kadācana ।। 

sarvatra sarvadā sarvaṃ sārvaṃ sarveṇa sarvathā ।
na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā ।। 

na ca kiñcin mṛṣā naiva satyaṃ kiñcin na madhyamam ।
bṛhad brahmāyate brahma śāntam antavivarjitam ।। 

sarvabhāvopamardena bhāvaḥ phalati pīvaraḥ ।
tenātibhāvo jayati śliṣṭayor api sargayoḥ ।। 

jīvaḥ parasparāprāptāv ūnabhāvena sidhyati ।
saṃsāras samabhāvas tu samatāṃ gacchati dvayoḥ ।। 

vilakṣaṇā bṛhadbhāvās samatvān militā mithaḥ ।
vailakṣaṇyena tiṣṭhanti nānāvarṇā iva tviṣaḥ ।। 

nirargalā sargaparampareti vijṛmbhate antaḥ paramāṇudhātoḥ ।
apy antar adrīndraśilāntare ca vahnau jale vākhilavastujāte ।। 

saṅkalparūpādrinadīdineśadikkālakalpasphuraṇākulāpi ।
jaganmahāmaṇḍalapiṇḍapīṭhī vyomodaraṃ cidghanaśūnyadhātau ।। 

nabhaś ca vāsyā udare apy apāraṃ sacandratārādridivākarādi ।
mithas tv adṛṣṭaśrutaśabdasārā kācin mitholabdhaśarīrikāpi ।। 

jagadākāśaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā pustamayaṃ sainyaṃ mahārambham api sphuṭam ।
vidyamānam anantaṃ ca sahasrāṅgāyudhādikam ।। 

svarūpaṃ prati taj jāḍyān nityāsambhavadīhanam ।
arūpālokamananam adikkālakalādikam ।। 

kevalaṃ kevalaṃ śāntaṃ samanirvāṇam ātmani ।
dṛṣṭair anumitair jñātair itareṇa daśābhramaiḥ ।। 

manāg apy aparāmṛṣṭaṃ vidyamānam asanmayam ।
ahamāditvam ādyaṃ ca tathaivākhaṇḍitaṃ jagat ।। 

brahmapustamayaṃ sarvaṃ vidyamānam asanmayam ।
rūpālokamanaskāraśabdārthaparivarjitam ।। 

anyenānumitair arthair muktam ātmani saṃsthitam ।
na ca satyaṃ na cāsatyam ātmany advayatāvaśāt ।। 

rāmaḥ

anyo asti pustasainyānām asmadādir munīśvara ।
asmadādes tu ko anyas syād anantād brahmaṇaḥ padāt ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nāsty eva yas sa no anyo asti brahmapustamayātmakaḥ ।
asann abhyudito mohaḥ prekṣito yo na labhyate ।। 

sa etān asato ananyān dūrād bhāvavikārakān ।
paśyaty unmattako jantur jīvann ātmamṛtiṃ yathā ।। 

sa eṣo aprekṣaṇātmaiva śuktau rajatadhīr iva ।
na vidyate prekṣitas sañ śuktau rajatadhīr iva ।। 

asmābhiḥ prekṣitas tena nūnaṃ nirmūlatāṃ gataḥ ।
anālokaḥ puro rūḍhaṃ vastu neti vilokanāt ।। 

yais tu na prekṣyate teṣāṃ śataśākhaṃ vijṛmbhate ।
asatya eva satyena bālavetālasainyavat ।। 

rāmaḥ

āsṛṣṭikaram ārudram iyaṃ bhrāntir upasthitā ।
tathāpy anantaduḥkhāya kiṃ śubhaṃ jñātayānayā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asan nivartate rāma kṣaṇād eva nirīkṣitam ।
satyaṃ tu vastu kṛcchreṇa kṣīyate naiva vānagha ।। 

avidyā jñātamātraiva śāmyaty āśu na bādhate ।
na vipralambhayaty antar mṛgatṛṣṇāmbudhīr iva ।। 

yad evāsyāḥ parijñānaṃ sa evāsyāḥ parikṣayaḥ ।
śreyase paramāyaiva mitre śatrudhiyo yathā ।। 

parijñātaiva galati lagaty ajñānarūṣitā ।
svabhāvataś ca nāsty eva mithyā yakṣamatir yathā ।। 

nāsty avidyālam ity eva pratyayo jñānam ucyate ।
rūḍhiṃ gatājñe jñe tv eṣā brahma mokṣas sa eva ca ।। 

asat prekṣitam evāsat sat tu naiva nivartate ।
yadāsatyajagadbhrāntis tadaiṣāśu nivartate ।। 

kalpanāmātrasampattir akalpanavilāyinī ।
manassatteva mṛdvaṅgī narāyattabhavābhavā ।। 

puruṣāyattajananamaraṇāyām akhindataḥ ।
yathāvad asyāṃ buddhāyāṃ mokṣa evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

adridyūrvīnadīśādikalpanāmātrakātmakām ।
pītvākalpanamātreṇa nirvāti nipuṇaṃ pumān ।। 

yadi śailādi satyaṃ syāt tat kena vinivāryate ।
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।। 

yathā prasarati spandāc cakravṛndam asaj jale ।
tathollasati saṅkalpāc citkhe saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।। 

nijaspandavaśād ekaṃ śatāvartaṃ payo yathā ।
nijaspandavaśād ekaṃ jagadātma paraṃ tathā ।। 

pravicāritam anviṣṭaṃ yāvac cakrādi nāmbhasi ।
asti nāpi ca sargādi cidvyomni na ca kalpanā ।। 

svayatnamātrasaṅkalpaprāpyau sargāpavargakau ।
ya eva rocate yasmai tayos taṃ so anugacchati ।। 

avittvād apavargatvaṃ vittvāj janmacamatkṛtiḥ ।
vedyam asti ca no satyaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

asad vedyaṃ vinirmāya bhuṅkte ka iva duḥkhadam ।
prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam ।। 

ka īdṛśo asti muktātmā yo vinirmāya yakṣakam ।
tenaiva ghaṭṭayaty ārtaṃ svayam ātmānam akṣatam ।। 

yasmai vā sargavetālasamutthānaṃ virocate ।
ātmanāśāya saṅkalpād utthāpayatu so aṅga tam ।। 

dṛśyaṃ nirmāya draṣṭṛtvam etyātmānaṃ nibadhya ca ।
ya icchati sukhaṃ sa svaṃ vidadhātu yathepsitam ।। 

yathābhūtārthakathane vayaṃ nāma samudyatāḥ ।
śrutvā satyam asatyaṃ tu gṛhṇātu svecchayā janaḥ ।। 

sargārthī sargayuktīho mokṣārthī mokṣayuktimān ।
bhavatv atra mahābāho na naḥ kaścid api grahaḥ ।। 

sargād vyāvṛttasaṃvid yas sabāhyābhyantarātmanaḥ ।
sargāsattāvabodhātmā so amṛtatvāya kalpate ।। 

sargāsattāpratyayena sargasaṃvin nivartate ।
sāhantā samanaskārā śiṣyate yad anāma tat ।। 

suvicāritam anviṣṭaṃ yāvat sargo na vidyate ।
sāhantādimanaskāraḥ kim anyad bhramakāraṇam ।। 

pātālam āviśasi yāsi nabho vilaṅghya diṅmaṇḍalaṃ bhramasi cet tad anātmatātmā ।
bhrāntītaro aham iti nāsti na sargavargas spandetaro anila ivāmbvitareva dhārā ।। 

sargavilāyanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kalanāmātrakāryatvād ime mervādayo adrayaḥ ।
mṛdavo laghavas sākṣāt kauśeyanikarād api ।। 

nisspandapavanākāraśarīrā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
brahmādyā api vidyante piśācapaṭalādivat ।। 

ahorātrātmanī tucche prakāśatamasī tate ।
jantoḥ pavanadehasya cchāyāvihasane iva ।। 

anviṣyamāṇam aprāpyaṃ jagat sphurati khe pare ।
keśapiñchalavabhrāntir ivānirmalacakṣuṣaḥ ।। 

surāsurās sphurantīme chinnavṛkṣapiśācavat ।
paripaśyanti saṃsāraṃ dagdhadehakajīvavat ।। 

niśśvasanti ca bhastrāvad vivartante khadhūmavat ।
cinvanty ardhaprasuptābhaṃ paśyanty udbhrāntam ābilam ।। 

jaḍās sphuranti janatā nadīrayataraṅgavat ।
budhyante anyātmakāś cānyat kokilāḥ kākatām iva ।। 

udyanti sthāvarā bhūmau rayarekhā ivāmbhasi ।
bhāvāḥ pariṇamanty antar jalānīva rayāj jale ।। 

anubhūtaya ātmasthā ikṣor madhuratā iva ।
kṣobhyante vikriyante ca pavanasparśapīḍanaiḥ ।। 

kalanaikātmikā laghvī sakulādrīndramaṇḍalā ।
tulām āropitā bhūmir na bhavaty ardharaktikā ।। 

bhaviṣyadbhūtakośasthaṃ dyauḥ pātālatalaṃ gatā ।
agneś citrakṛtasyeva śaityam evānubhūyate ।। 

adhūmātma nirādhāram avātādisamīritam ।
kham ūrdhvam ambu yāty abhrair bāndhavair iva śikṣitam ।। 

samudrā divi tiṣṭhanti tārakā uditā bhuvaḥ ।
nṛtyanti sabhujāś śailāś saikataṃ tailam ujjhati ।। 

yathā saṅkalpyate yad yat tat tathā na tad anyathā ।
saṅkalpakalanākalpaṃ kiṃ sat kiṃ vāpy asad bhavet ।। 

na sthiraṃ nāsthiraṃ kiñcin na jaḍaṃ na ca cetanam ।
nāhaṃ na tvaṃ na san nāsan na sthūlaṃ nāṇutātatam ।। 

sarvaṃ ca sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā sārvasārvikam ।
kalpanāviśvarūpātma na tad asti na yad vapuḥ ।। 

bālenairāvaṇo baddho dagdhāś candratviṣādrayaḥ ।
saritpravāhalaguḍair yudhyante citramānavāḥ ।। 

suphālakṛṣṭe vitate vyomni vyuptās suśālayaḥ ।
pakvāś ca saṅgṛhītāś ca bhāṇḍeṣu ca niyojitāḥ ।। 

hariṇā hāri gāyanti nṛtyanti vanarājayaḥ ।
padmā dṛṣadi jāyante prasūtāḥ kalabhaṃ śilāḥ ।। 

uḍḍīyante purāṇy uccair bhikṣanti bhuvi bhānavaḥ ।
sānavo nagarāyante gāyanti mṛdu madgavaḥ ।। 

ityādikāpi saṅkalpakalā satyeva rājate ।
anyā satyāpy asatyeva na saṃvittir virājate ।। 

eṣā ca saṅkalpakalā tīvrasaṅkalpakalpitā ।
pūrvasaṅkalpasantyāgāt satyarūpānumīyate ।। 

atas satyam asatyaṃ vā neha kiñcana vidyate ।
yad yathā bhāvyate yatra tat tathā tatra dṛśyate ।। 

iti nāstīdam akhilam asti vā brahmasattayā ।
ākāśātma nirākāśaṃ suptamānavahṛtsamam ।। 

itīyaṃ hṛdayenaiva trijagatpustaputrikā ।
na janyate janyate vā dhāryate vā na dhāryate ।। 

yādṛśena yadā yatra saṃsthānenābhirocate ।
tādṛśena tadā tatra svecchayotpādyate na vā ।। 

ity asmin pelavākāre saṅkalpāyattarūpiṇi ।
svāyatte sadasadbhāvabhrame keva kadarthanā ।। 

svayatnamātrasaṃsiddhir eṣa so aṅga śiśor api ।
sargo apavargalābho vā manye sidhyati helayā ।। 

etad buddhvā buddhimattvān nirāmayamanomayaḥ ।
bhāvābhāvobhayāttas tvam amanomaya eva vā ।। 

iti bhrāntimayaṃ viśvaṃ buddhvā viṣvag asāravat ।
viśvaśabdārthasantyāge niṣṭhāyāṃ tiṣṭha sāravat ।। 

neha satyaṃ na vāsatyaṃ nāvastutvaṃ na vastutā ।
kenāpīdaṃ kvacit kiñcit kim apīva kvacit sthitam ।। 

kā nāma sāsti kalanā kalayāpavargo vācāṃ yayaiti viṣayaṃ viśadāvabhāsaḥ ।
śāstreṇa kevalam asau parivarṇyate antas sambodham eti tu kayāpi nijaikayuktyā ।। 

pariṇativicārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bhagavan bhūmikāmadhyamaraṇoktiprasaṅgataḥ ।
etad uktaṃ tvayā sāram idānīṃ tad udāhara ।। 

paralokagato yogī śubhasaṅkalpasaṃsṛtau ।
bhogān surapure bhuktvā bhūyo bhavati kīdṛśaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tatas sukṛtasambhāre duṣkṛte ca purākṛte ।
bhogakṣaye parikṣīṇe jāyante yogino bhuvi ।। 

śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe gupte guṇavatāṃ satām ।
asatāṃ naiva paśyanti paiśunyābhimukhaṃ mukham ।। 

tatra prāgvāsanābhyastaṃ yogabhūmikramaṃ budhāḥ ।
spṛṣṭvā paripatanty uccair uttaraṃ bhūmikākramam ।। 

tatrodvegamadaglānimohamātsaryavibhramaiḥ ।
dūrojjhitāḥ pratiṣṭhante samaṃ somyā ivendavaḥ ।। 

asaṃsaktadhiyo dhīrā dhanyā dhavalabuddhayaḥ ।
bhavanti bhavabhārasthās tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptāṃśaturyaturyātigābhidhā ।
saptaprakārā brahmātmasatteyaṃ pāramātmikī ।। 

bhūmikātritayaṃ hy etad rāma jāgrad iti sthitam ।
tac ca brāhmam avasthānam anyāsambhavasambhṛtam ।। 

bhūmikātritaye yogī sarvaṃ jāgrad idaṃ sphuṭam ।
paripaśyati saṃsāraṃ pṛthakkāryaśatākulam ।। 

ghaṭāditā ghaṭāṃśādau paṭāṃśādau paṭāditā ।
vaṭāṃśādau vaṭāditvam avasthātrayasaṃsthitau ।। 

yathāvad bhedabuddhyedaṃ jagaj jāgrati dṛśyate ।
udeti yogayuktānām atra kevalam āryatā ।। 

aparāmṛṣṭatattvasya yat padārthaikabhāvanam ।
amlānaṃ tad bhavej jāgrad asad astu sad astu vā ।। 

kartavyam ācaran kāryam akartavyam anācaran ।
tiṣṭhati prakṛtācāro yas sa ārya iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

yathācāraṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathācittaṃ yathāsthitam ।
vyavahāram upādatte yas sa ārya iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

prāptaṃ karmendriyair yāti nāprāptam abhivāñchati ।
harṣāmarṣamadonmukto yas sa ārya iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

prathamāyām aṅkuritaṃ bhūmau vikasitaṃ tataḥ ।
phalībhūtaṃ tṛtīyāyām āryatvaṃ yogino bhavet ।। 

āryatāyāṃ mṛto yogī śubhasaṅkalpasambhṛtān ।
bhogān bhuktvā kalpitāṃś ca yogavāñ jāyate punaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ādehaṃ bhāvitaṃ yat syāt tad dehānte anubhūyate ।
tan muhūrte yugāvasthā kiṃ jīvenānubhūyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
kālatrayavibhāgastham ādyantaparivarjitam ।। 

tad brahmatilatailatvaṃ viddhi brahmavidāṃ vara ।
yathā tile sthitaṃ tailaṃ tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ceṣṭā jāḍyacittve sukhāsukhe ।
itīdaṃ brahmaṇi brahma tile tailam iva sthitam ।। 

māyā jīvo manaś cittam īhānīhā gatir jagat ।
itīdaṃ brahmaṇi bṛhat tile tailam iva sthitam ।। 

tilo antassaṃsthitaṃ tailaṃ yathānubhavati svayam ।
tathānubhavati brahma svasminn evāntare jagat ।। 

cetaty antas tilas tailaṃ kvacit pūrvaṃ kvacit param ।
kvacid alpaṃ kvacid bhūri mlānaṃ śuddhaṃ kvacid yathā ।। 

cetaty antas tathā brahma kvacij jāḍyaṃ kvacic citim ।
kvacic cittādi śailādi kvacid ākāśatāṃ kvacit ।। 

kvacic chūnyaṃ kvacit spandaṃ kvacit kālaṃ kvacid diśam ।
kvacic chabdaṃ kvacic chāntaṃ kvacit tanu kvacid ghanam ।। 

tamas tejaś śubhaṃ pāpam ahaṃ tvaṃ tāni tatra tat ।
deśaṃ tattvam atattvaṃ prāg adya sattvam asad balam ।। 

evam ekam anānaiva nānevāste paraṃ padam ।
daṇḍacakralatākārais taraṅgair ambv ivāmbhasi ।। 

evaṃ sarvātmani tate kvacit kiñcit prakāśate ।
advitīyam anādyante dravatvam iva vāriṇi ।। 

tanmṛtiprasare rāma muhūrtaṃ jaḍatābhrame ।
cirācirapratyayini praśnas te nopapadyate ।। 

pratibhātmani vistāre yad yathā pratibhāsate ।
sa eva tat tathā tena kim ivātra vikalpyate ।। 

kiṃ dravaspandane vārimarutor iva no yathā ।
tayos tadātmakatayā yuktaḥ praśno bhavādṛśām ।। 

brahmātmani tathā sarge sargatāpratyaye kṛte ।
kiṃ bhūḥ kiṃ khaṃ kim āśeti praśnas te rāma nocitaḥ ।। 

etasmāc ca padāc chuddhāl luṭhitānāṃ bhavārṇave ।
bhūtānāṃ sucirābhyastā vāsanaivātra kāraṇaṃ ।। 

yad yathā saṃvidābhyastaṃ śaityauṣṇyādi nijodayam ।
asad eva dvicandrābhaṃ tat svabhāvaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

svabhāvasya svabhāvaṃ svam abuddhvaiva bhramākulāḥ ।
avikalpyas svabhāvo na iti niścayinas sthitāḥ ।। 

asambhavāt pare tattve svatvabhāvadṛśoḥ pṛthak ।
svabhāvo brahmaṇīty uktir amūlā na virājate ।। 

evam eva pravartante iti bhāvā bhavā iva ।
evam eva nivartante ity avṛttiyutā iva ।। 

na jāyate na mriyate kvacit kiñcit kadācana ।
sarvaṃ śāntam anirdeśyaṃ śailotkīrṇam ivākṣayam ।। 

ghanavāsanayocchūne mohe ghanatarātmani ।
muhūrta eva kalpatvaṃ duḥkhitvād anumīyate ।। 

yathā brahmaṇi brahmatvaṃ tathaivaitās tadātmikāḥ ।
nāmaśabdārtharahitās saṃsthitās svānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

vāsanā dīrghaduḥkhāya prekṣitā sā na vidyate ।
nāham ity eva saṃvittyā svayatnena vilīyate ।। 

ahantānubhavo duḥkham anahantodayas sukham ।
dṛṣaddhṛdayatābhāvād alam etad udeti te ।। 

paramaṃ maunam āśritya yathāsthitam avasthitaḥ ।
akhaṇḍam etad āpnoti naro nirvighnam uttamam ।। 

brahmābhidhānāsti śilātivistṛtā tasyāṃ trilokīcirasālabhañjikā ।
sthitā bhavābhāvarayādikātmikā cittānvitācittakakāṣṭhamauninī ।। 

jagadabhāvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

ahantābījasaṅkalpamātram evam idaṃ mune ।
avidyamānam evāti vidyamānam iva sthitam ।। 

evaṃ cet tad vada brahmaṃl loke śāstre śrutau smṛtau ।
dehaḥ piṇḍādinodeti mṛtasyeti kim ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā brahma tathaivāsti sargo ayaṃ niyamānvitaḥ ।
atadanyas tadanyatvaṃ sargatāpratyayād gataḥ ।। 

atra sargādiśabdārtho bhūtādīny upasaṃsthitaḥ ।
bhūtatvaṃ viddhi bhūtānām ahantāmananātmakam ।। 

rāgadveṣātmikā caiṣā kalanā netarātmikā ।
idam evam idaṃ naivam ity ekātmasvarūpiṇī ।। 

soditā sargaśabdārthakalanā mānamāninī ।
brahmādinādipuruṣarūpeṇāhantvarūpiṇī ।। 

idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti niyamena vinā ca sā ।
na bhavaty ātmanaitāvanmātrarūpaikajīvitā ।। 

brahmāditāṃ gatāyās tu tasyās tavamamātmikām ।
na bhavaty anyatā tasmāt svabhāvāt paramātmanaḥ ।। 

tena brahmāditām etya svarūpasthaiva tiṣṭhati ।
nopaśāmyati nodeti niricchatvāt parātmikā ।। 

bhāvābhāvau samāv asyā niṣkalaṅkātmakasthiteḥ ।
tenaiṣāste samaṃ vetti nābhāvaṃ bhavanaṃ na ca ।। 

yadotpannaiva sā saṃvid brahmādikalanāmayī ।
ātmany eva niricchāste śāntānutpannasannibham ।। 

tad evam akhilaṃ śāntaṃ vyomevānantakaṃ sthitam ।
kam apy akalitaṃ kālaṃ nāsmābhis tad vicāryate ।। 

yadā tu sā manassattā prasarantī svabhāvataḥ ।
āste tadā tadākāras sarga ity eva tiṣṭhati ।। 

prasarantyā yathā nadyās svāvartādisvarūpakam ।
tathā saṅkalpasattāyā jagadādyātmakaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

sthitāyās sargasaṃvitter idam ittham idaṃ tv iti ।
iti saṃsthānaracanād ṛte sattā na vidyate ।। 

viriñcatādisampannā yadātmany eva śāmyati ।
idam ittham idaṃ ceti tadā na bhavati kramaḥ ।। 

śāntaṃ sarvagataṃ śūnyam āste brahmaiva kevalam ।
vārīvāvartavat satyaṃ tad asmābhir na carcyate ।। 

yadā tv āśu na nirvāti svātmasattātmakaṃ tadā ।
idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti sargadṛṣṭyā prasarpati ।। 

yat kalpanāvisaraṇaṃ tat sarga iti dṛśyate ।
visārī cakrakavyūhas tailabindur ivāmbhasi ।। 

yad eva sargasaṃsthānaṃ sargasattākaraṃ param ।
tad evettham idaṃ tv ittham idam atyarthajṛmbhaṇam ।। 

idam ittham idaṃ cettham ity āste yadi neha tat ।
katham ūrdhvaṃ bhaved ūrdhvam adhaś cādhaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

pratibhātmani sampanne sanniveśe jagatsthiteḥ ।
brahmādirūpamananaṃ marumārgavṛthāmbhasi ।। 

śabdasparśādayas tasyās sva evāvayavās tataḥ ।
saṅkalpātmāna evāśu sarūpālokavedanaiḥ ।। 

parasparaṃ vivartante payāṃsīva dravaujasaḥ ।
arthas sattām upādatte śabdo artham anudhāvati ।। 

anya ādhāratāṃ dhatte para ādheyatām api ।
prayacchaty ārtavam ṛtukālaś ced ṛtutāṃ vahan ।। 

evaṃ krame vikasite vastusattāniyāmake ।
niyatis sthiratām eti svayaṃ nimne yathā payaḥ ।। 

vedā ity eva niyates tatas te nāma tadgatāḥ ।
bhāvayanty artharūpeṇa niyantritajagatsthiteḥ ।। 

jagatsthiter athākalpaṃ jñānāyāpi ca siddhaye ।
sthairyāya cāśu niyatiṃ te vedā iti kalpitām ।। 

śabdarāśimayīṃ kṛtvā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ ।
dhārayanti cirārūḍhāṃ hṛdy arthagaṇanām iva ।। 

tasyā vedābhidhānāyās sthiter avayavā ime ।
piṇḍadānādayas tena saiva rūḍhim upāgatā ।। 

bhāvitās te yathābhāvaṃ phalanti manasi sthitāḥ ।
pakṣīvāṇḍarasāc cittvāt kālenodyanti santi ca ।। 

śrutismṛtyarthabhāvātmā mṛto bhāvitam agragam ।
sarvaṃ paśyati sadrūpaṃ tac ca tasya phalapradam ।। 

śrutismṛtigatir yena na manāg api bhāvitā ।
sa mṛto moham āyāti ghanam ātmajñatāṃ vinā ।। 

manāg api ca sā yena bhāvitā sa mṛtaḥ pumān ।
tāvanmātraphalaṃ bhuktvā punarjanmani jāyate ।। 

śrutismṛtigatir yena bhāvitā vā na bhāvitā ।
bhāvitā cātmasattāsau mukta eva na saṃśayaḥ ।। 

yac cittabhūmau patitaṃ bījam āśu manāg api ।
tad avaśyaṃ hi kālena phalaty avikalaṃ phalam ।। 

piṇḍādidānasya phalāni loke śrutvā mṛtas san puruṣaḥ purastāt ।
prāpnoti tāny antar avaśyam eva bhuṅkte yathābhāvitam eva cetaḥ ।। 

piṇḍadānanirṇayo nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
saṃvādaṃ daityanāthasya tathā devaguroḥ purā ।। 

atītaṣaṣṭhakalpasya pūrvam ekādaśe manau ।
caturyuge pañcadaśe tretāyāṃ vasudhātale ।। 

āsid daityo balo nāma sākṣād balam ivoddhatam ।
lasaddarpāvadalitadaityadānavarākṣasaḥ ।। 

utsāditāśeṣapuro bhuktāśeṣajanavrajaḥ ।
ākrāntāśeṣabhuvano jitāśeṣasureśvaraḥ ।। 

trailokyaṃ tena nirjitya svīkṛtā vāsavasthitiḥ ।
kṣuṇṇagrāmaṭikevaikā deśe arājani dasyunā ।। 

śakras saparivāro asya bhṛtyatām anujagmivān ।
lokapālāpsarassiddhavidyādharagaṇais saha ।। 

sa pālayañ jagadrājyaṃ hṛtvendratvaṃ śacīpateḥ ।
yathāvad akhilaṃ samyagācāram anutasthivān ।। 

sa kadācit sabhāsaṃsthaḥ kathāprastāvataḥ kvacit ।
naramṛtyukathāmadhye guruṃ papraccha vākpatim ।। 

balaḥ

bhasmībhūtasya śāntasya punar āgamanaṃ kutaḥ ।
paralokopalambhaś ca śarīreṇa vinā kutaḥ ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad deho jīvasya pratibhāsate ।
asatyātmā svasaṃvitteḥ payasīva taraṅgakaḥ ।। 

na tattvato dahyate asau jāyate na ca tattvataḥ ।
na tattvataś ca mriyate duḥkhaṃ cānubhavaty ati ।। 

yādṛgbhāvo bhavaty eṣa jīvas tat phalam aśnute ।
nāsatyatvaṃ na satyatvaṃ kiñcid asyopayujyate ।। 

yayā kayācid yuktyaiva rājan bhāvanabhāvane ।
vinivṛtte kva jīvatvaṃ bandhamokṣadṛśau kva ca ।। 

sadeho ahaṃ hi jīvāmi ciram apy upalabhya ha ।
cetaty ahaṃ mṛto asmīti jīvas svapna ivāvapuḥ ।। 

piṇḍadānādinā bhūyo bhāvitenāśu paśyati ।
jāto asmīti tataḥ karmabhoktāsmīti ca cetati ।। 

iyaṃ mṛtir ayaṃ vyādhir idaṃ maraṇam āgatam ।
idaṃ jīvitam etā me yonayas sukhaduḥkhadāḥ ।। 

ity antaś cetati pumāñ jaladravavivṛttivat ।
abhāvitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca svacamatkārajaṃ ca tat ।। 

jīvitapratibhāso atha maraṇapratibhāsanam ।
anyatāpratibhāsāś ca jīvasyaiva vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

na dehaḥ paramārthena vidyate na ca bhūtatā ।
asad evedam ābhāti sad iva bhramamātrakam ।। 

vedanaṃ viddhi saṃsāram avedanam asaṃsṛtim ।
jīvo yādṛksaṃsṛtis syāt tādṛg eva ca cetati ।। 

etāvanmātrakaiveyaṃ yuktir uktā manīṣibhiḥ ।
anubhūyata evaitat kim etāvati vibhramaḥ ।। 

jīve antar asti saṃsāras tile tailam ivābilam ।
na saṃsārāntare jīvas svapnādāv iti dṛśyate ।। 

kaṭakatvaṃ suvarṇe asti kaṭakatve na hematā ।
avicāraṇayāsty etat prekṣayā neha vidyate ।। 

adhikaprekṣayā kaiścin na hemāpy anubhūyate ।
ato na hema no jīvaḥ kaṭakatvaṃ ca nāṅga sat ।। 

yad antar asti tad rājann antar evānubhūyate ।
manāg apy atra no bāhyasādhanādy upayujyate ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu jīvādi tatsamāś cānubhūtayaḥ ।
vedanāvedanādyās tad yac chiṣṭaṃ tad avāggati ।। 

bhrama evodito mithyā bhramo mithyā vilīyate ।
śeṣaṃ śāntam avāgyogyaṃ yat tad asti na cāsti vā ।। 

ayaṃ mṛto aham asmīti jīvo bhāvitabhāvanaḥ ।
ajāto mriyate anyatra jāto asmīty avagacchati ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyarāśīn svamananātmakān ।
jīvako anubhavaty antar jalaṃ dravarayān iva ।। 

pramāṇātītacidrūparūpatvāj jīvako apy asan ।
tenānubhāvyānubhavau na santau nānubhāvakaḥ ।। 

asatyam eva satyābhaṃ jīvas svapratibhātmakam ।
sabhūmyambaraśailārkaṃ vapuḥ paśyati vā na vā ।। 

jīvaḥ paśyati ced etat tad anarthavijṛmbhaṇā ।
na cet paśyati cātmaiva tat paropaśamaś śivaḥ ।। 

nirastaśāstrārthavicāracāpalaṃ vilīnanānākulakāryagauravam ।
asambhavatsānubhavodbhavabhramaṃ praśāntanirvāṇam aśeṣam īśvaraḥ ।। 

upaśamapratipattir nāma sargaḥ

ekapañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

balaḥ

satāsatā vā jīvena kenāpy anyena vā guro ।
tathā na kenacid vāpi dehenaivātha vāpi ca ।। 

bhāvitaṃ piṇḍadānādeḥ phalaṃ yady anubhūyate ।
tadākartur na doṣeṇa sambandha iti me matiḥ ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

akartuḥ piṇḍadānādeḥ kriyāpīṭhasya sanmate ।
virodhabhāvanaṃ cittāt kva gacchati vadāśu me ।। 

parasparānapekṣitvāt kriyātyāgāt prajāhitam ।
bhavet teneha saṃyogo jāyate mahatainasā ।। 

aham ity eva yasyāsti saṃvit tasyāsti cittabhūḥ ।
yatra yat patitaṃ bījaṃ tad avaśyaṃ prarohati ।। 

jñānād ṛte vimūḍhasya bālasya ca sacetasaḥ ।
satyaṃ samastam evedam ā sarganiyatikramāt ।। 

mṛtena jīvatā vāpi sarvaḥ kartavyatākramaḥ ।
bhāvitas tena sarvatra sa hi sarvaphalapradaḥ ।। 

balaḥ

evaṃ cet tat suraguro na kiñcid yena bhāvitam ।
pāṣāṇeneva manasā sa mukta iti vedmy aham ।। 

bṛhaspatiḥ

na kiñcid bhāvitaṃ yena dṛṣajjāḍye tu tiṣṭhatā ।
sa mukto nātra sandeho muktiḥ kevalataiva hi ।। 

nakiñcidbhāvanaṃ jantor jīvato nopapadyate ।
jñānād ṛte jīvataiva kila kiñcinmayī yataḥ ।। 

yayā kayācid vā yuktyā nakiñcidbhāvanaṃ yadi ।
nūnaṃ rūḍham arūḍhasya tat prāpyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

itthaṃ purā surapure asuranāyakasya rāmaivamuttamavidā guruṇā surāṇām ।
tat te mayādya kathitaṃ kathayānayeha piṇḍādidānakṛtacāru vicārayeti ।। 

balabṛhaspatisaṃvādo nāma sargaḥ

dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vāpy asatāpi satāpi vā ।
cetaseṣad api spṛṣṭam avaśyam anubhūyate ।। 

sadyaḥ kālāntare vāpi sakṛd dṛṣṭaṃ hi cetasā ।
dravatvam ambhasevāntar avaśyam anubhūyate ।। 

kālāntaravisāry antas sakṛd dṛṣṭaṃ dadhan manaḥ ।
vismṛtya tiṣṭhati jaḍaṃ barhyaṇḍarasapiṇḍavat ।। 

vinā jñānāgnidāhena na kadācin nivartate ।
cittāt sakṛdgṛhīto artho nīlīrāga ivāmbarāt ।। 

na cāsty avāsanaṃ cittam akārṣṇyam iva kajjalam ।
jagatpadārthasārthātmā vāsanaugho mano'bhidhaḥ ।। 

na cāsya labhyate sattā cetasaḥ kācid īkṣitā ।
timirasyeva dīpena tadasattaiva śiṣyate ।। 

nātaś cittaṃ na caittādi vidma ityevamātrakam ।
viddhi jñānam anenaiṣā śāmyed bhavaviṣūcikā ।। 

kha evāhantvam uditaṃ śūnyatvam iva tan manaḥ ।
noditaṃ tad iti jñapter manaśśāntyopaśāmyati ।। 

manaḥpraśamanopāyo yoga ity abhidhīyate ।
saptabhūmis tu sa proktas tatra bhūmikramaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

bhūmikānāṃ trayaṃ proktaṃ tava rāma yathākramam ।
bhūmikātritayasthā ye te mahāpuruṣās smṛtāḥ ।। 

nirmānamohā jitasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmanityā vinivṛttakāmāḥ ।
dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasārair bhavanti bhūmitrayam abhyupetāḥ ।। 

cittābhāvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūmikātritayābhyāsād ajñāne kṣayam āgate ।
samyagjñānodaye citte pūrṇacandrodayopame ।। 

nirvibhāgam anādyantaṃ yogino yuktacetasaḥ ।
samaṃ sarvaṃ prapaśyanti caturthīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

advaite sthairyam āyāte dvaite ca praśamaṃ gate ।
paśyanti svapnaval lokaṃ caturthīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

bhede tv aprasṛtaprajñā abhede śāntabuddhayaḥ ।
īṣaccheṣavido bhānti caturthīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

īṣaccheṣātivilayā ardhasuptābhasaṃvidaḥ ।
bālakā iva ceṣṭante caturthīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

bhūbhṛtām iva kāṭhinyam arkaraśmighanopamam ।
paśyanti kalpanāṃśātma caturthīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

īpsitānīpsitānarthair jagad duḥkhe nimajjati ।
tan manāg api nopaiti caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

bhūmikātritayaṃ yāvat tāvaj jāgrad iti sthitam ।
caturthīṃ bhūmikāṃ prāpya svapnābhaṃ dṛśyate jagat ।। 

uttamapratibimbābham avyavasthiti bhaṅguram ।
dṛśyaṃ draṣṭā na jānāti caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptānāṃ yathāvad brūhi lakṣaṇam ।
turyasya turyātītasya mune yadi na khidyase ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

aparāmṛṣṭatattvasya yat padārthaikabhāvanam ।
amlānaṃ tad bhavej jāgrad asad astu sad astu vā ।। 

bhāvinyā kṣaṇavidhvaṃsadhiyānutphullarūpayā ।
asatyapratyayatayā yuktaṃ garbhaniṣaṇṇayā ।। 

jāgrad evānubhūtaṃ yad asatyaṃ satyam eva vā ।
mlānam ābilabuddhitvāt svapnam āhus tam uttamāḥ ।। 

jāgratsvapnānubhavayor avaśyambhāvinoḥ punaḥ ।
kam apy astamayaḥ kālaṃ yas tam āhuḥ suṣuptakam ।। 

buddhatvāc chāntabhedaṃ yad ajāgratsvapnam akṣayam ।
asuṣuptaṃ sthitaṃ svacchaṃ tat turyam iti kathyate ।। 

yat parāmṛṣṭatattvānām apadārthavibhāvanam ।
avasthātrayanirmuktaṃ tat turīyam iti sthitam ।। 

etaddaśātrayaṃ pūrvaṃ sarveṇaivānubhūyate ।
jīvanmuktād ṛte tv eṣā turyāvasthā na labhyate ।। 

samyagjñānavataivāntar avasthātritayakṣaye ।
cidākāśātmanācchena turyāvasthānubhūyate ।। 

videhamuktair yāvasthā turyātītānubhūyate ।
turyasthiticirābhyāsair na vāggocaram eti sā ।। 

na jīvanmuktaviṣayā turyātītadaśā yataḥ ।
tato asyāḥ kathanaṃ nāsti brahmatvād itarat kvacit ।। 

na svapnasuptatājāgratkāraṇaṃ kāryakovida ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptānāṃ param eva hi tiṣṭhati ।। 

jāgrat svapnatvam āyāti buddhiśyāmalatāvaśāt ।
svapnaś ca jāgrad bhavati buddhinirmalatodayāt ।। 

ghanamohatayā jāgrad api yāti suṣuptatām ।
svapnaś cāpi tathaivaiṣa svabhāvo rāma saṃsṛteḥ ।। 

nidrālor apy anidrālo rāghavaitad daśātrayam ।
bhavaty ā turyasamprāpteḥ kramān no tulyakālataḥ ।। 

turyāvasthasya cābhyāsād avasthātritayaṃ śanaiḥ ।
śāmyati prauḍharūpāyāṃ śaradīva ghanabhramaḥ ।। 

turyāvasthāsthito bhūyo nāvasthātrayam eti hi ।
jīvann api ciraṃ bhṛṣṭaṃ bījam aṅkuratām iva ।। 

bhāsurākāram askandhastambhaśākhādalādikam ।
chāyāvṛkṣaṃ jagad vetti caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

arthaśūnyasamārambhaṃ dṛśyamānam asanmayam ।
bāleneva kṛtaṃ paṅkāj jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

nānevaitām anānāttāṃ taraṅgaracanām iva ।
nirvāsanāṃ spandamayīṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagatsthitim ।। 

adṛṣṭam itarācāraṃ śrutaṃ dūre kṣaṇakṣayam ।
ajño deśam ivāpūrvaṃ tajjñas sarvaṃ prapaśyati ।। 

ajihvasvapnakathanaṃ bhāvanānubhavopamam ।
bhramābhramātraṃ vibhrāntaṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

nīhārasadṛśaṃ dūrād dṛśyamānabṛhadvapuḥ ।
nakiñcin nipuṇāloke jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

śaradabhrasamaṃ sphāram āmṛṣṭaṃ san nakiñcana ।
nakāryakāri śūnyātma jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

parāmarśāsahānekarāganirmitamaṇḍalam ।
barhibarhasamākāraṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

avidyamānaṃ bhramadaṃ prekṣitaṃ praśamaṃ gatam ।
trastabālakayakṣābhaṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

vistīrṇam apy anākrāntadeśaṃ paśyati sargakam ।
ākhyāyikārambham iva caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

aspṛṣṭadeśakālāṃśam asatyam iva satyavat ।
mahāravaṃ maunamayaṃ mahārambham apakriyam ।। 

sthūlaṃ karmendriyālabhyaṃ jagat paśyaty asadvapuḥ ।
saṅkalpasainyasaṅkāśaṃ caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

cittabhittigataṃ bhāvi citratantram iva sthitam ।
paśyaty asargakaṃ sarvaṃ caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

indrajālajalādarśapratibimbam ivāsthitam ।
sargaṃ sadānubhavati caturthīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

dravyabhāvakriyehānām ajñatvān mūkatāṃ gataḥ ।
durdeśam iva vikrīto jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

atyantāpūrvasaṃsthānaṃ deśāntaram ivālpadhīḥ ।
aśūnyaṃ śūnyam evāti jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

anūḍham uhyamānātma sthiraṃ calam asac ca sat ।
saridbimbasthapuravaj jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

pratibimbitam ambhodhāv iva nirmajjad eva vā ।
calite śapharaspandāj jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

jātyandharūpānubhavam iva nāsan na sanmayam ।
andhaprāgdṛṣṭarūpābhaṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

masṛṇaikamahābhittau saṅkalpollikhitātmakam ।
citrasainyam ivābhāti jagaj jñaṃ praty arodhakam ।। 

ākāśabhittilikhitam alabdham api vāyunā ।
cittacitrakṛtaś citraṃ jñaḥ paśyati jagattrayam ।। 

dṛśye pataty adṛśye api parayatnāvabodhitaḥ ।
bahir draṣṭaiva nāntar jño hṛdayenāparājitaḥ ।। 

caturthabhūmikopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

catuṣpañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vicchinnaśaradabhrāṃśavilayaṃ pravilīyate ।
sattāvaśeṣa evāste pañcamīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

samastaśabdaśabdārthabhāvanābhāvanātmakam ।
bījāṅkurasamutsedhasattāsuṣamam āsyatām ।। 

anahantādimananaṃ samaṃ sarvagataṃ sthiram ।
avedyavedanaṃ puṣpavikāsasamam āsyatām ।। 

advaitaikyaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ vijñānaikaghanaṃ param ।
ākāśakośaviśadaṃ jñaḥ paśyan na vinaśyati ।। 

bhedabuddhyā purāttānāṃ sampraty advayabhāvanam ।
sthirīkurvan padārthānāṃ samam āste suṣuptavat ।। 

suṣuptaghanavijñānabhāsurāvaraṇakṣayaḥ ।
nāstam eti na codeti na tiṣṭhati na gacchati ।। 

galitadvaitanirbhāsam udito antaḥ prabodhavān ।
suṣuptaghanam evāste pañcamīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

ahantvaṃ cetamānasya na kadācana śāmyati ।
hṛtpadmakośabhramarī saṃsṛtyākhyāviṣūcikā ।। 

amanobuddhyahaṅkāram āvartādi yathā payaḥ ।
saṃvetti deśakālādi tathā brahma jagattrayam ।। 

ahantvaṃ cetamānasya na kadācana śāmyati ।
ahantvatilatailaśrīs saṃsārograviṣūcikā ।। 

ahantvamukulasyāntar yat svaṃ saṃsārasaurabham ।
tad asya savikāsasya bahir dṛśyatayā sthitam ।। 

na yathā padmasaugandhye vyatirikte kadācana ।
ahantvadṛśye na tathā vyatirikte kadācana ।। 

ahantvaṃ svasvarūpasya draṣṭṛdṛśyamayātmanī ।
antar bahir iti svairaṃ kṛtavan nāma nāmanī ।। 

prekṣitaṃ san na cāhantvaṃ nāntar na bahir asti ca ।
māyaiṣā bhāty asadrūpā svālocanapalāyinī ।। 

yad asan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu bhāsate tat parīkṣitam ।
kathaṃ vilāpyate tadvad evāhantādivibhramaḥ ।। 

draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ darśanaṃ ca mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv iti trayam ।
nāsti kasyacid evātaś śāntaṃ śivam idaṃ tatam ।। 

iti niścayavān aikyadvaitātītavapuś śivam ।
samam āste mahāsattvaḥ pañcamīṃ bhūmikām itaḥ ।। 

antarmukhatayā tiṣṭhan bahirvṛttiparo api san ।
pariśāntatayā nityaṃ nidrālur iva lakṣyate ।। 

lokasaṃvyavahāre asmin nāntar na vyomni no bahiḥ ।
ramate atha bhramati vā vyomarūpo galanmanāḥ ।। 

suṣuptavaj jāgrati dṛśyavibhramaṃ tv abhāvayan bhāvaparikṣayodayī ।
cititvam apy antarasaṃvidann idaṃ pratiṣṭhate citranaropamo budhaḥ ।। 

pañcamībhūmikāyogo nāma sargaḥ

pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kurvann abhyāsam etasyāṃ bhūmikāyāṃ vivāsanaḥ ।
ṣaṣṭhīṃ turyābhidhām anyāṃ kramāt patati bhūmikām ।। 

yatra nāsan na sadrūpo nāhaṃ nāpy anahaṅkṛtiḥ ।
kevalaṃ kṣīṇamananaṃ tad āste gatavāsanaḥ ।। 

nirgranthiś śāntasadrūpo jīvanmukto vibhāvanaḥ ।
sakṛdvibhātā vimalam āste dvaitaikyanirgataḥ ।। 

jīvanmukto gataraso nirbhedo ambarasundaraḥ ।
anirvāṇo api nirvāṇaś citradīpa iva sthiraḥ ।। 

avāsanatvād vairasyān na kiñcana karoty asau ।
karoty evaṃsthitir yac ca tatrākartaiva kāṣṭhavat ।। 

samyagdarśanasampanno jīvanmuktapadaṃ gataḥ ।
yathāsthitam idaṃ paśyan karmabhir na nibadhyate ।। 

kurvan na kiñcit kurute gantāpi ca na gacchati ।
bhuñjāno api ca no bhuṅkte vaktāpi ca na vakty asau ।। 

jāgrati svapnadṛṣṭasya puṃsaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛte ।
yādṛśyau tatsthitī viddhi jīvanmuktasya rāghava ।। 

samaś śāntamatir maunī jīvanmukto vivāsanaḥ ।
draṣṭāraṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyam ākāśam iva paśyati ।। 

nirvāṇamatir ātmānaṃ paraṃ cādrim aṇuṃ tanum ।
śvānaṃ brāhmaṇam ādityaṃ sarvaṃ kham iva paśyati ।। 

sampannaś śāntam ābhāsaṃ param ekam akṛtrimam ।
kvāstam etu kva vodetu kīdṛgvapur asāv iha ।। 

prajñāprāsādam ārūḍhas tv aśocyaś śocate janān ।
bhūmiṣṭhān iva śailasthas sarvān prājño anupaśyati ।। 

naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।
na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaścid arthavyapāśrayaḥ ।। 

jale jalam iva kṣiptaṃ brahmaṇy evaikatāṃ gataḥ ।
galitadvaitanirbhāso jāgraty eva suṣuptakam ।। 

carācaram idaṃ viṣvak cetamāno na cetati ।
bhedam astaṅgatāhantvaḥ paśyann api na paśyati ।। 

bhagnasthālīghaṭākāśam iva khe militaḥ pare ।
samām ekām asadrūpāṃ śāntām upagato daśām ।। 

anirvāṇo api nirvāṇo bālavat praviceṣṭate ।
heyopādeyatāmukto jīvanmuktaḥ pratiṣṭhate ।। 

samagragatam apy antā rāgadveṣabhavāmayāḥ ।
nākāśam iva cetante samastā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

saṃśāntāhantvanīhāraḥ prasannavitatākṛtiḥ ।
aśūnyam iva śūnyātma śaratkham iva rājate ।। 

kṣīvatāyāṃ praśāntāyām iva somyatvam āgataḥ ।
bhūtale gāḍhanidras san svargaṃ nīta ivoditaḥ ।। 

ānandaikanimagnatvād anānandapadaṃ gataḥ ।
kevalaṃ jñaptirūpatvād ajñaptir iva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

nirmandara ivāmbhodhir dagdhadāhya ivānalaḥ ।
śāntabhramaṃ cakram iva svātmany eva śamaṃ gataḥ ।। 

tvaṣṭreva yantrollikhitas so apūrvākāratāṃ gataḥ ।
ṛtvantare druma iva sa evānyatayoditaḥ ।। 

upaśāntaś ca kāntaś ca dīpto apy ālokasundaraḥ ।
candrabimbād ivotkīrṇas somya āhlādakārakaḥ ।। 

antaśśūnyo bahiśśūnyaś śūnyakumbha ivāmbare ।
antaḥpūrṇo bahiḥpūrṇaḥ pūrṇakumbha ivārṇave ।। 

vikriyādivinirmuktas santyakto maraṇād iva ।
mahāvyādher ivottīrṇas tīrṇāpūrṇabhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

dīrghādhvaśramakhinnātmā sukhasupta ivākṣayam ।
prabuddha iti nidrālur iva dṛśye prasuptadhīḥ ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śītas tuṣārād iva nirmitaḥ ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ pūrṇa ālokenāmalāmbv iva ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ svacchaḥ kacan maṇir ivātmani ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śūnyo nabhaseva vinirmitaḥ ।। 

nirmanaskatayā jitvā saṃsthitas sālabhañjikām ।
yantrākṛtir iva svairaṃ spandikarmendriyavrajaḥ ।। 

syām ity antar ahantātmasattāsnehaparikṣayāt ।
jīvadīpo vinirvāṇa ātmany eva sa līyate ।। 

nityatṛpto nirānando nirduḥkho nirupāśrayaḥ ।
nissaṅgo nirabhiprāyo jño anīho nāvabadhyate ।। 

nāsya deho na karmādi na dṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam ।
na jīvitaṃ na maraṇaṃ nāsan na sadasan na sat ।। 

kiñcid evaiṣa sampannaḥ ko api vā vā na kiñcana ।
śuddhaṃ vedanamātraṃ vā kiñcid vā jñaptir eva vā ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ nānyad ekam eva padārthavat ।
sthito dūre apy adūre ca prasṛtānantatantuvat ।। 

sa bahvīṣv apy avasthāsu nityaikātmā samo amalaḥ ।
saṃśāntaguṇabhedaśrīr mahākāla ivākalaḥ ।। 

ajam amaram anādyaṃ buddham ādyantaśuddhaṃ śivam amalam ajalpaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntam ekam ।
bahir abahir apīśaṃ jñaṃ vinirmāṇam agryaṃ kam api tam upagamyaṃ sāram ābhāsam āhuḥ ।। 

ṣaṣṭhabhūmikāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahantādehatādyarthaś ciram eva layaṃ gataḥ ।
jīvanmuktasya tenāsau jño api vyomnaikatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

agamyā vacasāṃ sā tu sā sīmā bhavabhūmiṣu ।
saṃsārasarasaḥ pāram apārasyeha sā param ।। 

kaiścit sā śiva ity uktā kaiścid brahmety udāhṛtā ।
kaiścij jñaptir iti proktā kaiścic chūnyam iti smṛtā ।। 

artha ity ūhitā kaiścit kaiścit kāla iti śritā ।
kaiścit prakṛtipuṃbhāvavibhāga iti bhāvitā ।। 

anyair apy anyathā nānābhedair ātmavikalpitaiḥ ।
nityam avyapadeśyāpi kilānyaivopadiśyate ।। 

videhamuktair evaiṣā videhaikāntamuktatā ।
budhyate tādṛśair eva samanaskais tu netaraiḥ ।। 

na sattvasthair na cittasthaiḥ kaiścid evāvagamyate ।
videhamuktatvam ṛte videhā muktateti hi ।। 

asaṃsaktadhiyo ye hi jñatvāt prakṣīṇavāsanāḥ ।
tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikāṃ prāptās teṣāṃ cittaṃ na vidyate ।। 

ajñatve ghanabhāvatvaṃ cittam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
punarjanmāntarakaraṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavabhūruhām ।। 

jñatvāt kṣīṇarasaṃ cittam ajanmamayavāsanam ।
sattvam ity ucyate tajjñais tatsthās sattvapade sthitāḥ ।। 

sattvasthā jñānadahanair dagdhavāsanatāṃ gatāḥ ।
jīvāḥ kṣīṇāḥ prayacchanti na saṃsārāṅkuraṃ punaḥ ।। 

cittasthair atha sattvasthair etair yā nāvabudhyate ।
saptamībhūmikā saiṣā videhā muktatocyate ।। 

etās tā bhūmikāḥ proktā mayā tava raghūdvaha ।
āsām abhyāsayogena na duḥkham anubhūyate ।। 

etāsu bhūmiṣu padaṃ kuru kāraṇajña kāryāntarāṇy avikalāni nijāni kurvan ।
jīvan vimukta iha tiṣṭha ciraṃ tato ante bhūtvā videha uditaṃ padam ekam āssva ।। 

saptamībhūmikāyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptapañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asty anantā sadā mattā mṛdumantharacāriṇī ।
kariṇī vigrahavyagrā mahādaśanaśālinī ।। 

sā cen nihanyate nūnam anarthānarthakāriṇī ।
tad etāsu samagrāsu bhūmikāsu naro jayī ।। 

kariṇī madasammattā yāvat sā na vijīyate ।
ko nāma subhaṭas tāvaj jayet sa marabhūmiṣu ।। 

rāmaḥ

kāsau pramattā kariṇī kāś ca tā raṇabhūmayaḥ ।
kathaṃ vihanyate caiṣā kva caiṣā racitasthitiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāmecchā nāma kariṇī sedam astv itirūpiṇī ।
śarīrakānane mattā vividhollāsakāriṇī ।। 

mattendriyograkalabhā rasanākalabhāṣiṇī ।
manogahanasaṃlīnā svehāvaṃśavihāriṇī ।। 

etayā karmabṛṃhābhir bṛṃhyate pratikānanam ।
dehākhyamadanadyo yās tāsāṃ pravisṛtā iva ।। 

sukhaduḥkhe surabhayaḥ pṛṣatas spandasampadaḥ ।
kallolā eva kallolās taṭau sukṛtaduṣkṛte ।। 

svakarmāṇy urukūlāni śubhāny apy aśubhāni ca ।
bhāvābhāvā bhavāvartā vṛttayaḥ parivartulāḥ ।। 

ūrdhvādhogatayo mattā mūlāgrāṇi mahānty api ।
vilāsagatayo anantā bhavabhūmigamāgamāḥ ।। 

maraṇaṃ bisasañcāro jīvitaṃ phenasantatiḥ ।
mahormayaḥ kriyākārās tṛṣṇā upasaridrayāḥ ।। 

svargaḥ kalamasasyādi narakaṃ paṅkapīṭhikāḥ ।
putradārāś śapharikā makarā bhogabhūmayaḥ ।। 

durgrahā viṣamagrāhā dhanāny upalapaṅktayaḥ ।
paraloko mahāmbhodhir ādhayo vīcimaṇḍalam ।। 

tābhir madanadībhis sā hṛdayāntaracāriṇī ।
icchānāgī nihanty etān kṛpaṇāñ jīvajīvakān ।। 

vāsanehā manaś cittaṃ saṅkalpo bhāvanaṃ spṛhā ।
ityādir nivaho nāmnām asyās svāśayakośagaḥ ।। 

dhairyapadmākaronmāthe prasṛtām arthahelayā ।
nāgīṃ sarvātmikām enām icchāṃ sarvātmanā jayet ।। 

yāvad astv idam ity eva viṣam antar vijṛmbhate ।
tāvad ugrāḥ kusaṃsāramahāviṣaviṣūcikāḥ ।। 

tāvat kārpaṇyamihikā yāvad icchābhramaṇḍalī ।
asyāṃ vyapagatāyāṃ tu bhāti jīvaś śarannabhaḥ ।। 

etāvān eva saṃsāra idam astv iti yan matiḥ ।
asyās tūpaśamo mokṣa ity eva jñānasaṅgrahaḥ ।। 

idam astv iti mūḍhasya durgrahagrahagardhinaḥ ।
kallolāḥ parivartante nadya iva ghanāgame ।। 

icchottānamater nāntar upadeśo manāg api ।
viśrāntim eti makure muktāphalam ivātalam ।। 

prasādakāriṇī svacchā niricche vimalākṛtau ।
tailabindur ivādarśe viśrāmyaty upadeśavāk ।। 

manāg apy uditaivecchā cchettavyānarthakāriṇī ।
svasaṃvidyatnaśastreṇa viṣasyevāṅkurāvalī ।। 

icchāvicchurito jīvo vijahāti na dīnatām ।
upalepakarīṃ vāri mṛccūrṇa iva paṅkatām ।। 

icchācchoṭanacāturyaṃ turyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
tat kāryam āryavaryeṇa yatnenaudāryasaṃvidā ।। 

padam uttamam ajñānām icchācchedena sidhyati ।
pattriṇāṃ pāśabhedena sarvordhvasthā yathā gatiḥ ।। 

asaṃvedanamātreṇa nodetīcchābhavāṅkuraḥ ।
svayatnasādhyenāsekād bījakośād ivāṅkuraḥ ।। 

viddhy asaṃvedanaṃ nāma tūṣṇīm evāntarāsanam ।
etāvanmātrake vastuny aho niravadhānatā ।। 

niṣkarmāstu sakarmā vā puruṣaḥ pūrṇamānasaḥ ।
asaṃvidan sukhādy antaḥ pāṣāṇam iva tiṣṭhatu ।। 

sāvadhāno bhṛśaṃ bhūtvā bhuktaṃ śavaśataṃ yayā ।
tāṃ praty āhārabaḍiśenecchāmatsīṃ naya cchidām ।। 

saṅkalpālānam unmūlya mattairāvaṇalīlayā ।
helayā padam ālambya trailokyavijayī bhava ।। 

nañarthayuktottamamantrayuktyā citā ciraṃ cetitayā hṛdantaḥ ।
saṅkalparūpaṃ viṣam āśu nītvā jarāṃ jayāśeṣabhavāmayāṃs tvam ।। 

icchāmāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

naiṣkarmyāt kalpanātyāgāt tanuḥ patati dehinaḥ ।
katham etad ato brahman sambhavaty āśu jīvataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jīvataḥ kalpanātyāgo yujyate na tv ajīvataḥ ।
rūpam asya yathāvat tvaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।। 

ahambhāvanam evāhuḥ kalpanaṃ kalpakovidāḥ ।
nañarthabhāvanaṃ tasya saṅkalpatyāga ucyate ।। 

padārtharasam evāhuḥ kalpanaṃ kalpanāvidaḥ ।
nañarthabhāvanaṃ tasya saṅkalpatyāga ucyate ।। 

idam astv iti saṃvegam āhus saṅkalpam uttamāḥ ।
nañarthabhāvanaṃ tasya saṅkalpatyāga ucyate ।। 

smaraṇaṃ viddhi saṅkalpaṃ śivam asmaraṇaṃ viduḥ ।
tac ca prāganubhūtaṃ ca nānubhūtaṃ ca bhāvyate ।। 

anubhūtāṃ nānubhūtāṃ smṛtiṃ vismṛtya kāraṇam ।
sarvam evāśu vismṛtya gūḍhas tiṣṭha mahāmuniḥ ।। 

sarvāsmaraṇamātreṇa tiṣṭhāyāteṣu karmasu ।
ardhasuptaśiśuspanda ivābhyastopapattiṣu ।। 

nissaṅkalpaṃ pravāheṇa cakraṃ praspandate yathā ।
spandasva karmasv anagha prāksaṃskāravaśāt tathā ।। 

avidyamānacittas tvaṃ sattvasaṃskāram āgataḥ ।
pravāhāpatiteṣv eva spandasva sveṣu karmasu ।। 

ūrdhvabāhur viraumy eṣa na ca kaścic chṛṇoti me ।
asaṅkalpaḥ paraṃ śreyas sa kim antar na bhāvyate ।। 

aho mohasya māhātmyaṃ yad ayaṃ sarvaduḥkhahā ।
cintāmaṇir vicārākhyo hṛtstho api tyajyate janaiḥ ।। 

avedanam asaṅkalpas tanmayenaiva bhūyatām ।
etāvat paramaṃ śreyas svayam evānubhūyatām ।। 

kila tūṣṇīṃsthitenaiva tat padaṃ prāpyate param ।
paramaṃ yatra sāmrājyam api rāma tṛṇāyate ।। 

gamyadeśaikaniṣṭhasya yathā pānthasya pādayoḥ ।
spando aviditasaṅkalpas tathā spandasva karmasu ।। 

sarvakarmaphalābhogam alaṃ vismṛtya suptavat ।
pravāhāpatite kārye spandasva gatavedanam ।। 

spandasva gatasaṅkalpaṃ sukhaduḥkhāny abhāvayan ।
pravāhāpatite kārye veṣṭitonmuktaśaṣpavat ।। 

rasabhāvanam antas te mālaṃ bhavatu karmasu ।
dāruyantramayasyeva parārtham iva kurvataḥ ।। 

nīrasā eva te santu samastendriyasaṃvidaḥ ।
ākāramātrasaṃlakṣyā hemantartau latā iva ।। 

bodhārkāpītarasayā spandiṣaḍvargasattayā ।
yantraspandābhayā tiṣṭha vallyeva śiśire drumaḥ ।। 

vidāntararasāny eva pravṛttāny api dhāraya ।
svayatnenendriyāṇy āśu hemantartus tarūn iva ।। 

sarasendriyavṛttais taiḥ kurvato akurvatas tathā ।
saṃsārānarthasārtho ayaṃ na kadācana śāmyati ।। 

nissaṅkalpaṃ marujjvālāyantrāmbuspandavad yadi ।
spandase tad anantāya śreyase parikalpase ।। 

etad eva paraṃ dhairyaṃ janmajvaranivāraṇam ।
yad avāsanam abhyastanijakarmasu kartṛtā ।। 

avāsanam asaṅkalpaṃ yathāprāptānuvṛttimān ।
śanaiś cakraṃ bhramābhoga iva spandasva karmasu ।। 

mā karmaphalabuddhir bhūr mā te saṅgo astv akarmaṇi ।
ubhayaṃ vā tyajaitat tvam ubhayaṃ vā samāśraya ।। 

bahunātra kim uktena saṅkṣepād idam ucyate ।
saṅkalpanaṃ paro bandhas tadabhāvo vimuktatā ।। 

neha kāryaṃ na cākāryam asti kiñcana kutracit ।
sarvaṃ śivam anādyantam anantaṃ prāgvad āsyatām ।। 

paśyan karmaṇy akarmatvam akarmaṇi ca karmatām ।
yathābhūtārthavidrūpaś śāntam āssva yathāsukham ।। 

avedanaṃ vidur yogaṃ śāntam āsitam akṣayam ।
yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi nīraso mātha vā kuru ।। 

avedanaṃ vidur yogaṃ cittakṣayam akṛtrimam ।
atyantaṃ tanmayo bhūtvā tathā tiṣṭha yathāsi bhoḥ ।। 

same śānte śive sūkṣme dvaitaikyaparivarjite ।
tate anante pade śuddhe kiṃ kena kila vidyate ।। 

modetu tvayi saṅkalpo marubhūmāv ivāṅkuraḥ ।
icchā modetu bhavato latikevopalodare ।। 

avedanasya śāntasya jīvato vāpy ajīvataḥ ।
neha kaścit kṛtenārtho nākṛtenāpi kaścana ।। 

na karmākarma śānte antaś śāśvatābhedarūpiṇi ।
na karmaṇy api karmāṇi na kartary api kartṛtā ।। 

ahaṃ mameti saṃvidan na duḥkhato vimucyase ।
asaṃvidan vimucyase yad īpsitaṃ tad āhara ।। 

ahaṃ mameti nāsty alaṃ yad asti tac chivaṃ param ।
parāt paraṃ tv idaṃ śivam aśabdam arthavarjitam ।। 

yad dṛśyate jagad idaṃ khalu kiñcid etad dhemno aṅgadatvam iva bhāti na vidyamānam ।
arthakṣayaṃ vidur avedanam eva paścāt satyaṃ tad eva paramārtham athāvaśiṣṭam ।। 

icchācikitsāyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

advaitaikyaṃ vimananaṃ śāntam ātmany avasthitam ।
yathā pustamayaṃ sainyaṃ tathā śivamayaṃ jagat ।। 

mano'haṅkārabuddhyādi caivam eva ca tanmayam ।
kālākārakriyāśabdaśaktisandarbhasaṃyutam ।। 

śivapaṅkamayā eva rūpālokamanaḥkramāḥ ।
tanmayatvād anantatvād ataḥ kiṃ kena cetyate ।। 

mānameyapramāṇādi deśakālau digādi ca ।
bhāvābhāvavivartādi śivapaṅkamayātmakam ।। 

ahaṃ mamety atas sārān netarat paramāmbarāt ।
asaṃsaktamatis tiṣṭha jñaś śilodaramaunavat ।। 

rāmaḥ

ahaṃ mamety asadrūpaṃ jñasyābhāvayataḥ prabho ।
asaṅgaṃ karmaṇāṃ tyāgād anuṣṭhānāc ca kiṃ śubham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

pṛcchāmi yad ahaṃ tvaṃ tat kathayāśu mamānagha ।
yadi jānāsi tattvena karma tāvat kim ucyate ।। 

vistāraḥ karmaṇāṃ kīdṛṅ mūlaṃ tasya ca kiṃ bhavet ।
nāśanīyaṃ ca nipuṇaṃ kathaṃ kathaya nāśyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

yan nāśanīyaṃ nipuṇaṃ tan nūnaṃ pravināśyate ।
mūlakāṣeṇa bhagavan na śākhādivikartanaiḥ ।। 

śubhāśubhaṃ nāśanīyaṃ svakarma khalu dhīmatā ।
mūlakāṣavināśena tac ca naṣṭaṃ bhavaty alam ।। 

karmavṛkṣasya vakṣyāmi brahman mūlāni me śṛṇu ।
yan nikāṣeṇa nirmūlo na sa bhūyaḥ prarohati ।। 

dehas tāvad ayaṃ brahman karmavṛkṣas samutthitaḥ ।
rūḍhas saṃsāravipine vicitrāṅgalatānvitaḥ ।। 

karmabījataror asya sukhaduḥkhaphalāvaleḥ ।
jāgradvasantakālasya suṣuptaśiśirasthiteḥ ।। 

pāvanācārakalikāgucchakotkarakāriṇaḥ ।
kṣaṇatāruṇyakāntasya jarākusumahāsinaḥ ।। 

muhūrtaṃ prati kallolamarkaṭadhvaṃsitākṛteḥ ।
nidrāhemantajaṭharalīnasvapnadalodgateḥ ।। 

svavārddhakaśaracchāntiśīrṇehāparṇasantateḥ ।
jagajjaṅgalajātasya kalatropatṛṇāvaleḥ ।। 

pelavāvayavā hastapādagulphādayo aruṇāḥ ।
pattrāṇi tanuvṛntāni surekhāni calāni ca ।। 

aruṇāḥ pavanālolā mṛdvyo masṛṇamūrtayaḥ ।
snāyvasthidigdhās sarasā aṅgulyo bālapallavāḥ ।। 

mṛdvyo masṛṇatīkṣṇāgrā vṛntarūḍhāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
dvitīyendukarākārāḥ kalikā nakhaśuktayaḥ ।। 

karmaṇaḥ pariphullasya deharūpatayeti hi ।
karmendriyāṇi mūlāni dṛḍhāni granthimanti ca ।। 

sirāsthigranthinaddhāni paṅkamagnātmakāni ca ।
vāsanārasapīnāni nijaraktarasāni ca ।। 

gulphavanti dṛḍhāṅgāni sutvañci masṛṇāni ca ।
teṣām api ca mūlāni viddhi buddhīndriyāṇi hi ।। 

sudūram api yātāni pañcastambhāni tāni tu ।
vāsanāpaṅkamagnāni rasavanti mahānti ca ।। 

teṣāṃ mūlaṃ bṛhat stambhaṃ mano vyāptajagattrayam ।
pañcasrotassirākṛṣṭamuktānantarasadravam ।। 

tasya mūlaṃ vidur jīvaṃ cetyonmukhacidātmakam ।
jīvasya cetanaṃ mūlaṃ sarvamūlaikakāraṇam ।। 

cites tu brahma mūlaṃ yat tasya mūlaṃ na vidyate ।
anākhyatvād anantatvāc chuddhatvāt satyarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām evaṃ vedanaṃ bījam uttamam ।
svarūpaṃ cetayitvāntas tatas spandaḥ pravartate ।। 

mune cetanam evādyaṃ karmaṇāṃ bījam ucyate ।
tasmin sati mahāśākho jāyate dehaśalmaliḥ ।। 

etac cetanaśabdārthaṃ bhāvanāvalitaṃ yadi ।
tat karmabījatām eti no cet sādhyaṃ paraṃ padam ।। 

citiś cetanaśabdārthabhāvanāvalitā yadi ।
tat karmabījatām eti no cet sādhyaṃ paraṃ padam ।। 

tasmād vedanam eveha karma kāraṇam ākṛteḥ ।
etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījaṃ tvayaivoktaṃ munīśvara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asya rāghava sūkṣmasya karmaṇo vedanātmanaḥ ।
kas tyāgaḥ kim anuṣṭhānaṃ yāvaddeham idaṃ sthitam ।। 

yac cetyate tu tenāśu bahir antaś ca bhūyate ।
satyākāram asatyaṃ vā bhavatv āhitavibhramam ।। 

na cetyate cet tad alaṃ bhramād asmād vimucyate ।
bhramas satyo astv asatyo vā kiṃ vicāraṇayānayā ।। 

etac cetanam evāntar vikasaty udbhavabhramaiḥ ।
vāsanecchāmanaḥkarmasaṅkalpādyabhidhātmabhiḥ ।। 

prabuddhasyāprabuddhasya dehino dehagehake ।
ādehaṃ vidyate vittvaṃ tyāgas tv asya na vidyate ।
jīvatāṃ tasya santyāgaḥ kathaṃ nāmopapadyate ।। 

kevalaṃ karmaśabdārthabhāvanābhāvane sati ।
karma karmatvam utsṛjya svayam eva bhavaty ajam ।। 

asambhavati santyāge karmaṇo yaḥ karoti hi ।
idaṃkartavyatātyāgaṃ na kiñcit tena tat kṛtam ।। 

bodhād idantāsaṃvittes svayaṃ vilayanaṃ tu yat ।
jagatas taṃ vidus tyāgam asaṅgaṃ mokṣam eva ca ।। 

vedanaṃ sati saṃvedye sargādāv eva vedyadṛk ।
notpannā vidyate naiva tasmāt kiṃ kveva vedanam ।। 

vedyonmukhatvaṃ santyajya rūpaṃ yad vedanasya vai ।
na vedanaṃ tan no karma tac chāntaṃ brahma kathyate ।। 

cetanaṃ procyate karma saṃsṛtyā pravikāsitam ।
acetanaṃ vidur mokṣaṃ jñaṃ cety evopadeśadhīḥ ।। 

tyāgo hi karmaṇāṃ tasmād ādehaṃ nopapadyate ।
yais tu santyajyate karma tanmūlaṃ tair na mucyate ।। 

mūlaṃ svakarmaṇas saṃvin manaso vāsanātmanaḥ ।
sā cādehaṃ samucchettum ṛte bodhān na śakyate ।। 

rāma kevalam eṣāntaḥ karmamūlakalā parā ।
sūkṣmā saṃvid asaṃvittyā svayatnena nikṛntyate ।। 

yena saṃvid asaṃvittyā svayatnena nivāryate ।
tena saṃsṛtivṛkṣasya mūlakāṣo vitanyate ।। 

acetanākāśam ajaṃ yad ekaṃ tatraivam asti tv idam arthahīnam ।
tad vyomarūpaṃ yata etad evaṃ nirāmayaṃ cetanasāram āhuḥ ।। 

karmabījadāhayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

avedanaṃ vedanasya munīndra kriyate katham ।
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।
yadā tadaiva sukaraṃ vedanāvedanaṃ svayam ।। 

etau vedanaśabdārthau rajjusarpabhramopamau ।
asatyāv uditau viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasas samau ।। 

abodhas tv anayoś śreyān bodho duḥkhāya caitayoḥ ।
tasmāt sad eva budhyasva māsad budhyasva rāghava ।। 

jantor vedanaśabdārthabodho duḥkhakaraḥ paraḥ ।
nyakkṛtya jñaptiśabdārthabodhaṃ tiṣṭha yathāsthitam ।। 

sarvāvabodhāvasare jñaptiśabdārthayor iha ।
nirvāṇodaya ity eva param om iti śāmyatām ।। 

śubhāśubhātma karma svaṃ nāśanīyaṃ vivekinā ।
tan nāstīty avabodhena tattvajñānena sidhyati ।। 

karmamūlanikāṣeṇa saṃsāraḥ pariśāmyati ।
suvicāritam anviṣṭaṃ yāvat karma na vidyate ।। 

cidrūpo bilvamajjo antaś citrās sañjñā yad ātmani ।
karoti tad yathā bilvān na svalpam api bhidyate ।। 

tathā brahmaghanasyāntar anānaivāvabhāsate ।
nāneva nanu tasmāt tan na manāg api bhidyate ।। 

na yathā sanniveśo antas sanniveśavataḥ pṛthak ।
tathā nañarthādi pṛthaṅ na parasmān manāg api ।। 

yad evāntas tad evāntar dravatvam apṛthag yathā ।
vittvam eva tathāvittvaṃ tadrūpatvān nañarthayoḥ ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathālokaś ca tejasi ।
tathā brahmaṇy atadbhāvaś city acittvaṃ na vidyate ।। 

cetanaṃ karma tac cāntar nirmūlaṃ bhramayakṣavat ।
udety ahetukaṃ tac cen noditaṃ tan na vidyate ।। 

cetanaṃ karma tac caitad bhāti spanda ivānile ।
ahetukaṃ yadātmaitad bahir antaś ca sārthadhīḥ ।। 

vistāraḥ karmaṇāṃ dehas so ahantātmā sa saṃsṛtiḥ ।
acetanānahantvena śāmyaty aspandavātavat ।। 

avedanād anantātmā bhūtvā jño apy upalopamaḥ ।
saṃsāre mūlakaṣaṇaṃ kuru kroḍamukhāgravat ।। 

karmabījakalākośatyāga evaṃ kṛto bhavet ।
nānyathā rāghavātas te śāntam astu sadā sthitam ।। 

karmabījakalātyāge tv etasmād itarātmani ।
avidyamāne jīvasya tajjñair viditavastubhiḥ ।। 

śāntair na gṛhyate kiñcin na ca santyajyate api ca ।
tyāgādāne na jānanti te atas taiś śāntam āsyate ।। 

ākāśaśūnyahṛdayair jñair yathāsthitam āsyate ।
kriyate ca yathāprāptaṃ nāsyate kriyate na ca ।। 

pravāhāpatitaspandaṃ spandante śāntacetasām ।
teṣāṃ karmendriyāṇy evam ardhasaṃsuptabālavat ।। 

rase nirvāsane labdharasā apy atinīrasāḥ ।
nāntas tiṣṭhanti na bahir jñā ajñā nipuṇā iva ।। 

karmaṇo avedanaṃ tyāgas sa ca siddhaḥ prabodhataḥ ।
avastunetareṇātha kiṃ kṛtenākṛtena vā ।। 

avedanam asaṃvedyaṃ yad avāsanam āsitam ।
śāntaṃ samam anullekhaṃ sa karmatyāga ucyate ।। 

apunassmaraṇaṃ samyak ciravismṛtakarma yat ।
sthitaṃ stambhodarasamaṃ sa karmatyāga ucyate ।। 

atyāgaṃ tyāgam iti ye kurvate vyarthabodhinaḥ ।
teṣām avaṭalagnānāṃ vidhis trāṇaṃ kariṣyati ।। 

karmatyāgam akṛtvaivam ardhaṃ ye karma kurvate ।
sā bhuṅkte tān paśūn ajñān karmatyāgapiśācikā ।। 

samūlakarmasantyāgenaiva ye śāntam āsthitāḥ ।
naiva teṣāṃ kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana ।। 

samūlam alam uddhṛtya karmabījakalām iti ।
nityam ekasamādhānās tajjñās tiṣṭhanty alaṃ sukham ।। 

pravāhāpatite kārye īṣatspandā atanmayāḥ ।
ghūrṇamānā iva kṣīvā yantrasañcāritā iva ।। 

mokṣalakṣmyā vilāsinyā vyasanopahatā iva ।
ardhasuptaprabuddhābhāḥ kām apy avagatiṃ gatāḥ ।। 

yat samūlaṃ parityaktaṃ tat tyaktam iti kathyate ।
amūlakāṣas tyāgo yas sa śākhālavanopamaḥ ।। 

akṛṣṭamūlaś śākhāgravilūnaḥ karmapādapaḥ ।
punaś śākhāsahasreṇa duḥkhāya parivardhate ।। 

avedanātmanānena karmatyāgo aṅga sidhyati ।
krameṇa netareṇāta etad evāharan bhava ।। 

ye tv evaṃ karmasantyāgam akṛtvānyatpravartitāḥ ।
atyāgaṃ tyāgarūpātma gaganaṃ mārayanti te ।। 

bodhātmakatayā karmatyāgas sampadyate svayam ।
dagdhabījā niricchoccair akriyaiva bhavet kriyā ।। 

buddhīndriyehitaṃ karma saphalaṃ rasabhāvanāt ।
veṣṭitatyaktadāmnīva spando anyo niṣphalo aṅgajaḥ ।। 

karmatyāge sthite bodhāj jīvanmukto vivāsanaḥ ।
gehe tiṣṭhatv araṇye vā śāmyatv abhyetu vodayam ।। 

geham evopaśāntasya vijanaṃ dūrakānanam ।
aśāntasyāpy araṇyānī vijanā sajanā purī ।। 

pariśāntamater jñasya svapne apy aprāptamānavā ।
nirmalā vitatā hṛdyā hṛd eva vanabhūmikā ।। 

jñasya nirvāṇadṛśyasya niṣpadārthā manomayī ।
śāntāśeṣaviśeṣārthā jagad eva mahāṭavī ।। 

anantasaṅkalpavato hṛdayodyajjagatsthiteḥ ।
hṛdy evāvartate bhūmir ajñasyākhilasāgarā ।। 

ghanasyājñasya dīnasya vividhadvandvasaṅkaṭā ।
sārambhā vipulākārā hṛdy eva grāmamaṇḍalī ।। 

vividhakāryavikāradaśāmayī sapurapattanaparvatamaṇḍalā ।
makurakośa iva pratibimbitā hṛdi bhavaty amalā maline mahī ।। 

dṛśyopaśamopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sāhantādijagacchāntau bodhe saṃvitkalātmani ।
dīpasaṃśāntisaṅkāśas tyāgas sidhyati nānyathā ।। 

na tyāgaḥ karmasantyāgo bodhas tyāga iti smṛtaḥ ।
ajagatpratibhaikātmā yo anahantādir avyayaḥ ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me iti nissnehadīpavat ।
śānte paramanirvāṇaṃ prabodhātmaiva śiṣyate ।। 

ayaṃ so aham idaṃ tan me śāntam ity eva yasya no ।
na jñānaṃ tasya no śāntir na tyāgo na ca nirvṛtiḥ ।। 

mamedam ayam evāham ity etāvati yaḥ kṣayaḥ ।
bodhātmā śivaṃ śāntaṃ tu tasmād anyan na vidyate ।। 

ahamaṃśe citā kṣīṇe sarvam eva kṣayaṃ gatam ।
na kiñcic ca kvacit kṣīṇaṃ nirvāṇaikaghanaṃ sthitam ।। 

ahaṃvid anahaṃvittvād eva śāmyaty avighnataḥ ।
etāvanmātrasādhyeyaṃ kim eveyaṃ kadarthanā ।। 

ahaṃ nāham iti bhrāntir na ca vittvād ṛte asti sā ।
vittvaṃ cākāśaviśadam ataḥ kvaiṣā bhramasthitiḥ ।। 

na bhramo bhramaṇaṃ naiva na bhrāntir bhramako asti vā ।
anālokanam evedam ālokān nedam asti te ।। 

viddhi vinmātram evedam asadrūpopamaṃ tatam ।
om alaṃ maunam āssvaivaṃ sarvaṃ nirvāṇamātrakam ।। 

yenaivāśu nimeṣeṇa tv aham ity eva cetati ।
tenaiva nāham ity eva cetitvāśu na śocyate ।। 

ahambhāvaṃ nañarthena nirvāpyārūḍhabāṇavat ।
ajasram āsavakṣīvas tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhatatpadaḥ ।। 

sanañarthām ahantāṃ tvaṃ cetann evam anāratam ।
sarvabhāvair anārūḍho bhava tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

svabhāvamātrāvajaye svayaṃ yasya na vīratā ।
tasyottamapadaprāptau paśor brūhi kathaiva kā ।। 

ṣaḍvargo nirjitaḥ pūrvaṃ yenottamavidā svataḥ ।
bhājanaṃ sa prakarṣāṇāṃ netaro naragardabhaḥ ।। 

yasya svāntar manovṛttir jīyamānā jitātha vā ।
viṣayas sa vivekānāṃ sa pumān iti kathyate ।। 

artho dṛṣad ivāmbhodhau yo ya āpatati tvayi ।
tasmād eva palāyyāssva nāham ity eva bhāvanāt ।। 

nāham asmīti buddhvāpi sopapattikam apy alam ।
jñānāj jño jñaptimātraṃ ca kim ajña iva muhyasi ।। 

na jñe ahamarthatāstīha hemnīva kaṭakāditā ।
bhrāntimātrād ṛte sā ca śāmyaty asmaraṇena te ।। 

yo yo bhāva udety antas tvayi spanda ivānile ।
nāham asmīti cidvṛttyā tam anādhāratāṃ naya ।। 

lobho lajjā mado moho yenādāv iti no jitāḥ ।
nirarthakam anarthe asmin sa kimarthaṃ pravartate ।। 

ahantvaṃ pavane spanda iva yat tvayi saṃsthitam ।
paramātmani tan nānyad etat spanda ivānile ।। 

asargasaṃvidā sargaḥ pare astīti virājate ।
sanniveśaviśeṣeṇa durartho api hi śobhate ।। 

paramātmā tu nodeti nāstaṃ yāti kadācana ।
na cāsmād anyad astīti ko bhāvo abhāva eva vā ।। 

paraṃ pare parāpūrṇaṃ śānte śāntaṃ śivaś śive ।
ityevamātraṃ vitataṃ nāhaṃ na ca jagan na dhīḥ ।। 

anirvāṇaṃ vinirvāṇe śānte śāntaṃ śive śivam ।
nirvāṇam api nirvāṇe sanañarthaṃ na vāpi tat ।। 

śastrāghātāḥ prasahyante sahyante vyādhivedanāḥ ।
nāham ityevamātrasya sahane kā kadarthanā ।। 

jagatpadārthasārthānām aham ity aṅkuro akṣayaḥ ।
tasmin nirmūlatāṃ nīte jagan nirmūlatāṃ gatam ।। 

bāṣpeṇevāhamarthena nissāreṇāpi sāravān ।
śyāmalaḥ paramādarśas tacchāntau samprasīdati ।। 

ahamarthaḥ pare vāyau spandas tatpraśame tu tat ।
anirdeśyam anābhāsam anantam ajam avyayam ।। 

ahamarthaḥ puro dravyapratibimbakaraḥ pare ।
ratne tadvilayād āste tadarāgam abimbanam ।। 

ahamarthaḥ puro dravyapratibimbapradaś citi ।
tacchāntau sā nirābhāsā paramā kevalāyate ।। 

ahamarthāmbude kṣīṇe paramārthaśarannabhaḥ ।
parayānantayā lakṣmyā svacchayācchaṃ virājate ।। 

ahamarthamalonmuktam ahantātāmram aṅga cet ।
tad paraṃ paramābhāsaṃ sampannaṃ hemakāntimat ।। 

yathā nirabhidhārthaśrīr bhajaty avyapadeśyatām ।
tathānahantāhanteyaṃ brahmatvam adhigacchati ।। 

saty ahantve sthitaṃ brahma sanāmeva padārthavat ।
śāntavat sad ivāsadvat tadvat savyapadeśavat ।। 

ahamartho jagadbījaṃ yadi dagdham abhāvanāt ।
tad ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad bandha ityādeḥ kalanaiva kā ।। 

sad brahma śivam ātmeti pare nāmakalaṅkitā ।
udety ahantā kumbhatvād iva mṛddhātuvismṛtiḥ ।। 

ahamarthād iyaṃ bījāt sattā viṣalatotthitā ।
yasyāṃ jaganty anantāni phalāny āyānti yānti ca ।। 

sādridyūrvīnadīśeyaṃ rūpālokaiṣaṇādikā ।
ahamarthasya maricabījasyāntaś camatkṛtiḥ ।। 

dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ ।
ity āmodo ahamarthograkusumasya vikāsinaḥ ।। 

ahamarthaḥ pravisṛtaḥ prakaṭīkurute jagat ।
sadrūpālokamananaṃ pravṛtta iva vāsaraḥ ।। 

pravṛttena dinenābhā prakaṭīkriyate yathā ।
asaj jagad ahantvena kṣaṇān nirmīyate tathā ।। 

aham ity arthadustailalavo brahmaṇi vāriṇi ।
prasṛto yat tad āśv etat trijagaccakrikaṃ sthitam ।। 

unmeṣamātreṇāhantā jaganty anubhavaty aho ।
na nimeṣeṇa dṛg iva satyānīty apy asanty alam ।। 

ahamarthe pravisṛte saṃsāro hy anubhūyate ।
nāntarlayaparikṣīṇe locanasyeva tārake ।। 

ahamaṃśe niraṃśatvaṃ nīte śāśvatasaṃvidā ।
śāmyatīyam aśeṣeṇa saṃsāramṛgatṛṣṇikā ।। 

svasaṃvidbhāvanāmātrasādhye asmin varavastuni ।
siddhamātrātmani svairaṃ mā khedaṃ gaccha mā bhramīḥ ।। 

svayatnamātrasaṃsādhyād asahāyādisādhanāt ।
anahaṃvedanān nānyac chreyaḥ paśyāmi te anagha ।। 

vismṛtyāhantvam āssva pravisṛtavibhavo bhūṣitāśeṣaviśvo viṣvakśailāntarikṣakṣitijaladhimarunmārgarūpo amalātmā ।
svasthaś śānto viśokaḥ karaṇamalakalāvarjito niṣprapañco nissañcāraś carātmā sakalam asakalaṃ ceti siddhāntasāraḥ ।। 

ahantānirāso nāma sargaḥ

dviṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svabhāvam avajityādāv indriyāṇāṃ sacetasām ।
pravartate viveke yas sarvaṃ tasyāśu sidhyati ।। 

svabhāvamātraṃ yenāntar na jitaṃ dagdhabuddhinā ।
tasyottamapadaprāptis sikatātailadurlabhā ।। 

śuddhe alpo apy upadeśo hi nirmalādarśatailavat ।
lagaty uttānacitte tu nādarśa iva mauktikam ।। 

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
mama pūrvaṃ bhusuṇḍena kathitaṃ merumūrdhani ।। 

purā bhusuṇḍaḥ kasmiṃścit pṛṣṭa āsīt kathāntare ।
mayā kadācid ekānte meroś śikharakoṭare ।। 

mugdhabuddhim anātmajñaṃ kañcit tvaṃ cirajīvitam ।
smarasīti mayā pṛṣṭenoktaṃ tenedam aṅga me ।। 

bhusuṇḍaḥ

āsīd vidyādharaḥ pūrvam anātmajñas sukhocitaḥ ।
lokālokottare śṛṅge śuṣka āryo avicāravān ।। 

tapasā bahurūpeṇa yamena niyamena ca ।
akṣīṇāyur vyatiṣṭhat sa purā kalpacatuṣṭayam ।। 

tataś caturthe kalpānte vivekas tasya tūdabhūt ।
viḍūrasyeva vaiḍūryam aucityāj jaladodayāt ।। 

punarmṛtiḥ punarjanma jarā ceti vicārayan ।
lajje ahaṃ tat kim ekaṃ syāt sthiram ity avamṛśya saḥ ।। 

samājagāma sampraṣṭum aṣṭāpadamayīṃ purīm ।
svām upojjhya viraktātmā saṃsārārasatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

sa matsamīpam āgatya kṛtodāranamaskṛtiḥ ।
matpūjito avasarata uvācedam aninditam ।। 

vidyādharaḥ

mṛdūni paritāpena dṛṣaddṛḍhamalāni ca ।
chede bhede ca dakṣāṇi śastrāṅgānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

paryākulāni malināni vipatpradāni duḥkhormimanti guṇakānanapāvakatvāt ।
hārdāndhakāragahanāni tamomayāni jitvendriyāṇi sukham emi hi kiṃ mamārthaiḥ ।। 

vidyādharapraśno nāma sargaḥ

triṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vidyādharaḥ

yad udāram anāyāsaṃ kṣayātiśayavarjitam ।
padaṃ pāvanam ādyantarahitaṃ tad vadāśu me ।। 

etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ supta āsaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ ।
idānīṃ samprabuddho asmi prasādād ātmano mune ।। 

manomahāmayottabdhaṃ lubdham ajñānavṛttiṣu ।
mām uddhara durantehaṃ mohād aham iti sthitāt ।। 

śrīmaty api patanty āśu śātanotkā durādhayaḥ ।
guṇavaty agrapattre hi tuhinānīva paṅkaje ।। 

jāyante ca mriyante ca kevalaṃ jīrṇajantavaḥ ।
na dharmāya na mokṣāya maṣakā iva paṅkaje ।। 

bhāvais tair eva tair eva tucchalābhaviḍambanaiḥ ।
cireṇa parikhinnās smo vipralabdhāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

nāṇum apy avagacchāmi viśrāntiṃ śrāntamānasaḥ ।
prabhraman bhogabhaṅgeṣu marubhūmiṣv ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

āpātamadhurārambhā bhaṅgurā bhavahetavaḥ ।
acireṇa vikāriṇyo bhīṣaṇā bhogabhūmayaḥ ।। 

mānāvamānaparayā durahaṅkārakāntayā ।
na rame vāmayā tāta hatavidyādharaśriyā ।। 

dṛṣṭāś caitrarathodyānabhuvaḥ kusumakomalāḥ ।
kalpavṛkṣalatādattasamastavibhavaśriyaḥ ।। 

vihṛtaṃ merukuñjeṣu vidyādharapureṣu ca ।
vimānavaramālāsu vātaskandhasthalīṣu ca ।। 

viśrāntaṃ surasenāsu kāntābhujalatāsu ca ।
hārihāravilāsāsu lokapālapurīṣu ca ।। 

na kiñcid ucitaṃ sādhu sarvam ādhiviṣoṣmaṇā ।
dagdhaṃ bhasmāyate tāta vijñātam adhunā mayā ।। 

rūpālokanalolena vanitānanagṛdhnunā ।
sāvabhāsena doṣāya duḥkhaṃ nīto asmi cakṣuṣā ।। 

idaṃ guṇāvahaṃ nedam iti muktvā vikalpanam ।
rūpamātrānusāritvād avastuny api dhāvati ।। 

tāvad āyāti viratiṃ na śaṭhaṃ yāvad āpadam ।
nānītavat parāṃ cetaḥ parānarthehitonmukham ।। 

ghrāṇam etad anarthāya dhāvac caivābhitas sphuṭam ।
na nivārayituṃ tāta śaknomīha hayaṃ yathā ।। 

gandhodakapraṇālena sukhaduḥkhānupātinā ।
vairiṇevātidoṣeṣu ghrāṇenāsmi niyojitaḥ ।। 

ciraṃ rasanayā cāham anayā nayahīnayā ।
gardhagomāyugupteṣu duḥkhādriṣv alam āhataḥ ।। 

niṣeddhuṃ na ca śaknomi sparśalampaṭatāṃ tvacaḥ ।
grīṣmakālasamiddhasya tāpam aṃśumato yathā ।। 

śubhaśabdarasārthinyo mune śravaṇaśaktayaḥ ।
māṃ yojayanti viṣame tṛṇecchā hariṇaṃ yathā ।। 

praṇatāḥ priyakāriṇyaḥ prahvabhṛtyasamīritāḥ ।
vādyageyaravonmiśrāś śubhaśabdaśriyaś śrutāḥ ।। 

śriyas striyo diśaś caiva taṭyaś cāmbhodhibhūbhṛtām ।
dṛṣṭā vibhramahāriṇyaḥ prakvaṇanmaṇibhūṣaṇāḥ ।। 

ciram āsvāditās svādu camatkāramanoramāḥ ।
prahvakāntājanānītāṣ ṣaḍrasā guṇaśālinaḥ ।। 

kauśeyakāminīhārakusumāstaraṇānilāḥ ।
nirvighnam abhitas spṛṣṭā bhṛśam ābhogabhūmiṣu ।। 

vadhūmukhauṣadhīpuṣpasamālambhanabhūmayaḥ ।
anubhūtā mune gandhā mandānilasamīritāḥ ।। 

śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā spṛṣṭaṃ bhuktaṃ ghrātaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
tatrāpi hi na tṛptās smo dhig ajñānavijṛmbhitaṃ ।। 

etāvanmātrasāre asmin saṃsāre vyastavigrahe ।
saṃśuṣkavirase bhūyaḥ kiṃ bhajāmi vadāśu me ।। 

bhuktvā varṣasahasrāṇi durbhogapaṭalīm imām ।
ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ na tṛptir upajāyate ।। 

sāmrājyaṃ suciraṃ kṛtvā tathā bhuktvā vadhūgaṇam ।
bhaṅktvāpy arigaṇān uccaiḥ kim apūrvam avāpyate ।। 

yeṣāṃ dināśanaṃ nāsīd yair bhuktaṃ bhuvanatrayam ।
te api te apy acireṇaiva samaṃ bhasmatvam āgatāḥ ।। 

prāptena yena no bhūyaḥ prāptavyam avaśiṣyate ।
tatprāptau yatnam ātiṣṭhet kaṣṭayāpi hi ceṣṭayā ।। 

yena kāntāś ciraṃ bhuktā bhogās tasyeha jantubhiḥ ।
dṛṣṭo na kasyacin mūrdhni tarur vyomaplavaś ca vā ।। 

ciram etāsu dūrāsu viṣayāraṇyarājiṣu ।
indriyair vipralabdho asmi dhūrtabālair ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

adya tv ete parijñātā mayā svaviṣayārayaḥ ।
kaṣṭā indriyanāmāno vañcayanti na māṃ punaḥ ।। 

saṃsāre jaṅgale śūnye mugdhaṃ naramṛgaṃ śaṭhāḥ ।
āśvāsyāśvāsya nighnanti viṣayendriyalubdhakāḥ ।। 

viṣamāśāviṣair ebhir viṣayendriyapannagaiḥ ।
ye na daṣṭā na dṛṣṭās te dvitrā eva jagaty api ।। 

bhogabhīmebhavalitāṃ tṛṣṇātaralavāgurām ।
lobhograkaravālāḍhyāṃ kopakuntakulāṅkitām ।। 

dvandvajālarathavyāptām ahaṅkārānupālitām ।
ceṣṭāturaṅgamākīrṇāṃ kāmakolāhalākulām ।। 

śarīrasīmāntagatāṃ durindriyapatākinīm ।
ye jetum udyatās tāta ta eveha hi sadbhaṭāḥ ।। 

susādhyaḥ karaṭodbhedo mattairāvaṇadantinaḥ ।
notpathapratipannānāṃ svendriyāṇāṃ vinigrahaḥ ।। 

pauruṣasya mahattvasya sattvasya mahataś śriyaḥ ।
indriyākramaṇaṃ sādho sīmānto mahatām iha ।। 

tāvad uttamatām eti pumān api divaukasām ।
kṛpaṇair indriyair yāvan na svair eva nipīḍyate ।। 

yāvaj jitendriyo jantus tāvan merur ivonnataḥ ।
jitaś ced indriyair yāti tṛṇād apy apakṛṣṭatām ।। 

jitendriyā mahāsattvā ye ta eva narā bhuvi ।
śeṣān aham imān manye māṃsayantragaṇāṃś calān ।। 

manassenāpates senām imam indriyapañcakam ।
jetuṃ ced asti me yatno jayāmi tad alaṃ mune ।। 

indriyottamarogāṇāṃ bhogāśāvarjanād ṛte ।
nauṣadhāni na tīrthāni na ca mantrāḥ praśāntaye ।। 

nīto asmi paramaṃ khedam abhidhāvadbhir indriyaiḥ ।
eka eva mahāraṇye taskaraiḥ pathiko yathā ।। 

paṅkavanty aprasannāni madgudaurbhāgyavanti ca ।
gandhiśevālatucchāni palvalānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

duratikramaṇīyāni nīhāragahanāni ca ।
jīvitānantajālāni jaṅgalānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

paṅkajāni sarandhrāṇi sudurlakṣyaguṇāni ca ।
granthimanti jaḍāṅgāni mṛṇālānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

rūkṣāṇi ratnalubdhāni kallolavalitāni ca ।
durgrahagrāhaghorāṇi kṣārāmbūnīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

bāndhavodvegadāyīni dehāntaraparāṇi ca ।
karuṇākrandakārīṇi maraṇānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

avivekiṣv amitrāṇi mitrāṇi ca vivekiṣu ।
gahanātataśūnyāni kānanānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

ghanāsphoṭāny asārāṇi malināni jaḍāni ca ।
vidyutprakāśāny etāni mahābhrāṇīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

kṣudraprāṇigṛhītāni varjitāni kṛtātmabhiḥ ।
rajastamo'bhibhūtāni svendriyāṇy avaṭāni ca ।। 

pātanaikāntadakṣāṇi doṣāśīviṣavanti ca ।
rūkṣakaṇṭakalagnāni śvabhrāgrāṇīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

ātmambharīṇy anāryāṇi sāhasaikaratāni ca ।
andhakāravikārīṇi rakṣāṃsi svendriyāṇi ca ।। 

antaśśūnyāny asārāṇi vakrāṇi granthimanti ca ।
dahanaikāntayogyāni durdārūṇīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

ghanamohapratardāni duṣkūpagahanāni ca ।
mahāvakaratucchāni kupurāṇīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

ananteṣu padārtheṣu karaṇāni ghaṭādiṣu ।
sabhramāṇi sapaṅkāni cakrāṅgānīndriyāṇi ca ।। 

āpannimagnam imam evam akiñcanaṃ tvaṃ mām uddharoddharaṇaśīla dayodayena ।
ye nāma kecana jagatsu jayanti santas tatsaṅgamaṃ paramaśokaharaṃ vadanti ।। 

vidyādharavairāgyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catuṣṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

tatas tasya mayā brahmaṃs tac chrutvā pāvanaṃ vacaḥ ।
idam uktaṃ yathāpṛṣṭaṃ suspaṣṭapadayā girā ।। 

sādhu vidyādharādhīśa diṣṭyā buddho asi bhūtaye ।
bhavāndhakūpakuharāc cireṇotthātum icchasi ।। 

pāvanīyaṃ tava matī rājate śuddharūpiṇī ।
vivekenānaleneva kanakadravasantatiḥ ।। 

upadeśagirām artham ādatte hārihelayā ।
makure nirmale dravyam ayatnenaiva bimbate ।। 

yad idaṃ vacmi tat sarvam om ity ādātum arhasi ।
asmābhiś ciram anviṣṭaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।। 

yat kiñcit svadate antas te vastu vastutayāśritam ।
tad asvādv iti nirvighnaṃ tyajaṃs tiṣṭha yathāsukham ।। 

nirahaṅkāritāṃ satyāṃ budhyasvābodham utsṛjan ।
nāsi tvaṃ ciram apy antaḥ prekṣito asi na lakṣyase ।। 

nāhantvam asti na jagad iti niścayinas tava ।
sarvam asti śivaṃ tac ca na duḥkhāya sukhāya no ।। 

kim ajñatvāj jagaj jātaṃ jagato atha kim ajñatā ।
vicāryāpīti no vidma ekatvād alam etayoḥ ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad viśvaṃ avastutvāt sad apy asat ।
yac cedaṃ bhāti tatraiva kiñcid ity eva niścayaḥ ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad viśvaṃ avastutvāt sad apy asat ।
yac cedaṃ bhāti tad brahma nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad viśvaṃ na san nāsan na kiñcana ।
pratibhāsavaśāt satyam avastutvād asat sadā ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad viśvaṃ nāsti satyam athāsti ca ।
pratibhātāpi nāsty atra tadabhāvād ataś śivam ।। 

viśvabījam ahantvaṃ tvaṃ viddhi tasmād dhi jāyate ।
sādridyūrvīnadīśādijagajjaraḍhapādapaḥ ।। 

ahantvabījād aṇuto jāyate asau jagaddrumaḥ ।
tasyendriyarasāḍhyāni mūlāni bhuvanāni ca ।। 

tārakā bālakalikā ṛkṣaughaḥ korakotkaraḥ ।
vāsarā gucchavisarāḥ pūrṇacandrāḥ phalālayaḥ ।। 

svargādayo bṛhadvargā mahāviṭapakoṭarāḥ ।
merumandarasahyādyā girayaḥ pattrarājayaḥ ।। 

saptābdhayo aṅga srutayaḥ pātālaṃ mūlakoṭaram ।
agāni ghuṇavṛndāni parvāṇi purapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

ajñānam utpattimahī vihagā bhūtakoṭayaḥ ।
upalambho bṛhatstambho dāvo nirvāṇanirvṛtiḥ ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārā vividhāmodavṛttayaḥ ।
vanaṃ vipulam ākāśaṃ śuklā jalamucas tvacaḥ ।। 

vicitraśākhā ṛtava upaśākhā diśo daśa ।
saṃvid rasamahāpūro vātaspando vivartanaḥ ।। 

candrārkarucayo lolā majjanonmajjanonmukhāḥ ।
ramyāḥ kusumamañjaryas timirabhramarabhramāḥ ।। 

pātālam āśāgaṇam antarikṣam āpūrya tiṣṭhaty asad eva sadvat ।
tasyānahantāgnihate ahamarthabīje punar nāsti sato api rohaḥ ।। 

jagadvṛkṣabījavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

vidyādhara dharādhāra girikandaramandira ।
digantarāmbarācāra cārasañcāracañcura ।। 

īdṛśo yo jagadvṛkṣo jāyate ahantvabījataḥ ।
bīje jñānāgninā dagdhe naiva kiñcana jāyate ।। 

prekṣyamāṇaṃ ca tan nāsti kilāhantvaṃ kadācana ।
etāvad eva tajjñānam anenaiva pradahyate ।। 

ahantvabhāvāc cāhantvam asti saṃsārabījakam ।
nāhantvabhāvān nāhantvam astīti jñānam uttamam ।। 

sargādāv eva sargasya kilāsyābhāvayogataḥ ।
kuto ahantvaṃ kutas tvantvaṃ kuto dvaitaikyavibhramaḥ ।। 

samākarṇya guror vākyaṃ yatante ye prayatnataḥ ।
saṅkalpatyāgam āmūlaṃ padaprāptau jayanti te ।। 

randhanāj jayam āpnoti svaśāstre sūpakṛc chrute ।
vivekī svaviveke ca yatanād eva nānyathā ।। 

ciccamatkāramātrātma jagad viddhīha netarat ।
nāśāsu na bahir nāntar etat kvacana vidyate ।। 

saṅkalponmeṣamātreṇa jagaccitraṃ vilokyate ।
tadanunmeṣavilayi citrakṛccittacitravat ।। 

maṇḍapo asti mahāstambho muktāmaṇivinirmitaḥ ।
bahuyojanalakṣāṇi kāntakāñcanacitritaḥ ।। 

maṇistambhasahasreṇa vṛto aṅga protameruṇā ।
indrāyudhasahasrāḍhyakalpasandhyābhrasundaraḥ ।। 

strībālapuruṣādīnāṃ vāstavyānām itas tataḥ ।
krīḍārthaṃ sthāpitā yatra nānāracanayāntare ।। 

bhūtabījaparāpūrṇatamo'riṣu saghuṅghumāḥ ।
tamaḥprakāśacitrāḍhyā lokāntarasamudgakāḥ ।। 

āmodasubhagā lolajaladāvalipallavāḥ ।
līlāpadmāḥ kare strīṇāṃ vilolāḥ kalpapādapāḥ ।। 

bālaniśśvāsacalitāḥ kandukāni kulācalāḥ ।
sandhyāmbudāḥ karṇapūrāś cāmarāś śaradambudāḥ ।। 

kalpāntakālajaladās tālavṛntapadaṃ gatāḥ ।
bhūtalaṃ dyūtaphalakaṃ vitānaṃ tārakāmbaram ।। 

bhūtasāraparāvarte dyūte akṣāś śaśibhānavaḥ ।
vyomājire jagadgrāmapaṇe gṛhanivāsinām ।। 

tathaivāyaṃ jagadrūpas saṅkalpas san samutthitaḥ ।
ciccamatkāramātrātmā citrakṛccittacitravat ।। 

asatyam eva sphurati tathā satyaṃ vilīyate ।
vilīyate na sphurati sarvam asti na cāsti ca ।। 

asamutthita evāyaṃ kuto apīva samutthitaḥ ।
hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ saṃsārodārakoṭaraḥ ।। 

ciccamatkāra evāyam acitkacanasaṅkṣayaḥ ।
atyantam eva svāyatto yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

yadānnapānadānādāv anādaram upeyivān ।
tasyedaṃ paścimaṃ janma na sa karmasu majjati ।। 

prāpto vivekapadavīm asi pāvanātman puṇyāṃ pavitritajagattritayāṃ dvitīyām ।
nādhaḥ patiṣyasi punar manasāmuneti jānāmi maitad amalaṃ padam utsṛja tvam ।। 

māyāmaṇḍapavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

abudhyamānaś cetyādi cidrūpam api cānagha ।
śāntacidghana evāssva nirmalāmbvantar aṃśuvat ।। 

acetanaṃ cetanāntaś cetanād eva vidyate ।
vaisādṛśye api sadṛśaṃ payorāśāv ivānalaḥ ।। 

sā cetanācetanayor hetuś cittvātmanaiva cit ।
vināśotpādayor vahnijvālayoḥ pavano yathā ।। 

nāham astīti cidrūpam iti viśrāntir astu te ।
tato yathā yādṛśena bhūyate tādṛśo bhava ।। 

cidrūpas sarvabhāvānām antar bahir asi sthitaḥ ।
prasannāmbubharasyāntar bahiś caiva yathātapaḥ ।। 

nāyam asmīti cidrūpaṃ citau cel lagnam aṅga te ।
na cānyaś ceti tad brahmarūpaḥ kenāsi mīyase ।। 

sasurāsurapātālabhūviṣṭapam ivotthitam ।
nānājavañjavībhāvakriyākālam ivākulam ।। 

yathā raṅgamayaṃ kuḍye jagan maunam iva sthitam ।
tathā ciccitrakacitaṃ khakuḍye cātmasaṃsthitam ।। 

tenaiva bhūyate bhūri yac citau kacitam svataḥ ।
acetanaṃ cetanaṃ vā yathecchasi tathā kuru ।। 

ciccamatkṛtayo vyomni sphuranty etā jagattayā ।
arkāṃśuvad arodhinyas svecchāviditavedinām ।। 

timirāvṛtadṛṣṭīnāṃ yathā keśoṇḍukādi khe ।
sphuraty evaṃ jagadrūpam anātmany eva tiṣṭhatām ।। 

etaj jagat tvam aham ity avabodharūpam ābhāsamātram uditaṃ ca na coditaṃ ca ।
arkāṃśujālaracanānagarābham atra kuḍyādi satyam idam asti na khe lateva ।। 

citkacanayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

vidyate cetanād eva cetane antar acetanam ।
jale agnir iva cij jāḍye nāto bhinne manāg api ।। 

tad vedanāvedanayor abhedāt svastham āsitam ।
niryantram eva citrasthajñaptivad vyomamadhyavat ।। 

brahmaṇy aśeṣaśaktitvād avittvaṃ vidyate tathā ।
akṣubdhe vimale toye bhāvī phenalavo yathā ।। 

na kāraṇaṃ vinodeti jalāt phenalavo yathā ।
na kāraṇaṃ vinodeti sargādi brahmaṇas tathā ।। 

na ca kāraṇam asty atra sargotpattāv akāraṇe ।
nātas sañjāyate kiñcij jagadādi na naśyati ।। 

atyantaṃ kāraṇābhāvān na kiñcij jāyate jagat ।
marāv ambv iva nāsty eva dṛṣṭam apy agrato jagat ।। 

brahmānantam ajaṃ śāntam ato astīdaṃ na sargadhīḥ ।
kāraṇābhāvatas tena brahmaivedam akhaṇḍitam ।। 

ataś śilodarābho asi vyomakośopamo asi ca ।
brahmaikaghanarūpatvād ajo anavayavo asi ca ।। 

jño asi kiñcin na kiñcid vā niśśaṅkam alam āsyatām ।
acetanacidābhāsa śāmyatām ātmanātmani ।। 

nityānantatayājasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti kāryakṛt ।
sargādyasambhave tasmād yad asti tad ajaṃ śivam ।। 

ajo yeṣāṃ tu cidrūpo nāsti maurkhyavilāsinām ।
sarvanāśe samutpanne kiṃ teṣāṃ pravicāryate ।। 

yatra yatra paraṃ tatra tatra santi jaganti hi ।
jagacchabdārtharūpeṇa muktāny evaṃvidhāni ca ।। 

tṛṇe kāṣṭhe jale kuḍye sarvatraiva paraṃ sthitam ।
sarvatraiva ca sargaughaḥ pariprotas sthito mithaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇaḥ kiṃsvabhāvo asāv iti vaktuṃ na yujyate ।
anante parame tattve svatvāsvatvātyasambhavāt ।। 

abhāvasavyapekṣyasya bhāvasyāsambhavād api ।
padaṃ badhnanti nānante svabhāvād yā duruktayaḥ ।। 

asvatvābhāvayor nitye anante atyantam asambhavāt ।
svatvabhāveṣu siddheṣu svabhāvoktir na tiṣṭhati ।। 

nāhantvaṃ labhyate sādho buddhyālaṃ kiṃ nirīkṣitam ।
asad eva kuto apy etad bālayakṣa ivotthitam ।। 

muktaṃ tv ahantvaśabdārthair labhyate yac ca tat param ।
yuktaṃ tv ahantvaśabdārthaiḥ prekṣyamāṇaṃ vilīyate ।। 

bhedo jagadbrahmadṛśor abhedaḥ paryāyaśabdārthavilāsatulyaḥ ।
saṅkalpamātraprathito na satyo yathānayor vai kaṭakatvahemnoḥ ।। 

sargāpavargapratipattiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

śastrāṇi dayitāṅgāni magnāny aṅge nirambare ।
yo budhyamānas susamas sa parasmin pade sthitaḥ ।। 

tāvat puruṣayatnena dhairyeṇābhyāsam āharet ।
yāvat suṣuptatodeti padārthodayanaṃ prati ।। 

yathābhūtārthatattvajñam ādhayo aṅgagatā api ।
