na manāg api limpanti payāṃsīva saroruham ।। 

śastrāṅganānabhāṃsy aṅgalagnāny alam asaṃvidan ।
alagnānīva śāntātmā yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ।। 

viṣaṃ yathā svāntar eva ghugghunthībhavati svayam ।
na ca ghugghunthatā nāma viṣād anyāsti kācana ।। 

svarūpam ajahann eva jīvatām adhitiṣṭhati ।
tathātmā tatparijñānamātraikapravilāyinīm ।। 

jīvībhavati ghugghuntho mṛtyātmaiva yathā tathā ।
atyajantī nijaṃ rūpaṃ cij jaḍaṃ rūpam ṛcchati ।। 

brahmaṇy ananyo apy anyābho ghugghunthakavad utthitaḥ ।
tatsthas sa evāsa ivāpy atatstha iva sargakaḥ ।। 

viṣaṃ viṣatvam ajahad yathā svāntaḥ krimiḥ kramāt ।
na jāyate na mriyate jāyate mriyate api ca ।। 

svenaiva saṃvidarthena padārthānām arūpiṇā ।
tīryate goṣpadam iva na tu daivād bhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

sarvabhāvāntarāvasthā sarvabhāvātiśāyinī ।
antaśśītalatā yasmiṃs tasmin kim avahelanam ।। 

jagatpadārthasattāntas sāmānyenāśu bhāvyatām ।
mano'haṅkārabuddhyādiḥ kaḥ kalaṅko amalātmani ।। 

yathā ghaṭapaṭādy arthān paśyasy arthaṃ śarīrakam ।
tathāhantvamanobuddhivedanādy api paśya he ।। 

jagatpadārthasārthaughaṃ manobuddhyādisaṃyutam ।
jña evāsaṃvidaṃs tiṣṭha pariniṣṭhitaniṣṭhayā ।। 

na kenacit kasyacid eva kaścid doṣo na caiveha guṇaḥ kadācit ।
sukhena duḥkhena bhavābhavena na cāsti bhoktā na ca kartṛteti ।। 

yathābhūtārthavedanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonasaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

kha eva vyoma sampannam iti saṅkalpanaṃ yathā ।
bhrāntimātram asadrūpaṃ tathāhambhāvabhāvanam ।। 

khaṃ khe jātam iti bhrānter ahaṃ kalpayitā yathā ।
tathā nirvyapadeśyātma sad asty asad ivātatam ।। 

khe khātmaivāsti cidrūpaṃ tat svakaṃ vidyate vapuḥ ।
bhāsate yad idantvena nāham asmi na cānaham ।। 

tataṃ cidrūpam astīdṛg yatra sthūlaṃ kham apy alam ।
aṇāv iva mahāmerus tatsaṃvittir hi khāditā ।। 

ghanas tato vidābhāsaḥ khād apy atitarām aṇuḥ ।
jānāti yat svabhāvaṃ tad etat sargatayā sthitam ।। 

ahantākhāditādyātma vidaḥ prasaraṇaṃ jagat ।
ambhodravaprasaraṇaṃ yathāvartādiveṣṭanam ।। 

avitprasaraṇaṃ śāntam aspandīva jaladravaḥ ।
nisspandapavanākāram ākāśahṛdayopamam ।। 

na deśakālādi jagatprasareṣūpayujyate ।
ghanāc chūnyān nirābhāsād vinmātraprasarād ṛte ।। 

vinmātre prasṛte kāṣṭhe vyomni nāvi jale sthale ।
nidrāyāṃ jāgrati svapne bhavej jagad ivoditam ।। 

prasaraṇāprasaraṇe na ca sambhavato mithaḥ ।
khād apy atitarācchatvād akṣobhādes sadaiva hi ।। 

jñaś cetati na bhogādi na caivātmany asāv aham ।
dravatvam ambhasīvāntar advitīyaḥ pare sthitaḥ ।। 

dhīr hrīś śrīs strī smṛtiḥ kīrtiḥ kāntir ityādikaṃ gaṇam ।
na paśyati visaṅkalpas tamasīva padāny aheḥ ।। 

brahmendubimbasphuritaś cijjyotsnācchāmṛtadravaḥ ।
dikkālāsambhavāt sargo neśvarād vyatiricyate ।। 

adigādy asphurac caiva pare sphurati bhāsuram ।
jagadādyātmakaṃ cittvaṃ cakraughatvam ivāmbhasi ।। 

majjanonmajjanārāvair vivartāvartaveṣṭanaiḥ ।
acchinnānupadaṃ kṣīṇā vāti sargasaric ciram ।। 

yathāvartaiḥ payo yāti dhūmo yāti yathā nabhaḥ ।
tathā jaḍātmakatayā tṛtīyas sarga etayoḥ ।। 

dāruṇi krakacacchede yathāvartādikaṃ tathā ।
adigādau pare sargas tad etadrūpavān ayam ।। 

saṃsārakadalīstambhād vinā saṅkalpapallavāt ।
mṛduno api dṛṣatkrūrān na kiñcil labhyate antarāt ।। 

sahasrakhuramūrdhākṣikaravaktrehitehitam ।
nānādritarudigdeśasaritprādeśamātrakam ।। 

antaśśūnyam asārātma bahurāgoparañjitam ।
sphuradvirāgavihitamārjanāmātratarjanam ।। 

sasurāsuragandharvavidyādharamahoragam ।
jaḍātmapavanaspandi jaḍacetanacetitam ।। 

paṭe citramahārājyam iva bhāsurasundaram ।
parāmarśāsahaṃ cāru vikalpasphūrjitaṃ jagat ।। 

spandātmani vikalpāṃśe pratibhāsatyarūpiṇi ।
saṃvit prasarati bhrāntau tailabindur ivāmbhasi ।। 

hṛllekhājālavisarais sargāvartavivartanaiḥ ।
visaratsnehasammiśrajaḍānuśayacarvaṇaiḥ ।। 

ahamityādividrūpe vikalpenonmukhī satī ।
na parād vyatiriktaiṣā jalatvād iva toyatā ।। 

vidā nityas sva ātmaiva sarga ity abhidhīyate ।
bhūtvāham iti tenānyo na sargo asti na sargakaḥ ।। 

spandātmatāyāṃ śāntāyāṃ yathā spandaṃ jaladravaḥ ।
na vetti jagadābhāsaṃ citaḥ prasaraṇaṃ tathā ।। 

āvartatve taraṅgatvaṃ na yathā vetty apāṃ dravaḥ ।
tathā cid ātmavyomatve na vyomatvādi vetti hi ।। 

deśakālādinirmāṇapūrvakaṃ vedanaṃ vidaḥ ।
sargātmakatvāt tenāmbu dravasāmyaṃ na dūragam ।। 

mano'hambhāvabuddhyādi yat kiñcin nāma vedanam ।
avidyāṃ viddhi yatnena pauruṣeṇāśu naśyati ।। 

ardhaṃ mithas saṅkathayā bhāgaś śāstravicāraṇaiḥ ।
ātmaprayatnataś śiṣṭam avidyāyā nivartate ।। 

caturbhāgātmani kṛte ity avidyākṣaye kramāt ।
samakālaṃ ca yac chiṣṭaṃ tad anāmārthasadasat ।। 

rāmaḥ

ardhaṃ mithassaṅkathayā bhāgaś śāstravicāraṇaiḥ ।
ātmaprayatnato bhāgaḥ kathaṃ tasyā nivartate ।। 

samakālaṃ kramāc ceti muninātha kim ucyate ।
tad anāmārthasac ceti tac cāsac ceti kiṃ vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sujanena viraktena saṃsārottaraṇārthinā ।
saha vādhyātmaviduṣā saṃsṛtiṃ pravicārayet ।। 

yataḥ kutaścid anviṣya savirāgam amatsaram ।
janaṃ sujanam ātmajñaṃ yatnenārādhayed budham ।। 

sampanne saṅgame sādhor avidyārdhaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam ।
viddhi vedyavidāṃ śreṣṭha jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhadaśodayāt ।। 

ardhaṃ sajjanasamparkād avidyāyā vinaśyati ।
caturbhāgas tu śāstroktaiś caturbhāgas svayatnataḥ ।। 

eko abhilāṣa utpanno bhogebhyaś ca nivāryate ।
tat kṣayaṃ yāty avidyāyāś caturtho aṃśas svayatnataḥ ।। 

sādhusaṅgamaśāstrārthasvayatnaiḥ kṣīyate malam ।
ekaikenātha sarvaiś ca samakālaṃ kramād api ।। 

yad avidyākṣayaikātma nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā ।
śiṣyate tat paraṃ prāhur anāmārtham asac ca sat ।। 

brahmedaṃ ghanam ajarādy anantam ekaṃ saṅkalpasphuraṇam anādy anantam eva ।
buddhvaivaṃ vyapagatamānameyamoho nirvāṇaḥ pariviharan viśokam āssva ।। 

saṅkalpasargayor aikyapratipattir nāma sargaḥ

saptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

jagatprasarapūrasya na deśa upayujyate ।
na kālo dhāraṇe stambha ālokasyāmbare yathā ।। 

manomanananirmāṇamātram etaj jagattrayam ।
śāntaṃ tanu laghu svacchaṃ vātāntas saurabhād api ।। 

ciccamatkṛtimātrasya sādho jagadaṇoḥ kila ।
vātāntas saurabhaṃ merur anyānubhavayogataḥ ।। 

yaṃ praty udeti sargo ayaṃ sa eveha hi cetati ।
padārthas sanniveśaṃ svam iha svapnaṃ pumān iva ।। 

atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
yad vṛttaṃ devarājasya trasareṇūdare purā ।। 

kvacit kadācit kasmiṃścit kiñcit kalpadrume abhavat ।
kasyāñcid yugaśākhāyāṃ phalaṃ jagaduḍumbaram ।। 

sasurāsurabhūtaughamaṣakāhitaghuṅghumam ।
śailamāṃsalapātāladyubhūmyugrakavāṭakam ।। 

ciccamatkṛticārūccair vāsanārasapīvaram ।
vividhānubhavāmodaṃ cittāsvādamanoharaṃ ।। 

bṛhadbrahmataruprauḍhasattāvratatikoṭigam ।
ahaṅkāramahāvṛntaṃ samālokasamujjvalam ।। 

mokṣadvāravikāsāsyaṃ saridabdhisirāvṛtam ।
mātrāpañcakakośasthaṃ tarattārakaśīkaram ।। 

kalpāvasānajaraḍhaṃ kālakokilarūpayā ।
pātitaṃ śāntam āyātaṃ kvāpy antardhānam āgatam ।। 

tatrābhūd amarādhīśaś śakras tribhuvaneśvaraḥ ।
kṣaudrakumbhaniṣaṇṇānāṃ kṣudrāṇām iva nāyakaḥ ।। 

gurūpadeśasvābhyāsāt sa kṣīṇāvaraṇo abhavat ।
mahātmā bhāvitātmāntaḥ pūrvāparavidāṃ varaḥ ।। 

nārāyaṇādiṣu tataḥ kadācid vīryaśāliṣu ।
kvacid eva nilīneṣu satsv ekas sa surādhipaḥ ।। 

śastrajvālānalodgārair ayudhyata mahāsuraiḥ ।
vijitas tair mahāvīrair ato vyadravad ādrutam ।। 

diśo daśa sa vegena dudrāvābhidruto aribhiḥ ।
na viśramāspadaṃ prāpa paraloka ivādhamaḥ ।। 

udbhrāntavṛttiṣv ariṣu manāk chidram avāpya saḥ ।
praśamaṃ kāryasaṅkalpaṃ nītvā svaṃ svāntar eva hi ।। 

kam apy arkāṃśukoṭisthaṃ trasareṇuṃ viveśa saḥ ।
saṃvidrūpatayā padmakośaṃ sa madhupo yathā ।। 

sa tatrāśu viśaśrāma cirād āśvāsam āyayau ।
atha vismṛtasaṅgrāmo nirvṛtiṃ samupāgamat ।। 

kalpitaṃ sadma tatrātha sa kṣaṇād anubhūtavān ।
tasmin sadmani padmābhe reme sva iva viṣṭape ।। 

gṛhasthas sa dadarśātha kalpitaṃ nagaraṃ hariḥ ।
maṇimuktāpravālādikṛtaprākāramandiram ।। 

nagarāntargato apaśyat tato janapadaṃ hariḥ ।
nānādrigrāmagovāṭapattanāraṇyasaṃyutam ।। 

tādṛgratiś cetitavān sa śakro bhuvaṇaṃ tataḥ ।
sādridyūrvīnadīśāṃśaṃ sakriyākālakalpanam ।। 

tādṛgratiś cetitavān sa śakras trijagat tataḥ ।
sapātālamahīvyomaviṣṭapārkādiparvatam ।। 

tatrātiṣṭhat sureśatve sa bhogabharabhūṣitaḥ ।
putro babhūva tasyātha kundo nāmātivīryavān ।। 

tato jīvitaparyante tyaktvā deham aninditaḥ ।
nirvāṇam āyayau śakro nissneha iva dīpakaḥ ।। 

kundas trailokyarājo abhūj janayitvā sutaṃ śubham ।
kālena jīvitasyānte prāptavān paramaṃ padam ।। 

tatputro api tathaivātha kṛtvā rājye sutaṃ nijam ।
jagāma jīvitasyānte pāvanaṃ paramaṃ padam ।। 

evaṃ pautrasahasrāṇi samatītāni sundara ।
tatrādyāpi sureśasya yeṣāṃ rājye sthito aṃśakaḥ ।। 

ity adya yāvad amareśvaravaṃśa eṣa saṅkalpito jagati vaṃśapadaṃ vidhatte ।
tasmin kṣate api galite api hate api naṣṭe kvāpy ambare dinakarātapapāvanāṇau ।। 

indropākhyāne trasareṇvantarasargasaṅghavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekasaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

tasya śakrasya kulajaḥ kaścid āsīt surādhipaḥ ।
tatrottamaguṇaś śrīmān pāścātyā yasya sā tanuḥ ।। 

athendrakulaputrasya tasya tatra babhūva ha ।
pratibhājñānasamprāptir bṛhaspatigiroditā ।। 

tato viditavedyo asau yathāprāptānuvṛttimān ।
cakāra jagatāṃ rājyam ājyapānām adhīśvaraḥ ।। 

yuyudhe dānavais sārdham ajayat sarvaśātravān ।
śataṃ cakāra yajñānām ajñānottīrṇamānasaḥ ।। 

uvāsa kāryavaśato bisavālāntare ciram ।
anyāny api ca vṛttāntaśatāny anubabhūva ha ।। 

kadācid āsīt tasyecchā prabodhabalaśālinaḥ ।
brahmatattvam avekṣe ahaṃ yathāvad dhyānavān iti ।। 

so apaśyat praṇidhānena tata ekāntasaṃsthitaḥ ।
sa bāhyābhyantarāśeṣakaraṇatyāgaśāntadhīḥ ।। 

sarvaśakti paraṃ brahma sarvavastumayaṃ tatam ।
sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvais sarvatra sarvagam ।। 

sarvataḥ pāṇipādāntaṃ sarvato akṣiśiromukham ।
sarvataś śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya saṃsthitam ।। 

sarvendriyaguṇair muktaṃ sarvendriyaguṇānvitam ।
asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca ।। 

bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca ।
sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat ।। 

sarvatra candrārkamayaṃ sarvatraiva dharāmayam ।
sarvatra parvatamayaṃ sarvatrābdhimayaṃ tathā ।। 

sarvatra sāragurukaṃ sarvatraiva nabhomayam ।
sarvatra saṃsṛtimayaṃ sarvatraiva jaganmayam ।। 

sarvatraiva ca mokṣātma sarvatraivādyacinmayam ।
sarvatra sarvārthamayaṃ sarvatas sarvavarjitam ।। 

ghaṭe vaṭe paṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare nare ।
dhāmni vyomni tarāv adrāv anile salile anale ।। 

nānācāravikārāṇi vividhāvṛttimanti ca ।
paramāṇvaṃśamātre api trijaganti dadarśa saḥ ।। 

maricasyāntare taikṣṇyaṃ śūnyatvam iva vāṅga khe ।
trijagat saty asati ca vidyate cinmayātmani ।। 

ity evaṃ bhāvayan muktabhāvayā śuddhasaṃvidā ।
śakraḥ krameṇa tenaiva sa nirvāṇam avāptavān ।। 

tasyābhavad yaś śakrasya putraḥ parapurañjayaḥ ।
so api krameṇa tenaiva tathaiva dhyānavān abhūt ।। 

dhyānena sarvam ekatra paśyaṃś ciram udāradhīḥ ।
dadarśemam asau sargam asmadīyaṃ mahāmatiḥ ।। 

tato asmin vicaran sarge śakrānte śakratāṃ gataḥ ।
cakāra jagatāṃ rājyaṃ vṛttāntaśataśobhitam ।। 

vidyādharakulādhīśa ihādyaiva sa devarāṭ ।
tasyendrasya kulotpanna iti viddhi yathāsthitam ।। 

tato hṛdayabījasthaprāṅmukhābhyāsayogataḥ ।
bisajālavilāsādivṛttāntam anubhūtavān ।। 

yathaiṣa śakraḥ kathitas trasareṇūdarāspadaḥ ।
bisavālāspadaś caitatkulajaḥ kāntimān atha ।। 

tathā śatasahasrāṇi tatrataś cānyataś ca khe ।
tādṛśavyavahārāṇi samatītāni santi ca ।। 

vahatīyam avicchinnā cirāyaivaṃ taraṅgiṇī ।
tāta dṛśyasarit prauḍhā mūḍhā rūḍheva tatpade ।। 

iti māyeyam ādīrghā prasṛtopaśamonmukhī ।
satyāvalokamātrātivilayaikavilāsinī ।। 

yataḥ kutaścin māyeyaṃ yatra kvacana vānagha ।
yathā kathañcit sampannamātraiva paridṛśyate ।। 

ahambhāvacamatkāramātrād vṛṣṭir ivāmbudāt ।
jāyate mihikevāśu prekṣāmātravināśinī ।। 

maināṃ patābhimatadarśana paśya dṛśyamuktaṃ svabhāvam avabhāsanamātratattvam ।
sarvārthaśūnyam ata eva ca śūnyarūpam ekaṃ khamātram iva mātra vikalpam ehi ।। 

saṅkalpāsaṅkalpayor aikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvisaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

yatrāhantvaṃ jagat tatra pūrvam āgatya tiṣṭhati ।
parāṇvantar apīndrasya trasareṇūdare yathā ।। 

bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat ।
ahambhāvo abhimantrātmā mūlam ādyam udāhṛtam ।। 

vāsanārasasaṃsiktād ahambījakaṇād ayam ।
brahmādrau vyomavipine jāyate trijagaddrumaḥ ।। 

tārakāpuṣpanikaro vinīlācalapallavaḥ ।
saritsārasirāpūro vāsanāsārasatphalaḥ ।। 

ahantvasalilasyedaṃ jagat spanda udāhṛtaḥ ।
ciccamatkaraṇe svādu vāsanāvisaradrasaḥ ।। 

tārakāśīkarāsāro nabho'nantanikhātavān ।
bhāvābhāvamahāvarto nānāgiritaraṅgakaḥ ।। 

trilokīvilikhallekho vilolālokaphenilaḥ ।
brahmāṇḍabudbudodbhedaḥ kavāṭāpīḍapīvaraḥ ।। 

bhūpīṭhadṛḍhadiṇḍīrapiṇḍaś cidghanamaṇḍavān ।
citrājavañjavībhāvamajjanonmajjanātmakaḥ ।। 

jarāmaraṇamohādivīcīcayacamatkṛtiḥ ।
utpannadhvaṃsadehādibinduvṛndaikamandiraḥ ।। 

ahantvapavanaspando jagad ity avagamyatām ।
ahantvacandrasaugandhyaṃ jagad ity eva budhyatām ।। 

nāhantvajagatī bhinne pavanaspandavat sadā ।
payo dravatvam iva ca vahnir auṣṇyam ivāpi ca ।। 

jagad asty ahamarthe antar aham asti jagaddhṛdi ।
anyo'nyabhāvinī hy ete ādhārādheyavat sthite ।। 

jagadbījam ahantvaṃ yo mārṣṭi bodhād avedanāt ।
alaṃ citraṃ jaleneva tena dhautaṃ jaganmalam ।। 

ahantvaṃ nāma tat kiñcid vidyādhara na vidyate ।
akāraṇam avastutvāc chaśaśṛṅgam ivoditam ।। 

brahmaṇy atitate anante sakalollekhavarjite ।
ahantvaṃ kāraṇābhāvān na kadācana sanmayam ।। 

avastuny otuśṛṅgādau na sambhavati kāraṇam ।
ato ahantvādi nāsty eva vandhyāsuta iva kvacit ।। 

tadabhāvāj jagan nāsti cittvaṃ jagadabhāvataḥ ।
śiṣṭaṃ nirvāṇam evātaś śāntam āssva yathāsukham ।। 

abhāvād upapattisthād evaṃ jagadahantvayoḥ ।
rūpālokamanaskārāś śāntās tava bhavetarat ।। 

yan nāsti tat tu nāsty eva śeṣaṃ śāntam asi dhruvam ।
samprabuddho asi mā bhūyo nirmūlāṃ bhrāntim āhara ।। 

vyapagatakalanākalaṅkaśuddhaś śivam asi śāntam asīśvaro asi nityam ।
kham iva bhavasi sarvatopamānaṃ jagad api vā paramāṇurūpam eva ।। 

jagadahantvaikyayogo nāma sargaḥ

trisaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

bhusuṇḍaḥ

kathayaty atha mayy evaṃ sa vidyādharanāyakaḥ ।
āsīt saṃśāntasaṃvittis samādhipariṇāmavān ।। 

prabodhyamāno api mayā bhūyo bhūyas tatas tataḥ ।
na papāta purodṛśye paraṃ nirvāṇam āgataḥ ।। 

sa prāpa paramaṃ sthānaṃ tāvanmātraprabodhanāt ।
kenacin nādhikenāṅga yatnenātiśayaiṣiṇā ।। 

ata uktaṃ mayā nāma yadi śuddhe hi cetasi ।
upadeśaḥ prasarati tailabindur ivāmbhasi ।। 

nāham ity asti tenāntar maivaṃ bhāvaya śāntaye ।
etāvaty upadeśoktiḥ paramā netarāsti hi ।। 

eṣaivābhavyamanasi patitā prapalāyate ।
uttāne masṛṇādarśe muktāphalam ivātalam ।। 

bhavye tu śānte manasi lagaty abhyeti ca dyutim ।
praviśyāntar vicārākhyām arcir arkamaṇāv iva ।। 

ahambhāvanam evoccair bījaṃ duḥkhākhyaśalmaleḥ ।
mamedaṃ tadvaśād eti śākhāprasarakāraṇam ।। 

ahamādau mamety antas tata icchā pravartate ।
idamarthaśatānarthakāriṇī bhavabhāvinī ।। 

evaṃvidhā muniśreṣṭha mūḍhā api cirāyuṣaḥ ।
bhavanti niyamo hy aṅga dīrghāyuṣṭvasya kāraṇam ।। 

antaśśuddhamanaskā ye sucirāyābhavapradam ।
manāg apy upadiṣṭās te prāpnuvanti paraṃ padam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

merumūrdhani mām evam uktvā sa vihagādhipaḥ ।
tūṣṇīṃ babhūva muktātmā vṛṣṭamūka ivāmbudaḥ ।। 

aham āmantrya taṃ siddhaṃ vidyādharapathā punaḥ ।
prāpta ātmāspadaṃ rāma munimaṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।। 

etat tavādya kathitaṃ balibhukkathotthaṃ vidyādharopaśamanaṃ laghubodhanottham ।
asmin bhusuṇḍavihagendrasamāgame me caikādaśeha hi gatāni mahāyugāni ।। 

vidyādharopākhyāne vidyādharanirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catussaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

anahaṃvedanād eva śubhāśubhaphalapradā ।
saṃsāraphalinī nūnam icchāntar upaśāmyati ।। 

anahaṃvedanābhyāsāt samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ ।
bhūtvā śāntabhavāpīḍo na naraḥ paritāmyati ।। 

svasattāpuṭakoḍḍīnaḥ parabodhabaleritaḥ ।
ahamityarthapāṣāṇo na jāne kvāśu gacchati ।। 

ahantāpuṭakoḍḍīno brahmavīrabaleritaḥ ।
śarīrayantrapāṣāṇo na jāne kvāśu gacchati ।। 

ahamarthahimaṃ tv antar anahantāvidarciṣā ।
uḍḍīyeva vilīnaṃ san na jāne kvāśu gacchati ।। 

ahaṃraso vilīno antar anahantāvidarciṣā ।
śarīraparṇād udvarṇān na jāne kvāśu gacchati ।। 

śarīraparṇān niṣpīto hy ahambhāvarasāsavaḥ ।
anahantārkamārgeṇa paratām adhigacchati ।। 

śayane kardame śaile gṛhe vyomni sthale jale ।
sthūlā sūkṣmā nirākārā rūpāntaragatāpi ca ।। 

yatra tatra sthitā suptā prabuddhā bhasmatāṃ gatā ।
mṛtā pītā nimagnā ca dūrasthā nikaṭā satī ।। 

śarīravaṭadhānāntassthitāhantvanavāṅkurā ।
śākhājālaṃ tanoty uccais saṃsārākhyam idaṃ kṣaṇāt ।। 

ahantvavaṭadhānāntassthito dehabṛhaddrumaḥ ।
saṃsāraśākhānivahaṃ yatra tatra tanoty alam ।। 

śākhāśateddhadalapuṣpaphalo drumo asti bījodare na tu dṛśā paridṛśyate asau ।
deho apy ahantvakaṇikāntar aśeṣadṛśyasaṃvitparīta iti dṛśyadṛśaiva dṛṣṭam ।। 

dehād ahantvam anavāptavato vicārair vidvyomamātravapuṣo vapuṣo atha voccaiḥ ।
nāhantvabījajaṭharād asato abhyudeti saṃsāravṛkṣa iha bodhamahāgnidagdhāt ।। 

ahantvāsattvayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

maraṇaṃ sarvanāśātma na kadācana vidyate ।
svasaṅkalpāntar asthairyaṃ mṛtir ity abhidhīyate ।। 

paśya me pura uhyante iva mandarameravaḥ ।
anūḍhā api digvātais saridbimbitaśailavat ।। 

upary upary antar antaḥ kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।
śliṣṭāśliṣṭāḥ kharūpāḥ khe mithas saṃsṛtayas sthitāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

paśya me pura uhyante iti vākyārtham akṣatam ।
na kiñcid avagacchāmi yathāvan munināyaka ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāṇasyābhyantare cittaṃ cittasyābhyantare jagat ।
vidyate vividhākāraṃ bījasyāntar iva drumaḥ ।। 

mṛte puṃsi nabhovātair milanti prāṇavāyavaḥ ।
sarijjalair ivāmbhodhijalāny ātmadrutāni hi ।। 

itaś cetaś ca yānty eva teṣām antar jaganty alam ।
vyomavātavinunnānāṃ saṅkalpaikātmakāny api ।। 

saprāṇavātaiḥ pavanais sphuratsaṅkalpagarbhitaiḥ ।
sarvā eva diśaḥ pūrṇāḥ paśyāmīmās samantataḥ ।। 

atraite paśya paśyāmi saṅkalpajagatāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।
buddhidṛṣṭyā samuhyante puro mandarameravaḥ ।। 

khavāte antar mṛtaprāṇāḥ prāṇānām antare manaḥ ।
manaso antar jagad viddhi tile tailam iva sthitam ।। 

khavātaiḥ khe mṛtaprāṇā yathohyante manomayāḥ ।
uhyante vai tathaitāni tadaṅgāni jaganty api ।। 

sabhūtāny ambarorvyādivṛndāni trijaganty api ।
uhyante vāpy anūḍhāni puras sarvatra gandhavat ।। 

tāni buddhyaiva dṛśyante na dṛśā raghunandana ।
puras saṅkalparūpāṇi svasvapnapurapūravat ।। 

sarvatra sarvadā santi susūkṣmāṇy eva khād api ।
kalpanāmātrasāratvān na dahyante manāg api ।। 

tāny eva dṛḍhabhāvatvāt sveṣu lokeṣu teṣv alam ।
matāny eva cidaṃśasya sarvagatvād bhavān iva ।। 

pratibimbapurāṇīva puraḥ prāṇasaridraye ।
anūḍhāny api cohyante sūḍhāny api ca naiva ca ।। 

saurabhāṇi samuhyante vātāṅgasthāni rāghava ।
jaganti prāṇasaṃsthāni vyomātmakatayā tathā ।। 

kumbhe deśāntaraṃ nīte yathāntar vyomni nānyatā ।
spandanādimaye citte tathaiva trijagadbhrame ।। 

itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir iyam asatyaivoditaiva te ।
na vinaśyati nodeti kevalaṃ brahmarūpiṇī ।। 

yadi vāpy ūhyate vātais tat tad asyā na lakṣyate ।
tadantassaṃsthitais spando nāvi kośagatair iva ।। 

yathā spando aṅga lagno api nāvy antas saṃsthitair api ।
na lakṣyate tathā brahma tatsaṃsthais tanmayair api ।। 

yathā yojanavistīrṇaṃ laghau sadmānubhūyate ।
yakṣasya pādapastambhe paramāṇau tathā jagat ।। 

vastv alpam apy atibṛhal laghusattvo abhimanyate ।
mūṣikā svāñjalidravyam iva paṅkam ivārbhakaḥ ।। 

asaty eva kharūpe asmiñ jagadākhye vido bhrame ।
lokāntarādryoghamayī sudṛḍhājñasya bhāvanā ।। 

idaṃ heyam upādeyam idam ity antar ajñatā ।
yasya tasya bhavāyāsti sarvajñasyāpi mūḍhatā ।। 

sacetano hy avayavī cetaty avayavān yathā ।
svāntar eva tataṃ jīvas trijagad budhyate tathā ।। 

saṃvidātma parākāśam anantam aham avyayaḥ ।
vyomno avayavarūpāṇi tasyemāni jaganti me ।। 

sacetano ayaḥpiṇḍo antaḥ kṣurasūcyādikaṃ yathā ।
budhyate budhyate tadvaj jīvo antas trijagadbhramam ।। 

acit sacid vā mṛtpiṇḍaś śarāvodañcanādikam ।
yathāṅgaṃ manute jīvas tathāṅgaṃ manute jagat ।। 

cid acid vāṅkuro dehe vṛkṣatvaṃ manyate yathā ।
vṛkṣaśabdārtharahitaṃ brahmedaṃ trijagat tathā ।। 

cid vācid vā yathādarśo bimbitaṃ vāpy abimbitam ।
nagaraṃ vetti no vāpi tathā brahma jagattrayam ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyamātram eva jagattrayam ।
ahantvajagatos tena bhedo nāsti tadātmanoḥ ।। 

kalpitenopamānena yad etad upadiśyate ।
atropamaikadeśena upameyasadharmatā ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
amuñcataḥ parāṇutvaṃ jīvasyaitat smṛtaṃ vapuḥ ।। 

sarvasaṃvedanatyāge śuddhasattāspade pade ।
na manāg api bhedo asti nissaṅgopalakośayoḥ ।। 

yo yo nāma samullekho yatra yatra yathā yathā ।
yadā yadā yena yena payasas sa yathā dravaḥ ।। 

yo yo nāma vikalpāṃśo yatra yatra yathā yathā ।
yadā yadā yena yena cīyate sa tatheha cit ।। 

acittvān nāsti manasi saṅkalpaḥ kha ivāṅkuraḥ ।
cittvāt tu cetaso viddhi citer eveha kalpanam ।। 

yā yodeti vikalpaśrīr aprabuddhāśayaṃ prati ।
sarvagatvād anantatvāc cidvyomnas sā na sanmayī ।। 

sarvasaṅkalpakalanā satyety ābālam akṣatam ।
svapnādāv anubhūto antar arthaḥ kenāpalapsyate ।। 

saṅkalpo vāstv asaṅkalpo yo ya ālikhitaś citā ।
so anubhūto apy asatyas syād asatyasyaiva no sataḥ ।। 

asatyatābhidhaṃ satyaṃ mukta eva bhavec chivaḥ ।
so ativāhikadehaikaparikṣayavikāsavān ।। 

jaganti vātair uhyante vyomni śalmalitūlavat ।
nohyante copalānīva na ca santy eva kalpanāt ।। 

ity asminn akhilapadārthasārthakośe vyomany apy ativitate jaganti santi ।
kṣubdhāmbuprasṛtataraṅgabhaṅgabhaṅgyā sarvatrāviralataraṃ mitho milanti ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ niyatam arodhakāni nityaṃ protkampāny amalanabhāṃsi vāriṇīva ।
citrajñapravisṛtacittacitrajālānīvāntar bahir iva vṛndajṛmbhitāni ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ parimilitāni kānicit khe nānyo'nyaṃ parimilitāni kānicic ca ।
sarvatvāt paramaciter anantarūpāṇy ārambhapracuradigantasambhṛtāni ।। 

lolāmbūdarapurabimbabhaṅgurāṇi svāntasthāviralamahāpuropamāni ।
susthairyāṇy api satataṃ kṣaṇakṣayāṇi cidrūpārṇavalaharīvivartanāni ।। 

pṛthaksthitāni vyatimiśritāni jalāni vevāmbunidhau nadīnām ।
tārārkacandragrahamaṇḍalānāṃ samoditānāṃ nabhasīva bhāsaḥ ।। 

jagajjālākāśasādharmyayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

mune jīvasya yad rūpam ākṛtigrahaṇaṃ tathā ।
yathā ca paramārthatvaṃ sthānaṃ yac cāsya tad vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svasaṅkalpāṅkacetyāṅkaṃ cid ity aparanāmakam ।
anantaṃ cetanākāśaṃ jīvaśabdena kathyate ।। 

na parāṇu na ca sthūlaṃ na śūnyaṃ na ca kiñcana ।
cinmātraṃ svānubhūtyātma sarvagaṃ jīva ucyate ।। 

aṇīyasām aṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām ।
nakiñcinmātrakaṃ caiva sarvaṃ jīvaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

yasya yasya padārthasya yo bhāvas tena tatra tam ।
sthitaṃ viddhi tadābhāsaṃ tadātmaikāntavedanāt ।। 

sa cetati yathā yatra yad yadāśu tad eva hi ।
tathā tatra tadā rāma bhavaty anubhavātmakam ।। 

pavanasya yathā spandaś cetyaṃ jīvasya vai tathā ।
svasaṃvinmātranirṇeyaṃ nopadeśāmayakṣatam ।। 

yathaivāspandanād vātas sann evaity asadātmatām ।
tathaivācetanāj jīvo jīvann eti parāṃ gatim ।। 

jīvaś cidghanarūpatvād aham ity eva cetanāt ।
deśakālakriyādravyaśaktīr nirmāya tiṣṭhati ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyacarcitāṃ carcitāṃ svayam ।
asatyāṃ satyavat sphārāṃ tāvanmātraśarīrakām ।। 

cetitām asadākārāṃ prāleyaparamāṇutām ।
paśyaty ātmany athātmatve svapne svamaraṇopamām ।। 

svapnasvāvayavānyatvasadṛśīṃ tāṃ vibhāvayan ।
vismṛtya cetanīṃ sattāṃ tattām evāśu gacchati ।। 

evaṃrūpo budhyamānaḥ procchūnatvam athātmani ।
paśyaty āśu svam ātmānaṃ candrabimbam iva drutam ।। 

ātmany athendubimbātmany asau saṃvittipañcakam ।
kākatālīyavad bhinnam uditaṃ cetati svayam ।। 

pañcānāṃ saṃvidāṃ pañca bhinnāny aṅgāny asāv atha ।
budhyate tāni tadrūparandhrāṇy anubhavaty api ।। 

sa pañcāvayavaḥ paścād rājate puruṣo virāṭ ।
anantākārasaṃvittir avyaktātmā nirāmayaḥ ।। 

manomayo asāv uditaḥ parasmāt prathamotthitaḥ ।
ākāśaviśadaś śānto nityānantavibhāmayaḥ ।। 

sa cāpy apañcabhūtātmā pañcabhūtātmakopamaḥ ।
virāḍātmaikapuruṣaḥ paramaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

svayam evāśu bhavati svayam eva vilīyate ।
svayam eva prasarati svayaṃ saṅkocam eti ca ।। 

svasaṅkalpakṛtenāsau kalpaughena kṣaṇena vā ।
yadṛcchayodeti punaḥ punar bhūtvopaśāmyati ।। 

manomātraikarūpātmā prakṛter deha eṣa saḥ ।
eṣa puryaṣṭakaṃ proktas sarvasyaivātivāhikaḥ ।। 

sthūlas sūkṣmo ambarātmaiṣa vyakto avyakto antavarjitaḥ ।
sarvasya bahir antaś ca nakiñcit kiñcid eva ca ।। 

aṅgāni rāma tasyāṣṭau manaṣṣaṣṭhāni pañca ca ।
sāhambhāvānīndriyāṇi bhāvābhāvamayāni ca ।। 

tena gītā ime vedās saha śabdārthakalpanaiḥ ।
niyatis sthāpitā tena tathādyāpi yathā sthitā ।। 

anantam ūrdhvaṃ mūrdhāsya tathādhaḥ pādayos talam ।
aparākāśam udaram idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalam ।। 

lokāntarāṇy anantāni pārśukāḥ kṣatajaṃ payaḥ ।
māṃsapeśyaḥ kṣitidharās saritas santatās sirāḥ ।। 

raktadhārā jaladhayo dvipāny evāntraveṣṭanam ।
bāhavaḥ kakubhas sphārās tārakā romasantatiḥ ।। 

pañcāśad anilaskandhā ekonāḥ prāṇavāyavaḥ ।
mārtāṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ caṇḍaṃ pittaṃ jaṭharapāvakaḥ ।। 

śaśāṅkamaṇḍalaṃ jīvaś śleṣmā śukraṃ sitaṃ balam ।
manas saṅkalpakośātma sārātma paramāmṛtam ।। 

mūlaṃ śarīrakośasya bījaṃ karmadrumasya ca ।
prasavas sarvabhāvānām indur ānandakāraṇam ।। 

yad indumaṇḍalaṃ nāma sa samrāḍ jīva ucyate ।
śarīrakarmamanasāṃ bījaṃ mūlaṃ ca kāraṇam ।। 

asmād indunibhāj jīvāt prasaranti jagattraye ।
jīvā manāṃsi karmāṇi sukhāny annāmṛtāni ca ।। 

virāja ete saṅkalpā brahmaviṣṇujinādayaḥ ।
tasya cittacamatkārās surāsuranabhaścarāḥ ।। 

citsvabhāvo budhyamānaḥ prāleyaparamāṇutām ।
yadādau bhāvayaty āśu tadā tatraiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

tenaitad eva jīvasya sthānaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha ।
pañcāvayavam etat tac charīram anubhūyate ।। 

virāḍjīvāc candramaso jīvabhūtāni dehinām ।
prasaranty annajātāni prāleyavisarātmanā ।। 

tāny eva dehideheṣu jīvā jīvanti jīviṣu ।
manobhūtā viceṣṭante karma janmasu kāraṇam ।। 

evaṃ virāṭ sahasrāṇi mahākalpaśatāni ca ।
gatāny atha bhaviṣyanti nānācārāṇi santi ca ।। 

sarvato anubhavarūpayānayā sattayottamapadād abhinnayā ।
antavarjitamahāṅgasaṅgayā tiṣṭhatīti puruṣaḥ paraṃ virāṭ ।। 

virāḍātmavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṅkalpapuruṣas tv eṣa yad yat kalpayati svayam ।
tat tathā tādṛśaṃ pañcabhūtātma bhavatīva kham ।। 

sarvaṃ nāma jagajjātaṃ tatsaṅkalpaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
tādṛgrūpaṃ pañcakātmaviṣayonmukham āgatam ।। 

jagatpadārthasārthasya virāṭ sarvasya kāraṇam ।
kāraṇasya samāny eva kāryāṇi ca bhavanty ataḥ ।। 

yathaiṣa sa virāḍ evaṃ virāṭ pratyekam ātmani ।
svasaṃvidi prasarati bodhavān na tv abodhavān ।। 

āsarīsṛpam ārudram evam abhyutthito bhramaḥ ।
aṇāv apy adrivistāro bījakośa iva drumaḥ ।। 

āsarīsṛpam ārudraṃ virāṭ pratyekam ātmani ।
parāṇāv apy anantātmā bodhato na tv abodhataḥ ।। 

yādṛg eva virāḍātmany eṣa vistāra āgataḥ ।
tādṛg eveha sarvasminn aṇumātre api bhūtake ।। 

paramārthena na sthūlaṃ na sūkṣmaṃ kiñcana kvacit ।
yad yathā bhāvitaṃ yatra tat tathāśv anubhūyate ।। 

manaś candramaso jātaṃ manasaś candra utthitaḥ ।
jīvāj jīvo atha vaikaiṣā sattā dravajalāṅgavat ।। 

śukrasāraṃ vidur jīvaṃ prāleyakaṇasannibham ।
ānando balasandohas tata eva pravartate ।। 

taṃ cetati cidābhāsaṃ pūrvam ātmā svam ātmanā ।
tatra tanmayatāṃ dhatte tena tanmayarūpiṇīm ।। 

jīvasaṃvid athaiṣāntar yad upāyāti pañcatām ।
na tatra kāraṇaṃ kiñcid vidyate na ca kāryatā ।। 

pratiyogivyavacchitter abhāvāt svatvabhāvayoḥ ।
svabhāvoktir na caivātra bhavaty arthānusāriṇī ।। 

jīvo jīvatvam eva svaṃ jīvatvād eva ca svataḥ ।
antastvena bahiṣṭvena dṛśyatvena ca bhāvayan ।। 

nīhāreṇeva saṃvītaś cetyavastuparāyaṇaḥ ।
jātyandha iva panthānam āvṛtātmā na paśyati ।। 

jagajjṛmbhikayā jīvas tv anaikyadvitvayā sthitaḥ ।
spandaśaktyeva pavanas svātmano abhinnayānayā ।। 

śuddhaṃ buddham anādyantaṃ jīvo janitavāsanaḥ ।
ādyaṃ kṣīva ivātmānam āvṛtātmā na paśyati ।। 

ajñānasya mahāgranther mithyāvedyātmano asataḥ ।
ahamityartharūpasya bhedo mokṣa iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

vyapagataghanacetanas samantād aham iti nūnam abudhyamāna āssva ।
anabhidhaparacetanaikarūpas sadasadasan na sadā sadoditaś ca ।। 

jīvanirṇayayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭasaptatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jñāninaiva sadā bhāvyaṃ rāma na jñānabandhunā ।
ajñataiva varaṃ manye na punar jñānabandhutā ।। 

rāmaḥ

kim ucyate jñānabandhur jñānī caiva kim ucyate ।
kiṃ phalaṃ jñānabandhutve jñānitve api ca kiṃ phalaṃ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vyācaṣṭe yaḥ paṭhati ca śāstraṃ bhogāya śilpivat ।
yatate na tv anuṣṭhāne jñānabandhus sa ucyate ।। 

karmaspandeṣu no bodhaḥ phalito yasya dṛśyate ।
bodhaśilpopajīvitvāj jñānabandhus sa ucyate ।। 

vasanāśanamātreṇa tuṣṭāś śāstraphalena ye ।
ajñāñ jñānāṃśabandhūṃs tān vidyāc chāstrārthaśilpinaḥ ।। 

pravṛttilakṣaṇe dharme vartate yaś śrutocitam ।
adūravartijñānatvāj jñānabandhus sa ucyate ।। 

ātmajñānaṃ vidur jñānaṃ jñānāny anyāni yāni tu ।
tāni jñānāvabhāsāni sārasyānavabodhanāt ।। 

ātmajñānam anāsādya jñānāntaralavena ye ।
santuṣṭāḥ kaṣṭaceṣṭena te smṛtā jñānabandhavaḥ ।। 

jñānoditajñeyavikāsaśāntyā vinā na santuṣṭadhiyeha bhāvyam ।
tvaṃ jñānabandhutvam upetya rāma ramasva mā bhogabhavāmayeṣu ।। 

āhārārthaṃ karma kuryād anindyaṃ kuryād āhāraṃ prāṇasandhāraṇārtham ।
prāṇās sandhāryās tattvajijñāsanārthaṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsyaṃ yena bhūyo na duḥkham ।। 

jñānabandhuvicāro nāma sargaḥ

ekonāśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jñānena jñeyaniṣṭhatvād yo acitaṃ citam eva vā ।
na bhuñjate karmaphalaṃ sa jñānīty abhidhīyate ।। 

jñātvā samyag anuṣṭhānaṃ dṛśyate yasya karmasu ।
nirvāsanātmakaṃ jñasya sa jñānīty abhidhīyate ।। 

antaśśītalatehāsu prājñair yasyāvalokyate ।
akṛtrimaiva śāntasya sa jñānīty abhidhīyate ।। 

apunarjanmane yas syād bodhas sa jñānaśabdabhāk ।
vasanāśanadā śeṣā vyavasthā śilpajīvikā ।। 

pravāhāpatite kārye kāmasaṅkalpavarjitaḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty ākāśahṛdayo yas sa paṇḍita ucyate ।। 

akāraṇaṃ pravartante iva bhāvā akāraṇāt ।
avidyamānā apy ete vidyamānā iva sthitāḥ ।। 

āvirbhāvatirobhāvair bhāvābhāvabhavābhavaiḥ ।
paścāt kāraṇatāṃ yānti mithaḥ kāraṇakarmabhiḥ ।। 

asataś śaśaśṛṅgāder mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhaso atha vā ।
ālokanād alabhyasya kīdṛk syād atha kāraṇam ।। 

asataś śaśaśṛṅgādeḥ kāraṇaṃ mārgayanti ye ।
vandhyāputrasya pautrasya skandham āsādayanti te ।। 

asatyapratibhāsānām etad evāśu kāraṇam ।
yad anālokanaṃ nāma samālokākṣayakṣayam ।। 

paramātmāyate jīvo abudhyamānas tv acetanam ।
cetanaṃ budhyamānas tu jīva evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

paramātmaiva jīvo ayaṃ budhyamānas tv acetanam ।
āmra eva rasāpatteḥ prayāti sahakāratām ।। 

cetanaṃ budhyamānas tu jīva evāvatiṣṭhate ।
jīvo jīvati jīrṇeṣu jātijanmasu jarjaraḥ ।। 

ye parāṃ dṛṣṭim āyātā dṛśyaśrīpāradarśinaḥ ।
na vidyamānam apy asti teṣāṃ vedanam ātatam ।। 

ye parāṃ dṛṣṭim āyātā viddhi teṣām apām iva ।
arūpālokamananaṃ spandam aspandanaṃ sadā ।। 

ye parāṃ dṛṣṭim āyātā viddhi teṣām apām iva ।
spandam aspandanaṃ sarvam avedanavaśād iha ।। 

arūpālokamananaṃ veṣṭitonmuktadāmavat ।
buddhāḥ karmasu ceṣṭante vṛkṣapattreṣv ivānilāḥ ।। 

ye parāṃ dṛṣṭim āyātās saṃsṛteḥ pāradarśinaḥ ।
na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva ।। 

ye baddhavāsanā mūḍhāḥ karma śaṃsanti te anagha ।
śrutismṛtyuditaṃ tena vinādho'dhaḥ patanti te ।। 

indriyāṇi patanty arthaṃ dhṛṣṭagṛdhrā ivāmiṣam ।
tāni saṃyamya manasā yukta āsīta tatparaḥ ।। 

nāsanniveśaṃ hemāsti nāsargaṃ brahma vidyate ।
kiṃ tu sargādiśabdārthamuktaṃ yuktam ataś śivam ।। 

ekāndhakāre sampanne vyavahāro yugakṣaye ।
nirvibhāgo nirābhāso yathā brahmaghane tathā ।। 

abhrodare abhrabhāgānāṃ spandāspandamayī yathā ।
svasaṃvidātmikā sattā bhūtānām īśvare tathā ।। 

jalasyāntar jalāṃśānāṃ dvaitādvaitamayo yathā ।
svasaṃvidātmā svaspandas tathā brahmaṇi bhūtadṛk ।। 

yathāmbare ambarāṃśānāṃ dvaitādvaitaikatātmani ।
svasaṃvidātmikā sattā bhūtānām īśvare tathā ।। 

ananyāvayavavyāptir yathāvayavini sthitā ।
ananyā sṛṣṭir ābhāti tathānavayave śive ।। 

jagato antar ahaṃrūpam ahaṃrūpāntare jagat ।
sthitam anyo'nyavalitaṃ kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārai randhrair bahir iva sthitām ।
sṛṣṭiṃ paśyati jīvo antas sarasīm iva parvataḥ ।। 

jīvo jagattayātmānaṃ paśyaty ayam akāraṇam ।
hemeva kaṭakāditvaṃ tad apaśyan na paśyati ।। 

jīvanto api na jīvanti mriyante na mṛtā api ।
santo api na ca santīva parāvaravidaś śubhāḥ ।। 

prabuddhas sarvakarmāṇi kurvann api na paśyati ।
gṛhakarmāṇi gehastho goṣṭhabhāṇḍamanā iva ।। 

virāḍ hṛdi yathā candraḥ pratidehaṃ tathā sthitaḥ ।
jīvo himakaṇākāras sthūle sthūlo laghau laghuḥ ।। 

ahamātmā trikoṇatvam upagacchati kalpanāt ।
asad eva sadābhāsaṃ manyate cetanād vapuḥ ।। 

karmakośe trikoṇe tu śukrasāro avatiṣṭhate ।
dehe jīvo aham ity ātmā svāmodaḥ kusume yathā ।। 

aham ity eva śukrasthā saṃvid āpādamastakam ।
visaraty akhile jyotsnā yathā brahmāṇḍamaṇḍape ।। 

akṣarandhrapraṇālena vivṛtaṃ vedanodakam ।
vyāpnoti trijagad dhūmo viyan meghatayā yathā ।। 

dehe yady apy aśeṣe asmin bahir antaś ca vedanam ।
vidyate tat tathāpy atra śukre asti ghanavāsanam ।। 

jīvas saṅkalpamātrātmā yatsaṅkalpo avatiṣṭhate ।
hṛdi bhūtvā sa evāśu bahiḥ prasarati sphuṭam ।। 

yathāsthitāsyāṃ niścintāṃ varjayitvāmbaropamām ।
na kayācid api sthityā śāmyaty aham iti bhramaḥ ।। 

cintā tu cintyamānāpi bhāvanīyāmbaropamā ।
ahambhāvopaśamane śamanena krameṇa te ।। 

tajjñā vyavaharantīha bhāvyabhāvanavarjitam ।
arūpālokamananaṃ maunadārunarā iva ।। 

akiñcidbhāvano yas syāt sa mukta iti kathyate ।
jīvann ākāśaviśado baddhas tv anya iva sphuṭam ।। 

aham ity eva śukrasthā saṃvid āpādamastakam ।
visaraty akhile dehe brahmāṇḍe arkaprabhā yathā ।। 

dṛṅ netraṃ svadanaṃ jihvā śrutiś śrotraṃ bhavaty asau ।
ityādyā vāsanāḥ pañca baddhvā tāsu nimajjati ।। 

vidbhāvo akṣatayodeti mano bhūtvaikadeśataḥ ।
sarvago api raso bhūmau yathāṅkuratayā madhau ।। 

yo bhāvayati bhāveṣu neha rūḍheṣv abhāvatām ।
tasyāyatnavato duḥkham anantaṃ nopaśāmyati ।। 

yena kenacid ācchanno yena kenacid āśitaḥ ।
yatra kvacana śāyī jñas samrāḍ iva virājate ।। 

vāsanābhir upeto api samagrābhir avāsanaḥ ।
antaśśūnyo apy aśūnyātmā kham iva śvasanānvitaḥ ।। 

āsane śayane yāne sthito yatnena bodhyate ।
nidrālur iva nirvāṇamanomanananirvṛtaḥ ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ hi puruṣas sarvago api sa tiṣṭhati ।
sphuṭaṃ sāre śarīrasya yathā gandho abjakoṭare ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ vidur jantuṃ tasya prasaraṇaṃ jagat ।
ātmaniṣṭhatvam ajagat paramety upadeśabhūḥ ।। 

nīraso bhava bhāveṣu sarveṣu vibhavādiṣu ।
pāṣāṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā tathā bhavasi bhūtaye ।। 

sādho hṛdayasauṣiryam asauṣiryam ivāstu te ।
avidvadvapuṣo avittvād upalasyeva rāghava ।। 

tajjñājñayor aśeṣeṣu bhāvābhāveṣu karmasu ।
ṛte nirvāsanatvāt tu na viśeṣo asti kaścana ।। 

sattaivaiṣā vido yat sā bhavaty unmiṣitā jagat ।
paraṃ tattvaṃ nimiṣitā dṛg ivānāmakaṃ tatam ।। 

dṛśyaṃ vinaśyaty akhilaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jāyate punaḥ ।
yan na naṣṭaṃ na cotpannaṃ tat sat tad bhava tad bhavān ।। 

bhāvanā jñaptinirmūlā bhāvitāpi na vidyate ।
salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇeva na dadāti bhavāṅkuram ।। 

yathābhūtārthasandarśacchinnāham iti bhāvanā ।
dṛṣṭāpi na karoty antar dagdhaṃ bījam ivāṅkuram ।। 

karma kurvann akurvan vā vītarāgo nirāmayaḥ ।
nirmanā nityanirvāṇo munir ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

cittopaśāntau saṃśāntāś śāntaye bhogabandhavaḥ ।
na tv abhāvaparikṣīṇāś cittam eṣāṃ kilākaraḥ ।। 

aghanaḥ kevalāloko buddho jīvaḥ parāyate ।
sa evānyo apy ananyo antaraparāhṇa ivātapaḥ ।। 

ekadeśasthitāt puṃso dūraṃ yātasya cetasaḥ ।
yad rūpam akalaṃ madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

cāru cid vyomakarpūraṃ yac camatkurute svayam ।
anantam antar avyaktaṃ jagad ity eva vetti tat ।। 

gatabhavabhramabhāsuram akṣayaṃ śamam upetam upekṣitadīpavat ।
sthitam apīha janaṃ jagadīśvarā nanu namanti ramanti mudā ca khe ।। 

jñānasukhayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

aśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nirāśavāsanāpāstasamastabhavavāsanaḥ ।
utthāya gaccha prakṛter asyā maṅkir ivāṅkataḥ ।। 

maṅkināmābhavat pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇas saṃśitavrataḥ ।
sa kathaṃ śṛṇu nirvāṇam āptavān madvibodhataḥ ।। 

ahaṃ kadācid ākāśakośād avanim āgataḥ ।
bhavatpitāmahārthena kenāpy upanimantritaḥ ।। 

viharan bhūtalaṃ gacchaṃs tvatpitāmahapattanam ।
prāpto asmi kām apy ādīrghām araṇyānīṃ mahātapām ।। 

pāṃsupratardagahanāṃ prakacattaptasaikatām ।
adṛṣṭapāraparyantāṃ kvacid grāmakalāñchitām ।। 

akṣubdhakhānilālokajalabhūśāntiśālinīm ।
tatāṃ śūnyāṃ mahārambhāṃ brahmasattām ivāmalām ।। 

avidyām iva sammohamṛgatṛṣṇāgatabhramām ।
jāḍyadām ātatāṃ śūnyāṃ digdāhamihikākulām ।। 

atha tasyām araṇyānyāṃ yāvat praviharāmy aham ।
tāvat paśyāmi purato vadantaṃ pathikaṃ śramāt ।। 

pathikaḥ

aho nu parikhedāya prauḍhaprāyātapo raviḥ ।
paritāpāya pāpo ayaṃ durjaneneva saṅgamaḥ ।। 

saṅgalantīva marmāṇi sphuratīvāgnir ātape ।
saṅkucatpallavāpīḍās tāmyanti vanarājayaḥ ।। 

tāvat tad etam agrasthaṃ grāmakaṃ praviśāmy aham ।
śramam atrāpanīyāśu vahāmy adhvānam āśugaḥ ।। 

iti sañcintya so agrasthaṃ kirātagrāmakaṃ yadā ।
praveṣṭum icchati tadā mayā prokta idaṃ vacaḥ ।। 

aparijñāta nīrāga mārgamitra śubhākṛte ।
marumārgamahāraṇyapāntha svāgatam astu te ।। 

ciraṃ manuṣyadeśe asmin nirjanagrāmadhanvani ।
nāgarādhvaga viśrāntiṃ viśrānto api na lapsyase ।। 

śramo viśramaṇenaiva vardhate pāmarāspade ।
tṛḍ vai lavaṇapānena bhūya evābhivardhate ।। 

ete grāmaikaśaraṇāḥ pallavaspandabhīravaḥ ।
ayathāyathasañcārā hariṇā iva jantavaḥ ।। 

na sphuranti vicāreṣu na jvalanty anubhūtiṣu ।
na trasanti durācārād aśmayantramayā iva ।। 

kāmārtharāgavidveṣapariniṣṭhitapauruṣāḥ ।
karmaṇy āpātamadhure ramante dagdhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

ābhijātyonnatodārā śītalā rasaśālinī ।
neha viśvasiti prajñā meghamālā marāv iva ।। 

varam andhaguhāhitvaṃ śilāntaḥ kīṭatā varam ।
varaṃ marau paṅgumṛgo na grāmyajanasaṅgamaḥ ।। 

nimeṣāsvādamadhurāḥ kṣaṇāntaravirāgiṇaḥ ।
māraṇaikāntaniratā grāmyā viṣakaṇā iva ।। 

vānti bhasmakaṇākīrṇā jīrṇās saṃśīrṇasadmasu ।
tṛṇaparṇavanavyagrā grāmyāvakaravāyavaḥ ।। 

evam uktena tenāham idam uktas tadānagha ।
madvākyena samāśvasya snātenevāmṛtāmbhasā ।। 

pānthaḥ

bhagavan ko asi pūrṇātmā mahātmā katham ātmavān ।
paśyann anākulo lokaṃ grāmayātrām ivādhvagaḥ ।। 

kiṃ tvayā pītam amṛtaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ samrāḍ virāḍ atha ।
sarvārtharikto api ciraṃ supūrṇa iva rājase ।। 

śūnyo asi paripūrṇo asi ghūrṇasīva sthiro asi ca ।
na sarvam asi sarvaṃ ca na kiñcit kiñcid eva vā ।। 

upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighāti ca ।
nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ cedaṃ rūpaṃ kim iti te mune ।। 

bhūsaṃstho api samastānāṃ lokānām uparīva khe ।
saṃsthito asi nirāstho asi ghanāstho asi ca lakṣyase ।। 

prasṛtaṃ ca padārtheṣu na padārthātma cāsti ca ।
tavendor iva śuddhasya mano amṛtamayaṃ sthitam ।। 

kalāvān akalaṅko antaśśītalo bhāsuras samaḥ ।
rasāyanaparāpūrṇaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājase ।। 

tvadicchāyattasadasadbhāvaṃ paśyāmi te citi ।
saṃsāramaṇḍalam idaṃ sthitaṃ phalam ivāṅkure ।। 

ahaṃ tāvad ayaṃ vipraś śāṇḍilyakulasambhavaḥ ।
maṅkir nāma mahābhāga tīrthayātrāprasaṅgataḥ ।। 

gatvā sudūram adhvānaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīrthāni samprati ।
cirakālena sadanam ātmīyaṃ gantum udyataḥ ।। 

na ca me gantum udyogo viraktamanaso gṛham ।
dṛṣṭvā taḍitprakāśāni bhūtāni bhuvanodare ।। 

bhagavan mahyam ātmānaṃ kathayehānukampayā ।
gambhīrāṇi prasannāni sādhucetassarāṃsi hi ।। 

darśanād eva mitratvaṃ kurvatāṃ mahatāṃ puraḥ ।
kamalānīva bhūtāni vikasanty āśvasanti ca ।। 

mamemaṃ ca manomohaṃ saṃsārabhramasambhavam ।
manye hātuṃ samarthas tvaṃ sattvabodhānukampanaiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vasiṣṭho asmi mahābuddhe munir asmi nabhogṛhaḥ ।
kenāpy arthena rājarṣer imaṃ mārgam upasthitaḥ ।। 

mā gā viṣādaṃ panthānam āgato asi manīṣiṇām ।
prāyaḥ prāpto asi saṃsārasāgarasyāparaṃ taṭam ।। 

vairāgyavibhavodārā matir uktir apīdṛśī ।
ākṛtiś śāntarūpā ca na bhavaty amahātmanaḥ ।। 

maṇir madhurakāṣeṇa yathaiti vimalātmatām ।
tathā kaṣāyapākena cittam eti vivekitām ।। 

kiṃ jñātum icchasi kathaṃ saṃsāraṃ hātum icchasi ।
upadiṣṭam ahaṃ manye sampādayasi karmabhiḥ ।। 

vimalavāsana unnatamānasaḥ pariviviktamatir janacetasām ।
padam aśokam alaṃ khalu yujyase jagati netum itīdam ihocyate ।। 

maṅkivasiṣṭhasamāgamo nāma sargaḥ

ekāśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mamety uktavato maṅkir vinipatya sa pādayoḥ ।
uvācānandapūrṇākṣam idaṃ mārge vahan vacaḥ ।। 

maṅkiḥ

bhagavan bhūriśo bhrāntā diśo daśa daśāvatā ।
mayā na tu punas sādhur labdhas saṃśayanāśakṛt ।। 

samastadehavārāṇāṃ sārasyādya phalaṃ mayā ।
prāptaṃ yad asmi tvatpādapadme bhramaratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

khinno asmi bhagavan paśyan daśās saṃsāradoṣadāḥ ।
punar jātaṃ punar naṣṭaṃ sukhaduḥkhabhramas sadā ।। 

avaśyambhāviparyantaduḥkhatvāt sakalāny api ।
sukhāny evātiduḥkhāni varaṃ duḥkhāny ato mune ।। 

dṛḍhaduḥkhavad antatvād duḥkhayanti sukhāni mām ।
tathā nāma yathā duḥkham eva me sukhatāṃ gatam ।। 

vayo daśanalomāṅgais saha jarjaratāṃ gatam ।
uccaiḥpade pātaparā buddhir nādhyavasāyinī ।। 

prasuvānaṃ kusaṅkalpān gahanaṃ na prakāśate ।
manaḥ pippalapadmūlair iva kugrāmakoṭaram ।। 

vāsanāgardhavṛddhyaiti śvaś śvaḥ pāpīyasīṃ sthitim ।
kaṇṭakadrumavallīva karālakuṭilā matiḥ ।। 

āyur āyāsaśālinyā yāminyeva tamo'ndhayā ।
akṣīvānāgatālokaṃ kṣīṇaṃ santatacintayā ।। 

na kañcid rasam ādatte naṣṭaivāpi na naśyati ।
na puṣpitā na phalitā tṛṣṇā śuṣkalateva naḥ ।। 

karma marmaṇi nirmagnaṃ vāsanākhyam aśarmaṇe ।
jīvitaṃ janmane jīrṇaṃ naivottīrṇo bhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

dinānudinam ucchūnā bhogāśā bhayadāyinī ।
pūrṇāpūrṇātmani kṣīṇā śvabhrakaṇṭakavṛkṣavat ।। 

cintājvaravikāriṇyā lakṣmyāḥ khalu mahāpadaḥ ।
sampan nāma kṛtaṃ sāpi vipralambhena jṛmbhate ।। 

antassphuritaratnehaṃ bhāsuraṃ cāndhakoṭaram ।
kallolakalilaṃ śūnyaṃ cetaś śuṣkābdhidurbhagam ।। 

mām indriyārthaikaparaṃ na spṛśanti vivekinaḥ ।
sakaṇṭakam amedhyasthaṃ śleṣmātakam iva drumam ।। 

asad eva mahārambhaṃ valgadarjunavātavat ।
mano ramaṇam aprāptaṃ śūnyaṃ duḥkhāya valgati ।। 

śāstrasajjanasamparkacandratārakadhāriṇī ।
ahambhāvollasadyakṣā kṣīṇā nājñānayāminī ।। 

ajñānadhvāntamattebhasiṃhaḥ karmatṛṇānalaḥ ।
udito na vivekārko vāsanārajanīkṣayaḥ ।। 

avastu vastuvad buddhaṃ mattaś cittamataṅgajaḥ ।
indriyāṇi nikṛntanti na jāne kiṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 

śāstradṛṣṭir api prājñair āśritā taraṇāya yā ।
sāpy adṛṣṭir ivāndhyāya vāsanāveśakāriṇī ।। 

tad evam atisammohe yat kāryam iha dāruṇe ।
udarkaśreyase tāta tan me kathaya pṛcchate ।। 

śāmyanti mohamihikāś śaradīva sādhau prāpte bhavanti vimalāś ca tathākhilāśāḥ ।
satyeti vāg bhavatu sādhujanopagītā madbodhanena bhavatā bhavaśāntidena ।। 

maṅkivairāgyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvyaśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃvedanaṃ bhāvanaṃ ca vāsanā kalaneti ca ।
anarthāyeha śabdārtho vigatārtho vijṛmbhate ।। 

vedanaṃ bhāvanaṃ viddhi sarvadoṣasamāśrayam ।
asminn evāpadas santi latā madhurase yathā ।। 

saṃsāramārge gahane vāsanāveśavāhinaḥ ।
upayāti vicitroccair vṛttavṛttāntasantatiḥ ।। 

vivekino vāsanayā saha saṃsārasambhramaḥ ।
kṣīyate mādhavasyānte śanair vanam ivārasam ।। 

asyās saṃsṛtisallakyā vāsanotsedhakāriṇī ।
kadalyā ghanajālinyā rasalekheva mādhavī ।। 

saṃsārābdhitayodeti vāsanātmā rasaś citau ।
yathā vanatayāntasstho madhumāsarasaḥ kṣitau ।। 

cinmātrād amalāc chūnyād ṛte kiñcin na vidyate ।
nānyat kvacid aparyante khe śūnyatvetarad yathā ।। 

vedanātmā raso asty anya iti yā pratibhā sthirā ।
eṣāvidyā bhramas tv eṣa eṣa saṃsāra ātataḥ ।। 

anālocanasaṃsiddha ālokenaiṣa naśyati ।
asadātmā sadābhāso bālavetālavat kṣaṇāt ।। 

sarvadṛśyadṛśo bodhe bodhasāratayaikatām ।
yānty aśeṣamahīpīṭhasaritpūra ivārṇave ।। 

mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā bhāṇḍaṃ mṛcchūnyaṃ tu na labhyate ।
cinmayaṃ hi tathā cetyaṃ cicchūnyaṃ tu nopalabhyate ।। 

bodhāvabuddhaṃ yad vastu bodha eva tad ucyate ।
nābodhaṃ budhyate bodho vairūpyāt tena nānyathā ।। 

draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyeṣu pratyekaṃ bodhamātratā ।
sāras tena tadanyatvaṃ nāsti kiñcit khapuṣpavat ।। 

sajātīyas sajātīyenaikatām anugacchati ।
anyo'nyānubhavas tena bhavaty ekatvaniścayaḥ ।। 

yadi kāṣṭhopalādīnāṃ na bhaved bodharūpatā ।
tat sadānupalambhas syād eteṣām asatām iva ।। 

yadā tv aśeṣā dṛśyaśrīr bodhamātraikarūpiṇī ।
tadānyevāpy ananyaiva satī bodhena bodhyate ।। 

sarvaṃ jagadgataṃ dṛśyaṃ bodhamātram idaṃ tatam ।
spandamātraṃ yathā vāyur jalamātraṃ yathārṇavaḥ ।। 

miśrībhūtā api hy ete jatukāṣṭhādayo yathā ।
mitho'nanubhavāmiśrā aikyaṃ hy anubhavo mithaḥ ।। 

anyo'nyānubhavo hy aikyam aikyaṃ tv anyo'nyavedanam ।
yathāmbhasoḥ kṣīrayor vā na kāṣṭhajatunor iva ।। 

aham ity eva bandhāya nāham ity eva muktaye ।
etāvanmātrake bhadre svāyatte kim aśaktatā ।। 

candradvayapratyayavan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhivat ।
kim anutthita evāyam asad evāham utthitaḥ ।। 

mamedam iti bandhāya na mamety eva muktaye ।
etāvanmātrake vastuny ātmāyatte kim ajñatā ।। 

yaḥ kāṣṭhabadaranyāyo yo ghaṭākāśayos sthitaḥ ।
sa sambandho api naivaikyam aikyam anyo'nyavedanam ।। 

anyo'nyavedanaṃ tv aikyaṃ bhāgaśo gatam apy alam ।
ajaḍaṃ taj jaḍaṃ vāpi naikaṃ rūpaṃ vimuñcati ।। 

nājaḍo jaḍatām eti svabhāvā hy anapāyinaḥ ।
yac cājaḍaṃ jaḍaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭe tatrāsti naikatā ।। 

vāsanāveśavalitāḥ kuvikāraśatātmabhiḥ ।
saṃsārāraṇyakuhare nṛtyanti hatakarmabhiḥ ।। 

vāsanārajjunā kṛṣṭā dūraṃ nītās svakarmabhiḥ ।
vrajanty adho'dho dhāvantaś śilāś śailacyutā iva ।। 

vyūḍhānāṃ vāsanāvātair nṛtṛṇānām itas tataḥ ।
tāny āpatanti duḥkhāni yāni vaktuṃ na pāryate ।। 

bhrāntyā bhṛśaṃ karatalāhatakandukābhaṃ lokāḥ patanti nirayeṣu rayeṇa raktāḥ ।
kledena tatra parijarjaratāṃ prayātāḥ kālāntareṇa punar anyanibhā bhavanti ।। 

maṅkibodhanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tryaśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃsāramārge gahane patitasyāpatanti hi ।
vṛttavṛttāntalakṣyāṇi kāṣṭhā iva ghanāgame ।। 

sarva eva tv ime bhāvāḥ parasparam asaṅginaḥ ।
aṭavyām upalānīva bhāvanaiteṣu śṛṅkhalā ।। 

cittam āndhyāya vṛttāntadrumair gahanayan sthitaḥ ।
rasarañjanayā loko vasanta iva kānanam ।। 

aho bata vicitrāṇi vāsanāvaśato avaśaiḥ ।
bhūtakair anubhūyante sukhaduḥkhāni janmasu ।। 

aho batātiviṣamā vāsanā yadvaśāj janaiḥ ।
avidyamāna evāyaṃ bhramo antar anubhūyate ।। 

āhlādino amṛtavataś śuddhasyālokakāriṇaḥ ।
śītalasyākhilārtheṣu jñasyendoś ca kim antaram ।। 

pūrvāparam anālocya yat kiñcid abhivāñchataḥ ।
nirmaryādasya mūḍhasya bālasya ca kim antaram ।। 

labdham āprāṇaparyantaṃ śubhāśubham anujjhatoḥ ।
āmiṣe ko viśeṣo asti vada mārjāramūḍhayoḥ ।। 

sarva eva tv ime bhāvā dehadāradhanādayaḥ ।
kṣipram āśuṣkasikatāśarāvaviśarāravaḥ ।। 

ābrahmastambaparyantam api yoniśateṣu ca ।
ākalpaṃ bhramataś cittaśāntir nāsti śamād ṛte ।। 

paryālocanamātreṇa bandhagandho na bādhate ।
gacchato mārgavaiṣamyam ivālokanakāriṇaḥ ।। 

na tavāvahitaṃ cittaṃ kāmaḥ kavalayiṣyati ।
sāvadhānasya buddhasya piśācaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati ।। 

yathekṣaṇaprasaraṇaṃ rūpālokanamātrakam ।
saṃvitprasaramātrātma tathā sāhaṃ jagat sthitam ।। 

yathākṣisaṃvṛtis sarvarūpālokaśamo arihan ।
saṃvitsaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma sarvadṛśyaśamas tathā ।। 

asad eva jagat sāhaṃ śuddhā saṃvit tanoti khe ।
īṣatprasaraṇenāśu spandanaṃ pavano yathā ।। 

sad ivāsatyam evedam akurvatyaiva manyate ।
vidā hemneva kumbhatvam apṛthaglabhyam ātmagam ।। 

śūnyamātraṃ yathā vyoma spandamātraṃ yathānilaḥ ।
jalamātraṃ yathormyādi saṃvinmātraṃ jagat tathā ।। 

avyavacchinnanirbhāgasaṃvinmātraṃ jagattrayam ।
viddhi śāntaṃ tathā vyoma yathā vāriṇi parvatam ।। 

nirvāṇasyopaśāntasya jñasya sodeti śītatā ।
antar yatrendavo apy ete dīptajvalanabandhavaḥ ।। 

kiṃ kena katham ekāntaśāntātataśivātmani ।
nirāloke parāloke śūnye jagati janyate ।। 

yā sattā brahmaśabdākhyā rūpaṃ sarvasya tan nijam ।
na yatra kācid bādhāsti sarvaṃ tanmayam avyayam ।। 

yad idaṃ tu padārthatvaṃ yatra bādhānubhūyate ।
yac ca vā bādhanaṃ prekṣya tan na vidmaḥ khapuṣpavat ।। 

jña evāpagatasvāntaṃ śāntam āssva mahāśmavat ।
abodhamanano maunam anantam ajam avyayam ।। 

ākāśakalpe sve bhāve tiṣṭhato aṅgādivedanam ।
bhavaty abhyāsadārḍhyena vinā svapnavikāravat ।। 

nirupādānasambhāram abhittāv eva cetati ।
brahmākartṛ jagaccitraṃ na kaścid vā na kiñcana ।। 

tanoti yat tad ātmaiva tasya tatra tathā sthitam ।
dṛśyābhāvād ataddarśī tena kaḥ kva karoti kim ।। 

ahaṃ sukhīti sukhitā ahaṃ duḥkhīti duḥkhitāḥ ।
sarva eva svabhāvasthā vyomātmāno api pārthivāḥ ।। 

sarveṣām eva bhāvānāṃ vidākāśātmanām api ।
mithyaiva svapnaśailānām iva pārthivatāsti te ।। 

ahantollekhatas sattā bhramabhāravikāriṇī ।
tadabhāvāt svabhāvaikaniṣṭhatā śamaśālinī ।। 

hemnaḥ kaṭakaśabdārtho vyatirikto yathāsti no ।
vyatiriktā tathāsatyā nāhantāsti śamātmanaḥ ।। 

nirvāṇo nirmanā maunī kartākartā ca śītalaḥ ।
jña ekaś śānta evāste śūnya evābhipūritaḥ ।। 

nirvāsanaṃ spandamāno yantraputrakagātravat ।
sa yathāsthitam evāste jñas saṃvyavaharann api ।। 

yathā mañcakasaṃsthasya spandate naiva vā śiśoḥ ।
aṅgālir anusandhānaṃ vinaivaṃ viditātmanaḥ ।। 

nissambodhaikabodhasya nirāśehaiṣaṇāśiṣaḥ ।
śāntāhantvātmarūpatvād anusandhānitā kutaḥ ।। 

adraṣṭur apadṛśyasya dṛgrūpasyāparūpiṇaḥ ।
kutaḥ kilānusandhānam anapekṣasya paśyataḥ ।। 

apekṣaiva ghano bandho hy anapekṣaiva muktatā ।
sarvaśabdānvitā tasyāṃ viśrāntena kim īkṣyate ।। 

pārthivatve śarīre asmin svasvapnādrāv ivāsati ।
bhramamātrātmani kutaḥ kva kasya kim apekṣaṇam ।। 

upaśāntasamastehaṃ vigatākhilakautukam ।
nirastavedanaṃ jñena vidā kevalam āsyate ।। 

maṅkineti śrutavatā tato moho mahān api ।
aśeṣeṇa parityaktas tatra vai tvag ivāhinā ।। 

pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvatāpāstavāsanam ।
tena varṣaśatasyānte sthitam adrau samādhinā ।। 

tatrādya yāvat pāṣāṇasamadharmā sa tiṣṭhati ।
śāntāntaḥkaraṇo yogī bodhyamānaḥ prabudhyate ।। 

etena rāghava vivekapadena śāntim āsādayodayavatā manasā vihartum ।
mā dīnatāṃ vrajatu rāgamayī matis te kṣīṇā kṣaṇād asalileva śaradghanālī ।। 

maṅkinirvāṇasamāptir nāma sargaḥ

caturaśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nirvāṇo bhava śāntātmā yathāpraptānuvṛttimān ।
sann evāsatsamas somyas sphaṭikād iva nirmitaḥ ।। 

ekasminn eva sarvasmin saṃsthite vitatātmani ।
naikasmin na ca sarvasmin nānātā kalanāḥ kutaḥ ।। 

ādyantarahitaṃ sarvaṃ vyoma cittattvanirbharam ।
śarīrotpattināśeṣu kā cittattvasya khaṇḍanā ।। 

sphuranti hi jagatkrīḍāś ciccamatkāracāpalāt ।
acāpalāt pralīyante taraṅgā iva vāriṇi ।। 

yathā śubhrāmbude vastraśaṅkā na phalabhāginī ।
deho ayam aham ity eṣā tathā śaṅkā na vāstavī ।। 

māvastuni nimagnas tvaṃ bhava bhūribhayaprade ।
vastv anantasukhāyādyaṃ bhavya bhāvaya bhūtaye ।। 

cidvyomānanta evāsmi neyattāsti mamātmanaḥ ।
ity evaṃ paramaṃ vastu vastutas stutyam astu te ।। 

evaṃniścayavān rāma tvam evāsi nirañjanaḥ ।
dhyātā dhyeyaṃ tathā dhyānaṃ satyaṃ vāpi na kiñcana ।। 

draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ darśanaṃ ca cita etā vibhūtayaḥ ।
atas tat saṃvido nānyad adhyeyaṃ dhyeyam asti vā ।। 

udyati pratipaccandre vahati pralayānile ।
ātmatattvaṃ samaṃ somyaṃ na kṣubhyati na śāmyati ।। 

yathā nauyāyinas sthāṇutaruśailādicopanam ।
yathā śuktau rajatadhīs tathā dehādi cetasaḥ ।। 

yathā dehādi cittasya tathā dehasya cittakam ।
tathaiva jīvaḥ parame dvaitam aikyam ataḥ kutaḥ ।। 

sarvam evam idaṃ śāntaṃ brahma bṛṃhitavedanam ।
na kiñcij jagadādy asti bhrāntir anyā na vidyate ।। 

na vidyate yathā vyomni vanaṃ snehaś ca saikate ।
vidyuc chaśāṅkabimbe vā tathā dehādi cetasi ।। 

avidyamāne evāsmin mā bibhīhi jagadbhrame ।
etad eva paraṃ satyaṃ viddhi satyavidāṃ vara ।। 

jagad asti na me veti yāsīd bhrāntis tavādya sā ।
śāntā madupadeśena kim anyad bandhakāraṇam ।। 

sthālyudañcanakumbhādi yathā mṛṇmātrakaṃ tathā ।
cittamātraṃ jagad idaṃ kṣīṇaṃ tac ca vicāraṇāt ।। 

āpatsu sampatsu bhavābhaveṣu śāntaiṣaṇāharṣaviṣādasaṃvit ।
sāmyād ahambhāvavidā vimukto yathāsthitaṃ tiṣṭha vilīya vāssva ।। 

yathāsthitaṃ vastv avagamya samyak sthito asi ced vā svakulāmbarendo ।
tad dharṣaśokaiṣaṇadūṣaṇādi vimucya vāśritya yatheccham āssva ।। 

yathāsukhavyavahārayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bījāṅkurāṇāṃ puruṣakarmaṇāṃ janmakāriṇām ।
daivaśabdārthayuktānāṃ tattvaṃ vada vibho punaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

daivakarmādiparyāyaṃ ghaṭādighaṭanāvadhi ।
saṃvitspandanam evedaṃ loke puruṣatāṃ gatam ।। 

saṃvitspandād ṛte puṃstvaṃ karma vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet ।
ghaṭāvaṭapaṭādyātma hy etenaiva jagat kṛtam ।। 

pravartate jagallakṣmīs saṃvitspandāt savāsanāt ।
nivartate hi saṃsāras saṃvitspandād avāsanāt ।। 

avāsanaṃ hi saṃvittes spandam aspandanaṃ viduḥ ।
sa spando apy apsu na spando yenāvartādi nohyate ।। 

manāg api na bhedo asti saṃvitspandamayātmanoḥ ।
kalpanāṃśād ṛte rāma sṛṣṭau puruṣakarmaṇoḥ ।। 

jalavīcyor yathā dvitvaṃ saṅkalpotthaṃ na vāstavam ।
tatheha citparispandarūpayor jantukarmaṇoḥ ।। 

karmaiva puruṣo rāma puruṣasyaiva karmatā ।
ete hy abhinne viddhi tvaṃ yathā tuhinaśītate ।। 

himaṃ yat tad yathā śaityaṃ yac chaityaṃ tad yathā himam ।
yat karmāsau tathā jantur yo jantuḥ karma tat tathā ।। 

saṃvitspandarasasyaite daivakarmanarādayaḥ ।
paryāyaśabdā na punaḥ pṛthak karmādayas sthitāḥ ।। 

spandāt saṃvij jagadbījam aspandād yāty abījatām ।
aṅkuraś ca tad evāntassthitatvād aṅkuraśriyaḥ ।। 

cittvaṃ ca kvacid aspandaṃ kvacit spandi svabhāvataḥ ।
anantam ekārṇavavad adikkālakramaṃ sthitam ।। 

saṃvitspando vāsanāvān iha bījam akāraṇam ।
bhūtvā kāraṇatām eti dehāder aṅkurāvaleḥ ।। 

tṛṇavallīlatāgulmabījāṅkuragater api ।
bījaṃ saṃvitspanda eva tasya bījaṃ na vidyate ।। 

na bījāṅkurayor bhedo vidyate agnyauṣṇyayor iva ।
bījam evāṅkuraṃ viddhi viddhi karmaiva mānavam ।। 

saṃvit sphurantī bhūkośe karoti sthāvarāṅkuram ।
sthūlān sūkṣmān mṛdūn krūrān payo budbudakān iva ।। 

vidā vinā dharākośād atyantaparipelavāt ।
aṅkurān vajrasārāṃś ca ka ullāsayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

prāṇivīryarasāntassthā saṃvij jaṅgamam ātatam ।
tanoti latikāntasstho rasaḥ puṣpaphalaṃ yathā ।। 

yadi sarvagatā saṃvid bhaven nātibalīyasī ।
tat ka ullāsane śaktas syād evāsurabhūbhṛtām ।। 

jaṅgamānāṃ sthāvarāṇām etad ādyaṃ hi bījakam ।
saṃvidvisphuraṇāmātram asya bījaṃ na vidyate ।। 

bījāṅkuravikalpānāṃ kriyāpuruṣakarmaṇām ।
ūrmivīcitaraṅgānāṃ nāmni bhedo na vastuni ।। 

dvitvaṃ nṛkarmaṇor yasya bījāṅkuradhiyāttayoḥ ।
vipaścitpaśave tasmai mahate astu sadā namaḥ ।। 

saṃvitter janmabījasya yo antasstho vāsanārasaḥ ।
sa karoty aṅkurollāsaṃ tam asaṅgāgninā daha ।। 

kurvato akurvataś caiva manasā yad amajjanam ।
śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu tad asaṅgaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

atha vā vāsanotsāda evāsaṅga iti smṛtaḥ ।
yayā kayācid yuktyāntas sampādaya tam eva hi ।। 

yayaiva vā vetsi tayā yuktyā puruṣayatnataḥ ।
vāsanāṃ kuru nirmūlām etad eva paraṃ śivam ।। 

pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yathā jānāsi vā tathā ।
nivārayāhambhāvāṃśam eṣo asau vāsanākṣayaḥ ।। 

nāsty eva pauruṣād anyā saṃsārottaraṇe gatiḥ ।
nirahambhāvarūpe asmin vāsanākṣayanāmani ।। 

ādyaiva saṃvid astīha so aṅkuro bījam asti tat ।
tat karma tac ca puruṣas tad daivaṃ tac chubhāśubham ।। 

na bījam ādāv asty anyan nāṅkuro na ca vā naraḥ ।
na karma na ca daivādi kevalaṃ vid udeti hi ।। 

no bījam asti na kilāṅkurako api vāsti nāpy asti karma puruṣaś ca na vāsti sādho ।
ekaṃ tu vittvam uditaṃ hy anayābhidhānalakṣmyā naṭas suranarāsuraśobhayeva ।। 

ity eva niścayam anāmaya bhāvayitvā tyaktvā bhṛśaṃ puruṣakarmavicāraśaṅkām ।
nirvāsanas sakalasaṅkalanāvimuktas saṃvidvapur nanu yathābhimateccham āssva ।। 

praśāntasarveccham aśaṅkam acchacinmātrasaṃstho akhilakāryakārī ।
ātmaikarāmaḥ paripūrṇakāmo bhavābhayo rāma śamābhirāmaḥ ।। 

nirāśaṅkatvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍaśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nityam antarmukhas tiṣṭha vītarāgo vivāsanaḥ ।
cinmātram amalaṃ śāntaṃ brahma sarvatra bhāvayan ।। 

ākāśaviśadaprajñaś cinmātraikaghanasthitiḥ ।
samas somyas samānandas sadbrahmodbṛṃhitāśayaḥ ।। 

śokeṣv āpatsu ghorāsu saṅkaṭeṣv avaṭeṣu ca ।
yathāprāpteṣu sarveṣu kharveṣūnnatimatsu ca ।। 

yathākramaṃ yathādeśaṃ kuru duḥkham aduḥkhitaḥ ।
bāṣpākrandādiparyantaṃ vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

samāgameṣu kāntānāṃ cotsaveṣūdayeṣu ca ।
ānandaṃ bhaja somyātmā vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

bhūtāni mṛtyukāryeṣu saṅgrāmādiṣu nirdayam ।
dahānalas tṛṇānīva vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

kramāgateṣv akhinno arthaṃ bakavac cintayārjaya ।
arthopārjanakāryeṣu vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

balād vidalayāśeṣān arīn arinisūdana ।
vāto riktān ivāmbhodān vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

janeṣu karuṇārheṣu dīneṣu karuṇāṃ kuru ।
ātmārāmamanā maunī vāsanākrāntamūḍhavat ।। 

mudito bhava harṣeṣu duḥkheṣu bhava duḥkhitaḥ ।
karuṇāṃ kuru dīneṣu vīreṣu bhava vīryavān ।। 

antarmukhas sadānandas svātmārāmatayānvitaḥ ।
yat karoṣi śamodāras tatra kartāsi nānagha ।। 

ātmabhāvanayā sādho nityam antarmukhasthiteḥ ।
vajradhārāpi te rāma patitā yāti kuṇṭhatām ।। 

saṅkalpakalanonmukte svasaṃvinmātrakoṭare ।
yas tiṣṭhaty ātmani svairam ātmārāmo maheśvaraḥ ।। 

na taṃ bhindanti śastrāṇi na dahanti hutāśanāḥ ।
na kledayanti vārīṇi śoṣayanti na mārutāḥ ।। 

sustambham alam āliṅgya svātmānam ajarāmaram ।
tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhadhīrātmā sustambham iva mandiram ।। 

jagadvṛkṣapadārthaughapuṣpāmodaśriyaṃ parām ।
saṃvidaṃ saṃvidan svacchām āssvāntarmukham acyutaḥ ।। 

antarmukhatayā nityaṃ kāryam āharatāṃ bahiḥ ।
jīvatām api nodeti vāsanā dṛṣadām iva ।। 

punaḥprasaraṇonmuktam antassuptaṃ manaḥ kuru ।
kurvan sarvāṇi karmāṇi kūrmāṅgavad avṛttimān ।। 

antarvṛttivihīnena bahirvṛttimateva ca ।
suptaprabuddhaprāyeṇa kāryam ācara cetasā ।। 

bālamūkādivijñānavad antastyaktavāsanam ।
bhavataḥ kurvataḥ kāryaṃ khavac cittaṃ na lipyate ।। 

vṛttityāgavilīnena kiñcitprasaratā bahiḥ ।
antar atyantasuptena cetasā tiṣṭha vijvaram ।। 

asaṅkalpakalaṅkāyāṃ jñānāc cittakṣayodaye ।
śuddhāyāṃ saṃvidi sthitvā kuru mā kuru vānagha ।। 

suṣuptasamayā vṛttyā jāgrad vyavaharan svapan ।
gṛhāṇa mā kiñcid api mā ca kiñcit parityaja ।। 

jāgraty api suṣuptaś cej jāgarṣi ca suṣuptake ।
jāgratsuṣuptayor aikyāt tad asy asi nirāmayaḥ ।। 

evam ādyantarahitam abhyāsena śanaiś śanaiḥ ।
padam āsādayādvandvam atītaṃ sarvavastunaḥ ।। 

na ca dvaitaṃ na caivaikyaṃ jagad ity eva niścayī ।
paramām ehi viśrāntim ākāśaviśadāśayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

yady evaṃ muniśārdūla tad ahampratyayātmakaḥ ।
bhavān eveha kiṃ tāvad vasiṣṭhākhyas tato vada ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

rāghave gadati tv evaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ ।
tūṣṇīm eva muhūrtārdham atiṣṭhat spaṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ ।। 

tasmiṃs tūṣṇīṃ sthite kiṃ syād iti sabhye mahājane ।
patite saṃśayāmbhodhau rāmaḥ punar uvāca ha ।। 

rāmaḥ

kimarthaṃ bhagavaṃs tūṣṇīṃ bhavān aham iva sthitaḥ ।
na so asti jagati nyāyas satāṃ yatrottarakṣayaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

na me vaktum aśakyatvād uktikṣaya upasthitaḥ ।
kiṃ tu praśnasya te adyāsya tūṣṇīm evānaghottaraḥ ।। 

dvividho bhavati praṣṭā tattvajño ajño atha vāpi ca ।
ajñasyājñatayā deyo jñasya tu jñatayottaraḥ ।। 

etāvantam abhūt kālaṃ bhavān ajñātatatpadaḥ ।
bhājanaṃ savikalpānām uttarāṇāṃ mahāmate ।। 

tajjñas tvam adhunā jāto viśrāntaḥ parame pade ।
yogyo na savikalpānām uttarāṇām asi sphuṭam ।। 

yāvān kaścit kilollekho vāṅmayo vadatāṃ vara ।
sūkṣmārthaḥ paramārtho vā bahur alpataro api vā ।। 

pratiyogivyavacchedasaṅkhyābhedādibhir bhramaiḥ ।
sa sa sarvo aṅkitas sādho bhā iva trasareṇubhiḥ ।। 

uttaraṃ sakalaṅkaṃ ca tajjño nārhati sundara ।
nākalaṅkā ca vāg asti tvaṃ ca tajjñataras sthitaḥ ।। 

yathābhūtaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ jñasyāntevāsino mayā ।
yathābhūtaṃ viduḥ kāṣṭhamaunam antavivarjitam ।। 

avirāmam asaṅkalpaṃ maunam āhuḥ paraṃ padam ।
tad eva tava tajjñasya dattas sundara uttaraḥ ।। 

yanmayo hi bhavaty aṅga puruṣo vakti tādṛśam ।
jñeyamātram asac cāhaṃ vāgatīte pade sthitaḥ ।। 

vāgatītapadastho hi kathaṃ gṛhṇāti vāṅmalam ।
avācyaṃ vacmi no tena vāg ghi saṅkalpanāṅkitā ।। 

rāmaḥ

vāci ye ye pravartante tān anādṛtya doṣakān ।
pratiyogivyavacchedapūrvakān vada ko bhavān ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

evaṃ sthite rāghaveha yathābhūtam idaṃ śṛṇu ।
kas tvaṃ ko ahaṃ jagad vā kim iti tattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

ayaṃ tāvad ahaṃ śāntaś cidāloko nirāmayaḥ ।
cetyasaṃvedyarahitas sarvasaṅkalpanātigaḥ ।। 

svacchaṃ cidākāśam ahaṃ bhavān ākāśam eva ca ।
jagac cākāśam akhilaṃ sarvam ākāśamātrakam ।। 

śuddhajñānaikarūpātmā śuddhajñānamayātmani ।
anyasaṃviddaśonmuktas tv anyad vaktuṃ na vedmy aham ।। 

svapakṣodbhāvanaparā ahantātmaikabandhanam ।
mokṣārtham apy udyamino nayanti śataśākhatām ।। 

jīvato apy upaśāntasya vyavahāravato api vā ।
śavavad yad avasthānaṃ tad āhuḥ paramaṃ padam ।। 

abahissādhanaṃ śāntam anantassādhanaṃ samam ।
na sukhaṃ nāsukhaṃ nāhaṃ nānyad ity āsitaṃ śivam ।। 

muktatāyā ahanteyam abhāvo bhāvanāṅkayā ।
tayaivānviṣyate seti jātyandhaś citram īkṣate ।। 

spandane aspandane caiva yat pāṣāṇavad āsitam ।
ajaḍasyaiva tad viddhi nirvāṇam ajaraṃ padam ।। 

tac ca nānyo vijānāti svayam evānubhūyate ।
lokaiṣaṇāviraktena jñena jñatvam ivātmani ।। 

nātrāhantā na ca tvattā nāhantā naiva cānyatā ।
kevalaṃ kevalībhāvo nirvāṇam amalaṃ śivam ।। 

cetyonmukhatvam evāhuś cetanasyāsya cetanam ।
eṣa eva ca saṃsāro bandhaḥ kleśāya bhūyase ।। 

cetanasyācetanatvam acetyonmukhatātmakam ।
mokṣaṃ viddhi paraṃ śāntaṃ padam avyayam eva ca ।। 

dikkālādyanavacchinne śānte śāntātmani sthite ।
cetyaṃ na sambhavaty eva kaḥ kiṃ cetayatāṃ katham ।। 

saṅkalpasvapnadṛśye antas saṃvinmātrātmatāṃ vinā ।
yathā nānyad bhaved rūpaṃ tathaivāsmin bahirgate ।। 

manobuddhyādayaś caite saṃvinmātrātmarūpiṇaḥ ।
manobuddhyādiśabdārthabhāvitās tu jaḍātmakāḥ ।। 

saṃvinmātre same svacche sabāhyābhyantare tate ।
abhinne bhedabuddhir vaḥ kim anarthāya jṛmbhate ।। 

saṃvinmātrasya śuddhasya śūnyasya ca kim antaram ।
yac cāntaraṃ tad vibudhā vidanty eti na vāggatim ।। 

sadasadrūpa ābhāso yathā kim api lakṣyate ।
tamasīkṣitayatnena brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā gatam ।। 

ayam ākāśam evāhaṃ yadi śāmyāmy avāsanam ।
vāsanāṃ tu na badhnāmi sthita evāsmi cinnabhaḥ ।। 

itiniścayavān antas tajjño ajña iva sañjñayā ।
vidvapur vidyamāno api śāmyaty asad iva svayam ।। 

jīvānāṃ jñaptiguhyena jvalaty ajñānavāyunā ।
avidyāgniḥ prabuddhānāṃ punas tenaiva śāmyati ।। 

ajaḍānāṃ yad ajñānaṃ sthāṇūnām iva śāmyatām ।
tam āhur mokṣam akṣubdham āsitaṃ yad apakṣayam ।। 

jñatvenājñatvam āsādya munir bhavati mānavaḥ ।
ajñatvād ajñatām etya prayāti paśuvṛkṣatām ।। 

ahaṃ brahma jagac cedam ity avidyāmayo bhramaḥ ।
asatyaḥ prekṣayā dhvāntaṃ dīpeneva na labhyate ।। 

samagrakaraṇagrāmo apy asaṅkalpo vivedanaḥ ।
na kiñcid apy anubhavaty antar bāhye ca śāntadhīḥ ।। 

suṣuptatva iva svapnas samādhau pravilīyate ।
dṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ jñabodhe antaḥ punaḥ khātmaiva lakṣyate ।। 

talavattvaṃ yathā vyomni tathā pṛthvyāditā śive ।
bhrāntimātrād ṛte nānyā yathā vyoma tathā śivaḥ ।। 

vāsanābhir upeto api samastābhir avāsanaḥ ।
bhavaty asāv asat sarvam idam ity eva yasya dhīḥ ।। 

saṅkalpaiṣyadbhūtabhavyasvapnamāyendrajālajāḥ ।
yadvat saṃsṛtayas tadvad dṛṣṭe apy āsthā kim atra vaḥ ।। 

na duḥkham asti na sukhaṃ na puṇyaṃ na ca pātakam ।
na kiñcit kasyacin naṣṭaṃ kartur bhoktur asambhavāt ।। 

sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirālambaṃ mamatāpratyayo apy ayam ।
dvicandrasvapnapuravad yasyāsau so api nāsti naḥ ।। 

kevalo vyavahārasthaḥ kāṣṭhamaunarato atha vā ।
kāṣṭhapāṣāṇavat tiṣṭhan brahmatām adhigacchati ।। 

śāntatve citratve nānānānātmanīha caiva śive ।
avayavino avayavatve tv iva yuktir vidyate nānyā ।। 

arthagates svatvasya ca bhāvasya ca naiva sambhavād amale ।
etasmin sarvagate brahmaṇi nāsti svabhāvoktiḥ ।। 

na ca nāstitopalambhāt saṃvitter astitā ca naivāje ।
grāhyagrāhakadṛṣṭer asambhavād asti kiñcid api ।। 

samam amalam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ śivam ajam akṣayam āsitaṃ samaṃ yat ।
tad avitathapadaṃ tathāssva śāntaṃ piba cala bhuṅkṣva bhavān ayaṃ hi nāsti ।। 

nirvāṇabhāvanāpratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptāśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahantaiva parāvidyā nirvāṇapadarodhinī ।
tayaivānviṣyate mūḍhais tad ity unmattaceṣṭitam ।। 

ahantaivālam ajñānām ajñatvasya nidarśanam ।
na hi tajjñasya śāntasya mamāham iti vidyate ।। 

ahantāmalam utsṛjya nirvāṇaḥ kham ivāmalam ।
sadeham apadehaṃ vā jñas tiṣṭhati gatajvaram ।। 

na tathā śaradākāśam na tathā stimito arṇavaḥ ।
pūrṇendumadhyaṃ na tathā yathā jñaḥ parirājate ।। 

citre saṅgarasainyasya yuddhasyākṣubdhatā yathā ।
tathaikā samatā jñasya vyavahāravato api ca ।। 

nirvāṇaikatayā jñasya vāsanaiva na vāsanā ।
lekhā dāmopamās tv abdher ūrmyādi na jaletarat ।। 

tarattaraṅgo jaladhir jalam eva yathākhilam ।
dṛśyocchūnam api brahma tathā brahmaiva netarat ।। 

antarastaṅgato akṣubdho bahirastaṅgataś śamī ।
vidyate codito yaś ca sa mukta iti kathyate ।। 

ahantvasargarūpeṇa saṃvit saṃvinmaye pare ।
sphuraty ambho ambhasīvāto nānāteyaṃ kimātmikā ।। 

dhūmasya sphurato vyomni yathāgājagajādayaḥ ।
vyūhā dhūmān na te bhinnās tathā sargāḥ pare pade ।। 

saṃvidbhrāntivicāreṇa bhrāntyalābhavilāsinā ।
vijayadhvaṃ viṣādaṃ mā gatājñās tajjñatāsti vaḥ ।। 

aṅkuro anubhavaty antar vṛkṣaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ yathā ।
tathā jagadahantve jñaḥ khātmā khātma kham apy akham ।। 

rūpālokamanassattā jalārciṣṣv iva daṇḍatāḥ ।
satyo api na ca santy etā bhrānteś cittācalā iva ।। 

yathāsukhaṃ yathārambhaṃ yathānāśaṃ yathodayam ।
yathādeśaṃ yathākālam ajarāś śāntam āsyatām ।। 

iṣṭāniṣṭopalambheṣu śāntaṃ vyavaharann api ।
śavavan nānyatām antar nirvāṇo anubhavaty alam ।। 

amanovāsanāhantā dhatte yasya jagac ciram ।
jīvato ajīvataś caiva cijjīvas sa paraṃ padam ।। 

mattaiva jaḍavāhena duḥkhabhārāya kevalam ।
nṛṇāṃ pāśāvabaddhānāṃ potakānām ivārṇave ।। 

mokṣasattāṃ śrayati tāṃ nājño ananubhavād iva ।
mṛtena kila yat prāptaṃ jīvan prāpnoti tat katham ।। 

yad yat saṅkalpyate tat tat saṅkalpād eva nāśabhāk ।
na sambhavati yatraitat tat satyaṃ padam akṣayam ।। 

nānyo na cāham astīti bhāvanān nirbhayo bhava ।
satyaṃ yuktyā bhavaty etad viṣam apy amṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

jaḍaṃ dehādicittāntaṃ vicārya sakalaṃ vapuḥ ।
labhyate nāham asmīti tasmān nāsmīti satyatā ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣāṇām ahantāntaṃ vicāriṇām ।
kevalaṃ muktatodeti na tu kiñcid vinaśyati ।। 

bhogatyāgavicārātmapauruṣān nānyad atra hi ।
upayujyata ity ajñās svātmaivāśu praṇamyatām ।। 

nirvāsanaṃ mananam evam udāharanti mokṣaṃ vinā bhavati tac ca na jātu bodhāt ।
sanno jagadbhrama itīha paraḥ prabodho na pratyayo atra yad atas sa cirāya bandhaḥ ।। 

jagad aham asad ity avetya samyak sutadhanadāraśarīranirvyapekṣaḥ ।
bhavati hi sahacetano dṛṣad yas sa param itaḥ khalu nānyathāsti muktiḥ ।। 

paramārthopanyāsopadeśayogo nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāśītyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvātmani cidābhāse tad evāśv anubhūyate ।
saṃvedyate yad evāntar asatyaṃ satyavastu vā ।। 

tad evābhyāsataḥ pūrvaṃ bāhyārthānubhavātmanā ।
sphuraty eva bahiṣṭvena svasvapno atra nidarśanam ।। 

cidrūpaṃ sarvam etac ca cic cācchā gaganād api ।
vic ca no kiñcid evāto naitat kiñcana kutracit ।। 

na nāśo nāstitā nārtho na janmamaraṇe na kham ।
na śūnyatāsti no nāsti sarvaṃ brahmaiva naiva ca ।। 

nāśe jagadahantvāder na kiñcid api naśyati ।
asataḥ kila nāśe api svapnādreḥ kiṃ vinaśyati ।। 

mithyāvabhāse saṅkalpanagare keva naṣṭatā ।
tathā jagadahantvādau nāśo nāsati vidyate ।। 

kuto jagadupālambha iti cet tad avastuni ।
na nirṇayas sambhavati khapuṣpāṇāṃ kim umbhyate ।। 

nirṇayas tv eṣa evātra yad aśeṣam abhāvayan ।
yathāsthitaṃ yathācāraṃ pāṣāṇa iva tiṣṭhasi ।। 

jagat saṅkalpamātrātma tan nañarthayutaṃ kṣaṇāt ।
śāmyaty aśeṣeṇety eva nirṇayas sargavibhrame ।। 

sargo anargala evāyaṃ brahmātmakatayākṣayaḥ ।
anyathāpi na sargo ayam asti nāsti ca sargatā ।। 

yeṣāṃ na vidyate sargas svapnapuṃsām ivāsatām ।
sa sargaḥ puruṣās te ca mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvīcivat ।। 

asatām eva sadbhāvam iva caiṣām upeyuṣām ।
na vayaṃ nirṇayaṃ vidmo vandhyāputragirām iva ।। 

paripūrṇārṇavaprakhyā kāpy apūrvaiva pūrṇatā ।
tajjñānāṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyāṃśadṛṣṭau na hi patanti te ।। 

acalā iva nirvātā dīpā iva śamāmbv iva ।
sācārā vā nirācārās tiṣṭhanti svastham eva te ।। 

āpūrṇaikārṇavaprakhyā kāpy antaḥpūrṇatoditā ।
antaśśītalatā jñaptir jñasyāpūrvaiva lakṣyate ।। 

vāsanaiveha puruṣaḥ prekṣitā sā na vidyate ।
tāṃ ca na prekṣate kaścit tatas saṃsāra ātataḥ ।। 

anālokanasiddhaṃ yat tad ālokān na vidyate ।
kṛṣṇāhyanupalambho atra dṛṣṭāntas spaṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ ।। 

bhūtāni dehamāṃsādi tac cāsadvibhramo jaḍaḥ ।
buddhyahaṅkāracetāṃsi tanmayāny eva netarat ।। 

bhūtādimayatāṃ tyaktvā buddhyahaṅkāracetasām ।
atyantaṃ sthitir abhyeti yadi tan muktatoditā ।। 

cic chiṣṭā cetyaniṣṭhatvāt tādṛśy evātra kāstitā ।
tasmāt keva kutaḥ kutra vāsanā kiṃsvarūpiṇī ।। 

yasya caiṣa bhramas so asan prekṣayāsan na labhyate ।
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat tena saṃsāraḥ kasya kaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

tad evaṃ tarhi kasya syād iti cintodayo hi yaḥ ।
punas sa eva saṃsāravibhramas sampravartate ।। 

tasmāt sarvam anāśritya vyomavat samam āsyatām ।
apunassmaraṇaṃ śreya iha vismaraṇaṃ param ।। 

neha draṣṭā na bhoktāsti nāstitā na ca nāstitā ।
yathāsthitam idaṃ śāntam ekaṃ spandi sadābdhivat ।। 

sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagad brahma sad ity avagate sphuṭam ।
jalaśoṣād ivodeti bimbibimbakṣaye śivam ।। 

śāntatā vyavahāro vā rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ ।
viśrāntasya pare tattve dṛśyate samadarśinaḥ ।। 

atha vā śāntataivāsya nirvāṇasyāvaśiṣyate ।
nirvāsanaḥ kila muniḥ kathaṃ vyavaharatv asau ।। 

yāvat tv asya na nirvāṇaṃ paripoṣam upāgatam ।
tāvad vyavaharaty astarāgadveṣabhayodayaḥ ।। 

vītarāgabhayakrodho nirvāṇaś śāntamānasaḥ ।
śilevāpy aśilībhūto munir ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

kośe asti padmabījasya yathā sarvābjinī tathā ।
ananyā svapnavibhrāntir ātmany asti na bāhyatā ।। 

bāhyatābhāvanād bāhyam ātmaivātmatvabhāvanāt ।
bhavatīdaṃ pare tattve bhāvanaṃ tat tad eva hi ।। 

yāntassvapnādivibhrāntis saiveyaṃ bāhyatoditā ।
manāg apy anyatā nātra dvibhāṇḍapayasor iva ।। 

sthairyāsthairye tathaivātra bhrāntimātramaye tate ।
ādhārādheyate te dve yathā jalataraṅgate ।। 

svapnādāv ātmano anyatvajñānād anyatvavedanam ।
ananyabhāvabodhe tu tad ananyan na codayi ।। 

kalanārahitaṃ śāntaṃ yad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।
bhavaty asau tat tadbhāvād atadbhāvān na tad bhavet ।। 

svapnādijñānasaṃśāntau yad rūpaṃ śuddham aiśvaram ।
na tad asti na tan nāsti na vāggocaram eti tat ।। 

ātyantike bhrāntilaye mukta evāvagacchati ।
svarūpaṃ nopadeśasya viṣayo viduṣo api tat ।। 

śāntaṃ nirastabhayamānaviṣādalobhamohātma dehamananendriyacittajāḍyam ।
tyaktvāham akṣayam apāstasamastabhedaṃ nirvāṇam ekam ajam āsitam eva yuktam ।। 

nirvāṇayuktyupadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekonanavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yadā citiḥ prasarati tadāhantājagadbhramaḥ ।
asad evābhyudetīva spandād apsv iva dāmatā ।। 

udito api na khedāya brahmarūpatvavedanāt ।
paramāya tv anarthāya jagacchabdārthabhāvanāt ।। 

rūpānubhavam ādatte cakṣuḥ prasaraṇād yathā ।
citiḥ prasaraṇāt tadvaj jāgradvibhramam āsthitā ।। 

māsau prasaratu vyarthaṃ cetyābhāvān na sā satī ।
asat kathaṃ prasarati vandhyāputraḥ kva nṛtyati ।। 

ayaṃ tv anubhavād eva mudhaivānubhavas sthitaḥ ।
asad evānanubhavāt svayam arbhakayakṣavat ।। 

ayaṃ bhavāmi duḥkhārtham aham ity eva vedanāt ।
avedanān nāham atas svāyatte bandhamuktate ।। 

tad dhyānaṃ sa samādhir vo yad avedanam āsitam ।
ajaḍāṇāṃ jaḍam iva samaṃ śāntam anāmayam ।। 

dvaitādvaitasamudbhedair vākyasandarbhavibhramaiḥ ।
mā viṣīdata duḥkhāya vibudhā abudhā iva ।। 

asad āśrayate duḥkhaṃ svapnavad ghanavāsanaḥ ।
rūpālokamanaskārān saṅkalparacitān iva ।। 

duḥkhaṃ sad eva nāśnāti suptavat tanuvāsanaḥ ।
rūpālokamanaskārān saṅkalparahitān iva ।। 

atyantatanutāṃ yātā vāsanaivaiti muktatām ।
deśakālakriyāyogāt padārtho abhāvatām iva ।। 

atyantatanutāṃ yātā vāsanaivaiti muktatām ।
parāṇuparimāṇena khatāṃ khe abhrāditā yathā ।। 

abhāvaṃ bhāvanā yāti bodhena ghanatānavā ।
vipaścitsaṅgamābhyāsāt pāṇḍityam iva mūḍhatā ।। 

nāham asmīti sadyuktyā niścayo antaś śamātmakaḥ ।
jīvato ajīvataś cātirūḍho bodha iti smṛtaḥ ।। 

vāyau spanda ivātredaṃ jagadādy avabhāsate ।
ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ ceti vicāreṇaiva śāmyati ।। 

nāham ity eva nirvāṇaṃ kim etāvati mūḍhatā ।
satsaṅgamavicārābhyām etad āśv avagamyate ।। 

kṣīyate tattvavitsaṅgād aham ity eva bandhanam ।
ālokeneva timiraṃ divaseneva yāminī ।। 

ko ahaṃ katham idaṃ dṛśyaṃ ko jīvaḥ kiṃ ca jīvanam ।
iti tattvajñasaṃyogād yāvajjīvaṃ vicārayet ।। 

jīvitaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāti tamo aham iti naśyati ।
tattvālokena tajjñārkasevanāt sa niṣevyatām ।। 

yo yo bodhātiśayavāṃs taṃ taṃ pṛthag upāssva bhoḥ ।
saṅgasaṅkathayodeti teṣāṃ vādapiśācikā ।। 

vivādayakṣe abhyudite bālasyeva vipaścitaḥ ।
muktim uktām alaṃ mukhyam udety aham iti bhramaḥ ।। 

ataḥ pratyekam ekānte prājñas seveta paṇḍitam ।
ekīkṛtya taduktāṃs tān arthān buddhyā vicārayet ।। 

vicārayet taduktyarthaṃ buddhyā buddhivivṛddhaye ।
sarvasaṅkalpamuktaṃ yat tat sat tanmayatāṃ vrajet ।। 

vipaścitsaṅgame buddhiṃ nītvā paramatīkṣṇatām ।
ajñānalatikā saikā kaṇaśaḥ kriyatām alam ।। 

eṣo arthas sambhavaty eva tenedaṃ kathayāmy aham ।
anubhūtaṃ vayaṃ bālā nāsamañjasavedinaḥ ।। 

vyomno ambuvāhādivijṛmbhayeva taraṅgabhaṅgyeva mahārṇavasya ।
na yujyate nāpi ca naśyatīha nāśodaye nirmananasya kiñcit ।। 

idaṃ hi sarvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikāmbuvan nirāmaye brahmaṇi śānta ātate ।
vicārite nāham itīva vidyate kutaḥ kva kasmān mananādivibhramaḥ ।। 

satyāvabodhopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

navatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapauruṣeṇa svadhiyā satsaṅgamavikāsayā ।
yadi nānīyate jñatvaṃ tad upāyo asti netaraḥ ।। 

akalpitaṃ kalpitaṃ ca pratikalpanayā svayā ।
tad evānyatvam ādatte viṣatvam amṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

kalpanā cākalpanāntā muktatā tyaktakalpanam ।
etac ca bhogasantyāgapūrvaṃ sidhyati nānyathā ।। 

vacasā manasā cāntaś śabdārthāv avibhāvayan ।
ya āste vardhate tasya kalpanopaśamaś śanaiḥ ।। 

varjayitvāham ity eva nāvidyāstītarātmikā ।
śānte tv abhāvanād asmin nānyo mokṣo asti kaścana ।। 

ahambhāvam athādehaṃ kiñcic chrayasi naśyasi ।
jagadādau ciraṃ tasmiṃs tyakte śāmyasi sidhyasi ।। 

acetanād idaṃ sarvaṃ sad evāsad iva sthitam ।
śāntaṃ yasyopalasyeva namas tasmai mahātmane ।। 

acetanād idaṃ sarvam upalasyeva śāmyati ।
śūnyākhyāntaḥ parālīnacittasyācittabhāvanāt ।। 

idam astv atha vā māstu cetitaṃ duḥkhavṛddhaye ।
acetitaṃ sukhāyāntar acetanam acetanāt ।। 

dvau vyādhī dehino ghorāv ayaṃ lokas tathā paraḥ ।
yābhyāṃ ghorāṇi duḥkhāni bhuṅkte sarvatra pīḍitaḥ ।। 

ihaloke yatante ajñā vyādhau bhogadurauṣadhaiḥ ।
ājīvitaṃ yathāśakti cikitsā nāparāmaye ।। 

paralokamahāvyādhau prayatante cikitsitum ।
śamasatsaṅgabodhādyair amṛtaiḥ puruṣottamāḥ ।। 

paralokacikitsāyāṃ sāvadhānā bhavanti ye ।
mokṣamārgamahecchāyāṃ śamayuktyā jayanti te ।। 

ihaiva narakavyādheś cikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ ।
gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ sthānaṃ sa rogī kiṃ kariṣyati ।। 

ihalokacikitsābhir jīvitaṃ yātu mā kṣayam ।
ātmajñatauṣadhair ajñāḥ paralokaś cikitsyatām ।। 

āyur vāyucalatpattralambāmbukaṇabhaṅguram ।
paralokamahāvyādhir yatnenāśu cikitsyatām ।। 

paralokamahāvyādhau yatnenāśu cikitsite ।
dṛṣṭalokamayo vyādhis svayam āśūpaśāmyati ।। 

saṃvinmātraṃ vidur jantuṃ tasya prasaraṇaṃ jagat ।
paramāṇūdare apy asti tac chailaśatavistaram ।। 

yat saṃvidaḥ prasaraṇaṃ rūpālokamanāṃsi tat ।
vyomany evānubhūyante nātas satyo jagadbhramaḥ ।। 

pralayeṣv api dṛṣṭeṣu jagaddṛśyābhravibhramāḥ ।
na naśyanti na jāyante bhrāntimātraikarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

bhogapaṅkārṇave magna ātmā nottāryate yadi ।
svapauruṣacamatkṛtyā tad upāyo asti netaraḥ ।। 

ajitātmā jano mūḍho rūḍho bhogaikakardame ।
āpadāṃ pātratām eti payasām iva sāgaraḥ ।। 

jīvitasya yathā bālyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prathamakalpitam ।
nirvāṇasya tathā bhogasantyāgo rāgaśāntidaḥ ।। 

tajjñasya jīvitanadī sakallolāpy asambhramā ।
samaṃ vahati somyaiva citrasaṃstheva nīrasā ।। 

ajñajīvitanadyas tu rasenātyantabhīṣaṇāḥ ।
āvartāvṛttivikṣobhakallolās sahavāhinaḥ ।। 

sargavegāḥ pravalganti saṃvitprasaraleśakāḥ ।
dvicandrabālavetālamṛgāmbusvapnamohavat ।। 

saṃvidvāritaraṅgaughā bhānti sargās sahasraśaḥ ।
vicāritās tv asatyās te satyās tv anubhavabhramāt ।। 

jaganty ākāśakośe api saṃvitprasaraṇabhramāt ।
santīvāpy anubhūyante na tu satyāni tāni hi ।। 

saṃvidvikāsapayaso budbudas sargavibhramaḥ ।
aham ityādisadbhāvavikārākārarūpavān ।। 

saṃvinnirvāṇam ajagat saṃvidunmīlanaṃ jagat ।
nāntar na bāhyaṃ nāsatyaṃ na satyaṃ sarvam eva tat ।। 

cidrūpam ajam avyaktam ekam avyayam īśvaram ।
svatvabhāvatvarahitaṃ brahma śāntātma khād api ।। 

brahmaṇo nissvabhāvasya sargasaṃvedane svataḥ ।
spandane pavanasyeva kāraṇaṃ nopayujyate ।। 

svapnānubhavavad bhānti brahmābdhau brahmavīcayaḥ ।
sargatā vastutas tv atra na svapno na ca sargatā ।। 

ekam eva nirābhāsam acittvam ajaḍaṃ samam ।
na san nāsan na khaṃ nākham idam advayam avyayam ।। 

yathāsthitasyaiva sato yasyāsaṃvedanātmakam ।
saṃvitpraśamanaṃ jātaṃ tam āhur munisattamam ।। 

sato api mṛṇmayasyeva yasyāsaṃvedanātmakam ।
sāhaṃ jagad vigalitaṃ tam āhur munisattamam ।। 

yathā śāmyaty asaṅkalpāt saṅkalpanagaraṃ tathā ।
vedanotthaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti śāmyaty avedanāt ।। 

svabhāvavarjaṃ śabdārthās sarva eva sahetukāḥ ।
svabhāvasya tu yo hetur muktes tad anubhāvanam ।। 

na kasyacit padārthasya svabhāvo astīha kaścana ।
mahācidambudravatās sarvā evānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

mahācidanilaspandā etā evānubhūtayaḥ ।
etās tā brahmagaganaśūnyatā iti budhyatām ।। 

vātaspandāv ivābhinnau brahmasargau vibhinnatā ।
tayos tv asatyā svabhrāntes svapne svamaraṇopamā ।। 

bhrāntis tu tāvat tattvārthavicāro yāvad asphuṭaḥ ।
vicāre tu sphuṭe bhrāntir brahmatām eva gacchati ।। 

bhrāntis tv asatyāvastv eva prekṣayāto na labhyate ।
śaśaśṛṅgavad atyaccham ato brahmaiva śiṣyate ।। 

anādimadhyāntam anantam acchaṃ samaṃ śivaṃ śāśvatam ekam eva ।
sarvāṃ jarāmohavikārabhārabhrāntiṃ vimucyāmbarabhāvam ehi ।। 

satyārthopanyāsayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekanavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

prāpteṣu sukhaduḥkheṣu yo naśyati sa naśyati ।
yo na naśyaty anāśo asāv alaṃ śāstropadeśanaiḥ ।। 

yasya vecchodayas tasya santy avaśyaṃ sukhādayaḥ ।
te cet sāmyāc cikitsyante pūrvam icchaiva sohyatām ।। 

ahaṃ jagad iti bhrāntī na sta eva pare pade ।
idaṃ śāntam anālambaṃ sarvaṃ nirvāṇam avyayam ।। 

ahaṃ brahma jagac ceti śabdasandarbhavibhramaḥ ।
sarvasmiñ śānta ākāśe kena nāmopakalpitaḥ ।। 

nehāsty ahaṃ na ca jagan na ca brahmādiśabdakāḥ ।
śāntasyaikasya sarvatvāt kartā bhokteha kaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

upadeśātiśāyitvāt sarvāpahnava eva yaḥ ।
kṛto ayaṃ sa ca satyātmā sa evehāvaśiṣyate ।। 

agrasthasiddhasañcāro jñāyate nāpi dāruṇaḥ ।
yathaikapārśvasaṃsuptanarasvapnābhragarjitam ।। 

jñaptau nāsti yatas tena siddhācāro na lakṣyate ।
svabhāva iti sarveṇa jñaptistho hy anubhūyate ।। 

jñaptir apy ātmabhūtaiva sarvaṃ bhāti hi tanmayam ।
tasmāt sāhaṃ jagat sarvam abhinnaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

jñaptir jagattayā bhāti saṅkalpasvapnayor iva ।
anānāvayavodeti jalam ūrmitayā yathā ।। 

ekātmaivodayo jñapter nānātām iva vo gataḥ ।
ajñānāt sā tv avastutvāt prekṣitā nopalabhyate ।। 

yathā svāvayavā eva sarvo hy avayavī bhavet ।
nityānavayavaṃ śāntaṃ brahmaivedaṃ tathā jagat ।। 

bhāṇḍalakṣāṇi dhatte antaś cidrūpakanakeṣṭakā ।
yad eva sā cetayate jagadādīva vetti tat ।। 

brahmaiva kacatīvedaṃ sat tayācchaṃ jagattayā ।
cidrūpatvād dravātmatvāt taraṅgāditayāmbv iva ।। 

yad yac cetayate antas taj jagadādīva paśyati ।
arūpam api rūpaṃ svaṃ yan na cetayate na tat ।। 

cetanācetanatvoktī tasyeśatvāt svadehage ।
upadeśārtham evokte na sadviṣayam arthataḥ ।। 

na jagat san na caivāsad bhāsate cetanāc citi ।
acetanān na kacati ka ivātra graho hi naḥ ।। 

acetanaṃ cetanaṃ ca spandāspandavad ātmanaḥ ।
svāyatte na kadarthasthe svasthaṃ pāṣāṇavat sthite ।। 

yasyekṣitasya no sattā nādhāro na ca kāraṇam ।
so aham ity eva vo yakṣo na jāne kuta utthitaḥ ।। 

yasyāham iti yakṣasya sattaivāsti na satyataḥ ।
aho nu citraṃ teneme bhavanto vivaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 

kākatālīyavad bhrāntam ahaṃ brahmaṇi bhāsate ।
svam eva rūpaṃ dṛgbhrāntau keśoṇḍukam ivāmbare ।। 

brahmaivāhaṃ jagac cātra kuto nāśasamudbhavau ।
ato harṣaviṣādānāṃ kiṃ kveva katham āspadam ।। 

sarveśvaratvād īśasya vibhātīdaṃ pracetitam ।
acetitaṃ ca no bhāti tenācetitam astu te ।। 

kākatālīyavac cittvāj jagadvad bhāti brahmakham ।
svapnasaṅkalpapuravat tat tasmād bhidyate katham ।। 

yathormyādi jale vṛkṣe vā yathā sālabhañjikā ।
yathā ghaṭādayo bhūmau tathā brahmaṇi sargatāḥ ।। 

anākṛtāv asaṃsthāne svacche yad anubhūyate ।
tat tad evāta uditaṃ kiṃ nāmāhaṃ jaganti kim ।। 

marutas spandavaicitryaṃ sattayaiva yathā tathā ।
brahmaṇo nissvabhāvasya jagadādy ahamādi ca ।। 

yathābhre lakṣyate vṛkṣagajavājimṛgāditā ।
asanniveśākṛtini sargāhantve tathā pare ।। 

sargo avayavavad bhāti pare anavayave śive ।
evaṃ tadupamaṃ viddhi kāryakāraṇavad yathā ।। 

ataś śāntam anāyāsaṃ nirupādhi gatabhramam ।
jagato asambhavād eva vyomavat samam āsyatām ।। 

na bhavanto na ca vayaṃ na jaganti na khādayaḥ ।
santi śāntam aśeṣeṇa brahmedaṃ nirbharaṃ sthitam ।। 

aśeṣeṣv aviśeṣeṣu śāntāśeṣaviśeṣatā ।
satyā saivāham ity āśu tyaktvā mokṣāya bhāvyatām ।। 

vedanaṃ bandhanaṃ viddhi viddhi mokṣam avedanam ।
yathāsthitaṃ yathācāraṃ bhava śāntam avedanam ।। 

draṣṭā na dṛśyatāṃ yāti citir nāyāti cetyatām ।
cetyābhāvād ajagati kaḥ kiṃ cetayatāṃ katham ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśyadaśābhāvāj jāgraty eva suṣuptavat ।
śaradākāśakośābham asattopamam āsyatām ।। 

tathaikaṃ brahma cidrūpe pavanas spandane yathā ।
atra cidbodhatā sargo mokṣo brahmaikabodhatā ।। 

citspando brahmamaruto yas sa sarga iti smṛtaḥ ।
nātra citspandanaṃ yat syān nirvāṇaṃ tad udāhṛtam ।। 

bījam antar yathā vetti svaṃ rūpaṃ pallavādikam ।
tathā mahācid antassthaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ vetti sargatām ।। 

pattrādivedanād bījaṃ yathā pattrādi tiṣṭhati ।
parā cit sargasaṃvittes tathā bhavati sargabhāḥ ।। 

yathā bhāvavikārābhāś cit parā sargabhās tathā ।
sarve bījādidṛṣṭāntās tadrūpā eva tanmayāḥ ।। 

nirvikāraṃ paraṃ brahmamayaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat ।
nirvikāram anādyantam evaṃ viddhi nirāmayam ।। 

nijasaṅkalpamātrātmā nijāsaṅkalpanāt kṣayī ।
dvaitādvaitavikāro ayaṃ saṅkalpanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

śūnyatvākāśayor bhedo yādṛśo avagatas tvayā ।
bhedaṃ nirātmakaṃ viddhi tādṛśaṃ brahmasargayoḥ ।। 

mahācidrūpiṇī śāntā yā sattā brahmaṇaḥ parā ।
khatā seyam ahaṃ tvaṃ ca mā naro asmīty adho vraja ।। 

brahmaṇy asmiñ jagadrūpe na kiñcid api jāyate ।
jātam apy atha naṣṭaṃ ca na naśyaty ambuvīcivat ।। 

padārthaṃ brahmarūpeṇa brahmaivātmani tiṣṭhati ।
avayavīvāvayave khe khaṃ vārīva vāriṇi ।। 

nimeṣārdhārdhabhāgena deśād deśāntarasthitau ।
yad rūpaṃ saṃvido madhye sa svabhāva upāsyatām ।। 

saṅkṣubdham akṣubdham iti dvirūpaṃ saṃvitsvarūpaṃ pravadanti santaḥ ।
