śreyaḥ paraṃ yena samīhase tvaṃ tadekaniṣṭho bhava māmatir bhūḥ ।। 

paramārthayogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dvinavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyās saṃvidaḥ kṣaṇāt ।
yad rūpam amalaṃ madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।। 

gacchañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann unmiṣan nimiṣan hasan ।
nūnaṃ nirāmayatvāya nityam etanmayo bhava ।। 

tata eva nirābhāsāt satyān nirvāsanaiṣaṇāt ।
yathāsthitaṃ yathācāraṃ mā calāmaraśailavat ।। 

etad rūpam avidyāyāḥ prekṣitā yan na labhyate ।
prekṣitā labhyate cet sā tad vidyaiva parā bhavet ।। 

avidyāsambhavāc cetyacittve asambhavataḥ kvacit ।
cetyate katham evātaś śāntir eva baloditā ।। 

satyaṃ brahma jagac caikaṃ sthitam ekam anekavat ।
sarvaṃ cāsarvavad bhāti śuddhaṃ cāśuddhavat tatam ।। 

aśūnyaṃ śūnyam iva ca śūnyaṃ cāśūnyavat sphuṭam ।
sphāram asphāram iva tad asphāraṃ sphārasannibham ।। 

avikāraṃ vikārīva samaṃ śāntam aśāntavat ।
sad evāsad ivādṛśyaṃ tad evātad ivoditam ।। 

avibhāgaṃ vibhāgīva nirjāḍyaṃ jaḍavad gatam ।
acetyaṃ cetyabhāvīva niraṃśaṃ sāṃśaśobhanam ।। 

anahaṃ sāham iva tad anāśam api nāśavat ।
akalaṅkaṃ kalaṅkīva nirvedyaṃ vedyavāhi tat ।। 

āloki dhvāntaghanavan navavac ca purātanam ।
paramāṇor api tanu garbhīkṛtajagadgaṇam ।। 

sarvātmakam api vyaktaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṛcchreṇa bhūyasā ।
ajālam api jālāḍhyaṃ dāśeśavad anekadhā ।। 

nirmāyam api māyāṃśumaṇḍalāmalabhāskaram ।
brahma viddhi vidāṃ nātham apām iva mahodadhim ।। 

jagadratnamahākośaṃ tulāyāṃ tūlakāl laghu ।
māyāmarīciśaśinam api nekṣaṇagocaram ।। 

anantam api niṣpāraṃ na ca kvacid api sthitam ।
ākāśe vanavinyāsanaganirmāṇatatparam ।। 

aṇīyasām aṇīyas tat sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām ।
garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇam akāraṇam akārakam ।
antaśśūnyatayaivaitac cirāya paripūritam ।। 

jagatsamudgakam api nityaṃ śūnyam araṇyavat ।
anantaśailakaṭhinam apy ākāśalavān mṛdu ।। 

pratyekaṃ pratyahaṃ prāyaḥ purāṇaṃ pelavaṃ navam ।
ālokam andhakārābhaṃ tamas tv ālokam ātatam ।। 

pratyakṣam api durlakṣyaṃ parokṣam api cāgragam ।
cidrūpam eva ca jaḍaṃ jaḍam eva cidātmakam ।। 

aham evānahambhāvam anahaṃ cāham eva ca ।
anyad eva tad evāham aham evānyad eva tat ।। 

asya pūrṇārṇavasyāntar ime tribhuvanormayaḥ ।
sphuranta iva tiṣṭhanti svabhāvadravatātmakāḥ ।। 

bibharti sargam aṅgasthaṃ tuṣāram iva śuklatām ।
bhāti sargas tv anenaiva tuṣāreṇeva śuklatā ।। 

adeśakālāvayavo apy eṣa devo divāniśam ।
asaj jagat tanotīva yathā vāri taraṅgakam ।। 

etasmin vikasanty etā vipulākāśakānane ।
jagajjaraḍhamañjaryaḥ prasaratpattrapañcakāḥ ।। 

eṣa svapratibimbasya svayamālokanecchayā ।
atyantanirmalākāras svayaṃ makuratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

vyomavṛkṣaphalasyāsya svecchāccharddhaya ujjvalāḥ ।
sargopalambhasusvādvyaś camatkurvanti saṃvidi ।। 

antastvena bahiṣṭvena nānānānātayātmani ।
eṣa so antar bahir bhāti bhāvābhāvavibhāvayā ।। 

etadrūpā padārthaśrīr etasminn etadicchayā ।
camatkaroty etadarthaṃ jihveva svāsyakoṭare ।। 

asyāmbhaso dravatvaṃ yat tad idaṃ jagad ucyate ।
saṃvitsvādūpalambhāṅgaṃ bhuvanāvartavṛttimat ।। 

śāmyaty atra padārthaśrīs sarvā yāmeva bhāsvati ।
etasmād eva codeti svāloka iva tejasaḥ ।। 

idam eṣa jagat sarvaṃ śuklatvaṃ tuhinaṃ yathā ।
ata etāḥ pravartante vida indor ivāṃśavaḥ ।। 

etasmād aṅgato raṅgāj jagac citram idaṃ sthitam ।
viddhy abhāvavikārādi śāntam etanmayaṃ tatam ।। 

asmād varataror etās svārūḍhād gaganāṅgane ।
dṛśyaśākhāḥ pravartante jagajjālagulucchakāḥ ।। 

vyayodayavatī nūnam atra dṛśyataraṅgiṇī ।
nānātānantakusumā vahaty avicalācale ।। 

asmin vyomātmake raṅge bhuvanābhinayabhramaiḥ ।
nṛtyaty aviratārambhaṃ cārair niyatinartakī ।। 

jagatkrīḍo mahākalpakalponmeṣanimeṣaṇaḥ ।
vidānenādyate bhūyo janyate kālabālakaḥ ।। 

udyatsv api jagatsv eṣa śāntam evāvatiṣṭhate ।
aniccha eva makuraḥ pratibimbagateṣv iva ।। 

bhūtānāṃ vartamānānāṃ sargāṇāṃ sa bhaviṣyatām ।
eṣo akāraṇakaṃ bījam agānām iva kānanam ।। 

asyonmeṣo jagallakṣmīr nimeṣaḥ pralayāgamaḥ ।
anunmeṣanimeṣo asāv ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

udyanty amūni subahūni mahāmahāṃsi sargāgamapralayajanmadaśājaganti ।
sarvāṇi tāny ayam apārakharūpa eva praspandanāni marud eva yathāssva śāntam ।। 

parabrahmasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trinavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

camatkurvanty athātrārthā āvartā iva vāriṇi ।
etac ca bhāvās sakalā yathā vāri taraṅgakāḥ ।। 

sarvasyaivāsya viśvasya nirjñeyajñānarūpiṇī ।
paramākāśatā rūpaṃ kiṃ paropaśamaśramaḥ ।। 

bālacintāpuraṃ vyomni na kiñcid api me yathā ।
tathedaṃ tattvato viśvaṃ satyaṃ tu śiśucetasi ।। 

arūpālokamananaṃ śilāputrakasainyavat ।
rūpālokamanaskārā bhānti kevātra viśvatā ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārasāro vinmātratāṃ vinā ।
na labhyate sā ca paraṃ vyomaivātra kva viśvatā ।। 

vido vittvaṃ jagadbhrāntir avittvaṃ tu na vibhramaḥ ।
vittvāvittve tadāyatte cintācinte yathā tava ।। 

paramākāśarūpatvāc cidvyomno vitatākṛteḥ ।
na svabhāvaviparyāsaḥ kaścit sambhavati kvacit ।। 

tanmayasyāsya viśvasya na svabhāvavikāritā ।
vidyate prekṣyamāṇāpi kim u sāsya bhaviṣyati ।। 

sarvaṃ cidvyoma caivedaṃ na sat tvam aham ity api ।
vikārādy api na jñaptāv ajñaptiṃ na labhe kvacit ।। 

sarvaṃ śāntaṃ śivaṃ śuddhaṃ tvamahantādivibhramam ।
na kiñcid api paśyāmi vyomajaṃ kānanaṃ yathā ।। 

saṃvidākāśaśūnyatvaṃ yat tad viddhi vaco mama ।
idaṃ tvatsaṃvidākāśe svayam ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

param āhuḥ padaṃ sad yad anicchodayam āsitam ।
pāṣāṇapuruṣasyeva citrasthasyeva vāsanam ।। 

sa viśrāntamanā maunī yasya prakṛtakarmasu ।
spando dārumayasyeva vigateccham anākulam ।। 

antaśśūnyaṃ bahiśśūnyaṃ virasaṃ gatavāsanam ।
jaradveṇor iva jñasya jīvato bhāti jīvitam ।। 

yasmai na svadate dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ svadate hṛdi ।
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śāntas sa uttīrṇo bhavārṇavāt ।। 

ucyantāṃ śabdajālāni vaṃśavad gatavāsanam ।
rasenānaṅgalagnena prakṛtāny anyacodanaiḥ ।। 

spṛśyantāṃ sparśanīyāni yathāprāptāny avāsanam ।
kūṭāgāravad akṣubdham anicchamananodayam ।। 

svādyantāṃ rasajālāni vigatecchābhayaiṣaṇam ।
apagarvābhilaṣaṇaṃ yathāprāptāni darvivat ।। 

dṛśyantāṃ rūpajātāni puraḥ prāptāny avāsanam ।
arasaṃ nirmanomānam agardhaṃ citranetravat ।। 

śiṅghyantāṃ gandhapuṣpāṇi vigateccham avāsanam ।
spandavattve api lagnāni tyāgāya vanavātavat ।। 

iti ced virasatvena bodhayitvā cikitsitāḥ ।
na bhogarogās tad duḥkhaśāntyai nāsti kathaiva vaḥ ।। 

yas svādayan bhogaviṣaṃ ratim eti dine dine ।
so agnau svamūrdhni jvalite kakṣam akṣayam ujjhati ।। 

niricchatvaṃ samādhānam āhur āgamabhūṣaṇāḥ ।
yathā śāmyen mano anicchaṃ nopabhogaśatair api ।। 

icchodayo yathā duḥkham icchāśāntir yathā sukham ।
tathā na narake nāpi brahmaloke anubhūyate ।। 

icchāmātraṃ viduś cittaṃ tacchāntir mokṣa ucyate ।
etāvanty eva śāstrāṇi tapāṃsi niyamā yamāḥ ।। 

yāvatī yāvatī jantor icchodeti yathā yathā ।
tāvatī tāvatī duḥkhabījamuṣṭiḥ prarohati ।। 

yathā yathecchās tanutāṃ yānti jantor vivekataḥ ।
tathā tathopaśāmyanti duḥkhacintāviṣūcikāḥ ।। 

yathā yathecchā ghanatāṃ yānti lokasya rāgiṇaḥ ।
tathā tathā vivartante duḥkhacintāviṣormayaḥ ।। 

icchā cikitsyate vyādhir na svayatnauṣadhena cet ।
tad atra balavan manye vidyate nauṣadhāntaram ।। 

icchopaśamanaṃ kartuṃ yadi kṛtsnaṃ na śakyate ।
svalpam apy anugantavyaṃ mārgastho nāvasīdati ।। 

yas tv icchātānave yatnaṃ na karoti narādhamaḥ ।
so andhakūpe svam ātmānaṃ dinānudinam ujjhati ।। 

duḥkhaprasavaśālinyā bījam icchaiva saṃsṛteḥ ।
samyagjñānāgnidagdhā sā na bhūyaḥ parirohati ।। 

icchāmātraṃ hi saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ tadavedanam ।
icchānutpādane yatnaḥ kriyatāṃ kiṃ vṛthābhramaiḥ ।। 

śāstropadeśaguravaḥ prekṣyante kim anarthakam ।
kim icchānanusandhānasamādhir nādhigamyate ।। 

yasyecchānanusandhānamātre dussādhatāmateḥ ।
gurūpadeśaśāstrādi tasya nūnam anarthakam ।। 

icchāviṣavikāriṇyā sattayaiva nṛṇām alam ।
duḥkhaprasavakāriṇyā hāriṇyā janmajaṅgale ।। 

na vālīkriyate anyeṣām ātmajñānāya ced asau ।
icchopaśāntiḥ kriyatāṃ tayālaṃ tad avāpyate ।। 

niricchataiva nirvāṇaṃ secchataiva hi bandhanam ।
yathāśakti jayed icchāṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram ।। 

jarāmaraṇajanmādikarañjakhadirāvaleḥ ।
bījam icchāśu saivāntar dahyatāṃ śamavahninā ।। 

yato yato niricchatvaṃ muktataiva tatas tataḥ ।
yāvadgati yathāprāṇaṃ hanyād icchāṃ samutthitām ।। 

yato yataś ca secchatvaṃ bandhapāśās tatas tataḥ ।
puṇyapāpamayā duḥkharāśayo vitatārtayaḥ ।। 

icchānirāsarahite gate sādhoḥ kṣaṇe api ca ।
dasyubhir muṣitasyeva yuktam ākranditaṃ ciram ।। 

yathā yathāsya puṃso antar icchā samupaśāmyati ।
tathā tathāsya kalyāṇaṃ mokṣāya parivardhate ।। 

ātmano nirvivekasya yad icchāparipūraṇam ।
saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya tad eva pariṣecanam ।। 

hṛdvṛkṣajās svasukhaduḥkhakubījakośyo vairād ivāśayakṛtād aśubhāc chubhāc ca ।
āsādya duṣkṛtakṛśānuśikhāś śitāntā icchāś chamacchamiti puṃspaśum ādahanti ।। 

saṃsārabījakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturnavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

icchāviṣavikārasya prayogaṃ yoganāmakam ।
śāntaye śṛṇu bhūyo api pūrvam uktam api sphuṭam ।। 

ātmano vyatiriktaṃ ced vidyate tad ihecchayā ।
iṣyatām asati tv evaṃ svātmānyatve kim iṣyate ।। 

nirbhāgāvayavā sūkṣmā vyomnaś śūnyataraiva cit ।
saivāhaṃ jagad āśāś ca satī kiṃ tat tayeṣyate ।। 

sā vyomarūpā vyomny eva vettīvāvedyavedanā ।
vyomātma jagadābhāsam atrecchāviṣayo asti kaḥ ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhaḥ kutaś ced iti tan na naḥ ।
vidyate asau prasaktānāṃ yeṣām asti na vedmi tān ।। 

grāhyagrāhakasambandhas svaniṣṭho api na labhyate ।
asatas tu kathaṃ lābhaḥ kena labdho asitaś śaśī ।। 

eṣaiva grāhakādīnāṃ sattā yan nāma niṣṭhatā ।
svabhāvaprekṣayāsatyā na jāne kva prayānti te ।। 

eṣa eva svabhāvo yad draṣṭṛdṛśyadṛśo akhilāḥ ।
jñātvāsatyā vinirvāṇam ahantātmani gacchati ।। 

nirvāṇe nāsti dṛśyādi dṛśyādau nāsti nirvṛtiḥ ।
mitho anayor anubhavo na cchāyātapayor iva ।। 

ubhe ete mitho asatyam asatyaivātra nirvṛtiḥ ।
yato nirvāṇam ajaram aduḥkham anubhūyate ।। 

bhramabhūtaṃ tu dṛśyādi nityānantasukhapradam ।
asac ca tad bhāvyatāṃ mā nirvāṇe sthīyatām aje ।। 

śuktikārupyasadṛśaṃ prekṣitaṃ yan na labhyate ।
arthakāry api tan nāsti kim atrāpahnavena vaḥ ।। 

tatsadbhāvān mahad duḥkham asadbhāvān mahat sukham ।
abhāvas sopapattis tu dṛḍhatāṃ yāti bhāvanāt ।। 

tat kim ātmani bandhāya vidadhadhvaṃ narādhamāḥ ।
spaṣṭa evopacayade vastuny astamitāpadi ।। 

kāryakāraṇatādy asmin saṃvinmātrātmake tate ।
mārgayanty aprabodhādy etair mṛgair alam astu naḥ ।। 

vyomarūpe kilaikasmin sarvātmani tate sati ।
kāryakāraṇatādyānām uktīnām eva kaḥ kramaḥ ।। 

yo hetus spandane vāyor dravatve salilasya ca ।
śūnyatve nabhasas so asya sargāditve cidātmanaḥ ।। 

kāryakāraṇabhāvādi brahmaiva sakalaṃ yadi ।
tadā brahmaṇi sargāṇāṃ kāraṇārthī vilajjatām ।। 

na duḥkham asti na sukhaṃ śāntaṃ śivamayaṃ jagat ।
nāsti vinmātratānyatvam ata icchodayaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

mṛddehayodhasenāyāṃ na mṛṇmātretarad yathā ।
na sajjagadahantādau dṛśye brahmetarat tathā ।। 

rāmaḥ

evaṃ cet tad udetv icchā mā vodetu munīśvara ।
sā tu brahmaiva ko arthas syād asyā vidhiniṣedhanaiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jñatāyāṃ samprabuddhāyām icchā brahmaiva netarat ।
yathāsi buddhavān rāma tat satyaṃ kiṃ tv idaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yadā yadā jñatodeti śāmyatīcchā tadā tadā ।
vastusvabhāvād udayaty āditye yāminī yathā ।। 

yathā yathodayo jñapter dvaitaśāntis tathā tathā ।
vāsanāvilayaś caiva katham icchodayo bhavet ।। 

tasyāvidyopaśānteyaṃ nirmalā muktatoditā ।
aśeṣadṛśyavairasyād yasyecchodeti na kvacit ।। 

viraktatāsya no dṛśye na cāpy atrāsya raktatā ।
kevalaṃ jñāya dṛśyaśrīs svadate na svabhāvataḥ ।। 

kākatalīyayogena parapreraṇayātha vā ।
yadi kiñcit kadācic ca samyag icchati vā na vā ।। 

tad asya secchānicchā ca brahmaivātra na saṃśayaḥ ।
icchāyāṃ jñāyate jñasyāvaśyam eva tu tānavam ।। 

jñatā ced uditā jantos tad icchāsyopaśāmyati ।
naitayos sthitir ekatra prakāśatamasor iva ।। 

pratiṣedhavidhīnāṃ tu tajjño na viṣayaḥ kvacit ।
śāntasarvaiṣaṇecchasya ko asya kiṃ vakti kiṃkṛte ।। 

etad eva jñatācihnaṃ yad icchāsv atitānavam ।
hlādanaṃ sarvalokānām athānudaya eva vā ।। 

dṛśyaṃ virasatāṃ yātaṃ yadā na svadate kvacit ।
tadā necchā prasarati tadaiva ca vimuktatā ।। 

bodhād anaikyam advaitaṃ yaś śāntam avatiṣṭhate ।
icchānicchādayas sarve bhāvās tasya śivātmakāḥ ।। 

bodhād astamitadvaitam advaitād aikyavarjitam ।
yas svaccho vigatavyagraś śānta ātmany avasthitaḥ ।। 

naiva tasya kṛtenārtho na satā nāsatā sadā ।
na cātmanā na cānyena naitair maraṇajīvitaiḥ ।। 

icchā ca tasya nodeti nirvāṇasya prabodhinaḥ ।
yadi vodeti tat svacchā brahma śāśvatam eva sā ।। 

na duḥkham asti na sukhaṃ śāntaṃ śivam ajaṃ jagat ।
iti yo antaś śilevāste taṃ prabuddhaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।। 

duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ bhāvanayā kurvan viṣam ivāmṛtam ।
iti niścayadhīrātmā prabuddha iti kathyate ।। 

tat sthitaṃ vyomani vyoma śānte śāntaṃ śive śivam ।
śūnye śūnyaṃ sati ca sad yad brahmaṇi jagat sthitam ।। 

asaṃvedanasaṃvitkhe tate viśvam iti sthite ।
somye samasame śānte śive ahantābhramaḥ kṣayī ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
tat sarvaṃ śāntam ākāśaṃ paracintāpuropamam ।। 

paracintāpuro madhye gatavighnaṃ gamāgamau ।
yathā stas tava śūnyatvāt tathaivāsmiñ jagadbhrame ।। 

adridyūrvīnadīśābhā śūnyatātmani jṛmbhate ।
adraṣṭṛdṛśyakaraṇaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvīcivat ।। 

svapnanirmāṇapuravad bālavetālatālavat ।
yad idaṃ dṛśyate tatra kiṃ kilāsatyatetarat ।। 

asatyam evāham iti bhāsate satyam eva ca ।
bhrāntibhājaṃ vinaiveyaṃ bhrāntis sphurati sāsatī ।। 

nāsan na san na sadasat kim apīdam atīndriyam ।
avācyaṃ jagad ity eva bhāty avikṣubhitaṃ khavat ।। 

ihecchānicchate jñasya śamād yady apy alaṃ same ।
tathāpi śreyase manye nanv anicchodayaṃ sphuṭam ।। 

ahaṃ jagad iti jñaptiḥ khe khasyeveyam āsthitā ।
cidātmano yathā vāyos spando nātrāsti kāraṇam ।। 

citaś cetyonmukhatvaṃ yat tac cittaṃ saiva saṃsṛtiḥ ।
secchā tanmuktatā muktir yuktiṃ jñātveti śāmyatām ।। 

icchā bhavatv anicchā vā sargo astu pralayo astu vā ।
kṣatir na kasyacit kācin na ca kiñcid ihāsti hi ।। 

icchānicche sadasatī bhāvābhāvau sukhāsukhe ।
ity atra kalpanā vyomni sambhavanti na kāścana ।। 

icchānāṃ tānavaṃ yasya dinānudinam āgatam ।
vivekaśamatṛptasya tam āhur mokṣabhāginam ।। 

icchākṣurikayā viddhe hṛdi śūlaṃ pravartate ।
jayanti yatra naitāni maṇimantrauṣadhāni vaḥ ।। 

yaḥ kāryakāraṇādyūhān kṛtavān pūrvam eva tam ।
satprekṣayā na paśyāmo mithyābhramabharād ṛte ।। 

bhramabhūtena kurmaś ced vyavahāram avastunā ।
tat kasmāt paracintādriḥ kavalatvaṃ na nīyate ।। 

asatā vyavahāraś cet prekṣāmātravināśinā ।
kriyate śaśaśṛṅgeṇa tat kathaṃ cchādyate na kham ।। 

ahambhāvāc cidākāśo jāḍyātiśayataḥ kṣaṇāt ।
pāṣāṇatāṃ jalam iva manastvād yāti dehatām ।। 

cittvād anubhavaty etām asatyām eva dehitām ।
avinaṣṭaiva cicchaktis svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā ।। 

vyomny asatyam avastutvāt satyaṃ cānubhavād yathā ।
nīlatvaṃ tadvad īśe asmin sargo nāsan na sanmayaḥ ।। 

yathā śūnyatvanabhasor yathā spandanabhasvatoḥ ।
bhedo nāsti tathā sargabrahmaṇor ekarūpayoḥ ।। 

neha sañjāyate kiñcij jagadādi na naśyati ।
svapno nidrāgatasyeva kevalaṃ pratibhāsate ।। 

avidyamāne pṛthvyādau pratibhāmātrarūpiṇi ।
sarge ka iva saṃrambhas tyāgādānaiś cidambare ।। 

na dehapratibhāto asti buddhyādikaraṇānvitā ।
kevalaṃ brahma cinmātram evam ātmany avasthitam ।। 

buddhyādeḥ karaṇatvaṃ ca dvaitaikyāsambhavān na sat ।
anenedaṃ kriyata ity asyārthasyātyasambhavāt ।। 

ahetur akramaṃ bhāti citi kalpakriyāgaṇaḥ ।
kṣaṇenaiva yathā svapne mṛtijanmābdhisantarāḥ ।। 

kham eva pṛthvī khaṃ śailāḥ kham eva dṛḍhabhittayaḥ ।
kham eva lokās spandaḥ khaṃ sargasaṃvedane citeḥ ।। 

vyomabhittau jagaccitraṃ cidraṅgamayam ātatam ।
nodeti nāstam āyāti na tāmyati na śāmyati ।। 

cidvāriṇi jagattuṅgataraṅgadravarūpiṇi ।
kiṃ kadā katham utpannaṃ kiṃ śāntaṃ ca kadā katham ।। 

śānte mahācidākāśe jagacchūnyatvaśālini ।
cetyāsambhavatas santi nodayāstamayoktayaḥ ।। 

parvatā gaganāyante gaganaṃ parvatāyate ।
saṃvedanaprayogeṇa brahmaṇas sargatāsthitau ।। 

saṃviccūrṇaprayogeṇa nimeṣārdhena yoginaḥ ।
kurvanti jagad ākāśam ākāśaṃ trijaganti hi ।। 

siddhasaṅkalpanagarāṇy asaṅkhyāni yathāmbare ।
tathā sargasahasrāṇi santi tāni tu cinnabhaḥ ।। 

mahārṇave yathāvartā anyo'nyam api miśritāḥ ।
pṛthag evāvatiṣṭhante vyatiriktā na te tataḥ ।। 

sargāt sargāntarāloko yaḥ prabuddhasya yoginaḥ ।
siddhalokāntaraprāptis saiveti vibudhoktayaḥ ।। 

avināśīni bhūtāni sthitāni parame śive ।
vyomnīva śūnyatollāsās sargavargā nirargalāḥ ।। 

paramārthanijāmodās sahajās sargavibhramāḥ ।
nodyanti nopaśāmyanti lekhā iva śilodare ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ kusumāmodā militā apy amiśritāḥ ।
vyomarūpās tathā sargā anyo'nyaṃ siddhabhūmayaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpākāśarūpatvāt sarvārthānubhavasthiteḥ ।
tanusaṅkalpamohānāṃ satyāś śāpavaroktayaḥ ।। 

na jñānavāditā satyā na ca bāhyārthavāditā ।
yathāvedanam etāni vedanāni phalanti vaḥ ।। 

citi cittvaṃ yad asty antar jagad ity eva bhāti tat ।
bhedo dravatvapayasor iva nātropapadyate ।। 

kālo jaganti bhuvanāny aham akṣavargas tv etāni tatra ca tatheti ca sarvam ekam ।
cidvyoma śāntam ajam avyayam īśvarātma rāgādayaḥ khalu na kecana sambhavanti ।। 

dṛśyopaśamopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

pañcanavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cit paśyati jagan mithyā svavedanavibodhitā ।
vyomni māyāñjanāsiktā dṛg ivācalanartanam ।। 

brahmasargaś cittasargo dvāv etau sadṛśau matau ।
paramārthasvarūpatvād akṣubdhatvāt sadaiva ca ।। 

jñānarūpatayābāhyaṃ bāhyaṃ cānubhavāt tathā ।
satyarūpam atas satyāṃ viddhi bāhyārtharūpatām ।। 

bāhyārthavādavijñānavādayor aikyam eva naḥ ।
vedanaikātmarūpatvāt sarvadā sadasatsthiteḥ ।। 

akṣubdhā khānilālokajalabhūśāntiśālinī ।
tatā śūnyā mahārambhā brahmasattaiva sarvataḥ ।। 

tasmin sarvaṃ tatas sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca tat ।
tac ca sarvamayaṃ nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ ।। 

cinmayatvād yadā cetyam eti draṣṭṛcitaikatām ।
tadā dṛśyāṅgayaivaitac cetyate nānyayā citā ।। 

yadā cinmātram eveyaṃ draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyadṛk ।
tadānubhavanaṃ tatra sarvasya phalitaṃ sthitam ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśye na yady ekam abhaviṣyac cidātmake ।
tad dṛśyāsvādam ajñāsyan na draṣṭekṣor ivopalaḥ ।। 

cinmayatvāc citau cetyaṃ jalam apsv iva majjati ।
tenānubhūtir bhavati nānyathā kāṣṭhayor iva ।। 

sajātīyaikatābhāvād yathā kāṣṭhaṃ na cetati ।
dāru tadvad api draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ nājñāsyad ājaḍam ।। 

yādṛksattāni kāṣṭhāni tādṛgrūpaṃ svacetanam ।
jānanti netarat tasmād dṛśyaciddṛśyacetanam ।। 

mahācidātmataivāsti jalāniladharāśmanām ।
naiteṣu spandabuddhyādi prāṇajīvādyabhāvataḥ ।। 

prāṇabuddhyādayas sattāṃ bhāvanāvaśato gatāḥ ।
bhāvanā ciccamatkāras sa yatheccham udeti ca ।। 

jagattayā śāntatayā brahmasattāvatiṣṭhate ।
puṃstayāgatayevātmā retovaṭakaṇīkayoḥ ।। 

sarvāṅgāṇumayaṃ vīryaṃ yo yasmād aṅgato aṇukaḥ ।
sa sa tat tad bhavaty aṅgaṃ vīryaṃ ca svātmani sthitam ।। 

brahma sarvaparāṇvātma yo yasmād arthato aṇukaḥ ।
sa sa tat tad bhaved vastu brahma brahmaiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

dravyam eva yathā dravyaṃ tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā ।
sarvam eva tathā brahma yena tena yathā tathā ।। 

hematvam eva nānyatvaṃ hemno rūpaśate yathā ।
śāntatvam eva śāntasya sargāhantvagaṇe tathā ।। 

pārśvasthasvapnameghorjā yathā tava na kāścana ।
sargapralayasaṃrambhās tathā khātmāna eva me ।। 

paṅkatākalpitā vyomno yā putrakapatākinī ।
sā yathā śāntatāmātraṃ kham evedaṃ tathā jagat ।। 

saṅkalpabhrama evāntaḥ puṣṭībhūya jagat sthitam ।
jalāvanitalaklinnabījaṃ kalpa iva drumaḥ ।। 

anahantātmano jñasya sata eva tv ivāsataḥ ।
jarattṛṇalavāyante nanu rāmāṇimādayaḥ ।। 

trailokye tan na paśyāmi sadevāsuramānuṣe ।
ekaromāṃśaviśvasya yal lobhāya mahātmanaḥ ।। 

yathātathāsthitasyāpi yatra tatra gatasya ca ।
dvaitasaṅkalpasandehā na santy adhigatātmanaḥ ।। 

viśvam eva nabho yasya śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ mahātmanaḥ ।
kutaḥ kasya kathaṃ tasya bhavatv icchā nirātmanaḥ ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣasya nireṣaṇaviśeṣiṇaḥ ।
sattām asattāsadṛśīṃ ka ākalayituṃ kṣamaḥ ।। 

mārair na kiñcin mriyate jīvaiḥ kiñcin na jīvati ।
śuddhasaṃvinmayasyāsya samalokasya khasya ca ।। 

mithyā lokasya kacato bhrāntī maraṇajanmanī ।
asaty api bhrāntibhāji mṛgatṛṣṇānadītaṭe ।। 

samyakparīkṣitaṃ yāvan na bhrāntir na parīkṣakaḥ ।
na nāma janmamaraṇe kevalaṃ śāntam avyayam ।। 

dṛśyād yo viratiṃ yāta ātmārāmaś śamaṃ gataḥ ।
sa sann evāsadābhāsaḥ paritīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ ।। 

dīpanirvāṇanirvāṇam astaṅgatamanomatim ।
ātmany eva śamaṃ yātaṃ santam evāmalaṃ viduḥ ।। 

ābuddhyādi jagad dṛśyaṃ yasmai na svadate svataḥ ।
ākāśasyeva śāntasya tam āhur muktam uttamāḥ ।। 

aham asty avicāreṇa vicāreṇāham asti no ।
abhāvād ahamarthasya kva jagat kva ca saṃsṛtiḥ ।। 

saṃvitsaṃvedanād eva buddhyādyākāravat sthitam ।
rūpālokamanorūpaṃ jagad vetti vidambaram ।। 

sarvārthaśāntamanasas satas sarvātmanas tava ।
sarvathā sarvadā sārvaṃ sarvam ācaraṇaṃ śivam ।। 

yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat ।
yac ca paśyasi haṃsy eṣi tat sarvaṃ śivam avyayam ।। 

yad aham yat tvam āśā yad yat kriyākālakhādayaḥ ।
yal lokālokagirayas tac cidvyoma śivaṃ tatam ।। 

yad rūpalokamananaṃ yat kālatritayaṃ jagat ।
yaj jarāmaraṇārtyādi tan mahācinnabhaś śivam ।। 

nirvivitso nirābhāso niriccho nirmanā muniḥ ।
bhūtvā nirātmā nirvāṇas tiṣṭha santiṣṭhase yathā ।। 

gatecchāmananaṃ śāntam anantasstham abhāvanam ।
vyavahāro astu te mā vā spandāspandair yathānilaḥ ।। 

nirvāsanā niṣkalanā śāntā puruṣatāstu te ।
śāstreṇa yantravāhena vāhyā dārumayī yathā ।। 

bhūtāloko astu māntas te sa cāsnehasya bāhyagaḥ ।
anirdeśyaparālokaś citradīpavad āsyatām ।। 

nirvāsanasya virasasya nireṣaṇasya śāstrād ṛte ka iva vittvavinodahetuḥ ।
śāstrārthasañcalanam apy alam asya tasya saṃvedaneṣv anabhisandhim ataḥ kharūpam ।। 

nirvāṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṇṇavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sañjātakṛtrimakṣīṇasaṃsṛtipratyayaḥ pumān ।
asaṅkalpo na saṅkalpaṃ vetti tenāsad eva saḥ ।। 

śvāsān mlānir ivādarśe kuto apy aham iti sthitā ।
vid dhi sākāraṇā dṛṣṭā naśyaty āśu na labhyate ।। 

yasya kṣīṇāvaraṇatā śāntasandehatoditā ।
paramāmṛtapūrṇātmā sattayaiva sa rājate ।। 

sarvasandehaduḥkhāntamihikāmātariśvanā ।
bhāti bhāsvaddhiyā deśas tena pūrṇenduneva kham ।। 

visaṃsṛtir asandeho labdhajyotir nirāvṛtiḥ ।
śaradākāśaviśado jñenaiva jñāyate budhaḥ ।। 

nissaṅkalpo nirādhāraś śāntas sparśāt pavitratām ।
antaśśītala ādhatte brahmalokād ivānilaḥ ।। 

asadrūpopalambhānām iyaṃ vastusvabhāvatā ।
yat sargavedanaṃ svapnavandhyāputropalambhavat ।। 

avidyamānam evedaṃ jagad yad anubhūyate ।
asadrūpopalambhasya saiṣā vastusvabhāvatā ।। 

asatyeṣv eva saṃsāreṣv āstām arthaḥ kuto bhavet ।
svargāpavargayoś śabdāv eva vandhyāsutopamau ।। 

jagad brahmatayā satyam anirmitam abhāvitam ।
aniṣṭhitaṃ cānyathā tu nāhaṃ nāvagataṃ ca tat ।। 

ātmasvabhāvaviśrānter iyaṃ vastusvabhāvatā ।
yad ahantādisargādidṛśyādyanupalambhatā ।। 

kṣaṇād yojanalakṣāntaṃ prāpte deśāntaraṃ tv itaḥ ।
cetane tasya yad rūpaṃ mārgamadhye nirañjanam ।। 

aspandavātasadṛśaṃ khakośābhācchacinmayam ।
acetyaṃ śāntam uditaṃ latāvikasanopamam ।। 

sarvasya vastujātasya tat svabhāvaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
sarvopalambho galati tatrasthasya vivekinaḥ ।। 

suṣupte svapnadhīr nāsti svapne nāsti suṣuptadhīḥ ।
sarganirvāṇayor bhrāntī suṣuptasvapnayor iva ।। 

bhrāntir vastusvabhāvo asau na svapno na suṣuptatā ।
na sargo na ca nirvāṇaṃ satyaṃ śāntam aśeṣataḥ ।। 

bhrāntis tv asanmātramayī prekṣitā cen na labhyate ।
śuktirupyam ivāsatyaṃ kila samprāpyate katham ।। 

yan na labdhaṃ ca tan nāsti tena bhrānter na sambhavaḥ ।
svabhāvād upalambho anyo nāsti kaścana kasyacit ।। 

svabhāva eva sarvasmai svadate kila sarvadā ।
anānaiva hi nāneva kiṃ vādais sa vibhāvyatām ।। 

asvabhāve mahad duḥkhaṃ svabhāve kevalaṃ śamaḥ ।
iti buddhyā vicāryāntar yad iṣṭaṃ tad vidhīyatām ।। 

sūkṣme bīje asty agas sthūlo dṛṣṭam ity upapadyate ।
śive amūrte jagan mūrtam astīty uttamasaṅkathā ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārabuddhyahantādayaḥ pare ।
svarūpabhūtās salile dravatvam iva khātmakāḥ ।। 

mūrto yathā svasadṛśaiḥ karoty avayavaiḥ kriyāḥ ।
ātmabhūtais tathā bhūtaiś cidākāśam akartṛ sat ।। 

ātmasthād aham ityādir asmadāder asaṃsṛteḥ ।
śabdo arthabhāvamukto ayaṃ paṭahād iva jāyate ।। 

yad bhrāntaṃ prekṣayā nāsti tan nāsty eva nirantaram ।
jagadrūpam arūpātma brahma brahmaṇi saṃsthitam ।। 

yeṣām asti jagatsvapnas te svapnapuruṣā mithaḥ ।
na santy ātmani mithyāṅgā nāsmāsv ambarapuṣpavat ।। 

mayi brahmaikarūpaṃ te śāntam ākāśakośavat ।
vāyau spandair ivābhinnair vyavahāraś ca tair mayi ।। 

ahaṃ tu sanmayas teṣāṃ svapnas svapnavatām iva ।
te tu nūnam asanto me suṣupte svapnakā iva ।। 

tais tu yo vyavahāro me tad brahma brahmaṇi sthitam ।
te yat paśyanti paśyantu tat tair alam alaṃ mama ।। 

aham ātmani naivāsmi brahmasatteyam ātatā ।
tvadarthaṃ samudetīva tathārūpaiva vāg iyam ।। 

aniruddhasya ruddhasya śuddhasaṃvinmayātmanaḥ ।
na bhogecchā na mokṣecchā hṛdi sphurati tadvidaḥ ।। 

svabhāvamātrāyatte asmin bandhamokṣakrame nṛṇām ।
kadarthanety aho mohād goṣpade apy udadhibhramaḥ ।। 

abhāvasādhane mokṣe bhāvopaśamarūpiṇi ।
na dhanāny upakurvanti na mitrāṇi na ca kriyāḥ ।। 

tailabindur bhavaty uccaiś cakram appatito yathā ।
tathāśu cetyasaṅkalpe sthitā bhavati cij jagat ।। 

jāgrati svapnavṛttāntasthitir yādṛgrasā smṛtau ।
tādṛgrasāhantvajagajjālasaṃsthā vivekinaḥ ।। 

tenaivābhyāsayogena yāti tat tanutāṃ tathā ।
yathā nāhaṃ na saṃsāraś śāntam evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

yadā yadā svabhāvārkas sthitim eti tadā tadā ।
bhogāndhakāro galati na sann apy anubhūyate ।। 

so ayam ahantārahitas sphurati sṛtau bhavati bhāsate ca tathā ।
buddhyādikaraṇanikaro yasmād dīpād ivālokaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhagītāsu svabhāvaviśrāntiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

saptanavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rūpālokamanaskārabuddhyādīndriyavedanam ।
svarūpaṃ vidur amlānam asvabhāvasya vastunaḥ ।। 

asvabhāvatanutvena svabhāvasthitiśāntatā ।
yadodeti tadā sargo bhramābhaḥ pratibhāsate ।। 

yadā svabhāvaviśrāntis sthitim eti śamātmikā ।
jagad dṛśyaṃ tadā svapnas suṣupta iva śāmyati ।। 

bhogā bhavamahārogā bandhavo dṛḍhabandhanam ।
anarthāyārthasampattir ātmanātmani śāmyatām ।। 

asvabhāvātmatā sargas svabhāvaikātmatā śivaḥ ।
bhūyatāṃ paramavyomnā śāmyatāṃ meha tāmyatām ।। 

nātmānam avagacchāmi na dṛśyaṃ na jagadbhramam ।
brahma śāntaṃ praviṣṭo asmi brahmaivāsmi nirāmayaḥ ।। 

tvam eva paśyasi tvattvaṃ mattvaśabdārthajṛmbhitam ।
paśyāmi śāntam evāhaṃ kevalaṃ paramaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

brahmaṇy eva parākāśe rūpālokamanomayāḥ ।
vibhramās tava sañjātāḥ kalpaspandā ivānile ।। 

brahmātmā vetti no sargaṃ sargātmā brahma vetti no ।
suṣupto vetti na svapnaṃ svapnastho na suṣuptakam ।। 

prabuddho brahmajagator jāgratsvapnadṛśor iva ।
rūpaṃ jānāti vārūpaṃ jīvanmuktaḥ praśāntadhīḥ ।। 

yathābhūtam idaṃ sarvaṃ parijānāti bodhavān ।
saṃśāmyati ca śuddhātmā śaradīva payodharaḥ ।। 

smṛtisthaḥ kalpanāstho vā yathākhyātaś ca saṅgaraḥ ।
sadasad bhrāntatāmātraṃ tathāhantvajagadbhramaḥ ।। 

ātmany api nāsti hi yā draṣṭā yasyā na vidyate kaścit ।
na ca śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ bhrāntir iyaṃ bhāsate seti ।। 

vasiṣṭhagītāsu ātmaviśrāntikathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭanavatyuttaraśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asvabhāvasvabhāvo ayaṃ sargo ahantādivedanaḥ ।
svabhāvaikasvabhāvena nirvāṇīkriyatāṃ svayam ।। 

yatrādityo bhavet tatra yathālokas tathā bhavet ।
paraṃ viṣayavairasyaṃ yatra tatra prabuddhadhīḥ ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇam adṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam ।
jagad agrāhyam asphāram abhittau citram utthitam ।। 

na cotthitaṃ kiñcana vā śānte śāntaṃ tathā sthitam ।
anāmayaṃ paraṃ brahma satyam avyayam eva tat ।। 

ciccamatkāramātrātmakalpanāraṅgarañjanāḥ ।
saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante khe jagaccitraputrikāḥ ।। 

rasabhāvavikārāḍhyaṃ nṛtyantyo abhinayair navaiḥ ।
paramāṇuṃ prati prāyaḥ khe sphurantyo ambarātmikāḥ ।। 

sarvartuśekharadharā digbāhulatikākulāḥ ।
pātālapādalatikā brahmalokaśirodharāḥ ।। 

candrārkalolanayanās tārotkaratanūruhāḥ ।
saptalokāṅgalatikāḥ parito acchāmbarāmbarāḥ ।। 

dvīpāmburāśivalayā lokālokādrimekhalāḥ ।
bhūtabhāvacalajjīvāḥ pravahatprāṇamārutāḥ ।। 

vanopavanavinyāsahārakeyūrabhūṣitāḥ ।
purāṇavedavacanāḥ kriyāphalavilocanāḥ ।। 

trijagatputrikānṛttaṃ yad idaṃ dṛśyate puraḥ ।
brahmavāridravatvaṃ tat tad brahmānilacopanam ।। 

asvabhāvasthataivāsya kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmakam ।
asuṣuptasthatā svāpe svapnasyevāsatī ca sā ।। 

asuṣuptas suṣuptasthas svabhāvaṃ bhāvayan bhava ।
jāgraty api gatavyagraṃ māsatsvapnam imaṃ śraya ।। 

yaj jāgrati suṣuptatvaṃ bodhād arasam āsanam ।
taṃ svabhāvaṃ vidus tajjñā muktis tatpariṇāmitā ।। 

akartṛkarmakaraṇam adṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam ।
arūpālokamananaṃ sthitaṃ brahma jagattayā ।। 

kānte kāntaṃ prakacati pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ vyavasthitam ।
dvitvaikyarahite bhāti dvitvaikyaparivarjitam ।। 

sati satyaṃ sthitaṃ śāntaṃ sargātmātmātmani svayam ।
ākāśakośasadṛśaṃ śilājaṭharasannibham ।। 

suratnajaṭharākāraṃ ghanam apy ambaropamam ।
pratibimbam iva kṣubdham apy akṣubdham asac ca sat ।। 

bhaviṣyannavanirmāṇaṃ cetasīva sthitaṃ puram ।
brahmabṛṃhitabhārūpam abhedīkṛtamānasam ।। 

yathā saṅkalpanagaraṃ saṅkalpān naiva bhidyate ।
tathāyaṃ jagadābhāsaḥ paramārthān na bhidyate ।। 

hemapīṭham ivānekabhaviṣyatsanniveśavat ।
lakṣyamāṇam api sthānaṃ śāntam avyayam āsthitam ।। 

ajasranāśotpādāḍhyam ekarūpam anāmayam ।
anāśotpādam ajaram anekam iva kāntimat ।। 

brahmaiva śāntaghanabhāvagataṃ vibhāti sargodayena vigatāstamayodayena ।
vyomaiva śūnyavibhavena galatsvabhāvalābhaṃ prati prasabham eva na tu prabuddhe ।। 

svarūpaviśrāntyartham upadeśakaraṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonadviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cittavat kacanaṃ śānte yat tat tasmān na bhidyate ।
avyākṛtāmalatayā kvātas sargādisambhavaḥ ।। 

cittadīpe gate yānti bhrāntivad bhānti khe sthite ।
rūpālokamanaskārās saṃvidambudravormayaḥ ।। 

nirastakāraṇāpekṣaṃ marutas spandanaṃ yathā ।
yathā visaraṇaṃ bhāsas tathā jagad idaṃ pare ।। 

dravatvam iva kīlāle śūnyatvam iva cāmbare ।
spandanaṃ marutīvedaṃ kim apy ātmamayaṃ pare ।। 

mahāciti mahākāśe yad idaṃ bhāsate jagat ।
tac cittvam eva kacati nirmalatvaṃ maṇāv iva ।। 

yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā śūnyatvam ambare ।
yathā praspandanaṃ vāyau mahāciti tathā jagat ।। 

vetti vāyur yathā spandaṃ tathā vetti jagac citiḥ ।
na dvaitaikyādibhedānāṃ manāg apy atra sambhavaḥ ।। 

avivekavivekābhyāṃ bhāsuraṃ bhaṅguraṃ jagat ।
bodhe sad evāsadrūpam abhāsuram abhaṅguram ।। 

jñaptimātrād ṛte śuddhād ādimadhyāntavarjitāt ।
nānyad astīti nirṇītaṃ mahācinmātrarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

tat kasyacic chivaṃ śāntaṃ kasyacid brahma śāśvatam ।
kasyacic chūnyatāmātraṃ kasyacij jñaptimātrakam ।। 

tad anantātma cidrūpaṃ cetyatām eva bhāvayat ।
svasaṃstham eva jñeyatvam avagacchati cintayā ।। 

nāsti sattāṃ vinā vāyor yathā spandeṣu kāraṇam ।
tathā mahācito acchāyās sargasaṃvittivṛttiṣu ।। 

nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā hetur anyānapekṣaṇāt ।
ity atrārthe abhaviṣyat sad dvitvaikatvāstitāvaśāt ।। 

ko atra kalpayitā dvitvam ekatvaṃ vā mahāmbare ।
viṣvag viśvam apāraikā paramākāśakośatā ।। 

yathā spandāniladvitvaśabda eva na vāstavaḥ ।
viśvaviśveśvaradvitvaṃ tathaivāsanmayātmakam ।। 

sad evāsambhavaddvitvaṃ mahācinmātrakaṃ tu yat ।
viśvābhāsaṃ tad evedaṃ na viśvaṃ san na viśvatā ।। 

deśakālādisattvena kadācid dhemni satyatā ।
kaṭakatvasya bhinnasya viśvasya na tathā pare ।। 

dvitvaikyāsambhave cātra kāryakāraṇatā kutaḥ ।
syāc cet tat kalpanāmātram evaitan nānyavastutā ।। 

śūnyatā nabhasīvātra dravatvam iva vāmbhasi ।
khe khatevāpy abhinnaiva kilāsti jagadāditā ।। 

yadrūpaṃ brahma tadrūpaṃ jagat kvātra dvitaikate ।
yadrūpaṃ vyoma tadrūpam eva śūnyaṃ kilākhilam ।। 

ekātmani tate svacche cinmātre sarvarūpiṇi ।
śilāputrakasenāyāṃ pāṣāṇatva iva sthite ।। 

kāryakāraṇavaicitryaṃ kathaṃ sambhavati kva vā ।
katham avyomatā vyomni dvitīyāsambhavād bhavet ।। 

pratibhātmaiva bhārūpo bhāti sargo mahāciti ।
putrikevopalotkīrṇā tanmayatvāt tadātmakaḥ ।। 

sādhor yathāsthitasyaivaṃ buddhvā viśvaṃ pralīyate ।
kāṣṭhamaunadaśābhāsaṃ tatsāram avaśiṣyate ।। 

yathā nimīlitākṣasya rūpālokamanobhramaḥ ।
svapne jāgraty anagrastho apy asann evāsti bhāvanāt ।। 

bhāvanopaśamaṃ kṛtvā śilībhūya yathāsthitam ।
aśilībhūtam evāntas svabhāve samam āsyatām ।। 

svavivekopahāreṇa yathāprāptārthapūjanaiḥ ।
bodhāya pūjyatāṃ buddhyā svo bhāvaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।। 

vivekapūjitas svātmā sadyas sthānavarapradaḥ ।
rudropendrādipūjātra jarattṛṇalavāyate ।। 

vicāraśamasatsaṅgabalipuṣpaikapūjitaḥ ।
sadyo mokṣakaras sādhos svātmaiva parameśvaraḥ ।। 

satyālokanamātraikapūjito anuttamārthadaḥ ।
yatrāsty ātmeśvaras tatra mūḍhaḥ ko anyaṃ samāśrayet ।। 

satsaṅgaśamasantoṣavivekaiḥ pūjitātmanaḥ ।
śirīṣakusumāyante śastrāhiviṣavahnayaḥ ।। 

devārcanatapastīrthadānāny atikṛtāny api ।
bhasmāyante nirarthatvād avivekahatātmanām ।। 

etāny api vivekena kriyante saphalāni cet ।
viveka eva tat kasmāt sphuṭam antar na sādhyate ।। 

yathābhūtārthavijñānād vāsanoparame pade ।
yatno vivekaśabdākhyo bhavaty ātmaprasādataḥ ।। 

tathā tathā viveko antar vṛddhiṃ neyaś śamāmṛtaiḥ ।
yathā yathā punaś śoṣam upayāti na vibhramaiḥ ।। 

dehasattām anādṛtya yathābhūtārthadarśanāt ।
lajjāṃ bhayaṃ viṣāderṣye sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tyajet samam ।। 

jagadādi śarīrādi nāsty evādau kuto adya tat ।
kāryaṃ cet kāraṇasyaitat tathāpi brahmamātrakam ।। 

pratibhāmātram evācchaṃ na tu jñaptir ghaṭādivat ।
jñānātmikaiva pratibhā jñaptir evākhilaṃ tataḥ ।। 

jñaptir apy ātmatattvaśrīḥ parijñātāpi śāmyati ।
jñeyābhāve tv anirvācyā śiṣyate śāśvataṃ śivam ।। 

aśarīrādy aviśvātma sarvaṃ śāntam idaṃ tatam ।
jñānajñeyajñaptimātraṃ dṛṣanmaunam avasthitam ।। 

śāntāntaḥkaraṇās svacchāś śilāputrakakośavat ।
calantaś cācalantaś ca jñarūpā eva tiṣṭhata ।। 

ajñeyajñatvasadrūpās sadasatsārarūpiṇaḥ ।
ākāśakośaviśadā bhavatābhavabhūmayaḥ ।। 

yathāsthitaṃ ca tiṣṭhanto gacchantaś ca yathāgatam ।
yathāprāptaikakarmāṇas sampadyante budhāḥ param ।। 

atha vā sarvasantyāgaśāntāntaḥkaraṇojjvalāḥ ।
ekānteṣv eva tiṣṭhanti citrakarmārpitā iva ।। 

saṅkalpaśāntau saṅkalpapuravat sarvadākhilam ।
svapnavac ca prabuddhasya sad evāstaṅgataṃ jagat ।। 

sanetrarūpānubhavaṃ jātito andha ivāgamaiḥ ।
nirvāṇaṃ varṇayann ajñas tāmyaty antar na śāmyati ।। 

kalpanāṃśopadeśena loko avidyāmayātmanā ।
yena kenacid ajñatvāt kṛtārtho asmīti manyate ।। 

akṛtārthaḥ kṛtārthatvaṃ jānan maurkhyavimohitaḥ ।
vijñāsyaty akṛtārthatvaṃ kṣaṇāntarakadarthanaiḥ ।। 

upāyaṃ kalpanātmānam anupāyaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
duḥkhadatvān nimeṣeṇa bhāvābhāvaiṣaṇabhramaiḥ ।। 

jagadbhramaṃ parijñāya yad avāsanam āsitam ।
virasāśeṣaviṣayaṃ tad dhi nirvāṇam ucyate ।। 

ākhyāyikārthapratibhānarūpam acetyacidvāribharadravātmā ।
avedyavidrūpam aśeṣam acchaṃ paśyan vinirvāmi jagatsvarūpam ।। 

jātyandharūpānubhavānurūpaṃ yad āgamair buddham abodharūpam ।
adhaspadīkṛtya tad antar asmin bodhe nipatyānubhave bhavābhūḥ ।। 

nirvāṇopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

dviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahantādi jagac cedaṃ parijñānād asatyatām ।
yāti sānubhave mohāt satyam evānyathādhiyām ।। 

ajñānajvaramuktasya bodhaśītalitātmanaḥ ।
etad eva bhavec cihnaṃ yad bhogāmbu na rocate ।। 

alam anyaiḥ parijñānair vācyavācakavibhramaiḥ ।
anahaṃvedanāmātraṃ nirvāṇaṃ tad vibhāvyatām ।। 

abhijñātā yathā svapne padārthā ramayanti no ।
na ca santi tathaivāsmin nāhaṃ jagad iti bhrame ।। 

yathā svabhāvanād yakṣas tarau sasvajanaṃ puram ।
paśyaty asatyam evaivaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati saṃsṛtim ।। 

vibhramātmā yathā yakṣo yakṣālokaś ca tau mithaḥ ।
sadrūpau saṃsthitau mithyā tathāhantvajagadbhramau ।। 

anāvaraṇato araṇye yakṣād vibhramarūpiṇaḥ ।
yathā sphuranti bhūtāni tathemāni caturdaśa ।। 

bhramamātram ahaṃ mithyaiveti buddhyā vibhāvayan ।
yakṣo ayakṣatvam āyāti cittaṃ cācittatām idam ।। 

nirastasakalāśaṅkaṃ tyāgagrahaṇavarjitam ।
avisārisamastecchaṃ śāntam āssva yathāsthitam ।। 

atyantāsambhavaddṛśyaṃ draṣṭrātmakam idaṃ tatam ।
atha vā naiva draṣṭrātma savācyaṃ kim avāpyate ।। 

vasantarasapūrasya yathā viṭapagulmatā ।
svarūpamātrabharatas saṃvidas sargatā tathā ।। 

yad idaṃ jagadābhāsaṃ śuddhacinmātravedanam ।
kātraikatā dvitā kā vā nirvāṇam alam āsyatām ।। 

bhūyatāṃ cinmayavyomnā pīyatāṃ paramo rasaḥ ।
sthīyatāṃ vigatāśaṅkaṃ nirvāṇānandanandane ।। 

kim etāsv atiśūnyāsu saṃsārāraṇyabhūmiṣu ।
mānavā vātahariṇā bhramathodbhrāntabuddhayaḥ ।। 

jagattrayamarīcyambuvipralabdhāndhabuddhayaḥ ।
mā dhāvata ghanavyagram āśayopahatāśayāḥ ।। 

rūpālokamanaskāramṛgatṛṣṇāmbupāyinaḥ ।
vyarthaṃ mā yūyam āyūṃṣi narāḥ kṣapayataiṇakāḥ ।। 

jagadgandharvanagarāgāragardhena naśyatha ।
sukharūpāṇi duḥkhāni śāsanāyaiva paśyatha ।। 

jagatkeśoṇḍukaṃ bhrāntyai mā mahāmbaramadhyagam ।
avalokayatābhrānte svarūpe pariṇamyatām ।। 

mānavā vātaloloccapattraprāntāmbubhaṅgurāḥ ।
mā navāsu navāsv andhagarbhaśayyāsu śayyatām ।। 

avirāmam anādyantaṃ svabhāve śāntam āsyatām ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyadaśādoṣād asvabhāvād viramyatām ।। 

ajñāvabuddhas saṃsāras sāhaṃ nāsti manāg api ।
aviśiṣṭaṃ tu yat satyaṃ tasya nāma na vidyate ।। 

troṭayitvā tu tṛṣṇāyaśśṛṅkhalāvalitaṃ balāt ।
saṃsārapañjaraṃ tiṣṭha sarvasyordhve mṛgendravat ।। 

ātmātmīyagrahabhrāntiśāntimātraṃ vimuktatā ।
yathātathāsthitasyāpi sā svasattaiva yoginaḥ ।। 

nirvāṇatāvāsanatā paropaśamatā jñatā ।
saṃsārādhvani khinnasya śītā viśramabhūmayaḥ ।। 

tajjñajñāto na mūrkhāṇāṃ mūrkhajñāto na tadvidām ।
vidyate jagadartho asāv avācyo anyas tayor mithaḥ ।। 

viśvatā bhrāntisaṃśāntau saṃsthitaiva na labhyate ।
mahārṇavāmbuvalitā putrikeva payomayī ।। 

bhrāntiśāntau vimuktasya vinirvāṇasya viśvatā ।
yathā sthitaiva galitā vidyate ca yathāsthitam ।। 

nirdagdhatṛṇabhasmālī kvāpi yāti yathānilaiḥ ।
satāṃ svabhāvaviśrāmaiḥ kvāpi yāti tathā jagat ।। 

jagad brahmapadārthasya sanniveśas sa tūttamaḥ ।
brahmaśabdārtharūpātmā na jagacchabdakārthabhāk ।। 

navajātasya bālasya padārthā yādṛśā ime ।
viduṣas tādṛśā eva tiṣṭhataḥ kṣīṇavāsanam ।। 

yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī ।
yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā rātriḥ paśyato muneḥ ।। 

sthitam eva virāmāya jāgraj jñasya suṣuptavat ।
citrāvalokina iva jāgraty asya rasaiṣaṇāḥ ।। 

jātyandharūpānubhavasamaṃ bhuvanavedanam ।
bhrāntaprāyam asadrūpaṃ jñasya bhāti na bhāti ca ।। 

vimūḍhabuddhaṃ trijagad vibuddhaviṣayaṃ na sat ।
vibuddhabuddhaṃ trijagad vimūḍhaviṣayaṃ na sat ।। 

svapne svapnatayā jñāte rūpālokamanaḥkriyāḥ ।
na svadante yathā tadvaj jāgratsvapne sphurantu mā ।। 

nirvibhāgas samāśvasto nirodhaṃ param āgataḥ ।
āśītalāntaḥkaraṇo nirvāṇo jño avatiṣṭhate ।। 

tajjñasyākliṣṭamuktasya samaṃ dhyānaṃ vinā sthitiḥ ।
nimnaṃ vineva toyasya na sambhavati kācana ।। 

artha eva manaskāro mana evārtharañjanam ।
eka evaiṣa ābhāsas sabāhyābhyantarātmakaḥ ।। 

āsamudraṃ nadīvāhaśatasaṅgamayātmakam ।
yathaikaśleṣapiṇḍātma nayaty ambu taraṅgitam ।। 

sabāhyābhyantarākāram arthānarthamayātmakam ।
mana eva sphuraty arthanirbhāsaṃ vyātataṃ tathā ।। 

nāsty arthamanasor dvitvaṃ yathā jalataraṅgayoḥ ।
ekābhāve dvayoś śāntiḥ pavanaspandayor iva ।। 

nūnam ekopaśāntyaiva nissāre paramārthataḥ ।
ekatvād arthamanasī samam evāśu śāmyataḥ ।। 

arthas saṅkalparūpātmā nehitavyo vijānatā ।
manaś ca samyagjñānena śāntir evaṃ bhavet tayoḥ ।। 

anaṣṭe naśyataś caiva jñasyārthamanasī svataḥ ।
mṛṇmaye dviṣati jñānād dviṣadbhāvabhaye yathā ।। 

yathāsaṃsthaṃ sthite eva jñasyārthamanasī sadā ।
kim apy apūrvam evānyat sampanne abhāvarūpiṇī ।। 

sañcitārthajagajjālo apy ajño jñaviṣaye apy asan ।
pārśvasuptanarasvapna iva kṣīvāgrayakṣavat ।। 

jñasya sājñaṃ jagan nāsti dhīrasyeva piśācadhīḥ ।
jñam ajño bhāvayaty ajñaṃ svabhāvaṃ sarvagaṃ viduḥ ।। 

manaśśabdārtharahitaṃ vibhāgāntavivarjitam ।
bodhavāri mano viddhi taraṅgam iva nirmalam ।। 

kva sambhavata evātaḥ ke vārthamanasī kila ।
nirarthakaiva vidbhrāntis svabhāvamayam āsyatām ।। 

śuddhabodhasvabhāvasthair ākāśair iva śāradaiḥ ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptāntair manastvaṃ nānubhūyate ।। 

vidhūyānantanānātvam asambhavam anāmaye ।
jñeyaṃ raja ivāśeṣaṃ svabhāve tiṣṭha cidghane ।। 

jñaptir evāntaraṃ bāhyaṃ cārthatvam adhitiṣṭhati ।
bījaṃ śākhāphalānīva kvāto arthamanasī vada ।। 

jñeyāsambhavato jñaptir apy anākhyaṃ padaṃ gatā ।
śāntāśeṣaviśeṣātmā tena śeṣo asi san svabhāḥ ।। 

artha eva manaskāras sa cābhāvātmako bhramaḥ ।
mana evārthasaṃskāras sa cābhāvātmako bhramaḥ ।। 

sarvātmatvād ajasyaitad apakāraṇakaṃ manaḥ ।
bhramānubhavato arthaś ca mithyaivāstīva bhāsate ।। 

akāraṇakam evārthanirbhāsaṃ bhāsate manaḥ ।
vidyudvilasitākāram asthiraṃ taralāyate ।। 

tvaṃ manaskāramātrātmā saṃsṛtau vibhramāyase ।
svabhāvaikaparijñānān nāsi nāpi bhramāyase ।। 

manastaiva hi saṃsāra ātmabodhena śāmyati ।
śuktirupyabhramākāro jano mithyaiva tāmyati ।। 

abhāvabhāvas tu paraṃ bodharūpam asaṃsṛtiḥ ।
nirvāṇād itarā sattā duḥkhāyāham iti bhramaḥ ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmburūpo aham asac chūnyasvarūpakaḥ ।
ity evātmaparijñānād aham ity āśu śāmyati ।। 

jñātvā jñānaparo bhūtvā sabāhyābhyantarārthatām ।
gataṃ svam atyajad rūpaṃ taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ ।। 

mūlaśākhāgraparyantā sattā viṭapino yathā ।
nirvikārāmalā jñaptir jñeyāntaikaiva bhāsate ।। 

yathā yojanalakṣābham ekam evāmalaṃ nabhaḥ ।
ekam eva tathā jñānaṃ jñeyāntaṃ bhāty akhaṇḍitam ।। 

śūnyatvād ekam amalaṃ yathā sarvagam eva kham ।
tathaikam amalaṃ jñatvāj jñānaṃ jñeyadaśāsv api ।। 

ghṛtenātmā ghanībhūya pāṣāṇīkriyate yathā ।
citā cetyatayātmaiva svaś cittīkriyate tathā ।। 

deśakālaṃ vinaivātmā bodhād bodhena cittatām ।
abuddho nīyate nyāya evam evaiṣa susthitaḥ ।। 

atra yady api bodhādes sambhavo nāsti kaścana ।
tathāpi kalpyate atraivaṃ bodhanāya parasparam ।। 

mahānubhāvā vigatābhimānā vimūḍhabhāvopaśame laganti ।
nirbhrāntayo anantatayaiva śāntā nityaṃ samādhānamayā bhavanti ।। 

brahmaikatānatopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

ekottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kramāt samādhānataror ājīvaṃ phalaśālinīm ।
salatākusumāṃ brūhi sattāṃ viśrāntidāṃ mune ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ājīvam udyadutsedhaṃ vivekijanakānane ।
puṣpapattraphalopetaṃ samādhānataruṃ śṛṇu ।। 

yathā kathañcid uditaṃ duḥkhena svayam eva vā ।
saṃsāranavanirvedaṃ bījam asya vidur budhāḥ ।। 

śubhajālahalākṛṣṭaṃ rasāsiktam aharniśam ।
pravahacchvasanākulyaṃ kṣetram asya mano viduḥ ।। 

samādhibījaṃ saṃsāranirvedaḥ patati svayam ।
cittabhūmau viviktāyāṃ vivekijanakānane ।। 

svacittabhūmau patitaṃ dhyānabījaṃ mahādhiyā ।
sekair amībhir yatnena saṃsektavyam akhindatā ।। 

śuddhais snigdhaiḥ pavitraiś ca madhurair ātmanehitaiḥ ।
satsaṅgamanavakṣīrair aindavair amṛtair iva ।। 

antaśśaityapradaiḥ pūrṇais svacchair amṛtaśītalaiḥ ।
visṛtair matikulyāsu śāstrārthavaravāribhiḥ ।। 

svacittabhūmau patitaṃ parijñāya mahādhiyā ।
bījaṃ saṃsāranirvedo rakṣyaṃ dhyānasya yatnataḥ ।। 

tapaḥprākāradānena parārthaghaṭanokṣitaiḥ ।
tīrthāyatanaviśrāntidhṛtivistārakalpanaiḥ ।। 

kartavyo aṅkuritasyāsya rakṣitā śikṣitāśayaḥ ।
santoṣanāmā priyayā nityaṃ muditayānvitaḥ ।। 

paścātsthitāśāvihagān parapraṇayapakṣiṇaḥ ।
asmād āpatataḥ kāmagarvagṛdhrān nivārayet ।। 

mṛdubhis satkriyākūrcair vivekārkātapair iva ।
aucityālokadair asmān mārjitavyaṃ rajas tamaḥ ।। 

sampadaḥ pramadāś caiva taraṅgā bhogabhaṅgurāḥ ।
patanty aśanayas tasmin duṣkṛtābhrasamīritāḥ ।। 

dhairyaudāryadayāmantrair japasnānatapodamaiḥ ।
vinivārayitavyās tāḥ praṇavārthatriśūlinā ।। 

iti saṃrakṣitād asmād dhyānabījāt pravartate ।
ābhijātyonnataś śrīmān vivekākhyo navāṅkuraḥ ।। 

tena sā cittabhūr bhāti saprakāśāprakāśinī ।
bhavaty ālokaramyā ca khaṃ yathābhinavendunā ।। 

tasmād aṅkurataḥ pattre ubhe vikasatas svayam ।
ekaṃ śāstrābhigamanaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhusaṅgamaḥ ।। 

stambham evātha badhnāti sthairyaṃ nāma samunnatam ।
santoṣatvagvivalitaṃ vairāgyarasarañjitam ।। 

vairāgyarasapuṣṭātmā śāstrārthaprāvṛṣānvitaḥ ।
svalpenaiva sa kālena parām eti samunnatim ।। 

śāstrārthasādhusamparkavairāgyarasapīvaraḥ ।
rāgadveṣakapikṣobhair na manāg api kampate ।। 

atha tasmāt prajāyante vijñānālaṅkṛtākṛteḥ ।
latā rasavilāsinya imā vitatadeśagāḥ ।। 

sphuṭatā satyatā sattā dhīratā nirvikalpatā ।
samatā śāntatā maitrī karuṇā kīrtitāryatā ।। 

latābhir guṇapattrābhis sa dhyānatarur ūrjitaḥ ।
yaśaḥpuṣpābhir etābhiḥ pārijātāyate yateḥ ।। 

ity asau jñānaviṭapī latāpallavapuṣpavān ।
bhaviṣyaddhyānaphalado dinānudinam unnaman ।। 

yaśaḥkusumagucchāḍhyo guṇapallavalāsyavān ।
vairāgyarasavistārī prajñāmañjaritākṛtiḥ ।। 

sarvāś śītalayaty āśāḥ prāvṛṣīva payodharaḥ ।
bhavātapaṃ śamayati sūryatāpam ivoḍupaḥ ।। 

pratanoti śamacchāyāṃ chāyām iva ghanāgamaḥ ।
nirodham āsphālayati samo anila ivāmbudam ।। 

nibadhnāty ātmanā pīṭhaṃ kulācala iva sthiram ।
phalasya racayaty ūrdhve ghaṭikāṃ maṅgalācitām ।। 

vivekaphalavṛkṣe tu vardhamāne dine dine ।
chāyāvitānavalite puṃso hṛdayakānane ।। 

pravartate śītalatā talatāpāpahāriṇī ।
atyullasanmatilatātuṣārodarasundarī ।। 

yasyām avāntaraśrānto viśrāmyati manomṛgaḥ ।
ājanmajīrṇapathikaḥ pathi kolāhalākulaḥ ।। 

sattāmātrātmaśārīraśarmārthaṃ prekṣito aribhiḥ ।
nānātāsāram ātmānaṃ gopayan kuñjakonmukhaḥ ।। 

saṃsārāraṇyavisaradvāsanāpavaneritaḥ ।
ahantātāpasaritā sarvadā vipralambhitaḥ ।। 

dāradīrghadarīdūracirasañcārajarjaraḥ ।
putrapattraparāmarśaprapātāt patito avaṭe ।। 

lakṣmīlatāviluṭhanāt saṅkaṭe kuṭṭitāṅgakaḥ ।
tṛṣṇāśrīsaritaṃ gṛhṇan kallolair dūram āhṛtaḥ ।। 

vyādhidurvyādhavaidhuryapalāyanaparāyaṇaḥ ।
aśaṅkitavidhivyādhapātāticakitākṛtiḥ ।। 

geyāsvādasamāpātaduḥkhasāyakaśaṅkitaḥ ।
vairividrāvaṇavyagro dṛṣadāhananāṅkitaḥ ।। 

unnatānatasampātanipātānatighūrṇitaḥ ।
nyakkāropalanirghātaiḥ pāramparyeṇa cūrṇitaḥ ।। 

tṛṣṇāśaralatājālapraveśavaśavikṣataḥ ।
svaprajñāracitācāraḥ paramāyāsv aśikṣitaḥ ।। 

indriyagrāmam āgatya prapalāyanatatparaḥ ।
sudurgrahagajendrogravisphūrjanavimarditaḥ ।। 

viṣayājagarodgāraviṣaphūtkāramūrchitaḥ ।
kāmakauleyakair bhūmau rasārdrāyāṃ vipothitaḥ ।। 

kopadāvānalapluṣṭaspaṣṭavisphoṭadāhavān ।
sadāgatāgatānekadīrghaduḥkhapravāhavān ।। 

svāṅgalagnābhilāṣāṃśadaṃśadoṣair upadrutaḥ ।
bhogalobhalasanmedassṛgālaciravidrutaḥ ।। 

svakarmakandarodvāntadāridryadvīpyanudrutaḥ ।
vyāmohamihikāndhatvakūṭāvaṭaluṭhattanuḥ ।। 

mānasiṃhasamullāsahṛdayotkampanāturaḥ ।
maraṇenāraṇeyena bukapuṣpam ivekṣitaḥ ।। 

gardhān nigaraṇāyāśu dūrato janasevitaḥ ।
kāmais samantato dattacintānicayavāguraḥ ।। 

tāruṇyanāmnā suhṛdā kṣaṇam āliṅgya varjitaḥ ।
dussañcāreṣu pavanaiḥ kupitair iva tarjitaḥ ।। 

kadācin nirvṛtiṃ yātaḥ kṣaṇaṃ śamatarau kvacit ।
manohariṇako rājan rājīvam iva bhāsvati ।। 

tālītamālabakulādikavṛkṣagulmaviśrāntiṣu pracurapuṣpavilāsahāsaiḥ ।
nāmāpi yasya na vidanti sukhasya mūḍhāḥ prāpnoti tac chamataros svamanomṛgo vaḥ ।। 

manovipadvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti viśrāntimān eṣa manohariṇako arihan ।
tatraiva ratim āyāti na yāti viṭapāntaram ।। 

etāvatātha kālena sa vivekadrumaḥ phalam ।
antassthaṃ paramārthātma śanaiḥ prakaṭayaty alam ।। 

dhyānadrumaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ tad asau svamanomṛgaḥ ।
adhassthitaḥ prāntagataṃ tasya paśyati sattaroḥ ।। 

ārohati tato vṛkṣaṃ tad āsvādayituṃ phalam ।
anyagardhaparityāge vitatādhyavasāyavān ।। 

vivekarasam ākrāman vṛttīs tyajati bhūgatāḥ ।
uttamaṃ padam āsādya bhūyo nādhas samīhate ।। 

tenottamaphalārthena saṃskārān prāktanān asau ।
vivekapadam ārūḍhas tyajaty ahir iva tvacam ।। 

hasaty uccaiḥ padārūḍham ātmānam avalokayan ।
etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ ko abhavaṃ tv iti ।। 

karuṇādiṣu teṣv astabhramaś śākhāntareṣu saḥ ।
lobhavyālam adhaḥ kurvan samrāḍ iva virājate ।। 

hṛdayendor ghanaśreṇīr mukhābjatimirāvalīḥ ।
kṛṣṇāyaśśṛṅkhalās tṛṣṇā dinānudinam ujjhati ।। 

upekṣate na samprāptaṃ nāprāptam abhivāñchati ।
somasomyo bhavaty antaśśītalas sarvavṛttiṣu ।। 

śāstrārthapallaveṣv eva niṣaṇṇātmāvatiṣṭhate ।
unnatāvanatāpātā adhaḥ paśyañ jagadgatīḥ ।। 

bhīmadrumalatotkīrṇapuṣpaprakaradanturāḥ ।
prāktanīs svās sthalīḥ paśyan hasaty antar varākatām ।। 

teṣu tatskandhadeśeṣu tayoḍḍīnaviḍīnayā ।
hāriṇyā viharan gatyā rājeva parirājate ।। 

putradārakalatrāṇi mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca ।
janmāntarakṛtānīva svapnajānīva paśyati ।। 

rāgadveṣabhayonmādamānamohamahārtayaḥ ।
naṭasyevāsya dṛśyante śītalāmalacetasaḥ ।। 

unmattaceṣṭitākārā hasaty api puro asatīḥ ।
taraṅgabhaṅgurādhārās saṃsārasarito gatīḥ ।। 

na sa cetayate kāścil lokadāradhanaiṣaṇāḥ ।
apūrvapadaviśrānto jīvann eva yathā śavaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ kevale śuddhe bodhātmani mahonnatau ।
dattadṛṣṭiḥ phale tasmin dūraṃ samadhirohati ।। 

smṛtvā smṛtvāpadaḥ pūrvās santoṣāmṛtapoṣitaḥ ।
arthānām apy anarthānāṃ nāśe na paritapyate ।। 

vyavahāreṣu kāryeṣu bhogasampādakeṣv api ।
param udvegam āyāti sanidra iva bodhitaḥ ।। 

dīrghādhvaga ivodārām anāratam abādhitām ।
ciraṃ maurkhyaśramākrānto viśrāntim abhivāñchati ।। 

niśśvāsabodhito apy agnir anindhana ivātmani ।
śvāsamātrabhrame apy antar atiṣṭhann eva śāmyati ।। 

āpatantīṃ balād eva padārtheṣv aratiṃ śanaiḥ ।
na śaknoti nirākartuṃ vṛṣṭim abhracyutām iva ।। 

tāṃ mahāpadavīṃ gacchan paramārthaphalapradām ।
bhūmiṃ kām apy upāyāti vacasām apy agocarām ।। 

kuto apy aceṣṭiteṣv eva samprāpteṣu vidher vaśāt ।
bhogeṣv aratim āyāti pāntho marumahīṣv iva ।। 

ghūrṇan kṣīva ivānandī suptas saṃsāravṛttiṣu ।
antaḥpūrṇamanā maunī kām api sthitim ṛcchati ।। 

sa tādṛgrūpatām etya paramārthaphalasya tat ।
kramān nikaṭam āpnoti khago arkapadavīm iva ।। 

tatas tad akhilā buddhīr vihāya viyatā samaḥ ।
gṛhṇāty athāsvādayati bhuṅkte atha paritṛpyati ।। 

sakalārthaparityāgād dinānudinam ātatāt ।
śuddhasvabhāvaviśrāntiḥ paramārthāptir ucyate ।। 

bhedabuddhau vilīnāyāṃ bodha evāvaśiṣyate ।
śuddham ekam anādyantaṃ tad brahmeti vidur budhāḥ ।। 

lokaiṣaṇāviraktena tyaktadāraiṣaṇena ca ।
dhanaiṣaṇāvimuktena tasmin viśramyate pade ।। 

pareṇa pariṇāmena mithaś citparamārthayoḥ ।
tāpena himalekheva bhedabuddhir vilīyate ।। 

tajjñasyākliṣṭamuktasya svabhāvaṃ susamaṃ vinā ।
sthitis sragdāmakasyeva na sambhavati kācana ।। 

yathāprakaṭitāṅgāntas saṃsthitā sālabhañjikā ।
na satī nāsatī stambhe tathā viśvasthitiḥ pare ।। 

dhyānaṃ na śakyate kartuṃ na caitad upayujyate ।
abodhena vibuddhas tu svayam atraiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

ātyantikī virasatā yasya dṛśyeṣu dṛśyate ।
sa buddho nāprabuddhasya dṛśyatyāge hi śaktatā ।। 

dṛśyasya bodhatābodho yo bodhād aparikṣayaḥ ।
sa samādhānaśabdena kathyate susamāhitaiḥ ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśyaikatārūpaḥ pratyayo manaso yadā ।
udety ekasamādhāne tadā viśrāmyati svayam ।। 

svabhāvo dṛśyavairasyam eva tattvavido janāḥ ।
dṛśyasvadanam evāhur atattvajñatvam uttamāḥ ।। 

atajjñasyaiva viṣayās svadante na tu tadvidaḥ ।
na hi pītāmṛtāyāntas svadate kaṭu kāñcikam ।। 

vitṛṣṇasyātmaniṣṭhatvād eṣaṇātrayam ujjhataḥ ।
jñasyāpy anicchato dhyānam arthāyātaṃ pravartate ।। 

bodhas sphurati tṛṣṇāyāṃ saiva yasya na vidyate ।
tasya svaṃ rūpam utsṛjya kvāsau tiṣṭhati kaḥ katham ।। 

jñasyānādhārako adhyeyo bodho neyattayā bhavet ।
ananto asāv atṛṣṇasya nirvibhāgoditas svayam ।। 

anantam apatṛṣṇasya svayam eva pravartate ।
dhyānaṃ galitapakṣasya saṃsthānam iva bhūbhṛtaḥ ।। 

śuddhabodhātmani jñatvād asamāhitatoditā ।
labhyate na samiddhe agnau bukapuṣpam iva sthitam ।। 

paraṃ viṣayavaitṛṣṇyaṃ samādhānam udāhṛtam ।
āhṛtaṃ yena tan nūnaṃ tasmai nṛbrahmaṇe namaḥ ।। 

nūnaṃ viṣayavaitṛṣṇye pariprauḍhim upāgate ।
śaknuvanti nihantuṃ na dhyānaṃ sendrās surāsurāḥ ।। 

paraṃ viṣayavaitṛṣṇyaṃ vajradhyānaṃ prasādhyatām ।
bhede vigalite jñānād anyānandatṛṇena kim ।। 

mūrkhastho viśvaśabdārtho na tajjñaviṣayo yathā ।
tajjñastho viśvaśabdārtho na mūrkhaviṣayas tathā ।। 

tajjñājñayos tayoś caiva sthitayor viśvayor yathā ।
yatraikībhūya kacanaṃ tatra viśramyatāṃ budhāḥ ।। 

bodhabhūmiṣu siddhānām arthānāṃ vāvivekinām ।
sattāsatte dvayaikye ca nirṇīte neha kenacit ।। 

upāya ekaś śāstrārtho dvitīyo jñasamāgamaḥ ।
dhyānaṃ tṛtīyo nirvāṇe śreṣṭhas tv atrottarottaraḥ ।। 

jīvādarśo mitho rūpaṃ gṛhṇāty eṣāṃ mahad vapuḥ ।
jagaty udeti saṅghaṭṭād aviśeṣaṃ same asame ।। 

jñātapūrvāparāśeṣajagadaṣṭāpadasthiteḥ ।
ekasiddhau dvayos siddhir bhogavaitṛṣṇyadā yayoḥ ।। 

mativātyā dhuto vyomni dagdho jñānāgninākhilaḥ ।
jagattūlaḥ pare śānte na jāne kvāśu gacchati ।। 

citrāgnineva bodhena tena jāḍyaṃ na śāmyati ।
nirmūlāpi jagadbhrāntir yenāśu na vilīyate ।। 

yathājñasya jagajjñaptir apajñānāt pradīpyate ।
tathā jñasya parijñānāt tadajñaptiḥ pradīpyate ।। 

tajjñasya trijagajjñaptiśabdārtharahitā sthitā ।
yathā sthithaiva trijagajjñaptiś citra ivoditā ।। 

śūnyatveneva racitā svapnatveneva nirmitā ।
bhāsate bhāmayīvācchā jagajjñaptir jñacetasi ।। 

nūnaṃ bodhe virūḍhasya nāhantā na jagatsthitiḥ ।
bhāsate paramābhāsarūpiṇaḥ kāpy avasthitiḥ ।। 

bodhābodhātmakaṃ cittaṃ bhāti śuṣkārdrakāṣṭhavat ।
bodhād ekaṃ jagadbhāvair jāḍyān nānātvam āgatam ।। 

mitho abodhād vivadati maitrīṃ bhajati bodhataḥ ।
ya evāsyādhiko bhāgas tanmayatvena tiṣṭhati ।। 

buddhas saṃs tattvam āvetti jagato abhāvabhāvayoḥ ।
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptānāṃ svabhāvam iva turyagaḥ ।। 

vāsanaiva manas seyaṃ svavicāreṇa naśyati ।
avastutvād ato mokṣe nātmanāśaḥ pravartate ।। 

dhyānadrumāt svayam analpam upoḍhapākāt kālena bodham upayātavataḥ krameṇa ।
bhuktvā rasāyanaphalaṃ parabodham ādyam itthaṃ manohariṇako nigaḍād vimuktaḥ ।। 

manohariṇopākhyānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tryuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paramārthaphale jñāte bhukte pariṇatiṃ gate ।
bodhe atha sa bhavaty āśu paramārtho manomṛgaḥ ।। 

kvāpi sā mṛgatā yāti prakṣīṇasnehadīpavat ।
paramārthadaśaivāste tatrānantāvabhāsinī ।। 

dhyānadrumaphalaprāptau bodhatām āgataṃ manaḥ ।
vajrasārāṃ sthitiṃ dhatte cchinnapakṣa ivācalaḥ ।। 

manastā kvāpi saṃyāti tiṣṭhtaty acchaiva bodhatā ।
nirvācyā nirvibhāgāntā sarvā sarvātmikā satī ।। 

aviviktatayā cittasattā bodhatayoditā ।
anādyantā bhavaty acchaprakāśaphaladāyinī ।। 

svayam eva tatas tatra nirastasakalaiṣaṇam ।
anādyantam anāyāsaṃ dhyānam evāvaśiṣyate ।। 

yāvan nādhigataṃ brahma na viśrāntaṃ pare pade ।
tāvat tanmananatvena na dhyānam avagamyate ।। 

paramārthaikatām etya na jāne kva mano gatam ।
kva vāsanāḥ kva karmāṇi kva harṣāmarṣasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ dṛśyate yogī gato dhyānaikaniṣṭhatām ।
sthito vajrasamādhāne vipakṣa iva parvataḥ ।। 

virasākhilabhogasya praśāntendriyasaṃvidaḥ ।
nīrasāśeṣadṛśyasya svātmārāmasya yoginaḥ ।। 

krameṇa vigaladvṛtter balād viśrantim īyuṣaḥ ।
arthāyātaṃ samādhānaṃ kena nāma nivāryate ।। 

tāvad viṣayavairasyaṃ bhāvayaty ucitāśayaḥ ।
na paśyaty eva tān yāvad bhogāṃś citranaro yathā ।। 

apaśyañ jāgatān arthān nirvāsanatayātmavān ।
balād vajrasamādhāne tv anyeneva niveśyate ।। 

prāvṛṣīva nadīpūro yas samādhir upasthitaḥ ।
balād eva tam āyātaṃ bhūyaś calati no manaḥ ।। 

sarvārthaśītalatvena balād dhyānaṃ yad āgatam ।
jñānād viṣayavairasyaṃ sa samādhir hi netaraḥ ।। 

dṛḍhaṃ viṣayavairasyam eva dhyānam udāhṛtam ।
tad eva paripākena vajrasāraṃ bhavaty alam ।। 

yad etad bhogavaitṛṣṇyaṃ dhyānam aṅkuritaṃ hi tat ।
tad eva pīṭhabandhena bhavati skandhabandhuram ।। 

samyagjñānaṃ samucchūnaṃ yadaivojjhitavāsanam ।
dhyānaṃ bhavati nirvāṇam ānandāt param āgatam ।। 

asti ced bhogavaitṛṣṇyaṃ kim anyad dhyānadurdhiyā ।
nāsti ced bhogavaitṛṣṇyaṃ kim anyad dhyānadurdhiyā ।। 

dṛśyasvadanamuktasya samyagjñānavato muneḥ ।
nirvikalpaṃ samādhānam avirāmaṃ pravartate ।। 

yasmai na svadate dṛśyaṃ sa sambuddha iti smṛtaḥ ।
na svadante yadā bhogās samyagbodhas tadoditaḥ ।। 

yasya svabhāvaviśrāntiḥ kathaṃ tasyāsti bhogitā ।
asvabhāvo hi bhogitvaṃ tatkṣaye tat kathaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

śrutipāṭhajapānteṣu samādhinirato bhavet ।
samādhivirataś śāntaś śrutipāṭhajapāñ śrayet ।। 

nirvāṇam āsīta nirastakhedaṃ samastaśaṅkāstamayābhirāmam ।
suṣuptasomyaṃ samaśāntacittaṃ śaradghanābhogaviśuddham antaḥ ।। 

sāmyāvabodho nāma sargaḥ

caturuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

saṃsārabhārasuśrāntas saṅkaṭeṣu luṭhattanuḥ ।
yo abhivāñchati viśrāntiṃ tasya kramam imaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

pūrvaṃ vivekakaṇikā yadāsya hṛdi jāyate ।
saṃsāranirvedamayī kāraṇād vāpy akāraṇāt ।। 

tadāśrayati sacchāyān sādhūn unnatiśālinaḥ ।
adhvaśramaharāṃs tāpatapto mārgatarūn iva ।। 

dūre pariharaty ajñān yajñayūpān ivādhvagaḥ ।
snānadānatapoyajñān karoti vibudhānugaḥ ।। 

peśalaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca vyavahāram akṛtrimam ।
lokyam āhlādanaṃ dhatte candrabimbam ivāmṛtam ।। 

paraprajñānugo bhāvaḥ parārthaparipūrakaḥ ।
pavitrakarmarasikaḥ ko api somyaḥ pravartate ।। 

navanītasthalīvācchā snigdhā mṛdvī manoharā ।
janaṃ sukhayati svādvī tadīyā navasaṅgatiḥ ।। 

śītalāni pavitrāṇi caritāni vivekinaḥ ।
indor ivāṃśujālāni janaṃ śītalayanty alam ।। 

na tathodyānaṣaṇḍeṣu puṣpaprakarahāriṣu ।
viśramyate vītabhayaṃ yathā sādhusamāgame ।। 

mandākinīpayāṃsīva saṅgatāni vivekinām ।
prakṣālayanti pāpāni prayacchanti viśuddhatām ।। 

vivekiṣu virakteṣu saṃsārottaraṇārthiṣu ।
janaś śītalatām eti himahāragṛheṣv iva ।। 

nanu nāgaratodārā yā vivekini vidyate ।
suragandharvakanyāsu sā navāsu na vidyate ।। 

prajñā prasādam āyāti kramād ucitakarmaṇaḥ ।
antaḥ karoti śāstrārtham arthaṃ makurabhūr iva ।। 

satprajñonnatim āyāti śāstrārtharasaśālinī ।
vivekinī vilāsena kadalīva mahāvane ।। 

antar evāśu vahati sarvārthān pratibimbitān ।
ādarśavad aśeṣeṇa prajñā nairmalyaśālinī ।। 

sādhusaṅgamaśuddhātmā śāstrārthaparimārjitaḥ ।
prājño bhāty uddhṛtaṃ vahner agniśaucam ivāṃśukam ।। 

kacatkāñcanakāntena vimalālokakāriṇā ।
bhuvanaṃ bhāskareṇeva bhāti sādhus svacetasā ।। 

tathānugacchati prājñaś śāstrasādhusamāgamau ।
yathātyantānuṣaṅgeṇa tāv evāśu bhavaty ayam ।। 

kramāt sajjanatām etya śāstrārthabharabhāvitaḥ ।
bhāti bhogān adhaḥ kurvan pañjarād iva nirgataḥ ।। 

bhogābhigamadaurbhāgyaṃ dinānudinam ujjhatā ।
tena tat kulam ābhāti tārācakram ivendunā ।। 

abhogakṛpaṇā kāpi navaivāsya pravartate ।
mukhe kāntir apūrvaiva candre rāhau mṛte yathā ।। 

tṛṇīkṛtatrijagatāṃ mahatām abhidheyatām ।
sa yāti kalpaviṭapī nabhasīva divaukasām ।। 

bhogānāṃ dveṣaṇenāntar lajjamāno manasvy api ।
bhogānām anyasampattyā paramaṃ parituṣyati ।। 

svā evopahasaty antas taraṇī taralakriyāḥ ।
khedasmeramukho jātīr jātismara ivādhamāḥ ।। 

atha taṃ draṣṭum āyānti sauhārdenaiva sādhavaḥ ।
bhūmāv ivoditaṃ candraṃ vismayotphullalocanāḥ ।। 

nityānādṛtabhogo asau tam apy ucitayā dhiyā ।
prāptam apy ucitārambhaṃ bhogaṃ na bahu manyate ।। 

pūrvaṃ saṃsṛtivairasyam antar evoditātmanaḥ ।
jāyate jīrṇajāḍyasya pākād iva śarattaroḥ ।। 

tatas sajjanasamparkam udarkaśreyase svayam ।
karoti svasthatāgṛdhnur bhiṣagāśrayaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

tenodāramatir bhūtvā śāstrārtheṣu nimajjati ।
mahān mahāprasanneṣu sarassv iva mahāgajaḥ ।। 

sajjano hi samuttārya vipadbhyo nikaṭasthitam ।
niyojayati sampatsu svālokeṣv iva bhāskaraḥ ।। 

parasvādānaviratiḥ pūrvam eva pravartate ।
vivekino nijārtheṣu santoṣaś copajāyate ।। 

parasvādānaviratas santoṣāmṛtanirbharaḥ ।
vivekī kramaśas svārthān apy upekṣitum icchati ।। 

dadāti kaṇapiṇyākaśākāny api hi yācate ।
tenaivābhyāsayogena svamāṃsāni dadāty asau ।। 

nūnaṃ viralacintānāṃ vivekam anudhāvatām ।
maurkhyaṃ laghutvam āyāti dhāvatām iva goṣpadam ।। 

parārthādānaviratiṃ pūrvam abhyasya yatnataḥ ।
āhartavyā vivekena tatas svārtheṣv araktatā ।। 

tato bhoganirāsena saha svārthanirākṛtiḥ ।
paramāyai svaviśrāntyai kriyate kṛtibhiḥ kramāt ।। 

na tādṛśaṃ jagaty asti duḥkhaṃ narakakoṭiṣu ।
yādṛśaṃ yāvadāyuṣkam arthopārjanaśāsanam ।। 

āsane śayane yāne gamane ramaṇe arjane ।
āḍhyāś cintāparā eva na tu mūḍhā vidanti tām ।। 

nanv arthā vitatānarthās sampadas santatāpadaḥ ।
bhogā bhavamahārogā viparītena bhāvitāḥ ।। 

tāvan nāyāti vaivaśyaṃ cintāviṣavijṛmbhaṇaiḥ ।
yāvad arthamahānartho na kadarthārtham arthyate ।। 

anuttamasukhaṃ yasmai cirāya parirocate ।
jarattṛṇaśikhādṛṣṭyā so arthaṃ paśyatu śāmyatu ।। 

bhūribhāvavikārāṇāṃ jarāmaraṇakarmaṇām ।
dainyadaurātmyadāhānām arthas sārthapatis smṛtaḥ ।। 

asmiñ jagati jantūnāṃ jarāmaraṇaśālinām ।
ajarāmaratāṃ kartuṃ santoṣo asti rasāyanam ।। 

vasanto nandanodyānam indur apsarasas smaraḥ ।
ity ekatas samuditaṃ santoṣāmṛtam ekataḥ ।। 

sarasaḥ prāvṛṣevāntas santoṣeṇaiti pūrṇatām ।
gambhīrāṃ śītalāṃ hṛdyāṃ prasannāṃ rasaśālinīm ।। 

sādhur ojasvitām etya santoṣeṇa virājate ।
supuṣpitavarākāro vasanteneva pādapaḥ ।। 

pādapātaparāmarśapiṣṭakīṭavad īhate ।
dīnaprakṛtir arthārthī duḥkhād duḥkhāntaraṃ vrajan ।। 

kallolavikalāḥ kṣubdhasamudrapatitā iva ।
nāpnuvanti sthitiṃ svasthāṃ vikṛtākṛtayo arthinaḥ ।। 

sampadaḥ pramadāś caiva taraṅgotsaṅgabhaṅgurāḥ ।
kas tāsv ahiphaṇacchattracchāyāsu ramate budhaḥ ।। 

arthopārjanarakṣāṇāṃ jānann api kadarthanām ।
yaḥ karoti spṛhāṃ mūḍho nṛpaśus taṃ na saṃspṛśet ।। 

manaso bāhyam ārambham āntaraṃ ca lunāti yaḥ ।
samaṃ vaitṛṣṇyadātreṇa tasya kṣetraṃ prakāśate ।। 

jagattvam ajñasambuddhaṃ jño vidann asad eva yat ।
satīva tatra sphurati tad anabhyāsajṛmbhitam ।। 

saṃsāranirvedavaśād upetya satsaṅgamaṃ śāstram upetya tena ।
śāstrārthabhāvena nirasya bhogān vaitṛṣṇyadārḍhyāt paramārtham eti ।। 

mumukṣūpaśamopakramo nāma sargaḥ

pañcottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rūḍhe saṃsāranirvede sthite sādhusamāgame ।
śāstrārthe bhāvite buddhyā bhogavaitṛṣṇya āgate ।। 

jāte viṣayavairasye sajjanatve tathodite ।
prakāśe sammukhībhūte hṛdaye kalitodaye ।। 

dhanāni nābhivāñchyante tamāṃsīva vivekinā ।
tyajyante vidyamānāni saṃśuṣkāmedhyaparṇavat ।। 

nīrāgapānthadṛṣṭyaiva dṛśyante dārabandhavaḥ ।
yathāśakti yathākālam upacaryanta eva ca ।। 

indriyeṣv api saṃlagnā indriyārthāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
na bhogā anubhūyante nūnaṃ śāntamanastayā ।। 

ekānteṣu diganteṣu sarassu vipineṣu ca ।
uṣyante puṇyadeśeṣu nijeṣv eva gṛheṣu vā ।। 

suhṛtkelivilāseṣu sabhodyānāśanādiṣu ।
śāstratarkavivādeṣu na tathāsthīyate sthiram ।। 

upaśāntena dāntena svātmārāmeṇa mauninā ।
jñataivānviṣyate jñena vijñānaikāntavādinā ।। 

evam abhyāsavaśataḥ pare viśramyate pade ।
nimne ambhaseva śāntena svayam eva vivekinā ।। 

sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śāntā jñataivārthatayoditā ।
na sambhavati bhinno artha ity eva paramaṃ padam ।। 

nārthopalabdhir no śūnyam asti bodhātmatāṃ vinā ।
ity antaranubhūtistham āhus tat paramaṃ padam ।। 

abodhabodhabodhena dvaitaikyopaśame sati ।
nirvāṇam āsitaṃ śāntam āhus svaṃ paramaṃ padam ।। 

svasaṃvinmātraviśrāmavatām amanasāṃ satām ।
na svadante hi viṣayāḥ payāṃsi dṛṣadām iva ।। 

nirodhapadam āpanno nirmanā maunamantharaḥ ।
svabhāve sthita evāste citre kṛta ivātmavān ।। 

sarvārtham artharahitaṃ mahad eva parāṇuvat ।
aśūnyam eva śūnyātma hṛdayaṃ vedyavedinaḥ ।। 

ahantvaṃjagadīhādi dikkālakalanādi ca ।
jñasya jñānādi śūnyādi sthitam eva na vidyate ।। 

jñenāmalapadasthena dīpeneva na cetyate ।
tamo hārdaṃ yathā bāhyaṃ rāgadveṣabhayādivat ।। 

rajorahitasarvāśaṃ sattvāt param upāgatam ।
asambhavattamorūpaṃ praṇamet tajjñabhāskaram ।। 

bhedapravilaye jāte citte cādṛśyatāṃ gate ।
yā sthitiḥ prāptabodhasya na vāggocaram eti sā ।। 

dadāty etanmayabuddher nirvāṇaṃ parameśvaraḥ ।
aharniśaṃ paramayā ciraṃ bhaktyā prasāditaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

īśvaraḥ ko muniśreṣṭha kathaṃ bhaktyā prasādyate ।
etan me tattvato brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

īśvaro na mahābuddhe dūre na ca sudurlabhaḥ ।
mahābodhamayaikātmā svātmaiva parameśvaraḥ ।। 

tasmin sarvaṃ tatas sarvaṃ sa sarvaṃ sarvataś ca saḥ ।
so antas sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ ।। 

tasmād imāḥ pratīyante sargapralayavikriyāḥ ।
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇato gatayaḥ pavanād iva ।। 

aniśaṃ pūjayanty enaṃ sarvās sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ ।
yathābhimatadānena sarvato bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

subahūny eṣa janmāni yathābhimatayecchayā ।
yadā sampūjitas tena prasādam adhigacchati ।। 

prasannas san mahādevas svayam ātmā maheśvaraḥ ।
bodhāya prerayaty āśu dūtaṃ pūtaṃ śubhehitaiḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ātmanā parameśena ko dūtaḥ preryate mune ।
sa dūto bodhanaṃ cāpi karoti vada me katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ātmasamprerito dūto viveko nāma nāmataḥ ।
hṛdguhāyāṃ sa varadas tiṣṭhatīndur ivāmbare ।। 

sa eṣa vāsanātmānaṃ jantuṃ bodhayati kramāt ।
saṃsārasāgarāt tasmāt tārayaty avivekinam ।। 

bodhātmaiṣo antarātmaiva paramaḥ parameśvaraḥ ।
asyaiva vācako rāma praṇavo vedasammataḥ ।। 

japahomatapodānapāṭhayajñakriyākramaiḥ ।
eṣa prasādyate nityaṃ naranāgasurāsuraiḥ ।। 

dyaur mūrdhā pṛthivī pādau tārakā romarājayaḥ ।
bhūtāny asthīni hṛdayaṃ vyomāsya parameṣṭhinaḥ ।। 

sarvatraiṣa cidātmatvād vāti jighrati paśyati ।
tenaiṣa sarvatolakṣyakarakarṇākṣipādabhṛt ।। 

vivekadūtam udbodhya hatvā cittapiśācakam ।
ātmanā padavīṃ sphārāṃ jīvaḥ kām api nīyate ।। 

tyaktvā sarvavikalpaughān vidhūyānarthasaṅkaṭam ।
pauruṣeṇātmanaivātmā svayam eva prasādyatām ।। 

bhramanmanaḥpiśāce asmin kallolajaladākule ।
saṃsārarātritimire svātmaivāpūrṇacandramāḥ ।। 

abodhamaraṇāvarte kallolākulakoṭare ।
tṛṣṇākallolatarale svamanaścaṇḍamārute ।। 

mahājaḍajavādhāre saṃsāraviṣamārṇave ।
indriyagrāhagahane vivekaḥ potako mahān ।। 

pūrvaṃ yathābhimatapūjanasuprasanno dattvā vivekam iha pāvanadūtam ātmā ।
jīvaṃ padaṃ nayati nirmalam ekam ādyaṃ satsaṅgaśāstraparamārthaparāvabodhaiḥ ।। 

vivekamāhātmyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

paripuṣṭavivekānāṃ vāsanāmalam ujjhatām ।
mahattā mahatām antaḥ kāpy apūrvaiva jāyate ।। 

audāryodāramaryādāṃ matiṃ gāmbhīryasundarīm ।
mahatāṃ nāvagāhante bhuvanāni caturdaśa ।। 

cittabhrāntir jagad iti prarūḍhe pratyaye satām ।
bāhyañ cāntaś carann arthagraho mohaś ca śāmyati ।। 

dvīnduvat tāpajalavat keśoṇḍukavad ambare ।
visphurantyāṃ jagadbhrāntau vāsanāpratyayaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

vāsanāpratyayaśame śūnyaṃ vyomaiva śiṣyate ।
sāpy avasthā mano asac cet tatas tyājyā vivekinā ।। 

trayam etat tu yāvasthā trayeṇānena varjitā ।
paśyantīvāpy apaśyantī sāvasthā paramoditā ।। 

vicitraratnaraśmyogha iva nānātmakaṃ jagat ।
ābhāsamātraṃ nāmbvātma na ghanaṃ na ca pārthivam ।। 

rūpālokamanomātraṃ śūnyam eva jagat sthitam ।
khe vicitramaṇivyūhakarajālam ivotthitam ।। 

neha satyāni bhūtāni na jagattā na śūnyatā ।
idaṃ brahmākhyaratneśaprabhājālavijṛmbhitam ।। 

sṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭayo brāhmyo nānātāmananātmakāḥ ।
amūrtā eva bhāsante kalpāntārkagaṇāghanāḥ ।। 

evaṃ tāvad ghanībhūtaḥ piṇḍagrāho na vidyate ।
saṅkalpite arthe vyomnīva śūnyataivāvagamyate ।। 

asyām avastubhūtāyāṃ kathaṃ bhāvanibandhanam ।
bhaviṣyadākāśatarau viśrāntaḥ ko vihaṅgamaḥ ।। 

piṇḍatvaṃ nāsti bhūtānāṃ śūnyatā na ca vidyate ।
cittam apy ata evāstaṃ śeṣaṃ sat tatra vas sthitiḥ ।। 

anānā samam evāste nānārūpo vibodhavān ।
antarālīnanānārtho yathā kanakapiṇḍakaḥ ।। 

yathāsthitasya sāhantvaṃ viśvaṃ citraṃ vilīyate ।
jñasyāvācyam acittaṃ satsvarūpam avaśiṣyate ।। 

kliṣyate kevalaṃ buddhir uttarādharadarśanaiḥ ।
stokayābhyastayā buddhyā satyo artho hy avagamyate ।। 

virāḍojo virahitaṃ kāryakāraṇatādibhiḥ ।
bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthaṃ jagad aṅga hy asambhavam ।। 

yena bodhātmanā buddhaṃ sa jña ity abhidhīyate ।
advaitasyopaśāntasya tasya viśvaṃ na vidyate ।। 

pūrvoktās sarva evaite upadeśaviśeṣaṇāḥ ।
jñasyānubhavam āyānti satas sādhukathā iva ।। 

piṇḍatvaṃ nāsti bhūtānāṃ śūnyatvaṃ cāpy asambhavam ।
ata eva mano nāsti śeṣaṃ sat tatra vas sthitiḥ ।। 

cetyonmukhatvam evāntaś cetanasyāsya cetanam ।
uditaṃ tad anarthāya śreyase anuditaṃ bhavet ।। 

tasyānudayasaṃvitter bhava nityaṃ samāhitaḥ ।
saspando vā gataspandaś śaṅkām utsṛjya tāṃ bhave ।। 

uditaṃ bāhyatām etya tatra gacchati piṇḍatām ।
svayaṃ saṃvedanād eva jāḍyād ambv iva śailatām ।। 

svapnādyarthavad ādatte bodho abodhena piṇḍatām ।
tadgrāhakatayā cittaṃ bhūtvā badhnāti dehakam ।। 

etāvatīṣv avasthāsu bodhasyodeti nānyatā ।
śabdakalpanayā bhedaḥ kevalaṃ parikalpitaḥ ।। 

bahir antaś ca bodhasya bhāty ātmaivārthadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
kuto anyā cetyatā tasya syād yady unmukhatātmanaḥ ।। 

bahir antaś ca bodhasya bhāty ātmaivārthadṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
antastvena bahiṣṭvena caivāsya manaso yathā ।। 

bodhasyākāśakalpatvāt kālākāśādi tadvapuḥ ।
padārthāś caiva khātmānas svapnavan nārtharūpi kham ।। 

bāhyārthatāṃ cāntaratvaṃ bodho abodhavaśād vrajet ।
nāsad dṛśyaṃ hi bodhatvaṃ gantuṃ śaktaṃ jaḍaṃ kvacit ।। 

bodho dṛśyadaśāṃ naiti prāpto vāpi ca tāṃ sthitim ।
sad yathāsthitam evāste manāg apy eti nānyatām ।। 

atyarthaṃ śuddhabodhaikapariṇāme kṛtodaye ।
bodhābodhārthaśabdānāṃ smṛtir apy astam eṣyati ।। 

ātivāhikadehānāṃ cittānām eva jāyate ।
ādhibhautikatābodho dṛḍhabhāvanayā svayam ।। 

ākāśaviśadaiś cittair bhāvitaiṣātivāhikaiḥ ।
ādhibhautikatā mithyā naṭair iva piśācatā ।। 

bhrāntir abhramaṇābhyāsāt prajñātaiṣopaśāmyati ।
nonmatto asmīti sambodhāc chāmyaty unmattatā kila ।। 

bhrāntes svayaṃ parijñānād vāsanā vinivartate ।
svapne svapnatayā buddhe kasya syāt kila bhāvanā ।। 

vāsanātānavenaiva saṃsāra upaśāmyati ।
vāsanaiva mahān granthir etacchedaparā budhāḥ ।। 

ajñānonmattatā puṃsā yathābhyāsena bhāvitā ।
tathaiva bodhasvabhyāsāt sā kālenopaśāmyati ।। 

ātivāhikadeho ayam ādhibhautikatāṃ yathā ।
nīyate bhāvanāt tajjñair bodhasattāṃ prasādataḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadeho api nītvā jīvapadaṃ tathā ।
dṛḍhena bodhābhyāsena netavyo brahmatām api ।। 

svayambhuvaś ced utpattir budhyate bodharūpiṇī ।
tadātivāhikā buddhiḥ katham ity api budhyate ।। 

no cet tat prati vākyārthaṃ na granthir vinivartate ।
bhūtotsādanasūtrasya prati mantrapadaṃ yathā ।। 

jagadbodhaikatā buddhyā boddhavyā tāvad avraṇam ।
atyantapariṇāmena yāvat sāpi na budhyate ।। 

sabāhyābhyantare citte śānte bhāti svabhāvatā ।
śītalāṃ vyomanirbhāsāṃ tām evāśritya śāmyatām ।। 

jñānavāñ jñānayajñastho dhyānayūpaṃ viropayan ।
jagad vijitya yajati sarvatyāgaikadakṣiṇaḥ ।। 

pataty aṅgāravarṣe vā vāti vā pralayānile ।
bhūtale vrajati vyomni samam āste jña ātmani ।। 

vaitṛṣṇyaśāntamanaso nirodham alam īyuṣaḥ ।
sthitir vajrasamādhānaṃ vinānyā nopapadyate ।। 

yathā bāhyārthavaitṛṣṇyenopaśāmyaty alaṃ manaḥ ।
na tathā śāstrasandarbhair nopadeśatapodamaiḥ ।। 

manastṛṇasya sarvārthavaitṛṣṇyāgnir vibodhyatām ।
sarvatyāgānilais sampad atyāpad iti bhāvanāt ।। 

bahir antaś ca mohaś ca piṇḍagrāho arthavedanam ।
jñaptir eveti kacati jñatvān maṇir ivātmani ।। 

naranāgasurāgāragirigahvaradṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
citir evātivisṛtā dhūmo ambudatayeva khe ।। 

copanti vidravatvena brahmāṇḍajaḍabhāṇḍagāḥ ।
svavivartataraṅgiṇyo jīvaśaktyā patadrasāḥ ।। 

jīvakā jīrṇaśapharā vyomavārivihāriṇaḥ ।
mohajālena valitā na smaranty ātmani sthitim ।। 

ghanībhūtā ghanatvena cidghanā gaganāṅgane ।
nānāpadārtharūpeṇa sphuranti svātmanātmani ।। 

sarva evam amī jīvā vāsanāvātareṇavaḥ ।
śuṣkaparṇavad udgrīvā jaḍāś śvasanaveṇavaḥ ।। 

āhṛtya pauruṣabalāny avajitya tandrīm utthāya tarjitasamarjitavāsanaugham ।
saṃsārapāśaghanapañjaram añjasaiva bhaṅktvābhyudeyam iti nājñasamena bhāvyam ।। 

sarvopaśāntir nāma sargaḥ

saptottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ime ye jīvasaṅghātā dṛśyante daśadiggatāḥ ।
naranāgasurāgendragandharvādyabhidhānakāḥ ।। 

te svapnajāgarāḥ kecit kecit saṅkalpajāgarāḥ ।
kecit kevalajāgratsthās cirajāgratsthitāḥ pare ।। 

ghanajāgratsthitāś cānye jāgratsvapnās tathetare ।
kṣīṇajāgarakāḥ kecij jīvās saptavidhās smṛtāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

eteṣāṃ bhagavan bhedo bodhāya mama kathyatām ।
jīvānāṃ saptarūpāṇāṃ jalānām arṇaveṣv iva ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe kasmiṃścij jagati kvacit ।
kecit suptās sthitā dehair jīvā jīvitadharmiṇaḥ ।। 

ye svapnam abhipaśyanti teṣāṃ svapnam idaṃ jagat ।
viddhi te hi khalūcyante jīvakās svapnajāgarāḥ ।। 

kvacid eva prasuptānāṃ yas svapnas svayam utthitaḥ ।
viṣaye so ayam asmākaṃ teṣāṃ svapnanarā vayam ।। 

teṣāṃ ciratayā svapnas sa jāgrattvam upāgataḥ ।
svapnajāgarakās te tu jīvā ye tadgatās sthitāḥ ।। 

sarvajñatvāt sarvagasya sarvaṃ sarvatra vidyate ।
tena svapnavatāṃ teṣāṃ vayaṃ svapnanarās sthitāḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

yeṣu kalpeṣu te jātāḥ kṣīyante kalpakalpanāḥ ।
yadi tās tat kathaṃ teṣāṃ prabuddhānām avasthitiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iha svapnabhramāt te tu mucyante vā vinidratām ।
prāpya saṅkalpya te dehāṃs tathaivānyāñ śrayanty alam ।। 

tathaivānyaṃ ca paśyanti jagatkalpaṃ prakalpitam ।
kalpanābhāsanabhaso na hi saṅkaṭatā bhavet ।। 

svakalpanātmakajagajjīrṇodumbarakīṭakāḥ ।
svapnajāgarakāḥ proktāś śṛṇu saṅkalpajāgarān ।। 

kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe kasmiṃścij jagati kvacit ।
anidrālava evāntas saṅkalpaikaparās sthitāḥ ।। 

dhyānād viluṭhitā vātha manorājyavaśānugāḥ ।
saṅkalpadārḍhyam āpannā galitāgrānubhūtayaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpa eva jāgrattvaṃ yeṣāṃ ciratayā gataḥ ।
tatrāstamitaceṣṭānāṃ te hi saṅkalpajāgarāḥ ।। 

kalpanopaśame bhūyas tam anyaṃ vā śrayanti te ।
dehaṃ teṣāṃ vayam ime saṅkalpapuruṣās sthitāḥ ।। 

saṅkalpajāgarāḥ proktā ete saṅkalpaśāyinaḥ ।
jīvā jīvitahevākāś śṛṇu kevalajāgarān ।। 

prāthamyenāvatīrṇās te brahmaṇo bṛṃhitātmanaḥ ।
proktāḥ kevalajāgaryāḥ prāgutpattyavikāsinaḥ ।। 

bhūyojanmāntaragatās ta eva cirajāgarāḥ ।
kathyante prauḍhim āyātāḥ kāryakāraṇacāriṇaḥ ।। 

ta eva duṣkṛtāveśāj jaḍās sthāvaratāṃ gatāḥ ।
ghanajāgratayaḥ proktā jāgratsu ghanatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

ye tu śāstrārthasatsaṅgabodhitā bodham āgatāḥ ।
paśyanti svapnavaj jāgraj jāgratsvapnā bhavanti te ।। 

ye tu samprāptasambodhā viśrāntāḥ parame pade ।
kṣīṇajāgratprabhṛtayas te turyāṃ bhūmikām itāḥ ।। 

iti saptavidho bhedo jīvānāṃ kathitas tava ।
samudrāṇām iva mayā buddhvā śreyaḥparo bhava ।। 

bhrāntiṃ parityaja jagadgaṇanātmikāṃ tvaṃ bodhaikarūpaghanatām alam āgato asi ।
śūnyatvavarjitam aśūnyatayā ca muktam etad dvayaikyakavimuktavapus tvam ādyam ।। 

jīvasaptakavicāro nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kathaṃ kevalajāgrattvam akāraṇam akarmakam ।
parād vikasati brahman gaganād iva pādapaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

akāraṇaṃ mahābuddhe na kāryam upalabhyate ।
taj jāgrataḥ kevalasya na kaścid iha sambhavaḥ ।। 

tasyāto asambhavād anye jīvabhedās sajīvakāḥ ।
sarve na sambhavanty eva kāraṇābhāvavikṣatāḥ ।। 

neha prajāyate kiñcin neha kiñcana naśyati ।
upadeśyopadeśārthaṃ śabdārthakalanodayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kaḥ karoti śarīrāṇi manobuddhyādicetanaiḥ ।
ko mohayati bhūtāni sneharāgādibandhanaiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

na kaścid eva kurute śarīrāṇi kadācana ।
na mohayati bhūtāni kaścid eva kadācana ।। 

anādyantāvabhāsātmā bodha ātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।
nānāpadārtharūpeṇa kam ūrmyāditayā yathā ।। 

bāhyaṃ na vidyate kiñcid bodhas sphurati bāhyavat ।
udeti bodho hṛdayād bījād iva varadrumaḥ ।। 

bodhasyāntar idaṃ viśvaṃ sthitam eva raghūdvaha ।
stambhasyāntar yathā sālabhañjikā prakaṭīkṛtā ।। 

sabāhyābhyantarātmaikam anantaṃ deśakālataḥ ।
bodhāmodaprasaraṇaṃ jagad ity avabudhyatām ।। 

ayam eva paro loko bhāvyatāṃ vāsanākṣayaḥ ।
śāmyatāṃ paralokāsthaṃ kāḥ kilāyānti vāsanāḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyālokarūpacittātmasampadām ।
deśakālādiśabdārtharahitaṃ na ca śūnyakam ।। 

pade padavidām eva tasmiñ śūnye gatir bhavet ।
draṣṭṝṇāṃ śāntadṛśyānām evānyeṣāṃ na rāghava ।। 

ye vai taralagambhīram ahantāgartam āśritāḥ ।
paśyanti te tam ālokaṃ na kadācana kecana ।। 

caturdaśavidhānantabhūtajātasaghuṅghumā ।
jagaddṛṣṭir iyaṃ jñasya śarīrāvayavopamā ।। 

kāraṇābhāvatas sṛṣṭir noditā na ca śāmyati ।
yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ vā syāt tādṛg bhavati kāryakam ।। 

yādṛk syāt kāraṇe kāryaṃ sthitaṃ kāraṇatāsya kā ।
kāryam evopalambhāntar asad dvayam avedanāt ।। 

somyasyāntar yathaivābdher ūrmyāvartādayas sthitāḥ ।
brahmaṇy asambhavatkṣobhe jagaccittādayas tathā ।। 

sarvātmaivāmalaṃ brahma piṇḍa eka iva sthitam ।
nānābhāṇḍātma hemaiva yathāntassthitarūpakam ।। 

svapnakāle svapna eva jāgrad vyagrāparigrahāt ।
jāgratkāle jāgrad eva svapno asatyāvabodhataḥ ।। 

cittamātratayā buddhaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat sthitam ।
jāgrat svapnatvam āyāti vicāravikalīkṛtam ।। 

samyagjñānena bhūtāni jñasya dehatayā saha ।
pīṭhabandhaṃ vimuñcanti gatakālā ivāmbudāḥ ।। 

yathā galitum ārabdho ghano gaganatām iyāt ।
tathā satyāvabodhena śāmyet sātmagrahaṃ jagat ।। 

śaradabhravad ālūnā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat tathā ।
puras sandṛśyamānaiva bodhād galati dṛśyatā ।। 

yathā dīptānale līnaṃ suvarṇaṃ ghṛtam indhanam ।
ekatāṃ yāti vijñāne tathā bhuvanacittadṛk ।। 

bodhena tanutām eti piṇḍabandho jagattraye ।
piśācabuddhis sadane bodhitasya yathā śiśoḥ ।। 

bodhasyānantarūpasya svayam evātmanātmani ।
jagaccittāditā bhāti piṇḍabandhaḥ kilātra kaḥ ।। 

bodhabodhanam evedaṃ jagac cittam ivoditam ।
tad evāstaṅgataṃ bodhāt piṇḍabandhasya kāstitā ।। 

jahāti piṇḍakāṭhinyaṃ jagat svapnāvabodhataḥ ।
parāṃ pelavatām eti hema drutam ivāgninā ।। 

yathāsthito bodha eva ghanatām eṣa gacchati ।
vinaiva deśakālābhyāṃ tau vinirmāya hemavat ।। 

jāgraty evaṃ vicāreṇa svapnābhe pelave sthite ।
kṣīyamāṇe śaratkāle ivaiti tanutāṃ rasaḥ ।। 

parāṃ pelavatāṃ yātā dṛśyalakṣmyas sthitā api ।
svapnā iva parijñātā na svadante vivekinaḥ ।। 

kva kila svāntaviśrāntiḥ kvaitad viṣayavedanam ।
suṣuptajāgrator aikyaṃ kva cchāyātapayoḥ kva vā ।। 

draṣṭṛdṛśyadaśā bhrāntir abhrāntis svātmaniṣṭhatā ।
kathaṃ sadasator aikyaṃ bhrāntābhrāntātmanor bhavet ।। 

cittamātre bhrāntimātre svapnamātrātmani sthite ।
jagatīha padārthebhyas satyabuddhir nivartate ।। 

kasya svadante asatyāni katham apy amahāmateḥ ।
mṛgatṛṣṇājalānīva dṛśyāny api purassthiteḥ ।। 

satyabuddhau vilīnāyāṃ jagat paśyati śāntadhīḥ ।
jaladīpāṃśujālābham apiṇḍātmāmbarātmakam ।। 

jagato avastunaś śūnyāt parijñānān nivartate ।
cittabhramātmano bhrāntirūpā svadanabhāvanā ।। 

yad avastv iti vijñātaṃ tatropādeyatā kutaḥ ।
kena svapnaṃ parijñāya svapnahemābhigamyate ।। 

svapnād iva parijñātād raso dṛśyān nivartate ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyadaśādoṣagranthicchedaḥ pravartate ।। 

nīrasaś śāntamanano nirvāṇāhaṅkṛtiḥ kṛtī ।
vītarāgo nirāyāsaś śāntas tiṣṭhati buddhadhīḥ ।। 

rase nīrasatāṃ yāte vāsanā pravilīyate ।
śikhāyāṃ pravilīnāyāṃ pradīpasyāṃśavo yathā ।। 

bodhād dīpāṃśujālābham aghanaṃ vyoma dṛśyate ।
bhrāntirūpaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā ।। 

naivātmānaṃ na cākāśaṃ na śūnyaṃ na ca vedanam ।
atyantapariṇāmena paśyan paśyati tat padam ।। 

yatra nātmā na śūnyaṃ ca na jagat kalanā na ca ।
na cittadṛśyodayadhīs sarvaṃ cāsti yathāsthitam ।। 

bhūmyāditājñasambuddhā jñānād astam upāgatā ।
jñasya śūnyaiva sampannā saṃsthitāpi na vidyate ।। 

bhavaty ekasamādhānas somyātmā vyomanirmalaḥ ।
tiṣṭhaty apagatāsaṅgas sthita evāpy asatsamaḥ ।। 

astaṅgatamanā maunī nirodhapadavīṃ gataḥ ।
tīrṇas saṃsārajaladheḥ karmaṇām antam āgataḥ ।। 

tanubhuvanagaganagirigaṇakaraṇaparaṃ paramam ajñānam ।
vigalati galite tasmin sakalam idaṃ vidyamānam api ।। 

śāntatarāntaḥkaraṇo galitavikalpas svarūpasāramayaḥ ।
paramaśamāmṛtatṛptas tiṣṭhati vidvān nirāvaraṇaḥ ।। 

viśrāntiyogopadeśo nāma sargaḥ

navottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bodho jagad ivābhāti mune yena krameṇa he ।
taṃ krameṇa kramaṃ brūhi bhūyo abodhanivṛttaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

dakṣasyeva vimūḍhasya yad dṛṣṭau tat svacetasi ।
yan na dṛṣṭaṃ na tac citte bhavaty alpatarasmṛteḥ ।। 

bhavyaḥ paśyati śāstrārtham eva pūrvāparānvitam ।
na dṛṣṭiviṣayaṃ vastu yat paśyati karoti tat ।। 

bhavyānuṣṭhānaniṣṭhas sañ śāstrārthaikamanā muniḥ ।
bhūtvopadeśaṃ tvam imaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam ।। 

iyaṃ dṛśyabharabhrāntir nanv avidyeti yocyate ।
vastuto vidyate naiṣā tāpanadyāṃ yathā payaḥ ।। 

upadeśyopadeśārtham enāṃ maduparodhataḥ ।
satyām iva kṣaṇaṃ tāvad āśritya śrūyatām idam ।। 

kuta eṣā kathaṃ ceti vikalpān anudāharan ।
nedam eṣā na cāstīti svayaṃ jñāsyasi bodhataḥ ।। 

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sarvaṃ sarvavikārāḍhyaṃ kalpānte tad vinaśyati ।। 

asya bhāgavibhāgātmā nāśo avaśyam avāritaḥ ।
bindunā bindunāmbhodher uddhṛtasyāsti hi kṣayaḥ ।। 

evaṃ sthite dravyanāśe brahmaṇas tanmayatvataḥ ।
nānantatvaṃ na cāstitvaṃ na caitat sambhavaty alam ।। 

madaśaktir iva jñānam iti nāsmāsu sidhyati ।
dehāvajñānato asmākaṃ svapnavat tan na tattvataḥ ।। 

naśyaty eti ca dṛśyaśrīs saivānyaiva navaiva vā ।
itthaṃ bhavet samucitaṃ kṛtaṃ śāstraṃ na cānyathā ।। 

saivaitīty asamullekhaṃ kathaṃ naṣṭasya sambhavaḥ ।
tadrūpānyeti yuktaṃ syād anubhūtārthagā vayam ।। 

saiva vyomatayaivāsīd ity asat saiva sā katham ।
tathaiva vyomasaṃsthā cen nāśaṃ tarhi na sā gatā ।। 

kāryakāraṇayor ekarūpataivaṃ yadā tadā ।
kāryakāraṇatābhāvād aikyam evāsmadāgamaḥ ।। 

śūnyaṃ tv anupalambhatvaṃ yad gataṃ naṣṭam eva tat ।
anyas tarhi bhaven nāśaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kila kathyatām ।। 

naṣṭaṃ bhūyas tad utpannam iti tat pratyayo atra kaḥ ।
naśyaty avaśyaṃ tenedaṃ punar anyat pravartate ।। 

madhyamadhyodyadutsedhaphalādyavayavaikikā ।
ādāhaṃ bījasattāsti kāryakāraṇatā kutaḥ ।। 

deśakālakriyātmaikaṃ yathādṛṣṭam iha sthitam ।
bījam evaikakam ato na ghaṭaḥ paṭakāryakṛt ।। 

sarvadarśanaviśrānte nāmni bhedo na vastuni ।
paramārthamaye tena vivādena kim atra naḥ ।। 

idaṃ śāntam anādyantaṃ tadrūpatvād vicārataḥ ।
vyomābhaṃ bodhatāmātram anubhūtipramāṇataḥ ।। 

yathaitan nānubhūtaṃ sad yathaitan nānubhūyate ।
yathaitat siddhim āpnoti tad idaṃ kathyate kramāt ।। 

mahākalpānta unnaṣṭe sarvasmin dṛśyamaṇḍale ।
āmahādevaparyantaṃ samanobuddhikarmaṇi ।। 

vyomany api śamaṃ yāte kāle apy akalitasthitau ।
vāyāv api kvāpi gate tejasy atyantam asthite ।। 

tamasy upagate dhvaṃsaṃ vāryādau suciraṃ kṣate ।
alam antam anuprāpte sarvaśabdārthasañcaye ।। 

śiṣyate śāntabodhātma sad acchaṃ bodhyavarjitam ।
anādinidhanaṃ bodhyaṃ kim apy amalam avyayam ।। 

avācyam anabhivyaktam atīndriyam anāmakam ।
sarvabhūtātmakaṃ śūnyaṃ sad asac ca paraṃ padam ।। 

tan na vāyur na cākāśaṃ na buddhyādi na śūnyakam ।
na kiñcid atha sarvātma kim apy anyat paraṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

tadvidā tatpadasthena tan muktenānubhūyate ।
anyaiḥ kevalam āmnātair āgamair eva varṇyate ।। 

na kālo na tamo nātmā na san nāsan na deśadik ।
na madhyam etayor nānto na bodho nāpy abodhitam ।। 

kim apy etad atyacchaṃ ca budhyate bodhapāragaiḥ ।
śāntasaṃsāravisaraiḥ parāṃ bhūmim upāgataiḥ ।। 

pratiṣiddhā mayaite tu ye arthās sarve atra te sthitāḥ ।
asmadbuddhyāparicchedyās somyāmbodher ivormayaḥ ।। 

yathāsthitaṃ sthitās sarve bhāvās tatra tathā yathā ।
anutkīrṇā mahāstambhe vividhās sālabhañjikāḥ ।। 

evaṃ tatra sthitās sarve bhāvās tatra na ca sthitāḥ ।
asarvātmaiva sarvātma tad etad atad eva ca ।। 

padaṃ yathaitat sarvātma sarvārthaparivarjitam ।
yathāvat tat prapaśyanti tatraikapariṇāminaḥ ।। 

sarvārthāstamaye jāte sarvārtharahitaṃ padam ।
sarvārthaparipūrṇaṃ ca tad ādyaṃ paridṛśyate ।। 

tava tāvan mahābuddhe sarvārthopaśamātmakam ।
na samyagjñānam utpannaṃ saṃśayo atra nidarśanam ।। 

yaḥ prabuddho nirābhāsaṃ param ābhāsam āgataḥ ।
svasthāntaḥkaraṇaś śāntas taṃ svabhāvaṃ sa paśyati ।।
