ayaṃ tvam aham ityādis trikālagajagadbhramaḥ ।
tatrāsti hemapiṇḍe antar iva rūpakajālakam ।। 

hemapiṇḍād yathā bhāṇḍajālaṃ nānupalabhyate ।
tathā na labhyate bhinnaṃ paramārthaghanāj jagat ।। 

sarvadaivāpi bhinnātmā svāṅgabhūtopalambhadṛk ।
sajagac cājagac caitad dhemevāṅgadarūpakam ।। 

riktaṃ deśādiśabdārthair deśakālakriyātmakam ।
yathāsthitam idaṃ tatra sarvam asti na cāsti ca ।। 

yathormyādi same toye citraṃ citrakṛdīhite ।
bhāṇḍavṛndam ayaḥpiṇḍe tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

yathaitad atra no bhinnaṃ nābhinnaṃ nāsti cāsti ca ।
nityaṃ tanmayam evācchaṃ śānte śāntam idaṃ tathā ।। 

anikhātaiva bhātīyaṃ trijagatsālabhañjikā ।
surasasyaiva dṛśyatvam itā brahmaṇi dāruṇi ।। 

nikhātā dṛśyatāṃ yānti stambhasthās sālabhañjikāḥ ।
akhātā eva bhānty atra trijagatsālabhañjikāḥ ।। 

asminn akṣobhya evāntas taraṅgās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।
sarasy atirase bhānti cidghanāmṛtavṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

avibhāge vibhāgasthā akṣobhe kṣubhitā iva ।
avibhātā vibhāntīva cidghane sṛṣṭivṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

paramāṇau paramāṇāv atra saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।
vibhāti bhāsurārambhair api bhāti na kiñcana ।। 

ākāśakālapavanādipadārthajātam apy aṅgam aṅgarahitasya tad apy anaṅgam ।
sarvātmakaṃ sakalabhāvavikāraśūnyam apy etad āhur ajaraṃ paramātmatattvam ।। 

brahmasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

daśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yathācetye cetanatā yathākāle ca kālatā ।
yathā ca vyomatāvyomny ajaḍe ca jaḍatā yathā ।। 

yathāvāyau ca vāyutvam abhūtādau ca bhūtatā ।
yathāspandātmani spando yathāmūrte ca mūrtatā ।। 

yathābhinne ca bhinnatvaṃ yathānante ca sāntatā ।
yathādṛśye ca dṛśyatvaṃ yathāsargeṣu sargatā ।। 

etat krameṇa he brahman vada me vadatāṃ vara ।
āditaḥ paripāṭyaiva bodhyante hy alpabodhinaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tad anantaṃ mahākāśaṃ mahācidghanam ucyate ।
avedyavidrasamayaṃ śāntam ekaṃ samasthiti ।। 

brahmaviṣṇvīśvarādyante mahāpralayanāmani ।
śabdārthe rūḍhim āpanne yac chuddham avaśiṣyate ।। 

sargasya kāraṇaṃ tatra na kiñcid upapadyate ।
malam ākārabījādi māyāmohabhramādikam ।। 

kevalaṃ śāntam atyaccham ādyantaparivarjitam ।
tad vidyate yatra kila kham api sthūlam aśmavat ।। 

na ca nāstīti tad vaktuṃ śakyate vidvapur yataḥ ।
na caivāstīti tad vaktuṃ yuktaṃ śāntam alaṃ yataḥ ।। 

nimeṣayojanaśataṃ prāptāyām ātmasaṃvidi ।
madhye tasyāṃ tu yad rūpaṃ rūpaṃ tasya padasya tat ।। 

tasmin pade jagadrūpaṃ yad idaṃ dṛśyate sphurat ।
sakāraṇam ivākārakarālam iva bhedavat ।। 

tat sarvaṃ kāraṇābhāvān na jātaṃ na ca vidyate ।
nākārayuktaṃ na jagan na ca dvaitaikyasaṃyutam ।। 

yad akāraṇakaṃ tasya sattā nehopapadyate ।
svayaṃ nityānubhūte arthe ko atrāpahnavaśaktimān ।। 

na ca śāntam anādyantaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet ।
brahmāmūrtaṃ sumūrtasya dṛśyasyābrahmarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

tasmāt tatra jagadrūpaṃ yad ābhānaṃ tad eva tat ।
svayam eva tad ābhāti cidākāśaṃ citi sthitam ।। 

jagac cid brahma bhāvāś ca tathābhāvo bhramādi ca ।
sarvam ekam ajaṃ śāntam advaitaikyam anāmayam ।। 

pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ virājate ।
pūrṇam evoditaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ vyavasthitam ।। 

śāntaṃ samaṃ samudayāstamayair vihīnam ākāramuktam ajam ambaram accham eva ।
sarvaṃ sadā sadasad eva tathoditātma nirvāṇam ādyam idam uttamabodharūpam ।। 

nirvāṇavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekādaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jagannāma nabhas svacchaṃ sad brahma nabhasi sthitam ।
nabho nabhasi bhātīdaṃ jagacchabdārtha ity ajam ।। 

tvam ahaṃ jagad ityādiśabdārthair brahma brahmaṇi ।
śāntaṃ samasamābhāsaṃ sthitam asthitam eva sat ।। 

samudragirimeghorvīvisphoṭamayam apy ajam ।
kāṣṭhamaunavad evedaṃ jagad brahmāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

draṣṭādraṣṭaiva dṛśyasyābhāvāt svātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।
kartākartaiva kartavyābhāvataḥ karaṇād ṛte ।। 

na jñatvaṃ na ca kartṛtvaṃ na jaḍatvaṃ na bhoktṛtā ।
na śūnyatā na cārthatvam iha nāpi nañarthatā ।। 

śilājaṭharavat satyaṃ ghanam ekam ajaṃ tatam ।
sarvaṃ śāntam anādyantam ekaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ ।। 

maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ satyam asatyam aśubhaṃ śubham ।
sarvam ekam ajaṃ vyoma vīcijālaṃ jalaṃ yathā ।। 

vidbhāga eva dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ caiva gacchati ।
etac ca kalpanaṃ svapnapurādiṣv anubhūyate ।। 

evam acchaṃ parākāśe svapnapattanavaj jagat ।
bhāti prathamam evedaṃ brahmaivettham atas sthitam ।। 

tad idaṃ tādṛśaṃ viddhi sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca yat ।
deśād deśāntaraprāptau vido madhyam anaṅkitam ।। 

cidvyomnaś śāntaśāntasya madhyam evaivam āsthitam ।
jagattayeva salilam evormyāditayā yathā ।। 

yad udety uditaṃ yac ca yac ca nodeti noditam ।
deśād deśāntaraprāptau vido madhyān na bhedi tat ।। 

ataḥ kilāsya sargasya kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat ।
prayatnenāpi cānviṣṭaṃ na kiñcid upalabhyate ।। 

yad akāraṇakaṃ bhāti tad abhātaṃ bhramātmakam ।
bhramasyāsatyarūpasya satyatā katham ucyate ।। 

kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ kila kiṃ nāma vidyate ।
yad aputrasya satputradarśanaṃ sa bhramo na sat ।। 

yas tv akāraṇako bhāti sa svabhāvo vijṛmbhate ।
sarvarūpeṇa saṅkalpagandharvanagarādivat ।। 

deśād deśāntaraprāptau kṣaṇān madhyaṃ vido vapuḥ ।
svarūpam ajahat tv eva rājate arthavivartavat ।। 

bodha eva kacaty artharūpeṇa sa ca khād aṇuḥ ।
dṛṣṭānto atrānubhūto antas svapnasaṅkalpaparvataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

vidyate vaṭabīje antar yathā bhāvī mahādrumaḥ ।
paramāṇau tathā sargo brahman kasmān na vidyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yatrāsti bījaṃ tatra syāc chākhā vitatarūpiṇī ।
janyate kāraṇais sā ca vitatā sahakāribhiḥ ।। 

samastabhūtapralaye bījam ākāri kiṃ bhavet ।
sahakāry atha kiṃ tasya jāyate yadvaśāj jagat ।। 

yat tu brahma paraṃ śāntaṃ kā tatrākārakalpanā ।
paramāṇutvayogo api nātra kevātra bījatā ।। 

kāraṇasyeti bījasya satyāsatyaikakāriṇaḥ ।
asambhavāj jagatsattā kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kva vā ।। 

jagad āste parasyāṇor antar ity api nocitam ।
sārṣape kaṇake merur āsta ity ajñakalpanā ।। 

sati bīje pravartante kāryakāraṇadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
nirākārasya kiṃ bījaṃ kva janyajanakakramaḥ ।। 

ato yat paramaṃ tattvaṃ tad evedaṃ jagat sthitam ।
neha prajāyate kiñcin na ca kiñcana naśyati ।। 

cidākāśaś cidākāśe hṛdi cittvāj jagadbhramam ।
aśuddhavad ivāśuddhe śuddhaś śuddhe prapaśyati ।। 

svam eva bhāsate tasya rūpaṃ spanda ivānile ।
sargaśabdārthakalanā neha kāścana santi naḥ ।। 

yathā śūnyatvam ākāśe dravatvaṃ ca yathā jale ।
ananyātmamaye śuddhā sargateyaṃ tathātmani ।। 

bhārūpam idam āśāntaṃ jagad brahmaiva nas tatam ।
anādinidhanaṃ satyaṃ nodeti na ca naśyati ।। 

deśād deśāntaraprāptau kṣaṇān madhye vido vapuḥ ।
yat taj jagad itīvedaṃ vyomātmātmany avasthitam ।। 

yathā spando anile toye dravatvaṃ vyomni śūnyatā ।
tathā jagad idaṃ bhātam ananyat tv idam ātmani ।। 

saṃvinnabho nanu jagannabha ity anaṅkam ātmany avasthitam anastamayodayāṅkam ।
tatrāṅgabhūtam akhilaṃ tadananyad eva śūnyaṃ nirastakalano ambaraśāntam āssva ।। 

advaitaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvādaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhāvābhāvagrahotsargasthūlasūkṣmacarācarāḥ ।
ādāv eva hi notpannās sargādau kāraṇaṃ vinā ।। 

na tv amūrto hi ciddhātuḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ kvacit ।
khātmāśaktas samūrtīnāṃ bījam urvīruhām iva ।। 

svabhāvam eva satataṃ bhāvayan bhāvanātmakam ।
ātmany eva hi ciddhātus sargānubhavavat sthitaḥ ।। 

āsvādayan nijaṃ bhāvaṃ ciddhātur gaganātmakaḥ ।
baddhas sargapralāpena kṣīvaḥ kṣubdhatayā yathā ।। 

yadā sarvam anutpannaṃ nāsty evāpi ca dṛśyate ।
tadā brahmaiva viddhīdaṃ samaṃ śāntam asatsamam ।। 

cinnabhaś cinnabhasy eva payasīva payodravaḥ ।
cittvāt kacati yat tena tad eva ca jagat kṛtam ।। 

svapne cid eva jagad ity udeti vimalā yathā ।
kācakacyena kacati tathetthaṃ sādisargakhe ।। 

citkācakacyakacanaṃ yathā svapne jagad bhavet ।
tathaiva jāgradabhidhaṃ tatkhamātram idaṃ sthitam ।। 

ādisarge hi citsvapno jāgrad ity abhiśabdyate ।
adyarātrau cites svapnas svapna ity abhiśabdyate ।। 

pūrvapravṛttā saritāṃ rūḍhādyāpi yathā sthitā ।
taraṅgalekhā sṛṣṭīnāṃ padārtharacanā tathā ।। 

yathā vāri taraṅgaśrīs saritāṃ racanām itā ।
tathā cidvyomni cidbījasattāntas sṛṣṭitām itā ।। 

mṛtasyānantanāśaś cet tan nidrāsukham eva tat ।
bhūyaś ced eti saṃsāras tat sukhaṃ navam eva tat ।। 

kukarmabhyas tu ced bhītis sā sameha paratra ca ।
tasmād ete samasukhe sarveṣāṃ mṛtijanmanī ।। 

maranaṃ jīvitaṃ vāstu sadṛkṣe vāsane tayoḥ ।
iti viśrāntacitto yas so antaśśītala ucyate ।। 

atyantābhāvasaṃvittyā sarvadṛśyasya vedanam ।
udety apāstasaṃvedyaṃ sati cāsati sargake ।। 

yan na cetyaṃ na cidrūpaṃ yac cittair apy acetitam ।
tadbhāvaikyaṃ gatās tajjñāś śāntā vyavahṛtau sthiteḥ ।। 

citkācakācakacyaṃ yaj jagan nāmnā tad ucyate ।
atyacche paramākāśe bandhamokṣadṛśaḥ kutaḥ ।। 

cinnabhasspandamātrātma saṅkalpātmatayā jagat ।
sabhūtamayam evedaṃ na pṛthvyādimayaṃ kvacit ।। 

neha deśo na kālo asti na dravyaṃ na kriyā na kham ।
sad ivākhilam ucchūnaṃ cāpy anucchūnam apy asat ।। 

bhāti kevalam evetthaṃ paramārthaghanaṃ ghanam ।
yan na śūnyaṃ na cāśūnyam atyacchaṃ gaganād api ।। 

sākāram apy anākāram asad evātibhāsuram ।
atiśuddhaikacinmātraṃ sphāraṃ svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

nirvāṇam evam idam ātatam ittham antaś cidvyomna ābilam anābilarūpam eva ।
nāneva na kvacid api prasṛtaṃ na nānā śūnyatvam ambara ivāmbuni vā dravatvam ।। 

paramārthamayatvavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayodaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvatra sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvathā vyomni cinmaye ।
sādhu sambhavati svacchaṃ śūnyatvam kha ivākhile ।। 

yatra vit tatra sargaśrīr avyomni vyomni cāsti vit ।
cinmayatvāt padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāsty avit kvacit ।। 

padārthajātaṃ śailādi yathā svapne purādi vā ।
cid evaikaṃ paraṃ vyoma tathā jāgratpadārthabhūḥ ।। 

pāṣāṇākhyānam atredaṃ śṛṇu śrutirasāyanam ।
pūrvaṃ mayaiva yad dṛṣṭaṃ citraṃ prakṛtam eva vā ।। 

ahaṃ viditavedyatvāt kadācit pūrṇamānasaḥ ।
tyaktum icchur imaṃ lokaṃ vyavahāraghanabhramam ।। 

dhyānaikaniṣṭhatām etya śanair viśrāntaye ciram ।
tyaktājavañjavībhāva ekāntārthī śamaṃ vrajan ।। 

idaṃ cintitavān asmi kasmiṃścid amarālaye ।
saṃsthito vividhāḥ paśyan bhaṅgurā jāgatīr gatīḥ ।। 

virasā khalv iyaṃ lokasthitir āpātasundarī ।
na jātu sukhadā manye kasyacit kenacit kvacit ।। 

udvegaṃ janayanty antas tīvrasaṃvegakhedataḥ ।
imā dṛśyadṛśo draṣṭur iṣṭāniṣṭaphalapradāḥ ।। 

kim idaṃ dṛśyate kiṃ vā prekṣyate ko aham eva vā ।
sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ vyoma cinmātrātma niriṅganam ।। 

tasmāt samastasiddhendradevadaityādidurgamam ।
supradeśam ito gatvā saṅgopyātmānam ātmanā ।। 

adṛśyas sarvabhūtānāṃ nirvikalpasamādhigaḥ ।
same svacche pade śānte āse vigatavedanam ।। 

tasmāt ko nu pradeśas syād atyantaṃ śūnyatāṃ gataḥ ।
yatraitā nānubhūyante pañcabāhyārthavedanāḥ ।। 

śabdakānanavāryabdabhūtā dhyāninam ākulāḥ ।
kṣobhayanty apy asaṅkṣubdhās tasmān me girayo arayaḥ ।। 

nānāvidhā nagendrāṇām antarā valitā janaiḥ ।
deśā viṣamayā eva niśśeṣā viṣayāhibhiḥ ।। 

janair jalacarair vyāptās sāgarāgārakukṣayaḥ ।
vividhārambhasaṃrabdhair nagarāṇīva nāgaraiḥ ।। 

taṭāny adryamburāśīnāṃ lokapālapurāṇi ca ।
bhūtākulāni śṛṅgāṇi pātālakuharāṇi ca ।। 

gāyanty anilaśītkārair nṛtyanti latikākaraiḥ ।
puṣpair hasanty agendrāṇāṃ guhā gahanakoṭarāḥ ।। 

maunimīnamunisparśakampinālacalāmbujāḥ ।
sarasyo virasā eva vāryāvartavirāvitāḥ ।। 

pavanaspandasaṅkṣubdhatṛṇapāṃsupatākinī ।
raṭaty anilabhāṅkārair nirjanorvy apy asaṃyatā ।। 

tasmād ākāśam āśūnyaṃ kasmiṃścid dūrakoṇake ।
atra tiṣṭhāmy avaṣṭabhya yogayuktim aninditām ।। 

kasmiṃścid ekakoṇe atra kṛtvā kalpanayā kuṭīm ।
vajrodaradṛḍhāṃ tasyām antas tiṣṭhāmy avāsanam ।। 

iti sañcintya yāto aham ākāśam asinirmalam ।
yāvat tad api paśyāmi sakalaṃ vitatāntaram ।। 

kvacid bhramatsiddhagaṇaṃ kvacid udgarjadambudam ।
kvacid vidyādharadharaṃ yakṣotkṣiptakṣayaṃ kvacit ।। 

kvacit bhramatpuravaraṃ prārabdhasamaraṃ kvacit ।
kvacid dravajjaladharaṃ kvacid unnṛttayogini ।। 

kvacid daityapuroḍḍīnaṃ sagandharvapuraṃ kvacit ।
kvacid bhramadgrahagaṇaṃ tārakākulitaṃ kvacit ।। 

kvacit khakhagasaṅghuṣṭaṃ kvacit kṣubdhamahānilam ।
kvacid utpātavalitaṃ kvacin maṅgalamaṇḍitam ।। 

kvacic cāpūrvabhūtaughaṃ nāgaiś cāgopitaṃ kvacit ।
kvacid arkarathākrāntaṃ kvacid arkarathoddhuram ।। 

kvacid ādityadāhārtaṃ śaśiśaityānvitaṃ kvacit ।
kvacit kṣudrajanāsahyaṃ kvacid agnyauṣṇyadurgamam ।। 

kvacid uttālavetālaṃ garuḍoḍḍāmaraṃ kvacit ।
kvacit sapralayāmbhodaṃ kvacit sapralayānilam ।। 

tato bhūtagaṇāṃs tyaktvā dūrād dūrataraṃ gataḥ ।
prāptavān aham ekāntaṃ śūnyam atyantavistṛtam ।। 

atyantamandapavanaṃ svapne apy aprāptabhūtakam ।
maṅgalotpātarahitam agamyaṃ siddhasantateḥ ।। 

kalpitātha mayā tatra kuṭī prakaṭakoṭarā ।
nīrandhrakuḍyanibiḍā padmakuṭmalasundarī ।। 

ghuṇakṣuṇṇāṅgapūrṇendubimbodaramanoharā ।
kalhārakundamandārapuṣpaśrīkośaśobhitā ।। 

samagrabhūtāgamyatvaṃ tatra saṅkalpya cetasā ।
agamye sarvabhūtānām aham āsaṃ tadā tataḥ ।। 

baddhapadmāsanaś śāntamanāḥ paramamaunavān ।
saṃvatsaraśatāntena nirṇīyotthānam ātmanaḥ ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhistho nidrāmudrām ivāgataḥ ।
samas somyo nabhassvacchas samutkīrṇa ivāmbarāt ।। 

śuddhaṃ yad anusandhatte cetaḥ paśyati tat kṣaṇāt ।
cireṇa vā śāpavaravyaktivad vitataṃ yadā ।। 

tadā varṣaśatenātra bodhabījaṃ dhṛtāṅkuram ।
āsīn me hṛdayakṣetre kālasekavikāsataḥ ।। 

samprabuddho abhavan me atha jīvo sambuddhavedanaḥ ।
śiśirakṣīṇagātrasya madhāv iva rasas taroḥ ।। 

tac chataṃ tatra varṣāṇāṃ nimeṣa iva me gatam ।
bahvyo api kālagatayo bhavanty ekadhiyāṃ manāk ।। 

vikāsam āgato bāhyaṃ tato buddhīndriyakramaḥ ।
vāsantaḥ puṣparūpeṇa drumasyeva raso mama ।। 

māṃ prāṇapūritam upāgatasaṃvidaṃśam abhyāgatas tv aham iti prasṛtaḥ piśācaḥ ।
icchāṅganāvivalito atha kuto api sadma pronnāmasannamanavāyur ivāgravṛkṣam ।। 

ākāśamandire vasiṣṭhasamādhānaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturdaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

tvām apy uditanirvāṇam ahaṅkārapiśācakaḥ ।
bādhate kim iti brūhi mune manmohaśāntaye ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ahambhāvaṃ vinā dehasthitis tajjñājñayor iha ।
ādheyasya nirādhārā na saṃsthevopapadyate ।। 

ayaṃ tv atra viśeṣas taṃ śṛṇu viśrāntacetasaḥ ।
śrutena yenāhambhāvapiśācaś śāntim eti te ।। 

ahambhāvapiśāco ayam ajñānaśiśunāmunā ।
avidyamāna evāntaḥ kalpitas tena sūtthitaḥ ।। 

ajñānam api nāsty eva prekṣitaṃ yan na labhyate ।
vicāriṇā dīpavatā svarūpaṃ tamaso yathā ।। 

yathā yathā vilokyate tathā tathā vilīyate ।
ihājñatāpiśācikā tathāvicāritā satī ।। 

vilasantyām avidyāyām ajñatodeti śāśvatī ।
buddhimohātmikā yakṣī nirdehaiva yathā niśi ।। 

sati sarge tv avidyāyās sambhavo nāsati kvacit ।
sati dvitīye śaśini dvitīyo vidyate śaśaḥ ।। 

sargas tv ayam ajātatvād ajñajñāto na vidyate ।
na jātaḥ kāraṇābhāvāt pūrvam eva khavṛkṣavat ।। 

paramākāśakośāntar ādisarge nirāmaye ।
pṛthvyāder upalambhasya bhavet kim iva kāraṇam ।। 

bījāt kāraṇataḥ kāryam aṅkuraḥ kila jāyate ।
na bījam api yatrāsti tatra syād aṅkuraḥ kutaḥ ।। 

kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ na ca nāmopapadyate ।
kadā ka iva khe kena dṛṣṭo labdhas sphuṭo drumaḥ ।। 

saṅkalpenāmbare yad vā dṛśyate viṭapādikam ।
sa saṅkalpas tathābhūto na tv atrāsti padārthatā ।। 

yo ayam evaṃ cidākāśe sargādāv anubhūyate ।
śūnye kūpa ivākāśas sargas sthitinirargalaḥ ।। 

sama eva cidākāśaḥ kacaty ātmani tattayā ।
svabhāva eva sargākhyaś cittvāc caitanyam īśvaraḥ ।। 

svapnasargo atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyahaṃ yo anubhūyate ।
svayaṃ saṃvedanaṃ svapne sphuraty adripurākṛti ।। 

citsvabhāvo yathā svapna āste sarga iveha vaḥ ।
asarge sargavad bhātas tathā pūrvaṃ mahāmbare ।। 

avedyaṃ vedanaṃ śuddham eva bhāty ajam avyayam ।
sargādau yad anādyantaṃ sthitas sargas sa eva vaḥ ।। 

neha sargo asti naivāyaṃ pṛthvyādigaṇagolakaḥ ।
sarvaṃ śāntam anālambaṃ brahmaiva brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

sarvaśaktyātma tad brahma yathā kacati yādṛśam ।
rūpam atyajad evācchaṃ tathā bhavati tādṛśam ।। 

yathā svapnapuraṃ jantoś cinmātrapravijṛmbhitam ।
tathaiva sargas sargādau śuddhacinmātrajṛmbhitaḥ ।। 

svacche citparamākāśe cidākāśo ya āsthitaḥ ।
svabhāva eva sargo asāv iti tenaiva bhāvitaḥ ।। 

bhāvyabhāvakabhāvādibhūmīnāṃ bhavanaṃ bhṛśam ।
sarvaṃ cinnabha evāccham ātmanātmani saṃsthitam ।। 

evaṃ sthite kutas sargaḥ kuto avidyā kva cājñatā ।
brahma śāntaṃ ghanaṃ sarvaṃ kvāhaṅkārādayas sthitāḥ ।। 

ahambhāvasya saṃśāntir eṣāsau kathitā tava ।
ahambhāvaḥ parijñātaḥ piśāca iva śāmyati ।। 

mayā tv evam ahambhāvaḥ parijñāto yadākhilaḥ ।
tadā me vidyamāno api niṣphalaś śaradabhravat ।। 

citrāgnidāho vijñāto yathā dāhyeṣu niṣphalaḥ ।
tathāhambhāvasargādi jñātaṃ viphalatām iyāt ।। 

iti me ahaṅkṛtes tyāge rāge ca samatā yadi ।
tadā vyomna iva vyomni sarge asarge ca me sthitiḥ ।। 

ahambhāvasya naivāhaṃ nāhambhāvo mameti ca ।
tena viddhi cidākāśam evedam iti nirghanam ।। 

yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti bodhavatām iha ।
agnitvam iva citrāgner nāsty ahambodhavibhramaḥ ।। 

nāham asmi na cānyo asti sarvaṃ vāstītiniścayaḥ ।
prakṛtavyavahāras tvaṃ śilāmaunamayo bhava ।। 

ākāśakośaviśadākṛtir eva tiṣṭha nirdehavac ciram apahnutasarvabhāvaḥ ।
adyāditaś ca kila cinmayam eva sarvaṃ no dṛśyam asti śivam evam aśeṣam ittham ।। 

viditavedyāhaṅkāravicāro nāma sargaḥ

pañcadaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

aho nu vitatodārā vipulā vimalācalā ।
bhavatā bhagavan bhūtyai bhūyo dṛṣṭir udāhṛtā ।। 

sarvathā sarvadā sārvaṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadam ।
sad ity eva sthitaṃ satyaṃ samaṃ samanubhūtitaḥ ।। 

ayam asti mama brahman saṃśayas taṃ nivāraya ।
kim idaṃ bhagavan nāma pāṣāṇākhyānam ucyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarvatra sarvadā sarvam astīti pratipādane ।
pāṣāṇākhyānadṛṣṭānto mayāyaṃ tava kathyate ।। 

nīrandhraikaghanāṅgasya pāṣāṇasyāpi koṭare ।
santi sargasahasrāṇi kathayeti pradarśyate ।। 

bhūtākāśe mahaty asmin svaṃ śūnyatvam anujjhati ।
santi sargasahasrāṇi kathayeti pradarśyate ।। 

rāmaḥ

kuḍyādau santi sargaughā iti cet kathyate mune ।
tat khe vibhānti sargaughā iti kiṃ na pradarśyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etat te varṇitaṃ rāma mukhyam eva mayākhilam ।
yo ayam ālakṣyate sargas sarga eva kham āsthitam ।। 

ādāv eva hi notpannam adyāpi ca na vidyate ।
dṛśyaṃ yac cāvabhātīdaṃ tad brahma brahmaṇi sthitam ।। 

nāsti bhūr aṇumātrāpi sargair nirvivarā na yā ।
na ca kvacana vidyante sargā brahmakham eva tat ।। 

vāriṇo nāṇur apy asti sargair nirvivaro na yaḥ ।
na ca kvacana sargās te santi brahmakham eva tat ।। 

na tejaso aṇur apy asti sargair nirvivaro na yaḥ ।
na ca kvacana vidyante sargā brahmakham eva tat ।। 

na vāyor aṇur apy asti sargair nirvivaro na yaḥ ।
na ca kvacana sargās te santi brahmakham eva tat ।। 

khaṃ nāṇumātram apy asti sargair nirvivaraṃ na yat ।
na ca kvacana vidyante sargā brahmakham eva tat ।। 

na sā mahābhūtatāsti sargair nirvivarā na yā ।
na ca kvacana vidyante sargā brahmakham eva te ।। 

prāṇyaṅgo nāṇur apy asti sargair nirvivaro na yaḥ ।
na ca kvacana sargās te santi brahmakham eva tat ।। 

śailānāṃ nāṇur apy asti sa sargair yo na nirghanaḥ ।
na ca kvacana vidyante sargā brahmakham eva tat ।। 

brahmaṇo nāṇur apy asti sargair nirvivaro na yaḥ ।
na ca kvacana sargās te santi brahmakham eva tat ।। 

sargeṣu nāṇur apy asti na brahmātmaiva yas sadā ।
brahma sargas tathā tv eṣa vāci bhedo na vastuni ।। 

sarga eva paraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmaiva sargatā ।
manāg apy asti na dvaitam atrāgnyarkauṣṇyayor iva ।। 

ime sargā idaṃ brahma cety etā vākyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
vidāryadāruravavad bhānty arthaparivarjitāḥ ।। 

dvaitam aikyaṃ ca yatrāsti na manāg api tatra te ।
sargabrahmādiśabdārthāḥ kathaṃ kasyeva bhāntu te ।। 

śāntam ekam anādyantam idam accham anāmayam ।
vyavahāravato apy aṅga jñasya maunaṃ śilāghanam ।। 

nirvāṇam evam akhilaṃ nabha eva dṛśyaṃ tvaṃ cāham adrinicayāś ca surāsurāś ca ।
tādṛg jagat samavalokaya yādṛg aṅga svapne anyajantumanasi vyavahārajālam ।। 

sargabrahmatvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

anantaraṃ nabhaḥkośakuṭīkoṭarake mune ।
tava dhyānāt prabuddhasya vṛttaṃ varṣaśatena kim ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tato dhyānāt prabuddho ahaṃ śrutavāṃs tatra nissvanam ।
mṛdv avyaktapadaṃ hṛdyaṃ na ca vādyān na geyataḥ ।। 

strīsvabhāvād iva mṛdu madhuraṃ cāninādi ca ।
svalpāṅgatvād anirhrādi mayā tad vākyam ūhitam ।। 

indindirarutākāraṃ tantrīraṇanarañjanam ।
na rodanaṃ na paṭhanaṃ vaṃśakośasamasvanam ।। 

tad ākarṇyāśu tatredam ahaṃ cintitavān atha ।
śabdakartrīkṣaṇāt paśyan diśo daśa savismayaḥ ।। 

vyomno ayaṃ siddhasañcāramārgaśūnyam anantaram ।
bhāgo yojanalakṣāṇi samatikramya saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

tad ihedṛgvidhasyāsya kutaś śabdasya sambhavaḥ ।
śābdikaṃ na ca paśyāmi yatnenāpi vilokayan ।। 

anantam idam āśūnyaṃ puro me nirmalaṃ nabhaḥ ।
iha bhūtaṃ prayatnena prekṣyamāṇaṃ na dṛśyate ।। 

yadeti cintayitvāhaṃ bhūyo bhūyo vilokayan ।
śabdeśvaraṃ na paśyāmi tadā cintitavān idam ।। 

ākāśa eva bhūtvāham ākāśenaikatāṃ gataḥ ।
ākāśaguṇaśabdārthān karomy ākāśakośake ।। 

dehākāśam idaṃ sthāpya dhyāneneha yathāsthitam ।
cidākāśavapur vyomnā yāmy aikyaṃ vār ivāmbunā ।। 

cintayitvety ahaṃ tyaktuṃ dehaṃ padmāsane sthitaḥ ।
āsaṃ samādhim ādhātuṃ punar āmīlitekṣaṇaḥ ।। 

tyaktvā bāhyān api sparśān aindriyān āntarān api ।
cittākāśe aham abhavaṃ saṃvitspandamayātmakaḥ ।। 

kramāt tad api santyajya buddhitattvapadaṃ gataḥ ।
sampanno ahaṃ cidākāśo jagajjālaikadarpaṇaḥ ।। 

tatas tena svabhāvena bhūtavyomaikatām aham ।
samprayāto ambunevāmbu saurabhaṃ saurabheṇa vā ।। 

sampanno atha mahākāśo vyāpy ananto atha sarvagaḥ ।
anākāro apy anādhāras sarvārthādhāratāṃ gataḥ ।। 

yāvat trailokyavṛndāni saṃsārāṇāṃ śatāni ca ।
tatra brahmāṇḍalakṣāṇi paśyāmy agaṇitāny api ।। 

parasparam adṛṣṭāni mithaḥ khāny amalāni ca ।
nānācāravicārāṇi śūnyāny eva parasparam ।। 

svapnarūpāṇi suptānāṃ tulyakālaṃ nṛṇām iva ।
mahārambhāṇy adṛṣṭāni śūnyāni ca parasparam ।। 

jāyamānāni naśyanti vardhamānāni bhūriśaḥ ।
vartamānāny atītāni bhaviṣyanti ca sarvaśaḥ ।। 

anekacittajātāni mahābhittīni khāni ca ।
manasy evograrājyāni kṛtāni vividhair janaiḥ ।। 

nirāvaraṇarūpāṇi tathaikāvaraṇāni ca ।
pañcāvaraṇarūpāṇi ṣaḍekāvaraṇāni ca ।। 

daśāvaraṇacitrāṇi ṣoḍaśāvaraṇāni ca ।
caturviṃśatyāvṛtīni ṣaṭtriṃśatyāvṛtīni ca ।। 

śūnyāni bhūtapūrṇāni pañcabhūtamayāni ca ।
ekapṛthvyādibhūtāni catuṣpṛthvyādikāni ca ।। 

tripṛthvyādīni cānyāni dvipṛthvyādīny athāpi ca ।
tathā saptamahābhūtāny ekajātimayāni ca ।। 

tvādṛśānubhavābhogaviruddhānīdṛśāni tu ।
tathā nityāndhakārāṇi sūryādirahitāni ca ।। 

tathā mīlitasargāṇi ekanāthāvṛtāni ca ।
vilakṣaṇaprajeśāni vicitrācāravanti ca ।। 

jātyandhapāramparyeṇa saṅketācāravanti ca ।
tathā nityaprakāśāni jvalitāgnimayāni ca ।। 

tathā jalaikapūrṇāni pavanaikātmakāni ca ।
stabdhāni paramākāśe vahanti ca tathāniśam ।। 

jāyamānāni puṣyanti paripuṣṭāni cābhitaḥ ।
tiryag gacchanti cānyāni mūkasargamayāny api ।। 

devamātraikasargāṇi naramātramayāni ca ।
daityavṛndamayāny eva kriminirvivarāṇi ca ।। 

antar antas tadantaś ca svakośeṣv aṇukaṃ prati ।
jātāni jāyamānāni kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।। 

parasparam adṛṣṭāni nānubhūtāni vai mithaḥ ।
sainikasvapnajālāni jātānīva mahānty api ।। 

vividhāny apy anantāni svacchākāśātmakāny alam ।
anyo'nyam anyavṛttīni na mitho anyasthitīni ca ।। 

mithaś cānyānyaśāstrāṇi mitho anantāni yāni ca ।
anyānyasanniveśāni mitho anyānyāni yāni ca ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ paralokāni mithas siddhapurāṇi ca ।
anyādṛśamahābhūtāny anyādṛkṣagirīṇi ca ।। 

tvādṛśānubhavehānām agamyāny ātatāni ca ।
asamañjasarūpāṇi kathyamānāni mādṛśaiḥ ।। 

aṇuvat prohyamānāni cidādityāṃśumaṇḍale ।
paramārthaśriyo vyomni raśmijālāni kuṇḍale ।। 

kānicit tāni tāny eva bhūtvā bhūtvā bhavanty alam ।
kānicit tādṛśāny eva jātāni vanaparṇavat ।। 

anyāny atrārdhasadṛśāny anyāni sadṛśāny api ।
kañcit kālaṃ susadṛśāny anyāny anagha kānicit ।। 

anyāny ajñātakālāni yadṛcchāvaśatas svayam ।
jāyamānāni puṣyanti susthirāṇi sthitāni ca ।। 

phalāni tāny anantāni paramārthamahātaroḥ ।
ananyāny eva cānyāni tanmayāny eva vai tataḥ ।। 

kānicit svalpakalpāni dīrghakalpāni kānicit ।
anyāny aniyataṃ bhūri niyataṃ bhūri kānicit ।। 

tāni śūnyatvajālāni paramākāśakośake ।
aparijñātakālāni dṛḍhāny ajñātadoṣake ।। 

abdhyarkākāśamervādiśatair āvalitāny alam ।
ciccamatkārakhe svapnajālāny ābhānti cābilam ।। 

anubhūter bhramātmatvāt kāraṇānām abhāvataḥ ।
pṛthvyādīnām ahetūnām atyantaṃ santy asanti ca ।। 

mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubharavad dvicandravyomavarṇavat ।
sampannāni na satyāni satyāny apy anubhūtitaḥ ।। 

citsaṅkalpanabhasy eva bhāsamānāni bhūriśaḥ ।
vāsanāvātanunnāni vinunnāny ātmaceṣṭitaiḥ ।। 

surāsurādimaṣakāny ākāśoḍumbaradrume ।
phalāni rasapūrṇāni ghūrṇamānāni mārutaiḥ ।। 

abhijātasvabhāvasya sarvārambhakarasya ca ।
śuddhacittattvabālasya saṅkalpanagarāṇi khe ।। 

tvam ahaṃ sa idaṃ ceti dhiyācaladṛḍhāny alam ।
sampannāny arkadīptyeva paṅkakrīḍanakāni ca ।। 

dhṛtāni rasaśālinyā niyatyā nityatṛptayā ।
vanāny ugraphalānīva vasantarasalekhayā ।। 

mahākartṝṇy akartṝṇi na kṛtāny eva khāni ca ।
svayaṃsampannarūpāṇi cidvyomnaiva kṛtāni ca ।। 

paramārthamayāny eva tadanyatvoditāni ca ।
alabdhāny eva labdhāni sadāsanty eva santi ca ।। 

caturdaśadaśaikādividhabhūtagaṇāni ca ।
punas tāny eva tāny antar anyāny anyāny atho bahiḥ ।। 

narakasvargapātālabandhumitramayāny api ।
mahārambhamayāny eva śūnyāni paramārthataḥ ।। 

kṣīrāmbudher jalānīva snehasārāṇi sarvataḥ ।
taraṅgabhaṅgurāṇy antar bahiś cāvṛttimanti ca ।। 

ābhāsamātrarūpāṇi tejāṃsy ātmavivasvataḥ ।
jātānīva svatas tāni spandanāni nabhasvataḥ ।। 

vṛkṣarūpāṇi pattrāṇāṃ buddhyahaṅkāracetasām ।
asatām apy asanty eva svapno anyastho nṛṇām iva ।। 

purāṇavedasiddhāntakalpanātalpapāliṣu ।
ghananidrāṇi suptāni bibhranti śavatām iva ।। 

paramārthamahāraṇye cidgandharvakṛtāṇi khe ।
sūryadīpakadīptīni gṛhāṇi gahanāny ati ।। 

prajāyamānāni nabhasy anante viśīryamāṇāni ca nirnimittam ।
tadā tv ahaṃ taimirikākṣadṛṣṭakeśoṇḍukānīva jaganty apaśyam ।। 

jagajjālavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptadaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tato aham abhito bhrāntas tādṛśaḥ pravicārayan ।
bahukālam asaṃruddhasaṃvidākāśatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

śabdaṃ paścāt tam aśrauṣam ahaṃ vīṇāsvanopamam ।
kramāt sphuṭapadaṃ jātaṃ tata āryātvam āgatam ।। 

śabdadeśapataddṛṣṭir dṛṣṭavān vanitām aham ।
pārśve kanakaniṣṣyandaprabhayā bhāsitāmbarām ।। 

ālolamālyavasanām alakākulalocanām ।
loladhammillavalanām anyāṃ śriyam ivāgatām ।। 

kāntakāñcanagaurāṅgīm aṅgasthanavayauvanām ।
vanadevīm ivāmodisarvāvayavasundarīm ।। 

sā pūrṇacandravadanā puṣpaprakarahāsinī ।
yauvanoddāmavadanā pakṣmalekṣaṇaśālinī ।। 

ākāśakośasadanā śaśāṅkakarasundarī ।
muktākalāparacanā kāntā madanusāriṇī ।। 

svareṇa madhureṇemām āryām āryavilāsinī ।
papāṭhākaṭhinaṃ vāmā matpārśve mṛduhāsinī ।। 

asaduditariktacetanasaṃsṛtimṛgasariti muhyamānānām ।
avalambanataṭaviṭapinam abhinaumi bhavantam eva mune ।। 

ity ākarṇyāham ālokya tāṃ cāruvacanasvanām ।
lalaneyaṃ kim anayety anādṛtyaiva tāṃ gataḥ ।। 

tato jagadvṛndamayīṃ māyāṃ samprekṣya vismitaḥ ।
anādṛtyaiva tāṃ vyomni vihartum aham udyataḥ ।। 

tatas tāṃ tatkṛtāṃ cintām alam utsṛjya khe sthitām ।
jaganmāyāṃ kalayituṃ vyomātmāhaṃ pravṛttavān ।। 

yāvat tāni tathogrāṇi jaganti sakalāni kham ।
śūnyam eva yathā svapne saṅkalpakathane tathā ।। 

na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti kadācit kānicit kvacit ।
tāni kalpamahākalpajātān ekatra tān mithaḥ ।। 

pramattapuṣkarāvartān unmattotpātamārutān ।
sphuṭitādrīndraḍākkāraghaṭṭitabrahmamaṇḍapān ।। 

jvalatkalpāgnivisphoṭasphuṭadaiḍabiḍāspadān ।
pratapaddvādaśākārakaṭumārtāṇḍamaṇḍalān ।। 

luṭhatsurapuravrātavitatākrandaghargharān ।
raṇanmervādikaṭakaśreṇīnigaraṇodbhaṭān ।। 

kalpāgnijvalanollāsapaṭatpaṭapaṭāravān ।
ātmabhraṃśabṛhatkṣobhakṣubdhāmbaramahārṇavān ।। 

devāsuranarāgāraghargharākrandakarkaśān ।
saptārṇavamahāpūrapūritārkendumandirān ।। 

na vicetanti kalpāntān sarvāṇy eva parasparam ।
ekamandirasaṃsuptās svapne raṇarayān iva ।। 

tatra rudrasahasrāṇi brahmakoṭiśatāni ca ।
dṛṣṭāni viṣṇulakṣāṇi kalpavṛndāny alaṃ mayā ।। 

tatra kvacid anāditye nirahorātrabhūtale ।
akalpayugavarṣānte jagadvyūhaiḥ kṣayodayaḥ ।। 

citi sarvaṃ citas sarvaṃ cit sarvaṃ sarvataś ca cit ।
cit sarvaikātmikety etad dṛṣṭaṃ tatra mayākhilam ।। 

tvaṃ kā cid iti ced vakṣi tan na kiñcid ivāṅga cit ।
sā hi śūnyatamā vyomno na ca nāma nakiñcana ।। 

tad ākāśam idaṃ bhāti jagad ity abhiśabditam ।
tenaiva śabdanabhasā sarvaṃ hi paramaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

dṛśyadṛṣṭir iyaṃ bhrāntir ākāśatarumañjarī ।
cidvyomāṅgakam eveti tatrāham anubhūtavān ।। 

buddhyākāśaikarūpeṇa vyāpinā bodharūpiṇā ।
tatrānante nasaṅkalpam anubhūtam idaṃ mayā ।। 

brahmavyoma jagajjālaṃ brahmavyoma diśo daśa ।
brahmavyoma kalākāladeśadravyakriyādikam ।। 

tatrāham iva saṃsāraśate sārdhe munīśvarāḥ ।
dṛṣṭā vasiṣṭhanāmāno brahmaputrā maduttamāḥ ।। 

brahmadvāsaptates tretās sarvā eva sarāghavāḥ ।
tatra dṛṣṭaṃ kṛtaśataṃ dvāparāṇāṃ śataṃ tathā ।। 

bhedodayena ced dṛṣṭās tās tās sargadaśās tathā ।
bodhena cet tad atyaccham ekaṃ brahmanabhas tatam ।। 

bhedabrahmaṇi nāmāsti jagad brahmaṇy atha tv idam ।
brahmaivājam anādyantaṃ tat sarvaṃ tvanmadādikam ।। 

pāṣāṇamaunapratimaṃ nakiñcid abhiśabditam ।
yat tat kiñcid ivoddyotarūpaṃ brahma jagat smṛtam ।। 

vibhāty acetyacidvyomni svasattaiva jagattayā ।
nirākāre nirākārā svapnānubhavasannibhā ।। 

ananyad ātmano brahma sarvaṃ bhāmātrarūpakam ।
prakāśanam ivālokaḥ karoti na karoti ca ।। 

teṣu rāmānubhūyante jagallakṣeṣu tatra vai ।
uṣṇāni candravṛndāni sūryāś śītalamūrtayaḥ ।। 

prajās tamasi paśyanti paśyanty eva na tejasi ।
ulūkasya samācārās tasyaiva sadṛśasvanāḥ ।। 

itaś śubhena naśyanti yānti pāpais tathā divam ।
viṣāśanena jīvanti mriyante amṛtabhojanaiḥ ।। 

yad yathā budhyate bodho yathodety atha vā svataḥ ।
tathāśu sphuṭatām eti sad vāsad vā sad eva tat ।। 

viṭapākāramūlaughadarśanād vajraśobhibhiḥ ।
ghūrṇate puṣpapattrāḍhyaiḥ pādapair vyomni kānanam ।। 

sikatāḥ pīḍitās satyas sravanti snehajaṃ rasam ।
śilāphalahakebhyaś ca jāyante kamalāny alam ।। 

dāruṇy aśmani bhittau ca cañcalās sālabhañjikāḥ ।
gṛhāṅganābhis sahitā gāyanti kathayanti ca ।। 

meghān paridadhaty uccair bhūtāny uccaiḥpaṭān iva ।
prativarṣaṃ vijātīyāny utpadyante phalāny age ।। 

sanniveśe na niyatair aṅgānāṃ vividhāṅgakaiḥ ।
śirobhis sarvabhūtani parikrāmanti bhūmigaiḥ ।। 

śāstravedavihīnāni nirdharmāṇy eva kānicit ।
yatkiñcanaikakārīṇi tiryagvat trijaganty adhaḥ ।। 

kāmasaṃvittihīnāni nisstrījātīni kānicit ।
bhūtais saṃśuṣkahṛdayair vyāptāny aśmamayair iva ।। 

pavanāśanabhūtāni samaratnāśmakāni ca ।
ajñātārthāny alubdhāni nirgardhāni ca kānicit ।। 

kvacit pratyekam ātmānaṃ paśyaty āpnoti netarat ।
bahubhūtakam apy asti jagad ity ekabhūtakam ।। 

nakhakeśādike yadvat tadvad anyatra saṃsthitiḥ ।
ātmavat sarvabhūtānām ekabhūtātmabhāvanā ।। 

anantāpāraparyantaṃ śūnyam eva bahu kvacit ।
yan na nas saṃvid āpnoti tasyānte api jagat punaḥ ।। 

atyantābuddhabuddhīni mokṣaśabdārthadṛṣṭiṣu ।
dāruyantramayāśeṣabhūtaughāny eva kānicit ।। 

ṛkṣacakravihīnāni niṣkālakalanāni ca ।
mūkasaṅketasārāṇi bhūtajālāni kānicit ।। 

kānicid varjitāny eva netraśabdārthasaṃvidā ।
vyarthadīptārkatejāṃsi bhūtānīty ekacintayā ।। 

ghrāṇasaṃvidvihīnāni vyarthāmodāni kānicit ।
mūkāni śabdavaiyarthyāc chrutihīnāni kānicit ।। 

vākyasaṃvidvihīnatvāt pramūkāny eva kānicit ।
sparśasaṃvidvihīnatvād aśmāṅgāny eva kānicit ।। 

saṃvinmātramayāny eva dṛṣṭāny api ca kānicit ।
vyavahārīṇy athāgrāhyāṇy eva nityaṃ piśācavat ।। 

bhūmayāny ekaniṣṭhāni niṣpiṇḍāny eva kānicit ।
jaganti vyomarūpāṇi tāvat tatra kacanti khe ।। 

kānicid vāripūrṇāni vahnipūrṇāni kānicit ।
jaganti vyomarūpāṇi tāvat tatra kacanti khe ।। 

dharāpīṭhaikapūrṇeṣu tiṣṭhanty anyeṣu dehinaḥ ।
bhekā iva śilākośe kīṭā iva dharodare ।। 

jalaikaparipūrṇeṣu nirabdhyurvīvanādriṣu ।
bhramanty anyeṣu bhūtāni nityam evogramīnavat ।। 

anyeṣv agnyekapūrṇeṣu jalādirahitāny api ।
bhūtāny agnimayāny eva sphuranty alam alātavat ।। 

anyeṣv anilapūrṇeṣu bhūtāny astetarāṇy api ।
vātamātramayāṅgāni sphuranty arjunavātavat ।। 

anyeṣu vyomamātrātmadeheṣu vyomarūpiṇaḥ ।
prāṇinas santi sargeṣv adarśanavyavahāriṇaḥ ।। 

pātālapātiṣu tathāmbaram utpatatsu tiṣṭhatsu vibhramapareṣv atha diṅmukheṣu ।
nānājagatsu kim ivāsti mayā na dṛṣṭaṃ yan nāma cijjaladhicañcalabudbudeṣu ।। 

jagadvṛndavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭādaśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cidākāśāś cidākāśe payasīva payorayāḥ ।
cittvāj jīvās sphuranty ete ye ta eva manāṃsi naḥ ।। 

viśadākāśarūpāṇi tāny eva ca manāṃsi naḥ ।
jaganti tāny anantāni sampannāny abhitas svayam ।। 

rāmaḥ

sarvabhūtagaṇe mokṣaṃ mahākalpakṣaye gate ।
punaḥ kasya kathaṃ sargasaṃvittir upajāyate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahāpralayaparyante kṣitijalapavanahutāśākāśāśeṣavināśe ābrahmasthāvarānteṣu bhūteṣu muktau pariṇateṣu bhūyo yathedaṃ jagad anubhūyate tathā śṛṇu । 

avyapadeśyaṃ yat paramārthaghanaṃ brahma cinmātram ity ācakṣate munayaḥ tasya hṛdayam idaṃ jagat । tasmād avyatiriktam eva । sa eva ca devaḥ । tad ātmīyaṃ hṛdayaṃ svabhāvaṃ jagad ity avagacchatīva । vinodenaiva na tu vāstavena rūpeṇa jagad iti kiñcid upalabhāmahe vicārayantaḥ । 

tasmāt kim iva naśyati kim iva jāyate । yathā paramakāraṇam avināśi tathā taddhṛdayam avināśy eva । mahākalpādayaś ca tadavayavā eva । aparijñānamātram atra kevalaṃ khedāyaiva । tad api prekṣyamānaṃ na labhyate eva । 

tasmān na kasyacit kiñcit kadācin naśyati kvacit ।
na caiva jāyate brahma śāntaṃ dṛśyam ajaṃ sthitam ।। 

ākāśaparamāṇusahasrāṃśamātre api yā śuddhā cinmātrasattā vidyate । 

vapur jagad idaṃ tasyā nanu nāma mahāciteḥ ।
kathaṃ naśyaty anaṣṭāyāṃ tasyāṃ sā ca na naśyati ।। 

saṃvido hṛdayaṃ svapne yathā bhāti jagattayā ।
vyomātmaiva tathaivādisargāt prabhṛti bhāsate ।। 

cidvyomāvayavas sargas sargasyaitā daśāḥ kṣayāḥ ।
udayāś ceti khaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ nāśi kim anāśi vā ।। 

eṣā hi paramasaṃvid acchedyādāhyāśoṣyākledyātadvidām adṛśyā । tasyā yad dhṛdayaṃ tat tad eva bhavati । yathāsau na jāyate na naśyati tathaitadantarvartī jagadādyanubhavo na jāyate na naśyaty eveti । 

kevalaṃ smaraṇavismaraṇavaśena svabhāvarūpeṇānubhavānanubhavau kalpayatīva । 

yad yad yadātmakaṃ tattvaṃ tad vināśaṃ vinākṣayi ।
tasmād brahmātmakaṃ dṛśyaṃ viddhi brahmavad akṣayam ।। 

mahāpralayās tadavayavā eva । 

cinmātre parame vyomni kuta eva bhavābhavau ।
kuto bhāvavikārādiḥ kathaṃ vyomni nirākṛtau ।। 

mahākalpādayo bhāvā rāmaitāni jaganti ca ।
brahmātmakatayaivāsmin saṃvidbrahmaṇi saṃsthitam ।। 

nirākṛty acchacinmātraṃ dṛśyaṃ saṅkalpya tadvaśam ।
yāti yenaiva ghaṭito yakṣas taṃ ghaṭṭayet kila ।। 

yathāvayavino vṛkṣasya viṭapaphalapallavapuṣpādayo avayavās tathā paramārthaghanasyākāśād apy accharūpasyāvyapadeśyasya pralayamahāpralayanāśodbhedābhāvabhāvasukhaduḥkhajananamaraṇasākāratvanirākāratvādayo avayavāḥ । yathā cāsāv avayavy anāśo avyapadeśyaś ca tathaiva te iti । 

avayavāvayavinor dṛśyayor vāpy adṛśyayoḥ ।
ekātmanor eva sadā na bhedo asti kadācana ।। 

te hi tasya svātmarūpād avyatiriktāḥ । yathā taroḥ kvacin mūlaṃ tathā paramārthaghanasya kvacic cittvam । kvacit sargastambhaḥ kvacil lokāntaraviṭapāḥ kvacid vyavasthāśākhāḥ kvacit padārthapallavāḥ kvacit prakāśakusumaṃ kvacid andhakārakārṣṇyaṃ kvacin nabhaḥkoṭaraṃ kvacit pralayagulmāḥ kvacin mahāpralayagulphāḥ kvacid dhariharādigucchakāni kvacij jāḍyatvak । evam anākāraṃ vyomarūpam eva aṃvidātmani brahmaṇi brahmasadṛśaṃ svabhāvād avyatiriktam evaitat sthitam । 

ito bhāva ito abhāva itas sarga itaḥ kṣayaḥ ।
svabhāvam evānubhavad iti brahmācalaṃ sthitam ।। 

evammaye api parame brahmākāśe na rañjanāḥ ।
kāścid evāṅga santīndubimbe viṣalatā yathā ।। 

nirmale paramākāśe kva bhāvābhāvarañjanāḥ ।
kvādimadhyāntakalanāḥ kva lokāntaravibhramaḥ ।। 

aparijñānam evaikam atra doṣavad utthitam ।
kevalaṃ tat parāvṛtya prekṣaṇāt pariśāmyati ।। 

ajñānaṃ jñaptibodhena parāmṛṣṭaṃ praṇaśyati ।
yenaivābhyutthitaṃ tena pavaneneva dīpakaḥ ।। 

ajñānaṃ samparijñātaṃ nāsīd eveti budhyate ।
abandhamokṣaṃ brahmaiva sarvam ity avagamyate ।। 

evambodhād dhi yo rāma mokṣa uktas svasaṃvidā ।
vicārayann ālabhate nātra kaścana saṃśayaḥ ।। 

idaṃ jagajjālam anādy ajātaṃ brahmettham ābhātam itīha dṛṣṭvā ।
vicāradṛṣṭyāṣṭaguṇeśvaratvaṃ paśyaṃs tṛṇaṃ svātmani jīva āste ।। 

jagadākāśaikyāvabodho nāma sargaḥ

ekonaviṃśottaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

yad etad bhavatā dṛṣṭaṃ cidvyomavapuṣā tadā ।
tad ekadeśasaṃsthena kim uta bhramatāmbare ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sampanno aham anantātmā vyāpī vyoma tadā kila ।
syātāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ kīdṛśau tau gamāgamau ।। 

naikasthānasthitimayo nāhaṃ gatimayo abhavam ।
tadā tena kha evāsmin dṛṣṭam etan mayātmani ।। 

yathāṅgāni śarīre tvaṃ paśyasy āpādamastakam ।
cinnetreṇāpy anetreṇa tathaitad dṛṣṭavān aham ।। 

anākṛter niravayavasthites tadā tathābhavan vimalacidambarātmanaḥ ।
jaganti tāny avayavajālakāni me yathā khatā na hi galitā na vastutā ।। 

pramāṇam atra te svapnadṛṣṭo bhuvanavibhramaḥ ।
svapne anubhūyate dṛśyaṃ na ca kiñcit kham eva tat ।। 

yathā paśyati vṛkṣas svaṃ pattrapuṣpaphalādikam ।
svasaṃvedananetreṇa tathaitad dṛṣṭavān aham ।। 

yathāmbudhir anantātmā vetti sarvāñ jalecarān ।
taraṅgāvartaphenāṃś ca tathaitad buddhavān aham ।। 

avayavān avayavī yathā vetti nijātmani ।
ananyān ātmanas sargāṃs tathaitān buddhavān aham ।। 

adyāpi tān ahaṃ dehe vyomni śaile jale sthale ।
tathaiva sargān paśyāmi rāma bodhaikatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

puro asmākam idam yat khaṃ gṛhasyāntar bahis tathā ।
pūrṇam etaj jagadvṛndair vetti bodhaikatāṃ gataḥ ।। 

yathāmbho rasatāṃ vetti śaityaṃ vetti yathā himam ।
spandaṃ vetti yathā vāyus tathaitad vetti śuddhadhīḥ ।। 

yo yo rāma vivekātmā śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ ।
sa sa evammayaikātmā vetti svātmānam īdṛśam ।। 

asyāṃ dṛṣṭau pariṇate vettṛvedanavedyadhīḥ ।
na kācid asty abhyuditā vijñānaikātmatā yataḥ ।। 

divyā dṛg adrisaṃsthasya yathā yojanakoṭigān ।
bhāvān vetti bahiś cāntar evaṃ tad buddhavān aham ।। 

yathā bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhāvān nidhidhāturasādikān ।
vetty evaṃ tan mayā buddham ananyad dṛśyam ātmanaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahmann anubhavaty evaṃ tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇā ।
sā kiṃ kṛtavatī brūhi kāntāryāpāṭhapāṭhinī ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tām evāryāṃ paṭhantī sā tathaivānunayānvitā ।
matsamīpe nabhodehā vyomni devīva saṃsthitā ।। 

yathāham ākāśavapus tathaivāsau kharūpiṇī ।
tena dṛṣṭā na sā pūrvadehena lalanā mayā ।। 

aham ākāśarūpātmā sā khamātraśarīriṇī ।
jagajjālaṃ khamātraṃ tad iti tatra tadā sthitam ।। 

rāmaḥ

śarīrasthānakaraṇaprayatnaprāṇasambhavaiḥ ।
yad udeti vaco varṇais tat kutas tādṛśākṛteḥ ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārāḥ kuto vyomātmanām iti ।
brūhi me bhagavaṃs tatra tathāvṛttasya niścayam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rūpālokamanaskārāś śabdapāṭhavacāṃsi ca ।
yathā svapne nabhasy eva santi tatra tathāmbare ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārais svapne cinnabha eva te ।
yathodeti tathā tatra tad dṛśyaṃ khātmakaṃ sthitam ।। 

na kevalaṃ tu tad dṛśyaṃ yāvat tvadviṣaye vayam ।
jagac cedaṃ kham evācchaṃ yathā tan nas tathākhilam ।। 

paramārthamahādhātur vedyanirmuktacidvapuḥ ।
evaṃ nāma svayaṃ bhāti svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ ।। 

śarīrasthānakaraṇasattāyāṃ kā tava pramā ।
yathaiva teṣāṃ dehādi tathāsmākam idaṃ sthitam ।। 

yathaiva tat tathaivedaṃ yathaivedaṃ tathaiva tat ।
asat sattām iva gataṃ sac cāsad iva ca sthitam ।। 

yathā svapne dharābdhyadriprajāvyavahṛtir nabhaḥ ।
tadādya cāhaṃ tvaṃ sā ca tad idaṃ ca tathā nabhaḥ ।। 

yathā svapne nṛbhir yuddhakolāhalagamāgamāḥ ।
asanto apy anubhūyante saṃsāranikarās tathā ।। 

vakṣi cet svapnadṛśyā śrīḥ kasmāt tad asamañjasam ।
avācyam etad dhetur hi nānyo asty anubhavasthiteḥ ।। 

katham ālakṣyate svapna iti praṣṭuḥ prakathyate ।
yathainaṃ paśyasīty eva hetur atrāsti netaraḥ ।। 

svapnajantur iva vyomni bhāti prathamasargataḥ ।
prabhṛty eva virāḍātmā khe kham eva parāpare ।। 

svapnaśabdena bodhārthaṃ tava vyavaharāmy aham ।
dṛśyaṃ tv idaṃ na san nāsan na svapno brahma kevalam ।। 

atha rāghava sā kāntā mayā kāntānuṣaṅgiṇī ।
saṃvidaṃ tanmayīṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭedaṃ dṛṣṭarūpiṇī ।। 

vyavahāro yathodeti svapne svapnajanais saha ।
tathā tadā tayā sārdhaṃ vyavahāro mamoditaḥ ।। 

yathaiva svapnasaṅkāśo vyavahāraḥ kham eva saḥ ।
tathaiva tvam imaṃ viddhi mamātmānaṃ jagac ca kham ।। 

yathā svapne jagadrūpaṃ kham evaivam idaṃ jagat ।
jāgradākhyo mahāsvapnas sargādau viyadudbhavaḥ ।। 

svapno ayaṃ jagadābhogo nakiñcid vā kham eva vā ।
nirmalaṃ jñaptitāmātram ity asanmātrakhaṃ sthitam ।। 

svapnasya vidyate draṣṭā sākāro yuṣmadādikaḥ ।
draṣṭā tu sargasvapnasya cidvyomaivāmalaṃ svataḥ ।। 

yathā draṣṭāmalaṃ vyoma dṛśyaṃ taddṛggataṃ tathā ।
svapnarūpaṃ kacaty uccair jagat tenāmalaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

cidvyomno anākṛtes svapno hṛdi sphurati yas svataḥ ।
sargas tasya kutas tena sākṛtitvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 

sākārasyaiva yat svapnajagat tad vyoma kevalam ।
nirākārasya cidvyomnas sargasvapnaḥ kathaṃ na kham ।। 

nirupādānasambhāram abhittāv eva cinnabhaḥ ।
paśyaty akṛtam evemaṃ jagatsvapnaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā ।। 

mṛdvyā cidākāśamṛdā brahmaṇā brāhmaṇena khe ।
kṛto api na kṛtas sargamaṇḍapo akṣagavākṣakaḥ ।। 

no kartṛtā na ca jaganti na bhoktṛtāsti nāstīti nāsti na ca kiñcid ato budhas san ।
pāṣāṇamaunam avalambya yathāpravāham ācāram ācara śarīram ihāstu mā vā ।। 

jagadaikyaṃ nāma sargaḥ

viṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

tava striyā kharūpeṇa dehenābhūt tayā kathā ।
katham uccāritās tatra varṇāḥ kacaṭatādayaḥ ।। 

atha cet svapnavad vakṣi tat pṛcchāmi tad apy aham ।
proccaranti kutas svapne varṇā yaralavādayaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

svapneṣu khaśarīrāṇāṃ varṇāḥ kacaṭatādayaḥ ।
kadācanāpi nodyanti śavānām iva kecana ।। 

varṇoccāro abhaviṣyac cet prakaṭārthas tataḥ kvacit ।
svapneṣv anvabhaviṣyat taṃ vinidraḥ pārśvago janaḥ ।। 

tasmān na kiñcit svapneṣu tat satyaṃ bhrāntir eva sā ।
cinmātrākāśakacanaṃ tathā tat khe svabhāvajam ।। 

yathendukārṣṇyakhataruśilāgeyāditāṃ gataḥ ।
ivābhāti cidākāśas tathā yaralavāditāṃ ।। 

tac cidākāśakacanaṃ yan nāma svapnavedanam ।
ākāśam eva nabhasaḥ kacanaṃ viddhi netarat ।। 

yathā svapnas tathaivedaṃ jāgrad agre vyavasthitam ।
ākāśam apy anākāśaṃ yathaivedaṃ tathaiva tat ।। 

tathā kacati tac cāru cetanaṃ caturaṃ tadā ।
yathā sthitaṃ tad evedaṃ satyaṃ sthiram iva sphurat ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavan svapna evedaṃ kathaṃ jāgrad avasthitam ।
asatyam eva satyatvam iva yātaṃ kathaṃ vada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu svapnamayāny eva kathaṃ santi jaganty alam ।
nānyāni na ca satyāni na sthirāṇi sthitāni ca ।। 

anubhūtāni bījāni bījarāśāv ivāmbare ।
anyāny anyāni tāny eva samāni na samāni ca ।। 

pratyekam antar anyāni tathaivābhyuditāni ca ।
parasparam adṛṣṭāni bahūni vividhāni ca ।। 

anyo'nyaṃ tāni sarvāṇi na paśyanty eva kiñcana ।
jaḍānīvaikarāśīni bījānīva laganty api ।। 

vyomātmakatvāl laganaṃ na vidanti parasparam ।
api cetanarūpāṇi suptānīva nirantaram ।। 

suptās svapnajagajjālasvācāravyavahāriṇaḥ ।
asurā nihatā devais te svapnajagati sthitāḥ ।। 

ajñānān na gatā muktiṃ nājāḍyāj jaḍatām itāḥ ।
na dehavantaḥ kiṃ santu vinā svapnajagatsthiteḥ ।। 

suptās svapnajagajjālasvācāravyavahāriṇaḥ ।
puruṣā nihatāḥ puṃbhis te tathaiva vyavasthitāḥ ।। 

evaṃ ye nihatā rāma kiṃ te kurvantu kathyatām ।
ajñatvān na gatā muktiṃ cetanān na dṛṣatsthitāḥ ।। 

sādridyūrvījanaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ sarvaṃ yathāsthitam ।
cirāyānubhavanty ete yatheme vayam ādṛtāḥ ।। 

teṣāṃ kalpajagatsaṃsthā yathāsmākaṃ tathaiva tāḥ ।
asmākaṃ jāgatī saṃsthā yathā teṣāṃ tathaiva ca ।। 

ye teṣāṃ svapnapuruṣās ta eveme vayaṃ sthitāḥ ।
ye ca te rāma saṃsārās tebhya ekam imaṃ viduḥ ।। 

te svapnapuruṣās teṣāṃ satyā evānubhūtitaḥ ।
ātmano api parasyāpi sarvagatvāc cidātmanaḥ ।। 

yathā te svapnapuruṣās satyam ātmany athāpare ।
tavāpi svapnapuruṣās satyam eva tathaiva te ।। 

svasvapnapurapaurā ye tvayā dṛṣṭās tathaiva te ।
sthitās tatra tathādyāpi brahma sarvātmakaṃ yataḥ ।। 

prabodhe api hi vidyante svapnabhāvā yathāsthiti ।
tayā sthityānubhūyante paraṃ brahmatayāthavā ।। 

sarvaṃ sarvātma sarvatra sarvadāsti tathā pare ।
yathā nakiñcid ākāśaṃ na kvacin na ca hanyate ।। 

nirante paramākāśe nirante vedanodaye ।
nirante cittasaṅghāte niranto jagatāṃ gaṇaḥ ।। 

praty ākāśakalākośaṃ prati saṃsāramaṇḍalam ।
prati lokāntarāgāraṃ prati dvīpaṃ giriṃ prati ।। 

prati maṇḍalavistāraṃ prati grāmaṃ puraṃ prati ।
prati jantuṃ prati gṛhaṃ prati varṣaṃ yugaṃ prati ।। 

yāvanto ye mṛtāḥ kecij jīvā mokṣavivarjitāḥ ।
sthitās te tatra tāvantas saṃsārāḥ pṛthag akṣayāḥ ।। 

teṣām antar janās santi janaṃ prati punar janāḥ ।
punar janaṃ prati jagaj jagat prati punar janāḥ ।। 

evam ādyantarahita eṣa dṛśyabhramo bhramaḥ ।
brahmaiva brahmavitpakṣe nātreyattāsti kācana ।। 

kuḍye nabhasy upalake salile sthale antaś cinmātram asti hi yatas tad aśeṣaviśvam ।
tad yatra tatra jagad asti kuto atra saṅkhyā tajjñeṣu tat param athājñamanassu dṛśyam ।। 

jagattattvaikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekaviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataḥ kuvalayollāsimālatī sālilocanā ।
lalanā lalitālokya līlayā lapitā mayā ।। 

kā tvaṃ kamalapattrābhe kimarthaṃ mām upāgatā ।
kasyāsi kiṃ prārthayase kvāgatāsi kimāspadā ।। 

vidyādharī

mune śṛṇu yathāvat tvam ātmodantaṃ vadāmy aham ।
praṣṭum arhasi visrabdham ārtāṃ karuṇayārthinīm ।। 

paramākāśakośasya kasmiṃścit koṇakoṭare ।
yuṣmākaṃ saṃsthitaṃ kiñcid idaṃ tāvaj jagadgṛham ।। 

pātālabhūtalasvargā ihāvavarakās trayaḥ ।
kalpanaikakumāryāntaḥ kṛtā dhātṛtvam āptayā ।। 

tatra dvīpais samudraiś ca valitaṃ valayair iva ।
pātālotthaṃ jagallakṣmyāḥ prakoṣṭham iva bhūtalam ।। 

ante dvīpasamudrāṇāṃ sarvadikkam avasthitā ।
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa hemamayī mahī ।। 

svayamprakāśā saṅkalpaphaladāmbaranirmalā ।
cintāmaṇimayī svacchā svacchāyājitaviṣṭapā ।। 

sāpsaro'marasiddhānāṃ līlāviharaṇāvaniḥ ।
saṅkalpamātrasampannasarvasambhogasundarī ।। 

ante tasyā bhuvaś śailo lokāloko asti viśrutaḥ ।
bhūpīṭhasya prakoṣṭhasya valayāvalanāṃ dadhat ।। 

kvacin nityaṃ tamovyāpto mūḍhabuddher ivāśayaḥ ।
kvacin nityaṃ prakāśātmā manas sattvavatām iva ।। 

kvacid āhlādajanakas sādhūnām iva saṅgamaḥ ।
kvacid udvegajanako mūrkhair iva samāgamaḥ ।। 

kvacit prakaṭasarvārtho mano matimatām iva ।
kvacid atyantagahano mūrkhaśrotriyacittavat ।। 

kvacid aprāptasūryāṃśuḥ kvacit samprāptasūryabhāḥ ।
kvacil lokamayas tena kvacid āśūnyadiktaṭaḥ ।। 

kvacid devapuravyāptaḥ kvacid daityapurānvitaḥ ।
kvacit pātālagahanaḥ kvacic chṛṅgordhvakandaraḥ ।। 

kvacic chvabhrabhramadgṛdhraḥ kvacit sānumanoharaḥ ।
kvacic chṛṅgaśikhākrāntavairiñcanagarāntaraḥ ।। 

kvacic chūnyamahāraṇyavahatkalpāntamārutaḥ ।
kvacit puṣpavanodyānagāyadvidyādharīgaṇaḥ ।। 

kvacit pātālagambhīraguhākumbhāṇḍabhīṣaṇaḥ ।
kvacin nandanasaundaryamunyāśramamanoharaḥ ।। 

kvacid akṣayamattābhraḥ kvacid durlabhavāridaḥ ।
kvacid garbhaguhāśvabhragahanopāntamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

kvacit kṣudrajanākṣepasamutsāditabhūtabhūḥ ।
kvacid vāstavyajanatāsaundaryajitaviṣṭapaḥ ।। 

kvacin nityaṃ vahadvātājñātasthāvarajaṅgamaḥ ।
kvacin mahāmarumarunmattabhāṅkārabhīṣaṇaḥ ।। 

kvacit kvaṇatkamalinīmattasārasabhūṣaṇaḥ ।
kvacit salilakallolajaladollāsaghargharaḥ ।। 

kvacin mattāpsarodolāvilāsajanitasmaraḥ ।
kvacit piśācakumbhāṇḍaceṣṭitāviṣṭadiktaṭaḥ ।। 

kvacid vidyādharīsiddhagītanṛttalasattaṭaḥ ।
kvacid udvarṣadambhodasaridvāhaluṭhattaṭaḥ ।। 

kvacit satatagānītanītanānābhrasatpaṭaḥ ।
kvacit kamalinīkośacakrasthadhyānimaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

kvacit sarvāṅganāsiddhasundarīdattamaṇḍanaḥ ।
kvacit tapaddinakarajanitācārasundaraḥ ।। 

kvacin naiśatamogehanṛttonmattaniśācaraḥ ।
kvacid utpatadutpātatayā naśyajjanāvaniḥ ।। 

kvacit saurājyasampattyā prodbhavatpuramaṇḍalaḥ ।
kvacid atyantaniśśūnyaḥ kvacij janapadāvṛtaḥ ।। 

kvacic chubhrābhragambhīraḥ kvacit pātālabhīṣaṇaḥ ।
kvacid bṛhatkalpataruḥ kvacin nirjalajaṅgalaḥ ।। 

kvacin mahākarikulaḥ kvacin mattaharivrajaḥ ।
kvacin nirbhūtasūdyānaḥ kvacid unmattarākṣasaḥ ।। 

kvacit karañjagahanaḥ kvacit sarvartukānanaḥ ।
kvacid vyomopamasarāḥ kvacid dīrghamarusthalaḥ ।। 

śikhareṣu śilās tasya sāmānyācalasannibhāḥ ।
santi susthitakalpābhrā ratnamayyo ambarāmalāḥ ।। 

kṣīrodajārkagaurīṇāṃ vātaskandhaukasām api ।
viśrāmyanty aniśaṃ yāsu harayo hāriyonayaḥ ।। 

tāsām uttaradigbhāge pūrvaśṛṅgaśilodare ।
nivasāmy aham akṣīṇavajrasārasamatvaci ।। 

vidhinā tatra baddhāsmi naddhāsmy upalayantrakaiḥ ।
atrāsaṅkhyā mune yātā manye yugagaṇā mama ।। 

na kevalam ahaṃ baddhā yāvad bhartāpi tatra me ।
baddhas sāyantane padmakuṭmale ṣaṭpado yathā ।। 

tena sārdhaṃ mayā bhartrā śilākoṭarasaṅkaṭam ।
anubhūtaṃ ciraṃ kālam atra varṣagaṇā gatāḥ ।। 

adyāpy ātmaikadoṣeṇa na hi mokṣaṃ labhāvahe ।
ciraṃ tatraiva tiṣṭhāvas tathaivābaddhabhāvanau ।। 

pāṣāṇasaṅkaṭe tasmin baddhāv āvāṃ na kevalam ।
baddho yāvad aśeṣeṇa parivāro api tatra naḥ ।। 

purāṇaḥ puruṣo vṛddho dvijas tatrāsti me patiḥ ।
ekasthānān na calati jīvaty abdaśatāny asau ।। 

ā bālyād brahmacārī ca śrotriyaḥ pāṭhako alasaḥ ।
ekānta eka evāste ajihmavṛttir acāpalaḥ ।। 

ahaṃ vyasaninī bhāryā tasya vedyavidāṃ vara ।
na nimeṣaṃ samarthāsmi taṃ vinā dehadhāraṇe ।। 

śṛṇu tena kathaṃ brahman bhāryāhaṃ samupārjitā ।
kathaṃ vṛddhim ayaṃ yātas sneho asmākam akṛtrimaḥ ।। 

tena jātena madbhartrā bālenaiva satā purā ।
kiñcijjñena sataikena tiṣṭhatātmālaye amale ।। 

śrotriyatvānurūpeha jāyā me janmaśālinī ।
kutas sambhavatīty eva nirṇīya ciracintayā ।। 

svayam evānavadyāṅgī tena tāmarasekṣaṇā ।
utpāditāsmi nāthena jyotsneva śaśināmalā ।। 

manasā mānasī bhāryā mandārodarasundarī ।
tato vṛddhiṃ prayātāsmi vasanta iva mañjarī ।। 

sahajāmbarasañchannā bhūtānāṃ cittahāriṇī ।
pūrṇendubimbavadanā dyaur ivāmalatārakā ।। 

korakoccastanabharā samagrarasaśālinī ।
latā varavane neva karapallavalāsinī ।। 

sarvasya jantujātasya nityaṃ hṛdayahāriṇī ।
hariṇīhārinayanā madanonmādadāyinī ।। 

līlāvilāsaikaratā helāvalitalocanā ।
geyavādyapriyā nityaṃ navanṛttānurāgiṇī ।। 

saubhāgyabhogaparamā lakṣmyalakṣmyoḥ priyā sakhī ।
ananyā mohajālānām akhinnā sampadāpadoḥ ।। 

na kevalam ahaṃ gehaṃ dhārayāmi dvijanmanaḥ ।
yāvat trailokyasadanam idam aṅga bibharmy aham ।। 

ahaṃ kulakarī bhāryā kalatrabharaṇakṣamā ।
trailokyagṛhasambhāradhāraṇaikabharodvahā ।। 

athāhaṃ taruṇī jātā samudbhinnonnatastanī ।
latollasadguluccheva vilāsarasaśālinī ।। 

patir māṃ dīrghasūtratvāc chrotriyatvāt taporataḥ ।
kayāpy apekṣayādyāpi na vivāhitavān imām ।। 

tena yauvanasampannā vilāsarasaśālinī ।
taṃ vinā vyasanenāhaṃ dahye agnāv iva padminī ।। 

śītalānilalolāsu nalinīṣu nirantaram ।
aṅgadāham avāpnomi pūtāṅgārasthalīṣv iva ।। 

udyānāvalayas sarvāḥ pūrṇāḥ kusumavarṣaṇaiḥ ।
sampannās taptasikatāś śūnyā me marubhūmayaḥ ।। 

jalalolorukalhārakamalotkarakomalāḥ ।
sarasyas sārasārāvasarasā mama nīrasāḥ ।। 

ahaṃ puṣkaramandārakumudotkaramālitā ।
bhṛśaṃ dāham avāpnomi kaṇṭakeṣv iva dolitā ।। 

kumudotpalakalhārakadalītalpapālayaḥ ।
madaṅgasaṅgamād grīṣmamarmarā yānti bhasmatām ।। 

yat kāntam uditaṃ svādu vicitraṃ cittahāri vā ।
tad ālokya bhavāmy antarbāṣpapūrṇāyatekṣaṇā ।। 

vyasanānalasantaptāḥ patanto bāṣpabindavaḥ ।
chamacchamiti majjanti kamalotpalapaṅktiṣu ।। 

kadalīkandalīskandhadolāndolanalīlayā ।
lalitodyānaṣaṇḍeṣu mukham ācchādya rodimi ।। 

tuṣāranikarākīrṇaṃ kadalīdalamaṇḍapam ।
paśyāmy ūṣmāṇam ujjhantaṃ khadirāṅgārabhīṣaṇam ।। 

nalinīnāladolāsu sārasīṃ sārasāśritām ।
dīnānanā vilokyāntar nindāmi nijayauvanam ।। 

ramye rodimi madhyasthe padārthe yāmi somyatām ।
hṛṣyāmy aśobhane dīnā na jāne kim ahaṃ sthitā ।। 

dṛṣṭāni kundamandārakumudāni himāni ca ।
mayā kāmāgnidagdhānāṃ bhasmānīva diśaḥ prati ।। 

ānīlapallavamṛṇālalatotpalānāṃ kalhārakundakadalīdalamālatīnām ।
śayyā mamāṅgavalanena viśoṣayantyā vyarthaṃ gatāni navayauvanavāsarāṇi ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne vidyādharīvyasanavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vidyādharī

atha kālena mahatā so anurāgo virāgatām ।
prāpto mama śaracchāntau virasaḥ pallavo yathā ।। 

vṛddha ekāntarasiko nīrasas snehavarjitaḥ ।
bhartājihmamatir maunī kim anyaj jīvitena me ।। 

varaṃ vaidhavyam ā bālyād varaṃ maraṇam eva vā ।
varaṃ vyādhir athāpad vā nāhṛdyaprakṛtiḥ patiḥ ।। 

etāvaj janmasāphalyaṃ saubhāgyam avikhaṇḍitam ।
rasikaḥ peśalācāro yan nāryās taruṇaḥ patiḥ ।। 

hatā nīrasanāthā strī hatāsaṃskāriṇī ca dhīḥ ।
hatā durjanabhuktā śrīr hatā veśyā hṛtā hriyā ।। 

sā strī yānugatā bhartrā sā śrīr yānugatā satā ।
sā turyā madanodārā sā dhīr yā samadṛṣṭitā ।। 

nādhayo vyādhayo naiva nāpado na durītayaḥ ।
kurvanti manaso bādhāṃ dampatyor anuraktayoḥ ।। 

utphullāḥ kusumasthalyo nandanodyānabhūmayaḥ ।
dhanvāyante kunāthānāṃ vināthānāṃ ca yoṣitām ।। 

sarva eva jagadbhāvā yathecchaṃ guṇaleśataḥ ।
santyajyante anyam ādātuṃ varjayitvā patiṃ striyā ।। 

sthirayauvanayā duḥkhāny etāni munināyaka ।
bhuktāni varṣavṛndāni paśya daurbhāgyajṛmbhitam ।। 

atha krameṇa tenaiva sa rāgo me virāgatām ।
āyayau himadagdhāyā nalinyā iva nīrasaḥ ।। 

virāgavāsanāpāstasarvabhāvānurañjanā ।
tavopadeśenecchāmi mune nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ ।। 

aprāptābhimatārthānām aviśrāntadhiyāṃ pare ।
maraṇair uhyamānānāṃ jīvitān maraṇaṃ varam ।। 

sa madbhartādya nirvāṇam īhamāno divāniśam ।
rājā rājñeva manasā mano jetuṃ prabudhyate ।। 

brahmaṃs tat tasya madbhartur mama cājñānaśāntaye ।
nyāyopapannayā vācā kuru smāraṇam ātmanaḥ ।। 

yadā mām anapekṣyaiva sa madbhartātmani sthitaḥ ।
tadā virāgavairasyam anayan me jagatsthitim ।। 

saṃsāravāsanāveśavarjitāsmi tato avaśam ।
nibadhyābhimatāṃ tīvrāṃ vyomasañcāradhāraṇām ।। 

arjayitvā tayā vyomni gatiṃ dhāraṇayā mayā ।
abhyastā dhāraṇā bhūyas siddhasaṅgaphalapradā ।। 

tatas svajagadākāśapūrvāparanirīkṣayā ।
sthitāhaṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā sāpi me siddhim āgatā ।। 

atha svajagato dṛṣṭvā hṛdayaṃ tasya bāhyagā ।
ahaṃ dṛṣṭavatī sthūlāṃ lokālokaśiraśśilām ।। 

etāvatāpi kālena dampatyor āvayor mune ।
paraṃ draṣṭum abhūd icchā na kācana kadācana ।। 

madbhartā kevalaṃ śuddhavedārthaikāntacintayā ।
na ca yātaṃ na cāyātaṃ vetty aho vigataiṣaṇaḥ ।। 

tenāsau matpatir vidvān api na prāptavān param ।
adya so ahaṃ ca vāñchāvaḥ prayatnena paraṃ padam ।। 

tad etām arthitāṃ brahman saphalīkartum arhasi ।
mahatām arthino vyarthā na kadācana kecana ।। 

bhramantī siddhasenāsu sadā nabhasi mānada ।
tvad ṛte neha paśyāmi ghanājñānabalānalam ।। 

brahman vinaiva karuṇākara kāraṇena santo yato arthijanavāñchitapūraṇāni ।
kurvanti tena śaraṇāgatatām upetāṃ mām arhasīha na tiraskaraṇena yoktum ।। 

vidyādharījanmavyavahārakathanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayoviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athety uktavatī pṛṣṭā sā mayā kalpitāsanā ।
saṅkalpitāsanenāśu sthitena nabhasi sthitā ।। 

kathaṃ śilodare bāle tvadvidhānāṃ bhavet sthitiḥ ।
kathaṃ sañcalanaṃ tatra kimarthaṃ tatra vāspadam ।। 

vidyādharī

mune yathedaṃ bhavatāṃ jagat sphāraṃ virājate ।
tathāsmākaṃ jagat tatra sargasaṃhārayuk sthitam ।। 

yathehemās tathā tatra trailokyasthitayas sthitāḥ ।
vahanti saritas sphārā nivasanty ambare amarāḥ ।। 

sphuranti nāgāḥ pātāle tiṣṭhanty ātmani parvatāḥ ।
āpaś chalacchalāyante vahanti vyomni vāyavaḥ ।। 

arṇavā arṇasā bhānti yānty antaṃ śanakaiḥ prajāḥ ।
bhūtāny ajasraṃ jāyante mriyante avirataṃ tathā ।। 

vānti vātā vahanty āpo bhānti cābhānti khe surāḥ ।
tiṣṭhanty agās samudyanti grahāḥ pānti mahīṃ nṛpāḥ ।। 

devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vyavahāraparamparāḥ ।
lolāḥ pravṛttā ākalpam āsamudram ivāpagāḥ ।। 

dinapadmāni bhūlokasarasy ākalpam ānabhaḥ ।
lolābhrālīni phullāni mīlitonmīlitāny alam ।। 

candraś carcāṃ caturdikkaṃ candanenātmatejasā ।
racayan rātrirohiṇyos tamo hanty api hṛdgatam ।। 

svadaśāsvādanaratā vātayantrapracāritā ।
rodassadmani sūryākhyā dīpyate divi dīpikā ।। 

brahmasaṅkalpito aruddho vātasañcāravāribhiḥ ।
khe aniśaṃ cakram ṛkṣāṇāṃ ghuṇāvarto vivartate ।। 

bhūtataṇḍulam ā sṛṣṭeḥ pinaṣṭi dhruvakīlakaḥ ।
niyatyā cālito rodaḥkavāṭo ambhodaghargharaḥ ।। 

dvīpābdhiśailair bhūpīṭhaṃ vimānanagarair nabhaḥ ।
daityadānavanāgaughaiḥ pūrṇaṃ pātālamaṇḍalam ।। 

kuṇḍalaṃ trijagallakṣmyā nīlaṃ ākāśamaṇḍalam ।
sthitaṃ cañcalam ācāracañcalāyās sphuranmaṇi ।। 

buddhyādirahitāṃ spandasaṃvidaṃ vāyavīm iva ।
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sūkṣmām ādāya jāyate ।। 

munir maunair dharā vārbhir mārutaiḥ kapicāpalam ।
ākāśair avakāśitvaṃ tejobhir bhāsanaṃ śritam ।। 

vṛksorvyabdhyadrikhanṝṇāṃ prāṇino antas sphuranty alam ।
mṛtijanmonmukhāḥ kīṭasurāsurajalaukasaḥ ।। 

sasurāsuragandharvāḥ kālaḥ kalayate prajāḥ ।
dorbhiḥ kalpayugābdaiś śvaś śvaḥ paśūn iva pālakaḥ ।। 

anantavipulāgādhagambhīre kālasāgare ।
utpatyotpatya līyante ṛtvāvartavivṛttayaḥ ।। 

caturdaśavidhā vātavellitā bhūtapāṃsavaḥ ।
nāśākāśe vilīyante śaradambhodalīlayā ।। 

bhuvanaṃ bodhayantī dyauś candrārkakaracāmaraiḥ ।
sthitākāśāṃśukākalpaṃ tārakotkaraśekharā ।। 

sthitāḥ pavanabhūkampameghatāpasahiṣṇavaḥ ।
svaṃ pradeśam anujjhantyaḥ kakubhas stambhitā iva ।। 

utpātameghanirhrādabhūmikampagrahagrahaiḥ ।
ajñātair api vijñātair bhūtānāṃ jñāyate gatiḥ ।। 

saptānāṃ jalam abdhīnām aurvāgniḥ pibati jvalan ।
lokāntarāṇām ākalpaṃ kālo bhūtagaṇaṃ yathā ।। 

pātālam āviśati yāti nabho vilaṅghya diṅmaṇḍalaṃ bhramati bhūtagaṇas samantāt ।
paryeti parvatamahārṇavamaṇḍalāni dvīpāntarāṇi ca marutsaraṇakrameṇa ।। 

vidyādharīśilāntaravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

caturviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vidyādharī

yāvas taṃ sargam āgaccha prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ mune ।
āścaryeṣūpapanneṣu mahānto hy atikautukāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tayety ukte mayā sārdhaṃ gantum ārabdham ambare ।
vātyayā saurabheṇeva śūnye śūnyena śūnyayā ।। 

athāhaṃ dūram adhvānaṃ śūnyam ullaṅghya nābhasam ।
nābhasaṃ bhūtasañcāraṃ tayā sārdham avāptavān ।। 

tam ullaṅghya cireṇātra bhūtasañcāram āmbaram ।
lokālokaśirovyoma prāpto asmi dhavalāmbudam ।। 

uttarāśenduśubhrābhrapīṭhān nirgatya tāṃ śilām ।
ānīto asmi tayottuṅgāṃ taptakāñcanakalpitām ।। 

yāvat paśyāmy ahaṃ śubhrāṃ śilām eva na tajjagat ।
kaladhautamayīm uccair agnilokataṭīm iva ।। 

tadā mayoktā sā kāntā kva bhavatsargabhūr iti ।
kva candrārkāgnitārādi kva lokāntarasaptakam ।। 

kvārṇavākāśakakubhaḥ kvonmajjananimajjane ।
kva mahāmbhodasambhāraḥ kva tārāmbaraḍambaram ।। 

kva śailaśikharaśreṇyaḥ kva mahārṇavabhūmikāḥ ।
kva dvīpāvalayas sapta kva taptakanakāvaniḥ ।। 

kva kāryakālakalanāḥ kva bhūtabhuvanabhramaḥ ।
kva vidyādharagandharvāḥ kva narāmaradānavāḥ ।। 

kvarṣibhūpālamunayaḥ kva nayāpanayakramaḥ ।
kva yāmāyāmayāminyaḥ kva svarganarakabhramaḥ ।। 

kva puṇyapāpakalanāḥ kva kalākālakelayaḥ ।
kvāsurāmaravairāṇi kva dveṣasneharītayaḥ ।। 

vadaty evaṃ mayi vacas sovāca varavarṇinī ।
vismayākulam ālokya śilām alivilocanā ।। 

vidyādharī

paśyāmy akhilam ātmīyam ahaṃ sargam ihopale ।
makurapratibimbasthapurānyapuravat puraḥ ।। 

nityānubhava evātra darśane kāraṇaṃ mama ।
tadabhāvo mune manye te kāraṇam adarśane ।। 

anyo'nyacirakālaikadvaitasaṅkathayānayā ।
śuddhātivāhikaikātmyadehatā vismṛtāvayoḥ ।। 

mamātisucirābhyastam api śyāmalatām iva ।
gataṃ nijaṃ jagad idaṃ yataḥ paśyāmi na sphuṭam ।। 

abhūd yat svajagat pūrvam atiprakaṭam eva me ।
tat paśyāmīdam ādarśa iva bimbitam asphuṭam ।। 

ciravyarthotthayā nāthasaṅkathāvyathayā mithaḥ ।
svāsthyaṃ vismṛtam ātmīyam avadātatamaṃ tatam ।। 

yo abhyāsaḥ prakacaty antaś śuddhacinnabhaso rasāt ।
bhavet tanmayam evāntar ābālam iti lakṣyate ।। 

na tac chāstraṃ na sā siddhir na sa nyāyo na sā kalā ।
asty anastamitodyogād yad abhyāsān na sidhyati ।। 

svajagatsantatābhyāsavaśato māṃ kathābhramaḥ ।
nūnam ākrāntavān eṣa dvayor hi balavāñ jayī ।। 

iṣṭavastvarthināṃ tajjñasūpadiṣṭena karmaṇā ।
paunaḥpuṇyena karaṇān netarac charaṇaṃ mune ।। 

ayam ittham ihājñānabhramaḥ prauḍho ahamātmakaḥ ।
śāmyati jñānacarcābhiḥ paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam ।। 

ajño api tajjñatām eti śanaiś śailo api cūrṇyate ।
ghuṇo apy atti mahāvṛkṣaṃ paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam ।। 

ahaṃ śiṣyābalā bālā paśyāmi tvaṃ na paśyasi ।
sarvajño api śilāsargaṃ paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam ।। 

itthaṃ nāma pariprauḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā ।
śāmyaty eva vicāreṇa paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam ।। 

abhyāsena kaṭudravyaṃ bhavaty abhimataṃ mune ।
anyasmai rocate nimbaṃ tv anyasmai madhu rocate ।। 

abandhau ghanatām eti naikaṭyābhyāsayogataḥ ।
yāty anabhyāsato dūrāt sneho bandhuṣu tānavam ।। 

ātivāhikadeho ayaṃ śuddhacidvyoma kevalam ।
ādhibhautikatām eti bhāvanābhyāsayogataḥ ।। 

ādhibhautikadeho asau dhāraṇābhyāsabhāvanāt ।
vihaṅgavat kham abhyeti paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam ।। 

puṇyāni yānti vaiphalyaṃ vaiphalyaṃ yānti mātaraḥ ।
bhāgyāni yānti vaiphalyaṃ nābhyāsas tu kadācana ।। 

dussādhās siddhim āyānti ripavo yānti mitratām ।
viṣāṇy amṛtatāṃ yānti santatābhyāsayogataḥ ।। 

yenābhyāsaḥ parityakta iṣṭe vastuni so adhamaḥ ।
kadācin na tad āpnoti vandhyā svatanayaṃ yathā ।। 

yad atyabhimataṃ vastu svabhyāso na tadarjanāt ।
tadyuktipūrvakaṃ tyājya ā mṛtyor jīvitaṃ yathā ।। 

iṣṭe vastuni nābhyāsaṃ yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ ।
so aniṣṭāniṣṭam āpnoti narakān narakāntaram ।। 

taranti saritaṃ sphārāṃ saṃsārīṃ sārasevinaḥ ।
ta evātmavicārākhyam abhyāsaṃ na tyajanti ye ।। 

abhyāsabhāso abhimataṃ vastu prakaṭayanty alam ।
prāpayanti ca nirvighnaṃ ghaṭaṃ dīpaprabhā yathā ।। 

yathā kalpadrumalatās sucintāmaṇayo yathā ।
phalanti śaradaś caitās tathaivābhyāsabhūmayaḥ ।। 

iṣṭavastu cirābhyāsabhāsvān bhāsayati prajāḥ ।
tathendriyākhyāṃ dehorvyāṃ rātriṃ paśyanti no yathā ।। 

sarvasya jantujātasya sarvavastvavabhāsane ।
sarvadaivaika evoccair jayaty abhyāsabhāskaraḥ ।। 

caturdaśavidhāyās tu bhūtajāter na kasyacit ।
sidhyaty abhimataṃ vastu vinābhyāsam akṛtrimam ।। 

paunaḥpuṇyena karaṇam abhyāsa iti kathyate ।
puruṣārthas sa eveha tenāsti na vinā gatiḥ ।। 

dṛḍhābhyāsavidhānena yatnanāmnā svakarmaṇā ।
nijavedanajenaiva siddhir bhavati nānyathā ।। 

abhyāsabhāsvati tapaty avanau vane ca vīrasya sidhyati na yan na tad asti kiñcit ।
abhyāsato bhuvi bhayāny abhayībhavanti sarvāsu parvataguhāsv api nirjanāsu ।। 

abhyāsapraśaṃsā nāma sargaḥ

pañcaviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vidyādharī

tataḥ pratīpam abhyāsaṃ bodhe dhāraṇayāmale ।
kurvaḥ prakaṭatāṃ tena jagad eṣyati śailagam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yuktiyukte tayety ukte vidyādharyā dharopari ।
baddhapadmāsano athāhaṃ samādhāv udito abhavam ।। 

sarvārthabhāvanātyāge cinmātraikāntabhāvitaḥ ।
atyajaṃ tam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kathārthakalanāmalam ।। 

atha cidvyomatāṃ prāptaḥ parāṃ dṛṣṭim ahaṃ gataḥ ।
śaratsamayasamprāptau vyoma nirmalatām iva ।। 

tatas satyāvadhānaikaghanābhyāsena dehake ।
mamādhibhautikabhrāntir nūnam astam upāgatā ।। 

udayāstamayonmuktā satatodayamayy api ।
mahācidvyomatā svacchā proditeva tadābhavat ।। 

atha paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvat khasyaivopalateva sā ।
vastutaś ca na cākāśaṃ nopalaḥ param eva tat ।। 

paramārthaghanaṃ svacchaṃ tat tathābhāvi tādṛśam ।
tathābhāvanayā svātmā madīyo dṛṣṭavāṃs tathā ।। 

yathā svapne sumahatī dṛṣṭā gehagatā śilā ।
vyomaiva kevalaṃ tadvat sā śuddhaṃ cinnabhaś śilā ।। 

svayaṃ svapnānvito anyasya svapnapuṃstvaṃ gato naraḥ ।
svapne ajñānaprabuddhasya yādṛk tādṛk sa sūpalaḥ ।। 

svapnasthānāṃ śiraś chinnaṃ yeṣāṃ te saṃsṛtau sthitāḥ ।
kālena jñānalābhena vinā kurvanti kiṃ kila ।। 

bodhaḥ kālena bhavati mahāmohavatām api ।
tasmān na kiñcid apy asti brahmatattvād ṛte akṣayam ।। 

atas tac cidghanaṃ svacchaṃ brahmākāśaṃ śilākṛti ।
dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tathā tatra na tu pṛthvyādi sat kvacit ।। 

bhūtānām ādisarge yac chuddhaṃ yat pāramārthikam ।
vapus tad evādya teṣāṃ dhyānalabhyam avasthitam ।। 

brāhmaṃ vapur hi bhūtānām ātmīyaṃ yat purātanam ।
tad evādya manorājyaṃ saṅkalpa iti kathyate ।। 

sa ātivāhiko dehas tat paraṃ paramārthataḥ ।
pratyakṣaṃ prathamaṃ tat tat tad ādyaṃ kacanaṃ citaḥ ।। 

tad yat prathamam adhyakṣaṃ jīvasya prathamaṃ vapuḥ ।
manaḥpratyakṣam ity uktaṃ tat tenaivādya durdhiyā ।। 

yogipratyakṣam ity uktaṃ manaḥpratyakṣam ity api ।
tat svam eva citā rūpaṃ gatayevānyatāṃ mudhā ।। 

idam adyatanaṃ nāma pratyakṣam asadutthitam ।
asatpratyakṣam eveti viddhi pratyakṣam aṅga tat ।। 

aho nu citrā māyā yat prākpratyakṣe parokṣatā ।
nirṇītāsmiṃs tv anadhyakṣe pratyakṣakalanādṛtā ।। 

ātivāhikadehitvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prathamoditam ।
satyaṃ sarvagataṃ viddhi māyaiva tv ādhibhautikam ।। 

anubhūtāpi nāsty eva hemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā ।
tathātivāhikasyādhibhautikatvaṃ na vidyate ।। 

bhramam abhramatāṃ yātam abhramaṃ bhramatāṃ gatam ।
vetti jīvo vicāreṇa vināho nu vimūḍhatā ।। 

ādhibhautikadeho ayaṃ vicāreṇa na labhyate ।
ātivāhikadehas tu kila lokadvaye akṣayaḥ ।। 

ādhibhautikacid rūḍhā svātivāhikadehake ।
marau marīcikāsv eva yathā mithyaiva vāridhīḥ ।। 

jātādhibhautikī saṃvid ātivāhikavitkrame ।
dehadṛṣṭivaśāt prauḍhā sthāṇau puruṣadhīr iva ।। 

śuktau rajatatā tāpe jalatendau yathā dvitā ।
ādhibhautikatā tadvan manojaivātivāhike ।। 

yad asat tat kṛtaṃ satyaṃ yat satyaṃ tad asat kṛtam ।
aho nu mohamāhātmyaṃ jīvasyāsyāvicārajam ।। 

yogipratyakṣam evāsti kiñcid asti tu mānasam ।
yasmāl lokadvayācāras tābhyām eva prasidhyati ।। 

ādyaṃ pratyakṣam utsṛjya yo asatye asmin kṛtasthitiḥ ।
pratyakṣe mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu pītvā sa sukham āsthitaḥ ।। 

tat sukhaṃ duḥkham evāhuḥ kṣaṇanāśānubhūtitaḥ ।
akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ yat sukhaṃ tat sukhaṃ viduḥ ।। 

pratyakṣeṇaivam adhyakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravicāryatām ।
yad ādyaṃ yat sad adhyakṣaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyatām ।। 

lokadvayānubhavadaṃ tyaktvā pratyakṣam aihikam ।
māyātmakaṃ yo gṛhṇāti nāsti mūḍhatamas tataḥ ।। 

ātivāhikam evaiṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ vidyate vapuḥ ।
tatrādhibhautikabhrāntir asatyaiva piśācikā ।। 

ajātasaṅkalpamayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sat kathaṃ bhavet ।
svayam eva na yat satyaṃ tat satkāryakaraṃ katham ।। 

yatra pratyakṣam evāsad anyat kiṃ tatra sad bhavet ।
kva tat siddhaṃ bhaved vastu yad asiddhena sādhyate ।। 

pratyakṣa eva bhāvatve naṣṭe kvevānumādayaḥ ।
uhyante vāraṇā yatra tatrorṇāyuṣu kā kathā ।। 

ataḥ pramāṇasaṃsiddher dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva kutracit ।
anyad yad idam astīva tat tad brahmaghanaṃ ghanam ।। 

svapne draṣṭuḥ kham evādrir gehe nānyasya vai yathā ।
tathā tadbhāvanavator āvayos sā śilaiva cit ।। 

ayaṃ śaila idaṃ vyoma jagad etad idaṃ tv aham ।
iti cinmaya ātmāntaḥ khaṃ camatkurute svayam ।। 

paśyaty etat prabuddhātmā nāprabuddhaḥ kadācana ।
śrotuḥ kathārthasaṃvittir nāśrotur bhavati kvacit ।। 

aprabuddhamater bhrāntir eveyaṃ satyatāṃ gatā ।
kṣīvasya susthitā eva nṛtyanti taruparvatāḥ ।। 

sarvatrāpratihatarūpam ekabodhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ śivam avabudhya citsvarūpam ।
pratyakṣāntaram iha pelavaṃ śrayante ye mūḍhās tṛṇatanubhiś śaṭhair alaṃ taiḥ ।। 

pramāṇaparisiddhyā dṛśyānupapattivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaḍviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

jagadaṅgam anābhāsam adṛśyaṃ dṛśyavat sthitam ।
parayā dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā tad brahmaiva nirāmayam ।। 

tatra śailasaritsrotolokalokāntarabhramāḥ ।
bhānti te paramādarśe mahāvyomani bimbitāḥ ।। 

sā praviṣṭā tatas sargam anargalam aceṣṭitā ।
aham apy aviśaṃ tatra saṅkalpena tayā saha ।। 

yāvat sā tatra vairiñcaṃ lokam āsādya sodyamā ।
upaviṣṭā viriñcasya puraḥ paramaśobhanā ।। 

vidyādharī

vaktavyo muniśārdūla patir me pāti mām imām ।
vivāhārtham anenāhaṃ janitājarasā purā ।। 

purāṇaḥ puruṣo apy eṣa mām adyāpi jarāṃ gatām ।
na vivāhitavāṃs tena virāgam aham āgatā ।। 

virāgam eṣo apy āyāto gantum icchati tat padam ।
yatra na draṣṭṛtā naiva dṛśyatā na ca śūnyatā ।। 

mahāpralayasampanne jagaty asmiṃś ca samprati ।
dhyānāc ca na calaty eṣa śailamaunād ivācalaḥ ।। 

tasmān mām enam api ca bodhayitvā munīśvara ।
āmahākalpasargādau parame pathi yojaya ।। 

ity uktvā mām asau tasya bodhāyedam uvāca ha ।
nāthāyaṃ muninātho nas sadma samprāptavān idam ।। 

eṣo anyasmiñ jagadgehe brahmaṇas tanayo muniḥ ।
pūjayainaṃ gṛhāyātaṃ gṛhasthagṛhapūjayā ।। 

budhyatām arghyapādyena pūjyatāṃ munipuṅgavaḥ ।
mahan mahatsaparyā hi mahātmabhyo abhirocate ।। 

tayety ukte mahābuddhir bubudhe sa samādhitaḥ ।
svasaṃvittidravātmatvād āvarta iva vāridhau ।। 

śanair unmīlayām āsa nayane nayakovidaḥ ।
madhuś śiśirasaṃśāntāv avanau kusume yathā ।। 

śanaiḥ prakaṭayām āsus tāny aṅgāny asya saṃvidam ।
madhoḥ pallavajālāni navānīva navaṃ rasam ।। 

surasiddhāpsarassaṅghās samājagmus samantataḥ ।
yathā haṃsālayo lolāḥ prātar vikasitaṃ saraḥ ।। 

dadarśāsau puraḥ prāptaṃ māṃ ca tāṃ ca vilāsinīm ।
uvācātha vaco vandyaḥ praṇavasvarasundaram ।। 

anyajagadbrahmā

karāmalakavaddṛṣṭasaṃsārāsārasāra he ।
jñānāmṛtamahāmbhodhe mune svāgatam astu te ।। 

padavīm asi samprāpta imām atidavīyasīm ।
dūrādhvasu pariśrānta idam āsanam āsyatām ।। 

ity ukte tena bhagavann abhivādaya ity aham ।
vadan maṇimaye pīṭhe niviṣṭo dṛṣṭidarśite ।। 

athāmararṣigandharvamunividyādharoditāḥ ।
prastutās stutayaḥ pūjā natayas sthitinītayaḥ ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa sarvabhūtagaṇotthite ।
śānte prakṛtasaṃrambhe tasyoktaṃ brahmaṇo mayā ।। 

kim idaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa yad iyaṃ mām upāgatā ।
vakti jñānagirāsmāṃs tvaṃ bodhayeti prayatnataḥ ।। 

bhavān bhūteśvaro devas sakalajñānapāragaḥ ।
iyaṃ ca kā mama ca kiṃ brūte brūhi bṛhaddyute ।। 

katham eṣā tvayā deva jāyārthaṃ janitā satī ।
neha jāyāpadaṃ nītā nītā virasatāṃ punaḥ ।। 

anyajagadbrahmā

mune śṛṇu yathāvṛttam idaṃ te kathayāmy aham ।
yathāvṛttam aśeṣeṇa kathanīyaṃ yatas satām ।। 

asti tāvad ajaṃ śāntam ajaraṃ kiñcid eva sat ।
tataś citkacanaikāntarūpiṇaḥ kacito asmy aham ।। 

ākāśarūpa evāhaṃ sthita ātmani sarvadā ।
bhaviṣyati sthite sarge svayambhūr iti nāma me ।। 

vastutas tu na jāto asmi na ca naśyāmi kiñcana ।
cidākāśaś cidākāśe tiṣṭhāmy aham anāvṛtaḥ ।। 

yad ayaṃ tvaṃ mamāhaṃ te yad idaṃ kathanaṃ mithaḥ ।
tat taraṅgas taraṅgāgre raṇaty eveti me matiḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpasya me kālavaśato viśadākṛteḥ ।
saukumāryāc cidābhāsamātrasyāntas svabhāvataḥ ।। 

mamānanyā tavānyasya cānyeveha vibhāti yā ।
soditānuditaivāntar mamāham iti vāsanā ।। 

anāśasattāmuditas tv aham ātmani saṃsthitaḥ ।
svabhāvād acyutākāras svātmārāmas svayaṃprabhaḥ ।। 

tasyā aham iti bhrānter vāsanāyā jagatsthiteḥ ।
sampanneyam adhiṣṭhātṛdevatā deharūpiṇī ।। 

vāsanāyā adhiṣṭhātṛdevataivam iyaṃ sthitā ।
na tu me gṛhiṇī nāpi gṛhiṇyarthena matkṛtā ।। 

svavāsanāveśavaśena bhāvaṃ gṛhiṇy ahaṃ brahmaṇa ity upetya ।
eṣā svayaṃ vyartham itātiduḥkhaṃ yasmāt kilaiṣaiva hi vāsanāntaḥ ।। 

sargāntaraprāptir nāma sargaḥ

saptaviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

anyajagadbrahmā

adyāhaṃ cinmayākāśas tv anyākāśamayīṃ sthitim ।
parāṃ grahītum icchāmi tenehopasthitaḥ kṣayaḥ ।। 

mahāpralayakāle asmiṃs tyaktum eṣā mayādhunā ।
munīndra nūnam ārabdhā tena vairasyam āgatā ।। 

ākāśatvād yadādyāyaṃ parākāśo bhavāmy aham ।
tadā mahāpralayatā vāsanāyāś ca saṅkṣayaḥ ।। 

tenaiṣā virasībhūtā manmārgam abhidhāvati ।
nānugacchati ko nāma nirmātāram udāradhīḥ ।। 

ihādyāyaṃ kaler antaś caturyugaviparyayaḥ ।
prajāmanvindradevānām adyaivānto ayam āgataḥ ।। 

adyaiva cāyaṃ kalpānto mahākalpānta eva ca ।
mamāyaṃ vāsanānto adya dehavyomānta eva ca ।। 

teneyaṃ vāsanā brahman kṣayaṃ gantuṃ samudyatā ।
kveva padmākarāśoṣe gandhalekhāvatiṣṭhatām ।। 

yathā jalābdhilekhāyā jāyate laharī calā ।
vāsanāyās tathaivecchā mudhodety apakāraṇam ।। 

ābhimānikadehāyā vāsanāyās svabhāvataḥ ।
asyā ātmāvalokecchā svayam evopajāyate ।। 

ātmatattvaṃ tv apaśyantyā dhāraṇābhyāsayogataḥ ।
dṛṣṭo anayā bhavatsargo vargavyagrānirargalaḥ ।। 

anayāmbarasañcāraparayādriśiraśśilā ।
dṛṣṭā svajagadādhārabhūtāsmākaṃ tu khātmikā ।। 

etad asmajjagad yatra tad dṛṣat tvajjagadgirau ।
asmajjagatpadārtheṣu santy anyāni jaganty api ।। 

vayaṃ tāni na paśyāmo bhedadṛṣṭau sthitā ime ।
bodhaikatāṃ gatās tv āśu paśyāmas tāni vīkṣaṇāt ।। 

ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye khe anile ambhasi tejasi ।
jaganti santi sarvatra śilāyām iva sarvadā ।। 

jagan nāma mudhābhrāntiḥ kila svapnapuropamā ।
mithyaiveyaṃ kva nāmāsau cidrūpāsty atha nāsti vā ।। 

parijñātā satī yeṣāṃ saiṣā cinnabhasaikatām ।
gatā te na vimuhyanti śiṣṭās tu bhramabhājanam ।। 

athānyadhāraṇābhyāsāt svavirāgavaśoditam ।
sādhayantyārtham ātmīyaṃ dṛṣṭas tvam anayā mune ।। 

iti māyeva duṣpārā cicchaktiḥ parijṛmbhate ।
iyam ādyantarahitā brāhmī śaktir anāmayā ।। 

pravartante nivartante neha kāryāṇi kānicit ।
dravyakālakriyoddyotā citis tapati kevalam ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyamanobuddhyādikaṃ tv idam ।
cicchilāṅgakam evaikaṃ viddhy anastamayodayam ।। 

cid eveyaṃ śilākāram iva tiṣṭhati bibhratī ।
aṅgam asyā jagajjālaṃ marutas spandanaṃ yathā ।। 

vijñānaghanam ātmānaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate ।
anādyantāpi sādyantaṃ cittvād atigatāpi cit ।। 

cicchileyam anādyantā sādyantāsmīti bodhataḥ ।
sākārāpi nirākārā jagadaṅgeti saṃsthitā ।। 

yadvat svapne cid eva svaṃ rūpaṃ vyomaiva pattanam ।
vetti tadvad iyaṃ vetti pāṣāṇaṃ jagadaṅgakam ।। 

na sarantīha sarito na cakraṃ parivartate ।
nārthāḥ pariṇamanty antaḥ kacaty etac cidambaram ।। 

na mahākalpakalpāntasaṃvidas saṃvidambare ।
sambhavanti pṛthagrūpāḥ payasīva payo'ntaram ।। 

jaganti santy eva na santi śānte cidambare sarvagataikamūrtau ।
nabho'ntarāṇīva mahānabho'ntaś cet santi tat tāni parāmbarāṇi ।। 

vasiṣṭha tad gaccha mune jagat svaṃ tvaṃ vāsane samprati śāntim ehi ।
buddhyādirūpāṇi paraṃ vrajantu vayaṃ bṛhadbrahmapadaṃ vrajāmaḥ ।। 

śilāntarjagatpitāmahavākyāni nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā bhagavān brahmā brahmalokajanais saha ।
baddhapadmāsano anantasamādhānagato abhavat ।। 

oṅkārordhvārdhamātrāntaś śāntaniśśeṣamānasaḥ ।
lipikarmārpitākāra āsīd āśāntavedanaḥ ।। 

tam evānusarantī sā tathaiva dhyānagā satī ।
vāsanāsīd aśeṣāśāśāntā vākāśarūpiṇī ।। 

parameṣṭhiny asaṅkalpe tasmiṃs tānavam īyuṣi ।
sarvagānantacidvyomarūpo apaśyam ahaṃ tadā ।। 

yāvat saṅkalpanaṃ tasya virasībhavati kṣaṇāt ।
yathaivāśu tathaivorvyās sādridvīpapayonidheḥ ।। 

tṛṇagulmalatāśālisamudbhavanaśaktatā ।
samastaivāstam āgantum ārabdhā sā śanaiś śanaiḥ ।। 

kila tasya virāḍātmarūpasyāṅgaikadeśatām ।
sā bibharti mahī tena tadasaṃvedanodayāt ।। 

vicetanā sā virasā babhūva parijarjarā ।
mārgaśīrṣāntavallīva jarāvidhuratāṃ gatā ।। 

yathāsmākam asaṃvitter aṅgālī virasā bhavet ।
tathā viriñcāsaṃvitter dharā vaidhuryam āgatā ।। 

sampannasaṃhatānekamahotpātabharāvṛtā ।
duṣkṛtāṅgāranirdagdhanarakonmuktamānavā ।। 

durbhikṣākāṇḍadaussthityadainyadāridryadurbhagā ।
duśśīlāśeṣavanitānirmaryādanarāvṛtā ।। 

pāṃsupratardanīhāradhūlidhūsarasūryabhāk ।
dvandvimūrkhamahāduḥkhavyasanivyādhitākulā ।। 

agnidāhajalāpūrayuddhaprocchinnamaṇḍalā ।
avṛṣṭyavagrahonnaṣṭakaṣṭaceṣṭitapāmarā ।। 

aśaṅkitamahotpātapatatparvatapattanā ।
śiśuśrotriyapuṇyāryaguṇināśarudajjanā ।। 

aśaṅkitasthalīmadhyasañjātāgādhakūpakā ।
varṇasaṅkaranārīṇām āsaktajanabhūmipā ।। 

aṭṭaśīlākhilajanā śavaśīlacatuṣpathā ।
keśaikaśīlavanitā pānaśīlajaneśvarā ।। 

duḥkhaśīlasamācārā dvandvaśīlākhilaprajā ।
adharmaśīlavanitā kuśāstraśataśīlinī ।। 

durjanākhilavittāḍhyā vipadvihatasajjanā ।
anāryavasudhāpālā tadanādṛtapaṇḍitā ।। 

lobhamohabhayadveṣarāgarogarajoratā ।
agamyagāmipuruṣā ruṣābhihatasaddvijā ।। 

anārataghanākrandaparāparyantapāmarā ।
dasyūtsannapuragrāmadevadvijasamāśrayā ।। 

āpātamadhurārambhaduḥkhadodarkabhaṅgurā ।
ālasyollāsavilasatkāryavaidhuryadharmiṇī ।। 

sarvāpadupatāpārtā krameṇotsannadiggaṇā ।
bhasmaśeṣapuragrāmā nirjanākhilamaṇḍalā ।। 

rorūyamāṇabhasmābhrakuṇḍaloḍḍāmarāmbarā ।
durbhagāḍambarārambharodanoruravodarī ।। 

muṣṭipramāṇajanatā janatāpānuṣaṅgiṇī ।
nīrasāśeṣadeśāntā sarvartuguṇavarjitā ।। 

ity asya pārthive dhātau brahmaṇo gatavedane ।
pṛthivī pṛthuvaidhuryā sampannāsannanāśataḥ ।। 

atha tatsaṃvidunmukto jaladhātuḥ kṣayonmukhaḥ ।
yadā vikṣubhitātmāsīt tadā niyatilaṅghinaḥ ।। 

samutsāryāryamaryādām arṇavā vivṛtārṇasaḥ ।
pravṛttā vikṛtiṃ gantum unmattā iva rāviṇaḥ ।। 

vīcivikṣobhavinyāsair velāvipinalāvakāḥ ।
kallolavalanāvartavivartodvartitādrayaḥ ।। 

śīkaraughamahārambhaghanasaṃvalitācalāḥ ।
calācalavaladvīramakarāghūrṇitāntarāḥ ।। 

ullalanmakarākrāntadrumakānanitodarāḥ ।
darīvidāraṇabhraṣṭasiṃhāhatajalecarāḥ ।। 

utphālamakaracchinnanabhaścarabṛhadghanāḥ ।
parasparormisaṅghaṭṭaḍākkārakaṭuṭāṅkṛtāḥ ।। 

tarattaraṅgamātaṅgaphūtkārādhautabhāskarāḥ ।
anyo'nyavellanavyagrapravidīrṇādribhittayaḥ ।। 

taṭaparvataluṇṭhākataraṅgakaramaṇḍalāḥ ।
garjadgiridarīgehaviśadunmattavārayaḥ ।। 

bhūpāḥ parapurākrāntau lagnā iva hatārayaḥ ।
tārāravaraṇadrīḍhāvidrāvitanabhaścarāḥ ।। 

praluṇṭhitavanavyūhalūnakānanitāmbarāḥ ।
sapakṣaparvatākārataraṅgāpūritāmbarāḥ ।। 

mahāravamarudbhinnakalolācalacālitāḥ ।
cañcattīragirivrātapatattaṭaraṭajjalāḥ ।। 

ullaladvipulāvartaprotkṣiptamakarotkarāḥ ।
nimajjannistalāvartanigīrṇagirikandarāḥ ।। 

darīdalanasamprāptadṛṣaddaśanadanturāḥ ।
śṛṅgalambidarīprotamagnavīcijalebhakāḥ ।
vyālolavalanākrāntaviṭapiprotakacchapāḥ ।। 

yamendravasudhāvāhair utkarṇair bhayavihvalaiḥ ।
śrūyamāṇapatacchailataṭīkaṭakaṭāravāḥ ।। 

matsyapucchacchaṭācchinnamagnonmagnadrutādrayaḥ ।
nīlālūnavanavyūhaśevālāśāravārayaḥ ।। 

prajvaladvaḍavāvahnijvālācalamilajjalāḥ ।
svarasena vibhor nāśe viśantīva mahānalam ।। 

milacchikharimātaṅgajalamātaṅgayodhinaḥ ।
nṛtyantīva taraṅgaughair jalāvalanavedhinaḥ ।। 

jalācalācalānyo'nyasaṅghaṭṭāsphoṭapaṇḍitāḥ ।
vahadgirivanavrātaprāṇimaṇḍalamaṇḍitāḥ ।। 

uḍḍāmararavebhendrabherīrasanabhāsuraiḥ ।
āsurair iva pātālāḥ kallolair alam ākulāḥ ।। 

athodapatad unnāsadiṅnāgavadanadhvaniḥ ।
pātālatalatālvantarvisphoṭāmoṭanodbhaṭaḥ ।। 

cañcalācalakīlorvī cacāla jalacālitā ।
lolaśevālavallīva vyālolāmbhodhilaṅghitā ।। 

atha durvāranirghoṣanirghātāḍambarānvitā ।
pusphoṭeva patantīva dyaur diśām amarāravaiḥ ।। 

āvartavalanākārāḥ ketavaḥ petur ambarāt ।
hemaratnamahīmuktās sindūrabhujagā iva ।। 

kakubbhyo nabhaso bhūmer udagur dagdhadiktaṭāḥ ।
valajjvālājaṭāṭopā vividhotpātapaṅktayaḥ ।। 

pṛthvyādīny amarādīni brahmonmuktāni sarvataḥ ।
dvividhāni mahābhūtāny alaṃ saṅkṣobham āyayuḥ ।। 

candrārkānilaśakrāgnilokā halahalākulāḥ ।
paripātaparā āsan brahmalokagateśvarāḥ ।। 

kampaiḥ kaṭakaṭārāvaiḥ patatpādapapaṅktayaḥ ।
bhūmer anvabhavan bhūridolāndolanam adrayaḥ ।। 

bhūkampalolakailāsamerumandarakandarāḥ ।
petuḥ kalpatarūnmuktaratnastabakavṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

lokāntarādripuravāridhikānanānām utpātakalpapavanena mitho hatānām ।
kolāhalair jagad abhūt pravikīrṇaśīrṇaṃ pūrṇārṇave tripurapūra ivābhipātī ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne kalpakṣobho nāma sargaḥ

ekonatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athākṛṣṭavati prāṇān svayambhuvi nabhobhuvaḥ ।
virāḍātmani tatyāja vātaskandhasthitiṃ sthirām ।। 

te hi tasya kila prāṇās tenākrānteṣu teṣv api ।
ṛkṣacakrasthitiṃ ko anyaś cakre bhūtaikadhāriṇīm ।। 

vātaskandhe samākrānte brahmaṇā prāṇamārute ।
śamaṃ gantuṃ parityajya saṃsthitiṃ kṣobham āgate ।। 

nirādhārās savātāgnideholmukavad āpatan ।
vyomnas tārās taroḥ puṣpanikarā iva bhūtale ।। 

kālapākagalanmūlā jagatṣaṇḍaphalādayaḥ ।
praśāntapavanādhārā vimānāvalayo apatan ।। 

praśamonmukhatāṃ yāte brāhme saṅkalpanendhane ।
siddhānāṃ gatayaś śemur iddhānām arciṣām iva ।। 

prabhramantyo ambare kalpamārutais tanutūlavat ।
svaśaktyapacaye mūkās siddhasantatayo apatan ।। 

sakalpadrumajālāni sendrādinagarāṇi ca ।
petur bhūkampalolasya śirāṃsy amarabhūbhṛtaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

vakṣi saṅkalpamātrātmā virāḍ brahmā jagadvapuḥ ।
kim aṅgaṃ tasya bhūlokaḥ kiṃ svargaḥ kiṃ rasātalam ।। 

katham etāni cāṅgāni brahmaṃs tasya sthitāni vā ।
kathaṃ vā so antare tasya svasyaiva vapuṣas sthitaḥ ।। 

brahmā saṅkalpamātrātmā nirākṛtir idaṃ sthitam ।
jagad ity eva jāto me niścayaḥ kathayetarat ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ādau tāvad idaṃ nāsan na sad āste nirāmayam ।
cinmātraparamākāśam āśākośaikapūrakam ।। 

tat svām ākāśatāṃ caitac cetyam ity avabudhyate ।
svarūpam ajahan nityaṃ cittvād bhavati cetanam ।। 

viddhi tvaṃ cetanaṃ jīvaṃ sa ghanatvān manas sthitam ।
etāvati sthite jāle na kiñcit sākṛti sthitam ।। 

śuddhaṃ vyomaiva cidvyoma sthitam ātmani pūrvavat ।
yad etat pratibhātaṃ tu tad ananyac chivāt tataḥ ।। 

atha tan mana ābhogi bhāvitāhaṅkṛti sphurat ।
saṅkalpātmakam ākāśam āste timitam avyayam ।। 

tat saṅkalpacidābhāsanabho aham iti bhāvitam ।
asantam evānubhavat sanniveśaṃ kham eva khe ।। 

vetti bhāvitam ātmānaṃ paśyaty anubhavaty api ।
saṅkalpakātmakaṃ śūnyam eva deha iti sthitam ।। 

śūnyam eva yathākāri saṅkalpanagaraṃ bhavān ।
paśyaty evam ajo dehaṃ khe kham evānubhūtavān ।। 

saṃvido nirmalatvāt sa yāvadicchaṃ tathāvidham ।
anubhūyānubhavanaṃ svecchayaivopaśāmyati ।। 

yadā tv atra parijñānam asmadādes tadātatam ।
idaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ viddhi śūnyaṃ satyam iva sthitam ।। 

yathābhūtaparijñānād atra śāmyati vāsanā ।
advaitān nirahaṅkārāt tato mokṣo avaśiṣyate ।। 

evam eṣa sa yo brahmā sa evedaṃ jagat sthitam ।
virājo brahmaṇo rāma deho yas tad idaṃ jagat ।। 

saṅkalpākāśarūpasya tasya yā bhrāntir utthitā ।
tad idaṃ jagad ābhāti tad brahmāṇḍam udāhṛtam ।। 

sarvam ākāśam evedaṃ saṅkalpakalanātmakam ।
vastutas tv asti na jagat tvattāmatte ca na kvacit ।। 

kva cinmātre amale vyomni kathaṃ vā kena vā jagat ।
kiṃ jāyate kim atrāsti kāraṇaṃ sahakāri yat ।। 

ato alīkam idaṃ jātam alīkaṃ paridṛśyate ।
alīkaṃ svadate alīkam eva naśyati śūnyakam ।। 

jagadādikayā bhāsā cinmātraṃ svadate svataḥ ।
ātmanātmāmbare dvaitaṃ spandaneneva mārutaḥ ।। 

idaṃ kiñcin nakiñcid vā dvaitādvaitavivarjitam ।
cidākāśaṃ jagad viddhi śūnyam acchaṃ nirāmayam ।। 

śāntāśeṣaviśeṣo ahaṃ tena rāghava saṃsthitaḥ ।
sann evāsann ivātas tvam evam evāssva nirmamaḥ ।। 

nirvāsanaś śāntamanā maunī vigatacāpalaḥ ।
sarvaṃ kuru yathāprāptaṃ kuru vā mātra kiṃ grahaḥ ।। 

anādinityānubhavo ya ekas sa eva dṛśyaṃ na tu dṛśyam anyat ।
satyānubhūter anubhūtayo yās suvistṛtā dṛśyamahādṛśas tāḥ ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne nirvāṇaṃ nāma sargaḥ

triṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

bandhamokṣajagadbuddhir na śūnyā nāpi sanmayī ।
nāstam eti na codeti kim apy ādyam asau kila ।। 

upadiṣṭam idaṃ brahmaṃs tvayā buddham alaṃ mayā ।
bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me amṛtam ।। 

sargādisambhramadṛśaś śūnyatādidṛśas tathā ।
na kāścana vibho satyā asatyā na ca kāścana ।। 

evaṃ sthite tu yat satyaṃ tat sarvaṃ buddhavān aham ।
tathāpi bhūyo bodhāya sargānubhava ucyatām ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ deśakālakriyādimat ।। 

tasya nāśe mahānāśe mahāpralayanāmani ।
brahmopendramarudrudramahendrapariṇāmini ।। 

śiṣyate śāntam atyacchaṃ kim apy ajam anādimat ।
yato vāco nivartante kim anyad avagamyate ।। 

sarṣapāpekṣayā merur yathātivitatākṛtiḥ ।
tathākāśam api sthūlaṃ śūnyaṃ sad yadapekṣayā ।। 

amāne akalite somye akāle apariṇate ciram ।
śānte tasmin pare vyomany ādye hy anubhavātmani ।।
