asaṅkalpo mahāśānto dikkālair amitākṛtiḥ ।
antar mahāṃś cidākāśo vettīva paramāṇutām ।। 

asatyām eva tām antar bhāvayan svapnavat svataḥ ।
tatas sa brahmaśabdārthāṃ vetti cidrūpatāṃ tatām ।। 

vidbhāvo anubhavaty antaś cittvāc cidaṇutāṃ nijām ।
tām eva paśyatīvātha tato draṣṭeva tiṣṭhati ।। 

yathā svapne mṛtiṃ paśyaty eka evātmanātmanaḥ ।
mṛta eva mṛter draṣṭā tathā cidaṇur ātmani ।। 

tataś cidbhāva eṣo antar eka eva dvitām iva ।
paśyan kharūpa evāste draṣṭṛdṛśyam iva sthitaḥ ।। 

cidbhāvaś śūnya evātinirākāro apy aṇuṃ tanum ।
paśyan dṛśyam ivodeti draṣṭeva ca tadā dvitā ।। 

prakāśam aṇum ātmānaṃ paśyaṃs tadanubhāvataḥ ।
ucchūnatāṃ cetayate bījam aṅkuratām iva ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyadraṣṭṛdarśanadṛgdṛśaḥ ।
arthāntarasvabhāvena tiṣṭhanty anuditābhidhāḥ ।। 

cidaṇur yatra bhāto asau deśo mitim upāgataḥ ।
yadā bhātas tadā kālo yad bhānaṃ sā kriyā smṛtā ।। 

upalabdhaṃ vidur dravyaṃ draṣṭṛtātropalabdhṛtā ।
ālokanaṃ darśanatā dṛg ālokanakāraṇam ।। 

evam ucchūnatā bhāti mitānantātha vā kramāt ।
asatyaiva nabhasy eva nabhorūpaiva niṣpramā ।। 

cidaṇor bhāsanaṃ bhātaṃ tatpradeśena dehagam ।
yena paśyati tac cakṣus tac chrotraṃ yena ca śrutiḥ ।। 

yena jighrati tad ghrāṇaṃ yena spṛśati carma tat ।
rasyate yena sā jihvā saṅgraho akṣadṛśām iti ।। 

cidaṇupratibhāse antaḥ prathamaṃ nāmavarjitam ।
tanmātravṛndam eteṣām etadākāśarūpi tat ।। 

cidaṇupratibhākāśapiṇḍa ekaghanasthitiḥ ।
anusandhānavivaśaś cetatīndriyapañcakam ।। 

evaṃ cidanusandhānaṃ dṛśyapoṣam upaity alam ।
tad eva jñānam ity uktaṃ buddhir ity abhidhīyate ।। 

tato manastayā rūḍham ahaṅkārapadaṃ gatam ।
deśakālapariccheda ity aṅgīkṛta ātmanā ।। 

cidaṇor asya bhāvasya pratyagraṃ yatra vedanam ।
sa tatrottarakālena pūrvābhikhyāṃ kariṣyati ।। 

anyasminn ekadeśe asāv ūrdhvābhikhyāṃ kariṣyati ।
evaṃ digabhidhānādi kalpayiṣyati sa kramāt ।। 

deśakālakriyādravyaśabdānām arthavedanam ।
bhaviṣyati svayam asāv ākāśaviśado api san ।। 

itthaṃ svānubhavenaiṣa vyomny eva vyomarūpadhṛt ।
ātivāhikanāmāntar dehas sampadyate citaḥ ।। 

eṣa eva ciraṃ kālaṃ tatra bhāvanayā tayā ।
gṛhṇāti niścayaṃ pūrṇam ādhibhautikam ātmanaḥ ।। 

vyomnā vyomny eva racito nirmaleneti vibhramaḥ ।
asatāsat samāstīrṇaṃ tāpanadyā jalaṃ yathā ।। 

saṅkalpanām upādatte svadehe gaganākṛtiḥ ।
śiraśśabdārthadāṃ kāñcit pādaśabdārthadāṃ kvacit ।। 

uraḥpārśvādiśabdārthamayīṃ kvacid anābilām ।
bhāvābhāvagrahotsargaśabdādyarthamayīm api ।। 

niyatākārakalanāṃ deśakālādiyantritām ।
viṣayonmukhatāṃ yātām indriyavrātavedhitām ।। 

so aṇuḥ paśyaty athākāram ātmanas svātmakalpitam ।
hastapādādikalitaṃ cittādikalanānvitam ।। 

evaṃ sampadyate brahmā tathā sampadyate hariḥ ।
evaṃ sampadyate rudra evaṃ sampadyate krimiḥ ।। 

na ca kiñcana sampannaṃ yathāsthitam avasthitam ।
śūnyaṃ śūnye vilasitaṃ jñaptau jñaptir vijṛmbhitā ।। 

praticchandaś śarīrāṇāṃ bījaṃ trailokyavīrudhām ।
sargārgaḍaprado muktes saṃsārāsāravāridaḥ ।। 

kāraṇaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ netā kālakriyādiṣu ।
sa cādyaḥ puruṣas svairam ity anutthita utthitaḥ ।। 

nāsya bhūtamayo deho nāsyāsthīni śarīrake ।
avaṣṭabdhum asau muṣṭyā śakyate na ca kenacit ।। 

tenābdhimeghasaṅgrāmasiṃhagarjorjitātmanā ।
api suptanareṇeva nūnaṃ maunavatā sthitam ।। 

jāgratas svapnasandṛṣṭayodhārabhaṭavedanam ।
yathā smṛtigataṃ nāsan na sat tadvad asau sthitaḥ ।। 

bahuyojanalakṣaughapramāṇo api bṛhadvapuḥ ।
paramāṇvantare māti lomāntassthajagattrayaḥ ।। 

kulaśailaguṇaughātmā bṛhadvṛndātmako api san ।
tulāyāṃ dhānakāmātram api nāpūrayaty ajaḥ ।। 

jagatkoṭiśatābhogavistīrṇo apy aṇumātrakam ।
vastuto vyāptavān eṣa na deśaṃ svapnaśailavat ।। 

svayambhūr eṣa kathito virāḍ eṣa sa ucyate ।
brahmāṇḍātmā jagaddeho vastutas tu nabhomayaḥ ।। 

sanātana iti prokto rudra ity api sañjñitaḥ ।
indropendramarunmeghaśailajālādidehakaḥ ।। 

tejo'ṇumātraprathitaṃ cetitvā prathamaṃ vapuḥ ।
krameṇa sphārasaṃvittir mahān aham iti sthitaḥ ।। 

spandasaṃvedanāt tena spanda ity anubhūyate ।
yas sa evānilābhikhyo vātaskandhātmanā sthitaḥ ।। 

prāṇāpānaparispando vedanād anubhūyate ।
tena yas so ayam ākāśe vātaskandha udāhṛtaḥ ।। 

cittvād ye kalpitās tena bāleneva piśācakāḥ ।
tejaḥkaṇā asanto api ta ete dhiṣṇyatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

prāṇāpānaparāvartadolā tadudaroditā ।
vātaskandhābhidhāṃ dhatte jagat taddhṛdayaṃ bṛhat ।। 

praticchandaś śarīrāṇāṃ prathamaṃ bījam eṣa saḥ ।
jagadgatānāṃ sarveṣām ākalpavyavahāriṇām ।। 

praticchandād yadaitasmād utthitā jagadātmanaḥ ।
dehās tadā yathā bāhyam antar eṣāṃ tathā sthitam ।। 

citis tasyādyabījasya pūrvam eva yathoditā ।
tathaivādyāpi jīve antas tathodeti tadīhitā ।। 

śleṣmapittānilās tasya candrārkapavanās trayaḥ ।
grahā ṛkṣagaṇās tasya prāṇe ṣṭhīvanaśīkarāḥ ।। 

tasyāsthīny adrijālāni medaso jālikā ghanāḥ ।
śiraḥ pādau tvacaṃ dehāt paśyāmas tasya no vayam ।। 

vapur virājo jagad aṅga viddhi saṅkalparūpasya hi kalpanātma ।
ākāśaśailāvanisāgarādi sarvaṃ cidākāśam ataḥ praśāntam ।। 

virāḍātmavarṇanaṃnāma sargaḥ

ekatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tasmin kalpe tu saṅkalpe tasya yad vapur āsthitam ।
śṛṇu tatra vyavastheyaṃ vicitrācārahāriṇī ।। 

paramaṃ yac cidākāśaṃ tad virāḍātmano vapuḥ ।
ādyantamadhyarahitaṃ laghu tv asya vapur jagat ।। 

saṅkalparacito brahmā svāṇḍaṃ saṅkalpanātmakam ।
vapuṣaḥ parito bhāsvat paśyaty ākāśam eva tat ।। 

brahmātmaiṣa sa saṅkalpas svam aṇḍam akarod dvidhā ।
taijasaṃ taijasākāraḥ puṣṭaḥ puṣṭaṃ vihaṅgavat ।। 

aṇḍasyaikaṃ nabho dūraṃ gataṃ sambuddhavān asau ।
dūre adhas saṃsthitaṃ bhāgaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca nātmanaḥ ।। 

brahmāṇḍabhāga ūrdhvastho virājaś śira ucyate ।
adhobhāgo asya pādākhyo nirantaṃ madhyam atra kham ।। 

dūraṃ viyuktayos sandhiḥ khaṇḍayor ativistṛtā ।
anantā vyomalekheti śyāmā śūnyā ca dṛśyate ।। 

dyaus tālu vipulaṃ tasya tārā rudhirabindavaḥ ।
saṃvidvātalavā dehe surāsuranarādayaḥ ।। 

dehe antaḥ krimayas tasya bhūtapretapiśācakāḥ ।
lokāntarāṇi randhrāṇi suṣirāṇy asya dehake ।। 

brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍam asyādho vistṛtaṃ pādayos talam ।
jānumaṇḍalarandhrāṇi pātālakuharāṇy adhaḥ ।। 

jalaiś śalaśalāyantī suṣirānekarandhrikā ।
bhūr antramaṇḍalī lolā samudradvīpaveṣṭanā ।। 

jalair guḍaguḍāyantyo nadyo nāḍyas saradrasāḥ ।
jambudvīpaṃ hṛdambhojam asya hemādrikarṇikam ।। 

kukṣayaḥ kakubhaś śūnyā yakṛtplīhādayo acalāḥ ।
mṛdvyas snigdhāḥ paṭākārā medaso jālikā ghanāḥ ।। 

candrārkau locane tasya brahmaloko mukhaṃ smṛtam ।
tejas somo asya kathitaś śleṣmā prāleyaparvataḥ ।। 

agnilokas tathaurvāgniḥ pittam asyātidussaham ।
vātaskandho mahāvātāḥ prāṇāpānā hṛdi sthitāḥ ।। 

kalpadrumavanāny asya sarpavṛndāni ca kvacit ।
lomajālāny anantāni vanāny upavanāni ca ।। 

ūrdhvaṃ brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ tu samastam urumastakam ।
brahmāṇḍaprāntarandhrārcir asya dīptā śikhotthitā ।। 

svayam eva manas tena mano nāsyopayujyate ।
ātmaiva bhājyatām eti kila kasya kathaṃ kutaḥ ।। 

svayam evendriyāṇy eṣa tenānyatrāstitā kṛtā ।
yatas tatkalpanāmātram evendriyagaṇaḥ kila ।। 

avayavāvayavinor ivehendriyacittayoḥ ।
na manāg api bhedo asti naikyam ekaśarīrayoḥ ।। 

tasya tāny eva kāryāṇi jagatāṃ yāni kānicit ।
saṅkalpā eva puṃvṛttyā calantyā rūṣitadvitāḥ ।। 

jāgate tasya vijñeye nānye asya mṛtijanmanī ।
sa evedaṃ jagat tasmāt saṅkalpātmāsti netarat ।। 

tatsattayā jagatsattā tanmṛtyaiva jagan mṛtam ।
yādṛśī spandamarutos sattaikā tādṛśī tayoḥ ।। 

jagadvirājos sattaikā pavanaspandayor iva ।
jagad yat sa virāḍ eva yo virāṭ taj jagat smṛtam ।। 

jagad brahmā virāṭ ceti śabdāḥ paryāyavācakāḥ ।
saṅkalpamātram evaite śuddhacidvyomarūpiṇaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

saṅkalpātmā virāḍ eva kham evākṛtim āgatam ।
astu nāma svadehāntaḥ kathaṃ brahmaiṣa tiṣṭhati ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā dhyānena dehāntas tiṣṭhasi tvaṃ yathāsthitam ।
tathāste nijadehe antas saṅkalpātmā pitāmahaḥ ।। 

nṛṇāṃ tathā ca mukhyānāṃ śrīr yā brahmapurodare ।
utpattiputrikādehapratibimbopamāsti sā ।। 

yatra tvam api dehāntaḥ kartuṃ śaknoṣy alaṃ sthitim ।
saṅkalpātmā vibhus tatra brahmā kiṃ na kariṣyati ।। 

bīje antas sthāvare hy āste padārtho yatra jaṅgamaḥ ।
kiṃ nāste tatra dehe antar nije citkalpanātmakaḥ ।। 

sākāro gaganātmāstu nirākāraṃ kham astu vā ।
āste bahir athāntaś ca bhinne bāhyāntare na hi ।। 

ātmārāmaḥ kāṣṭhamaunī najaḍo api dṛṣajjaḍaḥ ।
ahaṃ tvam ityādimayo virāḍ ātmani tiṣṭhati ।। 

āveṣṭitojjhitalatātṛṇadārupuṃvad ucchabdam amburayavac ca vicopitāṅgaḥ ।
nānāvidhe hi viharann api kāryajāle tajjñaś śilājaṭharaśāntamanaska eva ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne virāḍātmavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athāgrasthabrahmaloke brahmaṇi dhyānaśālini ।
nikṣiptākṣaś śanair dikṣu dṛṣṭavān amalaṃ hy aham ।। 

dvitīyam arkaṃ madhyāhne paścād abhyuditaṃ sphuṭam ।
digdāham iva digvaktre vanadāham ivācale ।। 

vahnilokam iva vyomni vaḍavāgnim ivārṇave ।
tato apaśyam ahaṃ dīptaṃ sūryaṃ nairṛtadiṅmukhe ।। 

sūryaṃ yāmyaikadigbhāge sūryam agnikadiṅmukhe ।
sūryam aindraikadigbhāge sūryam īśānadiṅmukhe ।। 

sūryaṃ kuberakakubhi sūryaṃ vāyavyadiktaṭe ।
sūryaṃ vāruṇadigbhāge tena vismitavān aham ।। 

yāvad vicārayāmy āśu vidhivaidhuryam ākulaḥ ।
udabhūd bhūtalāt tāvad arka aurva ivārṇavāt ।। 

ekādarśe akhilārkāṇāṃ pratibimbam ivotthitam ।
udabhūt trayam arkāṇām ambare diggaṇāmbare ।। 

tad dvādaśaparīmāṇaṃ dīptaṃ vṛndaṃ vivasvatām ।
sarvadikkaṃ dadāhoccaiś śuṣkaṃ vanam ivānalaḥ ।। 

athodabhūj jagatṣaṇḍaśoṣaṇagrīṣmavāsaraḥ ।
anagnir agnidāho drāg adṛśyolmukagulmakaḥ ।। 

anagnināgnidāhena tena tāmarasekṣaṇa ।
aṅgāni dāvadagdhāni svinnānīva mamābhavan ।। 

pradeśaṃ tam atha tyaktvā dūram ārūḍhavān aham ।
dṛḍhahastatalāghātahatakandukavan nabhaḥ ।। 

apaśyaṃ gaganastho aham uditaṃ caṇḍatejasam ।
tapantaṃ dvādaśādityagaṇaṃ dikṣu daśasv api ।। 

bṛhadbhaḍabhaḍārāvajvaladghanavanācalam ।
mahākahakahāśabdakvathatsaptābdhiḍambaram ।। 

sajvālolmukanīrandhralokāntarapurāntaram ।
jvālāghanaghaṭāṭopasindūrīkṛtaparvatam ।। 

ḍīyamānamahāṅgārasthiravidyutkakuptaṭam ।
sphuratkaṭakaṭāṭopacaṭatpattanamaṇḍalam ।। 

vidaladbhūtalodbhūtadhūmadaṇḍaiś śilāghanaiḥ ।
kācastambhasahasrāḍhyabhuvanāsthānamaṇḍapam ।। 

kvathadbhūtamahābhūtatārākrandātighargharam ।
lokapālapurāpātasphuṭaccaṭacaṭodbhaṭam ।। 

tārāviśaraṇodgāravṛṣṭaratnadharātalam ।
sarvasthalālayacaladdahyamānajanavrajam ।। 

sarvadikkānalaploṣagaṇadurdarśadiktaṭam ।
uttaptāmbubharasvinnajalecaramahārṇavam ।। 

dharādharadarīrandhrabhramatkuṇḍalimaṇḍalam ।
patatparvataniṣpiṣṭapluṣṭapattanamaṇḍalam ।। 

patatpacapacāśabdaśabditābdhyadrikuñjakam ।
tapattāponnamadbhūtajvaritārṇavaparvatam ।। 

hṛdayasphoṭanissārapatadvidyādharāṅganam ।
ākrandarodanaśrāntadravanniśśaraṇāmaram ।। 

nāgalokajvalajjvālāpātālottaptabhūtalam ।
śuṣkārṇavaskhadāpaṅkavivṛttograjalecaram ।। 

aurveṇābindhanābhāvāt proḍḍīyeva sahasradhā ।
gatena śatadhotthāya gṛhītagaganāṅganam ।। 

athodabhūj jvalajjvālākiṃśukāṃśukaśobhitaḥ ।
tāṇḍavāyeva kalpāgnis taralolmukamālyavān ।। 

tāraṃ paṭapaṭāṭopī raṭadbhaṭa ivodbhaṭaḥ ।
jvālodbhujo dhūmrakaco jagajjīrṇakuṭīnaṭaḥ ।। 

jajvalur vanajālāni purāṇi nagarāṇi ca ।
maṇḍaladvīpadurgāṇi jaṅgalāni sthalāni ca ।। 

sarvakhāni mahākāśam āśā daśa divaś śiraḥ ।
śvabhrakūpāraghaṭṭāṭṭaghaṭṭanoḍḍāradiktaṭāḥ ।। 

śṛṅgāṇi siddhavṛndāni girayas sāgarārṇavāḥ ।
sarassarasyas sarito devāsuranaroragāḥ ।। 

āśāś śanaśanāśabdaiḥ puruṣair aśivārciṣām ।
āsan kṣveḍākurākṣasyo jvālājālojjvalordhvajāḥ ।। 

bhaṃ bhaṃ bham iti bhāṅkārair bhīṣaṇair bhūribhasmabhiḥ ।
jvālāś śvabhrādribhūmīnāṃ guhābhyaḥ pariniryayuḥ ।। 

jvālodarasthā aruṇās samastā bhūtajātayaḥ ।
sthalapadmodarālīnām ājahruś śriyam aśriyaḥ ।। 

sadyonissṛtaraktābhais sindūrāmbhodasundaraiḥ ।
dhag dhag dhag iti gāyadbhir jvālājālair jagadgataiḥ ।। 

āsīd raktāṃśukaiḥ kīrṇaṃ sandhyābhrair iva vā nabhaḥ ।
utphullakiṃśukavanair uḍḍīnair iva vāvṛtam ।। 

aurveṇa vāvṛtā āsan phullāśokavanā iva ।
sthalābjavalitā rāvavirāvā iva cārṇavāḥ ।। 

nānāvarṇajvalajjvālādhūmavinyāsabandhavān ।
rūḍhavān himavān dhātucitrasaudhatalaśriyam ।। 

anantavanavinyāsanavayauvanapāvakaḥ ।
udayāstamayādribhyo vindhyo vidhuratām agāt ।। 

aṅgārakalpaviṭapair jvālāvanavivalganaiḥ ।
śarair īśa iva kṣubdhas sahyo asahyatvam āyayau ।। 

madhyamadhyakacatkārṣṇyaṃ bhramaddhūmālimālitam ।
calajjvālābjam anilair mṛṣṭaṃ sara ivāmbaram ।। 

khe adrīṇāṃ śikharorvyo agniśikhāśikharaśekharāḥ ।
nanṛtur nīrasā rāma nartakyaḥ ketukuntalāḥ ।। 

talāhitānalajvālā brahmāṇḍordhvakavāṭabhūḥ ।
bharjanaprotphaladbhūtadhānāgād bhrāṣṭrabhūmikām ।। 

dvīpābdhikaṅkaṇaśreṇī mṛjjalāṅgāgnināruṇā ।
hṛtprakoṣṭhe jagallakṣmyās sāvatīrṇābhavat tadā ।। 

śailāś caṭacaṭāsphoṭair vṛkṣāḥ kaṭakaṭāravaiḥ ।
deśā halahalollāsair alaṃ vidalanaṃ yayuḥ ।। 

abdhayaḥ kvathitākārāḥ phenilollolamāṃsalāḥ ।
vīcīkaratalāghātāṃś cakrur arkamukhe nu khe ।। 

anyo'nyavellitair lolabhūtalāṅgāraparvatān ।
jahrur vīcikarair mohajaḍāḥ prakupitā iva ।। 

āśākāśāśinām eṣāṃ guhāgulagulāravān ।
prapannaś śabda āgneyo jvālābhaḍabhaḍodbhaṭaḥ ।। 

lokapālapurāpātabhagnāṅgārādibhittayaḥ ।
diśo daśāpi vaivaśyam ayur unmuktavṛttayaḥ ।। 

kāñcanadravasāndrārdradrumāṅgāraguhāgṛhaḥ ।
śanaiḥ kharvākṛtir merur āsīd dhimam ivātape ।। 

kṣaṇenaivānalāt tasmād dhimavān vyadravad drutaḥ ।
sarvāntaśśītalaś śuddho durjanād iva sajjanaḥ ।। 

tasyām api daśāyāṃ tu malayo amalasaurabhaḥ ।
āsīt tyajaty udārātmā na nāśe apy uttamaṃ guṇam ।। 

naśyann api mahān hlādaṃ na khedaṃ samprayacchati ।
candanaṃ dagdham apy āsīd ānandāyaiva jīvatām ।। 

na kadācana saṃyāti vastūttamam avastutām ।
pralayānalanirdagdham api hema na naṣṭavat ।। 

dve hemanabhasī tasmin na naṣṭe pralayānale ।
tayor eva vapuś ślāghyaṃ sarvanāśe apy anāśayoḥ ।। 

nabho vibhutayānāśi hemotkṛṣṭatayākṣayam ।
sattvam ekaṃ sukhaṃ manye na rajo na ca vā tamaḥ ।। 

caladuccavanāpātavikīrṇāṅgāravarṣaṇaḥ ।
dagdhābdādrir mahādhūmajālo abhūd vahnivāridaḥ ।। 

rasanissaraṇārtānāṃ śūnyānāṃ sphāradehinām ।
śuṣkānāṃ vyomaviṭapipattrāṇāṃ pātrarūpiṇām ।। 

vāridānāṃ savārīṇāṃ dagdhānāṃ pralayārciṣā ।
jñaptyevājñānadoṣāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhasmāpi na kvacit ।। 

na laṅghayati kailāsaṃ yāvad ullasito analaḥ ।
tāvat taṃ kalpakupito rudro netrāgninādahat ।। 

dāhasphuṭaddrumasthūlaśilācaṭacaṭāravāḥ ।
laguḍopalaloṣṭaughair ayudhyanteva bhūbhṛtaḥ ।। 

jvālā ghanaghaṭāṭopasāvataṃsācalābhidhāḥ ।
babhur āvyomavikasatsthalapadmavanā iva ।। 

sargaḥ kadācid evāsīd ity agāt smaraṇīyatām ।
kalpāntas sphārayan duḥkhāny agād asmaraṇīyatām ।। 

tāpopatāpaparamāḥ paramāraṇatatparāḥ ।
vahnayo apahnavaṃ cakrur jagatām asatām iva ।। 

vavur aśaninipātapiṇḍitāṅgāḥ kacadanalolmukakhaṇḍamuṇḍamālyāḥ ।
pralayasamayavāyavo analāttā daladacalāśanipālayo lihantaḥ ।। 

vyālolasphuṭitānaladrumavanaprodbhūtabhasmoṣmaṇā dattābhrabhramadulmukāhativahatsāṅgāragaurārciṣaḥ ।
bhraśyatpāvakaśṛṅgamadhyavivalajjvālālavaśyāmalā niśśeṣāgninikāśapūravapuṣo vegena vātā vavuḥ ।। 

mahākalpāntāgnivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

trayastriṃśaddviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha kalpāntamaruti vahaty avadhutācale ।
balenāmbhodhikallolair nabhasy āvartakāriṇi ।। 

samudreṣu vimudreṣu maryādollaṅghane ghane ।
aghaneṣu ghaneṣv ambudāridryopadravadrute ।। 

bhūtale bhūtaleśāṃśavarjite vahnibharjite ।
pātālam api pātāle gate kim api kālataḥ ।। 

divi cāvidyamānāyāṃ viśīrṇe sargavargake ।
loke vyapagatāloke śokaukasi kakubgaṇe ।। 

kuto apy ākāśakuharād dṛptadaityagaṇā iva ।
puṣkarāvartakā meghāś cakrur gulagulāravam ।। 

brahmavisphoṭitasvāṇḍakuḍyavisphoṭanodbhaṭam ।
anyo'nyāsphālanottālamattārṇavaravābilam ।। 

lokāntarapurodgīrṇaghanakolāhalolbaṇam ।
patatkulācalaskandhabaddhograravaghargharam ।। 

brahmāṇḍaśaṅkhajaṭharapūraṇāvartamantharam ।
svarlokarodhaḥpātālatalātatisagulmakam ।। 

samastadūradigbhittihelāhananaharṣulam ।
mahāpralayasammattapānakāpānatarṣulaṃ ।। 

prasṛtapralayākhyendramattairāvaṇabṛṃhitam ।
ākalpakṣubdhameghābdhinirhrādam iva sambhṛtam ।। 

mahāpralayasaṅkṣubdhakṣīrodamathanāravam ।
brahmāṇḍogrāraghaṭṭe asmin vāryantram iva sāravam ।। 

athāsmin sati kalpāgnau sthitim eti kathaṃ ghanaḥ ।
iti vismitavān asmi dṛśaṃ digdaśake atyajam ।। 

yāvan na kvacid evābhraṃ paśyāmy āśāsu kevalam ।
taranti taralāsphālam ulmukāśanivṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

tena jvalanatāpena bahuyojanakoṭiṣu ।
padārthā bhasmatāṃ yānti dūre dikṣu daśasv api ।। 

anantaraṃ kṣaṇād vyomni dūre aham anubhūtavān ।
ūrdhvataś śītalaṃ vātam adhastād vānalopamam ।। 

etāvati nabhomārge dūre kalpāmbudās sthitāḥ ।
yas teṣām agnitāpānāṃ viṣayo na ca maddṛśām ।। 

atha vāruṇadigbhāgād āyayau kalpamārutaḥ ।
yasmiṃs tṛṇavad uhyante vindhyameruhimādrayaḥ ।। 

tena jvālācalāḥ prāntaḍīnāṅgāravihaṅgamāḥ ।
lololmukavanākrāntā jagmur agnidiśaṃ drutam ।। 

sandhyābhrasadṛśākārās terur aṅgāravāridāḥ ।
bhremur bhasmabharābhrāṇi protāṅgārarajāṃsi khe ।। 

sa jvālācalasaṅghāto dṛṣṭo analadiśaṃ vrajan ।
hemādrīṇāṃ sapakṣāṇām anīkaṃ dravatām iva ।। 

dharādrimaṇḍalābhoge asomyāṅgārabharātmani ।
jvālācalaghane yāte bhāti tejasi bhāsvatām ।। 

arṇaveṣv analārṇassu kvathanotphālavāriṣu ।
vaneṣv asmṛtaparṇeṣu dīptāgnitaruvāriṣu ।। 

brahmalokasthanātheṣu lokapālapureṣv adhaḥ ।
sāṅganābālavṛddheṣu dagdheṣu nipatatsu khāt ।। 

kalpāntānalapadminyā brahmāṇḍograsarovare ।
jvālāpallavaśālinyās sabījāyās saholmukaiḥ ।। 

analātmasu mūleṣu nāgeṣu ca nageṣu ca ।
āpātālaṃ nimagneṣu mahaty aṅgārakardame ।। 

uṣṭrasainyam ivālakṣyagatir mannikaṭaṃ nabhaḥ ।
āyayāv añjanaśyāmaḥ kalpāmbudagaṇaḥ kṣaṇam ।। 

sthirakalpānalajvālātulyavidyunmayācalaḥ ।
ekakoṇakaviśrāntasaptāmbudhipayobharaḥ ।। 

bhittibhāsuranīhārabhāranirbharadiktaṭaḥ ।
brahmāṇḍakuḍyanibiḍamaṇḍalāsphoṭapaṇḍitaḥ ।। 

kalpānte kṣubhito ambhodhir vartulāvartavṛttimān ।
taḍijjalecaras sphāranirhrādaḥ kham ivāgataḥ ।। 

mṛto dagdho niśānāthaloko dviguṇaśītalaḥ ।
anyam ākāram āśritya paralokam ivāgataḥ ।। 

himasambhārarūpeṇa himācalam ivākhilam ।
jāḍyastambhitaniśśeṣajalakāṣṭhācalaṃ dadhat ।। 

atha brahmāṇḍavisphoṭakaṭhināsphāṭitāmbaram ।
prāk kṛtvodbhaṭatuṣkāraṃ kaṣṭā vṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha ।। 

agnidāhavanākāśavidyudunmeṣabhīṣaṇā ।
caṭadguḍaguḍāsphoṭasphuṭadbrahmāṇḍamaṇḍalā ।। 

pṛṣatotkaraśītkāraśatakṣveḍākṣayāravā ।
śītaśīkaranīhārabhittibandhamayāmbarā ।। 

rodomaṇḍapavaiḍūryastambhasambhārabhāsuraiḥ ।
dhārāsārair dharādhairyaśailaśātanaśālinī ।। 

dharācaṭacaṭāsphoṭasphuṭadaṅgārapattanā ।
garjanorjitasampātapatallokāntarākulā ।। 

sā babhūvātha sāṅgārajagadgehavilāsinī ।
kṛtapratyudgamā bāṣpaśriyājvalanayā bhuvaḥ ।। 

jvālālavollalanaḍambaram ambaraṃ tad vyūḍhasthalābjadalajālam ivālam āsīt ।
dhārā bhramadbhramarapaṅktinibhās tadāsaṃs tatra sphuracchiśiraśīkarapakṣipuñjāḥ ।। 

udyadbṛhaccaṭacaṭāravapūritāśo bhīmo abhavat sa salilānalasannipātaḥ ।
durvāravairiviṣamo mahatāṃ balānāṃ saṅgrāma ugra iva hetihatograhetiḥ ।। 

puṣkarāvartāḍambaraṃ nāma sargaḥ

catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athāvanipayastejaḥpavanānāṃ yugakṣaye ।
jāte paramasaṅkṣobhe babhūvāsmiñ jagattrayam ।। 

tāpiñchavipinoḍḍītinibhabhasmābhrabhāsuram ।
mahārṇavamahāvartavṛttidhūmavivartanam ।। 

līnajvālālavollāsahelāṭimiṭimāraṭi ।
skannabāṣpābhrasambhārapūrṇalokāntarāntaram ।। 

ucchaladdīrghajhāṅkāraiś chamacchamamayātmakaiḥ ।
tūryair unnamadāsāravisārijayaghoṣaṇam ।। 

bhramadbhasmābhadhūmrābhraṃ bṛhatkalpābhrasambhramam ।
bāṣpābhravibhramodbhrāntaṃ śīkarogrābhravṛndavat ।। 

brahmāṇḍabhittibhāṅkārabhīṣaṇair mātariśvanaḥ ।
prasarair ambaroḍḍīnadagdhendrādipurotkaram ।। 

jalānilānalollāsasphuṭatkoṭiśatāśmanām ।
pravighaṭṭanaṭāṅkārair jaḍībhūtāntakaśruti ।। 

nabhasstambhanibhābaddhadhārānīrandhravarṣaṇaiḥ ।
karṣaṇaiḥ kalpavallīnāṃ chamacchamaghanadhvani ।। 

gaṅgā taraṅgikā yeṣāṃ tādṛśais saritāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।
abhrair iva nabho bhīmaiḥ pūryamāṇākhilārṇavam ।। 

tāpiñchapattravṛndasthapuṣpagucchasamopamaiḥ ।
tapadbhir arkair ālīḍhapītakalpābhramaṇḍalam ।। 

vahadgirisaridvyūḍhaśikharidvīpapattanam ।
kalpānilaghanakṣobhakṛtaparvatakuṭṭanam ।। 

grahatārāgaṇair ugrair vyagrair vigrahadurgrahaiḥ ।
patadbhir dviguṇālātalatam āvartapātibhiḥ ।। 

arṇavotthajalādrīndrasaṅghaṭṭāsphoṭaghaṭṭitam ।
mahāpralayaparyastaparvataprāntakuṭṭitam ।। 

ghanaśātkṛtabāṣpābhraiḥ kalpābhrair api meduraiḥ ।
andhīkṛtārkajālāṃśutamonibiḍamantharam ।। 

viśīrṇavasudhāpīṭhakhaṇḍakhaṇḍair galattaṭaiḥ ।
uhyamānair luṭhacchailapattanais saṅkaṭārṇavam ।। 

ūrmyadryunnayanacchinnaghanair ghargharamārutaiḥ ।
samudraghoṣair gambhīranirghātair bhagnadiktaṭam ।। 

brahmāṇḍakuḍyakroḍāgrakuṭṭakaiḥ kaṭuṭāṅkṛtaiḥ ।
kalpābhravikaṭāsphoṭair ghaṭṭitaikārṇavāraṭi ।। 

svargapātālabhūlokakhaṇḍakhaṇḍair vimiśritaiḥ ।
yathāsvabhāvaṃ tiṣṭhadbhir marudbhugnair vṛtāmbaram ।। 

mṛtārdhamṛtadagdhārdhadagdhāṅgair devadānavaiḥ ।
anyo'nyadarśanād vātavellitair bhramitāyudham ।। 

kalpāntapavanodbhrāntair lokāntarajarattṛṇaiḥ ।
ārabdhārjunavātākhyastambham uddhūmabhasmabhiḥ ।। 

uhyamānaśilājālaprahāraviluṭhattaṭaiḥ ।
patallokāntarais tāraṭuṣkārakaṭuṭāṅkṛtam ।। 

vātodvyūḍhagirivrātaguhābhāṅkārabhāsuram ।
patadbhir vihitāvartaṃ lokapālapurīpuraiḥ ।। 

kṛtakarkaśanirhrādair asurair iva mārutaiḥ ।
uhyamānavanavyūhaprotavātāyanair vṛtam ।। 

puramaṇḍaladaityāgnisuranāgavivasvatām ।
nikurumbaṃ dadhad vyomni maṣakānām ivoccayam ।। 

naśyan nagavarābhogabhāgair bhagnasurālayaiḥ ।
āvartaghargharārāvair jalam ūrdhvam adho analam ।। 

kurvaj jalādriniṣpeṣair dikpālapurakuṭṭanam ।
nipataddevadaityendrasiddhagandharvapattanam ।। 

kuṭṭanaṃ parvatādīnāṃ praśāntāṅgārarūpiṇām ।
vātaiḥ kurvat padārthānām āsāraṃ rajasām iva ।। 

purāṇy amaradaityānāṃ bhramadbhittīni śātayat ।
ratnaiḥ khanakhanāyanti payāṃsīva payasvatām ।। 

pūrṇāmbaraṃ paripatallokasaptakamandiraiḥ ।
cakrāvṛttyā bhramadrūpair aparais sāgarair iva ।। 

hemasphaṭikavaiḍūryasasāramaṇimandiraiḥ ।
divaḥ patadbhir ākīrṇam udyajjhaṇajhaṇasvanaiḥ ।। 

utpetur dhūmabhasmābdāḥ petur dhārāpurotkarāḥ ।
unmamajjus taraṅgaughā mamajjur bhūtalādrayaḥ ।। 

āvartaghargharārāvā mithovidalanodyatāḥ ।
jughūrṇur arṇavāḥ kīrṇāḥ parṇavatprauḍhaparvatāḥ ।। 

krandacchiṣṭāmaragaṇaṃ dalatsajjīvabhūtakam ।
bhramatketuśatotpātaṃ duṣprekṣam abhavaj jagat ।। 

mṛtārdhamṛtayā bhūtasantatyānilalolayā ।
abhūn nīrandhram ākāśaṃ jīrṇaparṇasavarṇayā ।। 

jagad āsīt patacchṛṅgasthūladhāraughanirbharam ।
bhraśyadbṛhadgiripuravrātapūrṇasaricchatam ।। 

śāmyacchamaśamāśabdaśatasaṅgihutāśanam ।
calābdhivalanādolālolaśailasarittaṭam ।। 

tṛṇarāśisarinnyāyamiśradvīpārṇavotkaram ।
atyantadūradigvyomakṣaṇajvālāmahāvanam ।। 

varṣaśāmyaddhutāśotthabhasmāmodapatatsuram ।
bhūtapūrvajagadbhūtaṃ parivismṛtasargakam ।। 

nirargalollasannādaṃ sārgalopaśamakramam ।
sargalobhollasaccheṣaṃ vargalokavivarjitam ।। 

anārataviparyāsakārimārutanirdhutam ।
bījarāśim ivājasraṃ pūyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।। 

ulmukānyo'nyaniṣpeṣavahni cūrṇasuvarṇajaiḥ ।
rajobhir vivṛtair hemakuṭṭimākāśakoṭaram ।। 

bhūmaṇḍalabṛhatkhaṇḍair bhraṣṭais sadvīpasāgaraiḥ ।
pūrṇasaptamapātālaṃ luṭhatpātālamaṇḍalaiḥ ।। 

āsaptamasutālāntam āmahītalaparvatam ।
āvyomaikārṇavībhūtaṃ pūrṇaṃ pralayavāyubhiḥ ।। 

ekārṇavo atha vavṛdhe śanaiś śīghraṃ saricchataiḥ ।
bhuvane jaḍakallolaiḥ kopo mūrkhāśaye yathā ।। 

musulopamayā pūrvaṃ tatas stambhanibhāṅgayā ।
tatas tāladrumākāradhārayāsārasārayā ।। 

tato nadīpravāhograjalapātaikapātayā ।
saptadvīpamahīpīṭhasamamedurameghayā ।। 

vahnir vidāhakṛd vṛṣṭyā śamam abhyāyayau tathā ।
śāstrasajjanasaddṛṣṭyā maurkhyam āpatpradaṃ yathā ।। 

ūrdhvādharasthaparivṛttapadārthajātam antaḥkvaṇatkhanakhanāyitaśailamajjam ।
brahmāṇḍakoṭaram abhūd vidhuraṃ kubālalīlāvilolam iva bilvaphalaṃ viśuṣkam ।। 

puṣkarāvartavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

vātavarṣahimotpātaghātabhagne dharātale ।
jalavego agamad vṛddhiṃ kalāv iva mahīpatiḥ ।। 

gaṅgāpravāhapratimadhārāpātavivardhitaiḥ ।
saritsahasrais sahasā merumandarasundaraiḥ ।। 

ādityapathasamprāptakandaro jaḍamantharaḥ ।
ekārṇavas samucchūna āsīn mūrkha iveśvaraḥ ।। 

vipulāvartavṛttyāntar vivṛtādritarattṛṇaḥ ।
sphurattuṅgataraṅgāgranigīrṇādityamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

merumandarakailāsavindhyasahyajalecaraḥ ।
calitāvanipaṅkāntarlīnavyālamṛṇālakaḥ ।। 

ardhadagdhadrumavanavyūhāvalanasaṅkaṭaḥ ।
trailokyabhasmasammṛṣṭimaṣīkardamakutsitaḥ ।। 

nabhasstambhabṛhaddhārānālabhāskarapuṣkaraḥ ।
dhārājalamahāmbhodavilīnanalinīdalaḥ ।। 

diṇḍīraparvataprāntaprāptavṛttāntavāridaḥ ।
bhramadindrānalārkendupurapattanapūranauḥ ।। 

kāṣṭhavatprohyamānograsurāsuranarotkaraḥ ।
śanaiḥkramocchūnatayā lihann ādityamaṇḍalam ।। 

tarattāratarārāvadhārāsārasamudbhavaiḥ ।
budbudaiḥ parisandigdhaprohyamānamahācalaḥ ।। 

bhramadbudbudaviśrāntabhrāntakalpāntavāridaḥ ।
uttārakais tair nayanaiḥ paśyann aparavāridam ।। 

mahāpralayavāryoghaghoṣaghuṅghumitāntaraḥ ।
ekapravāhāpahṛtasarvorvīkulaparvataḥ ।। 

caṇḍavātakṛtāpūrvajalaughakulaparvataḥ ।
mahāghurughurārāvaghargharograpayorayaḥ ।। 

brahmāṇḍakuḍyasaṅghaṭṭaparāvṛttibhir uddhataḥ ।
kurvan yojanalakṣāṇi vinatāny unnatāni ca ।। 

tṛṇair iva taraṅgeṣu dolāndolanam adribhiḥ ।
kurvadbhir upalāghātabhagnabhāskaramaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

śūnyabrahmāṇḍavipulajalaghātakulāyake ।
līnān acalakākolān gṛhṇan salilajālakaiḥ ।। 

mṛtāmṛtabṛhadbhūtamajjanonmajjanākulān ।
taraṅgamakurān karṣan pratibimbānvitān iva ।। 

mṛtaśiṣṭān purabhraṣṭān phenādritaṭakoṭiṣu ।
dadhaj jalabalaśrāntāṃs tridaśān maṣakān iva ।। 

vimalādyatanākāśavipulān ambubudbudān ।
sahasrasaṅkhyān valayaṃl locanānīva vāsavaḥ ।। 

śaradvyomasamābhogair valadbhir budbudekṣaṇaiḥ ।
paśyann iva nadīdhārān meghān ātmaprapūrakān ।। 

puṣkarāvartakābhrāṇāṃ bāhubhir vīcimaṇḍalaiḥ ।
kurvann āliṅganānīva sapakṣādrivad utthitaiḥ ।। 

trijagadgrāsasantṛptaḥ pragāyann iva ghargharaiḥ ।
ravair nṛtyann ivogrādrikaṭakair vīcidordrumaiḥ ।। 

nadīdhārādharair ūrdhve madhye dagdhair dharādharaiḥ ।
adho dharādharair nāgair adharaḥ paṅkagair vṛtaḥ ।। 

dhārātripathagāpūrair nipatadbhir nirantaram ।
magnonmagnohyamānādriśṛṅgadiṇḍīrabudbudaḥ ।। 

uhyamānagalatsvargakhaṇḍakrandannabhaścaraḥ ।
vahadvidyādharīvṛndapadminīsundarāntaraḥ ।। 

ekārṇavapayaḥpūre ghargharārāvaraṃhasi ।
trailokyakhaṇḍasambhāre prohyamāne mahāmbhasi ।। 

nāsīt kaścit paritrātā dātā vā vacaso api ca ।
śaknoti kaḥ paritrātuṃ kālena kavalīkṛtam ।। 

nākāśam āsīn na digantam āsīd adho api nāsīn na tadordhvam āsīt ।
bhūtaṃ na cāsīn na ca sarga āsīd āsīt paraṃ kevalam eva vāri ।। 

ekārṇavavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etasminn antare cakṣur vyomastho aham athātyajam ।
brahmaloke mahīloke prabhāte arkaḥ prabhām iva ।। 

yāvad dṛṣṭo mayā tatra śailād iva vinirmitaḥ ।
parameṣṭhī samādhisthaḥ pradhānaparivāravān ।। 

samūhaś caiva vedānāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।
śukro bṛhaspatiś caiva śakro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ ।। 

somo atha varuṇo agniś ca tathānye ca surarṣayaḥ ।
devagandharvasiddhānāṃ sādhyānāṃ caiva nāyakāḥ ।। 

lipikarmārpitākārās sarve dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ ।
baddhapadmāsanās tatra nirjīvā iva saṃsthitāḥ ।। 

athaite dvādaśādityās tam evoddeśam āgatāḥ ।
baddhapadmāsanās tasthus tathaivāśu yathaiva te ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa dṛṣṭavān nāham abjajam ।
puro vinidratāṃ yātas svapnadṛṣṭam ivāgragam ।। 

brahmalokajanaṃ sarvam ahaṃ tām api vāsanām ।
nāpaśyaṃ svapnanagaraṃ budhyamāna ivāgragam ।। 

araṇyaṃ śūnyam evāsīt tad brahmanagaraṃ tadā ।
kaṭhinākāṇḍavidhvastaṃ pṛthivyām iva pattanam ।। 

sarva eva gatāḥ kvāpi te tathā tādṛśās tadā ।
ṛṣayo munayo vedā devā vidyādharādayaḥ ।। 

jñātaṃ tato avadhānena mayā nabhasi tiṣṭhatā ।
yāvan nirvāṇam āpannā brahmavat sarva eva te ।। 

vāsanāyāṃ vilīnāyām adarśanam upāgatāḥ ।
svapnalokāḥ prabuddhānām iva svaṃ rūpam āgatāḥ ।। 

ākāśātmaiva deho ayaṃ bhāti vāsanayā sphuṭaḥ ।
tadabhāvāt tu nābhāti svapno bodhavato yathā ।। 

antarikṣagato deho yathā svapne avalokyate ।
bodhe tadvāsanāśāntau na kiñcid api lakṣyate ।। 

jāgraty api tathaivāyaṃ vāsanāyāḥ parikṣaye ।
naivātivāhiko naiva lakṣyate atrādhibhautikaḥ ।। 

svapnānubhava eṣo atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ kena khaṇḍyate ।
ābālam etat saṃsiddham anubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ smṛtam ।। 

apahnavec ca vā yo api svam evānubhavaṃ śaṭhaḥ ।
sa tyājyaḥ ko hy alīkena suptam udbodhayet kila ।। 

dehakāraṇakas svapno dehābhāve na dṛśyate ।
iti cet tad adehānāṃ paraloko api nāsti vaḥ ।। 

ity etad abhaviṣyac cet tac charīrakasaṅkṣaye ।
nābhaviṣyad ayaṃ sargas sa cāsty eva hi sarvadā ।। 

avayavavibhāgātmany avaśyaṃbhāvini kṣaye ।
na kadācid anitthaṃ taj jagad ity apy asaṃsthitam ।। 

na kadācij jagannāśe dehād bhūtagaṇād iyam ।
madaśaktir iva jñaptir udetīty asi vakṣi cet ।। 

tat purāṇetihāsānāṃ sarvasaṅkṣayavādinām ।
smṛtyādīnāṃ ca vedānāṃ vaiyarthyam upajāyate ।। 

apramāṇatayaitasminn arthe teṣāṃ mahāmate ।
anyatrāpi pramāṇatvaṃ vidyādāv api kiṃ bhavet ।। 

na caitad vidyate loke jagaducchedakāraṇāt ।
anyac cāstām etad aṅga mamedam aparaṃ śṛṇu ।। 

madaśaktyātmani jñāne dṛṣṭā deśāntareṣu yā ।
pramṛtānāṃ piśācādidehatā sā na sidhyati ।। 

atha sāpi mudhābhrāntir yāvaddehaṃ pradṛśyate ।
iti cet tan mudhānāma satyam ity eva vo bhavet ।। 

evaṃ cet tat pare loke sat svarganarakādikam ।
ity eṣāpi na saṃvit kiṃ satyatām upagacchati ।। 

piśācapratibhā satyā madajñaptimato yadi ।
pratibhāsya na satyā syāt paralokātmikā katham ।। 

piśāco astīti cet saṃvit satyārthā tena saṃvidaḥ ।
mṛtasyāsti paro loka ity asyāḥ kiṃ na satyatā ।। 

kākatālīyavad dehāt paiśācī jñaptir asti cet ।
paralokārthasaṃvittiḥ kathaṃ nāsti sakāraṇā ।। 

yāntar vetti yathā saṃvit sā tathānubhavaty alam ।
astu satyam asatyaṃ vā siddham ity anubhūtitaḥ ।। 

mṛtasyāsti paro loko vid ity evammayī bhavet ।
sati cāsati dehe asmiṃs tena kiṃ sad asac ca kim ।। 

tasmāt svabhāvaḥ prathamaṃ prasphuran vetti saṃvidam ।
vāsanākāraṇaṃ paścād buddhvā sampaśyati bhramam ।। 

tatkṣayāc chamam āyāti draṣṭṛdṛśyadṛgāmayaḥ ।
tatsattāyām udetīyaṃ saṃsṛtyākhyā piśācikā ।। 

upalambha udety ādau brahmaṇo vāsanā tataḥ ।
tacchāntiṃ viddhi nirvāṇaṃ tatsattāṃ saṃsṛtibhramam ।। 

utpannaiva na sānādau pare brahmaṇy asambhavāt ।
utpannāpi ca vā yāsau brahmaiva param eva sat ।। 

etāvad yat parijñānaṃ tan nirvāṇaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।
yad atraivāparijñānaṃ taṃ bandhaṃ viddhi rāghava ।। 

vijñānaghana evāyaṃ kacanākacanātmakaḥ ।
svayam eva kacaty antar na kacaty eva vā svayam ।। 

saṃvidaṃśaparāvṛttimātrapelavarūpiṇī ।
bandhadṛṅ mokṣadṛk ceti kleśas tatsādhane kiyān ।। 

saṃvidudbodhanaṃ bandhas tadanudbodhanaṃ śivam ।
asat sadvaj jagad bhāti saṃvidudbodhanodaram ।। 

ajaḍaṃ bodhanaṃ suptaṃ mokṣa ity abhidhīyate ।
prabuddhaṃ bandha ity āhur yad icchasi tad āhara ।। 

nirvāṇavāsanam anantam ajāḍyam acchabodhaikatānam apayantraṇam astaśaṅkam ।
advaitam aikyarahitaṃ ca nirastaśūnyam ākāśakośaviśadāśaya śāntam āssva ।। 

vāsanābhāvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti te sarva āyātā brahmalokanivāsinaḥ ।
adṛśyatām eva gatā dīpāḥ kṣīṇadaśā iva ।। 

atha te dvādaśādityā brahmaṇi brahmatāṃ gate ।
jagadvad brahmalokaṃ tam adahan bhāsurārciṣaḥ ।। 

vairiñcanagaraṃ dagdhvā dhyānaṃ kṛtvā viriñcavat ।
te api nirvāṇam ājagmur nissnehadaśadīpavat ।। 

tata ekārṇavāpūro viriñcanagarāntaram ।
rātrau bhuvam iva dhvāntaṃ pūrayām āsa sūrmimān ।। 

ābrahmalokam abhavaj jagad āpūrṇam arṇasā ।
tulyaṃ rasaikapūrṇena pakvadrākṣāphalena tat ।। 

tata ūrmigirivrātavegair āvalitākhilaiḥ ।
vicchinnāḥ kalpajaladā jala eva vililyire ।। 

etasminn antare tatra dṛṣṭavān aham ambarāt ।
yāvad abhyutthitaṃ bhīmaṃ bhūtaṃ kiñcin nabho'ntarāt ।। 

kalpāntajaladākāraṃ kṛṣṇam āpūritāmbaram ।
ākalpaṃ sambhṛtaṃ naiśaṃ dehenevotthitaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

taruṇādityalakṣāṇāṃ teja ābhāsuraṃ dadhat ।
ādityatrayasaṅkāśais sthiravidyuttrayolbaṇaiḥ ।। 

netrair ābhāsuramukhaṃ jvālāpuñjān samudgirat ।
pañcānanaṃ daśabhujaṃ trinetraṃ śūlapāṇikam ।। 

amāntam antamukte api vyomnīva vitatākṛtim ।
kham ivāsivaraśyāmaṃ deham ādāya saṃsthitam ।। 

sthitam ekārṇavāpūrṇād brahmāṇḍād bahir ambare ।
vyomeva hastapādādisanniveśena lakṣitam ।। 

ghoṇānilaparāvṛttividhutaikamahārṇavam ।
govindam iva dordaṇḍakṣobhitakṣīrasāgaram ।। 

kalpārṇavajalāpūraṃ puṃstveneva samutthitam ।
mūrtiyuktam ahaṅkāram akāraṇakam āgatam ।। 

kulācalabṛhadvṛndam ivoḍḍayanaḍambaraiḥ ।
pakṣaughair utthitaṃ vyoma samastam abhipūrayat ।। 

tatas triśūlanayanair mayā rudro ayam ity asau ।
dūrād eva parijñāya parameśo namaskṛtaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

kiṃ sa tādṛgvidho rudraḥ kiṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kiṃ mahākṛtiḥ ।
kiṃ pañcavadanaḥ kasmād daśabāhuḥ kva tiṣṭhati ।। 

kiṃ trinetraḥ kim ugrātmā kim ekaḥ kiṃprayojanaḥ ।
keneritaḥ kim akarot kvāyāsīd vada me mune ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

kākutstha rudranāmāsāv ahaṅkāras tathotthitaḥ ।
viṣamaikābhimānātmā mūrtir asyāmalaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

vyomākṛtis sa bhagavān vyomavarṇāmalo mahān ।
cidvyomamātrasāratvād ākāśātmā sa ucyate ।। 

sarvabhūtātmabhūtatvāt sarvagatvān mahākṛtiḥ ।
yāni tasyānuṣaktāni pañcajñānendriyāṇy alam ।। 

tāni tasya mukhāny āhus tapadrūpāṇi sarvataḥ ।
karmendriyāṇi viṣayās te hi tasya bhujā daśa ।। 

sarvabhūtabharais sārdhaṃ brahmaṇā param eyuṣā ।
yadāsau samparityaktas tadāsau mūrtim āgataḥ ।। 

sa cākāśaikarūpātmā nāsti tasya hi sākṛtiḥ ।
tathā dṛśyata evāsau bhrāntimātraṃ na mūrtimān ।। 

cidākāśagate sphāre bhūtākāśe sa tiṣṭhati ।
dehe ca sarvabhūtānāṃ nityaṃ vāyur iveśvaraḥ ।। 

sarvabhūtaparityaktas tasmin kāle khamūrtimān ।
kṣobham etya kṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇaḥ paramāṃ śāntim eṣyati ।। 

ye guṇā ye trayaḥ kālāś cittāhaṅkārabuddhayaḥ ।
praṇavasya ca ye varṇā ye ca vedās tathā trayaḥ ।। 

rudrasya tasya te netrasanniveśena saṃsthitāḥ ।
triśūlaṃ tena trailokyaṃ gṛhītaṃ karakoṭare ।। 

yasmāt tadvyatirekeṇa sarvabhūtagaṇeṣv api ।
anyan na vidyate kiñcid dehātmaiva tatas sthitaḥ ।। 

sargasattopalambhātmā svabhāvo asya prayojanam ।
īritaś śivarūpeṇa cinmātrākāśarūpiṇā ।। 

tenaiva ca nigīrṇas san paramāṃ śāntim eṣyati ।
nirmalākāśarūpātmā kṛṣṇa ity eṣa īśvaraḥ ।। 

kṛtvākalpaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tat pītvaikārṇavaṃ tadā ।
samprayāti parāṃ śāntim abhūyassannivṛttaye ।। 

anantaraṃ mayā dṛṣṭas tatrāsau yāvad udyamāt ।
pravṛttaḥ prāṇavegena tam ākraṣṭuṃ mahārṇavam ।। 

atha tasya mukhaṃ sphāraṃ jvālāmālākulāntaram ।
prāṇakṛṣṭo mahāmbhodhir vāḍavāgnim ivāviśat ।। 

sa eva vāḍavo bhūtvā vahnir ākalpam arṇave ।
ahaṅkāraḥ pibaty ambu rudras sarvaṃ tu tat tadā ।। 

pātālam iva pānīyaṃ sarpo bilam iva kṣaṇāt ।
caṇḍavāyur ivākāśam aviśat tanmukhaṃ javāt ।। 

samudetyāpibad rudras sa muhūrtena tatpayaḥ ।
kṛṣṇāṅgo arka iva dhvāntaṃ satsamparka ivāguṇam ।। 

ābrahmalokapātālaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyam athābhavat ।
rajodhūmānilāmbhodabhūtamuktaṃ samaṃ nabhaḥ ।। 

kevalaṃ tatra dṛśyante catvāro vyomanirmalāḥ ।
ime padārthā nisspandāś śṛṇu tān raghunandana ।। 

ekas tāvad asau madhye rudraḥ kṛṣṇāmbarākṛtiḥ ।
nirādhāras sthito vyomni nisspando ambhodhibimbavat ।। 

dvitīyo avasthito dūre pṛthvyākāśatalopamaḥ ।
bhāgo brahmāṇḍasadanasyādhaḥ pātālasaptakāt ।। 

pātālabhūtaladivāṃ saśailendradivaukasām ।
vyāptiḥ pārthivabhāgena paṅkamātrātmanā manāk ।। 

tṛtīyo atra padārtho abhūd ūrdhvaṃ brahmāṇḍabhāgabhūḥ ।
dṛṣṭikṣayāt sa dūratvāl lakṣyate gaganāsitaḥ ।। 

dūraviśliṣṭayor madhyaṃ yat tad brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍayoḥ ।
tad ākāśam anādyantaṃ brahma nirmalam ātatam ।। 

caturtho asau padārthas tu tadā saṃlakṣito mayā ।
catuṣṭayād ṛte nānyad etasmād eva kiñcana ।। 

rāmaḥ

bahiḥ kiṃ vidyate brahman brahmasadmakavāṭataḥ ।
kās tatrāvaraṇā brūhi kiyatyas saṃsthitāḥ katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍayoḥ pāre tato daśaguṇaṃ jalam ।
sandhyākāśam anantaṃ taṃ varjayitvātataṃ sthitam ।। 

tatas tathaiva jvālātma tejo daśaguṇaṃ sthitam ।
tatas tathaiva pavanaḥ pāvano nirmalas sthitaḥ ।। 

tatas tathaiva vimalaṃ nabho daśaguṇaṃ sthitam ।
tataḥ paramam atyacchaṃ brahmākāśam anantakam ।। 

anyatrānyatra tasyātha dṛṣṭayo anyās tathaiva khe ।
kacanty asaṅkhyā dūrasthā mitho'dṛṣṭātmasṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ūrdhve brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍasya tasyādhastān munīśvara ।
taj jalādi mahākāraṃ kva kathaṃ kena dhāryate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sa pārthivaḥ padārthānāṃ sthitaḥ kaḍḍhakaratnavat ।
bhāgās tam eva dhāvanti te sutā mātaraṃ yathā ।। 

ato yad eva nedīyo brahmāṇḍākhyaṃ mahīvapuḥ ।
tat padārthāḥ pradhāvanti tṛṣitās salilaṃ yathā ।। 

avalambya tad evātas saṃsthitās te jalādayaḥ ।
na sthitiṃ pravimuñcanti svāṃ yathāvayavā iva ।। 

rāmaḥ

brahman brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍe te tiṣṭhataḥ katham ucyatām ।
kimākṛtī dhṛte kena kathaṃ vā parinaśyataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

adhṛtaṃ dhṛtam evoccair apatac caiva vā patat ।
anākṛty eva sākāraṃ jagat svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

kim asya nāma patati kiṃ vā kenāsya dhāryate ।
yathā saṃvittikacanaṃ tathaitad avatiṣṭhate ।। 

yathā keśoṇḍukaṃ vyomni yathā vyomani śūnyatā ।
yathā vā pavane spando jagac cidgagane tathā ।। 

citau saṅkalpanagaraṃ brahmāṇḍākhyaṃ jagadgṛham ।
khe kham evātyanākāram atyākāram iva sthitam ।। 

pātasaṃvitsamudbhūtaṃ patad āste divāniśam ।
utpatantyā vidodbhūtam utpatac caiva tiṣṭhati ।। 

sthitisaṃvitsamudbhūtaṃ sthitam āste divāniśam ।
gacchantyā saṃvidodbhūtaṃ gacchad āste divāniśam ।। 

eti nāśavidā nāśaṃ mahākalpādivedanaiḥ ।
jāyate janmasaṃvittyā vyomni sargādivedanaiḥ ।। 

ābhāti mauktikagaṇaś śaradambarāntar dṛṣṭāv asatya udito apy atisatyarūpaḥ ।
bhrāntyā yathā nabhasi visphuratāṃ tathaiṣāṃ saṅkhyāṃ vidhātum iha ko jagatāṃ samarthaḥ ।। 

bhrāntimātratvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha rāghava rudraṃ taṃ tadā tasmin mahāmbare ।
pravṛttaṃ nartituṃ mattam apaśyaṃ vitatākṛtim ।। 

vyomevākṛtim āpannam ajahadvyāpitāṃ nijām ।
mahākāraṃ ghanaśyāmaṃ daśāśāparipūrakam ।। 

arkenduvahninayanaṃ caladdaśadigambaram ।
ghanadīrghaprabhājālam ālānaṃ śyāmalatviṣām ।। 

vāḍavāgnidṛśaṃ lolabhujormibharabhāsuram ।
ekārṇavārṇo drāg dehabandheneva samutthitam ।। 

paśyāmy anantaram ahaṃ yāvat tasya śarīrataḥ ।
chāyeva pariniryāti nartanānuvidhāyinī ।। 

sūryeṣv avidyamāneṣu mahātamasi manthare ।
sthite katham iyaṃ chāyā bhaved iti matir mama ।। 

yāvad vicārayāmy āśu tāvat tasya tadā puraḥ ।
sā sthitā parinṛtyantī viśīrṇā strī trilocanā ।। 

kṛṣṇā kṛśā sirālāṅgī jarjarā vikṛtākṛtiḥ ।
jvālākulānalālolavanasambhāraśekharā ।। 

bhinnāñjanatamaśśyāmā yāminīvākṛtiṃ gatā ।
tamaśśrīr dehayukteva sākārevāmbaradyutiḥ ।। 

atidīrghā karālāsyā nabho mātum ivodyatā ।
dīrghajānubhujabhrāntyā mātukāmeva diṅmukham ।। 

kṛśā bahūpavāseva parinimnamahāhanuḥ ।
kajjalaśyāmalā meghamāleva pavanākulā ।। 

kṛśāśaktā yadotthātuṃ sudīrghā vidhinā tadā ।
grathiteva sirārūpair dāmabhir dairghyaśālibhiḥ ।। 

tathā nāma sudīrghā sā yathā tasyāś śiraḥkhuram ।
mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prayatnena cirordhvādhogamāgamaiḥ ।। 

ārdrāntratantrīgrathitaśiraḥkhurakarotkarā ।
amūlā sūtravalitā kaṇṭakānām iva sthalī ।। 

viśvarūpā yamārkādiśiraḥkamalajālakaiḥ ।
kṛtamālāmalālokavāntavahnimayācalā ।। 

pralambakarṇā lulitanāsā nṛśirakuṇḍalā ।
śuṣkatumbīlatāṣṭhīvā dīrghalolāsitastanī ।। 

kumārabarhipiñchaughabrāhmamūrdhajamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
lāñchitoccasurādhīśaśiraḥkhaṭvāṅgamaṇḍalā ।। 

dantendumālāvimaloddyotapītatamo'rṇavā ।
kṛṣṇoccair dhūmalekheva vṛttāvartavivartinī ।। 

śuṣkatumbīlatevoccair ākāśatarusaṃśritā ।
vilolāvayavāṣṭhīvā vātaiḥ paṭapaṭāravā ।। 

bṛhattaraṅgordhvabhujā śyāmalollāsaśālinī ।
ekārṇavormimāleva nṛttāvartavivartinī ।। 

kṣaṇam ekabhujākārā kṣaṇaṃ bahubhujākulā ।
anantograbhujā kṣipraṃ jagannartanamaṇḍapā ।। 

kṣipram ekamukhākārā kṣipraṃ bahumukhākṛtiḥ ।
anantogramukhī kṣipraṃ nirmukhī vāpi ca kṣaṇam ।। 

ekapādānvitā kṣipraṃ kṣipraṃ pādaśatānvitā ।
kṣaṇaṃ cānantapādāḍhyā niṣpādākāriṇī kṣaṇam ।। 

kālarātrir iyaṃ seti mayānumitadehikā ।
kālī bhagavatī seyam iti nirṇītasañcarā ।। 

jvālāpūrṇāraghaṭṭhograkhātābhanayanatrayā ।
jvaladvarendranīlādrisānūpamalalāṭabhūḥ ।। 

lokālokendranīlāgraśvabhrabhīmahanudvayā ।
vātaskandhaguṇaprotatārāmuktākalāpinī ।। 

indranīlādritulyorutoraṇocce prabhāsure ।
viśrāntakācaśailābhabhagabhīṣaṇavāyasā ।। 

nṛtyadbhujalatāpuṣpair nakhaśubhrābhramaṇḍalaiḥ ।
pūrṇacandraśatānīva bhramayantī nabhastale ।। 

bhramadbhir vyāptadikcakrā bhujaiḥ kalpāmbudair iva ।
varṣadbhiḥ pāṇijaprāntatārālekhābṛhatprabhāḥ ।। 

nakhapuṣpāṅgulīvallījālair bhrāntabhujadrumaiḥ ।
kṛṣṇaiḥ kānanitāśeṣagaganāgrogramūrtibhiḥ ।। 

tamālatālatanmūlam avadagdhaṃ mahānalaiḥ ।
viḍambayantī calitaṃ jaṅghāsaṅghena copatā ।। 

apy anante mahāvyomni pāraṃ prāptaiś śiroruhaiḥ ।
kurvāṇevātataṃ vāsavanaṃ timiradantinaḥ ।। 

uhyante meravo yena tena niśśvāsavāyunā ।
ghanaghuṅghumadigvaktragaganogrāṅgaghoṣiṇā ।। 

ghanamārutaghūtkāraiḥ kṣveḍāgeyaṃ pragāyatā ।
niyatānunayeneva valitāsyānuvṛttinā ।। 

tato nṛttavaśāveśād vardhamānaśarīriṇī ।
mayā dṛṣṭāvadhānena gaganābhogapūriṇī ।। 

yāvat tayā dhṛtā dehe helāvalanasāravā ।
mālā malayakailāsasahyamandaramerubhiḥ ।। 

āsaṃs tasyā yugāntābhramālikāḥ paṭṭapaṭṭikāḥ ।
ādarśamaṇḍalāny agre trīṇi lokāntarāṇi ca ।। 

karṇayor himavanmerū rupyakāñcanaputrike ।
brahmāṇḍaghurghurair mālā mahatī kaṭimekhalā ।। 

srajaḥ kulācalaiś śṛṅgavanapattanagucchakāḥ ।
taratpuravaradvīpagrāmapelavapallavāḥ ।। 

asyā aṅgeṣu dṛṣṭāni purāṇi nagarāṇi ca ।
ṛtavaś ca trayo lokā māsāhorātramālikāḥ ।। 

muktālatādikaṃ nadyaḥ kālindītripathādikāḥ ।
dharmādharmāv ubhau karṇabhūṣaṇe cānyakarṇayoḥ ।। 

stanās tasyās tu catvāras sravaddharmapayolavāḥ ।
vedās sakalaśāstrārthacatussaṃsthānacūcukāḥ ।। 

triśūlaiḥ paṭṭisaiḥ prāsaiś śaraśaktyṛṣṭimudgaraiḥ ।
niryadāyudhajālāni sragdāmāni bibharti sā ।। 

caturdaśavidhā bhūtajātayo yās surādikāḥ ।
tasyāś śarīraśāyinyas tā lomāvalayas sthitāḥ ।। 

tasyāś ca nagaragrāmagirayo dehaśāyinaḥ ।
nṛtyantyās saha nṛtyanti punarjanmamudeva te ।। 

jaṅgamātmakam evaitaj jagad asthāvaraṃ tadā ।
nṛtyatīti mayā jñātaṃ paraloke sukhaṃ sthitam ।। 

nigīrṇaṃ jagad aṅgasthaṃ kṛtvā tṛptim upāgatā ।
parinṛtyati sā mattā jagajjīrṇāhicātakī ।। 

ādarśapratibimbastham ivābhāty akhilaṃ jagat ।
tasyā vapuṣi vistīrṇe kharūpiṇi kharūpadhṛt ।। 

tajjagannartanaṃ cāru taddehādarśasaṃsthitam ।
ciraṃ mayā tadā dṛṣṭam avinaṣṭaṃ purassthitam ।। 

vivalattārakājālaṃ bhramatparvatamaṇḍalam ।
maṣakavyūhavad vātavyādhūtāmaradānavam ।। 

saṅgrāmonmuktacakrābhadvīpārṇavavṛtāmbaram ।
helāvivalanāvartaprauḍhaśailadharātṛṇam ।। 

nīlameghāṃśukāvṛttivātaghuṅghumitāmbaram ।
kāṣṭhādryasthipurāsphoṭapaṭatpaṭapaṭāravam ।। 

jagatpadārthair vyāmiśrair amiśrair makure yathā ।
vyāptam ābhogibhāṅkarair aṅgai raṅgabhramais tathā ।। 

merur nṛtyati loloccakulācalabṛhadbhujaḥ ।
bhramadabhrapaṭāṭopo namattarutanūruhaḥ ।। 

atyajantas samudrās svaṃ maryādāmudraṇaṃ drutāḥ ।
bhūmer nabhastalaṃ yānti nabhaso yānti bhūtalam ।। 

purāṇi ghargharārāvair dṛśyante luṭhitāny adhaḥ ।
sagṛhāṭṭālavāstavyaṃ na ca kiñcil luṭhaty adhaḥ ।। 

tasyāṃ bhramantyāṃ caturaṃ candrārkā dinarātrayaḥ ।
nakhāgralekhālokāntar bhānti kāñcanasūtravat ।। 

vibhānti vṛṣṭayas tasyā gharmārtijalajālikāḥ ।
iva nīhārahāriṇyo līlāvāridavāsasaḥ ।। 

kham eva tasyās sampannaṃ kavarīmaṇḍalaṃ bṛhat ।
pātālaṃ caraṇā bhūmir udaraṃ bāhavo diśaḥ ।। 

dvīpābdhayo antrāvalayaḥ pārśukās sarvaparvatāḥ ।
prāṇāpānāvalīdolāḥ pavanaskandhaśālikāḥ ।। 

tadānubhūtaṃ nṛtyantyās tasyā vapuṣi vistṛte ।
himavanmerusahyādyair dolāndolanam adribhiḥ ।। 

taradadriguṇāś chātā valayantyā tayā srajaḥ ।
punaḥ kalpānta ārabdha iva tāṇḍavahelayā ।। 

surāsuroragānīkaromaśograśarīrikā ।
nisspandaṃ sthātum aśakan nāsau bhramitacakravat ।। 

nānāvibhavavijñānayajñayajñopavītinī ।
sā sarantī nabhasy āsīd ghanaghūtkāraghoṣiṇī ।। 

tatra bhūtalam ākāśam ākāśam api bhūtalam ।
pratikṛtya bhavaty antar na ca kiñcid vivartate ।। 

bṛhannāsāguhāgehanirgatā ghanaghuṅghumāḥ ।
tatrogrā vāyavo vānti ghanaghūtkārakāriṇaḥ ।। 

nabhaḥ karaśatais tasyāś caturāvartanartibhiḥ ।
bhāti caṇḍāniloddhūtair ākīrṇam iva pallavaiḥ ।। 

tadaṅgagajagadvastujātabhramaṇasambhramāt ।
dṛṣṭir dhīrāpi mohe me sannā seneva saṅgare ।। 

prohyante yantravac chailā nipatanti nabhaścarāḥ ।
luṭhanty amaragehāni cale taddehadarpaṇe ।। 

meravaḥ parṇavad vyūḍhā malayāḥ pallavā iva ।
himādrayo himakaṇā ivorvyo abdalatā iva ।। 

sahyā mahyām iva khagā vindhyā vidyādharā iva ।
ṛkṣavanto bhramanto antar āsan haṃsā ivāmbare ।। 

dvīpāny api tṛṇānīva samudrā valayā iva ।
suralokālayāḥ padmā āsaṃs taddehavāriṇi ।। 

viśadākāśasaṅkāśe svapnāñjanapuropame ।
aṅge tasyā bṛhajjaṅghe piṇḍādarśasamatviṣi ।। 

vindhyo nṛtyati kāñcanācalavane sahyaś ca mahyāṃ giriḥ kailāso malayo mahendraśikhare krauñcācale mandaraḥ ।
gokarṇo gaganāṅgane vasumatī vidyādharāṇāṃ pure sarvā jaṅgamatāṃ gatā vanabhuvas tasyāś śarīre tadā ।। 

abdhir nṛtyati parvate girir api proccair nabhaḥkoṭare vyomāpīndudivākararkṣavalitaṃ bhūmer adhastād gatam ।
sadvīpācalapattano vanagaṇaḥ protkīrṇapuṣpo divi vyālolaṃ jagad ambudhāv iva tṛṇaṃ dikcakrake bhrāmyati ।। 

vyomni bhramanti girayo ambudhayo digantalokāntarāṇi purapattanamaṇḍalāni ।
nadyas sarāṃsi makurāntar aśeṣabaddhavātāvakīrṇatṛṇaparṇagaṇakrameṇa ।। 

matsyāś caranti ca marau varavāriṇīva vyomni sthirāṇi nagarāṇi bhuvīva bhānti ।
khe bhūr adho gaganam akṣayavārivāham utpātavātaparivṛttagiristhitaṃ tat ।। 

ṛkṣotkaro bhramati dīpasahasrayantracakrabhrameṇa maṇivarṣaṇameghacāruḥ ।
antar bahiś ca cakitaiḥ praṇayena muktaṃ vidyādharāmaragaṇair iva puṣpavarṣam ।। 

saṃhārasarganicayā dinarātribhāge bindūpamā rajanayo divasotkarāś ca ।
kṛṣṇās sitāś ca parito amalaśuklakṛṣṇasvādarśamaṇḍalavad ākulam ullasanti ।। 

ratnāni bhāskaraniśākaramaṇḍalāni tārotkarās taralakāntibhṛtaś ca hārāḥ ।
svacchāmbarāṇi valitāni mahāmbarāṇi kurvanty anāratam analpam alātalekhāḥ ।। 

kalpāntakālaviluṭhattrijaganmaṇīni vyāvartanair jhagitijātajhaṇajjhaṇāni ।
tejāṃsi santatatayordhvam adhaś ca yānti nānāvidhāni guṇavanti vibhūṣaṇāni ।। 

saṅgrāmamattabhaṭakhaḍgamarīcivīciśyāmāyamānasakalātapavāsarāṇām ।
vyāvṛttibhir viluṭhatām api susthirāṇām ākarṇyate kalakalo janamaṇḍalānām ।। 

brahmendraviṣṇuharavahniravīndupūrvā devāsurāḥ parivivṛttibhir āpatantaḥ ।
anyo'nyam eva vividhā upayānti yānti vātāvadhūtamaṣakāśanivibhrameṇa ।। 

saṃhārasargasukhaduḥkhabhavābhavehānīhāniṣedhavidhijanmamṛtibhramādyāḥ ।
sārdhaṃ pṛthak ca vilasanti sadaiva sarve vyāmiśratām upagatā api tatra bhāvāḥ ।। 

bhāvodbhavasthitivipatkaraṇabhramāṇāṃ saṃhārasargabhuvanāvanivibhramāṇām ।
mithyaiva khe prakacatāṃ khaśarīrakāṇāṃ saṃlakṣyate atra na manāg api nāma saṅkhyā ।। 

utpātaśāntimaraṇotsavayuddhasāmyavidveṣarāgabhayaviśvasanādi tatra ।
ekatra kośa iva ratnacayo vibhāti nānārasāpratighasargaparamparaṃ tat ।। 

tasyāś cidambaramaye vapuṣi svabhāvabhūtās sphuṭānubhavabhāvajagadvyavasthāḥ ।
sargakṣayā malinadṛkkalitāmbarasthakeśoṇḍukasphuraṇavat paritas sphuranti ।। 

jagat saṅksubdham akṣubdhaṃ dṛśyate asthitisaṃsthiti ।
sañcālyamānamakurapratibimba iva sthitam ।। 

nṛttasthapūtā apy antar jagadarthāḥ pratikṣaṇam ।
sthitiṃ tyajanti gṛhṇanti bālasaṅkalpasargavat ।। 

kriyāśaktiśarīre antaḥ pūyamānā anāratam ।
rāśībhūya viśīryante jaganmudgakaṇotkarāḥ ।। 

kṣaṇam ālakṣyate kiñcin na kiñcid api sā kṣaṇam ।
kṣaṇam aṅguṣṭhamātraiva kṣaṇam ākāśapūriṇī ।। 

yasmāt sā kalanā devī saṃvicchaktir jaganmayī ।
anantā paramākāśakośaśuddhaśarīriṇī ।। 

kālatrayasthitajagattritayāmbarāṅgī cit sā tathā kacati tena tathāsthitena ।
rūpeṇa citrakṛdudāramanassthacitrasaṃsārajālasadṛśena kacajjavena ।। 

sargātmakaṃ vapur anekacidātmakatvāt saṃśāntakhaikavapur ekavidātmakatvāt ।
ekaṃ nimeṣaṇasamunmiṣitaikarūpaṃ sā bibhratī vapur anantam anādi bhāti ।। 

tasyāṃ vibhāti tad anantaśilātmakośalekhābjacakraracanādivad eva dṛśyam ।
vyomātmakaṃ gaganamātraśarīravatyāṃ cittvād dravāj jaladhikośa ivormilekhāḥ ।। 

mahatī bhairavī devī nṛtyataḥ pūritāmbarā ।
tasya kalpāntarudrasya sā puro bhairavākṛteḥ ।। 

sirāmarmāśritogrāgnidagdhasthāṇuvanāvaniḥ ।
kalpāntavātavyādhūtā vanamāleva nṛtyati ।। 

kuṇālolūkhalabṛsīhalaśūrpakaraṇḍakaiḥ ।
musulodañcanasthālīkumbhasragdāmadhāriṇī ।। 

evaṃvidhānāṃ sragdāmajālānāṃ kusumotkaram ।
kirantī saṃsṛjantī ca nṛttakṣubdhākṣayaṃ tatam ।। 

vandyamānas tayā so api tathaivākāśabhairavaḥ ।
tathaiva vitatākāras tadoccaiḥ parinṛtyati ।। 

ḍimbaṃ ḍimbaṃ kuḍimbaṃ paca mana ḍuha mā jham prajham praṃ prajham praṃ tṛllaṃ tṛllaṃ tṛtṛllaṃ tṛkhalu khalumayaṃ khaṅkhamaṃ khaṅkhamaṅkham ।
guṃ haṃ guṃ haṃ tu guṃ haṃ guḍulaḍuḍumuḍaṃ ḍāḍimāḍiṃ ḍuḍeti nṛtyantī śabdavādyaiḥ pralayapitṛvane śreyase vo astu kālī ।। 

baddhvā khaṭvāṅgaśṛṅge kapilam urujaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ padmayoneḥ kṛtvā daityottamāṅgais srajam urasi śiraśśekharaṃ tārkṣyapakṣaiḥ ।
pūrṇaṃ raktāsavānāṃ yamamahiṣamahāśṛṅgam ādāya pāṇau pāyād vo vandyamānaḥ pralayamuditayā bhairavaḥ kālarātryā ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne kālarātrivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonacatvariṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

kim etad bhagavan sarvanāśe nṛtyati keva sā ।
kiṃ śūrpahalakumbhādyais tasyās sragdāmadhāraṇam ।। 

kiṃ naṣṭaṃ trijagad bhūyaḥ kiṃ kālyā dehasaṃsthitam ।
parinṛtyati nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ punar upāgatam ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

nāsau pumān na cāsau strī na tan nṛttaṃ na tāv ubhau ।
tathābhūte tathācāre ākṛtī na ca te tayoḥ ।। 

anādi cinmātranabho yat tat kāraṇakāraṇam ।
anantaṃ śāntam ābhāsamātram ātatam avyayam ।। 

śivaṃ tat sa śivas sākṣāl lakṣyate bhairavākṛtiḥ ।
tathāsthito jagacchāntau paramākāśa eva saḥ ।। 

cetanatvāt tathābhūtas svabhāvavibhavād ṛte ।
sthātuṃ na yujyate tasya yathā hemno nirākṛteḥ ।। 

katham āstāṃ vada prājña cinmātraṃ cetanaṃ vinā ।
katham āstāṃ vada prājña maricaṃ tiktatāṃ vinā ।। 

kaṭakādi vinā hema katham āstāṃ vilokyatām ।
kathaṃ svabhāvena vinā padārthasya bhavet sthitiḥ ।। 

vinā tiṣṭhati mādhuryaṃ kathayekṣurasaḥ katham ।
nirmādhuryaś ca yaś cekṣuraso na hi sa tadrasaḥ ।। 

acetanaṃ yac cinmātraṃ na tac cinmātram ucyate ।
na ca cinmātranabhaso naṣṭaṃ kvacana yujyate ।। 

svasattāmātrakād anyat kiñcit tasya na yujyate ।
anyatvam urarīkartuṃ vyomāvaśyam asau kila ।। 

tasmāt tasya yad akṣubdhaṃ sattāmātraṃ svam āsanam ।
anādimadhyaparyantaṃ sarvaśaktimayātmakam ।। 

tad etat trijagat sargaḥ kalpānto vyoma bhūr diśaḥ ।
nāśa utpādanaṃ rāma virāmo bhāsanaṃ tamaḥ ।। 

jananaṃ maraṇaṃ māyā moho māndyam avastutā ।
vastutā ca vivekaś ca bandho mokṣaś śubhāśubhe ।। 

vidyāvidyā sadehatvaṃ videhatvaṃ kṣaṇaś ciram ।
cañcalatvaṃ sthiratvaṃ ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ cetarac ca tat ।। 

sad asac cātha sadasan maurkhyaṃ pāṇḍityam eva ca ।
deśakālau kriyādravyakalanā kelikalpanam ।। 

rūpālokamanaskārakarmabuddhīndriyātmakam ।
tejovāryanilākāśapṛthvyādikam idaṃ tatam ।। 

etat sarvam asau śuddhaś cidākāśo nirāmayaḥ ।
ajahad vyomatām eva sarvātmaivaivam āsthitaḥ ।। 

etat sarvaṃ ca vimalaṃ kham evātra na saṃśayaḥ ।
asmād ananyat svapnādrir dṛṣṭānto atrāvikhaṇḍitaḥ ।। 

cinmayaḥ paramākāśo ya eṣa kathito mayā ।
eṣo asau śiva ity ukto bhavaty eṣa sanātanaḥ ।। 

sa eṣa harir ity āste bhavaty eṣa pitāmahaḥ ।
candro arka indro varuṇo yamo vaiśravaṇo anilaḥ ।। 

analo jalado ambhodhir hyo adya śvaś cāsti nāsti ca ।
ity ete cinmayākāśakośaleśās sphuranty alam ।। 

evaṃvidhābhis sañjñābhir mudhābhāvanayedṛśāḥ ।
svabhāvamātrabodhena bhavanty ete tu tādṛśāḥ ।। 

abodho bodha ity evaṃ cidvyomaivātmani sthitam ।
tasmād bhedodbhedam aikyaṃ nāsty eveti praśāmyatām ।। 

tāvat taraṅgatvam ayaṃ karoti jīvas svasaṃsāramahāsamudre ।
yāvan na jānāti paraṃ svabhāvaṃ nirāmayaṃ tanmayatām upetaḥ ।। 

jñāte tu śāntiṃ sa tathopayāti yathā na so abdhir na taraṅgako asau ।
yathāsthitaṃ sarvam idaṃ ca śāntaṃ bhavaty anantaṃ param eva tasya ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne śivasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

cinmātraparamākāśa eṣa yaḥ kathito mayā ।
eṣo asau śiva ity uktas tadā rudraḥ pranṛtyati ।। 

yāsau tasyākṛtir nāsāv ākṛtiḥ kṛtināṃ vara ।
tac cinmātraghanaṃ vyoma tathā kacati tādṛśam ।। 

mayā dṛṣṭaṃ tad ākāśam eva śāntaṃ tadākṛti ।
mayaiva tat parijñātaṃ nānyaḥ paśyati tat tathā ।। 

yathā nāma sa kalpāntas sa rudras sā ca bhairavī ।
māyāmātraṃ tathā sarvaṃ parijñātam alaṃ mayā ।। 

cidvyomaiva paraṃ śūnyaṃ sanniveśena netarat ।
tathā saṃlakṣyate rāma bhairavākāratāṃ gatam ।। 

vācyavācakasambandhaṃ vinā bodho na jāyate ।
yasmāt tasmāt tvayi mayā dṛṣṭam evaṃ pravarṇitam ।। 

yad eva vācy upārūḍham etad rāma tad eva te ।
rūḍhādhibhautikadṛśaḥ kṣaṇāt satyātmatāṃ gatam ।। 

na bhairavī sā naivāsau bhairavo naiva sa kṣayaḥ ।
samastam eva tad bhrāntimātraṃ cidvyoma bhāsate ।। 

svapnanirmāṇapuravat saṅkalparaṇavegavat ।
kathārthasārtharasavan manorājyavilāsavat ।। 

yathā svapnapuraṃ svacche vyomni mauktikadhīr yathā ।
yathā keśoṇḍukaṃ vyomni tathā cid bhāti cidghane ।। 

cinmātrākāśam evācchaṃ kacati svātmanātmani ।
yathā nāma tathābhāti tadātmaiva jagattayā ।। 

yathā cidvyomni kacati sva evātmā jagattayā ।
tathā kacati tat tatra kalpāntaśivanartanam ।। 

śivayor evam ākāro nirākāro aṅga varṇitaḥ ।
adhunā śṛṇu vakṣye te nṛttasyānṛttatāsthitim ।। 

cetanaṃ cetanād dhetoḥ kiñcit saṃspandanaṃ vinā ।
kvacit sthātuṃ na śaknoti vastv avastutayā yathā ।। 

svabhāvāc cetanaṃ tasmād rudratvena tathā sthitam ।
hemeva rūpakatvena sanniveśavilāsinā ।। 

yan nāma cetanaṃ yatra tad avaśyaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।
spandadharmi bhavaty eva vastutā hi svabhāvajā ।। 

yas spandaś cidghanasya svaś śivasyāsya sa eva naḥ ।
svavāsanāveśavaśān nṛttam ity eva rājate ।। 

atas sa kalpāntaśivo rudro raudrākṛtir drutam ।
yan nṛtyati hi tad viddhi cidghanaspandanaṃ nijam ।। 

rāmaḥ

prāmāṇikadṛśā dṛśyam idaṃ nāsty eva vastutaḥ ।
yadi vāsty eva tat sarvaṃ kalpānte pravinaśyati ।। 

tat kalpāntamahāśūnye etasmin paramāmbare ।
kathaṃ kiṃ nāma vā cetyaṃ cettā cetati cidghanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

etad eva tadāpy aṅga dvaitaikyāmbhodaśāntaye ।
yadi cinmātranabhasaś cetyam asti na kiñcana ।। 

na kiñcic cetati tataḥ kvacit kaścit kadācana ।
sarvaṃ śāntaṃ dṛṣanmaunaṃ vijñānaghanam ambaram ।। 

yac cedaṃ cetyate nāma tat svabhāvo asya valgati ।
citsvabhāvasya śāntasya svasattāyām avasthiteḥ ।। 

yathā svapne cid evāntaḥ purapattanavad bhavet ।
purādi na tu tat kiñcid vijñānākāśam eva tat ।। 

ātmanātmani cic chūnyaṃ jñātāraṃ jñeyam apy alam ।
tathādisargād ārabhya vetti svaṃ kacanaṃ ca tat ।। 

svayam antaḥ kacatkāntiś cidākāśas svabhāvakhe ।
ayaṃ so aham ayaṃ ca tvaṃ karotīty ādikalpanam ।। 

tasmān na dvaitam astīha na caikyaṃ na ca śūnyatā ।
na cettā cetanaṃ caiva maunam eva na tac ca vā ।। 

na cetati kvacit kiñcit kaścic cetyādyabhāvataḥ ।
tena cettāpi nāsty eva maunam eveti śiṣyate ।। 

nirvikalpasamādhir hi siddhāntas sarvavāṅmaye ।
tac ca jīvaddṛṣanmaunaṃ tūṣṇīm evāta āsyatām ।। 

kurvan nijaṃ prakṛtam eva yathāpravāham ācārajālam acalaḥ paramārthamaunāt ।
nirmānamohamadabhedam anaṅgajīvam ākāśakośaviśadāśaya śāntam āssva ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne viśvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

anantaraṃ mune brūhi kālī kim iva nṛtyati ।
kiṃ śūrpahalakuddālamusulādisrajāṃ dhṛtiḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sa bhairavaś cidākāśaś śiva ity abhidhīyate ।
ananyāṃ tasya tāṃ viddhi spandaśaktim anāmayām ।। 

yathaikaṃ pavanaspandāv ekam auṣṇyānalau yathā ।
cinmātraṃ spandaśaktiś ca tathaivaikātma sarvadā ।। 

spandena lakṣyate vāyur vahnir auṣṇyena lakṣyate ।
tat spandamayyā śaktyaivaṃ lakṣyate nānyathā kila ।। 

śivaṃ brahma viduś śāntam avācyaṃ vāgvidām api ।
spandaśaktis tadicchedaṃ dṛśyābhāsaṃ tanoti sā ।। 

sākārasya narasyecchā yathā vā kalpanāpuram ।
karoty evaṃ śivasyecchā karotīdam anākṛteḥ ।। 

saiṣā citir iti proktā cetyonmukhatayoditā ।
saiṣoktā vāsanānāmnī vāsanād dṛśyasaṃvidaḥ ।। 

saiṣā jīvakalā proktā jīvanāj jīvanaiṣaṇā ।
prakṛtitvena sargasya svayaṃ prakṛtitāṃ gatā ।। 

dṛśyābhāsānubhūtīnāṃ karaṇāt procyate kriyā ।
vāḍavāgniśikhākārā śoṣāc chuṣketi kathyate ।। 

caṇḍitvāc caṇḍikā proktā sotpalotpalavarṇataḥ ।
jayā jayaikaniṣṭhatvāt siddhā siddhisamāśrayāt ।। 

jayantī ca jayāt proktā vijayā vijayāśrayāt ।
proktāparājitā vīryād durgā durgraharūpataḥ ।। 

oṅkārasāraśaktitvād sāreti parikīrtitā ।
gāyatrī gāyanātmatvāt sāvitrī prasavasthiteḥ ।। 

saraṇāt sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kathitaiṣā sarasvatī ।
gaurī gaurāṅgadehatvād bhavadehānuṣaṅgiṇī ।। 

suptānām atha buddhānām ammātroccāraṇād dhṛdi ।
nityaṃ trailokyabhūtānām ametīndukalocyate ।। 

śivayor vyomarūpatvād asitaṃ lakṣyate vapuḥ ।
nabho hi māṃsam etābhyāṃ dṛṣṭikṛṣṭaṃ vilokyate ।। 

āste nabho nabhasy eva tena tau nabhasi sthitau ।
nabhonibhāv abhūtāṅgāv acchau vyomna ivāgrajau ।। 

hastapādāṃsamūrdhnāṃ yad bahutvālpatvabhedataḥ ।
nānātvaṃ halaśūrpādisragdharatvaṃ ca tac chṛṇu ।। 

sā hi kriyā bhagavatī parispandaikarūpiṇī ।
dadyāt snāyāc ca juhuyād ityādyugraśarīriṇī ।। 

citiśaktir anādyantā tathābhātātmanātmani ।
sākāśarūpiṇī śāntā dṛśyaśrīs spandarūpiṇī ।। 

devyās tasyā hi yāḥ kālyā nānābhinayavartanāḥ ।
tā imā brahmaṇas sargajarāmaraṇarītayaḥ ।। 

kriyāsau grāmanagaradvīpamaṇḍalamālikāḥ ।
spandāt karoti dhatte antaḥ kalpitāvayavātmikāḥ ।। 

kālī kamalinī kālī kriyā brahmāṇḍakālikā ।
dhatte svāvayavībhūtāṃ dṛśyalakṣmīm imāṃ hṛdi ।। 

na kadācana ciddevī nirdṛśyāvayavā kvacit ।
śivatvavyatirekeṇa śivataiva vidṛśyatā ।। 

yathāṅgaṃ śūnyatā vyomnas spandanaṃ mātariśvanaḥ ।
jyotsnāyāś śaityam aṅgaṃ hi dṛśyam evaṃ citeḥ kriyā ।। 

śivaṃ śāntam anāyāsam avācyaṃ viddhi nirmalam ।
na manāg api tatrāsti staimityāt spandadharmatā ।। 

sā kriyaiva tathārūpā satī bodhavaśād yadā ।
vyāvṛttyaiva tathaivāste śiva ity ucyate tadā ।। 

citiśakteḥ kriyādevyāḥ pratiṣṭhānaṃ yadātmani ।
tathābhūtasthiter eva tadaiva śiva ucyate ।। 

devyāḥ kriyāyāś cicchakteḥ kharūpiṇyā mahākṛteḥ ।
kalpitākāradhāriṇyā ananyāvayavā ime ।। 

sargās sajanatāvargā lokā ālokabhāsurāḥ ।
sadvīpasāgarāḥ pṛthvyas savanāvanayo adrayaḥ ।। 

sāṅgopāṅgās trayo vedās savidyāsthānagītayaḥ ।
savidhipratiṣedhārthās saśubhāśubhakalpanāḥ ।। 

sadakṣiṇāgnayo yajñāḥ puroḍāśājyaśaṃsinaḥ ।
kuṇālolūkhalabṛsīśūrpayūpādisaṃyutāḥ ।। 

saṅgrāmās sāyudhagrāmās saśūlaśaraśaktayaḥ ।
sabhusuṇḍigadāprāsahayebhabhaṭabhāsurāḥ ।। 

jātayo bhūtasaṅghānāṃ caturdaśa surādikāḥ ।
caturdaśābdhidvīporvyas tathā lokāś caturdaśa ।। 

rāmaḥ

citeḥ kālīśarīriṇyās sargā ye aṅge sthitās tathā ।
te kim ātmani satyās syur utāsatyā vadeti me ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

rāmāsau kila cicchaktis tayā yac coditaṃ tathā ।
tat pracetitam evāntas satyaṃ cedam ivākhilam ।। 

na tat prabimbitaṃ bāhyān makurapratibimbavat ।
satyaṃ tad antar evāsti citer nāsatyam arthataḥ ।। 

cidrūpasya tathāpy antas sat saṅkalpapuraṃ bhavet ।
dṛḍhadhyānād viśuddhāyāś citer bhavatu mā katham ।। 

ādarśe astv atha vā svapne sargas saṅkalpane astu vā ।
sa ātmany arthakāritvāt satya ity eva me matiḥ ।। 

mama nārthāya sa iti vakṣi cet tat kathaṃ na te ।
deśāntaragatās sarve bhavanty arthāya samprati ।। 

yathā deśāntaragrāmas tadgatasyārthakṛd bhavet ।
sarve tathaite tadbhāvaṃ gatasyārthāya niścayāt ।। 

yad yathābhūtasarvārthakriyākāri pradṛśyate ।
tat satyam ātmano anyasya naiva tattām upeyuṣaḥ ।। 

tasmāc cicchaktikośasthās sarvās sargaparamparāḥ ।
satyā ātmani tadbhāvaṃ gatasyānyasya nākhilāḥ ।। 

bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthās saṅkalpasvapnapūrgaṇāḥ ।
sarve satyāḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ sarvātma katham anyathā ।। 

cālitasya yathā gāḍhanidrasya svapnapattanam ।
na luṭhaty eva luṭhitam ity apy anumitaṃ sphuṭam ।। 

tathā calantyā luṭhitaṃ tasyā dehagataṃ jagat ।
na luṭhaty eva makurapratibimbam iva sthitaṃ ।। 

sa trailokyamahārambhas satyo api bhrāntimātrakam ।
bhrāntimātrasya ke nāma luṭhanāluṭhane vada ।। 

kadā svapnapuraṃ satyaṃ kadā svapnapuraṃ mudhā ।
kadā svapnapuraṃ bhagnaṃ kadā svapnapuraṃ sthitaṃ ।। 

bhrāntir na kevalaṃ saiva dṛśyaśrīr yāvad agragām ।
tvaṃ viddhīmām api bhrāntiṃ jagallakṣmīm avāstavīm ।। 

saṅkalpane manorājye svapne saṅkathane bhrame ।
yathā purānubhavanaṃ trailokyānubhavas tathā ।। 

aham iti jagad iti svāntar bhrāntir iyaṃ prakacatīva citeḥ ।
paramākāśakṛśāṅgyāś śāmyati nipuṇaṃ parijñātā ।। 

śivaśaktivarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvicatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

iti nṛtyati sā devī dīrghair dordaṇḍamaṇḍalaiḥ ।
parispandātmakair vyoma kurvāṇā ghanakānanam ।। 

kriyāsau nṛtyati tathā citiśaktir anāmayā ।
asyā vibhūṣaṇaṃ śūrpakuṇālapaṭalādikam ।। 

śaraśaktigadāprāsamusulāsiśilādi ca ।
bhāvābhāvapadārthaughakalākālakramādi ca ।। 

citspando antar jagad dhatte kalpaneva puraṃ hṛdi ।
saiva vā jagad ity eva kalpanaiva yathā puraṃ ।। 

pavanasya yathā spandas tathaivecchā śivasya sā ।
yathāspando anilaś śāntaḥ praśāntecchas tathā śivaḥ ।। 

amūrto mūrtam ākāśe śabdāḍambaram ānilaḥ ।
yathā spandas tanoty evaṃ śivecchā kurute jagat ।। 

nṛtyantyātha yadā tatra tayā tasmin parāmbare ।
kākatālīyayogena saṃrambhavaśatas svayam ।। 

nikaṭasthaś śivas spṛṣṭas sa manāṅmātram antikāt ।
vāḍavo agnis svanāśāya vahantyevāmbulekhayā ।। 

spṛṣṭamātre śive tasmiṃs tataḥ paramakāraṇe ।
pravṛttā prakṛtir gantuṃ sā śanais tanutāṃ tadā ।। 

anantākāratāṃ tyaktvā sampannā girimātrikā ।
tato nagaramātrāsau tataś ca drumasundarī ।। 

tato vyomasamākārā śivasyaivākṛtiṃ tataḥ ।
sā praviṣṭā saric chāntasaṃrambheva mahārṇavam ।। 

eka evābhavad atho śivayā parivarjitaḥ ।
śiva eva śive śānte ākāśe śamaśobhitaḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavañ śivasaṃspṛṣṭā sā śivā parameśvarī ।
kimartham āgatā śāntim iti me brūhi tattvataḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sā rāma prakṛtiḥ proktā śivecchā parameśvarī ।
jaganmāyeti vikhyātā spandaśaktir akṛtrimā ।। 

sa paraḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāvanākṛtiḥ ।
śivarūpadharaś śāntaḥ paramākāśaśaktimān ।। 

bhramati prakṛtis tāvat saṃsāre bhramarūpiṇī ।
spandamātrātmikā secchā cicchaktiḥ parameśvarī ।। 

yāvan na paśyati śivaṃ nityatṛptam anāmayam ।
ajaḍaṃ padam ādyantavarjitaṃ tarjitadvayam ।। 

saṃvinmātraikadharmatvāt kākatālīyayogataḥ ।
saṃviddevī śivaṃ spṛṣṭvā tanmayy eva bhavaty alam ।। 

prakṛtiḥ puruṣaṃ spṛṣṭvā prakṛtitvaṃ samujjhati ।
tadantar ekatāṃ gatvā nadī rūpam ivārṇave ।। 

āpagā hi payomātrā saṅgatārṇava eva sā ।
yadā tadā tam evāśu prāpya tatraiva līyate ।। 

citiś śivecchā sā devaṃ tam evāsādya śāmyati ।
janmasthānaṃ śilāṃ prāpya tīkṣṇā dhārā yathāyasī ।। 

puṃsaś chāyā nijā chāyāṃ praviṣṭasya śarīrakam ।
yathāśu praviśaty eva prakṛtiḥ puruṣaṃ tathā ।। 

cetitvā cin nijaṃ bhāvaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ sanātanam ।
bhūyo bhramati saṃsāre neha tattāṃ prayāti hi ।। 

sādhur vasati cauraughe tāvad yāvad asau na tam ।
parijānāti vijñāya na tatra ramate punaḥ ।। 

dvaite tāvad asadrūpe ramate anumate citiḥ ।
paraṃ paśyati no yāvat taṃ dṛṣṭvā tanmayī bhavet ।। 

citi nirvāṇarūpaṃ tat prakṛtiḥ paramaṃ padam ।
prāpya tattām avāpnoti sarid abdhāv ivābdhitām ।। 

tāvad vimohavaśataś citir ākuleṣu sargeṣu saṃsarati janmadaśāśriteṣu ।
yāvan na paśyati paraṃ tam athāśu dṛṣṭvā tatraiva majjati ghanaṃ madhunīva bhṛṅgī ।। 

samprāpya kas tyajati nāma tad ātmatattvaṃ prāpyānubhūya ca jahāti rasāyanaṃ kaḥ ।
śāmyanti yena sakalāni nirantarāṇi duḥkhāni janmamṛtimohamayāni rāma ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne prakṛtipuruṣavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

tricatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāma kathaṃ tatra mahākāśe tathāsthitaḥ ।
dehabhrāntiṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvā sa rudro apy upaśāmyati ।। 

sa rudras tau jagatkhaṇḍau tadā citra ivārpitāḥ ।
nisspandā eva tatrāsan prekṣamāṇe sthite mayi ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa sa rudras tau nabho'ntare ।
khaṇḍau vilokayām āsa dṛśārkeṇeva rodasī ।। 

tato nimeṣamātreṇa ghoṇāśvāsena khaṇḍakau ।
tau samānīya cikṣepa pātālāntar ivānane ।। 

atiṣṭhad eka evāsāv atha khe kham ivākhile ।
bhuktabrahmāṇḍakhaṇḍogracaṇḍamaṇḍakamaṇḍalaḥ ।। 

tato muhūrtamātreṇa laghus so abhram ivābhavat ।
tato abhavad drumasamas tatas stambhanibho abhavat ।। 

tato abhavad yaṣṭisamas tataḥ prādeśamātrakaḥ ।
tataḥ kācakaṇākāro mayā dṛṣṭas sa tādṛśaḥ ।। 

tatas so aṇur bhavan dṛṣṭo mayā khād divyadṛṣṭinā ।
paramāṇur atho bhūtvā tatraivāntardhim āyayau ।। 

ity asau śamam āyātaś śāradāmbudakhaṇḍavat ।
tādṛśo api mahārambhaḥ puraḥ paśyata eva me ।। 

iti sāvaraṇe tena te brahmāṇḍakavāṭake ।
vinigīrṇe kṣudhārtena hariṇeneva parṇake ।। 

athābhūn nirmalaṃ vyoma śāntaṃ brahmaiva kevalam ।
anādimadhyaparyantasaṃvidākāśamātrakam ।। 

ity ahaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra kalpāntam uruvibhramam ।
darpaṇapratibimbābhaṃ śilāśakalakoṭare ।। 

atha tām aṅganāṃ smṛtvā tāṃ śilāṃ taṃ ca vibhramam ।
rājadvāragato grāmya ivāhaṃ vismayaṃ gataḥ ।। 

tām ālokitavān bhūyaḥ kaladhautaśilām aham ।
yāvat sarvatra santy atra sargāḥ kālyā ivāṅgake ।। 

buddhinetreṇa dṛśyante divyākṣṇā vā na te anyathā ।
sarvatra sarvadā sarvaṃ yad asty eva tathā tadā ।। 

dūrataḥ prekṣyate māṃsadṛśā yadi ca sā śilā ।
dṛśyate tac chilaivaikā na tu sargādi kiñcana ।। 

sāvasthitā śilaivaikarūpā nibiḍamaṇḍalā ।
kaladhautamayī sphārā sandhyājaladasundarī ।। 

tato ahaṃ vismayāviṣṭaḥ pravicāritavān punaḥ ।
śilāyām aparaṃ bhāgaṃ tathaiva parayā dṛśā ।। 

yāvat tam api paśyāmi jagadārambhamantharam ।
tathaiva suṣirākāram iva nānārthasundaram ।। 

punar anyaṃ tathaivāhaṃ pradeśaṃ paridṛṣṭavān ।
sargasaṃrambhavalitaṃ tāvantam api tādṛśam ।। 

yaṃ yaṃ pradeśaṃ paśyāmi śilāyās tatra tatra vai ।
jagat paśyāmy avikalam ādarśa iva bimbitam ।। 

praviśyāmi jagac cet tat paśyāmīdam ivākhilam ।
dṛśyaṃ na ced bahissthas tat paśyāmy ādarśabimbitam ।। 

mayātikautukenātha sarvās tasya gireś śilāḥ ।
anviṣṭā bhūmibhāgāś ca tṛṇagulmādayas tathā ।। 

yāvat sarvatra tat tādṛg jagad asti yathāsthitam ।
buddhyaiva dṛśyate nākṣṇā parayā vividhākṛti ।। 

kvacit prathamasargātmajāyamānaprajāpati ।
kalpyamānarkṣacandrārkadinarātryartuvatsaram ।। 

kvacit kvacin mahīpīṭhasampannajanamaṇḍalam ।
kvacit kiñcid akhātogracatussāgarakhātakam ।। 

kvacit kiñcid asañjātasuraṃ sañjātadānavam ।
kvacit kiñcit kṛtayugācārasajjanabhūtakam ।। 

kvacit kiñcit kaliyugācāradurjanabhūtakam ।
kvacit kiñcit kalpakālamadhyasaṃsthitisusthitam ।। 

kvacit kiñcit puravyūhadaityasaṅgaradustaram ।
kvacit kiñcin mahāśailajālanirvivarāvani ।। 

kvacit kiñcid asampannasargam ekāmbujodbhavam ।
kvacit kiñcij jarāmṛtyumuktabhūtalamānavam ।। 

kvacit kiñcid asañjātacandraśūnyaśiraśśivam ।
anirmathitadugdhābdhimṛtyumatsurapūritam ।। 

asañjātāmṛtāśvebhavaidyāgakamalāviṣam ।
śukrāmaramahāvidyānāśanotkasuravrajam ।। 

kvacit kiñcic ca garbhāṅgakartanotkasureśvaram ।
aparimlānadharmatvāt svaprakāśākhilaprajam ।। 

kvacit kiñcic ca pūrvānyasanniveśakramasthiti ।
apūrvavedaśāstrārthasamācāravicāraṇam ।। 

kvacit kiñcana kalpāntasaṅkṣobhāśivasaṃsthiti ।
kvacit kiñcic ca daityaughaviluṇṭhitasurālayam ।। 

kvacit kiñcit surodyānagāyadgandharvakinnaram ।
kvacit kiñcit samārabdhagīrvāṇāsurasauhṛdam ।। 

bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyatsthajagadāḍambaraṃ mayā ।
tadānubhūtaṃ vapuṣi mahāviśvagaṇātmani ।। 

ekatra kalpavikṣubdhapuṣkarāvartamantharam ।
ekatra somyasakalabhūtasantatisusthitam ।। 

ekatra samarakṣubdhasurāsuranareśvaram ।
ekatrāsambhavadbhānunityābhinnatamoghanam ।। 

ekatrāsambhavaddhvāntaṃ kāntajvālodaropamam ।
ekatra nalinīnālanilīnamadhukaiṭabham ।। 

ekatra padmamañjūṣāsuptabālanavābjajam ।
ekatraikārṇavodagravṛkṣaviśrāntamādhavam ।। 

ekatra kalparajanīniśśūnyatimirākulam ।
śilājaṭharanisspandaṃ vyomeva vitatākṛti ।। 

suṣuptajaṭharākāram aprajñātam alakṣaṇam ।
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ suṣuptam iva sarvataḥ ।। 

ekatra pakṣavikṣubdhaśailakākākulāmbaram ।
ekatra vajraniṣpeṣadravadbhūdharabhāsuram ।। 

ekatrodvṛttamattābdhihriyamāṇadharācalam ।
ekatra suravṛtrāndhabaḍisaṅgarasaṅkulam ।। 

ekatra mattapātālagajakampivasundharam ।
ekatra śeṣaśirasaḥ kalpāntaluṭhitāvani ।। 

kvacid anyena rāmeṇa hatarāvaṇarākṣasam ।
rakṣasā rāvaṇenaiva kvacin nihatarāghavam ।। 

bhūsthapādena devādriśirassthaśirasā param ।
paśyatā pāram ākrāntaṃ kvacid vai kālaneminā ।। 

kvacic cāpasurair nityaṃ dānavair eva pālitam ।
kvacic cāmṛṣṭadanujair amarair eva pālitam ।। 

jiṣṇuyuktena guptena viṣṇupāṇḍavakauravaiḥ ।
kvacid bhāratayūthena nihatākṣauhiṇīgaṇam ।। 

kvacic ca dāśarathinā tvayaiva hatarāvaṇam ।
rāmeṇa raṇamattena niśśeṣīkṛtarākṣasam ।। 

rāmaḥ

kim ahaṃ bhagavan pūrvam abhavaṃ kathayeti me ।
abhavaṃ ced anenaiva sanniveśena tat katham ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

sarva eva vivartante rāma bhāvāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
pūyamānā yathā māṣāḥ krameṇānyena tena ca ।। 

sarvakramasamāḥ kecit ta evānye atha vā mithaḥ ।
sphuranty ardhasamā bhāvāḥ kecid abdhitaraṅgavat ।। 

punas tvaṃ punar evāhaṃ punaḥ punar ime janāḥ ।
na kadācana naivānye sambhavaty akhilaṃ pare ।। 

ta evānye atha vāmbhodhau taraṅgā iti nirṇayaḥ ।
yadvan na jāyate tadvad bhūtānāṃ bhramatāṃ bhave ।। 

āyānti yānty anantāni bhūtānīha bhavabhramaiḥ ।
tāny evānyāni cānyāni samāni viṣamāṇi ca ।। 

āvṛttimanti tāny eva tathaivānyāni cābhitaḥ ।
viddhi śīkarajālāni bhūtāni jagadambudheḥ ।। 

vittabandhuvayaḥkarmavidyāvijñānaceṣṭitaiḥ ।
tair eva kecij jāyante bhūyo bhūyaś śarīriṇaḥ ।। 

ardhais tais sadṛśāḥ kecit kecit pādena tais samāḥ ।
tajjīvās tair visadṛśā bhavanty anye śarīriṇaḥ ।। 

sarvair ebhis samāḥ kecit kālenaiva vilakṣaṇāḥ ।
kālena sadṛśāḥ kecit tair eva ca vilakṣaṇāḥ ।। 

kālenākulaceṣṭitāny adha ito gacchanty athordhvaṃ punar dehālekhanakheditāny agaṇitāny anyāni cānye na ca ।
bhūtāmbūni vahanti saṃsṛtimaye yāny ambudhau cañcale cakrāvṛttimayāni saṅkalayituṃ śaknoti kas tāny alam ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne jagadānantyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

catuścatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataś cidākāśavapur vyāpy ananto nirāmayaḥ ।
dattāvadhāno vapuṣi tadāpaśyam ahaṃ kvacit ।। 

yāvad antargatas sargas saṃsthito aṅkurito mama ।
kusūlasthasya bījasya siktasyevāṅkuro hṛdi ।। 

udbubhūṣur ivāste antas sekād bīje yathāṅkuraḥ ।
ākāravaty anākāraś cittvāc citte tathā jagat ।। 

yathonmiṣati dṛśyaśrīs suṣuptād bodham eyuṣaḥ ।
jāgrad vā vigate svapne cinmātrasya svacetanāt ।। 

tathaivātmani sargādāv anubhūtaḥ kharūpiṇi ।
hṛdi sargodayo ananyarūpas svākārarūpataḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

ākāśarūpa ākāśe paramākāśa kathyatām ।
bhūyo nipuṇabodhāya kathaṃ sargaḥ pravartate ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

śṛṇu rāma yathā tatra svayambhūtvaṃ mayā tadā ।
anubhūtam asat sadvad idaṃ svapnanaropamam ।। 

tam ālokya mahākalpasaṃrambhaṃ vyomarūpiṇā ।
bhāge anyatra śarīrasya saṃvid unmeṣitā mayā ।। 

yadaiva sāmalā saṃvit kiñcid unmeṣitā sthitā ।
tadaivāhaṃ kvacit tatra paśyāmy āśyānatām iva ।। 

gatas svabhāvaṃ cidvyoma yathā tvaṃ rāma nidrayā ।
jāgrad vā svapnalokaṃ vā viśan vetsi manāg ghanam ।। 

cinmātrākāśam evādau tato asmīty eva vedanam ।
tad ghanaṃ kathyate buddhiḥ sā ghanā mana ucyate ।। 

tad vetti śabdatanmātraṃ tanmātrāṇītarāṇy atha ।
pañcendriyāṇi tatsthaulyād itīndriyagaṇodayaḥ ।। 

suṣuptād viśatas svapnaṃ jagaddṛśyavanodayaḥ ।
yathā tathaiva sargādau dṛśyaṃ bhāti nimeṣataḥ ।। 

tulyakālam anante asmin dṛśyajālāvabhāsane ।
kathayanti kramaṃ kecit kecin na kathayanti ca ।। 

paramāṇukaṇaṃ kāntaṃ sampannam anubhūtavān ।
ahaṃ cetanam ātmānaṃ vastuto amalam eva kham ।। 

yathā svabhāvato vyomni calaty evāniśaṃ marut ।
tathā svabhāvāt sarvatra paśyaty evaṃ vapuś citiḥ ।। 

yādṛśaṃ cetitaṃ rūpaṃ śaktyā paramayānayā ।
tac chaknoty anyathā kartuṃ naiṣā yatnena bhūyasā ।। 

tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvat sampanno asmy aṇurūpakaḥ ।
cittvāc cetaṃs tad evāśu tathābhūto asmi saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

tato ahaṃ buddhavān rūpaṃ tanu tejaḥkaṇākṛti ।
tad eva bhāvayan paścād gato ahaṃ sthūlatām iva ।। 

prekṣe tāvad ahaṃ kiñcid iti bodhāl laghos tataḥ ।
manāg ālokanāyeva sampravṛtto anubhūtavān ।
yan nāma tatra tat kiñcit tasyehādya raghūdvaha ।। 

śṛṇu nāmāni mukhyāni kalpitāni bhavādṛśaiḥ ।
draṣṭuṃ pravṛtto randhreṇa yena tac cakṣur ucyate ।। 

yac ca paśyāmi tad dṛśyaṃ darśanaṃ tu phalaṃ tataḥ ।
yadā paśyāmi kālo asau yathā paśyāmi sa kramaḥ ।। 

prauḍhā niyatir ity adya yatra paśyāmi tan nabhaḥ ।
sthito asmi yatra deśo asāv ity ādyaiṣā prakalpanā ।। 

tadā tv ahaṃ vidunmeṣamātram etasya kāraṇam ।
paśyāmīti tatas tatra manāg bodho mamodabhūt ।। 

tato randhradvayenāham apaśyaṃ yat tad asti kham ।
yābhyām apaśyaṃ randhrābhyāṃ ta ime locane sthite ।। 

tataḥ kiñcic chṛṇomīti saṃvid abhyuditā mama ।
tataḥ kiñcin manāṅmātrajhāṅkāraṃ śrutavān aham ।। 

ādhmātasyeva śaṅkhasya śabdaṃ vyomnas svabhāvajam ।
yābhyām aham athāśrauṣaṃ ta ime śravaṇavraṇe ।। 

pradeśābhyāṃ vicaratā marutāviratasvanam ।
sparśasaṃvedanaṃ kiñcid aham atrānubhūtavān ।। 

tatsaṃvedanamātrātma so ayaṃ vāyur iti smṛtaḥ ।
sparśanendriyatanmātram asad eveti sat sthitam ।। 

āsvādasaṃvid yābhūn me tad āsvādyarasendriyam ।
ghrāṇān me ghrāṇatanmātram uditaṃ vyomarūpiṇaḥ ।
itthaṃ na kiñcit sampannaṃ sarvaṃ sampannam atra me ।। 

evam indriyatanmātrajālaṃ cetann ahaṃ sthitaḥ ।
yāvat tāvad vidaḥ pañca balād iva mamoditāḥ ।। 

śabdarūparasasparśagandhamātraśarīrikāḥ ।
anākārās tathānāmnyaḥ kharūpiṇyo bhramātmikāḥ ।। 

evaṃrūpam ahaṃ jālaṃ bhāvayan yat tadā sthitaḥ ।
tad ahaṅkāra ity adya kathyate tvādṛśair janaiḥ ।। 

eṣa eva ghanībhūto buddhir ity abhidhīyate ।
sātha buddhir ghanībhūtā mana ity abhidhīyate ।। 

antaḥkaraṇarūpaḥ kham eva tatrāham āsthitaḥ ।
ātivāhikadehātmā cinmayavyomarūpavān ।। 

pavanād apy ahaṃ śūnyaḥ kevalākāśamātrakam ।
sarveṣām eva bhāvānāṃ śūnyākṛtir arodhakaḥ ।। 

athainaṃ bhāvayann ahaṃ yadā tatra sthiraṃ sthitaḥ ।
tadāhaṃ dehavān puṣṭa iti me pratyayo abhavat ।। 

tenāhaṃ pratyayenātha śabdaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttavān ।
śūnya eva yathā suptas svapnoḍḍīno naro ravam ।। 

atha pūrvaṃ kṛtaś śabdo bāleneva tad om iti ।
tatas sa eṣa oṅkāra iti nītaḥ punaḥ prathām ।। 

tatas svapne nareṇeva yat kiñcid gaditaṃ mayā ।
tad etad viddhi vācaṃ tvaṃ paścān nītāṃ prathām iha ।। 

brahmaiva so asmi sampannas sṛṣṭeḥ kartā jagadguruḥ ।
tato manomayenaiva kalpitās sṛṣṭayo mayā ।। 

evam asmi samutpanno na tu jāto asmi kiñcana ।
dṛṣṭavān asmi brahmāṇḍaṃ tan na kiñcana kutracit ।। 

evaṃ jagati sampanne mamaitasmin manomaye ।
na kiñcit tatra sampannaṃ tac chūnyaṃ vyoma kevalam ।। 

itthaṃ saṃśūnyam evedaṃ sarvaṃ vedanamātrakam ।
na manāg api santy ete bhāvāḥ pṛthvyādayaḥ kila ।। 

jaganmṛgatṛḍambūni bhānti saṃvidi saṃvidaḥ ।
na bāhyam asti nābāhyaṃ khe tad vyoma tathā sthitam ।। 

marau nāsty eva salilaṃ saṃvit paśyati tat tathā ।
nirmūlam antassantaptā svasambhramavatī bhramam ।। 

nāsty eva brahmaṇi jagat saṃvit paśyati tat tathā ।
nirmūlam eva saṃvittvād eva bhrānteś ca sambhramam ।। 

asad evedam ābhāti hṛdy eva jagad ātatam ।
saṅkalpanamanorājyakathāsvapnapurādivat ।। 

pārśvasuptajanasvapnas taccittāveśanaṃ vinā ।
yathā na kiñcit taccittāveśanāt tv anubhūyate ।। 

tathā na kiñcit evedaṃ cittāveśena vedyate ।
ādarśabimbitākāraṃ dṛṣṭam apy anyathā tv asat ।। 

ādhibhautikabhāvena netreṇa yadi lakṣyate ।
tat tan na dṛśyate kiñcid girir evopadṛśyate ।। 

ātivāhikadehena parabodhadṛśā yadi ।
prekṣyate dṛśyate sargaḥ paramātmaiva vāmalaḥ ।। 

sarvatra sarganirmāṇaṃ prajñālokena lakṣyate ।
brahmātmaivānyathā tv etan na kiñcid api lakṣyate ।। 

yat paśyaty avadātā dhīs sopapattivicāraṇā ।
na tan netrais tribhiś śarvo nendro netraśatair api ।। 

yathā kham āvṛtaṃ sargais tathā bhūr iti buddhavān ।
tadāham abhavaṃ dhyātā dharādhāraṇayā yutaḥ ।। 

tayā dharādhāraṇayā dharārūpadharo abhavam ।
atyajann eva cidvyomavapus samrāḍ ivācirāt ।। 

dharādhāraṇayāśv eva dharādhātūdaraṃ gataḥ ।
dvīpādritṛṇavṛkṣādi dehe aham anubhūtavān ।। 

sampanno asmy atha bhūpīṭhaṃ nānāvanatanūruham ।
nānāratnāvalīvyāptaṃ nānānagarabhūṣaṇam ।। 

grāmagahvaraparvāḍhyaṃ pātālasuṣirodaram ।
kulācalabhujāśliṣṭadvīpābdhivalayānvitam ।। 

tṛṇaughatanuromāḍhyaṃ giriṣaṇḍakagulphakam ।
digvāraṇakaṭavyūḍhaṃ dhṛtaṃ śeṣaśiraśśataiḥ ।। 

hriyamāṇaṃ mahīpālaiś śobhamānaṃ tathartubhiḥ ।
prāṇibhir bhujyamānāṅgaṃ vardhamānaṃ vyavasthayā ।। 

himavadvindhyasuskandhaṃ sumerūdārakandharam ।
gaṅgādisaridāpūramuktāhāraraṇattanu ।। 

guhāgahanakacchādi sāgarādarśamaṇḍalam ।
marūṣarasthalaśvaitryam ambarāmbarasundaram ।। 

bhūtapūraiḥ parāpūrṇaṃ paridhūtaṃ mahārṇavaiḥ ।
alaṅkṛtaṃ puṣpavanais samālabdhaṃ rajogaṇaiḥ ।। 

nityaṃ kṛṣīvalaiḥ kṛṣṭaṃ vījitaṃ śiśirānilaiḥ ।
tāpitaṃ tapanais taptair ukṣitaṃ prāvṛḍambubhiḥ ।। 

vipulāgrasthaloraskaṃ padmākaraśatekṣaṇam ।
sitāsitaghanoṣṇīṣaṃ daśāśodaramandiram ।। 

lokālokamahākhātavalayogrāsyabhīṣaṇam ।
anantabhūtasaṅghātaparispandaikacetanam ।। 

vyāptam antar bahiś caiva nānābhūtagaṇaiḥ pṛthak ।
devadānavagandharvair bahir antas tu kīṭakaiḥ ।। 

pātālendriyarandhreṣu nāgāsurakrimivrajaiḥ ।
saptasv arṇavakośeṣu nānājātijalecaraiḥ ।। 

vyāptaṃ nadīvanasamudradigantaśailadvīpābdajantuvijayasthalajaṅgalaughaiḥ ।
nānāvanāvalitamaṇḍalakoṭṭaṣaṇḍavallīsarassaridarātiraṇābjaṣaṇḍaiḥ ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne pārthivadhātvantargatajagadānantyavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

bhūpīṭhena satā tatra mayā tadanu mānada ।
anubhūtaṃ nadanadīnādinedaṃ dine dine ।। 

kvacin maraṇasākrandanārīkaruṇavedanam ।
kvacid uttāṇḍavastraiṇamahotsavamahāsukham ।। 

kvacid durvāradurbhikṣadurākrandadurīhitam ।
kvacit sakalasasyaughasampannaghanasauhṛdam ।। 

kvacid agnimahādāhadagdhadeśograrodanam ।
kvacij jalaplavālūnapurapattanakhaṇḍakam ।। 

kvacic capalasāmantakṛtaluṇṭhanamaṇḍalam ।
kvacid uddāmadaurātmyarakṣaḥpaiśācamaṇḍalam ।। 

kvacij jalāśayollāsavellanotpulakāṅgakam ।
kandarodaraniṣkrāntavātavellitavāridam ।। 

saṃvidbodhonnamatsvāṅgakośotthāṅkuralomakam ।
vārivāraṇavikṣobhanatonnatalasattalam ।। 

saśṛṅgabhairavaśvabhrapurādrivanajhampanam ।
sandhimaṇḍalasañcālalekhāṅkamṛdukampanam ।। 

kvacit sāmantasaṅkṣubdhasainyasaṃharaṇaṃ raṇe ।
kvacit somyasukhāsīnasarvasāmantamaṇḍalam ।। 

araṇyaṃ kvacid āśūnyam ullasadvātabhāṅkṛti ।
jaṅgalaṃ kvacid ālūnavyuptasampannasasyakam ।। 

haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇasaraḥ phullāmbujaṃ kvacit ।
kvacin marusthalaṃ sthūlastambhābhārjunamārutam ।। 

kvacid dhradanadīvāhahelānikaṣaghargharam ।
kvacid aṅkurakāryaṅgasiktabījāsyajṛmbhaṇam ।। 

kvacid antassthakīṭāsyamṛduspandanavedanam ।
māṃ tvam evāśu buddhveha trāyasvetīva bodhanam ।। 

śākhāparikarābhogamṛdbhāgāṅganipīḍanaiḥ ।
mūlajālam avaṣṭabhya kvacid viṭapidhāraṇam ।। 

anyo'nyam alam ākramya diktaṭāṅganipīḍanaiḥ ।
kvacid adryasthinibiḍair arṇavollāsavellitam ।। 

śuṣkapallavasaṅkocanibiḍāṅganipīḍanam ।
amarṣaṇaiḥ karair ārkais svarasākarṣaṇaṃ kvacit ।। 

śṛṅgamandiramātaṅgaprahārāśanibhūruhām ।
nibiḍāṅgotkaṭasthairyaparuṣaṃ patanaṃ kvacit ।। 

nimīlitekṣaṇāmandatanūnnāmasamakramam ।
kvacit sūkṣmarasollekham aṅkurollasanaṃ navam ।। 

makṣikāyaukamaṣakanikāṣasadṛśaṃ kvacit ।
kuddālaśaṅkutuṅgārihalahelānikarṣaṇam ।। 

śītaṃ śītaviśīrṇāṅgajarjaratvagvikīrṇamṛt ।
pāṣāṇībhūtasalilaṃ kvacit paruṣamārutam ।। 

udgālībhūtamṛdvaṅgamajjadantaḥkrimivrajam ।
kvacid udbhavadabjādimūlaṃ jalanimajjanam ।। 

śanair antarnilīnāmbukṛtāhlādaṃ bahiḥkharam ।
sonnāmāṅkuraromaughaṃ kvacid dharṣavijṛmbhitam ।। 

tanutarapavanavikampitakomalanalinīdalāstaraṇaiḥ ।
virahiṇa iva me vihitaṃ sarobhir aṅgeṣu nirvāṇam ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne bhūmaṇḍalāśayavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

pārthivīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā jaganti samavekṣitum ।
sampannas tvam ayaṃ bhūmer lokaḥ kim uta mānasaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

idaṃ ca mānasaṃ cāhaṃ sampannaḥ pṛthubhūtalam ।
nedaṃ na mānasaṃ caiva sampanno vastutas tv aham ।। 

amānasaṃ mahīpīṭhaṃ na sambhavati kiñcana ।
yad asad vetsi yat sad vā manomātrakam eva tat ।। 

cidākāśam ahaṃ śuddhaṃ tasya me ananyad ātmanaḥ ।
yac cinmātrātmakacanaṃ tat saṅkalpābhidhaṃ smṛtam ।। 

tan manas tan mahīpīṭhaṃ taj jagat sa pitāmahaḥ ।
saṅkalpapuravad vyomni kacaty etan manonabhaḥ ।। 

evaṃ saṅkalpamātraṃ me manomātraṃ tad ātatam ।
dhāraṇābhyāsasampuṣṭaṃ bhūmaṇḍalam iti sthitam ।। 

nedaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tad vai tadanyad dhi manomayam ।
ākāśamātrakacanam acetyaṃ kacanaṃ citeḥ ।। 

tad evākāśamātrātma tathābhūtaṃ cirasthiteḥ ।
idampratyayalabdhatvān mānasatvaṃ samujjhati ।। 

idaṃ sthiraṃ sukaṭhinaṃ vitataṃ bhūmimaṇḍalam ।
astīti jāyate buddhir vyomny eva ciravedanāt ।। 

nyāyenedam ivānena tat sthitaṃ vasudhātalam ।
idaṃ na caivam evādya sargasyādāv upāgatam ।। 

yathā svapne puratvena cid eva vyomni bhāsate ।
tathā cid eva sargādāv idaṃ jagad iti sthitā ।। 

viddhi cidrūpabālasya manorājyaṃ jagattrayam ।
mahītalādikaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ sargaṃ ca sarvadā ।। 

cidrūpasyātmano nānyas saṅkalpas tanmayaṃ jagat ।
vastutas tu na piṇḍātma na satyātma na bhāsuram ।। 

dṛśyam asty aparijñātaṃ parijñātaṃ na vidyate ।
parijñānaṃ tad evāsya śṛṇoṣi yad idaṃ ciram ।। 

sarvaṃ cinmātram ākāśaṃ prakacaty ātmanātmani ।
bhūmaṇḍalātma dṛśyātma dvaitaikyābhyāṃ vivarjitam ।। 

maṇir yathā svabhāvena śuklapītādikās tviṣaḥ ।
akurvann eva kurute cidākāśas tathā jagat ।। 

yato na kiñcit kurute na ca rūpaṃ samujjhati ।
tasmān na mānasaṃ nedaṃ kiñcid asti mahītalam ।। 

mahītalam ivābhāti cidvyomaiva nirantaram ।
ātmany evātalaṃ vyoma yathāmalatalaṃ sthitam ।। 

svabhāvamātrakacanaṃ tat tadā me tathā sthitam ।
bhūmaṇḍalam ivātyacchaṃ kham eva vitatāntaram ।। 

idaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tac ca dvayam etan mahāciteḥ ।
svarūpam eva kacati tava svapnapuraṃ yathā ।। 

cirakālapratyayatas sthiram ity avagamyate ।
parijñātaṃ yathābhūtaṃ cidvyomaiva nirantaram ।। 

idam ākāśamātrātma tad apy ākāśamātrakam ।
ajñānān na parijñānāj jñānān nedaṃ na tat kvacit ।। 

trailokyabhūtajālānāṃ kālatritayabhāvinām ।
sambhramasvapnasaṅkalpamanorājyadaśāsthitau ।। 

bhūtāni ca bhaviṣyanti vartamānāni yāni ca ।
bhūmaṇḍalāni tāny aṅga sattāsāmānyatāṅgataḥ ।। 

aham eva samagrāṇi teṣām antargatāny api ।
tena tāny anubhūtāni tathā dṛṣṭāni cākhilam ।। 

cinmātram etad ajaraṃ padam ātmatattvaṃ śuddhātmatām ajahad aṅgagataṃ bibharti ।
sarvaṃ yathāsthitam idaṃ jagatāṃ tu bhedaṃ buddhaṃ sad aṅga na bibharti tu kiñcanāpi ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne dṛśyaprakāśatvapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

saptacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

rāmaḥ

anantaraṃ vada brahmañ jaganti bhavatā tadā ।
bhūmaṇḍalānāṃ hṛdaye kaccit dṛṣṭāni vā na vā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

parātmajāgratsvapnorvīmaṇḍalaughātmanā mayā ।
tato anubhūtaṃ hṛdaye dṛṣṭaṃ ca parayā dṛśā ।। 

yāvat tathaiva sarvatra jagajjālam avasthitam ।
sarvaṃ dṛśyamayaṃ śāntam api dvaitamayātmakam ।। 

jaganti santi sarvatra sarvatra brahma saṃsthitam ।
sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ sarvam ārambhamantharam ।। 

sarvatraivāsti pṛthvyādi sthūlaṃ tac ca na kiñcana ।
cidvyomaiva yathā svapnapuraṃ param ajaṃ na tat ।। 

nehānānāsti no nānā na nāstitvaṃ na cāstitā ।
