aham ity eva naivāsti yatra tatra kuto astu kim ।। 

anubhūtam apīdaṃ sad ahamityādidṛśyakam ।
nāsty eva yadi vāpy asti tad brahmājam anāmakam ।। 

yat svapnapuram evedaṃ sargādāv eva vinnabhaḥ ।
astitānāstite tatra kīdṛśe kva kutas sthite ।। 

yathāhaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tāni jaganty avanirūpadhṛt ।
tathā mayā jalībhūya dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśam eva tat ।। 

vāridhāraṇayā vāri bhūtvā jaḍam ivājaḍam ।
samudramandireṣv antaś ciraṃ gulagulāyitam ।। 

tṛṇavṛkṣalatāgulmavallīnāṃ stambhanāḍiṣu ।
mṛdv alakṣitam ārūḍhaṃ tavāṅgeṣv iva yūkayā ।। 

sarvotthānopamā stambhe tacchede valayopamā ।
mṛdvyā karṇāhigatyeva racanābhre kṛtodare ।। 

vallītamālatālādipallaveṣu phaleṣu ca ।
viśramya puṣṭayākṛtyā rekhāviracanaṃ kṛtam ।। 

mukhenāviśya hṛdayam ṛtuvaidhuryadhāriṇā ।
vṛtā vidhuritā bhuktā lūnā deheṣu dhātavaḥ ।। 

suptaṃ pallavatalpeṣu prāleyakaṇarūpiṇā ।
tulyakālam aśeṣeṣu dikṣu sarvāsv akhedinā ।। 

nānāhradanadīgehagāmināviratādhvanā ।
viśrāntaṃ setusuhṛdaḥ prasādena kvacit kvacit ।। 

vidā vidanusandhānāj jaḍena tadanāśrayāt ।
jalāśayeṣūllasitaṃ jalenāvartavṛttinā ।। 

mayā duṣkṛtinevordhvāc chilāstambhena bhūbhṛtām ।
sāvartavṛttinā śvabhrapāteṣu śatadhā gatam ।। 

dhūmarūpeṇa nirgatya dārubhyo gaganārṇave ।
kaṇaratnena nīlarkṣamaṇāv āvartinā sthitam ।। 

viśrāntam abhrapīṭheṣu vidyudvanitayā saha ।
bhinnendranīlanīlena śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā ।। 

paramāṇumaye sarge piṇḍarūpeṣv alakṣitam ।
sthitam antaḥ padārtheṣu brahmaṇevābilātmanā ।। 

prāpya jihvāṇubhis saṅgam anubhūtiḥ kṛtottamā ।
yā nātmano na dehasya manye jñānasya kevalam ।। 

na mayā na ca dehena nānyenāsvāditātma yat ।
tad antar vidhṛtaṃ śaityam ajñānāya tad apy asat ।। 

sarvarturasarūpeṇa nānāmodāni dikṣv alam ।
bhuktāni puṣpajālāni procchiṣṭaṃ dadatālaye ।। 

caturdaśaprakārāṇāṃ bhūtānām aṅgasandhiṣu ।
uṣitaṃ cetaneneva jaḍenāpy ajaḍātmanā ।। 

śīkarotkararūpeṇa ratham āruhya mārutam ।
āmodeneva vihṛtaṃ vimalavyomavīthiṣu ।। 

rāma tasyām avasthāyāṃ paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati ।
anubhūtam aśeṣeṇa yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat ।। 

ajaḍena jaḍeneva mayā jalatayā tayā ।
antas sarvapadārthānāṃ jñātājñātena saṃsthitam ।। 

jagatāṃ tatra lakṣāṇi nāśotpādaśatāni ca ।
mayā dṛṣṭāni rūḍhāni kadalīdalapīṭhavat ।। 

evaṃ jagac cājagad vā sākāraṃ vā nirākṛti ।
cinmātragaganaṃ sarvam ākāśādhikanirmalam ।। 

na kaścana tvaṃ na ca kiñcanedaṃ śuddhaḥ paro bodha idaṃ vibhāti ।
sa cāpi no kiñcana nāpi śūnyam ākāśam evāsi viśaṅkam āssva ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne jalaparamāṇvantargatajagadvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

aṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tato aham abhavaṃ tejas tejodhāraṇayeddhayā ।
candrārkatārakāgnyādivicitrāvayavānvitam ।। 

nityaṃ sattvapradhānatvāt prakāśākṛtirājavat ।
sarvadṛśyam ṛte sarvacaurād dhvāntāt pratāpayuk ।। 

dīpādibhiś carais snigdhair daśāśatavihāribhiḥ ।
pratyakṣīkṛtasarvārthaṃ pratigehaṃ surājavat ।। 

lokālokena hṛṣitaiḥ pratyakṣādyāṃśuromabhiḥ ।
paraprakāśaikaratair dūrotkṣiptāsitāmbaram ।। 

andhakārasya dainyasya samastaguṇanāśinaḥ ।
adṛśyaṃ dṛśyam aniśaṃ sarvasya guṇaśālinaḥ ।। 

tamastamālaparaśuḥ paraśuddhikaraṃ padam ।
suvarṇamaṇimāṇikyamuktādijanajīvitam ।। 

śuklakṛṣṇāruṇādīnāṃ bhittyaṅgotsaṅgaśāyinām ।
putrāṇām iva varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehadaḥ pitā ।। 

ghanasnehadaśaṃ pṛthvyā rakṣitānilavedhanam ।
gṛhaṃ prati ghanānandair dhṛtadīpakaputrakam ।। 

dṛṣṭaṃ pātālakeṣv īṣat tamorūpiṣu pāvanam ।
ardhadṛṣṭaṃ rajorūpe bhūtale bhūtamālite ।। 

sattvātmasu mahāsattvaṃ nityasthaṃ devasadmasu ।
jagajjīrṇakuṭīdīpaḥ kūpo andhatamaso mahān ।। 

digvadhūvimalādarśo niśānīhāramārutaḥ ।
sattvaṃ candrārkavahnīnāṃ kuṅkumālepanaṃ divaḥ ।। 

kedāraṃ dinasasyānāṃ tamo'mbūnām avagrahaḥ ।
nabhaḥkācabṛhatpātrakṣālanāmbu samullasat ।। 

sattāpradatayārthānāṃ prakāśakatayāpi ca ।
cinmātraparamārthasya sahodara ivānujaḥ ।। 

kriyākamalinībhānur bhūtalodarajīvitam ।
rūpālokamanaskāracamatkāre citir yathā ।। 

nabhastalagatāsaṅkhyanakṣatramaṇimālitaḥ ।
dinartuvatsarāvarto vāḍavāgnyādiphenilaḥ ।। 

candrārkāditaraṅgo antarajaḍo apaṅkilo mahān ।
bṛhadbrahmāṇḍakhātastho nityam ekārṇavo akṣayaḥ ।। 

hemādiṣu suvarṇatvaṃ narādiṣu parākramaḥ ।
kācakacyaṃ ca ratnādiṣv arkādiṣv avabhāsanam ।। 

jyotsnā mukhendubimbeṣu pakṣmalekṣaṇalakṣmasu ।
sravatsnehāmṛtāpūro hāsas sauhārdabhāsanam ।। 

kapolabāhunetrākṣibhrūkarālakalāsakaḥ ।
nijo ajeyatayā jāto vilāsaḥ kāminījane ।। 

tṛṇīkṛtatribhuvanaṃ capeṭāsphoṭitadviṣam ।
śirassu vajrīkaraṇaṃ vīryaṃ siṃhādicetasi ।। 

kaṭukaṅkaṭakuṭṭākakhaḍgasaṅghaṭṭaṭāṅkṛteḥ ।
paṭusphuṭāsphoṭaraṭi bhaṭeṣv aṭanam udbhaṭam ।। 

deveṣu dānavāritvaṃ surāritvaṃ surāriṣu ।
sarvabhūteṣu saujastvam unnāmas sthāvarādiṣu ।। 

atha hema bhavan bhāsvāṃs tatrāham anubhūtavān ।
jagadākāśakośeṣu teṣu tāmarasekṣaṇa ।। 

digantadaśakāstīrṇaiḥ karajālair jagatkhagam ।
gṛhṇad adryaṅgam arkatvaṃ grāmavaddṛṣṭabhūtalam ।। 

vyomotpale kośacakraṃ vāḍavaṃ timirārṇave ।
brahmāṇḍasadane dīpo vṛkṣo dinaphalāvaleḥ ।। 

rasāyanahradākāram indutvaṃ vadanaṃ divaḥ ।
niśāniśācarīhāso vikāso rajanīdiśām ।। 

jagallāvaṇyalakṣmīnāṃ sarvāsām upamāspadam ।
rajanīrohiṇīnārīkairavāṇāṃ paraṃ priyam ।। 

netravṛndaṃ khaśakrasya dyulatāpuṣpajālakam ।
svargaukomaṣakavyūhaṃ tārakāpaṭalaṃ pṛthu ।। 

vaṇiṅmārge vaṇigghastatalatolanadolitam ।
ratnatvaṃ jalakallolahastāndolitam abdhibhiḥ ।। 

abdābdhau śapharāvartam abdāge mañjarīgaṇaḥ ।
abdādrau dāvadahano vaidyutaṃ dyotanaṃ tarau ।। 

dārudāruṇadurvāraṃ dīptaṃ jvalanacālanam ।
yajñāgnidāhakalpāntavisphoṭakaṭhināravam ।। 

kacatkāñcanamāṇikyamuktāmaṇimayaṃ mahaḥ ।
tamastāṃ nītam ākṣipya pāṇḍityam iva pāmaraiḥ ।। 

viśrāntaṃ stanatuṅgeṣu muktāhāratayā mayā ।
asuroragagandharvanaranāyakayoṣitām ।। 

pādāhatiśataṃ mārge tilakatvaṃ vadhūmukhe ।
khadyotena mayā labdhaṃ paśyāvasthāsu cāpalam ।। 

kvacid vidyuttayābhreṣu śapharyevārṇaveṣv iha ।
khastheṣu vihṛtaṃ cāru vāryāvartavirāviṣu ।। 

kvacid dīpatayā nīpakalikākomalāṅgayā ।
antaḥpureṣu kāntānāṃ suratālokanaṃ kṛtam ।। 

kvacit kajjalajālasya jvālātvena kacākṛteḥ ।
khe antar nilīnaṃ kūrmāṅgasaṅgheneva svakoṭare ।। 

kalpānteṣu kvacit sarvajagadgrāsaghanaśramāt ।
khe kajjalāsite līnaṃ ruddhe abhra iva vidyutā ।। 

kvacid ākalpam āpīya vaḍavāgnitayā jalam ।
jagatsu gaganeneva na tṛptaṃ jalarāśiṣu ।। 

kvacid ulmukadantena mayā jvālābhujātmanā ।
viloladhūmāvartograkuntalenākulaujasā ।। 

purapalvalavāheṣu kavalīkṛtajantunā ।
kṛtāṣ ṭakārāḥ kāṣṭhādipadārthāsvādanoditāḥ ।। 

hatena śastrapāṣāṇair ayaḥpiṇḍādivāsinā ।
hantṛdāhārtham udgīrṇāḥ kaṇāḥ kopalavāḥ kvacit ।। 

kvacin mahāśilākośe pāṣāṇamaṇinā mayā ।
samastabhūtādṛśyena sthitaṃ yugaśatāny api ।। 

rāmaḥ

mune tasyām avasthāyām anubhūtaṃ tvayā sukham ।
uta duḥkham iti brūhi bodhāya mama mānada ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

yathā yāti naras supto jaḍatāṃ cetano api san ।
cidvyoma gacchad dṛśyatvaṃ tathā jāḍyaṃ pracetati ।। 

ātmānaṃ cetati brahma pṛthvyādīva yadā tadā ।
suptaṃ jaḍam ivāste antas syād asya na tad anyathā ।। 

vastutas tv asya khorvyādi nāsadrūpaṃ na sanmayam ।
draṣṭṛdṛśyam ivābhāti brahmaivaitat samaṃ sthitam ।। 

etat satyaṃ parijñānaṃ yasyotpannam akhaṇḍitam ।
na tasya pañcabhūtāni na draṣṭṛdṛśyavibhramaḥ ।। 

tadā mayaivaṃ śuddhena tat kṛtaṃ brahmarūpiṇā ।
brahmarūpād ṛte kiñcid etat kartuṃ na yujyate ।। 

yadā sarvam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jñātaṃ brahma nirāmayam ।
tadā brahmapadasthena mayātmaivaivam īkṣitaḥ ।। 

yadā punar ahaṃ pañcabhūtānīty eva bhāvayan ।
bhavāmi jaḍa evāhaṃ tadā cetāmi kiṃ kila ।। 

supto asmīti dṛḍhaṃ bhāvaṃ buddhavāṃś cetano api san ।
naidram evaity alaṃ jāḍyaṃ na sa cetati kiñcana ।। 

yas tu prajñāprabuddhātmā dehas tasyādhibhautikaḥ ।
śāmyaty udeti vimalo bodhātmaivātivāhikaḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehena tena bodhātmanāṇunā ।
bṛhatā vā yathākāmaṃ nirvāṇātmā sa tiṣṭhate ।। 

bodhadehena hṛdayaṃ śilānām apy abhedinā ।
praviśyāśu viniryāti yāti pātālam ambaram ।। 

tasmān mayā purā rāma bodhadehena tat tadā ।
tathā kṛtam anantena cinmayavyomarūpiṇā ।। 

vajrapāṣāṇapātālanabho'ntaragamāgamān ।
kurvatas tādṛśasyāśu na vighna upajāyate ।। 

bodhamātraśarīreṇa yāvad āste jaḍeṣv asau ।
padārtheṣu tathābhūtas tāvat tatrāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

svecchayaiva calitvātha tato anyatra prayāti cet ।
tat tatraiva sthitiṃ yāti tathaivāṅga matir yathā ।। 

bodhamātraṃ vidur deham ātivāhikam avyayam ।
idānīṃ tvaṃ tam eveha buddho anubhavasi svayam ।। 

cinmātravyomarūpo asmīty arkādāv iti bodhataḥ ।
ātmaivāstam upānītas sann evāsann ivātmanā ।। 

sthitaṃ svapnādijagati tamasevāsateva vā ।
āvṛteneva vānyāsām alabhyena satā dṛśām ।। 

taraṅgalekhayāṅgārasaritas svāṅgalagnayā ।
manorājyaśriyevāśu protpannastabdhadehayā ।। 

kajjalālikayā vahnivipine puṣpaśobhayā ।
phullatsthalāmbujāsārakiṃśukāśokarūpayā ।। 

vitatārambhayāpy uccair jvālājālatayeddhayā ।
utthāyotthāya valitaṃ khalalakṣmyeva lolayā ।। 

tejastayāpi paramāṇukaṇodare api dṛṣṭettham evam iha rāma mayā jagacchrīḥ ।
anyā ca sā na ca cidambarataḥ parasmāt svapne purācalagaṇo atra nidarśanaṃ vaḥ ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne tejaḥparamāṇujagadvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekonapañcāśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha vātamayīṃ dhattvā jagatprekṣaṇakautukāt ।
dhāraṇāṃ dhīrayā vṛttyā vātatām aham āgataḥ ।। 

sampanno asmy anilo vallīlalanālokalāsakaḥ ।
kamalotpalakundādijālakāmodapālakaḥ ।। 

śīkarotkaranīhārahelāharaṇatarṣulaḥ ।
surataśrāntasarvāṅgasamāhlādanaharṣulaḥ ।। 

tṛṇagulmalatāvallīdalatāṇḍavapaṇḍitaḥ ।
latauṣadhiphalollāsakusumāmodamaṇḍitaḥ ।। 

mṛdur maṅgalakāleṣu lalanālakacālakaḥ ।
bhīma utpātavāteṣu parṇavatprauḍhaparvataḥ ।। 

nandane kundamandāramakarandarajo'ruṇaḥ ।
narake aṅgārasambhāro bhuvi nīhārabhāsuraḥ ।। 

sāgare asaralāvartalekhānumitasarpaṇaḥ ।
divi vāridasañcāramṛṣṭāmṛṣṭendudarpaṇaḥ ।। 

nakṣatrakṣatrasainyasya ratho raṃhovibṛṃhitaḥ ।
trailokyasiddhasañcāravimānadharaṇehitaḥ ।। 

sahodara iva kṣipragāmitvād asya cetasaḥ ।
anaṅgo api samastāṅgas spandanānandacandanaḥ ।। 

tuṣāraśīkarāsārajarāromavijarjaraḥ ।
āmodayauvanonmādo maunamārdavaśaiśavaḥ ।। 

nandanāmodamadhuro madhurodārasaṃsṛtiḥ ।
cārucaitrarathonmukto hṛtakāntārataśramaḥ ।। 

ciraṃ gaṅgātaraṅgāṅgadolāndolanasaśramaḥ ।
śramasvarūpajñatayā nivāritarataśramaḥ ।। 

puṣpabhāranatās sparśair vasantavanitālatāḥ ।
ciraṃ capalayaṃl loladalahastālilocanāḥ ।। 

ciraṃ bhuṅktvendubimbāṅgaṃ suptvā pūrṇābhratalpake ।
vidhūya kamalānīkam apanītarataśramaḥ ।। 

samastarajasām oko vyomagāmī turaṅgamaḥ ।
āmodamadamātaṅgasamullāsamahāsuhṛt ।। 

dhārorṇāḍhyataḍicchṛṅgapayodapaśupālakaḥ ।
tantuś śīkaramuktānām arir gharmarajorujām ।। 

ākāśakusumāmodas sarvaśabdasahodaraḥ ।
nāḍīpraṇālīsalilaṃ bhūtāṅgopāṅganartakaḥ ।। 

marmakarmakaraikātmā hṛdguhāgehakesarī ।
nityam ekāntapathikas sārathir jātavedasaḥ ।। 

āmodaratnaluṇṭhāko vimānanagarāvaniḥ ।
dāhāndhakāraśītāṃśuś śaityendukṣīrasāgaraḥ ।। 

prāṇāpānakalārajjvā prāṇināṃ yantravāhakaḥ ।
arir mitraṃ ca dīpānāṃ dvīpasañcaraṇe rataḥ ।। 

purogato apy adṛśyātmā manorājyapuropamaḥ ।
tālavṛntatile tailam ālānaṃ spandadantinaḥ ।। 

ekakṣaṇalavenaiva valitākhilabhūdharaḥ ।
varṇāvalitaraṅgāṇāṃ gaṅgāvāharavaikakṛt ।। 

śyāmāmbuvāharajasāṃ mahāvartakṛd ambhasām ।
dyunadīvāhavāryogho nabhonīlotpalālikaḥ ।। 

śarīrāveṣṭitonmuktapurāṇatṛṇacopanaḥ ।
spandapadmavanādityaś śabdavarṣaikavāridaḥ ।। 

vyomakānanamātaṅgaś śarīragṛhagargaṭaḥ ।
dhūlīkadambavipinam āśāliṅgananāyakaḥ ।। 

styānīkaraṇasaṃśoṣadhṛtispandanasaurabhaiḥ ।
saśaityaiḥ karmabhiṣ ṣaḍbhir alabdhakṣaṇa ākṣayam ।। 

rasākarṣaṇasuvyagro nityaṃ bhrāteva tejasaḥ ।
haraṇādānakartṝṇām aṅgānāṃ viniyogakṛt ।। 

śarīranagare nāḍīmārgair gatinirargalaḥ ।
rasabhāṇḍaparāvartād āyurmaṇimahāvaṇik ।। 

śarīranagarīnāśanirmāṇaikaparāyaṇaḥ ।
rasakiṭṭakalādhātupṛthakkaraṇakovidaḥ ।। 

pratisūkṣmāṇukaṃ dehe tato dṛṣṭaṃ mayā jagat ।
tatretthaṃrūpam ārambhi sphuṭam ābhogi susthiram ।। 

paramāṇuṃ prati tv atra prohyanta iva sargakāḥ ।
na ca kiñcit kilohyante khākṛteḥ kim ivohyate ।। 

sacandrārkānilāgnīndrayamavaiśravaṇeśvarāḥ ।
sabrahmaharigandharvavidyādharamahoragāḥ ।। 

sasāgaragiridvīpadigantaramahārṇavāḥ ।
salokāntaralokeśakriyākālakriyākramāḥ ।। 

sasvargabhūmipātālatalalokāntarāntarāḥ ।
sabhāvābhāvavaidhuryajarāmaraṇasambhramāḥ ।। 

evaṃ nāma tadā rāma bhūtapañcakarūpiṇā ।
mayā pravihṛtaṃ tatra trailokyanalinodare ।। 

rasaḥ pīto anubhūtaś ca kṣmājalānilatejasām ।
mūlajāleṣu vṛkṣāṇāṃ prāṇināṃ ca satā mayā ।। 

rasāyanaghanāṅgeṣu candanadravaśobhiṣu ।
luṭhitaṃ candrabimbeṣu tuṣāraśayaneṣv iva ।। 

sarvartuvanajāleṣu nānāmodāni dikṣv alam ।
bhuktāni puṣpajālāni procchiṣṭaṃ dadatālaye ।। 

natonnatāsu mṛdvīṣu svāstīrṇāsv ambarājire ।
suptaṃ śubhrābhramālāsu navanītasthalīṣv iva ।। 

sumanaḥpattramṛduṣu līnaṃ lakṣmīvilāsiṣu ।
surasiddhāṅganāṅgeṣu dūrāstasmaravāsanam ।। 

kṛtaḥ kumudakalhārakarāle nalinīvane ।
komalaḥ kalahaṃsībhir līlākalakalāravaḥ ।। 

saratsaritsirāsāramūlabhūmaṇḍalānvitāḥ ।
aṅgeṣūḍhās sphuradbhūtā lomālaya ivādrayaḥ ।। 

caturdiggrathitādīrghasaritsūtrais samudrakaiḥ ।
ādarśair iva viśrāntam aṅgeṣu pratibimbibhiḥ ।। 

bhūtasargeṇa vibhrāntaṃ siddhavidyādharādinā ।
maddehe cetitenaiva makṣikāyaukarūpiṇā ।। 

matprasādena muditair labdham arkādibhir vapuḥ ।
kṛṣṇaraktasitāpītaharitair hāritair iva ।। 

samudramudrayā saptadvīpasaptātmarūpayā ।
saṃsthayā sthāpitā bhūmiḥ prakoṣṭhe valayopamā ।। 

vidyādharapurandhrīṇāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṅgayaṣṭinā ।
adṛṣṭenaiva vihitaḥ pulakollāsa ātmanā ।। 

saritsirāsaratsārarasāni suṣirāṇi ca ।
jaganty evāsthijālāni mamāsan saṃsthitāni ca ।। 

asaṅkhyair vyomamātaṅgaiś candrārkacalacāmaraiḥ ।
uḍumbarāntar maṣakair iva maddhṛdaye sthitam ।। 

mayā pātālapādena bhūtalodaradhāriṇā ।
khamūrdhnāpi tadā rāma na tyaktā paramāṇutā ।। 

dikṣu sarvāsu sarvatra sarvadā sarvakāriṇā ।
sarvātmanāpy asarveṇa śūnyarūpeṇa saṃsthitam ।। 

kiñcittvaṃ sadakiñcittvaṃ sākṛtitvaṃ nirākṛti ।
anubhūtaṃ sajāḍyaṃ ca cetanatvam alaṃ mayā ।। 

mainākamugdhamīnasya sāgarasyāpy aṇuṃ prati ।
santi sargasahasrāṇi svanubhūtāny atho mayā ।। 

jaganty aṅge mayoḍhāni gūḍhāni prakaṭāni ca ।
pratibimbapurāṇīva makureṇājaḍātmanā ।। 

evaṃ jalānilāgnitvaṃ bhūmitvaṃ khātmanā satā ।
kṛtaṃ citeva svapneṣu bata māyā vijṛmbhate ।। 

api tasyām avasthāyāṃ jaganty ākāśakośake ।
mayā dṛṣṭāny asaṅkhyāni paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati ।। 

paramāṇuṃ prati vyoma paramāṇuṃ prati sthitam ।
sargavṛndaṃ yathā svapne svapnāntarayutaṃ puram ।। 

kham evāham abhūvaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ dvīpakuṇḍalam ।
sarvātmanāpi na vyāptaṃ kiñcanāpi mayā kvacit ।। 

samutpādayatāśeṣalatātarutṛṇāṅkurān ।
bhūtalena rasākṛṣṭyā mayārtheneva jṛmbhitam ।। 

avadātatame śuddhabodhākāśamaye mayi ।
jagallakṣāṇi tiṣṭhanti na tiṣṭhanti ca kānicit ।। 

citi cārucamatkāraṃ camatkurvanti yat svataḥ ।
svacamatkṛtayo antassthās tad etās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ ।। 

anubhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yāvat kvacana kiñcana ।
paramārthacamatkārād ṛte nehopalabhyate ।। 

pratyekaṃ viśvarūpātmā sarvakartā nirāmayaḥ ।
prabuddhaś śuddhabodhātmā sarvaṃ brahmātmakaṃ yataḥ ।। 

sarvas sarvatra sarvātmā sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ ।
etat prabuddhaviṣayam aprabuddhaṃ na vedmy aham ।। 

ākāśakośaviśadātmani citsvarūpe yeyaṃ svatā kacati sargaparampareti ।
sāntas tad eva kila tāpa ivāntar ūṣmā bhedopalambha iti nāsti sad asty anantam ।। 

vāyuparamaṇvantarjagadvarṇanaprasaṅgena paramārthasargayor aikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

pañcāśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

athaivaṃrūpasaṃvitteḥ parāvṛtya prayatnataḥ ।
tam ambarakuṭīkośadeśam āgatavān aham ।। 

yāvat tatra na paśyāmi svadehaṃ kvacana sthitam ।
paśyāmi kevalaṃ siddhaṃ kam apy anyaṃ puras sthitam ।। 

upaviṣṭaṃ samādhānaniṣṭham iṣṭapadaṃ gatam ।
somyodayam ivādityaṃ dagdhendhanam ivānalam ।। 

baddhapadmāsanaṃ śāntaṃ samādhānaniriṅganam ।
gulphadvitayamadhyasthavṛṣaṇaṃ viṣayātigam ।। 

mṛṣṭasomyasamābhogaskandhabandhurakandharam ।
susthirodaraviśrāntasthānakasthitisundaram ।। 

nābhīnikaṭagottānapāṇidvitayadīptibhiḥ ।
hṛdayāmbhojatejobhir bahissthair iva bhāsitam ।। 

śliṣṭapakṣmekṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇasarvecchaṃ svacchatāṃ gatam ।
saro nimīlitāmbhojam iva suptaṃ dinātyaye ।। 

avikṣubhitam āśāntam antaḥkaraṇakoṭaram ।
dadhānaṃ dhīrayā vṛttyā śāntotpātam ivāmbaram ।। 

apaśyatā nijaṃ dehaṃ taṃ muniṃ paśyatā puraḥ ।
idaṃ mayā tadā tatra cintitaṃ cārucetasā ।। 

ayaṃ kaścin mahāsiddhas samprāpto asmin digambare ।
cirāyāham ivaikāntaviśramārthī mahāmbaram ।। 

samādhiyogyam ekāntaṃ labheyetīha cintayā ।
kuṭī dṛṣṭeyam etena satyasaṅkalpaśālinā ।। 

madāgamanam etena tato acintayatācalam ।
taṃ maddehaṃ śavībhūtam apāsyeha kṛtā sthitiḥ ।। 

tad ihāstām ayaṃ yāmi svaṃ lokam iti niścayī ।
yāvad gantuṃ pravṛtto asmi tāvat saṅkalpanakṣayāt ।। 

sā nivṛttā kuṭī tatra sampannaṃ vyoma kevalam ।
sa siddho atha nirādhāraḥ patito adhas samādhimān ।। 

svapnasaṅkalpasaṃśāntau svapnasaṅkalpapattanam ।
yathā sāśu kuṭī naṣṭā matsaṅkalpopaśāntitaḥ ।। 

sa papāta tato dhyānī jalotpīḍa ivāmbudāt ।
khād ivānilanunno abda indur diva iva kṣaye ।। 

vaimānika ivāpuṇyaś chinnamūla iva drumaḥ ।
khāt tyakta iva pāṣāṇas sa papāta tato avanau ।। 

ahaṃ yāvad iyaṃ tāvat kuṭikāstv iti kalpane ।
kṣīṇe kuṭīkṣaye jāte sa siddhaḥ patitaḥ kṣaṇāt ।। 

patatā tena siddhena tatas saujanyakautukāt ।
sārdham evāham agamaṃ nabhaso vasudhātalam ।। 

so apatat pavanaskandhavalanāvartavṛttibhiḥ ।
saptadvīpasamudrāntagīrvāṇaramaṇāvanau ।। 

prāṇāpānordhvagāmitvāt khād yathāsthitam eva saḥ ।
spaṣṭa evordhvamūrdhorvyāṃ baddhapadmāsano apatat ।। 

na prabuddho babhūvāsāv iva nūnam acetanaḥ ।
pāṣāṇadeha iva vā vātūlātmeva vā laghuḥ ।। 

mayā tadavabodhārtham atha yatnavatā tadā ।
kṛtvā jaladatāṃ vyomno vṛṣṭaṃ garjitam ūrjitam ।। 

karakāśanipātena tena tasmin digantare ।
mayūraḥ prāvṛṣīvāsau buddho abodhi vanāvaneḥ ।। 

babhāv āsāditāṅgaśrīr vikāsitavilocanaḥ ।
dhārānikaraphullātmā prāvṛṣīvāmbujākaraḥ ।। 

prabuddhaṃ sampraśāntāyāṃ vṛṣṭau tam aham agrataḥ ।
apṛcchaṃ svaccham āvṛttyā nivṛttaṃ paramārthataḥ ।। 

kva sthito asi karoṣīdaṃ kiṃ ca bho munināyaka ।
kas tvaṃ kasmād alaṃ dūrān na bhraṃśam api cetasi ।। 

ity ukto mām asau prekṣya saṃsmṛtya prāktanīṃ gatim ।
uvāca vacanaṃ cāru cātako jaladaṃ yathā ।। 

siddhaḥ

pratipālaya me yāvat svavṛttāntaṃ smarāmy aham ।
kathayiṣyāmi te paścāt pāścātyaṃ vṛttam ātmanaḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

ity uktvā cintayitvāśu sa yathāvṛttam akṣatam ।
smṛtavān sāyam ahnīva samācaritam ātmanaḥ ।। 

mām athovāca vacanaṃ cāru candrāṃśuśītalam ।
āhlādakam anindyaṃ ca niravadyaṃ sukhodayam ।। 

siddhaḥ

adhunā tvaṃ mayā brahman parijñāto abhivādaye ।
atikramo ayaṃ kṣantavyas svabhāvo hi satāṃ kṣamā ।। 

mune ciram ahaṃ bhrānto devopavanabhūmiṣu ।
bhogāmodavimoheṣu ṣaṭpadaḥ padminīṣv iva ।। 

dṛśyanadyām atho cittajalakallolahelayā ।
cakrāvartohyamānena mayodvignena cintitam ।। 

saṃsārasāgare dṛśyakalollair aham ākulaḥ ।
kālenodvegam āyātaś cātako avagrahe yathā ।। 

saṃvinmātraikasāreṣu ramyaṃ bhogeṣu nāma kim ।
avatiṣṭhe gatodvegaṃ saṃvidvyomny eva kevalam ।। 

śabdarūparasasparśagandhamātrād ṛte param ।
neha kiñcana nāmāsti kim etāvaty alaṃ rame ।। 

vinmātrākāśam evaitat sarvaṃ vinmātram eva vā ।
tat kim atrāsadākāre rame naṣṭamatir yathā ।। 

viṣayā viṣavaiṣamyā vāmāḥ kāmavimohadāḥ ।
rasā virasavairasyā luṭhann eṣu na ko hataḥ ।। 

jīrṇajīvitajambālajaracchapharikāṃ matim ।
kāyadrumagatādātuṃ jarecchati bṛhadbakī ।। 

kāyo ayam acirāpāyo budbudo ambunidhāv iva ।
sphurann eva puro antardhiṃ yāti dīpaśikhā yathā ।। 

vividhākulakallolā cakrāvartavidhāyinī ।
mṛtijanmabṛhatkūlā sukhaduḥkhataraṅgiṇī ।। 

yauvanollāsakalilā jarādhavalaphenilā ।
kākatālīyayogena sampannasukhabudbudā ।। 

vyavahāramahāvāhalekhā jaḍarayākulā ।
rāgadveṣaghanollāsā bhūtalāloladehikā ।। 

lobhamohamahāvartā pātotpātavivartinī ।
hā taptā jīvitākhyeyaṃ nadī nadanaśītalā ।। 

apūrvāṇy upagacchanti tathā pūrvāṇi yānty alam ।
saṃsārasaridambūni saṅgatāni dhanāni ca ।। 

pravṛttā ye nivartante tair alaṃ hatabhāvakaiḥ ।
apūrvā ye pravartante teṣv apy āstheha kīdṛśī ।। 

sarvasyās sarito vāri prayāty āyāti cākarāt ।
dehanadyāḥ payas tv āyuḥ prayāty āyāti no punaḥ ।। 

śataśaḥ parivartante pratipiṇḍaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prati ।
kulālacakrikābhāvā iva bhāvā bhavāmbudhau ।। 

caranti caturāś caurā viṣamā viṣayārayaḥ ।
haranti bhāvasarvasvaṃ jāgarmi svapimīha kim ।। 

āyuṣaḥ khaṇḍakhaṇḍāś ca nipatantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
na kaścid vetti kālena kṛtāni divasāny aho ।। 

idam adya tathedaṃ śvas tathedam idam adya me ।
evaṃkalanayā loko gataṃ prāptaṃ na vetty aho ।। 

bhuktaṃ pītam anantāsu bhrāntaṃ ca bhavabhūmiṣu ।
dṛṣṭāni sukhaduḥkhāni kim anyad iha sādhyate ।। 

sukhaduḥkhānubhavanād bhūyo bhūyo vivartanāt ।
anityatvāc ca bhāvānāṃ sthitā niṣkautukā vayam ।। 

bhuktāni bhogavṛndāni dṛṣṭā cānityatā bhṛśam ।
nopalabhyata evātiviśrāntir iha kutracit ।। 

bhrāntam uttuṅgaśṛṅgāsu merūpavanabhūmiṣu ।
lokapālapurīṣūccais samprāptaṃ kim akṛtrimam ।। 

sarvatra dārubhir vṛkṣā māṃsair bhūtāni bhūr mṛdā ।
duḥkhāny anityatā ceti katham āśvāsyate vada ।। 

na dhanāni na mitrāṇi na sukhāni na bandhavaḥ ।
śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ kālena kalitaṃ janam ।। 

jano jaraḍhajīmūtajālavad girikukṣiṣu ।
yāty antaśśūnya evāstaṃ pāṃsūpacayapelavaḥ ।। 

neme manoramāḥ kāmā na ca ramyā vibhūtayaḥ ।
idaṃ mattāṅganāpāṅgabhaṅgalolaṃ ca jīvitam ।। 

kveva kasya kathaṃ nāma kuta āśvāsanaṃ mune ।
adya śvo vā padaṃ pāpo mṛtyur mūrdhni niyacchati ।। 

śarīraṃ parṇavad bhraṃśi jīvitaṃ jīrṇasaṃsthiti ।
dhīradhīratayā grastā rasā nīrasatāṃ gatāḥ ।। 

nītaṃ manorathair eva nīrasair āyur ātatam ।
na manasvi camatkārakāri kiñcid apīhitam ।। 

moho adya māndyam āyāto deho nehopapadyate ।
anāsthaivottamāvasthā sthānāsthaivādhamasthitiḥ ।। 

āpad āpatitaiveyaṃ mahāmohavidhāyinī ।
nityam ity eva mantavyaṃ saktavyaṃ neha saṃsṛtau ।। 

vidhibhiḥ pratiṣedhaiś ca śāstritair apy aśāstritaiḥ ।
yatheṣṭaṃ nīyate loko jalaṃ nimnonnatair iva ।। 

vivekāmodasarvasvaṃ cetaḥkusumakośataḥ ।
hṛtvā mūrchāṃ prayacchanti viṣayā viṣavāyavaḥ ।। 

asad eva tathā nāma dṛśyaṃ sattām upāgatam ।
yathā sad evāsadrūpaṃ sampannam asad eva sat ।। 

dolayantyo avanau dehaṃ sāgarān sāgarāṅganāḥ ।
yathā dhāvanti dhāvanti janatā viṣayāṃs tathā ।। 

dhāvanti viṣayaṃ lakṣyam unmuktāś cittasāyakāḥ ।
spṛśanti na guṇaṃ bhūyaḥ kṛtaghnās sauhṛdaṃ yathā ।। 

utpātavāyur evāyur mitrāṇy evātiśatravaḥ ।
bandhavo bandhanāny eva dhanāny evātinaidhanam ।। 

sukhāny evātiduḥkhāni sampadaḥ paramāpadaḥ ।
bhogā bhavamahārogā ratir eva parāratiḥ ।। 

āpadas sampadas sarvās sukhaṃ duḥkhāya kevalam ।
jīvitaṃ maraṇāyaiva bata māyā vijṛmbhate ।। 

bahūn kālaparāvartān iṣṭāniṣṭān sukhaṃ manāk ।
paśyan priyaviyogāṃś ca yāti jarjaratāṃ janaḥ ।। 

bhogā viṣayasambhogā bhogā iva phaṇāvatām ।
daśanty api manāk spṛṣṭā dṛṣṭanaṣṭāḥ pratikṣaṇam ।। 

āyur yāti nirāyāsapadasamprāptivarjitaiḥ ।
udarkabhaṅgurākāraiḥ karālaiḥ kaṣṭaceṣṭitaiḥ ।। 

bhogāśābaddhatṛṣṇānām avamānaḥ pade pade ।
ālānaparilīnānāṃ vanyānām iva dantinām ।। 

sampadaḥ pramadāś caiva taraṅgotsaṅgabhaṅgurāḥ ।
kas tāsv ahiphaṇācchattracchāyāsu ramate budhaḥ ।। 

satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmās satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ ।
kiṃ tu mattāṅganāpāṅgabhaṅgalolaṃ hi jīvitam ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyeṣu ramante viṣayeṣu ye ।
atyantavirasānteṣu patanti narakeṣu te ।। 

dvandvadoṣoparuddhāni dussādhāny asthirāṇi ca ।
dhanāny abhavyasevyāni mama jātu na tuṣṭaye ।। 

āpātamātramadhurā duḥkhaparyavasāyinī ।
mohanāyaiva lokasya lakṣmīḥ kṣaṇavināśinī ।। 

āpātaramaṇīyāni vimardavirasāny ati ।
sukhāny āpatpradhānāni saṅgatāni khalair iva ।। 

śaradambudharacchāyāgatvaryo yauvanaśriyaḥ ।
āpātaramyā viṣayāḥ paryantaparitāpinaḥ ।। 

antakaḥ paryavasthātā jīvite mahatām api ।
calāny āyūṃṣi śākhāgralambāmbūnīva dehinām ।। 

jīryante jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ ।
kṣīyate jīryatas sarvaṃ tṛṣṇaivaikā na jīryate ।। 

bhogābhogātigahane sarvasmin kāyakānane ।
param ullāsam āyāti tṛṣṇaikā viṣamañjarī ।। 

bālyaṃ yauvanavad yāti yauvanaṃ yāti bālyavat ।
upamānopameyatvaṃ bhaṅguratve mitho anayoḥ ।। 

jīvitaṃ galati kṣipraṃ jalam añjalito yathā ।
pravāha iva vāhinyā gataṃ na vinivartate ।। 

jhagity evāgato dehaḥ kuto apy arjunavātavat ।
yāti paśyata evāstaṃ taraṅgāmbudadīpavat ।। 

ramyeṣv aramyatā dṛṣṭā sthireṣv asthiratāpi ca ।
satyeṣv asatyatārtheṣu teneha virasā vayam ।। 

sukhaṃ yad ātmaviśrāntau gate manasi sattvatām ।
pātāle bhūtale svarge tan na bhogeṣu keṣucit ।। 

api sampūrṇahṛdyārthāḥ pañcāpīndriyavṛttayaḥ ।
nāvarjayanti mām etā bhṛṅgaṃ citralatā iva ।। 

adya dīrgheṇa kālena nirahaṅkṛtinā mayā ।
svargāpavargavaitṛṣṇyam idam āsāditaṃ dhiyā ।। 

ciram ekāntaviśrāntyai tenaitan nabhasaḥ padam ।
tvam ivāgatavān atra dṛṣṭavān asmi tāṃ kuṭīm ।। 

adyaitat samparijñātaṃ yad dhi sā bhavataḥ kuṭī ।
āgantā tvaṃ punaś ceti jñāyate kvāvicāritam ।। 

tadā tv atra mayā jñātaṃ kaścit siddho ayam ātmanā ।
dehaṃ tyaktveha nirvāṇaṃ gata ity anumāninā ।। 

etan me bhagavan vṛttam eṣo asmīti yathāsthitam ।
mayā te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā jānāsi tat kuru ।। 

siddhair na yāvad avadhānaparair vicārya nirṇītam uttamadhiyāntar aśeṣavastu ।
tāvat trikālakalanāṃ na vidanti kāñcid ity abjajādimanaso api mune svabhāvaḥ ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne ākāśāmaṇḍape siddhasamāgamagāthāvarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

ekapañcāśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

atha hemamayākāśavistīrṇāyāṃ mahābhuvi ।
sauhārdād eva siddhasya tasyedam aham uktavān ।। 

tvayā na kevalaṃ yāvan mayāpi na vicāritam ।
avyāptirahitā nāma na sambhavati dehatā ।। 

yasmān mayā tavodantaṃ vicāryāsau sthirīkṛtā ।
na kuṭī vyomni yena tvam abhaviṣyas sthirasthitiḥ ।। 

tasmāt kamalapatrākṣa yad gataṃ gatam eva tat ।
vicāryātītam utsṛjya paśya sāmpratikīṃ sthitim ।। 

uttiṣṭha siddhalokeṣu nivasāvo yathāsthitam ।
svāspadasthitayas saumyās svātmasiddhau susādhanam ।। 

iti nirṇīya tāv āvām utplutau tārakopamau ।
samam ekapuṭoḍḍīnau vyoma yantropalāv iva ।। 

praṇāmapūrvam anyo'nyam atha kṛtvā visarjanam ।
gatas so abhimataṃ deśam ahaṃ cābhimataṃ gataḥ ।। 

iti vṛttāntam akhilam uktavān asmi rāghava ।
tavāścaryamayīṃ paśya saṃsṛtīnāṃ vicitratām ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhagavaṃs tava deho asau pṛthivyām aṇutāṃ gataḥ ।
bhrāntaḥ kena śarīreṇa siddhalokāṃs tato bhavān ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

āṃ sṃrtaṃ śṛṇu kiṃ vṛttaṃ tato mama jagadgṛhe ।
bhramatas siddhasenāsu lokapālapurīṣu ca ।। 

aham indrapuraṃ prāpto na kaścit tatra dṛṣṭavān ।
mām imaṃ deharahitam ātivāhikadehinam ।। 

ahaṃ kila tadā rāma sampanno gaganākṛtiḥ ।
na cādhāro na cādheyaś cidākāśamayātmakaḥ ।। 

na grahītā na ca grāhyas tvādṛśārthāvabodhinām ।
na caiva deśakālānāṃ kvacid āvṛtikārakaḥ ।। 

aruddhaś ca padārthaughais svayaṃ svānubhavonmukhaḥ ।
vyavahartā tathābhūtair eva pumbhir manomayaiḥ ।। 

svapnānubhūtayo rāma dṛṣṭānto atrāvikhaṇḍitaḥ ।
anubhūtyapalāpaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt tena te astv alam ।। 

yathā svapne naro gehe vyavahartā na dṛśyate ।
tathā tadā na dṛṣṭo asmi purasstho api nabhogataiḥ ।। 

aham anyaṃ prapaśyāmi pārthivākārabhāvanam ।
mām ātivāhikātmānaṃ na kaścid api paśyati ।। 

rāmaḥ

na dṛśyate videhatvād bhavān vyomavapur yadi ।
tat kathaṃ tena siddhena dṛṣṭo asi kanakāvanau ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

asmadādir jano rāma yathāsaṅkalpitārthabhāk ।
nāsaṅkalpitam āpnoti satyakāmavapur yataḥ ।। 

vyavahāreṣu magnena laukikeṣv amalātmanā ।
kṣaṇād vismāryate puṃsā svātivāhikatātmanaḥ ।। 

mayā paśyatu mām eṣa iti saṅkalpitaṃ tadā ।
tena māṃ dṛṣṭavān eṣa svasaṅkalpārthabhājanam ।। 

jano jaraḍhabhedatvān na saṅkalpārthabhājanam ।
sa eva jīrṇabhedatvāt satyakāmatvabhājanam ।। 

dvayos tu siddhayos siddha viruddhepsitayor mithaḥ ।
adhikaikāvadātātmā jayī puruṣayatnavān ।। 

bhramatas siddhasenāsu lokapālapurīṣu me ।
vismṛtā vyavahāraughais sātivāhikatātmanaḥ ।। 

yadā tadāham amarair vyavahartuṃ sahāmbare ।
pravṛtto na ca māṃ kaścit tatra paśyati cañcalam ।। 

atyantam apy āraṭataś śabdo na śrūyate mama ।
kenacit suralokeṣu svapnapuṃsa ivānagha ।। 

avaṣṭabdhuṃ pravṛttasya nānyāvaṣṭabdhaye mama ।
sampadyate kiñcid api manomananadehinaḥ ।। 

evaṃ vyomapiśāco ahaṃ sampanno raghunandana ।
mayānubhūtā kāpy eṣā devāgārapiśācatā ।। 

rāmaḥ

piśācās santi loke asmin kimākārāḥ kimāspadāḥ ।
kiṃjātiyāḥ kimācārāḥ kīdṛśāḥ kīdṛśāśayāḥ ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

piśācās santi lokeṣu yādṛśās tān imāñ śṛṇu ।
na sabhyo asau na yo vakti prasaṅgāpatitaṃ vacaḥ ।। 

piśācāḥ kecid ākāśasadṛśāś śūnyadehakāḥ ।
hastapādādisaṃyuktāṃ paśyanti tvam ivākṛtim ।। 

chāyayā bhayadāyinyā tv anyārthabhramarūpayā ।
te cittākramaṇaṃ kṛtvā vedhayanti narāśayam ।। 

ghnanty adanti pibanty āśu laghusattvaṃ calaṃ janam ।
balamāṃsam atho jīvān hiṃsanty ākramya cittakam ।। 

ākāśasadṛśāḥ kecit kecin nīhārasannibhāḥ ।
kecit svapnanarākārās sākārā api khātmakāḥ ।। 

kecit svapnanaraprakhyāḥ kecit pavanadehakāḥ ।
kecid bhramātmakā eva sarve buddhimanomayāḥ ।। 

grahītuṃ naiva yujyante grahītuṃ śaknuvanti no ।
ākāśaśūnyavapuṣaḥ paśyanty ākṛtim ātmanaḥ ।। 

śītātapādivihitaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vidanti ca ।
pātum attum avaṣṭabdhum īhante śaknuvanti no ।। 

icchādveṣabhayakrodhalobhamohasamanvitāḥ ।
mantrauṣadhatapodānadhairyadharmavaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 

sattvāvaṣṭambhayantreṇa mantreṇārādhitena vā ।
dṛśyante api ca gṛhyante kadācit kenacit kvacit ।। 

devayonir hi sā tena kecid devopamarddhayaḥ ।
kecin narasamaśrīkāḥ kecin nāgasamarddhayaḥ ।। 

śvasṛgālopamāḥ kecid grāmajaṅgalavāsinaḥ ।
kulyāvakararathyāsu vasanti nirayeṣu ca ।। 

etad āspadam eteṣām ityākārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।
piśācā evamācārā janmaiṣāṃ śrūyatām idam ।। 

acetyacinmayaṃ brahma sarvaśaktisvabhāvataḥ ।
yat sthitaṃ buddham evāntaś cetyaṃ saṅkalpayat tv iva ।। 

taj jīvaṃ viddhi sa prauḍhas tv ahaṅkāra iti smṛtaḥ ।
so ahaṅkāras smṛtaḥ puṣṭo mana ity uditātmabhiḥ ।। 

sa eṣa kathyate brahmā saṅkalpākāśarūpavān ।
asad evāsato bījaṃ jagato vigatākṛti ।। 

evaṃ manas sthito brahmā sadeho apy amalaṃ nabhaḥ ।
tat svapnapuruṣākāras sann evāsadvapus sadā ।। 

pṛthvyādimūrtirahitas tv ātivāhikadehavān ।
pṛthvyādayaḥ kila kutas saṅkalpapuruṣasya khe ।। 

bhavanmano yathākāśapuraṃ paśyati kalpitam ।
tathā mano viriñcatvaṃ paśyaty ātmani kalpitam ।। 

yad vetti kalpitaṃ tat sa paśyaty anubhavaty api ।
yo yāvanmātrakas tat sa kasmāt kila na paśyati ।। 

sa yat paśyati tat tādṛk śūnyātmā śūnyam ambare ।
brahma brahmaṇi vā brahmā tad idaṃ jagad ucyate ।। 

tathā sa pratibhāso asya cirakālaikabhāvanāt ।
ghanībhūtas sthitaḥ puṣṭas sudīrghasvapnasundaraḥ ।। 

ātivāhikadehasya tasya tac cirabhāvanāt ।
sargānubhavanaṃ bhūri brahmaṇo brahmarūpy api ।। 

gataṃ prakaṭatotkarṣād ādhibhautikadehatām ।
tenaiva sarga ity ukto bhedasantatibhāsuraḥ ।। 

sa brahmā brahmamātrātmā brahmamātrātmanos tayoḥ ।
ajātayor eva sadā tad ātmajagator dvayoḥ ।। 

abhinnayor eva bhṛśaṃ śūnyatvāmbarayor iva ।
aikātmyenaiva lasatoḥ pavanaspandayor iva ।। 

vetti bhūtamayatvaṃ tan mithyaiva na tu vāstavam ।
tathā yathā tvaṃ saṅkalpapuruṣasya sato asataḥ ।। 

tataś śarīradhātūnāṃ tena pṛthvyādikāḥ kṛtāḥ ।
abhidhāḥ pañca citṣaṣṭhā jagad ity eva tās sthitāḥ ।। 

yathā tv asatya evāyaṃ saṅkalpas satya eva te ।
tathāsāv ātmasaṅkalpaṃ satyam evānubhūtavān ।। 

sa svayaṃ cinmayākāśas tatsaṅkalpaś cidambaram ।
atas svapno jagat sarvaṃ kva tau nāśodbhavau sthitau ।। 

yathaiva tanmanas satyaṃ tadaṃśās satyam eva te ।
tathaiva tatkṛtāś candrarudrārkendramarīcayaḥ ।। 

evaṃsthite jagajjālaṃ tan manorājyam ucyate ।
tac ca śūnyaṃ nirālambam ākāśam aghanaṃ citi ।। 

yathā svapnapuraṃ vyoma saṅkalpādrir yathā nabhaḥ ।
tathā brahma jagac caiva kham evāccham anākṛti ।। 

evam ābhāsamātrasya kacato aniśam avyayam ।
sargādimadhyāntadṛśo mudhaivātroditās sthitāḥ ।। 

kiṃ cidākāśakośasya tava vā mama vānagha ।
jagato vāpi jāyeta kiṃ vā naśyati me vada ।। 

tat kimartham anarthāya nirarthakam apārthakāḥ ।
kasmād abhyuditā brūhi rāgadveṣabhayādayaḥ ।। 

vastuto aṅga na sargādir na sargo nāpy asargatā ।
vidyate sakṛdābhātam idam itthaṃ sad eva tat ।। 

aśūnye vipulābhoge svacchacijjalapūrite ।
kalanāpaṅkakalile bhaviṣyaccittadardure ।। 

antarikṣākṣayakṣetre khātmano gaganātmikā ।
tasmād bījād iyaṃ jātā bhūribhūtaśilāvaliḥ ।। 

nāsti kiñcid iha kṣetraṃ vyuptaṃ ca na ca kiñcana ।
na bījam asti no jātaṃ kiñcit sarvaṃ ca saṃsthitam ।। 

yāś śilāvalayas tv atra puṣṭās tā vibudhādayaḥ ।
yās tu varṇojjvalā etās tās sthitā buddhabuddhayaḥ ।। 

yās tv ardhapakvās tā etā naranāgādijātayaḥ ।
yās tv āśyānā rajonaṣṭās tāḥ krimisthāvarādayaḥ ।। 

yās tv agurvyaḥ phalair hīnāś śūnyākārāḥ kṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।
aśarīrāś śarīriṇyas tāḥ piśācādikās smṛtāḥ ।। 

na hi saṅkalpinas svecchā kvacit paryanuyujyate ।
tās tathecchā viriñcasya tathā rāma tadoditāḥ ।। 

sarvā eva cidākāśarūpiṇyo bhūtajātayaḥ ।
ātivāhikadehinyaḥ pṛthvyādirahitātmikāḥ ।। 

tāś cirābhyāsavaśatas tv ādhibhautikasaṃvidam ।
prāptā dīrghānubhavanāt svapnā jāgraddaśām iva ।। 

piśācādyās tathā hy ete tathābhūtādhibhautikāḥ ।
tiṣṭhanti tuṣṭamanasas svasaṃsāravihāriṇaḥ ।। 

paśyanti kāścid anyo'nyaṃ grāmyā grāmeyakān iva ।
svapnaikalokavāstavyā ivaitā bhūtajātayaḥ ।। 

kāścid bahunaraprāptasvapnanirmāṇalokavat ।
nānyo'nyam abhipaśyanti nānāsaṃsthānasaṃsthitim ।। 

sthitā yathaitā jagati piśācādyāḥ kujātayaḥ ।
prāyas tathaitāḥ kumbhāṇḍayakṣapretādayas sthitāḥ ।। 

yathā yatreha vai nāgā jalaṃ tatraiva tiṣṭhate ।
tathā yatra piśācādyās tamas tatrāvatiṣṭhate ।। 

madhyāhne api piśācaś ced ajire tiṣṭhati svayam ।
tat tasyāndhaṃ tamas tatra sannidhānaṃ karoty alam ।। 

na nihanti ca tad bhānur na cānyas tat prapaśyati ।
sa eva cānubhavati paśya māyāvijṛmbhitam ।। 

avinābhāvi candrādes taijasaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yathā ।
piśācāder ananyātma tāmasaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tathā ।। 

yānti tejasy anojastvaṃ tamasy ojaḥpradhānatām ।
ulūkavat piśācādyā ā sṛṣṭes tatsvabhāvataḥ ।। 

eṣā piśācādijanasya jātiḥ proktā mayā te samayānapetā ।
piśācatulyas suralokapālalokeṣu jāto aham iti prasaṅgāt ।। 

pāṣāṇopakhyāne piśācaprasaṅgena jagadbrahmaṇor aikyapratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

dvipañcāśaduttaradviśatatamas sargaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ

tataś cidākāśavapur bhūtapañcakavarjitaḥ ।
viharann aham ākāśe piśāca iva saṃsthitaḥ ।। 

na māṃ paśyanti candrārkaśakrā hariharādayaḥ ।
na devasiddhagandharvakinnarā nāpsarogaṇāḥ ।। 

nākrāmanti mayākrāntā na ca śṛṇvanti madvacaḥ ।
ity ahaṃ moham āpanno vikrīta iva sajjanaḥ ।। 

atha cintitavān asmi satyakāmā ime vayam ।
paśyantu māṃ suragaṇās tena tasmin surālaye ।। 

draṣṭuṃ pravṛttā mām agre vāstavyās sarva eva te ।
jhagity eva puraḥ prāptam indrajāladrumaṃ yathā ।। 

atha gīrvāṇageheṣu sampanno vyavahāry aham ।
yathāsthitasamācāras sthito niśśaṅkaceṣṭitaḥ ।। 

yair avijñātavṛttāntair dṛṣṭo aham ajirotthitaḥ ।
vasiṣṭhaḥ pārthiva iti lokeṣu prathito asmi taiḥ ।। 

vātāt samudito dṛṣṭo yair ahaṃ gaganāspade ।
siddhair vātavasiṣṭhākhyas tair ahaṃ samudāhṛtaḥ ।। 

vyomany ādityaraśmibhyo dṛṣṭo ahaṃ yair nabhogataiḥ ।
vasiṣṭhas taijasa iti lokeṣu prathito asmi taiḥ ।। 

yair ahaṃ salilād dṛṣṭaḥ protthitas tair munīśvaraiḥ ।
prokto vārivasiṣṭho aham iti me janmasantatiḥ ।। 

tataḥ prabhṛti loke ahaṃ pārthivaḥ prathitaḥ kvacit ।
ammayaḥ kvacid anyeṣāṃ taijaso mārutaḥ kvacit ।। 

atha kālena me tatra tasminn evātivāhike ।
ādhibhautikatā dehe rūḍhā gūḍhāntarikṣatā ।। 

yad etad ātivāhitvam ādhibhautikatā ca kham ।
dvayam apy etad ekātma tataḥ kacati me citiḥ ।। 

evamātmakacidvyomakacanātmāpy ahaṃ nabhaḥ ।
param eva nirākāraṃ yuṣmāsv ākāravān api ।। 

jīvanmukto vyavaharann apy āste brahmakhātmakaḥ ।
tathaiva dehamukto api tiṣṭhati brahmamātrakam ।। 

mama na brahmatāpeti tādṛg vyavaharann api ।
asambhavād anyadṛśo yuṣmadādiṣv ahaṃ tv aham ।। 

yathājñasya svapnanare nirjanmani nirākṛtau ।
ādhibhautikatābuddhis tathā me jagato api ca ।। 

evam evāvabhāsante sarva eva svayambhuvaḥ ।
sargāś ca na tu jāyante prajātā iva coditāḥ ।। 

eṣa so aham ihākāśavasiṣṭhaḥ puṣṭatām iva ।
gato adya svātmano abhyāsād bhavatāṃ cābhavasthitiḥ ।। 

ākāśātmāna evaite sarva eva svayambhuvaḥ ।
yathā te manmanomātram ime sargās tathaiva hi ।। 

ahamādir ayaṃ sargas tv aparijñānadoṣataḥ ।
vetāla iva bālānāṃ gato vai vajrasāratām ।। 

parijñātas tu kālena svalpenaivopaśāmyati ।
vāsanātānavāt sneho bandhau dūragate yathā ।। 

ghanatvam ahamādy asya tathā sargasya śāmyati ।
parijñānād yathā svapnanidher ādeyabhāvanā ।। 

śāmyantīmāḥ parijñātās sakalā dṛśyadṛṣṭayaḥ ।
yathā marunadīvegavārigrahaṇabuddhayaḥ ।। 

mahārāmāyaṇaprāyaśāstraprekṣaṇamātrataḥ ।
etad āsādyate nityaṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram ।। 

saṃsāravāsanābhāvarūpasatyā tu yasya dhīḥ ।
mandā mokṣe nirākāṅkṣā sa śvā kīṭo atha vānaraḥ ।। 

rāmaḥ

bhogābhogaḥ kilāyaṃ yas sa jīvanmuktabuddhinā ।
kīdṛśo bhujyamānas syāt kīdṛk syān maurkhyasevinā ।। 

vasiṣṭhaḥ

mahārāmāyaṇaprāyaśāstraprekṣaṇamātrataḥ ।
antaś śītalatodeti padārtheṣu himopamā ।। 

mokṣaś śītalacittatvaṃ bandhas santaptacittatā ।
etasminn api nārthitvam aho lokasya mūrkhatā ।। 

ayaṃ prakṛtyā viṣayair vaśīkṛtaḥ parasparaṃ strīdhanalolubho janaḥ ।
yathārthasandarśanatas sukhībhaven mumukṣuśāstrārthavicāraṇād ataḥ ।। 

vālmīkiḥ

ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye astam ino jagāma ।
snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma ।। 

pāṣāṇopākhyāne vasiṣṭhaśarīravarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ

samāpto ayaṃ pāṣāṇopākhyānakaḥ
